 
 Ataṣ akka n tɣiwanin i d-yezgan deg twilayt n Bgayet ttidirent deg waɣbel n waman n tissit. Yagi asmi ara ad d-yaweḍ weẓɣal, anda aman ttxaṣṣan aṭaṣ. Ibarbacen, d yiwwet akkeni n tɣiwant i yellan s kra n 35 ikilumiṭren ɣef Bgayet. Deg tɣiwant-agi igna mači dayen i xuṣṣen. Aman n tissit deg tama-agi d-aɣubel amuqran, imi xuṣṣen deg iqudas n tissit. Ɛla ḥsab imezdaɣ n tɣiwant-agi i d-yezgan deg yidurar n Lbabur, aman ttasen-d tikelt kan deg 5 n wussan. Yerna, aman-agi n tissit ttuɣalen-d deg yiqudas kra n swayeɛ kan deg 5 wussan ! Ayagi dayen ibanen ur yessefraḥ ara Ibarbacen, imi ɣas akken ttaččaren ibidunen wigi ur d-keffun ara i nnig n krad n wussan. Ayagi i demmer-iten akken ad d-aɣen iwumi nessawal aman n « les citernes » akken ad sxedmen aman i wayen ilaqen. Ama i tissit, i tarda (leqlul, tiɣerɣert, acucef,…)…Maca, « les citernes », tigi, imezdaɣ ttaɣent-ent-id ɣlayit: ger 1000 d 1200 idinaren ! Ayagi, mači akk imezdaɣ i yezemren ad d-aɣen aman, acku llant aṭaṣ n twaculin ur lḥiqent ara iman-nsent. « Aman dagi ɣurneɣ (Ibarbacen) d-agnu amuqran. Uɣalen as t-iniḍ d-uraɣ! Imi, nukni n-uɣal nettnadi ɣef tiqqit n waman ṭul n-useggas. Yagi deg unebdu, anda aman ttexaṣṣan mliḥ. Akka daw n sin wagguren ad d-yaweḍ waggur n Remḍan, aɣubel n waman ad yenerni fell-aneɣ. Ur neẓri ara akka tifrat n tazɣent-agi n waman n tissit ! » i aɣ d-yenna yiwen n Mas, bab twacult i zedɣen deg tama-agi n Iberbacen. Imezdaɣ d tidet, fuden, ulac amek ad d-afen tasarut i wagnu-agi n lixṣaṣ n waman n tissit deg yiqudas. Maca, yella akkeni yiwen usenfar yeɛnan acuddu n tɣiwant n Iberbacen ɣer waman n-ubaraǧ n Tici Ḥaf. Dacu kan, mazal ar ass-a ur iban ara usenfar-agi ma yella ad yeḍru neɣ ala. Imezdaɣ ttraǧun… »Araǧu yuɣal d lbatel… » akken yecna ucennay awaɣzniw Ayt Mengellet. Ma yella akka, Ibarbacen ttraǧun, acku d-araǧu kan isen-id yeqqimen! Deg tallit-agi, mazaliten ttraǧun tuɣalin n waman deg yiqudas n tissit kul 5 n wussan. I waya, mači d lbaṭel tura ?

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Iternet neɣ aẓeṭṭa n tissist akken i d-as-qqaren kra, d yiwen wallal atiknuluji atrar. Tettuneḥsab d ttawil amaynut n teywelt i yetteqqnen talsa n umaḍal. Tettuneḥsab, daɣen, d amḍiq ussnan anda ttemllilin yimusnawen, yimedyazen d yimyura…atg. D tin i d-ittawin isallen ɣef yal taɣult, ama d tadamsa, tasekla neɣ ɣef yal tamurt deg umaḍal. S usexdem n ttawil-a ajdid, yezmer yal amdan ad iwali ayen yellan daxel-is. Yezmer ad d-yagem seg-s ayen yebɣa, yerna, ma ira, yezmer ad as-yernu kra. Yal amdan yezmer ad iqelleb deg-s, ad yexdem tazrawt. Yezmer ad iɣer s yal tutlayt di temkerḍitin-is d yimawalen-is. Llant ula d timsirin d iluɣma d yidlisen n yal aska. Yal asentel deg-s ɣur-s tansa; amedya ma yebɣa yiwen ad inadi ɣef tsekla tamaziɣt, ilaq fell-as ad yaru deg umḍiq-nni n unadi: www.imyura.net neɣ www.tamazight-tura.com. Ma yebɣa daɣen ad iḥewwes ɣef tinsiwin yesεan assaɣ d yidles amaziɣ sumata, issefk fell-as ad inadi 

 deg: http/www.tamurth.net, neɣ www.amazigh world.org neɣ www.inalco.fr. 

 Tuɣal ass-a Internet d tifrat i waṭas n wuguren, yecban anadi ɣef yidles d tɣerma, ama d tiqburin neɣ d tid n tura. Tessaweḍ terra amaḍal amzun d taddart tameẓyant, imi yezmer ad yili dagi deg tmurt n Lezzayer, ad yettmeslay d yiwen niḍen yellan di Marikan, yerna ad ttemwalin di sin srid deg Internet. Zik, I wakken ad tazneḍ tabrat sya seg Lezzayer ɣer tmurt n Fransa, ma ulac maḍi ad teqqim 20 n wussan neɣ aggur, maca ass-a s ttawil n Internet ad tt-tceggεeḍ imir, ad taweḍ imir. Ihi, ibaɣuren n Internet mačči yiwen, akken ad ten-id-nebder, maca akken i telha i tfuḥ, alaḥsab n wamek itt-isexdem umdan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> ADAOUN Abdelghani  

  
 Ussan-agi ineggura, azɣal yenerna. Tifasniwin (degrés) ɛeddan-t i 40. Ḥamu yessefcel akk imdanen, ladɣa yedukkel lakked Ṛemḍan. Iṭij yekkat srid ɣer uqarru, rwel kan ɣer tili, neɣ mulac atteweḍ ! Medden deg yiberdan teddu-n tili tili, acku iṭij yeqwa dayen kan ! Tiyita-ines, yagi ɣer uqerru, tuɛar, tezmar attexdem axeṣṣar deg wemdan. Maca, n wala yiwet akken n t’ɣawsa teswahmaɣ aṭaṣ: Deg lfirmat n tama n Ṛaffur lakked Buaklan, i d-yezgan deg t’ɣiwant n yimceddalen, neẓra ifellaḥen (adrar n sber !) xedmen akal seddaw yiwen yiṭij isseraɛ iɣyal. Ɣas akken d-azal, d-aẓɣal, ifellaḥen-agi xedmen akal, ɣelten lɣella yerna « uẓamen »! Ayagi yeswahmaɣ aṭaṣ. Deg yimir-nni, llan imdanen xedmen i tili, deg taṣmuḍi (la climatisation) yerna smaɛgizen, gganen ! Ttafen-d sseba d Ṛemḍan, akken ad « sfinyinen ».

 Ifellaḥen-agi, irgazen n ṣber kkaten taceṭabit, tidi tettcercur. Deg lfirma i d-yezgan deg taddart n Ṛaffur, anda ẓẓan dellaɛ, ifellaḥen swayen lɣella-agi s waman. Xedmen tiregwa akken ad ɛeddin waman ɣer yimɣan n dellaɛ. Wagi yebda i tefɣed, d-azegzaw i dewwer. Ahat kra n wussan kan akka ad yew ! Jmaɛ liman yar sɛan yiwen n lkuraǧ…Maca, d wagi i d-aɣrum. Ur ed yettas ara kan akka. Ilaq cwiṭ n laɛtab, ma drus ! Deg lfirma nniḍen, yella-n deg Buaklan , llan daɣen aṭaṣ n yifellaḥen iɣelten, tikkelt-a, lbaṭaṭa. Ass-nni imi d nɛedda zdat lfirma-agi, neẓra ifellaḥen-agi ɣelten lbaṭaṭa seddaw yiwen yiṭij yessefsay uzzal. Ɣas akken, ilemẓiyen-agi xedmen akkal, ula-send yecliɛ ara ma d-aẓɣal. Ddin uqabac ! wigi uklalen arraz, neɣ xarṣum tajmilt. Ihi Tajmilt sɣur-neɣ nerra-y-asen-tt. Yegrad warraz…D-acu kan, ɣas akken yuɛar uxeddim n yifellaḥen-agi, maca lexlaṣ nsen ur yeṣṣiweḍ ara azal n tidi nsen yettcercuren am t’ḥemmalin. Xedmen s-ujurni ( s wass) mebla lasurans. Tella daɣen yiwet n t’ɣawsa nniḍen: Axeddim n wakal i wexxar aṭaṣ iseggasen-agi ineggura. Ifellaḥen xuṣṣen mliḥ. Yuɣ lḥal, ilmeẓyen regwlen ɣef wakal, akken ad xedmen kan ayen fessusen. Jmaɛ liman axeddim n wakal yesɛa azal-is ! Mebla afellaḥ (yettuḥeqren) amejjay, aǧinyur, aselmad, aselway, aneɣlaf,..atg ur tetten ara. Ad ččen iblaḍen. Ahawt, ilaq arrazen i yifellaḥen…!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Amzun akken idelli kan i d-tedra. Tikli n wazal n krad n yimelyunen n Yiqbayliyen di tmaneγt tura s yisekkilen n wura&amp;gamma,; imi d tin yessawden tesdukkel-d ttaqa n yimdanen i wakken ad ssutren deg udabu azref-nsen deg tudert di liser. Amek ihi, i nezmer ass-a ad nerr lehğab γef usiher yecban wa, lawan ideg yal mi ara t-id-yebder yiwen ad yini ; « ahlil a tikli n 14 di yunyu ! ». Acu yessawḍen γer liḥala-agi ? Am wakken i tella d lƐadda γer Yiqbayliyen, akken kan ara d-yawed waggur n yebrir, ad yebdu leqdic i umeskti n tefsut n yimaziγen. Maca aseggas n 2001, ur yelli am wid iƐeddan, imi tignewt tbeddel, lihala tenhewwal. Deg wass n 18 seg waggur n yebrir, tedra-d yiwet n tedyant n tmettant n yiwen n yilemzi n At Dwala deg lkazirna n yiğadarmiyen. Wagi, d Guermah Massinissa yellan yakan d anelmad deg tesnawit. Dγa d tiqit i d-igeggden aqbuc, imi deg tama n Bgayet, deg Amizour beddemma yella-d nnec imi krad n yinelmaden ssawlen-asen-d yiğadarmiyen mi llan teddun s aγerbaz. Ihi, asfugel s tefsut n yimaziγen yenneqlab γer ccwal d yimenγi. Yal ass, ad d-yennulfu usuγu deg yiwet n temnadt almi tamurt n Leqbayel tenhewwal imerra. Times tu&amp;gamma,; amek ara texsi ? Dγa, di ddiq ala agerruj n lejdud ma yessaweḍ γer tifrat. Ihi, dinna i d-ilul umussu n leɛrac yezdin ama d tudrin ama d tiγawanin. Yal tamnaḍt tefka-d wid yettmeslayen s yisem-is, imir yebda ccwar i wakken ad teḥbes tazzla n yidammen. Dγa d tamsalt-a n tmettant n yilmeẓyen i yessekren ahetwir deg yimdanen, imi mačči ḥala Massinissa i yemmuten, maca ulac ass ara yezrin mebla ma yessegla yid-s tarwiḥt. Lxuf yewweḍ s imnaren, abbuh ay iɛerḍiyen. Amussu n leɛrac iwala belli twulem yiwet n tγerγert ara yessiweḍ s afus n uselway n tmurt i wakken di tizwar ad yeḥbes lhem, tis snat ad d-yebru akka i lxir yellan deg ufus-is i wakken tamurt n Leqbayel ad d-teffeγ seg lḥers ideg tettidir ama d ayen yerzan anegmu, isenfaren, axeddim…Ihi, yella-d akka umwata γef wass n 14 di yunyu i wakken ad d-tili tikli meqqren i wakken adabu ad d-yerr i tiγri. Maca, ayen yerğan imesbaniyen mačči d ayen isehlen. Akken kan wwden yimezwura γer « Champ de manœuvres » deg tmaneγt, iqubel-iten-d yiwen n uγarab n yimessulta ur as-neğği ara abrid ad alin γer Lmuradiya. Di lawan-nni ihi i yekker uhetwir, izra, lakrimujan, lemwas…Almi ula d sin n yimesjernanen ğğan din tirwihin-nsen mi akken yezdem fell-asen yiwen n unehhar n lkar. D isuγal n tegrawla, tamaneγt tuγal ur tettweɛqal ara. Asmi ur yessawed ara umussu n leɛrac ad yefk tiγerγert-nni n Leqser s afus n uselway n tigduda, yeqqers uzar n tugdi, tekcem tmurt n Leqbayel deg yir liḥala almi tsebbel 127 seg warraw-is gar yimleẓyen d tlawin rnu ugar n 5000 n yimejraḥ. Amek ihi i tkemmel taluft ? Asmi akken adabu iwala lḥers simmal yettzad, igzem-itt deg rray i wakken ad yerr tamaziγt d tutlayt taγelnawt deg tmendawt deg useggas n 2002 mebla ma isers-d tamsalt-a γer tefranin. D acu kan, ur yelli leqneƐɛ si tama n umussu n leɛrac iwalan dakken tiririt iwulem ad d-tili γef 14 n tneqqiḍin yellan deg tγerγert n Leqser. Almi d 2004 i d-yella umtawi γef umeslay gar udabu d yiγɛeggalen n Umussu. Sin n yiseggasen i itezzi umeslay d uciwer. Maca, ma nsers-d ass-a tamsalt s asenqed, acu d-yewwi umennuγ-agi, sani yessawed tamurt n Leqbayel ? Rray iban akka ad yemgarad seg wa γer wa, tal tama acu i teqqar, meɛna ayen i d-ibanen ur yezmir yiwen ad t-yeffer : γas ulamma ass-a tamaziγt ur telli ara akken i tt-mennan warraw-is, maca a-tt-an d tutlayt tunsibt deg tmendawt. Lehqara-nni yellan zik ur tt-mazal ara, imi amdan yettidir mebla tikerkas i t-yesseƐɛyan uqbel. Ma d amennuγ iban akka mazal ad ikemmel maca s wudem n usnulfu, n tira, n uxeddim. Ass-a, ur iwulem fell-aγ ad nenker idammen n wid yeγlin deg tallit-a taberkant, d tagnit ideg ara sen-nessiwed rreḥma.

  M. Smail 

  
 Am wakken ira wallus, yal mara ad yekfu yal akraḍyur (trimestre) n useggas n tɣuri, yal aɣerbaz ad yeg tagrawt n uɣerbaz (conseil de classe). D timlilit, anda ara ilin iselmaden merra, anemhal, akked yiɛessasen ladɣa bac ad mmeslayen ɣef waqqayen igejdanen i d-ibanen deg teɣzi n kraḍ n wayyuren: ma yella kra deg wacu xussen yinelmaden ed tneɣriyin, ma tufrar-d taluft i yuklalen ameslay, ma isubb-d neɣ yuli uswir n warrac…atg. Deg waya ihi, iga uɣerbaz alemmas n Tizwal am tal tikkelt, ayen swayes teffeɣ tegrawt-nni n wid iqeddcen din, ur temgerrad aṭas ɣef yiseggasen yezrin skud ur d-yelli umaynut, akken i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n uselmad deg uɣerbaz. D acu kan, ameslay yella isenned s waṭas ɣef waddad n usɣur (établissement) seg tama n wallalen, ayen akk merra i t-ixussen, ladɣa aɣilif n waman ed kra n wallalen n daxel. Maca daɣen, yella uneɣmis i yuklalen ad d-yebder yiwen, d tufrart n kra n yinelmaden iɛeddan tmenṭac ttelḥamen ɣer ttseɛṭac deg tlemmast-nsen n ukraḍyur-a amenzu. Amaynut i d-ibanen daɣen aseggas-a deg uɣerbaz alemmas n Tizwal, yerza tiferrawin n yigemmaḍ n warrac. Imi deg wayaqeddac tamhelt n uɣerbaz tettak-iten i warrac send imuras, ma d tura tuɣal tefren ad ten-tefk i yibabaten n warrac ɣef ilaq ad rzun i uɣerbac akken ad ḥsun s tlemmast n tarwa-nsen. Yelha ma nenna-d belli tikti-ya, tɛeṭṭel d aɛeṭṭel ur tettwassemres deg yiseggasen iɛeddan. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Taɣiwant n At Ɛisa Mimun i d-yezgan deg ugafa n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tebɛed fell-as azal n 15 km. Taɣiwant-agi ideg llant 23 n tudrin, tettwassen s tẓegwa meqqren am umadaɣ n taddart n Uqawej (Budkku) d win n Wat Berahem.

 Rnu ɣur-s, d taɣiwant i d-yeğğan aṭas n yinaẓuren yecban : Ali Ferḥati, Muḥend Raḥim, Bellxir Muḥend Aki , Karim Xelfawi d wiyaḍ-nniḍen. Taɣiwant-agi, mazal tettidir iseggasen-agi ineggura lexsas deg waṭas n yiḥricen d yisenfaren yemgaraden n tudert tartar, gar-asen lgaz n temdint. 

 Ugur-agi n usiweḍ n lgaz n temdint s ixxamen, irennun-d lḥif i yimezdaɣ n 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant-agi. Seg tlemmast n useggas n 2015 i bdan yimuhal n usekcem n lgaz s ixxamen deg kra n tudrin, ma d tudrin-nniḍen kra armi d tura i bdan lecɣal n usekcem-is. 

 Imezdaɣ n tuddar-agi ṛwan rray-nsen, ladɣa deg tallit n ccetwa, imi acḥal n tikkal i leḥun d likumiṭer i wakken ad d-awin taqerԑet n lgaz, ama d aggefur neɣ d adfel, tikwal ttuɣalen-d ifasen d ilmawen: ulac aṭas n tḥuna i yesnuzun lgaz n tqerεat. D ayen yeğğan imezdaɣ n tɣiwant-a ad d-gren tiɣri, yerna ad suturen deg wid teԑna temsalt gar-asen imeḍberen n tɣiwant At Σisa Mimun, iɣef yella ɣef uqerruy-is Mass Aki Chabane d tenmehla n yimuhal izuyaz (Direction des Travaux public), i wakken ad yili ukemmel n usenfar-a deg ussan-agi kan i d-iteddun. Ar melmi ara tdum akka, taɣiwant n At Σissa Mimun ad teqqim mebla lgaz n temdint?.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ddurt-agi yezrin, abrid aγelnaw wis 12 yeddar yir tagnit  deg tufγa id-yezgan deg unẓul n Tizi-Wezzu, γer tama n tqendert n Sidi Naεman, seba n yiwet n twaγit naγ asehwu n webrid id-yeḍran ass n larebεa 13 maggu yezrin lewhi n 12 n uzal, imi yiwen n lkar amecṭuḥ i yeṣawaḍen imdanen deg uzarig icuden ger Tizi-Wezzu d temnaḍt n Delles yetabaεen tawilayat n Bumerdes yeceḍ syen yeffeγ i ubrid. Tawaγit-agi tegla-d s 28 n yimejraḥ, ger-asen 07 deg yir liḥala. Deqs n yemdanen id-yefkan afus n tallet γer yidis n yiγalen n usellek, imi sawaḍen imejraḥ γer sbiṭar asedawan Neddir Muḥamed n Tizi-Wezzu i udawi. Deqs n yemḍebren εlayen n twilayat n Tizi-Wezzu i yesfaqden γef imuḍan i yeẓlen di sbiṭar Neddir Muḥamed n Tizi-Wezzu, maca tamedit n wass aṭas seg-sen i yefγen γer yexxamen-nsen mbaεd imi iduwan akken iwata lḥal.

<p style="text-align: right;"> I. B 

  
 Am yella aseggas, deg tallit n ucraw n uzemmur, lwelha tettruḥu s waṭas ɣer lɣella ara d-yerr umdan. Tikkelt-a, ulamma aṭas i d-yeqqaren d akken aɛeqqa yeɛmer, rnu yella deg useklu, ɣer lawan n yiziḍ asirem-nni akk yuɣal yexsi. Ɣef leḥsab n wid i d-nemmuger deg lemɛasrat, nnan-d belli lɣella txus, mačči d aya i yetturajun. ‘’Mi bdiɣ acraw, nwiɣ ad d-awiɣ nnig n waya, imi aɛeqqa yella, rnu yeshel i uɣelluy seg useklu. Maca, asmi i d-wwḍeɣ ɣer lemɛasra, ufiɣ leḥsab-iw imal, imi seg yiwen n uqenṭar, wwiɣ-d kan 13 n litrat’’. Dɣa d ayen i aɣ-d-yenna Brahim, yiwen seg yifellaḥen i nemlal. Seg tama-s, bab n lemɛasra, yewwi-aɣ-d tamentilt i iwala teǧǧa azemmur ur d-yefki ara lɣella aseggas-a. “Azɣal iɛeddan iceggeḍ azemmur mačči d kra. Almi i d-ɣlint tmiqwa n lehwa deg tuber iɛeddan, i d-yuɣal uɛeqqa meqqer. D ayen i t-yeǧǧan iɛeṭṭel i wakken ad yesɛu zzit. Ɣas akka tura yettban-d yemmed, tirect ddeqs-is, maca lɣella ad txas, imi aman ur d-usin ara deg lawan ilaqen”. D acu kan, deg tama n tudrin n udrar, lɣella tessefraḥ imdanen, imi deg uqenṭar, wwin-d yimdanen ugar n 18 n litrat. I wakken kan ad d-nesmekti, dakken azemmur n useggas-a mačči ixus deg lɣella, meɛna yegla ula s terwiḥin n kra n yimdanen. Deg La Crête-Rouge, d yiwen n urgaz yesɛan 36 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is i yessufɣen tarwiḥt mi akken i d-yeɣli seg yiwet n tzemmurt sdat n uxxam-is. Wayeḍ n 50 n yiseggasen, teḍra yid-s twaɣit yecban tin n umezwaru deg Lesnam, imi ula d netta ur yemniɛ ara seg lmut. Ma d ayen yerzan taruẓi d ujraḥ, leḥsab ur yenneqḍaɛ ara, imi yal ass nsel wa neɣ ta ɣlin-d seg tzemrin. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail. M 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Ddurt-agi yezrin, ass n 17 yennayer ideg nella, agraw n tddukliwin n tγiwant n Yillulen n umalu s lemεawna n tγiwant-agi, sudsen-d yiwet n temlilit taseddawant, anda isqardcen s telqay amezruy n tejmaεt leqbayel, amad taseddut, assa&amp;gamma,; izarfan d waṭas niḍen. Akken id-wwin awal γef ayen yerẓan taddert ass-a. Taddert, d yiwet n tkemmict n wakal i d-yezgan deg wedrar Aẓar n taddert yekka-d si tudert, imezdaγ-is am watmaten, zzin aεrur-nsen i berra, ttidiren amzun d yiwet n twacult. Taddert tebḍa d iderma, deqs n lecγal d tγawsiwin iten-yesdduklen, ibardan, timeγriwin, lğanazat, iγeblan n tmetti d waṭas niḍen. Taddert tesεa taseddut d yisuḍaf iten-iselḥayen, yal win ara yefγen abrid at-xeṭṭin, naγ ma yella iεuṣṣa at-sufγen di ttewfiq n taddert, syen ad-ihağar taddert niḍen. Taddert am yiwen n wexxam, tettili tegmat gar wid yettidiren deg-s, ttemεawanen akken ad-refden aman-nsen, ami yal tallit ttgen tiwiziwin, ticemliyin d waṭas niḍen. Tezzin i yiγeblan d wugguren akken taεkkemt ad-tifsus fell-asen. Dγa nwala merra d akken deqs n wansayen i yarẓan taddert ass-a. imi tudsa tbeddel udem rnu isuḍaf ttwarekḍen. Γef aya, agraw n tddukliwin n tγiwant n Yillulen umalu n wammas n Wizgan, uḍnen aγbel, d annect-a iten-idegren sudsen-d yiwet n temlilit taseddawant ass n 17 yennayer ideg nella, deg uγarbaz alemmas Hadjeb Muḥend uyidir id-yezgan di tlemast n tγiwant n Yillulen umalu, anda i ḥedren deqs n yiselmaden n tseddawiyin yemgaraden n Lmulud At-Mεemmer n Tizi-Wezzu, d Σebdaraḥman Mira n Bgayet, ger asen Allam Said d Kenzi Σezdin, Arezqi Hammoum, rnu imnuda i ttewxeṣen deg yeḥricen yemgaraden akked yemyura, ger-asen, Muḥend Larbi Tiyeb, Moussouni Akli, ulebsir Racid d waṭas niḍen. Imsaragen win-d awal γef tejmaεt n taddert d wayen id as-d-yezzin, d wayen i yarẓan taddert ass-a, am twenaḍt, tadamsa, iγeblan n tmetti d tagnit tamatut ideg tettidir taddert.Iswi n temlilit-agi taseddawant d tiririt n wazal i tejmaεt n taddert i yellan d laεnaya, d ajgu fi tressa tugtud d tdukli.

<p style="text-align: right;">Islam Bessa

  
 D iseggasen segmi iɣab wudem aḥeqqani n Terbaɛt n Yilmeẓyen n Leqbayel. D akud ɣezzif i yezrin ɣef wid i tt-iḥemmlen i tt-yeṭṭafaren, wid i yessaramen ad tt-ttwalin deg unnar n rrbeḥ. Acḥal ncedha lbenna n telɣuɣa d teqbucin. Aṭas i nebɣa i nettraǧu s ccuq ad numer s wayen tella tettawi. Nennum igemmaḍ igerrzen, nwulef aɛeyyeḍ n lferḥ s yiswiyen, maca tura ulac ad d-qqlen wussan-nni. Nezga nettemseqsay acimi tbeddel terbaɛt-nneɣ? I wacu aswir n wurar-is iwexxer ɣer deffir? Ayɣer ur tettili ara s ljehd n wuzzal d rrsas am zik? Ayen ur tettaẓ ara ɣer sdat?… D isteqsiyen i yesɛan tiririyin i aɣ-d-yettakken tidet qerriḥen. Tarbaɛt n uwraɣ d uzegzaw, tin i yeɛceq yal azwaw, i yeǧǧan iles n win i tt-ikerhen yekkaw, ur teqqim tetturar ɣef nnif d lasel. Kra yeffeɣ-itt iḍurr-itt, kra nniḍen yekcem-itt yewwet-itt. Nekni imi d tarwa-s i nella, yak yis-s i nzux deg teswiɛin-nni, d nettat i aɣ-d-yefkan amur nerna-t d ccan, ur aɣ-d-isaḥ leḥya d uxzay. Ihi, win i d-yeqqaren dakken yettḥibi JSK, tayri-s tleḥḥu deg yidammen-is, tezdeɣ ul-is, ur ilaq ad tt-yeǧǧ deg teswiɛin n ddiq. Ur d lɛali ma ibeɛɛed ɣef terbaɛt n lasel-is, ad tt-iɣunza ɣef wayen i d-yekkan sɣur wid i yesɛan iswi yexḍa assaɛli n yisem-is. Amek ara nettu JSK iɣef cnan yinaẓuren-nneɣ?! Amek ara nebru i nnif ad nessefreḥ wid-nni i tt-kerhen?! Iban dakken leḥmala n tidet tettdum i lebda, ur tt-yessenqas, ur tt-yettbeddil kra. Daymi yessefk ɣef leqbayel anda ma llan, ad fken tallelt i terbaɛt-nsen s usebɣes akken ad d-tufrar am yiḍelli. Ad neqqim neṭṭafar-itt ɣef yisem-is, fiḥel ad neg leḥsabat-nniḍen i d-igellun s wayen ur aɣ-yehwi. Amek i as-yenna unaẓur: Yid-m ass-a d uzekka, nekni dima akka, d idurar i aɣ-d-yettawin. Trebḥeḍ nettekka, ma txesreḍ d JSK, Acḥal i yesserbaḥ yisem-im.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Tezzi ihi deg Ayt Smaɛel tfaska n tmedyezt tamaziɣt s wayen akk llan ssarmen wid tt-yennumen s yimedyazen ed yimeɣnasen s umata. Ugar n tiwin n tmedyezt s tmenna yemgerraden, tin igerrzen, sɣur yimedyazen, tella-d tejmilt n wannuz i Lwennas n Ayt Lewnis (Meɛtub) s temzikknin (expositions), kraḍ n yisaragen gar wass amenzu ed wis sin, akked yiwen n uḥanu (atelier) ɣef umecwar-is n ccna sɣur massa Wataḥ Lynda ed temrawin n yimedyazen ed yimeɣnasen. War ma nesha ttiɛad ageɛmir n ccna sɣur Bujemɛa Agraw, ilemzi n Ayt Smaɛel Wali Ɛebdelɣani, rnu-yas ilemzi nniḍen seg tama n Bgayet. Akken, mi d-tewweḍ ass aneggaru tegnit n tikci n warrazen, iɣef ur d-nemmeslay ddurt yezrin, isaḥ-d warraz amezwaru i sin n yimedyazen Salmi Musa ed Qasa Taɛerqubt. Wis sin d tamedyezt Buciba Fatiḥa i t-yewwin, ma d wis kraḍ fkan-t i yilemẓi Qeddur Rabeḥ. Seg warrazen i yettunefken, yella-d daɣen warraz n yilemẓi i mass Bari Ɛebdelɣani, win n tmeṭṭut d Buseksu Linda i t-yuklalen, win n yimezgi i Sellam Ɛebdelḥamid, win n umɣar yeggra-d i Brabez Muḥend, ma d wid n tantala ttunefken sin i massat Lantri Raḥima akked Katyusajaḥ Ɛebdelwahab. Nnan-d awal ɣef tfaska-ya : ⁯Fares Bakuc (aselway n Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad): Deg wayen yerzan ahil n tfaska-ya, yeḍra-d merra wayen i d-nhegga. Amsizwer daɣen iɛedda deg tegnatin igerrzen, ideg nesla i tmedyezt tufrar, nwala udmawen d imaynuten. Ad snemreɣ kra n win i d-yefkan afus n tallelt deg usuddes (organisation) ladɣa ilemẓiyen n Udrar n Fad. Qeddur Rabeḥ (Arraz wis kraḍ) : Tazwara ad rreɣ tajmilt d tameqqrant i Tddukla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad ɣef leqdic-is i ur nesɛi tamtilt. Ma ɣef warraz wis kraḍ i d-ḥellaɣ, tidet kan ur gmineɣ ara fell-as imi i tikkelt tamenzut i ara ttekkiɣ di tfaska-a. Ɣas ma isefra swayes tekkiɣ d ayen yellan d amaynut. Leqdic n tfaska d ayen i yi-yeswehmen, imi fkan-as yiwen n rruḥ i tsekla taqbaylit d tmedyezt s umata. Ad hduɣ arraz-iw i yimeɣnasen n teqbaylit akken ma llan, ama ddren ama mmuten.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Almi ɛeddan ukuẓ n yiseggasen i d-teḥḍer tuffɣa tunsibt n yiseɣrez (album) amaynut n Farid Ferragi, bab n tezlit n tayri ed yiḥulfan. Dɣa, seg winna n 2012 mu yefka azwel « Nekk ed yiman-iw », yuɣal-d unaẓur tikkelt-a s win i d-yefren s uzwel n « Itri arugal » (Étoile filante). D ameslay s tḥawact kan, war ma nɣez, ɣef wayen yellan deg-s, s sḍis-is (setta) n yizwal, ad d-nini yeɛreḍ unaẓur ad d-yesdukkel kra n yisental s wudem d amaynut. Am, war tisewham, tezlit n tayri, i ilaqen ad yili s tnaga-s (témoignage) ula d netta asmi t-nesteqsa send ad d-yeffeɣ. Dɣa, yuɣal-d s tayri s snat n tezlatin timezwura, mu yefka azwel « Am yitri iɛeddan » akked « I ṭṭlam weḥd-i ». Deffir tezlit tis kraḍ « Nettraju » ideg d-yesres unaẓur kra n tmuɣliwin s usirem akken i t-nennum, tusa-d tezlit tis ukuẓ umi yettunefk uzwel « Ccib », akken tban, yewwi-d deg-s Farid Ferragi s tmussni-s ameslay ɣef wamek i d-trezzu temɣer s yizeɣbuben imellalen ɣef uqerru. Dima s taɣect i ur nbeddel ɣef tin mi t-ttuɣ meẓẓi, bab n tezlit « Ay iḍ » yecna akk tizlatin n yiseɣrez-a s waṭas n yiḥulfan, ladɣa snat n tezlatin tineggura i ibudd unaẓur bu 63 n yiseggasen i yemma-s i yewwḍen ɣur Rebbi ilindi. Tijmilin-a, s yizwal n « Sikkideɣ deg-m a yemma » akked « Mazal-ikem » ad yefhem seg-sent yiwen tayri n umimmit i yemma-s, ideg ameslay gar-asen yella, ad yili i lebda. Wa d agzul d amecṭuḥ ɣef yiseɣrez n Farid Ferragi n useggas-a n 2016, ahat ad d-nawi awal fell-as s telqey tikkelt nniḍen. Ad d-nini kan belli yesḥissif waddad imi aḍebsi-ya almi i t-id-nuɣ seg waɣir n Bgayet, am winna n Zedek Mulud, acku ulac-it deg Ayt Smaɛel, deg Tsexriwt, wala Iderginen.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi  

  
 Azemmur, d armud gar yirmad n leqbayel, yettas-d lawan n tegrest. Ibeddu deg wayyur n tuber. D yiwen seg wansayen-nneɣ i d-ğğan lejdud-nneɣ. Ad naf taddart n Wat Laɛziz, teṭṭef deg urmud-agi, imi yal tasebḥit mi ara yelhu lḥal, ad ffɣent twaculin akken ad ruḥent, ad leqḍent azemmur. Seg useggas–nni 2012 mi d-yewwet udfel, yenɣes s waṭas uzemmur imi helken yisekla , txus zzit. Maca aseggas–a, yurew uzemmur s waṭas, yerna bdant snat n lemɛinsrat n twacult Zennouche, imi nutni aṭas iseggasen-aya i sɛan lemsinsra. Zik s wallalen iqdimen, ma d tura s tmacint tamaynut. Tella lemɛinṣra–agi–nsen segmi llan lejdud-nsen. Ar ass-a n wussan, mazal-iten xeddmen-tt. Ma d ssuma n zzit, ur tbeddel ara ɣef yilindi : 700 idinaren. Maca, mi ara twaliḍ leɛtab yesɛa ssuma-agi n zzit, ad naf rxiset maḍi, imi llant kra n twaculin, ad lḥunt azal n tsaɛet akken ad awḍent ɣer tferkiwin-nsen. Llan wid ibeddun lqeḍ seg wayyur n tuber almi d ayyur n meɣres, imi mačči yal ass i ttruḥun ad leqḍen. Ttrağun kan asmi ara yelhu lḥal, ulac ageffur. Maca, xas d asemmiḍ neɣ d agris, ttruḥun, awi-d kan ad d-jemɛen rrezq-nsen. Mi ara yelhu lhal neɣ taggara n ddurt, teddun ula d inelmaden, ttalen imawlan-nsen ula d wid n tseddawit , imi deg taddart –agi teɣriḍ neɣ ur teɣriḍ ara, mi ara yili ccɣel, ad t-txedmeḍ d winna i d amezwaur. Ad ruḥent s tumert, ad awint yid-sent twaculin tagella ara ad ččent, ama d aɣrum d ifelfel neɣ seksu, imi deg lexla yettiẓiḍ lqut, abeɛda mi ara tili twacult tennejmaɛ-d. Mazal wid yeccewwiqen , icennun lawan n uzemmur, llan wid yettawin yid-sen radyu ad slen i tezlatin i d-yettɛaddin deg yimaṭṭafen n Tizi Uzzu neɣ amaṭṭaf wis sin. Ma ɣef lawan n tanalt, tessen lqahwa d uyefki s teḥbulin. Ad leqḍen, ad ttnecraḥen alamma d tameddit. Mi d lawan n tuɣalin , ad msawalent twaculin yemqaraben akken ad ddukklent s axxam. Gellunt-d yid-sent tiɛekkmin, ama d isɣaren neɣ tiqjemyar, imi taddart-agi mazal ur tesɛi ara lgaz n temdint. Ma d irgazen, rennun alamma yeɣli-d yiḍ, imi ttfarasen n liḥa n tegnewt i igerrzen. Llant kra n twaculin, ur nesɛi ara azemmur, ttaṭṭafent amnaṣef, awi-d kan ad xedmen armud-agi i d-ğğan lejdud-nneɣ. 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 08 iɛeggalen seg yiwen uẓeṭṭa yellan d afud n trebbuyeɛ tirebrabin ttwaṭṭfen ass n ttlata sɣur yiwet n tejlibt n yigen aɣelnaw aɣerfan (ANP) yeqqnen ɣer temsigawt n Waregla, id-yenna yiwen n wulɣu n weɣlif n temḥaddit taɣelnawt deg was n laṛebɛa. « Deg usurrif umennuɣ mgal rrebrab ladɣa s wafud n isallen, yiwet n tejlibt n yigen aɣelnaw aɣerfan yeqqnen ɣer tama tamsigawt n Waregla di temnaḍt taserdasit tis kuẓ, teṭṭef ass n 13 tuber 2015, tam (08) iɛeggalen n yiwen uẓeṭṭa yellan d afud n trebbuyaɛ tirebrabin am waken sen-tekkes yiwen ukamyun I llan ssaxdamen di txazabiyin-nsen », id-yessefhem weɣlif n temḥaddit taɣelnawt. Seg yidis-nniḍen deg wayen yerzan taɛessast d laman n tlisa, ttwaṭṭfen deg unẓul n tmurt « snat n tmerwin d tam (28) imakaren n tmura yemmxallafen akk d tuṭṭfa n kuẓ (04) n tkeryas ileḥḥun di yak iberdan, kuẓ (04) imnadiyen n wuzzal, semmus (05) iɛmdan yeqqazen, tam (08) n usaxdem n trisiti akk d tilifunat ufus ».

<p style="text-align: right;"> APS 

  
 Inelmaden n ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ (DLCA) n tesdawit Lmulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu, ɣelqen ussan iɛeddan agezdu-agi n tmaziɣt imi ur asen-yeɛjib ara usihel n yikayaden n yimesdis amezwaru n useggas-agi asdawan 2016/2017. Tefka-d tedbelt n Ugezdu-agi, tikkelt tamezwarut ahil n yikayaden seg 08 ar 16 deg meɣres ideg nella. Maca, ugin inelmaden d umazday-nsen asihel-agi, deg unejmuɛ i xedmen d yiselmaden. Uɣalen gezmen-tt deg rray ad sɛeddin ikayaden-nsen seg wass n lḥed 02 deg waggur n yebrir 2017. Ikayaden-agi ara d-yilin mebɛed imuras n tefsut, rzan inelmaden n uswir wis sin d wis kraḍ n turagt akked yinelmaden n useggas amezwaru n Master. Ad bdun ass n lḥed 02 deg waggur n yebrir ad kfun ass n sed 08 dima deg waggur-agi n yebrir 2017. Ma d wid n useggas amezwaru n turagt, yuɣ lḥal nutni sɛeddan yakan, uqbel imuras n 15 wussan n tefsut.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ghani Amazigh 

<div> 
  
 Ddeqs n yimezdaɣ n taddart Teḥmilt i iḥeḍren d inagan, ddurt-a iɛeddan, mi d-thegga Tdukkla Awal Yessawal yiwen n warmud i uqecceɛ n yiwen n ugudu deg taddart-a i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Melbu, i ibeɛden s wazal n 40 n yikilumiṭren seg Bgayet.

 D aqeddic aseggam ideg kkint kra n tamiwin, gar-asent Tamehla n yiqeddicen izuyaz, tin n twennaḍt akked Uḥuddu Aɣarim. I lmend n waya, ayendin d armuden i yettwasmersen deg wannar i ubaɣur n twennaḍt, ɣef teɣzi n uzgen n wass. Ɣef wawal n uselway n tdukkla-a tilemẓit Mass Ɛaziz Xentus, yella-d ttiɛad i lmend n useḥbiber d uḥuddu ɣef tezdeg n Wasif Ageryun, i yekkan seg waṭas n temnaḍin deg usamar n Bgayet. Rnu ɣer-s, ammus i d-ibanen deg-s seg Xerraṭa ɛeddi akkin armi d Suq Letnin. «Yella ugudu-a, d amihi ameqqran, ama i tgemmi taẓegwant neɣ i yimezdaɣ n taddart d yimdanen akk i yettɛeddayen yal ass syinna. Am wakken nwala d akken ssebba tamezwarut n texmej n teftisin-nneɣ, d iguduyen-a i yettenḍeggaren deg yisaffen. D aya kan i aɣ-yeǧǧan nhegga-d tiwizi-a I wakken ad nemḥu later-is ». D awal n uselway n tdukkla-a i d-nebder. Dɣa, ahat azal n 60 n yiterrasen i d-yegren afus, kkin deg ccɣel-a yelhan, deg leǧwahi n ubrid aɣelnaw wis 17 i yeqqnen taɣiwant n Melbu d tin n Temriǧt. Imi ugar n tukksa n ugudu-a i tuɣ yettḍurru agama n temnaḍt-nni, irennu tazmert n umdan. Llant-d daɣen deg teɣzi n kra n yisaragen, tedwilin n wuẓẓi n ṭṭjur d ucebbeḥ n wadeg. Am wakken i d-iban yuɣ usḥulfu n kra n medden ɣef wazal n yibeddi i tezdeg n umkan n tudert d twennaḍt i aɣ-d-yezzin. Ula d tumert teɛmer At temnaḍt-a mi walan annect-nni d iḍumman ttwakksen seg sdat wanzaren-nsen, sɣur yiwaziwen imḥemmalen n ugama. Ɣer taggara, yelha ad d-nesmekti d akken tesnemmir Tdukkla Awal Yessawal, i d-yennulfan iseggasen-a ineggura, akk imdanen i yekkin ass-nni deg usmurres n wahil i d-yettwaheggan.

  M. K. 

  
 Mass Racid Ɛallic, d aselmad n tmaziɣt deg yiseggasen imezwura mi yebda uselmed n tutlayt n tmaziɣt, syin yuɣal d amaswaḍ n tmaziɣt, syin yeffeɣ tasɣimt. Akka tura, yesselmad deg tddukkla tadelsant di tesdawit n Mulud At Mɛemmer, akken daɣen i yexdem aṭas deg umaṭṭaf wis-ssin.

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen: xas akken teffɣeḍ tasɣimt ( la retraite ) seg uselmed n Tmaziɣt, maca, mazal-ik tesselmadeḍ deg tddukkla tadelsant, d tayri n uselmed, neɣ d tayri n tutlayt?  

  Rachid Alliche :  Nekk am wakken lliɣ qqareɣ deg wawal-iw, yal aqeddim di tudert-iw “d tamaziɣt”, ttmeslayeɣ s tmaziɣt (Taqbaylit), leḥḥuɣ s tmaziɣt, tetteɣ s tmaziɣt, steɛfuyeɣ s tmaziɣt? Mi ara rfuɣ, qqareɣ tamaziɣt, am wakken ula d idammen-iw deg-sen isekkilen n tmaziɣt. Ihi aselmed-iw mačči d tayri, maca nnig n tayri: ḥemmleɣ mi ara fkeɣ ayen ssneɣ i win ur t-nessin, acku ad d-yesfaydi, ayen akk yugaren aya imi s tutlayt-iw.

  Mmeslayeɣ-d ɣef yiseggasen-nni imezwura mi tebdiḍ aselmed, d acu-ten iɛewwiqen i d-mmuggrem?  

 Deg useggas n 1995, mi tekcem tmaziɣt (si tewwurt tamectuḥt ) ɣer uɣerbaz azzayri, nekk, seld ayagi lliɣ d aselmad n teɛrabt, degmi si tama n tarrayt uselmed ɣur-i ulac ugur. Ma si tama n tutlayt, , llan-d wuguren deg wid yeqqaren: wa yumen; wa ur yumin. Win iḥemmlen tamaziɣt yedda-d yid-nneɣ, ma d win ur tt-nḥemmel yettaker aḍar ɣer deffir, acu kan tella tddukkla n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt deg tallit-nni, tgerrez teswiɛt.

  Amek tettwaliḍ aselmed n tmaziɣt deg tmurt n Lezzayer?  

 Nekk s timmad-iw, ttwaliɣ belli aselmed n tmaziɣt deg tmurt-nneɣ seg ucrured ɣer tikli, acu kan ma yella yettunefk-as wazal i tuklal, ma yella d aɣen taneɣlaft n ttrebga teṭṭef deg wawal-is, belli ad tili tmaziɣt bessif deg wahil n yiɣerbazen meṛṛa deg tmurt-nneɣ. Tella daɣen temsalt-nniḍen, belli tamaziɣt ur tt-isseɣlay ara ubeṛṛani, slid ma yella sseɣlin-tt warraw-is, ihi : afus deg ufus, tamaziɣt ad s-nekkset ammus.

  Aṭas n yinelmaden i tesselmaded di tddukkla, wigi d inelmaden n ugezdu n tmaziɣt neɣ llan wiyaḍ?  

 Ɣer temsirin-iw, tineggura-agi ur ṭṭuquten ara inelmaden ahat ur sslin ara, neɣ sslan ur bɣin ara. Maca wid i d-yettasen ɣer temsirin-iw, ttawin tamaziɣt, ttagmen tarrayt amek ara slemden tamaziɣt , ttakeɣ-asen daɣen ayen akk swayes ara seddun taɛkkemt n tudert-nsen. Ihi win i d-yusan, ur yettuɣal ara s uḍellaɛ d ilem. Inelmaden –iw, llan wid n ugezdu n teɛrabt, n tmaziɣt, n tefransist, n teglizit, akken daɣen llan wid i d-yettasen beṛṛa n tesdawit.

  Tenniḍ-d llan inelmden i yettmeslayen kan tutlayt n teɛrabt. D acu n tarrayt i tessexdamed yid-sen?  

 Anelmad yettmeslayen kan tutlayt n teɛrabt, tuget ssemraseɣ tarrayt yemxalafen d tin i sexdameɣ d inelmaden yettmeslyen tamaziɣt, ihi yella wanda i d-ttalseɣ tamsirt i unelmad-nni weḥd-s s tutlayt-is i wakken ad as-sfehmeɣ tutlayt-iw, akken daɣen tikwal ad ṭṭfeɣ anelmad yessnen taqbaylit d teɛrabt ad ten-sɣimeɣ akked unelmad-nni ur nessin ara i wakken ayen ur yefhim ara uneggaru-agi, ad as-t-id-yessefhem. Llan yimɛerbawalen i d-yusan, ur ssinen ara ula d yiwen wawal s teqbaylit, uɣalen, ttawin-d tizmilin xir n yiqbayliyen. Nekni a win i d-yusan ad t-nesselmed.

  Ma yella nniɣ-ak-d tutlayt, ma yella nniɣ-ak-d tamur…t  

 Nekk, ɣur-i tamurt d aqerru, ma yella d tutlay d ul. Tutlayt ur tettaf ara iman-is ma yella tamurt ur as-teddi ara di lebɣi , ur as-tefki ara azal i tuklal, ur d telhi ara deg-s, dɣa imawlan n tutlayt, ad helken, mi ara helken din din tamurt ad terwi, ad tuɣal d taderwict, ad temhewwel, ur tettaf ara iman-is ula d nettat. Ma yella teǧǧuǧǧeg tutlayt, ad tgerrez tmurt.

  Awal-ik n taggara…  

 Ayen akk ur ḥemmleɣ di tudert-iw d awal n taggara di taɣult n tmaziɣt, imi tamaziɣt urǧin tekfa, urǧin telli taggara-is. Awal-iw n taggara i udiwenni-agi ad am-d-iniɣ a Massa tanemmirt imi d-terriḍ lwelha ɣur-i, ssarameɣ mačči d tikkelt taneggarut, afud igerrzen seg wul yesfan, tabɣest iwatan.

  Souhila Yamani 

  
 Ini-d s tẓuri “ d yiwet n tfaska i d-yettilin 14 n yiseggasen-aya di tmurt n leqbayel. Tlul-d Tikti n tfaska–agi deg unebdu 2004 deg At yanni. Yebna-tt-id unaẓur Denis Martinez, salah Slim akked Ḥcen Metref. D acu i d iswi n tfaska-agi? D Mass Hsen Metref imwelleh n yilmeẓyen ara t-id-yinin:” Azday i zdin yidelsan dagi d tamawt ɣef tmuɣli i nefka ɣer umaḍal. Tuɣalin i tuɣal tejmaεt d yimukan-nniḍen d igenwan n yidles, yeskan-d acḥal i yedda uẓar-nneɣ deg yidles d wansayen n tmurt. Nebɣa diɣen ad mlilen yinaẓuren-nneɣ i d-yettnekkaren akked wid i ten-yezwaren; imeẓẓyanen, ad lemden taklut d wayen-nniḍen deg yigrawen n tẓuri. S wakka, nger imecṭaḥ deg wul, d nutni i d asenfar nneɣ. S ulac, nessuli-d swayes ara nerr tili i temliliyin tunṣibin yezgel yidles’’. D ayen yeḍran s tidet nufa dinna denis Martinez yettaru unuɣen ɣef leḥyuḍ n taddart At Waɛban netta diɣen ixeddem ɣef yiswi-agi:”Dagi kif kif –aɣ akk. Nqedec akk. Ma d iswi-nneɣ d tiririt n wazal i yimukan igejdanen di tudrin akka am tejmaɛt ,tala, taẓuri d teklut deg yizenqan d uttekki n yimezdaɣ ama deg tira, deg wuraren, deg usuneɣ, deg ccna , deg umezgun. Nettidir yid-sen am yiwet n twacult, nesway idles s umata. Akken yeqqar Mouloud Mammeri deg wawal-is.’’ Nteddu akken nufa mačči akken nebɣa’’. Tazrigt tis 14 deg At waɛban Yal aseggas anda ara terzu tqufet n yiɛeggalen n Raconted w-Arts. Tikelt-a tra ad ters deg ugelmim deg ttnejmaɛen waman isemmaḍen i d-yetturugen di laɛwanser d taɛwinin n tqucac n udrar n Ǧerǧer di taddart n Wat Waɛban iteddun ɣer tɣiwant n Uqbil . Ahil n ddurt n tfaska n useggas-agi d amerkanti nezzah: seg 24 almi d 31 di yulyu, ddren yimezdaɣ d yinebgawen i d-yerzan ɣer tegnatin n lfarḥ, usan-d yimdanen sya u sya. Seg yal tamnaḍt, si Bgayet, Tizi, Lezzayer, wehran, tanezruft, seg umalu ar usammar. Ussan-d ula seg tmura n Lrupa, taẓuri tsemlal tassa d way turew. Ahil n useggas-agi, yeṭṭef-d taklut, isaragen, tikli ɣef uḍar deg udrar, timsikniyin, tamedyazt, aznuz n udlis s ubudu…atg. Kra tekka tfaska, ur iḥebbes leqdic alamma iruḥ yuli wass. Amaynut di tezrigt n 2017 Ayen i d–ijebden lwelha n yimzuyar ɣer tezrigt n tikkelt-a d ulzuz (ssuq)n tlawin n At Waεban, i d-tettheggi tiddukkla ’’Asurif “, yal anebdu. Iεemmer ass n 28 deg yulyu. D tilawin n taddart n Wat Waεban i iεemren rreḥba; ttawint-d isufar i d-tekksent deg tebḥirin-nsent. Ad d-fesrent lxeḍra d lfakya bio i yeswan s waman n Ǧerǧer; timellalin n tyuzaḍ n uxxam, ayefki, tamemt, atg. Ad d-rnunt ayen i xedment deg yixxamen am tgelliwin (tiɣrifin, aɣrum n leḥwal) d yiselsa i ttxiḍint (agus , timḥermin iɛemren s rrqum, tibernyas , atg). Imsewwqen ggten, wa d amsaɣ, wa d aḥewwas yusa-d ad iẓer, ad yekkes lxiq, wayeḍ yettnadi ad yissin isulas iɣef tebna tmetti d tdamsa n tudrin . Yiwen seg-sen d acennay n teqbaylit Lewnis Ait menguellet, yeεǧeb-as ccɣel. « Ayen akka i d-snaɛtent tlawin-agi d ayen igerrzen maḍi i tdamsa; kra n win ara yaɣen akka kra n usafar d afud ara-asent-id-yernu i temɣarin-agi n lbaraka», i d-yesseggra mi t-nesteqsa ɣef ssuq-nni. Tameɣra di taddart Tella-d yiwet n tmeɣra deg yiwen uxxam n taddart ass-nni n lǧemɛa ; teḍra akken i tt-xeddmen Wat zik. Tislit tedda-d ɣef userdun, telsa-d taksiwt n Leqbayel, isli s ubernus. Nudan-d izenqan n taddart. Taquffet n tlawin d yirgazen teḍfer-d s deffir s wurar d lbarud ; snat n temɣarin refdent ɣef tuyat-nsent yiwen n ufniq urqim. Aserwet Gar wayen-nniḍen i d-snaɛten At waɛban di tfaska-a Annar n userwet: Aserwet deg unnar yeḍra ass-nni n 27 di yulyu, ɣef tis 14t00. Gar yimnezzhen, llan wid werǧin ẓrin aserwet n temẓin d yirden. Dehcen di ccɣel icuban wa; qqimen akken i yiṭij armi yekfa usizdeg. Zzin-d i unnar, lemden kra seg umawal n tfellaht, ččan aḍemmin. S wakka i temdel tfaska n “Ini-d s tẓuri”. Kra n win/tin i as-iḥedren d acu i d-yegmer deg-s : win yebɣan tamussni yelmed yugem, win inudan ɣef laɛwayed d wansayen iwala, win ixaqen isared allen-is. Wigi d kra n lesrar n tfaska n “ Raconte-Arts ” i d-yellan deg Wat Waɛban, deg timiṭ n tmurt n Leqbayel. Brahim Benhamouche

  Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 Yuzzel ussan-a ineggura wawal ɣef tisin ɣer terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n Leqbayel yiwen seg yimyurar n Tadjenant. Wagi d amḥaddi Ali Guitoune I yebɣa uselway Hannachi ad d-yawi iwakken ad yessejhed ugar tamḥaddit n terbaɛt-is. Ɣas akka amḥaddi n DRBT d win yebɣan ad d-yass ɣer Tizi, maca yiwen n uɛewwiq n tesriḥ-is ur t-yeǧǧi ara ad tt-yegzem dir ray akken I yebɣa. Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen I aɣ-d-yewwḍen, Ali Guitoune yessuter seg uselway Hannachi iwakken ad yaɣ ayen iwumi neqqar tabrat n ttriḥ. Amyurar, yenna dakken “ma yella dɣa yella-d waya, s lferḥ d ameqqran ara yurar di terbaɛt mucaɛen di ama di tmurt ama di Tefriqt”. Seg tama nniḍen, ilaq ad d-nesmekti dakken asleɣmay Kamal Mouassa d netta ara ikemmlen di terbeɛt-a I useggas I d-iteddun imi d yiwen n usleɣmay I d-yessukksen JSK seg tlaqa n uɣelluy s aḥric wis sin, yerna yessuli-tt-id s amḍiq ur yerǧi ula yiwen. D ayen yeǧǧan Hannachi yerra deg-s yiwet n teflest mebla aɣbel. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Radia B. 

  
 Argaz d win i sen-t iceffun. Tudert d tuqqda n yixf. Ijujaḥ, yesmendig wakud, ilehben nnig yiri nnḍen si yal tama ɣef iman yettlejlijen s talwit xas ulamma talwit d awal-kan. Acu umi yezmer ufexxaṛ deg irebbi n tmes? Acu ara d yexdem uḥaber deg ufezqi n layas? Asirem yettrebbin taqlest tilist-is d tiderrit n tilawt: xuḍi tilawt –nneɣ nekni s iyennaten agi testewḥec. Argaz d win i sen-t iceffun, win ur n ceffu ulac ttkal fell-as, ḥesbet-it kan d taseṭṭa ur nerri tili neɣ d kalitus teɣzi ur yeǧǧi lfayda ur telli! S kra n win yettun ayen iɛeddan fell-as d awezɣi ad yektil s lqis i wayen ara d yennulfun. Amdan am win d war lexṣayel, xas err-it ɣer lmizan fessus. Tudert ur telli d anamer lemmer id ak terbiḥ ay ul: tudert d asurif, d tamuɣli, d-ameyyez uqbel anneggez. Yettɣaḍ win yegren iman-is ɣef wasif netta lɛum ur as yessin: Xuḍi asif-nneɣ yeḥceṛ, yeskerkir iftaten n tamagit-nneɣ, war aḥezeb neɣ a ḥader si lǧiha-nneɣ. Argaz d win ɣef iɛeddan-t, d win xas yeɣli yufa amek ara d yewet s ugerrz. Argaz d win yecban aseklu xas yeɣli yifer yedder uẓar. Acu ara d yexdem ugeṭṭum ffɣen waman? Acu umi yezmer umalway yeɣlin si gar ifassen? Acu id lfidya uqejmur nehren qamen? Tayerza n wenyir d amezruy i wid yeẓran… maca ur d teqqim ara deg tira imi wid ara d yesneṭṭqen tira werǧin llin. Iɛaklen negren neɣ ɣaben? Izemniyen ccḍen neɣ grarben, yedda lqum ɣer lemqam ziɣ di lemqam id yufa lemnam. Hum u ɣum Ṛebbi aɛziz lebṣel qreḥ is yenna wanzi. Deg akken gten lehḍur allaɣ ara ten-yegzin yewet-it wazi. Xas merruyet ɣef akal yenqed. Tufa lebɣi-s tamaggirt, yerra-aɣ lḥawj ɣer tiririt n yifeẓ.. Xuḍi nettfeẓẓa ilem akken a d yedhu yimi. Nseblaɛ abeḥri akken ad yettu uɛabuḍ aganni . Nmecceḥ iɣden akken ad ttun yicenfiren ḥaruq. Ɣef tuqda n lasel nerna tuqda n lbaṭel..dɣa kra nenwa yebṭel, kra nurǧǧa yeɣfel: xuḍi araǧǧu d teɛkemt n wungif, amenni n asijjew n uɣilif, aganni d lexṣla n lqum ur neɛrif! Lhem yessen abrid ɣer bab-is, bab-is yessen ad is iger irebbi-s. Din I tufa iman-is tagda( equation) ur n ferru. Ktil, qis , seḥseb ay anda yedda ujeriḍ taggara-ines d tunnḍa. Tunnḍa d lxeṣla n uzrem, azrem d lhiba tuffirt, tufra d addari n leɛyub. Ala win umi fsin ifadden I yettmurruden zdat tunṭict. Maca ɣef zher-nneɣ amcum deg ayla neddem tunṭict, deg tunṭict neḥwes takemmict. Yelha usendi deg urawan… imi igenni d timiqqwa-s iɣ yessuṭuḍen: xuḍi taɣzint tekkaw aɣeddu n tmussni sellaw nedda di zedwa n uḥerbebbu armi iɣ yuɣal ccna d ahruḥu! Yeqqed wayen yeqden. Aḍu n lḥif yewwid iludyan n uɣilif. Muqel zelmeḍ ziɣ idehem-it yeffus, muqel yeffus ziɣ iluqeb-it zelmeḍ, kerneni, berneni yexleḍ lḥebb d-ukerfa armi ineggi ukufi d ṭṭlaba. Ayen i treqq teftilt deg uḍan n lqum yesfugglen ṭṭlam? Ayen i-izher usefru deg ṛeḥba anda lqum yeddel tasusmi? Ayen tetteqliliḥ tussna deg ugni anda lqum yeɛbed leqniɛa ? Ayen iḥar yiles ɣer timenna deg tallit anda lqum yesmenyaf leɣṛuṛ n yir tirga? Xuḍi targit-nneɣ d yir netta-t, lmenṭaq-nneɣ rẓag am qlilu, sbeṛ –nneɣ yezzuḥub ddel , tigawt-nneɣ d amɛnter, tikli-nneɣ d asḥurejdel, tezla-nneɣ yif-itt fiḥel… hum u ɣum Ṛebbi aɛziz lebṣel qereḥ is yenna wanzi. “Nekni s leqbayel” n tettu is yenna uɛabaj n wawal…”xas nettaɣ-iten-t negguma a necfu” id yenna daɣen… ulamma ixf yettwaqqed… ulamma timdit tenɣed, ddel deg ulawen-nneɣ yessed… yeḥḍem.. ur igezzem ur iqarṛem… akka id teḍṛa d lqum ur nessin melmi id tuzzma melmi id llum.. ihum kan hum, ɣum kan ɣum wicqa lebṣel ma qerreḥ!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Amnir-iw n tmaziɣt, d yiwen udlis i d-yesuffeɣ umeddakkel-nneɣ Adaouan Abdelghani i yellan, akka tura, d aneɣmas deg Yisebtaren n Uɣmis n yimaziɣen n La Dépêche de Kabylie. Deg umnir-a, ad naf 31 n temsirin n tmaziɣt, 35 n tbadutin akked 100 n yimedyaten yerzan, ladɣa, ilugan n tutlayt. Bḍant temsirin ɣef 4 n yiḥricen : tamawalt, tajerrumt, taseftit akked tirawalt. Yal tamsirt tesɛa tabadut akked yimedyaten, ayen ara yessefsusin asegzi-ines, ama i yinelmaden n uɣerbaz neɣ n tesdawit, ama i wid-nniḍen i yebɣan ad lemden tamaziɣt. D allal, diɣ, i yinelmaden yetthegin ikayaden n BEM neɣ BAC imi xussen aṭas deg unnar yidlisen yecban wigi. Tella-d tezwert n udlis sɣur uselmad n tmaziɣt Ali Bekhti. Ilul Adaoun Abdelghani ass n 8 deg tuber 1994 deg taddart Taḥanut deg tama n Wagennun, lwilya n Tizi Uzzu. Akka tura d anelmad deg ugezdu n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu. Yessufeɣ-d yakan, deg yiseggasen yezrin, yiwen n wammud n yinzan iwumi yefka, dɣa, isem Tala n yinzan. Azal n Umnir-a 200DA. Taɣuri igerrzen i yimeɣriyen, afud i umeskar.

  Farida Elharani 

  
 Melmi kan, taddart n Timizart n Sidi Mansour i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Timizart deg dayra n At Wagenun ( lɛerc n At Jennad ) tella d axenduq anda iḍuman d yilefḍan ṭṭfen aḥbak i tmeddurt. Tameddurt yebran i yicuḍaḍ-is ɣef ddiq n tezrugin-ines, tacmet n leḥwari-ines . «Tidet kan , si 62 ɣer ussan-a ineggura, taddart-nneɣ tella teggursel, tezdew deg ussu n- uglugel, teqqen ɣer rrebg n ustehzi anda ḥedd ur d yecqi deg yir liḥala deg ttidiren imawlan-is. Iberdan-is nhudden, d ifermacen , ččen-ten ixemǧǧan armi asenher gar-asen yecba awezɣi. Rnu ɣef aya ammus yettnamḍaren di yal amkan, takka n ilefḍan isebɣen leḥwaṛi-s wakali. Lhaṣun mebla ma nessaɣzef awal , ur yelli i yesefraḥen neɣ i-ijbden amdan ɣer din. Xas ini d tamara iɣ-yeqnen ɣer-s wala lebɣi. » Iɣ-id yenna yiwen seg imzedaɣ n taddart-agi.

 Maca s lebɣi n yal yiwen , taddart-agi tebded ɣer leqdic n yiseɣ imi ggullen ur ḥniten yimawlan-is ar tt-id sufɣen si ddel deg tteggren lesnin , lesnin yerran astehzi d dduḥ deg yemuɣred lebɣi . «Nefra-tt d ṛṛay a nezwi ammus ɣef taddart-nneɣ, a nefres deg-s ifurkawen uclixen akken ad iban wudem-is yesfan imi akken ma nella neẓra udem n taddart d netta i d-lemri n lfehma n imezdaɣ-is, d netta i d- tansa n trebga n warraw-is. Ɣef ayen-nni nekker i yiḍuman anda ma llan nekkes-asen ṛṛeḥba, sin akkin neqqim i leḥwaṛi nessa ɣef iɣeṛban-nsen tahuski , ncebbeḥ udem-is am akken tettcebbiḥ tislit imi yal yiwen deg-nneɣ yegzi d akken taddart n Timizart d netta-t i tislit-nneɣ nettɛuzzu.» Id yerna deg awal umezdaɣ nniḍen, n taddart-agi.

 Anect-a yesbgned d-akken ma yella ddukklen wulawen, ma yella zdin yirgazen d tilawin n yiwen udrum neɣ taddart neɣ lɛerc ad yeknu lebɣi , awezɣi ad yer aḍaṛ am akken id yenna Matoub Lounes : « idurar ad rmimzen ». Ass-a taddart n Timizart tuɣal d taɛljet, tettfeǧǧiǧ am uzrar deg umgreḍ n tmeṭṭut. S kra n win yerzan ɣer taddart n Timizart, yessaweḍ tajmlit i kra n win id yefkan affus akken ad yessu ccbaḥa akked tezdeg ɣef yiwet n taddart id yefkan acḥal d ameɣras i lmend n tilelli n tmurt , id yefkan acḥal d ameɣnas i lmendad n tugdut menbeɛ timunent ama deg 1963 neɣ deg 1980 neɣ 2001.Am akken yeqqar wanzi s teqbaylit : “acu yettnadi uderɣal? D tafat!” 

 Ɣef anect-a yal yiwen yessarem ad yili warraz n tezdeg tewwi taddart n Timizart deg temzizelt –agi n 2015 d win ara yeẓẓun lebɣi deg ulawen n imezdaɣ n tudrin nniḍen n At Jennad akked tudrin n tmurt n leqbayel s-umata amer ad lalent tismin, ad mɛanadent ɣer ubrid –agi n yiseɣ akked tezdeg, ad krent tirni i yilefḍan yettcelliḥen udem n tmurt-nneɣ. Xudi tamselt yewwid fell-as uɛbaj n wawal asmi id yenna : a win yeddan d win I t-yifen/ ad yettɛanad ad a t yaweḍ!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Am waṭas n tdukkliwin i yerran ddhen-nsent i ugama d ccbaḥa, thegga-d ddurt-a iɛeddan Tdukkla « Oxy-jeunes » i Uḥraz n tgemmi tadigant tamazrayt n Yiderginen yiwen n ttiɛad n usfuggel i lmend n wass amaḍalan n tmerrit i d-yettuɣalen yal 27 deg wayyur n cutember. Ahil i d-yettwanawlen yella-d dɣa s tallelt n Tdukkla taɣelnawt Asirem Guraya i yennumen si tama-s aḥḍar d urray n wazal i wass am wa yal aseggas. Akken deg wakud, yebda leqdic i d-yellan ass n lǧemɛa tanezzayt s usuddes n yiwet n tirza n uḥewwes ɣef uḍar ɣer taddart tamazrayt tamerrayt n Tiɣremt, i d-yezgan deg Udewwar n Ayt Felkay, taɣiwant n Yiderginen, aɣir n Bgayet. Taɣiwant-a tebɛed ɣef Bgayet s lqidar n 45 n yikilumiṭren. Am wakken i d-iban deg wahil umsizwer n ufrux amaziɣ ifazzen, ideg ɛerḍen ad kkin yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt n Yiderginen am wid iwumi tehwa tekti. Armi ula d arrazen, ad ttunefken ɣer taggara sɣur yimheggiyen i win ikesben afrux igerrzen. Ɣef wawal n yimsuddsen n tigawt-a, gar yiswan n warmud-a (activité) d asḥulfu n medden d yiɣermanen idiganen akken ad ḥsun ugar s lqima n tmerrit d wazal-is inmetti, adelsan, asertan, neɣ daɣen adamsan. Yella-d ttiɛad-a meqqar d tagnit i ubdar n wayen yakk yekkin deg uressi n tmerrit, d usemres n kra n yiswan ara yilin d timerna i tneflit idummen. I usmekti kan, seld asihar-a n udrar, tella daɣen tdukkla « Oxy-jeunes » imalasen yezrin deffir usuddes n yiwet n twizi i ubnaw n tqenṭert deg teẓgi akken ad yeshil umerreḥ ama i yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt-nni neɣ i yinebgawen i d-irezzun seg saɣel.

  M. K. 

  
 Ar almi d ljemɛa iɛeddan mettwal tasebḥit, ttwajerrden s usḥissef tẓa (9) n lmeyytin deg teftisin n waɣir n Bgayet, gar 34 ideg yettwasemmeḥ uɛumu akked tid ideg yettwagdel.

 Ma nebder-d kra n lḥalat seg wid iɣerqen, amenzu yeɣreq deg teftist n Bulimaṭ iweɛren, taɣiwant n Bgayet, ass n 26 deg yunyu. D mmi-s n tmurt n Zimbabwi, i yellan yesɛa 23 n yiseggasen deg tmeddurt-is.

 Deg yiwen n wass yettwajerred wayeḍ i ččan waman, tameddit deg teftist yettwagedlen n Tizuyar, deg At Ksila. Almi i t-ufan azekka-nni mettwal 11:00 n uzal. 

 Daɣen, ass n 15 deg yulyu, teɣreq truḥ yiwet n tmeṭṭut deg teftist n yiẓra n At Mendil, mbeɛd mi yeslek yiwen n yilemẓi nniḍen seg Tizi. 

 Ass n 16 deg yulyu, d taɣtast tis tẓa (9) i d-yettwajebden deg waddad ixesren – ad yili d ilemẓi n ɛecrin, seg teftist n Wad emma Djemma, deg tɣiwant n Uweqqas.

 Ad d-nesmekti dakken, ɣef leḥsab n Uḥuddu Aɣerman (Protection Civile) n waɣir-a i d-nebder, sebbat n twuɣa-ya n yilel qqnent seg uwellih amenzu i ustehzi n yiɛewwamen ɣef usaḍuf n uɛumu d teftist. Yettusemma, kra n win i iruḥen d asfel n lemwaǧi ad yili aha iɛum deg waddad azeggaɣ, am ddurt yezrin mi yenhewwal lebḥer, neɣ iɛum anida ulac taɛessast, neɣ yettbeɛɛid war aḥezzeb ɣer yimeḍqan iɣedren…atg. 

 Neqqar-d aya s waṭas n usḥissef d tsewham, imi ɣas ma seg umenzu n yunyu yezrin iga-d Uḥuddu Aɣerman ayendin d allalen i usellek d tɛessast n teftisin ilmend n tsemhuyt n umerreḥ, maca ḍerrunt-d twuɣa, yerna yettzid yettahda umḍan n wid iɣerrqen!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Ttettwaxeleq-d tdukli-a, ass n 03 deg yunyu deg usuggas yezrin. Sedduyen-tt yilmeẓyen n taddart n Tewrirt Meqqran yetabaɛen taɣiwant n Larebɛa n At Yiraten. Yal mi ara d tili tedyant , ttqabalent. Tikkelt-agi, heggan-d yiwet n tmeɣra i lmendad n yinelmaden i d-yewwin ikayaden, ama n uswir amenzu, alemmas neɣ n win n BAC . Ad tili tmeɣra deg ussan-agi i d-iteddun , anda ara fken arrazen i yinelmaden i d-yewwin ikayaden s tezmilin ifazen imi deg ukayad amenzu yufrar-d yiwen unelmad s 9,40 , ma yella deg uswir alemmas, ad naf tazmilt i yeṭṭfen taqacuct d 17,21, ma yella deg ukayad n BAC, d tazmilt n unelmad d 18,31. Anect-agi, d ayen i yessfarḥen iɛeggalen n tdukla imi s teɣzi n useggas, heggan-asen-d ahil n uselmed : xedmen-asen timsirin i yinelmaden imi sɛan 18 n iselmaden deg tangiwin yemxalafen. “Ihi ass-a yeffeɣ laɛtab ɣer tafat imi i d-nemeger tizmilin-agi” i d-yenna yiwen uɛeggal . Si tama-s, iberreḥ-d Mass Zeggar Malik, netta d yiwen n uɛeggal di tdukla-agi d akken sɛan aṭas n yiɣeblan ladɣa seg tama n tedrimt imi ur sɛin ara allalen i ilaqen akken ad seddun tidukla , akken daɣen i d-yenna d belli ur sɛin ara axxam anda ara tili tdukla. Dɣa, ttafen-d aṭas n iɛewwiqen ladɣa mi ara d-yeḥḍer unejmuɛ n yiɛeggalen n tdukla. Yerna-d ikemmel deg wawal-is belli tidukla, ttɛawanen-tty imawlan n yinelmaden akked tejmaɛt n taddart, maca mačči d ayen s wayes ara texdem tdukla akken iwata isenfaren i d-tettheggi . Asirem-nsen, d akken ad sɛun amkan anda ara selḥun tiddukkla di tugnatin iwulmen . I usmekti, leqdic-a ad yili deg yiwen n uxxam n tmeɣriwin n taddart n Tewrirt Meqqren . 

  S. Yamani 

  
 I lmend n usmekti n temlilit n Ṣummam 20 ɣuct 1956, akked ẓẓedmat n 20 ɣuct 1955, yettwasbed yiwen n usebdad i umeɣras d unaẓur Farid Ali, deg taddart-is n Ikhelounéne, i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Bounouh. Tella-d tejmilt-agi, tasebḥit n wass-nni n lhed yezrin 20 ɣuct 2017, deg taddart n Ikhelfounéne, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Bounouh akked ladayra n Boughni, deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D tajmilt i ḥedren waṭas n yiwudam, gar-asen: Aɣella n ladayra n Boughni, aselway n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Bounouh, imḍebbren n Usqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya, d waṭas n yimeddukkal-is d yifennanen. D leqdic adelsan s wazal-is, i d-heggan yimsuddsen-agi: Tasqamut n taddart n Ikhelfounéne s tallelt n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Bounouh, Tuddsa taɣelnawt n yimjuhad n Bounouh, Asqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Tanmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, Tiddukkla tadelsant Moh Said Oubelaid, akked Tesquma n tuddar yellin deg tɣiwant n Bounouh. Tebda tejmilt-agi, s yiwet n temsikent n yimagraden n tɣamsa yettwarun ɣef umjahed d ucennay-agi Farid Ali, d wayen akk yexdem ama deg ccna neɣ deg tegrawla tazzayrit 1954-1962. Syin akin xedmen akk wid yellan din ddqiqa n tsusmi ɣef rruḥ-s d lerwaḥ n ccuhada merra. Sakin d taɣuri n lfatiḥ sɣur ccix n lǧameɛ n taddart n Ikhelounéne. Syin ɣur-s d asersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka-s yellan deg tmeqbart n taddart. Ɣef 10h00 n ssbaḥ, tella-d tulya tunṣibt n usebdad yettwaxdamen i lmend-is deg tlemmast n taddart, uran fell-as ula d azwel n tezlit-nni “A yemma aɛzizen ur ttru” i yexdem d tajmilt i tlawin iwumi mmuten warraw-nsen deg tegrawla, yerna yis-s i yettwassen aṭas deg unnar n ccna. Azal n ssaɛa mebɛed, llant-d tnagiyin ɣef tudert d yimuhal n urgaz-agi meqqren yuran isem-is deg umezruy, ama s ccna-s neɣ s wayen yexdem deg ṭṭrad n 1954-1962. Yemmeslay-d fell-as aṭas umeddakkel-is deg uẓawan, wagi d Atmani, yenna-d fell-as: “ Ssneɣ-t deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt asmi yella ixeddem deg rradyu tis snat, deg tedwilt-nni n “Yicennayen n uzekka”. Yella d argaz lɛali, yettqadar aṭas medden, ala ayen yelhan swayes ttmeslayen medden fell-as. Am wakken diɣen i d-mmeslayen ɣef umecwar-is deg lfen yiwudam-nniḍen, yecban: Imawlan-is, imeddukkal-is, aselway n tesqamut n taddart n Ikhelfounéne, aḥbib-is n temẓi d ccna Mohamed Chemoune. Mi yezgen wass, tella-d lweɛda ɣef yimekli i wid akk iḥedren deg tejmilt-agi. Ɣef 14h00 n uzzal, yella-d usenɛet n yiwen n usaru awezzlan i d-ixedmen agzul i tmeddurt d lecɣal n Farid Ali…
