<p style="text-align: right;"> Bu Lemraḥ Ulemrah  

  
 Akkin i temnaḍt-nniḍen deg Tezmalt, thegga-d tdukkla DEFI mgal aṭṭanen n tmaẓwalt yiwet n tuffɣa i lfayda n yimuḍan n Bgayet, d waɣiren i as-d-yezzin, ɣer wadeg mu ssawalen Hemmam Ksana di Tubiret. Aṭas n uheggi i d-yellan send ttiɛad n rwaḥ, larebɛa-a tasebḥit, sɣur yiɛeggalen n tdukkla d kra n yilemẓiyen At lɛali d lxir, imi iswi awḥid i ten-yezdin d asefreḥ n yimuḍan akked uɛeddi n uḥewwes-a deg tegnatin igerrzen. D iswi i yettwawḍen dɣa, imi ttwazdin yifassen ɣef wiyaḍ deg teɣzi n wass-nni ara yeqqimen yersex deg wallaɣen, akken i d-nnan yiɛeggalen d yimeɛḍar s timmad-nsen. Ad d-nesneɣmes belli ula d tarbaɛt yettwassnen n Lewhama, teḍfer-iten deg tirza-nsen s yisem n Masi, akken ad yekkes seg wulawen leɛtab n tikli. Ula d tignatin n uṭebbel, llant-d mi akken wwḍen yinerzaf ɣer wadeg. Am wakken i d-yella wamek i wid yebɣan ad ttwaletfen s talext s ssuma n 500 n yidinaren, ama i udawi neɣ i kra-nniḍen. S wakka i d-tettwekkid tdukkla-a DEFI, ɣef uqerruy-is turmidt n Nura Ayt Ɛebderreḥman, aḥaḍar-ines deg yal tizi ɣer yidis n yimuyupaten-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

<div> 
  
 Kra n wakud segmi i d-ukiɣ, ẓriɣ tafiremlit-iw teteddu-d akked yiwen n urgaz ɣef udem-is axeẓẓir, i ur nelsa ara tabanta tamellalt, daɣen akken i d-yettban, yerra dderk ɣef yiman-is send ad iyi-d-iḍes. Yella yeṭṭef deg ufus azmam akked umru. 

 — Amek isem-ik? I yi-d-yesteqsa. 

 Lliɣ ur nwiɣ ara ad as-rreɣ, la berrneɣ tamuɣli-w ɣur tfiremlit amzum ggareɣ-as laɛnaya bac ad tesuffeɣ argaz-nni. Maca teṭṭef-iyi-d seg ufus bac ad iyi-teshedden, tenna-yi-d ilaq fell-i ad as-rreɣ. 

 — Amek isem-ik? Ay d-yules daɣen urgaz mebla aqesser tikkelt-a.

 Lliɣ nhewwaleɣ daxel-iw acku ur cfiɣ ara akk fell-as. Taggara dayen nniɣ-as-t. Argaz-nni Yekla cwiṭ akkenni, yettraǧu kra n usegzi i ilaqen. ḥulfaɣ yesseḍsay cwiṭ waddad-iw, maca lliɣ ur sɛiɣ acemma ad t-id-rnuɣ.

 Tafiremlit-iw s timmad-is tzeyyer isebliwen-s. 

 — Aredmani, ay d-yenna urgaz. Ur yelli wamek.

 Rriɣ-as dakken ur cfiɣ ɣef kra, belli ukiɣ-d kan d awkay, am deg wass amenzu n tudert-iw, deg tesga tennexrab akk d abrid, ed daɣen aṭas ay lḥiɣ send ad iliɣ da.

 Ihuz  ddeqs n teswiɛt aqerruy-is. 

 — Deg lḥala am ta, ur tezmireḍ ad teqqimeḍ da. 

 Ssutreɣ deg-s ad iɛiwed asiḍen. Amek seg tama ttwaqebleɣ deg sbiṭar-a awerdan akken ad afeɣ iman-iw, tura ttwaḥerseɣ ad ttwatelfeɣ seg-s.

 — Ilaq ad ẓreɣ amek isem-ik, i wanda tmaleḍ akked teɣlent-ik (nationalité). D ayen ilaqen.

 Sdat uttḥeyyer, tafiremlit teẓuɣɣer argaz ɣer tama nniḍen akken ad d-tawi yid-s ameslay s taɣect taḥedrant, maca icaḍ din wawal. Argaz-nni yeṭṭef deg wawal-is, taqcict tettkettir aɛiwed. Taggara, win yettawin akken azmam yeggug akkin netta yesrugmut, mačči war ma ixẓer-iyi-d s tmuɣli taneggarut ur temɛin xilla. Dinna ay gziɣ belli yella yefqaɛ aṭas imi acemma ur yessaweḍ ad t-ijerred deg uzmam-ines. Maca nekk lliɣ ur zmireɣ ad t-alleleɣ. Tafiremlit-iw tuɣal-d i ɣur-i, azmummeg deg yicenfiren-is.

 — Ur yelli d amdan n diri, I yi-d-tenna. Wanag ilaq ad yeg amahil-is. Aṭas n yimahiyen imeqqanen i yeṭṭafaren tadarit-a, yewwi-d fell-aneɣ ad nili dima nfaq.

   Snuzgumeɣ ɣef wayen yezmer ad yeg urgaz-nni sey-a ɣer sdat. Tesbens-iyi tfiremlit. Briɣ I tfekka-w ihi, ad heggiɣ iman-iw ad uɣaleɣ i naddam.

   Dɣa terna-d : “Tura ad ak-nernu ciṭṭuḥ n yidammen. Aql-it tfecleḍ ḥawla, segmi tnezfeḍ tesruḥeḍ aṭas seg-sen. Zmummgeɣ war ma rriɣ.

 Yerra-tt-id ɣer tezwawt:

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Yettwasen uḥric n tnezduɣt di tubiret ass n tlata aṭas n tmesbaniyin yemgaraden di lwilaya, anda imdanen id-yesfayden tinezduɣin ssuturen seg yimḍebren akken ad asen -sbegnen ɣef tnezduɣin-agi nsen imi acḥal ayagi i yeḥbes uṣenfar ɣef lecɣal ,timesbaniyin timezwura yella-d s-ɣur wid yettujerden di AADL , anda xeddmen timesbaniyin zdat twakla n lwilaya ttuɣun AADL 1d 2 ur d-iban wacema 14 yiseggasen d araqqeb deyen neɛya seg uraju ar melmi ,ɛlaḥsab imesbaniyen yewḍi-ten kra isallen akken tinezduɣin-a ad ttwazedɣnt deg useggas 2018 maca am lwilayat nniḍen am lezzayer anda aneɣlaf n tmanaɣt iwekded akken ad ttwazedɣent di tazwara n 2016, Ma yella d timesbaniyin tis snat llant-d s-ɣur imesfayden n 130 tnezduɣin yetabaɛen aḥric n ttrebga anda ssudsen tamesbanit zdat n lwilaya ssuturen seg yimḍeber amezwaru n lwilaya tamuɣli ɣer uṣenfar-agi i mazal werɛad ikemmel, ɛlaḥsab imesbaniyin aṣenfar-a yebda axeddim si 2007 imi xellsen aḥric amezwaru ar tura ur yexeddim ula 20 si lemya ,ɣef waya steqsayen imḍebren dacu-tent tsebbiwin yeǧǧan aṣenfar ad yeḥbes, Rnu ɣer wannect-a ssuturen si lwali akken ad yer lwelha-nes ɣer win yeṭṭfen aṣenfar akken ad asen-ikemmel tinezduɣin nsen imi xellsen aḥric amezwaru

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas.A 

  
 Segmi teḍṛa twaɣit n tmenɣiwt n yineɣmasen n uɣmis n Charlie Hebdo s ufus n rrebrab aslamawi deg ass n 07 yennayer iɛeddan, yuɣal-d aṭas wawal ladɣa di ttawilat n yisallen ɣef temsalt n wunuɣen n Nnbi i yellan d sseba n txazabit-agi d tlelli n umeslay akked tɣamsa d umihi n Lislam aserti akked rrebrab.

 Taxazabit-a i d-yesseɣlin lɣiḍ ɣef umaḍal imi tḥuza yiwen seg yiferdisen igejdanen n tatrara : tilelli n umeslay akked tɣamsa, tusa-d daɣen d tagnit akken ad tt-smersen yisertiyen seg yal tama. Amezwaru seg-sen d Benjamin Natanyahu aneɣlaf amezwaru n tmurt n Israil i yesḥeṛsen akken ad yili ger 50 n yiqeṛṛa n tmura izeddin di tikli mgal rrebrab iɣer d-yessawel uselway n tmurt  n Fransa François Hollande i d-yellan di temdint n Lpari deg ass wis ṛebɛa mbeɛd tawaɣit n Charlie Hebdo ideg mmuten 12 n yimdanen d twaɣit n tmenɣiwt n 04 n wuwdayen i yexdem urebrab Amedy Coulibaly deg yiwet n tḥanut anda ten-yeḥbes qbel ad ten-ineɣ. Natanyahu ifureṣ tagnit n tedyant-a akken ad d-yefk tiɣri i wuwdayen n Fransa akken ad unagen ɣer Israil, imi « din kan i zemren ad afen lehna », ɛlaḥsab-is netta. Anḥerrak-agi n Natanyahu aṭas i t-iwalan d asewjed i tefranin ideg yeḍmeɛ ad d-yufrar deg-sent i tikkelt-nniḍen. Am wakken daɣen i yas-d-usant tedyanin-a d tagnit n wureɣ akken ad yekkes uma kra seg llum d tecmat iss tumes ddula tasrayilit ladɣa mbeɛd taxazabit i texdem deg unebdu iɛeddan deg temnaḍt n Ɣezza ideg mmuten d luluf n yifalistiniyen tuget deg-sen d igerdan akked tlawin.  Seg tama-nniḍen imussuyen iɣelnaẓriyen-imeṭṭurfa n tmura n Luṛup ssmersen tidyanin-a akken ad d-sbegnen ṛṛasizm i sɛan mgal imselmen d ukrah-nsen i ddin n Lislam i ttwalin d aɣbalu n rrebrab. Ayagi d ayen i d-yeglan s tugdi ɣer yimezdaɣ imselmen n yakk  timura n Luṛup. Ur tewwiḍ ara ddurt ɣef tedyanin-a, armi i d-ḍṛant wazal n 116 n tlufa icudden ɣer teslamufubit ger udennes n leǧwameɛ d utɛeddi ɣef tḥuna n yimselmen  di Fransa kan weḥdes. Ula d imussuyen Islamawiyen, uɣen nṣib-nsen seg tedyanin-a. Aselway n tmurt n Ṭṭturk Recep Tayyip Erdogan d uneɣlaf-is amezwaru Dawood Oglu i yettmetilen daɣen akabar aslamawi yeṭṭfen leḥkem di tmurt-a, ɛeṛḍen daɣen ad smersen tidyanin-a i lmaṣlaḥa n ukabar-nsen . Erdogan, yemmeslay-d i ugdud anda d-yewwet deg uɣmis n Charlie Hebdo, yerna daɣen yenǧeɛ deg awal-is   Israil i icuba ɣer watmaten Kouachi. Aya ɣas snat-a n tmura ǧehdent lemxalṭat-nsent ladɣa deg uḥric n lɛeskeṛ d tdamsa. 

 Unuɣ n Nnbi n Lislam i d-yeddan deg tmezwarut n uɣmis n Charlie Hebdo i d-yeffɣen mbeɛd  taxazabit, yegla-d s waṭas n unhewwel di tmura timselmin.     Di : Pakistan, Ṭṭurk, Maṣer, Muriṭaniya, Lezzayer, aṭas n tikliwin i d-yellan mbeɛd taẓallit n lǧamuɛa n wass n 16 yennayer iɛeddan. Imussuyen islamawiyen ( neɣ at Icumar) n tmura-ya i d-nebder ufan-tt d sseba akken ad d-uɣalen ɣer unnar asertan. I yessewhamen di tmurt n Lezzayer, imi aṭas n wudmawen n ddin akked ttawilat n yisallen ladɣa tilibizyuwat  tusligin (privés), ddan-t d tiderɣelt-agi, yella wanda ula i d-sbegnen dakken nutni ddan d rrebrab, akked watmaten Kouachi. S wakka, islamawiyen yessawalen i ccwal mgal amalu i ttwalin d aɛdaw-nsen akked yimeṭṭurfa n tmura n Luṛup yettḥeqqiren kra n win ur nella ara seg-sen, ldin tawwurt n ṭṭlam iseg bɣan ad sukken amaḍal ɣer unnar n umcenqer n tɣermiwin (choc des civilisations). Wigi bɣan ad ẓeṛṛben kra n ubrid i yettawin ɣer temlilit n talsa, imi di lḥaqiqa taɣerma n txelqit yiwet-is, ttekkin deg lebni-s akk yimdanen n yal lǧens ama d imselmen neɣ d imasiḥiyen neɣ d iberkanen,…atg. Llum ameqqran deg aya, yella ɣef wigi yettdafaɛen ɣef Lislam, deg umkan ad d-seknen udem-is n tidet yeččuṛen d ṛṛeḥma d umsameḥ nutni ttwalin deg-s ala tahamaǧit d tɣennant iss twasnen yakan waɛṛaben n tallit tajehlit (lǧahiliyya). Asmi yewweḍ Lislam ɣer taqacuct n tɣerma di tallit n leḥkem n Yiɛebbasiyen d tallit n Landalus ideg yedder umusnaw amaziɣ Iben Ṛucd, imiren iǧuz neɣ d leḥlal ɣef yinaẓuren ad xedmen unuɣen ama n Nnbi neɣ n Ṣṣaḥaba.  Ansay-agi mazal-it yella ar ass-a ɣer yiciɛiyen ama di Lɛiraq neɣ di Iran, anda ur ḥeṛṛmen ara aṣewweṛ neɣ asuneɣ ladɣa n yizumal n Lislam yettwaqedsen ɣur-sen am Sidna Ɛli d warraw-is Ḥsen d Lḥusin. Islamawiyen-agi zgan  ssexlaḍen ger udafeɛ ɣef tlelli n teflest(i izemren ad ten-yezdi d wuwdayen d yimasiḥiyen) akked d umennuɣ mgal tilelli n umeslay, tilelli n tɣamsa. Aya akk ɣas ula d nutni taswiɛin ttcektin, ssuturen ad sen-yettunefk wugar n tlelli, ɣas ma nnan-d kulci, abrid-nsen iban, ur sɛin acu n ujdid ara d-rnun…ugar.

<p style="text-align: right;">    Mokrane Chikhi

  
 Ass-nni n laṛebɛa 25 deg furar, inelmaden n tesnawit Si Lḥesen Uṭaleb s ufus n tiddukla tadelsant ASAKA d tɣiwant n At-Yanni (APC) rran-as tajmilt  i Umusnaw d yeḥyan tutlayt d yidles nneɣ, Dda Lmulud At Mɛemmer.  I lmend n umulli wis 26 seg mi yemmut, smektan-t-d s wahil d-yesduklen tazuri, tamusni, tamedyazt, atg. Taṣebḥit-nni sɛeddan-d asaru n Ɛli Muzawi i yexdem ɣef Dda Lmulud. Asaru d-yesmektayen ayen yexdem d wamek d-yedda deg ubrid n usekfel n yidles nneɣ si tatut. S yin yella-d cna n terbaɛt d-yusan seg wexxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi-Wezzu d tɣuri n tmedyazt sɣur Ḥsen Merric. Yiwen n umedyaz yuran aṭas yerna yessufeɣ-iten-id d idlisen. Uqbel ad kemlen ahhil nsen, ɣef 11h, rzan ar tmeqbert anda yenṭel Dda Lmulud At-Mɛemmer, ssersen tameqqunt n yizeǧǧigen, yerna wwin-d kra n awal akken ad t-id-ḥyun sdat n yinelmaden d tnelmadin. Mi yuɣalen ar tesnawit, slan i usarag i sen-d-texdem temyarut Massa Lǧuher Amḥis-Waksel, nettat tecfa-yas-d i Dda Lmulud yerna tura ɣef tsekla-s. Mi yekfa usarag, tezzi-d nnuba n tezlitt tamḥaddit i d-cna terbaɛt n yinelmaden n tesnawit. Akka i s-d-yuɣal wawal i Dda Lmulud i lmend n teswiɛt deg tesnawit n At-Yanni, i wakken ad yezgu yisem-is d umennuɣ-is ddren. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Tarbaɛt n inelmaden  

  Tasnawit n At-Yanni “Si Lḥesen Uṭaleb” 

  
 Seg wakken icudd yisem-is akken ilaq i wayen ixeddem, ma nenna-d Rachid Aït Ali Oukaci ad d-nini din-din iqeddicen idelsanen. Netta i yellan, dɣa, deg uqerruy n Tesbeddit Takanadit i Tmaziɣt « Tiregwa ». Yid-s, newwi-d, deg tdiwennit-a, awal ɣef ddeqs n yisental. Hattan!

<p style="text-align: left;"> Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : tefkam-d taggara-a igemmaḍ n umsizwer Rachid Alliche n wungal ifazzen i yewwi umaru Oulamara. Mmeslay-aneɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef wungal-a d usarag i d-iga ass n 17 deg yebrir. 

 <span style="text-align: justify;"> Rachid Aït Ali Oukacii:  tazwara, tanemmirt a gma Mhenni ɣef uncad-ik I wakken ad d-rreɣ ɣef yisteqsiyen-ik. S tidet Arraz Rachid Alliche d yiwen gar warrazen i tettak tesbeddit tiregwa yal aseggas. Win n useggas-a, iṣaḥ-d i Dr. Aomar Oulamara i lmend n wungal-is amaynut iumi isemma:  »Timlilit di 1962 » i d-yeffɣen deg tizrigin Achab. D ungal i d-yufraren gar 4 agi:</span>

 <span style="text-align: justify;">1-Abrid n twaɣit, Mazri, Tizrigin Tamagit;</span>

 <span style="text-align: justify;">2- Tislit n uɣanim, Rachid Bukherroub, Tizrigin, El Amel;</span>

 <span style="text-align: justify;">3- Timlilit deg 1962, Aomar Oulamara, Tizrigin Achab.</span>

 <span style="text-align: justify;">4- Tayri d teɣzent, Malek Menniche, Tizrigin Assirem.</span>

 <span style="text-align: justify;">Ɣas ulamma nezra belli mačči kan 4 i d-yefɣen deg useggas n 2015, maca ilugan n tesbeddit Tiregwa qqaren-d belli anagar ungalen i d aɣ-d-uznen, ama d imyura ama d tiẓrigin, i ara yettekkin deg umsizwer. Ihi wagi d izen sɣur-neɣ : deg yiseggasen i d-iteddun, imyura/tiẓrigin ur tettum ara ad aɣ-d-taznem ungalen i wakken ad kkin deg warraz Rachid Alliche. </span><span style="text-align: justify;">Ma yella d aḥric win sin n usteqsi-k, Tasbeddit Tiregwa tfureṣ tagnit-a i wakken ad nesfaydi seg tmussni n Dr. Aomar Oulamara, imi mačči kan d amaru s teqbaylit i yella, maca daɣen d aεebbaj-amciweṛ deg usefrek n tneflit d unadi amguri (Expert consultant en management de la R&amp;D industrielle) deg Fransa deg tkebbanit PSA-Peugeot. Ihi thegga-d yid-s 3 n yisaragen akked kra n tiddukliwin am ACAOH </span><span style="text-align: justify; white-space: pre;"> </span><span style="text-align: justify;">akked CCK.</span>

<p style="text-align: left;"> Ula d kečč tgiḍ-d yiwen n usarag deg unammas adelsan azwaw deg Montréal ɣef temḍerrit i d-ttawin wallalen n teywalt, yexḍan wid n tmaziɣt,  

 i yidles-nneɣ. Ahat ad aɣ-d-tawiḍ seg-s taḥawact d tameẓyant. 

 <span style="text-align: justify;">S tidet a gma Mhenni. D tawaɣit tameqqrant i yiqbayliyen, imaziɣen s umata, amek ‘’nnejmaɛen kfan, ɣef yiqerra-nneɣ i tt-fran, nutni ẓran, nekni ur nezri’’, akken yeqqar umedyaz afiluzuf Lounis Ait Menguellat. Asarag-a i yi-d-ihegga Unammas Adelsan Azwaw deg Montréal ass n 02 yebril 2016, iwumi ara iniɣ tanemmirt s tussda, riɣ deg-s ad suɣeɣ ad d-iniɣ “ABBUH», akken yeqqar umdakkel Arab Sekhii deg tceqquft-is taneggarut. ABBUH a tin i aɣ-yeḍran yal yiwen deg-neɣ ur d-yerri s lexbar, ladɣa isertiyen, d imawlan n tedrimt, d waggagen-nneɣ yettxemmimen. A ɛajaba! ugar n 50 n tiliẓriyin n Lezzayer i yessexṣaren allaɣ n uqbayli, amaziɣ s umata, yal ass. Ama s wudem n tkuzint, addal, isallen…, mačči d yiwet. Ur zmireɣ ara ad d-iniɣ da azal i yekka usarag-askasi i d-wwiɣ deg Montréall. Maca, tzemrem ad truḥem ɣer tansa-a ad twalim cwiṭ seg-s: </span>

  <span style="text-align: justify;">Telḥa-d tesbeddit Tiregwa tallit tamaynut segmi tessebɣas iqeddicen iseklanen, ladɣa amsizwer n tullisin deg useggas-is wis kraḍ.</span> 

  <span style="text-align: justify;">Amek twalam annect-a kunwi i yellan daxel-is? </span> 

 <span style="text-align: justify;">Iswi n Tesbeddit Tiregwa tebɣa ad d-tesken belli tutlayt-nneɣ tezmer, u nesɛa aṭas d wid/tid iẓewren di yal aḥric n tudert, ama deg tsekla, tussna, taẓuri, … Aslal n warrazen d taggazin d asebɣes i yiqeddicen iseklanen d tussna. Nger tamawt belli annect-a yebda la d-yettawi s lfayda, acku deg yiseggasen-a ineggura aṭas n wid/tid i aɣ-d-yettarun I wakken ad ttekkin deg timzizzlin n Tiregwa. Dɣa, ad farṣeɣ tagnit I wakken ad d-fkeɣ ismawen n wid/tid ifazzen s warrazen d taggazin n Tiregwa usaggas-a 2965/2966 (2015/2016), imi nemmeslay-d kan ɣef warraz Rachid Alliche deg usteqsi-ik amezwaru. </span><span style="text-align: justify;">Ad zwireɣ seg warraz Belaïd Aït Ali. Taẓrigt tis kraḍ, am tmezwarut (2014) d tis snat (2015), tɛedda akken iwata. Timsizzlet tella-d gar yulyu 2965 akked 1u n yennayer 2966. Mraw d seddis (16) i aɣ-d-yuznen tullisin. Tiregwa tesbedd-d taseqqamut n yinezrafen n wazal n 15 i yellan berra n tesbeddit. D tilawin d yirgazen i iqeddcen deg unnar n tsekla n tmaziɣt. Abellez yella-d am akka:</span>

 <span style="text-align: justify;">1. Malek Houd : Arraz amenzu, s tullist–is «Amsebbal Bu tneɛjab»</span>

 <span style="text-align: justify;">2. Lhadi Maâouchi : Arraz wis 2, s tullist-is «Amyezwar n yiderɣula»</span>

 <span style="text-align: justify;">3. Rachid Oulebsir : Arraz Wis 3, s tullist-is «Timlilit n yiḍ».</span>

 <span style="text-align: justify;">Ma yella d Arraz Ali Azaykou 2016 i yellan d amaynut. Arraz-a, ad yettunefk i yal Amaziɣ deg umaḍal i d-yefkan kra ifazzen ama deg tẓuri, tussna neɣ deg tsekla i tmaziɣt. Arraz-a n teẓrigt tamezwarut iṣaḥ-d ihi i umaru Acelḥi Mohamed Akounad. Argaz-a ilul deg 1950. Seg wasmi i yesɛa 20 n yiseggasen, netta yettaru ama d tasekla n warrac d yilemẓiyen (littéraire d’enfance et de jeunesse), ama d ungalen. Atan deg umedya wayen yura i warrac d yilmeẓyen: “Vasiliya Tafalkayt», “Tiddukkla», “Umiyy n illi-s n ugllid», “Gar taggmat», “Timilla iferrsen”. Ma yella d ungalen yesɛa akka ar tura 3: “Tawargit d imik” deg 2002, “Ijjigen n tidi” deg 2006 akked “Tamurt n ilfawen” deg 2012. Deg taggara, wid d tid akk i yewwin taggazin n Tiregwa i useggas 2015-2016 d wigi: 1.Taggazt Muḥend Saɛid Amlikec n tesdawit n Tubiret yewwi-tt Mass Mecat Mezyan seg At Leqser n Tubiret. D anelmad n Master aseggas wis 2 deg tesnilest tamaziɣt. ixeddem anadiyen-is ɣef “wemkan n tmaziɣt deg tsertit tazzayrit seg 1962 ar ass-a”. 2. Taggazt Mohend Arab Bessaoud n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu tewwi-tt Massa Ourdia Houcine seg taddart n At Ouaṭas deg Imsouhal (Iferhounen). D tanelmadt n Master aseggas amenzu deg tusnamdant tadelsant, asenfar-is n unadi: “Tamagit tamaziɣt d lɣerba ɣer Yimaziɣen.” 3. Taggazt Massin Ouharun n tesdawit n Bgayet tewwi-tt Mazigha Mekdoud seg At Rzin deg Iɣil Ali. D tanelmadt n Master aseggas amezwaru deg trakalt tasnilsant, txeddem anadi-s ɣef waya dɣa. Taggazt i terbeḥ d tin ara tt-yallen ad taɣ aselkim ad teqdec yis-s. </span><span style="text-align: justify;">Rriɣ ad rreɣ lwelha d akken ad tili tmeɣra n tiririt n warrazen akked taggazin 2965/2966 (2013§2016) anebdu-a deg tmurt n yiqbayliyen am yal aseggas. Ugar n ttfaṣil ad tafem sya ɣer sdat deg usebter Facebook n tiregwa, Tasbeddit Tiregwa.</span>

<p style="text-align: left;"> Ɣef leḥsab-ik, ayen akka yettmagan deg tmurt sɣur tdukkliwin izad neɣ ixus?  

 <span style="text-align: justify;">Llant kra n tiddukliwin sefraḥent s wayen i ttmagint. Ur zmireɣ ara ad tent-id-adreɣ akk, maca tella gar-asent tiddukla n taddart-ik ACAF (Tiddukla Tadelsant n Adrar n Fad). Nekkni deg Tiregwa s tumert tameqqrant i nessuli tameɣra-nneɣ tis snat anebdu yezrin deg At Smaɛel. Am akken nga tin yellan uqbel akked tiddukla tadelsant n taddart Zoubga, wala tin i d-iteddun aseggas-a. Anda? Melmi? Ugar n ttfaṣil ar sdat. Ayen ilaq ad tezrem d akken Tiregwa tqebbel yal tikkelt ad aɣ-d-necdent tiddukliwin i wakken ad nexdem akken.</span>

<p style="text-align: left;"><span style="text-align: justify;"> </span><span style="text-align: justify;"> Tanemmirt a Mass Rachid Aït Ali Oukacii. Awal-ik n taggara.  </span>

 <span style="text-align: justify;">Tanemmirt i kačč a gma Mhenni i wayen akk txedmeḍ i tutlayt-nneɣ. S tumert tameqqrant i qqareɣ imagraden-ik i d-iteffɣen deg yiɣmisen i yuran s tin-nneɣ.</span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t: Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Ɣer Tezrigin L’odyssée, yeffeɣ-d “Poésie Kabylie (tamedyazt taqbaylit) n usdawan Mohand Akli Salhi. Adlis-a n tussna d win ara inefɛen isdawanen, inelmaden d yiselmaden. Mohand Akli Salhi d aselmad n tsekla di tesdawit n Tizi Ouzou. Gar wayen yura: “Etudes de littérature kabyle” (Enag,2011), “Poésie traditionnelle féminine de Kabylie. Typologie et textes” (Enag, 2011), “Kra n tsura i tɣuri n tsekla», “Taɣuri n tneqqist d usefru” (Tizrini Tira)…

  
 Deg wayen umi isemma :  » amṣaleḥ asnilsan  » yessumer-d uneɣmas Sliman Bekhlili yettwassnen ladɣa s tedwilt  » Xatem Sulayman  » ad d-yili useɛdel ger taɛṛabt d tmaziɣt deg tmendawt s usenṣeb n tmaziɣt d ad tettuḥettem tmaziɣt deg yiɣerbazen akk n Ldzayer yennumek ula d timnaḍin tiɛerbawalin ad tettuḥettem ɣef-sen tmaziɣt. Am wakken d-yessumer ad d-tili tlelli n wefran nugemmay s tlelli ger usekkil aɛṛab d usekkil alatini Maca yessumer-d daɣen ur d-yettili ara maḥyaf ger tutlayin tijenṭaḍin m tafransist ed teglizit ay yettwali d tutlayt n tussna tamaḍlant ay d-yuɣen akk amaḍal. D ayen d-yessbanayen belliiswi agejdan n tsumert-a d adafeɛ ɣef taɛṛabt s tukksa n tefransist. Maca tasumert (initiative) n Sliman Bekjlii ur tt-qbilen ara aṭas n Yibeɛtiyen d waṭas n Yiselmaẓriyen ay d-yewten deg-s s teqseḥ imi yesseɣdem (yesseɛdel) ger taɛṛabt d tmaziɣt acku deg tesnakta-nsen d iriẓrant (tamsirit, raciste) tamaziɣt ddaw uḍar n taɣṛabt kan ay d amkan-is Ur qbilen ara daɣen ad tettuḥettem tmaziɣt ɣef  » Waɛṛaben  » ɣas ma ttwalin taɛṛabt ilaq ilaq ad tettuḥettem ɣef  » Yimaziɣen  » … Win ara yessilqin deg yiswi asertan n tsumert-a ad yaf ɣas akken Sliman Bekhlili d Amaziɣ n Wawras yessawalen tamaziɣt yettwassen ugar s udafeɛ ɣef taɛṛabt d weḥqar udrig n tmaziɣt ladɣa imi werjin ay as-nesla yedda deg usuter n yizerfan n tmaziɣt. Yuɣ lḥal Sliman Bekhlili yettwassen aṭas s udafeɛ-ines ɣef tutlayt taɛṛabt d tesnakta taselmaẓrit. Annect-a d ayen ara aɣ-yejjen ad nxemmem belli iswi-is asertanuffir d asnerni n yiɣallen ara yewwten mgal tafransist, ara yesnernin tizemmar tiɛeṛbaẓriyin mgal tutlayt tafransist alamma d asmi ara tt-snegren deg yinurar nuseqdec ladɣa aɣerbaz, taɣamsa, inurar delsanen s yisem n useɛdel ger tefransist f teglizit… imir-n ad d-zzin ɣef tmaziɣt ad tt-meḥqen, ad uɣalen deg wawal am wakken nnumen seg 1962 ar ass-a. Wigi ulac deg-sen laman !<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Tiddukla Tadelsant Imedyazen 

  
 Ma drus 40% n tlawin i yettmagaren ugur n tarda ixerben ( troubles des régles). D acu kan, ddeqs seg-sent, ur ttarrant ara lewhi-nsent ɣer waya, ɣas tikkwal yezmer ad yeffer ddeqs n waṭṭanen neɣ ad d-yeglu s lehlakat, labeɛda wid n yidammen. I wakken ad tesɛum kra n tmussniwin ɣef tarda n tmeṭṭut d ssebbat n uxrab-ines, nextar ad d-nerr dduṛt-a ɣef kra n yestaqsiyen yeɛnan asental-a.

<p style="text-align: left;"> D acu-tt tarda ? 

 D ayen i d-iḍerrun daxel n lwalda. Iteffeɣ-d d idammen beṛṛa-ines ɣer tmeṭṭut yesɛan gar 13 d 50 n yiseggasen s unekcum n ddeqs n thurmunin. Tarda tettɣimi gar 4 d 6 n wussan, tettuɣal-d mkul 28 n wussan wer ma tella deg wussan-nniḍen. D abeddel yettḥazen talliyin-a (anqas neɣ azidi), rnu ɣur-s abeddel n tesmekta n yidammen i wumi neqqaṛ tarda ixerben.

  D acu i d-yettakken axrab n tarda ? 

 Anerni ixuṣṣen neɣ acelleqluq (kyste) n waskiwen, aṭṭan yettḥazen lwalda am ufibṛum, abeddel di tgella, tuzert, atqelleq d lxiq alqayan, abeddel n thurmunin , wigi akk zemren ad d-ẓẓaẓen, ad sbaɛden tarda ɣer tmeṭṭut . Yella diɣ, yiwen n waṭṭan mucaɛen ɣer telmeẓyin : aṭṭan n waskiwen yeččuren d icellequqen (syndrome des ovaires polykystique) ; yessexrab mlih tarda. Tikkwal, yessengar-itt. Llant tegnatin anda i d-igellu s tiɛiqeṛt.

  Melmi ara d-nemmeslay ɣef rwaḥ n tarda ? 

 Aɛeṭṭel n tarda iɛeddan tlata n wagguren, neqqaṛ-as : rwaḥ n tarda. Yeslalay lxuf meqqṛen, labeɛda ɣer tin ur nelli s tadist. S umata, tettḥaz tameṭṭut izewǧen deffir tadist, neɣ umbeɛd asexdem iḍullen n tɛeqqacin n uḥbas n dderya. Ula d aṭṭanen yezgan, lqella n wučči, atqelleq, zemren ad ldin tawwurt i wugur-a.

  Kra n tmusnniwin-nniḍen d yiwellihen. 

 Yesfek ɣef yal tameṭṭut yesɛan ugur n tarda, ad terzu s amejjay akken ad tnadi ɣef ssebba imi tezmer ad tili d aṭṭan yuklalen asejji lqayen, labaɛda imi assaɣ yellan ggar-as d dderya meqqeṛ . D acu kan, ilaq ad nẓer belli, tameṭṭut uqbel ad tt-teǧǧ tarda (50 n yiseggasen), tettmagar axrab n tarda s waṭas am yal yiwet, akken diɣ llant tid i d-yettlalen s tarda yettɣimin ddaw n 4 neɣ ugar n 6 n wussan wer ma tella d ugur.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima dali 

  
 Ttɛeddin yiseggasen, zerrin wussan mazal cfawat n tikli n 14 di yunyu 2001 reṣṣan deg wallaɣ n kra n wid d tid terza taluft n yizerfan n umdan. .

 Uqbel tadyant-a, mačči drus I d-yeḍran deg unnar, tazwart-is d tin n1963 yessenfufden amennuɣ almi d 1976 anda I d-tekker yiwet n terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen, Massin gar-asen, iwakken ad d-ssufɣen tadyant-a n yizerfan s annar n uskasi, taluft iɣef yesberber udabu n lawan-nni. Mgal lḥif d zzeyyar, ur zmiren leḥbus wala leqyud ad rren timedlin ɣef wayen izedɣen amdan s timmad-is, imi tudert-is turez srid ɣer wayen ssuturen wid tezdeɣ tebɣest s amennuɣ. Ama d tadyant n 1985 neɣ d tanekra n Tuber 1988, agdud azzayri s umata, aqbayli beddemma yebges iwakken ad d-yesseɣres ayen akken iɣef yettuḥerrem. Tamaziɣt-nni izedɣen amdan tegguma ad taf amkan-is, ɣas akken yeḍra-d uɣunzu n uɣerbaz deg useggas n 1994, ulamma yella-d unekcum-is s aɣerbaz maca adeg I tuɣ d win ibeɛden s waṭas ɣef wayen I yettutajun. Rrebrab isers-d buberrak, tamaziɣt tetteddu ɣef yixf n tfednan, mi tger aquddin ɣer sdat, ad d-temmager iɣeblan. Lḥasun, taswiɛt mačči d tin yessefraḥen, tamurt d tin yenkedwaren imi tadrimt txus, tafunast-nni I d-yetteẓgen ǧǧan-tt yimeksawen, agdud irkeb-it lḥir. Asmi i d-ddukklent akk temsal-a, tewweḍ tfidi s iɣes, ḥuh yaf-as ixef-is ! Imi am yal tikkelt, d At Dwala I yettuḥazen deg tasa. Massinissa Guermah yessufeɣ rruḥ daxel n lkazirna n yiǧadarmiyen. Din teḍra, din terwi, awal yuzzel am lebraq, yuɣ-d timnaḍin n tmurt n leqbayel yernu ula d ass amzun akken yettwafran : 18 seg yebrir ! Taluft-a thubb-d am waḍu, timesbaniyin, asuɣu, aɛeggeḍ…D taḥemmalt, win I d-tufa sdat-s tewwi-t. Imi Iqbayliyen d wid iwulfen tijmuyeɛ, yal tamnaḍt tessebded wid ara yemmeslayen s yisem-is, seg axerrub, ɣer taddart almi tewweḍ ɣer leɛrac. Tamnaḍt n Leqser deg Bgayet tger irebbi-s I yiwet n temlilit s wazal-is anda tettujerred yiwet n tɣerɣert n 14 n temsal tid I izemren ad d-sersent talwit ma yella kra n tririt fell-asent. Din dɣa, i d-tettuhegga tikli tameqqrant n wazal n krad n yimelyan n yimdanen ara yewwten agerz di tmanaɣt. Yeḍra-d wayen i d-yeḍran, gar yimejraḥ d wid yessufɣen tarwiḥt, ayen yebɣu yili, d tikli n lqern ! Amennuɣ yuɣ akk timnaḍin n tmurt n leqbayel, yegla-d s terwiḥin n waṭas n yilmeẓyen ! 127 I iruḥen d asfel, amennuɣ I d-iḥellan amḍiq n tutlayt taɣelnawt I tmaziɣt uqbel ad tuɣal d tunṣibt deg yennayer yezrin. Ass-a, tidmi-nneɣ ad truḥ srid ɣer yilmeẓyen-a yeɣlin d asfel iwakken ad tifrir tafat fell-aɣ. Acku tatut n umennuɣ-nsen d timenɣiwt tis snat. Ṭṭest di talwit !

<p style="text-align: right;">  S. M 

  
 Seg tgemmi turtangawt (patrimoine immatériel) i inuḥen deg tama n Timimun, aɣir n Adrar, ulac win i ur nesla s Uhellil n Tgurarin (Gurara). Yuɣ lḥal, d Lmulud n at Mɛemmer i yellan d amezwaru seg Tezwawt i as-yefkan azal i tgemmi-ya ed yizlan akk i d-ttawin s yisefra yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt-nni, mi yerza ɣer dinna deg useggas n 1971 lwaḥi ed yiwen n umussnaw afransis deg uẓawan, anida i iga anadi alqayan ɣef wansay-a-nsen yerna yessekles-d izelwan-nni. Syinna, deffir-s llan wiyaḍ i yerran awellih-nsen ugar ɣer tgemmi-ya i yettwaɛeyynen, yuɣ lḥal, d tigemmi turtangawt tamaḍlant (patrimoine immatériel mondial) sɣur UNESCO seg useggas n 2005. Sem (lǧemɛa) iɛeddan ay tettwaseqqef ihi deg Timimun teẓrigt tis tẓa n useggas-a n Uhellil n Tgurarin, ideg ttekkant ma drus 28 n trebbuyaɛ tidiganin (locales). Deg yizlan akk i d-ttawin at Tigurarin s yisefra, ad naf wid icudden ɣer tesreḍt ed teflest (foi), maca daɣen ula d wid yeɛnan tudert-nsen n yal ass ed wayen i d-iḍerrun: am wayen i ten-yesferḥen, tadukkli-nsen, imennuɣen-nsen…atg. Am yisefra n ddeqs n yimedyazen iznatiyen i yettwaḥessasen, ɣas ini, ala deg tegnit-nni. Ma nemmeslay dɣa ɣef yimedyazen iznatiyen, ad naf seg-sen wid i mazal ṭṭfen deg teznatit, ḥerrzen-tt, sekfalen-tt-id, sissinen-tt. Imi ula i tfaska n tmedyezt n Udrar n Fad, ɣas yeggug ubrid, usan-d acḥal n tikkal.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Mass Meniche d amaru u d aselmad i iqedcen deg unnar n tmaziɣt. Tayri-is i tmaziɣt d tiktiwin-is, demmerent-t ad yaɣ abrid n tira. S lferḥ d ameqqran i d aɣ-d-yerra ɣef yisastanen-nneɣ.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Deg kra n wawalen, mmeslayeɣ-d ɣef yiman-ik? 

  Abdel Malek Meniche:  Luleɣ ass n 27 deg waggur n yulyu 1963, deg Imceddalen i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Mayyu deg lwilaya n Tubiret. Lliɣ yakan d aselmad n tutlayt n tmaziɣt deg uɣerbaz alemmas (C E M) n Ibn Khaldoune d tesnawit Abderrhemane Mira. D aneggal, d amaru atrar s tmaziɣt imi uriɣ yakan 11 n yidlisen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, iɣef ara d-nawi awal deg tdiwennit-agi. 

  I melmi tebdiḍ tira? D acu i d-ak-yessawḍen i wakken ad terzuḍ ɣer tira n yidlisen? 

 Bdiɣ tira n yidlisen deg useggas n 2001, asmi sεiɣ 37 n yiseggasen deg leεmer-iw, i d-suffɣeɣ adlis-iw amezwaru. Ussan-nni, lliɣ d aselmad , xas akken tira ḥemmleɣ-tt asmi lliɣ d anelmad. Ma d tamentilt i yi-iğğan ad awiɣ abrid n tira, seg wasmi lliɣ d aselmad i wallaɣ belli yella lexsas d ameqqran deg yidlisen n tmaziɣt, ladɣa win yerzan aselmed. Imi daɣen, aṭas i yettnadin ad lemden tutlayt-nsen, maca ur d-ttafen ara awfus ara ten-iεiwnen, dɣa xemmeɣ i wakken ad d-sizergeɣ timsirin i slemdeɣ u mazal la selmadeɣ deg yidlisen, i wakken ad d-aruɣ ayen ara ten-iεiwnen, swayes ara ad d-sfaydin meqqar.

  Ahat tirmit-ik deg uselmed n tmaziɣt tεawen-ik aṭas deg tira s tmaziɣt, meslay-aɣ-d ɣef wanecta? 

 Asmi lliɣ d aselmad, ssarameɣ tamaziɣt ad tuɣal, ad tesεu amkan deg tudert-nneɣ n yal ass, ad tili d tutlayt ara yesseqdac umdan, i wakken ur tettɣimi ara d tuffirt. D tidet, tirmit-iw deg uselmed n tmaziɣt tεawen-iyi i wakken ad aruɣ idlisen yerna s tmaziɣt. Mačči d aselmed-is kan, maca uqbel anect-a, tella leḥmmala-nni n tmaziɣt, d timeɣnest-nni-ines i d-aɣ-yeğğan ad naru u ad neqdec deg-s.

  Imi kečč telliḍ yakan d aselmad n tmaziɣt, d acu i d tamuɣli-ik ɣef uselmed-is deg uɣerbaz? 

 Si tama, yeffeɣ leεtab ɣer tafat, imi ayen yellan d targit yuɣal d tidet deg useggas n 1995, asmi tekcem tamaziɣt s aɣerbaz azzayri. Ma si tama-nniḍen, mazal amennuɣ ad ikemmel alamma tuɣal d tutlayt am tiyaḍ. Imi mazal urεad tewwiḍ s amḍiq i as-iwulmen, ladɣa deg uɣerbaz, teḥwağ aseggem, ama d ayen yeεnan akud neɣ deg wazal-is…atg. 

  Amek iga usurif-ik amenzu deg usizreg? 

 Asurif-iw amezwaru deg usizreg n yidlisen, wwḍeɣ almi fecleɣ imi ḥfan iḍarren-iw deg tikli. Qelbeɣ akk tizrigin yellan ama dagi deg Tubiret ama deg Tizi Uzzu ama deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, ulac win i yi-yennan ih. Ґer taggara, teqbel tezrigt “El Baghdadi”, i wakken ad d-.tesuffeɣ adlis-nni iwumi semmeɣ « Aselmad-iw n Tmaziɣt -1” deg useggas n 2001.

  Achal n yidlisen i d-tessufɣeḍ yakan? S wacu n tutlayin i d-ffɣen? 

 Seg 2001 ɣer ass-a, sazergeɣ-d 10 n wungalen s tutlayt n tamaziɣt, amenzu yella-d deg useggas n 2001. Deg yimawalen uriɣ kraḍ, amezwaru Tamaziɣt – Tafransist, yeffeɣ-d deg 2005, ma d wis sin d Tamaziɣt – Taεrabt, yeffeɣ-d deg 2006. Ma d wis tlata d asegzawal Tamaziɣt – Tamaziɣt, i d-yeffɣen deg taggara n 2013. Ma d ayen yeεnan aselmed n tmaziɣt, sazergeɣ-d ukuẓ n yidlisen . Amezwaru deg 2001 d “Aselmad-iw n Tmaziɣt -1-” d usuḍen wis sin deg 2003. Wis tlata isem-is « Ad lemdeɣ tamaziɣt 1AM », suffɣeɣ-t-id deg useggas n 2004. Ma d wis rebεa « Asurif amezwaru di tmaziɣt » i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2006. Ma deg wayen yeɛnan ungalen, tura akk uriɣ-d kan yiwen : yeffeɣ-d deg 2015 s uzwel “Tayri d tezɣent”. Idlisen-agi, tuget deg-sen, ffeɣen-d ɣer tezrigit “Asirem”. Am wakken daɣen i d-yerrna yiwen n CD n uselmed i wrrac imecṭaḥ.

  Meslay-aɣ-d ɣef udlis amaziɣ, ladɣa ungal, imi kečč s timmad-ik d aneggal? 

 Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ belli ungal amaziɣ ur yewwiḍ ara ɣer umkan i d as-ilaqen. Adlis amaziɣ, ilaq ad yili am netta am yidlisen-nniḍen, imi tamaziɣt d tunsibt deg tmendawt. Ulamma aṭas ara d-yetteffɣen n wungalen, maca mazal ur yufi ara iman-is gar tewsatin-nniḍen.

  D acu i d tamuɣli-ik ɣef tira s tmaziɣt s umata? 

 Deg tallit-agi taneggarut, la nettwali belli aṭas n yidlisen ara d-itteffɣen deg yal aḥric n tẓuri neɣ n yidles, d ayen yesferaḥen aṭas aṭas. Ladɣa tamedyazt imi la d-tettefeɣen mliḥ iseggasen-agi ineggura, maca llan ula d ungalen, tullisin, timucuha, timezgunin…atg. 

  Acu ara asen-tinniḍ i yimura imaynuten? 

 Imyura imaynuten, ilaq ad sizedgen tira-nsen, wa ad tt-id-sizregen, i wakken ad tt-ɣren medden. ssarameɣ ncallah ad ugten wid yettarun s tmaziɣt, am wakken daɣen ara ṭuqten imeɣriyen n tmaziɣt. Ttmeniɣ daɣen ad kemmlen amenuɣ s tira-nsen, ama ɣef yidles, ama ɣef tgemmi, ama ɣef wansayen…atg. 

  Amek i yezmer wungal ad iεiwen tutlayt? 

 Imi ungal, yettili-d deg-s uḥraz n tutlayt, daɣen d win i d-yessebganen amek yettidir ugdud-nni, i yesseqdacen tutlayt-nni. Yak s ttawil n yidlisen ladɣa ungalen, i nessaweḍ ad nissin amek ttilin igduden deg tudert-nsen n yal ass, mebla ma nerza ɣer tmurt-nsen. S wungal ad d-teḥliḍ amkan-ik, wa ad tefkeḍ tagnit i wiyaḍ akken ad ak-issinen yigduden-nniḍen.

  Amek i ilaq ad yili umaru neɣ umeskar deg tmetti? 

 Amaru, uqbel kulec, ilaq ad iḥemmel taɣuri d tira, acku ur yezmir ara yiwen ad d-yaru ungal ma yella ur yeɣri ara ungalen. Ilaq daɣen, ad yili d win yettεawanen timetti, i wakken ad tt-rfed iman-is. Am wakken daɣen ilaq ad d-yawi ayen ara d-yaru iseɣ d ubaɣur i tmetti-ines, ladɣa ma yella wayen akken yura d amaynut. D netta ara d-yinnin ayen yebɣa d wayen yuggi ugdud, s ttawil n yizen yesεedday deg tira-s.

  D acu n yisenfaren i tessewjadeḍ sya ɣer sdat? 

 Isenfaren mačči d yiwen mačči sin, imi sεiɣ aṭas n yidlisen i iwejden i wakken ad d-ffɣen, maca ama d tazmert ama d idrimen xussen tasiεt-a. Imi nekk aql-iyi ɣef uqerruy n tezrigt “Asirem”, dɣa ttezwiriɣ deg wayla n medden, ttağğeɣ axeddim-iw d aneggaru. Sya ɣer sdat, ad d-suffɣeɣ ungal-iw wis sin, d yidlisen n uselmed n tmaziɣt.

  Awal-ik n taggara… 

 Nessaram d akken leεtab n tmaziɣt, ad yeffeɣ ɣer tafat, tanemmirt-ik a mass Adaoun imi tgiḍ azal i nekk d leqdic-iw adelsan, tanemmirt s tussda i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen (La Dépêche de Kabylie), imi i yi-iga amkan deg isebtar-is. Slam-iw ɣef wid i yi-ḥemmlen d imeɣriyen-inu di yal amkan. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">   Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

 
  
 Aṭas n twaculin i yebdan ttheggint iman-nsent akken ad fɣen ɣer lexla ad d-leqḍent azemmur.  Aseggas-agi, xas akken lɣella –agi teslek-as i tizzitt n uzemmur i s-yefkan tiyita ilindi, maca ur temniɛ ara deg iɣamacen. Tallit iwedjiben as tiniḍ d aseɣzef n unebdu, ula d tiqit n lehwa ur d-gli yas asmi d-tekcem. Ayen yeǧan azemmur yeqqim kan akken yella deg kra n imekwan, ladɣa deg iẓuṛaṛ anda tizmrin ulac anda ara d-summent tiqit n waman.  Lḥebb d ameẓyan am cilmun, taglimt-is tekmec ɣef yiɣes. Atas deg-s ur yeṭṭif ara iman-s  sufella n tzemmurt. Yefruri-d ɣer lqaɛa uqbel ma ad yebb. Deg kra n tɣiwanin n Bgayet, imdanen bdan yuɣ lḥal ajmaɛ n lɣella-nsen. Imezdaɣ n taddart Tibane, d-yezgan di tɣiwant n Sidi Aïche, fɣen ɣer lexla ddeqs aya. Atas deg-sen nnan-d d akken aseggas-agi bdan uqbel lawan alqaḍ n uzemmur. Sebba ten-yeǧan ad bdun ajmaɛ n lɣella-agi d lḥamu id d-yessefrurin yak azemmur ɣer lqaɛa. “Leqwaɛi n tzemrin yak ssan-t uqbel lawan. Senttif ad d-nejmeɛ aya-gi yellan, wala ma neǧat iḍaɛ», id d-ennan kra n imezdaɣ d-nmuger.

 Deg kra n tɣiwanin n lwilaya n Tizi wezzu, tizemrin ur sefrahen-t ara. Ifurkawen yettawiten waḍu. Llan-t kra ur d-eǧin-t ula d aɛeqqa. Dagi, tiwaculin mazal ur ɛnin-t ara ad d-sufɣen-t ttawilat sexdamen-t deg tallit-agi. Imextafen, tisennajin lak d lbican mazal-iten nnejmaɛen deg imekwan-nsen. Anda yegget lxir, imdanen fɣen, akken kan iɛedda ugeffur, ad cerwen leqwaɛi n tzemrin-nsen w’ad ksen tizzuyin d yemɣan nniḍen yegman ddaw neɣ tama n isekla. Ayen ara sen-yessishlen ajmaɛ n lɣella-nsen.

 Di tama n Tugirett, imdanen yeffeɣ laɛqel mi walan iɣamacen n iweǧ iben ikemlen taɣart i wayen yellan yuɣ lhal yeqqur, yuɣal-iten-id rruḥ deg mi d-esawa, acku tugdi mazal-itt deg wulawen. Ula d nutin ur ttzuxxun ara aseggas-agi s lɣella ara d-awin. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>            

<p style="text-align: right;">Fatiha K.

  
 Gar-aneɣ d kra n wussan, Tuddsa n wid ur nettwali n twilayt n Bgayet ad theggi iman-is akken ad tili i walmend n ugar n mraw d ameɛḍur, i ara yerzun ɣef Wammas n Usileɣ Asadar (Centre de Formation Professionnelle) n Bgayet. Tura s useggas-a, ad tili tuddsa-ya tessaweḍ ad tesuddes i useggas wis kraḍ asileɣ-a i wid mu nessawal « iderɣalen », yettusemma n wallen. Imdanen-a ihi, ad ssawḍen deg teɣzi n 12 n wayyuren ad d-awin agerdas ara asen-yefken azref ad qedcen deg walbaɛḍ n tkebbaniyin neɣ n tdeblin. Anect-a iban yella-d s tallelt n unemhal n Wammas n Usileɣ Asadar, maca daɣen s tin n Tmehla n Tigawt Tinmettit (DAS) n waɣir n Bgayet, skud sɣur-s ay d-yettas udrim ilaqen. Aselway n tuddsa-ya mass Ɛisani Ɛebdelḥakim yenna-aɣ-d dakken umuɣ (liste) n yinelmaden i ara yeɣren aseggas-a yeččur, maca yefka-d ttiɛad i wid yebɣan ad ttwasilɣen qabel, ad heggin iman-nsen i uxdam n sin neɣ tlata n lekwaɣeḍ kan imi tiwwura-nsen zgant ldint. Asileɣ ɣef wacu i d-ttɛeddayen yimdanen-a i ur nettwali ur yelli d uwɛir ɣef leḥsab n wid ijerrben yakan. Imi deg tazwara ad asen-slemden yiselmaden agemmay-nsen uzzig, win i sseqdacen s yifassen-nsen. Mi ara kksen aqeddic amenzu, ad yettwassemres ɣef yinelmaden wahil ideg ara ɣren allalen-a atraren n teywalt (communication) ; amezruy-nsen, azal-nsen, nnuba-nsen, akked yineɣmisen akk i ten-yerzan. Aḥric-a n wahil ad yemmag deg ddeqs n wakud alama gzan yinelmaden s telqey amaḍal-a n tilifun ladɣa, imi fell-as i xeddmen asileɣ. Syin akkin, mi ara ilin yinelmaden ugmen-d xilla n tmussniwin timeẓrayin, ad ɛeddin ɣer uqeddic n tidet : winna n usemres. Akken ma llan yinelmaden ad ɛeddin ɣer tigawt: ad yettwasres sdat n yal yiwen tilifun yersen (fixe), bac ad lemden amek ara ssiwlen i kra n wuṭṭun, amek ara refden i tiɣri, neɣ amek ara ceyyɛen win i d-yessawalen ɣer yizireg wayeḍnin. Mi ara lemden dayen amenzay n twuri-nsen tamaynut, ad sɛun yimdanen-a i ur nettwali agerdas n uɛessas n tilifun (standardiste). Dɣa yiwen seg wid i d-iḥellan agerdas (diplôme) ilindi yenna-aɣ-d: « Aseggas-nni i ɣriɣ dinna akked yimdukkal d awezɣi ad t-ttuɣ. Tura aql-i d axeddam s tallelt n la das. Ɣas ma lexlas ur igerrez, maca akka wala ulac maḍi. Ilaq ɣef yal aderɣal ad yeg asileɣ-a ». D asileɣ s wazal-is, skud d ayen ara yeǧǧen ameɛḍur-a ad yekcem ugar deg tmetti. Yuɣ lḥal, ula d internet akked wallal n uselkim tenwa tuddsa-ya n wid ur nettwali n Bgayet ad t-terr gar yifassen n wid ukud tlehhu, lemmer mačči d aḥraq i yettwaḥreq tikkelt yezrin uxxam n yidles n Bgayet anda ttuɣ dduzan-a. Ɣas ma yella, anemhal n uxxam-a yefka-yasen amiru (promesse) dakken ad asen-iqeɛɛed taluft deg wakud iqerben. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Uggur n lexṣaṣ n waman n tisit d win id-yettuγalen yal tikkelt di deqs n temnaḍin n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu xarṣum di tsemhuyt (saison) n unebdu. Maca tikkelt-agi lexṣaṣ d win id-ibanen γef zik lḥal urεad lawan, seba n unebdu i ikecmen s lahmaq, rnu aheggan i iruḥen d aγurar. Γef aya imezdaγ n tadert Tizi n Wegni di tγiwant n Yiεekkuren begnen-d lγiḍ-nsen s zdat n waγbel-agi i ten-icewlen, imi nnig n 35 n wussan ur-sεin tiqit n waman deg yexxamen-nsen. Dayen iten-idegren akken ad-teqsaden tiliwa, laεwansar d lebyur d anadi γef tiqit n waman s wayes ara-ksen fad. Maca, ayen lexṣaṣ-agi yettuγal-d yal tikkelt, γas akken idurar leqbayel d iγbula n waman? Si tama niḍen, ayen abarağ n Taqsebt yesway timnaḍin n berra, ttewḥarmen imawlan-is deg-s? dagi is-yenna  » Aγyul n Baba d Jeddi, rniγ rrekba n deffir ».<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>           <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>       <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>                  

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci

  
 Ɣas ma ɛeddan kra n wussan yuklal ad d-nemmeslay fell-as, imi tamsalt terza amezruy i iresxen deg uqerruy. Wagi d leqdic i yemmugen deg twilayt n Tubiret, tamnaḍt n Rafur, taddart n Yiwaqquren, ass n ssebt 06 di deg mayu yezrin. Sin n leqdicat i d-thegga Tejmaɛit n Yimezdaɣ n Rafur, anda i d-smektan tidyanin i iga Urumi deg wass yecban ass-n, aseggas n 1957deg lawan n tegrawla. Settin n yiseggasen i iɛeddan ɣef tseɛtin-nni timcumin ideg Afransis yehjem ɣef Yiɣẓer n Yiwaqquren yexdem dinna afarnas s yidim d asemmaḍ. Yesreɣ taddart-nni, yehdem ixxamen-is ɣef qeddac n tmentilin. Gar-asent tiḥerci d tebɣest i kesben yimezdaɣ-is, d nnuba tameqqrant i sɛan deg uɛiwen n yimjuhad s wayen umi zemren akken ad sɣelben ɣef lɛesker n Fransa. Ass-nni dɣa ɣlin aṭas n yimeɣrasen d iseflan, mmren-d yidammen seg tfekkiwin n wid yemmuten d wid ijerḥen. Ma d wiyaḍ sellken iman-nsen seld ssawḍen rewlen ɣer watmaten-nsen di taddart n Lejdid n Yiwaqquren, kra nniḍen kecmen ɣer tudrin i ten-iqerben… Imezdaɣ n taddart n Yiɣẓer n Yiwaqquren rran tajmilt daɣen i 52 n yimeɣrasen i yemmuten di umkan Tala ass n 19 di duǧenber 1959. Ad d-nebder kan belli leqdic-a iwennɛen yeḥḍer deg-s lwali n twilayt n Tubiret mass Mulud Crifi i wwin yimsuddsen ɣer lɛenser n yiɣẓer n Yiwaqquren, yeswa-d aman isemmaḍen, syin rran ɣer tmeqbert anda xedmen ddqiqa n tsusmi ɣef yiẓiɣren n tegrawla, seg 1954 alama d 1962. Iɛeggalen n Tejmaɛit n Yiɣẓer n Yiwaqquren budden i lwali akatar (cadre), netta daɣen si tama-s yefka-asen-d tanaga n yiseɣ. Deffir tigawt-nni, lɣaci, iɛegallen n tejmaɛit , lwali akked urabaɛ-ines ulin srid ɣer Tala. Dinna dɣa i yesres lwali aɛemmur n yizeǧǧigen ɣef larwaḥ n yimeɣrasen n tegrawla, mbeɛd fkan asawaḍ i yimjuhad i iɛacen imenɣi-nni n duǧenber 1959, ḥkan-d ɣef wayen yeḍran. « tɛedda tegnit s ugerrez ɣas ma d ccɣel awɛran, imi tameɣra-agi tella-d deg udrar mačči deg uẓaɣar. Nmuger-d kra n wuguren, gar-asen win n waḥbas n tkeryas, lameɛna imsuddsen ufan-as-d tifrat ». I d-yenna yiwen seg yiɛeggalen n Tejmaɛit n Yiɣẓer n Yiwaqquren. I d-iberrḥen ula d tumert-is imi ulin lɣaci s waṭas, tiwaculin, irgazen, tulawin, arrac, tiḥdayin, igardan, imɣaren akked yinebgawen ɣer udrar-nni. Rnu, tella-d lweɛda n seksu, ččan merra wid i iruḥen ɣer din.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Tala-Tgana, d taddart. D taqdimt n lqedma, tecfa-d i yilel asmi yerɣa. Aẓar-is, d amaziɣ, yekka-d sennig tillay.

 Wid i d-yecfan, qqaren-d belli imezwura n taddart n Tala Tgana, frurin-d seg Udrar At Qḍiɛa seg lɛerc n Wat Jennad i d-yeṭṭfen seg Yizrexfawen seg temnaḍt n Uẓeffun alama d asun n Wagnun terreḍ akkin s At Leɛder d Yiɛeẓẓugen.D taddart akk meqqren deg tɣiwant n Friḥa. Tebḍa ɣef 10 n yiderma: At Brahem, At Jgala, At Mḥend, Ibesɛayen, Ibucuken, Iɛeddiwen, At Yusef, At Ugnun, At Wakli d Yiqejjiḍen.Tala-Tgana, d awal n tmaziɣt. d uddis, deg-s sin yimuren: tala, d aɣbalu, d adeg ideg umẓen waman, ma d tagana, d tagrumma n yisekla d wunan, meḥsub d agama, ɣas akken tura, tiliwa-ines, nqedwant, ta, yečča-tt umadaɣ, ta, yuwi-tt usyax, ma d tiyaḍ grurjent akk. Imezdaɣ, ad tesɛu azal n 2500 d amdan. Amur ameqqran deg-sen, d inuwar; kra niḍen, d ifellaḥen, ma d wiyaḍ, d iminigen. Tala-Tgana, tezga deg Tɣiwant n Friḥa, deg lɛerc n Wat Jennad. Tebɛed ɣef temdint n Tizi-Uzzu azal n 40 n yikilumitren. Tigti n yixxamen-is, bnan s uẓru n tfezza. Abrid ameqqran i tt-icergen deg yiɣir n ufella s iɣir n wadda, yebḍa taddart ɣef sin. Rnu ɣer-s 4 n yiberdan igezmen iderma s uglawi, ttawin seg ugmuḍ ɣer utaram. yal lḥara, tesɛa abrid i d-yessufuɣen ɣer ubrid agejdan. Ɣer tama n ufella, yesburr-as, s tecḍadt-is, ugerram Wenṭaja, ma d Aẓru d Udrar At Qdiɛa, d nutni i as-d-yerran tili i tiṭṭ yebɣan ad tsigg ɣer yilel.Ɣer unẓul, tama tayeffust, d Ajerrar, ijifer i d-yeffɣen seg timiḍt-is, ma d Lmajen d Mleɣni, d agmir n yizuɣar-is. Ɣer utaram, d Timerzuga d Wat Buweɛli, tesburr-asen s yiferr-is. Ɣer ugmuḍ, d Tagersift d Yixerban, zik llan yid-s d atmaten uqbel ad d-srifgen seg uwdef, ma ɣer ugmud n ugafa, d Aɣrib n Letnayen iɣer d-rezzun yimdanen at tnezzut d nniya asmi tedres tgella. Tura, agadez-nni ur d-yeqqim deg-s kra, imi ula d arraw-is ara as-igen leqrar, unagen anda niḍen. Ɣas akken, Tala-Tgana , d taddart, ad tafeḍ deg-s ayen tebɣiḍ: aɣsur n tujjya, snat n leqhawi, tiḥuna, d waṭas n tnufa tideblanin. Tamazna, taɣunt n tɣiwant akked unrar n ddabex. Tla 4 n leǧwameɛ: lǧameɛ n Teɛwint, lǧameɛ n Tqeccuḍt, lǧameɛ alemmas, lǧameɛ n wadda. Lǧameɛ n Tqeccuḍt, d isem-is i d awal-is, deg-s ay gerrwen wat–taddart i uqesser d unecreḥ; zik, deg-s ay neǧren ayen tteḥwiǧen i tkerza; ar ass-a, mazal-t ibedd am uɣudid, yezba i tillay n umezruy. Ma d lǧameɛ alemmas, d netta akk i d ameqqran deg-sen imi ulsen-as lebni deg yiseggasen n 70.Yuɣal i tẓallit d yigerwan imeqqranen n taddart. Tala-Tgana, tennezwa, tennecraḥ, tzemreḍ ad twaliḍ alamma d anda i d-yerra yigli tilist : Adrar n Jerjer, Larebɛa n Wat-Yiraten, Lǧemɛa n Sariǧ, At Yeǧǧer, iɣefdeg n Tizi-Uzzu, Tiqubɛin. Ma tmuqqleḍ d asawen, igli-inek, d Tiggit n Ugni Ucerqi ara ak-id-yerren agdil i wallen-ik. Tura akka, taddart tessemɣer ijufar-is ɣer yal tama, ɣer zelmeḍ, ɣer yeffus, d akessar d usawen, armi tuɣal tenṭeḍ d tudrin i as-d-yezzin: Aẓru d Tmerẓuga. Ma ɣer sdat yiɣzer, d At Jenged ara ak-id-iqablen s yiṣuken-is imaynuten d ubrid n ukerrus i icerrgen gar-as d tin i t-id-iɛeḍsen. 

  Ali Lounis 

<div> 
  
 Ṛamḍan, atan i bedded ɣef tewwurt. Mazal kan kra n wussan akken ad « yaweḍ »! Deg waggur agi i tettili twizi gar yemdanen, akken ad sɛeddin aggur-agi n « laẓ » akken ilaq lḥal. Aṭaṣ n twaculin tettaṭaf-itent tugdi, acku ẓrant belli ilaq-asent tadrimt, yerna s waṭaṣ. Ayagi, mačči akk tiwaculin yesɛan allalen akken ad qablent sidna Ṛemḍan, anda sṭuqutent tuččiyin. Ihi akka, tiwizi ilaq ad tili gar yemdanen i lmend n igellilen, akken ad ččen akken ilaq. Deg tama n Iɣil Ɛli, i d-yezgan deg unẓul n t’wilayt n Bgayet, yennulfa-d akken yiwen usmil (comité) i cudden ɣer « Agur Azeggaɣ Azzayri » neɣ le Croissant Rouge Algérien. Ɣas melmi kan, asmil-agi yelli tawwurt-is deg yiwen wemkan iwumi ssawalen « Jeddi gaḥtut », deg Iɣil Ɛli. Imdanen-agi bdan leqdic nsen s t’ɣiwla, imi jemɛen, i tikkelt tamezwarut kan, azal n 110 iḍellaɛen yettuferqen ɣef yigellilen, d ttuǧǧal akk d yigujilen n tama-agi. Dayen yessefraḥen aṭaṣ, yerna imezdaɣ n t’ɣiwant n Iɣil Ɛli nḥafen aṭaṣ, imi tiwaculin ur ellin-t ara deg liser akkit ! Agur-agi azeggaɣ yewwi-d yides « tiwizi » i yigellilen d yimaɛḍar n Iɣil Ɛli. Akka, tezmer attgerrez teswiɛt, imi tagmatt lakked d lemɛiwna yennerna azal nsen deg t’metti. Akken yebɣu yeṣɛeb Ṛemḍan, tiwizi at qabel akken ilaq. « Dayen i yessefarḥen dayen kan, ass-mi id d-yeffeɣ usmil (comité) n Uggur Azeggaɣ deg t’ɣiwant nneɣ. Mači ɣas d ttuččit kan i ferqen, ula d dwa lakked d yiselsa i yigellilen d yimaɛḍar n t’ɣiwant nneɣ. S-yillu ar ferḥaɣ i kra dayagi ! » akka iɣ-d yenna yiwen n-umezdaɣ n tama-agi n lɛarc n-At Ɛebbas. Akka ihi, Agur Azeggaɣ n-Iɣil Ɛli yebda i « leqqeḍ », ussan-a, tuččiyin lakked yisufar ilaqen akken ad sɛeddin medden ur nesɛi ara aggur n Ṛemḍan akken ig laq lḥal. D-acu kan aɣbel n usmil-agi « Azeggaɣ » yella-d ɣef ayen yeɛnan aṣiweḍ n yisufar n-učči (Transport des denrées alimentaires).  Asmil-agi ur yesɛi ara takerrust akken ad yessiweḍ isufar i yigellilen n t’ɣiwant i zedɣen deg tuddar i baɛden, am Taẓla, El Qelɛa, Buni, At Sraj, Tabuɛnant d tiyaḍ. Maca, agnu-agi ur yeswexxir ara ɣer deffir irgazen-agi yesnen d-acutt t’wizi lakked tagmatt !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Aṭas i llan ttraǧun seg wid iḥemmlen tigejdit-a n ccna azwaw ad walin muggen, ffɣen-d dayen sin n yisura-nni iɣef tella tessawel-d Malika Meɛtub tazwara n useggas n 2013, ed ideg d-tluɛa kra n wid iḥemmlen anaẓur-a, kra n wid yellan d imekdiyen-is, neɣ s umata kra n wid iḥulfan iman-nsen d imeɣnasen, ad ttekkin deg twizi-nni ulama s ddrur n tedrimt. Axdam-a n sin n yisura n Lwennas n Ayt Lewnis – yiwen ɣef ubaraz-ines (concert) awḥid, win sin ɣef umecwar n ccna i d-yewwi – yella yehwa i waṭas n Yizwawen ed Yimaziɣen merra skud ad asen-d-tas tegnit ad walin ttiɛadat n ccna n unaẓur s tɣara igerrzen DVD, rnu ad walin ahat kra n tugniwin i ur ẓran, neɣ d ineḍruyen s wazal-nsen deg tudert n Lwennas.

 Imi acennay-a anaẓur bu taɣect yesdegdigen yekcem yakan taɣlalt (éternité) akken i t-id-yenna, rnu daɣen acḥal i yellan ulac-iten, wiyaḍ ulac-iten llan. Asura-ya yella ad yesɛu azwel«Meɛtub Lwennas, isem-iw amennuɣ», d asenfar i yellan ad yili, akken i d-nnan deg tvidyut-nni, s tdukkli gar Tesbeddit Meɛtub Lwennas ɣef yixef-is uletma-s n uɣewwaɣ Malika Meɛtub akked Tfarest n Mathurin. Lameɛna, gar taggara yettwanɣel, neɣ ad d-nini yettwasselḥem ɣer wazemz wayeḍ usenfar-a, skud am wakken nezmer ad nɣer deg usebter amezwaru n wadeg i d-yennulfan i walmend n yisura-ya (<a href="http://www.matoublouneslesfilms.com" target="_blank">matoublouneslesfilms.com</a>) : «tesḥassef terbaɛt n Meɛtub Lwennas isura ad awen-d-tesneɣmes dakken ur nessaweḍ ara ad naf infarasen ara d-yesneɛten ahilen-nneɣ, ihi ulac ddeqs n tedrimt bac ad neg sin n yisura-nni i nella nettmenni ad awen-d-nesken…». Seg tama tayeḍ, yenna-d yizen-nni dakken asaru n ttiɛad n ccna n Meɛtub Lwennas deg Zinit n Pari, atan ihegga, ihi ad d-yeffeɣ sey-a ɣer sdat. Nessaram ad uɣalen wid i d-yesnulfan tikti-ya ass amenzu, ad xemmen ɣef usenfar-a igerrzen, imi war ahat wid iḥemmlen amdan-a bu tidet dima heggan i tal tallelt.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Aql-aɣ deg tallit ideg ttwalint wallen agdil (écran) deg yakk tamiwin. D ayen i d-tewwi tetiknulujit i yelḥan ɣer sdat iseggasen-a ineggura. Armi tura, ula d igerdan, sawḍen ad ṭṭfen gar yifassen-nsen tilifun, taṭabliḍt neɣ aselkim. Seg tama n tmussni, ad naf d zzman i d-yessuturen aya. Yelha-as i ugrud acu kan i kra n wakud i wass, ma yella yettwaɛus sɣur yimawlan-is s ubaḍi amarwan, neɣ ayen iwumi qqaren s tefransist (le contrôle parental). Ma yella seg tama n tdawsa n yigerdan-a, iban-d d akken agdil d aɛdaw amezwaru n wallen. Ma ur ifaq ara yiwen amek ara yessemres asagu-ines (appareil) d melmi ara t-yesseqdac, yezmer ad d-yeglu s txessarin, abeɛda i yiẓri. D ayen iɣef mtawan dɣa akk yimussnawen d yimsujjiwen deg umaḍal. Imi ɣef wakken i d-wwint tezrawin i yemmuggen ɣef ddemma n waya, yessefcal ugdil allen n umdan s umata. Maca d agrud i yenṭerren d amezwaru imi d ileqqaqen yinzizen n yiẓri-s. Ɣef waya yewwi-d ɣef yal ababat d tyemmat, ad ḥadren seg taluft-a n usawal i yigerdan.

  M. K. 

  
 D isalli yessefcalen ifadden i yuzzaren ama di tmurt am deg berra ɣef tmettant n umeɣnas Said BOUKHARI. 55 n yiseggasen kan deg leɛmer-is mi t-teccelqef lmut seg yirebbi n twacult-is d lehbab-is. D amdan i d-ilulen i wakken ad yennaɣ ɣef tugdut, ɣef yizerfan n umdan i wakken ad d-yessekfel lasel-is win akken yettwaɣebban acḥal d lqern. D tamaziɣt i yeẓẓan deg-s tismin, tabɣest i wakken ad yeddu fell-as, acku ayen i tekka tudert-is ur yuniz i uzaglu i d-yersen ɣef ugdud. Yedda, yelḥa, isuɣ, i wakken, ass-a, inelmaden yellan akk d arraw-is, qqaren-tt, ttarun yis-s, yerna deg uɣerbaz. D amdan ttqadaren medden irkelli, acku ẓran-t seg wid ur yettɣurru udrim wala cciɛat. Iteddu s uzday n lqedd imi amennuɣ-is d win yebnan ɣef tidet d sswab. Imeɣnasen, n at ufella neɣ n at wadda, ttqadarent i merra i lmend n tezdeg yekseb, d wawal ibedden ɣef tidet. Ass-a, tamettant-is, teɣdel-d leḥzen ɣef merra wid terḥa taluft n tlelli, yuklal tajmilt almend-is netta, win akken yellan d amedya i waṭas n Yiqbayliyen. Ilul Said Boukhari ass 28 deg cutember 1962 deg taddart n Bouarfa tama n Maatkas. Yella d ameɣnas ameqqran deg Umussu adelsan amaziɣ MCB, ladɣa deg yiseggasen-nni n 1980 deg temdint n Dellys anda yella yeqqar. Yella deffir n tikli tameqqrant i yeḍran deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt deg useggas n 1990 akked uneḥbus ɣef leqraya deg useggas 1994/195 i yessawḍen ɣer unekcum n tmaziɣt ɣer Uêrbaz azzayri uɣerbaz. Yehlek aṭṭan n kunsir seg yulyu iɛeddan, yemmut ass-nni n larebɛa yezrin.

  Smail Merzouk 

  
 ‘’Ṭṭes di trakna, tiniḍ-as ccetwa ḥlawet’’. Akka i as-yeqqar lemtel i aɣ-d-ǧǧan yimezwura. Lmeqsud n tenfalit-agi, neɣ anamek-is, fehmen-t akken iwata iɛeggalen n Waggur azeggaɣ azzayri n temdint n Tizi Uzzu imi ttafen imdanen nsan berra i usemmiḍ deg yal azniq n temdint n Tizi Uzzu.

 ‘’Yal iḍ, ɣef sebɛa, ttefɣen yiɛeggalen n Waggur azuggaɣ azzayri ɣer yizenqan n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, ttawin lmakla akked yiceṭṭiḍen i yimdanen-nni yettnusun deg berra. Llan deg terbaɛt-nneɣ 16 n yirgazen, 14 n tlawin, 6 n warrac d 2 n teḥdayin. Wigi akk, xeddmen baṭel, s lebɣi-nsen’’, i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Samir Bouaziz, anemhal n Waggur azeggaɣ azzayri n temdint n Tizi Uzzu ass-nni n ssebt. Ass-nni, dɣa, i asen-d-tseddeq tidddukkla n yimawlan n tḥuna ugar n 200 n tẓerbiten ara fken i yimdanen-agi yegganen deg berra akked twaculin ixussen. Xas ulamma ur ten-tettɛawan ara dduwla, meɛna yella wansi i d-ttḍebbiren ama d llebsa neɣ lmakla i swayes ttqabalen imdanen-agi yenṭarren. ‘’Llan wid i aɣ-yettɛawanen. Seg umewaru n duǧember ar tura, aql-aɣ nmudd kter n 2100 n tiram n lmakla. Ad nkemmel akka alamma d aggur n meɣres.u nezmer ad nkemmel akkin ma yeqqim lḥal akka semmeḍ’’, i aɣ-d-yenna yimḍebber amezwaru n tuddsa-a. Llan kra n yimekwan i yettwaheggan i lmend n waya, i lmend n win ur nesɛi ara anda ara nsen. Acu kan, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan iɛeggalen-agi n Waggur azeggaɣ azzayri, d akken wigi yegganen deg berra, ttagin ad ddun ɣer yimekwan-agi. Tikwal reffun ɛad mi ara asen-qqaren, u ttagin ad ččen lmakla-nni neɣ ad ṭṭfen iceṭṭiḍen. Ḥemmlen ad qqimen deg yiberdan, ad nsen i usemmiḍ wala ad ddun sani-nniḍen. Cwi kan, llan wid i yettukelfen deg-sen ama seg tama n lmakla, n llebsa neɣ s udawi. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, werǧin yemmut yiwen, neɣ yekcem ɛad ɣer sbiter imi llan wid i ten-yettdawin deg umekkan anda ttilin. Seg tama-nniḍen, tella Tiddukkla ‘’Djak Lkhir’’ i d-yelhan seg yimeɣban n tudrin n leqbayel. Yal tikkelt anta tama uɣur ara truḥ, ad tawi tifersuday i wid ixussen. ‘’Aql-aɣ tura, nessaweḍ 500 n tferṣuday ara nefreq deg ussan i d-iteddun. Iswi-nneɣ, ad nessiweḍ ɣer 1000’’, i aɣ-d-yenna Imarazen Wafik, imḍebber deg tiddukkla-agi.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine Moula 

<div> 
  
 La yettxemmim unabaḍ (ḥukuma) ad iɛawed tamuɣli deg tsertit-nnes n ussenqes n ssumat deg yiseggasen ay d-yetteddun yerna lemɛawna-a ad terzu kan imdanen ay tt-yeḥwaǧen ugar, ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked ass n laṛebɛa uneɣlaf n tedrimt, Abderrahmane Benkhalfa.

 Mi d-yerra ɣef tuttriwin n yimaslaḍen (aɛḍa’) n Ugraw Aɣerfan Aɣelnaw ay d-yellan deg temlilit ɣef usenfar n lqanun n tedrimt n 2016, iɛawed iwekked-d uneɣlaf d akken anabaḍ ad ikemmel tasertit-nnes tanmettit (iǧtimaɛiyya), maca yessefk ad iɛawed tamuɣli yerna ad ibeddel cwiṭ, cwiṭ tasertit-a.

 «D tidet nebda nettxemmim (deg unabaḍ) ɣef wamek, seg-a ɣef sin neɣ 3 n yiseggasen, ad d-nelhu s uɛawen deg ssumat», ɣef wakken ay d-yenna uneɣlaf mi d-yerra ɣef temsalt n tmerniwt n ssumat n trisiti d userɣu (waqud) deg usenfar n lqanun n tedrimt n 2016.

 Deg tidet, asenfar-a n lqanun yessumer-d (iqtaraḥa) timerniwt n leɣrama n wazal yettwernan seg 7% ɣer 17% deg ssuma n ugazwal, deg lgaz agaman lemmer ad iɛeddi i 2500 n ttirmiyin i 3 n wayyuren d trisiti lemmer ad tɛeddi i 250 n yikiluwaṭen-tasaɛet i 3 n wayyuren.

 «Taswiɛt-a, iɣlifen sɛan umuɣen n yimdanen ixuṣṣen mliḥ. Dɣa ad nɛeddi seg unagraw n ussenqes deg ssumat i medden akk ɣer unagraw n ussenqes deg ssumat i tegrawin ibanen. Maca ad neg aya asurif, asurif», ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Mass Benkhalfa.

  
 I lmend n usmekti n tmenɣiwt n Mouloud Feraoun, tiddukkla yewwin isem-is s lemɛawna n tenmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, heggant-d yiwen wahil d ameqqran ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan, 15, 16 d 17 deg meɣres-agi deg-i inella.

 Deg leqdic-a, ad tili temsikent deg uxxam n Tiddukkla Mouloud Feraoun n Tizi Hibel, timsizzelt n tmaziɣt gar kra n yiɣerbazen, isaragen ɣef tmeddurt d wayen yura Feraoun, asrusu n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uzekka-s ass n 15 deg meɣres d wayen-nniḍen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tameddurt n Mouloud Feraoun  

 Mouloud Feraoun d yiwen umaru azzayri, ilul ass n 08 deg meɣres 1913 deg taddart n leqbayel deg Tizi Hibel, taɣiwant n At Dwala deg Tizi Uzzu. Aɣara-ines Ait Chabane. Tella tawacult-is, txeddem tafellaḥt, d tigellilt , d tawacult n tmanya n yiɛeggalen , maca, ddren kan xemsa, Mouloud Feraoun d wis tlata, d aqcic amezwaru. Yunag baba-s ɣer Fransa seg useggas n 1910 armi d aseggas n 1928. Yura Mouloud Feraoun ungal-is amezwaru ‘’Le fils du pauvre’’, deg useggas n 1950. Yeckem ɣer uɣerbaz n Tizi Hibel , deg useggas n 1928, yella deg uɣerbaz amenzu n Tizi Uzzu. Deg useggas n 1932, yetteki deg temsizzelt, yekcem s aɣerbaz n Bouzaréah. Din, yessen Emmanuel Roblès. Deg useggas n 1935, yexdem d aselmad deg taddart-is Tizi Hibel. Yezweğ, yuɣ yelli-s n ɛemmi-s Dehbia yesɛa yid-s 7 n yigerdan .Yebda yettaru deg useggas n 1939. Yewwi ungal-is amezwaru ‘’Mmi-s n ugellil’’ arraz amezwaru deg Lezzayer, u s ungal-agi i swayes yettwassen . Deg useggas n 1946, ceyyɛen-t ɣer taddart-is. Deg useggas n 1952, yuɣal d anemhal deg Larebɛa n At Yiraten. Deg useggas 1957, yuɣal diɣ d anemhal deg uɣerbaz Nador de Clos-Salembier. Syin ɣer-s, yeffeɣ seg tmurt, yuɣal ɣer Lezzayer. Deg useggas n 1951, yemyussan Mouloud Feraoun n Albert Camus. yekfa tira n wungal : «La terre et le sang , yettunefk-as warraz deg useggas n 1953 «Le roman populiste» i ungal-is ‘’La terre et le sang’’. Deg useggas n 1960, yuɣal Mouloud Feraoun d amaswaḍ. Yettwanɣa s yifassen n OAS, ass n 15 deg Meɣres 1962, netta akked xemsa n yimeddukkal-is mi ruḥen ad nejmaɛen. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> <strong style="text-align: center;">Z.A.Y
