 <span style="text-align: right;"> </span>

  
 I lmend n usmekti n wass agraɣlan n waman i d-yettasen yal aseggas deg wass n 22 di meɣres, thegga-d Tkubanit tazzayrit n waman n lwilaya n Bgayet yiwet temlilit s wazal-is deg uxxam n “ ADE” di tama n uɣrem Remla . Deg temlilit-agi, mmeslayen yimusnaw yettuxessen deg uḥric–agi ɣef wazal sɛan waman di tudert n umdan n yal ass akked d ugama s umata . Yezzi wawal s waṭas ɣef wamek ilaq ara yili useḥbiber n lɣella-agi n waman ama di ttḍayuɛ, ama di tezdeg-ines d wallalen ilaqen, acku tineggura-agi, yettban-d belli amur ameqqran yettḍaɛ, yettruḥu ɣer yilel , imi aṭas n yiqudas n waman i yetteqrasen yal ass di tɣiwanin n lwilaya. Teddun waman sbaḥ tameddit deg yiberdan, ttɣiman akken acḥal n wussan ur d-ttwaxdamen ara. Ma d sebba n waya s umata, tettuɣal ɣer lqella n useɛlem n srabes teɛna temsalt. Tikwal, ttemlilin-d waman zeddigen akked wid n yizuliɣen. Aya d ayen i d-igellun s lemḍaerra, ama i umdan ama i yiɣersiwen . Ɣer taggara n temlilit, fɣen-d wid iḥedren s kra n ttewsayat icuban: asizdeg n lxuznat n waman d laɛwanser , lḥemlat n useɛlem n yimdanen ɣef n lɣella-agi i wakken ad tt-ḥerzen di ttḍayuɛ, areqqeɛ n yiqudas ideg teddun waman ama d wid zedigen, ama d wid n tzuliɣin, ladɣa ineggura-agi I wakken ur ttḍurun ara amdan d twennaḍt s umata . 

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  B.B. 

<div> 
  
 Mass Boukhalfa Bacha, d aneγmas di radyu tis snat seg useggas 1963 armi 2005. Zyada γef yisallen, yettheggi-d netta akked umeddakel-is, Mass Guerfi, tidwilin-nniḍen anda i d-yemlal aṭas n yimdanen yettwasnen, ama deg uḥric n ccna, n tira neγ tsertit. Deg wawal i d-newwi yid-s, yesmekta-aγ-d lewqat-nni : uguren d tmeḥqqranit i tettidir radyu tis snat, d zher yesεa imi yemlal d kra n yirgazen imeqqranen. 

  Melmi i tebdiḍ di Radyu tis snat.? 

 <span style="color: #ff0000;"> Boukhalfa Bacha : </span> bdiγ deg waggur n maggu, aseggas 1963. Mi bdi&amp;gamma,; lliγ d abujad : ur γri&amp;gamma,; ur ssine&amp;gamma,; ur fhimeγ timsal. Ayen akk ḥefḍe&amp;gamma,; di radyu ay t-ssneγ sγur irgazen yecban Si Larbi, imḍebber n uḥric n yisallen, Mouloud Chikaoui, Si Mahmoud, Belkacem, Abdelkader d wiyaḍ.

  D acu i txeddmeḍ ? 

 Boukhalfa Bacha : lxedma-w, nekk, d lexbarat, d aneγmas. Meεna xedmeγ tidwilin : ama d ayen i d-icudden γer yisallen neγ d ayen-nniḍen. Lliγ xeddmeγ akked umeddakel-iw M. Guerfi.

  D acu n wuguren i d-tettmagarem imir γef teqbayli ? 

 Boukhalfa Bacha: γef teqbaylit, ass-nni kulci yeddez, kulci yebrez. Di lweqt-nni, sḥefḍen-aγ acu i ilaqen ad t-id-nini d wacu ur nlaq ara. Lweqt-nni, netabaε taswiεt. Qqaren-aγ-d lexbarat ur d-tewwi ara l’APS, ur t-id-qqarret ara. Xas ulamma walaγ s wallen-iw lexbar ur t-id-qqareγ ara ma ur d-yekki ara s l’APS. Acu kan yella wayen i d-nesεedday di tedwilin : aṭas n lecγal i nexdem, i d-neḥya, aṭas n tmucuha i d-nessawel anda i fehmen yimdanen lmeqqsud-nneγ axater neqqar-d d itidwimilt-nni :’’macahu, kul yiwen akken yebγu ad tt-yessefru’’. 

  I radyu, gar zik d tura ? 

 Boukhalfa Bacha : lxilaf gar zik d tura am yigenni d tmurt. Di lweqn-nni, nesεa kan 7 n swayeε deg wass. Tura nedder armi tleḥḥu iḍ d wass. Zik nella di εecra yid-ne&amp;gamma,; tura εeddan di 60, rnan-d tantalayin-nniḍen. Ttawilat mačči kif-kif. Zik, radyu n teqbaylit tettwaḥqer aṭas, aṭas. Gar wayen nxeddem nekni d wayen xeddmen wiyaḍ yella lxilaf d ameqqran : d ayen ur iqebbel leεqel xas ulamma si 1990 γer da aṭas n lecγal i yettwaxedmen, ladγa deg uḥafeḍ γef teqbaylit.

  Llant tezlatin ur d-nettεeddi ara, amek i tẓerrem anti ? 

 Boukhalfa : sliγ ussan-nni iεeddan wid i d-yeqqaren d akken ulac tira i imenεen acennay-a neγ wa ur d-yettεedday ara. Qqaren-d, d ixeddamen n radyu kan i ten-itekksen. Ayagi, d lekdeb. Xas ulamma ulac lkaγeḍ yuran meεna xas bγiγ ad d-sεeddiγ acennay-nni, ur ttafeγ ara tizlatin-is. Akka ay teḍra d Slimane Azem. Ur tettafeḍ ara tezlatin-is di lweqt-nni deg uxxam n radyu, yerna ur nesεi ara lḥeqq ad tent-id-nawi si berra. Dagi, tella tira i d-yeqqaren ur ilaq ara ad d-tesεeddiḍ tizlatin i d-yekkan si berra. Nuγal nefhem timsal mebla timenna. Ttwakkasent leḥwayeğ di tuffra.

  Acu tzemreḍ ad asen-tiniḍ, ass-a, i yilemẓiyen n radyu ? 

 Boukhalfa Bacha : iwillehen, nefka-ten asmi nella din u aṭas i aγ-d-yesmeḥsen. Ha-ten-in ufraren-d. Ass-a, ad asen-ini&amp;gamma,; yiwet lḥağa :’’akken tebγum tesεam ttawilat, xas ssawaḍen γer tziri, γurwet γef teqbaylit. Ur ilaq ara ad ṭṭuqten s waṭas wawal-agi ijdiden ’’

  Temlaleḍ akked Mulud Mεemmri deg yiwet n tedwilt γef lecγal-a, dγa ? 

  Boukhalfa Bacha : nexdem-as tadiwennit nekk d Guerfi deg useggas-nni n 1974. Nexdem-itt deg umekkan n lxedma-s. Cfiγ γef kra n lewṣayat i aγ-d-yenna. Yenna-d mi ara txedmeḍ lxedma ilaq ad tt-tḥemmleḍ, ad tt-tqaddreḍ. Ur ilaq ara daγen ad tḥettmeḍ γef yiwen i wakken ad yexdem neγ ad d-yini ayen ur yebγi ara. 

   Ass-nni, yemmeslay-aγ γef tektabt ‘’Yenna Ccix Muḥend’’. D acu kan, yefka-aγ-d kra n wawalen, cfiγ fell-asen : agdud, tilelli, tagrawla…atg. Xemsa neγ setta n wawalen-nni imezwura i d-nessekcem γer radyu. Nebda-ten-id yiwen yiwen, awal s awal. Kul ass yiwen wawal, mkul lexbarat ad d-nini yiwen. Amedya, neqqar : tilelli, lḥuriya. Cwiṭ, cwiṭ. Zik neqqar, leḥbab d ssamεin, nuγal neqqar imsefliden. Akka i tebda teqṣiṭ-agi n tmaziγt. Ass-agi telḥa aṭas, aṭas. Zriγ yiwet n tmeṭṭut, Djamila Addar, tettwaεaqeb di lweqt-nni imi i d-tenna awal ‘’Aselway’’. Yenna-as yimḍebber-nni :’’ d acu-t userwal-agi ? Rrayes n lğumhuriya, mačči d aselway n tegduda.’’ Ass-a, ur tesεiḍ win ara d-iruḥen ad ak-d-yini acuγer i d-tenniḍ awal-agi, acu kan ilaq ad t-id-tiniḍ anda ilaq, amek ilaq.

  Anwi akk ukud i d-temlaleḍ di radyu tis snat ? 

 Boukhalfa Bacha : nekk sεiγ zher d ameqqran ur sεin ara akk yineγmasen. Tettunefk-iyi teswiεt mlaleγ d yirgazen imeqqranen. Gar yirgazen i d-mlaleγ di 42 n yiseggasen-agi, mazal lexyal n wasmi kecmeγ γer lbiru n Dda Lmulud. Lounis Ait Menguellet deg useggas n 1982, cher n remḍan kamel, nettmeslay yid-s ass s wass. Nεawed-as deg useggas 1992. Mlaleγ Taher Djaout, tlata neγ rebεa tikal. Ula d isertiyen, mlaleγ yid-sen, am Hocine Ait Ahmed d Said Sadi d wid-nniḍen ttuγ ad i yi-semḥen.          <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>              

<p style="text-align: right;">Yesteqsa-t Hocine.M

  
 Idles amaziγ d win yettnarnin deg useggas γer wayeḍ di tmurt n leqbayel, xarṣum di 04 n tγiwanin tesεa temnaḍt n wizgan deg ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu, ger-asent Wizgan, At-Zikki, Illulen Umalu akked At-Yejar, i yefkkan azal meqren i yedles d tẓuri.

 Taγiwant n Wizgan tuγal d tamanaγt n tfaskiwin, imi yal seggas tesdaray-d 04 n tfaskiwin yemgaraden, am tfaska n ukkarmus di taddert Sahel, tafaskan n ubarnus di taddert n Ḥura, tafaska Tament di taddert n Waḥriq, tafaska n Tiḥudedda n taddert n Iḥaṭussen, akken daγen id-tettheggi yal seggas tddukla tadelsant Tiεwinin n Wizgan tafaska umezgun naγ timliliyin n umezgun di tudder.Rreḥba tis snat n tfaska n ubernus s usentel» Abernus Iseγ d Trugza», id-sudes tiddukla tadelsant Yakoubi Ferhat n taddert n Ḥura taγiwant n Wizgan s lemεawna n tesqamut n taddert-agi, Tidddukla n tmetti ASSA, tamahla n yedles n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, asqamu aγarfan n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu d tγiwant n Wizgan, d tin id-yellan s wudem unsib ass n 11 almi d 13 yunyu ideg nella, d leqdic i yeddan γef teγzi n 03 n wussan, anda ijarden yiwen n wahil d amesbaγur, ideg llant temzikniyin γemgaraden γef ubernus d wamek id-yettili uẓeṭṭa-ines, taqendurt n leqbayel, tallaγt, iẓeḍwan, taklut, Tiḥudeda, allalen iqburen, asenεet n zwağ aqbur, ccna n tmedyazt n tlawin, uraren, taγuri n tmedyazdt, amezgun d waṭas niḍen. Timzizelt γef wexxam leqbayel aqbur. Akken itella d tagnitt yelhan i wid iḥemlen taγuri d tẓuri, imi llan yemyura, imedyazen, imazragen i yellan deg tfaska-agizenzen idlisen-nsen s ibuddan.

 Leqdic d win γezzifen imi id-llan isaragen yemgaraden γef umezruy n ubarnus d wazal yesεa di tmetti n wass-a d temnaḍt n leqbayel sumata. Nnig n 25 n yimzikniyen id-yussan si temnaḍin yemgaraden n tmurt leqbayel, ukkan deg leqdic-agi, akken id-tella tmaγra-agi ubernus s leḥdur n deqs n yinebgawen ger-asen; aεeggal n wegraw n luma mass Mussa Tamadartaza, iεeggalen n wesqamu aγarfan n ugarzu n Tizi-wezzu, timahliwen yemgaraden ama, n texamt n lḥirfat tiqburin, timarit, idles, addal d yelmeẓyen, aselway n dayra n Wizgan, iselwayen n tγiwanin yemgaraden n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu d yemḍebren n yeḥricen yemgaraden.

 Akken id-ussan deqs n yinebgawen niḍen si yal tamnaḍt n tmurt leqbayel, imi iswi n tfaska-agi ubernus, akken ad-rren azal i ubernus n sser d lḥerma, imi abernus d azamul u d tigemmi n leqbayel, u d tagnit yelhan i usebγes uẓeṭṭa ubernus akken ad-yeqqim i lebda.

 Syen tiddukla tadelsant Tiεwinin n taddert n At-Wizgan, thegga-d tazrigt tis 02 n temliliyin n umezgun i yebdan ass n 25 yunyu almi d 03 yulyu r id-iteddun, d leqdic ara yeddun γef teγzi n 10 n wussan.

 Leqdic-agi yella-d s lemεawna n tesqamut n taddert n Wizgan, taγiwant n Wizgan, timahliwin n yedles akked yelmeẓyen d wadal n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, asqamu aγarfan n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu akked d wexxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine. Ahil n leqdic d amesbaγur, anda yella usenεet n umezggun s yisental yemgaraden, cnawi, tamedyazt, cḍaḥ aγerfan d waṭas niḍen. Tadwilt n useggas-a tennarni s waṭas γef tin yezrin, imi 12 n trebuεa n umezgun ara d-yassen si 04 lwilayat n tmurt am Tizi-Wezzu, Tubiret, Bgayet d Wahran Iswi n temliliyin-agi, d aseqreb n umezgun γer tudrin n leqbayel d usebγes n yelmeẓyen akken adkecmen s tahri annar-agi n umezgun i yellan d ababat n tẓuri i wesnarni n yedles amaziγ. Akken tella d aγen d tagnit yelhan i twaculin ad-farssent uḍan n remḍan ideg ara temlil tassa d way turew, d uẓeṭṭa n tegmatt d tdukli ger Amaynut n useggas-a d tiddukla tadelsant 07 zzbari n taddert n Iḥaṭṭusen id-iheggan yiwet n tmeγra s wazal-is, tagi d tameγra n Tiḥudedda id-yellan ass n 06 γuct yezrin di taddert n Iḥiṭṭusen s usentel tudert ger tmes d wuzal, anda id-ussan deqs n yemḍebren n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzau ger-asen Lwali amaynut mas Merad Brahim i yellan d inebgi n lḥerma, akken i tella d tagnit yelhan imi ldin yiwen usalay n tiḥudedda ideg jemεen merra allalen iqburen swayes xedmen, akken lḥirfa-agi ad teqqim i lebda d azamul n taddert n Iḥiṭṭusen. Akken id tettheggi tdukla tadelsant Sliman At-Uεebbas n taddert Aḥriq tazigt tis 03 n tmeγra n tament d tzizwa ara d-yillin ussan n 15, 16 d 17 γuct 2015, akked tfaska n ukarmus ussan n 20 d 21 deg aggur ideg nella. Mbaεd tazrigt tis 12 n tfaska n ḥkku-d Taẓuri “Raconte-arts», s usentel « Ger yiḍelli d wass-a, aẓar yetabaε tara », id-yellan di taddert n Wagarsafen taγiwant n At-yejar deg ass n 24 almi d 31 γuct γef teγzi n 08 n wussan. Deqs n tfaskiwin niḍen id ittewhegan di tγiwanin yemgaraden n temnaḍt n Wizgan. Am tfaska n tmedyazt tamaziγt  » Smaεil Azikkiw », di tezrigt-is tis snat id-tessudes tduukla tadelsant n taddert Tawrirt bwar deg ussan n 06,07 d 08 γuct yezrin, akked tfaska n tmedyazt n wexxam n yedles Aziri Mḥend n tγiwant At-Zikki di tezrigt-is tis 02 ara d-yillin ussan n 27, 28 d 29 γuct d tajmilt i unaẓur meqren i yesnarnin di tezlit n teqbaylit, wagi d Qasi Σebdarahman. Ma yella d taγiwant n Yillulen umalu tella dima di tiεad, imi tger i rebbi i deqs n tfaskiwin, am tmaγra n tbaxsisin, di reḥba tis 09 id-tessudes tdukkla tadelsant Tiγilt n Lemṣella deg ussan n 27, 28 d 29 γuct id-iteddun, tafaska n tqendurt n leqbayel n taddert Yiḥemziyen d tid niḍen. D tagnit yelhan i yemdanen d yinebgawen, xarṣum imnigiyen ad agmen deg yedles lqayen n tmurt leqbayel.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ass-nni n umenzu n unbir 2017 i d-tella tẓunzut (inauguaration) n usebdad n yimeɣras sɣur lwali n Tizi Uzzu, deg taddart Tala Ɛetman, i ibeɛden s 15 n kilumitr ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu.

 I lmend n waya, aṭas n leqdicat i d-heggan yimezdaɣ n taddart akked tdukliwin, ama tinaddalin, ama dtidelsanin. Akka, dɣa, i d-ccnant teḥdanin timecṭaḥ, i n tdukkla Imɣi n Tala, i d-yelsan tiqendyar n leqbayel, kra n tezlatin n tegrawla, yecban ‘’A yemma sber ur ttru’’, ‘’Ma tecfam ay igudar’’…atg. Syin d inaddalen n tdukkla Inaddalen n Tala Athmane i d-yesneɛten kra deg uxeddim-nsen anaddal. Ma ɣef lewhi n lweḥda, tella-d lwaɛda i d-yettwaheggan i lmend n waya. Ttwanecden akken llan yimdanen ɣer seksu s yiyuzaḍ. Aṭas, diɣ, n trebbayaɛ n yikabaren n tsertit i d-yerzan ɣer usebdad-agi anda ssersen tameqqunt n yijeǧǧigen. Am wakken i d-yusa, ula d netta, yimḍebber amezwaru n daira n Tizi Uzzu i wakken ad yesterḥem ɣef 22 n yimeɣras-gi n tegrawla anda llan 8 deg-sen d ilmeẓyen, mmuten urɛad zwiǧen. Amur ameqqran n warraw n yimjuhad-agi, ur ssinen ara baba-tsen, neɣ ur as-cfin ara imi llan d igerdan imecṭaḥ asmi mmuten yimawlan-nsen. Ɣef leqdic-a, yenna-d Aliouat Ferhat, yiwen gar yimezdaɣ n taddart Tala Ɛetman « Ayen i asen-nexdem drus i yimeɣras-agi. Uklal tajmilt tameqqarnt. Rnu ɣer wanect-a, asmekti-nsen d izen i tsuta-agi i wakken ad issinen amezruy-nsen u ad ddun deg ubrid n yimezwura. Tanemmirt, diɣ, i kra n wid iqedcen deg tejmilt-a igerrzen nezzh ». Yella-d useggem n usebdad-a, ussan-nni kan, sɣur taɣiwant n Tizi Uzu. Ɛawden i yiẓekwan n yimeɣras akken iwata mebɛed mi llan deg yir liḥala. Am wakke i d-xelqen, diɣ, yiwen wurti azegzaw ɣer tama n usebdad anda gan imekwan n yiɣimi i yimdanen. Seg tama-a Abderrahmane Moula, s yisem-is d imḍebber deg tɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu ɣef taddart n Tala Ɛetman, yenna-d ; « Nebɣa ad as-nefk, aseggas-a, i usmekti n tegrawla n 1954 udem-nniden dagi ɣur-neɣ deg taddart. Nefreḥ aṭas imi nessaweḍ s ayen nessaram, tɛedda tejmilt akken iwata. Ad snemreɣ akk wid i d-yefkan afus n tallelt, ama d imezdaɣ n taddart ama d iberraniyen».

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Mazal imezdaɣ n temnadt n cibun i yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n at raced di lwilaya n tubiret tettidir di tegnatin qessiḥen imi rwan lmert d lmeḥna deffir n yiɣublan d wuguren iten-izedɣen di tmeddurt nsen ad as-tinid mazal -iten deg iseggasen n 90 anda ɣaben akk wallalen ilaqen i tudert n umdan yerra d yiwet n taddart yettwaɛezlen yerra ɣaben deg-s iṣenfaren unegmu , dayen yeǧǧan tiwaculin n tama-agi mazal-itent di lḥif d wurfan . Ma yella d iɣublan-a gar-asen abrid yettawin ɣer taddart-a yergel yexsar akk imi ur yeqɛid mazal ar ass-a d wussan ur sɛiwden ara , Rnu s annect-a ulac trisiti iberdan acku teddart-a tezgad gar yidurar yeɛlayen d tẓegwa yerna tettwaɛzal mliḥ ɣef waya iɣellid lxuf ɣer yimezdaɣ ladɣa deg iḍ mi ara d-ɛeddin seg ubrid-a ladɣa deg ussan n cetwa , am wakken ttidiren deg uɣbel n lgaz imi d ugur ameqqran anda ttmagaren lexsas deg usafar-a acku yettili iɛewwiqen amek ara d-aɣen tiqraɛtin lgaz imi ttruḥun tikwal ami d assif lexmis neɣ s at raced ma yella ulac ttruḥun ami d taɣwant leqsar ma d -affen neɣ ala , ayagi imi werɛad isen -yewweḍ uṣenfar lgaz yerra akk timnaḍin yetabaɛen s at raced sfaydent taddart-a werɛad iban ladɣa deg ussan n tegrest anda ttafen lexsas s waṭas imi d yiwen usafar isexdamen i lḥuman , Rnu ɣer yiɣblan iten-yeṭṭafaren ur sɛin ara tazeqqa n tujya anda ara d-awwin imuḍan ɣef waya yesefk ɣef yimezdaɣ ad rzun ama d leqsar neɣ ɣer beclul ameɛa rwan lmeḥna ladɣa ma yeɣlid umuḍin deg iḍ . D acu kan iɣublan- a ur ḥbisen ara kan da imi yella-d wugur n uṣiweḍ meḥsub lexsas n wallalen uṣiweḍ sebba n wannect-a axaṭar taddart-a tettwaɛzal yerra ur tesɛi ara aṭas n yimezdaɣ ladɣa arrac lakul ttafend uguren iwakken ad ruḥen ɣer yiɣerbazen , ur sɛin ara tazeqqa n waddal yemgaraden anda ara leɛben yilmeẓyen xersum d asɛeddi n lweqt , Rnu ɣur-s imezdaɣ mi ara bɣun ad d-xeddmen lekwaɣeḍ ilaq ad ruḥun ama d taɣiwant n at reced imi tebɛed ɣef temnadt-agi acku ulac tazeqqa yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant di tama-a ara yesifsen taɛkumt fell-asen , annect-agi akk d iɣublan ideg ttidiren zdat wallen imḍebren iɣaben ɣef wannar uxeddim , dayen yeǧǧan tiwaculin n cibun ssuturen seg iɛeggalen n usqamu aɣerfan ad d-afen tifrat i yiɣublan-a , ssarament daɣen tamuɣli n yimḍebren tɣiwant s tikci iṣenfaren xersum ad tifsis teɛkumt fell-asen ad idiren di telwit d lehna .

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Abdelhak Menas 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Yella ddurt-a iɛeddan, letnayen 7 deg wanber, uneɣlaf n yidles Mass Azeddine Mihoubi, deg dayra n Xerraṭa, i d-ibeɛden s wazal n 60 n yikilumiṭren ɣef waɣir n Bgayet. Lwaḥi d yimḍebbren-nniḍen, yeldi Mass aneɣlaf s wudem unsib tazeqqa n ssinima n temdint-a, s yisem n 8 mayu 1945, i yettwareqqɛen iseggasen-a ineggura. S wugar n 450 n yikursiyen i tesɛa, abrid, ad yeldi tura, meqqar, i kra n wid iḥemmlen isura mi ara yili yefreɣ wahil-nsen. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Mhenni Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Naïma Rahmani tlul di taddart ‘’Ighil n Boukiassa’’, tettidir di Lezzayer tamaneγt. Seg wasmi tella meẓẓiyet i tessaram ad tecnu neγ ad turar di sinima xas akken lebγi am wa tettwali-t tmetti s yir tiṭ deg yiseggasen iεeddan. Xas akken d tayemmat s warraw-is, tessaweḍ ad tenğer abrid i yiman-is u ad d-tban deg unnar-agi n sinima : turar deg waṭas n yisura.

 Nemlal-itt deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mεemmri imi i d-iεedda usaru ‘’Tameγra’’ n Rabah Dichou anda i d-turar Fadma n Sumer, terra-aγ-d s lferḥ γef kra n yisteqsiyen.

  Amek i d-tufiḍ iman-im deg unnar-agi n sinima ? 

 <span style="color: #ff0000;"> Naïma Ramdani : </span> seg wasmi lliγ d tameẓẓyant, ḥemmleγ ccna akked sinima. Bγiγ ad urareγ di sinima u ad cnuγ xas akken ẓriγ mačči d ayen isehlen ladγa di tmetti-nneγ.

  Amek teṣṣawḍeḍ tqenεeḍ imawlan-im i wakken  ad kem-ğğen ad turareḍ ? 

 zik mi ara as-iniγ i yemma bγiγ ad cnuγ neγ ad urareγ di sinima, ad iyi-d-tini ‘’Lukan ad iẓer baba-m tebγiḍ aya, ad kem-ineγ’’. Dγa qqimeγ kan akken armi d asmi i yi-d-yenna yiwen ma tebγiḍ ad turareḍ deg usaru axaṭer tesεiḍ udem iwulmen i sinima. Di tazwara, nekk bγiγ ad cnu&amp;gamma,; netta yenna-yi-d ad turareḍ. Meεna yeggra-d wugur-nni n yimawlan.  Akken, akken armi d yiwen wass nniγ-as srid i baba d akken yella win i yi-d-yennan ad urareγ deg yiwen n usaru s teqbaylit. Yenna-yi-d : ‘’a yelli acu ara am-ini&amp;gamma,; lukan am zik, d ṣṣaḥ ur nessin ara, ma d tura, ayen i am-iεeğben xdem-it, ayen i t-tḥemmleḍ, xdem-it. Ad kem-weṣṣiγ γef yiwet n lḥağa, εas iman-im, daya. Anda wwḍent wallen-im, ad awḍen iḍarren-im’’.  Xas akken kukreγ di tazwara ula d atmaten-iw d yissetma, meεna qeblen ula d nutni. Yeqqul baba iteddu yid-i γer casting akked mi ara nebdu asaru.

  Anda turareḍ akk ? 

 Urareγ deg usaru ‘’Gar zik d tura’’ n Hsen Ait Kaci, ‘’Imeslab’’ n Youcef Amrani, ‘’Tinifift’’, ‘’Awḥid mačči d nekk’’, ‘’Tameγra’’, publicité Dezzy, akked wiyaḍ…

  Amek tga tmuγli n tmetti γef tid yetturaren di sinima  

 Nnekk, tawacult-iw tefreḥ yes-i, tebγa ayen xeddme&amp;gamma,; teqbel ayen xeddmeγ. Akken llan meẓẓi meqqer, ttbaneγ-asen-d d iseγ. Ula d imdanen-nniḍen ulac ugur yid-sen, ala ayen yelhan i d-yekkan seg-sen.

  Yella wacu tettheggayeḍ akka tura ? 

 La nettheggay sin les feuilletons, yiwen s teqbaylit, wayeḍ s taεrabt. Amek wakken ad d-suffγeγ nekk s timmad-iw kra n les documentaires. Aql-i di&amp;gamma,; ad ssewjadeγ i usekles n yiwen n album n ccna. 

  Awal aneggaru. 

 Naïma Ramdani : tanemmirt-ik imi tqebleḍ tinnubga-nneγ tusiḍ-d twalaḍ asaru. Teγzi n leεmer i Uγmis n Yimaziγen.

<p style="text-align: right;">Yesteqsa-tt Hocine.M

  
 Inelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas ( Budraf ɛacur ) deg at leqsar ḥebsen leqraya azal n sin wussan sebba lexsas kra n wallalen iwilmen am wayen yeɛnan allaen useḥmu imi ur sɛin ara dayen iten-yeǧǧan Četkayen ɣef uɣbel-a ladɣa di tallit-agi n cetwa , Nnan-d akken tizeɣwa n uɣbaz-a akk d tisemmaḍin ur nezmir ara ad nɣar acku nettḥas s uṣemmiḍ mliḥ am wakken daɣan aɣbel iten-icuɣben s waṭas ur sɛin ara anda ara ččen ladɣa wid ibeɛden ɣef yixxamen nsen ttafen-d iman nsen yesefk fell-asen yal-ass ad aɣen si berra dacu kan llan inelmaden ur yesɛin ara idrimen dayen iten-yeǧǧan ttɣimin akken ur tetten ara , ɛlaḥsab imesiayen nsen wekkden-d akken seg asmi yeldi uɣerbaz-a tiwwura-is mazal ur xddimen ara anda ara tetten azal n 8 iseggasen-aya meḥsub si 2008 ar ass-a d wussan werɛad id uffin tifrat , Si tama nniḍen anemhal n tkubanit-a akk d uselway n tɣiwant rran sebba d lgaz ur tesɛi ara tkubanit-a imi werɛad yewweḍ uṣenfar ɣer tama -agi , dayen yeǧǧan arrac ḥebsen leqraya rrnu ɣer waya ttuɣun zdat n tɣiwant iwakken ad siwḍen izen i uselway akk d iɛeggalen teɛna temsalt ad ggren iman nsen ɣef yiɣublan iten-yeṭṭfaren yal aseggas imi ugguren am wiggi d nutni ara d -yafen tifrat i wannect-a , Ma yella d inelmaden begnen-d akken ma mazal ur d-ufin ara tifrat deg ussan -agi ur qqaren ara ama ufan iɣublan fran acku yettuɣal s wayen n diri di leqraya nsen .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Abdelhak Menas 

  
 Yella deg awal: amedyaz d win umi teknef tasa, yezzuzun urfan s wawalen-is am akken is yenna Lounis Ait Menguellet : s wallen iẓer yir ussan , yettarra-ten lhan, ljerḥ ɣef i yer-s ad yeḥlu. Mebla ccekk Ahmed Radja yewwi d tara seg useklu n imedyazen yecban Lounis, Mammeri, Prevert acku ulamma tirga zedɣent allaɣ, tamuɣli tressa ɣef akal… akal-nni deg id nefruri!

  nni-d i yimeɣṛiyen n uɣmis n imaziɣen azal n umedyaz akked ufelah yellan deg ixf n Ahmed Radja: 

 D tidet asileɣ ( formation) ḍefṛeɣ terza tafellaḥt( agronomie), ɣef aya ufiɣ- di iman-iw ttwaneǧǧreɣ akken ad ad gmuɣ deg uḥric-agi yeɛnan akal akked tfellaḥt. kecmeɣ annar-agi yerzan tamɛict n umdan deg useggas n 1987, din I gziɣ azal n lewɛara yettmaggrr ufellaḥ am akken gziɣ diɣen acḥal tesɛa azal lḥirfa-agi n tfellaḥt. Tafellaḥt tettleqqim deg ul n win I tt-iḍefṛen tidet , tettarra-t iweɛɛa lbaḍna n tudert taḥeqqit. Ɣef aya gar-as akked tmedyazt ala imi n wuccen kan i yellan . Nekk ɣur-i tamedyazt d tukkest ( heritage) werteɣ ɣef lejdud-iw, ṭṭdeɣ ifyar deg if n yemma, maca ilaq ak id iniɣ isefra-uriɣ wwin-d ttra seg akal neqceɣ neɣ swiɣ s tidiwin-iw .

  Amek id mǧazin deg ixf-ik leḥmala n tsekla akked tfellaḥt?  

 Ad nezzi alamma d tanfust n wayen id newwi yid-nneɣ mi id nlul- l’innée- d wayen negmer- acquis-. Tamedyazt ɣer win iyi cuban d lwert. Tella d amur deg-i,d- aḥric deg iman-iw xas tikwal ttarraɣ tilist gar-as akked iman-iw. Acku tamedyazt ẓẓayet I tɛebgga. Kra n wayen yellan d uɣris yesɛa s lehlak-is is yenna Prevert. Tamedyazt terra udem uɣris i timsal n tudert am akken id diɣen jack London. Tafellaḥt d ayen lemdeɣ s ddemma n tesleɣt ḍefṛeɣ. Ɣriɣ deg aḥric-agi yerzan akal, armi id ffɣeɣ d ajenyuṛ . D aya iyi ǧǧen sisineɣ d temɛict-iw deg ahric-agi ulamma taggara-agi aqli ldiɣ lbiru n uwellih deg ayen yecqan timsal iccudden ɣef tfellaḥt , iswi-nneɣ d asnerni n uhṛic-agi yellan d rkiza di tdamsa a beɛɛda di temnaḍin n tewririn ufella( hauts plateau) 

  Amek id ilul wammud n isefra-inek? 

 Tidet-kan d win i ammud amezwaru xedmeɣ d win id aneggaru acku tmedyazt d tirget yeṛɣan yesseknafen ixf n win tebla. Iseggasen-nni izeggaɣen n rebrab ur d ǧǧin tirni deg ixf-awen-nneɣ. Dayen-nni id yesmesden deg allaɣ lebɣi ɣer usefru… acku deg ixf n yiman-iw ẓriɣ ala s wawal i s wacu zemreɣ ad qazmeɣ yir tallit-nni, ala s yifyar i s wacu nezmer a n-sexṣi ijujaḥ n tmes yebɣan ad yeglun s uzegzaw akked uquṛan. Tira d lhewj ur yezmir ar yergel ḥedd… mi d yuli wawal, leqrar-is ad yeffeɣ ad yuɣal d asefru akken asefru , kra n wayen yeẓden neɣ yecbek, a t-yefru. Uriɣ isefra akken ur belɛeɣ ara di temda n layas. Ɣef aya friɣ-t d ṛṛay-iw uniɣ-d yak isefra uriɣ , rriɣ-ten d ammud id yeffɣen sɣur tiẓrigin “amel” deg Tizi- Wezzu.

  Amek i-ilaq akken a tefti tfellaḥt di tmurt-nneɣ , a ttuɣal d tin i teddun nned ɣer nedd akked tfellaḥin n leǧnas deg leswaq n umaḍal?  

 Lɣella n tmurt mačči d izli n lexsayel i tesɛa akken a teɣzu ssuq deg umaḍal. Maca aya yeḥwaj leɛnaya akken ad yifrir wazal-is ɣer imsuɣa ibeṛṛaniyen. Ilaq a negg di nnican acu nezmer nessufeɣ ɣef beṛṛa yerna ad iqazem ayen yellan dɣa di ssuq. Ilaq diɣen lɣella-agi a tesɛu taɣara( qualités) akked tagnut ( normes) tigraɣlaniyin akken ad teṭṭef amkan-is gar leɣla n lǧnas iḍen. Akken ad yili ussufeɣ n lɣella n tmurt ɣer timura tibeṛṛaniyin aya yessutur aheggi n wennar ɣef llsas isaḥen.. ilaq ugar n ṛẓana akked lekyasa. Ilaq teḥrayfit deg anect-a!

  Kečč id ilulen deg tmurt n leqbayel , yuffa-kid tseftayeḍ deg urtan n tizemrin deg izuɣar n tama n wanẓul n tmurt… 

 Am yal aqbayli nekk d mmi-s n idurar. Luleɣ ddaw tzemmurt. Ahat rezgg-iw imi akken kan bdiɣ amecwar-iw deg aḥric-agi n tfellaḥt, tettunnefk-iyi tegnit akken ad sferkeɣ urti deg Ɛin Wessara.Qqwant tizemrin din , lhiɣ-d yid-sen-t. Ṣṣaba tusa-d s tuddsa nnig ɣef ayen akken bniɣ di tazwara, dayen iyi sebɣasen akken ad lḥuɣ ugar deg termit-agi ( experience). Tazemmurt d yiwen useklu ( uɣris?) ukmic id yettmmuddun mebla cceḥḥa ma yella tuɣal fell-as leɛnaya. Zit n uzemmur ass-a azal-is meqqer deg ssuq agraɣlan.. leqrar-is ad yif deg azal ula d lpetrole . Ilaq nbedd ɣer usnerni n lɣella-agi iftin simmal simmal! 

  Nesla aten ad tessufɣem yiwet n tesɣunt yerzan aḥric-agi n teflllaḥt kečč akked umdakkel-nneɣ Nait Messadoud Amar… 

 Tezriḍ… talɣut( information) txuṣ aṭas deg ayen yeqnen ɣer tfellaḥt. Talɣut tussnant xas ini qṛib ulac-itt. Xuḍi mebla netta-t ulamek ara nsefti aḥric-agi iccudden ɣer tudert n umdan s timmad-is. Ɣef aya tasɣunt ara yilin di lmendad tlaq…tikti-agi teddawer deg allaɣ-iw acḥal-aya…maca ilaq ,akken ad teffeɣ, allalen, tawil akked lebɣi. Acku mačči kan deg ussufeɣ-is id teqqim imi nnig wayen ilaq ad teglu s lfayda i yifellaḥen yerna ad tdum… D lbal-iw tasɣunt agi ad tili d agni anda wid teɛna tamsalt ad mlilen akken ad mbadalen tikta, timuɣliwin… amer ad neǧren isula i taneflit n tafellaḥt sumata di tmurt-nneɣ.

  Yeqqar Lounis Ait Menguellet: mačči win kan id yussan yini nekk d afellaḥ…. 

 Tamuɣli n Lounis talqay…. D netta- id amezwar ɣer ibeṛden yessufuɣen. D amɣar azemni –nneɣ. D tidet afellaḥ mačči d menwala! Afellaḥ d win yegzin inumak n tudert , yettleqqimen tudert anda akken tebɣa a teɣbu . Yessen azal n ugama, azal n wemdan, ul-is iḥebbek akked uḥebbek n wul wakal! Maca akken ad yewɛu umdan i yiwsir-agi uɣris n ufellaḥ .. ilaq ṣber akken nnmara acku abrid iḍul! 

  Anda nniḍen yeqqar: uqbel a tzerɛeḍ timẓin, zzer amek yegga wakal…. 

 Bab n tmuɣli akked usekkud yessen amek ara ad yessemsawi awal akken ad yeɣzu ulawen ad yesduqqes ixf-awen. Amedyaz akka id netta , yesrusuy aḍad anda akken qerḥent timsal. Awal-is yettuɣal d anzi i yal lawan i yal lqum deg yal amkan! Nuɣ tannumi Lounis yesenɛat-nneɣ-d anda yella lexṣaṣ-nneɣ. Amedya deg iseggasen n 80 anda win tufiḍ ak yini” wallaɣ tamurt umaziɣ” netta yura-aɣ-id tibṛatin-is. Deg iseggasen n 90 anda yuzzel wawal n tugdut ɣef yal iles netta yenna “ acɛalet-aɣ tafat/ n-fudd a nwali”. Asmi akken rebrab yesmer lhul deg ulawen n lɣaci netta yenna: 

<p style="text-align: left;"><em> Ur nettsusru zdat wurfan </em>

  Ma texleḍ amzun tesfa 

  Ma nummen s ddwa n wussan 

  Ahat ad yelhu uzekka. 

  Amek yettwali umedyaz am kečč imal n tmurt ? 

 ( teḍṣa)… ayen yeqnen ɣer trmurt akked tfellaḥt mačči d tamuɣli n umedyaz i yesutur…ayen is ilaqen d tamuɣli n wid terza tamsalt am imusnawen n tfellaḥt akked tdamsa. Tamurt-nneɣ tella tesɛa ttra…tesɛa ifadden asmi akken tewwi timunent. Tesɛa ttra akked ifaden ibedden ɣef tiɛubbejt deg lḥirfat wakali kesben iẓẓayriyen seg uffus n iṛumyen. Deg lawan-nni ssuq itekka ɣef illugan iṣaḥan, yerna ɛumen-t lfirmat id yettakken ayen din n lɣela. Maca zrin wussan ṣṣaba-nni tenser si gar ifasen –nneɣ s ssebba n yir tisertiyin fernen yimḍabren deg lawan-nni. Anect-a yerza ɣef abrid aḥric n tfellaḥt akked d win n ṣenɛa. Rrnu ɣef aya terewla ɣer zdat id tewwi tasertit yellan i ṣṣwab d terbibt kan tkamel i wayen id yegran armi kra irab yeɣli s ɣellu n war tuɣalin. Ala ṛṛiḥa-s id mazal ɣer kra n yemɣaren yecfan ɣef zzman aqbur asmi yella zzman d lɛali-t. Ass-a tafellaḥt ilaq ad tewwet s ugezr akken ad ɛiwed talalit.Letkal ɣef Lpetrol akked lgaz yenɣa deg-nneɣ asnulfu, yesbek deg ulawen-nneɣ lebɣi ɣer uxeddim…armi yuɣal uḥedri yettidir am am ubeldi.. dɣa ur d teqqim temdint ur d tegri taddart…

  Amek ik-id yettban yimal n tfellaḥt deg izuɣar n wanẓul? 

 Ilaq a negzu akken ma nella yiwet n talluft : ma yella mačči s tidi-nneɣ ara d nesukkes talqimt… a nuɣal d rhina n wiyaḍ… ad tefsi lhiba n tmurt… ad yexnunes yiseɣ-is akked ccan-is gar leǧnas. Ahat deg temnaḍin-agi n wanẓul i yella usirem-nneɣ d akken yiwwas ad nner lmektub gar ifassen-nneɣ.. meɛna ur gelɛum ara amenni imi tidet tella kan deg ucemar n iɣalen… win yebɣan ad yidir d ilelli ilaq a tt-yecrew terɣa. Ɣef akken ttwaliɣ,Lẓẓayer mazal tezzi s weɛrur i tussna, xuḍi melba tussna am win ileɛben kan tuqna tufra netta d lweɛd. Adrim id neɣlen s waṭas ɣef tmurt (id yekkan seg uzanzi n lgaz akked petrole) yerra imdebren jeɛlan zemren ad aǧwen tanfalit( le progres) s uṣurdi melba ma senden ɣef yergazen akked tillawin at tamussni. Xudi leɣla tamenzut n yal agdud d teḥarayfit kesben irgazen-is akked tullawin-is. Ass-a i wakken ad neffeɣ seg yir aɣbir deg newqaɛ, ilaq tamuɣli-nniḍen. Lemmer id ak-terbih a wul, ddewla ad tili kan di lmendad n umeteddu n tdamsa wamma tayagt( intitiative) ad tilli d ayla n wid yellan deg annar,ɣer imaalan n lḥirfat akked wedrim. Ilaq diɣen ad tekfu tisertit n usaned deg leswam n tɣawsiwin .. yal taɣawsa ilaq a tenz akken teswa s tidet acku asaned agi yeseɛraq tidet…zun akken yis ara yeḥbes ccumaj.. xuḍi ayen –nni yak ziɣemma d asenquqel n rkiza tadamsant . 

  Acu-t usirem inek deg sin iḥricen-agi: idles akked tfellaḥt? 

 Tezriḍ asirem d taɣeswa deg-i, yekra deg iɣsan-iw. Am akken id yenna Mouloud Mammeri: “ ɣer tilelli-s ara yeddu ugdud-iw, tidet-agi treṣṣa deg aglim-iw”. Nnan diɣ imezwura-nneɣ: “ akken yella lḥal a t yeks umeksa”. Tamussni akked iseɣ n ugdud yettban deg tagnit n ccedda..; din id yettban acu umi yezmer … agdud-nneɣ yesemnaɛ timmadit-ines seg tuccar n txidas id yewwi zzman si zik n zik…xas akken werǧin icuḥ-as umezruy aɣref-nneɣ ur yerẓi ur yekni mgal acḥal d-amnekcem id yeṣṣawḍen wa deffir wa… nutni ṛuḥen nekni mzal nella! Maca nettwali diɣ di tagnatin n littaɛ d wid ur nuklal i-iḥaren imekwan…wamma di tagnit n lḥif ala win yeṣfan ara d yegrin .. d ineggura-agi i yettqazamen lewɛar ansi id yekka! Aya ur yelli d ameynut ɣef win yegzin taluft.

  Tiririt s tewzel 

  Yellu( Rebbi):  tassusmi taɣlalt deg tengantin war tillas.

  Tamdyazt :  d tamuɣli nniḍen yekaten akkin i wayen yellan amer ad tedlu ɣef yellu.

  Akal:  D-if yesuṭṭuḍen d leqrar n dima.

  Adrar:  Rṛiḥa n temẓi.

  Jack London:  asdelweḥ n tillawt.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Anta tameṭṭut taqbaylit ur ncewweq ara yiwen wass deg uxxam mi ara txeddem tilufa-s, mi ara tettnawal neɣ deg yiger mi ara tessusuy, mi ara tmegger neɣ mi ara tleqqed azemmur. Anta, diɣ, ur neshul ara mmi-s mi ara tebɣu ad yeṭṭes. Isefra, icewwiqen, izlan, iḥiḥayen, tibuγarin d udekker, d tiwsatin i yuγen s teɣzi d tehri deg tmetti-nneγ taqburt, syis-sent i tessaweḍ tmeṭṭut, ad d-tini tilufa iumi tettḥulfu d wayen akk i tettidir di tmetti, ama dayen yessefraḥen, ama dayen yesseqraḥen. Tamedyazt n tlawin nat-zik, yebna lsas-is ɣef uguren i d-tettmager tmeṭṭut di tallit-is, d wayen akk icudden ɣer tmetti n yimiren akked lḥif sɛeddant tlawin di tudert-nsent n yal ass. Ɣef yinig, ɣef tayri ɣef zzwaǧ d berru, d waṭas isental-nniḍen. War ma zegglent aḥric s tmedyazt-nsent, nnulent akk tiɣemmar-is. Tagrawla, daɣen, teslul-d imedyazen akked tmedyazin. Ad naf tameṭṭut tessefra ɣef tegrawla, ɣef tebɣest n yirgazen yekkren mgal lemḥella n Ufransis. Yal tadyant, ẓḍant-tt deg yisefra, yal amennuɣ skelsent-tt deg usefru. Ad naf tameṭṭut tezzuzen iman-is s yicewwiqen, akken ad tesnefsusi ɣef yixef-is, akken ad tessedhu iman-is, ama deg uxxam mi ara tettnawal, ama deg yiger mi ara txeddem cceɣl-is. Asefru, yezga d amwanes-ines n lebda, yezga s idisan-is yal ass, yal ta tleqqeḍ-it deg yimi n tmeṭṭut-nniḍen, tasuta tettaǧǧa-ten-id i tayeḍ. Tilawin n At-zik, qqarent-d ayen i tent-yerḥan s yisefra, izlan akked yicewwiqen. S waya kan i tezmer ad d-tessenfali afrayen-is deg wudem n tmetti deg-i tettidir, timetti yegnin imi-s Qqaren-d : ‘’argaz d targa, tmeṭṭut d tamda’’. Timetti n zik, tḥaz tameṭṭut deg yidis, terra-tt kan i tlufa n uxxam, ɣer usewwi d uniwel. Argaz, yella wanda yetteḥwiǧi tameṭṭut-is ad tili s idis-is, maca tameṭṭut teqqim kan d taɣawsa n urgaz. Ma yesra-tt, ad tt-id-yeddem, ad tt-yesseqdec, ma ur tt-yesri ara, ha-tt-an teṭṭef amkan-is, teqqim. Tameṭṭut si tama-s, teẓra, tegza aya. Seg wasmi ara teddu d tislit s axxam-is, ad tidir s ddaw n leɛnaya n urgaz-is akked yiɛeggalen n twacult-is. Axxam n baba-s dayen teffeɣ-it, yewwi-d fell-as ad tili akken, acku ara tt-inefɛen kan d axxam-is d urgaz-is. Ad naf tulawin di tliwa kan iḥekkunt iɣeblan-nsent, uguren ttidirent, d iɣilifen i yeǧǧan kra deg-sent ssefruyent. Tayri akked tasuft, ahat ulac tameṭṭut i tent-yeddren, xas ma llant, drus maḍi. Ad naf sin, xas msebɣan, ma yella imawlan-nsen kkren-d mgal-nsen, neɣ ma yella ugin-asen ad zewǧen, ur zewwǧen ara, acku zik d imawlan i izewwǧen i dderya-nsen. Taqcict, ur tezmir ara ad tagi argaz i as-d-yeffren baba-s neɣ yemma-s. Argaz, daɣen, kifkif, ad myezwaǧen bessif xas ma ur bɣin ara. Ad naf, At-zik, zewwǧen kan akken aẓar n twacult-nni ad yeqqim i lebda, ur inegger ara. Ma d tayri, ur tt-ssinen ara, xas ma timest-is ad tt-id-naf tezdeɣ ul n yal d ilemẓi, maca yal yiwen iḥerz-itt d lbaḍna n wul-is, ijmeɛ-itt i yiman-is, temmut yid-s. Tameṭṭut, si tama-s, teḥrez ansayen n tmetti deg-i tettidir, teṭṭef di teqbaylit, teḥrez isem n teqbaylit, xas ma urǧin tekcim s aɣerbaz. Teḥrez igerrujen ur nettaf ara deg uɣerbaz ass-a. Ɣerr ɣur-sent i d-mazal amawal n teqaylit, ad naf aya deg yisefra ḥerzent, di tmucuha, deg yinzan. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Fahim Messaoudene 

  
 Azemmur aseggas-agi ad yili s waṭaṣ deg tama-agi n Ṣummam, acku akken i neẓra deg wayen din n tzemrin, azemmur yeṭuqet! Ama deg Tazmalt, Buǧlil, Aqbu, Sidi Ɛic lakked d tɣiwanin nniḍen, azemmur yelha, « yaḥla », yagi ur tewwit ara tabaɛuct nni iwumi qaren « izi n-uzemmur » (la mouche d’oliγe). Aseggas-agi daqes n tzemrin i menɛen seg waṭan-agi n twaɣit, yessefsaden lɣella dayen kan! Uk, ibabaten n tzemrin zemren ad luqḍen azemmur yelhan, mači am win n-useggas n 2013 yeččuren ttiwikiwin n yizan n-uzemmur! Deg tama nniḍen, ageffur yewten ussan-a iɛeddan yesseǧhed aṭaṣ tizemrin, yerna i uzmmur deg tezmart, lḥeb-is yuf akken ilaq. Nezmer ad-enini belli aleqqaḍ n-uzemmur ad yelhu mliḥ tikkelt-agi, d-acu kan, tiwaculin ad heggin-t iɣallen-nsen-t ɣef ayagi. Lemɛinṣrat, si tama-nsen-t, ur tɛeṭilen-t ara ad ẓunẓun-t, imi dayen kan d lawan nsen-t! Qrib kan ad d-tuɣalen wussan-nni n-uzemmur, i ḥemlen medden. Iḥerqan ad aččaren d-imelqaḍen, ama d-imɣaren, d timɣarin nneɣ d yilmeẓyen akken ad luqḍen « uraɣ-agi », yes i ɛacen imezwura nneɣ. Zzit d-asafar i ssaxdamen leqbayel s waṭaṣ deg tuččiyin nsen, acku, nnig waya, zzit mači kan d-učči, maca d dwa i myal aṭan! Ussan-a yebda uznuz n-uzemmur deg taddart n Aftis, i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Buǧlil. Azemmur yettenuzu s kra kan, imi mazal ur ɛad leqḍen medden. Tebda ssuma-s s 40 idinaren i lkilu. D-acu kan, azal-agi yezmer ad yali deg smanat id iteddun. Ma d zzit, akka tura yettnuzu seg 600 ɣer 700 idinaren i litra. Aṭaṣ n twaculin dagi deg tama n Ṣummam traǧun-t ad yeww uzemmur akken ad luqḍen-t. Am akken d-agur n lɛid!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Azal n 17 n yisseggasen i izrin ɣef tmettant n unaẓur Hamid Lakrib. Iruḥ di lbaḍna akken ttruḥun yinazuren imeqqranen. Tjelq-it lmut d ilemẓi, d amgud ur d-yeǧǧi ara deffir-s slid tazuri-ines. Ass-nni deg yefna, d ass n l’eclipse solaire, inejla ula d iṭij,. Qqnent wallen i lebda ass n 11 deg ɣuct 1999 ɣef lweḥda n uzal, mi akken akk medden ddurin deg yixammen, ugaden ɣef wallen-nsen.. Ufan-t yeẓẓel ɣef umeṭraḥ di texxamt-is, ɣer yiri-s abanjut-is, ameddakkel-is n yal-ass. Akka i d tudert n Hamid. Hamid lakrib ilul deg taddart n Tala-Khelil ass n 01Yunyu 1961 deg lɛerc n At Dwala. Hamid ismenyaf lmusiqa ɣef uɣerbaz,. Tizmilin timenza ilmed-itent wehd-s s ugiṭar i ixdem s ufus-is, s tabidunt n zzit iwumi iqqen afus n usɣar akked lxyuḍ. Akken meẓẓi, iḥemmel ad issel i caɛbi, i Lḥaǧ Mḥemmed Lɛenqa, i Deḥman n Lḥaraci … Gma-s Yusef i itturaren ula d netta agiṭar yenna belli Hamid ɣur-s yiwet n tmeẓẓuɣt d ayen kan, akken ara issel i uzwu n tezlit, din ad as-id-yales. Hamid Lakrib yettwassen deg unnar n tẓuri s wurar n ubanjut. Ulac win i as-islan ur yetɛeǧǧeb ara s wurar n Hamid, izga isnulfuy-d. Inazuren merra ssaramen ad sɛun Hamid ɣef tama-nsen, d amḥami (bras droit). Yurar d amḥami i Akli Yehiatene, i Amar Zahi, i Kamek Bourdib, i Mehdi Temach, i Youcef Abdjaou, i Lounes Matoub… SSnen-t medden aṭas seg yurar d Lounas Matoub, i t-iḥemlen am gma-s. Issekles yid-s aṭas n tezlatin icban Rwaḥ rwaḥ, Lzzayer tehlek tuḍen, imekta-d wul sliman, Budyaf… Ɣef Hamid Matoub yenna: «Mi ara yili Hamid ɣef tama-w, ttafeɣ ima-iw mi ara cennuɣ, xeddmeɣ leɛǧeb». Aṭas seg yinaẓuren imaynuten i iɛawen Hamid. Mi ara iẓer yiwen iḥsel, ur isɛi ara isurdiyen swayes ara ixelles inaẓuren ara t-iḥamin, Hamid ittɛawan-iten, itturar-asen abanjut baṭel. Acḥal inaẓuren iwumi icebbaḥ asekles s tmerna kan n ṣṣut ubanjut. Tikkelt taneggarut i t-mlaleɣ ufiɣ-t ibedd, anda ittbedday yal ass, zdat n yiwet n thanut deg uzrug ameqqran Abane Ramdane deg Tizi-Ouzzou, icebbaḥ, igirru deg ufus, taṭṭucin uɣalenlent d tizeggaɣin seg uɛawaz, allaɣ yunag… Yal tikkelt deg ara t-mmlileɣ nesmektay-d tiqdimin, temẓi, nettawi-d awal ɣef kullec, iqqar-iyi-d ala di sin i d-nugra d iɛezriyen. Ass-nni, ufiɣ-t igugem, iruḥ am win icɣeb kra, ur ɛetleɣ ara deg wawal. Mi d-zegreɣ abrid ruḥeɣ, berneɣ-d ɣur-s, walaɣ-t iseḍfar-iyi-d tamuɣli, irfed-d afus-is, iwehha-yi-d. D tikkelt taneggarut ara t-waliɣ di ddunit, kra n wussan kan yewweḍ anda ara naweḍ akk yiwwas. Lmut-is, tejraḥ ulawen, tesseɣli-d rrehba ama di Tizi wala deg A Dwala neɣ deg Tala-Khelil. Ur umin ara medden s lmut-is, aseggass kan ɣef lmut n Lunas, yerna Hamid. Akken qqaren, «l’artiste n’a pas survécu à son maître». Asmi imḍel, yiwen ur d-yusi, ur yelli seg yimḍebren n yidles n tmurt-nneɣ. Alammi zrin tlata n yiseggasen si tmettant-is i t-id mmektan, rran-as tajmilt ass n unaẓur deg tezqqa n yidles Mouloud Mammeri deg Tizi-Ouzou. Akken yebɣu yili, xas tafekka-s tuɣal d akal, xas ulac-it ass-agi yid-neɣ maca ayen ixdem mazal-it. Mazal ssut n ubanjut-is ittwassekles i lebda ad as-nessel.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane LASHEB 

  
 Tenṭeq-d teqcict-nni, tenna-asent: – Semmḥemt-iyi, semmḥemt-iyi, ttxilkamt eǧǧemt-iyi ard ḥlu&amp;gamma,; ad ṛuheγ. Tilawin xas akken ur d asent-d-yehwi ara lḥal, ǧǧant-tt . Taqcict teqqim deg uxxam n ufeḥḥam kra n wussan. Di taddart n ccix, Σica ma tettru ulac lehwa, ma teḍsa ulac iṭij, ma temceḍ ulac ddheb, ulac lfeṭṭa.Iṛuḥ ccix γer wanida yella umeksa, yeddem iεelleq-it, yenna-as: – Teskadbev-iyi ! Ayen yakk iyi-tenniv ur tesεi ara weltma-k! Dγa aqcic ameγbun iεelleq-it ccix di teγmeṛt i wabbu. Ma yella d ultma-s, yiwen was tekker ad temceḍ, tenna-asen i tlawin ufeḥḥam ad as-d-fkent liẓaṛ ad temceḍ γer-s acebbub-is, dγa tilawin la ttaḍsant amek ara s-fkent liẓaṛ ad d-temceḍ γer-s tilkin-is ! Dγa taqcict tesfeǧ taqaεet, tenna: – Besmelleh! Tiden ttkemmilent taḍsa fell-as. Akken i tebda imceḍ, bdant twiztin n ddheb d lfeṭṭa la d-γellint γer lqeεa, tilawin-nni wehment, tεeǧǧbent deg ayen ara ttwalint! Kkrent s mγawla, ssant-as liẓaṛ ad temceḍ γer-s. Akken tfuk imceḍ, teddem tefka-asent ayen i asent-yekteb Ṛebbi. Tilawin ferḥent aṭas maççi cwiṭ ! Aḥric tefka-t i ufeḥḥam, ma d wayeḍ tefka-as-t i ufeḥḥam ad t-yawi γer taddart nni n ccix i deg yella gma-s yak d Σica. Ad ileḥḥu abrid abrid ad yeqqaṛ: – Anwa ara yaγen ddheb s wallen?. Iṛuḥ urgaz γer taddart nni i γef tweṣṣa teqcict ; mi yewwed yexdem akken i as-d-tenna, yessawal: – Anwa ara yaγen ddheb s wallen? Anwa ara yaγen ddheb s wallen? Kra n win i as-yeslan yewhem: anwa ara isebblen allen-is s ddheb? Akken i as-tesla Σica teffeγ-d γer-s, tenna-as: – D acu akka ara teqqaṛed? Argaz yenna-as: – Ala snuzuyeγ ddheb s wallen ad taγeḍ…

  Tettkemmil Seg tgemmi n teqbaylit 

  
 D yiwen n yifri i d-yezgan deg taddart n Uqawej i yettuɣalen ɣer tɣiwant n Micli, wagi qqaren-as Ifri n Macchabée neɣ akken i as-qqaren Wat n taddart “Lɣar n temdint” neɣ “Ifri Meɣreb”. Yebɛed ɣef tɣiwant n Ɛin Lḥemmam s wazal n 2 yikilumitren. I wakken ad tawḍeḍ ɣer Yifri n Macchabée, iḍul abrid yerna yewɛar nezzah. Adrar anda i yella yifri-a, yuli s wazal n 1483 lmitrat , s daxel n yifri, tella tfekka n yiwen umdan i iɛeddan syagi, i yettuɣalen ɣer wacḥal n leqrun. Ar ass n wussan, ur d-llin yinadiyen akken ad ẓren d acu-tt teḥkayt n umdan-a. Aṭas n wid i d-yeqqaren d akken d yiwen umeksa i yeɣlin dinna, wiyaḍ, qqaren-d d akken d yiwen i d-yusan si tmurt n Lmerruk, ceyyɛent-id akken ad inadi ɣef ugerruj di temnadt-a, maca imi ur yessin aa iberdan, yeɣli deg yifri. Ur ẓrin ar ass-a d acu i d lbaḍna n umdan-a. Akken kan ad tkecmeḍ ɣer yeifri, ad ak-id-iqabbel ṭṭlam imi ulac win i as-ixedmen leqrar i tmerrit deg umkan-a. Daxel n Yifri, semmeḍ lḥal, akken daɣen llant « les stalagmites » akked « les stalactites » mi ara mlilent « les stalagmites » akked « les stalactites » ttefɣent-d aṭas n tugniwin amedya : tameṭṭut, agrud , d ayen ara yeǧǧen amdan ad yekcem deg yiwen umaḍal ibaɛden ɣef win i nettidir . Ma yella d ljessa n « Macchabée » ur d-yugri ara deg-s ala kra , imi ur tettwaḥader ara . Xas ulamma yewɛar ubrid yettawin ɣer dinna, imerriyen, ttasen-d si tmura yemxlafen ɣer umkan-a akken ad walin «Ifri n Macchabée ». Adrar yettak-d yiwet n tmuɣli icebḥen aṭas imi texleḍ cbaḥa n ugama d lhiba n udrar.

  S. Yamani 

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis yezrin ɣef 13h i telli s wudem unsib rreḥba tis-20 n uzemmur i d-tettheggi yal aseggas Tidukkla n yifellaḥen i tneflit d usnerni n lɣella n uzemmur s lemɛawna n tenmehla n tfellaḥet n lwilaya n Bgayet di temdint n Uqbu.

 Tekka tfaska-agi 3 n wussan di 23 di furar almi d ass-nni lǧemɛa iɛeddan, nnig n 7O n yifellaḥen i yekkin deg-s. Ma yella deg wahil, ad naf ass-nni amenzu, tella-d tulya n temsikent n lɣellat yemxalafen akka am n zzit d leṣnaf-is : zzit n lḥuḍ, zzit ucemlal , zzit uzarraj, azemmur aquran ameṭṭur, imecellaḥ…atg. Am wakken daɣen i d-ttwasnaɛtent lɣella-t-nniḍen akka am tazart n At Imɛuc , d tament i d-wwin yimrebbiyen n tzizwa ɣer tama n temsikent-agi. Ayen i d-jebden lwelha n yimzuyar d timsirin n uleqqem i d-yefka Mass Mexmuxen Arezki deg yiwet n tzeqqa , anda i d-yesselmed aṭas n medden ɣef wamek i tettili lleqma n uzebbuj i wakken ad yuɣal d azemmur, d wamek ilaq ad yili ufras n tzemrin . Ma yella deg wass wis sin, llan-d kra n yisaragen i d-fkan kra n yisdawaniyen ɣef lehlakat yettaṭafen tizemrin d uɛeqqa, fkan kra n naṣayeḥ i yifellaḥen. Ma yella deg wass aneggaru, yella-d usenɛet n yiwen n usaru yexdem Mass Maxmuxen Arezki ɣef wamek ilaq ad yili uleqqem n uzemmur. Tekfa rreḥba n uzemmur s kra n ttewsayat i d-fkan kra n yijenyuren n tfellaḥet i useḥbiber ɣef lɣella n uzemmur imi tesɛa azal meqqren deg usnerni n tdamsa n temnaḍt n summam s umata.

<p style="text-align: right;"> B. Benhamouche 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Aneɣlaf n uwanak, aneɣlaf n tɣawsiwin n uzɣar d umyalel agraɣlan, Ramtane Lamamra, yenna-d ass n lexmis deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt d akken ttwenɣen 25 n yirebraben deg Tubiret deg yiwet n « temhelt tabɣast » (takuṛajit) yerna aya d « asurif deg tɣara » ay d-yesskanayen tizemmar n Yigen aɣelnaw aɣerfan d yimeẓla (ssrabes) n tɣellist deg ccɣel-nsen n tɛessast d tukksa n tegrawin tirebrabin. 

 « Wid yettḍafaren tamsalt-a nnan-d d akken ayen ay d-yellan d asurif deg tɣara », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Mass Lamamra deg yiwet n tseɣrut ay iga i tɣemsa deg tgara n udiwenni-nnes d tselwayt n Ugraw aɣelnaw n Tegduda taserbit, Maja Gojkovic, am wakken ay d-yenna d akken « d tisigar kan ay d-yeqqimen seg rrebrab deg Lezzayer ».  Aneɣlaf yumar (yefṛeḥ) s tezmert n Yigen aɣelnaw aɣerfan d yimeẓla n tɣellist imi ay ssawḍen ad ɛassen yerna ad kksen tigrawin (tirebrabin) yerna yenna-d « aya yesskanay-d d akken Lezzayer tezwar ɣer unrar deg yimenɣi mgal rrebrab ». Aneɣlaf yenna-d d akken tamhelt-a « d tabɣast yerna d taxatart », yerna yenna-d d akken slan yes-s akk medden. « Amaḍal s lekmal-nnes yeẓra s ttbut d akken llant tmura ay yezwaren ɣer unrar deg yimenɣi mgal rrebrab yerna Lezzayer d nettat ay d tamezwarut deg tmura-a », ay d-yenna. Ṣṣenf-a n temhal « yeḥwaj iɣallen uzzigen », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna am wakken ay d-yerna d akken iɣermanen idzayriyen « ttekkan s ubrid-nsen deg ccɣel yekkaten akken ad ifak rrebrab seg Lezzayer ».  Mass Lamamra yenna-d, deg temsalt-a d akken « amaḍal s lekmak-nnes yesteɛṛef s tmussni igerrzen n yiɣallen n tɣellist d yigen aɣelnaw aɣerfan deg uxeddim-nsen deg yimenɣi mgal rrebrab ».  « D ayen yesɛan azal ma sfaydin-d yidisan niḍen seg ttejṛiba n Lezzayer deg yimenɣi mgal rrebrab, d ttejṛiba ay d-terbeḥ seg wayen ay tefka d asfel seg warraw-nnes », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna.                              

 NSL (APS)

  
 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Isufar </span>

 500g n tbexsisin 250g n sker 1/2 n tlimet Tidgert n vanille

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span> 

 Sqecret tibexsisin, terrem-tent daxel ukasrun akked d iẓmi-nni n llim, ternum-as sker akked tidgert n vanille yettwafesten, anfet-as ad yazyag, syin ǧǧet-t ad yens iḍ kamel. Azekk-nni, sewwet tarakt-nwen, tettekksem akuftay simal tettewwa. ẓdet ma tebɣam iḥricen-nni n tbexsisin. Mi tewwa tarakt, ččaret yis-s tibellarin alamma neflent, syin tqelbem-tent, teǧǧem-tent iḍ kamel i wakken ad izmirent ad qqiment aṭas n wagguren mebla ma texser tarakt-nni. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Akka i tt-id-ǧǧan yimezwura, akka i tt-id-refden wigi n tura, akka ara tt-id-afent tsuta.

 Deg taddart n Iguersafen i yewwin arraz amezwaru, deg useggas 2014, n temsizzelt ‘’Rabah Aissat n taddart tazeddgant’’ i d-yettheggi Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya (APW) n Tizi Uzzu, ala tezdeg ara tafeḍ deg-s. Mačči kan d tezdeg n ugama, meɛna tezdeg n wallaɣen n yimezdaɣ ; tezdeg n leɛwayed i asen-d-ǧǧan lejdud akked yiseɣ s wacu i tent-refden. Xas ma yella anda-nniḍen, ‘’yal wa s teqbaylit-is’’, deg Iguersafen ẓran anta ay d Ttaqbaylit-nsen. Ẓran kan tin akken ara ten-yessuffɣen ɣer tafat, ɣer talwit. Ferrun tilufa deg tejmaɛt, ttgen ticimlit deg taddart u ttagmen-d aman seg tala i d-wwin seg udrar…

<p style="text-align: center;"> Taddart n Iguersafene 

 Tezga-d taddart n Iguersafène deg lɛerc n At Yeǧǧar seg tama n Ukeffadu. Tebɛed ṣef Tizi Uzzu s 70 n kilumitr, ɛlayet ɣef lebḥar s 890 n lmitrat. Zzint-as-d tudrin-a : ɣef ugafa, ad naf Mahaga ; ɣef unẓul, tella taddart n Ait Aicha ; ɣef umalu, ad naf Ighil n Boukiassa ma deg usamar, tella teẓgi n Ukeffadu. Iguersafène, d taddart n 99 n yimeɣras, sɛan axxam n yilmeẓyen, isebdad n yimeɣras, amraḥ n tuǧǧal n yimeɣras, iɣerbazen, urti n yigerdan, tajmaɛt, tiliwa, amraḥ n umezgun d wayen-nniḍen. Acu kan, kra din, d taddart i t-yebnan s tcemliyin akked yidrimen n yimezdaɣ, ladɣa iminigiyen-nsen. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Isem ‘’Iguersafène’’ 

 Iguersafène d awal uddis (Agarsafen) : gar+asif (tanzaɣt+isem). Ffkan-as isem-a imi i d-tezga taddart-a gar sin n yisaffen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tuddsa n taddart 

 Mazal teddun lecɣal deg taddart n Iguersafène am am wakken i asen-tt-ǧǧan yimezwura. Mazal d tajmaɛt i yesselḥuyen leqdic i d-yettilin deg taddart-a. ttnejmaɛen deg tejmaɛt, sɛan aqerru n taddart akked ṭemman. I wakken ad yili umsawa gar yimezdaɣ u yal wa ad iqader wayeḍ akked wayen ɣef wacu mcawaren, tga taddart yiwet n tmendawt i d-yellal d lsal gar wassaɣen n yimezdaɣ. Leqwanen n tmendawt-a, ttwaqadaren akken iwata u yal tikkelt mi ara d-yennulfu kra n ujdid deg tmetti, rennun-as iṣudaf i lqanun-a. S wakka, nezmer ad d-nini taddart n Iguersafène d tagduda tameẓyant imi tewwi ‘’timanit’’ s yiman-is. Ɣef teɣzi n useggas, Ttgen yal ddurt tacemlit. Ma yella d asenfar ameẓyan, ttgen-tt s nnuba, ma yella d asenfar ameqqran, taddart akken tella ad d-tefk afus n tallelt. kra din d asenfar, yettwaxdem sɣur taddart. Gar yisenfaren imeqqranen i tga taddart-agi, ad nebder aman i d-tewwi seg udrar ɣef teɣzi 1,8 n kilumitr anta i t-ṣerref 2,5 n yimilyaren, kan deg-s azal n 8 wagguren. Aman akka tura deg Iguersafène, baṭel, ur ttxelliṣen ara duru. Acu kan deg unebdu, ttgen tilisa i yixxamen, tesɛiḍ 80 litrat i wass baṭel, ma d zyada-nni ad tt-txelṣeḍ. D nutni i d-ijemɛen tadrimt-agi. Ulac la l’ADE, wala la Sonade.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Arraz amezwaru n tezdeg 

  Tewwi taddart n Iguersafène arraz amezwaru n tezdeg deg temsizzelt ‘’Rabah Aissat’’ i d-yettheggi Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu APW, deg useggas n 2014. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Arezki Messaoudène, aselway n tesqamut n taddart, yenna-d d akken taddart-agi-nsen, tella d taddart i yumsen ugar n tudrin-nniḍen, tezmer ad tawi arraz n wammus deg useggas n 2011 imi yal tama d aqabuc, 17 n yimukan i d-iḍewwren i taddart. (17 décharges sauvages). Ihi, syina i d-yebda ikeccem lḥir Wat taddart. kkren-asen i lecɣal yiwet, yiwet. Jemɣen-d iḍumman ɣer yiwen uqabuc, uɣen-d atraktur i d-yettɛeddayen ɣef yixxamen yal ass, syin ad ten-yawi ɣer uqabuc anda ara ten-ssersen yal wa deg umekkan-is mebɣed mi d-yella ufran-nsen deg yixxamen : lkaɣeḍ weḥd-s, lǧaǧ akked plastik, weḥd-s. Leqdic-a, yebda-d d ticemlit sɣur igerdan n taddart, d nutni i yebdan jjamaɛen iḍumman n taddart, syin ɛunden-ten yimeqqranen, ihi deg Iguersafène ‘’Yekker-d ufrux, yesselqeḍ baba-s’’. ciṭ, ciṭ, armi tuɣal taddart n Iguersafène d tazeddgant u tewwi arraz amezwaru i yeṭṭfen taqacuct n tezdeg.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Taddart n 99 n yimeɣras 

 Txelles taddart n Iguersafène s ugar n 99 yimeɣras timunent n Lezzayer. Zyad ɣef tuǧǧal akked yinɛawbuyen. Ahat, ala nettat i yellan deg Lezzayen deg lgirra-nni anda d tajmaɛt i d-yessuli rray i wakken ad ffɣen yimezdaɣ ɣer lgirra. Amek ? Mmsefhamen Wat taddart i wakken ad ruḥen, ad kecmen ɣer lɛesker n Fransa. Mi wwḍen, ffkan-asen-d leslaḥ, uɣalen am lɛesker n Fransa. Acu kan, mi d-ḥarran leslaḥ-nni, mmsefhamen i tikkelt-nniḍen i wakken ad d-ffɣen syin s leslaḥ-nsen u ad ruḥen s amadaɣ ɣer yimjuhad. Ihi, akken i xedmen. Aya, yegla-d s ttar. Tssenger Fransa taddart ass 4 deg duǧember 1957. Tegla s uzegzaw s uquran. Akka ay texla taddart n Iguersafène uqbel ad tebnun yimezdaɣ-is,syin ɣer da. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Kessous Mohand Ameziane. 

  Wagi d yiwen urgaz n taddart. d imezdaɣ n taddart i as-d-yellan deg lmendad. Ur yesɛi l lwali, wali tawacult acu kan yezga yennecraḥ wudem-is, yezga yelsa, yeswa, yečča, sɣur taddart. win tufiḍ yerfed-it, ama s llebsa neɣ s tedrimt. Refden Wat taddart akken iwata. Leɛmer i t-txus tɣawsa, ayen yebɣa, yella sɣur Wat Taddart. Netta iḥemmel-iten, nutni ḥemmlen-t. Yella d amedya n lemɛawna, d lemri n wwasssaɣen gar yimezdaɣ n taddart. ihi, asmi qrib ad yemmet, yenna-as i umeddakel-is ‘’asmi ara mmteɣ, awi-asen i Wat taddart idrimen-agi-inu’’. Akka, ihi, asmi yemmut, yefka-asen umeddakkel-is idrimen i d-yeǧǧa i taddart. meḥsub yerra-asen idrimen i as-d-ffkan imi netta ur ten-iṣerref ara imi yettawi-d yal taɣawsa baṭel. Syin kkren Wat taddart, bnan-as amraḥ d amecṭuḥ u semman-t s yisem-is…

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tiddukliwin n taddart 

  Zyada ɣef useqqamu n taddart, sɛan Iguersafène tlata n tiddukliwin-nniḍen i iqedcen deg yal aḥric n tmetti. Tella tiddukla tadelsant ‘’Alma’’ i d-yelhan deg yidles sumata d wayen i d-icudden ɣur-s, tella tiddukla ‘’Alma vert’’ i d-yerran lwelha-s ɣer useḥbiber n ugama akked usegmi n twennadt am wakken, diɣ, ara naf tiddukla n tmerrit ‘’Village du monde’’. Tiddukliwin-agi, qeddcent s lmendad n tesqamut n taddart. Sɛan tdukliwin-a,assaɣen gerrzen gar-asent, ayen i tent-yeǧǧan ad ilint d imedyaten i tiyaḍ u ad tekkint deg temliliyin i d-yettilin ama da deg Lezzayer ama deg Fransa. Aṭas i tent-yesnumren ɣef leqdic-nsent, ula François Holland yemlal u yesnemmer yiwet gar tɛeggalin n tiddukla n Iguersafène deg COP21 i d-yellan deg tmurt n Fransa. Aya, i wakken kan ad d-nini belli tudrin n leqbayel zemrent ad ilint d imedyaten i leǧnas-nniḍe, yessefk kan ad fiqqen yimezdaɣ-is u ad jebden seg wayen yellan yakan. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.Moula 

  
 Lexmis yezrin, tewweḍ laɛfu n Rebbi tmusnawt Camille Lacoste-Dujardin,deg leɛmer-is 83 n yiseggasen. Deg umecwar-is n tusna(ethnologue), tefka azal d ameqqran i yidles amaziɣ n tmurt n leqbayel. Tcerew-d acḥal d tamacahut, tessuqel-itent, tseleṭ-iten.Terra tiṭ daɣen ɣef liḥal i deg tettidir tmeṭṭut taqbaylit, di tmurt akked d Fransa.

 Ad temḍḍel azekka, 02 di furar, ɣef snat n tsaɛtin d wezgen di funénarium d’Antony, 106-110 rue de Châtenay.

  
 Dayen tefra tmacahut kfan iɣublan d leɛtab ɣef teqraɛtin lgaz imi teḍwa tafat ɣef yimezdaɣ n rewḍa akked tiḥemamin dag at menṣur umbaɛd aceɛɛel lgaz n temdint i lfayda 218 twaculin i yeǧǧan tiqreɛtin n lmeḥna(tiqraɛtin lgaz) imi tettnernay ssuma nsent ladɣa deg ussan n cetwa yerra tettxasa , lferḥa n twaculin-agi tbaned deg udmawen nsen axaṭar yessali uɣbel n lgaz dayen ara ten-yeǧǧen ad idirin di tegnatin ifazen imi d yiwen seg usafar agejdan i sexdamen s waṭas ama di cetwa neɣ deg ussan nniḍen ,ɛlaḥsab n twaculin-agi ferḥent mliḥ s uṣenfar iten-yiwḍen ami d ixxamen yerna iwḍen iswi i llan ssaramen acḥal d iseggasen-aya dayen ara yeqqimen deg umezruy n taddart.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"></span> M.A 

  
 Ass n acer yezrin 07 deg furar tidukkla yettξawanen wid yuḍnen tigeẓẓal ξerḍen-d imejjayen yettwaxeṣṣen i tukksa n tgeẓẓal seg tfekka ɣer tayeḍ , imejjayen-agi xedmen-d asarag (la conférence) deg sbiṭar n Neddir Muḥmed , wwin-d awal ɣef yimdanen yettaken tigẓelt-nsen i win itt-yeḥwağen, nnan-d deg tmurt n Lzzayer kan i ttkukrun tukksa –agi n tegẓelt , ɣas ma yella n twacult n umuḍin ad tafeḍ ikukra yugad , imejjayen-agi nnan-d nebɣa tifekkiwin n wid yemmuten lxerssum ,acku deg tmura n lberrani ulac akk aɣbel ama d tafekka n win yemmuten ama n wid yeddren ,awi-d kan ad allen amuḍin ad yejji maca deg tmurt-nneɣ qqaren –ak wa d gma ta d yemma amek ara ffkeɣ tigẓelt n win aξzizen ,akka yakk ittxemmimen ; imejjayen –agi sḥasfen aṭas aṭas ɣef wugur-agi ameqqran , tidukkla –agi tettwaxelq-d deg furar aseggas n 2014, wigi ttwelihen ttξawanen ama d imuḍan-agi, neɣ wid yebɣan ad fken tigzelt,ttmeslayen yid-sen segzayen-asen-d akken iwata amek ara qeblen deg wallaɣ-nsen ad fken tigẓelt-agi, ula d aselway n tɣiwant n Tizi wezzu Mass Mangellat yefka-d adrim i tdukkla agi , d-yezgan deg temdint tamaynut aṭas ur tt-nessin ara , llan kra n yimuḍan ur ɣrin ur sξin adrim ad ruḥen ɣer wa ad uɣalen ɣer wa , llan kra ad ruḥen ɣer sbiṭar n Msetfa Baca , netta mačči ɣer din ara ruḥen ilaq ɣer Bni Mesus am wakken id-yenna yiwen gar yimejjayen-agi id –ixedmen asarag,mi yebda usarag deg tazwara tmmeslay-d tdukkla-agi tenna-d aqlaɣ dagi ilmend n yimuḍan d wid ara yefken tigẓelt-nsen , ad ten-nξawen ama s udrim ama s wawal akken tanefsit n win ara yefken tigẓelt ad tili tertaḥ , yerna teqbel , ur ilaq ara ad aggaden imi aqerru ɣef tdukkla-agi d win ijerben aṭṭan-agi, yuɣal yuwi-d awal Mass Zziri yemmeslay-d ɣef wamek zerξen tigẓelt deg tfekka s umata, yuɣal yemmeslay-d Mass rénale) d netta i yestkelfen ɣef temsalt-agi , acḥal i ilaqen n tgeẓẓal ara d-yettwakksen i yimdanen neɣ i tfekkiwin yemmuten , akken daɣen acḥal imuḍan ara ten –izerξen , yuɣal yemmeslay-d umejjay rénale) amek d-yettili wayagi akk, aneggaru d yuwin awal d Mass Bulasel ( législation du don d’organes) mačči kan akka id –tekksen tigẓelt mačči am tuɣmest ilaq ad yeḥder umejjay-agi yettwastkelfen s lqanun neɣ n yizerfan, akka yekfa usarag s usirem n yimejjayen-agi akken ad fehmen yimdanen belli ulac fell-as ma kksen-d tigzelt n win yemmuten , awi-d kan ad d-ḥyun amuḍin, imi win d-yeḥyan ṛṛuḥ am akken yeḥya-d akk ddunit , d wagi i d iswi n tdukkla mebla ma nettu iswi n yimuḍan ad asen-d –yefk Rebbi cfa.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia n yahia   

  
 I tikkelt niḍen, tamettant teẓẓel-d iffasen-is , tewwi mebla akukru ayen yellan d iseɣ, ḥeznent tzizwa di tefsut ɣas akken tamurt tessa s tizegzzewt d yijeǧǧigen, imi d baba-s n Tferzizwit i yemmuten, ass n 04 yebrir 2016 di taddert-is tassaft n ugemmun di laɛmer-is 94 n yiseggasen Caɛban Waḥyun (chabane Ouahioune), illul di tefsut ass n 22 yebrir aseggas n 1922 di taddert n tassaft n ugemmund taɣiwant n Yibudraren lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu. D amyaru aqbayli s tutlayt n tefransist, id-yufraren deg annar n tsekla tagreɣlant, imi yura deqs n yedlisen ger-asen ; «La maison au bout des champs» à«L’aigle du rocher», «Tiferzizouith», d wiyaḍ niden. Caɛban Waḥyun, ger yargazen id-inejren abrid n tmusni, s tira-s, yegzem amrar n tegdi, yerz leqyud d snasel i yeqnen ameyyez, ulac ayen id-yussan seg ulac, ulac ayen yettuɣalen d ulac, kullec yettnarni, yettfukti. Dda Caɛban yenǧǧar-d abrid i yimal, issereḥ akken ad-teǧugǧgeg tmusni imi netta ger wid itt-lleqmen. akken nebɣu newwi-d awal fell-as, ur nezmir ara ad d-nezzi yakk ɣef wayen yexdem. Tamusni-s d lebḥer lqayen, d lebḥer wessiεen. Ihi tamusni n Dda Caɛban d tafat n wallaɣ, d iṭij n wass, d tiziri n yiḍ, d tilelli n wemdan. Yesakki amdan yellan yeɣfel. Tamusni ur tesεi ara tilisa, tessengugga idurar, tzegger lebḥur, tcerrig igenwan, ur tettağğa amḍiq, yal tiɣmert di ddunit tewweḍ-itt. Dda Caɛban ger wid ismendagen allaɣ-is, iẓemmi-t akken ad iniwel tamusni-s swayes yezmer ad d-icekti, ad yessufeɣ afrayen-is, syen ad yezreε tamusni-s d tẓuri-s. Amyaru Caɛban Waḥyun yettmaḍel ass n 06 yebrir 2016, di tmeqbert n taddert-is, deg akkal n lejdud-is it-id-irebban, anda iḥedren deqs n yidisan, tawacult n yedles, inaẓuren, ikabaren n tsartit, imḍebren n yaḥricen yemgaraden d waṭas n yemdanen id-yussan si temnaḍin yemgaraden.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ad d-theggi tneɣlaft n usegmi, nettat akked n tmawin teɛna temsalt, ladɣa imaswaḍen, yiwen wahil i uselmed n temsirin ur lmiden ara yinelmaden imi ɣelqen yiɣerbazen deg waṭas n yimekwan ɣef sebba n yir lḥal i d-yellan taggara-a deg tmurt. Aṭas n yiberdan i yeḥbes udfel neɣ ugeffur.

 Ɣef waya, ḥebsen yiɣerbazen ɣef leqraya. Ma nefka-d kan amedya, ad naf deg tmurt n leqbayel, amur ameqqran n yiɣerbazen i yellan deg tudrin i d-yezgan deg udrar, xelqen azal n smana. Xas ma inelmaden qerben ɣer uɣerbaz, meɛna qessiḥet teswiɛt, ur zmiren ara ad ruḥen, ladɣa, arrac imecṭaḥ. ula d iselmaden-nsen, llan wid i d-yettasen s lembɛid, ur zmiren ara ad ɛeddin. Ihi, ɣef wanect-a akk ara d-tessewjeḍ tneɣlaft n ttrebga yiwen wahil i temsirin ur nettwaselmed ara. ‘’Nemsefham, nekni akked yimaswaḍen i wakken ad nessewjed yiwen wahil n temsirin ur netwaselmed ara, yakan, imi ɣelqen yiɣerbazen. Ad yili wahil-agi di lmendad n yiselmaden, ad t-xedmen deg wussan i d-iteddun i wakken ad kksen leɛḍil i d-yellan deg smana-agi iɛeddan. Xas ulamma, leɛḍil yemxalaf gar uɣerbaz d wayeḍ, acu kan, yal aselmad ad iwali amek ara yexdem’’. Akka i d-tenna Massa Benghebrit. Ma ɣef wuswir n uselmed deg yiɣerbazen, terna, tenna-d :’’ad nexdem taslaḍt deg yal aɣerbaz i wakken ad nwali ma yettili-d unerni n uswir seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ’’. Ma ɣef temliliyin akked sindicat, ad tezwir s wid yellan, yakan, d iqdimen, syin ad temlit akked wiyaḍ, ɣef wakken i d-tenna.

<p style="text-align: right;"> H. M. 

  
 “I nes ines’’, d azwel n Album ajdid n Farid MALKI ara d-yeffɣen deg ussan-agi i d-iteddun ɣer tezrigin ‘’Akbou Production’’. D tikkelt tis snat ara yessekles ucennay Farid Malki, mebɛed mi d-yessufeɣ, yakan, Album-is amezwaru iwumi yefka isem ‘’Le matérialiste’’. ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna, imeslayen d uẓawan n tezlatin-agi d imaynutin mačči d ayla-s, d wiyaḍ i as-tent-id-ixedmen. Netta, yecna-tent kan. Isental n tezlatin tezzin ɣef tayri d wayen swayes i d-tgellu. Ma d aẓawan d axfifan yekka-d seg tgemmi taqbaylit s wallalen-agi n uẓawan atraren. Farid MALKI, am netta am yinaẓuren-nniḍen, yesḥassef aṭas ɣef wanda tewweḍ liḥala n lbiɛ n yiḍebsiyen-agi n ccna imi i d-yettili le “piratage” n les CD deg Internet, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna. Ayen yessefcalen u yettruẓun afud i waṭas n yinaẓuren, ɛlaḥsab n tmuɣli-s. Am wakken yessaram ad yeg timeɣriwin deg waggur-agi n Remḍan i wakken ad d-yessifrir tizlatin-agi-ines tijdidin.

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Hocine.M 

  
 Deg wussan-agi yezrin i d-yeffeɣ wammud n tmedyazt amezwaru n Mass Salim iwumi isemma “Ulamek” i d-yeffɣen s lmendad n Tsebeddit takanadit n tmaziɣt “Tiregwa” yellan deg tmurt n Canada. D wagi i d adlis amezwaru ara d-yesuffeɣ umedyaz-agi ilemẓi. Gar yisental, iɣef i d-yewwi awal deg udlis-agi n 36 n yisefra, ad naf : tamussni, amɣar azemni, lebɣi, tayri , asirem, Bgayet, tamurt, tirga, tatut, akukru, awal…atg. Ad d-nesmekti belli Salem Benkhlifa, ilul ass 29 maggu 1986 deg taddart n Yickaben deg lɛerc n yimellaḥen, yefrur-id seg twacult n umedyaz ameqqran Si Lbacir Amellah. Yura aṭas n yimagraden deg Uɣmis n yimaziɣen n La Dépêche de Kabylie, yerra-d kra n yiḍrisen ɣer teqbaylit n yimura meqqren yecban : Kateb Yacine, Nizar Kebbani, Djebran Khalil Djebran…atg. Iḥella-d aṭas n warrazen deg tfaskiwin n tmedyazt, ama deg Bgayet, anida yewwi sin warrazen n umḍiq amezwaru deg tfaska n tmedyazt n Udrar n Fad deg useggas n 2012 akked 2013. Yewwi daɣen sin warrazen deg Tizi Uzzu, yiwen d arraz n Cherif Kheddam n tiddukkla tadelsant « Si Muḥend u Mḥend d Yusef u Qasi » deg useggas 2011, akked warraz wis tlata dima n tiddukkla-agi deg useggas n 2012. Taɣuri igerrzen i yimeɣriyen, afud iǧehden i yimeskaren!

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Tella yiwet n teqcict γur-s izimer. Tettawi-t yid-s. Yiwen wass tṛuḥ γer tala a d-tagem. Tewwi izimer-nni yid-s. Armi tewweḍ ar tala, teqqim ad teččaṛ aman. Taswiɛt terḍa-d. Teqqim ar tettḥellil deg izimer-nni. Tenna yas: “γur k ad teḥkuḍ i uxxam nneγ !” Izimer-nni ittaḍsa, nettat tettḥellil deg-s, teqqaṛ as :”ttxil-k, ur qqaṛ ara i baba; ad ak-fkeγ tazlegt. “Netta akk-nni ittaḍsa. Nettat ar as-teqqaṛ:”ttxil-k, susem! Ɣur-k ad teḥkuḍ ! Ad ak-fkeγ amendil. » Armi i as-tessels akk iselsa-ines, teqqim nettat ala deg yiwet tqenduṛt. Netta akk-nni irennu ittaḍsa. Ar tettru. Tṛuḥ-d. Armi tewweḍ s axxam, tenna-as yemma-s :”a yelli, acu i kem-yuγen imi tettruḍ ?” –Tenna-as:”A yemma, ṛuḥeγ ɣer tala ad d-agmeγ ; qqimeγ ad ččaṛeγ tayeṭiṭ. Iḥcem-iyi Ṛebbi ! Erḍiγ-d sdat izimer! Tura innaiyi: Ad iniγ… -Tura, aqli seg imir-nni, d nekk ttḥellileγ deg-s akken ad issusem. Netta yugi. A-t-an fkiγ-as akk iselsa-inu. Akk-nni yugi ad isusem.” Tekker-d yemma-s diγen. Tebda diγen tettḥellil deg izimer-nni, teqqaṛ as :”susem, a mmi ! A ak-ihdu Ṛebbi, ur qqaṛ i yiwen ! Taqcict, tameγbunt, iḥcem-itt Ṛebbi. Tura a-tt-an tugad ad isel baba-s.” Izimer-nni akk-nni ittaḍsa. Tekker-d yemma-s n teqcict-nni, tefka-as i izimer-nni axelxal, tɛelleq-as-t deg uḍar-is. Terna-as timelḥaft, tessels-as-tt. Terna-as ibzimen. Terna-as aggus, tebges-as. Izimer-nni imir i yerna kra ittaḍsa. Taswiɛt akka, ikcem-d baba-s n teqcict-nni diγen. Yufa-tent la ttḥellilent deg yizimer-nni; netta yugi ad isusem. Inna-asent urgaz nni: “Acu i kent-yuγen imi akka la tettrumt, tettḥellilemt deg yizimer agi ?” –Tenna-as tmeṭṭut is: “Ay argaz, d taqcict iḥcem-itt Ṛebbi ! Terḍa-d sdat izimer ! Tura, la yeqqaṛ izimer: “Ad iniγ… -Tura, nugad ad isel gma-s n teqcict. Nettat, a-tt-an tessetḥa. “Ikker-d diγen baba-s n teqcict-nni, inna-as i yizimer-nni: “ad ak-ihdu Ṛebbi, susem! Ur ttini ara! Ad ak-fkeγ abernus.” Izimer-nni irennu akk-nni ittaḍsa ! Issels-as urgaz-nni abeṛnus i yizimer-nni. Izimer irennu ittaḍsa akken, yugi ad issusem. Irna-as urgaz-nni abernus-nniḍen. Kra i as-sslusun i tγawsiwin, netta imir-nni irennu ittaḍsa. I kraḍ(3) yid-sen, am teqcict nni, am yemma-s, am baba-s, i kraḍ ala ttḥellilen deg-s; netta, irennu ittaḍsa! Ameγbun, ittaḍsa, ibγa ad yečč neγ ibγa ad isew. Nutni γilen iqqaṛ-asen:”Ad iniγ i medden taqcict terḍa-d!”…

  Bu Lemrah u Lemraḥ 

  
 Akken yeqqar yenzi « Yal aẓar yetabaε tara », dγa ddurt-agi yezrin ass n sebt 06 yunyu 2015, amyurar agreγlan n tarbeεt taγelnawt n ddabax uḍar, Yacine BRAHIMI yerzad γer taddert n At-Buεḍa di tγiwant n Yiεeẓẓugen lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu. yerza-d γer xwal-is taddert ideg tlul yemma-s akked yimawlan-is, atmaten-is d yemdukkal-is ger-asen Sεid Belkalem amyurar n tarbeεt taγelnawt n ddabax uḍar n temnaḍt Meqlaε. Dγa imezdaγ n taddert n At-Buεḍa heggan-d yiwet n tmeγra meqren γef dema n tirza n wayaw-nsen imi 15 n yiseggasen-aya ur-d-yerzi γer taddert n yemma-s. Yacine BRAHIMI yefraḥ nezah s tmeγra-agi id-ittewheggan γef dema-s, iḥulfa amzun akken imir id-illul deg akken i ssulin deg azal-is, ggan-as ccan annect. Γas akken yetturar di trebuεa meqren n umaḍal am FC Porto, maca muḥal yettu iẓuran-is yellan d imaziγen, imi baba-s d amzabi n temnaḍt n Tγardayt, yemma-s d taqbaylit n Tizi-Wezzu, dγa Yacine Brahimi d amaziγ inekmalen. Yenna-d  » acḥal n yiseggasen-aya seramaγ ad-rruḥaγ γer taddert n yemma, maca d akkud i yiṭfen almi d tura, u ḥamdullah wḍaγ lebγi-w imi uffiγ-d imddukal n temẓi », syen yerna-d  » Wwiγ-d deqs n yisenfaren ilfayda n yimezdaγ n taddert n At-Buεḍa, am allalen n udawi i wexxam n tujya n taddert-agi, lxedma n wannar n ddabax uḍar n taddert At-Buεḍa « tasuta tis 05 », d waṭas niḍen. Ayen id-yernan cbaḥa i tmeγra-agi, d tikli yexdem Yacine BRAHIMI di tlemmast n taddert n At-Buεḍa, yelḥa merra deg yizenqan ideg yurar, yuγal yekcem s axxam n xwal-is anda id-yemekta temẓi-s. Tameddit n wass, iwala akked d yelmeẓyen n taddert n At-Buεḍa timlilit n tagara n talγuγa n Europe Juventus-Barça.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Tedder tγiwant n Leɛğiba taggara n ddurt yezrin tiswiɛin n ccedda yessawḍen imezdaγ n kra n tudrin yerzan Buɛekkac, Lmedera d Uzru n Urumi ad medlen tiwwura n uxxam n tγiwant teγzi n tlata wussan, seg wass n ttlata almi d lexmis, i wakken ad d-beggnen lγid-nsen sdat lixsas n waman n tissit. Tasebḥit kan, uqbel ad awḍen yixeddamen, imezdaγ yuγ lḥal myefken ttiɛad i wakken ad qqiment tewwura medlent ahat wid akken i terza temsalt ad d-afen tifrat i uγbel ttidiren yimezdaγ-a. « Achal d aseggas-aya i nessutur aman n tissit. Ass-a, tewweḍ tfidi ɣer yiγes, ur nezmir ad nqabel taswiɛt s ttawilat-nne&amp;gamma,; imi azγal yecban wa mazal-aγ nettaγ-d s wazal n 1200 n yidinaren tasitirt n waman. γer melmi ara tdum akka ? » D imeslayen i aγ-d-yenna yiwen n ubabat iγef d-iban reffu. Kra kan n lweqt γed tedyant-a n umdal n tewwura, imḍebber amenzu n ddayra yewwedḍ s amkan anda i yemmeslay d kra n yimdanen. Tigawt tamenzut d tuffγa γer unnar anda ddan yimḍebbren n tγiwant akked wid yettmeslayen s yisem n yimezdaγ. Asmi akken walan acu n ttawilat i iwulmen i taluft-a, uγalen-d γer tγiwant anda i d-yella umeslay d yimezdaγ yellan akka ttraǧun deg berra i yiṭij anda tiseddarin ufrarent nnig n 45°C. D acu kan, rray yettwaddmen d win ur qbilen ara yimezdaγ yettwalin d akken tifrat d tin ara iḍullen, dγa gguman ad slen i wayen i d-yeqqar ama d imḍebber n ddayra ama d imdanen yeddan s yisem-nsen. Dγa d yiwet n ccedda izaden, reffu yettban-d γef wudmawen, d ayen yeǧǧan imezdaγ n tudrin-a ad ṭṭfen deg rray n umdal n tewwura alamma yefra uγbel-nsen mebla leɛdil n watas. Azekka-nni, ulamma amɛellem i d-yelhan d usenfar n usiweḍ n waman ɣer yixxamen deg tudrin-a, yessaweḍ ttawilat ilaqen, yerna yewwi yid-s ixeddamen, imezdaγ ṭṭfen deg wawal-nsen, ugin ula ad ruḥen ad ẓren imḍebbren n twilayt. Awal-nsen ibedd γef yiwen n rray d akken ad swen aman deg lweqt wezzilen. γer lawan-a ideg nura isalli-a, mazal ccedda ur tefri ara, aṭas n tamiwin i yettnadin ad fsin tikerrist s kra n leryuy ahat ara yilin di lfayda n yimezdaγ-a yeffuden, akked yimezdaγ n tγiwant s umata yuḥwağen srabes n tγiwant i usufeγ n lekwaγed.

  M. S. 

  
 0al mara d-yaweḍ 14 deg meɣres neɣ 3 deg duǧember ad yili wayen ara d-yilin d asfuggel neɣ d asmekti sɣur kra n tdukkliwin tilsanin (humanitaires), dɣa syin ɣur-s ad d-tuɣal takkit (kullec) tesbek ɣef wayen yerzan ameɛḍur. Ɣas ma netta yezga d amuḍin deg teɣzi n useggas, mačči ala deg sin n wussan. Nnig n waṭṭan-is, yerna-yas daɣen uwanek (Etat) n tmurt-is i ur as-d-nga akk allalen umi itessra i usishel n tudert-is; ama seg tama n tedrimt tamayyurt i as-d-yettunefkayen, dduzan i as-ilaqen am tcelyult taliktrikt, akked ṭṭmana yemmden, ladɣa deg wayen yeɛnan adawi. Rnu, ma neɣra akken ilaq asaḍuf (lqanun) n uḥuddu ɣef umeɛdur, i d-yeffɣen deg mayu n useggas n 2002, ad naf dakken rsen-d akk waqqayen i as-yerran azal, d acu kan ur ttwasmersen (ur ttwaṭebbqen) deg wannar sɣur wid i terza taluft. Tal tikkelt ad d-smektayen kra n yimḍebbren imagraden-nni n usaḍuf i yettḥuddun ɣef umeɛḍur, maca wid yesɛan kra n tezmert deg uswir anedda ugin ad ten-smersen. Ma nemmeslay ɣef tedrimt i d-yettak uwanek i umeɛḍur, acḥal tura d aseggas nettat deg 4000 n yidinaren ɣas ma seg wass-nni tudert teɣlay ayendin ed wayendin. Taceryult taliktrikt, ttakken-tt-id seg xemsa n yiseggasen ɣer xemsa nniḍen, rnu tipyasin-is ur nuḥent. Ma yella ɣef tdawsa (santé) yeḍra uxessar ɣef umeɛḍur, imi ɣas ma yesɛa takarḍa i as-yessenqasen axelles n ddwawi, maca adawi-nni ɣef yiri-s kan. Ayen yellan iban, ɣas ma yella-d kra n ubeddel, meɛna ameɛḍur mazal-it deg tmurt-is meḥqur!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 I lmend n usmekti n wass aɣelnaw n umeɣras, i d-yettilin yal ass 18 deg waggur n furar..Aṭas n yidisan i d-iheggan ddurt tadelsant i lmend n usmekti-agi. Gar wid itt-id-isuddsen

 ad d-nebder: Tanmehla n Yidles, Axxam n Yidles n Tizi Uzzu d umaruz-is n Azazga, Axxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine, s tallelt n temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, akked uslay amniḍan n umeɣras, s lemεawna n tiddukkla n warraw n yimjuḥad, heggan-d yiwen leqdic d ameqqran deg waṭas n yimukan, ɣef teɣzi n 4 wussan, imi yebda ass-nni n ttlata 14 deg waggur furar 2017, yekfa sendiḍelli n sed 18 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Aseggas-agi, gan-as tajmilt i umeɣra ameqqran Mass Akli Amar. Ma d ahil yettwaxedmen sɣur yimsuddsen-agi d anesbaɣur, imi llan-d aṭas n leqdicat idelsanen ɣef teɣzi n 4 n wussan-agi. Ass-nni n ttlata 14 seg furar 2017, deg temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, yella-d usikew sɣur Massa Cherifi d Mass Semati Med. Ass-nni n lexmis 16 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, deg umaruz n Uxxam n Yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Azazga, tella-d temsikent ɣef tegrawla tazzayrit (tugniwin, imagraden, idlisen n umezruy…), tella-d diɣen temsizzelt n tmedyazt tagrawliwt. Ma d ass-nni n sem 17 deg waggur-agi n furar, xedmen tirza ɣer usalay n Fatma n Soumer. Am wakken diɣen i d-llant snat n temsikniyin deg Uxxam n Yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu; tin n tegrawla tazzayrit (tugniwin, imagraden, idlisen n umezruy…) akked d tin n yidlisen n umezruy sɣur tazrigt El Amel. Ma deg wass-nni n 18 di furar, deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin n Uxxam n Yidles Mulud At Mεemmer, llant-d diɣen snat n temsikniyin, ama d tinna n tegrawla, ama d tinna n yidlisen n umezruy. Ma deg tzeqqa tamecṭuḥt n umezgun, tella-d temsizzelt gar yiɣerbazen imenza, akked tmeɣra tadelsant akked tẓuri i usfukel n wass n umeɣras. Llant-d diɣen tnagiyin n yimjuhad d yimeddukkal d twacult n umeɣras-agi ameqqran “Akli Amar” iwumi tuɣal tejmilt aseggas-a. Ma deg uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine n Tizi Uzzu, yella-d usenεet n yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun, sɣur tiddukkla tadelsant “Tala” n Draa Ben Kheda, s yisem n “Ḥsen Amugad”. Ma deg tzeqqa n ssinima n Tizi Uzzu, yella-d uskan n usaru-nni n “Lbir” n Loutfi Bouchouri.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Amar Ouamrane, d argaz n tegrawla tazzayrit1954-1962, ilul deg useggas n 1919, deg Firkat i yettabaɛen ɣer ladayra n Draa El Mizan, di temnaḍt n Leqbayel, deg temdin n Tizi Uzzu. Yetturba-d deg yiwet n twacult d talemmast. Ssawalen-as yimjuhad lweqt-nni “Bu uqerruy”. Yeɣra armi yessaweḍ ɣer taggara n uswir amenzu, ayen iwumi qqaren s tefransist certificat d’études. Syin akin, yelmed deg tkadimit n lɛeskar n tmurt n Fransa yellan deg temdint n Cherchal, yeɣra dinna asileɣ aɛsekri (formation militaire). Syin deg tedyanin n 08 maggu 1945, yuɣal-d yunag ɣer berra yugi ad ittekki akked Fransa deg txazabiyin-agi i d-ittuheggan i watmaten-is Izzayriyen, dɣa ḥekmen-as s lmut deg useggas n 1946 sɣur uɛeskri afransis Catroux. Yuɣal ikcem-d ɣer tmurt, syin yuɣal d imḍebbar deg ukabar n ugdud Azzayri (PPA) i yuɣalen mebɛed s yisem n Umussu n tleliyin tidimukratiyin (MTLD), yella d amallal neɣ d amɛiwen n Krim Belkacem. Ittekka deg tefranin n tɣiwanin i d-yellan deg useggas n 1946. Ass-nni n umenzu n unbir 1954, mi tecɛel tmes n ṭṭrad, tuɣ-it yella yessedday tamnaḍt n Draa Ben Khedda. Syin yuɣal ɣef uqqeruy n lwilaya tis tlata tazzayrit. Amar Oumrane, yettekki deg unejmuɛ (Congrès) n Soummam i d-yellan ass n 20 ɣuct 1956 deg lwilaya n Bgayet, syin yekcem deg lɛesker n tlelli taɣelnawt (ALN). Sakin, yuɣal d imḍebber deg Usqamu aɣelnaw n tegrawla tazzayrit (CNRA), yettmeslay s yisem n lwilaya tis tlata, ittukellef daɣen s lecɣal n umrig (leslah) d wayen i t-yettabaɛen. Deg useggas n 1960, yuɣal yettmetil tarbaɛt n FLN deg tmurt n Liban syin akin deg tmurt n Turquie. Yewweḍ leɛfu Rebbi umeɣras-agi ass n 28 yulyu 1992.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Deg wagguren iɛeddan i d-yeffeɣ yiwen n udlis n yimeslayen inmidagen n Said Bouda. Uṭṭun-agi amezwaru, yefka-s isem Tiftilin. Deg udlis-agi, ad naf 30 n trastiwin s tifrat-nsent i d-yellan deg taggara n zzmam-agi n yiluɣma. S teqbaylit timserreḥt akked kra n wawal atraren, yessaweḍ Mass Bouda ad d-yerr s annar tameslayt s wurar. Yezmer ad ilin imeslayen inmidagen-agi d allal n ulmud s wurar n tmeslayt i yinelmaden, am wakken i yezmer ad yili d tasarut i yimeqqranen i yettnadin ɣef yinumak n wawalen iqburen. I wakken yeweḍ umeskar ɣer uxeddim yecban wa, yesseqdec amawalen d yisegzawelen i yellan deg unnar n tmaziɣt d unadi-ines s umata, akka aɣ-d-yenna Said Bouda. Aṭas n wuguren i d-yettmagar mi ara yesseqdac awalen yesɛan imesli uffay neɣ wid yesɛan sin yimesla, ɣef wakken iwala. Ayen i t-yettaǧǧan ad yettaṭṭaf aṭas n wakud i wakken ad yexdem yiwet n trasta. Yelmed Mass Bouda tira n tmaziɣt weḥd-s. Yella ixeddem, yakan, imeslayen inmidagen s tefrensist. Syin, ikemmel-iten ula s tmaziɣt. Yal ddurt, ad naf yiwet n trasta n Said Bouda deg yisebtar n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen n La Dépêche de Kabylie i d-ittefɣen yal ass n letnayen. Yettnuz udlis s 100 DA, yella akka tura deg Tizi Uzzu. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> H.M 

<div> 
  
 Argaz issetḥa, inneḥcam qrib ad t-tsebleɛ tmurt, irfed-d amger-nni izzi-d srid s axxam. Yewweḍ-d yufa-d tettraju-t tmeṭṭut-is, urɛad d-telli imi-s, argaz ismar-as-d akk urfan-is yenna-as : -A yir tameṭṭut ! Akka i tebɣiḍ tura uɣaleɣ d taḍsa gar medden. Tekkesseḍ fell-i sser alammi i yi-terriḍ d amehbul. Nekk wwiɣ-am-d amger kemm teqqareḍ-iyi-d d lemqes ! D acu-t wagi ! Tebɣiḍ ad iyi-tesderwceḍ !

 -Ay argaz ayen iyi-d-tewwiḍ d lemqes mačči d amger ! Amek tenwiḍ win i k-izenzen ad ak-id-yini kelxeɣ-k ! 

 Tameṭṭut tettkemmil deg unamar, teṭṭef kan deg wawal-is teqqar-as wagi d-tewwiḍ mačči d amger d lemqes. Argaz seg iwala tameṭṭut teṭṭef nneqma, tugi ad d-tuɣal ɣer ṣṣwab iɛzem ula d netta ad tt-iḥres alamma tuɣal-d s abrid. Amek ara ixdem, iwwi-tt nettat d warraw-is ɣer wasif. Wwḍen ɣer din, bedden rrif inṭeq ɣer tmeṭṭut-is yenna-as i tura ad d-tiniḍ tidet ad tḥebseḍ nnmara ma ulac ad kem-degreɣ ɣer wasif. D acu t wagi d amger neɣd lemqes ?

 Nniɣ-ak ay argaz wagi d lemqes mačči d amger. Argaz idegger tameṭṭut-is ɣer wasif. Inna-as : 

 – I tura, ad d-tiniḍ d amger neɣ mačči d amger! Tameṭṭut tbelleɛ asif izuɣur-itt akin.

 – D lemqes, d lemqes ! Nekk ur zmireɣ ara ad rreɣ lemqes d amger.

 – Ini-d a tameṭṭut a tin iwwet Ṛebbi, uqbel ad ifat lḥal , ad d-teǧǧeḍ arraw-im! Tameṭṭut simmal tbeɛɛed si rrif n wasif simmal tzedder deg waman. Argaz issawal-as iqqar-as ini-d, ini-d d amger…Tameṭṭut tettara-as-id d lemqes d lemqes alammi ulac ṣṣut-is. Xas akken tafekka-s akk tezder deg waman, tameṭṭut tessuffeɣ-d ifassen-is tettwehi-d teskanay-d s yiḍuden-is lemqes. Akken alammi zedren ula d ifassen-is deg waman, tennejla tmeṭṭut si ddunit iǧǧel urgaz, gujlen warraw-is. Akka i tḍerru d win ittaṭafen nnmara issengar iman-is d uxxam-is s ufus-is.

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Inelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas n sin n yimeɣrasen “Tellal Mohammed” n taddart n Akaoudj, n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, sɛan ugur n lgaz d ayen i d-yeglan s tɣuri n yinelmaden tiṣebḥiyin kan n wass-nni n lhed d wass-nni n letnayen yezrin. Fɣen yinelmaden ɣef 12h00 n uzal, tuɣal tedbelt tbeddel rray-is, imi ulamma ulac lgaz swayes ara sewwen, ttakken-asen tagela tasemmaḍt (aguglu, lyaɛut, timellalin…). Yerna isemmeḍ lḥal ass-nni n larebɛa d lexmis, d ayen yeǧǧan inelmaden d yiselmaden ad sḥisfen ɣef liḥala-agi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

 
  
 Ath Ahmed d taddart n Hocine Aït Ahmed. D taddart n yimrabḍen mebla lǧameɛ.Tewwi isem-agi imi d nutni i yerzan ɣer din d imezwura. D tamurt, diɣ, n Ccix Muḥend U lḥusin i as-yennan : « a win ineqqen irgazen, aẓakka-k, ad t-qqazen ». Seg twacult n Ccix Muḥend i d-yefruri Ait Ahmed, s tama n yemma-s, axater Ccix Muḥend U lḥusin d amengur ur yesɛi ara dderya. Acu kan, ɣef wakken i d-yenna yiwen seg twacult n Ait Ahmed, yesɛa yiwen,yemmut d amecṭuḥ. Ula d Bentaleb med Taher Said, yenna-aɣ-d asefru i yexdem Ccix Muḥend ɣef wasmi yemmut mmi-s.
   « Ad ken-recdeɣ a lexwan,  
 Ɣurwat win yettḥebbin tarwa-s.
 A lmumnin, ddenya ad tɛeddi, ad tekfu,
 S aẓekka, akk ad nɛeddi, 
 kul yiwen s nnuba-s.
 A Sidi Muḥend a Lɛerbi,
 A leɛyun n yizem bu tissas.
 Awi ad asen-theḍreḍ,
 D Rebbi i d-yedlan s ayla-s. »
  Taddart-a d tamecṭuḥ : rebɛa n yixxamen d utemmu, akken i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen. Meɛna teǧǧa-d snat n tgejda iɣef tebna tsekla akked tegrawla n tmurt. Ccix Muḥend U lḥusin, d azamul n ssadat-amussnaw aneggaru, Aït Ahmed, d agrawliw aneggaru n tegrawla. Aït Ahmed yesɛa, daɣen, assaɣ d twacult n tegrawliwt tameqqrant Fadma n Sumer imi i d-kkan deg sin seg taddart « Werdja » i d-yezgan seg tama-agi n Michelet.
  Awal ara d-nawi, nelquḍ-it-id seg timawit. Nefka azal i wayen mazal ur yuri ara. Wamag ayen ireṣṣan, yemneɛ seg tatut.
  Takerḍ n taddart
  Taddart n Ath Ahmed tettabaɛ lɛerc n Taqa n Ath Yahia, seg tama-agi n Michelet. Tuli ɣef lebḥar s wazal n 700 n lmitrat. Drus maḍi n yimezdaɣ i tesɛa. Deg useggas n 1959, tenfa-ten Fransa seg taddart mebɛed mi asen-tessedrem ixxamen-nsen. Tuɣal taddart ‘’Zone interdite » ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Ben Amara. Sɛan 10 n yimeɣras. Aṭas i tesɛedda taddart-a, ama deg tegrawla n 1954, ama deg temsalt n FFS n 1963. Axxam n Ccix Muḥend yella d amugger n tedyanin-agi. Kkes-d anwa ur nɛedda syin, neɣ ur neffir din. Axxam n Ccix Muḥend, d axxam nnig uxxam : ddaw-as, ifri ɣer gma-s ; d iberdan s ddaw tmurt ; kcem sya, tefɣeḍ akin. Aṭas n yimeqqranen n tegrawla i iɛeddan syin, gar-asen : Krim, Massa Bitat, Mehri, Ouamrane, Abane…atg. Ula d Aït Ahmed, d win i t-imenɛen deg temsalt-nni n FFS : syin i yerwel mi akken i t-id-ḥerran. Taddart n Ath Ahmed,tesɛa tilisa akked : Taqa, seg usamar ; Ait Boutchoure, seg umalu ; Igoufafe, seg ugafa ma seg unẓul, ad naf Agouni Guesaid. Amur ameqqran n yimezdaɣ, zedɣen anda-nniḍen, ama deg temdinin n Lezzayer, ama akkin i lebḥar.
  Amezruy d tmetti.
  Amezruy akk n taddart yeqqen ɣer Ccix Muḥend U lḥusin imi akken llan din, d tawacult : Ait Ahmed, Ait Belkacem d Ben amara. Jeddi-s n Ait Ahmed n twacult-agi n Ben Amara. Amur ameqqran n wakal n taddart n Ccix Muḥend imi d netta i d-yusan d amezwaru ɣer din. Yesɛa amekkan n tissirt andan gganen lexwan d yixeddamen-is (zik), lexlawi d yigran. Lbir n Ccix anda ttagmen aman i ddwa ar tura imi i d-qqaren ireqqa-ten (yexdem-asen ṛruqya). Axxam n lebḥar d axxam ddaw uxxam, yeččur d iberdan ddaw n tmurt, yettwabna deg lweqt-nni n Ccix Muḥend (Une casemate). Deg unebdu, isemmeḍ, deg cetwa, yeḥma.
