Zyada ɣef leqdic adelsan, yella umekkan i waddal: tella tzeqqa d tameqqrant i wid iqeddcen deg unnar-a, am wakken yella umekkan anda i nxeddem isaragen akked tmeɣriwin neɣ tijmilin.’’ Ayen yessewhamen, d akken tarbaɛt n ddabex uḍar OCA, tewwi 4 tikal talɣuɣa n lwilaya nettat ur tesɛi ula d annar anda ara turar… Axxam n yilmeẓyen-agi yesɛa WIFI. Yal tameddit ad tafeḍ qqimen yilmeẓyen d igrawen ɣer tama-s. Meqqar dayen-nni, ur rennun ara tabzert n ufliksi : fiḥel ma ssawlen, yella Facebook neɣ Twitter, neɣ ɛad xas ssawlen, snen akk Viber, baṭel s Internet.

 Zik, tella tfellaḥt ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan ; llant tneqqlin, tizemrin akked yigran n yirden, timẓin, ajilban d lbecna. Ass-a, kulec din iɣab neɣ yerɣa, yedda akked yimezwura. Ass-a, qlil win ixeddmen akkal-is, negrent ula timizar…

  Taẓebbujt n Oufettouche 

 Yella Oufettouche, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-tenna Nna Fadma, yiwet seg twacult-is, d amnir (guide) n taddart seg tama-agi n ddin. Bnan-as ula d taqubbet, syin ɣer da. Ihi, ula d netta yesɛa taqsidt am sadat. Tenna-d : ‘’asmi qrib ad yemmet, yenna-asen ay amḍiq tugadem, meḍlet-iyi dinna. Yuɣ lḥal At Wafir, zgan d imenɣi akked Yiflisen d Wat Jennad. Asmi yemmut Oufeṭṭouche, kkren meḍlen-t metwal Iflisen imi d nutni i yessarhaben kter n Wat Jennad. Yeǧǧa-d, daɣen, ttewṣaya. Yenna-asen mi ara meḍleɣ, sentut taɛekkazt-iw rrif n uqerruy-iw. Yenna-asen ad d-temɣi tzebbujt, ad d-tefk cḍeb, syin ad yentu deg lqaɛa u ad yefk imɣan-nniḍen. Asmi ara awḍen d imeqqranen, iferrawen-is ad ddlen lqaɛa, syin ad yekfu ddel n Fransa, ad teffeɣ seg wakal-nneɣ, ad tekfu teɛdawit gar leɛrac. Ihi, ar ass-a, tejra-nni mazal-itt, werǧin walaɣ tejra yecban tin, meqqret mačči d izli, tessewhem kra n win i tt-yeẓran. Terɣa acḥal n tikal, meɛna ttaxlafen-d yiẓuran-is. Taẓebbujt-a, d leɛnaya ɣef taddart’’. Mi newweḍ ɣer din, nufa d tidet d tejra i imeqqren nezzeh. Ulac-itt anda-nniḍen, ɣlin yifurkawen-is ɣer lqaɛa, syin uɣen, uɣalen d tiẓebbujin s timmad-nsen. Ma d timerɣiwt-nni i treqq, axater ttecɛalen ticemmaɛin, wid i tt-yettẓurun, ɣer lǧedra-s, dɣa, tettaṭṭaf deg-s tmes. Taggara-a, xedmen amekkan i tcemmuɛin u gan-as siman i lqaɛa-s. Deg taggara, tenna-d Nna Faḍma asefru-a :

 <em> ‘’Ay amaɣar Oufettouche ay izem, </em>

 <em>  Win i ak-iẓuren, yewhem, </em>

 <em> Yeḍleb iɣimi-s d ṛṣul. </em>

 <em> Aḥbib-is, d Jebrayel’’. </em>

  Ṭtarma n uɣilas. 

 ‘’izem d Ḥend i t-yenɣan, cciɛa-s d Abusliman’’. Yella yiwen umekkan qqaren-as Ṭtarma n uɣilas, ddaw n taddart, deg tama n uẓaɣar-is. Ɣef wakken i d-nnan, yella, zik, yizem dinna, yefka-asen axessar, yessenger kra n win i d-yemmugger, ama d amdan neɣ d aɣersiw. amekkan-nni, d akkal n tfellaḥt akked tkessaw. ihi, At Wafir nṭṭaren mačči d izli. Akken, akken, armi d yiwen wass, yekker yiwen urgaz bu tissas, yenɣa-t. mi t-yenɣa, yusa-d lqayed ɣur-s yenna-s ad d-yini d akken d netta i t-yenɣan, meḥsub d lqayed i yenɣan izem-nni. Ihi, syin i d-yeggra wanzi ‘’Izem d Ḥend i t-yenɣan, cciɛa-s d Abusliman.’’ Acu kan, mačči ala deg tama-agi i t-qqaren !

  At Wafir d Wat Jennad. 

 At Wafir d Wat Jennad d lǧiran aɛdawen, zgan d imenɣi : awi-d kan ad d-afen sebba. Ḥekkun-d, d akken yiwet n tikkelt ttemcaqlalen ɣef umnar n tala. D lweqt-nni, ad meslen ablaḍ aɣezzfan, ttaran-t d amnar i tala. Ihi, mi d-yewweḍ yiḍ ad d-asen Wat Jennad ad t-awin, ad t-rren i tala-nni-nsen, azekka-nni azal, ad ruḥen Wat Wafir, ad t-id-rren s amekkan-is : ad t-rren i tala-nsen. Akken kan armi i asen-tt-fran wiyaḍ gar-asen.

  Tissira n tmazirt d Yifri n Ubuɛemmar 

 Tissira n tmazirt d Yifri n Ubuɛemmar d inigan ɣef tgemmi akked tɣerma tamaziɣt. Ha-ten-in, qqimen akken mehmel. Ur yelli win i d-yelhan s useḥbiber-nsen. Limer i d ak-terbiḥ ay ul, neɣ deg tmurt-nniḍen i d-zgan, tili imekwan am wigi, ttuneḥsaben d agerruj. Ad naf daxel-nsen, tira d wunuɣen i d-icergen tallit, i d-yettmeslayen ɣef umezruy n tmurt. Later i d-yemmalen d akken d nekni i d imezwura ɣer tmurt-a, ma mazal llan wid yettcakkan deg yiman-nsen. Akken i as-yenna winna ‘’Ad teẓreḍ i ixeddem usexser, mi ara yaɣ amekkan di tmussni’’. Ass-a, yebda la yettaɣ usexser deg yiẓra-agi… Abuuuuuuh

  Kra n wudmawen 

  Icennayen :  Amar Sarsour, Akli Derouaz, Karim Adar…

 Agrawliw ameqqran : Ali Bellout 

 D waṭas-nniḍen n yal aḥric.

 Deg taggara, ad snemreɣ imeddukal, Said (Idir) Djennad, aselway n tiddukla Imnar, Nacer Oukacha, Dahmane Saadi akked Nna Faḍma, mebla ma ttuɣ imezdaɣ n taddart akken ma llan. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M   

  
 Almi d ass iɛeddan n 14 deg ɣuct 2016, i d-iɛum lebḥer n yimezdaɣ n taddart n Ayt Idris, taɣiwant n Tsexriwt, i yeggugen s wazal n 55 n yikilumiṭren seg waɣir n Bgayet. At temnaḍt-a tamsedrart reglen ass n acer 14 deg ɣuct abrid aɣelnaw wis tẓa (9), ugin ad tili tikli n tkeryas imi ur muggent teɣladin n tɣellist (parapets de sécurité) deg Yifalan. Ass-nni dɣa d igiman (luluf) n tkeryas i yessetnan d tazrart ta deffir ta, tasebḥit n wass, ulac sanda ad rrent. Almi d-yerza uselway n tdayra iqennaɛ-iten-id mi d-yenna ur ttɛeṭṭilen ad bdun n lecɣal-is imi tarmist (entreprise) tettwaṭṭef yakan. Sebba n waya aṭas i tt-yeẓran, imi teqqen srid ɣer twaɣit n usehwu (accident) n tikli i d-yeḍran ass n 10 deg wayyur-a deg ubrid iweɛren n Yifalan, yegla s ukuẓ n yiẓiɣren. Tlata seg yiwet n twacult, tayeḍ d tayyawt seg Rrif, tesbeḥ-d i twacult-nni yakan. Ass-nni, yuɣ lḥal abrid-nni yella yebzeg s tmiqwa timezwura n ugeffur i d-yeɣlin fell-as, rrant-t d amaccag. Mi d-isubb syin umerḥum bu 36 n yiseggasen, yecceg yerwel-as ukamyun-is ɣer ucruf. Seg setta n yiterrasen i ttuɣ deg-s, ala snat n tegrudin i yeddren s kra n lejruḥ, ɣlint-d mi akken yettekruttay deg ṭṭuq ukamyun-nni. Abrid n Yifalan dɣa, seg waṭas aya netta yettban-d d amihi ameqqran i wid yekkan seg-s. Maca wid i terza taluft n uqeɛɛed ur d-rran awellih i ɣur-s, ɣas aṭas n yinehharen i t-ineccden deg tallit n unebdu ladɣa. Ulama sseknen-aɣ-d yimḍebbren n tɣiwant n Tsexriwt yiwen n ukaɣeḍ i ufrag n umkan-nni, mu ssawalen Taɛettabt, i yettuɣalen i useggas n 2013 aya !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Sin yiseggasen –agi kan segmi i d-tlul tiddukkla n Soummam Aqbou, maca leqdic-is, yufrar-d s waṭas deg unnar. Yal taggara n ddurt, iɛeggalen n tiddukkla-a, ttheggin-d tirza ɣer kra n taddart. Teddun yid-sen imejjayen n leḥlalakat yemxalafen, am lehlak n ssker, wid n lehlak n wul akked d tmejjayin n lehlak n yidmaren ɣer tlawin. Ttawin yid-sen ddwawi d tɣawsiwin seqdacen. Xeddmen ayen iwumi qqaren ‘’Abeggen n lehlak di lawan’’ iwumi qqaren s tefransist” le dépistage “ akken ad yeɛlem umuḍin s lehlak-is ɣef zik lḥal uqbel ad yessiɣ deg-s, ladɣa imeqqranen yeddan di laɛmer. Nnig n 28 n turziwin ixedmen. Gar tudrin uɣur rzan, ad naf Sedduq wada, At Jemhur , Iɣil Ali , Tazmalt , At Mlikec, Icelladen , Iɣram, Truna akked d tudrin n lɛerc At Ɛidel s umata…atg. Azal n 4ooo n yimuḍan i duwan, nnig 180 n tfaṭurin n dwayat i fkan i wid ur nezmiren ara. Ɣer waya, yettili-d daɣen ibeddi ɣer tama n kra twaculin yenxessen ur sɛin ara tamezduɣt, ttɛawanen-ten di lebni…atg. Ttawin imejjayen n tnefsit ɣer yiɣerbazen, ttaken-d isaragen I lfayda n yinelmaden yettheggin iman-nsen ad sɛeddin ikayaden n BAC d BEM. Xeddmen timliliyin ideg i d-ttaɛraden imejjayen i wakken ad d-sfaḥmen i yimezdaɣ timental n waṭas n waṭṭanen n lqern, akka am lehlak n yidmaren , ssker , sida…atg . ”Ayen akka i nxeddem i yimezdaɣ, d lwajeb fell-aɣ, tajmilt ad tuɣal i yimawlan n lxir n temnaḍṭ n Soummam i d-yettaran i tiɣri-nneɣ yal tikelt. Ad ten-nesnemmer, gar-asen imḍebber n luzin n uyefki “Soummam” Lewnis Hamitouche i d-yettaken afus n lemɛawna, nebla ma ttuɣ imejjayen, Mass Nebbad, amejjay n wallen, Mass Sbayɛi amejjay n wul, Massa Fezwa tamejjayt n tuɣmas , akked d Mass Zakaria, Boubechir, Sehnun akked d Mass Melwi d wiyaḍ-nniḍen i iteddun yid-nneɣ yal tikelt’’ i d-yenna Mass Djernin Hamid s yisem-is d aselway n tidukla. Akka imi ara yili lebɣi, kulec ad yezmer ad d-yili, ad teqqim tiddukkla ” Soummam Akbou”, d amedya i tiyaḍ-nniḍen ma bɣant ad ddunt deg ubrid n lxir, lmeɛna d yibeddi ɣer tama n tmetti . <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim benhamouche 

  
 Lmecta d yiwet n taddart seg tudrin n Yilulen Usammer, tama n Uqbu. Seg 1985 d asawen, tuɣal tettekki ɣer tɣiwant tamaynut n Yiɣrem. Tebɛed ɣef ubrid aɣelnaw wis 26 s 13 n yikilumitren.

 Deg ugafa n tɣiwant i d-tezga. Zzint-as-d tlata tudrin : ɣer usammer, d tiɣilt Mexluf, At sellam tama wadda ; ɣer umalu akin i wasif, llan Yiɛzunen d udrar At Mlikec. S lbaɛd, taddart, tettban-d teddukkel s ufella n yiwet n tiɣilt, am tuget n tudrin n leqbayel. Ur tesgin ara icuḍaḍ-is, ur teferdaɛ ara am kra deg-sent. Ixxamen-is, ttbanen-d mebɛid, i tmuɣli amzun d adɣaɣ azerdxan s uqermud uzwiɣ, yeddal taddart am tzarbit. Ur tettwali ara tiṭ iberdan yettawin, ama gar yixxamen, ama ɣer lexlawi alamma iqerreb umzayer ɣur-s, d abrid ad yekcem. imir ara as-d-tefk taddart udem-is n tidet.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Taddart tuɣal d axrib 

 Ixxamen n tura d iqdimen. taqa deg-sen hruran, qqlen d ixriben imi ten-ǧǧan yimawlan-nsen.Yal yiwen anda inub i uqerruy-is. Am wid yunagen ɣer Fransa am wid yeqqimen di tmurt, bnan akk deg uzaɣar. Qqimen-d ala kra n medden, s tmara kan, tekkes-asen-tt tezmert, wanag ḍfiren ula d nutni. D tidet, yewɛer udrar, tudert n tmara ur tufiḍ win ara ten-yedmen d aḥric, ad as-hwun. kra n win yefɣen teḍra-yas am ibariq: ulac tuɣalin. lqella tessalez ulawen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Kra seg umezruy n taddart  

 Taddart n lmecta am nettat am tudrin n tudrin n Yilulen Usammer. Tedder kra n tegnatin weɛrit di lqern wiss 16, segmi tugi ad tt-xelles tbzart i Ahmed Ulqadi n tgelda n Kuku , dɣa llan-d waṭas n yimenɣiyen akked d iserdasen n tgelda n Kuku. Ɣer waya, imezdaɣ n taddart n Lmecta, kkin di trad n 1857 deg Yicarriḍen mgal acengu afransis. Yegra-d di lemtal ɣer temɣarin n taddart, mi ara yezɛef akka uqcic deg uxxam, ticki yebɣa kra n tɣawsan, ad as-tin yaya-s :” Aεni tewwi-tt-id deg Yicarriḍḍen?”.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Lmecta d tegrawla n 54  

 At Lmecta am nutni am Yizzayriyen, xedmen ayen iwumi zemren di tegrawla n 54, ama s texriṭ ama s yidammen: 74 n yimeɣrasen i yeɣlin deg unnar n lḥarma ɣef timunent n Lezzayer, seg wakken yella laman deg yimezdaɣ , imjuhad rran sin yixxamen n taddart d sbiṭar i udawi n yimejraḥ.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tadamsa Abelluḍ d asafar 

 Abelluḍ d yiwen n usafar s wazal-is di tudert n yimezdaɣ, ayen i ten-yeǧǧan seḥbibiren fell-as. Zik, deg-s i d-tekksen awren s wayes i xeddmen aɣrum, seksu di talliyin yezrin ladɣa di lawan-nni n trad 45. Ula d lmal, ttaken-as-t d tagella lawan n udfel, ttcuḥun i usaɣur. Mebla ma nettu oxygène i d-ttakent, s waya ilaq tisutwin n wass-a, ad rrent azal i tsufa n ubelluḍ ma ur tent-tezzin ara, ur tent-serɣayen ara . Ar ass-a, mazal imezdaɣ, ṭṭfen di lɣella-agi. Llan wid i t-id-yettawin snuzen-t di ssuq. Llan kra-nniḍen, ttelḥaqen-t d leɛlaf i lmal, lawan n tegrest.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tigemmi d wansayen “Tacemmlit n uzemmur n Sidi Sliman” 

 Si zik i tella tcemlit-agi. Yal mi ara d-tawweḍ tallit n ulqad n uzemmur, imezdaɣ n taddart xeddmen lufeq. Yettili ubarreḥ , yal ass n lǧemɛa ttemlilin-d ɣer umraḥ n taddart, ttasen-d anda bɣun ilin xeddmen tacemlit i wakken ad d-cerwen azemmur n Sidi Sliman, ttruḥun d tirebuyaɛ, tulawin leqdent di lqaɛa. S usbuɣer d cnawi. Asmi ara yekfu uzemmur-nni, xeddmen timecreḍt. Ma d zzit i d-wwin saǧawen-tt. Tadrimt i d- wwin, xeddmen s yis-s lecɣalat n taddart , teldin iberdan, ttaɣen tiqebrin, ttawin-d tiliwa n waman …atg.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ttbiyita n tefsut 

 yal mi ara d-taweḍ tefsut, imezdaɣ ttemlilin-d deg lemqam n Sidi Sliman, xeddmen ttbiyita, ayen iwumi qqaren lweɛda di kra n temnaḍin-nniḍen n tmurt n leqbayel, ttseddiqen-d medden izgaren, lxuḍra, d yisuffar-nniḍen s wayes ttnawalen seksu. Ma d iswi-ines, d asemlili n yimezḍaɣ akked yinebgawen i d-yettasen si yal tamnaṭ, ttemyusanen, ttmeẓran medden. Yettili ugraw anda ttseddiqen medden, tettili daɛwa lxir sɣur imɣaren n taddart. Ass-a, taddart lmecta, teqqim-d kan i tirza n tukksa lxiq s cbaḥa n ugama-ines, d tamurt n lejdud. Nessaram ad d-uɣalen imezdaɣ-is ɣur-s , ad tili teɛmer am zik-nni. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim Benhamouche 

 
  
 Assia Djebbar d yiwet n temyarut id d-ijebden ɣur-es tamuɣli n tɣamsa, tin n iselmaden, inelmaden, d imusnawen d wid yettnadin ladɣa deg weḥric n tsekla d umezruy, deg wasmi tegger aqeddim amezwaru deg tira. Tameṭṭut-agi tluled d Fatma-Zohra Imalayène 30 yulyu 1936 di lwilaya n Chechel. Baba-s, yellan d aselmad, yella ager wid is-yefkan afud ameqran. Yemma-s, ula d nettat, twelleh-itt ɣer webrid n tira. D tacawrat asmi teǧǧa lezzayer akken ad d-as ɣer Paris anda tekcem ɣer tesnawit Fénelon. D nettat id tamezwarut ger imyura n lmeɣreb i ykecmen  ɣer “l’académie ” n Fransa deg 2005. Amecwar-is n tira tebdat-id s “fad», La soif, ungal id d-yefɣen ɣer temkarḍiyin deg useggas n 1957. Zyada ɣef tira n wungalen d yedlisen, Assia Djebar, d-yettwabdren atas n tikkal ɣer waraz Nobel n tsekla, tessefra, tedhad d unezgum lak d uselmed n umezruy deg tesdawit.  Ungalen ttfaɣen-d ɣer temkerdiyin d inilban. Ungalen i yettwasuqlen ɣer wazal n 23 n tutlayin. Atas n yemnadiyen , ladɣa deg wehric n tsekla, i yufan deg wungalen n Assia annar n unadi ɣef umezru, d wayen tettidir tmettut ladɣa tazzayrit deg yiwet n tmetti is-ikeblen tilelli-ines 90. Lwelhas tezzi ula ɣer cinema, ahric deg ayeg d-eǧǧa isura s wayes id d-ewwi arazen. Assia tesselmed daɣen deg marikan tasekla. Tigejdit agi d-igemren yak deg yehricen n yedles tewwed laɛfu n Rebbi ass n 6 fuṛaṛ di Paris.

<p style="text-align: right;">Fatiha K.

  
 Ass n sem 04 deg meɣres 2016 yella-d usmekti n umedyaz ameqqran yettwasnen s Muḥmed At Ṭahar qqaren-as Benḥanafi , ilul ass n 07 deg furar deg useggas n 1927 deg taddart n Sidi Ʃatman deg tɣn wat wasif n Tizi Wezzu .

 Seg wasmi yella d amecṭuḥ iruḥen yimawlan-is ad zedɣen deg Tiyaret , yexdem deg tegrawla n tmurt-nneɣ akken tebda , yeṭṭef adeg-ik iḥureb aɛdaw aṛumi ssawalen-as lkumisaṛ aserti ( commissaire politique) , d argaz aserti d ameɣras n tmurt Lzzayer , iḥemmel tamurt-is iḥemmel idles , ḥemmlent akk medden , yexdem aṭ deg umaṭṭaf wis sin , yeqdec seg wul-is imi lawan-nni ala amaṭṭaf wis sin i yellan mačči am tura tella l’internet , tiliẓri ; yeqdec deg tedwilin –agi : tibḥirin, ijeğğigen , aman isemmaḍen , nuba-nwen ay ilmeẓyen , tudrin n leqbayel, icennayen n uzekka, nuba n yimğuhad, ɣef yiri n lkanun, d tagi i d tadwilt-is taneggarut , nezmer ad d-nini tudert-is yefka-tt akk deg umaṭṭaf wis sin d netta i aɣ-yezzuzunen zik ad tceɛleḍ radyu uqbel ad tegneḍ ad as-tselleḍ i wawal-is aḥlawan dayen yesewhamen deg wanec-ten nni yellan deg wallaɣ-is isefra-s sɛan anamek cebḥen mi ara ten-id-yeqqar ad ak-yawi wallaɣ-ik mbeɛid , ayen iɣef teseqsaḍ ad ak-id –yerr yerna mačči d win yettzuxun , yettara iman-is d menwala kan ,yettɛaddi ɣer tseddawiyin , yettak tamussni-s i yiseddawiyin d yiselmaden , iḥemmel amezruy-nneɣ, yenna-d deg wawal-is win ur nessin ara amezruy n tmurt-is mačči d amdan , aṭas ur neẓri ara belli Belḥanafi yugi ad yeqbel ad yettxelliṣ idrimen n yimğuhad, ur t-yeffiɣ ara leɛqel ɣef udrim, ayen d-nenna fell-as drus yedder ɣef tmussni yemmut ɣef tmussni ass n 04 deg meɣres aseggas n 2012 ad fell-as yeɛfu Rebbi, tajmilt tettuɣalas ama deg uxxam n yidles n Mulud At Mɛemmer , ama deg wat wasif, At Yanni, Bgayet , deg umaṭṭaf wis sin ….mačči d amdan i zemren ad ttun lɣaci.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia yahia 

  
 Zik, di tudrin n Leqbayel, akken ad ǧǧen ad yeww lexrif i medden merra, ad ikkes bab n lexla, ad ikkes yigellil, ttarran yimsewqen n taddart lexḍa (lḥaq): ulac win ara d-yekksen lexrif alamma berḥen. Assen mi kksen lexḍa, ffɣen medden tanezzayt, ruḥen rzan ɣer tferkiwin-nsen, ad d-kksen lexrif. Yiwen n yigellil, ur isi ara taferka, ur as-d-yeǧǧi ara baba-s akal, iqqim di tejmat weḥd-s, lɣaci tteddin d tirebba, ulac win t-id-iluan, ulac win i as-yennan: ‘’yya ma ad teddudḍ ad d-tekkseḍ’’. Iqqim, dɣa yewwi-d asefru : ‘’Ass lexmis taṣebḥit Nebhen imsewqen-is Ad kksen lexḍa Albaḍ iruḥ a lmelk-is, Netta d zwaǧ-is Ɣer-sen amzun d lficṭa Baba tebra tmeṭṭut-is Ad truḥ seg yiri-s Immut ur d-iǧǧi ara’’.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane LASHEB 

  
 Akken yella lḥal, werɛad i d-tekcem tegrest s sin n yiḍarren-is deg yixxamen n at yidurar, bac ad yili ugeffur d win idumen, asemmiḍ igezzmen, ed yideflawen daɣen. Maca tuget n medden ḥulfan yakan i uzaflali n ccetwa imi aql-aɣ deg-s, ɣas ma ussan n ṭṭyab iɛeddan slid talemmast n tefsut i d-smektayen. Ɣef taluft-a n umuger n ugris ed useḥmu, iban-d taggara-ya ugur d ageɛmir ɣur medden: timernit deg ssuma n umaẓuṭ ed ugaz seg umenzu n yennayer 2016. Kra n wid yellan sseqdacen ihi ttawilat n useḥmu i iteddun s yisufar-a n sseht, atnan ḥaren amek ara qablen tasemhuyt (saison) n uḥḥunǧer s teɣzi-is. Ladɣa imi, ɣef yisallen i d-yeffɣen deg tɣamsa, tezmer ad taweḍ tlitert n umaẓuṭ alama d 18.85 n yidinaren. D ayen i yeǧǧan dɣa tuget n medden zzin si tura ɣer wayen nniḍen, ɣer ttawil-nni aqbur n teqburin, ɣer uzdam ed usqucceḍ seg tẓegwa. «Ala isɣaren i nettwali ggran-d d tifrat i twaɣit-a n ussaɣli ɣas ma yewɛer rnu yeɛteb ccɣel-nsen. Ma d litra n lmaẓut ulac win ara iɛemmden ɣef lǧib-is ad tt-id-yaɣ s 19 n yidinaren ala ma i tkerrust-is». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel. Akka i ttwalin ihi lɣaci taluft si tura, ɣas ma ula d ikeccuḍen ur llin d wid yuggden deg umadaɣ am zik, am yiqejmuren yettenḍeggaren, am ttjur, uqan merra almi aṭas. Rnu ɣer-s, ɣas ahat nuḥen yimeḍqan da ed din gerrzen ayendin i uzdam, wanag tuɣal tukksa n tzedmin s uxelles !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Xilla n medden i iḥemmlen tiliẓri, zgan neṭḍen ɣer lemri-ines, ṭṭafaren ayen i d-yettɛeddayen deg-s. Seg tedwilin, ccna, iɣmisen, llan daɣen yisura. Iban dakken win, neɣ tin i yettferriǧen i yisura-nni, ad naf seg-sen kra n wid i ten-yesmenyifen ad asen-isel s tutlayt-is netta, mačči s tmeslayt-nniḍen. Ma neddem-d amedya, ad nefren atmaten izwawen. Segmi i asen-d-tusa tegnit ad ttwalin ayen i ten-icudden, gran ɣur-s s tumert, ttabaɛen-t s zzux. Acu kan ɣas ma yella d tidet nelḥa asurif ɣer sdat, ur neqqim deg yiwen n wadeg, maca mazal nẓer lexsas deg yiḥricen. Am yisura i d-yettaffaɣen di yal taswiɛt, win i yesɛan tirmit deg umaḍal n tmuɣli d tamawt, ad d-yini dakken aqeddic n wid akk i yettekkayen deg lebni n usaru, mačči d ummid i yella, ur igerrez ara. «Deg yisura n teḍsa, ttwaliɣ aswir yelha, ileḥḥu ɣer sdat. Am Luhama 5, tehwa-yi aṭas. Ma d isura-nniḍen, ulac, kerheɣ akk ad ten-ẓreɣ. Ilaq ad yili ufran n wid i ara d-yuraren, yerna ad ilin d wid i d-iɛeddan seg umezgun». I d-yenna yiwen n gma-tneɣ seg Tubiret. Ur nettaf ara ula d amaynut deg yisura-nneɣ, qrib dima ttarun yiwen n usinaryu d teqsiḍt, izeffanen(comédiens), daɣen, ur ssinen ad steɛemlen akken iwata, ad d-banen s wudem n tsemdanit tis snat i asen-yettunefken deg usaru. Asufeɣ tikwal ur t-nettaf ara yelha deg yal taɣawsa, ladɣa deg usiweḍ n ssut d ssfa n tugniwin. Mačči d ugur, neɣ d sin i d-nettmaggar deg yisura n teqbaylit. Acimi ur d-ttnulfayen ara yiɣerbazen n useḥfeḍ n tmellaɣt(comédie), akken ad tt-sseɣren yimazzagen d Wat tirmit? Ayɣer ur yettmagga ufran i wid i yuklalen ad ilin deg usaru? Iwacu ur xeddmen ara ajerreb s yikayaden n BAC mačči d menwala ara yeṭṭfen ayen i t-yexḍan? … D isteqsiyen qqimen ddewwiren, ɛellqen deg yiqerruyen n wid i yebɣan ad neddu ɣer sdat, ad nessali aswir-nneɣ am tmura-nniḍen i yewwḍen taqacuct, neɣ tid i ileḥḥun ɣer wannect-nni. Niḥqa d awezɣi ad yelḥeq yiwen iswi-ines iɣef yettnadi, ḥala s leqdic s leḥsabat, war ma nettu leɛtab daɣen. Yal aɣbel yesɛa tifrat, ihi ilaq ad nefsi leqyud, ad nfiq i wayen i aɣ-imenɛen ad nezger iɛewwiqen-nneɣ. Nessaram ad nwali areqqaɛ deg yisura n tezwawt, ad ttwaseggment tuccḍiwin deg yal tama. Ad yelhu ccɣel mi ara yekfu, akken ad aɣ-yehwu. Nessaram mi ara nettmuqul taqsiḍt ad tt-nedder, ɣas ulamma d asnulfu kan, ad nḥulfu yis-s d tidet, ad nesfaydi seg-s daɣen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaïssa Khalifi 

  
 Segmi yettwabṭel ilindi umsizwer Lwennas n Ayt Lewnis (Meɛtub) n tmedyezt, i d-yesmektayen anaẓur ed umdan amḥaddi, tuɣal-d aseggas-a Tesbeddit (fondation) Lwennas Meɛtub, deg uqerruy-is Malika, s tiɣri nniḍen i tikkin i umsizwer d amaynut deg teẓrigt-is tamenzut; wa d amsizwer n ccna i yettwasemman « Anza n Lwennas ». Kra n win i yebɣan ihi ad yekki, atan tɛerreḍ-it tesbeddit i d-nebder, ad iger asurif ɣer uxxam-is deg Tewrirt Musa akken ad ijerred iman-as, aya seg 24 deg yennayer ɣer 15 deg yunyu n useggas-a n 2016. Neɣ ad yessiwel ɣer: 020 61 59 29, neɣ 0552 79 09 80. «Nwala dakken aṭas n yilemẓiyen i d-yettnekkaren ṭṭafaren abrid n ccna i d-yewwi Lwennas. D aya i aɣ-yeǧǧan ad d-neg amsizwer-a n ccna…». Wa d kra seg wayen i d-tenna uletma-s n uɣewwaɣ, Malika Meɛtub, deg uẓeṭṭa inmetti. Ad d-nesmekti belli yella yetturaǧu kra ad yili almi dayen kan, ladɣa seg tama n yimedyazen, imi ilindi ur yemmug umsizwer-nni n tmedyezt i nnumen yal anebdu. Dɣa, imir-nni mi nesteqsa Malika Meɛtub ɣef tsebbiwt, tenna-yaɣ-d teqqen ama i wallalen neɣ i tegnatin n teswiɛt-nni, maca yezmer ad d-uɣalen s kra d amaynut. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Taggara n ddurt-agi yezri, terra tdukla n yimeɣban d wdi yenḥafen “Soummam” s lemɛawna d yimḍebbar n luzin “Yaourt soummamu tajmilt tameqqrant i yixeddamen n tɣiwant yettukelfen s tezdeg n yizenqan d tudrin I d-yezzin i temdint n Uqbu. Tella-d temlilit yiwet deg usensu Atlantis I d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Uqb anda i ttuferqen warrazen i wazal n 110 n yixeddamen. ”Nekni ur nsetḥa ara s yixeddim-agi-nneɣ, d asizdeg, nefraḥ aṭas s tejmilt-agi, d ayen ara d-yernun afud i yixeddamen”, i d-yenna yiwen n uxeddam . D tikelt tamezwarut i yeḍra ccɣel icuban wagi di temnaḍt n Ssumam. Ixeddamen n tezdeg d yiwet n tecriḥt di tmetti-nneɣ i yuklalen aṭas n leqdar, imi tezdeg d aɣbel-nsen n yal ass. Ixeddamen n tezdeg n Uqbu uklalen aṭas n leqder, ladɣa send aɣlaq n ugudu n tɣiwant n Uqbu nnig n sin wagguren. Asmi yefra wugur-nni, din din, ixeddamen n tezdeg deg wazal 8 wussan, xeddmen deg yiḍ deg wass almi jemɛen akk iḍumman yellan deg yiberdan. “Imi asizdeg d useḥbiber ɣef ugama, ilaq ad yili d aɣbel n medden akk. Nessaram yal yiwen deg-neɣ ad yessixfef taɛkemt fell-asen. Ma ur nessaweḍ ara ad nessizdeg , ur nettdeggir ara iḍumman di yal amkan” i d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ. Tajmilt meqqren i yixeddamen n tezdeg.

  B.Benhamouche 

  
 Xedmen, ddurt iɛeddan, yinelmaden n ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ n tesdawit Lmulud At Mɛemmar n Tizi Uzzu, ibeddi sdat n Tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Bdan tikli seg tesdawit n Hasnaoua alamma d tawwurt n tenmehla. Yella-d uqbel deg tsebḥit n wass uḥbas ɣef leqraya, syin d ibeddi sdat n tewwurt n tenmehla n usegmi. Deg ubrid-nsen, mi teddun ɣer umekkan n yibeddi, ɛelqen-d akk tiferkiwin uran deg-sent: “I uṣenṣeb n tmaziɣt iṣeḥḥan”, “Nessḥasef ɣef wuṭṭun n yimukan n uxeddim n tmaziɣt”, “Neṭṭalab aselmed n tmaziɣt deg akk lwilayat n tmurt”…atg. ibeddi-agi-nsen, yella-d mi d-yesawel umazday n ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ i tikli meqqren, imi ssḥasfen aṭas ukayad n uselmed ara d-yilin ass n 29 yunyu i d-iteddun. Membɛed mi ur ttwanefken ara imeḍqan i uselmed n tmaziɣt deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ama deg uɣerbaz amenzu neɣ deg uɣerbaz alemmas neɣ deg tesnawit. Mi wwḍen ɣer tewwurt n tenmehla-agi, ɣran-d ulɣu-nsen i xedmen yakkan, ssuturen deg-s: aseqdec n tmaziɣt deg tedbelt, aselmed-ines deg useggas amezwaru n uɣerbaz amenzu, d uselmed-is deg 48 n lwilayat n tmurt, tulya n ukayad uzzig i tmaziɣt, imi tikkelt-agi ur d as-id-fkin ara imukan i tmaziɣt deg Tizi Uzzu, yerna ala 57 n yimukan i d-tefka tneɣlaft n usegmi deg wakal akk n tmurt. Ssuturen diɣen tukksa n ttesriḥ i wid ur nebɣi ara ad ɣren tamaziɣt, ilaq ad tt-qqaren akk am taɛrabt, asnerni n wazal-is seg 2 alamma d 4 neɣ xersum 3…atg. Qqimen dina ugar n ssaɛa, meslayen yiɛeggalen n umazday n tmaziɣt, meslayen-d daɣen yisdawanen, yiselmaden, wid yesɛan yakkan turagt n licence neɣ master, ɣef yir liḥala n uselmed n tmaziɣt. Nesteqsa Farida, d tanelmadt deg useggas wis sin n master tenna-d: “ Nexdem tigawt-agi i wakken ad d-nbeggen lɣiḍ-nneɣ ɣef yimukan n uxeddim ur d-nṣuḥ ara lwilaya-nneɣ. Imi ɣef 10 000 n yimeḍqan imaynuten yellin i ukayad n uselmed n useggas aɣurbiz 2017-2018, ala 57 n yimeḍqan i d-iṣuḥen tamaziɣt , yerna deg Tizi Uzzu ula d yiwen n umkan ulac-it. Am wakken akk neẓra belli llan ugar n 1000 n yisdawanen i isɛan turagin n tmaziɣt, zemren ad seɣren, maca ur asen-tettunefk ara tegnit, imi ur d-llin ara imeḍqanen n uxeddim i tmaziɣt ».

  Amazigh Ghani 

  
 Tiddukkla tadelsant ‘Amezyab n lehna’ n taddart n Boudjelil, yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Irdjen, thegga-d ahil ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan, i lmend n usmekti n umulli wis 37 n Tefsut n yimaziɣen n useggas 1980 akked wis 16 n tTefsut taberkant n useggas 2001. Leqdic-agi adelsan, yella-d uqbel ttiɛad-agi s ddurt, imi ass-nni n lǧemɛa 14 deg yebrir i d ass amezwaru n leqdic-agi i d-yellan deg Uxxam n yilmeẓyen i yellan deg tlemmast n taddart n Boudjelil. Ma d ayen i d-yellan d ahil i wass-nni n sem, yella-d akka: ɣef 8h00 tella-d temlilit d yimsikniyen, ma ɣef 9h00 yella-d usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen deg usebdad n Yimaziɣen, sakin ɣef 10h00 llant-d tnagiyin ɣef 20 yebrir, sɣur wid iḥedren tallit-nni qerriḥen. Ma i tmeddit n wass, tella-d ɣef 13h30 tɣuri n yisefra, sɣur waṭas n yimedyazen d tmedyazin, syin d taceqquct n umezgun seg 16h00 d afella. Ma d ass n sed 15 seg yebrir, i yellan d ass win sin ideg yemdel leqdic-agi tiwwura-s, llant-d deg-s waṭas n temsikniyin yemgraden n tmagit tamaziɣt, ma ɣef 13h30 tella-d tmeɣra meqqren n ccna, ideg ɣennan waṭas n yifennanen, ma ɣer tagara akk yella-d ufraq n yigerdasen n uttekki i yimsikniyen.

  Ghani Amazigh  

  
 Idles d iles , agrud yeqqaren ass-a d win yettḥezziben i uzekka : Taɣuri tesɛa azal meqqren di tmetti imi d tin i d-ittrebin, d tin i yessnarnayen deg wallaɣ n umdan, d tin i yessimɣuren di ccan n leǧnas. Ihi tagi d yiwet n teɣri i d-yeffɣen si taddart n At Wizgan. Tikti-agi d asnulfu n yiwet n temkarḍit taɣelnawt di taddart. Ad yebdu usenfar akka : ur yyettɣimi ara kan udlis di temkarḍit, meɛna ad yelḥu : ad tafet di leqhawi, di tḥuna, deg wallalen n usiweḍ. S umata, anda akk ttilin imdanen, zemren ad affen idlisen i tɣuri. Yal afus yettak-it i wayeḍ, acu kan axeddim n ssaḥ, ha-t-an gar yifassen n Wat taddart imi ilaq ɣef yal yiwen, ad yessers azal n sin neɣ kraḍ n yidlisen. Akka, yal yiwen ad yefk afus n eamɛawna i tikti-agi akken ad tebdu tilḥin, ad tuɣal d asenfar ara d-yawin lɣella i wallaɣen n yimdanen , imi taɣuri d tin yessufuɣen allaɣ n umdan si lḥebs, tettruẓu-as leqyud akken ad yeffeɣ ɣer tlelli . D ayen ara yefken, daɣen, afud i yimyura i wakken ad kemmlen deg wayen xeddmen. S wanect-a, ad yettwazuzer yidles n tɣuri, ad yennerni s usenfar-a i d-yebdan di taddart n At Wizgan, ahat d win ara yeṭṭreḍqen di tuddrin-nniḍen. 

  S. Yamani  

  
 Yella-d leqdic n wass-nni amezwaru 19 ɣuct 2017, deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, d Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεmmer n temdint-agi d Tneḍfart-is n Azazga, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, Tazeqqa n ssinima n Tizi Uzzu, s tallelt n waṭas n yimεiwnen yecban: Aɣerbaz amniḍan n tẓurin iffazen n Azazga, Tasqamut n leqdicat idelsan d wid n tẓuri, Asalay amniḍan n umeɣras…atg, suddsen-d ass-nni n sendiḍelli akked yiḍelli (19-20) deg waggur-agi ideg nella, kra n leqdicat idelsanen swayes i d-smektan anejmuɛ n Ṣummam n 20 ɣuct 1956 deg taddart n Yifri, akked wass aɣelnaw n umeɣras, i d-yettilin yal aseggas deg was n 20 ɣuct. Yella-d leqdic n wass-nni amezwaru 19 ɣuct 2017, deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Yebda usmekti-agi s wudem unṣib ɣef 9h00 s snat temsikeniyin: yiwet akked tezrigin n yidlisen yerzan amezruy, tayeḍ temsikent n yimagraden n tɣamsa, tugniwin….atg. Ma deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun, yella-d usenɛet n usaru-nni n umeɣras Krim Belkasem, n umsufeɣ Ahmed Rachdi , syin akkin d taɣuri n yisefra n ṭrad sɣur waṭas n yimedyazen, ama d wid meẓẓiyen neɣ d wid meqqren. Ma d iḍelli 20 ɣuct 2017, deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin, kemmlent snat-nni n temsikniyin n sendiḍelli, ma deg tzeqqa n tmeɣriwin yella-d ɣef 10h00 usenɛet usarun-nni “D argaz a mmi” n umsufeɣ Ahcene Hesmani. Ma ɣef 14h00 deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun, llant-d tnagiyin d yisaragen ɣef ass aɣelnaw n umeɣras d unejmuɛ n Ṣummam, sɣur kra n yimjuhad n temnaḍt-agi. Ma d leqdic i d-yellan iḍelli n lhed deg Tneḍfert n uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mɛemmer n Azazga, yella-d akka: Yebda usmekti-agi s wudem unṣib ɣef 9h00 s snat temsikeniyin, yiwet akked tezrigin n yidlisen yerzan amezruy, tayeḍ d temsikent n yimagraden n tɣamsa, tugniwin….atg. Ma ɣef 10h00 d afella, yella-d usenɛet n usaru n “Krim Belkacem” n umsufeɣ Ahmed Rachdi. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella deg waṭas n yimeḍqan-nniḍen, yecban : Tamkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n Tizi Uzzu, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, Tazeqqa n ssinima, Ulmis adelsan Tahar Djaout n Uẓeffun…atg. Mebla ma nettu tirza-nni i asen-xedmen i yiɛeggalen n Tiddukkla n tuǧǧal n yimjuhad 1954-1962, ɣer taddart n Yifri deg Bgayet.

  A. A. 

  
 Baha Mansour d aselmad n tmaziɣt deg Merruk. Yewwi-d awal ɣef wuguren i d-yettmagar deg unnar.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Deg tazwara, amek iga waddad n usɣer n tmaziɣt di Merruk? 

  Baha Mansoub:  Akken tessnem, addad n uselmed n tutlayt tamaziɣt di Meṛṛuk am netta am wayen yakk yerzan tamaziɣt d temmuzɣa. Di tmazirt-agi, ulac tayri i wakken ad d-rren azal-is i tutlayt, i yidles, i tɣerma, d yizerfan n umdan, ama d wid n tmeṭṭut neɣ n urgaz… Asɣer azayez d tawaɣit i meṛṛa tangiwin i yettuɣran di tinmel (aɣerbaz) tawmeṛṛukt am tefransist, taɛrabt, tusnakt, amezruy… Ahil i yettuɣran yesɛa aṭas n tektiwin tiberkanin… Agemmuḍ-is d yiwen n umdan i iḥeqqren iman-is. Maca tamaziɣt, rnan-as tafesna di twaɣit. Ar ass-a, drus n yiɣerbazen ideg tettwasɣaray tmaziɣt. Yenna Meɛtub : « ur riɣ ad tettuɣer tmaziɣt di tinmel yuḍnen », tura zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ nwis tugdi n Dda Lwennas, tuɣal d tidet di Meṛṛuk.

  Ahat ttewɛirent kra n tlufa i yinelmaden imi timsirin ɣur-wen s tfinaɣ? 

 Tira s tfinaɣ, zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ ur wɛirent ara aṭas. Ttelmaden-tent yinelmaden s tazzla. as yelmeḍ ulemmud-ines i yinelmaden d tnelmadin, maca ulac idlisen yettwarun s tfinaɣ. S umata seg unadi ussnan yettwaggen seg tekcumi n Yiṛumiyen ɣer tmurt-nneɣ yella s usekkil alatini. Ar ass-a, imura imaziɣen yakk ttarun s usekkil alatini. Nekni tura mi nesselmad tamaziɣt s tfinaɣ, inelmaden ulac d acu ara ɣren, slid kra n tmucuha i d-yessufeɣ Usinag Ageldan n Yidles Amaziɣ (IRCAM), gma-s n Useqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa (HCA). Tuddsa tazayezt i yettɛebbin anezgum n tmaziɣt s tɣarast (manière) n udabu.

  Acimi mačči s yisekkilen n tlatinit i tesɣarayem? 

 Deg useggas n 2001, yessenṣeb udabu asekkil-agi iwumi qqaren tifinaɣ-IRCAM, deffir ufran-is sɣur Useqqamu Adeblan n Usinag. Deg umezwaru deɣren igmamen-is i usekkil alatini d win n teɛrabt d win n tfinaɣ, deg tsutelt tis snat deɣren yakk i usekkil n tfinaɣ. Nessen meṛṛa taɣtest n usekkil ur telli d tin n udɣar (vote), maca tella d tin n yimussnawen d yimuzzag n tesnilest am: Salem Caker, Qaḍi Qeddur, Dda Lmumud, Bujemɛa Lhebbaz… Meṛṛa wigi d wiyaḍ-nniḍen gan aṭas n tezrawin, ttinin i wakken tamaziɣt ad teddu ɣer sdat yuccel (ilaq) asekkil alatini. D acu kan adabu ameṛṛuki, yesɛa addud-nniḍen. Nekni s Yimaziɣen, ur ilaq ara ad yesɛu yal yiwen tamaziɣt-is d usekkil-is. Yuccel ad nili deg yiwen n ubrid ma nra tafat i yimal n tutlayt-nneɣ.

  Kunwi s yiselmaden, d anwi uguren i d-tettmagarem deg leqdic-nwen? 

 Ilaq ad ssentiɣ awal seg useggas n 2003 asmi teṛẓem tinmel tameṛṛukit tiwwura-ines i tutlayt n Yugerten, mi xedmen i yiselmaden d tselmadin i yessawalen s tmaziɣt asileɣ n kṛaḍ n wussan. Ad as-tiniḍ wigi yessawalen kra n tutlayt zemren ad tt-sseɣren. Ar useggas anemlan n 2012/2013 i iɛebba uɣlif n usegmi anamur taɣtest i wakken ad yessileɣ iselmaden imazzagen deg tmaziɣt. Ssufɣen-d 80 n yiselmaden d tselmadin. Di 2013/2014 rnan-as 80. 2014/2015 rnan 120. Deg 2015/2016 rnan 120. Aseggas-a n 2017 ulac asileɣ n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt. Ugar n wannect-agi, iselmaden d tselmadin i yeṭṭfen taḍermist aseggas-a, ur sɛin azref ad sseɣren tamaziɣt acku yella wugur n yiselmaden n tefransist d teɛrabt ɣur uwanek. Uguren-nniḍen, d drus n tinmal ideg tettwasɣaray tmaziɣt, d drus n tinmal ideg i tt-yeqqar unelmad seg uswir amezwau ar uswir wis sḍiṣ. Deg tesnawit, iselmaden i yesɣarayen tamaziɣt, tura aṭas seg-sen ur sɛin ara tineɣrit-nsen. Yuccel ad sseɣren kul aswir di tneɣrit n tnagiwin-nniḍen. Ussan-agi, yenna uneɣlaf n usegmi anamur: « D tidet ur fkiɣ ara azal i uselmed n tmaziɣt, maca deg wussan i d-yettasen ad d-nesbedd irkelli aselmed-is s yiselmaden imazzagen. Ihi iselmaden n tmaziɣt, ad sseɣren tamaziɣt, tafransit d tusnakt ». Awal n uneɣlaf, yebɣa ad d-yini, cwiṭ cwiṭ ad tettwakkes tmaziɣt seg tinmel. Di tesdawit nettaf-itt di Wejda, Agadir, Fas d Naḍur aseggas-agi. Maca amḍan n yinelmaden yettidris yal aseggas, acku ulac tawuri (amazil) s ugerdas n tmaziɣt.

  Segmi tuɣal tamaziɣt d tunsibt dinna, d acu i d-yellan d abeddel i ubaɣur n tutlayt? 

 Aṣenṣeb n tutlayt tamaziɣt d tikerkest taxatart. Segmi tella tmaziɣt d tutlayt tunṣibt tis snat di tmendawt n 2011, ttganin Yimaziɣen iṣuḍaf imsudsen n tmaziɣt d tutlayt tunṣibt. Asmi d-ffɣen, teffeɣ-d yid-sen twaɣit deg umaḍal i werǧin telli. Send ad d-yeffeɣ uṣaḍuf-agi, meṛṛa tisuda (tugart Aseqqim Anafella n Uselmed) qqarent ad nexdem tamaziɣt akken bɣan yiṣuḍaf imsudsen. Mi d-yeffeɣ uṣaḍuf-agi, nettaf deg-s, “ad tekcem tmaziɣt s tinmel akken yettini Useqqim Anafella n Uselmed”. Yal yiwen iteqqel ɣer wayeḍ. Maca d Imaziɣen i yettganin Guḍu akken yura Ṣamwil Bikit di tmezgunt-is ur nettwattu ara. Ihi zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ war tugdi, belli aṣenṣeb n tmaziɣt deg useggas n 2011, yusa-d i wakken ad beddlen i Yimaziɣen udem.

  D anti tifrat i tettwalim akken ad yali yisem n tmaziɣt d yidles-is? 

 Ulac tifrat i tmaziɣt mebla awanek amaziɣ. I wakken ad yili uwanek amaziɣ, ilaq Imaziɣen ad gen afus deg ufus. Tadukkli, tamunt, tartit, tanmennakt… Wigi d akniwen n yal taɣawsa i ḥwajen Yimaziɣen meṛṛa. Ilaq ad nesdukkel iɣallen. Ifukk ad neg afus deg ufus. Nesra tumast ad teddukkel.“Axxam i wakken ad t-nezdeɣ ilaq-as llsas ara t-yeṭṭfen” akken yecna yizem n Ḡerǧer. Tinariwin daɣen cennunt Tumast tanni bḍant war ma tewweḍ iswi-nnes. Ttwaliɣ, deg waddad amiran n tɣawsiwin, ad nejmeɛ imaswaḍen i tirza gar-aneɣ. Ad nemyawas akked yigduden-nniḍen yesɛan uguren am wid-nneɣ: Ikurdiyen, Ibaṣkiyen, At Kaṭalan, Ihindiyen… Ilaq ad nelteɣ di tuddsiwin tigraɣlanin, ad neg asuɣel i yidles amaḍalan, ad nari s tmaziɣt, ad nɣer yis-s, ad nḥulfu i targit s tmaziɣt, tutlayt n tlelli d uslelli.

  Tanemmirt ɣef wayen i d-tenniḍ. Awal-ik n taggara… 

 Ulac uɣilif. Deg uneggaru n wawal riɣ ad d-iniɣ azul d ameɣnas, seg tmurt n Tmazɣa tutrimt, i meṛṛa atmaten-nneɣ Imaziɣen anda ma llan di tmura n Yimaziɣen, s umata Izwawen. Taqbaylit nessen-itt kan seg yidlisen i uran yimussnawen Iqbayliyen am Dda Lmulud, Bulifa, Belɛid Ayt Ɛli d wiyaḍ d tiyaḍ mebla ma bedreɣ ismawen-nsen meṛṛa. Nessen-itt daɣen s ccna i cnan Yicennayen amzund Meɛtub Lwennas, Ayt Mengellat, Imaziɣen Imula, d wiyaḍ d tiyaḍ, mebla ma bedreɣ yakk ismawen-nsen(t). Ar ass-a, ur zmireɣ ara ad siwleɣ ɣef tmaziɣt, timmuzɣa, d yidles deg Tmazɣa, war ad siwleɣ ɣef wid yefkan tudert-nsen i wakken ad tedder tlelli deg yiman n umdan Amaziɣ. Tagi d tajmilt tameẓyant i wigi i aɣ-d-inejṛen abrid akken ad nissin ixfawen-nneɣ.

  Testeqsa-t Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Ma ɣef 13h30 fɣen-d yigemmaḍ-nniḍen, ideg yewweḍ leḥsab ɣer 19, 58% deg wayen yeɛnan taɣiwant, ma d win n APW yewweḍ ɣer 16,71%. Yelḥeq ɣef 16h30, ɣer 28,18% deg APC, ma d win n APW yelḥeq ɣer 34,53%. Ma d igemmaḍ ineggura n 19h00, llan-d akka: ulamma ttwajerden wazal n 11 838, maca debren kan wazal 5 809 n yideqqaren ɣer usqamu n APC akked 4 805 ɣer usqamu APW, d ayen ara d-yefken agemmuḍ n 49,07%, deg tefranin n tɣiwant akked ugemmuḍ n 40,59% deg usqamu APW. Ma deg wayen yerzan amyezwar n yikabaren deg tɣiwant-a, yella-d akka: deg umḍiq amezwaru ad naf akabar n FLN, s 2205 n leṣwat, dɣa yewwi 8 n yikersiwen, syin d akabar n RCD deg umḍiq wis sin, i yewwin 6 n yikersiwen. Deg umkan wis tlata ad naf akabar n MEN, i yewwin 3 n yikersiyen, syin d akabar n FFS, i yewwin 2 n yikersiwen. Ma d akabar n MPA akked ukabar n RND fɣen seg tefranin-agi mebla ikersiyen. S wakka i d-yeffeɣ mass Akli Chabane, d aselway n tɣiwant n At Ɛisa Mimun i tikkelt tis snat. Dɣa ad nger tamawt deg tɣiwant-agi, imezdaɣ rzan-d s ṭaqa deg tmeddit n wass, d ayen ara d-beggnen yigemmaḍ-agi ineggura. Ula d adber iɛedda deg tegnatin igerrzen, ulamma imḍebbren n wammasen n lbuṭ, bɣan ad kemmlent tefranin alamma d 20h00, maca aɣalla n ladayra n Wagennun yugi, dayen i d-isbeggnen lɣid n kra n yimezdaɣ, am wakken daɣen ur d-cetkan ara waṭas n yimezdaɣ. Tura ad nuɣal ɣer tɣiwant n Wagennun, ideg jerden wazal n 8 392 n yimdanen iman-nsen deg lejridat n lbuṭ, i yettwaferqen ɣef 9 n wammasen n udber akked 19 n yinirawen n udɣar. D taɣiwant iɣef myeḥzwaren 5 n wumuɣen n yikabaren-agi: RND, RCD, FLN, PT, MPA, FFS, akked wumuɣ tilellit “Timlilit”. Ma d igemmaḍ n tefranin-agi imenza, llan-d akka. Ɣef 10h30, leḥsab yerzan taɣiwant yewweḍ ɣer 6,92%, ma d win n usqamu n lwilaya yewweḍ ɣer 7,59. Ma ɣef 13h30 fɣen-d yigemmaḍ-nniḍen, ideg yewweḍ leḥsab ɣer 22, 32% deg wayen yeɛnan taɣiwant, ma d win n APW yewweḍ ɣer 18,91%. Yelḥeq ɣef 16h30, ɣer 37,91% deg APC, ma d win n APW yelḥeq ɣer 30,67%. Ma d igemmaḍ ineggura n 19h00, llan-d akka: ulamma ttwajerden wazal n 8 392, maca debren kan wazal 3 937 n yideqqaren ɣer usqamu n APC akked 3 262 ɣer usqamu APW, d ayen ara d-yefken agemmuḍ n 46,91%, deg tefranin n tɣiwant akked ugmuḍ n 38,87% deg tefranin n usqamu APW. Ma deg wayen yerzan amyezwar n yikabaren deg tɣiwant-a, yella-d akka: deg umḍiq amenzu ad naf akabar n FFS, s 911 n leṣwat. Ma d ikersiyen kif kif-it akked ukabar n FLN akked wumuɣ tilellit “Timlilit”, anida yal akabar yewwi 4 n yikersiwen, syin d akabar n RCD deg umḍiq wis rebɛa, i yewwin 3 n yikersiwen. Ma d ikabaren-agi MPA, RND, PT fɣen seg tefranin-agi mebla ikersiyen. S wakka i d-yeffeɣ mass Ḥaǧi Muḥamed Saɛid i d aselway n tɣiwant n Wagennun. Dɣa ad nger tamawt deg tɣiwant-agi, ula d imezdaɣ-is am yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n At Ɛisa Mimun, rzan-d s ṭaqa deg tmeddit n wass, d ayen ara d-beggnen yigemmaḍ-agi ineggura. Ula deg tɣiwant-agi n Wagennun adber iɛedda deg tegnatin yelhan, imi ur d-yelli ara waṭas n ucetki sɣur yimezdaɣ-is. Ma d tura ad d-nezzi ɣer tɣiwant n Timizar, ideg ara naf jerden wazal n 14 683 n yimdanen deg lejridat n lbuṭ, i yettwaferqen ɣef 16 n wammasen n udber akked 28 n yinirawen n udɣar. D taɣiwant iɣef myeḥzwaren 4 n wumuɣen n yikabaren-agi: RND, RCD, FLN, FFS, akked wumuɣ tilellit “Alternance citoyen ”. Ma d igemmaḍ n tefranin-agi imenza, llan-d akka. Ɣef 10h30, leḥsab yerzan taɣiwant yewweḍ ɣer 5,2%, ma d win n usqamu n lwilaya yewweḍ ɣer 4,83%. Ma ɣef 13h30 fɣen-d yigemmaḍ-nniḍen, ideg yewweḍ leḥsab ɣer 15, 56% deg wayen yeɛnan taɣiwant, ma d win n APW yewweḍ ɣer 14,34%. Yelḥeq ɣef 16h30, ɣer 24,55% deg APC, ma d win n APW yelḥeq ɣer 22,59%. Ma d igemmaḍ ineggura n 19h00, llan-d akka: ulamma ttwajerden wazal n 14 683, maca debren kan wazal 5 194 n yideqqaren ɣer usqamu n APC akked 4 751 ɣer usqamu APW, d ayen ara d-yefken agemmuḍ n 35,38%, deg tefranin n tɣiwant akked ugmuḍ n 32,36% deg tefranin n usqamu APW. Ma deg wayen yerzan amyezwar n yikabaren deg tɣiwant-a, yella-d akka: deg umḍiq amezwaru ad naf akabar n FFS s 1 653 n leṣwat, dɣa yewwi 6 n yikersiwen, syin d akabar n RCD deg umḍiq wis sin, i yewwin 5 n yikersiwen.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Krim Belkacem gar yiwudam yuran ismawen-nsen deg umezruy n tegrawla s wuraɣ, d tiɣri n ugdud i ad asen-yefkan afud i wakken ad qazmen aɛdaw afransis.

 Yella seg wid-ak yesɛan tabɣest n yirgazen akked teflest n wul. Yekka nnig n tugdi d ukukru, yuggi ad yeknu i uzaglu n ucengu. Asmi yeffeɣ ɣer umadaɣ, yella d ilemẓi, maca mi d-yuɣal d argaz, yesɛan azal d ccan deg timunet n tmurt. Krim Belkacem, d argaz n tegrawla Tazzayrit1954-1962, ilul ass 14 di duǧember 1922, deg taddart n Tirza Σissa, deg tɣiwant At Yaḥya Musa, deg tama n Draɛ El Mizan, deg temnaḍt n Leqbayel, deg temdin n Tizi Uzzu. D mmi-s n Mass Ḥusin Ḥemmu Σissa akked Massa Ḥlima Caybet.

  Almud-is akked usileɣ-is  

 Deg useggas n 1928, imir-nni yesɛa 6 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, akken kan yewweḍ i wakken ad yekcem ɣer uɣerbaz. Wwin-t yimawlan-is ɣer Lezzayer tamanaɣt, akken ad iɣer deg uɣerbaz amenzu, mebɛed 9 n yiseggasen n ulmud deg uɣerbaz amenzu, yessaweḍ ad d-yawi aselkin n taggara n uswir amenzu, ayen iwumi qqaren s tefransist “Certificat d’études” deg useggas n 1936. Maca ur yesɛedia ara akayad akken ad yekemmel ulmud-is deg uɣerbaz afellay (Ecole supérieur), dɣa yuɣal-d ɣer taddart-is, mebla asenfar n taggara. Deg useggas n 1940, iruḥ Krim ad yexdem d amaray di tɣiwant tamassayt n Draɛ El Mizan, syin akkin deg wussan imenza n tefsut n useggas n 1941, yesɛa kra n wuguren d unedbal-is, dɣa yeǧǧa amkan-is, yuɣal-d ɣer taddart-is deg useggas n 1942. Zrin 4 n yiseggasen ɣef tufɣa-ines seg uɣerbaz, syin deg wass n 4 maggu 1943, yekcem ɣer lɛesker deg temdint n Leɣwaṭ. Yeqqim dinna aseggas, syin deg useggas n 1944, uznen-t ɣer temdint n Blida i wakken ad ikemmel aseggas-nni i d as-yeqqimen dinna. Ma deg wass n 26 unbir 1944, ɛellqen-as cciɛa n “Caporal”. Dɣa deg umenzu n yulyu 1945, rran-t ɣer tɣiwant n yinemhalen Izzayriyen (RTA) i wumi qqaren s tefransist “Régiment des Travailleurs Algériens”. Syin ɣer-s deg 04 tuber 1945, rnan ɛellqen-as cciɛa n “Caporal Chef”. Deg useggas n 1947, yuɣal d aɣella ɣef ukabar Aɣerfan Azzayri (PPA). Seg wakken yefka afud-is akked rruḥ-is i usaki n ugdud-is seg umenzu n yulyu 1943, adabu n tmurt n Fransa, igzem-itt deg rray ad t-isɛeddi deg craɛ. Mebɛed leḥris i d-yellan ɣef twacult-is seg 23 meɣres 1947 d asawen, yexdem zzedma tamezwarut deg tudert-is taqrawlit, ideg yenɣa yiwen n Lqayed akked yiwen n Ccambiṭ. Dɣa yettucareɛ deg lɣib-is deg useggas n 1947, syin yettwaḥkem fell-a s lmut deg useggas n 1950. Ma ɣer taggara, deg meɣres n 1948, yettwaṭṭef ɣer lḥebs n Tizi Uzzu, armi d aseggas n 1950 i d-yeffeɣ; yeqqim azal n sin yiseggasen deg useckref-agi.

  Azal-is d yimuhal-is deg tegrawla  

 Ass n 24 tuber 1954, yemlal d semmus (05) n yiɣellaten imazrayen (chefs historiques) n tmurt-nneɣ, deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt i wakken ad msefhamen ɣef wass ideg ara tendeh tegrawla, dinna i yuɣal yeṭṭef akk tamurt n Leqbayel. Yella seg wid-k i d-yekkren i lmend n tegrawla n umenzu n unber 1954, yella ɣer tama-s imir-nni Ɛebban Remḍan. Ussan 29, 30 akked 31 seg waggur n yulyu 1955, ittekki d Muḥamed Wediɛi akked Aɛmer Uɛemran deg uheggi i unejmuɛ n Taḥanut i yuɣalen yettwassen s yisem n anejmuɛ n Ṣummam neɣ s tefransist (Congrés de la Soummam) imi deg temnaḍt n Soummam i yettwaxdam ass n 20 ɣuct 1956. Annect-a, yella-d s lmendad n kraḍ n yirgazen igrawliwen, ha-ten-an: Krim Belqasem, Σebban Remḍan, d Ben Mhidi, seg-s i d-ilul Usqamu aɣelnaw n tegrawla Tazzayrit (CNRA). Syin akin, deg useggas n 1957, yunag ɣer tmurt n Tunes, ddan yid-s yimjuhad-agi: Lexḍar Ben Ṭubbal, Ben Yusef Ben Xedda, Σebban Remḍan d Saɛid Deḥleb. Mebɛed talalit n Unabaḍ Uɛḍil n Tegduda Tazzayrit (GPRA) deg 19 cutember 1958, iberḥ-d yis-s uselway-is Ferḥat Σebbas seg tmura-a: Tunes, Maṣer akked Lmarruk. Dɣa yerra Krim Belqasem d nnayeb n uselway u d aneɣlaf n yiɣallen n yignan (Ministre des forces armées) maca, netta yebɣa ad yeṭṭef taselwayt, acku d netta i yellan d aɣella amazray yakkan, yerna ala netta i yekkaten ɣef telelli d timunent n tmurt Tazzayrit, maca Ben Ṭubel d Buṣuf, bɣan ad t-kksen d aneɣlaf n yiɣallen n yingan, ad fken amḍiq-is i Bumedyen, ma d netta ad t-rren d aneɣlaf n lecɣal n berra, deg umkan n umejjay Lamin Dabaɣin. Ma deg taggara n useggas n 1961, yeğğa tamurt n Ccam, yuɣal iruḥ ɣer tmurt n Rruss, syin yezger ɣer Ccinwa. Ass n 11 deg furar 1962, ɣef lweḥda d uzgen n uzal (13h30), tella-d yiwet n temllilit gar Uɣella n tegrawla Tazzayrit akked urumi Louis Joxe. Ass n 18 meɣres 1962, yemtawa ugrawliw Krim akked Louis Joxe amwata ʺEVIANʺ. Asmi i d-yewweḍ Bumedyen ɣer ukersi n leḥkem, deg useggas n 1965, Krim yella ibedd mgal iɣil yettwasxdem deg tallit-nni, ama d Bumedyen, ama d wid yewwḍen ɣer tqacuct. Ma deg useggas n 1967, yella yeslul-d yiwen ukabar iwumi i isemma (MDRA), maca Karim ur yewwiḍ ara lebɣi-s, acku gten fell-as wugren d yiɣeblan, dayen i t-yeğğan deg useggas-nni yunag ɣer tmurt n Lalman, imi i d-as-sbabben tawaɣit n uɛraḍ n tmenɣiwt n uselway n tegduda Tazzayrit mass: Bumedyen, alarmi ḥekmen fell-as s lmut deg useggas n 1969.

  Lmut-is d temḍelt-is  

 Ass n 18 di tuber 1970, yettwanɣa ugrawliw Krim Belqasem deg temdint n Frankfurt, deg tmurt n Lalman, s daxel n texxamt-is deg usensu anida yella yettnusu. D axneq i t-xenqen seg yiri. Wis d acu yexdem umeɣbun mi yettwamḍel dinna 14 n yiseggasen ddaw wakal n tmurt n Lalman. Armi d ass n 24 deg tuber 1984, nuqlen-d iɣsan-is ɣer Lezzayer, ɣer tmeqbert n yimeɣrasen n Lɛelya i d-yezgan deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt. Ihi Krim Belqasem, yura isem-is s wureɣ deg umezruy Azzayri. S wakka, ad d-nwali belli aggur-agi n tuber yeččur d ineḍruyen i icudden ɣer tudert d yimuhal d lmut ula deg temḍelt n ugrawliw ameqqran Krim Belqasem. 

  A. A. 

  
 Ma nenna-d talaxt, ad d-ifrir deg wallaɣ-nneɣ Lemɛatqa , ma nenna-d lfeṭṭa, ad yezwir s Wat Yanni. .Lfeṭṭa d taɣawsa ur tekkes ara tmeṭṭut di tudert-is n yal ass , d ayen i as-yettkemmilen nnefṣ n cbaha i tmeṭṭut taqbaylit, lfeṭṭa tesɛa azal di tmetti . Ma nsiked ɣer yiniten i ssexdamen yiḥeddaden deg-s, ad naf azeggaɣ i d-yessebganen idammen , aḥcayci, yettuɣal ɣer ugama , amidadi d igenni ma yella d awraɣ d iti . Si zik tamnaḍt n Wat Yanni tettwasen s cbaḥa d ssfa n uxeddim i d-ssufuɣen iḥeddaden-is. Ass n 4 deg ɣuct yezrin i tekfa tmeɣra n lfeṭṭa deg Wat Yanni. Yella-d usiher-a deg uɣerbaz alemmas Larbi Mezani d Uxxam n yidles Keddache Ali. Yal aseggas tettili-d tmeɣra-agi s tumert n yiḥeddaden n lfeṭṭa i d-yettheggin iman-nsen. Ttasen-d seg yal tama , ula seg berra n tmurt. D tagnit anida i d-ttasen wid ara yaɣen lfeṭṭa n tidet. Imi mi ara d-tinid lfeṭṭa n At Yanni ur ttnadin yimdanen ma telha neɣ diri-tt : d isem-is i d awal-is. Aseggas-a, d tazrigt tis 14 n tmeɣra xas ulamma tella-d maca banen-d aṭas n wuguren ɣef wakken i d-gren tiɣri iḥeddaden n lfeṭṭa n Wat Yanni. Nnan-d belli tagi d lḥirfa n lejdud ur nezmir ara ad tuɣal akken-nnidḍen, imi tella-d temḥeqqranit, ulac win i asen-yefkan azal , am wakken i d-yenna Mass Fekkir aselway n yiḥeddaden n lfeṭṭa, yenna-d : « seg waggur n mayyu i d-nessawal i uselway n tɣiwant maca tiririt-is mazal , ur d-iban ara melmi ara tili , anida ara tili acku aɣerbaz ilaq ad d-yettwaheggi » Dayen yesserfan aṭas iḥeddaden-agi. Llan kra qeḍɛen layas dɣa senzen lfeṭṭa-nni, deg wass wis kraḍ i qesden ad ḥebsen tameɣra-agi, yerna llan 120 iḥeddaden n Wat Yanni kan. Rrnu wid i ijariden iman-nsen yal wa ansi i d –yettas. Iɣad-iten daɣen lḥal ɣef lexlas i ttxellisen yerna ur d-banen ara yidrimen-agi sani i ttruhun, ur ten-id-isaḥ ara ula dayen ara ad ččen neɣ ad swen. Yenna-d uselway -agi ula d aseggas yezrin ttwakksen-asen-t ula d ṭṭwabel , ɣef waya i d-tban temḥeqranit n yiḥeddaden-agi. Beggnen-d lghid-nsen s ucetki s ttawil-agi n Facebook, nutni iswi -nsen ad asen-d yuɣal wazal , imi d iḥeddaden iqburen, xeddmen lḥirfa n lejdud-nsen, tasuta tettaf-itt-id tayed. Ur bɣin ara armud-agi swayes refden aqerru, ad yuɣal d aɣbel aserti, bɣan leqder am zik.

  S. Y/ Z. B. Y 

  
 Asalli yessefraḥen sɣur taneɣlaft n usegmi : tamaziɣt-nni, ad tt-ɣren deg 32 n lwilayat. Akka i d-tenna ass-nni mi d-terza ɣer lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ass-nni, diɣ, i yemmut yiwen ilemẓi deg Yiwaḍiyen mebla ma tban-d sebba n tmenɣiwt-is. Ula deg Seddouk, teḍra twaɣit : nnɣan wayeḍ s lmus.

  
 Ur yewwiḍ ara useggas ɣef tedyant n Charlie, terna-d twaɣit nniḍen di tlemmast n Lpari. Tawɣit n ljemɛa iɛeddan tegla s ugar 120 n yimdanen yemmuten, ṭṭaqa deg-sen d ilmeẓyen. Mara nmuqel s abaxix-agi aneggaru, ad naf belli tikkelt-a rebrab ur yeqsiḍ ara azamul, akken d-iban di twaɣit n Charlie Hebdo, imi irebraben wwten tilelli tanfalit. Tilelli-nni i d asen-yesexraben azeṭṭa. Rnu ufan-d tisebbiwin. nnan-ak aɣmis-nni yeččemit deg tugna nnbi Mohamed. Atan ihi, ɣas ulac akk d acu ara yessusmen ɣef rebrab, deg tedyan n Charlie nezmer ad “nefhem” tikli akked d tikti n yiččamraren.

 Tikkelt-a, rnan asurif ar zdat. Ɛeddan akkin i uzamul , wwten tudert. Lḥasun d ta i tafellaḥt n yiɛdawen n tudert akken ten-isemma Lwennas. Tikkelt-a rebrab, ur yesemgarad ara gar wa d wa. Tikkelt-a iɛewwel i trad, imi d agdud d imdanen n menwala i yenɣa.

 Ass-a, Fransa tettwet anda ur turji ara tita. 

 Wis ahat, ma d-taki, ma tbeddel tikti ɣer temsalt-agi n tneslemt d rebrab. Am nettat, am tmura n l’europe neɣ daɣen Marikan, ur ɛad wweten azrem s aqerru. Yal tikkelt ara d-yeḍru kra di tmura nsen 

 ttadden s lmeslaḥ mgal irebraben. Aya dayen i ilaqen ad yili. Lamaɛna aya drus. Imi Aqerru n wezrem mačči d akamikaz-nni neɣ d rebrab yesndayen lbubmat. Aqerru n wezrem d l’idéologie i ten-id-yurwen. 

 Anda-t uqerru-agi n wezrem ? Atan deg Saɛudiya, Qatar akked tmura nniḍen i ifaḍen s pétrole. Imi deg-sent lfayda, tezga Frnsa d tmura n l’europe sqizziben-asent. Rebrab yella u simal yettimɣur skud tella tedrimt t-iseččayen. Ihi, aqerru iban webrid-is. Ur yettfak ara laɛǧib-agi n rebrab alamma yettwet wezrtem s aqerru. Ahat, tikkelt-a ad d-akin u ad ḥsun belli ɣas ulamma sɛan lfayda (n tedrimt) d tmura-agi taɛrabin , lexsara ara sen-yeḍrun, skud qnen tiṭ, isem-is tilelli.

 D lawan ad ɛeddin akkin i Nek d Lpari neɣ Nek d Charlie u ad walin abrid ara yessufɣen ɣer talwit. Mi wwḍen, mačči ḥala nutni ara yesfaydin. Ula timura-agi taɛrabin ad sfaydint.

  
 I lmend n usmekti n wass agraɣlan n ugrud, i d-yettilin yal aseggas deg umenzu n waggur n yunyu. Tidddukkla tadelsant Ixulaf n Ǧerǧer n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, thegga-d yiwen n wahil s wazal-is ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan. Imi bdan leqdic-nsen ass-nni ahad 31 deg waggur n maggu deg temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Xedmen dina aṭas n yiremad idelsanen yecban: asikew n tmucuha, ideg i d-tulles Massa Touati Zoulikha snat n tmucuha s teqbaylit, snat-nniḍen sɣur Massa Amrouche Samar. Syin akkin llant-d snat n temsizliyin i warrac imecṭah, yiwet deg usuneɣ tayeḍ deg tullsa n tmucuha. Γer taggara n wass, sneɛten-d i warrac uraren iqburen. Ma d ass-nni n lexmis, amenzu n waggur-agi ideg nella, bdan ahil-nsen ɣef 11h00 n tsebḥit deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun n uxxam n Yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Zwaren s tɣuri n yisefra sɣur Hamlet Yasmine akked Ziram Damia, syin akkin tella-d tullsa n tmacahut “Mačči s kra n wayen yettberiqen d ddheb”, sɣur Massa Bousdia Sonia, terna-d kra n teqnaẓ. Sakin d taceqquft n umezgun ɣef wazal n ugrud akked d tutlayt n tmaziɣt, syin ɣer-s d ccnawi n Taleb Rabeh akked Cherif Kheddam s ṣṣut n warrac imeẓyanen. Ma ɣef 12h00 n uzal d afella, tella-d tcennayt tameẓyant Manel n 6 n yiseggasen, i d-icebḥen taqaɛet s kra n tezlatin icebḥen aṭas, tin ɣur-s d asenɛet n yiwen n usaru n wunuɣen yettembiwilen s teqbaylit, tsemma-as Massa Louiza Lakneb “Γerdidduc”, ma ɣer taggara akk tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n utekki i wid ittekkin deg tmeɣra-agi, am wakken diɣen i fkan arrazen i warrac-nni i d-yufraren deg snat-nni n temsizliyin; 3 n warrazen i wid i d-yufraren deg usuneɣ tlata-nniḍen i wid i d-yufraren deg tmucuha.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Tiddukkla Tadelsant Itri Adelsan n Uqbu, tsuddes-d ussan-agi iεeddan 2-3 akked 4 di furar 2017, yiwen n leqdic s wazal-is, ideg gan asfugel n umulli wis meyya n tlalit n Lmulud At Mεemmer, deg ulmis adelsan n Uqbu. Llan-d waṭas n yisaragen d yiskasiyen akked waṭas n temsikniyin yemgraden. Leqdic-agi, yebda s wudem unṣib ass-nni n lexmis yezrin 2 deg furar 2017 ɣef 10h deg Ulmis adelsan n Uqbu. Tella-d deg-s temsikent n wayen akk yura d wayen i d-yeğğa Mulud Mεemmeri. Ґef 13h, yella-d usenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen, sɣur waṭas n yimyura i d-yussan, gar-asen Ahcene Mariche, Kenza Djurdjura…atg. Ma ɣef 15h, yella-d usarag amezwaru n umaru d uneɣmas Rachid Oulebsir, ɣef tmettant n Lmulud At Mεemmer, deg uxxam n tiddukkla-agi. Ma deg wass-nni n sem 3 deg furar 2017 ɣef 10h, yella-d usenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen, sɣur waṭas n yimyura i d-yussan akked temsikent-nni n Dda Lmulud. Ma ɣef 15h d asawen, yella-d usarag n Mass Hacene Halouane (d aselmad deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu) s usentel «Mεemmri asnalsi, akked urgaz n tsekla». Syin akin d asarag i d-iga Mass Hamid Bilek, ɣef yidlisen n Mεemmeri yessadren aɣref amaziɣ. Ma ɣer taggara n was, tella-d tɣuri n yisefra, sɣur imedyazen n tama-agi n Uqbu, dima deg uxxam n tiddukkla-agi. Ma d deg wass wis kraḍ 4 deg yebrir 2017, yella-d usarag n Brahim Tazaghert (d amedyaz d amaru), ɣef 15h deg uxxam n tiddukkla-a. Ma ɣef 17h, yella-d usenεet n yiwet n tceqquct n umezgun s yisem “TAƔDEMT TAQUDART”, deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen n Abderrhmane Fares n Uqbu. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Tidukkla Tadelsant Itran n Tqerbust mazal-itt d turmidt deg leqdicat-is idelsanen. Segmi i d-tennulfa deg useggas n 2003 ar ass-a, tettkemmil ayen i d-tebda s yiwen n umenzay n tayri i yidles amaziɣ s umata. Ladɣa i umezgun. Tikkelt-a, ihi, d ameslay ɣef ttiɛad-is i as-d-yellan i tikkelt tamenzut, ass n sem yezrin deg Tizi Uzzu, neɣ deg Uxxam n Yidles Mulud At Mɛemmer. Dinna temlal Tdukkla-a Itran akked yimarayen n win iwumi qqaren ababat n tẓuriwin. Tidukkla Itran, neɣ wid iqeddcen deg-s, wwin-d ass n sem iɛeddan taceqquft n umezgun i tura Massa Nasira At Yusef. Tameskart-a, tefren ad as-tefk azwel “Taɣdemt taquḍart”, imi deg-s terra tajmilt i yimyura d yimegzuyen am Muḥya d wiyaḍ. S tallelt ihi n tmehla n Yidles n Tizi Uzzu, Axxam n yidles Mulud At Mɛemmer, akked Uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yasin, ɛeddan yilemẓiyen i d-yuraren taceqquft-nni ɣef usayes, jebden awellih n kra win d tin iḥeḍren ttiɛad-nni. «Ɣas s lexsas n ttawilat nessaweḍ ad d-nelḥu amecwar, ad nexdem s wayen umi nezmer. Nessaram ad naf afus n lemɛawna sɣur wid i teɛna temsalt, akken ad nsemmed leqdic-nneɣ ɣef yidles amaziɣ war iɛewwiqen i d-nettmagar, abeɛda wid n tedrimt». I aɣ-d-yenna Mass Naser Terrad, aselway n Tdukkla Tadelsant Itran n Tqerbust. Ad d-nesmekti kan dakken Tidukkla-a, mazal tesɛa ttiɛad-nniḍen ass n 11 deg wayyur-a, deg twilayt n Tbatnet, anda ara tili akked qeddac n tdukkliwin tidelsanin i ittekkan deg umsiẓwer-a n umezgum amaziɣ. Akka ihi, am yal tikkelt Tidukkla Itran ur as-ttruḥent tegnatin am ti, ideg tamsalt tcudd ɣer umezgun d yidles amaziɣ s umata. Ur tebɣi ad teqqim d tin iqeddcen deg Tubiret, maca tessaram ad teldi tiwwura i yiberdan-nniḍen akken ad tefk ugar n wayen i d-tefka yakan, i d-tettak daɣen.

  Aheggi 

    

 Sirdet isekkimen-nni akken iwata, tesqecrem-ten u tgezmem-ten d imecṭaḥ. Terrem-ten daxen n waman yeḥman s ufella n tmes azal n 15’. Rret udi ad yefsi daxel n tmeqlit, terrem isekkimen-nni (yuɣ lḥal udamen seg waman), terwim-ten kra n ddqayeq. Syin, rrzet timellalin s ufella n yisekkimen, terǧum azal n 4’. <p style="text-align: right;"> Sɣur Daya  

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
 
  
 48 n yiseggasen i yezrin γef tmettant n nna Faḍma At-Mensur, i yellan d azamul n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit, d timinigt s tesreṭ (ddin) tamasiḥit yefkan i warraw-is ttrebga izaden.

 Faḍma At Mensur-Ɛemruc d tameṭṭut taqbaylit tamenzut i yuran adlis iwumi tsemma tamacahutt n tudert-iw “Histoire de ma vie” deg useggas 1946 di Rades i d-yeffɣen deg useggas 1968, aseggas mbeεd tamettant-is. Tazwert n udlis-agi yura-tt Vincent Monteil akked Kateb Yacine. D adlis ideg d-teḥka tudert-is, tin n yemma-s d tin n warraw-is, tudert-is seg wasmi tella di Tizi-Hibel armi d asmi tedda d tislit ɣer Yiɣil-Ɛli d yinig-is ɣer Rades di Tunes d yinig-is wis sin ɣer Bretagne di tmurt n Fransa. Faḍma d tayemmat n sin n yemyura, inaẓuren, imeqqranen i d-yeğğan isem-nsen deg tsekla tafransist d yedles amaziɣ, Jean Lmuhub Ɛemruc d Marie Louiz Ṭawes Ɛemruc. Faḍma At Mensur tlul deg useggas 1883 di Tizi Hibel, d taɣtest (victime) n wagul tga yemma-s mi qqaren Ɛayni acku tesεa-tt-id mbaεd mi teğğel s wacḥal yiseggasen mebla nnaε n zzwağ. Di taddart-is, tenḥaf aṭas, timetti n yimiren ur tt-tqal ara sawalen-as taqcict n lεar, ɣef waya wwint-tt temrabḍin Irumyen yellan xedment di sbiṭar n Micli sekrent-tt-id, seɣrent-tt, dɣa mi temmed, tewweḍ 16 yiseggasen, fkant-as amḍiq gar-asent, txeddem dinna ula d nettat di sbiṭar, di lawan-nni dɣa i tt-yessen Belqasem At Ɛemruc i d wi tezweğ deg useggas 1899. Mbeεd zzwağ-is, Faḍma tban-as-d tudert-nniḍen, tufa win i d wi tecrek lferḥ-is d lqerḥ-is. Belqasem yella-yas d ayen akk tt-ixuṣṣen di tudert-is, yefka-yas tayri, leḥnana, tagmat, yerra-yas-d taflest d laman deg yiman-is. Tedder kra yiseggasen gar yiεeggalen n twacult n urgaz-is syen unagen ɣer Tunes. Dinna, dɣa i tesεedda tugget n yiseggasen n tudert-is, tessekcem arraw-is ɣer uɣerbaz, tefka-yasen ayen akk ilaqen akken ad ilin gar wid ifazen, ufraren-d s tegzi-nsen, s tmusni-nsen kesben, ḥellan-d imeḍqan εlayen. Faḍma d Belqasem, d ddin amasiḥi i ḍefren. Γef waya ad naf yal yiwen deg tarwa-nsen fkan-as sin n yismawen, yiwen d isem amasiḥi, wayeḍ d isem amaziɣ acku Faḍma ɣas tebεed ɣef wakal n lejdud-is maca teṭṭef deg yiẓuran-is, s wakka arraw-is ẓṛan ansi d-frurin. Dinna di Tunes, tezga tettcewwiq izlan n teqbaylit, tettawi-d timucuha n tgemmi n lejdud-is i dderya-s, tessaweḍ tefka-yasen idles-is, idles tuwret ula d nettat ɣef yemma-s. Faḍma iḥuza-tt aṭas yinig, ɣef waya tenna : “zgiɣ sarameɣ, yiwen n wass ad iliɣ di tmurt-iw, di tlemmast n taddart-iw, gar lejdud-iw, d wid d wi ttmeslayeɣ s yiwet n tutlayt, wid d wi zdiɣ yiwet n tmuɣli, yiwen n yiman neɣ rruḥ n tlelli, n tdukli d tmunent, d rruḥ n Yugurten”. Deg wakken tfud, neɣ tḥemmel taqbaylit-is, tessaweḍ armi tettali ɣer sufella n tɣurfett akken ad tessemḥas i yemsebriden yettεeddayen zdat uxxam-is i d-yezgan deg ubrid ameqqran imi ara ttmeslayen s tcelḥit imi d tantala n tutlayt tmaziɣt yettcabin aṭas ɣer tantala taqbaylit. Faḍma d adrar n ssber acku zyada ɣef lḥif i tt-iḥuzan di temẓi-is, rnu lɣerba i tt-yesbeεden ɣef wakal-is, terna-d tmettant yettawin arraw-is yiwen yiwen, d urgaz-is Belqasem, tewwet ssiεqa di tudert-is imi tezwer akk tawacult-is, d ussan irẓaganen i tessegra ala Ṭawes i s-d-yegran, tin i d wi tezdi lqerḥ-is. 

 Faḍma ur tunif ara i yir tudert tesεedda d wussan i tedder di tmurt n Leqbayel ad ten-tɣum tatut. Ayen i d-teğğa d agerruj, ɣur-s aẓar n tmedyazt d tẓuri. Ass-a, teqqim-d d azamul n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit timinigt s tesreṭ tamasiḥit yefkan i warra-is ttrebga izaden, i ten-id-yessufɣen d aggagen n yal ukud di yal amkan. Temmut Faḍma di Sbiṭar n la Bretagne di tmurt n Fransa ass n 09 yulyu aseggas 1967.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ɣas yessa s yisennanen umaḍal n usiẓreg ɣef yal win yeqqnen ɣur-s, maca iban-d d ameskar i d taɣtast tamezwarut. D win i d-yesnulfayen, i d-yerran yella udlis s tektiwin-is, i tent-yuɣen ugar n wayeḍnin. Ugar n tuɛert yettimɣuren, tettahda akken ad yaf tiẓrigin ara as-d-yessufɣen tira-ines ɣer ulzuz (ssuq), ur yesɛi umaru ula d yiwen n uzref ara t-iḍemnen, xersum am ucennay. Maca, nnig waya yakk, yerna-d zzmiḍ d ameqqran taggara-a ɣef yimura i d-yessufuɣen ɣef ddemma-nsen. Yekka-d uɣilif-a seg umkan anda ttnuzun yidlisen, imi ttagint-asen at tnedlisin tuṭṭfa n udlis skud mačči s tfakturt ara yettwaxelles, am wakken yella lḥal akked d at teẓrigin. « Mačči akk tinedlisin i yerran ɣer rrif amaru. Maca, nekk ar tura ugint snat ad serseɣ ɣur-sent adlis-iw, yiwet deg Tizi, tayeḍ deg Bgayet». I aɣ-d-tenna yiwet n tmarut. Neɛreḍ, nesteqsa kra n yimḍebbren n tnedlist ɣef rray-a i ddmen war ma xemmem amek ara yezzenz idlisen-is umaru i d-yessufuɣen seg lǧib-is, yenna-aɣ-d bab n tnedlist Guraya: « nekk ur sɛiɣ acu ara xedmeɣ i win i d-yessufuɣen ɣef ddemma-s. D asaḍuf i d-yeqqaren akka. Ihi ur zmireɣ ad ṭṭfeɣ adlis n yiwen war tafakturt». Ur iban anwa i d asaḍuf-a neɣ melmi i d-yeffeɣ? Acku ɣef leḥsab n kra n yimura, ad yili yusa-d ad yerẓ amaru i iferrsen abrid i yiman-is. Ladɣa win i ur nettaf tignatin igerrzen i usufeɣ ɣer teẓrigin. Deg teswiɛt ideg ɣillen yimura tettgerriz tegnit, ladɣa mi ttnernayen yimeɣriyen n tutlayt n Mulud At Mɛemmer, ha-t-an yusa-d wugur-a i yenwan zun ad ten-yessefcel.

  M. K. 

  
 Laqen-as 15 n wagguren n umennuγ  i Ali Ouchen i wakken ad yessiweḍ ad yessers mmi-s Gaya di tγiwant n Arris. Agellid gar yigelliden imezwura n tmazγa, ugin-t yimawlan-is ! Ababat-a i wakken isemma-as i mmi-s Gaya armi i tent-yecrew merriγit, armi yerwa tazla γer creε xas ulamma isem-agi n Gaya yella gar yismawen i yettwaqeblen di tγiwanin. Argaz-a, armi yeṭṭef abugaṭu i d-ibeggnen s ttbut d akken Gaya d isem azzayri i yewweḍ γer lebγi-s. Σlaḥsab n Mass Kouceila Zerguine, abugaṭu n Mass Ouchen, ha-t-an akked yiwet n temsalt-nniḍen yeεnan, di&amp;gamma,; isem amazi&amp;gamma,; tagi d isem ‘’Tifur’’ (tiziri neγ aggur) i yugin ad tt-ssersen di tγiwant n T’kout anda i d-ḍelben ttesriḥ n creε. ‘’Amek Ben Laden, Zeddam, Oussama d wiyaḍ, qebblen-ten, ismawen n yigelliden-nneγ ugin-ten’’ i aγ-d-yenna Ali.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M   

  
 Iban belli deg umaḍal merra, seg ansi i d-yeqreɛ, aṭṭan-a n uxenẓir n tebbuct yuɣal d anezgum ameqqran iseggasen-a ineggura. Ma yella i tmeṭṭut s timmad-is, i terza taluft srid, aṭṭan-a yeggra-d d aɛdaw-is amezwaru. Γas telḥa tussna ɣer sdat, ɣas tuẓa tujjya ayendin, maca ulac ar tura asafar i izemren ad yessuji aṭṭan-a. D acu kan, ɣef wawal n yimsujjiyen imazzagen (spécialistes), inuḥ akka tura wayen nezmer ad nsemmi « asafar amecṭuḥ ». D asafar acku d tidet yesɛa nnuba deg udawi, rnu d asirem ameqqran deg ḥellu n waṭṭan; ta d tamamugrafit (la mammographie) tamzikt. Ala asɛeddi-ya, i ilaq ad yili zik, i izemren ad yessenqes i tuɛert n waṭṭan-a. Yettusemma, ma yella tesɛedda tmeṭṭut zik lḥal ɣef yidmaren-is yella wamek ad teḥlu ɣas ad teffeɣ yebda-tt-id waṭṭan-nni. Maca, ma yella testehza ɣef tezmert-is, turǧa almi tfaq s yiman-is tuḍen akken truḥ ɣur umsujji, ur tezmir tujjya ad as-d-texdem aṭas deg tegnatin-nni, imi aṭṭan-nni axabit ad yili yessaweɣ-itt deg-s yakan akken ilaq. Ihi, ulayɣer ma tkukra tmeṭṭut ad d-tesɛeddi ɣef tezmert-is netta annect tɛeṭṭel annect-nni i tessewɛer ḥellu n tbaɛuct-nni i izemren ad tili deg-s. Ula d ṭṭebbat zgan qqaren asɛeddi seg tazwara d azgen n ḥellu. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Yemmlal ussan-agi iɛeddan uneɣlaf n tmerrit d tẓuri, Mass Hacène Mermouri akked kra n yiɛeggalen n Usqamu unnig n timmuzɣa i ɣef yella d aqerru Mass Assad. Deg temlilit-ag i d-yeḍran deg Uɣlif n tmerrit d tẓuri, yella-d wawal ɣef wahil ara yesdukklen snat n tamiwin-agi i usnerni d tneflit n tutlayt tamaziɣt, ɣef wakken i yella deg tmendawt, ladɣa deg umagrad wis rebɛa i d-yeqqaren : Tamaziɣt d tutlayt taɣelnawt d tunṣibt u ad texdem dduwla ayen iwulmen i wakken ad tt-tessenfel seg yal tama deg wakal aɣelnaw. Akka i d-yella umtawa ɣef uheggi i wussan imezwura n tmedyazt tamaziɣt deg Illizi seg 20 ar 24 tuber 2017 ara d-yasen akked tulya n tsemhut n tmerrit deg unẓul ameqqran. Mtafaqent, diɣ, snat n tamiwin-a ɣef unekcum n tmaziɣt deg usileɣ n yimnar n tmerrit. Am wakken i mmsefhamen ad kemmlen tira n tmaziɣt s tfinaɣ s ufella n yal tasudut n tmurt. Ahil n useqdec n yirmuden-a, ad d-yelli sya d afella gar Uɣlif n tmerrit d tẓuri akked Usqamu unnig n timmuzɣa.

  H. M. 

  
 «Ilaq iselwayen n tɣiwanin ad ilin d imɛiwnen-nneɣ iwakken ad nessiweḍ s aseddu n yisenfaren. Snat n tamiwin-a ma yella ddant afus deg ufus ad ilint deg lmendad ama i yimezdaɣ ama i tmurt sumata.” S wakka i yebda awal-is yimḍebber amaynut n Tubiret Mass Mouloud Cherifi lawan n beddu n lecɣal n useqqamu aɣerfan n twilayt i yebdan ass n larebɛa iɛeddan. D timlilit d-ijemɛen tiget n yimḍebbren deg yiḥricen yemgaraden iwakken ad sqerdcen timsal yerzan isenfaren n unegmu d uheggi n tedrimt iwulmen i lecɣal nnipden. Dɣa d tagnit I ifures lwali iwakken ad d-yini “ad kemmleɣ deg ubrid I d-yenjer yimḍebber yellan yakan da, maca ad ssugteɣ tufɣa ɣer unnar iwakken ad d-zreɣ s anda ddan yisenfaren yebdan.” Ssakin, yella-d wawal ɣef uktazal n temlilit yezrin anda tasqamut yettusbedden tefka-d akka kra seg wayen I texdem. Taneqqiṭ tamenzut d tin yerzan asufeɣ n tedrimt n yisenfaren igellen acḥal d aseggas, d uɛiwed n useddu n yisenfaren nniḍen. Tasqamut-a, tenna dakken “ ilmend n uwellih gar taɣlifin wis 933 n waggur n yebrir n useggas ideg nella, aqel-aɣ nessewjed tadrimt iwulmen I tiɣin n ttawilat n usiweḍ I tuḥwaǧ twilayt. Am waken daɣ I d-nelha s usenfar yerzan aɣawas n tikli daxel n temdint d uheggi n xemsa n yisebdad.” Awal yezzi daɣ deg temlilit-a ɣef ttjara mebla ttriḥ yuɣen aẓar deg tmetti, iḥuza akk timnaḍin n tmurt. Ɣef aya dɣa, imḍebbren n tesqamut sukken-d akka tiṭ ɣef wayen yettaxedmen uqbel am uḥareb n leswaq-a yettwasbedden di yal amkan, ula ɣef yiri n ubrid aɣelnaw. Wid yettmeslayen s yisem n tesqamut fkan-d yiwen n umḍan yewwḍen ɣer 320 n yimessenza iwumi gan amkan deg leswaq yettwasnen, yesɛan ttriḥ. Seg tama nniḍen, timlilit-a tezzi lwelha-s ɣer tedrimt ara teḥwiǧ twilayt ilmend n useggas i d-iteddun. Ɣef waya, yella-d umwata ɣef 1.703.903.470 n yidinaren, d ayen yessawḍen s asenqes n userref s wazal n 18% ɣef useggas yezrin. D yiwet n tedrimt ara yettuferqen ɣef waṭas n yiḥricen. Yella-d wawal d usqerdec s telqayt iwakken ɣer taggara n temlilit yettwaqbel ufraq-a n tedrimt s-ɣur waṭas n yiɛeggalen n usqamu n twilayt mi akken wid yellan deg tama nniḍen ugin ad ttikkin deg ufran.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Smail. M 

  
  Taviṭamint B3 (Taviṭamint PP) 

 tesɛa azal ameqqṛan deg tlalit n tezmert di tfekka, akken tettserriḥ iẓuran n yidammen. Lexṣaṣ-is di tfekka yeslalay-d aṭṭan n la pellagre. Taviṭamint B5 (Acide pantothénique) d nettat i yekkan deg unerni n tesririn n wallaɣ. Tessexdam-itt tussna aṭas deg udawi n ɣelluy n ucebbub, imi tessijhid-it seg yiẓuran.

  Taviṭamint B6 (Pyridoxine) 

 tetteḥwiǧ-itt tfekka deg ddeqs n leqdicat n tassemt d tepṛutinin.

  Taviṭamint B8 (Biotine) 

 azal-is d alqayan deg tlalit n tviṭaminin B9 akk B12.

  Taviṭamint B9 ( Acide folique) 

 d taviṭamint yettwassnen aṭas, imi lexṣaṣ-is yeslalay-d lqella n yidammen (anémie) d lahlakat n yiẓuran n lḥess. Tikwal, lexṣaṣ-is di tallit n tadist yettili d ssebba n ɣelluy-is neɣ tikkwal diɣ talalit n llufan anɛaybu.

  Taviṭamint B12 ( Cobalamine) 

 azal-is icuba mliḥ ɣer win n tviṭamint B9.

  Taviṭamint C (Acide ascorbique) 

 d taviṭamint yettekin deg tlalit n yiwen usafar amaṛkanti tettaḥwaǧi tfekka; asafar n le collagène.

  Acu n wučči i deg ttilint tviṭaminin-a? 

 Yeṭṭuqqqet wučči yesɛan tiviṭaminin-a, d acu kan s umata, taviṭmint A, D, E d K ttilint di tmellalin, ayefki, ttruḍegga, tasa, lḥut n lebḥer, lxeḍra tazeggzawt, iqcer n tčinat akked lfakya.

 Taviṭamint C tettili ddeqs deg lfakya, ma d tiviṭminin B1, B2 d B12 ttilint aṭas deg ubiṣar, aksum, timellalin d uyefki. Ma d taviṭamint B3 teṭṭuqqet deg les céréales d ubiṣar akked taswin.

  Taggara 

 Tazmert n umdan tcudd aṭas ɣer wučči yelhan, yesɛan ddeqs n tviṭaminin labeɛda win meẓẓiyen imi azal-nsent d ameqqṛan akken i t-id nebder s ufella. ɣef waya ilaq ad yettextiṛi s telqay učči-s d win n warraw-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Dali Salima 

  
 Segmi yezri lawan n yigumma i yettilin deg ṭṭjur, aṭas n yisenfan n yifrax i yettqabalen tuɛert akken ad afen tagella-nsen. Ifrax ihi tura, neɣ ussan-a, skud yekfa, neɣ yenqes yuqa wayen ara ččen deg lehwa, ttuḥettamen, am yal aseggas, ad tsubbun ɣer lqaɛa, ad nadin kra swayes ara kksen laẓ. Acu kan, yesḥissif maḍi lḥal, acku amdan ur yettaǧǧa igḍaḍ-nni, ad idiren amek akken uɣen tannumi. Neẓra belli seg wacḥal-aya, gren kra n yiterrasen deg ccɣel n tqefftin, ttkellixen s laman ifrax ur neḥsi send ad rsen fell-asent dakken d tamettant i ten-id-yettraǧun. Seg qeddac d tamnaḍt ideg tettili tmeddayt, ad d-d-nebder seg-sent tid n Ayt Smaɛel d Tsexriwt. Imi deg tamiwin-a, teqwa tmeddayt d tmenɣiwt n leṣnaf n yigḍaḍ, am uɛeẓẓi d wiyaḍ, di yal akud ideg nella. Ccɣel-agi i yettwassnen seg zik, d imeqqranen kan i t-yeṭṭafaren, qqlen lemden-t ula d imecṭaḥ. Acku tura nẓerr arrac n semmus, sḍis almi d ugar n mraw n yiseggasen deg leɛmer, ttruḥun ɣer tẓegwa akken ad mdin. Iban belli yal yiwen amek yettwali taluft-a n tmeddayt, yal wa d acu n rray-is deg-s. Ɣas ahat llan aṭas n wid i yellan mgal, ur asen-tehwi tmenɣiwt n yifrax i yettcebbiḥen agama, lameɛna widak imeddin ur zdin tamuɣli yid-sen. Imi zgan qqaren-d dakken ma yella llum s tidet, ilaq ad t-terren ɣef yimezwura i d-yebdan ccɣel-a, wamma nutni d attbeɛ kan i tebɛen. Dɣa, ad neɛqel deg wawal-nsen belli ɛewwlen ad kemmlen tameddayt-a i d-ufan, mazal ur ttxemmimen ad tt-ǧǧen, ulamma aksum n yigḍaḍ-nni ur yettqenniɛ ur yesserway.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaysa Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Tesfayed tɣiwant lmuqrani id -yezgan deg umalu lwilaya n tubiret seg uṣenfar tnezduɣt anda sersen aẓru n lsasan ass larebɛa yezrin ilmend ass umeɣras , d aṣnfar ara yesɛun 30 tnezduɣin ara yebdun deg ussan-agi kan id- i teddun d win ara yeṭṭfen aseggas d uzgen 18 wayyuren ɛlaḥsab n tkerḍa i yettwaxesen i uṣenfar-a yerna d win ara yesifsen cwiya si cedda n tnezduɣin i yellan akka di temnadt-a ladɣa tiwaculin ur yesɛin ara akal anda ara bnun , am wakken taɣiwant lmuqrani d yiwet seg tɣiwanin tiẓawaliyin ur yesɛin ara tadrimt tameqqrant ara yeselḥun iṣenfaren unegmu rnu s annect-a id- yellan daɣen ass n tmeɣra umeɣras tesfayded temnadt-a s tɣiwant tamaynut i yessalin lecɣal d tin yesɛan akk allalen iwelmen i uxeddim ara yeǧǧen axeddam ad yexddem di tegnatin ifazzen imi yella ayagi iɛeddan ttafen ixeddamen iman nsen di ṭiq d leɣyab n wallalen ameɛna tura ad tefru teɛkumt n wuguren di lxeddma nsen , am wakken teldi daɣen yiwet n tzeqqa yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant lmuqrani di temnadt lḥwadciya ara d-yessufuɣen lekwaɣeḍ i yimezdaɣ-a n tama-a melba ma ruḥen ama d lmuqrani meḥsub d tin ara yesneqsen di leɛtab n twaculin imi sfayden daɣen imezdaɣ lḥwadciya s tzeqqa n tujya anda isefkan isem umeɣras (Lɛeǧal muḥemed saɛid) i yeldin tiwwura-is di taggara n ddurt-agi iɛeddan anda testerḥeb s yimuḍinen i yellan rwan lmeḥna imi ttruḥen ami d ɛin bessam azal 20 yikilumiṭren ɣef taddart nsen , Si tama nniḍen saramen daɣen ad kfun uguren d yiɣublan di temnadt-a imi d yiwet seg temnaḍin umezruy yettwasnen s tegrawla id-immuden 200 yimeɣrasen seg arraw n twaculin di tɣiwant lmuqrani . 

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Abdelhak Menas 

  
 Zouaoui Aghilas d ilemẓi i ilulen deg useggas 2000 deg wass 26 yunyu, yekker-d deg udrum igawawen taddart n tegrawla Imeɣdasen i yettabaԑen taɣiwant Ukeffadu, yeqqar tura deg uswir wis sin deg uɣerbaz alemmas i yellan di tniri .Asmi yesԑa 09 n yiseggasen deg uwtay-is yebda tekcem-it taɣult n teklut acku d win iḥemmlen unuɣen n ugama mi ara iwali tugniwn izaden d thuski tin i d tayri-sd tadfi-is. Amecwar-is yegna-t s ddeqs n wallalen , yessunuɣ n yimru d tewriqt anda ixeddem tifelwiyin , yettseggim aɣawas anda ara yers wunuɣ , yettԑeṭṭil ɣef umahil-is anda yettawi akud ugar n 06 tseԑtin deg texxamt-is n tẓuri neɣ di lexla i tafukt n timedday d uzwu n turin ,xersum deg tsemhuyu n tefsut yessunuɣ ayen icebḥen , ayen yerzan leḥmala , ifrax, aman , tizegzew, deg wussan n umwan d agama n tsusmi ayen iḥeznen , d imeṭṭi , d tafuɣalt anda yexdem ugar n 30 n tfeslwiyin n teklut , udmawen n umezruy anada id-yessuneɣ ccix Aḥeddad , Faḍma n Ssumer d wiyaḍ, ayen icudden ɣer tlelli , tayri ,tamagit, amezruy, tahuski n tudert, tamdanit, izerfan n umdan….. Taɣda n tẓuri inǧǧer-itt-id s tikli icebḥen armi id-yufa yiwen unaẓur «Saàd Idir» d aselmad uẓawan d teklut anda yefka-as tallelt akken tiwwura n uwlaɣ n tẓuri ad llint , yekka deg waṭas n yirmad , tifaskiwin anda yedrew deg temzikent di tfaska n tafat ɣef tgemmi tanmezrayt d yidles n tmurt leqbayel anda id-yerza Yidir Azwaw , yella deg wahil temzizelt n Bgayet «Wadɣir» , yella di yennayer di taddart n tewrirt Akfadu , ass aɣelnaw n umeɣras , ass aɣelnaw n tmeṭṭut….atg, yella deg waṭas leqdicat idelsanen. Aɣilas yekseb tawrikt unaẓur d win iḥemmelen amahil zeddigen , tarrayt-is d tadrigt, tafarest n wayen ixeddem d ayen icudden ɣer cbaḥa n tmurt , aɣnib-is d amggasu, ɣur-s ugten yisenfaren anad yesԑa yiwen usenfar ad iɣer deg uɣerbaz n tẓuri anda iselmaden taklut d wamek tettili tmesɣara-s, asirem meqqer d anesbaɣur , yettak asenmmer i wid i as-yefkan afus i wakken yessawed iswi-is daɣ mazal annar n leqdic ɣer dzat , ad yessenmer aselmad-is n tunuɣt Ardjoun Omar , Saad Idir , imawlan-is acku ula d nutni fkan-as ttawil akken ad yili d amaha ɣer usaḍur-is. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">   -Azedine Abdous- 

  
  Isufar 

 1 kg n yiselman

 1 n tebṣelt

 2 n tfenza n ticcert

 3 n ṭumaṭicin

 1 n tculliḍt n yifelfel aberkan

 ½ n tculliḍt n lkemmun

  Lmelḥ  

 zzit n uzemmur

 1 kg n yifelfel aḥlawan

 500 g n seksu

  Aheggi  

 Ad yettwaxdem seksu am wakken i tuɣem tannumi tettheggim-t. Heggit iselman-nni, syin terrem-ten daxel n tassilt, ternum-asen zzit akked lebṣel. Anef-as azal n 2’, ternum-as ṭumaṭic akked yifelfel aḥlawan ara tgezmem. Rret ɣer tasilt azal n litra n waman, anfet, ad yeww. Ur ḥwaǧen ara yiselman aṭas n lweqt i wakken ad wwen. Mi yewwa seksu, terrem-as aseqqi-nni ara d-tekksem deg tasilt. S tezmert-nwen.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Sɣur Daya 

  
 Timecreḍt d yiwen seg wansayen i tesεa tmurt n Leqbayel. Xeddmen-tt deg leɛwacer (lɛid , taɛacurt, lmulud…) neɣ deg kra n tegnatin am tallit n tkerza neɣ azemmur.

 Tikkelt-agi, nextar ad d-nawi awal ɣef tmecreḍt n ḥertadem deg tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Deg tazwara, nefren ad-nemmeslay s telqay ɣef lewziɛa n taddart n Tahanouts, syin ad d-nejmel akk tuddar-nniḍen i tt-ixedmen, ama ass-nni n umenzu n unbir neɣ ass-nni n lǧemɛa yezrin. Deg taddart-agi n Tahanouts, yeṭṭafaren ɣer tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, uɣalen yimezdaɣ-is aseggas ɣer wansay n lewziεa, yettwassnen s yisem n tmecreḍt n ḥertadem, i d-yettilin yal aseggas deg tazwara n waggur n unbir. Mebɛed mi ur tt-xdimen ara deg useggas iɛeddan, maca ass n lǧemɛ yezrin i d-beggnen iman-nsen belli mazal-iten ṭṭfen deg lɛada-agi n lejdud. Tasebḥit n wass-nni n lğemεa 3 deg waggur-agi n unbir ideg nella, fɣen yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi qeccic meccuc (irgazen, ilmeẓyen akked yigerdan). D timḥezwirit ɣer unnar n Sidi Slimane ideg i d-tella lewziɛa-agi. Ɣef 07h30 n ṣṣbeḥ, mlalen-d akk ɣer umkan uɣur msefhamen, yal wa d acu i d-yewwi: wa d ajenwi, wa d taqabact, wa d tacaqurt…atg. Annect-agi, yusa-d mebɛed mi temlal tesqamut n taddart akked yimezdaɣ-is ass-nni n lǧemɛa 20/10/2017, ideg i d-jemɛen azal n 135 n yimelyan s wayes i d-uɣen rrebɛa n yizegaren i iweznen lqidar n 13,5 n yiqenṭaren, idrimen-agi d arḍal-iten-id-reḍlen yimezdaɣ, rran jemɛen-d azal 26 n yimelyan, 8 deg-sen ass-nni leǧemɛ 20/10/2017 ma d 18 i d-yeqqimen jemɛen-ten-id tasebḥit n wass-nni n lewziɛa. Syin akkin ɣef 08h00, bdan zellun-ten imezdaɣ n taddart, wa deffir wa, s nnuba kan. Syin uzan-ten, yal tarbaɛt teṭṭef yiwen uzger. S unecraḥ d teḍsa i xeddmen yilmeẓyen-nni, mi yeɛya yiwen, wayeḍ ad t-id-yestaɛfu amzun akken d tacemilt neɣ d tiwizi n taddart merra. Ma ɣef 11h00 uzal, bdan afraq n uksum ɣef 328 n tisɣar, yal yiwen ad yawi amur-is seg wayen yellan deg uzger (ul, tasa, aksum, iɣes,…). Syin ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, yal wa yeddem tasɣart i t-id-iṣuḥen. Ma d imeɣban neɣ wid ur nezmir ad xelṣen sehma-nsen, wwin-tt baṭṭel. Yal tasɣart tseɛεu gar 4,5 ar 5 kg, tenza s wazal n 4000 DA. Am wakken daɣen i xedmen ayen iwumi qqaren seksu Rebbi neɣ tameɣra Rebbi, anida i d-nawlen medden ayen zemren, wa d seksu s yibawen, wa d seksu s lubya…atg. Lukan d lebɣi xeddmen-t uqbel lewziɛa, ass-nni ideg ara d-jemɛen idrimen d lewɛadi, maca aseggas-agi, ǧǧan-t armi d ass-nni n tmecreḍt. Ma d tura, ad d-nuɣal ɣer tuddar-nniḍen i ixedmen lewziɛa-agi n ḥertadem deg tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, llant-d akka. Ass-nni n larebɛa amenzu n unbir, d tudrin-a: Akaoudj, Ighil Bouchene, Imkechrene, Boussouar, d tiyaḍ. Ma d tid i tt-ixedmen ass-nni n lǧemɛa iɛeddan 3/11/2017, d tigi: Tahanouts, Ait Khelfats, Ikhelouiene, Igunane Amuer, d tiyaḍ-nniḍen. Ɣer taggara maḍi, ad d-nawi awal ɣef wazal ameqqran i tesεa lewziεa deg tmetti taqbaylit, ama zik ama tura. D tagnit ideg ttemlilin medden, imi yezmer lḥal aseggas ur ttemyagaren ara, imi yal yiwen yelha kan deg ccɣel-is, am wakken qqaren zik:“ tTemmlal tasa d way turew”. D tagnit daɣen, ideg ttemεawanen yimdanen gar-asen, imi yal yiwen ad yexdem ayen iwumi yezmer. D ass ur necbi wiyaḍ, imi taddart si rrif armi d rrif ad tečč akk yiwen n yimensi s uksum, am ugellil am unesbaɣur, yiwet n lmakla ara ččen. D tagnit anida tettnerni tegmat, tddukkli, tiwizi, anida daɣen ttiğhidden wassaɣen gar yimezdaɣ n yal taddart. Ma d iswi n lewziεat-agi n ḥartadem, ɣef wakken i d-qqaren yimɣaren, xedmen-tt i lmend n tfellaḥt, ssuturen deg Sidi Rebbi ad d-tili ṣṣaba deg nneεma, ad d-yessew wakal s waman n ugeffur, ad issebεed tiwaɣiyin n twennaḍt, imi daɣen imir i ibeddu useggas n tfellaḥt ɣer yimaziɣen, dɣa ssuturen deg uxellaq ad yili d aseggas n ṣṣaba d lerzaq… atg.

   Adaoun Abdel Ghani 

  
 Anwi ara yettun ass n umulli n umeɣras Matoub Lwennas ass n 24 deg yennayer 1956 deg taddart n Tewrirt Mussa deg wasum At MAḥmud, taɣiwant At Dwala Tizi Uzzu.

 Lwennas Matub, d yiwen n ucennay ameqqran yettwassnen deg tmurt-nneɣ d tmura n berra. Seg wasmi i yella d amecṭuḥ i iḥemmel ad isel i yicennayen imeqqranen : Sliman Ʃazem, Ccix Lḥesnawi, Ayt Mengellat d Yidir… Yebda s tbidunt kan, simmal simmal yuɣal icennu deg tmeɣriwin deg tuddar. Icennu-asen s tumert, imi d yiwen i iḥemmlen ccna seg yidammen. Ur yeɣri aẓawan, ur yexdim timsirin n ccna. Icennu i yiman-is. Asmi yella d amecṭuḥ, d netta i yellan i lmend n yaya-s, yemma-s d uletma-s imi baba-s yella deg lɣerba. D netta i tufa yemma-s s idis-is. Daɣen yemma-s, Nna Alǧiya, tella d tayemmat, d ababat. Yeɣra lwennas deg uɣerbaz amenzu, maca yezga ur d-yettruḥu ara deg lawan, yerna yezga yettbeddil almi i t-id-ttaran s axxam iselmaden-is. Iswi-ines d ccna, ur yeclig ara di leqraya. Asmi yeɣra amezruy n yimaziɣen , agellid Yugurten mgal irumanen, dɣa tekcem-as tmaziɣt ɣer wallaɣ-is. Yettɣaḍ-it lḥal imi ulac tutlayt n tmaziɣt deg tmurt umaziɣ. Iswi-ines, yenerna gar ccna akked tmaziɣt. Asmi i d as-d-ssawlen akken ad yesɛaddi lɛesker n sin yiseggasen, iruḥ s lferḥ, ur yuggad ara. Iḥar akken ad t-id-yesɛaddi deg useggas 1975 , di Wahran. Dɣa mi yewweḍ ɣer dinna, yettnaɣ d wid yettmeslayen tutlayt taɛrabt, yekkat-iten yeqqar-asen ad meslayen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Deg useggas n 1978, iruḥ ɣer Fransa, yecna dinna deg yiwet n lqahwa yerbaḥ 4000f, dayen i as-ixedmen afud ad yecnu. Icennu deg leqhawi anida llan yiɣriben iqbayliyen. Yemla-as umeddakkel–is Remḍan, acennay ameqqran Yidir , yuɣal daɣen yessen Sliman Ʃazem d Ḥnifa. Lwennas, yefraḥ aṭas imi yessen icennayen-agi imeqqranen n teqbaylit. Yedda d Yidir di Fransa akken ad yessekles tizlatin timezwura ( 1980 / 1988 ). Deg yebrir n 1980, yella lwennas di Fransa mi krent tedyanin n tmurt n leqbayel, mi d-kkren yiqbayliyen , asmi i yugin i Dda Lmulud At Mɛemmer ad d-yexdem asarag deg tseddawit n Ḥesnawa. Wwin aṭas ɣer usekraf, Maṭub, ul-is deg tmurt, acu kan yettwaṭṭef akken ad yecnu deg l’Olympia, ur yeḥbis ara asiwel ɣer tmurt akken ad isel s yisallen yellan , yesḥasef imi ur yezmir ara ad yeğğ tameɣra-s tamezwarut.
