<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 “Aya mačči d amaynut; d ansay aqbur ɣer yimesdurar. Yella seg zik-nni. Mi ak-nnan bdan jebbun-d ilemlumen n lexrif di taggara n ɣuct,..” Win ara yaɣen abrid d asawen, ɣer udrar n ṭɣiwanin n Yilulen Usammer, Iɣram, Icellaḍen, deg lwilaya n Bgayet, deg ussan-agi n taggara n texrif , ad as-d-yettban wabu n tmes ɣef udrar n Yicelladen . D imeksawen i tt-yessaɣayen. Anect-a, d yiwen gar lecɣal n tsemhuyt n umwan (lexrif) ixedmen yifellaḥen. Maca, aya mačči d amaynut; d ansay aqbur ɣer yimesdurar. Yella seg zik-nni. Mi ak-nnan bdan jebbun-d ilemlumen n lexrif di taggara n ɣuct, ad bdun yimeksawen ad skarayen times deg udrar ansa yeṭṭef ugensiw. Ttqissin-t, tama s tama, alamma yerɣa wayen yellan d lmecmel, berra i lemluk d lɣella. s tefransist qqaren-as: ”l’écobuage.” 

 Mi ara ad d-bdunt kan akken legrur n tagara n lexrif, ixellef-d wurɣu-nni; yettak-d adles d aleqqaq. D winna i d- ttḥucun yifellaḥen di lawan n yiweǧǧiben d ccetwa i yezgaren n tyerza. D leεlef i d-yettasen melba adrim yerna bnin, iḥemmel-it lmal. Dinna i ikess lmal amectuḥ, melmi fukken ssmadiḥ n usemmid alamma yedled udfel tiqucac n yidurar . Amkan-nni yerɣan qqaren-as, deg yilulen usammer: Urɣu. Mačči ala imeksawen d yifellaḥen i itezzin ɣer wurɣu, ula d iseggaden d warrac yettandin tixeftin ḥemmlen ad ndin dinna . gar-ak ad tekcem ccetwa, yettuɣal wurɣu d agni n yifrax yecban zzerzur d umergu. “Deg wurɣu kan i ttandiɣ nekkini. Dinna i d-ttaṭṭafeɣ aṭas!», i d-yenna Karim akkedd Snusi At Lḥusin , sin yilmeẓyen n taddart Lmecta. Ttextirin yifrax urɣu imi yettishil dinna uxeggeḍ d unadi ɣef twekkiwin.

<p style="text-align: right;">Brahim B.

  
 Gar-aneɣ kan kra n wussan segmi i d-yeffeɣ udlis amaynut n umeɣnas ilemẓi Akli Muhubi. Mmi-s n Bgayet i d-ilulen deg Uweqqas, taddart n Iɣil Wiss. Yejmeɛ-d semmus n tmucuha n Wat zik, yessamed-d yis-sent adlis-is amezwaru iɣef yeqdec s lebɣi ameqqran seg wacḥal-aya. D taktabt iwumi iga tazwart umeɣnas amaru Mass Nasir Meǧdub. Ma d tawlaft n tduli, texdem-as-t-id tnaẓurt Massa Ɛisu Ɛica. Dɣa, imi adlis-nni deg-s tiqsiḍin n zzman aqbur i d-snulfan yimezwura-nneɣ, yefren umaru amedyaz, ad as-yefk azwel « Timuɛay, seg tgemmi taqbaylit », imi d win i iwala iwulem-as s waṭas. Yuɣ lḥal, ameskar yella u mazal-it ar ass-a, d aneɣmas s tutlayt tamɛemrit. Daymi yerna sɣur-s cwiṭ i tmucha i d-yejmeɛ, imi yekseb tamussni d termit deg usenfali d ucebbeḥ n tira n umeslay. « Umreɣ mi d-ssufɣeɣ adlis-iw, imi nekk iswi-inu d aḥraz n ubruy amecṭuḥ seg ugerruj anesbaɣur n tgemmi-nneɣ ». I aɣ-d-yenna umeskar Akli Muhubi. Adlis-a amaynut, yettnuzu 200 n yidinaren. Zemren ad t-afen yimeɣriyen deg kra n tnedlisin di Bgayet, Aweqqas, Tubiret. Ad yili ula deg yidigan-nniḍen deg wussan i d-iteddun. Ad as-nini i Wakli afud igerrzen. Nessaram timuɛay i d-tessufɣeḍ ad d-fken lfayda i tsuta n wass-a d tin n uzekka. Imi, ɣas yelha mi yettɣimay wayen ḥerrzent tewriqin, maca ilaq daɣen ad ilin wid ara t-yeɣren.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Tlul Nna Cabḥa deg useggas n 1915. Asseggas-a, i tessaweḍ lqern di leεmer-is. Akka, dγa, i as-tga twacult-is amulli ameqqran anda i d-necden aṭas n temγarin. Nna Cabḥa, mazal-itt tettγenni am wakken d tilemẓit, mazal tessen ayen din n tezlatin : tid-nni n zik d tid n tura. tessen ula d tuγac n Matub. Tessen tizlatin acku si zik tcennu γef wakken i d-nnant tmeddukal-is.  100 n yiseggasen deg tudert-is ur tesεi ula d yiwen waṭṭan : tsel tettwali am nettat am medden irkelli.Tecfa γef wayen tesεedda. Yezga yennecraḥ wudem-is, tḥemmel ad tetihi γef tmeddukal-is. Meεna, efk-as ccna teğğa-ak kulci. Tettmektay-d asmi teddekkir kra yekka yiḍ di Buεaṣem, γer ‘’Sadat’’. Mi as-nnan cnu-aγ-d tizlit-nni n Allaoua ‘’Lḥubb-iw amezwaru’’, yecna-d aẓawan-nni meεna tbeddel awalen, teqqar-as ‘’Lḥiğ amezwaru’’ am wakken i d-tenna asefru : ’’(…)ma teẓriḍ-iyi dir-iyi anwa i ak-yennan ad iyi-taγeḍ ?(…) Serreḥ-iyi ad εewdeγ wayeḍ. D tatgnit anda i d-mlal dderya n dderya γer yemma-tsen εzizu. Ihi, s teγzi n leεmer n Nna Cabḥa.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Ass-nni n 22 deg duğember 2014 i d-yeffeγ Album-nni n ZEDEK Mouloud, Album wis 20 deg umecwar-is, amecwar n tlatin n yiseggasen-aya. Album, isema-as ‘’Asderfef’’ neγ asderdef akken qqaren di kra n tamiwin. Llant deg-s 13 n tezlatin. Xas ulamma yella umdan mazal ur as-yesli, yezmer ad d-yaf γef wacu yecna, yettban unnar n ccna n ZEDEK, ttbanen yisental-is, yettban umennuγ-is. Am wakken i yesnaγ tannumi yettawi-d, yal tikelt, ajdid, si yal tama, abrid-a, ad t-naf deg wawalen ijdiden, di lebni n tmedyazt-is akked uγbalu anda i d-yettagem…

 S tezlatin-agi tineggura, iban-d d akken yuli uswir n ZEDEK Mouloud u yuγal yeṭṭef taqacuct di ccna n teqbaylit. Ula d netta iḥus s wanect-a, ayen i t-yeğğan ad d-yexdem ayen zeddigen d wayen swayes ara yettuqader kter.

 Mseḍfarent-d tezlatin εlaḥsab n wazal n usentel γer ucennay. Ayen akk εzizen γer ZEDEK, ihi, d taqbaylit-nni, yezwar-d seg-s. Syin, ḍefren-d yisental-nniḍen εlaḥsab n yiḥulfan n unaẓur. Seg tama n umawal, ad naf aṭas n wawalen-agi ijdiden i yessexdem, ilaq usegzawal (dictionnaire) i win ara as-yeslen. Ugar n 30 n wawalen ijdiden i d-yerna : taγdemt, tawtilt, tiktiwin, tamagit, tafrit, turda, tilawt, taslaḍt…atg Acu kan ayen yelhan γur-s d akken mačči d’’asizdeg’’ i yessazdeg taqbaylit, d timerna i as-d-yerna awalen-a, ur yekkis ara widd-nniḍen : awalen ijenṭaḍ. Am wakken i d-yessekfel awalen-nni iqdimen i yebdan la negren. Yerna-d ula d awalen-nniḍen n taεrabt. Si tama n tmedyazt, ad naf d akken yeẓẓem-d allaγ-is i wakken ad d-yexdem tizlit (Taẓrut) s 52 n yifyar ara ifakken akk s tmeγrut ( if ). Am wakken i d-iban d akken d amdan i yesεan aṭas n tmusniwin, i yeqqaren idlisen u yessemḥasen aṭas i yicennayen. Yewwi-d kra n tenfaliyin γur-sen : yelha leεqel zwir-it (Amour Abdennour), mazal lxir γer sdat (Mohia), ğğet-aγ abrid ad nεeddi (Ideflawen), win yeεyan yesgunfu, win iteddun γer tidet ysssawaḍ ‘’Si tu es fatigué repose-toi, mais n’abandonne jamais’’ (Mouloud Mammeri), yal mi ara yeffer ufrux, iteffer i wakken ad yemmet ‘’les oiseaux se cachent pour mourir’’ d ungal n (Collen McCullough)…atg 

 Ayen-nniḍen, yeεreḍ ad yexdem akk tinfaliyin-is d inzan. Dagi i d-yettban lğehd n umedyaz. Tizlit d amezwarut yefka-as azwel ‘’Taqbaylit-nni’’. Yebda kan yessenṭeq-d agrud, iγenna-d aḥric seg-s. Imi d-yewwi awal γef ungar n tmeslayt, yezwar-d s tifrat. Syin ikemmel yesmekti-d sebbat i yessawḍen γer usedrem n yidles d wamek i d-yella waya : yefka-d imedyaten. Yenna-d ula d asmi ara tuγal tmeslayt d asqewqew.

 ‘’Akkagi ay tettṣar d win ikerhen iman-is.’’ Tizlit tis snat, ‘’lemmer bγiγ’’. Dagi yemmal-d d akken ur yili d acu ay t-iγuren : ur t-iγur lğame&amp;epsilon,; cciεa, tadrimt neγ leḥkem. Yenna-d :

 ‘’ur ttaγeγ tijεal, ur snuzuγ targit,Tin i wumi rriγ azal, isem-is taqbaylit.’’

 Tizlit tis tlata, ‘’Ha-t-an’’. Di tezlit-agi yesḥassef aṭas γef yimeddukel-is imi i t-ğğan deg ubrid weḥd-s, ladγa, di tedyant-nni-ines akk d At ṭṭlam.

 ‘’ur sliγ i nnan yiεdawen, sliγ-as i tsusmi-nwen, tenna-yi akk din yellan.’’

 Tis 4, ‘’Taẓrut’’. Yewwi-d awal, da, γef uqbayli aneggaru n bessif i yebran i nnif, yefka afus di gma-s imi ‘’yeqqen lhemza d llif, summen-as adif.’’

 ‘’gma-s i gma-s yeṭṭarif, d waεdaw i yemyufa.’’

 Tis 5, ‘’Dda Sliman’’. Yerra tajmilt i Slimane Azem. Yessenṭeq-it-id deg uẓekka. Yeḥka-as-d γef teεkumt i yerfed acḥal n lesnin akked wasmi i tt-id-yessers.

 ‘’Yal mi ara yeffer ufrux, iteffer i wakken ad yemmet.’’

 Tis 7, ‘’Ayen iyi-yuγen’’. Dagi yelha-d s tmetti ibeddlen. Kulci yuγal d idrimen. Akken yesseḥseb, yufa yeγleḍ. Daymi i as-yecfa.

 ‘’‘’Win akken nḥemmel, d cḍeḥ i iḥemmel, amendayer ṭṭbel, taqbaylit ur t-tecqi.’’ 

 Tis 8, ‘’Aγerrabu’’. Dagi yuγal-d γer temsalt n lγerba d wamek i d-yerza γer tmurt daxel n lbabur ‘‘aγerrabu.’’ Xas ulamma lγerba d targit n yilmẓyen, meεna γur-s ’’lγerba-w tecmet’’

 Tis 9, ‘’Mm yimezran’’. Yewwi-d γef wugur i yettilin gar sin mi ara myezwağen : di tazwara, d tayri, di taggara d ayen-nniḍen. Meεna netta, ur teεni ara temsalt : mazal am tazwara.

 ‘’Ulawen ṣfan, tayri-nneγ ur tmal.’’

 Tis 10, ‘’Cwi telliḍ’’. Di tezlit-a, yefka-d amek yessifsis γef wul-is mi ara zadent fell-as.

 Rṣu-d allen-im deg wallen-iw,Rnu-as-d aṣeḍsu. 

 Mi ara icebbel wallaγ-iw, Γur-m kan i yettrusu.

 Tis 11, ‘’Winna ḥemmleγ’’. Yessenṭeq-d tameṭṭut i yeğğan winna tḥemmel axater ur tt-yeḥsib ara winna ukked tella. armi i as-truḥ i ifaq s wazal-is.

 ‘’Winna ḥemmel&amp;gamma,; Asmi ruḥe&amp;gamma,; Ass-nni i d as-truḥ.’’

 Tis 12, ‘’Tizwal’’. Di tezlit-a, iḥekku-as-d i mmi-s γef wasmi i xeddmen yimdanen timizar d wanda i ten-teṣṣaweḍ teswiεt ass-a.

 ‘’Tenker tyuga afellaḥ’’

 Tis 13, Kraḍ n tmerwin’’. Yerra-d, da, asefru d anagi γef umecwar-is di ccna. Yal wa amek i t-iwala, meεna netta yefreḥ s wanect-a u yaγal d iseγ imi i lemden yinelmaden asefru-s deg uγerbaz.

 ‘’Win yenwan ad teḍru, yuγal d tamsirt deg uγerbaz.’’

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine. M 

  
 Asufeɣ n yisental n yikayaden n BAC yeǧǧa tadwilt tamezwarut ur tesliḥ deg waṭas n yifurak-is. Wid yellan deffir n wannect-nni teddun srid ad xellsen s ubrid n usaḍuf, imi ar tura d iɛecrayen seg-sen i yettwaṭṭfen sɣur ssrabes n yijadarmiyen. Akken i d-yenna uneɣlaf amezwaru Mass Abdelmalek Sellal d tneɣlaft n ttrebga Massa Nouria Benghabrit, wid yellan d ssebba n uberreḥ n yisental, ur nwan ara kan asdebdeb n tedwilt n mayu, lameɛna daɣen d tiyita i d-wwten deg tmurt-nsen. D ayen ara aɣ-yeǧǧen ad d-nini belli tadwilt-a tis snat n 19 deg yunyu (juin), tlaq, akken ad d-ibin sseḥ seg lekdeb. «Yelha uɛiwed-a n BAC, acku d lmuḥal ad yili useɣti n yisental i yeffɣen!» I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel, send ad d-yernu. «S uɛiwed-a i d-iteddun ad d-ibin s tidet win iẓewren d win ur neẓwir». Ɣef waya, ttwalin aṭas n medden dakken taɣtest (decision) n lḥukuma i uɛiwed n yikayaden d ayen igerrzen, wamma tili yeḍra lbaṭṭel d ameqqran gar yinelmaden. Afud igerrzen i wid ara yesɛeddin!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaïssa Khalifi 

  
 Abderrahmane Timsi d yiwen gar yimedyazen neɣ yinaẓuren i yefkan ruḥ-is i tmedyazt n teqbaylit neɣ n tamaziɣt s umata. D yiwengar wid-ak i yesnarnin azal n tmedyazt d tẓuri n teqbaylit. Yeffka azal d ameqqran i tmedyazt n teqbaylit, imi yura aṭas ɣef teqbaylit d tmaziɣt s umata.Tayri-is i tmaziɣt d isefra demmeren-t ad yaɣ abrid n tira n tmedyazt deg yidlisen.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Deg tazwara, anwa i d Mass Abderrahmaneman Timsi? 

 Luleɣ ass 25 deg Yebrir 1964, di taddart Tala Tenzar deg tɣiwant At Imԑuc deg lwilaya n Bgayet.D amaru u d amedyaz atrar n tmedyazt n tmaziɣt.

  Amek i tesԑeddaḍ ussan n temẓi-ik? 

 Deg tazwara ɣriɣ deg tamanaɣt 5 n yiseggasen imenza n usegmi, deg uɣerbaz amezwaru“HarkatTayeb”. Syin uɣaleɣ-d ɣer Bgayet kemmleɣ din aseggas, dɣa uwiɣ-d akayad amezwaru (6ème), maca ur kemmleɣ ara deg uɣerbaz alemmas (C E M). Syin akkin kemmleɣ ddunit-iw s lḥif d leεtab, maca ass-a yeffeɣ-iyi leεtab ɣer tafat.

  I melmi tebdiḍ tira n tmedyazt?U d acu n sseba imi d-tettaruḍ? 

 Bdiɣ tira n tmedyazt deg useggas n 1980, asmi lliɣ 16 n yiseggasen di leԑmer-iw.Ma d tamentilt i yi-ğğan ad awiɣ abrid n tira n tmedyazt, d iḥulfan-iw d wayen akk nettidir d wayen nettwali deg tmetti-nneɣ.D lḥif ,lmeḥna, tudertreẓagen, I yi-d-yellin allen akken ad aruɣ isefra.

  Anwa asefru i swayes tettwasneḍ aṭas ? 

 Asefru i swayes ttwasneɣ mliḥ, d win yuɣalen am nekwa-w, d asefru-nni n « Slam », ixedmeɣ deg useggas 1991. D win i d-yeddan deg wammud-a-inu amezwaru n yisefra, iwumi semmaɣ »A yemma ».

  Achal n yidliseni d-tessuffɣeḍ yakan? 

 Tura akka suffeɣeɣ-d kan yiwen n udlis, d ammud n yisefra s tmeslayt n teqbaylit, iwumi semmaɣ »A yemma », i d-yeffɣen deg useggas 2012, ɣer tezrigin « Belles Lettres » ,i yuɣalen ass-a tettwasen s yisem « Tafat », u deg ammud-ayi llan 60 n yisefra.

  D acu i d-tamuɣli-k ɣef udlis-ik amenzu? 

 Xas akken yiwen kan n udlis i d-sazergeɣ yakan, maca yenza aṭas di ssuq, d win i yi-yuwin aṭas n udrim d tmussni. Ayen i yi-sferḥen aṭas deg-s imi selmaden s yisefra yellan deg-s di kra n yiɣerbazen.

  Ma tzemreḍ ad aɣ-d-tehduḍ tukkist seg yiwen gar yisefra-inek?. 

 Mačči d ugur, mebla lmezya. Ad awen-d-hduɣ tukkis tseg usefru-nni « Slam », ha-ta ɣur-wen ihi.

 <em>Slam-iw i wid yeṭsenGuman ad walin tafatIgenniur t-id-sseɣrasenNutni teԑreq-asen tmeslaytAnwa azrem ad t-qqsenSsuq d sbeḥ mi t-ifatTaqbaylitwara ad iyi-tt-yekksen Ma d keččdegwamanAcu n yisental iɣef </em>

  tettaruḍ tamedyazt-ik? 

 Isental iɣef uriɣ tamedyazt-iw uwiɣ-ten-id seg tmetti-nneɣ tamaziɣt (tajaddit, ansayen, idles amaziɣ…), di tira-w cuddeɣ-d aṭas n yisental yecban: tayemmat, timetti-nneɣ, tamurt-nneɣ, tayri, timsal n ddunit, amezruy, lḥif, ayen iyi-ceɣben, tudert umedyaz…atg.

  Amek i ilaq ad yili umedyaz neɣ umaru? 

 Amedyaz ur yesԑi tilisa, ilaq ad yaru neɣ ad yesnԑet ayen ixeddem, akken ad t-issinen medden. Ilaq ad yili d lemri n tmetti-ines d inigi ɣef tallit-is, d netta i d aktay n ugdud-ines. Amedyaz ilaq ad yawi awal aqbayli aqbur, ad iqelleb ɣef tidet d umezruy&amp;hellip,; akken ad iseԑlem tisuta i d-iteddun. Ilaq ad inadi ɣef lasel-is, ilaq ur isteqneԑ ara swayen yesԑa n tussna d tmawalt.

  Awal-ik n taggara? 

 Tanemmirt-ik a Mass Abdelghani imi tgiḍ azal i nekk d udlis-iw, tanemmirt s tussda i Uɣmisn Yimaziɣen, imi i yi-iga amkan deg yisebtar-is.Slam-iw ɣef wid i yi-iḥemmlen d yimeɣriyen-inu di yal amkan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa- t: Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Tessufeɣ-d ussan-a tmarut Kaysa Xalifi, i yettarun deg yisebtar-a n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen, yiwen n wungal s wazal-is s uzwel “Iḥulfan”. Ahat deg wawal-a aneggaru ad yegzu yiwen ɣef wacu isenned, imi ɣef wakken i d-tenna tmarut: ‘’ulac acu yezmer ad yaru walebɛaḍ war aḥulfu neɣ war ma iḥulfa-as, imi tebna ddunit ɣef yiḥulfan. Maca, tamɛayt n wungal-a, tettaǧǧa-yi tikwal ḥebbseɣ tira imi izad deg-s uḥulfu’’. Seg tama n usentel, aṭas n tlufa i tḥuza Kaysa deg termit-is tamenzut deg ssenf-a n tira. Am wakken dɣa i iger tamawt umasdawan Kamal Buɛmara i as-igan tazwart i wungal-a. Tebda-tt-id seg snat n twaculin i tesɛa Yelda, anda deg yal yiwet yella win i tḥemmel ayendin; Mennad deg tmezwarut d Mbarek deg tis snat. Tuɣal ɣer uqeyyem n wazalen n tmiddwa neɣ n tdukkli, dima s yisem n Yelda i d-ibanen d tawudamt tagejdant n wungal seg tama n twetmin. Acku seg tama n yiwetman, ula d imeɣri ad ifiq d Mennad i d asaḍ n teqsiḍt. Yuklal aya dɣa akken ilaq. S waya, ad naweḍ ɣer wayen i d-ibanen d asentel-nniḍen iweqmen n wungal, imi yuzzel aṭas wawal fell-as deg wullis. Tban-d tettwaḥuza Kaysa seg yiwen n wudem n temsirit (racisme) i tettwali deg ddunit-a. Dɣa, yal imeɣri ara iḍillen ɣef tektiwin i d-yellan ɣef tferrawin ticebḥanin, yezmer kan ad yeddu yid-sen. Nnig n tuffirt d ccbaḥa n tira i d-irennun tiẓeḍt n tɣuri, seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ tefka Kaysa iḍrisen i waṭas n tlufa-nniḍen; ama d ansayen, d tussna, d tamussni neɣ anecreḥ. Ungal-a, yella tura deg waṭas n tnedlisin. D ayen iɣef ara yili wawal s wudem aseklan ɣer sdat. Taɣuri igerrzen

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

<div> 
  
 Azekka, di tmurt-nneɣ d leɛyudat, ahat snat ɣef kradet. Tamenzut, d tin akken yerzan timunent, tin akken yessuzfen lḥif ɣef ugdud yeddren ddaw n lḥafer unekcam azal n 132 n yiseggasen.

 D lɛid, d tameɣra neɣ ahat d talalit tis snat n ugdud, win akken i d-tessager llafɛa. lɛid wis sin, d lɛid n yilmeẓyen, wissen kan ahat ma stufan ad sfuglen yis-s neɣ d ass ara yefsin am udfel ara iḥaz yiṭij. Acku, yezmer ad yewḥel gar sin leɛyudat, ladɣa win akken yerzan taggara n Remḍan. D wa dɣa iɣef i itezzi wawal. Di tazwara, iḍ-a ara d-iban ma d taggara n waggur n Remḍan neɣ ala. Tayeḍ, d aqabel n tfaska-a i iceɣben imdanen. Uẓamen Yizzayriyen aseggas-a di lḥif n leɣla n yisufar. Ur d-yelli kra n tɛessast ɣef wazalen n yisufar, almi leswaq tecɛel deg-sen tmes. Imessenza akken llan d imɛelmen, ulac win ara iḍebbren fell-asen. Teksa mebla ameksa, neɣ d ttar n useggas iɛeddan mi akken taɣlift n tjara tbedd di yal tamnaḍt n tmurt I wakken ad tesseḥbiber ɣef tudert n uzzayri, aẓawali labaɛda. Gguman akken yimawen ad tt-id-inin, wamma deg wallaɣen tefra, mi ara yili win ibedden ɣer lxedma-s isemṣaren, ad unagen, ad rǧun melmi ara yili ubeddel ara yeffɣen fell-asen. Ihi, d ayen rǧan i d-yusan, imi adellaɛ yenza s 150 n yidinaren deg wass amenzu n remḍan mi akken yella iḍelli-nni kan s 50. Tura, d lɛid, amager-is mačči d win isehlen. Aggus iwulem ad yili seg yidmaren imi yeḥwaǧ tadrimt. Wid akken yettidiren s tjarnant xfifen ad tiqsiḥ fell-asen tegnit. Igerdan, ttrajun ass-a s ccuq, ttemɛanaden gar-asen ɣef yiselsa, ladɣa tiqcicin. D ass, daɣ, n uɣafar n twelliyin, n tirza ɣef wid d tid turez tasa, d awezɣi ad nruḥ afus yekkat aḍar. Aya irkelli s udrim. Yenna-as Muḥya:” aha ziɣ kmez aɛrur-ik, wwet ad d-alin.” Meɛna anisi ara d-ffɣen, ma yeǧǧa-d dɣa remḍan kra ara yeččenčnen deg lǧib ! Nezzi-d akka ɣef tḥuna, nemmuger-d imawlan, irkeb-iten lḥir. Saɛid, yiwen n ubabat n tlata n dderya, yezzi wallaɣ-is, imi arraw-is bɣan iselsa seg tefdent alamma d aqerru, meɛna ssuma tufrar. Dɣa din i d-yenna:” yal yiwen deg-sen ilaq ad xelseɣ fell-as sin n yimelyunen n ssantim, nutni di tlata, af-as tura kečč leḥsab.” Yerna ikemmel:” nwiɣ ad d-aɣeɣ taɣawsa i yal yiwen, mi d-newweḍ ɣer da, ata-n ḥernen, ilaq ad aɣen kullec, nekk liḥala-w d tin rqiqen.” Di tama-nniḍen n temdint, tiḥuna ttbegginen-d iselsa akken ara jebden tamuɣli. Nemmuger-d aṭas n yimawlan, tadfert-nsen ɣer tama. Igerdan ttmuqulen ayen yelhan, imawlan tiṭ-nsen ɣer ssuma, anda ara d-ssigren cwiṭ. Da izad, da yenqes ! Imessenza, si tama-nsen, ttcetkin ɣef leɣla, ttgallan ma ttawin kra n lfayda yufraren. Zgan qqaren, amzun akken msefhamen : «welleh ar tikkelt-a, ssalin-aɣ di ssuma i yal akk iselsa. Ula d nekkni ur nufi ara amek ara nessishel i yimdanen, tekka nnig n tezmert-nneɣ.” Lḥasun, yal tama tettuɣu. Ɣer taggara, d win akken i d-yuɣen ideg ters tyita. “A tafat n tifrat, mmel-aɣ abrid ɣer sdat.” Yak akka i yella deg <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>wawal ! 

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Smail. M 

  
 Ma ur ibekker ara yiwen n tsaɛet neɣ snat ɣer lbusṭa n Ubqu, ur yessawaḍ ara ad d-yeqḍu kra n tɣawsa yeḥwaǧ dinna imi aṭas n lɣaci i tt-id-iqesden, yal ass, seg tudrin i d-yezzin i tɣiwant. Deg laɛwacer neɣ di lawan n lexlas n yixeddamen, tuget n yimezdaɣ, ttruḥun ɣer tɣiwant n Yiɣrem d Uzellagen i wakken ad d-jebden idrimen-nsen .‘’Dlewhayem, snat n lbusta i nnig 150 000 d amezdaɣ’’, i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen urgaz. Simmal, ad yettzad leɛdad n yimezdaɣ, simmal, ad ttnernin wuguren di lbusta n Uqbu ɣef yixedamen-is imi nutni, si tama-nsen, ur zmiren ara ad qablen annect-nni n lɣaci i d –yettasen yal ass. Ḍeyqent mliḥ, rnu leɛdad ixedamen-nsent drus. kif kif daɣen ɣef wid i tt-id-iqesden: ur sawaḍen ara ad qḍun ayen qesden di lawan seg uraju d umdegger. Ugur ameqqran, ttnalent yimɣaren d yimeɛdar . ’’ur zriɣ ara amek ara nettmeslay ɣef Uqbu ad yuɣal d lwilaya, nekni mazal ɣer ass-a di lbusṭa-nni akken i d –teǧǧa fransa. tella yiwet d tameẓyant, maca mi testeqsaḍ ad ak-inin ulac la connexion ‘’ i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen yilemẓi i nesteqsa .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim Benhamouche  

 
  
 Aneɣmis (information) yella kan d ameslay gar yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel seg waṭas d aseggas tura. Meḥsub iɣermanen-is (citoyens) llan ɣilen belli taɣiwant-a, i yeggugen (ibeɛden) s wazal n 60 n yikilumitren ɣef Bgayet, ur tettɛeṭṭil ara ad tettwiqqen s lgaz n temdint neɣ n lḥiḍ. Maca ddurt yezrin yuɣal-d wawal-a n wacḥal-aya d unsib (officiel). Mi akken rgen yimḍebbren n tɣiwant ed kra n yimezdaɣ n taddart ɣer temnaḍt mu ssawalen « Aswel » bac ad walin annar ed ubrid ansi yezmer ad d-yekk ugazuduk. « Nelḥem ɣer umḍiq anda nga yiwet n tezrawt ɣef wansi ara d-iɛeddi uteyyu-nni, syin akin, kra n win yettsayalen akal din, nessawel-as bac ad yestenyi turagt n uɛeddi ». Aya yenna-aɣ-t-id unmazul n uselway (vice-président)  n tɣiwant n Ayt-Smaɛel mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi, send ad d-yernu ɣef ssmamat i d-yettak usenfar i yimal. « Ar tura aṭas i yestenyan yakan, llan d tidet werɛad, mazal steqsayen, maca yettban-aɣ-d ur d-nettmagar ara ugur seg tama-ya, skud asenfar d ayen ara yekksen taɛkemt i yimezdaɣ merra ». D tidet, ur ilaq ara akk ad d-tmager tɣiwant tiririyin n « uhu » sɣur imezdaɣ, ḥaca ma yella smenyifen aqaɛ ed ubellaɛ akken qqaren, rnan ttun lmeḥna-nni n yennayer n useggas 2012, asmi rewwun leɛtab, aḥeyyer, adaxel , ed uḥebber bac ad afen tabutayt n lgaz. Ad d-nesmekti dakken taɣbalut n lgaz-a ad d-taweḍ Ayt-Smaɛel seg temnaḍt Tala n Yifassen i yettabaɛen tawilayt n Seṭṭif, dɣa syin ad d-tekcem Buyman anda ara tettwasbedd teɣsert-nni (station de détente), seg wansi ara ttwasseččent ihi akk tuddart n Ayt Smaɛel, send mara tesdaffel amḍiq « Aswel ». Mara yekfu umgar n tzemmilin, ad yettwasres ukaram(dossier) n tezrawt iwakken ad yettwajerred usenfar deg tazwara n useggas-a ara d-ikecmen n 2015. Dɣa, rnu kra n wakud ad bdun yiqeddicen, i nessaram ur ttaɣen ara amecwar bac ad kfun. « S lferḥ d agaɛmir ay nlaqa lexber-a, nessaram kan ur yekkat xilla n yiseggasen bac ad yekfu ». I d-yenna yiwen n uɣerman n Ayt-Smaɛel. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Aṭas i yezzuzen ucewwiq-is, mi tella dɣa gar tlawin tizwawin timenza i ikecmen annar-a n ccna aqerruy ibedd. Imi deg tfaska-ya n tmedyezt n Udrar n Fad i nettat ara tettwar tejmilt, nesteqsa-tt ɣef yidles s umata, fell-as akked ttiɛad-a n meɣres, hata wamek i d-teldi Malika Dumran ul-is i yimeɣriyen. 

  Akken ad nebdu, amek tettili Malika Domrane, ed wamek tleḥḥu i tudert-is tikwal deg tmurt tikwal deg Fransa? 

 Malika Dumran: Tanemmirt. Aql-i gerrzeɣ. Ddakkaleɣ akked tudert-iw tamirant s beṭṭu n wakud gar Pari ed Tezwawt. Tudert-a yeftin ɣef sin n yimeḍqan n tudert tettarra-yi lhiɣ skud ttarraɣ tiɣri i tedfiyin-iw (désirs), ssemraseɣ tigawin tidelsanin, tinmettiyin daɣen, akken i tent-riɣ.

  Ma tebɣiḍ ad nuɣal ɣer yizri (passé), ɣer tezrawin-im timezwura, am tesnawit (lycée) akked terkeft-nni yettwassnen ideg telliḍ gar tid i tt-id-yesnulfan. Mmeslay-aneɣ-d ɣef tallit-nni icebḥen… 

 D tidet, llan d akuden igerrzen, tallit-nni tella d tin yelhan aṭas deg tudert-iw! Ass-a, mara d-ttmektayeɣ tarbaɛt n ccna n tesnawit, ttageɣ-it s tumert wala s lxiq, acku smenyifeɣ ad sɛuɣ aqennaɛ-nni dakken aɣan-iw (devoir) giɣ-t, wala lqerḥ n tuɣalin ɣer temẓi. Seg tama-w, ẓriɣ dakken aṭas n uqeddic aẓayan aɣezfan, i ilaq fell-i, i ilaq fell-aɣ ad neg daɣen i usemɣer, maca ladɣa i usnerni n yidles-nneɣ. La chorale i lliɣ sbeddeɣ-d akked kra n temdukkal d nettat i yeldin tawwurt ad bduɣ amecwar-iw n tnaẓurt. Lliɣ nwiɣ ad ssenfaliɣ s tezlit akken kan ad d-iniɣ « ihwah » inmetti, tugart tugart amagan, ɣas ma syin akkin ssenfalay-d s tigawt tameɣnast nekk d taqcict d tameẓyant, rnu griɣ iman-iw deg umennuɣ-a aɣezfan n usuter. Ḥqa! Ttuɣ iman-iw! Ur ilaq ad sqedceɣ awal « asuter » acku ur yelli wacu ara ssutreɣ ɣef lasel-iw: lasel-iw d tamaziɣt… Ad yeqqim akken i lebda. Hata wamek nɣelli nekni, imeɣnasen, deg yinawen n tkerkas. Lasel alsan ur t-nessutur ara, maca nesbeggin-it-d.

  Qqaren-d dakken telliḍ tugiḍ ad tefkeḍ abernus i Bumedyen. ḥaca nezmer ad d-nefhem tigawt tameɣnast. Yak? 

 D tidet, lliɣ ugiɣ ad geɣ tigawt-nni i d-yekkan seg timmeɣnest. Ɣas ma d tameskant maca d tidettit rnu daɣen tḥettem-d iman-is. Acu bɣiɣ ad d-iniɣ s waya? Ahat acku tikti i lliɣ sɛiɣ ɣef uselway-a ur ddukklent ara akked tiktiwin n tallit-nni… Ula ass-a daɣen, acku yekkat deg tmagit tamaziɣt n tmurt. S kra n uḥezzeb, ur ndemmeɣ ara mi giɣ tigawt-nni, umi zemreɣ ad d-alseɣ, s tebɣest, lemmer tagnit tayeḍ ad d-teḥḍer. 

  Amek gan wassaɣen-im n tmussni i telliḍ tesɛiḍ akked Margarit Ṭawes Ɛemruc? 

 Ɣef Ṭawes Ɛemruc, cfiɣ ttaruɣ tibratin s ufus ddaw leɛnaya n nanna Cabḥa i yellan tettaru i cantatrice. Yiwen n wass, tameṭṭut tameqqrant tusa-d ɣer udrum-nneɣ, i tiẓri n xalti-s deg Tizi Hibel, taddart-iw n tlalit. Mi iyi-tehwa akken tmeṭṭut-nni icebḥen, i yettqenniɛen, mlaleɣ-tt ihi din. Lliɣ sɛiɣ 12 n yiseggasen. Tenna-yi-d ayyuz ɣef tira-nni, terna tqelleb-d acebbub-iw, d asebɣes seg tama-s. Tura akka cedheɣ-tt aṭas, acku tella tban-iyi-d kan am deg targit icebḥen: Taneglust tban-d taswiɛt, tuɣal teṭṭaxer…

  Nezmer ad d-nini dakken tazibba n ureɣ i d-tḥellaḍ deg tfaska taferkant, tceyyeɛ-ikem akkin i sdat ? 

 Lliɣ cerheɣ aṭas seg tzibba-nni n ureɣ… Syin akkin, lliɣ ttwaɣelbeɣ sɣur yiwen n usḥissef d ameqqran. Acimi? Acku imir-nni wwiɣ-d s yisalli dakken massa Ṭawes Ɛemruc, i yellan teḥḍer deg tfaska-nni, ur d-tettwanced ara i ccna. Akken ttxemmimeɣ nekkini, lemmer ḥsiɣ seg tazwara s wanect-nni, tili ugiɣ tazibba-nni acku tanaẓurt n Ṭawes εemruc tella tesɛa amḍiq dinna… wala kra n wiyaḍ neɣ ad d-iniɣ ugar n wiyaḍ!

  Tamɛayt-im akked tlawin timuḍinin ur tettwattaw ara. Amek ihi? Ma neẓra dakken telliḍ d asafar-nsent i tent-yessuṭusen.. Ahat d awal fell-asent skud tgiḍ-asent ula d tijmilin deg kra n tezlatin ? 

 Imir-nni qeddceɣ d tafiremlit deg sbiṭar n Wasif n Ayt εisi deg Tizi Wezzu, ttdawiɣ tulawin i yesɛan uguren deg leɛqel. Ccetkayent-iyi-d iɣilifen-nsent, s yidim asemmaḍ n leǧwareḥ-nsent, n tugna-nsent, ttwaɣelbent s yiɣeblan-nsent inmettiyen (difficultés sociales), n twacult neɣ n tissulya. Llant-iyi-d d taɣbalut n tehregt, d tisit (lemri) n ugraw inmetti, adelsan. Snemmireɣ-tent ɣef wayen i d-ssufuɣent, daɣen qqareɣ-asent dakken aql-i yid-sent. Deg tidet, war ma ẓriɣ, lliɣ ssemraseɣ taẓuri n udawi, segmi bdiɣ d tacennayt, ed tafiremlit. 

  Aṭas i tennuɣeḍ ɣef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut. Neqqar-as ahat tura tcerheḍ segmi ibeddel ass-a uẓayer n tmeṭṭut? 

 Uhu, ur criheɣ ara acku mazal aṭas n uxeddim ed ubeddel ama deg tmuɣli n urgaz s umata neɣ n urgaz azwaw s lxusus ɣef tmeṭṭut. Asaḍuf azzayri ur iyi-d-yettban ara yebna ɣef yiwen n usemsawi n tidet gar urgaz ed tmeṭṭut. Yettusemma bɣiɣ ad d-iniɣ, argaz ad yili deg umḍiq-is, tameṭṭut daɣen: ad yettwakkes uzaglu-nni n tmeṭṭut i as-d-yesrusuy urgaz. 

  Deffir n tdukkla « Muḥend At Lḥaǧ » n Tersatin deg Yiɛeẓẓugen, Tidukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad tebɣa ad kem-terr tajmilt deg meɣres-a mi i kem-d-teɛreḍ d tinebgit n yiseɣ n teẓrigt tis mraw ed kraḍ n tmedyezt tamaziɣt. D acu tettḥulfuḍ seg yiqeddicen-a? 

 Ttḥulfuɣ s zzux, skud d tanaẓurt i lliɣ, daɣen d tameɣnast… maca daɣen ɣef at-iw i yerḥa yiseɣ, d azalen alsanen, d azalen inmettiyen, d azalen n wassaɣen yesfan… d azalen imaganen. Rnu, ilemẓiyen-a imeɣnasen n Tdukkla Adrar n Fad, i d-mlaleɣ mi iyi-d-necden i ttiɛad-nni, ssawḍen ad iyi-qennɛen s umeslay-nsen iwulmen, iweznen. Cerheɣ aṭas mi ẓriɣ dakken llan deg tmurt-iw yilemẓiyen ttuqennɛen ed ttqenniɛen, i yekkaten ɣef yiwen n umennuɣ.

  Aṭas i kem-yessawalen « Tabergazt » almi yuɣal d isem-im wis sin. Ahat, ḥaca tzemreḍ ad tferḥeḍ seg waya? 

 Irem-a (terme) yettarra ɣer tesga tillit-iw d tawtemt, acku nekk d tameṭṭut ur d kra nniḍen. Cuddeɣ i tmadit-iw, maca daɣen i tugna-yiw. Ma yehwa-yawen, qebleɣ ad iyi-ssawalen « Tameṭṭut n umenzay ». Ɣef waya, ḥemmleɣ irgazen, tulawin, i iteddan i tlufa s terẓen, sseqdacen akk tazmert-nsen. Ɛuffeɣ wigad, ed tigad, i yulwayen sdat n tlufa, ur sseqdacen tazmert-nsen. Ineggura-ya, ayen d imexsas n tebɣest, izwawen n uqeddic, irgazen i ur nemɛin…

  Ur nezmir ad nɛeddi akken war ma nemmeslay ɣef Lwennas n Ayt Lewnis (Lwennas Meɛtub). D acu-ten waktayen (souvenirs) i tesɛiḍ ɣef urgaz-a n umedya ? 

 Argaz d Ameqqran yeɣli… argaz d ameẓyan iɣez tamṭelt-is mi i t-yenɣa. Ihi din, d netta s timmad-is i yeɣlin din seg wakken yeffer tidet, imi dɣa argaz i izemren ad d-yini ulac-it da akken ad t-id-yini. Irgazen nniḍen, tulawin nniḍen, qqaren-it-id deg umḍiq-is, ttarran nnican ɣer urgaz-nni « imseɣli » n urgaz ameqqran. Lwennas yemmut fell-anteɣ, fell-aneɣ merra, ɣef yidles-nneɣ, ɣef tlelli-nneɣ… Ma yella d aktayen, ur sɛiɣ ara, ahat ad ken-swehmeɣ s waya. Maca nekk ɣur-i, mazal yettidir unaẓur, anaẓur yella, deg-i, deg-wen… Ur bɣiɣ ad d-mmeslay ɣef Lwennas s waktayen acku aktayen d menwala-ten, ma d Anaẓur ur d menwala… Lḥasul, « aktayen » i sɛiɣ ɣef Lwennas d afelleq…

  Ur tettxemmimmeḍ ad d-tuɣaleḍ s kra n uḍebsi amaynut deg yimal iqerben ? 

 Atan n yiqeddicen i ldiɣ… Aql-i qeddceɣ…

  Tanemmirt a Malika Dumran mi i d-terriḍ i yisteqsiyen-nneɣ, d acu d awal-im n taggara akken ad nseqqef? 

 Tanemmirt ɣef tinnubga-nwen, ad d-aseɣ s tedfi akked tumert akken ad tekkiɣ deg ttiɛad-nni adelsan. Ɣef waya, nekk ad sbeɣseɣ tigawin i yecban tayla-nwen, s wazal-is deg tqacuct, ed wazal i tettakkem i yiqeddicen idelsanen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-tt: Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis i iεeddan 24/11/2016, i telli s wudem unsib tezrigt tis ttesεa n rreḥba n udlis n Ğerğer, ɣef 10h n ṣṣbah deg temkerḍit tagejdant, i yellin tiwwura-as melmukan. Tin i d-yellan ɣef teɣzi n ddurt, imi tebda ass-nni n amhad 24/11/2016 ad tekfu azekka n aram 29/11/2016. Tettili-d rreḥba-agi n useggas-agi deg ukuẓ n yimukan, ama deg temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n Tizi Uzzu, ama deg uxxam n yidles-is Lmulud At Mεemmer d umaruz-is (annexe) n Azazga, d uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine, tettili-d daɣen deg temkerḍiyin n kra n tɣiwanin. D rreḥba n udlis deg tezrigt-is tis tẓa, s usentel “Seg tussnamdan ɣer tgemmi, abrid ɣer yiman” ideg ara ttekkint azal n 30 n tezrigin ara ixedmen timsikiyin n yidlisen-nsent, ad d-nebder gar-asent: El Amel, Arts Plume, La pensée, Tamagit, , Asirem, Richa Elsam, Numide(…). Am wakken daɣen ara yilin 15 n yimaryen ara ixdmen asenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen-nsen, gar:asen Ahcène Mariche, Yousef Merahi, Rabah Ben Amghar, Abderrhmane Yefsah, Idir Bellali, Amziane Lounés, Chabane Imache, Hocine Harouni…Tazrigt-agi ad tettili-d d tajmilt i tlata n wudmawen mucaεen deg wannar n tira, wigi d: Nabil Fares (1934-2016) d Fanny Colonna (1934-2014), akked Mouhamed Brahim Salhi (1952-2016). Aṭas n yidisan i d-isuddsen rreḥba-a n udlis, gar-asen: taneɣlaft n yidles, tanmehla n yidles d uxxam n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, d uxxam n umezgun amniḍan, s lemεawna n tesqamut n leqdicat idelsanen d tẓuri…atg.Heggan-d ahil d amerkanti beddema i leqdic-adi adelsan, imi ttilin-d aṭas n yisaragen d iskasiyen sɣur iselmaden n tesdawit, yecban Said Chemakh, Azeddine Kenzi, Habibi Mohamed Akli…atg. D isaragen i d-yewwin awal ɣer tudert d tira n yimyura-agi i meqqranen n tmurt-nneɣ. Am wakken i d-ttilint yal ass deg ukuẓ n yimukan i d-nebder yakkan, temsikeniyin n 30 n yixxamen tezrigin, i d-isenεaten idlisen-nsent d usenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen n 15 n yimura i d yerza aseggas-agi. Tellili-d daɣen tɣuri n tmedyazt, sɣur aṭas n yimedyazen, yella daɣen usenεet n tceqqufin n umezgun…Ma d ass aneggaru 29/11/2016, ad d-tili tukci n warrazen d igerdasen n usebɣes, deg uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu, i wid akk yettekkin deg rreḥba-agi, ad salin leqdic-agi s yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun “Julius Caesar de William Shakespeare”, ara d-senεet tiddukla tameɣra n Uqbu. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani. 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Seg usfuggel n ttiɛad amezray n 8 deg mayu 1945, ideg i d-thegga tuffɣa ɣer taddart n Ayt Felkay, i yeṭṭafaren taɣiwant n Yiderginen, ideg asentel i d-yettwafernen i temlilit, yella «Amezruy ed tgemmi», d tagnit n tidet ass-nni i Tdukkla Asirem Guraya akken ad d-tesbeyyen tadukkli-s akked yimezdaɣ idiganen, daɣen ad teḥrez imeḍqan igerrzen i yellan din: d igamanen, d idelsanen neɣ d imezrayen. Ddeqs ihi n warmuden i yemuggen: am tefsarin n wayen akk icudden i umezruy, asarag ɣef tegrawla, akked yiqeddicen nniḍen i warrac umi i d-yettwahegga umsizwer n wunuɣ (dessin), rnu-yas daɣen yiwet n tuffɣa n waddal d umerreḥ. Ma yella d tameɣra n ugama i d-yellan deffir ttiɛad n Ayt Felkay, deg teɣzi n ddurt, tga tdukkla Asirem Guraya aṭas daɣen n temliliyin deg temnaḍin yemgerraden n waɣir n Bgayet am Takkuct deg Ayt Smaɛel, akked ddeqs n warmuden ed tɣawsiwin s twizi lwaḥi ed tdukkliwin tiyaḍ i ubaɣur n twennaḍt. Ma yella taggara-ya daɣen, tesuddes tdukkla-ya uɣef nettmeslay ttiɛad s wazal-is, d tameɣra n uberquq, neɣ lɛin, deg taddart n Leɛlam, taɣiwant n Temriǧt. Annect-a yella-d s usentel n « Acemma ur t-nesɛi war kra, ad neqdec akalen yeddren ».

 Tamnaḍt n Leɛlam tettwassen nezzeh s uberquq-is, daymi tenwa tdukkla-ya Asirem Guraya ad tessissen tiɣenṭert-a s ubrid n ttiɛad-nni ideg tekkant twinas n medden. «Nekkni deg Tidukkla Asirem Guraya nesɛa aɣawas (plan) n yiqeddicen deg teɣzi n yal aseggas s waṭas n leḥsabat ed tezrawt ed ttbut. Yettusemma ayen nferren ad nexdem mačči sres kan war ma neẓra azal-is. Aseggas-a dɣa zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ dakken nesteqnaɛ s wayen nexdem deg setta n wayyuren imenza n useggas-a n 2015. Rnu ad d-iniɣ aseggas-a i nḥerrek ugar cwiṭ ɣef setta n wayyuren imenza n yilindi. Taggara-ya kan, ussan n 15 ed 16 deg yunyu nga yiwen n usileɣ s wazal-is i kra n yilemẓiyen.» i aɣ-d-iberreḥ Ɛemmar Rabḥi, i yellan ɣef uqerru n Tdukkla Asirem Guraya, send ad d-yernu : «Am tal tidukkla nesɛa ula d nekkni ddeqs n yiswan nebɣa ad ten-naweḍ, gar-asen asnerni n waddal s umata d win n udrar s lxusus, aseḥbiber ɣef ugama akked uḥraz n tgemmi (patrimoine) tadelsant, tagamant akked tmezrayt daɣen.» Ma ɣef tallelt i tufa tdukkla sɣur tamiwin yemgerraden, Ɛemmar yenna-d: «akken teẓram nekkni d tidukkla n waɣir, tal tikkelt nesɛa ddeqs n warmuden i yesran i waṭas n yibeddi ed tebɣest. Ɣef waya ad d-iniɣ, ɣas ma nufa kra n tallelt sɣur wa ed wa, ama s udrim, s wallalen neɣ s wawal, maca ilaq ad d-nini dakken mazal txus.» Tidukkla-ya i d-yennulfan deg wayyur n yunyu 2008 atan tettban-d tessef ma neẓra ayen akk txeddem deg wannar. Ula d isenfaren tesɛa tdukkla-ya Asirem Guraya: «tal tikkelt nqeddec ahat ugar n tezmert-nneɣ, maca daɣen nesɛa kra n yisenfaren d imeqqranen sey-a ɣer sdat, ad d-bedreɣ seg-sen : aɣerbaz n tmussni ed ugama akked uxxam yettwabnan n ulbas.» I aɣ-d-yerna win i aɣ-d-yettmeslayen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Sendiḍelli n ssebt 13 deg maggu 2017, i temdel tiwwura-s temsikent n tewllafin tifuṭugrafiyin n Mass Mahammed Attaf, iwumi yefka asentel «Lezzayer n Tafat». Tella-d temsikent-agi deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin n uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu, tebda ass-nni n letnayen iɛeddan 08 maggu, tekfa sendiḍelli tameddit n wass. Am wakken diɣen i d-yella usenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen-is, dima deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin. Ad d-nesmekti belli, Mohammed Attaf d amaru n waṭas n yidlisen yecban: ungal “aseklu n zzher” iwumi isemma netta “L’Arbre de la chance”, d wammuden tullisin “Tasusmi n leḥyuḍ” iwumi isemma netta “Le Silence des murs”, d wammud n tmedyzt “ijeğğigen n yiman-iw” iwumi isemma netta “Les fleurs de mon âme”…

  A. A. 

  
  Tamsalt n uɣerbaz  

 D ayen yessewhamen, seg 1967, meḥsoub seg wasmi yefteḥ uɣerbaz amnzu deg taddart n Tidmimin, inelmaden n El Kelâa, ar ass-a n wussan, werǧin ɣran ass kamel. Azgen, yeqqar sbaḥ, azgen-nniḍen, yeqqar tameddit. Mi nesteqsa ɣef ssebba n waya, yerra-aɣ-d Hammad Mohend, s yisem-is d aɛeggal n tesqamut n Taddart n El Kelâa, yenna-d : « Nuzzel i wakken ad d-nawi aɣerbaz-nniḍen imi deg uɣerbaz n tIdmimin, llant kan snat n tneɣriyin. Ihi, uɣalen bnan-aɣ aɣerbaz-nniḍen anda i ilaq ad ɣren warrac n snat n tudrin. Meɛna tugi yiwet n taddart ad d-tceyyeɛ arraw-is ɣer uɣerbaz-a. Ihi, teqqim akken taluf. Nuɣal, nebra i ṭṭbel deg waman. Ur nerbiḥ ula d yiwet. Aɣerbaz d ajdid, meɛna werǧin teldi tiwwura-s». Yezga-d uɣerbaz-a rrif ubrid, werǧin ɣran deg-s yinelmaden, acu kan yuɣal am wakken d aqdim. Imi neɛreḍ ad t-nwali s leqreb, yulsa-aɣ-d Mass Hammad tadwant-is. « Akka tura, d yiwen i t-izedɣen. Yerra-t am wakken d lmelk-is. La uettrebbi deg-s lmal akked yiyuzaḍ. Ixeddem deg-s nnḍer-is. Yusa-d seg Uẓefun asmi i t-id-ssuffɣen seg uxxam i yezdeɣ berra lqanun, yusa-d ɣer da, yeṭṭef aɣerbaz, yerra-t d axxam-is. Yiwen ur yecliɛ deg-s, yiwen ur d as-yenni hemma. Bran akk i ṭṭbel deg waman, ama nekni s yimezdaɣ, ama d imḍebbren. Am wakken ur aɣ-teɛni temsalt-a». Acu kan, wissen ma ffaqen d akken deg yizerfan n yinelmaden i tuɣ icci-s. « Axxam yeččur d irgazen, meɛan ulac anwa ara d-yarren tiqit» i as-qqaren Wat zik. Sya alamma tbeddel, mazal la qqaren yinelmaden azgen kan n wass, xas ulamma wwin-d akk akayad n 5e aseggas-a, akka i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Belaidi Kader, anemhal n uɣerbaz n Tidmimin.

  Ḍaɛen yilmeẓyen n taddart-a  

 «Ur nesɛi ara ula d annar amecṭuḥ n ddabex uḍar, tili meqqar ad nedhu tinna u ad nekkes ciṭ n lxiq d yurif fell-aneɣ. Aṭas i aɣ-iṛeggmen ad aɣ-xedmen kra n yisenfaren. Acu kan, aṛeggem-nsen, yettili-d kan lawan n uḥeggi n tefranin. Mi ɛeddant, ur aɣ-ssinen ara», i d-yenna yiwen yilemẓi i nemlal deg tlemmast n taddart, yeqqim daxel n tejmaɛt, ikemmel yenna : « Acḥal n tikkal i ten-id-nesmektay s wayen i aɣ-d-nnan, meɛna asuter-nneɣ, ad yeqqim d awal kan ɣef lkaɣeḍ, am win iceṭṭḥen i uderɣal. Am wakken mačči akk d nutni i d-yusan deg uberraḥ-nni n tefranin». Deg taddart-a yettwattun, ulac ula d lbusṭa neɣ ɛad axxam n usejji. Ma yella win yeḥwaǧen ciṭ n tedrimt, ilaq ad yerzu ɣer temdint n Uẓeffun i d-yezgan d acḥal n ikilumitren n tikli. Ulac ula d ttawil n usiweḍ. « Ma yella tebɣiḍ ad tliḍ ɣef tmanya n sbaḥ deg temdint n Uẓeffun, ilaq-ak ad tekreḍ ɣef rrebɛa, u akken wissen ma ad tafeḍ takerrust», i yesḥassef yiwen yilemẓi-nniḍen i iḍelben ad rren aɣerbaz-nni yezdeɣ yiwen d axxam n yilmeẓyen. « Imi, ur qqaren ara deg-s, meqqar ad t-rren d axxam n yilmeẓyen, ad d-nesfaydi deg-s. Ad nettemlil deg-s, ad d-nexleq tiddukkla tadelsant anda nesnerni idles-nneɣ akked tmussniwin », i iwala wayeḍ yilemẓi. Aṭas n tɣawsiwin i ixussen taddart-agi n El Kelâa xas ulamma imezdaɣ-is ddukklen u ttaɛraden ad ssifsussen taɛkemt ẓẓayen. Meɛna akken i as-yenna winna « Ttaɛṭac i ixussen i ɛecrin ».

  Hocine Moula 

  
 D udem amezrayan n teẓriɣlant tazzayrit, d aɛeggal n tegrawt n tẓa (9) i yellan d ssebba n tnekra n Tegrawla, d yiwen seg yimezwura n tirni akken ad tili tdiplumatit n teslellit yella daɣen seg wid icetlen tanamert seld azarug-nneɣ, Hocine Ait Ahmed yemmuten iḍelli, deg leɛmer-is 89 iseggasen, yella, ulac din ccik, d argaz yessegten imennuɣen.

 Dda Lḥusin, am wakken i ḥemmlen ad as-ssiwlen yimeɣnasen n Tirni n yiɣallen inemlayen (FFS), d tazmert tamezwarut n tnamert i d-yeɣnew umeɣnas-a ur nfeccel seg newwi azarug, yuki-as i teẓriɣlant ɣef zik lḥal. Deg Ukabar n uɣref azzayri (PPA), i d-yeɣnew Messali Hadj, udem ameqqran n teẓriɣlant tazzayrit, i yelmed izalen n tlelli akked wid n nnif akked lḥerma n umdan, d izalen werǧin ten-yeǧǧa nejren abrid-is abaɣut s yisem-is d argaz asertan ttqadaren. Yekki deg uɣnaw n Tuddsa tuzzig (OS), d taɣbalut n tidet n yimeɣnasen imaẓriɣlanen i cetlen deg tetwilin n yimenɣi, i yuɣalen sakin d ikataren n tegrawin n Yigen n teslellit Taɣelnawt (ALN), Hocine Ait Ahmed, ur iɛeṭṭel ara yezzaken-d tazmert-is n umsuddes, netta deg leɛmer-is 20 iseggasen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> D anelmad deg tesnawit yewwin lewhi n uɣella asertan 

  Ur yettɛeṭṭil ara ad iban fell-as belli d aɣella asertan, netta mazal-it deg tesnawit n Ben Ɛeknun, ɣer tama n yimeɣnasen imaẓriɣlanen ara d-yeǧǧen later deg umennuɣ i teslellit n Lezzayer, gar-asen, Omar Oussedik, Benaï Ouali, Amar Ould Hamouda, Chibane Saïd akked Idir Ait-Amrane. Yeṭṭef, seg iruḥ Mohamed Belouizdad, tamehla n Tuddsa tuzzigt (OS), d yiwet n tuddsa ideg yella d amsuddes igerzen yerna d aɣella n tidet, acku, d netta i yessufɣen attafttar n telɣut taserdasant i ferqen i wakk imekkiyen n tuddsa taserdasant. 

 Dindin gren-as tamawt, deg temlilit n Useqqamu alemmas n ukabar n PPA, deg useggas 1948, deg Zeddine (tama n Cclef). Tikkin-is s tirawt, ideg tella tmuɣli-s ɣef tsetratijit n umennuɣ iɣef yessefk ad yeddu ukabar n PPA, yessebgen-d dɣa imal aɣelnaw i yellan yettraǧun ilemẓi-a yesɛan deg leɛmer-is, deg tallit-nni, 22 iseggasen, d abrid yeččuren d uguren, seg gar wuguren-nni d tazɣint i umi ttinin « Taẓermazɣant » n useggas 1945. Uguren i d-yemlal deg ukabar-is ur nnulen ara beɣɣu n umsedrar n Ɛin Lḥemmam, deg tmurt n leqbayel n ufella, yetturebban deg tnemgalt n ulmad n teẓriɣlant ɣer tama n wudmawen imeqqranen n umennuɣ ɣef uzarug n tmurt. Ar ass-a, 53 iseggasen seld azarug, mazal inmazrayen ssekfalen-d ddeqs n tɣawsiwin yefren n umennuɣ n Hocine Ait Ahmed ɣef tmurt-is, ideg yella yinig-is ɣer asya i yebdan deg useggas 1953, akken ad yeɣnew iseqquma ara iɛiwnen akken ad tawi Lezzayer azarug-is, dɣa, deg tikkin-is deg usarag amezwaru n yikabaren inemlayen n asya deg Rangoon deg Birmani. D aɛeggal n tegrawt n tẓa i yellan d sseba n tnekra n umgaru n teslellit taɣelnawt, mi yella deg Lqahira, netta akked Mohamed Khider akked Ahmed Ben Bella, d netta i d aɣella n tmagla n Tirni n teslellit taɣelnawt (FLN) deg usarag n Bandung deg useggas n 1955. S ɣur Mustapha 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Mouhoub(APS) 

  
 Yuɣal-d usmel (forum) n tdukkliwin tidiganin n Ayt Smaɛel deg teẓrigt-is tis kraḍ (3). Ttiɛad yeḍra-d ihi ssebt-a iɛeddan deg uxxam n yilemẓiyen n tɣiwant, ideg kkint ugar n 8 n tdukkliwin, yal yiwet ɣef wacu i tesseḥbibir. Ma nwala ɣer yilindi, mi yemmug usmel-a deg wayyur n ɣuct, ad d-naf iɛeṭṭel win n useggas-a i d-yeɣlin deg unbir. I lmend n waya ihi, ddeqs n warmuden (activités) i d-yellan deg wass yekmel. Gar-asen isaragen ɣef usefrek n tdukkliwin, d leqdic n yilemẓiyen, sɣur Ɛisawi Ɛezdin seg tesdawit n Bgayet, Mass Salḥi Mulud, aselway n tdukkla Itri Adelsan n Uqbu, akked Fersawi Ɛebdelwahab, aselway n RAJ. Llan-d, daɣen, 3 n yiḥuna (ateliers) ɣef unneɛẓuẓi daxel tdukkla sɣur Merrar Yazid d aselmad, d Sadeq Rebbaɛi d anmazul n uselway n tɣiwant. Ɣef tneflit deg udrar, sɣur Ben Ɛeyyac Ṭaher, d aɛeggal deg tɣiwant n Draɛ Lgayed, yid Mass Mulwa. Akked uḥanu wis kraḍ, deg ṭṭabla n umciwer, ɣef wazal n tdukkla n yibabaten n warrac deg uɣerbaz, sɣur Rebbaɛi Racid, d amasay deg tesnawit n Ayt Smaɛel. Ddeqs n timsiknin ɣef yidles d umezruy, ladɣa, i d-yersen i uzayez, akked kra n tegnatin n waddal leǧwahi n tmeddit. Ayen yessefraḥen daɣen seg ttiɛad, d asɛeddi n yimuḍan, akked uɛeyyer ɣef waṭṭan n ssker sɣur yimejjayen i yimezdaɣ. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli iswi amezwaru n usmel-a n tdukkliwin, akken i d-nnan xilla n tikkal yimḍebbren n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, d asebɣes n tdukkliwin n temnaḍt-a tamsedrart ɣer ugar n leqdic deg unnar. Rnu-as tagnit i temlilit d umbaddal n tiktiwin gar yibujaden d wid yennumen amaḍal-a n uselḥu n tdukkla.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Segmi nuḥent tkeryas s waṭas, simmal zerrin yiseggasen, yerna yettimɣur daɣen umḍan n yisehwa (accidents) deg yiberdan, adabu n tmurt n Lezzayer, am tmura merra, yewfa iman-is yettwaḥettem ad yessiwɛir seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ angal (code) n tikli, neɣ asaḍuf n ubrid. Maca deg yisuḍaf-a, aṭas i yettwalin « tuccḍiwin », i d-yettbinen akken nniḍen. Amedya, ma nebda seg tama n winna i iɣerrmen kra n win inehhren netta yesker. Deg useggas n 2004, yeffeɣ-d usaḍuf i iḥessben amdan yesker mara yili yiɣisem (alcool) yeṭṭef deg yidammen 0.1 %. Annect-a yella iga-d agnu (problème) d ageɛmir, acku tikwal ad yili unehhar yeswa kan iɣi neɣ d ikkil ad yali yiɣisem deg yidammen-is. Dɣa, wid terza taluft n tɛessast ad sḥebsen anehhar-nni rnu ad yettwaɣerrem, netta ur yeswi iɣisem. Rnu daɣen, deg ddeqs n tegnatin, ad yettwasseḥbes unehhar, ad t-awin ad as-sɛeddin idammen ad yeǧǧ iqeddicen-is, ɣer taggara ad d-iban dakken d amelsi (innocent) i yella. Ɣef waya, adabu imuqel deg usaḍuf-a, ireqqaɛ-it 6 n yiseggasen tura ɣer deffir, yettusemma deg 2009. Yuɣal unehhar yettwaḥbas deg waddad n uskar ala ma iɛedda yiɣisem deg yidammen-is 0.2%. Maca daɣen, imsulta sseqdacen tura amris (appareil) n uktil n yiɣisem, mu ssawalen s tefransist l’alcootest, i izemren ad yesɛeddi idammen n unehhar netta deg tkerrust-is i yella. Seg tama nniḍen, yella usaḍuf wayeḍ i yessefqiɛen inehharen; win igedlen aseqdec n wallalen n teywalt (moyens de communication) deg tnehra. Neẓra dakken asaḍuf-a yeffeɣ-d deg useggas n 2004, seg wass-nni aṭas n yisteqsiyen i d-yesnulfan, gar-asen: amek asiwel kečč tnehhreḍ megdul, ma d awali n usaru uhu? Hata ukerris neɣ ad d-nini tuccḍa i as-d-yettwassuksen i usaḍuf-a n ubrid, ladɣa mi yettbin ɛinani belli d asaru i izemren ad yessufeɣ anehhar seg leɛqel-is wala asawal. Ɣas ar tura mačči akk tikeryas sɛant tawuri-ya n tiliẓri, maca sey-a ɣer sdat ilaq ad muqqlen yinesdabuyen (autorités) amek ad ẓerren ma yella anehhar-a yettmuqul asaru neɣ uhu. Deg wannect-a, neɛreḍ ad d-nefser kra n waqqayen (points) ɣef usaḍuf n ubrid, ɣas ma yella isehwa (accidents), ad yeqqim umdan d netta i d amassay (responsable) amezwaru fell-asen.        

    Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Acḥal i yuzlen n yidamen ɣef tmaziɣt , acḥal n yergazen d yilmeẓyen i iruḥen d asfel fell-as. Deg umussu aɣelnaw n yiseggasn n 40 i d-kren imeɣnasen am Bénai Ouali d Laimeche Ali ad fken amkan i tmaziɣt deg Lezzayer yettnaḍahên mgal Fransa. Seg useggas n 1980 anida yebda umennuɣ sebba-s asmi i iruḥ Mulud Mξemmri ɣer tseddawit n Ḥasnawa akken ad yexdem asarag dɣa ugin-as . Maca inelmaden iɣaḍ-iten lḥal, dɣa ffɣen-d akk akken ad d-sbeggnen lɣiḍ -nsen, ama deg Ḥasnawa ama deg wad ∑isi. Ṣubben-d seg yidurar akken ad ttekkin deg tmesbanit-nni di Tizi Wezzu, dɣa tekker akken ilaq. Jerḥen acḥal , wwin acḥal ɣer usekraf imi leqbayel mmsemyafen ad arẓen wala ad knun ,ur bɣin ara tamḥeqqranit d lbaṭel bɣan Tamaziɣt ad teṭṭef amkan-is am nettat am tutlayin niḍen. Amenɣi d win i ikemmilen . Leqbayel ur rrin ara aḍar ɣer deffir ,seg Mulud Mξemmri ɣer Lwennas Maξṭub. Ass-a ban id isin seg wallen. Yiwen yewweḍ leɛbu Rebbi asmi d-yuɣal seg Lmerruk, di 26 furar 1989, wayeḍ seftutsen-t deg Tata Bunan, 25 yunyu 1998. Wi d wid d-yufraren, wamag llan aṭas n yimeɣnasen i uruḥen d asfel , amedya kamel waḥyun d Ǧaξfer sin-agi d iselmaden n Tasaft xeddmen deg wat yanni, kecmen ɣur-sen ɣer tneɣrit nɣan-ten din. Lḥasun mačči d yiwen i yeɣlin ɣef tugdudt d tmaziɣt. Ineggura d arrac n tefsut taberkant. Asmi tekcem tmaziɣt s aɣerbaz ɣas akken yella lexṣaṣ n yedlisen maca awi-d kan teṭṭef adeg-is. Ass-a, attan tmaziɣt d tunṣibt. D ayen igerrzen yesefraḥen. <p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben Yahia 

  
 Ulamma, am yal aseggas, yella-d kra n ukukru ɣer medden i ucraḍ mgal azleg neɣ abeḥri, aṭas i t-igan ɣer taggara, ama d imecṭaḥ neɣ d imeqqranen. Ladɣa mi d-iban d akken acraḍ-a yelha maḍi i yimɣaren d wid yesɛan aṭṭanen idumen. Deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, tettunefk tezwert i warrac n uɣerbaz. Ussan-nni imezwura dɣa, mi d-yekcem ucraḍ ɣer tmurt, akk inelmaden n yiɣerbazen n Ayt Smaɛel ɛeddan seg tigawt-a n uḥuddu d uḥami mgal azleg asemhuyan (saisonnier) n tegrest. Ma yella lawan-a, seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ, llan yimɣaren i yettceyyiɛen ɣer tensafart ad d-aɣen acraḍ-a, neɣ rezzun ɣer tzeqqa n udawi n Tizwal, ad d-wwten tissegnit-a. Ad d-nesmekti belli si tama n yimɣaren, yefka-asen uɣlif n tezmert snat n tferniwin i uxdam n ucraḍ i yella baṭṭel; aha ad qerrben ɣer tzeɣwa n udawi, neɣ ɣer tensafarin ansi ara d-aɣen acraḍ-nni ara yili yettwaɣram-d. Ayen yeɛnan lqidar n yicraḍen i d-yemmesɣen, ɣef wawal n ugensas (représentant) n uɣlif n tezmert deg umaṭṭaf aɣelnaw, ad ilin ɛeddan amelyun d uzgen n yicraḍen. D ayen ara iqidden akken i d-yenna, imi nnumen annect-n i d-ttaɣen yal aseggas. Meskud d tagrest, mazal tettkemmid tedwilt-a n ucraḍ alamma d furar i d-iteddun, neɣ alamma kfran yicraḍen i inuḥen.

  M. K. 

  
 Armi d tura i d-baben wuṭṭunen yerzan ikayaden n taggara n useggas, deg kraḍ n yiuswiren yemxalafen deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu.

 Yetturaǧu i ukayad n taggara n uswir amenzu 5e ara d-yilin ass n 24 deg waggur n maggu 2017, ad sɛeddin wazal n 16305 n yinelmaden, gar-asen 8495 d arrac d 7810 d tullas, ad sɛeddin deg 371 n wulmisen n yikayaden. Ma d win n taggara n uswir n ulmud alemmas BEM ara d-yilin gar 04 ar 06 seg waggur yunyu, ad t-sɛeddin wazal n 13799 n yinelmaden, gar-asen 6550 d arrac akked 7239 d tullas, ad xedmen ikayaden-agi deg 50 n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen. Ma d win n taggara n uswir n tesnawit neɣ ayen iwumi qqaren BAC ara d-yilin gar 11 ar 14 deg waggur n yunyu, yetturaǧu ad t-sɛeddin wazal n 20955 n yisnawiyen, gar-asen 8754 d arrac mad d 12201 d tullas. Ad xedmen akyad-agi deg 70 n wulmisen n yikayaden. Ilaq ad d-nini belli wigi ijerden iman-nsen ɣer ukayad n Bac, llan deg-sen 14900 d inelmaden iɣurbizen (yeqqaren deg tesnawit), llan wazal n 6055 n yinelmaden imunan. Ma ikayaden n waddal ama d win BEM neɣ d win BAC, yuɣ lḥal sεeddan-ten yinelmaden deg yiɣerbazen-nsen am useggas iεeddan. Ma d akayad n taggara n uswir amenzu 5e n useggas aɣurbiz 2016 / 2017, ad t-sεeddin yinelmaden deg yiɣerbazen-nsen anida qqaren, mebla ma rzan ɣer yiɣerbazen-nniḍen, am wakken xedmen deg useggas yezrin.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Tiwizi n uzemmur n Sidi Sliman d yiwen n wansay aqdim i ulac win i as-yecfan seg melmi i tebda, ar ass-a mazal ṭṭfent deg-s snat n tudrin “Lmecta d At sellam” deg yilulen n usamar tama n Uqbu . amek i d-yettili ? .

 “Si zik yal mi ara ad d-yawweḍ yennayer, yettili-d ubaraḥ ttemlilin-d medden ɣer tejmaɛt n taddart ,nettheggi iman-nneɣ i wakken ad tebdu twizi, win yesɛan acaraɛ ad t-id-yawwi , bu zayla ad d-yessiweḍ, ula d tilawin ttilint tmenharin , d nutenti i zeggiren sdat-tsen, sendahent ɣer leqdic. Mi ɛeddant si tzemmurt ɣer tayeḍ, yettili-d usgunfu s ubendayar d cnawi ,…” i d-yenna Ɛemmi salaḥ, d amɣar ameqqran n taddart n Lmecta, 90 n yiseggasen di leɛmer-is. Ass-nni n leǧmɛa yezrin, arrac, irgazen , tilawin , imɣaren, fɣen zik, deg yifasen-nsen tigelzyam, imurar n warruz, icellafen, imextafen, uɣen abrid ɣer lemluk i wakken ad d-leqḍen azemmur n Sidi Sliman. Ayen i d-irennun cbaḥa n twizi-agi, d laɛyaḍ n yigurden, lɣaṭi d cnawi n tulawin akked d yicewiqen n temɣarin iwumi ara tselleḍ di yal tama. Si lebɛid i d-ttbanent tzemrin. Irgazen am yifrax s ufella-nsent, di leqwaɛi tilawin am tferṭṭeta, yal yiwet s nnul-is. ‘’D ussan n lferḥ, d yiwet n twizi i izeṭṭen assaɣen n tegmat gar yimezdaɣ, tettara-ten ttḥulfun i yiman-nsen amzun d yiwet n twacult’’. i aɣ-d- yenna zidane Benamara d imdebber n taddart n At Sellam. Azemmur n Sidi Slimane, deg wazal n 600 n tzemrin, yettara-d alamma d 10 n yiqenṭaren n zzit macki yerbaḥ useggas. Aḥric deg-s, siǧǧiwent i yimezḍaɣ s ssuma maɛqulen, aḥric ɣer berra. Idrimen i d-ttawin deg-s, ttqabalen yis-sen lecɣalat n taddart am tliwa, ttaɣen akal i taddart … atg. Aḥric-nniḍen, ttaǧǧan-t i ttbiyita i d-yettilin snat n tikwal deg useggas. Tacemlit n useggas-a, tekfa s yimensi, send imi d-subben yifellaḥen ɣef tzemmrin, tulawin kfan-d alqad di leqwaɛi. Mlalen-d yimezdaɣ ɣer yiwen n umraḥ iwumi qqaren Alemsu Tqarrabet, zzin i tarbuyin n seksu. tekfa twizi s cnawi d usbuɣar. ‘’Lfarḥ n wass-a, ncalleh d win ara idumen, imi tekfa twizi n uzemmur di talwit ulac afellah i d-yeɣlin ɣef tzemmurt, neɣ tameṭṭut yegrarben. Nessaram tisutiwin i d-yettenkaren, ad ṭṭfent di twizi-agi’’, i d-tenna Nna Wardiya, yiwet n temɣart n lbaraka

 Tettidir taddart n yiɣil iwumi qqaren draɛ n at mḥemed i yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n at racced id yezgan deg usammar lwilaya n tubiret di liḥala qerriḥin anda ɣaben wallalen n tudert ilaqen i tmeddurt n umdan imi tuɣal temɛict n twaculin-agi rẓaget acku ulac akk iṣenfaren unegmu s wacu ara d-yuɣal cwiya usirem i temnadt-a , gar iɣublan d wugguren ttmegaren ladɣa win iten-icuɣben aṭas d lgaz n temdint imi tuget n tuddar yetabɛen s at recced sfeydent s uṣiwed lgaz ḥaca teddart nsen i yiɣab uṣenfar lgaz anda ad rajun daɣen ama id yeffaɣ uṣenfar nniḍen si lwilaya , dayen yeǧǧan tiwaculin-agi ad sḥisfent ɣef uɣbel-a imi taddart n yiɣil tettwasen s ugeffur d usemmiḍ ladɣa adfel qessiḥen deg ussan n tegrest acku ciṭ n udfel kan iberdan akk ad yeɣlaq imi ur zmiren ara akk ad ɛeddin ɣef waya ur ttafen ara akk ansi ara d -awwin taqerɛet n lgaz yerna tamnadt-a tettwaɛzel mliḥ yerra tussa-d deg yidurar yeɛlayen meḥsub ulac akk ayen ara yisifsen ɣef uɣbel-a akken qqaren ansi is d-ussiḍ i ḥelwan d asawen , d acu kan iɣublan n yimezdaɣ n tama-agi ur ḥbisen ara kan dda imi mazal aɣbel n tzeqqa n tujya ar ass-a d wussan werɛad id -uffin yimḍebren tifrat i wannect-a yerna maci d tikelt maci tis snat i ttuɣun ɣef uɣbel-agi n tujya dayen yeǧǧan yimezdaɣ yesefk fell-asen ad ruḥen ɣer tɣwant leqsar akken ad awwin imuḍan am wakken ttafen uguren imdanen ur yesɛin ara tikerrusin ɣef kerrun tikerusin anda tettaweḍ ɣer suma n 600 -700 idinaren ,ad d-naf daɣen ugur n uṣiwed imi ur sɛin ara aṭas n lkiran yeṣawaḍen ɣer taddart-a rnu ɣer waya iberdan reglen akk-d leɣyab n trisiti iberdan anda imezdaɣ n yiɣil iɣelli-d lxuf fell-asen deg iḍ anda kullec d ṭṭlam ɣef wannect-a ssuturen imezdaɣ n taddart-a seg yimḍebren akken ad d-rren lwelha d tmuɣli nsen ɣer taddart i yenḥafen i yerran tameddurt nsen twaculin-agi akk d iɣublan d wuguren xersum s kra n yiṣenfaren unegmu ara ten-yeǧǧen ad sirmen sya ɣer zdat acku ma yella teqqim akka taɛkumt yal ass tettnerni s yiɣublan . 

  
 Twekded tneɣaft n ttrebga taɣenawt ahil n ikayaden uḥric wis kraḍ umbaɛd aqeɛed i texddem tneɣlaft ttrebga nuriya ben ɣebrit d akken ad bdun seg ayyur agi ideg i nella 15 si maggu deg yiswiren yemxalafen ama deg iɣbazen (amenzu ,alemmas , tasnawit ) , aqeɛed-agi i tesbed tneɣlaft ttrebga yussa-d umbaɛd aṭas n tmesbaniyin i xeddmen inelmaden n lwilayat unẓul n tmurt mi yella ayagi deg ayyur n remḍan yunyu , anda inelmaden-a ssuturen si ben ɣebrit awexer n yikayaden acku lwilayat n unẓul ttwasnent s lḥuman qessiḥen , dayen yeǧǧan taneɣlaft n ttrebga ad tbeddel rray terrat ɣer 15 mayyu meḥsub aswir 1 ,2 , 3 ,4 deg uɣerbaz amenzu , ma yella d aswir 1, 2 ,3 deg uɣerbaz alemmas ma d 1,2 di tesnawit , Ma yella d ikayaden useldem ad bdun si 12 yunyu imi d tagnit ara farṣen yinelmaden . Ma yella d ikayaden n taggar yemxalafen am wayen ye3nan akayad n taggara deg uɣerbaz amenzu ad yili 22 may , akayad n taggara aswir wis 4 deg uɣerbaz alemmas ad yebdu si 24 ɣer 26 may , ma d akayad n taggara di tesnawit ( BAC ) ad yebdu si 29 may ad ikemmel di 02 yunyu umbaɛd ad bdun imuras unebdu si 07 yulyu , am wakken ad tilli tuɣalin ɣer uɣerbaz aseggas ajdid ( 2016-2017 ) deg ass n tlata 30 ɣuct i yixeddamen d wid ixeddmen di tedbelt , 01 september ttuɣalin lecyax d yiselmaden , ma yella d arrac ad uɣallen ass n lḥed 04 september , ihi abeddel -agi deg ahil n yikayaden yella-d ɣef tmesbaniyin warrac unẓul imi ur bɣin ara d-illin ikayaden di remḍan . 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Abdelhak Menas 

  
 Ussan-agi ineggura, Tger-d tcennayt taqbaylit Louiza tiɣri i Leqbayel i wakken ad tt-ɛiwnen s tedrimt imi i d-yeɣli-d fell-as waṭṭan. Aṭas n ttawilat i as-ilaqen, ladɣa lmesruf, netta ur tezmir ara ad t-tqabel. Ɣef wakken i d-tenna tiɣri-agi ur tettuneḥsab ara d tuttra, maca tewwed-as tfidi s iɣes. “Xas imejjayen deg tmurt n Lezzayer ẓewwren, maca ulac dwawi i iwulmen’’, i twala tcennayt Louiza. Ɣef waya, truḥ ɣer tmurt n Fransa, s axxam n mmi-s i wakken ad tdawi. Acu kan, laqen-as setta neɣ sebɛa les scanners d 660 n tsegnatin. Aya-agi yeḍḥa-d dayen ɣlayen, ur tezmir ara ad txelles akk anect-a. Tenna-d belli snen-tt Leqbayel tcennu seg useggas n 1978 ar ass-a n wussan. Mazal ur teqḍiɛ ara layas. Tebɣa ad teḥlu akken ad tkemmel ccna. Tecna ɣef tmurt, ɣef tmeṭṭut , ɣef lḥerma. Tḥemmel ifennan imeqqranen, yecban slimane Azem , Ait menguellet, Matoub Lounes d wiyad-nniden. Tenna-d belli tsetḥa imi i d -tessutet deg Leqbayel akken ad tt-ɛiwnen, meɛna d lehlak-agi d amcum i d-yeɣlin fell-as. Ɣef wakka i teḍleb ad tt-iɛiwen win i izemren s cwit mačč alamma s waṭas. « Ya yiwen ad i yi-d-yefk ayen iwumi yezmer ma yehwa-as 100DA, awi-d kan ad ḥluɣ. Kra n win i yi-d-yessutren zik, cennugh-as baṭel imi mačči d adrim i d ssaḥ. Cennugh s nnif d lḥerma, i leqbayel i teqbaylit », i tessuter tdeg Leqbayel tcennayt Louiza. Am wakken, diɣ, tessutur deg tdukkliwin ad tt-ɛiwnen, yerna teqqar-asen ma yella teḥla, ayen ara d-yegrin n yidrimen, ad tent-tefk i tdukkliwin-agi. Tekfa tiɣri-s s wawal-a « Imi i ken-ḥemmleɣ, tḥemmlem-iyi i d-ssutureɣ deg-wen afus n tallelt, akken ad jjiɣ ».

  Z. B. Y. 

  
 Tikwal ttnejmaɛen kan, jemɛen-d idrimen i usnerni n tgerrujt n taddart icban anejmuɛ n lḥaquq. Wid isedduyen tajmaɛt, lamin d ṭṭemman i t-ittḥamin zwaren wwḍen ɣer umekkan. Suffɣen-d tiḥṣirin yellan di lǧama n lemqam illan din ssan-tent berra, qqimen d agraw ddaw tẓebbujt i tili, ttheggin gar-asen annejmuɛ simi ara d-awḍen innejmaɛen. Xas akka tamurt tbeddel seg wasmi akka d-ikcem urumi, xas fransa terẓa taxeddimt n udrar d tuddsa ɣef i tbedd tmurt n leqbayel,I qbayliyen mazal sedduyen tajmaɛt am ik. Imɣaren, irgazen d yilmeẓyen ttawḍen-d d tirebba ta deffir ta ad as-tiniḍ ɣer lǧanaza ara ruḥen. Imɣaren d wid meqqren ṭṭfen imukan iqerben ɣer lamin d ṭemman mačči kan akken ad slen akken ilaq maca ḥemlen ad d-inin awal-nsen, ttakken-d ṛṛay-nsen. Ilmeẓyen, wid ikecmen melmi kan ttufiq, ttɣimin ɣer deffir, lemden ɣer yimɣaren amek ttmeslayen. Ulac win izemren ad d-immeslay zdat baba-s. Akken qqimen akk imnejmaɣen, lamin izzi akka ɣer ubrid d-ittawin ɣer tmeqbert ma ulac win ara d-iteddun, ssyin iwehha i Ccix n taddert ad d-iɣer lfatiḥa. Ikfa Ccix yebda awal lamin s uṣelli ɣef nnbi : -Llah u ma ṣelli ɛlik a rasul llah! Llah u ma ṣelli ɛlik a rasul llah ! Imnejmaɛen rran-as-id akk, ṣelli ɛlih wa sellem. Ssyin ibda awal ɣef cɣel ɣef ara mmeslayen. Ibda umeslay, mmeslayen yirgazen slid Saɛid u Ḥemmu n At Brahem d tmital-is. Di tejmaɛt n Tala-Zeggaɣen yuɣal uqelmun s iḍarren. Wid issawalen taqbaylit, imusnawen d wat tirugza d nnif uɣalen di rrif, ṛṛay yuɣal ɣer bab usurdi d cci. Asmi tetteddu, tbedd tejmaɛt ɣef lḥaq baba-s n Ḥemmu d netta i d amsewwaq n taddart. Ma ulac-it, leǧmeɛ n taddart ur iferru ara. Seg wasmi yuɣal ṛṛay deg yifassen n wid ittgallen kan s usurdi, Ḥemmu d wid i t-icban uɣallen di rrif ur asen-ttaken ara awal di leǧmeɛ n taddart. Yiwen wass, nnejmaɛen wat taddert, seg ikker cwel gar imnejmaɛen, leǧmeɛ yegguma ad yefru, inṭeq yiwen seg yimnejmeɛen ɣer Ḥemmu yenna-as: -A Ḥemmu n At Brahem mmeslayen akk imnejmaɛen ala kečč ! – I mi tebɣam ad d-mmeslayeɣ, ad awen-d-ssiwlaɣ yiwet n tedyant. Yella yiwen n uzrem ittidir deg uxjiḍ-ines, deg tlemmat n tmadaɣt, akken ad t-nɣen saɣayen times i tmadaɣt-nni. Ad yerǧu alamma tensa yiwet n tama, ad d-izwir aqerru-s ad d-iffeɣ anda tella tmes iwala-tt. Yiwet n tikkelt izwer-d taseṭṭa-s, ikcem deg ujajiḥ n tmes, iḥsel dinna. Ihi ay atmaten Ḥemmu n At Brahen ur ittmeslay ara, mmeslayet kan kunwi. Wehmen akk imnejmaɛen di teqsiṭ i d-yewwi Ḥemmu ala yiwen n umɣar i itt-ifehmen, yenna-asen : – ay atmaten, ayen d-inna Ḥemmu n At Brahem d ayen i aɣ-d-iḍran. Asmi ṛṛay illa deg ufus n wid i wumi tezwar, deg ufus imusnawen leǧmeɛ ifra, tura mi yuɣal deg ufus n wid i wumi ur tezwar ara, a-ta leǧmeɛ yerwi yegguma ad ifru…

 <em> yettkemmil </em>

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Taddart n Akaoudj d yiwet seg 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun i d-yezgan deg ugafa n tɣiwant-agi, tebԑed ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu s wazal n 10 km.

 Taddart-agi, mazal ar ass-a n wussan, tettidir lexsas d ameqqran deg yiḥricen d yisenfaren yemgarden n tudert tatrart. Gar-asen : ttawil n Internet, lgaz n temdint, yir liḥala n yibrdan, asezdeg n twennaḍt, imḍiqen i yilmeẓyen akked uɣbel n waman. Ssuturen yimezdaɣ n taddart n Akaoudj deg yimḍebren teεna temsalt, ama d wid n usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan (APC) n Ait Aissa Mimoun, ama d wid n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i wakken ad d-rren lwelha-nsen ɣer yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi yenḥafen aṭas si yal tama. Menbeεd mi ttidiren akka tura deg tegnatin qessihen. Ma d iɣeblan i d-ttmagaren kul ass, deg tazwara, ad naf aɣbel n waman n tissit, imi ufan-d iman-nsen ttnadin ɣef tiqit n waman anida ara tt-id-awin, acku ttɣiman 7 neɣ 10 n wussan i wakken ad d-uɣalen waman yiwen ubrid, d ayen i ten-yeğğan ad d-aɣen tisitirin n waman, ladɣa deg unebdu. Ugur wis sin, d Internet i mazal ur yefri ara. Ma yebɣa yiwen ad yazen neɣ ad d-yawi kra seg Internet, ilaq fell-as ad yerzu alamma d tamdint n Tizi Uzzu. Ay-agi, yebɣa ad d-yini d akken ilaq ad ilḥu 10km, neɣ yezmer lḥal ad isruḥ yiwen wass ɣef liğal n ssaεa. Maca lukan i d-tewwiḍ s ixxamen tili mačči akka. Cetkayen daɣen ɣef uεeṭṭel n uṣiweḍ n lgaz n temdint s ixxamen-nsen, imi ṛwan lḥif ladɣa deg tsemhuyt n tegrest, imi acḥal n tikkal i leḥun d likumiṭer i wakken ad d-awin taqqerԑat n lgaz, uɣur ara sewwen neɣ uɣur ara seḥmun. Bdan yakan lecɣal aseggas d nnefṣ-aya, maca takebbanit yeṭṭfen asenfar-a, teḥbes azal n 6 wagguren-agi. D ayen i ten-yeğğan ad d-gren tiɣri, yerna ad ssutren deg wid teԑna temsalt, gar-asen imeḍberen n tɣiwant Ait Aissa Mimoun, d tenmehla n Imuhal Izuyaz (Direction des Travaux public), i wakken ad yefru wugur-a deg wussan i d-iteddun. Aɣbel wis ukuẓ, d win n yiberdan, imi aṭas n yiberdan yellan deg taddart-agi, ha-ten-in deg yir liḥala, am ubrid ameqqran yeqqnen gar-as d Lekhali, rnu ɣer-s iberdan yellan daxel n taddart. D annect-agi akk n yiɣeblan i yerran tudert n twaculin n taddart n Akaoudj, ttidirent deg lḥif d lmeḥna, ɣef waya ssuturent deg yimḍebren ad d-lhin deg wuguren iceɣben allaɣ-nsen, u ad d-afen tifrat i yiɣeblan s tazzla.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdel Ghani 

<div> 
  
 Tikkelta, nerza ɣer taddart n Tala Amara anda i nemlal d kra n yimḍebbren-is, deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen, i wakken ad d-nawi awal ɣef tmetti d umezruy n tama-agi n tmurt n leqbayel. Nemlal d : Mass Yefsah Youcef, d amdan mechuren nezzeh deg taddart ; Mass Izri Belaid, d amaru amatu n tesqamut n taddart ; Mass Djaffer Medjbeur, aselway n uxxam n yilmeẓyen akked Dr Kechabia Nadir, aselway n tiddukla ‘’Le Defi’’. . S lferḥ d ameqqran i d-rran ɣef yisteqsiyen-nneɣ. 

  
 Tamendawt n tmurt n Lezzayer ittuqeblen aseggas-a tettusuqel-d ɣer tutlayt n tmaziɣt sur useqqamu unnig n timmuɣza s uskil alatini . Tamendawt-a yuran s tmaziɣt tella-d di 45 isebtaren , deg-s 218 imegraden i ttwaqeblen s wumni di furar 2016 anda tekcem tutlayt n Dda Lmulud d tutlayt tunṣibt deg umgarad wis kraḍ wis sin akked d tkadimit ara yilin ilmend imusnawen ara yesduklen tutlayt n Tmaziɣt d unegmu-ines ɣas akken ar tura ur d-yeffiɣ uṣaḍuf ara yessudsen aselḥu-ines di tagduda n Lezzayer . Yelha usurif-agi maca aṭas n tɣawsiwin i tuḥwaǧ tutlayt-nneɣ n umahil d umtawa gar warraw-is i wakken a tuɣal d tutlayt s timad-is war ma tesɛa takna .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Dahmani Bilal 

  
 Deg tdiwennit-a, newwi-d awal ɣef umecwar n ucennay Ahcène Bedrani akked wayen icuɣben anaẓur s umata.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Amek i tgiḍ isurifen-ik imenza deg ubrid n ccna?  

  Ahcene Bedrani :  Seg ucrured ɣer tikli, imi deg lweqt-nni ur yeshil ara ad yecnu yiwen kan akka. Seg zik i ttruḥeɣ nekk d yimeddukkal-iw ɣer umadaɣ i wakken ad nezhu cwiṭ s ccna. Cfiɣ am tura ɣef wasmi i xedmeɣ snitra-w tamezwarut s lxamsa n zzit akked kra n lexyuḍ. Ussan-nni ad iliɣ sɛiɣ 18 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-iw. Syin akkin deg useggas n 1991 i d-uɣeɣ tagitart-iw n ṣṣah tamezwarut, ɣer yiwen n urgaz n tmurt n Brazil. Dɣa seg yimir tedduɣ cwiṭ cwiṭ ɣer sdat, armi i d-wwḍeɣ ɣer tizi n wassa. Ussan-nni yal tameddit nettemlili d tarbaɛt, wa ad d-yawi derbuka, wa d abendayer ma d nekk ad awiɣ tagitart-iw. Nettɛawaz alamma yuli wass, ama d iṭij neɣ d asemmiḍ, imi imir ur nesɛi ara ttawil anida ara necnu, yecban axxam n yilmeẓyen. Tizlatin i tecniḍ d ayen kan i d-yeẓẓem wallaɣ-ik, neɣ tugmeḍ-d anida-nniḍen? Nekk ur ttefreɣ ara tidet, yerna ad t-id-niɣ s ttnefxa, imi mačči d lɛib ma yewwi-d ufennan asefru ɣer umedyaz neɣ lmusiga ɣer win i tt-ixeddmen. Acu kan nekk tuget n wayen xedmeɣ n yiman-iw. Ar tura, wwiɣ kan asefru-nni « Tuzyint » ɣer lǧar-iw Karim Iloula amedyaz. Am wakken daɣen i yi-d-yefka yiwen umedyaz-nniḍen n tɣiwant-nneɣ lmusiga i yiwet n tezlit, d Sahali Chabane yettwassnen s yisem n « Caban Ameɣbun ». Ma deg tesfift i d-iteddun, yefka-id uneɣmas n rradyu tis snat d umedyaz Said Friha ttesriḥ, i wakken ad ɛiwdeɣ, ad cnuɣ tizlit-nni-ines « Abrasli ireqqen », ara cnuɣ s wudem atrar.

  Mmeslay-aɣ-d ugar ɣef tesfifin-ik…  

 Tura akka ɣur-i snat n tesfifin, tamezwarut teffeɣ-d deg useggas n 2001 iwumi semmaɣ “Yeggra-d lexyal”. Llant deg-s 6 n tezlatin, gar tezlatin yellan deg-s ad bedreɣ: Idurar, Xas ɛeddan leɛwam, Serzgen-as ddunit-is, yeggra-d lexyal-im…atg. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ belli ur xtareɣ ara tallit ideg ara d-ssufɣeɣ tasfift-agi, imi tɛedda kan am uzaylal, aṭas ur neẓri ara belli teffeɣ-d. Imi daɣen imdanen deg lweqt-nni, lhan kan d Tefsut taberkant. Syin akkin qqimeɣ alarmi d aseggas n 2015 i wakken ad d-ssufɣeɣ tasfift-iw tis snat iwumi giɣ isem “Tuzyint” ideg llant 7 n tezlatin, yiwet deg-sent tella deg tesfift-nni iɛeddan, d tizlit-nni “Yeggra-d lexyal-im”, ma d setta-nni-nniḍen d timaynutin, ad d-bedreɣ deg-sent: Tuzyint, Yewet-iyi ufus-iw, Tiɣri, Yeggra-d lexyal-im,…atg. Ad d-rnuɣ kan cwiṭ ɣef tezlit-nni “Tuzyint” i cniɣ nekk akked tcennayt tilemẓit Noria, i yesɛan ṣṣut ḥlawen mačči d kra, d tagnit i wakken ad tt-snimmreɣ aṭas.

  Tzemreḍ ad aɣ-d-tiniḍ sebba n uɛeṭṭel deg ussuffeɣ n tesfifin-inek?  

 D tidet ɛeṭleɣ aṭas, imi tikkelt tamezwarut qqimeɣ azal n 7 n yiseggasen i wakken ad d-ssufɣeɣ tasfift-iw tamenzut. Ulamma

  D tuqqsa n tayri i ak-yeǧǧan ad tecnnuḍ fell-as, ahat, imi tettḥaz yal ilemẓi ?  

 D tidet tuqqsa n tayri tḥuza-yi mi meẓẓiyeɣ am yilmeẓyen merra, ulac win ara ak-yinin nekk ul-iw d ablaḍ, ma yella wayen-nniḍen, imi ar tura mazal nettwali imawlan i ibeḍḍun gar yilemẓyen yemyeḥmalen. Da ad fken taqcict s ddreɛ, da ad seyyfen aqcic ad yaɣ tin ur iḥemmel,…atg. D ayen ara d-ibanen deg tezlit-nni « Serzagen-as ussan ».

  S yiwet n tezlit, tezẓiḍ-d i tɣiwant-ik…  

 Ferḥeɣ aṭas imi iyi-d-tefkiḍ asteqsi-agi, imi d tajmilt i xedmeɣ i tɣiwant-iw Ait Aissa Mimoun i nettɛuzzu aṭas d nettat i d-aɣ-iṛebban. D yiwet gar 7 n tezlatin i xedmeɣ deg tesfift-iw taneggarut, iwumi semmaɣ Tuzyint i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2015. D tizlit ideg i d-bedreɣ akk tudrin n tɣiwant-nneɣ, i wakken ad tent-id-sbeggneɣ u yerna ad tent-issinen medden.

  Amek i ak-id-tusa tekti-s?  

 Tikti n tezlit-agi tagrakalt, tusa-iyi-d asmi ttqesireɣ d ucennay ameqqran Mouh Said Oubelaid, dɣa yenna-iyi: “ur ssawḍeɣ ara ad ken-id-sedduɣ deg tezlit-nni-inu, imi deg lweqt-nni d tikasiḍin i yella dayen kan i tewwi, ulamma tellam deg usefru”. Syin iweṣṣa-iyi-d i wakken ad xedmeɣ yiwet i temnaḍt, dɣa uɣaɣ-as awal.

  Amek tettwali tmetti afennan, d wamek i tt-tettwaliḍ kečč s timmad-ik?  

 Timetti-nneɣ taqbaylit, tettwali belli acennay i xeddem s sshala tameqqrant, sufɣen-d kan akka, qqaren-d kan ayen i d-yusan deg wallaɣ-nsen. Nekk ttwaliɣ-t d win ineɛtaben aṭas. Tikkwal ur yeggan ara uḍan i wakken ad ixdem asefru, tikkwal iteẓẓem-d allaɣ-is ama deg wayen yerzan imeslayen, tiktiwin neɣ tinfaliyin icebḥen. Amedyaz neɣ acennay am tcemmaɛt, ad yettak tafat i medden netta ad ireqq s ttawil kan.

  Ma yella kra tessewjadeḍ kečč sya ɣer sdat?  

 Aql-iyi akka tura deg ustudyu, sewjadeɣ tasfift-nniḍen anda ara ilint 9 n tezlatin, gar-asent : Tajmilt i tmeṭṭut, Tusa-d tekcem ɣer wul, D kemm i d zzher-iw, Ay abrasli ireqqen,…atg. Ahat d tasfit ara d-yeffɣen sya ar tazwara n useggas n 2018.

  Ma yella win i ak-yefkan afus n tallelt deg ubrid-a n ccna?  

 Asmi bdiɣ akk, yella yettɛwan-iyi umedyaz ameqqran Abboud Salah deg tmeɣriwin, syin akkin ttedduɣ cennuɣ akked ufennan Mouh Oubelaid. Ma ɣer taggara-agi, yettɛwan-iyi aṭas Karim Khelfaoui akked umeddakkel-iw ameẓẓawan (musicien) neɣ i ixeddmen timseggemt (arrangement) Lyes Haddad.

  Tessefruyeḍ ɣef wayen i tebɣiḍ kečč, neɣ ɣef wayen i d-yerzan s allaɣ-ik?  

 Tuget n wayen ssefruyeɣ, ttaruɣ-t ɣef wayen i d-yerzan s allaɣ-iw, ladɣa ɣef wayen i yi-ceɣben nekk s timmad-iw. Tikkwal daɣen ssefruyeɣ ɣef usentel i yi-yehwan nekk, imi iɛjeb-iyi, dɣa bɣiɣ ad aruɣ fell-as.

  Anwa isental igejdanen iɣef tessefruyeḍ?  

 Nekk sɛiɣ sin n yisefra igejdanen iɣef ḥemmleɣ ad aruɣ tamedyazt, wigi d tayri akked yidles s umata.

  Awal-ik n taggara  

 Tamezwarut, ad awen-iniɣ tanemmirt s tussda i kunwi d uɣmis-nwen « La Dépêche de Kabylie », tis snat, tanemmirt i wid iqeddcen akk deg uḥric n yidles ladɣa idles aqbayli neɣ amaziɣ s umata. Tanemmirt daɣen i wid i yi-iḥemmlen d wid i yi-isellen, ssarameɣ ad iliɣ fessuseɣ fell-asen yerna ad xeddmeɣ ayen ara ten-yessefraḥen.

  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Yal amedyaz yettban yettawi aṭas n tlufa deg uqerruy-is, ur ḥala asefru. Yal amedyaz yesɛa aṭas n wawal i yebɣa ad t-id-yini ad as-slen wiyaḍ, imi deg-s izen. Deg tdiwennit-a, yemmeslay-d mmi-s n Yiwaḍiyen, mass Belqasem Sikadir ɣef kra n temsal.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: anda tettwaliḍ ugar ccbaḥa n usefru? 

 Belkacem Sikadir: ccbaḥa n usefru tezwar-d seg usentel akked talɣa d amek i d-yebna usefru. Nekk ḥemmleɣ asefru anida tella daxel-is tuffirt anamek: ad d-yili yiwen n usefru, ad t-ɣren εecra n yimdanen. Mbeɛd yal yiwen seg-sen ad t-yegzu s tidmi-s, ad mgaraden yiḥulfan ɣer usefru-nni.

  Nerra tamawt i yisental i tettaruḍ, nufa aṭas seg-sen ɣef tayri d laxert. Acimi? 

 D tidet, tuget n yisefra-w ddan s tayri. Maca ilaq ad nerr tayri di yal iḥulfan i icudden ɣer umdan, tayri ɣer tmeṭṭut, ɣer yimawlan, ɣer tmurt, ɣer tutlayt… Acku leḥmala ur telli kan gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut. Ddeqs n yisentel i ttaruɣ daɣen ɣef At laxert. Annect-a, d tidmi i d-ineflen ɣer wallaɣ n umedyaz; ayen i d-yusan ad yaru fell-as

  Yal ass ttlalen-d yilemẓiyen d imaynuten, ttekcamen-d deg unnar n tmedyazt. D acu d awal-ik ɣef waya? 

 Aẓar yettabaε tara. Taqbaylit tebna s wawal mačči s tfukal. Nekk ad d-iniɣ d amennuɣ, d aseḥbiber ɣef tutlayt akken teṭṭef amḍiq-is deg unnar n tmussni. Si tama tayeḍ, ilemẓiyen i d-yettilin d imaynuten, ahat mačči weḥd-sen i d-rzan ɣer tmedyazt, maca d taqbaylit i asen d-yessawlen. Ayen yessefraḥen aṭas imi ula d tiḥdayin gezment lqid i yiles. Acku ma nger tamawt, yella umgarad gar yiseggasen n 70, 80, akked 90, ulac aṭas n teḥdayin (tilawin s umata) i yellan deg unnar n tẓuri neɣ n yidles. Wamma tura, ddant akken yedda urgaz. Aya d ayen i teḥwaǧ tmetti taqbaylit, imi tutlayt tcudd ɣer tmeṭṭut ugar n urgaz. Ladɣa deg uḥric n ttrebga, imi d tameṭṭut i iqerben nezzeh ɣer tarwa-s. Meḥsub akken yebɣu yili lḥal, tutlayt n tyemmat ur tt-nettaf ara di lakul kan, maca deg tmussni n tyemmat i tella. Ilaq aqbayli ad yesseddu taqbaylit ama s wudem n tira neɣ s timawit

  Ahat tettheggiḍ-d kra n umaynut swayes ara tesferḥeḍ wid i k-iḥemmlen? 

 Lecɣal ṭṭuqten, Lɛerbi yiwen (yeḍsa). Di tazwara d tadrimt i d llsas n yal leqdic. Aql-i ttheggiɣ ammud n yisefra, ssarameɣ ad yili akken bɣan wid i ara t-yeɣren, mačči kan akken bɣiɣ nekk. Ad farseɣ tagnit ad snemmreɣ nezzeh iεeggalen n tdukkliwin tidelsanin mi qeddcent di tfaskiwin. D nutenti ideg i d-yettaf ladɣa umedyaz anida ad d-yini awal-is. Nettaf timlilit din daɣen.

  Tanemmirt a mass Belkacem. Rnu-aɣ-d awal n taggara… 

 Tanemmirt i kem a Kaisa. Afud igerrzen i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen d wid akk iqeddcen i teqbaylit akken ad tidir.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Testeqsa-t Kaïsa Khalifi 

 
  
 Yal aseggas, lawan-a, nestuqqut awal ɣef Lwennas. Nettmektay-it-d, nettgerriz-as “tazibba”. D iḍrisen, rnu semḍit, deg yiɣmisen, d tajmilt deg uzeṭṭa n facebook, d ticemmuɛin di tudrin, d timeɣriwin di tdukliwin, d taɣuct-is tetttbeɛziq deg ifurguten…. Lḥasun, ulac tardast, di Tmurt n leqbayel,  ur d-nesekfal awal “Rebelle”.  Yuklal Matoub ugar n waya, mačči d wa i d aɣbel. D acu kan, ntezzi, ntenneḍ  di “ccfawat mécaniques” yettwehhin ɣer deffir. Niɣ ccfawat i uzekka, mačči i uẓekka !  “Ɣer zdat i twehha tmuɣli” , i d as-yeqqar Lwennas. D acu akka ara nwali ar zdat ? D tamaziɣt, d tugdut, d tilelliyin… i ɣef efka umedyaz tarwiḥt-is.    

  
  Anegzum n wassaɣ gar yimqimen iwsilen d tgejda uɣur qqnen :  

 • Sb. 15. “ Fafuc akked setti-s Takarut qqiment-d ɣer tmeṭṭut n εemmi-s Tamensurt, d taǧǧalt tamecṭuḥt , Argaz-is imut d ameẓẓyan am baba-s Ameur akked gma-s, baba-s n Fafuc.“ Muqel « s“ deg « baba-s“ : yettuɣal ɣer urgaz n taǧǧalt , neɣ ɣer Fafuc neɣ εad ɣer Tmensurt ? Fiḥel ad yemmeslay yiwen ɣef usigez d tira n yismawen (Ameur).

 • Sb. „ Aserdun ibedd, sin ifassen kkan-d nnig tɣerdin-is“ Amqim « is“ ur yeqqin ara ɣer userdun, yesmektay-d Fafuc. D acu kan ulac allal i yezdin gar tefyar akken yal awal ad iban yixf-is, ad tban tagust uɣur icudd.

  Iɣimi ɣef yiwen n usentel 

 Iban-d lexsas n usemres n ulugen n usmekti deg wungal “Tislit n uɣanim”. Amedya, deg usebter 22: yuɣal-d yisem n Dehbiya 3 iberdan deg snat n tefyar ideg ulac maḍi urar ɣef uɣanib. D awal imserreḥ, yejla fell-as uɣilif n tsekla.

  Lmizan gar yimuren n tefyirt  

 Dagi diɣen, yessefk ad yefres umaru aḍris ines. Deg tefyirt « Yiwen yerfed-d ayemmus, wayeḍ yessawel-as i Fafuc.“ Sb.24. ur mgadan ara yiḥricen; amyag amezwaru n tigawt akked wis-sin mgarraden taɣulin.

  Tanmegla  : Seg tseddart ɣer tayeḍ neɣ seg usebter ɣer wayeḍ, itettu umaru ayen iɣef d-ikka, ikeččem deg tenmegla.

 Md: sb. 16: Tazwara, ad naf Fafuc terkeb ɣef userdun, teḥjeb s ubernus d uḥayek d umeclux. Yerna tettru. Γas deg tegnit-a, “ iles-is iḥreqsen s ugusim irna cbaḥa i wudem-is “

 Md: sb. 16-17: Fafuc, sufella n userdun, iqeffafen ddan akken yid-s, maca “ Kra din ur tefhim”, meḥsub ur teẓri ara d acu-t akk wayenni. Armi qrib ad taweḍ s axxam n urgaz-is i tefhem iman-is d tikli i tedda d tislit !

 Γer waya, yerna-d umyeεreq gar wawalen

 ( Md: sb.23 : lmeεna / lemεana) akked usnulfu n yinumak (md: sb.25: “ lbaṭel yerfed tadist” / mačči kan “ s tadist”) .

 Ungal n R.B. yunef i yilugan n tira; yunef i wid n usenfali. Lemǧaz-is yeṭṭef kan deg tinna akken “imi d tamaziɣt wicqa !” D tidet, ayen akka i tettidir tsekla tamaziɣt d lemri; azekka, ad walin medden deg-s amezruy n luεer n tnekra d unerni i tmugger tsekla-a, maca ur ilaq ara ad d-yarew waya tawaɣit ara tt-ikerfen.

 Yeqqim-d deg warrazen, mačči d tawafit n menwala. Llan wansayen ibedden ɣef tsulal iǧehden, ad ten-yeḍfer bab n cci; win ur nessin ad ixiḍ ad yeḍfer nnfadi. Tamaziɣt ur teḥwaǧ ara aseḥnunef ! Γas s yisem n Assia Djebbar.

  Racid Buxerrub, Tislit n uɣanim, El Amel, 2015, 157 sb. 250 DA. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yahia Bellil, d aselmad n tmaziɣt (PEM) 

  
 Ddemt tutlayt, anefet-as ad tcali deg yiberdan (aken s-yenna Mao) ad tedduqes, ad tidir. Erret-tt ar daxel n lemqam neɣ bellat-tt daxel n wedlis, ad temmet u ad tneɣ wid i d as-d-yezzin. Ddemt tutlayt, rnut-as adabu d yiserdasen, ad tuɣal d tunṣibt. Ma ternam-as tadiyanit d nnbi, ad tuɣal d tutlayt tarebbanit.Wid ara wen-d-yinin belli tutlayt tazayrit ulac-itt bɣan ad awen-d-inin ulac-iken : ad nekkes azref n umeslay i ugdud, mara s-nekkes tutlayt-is, ad tt-ner ɣef yiri, ar daxel n lkuri ad tuɣal d asbeɛbeɛ. Ad nekkes i ugdud azref-is deg wakal-is, mara s-nḥettem tutlayt nniḍen ara t-yerren d agugam. Ma nnan-awen-d belli taɛrabt d tutlayt i «ifazen», bɣan ad d-inin belli kenwi d imdanen «meẓẓiyen».Ass-a di Lezzayer snat n trebbuɛa ttmeslayent taɛrabt, tutlayt yemmuten, i Yizzayriyen, agdud yeddren : isertiyen d wat rebbi. Di sin yidsen ugmen-d si trebbanit dderk-nsen. Am yimrabden d yigeliden n zman aqdim n «l’occident». Dɣa, ma tbeddeḍ mgal-nsen, tebeddeḍ mgal Ccahid d Rebbi. Win ara yini taɛrabt d tutlayt yemmuten, yebɣa ad yeglu s yiqqara n at rebbi d yisertiyen.Wid ara awen-yinin tazzayrit, tutlayt, ulac-itt bɣan ad ressin ima-is s bessif gar-awen de Lezzayer, gar-awen d Rebbi. Ḥellan-d tadrimt-nsen s tutlayt yemmuten. Kkest-asen tutlayt-a, ad uɣalen ulac deg-sen nnfeɛ, ad tineɣ ccumaj d reffu. Wid ar awen-d-yinin belli Tazzayrit, d aḥric seg taɛrabt, ttwalin belli seg lɛrabiya Suɛudiya i d-cetlen. Ad ruḥen ihi ! Taɛrabt d tutlayt n listiɛmar. Ad nesteɛmer mara neddem s bessif akal neɣ ad nekkes iles d wallaɣ. Mbaɛd leqrun, win yerẓa uzaglu, yerra «tajmilt»i listiɛmar, ak-yeqqar d netta i d nek, d tutlayt-is i tutlayt-iw. Win ara yinin ayen nniḍen, d aberrani ! Frantz Fanon yarra tamawt i waya : «peau noire, masque blanc». Tutlayt tazzayrit, … Wid ar awen-yini belli tazzayrit ulac-itt acku tastayfit, tawehranit… mmxalafent, init-as ruḥ ad teɣreḍ amezruy :tafransist n lqern wis 14 tella d tutlayt n yimeɣban, n yimakaren, n wid iqeṭṭan deg yiberdan n wid akk i terkeḍ ddunit. Asmi i ibedd ugellid d tkadimit, tuɣal d tutlayt n tafat yemmalen abrid ar zdat. Deg wacu id aɣ-ifen ? Wid ar awen-yini tazzayrit tutlayt yettagmen seg tutlayin nniḍen, init-asen akka i tutlayen yedduqsen, yedren. D tutlayin yemmuten yaqqaren nukunti n «sfa». Taɛrabt ur d-ɣli ara seg igenni, tlul-d deg yiberdan gar imestajaren d yemsebriden : «hébreux, araméen, syriaques.. .» atg Wid ar awen-d-yinin tazzayrit mazal ur tezmir i yiman-s i wakken ad tuɣal am tutlayin yeselḥuyen ddunit, init-asen ayen i d-yenna Abou Ara El Maârif, amedyaz aderɣal yuran «l’épître du pardon», amedyaz-nni yebɣan ad tbedd tmedyazt-is nedd n lquran : «anefet i wulawen-nnwen ad tt-(tamedyazt)berden (polir), kra n leqrun, sakin ad twalmi». Tutlayt tettuɣal d tigellilt ḥala ma ur yesɛi ara laman deg-yiman-is wegdud tt-yettmeslayen u yeḥsib iman-is d agdud nniḍen. Dɣa, ad d-yyetwali iman-is seg ufella s tḥeqranit. Imir, tilufa n ddunit ad as-cḍent, ad d-ɣlint gar ifasen n yigduden nniḍen. Ur lliɣ «maghrébin» n yiwen ! «Le maghreb» d tazniqt n «le Machrek» i d-yennan din i d-luleɣ. Nek, zriɣ belli din i mmuteɣ. Yeḥseb iman-is d timmiṭ n ddunit, nek d ameṭarfu. Timiṭ n ddunit tsaḥ-d i ugdud yefkan azal i tutlayt-is, yettwali-tt d tutlayt n ddunit. Ur d aɣ-d-ttaḥ ddunit , ḥala ma tsaḥaɣ-d tutlayt-nneɣ. Mi yemeslay wegdud tutlayt-is u yefka-as azal, yeqquder lasel-is, akal-is , lejwareḥ-is, aḍu-is, lɣella-s… Ḍillet ɣef umezruy : yal tikkelt i deg ara iɛewwel wegdud ad «yaɣ» ddunit, ad ak-yini tutlayt ttmeslayeɣ d sfa, d tutlayt-iw, tekka-d nnig akk tiyiḍ. Akka i d-nnan iturkiyin, israiliyen, aɛraben…atg Ass-nni ideg ara nqader tutlayt-nneɣ, ad d-yenulfi ɣur-neɣ Goethe d tsekliwin, ad d-nesnulfu timacinin d cnawi u aɣ-d-isaḥ wemkan di ddunit, imi aɣ-d-yaf lḥal di tlemmast n ddunit-nneɣ. Wid ar awen-d-yinin belli tazayrit ur tcub ara ɣer tutlayin nniḍen, init-asen : a rbeḥ, a tafat, imi temxalaf. Lxilaf-nni i d nukni, i d nekwa-nneɣWid ar awen-d-yinin «amek ara tt-naru ? init-asen : wicqa, inumak mačči di lmidad i yellan, d rruḥ !Wid ar awen-d-yinin : weǧin ad d-yeḍru waya ! init-asen : isaḥikun-id yiḍelli, nukni d azekka i d aɣ-yettraǧun. Wid ar awen-d-yinin : s wacu ara tebdum ? init-asen : s ccna, s tkadimitt, sleḥmala n yiman-nneɣ.Di Lezzayer, ayen yesɛan azal yettmeslay s tzzayrit : agdud, idrimen, adellel, tayri , reffu. Ayen nniḍen d zzayed : tilibizyu, Bouteflika, limamat, at iččumar. Widen yebɣan ad teɛmer Lezzayer, ad t-ḥemmel iman-is, ad d-tekk nnig tmura, ttmeslayen tazzayrit. Widen yebɣan ad tt-aɣen, ad tt-akren, ad tt-rẓen , ad tt-nekren, ad tt-rekḍen, ttmeslayen taɛrabt taqurant. Di drus yidsen qwan, tazzayrit d aṭas tettwarkeḍ. Maɛna, ar tura kan !Deg upaspur-iw, yura-d d azzayri. I yemma, i tmeṭṭut ḥmleɣ d warraw-iw ttmeslayeɣ s tzzayrit. Ur d iyi-d-uqiɛ ara deg imeslab : ad d-yas wass i deg ara ruḥen, nek, arraw-iw d warraw n warraw-iw mazal-aɣ da ! Nutni ttḥamin ɣef lǧetat, nek ɣef ilufanen. Tebɣam tbut ? init ad tdafam ɣef tutlayt tazzayrit, ad yerfu limam, umakar, umaɛcuq n Okba Ibn Nafaa, at rebbi d widen akk ur neḥmil iman-nnsen. D reffu-a i tetbut.Ur lliɣ seg wid yettetḥin seg yiman-nnsen, i inekren tutlayt-nnsen. Ttmeslayaɣ tazzayrit, taɛrabt (idles d tsekla) d ayla-w, mačči d netta i d-iyi-sɛan 

  N kamel Daoud (Djazairi : le manifeste de Ma Langue) 

  yerra-t-id ar teqbaylit TOA 

  *Yeffeɣ-d yakan 

  
 Ilmend n tmeγra n tεacurt, id-yellan ass n ssebt 24 deg aggur ideg nella, deqs n tmesbaniyin d leqdicat yemgaraden id-ittewheggan γef dema di temnaḍin yemxalafen n tmurt n leqbayel. Dγa imezdaγ n taddert n Ṣwama&amp;epsilon,; taγiwant n Ṣwamaε id-yezgan deg usamer n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, sudsen-d yiwet n tmecreṭ meqren s wazal-is, ass n lğemεa 23 tuber yezrin, i yellan d yiwen wansay ger wansayen n tmurt n leqbayel s wayes ẓeṭṭen tagmat d tiddukli ger yemdanen. Γas zrin acḥal n yiseggasen, imezdaγ n taddert n Ṣwamaε mazal ṭfen deg laεwayed d wansayen id-warten γef lejdud-nsen imezwura, anda i ttgen timesbaniyin icuban timecreṭ-agi yal seggas akken ad-ẓẓun cfawat deg allaγen n tisutiwin id-iteddun, imi ayen id-ğğan lejdud d agerruj ur nettfaka.
