Tasebḥit n wass n lğemεa 23 tuber 2015, tella-d tmezla n 08 n yezgaren γef tikkelt, annect-a yella-d s leḥdur n yimezdaγ n taddert sumata akked inebgawen d ttweliyin-nsen id-yusan si temnaḍin yemgaraden n tmurt. Ansay-agi yelḥa-d di tsuta γer tayeḍ, anda timecṛeṭ xedmentt yemdanen di laεwacar am tεacurt akken ad-sfarḥen imeγban yenxeṣen, d usaεdel ger yemdanen, u tettili-d daγen d lfal yelhan swayes ttḍeggiren ayen n diri.I usmekti kan, timecreṭtettili-d tikwal di tallit n unebdu, lawan n tmegra akken ad-tilli lγella, tikwal niḍen tettili-d di laxrif, deg aggur n tuber, lawan n ḥartadem naγ iwjiben, melmi id-yeweḍ lawan n tyarza akken ad-temγi ṣaba.Timecreṭ-agi n taddert n Ṣwamaε tella-d s lewεadi n imezdaγ n taddert, swayes ṣawḍen uγen-d 08 n yezgaren i yemezlen, syen yella-d beṭṭu n yikesman γef twaculin n tadderet. Timecreṭ-agi d tagnit yelhan aṭas i imezdaγ n taddert n Ṣwama&amp;epsilon,; imi d ass i yessemlalen tasa d way turew, d usekcem n lfarḥ γer wulawen n yemdanen mera.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ahat tura, llant ukuẓ n tmerwin n yiseggasen segmi tebda tira tamaziɣt tettnernay deg lkaɣeḍ. Tirẓi n usalu n kra ǧǧan-tt teṭṭef dayen abrid s wacḥal d asenf d uɣanib n tira. Lameɛna, ass-a deg wussan, skud ur tettwaɣri tmaziɣt, ɣas caḍen wid yettarun, wid i d-yessiẓragen, uqan s waṭas yimeɣriyen. Ulamma imyura gren deg tira, nutni ur lmiden tutlayt-nsen deg uɣerbaz, ḍulen yimeɣriyen ad gen akken, ad ɛeddin ad ɣren tutlayt-nsen, imi s yiwen n uɛekkaz i ttewten. Neɛreḍ ad d-nawi lemri ɣef waddad amiran n udlis i yuran s tutlayt n Lmulud At Mɛemmer. Nesteqsa wid i d-yezzin akk i taluft-is seg tira i tnezzut: imyura, imaẓragen, At tnedlisin akked yimeɣriyen. Nebda-tt seg yimyura i d-yefkan tanaga (temoignage) yettemcabin cwiṭ imi tuget sḥassfen d tidet seg kra n ugdud i ur nennum arfad n udlis i tɣuri. Maca ur heggan ad brun i ṭṭbel deg waman imi ayen yellan deg udlis, ɣas ur yettwaɣri ass-a, ad yettwawef azekka.

 Seg tama n teẓrigin, nesteqsa bab n teẓrigin Tira i d-yessuffɣen ddeqs n yidlisen n tmaziɣt, maca ur nessaweḍ ad d-nesɛu tiririt-is. Racid Ulebsir, imḍebber n teẓrigin Afriwen, ulamma s tmaziɣt yiwen n udlis kan i d-yessaẓreg, yesɛa awal: «seg udlis “Azemmur deg yidurar n Leqbayel“ drus maḍi i yenzan. Deg rreḥba n udlis ideg ttekkiɣ deg Fransa, ad d-asen xemsa ad awin win n tefransist, akken ara d-yas yiwen ad yaɣ win n tmaziɣt». Deg Lezzayer, llant teẓrigin « Amsedrar » (Le Montagnard), i bdant ssufuɣent-d idlisen n tmaziɣt. Nwala imḍebber-nsent, mass Ḥasan, yenna-d: «Tidet kan, adlis amaziɣ ileḥḥu kan deg rebɛa n twilayin n tmurt daya: Lezzayer talemmast, Tubiret, Bgayet akked Tizi. Ula deg Seṭṭif anda llan yizwawen, ulac win i t-ineccden». Seg tama n At tnedlisin, yusa-d wazuḥ n usirem sɣur kra d wayen i d-yessawalen ɣer uxemmem sɣur wiyaḍ. Deg umedya n tnedlist i yettwassnen, ahat d tamezwarut deg Tizi. «Lḥala n udlis amaziɣ mačči am zik, maca ixus ma nmuqel amek leḥḥun yidlisen nniḍen». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n yilemẓi deg tnedlist n Ccix. Ma yella d imḍebber n tnedlist Guraya ur d-yebri i waṭas n usirem mi d-yenna: «ur ileḥḥu ara udlis amaziɣ. Ur nezmir akk ad t-nesserwes i win n tefransist». Deg Xerraṭa, yella yenna-aneɣ-d bab n yiwet n tnedlist, lḥala teqqur am terga i werǧin tettwarr-d. Ula d kra seg wid i nessen yakan d imeɣriyen, nɛedda sɣur-sen, yal wa s wawal-is. Gar-asen tamuɣli n Sadeq. «Nnig n lebɣi n uttekki deg ubnaw n tutlayt imi adlis ilaq-as win ara t-yeɣren. Nekk ɣɣaren daɣen s tewnafit (curiosité); d acu yellan deg udlis-inna? D acu d amaynut i d-yewwi wa? Ma d idles n tɣuri, ixus aṭas aṭas deg tmetti-nneɣ!» Akken yella tura waddad n udlis, nettraǧu ad gen kra yinesdabuyen (autorités) d yisɣuren iɣurbizen (établissements scolaire) akken ad yaf iman-is imi ula d tamaziɣt yak d tunsibt tura !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi  

  
 Ɣef ttlata n ṣṣbeḥ i yeṣṣuni rrabay ! Muḥend yellan werɛad yeṭṭis yelwawec mi as-yesla. Yewhem amek i yeṣṣuni rrabay win akken werǧin iɛemmeṛ ahat ɛeddan qeddac n yiseggasen aya. Netta acḥal n yiseggasen aya ideg yettu ssaɛa, yettu akud s timmad-is. Taswiɛt akka usant-id yisekta, isekta n temẓi, ladɣa asmi akken yetḥemmes ad yelmed ssaɛa tin akken werǧin yesɛi. Imiren d tixulal n yimcac i yesrusay ɣef ufus-is, yettṛaqab deg-sent melmi ara dewwṛent. Yemmekta-d ussan-nni asmi i yeɣɣaṛ, asmi i d-yettnekkar tafejrit s leḥṛaṛa i wakken ad iṛuḥ ɣer lkuliǧ. Imiren d netta i d-yezeggirin rrabay, yettekkar-d uqbel ad yeṣṣuni s wacḥal. 

 Taswiɛt akka, yenṭeq ɣer yiman-is yenna-yas: I iɛeddan fell-ak ay ixef-iw, yerna mazal ur temmuteḍ ! Ncab uqbel ad numɣuṛ, meqqeṛit uqbel ad ncab ! Zgant tirga-nneɣ ɛekksent imi di ṭṭlam i neṛǧa tafsut armi i teǧǧuǧeg ur tt-nwala ara. Tura d ayen kan tirga ḥebseɣ-tent, ssaɛa ttuɣ-tt, aḥun Ṛebbi kan yella lkif iss ttṣebbiṛeɣ ul-iw ; ɣas ma ɛemdeɣ tazmert-iw ad tt-isum meɛna ufiɣ-t d amwanes. 

 Muḥend, ur iḥar ara mi akken yeṣṣuni rrabay, ɣas yeẓṛa d ayen yessewhamen imi mačči d netta i t-iɛemṛen, meɛna netta i wumi teffeɣ leḥṛaṛa acu n lfayda yesɛa ma inuda ɣef sseba ? 

 Netta di tidet, d yelli-s n gma-s tameẓyant i yesfentewcen di rrabay-nni mi as-t-yefka ad turar yes-s, ziɣen nettat tɛemmeṛ-it mebla ma tfaq. Mi as-t-imud akken yenna-yas : Ax-n ad tbeṛneḍ deg uṛeqqas n ṣṣeḥ, s anda i am-yehwa tawiḍ-t, meqqaṛ ad tlemdeḍ amek ara tjiriḍ lweqt-im akka d tameẓyant mačči am nekni umi teɛkes aqlaɣ neffeɣ-d d uɛwijen ugar. Asmi i nella annect-im, nɛelleq zzheṛ-nneɣ deg texlalt n umcic, neɛya nettṛaju deg-s anda ara terr ma d asawen neɣ d aksar armi i aɣ-teqqim akken d tannumi nettenququl, negra-d neṣṛuḥ taflest deg wakud ar lexxeṛ-nneɣ. Muḥend di leɛwayed-is ur yeggan ara di lawan-nni, yufa-tt meqqaṛ d sseba i wakken ad yetmeɛɛen ɣef wayen icudden ɣer wakud. Yettmeyyiz, yettxemmim ɣef lweqt ɛlaḥsab n wayen yessen. Imiren bdan ttadfen-d ɣer wallaɣ-is lemɛani icudden ɣer lweqt : Ass, azal, iḍ, aseggas neɣ awettay, ssmana, agur, tasemhut, tanezzayt akked tmeddit, ssaɛa, dqiqa, asukund neɣ tasint,… Yuɣal yenṭeq ɣer yiman-is, yenna : Ismawen-a akk icudden ɣer wakud neɣ lweqt, d imdanen i ten-isemman akken ad ggen lxilaf ger teswiɛin, akken ad neḍmen tudert-nsen, ad qeɛden tiktiwin-nsen icudden ɣer yisekta-nsen d yimahilen-nsen : Luleɣ-d ass leflani, ttiɛad ad yili dduṛt leflani, ɣef ssaɛa leflani,…atg.                 <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>         …/…

  
 Lɣella n uyefki, tettxaṣsa deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura deg wakal akk n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Tikwal, ttɣaman yimezdaɣ n 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant-agi, 5 neɣ 7 wussan, i wakken ad d-yas uyefki yiwen ubrid. D ayen i ten-yeğğan ad d-ttaɣen ayefki n tebwaḍt, yecban s 80 DA i yiwet n tebwaḍt, neɣ win-a n llaḥḍa. Amedya tacelwiḍt n «Loya» n 150g tettnuzu s 80 DA, ma d tin n 250g tettnuzu s 150 DA. Ssebat ugtent ma d tifrat ulac; tikkelt d lluzin i iḥebsen ɣef lxedma, tikkelt ulac asafar i d as-sexlaḍen, i d-ttawin seg tmurt n Fransa, tayeḍ tayeḍ. Niqal, ttawin-d tlata n tikkal i ddurt ayefki ɣer ugafa n tɣiwant-a, s uqawej d asawen (azal n 5 n tuddar), yuɣal snat n tikkal i smana. Ma deg waggur-agi iεeddan, yuɣal ala yiwet n tikkelt i d-ittṣaḥen tama-a, d ayen yeswhamen n ṣṣaḥ. Dɣa, deg ddurt kan yezrin, yeqqim 5 wussan ur d-yusi. Ɛeddant teswiεin anida qqimen imezdaɣ n tɣiwant-agi azal n ddurt mebla ayefki. Iεedda yiwen n lwaqt anida tacelwiḍt n 30 DA tenza s 50 DA, yerna d tin-a yesεan azal ur nettbeddil ara s ufella. Ma d imezdaɣ n tɣiwant-agi, la ttrağğun s ccuq, melmi ara telli lluzin-nni tamaynut, yellan deg Tala Athmane. Ahat d tifrat i ugur-agi n lexsas n llɣela deg tḥuna n tɣiwant-a i ttiḥwiğin yal ass.

<p style="text-align: right;"> A. A. 

<div> 
  
 Taourirt Moussa Ouamar yenṭeḍ yisem-s ɣer yisem n Lounes Matoub imi deg-s i d-yekker u deg-s i yezdeɣ armi d asmi i t-nɣan. Tettwassen taddart-a ugar seg wasmi yuɣal uẓekka n Matoub d ’’lemqam’’ : ttẓurun-t yal ass u ttasen-d seg yal tamnaṭ. Acu kan Matoub ur d-yekkir ara akka kan. Yufa-d annar yerwet, taddart teččur d izemniyen, netta ikemmel deg ubrid-nsen. ‘’Dagi ula d tjur ɣrant’’, akken i as-yenna Lounis Ait Menguellet. Taourirt Moussa Ouamar d taddart n Aïni Aït Larbi Ou Said yemma-s n Fadma Ath Mansour. Deg uɣerbaz n Taddart-a i yesɣer acḥal d aseggas Mouloud Feraoun, aɣerbaz uɣur i d-yusa Albert Camus akked Emmanuel Roblès. Deg lgirra-nni, tettusemma taddart-a, ‘’Zone rouge’’.

   Takerḍa n taddart 

 Taourirt Moussa Ouamar, tetabaɛ taɣiwant n Aït Mahmoud lɛerc n At Ɛisi uqbel ad yuɣal At Dwala. Zzint-as-d tudrin-a : ɣef usamar Tizi Hibel ; ɣef ugafa, Tizi n Talakht ; ɣef umalu, Aït Bouyahia ; ma ɣef unẓul, Taguemmount Azouz. Tuli ɣef lebḥar s wazal n 600 n lmitrat, zedɣen deg-s ugar n 3000 n yimdanen. Mačči d yiwen neɣ sin i iɛeddan s taddart-a, deg-sen : Fadma n Soumer deg useggas n 1863 ; Messali 1936 ; Ahmed Oumeri 1943 ; Mouloud Feraoun 1944-1952 ; Imache Amar 1951 ; Krim Belkacem 1955 ; Amirouche 1957…atg. Ɣur-s 46 n yimeɣras. Tesɛa taddart-a, aɣerbaz amenzu d uxxam n yilmeẓyen i tebna nettat. Sɛan, diɣ, tarbaɛt n ddabex uḍar OTM (Olympique Taourirt Moussa)

 Llant aṭas n tjemmuyaɛ anda ttɣimin yimezdaɣ. Izenqan akken ma llan zeddigit u yal azniq yesɛa isem. Ismawen n yimeɣras i asen-fkan Wat taddart. Mazal ar ass-a teẓẓaḍ tissirt taqdimt n uzemmur deg taddart. 

  Isem n taddart 

 “Tawrirt n Musa Waɛmer, Seg zik ay teɛmer, d tamezwarut deg leɛrac.’’ A.Ourrad Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Achour Ourrad, isem-agi yekka-d seg yimezwura i d-ikecmen ɣer taddart. Amezwaru isem-is Ouamar, syin yesɛa-d mmi-s Moussa. Dɣa, qqaren-as Taourirt Moussa Ouamar. Yella wayeḍ-nniḍen gar yimezwura, qqaren-as Moh Ath Moh. Yiwen yeṭṭef tama n wadda, wayeḍ yeṭṭef tama n ufella. Taddart-a, tebda tettɛemmir gar lqern wis 10 d wis 13. 

  Amezruy d tmetti. 

 ‘’Taddart-a, deg tazwara, xeddmen akal : zerɛen irden, timẓin, yella uzemmur, lḥeb lemluk, ttrebbin lmal, ayen yeɛnan tafellaḥt s umata. S yis-s i ddren. Lawan n lɣella, ttembeddalen rreẓq : yal wa ad d-yawi ɣer wayeḍ ayen ur yesɛi ara (Le troc). Mi ara megren, xeddmen tiwizi, d ccerṭ ɣur-sen. Sserwaten deg yinurar, annar aneggaru n userwet yeḥbes deg useggas n 1967 n Amar Ou Yidir. Ma d tura, ala ciṭ n uzemmur i d-yeggran’’. Akka i aɣ-d-yesmekti taswaɛt Mass Ourrad. ‘’Zik, ttemlilin yimdanen deg tejmaɛt i yellan d aɣerbaz n tudert. Yella deg-s wawal n ṣswab d lmeɛqul, llan yimɣaren izemniyen s leɛqel-nsen, yella yidles s umata’’. Ikemmel yenna-d urgaz-a.

  Taourirt Moussa Ouamar d Larebaâ Nath Yiraten. 

 Zik, Tizi Rached akked Mekla tteḥqaren Larebaâ Nath Yiraten, bɣan ad ten-stɛemren. Ihi, kkren Wat taddart Taourirt Moussa Ouamar, ruḥen ɛawnen Larebaâ Nath Yiraten, rran ‘’icenga-nsen’’ syin. D acu kan, yella ccerṭ. Nnan-asen i Wat Larebaâ :’’kunwi ad txedmen ssuq snat n smanat, nukni ad t-nexdem smana tis tlata’’. Ihi, akka i d-yella umtawa gar-asen.

  Aɛdawen uɣalen d iḍewlan. 

 Yeqqar lemtel-nni n zik : ‘’tkennu tẓeṭṭa ɣef wayen turew’’. Zik, deg taddart-a, tella taɛdawit d tameqqrant. Tella gar sin yimdanen, Slimane Oulamara d Ali Ath Mbarek. Acu kan, taddart kamel tettucebbel imi sɛan deg sin awal-nsen deg tejmaɛt. Ihi, i wakken ad tefru temsalt, yekker Slimane Oulamara yeḍleb yelli-s n Ali Ath Mbarek i mmi-s. Seg wass-nni, uɣalen d iḍewlan, yekfa cwal.

  Tettwaṭṭef Fadma n Soumer deg taddart-a. 

 Ɛemti-s n Fadma n Soumer tezweǧ-d ɣer taddart-a, yuɣi-itt yiwen seg twacult Laskri. Ihi, asmi ttnadin yiṛumyen ɣef Fadma n Soumer, tekker truḥ-d ɣer ɛemti-s i yellan deg taddart Taouririt Moussa Ouamar. Ḍefren-tt-id yiṛumyen ɣer taddart-agi. Syin tekker terwel ɣer yiwen umekkan i ibeɛden s wazal n 50 n lmitrat ɣef uɣerbaz n taddart, terwel ɣer Tala n Sidi Ali Moussa anda i tt-ṭṭfen. 

  Aɣerbaz n taddart 

 Aɣerbaz-a, yeldi tiwwura-as deg useggas n 1893. Mazal-it ar tura. Yettwaqɛed, ala netta i d aɣerbaz i tesɛa taddart akka tura. Yesselmed deg-s Mouloud Feraoun seg 1944 armi 1952. Usan-d ɣer uqerbaz-a, Albert Camus akked Emmanuel Roblès. 

  Imṛabḍen n yiṛumyen.  

 ‘’Dagi ula d tjur ɣrant’’ : akken llan yimɣaren d temɣarin, heddren akk tarumit. Sseɣren-ten akk yimṛabḍen n yiṛumyen (Pères blancs et sœurs blanches). Yella uɣerbaz i warrac, yella wayeḍ i teḥdayin. At n Tewrirt, ttcekkiren aṭas imṛabḍen-agi imi i as-nxedmen lxir. Mačči ala leqraya i ten-sseɣren, meɛna ɛawnen-ten ula deg tudert-nsen. ‘’ttawinaɣ-d lmakla, ayefki d lebsa’’ i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Lardjane Nafaa. ‘’yiwen yettas-d ula deg yideflawen, ileḥḥu-d ugar n 2 n kilumitr deg teẓgi i wakken ad d-yaweḍ ɣer umuḍin.Lukan mačči d timṛabḍin n yiṛumyen, tili ass-a, aṭas ur nettili ara, imi d nutenti i yellan d tirḍaytin, d nutenti i yettɛawanen tilawin mi ara d-rbunt’’. Ikemmel yenna. 

  Jida Lalla Ouzna. 

 Lalla ouzna, d tameṭṭut mechuren aṭas deg taddart. Nnan-d ad as-tefkeḍ taɣawsa, mi d-tefɣeḍ, ad tt-tefk i wayeḍ. Tlul deg useggas n 1873, temmut deg useggas n 1974. Tella d tarḍayt (Sage-femme). Seg wakken txeddem aṭas n lxir, tekcem deg umezruy, neɛ ɛad deg tmucuha. Kra ara tesɛu, ad t-tseddeq. Nnan-d argaz-is yesnuzu zzit. Yiwet n tikkelt, tekker teseddeq akk zzit-nni n urgaz-is, teseddeq ula d litra taneggarut. Ihi, mi tfaq tekfa zzit-nni, tugad argaz-is, dɣa, truḥ s axxam-nsen, tugad ad as-yebru. Ass-nni, usan-d wid iwumi ara yessiǧew zzit urgaz-is. Akken yemmeɣ ɣer yicbula, yufa-ten ččuren, akken i ten-yeǧǧa. Tameddit mi d-tuɣal, ttmeslayen, yenna-as ass-a saǧwaɣ zzit-nni. Dɣa, nettat, teqqim tewhem. Kra n tedyatin ɣef Matoub.

  Matoub d yidlisen. 

 Ɣef wakken i d-nnan, seg zik, iḥemmel Matoub ad iɣer. Ihi, yiwen wass, yemlal deg lǧanaza akked Achour Ourrad (d netta i aɣ-tt-id-yennan). Yuɣ lḥal, argaz-a yesnaɣ-as tannumi yettawi-d idlisen mi ara d-yali ɣer taddart. Mi d-yewweḍ winna ɣer lǧanaza, yuɣ lḥal teqqes-it tɣirdemt. Medden akk lhan-d deg umekkan-nni n tuqsa, Matoub yettḥewwis lǧiban-is ma yella kra n udlis.

  Matoub d waman n lbir .

 Yesɛa Matoub lbir deg uxxam-is. Seg wakken ttxassan waman deg taddart, yebna tala i Wat taddart u yessalay-as-d aman seg lbir-nni. Ttasen-d ttagmen. Yiwet n tikkelt mi d-ileḥḥu s axxam, yemmuger-d tilawin uɣalent-d mebla ma wwint-d aman. Yesteqsa-tent ɣef sebba. Nnant-as-d : ‘’la d-teqqar yemma-k, yeqqur lbir-nni’’. Mi yewweḍ s axxam, yufa yemma-s la tettess tamazirt s waman n lbir-nni. Seg zɛef-nni, yekker yerkeḍ-as akk tibḥirt-is.

  Matoub deg wass lɛid. 

 Iruḥ Matoub ɣer tejmaɛt deg wass n lɛid, yufa-n din yiwen urgaz yeqqim weḥd-s. dɣa-, yenna-as Matoub :’’nekk aql-i da axater weḥd-i i lliɣ, i kečč, acuɣer mačči deg uxxam-ik i telliḍ, ɣer warraw-ik ass-agi n lɛid ?’’ yerra-as-d winna :’’ad ak-iiniɣ kan ṣṣaḥ, setḥaɣ ad qableɣ tawacult-iw imi ur zmireɣ ara ad d-aɣeɣ ikerri n lɛid’’. Yuɣ lḥal, Matoub, yesɛa ikerri deg uxxam. Din, din, iruḥ yewwi-as-t-id.

  Matoub d iselman. 

 Yiwen wass, iruḥ ad d-yaɣ iselman deg taddart. Mi yewweḍ, yenna-as i winna yesnuzun iselmaden ad as-d-yefk arḍel (azgen n kilu). Mi i as-t-id-yefka, yessegra-as-d awal winna, yenna-as :’’Matoub s timmad-is, yewwi kan arḍel’’. Yuɣ lḥal, yefka-as Matoub 1000 idinaren. Mi iruḥ ad as-d-yerr ṣserf, yenna-as Matoub : ‘’aɣ-d yis-sen lefhama’’. Kra n tedyatin ɣef Matoub.

  Matoub d yidlisen. 

 Ɣef wakken i d-nnan, seg zik, iḥemmel Matoub ad iɣer. Ihi, yiwen wass, yemlal deg lǧanaza akked Achour Ourrad (d netta i aɣ-tt-id-yennan). Yuɣ lḥal, argaz-a yesnaɣ-as tannumi yettawi-d idlisen mi ara d-yali ɣer taddart. Mi d-yewweḍ winna ɣer lǧanaza, yuɣ lḥal teqqes-it tɣirdemt. Medden akk lhan-d deg umekkan-nni n tuqsa, Matoub yettḥewwis lǧiban-is ma yella kra n udlis.

  Matoub d waman n lbir. 

 Yesɛa Matoub lbir deg uxxam-is. Seg wakken ttxassan waman deg taddart, yebna tala i Wat taddart u yessalay-as-d aman seg lbir-nni. Ttasen-d ttagmen. Yiwet n tikkelt mi d-ileḥḥu s axxam, yemmuger-d tilawin uɣalent-d mebla ma wwint-d aman. Yesteqsa-tent ɣef sebba. Nnant-as-d : ‘’la d-teqqar yemma-k, yeqqur lbir-nni’’. Mi yewweḍ s axxam, yufa yemma-s la tettess tamazirt s waman n lbir-nni. Seg zɛef-nni, yekker yerkeḍ-as akk tibḥirt-is.

  Matoub deg wass lɛid. 

 Iruḥ Matoub ɣer tejmaɛt deg wass n lɛid, yufa-n din yiwen urgaz yeqqim weḥd-s. dɣa-, yenna-as Matoub :’’nekk aql-i da axater weḥd-i i lliɣ, i kečč, acuɣer mačči deg uxxam-ik i telliḍ, ɣer warraw-ik ass-agi n lɛid ?’’ yerra-as-d winna :’’ad ak-iiniɣ kan ṣṣaḥ, setḥaɣ ad qableɣ tawacult-iw imi ur zmireɣ ara ad d-aɣeɣ ikerri n lɛid’’. Yuɣ lḥal, Matoub, yesɛa ikerri deg uxxam. Din, din, iruḥ yewwi-as-t-id.

  Matoub d iselman. 

 Yiwen wass, iruḥ ad d-yaɣ iselman deg taddart. Mi yewweḍ, yenna-as i winna yesnuzun iselmaden ad as-d-yefk arḍel (azgen n kilu). Mi i as-t-id-yefka, yessegra-as-d awal winna, yenna-as :’’Matoub s timmad-is, yewwi kan arḍel’’. Yuɣ lḥal, yefka-as Matoub 1000 idinaren. Mi iruḥ ad as-d-yerr ṣserf, yenna-as Matoub : ‘’aɣ-d yis-sen lefhama’’.

  Awal akked Malika Matoub. 

 Nemlal-itt ass-nni mi nerza ɣer uẓekka n Matoub, terra-aɣ-d ɣef kra n yisteqsiyen.

  Anda tedda temsalt n tmenɣiwt n Matoub deg creɛ? 

 Malika Matoub : ar ass-a, ur d-iban kra. Aql-aɣ la nettraǧu. Tamsalt n Lwennas, werǧin tɛedda deg creɛ. Deg useggas n 2011, sɛeddan Medjnoun akked Chenoui mačči d tamsalt n Matoub i aɣ-d-nnan. Dɣa, nejbed-d iman-nneɣ. Tamsalt n Matoub, d tamsalt tasertit mačči n creɛ. 

  Syin, tettnadim kunwi ɣef wayen yeḍran, teṭṭfem imusnawen iberraniyen ara inadin. Nezmer ad nẓer s anda ssawḍen ? 

 Teẓram, nebɣa ad d-tban ciṭ n tafat deg temsalt-a. neṭṭef wid ara inadin. Xedmen tazrawt n ṭerṣasin, ɛawden-d amek teḍra teqṣiṭ. Aql-aɣ la nettraǧu melmi ara d-yaweḍ wass, ad nuɣal ɣer creɛ. 

  Yiwet n turda (hypothèse) 

 Mačči d tamsalt n turdiwin. Timenɣiwt-is, tettuhegga-d akken ilaq. Anda i t-nɣan, d amekkan iwulmen i txezzabit-nni. 

  Anwa yesɛan lfayda s tmenɣiwt-a ? 

 D wagi i d asteqsi i ilaqen. 18 n yiseggasen-agi, tebda tettifrir-d tagut. Acu kan ayen i aɣ-iceɣben, d akken nebɣa ad nẓer amek d wacuɣer. Aɣref aqbayli mačči d ungif, ilaq kan bnadem ad yesteqsi ɣef winna yesɛan lfayda seg tmenɣiwt. Lwennas yettnaɣ ɣef tugdut, ɣef teqbaylit, ɣef tmaziɣt. D argaz ilelli. Irgazen ilelliyen ssagaden. 

  Amek i tɛacem iseggasen-a ? Tella-d tmeḥqranit ? Ma yella win yettgalan deg-wen ? 

 18 n yiseggasen-a, tedder twacult-iw leɛǧeb deg tɣamsa. Nerwa rregmat d tuksa n sser. Ɛeddan tilas. Amek akabar i ilaqen ad yili ɣer tama-nneɣ, yuɣal d axsim-nneɣ. Dayen ur iqebbel leɛqel. Mkul 25 deg yunyu, mi ara d-yeḥder umulli n tmenɣiwt n Lwennas, taɣiwant n Aït Mahmoud ad d-teɣleɣ ass-nni aman i taddart kamel. Asmi i tt-yeṭṭef ukabar RCD. Ula d llambat n trisiti ur tent-ttɛawaden ara deg les poteaux iqerben ɣer uxxam-nneɣ. 

 Deg taggara, ad snemreɣ, Mokrane. Nessah, Ourrad Achour, Lardjane Nafaa d Sellal Moh Oussalem.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Deg tkerḍa tamaynut i d-thegga tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu i yinelmaden ijdiden, tettwakkes tira n tmaziɣt, ur d-yeddi ara diɣ, yisem n tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmri, ayen i d-yessekren lɣiḍ ameqqran ɣer yinelmaden n tesdawit-agi, ussan-nni n tuɣalin. Din din, yeffeɣ-d yiwen wulɣu i yettwazuzren deg Facebook, anda yeṭṭaleb aneḥbus ɣef leqraya alamma tuɣal-d tira n tmaziɣt akked yisem n Mulud Mɛemmri. Ihi, yeḍra-d uneḥbus ɣef leqraya i kra n lweqt deg tesdawit. Xas ulamma mačči akk inelmaden i d-yerran i teɣri, meɛna tigawt-a, tewwiḍ ɣer yiswi-s imi i d-tuɣal tira n tmaziɣt akked yisem n Mulud Mɛemmri ɣef tkerḍa-nni, ɣef wakken i asen-iṛeggem Pr Tessa, imḍebber amezwaru n tesdawit. Seg tama n yimḍebber-a, tamsalt tban, u lumur fran imi iwala d akken ‘’inelmaden sɛan lḥeqq, meɛna ilaq ad aɣ-d-ssiwḍen tiɣri i nekni, ad nemmeslay uqbel ad ɛeddin ɣer uneḥbus-agi. Syin ma walan, tewwi-d ad t-xedmen, ad t-xedmen’’, i d-yenna Mass Tessa. Ma d inelmaden, nutni walan tamsalt s tmuɣli-nniḍen. Deg wawal i d-wwin ass-nni n unujmuɛ sdat n temkerḍit n tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmri, walan yinelmaden d akken ‘’tukksa n tira n tmaziɣt ɣef tkerḍa tamaynut n unelmad d asenqes deg wazal n tutlayt, ama d tamaziɣt neɣ tafransist imi ula d taneggarut-a, ulac-itt deg tkerḍa-agi’’. Imi ayen ibanen, iban, ula d imḍebbren n tesdawit, fehmen timsal u steɛrefen d akken yella-d lexsas deg tira n tkerḍa-a. ‘’Tamaziɣt, d tutlayt taɣelnawt u tunṣid, ilaq ad tili deg tkerḍa-agi. Gar-aɣ d smana, ad d-ffɣent azal n 12 000 n tkerḍiwin n yinelmaden ijdiden s tlata n tutlayin : tamaziɣt, taɛrabt akked tefrensist’’, akka i asen-yenna Pr tessa, imḍebber amezwaru n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu. I wakken ad iqenneɛ ugar inelmaden, ikemmel yenna ‘’Aql-aɣ la nettwali amek ara nerr timsirin n tmaziɣt deg wahil n yal aɣiwen’’. I usmekti, lemden deg tesdawit Mulud Mammeri ugar n 60 000 n yinelmaden, gar-asen 12 000 imanuten. Aseggas-a, rnan-d 135 n yiselmaden ɣer dinna, am wakken ulin 11 n yiselmaden ɣer uswir n Professeur. Ugur ameqqran n yinelmaden n tesdawit-a, d tamsalt n tɣellist imi aṭas n cwalat i d-yettilin, ladɣa deg Tamda akked Boukhalfa anda i d-tegla ula s tmettant n yimdanen. Aṭas n tmesbaniyin i d-yellan ilindi ɣef demma n wanect-a.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Taddart tbedd ur tmal. Tecfa ɣef ctawi qessiḥen, tecfa ɣef unebdu yeṛɣan. Di lawan-nni , werǧin yečča wamwan di tegrest, werǧin tečča tefsut di ṣṣmayem. Lmizan igerrz i wussan lkil, tisemhuyin( saisons) sɛedlent nuba gar-asen-t. 

 Imesdurar ggan lemqud iwussan , ferqen aseggas d iḥricen . ixf useggas yessawel lyali n yennayer, lɛezla, imirɣan, iɛaẓriyen, anekcum n tafsut, tizeggaɣin, timɣarin, lejwaṛeḥ, sswaleḥ, imeḥzan, aḥeyyan , aḥeyyan n iḥeṛṛiyen, aḥeyyan n waklan, gar uḥeyyan d nnisan, nnisan, izegzawan, iwraɣen,iquranen, adwel n tafukt, lɛinṣra, ssmayem n unebdu, ssmayem n umwan,hartadem( amedmum n tyerza), taggara n tyerza( iwejjiben),iqecqacen, tuɣalin n tafukt,iṣṣemaḍen iberkanen, lyali. Di lawan-nni akal yufa iman-is, imɣan ,ufan ttbut , iɣersiwen ufan lebɣi. Agama yella d ṣelṭan.

 Tekcem tafsut war ameggar. War ma fɣent lxalat ɣer lexlawi. War ma necṛaḥent wallen n ilmeẓyen s thuzki n teqcicin ssut rubba-t akked lefwaḍi. Tafsut( sebɣen tikwal d tazeggaɣt, tikwal d taberkant) tikelt-a tuɣal d tasusamt. Tixlulin ur d fkint tafenda-nsen( parfum). Igran ur d cebḥen s iǧeǧǧigen urqimen.Agusim ur yeɣma ɣer icenfiren n teḥdayin. Tafsut n useggas-as terra aɛjar ɣef udem-is, teffer ddaw ujellab n tacmat.

 Taddart tettu tamuɣli ɣer tignewt . Lebyur ur d jmiɛen aman, . Di tliwa leɛwanser qquṛen. Tisarijin n waman ččuṛent d amillus. Timiqqwa n n igeffuren uɣalent d- irragen uqbel ad nnalent lqaɛa. Xellen wussan d wiyaḍ. Ccetwa temmut uqbel ad tlal. Anebdu yessufɣ-d timejjatin-is mebɣir lawan. Tafsut tefka anzi ɣer wamwan. Amsedrar yettu lqis n tudert , iɛerq-as amek ara yelhu ilmen n tlaba yelsa. 

 Deg zenqen yekker uɣabar yesdelwih waḍu n fuṛaṛ yeṛɣan. Deg lexlawi knan yimɣan , lliqa tuɣal d asfer ur d nettnulfu. Deg urtan nnudment tiskar deg akken iban-asen-t id lḥal yesker. Imi ɣef yekmec wawal yesnehtit yeqqar: tasehmuyt anda akka teffer?

 Ulac aman di tiregwa. Ulac aman deg iɣeẓran ..ala nnif mi yeffunzer. Amsedrar yerran regmet d lḥirfa, yir asweɛdi d ṣṣenɛa, yir lefhem d ssɛaya… yennecraḥ ul-is deg uḍumu n ilefḍan id yewwi lawan. Iɣmisen neggin d yir awal yekran gar Flen akked flen. Nessen amek ara nesfreḥ ixṣimen-nneɣ. 

 Deg wamwan neɣ deg tefsut aqbayli yezga yeseftutus d nnif n weqbayli. Ayen yeḍṛan deg ukabar n yidles akked tugdudt ( RCD) yefka-d ttbut amek iɛagalen-is seftin anamek n idles d win tugdut. Yecceḍ wawal di tefsut yuɣal ttwab ɣer “qil u qal”…meɛna si zik akka i yella lḥal : nessen i uɣerbal tikli, awran ad iɛeddi ma aclim yid-s a nili. Meɛna akka i yella lḥal: nessen aniwel n tarbut n ccwal bay-gar-nneɣ. Ɣef tiwwura n tefsut amek ara id ilal wawal neɣ amek ara ifakk wawal? Awal yenna-t-id bab n wawal:

  Yal yiwen yenna  

  D nekk izewren 

  Kra xedmen ɛecra 

  A t-yexdem yiwen 

  Ur tḥamlem ara  

  Awal n tdukli 

  A Hmed Umeri 

  Iɣaben am yitri.. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Yiwen uɛeggun tceggɛit yemma-s as-d-yaɣ ulac di ssuq. Iteddu deg ubrid, yufa yiwen yettɛebbi tilajurin. Yena-as :

 -Yya ad iyi-d-ɛiwneḍ.

 -D acu ara d iyi-d-tefkeḍ ma ɛɛewneɣ-k ?

 -Ak ffkeɣ ulac.

 -Ulac ! D ayagi i tt-qellibeɣ.

 Imi fuken, yenna-as uɛeggun-nni :

 -Ffek-iyi-d tura d acu iyi-d-tenniḍ.

 -D acu k-in ffkeɣ, ulac !

 -Ih ! Ffek-iyi-d ulac.

 -Amek ara k-in-ffkeɣ ulac, ulamek ?

 -Debber aqerru-ik, nekk bɣiɣ ulac-iw ad d-yali di lqaɛa neɣ ad d-yeɣli deg yigenni.

 Nnuɣen ɣef wulac. Tagara ruḥen ɣer umɣar azemni akken aten-yefru. Yesla i tedyant-nsen alarmi fuken. Yal yiwen yeḥka-d tadyant-is akken i as-teḍra.

 Inna-asen umɣar azemni i uɛeggun-nni :

 -Ḥader ! S acu i ak-yeɣlin ɣer lqaɛa ?

 Yettnadi uɛeggun-nni deg yilem anda ara yaf ulac, ulac. Yeqqar-asen kan :

 -Ulac d acu iyi-ɣlin, ulac…

 Inna-as umɣar azemni :

 -Ih ! D ulac-nni iɣef tettnadiḍ i ak-yeɣlin, qelleb mliḥ ad t-afeḍ.

 Yettnadi alarmi ulac d acu i yufa, dɣa iruḥ.

 Bussaɛd  ḤEMAR,

<p style="text-align: right;"> * D tajmilt i Muḥya 

  
 PARIS – Yemmut Jean Lacouture, aneɣmas, amaru n tmeddurin n tugniwin n lqern wis 20 yerna d yiwen seg yimeqranen ay iwten ɣef tukksa n ussehres, ɣer 94 n yiseggasen, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna ass n ssebt twacult-nnes.

 Aneɣmas-a ameɣnas ay ixedmen d amɛawen azal n 20 n yiseggasen deg uɣmis n Le Monde yemmut deg uxxam-nnes deg Roussillon (Vaucluse, deg Fṛansa), yenser seg ddunit-a war leɛtab yerna s leɛqel-nnes, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna yelli-s, Dominique Miollan-Lacouture, ay d-yernan d akken ad d-tili tfagla ahat deg Ctembeṛ deg Paris akken ad as-rren tajmilt. Lacouture yella-d d anagi ameqran n lqern wis 20, yerna yemlal d umur ameqran seg wudmawen mechuṛen n lqern-a. Argaz-a yewwi-d amecwaṛ i yiman-nnes yerna iga-d axeddim d ameqran ay t-yerran d aneɣmas, d amaru n tmeddurin yerna d anmezruy ay d-yufraren. Seg tgara n yiseggasen n 1940, yuki d akken tukksa n ussehres (listiɛmaṛ) ulac tarewla fell-as, yerna yeqqel d yiwen seg yiwen seg yimeqranen ay iwten i lmend n waya. Yebda amahil (axeddim) deg uɣmis n Combat, sakkin yudef ɣer tmirawt n uɣmis n Le Monde yerna yeqqel yettwassen d aneɣmas ay yettarun seg wul ɣef tukksa n ussehres, ladɣa deg wayen yerzan tiririt n tlelli i Lezzayer ayɣef ay d-yura sin n yidlisen. Aneɣmas-a yella-d d anagi usrid n ṭṭrad n Lezzayer d lemcawṛat tiweɛṛanin n Evian gar unabaḍ afṛensis d unabaḍ uɛḍil n tegduda tadzayrit. Deg udlis-nnes «Algérie, la guerre est fini» (Lezzayer, ifuk ṭṭrad) ay d-yeffɣen deg 1985 deg teẓrigin n Complexe (Bruxelles), yebder-d uguren ay yellan gar sin-a n yidisan imi ay mgerraden deg ṛṛay. Jean Lacouture yessuffeɣ-d deg 2008 adlis niḍen ay yura ɣef uzarug n Lezzayer d tgara n umenkud ahersan afṛensis. «L’Algérie algérienne, fin d’un empire, naissance d’une nation» (Lezzayer tadzayrit, ifuk umenkud, ilul-d uɣlan) yura-as tazwert-nnes Jean Daniel, yerna yeḥka-d deg-s imenɣi i uzarug n Lezzayer d yiseggasen ineggura n ussehres afṛensis.

 Yexdem d aneɣmas deg Le Monde deg tallit n ṭṭrad n Lezzayer, yerna yura-d timeddurin n De Gaulle, Mendès France, Mitterand, Ho Chi Minh d Umaṣri Djamel Abdenasser, yerna deg udlis-nnes wis sin ɣef Lezzayer, yeḥka-d ass s wass imenɣi n Yidzayriyen i uzarug. Lacouture d ameɣnas n uzelmaḍ, iwet i usseddu n «tɣemsa n tgermant» yerna ur yettamen ara s tmesɣarut. «Aneɣmas-a ixeddem am udiplumati: yettnadi ad yefhem yerna ad d-yessefhem timuɣliwin yemgerraden, am wakken ur yetteffer ara d akken yesmenyaf tifrat-a ugar n tifrat niḍen».S tmettant n Jean Lacouture, Lezzayer tesṛuḥ yiwen n umeddakel d ameqran, d argaz ay yefkan iseɣ i yimenɣi n yiɣerfan mgal ussehres d lbaṭel abeṛṛani.

<p style="text-align: right;"> NSL 

  
 Aṭas n leswaq i yellan deg Bgayet, deg qeddac n idigan, kra seg-sen acḥal-aya nutni xeddmen znuzun, kra nniḍen nnulfan-d taggara-ya d imaynuten. Am rreḥba n tnezzut tameqqrant i d-yellan ussan iɛeddan deg Lberj n Mira, taɣiwant n Tsexriwt, deg teɣzi n qrib ayyur. D timeyyatin n tɣawsiwin, tal yiwet deg usenf-is, i d-ijebden allen n medden i yerzan ɣer din s ṭṭaqa. Gar wayen akk i d-yettwafesren ɣef ṭṭwabel, neɣ i d-yettwaɛellqen deg yigenni, yezmer ad iwali unerzaf ɣer umḍiq-nni iselsa n tal tasuta (génération), tagella, isafaren n tmeṭṭut, dduzan n uxxam, akked wurar i d-isaḥen d amur tikkelt-a i warrac imecṭaḥ ma bɣan ad kksen ɣef wulawen-nsen ladɣa deg teswiɛt-a iɛeddan n yimuras (vacances)…atg. Ɣef waya, ddeqs n yibabaten i yessawḍen arraw-nsen ɣer umḍiq-nni n usgunfu anda yal aqrur ilaq ad ixelles kra n ssuma, teɣlay ɣur kra, iwakken ad yurar urar-a neɣ d wa. «Asmi sliɣ i ttawil n wurar i yellan deg ulzuz n Lburj n Mira, wwiɣ-n mmi ad yurar din kra war ma yessuter-iyi-d, maca mi newweḍ din ur yufa ara uraren i as-yehwan, am win n tkeryas, dɣa nuɣal-d dindin». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n ubabat. Seg tama n tlawin, aṭas i yerzan ama seg Ayt Smaɛel, Ssuq n Letnin, Ayt Idris, Kefrida, ed temnaḍin nniḍen i ibeɛden cwiṭ, merra deg-sent s usirem ad n-afent ayen ara asent-yeččaren tiṭ deg rreḥba-ya n tnezzut i yemuggen i tikkelt tamenzut deg Lberj n Mira. «Lliɣ serseɣ kra n tedrimt swayes ɣileɣ ad d-slezmeɣ iman-iw seg ssuq-a. Lameɛna ufiɣ kennfent d axessar ssumat n tɣawsiwin». D wa i d rray n yiwet n tlemẓit mi tt-nesteqsa.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Ass n lğemɛa yezrin, tazeqqa n waddalen yemxallafen Rabah Bitat n Tubiret telli tiwwura-s i yiwet n temlilit n ddabex n udar daxel n tzeqqa yesdukklen MCBgayet akked ASGuelma.

 D tikkelt tamenzut ara d-tili s wudem unsib teqbuct n Lezzayer deg ssenf-a n wurar. Uqbel beddu n temlilit, atas n yimdebbren i ihedren i usihar-a anaddal amenzu deg-sen anemhal n waddal d yilmezyen n Tubiret, rnan-d γur-s iɛeggalen n tfidiralit n ddabex n udar, imi d nutni beddemma i yesseddan talγuγa almi i d-tewwed γer taggara-s. Tendeh temlilit s yiwet n lehrara i d-beggnen yimyurar n snat n trebbaɛ, d acu kan uqbel ad ikfu uhric amenzu, MCBgayet yessawed ad ijerred sin n yiswiyen mi akken ilmezyen n Guelma gguman ad awden γer ucebbak n Bgayet mi akken ineggura-a zgan llan deg lmendad yal mi ara d-tili zzedma sγur yixsimen-nsen. Uqbel akka ad yebdu uhric wis sin, d lwali n Tubiret, Mass Mouloud Chérifi i d-yewden γer tzeqqa n Rabah Bitat, yedda-d yid-s uselway n usqamu n twilayt. Akken kan ihi mi yebda uḥric wis sin, arraw n yemma Gouraya ceɛlen times deg unnar amezyan i wakken ad ssiwden ad rnun ukkuz n yiswiyen-nniden i wakken ad yawed leḥsab γer sdis(06) mi akken imyurar n Guelma wwḍen kan yiwet n tikkelt s acebbak n Bgayet. γas akka yeqwa lers daxel n unnar, maca fazen yimyurar s ubeggen n yiwen n leɛqel yeǧǧan timlilit tɛedda deg tegnatin igerrzen. Di lawan n taggara, d lwali n Tubiret i yettunecden i wakken ad yefk arrazen i yimyurar akked d teqbuct i MCBgayet i tt-yuklalen, imi rebḥen s wurar akked leɛqel.

  M. Smail 

  
 Tɛedda tamendawt tamaynut war lwehmat. Aya iban si tazwara. S w akka tamaziɣt tuɣal d tutlayt taɣelnawt tunṣibt meɛna ddaw ugrez n taɛrabt tutlayt tunṣibt n ddewla . Ɣef taluft yuzzel wawal: kra ( wid ur nettwali) nwan nerbeḥ dayen-nni, amennuɣ n w acḥal d aseggas( si 1949 ɣer ass-a) yewweḍ ɣer yiswi-s! Kra nniḍen ( wid yettcukkun neɣ yettwalin ugar n w ayen yellan, neɣ yeqqaren di nnesnnes , neɣ yesfan d yiman-nsen… lḥasun ur iban wamek ) nnan-d kra ur yefri imi di tilawt tamaziɣt mazal-itt d tarbibt neɣ d tawaǧǧit ( otage) n udabu akked imesɛerbuben( arabisants) yenwan as rran rreẓẓa ddaw asekkil n teɛrabt akken werǧin ad ttaf afud i wesrifeg deg igenwan n tira akked usnnulfu d -uqazem n tussniwin yettnernin seg ass ɣer wayeḍ. Akken ibɣu yektal umdan , iqass, yesseḥseb, yewzan, lmil imal ɣer tikerkas: ur yefri w-ara ɣef taluft-agi. Xuḍi amennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt i t-iɛebban seg 1949 ɣer ass-a d tamurt n leqbayel. Idles amaziɣ wid yeɛnan a t-seftin tuget seg-sen d iqbayliyen( seg Boulifa ɛeddi ɣef Mammeri, Salem Chaker, Remdane Achab, Said Chemakh…..) merra d leqbayel. Wid id yeggan ilugan n tira i tutlayt , wid id yes nulfan ungalen s tmaziɣt, tullizin, d leqbayel, wid id yeswajden amawalen akked isegzawalen i tmaziɣt d leqbayel, wid yesseqdacen tamaziɣt deg uzeṭṭa n lweb ugar d leqbayel…Ɣef aya tamsalt n tira n tmaziɣt ulamek ad tekk si tama nniḍen bexlaf tamurt n leqbayel id qqaren diɣen kra…Abrid ɣef akka nettwali yezzi yenneḍ yuɣal ɣer tḥajurt tamezwarut : amek i d tamaziɣt amek ara tili tamaziɣt…hanun zanun zdat lmedwed neɣ lkanun …aḍaṛ ur yeddi i lmendad n tlaba yelsa…ɣef kra mazal -aɣ deg tegnit n usenfiraɛ n iḍaṛṛen, deg uzebbal deg warquqen, deg usuɣu ddaw ẓẓrubat n lkermus ( ur nzerreb I lḥaṛa ur nefki tahuski i umkan) Nekni d Imaziɣen…Ɣef aya mazal kra yettcuffu-asen uqendur mi ara ad yeḍṛu umagnu( l’ordinaire). Ttwalin-t am akken d amaynut neɣ ahat d tadyant yeffɣen i tannumi! Aḥlil. Win werǧin yeẓran tafat yettwehim deg ifeṭṭiwej. Akka dɣa deg ussan-a yekker-itt wawal deg Facebook ɣef Moqrane Ait Larbi yugin ad isuqqel ɣer taɛrabt i lqaḍi ( juge de de paix) anzi n teqbaylit. Ɣer tuget n wid id yewwin ɣef tamsalt agi, ayen-nni iban-sen d tirrugza ur nesɛi tamtilt( un fait d’arme), xuḍi lemmer id ak terbiḥ a ul, ayen-nni yedda d lmeɛqul: amek akka ara d yessuter lqaḍi asterǧem n tutlayt n tmurt di tmurt-is ɣer tutlayt nniḍen ( lemmer ad nini tidet d tajentadt) yellan ula d netta-t d tutlayt yefkan iẓuran di tmurt? Meɛna tikwal tabernint mačči akken yejbed lxiḍ I taddawer… Akka id teḍṛa d tamaziɣt, deg lawan deg nettraǧu tanaṭ( decret) ara iḥettmen ɣer yal tasudut( institution) ad tebdu aseqdec n tmaziɣt ( a nwali ɣef tijellabin n sselɛa deg-s tira s tmaziɣt, ɣef tiplakin, ɣer tibitrinin n tḥuna, trini anda ma nedda tira s tmaziɣt .) Awah nekni mazal nenwa anṣib deg ixmir… armi iɣ yerra lweɛd ɣer yir askasi am lqum –nni yesɛeddan leqrun d anadi ɣef anta id yezwaren ɣef anwa id yezware ma d tamalalt neɣ d tayaziḍt… id turwemt a tilawin am akken is yenna Muhya!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 I lmend n usfugel n umulli amezwaru n usenṣeb n tmazuit i d-yellan aseggas iɛeddan deg wass n 6 deg furar, taneɣlaft n TIC tessuffeɣ-d yiwen n uɣdem s tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Asenɛet n uɣdem-agi, yella-d deg uxxam n Usqamu Unnig n timmuzɣa ddurt -ɛeddan anda teḥder tneɣlaft n TIC akked unemhal amatu n Algérie poste. Deg wawal-is, yenna Mass Assad : ‘’aya yekcem deg usnerni n tmaziɣt deg unnar i wakken ad d-nesbin asenṣeb-is s ttbut. D tawwurt-nniḍen i as-ifetḥen i tutlayt n tmaziɣt i yebdan tettreṣṣi deg tmetti seg wass ɣer wass. Aɣdem-a, d ccira n tmagit n tmurt ara yeffɣen ɣer berra i wakken ad yettwassen yidles d tutlayt’’. Ma ɣef tkadimit n tmaziɣt i yettwarǧan aṭas-aya, yenna- : ‘’ ur d-tettas ara tkadimt n tmaziɣt i wakken ad tesfeḍ Asqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, ad d-tas d akemmel i leqdic n usqamu-a. ad teṭṭef aḥric ussnan d tfukkest. HCA, ad yeqqim deg yiswi-ines. Ad yesnerni tamaziɣt am wakken ad yili d assaɣ gar tneɣlafin’’. Ma ɣef yisekkilen s wacu ara taru tmaziɣt, mazal ur tt-gzim ara di rray. Xas ulamma Asqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, yesmenyif isekkilen ilaṭiniyen imi amur ameqqran yis-sen i ttwaxedmen inadiyen, meɛna yenna-d ilaq ad nerr ddehn ɣer tilawt, ɣef wakken i d-yenna. Seg tama-s, taneɣlaft n TIC tenna-d :’’tikti tekka-d seg Algérie poste i d-yerra i tiɣri n uselway n tegduda i yebɣal ad as-yuɣal wazal i tmaziɣt, imi yellan d tarkizt n tmagit taɣelnawt’’. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> D.M 

  
 Yal amenzu n yunyu, timura n umaḍal i merra sfugulent s wass-a i lmend n lɛid n yigerdan, ahat, d tagnit anda ara d-sγimen i wawal wid yettuxessen deg uḥric n unadi d uḥareb γef tlelli d yizerfan n warrac.

 Lsas iγef iressa useḥbiber γef yigerdan d wawal-nni mechuren n wulγu n tmurt n Genève anda ara naf : « Talsa, ilaq ad d-tefk i ugrud ayen i tekseb seg wayen ifazen. » Agrud, nekni nettwali-t d amdan-nni ara yessiwḍen deg leɛmer-is sebɛa n yiseggasen, maca ulγu amwati agraγlan n 1989 ibeggen-d d akken alamma yessawed 18 n yiseggasen mazal yettunehsab d agrud. Dγa, ulγu-agi d win yefkan azal i uqcic ama deg yizerfan-is neγ deg ugemmir-is. Lixsas n ljehd d tezmert ur yeksib ara ugrud i yeğğan imḥaddiyen ad d-ssufγen isuḍaf ara t-yeğğen ad yidir di tussra. Ma nezzi tamuγli cwit ɣer deffir, ad naf d akken tikti-a d tin i d-ilulen mi yefra ṭṭrad agraγlan amenzu, d ayen wid yettḥaraben γef yizerfan n uqcic, ad d-sbedden tasqamut i d-yeswejden ulγu n Genève deg useggas n 1924. S lḥers n tejmaɛt n leğnas, yella-d akka yiwen n lqanun iwumi semman Izerfan n ugrud deg useggas n 1959. Izerfan-a d wid yerzan tudert, anegmu, učči, leqraya d tterbegga. Maca, mi ara nwali ayen ijerden d isudaf d wayen ttidiren warrac-a, ayadra yettuqader wayen iγef mwatan leğnas ? Ass-a, ulac tamdint ideg ur nettwali ara arrac d imezyanen, taqedduḥt deg ufus ssuturen tin n Rebbi. Di tuget, d win i d-yudfen seg tmura n Tefriqt n Wadda, Nijer d Mali. Ulac amkan ğğan, ur wwiḍen ara γur-s. Seg tama-nniden, d wid n Surya, yettaṭṭafen tama n yiberdan ukkud yimawlan-nsen, ama d iṭij, ama d ageffur, ttrajun ulawen ḥninen ara asen-yefken kra n tedrimt. Deg leswaq, d arrac ur nejbi ara i 12 n yiseggasen ara d-nettemlili ttbabban isendyaq n yigumma, i wakken ad d-ḥellin kra n tedrimt. Anda-ten yizerfan n ugrud deg lihala yecban ta ? Nnig n waya, aṭas n yigerdan i iruḥen d asfel n tidderwect n yimeqqranen, mmuten, ur xdimen kra iγef ara ttuḥasben. Nihal : Qemden leɛmer-is, ur tukir, ur tenγi. D lmuhal ad yettu umdan tadyant n Nihal yettwacleqfen deg At Wasif deg useggas yezrin. Ur nebγi ara ad nessendef lğerh, maca ilaq ad tt-id-nemmekti i wakken tamettant-is ur tettruḥu ara kan akka am yiγid yeddem wuccen. Akken kan i d-tusa ukkud yimawlan-is ad sgunfun deg taddart kra n wassan, imesḥaf ur as-fkin tagnit ad tudef ula s axxam i wakken ad tγab γef wallen, i wakken kra n wussan ad d-tennulfu lfekka-s. D agejdur ! Ain Bessem, tegguma ad tettu mmi-s Badro. 14 n wagguren-aya i yezrin segmi, tamdint n Ain Bessem ur tesɛi isalli γef mmi-s Badro yunagen. Ur iban yemmut neγ yedder, tasa n twacult-is tezza. Taggara-agi, layas yeγleb asirem, imi simmal zerrin wussan, layas yettaγ azar. Ma nebder-d kan sin n yigerdan-a, iban lḥal macci ala nutni i yellan, ur nezmir daγ ad nettu ayen yedran di Qsentina d temdinin-nniden. Γas ulamma iṣudaf llan, ulγu jerdent akk leğnas, maca yegguma ad yehbes ujajih. Ar melmi ara tdum akka ?

  Timsizzelt n waddal i warrac deg Yilyiten 

 Γas akka nezwar-d s wayen qessihen ahat, maca yella wanda igerdan ufan tit yezzin ɣur-sen tamuɣli. Deg taddart n Yilyiten, deg tɣiwant n Saharidj, Tiddukla tadelsant Timlilit tessewjed-d i lmend n wass agraɣlan n yigerdan yiwet n temsizzelt n waddal. AṬas n warrac i yettekkin s ufus n tallelt n yimeqranen i asen-d-yellan deg lmendad i wakken ad ten-welhen s addal uqbel ad yesberber fell-asen yir rray. Ass n umenzu n yunyu ihi, d tameɣra i ixedmen warrac n taddart, yal wa yettnadi ad d-yezg d amenzu deg tazla anda i d-ttuheggan warrazen i yinaddalen d tnaddalin.

  Tubiret : Asqamu aɣerfan n twilayt n yigerdan yexdem anejmuɛ 

 Am wakken i tella d tanumi di Tubiret, ass n umenzu n yunyu asqamu aɣerfan n twilayt yexdem anejmuɛ-is anda yettekki Mass Cherifi lwali n Tubiret d yimdebbren irkelli n twilayt. Igerdan-a, d wid i d-yefkan tuttriwin i yimdebbren n yiḤricen yemxallafen deg wayen yerzan anegmu d yisenfaren. Asmi ara nwali lebɣi d lhir i kesben yigerdan-a, nezmer ad d-nini acimi ur sɛin ara azref ad ttemlilin yal tikkelt, mačči kan deg umenzu n yunyu, i wakken ad d6fken rray-nsen ula d nutni deg wayen yerzan isenfaren d wayen iwulmen i twilayt.

  M. Smail 

  
 Yuzzel wawal, iseggasen-agi inegguṛa, ɣef tutlayt lakked yidles imaziɣen gaṛ yimusnawen nneɣ. Aṭaṣ gaṛ-asen i d-yennan daken tutlayt tamaziɣt neɣ taqbaylit « attengeṛ » geṛ sya ɣeṛ kṛa n yiseggasen. Awal-agi yenna-t-id i tikkelt nniḍen Mas.Toulaït, yella-n d yiwen n-umusnaw aqbayli i zedɣen deg Kanada (canada). Amusnaw-agi (spécialiste des politiques publiques en matière des langues officielles au Canada) yenna-d deg taddaṛt n Buzeggan, anda i yemeslay lakked d yimezdaɣ, belli « geṛ taqbaylit i mmeslayen leqbayel deg iseggasen n 1950 lakked tin n tuṛa yella lxilaf muqṛen. Deg useggas n 1950, llan 90% n yiqbayliyen i yettmeslayen taqbaylit kan. Uṭun-agi ad d-tiṣub alaṛmi d 0.1 % ɣeṛ useggas n 2030 geṛ wid aṛ ay mmeslayen taqbaylit! ». Ayen i d-yenna akka Duktuṛ Toulaït yessexlaɛ mači d kṛa. Maḥsub yebɣa ad yini belli taqbaylit ad d-tengeṛ sya ɣeṛ 2030 !? Ma naḥseb, ihi akka taqbaylit mazal-as-d kan 15 iseggasen akken ad ttṛuḥ !? Mas.Toulaït yenna-d daɣen: »Tawaɣit tusa-d seg le «bilinguisme», (snat n tutlayin, anda tella tutlayt tulli ɣef tayeḍ). Akka, tutlayt tis snat tettawi aḥeṛic muqṛen, acku tella deg uɣeṛbaz, deg lintiṛnet,…aɣbel-agi yella deg tmuṛa n tmazɣa, anda adabu yessaxdam tasseṛtit n uɛeṛṛeb n yigduden imaziɣen! ». Toulaït yenna-d daɣen: » m-uṛ nessaxdam aṛa idles lakked tutlayt nneɣ wigi ad mten-t! ». Imi akka i yella lḥal, d-acu i tasaṛutt ihi? Toulaït yenna-d: »Ilaq tamaziɣt ad d-tuɣal tutlayt tunṣibt deg tmuṛa n tmazɣa (…) ». Ayen i d-yenna akka umusnaw-agi aqbayli yedda, yiweḍ alaṛmi d-annaṛ-agi n tmetti iwumi qaṛen Facebook. Dagi, yeqwa umeslay ɣef ayen i d-yenna Toulaït. Llan kṛa n « yifaysbukiyen » fɣen-d mgal ayen i d-yenna Toulaït. Wiyaḍ, maca, nnan-d belli d tidet i d-yenna. Yiwen geṛ « ifaysbukiyen » yenna-d : »ayagi d-awezɣi, idles nneɣ uṛ i neggeṛ aṛa! ». Wiyaḍ ṛṛan-as-d: »Yezmeṛ lḥal ad yili d tidet i d-yenna Toulaït, acku tameslayt nneɣ taxleḍ degs taɛṛabt lakked tṛumit ». Mgaṛaḍ-ent tikta, maca tifṛat uṛ d-ufṛaṛ aṛa. Mas toulaït mači d-amusnaw amezwaṛu, mači d-aneggaṛu i d-ibedṛen awal-agi « n ngeṛ » (aweṛ yeḍṛu) n yidles lakked tutlayt imaziɣen, llan aṭaṣ n yimusnawen nniḍen i d-yenna-n ayagi. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y 

  
 Deg ussan-agi iεeddan i d-yeffeɣ wungal amezwaru s teqbaylit n uneggal d umedyaz aqbayli Mass Fahim Messaoudene iwumi yefka azwel “Anza” i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin ‘’Richa Elsam’’. D ungal-nniḍen i d-yernan ɣer ugerruj n temkerḍit n tsekla tamaziɣt, d win ara d-yawin abaɣur i tutlayt. Yemeslay-d deg-s ɣef yiwen usdawan, i d-yekfan leqraya-ines, yuɣal yeqqim acḥal n yiseggasen ur yexdim ara, imi yesεa ugur deg lekwaɣeḍ n tserdest “la carte militaire”. Syin yettwaɣ wul-is s tayri, yelḥaq armi yekcem deg umaḍal n tirga d usugen (…). Ilul Fahim ass n 7 seg maggu n useggas 1981 deg taddart n “Igersafen”, deg tɣiwant n At Yeğer, deg tama n “Yiεekuren”, deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Amahil-is d aselmad deg uɣerbaz n uselmed n tẓuri (lḥirfat) deg Buzeggan. D amedyaz, d amaru, amnadi deg yidles amaziɣ, d aneɣmas. Yebda tira n yisefra imezwura deg useggas n 1993, asmi yella yeqqar deg uɣerbaz alemmas (C E M). D amaru imi yura ammud n yisefra deg useggas 2013 “Tiyersi”, i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigt Richa Elsam n Tizi Uzzu. Llan deg-s 38 n yisefra s tmaziɣt, yebḍa-t ɣef kraḍ (03) n yixfawen: Ixef amezwaru, ad naf yettmeslay-d deg-s ɣef ussan-is n temẓi. Ma deg yixef wis sin d timsal akk n ddunit, d wayen yettidir deg tmetti. Ma d ixef wis tlala, iga-t i usmeɣnes ɣef tmaziɣt. Ma d ayen yeεnan isental iɣef yettaru tmedyazt-is, aṭas deg-sen d ayen yerzan yal amdan, ladɣa aqbayli: Tayemmat, Taqbaylit, Agama, Ddunit, Tayri, Tudert… D amaru daɣen imi yura yakan ammud n tneqqisin d tullisin timecṭaḥ deg useggas n 2014, i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin “Sefra Ber” n tmurt n Fransa. Llant deg-s mraw (10) n tullisin d mraw (10) n tneqqisin-nniḍen. Kra seg-sent d asnulfu i tent-id-yesnulfa, ma kra-nniḍen, d-agmer ɣer yimɣaren. D amnadi, diɣ, imi yettnadi ɣef yismawen inasliyen n tmurt n Leqbayel, ladɣa deg tama n At Yeğǧer, ismawen n yiɣersiwen, n yimɣan, n leḍyur, d isefra iqburen n temɣarin. D aneɣmas daɣen imi yura yakan imagraden s teqbaylit deg yiɣmisen. Yetthegi yiwen n udlis d awfus n wuraren s tmaziɣt i warrac n uɣerbaz, ad yeffɣen sya d afella. D yiwet n tullist “Tifukal’’. Taɣuri igerrzen i yimeɣriyen! 

<p style="text-align: right;"> A. A. 

<div> 
  
 Ddurt-agi, awal deg wexxam-nneɣ ḥala ɣef sonatrach. Ula d yizegzawen-nni yetturaren yettazalen deffir n ciret uḍar ttun-ten.  

 Di tazwara, sonatrach-agi ɣileɣ-tt d albaɛḍ n yibibiḍen neɣ n tbibiḍin  inecfen dayen kan. Ala, sonatrach, ɣas tencef, mačči d abibiḍ am nek neɣ am Nuja-nni mlaleɣ, ddurt iɛeddan, di polyclinique  neɣ daɣen am Lina (tagi d yiwet n bannagt qrib ad tt-mlileɣ: sneɣ-tt di tirga). Sonatrach am akken ara d-iniḍ tafunast i seg ɛacen    iɛeggalen n twacult. D acu, sonatrach ur tetteẓeg ara  ayefk : tetteẓeg pétrole, teznuzuy-it qrib 80 idularen i tbettit, azal n 7OOO idinaren s yidrimen-agi-nneɣ. S idularen-agi, Bouteflika(d netta i d ameksa en chef n tfunast i yetteẓgen pétrole), yettaɣ-aɣ-d učči, ddwa, ṭṭumubilat, timellalin,  tournevis… et bien sûr  ayefki i tbibiḍin d yibibiḍen i d iyi-cban .  Akken i fehmeɣ, tafunast-agi i yetteẓigen pétrole nettalas akk deg-s, y compris nukni s yibibiḍen . Safik, ula d nek teṭḍeɣ si tfunast n pétrole!  Selon toujours baba, Chakib Khelil, win i wumi yefka Bouteflika tafunast ad teks, i sum akk timaẓẓagin-is. Baba yettmeslay-d ɣef sonatrtach, yal tikkelt  ara yi-fak uyefki d-yettaɣ ɣer ufarmasyan, neɣ daɣen mara as-tini yemma: “aɣ-d aya d waya !”. Aḥeq tibibiḍin i sneɣ d tid i mazal walaɣ a les adultes-agi qqersen kumplikin mačči  kra !! Sbeḥ meddi d imeṭṭi, alors qu’il suffit  ad bedlen  ameksa neɣ ad ksen sonatrach s nnuba.

<p style="text-align: right;"> S.O.A 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yeffeɣ-d 

  
 Yenna umedyaz ɣef azal n tmurt : «tamurt d leqrar / aḥlil n win ur tt-nesɛi/ seqsit aɛeṭṭar/ netta awen id yini/ yeṛwa anemḍar/ ur yehbis tikli/ mi id testeqsa tewser / wissen anda yeɣli». Tidet acu-t umdan mebla taferka ? Acu-t ugdud mebla tamazirt ?Xuḍi imawlan ǧǧen-aɣ-id tamurt …tin ɣef yenna Ḥasen Abassi : «tecbeḥ tmurt-iw tzad/ ḥamlen-tt lɛibad merra/ deg-s yal lxiṛ izad/ sser nnif d lḥeṛma/ Muḥal mmi-s ad yaggad/ ma izuxx yis di tmura», tin ɣef yenna Cherif Kheddam : «Ṛṛɛud d waḍu ttṣṣuḍḍun / ur rzin tiɣaltin-is.»

 Maca taggara-agi tamurt-agi ɣef ccnan ayen din n imedyazen, ayen din n icanayen tuɣal d rayyaɛ…kra yellan deg-s d sser yettmettat war ma yeclig deg-s ḥedd. Deg akken liḥala n tmurt terki s ssebba n ustehzi n imawlan-is yenna Lounis Ait Menguellet: «la tettmettat nettwali/ amzun akken mačči nneɣ» . Mebla ccekk ur yeɣliḍ ara deg awal-is netta id yennan akken , imi ayen iḍeṛṛun n lefsad di twennaṭ( environnement) ifal akkin i lmeɛqul. Anda nsukk tiṭ ala tiqerɛiwin n zlaj, tisleḍyin n laluminyum, tiqraɛtin n plastik, icabcaqen n wuzzal, ṛṛwadi n cawičču, ticakarin n plastik i-iɛmaren timizar akked d teqwirin. Ddu anda ik yehwa ala tecmet nsen id reǧǧmen allen. Win kan id yusan yerra rreḥba d abudu, iɛamer-itt s wafrasen. Xuḍi melmi kan tudrin n tmurt n leqbayel llan-t d amedya n tezdeg . Imawlan-nneɣ ( xas akken tuget deg-sen ur ɣrin-ara) sṛuɣun rrbu-nsen , werǧin ad deqren iḍuman ɣer wayla n taddart, imi ttejmaɛen-t alamma yerka yettuɣal d leɣbar imir zuzuren i wakal akken ad yefk lɣella . Imawlan-nneɣ ur rrin ara ttkal ɣef tɣiwant, ggan lemqud I tezdeg s ddemma n leqwanen n teqbaylit imi win yesamsen ( imiren) ad ttuxeṭṭi. S wayen –nni i menɛen imezwura-nneɣ taddart seg yir tikli akked twafɣa i ubrid.

 Ass-a kulci yenqedwa. Taddart tuɣal d tasraft deg tt-nejmaɛen ilefḍan ( wid n tidet akked d wid n lqella n lefhama deg id negra ) . Di ccaw yeɣli sser-nni ɣef tudrin, tenfa lḥeṛma-nni, yeɣli leqder-nni, teqcem ccbaḥa-nni ɣef sefran yimedyazen zik-nni. 

 Tikwal mi ara nneɣ iberdan n tmurt , yetterɛiɛic lxaṭer deg ayen nettmaggar. Ulac abrid iselken deg udeqar n iḍuman-agi war aḥazeb ɣef liḥala n ugam d wayen it-yettaɣen s ssebba n usɛuffen deg ijuɣdan-is, war aḥazeb ɣef tadamsa-nneɣ akked tin I yimɣan d iɣersiwen. Deg akken liḥala tḍal ɣer lmuḥal luɣent tiliwa d tiregwa , xnusent timedwa, uɣalen waman cban amillus. Xuḍi ɣef akken iɣ-d yenna Belkacem n Mhand u SLiman, yellan zik d aqeṛṛu n usqamu n taddart n Iɣerbiyen deg At Jennad : «Asmi rebḥen wussan , nella n ttess aman di tregwa war ma yuɣ-aɣ kra , nella n tett imɣan id nettekkes deg lexlawi war tugdi. Tezdeg am akken tella deg daxel n uxxam i tella ula deg azniq. Yal wa yeẓra d akken lmecmel d ayla n medden irkeli , isekf ad yizdig akken yal wa ad yaf iman-is deg taddart-is. Ur tettu ara yella deg awal neqqar-it asmi mazal nesɛa lɛez deg iman-nneɣ: “ taddart am Ṛebbi”! Ɣef ayen-nni nettaf di taddart lehna, abeḥri ḥlawen, aman zeddigen, kra yellan yewwi-d imɣi-s di lhu yellan deg ulawen n medden armi yenfal lhu-nni ɣer lhu yesburen i tudrin s timmad-nsen-t. Xuḍi zik teqqa n imezdeɣ n tmurt ur ɣrin ara.. meɛna sɛan tamussni, lekyasa akked ttrebga… anwa akka i-izemren zik ad yessew ccrab ɣer tama n taddart ? Dayen ur iqabel ara leɛqel. Ass-a ayen yelhan deg-nneɣ iṛuḥ am uclim yeddem-it waḍu, nejmɛed ɣef ikufan a smuhbel ur nemɛin… akked d rawadi n kawičču nnig tizeɣwa ad qerɛen-t tiṭ .. ɣef tecmet iɣ-izedɣen!»

 «Mebla ccekk aṭan yesɛa ssebba… ssebba ilaq as imussnawen ara tt-id yesfrun: ayen akka terki liḥala deg tudrin n tmurt n leqbayel armi nuɣal nettsetḥi ad nesken I yibarniyen yebɣan ad yerzun fell-as ula d tugniwin ines , acku akken ibɣu tecleqfeḍ yiwet ad yeddu yid-s amur n wafrasen yembarsaxen akkin akka teɣzi n ugama?»Iɣ-id yenna s Ljiha-s O. Djafar yellan d yiwen umeɣnas yeseḥbibiren ɣef ugama deg tamnaḍt -agi n At jennad!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen:  Amek iga uselmed n tmaziɣt ass-a deg kra n wawalen?

   Djamel Ikhloufi:  Yella deg uɣerbaz azzayri. Wa d iswi amenzu. Amek i yella ass-a ? Aselmed n tmaziɣt yella-d s yiselmaden-iqbayliyen i yinelmaden-iqbayliyen deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Tamaziɣt a-tt-an deg yinaw unsib n ddula. Ulac aselmed n tutlyat ur d-nezzuɣur idles-ines, tasekla-ines, ansayen-ines, leɛwayed-ines, atg. Nekni, da, deg tmurt-nneɣ, nesselmad tutlayt ḥafi. Ad nesselmed tamaziɣt ḥafi, ad d-nessufeɣ arrac ara iḥercen deg tmaziɣt, ara yettun aẓar-nsen, ara yemḥun idles-nsen. Ma nkemmel, s wallalen i d-sbedden i uselmed n tmaziɣt, ad nɛerreb arrac-nneɣ s tmaziɣt. Yeshel ad tuɣaleḍ d izimer ad tḍefreḍ wiyaḍ, yuɛer ad tiliḍ d kečč. Yerna anect-a akk, yekka-d sɣur-nneɣ, seg wayla-nneɣ, seg wid yeqqaren d nekni kan i yellan i uselmed, seg wid i d-yessewjaden zeɛma allalen i uselmed. Yewweḍ-d lawan ad ǧǧen wid i d-yeffɣen s ugerdas n tmaziɣt seg tesdawit ad lethin deg tedyanin am ti. Timeɣnest telha, meɛna axemmem-is yeqqen ɣer wul. Yewwi-d, ad ilin wid ara yessezwiren tussna i uselmed n tmaziɣt. Lɛib, mačči imi d-gan idlisen-a d wahilen, lɛib ma yella faqen, mazal ttkemmilen akken. Anda-nniḍen, yella meɛna am uɣerbal acerbal, la ired la ustayen. Deg lwilaya, ad tafeḍ azal n 100 n yinelmaden i yeqqaren tamaziɣt. Aɣlif n Usegmi, rnu ɣur-s Asqamu Unnig, la ak-qqaren 32 n lwilayat i yeqqaren tamaziɣt. Iselmaden, azgen ameqqran seg-sen, d Leqbayel, ttidiren yiwet n liḥala, dayen ur yettamen yiwen. Wa, ḥettmen fell-as ad yesɣer tafransist ; wayeḍ, yesɣaray ɣef berra i sswayeɛ n uselmed ; wihin, la t-ttmuqqulen d aselmad ara d-yawin lebla, atg. Ma d ayen i sɣarayen, d lewhayem ! Yiwen ur yettmuqqul ɣur-s. Wissen imaswaḍen ayɣer i susmen, ur ten-id-yuli wawal ɣef wanect-a ? Selmaden s yidlisen n da i yinelmaden n dihin. Annaɣ mačči d imazɣawawalen !

  Ulama aṭas n yiḍrisen n yimura d yinaẓuren ur nelli deg wahil, ur turǧam kunwi aya akken ad ten-tgem d timsirin i yinelmaden. Awal ɣef waya…  

 Taɣessa n uḍris mačči d aselmed n tutlayt. Taɣessa d allal i uselmed n tutlayt. Aselmed n tutlayt yeẓẓuɣur idles, leɛwayed, tigemmi, tissas, leḥmala, tayri, tamussni. Aselmed n tutlayt werjin ibedd ɣef tɣessa. Aselmed, amaqwa-k, win ibedden ɣef tzemmar, ur d-yelli i ulemmud n tɣessa. Aselmed n tutlayt d gemmu s yidles n uqcic ara ireṣṣin tikta n lehna, ccbaḥa d leḥmala. Aselmed s tzemmar ibedd s tudert n yal ass n uqcic, s yiḥulfan-is, s wuguren-is, s tikta-s. Ma nerra ccbaḥa d tayri d iwaɣezniwen i warrac nesselmad, ad nezzer deg lakul-nni i ira Xerrubi d Brahimi. Wid-a ttewten s uzduz-nni i d-yekkan seg lmecreq. Wid-a fernen abrid n tebrek i warrac-nneɣ. Neẓra-ten asmi i as-kkren i Matoub, i Said Mekbel, i Tahar Djaout, i Chab Hasni, i Alloula, i wiyaḍ. Aselmed n tmaziɣt ad d-yili s uselmed n tutlayt, n tɣessa n yiḍrisen, n wanaw, n tjerrumt, n tirawalt, i usnerni n uqcic deg ccbaḥa, deg talwit, deg tayri. Iselmaden, aṭas seg-sen, ur rujan ad tbeddel tmuɣli n At Ufella. Kkren-as i twaɣit yezgan teqqaz. S wakka kan ara neffel i udrar, ara neffel i tallast yentan deg lakul azzayri. Ungalen d yidlisen ggten tura. Nekker iman-nneɣ akken ad as-nekker i uɣbel n yiḍrisen d wahilen. Ayɣer ? Ilaq ad iwali walbeɛḍ ayen yellan d iḍrisen deg yidlisen n uɣerbaz. Ziɣen, deg tmaziɣt, ala sin i yettarun. Azal n 70 n yiḍrisen unsiben s nesselmad deg lakul. 46 seg-sen uran-ten sin : yiwen ur nelli d amaru gar-asen. Amek akka ? Ɛni, ulac wiyaḍ ! Ɛni, ur ssinen ara ungalen n Amar Mezdad, Mohand Ait Ighil, Rachid Alliche, Kaysa Khalifi, Lynda Koudache, Said Sadi, d wiyaḍ. I tmucuha, ɛni xussent ɣer Leqbayel, ɣer Yimaziɣen? Imeskaren n yidlisen, rran-d, suqqlen-d timucuha n wiyaḍ ɣer teqbaylit. A tawaɣit !

  Ahat ad aɣ-tawiḍ ɣer ccfawat n uɣmis l’Hebdo n Tmurt. Amek i d-yettili usufeɣ-ines deg tallit-nni?  

 Aɣmis Hebdo-n-Tmurt, kkren-as snat n trebbaɛ : imeɣnasen n tmaziɣt akked yineɣmasen-imeɣnasen n tugdut. Gar-asen, lliɣ nekk. D tikelt tamezwarut i greɣ ɣer tɣamsa. Yerna fernen-iyi ad iliɣ ɣef uqerruy n yisebtar n tmaziɣt. Ẓriɣ d ayen yuɛren. Deg lawan-nni, kra n uɣmis s tmaziɣt yellan, ilul-d akken ad yemmet. Ugadeɣ ad falṭiɣ !Ur bdiɣ almi i d-ḥuddeɣ timsal n tɣamsa. Nudaɣ, wwteɣ zelmeḍ-yeffus, zeggreɣ imir seg tsekla ɣer yisallen. Taɣamsa tebna ɣef yisallen mačči ɣef tmucuha, ansayen, isefra, tasekla. Γas ad ilin, d ayen yerzan isali i d-yewwi ad yefk yiwen azal. Hebdo-n-Tmurt yebḍa ɣef sin n yimuren : amur i tmaziɣt s 8 n yisebtar ; amur i tefransist s 16 n yisebtar.Tidett ad tt-id-nini, nekk akked yimeddukkal, newwi-d tamuɣli tamaynut i tɣamsa s tmaziɣt. Nessezwar izen ɣef tsekla, nezger seg yisefra d wansayen ɣer win n usiweḍ n yizen s tmaziɣt i yimeɣriyen, nger tamaziɣt deg usebter amezwaru n uɣmis. D aya i yeǧǧan aɣmis Hebdo-n-Tmurt ad yesɛu isallen ɣef tmurt, isallen sya d sya, urar, tigejdit, isallen n tɣiwanin, atg.

  Imi teqqneḍ ɣer umezruy n tɣamsa tamaziɣt, amek tettwaliḍ azekka-s?  

 Azekka-s s warraw-is i warraw-is. Tidi tettawi-d udi. Yewwi-d ad as-nekker, ur nfeccel. Seg wulac, yella-d wayen yellan. Yelha neɣ dir-it, yettseggim ! Yettwenniɛ ! Imi yuɣ aẓar, anagar aǧǧuǧeg ara yeǧǧuǧeg. Ass-a, llan yiɣmisen i yesɛan isebtar s tmaziɣt, yella usebter n lanternet APS s tmaziɣt, llan yisebtar s tmaziɣt ama deg facebook ama d wiyaḍ. Tamaziɣt tezger ɣer tiliẓri. Azekka, d arrac yeqqaren tamaziɣt ara yessutren iɣmisen s tmaziɣt. Yewwi-d kan ad nḥader ur as-neqqar tedder tɣamsa s tmaziɣt dayen ad nekker ad nesbender. Mazal, ur newwiḍ s anda sawḍen lejnas. Ilaq ad tezger s warraw-is ɣer tin ara yuḥwaj yimeɣri. Imeɣriyen ma tjebbed-iten tmaziɣt, ad tidir ; ma tesserwal-iten, ad temmet. S warraw-is ara tedder, i warraw-is ara tedder.

  Tanemmirt. Awal-ik n taggara…  

 Amecwar nelḥa-t, ad t-nelḥu jmiɛ. Abrid i nuɣ, abrid ara naɣ d win ara yekksen tallast ɣef wallen, d win ara yerren azal i wayen d-yeǧǧa Massensen, Kahina, Mulud At Mɛemmer, Saɛid Meqbel d wiyaḍ. Amecwar ad yeffel i tizi ma neẓẓa leḥmala, tayri, tilelli d usirem deg yirgazen d tlawin n uzekka. Amecwar i d-newwi ur d-yekki seg wulac, ur d-yeffil seg uɣamac. Yella-d s usfel, s yidammen n waṭas n wid yefkan tudert-nsen akken ad nesselmed nekni, ass-a, tamaziɣt. Tamaziɣt d tayri, d talwit, d tissas, syin ad d-tettbeɛ tutlayt. Amennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt mačči d amennuɣ ɣef tutlayt. Tamaziɣt d tamuɣli i uressi n Tferka n Ugafa, i usnerni n Tmazɣa, i tuffɣa seg leqyud icudden ɣer lmecreq. Ur nelli d “lmeɣrib el ɛarabi”. Nekni d Imaziɣen n Tferka n Ugafa. Yenna-as yakk Massensen : “Tafriqt i Yifriqen”. Ilaq ad neḥsu amennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt am tmes deg walim, ad tekker, ḥedd ur yeɛlim.

  Yesteqsa-t Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Γas akka ttruḥun yimdanen, zerrin wussan d yiseggasen, maca win akken ijerden tudert-is s tikta, s lxedma d umennuɣ d awezɣi ad t-ttun medden.

 D wigi dɣa iɣef i d-yenna Ccix Muḥen : «Yella lbaƐd yella, ulac-it, yella wayeḍ ulac-it, yella.» Mustapha Bacha, imi d wagi ara d-nemmekti ass-a n 08 di ɣuct, yettuneḥsab seg wid yellan ɣas ma ulac-it. Mmi-s n Tasaft Ugemmun, tin akken i d-yurwen izumal, yuɣ abrid n umennuɣ seg temẓi-s. Ama mi yella deg tesnawit neɣ deg tesdawit, yezga d amenzu s aseḥbiber ɣef yiseɣ d yidles-s yuɣalen di rrif lawan-nni. Ulamma qessiḥet teswiƐt, aseqqi yeḥma, maca win I zedɣent tissas d lmuḥal ad yebru I wawal neɣ ad yekbel tidet. Tiddi-s tuğew-as-d urrif d uɣilif imi yezga deg tlufa mgal sin n yixsimen: adabu d at tmira. Amennuɣ-is yessaweḍ-it ɣer leḥbus, maca ur yefcil ara mi akken yella seg yimenza I d-isbedden akabar aserti deg furar 1989. Yedda, yuzzel, iƐawez iwakken ad yeldi allen I waṭas n yilmeẓyen ladɣa di tesdawit iwakken ad d-iḥelli azal-is I yidles-is d tutlayt-is tamaziɣt. Mi akken yendeh rrebrab seg tama, amennuɣ ɣef usekcem n tmaziɣt s aɣerbaz azzayri, ul n Mustapha agrawliw yegguma ad yejmeƐ annect-nni n yiɣeblan anda mmezlen ula d yigerdan. D tin I dssebba n rwaḥ ! Yeɣli s ibeddi, uqbel ad yaweḍ lebɣi-s. 

 Ass-a s kra n win I t-yessnen, ẓran d acu I d azal-is deg unnar, ur yelli d win yeqqaren:”xedmet akka.” Yezga yeqqar:”ad nexdem akka” imi dima d netta I izeggiren. Cfawat I d-yeqqimen ass-a ɣet waṭas n win I t-yesnen d awal-nni iwumi I d-yettales:”Γret, ma tebɣam ad nesseɣs ayen akka I aɣ-yettwakksen.” ṭṭes di talwit ! 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail. M 

  
 Zik, amur ameqqran n yimdanen, snen kan d acu i d imensi n yennayer imi i t-ttmagaren s seksu d uyaziḍ deg yixxamen-nsen. Ass-a, nekni s yinelmaden, nessen d acu i d yennayer, neẓra d acu-t imi i t-nelmed d tamsirt deg uγerbaz : neẓra d akken d ixf n useggas γer Yimaziγen ; mačči kan deg Lezzayer maca deg tefriqt n ugafa. Neẓra d yiwen wansay γef wacu sseḥbibiren Leqbayel. Asfugel n yennayer yettili-d ass n 12 janvier n yal aseggas di yal tamnaṭ n tmurt n Lezzayer : seg usamar γer umalu, seg unẓul γer ugafa. Tgen deg-s seksu n bu 7 n yisufar, neγ 7 n tgelliwin, ttṣeṭṭilin i warrac imecṭaḥ, zellun ayaziḍ d asfel acku At zik qqaren :’’anda uzlen yidammen, ur yettili lhemm.’’

 Nelmed d akken yennayer ğğan-aγ-t-id yimezwura-nneγ deg tmetti aṭas n leqrun-ya. Imensi n yennayer d ansay iẓeṭṭen assaγen gar yimdanen imi d tagnit anda i ttemlilin iεeggalen n yal tawacult. 

 Ass-a, yennayer yekcem deg tfada (calendrier) i d-yesnulfa Ugraw n Yimaziγen i yellan di Fransa deg yiseggasen-nni n 1970. 

 Ihi, yennayer ameggas 2965, yal aseggas ad ken-d-yettaf di talwit.

 Agraw n yinelmaden : Abdellah, Nihed, Faïza, Fatima d Massi.

  
 Belqasem Saddur d aḥeddad ilulen deg useggas 1948 di taddar n Tabunt i yettabaεen taɣiwant Ukeffadu. D igellil , d amɣid , bab-as yemmut yeğğa-t-id akken d aqrur ur yesεi amraw , yemma-s tuɣal s axxam-nsen. Dda Belqasem yufa-d jeddi-s d amzil d win ixeddmen aderreq di tama n Mezgug ,din i yelmmed tinḍi-a ,yesεedda ɣur-s tanant asmi yenfel deg uwtay 14 n yiseggasen , yettεawan-it deg umahil aya deg tmunent n tgaluft tazzayrit 1962.

 Ddeqs kan yemmut jeddi-s , lḥif , laẓ , asemmiḍ ur t-yezgil , acu kan ɣur-s tamesɣara yelmmed ɣer uselmad-is , qqaren s umegda «lğehd n uberreq, yettuɣal d amzil» yexdem ɣer Ḥammu aḥeddad deg At Weɣlis kra kan n yiseggasen , iḥulfa iman-is yezmer ad yennefti deg usaḍur-a , yelli tazeqqa n uberreq deg Ukeffadu di taddar At Sεada amḍiq At Ԑemran deg useggas 1979, imiren ur caḍen ara imzilen deg lεerc At Mensur yella Smaεil aḥeddad di Lqalεa n Yikeğğan d ṭaher di Tifra akk Sidi Mḥend amzil d win yesselqamen uzzal-is bɣir afḍis di temεemmert n Silan. Yuɣal d amagnu , d axeddam yettekes-d aɣrum-is, di lweqt-nni ugten yifellaḥen , ttawin-as-d tiɣawsiwin icudden ɣer tfellaḥt amedya tagersa , agelzim, aqabac… d tisemmrin n uɣyul akk d wallalen n lebni ,netta it-seggim-iten.Amahil d agensas tafḍist ur trekked seg tuddza ɣef zzebra, akken yettawi asefru umzil n lqalus :

 <em> Xedmeɣ i medden lxir </em>

 <em> Nekk d aḥeddad si lqalus </em>

 <em> Ul-iw i ttagwem ineqqel </em>

 <em> Aṭan di lhem ur ixuṣ </em>

 <em> *At Mraw akud At Ԑaṛus </em>

 <em> Aqli-n neğğreɣ azedduz </em>

 <em> Ayat Rebbi get-as afus. </em>

 Dda Belqsem yessexdam allalen uberreq , lkir d win i yettaken azwu akken ad yecεel ufarnu deg uɣrud , uɣrud d lfur uḥeddad din i yecεlay times s cerbun ,zik s uzeqqur n yimesleḥ , yesseḥmay uzzal deg-s akken yeqqar dda Belqasen «uzzal ijebbed deg uzɣal» mi ara yesseḥmu uzzal-nni yettekkes-it-d s tɣemdin d timyaṭṭafin ayen yeḥman ,syin ad ires ɣef zzebra , tafḍist ad t-seggem uzzal-nni ixesren ,yessemsad-it yettara-t-id d amaynut , yessmukun-d daɣen tiɣawsiwin s ɣur-s.

 Yemmed amahil-a armi d aseggas 2008 syin teddrem tεecciwt-is anda i yebna timeḍḍirt-is , yeḥbes kra n wagguren , yuɣal ibeddel tadala deg Ferḥun ar ass-a din i ixeddem, aɣyul-is yeqqen-it ɣer tefga n thatimt netta yettsemmir s daxel , yewwi-d tasteɣt si zzman , yexdem ugar n 45 yiseggasen , d acu kan mazal yettemmid ar ass-a tanga-a , d leḥmala-s , d azerruy i as-d-yeğğa jeddi-s.

 Belqasem aḥeddad d tawrikt ikesben tasnagt, daymen d amaha ɣer tinḍi-s , tanezzayat uqbel ad d-tali tafukt d ayen iḥerkel iman-is ɣer usemmeṛ , tamseɣara-ines d tazzagert , acku ɣur-s tirrut , ɣur-s 8 dderya akken qqaren at zzman “yessers uḥeddad afḍis, irfed-it mmi-s” , d acu kan ur yelli waya , tarwa-s ugin ad ṭṭfen adeg n bab-t-nsen , asaḍur-a d tamussni , d tamaḍirt d tarrayt, d taneftit ,d asisen …..

 “ Tasemmunt n uḥeddad , d tafḍist n wuzzal”<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Azedine Abdous 

  
 Ɣef wakken i teddun lecɣal yerzan aḥareb n tjara mebla ttriḥ, yettban-d dakken mačči d aṭṭan ara inegren s shala. Aya nettwali-t yal ass, di yal amkan u di yal tamnaḍt. Deg temdint n Tubiret, tella-d yakan deg wagguren yezrin yiwet n lḥemla n uqḍaɛ n lbiɛ mebla ttriḥ s usexdem n yiɣil n ddula. D iǧadermiyen s timmad-nsen I yeffɣen s abrid aɣelnaw wis 5 iwakken ad sbeɛden imsenza irehnen azgen seg ubrid. Mačči s shil I d-yella waya, imi yeḍra-d yiwen n cwal d ameqran, and aula d arrac imeẓyanen gren-d iman-nsen iwakken ad d-wwten s yiẓra iɣallen n laman. Seg wassen, yexla umkan, yuzdag ubrid, iban-d ziɣ yewseɛ. Meɛna, akken I qqaren: win I iɛerḍen tacriḥt n tsekkurt ur iqenneɛ ara, bdan widak-nni iwulfen rrbeḥ s lemɣawla ttuɣalen-d ɣef yixf n tefdent. Yal ass, ad yili yiwen, ad d-isers cwiṭ kan seg sselɛa-ines, yettqaraɛ aniwa ara d-iḥebsen. Tura akken d wid yesnuzun ddellaɛ d ufeqqus I d-irezzun s amkan-a, d acu kan melmi walan takerrust n yiǧadarmiyen, ad refden iman-nsen, ad rewlen. Ɣer melmi ? Ɣef leḥsab n waṭas n leryuy I d-yufraren deg yinejmuɛen, astixxer kan akka ur yezmir ad yefru taluft. Ayen iwulmen ass-a n wussan d asewjed n yimukan I win yebɣan ad yexdem, s yin, d asexdem n lqanun ɣef win akk ara ixalfen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> S. M  

  
 Akka ihi, Remḍan-nni « yeǧǧa-y-aɣ » ! D-acu kan, llan-t aṭaṣ n t’ɣawsiwin iwumi ad necfu, yagi Remḍan n-useggas-a. Deg tama n Ṣummam, nezṛa, ṭul n waguṛ-agi n Remḍan, d-akkeni laɣla n yisenfaṛen n wuččiuṛ d-teḍṛi aṛa am iseggasen-nni yezṛin! Nwala, seg wass-nni amezwaṛu n Remḍan ssumat n yisenfaṛen n wučči, yagi izegza lakked igumma (Les légumes et les fruits), uṛ ulin-t aṛa am iseggasen iɛeddan. Ayagi, yeǧǧa tiwaculin n tama n Ṣummam sɛeddan-t aguṛ-agi deg lahna lakked d talwit. Ɣas akken, ussan-nni imezwuṛa imdanen, neɣ ibabaten n twaculin, ugaden laɣla, ttṛaju-n kan melmi ad « yeṭṭeṛḍaq » fellasen waɛbaṛ n summat n yisenfaṛen n tuččit. D-acu, ayagi uṛ d yeḍṛi aṛa. Uf ! Adellaɛ uṛ « yesselqef » aṛa tikelt-agi, d-awezɣi, imi it neẓṛa yeččuṛ alaṛmi yettwezziɛ. Ɣas akken ussan inegguṛa n Remḍan tella-d akkeni ciṭuḥ n laɣla ɣeṛ yizegza lakked d yigumma, maca, mači dayen yesxelɛen medden. Yella daɣen wudem nniḍen si yettwassen Remḍan; dayen yaɛnan tagmatt geṛ yemdanen. Aḍellaɛ n Remḍan yella deg yal taɣiwant n tama n Ṣummam. Aḍellaɛ-agi icud akk ulawen, yeẓḍa tagmatt geṛ yemdanen. Ulac igellil uṛ nečči aṛa deg waguṛ-agi. Acku, si yal tama, llan widak d ttidak yefkan ccan i t’wizi s yiḍellaɛen n Remḍan lakked d-usečču n Rṛeḥma. D-acu kan, aṭaṣ n tuddaṛ deg tama n Ṣummam ixuṣṣ-iten-t cwiya n zhu deg yiḍ. Ṣahṛat n Remḍan txuṣ-iten-t lbenna, acku medden ulac anda ad sɛeddin akud nsen. Ma yella anessiwezil awal, adenini kan, Remḍan n-useggas-a iɛedda akken ilaq lḥal s-umata. Ɣas akken yella-d lixṣaṣ ɣef ayen icudden ɣeṛ waman. Wigi xuṣen deg waṭaṣ n tamiwin, amakka yal anebdu yettili weɣbel-agi muqṛen, yagi deg 5 t’ɣiwanin i d-yezgan ɣef wenẓul n Bgayet (Buǧlil, Tazmalt, iɣil Ɛli, At Rẓin d At Mellikec) anda uṛ ɛad uṛ wiḍen waman n ubaṛaǧ n Tici Ḥaf.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Ukkuz n yiseggasen aya i d aɣ-yeğğa unaẓur ameqqran dda Crif Xeddam d acennay aqbayli yeddren akken ad yesnerni idles d tutlayt n tmaziɣt , dda Crif xeddam ilul deg useggas n 1927 deg taddart n Bumesξud deg tɣiwant n yimesuḥal n yiferḥunen, seg wasmi ila tẓa (9) n yiseggasen yebda almad deg zawiya n Buğellil n Tezmalt , yerna cwiṭ deg useggas 1942 iruḥ ɣer Lzzayer akken ad yexdem deg Wad Semmar almi wwḍen semmus n yiseggasen iruḥ ɣer tmurt n Fransa ( Saint Denis) yuɣal ɣer Epinay ,deg tazwara yexdem deg luzin n usefsi n wuzzal (fonderie) yuɣal sakin ɣer taṛmist n teklut ( entrerise de peinture), yerra lwelha-s ɣer ccna iḥemmel aẓawan , dayen it-yeğğan ad ixeddem ad ilemmed timeddiyin mi yekfa axeddim ad yexdem timsirin n uẓawan .Deg tazwara kan n umecwar-is yesekles tizlit tamezwarut : «A yelli-s n tmurt», deg useggas n 1956 ;yusa-d ɣer Lzzayer akken ad yeqdec deg nuba –nni yettwasnen zik , aξzizet ɣer leqbayel nuba n yicennayen n uzekka deg useggas n 1963 .Yuɣli-d fell-as waṭṭan yuɣal ɣer tmurt n Fransa akken ad idawi , ad yesejji tazmert-is maca aṭṭan yettnerni almi t-yessaweḍ ɣer lmut deg 23 yennayer 2012 deg sbiṭar n Fransa , yenṭel deg taddart –is Bumesξud ass n 27 yennayer 2012 . Dda Crif Xeddam yecna tizlatin icudden ɣer tfulki n tmurt , yecna ɣef Lzzayer , ɣef tmeṭṭut, yecna ɣef tmetti laqbaylit , tizlatin-is rebbant-d yal tasuta , tzemreḍ ad asen t-sleḍ iman-ik neɣ sdat twacult-ik imi ulac deg-sent ayen ixesren , d tizlatin n ttrebga cebḥent ḥlawit, d timelḥanin , anaẓur -nneɣ ameqqran yesselmed aṭas n yifennanen ger-asen : Ayt Mengellat, Newara, Karima, yidir d waṭas niḍen d-yugmen seg wayen d-yeğğa , mi ara tili kra n tmeɣra deg uɣerbaz s tezlit n dda Crif Xeddam nettruẓu asalu , teccebiḥ tagnit , ger-asent tid yettwasnen aṭas : s yisem-im a ğerğira (1958),Nadiya (1958), Bgayet telha d arruḥ n leqbayel (1960) , ṣbaḥ lxir (1960),a lemri (1963), sliɣ i yemma tenna (1978), tilawin (1980), ad qiment ur ttmettatent ara , ɣas yeğğa-aɣ , yeğğa-aɣ-d, ad t-yerḥem Rebbi unaẓur-nneɣ ameqqran dda Crif Xeddam.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 Eternel Mammeri d wagi i d azwel id-as yextar umyaru ameqqran Amin Zawi i udlis anda i d-yejmaɛ 30 n tmuɣliwin n yimyura akked isdawanen. Mmeslayen-d ɣef wayen yexdem Mulud Mɛemmri d wayen i d-yewwi i tmaziɣt s umata. Adlis-agi, yettwaru s tutlayt n trumit, yegffeɣ-d ass n 18-04-2017 ɣer tezrigin “Tafat “, i lmen-d imi ɛeddan meyya n yiseggasen n tlallit n umussnaw (1917-2017). Nnejmaɛen-d 30 n wallaɣen, zḍan-d akk ayen yexdem umussnaw akken ad suffɣen di taggara adlis-agi. Gar widak yuran ad nebdar: Yucef Merraḥi, Brahim Tazaɣart, Layla Ḥamuten, Ɛmer Mezdad, Muḥemmed Lexḍar, Yassin Temlali, Amin Zawi, Ḥasen Ḥelwan, Rabya Jelti d wiyaḍ. Azal n udlis: 500 DA .

  S. Yamani 

  
  Amaru 

 Racid Buxerrub yettaru s tmaziɣt. Isuffeɣ-d yakan yiwen n udlis, isemma-as “ Tislit n uɣanim”; yuwi yis-s arraz aseklan Assia Djebbar n wugal amaziɣ deg useggas 2015 (SILA wis-20).

  Agzul 

 Ungal n Racid Buxerrub yules-d tudert n Fafuc, yiwet n n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit i wumi tennegza tmeddurt deg wul-is. Tezga tettnaɣ d unezgum. Seg temẓi i tebda lḥif; d win i tt-itebεen armi meqqert. Ur terbiḥ la ɣef zzwaǧ amenzu, la ɣef wis-sin. Cwi kan tella cwiṭ nni n nnmara swayes tettagar urfan. Taggara, teḍra-as am yefrax-nni n Colleen McCullough, teffren akken ad mmten. Mi wessert, temmut iman-is; ḥaren medden ad walin tidet n tmettant-is.

  Tasleḍt 

 Aḍris yeččur d igulen. Llan wid n tira tumrist, llan wid n tjerrumt. Wid n tira tumrist ama kkan-d seg usemres n tmacinin (ttemlilin yisekkilen, teffren ɣef wallen), ama seg lexsas n uqader n yilugan n tira, zgan sadaren azal n ufaris imi d-ggaren anida ur ilaq, ttnamaren imeɣri deg wayen ur nelhi. Wid n tjerrumt, deg taɣult n tefyirt neɣ deg tin n tezḍawt taḍrisant, seg wakken ggten, iban uɣen-d aẓar seg tmussni n tutlayt; ur asen-ufiɣ ara ssebba nniḍen.

 Deg wayen akka ara d-yernun, ad d-alin kra n yimedyaten ara d-yemlen amek i tedda tira deg wungal-a. Tazegrawt gar yisebtar teskan-d annect meqqer ucerrig.

 1. Igulen n tira tumrist:

 Yal asebter yuwi amur-is seg yigulen n tutlayt. Ggten armi tuɣal tɣuri d anamer, tessenzaf imeɣri.

 1.1. Igulen n usemres n tmacint

 Tikwal akka, ttilin yigulen ula deg yidlisen i d-yeffɣen ɣur tiẓrigin mussnawen. Γas yerked useɣti, mačči d winna n uwt εeddi, teccḍent tira. Deg udlis-a, wissen ixus useɣti neɣ ulac maḍi. Ma yella tezri fell-as tiṭ n umeḥḥes, isefk ad d-iban amek akka i tḍerru teẓrigt n udlis amaziɣ.

 Md : iswaqi (ilaq : i sswaqi); yarna (ilaq : yerna) (sb. 9)

 1.2. Igulen n yilugan n tira

 Igulen n tira tumrist diɣen ggten. Wigi kkan nnig n tutlayt akken tt-id-gelmen yimassanen, ama deg wawal ama deg beṭṭu n wawalen deg tefyirt.

 1.2.1.deg yiwen wawal

 Yettkemmil…

  
 Tifaskiwin n tmedyazt i yettmagan yal tikkelt di tmurt n Leqbayel mačči kan  d tagnit i umeyḥezwer ger yimedyazen ilmend n uḥelli n warazen, meɛna daɣen deg-sent i tettili tegnit i ten-yessemlalayen. Di tfaskiwin-a, yettemlil umedyaz d tmedyazt, deg-sent i ttemlilin yimedyazen ilmeẓyen d wid meqqren di leɛmeṛ. Ger yimedyazen-a imeqqṛanen i yezgan ttasen-d ɣer tfaskiwin ad d-nebder seg-sen : Dda Ssaɛid Debyan ad yeɛfu Rebbi fell-as, Jeddi Ɛmeṛ, Ɛemmi Ṣaleḥ akked Dda Aɛṛab. Dda Aɛṛab iɣef nebɣa ad d-nemmeslay, netta seg lɛeṛc nat Weɣlis, ilul deg useggas n 1952 di tɣiwant n Chemini. Yuɣ lḥal taɣiwant n Chemini tefka-d aṭas n wudmawen n yidles gar-asen, Smaɛil Bellac ameɣnas n « Ugraw Imaziɣen » i yewwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi deg wagur n fuṛaṛ yezrin.  Dda Aɛṛab, seg wasmi yakan yella d ameẓyan i t-yekcem waḍu n tmedyazt d leḥmala n yidles amaziɣ.  Netta yella d yiwen seg yimeɣnasen i d-yeslulen deg yiseggasen n tesɛin tidukla tadelsant « at Weɣlis » i ixedmen aṭas n leqdicat idelsanen di tɣiwant n Chemini. Deg yiseggasen n tesɛin, tidukla « at Weɣlis », telletha-d d uselmed n tira n tmaziɣt, am wakken daɣen i tesbedd tarbaɛt n umezgun i yuraren aṭas seg tceqqufin n Muḥya. Rnu ɣur-s, tessemlal imedyazen n tudrin n tɣiwant n Chemini, seg-sen ad d-nebder ṚacidZeɛruri i yewwḍen leɛfu n Ṛebbi ilindi, amedyaz umi terra tajmilt deg ussan iɛeddan, tdukla tadelsant «  Agraw » n taddart n Semɛun (Taxlijt). Deg useggas n 1970, Dda Aɛṛab yella d axeddam di Lezzayer. Ɣas lḥeṛs d rrehba i d-yesseɣli ɣef tmurt leḥkem n tallit-nni i yeɣunzan tamaziɣt, Dda Aɛṛab yeṭṭafaṛ isallen n umennuɣ, yezga yeqqaṛ tisɣunin n « Ugraw Imaziɣen » i d-ikeččmen s tuffra seg Fṛansa.  Di tallit-nni daɣen, Dda Aɛṛab yezga yettṛuḥu ɣer TNA (Axxam n umezgun aɣelnaw n temdint n Lezzayer) anda i iḥedder i tɣuri n tmedyazt i ixeddem umedyaz    Ben Muḥemmed umi isell daɣen i nnuba-s di ṛṛadyu n teqbaylit. Dda Aɛṛab yezga itteddu, anda tella temlilit tadelsant ad tt-yeɛnu walukan ɣef uḍaṛ. Ittekki di yakk tiẓrigin n tfaska n tmedyazt i d-tessudes deg yiseggasen n tesɛin tdukla tadelsant Ṣṣumam di temdint n Bgayet. Taggara-ya, yettṛuḥu ɣer tfaskiwin ama d tin n Weqbu neɣ tin n Tmizar ( Ssuq Lḥed) neɣ tafaska n Udrar n Fad ( at Smaɛil).  Si Mḥa Umḥend tigejdit n tmedyazt taqbaylit d amedyaz i iḥuzan aṭas Dda Aɛṛab, armi i t-yettɛanad yuɣal am netta yettcali, iteddu ur iɛeyyu. «  Si Mḥa Umḥend d yiwen n uɛeṛqub n yisefra, netta d azamul, d adɣaɣ amenzu , d ajgu n tsekla tamaziɣt ». Akka i yaɣ-d-yenna mi neqqim yid-s deg « Lqahwa n Uɣilas » yellan deg Uẓṛu n Chemini. Lqahwa-agi ideg t-nemlal, semman-tt ɣef « Ɣilas » ad t-yeṛḥem Ṛebbi, netta d yiwen n yilemẓi yemmuten d ameɣṛas di « Tefsut Taberkant ». Tamedyazt n Dda Aɛṛab tefreh, tserreḥ yerna teččuṛ d lemɛani lqayen. Tettawi-d ɣef yisental yemxalafen, seg tayri n temẓi ɣer umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt d tallit n tɛecṛet taberkant d temsal-nniḍen icudden ɣer tudert n yal ass. Aɣanib i yessemras di lebni n yisefra-s yezga d  afessas, yessemras s umata imeslayen icebḥeni yettwafhamen di yal tamnaḍt n tmurt n Leqbayel. D amedya,  ad nseddu yiwen ger yisefra-s umi isemma : « Tamurt n umaziɣ », nefren-it-id deg wammud-is ur d-neffiɣ ara ɛad, akken ad nextem yes-s amagrad-nneɣ.

 D tamaziɣt ay nedhem

 Seg ul ad tt-nexdem

 D idles-nneɣ ay nettnadi

 Fell-as ssefran (y)imedyazen

 Wid yettmeyyizen

 Ssakayen-d di lɣaci

 Nekni ur nelli d imcewwlen

 D talwit ay nedhem

 Ɣef tugdut ay nettnadi

 Seg yifniqen armi d ifṛansisen

 Ɣer uzaglu-nsen nettwaqqen

 Nerẓa azaglu n uṛumi

 Tamurt tuɣal-d ɣer yifassen

 Neǧǧa-tt akk ur tt-nxeddem

 Teḥzen tuɣal d asuki

 Tadukli ay atmaten

 Illu ad aɣ-iɛiwen

 Ɛinttu i ɣ-yurzen ad yeɣli.

<p style="text-align: right;">Mokrane Chikhi

  
 Četkayen imezdaɣ n temnadt tiza i yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n at racced deg usammar lwilaya n tubiret seg lexsas n wallalen tudert imi ttidirin di tegnatin qessiḥen dayen ur iqebbel ara leɛqel acku ulac ayen ara ten- yeǧǧen ad idiren tameddurt nsen akken iwata ḥaca seg iɣublan d wuguren i yettnernin yal ass ɣef yizugar nsen , ɣef waya ad d-naf gar iɣublan iten-icuɣben iberdan yettawin ɣer temnadt-agi ansi id asen-d ussin reglen imi xesren akk d idɣaɣen d yixujḍan meḥsub ur tezmired ara akk ad d-ɛeddid seg yiberdan-a ladɣa deg ussan n cetwa ciṭ ugeffur kan iberdan akk ad uɣalen d ixujḍan d iḥemmalen n waman imi reglen s waṭas di tegrest ulac win id -yettekan seg ubrid ama d tikeṛusin neɣ d imezdaɣ ɣef uḍar , am wakken ad d-naf daɣen seg yiɣublan lexsas n wallalen usiweḍ ladɣa inelmaden ttafen uguren iwakken ad ruḥen s iɣirbazen anda qqaren ama deg at racced neɣ tasnawit leqsar ,ɣef wannect-a ttafend iman nsen gar iɛewwiqen d imeqqranen di leqraya rnu ɣur -s ilmeẓyen n tama-agi ur sɛin ara anda ara sɛeddin lweqt nsen imi ɣabent tzeɣwa n waddal yemgaraden akk -d wannar n dabax yerra di tallit anda ulac axeddim i yiɣaben ɣef yilmeẓyen yerna llan waṭas id -iɛeddan di tseddawit , Si tama nniḍen četkayen imezdaɣ si leɣyab n trisiti iberdan iten-yeǧǧan ur ttefɣen ara deg iḍ imi id yeɣli lxuf fell-asen acku taddart tettwaɛzel dacu kan uguren d yiɣublan ur ḥbisen ara kan d agi imi mazal anda daɣen ar ass-a d wussan werɛad yewwiḍ usenfar n lgaz ɣer tama-a imi mazal rwan lmerta ɣef unadi tqerɛet n lgaz ma d-afen neɣ ala acku d asafar agejdan iseqdacen s waṭas ladɣa di lawan-agi n usemmiḍ , ɣef waya nezmar ad d-nini akken imezdaɣ ttidiren ḥaca seg uɣbel ɣer wayeḍ ɣas akka aqlaɣ di 2016 ameɛna mazal-iten tensa tafat ɣef twaculin-agi i yerwan leɛtab d lmerta iten-yeṭṭafaren di tmeddurt nsen dayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ ttuɣun četkayen i yimḍebren akken ad- yiḥnin wul nsen ad d-rren tamuɣli ɣer tama-agi s yisenfaren unegmu i ttrajun acḥal iseggasen-aya xersum ad tifsis teɛkumt d yiɣublan iten-ixenqen . 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Abdelhak Menas  

  
 « Nɣaz » deg tmektayt nneɣ akken ad nessufaɣ sin n yemdanen yemmuten tura, akken ad asen-er tajmilt. Wigi, zik nni, llan d-iɛeṭṭaren i zedɣen deg taddart n’At Buɛli id yezgan deg tɣiwant n At Manṣur (Tubiret). Wigi d N’na Taxrucatt d ɛemmi Menad aderɣal. Sin iɛeṭṭaren-agi, ɛacen, ɛeycen widak nsen, s-uznuz n laḥwal. Ttruḥun seg taddart ɣer tayeḍ, akken ad zenzen ayen i d-ewwin. N’na Taxrucatt, d yiwwet akken n temɣart muqren deg tallit nni n yiseggasen n 1980. (Temmut waqil deg taggara n tmanyin). Tamɣart-agi, tedla ɣef tuddar yezzin ɣef At Buɛli, tettruḥu ar yixxamen akken at-zenz ayen i d-tewwi. N’na Taxrucatt ḥemlen-tt akk medden, yagi tilawin acku teḥdaq dayen kan. Tesɛa nniya, netta-t yuɣ lḥal tekka-d seg tuttwin n zik nni. Teznuzu deg yixxamen cciḥ, lkuṣbar, lḥenni, ticert, ifelfel anaɣdan d-uberkan, naɛnaɛ,…lḥaṣul mači d yiwwet ar ad nebdar. Necfa-yas-d akken, nekni meẓẓiyit. Ass mara tekcem ɣer yixxamen, tettawid lfarḥ d ttaḍṣa i t’lawin ur n ttefeɣ ara. Ttɛuzzun-tt, ḥemlen-tt. Asmi i temmut N’na Taxrucatt, yeɣli-d laḥzen ɣef yixxamen. Tilawin nni dayen ulac war asen-d yawin laḥwal nni i ḥemlen-t. Segmi i temmut temɣart-agi, deg taggara n 1980, ulac tamɣart nniḍen yewwin amkan-is. Aɛeṭṭar wis sin, d yiwen akken n-uderɣal, iwumi ssawalen ɛemmi Menad. Wagi yugar kra yella-n d-aɛeṭṭar, acku netta d-aderɣal yedlan ɣef tuddar i qarben taddart n’At Buɛli, am Tawrirt d B’ni Manṣur. Ɛemmi Menad, d-amezruy. Amɣar-agi, yemmut ahat kra n 10 iseggasen aya kan, d-aɛeṭṭar aneggaru n tama n’At Manṣur, waqil n tama n Saḥel akk! Am N’na Taxrucatt, wagi yeznuzu aṭaṣ n laḥwal. Yettruḥu-d seg At Buɛli alarmi d B’ni Manṣur ttikli ɣef iḍaren-is mebla ma yedda ula d yiwen yides ! Allen-is ttaɛekkazt-is ay at laɛraḍ. I teddu azal n 4 ikilumiṭren akken ad yezenz deg taddart n B’ni Manṣur. Yeznuzu ticert, lkuṣbar, cciḥ, lkemmun, ttay, tizan,…s ubarreḥ deg zenqan! Sellen-as-d medden seg lbaɛd, imi taɣuct-is teqwa dayen kan. Amɣar-agi iceffu d laɛǧeb. Iɛeqqel akk medden s tuɣac nsen kan. As yahḍar kan yiwen at yaɛqel din ! Mti i yeznuzu ulayɣar ad yaɛreḍ yiwen as i kellax , acku ɣas akken ma yella ur yettwali ara, ifassen-is i d-allen-is. Yezmar ad yaɛqel idrimen s yiḍuḍan-is kan ! Ḥemlen-t  akk medden, ulac win yewten at yaɣḍar, acku d-aderɣal i xeddem ɣef ccar-is. D’da Menad d win yettecmummuḥen kan, yettaḍṣa, acku ul-is d-amellal. Maca, mači d-ayagi kan i yaxdem Menad, yettawi ula d ttibratin i yimezdaɣ n’At Buɛli. Yettruḥu ɣer lbuṣṭa n B’ni Manṣur(tawilayt n Bgayet) akken ad yejmaɛ akk tibratin akken aten-t yawi ɣer taddart n’At Buɛli, taddart-is. Asmi yemmut D’da Menad, yaɣli-d laḥzen ɣef tama-agi. Deg zenqan n tuddar yekfa uberraḥ ines. Akka ihi, ruḥen iɛeṭṭaren n’At Manṣur, « truḥ-as » lbenna i teccuyt…N-ella akken ad nesmekti !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax.Y 

  
 D asali ara yesferḥen iselmaden akked yinelmaden n Ugezdu n Tutlayt d Yidles n Tamaiɣt n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu imi agezdu-agi ur inuqel ara ɣer Tamda.

 Ihi, inelmaden akked yiselmaden n tmaziɣt, uɣalen ass-a ɣer tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu mačči ɣer Tamda. Deg tazwara, imḍebbren yellan deg tesdawit-a, gemmnen ad naqlen Agezdu n Tutlayt d Yidles n Tmaziɣt ɣer Tamda imi, ɣef wakken i d-nnan, teččur tesdawit Mmulud Mɛemmri dagi deg Hasnawa. Ayen yeǧǧan imḍebber n lweqt-nni Mass Arezki Derridj i wakken ad inaqel Agezdu-agi n tmaziɣt ɣer Tamda.n Acu kan, kkren-d yiselmaden akked yinelmaden mgal rray-a u gemmnen ad ḥebsen ɣef lxedma akked leqraya, deg tazwara n tuɣalin ɣer tesdawit, ma yella inuqel ugezdu-a ɣer Tamda. Acu kan, tuɣalin n Mass Tessa Ahmed ɣer uqerru n tesdawit (i kra n lweqt kan), yegla-d s umaynut u yebda iferru uguren yellan ama d wid n yiselmaden neɣ wid n yinelmaden. Gar wuguren i d-yufan tifrat, yella wagi n Ugezdu n Tutlayt d Yidles n Tamaziɣt. akka i tt-fran d rray i wakken ad yeqqim deg Hasnawa deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu. I usmekti, tasdawit n Tizi Uzzu, ha-t-an la d-tettheggi matawayen gar-as akked kra n tkebbaniyin, yecban Ansej, Anem d Cnas i wakken ad walin u ad mmeyzen amek ara ilin wassaɣen gar-asen. Assaɣen ara yessiwḍen ahat inelmaden ɣer uxeddim ɣer tkubbniyin asmi ara selken leqraya-nsen, ‘’d aheggi ɣer umahil sya d afella’’, ɣef wakken i d-nnan yimḍebbren n tkebbaniyin-a.

<p style="text-align: right;"> H. Moula  

  
 Yal aseggas, mi ara d-yaweḍ 20 di yebrir, tasa tettenhaz ɣef wayen yeḍran deg useggas n 80. D ayen yeǧǧan s kra n win yumnen s temsalt-a ad iger tamawt ɣer wayen iɣer newweḍ ass-a iwakken ad yerr tajmilt I wid d tid I d-yessaɣen asafu I usǧuǧǧeg n tmaziɣt. Tajmilt-a, yal wa amek i yefren ad tt-yerr. Nwulef akka tikli d tmesbaniyin, isaragen, aneḥbus ɣef uxeddim.
