Maca, tikkelt-a, llan wid ifernen ass n 20 di yebrir iwakken ad d-yili d tagnit i usenṣeb n uselmad amezwaru n tmaziɣt deg Umalu n tmurt. D aɣerbaz Medjaoui Rachid deg temnaḍt n Rremci deg Tlemsan i yeddren adyan-a, anda iselmaden imerra n uɣerbaz-a mmugren-t s lferḥ. Kouceila Iskounene, d aselmad i terza temsalt-a, yenna-d:” s ccuq i rǧiɣ ass-a, aqel-i ddreɣ-t amzun akken d targit.” Gar wid i iḥeḍren, d Souria, yiwet n tselmadt n tefrensist deg Maɣnia, tenna-d:”Ur nwiɣ ara belli yewweḍ uselmed n tmaziɣt s aswir yecban wa. S tidet, behteɣ mi walaɣ inelmaden amek i d-qqaren aḍris n Mouloud Feraoun, d wamek i ssawḍen ad dcnun tizlatin s teqbaylit. Ma d ayen yerzan tira, wagi d asurif ameqqran i yuɣen yixulaf-a.” Anemhal-is, M.Abderrahmane, yerna-d:” Ɣas akka ɣur-i lebɣi iwakken ad d-fkeɣ s kra n wayen iwumi zemreɣ I uselmed n tmaziɣt, maca s ya d afella, ad d-muddeɣ s nnig n tezmert, imi ass-a ddreɣ ayen I nwiɣ zik-nni d aqesser. Umneɣ tura belli s tmaziɣt ad nesnerni tamurt-nneɣ.” Ad d-nesmekti belli, 04 n yiselmaden i terza temsalt-a n usenṣeb deg Tlemsan, iwakken ad d-taweḍ nnuba n 04 nniḍen deg useggas aɣurbiz I d-iteddun. Iwakken yella-d usenṣeb-a, tasweḍt tamatut twekkel amaswaḍ n tmaziɣt yellan deg Tubiret iwakken ad d-yelhi s ccɣel-a, imi tamneḍt-a n Umalu ur tesɛi ara amaswaḍ n tmaziɣt. seg tama-s, tamehla n Usegmi n twilayt-a ur teɣfil ara ɣef ttawilat ilaqen iwakken ad tessishel amahil I umaswaḍ-a.

  M. Smail 

  
 Yennayer d yiwen gar wansayen iqburen i aɣ-d-ǧǧan lejdud-nneɣ imaziɣen. Yennayer d azamul, d ansay, d amezruy. Yettili-d deg wass wis 12 n deg ‘janvier’, ass-nni i ikeccem useggas amaziɣ amaynut. Ihi ansi i d-yekka? Amek it-ssfuggulen medden? Yennayer d ass amenzu n usseggas n yimaziɣen, yebda leḥsab-a lewhi n 950 n yiseggasen uqbel talalit n Sidna Ʃisa. Bdan yimaziɣen ssfuggelen-t, seg wasmi yerbeḥ ugellid Cacnaq agellid n yiferɛunen (Ramsess wis sin) n tmurt n Maṣer. Dɣa, seg wass-nni i yebda leḥsab n yimaziɣen, u yerna yal mi ara d- yaweḍ zellun yimdanen iyuziḍ ɣef umnar n tewwurt n uxxam i wakken ad yebɛed ccer ɣef yixxamen-nsen. S umata, sewwayent tlawin seksu d uyaziḍ bu sebεa n yisufar: lḥemmez, lubya n leqbayel, lubya tacebḥant, ibawen iquranen, irden, leεdes d tjilbant taqurant. Sewwayent diɣen aɣrum aqquran, tiɣrifin, lemsemen&amp;hellip,; maca ur sewwayent ara cyaḍ i wakken ur yettceyyiḍ ara useggas-nsent. Llan yirmad-nniḍen i xeddmen yimdanen zik, yecban ttesḍila tamezwarut i warrac imecṭaḥ akken ad yiğhed ucebbub-nsen. Xeddmen daɣen tasewwiqt, anida aqcic ad isewweq i tikkelt tamezwarut akken ad yawi aqerruy n uzger i wakken ad yuɣal d aqerruy ɣef uxxam. Yennayer d ansay i aɣ-d-ǧǧan yimezwura-nneɣ, ilaq ad nseḥbiber fell-as akken ad neṭṭef deg wansayen-nneɣ, imi diɣen yennayer d aggur yesfilliten i rrbeḥ, lxir, lerẓaq, tazmart d talwit…atg.

  Sbihi Lina 

  
 Anaẓur ameqran umezgun Moḥemed Fellag yuɣal-d s uhanay (spectacle) amaynut umi yefka azwel  » Bled Runner ». Deg web unṣib-ines yura-d d akken ahanay-agi d tahiwect deg ayen yexdem d wayen yura seg 1995 armi tura u di yal ahanay yeks-d deg-s ayen yelhan(si Djurdjurassiquebled armi petits chocs des civilisations ), ma d iswi umahi-a d aɛraḍ n tarda n ddɣel ger snat tmettiyin (ijenṭad akked d irumyen) di tmurt n Fransa imi ala s taḍṣa d unecraḥ inezmer a neseqreb ulawen wa nesqerdec timsal ara yesduklen igduden xas mgaraden di kullec maca ulac win yellan mgal taḍṣa , ahanay-ines amezwaru ad yili ass 9 ṭuber 2015 di Fransa D asmekti kan Mohemed Fellag yettidir di tmurt n Fransa ugar n 20 iseggassen , ilul di tɣiwant Uzeffun di twilayt n Tizi Wezzu deg useggas 1950 . yunag ɣer lɣerba mbaɛd temrawt taberkant acku irebraben ḥekmen fell-as s lmmut , ger imahilen-ines mucaɛen nezzah aɣarrabu a tmurt n Lustralɣ , SOS labass , cocktail khorotov , ɣer tama umezgun Fellag yura ddeqs n yedlisen d wungalen am « rue des petites daurades » « L allumeur des reves berbere d waṭas isura n sinima am « ce que le jour doit a la nuit , monsieur Lazhar …atg. Xas isem-is yewweḍ akk timura maca asirem Muḥend Saɛid Fellag yiwwas ad yurar d agi di tmurt-is zdat n wid tiḥemlen di tmurt n Lezzayer.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Dahmani Bilal 

  
 Aseggas –a teffi tala mellulen , bdan yimdanen ttruḥun ɣer dinna , tala mellulen tezga-d deg wat Dawed d-yezgan deg yiɛeṭṭafen , taɣiwant n wat yanni , teqreb ɣer taddart n At Mislayen n Uqbil , aman n tala –agi d izeqqalen lhan i waṭṭanen am rumatiz , timmas , d waṭṭanen niḍen , d ddwa , ttasen-d seg yal tama , tettwasen seg zzman aqbur , sin wussan-agi kan ideg i teffi , yal aseggas tettefi taggara n meɣres d yebrir , win ara d-yasen ilaq ad d-yawi yid-s timellalin tuftiyin ad tent-yečč dinna wa ad yedɛu s lxir , ilaq ad d-yas kraḍ n tikkal , tala agi n yiwet n twacult At ččiɣa n tzaɣart taddart rrif n wat Dawed ,aman-is tzemreḍ ad tcucfeḍ yis-sen imi ḥman , meliḥit , ɣas d tala tamecṭuḥt aman nejren tiregwa , mi ara truḥed ad tawḍeḍ ɣer dinna ad taliḍ yiwet n tsawent ɣef yiwen uẓru d aḥlawan d amellal fellas leḥḥun waman n tala –agi ,imdanen ttfarasen xeddmen-d tugniwin imi ccbaḥa n umkan agi d ayen izaden , acḥal i yebɣan ad aɣen amkan-a maca At ččiɣa ur qbilen ara aya ǧǧan-tt i yimuḍan ad dawin s waman n tala –agi, yerna limer ad yemmet yiwen seg twacult agi n At ččiɣa ur tetteffi ara tettɣar, d tagi i tala mellulen yesɛan aman d ddwa. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 S umezruy-is d ccan i tesɛa ɣur yal yiwen, tettwassen Yemma Guraya ula akin i yilel agrakal. Seg wakken tella d tigemmi yeswan n tmurt n Yizwawen, aṭas n yiberraniyen i d-irezzun ɣur-s teɣzi n useggas, aniɛad at-is. Maca, iban-d d akken leqder i tesɛa d tayri sɣur lɣaci ur yesḥerrek acemma deg yinesdabuyen n waɣir n Bgayet, ladɣa imḍebbren n uḥric n tmerrit. Imi lḥala ideg i d-teggra Yemma Guraya ass-a, yettaǧǧa kra n win iḥewwsen i yirebbi-s yettuɣal ul yendef s axxam-is. Ssebba n waya d ayen akk ur yezmir yiwen ad d-isugen deg wadeg am win i yellan d lemqam, d sellaḥ. Deg-s teqqnen iɣyal amzun d addaynin. Kra n medden rran-tt d abduz i useɛfen. S anida twalaḍ, ad tafeḍ iɣraben-is, ttwarun s yal asxerbubbec n win ikecmen ɣur-s ur tt-iquder. Iḍumman, ṭṭfen amkan d tɣemmar ad as-tiniḍ d agudu. War ma nemmeslay ɣef leḥyuḍ i yehtutin seg tuzzya n zzman, ur xemmen yimḍebbren ad as-ɛiwden areqqeɛ. « Hezneɣ aṭas mi rziɣ ɣur-s deg 2014, ufiɣ-tt deg waddad am win. Armi d ussan-a mi uɣaleɣ, ɣileɣ ad afeɣ yella-d kra n ubeddel deg-s. Maca d tuzzma kan i d-rniɣ i yiman-iw. Lemqam n Yemma Guraya, aql-it deg yir liḥala. Ur d-lhan yis-s wid-is ». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna M. K, yiwen seg wid iḥemmlen ad ẓuren Yemma Guraya seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ. Deg tallit-a n unebdu ideg ṭṭuqquten tirziwin ɣer wadeg-a iqedsen, yewwi-d ɣef yimḍebbren ad d-binen, ad as-rren azal i as-yettwakksen s ureqqeɛ d usizdeg.

  M. K. 

  
 Iḥemmel ccna segmi yella d amecṭuḥ. Ula d baba-s imir-nni yuɣ-as-d tagiṭart akken ad ternu tayri-s ɣer uẓawan aressi. Wagi d Fares Amaɛuc, acennay i d-ilulen, i d-yekkren di temdint n Bgayet, tamnaḍt n Ssuq n Letnin. Ilemẓi-a d yiwen seg gar wid iḍefren tizlit taqbaylit, yecna yis-s s zzux d ameqqran imi yezga dima yumer s lasel-is d tummast-is (identité). Amecwar-is deg wannar-a, ur ɣezzif aṭas. Yebda-t deg useggas n 2009, mazal yettkemmil-it s lebɣi-s i yesɛa i leqdic d usnulfu. Sa n yiseggasen i d-yelḥa ar tura s leɛtab d tmussni n wallaɣ, simmal tfetti daxel-is, trennu-as-d tirmit (expérience) I wakken ad yessemɣer aswir-is ugar. Fares, ur yeksib kan yiwen n uɣanib (style) deg ccna-s, imi yecna ɣef qeddac n yisental yemgradem, am tayri, ddunit, timetti…atg. Aya, ad t-naf deg ukuẓ (04) n yiseɣraz i d-yessufeɣ yakan, neɣ deg yimeslayen n tezlatin-is. Iseɣrez-is amezwaru, yeffeɣ-d deg 2009, d win umi isemma « Aṭṭan-iw d ssem. Yerna kraḍ n yiseggasen, yessufeɣ-d aḍebsi wis sin s uzwel « Lexyal ». Wis tlata yessufeɣ-it-id di 2013, isemma-yas « Tfukk leḥnana ». Ma d wis ukuẓ, ilindi kan i t-id-yessufeɣ, yefka-as azwel « Anef-iyi ». Yal iseɣrez yettawi ṭam (08) n tezlatin. Fares d win i d-yettheggin akka tura aḍebsi wis semmus, ur yettɛeṭṭil deg tuffɣa, ɛlaḥsab N wawal-is. Yettban mmi-s n Bgayet, tezdeɣ-it tehregt (inspiration) n lɛali, tin i t-yettɛawanen ad yaf tiktiwin, ad yaru, ad yessefru, ad yecnu yis-sent, daɣen, s taɣect-is tuzmirt i ila d afud. Iban imi ur yettɣimay aṭas n wakud war ma yessekles, yewwi-d imaynuten i d-yettnernayen wa deffir n wayeḍ. Ahat d abeḥri n yilel i yellan deg temnaḍt-is i d sser n wannect-nni, neɣ wissen d acu! Fares Amaɛuc, ssnen-t xilla n medden, yehwa-asen ccna-s daɣen. D annect-nni dɣa i t-yessawḍen ad iseɛɛu tinnubgiwin sɣur-sen, ad yettwaɛraḍ, ad yeg timeɣriwin d ttiɛadat n ccna ɣer wacḥal d adeg deg tmurt. Aya yumer yis-s, yerna-as-d tabɣest ad yessefreḥ kra wid i t-iḥemmlen, ad d-yefk ayen iwumi yezmer i tezlit-is taqbaylit. Yenna-d ɣef waya: «yessefk s nekk s wid akk icennun ad neqdec s wul d tayri ɣef tezlit-nneɣ, acku ssarameɣ s tidet ad teddu ɣer sdat, ad tawweḍ taqacuct». Afud ijehden i Fares Amaɛuc.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaïsa Khalifi. 

  
 Nezmer ad d-nini anammas adelsan n Lberj n Mira, deg tɣiwant n Tsexriwt i d-yezgan deg usamar-anẓul n Bgayet, icuba waddad-is ɣer kra i yemmuten seld aselqef ur nḍul. Ahat wid yeẓran d acu yellan, yettmagga deg-s sɣur tiddukkliwin n temnaḍt-nni, ladɣa tidukkla tadelsant tanaddalt Tigelzi n Rrif, ad ḥsun belli almi i tent-yuɣ akken ilaq umkan-a ulac kra deg-s. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer wass deg yečča tiyita unammas-a, d kra n yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant-nni, i yeṭṭef wurrif ɣef tulacit n tnezduɣin i d-yettak uwanek, i yekkren sserɣen axxam ayiwen ideg llan xeddmenkra yellan d armud adelsan, ukuẓ n yiseggasen tura. Deg ddrur n wakud kan, yuɣal unammas adelsan d aberkan am teyyint yerɣan, ur yesliḥ ulamma i tmuɣli. Seg yimir-nni dɣa, ggrant-d tdukkliwin n temnaḍt-nni feclent am uxerṭuṭ almi yenqes uzgen ageɛmir n wayen tuɣ seɛɛunt deg wahil.Ad aɣ-yawi srid waya ad nxemmem ɣef tfaska n umunulug, i tuɣ tessuddus tdukklaTigelzi n Rrif almi ssawḍen wwin-d ula d Muḥemmed Fellag yiwen n useggas akken. Maca, ass-a deg wussan, yeḥbes yeggra-d kan ala isem-is ɣur wat yidles. Seg tama n yinesdabuyen idiganen (autorités locales), neẓradakkenɛerḍen s wayenzemren ad yettwaseggem unammas-a, maca tasarut aql-itt deg tmehla n yidles n waɣir n Bgayet. Acku, ɣefwamek i daɣ-d-tenna teɣbalut seg tɣiwant n Tsexriwt, ilaq-as i umḍiq-nni aṭas n yidrimen, ahat d imelyaren, akken ad d-yuɣa lamek i t-tuɣsend ad t-tečč tmes. Ad yeqqim kan umdan yesḥassef imi d aḥric n yidles gedged i tent-yuɣen. Ilemẓiyen n Tsexriwt aql-iten kan ssaramen ttraǧun melmi ara d-ineǧǧaɛ unammas-nsen adelsan. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Yal mara d-yennerni umaynut aseklan i yifesqi n temkarḍit tazwawt, ala tiɣratin n tutlayt i umi nsell. D ayen i iga uselmad Zahir Meksem, mi d-yurew ungal umi isemma « Tabraṭ n uẓekka ». Akken kan i t-id-yesuffeɣ ɣer teẓrigin Tira, nesteqsa-t fell-as deg tdiwennit-a. Ɣret-tt

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Tessufɣeḍ-d taggara-ya ungal-ik amenzu ɣer teẓrigin Tira. Send ad nekcem deg-s mmeslay-aneɣ ɣef umecwar akked tikti i ak-d-yusan akken ad t-taruḍ…  

  Zahir Meksem :  Tidet, ur yelli ara d asenfar iɣef xemmeɣ aṭas, ur yelli, daɣen, d asenfar akken ad aruɣ ungalen. Deg useggas n 2007, llant kra n tedyanin n tilawt s ɛelmeɣ, i yi-d-yegren tikti ad aruɣ tadyant-a kan. Seg yimir, uriɣ-t, ǧǧiɣ-t deg tama, ttxemmimeɣ ma yessefk ad t-id-ssufɣeɣ neɣ ala. Twalaḍ 8 n yiseggasen i yezrin d wasmi i tt-friɣ d yiman-iw. Tura, ma tettunefk tegnit, ahat ad t-semdeɣ. Maca, timsal am ti, ur nettdebbir ara deg-sent aṭas.

  Sissen-aɣ-d cwiṭ ungal-ik, amek tga tedyant-is?  

 Tadyant d tamagnut, d yiwet gar tedyanin n tmetti. Maca riɣ ad d-sekneɣ amdan i isɛan imenzayen, yessnen azal n tudert, azal n teqbaylit, ur yezmir ara ad yedder deg tmetti d taɛkemt ɣef wiyiḍ. Ur yezmir ara ad yedder deg tmetti anda ara iɛeddi d aɛeddi kan, war ma ila kra n wawal, kra n yiseɣ, akken qqaren:” yella, ulac-it”. Imdanen am wiyi, uqan tura. Dɣa ungal-a, ma nuɣal ɣer yimenzayen-nneɣ, yeskan-d , s umata, amdan i wimi yettizwiɣ wudem, yesɛa yiwen n ubrid kan deg tudert, ur yezmir ad yedder s tfukal (prétextes). 

 Гef wannect-a, i uriɣ ungal-a . Asaḍ, am yal amdan , ad yefk rray i rray-is, ad yessekcem iman-is deg wayen ɣef ur d-yekkir, deg wayen i wimi ur yezmir alma yegra-d deg yir tudert. Ayen akka i d-yuǧew s ufus-is, ad t-id-yessegri deg yir tagnit , war tifrat; ad iɣaz deg wallaɣ-is, alma ur yeẓri anwa abrid ara yawi. Dɣa ad yefren taneggarut d aẓekka.

  Ihi d ayen yellan daxel-is i d-iḥettmen azwel-is « tabraṭ n uẓekka » neɣ tferneḍ-t ɣef kra n yiswan?  

 D tidyanin i d-ifernen azwel-a. Uriɣ-t akken imeɣri ad yeḍfer akk tidyanin alama d taggara iwakken ad yegzu tamukrist n wungal. Aṭas i d-yennan acuɣer mačči “tabrat n uzekka”acku “azekka” d azamul n usirem, n tudert….Maca deg ungal-a d “aẓekka” i wasaḍ, d “azekka” i wid i d-yessegra deffir-s.

  Deg wanwa asenf n wungalen ideg nezmer ad t-nesres? 

 Ahat d ungal yerzan timetti. Maca at tsekla, ad as-gen tasleḍt ahat ad tt-id-frun. Mazal ameslay yettkemmil , ad ikemmel ma tawsit am ta d ungal neɣ d tullist.

  Asufeɣ n wungal sɣur uselmad deg tesdawit yesɛa anamek weḥd-s. Amek tettwaliḍ taluft-a imi d lebɣi i k-yeǧǧan tessuffɣeḍ-tt-id…  

 S umata, ulac amgired gar wungal n uselmad d wungal n yimyura-nniḍen. Yezmer aselmad ad yerr tamawt ugar ɣer tira, ɣer tutlayt, ɣer wawal; akken yezmer ad yebɣu ad yesɛeddi kra n tektiwin-nniḍen yeflen akkin i yiswi n tsekla.

  Acu ara tiniḍ i yimyura imeɣnasen i itewlen deg tira maca sɛan akukru ad ɛeddin ɣer tigawt?  

 Medden akk ttagaden tira akken tabɣu tili, ɣas d tabrat kan n menwala,. Tira d lemri i d-yeskanen tiktiwin, udem, tazmert, tuccḍiwin n win ara yarun. Dɣa yal amdan yettkukru d acu ara inin medden fell-as, d acu n yiweniten s ara d-yeglu umahil-is. Maca, i wid iran ad arun, ur d-tegri ara kan deg usirem, yessefk ad yenhel, ad yewjed. Tin ɣur-s, yelha win yettcawaren, amaru yewwi-d ad yesseqsi wid yuran, wid yessnen akken ad as-fken tamuɣli ɣef umahil-is. D annect-a ara d-yefken afud i win ikukran. Deg tilawt, akukru yelha acku, akken teẓriḍ, wid ur nugad, wid ur ncawer , ɣawlen ɣer usufeɣ syin akkin ahat faqen mačči d rray iwatan. Aṭas n yimahilen ɛerqen s tuccḍiwin ula n tira.

  Maca ɣer tama nniḍen yella wugur n usiẓreg, ur t-tettwaliḍ gar yiɛewwiqen imenza n umaru?  

 Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ ahat ulac tura. Zik d tidet acku ulac tazrigt ara iqeblen isenfaren n tmaziɣt; ttwalin d lexsara imi ur tli imeɣriyen. Tura tizrigin i d-yessufuɣen s tmaziɣt llant , akka am tezrigt n “Tira” n Tazaɣart B., tin n Ɛeccab… Yegra-d ahat wugur deg usiweḍ n umahil ɣer tnedlisin ara t-yezzenzen, yella wugur daɣen deg usussen “publicité”-ines. Aṭas n yimahilen i d-yeffɣen tikwal ur ẓerren ara medden. 

 Maca, llan yiɣmisen i yerran tamawt ɣer wannect-a, sissinen-d ayen yellan d amaynut. Rnu ɣur-s faysbuk yettɛawan daɣen.

  Tanemmirt a Mass Zahir, ma tesɛiḍ kra n yisenfaren ɣas ini-yaɣ-d, ternuḍ-d awal-ik n taggara… 

 µIsenfaren llan, maca deg Lezzayer: Ur nxeddem, ur nestufa” yal akud d acu i t-yeččan. D acu, ayen i d-yeqqnen ɣer wungal, iswi-w d akemmel n yixfawen-nniḍen yerzan udmawen n wullis i d-yeddan deg ungal akka am Tasaɛdit…Tanemmirt i wazal i terriḍ i wungal-a, tanemmirt i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen i yefkan tagnit i yidles n tmaziɣt, afud i yimahilen-ik kečči. 

 Sɛiɣ kan awal ad t-id-rnuɣ i wid ikukran ad arun: ma yenza wungal, idrimen ara d-yawi -ma yewwi-d – ad ten-fkeɣ d tallalt i walbeɛd yesɛan kra ad t-id-yessufeɣ ɣef tmaziɣt, ma amahil-is yelha.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yella-yas wawal akked: Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 I lmend n tedyanin n 17 deg tuber 1961, yella-d uwali n usaru ajdid ‘’Faḍma n Sumer’’ n Belkacem Hadjadj di tzeqqa n tmeγriwin n uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer n temdint n Tizi Ouzou.  Asaru am wa, i waken yeffeγ-d, mačči dayen isehlen : laqen-as ttawilat imeqqranen d yimdanen yessnen s telqayt sinima d umezruy, ama n tmurt neγ d iberraniyen. Γef wanect-a, dγa, i d-yemmeslay Mass Belkacem Hadjadj di taggara n usεeddi n usaru. ‘’Leqdic –a, yeṭṭef-aneγ 4 n yiseggasen n lxedma. Nessexdem ttawilat imeqqranen iwulmen. Nebγa ad d-nexdem ayen igerrzen. ’’Ula d tin yuraren Faḍma n Sumer mačči d taqbaylit. Γef wanect-a, yenna-d :’’xedmeγ acḥal n tikal casting   ur d-ufiγ ara ayen ttnadiγ ; ulac tin i yi-iqenεen di tmurt daymi nudaγ ula di Fransa. Dinn-a mlaleγ d Laêtitia Eido. Xas ulamma  ur tessin ara taqbaylit meεna yettak cbih γer udem n Faḍma n Sumer γef wacu ttnadiγ. Syin yesselmed-as Benmohamed tameslayt.’’

 Aṭas, di&amp;gamma,; i iwalan d akken asaru-agi ur d-yemmeslay ara s telqayt γef umecwar n Faḍma n Sumer ayen yeğğan Mass Hadjadj ad d-yini : mačči di snat n tsaεtin ara d-nini amecwar-is akken yella, wagi d yiwen n usaru γef Faḍma n Sumer mačči d asaru n Faḍma n Sumer.’’ 

 Taqsiṭ n usaru teḍra di taggara n yiseggasen n 1940 di tmurt n Leqbayel ur nelli ara di lweqt-nni ddaw leḥkem n umnekcam, acu kan yella d amekkan i uheggi n tegrawla. Di liḥala yecban ta i d-tekker Faḍma n Sumer deg yiwet n twacult yeγran leqran. Faḍma n Sumer teffeγ di lqaleb-nni n leεwayed yurzen tameṭṭut, syin, dγa, i yebda umecwar-is…

 Asaru dayen igerrzen nezzeh, εlaḥsab n wid akk i t-iwalan. ‘’Akka tura, nezmer ad d-nini nesεa sinima di tmurt-nneγ. Asaru am wa wa ad yekk di yal timsizzelt di ddunit.’’ I aγ-d-yenna yiwen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Azekka-nni tameṭṭut n Saɛid u Ḥemmu teffeɣ ɣer tala ad d-tagem tacmuxt n waman. Tegguni nettraju nnuba. Tilawin bdant awal ɣef unejmuɛ n yiḍelli-nni. Tin iṭṭfen awal ad d-tini , iḍelli di tejmaɛt argaz-iw immeslay-d, yenna-d akka d wakka. Tameṭṭut tessel i tilawin ttalsent-d lehdur n yirgazen-nsent nettat tessusem kan ulac acu ara d-tini. Mmeslayen akk yirgazen-nsent di tejmaɛt ala argaz-is. Mi tuɣal s axxam, tenna-as i urgaz-is :

 -ay argaz amek akka akk irgazen mmeslayen di tejmaɛt ala kečč ?

 -D tidet a tameṭṭut, mmeslayen akk ala nekk d wid I yi-icban ur nemmeslay ara, ḥaqren-aɣ s wid illan rqiqit.

 – Yyah akka ! rǧu ihi, aḥeq wihin d wihin arda ad tuɣaleḍ ad tettmeslayeḍ am kečč am wiyaḍ.

 -Acu ara txedmeḍ daɣen kemmini ? 

 -Sussem kan wagi d cɣel n tmeṭṭut.

 Azekka-nni, tameṭṭut-nni teffeɣ zik seg uxxam, terfed tasebbalt tamerkut truḥ ɣer tala. Tewweḍ teɛna acercur –nni n waman tebda tessirid tasebbalt-nni. Tewweḍ-d tameṭṭut tamezwarut tenna-as:

 – A tameṭṭut imi d asired ara tessirideḍ tasebbalt-im , anef-iyi ad ččareɣ, argaz-iw d afellaḥ a yi-ittraju ad iffeɣ ɣer lexla.

 – Ula d nekk a yi-ittraju urgaz-iw, ad iffeɣ ɣer tyerza.

 Tewweḍ-d tayeḍ tenna-as am tmezwart anef-iyi ad acareɣ tacmuxt-iw, ǧǧiɣ llufan di dduḥ. Terra-as:

 -ala kemm i iǧǧan llufan di dduḥ, ula d nekk a-ta-n di dduḥ. Akken a-t-in d-yewwḍen ad as-terr awal.

 Alammi d-nnejmaɛent aṭas n tilawin, tenṭeq-d yiwet tenna-as i tmeṭṭut n Saɛid u Ḥemmu:

 -I tura kemm tebɣiḍ ad brunt akk tlawin-agi! Ilaq ad awint aman di lwaqt. Terra-as :

 Ihi a leflantegga acimi irgazen-nkent ur ttaǧǧan ara argaz-iw ad immeslay di tejmaɛt am yirgazen-nkent!

 Neṭqent-d tilawin-nni, nnant-as wgi d lbaṭel ur t-neqbbel ara, xas kkes aɣbel wagi tura d cɣel-nnteɣ. Tameṭṭut twexxer-d i ucercur, ugment tlawin uɣalent ɣer yixxamen-nsent. Wwḍent s axxam, nnant i yirgazen-nsent cɣel xedmen di tejmaɛt ur ilhi ara imi xeddmen meḥyaf ula deg umeslay. Nnant akk issefk leflani ad isɛu awal di tejmaɛt. Leǧmeɛ-nni i d-iḍefren, Saɛid-u-Ḥemmu immeslay, ifka-d ṛṛay-is am netta am wiyaḍ.

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Deg ussan-agi yezrin i d-yeffeɣ wammud n tmedyazt amezwaru n temsiwt Ben Sidhoum Rachida iwumi tsemma “Keltouma, yemma taɛzizt” i d-yeffɣen ɣef ɣer tezrigin «Art Plume» deg n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. D wagi i d adlis amezwaru ara d-tessuffeɣ tnelmadt-agi n tmaziɣt, ideg terra tajmilt i yemma-s s wammud-agi n tmedyazt. Gar yisental iɣef i d-tewwi awal deg udlis-agi n 18 n yisefra, ad naf ukuẓ n tejmilin (tlata i yemma-s, yiwet i baba-s), tagujilt, tamussni, lmektub, tayri, daɛwessu, lefraq, urfan, uguren, lexdaɛ, tudert n tmeṭṭut…atg. Ad d-nesmekti belli tmarut-agi, tewwi-d agerdas n master «Taẓuri d tsekla tamaziɣt», deg taggara n useggas n 2016, seg Ugezdu n tmaziɣt deg tseddawit n Lmulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Tettheggi diɣen yiwen wungal ara d-yefɣen deg wussan i d-iteddun. Taɣuri igerrzen i yimeɣriyen, afud iǧehden i yimeskaren.

<p style="text-align: right;"> A.A. 

  
 Ussan-a iɛeddan i d-yewweḍ yisalli yessefraḥen dakken yeffeɣ s wayen yelhan ucerreg (opération) n uḥeddad n wawal, mass Zedek Mulud, i iga taggara-ya deg yiwen n usbiṭar deg tmurt n Fransa. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef wugur-a n tezmert, ed tmentilt (sebba) i yeǧǧan bab n « Hatan ihi » ad yerr ɣer ttawil n ucerreg, ad d-nini mačči d ayen iweɛren, imi d kra n waṭṭan icudden ɣer tiqraḥ n yiẓi, d ayen yuggten dɣa taggara-ya ɣur waṭas n yimdanen, ladɣa wid yesdafflen akkin tlatin n yiseggasen. Ad d-nesmeki belli segmi i d-yekcem Zedek Mulud ɣer Tmurt deffir ttiɛadat n ccna i iga deg Tkanada ed Fransa, yella ad tekk fell-as tmeqset send ad yekfu useggas yezrin n 2015. Maca, ɣer taggara, yettwaẓuɣɣer usihar almi d tazwara n wayyur-a n furar deg nella. Tura segmi i iɛedda ucerreg deg tegnatin igerrzen, ad yili Zedek Mulud ussan-a deg uxxam-is anda ara yesgunfu kra n wakud. Ma d wid i t-iḥemmlen ed wid yessnen azal-is i tezlit tazwawt, ed tmaziɣt s umata, zgan fell-as d asteqsi ɣef wamek tella liḥala-s, d assirem akken ad yeḥlu s tazzla ad yuɣal ad yeddem adinan-is, ad yesbeɛẓeq taɣect-is. S tujit-ik a win yesqerdicen awal!

<p style="text-align: right;"> M.X 

  
 Taddart n Hagui I d-yezgan tama n ugafa n Leɛǧiba tesfayda-d s yiwen n usenfar ara yessuzfen fell-as lḥif n lixsas n trisiti ama deg unebdu neɣ deg tegrest. Tamnaḍt-a, d tin yettwasnen s wakal n tfellaḥt d tin yeḥwaǧen trisiti s waṭas iwakken ad izmiren yimezdaɣ-is ad ssiwḍen aman ɣer tebḥirin-nsen. Di tazwara, taddart-a turez kan ɣer yiwet n tama I d-yettawin trisiti, maca zgan yimezdaɣ-is ccektayen s lixsas d uneqḍeɛ n tafat yal tikkelt. D ayen yeǧǧan imḍebbren terza taluft ad snernin I usenfar yellan iwakken ad ssixfen taɛkemt. D acu kan, segmi akka I d-yusa usenfar n lemɛawna deg lebni, aṭas n yimezdaɣ gar-asen ilmeẓyen s ṭṭaqa, fursen tagnit iwakken ad bnun. Aṭas n yixxamen I yettwasbedden, meɛna xas asiweḍ n waman ur yelli ara d aɣbel, maca trisiti d tin I ten-yeǧǧan gguman ad zedɣen imi d ayen iwumi ur zmiren ara ad d-ssiwḍen s tedrimt-nsen. Ihi, s lferḥ d ameqran I mmugren ussan-a beddu n lecɣal n usiweḍ n trisiti ɣer yal axxam. Si tama-nsen, imezdaɣ ssasehlen timsal I tkebbanit ur d-nmuger ara iɣeblan n uɛeddi di tferkiwin. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail. M  

  
 Tayerza id -yewwin aneɣlaf n daxel mass nureddin bedwi ɣer lwilaya n tubiret iberḥed akken imdanen ad uɣalen ad d-sufuɣen nkawi si tɣiwanin ideg ttidiren ,am wakken id-iwekked ilaq ɣef yemdanen ad ṭṭfen deg wallalen tatiknulujit akked usnerni-is akken ad tilli tedbelt teqreb ɣer yemdanen ,ilmend n tyerza-a ibed uneɣlaf ɣef waṭas iṣenfaren icudden ɣer tedbelt imi iswi n lḥukuma d asnerni n tedbelt di yal taɣult id-yesufuɣen lekwaɣeḍ i yemdanen ,anda id-ibegen si tɣiwant lexḍariya ara yebdun ad d-sufuɣen lekwaɣed n tmagit yemgaraden am nekwa ,Si tama nniḍen iwellah ixeddamen n tɣiwanin akken ad ṭṭfen di tiknulujit tamaynut iwakken ad xeddmen di tegnatin igerrzen ,Rnu s annect-a ad tifsis teɛkumt ɣef yemdanen imi rwan lmeḥna deg usufaɣ lekwaɣeḍ , yerra yefka ttiɛad i tɣiwanin nniḍen akken ad bdunt deg uṣenfar-a deg ayyur n yennayer 2016 ,Si tama nniḍen yessutur nurredin bedwi seg yimḍebren n lwilaya ama d lwali neɣ d iselwayen n tɣiwanin s usejhed lxeddma akken ad yenerni uḥric n tdamsa aɣenaw imi yessaram d lwilaya n tubiret ara yuɣalen d aḥric ameqqran di tdamsa ma yella fkan ljehd nsen deg uxeddim s yiṣenfaren unegmu iwakken ad ternu deg ugemuḍ n tdamsa lezzayer ladɣa di tallit-agi ideg nella , Nureddin bedwi i kemmel tayerza-nes ɣer tɣiwant leṣnam anda yefka ttiɛd ad bnun anda ara ttheggin srabes uselek imi yettuneḥsab d amezwaru di tefriqt d wis kraḍ deg umaḍal , yerza daɣen ɣer waṭas n temnaḍin s usefqed n yiṣenfaren anda iwḍen am tɣiwant n beclul akked ladayra n Ain bessam timaynutin maca yerra lwelha- nes ɣer liḥala n tedbelt , s yin yuɣal ɣer tmanaɣt n lwilaya yeldi yiwen wannar n dabax i lfayda ilmeẓyen n tubiret . 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas Abdelhak 

  
 D acu yettwaqaddren ɣer yiqbayliyen nnig tala-nsen, tala ansi i d-ttagmen aman i tudert-nsen? Ihi, i wakken ad rren imezdaɣ n taddart n Tala Athmane tajmilt i ucennay ameqqran Matoub Lounes, kkren bnan-as tala deg yiwen urti n lqahwa u semman-as ‘’Tala n Matoub’’. S leqdic am wa, bɣan ad d-beggnen d akken Matoub d tala, d aɣbalu ansi i d-ttagmen medden timussniwin, d tala anda i tekksen yilmeẓyen acayaḍ i tayri-nsen, d aɣbalu ansi i d-ttliqqimen imeɣnasen amennuɣ-nsen. Matoub d tudert s timmad-is. Akken i as-yenna deg wawal-is ‘’Xas neqqḍen acḥal d itri, igenni ur negger ara’’. Akka,ihi, xas akken nɣan-t ’’yiɛdawen n tudert’’ deg Tala Bounane, ilul-d deg Tala Athmane. Ilul-d i lebda : tasuta teǧǧa-t i tayeḍ imi tura ur yezmir yiwen ad t-ineɣ. Yak qqaren Wat zik ‘’Win yebɣan ad yidir, yemmet !’’ S ufella n tala-a, reṣsant tlata n tugniwin n Lwennas : ansi i as-d-tekkiḍ, ad tent-id-twaliḍ neɣ ɛad d netta ara ak-id-iwalin. S ddaw n yal tugna, yella wanay amazigh (drapeau) anda yura ‘’Ṭṭef deg tjaddit, mmeslay taqbaylit’’. Ass-nni n 24 deg yunyu, ɣef 12 n yiḍ, i d-yella uskan n tugniwin-a s wudem unṣib sdat n yimezdaɣ n Tala Athmane i d-yusan s waṭas i wakken ad ttekkin, ula d nutni, deg tejmilt i as-yuɣal i Le Rebbelle. Amek ur ḥeddren ara, nutni i igan tikli deg useggas n 1994 si Tala Athmane armi d Tizi uzzu i wakken ad ḍelben s userreḥ n Matoub asmi i t-ṭṭfen yirebraben ?. ‘’Ayen i as-nexdem, drus. Yuklal ugar n waya. Yefka tudert-is i tmaziɣt d tugdut.’’ I aɣ-d-yenna Ferhat, mmi-s n bab n lqahwa anda i d-tella tala-agi. Ma d Nadir, ikemmel yenna-d : ’’ayen yelhan, d akken ilmeẓyen akk ḥemmlen Matoub xas akken ur t-ssinen ara. Yella usirem, akken i as-icaṛ’’

  Ihi, ‘’win i as-yennan lexla yexla, i yexlan siwa netta’’.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M  

  
 Yuɣal leqdic-a, d tannumi i Tdukkla Tanaddalt Ijermunen n Xerraṭa imi yal ayyur n mayyu i d-yesmektayen tidyanin i texdem Fransa deg temnaḍt-nni, lwaḥi d Seṭṭif d Galma, ass n 8 mayyu 1945, ad d-theyyi amaraṭun ameẓyan. I lmend n usfuggel dɣa n ttiɛad-a amazray d uttreḥḥem ɣef yimeɣrasen i yeɣlin, thegga-d am yal aseggas yiwen n umaraṭun amecṭuḥ i yilemẓiyen inaddalen n tama n Xerraṭa d twilayin i tt-iqerben, deg teẓrigt tis ukuẓ. Ddeqs n yilemẓiyen i d-yerran i tiɣri, tazwara n ddurt iɛeddan, anida uzzlen ugar n 11 n yikilumiṭren seg teswiɛin timezwura n tsebḥit. Deg waya, azal n 115 n yinaddalen i yellan di ttiɛad i lmend n teẓrigt-a tis ukuẓ i yiwet n tazzla iweɛren ma nwala lḥala n yiberdan n udrar. Yewwi-d ad d-nerr awellih belli limmer mačči d afus n tallelt n kra n yimezdaɣ n Xerraṭa akked yimeddukkal n tdukkla, ur yeččaray ara, usihar-a, tiṭ n kra n win yekkin deg-s.

  M. K. 

  
 Snat n ssmant kan i iɛeddan ɣef tuɣalin n yinelmaden s iɣerbazen-nsen, i d-yellan ass-nni n larebɛa 06 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, ha-ten-in bdan ama d inelmaden neɣ d imawlan-sen, la cetkayen ɣef waṭas n yiɣeblan.

 Ddeqs n yiɣerbazen i iḥebsen ɣef leqraya, llan kra imi ugin yinelmaden yeqqaren deg kra n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen d tesnawiyin yellan deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ad lemden deg yir tignatin n ulmad, llan wiyaḍ d imawlan n yinelmaden yeqqaren deg yiɣerbazen imenza i yugin i warraw-nsen ad kecmen ɣer tzeɣwa n tɣuri. Deg tuget kan, mačči d uguren imaynuten deg unnar n uselmed. Gar wuguren iwumi ssuturen tifrat-nsen yinelmaden d yimawlan-nsen, ad naf deg tazwara d ugur n ttawilat n usiweḍ n yinelmaden ɣer yiɣerbazen-nsen. Aɣbel wis sin iɣef ttcetkin, d win n usečči n yinelmaden deg tnawalin tiɣurbizin (cantiens scolaires). Ad d-nebder kra n yiɣerbazen i iḥebsen ɣef uselmed deg wussan-agi iɛeddan: aɣerbaz alemmas “Metrek Aomar” n Tizi Rached, tasnawit “frére Ait Betta” n Timizart, aɣerbaz amenzu akked uɣerbaz alemmas yellan deg Timizart Loghbar, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu. Am wakken daɣen i yella wugur yerzan afraq n tallelt-nni n yinelmaden (3000DA), imi ala 50% i ferqen ar tura, mazal azgen n yinelmaden ur wwin ara lḥeqq-nsen. Mebla ma nettu lexṣaṣ n yinemhalen deg yiɣerbazen. Imi 198 n yiɣerbazen imenza, 37 n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen akked 10 n tesnawiyin ur sɛint ara inemhalen unṣiben, dɣa rran deg yimeḍqan-nsen iselmaden iqdimen neɣ imagazen imatuyen (surveillants généraux). Ula d iselmaden ur ten-zgilen ara yiɣeblan, imi ugur amezwaru i d-ttmaggaren d amḍan meqqren n yinelmaden deg tneɣriyin. Yella wanida yewweḍ leḥsab n yinelmaden 40 deg yiwet n tneɣrit, ladɣa deg yiseggasen imezwura n uswir amenzu. Ugur wis sin, d win n lexsas n yidlisen deg yiɣerbazen, imi aql-aɣ deg ddurt tis kraḍ, mazal iɣerbazen ur nesɛi ara idlisen, ama d wid ara ferqen d afraq, ama i lbiɛ i wid yebɣan ad aɣen d lbiɛ. Am wakken daɣen i llan yiselmaden i ceggɛen ɣer wanda yebɛed lḥal, d ayen i yeǧǧan tuget deg-sen ad beddlen amkan-nni i d asen-fkan tikkelt tamezwarut. Uguren i d-mmugren yiɣerbazen n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu,mmugren-ten ula d lwilayat n Bgayet akked Tubiret.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 I lmend n tirza tadelsant s yisem Aẓeffun agerruj n tmusni i d-yellan seg wass-nni 30 cutember ar umenzu n tuber 2016, agraw n yinelmaden n uɣerbaz Lɛerbi At Ɛmer d wid n tesnawit Si Lḥasen Utaleb n At Yanni , rzan ɣer Uẓeffun anda rran tajmilt i Tahar Ǧaɛuṭ d Mḥemmed Isyaxem.

 Di tazwara, uɣen ameccaq ɣer taddart n Tbuduct, anida i sen-d-telli tiddukla tadelsant i irefeden isem «Mḥemmed Isyaxem» tiwwura-s s lferḥ d uɛuzzu. Mḥemmed isyaxem d argaz n yidles, yufrar-d s taklut-is d cbaḥa n tfelwin-is. Akka i tettunefk tegnitt ad zṛen axxam-is, maca sḥasfen aṭas yinelmaden imi t-in-ufan yeɣli, yuɣal d idɣaɣen.

 Dina, i d-tusa tikti i yinelmaden-nni, ad ssunɣen axxam-nni yeɣlin, ara yilin d azamul n usḥissef-nsen. Deg usunneɣ-agi, ad ten-iɛiwen unaẓur n teklut mass Ǧamal Sennan.

 Syin, uɣen abrid ɣer taddart n At Ṛhuna, din zran-d lemqam yebnan s uẓru. Ayen yessewhamen aṭas, d amek mbabben iẓra nni, wa ɣef wa.

 Azekka nni, uɣalen ɣer Ulxu, taddart n Tahar Ǧaɛut. Rzan ɣef uẓekka-s, yerna glan taḍbiqt n rxam i ɣef uran awal n uneɣmas n tidet «Ma tessusmeḍ ad temteḍ, ma temeslayeḍ-d ad temteḍ, Ihi… Ini-d temteḍ», i wakken ad yeḍbeɛ wawal-is deg wallaɣen d wulawen am wakken yeḍbeɛ ɣef teḍbiqt-nni n rxam. 

 Syin, kemmlen tirza-nsen ɣer taddart n yinaẓuren Saɛid d Muḥemmed Ḥilmi. taddart-agi-nsen, tettwassen s yexriben i d-yeqqimen si tallit-nni n Ṛuman. Akka i yekfa yinig n yinelmaden n At-Yanni ɣer lɛerc n Uẓeffun, d asmekti i yinaẓuren d yimusnawen n tmaziɣt, d timlilit d umezruy-nsen amaziɣ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mekioussa Boumendil 

  
 Ighil Ali, d taddart deg Wat Ɛebbas ɣer tama n unẓul n Summam deg lwilaya n Bgayet. Syin ɣer da, tuɣal d taɣiwant n 13 tudrin. Ighil Ali yeqqen yisem-is ɣer twacult Amrouche (Taos d El Mouhoub) mebla ma nettu yemma-tsen Fadhma Ath Mansour. Deg tazwara, nebda tirza ɣer taddart n yemma-s n Fadhma Ath Mansour, Aïni, deg taddart Taourirt Moussa Ouamar, syin nkemmel ɣer taddart n Fadhma Ath Mansour, Tizi Hibel. Deg taggara, neggra-d deg taddart uɣur i d-tezweǧ, Ighil Ali. Zik, imezdaɣ n Ighil Ali, ttidiren am teɣrast n tzizwa : yal adwar s umahil-is. Akka ara naf, amekkan n yigezzaren, wayeḍ i yixerrazen, iḥeddaden…atg. Seg wakken teǧǧhed tdamsa-nsen, uɣalen snuzun leslaḥ i Ahmed Dey ɣer Qsenṭina.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Takerḍa n taddart 

 Zedɣen deg taddart azal n 7000 n yimdanen. Gar wid yellan deg teqdimt akked tejdidt imi i d-tettuxleq taddart-nniḍen. Ɛlayet ɣef lebḥar s wazal n 680 n lmitrat. Zint-as-d tudrin-a : seg usamar, ad naf Aït Sraj ; seg umalu, Azrou ; seg ugafa, Tiniri, ma seg unẓul, Tabouanant. Ixxamen n taddart, cuban ɣer wid n Casbah. Bnan s uẓru. Tiwwura-nsen n usɣar ur nrekku imi yesɛa daxel-is qeḍran. Ttemcabin gar-asen am wakken d yiwen i ten-yebna. Daxel ad naf asqif, afrag, axxam ameqqran, lḥara, tiseddarin yettawin ɣer tɣurfatin…atg. Neṭṭḍen yixxamen akken llan. Zyada ɣef lḥiḍ yebnan s uẓru i icerken axxam d wayeḍ, ad naf lḥiḍ n ukerṭun. Ha-t-an wayen i aɣ-d-yenna fell-as Messaoud Amrouche : ‘’zik, tettili tukerḍa. Ẓeddmen-d Iḥǧarsiyen ɣef taddart, deg yiḍ. Ihi, i wakken ad ten-qablen yimezdaɣ akken ma llan, xedmen lḥiḍ n ukerṭun gar uxxam d wayeḍ. Akken kan ara isel neɣ iwala yiwen umezdaɣ aḥǧarsi i d-yusan ad yaker, ad yesqerbeb deg lḥiḍ-nni n ukerṭun i lǧar-is. Syin ad tekker akk taddart ɣur-sen’’. Tella tɛessast deg yal tama n taddart : ansi i as-d-tekkiḍ, ad ak-id-tmager yiwet. Taddart tettwaɛus seg yal tama. Tesɛa aɣerbaz deg useggas n 1914. Am wakken i d-yella, zik, ciṭ n umqelleɛ gar yimasiḥiyen n yimṛabḍen n yiṛumyen akked yinselmen n tiddukla n Ɛulama n Ben Badis.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Isem Ighil Ali 

 Isem-agi ur d-yekki ara seg yisem Ɛli, acu kan yekka-d seg wawal ɛlay. Imi iɣil-nni d aɛlayan, dɣa, qqaren-as ‘’Iɣil Ɛlayen’’, syin yeqqel ‘’Iɣil Ali’’. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Amezruy d tmetti Tadamsa, zik-nni 

  Zik, ttidiren yimezdaɣ n taddart am tzizwa deg teɣrest. Yal wa s umahil-is, yal tiɣmert neɣ amekkan s tẓuri-ines. Tella tdamsa teǧǧuǧeg dayen kan. Wwḍen armi ula d Dey Ahmed n Qṣenṭina, seg taddart-a i yettaɣ leslaḥ-is. Teẓḍa tẓuri d azrar, yal ta ɣer tama n tayeḍ : tama n tgezzart, tama i usebbaḍ d uxerraz, tayeḍ i uglim d tbardiwin, lfeṭṭa, syin usran, leslaḥ d yiḥeddaden, awi-tt akken alamma d tafellaḥt anda ara naf zzit, tazart, lluz d wayen-nniḍen…atg. Llan, diɣ, mechurit s yisebbaḍen-nsen, ttilin deg yal taḥanut n Lezzayer, Qṣenṭina d Wehran. Aṭas i yettruḥun ɣer din, zik, i wakken ad d-lemden lḥirfa-agi n lfeṭṭa. Ttruḥun seg yal tama n tmurt n leqbayel, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan. Yetteli ssuq ɣef teɣzi n 3 wussan. Acu kan deg taggara-a, kra din iruḥ, lamana tewweḍ bab-is. Meɛna xas akken truḥ tẓuri-agi, mazal ṭṭfen deg kra n leɛwayed n tjadit.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Asfugel deg wass n lmulud 

 Ar ass-a, yettili-d usfugel n lmulud d igrawen deg taddart. Yal mi ara d-yaweḍ, ttenfɣent-d tlawin, deg yiḍ, ɣer tejmaɛt. ‘’Deg wass n lmulud, ttruḥunt-d tlawin, deg yiḍ, ɣer tejmaɛt xeddment tameɣra gar-asent : tteqnent lḥenni, ssaɣayent ticemmaɛin u ttqessirent gar-asent. Am wakken d zzerda. Ttɣemint seg tesɛa alamma d ttnac n yiḍ nutenti d asfugel’’. I aɣ-d-yenna Mass Djaâfi. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Amagger n tefsut 

 Yal amenzu n tefsut, ad ruḥen yimezdaɣ n taddart ɣer umekkan iwumi qqaren Lexyar i wakken ad maggren tafsut, ladɣa tilawin. Ttawint yid-sent ameqqful, timellalin akked yisufar-nniḍen. D taswiɛt anda ttemlilin yimezdaɣ n taddart gar-asen. Xeddment tlawin tameɣra : ttcewwiqent u kkatent abendayer. Akka ara sɛeddin ass s unecraḥ, s lferḥ akked usirem ɣer wayen yelhan ɣer sdat. ‘’Aya, iẓeṭṭ assaɣen iǧehden gar yimezdaɣ, yettṛeṣṣi leɛwayed n lejdud ɣer tsuta’’. I d-yenna yiwen umezdaɣ.

  Dɣa, din din asefru sɣur yiwen unelmad amecṭuḥ, Amin Djaâfi :  

 Yexlef-d uẓar,

 Yewwi-d isegmi.

 Yefka-d lḥebb d amellal,

 Yis-s i ferḥen lɣaci.

 Tamaziɣt yellan tgen,

 Ass-agi, ncallah tugi

 Asefru i as-yesselmed jeddi-s i yellan d amedyaz.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Nger n Wat Ɛebla 

 Zik, tella At Ɛebla d taddart uqbel ad tenger. Ula d kra n yimezdaɣ n Ighil Ali, nnan-d kkan-d syin, rewlen-d i twaɣit-nni. Ha-tt-an tedyant. Llan sin watmaten myekrahen deg taddart-agi n Wat Ɛebla. Yiwen yesɛa aṭas n yidrimen, wayeḍ ḥemmlent yimezdaɣ-nni u ttaken-as tayet deg yal taswiɛt. Gma-s-nni d aḥeqqar u yettasem deg-s. Ihi, yekker gma-s-agi yesɛan tadrimt, yesɣam-d i taddart : ixelles iḥǧarsiyen i wakken ad snegren imezdaɣ-is. Yeḍra wayen yeḍran. S wakka i tenger taddart : amur ameqqran yemmut, ma d kra rewlen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Lbaṭel n tɛeccact 

 Tella yiwet n tama qqaren-as taɛeccact. D tama anda sewwayen afexxar u yettili deg-s ssuq. Ihi, yal mi ara d-awḍen yigezzaren ɣer din, ad ɛelqen iɛejmiyen-nsen ɣef tuyat n yimezdaɣ-nni i wakken ad ten-azun. Akken, akken armi i asen-tuɣal d lɛada. Seg wakken llan deg drus yid-sen, ur zmiren ara ad kksen ddel ɣef yiman-nsen. Armi d asmi i d-yekker yiwen qqaren Salem Saâdoun i yellan anect-ila-t yerra-asen tabɣest u iɛawen-iten rran-d iseɣ i yiman-nsen. Syin tṛeṣṣa tenfalit-a ‘’Lbaṭel n Tɛeccact, neɣ lbaṭel n Wat Ɛeccac’’.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Timeqqbert n waɛraben 

 Zik, zgan Iḥǧarsiyen d tukerḍa deg taddart n Ighil Ali. Skerhen tudert n yimezdaɣ. Ihi, yiwet n tikkelt udin-asen taxezzabit i wakken ad ten-snegren. Kkren yimezdaɣ n taddart-a, gan iqiḍunen berra n taddart u suffɣen awal ɣer yiḥǧarsen d akken guǧǧen ɣur-sen. Asmi i d-ussan yimettakren-a, wwḍen ɣer dinna, meḥsub ɣer yiqiḍunen, ufan At taddart la ten-ttraǧun. Ass-nni, d ass-nsen aneggaru : snegren-ten akken ma llan. Meḍlen-ten din u semman i umekkan-nni ‘’Timeqqbert n waɛraben’’.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Axxam n twacult Amrouche 

 Ayen yeḍran d uxxam n tnezduɣt n twacult Amrouche, d tawaɣit i tent-yugaren akk. Amek axxam i ilaqen ad yuɣal d asalay ara yeqqimen d later n yimdanen yecba wigi, yuɣal d tanezduɣt i yiwen umdan i t-yeṭṭfen s ẓẓur u yettɛawad deg-s ? Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna uselway n Tiddukla Taos Amrouche, Mass Messaoud Amrouche. ‘’Asmi i d-tusa Taos Amrouche ɣer Ighil Ali, tenna-d s yimeṭṭawen :’’asirem-iw, d akken axxam-nneɣ ad d-yuɣal u ad t-nefk i taddart i wakken ad t-terr d asalay neɣ d axxam anda ara ḥefḍent teḥdayin lḥirfat’’. Ikemmel uselway n tiddukla deg wawal-is. 

 Achal-aya ara kkaten yimḍebbren n Tiddukla Taos Amrouche i wakken ad d-rren axxam-a i yimawlan-is, yerna tanezduɣt-a tesɛa lkaɣeḍ n ttbut i d-yeffɣen deg 06/07/1923 meɛna winna i t-yeṭṭfen yugi ad yeffeɣ seg-s. Deg taggara-agi, yella-d lexbar yessefraḥen ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Messaoud Amrouche, acu kan yugi ad aɣ-d-yini d acu-t. ‘’Ad t-id-nini deg lawan-is mi ara netḥeqqeq seg-s’’. I d-yenna. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ciṭ deg tudert n El Mouhoub Amrouche 

 Ilul Jean-El Mouhoub Amrouche deg useggas n 1906 deg Ighil Ali. Iruḥ akked twacult-is ɣer Tunes deg useggas 1910. Yella d aselmad. Yexdem deg radyu anda yella mechur s yidiwenniyen-is. Yuɣal d aselway n tesɣunt ‘’L’Arche’’. Yella deg lgirra-nni i lmendad gar FLN akked De Gaulle. Yura aɣmis seg 1928 armi 1961 i d-tessufeɣ Tassadit Yacine. Gar tanfaliyin-is mechuren, ad d-nader : ‘’Ttxemmimeɣ u ttaruɣ s trumit, meɛna ttruɣ s teqbaylit’’. Tayeḍ ‘’La France est l’esprit de mon âme, la Kabylie est l’âme de mon esprit’’.

<p style="text-align: center;">Ciṭ deg tudert n Taos Amrouche

 Tlul Marie Louise Taos Amrouche ass n 04/03/1913 deg tmurt n Tunes. Temmut ass n 02/04/1976 deg tmurt n Fransa. D tanaẓurt : tcennu, tettaru. Tewwi arraz n ccna n tefriqt deg Dakar deg useggas n 1966. Ma deg Lezzayer ugin-as ad tettekki deg tfaska-nni, meɛna tusa-d u tecna deg tesdawit. Tella deg ugraw n yimaziɣen (Académie berbère) deg Fransa.

  Ayen tura 

 – Jacinthe noire, 1947.

 – Le Grain magique, 1966.

 – Rue des tambourins, 1969.

 – L’amant imaginaire, 1975.

 -Solitude ma mère, roman posthume, 1995.

  Ayen tecna 

 -Chants berbères de Kabylie, 1967.

 -Chants de processions, 1967.

 -Chants de l’Atlas, 1971.

 -Chants espagnols de la Alberca, 1972.

 -Incontations, méditations et danses sacrées berbères, 1974.

 -Chants berbères de la meule et du berceau, 1975.

 Deg taggara, ad snemreɣ tawacult Djaâfi s umeqqran d umecṭuḥ, aselway n Tiddukla Taos Amrouche, Messaoud Amrouche, Youcef Oukidja, Merzouk Boumala d Nacer Oukacha. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M  

  
 Ddurt-agi yezrin, Massa Nouria Benghebrit, taneγlaft n usegmi aγelnaw, texdem-d tirza γer lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i d-iḥaren amḍiq amezwaru i tekkelt tis 08 deg yikayaden n 03 yiswiren yemgaraden, 5 eme B.E.M d BAC anda i tessefqed γer deqs n yiγerbazen d isenfaren icudden γer uḥric n usegmi. Syin, teḥder i tmeγra meqqren i d-yettwahegan deg uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yasin n temdint n Tizi-Uzzu γef demma n yinelmaden i d-yufraren s yigemmaḍ yelhan di 03 n yikayaden n yiswiren yemgaraden 05 eme, BEM d BAC. Massa Nouria Benghebrit, terra tajmilt meqqren i yinelmaden yesεan talemmast n nnig n 18/20, anda i t-sseḥṛes akken ad xedmen igemmaḍ yelhan deg umecwar-nsen n leqraya imi tussna d tisura n tudert swayes i salayen lebni n tmura i teddun γer zdat u deg ubrid n unegmu. Syin, terra tajmilt i yimawlan n yinelmaden, iselmaden d imaswaḍen d twacult n ttrebga sumata i ibedden γer yidis n yinelmaden γef teγzi n yiseggasen. Imi igemmaḍ-agi, ussan-d s tebγest d laεtab n yal yiwen. Syin, tewwet-d s leqsaḥ γef wid yebγan ad hudden aḥric n ttrebga seg yiẓuran, wid i d-yessufγen isebtaren n ukayad n BAC imi imdanen-agi, cuban irebraben yebγan ad hudden tamurt, ɣef wakken i d-tenna tneɣlaft n ttrebga. Maca, Massa Nouria Benghebrit, muḥal teqbel tikkerkas, muḥal tebra i tella s sdat n yimesḥaf-agi, tquzzem-iten, tqubel-iten s lqed d tebγest. Syin, tefkka-d yiwet n tunḍict yelhan, anda i d-wekked d akken aselmed n tutlayt n tmaziγt ad tihriw deg unekcum aγurbiz 2016 / 2017 anda ara tennal 32 n lwilayat. Xas akken ur d-yettili ara uselmed deg merra n yiγarbazen n lwilayat-agi, maca ad fken akk ttawilat d walllalen i usnarni d uselmed n tutlayt n tmaziγt. Wagi d asurif meqqren I tgger tneγlaft n usegmi aγelnaw n tmurt n Lezzayer i usnerni n uswir.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Zik-nni, llan sin n watmaten; yiwen yesɛa zzher seg wasmi yella d llufan, anda i tt-iger ad temɣi, ayen yennul ad yerbeḥ. Ma d wayeḍ dayen-nniḍen, iḥesseb tiram, lxedma ur yeǧǧi ara, maca ulac ṣṣaba. Amezwaru-nni, a bab n tegnewt a lmelk! D anesbaɣur; tawacult-is tečča teṛwa, tessager; ddunit-is akk d talwit akked lehna, yerna d netta i yewwin akk akal i d-yeǧǧa baba-s. Ma d gma-s, yectaq lqut; ula d arraw-is ur setten alamma kksen laẓ, ur ttlusun ad ɣelben asemmiḍ imi d igellilen. Yiwen n wass, ha-t-an tewweḍ-d lɛid, yal yiwen amek i as-yettheggi akken ad ferḥen yiqrar. Ma d netta d tawacult-is, ttṛaǧun anwi ara yesɛun tasa ad d-yiḥnin fell-asen, ulac. Kkren medden, ṭṭfen gma-s-nni amerkanti ur neẓri d acu yesɛa, nnan-as: “Ilaq ad tɛiwneḍ gma-k acku yeṛwa lḥif am netta am warraw-is!” Iɛedda, mi yewweḍ s axxam, yenna-as i tqeddact-is: “Ruḥ! Awi-as aqelwac-agi i Meqber-mensi!” Nettat tɣil ad t-tawi ɣer tmeqbert, texdem akken; teqqen-it s ufella n yiẓekwan, tuɣal-d. Mi d-yewweḍ yiḍ, ččan-t akk wuccanen. Azekka-nni, steqsan-t medden ma yefka-as kra i gma-s neɣ d lxir kan, yerra-asen: “Iḍelli, i d as-fkiɣ aqelwac”. Uɣalen nudan ɣef yigellil-nni, ma yella d tidet yefka-as aqelwac-agi neɣ d lekdeb, yerra-asen-d: “Ay atmaten! Ulac d acu i yi-d-yefka!” Wehmen lɣaci-nni. Mi d-yuɣal unesbaɣur s axxam-is, yenna i txeddamt-is:“Anda tewwiḍ ayen i am-fkiɣ, iḍelli?” Terra-as-d: “Tenniḍ-iyi, awi-t i Meqber-mensi, wwiɣ-t ɣer tmeqbert!” Imi yeḥseb gma-s d Meqber-mensi, suffɣen-t At-taddart si lufeq. Ɣer taggara, kksen-as-d akal i d as-yekkes i gma-s-nni, yuɣal ixeddem tafellaḥt s lferḥ d tebɣest.Yerfed-it Ṛebbi, kfan fell-as yir wussan, am netta am twacult-is.

  Benmouhoub Houria 

  
 Taddart n Igounane Ameur, d yiwet seg 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i d-yezgan deg ugafa n tɣiwant-agi u deg ugafa n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tebԑed ɣef temdint-a azal n 10 km. Taddart-agi, mazal ar ass-a n wussan tettidir lexsas d ameqqran deg yiḥricen d yisenfaren yemgarden n tudert tartar, gar-asen: ttawil n Internet, lgaz n temdint, yir liḥala n yiberdan, asezdeg n twennaḍt, imḍiqen i yilmeẓyen d uɣbel n waman n tissit…Ssuturen imezdaɣ n taddart-agi n Igounane Ameur deg yimḍebbren teεna temsalt, ama d wid n usqamu aɣerfan (APC) n Ait Aissa Mimoun ama d wid n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i wakken ad d-rren lwelha-nsen ɣer taddart-agi yenḥafen aṭas si yal tama. Menbeεd mi ttidiren akka tura deg tegnatin qessihen. Ma d iɣeblan i d-ttmagaren yal ass, ad naf deg tazwara aɣbel n waman n tissit, imi ufan-d iman-nsen ttnadin ɣef tiqit n waman anida ara tt-id-awin. Acku ttɣaman laqdɣa deg unebdu azal n 7 ar 10 n wussan i wakken ad d-uɣalen waman yiwen ubrid. Cetkayen daɣen, ɣef uεeṭṭel n uṣiweḍ n lgaz n temdint s ixxamen-nsen imi ṛwan lḥif ladɣa deg tesmehuyt n tegrest, neɣ deg ussan n ccetwa, imi acḥal n tikkal i leḥḥun d likumiṭer i wakken ad d-awin taqqerԑat n lgaz, uɣur ara sewwen neɣ uɣur ara seḥmun. D ayen i ten-yeğğan ad d-gren tiɣri yerna ad ssutren deg wid teԑna temsalt, gar-asen: imeḍbbren n tɣiwant Ait Aissa Mimoun, d Tanmehla n Imuhal Izuyaz, i wakken ad yefru wugura-a deg wussan i d-iteddun. Aɣbel wis ukuẓ, d win n yiberdan imi aṭas n yiberdan yellan deg taddart-agi, ha-ten-in deg yir liḥala, yecban abrid ameqqran yeqqnen gar-as d Ighil Bouchene rnu ɣer-s abrid yellan daxel n taddart. Aḥric n tedwest d ṣṣeḥa, yenxas ugar n yiḥricen-nniḍen, imi zik yella yiwen n uxxam n tujjya d amecṭuḥ acu kan yeɣleq achal-agi, ssebba imi ur yesԑi ara aṭas n ttawilat n udawi. Mebla ma nettu ugur n Internet, i mazal ur yefri ara. Ma yebɣa yiwen ad yazen neɣ ad d-yawi kra seg Internet, ilaq fell-as ad yerzu alamma d tamdint n Tizi Uzzu. D annect-agi akk n yiɣeblan I yerran tudert n twaculin n taddart n Igounane Ameur, ttidirent deg lḥif d lmeḥna, ɣef waya ssuturent deg yimḍebbren ad d-lhin deg wuguren iceɣben allaɣ-nsen u ad d-afen tifrat i yiɣeblan s tazzla.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdel Ghani 

<div> 
  
 Ass-agi ufiɣ-d imdanen yeffɣ-iten laɛqel ɣef yiyuzaḍ, yal yiwen yeččur-d ifassen-is, a bu sin a bu tlata.

 Wissen d acu i yeḍran akka ? waqila d ass agerɣlan n yiyuzaḍ, neɣ ahat d tafaska n yiyuzaḍ ? 

 Yennayer akked taɛacurt mazal d wwiḍen, tafsut tɛedda ! D aḥeggan, ur zellun ara deg-s iyuzaḍ. 

 Nniɣ-as ad ɛeddiɣ ad steqsiɣ lɣaci ayen akka d ttaɣen iyuzaḍ s tuget :

 -A winnat, ayen akka id uɣeḍ ayaziḍ ?

 -Walaɣ medden akk ttaɣen-d, ula d nekk uɣaɣ-d.

 Zzin ɣer wayeḍ nniɣa-as :

 – A winnat, ayen akka id uɣeḍ ayaziḍ ?

 -Yeffeɣ-d yiwen weqjun deg uqelmun, yenna-d : «Win ur d-nuɣ ara ayaziḍ, ad yemmet d amcum.

 Lɣaci ttamnen s menwala, tt-babban tuggdi ɣef yeɛrar-nsen. Lɣaci yebḍa ɣef 3 yeḥricen. Llan aga dur nettxemmim ara, am umedya n umezwaru-nni, ɣur-s tiɣawsiwin ttɣimant akken llant, ur tt-beddilent ara udem. Llan at wallaɣen yeḥfan am umedya n wis sin-nni. Wagi teddun akken ddan waman, ṭṭafaren kan wiyaḍ am iderɣalen, imdanen teddu ɣer zdat nutni ttazzalen ɣer deffir. Llan agad yettxemmimen ttaẓen ɣer sdat, wigi d agad iwumi yeqqar umyaru Taher ǦAƐUṬ «Tawacult yettaẓen ɣer sdat».

 Tedduɣ s axxam, nniɣ-as deg wul-iw : «Ḥader kan ahat ula d tameṭṭut-nni-inu teṭṭef-itt tawla-agi n yiyuzaḍ ?. Bḍeɣ s axxam, temmuqel-d s ifassen-iw ilmawen, yenna-iyi-d :

 -Amek akka ! Ur d uɣeḍ ara ayaziḍ ? Akka i t-xedmeḍ yal ass, ur tenḥerwaḍ ara ! i lukan ad nenger ? 

 -Nekk tikelt-a, gulleɣ ad iliɣ d argaz mačči d ayaziḍ, tebra cclaɣem-iw ur t-id uɣeɣ.

 Azekka-nni ruḥeɣ s amahil-iw ar uɣerbaz. Ufiɣ-d deg ubrid imdanen bedden wa deffir wa, yal wa yettraǧu nnuba-s akken ad d-aɣen iyuzaḍ. Walaɣ yiwen irewl-as uyaziḍ iḍfer-it deffir akken ad t-id yeṭṭef dɣa qrib i tenɣa tkarrust, beddeɣ steqsa-ɣ-t, nniɣ-as :

 -Acimi d tuɣeḍ ayazid ?

 -Aɛekkaz yewten taddart, awer yizgel !

 -Wagi d ayaziḍ ineqben taddart. 

 Ay akka d tallit deg-i d negra, amusnaw ur yesɛi azal, yefka-d tamsirt i yemdanen yiwen ur as-yessli. Yeɣli-d yiwen uderwic deg yigenni, yiwen t-iwala, yiwen ur t-yessin, yefka-d tamsirt dɣa imdanen akk ḥessen-as.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Busad Ḥemmar 

  
 Aṭas n wawal i itezzin ussan-a, ladɣa di tfarkiwin n Facebook ɣef ugdal n kra n yiselmaden i inelmaden anekcum ɣer tesmilin imi lbus-nsen mačči d win i teddun akked uṣaḍuf n uɣerbaz akken i ttwalin kra deg-sen. Iselmaden-a, ugin i yinelmaden i ixeddmen kra n umcaḍ i ucekkuḥ-nsen. “Amzun akken mačči ɣer uɣerbaz i teddun” i d-qqaren. D ayen i yeǧǧan iselmaden ur qqbilen ara lecɣal-agi di tesmilin-nsen. Ma yella d imawlan n yinelmaden d wid i yeddan si tama n warraw-nsen imi rran-d ṭṭlem ɣef uselmad di tugnit-a, yufa-d uselmad iman-is la yettemxibbiḍ gar yinelmaden ur nettaɣ ara rray, d imawlan-nsen i sen-ittaken lḥeqq. Qqaren-d d akken iseggasen ttbeddilen ula d iṣuḍaf ilaq ad beddlen i lmend n wayen i d-yettnulfun. Ad nexdem tamawt d akken anect-a yakk sebba-s d ayen i iwumi neqqar s trumit “la mondialisation” i d-tewwi Internet i yeǧǧan inelmaden xeddmen ayen ttwalin ɣer yiwudam imucaɛen ama di lebsa ama deg umeslay , imi inelmaden-a ha-ten-in deg yiwet n tallit n tnuba ( adolescence) xeddmen anect-a akken ad sbeggnen iman-nsen di tmetti ama s wayen yelhan ama s wayen n diri.

  S.Yamani 

  
 Tidukkla tinmettit n yimeɛḍar d yimuḍan idumen «Tiɣri», n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel deg Bgayet, mazal tettkemmil deg leqdicat-ines yelhan i lmendad n tecriḥt n yimuḍan, neɣ n yimeɛḍar, deg temnaḍt-a. Ussan-a kan i iɛeddan dɣa, thegga-d armud-nniḍen i lmend n wass agraɣlan n uḥesses ɣef tdawsa n uqemmuc d tuɣmas. Imi d imi n umdan i d llsas, d amḥaddi ɣef tɛebbuḍt-nneɣ. Deg ttiɛad-a, d tifsarin n tdukkla Tiɣri i d-yettwasersen tazwara. Syin akkin yewwi-d Mass Salamani yiwen n usarag ɣef usentel-a, s yisem-is dɣa d amsujji n tuɣmas deg sbiṭar n Xerraṭa. Kra n lweqt daɣen, yemmug-d usarag-nniḍen sɣur temsujjit n tuɣmas, Massa Cuder. Deg ukemmel n wahil-nni, ḥeḍren wid i teɛna temsalt i uḥanu (atelier) s uzwel: « Aqemmuc adawsan deg yal leɛmer ». Mbeɛd turart n teḥruci d ufraq n kra n tferrawin i yimecṭaḥ i useɛlem ɣef wazal n uqemmuc mi ara yili yezdig, yusa-d lawan n tikci n warrazen i wid irebḥen d kra n dduzan i yimeɛḍar, ladɣa ticeryulin. Afud igerrzen i Tdukkla Tiɣri, nessaram ad tkemmel akka deg ubrid-a aseɛdi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Tezga d tameṭṭut i yettzuxxun s yisem-is d lasel-is. Leqdic-is yesbeggin-d annect-a war ma tenna-t-id s yimi-s. Tagi d Hedjila Mezieche, yelli-s n taddart n Lemsella ukud i d-newwi awal ɣef tekci-s n unqac d talaɣt. Ɣret tadiwennit-a.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Amek i d-tkecfeḍ tikci-inem deg unqac d talaɣt? 

  Hedjila Mezieche:  Talaɣt, ɣur-i ur i yi-d-tusa d tikci. Nekk luleɣ-d di twacult n yinaẓuren, kkreɣ-d di dduḥ n tẓuriwin d yirebbi n yemma. Asmi i d-luleɣ, yemma tessawel-iyi-d asefru s teqbaylit ɣer tmeẓẓuɣt-iw. D iswi-ines i refdeɣ akken ad ssiwdeɣ tiɣri-ines d tẓuri-inu s umata. Asmi sɛiɣ 20 n yiseggasen, lliɣ qeddceɣ deg-s, syin akkin briɣ-as. Akka i d ddunit n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit; ilaq ad telhu d wayen-nniḍen i icudden ɣer tudert-is! Maca, nekk ɣas briɣ i tẓuri, nettat ur i yi-tebri ara. Asmi ssawḍeɣ 40 n yiseggasen, d nettat i d-yuɣalen testeqsa-d fell-i (teḍsa). Akka i d taẓuri, win i tuɣ ur as-tberru ara! Yerna taqbaylit d nettat i iferrnen anwa; ma d tilawin neɣ d irgazen ara tt-irefden. Tiktiwin-inu akk d aḥulfu. Amek zemrent ad ilint d asefru, i zemrent ad ilint d taɣawsa. D taqbaylit i yi-d-yessawlen, ilaq ad as-rreɣ awal s tiktiwin-inu.

  Amek i am-d-ttasent tektiwin i talaɣt? 

 Tiktiwin-inu, cuddent ɣer umennuɣ n tmeṭṭut n yal ass. Yerna ayen akk xedmeɣ s yisem n tmeṭṭut Taqbaylit. Tiktiwin-inu d ayen i yi-izedɣen di temẓi-w d yiḥulfan-iw. D ayen ẓrant wallen-iw iḍerru di tmetti-nneɣ. Ayen i ḥemmleɣ ad t-xedmeɣ, ḥulfaɣ s yiman-iw nniɣ-d cwiṭ seg wayen tettḥulfu tmeṭṭut. Ssarameɣ tiɣri-nes ad d-teffeɣ, acku ẓriɣ aṭas i yellan deg-s d tamussni. Nekk, ul-iw yeččur d asirem. Tiktiwin-inu cuddent ɣer udrar-iw, ɣer taqbaylit-iw, ɣer tira n tmaziɣt d yidles-iw. Ayen akk i icudden ɣer wayen i d-nniɣ d tajmilt i t-walaɣ. Nekk ɣef waya i yi-d-ttasent tektiwin i d-yettawin amaynut s yisem n tẓuri i yettdawin aɣbel akken ad teddu tmetti ɣer sdat .

  Seg yisenfan akk n talaɣt, d anwa i tḍefreḍ kemmini? 

 Nekk ddmeɣ akal d tumlilt, sseqdaceɣ-ten d talaɣt neɣ d tasreɣta (la sculpture). Akal d netta i yi-d-iqesden akken ad yemmeslay yid-i. Nekk ur ɣur-i amzun akken yella kra i yebɣa ad t-id-yini, yerna s teqbaylit. Dɣa yedda-d di lebɣi n yifassen-iw mi ara xeddmeɣ yis-s. Nekk, akal la d-yettmeslay yid-neɣ nuɣ tannumi dakken agdud-nneɣ yemmeslay tutlayt-is, ncudd ɣer ɣur-s. Amahil-inu di tẓuri-a, icudd akk ɣer umennuɣ n yidles neɣ ɣer n yisem n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit iwumi rriɣ tajmilt ɣas akken nebɣu nerra-as tajmilt drus. Amenuɣ-inu, yekkat bac idles-nneɣ, ad d-yeffeɣ gar yiɣerfan, imi d netta i d llsas n tmurt-iw. Yeḥwaǧ-aɣ akken nella, argaz tameṭṭut.

  D anti tiẓuriwin i tḥemmleḍ seg tid yettwassnen deg umaḍal n tẓuri? 

 Yal tameṭṭut taqbaylit s wazal-is. Nekk akken ẓriɣ taẓuri tlul-d ɣrr ɣur-s, imi ulac tameṭṭut ur nɛubbej ara di tẓuri s yisem n wansayen n Yiqbayliyen. Am tid ixeddmen tamedyazt d yisura, neɣ tid ixeddmn aẓeṭṭa, i yesewwayen lqut deg uxxam…atg. Ma yella bedreɣ-d yiwet gar-asent iwumi rriɣ tajmilt, d Haǧira Ubacir swayen i texdem s yisem n teqbayli. Ma yella deg umaḍal s umata, tella yiwet n tmeṭṭut i yettwasnen aṭas deg uḥric-agi n tẓuri s wayen i d-teǧǧa. Tagi d Camille Claudel acku d nettat i yi-d-ijebden aṭas s leqdic-is ɣer wayen xedmeɣ.

  Kunwi s yinaẓuren n ufus, ahat tesɛam tutlayt s wayen i d-txeddmem? 

 Ih, nesɛa tutlayt deg wayen i d-nxeddem. Maca nesseqdac s waṭas tutlayt n usirem imi yal anaẓur yemmeslay-itt, acku llant deg-s tektiwin i d-yeskanayen abrid ɣer sdat. D win i d asirem. Yal tikti d lebḥer n usirem, yerna d tafat n ugdud. Yewɛer lḥal ma yella anaẓur yessusem. D yir aṭṭan ama i tmetti ama i netta d tmurt-nneɣ i yegzem ubrid. Anaẓur yufa-d iman-is weḥd-s. Ɣas yeččur wul-is, ur yezmir i kra, acku akken tebɣu teddu ddunit d awal i t-iɛiwnen ar taggara. Acimi? Acku yessen kan tutlayt n usirem d wid i d-yessemɣayen lebɣi. Ihi nekni ad neqqim d izamulen n tudert zeddigen, yal imɣi ara d-yeǧǧuǧgen deg-s i yella. Tamurt-iw nekk d asirem, tutlayt-iw d asirem. Tudert d asirem, taqbaylit d asirem. D asirem i d ddunit!

  D acu tessarameḍ ad tgeḍ s tikci-a n unqac d talaɣt? 

 Asirem-iw iban. Ssarameɣ kan taẓuri-nneɣ s yisem n teqbaylit ad tennerni, ad d-teffeɣ gar yigduden-nniḍen. Asirem-iw, ad nefk azal i yal anaẓur, imi d netta i d azamul n tayri d tlelli. A win yufan ad as-nexdem akk allalen i wakken ad yaẓ ɣer sdat. Ur ilaq ara ad as-nexdem aḍar deg ubrid-is akken ad yeɣli ɣef uxenfuc. Aql-aɣ lḥasun nessidir asirem bac ad yidir di yal yiwen deg-neɣ.

  Tanemmirt ɣef wayen i d-terriḍ. Yella kra i tebɣiḍ ad d-ternuḍ? 

 Tanemmirt a uletma ɣef yistaqsiyen-im. Ma d nekk ad ǧǧeɣ taẓuri-inu, ad d-tini awal-iw aneggaru, imi d nettat kan ara yerren i yal asteqsi. Tutlayt-iw neɣ taẓuri-inu d tajmilt i yal anaẓur. Taqbaylit d tasarut n tafat, yis-s kan ara nwali tudert-nneɣ ɣer sdat. Tudert i teqbaylit, tudert i yidles , tudert i tmeṭṭut taqbaylit. Acku d nettat i d tayemmat n ddunit.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Testeqsa-tt Kaisa Khalifi 

 
  
 Ddurt iɛeddan i yekcem ucennay ameqqran n teqbaylit, Taleb Tahar, ɣer ṣbiter n Tizi Uzzu, anda i t-mazal ar ass-a. Mebɛed mi yehlek aṭas n ssker acḥal d aseggas-aya, aṭas-a, yessekker-as-d lehlak-nniḍen : lehlak n wallen. Yebda usekkud n ucennay, la ineqqes ciṭ, ciṭ, d ayen i t-yessawḍen ad yekcem ɣer sbiter i wakken ad idawi allen-is. Xas akken lehlak-is mačči d ayen isehlen, meɛna mi yettwali wid i d-yerzan ɣur-s, ittanqas-asen uxemmen. Yenna-as Matoub :’’mi yesla ttewdeɣ, yenna-yi ad ssuɣeɣ, ad ak-d-naɣ leɛmer.’’ Ayen yessewhamen deg unaẓur-a, xas akken yehlek u daxel n sbiter i yella, maca iruḥ s Iɛezzugen yeḥder i tejmilt i as-yuɣalen i ucennay-nniḍen : Arezki Moussaoui. Daymi qqaren : ‘’win yebɣan, yeqqar amek, mačči ulamek !’’ Aya, yerna ccan akked lɛezz ɣer ucennay Taleb Rabah iwumi nessaram asejji s lɛejlan, mazal teḥwaǧ-it Teqbaylit, mazal ad d-yefk i tezlit taqbaylit. Tjmilt tameqqrant i twacult-is i yellan ɣer yides-is acḥal-aya tura, ladɣa tameṭṭut-is i nettaf yal tikkelt ɣer ɣur-s.

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : amek i txemmem ɣer temlilit am ta ? 

  Mass Assad :  nwala lexsas i yellan deg tɣamsa neɣ deg teywalt s umata, ladɣa seg tama-agi n umawal. Ihi, nerra-t d aɣbel seg lǧiha-nneɣ u nenna-as ad d-nheggi tannant i yineɣmasen iqeddcen s tmaziɣt. Am wakken teẓram, zik ttimint-d kan temliliyin i yiselmaden n tmaziɣt. Nger-d tiɣri i yineɣmasen, usan-d azal n 100 deg-sen. Aya, d ayen yessefraḥen. 

  D acu n yiswiyen i tgam i tannant-a ? 

  Mass Assad :   deg tazwara, nebɣa d d-nessemlil ineɣmasen i wakke ad nẓer akk uguren i d-ttmagaren deg lxedma-nnsen, xas ulamma neḥṣa s wugur n umawal akked tenfalit imi daymi i d-nhegga kra n yisental seg tazwara. Syin, nebɣa ad d-nessufeɣ sya ɣer sdat yiwen udlis anda ara ilin azal n 850 d awal s tmaziɣt ara yeḥwiǧ yal aneɣmas deg umahil-is. Iswi-nniḍen, d asileɣ deg tesnarrayt n uheyyi n usali n tukkisin n yiḍrisen n tsekla tazzayrit n tmaziɣt.

  Anwi i d-yellan deg lmendad n tannant-a u amek i d-yella ufran-nsen ? 

  Mass Assad  : nessawel i yisdawanen akked wid iqeddcen deg uḥric-agi n tɣamsa, wid yesɛan, yakan, tirmit tameqqrant. Am wakken i d-nenced ineɣmasen iqdimen n tmazit. 

 Amawal-agi, ad d-yili s xemsa (5) n tmeslayin, meḥsub : taqbaylit, tacawit, tacenwit, tamẓabit akked tergit. 

  Tezmer tmaziɣt-agi ur tt-ifehhem yiwen. Ad tuɣal ‘’D tamaziɣt lfuṣḥa’’. I wacuɣer mačči yal yiwen ad yesneni tameslayt-is ? 

  Mass Assad :  akka tura, yal yiwen ad yexdem s tantala-ines, ad yexdem i yiman-is syin ad nruḥ ɣer usdukkel-nsent s umtawa n yimusnawen. Akka tura, win yekkren kan ad d-yesnulfu awal. Nekni, iswi-nneɣ d akemmel n ubrid i d-yebda Dda Lmulud deg uḥric-agi n umawal…

  Ɣef wanect-a, dɣa, anwi ismawen ara yilin deg tesqamut-agi n yimusnawen ? 

  Mass Assad :  akka tura d tasqamut kan n leɛḍil, yella deg Mass Benkhemou, Mass Bali syin ad d-nessiwel i yimusnawen i teɛna temsalt n yal aḥric.

  Awal n taggara. 

  Mass Assad :  tamaziɣt teḥwaǧ lehna. Teḥwaǧ afus n tallelt n yal yiwen. Tamaziɣt d lebni ameqqran armi d tura i nettaɛraḍ ad as-nesser lsas. Ihi, nebɣa lsas iṣeḥḥan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t Hocine.M  

  
 I tikkelt tamezwarut, ‘’Cicnaq’’ yezzi-d i temnaḍin n Tubiret imerra. Iɣerbazen mmugren amenzu n yennayer akken iwata, yal tama acu i as-thegga. Yella yakan wayen i ten-yezdin, imi taɣlift n usegmi tuzen-d yiwen wahil ara yettwaxedmen, anda ara naf yiwet n temsirt icudden ɣer umezruy n yennayer d wayen i yezzuɣur d idles, d tadamsa, d aseḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt.

 Ihi, am wakken yettuɛeggen, d aɣerbaz alemmas Khales Hammouche n Beclul i yettwafernen i wakken ad tili deg-s tmeɣra s wudem unṣib. Da, ahil i yettwaheggan d amerkanti, imi ccɣel yettwaxdem akken iwata. Timsikkent, tsuma aṭas n yiḥricen ama n yiselsa, n wučči, d wallalen yemxallafen. Inelmaden, tettunefk-asen tegnit I wakken ad gen yiwet n temsizzelt n ddabex n uḍar, tayeḍ ɣef unadi yerzan amezruy n yennayer, tayeḍ-nniḍen ɣef wučči lɛali. Lḥasun, inelmaden imerra lhan-d d uxeddim, almi yuɣal uɣerbaz d annar i temsizla d unadi. Ass dɣa n umenzu n useggas n yimaziɣen, aṭas n yinebgawen i d-yusan. Amenzu, d anemhal n usegmi n Tubiret akked d tmarayt tamatut n tnemehla-agi, imḍebber n tnezzayt n Beclul akked d uselway n tɣiwant-a, amwekkel n yiɣallen n laman, inemhalen n yiɣerbazen-nniḍen d waṭas n yimawlan n warrac. Da, tameɣra temmed, imi aselmad n uẓawan i d-yesbedden yiwet n terbaɛt seg yinelmaden-is, ssedhan mačči d kra widen akk i iḥeḍren s tezlatin yeččuren d lemɛun. D ayen yeǧǧan Mass Mourad Bouziane, anemhal n usegmi ad d-yini:” akka i d asfugel s yennayer, imi nefka tagnit i yinelmaden i wakken ad d-beggnen tizemmar-nsen di yal aḥric.. D tarrayt ara ten-yeǧǧen ad ḥemmlen leqraya, ad walin aɣerbaz s wudem lɛali ad ttḥirin ad d-asen, mačči ad regglen seg-s “. Si tama-s, amaswaḍ n tmaziɣt yewwi-d awal ɣef umezruy n yennayer anda i d-ibeggen iswiyen n usfugel yis-s, anda amager n useggas amaynut ur yettɣimi ara kan deg seksu d uyaziḍ, maca ad truḥ tmuɣli mebɛid ɣer yiḥricen-nniḍen ara yeǧǧen amdan ad yesseḥbiber ɣef umezruy, ɣef tmurt, ɣef twennaḍt d yidles. Tasebḥit n umenzu n yennayer, d tasnawit Mohamed Boudiaf n At Leqser i yeswejden yiwet n tmeɣra s wazal-is, imi inelmaden, iselmaden d yimawlan sdukklen iɣallen-nsen i wakken ad ilin s wudem icebḥen deg usihar-a. Ula deg tama n Ain Bessem, Sour El Ghozlane, yennayer yella deg ttiɛad i wakken tameɣra terza Izzayriyen mačči yiwet n tama kan. Aya, nwala-t deg Tlemcen anda i d-tella tmeɣra taɣelnawt ɣer tama n Mostaganem… Deg Saharidj, d tafaska tameqqrant n umezgun i yettwaxedmen, imi ass n umenzu n yennayer i d-yella ufran n terbaɛt i d-yufraren deg umezgun. Ɣer tama n waya, d timsizzelt n tzabut deg tmaziɣt i d-yellan deg tɣiwant-a. Azal n 136 n yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas i d-yusan ad ttikkin deg temsizzelt-a. D tanmehla n yimeẓyen d waddal n Tubiret, s lemɛawna n tin n usegmi d tesweḍt n tmaziɣt i yellan deg lmendad. Ulac tama yeqqimen deg tsusmi, imi ad naf deg tɣiwant-a, taddart n Yilyiten i d-iheggan yiwet n tmeɣra tameqqrant. Deg temsikkent, ad naf aṭas n yisufar n wučči, iselsa d kra n wallalen yuttusxedmen zik-nni, ama deg tyerza, deg uzeṭṭa neɣ imahilen-nniḍen. Ɣer tama n waya, yella-d yiwen n usarag ɣef umezruy n yennayer d wayen i t-yurzen ɣer uselmed n tmaziɣt. D taddart imerra i yettikkin deg tmeɣra-a. Yal amezdaɣ s wacu i d-iɛawen, d ayen yeǧǧan imḍebbren n twilayt usan-d s ṭṭaqa I wakken ad ḥeḍren i tfaska-agi daɣ ad snemren imezdaɣ n taddart ɣef useḥbiber-nsen, ɣef umezruy d leɛwayed. Deg Leɛǧiba, d sin n yiɣerbazen n uswir alemmas i yellan deg ttiɛad I wakken ad maggren aseggas amaynut s tmeɣra. Deg Tamra, Tiddukkla “Kafil El Yatim” akked “El Ihsan” i iqedcent akken iwata i wakken ad ǧǧent ass yecban wa d win n tmeɣra, n lferḥ d usfillet ɣer lxir d lehna. Ass n ssebt yezrin, d Mass Cherifi, lwali n Tubiret i yellan deg tɣiwant n Saharidj anda yefka arrazen i wid i d-yufraren ama deg umezgun neɣ deg tzabut. 

<p style="text-align: right;">   Smail. M 

 
  
 Aṭas n yiselmaden akked yinelmaden, n yal tama, i yesseqsayen ɣef udlis n tmaziɣt n uswir amezwaru deg uɣerbaz alemmas, win iwumi qqaren ‘’Tasuta tis snat’’.

 Kra deg-s (iselmaden), ɣillen d lexsas, wiyaḍ rran ṭṭlima ɣef yinemhalen, nwan d nutni i yestehzan. Acu kan sebba n waya, ha-tt-an deg yirebbi n wid-nni i ilaqen ad seḥbibren ɣef uselmed n tmaziɣt. Yuzzel wawal,d akken tamsalt, tcudd ɣer yir assaɣen i yellan gar wid i d-iheggan adlis-a akked tesqamut n uztazal d tɣuri-s. Neɛred ad nẓer sebba n waya, ad nẓer acimi ur d-yeffiɣ ara udlis-a ar tura, nesteqsa yiwen gar n yiɛeggalen n tesqamut n uktazal d tɣuri, yenna-d ’’ Tasqamut n uztazal d tɣuri, ur teqbil ara adlis-aimi ur iwulem ara i wahil n tsuta tis snat. Ayen yellan deg-s, dayen yellan deg udlis-nni aqdim. Ciṭ kan swayes yemgarad. Ihi, ɣef wanect-a i ur t-teqbil ara tesqamut, mačči akk ɣef wayen-nniḍen.’’ I wakken ad nẓer, diɣ, rray n wid ixedmen adlis, nessawel-as i yiwen deg-s, yerra-d ɣef wanect-a : ‘’adlis i as-nefka, iwulem. Ur neẓri ara i wacuɣer ur t-teqbil ara tesqamut-nni. Yerna wagi ad yeqqim kan d rray-nnsen, meḥsub d rray n tesqamut-agi tamezwarut. Adlis, ha-t-an gar yifassen n tesqamut-nniḍen ara t-iɣren, aql-aɣ la nettraǧu. Ayen yellan deg udlis, yettwakkes-d seg wahil unṣib n tneɣlaft n usegmi, ur yeffiɣ ara seg-s.’’ Akken yebɣu yili rray n wa akked wa, akken tebɣu tili ssebba i yeǧǧan adlis ur d-iteffeɣ ara, iselmaden akked yinelmaden, ha-ten-in mebla adlis n tmaziɣt, mebɛed 3 n smanat seg wasmi i uɣalen s aɣerbaz. S waya, zyada-nni i yernan i lweqt n uxeddim deg useggas (4 smanat), iruḥ-as akka tura i tmaziɣt ! Anda laqrar-is. Ɣef laqrar-agi, dɣa, nesteqsa amaswaḍ n tmaziɣt deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yenna-d :’’ad nesḥissef aṭas ɣef wanect-a imi i d-tella tuɣalin ɣer uɣerbaz mebla ma yewjed udlis n tmaziɣt n uswir amezwaru n uɣerbaz alemmas, tasuta tis snat xas ulamma adlis-a, d taɣuri kan n wahil unṣib n uswir-a. Zemren ad ilin aṭas n yidlisen i yiwen wahil’’ nesteqsa-t ɣef wamek ara qablen taswiɛt, ikemmel yenna-d :’’aql-aɣ akka tura deg tannant n yiselmaden ijdiden. Ad neɛreḍ ad nqabel taswiɛt akken iwulem imi zemren yiselmaden ad d-heggin i yiman-nsen ttawilat swayes ara slemden. Swaya, dɣa, ara nnaɣen tannumi i wakken ad tteklen ɣef yiman-nsen, mačči kan ɣef wiyaḍ’’.

 Sya ar tifrat n wugur, nessaram d akken tamsalt ad teqqim kan deg unnar n usegmi, d tamsalt n uselmed n tmaziɣt mačči d tamsalt gar yimdanen. Ladɣa mi ara yili wid teɛna tedyant-a, d imḍebbren ɣef uselmed n tmaziɣt deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> H.Moula  

  
 Yuɣal yettwajerred unɣiman (suicide) nniḍen deg Tsexriwt! Ma yella tamettant (lmut) i d-irezzun s yiman-is ɣer umdan tuɣal d tannumi, ulama tgellu-d s terẓeg d yimeṭṭi, tin i d-yettawi umdan i yiman-is mi ara iɛemmed ad yeg talast i tudert-is, tezga d tarehbanit, tessemɣay tuggdi d ttuḥid deg tmetti. Am wayen i d-yeḍran, dɣa, ussan-a iɛeddan deg taddart n Rrif, taɣiwant n Tsexriwt, i ibeɛden s wazal n 60 n yikilumiṭren seg waɣir n Bgayet. Fejɛen yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt-a mi slan amek yemmut yiwen n yilemẓi bu 19 n yiseggasen i iɛellqen iman-is ɣer tzemmurt, ɣef wakken i d-yenna Uḥuddu aɣerman (Protection civile) n Bgayet. 

 Ayen i d-yernan ugar n lḥir i lɣaci d mi d-iḍerru wannect-a n yinɣimanen deg tama-a n Rrif, almi tuɣal d tamezwarut ideg i d-llan yibaxixen s waṭas iseggasen-a ineggura, ladɣa ilindi. Rnu, ɣef tmuɣli tamatut, mačči d timmuhbelt i d-yettilin deffir waya akken ad yezmer yiwen ad d-yessefhem taluft s wudem isehlen. Ɣef waya, ilaq ad d-nini ugur-a inmetti (social) yeḍḥa-d iɛum idum, almi i d-yettḥettim ɣef yal yiwen ad d-yefk tikti-s. wissen ahat ad d-yefrir ugmuḍ, yelha ɣas azuḥ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Ur ‘’ttɛeṭṭilen’’ ara ad ciren aseḍru n yiwen n uhil n 800 tnezduɣin, tid i umi ttinin kerru-azenzi (AADL), deg tlemmast n tɣiwant n Tubiret, i d-yenna, ass n larebɛa, lwali, Nacer Maskri. Seg kfant tezrawin akked ufran n teṛmisin akken ad sseḍrun asenfar-a n 800 tnezduɣin (AADL), bḍan-tent ɣef sin yiḥricen n 400 iferdisen ara ciren war leɛḍil’’, i d-yessgzi, ɣer tama n yiwet n tfugla n usɣimi n uɣella amaynut n tdayrat n Yimecceddalen, Bouziane Derradji. Ttunefkent i tɣiwant n Ṣṣur Lɣezlan, 400 n tnezduɣin AADL nniḍen mazal tent-ciren seg tent-teǧǧa teṛmist taṭeṛkit, ‘’ihi ad nefren taṛmist nniḍen akken ad nezmer ad ncir, sya d afella, lebni-nsent’’, i d-yenna, Mass Maskri.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> APS 

  
 Taɣiwant n At Σissa Mimun i d-yezgan, deg ugafa n lwilaya n Tizi Wezzu, i yebaɛden azal n 15 n km yerna ideg llant 23 n tudrin, mazal tettidir iseggasen-ayi ineggura lexsas d ameqqran, deg yeḥricen d yisenfaren yemgarden n tudert tatert am lgaz n temdint.

 Taɣiwant-ayi yura deg unyir-is lḥif; acku ar ass-a n wussan mazal aɣbel n waman d lgaz n temdint ur yefri ara. Imi mazal aṭas n tudrin yeddren aɣbel-ayi, acku di tenaṣfa n useggas 2015 mazal ar ass-a werԑad yekcim ixxamen n medden, anida Leqrar-is ?.

 Aṭas n tudrin mazal tterağun lɣaci am win yettrağğun ayyur n Lԑid melmi ar d-ilal, yerna wa-ayi qqrib ad ibban ma d lgaz “ṛuḥ ay aԑrab ar tafsut», neɣ ahat fiḥel i tuddar n udrar n At Σissa Mimun. Llan-t kra tuddar seg-s bedan inmuhal neɣ lecɣacal n usԑeddi-ines am taddart Uqawej, taddart Ibussaden, taddert n Iɣil n Wuccen; d ayen i d-yeglan s wugur niḍen d win n yibardan, imi deg waṭas n tudrin-ayi ideg bdan inmuhal n lgaz n temdint, yella-d usekfel n waṭas yibardan yecban; abrid n Uqawej, d win n Laԑzib n Bugeni n Σmer, arnu ɣer-s abrid n taddert Iɣil n Wuccen. Llant kra n tuddar mazal werԑad itent-id-arran deg leḥsab-nsen am: taddart n Tḥanut, Tizi n Txarubt, Imqecren, Laԑzib n Bugeni n Σmer, Menԑem, Buṣwar…

 Imezdaɣ n tuddar -ayi arwan lḥif ladɣa deg utesmhuyt n tegrest, neɣ deg ussan n ccetwa, imi acḥal n tikkal i leḥun d likumiṭer i wakken ad awin taqqerɛat n lgaz, ama d aggefur neɣ d adfel, tikwal ttuɣalen-d ifasen d ilmawen. D ayen iten-yeğğan ad d-gren tiɣri yerna ad suturen deg wid teԑna temsalt ger-asen yimeḍberen n tɣiwant At Σissa Mimun iɣef yella ɣef uqarruy-is mass Aki Caban d Tanmehla n Imuhal Izuyaz (Direction des Travaux public). Ar melmi ara tedum akka, taɣiwant n At Σissa Mimun ad teqqim mebla lgaz n temdint? .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ʃedwan Ʃebdelɣani 

  
 “Aneṣṣeb n tmaziɣt di tmendawt n tmurt d ayen ara d-yeglun s tifrat i waṭas n wuguren ideg tettidir tmaziɣt ass-a ladɣa di taɣult n uselmed. Ma tettuneṣṣeb tmaziɣt, labud ad d-ḍefren yisuḍaf-nniḍen  ara tt-iṛessin di tmetti, ara iḥettmen aselmed-is di yakk iɣerbazen n tmurt. Rnu ɣef waya, aneṣṣeb n tmaziɣt yezmer ad yili d tagnit i ara ireglen abrid i wid i d-yettarran yal tikkelt tuttra-nni ur nesɛi lmeɛna : S wacu ara tt-naru ?! S wakka tamaziɣt ad tesɛu tira-s tunṣibt i ara yezdin meṛṛa wid yettarun yes-s. Ma tuɣal tmaziɣt d tunṣibt d ayen ara yesɛejlen talalit n tkadimit taɣelnawt i ara d-ijemɛen meṛṛa imusnawen n tmaziɣt. Takadimit n tmaziɣt, d ayen ara s-yefken afud ama i uselmed-is d usemres-is di tmetti ama di tewnaḍt, di tɣamsa neɣ di tedbelt”.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yugem-d awalen Mokrane.C 

  
 Iban d-akken tura, gar umeslay laked d tilawt; tilist muqret dayen kan. Ayagi yaɛna taneɣlaft n ttrebga i d-yenna-n, ɣas melmi kan, belli tamaziɣt « att-lemden deg 48 twilayin n t’murt nneɣ ». Ass-a, iban-d wagi d ttikerkas. Imi taneɣlaft n ttrebga tbeder-d timezizlin n-uxeddim yaɛna-n aselmed deg 3 yaḥricen n ttrebga: amezwaru, alemmas lakked tasenawit. Ayagi dayen yesefraḥen, imi neẓra belli iɣerbazen xuṣen-ten aṭaṣ n yiselmaden. Maca, ayen yaɛnan aselmed n tutlayt (ih tutlayt, neɣ amek?) n t’maziɣt ur yewwi ara aḥric yuklal iwakken ad ɣren warrac tutlayt n-imezwura nsen, yerna akken attesnefli. Dagi kan deg t’wilayt n Bgayet, ulac nnig n 15 imukan id d-tefka taneɣlaft n ttrebga i uselmed n t’maziɣt ! Ayagi ur yessefraḥ ara maḍi imezdaɣ n tama-agi, yagi isedawiyen (uniγersitaires) yesɛan « la licence » n t’maziɣt ! Wigi xedmen yiwen ubeddi (Sit-in) zdat n tanmehla n ttrebga n Bgayet, ass-nni n Arim (Mardi) akken ad begenen lɣiḍ nsen ɣef uɣbel-agi. Ttameḥuqranit yewten tutlayt-agi i yes yemeslay Masensen, agellid n yimaziɣen. 15 kan imukan i uselmed n t’maziɣt, mači d lɛib ? Ma yella d tutlayt taɛrabt, taneɣlaft tefka-d azal n 191 imukan i uselmed-is. Ayagi iban d-acu-t: d ttasertit n-uɛerreb ; la akkin, la akka ! Sya, adabu yeqqar-d: Tamaziɣt att-uɣal ttutlayt tunṣibt, syagi nniḍen, yugi ass-ifek allalen !! Aṭaṣ n yicenga n tutlayt akked yidles Amaziɣ i d-yeqqaren d-akken tamaziɣt « ur teṣiweḍ ara akken ad d-tuɣal d tutlayt tunṣibt, acku mazal-itt…meẓẓiyet » ! Ddin u qabac ! Tamaziɣt yesɛan luluf d luluf n yiseggasen, ass-a d « ttilemẓit »? Wigi bɣan waqil ad-nini kra n laɛǧeb ! Tasertit-agi n temḥuqranit i lmend n t’maziɣt iswi-ines d-asefcel n-uselmed n tutlayt-agi. Iseddawiyen « feclen » asmi ẓran belli llan kan 15 n yimukan i uselmed n t’maziɣt deg lwilaya n Bgayet yesɛan 52 n t’ɣiwanin !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Yiwet n tikkelt, Lḥaǧ Salem si taddart n At Yidir isuddes-d yiwet n tmeɣra n rcel. Issawel i yimeddaḥen ad d-asen ad zenzen lḥenni. Yuli Aɛmer Awmer d Saɛid Awdi si taddart n At Buɛli, yuder-d Muḥed u Saɛid n At Weɛrab d yimeddukal-is si Taddart Ufella, ruḥen-d ula si Tgemmunt Ukerruc. Mlalen deg uxxam n tmeɣra. Sersen-asen-d lmetreb, iččur d timellalin, lesfenǧ d uḥeddur. Syin, bdan yimedyazen, znuzun lḥenni. Ttawin-d isefra. Mi ikfa yiwen, ad yuɣal wayeḍ, ttemjadalen akken s yisefra alammi Saɛid n At Weɛrab ibda-d yiwen usefru:
