 <em> (… ) yettkemmil  </em>

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ass n 18 deg meɣres 1962 i d-yella umtawa gar lḥukuma n Fransa akked lḥukuma n leɛḍil n tegduda tazzayrit, deg temdint n Evian-les-Bains deg tmurt n Fransa.Ṭrad, i idummen sebɛa n yiseggasen d uzgen, anda mmuten ugar n umelyun d uzgen n yimeɣras izzayriyen.

 Ihi, seg wass-nni i yeḥbes ṛsas u yebda yettban-d uzarug n tmurt n Lezzayer, xas ulamma tella tama tamṭerfit timselleḥt OAS i yellan mgal amtawa-agi. Tuddsa-agi, dɣa, i yenɣan Mouloud Mɛemmri d 5 n yimeddul-is deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt ass n 15 deg meɣres 1962. Yebda umeslay ɣef umtawa-agi seg 8 armi d 18 deg meɣres 1962 anda i d-yella umtafaq gar tama n Lezzayer akked tama n Fransa. Amtawa-agi yesstenya-t Krim Belkacem, seg tama n Lezzayer u Louis Joxe, aneɣlaf n Fransa. Aḍris n umtawa, yeqqar-d ad yeḥbes ṭrad seg 19 deg meɣres 1962, aserreḥ i yimeḥbas akken ma llan, ad d-yili afraniman gar tlata n wagguren ɣer setta i d-iteddun, ad yili wahil n tuffɣa n lɛesker n Fransa d wayen-nniḍen. D Krim Belkacem i yellan ɣef uqerru n tarbaɛt n yizzayriyen i iḥeḍren deg umtawa-agi n Evians. Llan yid-s : Taib Boulahrouf, Saâd Dahlab, Mohamed Seddik Benyahia, Benmostefa Benaouda, Redha Malek, Lakhdar Bentobal, M’Hamed Yazid akked Seghir Mostefai. Deg umtawa-agi, tḥettem tama tazzayrit ɣef lḥukuma n Fransa akken ad teqbel amur ameqqran n yiswiyen i d-yellan deg ulɣu-nni n umenzu n unbir 1954. Deg umenzu n yulyu 1962, yella ufraniman ɣef uzarug n Lezzayer. Asteqsi yella-d deg ufran akka ‘’Ma tebɣam ad tuɣal Lezzayer d tamurt s timunent-is u ad temɛawan akked Fransa ɛlaḥsab n wayen yellan deg umtawa-nni n Evians ?’’. Ass-nni, 91,23% (5.975.581) n Yizzayriyen, rran-d s (Ih) i tmunent n Lezzayer, gar 6.549.736 i iruḥen ɣer yisendaq n tefranin. Azal n 0,25% i d-yennan (Ala), meḥsub 16.534 n yimdanen i yellan mgal timunent n Lezzayer. Ma d 8.12% (532.056) n yimdanen, ur ruḥen ara ɣer tefranin-agi. Ass n 3 deg yulyu 1962, yenna-d uselway n Fransa Charles de Gaulle agemmuḍ n ufraniman-agi u testeɛref Fransa s timunent n Lezzayer, u tberreḥ-d yis-s s wudem unṣib. Ass n 5 deg yulyu 1962, tuɣal Lezzayer d aɣlan am nettat am tiyaḍ, tewwi timunent-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine Moula 

  
 I tikkelt tis snat, tasqamut n useḥbiber ɣef JSK thegga-d timlilit-nniḍen deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu ass-nni n 16 deg yulyu-agi iɛeddan.

 Aṭas n yimferǧen n JSK i d-yusan tikkelt-a (ugar n 20 000), ṭṭalaben deg uselway-is i wakken ad iruḥ ad yeǧǧ tarbaɛt-agi n ddabex ad tt-seddun wiyaḍ, imi ,dɣa, ɣef wakken i d-nnan, llan wid i yebɣan ad ṭṭfen JSK meɛna cerḍen-d rwaḥ n Hannachi.

 Aya, yeǧǧa kra n yimdanen ad cakken deg lecɣal am wigi imi ur d-bdiren ara, s wudem unṣib, isem neɣ ismawen n wigi i yebɣan ad tt-ṭṭfen. ‘’Lukan i d-nnan isem n wagi i yebɣan ad yeṭṭef JSK, tili ad d-yeqqers udrar ass-a’’ i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen gar yimferǧen. Tebda-d tikli seg unnar n umenzu n wunbir ɣef 11h d abrid ɣer lwilaya. Deg ubrid, i yiṭij, ttɣennin yimferǧen tizlatin n Matoub, ladɣa, tizlit ‘’Kksen-aɣ la JSK’’. Simmal tetteddu tikli, simmal yettnerni ugemmuḍ-is. Mi wwḍen ɣer lwilaya, kecmen kra n yiɛeggalen n tesqamut i wakken ad d-ẓren lawali, meɛna ur t-ufin ara. Gar yiɛeggalen d yimyuraren iqdimen i yekkan deg tikli-a, ad naf : Fergani, Iboud, Mennad, Dali, Bahbouh d wiyaḍ. Ass-nni, imdanen akken ma llan heddren kan s teqbaylit. Ur nuɣ ara tannumi s wanect-a deg Tizi.

 Deg taggara n tikli, nemlal FERGANI akked IBOUD, nesteqsa-ten ula d nekni s teqbaylit.

  
 Γef wakken i tt-id-yufa Othmane Saâdi, Qsenṭina d tamurt n Waεraben si zik. Xas akken yenna-d d Imaziγen i yellan deg-s uqbel akk imnekcamen u yeḥken deg-s Syphax d Massinissa meεna, Qsentina d taεrabt si zik.  Ruḥ tura kečč fhem-itt. Acu kan γur-sen ddunit ur teddewwir ara, ay k-id-yefnan d tardast n wakal ! ugur ameqqran γur-s d akken ara d-yeqqar nekk d Amaziγ meεna d Aεrab ! Cwi kan nekni d Leqbayel mačči d Imaziγen-agi-ines. Tili terwi, alamma s ADN ara d-naf imawlan-nneγ ! 

 Othmane Saâdi ara aγ-d-yemmal amek yenker laṣel-is i wakken ad neddu di lateṛ-is. Ha-t-an uxabit-nniḍen !!! Ma tγileḍ Leqbayel ttun asmi i tessutureḍ di syad-ik, timura n waεraben, i wakken ad seyyfen imḍebbren n lezzayer ur sṭeεrifen ara s tmaziγt deg useggas n 2001, ay ‘’Amaziγ’’ ?

 Aya, yebda-d imi Idir akked Ait Menguellet ugin ad γennin di ‘’Qsenṭina, tamaneγt n yidles aεrab’’. Ugin ad γennin axaṭer sεan sebba. Yal wa s tekti-ines. D tagi i d tilelli n ucennay. Ula d tacennayt n Lubnan Faïrouz ur tettγenni ara. Meεna acimi ur yezεif ara fell-as, ulac acu i as-yenna ? Yettban, axaṭer d taεrabt, ma ulac ad rfun syad-is. Yezεef γef yicennayen iqbayliyen axaṭer yiwen yeqqar-asen :’’di cetla-nsen i tt-ufan, di txessart i d-ttlalen…’’ Ma d wayeḍ yettmeni-as :’’ ad teḥluḍ si…ncallah…’’

 La d-yeqqar, di&amp;gamma,; i wacuγer Ait Menguellet ibedd ddqiqa n tsusmi, di Zenith, γef yineγmasen n Charlie Hebdo imi wigi wwten-d di Nnbi ? Am wakken, dγa, ur yeẓri ara belli axxam n Rebbi s timmad-is yelḥa di Fransa netta Qatar γer tama n Holland ? 

 Yewwet-d ula di M.Mεemmri d S.Chaker. Γef wakken iwala d nutni i yessaγen tamsalt-agi n tmaziγt imi d-nnan Tafriq n ugafa n yimaziγen mačči n waεraben. ‘’(An)wa kem-iqeṭṭben a tilawt, win tufiḍ deg-neγ yewwet !’’  i as-yenna Zedek. 

 Teḍra yid-k a Othmane Saâdi am wakken i as-yenna Matoub :’’tettγaḍ tejra n llim, mi as-εawden ttelqim, teḥced tuγal d isγaren.’’ Ihi, d tagermumut-ik kan i d-yeggran, tlaq kan i lkanun. Deg yidurar n leqbayel, meqqint-d srid tzemrin, ur ḥwağğent ara ttelqim. 

 Ulayγer rregmat deg yimdanen i ak-yifen ay amγar n ’’terga uγanim’’. Imγaren γur-neγ d izemniyen, ttweṣṣin-aγ γef wayen yelhan, γef tayri gar yimdanen, γef laṣel-nneγ. Laṣel refdent tsuta yefkan lεehd i Dda Lmulud. 

 Anda ara tedduḍ a Othmane Saâdi, ha-t-an ugeswaḥ n Dilem Ali di Charlie !?

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Gas tewɛer-as tegnit ayendin i umedyaz akken ad d-yessufeɣ isefra-s deg udlis i wid ara ten-yeɣren, maca ulac ayen iɣef ur iɛedda akken ad yagged ugur-a imezdi n usiẓreg (édition). D ameslay, da, ɣef wammud n umedyaz ameyyaz Mbarek Gamar iwumi yefka azwel n « 99 d asefru », i d-yessufeɣ s yidrimen-is ɣer teẓrigin Tamagit, ayyuren iɛeddan. D ammud-is iɣef i as-d-ɣlin yimeṭṭawen imi akken yufa abeddel deg tira d usenfali mačči akken i yemsefham akked umaẓrag. Mi ara nekcem deg tebḥirt n wammud n Dda Mbarek – deg yisebtar – ad aɣ-d-tmuger seg uwellih amezwaru rriḥa-nni n tutlayt tazwawt akked tmaziɣt tikwal. Deg-s ad ifiq yimeɣri s umeskar d win i yettferrsen yakan deg tutlayt n Lmulud At Mɛemmer, d win ijerrben aṭas n tlufa n ddunit, d win yeɣran daɣen ddeqs seg yiɣerbazen n usefru. Ɣef wawal n umeskar-is, ttuɣ acḥal-aya segmi ihegga wammud i usiẓreg, maca tuqin n teẓrigin d uẓuɣɣer-nsent, ǧǧan-t almi d aseggas-a akken i d-yeffeɣ. War ma nettu ɣef yisefra i d-yenna akked iqburen mi d-nnernan gar yiseggasen n sebɛin d 2000. Ma yella d imaynuten-nni ad d-ffɣen ɣer sdat deg wammud-is wis sin.

 <em> Yenna deg yiwen n usefru:  </em>

 <em> ‘’Tegrem s lhedra aẓeṭṭa </em>

 <em> Rwin lexyuḍ-is yexreb </em>

 <em> Tẓerrem sswab d lɣelṭa </em>

 <em> Uzlig tettwalim-t yesweb </em>

 <em> Kunwi tɛecqem di ssmaṭa </em>

 <em> Nekk leɛqel-iw d aseḥseb </em>

 <em> Ma ɣur-wen awal d lfeṭṭa </em>

 <em> Tasusmi ɣur-i d ddheb.’’ </em>

 D ammud n tmussni d tirmit i ilaq ad iɣer kra n win i yettakken azal i wawal alqayan d yidles aɣlayan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> M. K. 

  
 Uγalen-d, daγen, wid-nni γer tid-nni-nsen. uγalen-d γer ‘’Σliha neḥya, εliya nmut’’, γer ‘’ Ddawla islamiya’’. Ma ur d-ddin ad d-ckunṭḍen,ma ur d-kcimen di tewwurt, ad  d-εeddin si ṭṭaq. Awi-d kan ad d-afen sebba s wayes ara d-ffγen am yiberriqen. ‘’D acu i ak-yewwin ay amcum γer yisellufen n uydi, teẓriḍ ihemmej uqjun, teẓriḍ d acu ara ak-d-iheggi !’’

 Ass-a, wid-nni i yenwan ad d-yekker usalas deg umagaraman, γelḍen di tmuγliwin-nsen. Tamsalt n rrebrab d tamsalt n ttelqim : ‘’imγi n ṣṣaba meεqul’’ i as-qqaren. Skud mazal ddin seqdacen-t i tsertit,mazal ussan n rrebrab ad iγzifen, mazal ‘’Les Charlies’’ ad mten u ‘’les Kouachis’’ ad uγalen d imeγrasen. 

 Ass-a, imḍebbren-nni i d-iheggan tikli di Lezzayer tamaneγt, ur d-ffiγen ara ad lḥun mgal ineγmasen n’’Charlie Hebdo’’, ffγen-d ad d-beggnen lγiḍ-nsen mgal tikli i d-yellan di Fransa. Lukan γef Charlie Hebdo, tili fγen-d acḥal-aya. Nutni ffγen-d i wakken ad d-inin : ‘’silence, on tue’’. Mi ara neqqen, ur ilaq ara yiwen ad ten-iεewweq. ‘’A mmi d tinna ad ak-wwte&amp;gamma,; yerna ad ak-ggale&amp;gamma,; ma tsuγeḍ ad cektiγ’’.

 Ttuγaḍen kan yilmeẓyen-nni i ten-yeṭṭafaren : ‘’At wawal yezwar limin, d widak yeqqaren amin, s wayla-nsen werğin umnen.’’

 Xas ulamma Fransa tella teggugem, ne&amp;gamma,; ahat, tefka afus, asmi ttwanγan ugar n 110 d aneγmas di Lezzayer, meεna lmut dir-itt, dir-itt, ur tt-tettmenniḍ ula i uεdaw-ik i d-qqaren izemniyen.  

 Ayen yettuγaḍen γer yimdanen, ladγa ilmeẓyen yeγran d akken mačči d nutni i yettnadin ad γren i wakken ad fehmen d acu i d-yenna ddin, meεna d asemḥes i ssemḥasen i wid i asen-d-ifetun, wid-nni werğin ikecmen tawwurt n uγerbaz…Amek yiwen leεmer i t-yefka umnar n lakul, ad ak-d-yini amek ilaq ara teddu ddunit? Meεna ula d aγerbaz azzayri s lḥeqq-is !

 Yeshel ad tamneḍ wala ad terẓeḍ aqerru-k ad tfehmeḍ. Ihi, umneγ nekk d ’’Yennayer’’. Aseggas ameggaz. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Hocine.M

  
 S uheggi n Tdukkla n Lxir Imɣan Tizemmurin Akfadu (ABITA), d ayen i d-yellan s umata d tiktiwin timaynutin i uqeddic n tlawin, – tadukkli n termisin tinmettit – taɣermanit tarufant-tagrakalt, – tidukkla Fransa-Lezzayer. 

 D tiwizi i d-yellan dɣa gar tdukkliwin ABITA n yisenfaren i uqeddic akken ad d-snulfunt agraw afransis-azzayri n tlawin timɛelmin i iɛewwlen ad ssegmunt isenfaren inmettiyen,, idelsanen, isegmayen, neɣ i ubaɣur n twennaḍt. Neɣ akken nniḍen, i kra n tid yesɛan isenfaren n termist inmetti, ideg ur yelli iswi d array i tsutert n ulzuz kan, wanag daɣen d awennaɛ n lḥala n tudert ed rraḥa n yiɣermanen (citoyens). Deg wayen nezmer ad nɣer daɣen deg ulɣu n tdukkla-ya, dakken ama d tamahelt (ambassade) n Fransa, tamnaḍt n tegzigrt n Fransa, akked uɣerbaz-nni yettwassnen management HEC, akk ad ddun i yidis n usenfar-a alama yettwawweḍ yiswi. Rnu ula d Agraw Aɣerfan n Twilayt (APW), Tamehla n Tigawt Tinmettit (la DAS), Tamehla n Yilemẓiyen ed Waddal n Bgayet, Taɣiwant n Ukfadou, gar waṭas n waṭas n termisin nniḍen, ttwanecdent sɣur Tdukkla-ya i tikci n tallelt s wayen mu zemrent. Ma yella nemmeslay-d ɣef yiswan igejdanen n tdukkla-ya ABITA, tesḥessis ladɣa tilawin n waɣir ɣef wazal n leqdic n termisin inmetti imi tameṭṭut tamɛellemt ilaq-as tazwara ad tger iman-is deg umennuɣ iwakken ad d-tawi tifrat d timaynutin s uxdam n uqeddic neɣ n usafar ara yemmenden akk inesdabuyen izayzanen. Dɣa dima deg ubrid-a n tdukkla, zemrent ad ttwaɛeyynent ɣer sdat sḍis n tlawin ilmend n tiɣri-ya i usenfar, ad ttwafernent tiyaḍ umi ara yemmag usileɣ deg Pari. Aya gar umenzu alama d 5 deg duǧember n useggas-a 2015.

<p style="text-align: right;">Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Tella-d deg teɣzi n kraḍ n wussan, tafaska n tmedyezt tamaziɣt i d-tesuddus Tdukkla Lbacir Amellaḥ, tseqqef iqeddicen s temdelt i yemuggen ass n umenzu deg wayyur-a n ɣuct deg nella. Ɣef wahil n temlilit, aṭas i yennan belli yeɣɣenter ayendin ma nwala i tlata n wussan kan deg i d-llan warmuden (activités). Deg wass amenzu, send amager n yinebgawen, llant-d temzikknin sɣur kra n tdukkliwin: Tidukkla Tadelsant n Tmaziɣt Lbacir Amellaḥ. Taklut, tugniwin n tfaska tis snat. Sɣur Tdukkla n Yiger Ɛli « Amennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt ». Akked Tdukkla Agerruj n At Maɛuc « Tiɣawsiwin n zik n Yizwawen ». Mi iɛedda yimekli, rran yimekkiyen srid, d tirzi, ɣer uẓekka ed uxxam n Si Lbacir Amellaḥ. Almi d 15sr00 tella-d tulya (taldayt) tunsibt n tfaska, syinna d Tilelt sɣur Tdukkla Tussna n Yiger Genduz. Mi yesqer akken wakud deg 16sr, wwin-d massen Buɛlam Messusi akked Muḥend Akli Qasi yiwen n usarag ɣef temɛayt s tesrit ɣer usefru. Imensi, kra n tmenna n yisefra, ed tceqquft n umezgun  » Later n ubrid yettwattun » sɣur Tdukkla Lbacir Amellaḥ, d wid i d-yellan ɣer taggara n yiḍ. Deg wass wis sin, ttwaldint temzikknin tasebḥit, syin akkin d timzizzelt n tmedyezt. Kra n teswiɛt aredqal, iga-d mass Kamal Buɛmara asarag ɣef yiberdan n tira n tezwawt. Akken-nni deg yiḍ d timzizzelt n tmedyezt, almi d asrag n 22sr30, tessenɛet-d terbaɛt Ečč-illa n Tuǧa taceqquft n umezgum umi tefka azwel « igugamen ». Ass wis kraḍ, i yellan d aneggaru, d timzikknin am tal tikkelt. Tirzi ɣer tmellaḥin n At Wnir Iɛednanen. Sdat n yimekli, d asarag n tesqamut n yinezzurfa ɣef temɛayt s usefru. Tameddit, mi tewweḍ lxemsa, d ttiɛad n tikci n warrazen i wid i d-yufraren: yewwi arraz amezwaru mass Harun Ɛemmar, yuɣal-d wis sin i tmedyezt Xalifi Kaysa, ma yella d arraz wis kraḍ yettunefk i mass Ageccaryu Murad. Mi tekfa tmeɣra n tikci n warrazen, yemmečč daɣen yimensi, ɛeddan yiɛeggalen n tdukklant tamnaḍant ɣer ukemmel n uheggi i tmeɣra n yiḍ. Akken i teḍra, sdat uzayez s ddeqs-is, gar yimezdaɣ n taddart ed yinebgawen, sferfren imesli n taɣect ed uẓawan aṭas n yinaẓuren, am Ɛebbas n Ayt Rẓin, Ḥsen Ɛednani, Muḥ Amellaḥ, Aneggar… .

 Baɛzizi Muḥend, aselway wis sin n Tdukkla Lbacir Amellaḥ : «Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ tɛedda tfaska-ya tis kraḍ Lbacir Amellaḥ akken ilaq s 37 n yimedyazen i iḥeḍren, ɣas ma cewwlen-aneɣ yiwen n yiḍ rrɛud-nni imi nga armuden berra. Ma d iswi aql-aɣ nettawaḍ-it kra kra; nebɣa ad teddutmedyezt-nneɣ ɣer sdat, ad taweḍ tagreglant-nni». Kaysa Xalifi, arraz wis: «Nger tamawt belli tafaska n Lbacir Amellaḥ tewwi-d amaynut aseggas-a, imi ur yeshil ara ad d-taruḍ tamɛayt s usefru. D ayen i yi-yeǧǧan cerheɣ aṭas mi d-lliɣ gar wid i d-yufraren. Afud igerrzen i tdukkla».

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Inelmaden tesnawit Mohamed Oudiai n Ait Aissa Mimoun i d-yezgan deg tama n Tiplakin, i yebεden azal n 10 n likilumiter ɣef usamar n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, ḥebsen ɣef leqraya seg tazwara n ddurt yezrin. Isnawiyen-agi, ugin ad uɣalen ɣer tzeɣwa-nsen n tɣuri, i wakken ad kemmlen aseddu n temsirin. Imi ḥebsen ɣef leqraya seg ass-nni letnayen 13 deg f urar 2017 almi d ass-nni n lexmis 16 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Inelmaden-agi, ssuturen areṣṣi n tɣellist d laman, ama daxel n tesnawit neɣ deg berra. Imi ass-nni n acer, 13 deg furar, wwin-d kra n yilmeẓyen n Tala Gahia iqjan yesḍen, qqnen-ten ɣer tewwurt n tesnawit, dɣa qqrib qqercen yiwen n unelmad. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli aṭas n twaɣiyin i d-yeḍran segmi yelli uɣerbaz-agi, yerna aṭas n tikkal i keccmen yiberraniyen s ṣṣur ɣer daxel n tesnawit-a. Mačči yiwen n ubrid i wwten tullas daxel. D ayen yeğğan isnawiyen-agi, ad d-gren tiɣri yerna ad ssutren deg wid teԑna temsalt, gar-asen tamṣulṭa, i wakken ad d-afen tifrat i wugur-a n laman. Nesteqsa yiwet n tnelmadt yeqqaren deg uswir wis kraḍ 3AS tenna-aɣ-d: “skud mazal ur d-yefri ara wugur-agi n tɣellist d laman, ur nettuɣal ara ɣer tneɣriyin-nneɣ. Ya ad d-awin imṣulṭa neɣ ad xedmen imgayen n tεessast. Azal n 4 n yiseggasen segmi neṭṭalab, ad aɣ-d-awin taɣellist, yal tikkelt d acu n ssebba i d-ttafen” . Ma d ayen akk yessewhamen deg wanect-a, imi tiddukla n yimawlan n yinelmaden n tesnawit-agi, ur d-tgir ara afus-is am wakken ur tt-teεni ara taluft-agi n warraw-nsen, yeqqimen ddurt ur ɣrin.

<p style="text-align: right;">  <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Tuɣal teywalt(communication) iseggasen-a ineggura d tin isehlen maḍi ma yebɣa ad yeṭṭef, ad yekcem deg-s umdan. Imi segmi i d-yella uẓeṭṭa amaḍlan yezmer yiwen ad yemmeslay srid lwaḥid win i as-yehwan deg ukuẓ n tɣemmar n umaḍal.

 Ɣef waya i yuɣal wallal aqbur n tesreqqest(poste) drus n lɣaci i t-ineccden i usiweḍ n tebratin-nsen. Ladɣa wid yeɣran, xulḍen yakan amaḍal uhlis n Internet. Timentilin (sebbat) n waya banent segwaṭas n tamiwin, imi qqnent tazwara ɣer wakud. Yettusemma, zik akken ad ak-d-yaweḍ yisalli (lexber) n uɣrib, ilaq-ak ad tsebreḍ ugar n wayyur i tuɣalin n wawal. D ayen ur d-neggri tura. «Ahat mi ara yili d ameslay kan aṭas i yufand Internet neɣ d tilifun axir. Maca mi ara tili d taɣawsa urnezmir ara ad tt-nesɛedd iseg zzǧaǧ n uselkim, ihi d tasreqqest i d tasellakt». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n AytSmaɛel. Dima ɣef tesreqqest, garwidnesteqsa, daɣen, ad nẓer rray-nsen fell-as,ass-a deg wussan, imi akken yebɣu yili yettban-d ttawil-a d amsellek deg waṭas n tikkal, llan wid i d-yennan mazal ṭṭfen deg-s ar tura, d acu kan sḥassfen ɣef kra n tlufa i d-ttmaggaren deg ubrid-nsen! «Ur yezmir yiwen ad yebḍu assaɣ i t-yezdin akked tesreqqest, akka am nekk. Lameɛna ḍerrun-d kra n wuguren ttaǧǧan-aɣ nerfa: yiwen d assaɣli i ssaɣlin aceyyaɛ n kra n tɣawsa, imi s lmizan kullec ; tayeḍ, d aɛeṭṭel i ttɛeṭṭilen deg usiweḍ n lamana-nni i tuzneḍ. Amek ɛni seg Bgayetɣer Tizi Uzzu ilaq ad terǧuḍ 13 n wussanalmi d 15?» I yesḥassef yiwen n uɣerman-nniḍen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Anwa aqbayli ur nessin ara Mass AmedNekkar. D amedyaz, d anagal, d amaru ameqqran n tsekla tamaziɣt tatrart. D yiwen seg tigejda n yidles amaziɣ, swayen id-yeffka i tutlayt n tyemmat tamaziɣt d tsekla-s.

 D yiwen gar yimedyazen neɣ imaruyen i yefkan ruḥ-is i tmedyazt d wungaln teqbaylit neɣ n tamaziɣt s umata. D yiwen gar wid-ak i yettnaḍaḥen I wakken ad tekkes tagut d tatut d uɣebbar yulin idles amaziɣ. D yiwen seg yimenza i d-yerran i tiɣri-nni n tefsut n 80. Iban-d aṭas ɣer unnar n tira deg yiseggasen n 2000, ass-a ɣur-s amecwar ɣezzif degtsekla tamaziɣt.n Ahmed Nekkar,ilul ass n 13 deg waggur n meɣres 1955, degUԑfir n Delles deg lwilaya n Bumerdas, di tmurt n Leqbayel. Deg uḥric n tira, yeqdec deg waṭas n yiḥricen-is yemgarden, xas ma yebda s tira n yisefra d tmedyazt u mazal-t deg-s ar ass-a. Imi yebda tira n yisefra deg yiseggasen 1972-1973, asmi yella yeqqar deg tesnawit “ Ʃebdereḥman Illui” deg Larebԑa n At Yiraten. Yura daɣen 4 n wungalen s tmaziɣt, d kra tullisin d tmucuha. Ma d tamentilt I t-yeğğan ad yeḍfer abrid n tira, d iḥulfan-is d wayen akk yettidir d wayen yettidir deg tmetti. Am wakken diɣen yeqqar aṭas n yidlisen n yimyura ama d wid n da, ama d iberaniyen. Seg useggas n 1999ar ass-a yesazreg-d 07 n yidlisen s tmaziɣt; 4 seg-sen d ungalen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, amenzu yella-d usuffeɣ-is deguseggas n 1999, iwumi isemma «Yugar ucerig tafawet», id-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin “Yuba wis sin”. Ma d wis sin d ungal daɣen, isemma-as: »Gar ẓẓebra d yifḍisen », yesazreg-it-id deguseggas n2012, ɣer tezrigin “le savoir”. Ma d ungal-is wis kraḍ (03) « Tajeğğigt n Meɣres » yesuffeɣ-it-id deg unbir 2015, ɣer tezrigt-is “Tamagit”. Ungal-a d tasuqqilt i wungal n “Moussa Bouchakour” s uzwel-is anasli “Rencontre inattendue”. Ma d ungal-is wis ukuẓ (04) iwumi yefka azwel “Aẓeḍḍa n Tissist», i d-yeffɣen deg 13 Yebrir 2016, ɣer tezrigt-is “Tamagit”.Yesuffeɣ-d s yiwen n udlis, llan deg-s snat n tmucuha: tamezwarut isem-is “Tageldunt deg uglim n ujḥiḥ», ma tis snat isem-is “Amettaker asadaran”. Yeffeɣ-d deg 2015 ɣer tezrigt-is (Tamagit). Yerna yesazreg-d yiwen-nniḍen n tullisin ideg llant daɣen snat n tullisin. Tamezwarut iga-as azwel “Taɣaḍt n Mass Seguin” d tasuqilt i tullist-nni n Tefransist “La chèvre de Monsieur Seguin”. Ma tis snat-nni isem-is «Isegbazen n tedyant n Stéphanie Benson». Ula d adlis-a yeffeɣ-d ɣer tezrigt-is, deg useggas n 2015. Yura, daɣen, yiwen n udlis n tɣuri «Adlis n tɣuri- Iluɣma d yisnasen» i yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas d wid n tesnawit. Yeffeɣ-d yakan deg useggas n 2013 ɣer tezrigt “ La pensée”. Ahmed Nekkar ha-t-an la yettheggi aṭas n yidlisen gar-aes: ungal n “Alis deg tmurt n tirga”. D sin yidlisen i ulmud n tmaziɣt, i wid ur nessin ara tamaziɣt. D yiwen n umawal n tmaziɣt d tefransist.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani. 

  
 Snat n temsizzliyin i lfayda n yisdawanen I lmend n usmekti n wass aɣelnaw n unelmad, i d-yettilin yal ass n 19 maggu deg yal aseggas, i d-thegga Tiddukkla tadelsant “Lmulud At Mɛemmer” n tedawit yewwin isem-is, yettwassnen s yisem n ‘Hasnaoua’ . Tesɛa tiddukkla-agi tedelsant aseqqamu-ines deg ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles aɛrab. Timsezwert tamezwarut, tella-d ɣef 10h00 n ssbaḥ, ass-nni n letnayen 22 seg waggur-agi ideg nella, deg yiwet n tzeqqan n temsirin yetabaɛen ɣer ugezdu n Taɛrabt. D akayad n tira d wayen icudden akk ɣer tutlayt d yidles amaziɣt. Ttwajerden deg-s wazal n 35 n yinelmaden, tuget deg-sen d inelmaden n ugezdu n tmaziɣt. Ufraren-d deg-s tlata n tullas, deg umḍiq amenzu tufrar-d Alili Lydia, deg umḍiq wis sin d Kadri Saliha, ma deg umkan wis kraḍ tufrar-d Bounini Thafath. Ma d timszwert tis snat, d tin n tmedyazt, i d-yellan ass-nni n ttlata tameddit n wass deg tzeqqa n yisaragen n tesdawit-agi. Γran-d yisdawanen isefra-nsen, llan wid n tmaziɣt, llan wid n taɛrabt, llan ula d wid n tefransist. Myezwaren 19 n yisdawanen n yigezduyen yemgaraden: tamaziɣt, taɛrabt akked win n tefransist. Ufraren-d deg-s 3 n yinelmaden, imseḍfaren akka : Basselina Lycia, Chatbi Lwiza akked Ben Kaci Ghenima. Mass Hocine Zinia d aselway n tiddukkla-agi, yenna-d: « Nessaram leqdic-agi ameẓyan iɛjeb akk wid yettekkin deg temsizzliyin-agi nexdem. Win yebɣun yerbeḥ imi ɣur-nneɣ nekkni d tamaziɣt i irebḥen uqbel kulec. Iswi-nneɣ deffir n leqdic-agi, d asnerni n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ, d asnerni daɣen n tmussniwin n yinelmaden d usebɣes n wayen xeddmen. Nessaram ɣer sdat, inelmaden akken ma llan, ilaq ad d-rren lwelha-nsen ɣer tmaziɣt, ulamma qqaren tutlayin-nniḍen neɣ ḍeffren tuzzigin-nniḍen maca aẓar-nsen d amaziɣ. Ihi ilaq fell-asen ad d-fken ayen ssnen d wayen zemren i tutlayt n tyemmat. Ulamma lejyub-nneɣ d ilmawen, s yidrimen-nneɣ i nxeddem leqdicat-nneɣ idelsanen, imi ddula ur d aɣ-tettɛawan ara, yerna nxeddem ayen i wumi nessaweḍ ».

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Am yal aseggas, imezdaɣ n Tubiret d tamiwin i as-d-yezzin, ttmagaren amenzu n yennayer akken iwata, imi ttqabalent s tmeɣra d waṭas n leqdic. Ama d tiddukkliwin tidelsanin, neɣ d iɣerbazen. Yettɛeddi umenzu n yennayer s cfawat, s yisaragen, d umbiddal n yisirmen gar yimdanen. Aseggas-a, s wudem unṣib, Tubiret ad tesfugel s yixf n useggas amaziɣ deg uɣerbaz Xales Hammouche deg Beclul anda ara yeḥḍer lwali d waṭas n yimḍebbren-nniḍen, gar-asen anemhal n usegmi. Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i aɣ-d-yewwḍen, yezmer lḥal dakken aɣerbaz-a, ad yeldi tiwwura-s i yimḍebbren ara d-yasen seg teɣlift n leqraya. Sin wussan mbeɛd, d taddart n Yilyiten, deg tɣiwant n Saharidj ara yesfuglen s umenzu n yennayer s uncad n waṭas n yimḍebbren n twilayt anda yiwen n leqdic s wazal-is yebda acḥal n wussan aya. Nnig n wallalen ssexdamen At zik, timsikkent, ad teɛmer s yisafaren n wučči yemxallafen yerzan taddart-a s timmad-is. Ad yili usfugel n yennayer deg yal aɣerbaz n tmurt.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ad yili usfugel n yennayer s wudem unṣib deg yal aɣerbaz azzayri 

 Deg yiwen yizen i d-tceyyeɛ tneɣaft n usegmi i 48 yinemhalen n usegmi, anda i teṭṭaleb asfugel n yennayer deg yal aɣerbaz n tmurt ass n 12 deg waggur-agi deg-i i nella, tbeggen-d tneɣlaft n usegmi azal yesɛa wansi-a i icudden ɣer yidles d umezruy n tmurt n lezzayer. Am wakken i teḍleb deg yimḍebbren n yiɣerbazen i wakken ad sfuglen yennayer s leqdec adelsan (ccna, tamezgunt, isaragen…), zyada ɣef uheggi n seksu s yiyuzaḍ i yinelmaden ass-nni n yennayer. Ma d iɣerbazen, aṭas n leqdic i d-yettwaheyyan deg-sen, am wakken ara tili yiwet n tzabut i yinelmaden n uswir alemmas ara d-theggi tenmehla n waddal d yilmeẓyen s lemɛawna n tnemehla n usegmi d tesweḍt n tmaziɣt. 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Smail. M 

<div> 
  
 Taddart Isummaten , d taddart gar tuddar n tɣiwant n Uzeffun, tezga-d ɣer umalu-s, ɣef ubrid aɣelnaw 24, ɣer yiri n teftist Taɣɣza n lebḥaṛ, tebɛed ɣef walmus n tɣiwant azal n seddis (06) ikilumtren.

 Mi ara tawiḍ abrid metwal Aẓeffun, taddart Isummaten, ad ak-id-tbin s ddaw ubrid, ɣer telqay n yeɣzer . Ttidirent deg-s azal n 88 n twaculin. Mi nerza ɣur-s , muggren-aɣ-id yimezdaɣ-is s tmuɣli n usḥissef, tamuɣli n layas imi akken qqaren imezwura-nneɣ : “ Yal lɛella, tuɣ lalla”, qqaren diɣen :” Iṛuḥ wul ad yekkes lxiq, yufa leḥbab d imuḍan “. Ulac tin i ten-izeglen, uguren ggten-d fell-asen, yal tama d tiyarrist . Deg useggas 2017, anda tudrin-nniḍen, suturent allalen atraren n tmeddurt, imezdaɣ n taddart-a, mazal-iten deg usirem n timunent . Aɣerbaz amenzu, yemdel tiwwura-as, azal n snat tmerwin (20) n yiseggasen aya, d ayen i yerran inelmaden-nsen n uswir amezwaru, ad leḥḥun azal n kṛad (03) ikilumitṛen ɣer taddart n Mlata . Mi ara tedduḍ neɣ ara tadreḍ ɣer daxel n taddart, wicqa ad tnadid ɣef ubrid, imi wagi d awal kan . Abrid n taddart, mazal akken i t-ǧǧan yimezwura-nsen, d tizerggatin tudyiqin, d tiɛettabin, d isyaxen . Daya i yerran tiddin deg-s d ugur, ladɣa i wid i teǧǧa tgecrirt am yimɣaren d temɣarin, iggerdan imeẓyanen d tggerdatin . Ma yella-d umuḍin, yessefk ad uɣalen ɣer tinna n lejdud, ad t-id-ssuffɣen ɣer ubrid ukerrus i ibeɛden fell-asen azal n 800 n lmitra ɣef zzayla neɣ ɣef lluḥ ma ulac d abibbi. Ma d wid i yellan ɣer tama n wadda, yessefk ad d-lhun azal n yiwen ukilumitr alamma d abrid ukerrus .Akken i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen seg yimezdaɣ n taddart Mass Ɛumaṛ Tasayust :” am wakken i as-yenna Fellag , taddart-nneɣ tesɛa yiwen n uyaziḍ d yiwen uɣyul d yiwet n tezzut”. Awal-agi yeẓẓay deg wayen i yezzuɣur, imi ula d allal n trisit ixus nezzah. Azal n 12 n twaculin ur qqinent ara s lexyuḍ n wallal-agi i yuɣalen d tudert n yal amdan deg umadal . Tiwaculin-agi, bnant ixxamen imaynuten, qarbent-d ɣer ubrid, imi tudert anda llan yakan d amihi i dderya-nsen. Ayen i d-ijebden lwelha neɣ tamawt, d aman yeblulɣen neɣ tizuliɣin, imi ulac iqadusen ara yessufɣen aman-agi, d ayen i yerrran imezdaɣ, yal yiwen ad yeɣz tasraft-is deg wayla-s. Ayagi, yegla-d s yiwen wugur meqqren i tfarkiwin-nsen, i lɣella-nsen d tezmert-nsen . Deg wussan n tegrest, imezdaɣ n taddart-a, ladɣa wid i yebnan ɣer tama-nniḍen n yeɣzer, heǧben deg uxxam, ur ttizmiren ara ad d-fɣen. Ulac kra n tqenṭert neɣ kra n umezgar ɣef wayeg ara d-zegren . “D ahbuh, d taluft”, am waken i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen seg yiɛeggalen n usqamu n taddart-a Mass Yusef Das, yerna -d: ” Di 2017, mazal nessaram timunent, mazal nessaram tafat, mazal nettargu ayen i ttidirent tudrin-nniḍen. Ad nessuter seg yimḍebbren n tɣiwant, seg yimḍebber n wasun n Uẓeffun ad d-rren lwelha ɣur-neɣ , ad aɣ-d-fken amur-nneɣ am nekkni am tudrin-nniḍen “. Di taggara n temlilit-nneɣ d At Isummaten, nezmer ad d-nini taddart-a, tettidir gar tatut d usirem.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kader Belaidi 

  
 Nnger n yiɣersiwen, aṭas-aya tura segmi d-yebda deg Tferka n Ugafa. Imi mazal latarat i d-yeskanayen belli ula d izem d waytma-s, llan nuḥen meqrub Ilel Agrakal. Wanag ass-a deg wussan-a, ma nekkes wid i d-yettrebbi umdan deg uxxam, drus maḍi n yiɣersiwen i d-mazal deg lexlawi. Ad d-nebder seg-sen uccen, ilef, ifker, awtul n lexla, inisi, ifis, azirdi d kra-nniḍen. D acu, ayen i d-ijebbden tiṭ tallit-a taneggarut, d amek i d-yesnulfa umdan ssenɛa swayes ara yessenger s wudem arusrid iɣersiwen-a; yuɣal yettnadi-ten anda nuḥen yesseqdac-iten di leḥruz. « Tikkelt iɛeddan nufa tama uxxam-nneɣ yiwen n yifker neṭṭef-it-d. Nebɣa ad d-nekkes aqeclum-is ad nbexxer yes-s. Qqaren-d yelha aṭas i tukksa n wayen yellan diri-t ». Akka i aɣ-d-tenna yiwet n teḥdayt seg Ayt Smaɛel. D abrid-a ihi i yefren umdan akken ad ineɣ s uɛemmed iɣersiwen-a i simmal ttfakkan. Kra n win ara yerzun ɣer ugezzan, neɣ ccix, ad as-d-yettwacreḍ uɣersiw, ilaq dindin ad t-id-yaf ɣas s waṭas n yidrimen. Ladɣa imi ula deg leswaq, tikwal ttilin yiɣersiwen-a i win yebɣan ad ten-yawi i leḥruz. Dɣa deg Bgayet, yal mi ara d-ibin uɣersiw seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ i wallen n umezdaɣ, ladɣa ifker d yinisi i isehlen i tuṭṭfa, dindin ad t-yeḥzeq d ameḥbus deg uxxam. Di leɛḍil ad d-yaweḍ wass-is. Ɣas ma yella inisi tuɣ tetten-t kra « ɣef teksumt-is taẓiḍant » akken i d-qqaren, ass-a yettruḥu s ṭṭaqa d asfel i ubexxer am uɛeqqar. Ma yella nebɣa ad aɣ-d-qqimen kra n yiɣersiwen d inaragen (lǧiran), yessefk ɣef yinesdabuyen idiganen (autorités locales) ad d-gen asaḍuf ara iḥudden ɣef yiɣersiwen-a ineggura. 

  M. K. 

  
 Ass-nni n larebɛa yezrin, 27 deg waggur n cutember 2017, i d-tefka tneɣlaft n Usegmi aɣelnaw Massa Nouria Benghabrit, deg tansa (le site) n tneɣlaft-is leğrida n yikayaden unṣiben n taggara n useggas-agi aɣurbiz 2017 / 2018. Ihi ha-ten-in amek ara d-asen: Akayad n taggara n uswir amenzu 5e, ad d-yili ass n larebɛa 23 deg waggur n maggu ( 28/05/2018). Ma d win n taggara n uswir n ulmud alemmas, yettwassnen s yisem n BEM, ad d-yili seg wass n letnayen 28 alamma d ass n larebɛa 30 seg waggur yunyu (28-29-30/05/2018). Ma d win n taggara n uswir n tesnawit neɣ ayen iwumi qqaren BAC, ad d-yili seg wass lḥed 03 yunyu alamma d ass lexmis 07 deg waggur n yunyu (03-04-05-06-07/06/2018). Ma akayad n waddal ama d win BEM neɣ d win BAC, ad t-sεeddin yinelmaden deg yiɣerbazen-nsen am yiseggasen i iɛeddan. Akayad-a, ad d-yili gar tlemmast n waggur n meɣres d tazwara n waggur n yebrir n useggas i d-iteddun. Akayad n taggara n uswir amenzu 5e n useggas aɣurbiz 2017 / 2018, ad t-sεeddin yinelmaden deg yiɣerbazen-nsen anida qqaren, mebla ma rzan ɣer yiɣerbazen-nniḍen, am wakken xedmen deg sin n yiseggasen-agi yezrin. Ma nger tamawt ɣef leǧrida-agi n yikayaden n useggas-agi aɣurbiz amaynut, ur temgarad ara ɣef tin n useggas yezrin, imi ulamma ugin deg useggas-nni i iɛeddan ama d imawlan n yinelmaden neɣ d inelmaden s timmad-nsen ad sɛeddin ikayaden-agi unṣiben n taggara n useggas deg waggur n Remḍan, ladɣa win n BEM akked win n BAC, imi ɣef leḥsab-nsen ttenqasent tzemmar n yinelmaden yettuẓumen, ladɣa wid n lwilayat n unẓul n tmurt, anida tettaweḍ lḥamu ɣer 50 n tfesniwin, maca taneɣlaft n usegmi imi d nettat i d timḍebbart tamezwarut n uḥric-agi n usegmi, dɣa teṭṭef deg rray-is ur teẓẓuẓ ara ikayaden-agi ɣef waggur n Remḍan.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 D tidet, imukan n umerreḥ d usɛddi n wakud xuṣen aṭaṣ deg temdint n yimceddalen. Maca, llan kra n yimukan, d-acu kan xuṣen deg kra n ttawilat. Ad nebder medya n wurti « Ɛaskri Akli » i qublen ṣbiṭar n yimceddalen « Yaḥya Kasi ». Urti-agi, neɣ tamazirt (jardin) wessiɛ-it, yelha yettawi aṭaṣ n yemdanen. D-acu kan iruḥ degs-ent, akken qqaren medden. Yerwi. Yettuɣal kan ɣer deffir yeqqar mazal. Lukan kan ad gren iffasen-nsen imḍebren n tɣiwant, ahat zemren at reqɛen, ad yeṣlaḥ aṭaṣ i yimezdaɣ n Mceddala, yagi i warrac anda ad uraren. Urti-agi n « Ɛaskri Akli » tella degs tafuwwart d-acu kan terrez, ulac degs aman. Teqqim akken d-amdun amectuḥ. Isekla xuṣṣen bezzaf. Kra kan yellan rran-d tili ɣef kra n yimdanen yettɣimin din. Amkan-agi ulac degs ikersiyen. Imdanen, neɣ ilemziyen i kečmen ɣer tɣimin ɣef ukerṭun f lqaɛa akkit ! ulac ya ɛaǧaba ula d-akersi anda ad yessers amdan azagur-is ! Yella daɣen deg urti-agi imukan n turart mebla…tawil n turart ! Isegassen-nni iɛeddan, llan akkeni kra n tawilat n turart deg urti-agi, maca ur neẓri ara s-anida iten rran ?(anwa?). Ulayɣer ad nebder rṣaḍ d yiḍuman « yessan » deg tɣerɣert n wurti-agi. Tiqarɛatin n blastik, tidak n lbira d crab (bṣaḥt-hum ur nelli ara mgal tissit !) xedmen tirac sya u sya, dagi dihin ! Win yeswan kan, neɣ yečča deg wurti-agi, ad yeǧǧ kulec din, ama d-učči neɣ d-iqarɛunen. Ulac tigzi, ulac laqder. Aɛh, yeqdaɣ ayen neẓra akka deg wurti-agi n mcedalla, awah ay adnaw at reqɛen ad yuɣal amzun d tamazirt yeččuren d lward. Ay at laɛrad, ur nefhim ara tigert, imi imḍebren tɣiwant kren ad bnun yiwen n wurti nniḍen deg temdint-agi n mcedalla. Urti-agi mazal-it deg weḥric n lebni, ur kfin ara lecɣal degs. Yezga-d s kra n lmitrat kan ɣef tassenawit Ben Badis. Yaɛni, iwacu kan ur ttreqiɛen ara urti n « Ɛaskri Akli » i d-yezgan zdat n ṣbiṭar, akken ad cuḥen i tedrimt n wurti amaynut, sawyes ad xedmen asenfar nniḍen? 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax.Y.  

  
 Neḥḍer almi i d-tewweḍ tallit ideg amdan ur yessemgerrad gar sswab ed teɛwijt. Segmi i d-yekcem unebdu-ya deg teɣzi-s, tezga tmurt tettnezlaz, igenni yexneq, imeẓẓuɣen ttbeɛziqen, ma d allen zun sbennayent seg yifeṭṭiwjen-nni i d-ssufuɣent, isaɣuren yetterḍiqen (feux d’artifices), neɣ lbumbat n yigenni, uɣalen, lwaḥi d tḥerrayqin yettfelsiɛen, d lɛada tamaynut i d-yennulfan deg Tmurt n Yizwawen akked temnaḍin nniḍen, imi yal ttiɛad n tmeɣra ad ten-tafeḍ ɛemren ddeɛwa, ssettruyen agama ed twennaḍt, rnu sneqmisen yal amdan. D asteqsi i d-iḥettmen iman-is, amek ɛemmden yinesdabuyen (autorités) ttnuzunt tɣawsiwin-a timihanin am widak yerna ama i umecṭuḥ ama i umeqqran ? Zik d lbaruḍ kan i ssufuɣen medden bac ad beyynen tumert n tmeɣra-nsen, ma d tura d lbumbat, tiɛdawin n twennaḍt, i yewwin allaɣen n medden almi tthewwilent tawennaḍt tal taggara n ddurt, neɣ tikwal ulama tazwara-s neɣ deg tlemmast-is. Tin ɣur-s, ur neẓri anda yewweḍ akka usegmi inmetti imi idles i aɣ-d-yettwasɛerḍen ad t-nesserbu. Ɣas ma ɣlayent ayendin tbumbatin-a n yigenni, maca amdan ur d-yecliɛ deg waya ɣas ad iɛemmed i twaɣit, lebɣi-nni ed tadfi-nni mara ad iceyyaɛ urar-is deg yigenni, ugaren takkit. Da ihi i yedda ugdud deg leɣlaḍ ameqqran, ladɣa mi tettwali tuget dakken taluft-a tura teqqen i cciɛa ed zzux, yettusemma win igan tameɣra ur yesterḍeq ara tibumbatin-a am wakken zun acemma ur t-iga! 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Segmi ara d-tezziḍ deg Bouaiche iwakken ad teṭṭfeḍ abrid awilay wis 98 ara yessiwḍen alamma d M’chedallah, anehhar yettmagar iɛewwiqen ur nesɛi leḥsab. Aɣbel amenzu yella-d mi akken tikebbaniyin yesseddan isenfaren n waman d lgaz i yettaǧǧan abrid deg yir liḥala mi tgezmen iwakken ad sɛeddin iqudas. Deg umkan-a beddemma deg Bouaiche, segmi akka i ssawḍen aman d lgaz ɣer kra n yixxamen, ǧǧan iɣisi deg tlemmast n ubrid, d ayen yessaɛwaqen tikli i tkeryas. Deg wussan-a n ugeffur, imukan-nni udren am wakken yuder wakal i as-dlen iɣisi-nni, d ayen yeweɛren aɛeddi mačči d kra. Ma terniḍ-d akka kra n uqeddim ɣer zdat, tama n La Crête-Rouge, ad d-naf liḥala yecban tamezwarut-a s ssebba n usɛeddi n yiqudas imeqqranen n waman. Dɣa dinna, ad d-tinniḍ d taḥemmalt i d-iɛeddan imi icerrig yugar tafawet i ixedmen. Asmi ara yezzi umsebrid tama n M’chedallah, nnig n yiɣisan-a ad naf ibabdren yemseḍfaren wa deffir n wa almi ɣef teɣzi n wazal n 15 ikilumitren, ugar n 30 n yiḥebbasen i yettwaxedmen. Seg Wasif Asemmaḍ alamma d Aɣazi, tɛeddiḍ ɣef At Yexlef, liḥala n ubrid d tin yenṭerren, imi ɣef leḥsab n yimeslayen n yimdanen yattaɣen abrid-a yal ass “seg wasmi ttɛeddin da ikamyunen yessawaḍen akal s abrid ameqqran, abrid-nneɣ yenṭer mačči d kra, almi ass-a ttgamin yinehharen ad ɛebbin i tkeryas-nsen.” Seg tama nniḍen, d imawlan n yifurguten yessawaḍen imdanen iɣef yers lḥers s waṭas imi d nutni i yettɛeddin acḥal n tikkal deg wass.

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Smail M. 

  
 Mi tga tɣiwant anejmuɛ-is ansayan tikkelt iɛeddan, iɣer ttwaɛerḍen yimezdaɣ, at umussu asduklan, akked yineɣmasen, aṭas i d-ibanen tthennan, wiyaḍ ssaramen belli taɣiwant-nsen ur as-mazal xilla ad tekcem dayen tawwurt n tneflit (développement). Aya mi d-sneɛten yimḍebbren n tɣiwant tiṭ ɣef liḥala n yisenfaren-is; anda kkan yiqburen, ed melmi ara sqelɛen imaynuten i yettwajerrden yakan. Deg umeslay, yella-d usenned ladɣa ɣef kraḍ n yisenfaren d imeqqranen; winna n usiweḍ n waman seg Lɛenser Azegza, axdam n ubrid ɣer Uweqqas seg Tecruft ed Kefrida, asekcem n ugaz n lḥiḍ i yixxamen, akked useggem n yiberdan n Taɛisert-Tigratin-Lmerj n Yiɣil, ed winna n Taregragt-Bumejber-Burafaɛ. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Ma nemmeslay ɣef umezwaru i d-nebder, i yeɛnan taɣbalut n tudert, ɣef wawal n uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel atan yettwajerred tura, qqiment-d kra n tigawin akken ad t-sqelɛen. Abrid n Tecruft kifkif, i ttraǧun yimezdaɣ ad yekfu war ssber, mazal-as kan assaw n ugidrun imalasen (semaines) i d-iteddun. Qqimen-d yisenfaren n uqqan n ugaz i tnezduɣin akked uqeɛɛed n yiberdan. Dɣa, imi i d-dukklen akken wa deffir wa, ilaq tazwara ad mmagen yiqadusen n ugaz abrid abrid ddaw tmurt send ad asen-tettwaxdem tduli s ugidrun. Ad d-nesmekti ɣer taggara, belli yella-d deg umsegraw umeslay ɣef waṭas n yiqeddicen, i wa ileḥḥem, wa deg ubrid!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Yewweḍ-aɣ-d ussan-a kan sɣur Tenmehla n Uḥuddu Aɣarim (Protection Civile) n Bgayet yiwen n wulɣu d amaynut ideg i d-ddan leḥsabat n yineḍruyen, tuffɣiwin d twuɣa deg setta n wayyaren imezwura n useggas-a 2017. D ameslay ɣef umḍan amatu n tuffɣiwin, yewweḍ merra ɣer 13 828. Gar-asent 6007 ɣer yimuḍan neɣ ɣer yimejraḥ seg uɣelluy, axeddim, atg. 836 d tuffɣiwin n usellek ɣer yisehwa (laksidat) n yiberdan, i d-yesseggran 999 n yimejraḥ, d 28 n yimattanen. Ayen i d-ibanen s waṭas diɣ deg usḍisyur-a amenzu, d indaren n tmes i yewwḍen ass mi d-yeffeɣ wulɣu ɣer 676. Amḍan-a yerza akk imeḍqan. Am wakken ttwajerrdent 3620 n tuffɣiwin-nniḍen am i ttiɛadat inaddalen, neɣ i lmend n tirzi n yimḍebbren,atg. Ma yella ɣef wayen icudden i yilel, ɣerqen deg teftisin n Bgayet ɣef waṭas n tsebbiwin 5 n yimdanen deg wayyur n yunyu. Dɣa jerrden ssrabes n Uḥuddu Aɣarim azal n 810 000 n yiɛewwamen ar tura. Ma nga aserwes gar tallit yecban ta n yilindi, ad naf aseggas-a, zadent merra tuffɣiwin. Ula d indaren n tmes ur d-llin uggten imi d-llan azal n 400.

   M. K. 

  
 Ass n 28 deg ctember iɛeddan iga-d yimḍebber amezwaru n waɣir n Bgayet yiwet n tirzi n usefqed i kraḍ n tɣiwanin i tesɛa tdayra n Yiderginen: Iderginen, Tasexriwt, Ayt Smaɛel. Mass lwali d win i d-yeẓran ihi ddeqs n yisenfaren ed wamek leḥḥun lecɣal-nsen. Imi deg Tsexriwt yesḍal ladɣa ɣef Wammas n Usileɣ Amsadur, tamkarḍit n tɣiwant akked uxxam n tɣiwant deg Lberj n Mira. Send ad ikemmel ɣer Ayt Smaɛel anda iwala tazwara tasnawit tamaynut i yettwaldin taggara-ya kan, ed waddad deg tella. Send ad d-isub daɣen ad yezzi tamuɣli ɣer temkarḍit n tɣiwant i mazal akken tella kan acḥal-aya tura, imi ulac tadrimt swayes ara mden yiqeddicen-is. Akken ɣer taggara n tuffɣa-ines i Udrar n Fad, yenwa mass lwali ad iḥewwes i uxxam n tɣiwant, ad n-iwali amek tga tegnit n uqeddic, ladɣa imi sey-a d asawen sɣur tɣiwanin ara ttwanefkayent tkarḍiwin n nnekwa. Deffir n tirzi-ya ihi, yuli ɣer turin n yiɣermanen (citoyens) yiwen n usirem d ageɛmer, amer ad d-teglu s tidet s ubeddel i ttraǧun, i tneflit n temnaḍt-nsen deg kra n yiḥricen xersum, am win n baylek, idles, akked tdawsa (santé). 

<p style="text-align: right;">Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Tameṭṭut tessers-as-d aḍebsi n seksu n yirden s yibawen, terna-as-id tifelfelt taqurant sdat-s. Argaz ixẓer akin akka ssyin inna-as : ‘’ tameṭṭut aɛni ur tessewweḍ ara tasekkurt-nni ! ‘’Ay argaz aɛni turgaḍ, neɣ yella kra i ak-id-ibdan?’’. Yerra-as: ‘’tassekkurt-nni i d-nɣiɣ di lḥara ! Yak d kemm i yi-d-issawlen a tt-an tsekkurt la tkess di lḥara, ddmeɣ-d tamekkḥalt jebdeɣ fell-as teɣli temmut’’. ‘’Ay argaz, ɣur-k wi aɣ-id-isellen ! Ad aɣ-awin medden d awal ! Melmi akka d-ttrusunt tsekkrin di lḥara?’’, i t-tqubel. Tḍeffer-it alammi iskadeb iman-is. Isusem, ičča imensi ssyin iffeɣ ɣer tejmaɛt. Iṣubb-d ilemẓi-nni si tkanna, tenna-as : ‘’yak tesliḍ-d i kullci ?’’, i as-tenna. Ihi, ruḥ kemmel abrid-ik, qeddem ad teɣreḍ. Ilemẓi-nni, iffeɣ seg uxxam-nni ikemmel abrid-is. Ileḥḥu, ileḥḥu alammi yewweḍ ɣer yiwen n uxxam d aɛezzab, teffeɣ-d yiwet n tmeṭṭut tluɛa-t-id tenna-as yya kcem-d s axxam. Ikcem s axxam, iswa lqahwa syin tenna-as ax-n idrimen, ruḥ aɣ-iyi-d tlata kilu n sardin u tɣiwleḍ-d. Ilemẓi-nni, iṭṭef idrimen iruḥ iwwi-as-id sardin. Mi d-yewweḍ urgaz-is, yessendeh-itt ad d-tebru i tyuga. Tebra-d i tyuga ssyin tenna-as taṣebḥit-agi zemreɣ ad dduɣ yid-k ur sɛiɣ kra n cɣel dagi deg uxxam. Argaz yenna-as akken i am-ihwa a tameṭṭut. Ffɣen akken ɣer tkerza. Netta ikerrez, nettat teṭṭeggir deffir-s sardin teqqar-as kan ay argaz la d-iteddu sardin ! Argaz izzi-d ɣer deffir iwala-d d tidet, tameṭṭut-is ad d-tjemmeɛ sardin. Akken iččur ucekkar tenna-as i urgaz-is :’’ay argaz ad uɣaleɣ kan s axxam ad t-sewwaɣ ma ulac ad ixser’’…tettkemmil. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

 
  
 Karim Khelfaoui, d yiwen ucennay ameqqran n tmedyazt d tezlit n tmaziɣt tartar. D mmi-s n Wat Wagennun.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Azul fell-ak a Mass Karim Khelfaoui, amek telliḍ ussan-a?.  

  Azul i yizzayeriyen,  d yimaziɣen merra anida ma llan. Aql-aɣ labas, lḥemduleh, akken kan yebɣa Rebbi. Ddima nekk d leqdicat idelsanen, yal tikelt anida : tikelt d timeɣriwin ; tikelt-niḍen d tidwilin n radyu d tiliẓri (…). Ttidireɣ am nekk am yimdanen merra, ass d iṭij, ass-niḍen d ageffur, am lḥal n yigenni.

  Deg tazwara anwa i d Mass Karim Khelfaoui? 

 Luleɣ deg taddart n At Brahem, deg tɣiwant Ait Aissa Mimoun, deg temnaḍt n Wat Wagennun deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Imi baba d agrawliw ameqqran, thud-aɣ Fransa axxam-nneɣ yellan deg taddart n At Txelfat, dɣa iruḥ baba yezdeɣ ɣer iḍewlan-is, dɣa dinna i d-luleɣ. Maca ass-a ttidireɣ deg taddart n At Txelfat. D yiwen i iḥemmlen tamedyazt d ccna seg temẓi, dɣa kecmeɣ deg unnar-agi n uẓawan nekk mazal-iyi d ameẓyan. D acennay yeddan d lwaqt-agi. D win iḥemmlen ad isel i yicennayen-nneɣ imeqqranen, d win i d- irebba lḥif n udrar…

  I melmi tebdiḍ ccna?. D acu n ssebat i d ak-yeğğan ad d-tecnuḍ tizlatin ?

 Azal n 20 n yiseggasen-a deg-mi bdiɣ cennuɣ, imi tuɣac-iw akk timezwura ccniɣ-tent deg yiseggasen n tesεin. Ihi ccna bdiɣ-t asmi lliɣ sεiɣ 21 neɣ 22 n yiseggasen deg leεmer-iw. Acu kan, deg tazwara bdiɣ ccenuɣ isefra n umedddakkel-iw amedyaz Salah Zayef, syin seg 2000 d afella i bdiɣ ccenuɣ tamedyazt i xeddmeɣ nekk s timad-iw.

 Ma d tamentilt i yi-ğğan cennuɣ wa ad sefruɣ d, tamezwarut d tukci Rebbi, tis snat d tayri, tis tlata d ayen akk nettidir deg tudert n yal ass.

  Anwa asefru neɣ tasfift swayes tettwasneḍ aṭas? 

 Tasfifit swayes ttwasneɣ mliḥ, iban d akken d aḍebsi-iw amezwaru iwumi semmaɣ «Wisen ma ad am-yexdem leḥsan». Ma d tizlatin swayes mechureɣ aṭas gar-asen-t:«Am wallen tizraraqin, semman-iyi medden sufğeɣ, ay irij, a mmi zuɣer-iyi-n deg ufus, tazeqqa n lejdud»

  Imi am wakken neẓra, tesεiḍ amecwar ɣezzif deg ccna. Ihi inni-aɣ-d achal n tesfifin i d-suffɣeḍ yakan? 

 Suffɣeɣ-d, yakan, mraw 10 n yiḍebsiyen . Amenzu d «Wissen ma ad am-yexdem leḥsan» i d-yeffɣen deg 26 deg waggur n yulyu 1993, ccniɣ deg-s 06 n tuɣac: «wisen ma ad am-yexdem leḥsan, am wallen tizraraqin, semman-iyi medden sufğeɣ, ayen ayen…». Ma d wis sin d «Taftilt» i d-suffɣeɣ deg useggas n 1995, ideg llant 06 n tezlatin. Deg useggas n 1996 suffɣeɣ-d CD wis kraḍ, semmaɣ-as : «A tin i yi-yuran deg twenza-w». Aḍebsi wis ukuẓ «Ibujaden n tayri» yeffeɣ-d deg useggas n 1998. Ma d tasfift tis semmuset «Seqsi iman-ik d acu-k?», d tis seddiset «Ґef zewağ-iw yurez-iyi ckal», ffɣent-d deg useggas n 2001. Ma d tasfift tis sat teffeɣ-d deg useggas n 2004, tinna iwumi semmeɣ«Tayri-w tamezwarut zegleɣ». Aḍebsi wis ṭam «Ay irij», yeffeɣ-d deg useggasn n 2006, ma d wis tẓa «Tazeqqa n lejdud» deg useggas 2009. Ma d tasefift taneggarut akka tura d tagi n 2016, tinna iwumi giɣ «Ur d- yegri deg yidikel uqluj».

  Acu n yisental iɣef tccenuḍ tizlatin-ik? 

 Ma d isental iɣef i d-wwiɣ awal deg tmedyazt-iw, mačči d yiwen neɣ d sin, gar-asen: tigujla, tayri, lḥif, taneḥyaft, lefraq, tayemmat, asirem, tajmilin, tudert-nneɣ tura, timetti…

  Tura ma nuɣal-d ɣer tesfift-agi taneggarut n 2016, nwala yella-d deg-s umaynut, amek armi?  

 D tidet deg tesfit-a taneggarut n useggas-agi, yella-d deg-s umaynut deg sin yiḥricen. Aḥric amezwaru d win n yisental imi ad tafem deg-s isental yemgaraden ɣef widak i nnumeɣ xeddmeɣ (tayri , lefraq…), tikkelt-agi tella-d tejmilt i ufennan-nneɣ ameqqran nettεuz s waṭas “Muḥend Raḥim», tayeḍ daɣen i tyemmatin s umata. Am waken, daɣen, i d-tella tmedyazt tamḥaddit deg snat n tezlatin. 

 Ma d aḥric wis sin d win n uẓawan imi tura nulfan-d aṭas n wallalen n uẓawan imaynuten, am wakken, daɣen, llan wid yessnen mliḥ ad wwten allalen n uẓawan. Anect-agi akk yella-d s waṭas n uxeddim d truẓi uqerruy, mačči akagi kan i d-yusa.

  D acu i d tamuɣli-k ɣef ccna n taqbaylit tatrart? 

 Tamedyazt d tezlit tazwawt yella anida tewwuḍ s amkan i d as-iwulmen imi nesεa imedyazen d icennayen yesaẓayen tizlit taqbaylit s umata ɣer sadt. Imi nesεa daɣen ifenanen d iḥeddaden n wawal d lemtul, yerna neğren abrid i tmussni. Imi diɣen i d-yella umaynut deg wayen yerzan isental d uẓawan (…). Am wakken, daɣen, yella wacu i yexusen, imi llan kra n icennayen ur snernayen ara timusniwin-nsen, neɣ ur d-ttawin ara amaynut i tezlit n neɣ i tmetti.

  Amek i ilaq ad yili ucennay deg tmetti? .

 Accenay ilaq ad yili d iman-is uqbel kulci, neɣ ad ylil d amdan am yimdanen akk-niḍen. D ayen yettwali d ayen yettḥulfu u d ayen yettidir ara t-idemmren ad yesefru neɣ ad yeccnu. Ilaq ad yili s wazal-is, s leqdder-is. Ilaq ad yili yerẓen, yerna ad yawi iseɣ i temtti-inesd lemri n tmetti-ines. Ilaq ad yili d inigi ɣef tallit-is, d netta i d aktay n ugdud-ines.

  Anwa icennayen iwumi tḥemmleḍ ad tesleḍ? 

 Am wakken neẓra akk, aṭas n yifennaen imeqqranen i nesεa. Ihi nekk selleɣ s waṭas i yiɣerbazen n ccna n teqbaylit, lḥasun mačči yiwen ad d-nebder isem, gar-asen: Cherif Kheddam, , Atmani, Lounis Ait Menguellet, Matoub Lounes…atg. Am waken ,daɣen, smeḥsiseɣ i yicennayen-a imaynuten, yal yiwen s yisem-is. Nekk lḥasun ḥemmleɣ akk ad suzegteɣ i ccna n teqbaylit igerrzen, ama d tin n zik neɣ d tin n tura.

  Amek zemrer icennayen ad ԑiwnen tamaziɣt?. 

 Amedyaz neɣ acennay yezmer ad εiwen tamaziɣt ma yella yesskfel-d awalen neɣ lemtul iqburen. S tmedyazt inḥureb ɣef ugerruj n tutlayt-nneɣ. Yal yiwen ad yexdem ayen yezmer; ama s wawalen iqburen ama s imaynuten, ama s yinzan …

  Acu ara asen-tinniḍ i yicennayen imaynuten?. 

 Ilaq acennay ur yettḥiri ara akken ad d-yessuffeɣ tamedyazt-is deg yiḍebsiyen (C D). Ilaq ad iciwer win yessnen kter-is, maca ilaq ad yili deg taɣult-a n tmedyazt, ad tiwleḥ akken ad yesuffeɣ ayen yelhan, izeddigen ara iεiwnen idles-nneɣ. 

  D acu n yisenfaren i tsewjadeḍ sya ɣer sdat? 

 Sewjadeɣ aṭas n yisenfaren sya d afella, gar-asen: tasfift tamaynut deg useggas n 2017. Yella yiwen n leqdic daɣen deg tefsut n useggas n 2017, ula d netta s wazal-is, imi ad nezzi i ukuẓ (04) neɣ semmus (05) n tmura deg lurup. Ad ccnuɣ nekk d yiwet n terbaεt tamaziɣt ideg llan 3 n yicennayen, yiwen d amzabi wayeḍ d acenwi, yerna nekkni d 3 d Izzayriyen, ma d wayeḍ d acelḥi n tmurt n Lmaruk.

  Awal-ik n taggara… 

 Tanemmirt-ik ɣef tdiwennit-agi i yi-txedmeḍ i nekk d leqdicat-iw idelsanen. Tanemmirt tameqqrant i Uɣmis n yimaziɣen imi yi-iga azal, ad awen-iniɣ afud igerrzen i kunwi d uɣmis-nwen. Ad iniɣ tanemmir s tussda i wid akk i yi-ḥemmlen, d widak yesmeḥsisen i tuɣac-iw. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t: Adaoun Ghani 

  
 Gar wayen i yesnernan igemmaḍ n yikayaḍen n yal aswir n leqraya deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ad naf tizmilin-nni igerrzen i d-ttawin yinelmaden deg tutlayt n tamaziɣt. Xas ulamma mačči d tamaziɣt weḥd-s kan, llant ssebbat-nniḍen, am yimawlan i yetabaɛen leqraya n warraw-nsen, iselmaden i ixeddmen seg wulawen-nsen, aḥemmel n tutlayin tibarraniyin sɣur inelmaden iqbayliyen, anadi ɣef tmussni d tussna, acu kan, tamaziɣt, tesnerna igemmad s waṭas, armi tewweḍ lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu , teṭṭef amḍiq amezwaru i useggas wis tmaniya, wa deffir wa. Awal yemmeɣ d akken d tamaziɣt i d-yessulin igemmaḍ-a. Neɛreḍ ad nwali s leqreb, deg unnar, ma nezmer ad d-nawi ttbut ɣef wanect-a. Nwala tasnawit Ali Mellah anda qqaren akk yinelmaden tamaziɣt. Nesteqsa aselmad n tmaziɣt n tesnawit-a, Mass Karim Chaouche, ɣef tezmilin n yinelmaden d wamek i tezmer tanga-a ad tesnerni igemmaḍ n BAC. Yenna-d :’’95,53 % n yinelmaden wwin-d ugar 10/20 deg ukayaḍ n BAC. Ihi, tezmilin-agi, ɛawnent aṭas inelmaden i wakken ad ssiwḍen ad sɛun 10/20 neɣ ugar deg BAC. Mi ara nwali azal n 60 n yinelmaden i yesɛan ddaw 11/20 deg BAC, ad naf lukan mačči d taneqqiḍt-nni n tmaziɣt i ten-id-yessulin, ur ssawaḍen ara 10/20, meḥsub ur d-ttawin ara BAC.’’ D wa i d ttbud i aɣ-d-yefka uselmad-agi n tmaziɣt i yettmeslayen s yisem n xemsa-nniḍen n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt i yesselmaden deg tesnawit Ali Mellah n Draa El Mizan. Aṭas n yinelmaden i d-yeqqaren, diɣ, d akken tamaziɣt tettɛawan deg usegzi n temsirin n tutlayin-nniḍen. Ladɣa deg temsirin n tjerrumt.’’ S tmaziɣ i yeshel ad nefhem tamsirt n tjerrumt deg tmaziɣt. Syin, mi ara tt-nefhem, tettɛawan-aɣ ad nefhem timsirin n tutlayin-nniḍen imi qrib kif-kif tajerrumt.’’ I d-yenna yiwen unelmad. Zyada ɣef wanect-a, ad naf assaɣen gerrzen gar yiselmaden akked yinelmaden. Aya, yettak afud u yettaǧǧa inelmaden ad ḥemmlen, ‘’meqqar’’, tamaziɣt deg uɣerbaz. 

 Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, aselmed n tmaziɣt yeṭṭef ciṭ taqacuct deg uɣerbaz imi ɣer yiselmaden-is, mačči kan d tamsalt n uɣrum, tella deg-s temsalt n nnif akked tirrugza. Akka i aɣ-d-nnan kra deg-sen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.Moula 

  
 Timetti taqbaylit d yiwet n tmetti yettwasnen s leɛwayed d wansayen id ǧǧan yimezwura ama d lejdud neɣ d tasuta id aɣ-d yezwaren anda is ḥefḍen i waraw nsen akken ad ṭfen deg wansayen-agi , gar wansayen -a ad d naf timecredt , tiwizi , asfukel n yennayer , ayaggi akk yes i ttwasnent tudrin leqbayel s leɛwayed n lejdud s yin akkin ad d naf yiwet n taddart i yeṭṭfen ula d netta deg wansayen -agi taggi d taddart n at racced id-yussan deg usammer lwilaya n tubiert meḥsub d yiwet seg tudrin leqbayen i mazal ar ass-a d wussan seqdaccen ansayen n zik imi xeddmen ass n tlata iɛedda yiwet n tmecredt d tameqqrant s wazal-is ilmend n lmulud anda ttekin akk imezdaɣ id-yezzin i tama-agi azal n 600 twaculin i yellan di tegnit-a imi d tagnit anda temlal tassa d way turew wwind , am wakken nezmar ad d-nnin ula d wid ur yesɛin ara ama d iẓawaliyen neɣ d imeɣban fkan-asen amḍiq nsen ɣas akka tefraɣ taxṛit nsen si tedrimt ur ten-ǧǧin ara ad ɣaben ɣef tmeɣra-agi ixeddmen acku tagnit ara yesferḥen akk tiwaculin n taddart-a rrnu ɣur-s ad illin di ttiɛad akken ma llan ,ɛlaḥsab iɛeggalen i qeddcen di tmecredt-a nnan-d belli nesaweḍ s yidrimen ijemɛen uɣend 6 n yizegran imi aṭas n twaculin i yellan di ttiɛad ,Rnu ɣer waya yal tawacult neɣ yal taxxamt fkan 2000 idinaren i yal tawacult ḥaca wid ur yesɛin ara dacu kan ɣas akka ur d-mmuden ara ameɛa ula d nutni ad awwin lḥeq , Si tama nniḍen wekkden-d ass n tmecredt akk imezdaɣ ttilin ama d imeqqran neɣ d ilmeẓyen ladɣa imeqqranen n taddart imi d nutni iwumi fkan azal s waṭas s yesen i tleḥu taddart acku tignatin yecban tiggi tettilid s ɣur-sen anda id -mmalen amek ara xeddmen meḥsub amek ara tili lewziɛa neɣ ajmaɛ n yidrimen ,Dacu kan ayen ifazen di temlilit-a akk ilmezyen n taddart ass n tmecredt ttajan ula d axeddim nsen iwakken ur sen -tesfat ara tagnit amzun d ass yemgaraden ɣef wussan nniḍen ttakend afus lemɛiwna yerna akken ad issinen ad cfun iwayen xeddmen ,Ayen id-yufraren daɣen di tmecredt-a ula d tameṭṭut tesɛa azal-is imi ttikent ula d nutenti s wayen nniḍen imi yal axxam ad d-naf yal ta dacu tetthegi neɣ tesewjed di lweqt-nni imi xeddment tibaqiyen n seksu s wacḥal isufar aten-ceyɛen ass-nni ɣer umkan ixeddmen timecredt acku hesben-tt d sadaqa rrnu s annect-a begnen-d kra n yimezdaɣ ɣef leqdic-agi d tagnit anda ndeɛu ɣer Rebbi sebḥanu sayen lɛali ɣer lxir ad tenerni tegmat gar taddart-a am wakken d tagnit anda deɛun ɣer Rebbi iwakken ad d-awwet lehwa imi azal n kra sin wayyuren ur d-wwit ara akken ad tekker tfellaḥt , yella-d daɣen nehu n yilmeẓyen ɣ wayen ddiri ad ksen tiɛdewt yella gar yemdanen di tama-agi ḥaca ayen lɛi ara d-yezzin di temnadt-agi akken ad tejujeg ad tenerni di ccan n taddart am wakken timecredt-a ad teqqim d ansay ur yettwattun ara ad ṭṭfen deg-s am akken tella d amedya i tudrin leqbayen id-sbegnen s wudem yesefraḥen s wayen akk icudden ɣer tmetti taqbaylit ama s wansayen neɣ leɛwayed i mazal jehden di tama-agi n at racced ihi nnan-d nessaram akken ur ttaken ara afus di leɛwayed n zik ad teqqim d amezruy n taddart akk d cfawat i tsuta id i teddun 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Abdelhak Menas 

  
 Mbaεd 30 n yiseggasen n lγiba n unaẓur Yidir, imdane it-ḥemlen akked imezdaγ n temnaḍt-is At-Yanni d taddert-is At-Laḥsen ggren-d nnahta, imi id-yuγal yetri γer irebbi n tmurt-is, γer wakkal n lejdud-is i t-id-isekren. Γas akken yebεed acḥal n yiseggasen maca yeṭṭef dima deg isseγ-is, deg yedles-is amazi&amp;gamma,; imi amennuγ-is mači n wass-a. Tuγalin-is γer tmurt n Lezzayer tella-d d tunḍct yelhan i waṭas n leqbayel, imi tettunnefk-asen tegnit akken ad-mlilen yid-s ilmend n tfaska n tgemmi adelsan n leqbayel id-yellan deg ussan n 05 almi d 09 unbir 2015. Deqs n yemyura d yinaẓuren i yellan di ttiεad-agi adelsan, ger-asen Tasaεdit Yassin, Kamel Ḥamadi, Kamel Tarwiḥt, Mohamed Saadi d wiyaḍ niḍen. Ass larebεa yezrin 11 deg aggur n unbir ideg nella, yidir igger irebbi i temlilit akked ineγmasen deg usensu n Snat n Tezdayin «Les Deux Palmiers» di temnaḍt n Draε Ben Xedda, lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu. Deqs n yineγmasen id-yerran i teγri akken ad-ḥṣun s yisenfaren n ucennay Yidir, tamentilt n lγiba-s deg annar n cna di tmurt n Lezzayer deg seggas n 1979, d acu i yebγa at-yexdem sya d afella. Syen yerra-d s wul zeddigen γef deqs n Yisteqsiyen n yineγmasen, am ayen icuden γer tsartit d tdamsa n tmurt, timmanit n leqbayel. Deg useggas n 1977, tizlit n Yidir « A Baba Inuba » tufrar-d ger yetran, yal tamurt di ddunit slan-as syen suqlen-tt γer tutlayin niḍen ma drus 30. Aselway n tmurt n Lezzayer di tallit-nni, Hewari Bumedyan, yebγa ad-iẓẓar Yidir, yussad γer tmaγra i-yexdem deg tzeqa n coupole di Lezzayer tamanaγt, netta akked yemḍebren meqren n tallit-nni. Yidir muḥal yecna deg seggas n 1979 di tmurt n Lezzayer ar ass-a, sebba imi ulac win is-yesawlen, wama yebγa ad-yecnu s wul zeddigen deg irebbi n tmurt-is, maca yezga yettara-d i tinubga n tmura n tmazγa am Lmaruk dTunes, akked tmura n lbarani, am Fransa, Kanada d tiyaḍ niḍen. Γer tagara yidir imeslay-d γef lalbum-ines ara d-yefγen sya d afella, imi tura yebda yettheggi akked icennayen meqren n tmurt n Fransa am Charles Aznavour,Maxime le Forestier, Patrick Bruel, Bernard Lavilliers akked tcennayt n tmurt n Irland Sinead-Marie O’Connor. Dγa lalbum-agi ad-yeffaγ di tefsut n yimaziγen n useggas id-iteddun (20 yebrir 2016).

 Acennay yidir, tuγal-as tejmilt ddurt yezrin di temnaḍt-is At-yanni s tikci n ciεa  » Itri n Lfeṭṭa ». Akken id-yerza γer taddert n Yigarsafen, taγiwant n At-Yeğğar di temnaḍt n Wizgan, yerra tajmilt i yimezdaγ n taddert-agi zeddigen, imi tudert yelhan tettek-d di tezdeg.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Tamussni i d-aɣ-d ğğan lejdud-nneɣ, ur tt-id wwin ara seg uɣerbaz, neɣ seg tesdawiyin, maca sefrurin-tt-id seg tmussni n tudert-nsen n yal ass. Tamussni ɣur-sen, d ajgu alemmas n tudert n umdan, axeddim yis-s d lssas n usnerni d usirif ɣer sdat. Ur tenfiɛ ara weḥd-s, acku ilaq ad tenneḍ deg ubernus n ttrebyya, i d-irennun i umdan lqima d lkarama. Tamussni tcudd ɣer liman, yenna Luqman ideg lewṣaya i mmi-s: ‘’a mmi, am wakken ur d-tettṣab ṣsaba alamma s waman d wakal, ur yenfiɛ liman siwa ma s tmussni d uxeddim.’’ Lejdud-nneɣ, ffeɣen-d deg uɣerbaz n tuddert. Aɣrebaz-agi, yettjerrib-iten ddima, syin yesselmed-asen timsirin d temɛaytin(d yinnan), lemden ɣef ufus n uselmad i iweɛren mačči d izli. Maca lewɛara-s, trebbi-d irgazen, trennu tettṣeggim tisuta [asget n tsuta (lğill).], terna tessemɣay-d asirem deg tuddert-nsen. Tessefham-asen-d lesrar n ddunit, yerna tesselmad-asen ayen ilaqen ad t-issinen. Tesselmad-asen amek ara zerɛen lewqama d leṣlaḥ s leɛqel, amek ara sɛun lebɣi i tigawt neɣ i uxedim mačči i wawal. Syin, yuɣal leɛqel-nsen (llmux-nsen) yugger ameslay-nsen, yesselmed-asen d akken tamussni mačči d lqewwa, maca lqewwa tettilli deg usexdem d usleɣmu (aṭbaq) n tmussni-a, rnu ɣur-s cbaḥa n tmussni, tettbin-d deg leṣlaḥ neɣ awenaɛ n uexdim.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Agdud mebla idles am umdan mebla iles. Idles yebna ɣef tutlayt, amezruy d-teskla,… atg, syen ad-tlal tɣerma. Aṭas n yimusnawen irefden idles n tmurt almi yewweḍ ɣer tqacuct. Aṭas n yimusnawen i irefden idles n tmurt almi yeweḍ γer tqacuct. Aṭas i yuran γef umezruy, uguren d iγeblan n tmurt akked cbaḥa-s. Ger yemyura agi yella yiwen gar tgejda n tsekla Tazzayrit wagi d Mulud Ferεun, d amyaru azzayri s tutlayt tafransist, isem-is aḥeqqani Mulud At Caεban, ilul i tmurt leqbayel ass n 8 di meγres 1913 deg Tizi Hibel deg At Dwala. ikcem ar uγarbaz amenzu di Tewrirt Musa. Syen yuγal yekcem γer « le college » n Tizi-Wezzu di 1928, anda iykemel amecwar-is leqraya. 1932,rebεa iseggasen mbaεd yewwi-d agerdas, yuγal yekcem γer uγerbaz amagnu di Lzzayer tamanaγt, tama n Buzarriεa asmi yesεa 19 iseggasen di leεmer-is. Labaεda mi yesεedda amzizwer yeffeγ-d s ugerdas n uselmed. Deg useggas n 1935 yesselmed di taddert-is Tizi Hibel. Yuγal d anemhal n uγerbaz n Tewrirt Musa, ssyinna γer uγerbaz n Larebεa n At Yiraten. Aseggas 1960 yuγal d amesweḍ. Mulud Ferεun yumen swayen ixeddem, ticert swayes yettaru qeṭṭiεet, temsed itira. Yettkel aṭas γef tira-s acku yessen amek izarreε awal, yal win arat-yeγṛen yezmer ad yefhem. Mulud Ferεun ikred ger twacult tigellilt, ikred yelḥif d laẓ. Γas aken uguren n yal ass id-yettaf s zdat-s yessaweḍ yelmed deg uγarbaz aṛumi, ilqeḍ-d tamusni zedigen am waman, yugmed di tala tmusni swayes yessew tasekla Tazzayrit, isufeγ-itt-id si ṭlam γer tafat. Tira n Ferεun tcud γer laεwayed tiqbuṛin n tmurt leqbayel, igemmer-d d gayen yelhan, annect-a yesbeggen-it-id deg wengal-is amezwaru  » Mmi-s n ugellil. Syen yesbegen-d tudert n twacult tazzayrit di temnaṭ n leqbayel. Ar yidis n wangal agi yura daγen ungalen niḍen  » Akal d-idamen », »Ibardan yettalin », »Aγmis »d « Isefra n Si Muḥ U Mḥend. Yesbegen-d miḥyaf yellan ger sin yegduden, agdud azzayri d imawlan n tmurt, d wegdud afransi id-ikecmen s rrṣaṣ d idammen. Rnu yefka-d iḥulfan-is d tmuγli-s γef wayen iḍerrun di tmurt n Lzzayer ledγa di lawan n ṭṭrad. Ass n 15 meγres 1962,yiwet n terbeεt n l’ OAS tessufeγ-d Mulud Ferεun seg unejmu&amp;epsilon,; rnan-d γur-s 5 n yemdanen niḍen (Σli Ḥamutan, Salaḥ Uld Awdiya, Robert Aimzrt, Marcel Basset d Max Marchand), tsenned-iten γer lḥiḍ, syen akin teqreṣ fell-asen s arṣas tenγaten.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;">  I. B 

  
 “D ahdum, d taluft, Aẓeffun yettidir gar snat twuɣa, urɛad tefri yiwet, tennulfa-d ultma-s”. Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen seg yimezdaɣ n temnaṭ-agi .

 Tamezwarut, d yiwet n tlemẓit i yesɛan setta uɛecrin (26) d aseggas di laɛmeṛ-is, isem-is Ibaɛzizen Ḥafiḍa, n taddart Ibaɛzizen, taɣiwant n Tmizar, lɛaṛc n At Jennad, maca teddirir nettat d twacult-is deg Uẓeffun. D tuḥrict, d tumɛint, teɣɣar di tesdawit n Tizi-uzzu. Gar teswiɛt d tayeḍ, Ḥafiḍa Ibaɛzizen, teɣli gar yiɣuraf n waṭṭan, d ssiɛqa i d-ihummen fell-as d twacult-is d kra n win i tt-yesnen. Kkawent tgeẓẓal-is (insuffisance rénale), ula d timacinin-nni i as-yessizdidigen idammen (Dialyse), uɣalent ur nfiɛent ara. Tazmert, teɣli , ur d-yeqqim deg-s lǧahd. Imejjayen-is ,walan ala yiwet n tifrat, yessefk, ad tɛiwed tigeẓẓal (greffe renale) di tmurt n Fṛansa. D ayagi i yerran imezdaɣ n Uẓeffun d imezdaɣ n Tmizar, ad sdaklen iɣallen-nsen, ad sdaklen tikta-nsen akken ad jemɛen azal n umelyar n yiseṭimen akken ad tt-ceyyɛen ɣer tmurt n Fṛansa . Ass n lǧemɛa 17 di maɣres tanezzayt, azal 150 n yilmeẓyen s tkarrusin-nsen i yeṭfen abrid akken ad d-sutren tadrimt di tudrin n lwilaya n Tizi wezzu, tizi n tinzert imi arraw-is, zgan tteklen ɣef yiman-nsen. Iɛeẓẓugen , Tigzirt , Iɛekkuren , Iɣil n Zekri, d tigi i d timnaḍin ɣer wanida ara rzun . Ma d imezdaɣ n At Jennad, fɣen ɣer temnaḍin-nniḍen i d-yeqqimen: Qqaren Wat zik : ‘’Win i ten-yesɛan deg udrar, ur yettaggad ara deg uzaɣar’’. D tag i d tagmat di tallit n ddiq, d tag i d tinzert di tallit yeẓmen. Send, ad tefru twaɣit-a, yeɣli-d uhdum-nniḍen. Yeɛreq yiwen uqcic ass-nni n lexmis. Segmi yeffeɣ ɣef tlata d uzgen n tmeddit ur d-yekcim s axxam, Kra yedda yiḍ, qeccuc meccuc wer yerkid, iɣezran, imudaɣ, iberdan, iri n lebḥar, ur ǧǧin amekkan. Lǧemɛa, kra yedda wass d anadi, Tigzirt, Bgayet, Assif n Lḥemmam, anda i d-iban cwiṭ n ccek, rzan ɣur-s . Targayt, tessaɣli ifadden, tegzem ifewdan. Bu qellaq, yettban ɣef wudmawen . D ass aberkan ɣef yimawlan. Ad tili d tlata d uzgen (3h3O), ass-nni n lǧemɛa, mi d-ssawlen yiɣallen n laman i baba-s u nnan-as mmi-k iban-d, nufa-t. Acu kan, mazal aqcic ɣer yiɣallen n laman imi yettkemmil unadi ɣef ssebbat i yellan deffir tedyant-a. Awi-d kan imi i dyuɣal s axxam, yuɣal-d RAHIM Taḥarbuct ɣer twacult-is, ɣer taddart-is, ɣer yimdukal-is. Ilaq tadyant-a, ad teqqim d tamsirt , d amedya i yimawlan s umata . lḥaṛs? diri-t, ttnefcic diri-t, tulya n tewwurt diri-t. Yessefk yal ababat, yal tayemmat, ad rren s lmendad i dderya-nsen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kader Belaid  

  
 Ma d adlis wis sin «D ulaqrar ad yali wass», tewwi-d deg tmacahut-agi awal ɣef sin watmaten d inilban «Ʃmara» akked «Yidir». Terẓag tudert-nsen mačči d kra, ṛwan rray-nsen ula d ddunit terra-ten deg rrif. Maca ɣer taggara yeffeɣ-asen leɛtab ɣer tafat, yufrar usigna ɣef yiṭij-nsen. Uɣalen ula d ijeǧǧigen n tefsut ǧǧuǧǧgen-asen-d ferḥen yis-sen. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli Massa Hammadi Fatima, tlul deg useggas n 1955 deg Yaḥacen deg lɛerc n At Yanni. D tagujilt n yimawlan deg ussan yimezwura n tudert-is imi mmuten deg lawan n tegrawla tazzayrit. Tḥemmel aṭas timucuha d tira s umata, yis-s i d-teqqar ayen akk i tt-yuɣen d wayen ur tezmir ara ad d-tini s wawal usrid. Tettara-t d tamedyazt neɣ d timucuha. Akka tura tesɛa aṭas n yidlisen-nniḍen i iwejden mazal kan ur d-ffiɣen ara.Afud igerrzen i tmarut, d tɣuri igerrzen i yimeɣriyen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> A.A 

  
 « Suseq agaman, ad yuɣal d-aṛabeɛ » (chasser le naturel, il revient au galop) akka i d-yeqqaṛ yiwen wanzi s tṛumit. Ayagi, nebɣa ad nmaɛen ɣef tuɣalin-agi n laɛwayed lakked d yidles aqbuṛ ɣeṛ « wannaṛ » n tmetti nneɣ. Am akken, iqbayliyen ẓṛan belli uṛ yettdumu ḥaca ṣṣaḥ. Iseggasen-agi inegguṛa, walan imeɣnasen n yidles lakked tutlayt imaziɣen, belli timetti nneɣ tuɣal tegeṛ-d lwelha ɣeṛ iẓuṛan-is. Dayen yessefṛaḥen aṭaṣ. Ayagi dayen i xedmen imeɣnasen acḥal iseggasen-aya akken ad yufṛaṛ yidles Amaziɣ, iṛuḥen am akken « ad yengeṛ » tallit-agi yezṛin, yagi ass-mi yebda udabu taseṛtit-ines n-uɛeṛeb yuɛṛen aṭaṣ! Iseggasen-agi inegguṛa, yuɣal Amezwaṛu n Yennayeṛ yettwassen geṛ medden s-umata, wigi uɣalen xedmen-as ccan akka s yimensi, s timecṛeṭ akked laɛwayed nniḍen. Deg tama-agi n Ṣummam, amezwaṛu n Yennayeṛ ɛeydent medden akken ilaq. Yuɣal yettwassen aṭaṣ geṛ medden. « Ula d nukni nesɛa ṛibiyun-nneɣ! (réveillon) » akka i d-qqaṛen imaziɣen. Am akken yuɣal-d wassif ɣeṛ lḥaddis. Yemlal umaziɣ lakked yidles n yimezwuṛa. Lḥaṣun, ass-nni n Aṛam, imezdaɣ n tama n Ṣummam fkan-as azal-is i « sidna » Yennayeṛ, aqeṛṛu n-useggas amaynut Amaziɣ. Akken neẓṛa, dagi dihin, ixxamen n yidles, ixxamen n yilmeẓyen lakked yiɣeṛbazen begsen akkit akken ad ɛeyden Amezwaṛu n Yennayeṛ. S temzizliyin, s yiselsa iqbuṛen am tqendurt n lfuḍa, abernus,…s tuččiyin (seksu s-ucedluḥ, seksu ubisaṛ, lɛeṣban, tiɣerrifin, atg.) s ticeqqufin, s cna akked s tinawin (conférences) ɣef cucneq, agellid Amaziɣ i hettken Afeṛɛun Ramsis wis III, 2966 isegassen aya. D-agellid-agi Alubi-Amaziɣ (Lybico-Berbère) i d-yeǧǧan asakud-agi (cette date historique). Ass-agi n-umenzu n Yennayeṛ icud-d yides laɛwayed nniḍen tiqburin. Akka ihi, aṭaṣ n tuddaṛ, am Lemṣella (At Mellikeč), neɣ Tawṛiṛt u Ɛebla (At Ṛẓin) ma yella ad nebdeṛ kan tigi, xedment timecṛaḍ (timecṛeṭ) akken ad ɛeydent i wass-agi n Yennayeṛ ameṛbuḥ. Am deg taddaṛt n Tawṛiṛt u Ɛebla (At Ṛẓin) ẓlan azal n 10 i ɛeǧmiyen neɣ igenduzen, i feṛqen ɣef twaculin n taddaṛt-agi deg yiwen n lfeṛḥ muqṛen ! Akka, imezdaɣ sfilin ayen yelhan akken ahat igenni ad iseṛṛeḥ i watas n-ugeffuṛ. Ay at laɛṛaḍ, qquṛent tfeṛkiwin, isaffen neqsen degsen waman, aman ulac deg taɛwinin,…tawaɣit! D-acu, tilawin ssutṛent deg yillu n-ugeffuṛ, Anẓaṛ, akken ad d-iseṛṛeḥ i waman n yigenni. Wissen ma yella yesla-d neɣ ahat ala.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;">  Syphax Y 

  
 Asmi d-luleɣ, sbedden-d ajenwi nnig n dduḥ-iw, nnan-d : «Cehhed ! Ddu d ddin-ik, uɣal d ineslem» s ddreɛ, mebla ccwer, mebla lebɣi.

 Asmi meqqreɣ, gziɣ timsal, mmugreɣ-d ddiyanat nniḍen, maca yiwen ur iyi-d-yemmeslay fell-asent, ama deg uxxam, ama deg uɣerbaz…

 Aselmad-iw yeqqar-d : «ineslem n diri axir n lkafer n lɛali».

 Asmi meqqer, nnan-d ilaq ad tt-uẓumeḍ aggur. Nnan-d : «wagi d aggur n rreḥma»

 Uqbel ad d-ibin waggur, tulli ssuma di kullec.

 Iban-d waggur, yekfa ccek. Azekka ad yebdu waggur n Remḍan. Imdanen d aɛezzar alamma d lawan n sḥur azekka-nni ad tt-wwten d iḍes ass kamel.

 Tameddit imi ara d uɣaleɣ deg umahil-iw, ttmagareɣ-d imdanen ssuḥuben iman-nsen d asuḥeb, ttemderkalen deg ubrid am wid-nni isekren, iḍarren teddun, allaɣen ṭṭsen. Inyiren kersen, teǧǧa-ten taḍsa. Ifadden kkawen, iqudam d iwraɣen, allen d tizeggaɣin ctaqent iḍes. Alamma feqɛen kan ara t-fiqeḍ belli ukin, imiren ad tt-naɣen ad tt-suɣun.

 Lɣaci amek i as-ɛeddayen lweqt-nsen ? Deg wuzal, irgazen ass kamel d iḍes, ma d tulawin ass kamel di tenwalt. Deg yiḍ irgazen tt-uraren Duminu, lkerṭa aked luṭu, tilawin zdat n tiliẓri tt-ferriǧent isura n Yimasriyen. Yal ass lhem yettkemmil.

 Kra ara yekker waggur n Remḍan, lɣaci tt-ɛassan ccix n lǧamaɛ melmi ara yadan.

 Yal yiwen s wacu yettruẓ Remḍan-is, wa s zlabiya, wa s ttmer d uyefki… Imir-nni ad aɣlin ɣef učči, ayen yellan ad ɛeddin fell-as, alarma qerẓeẓin. Mi ččan rwan ad nnecraḥen wulawen. Ad uɣalen ad ttaḍsan, ad d-uɣal tudert udmawen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Bussaɛd Ḥemar 

  
 Yella ddurt-a iɛeddan umedyaz Brahimi Lxeyyer deg Uweqqas ilmend n yiwen n usarag s wazal-is ɣef yizamulen n rrqem ɣur Yimaziɣen i yellan d tigemmi turtangawt (Patrimoine immatériel). D asarag i d-thegga Tdukkla Azday Adelsan n Uweqqas, i d-yuɣalen s tegnatin-a n yisaragen yal ddurt, s yiswi n ukemmel deg umennuɣ adelsan s umata. Ladɣa mi ara yili d tira s tutlayt n Lmulud At Mɛemmer. Ugar n tegnit n yisefra, imi inebgi n wass-nni d amedyaz akken i d-nezwer yakan ameslay, yesseɣzef awal Mass Lxeyyer Brahimi ɣef yizamulen n rrqem d umezruy-nsen ɣer Yimaziɣen d lḥala n tgemmi-a ass-a n wussan. D lemɛun, d tabrat i tra tmeṭṭut n tmazɣa ad tessiweḍ i tsutwin deg yiqennucen n yideqqi i yettwaseqdacen ula i tgella. Deffir waya, yella-d uskasi sɣur yimeḥḍar, ama s yisteqsiyen ɣef umezruy d unamek n tidet n yiriten-a n rrqem neɣ d tamawin ɣef usentel-a yakan. Syin akin, yella-d usenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen n umeskar: yiwen ɣef rrqem, yeffeɣ-d deg useggas n 2010 s uzwel n « Yal azamul yesɛa azal », wayeḍ d ammud n yisefra iwumi yefka azwel « Tisit n Udrar n Fad ». Idlisen-a, ffɣen-d s tallelt n Tidukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad, yuɣ lḥal.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi  

  
<p style="text-align: center;"> Mass Salhi Mouloud, d aselway n tiddukla 

 “Tafaska-agi n tmedyazt tamaziɣt d yiwen seg leqdicat idelsanen i txeddem tiddukkla-agi-nneɣ. Ass-a, nefreḥ aṭas imi newweḍ ɣer tezrigt tis mraw. Gar yiswiyen n tmelkilit-agi d timlilt s timmad-is gar yimedyazen d iḥeddaden n wawal, akked wid iḥemmlen awal iweznen, d usenεet n wayen sεan d agerruj, am wakken i d-yettili usbini n yimedyazen imaynuten. Nessaram d leqdic ara d-yettuɣalen yal aseggas, yerna ad yeglu s ujdid”.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Mass Zidane Yacine, aselway n tesqamut n uktazal 

 “D timsizzelt iεeddan deg tegnatin yelhan, yella-d usqerdec n wawal gar-i d yiεeggalen-nniḍen n tesqamut i ufran n yiḍrisen. D tidet, yella wugur deg ufran n yisefra, imi llant snat n tewsatin n tmedyazt gar teqburt d tetrart. Nessaram ad yili warraz i tmedyazt taqdimt wayeḍ i tmedyazt tamaynut i wakken ur nteg ara amgired gar snat n tewsatin n tmedyazt tamaziɣt. Acu kan nekkni ur nessemnyif ara yiwet ɣef tayeḍ”.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Mass Malek Houd d Mass Salem Amrane 

 “Nefreḥ aṭas s tejmilt-agi i d aɣ-tga tiddukkla tadelsant Itri n Akbou. Fernen-aɣ-d i lmend n leqdic-nneɣ d umecwar-nneɣ ɣezzifen deg tmedyazt. Ur neẓri ara deg sin s tejmilt-agi almi d ddqiqa taneggarut. Ad nesnumer aṭas tiddukka-agi ɣef leqdic-is s umata d tejmilt-a s wuzig, imi i d as-neḥder deg sin gar waṭas n yimedyazen-nniḍen”.

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Yiwet n tikkelt llan xemsa yiderɣalen zedɣen deg yiwet taddart. Yiwen wass yusa-d ɣur-sen yiwen seg yimezdaɣ yenna-asen : ɣurwat ha-t-an yella lfil deg taddart ass-a !

 Nitni d iderɣalen ur ẓrin d acu ay d lfil. Ihi nnan-as, ɣas ur nezmir ara ad t-nwali ad neɛreḍ ad yes-s nḥulfu. Kkren ihi ṛuḥen akk s anda akken yella lfil-nni sakkin nnulen-t akk yiwen yiwen. Yeddem yiwen yenna-as :

 – Hey ! Lfil am tgejdit  » ay as-yenna win yennulen taɣmas-is

 – Awwah ala ! am wemrar ay as-yenna win sin ay yennulen taseḍḍa-is.

 – Awwah, awah, ala ! D afurek annect ila-t nṭṭejṛa  » ayas-yennan win yennulen abuq-is (inzer-is).

 – D tasebbaḥrut tameqqrant  » ay d-yenna wis ukkuẓ (4) mi yennul ameẓẓuɣ-is

 – Wa d aɣalad ameqqran  » ay asen-yenna wis sḍis mi yesferfed deg uɛebbuḍ-is.

 Ihi bdan la ttemjadalen, mkul yiwen yettḥettit belli d ayen yumen netta ay d tidet. Mi d-iɛedda wemɣar azemni iwala-ten ur ttemsefhamen ara dɣa yeḥbes, yesteqsa-ten :  » D acu yeḍran akk-a ?  » Nnan-as :  » Ur nezmir ara ad nemsefham ɣef wamek ay iga Lfil ! » Sakkin kulwa yefka-d ṛṛay-is. Yeddem uɛeqli-nni yessefhem-asen s terẓen kan ed tekyest belli d tidet akk ay nnan. Yenna-asen axaṭer kulwa deg-wen yennul amur seg tfekka-is, maca s tidet Lfil ila aglamen akk ay d-tefkam imi yal aglam n wemḍiq ay yennul. 

 Dɣa feṛḥen imi sawlen-d akk amur seg tidet.

 Ihi anamek n temɛayt-a d amur n tidet ay yellan deg wayen ara d-yini yal wa. Tikwal nezmer ad nwali tidet-a tikwal ur, acku wehhan yiswan-nneɣ ɣer tnila yemgarrden. Ihi yif ad as-nini ahat yal wa ɣer-s ifukal-is wala ifukal ur nettfuku.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yessuɣel-itt-id Hamid Oubagha 

  
 Nassima Rabehi d yiwet gar tmedyazin neɣ timaruyin i yefkan ruḥ-is i tmedyazt n teqbaylit neɣ n tamaziɣt s umata.

 D yiwet gar tidak i yesnarnan azal n tmedyazt n teqbaylit. Tefka azal d ameqqran i tmedyazt n teqbaylit taqburt, imi i d-tḥawec aṭas n yisefra n teqbaylit ɣer temɣarin. Tban-d aṭas ɣer unnar n tira deg useggas n 2014. Ass-a ,ɣur-s yiwen wammud n yisefra, d taḥawact seg timawit-nneɣ. Tlul ass n 15 deg yunyu 1967, deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt. Ma tura tezdeɣ deg At Lqern, i d-yezgan deg temnaḍt n Buzeggan, di tmurt n Leqbayel. D tamedyazt imi tebda tira n yisefra deg useggas n 1988, dɣa asefru amezwaru i tura, tsemma-as “Leḥmala”. Lḥasun d ddunit i tt-iseɣren imi d-teğğa aɣerbaz zik, bḥal akk tilawin n leqbayel. Seg temẓi-is, tḥemmel taɣuri, tamedyazt d tmussni. Xas akken tebda tira n tmedyazt deg useggas n 1988, maca teğğa-ten kan deg rrif, yuli-ten uɣebbar. Dɣa, tezwar deg usizreg n tmedyazt n temɣarin n temnaḍt n Buzeggan, teğğa tin-is d taneggarut. Ma d ayen yeԑnan tamentilt (sebba) i tt-yeğğan ad teḍfer abrid n tira n tmedyazt, ad naf d akken d iḥulfan-is d wayen akk tettidir deg tmetti-nneɣ. Am wakken, diɣen, tḥemmel ad d-tsel i temɣarin mi ara sefruyent, d yisefra i d-as-d-teqqar yemma-as. D tamarut imi tura, yakan, adlis-is amezwaru i d-yellan d ammud n yisefra s teqbaylit, tefka-as azwel “Ammud n tmedyazt n temnaḍt n Buzeggan”. Yeffeɣ-d deg taggara n useggas n 2014, ɣer tezrigt “El amel”. Llan deg-s 67 n yisefra n waṭas n temɣarin n temnaḍt-is yecban: yemma-s Zwina, Nna Werdiya n At Yeḥya, Nna Yamina n At Σebbas, Nna Seԑdiya n At ugujil, Nna Faḍma akked setti-s tameԑzuzt Izemraqen ( snat-a tineggura uwḍent leԑfu Rebbi) … Ma d isental iɣef i d-yewwi wammud-a n tmedyazt, mačči d yiwen neɣ sin, gar-asen: temẓi, tameṭṭut, lḥif, lɣerba, zwağ, zzher, lwaldin, tagrawla, amjahed…atg Massa Rabehi, la tettheggi aṭas n yidlisen, ara d-yeffɣen deg yiseggasen i d-teddun, gar-asen: ammud n yinzan, ammud n temseԑraq, tullis, ungal d tsuqqilt n tmacahut-nni “Le Petit chapeau rouge” s teqbaylit.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Adaoun Abdelghani. 

  
  Isufar 

 Kra n tfelflin, Kra n ṭumaṭicin, Zzit uzemmur, Lmelḥ

  Aheggi 

 Glit ifelfel akked ṭumaṭic, rrem-ten daxel n tculiḍt n plastik alamma dayen semmḍit. Sqecrem-ten u tekksem-asen zzariɛa. gezmzt-ten ɣer daxel n tḍebsit n talaxt, rnum-as snat n tɣenjawin n zzit n uzemmur, terrem-t ɣef tmes taḥlawant. Kemmlet anegzun n yifelfel d ṭumaṭic akken daxel n tmes. Mi yewwa, rnut-as zzit. S tezmert-nwen 

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Sɣur Daya 

 
  
 Tikwal, yezmer ad yili ustehzi d afessas deg kra n yiḥricen, meḥsub ur d-igellu ara s lemḍarra tameqqrant, ad yettuneḥsab kan d astehzi. D acu kan mi ara yili ustehzi yeɛna tarwiḥt n umdan, wagi yettuneḥsab d amgerdt. Bab-is ulaq ad yettwaḥaseb fell-as. Neɣ meqqar ad as-d-afen tifrat sya d afella i wakken ur d-ḍerrunt ara tiyaḍ.

 Deg yimalas yezrin, teḍra-d yiwet n twaɣit i d-isersen leḥzen ameqran deg yiwet n twacult izedɣen deg Ain Bessem. Di leɛmer-is 41 n yiseggasen, tameṭṭut-a truḥ iwakken ad terbu deg sbiṭer n temnaḍt-a ideg I tezdeɣ. Maca, mi tt-ssawḍen ɣer din, ufan dakken ulac amejjay yetxeṣṣen i wakken ad d-yelhi yid-s. D ayen I yeǧǧan imḍebbren n sbiṭer-a ad tt-ceyyɛen ɣer…M’chedallah. Yeɛni ad tɛeddi ɣef Tubiret, i wakken ad ternu azal n 40 ikilumitren iwakken ad taweḍ ɣer Mayu. Deg ubrid, imi lḥal-is iḥar, abrid ɣezzif, tameɣbunt-a ur tessaweḍ ara rruḥ ɣer sbiṭer anda I tt-ceyɛen, temmut deg ubrid gar yifassen n wid I tt-yewwin. Dɣa din I yendeḥ unadi ɣef tmettant-is, meɛna aɣbel meqqren, d acu yessawḍen ɣer liḥala yecban ta anda sbiṭer yecban win n Tubiret ur yesɛi ara imejjayen ara yettukelfen s tid ara yerbun. Daɣ, amek ara d-tas tmuḍint-a seg Ain Bessem alamma d M’chedallah, yeɛni seg Umalu s asammar, u nettat deg liḥala yenṭerren. D ayen I yesserfan mačči d kra ama d imawlan n tmeṭṭut ama d imdanen-nniḍen i yugaden ula d nutni ad d-ɣlin deg temcukkal yecban ti.

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> S. M 

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis yezrin, 28 deg waggur n cutember 2017 ɣef 15h30 n tmeddit, tella-d temlilit taseklant tis rrebɛa sɣur Mass Hachi Slimane deg Temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D timlilit yeddan ɣef teɣzi n snat sswayaɛ, yemselay-d umaru d umnadi ameqqran Mass Hachi ɣef tudert d yimuhal akked umecwar n uzamul n yidles d tutlayt n tmaziɣt Mulud Mɛemmri. D tanemhalt n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu Massa Goumiziane Nabila i d-yellan ɣef lmendad n temlilit-agi taseklant, d nettat i d-yefkan awal n tazwara, syin akin tefka-as awal i Massa Sebki s yisem-is d timḍebbert n usizreg n tesɣunt “Livers”, nettat s timmad-is texdem-d agzul i yimuhal d tudert n uselmad d umnadi Hachi. Sakin tefka-as aṣawaḍ i bab n usarag i d-yennan: “Mi ara yettmeslay Lmulud At Mɛemmer nekkni nettsusum, mi ara nettmeslay nekkni fell-as tɣeli-d tsusmi” I kemmel yenna-d daɣen: “Mačči d asmekti kan n tesmiḍent-is (1917-2017) i wumi ara nefk azal, imi argaz yecban netta, ilaq ad yili leqdic fell-as ɣef teɣzi n useggas alamma d lebda”. Yelḥa deg wawal-is ɣef tudert n Lmulud At Mɛemmer, dɣa yefka-d tanagit-is fell-as, d ayen i t-yeǧǧan ad d-yini: “Netta ur yettugad ara yiwen, imi tuɣ-it yakan inǧer abrid ara yawi dɣa yedda kan deg-s, ulamma aṭas n wuguren i d-imuger, maca ur yeqḍiɛ ara asirem, ur yessers ara leslah. Yak d netta i yeqqaren «Win yettruẓun asalu iteddu akken yufa, mačči akken yebɣa»”. Deg uḥric wis sin n usarag-agi, yewwi-d awal deg-s ɣef umezruy n tmurt seg 1871 i beddlen udem n umezruy n tmurt n Lezzayer. Imeslay-d daɣen ɣef tedyanin i iɛeddan ɣef tmurt ladɣa tid yesɛan assaɣ d tudert n Mulud Mɛemmri d ayen i d-yessban deg tira, dɣa yenna-d fell-as: “ Azamul-agi n tmussni d tɣerma tamaziɣt, ulamma ilul deg lqern wis 20, maca yedder lqern wis 19, imi i inuda fell-as aṭas dɣa ad tǧeɛleḍ imir i d-ilul”. Yewwi-d diɣ awal ɣef tira-s deg tɣamsa, imi yella yettaru s yisem n “Bouakaz” seg useggas n 1952 alarmi d aseggas n 1956. Yesseḥres daɣen i wakken tabrat-nni yura Mulud Mɛemmri iwumi isemma “tabrat i yiwen n Uṛumi” i d-yeffɣen deg yiwet n tesɣut tafransist ad d-teffeɣ seg tatut. Imi tettuneḥsab seg yiḍrisen igejdanen n tegrawla tazzayrit n 1954-1962. Imeslay-d daɣen ɣef temsirt tamezwrut n tjerrumt n tmaziɣt yexdem deg tesdawit n Lezzayer mebaɛd 1962, d umennuɣ-is ɣef tgemmi d yidles amaziɣ s umata. Syin, ijbed-d awal ɣef udlis-nni n “ L’Ahellil n Guraya”, dɣa yenna-d: “Lukan mačči d netta i d-yuran fell-as, ulac win ara yeẓren ass-a belli yella yettwaxdam yal aseggas”. Aṭas n tenfaliyin i icebḥen i d-yefka fell-as deg umeslay-is yenna: “Yettuneḥsab d amdan yesɛan rrebɛa n teṭṭucin, snat yettwali yis-sent ɣer sdat, snat-nniḍen yettmuqqel yis-sent ɣer deffir”, yettwali-t belli yeɛreḍ ad yexleq amdan ajdid, i ilaqen ad yagem seg uqdim syin ad yeddu d umaynut. Ɣer taggara, yeɣra-d Mass Hachi kra n yiḍrisen s tefransist deg udlis-nni “Mouloud Mammeri, Ecrits et Paroles” i tura yelli-s n Mulud Mɛemmi d yiwen n umnadi-nniḍen, gar yiḍrisen-agi i d-yeɣra, tella tebrat-nni iwumi iga isem “Tabrat i yiwen Uṛumi”, syin akin yeɣra-tt-id Mass Graine Arezki, d win i d-yelhan s tsuqilt deg Wulmis aɣelnaw n unadi n uqbel amezruy, tantrupulujit akked umezruy (CNRPAH), imi d netta s timmad-is i as-ixedmen tasuqilt ɣer teqbaylit. Mi yessuli asarag-agi-ines unemhal n CNRPAH Mass Hachi Slimane, iger-d tiɣri i yilmeẓyen ldɣa inelmaden yellan dinna, i wakken ad ɣren idlisen n yimura meqqren yecban Mulud Mɛemmri d wiyaḍ, uqbel ad ɣren ibarraniyen. Ɣer taggara maḍi n temlilit-agi yekfan lewhi n 17h00, yella-d deg-s wazal n 30 n ddqayeq n tririt ɣef yisteqsiyen n wid yellan dinna. Ad d-nesmekti belli Hachi Slimane d amaru n rrebɛa n yidlisen, am wakken daɣen i d-yura ugar n 33 n yimagraden n tɣamsa deg tesɣunin d yiɣmisen n ddunit merra. D aprofisur deg rrebɛa n tesdawiyin snat deg tmurt n Lezzayer, snat-nniḍen deg tmurt n Fransa, seg 2000 ar ass-a ha-t-an d anemhal n unadi deg wulmis CNPRAH n Lezzayer,…atg.

  A.A. 

  
 Yerna-d umerbuḥ nniḍen ar tsekla tamaziɣt , d ungal s wazal-is sɣur umedyaz d umaru ameqran Salem Zenia seddaw uzwel « aẓar n tagut » ar tezrigin Tira ,Salem Zenia gar wid i d-yufraren di tira n tmaziɣt yellan yakan d aneɣmas deg uɣmis le pays seld yeslul-d yiwen uɣmis umi isemma iẓuran deg useggas 1999 ar 2003 , Salem ɣas yettidir di tmurt n espenyul maca mazal yettkemmil tira s tutlaty n Dda lmulud , yura ddeqs n yedlisen am :

 Tafrara, Ungal, Tiẓrigin L’Harmattan, Paris, 1995.
