<p style="text-align: right;"> Dahmani Bilal 

  
 Nnan Wat zik : ‘’win yebɣan ad yegmu, yilqiq, win yebɣan ad yuzur, yirqiq, win yebɣan ad yidir, yemmet’’.

 Diɣ, netta armi i yemmut Kheloui i d-iban wazal yesɛa akked wayen i d-yefka i ccna aqbayli. Ass-nni n temḍelt-is, mačči d izli n lɣaci i d-yeqqersen ɣer taddart-is, Taddart tameqqrant, deg tama n Yiḥesnawen, i wakken ad ḥeḍren i lǧanaza-s. Aṭas n yinaẓuren i d-yusan ad t-walin i tikkelt taneggarut gar-asen : Ait Menguellet, Taleb Tahar, Rabah Ouferhat, Yasmina, Takfarinas, Dahmani Belaid, Mohamed Chemoun, Hacène Ahrès, Ali Meziane, Youcef Guerbas…atg. Uqbel ad t-id-awin ɣer taddart-is i wakken ad yemḍel deg wakal n lejdud-is, yuɣ lḥal tessens fell-as twacult-is lexwan deg uxxam-is i yellan deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Asmi yemmut, diɣ, wwin-t ɣer uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri anda i t-walan medden. Yella Kheloui Lounes, yuḍen aṭas-aya. Acu kan ussan-agi ineggura yenṭer u yekcem acḥal n tikal ɣer sbiter. Yekcem i tikkelt tamezwarut ɣer sbiṭer n Sanatorium n temdint n Tizi Uzzu anda i yettdawi lehlak n turin (la fibrose), yekka deg-s kra n wussan, syin fkan-as-d ttesriḥ. Acu kan ur iɛeṭṭel ara yuɣal ɣer sbiṭer n Tizi Uzzu imi yenṭer mliḥ. Xas ula akken yeqqaz deg-s lehlak, meɛna yal win ara yerzun ɣur-s, ad as-d-yemmeslay ɣef ccna akked album i d-yettaheggi. ‘’Asirem-iw d akken ad d-yeffeɣ deg ussan-agi album-agi i ttheggiɣ u ad cnuɣ tameɣra-w taneggarut deg Tizi Uzzu.’’ D wigi i d awalen i d-yenna i uɣmis La Dépêche asmi yerza ɣur-s ɣer sbiṭer n Sanatorium. Acu kan ddunit d mm leɣrur, akken qqaren, ur t-teǧǧi ara ad yaweḍ asirem-is wis sin. Meɛna, yewweḍ asirem amezwaru imi isellek asekles n 14 n tezlatin ass-nni 20 deg tuber iɛeddan. Yeggmen ad d-yessuffeɣ album-agi deg taggara n unbir i deg-i nella. Am wakken yeḥsa ad yemmet deg ussan-agi, ad as-tiniḍ yettciri. Yefka azwel ‘’Bqa ala xir a ddunit’’ i yiwet gar tezlatin-is-agi tineggura. Aṭas i yessḥassef Kheloui Lounes imi ur as-ffkin ara azal iwulmen dagi deg tmurt am wakken i t-yesɛa deg tmura tiberraniyin. Yemmut Kheloui deg leɛmer-is 66 n yiseggasen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.Moula   

<div> 
  
 Ihi Mass Azeddine Berkouk, d acennay amenzu n temnaḍt n uweqqas, d netta i yerẓan asalu i tezlit taqbaylit, acku deg wakud-nni deg tmetti-nneɣ d lɛib ad yecnu yiwen, yerna ttwalin acennay s yir tamuɣli. Lḥaṣun mačči d yiwet i yesɛedda. Dda Ɛezdin ilul deg taddart n Ayt Ɛisa (Aweqqas-Bgayet), deg tmurt n yiqbayliyen. Yekcem deg unnar n ccna seg-mi yella d abeztuḥ deg yiseggasen n 70. Yella icennu akked Mas Allawa Rabḥi i yuɣalen ass-a d aduktur n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt akked Naṣir Medjdoub i yellan ass-a d amyaru, d amnadi ilelli. Ihi Dda Azeddine, yekka-d aṭas n tudrin tiqbayliyen, yecna deg-sent taqbaylit tazeddgant ḥemmlen-t akk yimdanen, deg yimi-s dayem awal n tizeḍt i d-yettefɣen. Ayeni d-irennun tumert dakken yekker-d s yicewwiqen n yemma-s akked tezlantin n yinaẓuren iqbayliyen imeqqranen am Dda Slimane Azem akked Dda Ṣaleḥ Sadaoui.

 Ihi deg useggas n 1984 yessufeɣ- d tasfift-is tamenzut, ma d tis-snat deg useggas n 1986, dɣa seg yimir ur d-yessufeɣ tasfift. Ikemmel tizlit deg uzayez ɣer wayeḍ ? yerna yefka afus n tallelt akked uweṣṣ i waṭas n yilemziyen i yekcmen abrid n cna. Yerna yelddi allen i waṭas n yimdanen.

 Salim Bellouz d acennay awḥid i yerran tajmilt i ucennay-nneɣ.

 Ihi, seg-mi yerẓa Dda Azeddinz asalu i tezlit taqbaylit deg temnaḍt n uweqqas, aṭas i d-yernan kecmen abrid-a n tezlit, gar-asen Lmadjiid Adrar, Ait Ikni Boualem, Chekkal Laziz, Maamache Brahim, Ṭaher Aïsi, Djouder Ḥammou akked uletma-s Ḥmama, Agraw Isaffen,Tatiche, akked wiyaḍ.

 Ma deg taggara, ad greɣ tiɣri i tdukliwin tidelsanin n temnaḍt n uweqqas ad rren-t tajmilt i Dda Azeddine acku yuklal asnemmer, yerna yenḥaf aṭas. Ihi ad nekfu s yiwen n ubruy n Dda Azeddine i

<p style="text-align: right;"> Akli Ait Ighil 

  
 Tuɣal tmurt n leqbayel d tazeqqa n tmeɣriwin, yal tama d tafaska : tafaska n talaxt deg Maatkas, tameɣra n lfeṭṭa deg Wat Yanni, Raconte-arts deg Souama, ad d-tetteddu tmeɣra n tbexsisin d tqendurt n leqbayel deg Lemsella d Yihenziyen, ula d lkermus s tmeɣra-s. Acu kan ‘’Bezzaf i xeddmen lpulitik yinelmaden-nneɣ deg tesdawit’’, ɣef wakken i d-yenna Pr Arezki Derridj, imḍebber amezwaru n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu.

  
 Ilmend n useggas amaynut n yimaziɣen (2965) tidukla taḍelsant taɣerma i yellan deg tɣiwant n Ḥnif taddart n Iɣil nat Ʃamer thegga-d yiwen leqdic d amerkanti ahil n tdukla-a yebda ass n 11 seg yennayer s yiwet n temzikent ɣef tɣawsiwin tiqburin n tgemmi n leqbayel,syen akin tamdit n wass yella-d imensi n yennayer s seksu d uyaẓid,ass n 12 seg yennayer tkemel temzikent syen akin tamdit n wass yella-d umaṭṭaf n taddart anda i d-meslayen kra n yimɣaren ɣef wansayen n tmurt leqbayel,Ɛlaḥsab yiwen seg yimdebren n tidukla taɣerma mass Zaidi Sofian yenna-d i uɣmis n yimaziɣen d akken :iswi n tdukla d aseḥbiber ɣef yidles d tmagit n yimaziɣen u yisefk ɣef tdukla ad ttzuzer idles ɣef tsuta-agi timectaḥ.      

 <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>            

<p style="text-align: right;">Ziar.Ahcene 

  
 Teḍra-d ddurt iɛeddan yiwet n twaɣit tinmettit deg taddart iwmu ssawalen Leɛlam, taɣiwant n Temrijt, i ibeɛden s wazal n 50 n yikilumiṭren ɣef waɣir n Bgayet. D yiwen n yilemẓi bu 26 n yiseggasen, s tmezwura n B. K, i igan talast i tudert-is mi iɛelleq iman-is s temrart. Ɣef wawal n At temnaḍt merra, ur yelli umdan yuɣ-itent deg uqerruy neɣ yettwassen s tigawin tifuḥanin deg zik. D ayen i d-yeslalen ugar n uttḥeyyer d usḥissef deg wulawen n yimezdaɣ n usamar n Bgayet mi slan i yir isalli-a. Imir mi yettwaberreḥ isalli n unɣiman-a, kkren ssrabes n yiǧadarmiyen, wwin amerḥum. Am wakken sqelɛen anadi akken ad d-binent tegnatin tiḥeqqaniyin ideg i d-yella unɣiman-a.

   M. K. 

  
 Am useggas yezrin, mazal yettazzal wawal ɣef yidlisen n tmaziɣt n wahil amaynut n tsuta tis snat. Xas ulamma adlisfus n useggas amezwaru n uɣerbaz alemmas n yilindi ur d-yefiɣ ara maḍi, ayen yeǧǧan iselmaden akked yinelmaden ad sqedcen adlis aqdim, meɛna idlisen n useggas-a, ad d-ffɣen gar-aɣ d kra kan n wussan.

 «Idlisen n tmaziɣt n useggas wis rebɛa n uɣerbaz amenzu akked wid n useggas wis sin d wis tlata n uɣerbaz alemmas, qrib ad d-ffɣen. Ha-ten-in la ten-id-ssewjaden. Ad ilin deg yiɣerbazen ddurt i d-iteddun». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen umaṣwaḍ n tmaziɣt i yekkan deg uheggi n yidlisen-a, ayen ara yessifsusen, ahat, aḥebber n yiselmaden akked yinelmaden. Amur ameqqran seg yiselmaden, kukran ad asen-teḍru am yilindi. Aya, beggnen-t-id s timmad-nsen deg uẓeṭṭa anmetti anda i sseqsayen yal tikkelt ɣef leqrar n yidlisen-a. Acu kan, aseggas-a, yemgarad ciṭ ɣef useggas iɛeddan imi ula d wid n kra n tangayin-nniḍen urɛad i d-ffiɣen. Daymi i as-yenna yiwen « Asyax gar yisyaxen, mačči d asyax, imi mačči ala tamaziɣt i mazal ». Ihi, sya ar d-awḍen yidlisen-a, ha-ten-in yiselmaden sɣarayen s yidlisen iqdimen. « Ur nesɛi ara lxetyar. Aql-aɣ nessexdam idlisen i yellan yakan, sya ar d-wejden yimaynuten-agi. D wagi i d awellih i asen-nefka i yiselmaden-nneɣ. Ilaq ad zren d akken ahil n uswir d yiwen, acu kan zemren ad ilin ayen din n yidlisen i wahil-ag», akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen umaswaḍ n uɣerbaz amenzu deg Tizi Uzzu, wagi d Mass Sahki, i d-yemmselayen, diɣ, ɣef wugur n yimaswaḍen deg uḥric-agi. « 5 n yimukan n yimaswaḍen i yellan akka tura (rnan-d yiwen aseggas-a), acu kan, deg unnar aql-i weḥd-i. Mazal ur d-rnin ara wiyaḍ-nniḍen. Ihi, nessaram, ad ten-id-rnun deg ussan-agi kan i d-iteddun imi taɛkumt ẓẓayet mačči d izli ɣef yiwen». Am wakken i d-yella, diɣ, wawal ɣef wahil n useggas-a n tesnawit, anda i d-smektan kra n yiselmaden lexsas i d-yellan deg-s neɣ ɛad aswir-is fessusen maḍi. I usmekti, ad nebder kra gar sebbat i yeǧǧan ur d-yeffiɣ ara udlis n tmaziɣt n uswir amezwaru n uɣerbaz alemmas, ilindi. Ha-t-an wayen i d-tenna yal tama, aseggas iɛeddan. Yenna-d yiwen gar n yiɛeggalen n tesqamut n uktazal d tɣuri : ’’ Tasqamut n uktazal d tɣuri, ur teqbil ara adlis-a imi ur iwulem ara i wahil n tsuta tis snat. Ayen yellan deg-s, dayen yellan deg udlis-nni aqdim. Ciṭ kan swayes yemgarad. Ihi, ɣef wanect-a ur t-teqbil ara tesqamut, mačči akk ɣef wayen-nniḍen.’’ I wakken ad nẓer, diɣ, rray n wid ixedmen adlis, nessawel-as i yiwen deg-s, yerra-d ɣef wanect-a : ‘’Adlis i as-nefka, iwulem. Ur neẓri ara i wacuɣer ur t-teqbil ara tesqamut-nni. Yerna wagi ad yeqqim kan d rray-nnsen, meḥsub d rray n tesqamut-agi tamezwarut. Adlis, ha-t-an gar yifassen n tesqamut-nniḍen ara t-iɣren, aql-aɣ la nettraǧu. Ayen yellan deg udlis, yettwakkes-d seg wahil unṣib n tneɣlaft n usegmi, ur yeffiɣ ara seg-s.’’ Akken yebɣu yili rray n wa akked wa, akken tebɣu tili ssebba i yeǧǧan adlis ur d-iteffeɣ ara, qqimen yiselmaden akked yinelmaden, mebla adlis n tmaziɣt, aseggas kamel. Si tama-nniḍen, nestaqsa amaṣwaḍ-nniḍen n tmaziɣt ɣef wamek i d-yella wulmud n wahil amaynut s udlis aqdim, yerra-aɣ-d, :’’ad nesḥissef aṭas ɣef wanect-a imi i d-tella tuɣalin ɣer uɣerbaz mebla ma yewjed udlis n tmaziɣt n uswir amezwaru n uɣerbaz alemmas, tasuta tis snat xas ulamma adlis-a, d taɣuri kan n wahil unṣib n uswir-a. Zemren ad ilin aṭas n yidlisen i yiwen wahil’’. Nesteqsa-t ɣef wamek ara qablen taswiɛt, ikemmel yenna-d :’’aql-aɣ akka tura deg tannant n yiselmaden ijdiden. Ad neɛreḍ ad nqabel taswiɛt akken iwulem imi zemren yiselmaden ad d-heggin i yiman-nsen ttawilat swayes ara slemden. Swaya, dɣa, ara nnaɣen tannumi i wakken ad tteklen ɣef yiman-nsen, mačči kan ɣef wiyaḍ’’. Deg taggara, u ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen umaswaḍ i yekkan deg uheggi n udlis n tmaziɣt n uswir wis 4 n uɣerbaz amenzu, d akken ad ilin daxel n udlis-a kra n yiḍrisen i d-yettwakksen deg Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen i d-yettilin yal letnayen deg uɣmis La Dépêche de Kabylie.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 ilmend n tuget n yimazrayen, asebded n Qerṭaǧ yella-d deg tasut tis IX s.t.s.ɛ deg useggas 814 q.t.ɛ. Nnan-d zik-nni yella yiwen ugellid deg tmurt n yifniqen, tamdint n “sur” neɣ “Tyr», yemmut yeǧǧa-d taqcict “Elissa” d uqcic “Pygmalion”. Mi tezweǧ Elissa , gma-s yuggad ɣef lwert I asen-d- yeǧǧa baba-tsen. Ihi, yenɣa argaz n ultma-s .Elissa terfa fell-as, terwel deg teflukt deg yid d tarbaɛt n yilmeẓyen, tewweḍ ɣer tagzirt n “chypre”.Tebɣa ad tebnu awanek akken ad tejmaɛ wid I d- yeddan yid-s.Tessuter I ugellid n Tunes amersu n wakal, s wakka tebna tamdint n Qerṭaǧ.Anamek-is “ville neuve” “tamdint tamaynut”. Deg tazwara, nnan-d yimazrayen semman-as “Byrsa” anamek-is aglim n uzger”.Tella tamdint-a tamaynut, ur tesɛi ara aṭas n yiɣbula n temɛict, tella tettak tabzert I yilibiyen, tettxellis Tyr tamanaɣt n surya . Kra kra temhez tuɣal d tamanaɣt n Tefriqat ugafa. Temhaz deg tezmert akked tesreḍt. Tqeɛɛed tudert n yimaziɣen imi llan sɛan tiqbilin. Mi d-kecmen yifniqen, seggmen awanek (lebni, lqanun, yella wayen iwumi qqaren sufféte…atg).Taɣerma-nsen teqqen ɣer tnezzut, tasekla, tasreḍt ideg d-ǧǧan later-nsen am Baal Amon d Tanit. Wwin-d tira d tẓuri-nsen.Bnan isugan am skikda, ǧiǧel, Delles, Saldae(bgayt), Icosium(lezzayer tamanaɣt),…atg. Ayen I d-ibanen deg umhaz n Qerṭaǧ yettak-aɣ-d isallen ɣef wassaɣen-is d yiɣerfan-nniḍen ladɣa imaziɣen imi tebda s uxelles n tebzert I wakken ad texdem tafellaḥt I yimezdaɣ-is, teznuz irden d temẓin.Daɣen, suffɣen-d lɣellat seg wakal-nsen d timeqranin I yimezdaɣ n Tefriqt ugafa, acku lemden tarrayt n tfellaḥt.Tufa-tt Qerṭaǧ d tagnit I wakken ad d- tessewsaɛ akal-is.Deg tasut tisV(5) s.t.s.ɛ uɣalen yimezdaɣ I as-d-yezzin I Qerṭaǧ d ixeddamen ɣur-s.Ttxellisen I wakken ad zedɣen ad xedmen akal-nni, ta d tallit anda Qerṭaǧ ur tettak ara leɣrama.Ad naf daɣen igen n Qerṭaǧ azgen ameqqran deg-s d inumidiyen,(el murtaziqa neɣ les mercenaries). Imezdaɣ n Qerṭaǧ llsas n tudert-nsen amenzu d tanezzut.I wakken ad d-awin aṭas n tɣawsiwin ilaq ad tiwsiɛ ula ɣer tmura n l’europe(Rum, l’espagne, la Gréce, fransa, l’italie,…)Aya yeǧǧa-ten ad xedmen assaɣen yid-sen ladɣa d tɣerma tameqqrant n “la Gréce.Qerṭaǧ I wakken ad teg assaɣen teṭtef kra n temnaḍin n tegzirt n” la sicile”.Ɛeddan leqrun tuɣal tebɣa ad teṭṭef tigzirt akk I wakken ad tedder.Tigzirt-a tesɛa azal meqqern ɣer Qerṭaǧ imin teqreb ɣur-s.Tigzirt-a d asaka gar Qerṭaǧ d yigrikiyen.Assaɣen di tazwara lhan acku cerken deg kra n tɣawsiwin am zzeǧaǧ, afexxar I xedmen yigrikiyen yeqqim-d later-is deg Qerṭaǧ.Almi d 480 q.t.s.ɛ.Bdan-d wuguren d ṭradat gar-asen, ɣef temsal n wakal (la sicile imi bɣan akk ad tt-awin). Assaɣen n yirumanen d Qerṭaǧ llan seg wasmi tbedd Qerṭaǧ lhan almi ttwaɣen deg 264 q.t.s.ɛ syin bdan ṭṭradat gar yiqerṭaǧiyen d yirumanen.Ṭṭradat-a semman-asen yimazrayen”ṭṭradat ibuniqen”.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Fadila Nait Meghar 

  
 Ayen yeḍran ddurt yezrin deg taddart n Mira deg tɣiwant n Timizart id yezgan deg lɛarc Nat Jennad, anda nnuɣen sin lesfuf ɣef akal (imenɣi id yeglan s txeṭṭarin d timeqranin di cci a beɛda taruɣi n yexxamen, n tekryas akked lemḥalat), yerra-d lbal ɣer liḥala n teqwirin akked timazirin deg temnaḍin n tmurt n leqbayel sumata, imi mačči d tikelt neɣ snat id yekker cwal gar imezdeɣ n yiwet n taddart neɣ gar snat tudrin yemqaraben ɣef lijal n tiferkiwin. Ugur d aqdim n lqedma , imi anect-a newret-it ɣef imezwura-nneɣ deffir tamunent n tmurt. Uqbel anekcum arumi tuddrin llan teddun s yiwen lqanun umi neqar «lqanun aqbayli/ le code kabyle» . D lqanun agi yeselḥuyen timsal timetiyin gar leɛrac iɛamren tamurt n Leqbayel. Deg ussan-nni taddart tella ddaw leɛnaya n tajmaɛt ɣef yella Lamin. Lamin yettwafren si gar ṭṭemmen id fkan iderma . Mi ara yili wugur yewɛes, ur as yezmir ara udrum ,d tajmaɛt is yettlin di lmendad akken a tefru. Ma yella ugur yeḍḥa-d nnig taddart d lɛarc meṛṛa ara yenejmaɛen akken as id yaff tifrat.Di tallit-nni imezdeɣ n taddart ḍuɛen i tajmaɛt am akken id yeqqar lemtel «taddart am Ṛebbi”. Ma yella win ixulfen “taqbaylit” amdan –nni ad yeffeɣ deg lufaq n taddart.. yiwen ur t yettllaɛi alamma id yuɣal s abrid. S wakka ddan leɛrac, dren bay-gar-asen war ugur ameqran. Maca asmi id yekcem urumi ɣer tuddrin-nneɣ yewwid yid-s amaynut iḥuzan deg ixef-is asnagal aqbayli- le code kabyle- imi yesebded ayen umi qqaren “ addad aɣrim/ l’état civil», yerna–d usfella taɣdemt( justice) id yellan d tarbibt i leqwanen sbedden lejdud i timeti-nsen. Seg imir yebda uṛumi yettkadastri akal , iferq-it ɣef aṭas n yeḥricen : ayla n baylek( akkal n taɣult aɣiwan), akal n tfellaḥt, akal uslig( privé), akal n tizgi. Di Lǧerra n waya kra seg imezwura-nneɣ xedmen leɛqud ɣef akal-nsen, maca amur ameqran qqimen deg tin-a n lejdud s yimi kan akked innigan I rran tillist ɣef cci-nsen . Anect-a isedda timsal , yassanef i wugguren skud talla tejmaɛt tessɛa azal, maca deffir timunent ansayen iqburenn leqbayel bdan ɣellin, simmal simmal leqbayel keččmen ddaw lqaleb n tuddert tamirant armi tuɣal tajmaɛt d awal-kan: tettwekkes-as lhiba teɣli. Di taggara-agi tuget n tuddrin teddun ddaw ayen umi qqaren asqamu n taddart( comité de village) yeselḥuy lqanun n tidukkliwin sumata. Gar wayen id ixulef waya, akal war aẓayer( sans statut) umi qqaren leqbayel lmecmel. Qrib yal taddart tesɛa lmecmel-ines…Lmecmel d akal yellan d ayla n taddart (deg ur tellas –ara ddewla) yeqqim akken d cerɛa ur yebḍi ur yesɛi bab. Ahat zik imewlan-nneɣ ǧǧan-t akken melba bab s demma akken a t-sexdament i tfellaḥt. Di taggara-agi, akal-agi n lemcmel reɣbent yemdanen, yal wa yettnadi ad iḥiz iyi iman-is teferka. Meɛna anect-a igellud s wugur imi amek ara yetwafreq wakal-nni gar merra imezdeɣ n taddart? Acḥal ara d iṣiḥen i yiwen? Anwa ara a t-yebḍun imi tura qrib tijemuyaɛ-nni n zik muten-t ( ulac lamin, ulac ṭṭeman) yerna isquma i ten-id xelfen ur ksiben-ara lhiba akked leɛnaya tekseb tajmaɛt n zik-nni ! Sya ɣer da ttilin wid yettramen , mebɣir cwer n taddart ttḥizin iyi iman-sen seg akal n lmecmel teferka neɣ snat deg.. bennun ixammen ..xuḍi yal yiwen yeẓra belli akal-nni ur yelli d-ayla-nsen. Dayemmi aṭas n wid wukud nemeslay ɣef taluft-agi ttwahimen amek isen-yettunefk ttesriḥ n lebni imi ( am akken id yeqqar lqanun) akken ad yawi umdan ttesriḥ n lebni ilaq –as di tazwara ad yefek lberhen bell-i akal-nni yenwa ad yebnu s tidet d-ayla-s..ilaq-as aseɛkir n sɛaya( acte de proprièté) …Astehzi-agi, melba ccek, d netta i yettilin deffir cwal id yettnakaren ɣef tilisa, ɣef tiferkiwin , ɣef akal gar imezdeɣ n yiwet n taddart neɣ tikwal gar taddart d tayeḍ… xuḍi lemmer yal taɣiwant ad tɣiwel a tt-kadastri yak akal yellan ddaw leɛnaya-s tili yal wa as id iban wayl-as… ad yekfu cwal d uceqlal yesekcamen tikwal atmaten deg yir timṣeḥsal. Ad yegri wakal n lemcmel ahat ula d win yewwdeḍ lawan akken ad yesɛu azayer( statut) akken ad yettwakkes uggur-agi s wadda ..ur mazal ad yili fell-as cwal!

<p style="text-align: right;"> A.S Hamid 

  
 Inig ideg kecmeɣ umbeɛd mi nerwa aḥnunef deg tzemmurt-nni taneggarut yellan deg tiɣilt n lexla-nneɣ Iɣzer inalen, d inig aɣezfan, alqayan, ula d baba -nni iyi-d-ittmeslayen iɣil d taguni i gneɣ ɣas ulamma ttwaliɣ-t-id netta ikkaten si tegnit ɣer tayeḍ tizemrin i as-d-yeǧǧa baba-s s yeẓra; Wis kan ma d zzɛef neɣ d lxiq i as-igan akken? imi lɣella tenɣes , ma zik tettakk-d tzemmurt 4 ar 8 n tesnatin , tura tin yurwen ad d-tfekk azal n tacekkart, neɣ ahat d war lettkal ɣef tarwa-s labeɛda imi netta yedder i wakal, am akken i yedder s wakal ! Unageɣ am wakken yunag win iḥemmlen ɣer temdinin n tayri-s, unageɣ deg uɛeqqa n uzemmur amectuḥ i serseɣ gar yiḍudan- iw, wehheɣ-t i yiṭij, caxeɣ deg-s imi ɣer-s icuba ussan-agi mezziyen i d-sɛeddaɣ nekk d twacult-iw, Mmektaɣ-ten-id yiwen yiwen amzun d taktabt i qqareɣ ɣas akken si dqiqa ar tayeḍ kateɣ tiṭ-iw ɣer At tawacult- iw, ussan-a ssneɣ-ten, sliɣ-asen , skefleɣ-ten-id, fehmeɣ d akken ur nemyussan, fehmeɣ daɣen acimi i qqaren wat zik: «uqbel ad ak-teɣwu tmeṭṭut muqel qbel anta i d yemma-s!» tidet kan kukraɣ tuɣalin s axxam ɣas yid-sen cerkeɣ ssqef, ṭṭabla, nneɛma…….. Bɣiɣ ad yiɣzif yinig, imi akka i t-mazal tura bɣiɣ ad iyi-d-yini: Ad iyi-mazal! Tamecwart kan sliɣ i baba yessawal-d akken ad nuɣal s axxam, ɣas yembawel yinig ckenṭḍeɣ ɣer-s, bɣiɣ ad d-iɛawed baba asiwel akken ad as-t-rnuɣ d aktay i wussan -a. Iɛawed-d baba asiwel dɣa ndekwaleɣ-d seg umḍiq-iw, ma d aɛeqqa-nni yeɣli si gar yiḍudan, ɣas netta d agrireb i yegrareb deg uḥecraruf-nni, nekk d anfaḍ i d-nefdegh seg yinig-nni, unfeɣ-as ad iyi-yerwel, ḍsiɣ-as ,ur ɛerḍeɣ ad t-id-ṭṭfeɣ, imi iruḥ am tḥebbuyt n ukba deg ugadir.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima.D 

  
 Aṭas n yimusnawen i irefden idles n tmurt almi yeweḍ γer tqacuct. Aṭas i yuran γef umezruy, uguren d iγeblan n tmurt akked cbaḥa-s. Ger yemyura agi yella yiwen gar tgejda n tsekla Tazzayrit wagi d Mulud Ferεun, d amyaru azzayri s tutlayt tafransist, isem-is aḥeqqani Mulud At Caεban, ilul i tmurt leqbayel ass n 8 di meγres 1913 deg Tizi Hibel deg At Dwala. ikcem ar uγarbaz amenzu di Tewrirt Musa. Syen yuγal yekcem γer « le college » n Tizi-Wezzu di 1928, anda iykemel amecwar-is leqraya. 1932,rebεa iseggasen mbaεd yewwi-d agerdas, yuγal yekcem γer uγerbaz amagnu di Lzzayer tamanaγt, tama n Buzarriεa asmi yesεa 19 iseggasen di leεmer-is. Labaεda mi yesεedda amzizwer yeffeγ-d s ugerdas n uselmed. Deg useggas n 1935 yesselmed di taddert-is Tizi Hibel. Yuγal d anemhal n uγerbaz n Tewrirt Musa, ssyinna γer uγerbaz n Larebεa n At Yiraten. Aseggas 1960 yuγal d amesweḍ. Mulud Ferεun yumen swayen ixeddem, ticert swayes yettaru qeṭṭiεet, temsed itira. Yettkel aṭas γef tira-s acku yessen amek izarreε awal, yal win arat-yeγṛen yezmer ad yefhem. Mulud Ferεun ikred ger twacult tigellilt, ikred yelḥif d laẓ. Γas aken uguren n yal ass id-yettaf s zdat-s yessaweḍ yelmed deg uγarbaz aṛumi, ilqeḍ-d tamusni zedigen am waman, yugmed di tala tmusni swayes yessew tasekla Tazzayrit, isufeγ-itt-id si ṭlam γer tafat.   Tira n Ferεun tcud γer laεwayed tiqbuṛin n tmurt leqbayel, igemmer-d d gayen yelhan, annect-a yesbeggen-it-id deg wengal-is amezwaru  » Mmi-s n ugellil. Syen yesbegen-d tudert n twacult tazzayrit di temnaṭ n leqbayel. Ar yidis n wangal agi yura daγen ungalen niḍen  » Akal d-idamen », »Ibardan yettalin », »Aγmis »d « Isefra n Si Muḥ U Mḥend. Yesbegen-d miḥyaf yellan ger sin yegduden, agdud azzayri d imawlan n tmurt, d wegdud afransi id-ikecmen s rrṣaṣ d idammen. Rnu yefka-d  iḥulfan-is d tmuγli-s γef wayen iḍerrun di tmurt n Lzzayer ledγa di lawan n ṭṭrad.

 Ass n 15 meγres 1962,yiwet n terbeεt n l’ OAS tessufeγ-d Mulud Ferεun seg unejmu&amp;epsilon,; rnan-d γur-s 5 n yemdanen niḍen (Σli Ḥamutan, Salaḥ Uld Awdiya, Robert Aimzrt, Marcel Basset d Max Marchand), tsenned-iten γer lḥiḍ, syen akin teqreṣ fell-asen s arṣas tenγaten.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ini-d s tẓuri “ d yiwet n tfaska i d-yettilin 14 n yiseggasen-aya di tmurt n leqbayel. Tlul-d Tikti n tfaska–agi deg unebdu 2004 deg At yanni. Yebna-tt-id unaẓur Denis Martinez, salah Slim akked Ḥcen Metref. D acu i d iswi n tfaska-agi? D Mass Hsen Metref imwelleh n yilmeẓyen ara t-id-yinin:” Azday i zdin yidelsan dagi d tamawt ɣef tmuɣli i nefka ɣer umaḍal. Tuɣalin i tuɣal tejmaεt d yimukan-nniḍen d igenwan n yidles, yeskan-d acḥal i yedda uẓar-nneɣ deg yidles d wansayen n tmurt. Nebɣa diɣen ad mlilen yinaẓuren-nneɣ i d-yettnekkaren akked wid i ten-yezwaren; imeẓẓyanen, ad lemden taklut d wayen-nniḍen deg yigrawen n tẓuri. S wakka, nger imecṭaḥ deg wul, d nutni i d asenfar nneɣ. S ulac, nessuli-d swayes ara nerr tili i temliliyin tunṣibin yezgel yidles’’. D ayen yeḍran s tidet nufa dinna denis Martinez yettaru unuɣen ɣef leḥyuḍ n taddart At Waɛban netta diɣen ixeddem ɣef yiswi-agi:”Dagi kif kif –aɣ akk. Nqedec akk. Ma d iswi-nneɣ d tiririt n wazal i yimukan igejdanen di tudrin akka am tejmaɛt ,tala, taẓuri d teklut deg yizenqan d uttekki n yimezdaɣ ama deg tira, deg wuraren, deg usuneɣ, deg ccna , deg umezgun. Nettidir yid-sen am yiwet n twacult, nesway idles s umata. Akken yeqqar Mouloud Mammeri deg wawal-is.’’ Nteddu akken nufa mačči akken nebɣa’’. Tazrigt tis 14 deg At waɛban Yal aseggas anda ara terzu tqufet n yiɛeggalen n Raconted w-Arts. Tikelt-a tra ad ters deg ugelmim deg ttnejmaɛen waman isemmaḍen i d-yetturugen di laɛwanser d taɛwinin n tqucac n udrar n Ǧerǧer di taddart n Wat Waɛban iteddun ɣer tɣiwant n Uqbil . Ahil n ddurt n tfaska n useggas-agi d amerkanti nezzah: seg 24 almi d 31 di yulyu, ddren yimezdaɣ d yinebgawen i d-yerzan ɣer tegnatin n lfarḥ, usan-d yimdanen sya u sya. Seg yal tamnaḍt, si Bgayet, Tizi, Lezzayer, wehran, tanezruft, seg umalu ar usammar. Ussan-d ula seg tmura n Lrupa, taẓuri tsemlal tassa d way turew. Ahil n useggas-agi, yeṭṭef-d taklut, isaragen, tikli ɣef uḍar deg udrar, timsikniyin, tamedyazt, aznuz n udlis s ubudu…atg. Kra tekka tfaska, ur iḥebbes leqdic alamma iruḥ yuli wass. Amaynut di tezrigt n 2017 Ayen i d–ijebden lwelha n yimzuyar ɣer tezrigt n tikkelt-a d ulzuz (ssuq)n tlawin n At Waεban, i d-tettheggi tiddukkla ’’Asurif “, yal anebdu. Iεemmer ass n 28 deg yulyu. D tilawin n taddart n Wat Waεban i iεemren rreḥba; ttawint-d isufar i d-tekksent deg tebḥirin-nsent. Ad d-fesrent lxeḍra d lfakya bio i yeswan s waman n Ǧerǧer; timellalin n tyuzaḍ n uxxam, ayefki, tamemt, atg. Ad d-rnunt ayen i xedment deg yixxamen am tgelliwin (tiɣrifin, aɣrum n leḥwal) d yiselsa i ttxiḍint (agus , timḥermin iɛemren s rrqum, tibernyas , atg). Imsewwqen ggten, wa d amsaɣ, wa d aḥewwas yusa-d ad iẓer, ad yekkes lxiq, wayeḍ yettnadi ad yissin isulas iɣef tebna tmetti d tdamsa n tudrin . Yiwen seg-sen d acennay n teqbaylit Lewnis Ait menguellet, yeεǧeb-as ccɣel. « Ayen akka i d-snaɛtent tlawin-agi d ayen igerrzen maḍi i tdamsa; kra n win ara yaɣen akka kra n usafar d afud ara-asent-id-yernu i temɣarin-agi n lbaraka», i d-yesseggra mi t-nesteqsa ɣef ssuq-nni. Tameɣra di taddart Tella-d yiwet n tmeɣra deg yiwen uxxam n taddart ass-nni n lǧemɛa ; teḍra akken i tt-xeddmen Wat zik. Tislit tedda-d ɣef userdun, telsa-d taksiwt n Leqbayel, isli s ubernus. Nudan-d izenqan n taddart. Taquffet n tlawin d yirgazen teḍfer-d s deffir s wurar d lbarud ; snat n temɣarin refdent ɣef tuyat-nsent yiwen n ufniq urqim. Aserwet Gar wayen-nniḍen i d-snaɛten At waɛban di tfaska-a Annar n userwet: Aserwet deg unnar yeḍra ass-nni n 27 di yulyu, ɣef tis 14t00. Gar yimnezzhen, llan wid werǧin ẓrin aserwet n temẓin d yirden. Dehcen di ccɣel icuban wa; qqimen akken i yiṭij armi yekfa usizdeg. Zzin-d i unnar, lemden kra seg umawal n tfellaht, ččan aḍemmin. S wakka i temdel tfaska n “Ini-d s tẓuri”. Kra n win/tin i as-iḥedren d acu i d-yegmer deg-s : win yebɣan tamussni yelmed yugem, win inudan ɣef laɛwayed d wansayen iwala, win ixaqen isared allen-is. Wigi d kra n lesrar n tfaska n “ Raconte-Arts ” i d-yellan deg Wat Waɛban, deg timiṭ n tmurt n Leqbayel. Brahim Benhamouche

 Ini-d s tẓuri “ d yiwet n tfaska i d-yettilin 14 n yiseggasen-aya di tmurt n leqbayel. Tlul-d Tikti n tfaska–agi deg unebdu 2004 deg At yanni. Yebna-tt-id unaẓur Denis Martinez, salah Slim akked Ḥcen Metref.

  D acu i d iswi n tfaska-agi? 

 D Mass Hsen Metref imwelleh n yilmeẓyen ara t-id-yinin:” Azday i zdin yidelsan dagi d tamawt ɣef tmuɣli i nefka ɣer umaḍal. Tuɣalin i tuɣal tejmaεt d yimukan-nniḍen d igenwan n yidles, yeskan-d acḥal i yedda uẓar-nneɣ deg yidles d wansayen n tmurt. Nebɣa diɣen ad mlilen yinaẓuren-nneɣ i d-yettnekkaren akked wid i ten-yezwaren; imeẓẓyanen, ad lemden taklut d wayen-nniḍen deg yigrawen n tẓuri. S wakka, nger imecṭaḥ deg wul, d nutni i d asenfar nneɣ. S ulac, nessuli-d swayes ara nerr tili i temliliyin tunṣibin yezgel yidles’’. D ayen yeḍran s tidet nufa dinna denis Martinez yettaru unuɣen ɣef leḥyuḍ n taddart At Waɛban netta diɣen ixeddem ɣef yiswi-agi:”Dagi kif kif –aɣ akk. Nqedec akk. Ma d iswi-nneɣ d tiririt n wazal i yimukan igejdanen di tudrin akka am tejmaɛt ,tala, taẓuri d teklut deg yizenqan d uttekki n yimezdaɣ ama deg tira, deg wuraren, deg usuneɣ, deg ccna , deg umezgun. Nettidir yid-sen am yiwet n twacult, nesway idles s umata. Akken yeqqar Mouloud Mammeri deg wawal-is.’’ Nteddu akken nufa mačči akken nebɣa’’.

  Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 Mbeɛd setta n yiseggasen, yuɣal-d ucennay mmi-s n At Mlikec Ḥakim Gawa s umaynut deg umaḍal n uẓawan d wawal. Ayen nezmer ad d-nini ɣef yiseɣrez-a (album) iwumu yefka azwel « A tayri », d akken inuḥ deg-s aṭas n wayen yeɛnan timetti : ama d tilufa n tudert, n umdan deg ddunit neɣ d tayri. 6 n tezlatin iwumi nezmer ad nettḥesses, yal yiwet s uẓawan-is, imeslayen-is, d yiḥulfan-is. Ula d allalen, lqidar i yettwasqedcen deg-s. Llant dɣa seg umaynut-n « A tayri ttxil-m », « D acu i d-mazal », « Lehlak », « Yiwwas », « Lewṭar », akked tneggarut « A Rebbi ». Ɣef wawal n unaẓur i teɛna taluft, i d-yessufɣen ar tura rebɛa n yiḍebsiyen deg umecwar-is n ccna, ma yella iɛeṭṭel seg 2010 armi d aseggas-a akken ad d-yawi ajdid, d ddunit kan i t-yeǧǧan ad yexdem kra kra war ma yesseɣseb lecɣal i d-yessuturen ayendin d ttawil. Ɣas ma yesɛa tiẓrigin d ayla-s, maca uguren i d-yettmaggar ur mxalafen ɣef wid n yinaẓuren merra n tmurt. Imi i d-yenna ur iwala d acu yexdem uxxam n yizerfan n umeskar, ma yella asebɣes yettili-d i kra, wiyaḍ xaṭi. Amaynut-a, ihi, tzemrem ad t-tafem deg yimeḍqan anda ttnuzun yiseɣraz (albums). Tella kan yiwet n taluft i ilaq ad d-nerr awellih fell-as: tagi d tira ur newqim n yizwal n tezlatin. Lemmer yal win yebɣan ad d-yessufeɣ, ad icawer win iẓewren deg tjerrumt tamaziɣt, tili iḍebsiyen akk ad rnun ccbaḥa ugar ma ttwarun akken yessefk s tutlayt n Lmulud At Mɛemmer.

<p style="text-align: right;">   Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Djilali Hamama, d yiwen ucennay ameqqran n tezlit n tmaziɣt tartart. D mmi-s n Wat Wagennun. Yefka-d aṭas i yidles amaziɣ, iga amecwar ɣezzif deg ubrid n tẓuri.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: deg tazwara, efk-aɣ-d agzul n umecwar-ik deg lfen… 

 Azal n 16 n yiseggasen-a, segmi bdiɣ cennuɣ, imi tuɣac-iw akk timezwura cniɣ-tent deg useggas n 2001. Acu kan, nekk segmi bdiɣ cennuɣ, ala tamedyazt i xeddmeɣ nekk s timad-iw deg tezlatin-iw. Aḍebsi-iw amezwaru, iffeɣ-d deg useggas 2001 s uzwel «Isufa». Aseggas mebεed, rniɣ wis sin s yisem «Ifat lḥal», aseggas diɣen membεed, suffɣeɣ CD wis tlata s uzwel «Targit». Deg useggas 2004, sazergeɣ aḍebsi-iw wis rebεa s yisem «Ɛeddan wussan-im». Di 2005 ur xdimeɣ ara, armi d 2006 i xedmeɣ CD wis xemsa s uzwel «Rrbeḥ-iw». Syin, daɣen qqimeɣ armi d 2007, i rniɣ album-iw wis setta, s yisem «Err-iyi-d awal». Deg useggas n 2008, i xedmeɣ aḍebsi «Sḥesbeɣ». Qqimeɣ alarmi d 2010 i wakken i d-rniɣ CD wis sebεa s uzwel «Amecwar». Deg useggas n 2011 suffɣeɣ-d album wis tmanya, semmaɣ-as: «Tamara». Ma album-iw wis ttesεa «Tusiḍ-d», yeffeɣ-d deg useggas n 2013. Xtareɣ ad as-semmiɣ akka, imi 8 n yiseggasen ɣef zwağ-iw i wakken yerna ɣur-i uqcic, dɣa fkiɣ-as isem-agi “Tusiḍ-d”. Syin daɣen qqimeɣ armi d 2015, i wakken i d-sazergeɣ aḍebsi wis mraw s uzwel «Timsal». 

  D acu i d ahil-ik i useggas-agi n 2017? 

 Ma d ayen yerzan ahil-iw i useggas-agi amaynut n 2017, ad yebdu s tlata n tmeɣriwin deg tmurt n Fransa; tamezwarut ass 18 di furar 2017 deg temdint n Paris, tis snat ass n 11 meɣres 2017 deg temdint n Lyon, tis kraḍ ass n 25 deg meɣres 2017 deg temdint Ile de France. Sεiɣ diɣen tinnubga ɣer snat n tmura, tamezwarut d Marikan i wass n 20 deg yebrir 2017, tis snat ɣer Canada deg temdint n Murielle i wass n 06 maggu 2017, sɣur tiddukkla n Yiqbayliyen n Canada. Timeɣriwin tisiεta ala tigi i ẓriɣ, maca sewjadeɣ daɣen CD ara d-yeffɣen deg wussan i d-iteddun.

  Tura mmeslaɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef tezlatin-ik tineggura n 2015… 

 Album “Timsal” d taɣuri-w, d tamuɣli-w ɣef kra n tilla n ddunit, imi am wakken i d-nniɣ yakkan, d nekk i ixeddmen isefra n tuɣac-iw, ihi qqareɣ-d kan ayen ssneɣ d wayen walaɣ, ur xeddmeɣ ara ɣef tɣawsa ur ssineɣ ara. Xedmeɣ-tt s lexṣaṣ n ttawilat, acu kan imi tella nneya ama si lğiha-w ama si lğiha n yinaẓuren-nni i ixedmen yid-i. Maca mi teffeɣ ɣer ssuq, tenzza mliḥ, yerna aṭas iyi-d-yeqqaren yuɣal-d Dilali-nni nessen zik.

  Acimi d isefra-k kan i tettɣeniḍ? 

 Segmi bdiɣ asizreg deg useggas n 2001 ar ass-agi, leεmer ɣennaɣ asefru n yiwen deg tezlatin-iw, ula d lmusiqa diɣen, ala ayen kan i d-yetteẓẓem wallaɣ-iw i cennuɣ. Acu kan, mačči i wakken ad d-sbegneɣ iman-iw belli ssneɣ neɣ zemreɣ, lukan ad d-afeɣ win ara yi-xedmen imeslayen, mreḥba yis-s. Acu kan ilaq ad iεeddi i wayen xeddmeɣ neɣ i tmussni-inu, maca ma yella kif kif-aɣ aswir, axir ad sxedmeɣ imeslayen-iw. Akka tura la ttrağuɣ ableεaḍ neɣ ttnadiɣ amedyaz ara d-ifken ajdid neɣ lḥağa leεmer xdimeɣ neɣ ur ssawḍeɣ ara ad sefruɣ fell-as. 

  D acu i d tamuɣli-k ɣef uswir n ccna n teqbaylit tatrart? 

 Tizlit taqbaylit, tεedda-d yal tallit s yifennanen-is, d imezwura syin d ilemmasen tura d imaynuten. Iεedda yiwen lweqt, tebda tezlit taqbaylit tettṣubu, imi ulac ixulaf yeddan deg ubrid n yifennanen imezwura. Anida yelḥaq lḥal armi ur tezmireḍ ad as-tesleḍ deg uxxam d yimawlan-ik. Uɣalen, nulfan-d leṣnaf-nniḍen n ccna (win n tmeɣriwin, “non-stop”). Yerna nekk zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ belli leṣnaf-agi ijdiden ur nɣin ara lfen, acku axir ad yecḍeḥ yiwen s teqbaylit wala s taεrabt. Ttwaliɣ si tama-nniḍen, yuli-d cwiṭ uswir-is, imi llan wid mazal ṭṭfen deg uqdim, llan daɣen wid i d-yeglan s umaynut. Ilaq diɣen ad ilin imeslayen ẓiden, zeddigen, icebḥen, iweznen, axaṭar tura imdanen d ayagi i bɣan ad slen. 

  Acu i d-wwint tmeɣriwin n ccna i tezlit taqbaylit? 

 Dagi deg tmurt n Leqbayel, d tizlit i d-yettawin timeɣriwin. Amedya, ma yella ufennan-nni mechur, taddart-nni ur tettwasen ara ṣafi d acennay-nni i iεawnen taddart-nni. Ma yella mgal d taddart-nni i imucaεen ugar n unaẓur-nni, tezmer ad ad as-texdem tadlelt (la publicité) neɣ abaɣur. Ma yella deg lwilayat-nniḍen n tmurt-nneɣ neɣ deg lɣerba (Fransa, Canada…), ma tettwaxdam tmeɣra n ccna n teqbaylit d iseɣ imi ad ttissinen dina. Ma yella tmeɣra-a n ccna tella-d berra n tmurt n Leqbayel, ad d-tawi cwiṭ, ma ulac d imferjen-nni n useggas-agi i d wid n qabel. 

  Ma yettili-d umεiwen gar yicennayen n tmurt-nneɣ? 

 Ulac amεiwen gar-nneɣ s yinaẓuren, mačči am yifennanen n tmura-nniḍen. Nekni, yal yiwen yeqqar aḥeqq nekk, win yufan tagnit ilaq d netta kan. Nxuṣ cwiṭ deg ccɣel-agi, acu kan mačč d tuccḍa-nneɣ, imi si zzman aqdim, nufa-d belli icennayen-nneɣ imezwura ur ttemεawanen ara gar-asen. Ttwaliɣ ifennanen n” rray” ttemεawanen gar-asen ama dagi deg tmurt ama deg tmura tibaraniyin. Ad iɣenni yiwen n “rray” deg Paris, ad yawi akk imeddukkal-is ad d-cnnun akk yiwet n tezlit, ma d nekni s yiqbayliyen, nettmeɣullu gar-aneɣ.

  Amek-itt tezlit taqbaylit di lɣerba? 

 Ulamma lɣerba isem-is lɣerba ama di Fransa neɣ d Marikan neɣ Canada, acu kan tura mačči am zik, imi llan wallalen itiknulujiyen n teywelt, i yerran amaḍal amzun d taddart. D amedya, ifennanen yettidiren deg Fransa, ttwalin-ten yiqbayliyen n din kul ass, am nutni am wiyaḍ, acu kan mi ara iruḥ yiwen sya seg Lezzayer ɣer din ladɣa tikkelt tamezwarut, ttmaggaren-t-id s tumert, ferḥen yis-s aṭas, ihi mi ara iruḥ d inebgi, ttaεwaqqen amek ara as-xedmen, am win yewwin taɣeddiwt.

  D acu ara d-tinniḍ deg yicennayen yettεawaden tuɣac n wiyaḍ deg tesfifin? 

 Win ara iεiwden taɣect n uccenay-nniḍen, awi yufan ma yedder ad t-iciwer s timad-is, yerna ad as-isel uqbel ad d-tffeɣ, ma yemmut, ad iciwer imawlan-is. Dagi ma yella ur yesεi ara izerfan n umeskan n ONDA, ma yella yesεa-ten d awezɣi ad as-ruḥen, fiḥel ma icureε-it neɣ yewwi awal fell-as. Acu kan daɣen mi ara yettmeslay di tɣamsa neɣ tilibizyu d radyu, ilaq ad d-yinni belli mačči d ayla-s. Si tama-nniḍen, yezmer ufennan ad as-iεiwed i tezlit n yiwen, ad as-yernu ad tt-icebbeḥ akter neɣ ma ulac maḍi ad as-yefk azal-is d rruḥ-is i as-ilaqen. Amedya Matoub Lounès aṭas n tuɣac iwumi iεawed, maca leεmer i d as-yessenqes deg wazal-nsen, ittkemmil yettcebbiḥi-tent ugar. Am wakken daɣen llan wid yettruẓun, yettcemmiten tizlatin yelhan, mebla ma nudder-d ismawen.

  D acu ara as-tinniḍ i wid yettrağun amaynut-ik? 

 Am wakken i d-nniɣ yakan, sewjadeɣ tasfift tmaynut i taggara n waggur n yebrir 2017, akka tura la as-xeddmeɣ “clip” di Fransa i yiwet n tezlit tajdidt. Ad asen-iniɣ i wid yettrağun album-a, ssarameɣ ad asen-yeεğeb aṭas. Imi ad ilint deg-s 8 n tezlatin, gar-asen-t: Nneqma, Temẓi, Ad qqimeɣ gar-awen, Lexyal…

  Awal-ik n taggara… 

 Tanemmirt-ik ɣef tdiwennit-agi i yi-txedmeḍ i nekk d leqdicat-iw idelsanen. Tanemmirt tameqqrant i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen imi i yi-iga azal, ad awen-iniɣ afud igerrzen i kunwi d uɣmis-nwen. Ad iniɣ tanemmirt s tussda i wid akk iyi-ḥemmlen, d widak yesmeḥsisen i tuɣac-iw. Ssarameɣ, ad tuɣal tmurt-nneɣ ad tesεu azal gar tmura-nniḍen, d azuxxu ara nettzuxxu yis-s mačči d leḥya ara nettsetḥi yis-s.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

<div> 
  
 Tella-d yiwet n temsizzelt n ufran n ssut akken ad yebdu usenfar n usisleg n usaru “L’Opium et le baton” ɣer tmaziɣt akken i d-as-id-ibarreḥ yakan Mass Samir Ait belkacem deg yiwet n tdiwennit i Uɣmis n yimaziɣen. Leswat ara d-yifriren d tid ara yettunefken i yiwudam i d-yuraren deg usaru. Teḍra-d temsizzelt tasebḥit n wass n 21 deg unbir-agi deg-i deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi uzzu. I usmekti kan, asenfar-agi, yella-d ddaw n leɛnaya n Tneɣlaft n yidles d umaray amatu n Usqamu unnig n timuzɣa d ONDA i lmendad n meyya n yiseggasen ɣef tlalit n umusnaw i d-yuran adlis i yuɣalen d asaru i d-yessufeɣ Ahmed Rachedi s tutlayt n teɛrabt. Ass-a, ad yuɣal usaru s tutlayt n tmaziɣt akken i t-yessarem umussnaw ameqqran Mulud Mɛemmri. Ma d imtekkiyen i d-yusan s ṭṭaqa i wakken ad tekkin di temsizzelt, mxallafen di leɛmer: llan wid meqqren akken, llan daɣen yigurdan akken i d-yenna Mass Ait Belkacem : “igurdan d azekka nneɣ , yal yiwen yefka-d taɣuct-is syin akkin ad ffɣen igemmaḍ n temsizzelt akken ad yebdu usenfar”. Nesteqsa-d yiwen seg wid yettikkan di temsizzelt ɣef yisenfaren yecban wigi yenna-d : “ D ayen yessefraḥen imi nettwali tutlayt-nneɣ tekcem di taɣulin yecban tigi, akken daɣen d araz ara as-yuɣalen i umussnaw “ . Tettkemmil temsizzelt imi mazal ad tili di Bgayet akked Tubiret.

  S.Y. 

  
 Mazal d FLN i yeṭṭfen amḍiq amezwaru deg Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣelnaw s 164 n yimekwan i d-yewwi deg tefranin-agi n 4 maggu 2017, xas ulmma iwexxer ɣer deffir, ma neqren igemmaḍ-a akked wid n useggas 2012 anda i d-iḥella 208.

 Sumata, ffɣen-d yigemmaḍ ɣef wakken yella wudem n tsertit deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Ula d wid igan taslaḍt i yigemmaḍ-a, nnan-d yettban akka ara d-ffɣen. Mazal d ikubar-nni yewwin neɣ yeddan deg wahil n uselway n tegduda i d-yezgan d imezwura, gar-asen ad naf : FLN, RND, TAJ, MPA. Gar 462 n yimekwan i yesɛa Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣelnaw, amur ameqqran wwin-t FLN akked RND. Yewwi umezwaru 164, gar-asen 50 n tlawin, ma d RND, yewwi 97 gar-asen 32 n tlawin. Ɣef wakken i d-yenna Derbal, imḍebber n HIISE, azal n 330 n yicetkiyen i d-yewḍen ɣer tesqamut-agi-nsen. Xas ulamma, ɛeddan tefranin, sumata, akken iwata, meɛna yella-d kra n ccwal deg kra n temnaḍin n tmurt, ɛlaḥsab n Berbal. Ma ɣef ugemmuḍ n uttekki i yewḍen 38,25%, yettuneḥsab d alemmas sɣur aneɣlaf n daxel. « Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, aɣref azzayri, yerra-d i teɣri akken iwata », ikemmel yenna. Ma ɣef yicetkiyen, yenna-d : « h-tent-in tura tewwura n tesqamut HIISE, ldint i wid yesɛan aceti. Tasqamut-a, ad texdem akk ayen yellan fell-as ». Ma ɣef lexsas i d-yeḍran deg tefranin-agi, ama ɣef cwal, ama ɣef wid ur nessaweḍ ara ad kkin deg tefranin imi yella wanda ur wwiḍent ara tbewwaḍin, yenna-d Mass Bedoui « Lexsas-agi akk ad yuɣal ad yettwaseɣti sya d afella ». Ha-ten-in igemmḍ sumata : FLN 164, RND 97, A.HMS 33, Imezrigen 28, TAJ 19, NAHDA+ADALA+BINA 15, Front El Moustaqbel 14, FFS 14, MPA 13, PT 11, RCD 9, ANR 8, MEN 4, Parti El Karama 3…atg.

  M. H  

  
 Akken ad yelḥu yiwen ɣer sdat deg leqdic-is, ilaq ad as-yezwir tayri d lebɣi. Aya d ayen i yeḍran i Uzwaw Xadir Lqadir, neɣ Klek s yisem n tẓuri, mi yuma iḥemmel isenfan n tẓuri, ladɣa win n wunuɣ. Mmi-s n temnaḍt n Yiwaḍiyen, taddart n Cerfa, i ilulen deg yiseggasen n sebɛin, seg send amdur n tnubit i yerra tawriqt d tamdakkelt iɣef yesseftay tiktiwin i as-d-yettasen s usuneɣ n yifɣal (caricatures). Yella iḥerrez tikci-s i yiman-is kan, armi d-tewweḍ tallit ideg yekcem deg kra n tdukkliwin, gar-asent tidukkla “Iles n Umaziɣ” anda yekki deg waṭas n temsikkinin, yerna deg yimeḍqan-nniḍen yemgaraden. Dɣa seg yimir-n i d-yesban taẓuri deg wunuɣ n ufɣul, i yefka tagnit i medden ad gzun aṭas n yiznan i d-yettberriḥ s drus n usuneɣ. Amsefɣul Xadir Lqadir, i iḍefren ad d-yettini ayen yettxemmim s tsusmi i yezmer kan wallaɣ ad as-isel, yelha mliḥ d leqdic-is, werǧin yestehza deg-s. Ɣas qeddac n yiɛewwiqen i d-imuger deg wakud ideg xussen ttawilat, maca aya ur as-yemniɛ ad iger deg usenfar n usufeɣ n udlis n yifɣal. Ur as-yemniɛ ara ad yaweḍ iswi-nni deg useggas n 2001, mi d-yessufeɣ taktabt timezdit, wumi isemma “Trio Gag Caricatures”, akked sin n yimdukkal-is, ɣer Teẓrigin El Amal n Tizi Uzzu. Skud yella dima d imekdi i usnulfu, yekcem Klek ula deg tẓuri n udlag n yixxamen s teklut. Yettcebbiḥ tixxamin n warrac d yimukan-nniḍen s sin n yiɣaniben; aqbur d utrar, s tmussni i d-yekseb, swayes yettgerriz amahil-is. « Seg gar yisenfaren-iw, ssarameɣ ad bnuɣ yiwet n tzeqqa s uɣanib aqbayli amek tella zik deg yixxamen izwawen; s yikufan, acbayli… ». I aɣ-d-yenna unaẓur Xadir Lqadir.

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 D-ass n yimaɛḍar. Yal ass n 14 Maɣreṣ, imaɛḍar n-umaḍal akken ma llan, tekkat-d tafat ɣer ɣurṣen akken ad banen i medden. Maca, azekka nni kan,  attexsi tafat, ad ttwattu-n. D ttagi id liḥala n yimaɛḍar… Am tiddukla yecban tiyaḍ, taddukli n yimaɛḍar n t’ɣiwant n yimceddalen terra tajmilt i yimdanen-agi ur nesɛi ara tazmart. D-acu kan, lfarḥ yusad yenqes, imi imaɛḍar-agi ttidiren deg yir liḥala, acku xuṣṣen-ten aṭaṣ n wallalen. Acḥal aya, tiddukla-agi n yimaɛḍar n-imceddalen tessutur deg medden akk d yimḍebren n t’ɣiwant akken ad gren iman nsen, neɣ ad awsen imaɣban-agi yaḥwaǧen aṭaṣ n t’ɣawsiwin. Ama d-iselsa, neɣ tikerrusin n yimaɛḍar, neɣ d ttadrimt, tiddukla ur teḥbis ara deg usuter. Tudert n yimdanen-agi tuɛar dayen kan. Aṭaṣ n wuguren id ttemlilin deg tudert n yal ass. Yuɛar-asen akken ad affen axeddim, acku irebbiten n t’kubaniyin ur ten-ssaxdamen ara, ɣas akken aṣaḍuf (la loi) tefka-yas-en azref akken ad xedmen ! Tamuɣli n t’metti nneɣ tugi att-beddel ɣer yimaɛḍar-agi, akken iten-ttwalin kra s yiwwet n t’muɣli am akken mači d-imdanen ! Ayɣer? « Ar ass-a, ur newwi izerfan nneɣ s-umata, ɣas akken amennuɣ i nexdem muqer! Mazal-aɣ akken deg yir liḥala, mazal imḍebren ur d rrin ara lwelha ɣurneɣ. D-acu-ten-t 4000 idinaren i wagur iɣ-d yezzuzur udabu acḥal iseggasen aya? Anwa bab neɣ tayemmatt n t’wacult i zemren ad yessider arraw-is s 4000 idinaren ? » akka id d-t-yenna yiwen n-umaɛḍur i zedɣen deg M’cedalla. D-acu kan, aḥun a rebbi llan-t tiddukla n yimaɛḍar deg yal taɣiwant yekkat-ent ɣef izerfan nsen, iten-yettɛiwinen ama s tedrimt, neɣ swayen nniḍen, wamma ad nṭaren dayen kan! Awin yufan, ass-agi n yimaɛḍar d ttagnitt akken medden akked d-udabu ad bedlen tamuɣli nsen ɣer yimdanen-agi yerwan lḥif, acku d-imdanen am wiyiḍ yuklalen izerfan nsen mebla lemziya n yiwwen !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Ayen yellan deg wayyuren iɛeddan, neɣ deg yiseggasen, d targit kan i ssaramen kra n tarwa n Uweqqas, ladɣa wid iqerben ɣer tdukkla « Taddukkli » deg taddart n Ayt Ɛisa, yuɣal tura d tilawt. Ha-t-an, la ttwasemrasent tigawin deg wannar i wakken ad d-yuɣal usenfar-a n umezgun n tezzegzewt, neɣ azegzaw, i ttraǧun Yizwawen merra. Tura akka, d tiwizi yessefraḥen i d-iḍerrun deg taddart n Ayt Ɛisa s ubnaw n ubraḥ-a n umezgun gar ṭṭjur, deg tmiṭ n yidurar. D aqeddic i d-yesmektayen lebni n yimaziɣen iqburen, neɣ d win n yirumanen n yiwet n tallit. Ɣef waya, d timrawin n yilemẓiyen i irezzun ɣer Ayt Ɛisa seg qeddac d tamnaḍt akken ad kkin deg usbedd n ubraḥ-a amaynut deg tegnit n ubeḥri d tili. D imal yelhan meqqar i ubrid i d-yenjer Muḥend Uyeḥya i usefti n umezgun azwaw d usbeyyen-ines gar leǧnas. Imi tura llan wid izemren ad d-awin aswir s tceqqufin n umezgun. Ihi ma ldin ugar n yixxamen d yibraḥen, am wa n Uweqqas, d ayen ara d-yernun ala lfayda, labaɛda, i warrac-nneɣ. Dɣa ad d-nesmekti belli, nnig n yibeddi n tdukkla turmidt Tadukkli n Ayt Ɛisa, gren-d afus ula d Izwawen iɣriben n Canada s uheggi n tbezzart i ujmaɛ n yidrimen ara yerren ɣer usemmed, aselzem, d uwenneɛ n umezgun-a n berra. Mazal yezmer yal yiwen, ad iɛiwen deg usenfar-a. Ladɣa ilemẓiyen n tmurt iɣef tteklen yidurar. Ma yella lewqam ibeddu seg Wat uxxam, ur seg yiwen n wudem kan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Lydia d yiwet n tlemẓit n 17 n yiseggasen di leɛmer-is, teqqar di tesnawit di tama n M’chedallah. Yeɣli-d fell-as yiwen n waṭṭan i tt-yeǧǧan tekref deg wusu acḥal n wagguren, imi tawacult-is ɣas akken tuzzel, tnuda ur tessaweḍ ad d(taf kra n usafar ara yerran yell-is tbedd am zik-is. Ḥala rwaḥ-is ɣer tmurt n Fransa I izemren ad tt-id-yerr ɣef yiḍarren-is. Maca, anda ara taf ttawilat iwulmen i udawi-s imi ɣef leḥsab n wayen i d-ssutren seg sbiṭarat n tmurt-a n lberrani nnig n sin n yimelyaren n ssantim ara d-tesqam taluft-is. D ayen yeǧǧan iɛeggalen n tiddukla “tamgut” ad beggsen s annar iwakken ad gren tiɣri I ufus n tallelt I twacult n Lydia. Imi mebla leɛḍil, meẓẓi, meqqer, argaz, tameṭṭut rran-d I teɣri, yal wa s wacu i yezmer almi d-jemɛen nnig n wayen ilaqen n tedrimt. Ɣer taggara, ula d imḍebbren n twilayt mi walan annect n ugraw i d-ibedden gren-d afus-nsen ula d nutni. Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i aɣ-d-yewwḍen, almi d ussan-a yezrin i d-yewweḍ usihar n rwaḥ n Lydia ɣet tmurt n Fransa iwakken ad d-kkes lhem i tt-izedɣen. Wagi d yiwen n waṭṭan iwumi qqaren “Sarcom d’Ewing” yekkaten ɣer yiɣes n taɣma, ayen ara yeǧǧen amdan ur yettadded, ur iteddu. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Nabila.B 

  
 Di tmeɣra-nni d-yellan di Zénith di Lpari, 11 yebrir yezrin, yemmeslay-d Lounis Ait Menguellet ɣef tedyant-nni « Je suis Charlie ». Dɣa, yenna umedyaz « Nek daɣen d Matoub, d Tahar Djaout, d Said Mekbel, d Smail Yefsak » akked widak akk nɣant tersasin n rebrab. Widak akk yellan d azamul, wid yettnaḍḥen ɣef nnekwa, ɣef yidles ad yejujeg. Maoub d yiwen seg widak-agi yemmalen abrid. Ula d netta tegla yes-s tisselbi n umdan (bêtise humaine). Teselbi-nni « meqran am sebɣ igenwan (l’univers) », syenna Idir, d-yugmen ɣer Einstein, ɣef txazabit n Lpari.

 Tisselbi-nni tegla s Matoub, di Tala Bounana, ass 25 yunyu 1998. Maɛna tisselbi-nni ur teslib ara, ma nezmer a d-nini, axaṭar tewwet azamul ancet-ila-t, yeddren s lejwareḥ-is di tmetti taqbaylit. D azamul uɣur twehha tmuɣli, asmi akken yeɣreq webrid i webrid, asmi akken ggumen ikabaren, nzant t dukliwin.

 Ilul-d Matoub di 24 yennayer 1956. Asmi kan yebda cna, yettwasen, iḍ-nni n Tefsut Imaziɣen, yebrir 80, yedda d Ait Meguellet, Idir, Ferhat Imaziɣen Imula d yimeqranen n ccna n teqbaylit yefkan azal i wawal. Isem-is  « yebbeɛzeq-d » didin. Yewwi-d ssef ajdid, yeqqar-d timsal mebla tawazya, mebla rkuz. Tuɣac-is d ddwa ɣef ljerḥ. Yekcem s ulawen n yilmeẓyen yeffuden tidet, yeffuden ad idiren taqbaylit-nnsen mebla akukru. Azal  20 iseggasen i teṭṭef tmedyazt n Matoub afus i usirem n yilmeẓyen.    Tabɣest-is d « tɣennant-is » glant yes-s. Uqbel ass-nni amcum, yuɣ lḥal yewwet-it ujadarmi s kalachikov (tuber 88).  Taggara-s, am akken yehṣa yes-s. Dayen d-yettbanen di tuɣac-is. Matoub yezra amennuɣ-is ad d-yessiwel i yeɛdawen. Uac win ur yezgil : isertayen, iserkasen , lakul,  timeṭṭurfa (intégrisme)… d wayen akk yettekkin deg ugrireb n tmeti, si 62. Yettani ula di tallit n ligirra-nni , yesekfel-d  tixazabiyin-nni yeglan s kra n yigrawliwen. Din i yufa  sseba n lqerḥ d ljerḥ n uzekka . Tudert n Matoub d amennuɣ, amennuɣ n yal ass, alarmi ur nettaf tilisa gar tudert n ucennay, tamedyazt-is d umennuɣ-is.  Dɣa, aya yettbini-d di   « Atarwa lḥif » (1986). Di taɣect-a  texleḍ tudert n Matoub, tikerkas n udabu asertan, tameḥqranit akked temsirin n tfelsafit n ddunit.    Tuɣac n Lwennas ddant mgal liḥala yerṣa udabu asertan : tasertit, timeti, tafelsafit, idles. Ur d as-teqqareḍ ara 20 n yiseggasen i yecna : nɛac-iten amzun d nnefs n lqern neɣ ugar ! Rnu yewweḍ leɛfu Rebbi meẓẓi (42 n yiseggasen). Iruḥ asmi akken i yezmer ad d-yefk ugar, am Moumoud Feraoun, yettwanɣan d rsas 36 iseggasen uqbel d Tahar Djaout yettwanɣan di 1993. Iruḥ, maɛna ugin aya yelmeẓyen. Ɣer ɣur-sen, ɣas ulama ur t-sinen ara, mazal-it yedder, mazal awal-is yesɛa amkan ass-a, mazal-iy yettwellih i uzekka. Awal yeddan d Tmaziɣt, Tugdut, mgal taneḥqranit… Awal yefkan-afus i akk imennuɣen iḥeqqiyen. Widak-nni i wumi beggsen yelmeẓyen acḥal n lesnin. Imennuɣen-nni ara yessiwḍen cwiṭ cwiṭ, « ɣas ulama lwaɛd la iteqqes » Nuɣ tannumi n reffu mara yili ur nerri ara tajmilt i unaẓur neɣ amaru, alama yemmut. Yemmeslay-d  Maoub ɣef waya   « Atarwa lhif » :  « asmi ara yemmet, ara nissin lqima n wergaz ». D acu kan Lwennas « tuɣal-as tejmilt di tudert-is ». 

<p style="text-align: right;">Amar Nait Messaoud

<p style="text-align: right;">yerra-t-id ɣer teqbaylit T.O.A

  
 Mohand Nait Abdellah d amedyaz, d anaẓur, d amaru ameqqran n tmedyazt tmaziɣt tartar, d ameɣnas diɣen n tmaziɣt. Tayri-is i tmaziɣt d isefra demmerent i wakken ad yawi abrid n tira n tmedyazt deg yidlisen.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: i melmi tebdiḍ tira n tmedyazt? 

 Bdiɣ tira n tmedyazt am nekk am tuget n yimedyazen deg temẓi. Isefra-inu imezwura, uriɣ-ten deg yiseggasen n 1970-1972. Ussan-nni, lliɣ d anelmad deg uɣerbaz alemmas (CEM) n Lğemεa n Sarriğ. Ussan-nni, lliɣ sεiɣ gar 15 ar 17 n yiseggasen deg leεmer-iw. 

  Ahat d timeɣnest n tmaziɣt i d ssebba mi tsefruyeḍ? 

 D tidet, timeɣnest n tmaziɣt tdegger-iyi i wakken ad sefruɣ, imi nekk d yiwen seg 24 n yimeɣnasen i yettwaṭṭfen ɣer lḥebs deg useggas n 1980. Zyada ɣef wanect-agi, lḥif n tegrawla, lbaṭel akked d tmuḥeqqranit i d-εaceɣ deg ddunit-iw, i d i yi-gan d amedyaz, imi mačči d nekk i inudan fell-as.

  Imi kečč d amedyaz amḥaddi, d acu i d tamuɣli-k ɣef tewsit-agi n tmedyazt? 

 Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ belli, tamedyazt tamḥaddit tewwi-d aṭas ama i tmedyazt ama i tmaziɣt s umata. D nettat i d as-yelddin iẓri, tessaki-tt-id seg tguni. Tettara-d tiɣawsiwin s imekwan-nniḍen. Tessenfalay-d ayen iwumi ur tezmir ara ad d-temmeslayeḍ srid. Lukan mačči d nettat ur tettaweḍ ara sanida akka i tewweḍ.

  D amedyaz d amaru, amek armi? 

 Deg tazwara, lliɣ sefruyeɣ kan i yiman-iw, d kra n leḥbab i d-asen-yeslan, gar-asen: Ahcene Mariche, Idir Bellali. Nnan-iyi acuɣer ur ten-tettaruḍ d idlisen, i wakken ad ten-ɣren akk medden. Tura akka, suffɣeɣ-d sin yidlisen d ammuden n yisefra s tmaziɣt. Amenzu d ‘’Aḍref’’ i d-yeffɣen deg waggur n maggu di tefsut n useggas 2013, ɣer tezrigin Aẓur, uriɣ deg-s 30 n yisefra s tmaziɣt. Wis sin d ‘’Awal d wawal’’ i d-suffɣeɣ yakkan di ɣuct-a n 2015, ɣer teẓrigin Aẓur, ideg llan 24 n yisefra.

  Dɣa, i wacu d wigi i tferneḍ d izwal-a i yidlisen-ik? 

 Amezwaru ‘’Aḍref’’, ffkiɣ-as-t i wammud-iw amezwaru imi mesḍefren deg-s yisefra, am win ixedmen aḍref n tkerza. Ula d tutlayt, am wakal, ilaq ad tkerzeḍ akken ad d-yefk lɣella. Yal yiwen ilaq ad yexdem ayen iwumi yezmer. Wis sin ‘’Awal d wawal’’, xtareɣ-t d azwel i udlis-iw imi uqbel ad t-aruɣ d asefru , yella-d d adiwenni gar-i d yiwen n umɣar di taddart. Syin azwel n udlis-a, kkseɣ-t-id seg uzwel n usefru amezwaru yellan deg-s.

  Anta talɣa n tmedyazt i tessexdameḍ deg yisefra-k? 

 Abḥal n tuget n yimedyazen yuẓen deg leεmer, mazal-iyi ṭṭfeɣ deg talɣa-nni n tmedyazt taqburt. Imi ddeqs n wayen ɣriɣ n tmedyazt, tettwabna ɣef talɣa-nni taqdimt. 

  Acu n yisental iɣef tettaruḍ tamedyazt-ik? 

 Aṭas n yisental iɣef ttaruɣ tamedyazt-iw, gar-asen: amezruy, tameṭṭut, lbaṭel, tirrugza, ameɣras, tuggdi, tijmilin, tutlayt n tmaziɣt, lɣerba, lḥif, taneḥyaft, taεecret taberkan n rrebrab, tidyanin n 1980 d 2001, tudert-nneɣ tura, timetti, idles amaziɣ, timeɣnest, adabu…atg

  Amek-itt tmedyazt taqbaylit ass-a, ladɣa tin yettwarun? 

 Zik tamedyazt-nneɣ, tella- kan d timawit, imi llan waṭas i issefruyen, d acu kan ur urin ara tamedyazt-nsen deg yidlisen. Maca ass-a, teffeɣ tirga n waṭas n yimedyazen, imi ssawḍen ad sneεten ayen uran. Nekkseb agerruj d ameqqran n yimedyazen yessulin aswir d wazal n tmedyazt taqbaylit, yal yiwen s yisem-is. Ma nsuk tiṭ ɣer unnar n tira, ad naf aṭas n yidlisen n tmedyazt ara d-itteffɣen. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ belli tga asurif d ameqqran ɣer sdat, ladɣa tura imi tuget n yimdyazen sεan aswir εlayen deg tmussni.

  Ma tettekkiḍ yakan deg temsizzliyin n tmedyazt, deg tmurt n Leqbayel? 

 Σerḍeɣ ad ttekkiɣ deg temsizzliyin n tmedyazt, i d-yettilin deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Uzneɣ aṭas n tikkal isefra-w ɣer tfaskiwin-agi n tmedyazt, ur ten-qbilen ara, acku d tamedyazt tamehaddit. Syin uɣaleɣ ttekkiɣ kan berra n temsizzliyin (d taɣuri kan i d-qqareɣ isefra-w). 

  D acu ara tinniḍ deg tfaskiwin n tmedayzt? 

 D nutenti i d-isbanen ddeqs n yimedyazen yettwafren, ttuneḥsabent d aɣerbaz n tmedyazt d tmussni imi i d-tettili temlilit gar waṭas n yiḥeddaden n wawal d yimedyazen. Ula d tifaskiwin-agi s timmad-nsent, εawnent amedyaz d tmedyazt s umata. Acu kan, d lawan ad tettwaqbal tmedyazt tameḥaddit deg-sent, imi ula d nettat d yiwet n tewsit seg tewsatin n tmedayzt.

  Ma tugmeḍ-d ɣer yimedyazen-nniḍen neɣ ala? 

 Ugmeɣ-d aṭas n tiktiwin, s ttawil n tɣuri d usmeḥses i yimedyazen-nneɣ iqdimen. Ttruḥuɣ daɣen ɣer tfaskiwin n tmedyazt, ɣriɣ isefra n Si Muḥend U Mḥend d wiyaḍ, am wakken diɣen i qqareɣ kra n yisefra s tefransist.

  Amek i ilaq ad yili umedyaz? 

 Amedyaz, ilaq ad yili d iman-is uqbel kulci, d ayen yettwali, d ayen yettḥulfu u d ayen yettidir ara t-idemmeren ad isefru. Ilaq ad yili s wazal-is d leqddar-is. Ilaq ad yili d lemri n tmetti-ines, d inigi ɣef tallit-is. 

  Acu ara asen-tinniḍ i yimedyazen imaynuten? 

 Ilaq amedyaz ur yettḥiri ara akken ad yessuffeɣ tamedyazt-is deg yidlisen. Ilaq ad iciwer win yessnen akter-is, maca ilaq ad yili deg taɣult-a n tmedyazt, ad t-iwelleḥ akken ad yessuffeɣ ayen yelhan, izeddigen ara iɛiwnen idles-nneɣ.

  Imi aql-aɣ deg yennayer, ma turiḍ yakan asefru fell-as? 

 Tasiεt-agi, mazal ur uriɣ ara asefru ɣef yennayer, leεmer i yi-d-tusa takti i wakken ad sefruɣ fell-as, maca sarameɣ yiwen was, ad t-id-yawi umeddaḥ deg teqsiḍt, dɣa ad aruɣ fell-as.

  D acu n yisenfaren i tsewjadeḍ sya ɣer sdat ? 

 Sewjadeɣ aṭas n yidlisen sya d afella, gar-asen: ammud wis kraḍ (03) n yisefra s tmaziɣt, snat n tullisin, yiwen n udlis i d-iḥekkun ɣef tudert n yilemẓi azzayri, d snat n tcequfin n umezgun, yiwet ɣef teɣdem, tis snat isem-is “Taḥkayt-nneɣ”. Ssarameɣ sya ɣer taggara n useggas-agi n 2017, ad siwḍeɣ ad ten-id-suffɣeɣ. 

  Awal-ik n taggara… 

 Tanemmirt-ik ɣef tdiwennit-a i yi-texdmeḍ i nekk d leqdicat-iw idelsanen. Tanemmirt tameqqrant i Uɣmis ‘’La Dépêche De Kabylie» imi i yi-iga azal. Ssarameɣ aseggas ameggaz i yimaziɣen merra.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

 
  
 Ussan-agi, ad d-uɣalent tmeɣriwin-nni qui font le bonheur n les adultes. Yiwet tɛedda déjà. Qqaren-as awel muḥarem. Tagi d l’anniversaire n wasmi ihujer nnbi si Mekka ar Lmadina. Ass-nni dɣa yuɣal d ixef n useggas n yinselmen. Ihi, yal aseggas , l’exil-a  “yettmiɣriw” (ur tesinem ara awal-a ! tura i t-id-snulfaɣ. Ddunit akk tesnulfuy-d, pourqoui pas moi !). Tella daɣen tɛacurt. Tameɣra-agi tcud, ula d nettat,  ar ddin. Ttfitin-tt  s waṭas di tmurt n leqbayel d…Iran. Normalement y a pas photo, neɣ ala ?  Uqebl ad ifak waggur dujember, d Noêl. D l’anniversaire n wasmi d-ilul Sidna Jésus. Tagi daɣen ttfitin-tt di tmurt n leqbayel s tqejmyar n cikula.  Mi iɛedda Noêl, ad d-yelḥeq réveillon n 31 duǧember. D tameɣra n yixef n useggas  amasiḥi i yuɣalen d la référence i ddunit merra. Iḍ-nni  d la fête non stop alamma yexcawet Nnaqus n Zimu.   Akken ara yelḥu, s wazal n ɛecra n wussan, waggur amenzu agriguri, ad d-ilal Yennayer n yimaziɣen n taddatr ufella. Les adultes  dont ijerriden n tuqqna, qqaren belli d l’anniversaire n wasmi yeskuli Cacnaq l’équipe nationale n ferɛun, qrib 3000 n yiseggasen aya. Autrement dit,   ussan-agi  ad neffiin, au moins, la 2966 ème années de notre existence di ddunit.  Twalam(t), tura s wacḥal n leqrun i nezwar nos colocataires di ddunit.      Théoriquement, et selon la déduction de mes neurones bébétals, d nukni s “les brobros yettaken awal i wawal” ara d-yufraren di ddunit.  il faut kamim reconnaître belli yufrar-d uyaziḍ d seksu. Pour le reste, u skudal “les brobros ttaken awal i wawal», il faut attendre azal 3000 n yiseggasen nniḍen.  Si sya ar ass-nni, ad nečč ayaziḍ, ad nemceḥ taqejmurt n cikula, ad nheyyi lweɛda i sidi lmuxtar… 

 En attendant ass-nni, iseggasen imeggazen !!
