 D anwa akka d azwaw-a i ur nesli ulama tikkelt yes-s? D anwa d wa i ur tesduqqes taɣect-is i yeččuren d iḥulfan ed wurrif? Atmani, bab n 70 n tefsutin ass-a, seg gar yinaẓuren imeqqranen n Tmurt n Yezwawen i iwansen akken iwulem ilemẓiyen deg yiseggasen n 70 ed 80 ladɣa, ɣas ma yella izli-ines yettabaɛ tallit taɣezfant, acku mazal yettwaḥessas ar tura. D yiwen i yessnen i yak isental i iceɣben azwaw neɣ amdan s umata. Ama d tid n timmeɣnest ed tmagit am « Ahya tawaɣit » neɣ « I umaziɣ », neɣ d tid n tayri am « Ur seḍḥaɣ ad kem-in-muqleɣ », neɣ d tid n ddunit ed tlufa-s am tezlatin « A ddunit a mm lehmum » ed « A lmektub a bu tlufa ». Aredmani, d agerruj s timmad-is i win yettakken azal i uswir n tezlit tazwawt, i yimal-is ed wayen merra tesselmad i tsutiwin. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Yeḥbes akken ur iban ɣef wacu !  

 Ɛetmani neɣ Ḥmimic ɣur kra, seg zik ur yelli d win yebɣan ad yettwassen aṭas neɣ ad yesɛu cciɛa akken qqaren. Dɣa deg yiwet n tebraḍt i d-yuzen i gma-tneɣ Cami Muḥemmed, amseɣbar (archiviste) n tezlit tazwawt, yenna-yas-d dakken netta s timmad-is ur yesɛi tiwlafin d ayla-s s ugiṭar ! Aya, iwakken ad d-nini amek yella yettwali taluft-a n tẓuri. Ula d tividyutin fell-as, ala yiwet neɣ snat i tzemreḍ ad tafeḍ deg internet. Yettusemma netta, yella icennu kan iwakken ad yessifsus ul-is, ad yessawki wid yeṭṭsen, daɣen ad isebber yid-s wid yuysen seg kra n yiɣeblan. Daymi ihi iɣab akken seg wannar n ccna netta mazal-it d amuddur. Rnu, isul ttraǧun wid i t-iḥemmlen ad t-walin ulama tikkelt deg usayes netta yettawi-d kra n tuɣac-is. Ayen yessewhamen ugar amek almi ula deg ugernit yewɛer ad tafeḍ  yiwen n yisalli i t-yerzan ! Yewwi-d ɣef wid i t-iḥemmlen tili sersen-d xersum tameddurt-is. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ula d tarwa-s gan am netta. 

 Mi yeḥbes Ɛetmani ccna, ɣas ma yella yezmer ad d-yernu ad d-yefk, aṭas i iɣilen dakken d tarwa-s i ara isemmden deg ubrid-is, imi dɣa yella yenǧer-asen-t yakan mi i ten-yessiweḍ ad cnun d amsin (en duo) taɣect-nni yettwassnen aṭas s uzwel n « Tayribt-iw ». Yuɣ lḥal, llan ɛeddan-d ula deg tiliẓri cennun deg sin. Maca atan segmi yejbed iman-is baba-tsen ǧǧan ula d nutni aḥric-a n tẓuri. 

 Gar tezlatin i yettwassnen n Ɛetmani d tid i d-bedreɣ s ufella, akked tiyaḍ nniḍen am tinna: « Sliɣ i udrar », « Rwu rray-ik a rray-iw », « Trebba-yi-d lmeḥna ». 

 <em> Yeqqar deg tsetna n tezlit n yal tallit « I umaziɣ »:  </em>

 <em> I umaziɣ, yenna-yas baba-s freḥ  </em>

 <em> I umaziɣ, yak wwiɣ-ak-d lḥuriyya (tilelli)  </em>

 <em> I umaziɣ, asmi tefra ziɣen yeqreḥ  </em>

 <em> I umaziɣ, ffɣent-as tirga mxalfa.  </em>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi   

  
 Yeḍra-d ussan-a kan deg taddart n Ayt Idris, taɣiwant n Tsexriwt, yiwen n ubaxix yessewhem amecṭuḥ d umeqqran, imi ur nennum yettili-d deg yidurar-nneɣ. D yiwet n temɣart i yettwawfen dɣa terɣa armi d iɣes deg yiwen n lkuri i ur nebɛid aṭas ɣef uxxam-is. Ar tura, ur iban ara akken ilaq amek, neɣ anta d ssebba i d-yewwin tamettant am ta. Wa yeqqar d asehwu (accident) kan am wiyaḍ, wa yettmeslay ɣef tmentilin-nniḍen i yeffren. Aneḍruy-a, yesgugem akk asamar n Bgayet, ladɣa Tasexriwt d Ayt Smaɛel, imi akken i d-nenna, nsell d amecṭuḥ i yettḥaz urɣay s ṭṭaqa. Ad d-nesmekti dakken deffir twaɣit-a yesseḥzanen, yettwasneɣmes Uḥuddu Aɣerman (Protection Civile), wwḍen-d dindin yirgazen-is, wwin tamerḥumt ɣer sbiṭar.

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

  
 Ddurt-agi yezrin, uqbel aggur n Remḍan, aγerbaz n uselmed n ddin n Sidi-Σebd Areḥman El-Yilluli, n tγiwant n Yillulen Umalu yesudes-d yiwet n tmeγra meqren γef dema ussufeγ n 129 ger iselmaden d lecyax n lumur n ddin useggas n wulmud 2014 /2015 i yellan d tarbeεt tis 29 (29eme promotion) i yewwin isem n ccix Σli At-Lwenas Idrayes n At-Buyaḥya tamnaḍt At-Dwala i ilemden di temεemmart-agi n Sidi Σebd Areḥman, illul deg useggas 1902, yemmut deg seggas n 1990.

 Tameγra-agi tella-d s ddaw laεnaya n tnaγlaft n lumur n ddin d tmahla n lumur n ddin n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, s laḥdur iεeggalen n tnaγlaft n lumur n ddin n tmurt-nna&amp;gamma,; inemhalen n tmahliwin n lumur n ddin n lwilayat n tmurt ger-asent, Tizi-Wezzu, Tubiret, Lzzayer tamanaγt, Bgayet akked yiselmaden n tsedawit n Qesenṭina.

 Akken ḥedren yemḍebren n tγiwanin yemgaraden n wammas n Wizgan d yemdanen niḍen id-yussan sya u sya.

 Γer tagara, tella-d tikci n yigardasen n tagara n wulmud d warazen n usebγes i wid id-yefγen di tarbaεt-agi tis 29.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Imezdaγ n taddart n Ṣwamaε s lemεawna n tesqamut n taddart akked tiddukliwin tesεa, theggin ad-sdarin tazrigt tis 13 n tfaska ḥkku-d Taẓuri “Raconte-arts», s usentel « Ales-iyi-d Tagelda n Kuku « ara yeldin tiwwura-s s wudem unsib ass n 24 yulyu id-iteddun, d leqdic ara yeddun γef teγzi n 08 n wussan almi d ass n 31 deg aggur ideg nella. Tafeska-agi tsuddes-itt-id tdukla n tẓuri n sinima n Tizi Uzzu, s lemɛawna n UsEQqamu aγerfan n ugarzu n Tizi-uzzu, imḍebren n tγiwant n Ṣwama&amp;epsilon,; tasqamut n taddert Ṣwamaε d tidukliwin tesεa, akked yimezdaγ n taddArt-a. Imḍebren n tfaska-agi ussan-d acḥal d tikkelt γer taddert n Ṣwama&amp;epsilon,; anda imlalen d yemḍebren n taddert-agi akked yimezdaγ-is, anda id-mmeslayen ɣef wamek d-yettili uheggi n tfaska-agi.Iswi n temlilit-agi, d aheggi n wannar n leqdic akken imdanen ad gzun amek d ttilin wussan n tfaska-agi, syen ḍelqen-d ahil n leqdic d tegnatin ideg ara yeddu. Tafaska n useggas-a ad-ttekin deg-s nnig n 250 n yinaẓuren izzayriyen, d wazal n 50 n yinaẓuren n tmura n lbarani am Tunes, Palistine, Surya, Lubnan, d fransa. Ger inaẓuṛen ara yillin di ttiεad n useggas-a, tanaẓurt Sylvie Vieville n tmurt n Fransa akked unaẓur Jorus Mabiala n tmurt n Congo yettidir di tmurt n Fransa. Ahil ig ttewjarden d amesbaγur, anda llant temzikniyin yemgaraden, isaragen, isura, ticeqqufin n umezgun, timucuha, tamedyazt, ccna, timliliyin, uraren deg yiberdan akked yizenqan. Iswi n tfaska-agi d asnerni d unegmu n yidles amaziɣ akked tfriqt s umata d wuẓẓu n tayri deg ulawen yemdanen, asebγes n tẓuri d i tudrin leqbayel, aẓeṭṭa n tegmatt ger yegduden d usbedi n tqendyar ger tmura n wager akkal.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Tamkarḍit n tsekla taqbaylit simmal tettnerni. Qrib tura yal aggur   sin ɣer tlata wedlisen  yuran s tutlayt n Si Muḥend U Mhend id tteffɣen ɣer ssuq.  Idlisen-agi huzzen yal udem yellan di  tira : ungalen, tullizin, isefra, amezgun, annadi…

 Gar idlisen id yefɣen taggara-agi nezmer ad nadder ungal “ tafrara” sɣuṛ umyaru yettwasnan  Salem Zenia, «  di lǧerra-k ay awal » d ammud n tullizin s ɣuṛ Mourad Irnaten., « times d waman » ungal s ɣuṛ M’hend Askeur, «  amɣar d ilel » tasuqqilt n ungal n Ernest Hemingway s ɣuṛ Mohamed Arabe Ait kaci. Ɣer yidlisen agi yenerna-d deg aggur agi n Yunyu wammud n tullizin « Seddaw n treccact »  s ɣuṛ  umedyaz yettwasnen aṭas ɣer wid iḥamlen tamedyazt  taqbaylit tatrart Louni  Hocine  .

 Ayen akken yellan zik-nni d targit  kan tura yuɣal d tidet ( anwa ara s yinin deg iseggasen n 70 ad yas wass deg ara tefrurex tira  s teqbaylit ? Neɣ ɛad ad tennulfu  tasekla ɣezzifen s tutlayt-agi bɣan kra a tt-ḍelqen di tarkent n tantala daya kan ). Awal n Lounis Ait Menguellet: “ zik wa iḥader-itt i wayeḍ/ass-a di lkaɣeḍ/ a tt-id afen ineggura” ur yeḥnit-ara.  Anect-a yussa-d asiǧhed n tiɣri n Idir id as yennan: “ ay aqcic aras/ ay izimer aksas/ win yebɣan teqbaylit/ ad yisin tira-s”. Yussa-d diɣ akken ad iressi tiɣri n Ferḥat Mhenni id as yennan: “ idles-nwen aru-t/ idlis-nwen kan.” Am akken diɣ id yussa lewǧab i  tabṛat yura Mouloud Mammeri  i Muḥend Azwaw. Asmi id yennulfa ungal amezwaru n Rachid Alich “ Asfel”  drus n wid yumnen( imiren)  ad yas wass deg adlis-nni  ad yawi di lǧerra-s ayen din n yedlisen nniḍen…maca zzman yeskadeb wid –nni yerran tazmert n tutlayt taqbaylit di ccek imi di lǧera n Rachid Aliche  aṭas n yemyura id yegren s annar n tasekla s teqbaylit am Said Sadi s wungal  “Askuti», Amar Mezdad s wungalen-is “ Yiḍ  d wass», “ Tagrest d wurɣu” , “ Tuɣalin” , “ Ass-nni” , “ tettili-d ur d t-keččem», “ Yiwen wass deg tafsut” . Maca tuget n yedlisen id yeffɣen  llan-d seg  imi  nekcem agim n 2000.  Taqa seg adlisen-agi  fɣen-d ɣer tiẓrigin n HCA . Ɣef aya Ahat tira-agi ur d tufi ara irebbi  ɣer imeɣṛiyen imi akken neẓra yak idlisen di yesufuɣ HCA ur ttnuzun-ara deg tinedlisin.  Maca llan wadlisen id yefɣen ɣer tiẓrigin nniḍen am tizrigin “tira», “Amar Achab”  “ Mehdi” “Amel”  id yufan ṣda deg iɣmisen akked d ttawilat n umṣiweḍ. Gar wayen id yeffɣen s wudem-agi  nezmer ad nebder  d-imedyaten  ungal n “ Timlilit n tyermiwin “ sɣur Djamal Benaouf, “ Tawenza” s ɣuṛ Hamid, “Nnbi” tasuqilit n udlis n Jebṛan Xalil jebṛṛan sɣur Louni Hocine, “ tujjam d isefra” ammud n isefra sɣur Djamel Benaouf, “ Irus d Tatanus” tamezgunt sɣur Amar Benhamouche…

 Ayen id tewwi  a t-negzu s imedyaten-agi  d-akken ulac udem n teskla ur thuz-ara tira tamirant s teqbaylit. Maca xas akken ggten imyura , xas akken yella usnnulfu, tuget n yedlisen-agi ur ttawḍen  imeɣṛiyen acku imyura  ur  sen-tunefk ara tagnit akken ad sbuwcɛen akken i wata idlisen-nsen. Aya ssebba-s, ahat,  d tiẓrigin imi fkint  ara azal  i cɣel agi n usbucaɛ. Lqidaṛ deg ara yili d nutenti ara yezlan ɣer raduwat, ɣer yiɣmisen akken ad yili w- awal ɣef udlis id yennulfan amer ad ɛelmen s twafɣa –ines imeɣṛiyen,ad bɣun  at-id aɣen ,  netta-f taqqa d imyura s timad-nsen i ttazzalen  zelmeḍ yeffus akken ad jebden tamawt ɣer udlis-nsen. Xuḍi ceɣl-agi lemmer id-ak terbiḥ ay wul, yerza tiẓrigin imi amyaru lhem-is ( anda teddun lecɣal akken i wata) d-asnnulfu mačči d-azenzi. Ayen diɣ yefkan tiɣirt i udlis s teqbaylit d-asiẓreg s ddemma n umyaru. 

 Terra tmara ad yili wayagi imi qṛib yak  tiẓrigin yellan, ulac tin  izemren a ter=ṛhen xersum a sentim akken ad tessufeɣ adlis(  a beɛd-a i yemyura imaynuten mazal ur nettwassen ara) . Ɣef aya tamara ineggura-agi sufuɣen-d idlisen-nsen s ddemma-nsen, d ayen-nni i yessenɣasen azal n umyaru akked d wayen yura. Ɣer ass-a mazal ur d tlul ara taẓrigt ixedmen s lmun, yefkan azal i tsekla akked i wid yettnawalen tasekla! 

 Ɣef aya nettaf diɣ ( di taggara agi) aṭas n yemyura I yesmenyafen ad sufɣen  adlis-nsen srid ɣer tiẓrigin  yellan  deg uzeṭṭa ( am  tiẓrigin “lulu», “ booklis”).  Meɛna dag-i diɣ yella wuggur imi ayen id yeffɣen d tekteb s tawil -agi ( a zrireg deg uzeṭṭa/ édition en ligne) yewɛer akken  a t- id yaɣ win umi yehwa imi ulac ttawil n uzenzi s tawil n  internet di tmurt-nneɣ.

 Ahat akken negzu azal n tira-agi s teqbaylit ilaq i  tazwara ad tili tḥawact ( catalogue) n kra n wayen id yefɣen d-adlis s tutlayt taqbaylit. Sin akkin ilaq ad yili unadi deg anect-a s ɣuṛ isdawiyen akken ad as ggen aktazal ammer aɣ-id iban a cu id tewwi, anwi isental tettɛebbi, amek id aɣanib n tira s teqbaylit, amgared gar tasuqqilt akked usnnulfu, uguren yellan di tira s teqbaylit, afran n umawal…lḥasun ad iban ubrid ! 

 Maca yiwet n tamsirt tufrar-d  mebla amjadel :  ass-a tasekla taqbaylit teffɣed seg tagnit n usferfed, tura tesɛa illugan-is,  tesɛa adasil ɣef acu ara tbedd, tesɛa llsas ɣef acu ara tesali iɣeṛban isaḥen, tesɛa imeɣṛiyen-is, imsenqaden-is, d lawan kan ad teǧǧuǧeg ad taf amkan-is deg tinedlisin d timkerḍiyin, a teṭṭef nuba di lbal  n wid yak  iḥamlen taɣuṛi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid   

  
 Mebεed ‘’alγem-nni i d-zuγren sin’’ di Tizi Uzzu, ussan-agi ineggura d Baba Noël i d-yewwin ajḥiḥ-is, iεedda-d syin, dγa yeqqim din. Acu kan imawlan n ulγem-nni ḥeznen, ssuturen, ma d bab n ujḥiḥ-nni yeṣṣeḍṣay imdanen : yexleq-d anecreḥ d uṣeḍsu γer warrac imecṭaḥ akked yimawlan-nsen.

 I lmend n tmeγriwin n taggara n useggas, kkren sin yilmeẓyen, Tayeb Mourad akked Nadour Hakim, wwin-d ajḥiḥ akked tcaṛiṭ-is γer temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Cebbḥen-t-id akken ilaq. Yiwen deg-sen yelsa-d llebsa am Père Noël wayeḍ yettṣewir s yidrimen arrac imecṭaḥ i irekben ajḥiḥ-nni. Din din ad d-teffeγ teṣwira-nni. Γer tama-nsen, wayeḍ yesnuzu ‘’la barbe à papa’’. Akka acḥal d aseggas. 

 ‘’Papa Noël di Tizi Uzzu d idrimen i yettawi mačči d arrazen i d-yettawi !’’ Akka i aγ-d-yenna Massi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Seg wayyuren-a iɛeddan, yeqqel umedyaz ilemẓi mmi-s n Sidi Ɛic, Yusef Haruni, am tzizwit deg tefsut. Akken ad yessiweḍ i yimeɣri ammud-is amezwaru n yisefra, iwmu yefka azwel « Asirem », icala war ɛeyyu ɣer ddeqs n waɣiren (tiwilayin) n tmurt anda iga tinezzuyin n ubuddu (ventes-dédicaces). Gar-asent, ad d-nebder Bgayet, Tizi Uzzu, Tubiret, Lezzayer tamaneɣt, Tabatent, Wehran, Tablidt, d kra n twilayin-nniḍen n usamar.

 Imi yeẓra amek tella tmetti tura, d wacu i d abrid igerrzen n umedyaz, neɣ n umaru n wass-a, akken ad yessiweḍ asnulfu-ines i yimeɣri, yuzzel Yusef iḥerrek i temlilit n medden deg yal ttiɛad adelsan i d-yettilin. «Lḥiɣ aṭas s udlis-a akken ad t-senzeɣ. Netta d isem-is i d anamek-is, imi azwel-is Asirem. Ihi, ɛerrḍeɣ ad zzuzreɣ asirem ɣer wanida lfiɣ. Deg 32 n yisefra i yellan deg-s, rriɣ tajmilt i kra n yizumal am Lwennas n Ayt Lewnis (Meɛtub) akked Sliman Ɛazem». D awal-a i aɣ-d-yenna umeskar ilemẓi Yusef s umata. D ammud, dɣa, i d-yettawin ɣef tmagit (identité), tilufa d yiɣeblan n ddunit, rnu-as ciṭṭuḥ n tayri ɣer taggara. D acu, ɣas yewweḍ udlis-is 21 n twilayin ar iḍa, yesḥassef ayendin Yusef imi ur yelḥi udlis-is di Bgayet am temnaḍin tiyaḍ. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis 02 deg waggur n yebrir 2017, lewhi n 12h00 uzal, yerɣa yiwen uxxam deg taddart n Tahanouts, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Ssebba n tmerɣiwt-is, d agzam igezmen yixeddamen n tkebbanit n lgaz d trisiti (Sonalgaz) tasebḥit n wass, syin akkin mi yezgen wass rran-tt-id, dɣa tegla-d s twaɣit-agi n tmerɣiwt s trisiti. Axxam-agi n twacult K. A yellan akkin i taddart, yuɣ lḥal tella yiwet n tmeṭtut deg-s, i isuɣen syin uzzlen Wat taddart ssufɣen-d tibutayin n lgaz, rnan ssufɣen-tt-id ula d nettat imi tettwaxnaq seg dduxxan n yiceṭiḍen-nni yerɣan. Usan-d yiɣalen n usellek wwin-tt ɣer sbiṭar n Med Nadir n Tizi Uzzu, maca ur tɛeṭṭel ara tuɣal-d s axxam. Ad d-nesmekti belli, d tagi i tawaɣit tis snat n tmerɣiwt n sin yixxamen deg wakal n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, gar taggara n useggas yezrin d tazwara n useggas-agi ideg nella. Imi tamezwarut tella-d deg taggara n waggur duǧember iɛeddan, menbeɛd mi yerɣa yiwen n uxxam s lgaz deg taddart n Ait Brahem, i d-yeglan s lmut n yiwet n tmeṭṭut, d truẓi n urgaz-is d mmi-s. Tura terna-d tis snat-agi, acu kan ta ulac s wacu i d-tegla di lerwaḥ. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> A.A 

  
 Segmi i d-yeḍra umsegraw-nni (anejmuɛ) n la COP 21 deg Pari, tamaneɣt n Fransa, ɣef ubeddel i d-yettilin iseggasen-a ineggura deg twennaḍt, uɣalen kra n medden ttmesteqsayen, kra ssaramen, wiyaḍ ugaden seg wayen izemren ad d-ibin seg umcawer-nni n yisertanen, ideg ttekkan, d asmekti kan, azal n 195 n yiselwayen n tmura. Ɣef waya, aselway n Tesbeddit Nikulas Hulu i Ugama ed Umdan, yella, deg teɣzi n wayyuren, yeṭṭafar amaynut n wayen s tezmer ad d-teglu temlilit-a tagreɣlant mi yella yeḥḍer-as s timmad-is, rnu yezga yesseɛlam deg yimdanen akk i iqerben i tesbeddit. Tura ihi, segmi temmug tɛedda dayen, yefka-d tasleḍt-is (analyse) ɣef wamek yettwali ed unamek n wayen i d-yellan. Ɣef tmuɣli-s, ahat akken yebɣu yili, tezmer talsa ad tessirem i yigmaḍ igerrzen imi i tikkelt tamezwarut i mtawan yisertanen ɣef twennaḍt, maca, seg tama nniḍen, ur ilaq ad ɣeflen yimdanen amzun tefra, ; wanag yewwi-d ad kemmlen aḥras-nsen ɣef yimḍebbren alama yeqqel wawal d tigawt. Skud ar tura, ɣas myefkan merra lɛehd i lɛali ed tezdeg n ugama, maca acemma ur yettwassemres deg tidet ɣef wannar. Yuɣ lḥal, akken ɛeqlen umeqqran ed umeẓyan, liḥala n twennaḍt tenṭer almi dayen kan almi neḥḍer i lexsas n waman ula deg ccetwa. Rnu, ssmamat n waṭṭan n twennaḍt acḥal-aya segmi i d-banen deg umaḍal-a ɣas ma mačči i medden merra. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Taluft-a d tin i d-ijebden awellih deg tallit-a i d-yeggran. Ma yella zik mara d-nini adrar anamek-is tizzegzewt, tibeḥyar, littaɛ, abeḥri yezdigen, tasusmi akked ugama, ass-a iteddu waya srid akken ad ibeddel s tidet, almi uɣalen kra n medden ttmesteqsayen s usnuzgem ɣef wanida akka teddun yidurar ed wid i ten-izedɣen. Segmi i d-iga uwanek n Lezzayer deg yiseggasen iɛeddan ahil n tallelt i ubnaw n yidurar, mu ssawalen yizwawen « ixxamen n lḥukuma », bdan yidurar ssenfalen udem ttuɣalen d ayen nniḍen, neɣ ad d-nini ttakken anzi ɣer waɣir, ɣer temdint. Ass-a kra n win yellan yesɛa taferka, d tulḥimt neɣ teggug (teqreb neɣ tebɛed), yerra-tt yakan neɣ yettheyyi ad tt-yerr d adeg i tnezduɣt-is tamaynut, almi dɣa ur d-mazal tibeḥyar sdat n yixxamen am zik, ur mazal ireẓwan yettwaẓẓawen ala deg tecwawin n yidurar maḍi maḍi. Ass-a, simmal teṭṭuqut tazzla n yilemẓiyen ɣer lebni n yixxamen, simmal tteḥcirent tuddar iteffer wakal yettmagga d ssiman. Aya iban ansi i d-yekka, seg gemmu n yimezdaɣ n tudrin i yettziden seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ, imi ma yella deg temdint ssalayen d asawen, deg udrar atnan tazwara ttarran tiferkiwin d ixxamen. Maca daɣen tella tmentilt (sebba) nniḍen, i ineṭḍen ɣer uɣilif inmetti i d-snulfan medden. Amek aya? Iseggasen-a ineggura nwala tneffu lɛada-nni i llan sɛan yizwawen zik; tinna n tdukkli, n tudert lwaḥi deg ukeddus, meḥsub deg tmezdit. Tura, yal mara d-yemɣur yilemẓi ibennu axxam i yiman-is send ulama ad yercel, aniɛad ihi ma yewwi-d taqcict-nni i ara as-ibedlen tamuɣli ɣef yimawlan-is. Ad ten-yettwali d iwerdanen, ad irewwel fell-as. « Akken i d-yettili ddiq deg ugama i d-yettili deg wulawen. Ass-a deg ussan, ula d lexrif ur t-tettafeḍ deg lawan-is ḥaca deg tẓegwa ». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n umsedrar. Seg wannect-a merra, skud yewɛer akken ad tettwaɛiwed tmuɣli, ala ayen ara d-yernun iɣeblan i tmetti tabudrart s umata i izemren ad yili.                                

<p style="text-align: right;">   Mhenni Xalifi.  

  
 Ma yella yenna Lounis Ait Menguellet : Fṛeḥ a teqbaylit s wid i d-rebbaḍWid nɣant tismin ur ten yessawaḍ

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ɣelben tasebḥitzzemren i tmedditWwet afus a nṛuḥ  

 Aya ur yelli s ugacur. Ma yella yecna fell-as acḥal n tikkal Matoub Lounes, Zedek Mouloud, Amar Koubi, Kheloui Lounes d w aṭas nniḍen d anaẓur, aya ur yelli d agacur. Ma yella yenna fell-as umedyaz :

<p style="text-align: center;">  JSK nek d aqbayli I lmend n win nɣant tismin,S yisem-im nedheɣ ɣef tlelli yak ass-a iban-d mmi-m 

 diɣan ur yelli s-ugacur. JSk ɣef id newwi awal d tin n iseggasen n 70/80 asmi tsenni tilɣuɣa akked tiqbucin ta deffir ta ɣer uzrar n lɛez. JSK tin ɣef id newwi awal d tin id yefkan imyurar umi ur yezmir yiwen am Koli, Dali Rachid ,Dardar Rabah, Douadi Bachir,Iboud Miloud, Terzi Miloud, Koufi , Derridj, Baris Rachid , Anane , Aouis, Cerbah, Boubekeur, Abdeslam Kamel, Adghidh Rachid , Amara Mourad, Belehcene Ali, Menad , Meddane …d waṭas nniḍen. Imyurar irefden ssenǧaq n teqbaylit d asawen, yefkan lɛez i yidurar-nneɣ. JSK am akken neẓra tella d azamul n teqbaylit deg yeɛqel iman-is yal aqbayli anda i t-yuɣ lḥal. Yis i yezdi lqedd umsedrar lawan deg teẓmek fell-as, deg teẓmek ɣef tmeslayt-is, deg teẓmek ɣef idles-ines, deg teẓmek ɣer tmmagit-ines. Di lawan-nni JSK tella gar ifassen n wid i tt-ihemlen, yesnen ccan-is akked d azal-is am Abelkadr Khalef akked Mhiedine Khalef. JSK n immir tbedd ɣef llsas iṣaḥen , dayen-nni i yeǧǧan Ait Menguellet ad yini:

<p style="text-align: center;"> Win i d- ibedren adrar Ad yeglu s yisem-im Kra id urwen-t tuddar Hha-ten ɣef idis-im ur tɣelli–d ara Ad tt-beddeḍ lebda Wwet-t afus a nṛuḥ 

 Maca zrin wussan armi tuɣal, JSK yellan teṭṭef tiqucac, tetteḥnunnuf deg imillusen . Amillus deg teɣli JSK isem-is “ tadrimt”. Ass-a netawali-tt tuɣal d terbaɛt n menwala armi tuget n wid iḥamlen ddabex( neɣ adal) ur ssinen -ara ula d ismawen n yemyurar yetturaren ddaw ssenǧaq-ines taggara-agi. Rran ṣṣdid ɣef uzamul. Rran ddel ɣef uɣeddu n ttnefxa. Teɣli JSK. Xuḍi asmi yebɣa udabu a tt-yemḥu ( asmi is bedlen isem rran-tt d JET) idurar nedhen am yiwen JSK tella tella. Deg annar cnawi yessidiren ixf, yettakken abeḥri i turin, ihuzen ulawen cerrgent igenni : “ Maɛlic ma nemmut / argaz tameṭṭut, J .S. Imaziɣen ad teḥyu tamurt” neɣ “ yeǧǧa d lɛehd Ɛamiruc, Beṛka-aɣ temɛict n ddel”. Yal dduṛt tettemlil tassa d wayen turew deg annar n Oukil Remdane neɣ deg annar n umenzu n unbir akken ad inin nella u mazal a nili. Zrin wussan ur d yegri wayen ara d yegrin, JSK ḥfan waccaren-is. Teɣli d gar yir ifassen am akken is yenna Lounis : tettaɣeḍ teqbaylit/ mi ara d teɣli gar yir ifassen. Akka kečč diɣen: ayen ur zmiren ad hudden yexsimen hudden at wexxam. Ziɣ werǧin yeskaddeb wanzi is yeqqaren : ansi iɛedda lɛez ad iɛeddi ddel. Teḍṛa-tt yid-nneɣ am Mḥend bu tkerciwt! Wissen kan ma d yeḥnunneḍ Mhend bu twenza n wewṛaɣ?

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Tekker-d yiwet n tnezzayt , zik tccebeḥ akken i iwata i mmi-s n Rabaḥ . Tccebbeḥ ula d ula d nettat akken tufa, terfed-d cwiṭ n tḥwact-nni i as-d-teǧǧa yemma-s, tger mmi-s deg yiwen uḍellaɛ yesɛan taleqqaɛt tahrawant, terra-t daxel-is am wakken d dduḥ, terfed-it seg yifassen, teffeɣ seg uxxam-nsen mebla ma teṭṭal ula d tikkelt timendeffirt . Deguzniq ulac ula dyiwen umdan al akra n yimcac iigezzmen abrid . Asurif tuwi, aḍellaɛ d lamana yellan daxel-is deg ufus, yettara metwal win akken yellan d axxam-is uqbel ad tennebru


<div style="text-align: right;"> n Malek Houd  
 
  
 Anegmu akked tneflit deg lwilya n Tizi Uzzu, yeḍḥa-d d asentel agejdan gar wawalen i d-yenna Amara Benyounes, aselway n umussu agdudan azzayri, deg temlilit i yexdem akked yimeɣnasen-is d yimezdaɣ n lwilya n Tizi Uzzu, deg tzeqqa tameqqrant n Uxxam yidles Mulud Mɛemmri, ass-nni n lexmis 9 deg unbir 2017.

 Yeḍra-d usiher-a, i lmend n ddiɛayat n tefranin ara yilin ass n 23 deg waggur-agi deg-i i nella. Mebɛed mi d-yefka yimḍebber amezwaru n MPA deg Tizi Uzzu, ismawen n wid i d-ibedden ɣer yiqerra n tselwayt n 20 tɣiwanin APC akked usqamu aɣerfan APW n Tizi Uzzu, yettunefk wawal i uselway n MPA i wakken ad yehder s telqayt ɣef wuguren n unegmu i tettidir lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. « Aɛdaw-nneɣ awḥid, d yir liḥala n unegmu deg wayeg tella tmurt n Tizi Uzzu. Tifrat n tmukrist-a, tezmer kan ad tili s tugdut, ad xḍun yimezdaɣ i cwalat, axater cwal ysserwal ɣef tama-gi wid yebɣan ad sseftin idrimen-nsen deg tdamsa. Ttmenyifen ad ruḥen ɣer tamiwin-nniḍen anida terked teswiɛt », i d-yenna uselway n MPA, Amara Benyounes, i iwalan d akken « amennuɣ ɣef tugdut akked tmaziɣt, ur ilaq ara ad aɣ-yessebɛed ɣef tdamsa d unegmu deg lwilaya-agi ». Ayen yeǧǧan tamurt n leqbayel ad tuɣal ɣer deffir seg yal aḥric, ɣef wakken i t-i-yesmekti Mass Benyounes. « Ɣef wanect-a, dɣa, i yextar ukabar Amussu agdudan azzayri tanfalit-is deg ddiɛayat-agi n tefranin « Tugdut s lehna », ikemmel yenna. Ma ɣef wayen yeɛnan ikabaren-nniḍen, iwala d akken d lawan ad d-ffɣen seg cciɛat-nni n umezruy, ad d-uɣalen ɣer unnar n tugdut ma d tidet-nsen bɣan ayen yelhan i tmurt. « Ilaq ad d-ffɣen seg-s wid-nni yettmeslayen s yisem n umezruy. Ilaq ad kecmen annar n tugdut. Llan ɛad wid yettmeslayen ɣef 2019 akka tura deg useggas n 2017. Netta yuɣ lḥal aql-aɣ deg tefranin n tɣiwanin akked yiseqquma mačči deg tid n tselwayt. Win yebɣan tifranin n tselway, yerǧu aseggas n 2019 ». Deg wayen yerzan ahil n ddiɛayat n tefranin n 23 deg unbir 2017, yessers-d Umussu agdudan azzayri sin n yisumar igejdanen ɣer unnar-agi : aṭas n tugdut akked waṭas n leḥkem i yiselwayen n tɣiwanin d yiseqquma iɣerfanen. « Ulamek ara yeḥkem lwali deg uselway n usqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya, neɣ ad yeḥkem imḍebber amezwaru n dayra deg uselway n tɣiwant ? », i d-yessegza Benyounes. Xas ulamma tamsalt, ur teɛni ara kan aḥric-agi n tsertit, imi ula d iḥricen-nniḍen, ur yesɛi ara uselway n tɣiwant tilleli i wakken ad iḍebber deg kra n temsal, ladɣa, tin yerzan akal akked lebni. Ula deg tama n laman n yimdanen, iwala uselway n MPA d akken laqen yiɣallen uzzigen n laman n tɣiwant ara yesdukkulen lecɣal akked wid n tmurt. Ma ɣef uxlaq n yidrimen, neɣ win iwumi qqaren s tefransist tura ‘’La planche à billets’’, yenna-d Amara Benyounes ala tinna i « d tifrat i iwulmen akka tura gar tid i izemren ad ilint », acu kan ilaq wayen ara tt-id-iḍeffren deg useggem n tdamsa tazzayrit, ɣef wakken iwala. Ɣef rray n uselwau n MPA, ur tezmir ara Lezzayer ad tettkel kan ɣef tkebbaniyin tiɣelnawin. Laqent, ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna, tid-nniḍen, tikebbaniyin tusligin (Privées). Aṭas n wawal, dɣa, i yuzlen ɣef yidrimen yemsun i sbbaben i tkabaniyin-agi tineggura, ɣef wakken i d-qqaren kra, acu kan Mass Benyounes, iwala d akken idrimen yumsen ha-ten-in deg rrebrab akked lehyuf (la drogue). « Mi d-isubb yiwen deg udrar, ad yebnu lbaṭima s yidrimen n rrebrar, ad as-iɛelleq deg tewwurt n berra takerḍid-d « Hada min faḍli llah » (ayagi sɣur Rebbi), syin ad d-yaɣ 4/4, ad as-ilesseq « Ma caa llah » (D ayen yebɣa Rebbi). Ɣef wakken i d-yenna Mass Benyounes, d wigi i d idrimen yumsun iɣef ur d-ttmeslayen ara wid-nni yesṭṭuqquten deg wawal. Deg taggara, iwala Benyounes d akken d akabar awḥid i d twaɣit n tmurt u leḥekem n tnemla (socialisme), ur lesliḥ ara. « Ulac tamurt i yegman yis-s deg ddunit merra », ɣef rray-s. S 950 n wumuɣen deg Lezzayer merra, yessaram Umussu agdudan azzayri ad yeṭṭef amḍiq wis tlta deg tefranin-ani n 23 deg unbir i d-iteddun, ɣef wakken i d-qqaren yimḍebbren-is.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Muḥemed Budiaf aselway yettwanɣan srid di tilizri ayen yeǧǧan amaḍal yegggugem d acu-tt txazabit ɣur tewweḍ tmurt n Lezzayer, yusa-d asirem i wid yellan ger iɣesmaren udabu amesbaṭli d rrebrab uṣiḍ agdud i kecmen di twaɣit ur yetiki deg-s.

 Muḥemed Budiaf neɣ Si Ṭeyeb el waṭani isem agrawliw d ameɣnas deg umussu aɣelnaw deg ukabar n ugdud azzdayri PPA ardeqal MTLD armi id uwḍen ad s-lalen akabar ad yawin timunent imi semman FLN.

 Win a yḍefren abrid n wargaz-a di telqay umezruy ad yaff d netta i d bab n tegrawla d netta id isawlen i tegmat n imdebren n MTLD ger imesaliyen yakk d iɛeggalen useqamu aɣelnaw, maca netta yumen s tdukli n warraw n Lezzayer imi beṭṭu ger-asen d lfayda n unekcum afransawi.

 Budiaf d win a yesduklen arraw n tudsa tuffirt OS ɣef yiwen yiswi timunent n tmurt d ayen ara yilin ass n umenzu n wanbar 1954 imi yumen s tiggawt akk d wannar maca ardeqal tufɣa n Fransa tajmilt as yuɣalen d anekraf akk d neffu di tmurt-is tin ɣef isebel iman-is i wakken a tidir tilellit, Yenfa war lebɣi-s ɣer tmurt n Lmarruk anda i t-kemil ussan s temraɣ d wurrif, maca rruḥ n umeɣnas mazal-it deg-s mazal yumen s uzekka yelhan i wegdud azzdayri.

 Xaz mḥan isem-is deg umezruy am akken yeffaɣ d amnafaq, armi d ass deg-i tamurt tekcem deg uxemmuǧ war tufɣa ddarz uɛsekri d win usarti la yeqqaz deg iɣisi yettihririwen ger uɣarfan d tmurt-is, ma d imdebren n wakud-nni ilaq ad afen argaz illaw win yuyren tamurt-is s tidet dɣa uɣalen armi d warraw n tuddsa tuffirt OS am Husin at Ahmed d watas n igrawliwen imi zran nutni d acu swan ur zmiren-ara i tifrat ur llin d uɣdimen neɣ d imagdayen, Teffaɣ Fransa uɣalen-d nutni agdud yuɣal iɣunzaten d ayen i t-yeǧǧan di tefranin 1990 akk d 1991 ad fek ssut-is i ukabar n FIS iswi-is yebɣa ad yarr ttar acku akabar n FLN yaxdem l batel abarkan deg uɣref azzdayri. Ihi walan ,nudan tifrat uffan-tt ɣar uṣaḍ n tegrawla 1954 bab n wanber Muḥemed Budiaf, sawel-as n nnan tamurt yewwi-tt ssix ala kečč i zemren ad yarr tawaɣit-a ɣef tewwurt, yerra-d i tiɣri n wul ikecem-d mugren-t ɣar usaffag s tgella d yiɣi arnan-as iḍebalen ɣilen wwin-d izem i teqnaṭ maca yufa-d azzdayri yaɣraq deg ilel n lbatel udabu d tlafsa n usiden n rrebrab.

 Agrawliw d agrawliw d awezɣi ad bedel ,mazal ur isehma akarsi n tselwayt yebda i farres annar, yebɣa talwit ad uɣal ɣef idaren-is yebɣa yebɣa ajeǧǧiḍ n tukarḍa ad i ruḥ seg izuraran-is kra n win yukren tadrimt n wegdud ad i magar taɣdemt, yebɣa Lezzayer ad uɣal i warraw-is arnu ayen s-nnan di Lmarruk d wayen id yufa da yemgarad nezzah am igenni d lqaɛa, tura s tidet ifhem atan tmurt anda yella…

 umi ur ɣelqen-t wallen fahmen ula d nutni, tiririt-nsen rran-as-tt di Ɛennaba agdud yettwali srid di tilizri.

 Maɛtub Lwennas yerra tajmilt i umaɣras ɣef Lezzayer uzekka

<p style="text-align: right;"> Dahmani Bilal 

  
 Mebeɛd timeɣriwin n unebdu, ama d tid n yimdanen neɣ n tɣawsiwin : tameɣra n lfeṭṭa, tameɣra n uẓeṭṭa, tameɣra n talaxt, tameɣra n tqendurt n leqbayel, tameɣra n tbexsisin, n tkermusin, n zzit, n tamamt…tamurt n leqbayel, tuɣal, kra yekka unebdu, d tazeqqa n tmeɣriwin (Salle des fêtes). Yezha win ixaqqen, yekker zhir deg yal tama n tmurt, tekker ddunit ad telḥu. Tefreḥ tmurt meqqar, teɛya deg leḥzen d umennuɣ i yeddlen tudert-is. 

 Tikkelt-a, d imezdaɣ n yixelwiyen tama-agi n wagennun i igan tameɣra n Rebbi. Acu kan d tameɣra n Rebbi mačči i Rebbi. Tameɣra-agi, tella seg zik ɣer leqbayel, acu kan yal tama melmi i tt-txeddem. Llan kra, xeddmen-tt smana uqbel timecreḍt n ḥartadem, llan wiyaḍ xeddmen-tt azekka-nni n tmecreḍt. 

 Deg tama-agi n yixelwiyen, xeddmen-tt ddurt uqbel timecreḍt. Xedmen-tt ddurt iɛeddan. Ihi, ass-nni n tmeɣra n Rebbi i ttemlilin Wat taddart deg lǧameɛ i wakken ad mmeslayen u ad d-heggin timecreḍt (lewziɛa, deg kra n tamiwin). Ad walin acḥal n yizgaren akked yidrimen i asen-ilaqen i wakken ad d-aɣen izgaren i ara zlun deg tmecreḍt ara yilin ddurt-nni i d-iteddun. Akka, dɣa, i d-tella tmecreḍt-nni sman-agi anda i zlan 13 n yizgaren ara ferqen ɣef 805 n tesɣar. 

 Deg tmeɣra n Rebbi, ttnawalen seksu i ttawin ɣer umekkan unejmuɛ, zik ɣer tejmaɛt, tura ttawin-t ɣer lǧameɛ. Akka, Ixelwiyen mazal ṭṭfen deg leɛwayed n tjaddit, leɛwayed iẓeṭṭen tagmat mačči d tid i ten-iferqen akken i bɣan kra ad xedmen : ad d-awin leɛwayed n wiyaḍ s yisem n Rebbi. Akken i as-yenna Ait Menguellet ‘’Ula d Rebbi d ayla-nsen’’. Ihi, akka i d-sbanen Wat Wagennun d akken ula d nutni ttalasen deg Rebbi u rran-as ‘’tajmilt’’. Ayen yelhan, yelha. 

 Llant kra n tamiwin, ad xedmen lewziɛa, azekka-nni d tameɣra n Rebbi, selazekka-nni ad kkren yifellaḥen ad bdun tayerza.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M  

  
 tlul Taos Amrouche ass n 04 deg meɣres aseggas 1913 deg tmurt n Tunes. D tanaẓurt d tamyarut s tefransist. D nettat i tameṭṭut tamezwarut taqbaylit i yerẓan asalu n tira s ungal-is amezwaru s tefransist (Jacinthe noire, 1947), imi zik tameṭṭut ur tesɛi azref i wacemma.Taos Amrouche d yelli-s n Fadhma Ait Mansour d uletma-s n Jean Amrouche. Tcennu Taos tizlatin tiqburn s teqbaylit. Imawlan-is, d iqbayliyin, baba-s Belkacem Amrouche ( 1880-1958), yemma-s Fadhma Ait Mansour(1882-1967). Kkren-d deg Ighil Ali deg Bgayet, segmi i d-ilul Jean Amrouche aseggas n 1906, truḥ tawacult ɣer Tunes , sɛan lekwaɣeḍ n Fransa. Tewwi-d Taos Amrouche akayad n uswir alemmas, truḥ ɣer tmurt n Fransa. Tefka dinna azal i ccna n teqbaylit. Tura ungal amezwaru s tefransist «Jaceinthe noir», yeffeɣ-d aseggas n 1947. Ayen akk i texdem Taos Amrouche d yemma-s i as-ixedmen afud, tesselmed-as idles n tmaziɣt, tettales-as-d timucuha n leqbayel. Tetteki deg Ugraw Imaziɣen deg Fancsa aseggas 1966. Tessen Taos Amrouche aṭas n tullisin akked tmucuha i as-teḥka yemma-s. Tecna aṭas n tezlatin s ssut-is aḥlawan, yerna tesɛa tafulki , ar ass-a n wussan ‘’ulac’’ tameṭṭut i icennun am nettat. D tanazurt, ur tettun ara leqbayel yiwet tmeṭṭut am Taos Amrouche. Temmut deg 02 yebrir asseggas n 1976 deg Saint-Michel-L’observatoire. Isem-is ad yeqqim deg umezruy, ayen i d-teğğa ad yeqqim deg yidles, ad fell-as isuref wuzmir.

 Ayen tura

 – Jacinthe noire, 1947. (Ungal)

 – Le Grain magique, 1966. (Ammud n tmucuha d tmedyazt)

 – Rue des tambourins, 1969. (Ungal)

 – L’Amant imaginaire, 1975. (Ungal, tameddurt-is)

 – Solitude ma mère, 1995. (Ungal, mebɛed lmut-is)

 Ayen icudden ɣer ccna

 -Chants berbères de Kabylie, 1967.

 -Chants de processions, méditations et danses sacrées berbères, 1967.

 -Chants de l’Atlas, 1971.-Chants espagnols archaïques de la Alberca, 1972.

 -Incantations, méditations et danses sacrées berbères, 1974.

 -Chants berbères de la meule et du berceau, 1975.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Z.A.Y 

  
 Ɣef wakken ttwalin wid –nni i d-yelhan deg uḥric-agi n ddin akked tmetti, nnan-d d akken Remḍan-agi neɣ tuẓumin s umata yella seg zik n zik. Uqbel ad ilint neɣ ad d-banent ddiyyanat, ama d tamasiḥit , tudayit, tineslemt neɣ tid-nni-nniḍen. Ihi, uqbel ad d-yili u ad yettwaḥettem Remḍan-agi ɣef wid yettamnen deg ddin swayes umnen, yella, yakan, ɣer yimezwura i t-ixeddmen i wakken ad ssiǧǧhiden assaɣen gar tfekka-nsen akked d rruḥ-nsen. Meḥsub ad d-sneqqsen kra seg tfekka, ad t-hdun i rruḥ. Amek ? Ɣer wigi uɣur i d-yennulfa Remḍan, ttwalin d akken yal mi ara tili tfekka tufay, rruḥ ad yili d areqqaq, u mkul mi ara tili tfekka d tareqqaqt, rruḥ yettuzur. Ihi, seg wakken ttɛebbiden u ttqadaren rruḥ-nsen i ḥesben nnig-nsen u d netta ara ten-icefɛen asmi ara mten, xeddmen akk kra yellan i wakken ad uɣalen d ireqqaqen , syin ad yuzur rruḥ-nsen, ɣef wamek i ttxemmimen. Ihi, s kra n win yufayen, tewwi-d fell-as ad yirqiq ma yebɣa ad yili d aḥbib n rruḥ-is. I wakken ad yirqiq, tewwi-d ad yeqqim i laẓ. Acu kan, ass yecban ass-a, wid yettuẓumen, rennun deg tufayr imi setten ugar n wagguren-nniḍen. Ma llan wid yuẓamen ɣef wanect-a, ur wwiḍen ara s iswi ? Llan wid i d-yeqqaren, diɣ, ttuẓumen, zik, i trebbit Allat, d tarebbit n waggur. Aggur-agi, yettas-d d wis 9 deg leḥsab n wagguren n useggas. 9 n wagguren i tettɣimi tmeṭṭut i wakken ad d-terbu segmi ara terfed. Ihi, aggur-nni, imdanen ur tetten ara alamma walan Tirebbit-nni. Acu kan daɣen, akken kan ara tt-walin, ad d-ɣermen ayen kan ǧǧan. Tuɣal ɣer din. Syin, yusa-d ddin, u yenna-d d akken Remḍan d ajerreb : ad tjerbeḍ laẓ i wakken ad ak-ɣiḍen wid-nni yelluẓen, syin ad asen-d-tseddqeḍ. Meɛna, mi d-yewweḍ Remḍan, imdanen ttḥiwwisen ɣef wid i t-yeččan i wakken ad asen-agin ad ččen, ur ttnadin ara ɣef wid yelluẓen, i wakken ad ten-seččen. Ihi, s tezmert n yimensi-nwen, d tameggazt lɛid-nwen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M  

  
  (Tullist-agi, tufrar-d deg temsizzelt n 20 yebrir, i texdem tiddukkla tadelsant Itri n Uzekka)  

 Kraḍ n yiseggasen-a ɣer deffir, tella yiwet n tlemẓit tettidir d yemma-s Taseɛdit deg yiwet n texxamt i d-yezgan deg tlemmast n taddart. Taqcict-a, qqaren-as Ẓuhra, ad tesɛu azal n 36 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is. Imi tmeqqer, tebɣa ad tezweǧ am nettat am tezyiwin-is, maca ur as-id-yefki ara Rebbi amwanes. Armi d yiwen wass, yusa-d ɣur-s unexḍab, tugi-t yemma-s ad tt-tefk meɛna nettat terẓa awal-is. Argaz-a, qqaren-as Muḥend, nezmer ad d-nini belli mačči d argaz d wawal, meɛna Ẓuhra tenna-s: “Nekk d wagi ara aɣeɣ, ayen yebɣu yeḍru”. Zrin kra n wagguren, tedda d tislit. Texdem-as yemma-s tameɣra d tameqqrant, xas akken s daxel-is ur tebɣi ara. Muḥend, ur ixeddem ara. Yezga d ssekran, yerna mi d-yekcem ɣer uxxam, ad yewwet akk Ẓuhra. Tameɣbunt n Rebbi, tettarra kan ɣer daxel, ula d yemma-s ur as-tettales ara auen iḍerrun. Taseɛdit, tebɣa ad tesɛu yelli-s agrud ɣef zik n lḥal, acku tmeqqer. Ẓuhra texdem ayen i d as-id-tenna yemma-s, teḍmeɛ ula d nettat ad tesɛu yiwen n llufan. Mi tewweḍ 8 n wagguren deg tadist, teɛya mačči d izli. Ur tezmir ara ad texdem ula d ccɣel, maca argaz-is yal ass yekkat-itt. Tesber tmeɣbunt, mačči d kra, armi d yiwen wass yewweḍ-as-d lexbar i yemma-s, belli tewweḍ leɛfu Rebbi. Yiwen ur yeẓri ara d acu i tt-yenɣan, ma d imdanen izedɣen rrif-is, qqaren-d belli d argaz-nni-ines amcum, d netta i tt-yewwten akk armi temmut.D tagi i d tadyant yeḍran i Ẓuhra meskint, teǧǧa-d ccwami deg wul n yemma-s, ulac win i izemren ad tent-yemḥu.

  Trif Lydia 

  
 Akken yella yetturaǧu, tezzi deg kraḍ n wussan tfaska n tmedyezt tamaziɣt d tajmilt i Dda Lmulud n At Mɛemmer, s uḥḍar n yimeyyaten n yimeɣnasen. Taẓrigt-a, yuɣ lḥal, tettwabud i tgejdit n ccna amḥaddi, anaẓur Lwennas n At Lewnis (Meɛtub). Deg wass amenzu, mi ttwaldint tefsarin n tfaska rnan ttwajerrden yimekkiyen, yella-d usenɛet n temzikkin n Tesbeddit Meɛtub Lwennas. Almi d 14sr n uzal tettwaldi s wudem unsib tfaska s wawalen n uselway n Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad mass Fares Bakkuc, anmazul-is mass Sadeq n Ayt Urbaɛ (Rebbaɛi), inebgi n yiseɣ n tedwilt mass Bujemɛa Agraw, akked uletma-s n uɣewwaɣ umi tuɣal tejmilt, massa Malika Meɛtub. Sin-a ineggura wwin-d dɣa tinagiwin-nsen ɣef bab n tezlit  » leɛmer-iw », syinna, mettwal 15sr n tmeddit, tewwi-d massa Wataḥ Lynda, d taselmadt deg tesdawit n Bgayet, yiwen n usarag s uzwel: «Tamettant ed usirem deg tmedyezt n Lwennas Meɛtub». Seg yimir-nni ala tignatin n umsizwer n tmedyezt i d-yellan alami d iḍ-n. Azekka-tuyen n sem tanezzayt, uɣalen merra ɣer umsizwer n tmedyezt i isemmden almi d imekli. Send ad d-yettwawi usarag wis sin n «Ba Salem chantre des Ahellis du Gourara dans la traversée de Mouloud Mammeri» sɣur massa Buxellu Faṭima. Mi tɛeddi tegnit nniḍen n umsizwer n tmedyezt, yemmug usarag wis kraḍ sɣur mass Yalla Seddiqi ɣef «Seg temlilit akked ugdud ed yiẓuran ɣer temdanit n umedyaz». Akken, fell-as i d-yewweḍ yimensi send ad rǧun merra ttiɛad n ccna i d-yeḍran sɣur ddeqs n yinaẓuren gar-asen mmi-s n Udrar n Fad Wali Ɛebdelɣani, Bujemɛa Agraw akked Ḥasen Aḥres. Merra wwin-d s tuget tizlatin n Lwennas n Ayt Lewnis i uzayez i iḥeḍren s ṭṭaqa. Ma yella d ass aneggaru tettwasenɛet-d tvidyut n wid irebḥen ilindi, synna ttwaferqen warrazen i wid i d-yufraren deg teẓrigt-a tis 14. Dɣa, ɣef waya ara d-nuɣal tikkelt i d-iteddun.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Timizart, d yiwet gar tɣiwanin n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i tḥuza s waṭas tmes, seg wusan agi yezrin; imi azal n tmanya n tuddar anda i tendeh tmes, yecban Buxaruba, Ibazizen, Taεwint, Ihamham At Saεid, Ibdac, Iɣerbiyen, Izarazen d taddar n Ait bbrahem. Teṭṭef tugdi d tameqrant lɣaci n tama-agi, ugaden ɣef yiqerra-nsen akked yixxamen-nsen, imi kra i asen-d-yezin, yerɣa, ur d-yeqqim kra yellan, ama d tjur, azemmur neɣ iqwiren-nsen. Truḥ akk tfellaht-nsen . Yella wanda tegla ula s lmal-nsen : yerɣa akken d amuddir. » Tebda-d tmes -agi ass n lexmis, ɣef ttnasṣif n uzal. Imezdaɣ akk, uzlen-d, yal yiwen ixdem acu iwumi yezmer, limeεna mačči dizli! Srabes n usellek, ur d-lhiqen ara di lawan, tili ur tettaweḍ ara akka », i d-yenna Rabeḥ, yiwen seg yimezdaɣ n taddart Ibaεzizen. Aṭas n yimezdaɣ i d-yeffɣen seg yeixxamen s lxuf. Ugaden ad ten-taweḍ tmes s axxam. Am wakken ttwaxenqen daɣen yiigerdan d yimɣaren imi ur zmiren ara i wanect-nni n dexxan. Ttilint-d tedyanin-agi n tmes yal aseggas. Seg tama n yimḍebbren n tɣiwant, walan d akken « D tamsalt i yeεnan akk imdanen.Ɣef waya i ilaq ad nexdem ttawilat yal anebdu. Lɣaci ilaq ad fersen timizar-nsen. Ad kksen akk ayen i d-yettilin d sebba n usiɣi n tmes deg wussan n lhḥamu yecban wigi », akka iwala yiwen n yimḍebber , ikemmel yenna : « Imezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Tmizart, gren-d tiɣri i srabes teεna temsalt i wakken ad ilin srabes n usellek deg tɣiwant. Taɣiwant-agi-nneɣ tettwattu. Aṭas n yisenfaren i ixussen. Lukan d anda llan ttawilat, tili ur tettaweḍ ara liḥala ɣer wakka! Ass-a, ad d-nger tiɣri i wakken ad yili deg tɣiwant –nneɣ uxxam i uḥuddu aɣarim (protection civile) ». I usmekti, ugar n 113 n yihigaṭṭaren i yerɣan ar tura deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu anda tečča tmes azal n 3620 n tjur n lfakya, amur ameqqran d tineqqlin akked tzemrin. Ɣef wakken i d-nnan srabes usellek, d tiɣiwanin-agi, Maatkas, Tizi Rached, Ait Yahia Moussa, Draa El Mizan akked Tigzirt i yenṭarren mliḥ. Glant-d twaɣiyin-agi s lmut n sin yimdanen akked tmerɣiwt n waṭas n yixxamen. Ha-t-an yebda uɣawas ORSEC deg kra n tɣiwanin, ɣaf wakken i aɣ-d-yewweḍ isalli.

  Farida Elharani 

  
 Ufan sakin hudden 1.422 n lminat n tallit tahersant deg wayyur n ɣuct deg ukatar n temzelt n usexsef deg tlisa n ugmuḍ akked tid n utaram n tmurt, i aɣ-d-nnan seg teɣbula tunṣibin. Deg Temnaḍt taserdasant tis 3, ufan sakin hudden 137 n lminat mgal imdanen akked 45 n lminat mgal tigrawin, ma deg Temnaḍt taserdasant tis 5, ufan sakin hudden 1.237 n lminat mgal imdanen akked 3 lminat yetfeǧǧiǧen, i d-tesseddi teɣbalut-nni. Seg kfant tmezlin-nni, aɣrud amatu n lminat i ufan sakin hudden-tent s azemz n wass 31 ɣuct 2016, yessaweḍ ɣer 841.927 n lminat, 698.416 n lminat mgal imdanen, 137.859 n lminat mgal tigrawin akked 5.652 n lminat yettfeǧǧiǧen, i terna tenna-d teɣbalut-nni.

  
 Mohand Arkat, d amaru s tmaziɣt. D yiwen seg tigejda n yidles amaziɣ. S lferḥ d ameqqran i d aɣ-d-yerra ɣef yisastanen-nneɣ.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: deg tazwara anwa i d Mass Muḥend Arkat ? 

 Mohend Arkat : luleɣ ass n umenzu deg waggur n yennayer 1958, di taddart n Ikhelouiéne i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, di tmurt n Leqbayel. Lliɣ d aselmad n tutlayt n tmaziɣt, u d aselmad n tutlayt n tefransist deg uɣerbaz alemmas (C E M) Mohmmed Abboud n Ikhelouiéne. Uriɣ yakan deg waṭas n yiɣmisen, yecban, La Dépêche de Kabylie, Iẓuran, 20 Minutes n tmurt n Fransa…atg. D aneggal d amaru atrar s tmaziɣt, imi uriɣ yakan kraḍ n wungalen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, iɣef ara d-nawi awal deg tdiwennit-agi. Ma tezemreḍ ad aɣ-d-temmeslayeḍ ugar ɣef yiman-ik, ladɣa deg wunnar n tẓuri? Leqdic-iw deg umussu adelsan amaziɣ d ayen ẓran akk medden, aṭas n tiddukliwin tidelsanin ukkud qedceɣ. Gar-asent : Tala n Tussna n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu d tiddukla «Tiɣri n At Jennad …atg. Sazregeɣ-d daɣen aṭas n yidlisen ama s teqbaylit ama s tefransist.

  Imelmi tebdiḍ tira ? D acu i d-ak-yessawḍen i wakken ad terzuḍ ɣer tira n wungal ? 

 Bdiɣ tira n yidlisen deg useggas n 1998, asmi sεiɣ 40 n yiseggasen deg leεmer-iw, i d-suffɣeɣ adlis-iw amezwaru. Ussan-nni, lliɣ d aselmad deg uɣerbaz alemmas Mouhmmed Abboud. Xas akken tira ḥemmleɣ-tt asmi lliɣ d anelmad deg CEM.Ma d tamentilt i yi-ğğan ad awiɣ abrid n tira, seg wasmi lliɣ d aselmad i wallaɣ belli ahil n uɣerbaz azzayri d ilem, ur yeddi ara d wayen yeḥwağ ugrud. Inelmaden ur sawḍen ara s wahil-agi ad snernin tiktiwin d tmussniwin-nsen, am wakken qqaren: “Am win yettεawaden i yiɣsan asewwi”. Ulac amaynut deg-s, ladɣa win n tmaziɣt. Dɣa, xemmeɣ i wakken ad d-aruɣ ayen ara ten-iεiwnen, s-way-s ara d sfaydin meqqar.

  Ahat tirmit-ik deg uselmed n tmaziɣt, tεawen-ik aṭas deg tira s tmaziɣt, mmeslay-aɣ-d ɣef wanect-a ? 

 Asmi lliɣ d aselmad, ssarameɣ tamaziɣt ad tuɣal, ad tesεu amkan deg tudert-nneɣ n yal ass, ad tili d tutlayt ara yesseqdac umdan, i wakken ur tettɣimi ara d tuffirt. D tidet tirmit-iw deg uselmed n tmaziɣt, tεawen-iyi i wakken ad aruɣ ungalen yerna s tmaziɣt. Am wakken ttaruɣ akk s tutlayin-niḍen.

  Meslay-aɣ-d ɣef udlis amaziɣ ladɣa ungal, imi kečč s timad-ik d aneggal ? 

 La ttwaliɣ d akken adlis amaziɣ ladɣa ungal, d amaynut gar tewsatin-niḍen n yidlisen, xas akken llan wid iεetben aṭas, asmi tella tutlayt n tmaziɣt tettwanker. Gar wid yuran deg tallit-agi: Belaid Ait Ali, Boulifa, Mouloud Mammeri…atg. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ belli ungal amaziɣ, ur yewwiḍ ara ɣer umkan i d as-ilaqen.Adlis amaziɣ, ilaq ad yili am netta am yidlisen-nniḍen, imi tamaziɣt d tunsibt deg tmendawt.  Ihi ilaq adlis-ines ad yuɣal gar yifassen n ugdud akken ma yella, mačči ɣer yimaziɣen kan. 

  Imi kečč telliḍ yakan d aselmad n tmaziɣt, d acu i d tamuɣli-ik ɣef uselmed n tmaziɣt deg uɣerbaz ? 

 Aselmed n tmaziɣt i ilaqen ad yebdu seg timunent ar ass-a, maca ur yebdi ara almi d 1995. Acu kan agdud azzayeri yettεawan arraw-is i wakken ad yelmed tutlayin tibaraniyin: taglizit, tafransist, talmanit, taṭṭelyanin…atg. Maca ur d as-fkin ara afud i wakken ad yelmed tamaziɣt, i yellan d tutlayt n tyemmat. Ula deg uɣerbaz anida teḥwağ aseggem, ama d ayen yeεnan akud, imi drus maḍi 3 n tikkal i ddurt, ama deg wazal-is…atg. 

  D acu i d tamuɣli-ik ɣef tira s tmaziɣt s umata ? 

 S umata, tira s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, tella zik d targit d asirem, maca ass-a, tuɣal d tilawt, d tidet, u dayen i teḥwaj tmaziɣt aṭas ass-a. Di tԑecret-ayi taneggarut, la nettwali d akken aṭas ara d-yesuffɣen idlisen deg yal aḥric n tẓuri neɣ n yidles, d ayen yesseferaḥen aṭas. 

  Ma nuɣal-d ɣer tira-k, anwa adlis i swayes tettwasneḍ aṭas? 

 Adlis i swayes ttwassneɣ mliḥ, d win yuɣalen am nekwa-w, d ungal-nni n « Abrid n tala », iwumi i d-εawdeɣ asizreg-is ukuẓ n tikkal, xas akken ungalen-iw ttwassnen akk.

  Achal n yidlisen i d-tessufɣeḍ yakan ? S wacu n tutlayin i d-ffɣen ? 

 Seg 2009 ɣer ass-a, sazergeɣ-d 3 n wungalen s tutlayt n tamaziɣt, amenzu yella-d deg useggas n 2009, d win iwumi semmaɣ « Abrid n tala ». Ma d ungal wis sin, isem-is « Tameɣra di taddart », suffɣeɣ-t-id deg useggas n 2012. Ma d ungal-iw wis kraḍ (03) « Tiwizi » i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2015. Idlisen-agi i tlata deg-sen, ffɣen-d ɣer tezrigit “La pensée” 

  Acu n yisental iɣef tettaruḍ ungalen-ik?  

 Isental iɣef uriɣ ungalen-iw, wwiɣ-ten-id seg tmetti-nneɣ tamaziɣt (tajaddit, ansayen, idles amaziɣ…), di tira-w, cuddeɣ-d aṭas n yisental yecban : timetti-nneɣ taqbaylit, tamurt-nneɣ, tayri, tagmat, leεwayed-nneɣ, tiwizi, tudert n uqbayli …atg . 

  Amek i yezmer wungal ad iεiwen tutlayt ? 

 Imi ungal yettili-d deg-s uḥraz n tutlayt, daɣen d win i d-yessebganen amek yettidir ugdud-nni, i yesseqdacen tutlayt-nni. Yak s ttawil n yidlisen ladɣa ungalen, i nessaweḍ ad nissin amek ttilin igduden deg tudert-nsen n yal ass, mebla ma nerza ɣer tmurt-nsen. S wungal ad d-tḥelliḍ amkan-ik, wa ad tefkeḍ tagnit i wiyaḍ akken ad ak-issinen yigduden-nniḍen

  Amek i ilaq ad yili umaru neɣ umsekar deg tmetti ? 

 Amaru di tmurt-nneɣ, ar ass-a mazal ur yewwiḍ ara ad yili akken yebɣa, maca ixxddem kan akken yufa. Ilaq ad yili d win yettεawanen timetti, i wakken ad tṣggem iman-is. Imyura, d lemri n tmetti-nsen, d inigan ɣef tallit-nsen, d nutni i d uktuyen n ugdud-nsen. Ilaq ad as-d-llin iẓri, ad as-id-kemzen anida bɣna, ad as-d-mmlen abrid usrid. D acu n yisenfaren i tessewjadeḍ sya ɣer sdat?

 Isenfaren mačči d yiwen mačči sin, imi azal n 15 n yidlisen i yewjden i wakken ad d-ffɣen. Imi nekk aql-iyi ɣef uqerruy n tezrigt “La pensée”, dɣa ttezwiriɣ deg wayla n medden, ttağğeɣ axeddim-iw d aneggaru. Sya ɣer tazwara n useggas n 2017, ad d-suffɣeɣ ungal-iw wis ukuẓ, ara yilin d tajmilt i tmeṭṭut. 

  Awal-ik n taggara… 

 Nessaram d akken leεtab ad yeffeɣ n tmaziɣt ɣer tafat, tanemmirt-ik a Mass Ʃedwan imi tgiḍ azal i nekk d leqdic-iw adelsan, tanemmirt s tussda i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen (La Dépêche), imi i yi-yiga amkan deg isebtar-is. Slam-iw ɣef wid i yi-ḥemmlen d imeɣriyen-inu di yal amkan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t : Adaoun Abdelghani 

 
  
 Tiddukkla n yimawlan n yinelmaden n tesnawit tamaynut n 1000 n yimukan ibidagujiyeni i d-yezgan deg ladayra Beni Douala, gren tiɣri i unemhal n Usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu ideg i d-tsebgen asḥissef ɣef yir liḥala n tesnawit-agi, segmi telli tiwwura-s. Ssuturen yiεeggalen n tiddukkla-agi deg tuttra-a i gan i unemhal n Usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tifrat n waṭas n wuguren d lexṣaṣat i yellan deg tesnawit tajdiḍt, imi tenṭer mačči d izli. Gar wayen ssuturen ad d-nebder: aɣerbaz-a, ur yesεi ara anemhal, imi yal aseggas ad d-awin yiwen, xemsnin-agi ɣer deffir, 5 n yinemhalen i iεeddan deg-s. Tin ɣur-s, lexṣaṣ n yiεessasen d imallalen n usegmi, d udemmas akked umaẓlay amatu. Yell ula d lexṣaṣ n yiεessasen ama d wid n yiḍ ama d wid n uzal, yerna ur xeddmen ara axeddim-nsen akken ilaq lḥal. ‘’Mebla ma ttuɣ lexṣaṣ n yidlisen deg temkerḍit-is, ula d ugur n waman yerna-d dḥis-is ladɣa deg unebdu. Aɣbel n yixxamen yettwaxdamen i yiselmaden d inedbalen-nniḍen ibeεden, ulamma kfan s lxedma maca mazal ur ten-friqen ara, dima zgan ur d-ttawḍen ara deg lwaqt ɣer tesnawit’’, i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen seg yiɛeggalen n Tiddukkla. Xas akken tesεa annar n wurrar maca deg yisem kan, imi amḍiq-nni n ungaz imeqqren mazal ur yettwaxdam ara. Am wakken daɣen i ṭṭalaben deg tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i wakken ad d-aznen anemhal unṣib i iwulmen i tesnawit-agi, yerna ad yexdem lxedma-s akken ilaq lḥal, yerna d win ara idumen. Yenna-aɣ-d uselway n Tiddukkla-agi Mass Saket Meziane: “Tasnawit-agi-nneɣ n Yicerdiwen, tettidir aṭas n wuguren seg wasmi telli tiwwura-s deg waṭas n yiḥricen, d wigi i d-nebder yakkan. Ula d iselmaden ur ṣawḍen ara izen-nsen akken ilaq i yinelmaden, d ayen i d aɣ-d-nan warraw-nneɣ s timad-nsen. Nekkni si tama-nneɣ nger tiɣri i wid teεna temsalt gar-asen: anemhal n Usegmi n Tizi Uzzu, taneɣlaft n usegmi aɣelnaw, lwali n Tizi Uzzu, aɣella n ladayra n Beni Douala d uselway n tɣiwant-agi n Beni Douala. Acu kan am win iceṭṭḥen i uderɣal neɣ am win yettmeslayen akked uεezzug”.

 Tikwal anda akken i yebda wawal, i-ifukk wawal, acku lehdu timsusen. Tuɣalen d war anamek. Akka dɣa d kra ur nettseḍḥi yebɣan ad rran tamettant n Mass Hocine Ait Ahmed d-adasil i dɣel-nsen. Uma sriɣ i lehdur-nsen, uma sriɣ i tilin-nsen, imi yif-iten fiḥel. D wa – d amazan amezwaru n Mass Hocine Ait Ahmed i wid yettesmaden tiremt zdat nnɛi ! Tikwal anda akken i-ifukk wawal, id ibeddu wawal, imi tasusmi tesseɣleb lmenṭaq ɣer wid yettmeyizen. Asfuǧǧeɣ wergîn yebna tisadarin n ṣṣwab, aceqlal n wewtul werǧin yeserwel izem bu tissas. Ɣef aya wid yesnen azal n teqbaylit , ssnan amek i t-tteddu teqbaylit: s sser d lmeɛna d war lehmeq. Ferhat Mhenni yella seg wid yettqadaren taqbaylit, werǧin icmet-itt neɣ irekked-itt.  At Ahmed walan, ẓran fehmen anzi id yeqqaren: imawlan ṣṣebṛen imeɛaẓen kefren. Tamurt n Leqbayel twala , teẓra anwi i-yettcuddun imraren n lkerrh gar tarwa-s, d anwi id yesfillitrn i tagmat akked tadukli.Ɣef aya tenna uma sriɣ deg useweɣwaɣ n yir tagarfa, uma sriɣ i yiḥizi ur negzi timsal. D wagi i d-amazan wis tlata n Mass Hocine Ait Ahmed : ala win wezzilen i-iteddun ɣef tifednin wamma win ɣezzifen ur terri tmara.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Armi yewweḍ ɣer teqcict-nni i as-yennan: Ad ak-aγe&amp;gamma,; yuγ-itt. Inna yas: ”Nekkini, tura, aql-i uγeγ-kem, maca ad kem-awiγ ɣer tmurt iw”. Tekker-d teqcict-nni, tenna-as :”Ihi! Imi ad nṛuḥ ɣer tmurt-ik, aqcic-nni ara d-neǧǧ nekk yid-k anida ara yeγli ? Yak, γileγ aa yi-taγeḍ, ad neqim da. Ass-nni ma ara yernu γer-neγ uqcic, ad d-yeγli seg ṭṭaq-a”. Inna-as netta: ”Iyya ad nṛuḥ ɣer tmurt iw. Ar asmi ad d-ilal γur-neγ uqcic, ad d-nas γer da; imir-nni ad d-yeγli seg ṭṭaq-a”. Tenna-as: ”Yuqem”. Iwwi-tt, yuγal ɣer tmurt is. Armi yewweḍ ɣer taddart-nni iwumi iga tafat i tmesgida, feṛḥen yis-s medden-nni. Nnan as: “Qim ad tzeḍγeḍ da akk yid-neγ”. Inna-asen netta: ”Ad awen-ibarek Ṛebbi. Nekk ad ṛuḥeγ ɣer yimawlan-iw. Ahat ad ilin ttrun fell-i”. Nnan-as: “Ṛuḥ”. Iṛuḥ. Armi yewweḍ s axxam-is, yufa baba-s ittnadi deg ugudu; yemma-s tettnadi fell-as deg selsa; ultma-s tettnadi fell-as deg tefliwin uγerbal. Deg mi i t-id-ẓran yewweḍ-d, twala-t yemma-s ilsa tiγawsiwin-ines. Tenna-as i urgaz-is akk d yelli-s: “Yak, nniγ-awen deg selsa i yella, kunwi tettnadim deg yimeḍqan-nniḍen! A-t-an akka ilsa tiγawsiwin. Mer da ur d-isban ara iman-is, lliγ ad t-afeγ ass-a deg yiselsa-ihin-ines, acku qqimen ala wid-ak ihin i illan γur-s, urɛad ur ten-nudaγ ara. Lliγ ass-a ad ten-nadiγ”. Inna-asen uqcic nni: “A ziγ akka teqqimem kan d ibuhalen ? Tenna-as yemma-s : ”Amek, a mmi? Aṭas aya tura nekni nettnadi fell-ak armi d-ass-a i akunufa” ! Inna-as mmi-s:” Lliγ deg selsa-inu iṭṭseγ”. Qimen armi zrin kra n wussan, terfed teqcict-nni i d-yewwi s tadist. Armi d-ass i d-turew, teǧǧa-d aqcic. Tenna-as i urgaz is: “Ay argaz, iyya-d a nṛuḥ s axxam-nneγ i wakken ad d-yeγli uqcic-nneγ seg ṭṭaq-nni n uxxam nneγ”. Inna-as netta: ”Yuqem. Maca ad neqim kra n wussan ar d imγuṛ kra uqcic-a; imir-nni ad nṛuḥ”. Tenna-as: ”Yuqem.” Qimen. Yal ass teqqaṛ as: “Iyya-d ad nṛuḥ ” Netta iqqaṛ-as: “ Ar azekka.” Azekka-nni, ad as-tini: “Iyya-d ad nṛuḥ” Netta yini-as: “Ar azekka, diγen ‘’. Netta iγil ad taγ awal-is, ur tneqq ara aqcic-nni. Armi d yiwen wass, netta irzef. Nettat tewwi-d aqcic γef yiγil-is, teffeγ-d ɣer ufrag. Taf yiwen lbir γur-s ṭṭaq am winna n uxxam-nsen. Tenna deg ul-is: “Yak iɛdel am ṭṭaq a am winna n uxxam-nneγ. Tura ad t-sseγliγ seg ṭṭaq-a“. Teṭṭef aqcic-nni-ines, tḍeggeṛ-it seg ṭṭaq-nni. Iγli ɣer lbir, immut. Armi dtameddit, yusa-d urgaz-is. Inna-as : Anda yella mmi-m ? Tenna yas: “Ihi, iγli seg ṭṭaq”. Inna-as: Anwa ṭṭaq deg iγli? Tṛuḥ yid-s, tessaweḍ-it ɣer lbir-nni seg tḍeggeṛ mmi-s, tenna-as: “Nekkini ffγeγ-d ɣer da, ufiγ-d ṭṭaq-a, nniγ: Iyya! Iɛdel yak am ṭṭaq-a, am winna n uxxam-nneγ . –Briγ-as sya”. Inna-as netta: “Ihi ansi iγli uqcic-a, ad tḍefṛeḍ ula d kemm.” Iṭṭf-itt, iḍeqqṛ-itt ula d nettat diγen. Teγli ɣer lbir, temmut. Iqim netta. Izweǧ diγen. Yuγ tameṭṭut-nniḍen maca ur telli d-tabuhalt, dtuḥdiqt am netta.

 Tazrigt tis snat n temliliyin n umezgun n useggas-a 2015, id-hegga tiddukla tadelsant Tiεwinin n Wizgan di tγiwant n Wizgan γef dema n wuggur n remḍan d tin yebdan tamedit n wass n 25 yunyu 2015 s wudem unṣib u d leqdic ara-yeddun γef teγzi n 10 wussan almi d 03 yulyu id-iteddun, s yiwen n wahil d amesbaγur anda i llant 12 n trebuεa meqren n umezgun n 04 lwilayat yemgaraden am Tizi-Wezzu, Tubiret, Bgayer d Wahran. Gar trebuεa-agi nezmer ad-nebder Tigejdit n Mεetqa s usentel Tagujilt ur neggujel d Imaḥbas, ifeḥcac n Ğerğer s usentel Mesmar Ğeḥḥa, macahu (Ifarḥunen) s usentel Yenna-yi Jeddi, asarhu n At-Yeğğar s usentel Xddem tafeḍ, Imγan n Uzeffun s usentel Amur-ik d ayen id-yemger ufus-ik, igersafen s usentel Ccix Laḥlu, Igawawen n At-Yiraten. D tirebuεa n umezgun n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu. <p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Mbaɛd takerḍit i d-ilulen di taddart n At Wizgan deg unebdu-agi, tikkelt-a d nnuba ad d-tlal temkerḍit tis snat di tɣiwant n Friḥa. Asenfar-a, iheggat-id yiwen n Ugraw n yilmezyen ɣef uqerru-nsen Belharet Amine akked Cherou Messipssa, anda i mmsefhamen akken ad d-xelqen yiwet n temkerḍit di tɣiwant-nsen anda yezmer uɣerman, ad d-yawi adlis, meɛna ilaq ad yessers wayeḍ deg umkan n yinna i d-yewwi. Akka, ad yili umbeddel gar yimeɣriyen. Ilmeẓyen-a, xedmen-d tiɣri deg uɣarab-nsen di Facebbok akken ad ten-ɛiwnen i wakken asenfar-agi, ad yimɣur, ad d yuɣal s lfayda i yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant. Asenfar-a n temkarḍit d wid i t-yecban, suzuren tiktiwin ibennun agdud, d wid yessufuɣen ṭṭlam n war tamussni seg wallaɣ , imi agrud yeqqaren ass-a d win yettḥezziben i uzekka. Mi i d-nesteqsa wid i d-yesslalen tikti-a nnan-d : “Nukni d ilmeẓyen, nebɣa ad nawi ayen yelhan i tɣiwant-nneɣ ladɣa i tsuta i d-yettenkaren imi d nutni i d azekka n tmurt “

   S.Yamani 

  
 Aneɣlaf amenzu Abdelmalek Sellal iwekked-d ass n lexmis deg Tɣerdayt d akken awanak (ddula) iɛewwel akken ad yedden iḥezziben iwatan akken ad ifak akk leṣnaf n tekriḍt deg temnaḍt-a yerna ad d-yerr lɛafya d talwit deg-s.

 Mass Sellal yenna-d aya deg yiwen n umyager ay iga d yimaslaḍen n tmetti taɣarimt, udmawen yettwassnen d yimasnagen (lɛuqqal) n twilayt n Tɣerdayt, yerna iɛawed iwekked-d d akken ad yesseḥbiber ɣef ussefɛel n yiḥezziben ay yeddem uselway n tegduda, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, i lmend n yiriri n tɣellist (laman), talwit d umtawa anmetti deg temnaḍt n Tɣerdayt ay yellan, zik, d «amedya n umtawa anmetti ayyes tella tettzuxxu Lezzayer». Aneɣlaf amenzu yesmekti-d, s tewzel, iḥezziben ay yeddem uselway n tegduda, yerna yenna-d d akken amenzaḍ n temnaḍt taserdasit tis 4 yettwakellef akken «ad yeḍfer lecɣal n yimeẓla (ssrabes) n tɣellist d yiduba idiganen akken ad d-rren lɛafya yerna ad ḥerzen taɣellist n yimdanen d wayla-nsen deg wakk timnaḍin n twilayt n Tɣerdayt». Mass Sellal iger-d tiɣri i wakk timetti taɣarimt, amussu n tiddukliwin d yilemẓiyen akken ad sdukklen iɣallen-nsen akken «ad reglen abrid i wid ay yebɣan ad swaɣen Tadukli Taɣelnawt».

 «Lezzayer d yiwet yerna teddukkel, ur tbeḍḍu», ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Uneɣlaf amenzu ay d-yernan d akken talast-a ur yessefk ad tt-iɛeddi yiwen yerna aɣref adzayri yeẓra azal ay ixelleṣ akken ad yeslelli tamurt-nnes seg ussehres yerna ad yeḥrez tadukli n wakal-nnes. Amenzaḍ n temnaḍt taserdasit tis 4 ttunefkent-as akk tzemmar, s uqader n leqwanin n tegduda, akken ad d-yerr lɛafya. Dɣa tettwagdel tuffɣa deg yiḍ, yerna ttwagedlen tmesbaniyin d yimsegrawen, ɣef wakken ay d-yesmekti. Aneɣlaf amenzu iger-d tiɣri i wakk iḥricen n tmetti deg twilayt n Tɣerdayt akken ad mɛawanen i uḥraz n lɛafya d tuqqla n talwit d lehna ɣer temnaḍt-a. «Nekkni akk d Idzayriyen, yessefk ad nedder lwaḥid deg umsefham yerna ad nesseḥbiber ɣef tegmat d umqader», ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked. Aneɣlaf amenzu ddan yid-s, deg terzi-a, uneɣlaf n teɣdemt, amenzaḍ n temsetla taɣelnawt d umenzaḍ n temnaḍt taserdasit tis 4, yerna yenna-d, deg terzi-a d akken «awanak ad yessefɛel lewṣayat n uselway n tegduda s tidet yerna s lewɛaṛa akken ad ifak urkaḍ n lqanun deg wakk timnaḍin n twilayt n Tɣerdayt, ladɣa atɛeddi ɣef tɣellist n yimdanen d wayla».

 Mass Sellal iɛawed iwekked-d d akken dduṛ n unabaḍ netta d aḍman d usseḥbiber ɣef urkad n tmurt d tneflit tadamsant deg temnaḍin yemgerraden n tmurt, am wakken ay d-iger tiɣri i yimezdaɣen n Tɣerdayt akken ad ḍefren abrid n tesnagt d umsefham akken ad frun taluft-a. Uqbel aya, aneɣlaf amenzu yesselwi, mi yuweḍ ɣer Tɣerdayt, ɣer yidis n yiduba ay terza temsalt, yiwet n temlilit n uqeyyem n tegnit n tɣellist deg twilayt s uḥdaṛ n yiɣef n temnaḍt taserdasit tis 4. Tirzi n uneɣlaf amenzu, Abdelmalek Sellal, ɣef Tɣerdayt, tella-d deg ukatar n ussefɛel n yiɣtasen ay yeddem ass n laṛebɛa uselway n tegduda, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, mi iga timlilit tuɛjilt ɣef tegnit deg tella Tɣerdayt, d timlilit deg iɣef n tmurt iweṣṣa aneɣlaf amenzu «ad yesseḥbiber, ɣef yidis n uneɣlaf n teɣdemt, akken ccṛeɛ ad d-yelhu s tidet yerna s lewɛaṛa d wakk irkaḍen n lqanun deg wakk timnaḍin n twilayt n Tɣerdayt, ladɣa deg wayen yerzan atɛeddi ɣef tɣellist n yimdanen d wayla». Mass Sellal yuwey yid-s yiwet n tmagla deg yella uneɣlaf n teɣdemt, Tayeb Louh, d ujiniṛal n tfekka n yigen, amenzaḍ n temsetla taɣelnawt, Ahmed Boustila. I usmekti, aneɣlaf n tɣawsiwin n daxel d tmezdayin tidiganin, Nourredine Bedoui, yerza yagi ass n laṛebɛa ɣef Tɣerdayt ɣer yidis n unemhal amatu n tɣellist taɣelnawt, ajiniṛal-amajuṛ Abdelghani Hamel, d yiɣef n yiɣallen n temsetla taɣelnawt, ajiniṛal Bouba Mena.

<p style="text-align: right;"> NLS(APS) 

  
 Takebbanit n Algérie Télécom tessaweḍ deg wussan-a yezrin ad d-teldi yiwen n umraḥ wessiɛen n Internet deg taddart n Uzaknun i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Leɛǧiba. Asenfar-a yetturajun acḥal d aseggas yefka tagnit i yimezdaɣ n taddart-a iwakken ad ffɣen seg tillas i yesberbren fell-asen deg uḥric-a n taywalt. Akken kan yendeh yisalli n beddu n usexdem n ttawilat-a, d amḥizwar ɣer tɣiwant n Yimceddalen iwakken ad d-aɣen yimdanen ttawilat iwulmen yecban “les modems”, iwakken ad kecùmen s wudem unṣib deg uzeṭṭa-a atrar. Iwulem ad d-nebder dakken lemwaǧi-a mačči d tid iḥuzan kan taddart-a n Uzaknun, meɛna jbant mebɛid iwakken ad sfaydin ula d wiyaḍ s ttawilat. Ɣef leḥsab n wayen i nesla, takebbanit-a n Algérie Télécom d tin yenwan ad tessiweḍ l’Internet ɣer waṭas n tamiwin n twilayt n Tubiret, akka tura mazal-as ad tessuddu ayen akka I tettheggi ama di Beclul neɣ anda nniḍen. Ad d-nesmekti dakken asenfar yettwaxedmen beddemma deg taddart n La Crête-Rouge s ttawil n “la fibre optique” yebda ixeddem, d acu kan yetturaju ad yennerni iwakken ad yaweḍ ɣer yixxamen n taddart-a imerra.<span> </span> <span> </span> 

  Smail Merzouk
