 Tasebḥit n wass n 25-07-2017, banen-d igemmaḍ n ukayad n BAC i ttrajun inelmaden acḥal-aya mbaɛd ayen akk yeḍran i ukayad-agi aseggas-a. Wwḍen yigemmaḍ ɣer 56.07 % n wid i t-id-yewwin deg Lezzayer merra . Yennerna ugemmuḍ-a ɣef win n yilindi imi aseggas yezrin llan 49.79%. Ma yella seg tama n lwilayat i d-yufraren deg tqacuct, ad naf, am yal tikkelt, tamdint n Tizi Uzzu s 71.82 %, syin ad d-as Bgayet deg umḍiq wis sin. Amḍiq wis 3, iṣuḥ-d tamdint n Adrar. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer ugemmuḍ amezwaru di tmurt n Lezzayer, tewwi-t-id yiwet n tnelmadt di tɣiwant n Tamalus di lwilaya n Skikda. si tama-nniḍen, tasnawit n Said Diouani di tɣiwant n Makuda, tḥella-d amḍiq amezwaru di lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu syin d tasnawit n Ath Zmenzer , ma yella d umḍiq wis kraḍ, tewwi-t tesnawit Ladlani Amar n Maɛetqa.

   S. Yamani 

  
 Di teswiɛt anda timura-nniḍen ttnadint amek ara d-afen-t tifrat i wejmaɛ, akken iwata, n wafrasen d wamek ara d-sfaydin seg-sen, nekni imḍebren-nneɣ teɛna temsalt gumman ad wten azrem s aqerruy. Ugur-agi yefkan taxessart i tezmart n wemdan lak d ugama yečan, yuɣ lhal, tiyita. Zyada ɣef wedrim,  ttawilat yemxallefen, imdanen ilemden ayen yeɛnan aḥrich-agi n tezdeg d twennaṭ ur keffun ara anadi akken ad rren tilas i yḍumman. Nekni d tinna ma ɛeddan ma cqan-k, ma qeḍɛen-k-id anef-asen. Ma ur d- ɛeddan ara wid ara ijemɛen ddurt-agi afrasen, ulac n weɣbel, llan wussan-nniḍen, ledwaṛ -nniḍen, aguren,…Deg iberdan, deg iɣerbazen, tiseddawiyin, isensuyen, sbitarat, afrasen čan dunnit, ayen d-ijebden iɣerdayen, iqjan d yemcac yettafen tiram-nsen deg taricin n iḍumman. Ugur-agi mači n wass-a, tifrat-is ur d-ettili ara azekka. Tawacult n tɣamsa tegga deg uɣbel-agi d asentel-is n yal-as, maca hder neɣ qim acemma ur ibeddel. Ugur ur yezgil tama, zzik d imdanen n temdint kan i yettcetkayen s telxex iɛeddan tilas. Tineggura-agi ula d tuddar yewweḍ iten-t-id wayla-nsen-t. Icekkaren n iḍumman zgan setfen tama n yexxamen. Deg yiḍ, ttzurun-ten-id iqjan d yemcac d yettnadin deg-sen tasagert n lmakla uɣur snagaren. Tiregwa, iɣezran d yissafen atnad deg yir liḥala. Iberdan ur ten-ezgil tyita. Di lawan anda timura-nniḍen ttnadin-t amek ara d-sfaydin-t deg iḍumman d wamek ara ǧen tawennaṭ d tazedgan-t, nekni imḍebren-nneɣ teɛna temsalt yeffeɣ -iten weɣbel. Am wass-a am uzekka. Snen kan ad gerzn lihala mi ara d-rzun imḍebren ɛlayen. Imir yettfaɣ-iten laɛqel akken ad cebhen taswaɛt. Ttawilat ak yellan ad ttwasxedmen akken ad fken udem igerzn i ynebgi ara d-yasen. Amer xedmen akka mkul ass!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Fatiha.K 

  
 N’wala aṭaṣ n t’ḥuna n-uraɣ (Bijouteries) yeldin iseggasen-agi ineggura deg temdint n Aqbu, i d-yezgan s kra n 60 ikilumiṭren ɣef Bgayet. As t-ini-ḍ d ttawla n-uraɣ yewwin medden! Ayagi yebɣa ad yini belli uraɣ yesɛa azal muqren deg lkumirṣ. Maca, taggara-agi, ssuma-s terna s waṭaṣ deg umaḍal. Ayagi yewwi-d laɣla-ines deg t’murt nneɣ. Akka tura, uraɣ yettnuzu gar 4600 ɣer 4800 idinaren i yiwen ugram. Azal-is yerna aṭaṣ, ɣef ayagi ur nettwali ara aṭaṣ n t’lawin, yagi, ɣer daxel n t’ḥuna-agi. Laɣla n-uraɣ yewwi-d yides taɣawsa nniḍen. Akka ihi, lfeṭṭa « t-negzed » akken att-awi amakan-is is-iruḥen acḥal aya. Tiḥuna n-uraɣ uɣalen-t znuzun-t lfeṭṭa s waṭaṣ, alarmi yuɣal uraɣ am akken ur « yeswi » ara ! Deg « les vitrines » n t’ḥuna-agi lfeṭṭa texdem axeṣṣar. Tewwi aḥric amuqran, yerna ttaɣen-tt medden, yagi tilawin, acku terxeṣ ɣef uraɣ. At Yanni iɛedda sya! Akka, ih lfeṭṭa n’At Yanni texdem laɛǧeb deg temdint n Aqbu, imi tuɣal d « la mode » gar tlawin d ttilmeẓyin, yufan d-akken d-abrid n t’naṣlit, acku lfeṭṭa n’At Yanni tettwassen s wazal-is muqren. Aṭaṣ n yikumirṣiyen n-uraɣ id yewwin lfeṭṭa n’At Yanni akken attezenzen deg tama-agi n Aqbu. Deg « les γitrines » n wala aṭaṣ n lǧuhar yettuxedmen s lfeṭṭa. Am imeqyasen, tizrarin, timengucin, tixutam,…cebhen dayen kan, imi reqmen. Ṛennun-d lecbaḥa i t’lawin iten-yettlusun. Ngar tamawt ɣef ṣṣenɛa-gi n lfeṭṭa, nufa belli am akken tuɣal-ed s tezmart iǧahden taggara-agi. Ɣas akken truḥ attenger iseggasen yezrin, lxedma n lfeṭṭa tuɣal-ed tewwi-d yides idles-is anaṣli. Lḥirfa-agi n lfeṭṭa tesɛa leqrun d leqrun deg lɛamer-is. Udem-is d yiwen kan: Ur nettaf ara deg maḍal lḥirfa itt-icuban acku areqem-ines (les motifs décoratifs) n t’murt n leqbayel kan! D-acu kan, llan-t kra n twaculin deg tama n’At Ɛebbas mazal-iten-t xedmen-t lfeṭṭa, d-acu drus-it. Am t’wacult n’At Ṭaleb deg taddart n’Ayt Dassen i d-yezgan deg t’ɣiwant n Bujlil, anda mazal xedmen cwiṭ n lfeṭṭa.                            

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Ah, ctaqaɣ ad « glilezeɣ » ɣef ugertil, ad ḥulfeɣ i lḥelfa nni taqurant, « atteskikeḍ » azagur ! Ddin uqabac, iḍelli yella, ass-a ulac-it, neɣ iruḥ yengar. Agertil amaɛzuz zik ulac axxam neɣ tawacult ur t nesɛi ara. Ass-a ma t’kecmeḍ ɣer yixxamen ur tettafeḍ ara, acku ur yettnuzu ara. Cfiɣ-d kan as mi meẓẓi-y-eɣ, nella nesɛa agertil, anda glalezeɣ, qqimeɣ, kesleɣ, ẓleɣ, urareɣ,…Ass-agi d-aktayen (souvenirs) kan i yeqqimen ! Azeṭṭa n yigertyal yeǧhed dayen kan deg yizri iqarben (alarmi deg iseggasen n 1980) uqbel ad « yenger » uxeddim-ines, acku widak lakked d ttidak it ixedmen muten, wwin yid-sen lḥirfa-agi. D-agerruǧ ger igerruǧen i ruḥen deg t’murt n leqbayel. Ladɣa taleɣt, neɣ aẓeṭṭa n tzerbiyin lakked iḥembelen…Ɣas akka an « neqqim » kan ɣef ugertil imi d wagi i d nebder. Agertil-agi ẓẓaḍen-t s yileẓwiyen n lḥelfa. D ttusna ay at laɛraḍ. Imdanen it yeẓẓaḍen zik nni ḥesbiten d-imusnawen, neɣ d-iselmaden n lḥirfa-agi. Ɣas akken ur ɣrin ara deg yiɣarbazen, sɛan tussna syes i qublen lḥif, yerna ɛacen s lḥirfat is-en-d ǧǧan leǧdud nsen. Tama n’At Ɛebbas, i d-yezgan deg unẓul n t’wilayt n Bgayet, tettwassen s-uẓeṭṭa n-igertyal. Yagi tuddar n: Tigrin, Ḥamda d At Wihdan i d-yezgan deg t’ɣiwant n Buǧlil. Lḥirfa n-ugertil deg tuddar-agi mucaɛ-it aṭaṣ, yerna ttwassen-en-t deg yal tama. Ayen yesneflin lexdma-agi, d lḥelfa yeṭṭuqten s uaṭaṣ deg tama-agi n’At Ɛebbas. Medden zik nni ḥemlen igertyal, ttɣimin neɣ gganen fellas-en. Ɣas akken qquren cwiṭ, maca lhan. Am ddaɛwessu, lḥirfa-agi truḥ d yimawlan-is, ur « tturiten » ara imeẓyanen. D ttagi i ttawaɣit yeḍran deg t’murt nneɣ. Ass-a, tuddar-agi d-abeḥri kan i yettṣuḍun deg zuqaq nsen-t. Kulec yuɣal d-aktayen (souvenirs) t’mektayen-ten-id yimɣaren. D-acu kan, tella yiwet n t’ɣawsa is ɛejlen « nger » n lḥirfa n-ugertil: Agertil n Plastik. As mi i d-t-yennulfa wagi, medden uɣalen ttaɣen-t-id acku yerxes. Deg tama-agi n’At Ɛebbas, ẓẓaḍen zik tiɣurasin n t’zizwa s lḥelfa. Tiɣurasin-agi sɛan-t tafekka iwumi n ssawal s tfransit « forme cylindrique ». Cebḥen-t dayen kan. Nufa deg taddart n Tigrin kra n tiɣurasin tiqburin yettufeṣlen s lḥelfa. Surfet-aɣ kan: D-ayen ur ttamen-en-t ara wallen; cebḥen-t dayen kan…Ah a lqum amcum s-anda i t tteddu-ḍ…?<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Taẓrigt tis snat n usmel n tdukkliwin n Ayt Smaɛel i d-yeḍran ussan n sem 28 ed sed 29 deg ɣuct, d tin i nezmer ad d-nini tewwi-d akk ayen ttraǧun deg-s, ama d imsuddsen-is, at umussu adelsan, neɣ d takemmict n yimezdaɣ i iḍefren ahil. Imi segmi ttwasnubegten yinebgawen ass amenzu mettwal 14sr n tmeddit bdant ttbinent-d ssmamat timezwura n wazal n usihar-a. Dɣa syin akkin, yal yiwen yeḍfer abrid n tzeqqa n yilemẓiyen ideg ara ḥeḍren i talilt n uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Txerraḍt (Xerraṭa) akken ad d-tɛeyyen s taldayt send awal unsib n uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel mass Ɛebdun Nasir, lwaḥi ed kra n wawalen nniḍen n yinebgawen. Azal n sin n yisragen (sswayaɛ) aredqal, tebda tezrart n yisaragen-iskasiyen, mi yeɛfes ɣef usayes mass Metref El Ḥasen, i yellan d asemtar n urebbi (conseiller pédagogique) n yilemẓiyen, akken ad d-yawi yiwen n usarag ɣef «umussu asdukklan i uqeddic n tneflit tadigant». D timrac ɣer sdat yelfa-d wakud n usarag «tigawt tadigant akked, daɣen i yilemẓiwen», i d-iga umeɣnas ed uselway n Tdukkla Itri Adelsan n Uqbu mass Mulud Salḥi. Seld (mbeɛd) aḥric-a amenzu n yisaragen iɣef i d-yella ddeqs n uskasi, tella-d tegnit n usteɛfu i tfekka ed wallaɣ send ad yettwasemmed wahil n wass s yiwen n wurar adelsan i d-tga tegrawt n yilemẓiwen i d-yusan seg Leqser. Mi tessulles dayen, yettwasemmed uzekka-tuyen wahil tanezzayt s usarag wis kraḍ s uzwel n «d acu d aḥezzeb i wanwa aṭṭan n tgeẓẓal?», i d-yesken uduktur Anes Fateḥ, d amsujji n tgeẓẓal (Néphrologue) deg txerraḍt. Deffir usarag-a tella-d dindin tigawt n ugmar n yidammen i d-heggan s umɛiwen EPH ed EPSP n Txerraḍt. Syinna rǧan yimeḥḍar almi i d-tewweḍ tmeddit, lawan ideg bdan yiḥuna (ateliers) n usileɣ. Dɣa, d mass Fersawi Ɛebdelwahab i d-igan amezwaru-nni umu yefka azwel «ilemẓiyen ed temḥaddit taɣermant». Ad d-nesmekti belli netta d aselway n Ugraw Tigawt Ilemẓiyen. Aḥanu wis sin d mass Sadeq n Ayt Urbaɛ (Rebbaɛi) i t-id-yewwin, netta i yellan d anmazul (adjoint) n uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel. Yewwi-d Sadeq ɣef «umḍiq n tẓuri ed yidles deg tmetti tamsedrart». Ɣer taggara, d aselway n Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad, mass Fares Bakkuc, i d-yewwi asentel ɣef «tetiknikin n uselḥu n tdukkliwin ed yisenfaren idelsanen». Yuɣ lḥal, am deg yisaragen, gren-d iman-nsen wid yettferriǧen s kra n tuttriwin neɣ n tektiwin. Mi yewweḍ akken wakud n tmeddit deg 17sr30, teqleɛ tegnit n waddal mi d-sneɛten yilemẓiyen n terbaɛt tanaddalt tabujadt n Ayt Smaɛel kra seg win mu qqaren Simo Hapkido. Syin ɣur-s, yeḥḍer uzayez i temlilit n ddabex yettferfiren sɣur yinaddalen n terbaɛt tanaddalt tabujadt Itri. Rnu kra akken, d tarkeft Tadukkli n Ayt Ɛisa n Uweqqas i d-yewwin yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun i yehwan i kra n yimferrǧen. 

 Mi d-tettqarab dɣa temdelt n usmel-a i iɛeddan akken ilaq, tella-d s tegnit n ucmummeḥ sɣur terbaɛt n yimseḍsayen Lewhama deg teɣzi n ddeqs n wakud. Ilaq ad d-nesmekti daɣen belli llant-d kraḍ n temzikknin deg teɣzi n sin n wussan n usmel: timzikkent ɣef usegmi awennaḍan ed unegmu idumen n mass Xaled Fuḍil, i yellan d ajenyur deg tnezduɣt ed wayen yerzan tamdint.. Timzikkent n wallalen n tensafart sɣur tdukkla «Tiɣri» n Ayt Smaɛel. Akked temzikkent tadelsant sɣur Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Yella-d leqdic n wass-nni amezwaru 19 maggu 2017, deg uxxam n Yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu.

 Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, d Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεmmer n temdint-agi d Umaruz-is n Azazga, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, Tazeqqa n ssinima n Tizi Uzzu, s tallelt n waṭas n yimεiwnen yecban: Aɣerbaz amniḍan n tẓurin iffazen n Azazga, Tasqamut n leqdicat idelsan d wid n tẓuri, Asalay amniḍan n umeɣras, Tazeqqa n ssinima…atg, Suddsen-d ass-nni n sem d sed 19 d 20 deg maggu 2017, kra n leqdicat idelsanen swayes i d-smektan ass aɣelnaw n unelmad, tikkelt-agi, gan-tt d tajmilt i Mass Metiche Moh n Djerder akked Lhadj Ali Boulou. Yella-d leqdic n wass-nni amezwaru 19 maggu 2017, deg uxxam n Yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Yebda usmekti-agi s wudem unṣib ɣef 9h00 s snat temsikniyin, yiwet akked tezrigin n yidlisen yerzan amezruy, tella-d diɣ temsikent n yimagraden n tɣamsa, tugniwin….atg. Ma deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun, yella-d usenɛet n yiwet tmezgunt s uzwel “Amjahed”, syin d yiwen n ucewwiq n trad, sɣur yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas Derdar Said. Ma d inelmaden n uɣerbaz amenzu Laimeche Ali, cnnan-d tizlit-nni “El Allim Nour” neɣ “Tamussni d tafat”, syin d asefru s uzwel “Anelmad”, ɣer taggara uraren-d tamezgunt tameẓyant. Ma seg 11h00 d afella, llan-d wazal n 6 n yisaragen. Γef 13h00, yella-d wahil i d-senɛet Tiddukkla tadelsant “Ixulaf n Ǧerǧer” n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Bdant-id s yiwet n tmezgunt yewwin isem “Lezzayer”, syin akin d taɣuri n yisefra, ɣer taggara d tarbaɛt n ccna n warrac imecṭah. Ma seg 14h00 d asawen, yella-d wahil n waddal sɣur talɣuɣa n n waddalen imenɣiyen n TiziUzzu, syin ɣer-s d aẓawan, ma ɣer taggara akk n was, tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n uttekki d kra n warrazen. Ma d leqdic i d-yellan ass-nni n ssebt deg Tneḍfert n uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mɛemmer n Azazga, yella-d akka: yebda usmekti-agi s wudem unṣib ɣef 9h00 s snat temsikeniyin, yiwet akked tezrigin n yidlisen yerzan amezruy, tella-d diɣ temsikent n yimagraden n tɣamsa, tugniwin….atg. ma seg 10h00 alamma d 12h00, yella-d usarag d tnagiyin n Mass Bounoura Ali, d aselmad yeffɣen ɣer tesɣimt, u d mmi-s n umjahed Moh Said Amendas. Ma ɣef 14h00 d afella, yella-d usenɛet n usaru n ṭrad, s uzwel “L’embuscade à Lakhdaria.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Adfel yewten s leqsaḥ deg ugafa n t’murt, yaɛzel aṭaṣ n tuddar n tama n lɛarc n’At Ɛebbas. Imeččimen n wedfel yewḍen ɣer kra n 10 isantimitren deg tama-agi, yegzem akk iberdan yettawin ɣer tuddar n t’ɣiwanin n Iɣil Ɛli lakked Buǧlil. Tuddar-agi zgant-d deg yidurar yulin nnig n 600 lmitrat ɣef lebḥar, ɣef ayagi yessa wedfel dinna s waṭaṣ. Seg wass-nni n Larbɛa, abrid aɣelnaw wis 106, yettɛedayen ɣef t’ɣiwant n Iɣil Ɛli yegzem seg taddart n Aẓru alarmi d Buni, s wazal n 25 ikilumiṭren. Imḍebren n t’ɣiwant-agi yenṭarren aṭaṣ, ttruẓun asalu s walallen ilaqen, akken ad ldin abrid-agi akk d yibardan yettawin ɣer tuddar nniḍen. Ar ass-a, iberdan yettawin ɣer kra n tuddar deg t’ɣiwant n Iɣil Ɛli, mazal ɣelqen am El Qelɛa, At Sraǧ, Taẓla, Tabuɛnant akk d ttiyaḍ. Imezdaɣ kkaten ad rzen asalu sɣursen akken ad fɣen. Ma yella deg t’ɣiwant n Bujlil, llan-t krad n tuddar yenṭaren deg tiyita n wedfel-agi. Tigrin, Ḥamda akk At Wihdan abrid yettawin ɣer din yeɣleq, akka tura imi n ttaru izarigen-agi. D-acu kan, ɛla ḥsab yiwen yiles n t’ɣiwant-agi n Bujlil, iberdan « yettuneṭlen » sedaw wedfel ur ttɛeṭilen ara ad ldin. D-acu kan, tiyita-agi n wedfel t-begen-d belli tuddar n snat t’ɣiwanin-agi ur zmiren-t ara ad qablen-t ideflawen, acku ur sɛin-t ara allalen ! Asaḥmu, asewwi lakked d-uṣiweḍ ttuɣalen d-iɣublan imuqranen deg tuddar-agi. Aḥun a rebbi, tiyita n wedfel-agi ur ed ussi ara deg tallit n leqraya, wamma iselmaden d yinelmaden ur ttruḥun ara ɣer iɣerbazen nsen ! Aɣbel nniḍen icud tikelt-a ɣer tiqarɛatin n lgaz. Ussan-agi n wedfel yegred, deg tama-agi n’At Ɛebbas, cceda ɣef lgaz, imi medden ttqelliben ɣef tiqarɛatin n lgaz, yiwḍen ɣer 300 idinaren. Aṭaṣ n yimezdaɣ n tuddar ssaxdamen isɣaren akken ad sewwen neɣ ad saḥmun, imi lgaz ixuṣ dayen kan. Ayagi yerra-d ɣer wallaɣ n yimezdaɣ n lɛarc n’At Ɛebbas asutar n lgaz « de γille », i ɛeṭlen iseggasen-agi ineggura ur yettwaxdem ara.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax.Y 

  
 Tiddukla n yimaεder d yemddukal-nsen n temnaḍt n Wizgan, ger tiddukliwin meqqren i iqedcen deg uḥric n tmetti di lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, id-illulen deg seggas n 2001, tger irebbi i uḥareb γef izarfan n yimaεdar sumata. Amecwar n tiddukla-agi d win γezzifen u dwin zeddigen, imi yal seggas tettnarni deg ayen yelhan, anda i tesbed deqs n yisenfaren s wazal-nsen, am uγarbaz n yimaεder (CMP) di temdint n Wizgan, axxam n tujya ilfayda n yimaεder d yemdanen yenxeṣen. Maca imḍebren n tiddukla-agi n imaεder sḥasfen aṭas γef iεewiqen d wugguren i izemren ad-xelqen laεḍil meqren d wugguren seba n yemḍebren n tγiwant n Wizgan i iεezmen akken aten-sufγen deg wexxam naγ lemqar n tiddukla i ṭfen s lqanun deg useggas n 2013 ar ass-a. Si tama niḍen sḥasfen aṭas imi ur d-sfaydin ara am tiddukliwin niḍen s lemεawnat id-tettak tγiwant ilfaya n tiddukliwin. I wesmekti, tiddukla n yimaεder d yemddukal-nsen n temnaḍt n Wizgan tjared 1216 n yimaεder i ittewfarqen γef 08 n tγiwanin, Wizgan, At-Zikki, Illulen umalu, At-Yeğğar, Ifiγa, Iεekkuren, Imsuḥal d swammaε. Γefugguren-agi merra, tiddukla n yimaεder, imawlan-nsen d yemddukal-nsen, gren-d tiγri seg ul i yemḍebren taεna temsalt akken ad-sifsen taεkkemt fell-asen, s tikci n ufus n tallelt akken i wata lḥal, i usebγes n tiddukla-agi i iqedcen γef izarfan n imaεder.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Mebɛed ‘’Imeṭṭi n Bab Yidurar’’, ‘’Lkuraj n tyaziḍt’’, ‘’Mraw n tmucuha i yiḍes’’, d yidlisen-nniḍen s tutlayt talmanit, yuɣal-d Akli Kebaili s tmacahut-nniḍen iwumi yefka isem ‘’Afriwen ur nessafag’’. 

 ‘’Afriwen ur nessafag’’ d tamacahut n tyaziḍt i yeffɣen deg tmurt-is imi ḥettmen fell-as yimnekcamen i wakken ad tečč ibawen deg umekkan n temẓin. D tamacahut i d-yessawel umeskar s yixemmimen akked d tudert n tura. Xas ulamma tayaziḍt ttakken-tt medden d amedya n tugdi : win yekkren ɣer wayeḍ, ad as-yini tesɛiḍ tasa n tyaziḍt, meɛna Akli Kebaili iga-as i tyaziḍt-a tabɣest : tesseɣleb ɣef wuguren i d-temmugern akked yiɣersiwen, ladɣa, nettat d igider i yettwassnen d acengu n tyuzaḍ. Deg taggara, tuɣal-d armi d tamurt meɛna, amek d wacuɣer ? 

 Akli Kebaili yesɛa duktura deg tussniwin tisertanin daymi ara naf ticraḍ n tsertit deg tira-as.

 Tazwart s ɣur Kamel Nait Zerrad.

 Yeffeɣ-d udlis ɣer tezrigin L’Odysée, 2014.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Taneɣlaft n Usegmi aɣelnaw, Nouria Benghebrit, tcar-d, ass n larebɛa deg Tmaneɣt, dakken ad tili tuddsa n tzizwert deg wayyur n yebrir i d-iteddun akken ad skecmen ugar n 28.000 iselmaden i kraḍ yeswiren n ulmad. ‘’Ad tili yiwet n tzizwert ass n 22 neɣ 23 yebrir i d-iteddu akken ad skecmen 28.084 n yiselmaden yerzan kraḍ wannagen n Usegmi aɣelnaw, aswir amenzu, alemmas akked yimineg’’, i d-tenna i tɣamsa Massa Benghabrit ɣer tama n yiwen n umyiger akked yecriken n tmetti n uḥric-is. Tenna-d dakken igerdas ara d-nessuter, timezzugin akked wahil n tzizwert ad ten-id-ẓergen ass n 22 meɣres ideg nella deg udeg n uɣlif (www.education.gov.dz). Ajerred i tzizwert-a ad yili seg 28 meɣres d afella deg wadeg(www.onec.dz) n tuddsa taɣelnawt n yikayaden n tzizwert (ONEC), i terna tenna-d. ‘’Mi rar yekfu ujerred, ad nefk asihar i yal amekki akken ad isers akaram-is’’, i d-tsegra.

<p style="text-align: right;"> APS 

  
 Akka, am yal tikkelt, tutlayt n tmaziɣt tettdeggir arraw-is s asenfali ama s timawit neɣ s tira. Taggara-agi, aḥric n tira yebda yettaɣ aẓar deg tmetti, ɣas akka ṭṭuqten fell-as yiɛewwiqen. Deg wussan-a yezrin, d Abdelnasser Rabia i d-yewwin adɣaɣ-is ula d netta I wakken ad yekki deg lebni n yiɣrem. Ilul deg taddart n Ccerfa i d-yezgan tama n usammar n Tubiret, Abdelnasser yessaweḍ ad d-iger s annar s yiwen n wammud n yisefra s wazal n 26. D adlis i d-yessufeɣ s ttawilat-is, yewwi-aɣ-d deg-s yiwet n terzeft anda yessukk tamuɣli-s ɣef waṭas n yiḥricen. D tayri, tin akken yeskenfen ulawen iwumi yefka azal meqqren deg yiḍrisen-is. Tikkelt ad t-naf yesḥassef, tikkelt yerfa neɣ ahat yegguma ad isemmeḥ. S yin, yezzi tamuɣli-s ɣer tudert n yal ass n umdan, anda ara naf “leɣrur n zman” yiwet n liḥala yettidir yal yiwen deg-neɣ. Dɣa, d yiwen n usefru i icudden ɣer waṭas n yisental iɣef d-yemmeslay umedyaz. Lezzayer, teṭṭef amkan deg wammud anda yesḥassef Rabia ɣef liḥala i tettidir, tin akken iwumi yessaram yal lxir. Am wakken daɣ yezzi ɣer tejmilin, tamezwarut yerra-tt i Lounis Ait Menguellet, anda yal afyir amenzu n tseddart yebda-t s yiwen seg tezlatin-is. D asefru i yessekfa s yiwet n teɣri mi d-yenna:” i lhedra-s kunwi cfu-t, yezga zeddig wawal-is.” Daɣ, yerra tajmilt-nniḍen i yemma-s d tyemmatin s umata, tidak yettaǧǧan lweḥc mi ara ɣabent. D acu kan, d lawan akka tura ad yili uwenneɛ deg tira n yidlisen i d-yettefɣen, imi nettwali tucḍiwin ggtent ɣas akka widak yessnen ad arun llan deg yal tama. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail. M  

<div> 
  
 Yal taggara n useggas deg tegrest leqḍen medden azemmur , ad ruḥent twaculin akken ara d-yebdu yiṭij ɣer wayla –nsent akken ad leqḍent azemmur , ttruḥun yakk iɛeggalen n twacult abeɛda mi ara yelhu lḥal. Zzit n uzemmur telha d asafar yesejjiyen aṭas n waṭṭanen maca tewɛer i ulqaḍ , llan kra imukan ur nefris ara ttaččren d isennanen n yidmim , llan daɣen imukan i deg yella ugris ur wɛin ara iṭij , ɣas akken Leqbayel ttebiren awi-d kan ad tili ṣṣaba d lɛella n uzemmur telha. Alqaḍ n uzemmur d tagnit anida d-ttemlilint twaculin xeddment d tumert , yella wanida xeddmen tiwizi maca mačči am zik acku drus i sɛan medden n uzemmur ɣef zik. Lɣella n zzit teffeɣ aseggas-a seg 16 ɣer 20 litrat n uqenṭar maca wid yesnen tafellaḥt nnan-d drus ,imi zik anect-a ttawint-id deg uzemmur n lqaɛa mi ara t-id yeseɣli waḍu uqbel ad t-id-zwin ; ɣef waya lɣella n uzemmur txuṣ ɣef zik sebba n lexṣaṣ-agi d adfel d ubruri bu- tucar d-yewten deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura , ma d azal n zzit tuwweḍ dagi deg lemɛinṣra n uqbil , neɣ iɛeṭṭafen d wat yanni ɣer 700 idinaren i litra .Nesaram armud-agi n uzemmur ur stehzayen ara deg-s Leqbayel imi d armud d-ǧǧan lejdud-nneɣ tasuta ad tt-id teǧǧ i tayeḍ.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia  

  
 Am yal aseggas, yal tamnaḍt neɣ tama amek tettqabal amenzu n yennayer. Deg Makouda, suddsen-d leqdic adelsan i lmend n usfugel n yixef useggas n yimaziɣen amaynut ‘’Yennayer 2967’’. D amussu asdukla n Tala Bouzrou i d-iheggan ass-nni n 12 deg yennayer 2017, yiwet n tmeɣra n ccna s wazal-is. Imi ccnan azal n 15 n yinaẓuren, gar-asen: Karim Khelfaoui, Karim Yeddou, Djilali Hamama, Dehmani Belaid, Madjid Fahem, Rabah Oultache d wiyaḍ. Tella-d daɣen “Tombola” ɣer taggara n tmeɣra-agi, i d-yellan deg unnar n uxxam n yilmeẓyenn Tala Bouzrou, i yetabaεen ɣer tɣiwant n Makouda. Ula deg Ouaguenoun, yella-d usfugel n tewwura n useggas 2967. D tiddukkla Tadelsant “Uqeṭεan n Uqawej” n taddart-agi n Uqawej, i itabaεen ɣer tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. D ahil d amerkanti i yettwaxdamen, sɣur tiddukkla-agi deg wass-nni ahad d amhad. Ass amezwaru, 11 deg yennayer 2017, xedmen deg-s timsikent n wayen i d-yeğğa d wayen yettwarun ɣef Bessaoud, deg uxxam-is yellan deg Uqawej. Llan-d, daɣen, tiyaḍ, n wallalen d tɣawsiwin tiqburin, deg uxxam n tiddukkla-agi. Ma deg wass n 12 deg waggur n yennayer, xedmen aṭas n temsikniyin, gar-asent: iselsa, tiqneddurin, unnuɣ, talaɣt, taklut, allalen iqburen…atg. Yella-d, diɣen, usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeğğigen ɣef sbaḥ n wass, ɣef uẓekka n Bessaoud Mohand Arab, yettwamḍelen dinna. D tinagiyin ɣef tudert-is d tiktiwin-is. Mebla ma nettu tikli (carnaval) n Ayrad, deg tlemmast n taddart, xedmen diɣen, ɣer tmeddit n was, temsizzelt n uyaziḍ. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Adaoun Abdelghani 

<div> 
  
 Win iɛetben yettnall id yeqqar wanzi. Lemtel id newwi yebna ɣef llsas werǧin yeskaddeb–it lawan. Ayen id wekkden ɣef tidet n wawal-agi d ayen nettwali deg annar n usnulfu adelsan ɣef kra n yelmeẓyen n tmurt n leqbayel. Taḥejjurt ɣef tayeḍ, asɣar ɣer wayeḍ iswi yellan d awezɣi yettuɣal d d tilawt. Gar isalen yessefṛaḥen nezzeh d afran u usaru n Reda Amrani «mi ara d ḥekku targit» akken ad yettikki deg tafaska t-is tesɛa n isura n tmaziɣt ara d yilin di tmurt n Lmaruk deg tamdint n Agadir deg tettili timsizelt ɣef warraz “ Isni n wewṛaɣ” . Tafaska-agi ara idumen azal n xemsa n wussan ( si 2 unbir alamma d 6 unbir 2015) d ttin deg ara ttikkin aṭas n isura( ama d isura iweẓlalen neɣ d isura ɣezzifen) id yekkan si yal tama n tmurt n tmazɣa . Tadwlit-agi t-is 9 a ttili diɣen d tajmilit i umsufeɣ amaruki Hakim Belabes akked tamsufeɣt tatunsit Salma Baccar. Ɣer tama n tfaska-agi aṭas n isurag ara yilin akken ad sefrurin liḥala deg yella sinima amaziɣ s-umata . Mačči kan d-aya, imi asaru n Reda Amrani: «mi ara d ḥekku targit» yettwafren diɣen akken ad yettikki di tadwilt tamezwarut n tfaska tagraɣlant n Sinima Amaziɣ n temdint n Casablana dima di Lmaruk . Tafaska agi ula d netta-t a tt-dum azal n 5 wussan ( si 6 alamma d 10 deg aggur n unbir). Xudi Reda Amrani yelha amecwar deg aḥric-agi n sinima. Asaru- ines : «mi ara d ḥekku targit» d tajmilt i sin icennayen n tmurt n leqbayel Slimane Azem akked Salah Sadaoui. Leɣzel n usaru yebna ɣef taqṣit n yiwen weqcic “Fahem” id yekran gar tawacult n inaẓuren. Bab-as yella ixeddem timesllalin ( marionettes) yerna ixeddem ticqufin s teslatin –agi n usɣar i warrac imecṭaḥ. Bab-as n Fahem yeffer ɣef mmi-s yak ayen-nni. Yiwwas (deg ass n umulli-ines) Fahem ad yeldi tawwurt iɣelqen ( tazeqqa anda ixeddem baba-as timesllalin-nni) dɣa ad yedlu ɣef tidet yellan. Di ccaw ad yekcem tizrugin n tirga, tirga ara t-yawwin tmurt inaẓuren. Din ad yemlil akked tigejda n ccna n teqbaylit am Slimane Azem akked Salaḥ Sadaoui.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Aṭas i yurǧan amaynut n Zedek Mulud i wayyur n ɣuct iɛeddan akken dɣa i aɣ-t-id-yenna netta s timmad-is. Deffir n « D abrid kan » ihi, iseɣrez (album) amaynut i izewwel « Asderfef », yella yetturaǧu i 20 seg wayyur n ɣuct 2014, d azemz amezray, imi d-yesmektay amulli n uswir n Sumam 1956. Maca, ɣas yewwi-d tili ahat yeffeɣ-d imir-nni, tilufa llant mgal anect-nni. Meḥsub ur lḥant ara yakk am wakken i ten-yessarem win i terza taluft. Dɣa deg umagrad-a ad d-nefk tasebba n uɛeṭṭel ed wayen  yeqqnen i ɣur-s. 

  Ur yemsefham ara akked umaẓrag  

 Zedek  Mulud mačči d menwala, ilaq ad t-id-nini. Amaynut-is urǧan-t ama d wid i t-iḥemmlen, neɣ d wid iḥemmlen aẓawan s umata. Maca atan ziɣ, ula d inaẓuren imeqqranen la d-ttmagaren ugur deg tmurt-nneɣ. Ɛlaḥsab isallen i d-nelqeḍ ihi, ur yemsefham ara unaẓur akked umaẓrag-is (éditeur) ɣef ssuma taneggarut s wanect ara yezzenz aḍebsi-ines. Aneggaru-a, akken nesla i kra n tukkisin deg internet, daɣen akken snagayen wid i as-yeslan, ad yili gar yiḍebsiyen igerrzen i yexdem segmi yuma (yebda) ccna. Ɣef waya, nettmesteqsay ɣef wamek almi i d-yella ugur-a. Acku, wis ɛni lemmer Zedek Mulud d acennay kan n tmeɣriwin i uhuzzu n wammas, amek ara yili waddud n yimaẓragen mara bɣun ad t-siẓergen. D tidet, ula d  amaẓrag d amzenzu, ula d netta seg tama-s yugad ad yexser ɣer taggara, skud yeṭṭuqqet yiwen n ccɣel i icewwlen akk inaẓuren, wayi qqaren-as : asɣendef (piratage). Lamaɛna, akken yebɣu yili, snat n tamiwin-a ameskar-ameẓrag yessefk tili gant kullec bac ad yili umtawa jar-asent, acku ayen merra ɣef nettmeslay ayen d imal n tezlit tazwawt.

  Yettxemmim ad d-yesnulfu tiẓrigin i yiman-is  

 Seld ayen akka i as-yeḍran almi yettwaḥettem ad yessexreb ahil n tuffɣa n walbum-is, Bab n tezlit « aderwic » yettxemmim seg wul tura akka ad yesnulfu tiẓrigin i yiman-is iwakken ur d-yettemlil ara ugur am wa ɣer sdat. Ihi, dima ɣef usiḍen n yiwet n teɣbalut i t-iqerben, ma yella ur yessemres ara tikti-a tamezwarut, anaẓur iɛewwel ad yesuffeɣ ɣer ssuq amiran-is s yidrimen-is. Wamma aheggi, ed tukkfa n usekles, akken i t-id-newwi deg wayen iɛeddan deg Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen, Zedek Mulud yella yekfa asekles acḥal-aya imi yezga deg ustudu ssbeḥ meddi, i yiwen n yiswi: ad iwennaɛ aqeddic. Ihi tura, deffir laɛtab, mazal kan ad d-yeffeɣ i tnezzut. D ayen ara yeǧǧen azayez-is ad yesber cwiṭ alama d taggara n useggas-a deg nella, neɣ ma ulac, ma iḍul maḍi maḍi, i tazwara n useggas ara d-ikecmen 2015. 

  Ar melmi aɣilif-a n usiẓreg? 

 Ugur-a n usiẓreg atan yeqqel d lmeḥna tamezwarut n umekar, ama n tira neɣ n ccna. Dɣa ugur-a ansi i d-iɛedda Zedek Mulud iɛedda-d fell-as yakan Crif ḥamani maca akken nniḍen. Yuɣ lḥal d tin ay tamentilt tamenzut i t-yeǧǧan ad yeffer annim-n d akud seg umaḍal n usufeɣ. Dɣa mi d-yuɣal s yiseɣrez mu isemma « Ɣur-k ay ul » yenna-d deg usarag i tɣamsa dakken imaẓragen llan zdeffir n uɛeṭṭel-ines, acku nutni ur t-steqsayen ara, netta daɣen ur iḥemmel ara ad ten-yenced iwakken ad yessinef i wuguren-a gedged n umsegzi. Ɣef waya, taluft tuklal asteqsi: sanda akka teddun tẓuri ed yidles deg tmurt-a? 

 Skud ameskar ur yettemsegzay akked umaẓrag, ur yettgerriz ugemmuḍ. Ma nemmeslay ɣef tira, s ssenf-is yemgerraden. Atan aṭas n yimyura i yettarran ad suffɣen seg tjibet-nsen. Wayi acku ur as-tehwi « tmeḥqranit » deg i d-yeɣli, anida uqan aṭas yizerfan-is s yisem-is d ameskar, skud yettalas kan 10 % seg takkit, rnu ɣer-s, aqqayen n ugatu n usiẓreg (contrat d’édition) kkaten-t ɣer uqaɛ, am umagrad wis 3. Deg waya, yessuham daɣen yesseḥzan waddad n umeskar i yessidiren tamussni deg ukaɣeḍ, ur ixemmem ḥedd lemmer ad yeḥbes tira acu ara yeḍrun. Aẓawan d yiwen-is, aɣilif agaɛmir n yinaẓuren n ccna deg tallit n tatrara d aɛiwed i yiḍebsiyen berra i usaḍuf (lqanun), neɣ lpirataj. Tasenselkimt teggra-d tettwaɣlet ɣef uzref n wayeḍ. Ager dayi aḍebsi ad ak-d-yefk ma yehwa-ak alef n yineɣlan (copies). Dɣa d ayen i yerran icennayen ɣer tesga n layas. Aredmani, ixxamen n yizerfan n umeskar deg umaḍal merra ilaq ad walin ɣef taluft-a n yimyura ed yinaẓuren icennayen. Acku ma tsemmed akka, taẓuri ad temmet, ma temmut tẓuri ad temmet talsa, imi aɣref war taẓuri ur yezmir ad yili. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Mhenni Xalifi  

  
 Ass n wid yemḥemmalen, ta tettwali-t d ass n lferḥ ,wa yenna-k d targit kan ,wiyaḍ ttwalint d ass n rbaḥ. Llan wid ur tessinen ara maḍi .Lḥasun, tamuɣli fell-as temgarad, ad yeqqim kan, ulac win ur tenbic ara tayri, neɣ am wakken qqaren Wat zik :”ulac ifer n ṭejra ur ihuz waḍu’’. Yal wa amek i tt-yedder. D amɣar d tamɣart, d ilemẓi, d tilmeẓiyin, wa yewweḍ lebɣi n wul-is, wa mazal nnuba-s, wayeḍ teǧǧa-t gar yiberdan. I wakken ad d-nawi s ttbut ɣef waya, nesteqsa kra n medden, ldin-aɣ-d ulawen nsen.

  Zahir (22 yiseggasen) 

 ‘’ Ma d ilindi kan d ssaḥ. Ddurt uqbel, nekk ttheggiɣ-as. Idrimen-iw akk serfaɣ-ten deg yiwen wass , qqareɣ-as awi-d kan ad tefraḥ temdakelt-iw. Ma d aseggas-agi qqimeɣ-d weḥdi segmi nemfraq. Dɣa, ad d-yeqqim kan d ass n usmekti…d targir kan’’.

  Belqasem ( Bab n la pézziria) 

 ‘’ I wacu lekteb, nekk ɣer ɣur-i, d yiwen n wass i nettraǧu s ccuq axater yettili ixeddim, ttaččarent akk ṭṭwabel s les couples, nlehhu-d yid-sen akken ilaq, awi-d kan ad sɛeddin ass-nsen akken ilaq’’

  Nadiya d taselmadt   

 ‘’ Nekk ɣer ɣur-i d yiwen yifen ussan n ddunit, ulac d acu yifen tayri , amer bnan wassaɣen yettilin gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut, bnan ɣef tayri , tili, ur ttilin ara inebran. Ilaq ussan akk, am wass-a. Ilaq ad yuɣal 14 di furar jour férié..oh..vive tayri’’

  Sonia 18 n “yiseggasen” 

 “ Telha tayri , ma yedder-itt bab-is d tufiret , ur iɛellem ḥedd s yis-s, ad yedrem kulec , ulac d ass n jeddi Sain Valentin ad yeddu”

  Brahim (39 n yiseggasen ) 

 “ Awal-iw ɣef QSaint Valentin: ini-asen yella yiwen anda i tt-iger teqqur. Yettnadi ur yufi, ur yeẓri ayɣer?Ass n Saint Valentin di 2005 i d-yufa tameddakelt-is d yiwen-nniḍen.Dɣa deg wass-nni yekreh 14 di fura. Qeg yimir mi d-yewweḍ wass n Saint Valentin, ad d-mektiɣ lkerh-inu’’.

  Dda belɛid (75n yiseggasen) 

 ‘’ Ad ak-iniɣ tidet kan: Dadda-k Belɛid, mačči am yimɣaren-nni i ak-yeqqaren akken d lɛib tayri. Nekk s lǧil n zik teḍra-aɣ akken i as-yenna wuccen :’’yetbaɛ semmum-it’’.tifem-aɣ s lǧil n tura, kunwi meqqar teddrem tayri , mačči am nekni ad tt-taɣeḍ ur tt-tessineḍ, dommage ɣef wass-agi n Saint Valentin yeqqim almi nejba di leɛmer, yejba-d ɣer tmurt-nneɣ.’’

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-ten Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 Deg temsizzelt  tis snat n warraz Belɛid At Ali d-tesnulfa Tiregwa, Tisebeddit Takanadit   i Tmaziɣt , ufrarn-d  tlata n yimyura gar 15 yettekkin.

 Arraz amenzu isaḥ-d i umeddakul nneɣ aneɣmas  Mhenni  XALIFI, s tullist “Tafrara tamezut», wis sin i umeddakul Malek HOUD, s tullist  “Tauru n tasa»,arraz  wis tlata i temsiwt Nasima XUXI, s tullist “Yir taggara”. 

  
 Tanaẓurt-nneɣ Aldjia, tettwassen d lal n uḥulfu, d mm taɣect i d-ineṭṭqen awal s rruḥ. Ɣas d tin iḥemmlen awal deg tezlit aṭas, maca temmeslay-d deg tdiwennit-a ɣef kra n temsal. Gar-asent aḍebsi-ines amaynut i d-iteddun.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: amek tettili Aldjia akked tẓuri? 

  Aldjia : nekk d tẓuri akken i aɣ-mazal neddukkul kan. Tugi ad iyi-tebru, nekk ur zmireɣ ad tt-ǧǧeɣ. Ufiɣ iman-iw aṭas ɣur-s ɣas xedmeɣ d yimedyazen i tt-yettcebbiḥen.

  Tɛeddaḍ deg ustudyu, mmeslay-aɣ-d ɣef umaynut-a i d-tettheggiḍ? 

 Aseggas-a, mi kecmeɣ ɣer ustudyu, xedmeɣ s leɛqel-iw imi ttruḥuɣ, ttuɣaleɣ gar Paris d Tmurt. Ur zmireɣ ad qqimeɣ di tmurt nnig 30 n wussan. Tazwara d tayemmat. Deg-s ṭam (8) n tezlatin s yisental yemxalafen. Snat n tezlatin d timaynutin, d tijmilin i Meɛtub Lwennas d Muḥya. Yiwet n tezlit en duo avec Slimani, d afennan aqbur. Ad as-iniɣ tanemmirt d tameqqrant, ad yesseɣzef Rebbi di leɛmer-ines, di tezmert d talwit. Lhiɣ d tezlatin n yiseɣrez, ladɣa snat iwumi ɛawdeɣ, bedleɣ deg-sent asentel.

  I melmi ara d-yeffeɣ ɣer ssuq? 

 Tura yewjed. Ufiɣ amaẓrag, nemsefham, ad t-id yessufeɣ akken iwata. Ayen-nniḍen ɣef yiseɣrez, ad t-teẓrem di unbir mi ara d-yeffeɣ.

  Nessen-ikem tcennuḍ aṭas ɣef lmeḥna n tmeṭṭut. D acu i d awal-im ɣef wannect-a? 

 Tazwara, nekk d tameṭṭut, ẓriɣ d acu d lḥala-nteɣ. Ẓriɣ i tettidir tmeṭṭut, ladɣa taqbaylit. Ala nettat i yeẓran lḥala-s, ala nattat i ara yecnun ayen ttḥusunt tid i tt-yecban, d wayen ttidirent. Nekk skud d tameṭṭut i lliɣ, d nekk i ara iḥudden ɣef yizerfan-iw. Ala tameṭṭut i yettnaḍahen ɣef wayen icudden ɣer tmeddurt-is. Ala nettat i teɛna temsalt. Qqaren » Ur yeqriḥ ḥedd usennan ala aḍar i yeddan ḥafi ».

  Telḥiḍ-d amecwar ɣezzif deg wannar n ccna. Ar tura, tettuqenɛeḍ s wayen akk i d-tefkiḍ i tezlit tazwawt? 

  Bdiɣ ccna d terbaɛt n Djurdjura deg useggaz n 79. Ur qqimeɣ aṭas yid-s, imi tella-yi kan d tazwara n tikli akken ad tt-semmdeɣ, acku nekk bɣiɣ ad cnuɣ weḥd-i. Qedceɣ aṭas d Fahem Muḥ Sɛid, Ayt Meslayen, ad yesgunfu di talwit, Ayt Mengellat. Daɣen, lḥiɣ-d amecwar i yiman-iw. Anaẓur, d acu i d-yefka, ad d-yini ur d-fkiɣ ara. Yal mi ara d-nefk, mazal nebɣa ad d-nernu ugar. D awezɣi anaẓur ad yeɛyu deg wayen i d-yefka, dima ad yeqqar urɛad ssawḍeɣ, mazal ur d-nniɣ kullec, mazal yella wayen ixussen. Llan kan kra n wid i iḥemmlen ad ttzuxxun, wid i izemren ad ḥettben wḍen. 30 n yiseggasen segmi bdiɣ ccna, werɛad qennɛeɣ iman-iw deg wayen i d-bdiɣ. Ḥemmleɣ ad cnuɣ, ḥemmleɣ Taqbaylit, cniɣ mazal ad cnuɣ, nniɣ-d mazal ad d-iniɣ.

  Kra n ttiɛadat n ccna ɣer sdat? 

 Akken ad yewjed umaynut, ad nettheggi wayeḍ. Ttaruɣ isental, sxerbiceɣ akken zemreɣ. Ttawiɣ-d ɣer wid ixeddmen tamedyazt, sɣur yinaẓuren i yettarun Taqbaylit . Deg yiseɣrez-a aneggaru, d leqdic n terbaɛt akked kra n medden. Ur ttwacqiɣ ara ad t-id-iniɣ, yal yiwen d acu i d-yefka d aẓawan, neɣ d imeslayen. Fkiɣ leqdic i waṭas n yimdanen.

  Tanemmirt ɣef wayen akk i d-terriḍ. D acu tebɣiḍ ad t-id-ternuḍ? 

 Ad d-iniɣ azul d ameqqran i wid yeqqaren aɣmis-agi s teqbaylit, d wid i t-yettarun i as-yettakken afud. Tanemmirt-im a Kaisa imi i yi-d-tefkiḍ isteqsiyen. Ǧǧiɣ-am lehna d talwit.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Testeqsa-tt: Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Di leɛmer-is ass-a 61 n yiseggasen limer ur d-teɛjil γur-s ! Tedra-as amzun akka i tt-iwala di targit.

 Yak yenna-t-id-d iseggasen uqbel, mi yecna :

  «Ass-agi lli&amp;gamma,; azekka wissen, Nniγ-d ayen i zriγ d wayen i ttwali&amp;gamma,; Cfut di terga ma γli&amp;gamma,; D anza-w ara awen-d-yessiwlen !» 

 Di tala Bounane i as-d-wwint akal ass n 25 di yunyu 1998, di tuγalin-is s axxam ukkud tmeṭṭut-is Nadia d snat n teslifin-is. Iɛdawen n tudert qurɛent anda akken ur yettizmir ad yeslek, γas ulamma yerra γef yiman-is, maca abruri n ṛrsas i d-yuragen fell-as yegla s terwiḥt-is. Yuzzar lexbar, tenhewwal tmurt n Leqbayel, zzant taswin, yettuqqet usnunnec γef tmettant-is, wid i t-yenγan, acimi i t-nγan…Lḥasun, wid i iḥemmlen Lounes tejreḥ tasa-nsen, ḥsan dakken d awezγi ad d-ilal win ara t-id-yecbun, win akken yeddren s tissas. Yak yenna Lounis AT Menguellet deg wawal-is :

  «Tirrugza ur tuḥwağ aɛeggeḍ, Ma ur tt-id-tewwid mi ara d-tlaled, Ur tettnuzu di leswaq» 

 Segmi akka i iruḥ Lounès, tizlatin-is neddhent di yal amkan, anda yedda umdan ad isel i ssut-is yettbeɛziq. Ahat ṭṭfent yal tama, almi ula d tasuta-nni ur as d-necfi ara tsell i tezlatin-is. Yal 25 di yunyu, abrid yettawin γer At Dwala, ur yettneqdiɛ ara s tkeryas d lkiran. Iqbayliyen, rezzun s azekka-s, ttarran-as rreḥma, almi yuγal yugar lemqam. Aya, yettbeyyin-d acḥal ceffun yimdanen i lxir, imi Matoub d win yextaren tama n yigellilen, am wakken i t-id-yenna : « Nekk si ssenf n yimeγban. » Ma nezzi-d tamuγli γer ttawilat n usiweḍ, d lkiran, d ifurguten neγ ahat d tikeryas, aṭas seg-sen kesben tteswirat n Lounes i iɛelqen s ttnefxa, i wakken ad d-inin : « Ulamma yemmut, mazal-it yella. » Da i newweḍ s awal n Ccix Muhend U Lhusin :

  «Yella walebɛaḍ yella, ulac-it, Yella wayeḍ ulac-it, yella» 

 Akka, Lounes seg wid ulac-iten maca yella, imi tizlatin-is akk d timsirin, tteḥwiğin-tent medden di yal taswiɛt. Di ddiq, ttafent medden, ilmeẓyen labeɛda, imi yezga yettarra-d i tiγri, ur yelli seg wid yettγurru udrim. Di lawan n leḥris, yella-d di lmendad di taddart-is, yettɛassa am netta am medden γef nnif d lḥerma. Ayen akken i ttxemmimen medden di tuffra, ahat d tugdi, netta iqerra-it-id s uzday n lqedd. Ma d wid yeffγen lufeq n Teqbaylit, ur asen-yeğği ara, igezzer, irennu deg-sen, imi γur-s Taqbaylit ur tettnuz ur tettwarhan. Dγa d Taqbaylit-a iwumi yettarra azal di yal tizlit, yessaweḍ, achal n tikkal, yessukkes-d atas n yimeslayen si fennu. Isefra-s zḍan, ṛessan deg yiwet n tγessa ara yilin d tigejdit i tudert n tutlayt d yidles amaziγ. Ur yezmir ḥedd, ad yenkerr amecwar n Lounes, abrid-nni yessan d isennan, yernan iɛedda-t ḥafi. Aniwa ur necfi i taluft n tuber asmi akken i t-fetkent xemsa n tersasin, neγ tadyant n 94 mi yesɛedda 16 n wuḍan deg yifran n yirebraben, almi tegla-as tis tlata. D aqerru n lmeḥna, yerna yenna-t-id deg tezlit-nni :

  «Asmi i d-luleγ d ass amcum Deg ufus i d-kemseγ lehmum Akken ur i yi-ttixxiren ara» 

 Limer ad imuqel umdan ayen akk i yexdem, ayen yecna d wayen yesɛedda, ad d-tiniḍ yedder lqern, maca deg 42 n yiseggasen yessaweḍ igmer-d agerruj yecban wagi i d-yeğğa. Am wakken i d-nebder di tazwara, dakken Lounes amzun akken yettwali ayen ara yeḍrun yid-s ɣer sdat, imi deg yiwen n usefru ur yecni ara yakan, i d-nekkes seg udlis yura Yalla Seddiki : « Lounes Matoub, mon nom est combat », ad naf :

  «Ad lehhuγ ttaggadeγ Dayen ad nefleγ Anda akken ğğiγ tacriḥ-iw Tikkelt-a ma deg-s brettxeγ Ur d-ttensareγ Ad ruheγ s lqedd-iw Ayen akk ɛzizen ḥemmleγ Deffir ad t-ğğeγ Imi d nekk i d axsim-iw»  

  M. Smail 

  
 Taddart icellaḍen, d yiwet n taddart gar tudrin n Yilulen n Usammer di tama n Uqbu, aɣir n Bgayet . Di tama n ugafa, qublen-tt-id tudrin n Yillula Umalu.

 Ma di tama n unzul d taddart n Mliḥa, akkin i wasif di tama n usammer d tudrin n tɣiwant n Yiɣrem”At Amar uzeggan akked d tzaɣart”, ɣer umalu d tudrin N lɛerc n uzellagen.

  Aɣerbaz n tussna deg useqqif n ṭṭmana di lqern wiss 19 

 Si zik i yella yiwen n useqqif iwumi qqaren Afrag n ṭṭmana, yella deg-s yiwen n uɣerbaz anda slemden di lqern wis 19 aṭas n tussniwin, yecban tafelsafit akked tunsna n yigenwan. Aya s lmendad n Mohand Said Acellaḍ. Atas n yimussnawen n tsekla i d-yeɣran dinna icuban Lbacir Ibrahimi, am wakken daɣen i tella yiwet n temɛemmart ideg i d-ffɣen waṭas n ṭṭelba. Tella zik dinna yiwet n temkardit tameqrant, maca di lawan-nni n tegrawla serɣen-tt lɛesker n Fransa. Ma d tura, yeqqim-d kan lakul-nni d aktay i cfawat; rezzun-d ɣur-s medden seg yal tamnadṭ, ttzurun-t. Zyada ɣef waya, sεan yiwet n lεadda yimezdaɣ n taddart n Yicellaḍen: Akken ur d-tetteffeɣ ara teslit neɣ ur d-tkeccem ara alamma tεedda-d deg Ufrag n ṭṭmana.

  Tajmilt i yimeɣrasen n tegrawla n 54 

 Ass-nni n 19 di ɣuct, taseqqamut n lɛeqqal n taddart n Yicellaḍen s lemɛawna n yimḍebbar n lewzin n Summam Lewnis n udrum At Hmiṭuc, rran tajmilt meqqren i yimeɣrasen n taddart. Ṣeggmen timeqbart, bnan axxam n umezruy anda rsen-t ttsawar d yimagraden i d-yettmeslayen ɣef wayen yeḍran di taddart n yicellaḍen di tegrawla n 54. Ad d-nesmekti d akken taddart n Yicellaḍen tefka-d aṭas n yimeɣrasen di traḍ n 1857 , imi aṭas i yekkin deg umennuɣ -nni n unebdu 1858 deg ugni n Tizi i d-yezgan ɣef tilist metwal adrar n At Aɛziz i d-yellan deg Yilulen n Umalu di wilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ɣer waya, ur ntettu ara ameɣras n tugdut Karim Sidhum yeɣlin di tefsut taberkant 2001.

  Tulya n Uxxam n yidles n taddart 

 D tikkelt tamezwarut i deg ara yili yiwen n uxxam icuban wagi di taddart n leqbayel imi d taddart ara yesseduwen kan lumuru-ines . Yelli tiwwura-s s wudem unṣib ass-nni 19 di ɣuct i lmend n usmekti n tɣerɣert n Ugraw n Summam 1956 i d-yellan di temnaḍt n Summam deg Yifri n Uzellagen . Axxam-agi, llan deg-s akk wallalen i iwulmen i leqdic n taddart : ama d idles, addal neɣ aheggi n tmeɣriwin. Yettwabna uxxam i Wat taddart, sɣur imḍebbar n lewzin uyefki Soummam, imi netta yakan d mmi-s n taddart. Di taggara n tirza-nneɣ, nemlal kra n yimezdaɣ mkul yiwen amek i d-ibeggen lferḥ-is:’’ S wallalen-agi i tesɛa taddart, nessaram ahat kra n wass ad d-nebnu kra n tfaska ara yesnernin di ccan n yidles amaziɣ s umata ‘’ i d-yenna Zahir loubar d aɛeggal n tdukkla n taddart.

  B. Ben. 

  
 Taddart n At Mizar, qqaren-as daɣen, At Sidi ḥend Waɛli, d taddart tamecṭuḥt, tezga-d ɣer yidis n taddart n Yiḥiṭusen di tɣiwant n Buzgan. tsɛa azal n 500 n yimezdaɣ.  Taddart-agi mechuret s yiwen n lwali i yesɛan leqder d ameqran. Yessen ddin azedgan, yesɛa ṣṣwab akked tmusni. Ilmend n waya ttzuṛunt yimdanen. Xas ma ass-a yemmut, mazal yeqqim-d yisem-is deg umezruy n temnaḍt-agi. Ma yella win yeqqes uzrem, ad iruḥ srid ɣer taddart n At Mizar, as- d-yesslef walbaɛḍ deg yimezdaɣ-is, s wakal n Sidi Musa, deg umḍq-nni deg-i yettwaqqes, dayen as- yekkes uqreḥ. Ad yini kan deg wul-is:&lt;&lt; A Rebbi deg leɛnaya-k, ssufeɣ aqraḥ deg umdan-agi&gt;&gt;. Din din ad yekkes uqraḥ.

 Mmeslayeɣ d Mass. Ḥanafi ALILI, yiwen deg yimezdaɣ n taddart-a yenna-d: &lt;&lt;yiwwas, Sidi Musa iruḥ ɣer  teẓgi iwakken ad d-yezdem isɣaren. Imi ifuk asqucceḍ, yemmekta-d belli ur yewwi ara amrar s wayes ara d-icudd tazdemt-is. Iwala azrem yettecrurud-d, imi d-yewweḍ ɣer ɣur-s yeṭṭef-it-id yenna-as : &lt;&lt;yefka-k-id Rebbi s waswa, ak-xedmeɣ d amrar, ad cuddeɣ s yess- tazdemt-iw&gt;&gt;. Dɣa icudd tazdemt-is, ibubb-itt s axxam. Deg was-nni uɣalen izerman ur tteqsen ara deg wakal-nni n Sidi Musa, di taddart n At Mizar.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Bussaɛd  Ḥemmar  

  
  Isufar 

 3 n wurawen n uren alemmas, 3/4 n lkas n zzit uzemmur, 3 n tmeqqunin n nneɛneɛ, 2 n tbeslin, timeqqranin, Lmelḥ.

  Aheggi 

 Sexleḍ iferrawen n nneɛne, lebṣel akked lmelḥ, teẓmeḍ-ten i wakken ad d-tekkseḍ iẓmi-s. Err iqecran i d-yeggran deg tḍebsit, ternuḍ-as awren-nni akked lmelḥ. Sexleḍ-iten akken iwata, txedmeḍ taṭiṭuct deg tlemmast n urekti, tesmireḍ-as zzit-nni. Syin, teslexseḍ arekti s yiẓmi-nni n nneɛneɛ akked lebṣel, ternuḍ-as aman i wakken ad yishil i lxedma. Skur arekti-nni tezzuzreḍ-as ciṭ n uwren. Err arekti d tiqrisin, tebḍuḍ-tent d timkuzin. Seḥmu tameqlit, teslexseḍ-tt s zzit n uzemmur. Terreḍ tirbaɛtin-nni ad wwent azal n 15’ seg yal tama. Tzemreḍ ad t-ččem akken yeḥma neɣ d asemmaḍ. S tezmert-nwen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Sɣur Daya  

  
 Tasnawit n yimeɣrasen Uğeddi i yellan di tɣiwant Ukeffadu, thegga-d, am yal aseggas, leqdic adelsan i usfugel n useggas amaynut n yimaziɣen 2967. Leqdic-a, yella-d s ddaw n tallelt n tesmilt n tuddsa ‘’School Espoir’’, aɣerbaz usirem d tagrumma n yinelmaden d yiselmaden , dɣa, ḥerklen-d ahil d aččuran , anda i d-yella ass n amhad (lexmis) 12 deg yennayer 2016, d ass ilelli i urmud-a. Tanzayt, tella-d temsikent anda llan sin n yinaẓuren i ixeddmen di tẓuri , neɣ taklut , d inelmaden , d ilemẓiyen gar-asen ‘’ Zouaoui Sofiane , Tirrouche Sonia . Yella-d, daɣen, usenzi n yidlisen s ubuddu. Syin akkin, d aznuzu n Uɣmis n tesnawit i d-yetteffɣen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt anda llan deg-s iselmaden n tmaziɣt gar-asen mass Achoui Azedine d win yeṭṭfen tasmilt n tira n uɣmis. Deg-s ttarun-d yinelmaden , iselmaden. .. Yemmed wahil s tehri anda i d-yella unabaz deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen, d tagnit n tumert anda yella usarag sɣur tnelmadin n tesnawit , Bessati Tassaadit akked Zadri tafsut, xedment-d agzul i yennayer d umezruy-is. Yella-d, daɣen, tikci n warrazen i yinelmaden i d-yewwin tazmilt εlayen deg ukradyur amezwaru , syin d ccḍeḥ n leqbayel. D tisekkrin n yiḥerqan i d-icebḥen s teksiwin d yimendilen d lfuḍat. Rrant takatayt ɣer deffir anda i d-sbinent lasel , iseɣ , ansayen … Tella-d, daɣen, tmedyazt , aḥric n wawal , ammur n tefyar, iwellihen … Ccna, terra-d tiɣri imi rran-as azal s uẓawan , anda ccnan yinaẓuren n tesnawit yakkan gar-asen Ghilas Sahiri , Challa sylia , Rafik Ardjoune , Yacine Laradi d wiyaḍ. Ad d-nesmekti d akken tella-d tulya s wudem unṣib s ɣur Aselway n tɣiwant and aḥedren waṭas n yinebgawen, gar-asen Tiddukkla n yimawlan n yinelmaden d wiyaḍ… 

<p style="text-align: right;">   Azedine Abdous 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Qqaren-d, yella yiwen n uxxam zik-nni, deg-s tamɣart, mmi-s d teslit-is. Tamɣart-nni d teslit-is am umcic d uɣerda neɣ, ugar, am temɣart d teslit…di Tmurt n Leqbayel n zik-nni : a wufan tamezwarut d Lalla, tislit-is d taklit kan. Dɣa ulac d acu ur (d)as-tesbubb temɣart i teslit-is d ihwah, akken kan ad as-yebru mmi-s. Yal tameddit n wass, ad d-tcellef fell-as leɛǧeb, ad as-d-tales i mmi-s ayen tga d wayen ur tgi, ayen d-tenna d wayen ur d-tenni. Argaz n uxxam, mmi-s n temɣart, iɛewweq d acu ara yeg, d acu ara d-yini ? Ad as-yebru i tmeṭṭut-is, akken ad tellez yemma-s ? Ad as-yini i yemma-s “Teccḍeḍ a yemma !”? Yeẓra d acellef i d-tettcellif yemma-s ɣef leɛyal-is, d yihwaw i tebɣa ad as-teḍlu, meɛna seg tama-nniḍen, d yemm-as netta, rnu ahat ulac ccekk yella “leḥmu n wulawen” gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut-is, ulamma s tuffra kan. Acḥal i iɛeddan d ussan, d uḍan, d ayyuren, d … ugur yezga d win kan, ameslay d yiwen kan. Ur neẓri amek iga –ahat icawer Amɣar azemni (?)– armi i d-yufa tifrat i wugur. Ihi yiwen n wass, ass n ssuq, yekker urgaz n uxxam ad isewweq, ssbeḥ zik ɣer tafrara. Mi yekker ad yeffeɣ, tesla-d tyemmat i mmi-s, tenna-yas :

 –Anida i tɛewwleḍ akka, a mmi ?

 –Ad ruḥeɣ ad sewwqeɣ, a yemma…

 – D acu ara d-taɣeḍ, a mmi ?

 Yenna-as :

 –Ad d-aɣeɣ itbir, a yemma…

 –Amek ara as-tsemmiḍ ?

 –Ad as-semmiɣ“Neẓra neffer !”

 Tekker-d teslit tenna-as :

 –Ihi ula d nekki, a ɛezzu, rnu-yi-d wayeḍ …

 –I kemmi amek ara tsemmiḍ ? i as-yenna urgaz i tmeṭṭut-s.

 Tenna-as:

 –Nekki ad as-semmiɣ “Necceḍ nwexxer !”

 Tamɣart tesla-d, tefhem, ihi tenna :

 –Ula d nekki, a mmi, rnu-yi-d wayeḍ …

 –Amek ara as-tsemmiḍ, kemmi a yemma ?….

 Tenna-as:

 –Nekki, a mmi, ad as-semmiɣ “Rebbi iɛeffu iɣeffer !”

  Kamal Bouamara 

  
 Boussad Touazi d anaẓur i yellan di tlalit deg useggas 1978 di temnaḍt n Lquba di Lezzayer tamanaɣt , uɣalen-d ɣer tama n Igufaf deg useggas 1983, asmi yesԑa 17 n yiseggasen deg uwtay-is tettunefk-as tegnit akken ad d-yexdem abrug di tesgilt (Icennayen uzekka) i yellan ɣef uqerru-is Majahed Hamid s tezlatin-is azal n ukuz , d tidak yura s leḥmala , s unaruz .Di nnuba-a i yelli taɣda n tẓuri-s yugten d tahuski , anda daɣen yexdem tadwilt sɣur Samira Tamekfadut deg usiher (tawwurt telli i ufennan akked n yinebgi) ,yegna aceqqiq n tira s tmedyazt icebḥen, lqayen , yezren di tira d unamek i yellan akkin i tmuɣli. Deg useggas 2000 yunag ɣer tmurt n Fransa , amahil ur yeḥbis , aẓwan yezdeɣ deg yidamen , am uclim yewwi waḍu di tmenzut anda ula d ccna tedda di lǧerra , yexdem tasgilt sɣur Nour Ould Amara fell-as yaԑfu yerḥem di tiliẓri n BERBER TV mbaԑd sin yiseggasen ɣef yinig , yebda yetturar ɣef wallalen uẓawan , ardin , snitra …d wawalen akken ad tmug tmedyazt , iḥerkel-d tizlatin yecban tayri , tamdanit , taflest …yebda yekcem ɣer uxam usekles aya di tmurt di tuɣalin anda llan wid i as-yefkan tallelt akken ad tili tfarest i uḍebsi win yefka azwel (laman) ad d-nebder : Madjid Halit , Nabil Cherifi , Dahmane Bendahmane…..d wiyaḍ , asisen n leqdic-a yeffeɣ-d deg useggas 2014 sɣur teẓrigt Idole , din i yufa ttawil akken ad yexdem assag s ccna-s yecban times mi ara ad d-teǧǧ urɣu , d leḥzen , d aberrug , d lxiq, anda Boussad d win icennun aṭas n yiɣenniben gar-asen Kamal Messoudi ..asiher yexdem-it di Fransa anda inabazen yellan deg wahil-nsen di (Le centre culturel Algérien, la salle concert café de Paeis , la salle le poterme des peupliers ) ddeqs n tzeɣwa yecna ,yella deg lemwaji n yisadaren amedya : Beur film , Radios pays,radion Numidia , Radion Orient, Radion pluriel, ula di tesgilin n tegrarin anda yella di tedwilt n BERBER TV ddunit d afares sɣur Redouan , akked d massa djahida, ula di ssinima yekcem di taɣult anda yella ilmendad d tuddin i tdukliwin, tura yessewjad tagrirt win yefka isem (ZOOM) anda ara tili d tameddurt unaẓur Aqbayli , d lwelha ɣef umecwar ufennan , i win iran ad kkin deg yisura ara ad d-yexdem mass Boussad tiwwura llind ilmend-nwen xersum imeltaɣen neɣ isegbaren , isenfaren d tasenduqt n uwlaɣa anda yiwen uḍebdi deg-s tizlatin yesԑan asdig i teqbaylit d tijmilin i tgejda n ccna-nneɣ Slimane Azem , Matoub , Lhasnaoui , d yisura-nniḍen. Boussad Touazi d win iḥemmlen taẓuri tamatut mačči anager ccna , anda yella taɣult ( aserkeb n twellafin, asali n tegrarin , ….d tidfi-ines , d azwu-ines , d tayri-is, ssut-is d adrar aԑmam i as-yezzin icerfa n umezruy , tayri, asirem , idles,azref , iseɣ , d tawrikt ikesben tusnagt ɣur-s azmul deg uɣnib-is , d tafuɣalt, d agellid n tsusmi, d tinafusin i yellan di tirga ,d adrig, d asugen …<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Azedine Abdous 

  
 Akken ḥsan kra wid yeṭṭafaren taluft n tmaziɣt deg tmurt, yella-d taggara-ya ttiɛad gar Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa akked tneɣlaft n usegmi massa Benɣebrit. D timlilit ideg i d-yella yiwen n umtawa deg teɣzi n wakud, akken taɣlift n usegmi ad d-telhu ugar ed tutlayt tamaziɣt sey-a ɣer sdat. Dɣa yenna-d ɣef waya umaray amatu n usqamu, mass ɛessad i umaṭṭaf aɣelnaw: «Timlilit-a anamek-is dakken adabu yenwa d tidet ad yefk azal i tmaziɣt, iwakken sey-a ɣer sdat, akk uguren i d-nettmaggar deg usnerni n tmaziɣt ad kksen. Acku ar tura, akken teẓram, tamaziɣt ḥaca tettwasselmad deg 11 n waɣiren, aya ur yelli d iswi-nneɣ. Nebɣa ad as-nefk i tmaziɣt udem aɣelnaw, ad tili deg 48 n waɣiren i tesɛa tmurt. Rnu tamsalt n tmaziɣt ur teɛna ara kan Asqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa.» Ad d-nesmekti dakken deg temlilit-nni n 21 furar, yefka-d usqamu unnig n timmuzɣa 8 n yisdawanen, terna-d teɣlift 7 s ɣur-s almi tettwasbedd yiwet n tesqamut ara igen kra n yinadiyen ɣef waddad n tmaziɣt, acku iswi amiran n wid ileḥḥun i ubaɣur n tutlayt-is, d assiweḍ n tmaziɣt ɣer 24 n twilayin sey-a ɣer 2 n yiseggasen. Seg tama-s, ula d taɣlift n yidles tesbeyyen-d zun lebɣi n uwanek bac ad yerfed tutlayt n Dda Lmulud ugar, dɣa tenna-d i umaṭṭaf aɣelnaw dima: «Ilmend n wass agreɣlan n tutlayt tayemmat, nenwa ass-a ad nestenyi yiwen n umtawa akked usqamu unnig n timmuzɣa i usnerni n tmaziɣt, d ayen iɣef nemsifham 6 n wayyuren tura ɣer deffir. Rnu, skud nusa-d ɣer da akken ad nestenyi deg uxxam n usqamu, aya d ccɣel n lɛali. Anect-a iwakken tutlayt tamaziɣt ad tesɛu amkan-is i ilaqen deg uɣlif n usegmi. Maca, ayen ara inefɛen ugar nnig n waya d aqeddic. Ilaq ad yili uqeddic n uslugen, ed unadi ɣef waṭas n tlufa (…). Amtawa-ya d ayen ara yessisehlen iqeddicen-a ɣef tmaziɣt.» Aṭas i yettraǧun aredmani ad yili ugmuḍ n wayen i d-iḍerrun deg wannar, deg wakud ulḥim.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Ass n umenzu n yennayer 2967 , tella-d temlilit tameqqrant i d-yesgerwen inemhalen d yinelmaden n tesnawiyin d yiɣerbazen yemgaraden, akken ad d-mlilen deg udrar n Ǧerğer icebhen s udfel amellal am ubernus.

 Tullas, lsant-d tiqendyar n leqbayel , usan-d seg tnemhalt n usegmi wid yesedduyen idles, Mass Boukhalfi d Mass Ali Amed , anemhal n uɣerbaz alemmas Larbi Mezani seg Wat Yanni Mass Iften Hamid d unemhal n uɣerbaz n Amer Ath chikh, Mass Boudinar, amaswaḍ n tmaziɣt n yiɣerbazen imenza d watas nniḍen, Tusa-d terbeɛt n ccna seg Wat Yanni i d-yewwi uselmad Mass Berdjane Yazid , tusa-d terbeɛt n ccna seg Tizi n Targa n Mekla , terbeɛt n ccna n uɣerbaz Amer At Chikh , usan-d daɣen, deg tesnawit n Tasaf, Akbil, At Hichem, At Ziri, aɣerbaz n telmeẓyin n Michli. Yella-d leqdic s timsikent n wallalen i sexdamen zik Leqbayel u mazal sexdamen kra deg-sen ar tura, temsikent n wallalen n taleɣt. Tella-d, diɣ, temsizzelt n tgella n leqbayel ( seksu s iyuzaḍ, tacewwaḍt, seksu n ubelluḍ, taɛesbant, aɣrum n leḥwal …) deg temkerḍit i d-yezgan deg yiwet n tkessart n uɣerbaz alemmas Amer Ath Chikh. Ula d imekli, yella-d deg uɣerbaz-agi. Ma d tameɣra, gan-tt deg tzeqqa tameqqrant n Yidles Matoub Lounes, deg Michli. Deg tazwara, tebda-d terbaɛt n uɣerbaz Amer Ath Chikh s tizlit n Karima ‘’A yemma’’, rnan-d tizlit n tefransist ‘’A dieu Monsieur le professeur’’, hdan-tt i yiselmaden yeffɣen lintrit, ccnan-itt-id s teqbaylit ‘’Ruḥ di lehna ay aselmad’’. Tameɣra-agi, isedda-tt Mass Ali Amed Mohammed , tella-d yiwet n temsizzelt n tmaziɣt : tiririt ɣef tuttriwin n yiswiren yemxalafen. Llan-d yisestanen ɣef yidles s umata akked wahil , kemmlen daɣen ccna terbeɛt n Wat Yanni s tezlit n Idir ‘’Adrar-inu’’, rnan-d acewwiq n Taoues Amrouche. Di leɛḍil mi ttarun yinelmaden n temsizzelt, Mass Ali Amed, yettawi-d isefra-ines igerrzen. Tɛedda-d yiwet seg uɣerbaz amenzu n Wat Yahia, tewwi-d ameslay ɣef umerḍil i d-yellan gar yennayer d furar. Taggara, fkan-asen arrazen i yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt n tɣuri deg umaḍal aɛrab, ma di timsizzelt ufraren-d yinelmaden n Miclii s 44 n tezmilin , At Yahia s 33 n tezmilin. Yella-d ufraq n yigerdasen i yakk inemhalen n yiɣerbazen yettekin deg tfugla-agi n yennayer 2967 , ssarmen aseggas ameggaz i yimaziɣen anida ma llan. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>
