 Zzit n uzemmur

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Slexset deg waman lḥemmez, irden akked yibawen., yiwen wass uqbel asewwi. Azekka-nni, rret-ten daxel n tasilt yeččuren d aman, ternum-asen lebṣel, zzit uzemmur akked lmelḥ.syin, txummem tasilt-nni. Ǧǧet-ten ad yeww azal n snat ɣer tlata n swayeɛ. Mi wwan, kkset aɣummu i wakken ad azyagen waman ara yilin d zyada.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Daya 

  
 Ass-nni n lğemεa 02/12/2016 ɣef 10h n uzal, i tebda tezrigt tis kraḍ n wussan n umezgun, i d-yellan deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen Dib Ali deg tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, yellan deg taddart n Ikhelouienne. Aseggas-agi, gan-tt d tajmilt i Mass Allam Said. Leqdic-a, thegga-t-id tiddukla tadelsant Itri n Uzekka n Ikhelouienne. Ma d ayen yerzan ahil yettwajerden deg leqdic-agi, yella-d ass-nni n sem 02 deg duǧember 2016, uldi s wudem unṣib n tedwilt-agi tis tlata ɣef 10h n ṣṣbah. Yella-d daɣen usenεet n waraten n tɣamsa i d-yettmeslayen ɣef umezgun d waṭas n uktuyen i d-yeğğa Mass Allam Said. Am wakken Lllant, diɣ, tfelwiyin n teklut n tiddukla-agi. Ma ɣef 14h, yella-d usenεet n yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun “Meryuma”, sɣur tarbaεt Tiliwa n Tizi Uzzu. Ma d ass-nni n sed 03 deg duǧember 2016, yella-d usenεet n kraḍ n tceqqufin n umezgun. Tamezwarut, tella-d d taceqquft n warrac “Arez d Tzizwit”, i d-tewwi terbaεt tafat n tiddukla “Itran” n Maâtkas. Ma d tis snat, tella-d ɣef 14h sɣur tarbaεt Tafejrit n tiddukla tadelsant “Ilmeẓyen n Usirem” n Ouadhia, ma ɣef 16h, yella-d usenεet n tecqquct tis kraḍ “Aḥeddad n Lqalus”, sɣur uxxam n Yilmeẓyen n Ouaguenoun. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella usenzi s ubuddu sɣur umyaru Adaoun Abdelghani, i d-ywwin adlis-is Tala n Yinzan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Amazigh Ghani 

  
 Di tirza-nneɣ ɣer At Xir, anda d-tella rreḥba n ufexxar, nemlal d Abderaḥman Dinar, anazur aɣerfan, amurar n l’accordéon. Nufa-t iṭtef amkan gar temzikniyen, yetturar, lɣaci ttnezzihen-as. Yuɣal-d sser tamurt, ddeqs aya ur nwala ara inazuren icban wigi, inazuren n «yizenqan», wid itturaren agitar, neɣ abyulon, neɣ allal nniḍen, imeddaḥen , imedyazen issawalen tamedyazt deg yizenqan neɣ di leswaq. Nnejlen ass-a neɣ snejlan-ten. Anda llan imedyazen iɣerfanen am Muḥend U-Yidir, i issawalen tameyazt deg uzniq di Tizi neɣ di ssuq deg wass n ssebt. Anda yella ucennay aɣerfan Hend n yiɛeẓẓugen i itekksen lxiq i lɣaci s tgiṭart deg yizenqan n Tizi neɣ n Lezzayer. Netta dɣa, mi t-id- ufan yimsulta, icennu deg ubrid, ad t-awin ɣer lkumisarya. Yezga icennu deg uzniq, sdat tesdawit n Lezzayer. Yiwen wass, ufan-t-id icennu sdat la «Fac centrale», dina di Lezzayer wwin-t, rẓan-as tagiṭart-is ssbaḥ, tameddit-nni kan mi as-id sserḥen, yuɣ-d larmunika, yuɣal ɣer uzniq. Anda llan wid icebḥen ibarden, i tekksen si lxater, itekksen lxiq i yimsebriden ? Anda llan, anda! Mi nufa Abderrahmane Dinar yetturar l’accordéon, lɣaci zzin-as, ttnezzihen, necraḥen wudmawen nefraḥ nezzeh, nemmekta zzman, nemmeka-d inaẓuren n yizenqan, nemmekta-d Hend … Mazal ziɣen ur ngiren ara. Yella Abderahmane Dinar n Umazul, anazur n At Frawsen. Yusa-d ɣer At xir, necden-tid imḍebren n rreḥba n ufexxar akken ad icebbaḥ tesweɛt. Mi t-nemlal nesteqsa-t d acu t-yewwin ɣer wallal n l’accordéon. Yenna-d : «Seg wasmi waleɣ di tilibizyu l’accordéon, sliɣ i sṣṣut-is, ikcem ul-iw, iɛjeb-iyi aṭas. Tamezwarut deg i t-nuleɣ, i t-ṭṭfeɣ gar yifassen-iw, ufiɣ-t deg uxxam n yidles Mouloud Mammeri deg Tizi-Wezzu. Yewwi-t-id yiwen, yetturar yis. Din din bɣiɣ ad sɛuɣ yiwen. Nudeɣ anda ara t-afeɣ i lbiɛ ulac, mačči aṭas i yetturar l’accordéon. yiwen wass, ufiɣ-t deg l’Artisanat deg Tizi-Wezzu, uɣaɣ-t-id xas akken mazal ur ssineɣ ara ad t-urareɣ. Acukan, bbakken ḥemleɣ allal-agi, ur ɛeṭṭleɣ ara lemdeɣ. Tura ssneɣ-t mliḥ alammi d nekk i t-ixedmen mi ara ixser kra deg-s. Tturareɣ yis deg yizenqan, di tmeɣriwin n taddart neɣ mi ara iyi-nnecdent tdukkliwin tidelsanin am tagi n At Xir. Lɣaci ḥemlen ad slen i l’accordéon, ur uɣen ara tanumi ttwalin-t. Yal tikkelt mi ara yi-d-necden, ttruḥuɣ tturareɣ baṭel, lfarḥ-iw, mi ara waliɣ wid ittnezzihen ferḥen. Mi ara d-yas webɛaḍ n yicennayen, sutureɣ deg-s ma yebɣa ad t-ḥamiɣ s l’accordéon. Aṭas n yicennayen akked urareɣ, seg-sen yella Aɛli Meẓyan. Iḥemmel aṭas l’accordéon.». Akka i t-id-yenna Abderahmane «lfarḥ-iw, mi ara waliɣ wid iyi-ttnezzihen ferḥen», akka i itekkes cwiṭ umdan si lxater-is, i tettili tumert, i tettiẓid tudert.

<p style="text-align: right;"> R.LASHEB 

  
 Lehwa i d-yewten deg wussan-a ineggura tessazzel leḥmali mačči d kra, almi I d-ters yiwet n tugdi tazegzawt ɣef yimezdaɣ. Ur qqimen yiberdan, wala wurtiyen almi deg yiwet n teswiɛt tbeddel ṣṣifa n taddart. Iqudas ara yessufɣen aman, wid yerǧan acḥal aya asizdeg s-ɣur yimḍebbren n tɣiwant ttwattun maḍi, almi I d-jbant leḥmali. Zdat liḥala yecban ta, d imezdaɣ I ibegsen iwakken ad ssuzfen lḥif I ten-id-yennulen. Dɣa, d abrid-nni n tjaddit I yuɣen tasebḥit n wass n lǧemɛa yezrin iwakken, meẓẓi meqqer, myefken ttiɛad s abrid ara ssizedgen akked yiqudas yellan yakan reglen. S tidet, cɣel yecban wa ur yezmir ad yeǧǧ imdanen di rrif, imi yal amezdaɣ s wacu n ttawil I s-d-yusa. Lḥasun, ur tettafeḍ anda ara tgeḍ afus, imi imdanen amzun akken d yiwen n ufus, ṭṭfen amkan am tirni, wa yessekfal-d, wa yettara deg yidis. Ɣer tmeddit n wass, azniq ibeddel udem, s kra n wayen I d-tewwi lḥemla yettwakkes, yettwaḍegger. Ma d iqudas, ur d-yeqqim deg-sen uxeclaw ara iḥebsen aman ma yella tuɣal-d lehwa. D tamsirt I d-fkan yimezdaɣ n La Crête-Rouge, ur nekrif ara ifassen-nsen ad rǧun melmi ara ara d-tass nnuba-nsen, ma ran-d lwelha yimḍebbren ɣer liḥala ideg llan. D ayen dɣa I aɣ-d-nnan waṭas n yimezdaɣ I d-nemmuger lawan n usizdeg mi d-nnan:” Ayen akka I nxeddem mačči d ayen I d-nesnulfa. Seg zik I d-nufa imawlan-nneɣ ttadden amzun d yiwen n urgaz di lawan n ddiq. Lḥemlat I d-yennulen taddart-nneɣ glant-d s kra n usexreb ama deg ubrid ama deg urtiyen, maca ass-a neddukkel-d iwakken ad nekkes ayen iḍurren imezdaɣ d widen akk yettɛeddin s ya. Ur nezmir ad nerǧu imḍebbren n tɣiwant. Limer d lebɣi d nutni ara yilin d imezwura ɣer cɣel yecban wa, meɛna skud mazal tadukli d tegmat, ur yezmir ad aɣ-yerẓ lḥal.” <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Smail. M  

  
 Yeqwa wawal iseggasen-agi ineggura ɣef usekkil swayes ara tettwaru tutlayt n tmaziɣit. Imi yal wa d anwa asekkil i yesmenyif ɣef wayeḍ, wa yebɣa win n tlatinit, wa yebɣa win n tifinaɣ, wayeḍ d win n taɛrabt. I lmed n wannect-agi, Tiddukkla tadelsant n tmaziɣt Lbacir Amellaḥ n Ichekaben yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Feraoun, deg lwilaya n Bgayet, thegga-d yiwet n temlilit meqqren ɣef teɣzi n ukuẓ n wussan, i lmed n usqerdec n temsalt n usiskel n tutlayt n tyemmat. Am wakken daɣen i ttekkin yimsuddsen-nniḍen, deg usuddes n ttiɛad-agi adelsan, yecban: Asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Feraoun, Asqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Bgayet, Asqamu unnig n timuzɣa, tanmehla n yidles n Bgayet akked tenmehla n yilmeẓyen d waddal n Bgayet…atg. Tebda s wudem unṣib temlilit-agi, ass-nni n larebɛa 23 deg waggur n ɣuct 2017, gan-tt d tajmilt i rebɛa n yiwudam yettwassen s umennuɣ-nsen ɣef tmaziɣt, wigi d Mulud At Mɛemmer, Lahcene Bahbouh, Hacène Sahki, akked Hocine Cherad. Llan-d deg-s yisaragen d yiskasiyen ɣef usekkil i wulmen ass-agi i tira n tmaziɣt, i d-xedmen yiselmaden d yisnalsiyen akked yimeɣnasen n tmaziɣt. Am wakken daɣen i d-llan yiskawan (les ateliers), isaragen iwezzlanen s ṣṣenf (table ronde), akked tmeɣra n ccna ɣer taggara. Ma d ahil yettwaxdamen ɣef teɣzi n rebɛa wussan, yella-d akka: deg wass-nni n larebɛa 23 ɣuct 2017, i d-yellan d ass amenzu n temlilit-agi, yella-d deg-s usṭerḥeb s yinebgawen d yimettekkiyen lehwi n 9h30 n ssbaḥ. Ma seg 14h00 alamma d 18h30, yella-d usarag d uskasi amezwaru sɣur Mass Sahki Hacène, d asnilsi d ameɣnas n tmaziɣt, tella-d s usentel: “Amagrad amaziɣ”. Ma seg 19h30 n yiḍ alamma yezgen yiḍ, yella-d usarag n umaru d umnadi d usnilsi Remdan Achab, yewwi usantel-agi: “Amezruy n tira n tmaziɣt s usekkil n tlatinit”, imeslay-d s telqey ɣef wamek i yebda usiskel s tlatinit i swayes yettaru ugdud amaziɣ yellan deg ugafa n tmurt n Lezzayer, d wanda yessaweḍ ass-a. Ma i wass-nni n lexmis 24 ɣuct 2017, i d-yellan d ass wis sin n temlilit-agi, seg 09h30 alamma d 11h30 llan-d yisekwan n tira n tmaziɣt. Ma seg 14h30 alamma yezgen yiḍ, llan-d sin n yisaragen-nniḍen. Amezwaru yella-d sɣur Mass Mohamed Hassani s usentel: “Acu yezwer ad aɣ-d-yawi udlis tirawalt d tjerrumt n tmaziɣt n Lahsene Bahbouh”. Ma d asarag wis sin yella-d sɣur Hocine Cherad, yettuneḥsaben d ameɣnas n tmaziɣt, yewwi asentel-agi: “Anwa agemmay alatini i iwulmen i tira tamirant, tussnant n tutlayt n tmaziɣt yeddan d lqern wis 21”. Ass-nni n sem 25 ɣuct 2017, i d-yellan d ass uqbel aneggaru n temlilit-agi, yella-d deg-s usenɛet d tɣuri n wayen xedmen wid i ttekkin deg yisikawan-nni n wass-nni wis sin. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella usarag ameẓyan deg tmeddit n wass, ijemɛed aṭas n yiwudam ɣer yiwet n ṭṭabla, wigi d: Mustapha Tidjet, Arezki Farad, Rachid Adjouat, akked Bachir Benanissa. Meslayen-d ɣef usentel-agi: “Asiskel n tutlayt tamaziɣt, gar usekkil n Tifinaɣ, d win Tlatinit, akked win n Taɛrabt”. Ma deg wass-nni n ssebt 26 ɣuct 2017, i d-yellan d ass aneggaru ideg tessuli temlilit-agi, tella-d deg-s tmeɣra n ccna meqqren i fyada n yimezdaɣ n taddart n Ikhekaben akked wid yerzan ɣer dinna i lmend n temlilit-a.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Imezdaɣ n 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, la ttrağğun s ccuq melmi ara d-yili ufraq n yixxamen, ama d wid n tallelt (70 melyun), ama d ixxamen imettiyen. Membeεd mi i d asen-d-ttunefken wazal n 120 n yixxamen n lemεawna d wazal n 12 n yixxamen imettiyen, i lfayda n yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant-agi, seg tazwara n useggas-agi n 2017. Ulamma imezdaɣ llan wid yettrağğun tisura n yixxamen-nsen yellan deg Tamda, llan wid yettrağğun idrimen-nni n 70 melyun, maca asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan (APC) n tɣiwant-agi n Ait Aissa Mimoun, yessutur deg wid teεna temsalt i wakken ad asen-d rnun ixxamen imettiyen d yidrimen-nniḍen. D ayen iɣef i d-yuɣal uselway n tɣiwant, Mass Akli Chabane : ‘’ d tidet nugi ad nefraq ixxamen-agi, acku d awezɣi ad nessefreḥ akk imezdaɣ-nneɣ. D amedya, nesεa azal n 1400 n zzmamat n ujerred n yixxamen n sebεin melyun, nekni fkan-aɣ-d kan idrimen i wazal n 120 n yixxamen, ruḥ tura kečč freq-iten. Nekni si tama-nneɣ, nger tiɣri ama i lwali n Tizi Uzzu, ama i Tneɣlaft n lebni d temdint, i wakken ad aɣ-d-rnun ixxamen neɣ ad aɣ-d-afen ttawil iwulen’’.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Timliliyin n ddabex i uɛiwen n tmuḍint Souhila 

 Tiddukkla n waddal n taddart n Uqawej s tallelt n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Ait Aissa Mimoun, suddsen-d aṭas n temliliyin n ddabex uḍar. Bdant ass-nni n sem 27 seg yennayer 2017, ma d timlilit n taggara ad d-tili ass n 8 meɣres 2017. Timeliliyin-agi, ttilint-d deg unnar aɣiwan n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, yellan deg “Tiplakin” tama n tesnawit n “Med Oudiai”. Ad d-nesmekti belli timliliyin-a, ttilint-d i wakken ad εiwnen s yidrimen-nni ara d-jemεen, yiwet n teqcict tamuḍint n taddart n Uqawej, tagi d tamsiwt “Sellah Souhila”. Am wakken diɣen ara d-tili tmeɣra n ccna sɣur waṭas n yinaẓuren n tama-agi n Wagennun, yecban Karim Khelfaoui, Mouh Oublaid, Ali Ferhati…atg. Ad d-yili wannet-agi ass n 8 deg meɣres 2017 deg umraḥ n usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan yellan deg “Levdhahi”, dima i wakken ad siwḍen ad d-jemεen ugar n yidrimen i tmuḍint-agi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 I lmend n waggur n remḍan, am yal aseggas, iḥegga-d Uxxam n yidles Mulud At mɛemmer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu yiwen n wahil d amesbaɣur, anda i d-necden aṭas n yinaẓuren i icennun leṣnaf yemxalafen n uẓawan n teqbaylit. Yebda wahil-a i d-yettuheggan seg wass n umenzu n yunyu ad yeddu alamma d 25 si yunyu i seg-i nella. Seg sass n umenzu armi d ass n kraḍ yecna uḥeddad n wawal Lounis Aït Menguellat, syin ass n 04 icna-d : Rabah Ouferḥat, Djamal Kaloun d Belaid Tagrawla. Iḍ n wass-a ( 05 yunyu ), ad tcebbaḥ taqaɛet tnazurt Nouaara, akken daɣen ad yili Brahim Tayeb d Ali Meziane. Ma yella d tameddit n wass n 06 yunyu, tiwaculin ad kksent lxiq s cnawi n yilmenzyen : Samir Sadaoui, Nourdine Debiane d Lyes, syin akkin iḍ n 07 d Taoues, Brahim Madani d Sonia Amrani i d-ttunecden akken ad suznen imferjen s cnawi-nsen. Ma d tameɣra n 08 yunyu, ad yili akked yiwen seg meqqranen n tezlit taqbaylit wagi d Akli Yaḥiatène, syin ad yecnu Ahcène nat Zaim. Ma yella d iḍ n 09 yunyu, ad ilin : Yacine Yefsah, Tanina d Rami Fares. 10 di yunyu d : Fiklan, Abdelhak sahel , i win iḥemmlen Said Youcef, Mayles d Larbi Yuba ha-ten-in ad cnun ass n 11 Yunyu. . Timeɣriwin-a, beddunt si 22h n yiḍ deg zeqqa n tmeɣriwin n Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri. Ahil mazal yettkemmil… .

  S.Yamani 

  
 Tiẓegwa, imudaɣ d yisekla i d-yettaken ccbaḥa n ugama, d nutni i yessizdigen azwu ssuffuɣen-d « luksijin », tessen azwu iselɣen. Seg wanect-a, nezmer ad d-nini aseklu d inzer n ddunit, seg-s nettawi-d tudert nessufuɣ lehlak d yilili. Azamul n Teqbaylit, ur nezmir ad t-nenker ɣas yella win i d-yennan mačči nneɣ maca akal yeẓra acu n uẓar i yeṭṭef, yeẓra ugdud d acu i yezreɛ. Tazemmurt, ur telli d tin yezmer bnadem ad tt-yettu neɣ ad yettu azal-is. Tazemmurt, d aseklu yettidiren di temnaḍin i d-yezzin i yilel agrakal, d azamul n talwit d lehna. Tḥemmel aṭas n tafat, tesɛa tafga tumtint (teǧhed). Iferrawen-is, ur ɣellin ara am unebdu am tegrest, zgan d izegzawwen ldin d ileggaɣen deg udem n ufella d iḥercawen, cwiṭ deg udem n wadda, teǧǧuǧug di tefsut. Llant kra n tzemrin i d-imeqqin kan akka weḥd-sent di tẓegwa, qqaren-asent azebbuj (aḥecad), ttleqiment medden akken ad yuɣal d tizemrin. Asɣar n tzemmurt, tiɣmi-ines d tawraɣt sdaxel, d ayen i t-yeğğan ad yettemcabi ɣer yiɣed. Di tagara, tewwi-d ad d-nemmeslay ɣef wazal n yisekla d yidgan n tizegzewt di temdinin anda yettluɣu mliḥ wuzwu, ma yella ulac ayagi d acu ara s yesneqsen abluleɣ n wuzwu? Ma yella ulac tizegzewt, anda ara sgunfun lɣaci icedhan agama d ubeḥri zeddigen ? D acu i d ccbaḥa i tezmer ad tt-id-tmager tiṭ, ma tuɣal temnaḍt d ssrayat d yixxamen ihi. Tifrat d azwu n yisekla di yal tardast n wakal ur nebni, d useḥbiber ɣef yal aẓar n yisekla yellan.

  Adaoun Abdelghani. 

  
 Agguren-agi ineggura, ṭṭuqtent twaculin yessuturen di temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Di yal tama n yiberdan imeqqranen, ad naf teẓẓel twacult deg-s la tessutur, ladγa tiwaculin n ’’yiminigen’’ : Nijer, Mali d Suriya mebla ma nettu tiwaculin tizzayriyin yellan yakan si zik. Teṣbiḥ neγ taktabt n leqran deg yiwen ufus, deg  wayeḍ ad naf  taḍebsit i yidrimen. Ababat d tyemmat ad d-fessren arraw-nsen am sselεa, ur d-cliεen la deg urγu n unebdu-nni, wala deg ugris n usemmiḍ-agi. Awi-d kan tadrimt, d aya i d iswi-nsen ; awi-d kan ad ssergagin iḥulfan n yimdanen. Ula d  timetti tedda di lεeb-nsen. Mačči d lemεawna i dir, meεna d yir tannumi i asen-snaγen armi i asen-tuγal tmetrit d lxedma. Σlaḥsab n yikumirsiyen uγur ttawin ṣṣerf i d-ttḥellin, llan wid i d-yettṣerrifen ugar n 3 n yimelyan deg wass, ladγa, Isuriyen-nni yettmetran deg ubrid aγelnaw.

 Xas ulamma dduwla texdem-asen ttawilat anda ara ttilin, meεna nutni ugin-ten. Γef wakken i d-qqaren yimusnawen n tnefsit, timetrit-agi tessegray-d tawaγit tameqqrant γef yigerdan-nni imecṭaḥ. Nnan-d d akken asmi ara imγuren, ad d-rren ttar di tmetti i ten-yeğğan deg ubrid ur ssinen lḥamu n uxxam. Akka, dγa, i ttawin yir abrid deg tudert-nsen. Yerna cγel am wa, yuγal d lewrata γer twaculin tizzayriyin : akka ara naf taqcict-nni swayes ssuturen, yakan, tura mi akka meqqret ciṭ, tuγal d nettat i yeṭṭfen amekkan n wid i tt-id-yettawin zik. Aṭas deg-sen i yesεan ttawilat imeqqranen, meεna ugin ad ğğen aya. Akken i as-qqaren ‘’ansi iεedda uγerda n leflas, yeddbeε-it gma-s’’ neγ ‘’Yessers uḥeddad afḍis, yerfed-it mmi-s’’

 Ha-t-an waqila, Nijir teḍleb-d di Lezzayer i wakken ad tejmeε arraw-is. Seg wassmi ay slan, dγa,  bdan la ttbeddilen imekwan… 

<p style="text-align: right;">Hocine.M   

  
 Ass n lǧemɛa yezrin, imezdaɣ n La Crête-Rouge deg tɣiwant n Leɛǧiba myefken ttiɛad s aɣerbaz amenzu n taddart-nsen iwakken ad xedmen yiwet n twizi n usizdeg d useggem n yiwet n terga i d-iɛeddan zdat lakul ideg qqaren warraw-nsen.

 D ilmeẓyen neɣ d imeqranen, d tirebbaɛ i d-ttasen yal wa s wacu i d-yegla d ttawil iwakken ad sbeɛden s kra yellan d amihan ɣef yinelmaden. Imi d yiwen n cɣel yuḥwaǧen aṭas n wallalen, imezdaɣ n Tqaɛet yeɛyan deg uraǧu gezmen-tt deg rray iwakken ad d-swejden ayen i iwulmen s tedrimt-nsen. Ɣef waya, yal amezdaɣ yewwi-d ayen iwumi yezmer, wa d rrmel, wa d ssima, wa d uzzal wayeḍ d iɣil-is. «Nefra-tt gar-aneɣ iwakken ad nekkes tifxet-a yettwandin i warraw-nneɣ. Yal ass nettraǧu aniwa ara yeɣlin deg uxemmuj yecban wa, mi akken imḍebbren terza temsalt qqnen allen-nsen zdat tudert n yinelmaden. Newweḍ ɣer tallit anda ala win yenṭerren ara yeḥrirten ! Wamma, limer d lebɣi llan srabes yettuxessen I cɣel-a ara xedmen acḥal aya. Meɛna, skud I mazal tagmat, agerruj I aɣ-d-ǧǧan imezwura-nneɣ ur inegger-a. Tacemlit d tin yessuzufen lḥif di tudrin, ihi ass-a nekni nerra-as azal, nemlal-d !” Dɣa d wigi I d imeslayen I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n ubabat yerfan zdat tsusmi n yimḍebbren ɣef lḥif ideg ttidiiren yinelmaden. Imezdaɣ n Tqaɛet heggan-d daɣ iwakken ad bnun zdat n uɣerbaz kra n tseddarit I yinelmaden iwakken deg wussan-a n tegrest ur ttɣimin ara I lehwa d usemmiḍ. D yiwen n usenfar s wazal-is iɣer kkren yimezdaɣ n taddart. Ayen I d-ijebden lwelha-nneɣ mi nerza ɣer twizi n yimezdaɣ n taddart-a, d anabit n yimḍebbren ama n tɣiwant neɣ n srabes nniḍen.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Smail. M 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Yettban-d mazal ad tḍul tiɣri-a n ‘’Afalu n lmut’’ i fkan yinehharen n ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9 i ufalu n Xerraṭa, i d-yezgan s wazal n 60 n yikilumiṭren seg twilayt n Bgayet. Dɣa, deffir n ubaxix i yeḍran ayyuren iɛeddan ɣef ssebba n ukamyun iwumi yeqqers uḥebbas, teḍra-d ddurt-a kan, twaɣit-nniḍen n ubrid i yeglan s yiwet n terwiḥt, daxel ufalu-a. Imi llan wid i tent-yuɣen s unṭer wwin-ten ɣer sbiṭar. Am dima, yeḥḍer deg usehwu-a (accident) yiwen n ukamyun n ttɛebya yeẓẓayen. Ɣas ma d aɛeddi iweɛren sɣur yiwet n tkerrust i yellan deffir n wayen i d-yeḍran, ɣef leḥsab n waṭas n tnagiyin. Iban-d segmi yemdel ubrid wis sin n Ɛecba, ideg ttilin-d yiqeddicen n ussusaɛ, izad umihi (danger) n twuɣa s sin n yiberdan ahat. Ladɣa imi seg wacḥal-aya i yeffeɣ wawal ɣef ufalu-a, belli ilaq-as ad as-yemmag ureqqaɛ s telqayt akken ad yili iwulem cwiṭ i tikli, ad neqsen deg-s yisehwa.War ma nettu ikumyan imeqqran i yettilin, deg waṭas n tikkal, d ssebba n yibaxixen-a n ubrid. Ihi, deg tsemhuyt-a n yigeffuren d texser n tegnawt, ala aḥader i izemren ad d-yemneɛ bab n tkerrust seg tmettant.

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

<div> 
  
 Akken i as-yenna winna :’’ deg uxxam, tameṭṭut tettwet γer uqadum-is, di lxedma, tettwet γer deffir-is.’’     I lmend n wass agraγlan n mgal tiyitiwin n tlawin i d-yettasen yal 25 deg unbir n yal aseggas, thegga-d tuddsa Amnesty International s lemεawna n tiddukla tadelsant ‘’Amusnaw’’ n Tizi Uzzu yiwet n tmesbanit deg umraḥ n usalay n temdint n Tizi Uzzu anda i d-yella umeslay gar wid i d-iheggan leqdic-a akked yimdanen i d-yerzan γer din γef yiswiyen n tmesbanit-a. Aṭas n lγaci i d-yusan : wa d abrid kan, wayeḍ teεna-t temsalt. Mass Aomar Ait Slimani, yiwen gar yimḍebbren n Amnesty Internationnal, yenna-d :’’ mebεed mi nexdem asarag d tγamsa di Lezzayer tamaneγt, ass-a nexdem timsikent i lmend n wass agraγlan n mgal tiyitiwin n tlawin i wakken ad d-nessefhem leqdic-agi-nneγ i d-yezgan mgal tiyitiwin n tlawin ladγa tamsalt n lḥarma. Neḍleb, di&amp;gamma,; deg yimḍebbren n Lezzayer i wakken ad gen leqwanen ara yesseḥbibren γef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut.’’ Deg yiwen ulγu i d-tessufeγ tuddsa-a, teḍleb ad tẓer aneγlaf amezwaru Mass Sellal. Ula d Mass Hachemi Touzane, aselway n Tiddukla tadelsant ‘’Amusnaw’’, ikemmel deg ubrid-a, yenna-aγ-d:’’ tikti-a tekka-d sγur imeγnasen n tiddukla-nneγ. Ihi, i lmend n wass agraγlan n mgal tiyitiwin n tlawin, nhegga-d timsikent-agi si 8 n sbeḥ armi d 4 n tmeddint i wakken ad nili mgal tamḥeqqranit n tmeṭṭut. I wakken ad d-nebeggen, di&amp;gamma,; d akken leqwanen-agi n Lezzayer ilaq ad beddlen, ur ilaq ara ad yili miḥyaf gar tmeṭṭut d urgaz deg yizerfan-nsen. Aṭas n yimdanen i iferḥen imi neṣṣaweḍ nessufeγ-d ugur-agi γer berra. Zik yella kan daxel n radyu d tilibizyu.’’

     Akken yebγu tili tiγri n yimdanen-agi, tamsalt teεna timetti s timmad-is. Ma yella deg uxxam d tameṭṭut i tessimyifen mmi-s γef yelli-s di yal taγawsa, amek ara d-tawi azref-is di berra? Ma yella di lğame&amp;epsilon,; ccix ad yeḥseb tameṭṭut d ciṭan, d nettat i d aγbalu n wuguren akken ma llan u tameddit d tameṭṭut-is ara as-yessirden iḍerran-is, amek ara d-tawi azref-is deg uxxam ? Ma yella deg udlis n uγerbaz, ad naf d akken yura-d aqcic deg waddal, taqcict di tkuzint yerna d tiselmadtin i t-yesselmaden, amek ara tesεu azref di tmetti ? Ma yella taqcict yefka-tt baba-s d tarzeft i yirebraben γer Suriya neγ Lεiraq u nettat teqbel, amek ara d-tnadi, ass-a, γef uzref-is ? 

     Ihi, akken i as-yenna winna, daγen :’’ win yebγan ad tṣeggem, iṣeggem iman-is.’’

 Ula d argaz, s lḥeqq-is : yugi azref n tmeṭṭut s zik akken i aγ-t-id-tenna Nna Ourida deg usefru.

 ‘’Qqimeγ armi d yiwen wass,

 Iger-iyi ubrid γer gma.

 Yenna-yi-d : mreḥba s uletma,

 A tin ṛẓagen am ddwa.

 A gma, ur γelleḍ ara,

 Yeğğa-yi-d baba d yemma.’’

 Qqimeγ armi d yiwen wass,

 Iger-iyi ubrid γer εemmi.

 Yenna-yi-d : mreḥba s yelli,

 A tin rẓagen am ilili.

 A gma, ur γelleḍ ara,

 Yeğğa-yi-d baba ḥnini.’’

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Ass-nni n ttlata (ahad) yezrin i d-banen yigemmaḍ n ukayad n taggara n uswir alemmas (BEM) n useggas aɣurbiz 2016-2017. Ɛlaḥsab n tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, azal n 13313 i ijerden iman-nsen deg umuɣen n usεeddi n ukayad-a, acu kan ala 13246 deg-sen i t-sεeddan. Leḥsab n wid i t-id-yewwin, yelḥaq 8878, s lqidar n 67, 02%, s wakka i d-tḥela amkan amezwaru deg umyezwar I tikkelt tis 9 deg wakal aɣelnaw. Ma d amḍiq amenzu n umyezwar n yinelmaden deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yuɣal i tnelmadt Djaouti Lydia, yeqqaren deg uɣerbaz alemmas Hadjeb Mohammed Iloula, s tneqiṭ n 18,72. Ma amḍiq wis sin tḥara-t-id tnelmadt Nacer Lyna, yeqqaren deg uɣerbaz alemmas Loutfi n Tizi Uzzu, s tenqiṭ n 18,72 ula d nettat. Ma d inelmaden i yewwin ugar n 18, wwḍen 18 n yinelmaden, ma d wid i d-yewwin ugar n 17 leḥqen 131. Ma deg wayen yeεnan amyezwar n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen: d aɣerbaz alemmas Nacaf Mohammed Akarou deg Azeffoun i yewwin amkan amezwaru s wazal n 97, 06 %. Ad d-nesmekti d akken lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu d tikkelt tis ṭẓa (09) ideg i tewwi amḍiq amezwaru deg umyezwar deg ukayad-a n BEM deg wakal aɣelnaw. Ad d-nesmekti diɣ belli agemmuḍ amatu yewweḍ ar 73,68% s yinelmaden-nni iɛeddan d ugemmuḍ amatu n useggas.

  A. A. 

  
 Ass n ssebt iɛeddan, 14 deg waggur n tuber 2017, ɣef 13h00 n uzal, i d-tella tmeɣra n ccna n tallalt i yettwaxdamen deg uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer, i lfayda n ugrud-agi Adam. D tameɣra i d-thegga Tiddukkla taɣelnawt n Twizi n Tizi Uzzu, s lemɛawna n Tenmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, Axxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer. D tameɣra meqqren i d-yellan deg tzeqqa tameqqrant n Uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu. D tameɣra ideg ccnan 06 n yifennanen-agi : Arezki Ouali, Siham Stiti, Rachid Hamouche, Hacéne Ahres, Massi,…atg. Anekcum ɣer tmeɣra-agi yella-d s wazal n 300 DA kan, d azal uzmil (prix syomblique). Ad d-nesmekti belli, Tiddukkla-agi, texdem leqdic-agi i wakken ad d-tejmaɛ ayen iwumi tezmer i wakken ad tent-tefk i ugrud-agi Adam, i yeɛan kan 4 n yiseggasen deg lɛemer-is, i yenḍerren aṭas tineggura-agi.

   A. A 

  
 I wakken ad tkemmel amecwar-is terbaɛt n Lezzayer deg teqbuct n tefriqt, ilaq-as ad terbeḥ tarbaɛt n Sinigal u ad tessirem ad ad texser terbeɛt n Tunes, tameddit-a. Xas akken, ad yili deg-s leḥsab, meḥsub ur ilaq ara i tarbaɛt n Zimbabwi, ad terbeḥ s ugemmuḍ ameqqran. Ma ulac, d taneggarut-agi ara iɛeddin ɣer uswir 1/4. Acu kan, aya d leḥsabat mačči d annar. Tidet n unnar, dayen-nniḍen. Ɣef wakken i d-tban terbaɛt taɣelnawt n lezzayer deg temliliyin-is, ama d tin akked Zimbabwi neɣ tinna akked Tunes, u ma tkemmel deg lɛeb am winna, asirem ɣer uswir 1/4, yettban-d d awezɣi. Ladɣa,imi tebɣa terbaɛt n Sinigal, ad d-ternu rbeḥ-is wis tlata akked terbaɛt n Lezzayer. ‘’Ad nqabel tarbaɛt n Lezzayer, akken i nqubel timezwura-nni. Nhegga-d timlilit i wakken ad tt-nerbeḥ’’, akka i d-yenna usleɣmay n Sinigal, Aliou Cissé. Am wakken yessaram, diɣ, ad tili temlilit tgerrez imi ‘’aṭas i tt-yettraǧun. Deg unnar, ad ilin aṭas n yimyuraren ifazen. Ɣef waya i nessaram ad tili timlilit igerrzen. Xas ulamma, mačči kan ɣer yimyurar ifazzen i teqqim imi aql-aɣ la nettwali deg terbaɛt n Lezzayer i ikesben imyurar igerrzen acu kan mebla igemmaḍ ifazen’’, ikemmel yenna usleɣmay Cissé. Tarbaɛt n Lezzayer i ḥesben d taqacuct n Tefriq uqbel ad tebdu teqbuct. Acu kan, akken telɛeb timlilit-is tamezwarut akked Zimbabwi, tessban-d aswir-is d ttbut, aswir adday d wuguren i tesɛa yakan deg tmliliyin-nni n teqbuct n ddunit. D tarbaɛt s yimyurar yetturaren mebla lebɣi, mebla lemqadra, wammag tirrugza, fiḥel ma nenna-d. Ma nekkes, ahat, Mahrez akked M’Bolhi, wiyaḍ d nutni i yesxesren tarbaɛt-nsen : llan d sebbat n yiswiyen i ikecmen deg ucebbak-nsen. Ula d Raouraoua, yekcem sbiter n Fransa akken tekfa temlilit-nni n wass-nni n lexmis akked Tunes. Ɛlaḥsab n kra n yiɣmisen, akken texser terbaɛt n Lezzayer, yehlek Raouraoua. Iruḥ srid ɣer Fransa i wakken ad idawi dinna. Tameddit-a, ayen yellan deg tasilt, ad t-id-yessali uɣenja. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine Moula 

 
  
 Akken kan uɣalen warrac s aɣerbaz u bdan keccmen deg tannumi n useggas amaynut 2016/2017, yenneqlab fell-asen waddad. Deg ddurt iɛeddan, teḥbes leqraya deg yiɣerbazen n Ayt Smaɛel, qqimen yinelmaden sin n wussan war timsirin. Aya, yuɣ lḥal yekka-d seg yisundiden (grèves) i gan kra n yiselmaden i tikkelt tamezwarut segmi tfukk teswiɛt n kraḍ n wayyuren n yimuras. Iselmaden-agi, ɛla ḥsab ayen i d-qqaren, yella-d wugur i ten-yeǧǧan ad beṭṭlen lawan-a aseḥfeḍ, imi ur msefhamen akken ilaq akked sindika i d-yettmeslayen s yisem n uɣlif n usegmi. Meḥsub, iɣaḍ-iten lḥal ɣef wayen i ten-yeɛnan. Ttwalin iman-nsen, ur wwin azref-nsen amek i t-bɣan. Yezmer mačči d yiwet n tɣawsa i d-cerrḍen yiselmaden-nni bac ad uɣalen ɣer umahil-nsen. Ad d-nebder seg-sent, asuter i ssuturen ad asen-rnun adrim i tmayyurt-nsen, acku tin i d-teṭṭfen ur ten-tseɛɛed ar tura. Kkaten ladɣa ad ffɣen tastaɣt (retraite) deg semmuset n tmerwin (50) n yiseggasen. Ɣas ma mgaradent ahat ssebbat i yellan deffir useḥbes n tɣuri, ur yettwazdi yiswi, maca tikti n yisundiden mtawan fell-as. Daymi nessaram ad tefru taluft s lemɣawla, ad uɣalen waman i yiɣeẓran-nsen. Imi ma teqqimliḥala amek tella, ma yettwakemmel uxdam n yisundiden-nni amek i d-qqaren, tagnit ad tewɛer ugar. Dɣa, annect-a yesmektay-aɣ-d ɣef yilindi asmi tettwaḥbes leqraya aṭas n wakud akken reqqɛen yiɣilifen. Izerreɛ daɣen asḥissef ɣef warrac-nneɣ, acku akken yebɣu yili lḥal, d nutni i d iseflan imezwura n yiɣimi-a i yettuḥettamen fell-asen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaïsa Khalifi 

  
 Taɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun i d-yezgan deg ugafa n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i yebaԑden fell-as azal n 15 km. Taɣiwant-agi ideg llant 23 n tudrin, tettwassen iseggasen-agi ineggura s lexsas meqqren deg waṭas n yiḥricen d yisenfaren yemgarden n tudert tatrat, gar-asen: lgaz n temdint, yir liḥala n yiberdan, Internet, aman n tissit…atg. Acu kan tikkelt-agi, yerna-d ula d aɣbel n ttawilat n uṣiweḍ ɣer yiɣerbazen. Mazal imezdaɣ n 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant-agi n Ait Aissa Mimoun, ssuturen tuɣalin n lkiran yettawin ɣer yizɣerbazen, anda ttafen iman-nsen inelmaden gar sin wuguren. Aɣbel amezwaru d lexlaṣ i ttxeliṣen yal ass gar 80 ar 100 DA i, ladɣa wid yeqqaren deg tesnawiyin. Ma d aɣbel wis sin d ttiwḍin s aɣerbaz ɣef 08h n sbeḥ. Imi acḥal n tikkal ur ttawḍen ara inelmaden deg lwaqt ɣer uɣerbaz. Sseba akk n wanect-a ; d ulɣu-nni i d-yefka useqamu aɣarfan aɣiwan (A P C) n Ait Aissa Mimoun, ideg yekkes akk lkiran yettawin ama ɣer tesnawit n Muḥmed Wediεi yellan deg Teplakin, ama d tin yettawin ɣer tesnawiyin n Tizi Uzzu, gar-asent- Rabaḥ Sṭembuli, Lxensa, Faḍma n Sumer… Ad d-nesmekti kan, d akken lkiran-agi yellan ttawint ɣer tesnawiyin, nnefṣ tettxelis-it tɣiwant, ma d nnefṣ-nni-niḍen, ttxelisen-t inelmaden s waggur. Acu kan seg wass-nni lhed mi uɣalen warrac ɣer tesnawit, ulac lkiran n uṣiweḍ. Ma d tid yettawin ɣer yiɣerbazen ilemmasen (CEM), yettabaεen ɣer tɣiwant, ḥebsen ixeddamen-nsent ɣef lexdma ɣef teɣzi n 3 wussan, seg wass n ltnayen armi d lexmis-a yezrin. D ayen i yeğğan inelmaden deg uɣerbaz n sin yimeɣrasen Tellal Muḥend n Uqawej yeqqaren ad ruḥen azal n 5 ikilumitren ɣef uḍar. D ayen yeğğan imezdaɣ n tɣiwant-agi, daɣen, ad d-gren tiɣri yerna ad ssuturen deg wid teԑna temsalt, gar-asen imeḍberen n tɣiwant Ait Aissa Mimoun, iɣef yella ɣef uqerruy-is Mass Aki Chabane, i wakken ad d-afen tifrat i wugur-a n uṣiweḍ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> ADAOUN Abdelghani 

  
 Am yiseggasen iɛeddan, ur d-yelli kra n ubeddel rrif n yilel n waɣir n Bgayet, deg tsemhuyt-a n unebdu.

 Yal amḍiq i yebɣa yiwen ad t-iẓur i uɛumu, ilaq ad yawi yid-s aṭas n tedrimt swayes ara ixelles ayen ara yesseqdec. Seg uqiḍun i yeɣlayen i ukraw, ɣer uneɣsar (parking) s 100 n yidinaren, i yettuḥettmen akken ur yettaweɣ wara takerrust, ɛeddi ɣer ubduz s 100 n yidinaren-nniḍen…atg. Armi i d-iban i kra umḍiq-a n tukksa n uqebli, yecba akk imukan n ttjara, am ssuq, anafag, atg. « A win yufan a Rebbi ad tili teftist d amkan n tukksa ɣef lxaṭer i yal amdan, yesɛa neɣ uhu. Maca ha-t-an aẓawali ur yezmir ad n-yerzu weḥd-s, aniɛad s twacult». D awal n yiwen n ubabat seg Ayt Smaɛel. Ilaq ad d-nini deg wussan yezrin, yeffeɣ-d wawal ula sɣur lwali n Bgayet s timmad-is akken ad ilint teftisin ldint baṭṭel i medden. Meɛna, seg tama-nniḍen, wid yeddewwiren i sswaḥel-a teɣzi n unebdu ur ufin s wudem ilaqen taɛessast d lḥers fell-asen. Zgan ttḥettimen ɣef yal aḥewwas, d amerray neɣ uhu, ad ixelles idinaren ma ulac ɣas ad yuɣal ansi d-yusa. D ugur ameqqran i yeqqimen ur yefri ar iḍa, deg teswiɛt ideg simmal rezzun medden ɣer teftisen, wissen ahat ad afen kra n tesmuḍi, imi azɣal yewweḍ ɣer tla-s.
