 Zik, lɣerba teqher ulawen n wid yellan di tmurt lak d wid yerzan ɣer ynig. Ala kra n wawalen id d-yettawḍen ssin idisan deg tegnitt ɣer tayeḍ s lmend n tebratt deg watas n tikwal. Illa melmi, ma myagaren sin n taddart deg yiwen wemkan deg yinig, ttemsawadhen-d slam i wid yellan dagi. Deg watas n tikwal, ur d-qaren ara tidett, neɣ ur tt-id-tteglamen ara akken tella. Atas i yettfaren ayen ttidiren. Llan kra ttexnunusen deg lhif, maca ur d-eqqaren ara ayen ten-yettaɣen akken ur steɣbilen ara at wexxam. Llan kra sbedden ixxamen-nniḍen akken wḍen.Tabratt tella d ttawil ttragun yemdanen am wagur n lɛid. Iccer-nni n lkaghed yettarra-d acmumeh ɣer wudem n yemdanen umu tejreh lɣerba ulawen-nsen. Imdanen, zzik, ur ɣrin ara. Mi ara arun ne ɣad d-seɣren tabratt ad gren tiɣri i wid yeɣran akken ad sen-d-sfehmen timsal.

 Di tmurt, d tilawin i yhulfan atas s lefraq-agi. Asentel-agi yegla-d, ama deg tmedyazt, ama di cna, s iḥulfan n ṣbeṛ d lxiq. Ger tlawin i yecnan ɣef yinig ad d-nebder nna Crifa, aɣerbaz n tezlitt taqbaylit, tala ur nettɣar. Nna Crifa terfed asefru d amwanes-is akken ad tecnu ɣef lehmala “Ay aẓerẓuṛ», ger tezlatin s wayes tettwassen. Tceyyeɛ afrux-agi akken ad s-d-yawi lexbaṛ n win tḥemmel.

 “Ah ay aẓerẓuṛ

 Tbeɛ-it ɣer lbabuṛ

 In-as i wacu iyi-iɣuṛṛ

 Ak yexdeɛ Ṛebbi a ṛṛay-iw

 Mliɣ-as ul-iw

 Yenna-d lxiṛ ɣer zdat”

 Atas n tlawin, ladɣa, sufuɣen-t-ed s usefru tugdi-nsen-t, ihulfan, lak d wayen yak yettqerriɛen i yiḍes ad d-yers ɣef cfer. Deg snat n tezlatin-nniḍen nna Crifa ad d-sefru.

 “Ay aɣṛib sɛu laɛqel

 Nesla ijaḥ ṛṛay-ik

 Lɣerba ur tettdummu ara

 Asmi ara ɣlin wuglan-ik

  yeǧa-iyi netta iṛuḥ ɣer l’Paris

 Ma d nek ṛwiɣ lemḥani »

  « Di lɣeṛba yeɛṛeq yisem-is

  Ur neẓṛi d acu i t-ifnan

 Yettu tamurt n lejdud d lwaldin i t-id-iṛebban

 Teyyara i d-yusa deg yiḍ

 Awi-iyi ɣer wusbiɣ n tiṭ

 Ma d keč a xuya tṛuḥeḍ

 I nek ɣer menhu iyi-d-eǧǧiḍ » 

                  Fatiha K

  
 Axxam n yedles n Mulud At-Mεemmar n temdint n Tizi-Wezzu, yesduri-d ddurt-agi yezrin tusnawt γef Kateb Yasin s teγzi n 02 wussan 28 d 29 tuber 2015, s usentel « Kateb Yacine, d amaru bu tira yegten d udmawen ». Dγa deg yisaragen s yiskasiyen ixedmen yisdawanen, wwin-d awal s telqay γef umecwar n tsekla n ungal, akken isqardcen awal γef tmezgunt n Kateb Yasin. akken id-tella temzikent γef tudert n umyaru akked umeskar n Nedjma (Itri), asenεet n tecquft n umezgun, syen segran s tγuri n kra n yeḍrisen n Kateb. Timlilit-agi tesdduritt-id tzeqqa tameẓyant n leqdicat n wexxam n yedles n Mulud At-Mεemmar n Tizi-Wezzu anda iḥedren deqs n yinelmaden n tsedawit n Tizi-Wezzu i ilemden tutlayt n Tefransist. Ma yella d imsaragen yellan deg ahil n temlilit tusnawt, Dr Fatima Malika Boukhelou , d taselmadt deg tutlayt akked tɣerma tafransist di tsedawit n Tizi Wezzu, id-yeγran aḍris n Yasine , « Seg yimbiddalen n Uɣyul n Afulay, ɣer uɣebbar n lefhama n Kateb Yacine neɣ tasmedna taɣerfant i umi d-ulsen anulfu ». Syen mass Ali Chebili , d aselmad deg ugezdu n tefransist di tsedawit n Tizi-Wezzu, yeγra-d aḍris « Nedjma, tira yegten d tuɣac n ugzam neɣ aɣewweɣ n cbaḥa ». Ma yella d mass Mohamed Lakhdar Maouga, aselmad deg tsedawit n Lezzayer yemmeslay-d γef « Timmuzɣa ɣur Kateb Yacine ». Tighilt Mohamed Amokrane, d amusnaw, d aselmad n tutlayt n tefransist di Tizi-Wezzu, d anaẓur imi d argaz n umezgun yemeslay-d γef azal n ungal Nedjma s usentel « Azamul n Nedjma », ma yella d « Tawinnest n ttaṛ : aseɣret n tegrawla) s ɣur Aini Bettouche, d taselmadt taqburt n tesdawit n tsekla akked tutlayin di Tizi Wezzu. Axxam n umezgun amnaḍan n Tizi-Wezzu i yewwin isem n umyaru kateb Yasin, yesduri-d tagara n temlilit s tecquft n umezgun id-ksen deg yeḍrisen n Kateb Yasin, id-uraren yinelmaden n tsedawit n Tizi-Wezzu. Kateb yasin ilul ass n 6 ɣuct aseggas 1929 di temdint n Qsenṭina, deg usamer n tmurt n Lezzayer. Mbeɛd mi yekcem ɣer uɣerbaz n uselmed n Leqqran aseggas n 1936, yuɣal yekcem ɣer wulmud deg uɣerbaz n tesnawit afransawi. Di 8 maggu 1945, yesεa 15 yiseggasen kan di leεmer-is, yekki di tmesbanit-nni i d-yellan deg temdint n Sṭif mgal lbaṭel imahrasen n tmurt n Fransa, yugi tudert n ddel. Dɣa yettwaḥbes 4 wagguren. Yemma-s tɣil dayen yettwanɣa, dɣa ifukk fell-as usirem, tesleb. Tkemmel ussan-is di sbiṭar n Blida. Aseggas n 1946, yessufeɣ-d adlis-ines amezwaru, d amud n isefra. Di 1948, yuɣal d aneɣmas deg uɣmis Alger Républicain. Aseggas n 1951, yunag ɣer tmurt n Fransa. Di 1955, yessufeɣ-d yiwen n udlis Le cadavre encerclé. Aseggas mbeεd, di 1956, yessufeɣ-d adlis-nni yettwassnen ugar wiyaḍ, win i as-yernan azal, wagi d Nedjma di tizrigin n Seuil. Aseggas 1959, yessufeɣ-d Le cercle des représailles. Gar yiseggasen n 1966 d 1970, yerna yessufeɣ-d sin n yedlisen-nniḍen, wigi Le polygone étoilé akked L’homme aux sandales de caoutchouc. Asmi i d-yuɣal Yasin Kateb yettidir di Lzzayer, yeṭṭaxer i tira n yedlisen, yuɣal yettaru amezgun s tutlayt n taεrabt n Lezzayer, dɣa yesbedd yiwet n tdukla n umezgun d netta i yellan ɣef uqerruy-is. Gar tceqqufin-ines yettwassnen ; Rrfed tabalizt-ik a Muḥ (1971), Tiɣri n tlawin aseggas (1972), Ṭrad n 2000 yiseggasen (1974), Palestine yettwaxedεen (1975). Kateb Yasin yecrew-d aṭas n warrazen s tegzi-s. Aseggas n 1963, yewwi arraz n Jean Amrouche, i d-tsuddes tamdint n Florence n tmurt n Ṭelyan. Aseggas n 1975, yewwi arraz n Lotus n yimyura. Aseggas n 1980, yewwi arraz amenzu n yizem i umezgun, Académie Simba et Corriere Africano. Aseggas n 1987, yewwi arraz ameqqran aɣelnaw n tsekla i as-tefka taɣlift n yedles n tmurt n Fransa. Ayen i d-yeğğa Kateb Yasin d aggeruj ur nettfakka, tisutwin i d-iteddun ad t-id-afen. Yasin yemmut deg waggur n tuber aseggas 1989 di temdint n Grenoble, tamurt n Fransa. Yuklal ayen yugaren tajmilt acku d netta id ajgu n tsekla Tazzayrit.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Di yal tamurt, ɣer yal agdud d tidiwin n wallaɣ i yesseftayen timeti. D asekkud n imensawen akked imedyazen id yettṛuẓun isula akken ad ggen abrid i tafat. Tafat yettawin amdan ɣer lberr n leqrar akked liser . Tafat yesseɛdalen amdan akked d inek-is . Tafat yettcuddun ifer ɣer lǧedra-as, lǧedra ɣer uẓar-is akken yal as , di yal lawan, aẓar werǧin ad yenser I tara. Di tmura yegzin taluft amedyaz s wazal-is. Bab n wawal qṛib d Nnbi. Imedyaten gten ama di tmura n usamer alemmas neɣ di tmura tutrimin( occidentales) . Imedyazen am Baudelaire, Hugo, Paul Eluard , Adonis, Nizar Qabani, Mohamed Derwich s leqder akked d leɛnaya i d yettwabder yisem-nsen ɣer timura i ten-id yurwen akked ɣer leǧnas iḍen merra. Di tmurt –nneɣ amedyaz xas ini qṛib d tacrurt ur newwi ur nerri. Deg akken yuder yiswir n tmussni ɣer-nneɣ, ma aṭas ttwalin deg-s amedah yessedhuyen arrac ma drus ccuban-t ɣer tseṭṭa –nni ur nerri tili, tella neɣ ulac-itt ḥedd ur yenḥerwel. Xuḍi zik mačči akka i yella lḥal di tmurt n leqbayel, imi imezwura –nneɣ rran ccan i – ilaqen i wawal, rran lɛez i At wawal. Ɣef aya ismawen n Yusef Uqasi, Si Muhend U Mhend, Ccix Muhend u Lhusin, Slimane Azem, Lounis Ait Menguellet, Ben Mohamed…d itran iɛemṛen igenni n tsekla taqbaylit , d iɣbula n tmussni , d tiɛwinin n usekkud yettmmalen abrid ɣer yiman-nneɣ. Maca di taggara agi, imedyazen ṛuḥen am akken t-heqqer-iten tiṭ, win id yusan ad yessew tidi-nsen zun akken tidi n wallaɣ-nsen d lmecmel win id yusan ad yeddem mebla ma yella unebbeh neɣ tilisa. Akken ad ad nnaf acimi yettseyyix u ɛerqub n tmussni tineggura agi di tmurt n leqbayel tella-d tadiwennit-agi akked umedyaz mussanen nezeh aṭas Mass Selmi Moussa.

  Awal s tewzel ɣef Moussa SELMI i yimeɣriyen-nneɣ. 

 Lemmer d lebɣi d kečč, s ṣṣifa-k d aneɣmas, ara d-yinin awal fell-i, meɛna wicqa. Akken ad d-rreɣ s tewzel ɣef westeqsi-agi, am wakka i yi-d-tessutreḍ, nekk d amedyaz, d imsuqel. Ttaruɣ tamedyazt ɛecrin n yiseggasen aya tura. Suqleɣ-d ddeqs n yedlisen si trumit akked taɛrabt ɣer teqbaylit.

 <span style="font-family: inherit;"> Amek i d-ilul Umezday n yimedyazen ? D acu i d-iswi-ines ? </span>

 <span style="font-family: inherit;">Amezday-agi di tazwara d ttexmam aseklan amaynut, d abrid adelsan yeffɣen i yiberdan n tsertit tadelsant tuɣ tmurt. D ayen ara yemmden d aɣerbaz n tsekla d tmedyazt. Ddeqs aya i nɛewwel ad d-nesbedd tikti-ya. D acu kan llant-d kra n tedyanin i d-inebcen alali n Umezday-agi. Di yebrir 2015, tessawel-aɣ-d yiwet n tdukla tadelsant ad nettekki deg usfugel i d-thegga ddaw leɛnaya n tmehla n yedles n Tizi Wezzu. Asfugel i wuɣur i d-teɛreḍ daɣen icennayen akked wid ixeddmen amezgun. Ineggura-agi msewwaqen ad ttuxellṣen. Weqbel ad tebdu lḥefla, wid i d-yessuddsen leqdic-nni heggan « amḍiq n yiseɣ » i yinaẓuren-nni-nniḍen, nekkni ǧǧan-aɣ di beṛṛa. Mi tebda tmeɣra, winna yettanimin iqeddem-d icennayen d yikumidiyen-nni, ma d nekkni, ur aɣ d-yebdir ara maḍi. Dɣa din i tewweḍ s ajmam, tennɣel. Ur nerni ara ula d dqiqa dinna. Deg wexxam n gmat-neɣ Lyas Gecṭuli i nesɛedda iḍ. Syin imir-n i nennejmaɛ ddeqs n tikkal armi i d-nesbedd Agraw n Yimedyazen Yezdin. AMEDYEZ. Bɣiɣ ad farṣeɣ tagnit-agi ad d-bedreɣ imedyazen i d-yesbedden Agraw-agi : LOUNI Hocine, SADI Kaci, DJOUAHER Mohand-Akli, AÏT BOUSSAD Akli, DJOUDI Fahem, DALI Salima, AOUCHICHE Mohammed, GUECHTOULI Lyès, KADDOUR Rabah, LOUNI Salah, YOUNSI Mouloud, AMOUR Mouloud akked SALMI Moussa. Ger yiswiyen-ines (imi mačči yiwen kan i yellan), nessaɣay tiktiwin-nneɣ, nettwellih, nesfiqiy, nessakay imedyazen iɣeflen, nekkat ad nekkes ddel i d-teɣḍel tsertit tadelsant ɣef yimedyazen iqbayliyen, nekkat ad d-nessukkes tamedyazt taqbaylit seg useffulekler i deg i tt-tger. Aql-aɣ la nettheggi yiwen Wubriz (un Manifeste) i deg ara d-nefser tiktiwin d tmuɣliwin-nneɣ, ad t-id-nessufeɣ di tɣamsa. Syin imir-n, Agraw yelli i yimedyazen ara yettuqennɛen s umennuɣ-nneɣ</span>

 <span style="font-family: inherit;"> Amek i ilaq akken imedyazen, ass-a , ad sɛun izerfan-nsen di yal aḥric (rradyu, tilivizyu, tizeɣwa n tmeɣriwin …) ? </span>

 <span style="font-family: inherit;">Asteqsi akken nniḍen i ilaq ad d-yettunefk : Amek ar ass-a ur sɛin yimedyazen izerfan ?! Tamedyazt d taẓuri tis xemsa ; yal leqdic n tẓuri neɣ n tsekla ara yeffɣen ɣer wegdud tewwi-d ad d-yeglu s nnfeɛ i bab-is, d ayen umi qqaren « droit d’auteur ». Aya di tmura irebḥen ulac akk fell-as awal. Tudreḍ-d tilivizyu ! Tagi iwumi semman Tilivizyu tis rebɛa n tmaziɣt tesɛedday-d kra n yimeɣruyen (rimeurs) ur tezdiɣ tehrekt ṣbeḥ meddi tenwa d tinna i d tamedyazt. Yiwwas ssawlen-d i Wakli AÏT BOUSSAD ucaylellah ɣer tedwilt « Gar-aneɣ » i wuɣur i ɛerḍen daɣen sin n yicennayen akked yimuzigiyen. Mi fuken, ssutren-asen-d ad asen-fken ccikat-nsen. Mi i asen-imekken ccak-is Wakli, nnan-as-d s taɛrabt : «Awwah ! Keččini ḥmed Rebbi imi i k-id-nesɛedda, wamma nutni ɛetben». Ayagi d lɛar, d tukksa n sser. Ula d rradyuwat yiwet nsent. Xeddmen tidwilin n tmedyazt, sɛeddayen-d imedyazen i d-yeqqaren isefra-nsen, ttalsen-asent-id i tedwilin-nni mebla ma xellṣen « les droits d’auteur ». D lɛib. Wamma tura ixxamen n yedles, seg wakken ẓran belli deffir yal tagrawla yella usefru, kkaten amek ara sburren i tmedyazt taqbaylit s weɛlaw n lfulklur. Rran imedyazen d ticcicin regglen imerǧan yis-sen. Ɣef waya, nekkni ncerreḍ-asen, mi ara aɣ-d-ssiwlen, ad gen yid-neɣ « les contrats » ma ulac maḍi am wid i ttgan d yicennayen i deg amur ameqqran deg-sen ur sɛin ara aswir-nneɣ. Ma ur qbilen ara, nettagi ad nekki yid-sen. Ilaq ad tt-id-nini, tadbelt n yedles yiwen i d idles-ines : d annuz « adelsan » i lḥekkam. Nekkni annuz nexḍa-yas. Tella taluft-nniḍen, ula d timetti ur tt-tfehhmeḍ ara. Lɣaci ur ttgan ara azal i wayen ur nesɛi ara ssuma. Ad ten-tafeḍ ɛebden kra n yicennanyen, ttaken idrimen akken ad ḥedṛen timeɣriwin-nsen, si tama-nniḍen ḥessben imedyazen « iḥerfiyen » d iɛeṭṭaren n wawal, d imattaren ! Ma ur iga ara umedyaz i yiman-is d ccɣel-is ccan, mačči d wid iḥesben tasekla d lfulklur ara as-t-yerren.</span>

  Amek yettwali Moussa tamedyazt taqbaylit  <span style="font-family: inherit;"> tamirant ? </span>

 <span style="font-family: inherit;">Tamedyazt taqbaylit tamirant tettban-iyi-d am tfelwit i deg ṭṭuqqten yiniten yemgaraden akk gar-asen (poésie contrastée). Deg wayen akk i ɣriɣ neɣ i sliɣ -yerna yif-it lemmer d ay telli tanṭulujit- ssenfaliɣ-d snat n tmedyaziyin timiranin : tamedyazt tamirant tazikit (traditionaliste) akked tmedyazt tamirant tatrart. Tazikit-nni d asiẓɣel n waman yemmuẓeɣlen yakan ! Am wakken yeqqar yinzi : «D acu i tetteffẓeḍ a wlidi, d llazuq n yilindi» ! Amawal yeḥfa, tugniwin wessrit armi kemcent, isental htutan, talɣa tefruri. Kra deg-s ur yelli d amaynut. D ayen i wumi ssawaleɣ « taddayninit ». Yerna ayagi yella ula ɣer yimedyazen yesɛan isem. Ayen i ɣef nesḥissif, (les médias) d tamedyazt-agi i ɣef ssaɣayen tafat. Ma d tamedyazt tamirant tatrart, snat ay deg-s : tatrart ibedden akked tetrart iteddun. Tin ibedden, d tamedyazt yessulin aswir aṭas ama di tikta, ama deg usentel. Imedyazen-is snulfuyen-d talɣiwin, ttekken ansi ur yekki yiwen i wawal. D acu kan tamedyazt-a teqqen ɣer yiwen n uɣanib. Tamedyazt tatrart iteddun, d tamedyazt yefflen akkin i usugen, izegren akkin i wakud. D tamedyazt n yimal. Tamedyazt tamirant tatrart s sin wudmawen-agi-ines, d rrezg n teqbaylit. Meɛna ayen i ɣef nesḥissif daɣen, ala di tfaskiwin i tt-nettaf, ulac-itt deg yedlisen.</span>

 <span style="font-family: inherit;"> Liḥala n udlis aqbayli… Amek-itt ? Amek id ak-id-yettban yimal-ines ? </span>

 <span style="font-family: inherit;">D lḥala n Weqbayli ara ak-d-yefken lexbar ɣef tin n wedlis aqbayli. Aqbayli ass-a ur yeqqar ara, ladɣa s teqbaylit. Amek tebɣiḍ ad yeddu wedlis !? Imal-is yeqqen s imal n Weqbayli. Ma yebɣa Uqbayli ad yaki, ad yissin, ad yennerni, ad ibedd netta, ad tbedd tmeslayt-is, tewwi-d ad iɣer ; ma yerra leqraya d aweddeṛ n lweqt di tmucuha ur nemɛin, ur iteddu wedlis, ur tetteddu teqbaylit, ur iteddu Weqbayli ɣer zdat. U ayagi yessagad aṭas.</span>

 <span style="font-family: inherit;"> Wissen dɣa tiẓrigin yellan ma xedment ayen ilaqen akken ad yeddu wedlis aqbayli am netta am yedlisen-nniḍen ? </span>

 <span style="font-family: inherit;">Di tmura irebḥen, asiẓreg d ṣṣenɛa mačči d tiḥilet. Qqaren-as « slesla n wedlis ». Imsiẓreg yettqabal s tedrimt asiẓreg. Lfayda tameqqrant tettruḥu ɣer win(le diffuseur) yettemsewwaqen akked wid yeznuzuyen idlisen (les libraires) akked win yesselḥuyen idlisen (distributeur), i ten-yettawin ɣer wid i ten-id yekmandin i yemsewweq-nni. Ayen i d-yeqqimen, azal n 10%, yettawi-t bab n wedlis. Dagi ɣur-neɣ, ad truḥeḍ ɣer yemsiẓreg, werɛad akk tesrusuyeḍ ayen i turiḍ, ad ak-d-yessuter agelmuẓ. Amur ameqqran deg-sen ula d tiseqquma n tɣuri ur tent-sɛin ara. Ayen yeǧǧan imyura qlil i d-ssufuɣen. Anwa i ixeṣren, d tasekla taqbaylit. Tella ssebba-nniḍen daɣen d tameqqrant. Ayen yettusemman Asqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa ixeddem lmenker deg yimsiẓergen. Yettruẓu-asen ssuq. Yessufuɣ-d idlisen baṭel, netta ur ten-yesselḥuy, yerna yettagi-asen ad ten-zzenzen. Ula d amyaru ur t-id-yettṣiḥ ara ad ten-yezzenz. Tagi d tawaɣit. Tasertit n usiẓreg n HCA d lfinga i tsekla taqbaylit.</span>

  Amek alarmi ɣer ass-a, ulac tisɣunin s ddemma i tsekla taqbaylit ? 

 Tirit kan i zemreɣ ad ak-d-fkeɣ : Agraw n Yimedyazen Yezdin, ger yeswiyen igejdanen-ines d asefti d usnerni n tsekla ama s tesɣunin, ama s tedwilin n uwelleh d uselmed (les ateliers), ama s tsuqilin, atg.

  Azal n usuqel d wacu i d-yewwi neɣ ara d-yawi i tsekla taqbaylit…? 

 Tasekla taqbaylit tella d timawit armi d tagara-agi kan i tuɣal d tirawit. Tasuqilt d ttawil ara d-yacaṛen ilem ur zmiren ara yemyura d yimedyazen ad d-reglen s ufares (production) imani di drus n lweqt. Ayagi ad d-yeglu s nnfeɛ meqqren. Iɣerbazen d tesnawiyin ad afen d acu ara sseɣren. Yerna tasuqilt d asaɣ ger tsekliwin, ger yidelsan. S tirmi n wiyiḍ ad d-nerbeḥ tamusni, ad d-nerbeḥ leɛdaṛ (la quantité), ad d-nerbeḥ akud, ad d-nrebbi afud i tsekla-nneɣ sya ar tizmir ad teddu s wayla-s aḥrur. Yerna daɣen s tsuqilt, tasekla taqbaylit ad terbeḥ tawsit-nniḍen, ayen iwumi qqaren tasekla n tsuqilt taseklant ! S yimsuqel, idles i d-yewwin (la culture d’arrivée) yettimɣur, yettnerni, yettuɣal d amerkanti. Tisuqilin keččment di tgemmi taseklant n waɣlan.

  Melmi ara d-yeffeɣ leqdic n Moussa d-adlis akken ad as-wɛun yimeɣriyen ? 

 Ddeqs n wungalen akked yiwen l’essai i d-ssuqleɣ i yi-yessufɣent teẓrigin Lalla Moulati di Lezzayer s lebṛay (tira tiḥercawin). I tikkelt tamezwarut deg umezruy ara yeffeɣ wedlis s teqbaylit s tira-agi. Ɛewwleɣ ad ten-id-ssufɣeɣ s tira tiberkanin. Sserseɣ daɣen yiwen wungal ɣer yiwen wexxam n usiẓreg, la nettraǧu ad t-id-yessufeɣ.

  Asirem n Moussa s yisem-is d amdan, s yisem-is d amedyaz ? 

 Ad ak-iniɣ tidet, ur ḥemmleɣ ara ad hedṛeɣ ɣef usirem imi asirem d ddunnit n usugen. D asuget n wayen ulac di tilawt. Meɛna akken ad k-in-wajbeɣ, ad ak-iniɣ : d amdan, ssarameɣ ad temmudden tmedyazt ; d amedyaz, ssarameɣ ad yemmedyez Wemdan !

  Awal aneggaru ? 

 Ad ak-iniɣ tanemmirt ɣef tdiwennit-agi. Bɣiɣ kan ad fakeɣ s wawal n Vissarion Grigorievitch Belinski, yiwen uneqqad aseklan arussi i yennan : «Di tmedyazt, tudert d tudert ugar n tudert s yimad-is» !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Karim Ferkane, neɣ MuḥKarim Ferkane s yisem n tẓuri, d amedyaz i yettɛeggiḍen s usefru akken ad yessiweḍ izen-is. D mmi-s n Bgayet, i d-yekkren deg temnaḍt n Uqbu. Newwi-d deg tdiwennit-a kra n wawal. yid-s

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Amek iga wassaɣ yellan gar-ak d tmedyazt ?  

  Karim Ferkane:  Assaɣ yellan gar-iw d tmedyazt, zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ amzun d win yuḍnen yufa ddwa i waṭṭan-ines! Acku, segmi bdiɣ smedyizeɣ, (seg tagara n 2008 ar ass-a), ḥulfaɣ dakken ttifsuseɣ seg tɛekmin i yi-yesbubben wussan di yal aḥric n tudert-iw, akked tmetti tuzligt i yeffeɣ sswab d teqbaylit s umata. Tamedyazt ɣur-i d asafar n tujjya i wul d wallaɣ. Akken diɣ i tettuneḥsab tmedyazt d iles n tudert s umata (d tumert neɣ d amerret). Ɣef waya zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ d ddwa-inu! Ufiɣ fell-as! Tekkseɣ-d ayen i yi-yerḥan! S usefru i ntettru. Wamma iẓri-nneɣ yekkaw yakan. 

  Ɣef tmuɣli-k, deg tmurt-nneɣ acimi ur ttakken yimdanen i usefru azal i yuklal ? 

 Asteqsi-a wis sin a weltma Kaysa, aṭas i d-yeqqnen ɣur-s. Mačči ɣas d asefru kan iwumi ur ttakken azal di tmurt-nneɣ. Nekk ad d-iniɣ taẓuri s umata ur tufi iman-is. Acku sseddayen-tt yir ifassen, s lebɣi n udabu. Limer i yufa ur d-yettaki ugdud seg naddam-ines alqayan… Ssebɣasen deg wid i irennun naddam i wallaɣ, akked uhuzzu n wammas! Rnu, tuget n ugdud ur ɣur-s idles n tɣuri (n tmedyazt neɣ n wayen-nniḍen). Limer i trebḥeḍ ay ul talfi amedyaz ad t-tafeḍ d lmezwer n tmetti, ad sellen medden i tiɣri-ines d yiwellihen-is.

  Tbaneḍ seg wid i yessefrayen s waṭas ɣef wayen i iceɣben allaɣ d wul. Ɣas tikwal s uɣiḍi, tikwal-nniḍen s zzɛaf, maca deg tmedyazt-ik ur tebriḍ i usirem. D acu ara d-tiniḍ ɣef waya?  

 D tidet. Yella waya i d-tenniḍ. Acku ayen i yi-d-yesneṭṭqen seg tazwara d zzɛaf d unnuɣni, d leḥzen ɣef waddad-nneɣ s umata d wayen akk i d-yeḍran yid-i sɣur wid i yi-d-yezzin. Dɣa, ttlallen-d yisefra d usriden wa deffir wa, ɣef idra n yal taluft neɣ tadyant i aɣ-iḥuzan. Ama d tid i yuran fell-aɣ, tid i nura s yifassen-nneɣ, neɣ ula d tid i uran yimdanen-nniḍen ad zrint fell-aɣ (d ccer).

  Dɣa nettqabal-itent s tebɣest, imi tudert-a s lekmal d amennuɣ. Ihi yessefk ad nili d inazbayen, yerna ad nleqqem asirem a weltma Kaysa. D aɣan (d lwajeb) fell-aɣ. Txeddmeḍ tamedyazt tudmawant, i yiman-ik kan?  

 tamedyazt-inu mačči d tudmawant, i yiman-iw kan. Ɣas llan kra n yisefra d udmawanen, ttbuḥruyeɣ yis-sen nekk d yiman-iw kan, ulayɣer ad asen-slen wiyeḍ, neɣ ur bɣiɣ ara maḍi ad asen-slen. Acku d nekk kan i asen-yettḥulfun: rzan iman-iw. Maca tuget n tmedyazt-inu, terza timetti-nneɣ di yal aḥric, u terza

  Amek tettwaliḍ tamedyazt deg tsekla taqbaylit?  

 Ayen yerzan tasekla s umata, ad naf d tamedyAzt i d llsas-ines. Ɣef waya yelha nezzeh ɣef yimura n tsekla ad sseqdacen di tira-nsen tugniwin n usmedyez i wakken ad gerrzent tira-nni. Ma d tasekla taqbaylitt, tuget ad tt-naf d ammuden n tmedyazt ugar n yiḥricen-nniḍen. Nessaram simmal ad yettnerni uswir n tsekla taqbaylit di yal taɣult.

  Tanemmirt ɣef wayen i d-terriḍ a Mass Karim. Awal-ik n taggara…  

 Tanemmirt tameqqrant a weltma Kaysa ɣef tdiwennit-a i yi-txedmeḍ. S rrezg i d-rriɣ ɣef yisteqsiyen i d-tefkiḍ. Tanemmirt i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen.

  Testeqsa-t Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 ‘’Awal ibennu yetthuddu’’, d amud n yisefra i d-tessufeɣ Massa Touati Zoulikha ‘’Hakima’’ ɣer tezrigin ‘’Edition du terroir’’, deg wagguren-agi iɛeddan. Aḥric-a amezwaru, ɣef wakken i d-tura, deg tezwarut, d aseḥbiber ɣef tutlayt timawit i wakken ad taẓ tmaziɣt ɣer sdat, ad d-tecfu tiyaḍ. Deg udlis, llan 35 n yisefra i d-yeskanen yal tama n tudert, yecban : awal, tikkellax, laman, zzher, tamurt,… Mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut i tekcem Massa Touati aḥric-agi n tira imi tesɛa yakan ugar n rebɛa-nniḍen n yidlisen. Taɣuri igerrzen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Yella ddurt iɛeddan umedyaz-amsuqel Buɛlam Messusi d inebgi n Tdukkla Azday Adelsan n Uweqqas i t-id-inecden i yiwen n usarag s wazal-is ɣef umaḍal n usezgi (adaptation). Mi d-teḥḍer tegnit, yemmeslay-d umsureg ɣef yidlisen i d-yessufeɣ d umezruy n tneqqisin yecban Kalila d Dimna, syin yefka-d kra n yiwellihen ɣef wamek suqulen, neɣ sezgayen, aḍris neɣ tamacahut sdat n kra n medden. Ɣas drus yid-sen, maca ffuden s tidet i usenf-a n temliliyin. Kra n wakud, yessawal-d Mass Buɛlam kra n tneqqisin i wid iḥeḍren, am tinna Uccen d Yizimer, almi i ten-yewwi ɣer ddunit-nni n uḥezzeb. Dɣa, yeɛjeb-asen lḥal merra. Ɣer taggara n usarag, yella-d yiwen uskasi yelhan anda i d-llan yisteqsiyen i bab n yidlisen d tmuɣliwin ɣef wayen akk icudden ɣer tira. D acu, sḥassfen yimeḥḍar imi ur d-telli temlilit n ubuddu n yidlisen n umsuɣel. Ɣef waya yenna-aɣ-d win i terza taluft: «ssawleɣ i umaẓrag maca ur d-yewwi kra. Ma d timlilit, tgerrez ayendin ɣas ur d-yusi ara waṭas. Ilaq kan, ad gtent ugar deg tmurt n Yizwawen». Ugur-a n yir aqeyyem n temliliyin tidelsanin, iɛumm deg yal tama ɣur-neɣ. Imi, deg ta n Uweqqas, ssawlen yimheggiyen i yiselmaden merra, maca ala yiwen i yellan di ttiɛad, rnu d aɣrib! Yessufeɣ-d ar tura Buɛlam Messusi kraḍ n yidlisen, akk-nsen, cudden i warrac, d asezgi neɣ d asuqel ɣer tmaziɣt. Amezwaru d kra n tneqqisen i d-yeffɣen s tallet n HCA deg 2004. Syin, yerna-d Kalila d Dimna d uḥric-nniḍen n tneqqisin tigreɣlanin.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Seg umezruy aqbur, neẓra aṭas n yiberraniyen i yewwten amek ad yeɣli Umaziɣ d yidles-is, maca llan-d wiyaḍ i ixedmen, xeddmen ar tura fell-as akken ad ibedd, ad yennerni. Ad d-nemmeslay da ɣef Ukusi Pawl Andirsun, bab n wadeg akufi.org, akked tkebbanit Aɣerbaz d timetti daɣen. Nnuba n tkebbanit-a, d asras n usekkil amaziɣ deg rebɛa n tɣemmar n tmurt i uberreḥ ɣef walbaɛḍ n yiqeddicen, neɣ i udellel. Ɣas mačči aṭas-aya segmi d-tlul, tessaweḍ tecreḍ tamaziɣt akked wid i tt-iḥemmlen deg waṭas n yimukan d tezniqin. « Iswi amezwaru d asras n tutlayt tazwawt deg yakk imeḍqan izuzaz (publics), am di tḥuna, isensa, leswaq, tikeryas, tikebbaniyen n baylek d tid n uwanek, atg». I aɣ-d-yenna Mass Andersun. Syin yerna-d: « Nebɣa s usenfar-a, ad nessider tamaziɣt, ad nḥesses lɣaci ɣef wazal n tira n tutlayt-nsen deg tudert n yal ass. Am wakken, nenwa ad nebḍu tirmiyin n tsuqilin». Imi caḍen yiberdan n usnerni n yidles d tutlayt, awi-d ukan ma teḥsa tefrit s ubaɣur.

  M. K. 

  
 D taddart Tiferdud i yewwin amḍiq amezwaru n “Temsizzelt n taddart zeddigen” Aissat Rabah, deg tedwilt-is tis 5, i d-yettheggi, yal aseggas, Usqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu.

 D tajmilt i d-as-yettuɣalen i Rabaḥ Aissat yal aseggas s temsizzelt i d-yettilin akken ad tt-ttwafren taddart i zeddigen. Deg tezrigt n useggas-a, ttekkant 78 n tuddrin. Ffɣen-d yigemmaḍ n temzizelt ddurt iɛeddan deg yiwet n tmeɣra deg Uxxam n yidles n Mulud Mɛemmri anda i ḥedren aṭas n yemdan. Tḥella-d taddart Tiferdud, taɣiwant n At Yusef di Miceli, amḍiq amenzu, syin d taddart Talbent di tɣiwant n Zekri. Ma yella d amḍiq wis kraḍ, yuɣal i taddar Ibekkaren di tɣiwant n At Wizgan. Tazrigt n useggas-a, temgarad d tid iɛeddan imi 8 n tuddrin i wumi i d-issaḥ warraz. Arraz amenzu d idrimen s lqidar n 8 n yimelyan n yidinaren, syin wis ssin azal n 7 n imelyan n yidinaren, wis krad 6 n yimelyan, ma yella d arraz wis ukkuz i yuɣalen i taddart n Mhaga (idjeur) s 5 n yimelyan, amḍiq wis semmus tiwi-t taddart n Leɣrus (Meqlaɛ) s 4 n imelyan, ma yella d tuddrin n Ḥura, Izaouin d tiɣilt n Mḥend tigi isaḥ-itent-id 3 n yimelyan .

   Yettwaxdam usebdad i Rabah Aissat deg tɣiwant Ɛin Zawiya 

 Am yal aseggas, mi ara d-yaweḍ 12 deg wayyur n tuber, taɣiwant n Ɛin Zawiya tesmektay-d tamettant n mmi-s n taddart-nsen. 11 n yiseggasen-aya segmi i yettwanɣa uselway n tɣiwant n Ɛin Zawya, Rabah Aissat, i yellan, diɣ, d aselway n Uqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu (APW). Ddurt iɛeddan, tuɣal-as tejmilt di tɣiwant-is. Ar ass n wassan, ur d-iban kra ɣef temsalt-a. Tuɣal-as tejmilt sɣur uselway amenzu n ukabar n FFS, imḍebbren n ukabar-a, aselway n tɣiwant akked mmi-s n Rabaḥ Ɛissat. Am wakken i ḥedren daɣen waṭas n iwudam-nniḍen i d-yusan akken ad t-id-smektin. Yal yiwen, yefka-d awal-is ɣef urgaz yettwanɣa. Aya, yeḍra-d mewed mi sersen tamuqqint n yiseǧǧigen ɣef uẓakka-s u bedden dqiqa n tsussmi ɣef terwiḥt-is. Yenna-d yiwen seg yimḍebbren n ukabar n FFS : “Aissat rabaḥ d argaz ara tafeḍ di yal taswiɛt mi ara t-teḥwiǧeḍ , yella d amedya yecban Dda L’Hocine, Ali Mécili d waṭas n wiyaḍ, yal aseggas, nettas-d akken ad d-nesmekti tamettant-is. Ur ilaq ra ad ten-nettu “. Ɣer taggara, mi kfan awal, xedmen-as asebdab di tmeqbert n tɣiwant-is i lmend n 11 n yiseggasen seg wasmi i yettwanɣa.

  S.Yamani 

  
  Isufar i urekti :  1 kg n uwren n temẓin, Lmelḥ ( tissent ), Aman 

  Isufar i useqqi :  1 n tebṣelt , 1 n tumatict , Cwiṭ n uqeddid ( aksum aquran ), Lkas n jelban ibrin, Leḥbeq. 

  Akud n usewwi :  Azal n 30 n tesdidin (ddqayeq) ( ½ h)

  Aheggi n urekti :  Sif awren ( awren azuran ad yuɣal deg yidis, ad t-neḥwiǧ …) Awren–nni yufafen , eg-as lmelḥ, aman, alamma yuɣal d arekti . Bḍu arekti –nni d tiḥbulin ( azal n 12 ) , yal taḥbult , jbed-itt , suzzer-as awren azuran s ufella-s . Mi tgiḍ 6 n teḥbulin , err-itent ta s ufella n tayeḍ , ad mmdent 2 n tenbulin sut 6 n tissiwin ( feuilles , couches ) . Tura , gzem tissiwin-nni d imkuẓen imectaḥ ( petits carrés) suddem –asen cwiṭ n zzit , err-iten ɣer <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>useksut ad fuṛen . 

 Aheggi n useqqiErr 1.5 L n waman ar tuggi ( taccuyt, tasilt ) , tibselt , tatumatict igezmen , akked d uqeddid ( aksum aquran , taɣenjawt n zzit n lkuẓa , lmelḥ , taɣenjawt n leḥbeq yebrin . Ar taggara , smir imkuẓen-nni ( les dés , carrés ) ɣer daxel n useqqi , teǧǧeḍ-t ad yawel . 

 * Tamawt : sefqad aseqqi-nni , i wakken ur itezzer ara .S tezmert-nwen <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Sɣur Daya 

  
 Hatan wacu id yeqqar amagrad 3 wis sin( article 3 bis ) deg id tedda tamaziɣt d tutlayt tunṣibt : tamaziɣt ula d netta-t d tutlayt taɣelnawt yerna d tunṣibt. Ddewla ad tebded ɣer usnerni-ines di yal tama n tmurt yerna a tt-ɛebbi yak iferdisen yellan d amur-is. Yella-d usbeddi n uggusen( académie) azzayri n tutlayt tamaziɣt ddaw leɛnaya n uselway n tmurt . Aggusen-agi ad isenned ɣef leqdic n yimnuda tecqa talluft akken ad ad yessewwjed ṛṛeḥba iwaten i usnerni akked usenfal n tutlayt-agi akken a ttaɣ amḍiq-is unṣib di tmurt Lẓẓayer ». 

 Lemmer am zik tili anect-a mačči d izli n lferḥ ara d yawi ɣer wulawen n lluluf n imeɣnasen yennuɣen acḥal d aseggas akken tutlayt n Massinisa a tesɛu amkan-is di tmurt-is. Maca anect-a ur d yelli ara. Ssebbat mačči d yiwet. Tamezwarut rrabul-agi id yerran tamaziɣt d tutlayt tunṣibt yemdarkel ɣef win i t-yezrwaren id yeqqaren: “ taɛrabt d tutlayt taɣelnawt , d tutlayt tunṣibt yerna d tutlayt n ddewla.”. Ɣef aya aṭas, seg wid yeṭṭafaren timsal n tsertit di tmurt id yegren tamawt-agi: i ma yella teɛrabt d tutlayt n ddewla n Lẓẓayer , ihi tamaziɣt d tuttya tunṣibt n wanta tamurt?  » .

 Ssebba t-is snat tcudd ɣer wamek id yeffeɣ isali-agi: imezwura id neṭṭqen ɣef tamendawt-agi tamaynut d Mass Ahmed Ouyahya aselway n RND akked Saidani aselway n FLN. Tuget n wid yesenqaden taluft nnan-d amek armi d wigi mačči d aneɣlaf n lecɣal n daxel n tmurt id yemeslayen ? 

 Ssebba t-is tlata : mi ara nsel I Mass Ahmed Ouahya yeqqar d akken tamaziɣt isekf ad tezdi ad tili d yiwet n tutlayt i wakken a tizmir a tesɛu amur deg umtedu n lecɣal n tmurt. Asteqsi id ḍefren anect-a d wagini : amek ara tili tamaziɣt d yiwet n tameslayt netta-t yebḍan ɣef acḥal d tutlayin nniḍen ( teqbaylit, tacawit, tamẓabit, tamacaɣt , tacinwit mebla ma nudred tarifit, tacelhit, tamaziɣt n Libya….) ayagi yeǧǧa kra n imsenqaden cukken imi ttwalin din i tudi ticerket ara ikerfen asnerni n tmaziɣit. Tugert deg-sen ttwalin dayen-nni ara tt-yegren deg tamda n waglugel akken d awezɣi ad tifrir , d awezɣi ad tqazem timsal timiranin iccudden ɣer tussna, tasertit, tadbelt…imi ɣef akken ttwalin wid teɛna tamsalt n tmaziɣt:i wakken ad zdin tutlayin n tmaziɣt ad uɣalen-t d yiwet, ilaq yiwet seg-sen-t a tseblaɛ tiyaḍ. Aya d awezɣi. Ɣef aya tuget deg-sen smenyafen yal tameslayt tamaziɣt a d tenerni s yiman-is am akken nernen-t di tmura nniḍen ( am Franṣa, Ṭalyen, Spanyul, Portugal) tutlayin id nesren seg tutlayt taqburt talaṭinit. 

 Ad yegri wugur nniḍen ( win yestewḥecen amur ameqqran seg wid iḥamlen tamaziɣt) amek a tettaru tmaziɣt? anwa asekkil? Ɣer w aṭas n imeɣnasen n tmaziɣt ur yelli ccekk adabu ad yefren asekkil n teɛrabt ur nezmir ad iɛebbi tamaziɣt. Ɣef aya yugar ccekk ttbut deg uṣenṣeb agi isneṣben tutlayt tamaziɣt deg tamindawt agi id yenuflan. D aɣebbaṛ s-allen? Ɣer w aṭas seg wid nesteqsa mačči d lmuḥal! 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Asenfar n webrid muqren ara isduklen lwilayat n Tubirett lakekd Bgayet (Pénétrante Adjiba-Béjaïa) yewwi-d yides lfayda, yagi i yilmeẓyen n tama n At Ɛebbas yesduklen krad n tɣiwanin: Iɣil Ɛli, At Ṛẓin lakked Buǧlil. Asenfar-agi ṭfen cinwa (Crcc) lakked d yizdayriyen (Sapta) yebda i leḥu cwiṭ-cwiṭ deg tama-agi n’At Ɛebbas. Ixeddamen ttqeɛiden annar ansa ad iɛeddi webrid-agi muqren. D-acu, mači ɣef ayagi i nebɣa ad nemesslay. Ad nebder ayen i d t-yewwi usenfar-agi, imi ayen din n yilmeẓyen lakked d ibabaten n t’waculin yufa-n imukan, neɣ ixeddimen, deg usenfar-agi. Ɛla ḥsab akken iɣ-d nnan deg « la base de γie » yella-n deg tama n At Ṛẓin, azal n 132 n yilmeẓyezn yeṭfen imukan nsen deg uxeddim. Ayagi yessefraḥ aṭaṣ imezdaɣ n tama-agi, i walla-n akken asenfar-agi yewwi-assen-d axeddim s ṭaqa! Amek ihi ? Ma yella ad neǧmaɛ akk tiɣiwanin-agi, ur nettaf ara ula d 20 n yimukan n uxeddim uqbel asenfar-agi. Tama-agi n’At Ɛebbas tenṭar aṭaṣ, tenḥaf dayen kan, imi axeddim ixuṣ mliḥ. Yuɣ lḥal tiɣiwanin-agi zgan-t-d deg yidurar, yerna ttwattun-t ! « Dayen yessefraḥen aṭaṣ, imi ayen din n yilmeẓyen ufan axeddim deg uṣenfar n webrid Ɛǧiba-Bgayet. Ama d iɛessasen, neɣ d yimliwiyen, neɣ dayen nniḍen, awid kan ad xedmen ad awin aɣrum nsen, yuɣ lḥal tallit-agi nneɣ tuɛar. Laɣla, tazmart, lakked d usufeɣ n tedrimt, mači dayen i sehlen fellaɣ! » akka iɣ-d yenna yiwen wemɣar i zedɣen deg taddart n’At Ṛẓin. D-acu kan, llan widak yessekrasen anyir nsen, imi aṣenfar-agi n webrid ad idum kan 36 wagguren, neɣ 3 iseggasen. Ayagi yeǧǧa kra n yimdanen, yagi wid ixedmen deg « la base de γie » ur friḥen ara s lekmal. « Maca, axeddim-agi yelha ad yettwaḥsab deg taǧriba. Akken nessen aṭaṣ n tkubbaniyin i yeṭṭalaben taǧriba deg uxeddim ! » ɣef akken iɣ-d yenna yiwen ulemẓi i xedmen deg uṣenfar-agi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax.Y 

  
 Taddart n Izararzen id yezgan deg tɣiwant n Timizart deg dayra n Wagenun (lɛerc n At Jennad) tegger irebbi i terbaɛt yellan deffir umazrar (feuilleton) «yella deg awal» ara d iɛeddin deg tilibizyun n tmaziɣt (ENTV4) deg ussan-a id teddun.

 Yuɣ lḥal aḥric amenzu n umezrar-agi iɛedda-d yekka ɣef agdil ( écran) deg aggur n Ɣuct yezrin (aggur n remḍan). «Leɣzel n umezrar «Yella deg awal», am akken i ɣ- id yenna umsufeɣ -ines Mass Reda Amrani, yewwi d ulman-is seg lemtul n teqbaylit. Lɣerḍ id as nebɣa : ad yeḥyu anziyen- agi id ǧǧen imawlan-nneɣ akken ad afen tudert nniḍen deg timeti tartart (anda, ahat amdan, tamara tikwal, i tettu ansi id yekka d sani i teddu, iɛerq-as ula d anwi i t-yillan). Ɣef aya tazwart n umezrar d tadyant (yeḍṛan neɣ izemren a teḍṛu, d teqburt neɣ tamirant) ara d yawin sebba n tmenna n wanzi. Di yal taxelalt yettili afser n wanzi id yeɣlin deg awal, acu i d-anamek-is, amek yettwafeṣel, amek i-ixaḍ, amek yesenta iẓuran deg akal n timeti ansi id yefruri, d anwa asekkud wuɣur yettmuqul.».

 Wid iwalan aḥric amenzu id tesken tilbizyun n tmaẓiɣ deg unebdu-agi yezrin, ur ḥyin ara deg acekker deg umazrar-agi. Ayen yeṭṭfen lwlha ɣer-s, d tikti s wacu id yegla imi yessemlal amdan akked yiman-is. s kra n win nesteqsa ɣef umzerar-agi yemmeslay-aɣ-id ɣef telqay n teqbaylit yellan deg usinaryu –ines (tutlayt) yura umezdyaz Mass A. S. Noredine, akked ṛẓana n izaffanen (comédiens) yuraren degs am Mass Hocine Ait Gueni, Nacer Mouhouche, Ahmed Slimani, Toufik kaouedj, Ouiza Nahar, Djamila Bouanem, Safia Ounir.

 «Azal n 30 n tixellal ara yilin deg aḥric-agi wis sin n umezrar iɣ-id yenna Mass Noredine: « Tira n isinaryuten nella-asen di lmendad d sin yid-nneɣ nekk akked Ḥamid. Tuget n teqsiḍin id newwi d t-id i kecmen ansayen n tmurt n leqbayel, nesquccḍ-d kra deg ayen i-ɣ-id ḥkan imawlan-nneɣ deg temẓi, maca llan-t tiyaḍ d asnulfu imi yal anzi ilaq as-id yaf wemdan tadyant ara t –id yawwin deg awal.»

 Maca a filmi n wayen-nni n tixelalt, yesutur ttawilat meqran, tadrimt s waṭas i wakken asaru ad yawi udem is yebɣa bab-is. Ɣef ugur agi i temderkal terbaɛt agi yellan deffir umzrar-agi .: « Nxeddem akken nufa s wacu nufa. Akken ad yesrifeg ufrux ilaq-as ad irebbi afriwen, afriwen irefden sinima d adrim. Xuḍi di tmurt-nneɣ a sekcem n wedrim deg leqdic adelsan ulac-it di lɛeqliya n imsihranen (detenteurs de capitaux)n tmurt-nneɣ. Ɣef aya mi nettaru isinaryuten, neseḥras akken taqṣit ur d tesutur ara allalen imeqranen, acku qṛib s wulac i nettqazam asufeɣ n umezrar agi. Wamma lemmer id ak terbiḥ a wul, nezmer ad nsali isura akked imezraren ara yili nned ɣer nned d wayen xedmet leǧnas nniḍen deg aḥric-agi, acku llan taktiwin, llan wid yettraun isinaryuten ifazen, llan imsufɣen yesnen acu id anemek n sinima. Meɛna ama akken yella deg awal: “ulac ur ixeddem ara tafenṭazit», id yerna deg awal Mass Hocine Ait Gueni yiwen seg izaffanen (comediens) yettikkin deg umezrar-agi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Amusnaw, azamul n usnulfu deg tẓuri, akka i as-qqaren i umedyaz! Wis kan amedyaz aqbayli n wass-a ma d tagi i d tamuɣli n medden ɣur-s? Tura war ma neclex tamuɣli-nneɣ ɣer yimedyazen -nni imeqqranen yettwasnen s ccna, ad tt-nerr kan ɣer imedyazen-a n tfaskiwin n temdyazt i iṭuqqten asa-a! Tidet kan, yerḥa-yi ad nadiɣ ɣef wayen d-wwint tfaskiwin-a i umedyaz aqbayli ass-a. Yiwen yenna-d: D timlilit, d tagnit i umedyaz ad d-iɣer isefra-s maca d timlilit anda yettaf iman-is yeqqar-d isefra-s i yimdukal-is kan. Wayed: Timlilit yerran asefru aqbayli d asefru n tfaska lmaɛna n wawal d win n waraz d ayla n wiyaḍ dɣa nettɣili yesnulfa-d. Ma d yiwen-nniḍen s nnehta yenna-d: Kkiɣ deg waṭas n tfaskiwin, wwiɣ aṭas n warazen, ulac d acu id-yennulfan. Ma d amdakel-iw yeḥbes akk tikkin imi werjin yewwi araz. Ma ur skadbeɣ ara, yeḥbes ula d tira. Lḥasun ṭuqqtent tmuɣliwin, armi i as-sliɣ i yiwen: Wa yettruḥu akken ad d-yessisen wayeḍ akken seg-sen ad d-yeddem, yiwen am nekk akken ad d-yendem! Mi testaqsaɣ acimi? Yenna-d: Qqersen wigi yesmedyizen s teqbaylit, qqarsen! Ha-tt-an tusa-d tfaska, teqqim kra n wussan, ufraren-d 3 n yimedyazen gar-asen, tekkfa tfaska, yella wacu id-yennulfan?

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima.D 

  
 Urɛad ur yekfi unadi ɣef yizuray iɣ d-ğğan lejdud di teglest , d anza d akken llan.Ihi kra n yimdanen nezmer ad d-nini d irekkisen deg lɛerc At Mensur mazal ar ass-a ttnadin , gerrun-d s kra yesɛan asdig , dɣa ussan-a n yimuras xedmen tirekkisent anda id-yusa mass Farid Kherbouche , d anegmi deg ugraw CNRPAH , d anemhal n tirekkisent n tuzuray Geldaman, i d-yerzan di Lezzayer tamanaɣt akk d Djamal Aliouat d aneɣmas n uɣmis « Lwatan » ilmend unadi d usekfel deg wayen yefrendeg At Mensur, ufan-d wid yellan d usligen neɣ yellan di taɣult deg umahil-a anda yella yiwen umnadi Hakim Ferkiwi d win yettnadin ɣef yimeḍqan d wamek id-ferrurin twaculin , yella daɣen Saad Idir d anaẓur , d amedyaz , d aselmad , Sadek Hannat d amedyaz d amnadi ,yella daɣen Ghilas Abdous win yellan deg ugraw atrar “Ithran “ d anazur , ihi agraw-a akk Kaci Mohand Meziane d anegmi , d amedyaz ,zgan d imaha ɣer usekfel deg wayen yefren acḥal leqrun , am wakken llan d isukkar , ttawin-d tilta yal tama , anda ufan kra n yicerfa anda qqaren-d d akken tanica “silex” mazal-itt tella , ufan kra n yiḍɣaɣen deg-s izumal d kra n wawalen ttwawcmen s yes , d adrig , d ayen ur nettwafham , wwin-d yid-sen kra n lesnaf n yiḍɣaɣen ad d-nebder gar-asen “aḍɣaɣ n lemleḥ , aḍɣaɣ n lemsed …llan wiyad mazal ttandin ɣef wassagen-is ,rezzun ɣef tesyar n waman d ufus , yellan anda ufan iɣuraf din id-gerrun d akken ma yettwaxdem neɣ mazal, ufan ibasalen anda twaxdamen s uḍɣaɣ deg-s iteẓẓaḍden ayen yesɛan aman. Ufan-d ɣer tama-nsen aselway n Tɣiwant Ukeffadu mass Haddadou Mhenni anda yefka-asen-d ttawilat , ihi anadi mazal , d asekfel ayen mazal yella , d tifukalin , d izuray ,… 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Azedine Abdou 

  
 Ass n lǧemɛa yezrin, tiqucac n udrar n Ǧerǧer dlent imerra s udfel i asent-yefkan yiwet n cbaḥa ifazen. Tasebḥit, abrid yettawin ɣer Tikjda yegguma ad yenneqḍaɛ s yimerriyen i d-yusan seg yal tama. Ama seg Sṭif, Lburǧ, Lezzayer tamanaɣt neɣ Boumerdès, amkan-a n tmerrit d waddal yegguma ad yawi annect-a n yimdanen i d-yerzan ɣer ɣur-s. Deg Teɣzert, neɣ Tinzar, truḥeḍ almi qrib d Aswel, tiwaculin, ɛemrent abrid, teddun deg udfel anda imeẓyanen smuheblen s wurar d usebded n lexyalat. Tuget n twaculin-a i nemmuger, fernent ad sfuglent s umenzu n yennayer dagi deg leɛlayat n Ǧerǧer imi nnant-d:”iḍelli, ur aɣ-tessefk ara liḥala iwakken ad nemmager aseggas amaynut deg yixxamen-nneɣ, deg tsusmi. Nebɣa ad d-nass ɣer da, i wakken ad nemmager yennayer gar medden irkelli, imi lferḥ yesɛa sser mi ara yezdi aṭas n yimdanen. Ass-a, ad as-necfu, yerna ad t-neẓẓu deg wallaɣer n warraw-nneɣ i wakken ɣer sdat d nutni ara ikemmlen.” Deg yiḍ n lexmis, teldi Tikjda tiwwura-s i usfugel n yennayer s waṭas n leqdic. Aṭas n yimdanen i d-yusan, sɛeddan tameɣra dinna imi ttawilat imerra ufan-ten-id.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Smail. M 

  
 Aneγlaf n teywalt mass Ḥamid Grine, yexdem tirza n usefqed γer lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu ass n 22 tuber yezrin ass aγelnaw n tγamsa tazzayrit, anda i yella γef lmendad n tulya n wexxam n tγamsa n Tizi-Wezzu s yisem n uneγmas Malik Ait Aoudia i tewwi tmettant ussan-agi yezrin mbaεd aṭan it-yeṭfen. Tamesbanit-agi tella-d s leḥdur n uneγlaf n yelmeẓyen d wadal mass Uld Σli Lhadi, Lwali n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu mass Brahim Merad, aselway n wesqamu aγerfan n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu mass Ḥussin Harun, tawacult n tγamsa d twacult n uneγmas Malik Ait Aoudia d yinemhalen n tmahliwin yemgaraden. Maca tiddukla n yineγmasen d yemcegεen n tγamsa akked wesqamu aγarfan n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezuu begnen-d lγiḍ-nsen imi ur-ttewcawren-ara γef amek ara d-yilli usemmi n wexxam n tγamsa-agi. Acu kan, aneγlaf n teywalt mass Ḥamid Grine, yenna d akken ad-tilli tegnit niḍen sya d afella anda ara nefk isemawen n yineγmasen yeγlin γef tugdut d tlelli n tγamsa am Allaoua Aït Mébarek d wiyaḍ niḍen. Axxam n tγamsa Malik Ait Aoudia n Tizi-Wezzu yesεa 40 n tzeγwa, lqahwa, tazeqa n yinejmuεen, u yella-d usbedi n merra ttawilat iwulmen akken ineγmasen n tira ad-xedmen di tegnatin igarzen, imi deqs n yineγmasen i yettidiren ugguren meqren di lxedma, ttruḥun deg wemkan γer wayeḍ d anadi γef amek ara cegεen isallen-nsen γer yeγmisen. Syen, aneγlaf n teywalt mass Ḥamid Grine, yesnarna deg ahil n radyu n Tizi-Wezzu, di 06 n ssbaḥ almi d ttnaṣfa n yiḍ, imi d yiwet n radyu id-yefkan aṭas n tallelt i lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu xarṣum deg ayen icuden γer unegmu n lwilaya-agi, syen aneγlaf n teywalt mass Ḥamid Grine yerra tajmilt i twacult n tγamsa sumata, anda i yeεzem tikci n wallalen iwulmen i usebγes n waḥric-agi.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;">  Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ugar n 15 n wussan segmi i d-yeffeɣ udlis-nniḍen amaynut i tsekla taqbaylit, ɣur Teẓrigin El Amal n Tizi Uzzu. Talallit n tikkelt-a ur telli n tmedyazt, n tullist neɣ n wungal, maca, d tin n usegzawal n tenfaliyin tiqbayliyin i yesɛan assaɣ akked tfekka n umdan s umata. Ula d azwel yefren-as-t umeskar-is Mass Muḥend Mehrazi, ad yili akka: “Asegzawal n tenfaliyin tiqbayliyin yerzan tafekka n umdan: tizumla d tgensas”. D adlis i yettawin 475 n yisebtar, iɣef rsent azal n 2200 n tenfaliyin n temnaḍt n Leqbayel, ttwarunt s yisekkilen n temɛemrit. Ma d tasuqilt-nsent, tettwaxdem ɣer tefransist. Nnig waya, ula d asegzi n yinumak n tenfaliyin-nni, ad t-yaf yimeɣri deg usegzawal. Muḥend Mehrazi, mmi-s n Tizi Uzzu, aselmad n tutlayt tamaziɣt deg tesdawit n Tubiret, niqal yessaẓreg-d yakan kra n yidlisen. Gar-asen amawal n tudsa d tussniwin n umeslay (Lexique de la didactique et des sciences du langage) d usegzawal n tgezmi tafransist-tamaziɣt (Dictionnaire d’électrotechnique français-berbère), d wiyeḍ. Tikkelt-a mi d-yessufeɣ asegzawal-a iɣef yebda iqeddec deg useggas n 2007, iban yumer ayendin mi yessamed ccɣel-is. « Tutlayin merra sɛant isegzawalen. Ula d tamaziɣt ilaq ad ten-tesɛu. Ttwaliɣ tutlayt-nneɣ tedda asurif ɣer sdat, meɛna mazal-as aṭas n yisurifen. S leqdicat n warraw-is ad ternu ad taẓ. Nekk iswi-iw d asnerni n tmaziɣt… Ssarameɣ ihi asegzawal-a n tenfaliyin, ad t-aɣen medden akken ad kkin ula d nutni deg usnerni-s ». I aɣ-d-yenna umeskar. Tiɣin n udlis-a, ad tili teshel i yimeɣri, imi yettnuzu di yakk tinedlisin n tmurt s wazal n 1000 n yidinaren.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Deg ussan-agi iεeddan i d-yeffeɣ udlis amaynut n umaru d imsuggel aqbayli Lounes Amziane iwumi yefka azwel “ Kra seg umezgun n « TCHEKHOV ». Yeffeɣ-d udlis-agi ɣer tezrigin Art Plume. D win ara yesnernin tasekla tamaziɣt d win ara d-yawin abaɣur i tutlayt-nneɣ tamaziɣt. D adlis wis tlata i d-isuqqel seg tefransist ɣer teqbaylit, syin akkin i d-yessuffeɣ d idlisen. Imi i d- yesuqqel 41 n tmucuha n « Jean de la Fontaine », s tewsit n tmedyazt d isefra ; aḥric amenzu yella-d usuffeɣ-ines deg useggas n 2012, iwumi isemma « Timucuha » ideg llan 20 n tmucuha. Aḥric wis sin dima s uzwel « Timucuha », yella-d useffeɣ-is deg 2013, ideg llant 21 tmucuha. Ma d adlis wis kraḍ d “Lexḍubegga” n Anton Tchekhov s uzwel-is anasli “Une demande au mariage”, i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2013.Yexdem deg udlis-agi ajdid taserwest “adaptation” seg tefransist ɣer teqbaylit n kra n wayen yura umussnaw Arussi Tchekhov, yesuqqel-d deg-s tlata n tceqqufin n umezgun (lexḍubegga, bu tenεemt, ṭṭrura n tissit n dexxan) umussnaw-agi, yerna yefka-d agzul ɣet tudert-is d yimahilen-is. Taɣuri igerrzen i yimeɣriyen.

<div style="text-align: left;"> Taceqquft n umezgun “Anẓar” n Kader Ait Ali  
<div style="text-align: center;"> 
 
  
<div style="text-align: center;">
Deg ussan-agi yezrin, i d-ilul yiwen n udlis amaynut ara d-yernun abaɣur i temkerḍit n tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Adlis-agi, yessuffeɣ-it-id yiwen n yilemẓi, i d-igren iman-s i tikkelt tamezwarut deg ubrid-agi n tira s tamziɣt. Taceqquft-agi n umezgun iwumi yefka Kader Ait Ali azwel “ Anẓar ”, tesɛa semmus n yisuyas s teqbaylit, teffeɣ-d ɣer tezrigin Numidie n Tizi Uzzu. Ma d unuɣen i swayes i d-yerna cbaḥa i tceqquft-agi, d Mass Tighil A i d as-ten-isunɣen. Yefka-d deg-s adeg (tiẓgi, adrar) anida tḍerru tceqquft-agi, d yiwudam igejdanen yettekkin deg-s (lweḥc aberkan, tafat n wass, tiferṭeṭa, tizizwa). 
     

<div style="text-align: right;">Adaoun abdel Ghani 
  
 
  
  Aɣmis n Yimmaziɣen: Amek tebdiḍ ccna? 

  Malik Kezoui:  Bdiɣ ccna mačči s lebɣi, acku leɛmer ad as-niɣ nekk ad uɣaleɣ d acennay neɣ ad sefruyeɣ. Seg wasmi meẓẓiyeɣ ḥemmleɣ ad sleɣ aṭas i rradyu d wayen akk i icudden ɣer tẓuri. Qqaren-iyi-d imawlan-iw zik asmi mecṭuḥeɣ deg yiḍ ma ur sliɣ ara i uẓawan ur gganeɣ ara, acku d ayen wulfeɣ-tt, s yis-s i d-tturbbeɣ. Asmi leḥqeɣ ad ɣreɣ deg uɣerbaz n yimeɛdar yellan deg Boukhalfa, ufiɣ imeddukkal-iw llan deg-sen wid yeqqaren deg tesdawit, syin ttawin-iyi ad cnuɣ deg tmeɣriwin i d-yettilin daxel n tesdawit. Bdiɣ timeɣriwin deg tesdawiyin seg useggas n 1999, syin akkin cniɣ akked tiddukkliwin tidelsanin, syin ɣer sdat uɣaleɣ xedmeɣ aṭas n tmeɣriwin deg uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu.

  Ma yella win i d ak-id-yefkan afus n tallelt? 

 D tidet llan wid iyi-ɛawnen deg umecwar-iw n ccna, amezwaru seg-sen d acennay-nneɣ ameqqran i ḥemmleɣ aṭas wagi d “Ahcene Ahris”, lukan mačči d netta tili ass-agi ur ttawḍeɣ ara s andaka wwḍeɣ ass-a. Imi d netta i d-isulin ɣef usayes i wakken ad cnuɣ yid-s i tikkelt tamezwarut deg 2006, yerna d tameɣra-s taneggarut i yexdem. Syin akkin d aneɣlaf n yilmeẓyen d waddal Mass Ould Ali Lhadi, yellan imiren d anemhal n uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Aṭas n tikkal iyi-id-yessawel i wakken ad ɣeniɣ uqbel ad d-sufɣeɣ tasfift-iw tamezwarut. Syin akkin daɣen iɛwen-iyi ucennay-nneɣ nḥemmel aṭas, wagi d Ferhat, imi timeɣriwin-is tineggura yexdem deg tmura n Leqbayel (Tizi Uzzu, Bgayet akked Tubiret), cniɣ deg-sent yid-s ɣef usayes. Mebla ma ttuɣ tameɣra taneggarut i yexdem Si Moh deg useggas n 2004, yessuli-iyi-d daɣen cniɣ yid-s.

  Ma d isefra-k kan i tcennuḍ? 

 Tidet kan, mačči ala isefra i xeddmeɣ nekk s timmad-iw i cennuɣ deg tezlatin-iw, xeddmeɣ-d tasuqilt i kra n tikta s tutlayt n tefransist, ttaraɣ-tent-id ɣer teqbaylit d isefra. Imi daɣen nekk ttnadiɣ aṭas u ḥemmleɣ ad suqleɣ tinfaliyin n yimura imeqqranen iyi-tteɛjaben. Am wakken daɣen i cniɣ yiwet n tezlit n Taleb Rabeh.

  Amek tessawḍeḍ, ad teɣreḍ wa ad tecnuḍ, yerna kečč d amuḍin? 

 Deg temsalt-agi, nekk liɣ mgal widak ik-yeqqaren belli aẓawan neɣ ccna tettɛewiq inelmaden ɣef lqraya-nsen. Nekk lukan mačči d ccna ur cukkeɣ ara ad ɣreɣ, lukan daɣen mačči d leqraya cukkeɣ ur cennuɣ ara. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ belli ta tettkemmil ta, ulac am wakken mi ara ddukklent. Nekk ttafeɣ aṭas iman-iw deg ccna, yis-s senqaseɣ ɣef wul-iw, senfalayeɣ ayen bɣiɣ…atg. Imir-nni yeɛni liɣ qqareɣ yerna cennuɣ tura akka selmadeɣ deg uɣerbaz n yimeɛdar n Boukhalfa, yerna mazal-iyi ttɣeniɣ. Ma d aṭṭan-iw d tamesalt-nniḍen akk, acku ḥemmleɣ tamussni d unadi dɣa lemdeɣ tura uɣaleɣ selmadeɣ, ula d ccna ḥemmleɣ-tt aṭas dɣa rebḥaɣ fell-as. 

 Ula d tamsalt n uselmed deg uɣerbaz, laɛmer xemmeɣ ɣur-s, armi i d-ufiɣ iman-iw d aselmad ur ḥtameɣ ara.

  D acu n yiɛwiqen i d-tettmagareḍ deg ubrid n ccna? 

 Ugur amezwaru i d-ttmagareɣ nekk s timmad-iw d aṭṭan-iw, imi ulamma tura qqwan ttawilat imaynuten, maca ur nezmir ara ad nexdem kulec i yiman-nneɣ akken ilaq lḥal dima. Yerna lukan mačči d imeddukkal-iw d twacult-iyi iyi-ttɛawanen aṭas aṭas, tili ass-agi ur ttiliɣ ara gar-awen d afennan. Ma iɛwiqen i d-yettmagar ufennan s umata, imi afennan deg tmura-a ur ixeddem ara deg useggas kamel, imḍebbren ttɛassan kan tignatin akked tmeɣriwin, yecban yennayer, 20 yebrir, uḍan n remḍan…atg. Ḥesben-aɣ am tɣawsiwin melmi kan isen-yehwa ad aɣ-d-ssiwlen i wakken ad necnu, ayɣer ala ur d-ttilint ara tmeɣriwin n ccna ɣef teɣzi n useggas. Ulac daɣen imazragen d yimsuffɣen yesɛan ssaḥ. Ilaq daɣen ɣef yimdanen uzzigen ad d-gren afus-nsen, acku ddula weḥd-s ur tezmir ara i wannecat-a. 

 Ulamma yerna nekkni dagi deg Tizi Uzzu tanmehla n yidles txeddem ayen i wumi tezmer, lḥasun ulac tin itt-yugaren deg tmura-nneɣ deg temsalt n leqdic.

  Ma tcennuḍ kan ɣef tudert-ik, neɣ ɣef wayen ttidiren wiyaḍ? 

 Tamezwarut, cennuɣ ɣef wayen ttidireɣ nekk deg tudert n yal ass, syin akkin sefruyeɣ ɣef wayen ttḥulfun wid yettidiren yid-i deg tmetti. Imi nettɛici deg yiwen umkan dɣa uguren-nneɣ ttemcabin ama d tayri ama d aṭṭan ama ɣef yidles-nneɣ d teqbaylit-nneɣ, acu kan cennuɣ timsal-agi akken i tent-walaɣ nekk s timmad-iw. Imi daɣen suquleɣ-d cwiṭ seg tefransit ɣer teqbaylit, iban kan ad sefruɣ wa ad cnuɣ ɣef wayen ttḥusun wiyaḍ. Cniɣ daɣen ɣef yiwen n uderɣal i yettwalin tilufa akken-nniḍen mačči akken i d tent-ttwalin tuget n yimdanen, taɣuct iwumi semmaɣ “ssemhaɣ-am”.

  I kečč tettwaliḍ timsal akken itent-ttwalin medden, neɣ temxalaf tmuɣli-k fell-asen? 

 Deg tuget n temsal ttemgiridaɣ ɣef medden-nniḍen deg wamek i ttwaliɣ kra n tlufa n ddunit, yerna nekk uɣeɣ tannumi qqareɣ ayen ttwaliɣ ula ur yetteɛǧab ara lḥal imdanen, imi qqareɣ-tent-id akken qqariḥit, tikkwal ur ttaṭṭfeɣ ara iman-iw, ulamma ur bɣiɣ ara ad tent-id-iniɣ maca iaedda-yi lḥa mačči d lebɣi-w. Dɣa tura ttaɛraḍeɣ amek ur d-qqareɣ ara kulec ɣef wayen ttxemmimex d wayen ttwaliɣ deg tudert n yal ass, ilaq ad sawḍeɣ ur d-qqareɣ ara ayen yellan deg-i. Ulamma yeɛni ur cliɛeɣ ara deg yimdanen ur nbeɣɣu ara ayen i d-qqareɣ maca friɣ-tt d yiman-iw xas akken ẓriɣ ur zmireɣ ara ur d-qqareɣ ara kulec, maca ayen sneqsaɣ d aṭas.

  Ma yella wayen txeddmeḍ berra n ccna? 

 Am nekk am tuget n yicennayen neɣ n yinaẓuren s umata nxeddem ayen-nniḍen, yerna mačči d ccna i xeddim n uɣrum deg tmurt-nneɣ, nennu-tt kan d zyada. Ihi uqbel ad iliɣ d aselmad n tefransist deg uɣerbaz n yimeɛdar n Boukhalfa, asmi liɣ d anelmad deg tesdawit liɣ xeddmeɣ ɣer yiwet n tezrigt i wumi qqaren “Llala Moulati”, seɣtayeɣ-asen idlisen n tmaziɣt i d-tessufuɣ s ttawil n tira n “Braille”. Gar wayen sextaɣ adlis-nni n Kateb Yacine, adlis-nni n Mouloud Feraoun, akked tmucuha i warrac imeẓyanen. Menbeɛd mi tamurt teṭṭef-itt ccedda n lexsas n yidrimen, dɣa yenna-iyi bab n tezrigin-agi nekk ad ḥebseɣ imi ulac idrimen. Dɣa seg yimiren ar tura aql-iyi-n d aselmad n tefranstist deg uɣerbaz n Boukhalfa.

  Mmeslay-aɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef umecwar-ik deg ccna? 

 Deg ccna aql-aɣ nruḥ-as kan s ttawil, nxeddem ayen i wumi nezmer wayen kan nesɛa. Ulamma bdiɣ ccna deg useggas n 1999, maca ur d-sufɣeɣ ara tasfift alarmi d aseggas n 2010, armi ɛeddan 11 n yiseggasen n tmeɣriwin ɣef usayes i skelseɣ tasfift-iw tamezwarut, i wummi semmaɣ “Tiktabin”, ideg llant 7 n tezlatin. Tis snat giɣ-as isem “Africa”, llant deg-s 8 n tuɣac, yiwet s tefransist ma d sebɛa-nni-nniḍen s teqbaylit. D tasfift ideg cnan aṭas n yicennayen, gar-asen: Djafer Ait Mengullat, yiwen n ucennay n tmurt n Coungou, nekkini…atg. Deg useggas n 2014, rniɣ-d aḍebsi-w wis tlata, d winna i wumi fkiɣ azwel “Tamurt-iw”, llant deg-s 9 n tuɣac. D aḍebsi daɣen ideg cnan waṭas n yicennayen n tmurt n Leqbayel, yecban Rabeh Ouferhat, Karim Abranis, Malek Bachi, Nouria…atg. Syin ilindi rniɣ-d tasfift-iw taneggarut, i wumi giɣ azwel “Tujmiwin”.

  Acimi d “tujmiwin” i textareḍ d azwel i tesfift-nni n 2016? 

 Imi uɣaleɣ-d aṭas ɣer temẓi-iw, mektaɣ-d ayen akk ddreɣ deg tallit-nni d wamek i tt-ddreɣ deg teswiɛt-nni. Yerna azwel-agi fkiɣ-t i tesfift s umata, acku ulac tizlit i wumi semmaɣ tujmiwin, ulac ula d afyir ideg i t-id-uddreɣ. Nekk tura friɣ-tt d rray-iw belli izwal n tesfifin-iw ilaq ad ilin jemlen-d akk isental n tuɣac-nni yellan deg-sen.

  Neẓra belli tɛedleḍ aṭas akked ucennay Taleb Rabeh, amek armi? 

 Ulamma semḥaseɣ i tuɣac-is yerna ḥemmleɣ-t uqbel ad tissineɣ, maca deg yennayer n 2006, ssawlen-as-d akken ad yexdem tadwilt deg tiliẓri tazzayrit “Canal Algérie”, yuɣ ula d nekk nan-iyi-d ad dtecnuḍ yiwet n tezlit n 5 ddqayeq kan. Yuɣal yenna-as i uneɣmas-nni ilaq ad yili yid-i deg leblaṭu, ad imeslay am nekk, dɣa yefreḥ uneɣmas-nni s tigawt-agi igrrzen. Yerna imiren ur iyi-ssin ara, mi nekfa tadwilt-nni niɣ-as ayen txedmeḍ akken yenna-iyi-d lukan d nekk i yellan deg umkan-ik iyi-ɣaḍ lḥal mliḥ, dɣa deg wass-nni nuɣal d imeddukkal n tidet, netta iḥemmel-iyi seg yimir nekk tezad aṭas leḥmmala-w ɣur-s. Syin akkin niɣ-as ma maɛlic ad cnuɣ tizlit-ik, yenna-iyi-d ulac fell-as. Maca llan kra n yicennayen lliɣ ḥemmleɣ-ten mačči d izli, ḥemmleɣ ad asent-smuzegteɣ i tezlatin-nsen, maca mi iyi-tettunefk tegnit ssneɣ-ten uɣaleɣ kerhaɣ-ten aṭas.

  Ma yella wayen tsewjadeḍ? 

 D tidet, sewjadeɣ yiwen n album amaynut, maca wellah ma ẓriɣ imelmi ara yewjed i wakken ad d-yeffeɣ. Ẓiɣ kan belli ad ilint deg-s 12 n tezlatin, yiwet s tefransist tiyaḍ akk s teqbaylit. D tasfift ideg daɣen ara ɣenin waṭas n yicennayen, gar-asen: yiwet n tcennayt tacenwit yettwassnen aṭas, yiwen n ucennay d uneɣmas i xeddmen akka tura a “El Watan”, d wiyaḍ. Ad d-tuɣal deg-s tezlit-nni Africa.

  Ma yella wayen ara d-ternuḍ? 

 Bɣiɣ kan ad weṣṣiɣ icennayen-agi ilmeẓyen, i wakken ur ten-yetteffeɣ ara leɛqel i wakken ad kecmen ɣer ustudu, i wakken ad skelsen tasfift. Ilaq qbel ad cnun deg tmeɣriwin aṭas n tikkal, imi asayes iselmad aṭas n tɣawsiwin, i wakken ad d-tjemɛeḍ imferɣen-ik, i wakken ad txedmeḍ tadellet i yiman-ik d yawen ara d-tesuffɣeḍ ɣer sdat.

  Awal-ik n taggara? 

 Tanemmirt-ik ɣef tdiwennit-agi iyi-texdmeḍ s tmaziɣti nekk d leqdicat-iw idelsanen. Iɛǧeb-iyi lḥal imi tadiwennit-agi tettwaxdam s tutlayt n tyemmat. Tanemmirt tameqqrant i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen imi i yi-iga azal, ad awen-iniɣ afud igerrzen i kunwi d uɣmis-nwen. Ad iniɣ tanemmirt s tussda i wid akk iyi-ḥemmlen, d widak yesmeḥsisen i tuɣac-iw. Ma nebɣa tamaziɣt ad taẓ ɣer sdat, ilaq ad tili deg yal iḥricen n tudert-nneɣ, deg tɣamasa, deg tira, deg ccna, deg yidles s umata…atg.

  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Taɣlamt taɣelnawt n ddaw 17 n yiseggasen ad turar timliliyin-nnes timmidwanin mgal Tunes ussan n 23 d 27 Meɣres deg Ldzayer Tamaneɣt i ussewjed n snat-a n teɣlamin akken ad ttekkint deg temliliyin n waffas (taṣfiyat) n Teqbuct n Tefriqt n Yeɣlanen n 2017 ɣef wakken ay aɣ-d-tenna Tfidiṛalit Tadzayrit n Tcirt n Uḍar ass n lexmis. Timlilit tamezwarut ad d-tili ass n laṛebɛa 23 Meɣres 2016 ɣef s3:30 deg usarir n Umeɣrus Ait Hocine deg Berraqi. Timlilit Tis snat ad d-tili ass n lḥedd 27 Meɣres 2016 ɣef s3:30 deg Wammas Atwilan Aɣelnaw n Tfidiṛalit Tadzayrit n Tcirt n Uḍar deg Sidi Musa. Imariren idzayriyen n ddaw 17 uraren yagi dduṛt yezrin snat n temliliyin timmidwanin mgal Maṣer. Tamezwarut xeṣren deg-s s 0 ɣer 1, ma d tis snat, rebḥen deg-s s 2 ɣer 1. Timliliyin-a d aḥric seg ussewjed i uɛeddi ɣer Teqbuct n Tefriqt n ddaw 17 n yiseggasen. tuzzya tamezwarut n temliliyin n uɛeddi, Ldzayer ad turar mgal Libya. Akken ad tessewjed teɣlamt tadzayrit iman-nnes i temlilit-nnes mgal Tunes, ad teg tannant (tarabbuṣ) seg 18 ɣer 28 Meɣres 2016 deg usensu n Planteurs deg Ldzayer Tamaneɣt. Isleɣmayen (mudarribin) ɣran-d i 26 n yimariren, gar-asen 7 seg teɣlamt n Paradou AC. Imariren umi d-ɣran d wi: Juba Sami, Zorgane Adam, Dehiri Hocine, Zerouki Merouane, Berkoune Abderrahmane, Boucif Zerrouk, Benleguemari Chaouki (Paradou AC), Kessour Mohamed, Boutahra Zakaria (USM Belɛebbas), Baghdaoui Mohamed Amine (MC Wehṛan), Latafi Mhamed, Moussaoui Abdennour (ASO Cclef), Hamdad Karam (Ilemẓiyen Inaddalen n Leqbayel), Maazouz Tahar Chahine, Belaribi Aymen, Ouamara Nabil, Kerroum Ahmed, Belharane Abdelkader (ASM Wehṛan), Ait Ziane Meziane (USM Leblida), Tougai Mohamed Amine (NA Ḥusin Day), Idir Mahdi (JSM Bgayet), Rahmani Abdelmoumen, Boudchicha Aissa (CAB Lbuṛj Buɛṛiṛij), Louanchi Abdelkrim (MC Ldzayer) et Belouli Abderrezak et Bensahli Ouail (ES Sḍif).<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  APS 

  
 Teɣli teslent deg Illulen, tḥuza yiwen d Mlikec, d anzi yebnan ɣer tidet ur yekki wammus. Akka diɣ i teḍṛa akked tifranin timnaḍin( éléctions régionales) I d-yellan taggara-agi di Tmurt n Fṛansa.Iṛumyen buṭin, iẓẓiriyen ikecm-iten ihwah akked lḥir am akken i d-yeqqar wawal aqbur : tayaziḍt tettarew, ayaziḍ iqerḥ it uqeṛṛu-is. Ssebba ? Imi d Anyir Aɣelnaw n Marie Lepen( FN) id yezgan d amezwaru deg lbut-agi. 

 Akken kan id iban wamek ffɣen-t tifranin-agi, yekker wahruḥu akked “qiluqal» deg Facebook akked twitter amzun akken nettales i yifṛansisen amek ara buṭin neɣ ɣef anwa ɣef ara buṭin. Akka akka, wa yenna-k irrumyen d imedɣal tzeddeɣ deg-sen tamsirit( racisme) , ur ḥamlen ara iẓẓiriyen, aɛraben, inselmen. Wihin( deg akken yečča ḥabuṛa) yesfelet agrireb i tmurt n Fṛansa imi agdud-is yedderɣel yezzi s taɛrurt i tugdut . Wayeḍ( deg akken yerfa s yir lbut-agi) yettgalla war yeḥnit ur mazal ad yerkeḍ akal n Fṛansa s-iḍaṛṛen-is skud d akabar-agi n FN i yeṭṭfen zzmam n temsal di temnaḍin n tmurt-agi. Ziɣ nezwar deg tsertit armi i teḍṛa yid-nneɣ am akken is yenna wanzi: “axxam-nneɣ ur d –as nezmir, i lǧameɛ neṭṭef amazir! A buh…

 Meɛna tidet ilaq a tt-id yini wemdan: ayen yessawḍen agdud n tmurt n Fṛansa ad yeččeḥ ɣef ikabaren iqburen n llem azelmaḍ neɣ a yeffus d tasertit ḍefṛen ineggura-agi mgal imnigiyen izeḍɣen din-a. Tamurt n Fṛansa ( seg asmi id yeṭṭef adabu François Mittèrand) telli tiwwura-ines i yeɣriben akken ad sɛun nekwa tafṛansist. Di tmuɣli n udabu n Fṛansa d win id abrid akken ad zdin ijentaḍ akked inṣaliyen n tmurt. S wakken-nni ara teddukkel tmeti , imdanen-is a d zḍen lwaḥid ddaw yiwen ubeḥnuq . di nwaya-nsen d tasertit ara yerran i yal yiwen leqder akked lɛezz . Maca asujer -agi yezleg , imi iɣriben-agi yewwin nekwa n tafṛansist , bɣan tsekkurt timalalin: ad ilin d iɣermaniyen n tmurt-nni i ten-ijemɛen yerna ad ḥettmen ɣef imewalen-is leɛwayed n tmeddurt-nsen. S wakka iweqaɛ-itt u suter n yir izerfan( am lebni n leǧwameɛ, tarrussi n lḥijab akked uqendyar, taẓallit deg iberden..) armi zerɛen lxuf deg ulawen n-iṛumyen , yettwalin d akken tamurt-nsen tewwi abrid ɣer usyax ma yella tkamel-akken-nni. Rnu ɣef aya, tixazabiyin id yekkan s ddaw n ufus n rebrab tineggura-agi, dɣa yenfel wayen id neflen. 

 Amek ara n llum ɣef iṛumyen ma yella tuget deg-sen ugin tisirit taẓzelmat neɣ tayeffust id wwin ikabaren iqdimen( akabar amnay akked ukabar agududan)? Amek ara neččeḥ ɣef fell-asen ma yella bɣan ad teqqim tamurt-nsen d tagdudant, d talaykit, d tafṛansist isenden ɣef yidles amasiḥi? 

 Meɛna teḍṛa-tt d wigi-nneɣ ( yebɣan ad ilin n d agi yerna n dihin armi celxen iṭṭaren-nsen deg akken i ten-sen ferɛen ɣef snat n tmura) am akken wwin ad yeẓiẓen ɣef taggara yeẓẓel iḍaṛṛen! Ziɣ tamacahut n yifer akked umerɣun mazal tesɛa inumak !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Ddurt-a iɛeddan, am wakken i d-nessedda yakan isalli deg yisebtar-a, tella tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, i yeggugen seg waɣir n Bgayet s wazal n 60 n yikilumitren, d rreḥba n yidles azwaw, mi tesuddes, tesnubget, sin n ttiɛadat yeswan: amsizwer adigan n yiqennucen, akked tfuggla n Tesbeddit Tiregwa i tikci n warrazen n yimsizwar-is n tullisin ed wungal, rnu daɣen taggazin i yisdawanen (taggazt Racid Ɛellic, tin n Masin Uharun, akked Muḥend Saɛid At Mlikec). Ilmend n waya, ddeqs n yinebgawen, gar imeɣnasen, imedyazen, iselmaden, wid iḥemmlen idles s umata, i yellan deg dduḥ n Udrar n Fad, daxel n uxxam n yilemẓiyen n tɣiwant anda i d-llan tuget n warmuden (activités), imi ula d kra n yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel ḥsan teɛna-ten taluft, ḥeḍren i wayen merra yemuggen. Ayen i d-yellan s umata ass n amhad (lexmis), ttwaldint tanezzayt temzikknin n wayen akk icudden i Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad ed umezruy-is, syinna d ajerred n wid yettekkan deg ttiɛad, akked usnubget n wid i d-yerzan i Udrar n Fad, gar yimeɣnasen n Tregwa ed yimeɛraḍen i d-iḥewwsen seg waṭas n tamiwin. Ass n sem (lǧemɛa), yettwager wuɣud anida ara qqden yiqennucen, sɣur kra n temɣarin tinasniliyin n taddart, iɣef i d-tella tirzi tamenzut sɣur yimeḥḍar. Mi d-telḥeq temrint n wawalen n teldayt yuli uselway n Tdukkla, mass Fares Bakkuc, ɣer usayes akken ad d-yini ameslay-is. Ilemẓi-ya d win i yessarmen ladɣa tirza n lɛali i yimeɣnasen n Tesbeddit Tiregwa, i yinebgawen-is ed wid n Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad. Syin akkin iɛedda-d Sadeq n Ayt Urbaɛ (Rebbaɛi), yefka-d awal-is s yisem-is ed win n yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel, s wacu yesnemmer kra n wid iqeddcen i uḥraz ed usnerni n yidles, gar-asen tilawin n Udrar n Fad i icebbḥen ddeɛwa n umsizwer n yiqennucen, akked yimeɣnasen n Tregwa i d-yettagen seg berra ayen ur xeddmen kra n daxel. Ma deg nnuba n Racid At Ɛli Uqasi, aselway n Tesbeddit-a, yesmekta-d ladɣa umeɣnas-a dakken ma ur nga nekni kra atan ulayɣer ma nurǧa adabu-nni, rnu ɛad tasertit taxabit. Deg usemmed n wahil temmug ṭṭabla timezdit sɣur umeɣnas Yasin Zidan, amaru Lɛerbi Yeḥyun, amedyaz Seɛdi Qasi, akked umaẓrag Abdelmalek Mennic. Wi d wid i d-yewwin isaragen ɣef tfarest tamaziɣt (production amazighe) ar tura, ama deg tsekla, neɣ deg kra n taɣulin n tgemmi, am win n yiqennucen. Yella-d daɣen usenɛet n yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun sɣur terbaɛt n yilemẓiyen i aɣ-d-yusan seg Tbatent. Taceqquft-a tewwi-d ɣef usentel, ad d-nini icudd i umezruy, imi win i tt-yuran ed wid i tt-id-yuraren wwin-d kra n tugniwin d imedyaten ɣef wamek teḍra i Tgelda n Aksel. Kra n wakud akken, tewweḍ-d teswiɛt n tikci n warrazen, ɣef 17sr akken-nni, i wid i d-yufrar deg yimsizwar n tullisin ed wungalen umi d-tessawel ilindi Tesbeddit Tiregwa. Ɣer taggara n tmeddit, deg yiḍ, gerrzen ddeqs n yinaẓuren tagnit tama n uxxam n yilemẓiyen, am unaẓur n tezlit taɣerfant (ceɛbi) i yettwaḥemmlen aṭas, wa d Yasin Azwaw (Zwawi). Anaẓur Ɛli Ɛemran, Atmaten Imanza (Imenza), Izenẓaren, akked ddeqs n yicennayen nniḍen, am Wali Ɛebdelɣani seg Ayt Smaɛel. Aredmani, yal yiwen seg-sen yufa assaɣ-is icudd ɣer uzayez i yellan s ṭṭaqa, i d-yettarran s waṭas. Ula d timlilit tdum almi tɛedda akkin tzeggant n yiḍ s sin n yisragen. Ma yella d ass n sem, yewwi-d uduktur Ḥasen Ḥirec yiwet n tanant ɣef uxemmem n tmetti n wass-a. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi  

  
 Taviṭamint(vitamine) ; d asafar tetteḥwaǧi tfekka n umdan akken ad tessider igmamen-is(organs) i meṛṛa. D acu, imi tafekka ur tezmir s timmad-is ad d-teslal s ṭṭaqa tiviṭaminin-a, ilaq ad tent-tettaf deg učči-s s tawant. D acu n tviṭaminin i yellan ? D acu n wazal sɛant? Acu n wučči i deg ttilint ? d isteqsiyen i ɣef ara neɛreḍ ad d-nerr tikkelt-a deg umagrad-nneɣ.

<p style="text-align: center;"> D acu n tviṭaminin i yellan? 

 S umata llant 13 n tviṭaminin, 4 seg-sent (taviṭamint A, D, E, K) tezmer tfekka ad tent-texzen di tassemt tesɛa, ɣas ma ur llint ara deg učči n yal ass, ur d-yettili ara lexṣaṣ. Ma 9 nniḍen ( taviṭamint B1, B2, B5, B6, PP, B8, B9, B12, C), tessuffuɣ-itent tfekka yal tikkelt deg yibeccan ɣef waya ilaq ad ttilint deg učči n yal ass akken ur d-yettili ara kra n lehlak. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> D acu n wazal sɛant? 

  Taviṭamint A  (Rétinol): Tettḥarab ɣef yiẓri imi tessijhid yal aḥric deg wallen, ɣef waya lexṣaṣ-is izmer ad d-ifekk tidderɣelt. Tissiɣzif iɣes labeɛda ɣer yimeẓyanen. Tettḥarab ɣef uglim si yal tamsalmit, am wakken tettḥarab ɣef wul d yiẓuran n yidammen si yal lahlak n tassemt. Qqaṛen-d imussnawen akken taviṭamint-a, tettḥarab seg waṭṭan n uxenzir.

  Taviṭamint D  (Calcéférol): D nettat i yettsummun lkalṣyum(calcium) akked lfuṣfur(phosphore) seg yiẓerman akken ad awḍen ɣer yal tasrirt. Am wakken, tessijhid iɣes. Ɣef waya lexṣas-is, yeslalay-d tehcec n yiɣsan.Azal-is d ameqqṛan di tallit n tadist imi d nettat i yettawin tasmekna ilaqen n lkalṣyum i llufan akken ad yimɣur akken ilaq.

  Taviṭamint E  (Tocophérol): Azal-is d ameqqṛan, d aḥareb mgal temɣeṛ d ɛeyyu n yal agmam, mgal diɣ n tiɛuqqeṛt (stérilité).

  Taviṭamint K  : D taviṭamint yettḥaraben seg tazzla n yidammen (hémorragie) imi teslalay-d isufar ilaqen deg-sen akken ad jemden war ma glan-d s kra n twaɣit i umdan labeɛda di tegnit n tfidi lqayen.

  Taviṭamint B1  (Thiamine) : D nettat i d lsas n tlalit n tezmert ɣer umdan, aya s usexdem ilaqen n yal sskeṛ i ikecmen tafekka. Am wakken, tettwassen s yisem n tviṭamint mgal aṭṭan n lbiribiri (BériBéri) i d-yettakken lehlak n yiẓuran n lḥess d wul.

  Taviṭamint B2  (Réboflavine) : D nettat i yessishilen aseqdec n tassemt d tepṛutiyin i d-iteddun deg učči n yal ass.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Dali Salima 

  
 Am yal aseggas, anamek n ukcam n tegrest d tiwin n yal ssenf d avirus i yettafen iman-is yettidir, yettili dɣa deffir n wacḥal d aṭṭan. Gar waṭṭanen-a ihi, d win i ur nzeggel ula d yiwen: azleg, neɣ abeḥri deg kra n temnaḍin (la grippe). Azleg d aɛdaw amenzu n yimdanen s umata deg tsemhuyt n usemmiḍ – ccetwa – almi tikwal yettḍurru aṭas win i yeṭṭef. Seg temḍerrit-a, ɣas llan wid ijebbden usu d ussan neɣ d imalasen (ddurtat) akken ad ḥlun ad selken, llan wiyaḍ, drusit, ttruḥun almi ttwaɣelben, ssufuɣen seg-s iẓiɣer, ladɣa imɣaren ed yimuḍan idumen. 

 Ɣef waya, yeɣtes Uɣlif n Tezmert ad yeldi seg tura tiwwura n ucraḍ i win yebɣan ad as-yili uzleg d afessas. Acraḍ ad ikemmel alama teffeɣ tegrest, yettusemma akkin i meɣres n useggas i d-iteddun 2015. Maca aɣilif yellan yekka-d sɣur kra n yiɣermanen (citoyens) i ugin acraḍ-a acku ugaden ad yesɛu ccɣel nniḍen deg tfekka bexlaf amennuɣ akked uzleg. «Nekk ur zmireɣ ad qebleɣ ad cerḍeɣ netta ẓriɣ aṭas n ṭṭebbat i yettagin acraḍ-a. Amek tebɣiḍ ad nesɛu nekni deg-s laman ?». I aɣ-d-tenna yiwet n teḥdayt i nesteqsa. Ɣef waya, atan ur terkid taluft-a deg wallaɣen n medden, wa yebɣa ad yecreḍ ikukra, wayeḍ ur yebɣa ur ikukra, wiyaḍ heggan ad qablen azleg am yal aseggas, awi-d ukan ad yili d aḥnin. Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 « Imeɣriyen imezwura i t-yeɣran, llan wid i d-yennan efk-as isem n wungal, kra nnan-d eg-as isem n tullist, llan wid i d-yennan ahat nezmer ad as-nsemmi tungalt. Rriɣ asteqsi-ya i wid terza temsalt, yiwen n umdakkel yenna-yi-d : « ur sexlaḍ ara tilufa : unti ad yeqqim d unti, amalay ad yeqqim d amalay, mulac ad d-negri deg usenfar-nni n Fransa : le mariage pour tous ». Ilmend n waya, Aḍris-a nezmer, ahat, ad t-nwali d ungal acku deg waṭas n tulmisin-is yeffel i tullist ; nezmer ad t-nwali d tulist acku wezzil ibedd s tuget ɣef umazrar n tedyanin ».

 Akka i yefren umaru ad d-yessisen aḍris aseklan yura. Yakan, mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-tettuɣal tmukrist-a n tewsatin n yidlisen i d-yettlalen deg tsekla tamaziɣt. Amek ilaq ad as-nsemmi i tewsatin n yiḍrisen iseklanen i ttarun yimura n tsekla tamaziɣt taggara-yi : d tullist, d ungal ? Dɣa, deg tmaziɣt, d ayen ibanen ad d-ttuɣalen yisteqsiyen icudden ɣer teẓri n tsekla skud mazal ur rkiden ara isfernen n ufran n yismawen n tewsatin tiseklanin, ɣas ttuqtent tezrawin i d-yettawin ɣef tmukrist-a.

 Ungal-a meẓẓiyen, yeffeɣ-d ɣer Tuẓrigin Tira, deg yebrir 2015 ; akken i d-yessuli tamukrist-a n usemmi n tewsatin tiseklanin i d-yewwi daɣen, ɣef waṭas n tektiwin d tkerwas iɣef zemrent ad mxalafent tmuɣliwin. Maca, deg umagrad-a, ad d-nefk amedya ɣef kra kan n tektiwin imi tuget ad tent-neǧǧ i twennafit n yimeɣriyen yebɣan ad ɣren ungal-a, ara afen deg tnedlisin neɣ deg temzikent n udlis deg Uxxam n Yidles n Tubiret ara yeṭṭefen armi d 17 ǧember 2015.

 Z. Meksem, s uḍris-is yebɣa ad d-iger ɣer wannar aṭas n temsal tinmettiyin yuklalen aɛiwed n tmuɣli ahat neɣ xersum axemmem fell-asent d ɣer-sent ɣas ma seg zik, imdanen uɣen tanumi yiwen ur izmir ad tent-id- yales neɣ ad tent-id-yader (tuffirin n tmetti, tuffirin n tnefsit n umdan, tasreṭ, …. ). Abeddel inmetti, assaɣ akked umaḍal igellu-d s ubeddel ula s tektiwin d tmusni s wacu llan ttamnen wid iɣ-yezwaren. Akka, tidet tettuḥwaj ccek, ccek yettuḥwaj anadi, anadi yessawaḍ ma mačči ɣer sswab ahat ɣer tesleḍt d tigzi ! 

 « Deg tsarit n taddart timḍelt tettili uqbel taẓallit n ṭṭhur ; maca ass-nni ɛeṭṭlen aṭas acku ccix n lǧameɛ yugi ad iẓẓal fell-as. Yenna-yasen : _ Amdan-a yenɣa iman-is, annect-a d leḥram deg ddin, ulac win ara t-yeccafɛen ama da ama dihin. D times n ǧǧahennama ara t-yeččen. Nekk ur zmireɣ ad ẓalleɣ ɣef win yeffɣen abrid n ddin ».

 Aḍris-is ur ibri ara daɣen i wayen yellan d iḥulfan yeseddawen amdan, maca yextar tikwal ad asen-yefk i yiḥulfan-a tamuɣli lqayen armi ssuren neɣ xelḍen akked tfelseft tanmeglant :  » D wa i d anamek n war abrid ideg yekcem umdan. Deg tama, yebɣa tudert ; deg tama yettcebbiḥ lmut. Ihi, ur lliɣ seg wid yekkaten aɣyul ddarayen tabarda-s. Ma temsa tumert-iw deg tmeddurt mačči seg wul i d-tekka. Ul-iw ira ad iḍes, ad yezhu, ad yedder, ad yazzel, ad yeldi tiwwura i tmeslayt, i ccna, i tayri… » 

 Tikwal-nniḍen, iḥulfan-a ṭṭfen kan deg tadra-nsen tamagnut ladɣa deg tenfaliyin ideg igellem leḥmala n Meẓyan i tmeṭṭu-is Taseɛdit akked sin n tarwa-s (Tanina d Гiwan) : « Yak d nutni i d ccbaḥa n tudert-is. Anaɣ d nutni i d tayri n wussan-is, d nutni i d ijeǧǧigen n tmuɣli-s. Mi yettwali akka seg-sen yettaččar almaɣ-is s tugniwin-nsen akken ad ten-yettwali am tafat gar yitran ».

 « Inig » d tamsalt-nniḍen yenfufden deg tmetti taqbaylit, iɣef yextar ad d-yemmeslay umaru ; imi i d-iglem tudert n Meẓyan (aṣaḍ neɣ awadem agejdan n ungal) din deg Fransa : « Deg Fransa Meẓyan ibedd ɣer uxeddim akken ad d-yessasi adrim ara yazen ɣer tmurt…. Ussan imezwura yedder-iten am uydi. Ur yufi afus n tallalt ara as-yesseknen iberdan, ara as-yeṭṭfen afus ara d-yaf axeddim, taxxamt akked wayen iwatan tudert n yiminig … ».

 Tefses n wawal d umawal, aseqdec n tutlayt timserreḥt, tihuskit n uɣanib, azeṭṭa yelhan gar tektiwin, aya akk yefka-yas i tutlayt n ungal-a attwel n ujbad n tmuɣli. Seg wawal amezwaru, am ddkir, awal ad k-id-issawal akken ad teɣreḍ wayeḍ alma d taggara ; ɣas taggara-s ur temmid, imi izmer ad teldi tiwwura i ḍerru n tedyanin-nniḍen ara t-issiɣzifen akken ad yuɣal d ungal ɣezzifen. Yakan d wa i d lebɣi n umaru, imi ur s-tettunfk ara kan tegnit ad as-ikemmel tira ; d ayen i t-yeǧǧan isuffeɣ-it-id akken i yella kan, war ma ikemmel-as. Ma d nekni s-yimeɣriyen, ahat s tmuɣli n usenqed d usezɣen amseɣran, s wawal n usebɣes, ara as-nefk tagnit d ufud i umaru akken ad isemmed ungal-a meẓẓiyen ɣer sdat.

<p style="text-align: right;">Kania Rabdi.

  
 lamma zrin 35 n yiseggasen ɣef tmenɣiwt n umeɣnas n tugdut akked yizerfan n umdan Kamel Amzal, maca mazal imdanen cfan ɣef wass n 2 deg waggur n unbir 1982. Ulac win ur iɣaḍ ara asmi yettwanɣa s yifassen n yimṭurfa akked yiɛdawen n tudert akken i asen-yeqqar Lwennas Maɛtub deg yiwen n usefru. Yettwanɣa daxel n tesdawit n Ben Ɛeknun, deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt, ass 2/11/2017. Kamel Amzal, yemmut lmut n yirgazen yesɛan tabɣest d tissas. Yettwanɣa imi yettuneḥsab d ameɣnas n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ u d ameɣras n tugdut d yizerfan n umdan. Ilul umeɣnas-agi, deg yirebbi n timunent n tmurt n Lezzayer, i d-yellan deg useggas n 1962, deg taddart n Tiferdud deg tɣiwant n Abi Youcef deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Yella d asdawan yettkemmil tizrawin-ines tufrinin deg tesdawit n Ben Ɛeknun, yellan deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt. Ruḥen yidammen-is d asfel amezwaru n yimeɣras n tugdut d yizerfan n umdan deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Yella daɣen, yettḥarab ɣef tektiwin-is yerzan idles amaziɣ, tilelli n rray n umeslay, tugdut akked yizerfan n yimdanen, dɣa yemmut fell-asen. Ssebba n tmenɣiwt-is, sɣur yimṭurfa inselmen i iqeddcen i lfayada n ukabar-nsen daxxel n tesdawit, d ulɣu-nni i iɛelleq deg lḥid daxel n tesdawit, ɣef lewhi n 8 n tmeddit. D ulɣu i d-yessawalen ɣer temlilit n yisdawanen n tesdawit, i wakken ad xedmen tasqamut ara d-yessuddsen leqdicat. Akken kan teǧuǧǧug deg-s temẓi, dɣa sewzlen-as leɛmer, rran-as tilist i tudert-is netta akken kan yeṣṣaweḍ 20 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is. Suzlen-as idammen-is yeḥman, yerwa-ten wakal, uggarent-d kra n tmiqwa i wakken ad d-qqiment d ccfawat. S ujenwi aqeṭɛan i wwin tarwiḥt-is deg tmeddit n wass-nni 2 deg unbir 1982. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti kan belli, taddart n Tiferdud ideg ilul, d nettat i yewwin arraz amezwaru n tezrigt tis semmus n temsizzelt n taddart tazedgant “Aissat Rabah” n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, dɣa tewwi 800 melyun n sentim. Imezdaɣ n taddart-agi, ttɛuzun-t aṭas, yerna tura zemren ad zuxxen yis-s, imi tamezwarut tefka-d argaz bu tissas d tebɣest yemmuten d ilemẓi, wagi d Kamel Amzal. Tis snat imi tewwi arraz amezwaru n taddart tazedgant deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. 

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Am yal taɣiwant seg tɣiwanin n lwilayat akk n tmurt, ssmektayent-d ass n 5 seg waggur n yulyu n 1962. Seg wass-nni ara ass-a, 55 n yiseggasen i yezrin ɣef wasmi tensa tmes n ṭṭrad mucaεen deg ddunit.

 Yal aseggas di yal tama n tmurt yettili-d usmekti n wass-a n 5 yulyu, yeεzizen aṭas ɣer ugdud azzayri, yerna yesεa azal d umezruy meqqren deg Tegrawla Tazzayrit 1954-1962. I lmend n umuli wis 59 n wass n timunent, ad d- yili usmekti-ines deg taddart n Tahanouts, yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Imi sbedden deg tlemmast n taddart-agi, tama n ubrid ameqqran, yiwen n usebdad ideg rran tajmilt i 26 n yimeɣrasen n 4 n tuddar (Ighil Bouchene, Thaguemount, Tahanout, Ait Khalfats). Yesqam-d lebni n usebdad-agi 08 n yimelyan n ddinar, mebla idrimen n tulya-s tunṣit ara d-yilin ass n lǧemɛa 07 yulyu 2017, imi yella-d usṭarḍaq n snat n lbumbat deg 07 yulyu 1956. Uran deg-s 15 n yimeɣrasen n taddart n Tahanouts gar-asen 4 n twacult Hacemi d 5 n twacult Oudiai. Akked sin n yimejuḥad-nniḍen n Thaguemount. Ma deg Ait Khalfats uran 8 n yimeɣrasen, 4 seg twacult n Moussaoui, d ukuẓ n twaculin-nniḍen. Ma taddart deg Ighil Bouchene, uran yiwen, wagi Nessah Ali. Bdan lecɣal n usenfar-agi deg waggur n duǧamber 2016 deg taggara n waggur maggu i kfan lxudma deg-s. Ayen yessefraḥen deg wannect-agi, imi s yidrimen n yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi d tuddar i d as-id-yezzin i swayes tettwaxdam. Yella-d ujmaɛ n yidrimen snat n tikkal. Tikkelt tamezwarut i wakken ad d-sṣiwḍen azal swayes ara bdun lebni-ines, ma d tikkelt tis snat i ujmaɛ n yidrimen n tulya tunṣibt. Ma d ahil yetturaǧun, ad d-yili ass n sem i d-iteddun, ad d-yili akka: tasebḥit n wass ad d-tili tulya tunṣibt n usebdad-agi n 26 n ccuhada, syin d asersi n snat n tmeqqunin n yijeǧǧigen ɣef lerwaḥ n ccuhada-agi akked rruḥ n yilemẓi Zaif Mohammed i iruḥen d asfel deg tefsut taberkant. Syin ɣur-s, ad d-yili umeslay sɣur yimjuhad i d-yecfan i umezruy n taddart-agi u ɣef tudert n ccuhada-agi. Ma ɣef 12h00 d asawen, ad d-tili lwaɛda n seksu s uksum i wid yellan akk din. Ɣer taggara maḍi, ad d-tili terbaɛt n yiḍebbalen, ara d-yawin kra n tezlatin imi d lferḥ u d tameɣra n taddart merra. Ma ɣef leqdic-a, yenna-d uselway n tesqamut n taddart Mass Mohammed Oumaiouf: “ Ad d-nesmekti ass n timunent am nekkni am tuddar-nniḍen, ideg nga yiwen n usebdad i 26 n ccuhada n 4 n tudrin i d-nebder yakan. Nefreḥ aṭas imi nessaweḍ ad asen-nerr tajmilt i ccuhada n taddart-nneɣ d tuddar i d aɣ-d-izzin s ttawilat-nneɣ nekni s yimezdaɣ n tuddar-agi, acku tura la nettwali belli aṭas n yilemẓyen ur neẓri ara amezruy n tmurt-nneɣ. Ilaq fell-aɣ nekni s yimeqqranen, ad asen-nales amezruy n tmurt d win n tmurt n Leqbayel. Ula deg taddart, aṭas ur neẓri ara acu yeḍran dagi deg tegrawla tazzayrit, dɣa ad nfares tagnit-agi i wakken ad d-nemmeslay ɣef wazal tesɛa taddart-agi n Tahanouts deg ṭṭrad n tmurt-nneɣ”.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ahil n leqdic i d-thegga Tiddukla tadelsant Tiεwinin n tγiwant n Wizgan lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, i icudden γer temliliyin n tsekla n yal ass n ssebt mazal yettkemil deg unnar, imi deqs n yimussnawen d wudmawen mucaεen i d-wwin u mazal ad-awwin. Dγa ssebt-agi yezrin 4 furar 2017 d Mass Muḥend Tilmatin, aselmad n tutlayt d tsekla tarumanit (Romaines) i yellan d amsarag deg uxxam n Yidles Ferrat Remḍan n temdint n Wizgan γef 14h, anda i d-imeslay γef tsertit n tutlayt d umḍiq n tutlayt n tmaziγt di Lezzayer. Ula d timliliyin ara-d-yillin deg wussan i d-iteddun s wazal-nsent, ledγa, ass n 11 furar 2017 anda ara yili Mass Mourad Ouchichi di ttiεad, syin d Mass Naser Buḍyaf, mmi-s n uselway Muḥamed Buḍyaf ara yillin d inebgi n Tiddukla tadelsant Tiεwinin n Wizgan ass n 18 furar i d-iteddun.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci
