 Dahmani Belɛid yuɣal-d s udebsi amaynut imi yefla isem « lahlak tayri-w » anda yecna ɣef tayri d iɣeblan n dunnit d tmeddur izdayriyen s isefran n teqbaylit taḥarritd uẓawan ifazen nezzah, d anazur aqbaur ger tuɣac yettwasnen atas tizlitt « ili-k d argaz alɣiḍa « neɣ « ayɣar nek yidem ay nennuɣ » d tiyiḍ, Dahmani Belaid ilul ass 16 yulyu 1950 di taddart n tgarsift di tɣiwant n Freḥa, si temzi-s yuyar aẓawan ɣas lḥif akk tiguǧel maca yufa-d amdakel a tiwansen di tkessawt anda i kes i yemdanen lmal-nsen s iqcar n weɣrum maca aganbar amezwaru i xedm-it s tbidunt n zzit am ugar icenayen di lawan-nni yettaǧa-t i tettu lmarta n tmeddurt, asmi yewweḍ 16 iseggasen yunag ɣar tmanaɣt ad isekles tizlatin-insen deg umaṭaf wi sin ɣer cix Nurdin, xas deg akud-nni adabu isaḥres ɣef wid akk yetnaɣen ɣef yidled n tamaziɣt maca Belɛid yeṭṭef di tnaslit yecna u mazal la icennu s tutlayt-is bla ma nettu d akken yella d ameɣnas n umessu adelsan amaziɣ. Xas 46 iseggasen deg annar n cna maca Daḥmani Belɛid mazal taɣuct-is d uganbar-ines qaren-d ayen yettidir uzdayri d wugguren yetmagar yal ass arnu warǧin id-yesufaɣ yasfift anda ulac tizlit tamḥaddit mgal lbatel akk tsartit n laḥyaf udabu. Awal alqayan d uẓawan isuzunen imdanen d wagi i d da belɛid, s teɣzi lɛamer-ik ay anaẓur.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Dahmani Bilal 

  
 Seg wass n 20 alamma d 22 di yebrir 2017, taɣiwant n Bujima ad jmaɛ imyura d yimedyazen di rreḥba n udlis ara d-yillin di temkarḍit ‘ MUḤYA ‘ n tɣiwant , di tezrigt-is tis ukkuz . Ad tili aseggas-a d tajmilt i umusnaw Mulud at Mɛemmar . I Wid akk iḥemmlen imru d tferka, ha-tt-an ad tili rreḥba n udlis di Bujima, taɣiwant n Wagnun , ahil ad yili d amesbaɣur imi mi ara nejmaɛen iḥeddaden n wawal iban kan d agerruj ara d-ilallen. Ger yimyura ara yilin ad d-nader : Saɛid Cemmax , Arezqi Meṭṭref , Amin Zawi , Naser Buḍyaf , Saɛid Saɛdi , Malika Arabi , Ḥand Saɛdi , Yusef Merraḥi , d waṭas n wiyaḍ ara d-icebḥen timlilit-agi n udlis ama s yisaragen ara d-xedmen, ama s usnuzu s ubuddu i widak iḥemmlen taɣuri. Akken daɣen ara mmeslayen ɣef umussnaw ameqqran Mulud at maɛmmar d uxeddim mmeqren i yexdem ɣef Tmaziɣt imi di tezrigt n useggas-agi ad as-tuɣal tejmilt . Di tfaska ad ilint tzeɣwa n tira , n tɣuri , akken daɣen ad yili umezgun . Amaynut n useggas-agi imi aṭas n yixxamen n usezreg ara yettekkin di tfaska n udlis, d ayen ara yejjen imeɣriyen ad afen ayen ttnadin n idlisen. 

  S.Yamani 

<div> 
  
 Xas ulamma teǧǧa-aɣ tfekka-s, acu kan mazal ṣṣut-is gar-aneɣ. Yeqqar umussnaw-nneɣ, Dda Lmulud :’’yella walebɛaḍ, yella ulac-it. Yella walebɛaḍ, ulac yella. Ihi’’, acennay-nneɣ ameqqran Lounes Kheloui, ha-t-an ass-a yid-neɣ s tezlatin-is i yessekles uqbel tamettant-is. Isellek asekles-nsent deg 20 deg tuber iɛeddan, kra n wussan kan uqbel ad yemmet. Deg yiwet n tdiwennit i uɣmis La dépêche de Kabylie, asmi yella deg sbiter, yenna-d : ‘’ssaramaɣ ad cnuɣ i tikkelt taneggarut deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛrmmri n temdint n Tizi Uzzu asmi ara d-ffɣent tezlatin-iw timaynutin’’. Ha-t-an yeffeɣ uzgen kan n usirem n unaẓur : ffɣent-d tezlatin-is xas ulamma netta ulac-it, ma ɣef uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri, ruḥen yimdanen i wakken ad t-walin i tikkelt taneggarut asmi yemmut, mačči i wakken ad as-slen am wakken yessaram. Deg tezlatin-is tineggura-a, ad as-tiniḍ icar-itt. Yefka azwel i Album1, Lefraq am wakken iḥus yis-s iḥḍer-d. Ula deg tezlit taneggarut ibeqqa slam i ddunit, yenna :’’qqim di lehna a ddunit, ass-a, akked-m ay ddiɣ. Qqim di lehna a ddunit, aggur, iṭij ttwaliɣ. Qqim di lehna a ddunit, ma d kunwi ar timlilit’’. Mi ara icennu tizlatin-agi-ines tineggura, ad tḥasseḍ tella lḥaǧa : iger-d akk iḥulfan-is. Ula d ṣṣut-is ibeddel ciṭ. Xas yenqes nnefs-is imi aṭṭan-is d idmaren, acu kan yettban-d yeḥzen mačči d izli. Ittaɛraḍ ad t-yeffer, meɛna tettensar-as-d tuffra-agi seg kra n tuɣac. I wakken ad yexdem umdan ayen akka yexdem Kheloui Lounes, ad d-yecnu tizlatin ɣef lmut i t-yettraǧun deg kra n wussan kan, yerna yeẓra, ilaq ad tiliḍ dɣa d Kheloui, d kečč ay d kečč ! ilaq ad tesɛuḍ tabɣest yenneflen, tirrugza n yigelliden-nneɣ imezwura. Xas ulamma ẓran akk yimdanen ad mmten, acu kan mi ara d-taweḍ, tewɛer i wakken ad tt-tqableḍ. Yenna umedyaz deg wawal-is :’’ɣef temgerḍt ma yers lmus, i tidet ma ad d-teffeɣ imi’’. Tajmilt i nezmer ad as-ner i ucennay Kheloui Lounes, ad nsel i wayen i d-yecna i tikklet taneggarut. Tizlatin ha-tent-in. Album1 : Lefraq, Teswira, Bɣiɣ, Aggur, Xelfeɣ-d, Tuffɣa, Qqim. Ma d Album2 : Lwehma, Ɛyiɣ, Tejra, Lawliya, Wali, Sseɛd-iw, A Ccix.

 <em> Gen deg talwit a Lounes, xas ‘’teǧǧiḍ-aɣ, teǧǧiḍ-aɣ-d’’.  </em>

<p style="text-align: right;"> H. M. 

  
 Gar-aneɣ d kra n leḍwar kan, ad as-yekker unaẓur ageɛmir Zedek Moulud i yiwet n tuzzya tamaḍlant n tẓuri ɣer waṭas n tmura. D tagnit i iḍulen ayendin i temlilit akked uzayez-ines i inuḥen deg rebɛa n tɣemmar n ddunit, d usbeɛzeq n tutlayt tazwawt akkin i yilel. Bab n « tidderwect-iw » ur iḥebbes ihi asikel seg furar n useggas-a i d-iteddun 2017, almi d yennayer n 2018. Ad as-yebdu seg tmurt n Fransa deg furar d meɣres n qabel, ladɣa tamaneɣt Paris, Lyon, d Marseille. Uqbel ad yeṭṭef abrid n Canada d Marikan anda i t-ttraǧun ttiɛadat imeqqranen n ccna, abeɛda deg Montréal ideg neẓra llan waṭas n yizwawen d yimaziɣen. Deffir tmura-a n umalu, ad d-yuɣal mmi-s n At Xelfun ɣer yidurar i t-id-irebban, anda yetturaǧu ad yeg igalaten s wazal-nsen deg Tizi, Bgayet d Tubiret, gar mayyu d yulyu n useggas 2017. Seg ubeḥri n Ǧerǧer, ad yunag Zedek Moulud ɣer watmaten Imaziɣen n Merruk anda ara yemlil imḥemmalen-is deg Agadir deg wayyur n ctember. Syin, ad d-yezzi ɣer Lezzayer tamaneɣt i tegnit n ccna d unnecraḥ akked waṭas daɣen n wid i t-yeṭṭafaren. Ad tili tmeɣra tameqqrant Zenith n Paris i lmend n yennayer 2018. Tuzzya-a n tẓuri, ara d-yettwaheggin s tallelt n yimeddukkal n Zedek Moulud, tusa-d deg lawan-is d tidet, imi taggara-a, ur d-yeffiɣ unaẓur-a ɣer uzayez-ines, ama deg tmurt n Yizwawen, anda ur as-d-ssawalen yimḍebbren, neɣ deg tmura n berra. D tignatin yeggten ihi, i ur zmiren ad sruḥen wid yettakken azal i wawal, d wid yeẓran acu d-yewwi bab n « Taqbaylit-nni » i yidles-nneɣ, skud neḥsa yenna-t-id yakan: “ur zmireɣ ara ad bedleɣ ɣef teqbaylit!”.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Ḥusin ayt Ḥmed ilul ass n 20 deg ɣuct deg useggas 1926 deg taddart n wat Ḥmed n wat Yaḥya deg ∑in El Ḥmmam (Micli) n Tizzi Wezzu , isem-is Muḥend u Lḥusin , terra-d yemma-s isem n gma-s Ccix Muḥend u Lḥusin , (d xali-s ), dda Lḥusin seg wasmi ila 16 n yiseggasen deg le mer-is yella deg tesnawit mi yeččur wul-is d leḥmala n tmurt ,Ayt Ḥmed ger yimezwura n yisulas n tmurt i inuḍḥen fell-as, ulac win ur t-nessin ara d agrawliw n tidet , d bu yiseɣ d nnif, bu tirrugza , d amedya n yimeɣrasen, yecban Muḥmed Buḍyaf, Muḥmed Xider, Krim Belqasem, Rabeḥ Biṭaṭ, d wiyaḍ mačči d yiwen ad d-yeched fell-as umezruy n tmurt Lzzayer , limer mačči d ameɣras-agi tili ass-a ur tettili tlelli wala timunent n tmuert-nneɣ, ur yeğği ara amcum arumi ad aɣ-yeseddu akken yebɣa, ɣas akken srewten deg ugdud azzayri maca azamul-nneɣ n tdukkli yessaweḍ yesazdeg tamurt seg ujrad d-yeɣlin fell-aneɣ, dda Lḥusin d win iḥurben ɣef yizerfan n umdan , yexdem akken iwata tasertit , yella daqerru ɣef ukabar n( FFS ), seg useggas n 1963,ḥemmlen-t leqbayel meẓẓi meqqer, argaz tameṭṭut ,bɣan akk ad yili d aselway n tigduda maca ur yeqbil ad yili d amesbaṭli , d bu sin wudmawen , iswi-ines mačči akken ad t-id walin medden d aselway , iswi-ines d tadukkli d tegmat ger yizzayriyen mgal amnamar (a daw) arumi, awi-d kan lzzayer mačči d tafransist, ayen yes a deg wallaɣ-is d agerruj drus i yellan am netta, ayen yexdem, ayen inuḍaḥ ɣef tmurt n Lzzayer d amezruy ad t-id yinin i tsuta ad d-iteddun , ayen i d-nenna fell-as drus ,ayen d-yeğğa ara d-icehden fell-as, dda Lḥusin seg waswi yettwanɣa, Muḥmed Buḍyaf i iruḥ ɣer lɣerba , yettas-d kan mi ara d –smekti tmurt tagrawla n 1954, yefka tarwiḥt-is d asfel ɣef tmurt, ula d yemma-s mi tuweḍ le fu n Rebbi ur tt-iwala deg useggas n 1983, akka i t-xeddem tayri n tmurt d -yeffɣen seg wul zeddigen , sɣur imeqqranen .Argaz –agi l ali yuweḍ le fu n Rebbi ass n 23 deg duğember 2015, s yiwen waṭṭan,deg lɣba deg (la Suisse) ayagi yeğğa leqbayel qlalḥen akken ilaq , i ten-yeğğan gugmen , wehmen, zzan imi tejraḥ tmurt n Lzzayer , tettru ayagi iban-d deg temḍelt-is deg taddart-is At Ḥmed , ulac win ur d-nusi ara ɣer lğanaza-s ,d ayen walan medden akk , yeğğa-aɣ usalas , uzamul n tdukkli d yiseɣ , deg le mer-is 89 iseggasen,yemḍel tama n yimawlan-is deg zzawiya (lemqam) n ccix Muḥend u-Lḥusin , ad t-yerḥem Rebbi , a iṣebber tamurt Lzzayer , ahat ad as-d-yili i tmurt-nneɣ yiwen am dda Lḥusin Ayt Ḥmed tikkelt niḍen !! .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben Yahia

 2 lkisan n uwren areqaq,

 1 lkas n lfarina, tisent (lmelḥ), 1 tɣenjawt n yiɣes (lexmira),1 n tɣenjawt n ssker, aman immuḥlan (tiede), zzit n lkuẓa,

 ssker n uwren i ccnaḥa .

  Aheggi 

 Di tqedduḥt , rwi awren , lfarina , lmelḥ, sskeṛ akked iɣes. Rucc-it s waman , ɛarek atekti-nni , rennu-as aman alamma yuɣal d aleqqaq . Get taḥbult , zuzzert-as awren , ɣummet-ett , eǧǧet-ett ad tali. Mi tuli teḥbult , meqqeret , eṛzet arekti-nni s ufus neɣ s wallal i waya . (Rouleau). Gezmet imkuẓen deg urekti ( carrés ) s lmus , gret imkuẓen –nni ar zzit iḥman , ttruccut-tten s zzit alamma cuufen , mi bdan la ttizwiɣen ., d lawan ad ten-id kksem , ad uddumen . Mi yuddamen , zzuret fell-asen sskeṛ .

<p style="text-align: right;">  S ɣur Daya 

  
 TABATENT– Tenker yiwet n tmes d tameqrant ass n lexmis, deg tezwara n yiḍ, deg lluzin tusligt n usselket (taḥwil) n yigumma (fawakih) d ussenzi n yiẓman n Ngawes, deg tɣiwant n Ngawes d-yusan 80 n yikilumitren deg utaram n Tbatent, ɣef wakken ay aɣ-d-yenna yemkellef n teɣwalt n uḥuddu aɣarim Zouhir Nekaa. Times-a tenker deg lmexzen meɣɣren 21.000 n yimitren imkuẓen (m2), d win aydeg tteffren tanga tamezwarut (madda awaliyya), ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Mass Nekaa, am wakken ay d-ixebber dakken lmexzen-nni maci aṭas aya seg wasmi ay yettwarẓem. 5 n tegrawin n tgermant (tadaxxul) n uḥuddu aɣarim ay d-yusan ɣer wemkan-nni, gar-asent tigget (wiḥda) tagejdant n Tbantent, yernu xedment akken ad ḥebsent times-nni akken ur d-tettḥaz imukan ay d-iqerben ɣer-s. Lluzin n usselket n yigumma d ussenzi n yiẓmawen (ɛaṣa’ir) tessaǧaw sselɛa-nnes ula ɣer wezɣar. 950 n yixeddamen ay ixeddmen deg-s yernu tebda, seg melmi kan, tessemɣar ttawilat-nnes.

<p style="text-align: right;"> APS 

  
 Ass-nni n letnayen akked ttlata 6 d 7 furar 2017, yella-d usmekti n tmettant tis 57 n umussnaw ameqqran deg umussu aɣelnaw “Amar Imache”. Yebda leqdic-agi ass-nni n arim 6 deg waggur-agi n furar ideg nella, ɣef 9h00 n ṣṣbaḥ deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin n uxxam n Yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, s yiwet n temsikent ɣef tudert d umecwar-is deg umussu aɣelnaw d tegrawla tazzayrit. Ass-nni n aram 7 deg waggur n furar, ɣef 10h00 n ṣṣbaḥ, sersen tameqqunt n yijeğğigen ɣef usebdad n At Dwala, syin sersen tayeḍ ɣef uẓekka n Imache, yellan deg taddart-is ɣef 10h30, sakin yella-d diɣen umeslay sɣur waṭas n yiwudam d yimdanen, gar-asen : Nabila Goumeziane, aɣella n ladayra n Beni Douala Mass Hettoume Saleh, atmaten d warraw n Amar Imache. Ma ɣef 11h30, deg tesnawit irefden isem-is, tella-d temsikent-nniḍen i d-isneεten aṭas n ttṣawar ama d tid-is ama d tid n tegrawla s umata. Dima deg tesnawit-agi, yella-d diɣen usenεet n yiwen n usaru amecṭuḥ, i d-yewwin awal ɣef tudert-is d yimuhal-is. Ma ɣef 13h30 d asawen, llan-d tlata n yisragen: amezwaru iga-t-id Mass Ahmed Ait Ouali, wis sin sɣur Gacem Mokrane, ma d aneggaru sɣur Mass n Rachid Oulbsir. Ma ɣer taggara akk n wass, tella-d tukcci n yigerdasen n utteki, i wid i iqedcen deg usiher-agi. Ad d-nesmekti belli, aṭas n yidisan d tamiwin i yettekkin deg useddes d uheggi i leqdic-agi adelsan, ad d-nebder deg-sen: Tanmehla n yidles, axxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer, ladayra d tɣiwant n Beni Douala, s tallelt tiddukkla tadelsant n Amar Imache akked tesqamut n taddart-agi-ines.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tudert n Amar Imache 

 Ilul ass n 7 deg yulyu 1895, deg taddart n Ait Mesbah deg Beni Douala. D argaz n tsertit, d amussnaw ameqqran deg umussu aɣelnaw azzayri, yella d imsbeddi n tuddsa ‘’Itri n Tefriqt n Ugafa (ENA). Yella deɣen deg lweqt-nni d amaray amatu n tuddsa-agi diɣen d amassay n tira (rédacteur en chef), deg uɣmis «EL Ouma». Yettwaṭṭef ɣer lḥebs ass n 5 deg unbir 1934, yeqqim dina azal n 6 wagguren, yerna ixeleṣ tabzert n 2000Franc, yeffeɣ-d deg useggas deg useggas n 1935. Iker-d mgal asenfar-nni n “Blum- Voilette” n 1936; d ayen i d-ibanen deg warrat-is amezwaru“ L’Algérie au Carrefour”. Yura azal n 16 n warraten d yimgraden , gar 1934 alamma d 1946. Yemmut ass n 7deg waggur n furar n 1960, yeğğa-d sin watmaten akked 5 n warraw-is.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ayen i d-nan fell-as 

  Goumeziane Nabila, d tanemhalt n yidles:  

 “nerza ɣer usmekti wis 57 n tmettant n Amar Imache, i d-yellan aseggas-agi deg taddart-is d tesnawit yewwin isem-is. Nezmer Ad d-nini fell-as d argaz ameqqran i d-yefkan aṭas i tmurt n Lezzayer ama s tektiwin-is ama s tira-s, neɣ s tmuɣli-s ula s tsertit-is akked umennuɣ-is… atg. Nefreḥ aṭas yis-s, nefreḥ s tmurt-is n Beni Douala, i d-yefkan aṭas ama i tegrawla ama i yidles azzayri”.

  Imache Chabane, d mmi-s n Amar Imache:  

 “nefreḥ s tejmilt-agi i d-as-yuɣalen ussan-agi iεeddan i ubabat-nneɣ, acku tura netta mačči n twacult-is neɣ n Ait Mesbah kan, maca d ababat n Lezzayer merra. Tanemmirt s tussda i wid akk i d-yefkan afus n tallelt, deg tejmilt-agi meqqren, tanemmirt daɣen i yinebgawen n lḥerma i d-yerzan ɣer taddart-nneɣ”.

  Madjid Heddaf, d aselway n tɣiwant n Beni Douala:  

 “nefren aseggas-agi isragen i d-yellan fell-as, nexdem-iten deg tesnawit n Beni Douala yewwin isem-is, i wakken ad ẓren yinelmaden d anwa i Amar Imache. D acu yexdem. Nekk diɣen s timad-iw ad snimmreɣ aṭas imsuddsen-nniḍen ukkud nemεawan, seg tazwara, armi d taggara n tejmilt-agi”.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

 
  
 “Coluche : politique et comique’’ d adlis wis 3 n Dr Nasserdine AIT OUALI. Uqbel adlis-a, yella-d, yakan, deg lmendad i udlis ‘’De la pédagogie de projet et de l’enseignement de la langue amazighe en Kabylie’’ i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2013 ɣer tezrigin L’ODYSSEE, am wakken yura adlis-nniḍen ‘’L’écriture romanesque kabyle d’expression berbère (1946-2014) i d-yeffɣen deg useggas 2015. Adlis n tikkelt-a n Dr AIT OUALI, yewwi-d awal ɣef yiwen n wudem mechuren nezzeh deg tmurt n Fransa, ladɣa, deg uḥric-agi n unecreḥ d teḍṣa, wagi d Coluche. Deg tazwara, tella-d tira n udlis-a d asentel n Ductura n Mass Ait Ouali, syin yerra anadi-agi-ines d adlis ɣef Coluche. Aṭas n yiḥricen deg tmeddurt n Coluche iwumi yekkes umeskar takka, aṭas n tmussniwin ɣef tmuɣli-ines ara d-rnun fell-as wid-nni akken yenwan ssnen Coluche akken ilaq. Seg «Les Restos du cœur» alamma d tifranin n tselwayt n tegduda n 1981, ad teẓrem Coluche akken werǧin i t-teẓram. Deg ssinima neɣ deg tmezgunt, ɣef tsertit neɣ ɣef yimḍebbren, awi-d kan ad d-yeg asentel i tmuɣli-s s teḍṣa. Yedder d ilelli, yenna-d ayen yebɣa ad d-yini. Ha-tt-an tmuɣli-s ɣef tlelli. ‘’Vous voyez, c’est ça la liberté en France : on a rigoureusement le droit de dire ce qu’on veut. Et le gouvernement a rigoureusement le droit de faire ce qu’il veut’’. Adlis yeffeɣ-d ɣer tezrigin L’ODYSSEE, 2016, 288 n yisebtar, azal-is 600 idinaren.

 1 n tebselt

 2 n tbaṭaṭatin

 2 n texssayin

 2 n tezrudiyatin

 250 g n jelban

 250 g n lubyan

 4 n tɛqqayin n ticert

 1 n ṭumaṭict

 lmelh d Zzit

  Aheggi  

 Mebɛed mi ara d-theggiḍ lubyan akked jelban, err aman ad zeɣlen di tassilt, syin rnu-asen zzit d lmelḥ, teǧǧet-ten ad awlen. Seqcer tidal-nni, zrudiya, lbaṭaṭa, ṭumaṭic akked texsayt. Gzem lebṣel d ticcert. Anef-asen alamma wwan akken iwata. Syin, kkes-d tidal-nni, tezdeḍ-ten , terred kullec ad yawel azal n 2’. S tezmert-nwen

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Sɣur Daya 

  
  D azal kečč mazal teṭṭsed. Kker fell-ak ad taɣeḍ aksum, yal lɛid akka i t-xedmeḍ. Aha ! kker fell-ak ɣiwel ad tt-xedmeḍ akken xedmen meddn. 

  Mḥend ur yerwi ara iḍes. Yeldi-d yiwet n tiṭ, yerra-as-d : 

  -Ihi tebɣiḍ ad iyi-terred am babaɣayu, ad tt-ɛanadeɣ medden, acimi mačči d nutni ara yid iɛanden, ad arwun iḍes yerna ad ḥadren taɣriṭ-nsen. 

  Tasaɛdit terfa, tuzzel ɣer ufus n yimesleḥ teddem-it-id, tenna-as : 

  -I tura ad tt-kkreḍ neɣ ak-ffkeɣ tamcumt-ik 

  Mḥend ijelleb-d ɣef imeḍraḥ, yelsa lqecc-is s tezzla. 

  -Ruḥ ɣiwel skud ifuk, mebla ma tesswiḍ lqehwa, mebla ma tesserdeḍ udem-ik, aha ɣiwel ! 

  Iruḥ Mḥend ɣer ugezzar, yufa imdanen ugaren tiweḍfin. Wa yessuter taɣruḍt, wa d tameccact… Imi d wweḍ nnuba-s, yessetḥa ad d-yaɣ sin ikiluten, dayen kan iwumi yezmer. 

  Imi yewweḍ s axxam, di tazwara Tasaɛdit tefreḥ, alarmi tedla ɣer ucerraɛ-nni, tufa drus n uksum, dɣa tebda daɣen tettsuɣu : 

  -Dayagi kan id tuɣeḍ. yeqqur uqerruy-ik, azeɣbub-agi ur yesserway ara ula d agrud amecṭuḥ. Ɣiwel uɣal arnu-d 5 ikiluten. 

  Ayen tebɣa tmeṭṭut amzun yebɣat Sidi Rebbi maca Mḥend ur yesɛi ara idrimen, ifeddix, tirɣi. 

  -Ad ruḥeɣ ad ẓreɣ Qasi, netta d amerkanti, yerna yesɛa ul n lɛali. As-iniɣ ad iyi-d-yessekridi neɣ ma ulac ẓriɣ, ur d tt-rus ara lehna deg uxxam, ad nseɣ berra. 

  Yuɣal Mḥend ɣer ugezzar, yettxemmim, idewwex yugi ad yefhem amek yegga wegdud Aqbayli,  

  imdanen akk zzin i ugezzar-nni, ma d tiḥuna yeznuzuyen idlisen d tilmawin, idlisen yulin uɣebbar, ur 

   ufin win ara ten-yennalen, iɛedda d idis n yiwet n tḥanut iwala yiwen wungal «Les vengiles», yura-t 

   Taher ǦAƐUT. Yemmekta-d tafyirt d-yenna wemyaru-agi : «Targit akked usirem fuken, Tamurt 

  -nneɣ tuɣal d aqemmuc ur nesɛi tawant, d ajeɛbub ur nesɛi tgara». Anda tuffeg i ters, ur walaɣ ad zzi tefsut ɣer tmurt-a. yal aseggas d tazla ɣer deffir. 

  Mḥend yerna-d aksum. Tasaɛdit tefreḥ ma d netta yettxemmim amek ara yerr ṭṭlaba-s, amek ara yemmager lɛid id iteddun, amek ggan wallaɣen ixedmen tameɣra i weksum, yerra-d Mḥend nneht, yenna-as : 

  -Ah ! A wi qqlen d ameksa, ad yidir waḥd-es deg udrar. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Bussad Ḥemmar 

  
 ‘’Yuɣal-d sser tamurt’’, d tanfalit-a i yezgan, ussan-agi, deg yimawen n yimezdaɣ n tmurt n leqbayel. Awalen-a,qqaren-ten imi i d-tuɣal lewziɛa i yellan, seg zik, d lɛada ɣur-sen, xeddmen-tt deg wass lɛid tamecṭuḥt.

 Mebɛed mi teḥbes ugar n 15n yiseggasen-aya, ɣef sebba n tmenɣiwt n Matoub, tikkelt tamezwarut, syin ɣef tefsut taberkant deg useggas n 2001, ha-tt-an ihi, tuɣal-d lewziɛa ɣer taddart n Tala Athmane i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Tizi Uzz. Am yal taddart n tudrin n tmurt n leqbayel, taddart n Tala Athmane xedmen lewziɛa ass-nni n Lɛid tameẓyant deg sin yimekwal : Taddart Ufella akked Taddart Bwadda. Zlan 8 n yizgaren. ‘’D ayen yessefraḥen imi nuɣal ɣer tjaddit’’ i aɣ-d-yenna Dda Muḥ. Fkan yimezdaɣ ttiɛad ɣef 11 n yiḍ ɣer tlemmas n taddart anda mlalen s umeẓẓyan d umqqran, s wid izedɣen deg taddart akked wid i d-yusan seg berra, rzan-d ɣer taddart-nsen ass-agi n leɛwacer. S lmendad n yimɣaren yuɣen tannumi s lewziɛa, kkren yilmezyen n taddart-a, zlan 8 yizgaren u ferqen-ten d tisɣar : 491 n tesɣar deg Taddart Ufella ; 209 n tesɣar deg Taddart Bwadda. ‘’Tikkelt tamezwarut ara ḥedreɣ i Lewziɛa. Ẓriɣ-tt kan deg Facebook ɣer tudrin-nniḍen.’’Akka i d-yenna yiwen ilemẓi n 15 n yiseggasen. Ula d arrac imecṭaḥ, sɛan azal d ameqqran ass-nni n tmecreḍt imi keccmen ɣer Lewziɛa u ttawin-d iɣes. Akka ay tella d lɛada ɣer leqbayel. Ass-nni n lewziɛa, ad yawi ubabat mmi-s amecṭuḥ, ad t-yessekcem, i tikkelt tamezwarut, ɣer lewziɛa i wakken ad t-issinen yimezdaɣ n taddart. Mi d-yuɣal, ad d-yeglu s yiɣes. Qqaren-d i wakken ad yiǧhid u ad yesɛu tabɣest (le courage) am yiɣes. Syin, deg leɛwayed n leqbayel, mi ara yaweḍ ugrud-a d aqcic, ad t-yawi baba-t ɣer ssuq i wakken ad t-issinen yimeddukkal-is u ad d-yawi, diɣ, aqerru. Aqerru ɣer leqbayel, meḥsub ad yili d aqerru n uxxam, ad yesɛu lḥir. Akken kan alamma yewweḍ 18 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, ad yekcem ɣer tejmaɛt, ad d-yuɣal s wawal-is gar yimezdaɣ n taddart. Ihi, aḍar la iteddu s aẓar iseggasen-agi ineggura. Ayen yelhan, yelha, i as-yenna winna.

<p style="text-align: right;">  H. Moula  

  
 Deg ddurt-agi yezrin i d-yeffeɣ wammud amezwaru n yisefra n umedyaz acawi Mass Aghougali Younes iwumi ifka azwel Taɛric i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin «Tamagit» n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D wagi i d adlis amezwaru ara d yessuffeɣ uselmad-agi n teglizit, mmi-s n Xennecla. D ammud ideg yerra tajmilt deg yisebtaren imezwura n udlis-agi, i umaru ameqqran d urgaz n umezgun Kateb Yacine. Gar yisental iɣef i d-yewwi awal deg udlis-agi n 40 n yisefra s tcawit, ad naf : izerfan, aẓawan, tannumi, asirem, tayri, iḥulfan, tudert, ccbaḥa n Uwres, agamma, tazemmurt,…atg. D adlis n 108 n yisebtar, azal-is 250 Da. Ma d tazwart ixdem-as-tt Mass Hassane Hahrouche , d aselmad asdawan deg Bgayet. Taɣuri igerrzen i yimeɣriyen, afud iǧehden i yimeskaren.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"></span>A.A 

  
 Tizemrin i-d ǧǧan lejdud yewwiten-t umencar n Cinwa! Aṣenfar n ubrid ar ay cudden Bgayet d Ɛǧiba deg twilayt n Tubirett, ad iɛeddi ɣef wakal n t’ɣiwant n’At Ṛẓin, id yezgan azal n 85 ikilumiṭren ɣef uqerru n twilayt n Bgayet. Asenfar-agi amuqran, yewwi azal n 15 ikilumiṭren (deg tuɣzi) n yiḥarqan deg tama-agi. Tikubaniyin yedduklen (Sapta n Leẓẓayer d Crcc n Cinwa) tt-heggin-t anar i ubrid-agi, akken yesɛan ajerrid i « dahmen » s yiḥarqan n kra n yimezdaɣ deg t’ɣiwant-agi n tama n’At Ɛebbas. Ɣas akken qeblen akken abrid ad iɛeddi, ibabaten n yiḥarqan-agi begnen-d taggara-agi, lɣiḍ nsen mgal ixeddamen n Cinwa yegren, ussan-agi kan, ɣef iḥarqan nsen akken ad gezmen aṭaṣ n tizemrin, am akken ḥaren melmi ad ikfu uṣenfar-agi. Ayagi ur yaɛǧib ara dayen kan ibabaten n yiḥarqan, yagi as mi-i-ẓran « At uglim awraɣ » (Cinwa) geẓmen tizemrin yenzan s kra n 4 imelyan i yiwwet. Imezdaɣ rfan, imi « Cnawa » ur ten ǧǧin ara ad kemlen alqaḍ uzemmur, akken i msefhamen deg tazwara, ɣas akken tizemrin nni nzan-t. « Gezmen tizemrin zdat nneɣ, nukni ur ɛad ur nekfi aleqaḍ uzemmur. Tizemrin-agi ǧǧan-t-ten id lejdud d-agerruj. Ass-a, aten-t ad twaɣeḍlen-t. Mači dayen yessefraḥen. Ula d ssuma iɣ-d fkan drus-itt. Kra n ukuẓ imelyan i yiwwet n t’zemmurt (40 000 da l’olivier indemnisé!). Ayagi mači d-azal n tidett. Tizemrin-agi, taneggarut degsen-t tesɛa nnig n lqarn, sɛan nnig n 4 lmitrat deg ṭul. Yusad yiwen ar dagi, d-amusnaw n t’fellaḥt, yaḥseb laɛmer n yiwwet n t’zemmurt yettuɣeḍlen, yufa lɛamr-is azal n 230 iseggasen ! Qrib sin n leqrun d wezgen.Tazemmurt-agi, tella mazal tettaked azemmur, fkan-aɣ-d dges 4 imelyan ?! D-awezɣi ! » akka i yerfa yiwen n bab waḥriq n Iciqar, yiwwet n taddart deg t’ɣiwant n’At Ṛẓin. Ṛuḥemt a tizemrin n lejdud ruḥemt !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax.Y 

  
 Imɣan n Tensawt d adlis i d-yessufeɣ Mass Saïd Zidat deg ussan-agi iɛeddan. Deg udlis-a igerrzen nezzeh, ad naf azal n 200 n leṣnaf n yimɣan. Yal imɣi s yisem-is s teqbaylit, tafrensist akked tlaṭinit u yal imɣi s tugna-s. Ayen igerrzen deg unadi-agi, d akken yal imɣi yeddan wanida i yettili neɣ, ɛad, anda i t-yufa. Zyada qef wanect-a, yemla-d amek i tesseqdacen deg lmakla akked tujjya. Xas ulamma llan wid i yuran, yakan, ɣef yimɣan, meɛan leqdic am wa ixus deg unnar. Ihi, adlis-a n Said Zidat, ad yili d yiwern wallal i yimnuda akked yiselmaden d yinelmaden deg tmurt n leqbayel.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.Moula  

  
 Sya  d sya ,  ttawḍen-d  imazanen    yessaramen ḥellu s  lɛjalan i Lounis Ai Menguellet . Ulac win ur terzi ara taluft i d-yeɣlin   fell-as .   Ulac win ur nugad ara fell-as. Ama d Ferhat Mhenni neɣ Hasen Hirech neɣ d inaẓuren-nneɣ nniḍen yal wa yuzen-d lfal    i Lounis Ait Menguellet  akken   as ibud ccfa   s lemɣawla.     Aya ur yesewham ar  imi yal aqbayli yettḥibin teqbaylit-is   yeɛaqel deg-s aktay aktay , teqbaylit , azemul n tmusni, bab n wawal urẓin, bab n usekkud laqayen. 

 Anect-a ur yesewham ara wid    yesnen acu i d lqima n urgaz, acu i d azal n umedyaz di tmeti yecban tagi nneɣ anda ixef-nneɣ, timadit nneɣ &amp;nbsp,; nnekwa –nneɣ tebna  s awal, tuffa lɣerza-s  deg usefru. Lounis Ait Menguellet yezwar deg awal asmi i d as-yenna:  win yesɛan ul d aḥnin ad yeddez. Amek ur yettnuɣni   ara wul   ticki ayen ɣef acu dlant wallen sellaw? Amek ur yettmuɣbun  ara wul ticki yeẓra widen tezdi tegmat bḍan  am ibawen ɣef lluḥ? Amek ur yettneẓma ara  wul ticki anda akken yeḍmaɛ lhu d ayen n dir i d-yufraren? Amek ur iḥaẓẓen ara wul ticki: “ ayen akken i d-yefda leɣla/ neǧǧa-t yenza s rxa?”Amek ur yettaḍen ara wul ticki yettwali tagmet d-awal deg immi nettawit wama   tidet nesuref-as? Wi ccqa!   Ayen sfedsen leqrun awal a t-id yefdu . Ayen ɣebban lesnin awal a t-id yeḥyu am akkenid as  yenna ccix deg wal-is : xellun-t di  ɛaccra, yeḥya-tt-id yiwen. Lounis yenna: lejerḥ  ɣef a yers wawal ad yeḥlu. Akka  i d- tawenza n umedyaz : s wallen iẓẓer    yir ussan , yettra-ten lhan. Wi cqa ma texreb tagnit neɣ tagnit teɛkkes  imi ticki ixaq   wul lhejna-s d-asfru. Asefru yettilin i  lmendad n temcukal akken ad yer assif ɣer lḥed-is .

 Tirugza ur tettnuz di leswaq. Win i tt-yesɛan d ayla  yesexdam-itt, ma d wayeḍ  yekna i ddel yerna  annuz s ufella. Lounis Ait Mengullet        yenn-ad asmi akken teẓmek  liḥala : 

 bɣiɣ ad inniɣ 

 ad yifsus wul-iw 

 ur tesɛiḍ anwi i nnɣiɣ 

  uggadeɣ tilli-w. 

 Meɛlum     kan ad yinni imi yeẓra : 

 ameslay ḥedd ur t-ineq 

 wama lɛebd yettmettat

 Ameslay mi ara d yeṭṭerdeq 

 ljil i-t-yebɣan yuffa-t. 

 Iban kan ad yinni imi d netta  s timad-is di icarren : “waqila xir lmenṭaq. Init-id uqbel ak-ifat”

 Ayen id yewwi Lounis Ait Menguellet i teqbaylit ḥedd ma ad t-yenker. D imedyazen am netta id aɣ -id yeḥyan am akken is yenna Matoub Lounes deg awal-is. Yissen nezdi s leqedd. Yissen id newet s ugerz akken ad neflali. Yissen id iban yisem-nneɣ. Yissen id ɛaqlen leǧnas nella yernu a nnili xas a ttibrik neɣ a ttimulul. Awal ɣef Lounis Ait Menguellet ur as yezmir wawal ɣef aya kan id tewwi as neǧǧ nnuba I bab n wawal akken d netta ara d yinnin iḥulfan yellan deg uwalen-nneɣ meṛṛa di tagnit yecban tagi: 

 Limer mačči d isefra

 A yeḍrun yidi n lxiq

 Urfan ad  segmen tafa

 Deg-i ur ttaǧǧen amdiq

 Mi yeččur wul yal tama

 Ad yewwet deg-s iceqiq

 Ad yeṭerḍeq tagara

 Ad yeswhem aɛddaw arfiq 

<p style="text-align: right;">Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
<p style="text-align: center;"> <em>Awin i-isexdamen awal</em> 

  <em>D-acu teḍmaɛḍ di tsusmi</em> 

  <em>Akken yella yir awal</em> 

  <em>I-tella yir tasusmi</em> 

  <em>Tezriḍ i xeddem w-awal</em> 

  <em>Tezriḍ it xeddem tsusmi</em> 

  <em>Ma yexḍa ṣṣwab i w-awal</em> 

  <em>M-ad yelli ṣṣwab di tsusmi</em> 

  <em>Xas yexḍa ṣṣwab i w-awal</em> 

  <em>M-ad yili ṣṣwab di tsusmi( Zedek Mouloud</em> 

 Akkin( agemmaḍ) , amedyaz s wazal-is. Imdanen ggan-as ccan di tudert-is, rnan-as lɛaz m beɛd lmut-is. Ass-a akken ad nesmekti Slimane Azem, ilaq a nner lewhi ɣer liḥala umedyaz d tmurt-nneɣ. Acu n lqima yewwi di tmeti-nneɣ tatrart. Rreḥba n tmenna n isefra yellan zik tejla . Fukken imeddaḥen deg leswaq, deg tijamuyaɛ, deg amḍiq anda id tettlal tamussni. Ibeddel lawan yussa-d wayeḍ. Di tallit deg nella akken ad yaweḍ wawal umedyaz wid yeqsed, ttilin-t tifaskiwin , tikwal ttwancaden akken ad ilin i lmendad deg timeɣṛiwin xeddmen iccanayen( qqaren-d isefra gar snat n tezlatin) ,llan-t diɣen tidwilin n tmedyazt deg imaṭṭaffen.

 Maca ahdum ɣef umedyaz ur yekkis. Imi Ɣef akken nettwali, ay anda yebɣu yettwencced, ama ɣer tifaskiwin, neɣ ɣer nuba-t yellan deg radyu , leɛtab-is ur as ggin-ara ssuma. Di tmura nniḍen mi ara d iɛeddi umedyaz deg nuba-t ( ama di tilbizyun neɣ di radyu) imeḍebṛen n uzrar-nni( la chaîne) akked imawlan n nuba-nni sekcamen isefra id yettwaɣṛan deg tadwilt ɣer usdyay n izerfan n umeskar( les droits d’auteurs . Amedya di Fṛansa mi ara d iɛeddi umedyaz di radyu ayen id yeɣṛa d asefru yettṛuḥu ɣer la SACEM. Mačči kan d aya, imi di tmura nni imedyazen ttawin azwil (un “ cachet ) ɣef u ɛeddi-nsen deg umeṭṭaff-nni neɣ di tesgilt-nni. 

 Zik, deg iseggasen n 80 akken i yella lḥal ula d dag-i ɣer-nneɣ nekni. Imedyazen id yettɛeddayen di nuba “ leqlam d usefru” n Mass Agaruj Rabah, ttaɣen azwil ɣef isefra-nsen. Zrin wussan tenngdam tagnit, uɣalen wid id yetthheggin tisgilin s ddemma i tamedyazt deg imeṭṭaffen yellan ( ama di radyu Sumam, neɣ tin n Tiz-Wezzu, neɣ tin Tubiret, neɣ di radyu tis snat) wwin-tt am akken d lemziyya i xeddmen i yimedyazen snubguyen ɣer tidwilinnsen. Xuḍi lemmer ad ɣunzun yimedyazen-nni ṛwaḥ ɣef nuba-t agi, d awezɣi ad tilin-t. Ma nenna-d awal akken nniḍen: s imedyazen id yettassen ɣer nuba-t agi i s wacu id tt-harrin yinerdalen n tesgilin ( animateurs) aɣrum-nsen. Ɣef aya iseɣ yewwi d akken ad fehmen belli d nutni i yeḥwajjen imedyazen , mačči d imedyazen iyeḥwajjen tisgilin-nsen. Ɣef aya ilaq ad yuɣal wayla i bab-is. Amedyaz ,yal anda ara d iɛeddi, isekf ad yewwi leḥq-is n leqder, akked leḥq-is n yedrimen.

   

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tewɛer deɛwessu n tidi, tewɛer diɣen yir tamuɣli. Ihi am akken is yenna umedyaz:  

 <em>Tṣaɛbeḍ ay aɣṛum</em>

  <em>Ad ak tiṣɛib liḥala</em> 

  <em>Ad d tedubeḍ ay aksum</em> 

  <em>Ad d tebeddelḍ ay udem ṣṣifa</em> 

  <em>Ad d-teggeḍ am ɛeggun</em> 

  <em>Ad yettwali wer yesla</em> 

  <em>Ad d-taṛwuḍ lahmum</em> 

  <em>D acu ara k-id egg snitra ?( Zedek Mouloud) </em> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Seg tazwara n useggas-agi n 2016 ideg nella ar ass-a, azal n 15 n yisenfaren i yettwaxdamen sɣur usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan (APC) n Ait Aissa Mimoun, iɣef i yella ɣef uqerruy-is Mass Akli Chabane.

 Isenfaren-agi, ttwajerden deg lejrida n lxedma i useggas-agi n 2016. Gar 15 n yisenfaren-a, llan 5 seg-sen εnan aftaḥ n yiberdan n tfelaḥt daxel n tudrin. Amedya: aftaḥ n sin n yiberdan, yiwen deg taddart n Imkechrene, wayeḍ deg Tizi Tkharoubt ɣef teɣzi n sin ilikilumitren d uzgen. Sin-nniḍen seg-sen, d tiregwa i waman ɣef yiri n yiberdan n tuddar, Mendjah, Imkechrene, El Hara Oufella (Ikhelouiène), Akar Dhamoune, Vouchouva, d tregwa-nniḍen deg Ighil Bouchene akked Akaoudj. Am wakken, daɣen, i rran ssiman i tlata n yiberdan yecban win n Akarou Thanouts, Tharga deg taddart Akaoudj akked El Klaa. Yella-d, diɣ, usewseε n sin yiberdan imeqranen; amezwaru d win yeqqnen gar Dhlalouth alamma d Ighil Bouchene, ma d wis sin d win yeqqnen gar Boussouar d Igounane Ameur. Seggmen, daɣen, sin n yinurar n waddal n snat n tuddar: yiwen deg taddart n Igounane Ameur yesɛan tajuma n 3300 M2, ma d wis sin deg taddart n Ighil Bouchene n 4000 M2. Aṭas-nniḍen n yeqdic i yettwaxedmen, am lebni n lḥiḍ n ublaḍ deg unnar n Akaoudj d lxedma n teftilin n yiberdan deg Izourar n Tala Gahia. Isenfar-agi akk yettwaxedmen seg tazwara n waggur n yennayer, sqamen-d i tɣiwant s lqidar n 10 000 000 DA. Mazal akemmel n lgaz n temdint. Mazal imezdaɣ n 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant-agi n Ait Aissa Mimoun, ssuturen akemmel n usenfar n lgaz n temdint, imi mazal ar ass-a n wussan aɣbel-agi n lgaz ur yefri ara. Imi mazal aṭas n tudrin i t-yeddren, acku seg ttnaṣfa n useggas 2015 i bdan lxedma deg-s, maca mazal ar ass-a urԑad yekcim ixxamen n medden, anida Leqrar-is ? . Membeεd mi tikebbaniyin-nni yeṭṭfen asenfar-agi, yella winda bdant axeddim ğğant akken, deg waṭas n tuddar yecban : Tahanouts, Ighil Bouchene, Ait Khelfats…atg. Maca llant tuddar anida mazal ur bdin ara maḍi imuhal-is, yecban tudrin-agi: Ifouzar, Imkechrene, Menaam…atg. Akka tura, ala yiwet n tkebbanit, i d-yeqqim tettkemmil axeddim-is, deg tama n Ikhelouiene, d Mendjah, Igounane Ameur. Maca yiwet-agi i d-yeqqimen, ur tezmir ara ad teṭṭef asenfar-agi n lgaz deg 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant-agi. iIlaq ad d-awin tikebbaniyin-nniḍen. Ma ulac ur ikeccem ara lgaz s ixxamen n yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun ahat alamma 2020 ma yella kra. Imezdaɣ n tuddar –agi, ṛwan lḥif, ladɣa deg tesmhuyt n tegrest, neɣ deg ussan n ccetwa, imi acḥal n tikkal i leḥḥun d likumiṭer i wakken ad d-awin taqqerԑat n lgaz, ama d aggefur neɣ d adfel. Tikwal ttuɣalen-d ifassen d ilmawen. D ayen i ten-yeğğan ad d-gren tiɣri yerna ad ssutren deg wid teԑna temsalt, gar-asen imeḍberen n tɣiwant Ait Aissa Mimoun, iɣef yella ɣef uqerruy-is Mass Akli Chabane, d tenmehla n Imuhal Izuyaz n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 “Coluche : politique et comique’’ d adlis wis 3 n Dr Nasserdine AIT OUALI. Uqbel adlis-a, yella-d, yakan, deg lmendad i udlis ‘’De la pédagogie de projet et de l’enseignement de la langue amazighe en Kabylie’’ i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2013 ɣer tezrigin L’ODYSSEE, am wakken yura adlis-nniḍen ‘’L’écriture romanesque kabyle d’expression berbère (1946-2014) i d-yeffɣen deg useggas 2015. Adlis n tikkelt-a n Dr AIT OUALI, yewwi-d awal ɣef yiwen n wudem mechuren nezzeh deg tmurt n Fransa, ladɣa, deg uḥric-agi n unecreḥ d teḍṣa, wagi d Coluche. Deg tazwara, tella-d tira n udlis-a d asentel n Ductura n Mass Ait Ouali, syin yerra anadi-agi-ines d adlis ɣef Coluche. Aṭas n yiḥricen deg tmeddurt n Coluche iwumi yekkes umeskar takka, aṭas n tmussniwin ɣef tmuɣli-ines ara d-rnun fell-as wid-nni akken yenwan ssnen Coluche akken ilaq. Seg «Les Restos du cœur» alamma d tifranin n tselwayt n tegduda n 1981, ad teẓrem Coluche akken werǧin i t-teẓram. Deg ssinima neɣ deg tmezgunt, ɣef tsertit neɣ ɣef yimḍebbren, awi-d kan ad d-yeg asentel i tmuɣli-s s teḍṣa. Yedder d ilelli, yenna-d ayen yebɣa ad d-yini. Ha-tt-an tmuɣli-s ɣef tlelli. ‘’Vous voyez, c’est ça la liberté en France : on a rigoureusement le droit de dire ce qu’on veut. Et le gouvernement a rigoureusement le droit de faire ce qu’il veut’’. Adlis yeffeɣ-d ɣer tezrigin L’ODYSSEE, 2016, 288 n yisebtar, azal-is 600 idinaren.

<p style="text-align: right;">   H. Moula 

  
 Ǧaɛfer Xalifi d mmi-s n temnaḍt n Ayt Smaɛel, d yiwen ilemẓi i yesɛan 21 n yiseggasen di leɛmer-is, d anelmad i d-ilehhun ed tɣuri-ines war ma yeggug (yebɛed) seg umaḍal n tẓuri. Deg waya ihi, Ǧeɛfer d ameɛcuq n tderbukt (dderbuka). Iḥemmel-itt aṭas, ur yettɛedday wass fell-as war ma yesderbek deg-s taswiɛt. Ula d ssut-nni i d-tettak, ɣas ma iceqqu medden i tseddart anda tikwal ixelleq-asen-d lqerḥ n uqerruy, wanag netta aya ɣur-s d anemgal, meḥsub d ddwa, acku mara ad t-yeqreḥ yixef-is, seld ad iruḥ ad yesderbek iḥellu dindin. Tannumi-ines i ɣur-s terra-t ad tt-iwali mačči kan d yiwet seg dduzan n uẓawan, lameɛna d ugar. «Nekk ɣur-i dderbuka d tamdakkelt tamekdit(fidèle), d nettat i d tamwanest-iw acku ẓriɣ-tt d tikci, yes-s i ttakkeɣ lehdu i lxaṭer», i d-yenna Ǧaɛfer Xalifi i yettafen ccbaḥa n tedfi mara yekkat iḍuḍan-is deg dderbuka. Ma d ayen yeɛnan akud n twala i ten-yezdin seg yimir-n almi d tura, yerra-d ɣef usteqsi : «S tidet ur cfiɣ melmi gedged bdiɣ kkateɣ dderbuka, skud lliɣ d amecṭuḥ, ur yelli lawan-nni deg tekwat-iw. Lḥasun ahat seg mraw iseggasen d asawen, acku acḥal-aya tura». Ǧaɛfer yessen ad yewwet dderbuka s lesnaf n uẓawan n ccna s tumata, ama d ccaɛbi, win n tmeɣriwin… D wiyaḍ. Ur yettaf tuɛert deg-sen, ur d ɛeyyu daɣen, ulama ulac amahil deg ur yelli leɛtab. Ahat d tisselbi-s i ɣur-s i t-yeǧǧan ur yettḥulfu ara s leɛtab-nni, i as-yessettsawen ɛeyyu n yiɣallen-is. Ar tura Ǧaɛfer Xalifi ur yetturar allal nniḍen n uẓawan anagar dderbuka, ɣas ma yella yettqessir cwiṭ apyanu, yestehza seg-s segmi ifaq dakken yettḥibbi dderbuka ugar. S tnaga n xilla n yimazzagen(spécialistes) n ccna, Ǧaɛfer yettgerriz mliḥ asderbek ulama leɛmer yekcem aɣerbaz n useḥfeḍ n uẓawan, rnu yettekka yakan deg kra n tmeɣriwin n ccna i yettwaxedmen iseggasen yezrin deg taddart-is. Ǧaɛfer yehwa-yas xilla umuqel deg yidrabkiyen imeqqranen, wid n umaḍal s umata, ma d win iḥemmel nnig-sen, yerra-d ɣef usteqsi yenna-k : «D Dda Rabeḥ Xelfa i yi-yerḥan ugar n wiyaḍ, s leqder-iw i nutni niḥqa, maca d netta i serseɣ deg tqacuct». Ǧaɛfer yessaram ad ifares tikci-ya-ines sey-a ɣer sdat, skud tura ilehhu d tɣuri d-yessuturen akud d aɣezzfan deg tudert n umdan, dɣa aql-it gar dderbuka d leqraya, yeṭṭef-itent di snat.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;">  M. X. 

  
 Ddurt yezrin, imezdaɣ n yattafen i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Wat yanni , yettawin seg Ssuq Lḥed anida i d-ttemlilin At Uqbil d Yibudraren d Yattafen, ɣer taddart n Ait Saada d Ait Daoud Tazaghart d Derna, msefhamen yinehhaṛen, ad snernin seg 30 yidinaren ɣer 40 yidinaren ssuma n usiweḍ, kan akka mebla ma yella kra n uzref. Dɣa, ur qbilen yilmezyen n temnaḍt–agi rray-agi u sutren deg-sen i wakken ad d-fken kra n lkaɣeḍ i asen-isemḥen s usnerni-agi n ssuma. Bɣan ad walin ma yella kra n ulɣu i d-yeffɣen ɣef lmend n waya. Imi ulac ttbut, nnan-asen ad nruḥ, ad necetki fell-awen ɣer yijedermiyen. ‘’Ɣillen cceɛb akken i asen-yehwa ad uraren yid-sen, maca llan yilmezyen ur qbilen ara lbaṭel yecban wagi’’, i aɣ-d-nnan yiwen usdawan. Syin, kkren-d yakk la ttuɣun, yerna tamnaḍt-agi, tettidir lexsas meqqren ama d lgaz , aman neɣ trisiti d waṭas n wuguren-nniḍen. Xas ulamma yeqreb Ssuq Lḥed ɣer tudrin-agi, rnan di ssuma, wammag ɣer temdint n Tizi Uzzu, ttawin s100 yidinaren , ‘’d acu kan smenyafen ad ṣubben ɣer Lḥed, yella dinna wayen ḥwağen wala ad awḍen alamma d tamdint n Tizi Uzzu’’, i iwala umezdaɣ n tama-agi. Tudert deg temnaḍt –agi, ur teshil ara, abeɛda lawan-agi n tegrest. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Z.A.Y 

<div> 
  
 Tameɣra-nni yettuɛynen ad d-tili ass-nni n 8 deg meɣres, yuɣal yeẓuẓ-itt Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i d-isuddsen tameɣra-agi ara d-yilin ass n lexmis 30 deg meɣres 2017 deg tzeqqa n tmeɣriwin «Les Berbères». D tameɣra ideg ara cennun 14 n yinaẓuren n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yecban: Karim Khelfaoui, Mouh Oubelaid, Dahmani Belaid, Siham Stiti, Mouh Bouchiba, Kaci Boussad, Ouazib Med Ameziane, Ahcene Bedrani…atg. Ma deg useddu n tmeɣra-agi, ad d-tili sɣur Rabah Boujaboud akked d Hayat Remdani. Ad d-nesmekti belli ama d tameɣra-agi n ccna n wass n lexmis, ama d timliliyin n ddabex uḍar i yellan yakan deg wussan iɛeddan, deg unnar aɣiwan n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, yellan deg “Tiplakin” tama n tesnawit n “Med Oudiai”, llant i wakken ad yessiweḍ Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Ait Aissa Mimoun, ad d-yejmaɛ idrimen i teqcict-nni tamuḍint n taddart n Uqawej, tagi d tamsiwt “Sellah Souhila”. Iwumi i d-ttwaḍelben waṭas n yidrimen, i wakken ad tdawi aṭṭan-is imi d tameɛdurt, werğin telḥi ɣef yiḍarren-is.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"></span>Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ddurt-agi, deg wexxam-nneɣ, ameslay ḥala ɣef Bengherbrit. Tagi d taneɣlaft n uselmed. C’est à dire, s ddarija n tmaziɣt, d tawazirt n lakul. D nettat i iḥekmen di anisati n tteḥḍiri ak d lmudir. D nettat, théoriquement, yettdisidin d acu d wamek ara nɣer. Ihi, akken fehmeɣ, selon baba d yemma, teddisidi tneɣlaft akken si s-ya d afella ad nuɣal neqqar s ddarija. Mais d acu-tt ddarija-agi? Akken fehmeɣ, ddarija-agi d tameslayt. s tefransisit lfusḥa qqaren-as le dialecte. S teqbaylit lfusḥa ur s-qqaren ara. En fait, akken bɣun inin, les neurones-inu ssawḍen ad fehmen belli ddarija-agi d tutlayt. d acu kan, ur tt-id-saḥ ara teɛlamt d userdas ara yesnernin di ccan-is am teɛrabt lfusḥa d tefransist lfusḥa.

 Heureusement tella Benghebrit d-yennan belli mara yekcem weqcic pqer lakul ilaq ad n-yaf yemma-s. Di tazwara ferḥeɣ, nniɣ-as d yemma ara yuɣalen d anisati n ttehḍiri. Ala. D anisati n teḥdiri ara yuɣalen d yemma. Mais nek j’ai refusé . Mi steqsaɣ yemma ɣef ssuq-agi, tenna-yi-d:

 – Ala a mmi, ulac di ddunit tin ara yeṭṭfen amkan-i

 w-amek ihi ara tuɣal anisat d yemma ?

 -jamais !!! anisti-inek ad tuɣal tettmeslay am kunwi.

 -taqbaylit ?

 -ih !

 -mais anisati d taɛrabt, ur tessin ara taqbaylit !

 -ad awen-d-mmeslay s taɛrabt ddarija

 -safik tella tesggugem-iyi taɛrabt lfusḥa, tura ad d-ternu taɛrabt ddarija ?

 -euh…

 -awah a yemma, wagi akk mačči d rray ! tezriḍ d acu i ilaq ad texdem Benghebrit ?

 – d acu?

 -ad tekkes anisati n tteḥidiri akked tiyaḍ, ad ṭfent imekwan-nnsent tiyemmatin-nneɣ. C’est à dire, yalwa tesseɣer-it yemma-s.

<p style="text-align: right;"> SOA 

  <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="fd89d3928891999c909c8fbd849c959292d39b8f" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a> 

  
 Taddart n Ifouzer d yiwet seg 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i d-yezgan deg ugafa n tɣiwant-agi u deg ugafa n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Taddart-agi, mazal ar ass-a n wussan tettidir iseggasen-agi ineggura lexṣaṣ d ameqqran, deg yiḥricen d yisenfaren yemgarden n tudert tatrart gar-asen ; ttawil n Internet, lgaz n temdint, yir liḥala n yiberdan, imḍiqen i yilmeẓyen, d uɣbel n waman tissit, trisiti …atg. Ssuturen yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi n Ifouzer deg yimḍebren teεna temsalt, ama d wid n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan (APC) n Ait Aissa Mimoun, ama d wid n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i wakken ad d-rren lwelha-nsen ɣer taddart-agi yenḥafen aṭas si yal tama. Menbeεd mi ttidiren akka tura deg tegnatin qessihen. Nnan-d yimezdaɣ-is belli taddart-agi si zik tettwaεzel, yerna mazal ar tura tettwaḥqar, acku ulac tadrimt yettwaxeṣen i yisenfaren n unegmu i lfayda n taddart-agi ara yessifsusen taεkumt ɣef tudert-nsen. Yenna-aɣ-d yiwen n umezdaɣ : ‘’taddart-agi akk i d taneggarut deg tɣiwant-a, cukkeɣ deg tmurt n Leqbayel merra’’. Ma d iɣeblan i d-ttmagaren yal ass, ad naf deg tazwara aɣbel n waman n tissit, imi tikwal tteddun-asen-d waman ur nelḥi ara, yettili daɣen lexṣaṣ n waman ladɣa deg tsemhuyt unebdu. Cetkayen daɣen, ɣef uεeṭṭel n uṣiweḍ n lgaz n temdint s ixxamen-nsen, imi ṛwan lḥif ladɣa deg tesmhuyt n tegrest, neɣ deg ussan n ccetwa, imi mazal-asen yiwen n umkan ur d as-xdimen ara lgaz. D ayen i ten-yeğğan ad d-gren tiɣri, yerna ad ssutren deg wid teԑna temsalt gar-asen, imeḍbbren n tɣiwant Ait Aissa Mimoun, d Tanmehla n Imuhal Izuyaz, i wakken ad d-uɣalen ad kemmlen lecɣal-agi n lgaz deg wussan i d-iteddun. Aɣbel wis ukuẓ, d win n yiberdan, imi abrid yeqqnen gar Tizi n Tagouma d taddart-agi n Ifouzer, ha-t-an deg yir liḥala. Azal n sin n yiseggasen segmi i d-ffɣen yidrimen-s, maca mazal ur yettwaxdam ara, imi mazal urεrad kfin asekcem n lgaz s ixxamen. Ugur wis semmus, d win n trisiti, imi ar tura mazal llan yixxamen ama deg tlemmast ama akkin i taddart ur sεin ara trisiti deg yixxamen-nsen. Yella diɣ lexṣaṣ n teftilin n tafat n yiberdan, d tqenṭyar d tregwa i yessuffuɣen aman. Llant tid yettwaxdamen zik, tura ilaq ad ttuεawdent. Llant tid i ilaqen ad ttwaxdament maca mazal ur d-tent-id-εnin ara ar imir-a. Mebla ma nettu uguren-nniḍen yecban, Internet, imḍiqen n wurrar, annar d wayen akk-nniḍen. D annect-agi akk n yiɣeblan i yerran tudert n twaculin n taddart n Ifouzer, ttidirent deg lḥif d lmeḥna, ɣef waya ssuturent deg yimḍebbren ad d-lhin deg wuguren iceɣben allaɣ-nsen, u ad d-afen tifrat i yiɣeblan-agi s tazla.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdel Ghani 

  
 Ḥemmad d agellid ɣef temdint n Lqelqɛa d tudrin i as-d-izzin. Qqaren-d xas akken iwɛer nezzeh, iḥemmel-it uɣref-is imi iḥkem s lḥaq. Tamdint n Lqelɛa tuɣal d tamaneɣt, ttasen-d si yal tama ad zṛen agellid neɣ akken ad d-qḍun kra.

 Yiwen wass, yiwen umɣar iruḥ d tmeṭṭut-is si taddart-nsen ɣer temdint n Lqelɛa. Tameṭṭut-is meẓẓiyet aṭas fell-as, tezyen d ayen kan, anda tɛedda ad as-d sḍefren tamuɣli. Wehmen akk lɣaci amek teqbel tuɣ amɣar. Deg ubrid, mlalen-d yiwen n yilemẓi iteddu ula d netta ɣer temdint n Lqelɛa. Dduklen, kemlen abrid akken. Mi leḥḥun, ilemẓi-nni iɛcaq tameṭṭut-nni n umɣar. Nettat, daɣen si tama-s tebɣa-t, iɛjeb-as. Ad as-tinniḍ ixdem-as kra n sḥur. Amɣar izwar, ǧǧan-t ileḥḥu weḥd-s. Tameṭṭut-nni-ines teggra d yilemẓi-nni ɣer deffir, leḥḥun-d akken ttemyeḥkun, ttqessiṛṛen, ttaḍsan. Mi as-yenna umɣar rwaḥ ɣur-i d nekk i d argaz-im, nettat teqqar-as kan ruḥ kemmel abrid-ik, tura d ilemẓi-agi i d argaz-iw ! Ilemẓi d tameṭṭut mmeslayen, msefhamen ad rren iman-nsen myezwaǧen: netta si tama-s ad yerr iman-is d argaz-is n leḥlal; nettat si tama-s ad terr iman-is d ilemẓi-nni i d argaz-is, ad tenkeṛ argaz-nni n tidet. Mi wwḍen imsebriden ɣer temdint n At Ḥemmad, amɣar-nni izwar irra srid ɣer sselṭan Ḥemmad icekta fell-asen. Iḥka-as akk ayen i as-xedmen deg ubrid. Yenna-as amek ilemẓi-nni d tmeṭṭut-is n leḥlal i kksen sser fell-as. Yenna-as ugellid: ‘’D tidet akka, tameṭṭut-ik n leḥlal ikkes-ak-tt urgaz deg ubrid, yerna yerra-tt d tameṭṭut-is ?’’ Yerra-as umɣar: ‘’akka a Sidi Ḥemmad, ur ẓriɣ d acu n sḥur i as-ixdem alammi ula d nettat tenkeṛ-iyi belli nekk d argaz-is. Ṣelṭan iwhem d acu-t ẓur icban wa i d-iḍran di teqbilt-is. Yenna-as i umɣar: ‘’ qqim dagi tura iffeɣ-ik uɣbel’’. Imiren kan, ifka lameṛ ad d-awin ilemẓi d tmeṭṭut-nni ad d-mqabalen nutni d umɣar. Wwin-ten di sin yid-sen, bedden sdat n Ḥemmad. Inṭeq ɣer tmeṭṭut-nni yenna-as : ‘’ i kemm, anwa i d argaz-im n leḥlal, d amɣar-a neɣ d ilemẓi-a ?’’ Terra-as: ‘’anɛam a Sidi Ḥemmad, nekk yiwen n urgaz i sɛiɣ d ilemẓi-agi akked i d-ddukleɣ i d argaz-iw, ma da ur iyi-tumineḍ ara, steqsi-t netta d acu ara ak-id-yini. Ayen akk i ak-id-yenna umɣar-inna d lekdeb’’. Ḥemmad iluɛa ilemẓi-nni yenna-as : ‘’i kečč ay ilemẓi ! D tidet akka, d tagi i d tameṭṭut-ik n leḥlal ?’’ Yenna-as ilemẓi-nni : ’’ wwah a Sidi ṣelṭan! D tameṭṭut-iw n leḥlal, yili da d-neddukkel akken ɛinani, sdat akk lɣaci. Ur smeḥsis ara i umɣar-inna n lǧihenema, yeskiddib’’. Ilemẓi d tmeṭṭut ṭṭfen deg wawal-nsen, akken mmsefhamen. Tin-a ad tini d ilemẓi i d argaz-is, winn-a si tama-s ad yini d tagi i d tameṭṭut-is. Ad d-cehden di sin belli d amɣar i yeskiddiben. Yezzi Ḥemmad ɣer umɣar, inna-as : ‘’i kečč ay amɣar tzemreḍ ad d-tawiḍ kra n ttbut swayes ara d-tbeggneḍ ayen ara d-teqqareḍ ! Yella wid d-iddan yid-wen deg ubrid ?’’ Yerra-as-id umɣar : ‘’ulac a Sidi win d-iddan yid-neɣ nniḍen ala aqjun-a.’’ Amɣar yunez ɣer tmurt akken ad d-isken aqjun-is ibedden sdat-s. Imiren kan Ḥemmad tusa-as-id tikti. Isendeh ixeddamen-is ad qqnen aqjun-nni ɣer tzanet i illan din. Syin, issendah tameṭṭut-nni ad as-d-tefsi i uqjun. Tameṭṭut tuɣ awal truḥ tefsi-as-d i uqjun. Syin, akin, isendeh-itt tikkelt nniḍen ad t-teqqen. Tameṭṭut tessawel i uqjun, iruḥ-d teqqen-it ɣer tzanat-nni. Imiren, izzi ɣer yilemẓi-nni inna-as: ‘’ kker keččini xdem akka i texdem tmeṭṭut-a. Bru i uqjun, ssyin qqen-it.’’ Ilemẓi iqerreb ad as-d-ibru, aqjun ibda assegelf-d fell-as am wakken ur t-issin ara, am wakken d abeṛṛani. Ḥemmad ifaq s yilemẓi iskaddeb. Iluɛa tameṭṭut-nni, yenna-as: ‘’d amɣar-a i d argaz-im n leḥlal! Tbeddeleḍ-t kan s yilemẓi-agi. D kemm i iskeddiben !’’ Tameṭṭut, teṭṭerḍeq d imeṭṭi, tuɣal ɣef wudem tesudun iḍarren n Ḥemmad, tessutur deg-s s wannuz ad as-yeɛfu. ‘’Kker syina’’ i as-yenna Ḥemmad, ruḥ ad tedduḍ d umɣar-inna. Limmer mačči d tameṭṭut i telliḍ akked umɣar-agi iyi-ɣaḍen, yili ad igzem uqeṛṛu-m am yilemẓi-a. Urzen ilemẓi-nni, wwin-t ɣer lḥebs. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane LASHEB 

  
 Ilmend n tuffɣa n udlis «Abrid ɣer ukayad n Tmaziɣt» s tallelt n Tesbeddit Tiregwa, ara yili d aɛwin i warrac ara yesɛeddin ikayaden n BAK d BEM, nefren ad d-nessesten ameskar-is mass Lɛerbi Yeḥyun akken ad nesɛu ugar n yisallen fell-as. Hatan wayen iɣef nemmeslay.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Ahat Ad aɣ-d-tiniḍ tazwara anwa i d Lɛerbi i wid ur k-nessin?  

 <span style="color: #ff0000;"> Lɛerbi Yeḥyun :  </span>Mass Lɛerbi Yeḥyun, ilul deg Uqbu, aɣir n Bgayet. D aselmad n tutlayt d tsekla Tamaziɣt deg uɣerbaz alemmas n Yiɣil Ɛli. D yiwen umeɣnas i irefden amennuɣ ɣef tumast d yidles amaziɣ s wawal akked dira. Yura yakan ammud n yisefra i wumi isemma «Tayri n Umedyaz» i d-yeffɣen s lmendad n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa (HCA) deg useggas n 2014.

  Tessufɣeḍ-d taggara-a yiwen n udlis i yinelmaden ara yesɛeddin aBAK s tallelt n Tesbeddit Tiregwa, eg-aneɣ-d taḥawact fell-as…  

 Adlis-iw «Abrid ɣer ukayad n Tmaziɣt» d adlis wis sin i d-ssuffɣeɣ s ufus n tallelt n Tesbeddit Takanadit Tiregwa, xedmeɣ-t-id i yinelmaden yeqqaren tamaziɣt, akken ad asen-yili d amnir (guide) ara ten-yallen u ad ten-iɛiwen deg umecwar-nsen n tɣuri, akken ad heggin iman-nsen i yikayaden unsiben : BEM d BAC. Ma d ayen yerzan agbur, deg-s ad naf : agzul n temsirin s tewzel ; 10 n yikayaden yemgaraden ilmend n tsekka taḍrisant (aḍris ullis, aḍris agelman, aḍris asegzay d uḍris imesfukel) ; aseɣti n yikayaden-a d yifarisen s tira ; iḍrisen i tɣuri ɣef tmedyezt d tsekla taqbaylit ideg yella yiwen usefru yessaḍsayen akked yiwet tmezgunt i warrac.

  Akken i t-id-yeqqar uzwel-is, adlis-a ad yenfaɛ ihi wid ara yesɛeddin akayad n BAK? Imi ulac-it deg tnedlisin anda yezmer ad t-yaf unelmad?  

 D tidet, ur yelli ara deg waṭas n tnedlisin, imi yeffeɣ-d i ddemma n bab-is, ɣef waya amur ameqqran deg-sen senzeɣ-ten deg yiɣerbazen ilemmasen akked tesnawiyin, srid seg ufus-iw ɣer ufus n yinelmaden, akken diɣen i iyi-ɛawnen kra n yiselmaden akked tselmaden, imi wwin adlis-iw akken ad t-seknen i warrac i iran ad t-id-aɣen. Ma d win yebɣan ad t-id-yaɣ, yella deg tnedlist Haroun Mohamed deg Uqbu akked tnedlis Gouraya Culture deg Bgayet.

  Akken nettwali deg wannar, yettmagar-d umaru aṭas n wuguren sdat-s?  

 Win ileḥḥun akk deg ubrid n yidles d tnaslit, yettmaggar-d uguren, d abrid n tẓuri neɣ d abrid n tira kifkif-nsen, ula d amaru yesɛa uguren-is, imi adlis n tmaziɣt ur iteddu ara s waṭas acku drus i t-yeqqaren imi tugget n yiqbayliyen ur tt-ɣrin ara deg uɣerbaz. Tin ɣur-s, ugur n teẓrigin, imi yuɛer ad tafeḍ win ara d-yessuffɣen adlis n tmaziɣt, ɣef waya i ttwaliɣ dakken «Tira d amennuɣ», amaru ilaq ad yennaɣ d yiman-is akken ad d-yaru ayen yettxemmim d wayen yettḥulfu, ilaq ad yennaɣ d teswaɛt akken ad yaf win ara as-d-yessuffɣen adlis-is, ilaq diɣen ad yennaɣ d tmetti akken ad yessiweḍ izen-is i yimdanen d wid akk ara t-yeɣren, akka i d tudert n umaru deg tmurt ur nerri azal i umaru.

   Awal-ik n taggara? 

 Ad d-iniɣ kan, tanemmirt i kra n win d tin i d-yefkan afus n tallelt akken ad d-yeffeɣ udlis-iw u ad yaweḍ afus n unelmad, tanemmirt i kra n win i yi-d-yefkan tabɣest akken ad kemmleɣ tikli-w deg ubrid n tira, tanemmirt diɣen i kečč a M’henni ɣef tdiwennit-a. Ar tikkelt-nniḍen deg lehna.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t : Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Imkechrène, d taddart tamezwarut n tama n umalu deg lɛerc n Wat Wagennun. D taddart n 38 n yimeɣras. ‘’Ur wwiḍen ara 38 n yixxamen i yellan deg lgirra-nni. Dagi i bbumbardint, i tikkelt tamezwarut, ṛruplanat n Fransa.’’ I aɣ-d-yenna Mass Hammad Hamidouche, dɣa netta d mmi-s n umeɣras. Am tudrin n leqbayel, imezdaɣ n Imkechrène, ula d nutni, tcudd tmetti-nsen ɣer tedyanin akked tmucuha. Akka ara naf taqṣidt n uɣilas, n lgirra, n Jeddi Ɛli Gueɛrab…atg

  Takerḍa n taddart. 

 Imkechrène, d taddart gar tudrin n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun deg lɛerc n Wat Wagennun. D nettat i d tamezwarut ɣer umalu n lɛerc-agi. Tella uqbel taddart Tahanouts, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan. Zedɣen deg-s ugar n 1000 n yimdanen. Ɛlayet ɣef lebḥar s 600 n lmitrat. Tesɛa tilisa akked At Khelfats, seg usamar ; ma seg umalu ad naf Ifouzar ; seg ugafa tella Makouda ; seg unẓul ad naf Boussoir. Tebḍa taddart d idrumen. Idrumen-a, llan-d ɛlaḥsab n warraw n jeddi-tsen amezwaru. Wagi d Jeddi Ɛli Gueɛrab. Ccix-agi yesɛa 5 warrac akked teqcict, ihi yal yiwen yesɛa adrum-is : At Amar Oukaci, Iamrache, At Chabane, At Yahia, At Slimane, akked Issoulame.Ayen yeṭṭfen lwelha-nneɣ deg taddart-a, d akken xas ulamma Jeddi-tsen yesɛa lǧameɛ zik-nni anda ttẓallan, meɛna ass-agi lǧameɛ yuɣal d tajmaɛt kan i temlilit n yimezdaɣ mačči i tẓallit. ‘’Dagi ɣur-neɣ, ttẓallan deg uxxam, ur nesɛi ara lǧameɛ.’’ I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen umezdaɣ. 

  Isem ‘’Imkechrène. 

 Ahat, amdan mi ara isel awal-agi Imkechrène, ad ixemmen ɣer umyag ‘’Qqcer’’ i wakken ad as-yefk anamek. Acu kan, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, awal Imkechrène yekka-d seg umyag ‘’mqacar’’, meḥsub ttemsewwaq deg ssuma (négocier) mi ara d-tettaɣeḍ neɣ teznuzuḍ. Syin i d-yekka wawal- agi ihi, imi llan yimezwura-nsen ttemqacaren.

  Amezruy d tmetti. 

 Zik, Imkechrène, uqbel ad ṭṭfen tasawent-agi n tura, llan zedɣen deg tama n wadda iwumi qqaren Tiḥerqatin: mazal ar tura later n yixxamen-nsen iqdimen. Syin d afella, ulin-d d asawen ɣer tqacuct n udrar. Amezwaru-nsen qqaren-as Jeddi Ɛli Gueɛrab, seg-s i d-frurin. Ha-tt-an, dɣa, teqṣidt-is.

  Jeddi Ɛli Gueɛrab, amezwaru ɣer taddart. 

 Ha-tt-an tedyant n Jeddi Ɛli Gueɛrab ɣef wakken i aɣ-tt-id-yenna Mass Hamid Berkani : ‘’Yemmut baba-s, yeǧǧa-t-id d awḥid d ameẓyen. Yella yezdeɣ deg ukessar, deg Zehla. Yekker ɛemmi-s yerra yemma-s u yesɛa-d yid-s 7 warraw-is, meḥsub Jeddi Ɛli Gueɛrab, yesɛa 7 watmaten s yemma-s. Atmaten-agi-ines, ur qbilen ara beṭṭu gar-asen. Nnan ulamek netta, weḥd-s, ad yawi amur, nekni deg sebɛa, ad nawi amur. Ihi, i wakken ad t-nɣen, kkren segrarben-t. teqqim yemma-s 3 n wussan mebla lmakla. Mi ceyyɛen akli-nsen i wakken ad d-yawi alim deg utemmu, yufa-t dinna. Yewweḍ-d s axxam, yenna-s i yemma-s :’’ a lalla, mmi-m ha-t-an deg utemmu.’’ Tekker yemma-s, tesseɣres lḥiǧab-is, truḥ s tazla ɣer wanda akken yella. Mi tewweḍ, tḥawet-it i wakken ad yuɣal s axxam, yugi. Syin, kkren ruḥen ɣer temɛemmert deg Ɛezzuzen. Yeɣra ayen yeɣra, syin yenna-s Ccix-is : ‘’tura kečč leqraya dayen, ha-tt-an tegmart awi-tt, ay anda teḥbes, tzedɣeḍ din’’. Yekker Jeddi Ɛli Gueɛrab, yewwi-d taserdunt-nni. Tleḥḥu, tleḥḥu armi d Imkechrène, dɣa teḥbes. Seg yimir i tebda tudert d tnezduɣt deg taddart-a. Asmi meqqer, yuɣal yesɛa arraw-is, yesɛa 5 warrac akked teqcict. Syin, ttwaxelqen-d yiderman ɛlaḥsab n warraw-agi-ines, ula d taqcict-nni s udrum-is. Taddart tebḍa akka : adrum n At Amar Oukaci, adrum n Iamrache, adrum n At Chabane, adrum n At Yahia, adrum n At Slimane akked udrum n At Issoulasse.

  Amḍiq Uɣilas. 

 Zik, yezdeɣ yizem, tasedda d warraw-nsen deg yiwen umḍiq. Tekker tsedda-nni, tuker-d agrud u tefka-t i warraw-is ččan-t. asmi inuda baba-s n uqcic fell-as, yufa tabernust-is gar warraw n yiezm, deg umḍiq-agi. Seg zzɛef-nni, yekker yezla iɣilasen-nni akken ma llan. Mi d-yuɣal yizem ɣer umekkan-a, yufa-d arraw-is mmezlen. Yefhem sebba, yerra-d ttar deg tsedda-nni. Akka i aɣ-tt-id nnan yimezdaɣ n tama-agi. Ttawin-d awal, diɣ, ɣef tsedda yeččan ameẓẓuɣ n yiwen urgaz. Nnan-d : ‘’ruḥen Wat taddart i wakken ad nɣen tasedda, acu kan ur as-ssawḍen ara. Yewweḍ yiwen ɣer din, dɣa, yenna-asen : ‘’ah ya lɛerc terna temcict.’’ Syin tneggez-d tsedda-nni fell-as, tewwi-as ameẓẓuɣ-is.’’

  Imkechrène deg lgirra-nni. 

 Tagi d tadyant n 3 n yimeɣras : Hammad Said, Rahim Ramdane Abderrahmane akked Mimouni Ali Hend Ou Said. Llan deg tmadaɣt n Tejjuṭ asmi xedmen lɛesker n fransa ratissage dinna. Tameddit mi kkren lɛesker-nni ad d-ruḥen, walan yiwen deg-sen mi d-yesṭuṭec. Syin yekker umennuɣ gar-asen. Iṛumyen-nni, ɣillen aṭas n yimjuhad i yellan din, sawlen i yimḍebbren-nsen. Syin, ceyyɛen-asen-d rruplanat, bdant kkatent ɣer umadaɣ-nni. Acu kan d lɛesker n fransa i ttḥazen, ɣelḍen gar-asen, nɣan azal n 100 xas ulamma glan s tlata-agi n yimjuhad. Wwin Yiṛumyen sin yimjuhad, ur asen-ten-id-fkan ara armi ttraḥen. 

  Kra n wudmawen. 

 Rahim : d acennay mechuren ladɣa s tezlit-is ‘’yya-d ad am-iniɣ’’. Yemmut ass 13 deg furar 2010 deg leɛmer-is 50 n yiseggasen. Yusa-d i wakken ad yawi yemma-s ɣer Fransa. Mi iruḥ ad iṣubb ɣer temdint n Tizi Uzzu netta d umeddakel-is, yeḥbes wul-is deg ubrid. Ur yehlik, ur yelli kra yellan, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna gma-s Chabane. Ali Mebtouche : d amyaru iminig. Gar wayen yura, ad naf adlis ‘’Pour l’honneur d’un village’’, 2011. Yeffeɣ-d, diɣ, s yisem-nniḍen ɣer tezrigin Edilivre ‘’Le Bagnard de Kabylie’’, 2015. Deg taggara, ad snemreɣ ameddakel Mohamed Benkanoun, Hammad Hamidouche, Rahim Chabane, Berkani Hamid akked yimezdaɣ n taddart Imkechrène akken ma llan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Ddurt-agi yezrin, tamedit n wass n 24 furar 2015, teḍra-d yiwet n twaγit γef 18:30 di tlemast n temdint n Yiεeẓẓugen, s zdat n tzeqa n leqdicat n temdint-agi, anda ittwenγan 02 n yelmeẓyen s rṣaṣ, wigi d Rafiq Bujemεa n taddert n Yiγil n wuzzal, taγiwant n Yiεeẓẓugen akked Mağid Lwenas n taddert n Tifrit n At-Lḥağ taγiwant n uqaru tamnaḍt n uzeffun. Ma yella d wis 03 d amejruḥ n taddert n Tarsatin taγiwant n Yiεeẓẓugen, wagi d Akli Bessah i iḥuzant snat n taṛṣaṣin deg uεebbuḍ, is-d-kksen di sbiṭaṛ Meγnem Lwenas n tγiwant n Yiεeẓẓugen, imazl yeẓẓel deg-s.

 Imezdaγ n temnaḍt n yiεeẓẓugen d temnaḍin niḍen, sḥasfen aṭas γef tuγa icuban tigi, anda isuturen isaγ d laman i yemdanen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ayen i ibennun tamurt i tt-yettağğan tettaẓ γer zdat, d amsawi ger yizerfan n urgaz d tmeṭṭut. Amer d-nzeggir laεqel γer zdat azref n tmeṭṭut mačči d ayen yezmer umdan a t-yeffer neγ a t-yesdari akken muḥal a d-iban, mačči d ayen mi ara tεerqeḍ iberdan, imi tidett tezga tettifrir am zzit γef waman, ihi azal n tmeṭṭut d awezγi ḥed a t-yenker, tafat d-tettak teḍwa tudert n umdan.

 Nettheggi-d neγ nettaf-d tiḥila amek ara neṣṣiweḍ a nqebbeḍ lerwaḥ n tlawin, tid iqedcen, tid d-yefkan tirwiḥin-nsent i tmurt. Bbubent taεekkemt ẓẓayen, nneεtabent aṭas mačči ciwiṭ, bγant a d-grint neγ ad qqiment deg umezruy a d-ğğent later-nsent i lebda. Nekni nesderγel iman-nne&amp;gamma,; nettγumu iṭij s uγerbal, nuğew-d aγilif d lehlak s ifassen-nneγ almi nruḥ nettu. D acu i d tirugza? Amek i nugi tikli ar zdat, neqbel tin γer deffir? Amek neqbel ṭṭlam, nugi tafat? Amek nugi talwit, nettqellib γef cwal? Amek i nesderγel iman-nneγ ? Tura iban-d ubrid n tlelli, abrid n talwit, nejrent-d abrid n umennuγ γer bennu. Ihi deg wass yecban 8 meγres ḍerrunt-d di tmurt n Leqbayel tmeγriwin swayes ttaran tajmilt i tmeṭṭut akken d-ḍerrunt di tmura n umaval merra. Timeγriwin-agi d tid i d-yettawin abeḥri n tlelli. Γef wanect-a yessefk fell-aneγ a d-nettheggi yal ṣṣenf n temliliyin ideg ara neεreḍ a nẓer neγ a negzi liḥala n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit akken a nḥareb fell-asent akken iwata.

 8 maγres d ass agraγlan n tmeṭṭut, anda i terẓa leqyud, anda tessers anezgum i d-tεebba ass-agi ilaq tugdut a d-taγ am tmes, ur yezmir ḥed a tt-yessens akken a d-yuγal wazal n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit γer wekan-is.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Lbaṭel yeḍran d tmeṭṭut! 

 Ayen tettru tmeṭṭut? Ayen iεegben tameṭṭut ? Anwa i tt-iεegben? Ayen s-yettwakkes wawal I tmeṭṭut ? Deg wacu i tettwaḥeggef tmeṭṭut teqbaylit ? Anwa i s-d-ixelqen uguren ? Ayen i s-yura lbaṭel di twenza ? Ayen? ayen ?…

 Ihi ulac amdan ur nessin tiririt γef yesteqsiyen yecban wigi, d ayen ibanen am tafat, d ayen ur yezmir a t-yeffer wemdan. Neẓra taεekkemt i tεebba tmeṭṭut dayen umi ur zmirent tuyat. tḥulef tmeṭṭut tameγbunt i wayen tt-iḥuzan, tuγal temwalaf iγeblan, tedεen s yal ugur almi tuyes talwit. Ayagi yekka-d seg ustehzi n udabu.

 Ma nga tamuγli-nneγ ar tmura yuẓen ar zdat, tid yefkan azal meqqren i tmeṭṭut, a tent naf quddrent-tent akken iwata di yal aḥric n tmetti deg umedya tameṭṭut ara yilin s tadist muḥal ad teğğen ad texdem ayen ẓẓayen fell-as, ur tessemḥiḥid ara ula d taluft, tella-d fell-as lemḥadra tameqrant. Acku tameṭṭut mi ara tili s tadist mačči d ayen isehlen, tamsalt tuεer aṭas fell-as. Maca ma nga tamuγli-nneγ ar tmeṭṭut taqbaylit a naf d akken ulac amgired d-yettilin fell-as mi ara tili s tadist neγ mačči s tadist, tezgga tenεettab, tezga tettεebbi, alamma d agur-is wis 9, ur s-gin ara ccan i waya.

 Mačči d yiwet i yuγen tameṭṭut, muḥal tesεa laεfu neγ tuksa lxiq aγbel yezga yeṭṭafar-itt ula d iḍ ideg staεfayen medden, nettat muḥal ad teqqen tiṭ-is, tettḥebbir i uzekka-nni d acu ara ččen warraw-is, tettawi tafat swudem, tanekra-ines zik werεad tafrara, ad tseww aγrum, lqahwa, ad tagem aman di tala, ad tefk lqerḍ i lmal, a sen –tenneḍ, ad tessuffeγ leγbar, ad tffeγ γer lexla akken ad tenγec tibḥirt, ad tefres lmelk-is, ad teglu s tγeddiwt swayes ara teg imensi, d yesγaren swayes ara sen-tecεel times i warraw-is, ad tessired taduṭ, ad tt-tesqerdec a tt-tellem a tt-ger aẓeṭṭa….atg. Lḥaṣun ṭṭuqtent fell-as. Ula d tameṭṭut yeγran ur ttzgilen ara, γur-s snat lexdayem, tid n berra, d tid n uxxam. Yerna anect-a laεtab yakk yeḍran yid-s, nettat muḥal tegr-d nehta neγ yul-itt wawal

 Cedda tura di twenza-s, muḥal tesεa tmeṭṭut taqbaylit izerfan akken ten-sεant tlawin nniḍen. Anect-a yakk d ayen yetthudun tamurt, ayen yettağğan timetti tettuγal γer deffir. Di tmura yettaẓen γer zdat, tid yefkan azal I tmeṭṭut neγ tid yumnen s izerfan n umdan s umata, mi ara d-ilal wegrud, d aqcic neγ d taqcict, ulac amgired, γur-sen d amdan a s-ferḥen. Ma yella γur-neγ ladγa di tmurt n Leqbayel mi ara d-ilal wegrud γur-sen, ma yella d aqcic ad tafeḍ tawacult tennecraḥ merra, ad twaliḍ lferḥ γef wudem-nsen, tilawin ad seγratent, irgazen ad ssuffγen iεbaren n lbarud, ad ttakken tiẓidanin, imezdaγ n taddart ad keččmen γur-sen a sen-srebḥen aqcic “ d amerbuḥ uqcic-nwen, a t-yeg Rebbi d aγezfan n laεmer, d win ara d-yesḍefren ayetma-s…” yettilid-yiwen umussu meqqren acku zik nḥafen deg yergazen, d netta i d cci n twacult, anda ara yernu uqcic ḥṣu axxam yeεmer, bab-is ur inegger ara, ara t-iwerten siwa mmi-s. Yerna a d-naf win ara yesεun aîas n yergazen deg uxxam-is iseεεu lhiba, taddart akk a tettqader, d ayen i ten-yettağğan ttaran bab n uxxam-nni neγ ḥed iεeggalen deg-sen d aqerru γef taddart. Ma yella d win ur nesεi ara irgazen dima yettawi tama n wadda, dγa tagi d yiwet lεadda ger leεwayed n tmurt n Leqbayel i irekḍen tameṭṭut almi tuγal ur tesεi acemma n wazal neγ anẓad n wezref. Ihi akken d-nenna di tazwara asmi ara d-ilal uqcic ttgen ula d imesi, tameγra, sbu&amp;epsilon,; dγa di liḥala am tagi a naf timennifrit-nni i d-yerban ttgen-as ccan, ttaken–as azal meqqren. Ma yella d taqcict i d-ilulen a twaliḍ yeγli-d leḥzen γef uxxam d wid ten-iqerben, akken kan ara d-tlal ttmagaren-tt s wudem n diri, s yir tamsiwla, tmmagaren-tt s leḥzen, almi tt-yetbaε ar temγer, imdanen ad keččmen γer uxxam anda i terna teqcict mačči s lferḥ, s leḥzen d timuγbent, as-qqaren i tmennifrit “ imi tmenεeḍ ḥala kem, ma tedder tenfaε ma ulac tissemḍelt tewsaε…», llan kra n yemdanen mi ara tili tmeṭṭut s tadist ad seḥmacen γer uqcic, asmi ara d-ilal, ma yella d taqcict, ttaran-tt i lweεd imeṭṭi, ula d timennifrit-nni ttγunzu-tt merra at uxxam, ttmuqulen-tt s yir tiṭ, a s-tiniḍ d nettat i tt-id-yefkan mačči d Rebbi. Dγa nek s yiman-iw steqsayeγ ayen i tettru tmeṭṭut imi ara d-ternu γur-s teqcict? Teḥṣa tmeṭṭut ula d nettat akken i s-teḍra, akken i ttrun fell-as acku ur tt-bγin ara, di dqiqa tamenzut ideg d-tḍal γer ddunit i tebda temḥeqranit fell-as akken i s-truḥ almi tuγ yid-s tannumi, ihi, twala daγen asmi d-terna γur-s teqcict amek i tt-cuḥnen. Ilaq tura d nettat ara d-yefken amedya i tid d-iteddun akken ad tettwakkes yir lεadda-yagi. Teẓra ayen iεeddan fell-as umazal tugi ad tekkes actal γef yiman-is, teẓra lḥif d miḥyaf ideg d-tekker, yessefk γef tmeṭṭut ad tili deg ubrid n ṣwab, mačči d nettat s yiman-is ara s-irennun zzit i tmes tin akken yeččan amur-is. Ur d-yewwi ara i tmeṭṭut akken ad tettmil γer tama n uqcic kan, ma d taqcict ad tt-teεzel, yessulef ad tsemsawi gar-asen, ad ten-tettmuqul s yiwet n tmuγli. 

 Akka nwala tameṭṭut ulac win ara igen fell-as laεnaya, yal tama tjebbed deg-s, tikkel-a ula d imawlan yella wanda ḍḍuren yelli-tsen, xelqen-as-d uguren d iεewwiqen, εeggben-tt si temẓi, kerhen ad slen i ṣṣut-is deg uxxam ulamma d nettat i yettεawanen yemma-s di yal taγawsa, tettrebbi ayetma-s, tbubb-iten, tessared-asen, tuḍen iγeblan-nsen, γas akken nettat ulac win yuḍnen aγbel-is, tezga d d akken d nettat i d taftilt I d-yettaken tafat. taεekkemt γef at uxxam ttrebbin s wurfan. d taleqqaqt telmed merra lecγal γas akken melmi i teεreḍ a d-teccekti a s-rnun aεekkaz. Ayen yelhan i warrac, nettat ad tessikid γas tender tettara s wul-is, awi-d kan a d-kkren wayetma-s. Imawlan ttḥiren melmi ara d-asen inexḍaben, a s-tiniḍ d taεdawt-nsen mačči d yelli-tsen, ar γur-sen taqcict d aγbel meqqren, am win yesεan lbumba daxel n uxxam, tettun iεeddan yekkes-d deg-s, a s-yessegri s uclax. Tuγal am umextaf, mi d-teskna ayen ibeεden fell-asen,a d-kksen ad ččen, ad γelten am nutni am wiyiḍ, nettat ad tuγal deg rrif.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ayen akk anect-a?  

 Tura ifuk ddel d lbaṭel γef tmeṭṭut, tfuk tufra, d lawan ad tidir tmeṭṭut di laman d talwit. Tiγri i d-yeffγen seg yimi n tmeṭṭut, tḥuza-yaγ merra. Γef waya, tameṭṭut taqbaylit kkes-d taγawsa ur tessin ara neγ lḥif ur tt-yennulen ara. Muḥal tḥemmel ad ttwaqnen ifassen-is neγ ad yestaεfu yixef-is. 

 Amek ur nseεεu tissas? Amek ur d-tettiḥnin tasa-nneγ γef tmeṭṭut?

 Ihi ass-a γas akken izerfan n tmeṭṭut twaṭfen ger tuγmas n yemcumen, γas akken ttwaεelqen deg ufus udabu. Maca iban-d yixef-is, a d-yaweḍ wass anda ara d-binen izerfan n tmeṭṭut s umata, acku amennuγ n tmeṭṭut yebna γef tidett, kra yebnan γef tidett yettefeγ γer tafat akken neqqar dey yenzi “ win ileḥḥun γef tidett yeṣṣawaḍ”. Ayen γef tennuγ tmeṭṭut umazal tettna&amp;gamma,; muḥal yezmer yiwen ad yenker ayen tt-yennulen, ayen γef tettewwet, ayen γef i tettwaḥbes. D awezγi, d ayen muḥal ad neqbel. Ihi tura aql-aγ γer yidis n tmeṭṭut, ulac azal meqqren ara yesεu umdan, d win i ileḥḥun γef tidett, yettbeggin-itt- Ihi γas llan wid iwalan tamsalt n tmeṭṭut tensa, lğerḥ werεad yeḥli, taluft mazal tleḥḥu ur tḥebbes ara di tikli. tameṭṭut tewwet akk s wayen tesεa deg-s i waken ṣṣut-is a s-d-isel yal amdan. tamsalt n tmeṭṭut am waman yeṭṭsen, mi ara d-sγersen ayen d-mlalen a tawin. Γas akken tufa-d iεewwiqen d wuguren, muḥal tekna neγ terreẓ deg wawal, muḥal tessetḥa s yiman-is neγ s waylay-s, dima yezdi lqed-is, γas akken tameṭṭut teẓra, twala lbeṭel yettεeddayen fell-as, d ayen ur iqebbel laεqel muḥal yefcel wafud-is, tettkemmil dima deg umennuγ. Tameṭṭut tettruẓ asalu ar iberdan n tafat, tessaram dima ad taweḍ id yal taswaεt mi ruḥen ad tneḍlen. Ccan ara yawi umdan d win yettḥraben γef yizerfan di teswaεt-agi ideg nella, nesseqdac yal ttawil akken tameṭṭut ad tidir di tlelli, lebγi-nneγ a t-naweḍ merra s umata. Cbaḥa n ugraw d tadukli, cbaḥa n tdukli d tamusni, tamusi yeṣṣawaḍen γer yeswi. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ddeqs n leqdicat i d-ittwheggan γef demma n waggur n remḍan di yal timnaḍin yemgaraden n tmurt n Lezzayer, am d timesbaniyin icudden γer yidles, addal, timetti, lumur n ddin d waṭasn-niḍen. Dγa tamnaḍt n Wizgan tella di ttiεad, imi tiddukla tadelsant Tiεwinin n taddart n At-Wizgan, thegga-d tazrigt tis 03 n temliliyin n umezgun i yebdan ass n 23 yunyu almi d amenzu n yulyu i d-iteddun, d leqdic ara yeddun γef teγzi n 09 n wussan. Leqdic-agi, yella-d s lemεawna n tesqamut n taddart n Wizgan, taγiwant n Wizgan, tinmahliwin n yidles akked yilmeẓyen d waddal n lwilaya n Tizi-Uzzu, aseqqamu aγerfan n ugarzu n Tizi-Uzzu akked d uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine. Ahil n leqdic d amesbaγur, anda yella usenεet n umezgun s yisental yemgaraden, cnawi, tamedyazt, cḍaḥ aγerfan d waṭas-nniḍen. Tadwilt n useggas-a, tennarna s waṭas u temgarad aṭas γef tin yezrin, imi nnig n 12 n trebuεa n umezgun ara d-yassen si 04 tγemmar n tmurt n Lzzayer ger-asent : lwilayat n tmurt am Tizi-Uzzu, Tubiret, Bgayet , Batna d Wehran. Akken yella umaynut di tezrigt n useggas-a, imi yal tarbeεt ad senεet taceqquft-is i tikkelt tamenzut s usentel amaynut. Gar trebuεa-agi n umezgun d isental yellan, tarbeεt Macahu (Taḍsa di twaγit), tarbeεt tafat n Imsuḥal (Ccḍaḥ aγerfan), tarbeεt lemri n Leqṣar (Agerruj yefren), Djurdjura n Saharidj (Sidi Hlal), tarbeεt n umezgun n Wad Amizur (Ğeḥḥa), tarbeεt n umezgun asirem n Lewres n Batna (Nekk akked Jack), tarbeεt n umezgun n Tewririn n At-Yiraten (Muḥend Ucaεban), tarbeεt n umezgun Asirem n Wehran (Tirga n Cibuḥ), tarbeεt n umezgun Ifeḥcac n Ğerğer (Selṭan). Akken ijerden deg wahil-nsen n useggas-a, asenεet n usaru ixedmen s usentel Timektiwin n Taddart, anda imγaren n taddart n Wizgan, ffkan-d tinigiyin-nsen d cfawat sεeddan. Iswi n temliliyin-agi, d aseqreb n umezgun γer tudrin n leqbayel d usebγes n yilmeẓyen akken ad kecmen s tehri annar-agi n umezgun i yellan d ababat n tẓuri i usnerni n yidles amaziγ. Akken tella ,daγen, d tagnit yelhan i twaculin ad farsent uḍan n remḍan ideg ara temlil tassa d way turew, d uẓeṭṭa n tegmat d tdukli gar yimdanen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ḥsen Maric d amedyaz, d aneɣmas, d anaẓur, d amaru ameqqran n tmedyazt tmaziɣt tatrart. D yiwen seg tigejda n yidles amaziɣ, swayen i d-yeffka i tutlayt n tyemmat “tamaziɣt», neɣ i tmedyazt n teqbaylit d yidles amaziɣ s umata. Iban-d aṭas ɣer wannar n tira deg useggas n 2005, ass-a ɣur-s amecwar ɣezzif s tmedyazt-is yezdigen mačči d kra. Ḥsen Maric ilul ass n 21deg agur n furar 1967, deg taddart n Tala n Tulmut i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Tizi Raced, deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Axeddim-is d aselmad n Tɣarant neɣ Tsengama (la physique) u d aselmad n lanfurmatik, yesɣer deg uɣerbaz alemmas (C E M) Miṭrak Ʃumar, deg tɣiwant n Tizi Raced. Deg uḥric n tẓuri, yeqdec deg waṭas yeḥricen yemgarden n lfen, xas ma yebda s tira n yisefra u mazal-t deg-s ar ass-a. Maca yurar yakan deg yisura s tmaziɣt amedya : asaru n « Wardiya n Ṭriz » d usaru « Ineẓra mazal ad nẓer » . Yebda tira n tmedyazt deg useggas n 1984, asmi yella yesԑa 17 n yiseggasen deg leԑmer-is, di tallit-nni yella d anelmad deg tesnawit n Larebԑa n At Yiraten « Ʃebderḥeman Illui ». Seg Yunyu 2005 ɣer ass-a yesazreg-d 13 n yidlisen n tmedyazt s 4 n tutlayin ; 6 seg-sen d ammuden n yisefra s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, amenzu yella-d usuffeɣ-is di tefsut n 2005, di tesdawit n  » l’Oregin State  » di tmurt n Marikan, iwumi yesma  » Iḍ Yukin « . Ma d wis sin d ammud daɣen n tmedyazt, yesma-as: »Taԑezzult-iw », yesazreg-it-id di Mayyu 2006. Ma d ammud-is wis kraḍ(03) « Tiderray » yesuffeɣ-it-id deg Yulyu 2007. Adlis wis ukuẓ (04) d ammud i d-yejmlen 03 n wammuden-nni yezrin deg yiwen udlis deg Yebrir 2009. Ma wis semmus (05)  » Tibernint d Ssellum » yella-d usizreg-is deg Yunyu n 2009. Ammud wis Seddis (06) « Tazlagt n Tikta » i d-yeffɣen di Yunyu 2012. Ma d 4 seg yidlisen-is yesuffeɣ-iten-id s tutlayt n Tefransist, amenzu « Les Nuit Volubiles « , id yellan d tasuqilt i udlis  » Iḍ Yukin « .Ma d wis sin « Confidences et mémoires », i d-yettussuqlen seg tmaziɣt i udlis « Taԑezzult-iw » .Ma wis tlata « Contusions », yella-d d asuqel i wammud n yisefra « Tiderray » .Ma d wis rebԑa « La Toupie et L’échelle », yella-d daɣen d asuqel i udlis  » Tibernint d Ssellum ». Ma s Teglizit yura snat tektabin yiwet isem-is « Volubble Nights » neɣ  » Iḍ Yukin  » s tmaziɣt ma tis snat yeffka-as azwel « Confidence and Memories » neɣ « Tazlagt n Tikta » s tmaziɣt, amaken diɣen yura yiwen n udlis s tutlayt n Taԑrabt. Ma deg tira-as yecud-d aṭas n yisental yecban : Timetti-nneɣ, Tamurt-nneɣ, Tayri, Tawnaḍt d ugama, yesneṭq-d allalen d leḥwayeğ nessemras, yettegg amjidel d imenɣi s wawal ger snat n tɣawsiwin, amaken daɣen yettaru ɣef tikta tifelsafiyin, d tnefsit (iman) n umdan, timsal n ddunit …atg . Deg Yebrir 2008 yeskels yiwen n uḍebsi (C D) n tmedyazt s uẓawan d lmusiqa, deg-s yecnna 25 n yisefra i yellan deg udlis-nni « Taԑezzult-iw », ger-asen asefru-nni swayes yettwasen aṭas « Sidi Valentin ». 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Adaoun Abdelghani. 

  
 Ferɛun illul di taddart n Tizi Hibel, deg useggas n 1913.Di tazwara, yella d aselmad deg  uɣerbaz amezwaru. iḥemmel tasekla. Yezga yettbeddil tiktiwin d imura imeqranen yecban Albert Camus d wemdakkel-is Emmanuel Robles d wiyaḍ nniḍen.

 Ijebbdit webrid n tsekla, yebda yettaru s tefransist. Tira-ines teṣfa am waman, tecbeḥ am wadfel, ẓidet am tament n tzizwit, aɣanib-ines d aḥerfi, d afessas, iserreḥ yerna yenecraḥ. Yura ungalen anida yesdukkel tilawt d usugen s tiḥerci. Yessen ad yeḥku, yettak azal ula i yifutas imectaḥ.Idlisen-is ttmeslayen am usaru yerra d lemri ɣef tmetti taqbaylit, jebden imeɣriyen am dkir.Yura ɣef  ṭrad, d amaru amezwaru id yenna-n tidet akken tella, akken teḍradeg Aɣmis n 1955-1962.  D amaru i yuklalen arraz n Nobel di tsekla maca irebraben  n L’O.A.S  nɣan Dda Lmulud ass amcum n 15 di Meɣres, ass aberkan deg umezruy n tsekla .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ḥemmar  Busaɛd 

  
 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Isufar </span>

 3 n yiftaten n uksum amelḥan(acedluḥ) 1 n yirew n lḥemmez 1 n yirew n yibawen 4 n tdeggar n zrudiya 4 n tdeggar n lleft 2 n tbaṭaṭatin 2 n tbeṣlin 1 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n lkemmun ½ n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n yifelfel 2 n tqenjawin n lmakla n zzit uzemmur 1 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n ṭumaṭic yeẓdan Lmelḥ, udi d berkukes

  Aheggi 

  Heggit berkukes am wakken i tettheggim seksu. Rret berkukes daxel n tsekksut, teslilem-t, syin rret-t daxel n tbaqit, ternum-as ciṭ n zzit, tanfem-as ad yeqqudder. Imi, tesewwem-t azal n 20’. Ad d-ifur tlata n tikkal. Yuɣ lḥal tettheggim aseqqi. Gezmet akk lxedra-nni. Rret aksum daxel ukasrun, ternum-as azal n litra n waman, rnut lebṣel, lḥemmez, zzit, tanfem-as ad yeww. Deg ttnaṣfa n tiwwin, ternum zrudiya akked yibawen, syin d lleft. Deg taggara, mi qrib ad yeww, terrem lbaṭaṭa d ṭumaṭic yeẓdan. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Ass n aram 05 deg yulyu2016, d ass n usmekti i deg tewwi tmurt timunent-is. Ulac win ur nessin ara d acu-t wass n 05 yulyu 1962, asmi tekfa ɣef tmurt n Lezzayer tugdi n ucengu aṛumi, lgirra ( ṭṭrad ) teǧǧa-d igujilen, tuǧǧal, tesenger ixxamen, ɣlin fella-s umelyun d nnefṣ n cuhada , ama d tilawin ama d irgazen, ama mecṭuḥit ama meqqrit. D Izzayriyen i iruḥen d asfel , i yefkan tirwiḥin-nsen akken ad tawi tmurt n Lezzayer tilelli. Amezruy, ad d-yeched d acu i texdem Fransa Deg yizzayriyen ; tamurt n Lezzayer tettwasteɛmer 132 yiseggasen. Zeg zzman n zik ar tura, sebɛa leǧnas iberraniyen i tt-id –ikecmen wa deffir wa , akken yecna uleḥlu «usan-d waɛraben deg lɛesker d ṣfuf , ma d ddin i aɣ-d-wwin iwumi lesyuf, zaɛma d imselmen s yisem leqran, bɣan ad aɣ-faken, i ixeddem laman !!» Yal acengu d acu n sebba swayes i d-yekcem cwiṭ cwiṭ, uɣen tamurt s yiɣil , wwin-d idles –nsen tutlayt-nsen , nuɣal nessusem nutni heddren , maca agdud azzayri mi ara d-yekker am meɣres, yiwwas ma yezhel meɣres ad d-yerr leblad d amellal , nnuɣen mgal acengu i d-ikecmen. Yal azzayri yexdem ayen yekkan nnig tezmert-is akken ad awḍen ɣer yiswi , asmi tesuffeɣ Lezzayen Fransa ass n 05 deg yulyu 1962 leɛlam n Lezzayer yettrefrif , tiɣratin , ulac amkan anida ur iɛelleq ara leɛlam n Lezzayer. Izzayriyen, ddukklen afus deg ufus , 54 yiseggasen-aya yeffeɣ uɛdaw, ɣas ma yella-d umennuɣ gar yizzayriyen maca tamurt n tmazɣa yiwet, akken i qqaren deg umedya ur ḥmileɣ gma , ur ḥemleɣ win ara t-yuwten. Ad yerḥem Rebbi imeɣrasen n tmurt n Lezzayer. 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 Yiwen n uqcic iǧǧa-t-id baba-s meẓẓi mi yemmut. Yemma-s tsebbel temẓi-s, fell-as, trebba-t-id s lḥif alammi meqqer. Mi yewweḍ d ilemẓi iḥemmel yiwet n teqcict d leɛmer-is maca nettat ur tecliɛ ara deg-s aṭas. Ɣer-s d ameddakel kan n temẓi. Mi ara tt-imlil yeqqar-s melmi ara d-awiɣ yemma ad kem-texḍeb. Nettat teqqar-as kan d lɣerḍ-k, rju cwiṭ. Alammi i tt-iḥres, yal tikkelt deg ara as-yini, nettat teqqar-as ma tḥemleḍ-iyi seg wul awi-iyi aya d waya. Akken yal tikkelt d acu ara as-tsuter. Netta ad as-tt-id-yawi, akken yebɣu ɣlay neɣ inqedwa cci-nni ad t-id-yaɣ neɣ ad t-id-idebbeṛ. Xas yemma-s ixla-tt. Ayen akk tesɛa d leqṛar n uxxam yella yewwi-as-t. Armi teɛya teqcict-nni deg-s tenna-as, aqcic-a issefk ad d-afeɣ amek ara gezmeɣ yid-s ma ulac wagi ad iyi-inṭeḍ am uselluf, wagi ad iyi-sderwec. Tikkelt-a i wakken ad iyi-iṛuḥ akin, ad iyi-xḍu, ad as-sutreɣ ayen i wumi ur yezmir ara ad iyi-d-yawi. Ass-nni mi t-temlal yid-s, taqsiṭ yiwet, am zik, aqcic iqqar-as kan melmi ara d-awiɣ yemma. Tenna-as teqcict : 

 -Ma dɣa s tidet-ik tḥemleḍ-iyi am tfekkert n wul-ik, ugar n yemma-k, ad ak-in-sutreɣ i tikkelt taneggarut yiwet n lḥaǧa ma tewwiḍ-tt-id a rbaḥ a tafat ma ur iyi-tt-id-tewwiḍ ara fiḥel awal. Aqcic allen-is ceɛlent am tmes, inna-as :

 – Cṛeḍ kan a taɛzizt aɣbel deg-i, illa wasmi qqimeɣ ur am-d-wwiɣ ara ayen d-tcerḍeḍ! 

 -Ihi nekkini tura, tikkelt-a taneggarut i bɣiɣ d tasa n yemma-k, ad iyi-tt-id-tawiḍ ad tt-skenfeɣ, ad tt-ččeɣ. Aqcic isusem, iruḥ. Taqcict tezmumeg tenwa d ayen aqcic ad tt-ihenni i lebda. Azekka-nni kan, aqcic izla yemma-s, ikkes-as-d tasa-nni-ines, yewwi-tt-id deg uqelmun-is d tazla ɣer teqcict. Tazla-nni d-ittazal iɣli igrareb. Tasa-nni tenṭew-d seg uqelmun n uqcic, tettegririb zdat-s. Alammi ḥebsen deg ugrireb, tenṭeq-d tasa-nni n yemma-s ɣer-s, tenna-as : -Ulac d acu i ak-yuɣen a mmi !

 Akka i d tasa n tyemmat, akken tebɣu tili teswaɛt, tayemmat tezga tetteqliliḥ, tettergigi tasa-s ɣef tarwa-s

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Assegas amaynut n yimaziɣen ɣef tewwura. Deg umenzu n yennayer ad ibedd yal amaziɣ ɣef timadit-is akken ad yemekti anwi i t-illan, ansi i d-yekka, sani i iteddu, amek i d-teḍra d s teqbaylit-is . Akken ad yefti ugdud, ad iqazem tixidas n zzman ilaq-as ijga ɣef acu ara isenned. Ilaq-as tiliwa ansi ara d yeggem aman yetteksen fad i yiman. Ilaq-as akufi anda ara d yeddem lqut ara yefkken afud i “Nekk” ines yesmirjiḥen gar yir lemwaji : tid ara t-id yesufɣen ɣer rrif ( lisser / lemnaɛ) neɣ tid ara t-yezuɣren ɣer yimmi n nnger. Ayen yettqqawiten iman n umdan, ayen i tekksen fad ɣef ṛṛuḥ , ayen yettcuddun “ Nekk” ɣer yiman-is d idles. Agdud melba idles am umdan melba iles id nnan imezwura. Ɣef aya i neɛreḍ ad nsuk tamuɣli ɣef yidles aqbayli seg asmi tewwi timunent tmurt ɣer ass-a n wussan.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Liḥala n yidles aqbayli deg issgasen n 60: 

 I wakken ad illal kra, ilaq ad yilli kra. Di tagara n isaggasen n ssettin( 60) tasekla taqbaylit tbedd ɣef yiwet n tqejirt : “tamedyazt”. Amur ameqran n wayen iccuden ɣer timsal n tidmi id yettnulfun s teqbaylit di lawan-nni yella s udem n isefra akked tezlatin. Wid is yefkan azal i unect-a, ɛarḍen ad leqmen isufar itararen i tmedyazt-agi d Slimane Azem Akked Cherif Kheddam, wama ayen nniḍen yella kan d isefra n tallit id tezzin ɣef isental ur d nettawi kra i tusna n umdan am tayri temeɛlalt , leɣrba, d kra n wugguren iccuden ɣer liḥala n twacculin di tallit-nni am zwaj, berru, iḥeckulen….

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tazwara n isaggasen n 70 

 Kra –nni id yellan , i-ibeddelen tagnit ɣef tasekla taqbaylit , d tizlit n Idir “ baba inuba”. Aya yella-d di ttnaṣfa n isgassen n sebɛin( 70). Timlilit yellan gar umedyaz Ben Mohamed akked uccenay Idir tbedel udem mačči kan i tizlit taqbaylit terna ula i lqaleb n tmedyazt taqbaylit. Ssin inaẓuren-agi segrewlen liḥala n yidles aqbayli s –umata. Seg assen-nni uɣalen imedyazen n teqbaylit ttemɛanaden anwa ara d yawwin ugar n tatrart ɣer tira –ines. Wakali, isental ɣef I t-tezzi tmedyaz-agi beddlen. Lqaleb n tira yembeddel, lhejna n twefɣa nnig uglugel treṣṣa iman-is di tesga n usnulfu s teqbaylit. Ahat Lounis Ait Menguellet d netta i-ineǧren asalu ɣer tanfalit deg tira s isefra-ines mechuren am “igenni-m trekeb-it tewla», “ nnuɣeɣ yid-k ay yul-iw»,” teseḍlemeḍ-iyi»,” acuɣer», “ixef yettrun», “anida teǧǧam mmi” …Yuɣ lḥal widen yecfan I tallit-nni ttmektayen-d timzizlit yellan gar Lounis Ait Menguellet d Idir Ait Meslayen ɣer usnulfu n tezlatin yesduqusen lexwaṭer.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ɣer leqruba n Mouloud Mammeri 

 Kra agi id yellan, i-yefkan udem nniḍen I temedyazt taqbaylit ur d yekki ara s -ugacur imi inaẓuren-agi( id yewwin abeḥri amaynut I yidles aqabyli) i merra llan ɣer leqruba n Mouloud Mammeri. Amezruy yura d akken d aragaz-agi is id ijaben aɛiwed n tllalit i yidles-nneɣ yellan ɣef yiri n ttmattent. Tajerrumt akked illugan n tira id yexdem Mouloud Mammeri lldint tiwwura ɣer tira taɣezfent. Aya yewwid tawefɣa n ugalen imenza s teqbaylit s demma n Said Sadi yuran ungal “askuti», Rachid Alich yuran ssin ungalen “ asfel” , “ fafa”. Si lǧera n ssin imyura-agi yerna-d Amar Mezdad yuran ungla “ yiḍ d wass”. S wakka I yenǧer usalu I teskla taqabylit s yal udmawen-is ama d tamedyazt, ama d tullisin, ama d ungalan, ama d amzgun. Ayen akken yecban, lmuḥal ziɣ yuɣal ɣef yimmi n leqlam. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Deg isaggasen n 80 

 Ɣlin ifergan zdat n tidmi, zdat n tebɣest , zdat n tismin ɣef yidles aqbayli.
