 Deg uḥric-agi wis sin, ad nwali tazrewt n wayen yessefra akked kra n yimedyaten n useddes n yifyar

 Tazrewt n tmedyazt-is. Aṭas n talɣiwin n tmedyazt, d waṭas n tewsatin n tmeɣruyin i swayes i isefra ula d tunṭiqin kif kif. Yal asefru yemgarad ɣef gma-s ama deg talɣa ama deg tmeɣrut neɣ deg umḍan n tuntiqin, ama deg umḍan n yifyar. Tuget n yisefra-s bu ssettayen n yifyar.

  Asuddes n talɣa:  Deg talɣa, isefra cwiṭ deg lqaleb-nni swayes yettwassen Si Muḥen U Mḥend ladɣa deg tmeɣrut ( a .a. b ). Acu kan imi Yusef U Qasi i t-id-yezwaren ɣer ddunit ɣer tmedyazt, ihi ilaq ad d-nini belli d Si Muḥed u Mḥend i yessfran s lqaleb-nni (a. a. b) s wayes isefra qbel Yusef U Qasi. Amsadaɣ di ṣṣda : Tettili tewsit-agi deg tmeɣrut i d-yettwalsen. Mi ara yesεu kan usefru snat n tmeɣrutin, d allus-nni-nsent i d-yettakken ṣṣda-ines d anagraw, yettqqen gar yifyar, yettara-t asefru yeddukkel. Ad d-nefk amedya ɣef tewsit-agi :

  Lukan deg Ubizar meqqar 

  Ssyadi leḥrar 

  Si zik-nsen d imnayen 

  Imi si Hendu leqrar 

  Ma ɣeḍleɣ-k, d lεar 

  Ma tɣeḍleḍ-iyi, d εrayen 

  Tamawt 1  : Asefru-agi bu ssetta n yifiren snat d tmeɣrutin i ɣef yebna usefru-agi « ar, en ».

  Tamawt 2  : Asefru-agi yekka-d seg tedyant-nni n yiwen urgaz n Si Hendu ; i d-yemllalen Yusef u Qasi, yenna-as-d yya ad nmεebbar a dda Yusef, dɣa yerra-as-d s usefru-agi.

  Amsadeɣ di tkatit : Yettili-d mi ara d-yettuɣal yiwen wakat (métre) deg usefru neɣ deg tseddart.

  Amedya  : Yiwen d bu uzegga nεeql-it → Yiw ned bu zeg zan εeq lit (7)

 Seg yiɣzer ay d-ixutal → Seg gez zer ay di xu tel (7)

 Ma yella d uḥdiq neffer-it → Ma yel la duḥ diq neff rit (7)

 Abrid wayeḍ ar d-iqatel → Ad rid way ḍar di qa tel (7)

 Ma yella d ungif nemmel-it → Ma yel la dun gif nemm lit (7)

 Ad fell-as ṣewwbeɣ lmaqel → Ad fell as ṣeww ɣel ma qel (7)

  Tamawt 1 :  Asefru-agi d bu 6 n yifyar, d bu 42 n tunṭṭiqin (07) i yal afyir.

  Tamawt 2 :  Ifyar n usefru-agi kif kif-iten deg wakat, bnan akk ɣef (07) n tunṭṭiqin, tlata deg-s keffun n tmeɣrut ( it ), tlata-nniḍen s tme ɣrut ( el )

 Amata: Tuget n yisefra n Yusef U Qasi, talɣa-nsen d isefra i bu settayen (6) n yifyar, bḍan ɣef nat n taggayin 6 = (3+3) neɣ 6 = (2+2+2). Maca llan wiyaḍ εeddan 6 n wafiren i sεan.

  Tameɣrut: 

 – Allus n teɣri d tergalt: D aεiwed n yiwet n teɣri d tergalt ɣer taggara n yal afir. Wigi d ṣṣenf n tmeɣrut deg tmedyazt taqbaylit, yessmers-it aṭas Yusef u Qasi.

  Amedya 

  A lexbar i d-yennulfan 

  Aεudu billeh ya laṭif 

  Tarwa n leğwad nnuɣen 

  Atmaten tebḍiḍ a nnif 

  Am zzebra gar yifḍisen 

  Tufeg ttnefɣa di ttnaṣif 

 -Allus n yiwet n tmeɣrut (targalt neɣ tiɣri) : Ifyar akk n usefru ad kfun s yiwet n tergalt neɣ n teɣri, ulamma isseqdec tawsit-agi maca mačči s waṭas.

  Amedya:   Muḥend n uzwaw aḥruṛ 

  Umliḥ n bab-s Aεmeṛ 

  Ur ak-issugut lehḍuṛ 

  Deg wawal-is i iferru ccweṛ 

  Am tnina di zzerzuṛ 

  Akken i ixeddem neɣ kteṛ 

  Amata:  Tuget n yisefra-s, bnan ɣef kraḍ n tewsatin n tmeɣrut, Md: (a.b / a. b / a. b) am tuget n yisefra n Ccix Muḥend U Lḥusin, neɣ (a. a. b / a. a. b) am Si Muḥend u Mḥend, neɣ (a. a. a / a. a. a). Llan kra-nniḍen deg yiwen usefru neɣ deg yiwet n tseddart tettbeddil tmeɣrut.

  Tiseddarin d yifyar: 

 Taseddart di tmedyazt teqbaylit, s umata tebna ɣef sin neɣ tlata n yifyar. Tamedyazt n Yusef u Qasi, tella deg-s tseddart yesεan sin neɣ kraḍ n yifyar, tella tin yesεan ugar. Yal asefru yesεa amḍan n tseddarin weḥd-s, llan wid yesεan snat, llan wid yesεan tlata, llan wiyaḍ ttawḍen alamma d 12 n tseddarin deg yiwen n usefru. 

 Amedya: Asefru “Taqsit tis kraḍ” seg udlis Mulud Mεemmeri, isefra n Leqbayel iqburen, isebtar:120-124. 

  Tiɣbula

 • Mouloud Mammeri, « Poèmes kabyles anciens » (textes berbères et français). Paris, La Découverte, 2001.

 • Camille Lacoste-Dujardin, article « Youcef Ou Kaci » du Dictionnaire de la culture berbère en Kabylie, La Découverte, Paris, 2005.

 • Mohamed Ghobrini, « Le Cavalier Poète », éd. El-Amel, 2001.

 • Muḥend Akli Salḥi, « Asegzawal ameẓẓyan n tsekla »éd. L’odyssée, 2012.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ssawḍen yiɣalen n laman n ladayra n Ouaguenoun ddurt iɛeddan, ad ḥebsen yiwet n terbaɛt i xeddmen amrig n tmes. Tarbaɛt-agi ideg llan 4 n yimdanen d irgazen i 4 yid-sen, laɛmer-nsen gar 27 alamma 51 n yiseggasen. Usan-d deg lwilaya n Tébessa akked Khenchla. Kraḍ deg-sen, ṭṭfen-ten deg ubrid yettawin ɣer tɣiwant n Boughni, ma d wis rebɛa yella-d useḥbes-is deg temdint n Khenchla. Alaḥsab n wulɣu n yiɣalen n laman, ufan ɣer terbaɛt-agi timselleḥt azal n 8 tneggeḥlin n ṣṣyada. Tura akka, ha-ten-an gar yifassen n yimsulṭa n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, la ten-steqsayen ɣef ssebba i ten-yeǧǧan ad xedmen leslah n tmes, d usenzi-ines mebla ttesriḥ n ddula.

  A. A. 

  
 T indaw (conjonctivite) , d tamsalmit neɣ d azzug yettḥazen timelli (conjonctive) yettḥaraben ɣef wallen n umdan. D aṭṭan yeṭṭuqten ama ɣer win meẓẓiyen neɣ ɣer win meqqṛen. Akken ibɣu ṭṭuqtent ccirat-is, ur yettḥaz ara iẓri. D acu kan imi ineṭṭeḍ seg umdan ɣer wayeḍ, isefk ɣef yal yiwen i t-yesɛan ad yerzu s amsujji ilaqen akken ad idawi iman-is si tama, ad isseḥbiber ɣef wiyaḍ si tama nniḍen. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> D acu n ccirat yesɛa waṭṭan-a ? 

 Sumata, aṭṭan-a yettban-d s tezweɣ d uɣẓaẓ yettḥazen yiwet n tiṭ syin snat n wallen, d tirtaw id-itekken si takawt akked taɣart n waman iwṛaɣen d warseḍ deg yiḍ, daya ara imedlen allen tasebḥit mi ara d-yaki umdan seg yiḍes. Akken diɣ tettban-d s imeṭṭawen. Ineggura-ya čeṭṭinen tamuɣli labeɛda ma iḥuss umdan amzun yella yijdi deg wallen-is neɣ ahat tiṭ-is ad tcerreg si tegnit ɣer tayeḍ mi ara tt-yessembiwel. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Acu-tent sebbat n tindaw? 

 Tezmer ad tili sebba d abirus (virus) neɣ d tabaktirit (bactérie): ttḥazen ama yiwet n tiṭ ama snat n wallen. Abirus yettili d sebba n usiḥḥi yecban aman iwṛaɣen seg tiṭ, ma d tabaktirit teslalay-d arseḍ. Tindaw-a zemrent ad mlilent akked d ddeqs n lehlakat yecban aṭṭan n ubeḥri, aṭṭan n turin neɣ aqraḥ n tyersi. ṣṣenf-a ineṭṭeḍ aṭas gar medden, labaɛda win n tbaktirit ɣer yimeẓyanen. Sebba n tindaw tezmer ad tili diɣ d aḥerbal ( allergie) yettḥazen snat n wallen umbeɛd amlili n umdan akked tɣawsa ukkud yesɛa aḥerbal. Tindaw-a d sebba n uɣẓaẓ d wazzug n wallen ameqqran yettḥazen allen. Tineggura-ya ad neggint d imeṭṭawen war aḥbas. Llant diɣ kra n sebbat nniḍen yecban lewsex (aqeclaw) neɣ kra n ddwa iweɛren mi ara d-iṛuc tiṭ.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Milmi ilaq ad iruḥ umdan s amsujji ? 

 Isefk ɣef yal yiwen yesɛan tindaw ad yerzu s amsujji melba leɛḍil mkul mi ara iwali ccirat n tindaw labeɛda imi tneṭṭeḍ seg tiṭ ɣer tayeḍ, seg umdan ɣer wayeḍ ɣef teɣzi n snat n leddwaṛ si beddu n ccirat-nsent. Isefk diɣ ɣef win yettlusun tiɛeqqacin n wallen ( les lentilles de contact) ad tent-yekkes mkul mi ara t-id-yebdu waṭṭan-a akken ur itelli ara tawwurt i temsalmit iweɛṛen n wallen-is. Ilaq amdan ad iẓer dakken llan ddeqs n waṭṭanen bexlaf tindaw, zemren ad d-banen s tezweɣ n wallen, aqraḥ-nsent, anɣas n yiẓri, d ccirat ilaqen ad awint amdan s lɛeǧlan s amsujji n wallen akken ad inadi ɣef sebba .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima Dali  

  
 Ddurt iɛeddan, yerza lwali n Tizi-uzzu ɣer wasun n uẓeffun anda yessefqed isenfaṛen i yettusbedden di tɣiwanin n wassun. Yebda tirza-s si tɣiwant n Tefrit n At Lḥaǧ , anda ibedd ɣer usenfaṛ n lebni n uɣerbaz alemmas B5 deg ulmus n tɣiwant anda lecɣal deg-s sɛan aṭṭas n laɛḍil, d ayen i yerran lwali, ad yefk iwellihen i yemḍebbṛen n tɣiwant d wid teɛna temsalt, i wakken ad ɣiwlen deg uheggi n uɣerbaz –agi i unukcum aɣurbiz i d-itteddun. Am wakken, diɣen, i yerza ɣer temɛemmeṛt n Tefrit n At Lḥaǧ anda yemmeslay d wid isedduyen aselmed deg-s. Tinna, wwin-d awal ɣef uselmed n ddin n lejdud akken ur d-ttafen ara abrid wid i d-yettawin tiktiwin n lbaṛṛani ur nelli ara d ayla n tmurt . Ayen i d-yejjebden lwelha n lwali di tamɛemmert–agi, d allalen i sxedem iserdasen (lɛeskeṛ) imaziɣen di tṛadat-nsen am yimrigen (leslaḥ) d wayen i yettḥaraben fell-asen . Si tɣiwant n Tefrit n At Lḥaǧ , udren-d ɣer tɣiwant n Uẓeffun. Di tazwara, ibedd ɣer yisenfaṛen n yiɣerbazen imaynuten i yessefk ad ldin deg tazwara n cutember i d-iteddun, aseggas aɣurbiz 2017/ 2018, aɣerbaz amenzu , aɣerbaz alemmas B7 akked tesnawit. Ibeggen-d yimḍebber amezwaru n lwilaya lɣiḍ-is, imi axeddim deg iɣerbazen –agi ur yeddi ara akken i iwata : sɛan aṭṭas n laɛḍil, ama di lebni neɣ deg uheggi n yibṛaḥen d yiberdan i yettawin ɣur-sen, ladɣa imi i yezṛa iɣerbazen i yetteddun tura anda ṭuqten yinelmaden. Amedya, aɣerbaz amenzu Saɛdu Ɛli deg wayeg lemden igerdan d tgerdatin. Akka tura isegrew ugar n 900 n yinelmaden . D ayen i yerran lwali, ad iwekked ɣef uɣiwel akken ad ttuheggin i unekcum aɣurbiz i d-iteddun . Syin , iruḥ ɣer teɣremt n 353 n tmezduɣin i ifuken s lebni di 2014, ar ass-a, ur ttufarqent ara. Xas akken azal n 218 n yixxamen di teɣremt-agi, banen-d yimawlan-nsent di maɣres 2015, maca tisura ur sent-ttufkent ara ar tura. Ssebba n waya, d trisit, aman d lgaz ur ttusekcman ara. Rnu ugur n yiberdan d wayen iteddun . D ayen i yerran imḍebber amezwaru n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu ad yessali ṣṣut-is ɣef wid i yellan d sebba n ustehzi-agi, imi asirem n yal tawacult tazzayrit d akken ad tt-id-tṣiḥ tmezduɣt. Syin, yewwi lwali abrid ɣer yiwen n yiɣzeṛ i yellan di tlemmast n temdint n Uẓeffun, imi lecɣɣal n uqaɛɛed n yiɣzer–agi s leswaṛ n ubiṭun, mazal ur fukken ara, tin ɣer-s d abrid ara yeddun s teɣzi n yiɣzer-agi akken ad tifsus tikli deg ubrid aqdim, d ayen i t-yerran ad iṣaḥres ɣef wid ibedden ɣer usenfar-agi. Deg lport n uẓeffun anda i yemlal d inegmaren d wid t- isedduyen, yesla i yiɣeblan i ten –yerzan , am wakken i ibedd di luzin n teflukin SAKOMAS. Seg tɣiwant n Uẓeffun, yewwi abrid ɣer tɣiwant n At Cafaɛ , dinna, ibedd ɣer uɣerbaz alemmas amaynut ara yeldin tiwwura-s deg useggas aɣurbiz i d-iiteddun, yefṛaḥ imi yufa lecɣal deg-s tteddun akken ilaq . Syin yerza ɣer teftist (plage) iwumi qqaren ( Petit paradis), ula dinna, ibeggen-d lɣiḍ-is seg wayen iwala, am yiḍumman i yettuḍegren deg-s. Syin ,yetti-d ɣer teftist n Sidi Xlifa , imi deg-s ittuhegga-d yiwen n usenfar n tmarrit d tuksa n lxiq . Seg tɣiwant n At Cafaɛ , d abrid ɣer tɣiwant n Aɣrib anda i ibedd ɣer yiwen n usenfaṛ n lebni n lluzin n lajuṛ deg umkan iwumi qqaren Agni Ucarqi , anda lecɣal bdan deg-s , yerna d asenfar ara yefken axeddim i waṭas n yilmeẓyen d telmezyin n temnaḍt–agi, d asenfaṛ ara d-yeglun s lfayda i yimezdaɣ . Am wakken i ibedd ɣer teɣremt n 500 n tmezduɣin AADL d teɣremt 340 n tmezduɣin i lekra. D taɣiwant i yesferḥen lwali n Tizi Uzzu di taggara n tirza-s

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kader Belaid  

<div> 
  
 At tuddar d iɛazamen, ɛebban taluft seg ul kren i unadi ɣef win umu ur yezmir ad yesukkes yiwen. Nudan, sɣerblen armi ɣer taggara ufan win bɣan: 

 «Tuddar nudant-seg ul

 Ufant arzgaz lkayes»

 Berḥen s lexṣayel-is( Ɣer tidet i yettmuqul/ di lḥeq mačči ad yesenqes), amer ad yilli lufaq fell-as. Maca acu ara yexdem bab n lḥeq , bab n tidet zdat dɣel yettayzagen di tasilt n tismin gar taddart-a d ttaddart-ina ? I tikelt nniḍen yebṭel wafran imi taddart teggul s jmaɛliman ur d yeḍri wayen-nni :

 «Tekker taddart teggul

 Argaz-agi ad yettwakkes !»

 Qarren leɛtab ur yettuneḥsab. Imi akka, yesbab ugraw taluft i taddart amer netta-t a tt-id tefru, ad taf argaz ara yeqbel yal yiwen akken ad isewaq ɣef lqum. Taddart am ṛṛebi, yella deg awal ḥedd ur tt-ittɛaṣṣi, ḥedd ur yettruz leɛnaya-s. Kran at taddart ḥetcen, weznen, ktalen, qassen dlan ɣef win i-izemren ad iqazem tilufa : 

 «Win id sbedden yufaf

 Izmer i mkul tilufa»

 Maca asmi id yewwed wass n tidet, d adrum id yekkren s wurfan, isuɣ ibereḥ i wid yebɣan asen-slan : aragaz-nni ur d awezɣi ad yeḥkem adrum yis yugi ad yesteɛraf.

 «Yekker udrum s zɛaf

 Yenna-d ur ten-qbil-ara» 

 Simmal tettcuddu tkares. Simmal tettiwɛiṣ tamselt. Maca nekni si leqbayel si zzman nessen i nmara tiklmi armi id as-nkenu i tmara. Adrum yugi ? Wi cqa ma yugi , ad yekker ihi netta (drum) aɣ-id yaff argaz ɣef ara nemjamel irkeli : . 

 «Yekker udrum yemjamal

 Yebda ameyyez di lɣaci

 Yextar bab n wuzal

 Ttqadaren medden irekkeli» 

 Deg ugraw yal wa yegred nehta. Yal yiwen yenwa dayen tefra. Tura d tidet tamurt tufa-d bab-is . Lemeɛni am yal tikelt iɣalid unẓad ɣer tarbut n lɛaqal :

 «Yekred gma-s ɣer cwal

 Amek tenwiḍ tifet-iyi ?»

 Terqed akken ilaq . Teberber armi tewweḍ ɣef lmuḥal. Widen yellan d atmaten s ddew tit i yuɣalen ttemyaxẓaren. «tura ur d yeqqim lefhem/ tṣub s anda ur d tettali». Sudden yiberden n ṣwab, lmeɛqul ihujer tajmayɛit. Terrez leɛnaya n tmurt, terna tin leɛrac, tegla s tin tuddart, temsex tin n taddart, yekfa lberhan n wadrum, teqras tamrart n tegmat. Amek ara tbedd ɣef iḍaren tamurt ur nesɛi-ara aqaru ? Anwi i-ilaqen a tt-yeḥkem ? Zzin nḍen baygar-asen( imnejmuyaɛ-nni) . Sḥasben, meyzen , cexxen … cexxen armi id ufan ṛṛayɣef acu i ttaqsen si tazwara : tamurt nekni ur as nezmir ara a tt-nner kan gar affus n ubarani :

 «Anwa i-ilaq ad yeḥkem

 Ma ur d i-tqablem nekkini 

 Anwa i-ilaq ad yeḥkem

 Ur ken-qabel kečč-nni

 Teẓram amek ara nexdem…..

 A sen-siwel i ubarani»

 Deɛwessu mačči yiwen udem i tesɛa. Ayen id yecna deg usefru agi Lounis Ait Menguellet d tadyant yugin a tekfu fell-as wagdud aqbayli( amaziɣ s umata). Aya yella deg-sen seg asmi tebda txelqit ɣer ass-a. Yal mi ara t-qareb tadukli ɣer ɣer-sen, ad yekk kra ara yerẓen lufaq nsen. Ahat tibuxest (leɣḍer n Bbuxus yenɣan Yugurten) tefka aẓar di cetla armi neguma ad nemǧazi ɣef yiwen wawal, ɣef yiwen ṛṛay , ɣef yiwet n tmuɣli, ɣef yiwen yismi. Ahat d tibuxest-nni iɣ-zedɣen ɣer yiḍ-a iɣ yeǧǧan wa ijebedd wayeḍ ikaref. Ahat d netta-t (tibbuxest) iq yeqnen ɣef rebeg n facal akked uglugel imi ala ɣer beṭṭu akked icerigen wuɣur nettemḥezwir. Ahat d tibbuxest newret ɣef imezwura nneɣ iɣ yeṣawḍen neguma ad newet ugerz akken ad tefllali timadit-nneɣ. Teḍra-tt yid-nneɣ am win yemɣunzan deg «Nekk» ines . Mi ara yemuqel ɣer lemri ɣef wayed( ayen ur yelli) i-yettqallib xas ulama akken is yenna umedyaz( Lounis) : «laṣel-ik izegel-ik/ win tebɣiḍ yugi-k/ mmel-iyi-d anwi ik illan ?». D tagi id taqṣit-ik yugin a tefru Ay aqbayli yettaǧǧen gma-s yeɣli,a y aqbayli irefden abarani….»

<p style="text-align: right;">Ifuk Ait Slimane Hamid

  
  A winnat, 

  Beṛka-k asnulfu 

  Aẓaṛ irekku 

  Eg leqniɛa deg (w)ayen yellan 

  Akka s-txedmeḍ ur iḥellu 

  D aṭṭan i as-d-irennu 

  Ad t-tenɣeḍ weqbel lawan. 

  Ih, ih, 

  Imi tesɛiḍ nniya i k-id-luɛaɣ 

  Ahat wissen ad tḥesseḍ 

  Ẓṛiɣ tenɛettabeḍ 

  Meqqar xdem ayen yelhan 

  Wexxeṛ-as i wayen yerkan 

  Tamettant ur d-tettak tudert. 

  Ih, ih, 

  Tettḥibbiḍ ad tessizdgeḍ 

  Tleqqmeḍ iẓuṛan n tidet 

  Akken ad tessufɣeḍ ixulaf yeṣfan 

  Meɛna tettuḍ ur d-terriḍ s liqin 

  Aẓaṛ yeqquṛen 

  ul(a) iwumi-yas ttelqim 

  D ayen kan yemmut 

  Ilul-d umaynut 

  Ay akken yebɣu yili 

  D amerḍil neɣ ur yeṣfi 

  Meɛna mazal-it yedder. 

  Ma d ṭlaba i tugadeḍ 

  Ulac wi k-yettabaɛen 

  Ttemyafen akk madden 

  Ma tɣunzaḍ lxaluṭa 

  Ṛuḥ sawem asɣun ireqmen 

  Taɣawsa yeččuṛen d lelwan 

  D nettat i icebḥen 

  D nettat i yeɣlayen. 

  Nekk nniɣ-ak yecbeḥ 

  S yes ɣas berreḥ 

  Akken wid-ik ad ak-d-slen. 

  Wama akka telliḍ akka 

  Aten-id zzin-ak-d s weɛrur 

  Wehmeɣ ayɣer ur asen-tfaqeḍ 

  Neɣ akken i tufiḍ iman-ik ?! 

  Tḥekreḍ fell-asen ayla-nsen 

  Keččini yessizdigen. 

  Ma yella akka i tgiḍ 

  Atan ur teṣfiḍ ara 

  Uɣal-d meqqaṛ tura ɣer ubrid n ṣṣwab 

  Imi nniya-k tugar kulci. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mokrane Chikhi 

  
 Ass-nni n ahad 24 seg waggur n maggu 2017, ɣef 8h00 n ssbaḥ i bdan yinelmaden akayad-nsen n taggara n uswir amenzu 5e. Membeɛd mi yetturaǧu ad t-sɛeddin wazal n 16305 n yinelmaden, gar-asen 8495 d arrac d 7810 d tullas, sɛeddan-t deg 371 n wulmisen n yikayaden. Ihi iban-d belli llan 45 n yinelmaden zeglen akayad-agi-nsen, ugten tmental, s lqidar n 0,25 %, s wakka 16260 n yinelmaden i ikecmen tizeɣwa n useɛeddi deg wakal n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Lḥasun iwekked-aɣ-d wannect-agi Mass M. Tacabount, d win istkelfen s yisallen d teywelt deg tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ass-nni n lexmis tasebḥit n wass. Twekked-d si tama-s Massa Benghebrit, taneɣlaft n usegmi belli akayad-agi amezwaru, iɛedda deg tegnatin igerrzen d ayen yessefraḥen. Niqal ad yili ukayad-agi i 28 deg waggur n maggu, tuɣal tẓuẓ-it-id s 4 n wussan yuɣal-d ar 24 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Imi twala belli d remḍan dɣa tẓuẓ-it-id, ama ɣef yigerdan neɣ ɣef yiselmaden. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, akayad-agi n taggara n uswir amenzu 5e n useggas aɣurbiz 2016 / 2017, sεeddan-t yinelmaden deg yiɣerbazen-nsen anida qqaren, mebla ma rzan ɣer yiɣerbazen-nniḍen, am wakken xeddmen deg useggas yezrin. Am wakken diɣ ara d-nesmekti belli, akayad-agi yella-d kan ɣef teɣzi n yiwen kan n wass, sɛeddan deg-s kraḍ n yikayaden, win n taɛrabt, win n tefransist akked win n tusnakt. Ma d akayad n taggara n uswir n ulmud alemmas BEM ara d-yilin gar 04 ar 06 seg waggur yunyu, ad t-sɛeddin wazal n 13799 n yinelmaden, gar-asen 6550 d arrac akked 7239 d tullas, ad xedmen ikayaden-agi deg 50 n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen. Ma d win n taggara n uswir n tsenawit neɣ ayen iwumi qqaren BAC ara d-yilin gar 11 ar 15 deg waggur n yunyu, yetturaǧu ad t-sɛeddin wazal n 20955 n yisnawiyen, gar-asen 8754 d arrac ma d 12201 d tullas. Ad xedmen akayad-agi deg 70 n wulmisen n yikayaden. Ilaq ad d-nini belli wigi ijerden iman-nsen ɣer ukayad n Bac, llan deg-sen 14900 d inelmaden iɣurbizen (yeqqaren deg tesnawit), llan wazal n 6055 n yinelmaden imunan. Ma d ikayaden n waddal ama d win BEM neɣ d win BAC, yuɣ lḥal ad sεeddan-ten yinelmaden deg yiɣerbazen-nsen am useggas iεeddan.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Imezdaɣ n Ainouche hdjila i yettwasnen s yisem n bulitif di tlemmast n tmanaɣt temdint n tubiret xeddmen ass larebɛa iɛeddan timesbaniyin zdat lwilaya n tubiret anda ssuturen si lwali s tnezduɣin nsen tijdidin iten- weɛden acḥal-ayagi s tikci n tnezduɣin ladɣa asmi ssalin lecɣal , ɛlaḥsab imetel n twaculin iɛeddan i 128 twaculin yenna-d akken sin iseggasen aya imi s nennan ad tefɣem seg ixxamen ideg llan ad uɣallen ɣer yixxamen ijdiden di 10 wussan kan dacu kan ayaggi ur d-yelli ara di tilawt acku acḥal- aya ttrajun melmi ara wḍen asirem nsen , Rrnu ɣer wayan iten-icuɣben mliḥ imi lejrida n tnezduɣin tbaned dayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ-a ad ɣulfen s waṭas , Si tama nniḍen tinezduɣin-agi ideg ttidiren akka tura ɛlaḥsab imeslayen kra twaculin azal 50 yiseggasen aya fell-asent meḥsub si tallit n ucangu aṛumi yerna xerbent akk bɣant ad aɣlint di yal lweqt ladɣa deg ussan n tegrest ttazalent akk d aman , am wakken daɣen begnen-d d timecṭaḥ ur wesiɛit ara imi llant twaculin yesɛa azal 7 neɣ ktar yemdanen yid-sen ttidiren deg snat texxamin kan , ɣef wannect-a xeddmen timesbaniyen zdat lwilaya iwakken ad d-sbegnen lɣid nsen d liḥala ideg llan i yimḍebren ladɣa lwali ɣef lweɛd ur smersen ara deg tilawt yerra d aɣbel iten ixenqen acḥal iseggasen-aya yerna mazal ttidirent . Ma yella d timesbaniyen nniḍen llant ass letniyin di tɣiwant lexḍariya id-yezgan di lwilaya n tubiret anda imesfayden si tnezduɣin n AADL seg ahil 2 aseggas 2013 xeddmen timesbaniyen zdat n tɣiwant ssuturen seg uselway n usqamu ɣerfan tɣiwant akken ad iggar iman-is ɣef tedwilt-agi n tnezduɣin yesɛan azal 250 tnezduɣin imi werɛad bdan lecɣal deg-s ur d-iban wacema fell-as , am wakken ssutren daɣen dacu n tsebbiwin iten- yeǧǧan ad bedlen amkan i uṣenfar imi stenyan ad yili di saṭṭu i yiqerben ɣer temdint lexḍariya uɣallen rrant s amkan nniḍen ɣer temnaḍt talwin , Si tama tayeḍ nnan-d belli xelsen aḥric amezwaru deg useggas n 2014 s-ɣur twekla rrnu ɣer waya maci d tikelt tamenzut ara xeddmen timesbaniyin acku xeddmen yiwet n tikelt zdat n lwilaya anda ssutren seg imḍeber amenzu lwilaya akken ad d-yar lwelha-nes ɣef uɣbel-agi iten-icuɣbel s waṭas am wakken ssuturen ad d-afen tifrat s lɛejlan dacu kan ur d-iban yiqiḥ ar ass-a d wussan . 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Abdelhak Menas 

  
 Aṭas i iwalan Nasira Ɛebrus tger deg wannar n leqdic seg wul ɣef tutlayt n Lmulud at Mɛemmer, ama s yimagraden-is n unadi, s yisaragen d wayen-nniḍen. D ayen i aɣ-yeǧǧan ad tt-nenced i tdiwennit-a i teqbel s tumert akken ad aɣ-d-temmeslay ɣef kra n tlufa n tutlayt.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen:mmeslay-aneɣ-d, tazwara, ɣef Nasira tamnadit? 

 Nasira Ɛebrus: Azul. Seg yiseggasen n 90 i bdiɣ ttarraɣ tidmi-w ɣer unadi deg unnar n tmaziɣt. Acu kan d aserwet, ur iban ara wannar-nni. Ḥemmleɣ-ten akk: tasekla, tasnilest, amezruy… Nniɣ-as ad sqedceɣ meqqar ayen lemdeɣ deg tefransist. Dɣa, ma tebɣiḍ rriɣ-tt ɣer tesnilest, maca giɣ-as amkan i tsekla: sya ɣer da, alama rseɣ-d ɣer uḍris n tezrawt taseklant. Bdiɣ deg Tizi, sakkin usiɣ-d ɣer Inalco kemmleɣ d Mass Chaker. D netta i yi-yeslemden am waṭas-nniḍen amek iteddu unadi n tidet. Sakkin, udreɣ-d ɣer Aix en Provence, slemdeɣ tamaziɣt, slemdeɣ daɣen tafransist. Sakkin, uqmeɣ akayad aɣelnaw di CNRS deg 2005.

  Tenniḍ-as ad d-yaweḍ wass ad tkecmeḍ i unadi-a?  

 Lemmer d lebɣi, yal win yerẓan aqerru-s, yewwi dderk ur yestehza ara deg ulmad, ad yaweḍ iswi. Ulama amkan i ṭṭfeɣ mačči di tmaziɣt. D tizrawin tigreɣlanin tigrakaliyin. Ayen igerrzen d amlili d waṭas n yimnuda n tmura-nniḍen. Aṭas wid ukud lemdeɣ timsal d tifin n yisteqsiyen iwulmen i tutlayin yecban tayi-nneɣ.

  Tgiḍ kra n yisaragen, am wakken i d-turiḍ ddeqs n yimagraden ɣef tira n tmaziɣt d tsekla s umata. Ɣef tmuɣli-m, d acu igerrzen deg-sen d wacu ixussen? 

 Di tazwara ferrḥeɣ aṭas mi ara d-yeffeɣ udlis. Acu kan, skud neqqar nettwali, tettban-d ssebba i yesserwayen, i itekksen laẓ, gar wayen ɣriɣ i yiman-iw neɣ almend n waktazal di temsizzlin. Yettɣaḍ lḥal mi ara iban umaru iḥar ad d-yessufeɣ adlis, ulac aseɣti. Tikwal daɣen, d asemnenni n tefyirin. Ur iban akk amek yebna wungal neɣ tullist. Aṭas i yenwan teshel tullist. Tewɛer ugar. Deg wungal, tzemreḍ ad tcaliḍ, ad truḥeḍ ad d-tuɣaleḍ. Tullist ɣur-s ilugan zemken. Ma d tamedyazt, yella wayen yufraren daɣen. Ula d tinna deg-s ccɣel. Nniɣ-d yakan tahregt (inspiration) weḥd-s mačči d tasekla. Aru ales, ales taruḍ, tasekla am usnay n yizurar. Tikwal yelha yiwen ad yaru ayen i as-d-ineffḥen, tikwal daɣen, yelha ad as-yini umaru: ‘’anwa ara yeɣren ayen uriɣ? Iwumi ttaruɣ…?’’ 

  Ad d-nuɣal ɣer uselmed n tmaziɣt iɣef turiḍ yakan. Aṭas i yettwalin teqqen-it tsertit deg Tferka n Ugafa. Acu d awal-im? 

 Awal ad yeɣzif. Yella wayen i d-yesbanen udem amaynut n uselmed n tmaziɣt. Idlisen awfusen, inelmaden ṭṭuqqten di tmurt n Yiqbayliyen. D ayen yessefraḥen. Yella wayen yelhan. Ssneɣ aṭas n yiselmaden ulac win i ten-ifen ula di tmura-agi n Umalu. Acu kan, ar melmi ara yeddu uselmed n tmaziɣt s warraw-is kan? Yiwen n ufus ur yettceqqir ara! 20 d aseggas-aya, alemmud ur s tmara!(…) Yegzem wawal. Ma d tifaskiwin d yinawen, d asdegdeg, akken qqaren warrac-nneɣ.

  Amek ara igerrez waddad-is meskud tutlayt d tunsibt deg ukaɣeḍ? 

 Ur nezmir ara ad nẓer, mačči aṭas-aya. Ulama lemmer bɣan, tili tuɣalin ar lakul i d-iteddun ad tgerrez tegnit. Neɣ amer ttraǧun Takadimit ad asen-d-tesnulfu tameslayt i ara slemden. Ur ilaq ara ad nettu, daɣen, yiwet uriɣ-tt di tezrawt n ddukṭura-inu. I tikkelt tamezwarut Lezzayer tufa-d iman-is sdat useddu n uselmed n tutlayt ur nesɛi kra n ttawil neɣ n tarrayin. Taɛrabt, tafransist d teglizit, usant-d am trezfin si tmura i tent-yesseddan. Yerna tutlayin-agi i d-uddreɣ mačči d yiwet n tmurt i tent-yesseddan. Fransa d tmura yettmeslayen tafransist (la Francophonie), am Kanada, Timura taɛrabin (Surya, Maser, Lubnan) acḥal d leqrun i sserwaten. Ma d taglizit, atan iban, Legliz d Marikan yella deg wawal. Wa ilaq ad t-id-nini.

  I deg wayen yerzan tira n tmaziɣt, d acu i mazal ẓerren d uguren yimnadiyen n INALCO? 

 Tamsalt n tira teddez ur tebriz. Llan yisemtar (Recommandations) n 1998, deg lliɣ imir-n. Ma nemsefham, ad neddu yis-sent alama tella temlilit gar yimnuda d yiselmaden yessnen tamaziɣt d tesnilsit, d wid yesseɣrayen daɣen. Ahat walan ayen ur walan yimnuda di tesgiwin ideg llan. Imnuda n Lezzayer, n Fransa, n Kanada. Ma tkemmel akka, atan tetteddu am tsertit. «Kečč tettaruḍ akka, nekk bɣiɣ akken-nniḍen». Neɣ «Imi d kečč i d-yennan ur qbileɣ ara». 

  Tserseḍ-d taggara-a ayen tqeddceḍ deg Internet i lmend n win i terza taluft. Amek almi tenniḍ tura ad sqerbeɣ leqdic i wid i as-yesran? 

 Tura, aql-aɣ di tallit n tɣawla. Lemmer ad gganiɣ, ad d-stafiɣ akken ad d-ssuffɣeɣ adlis. Ayen uriɣ ad t-yeg lawan(…) Ihi, ama d tasekla ama d anadi, mi d-ḥawceɣ kra, ad t-serseɣ s aḍris. Win yeččan, yečča, win ur nečči, tarbut tella.

  Ad kem-nesnemmer ɣef wawal-im. Aseqqef n tdiwennit-a i kem… 

 A win yufan ad tefkem, daɣen, awal i yimawlan n warrac, i warrac yeqqaren tamaziɣt neɣ ahat i wid yuran ur ssawḍen ara ad ssiẓergen kra. Wid yuran aṭas deg Internet. Llant daɣen di tdeblin (administrations), wid yeṭṭfen aseddu n tmaziɣt, ahat nezmer ad nefhem ayen akka tekres. Mačči kan d tasertit n udabu. Kecment-d tlufa-nniden. Azul i yiselmaden n tmaziɣt anda ma llan. Tidmi i Nur Weld Ɛmara, Ferḥat Ayt Muḥend, Ferḥat Celmuni, Naɛima Ḥadi d wid akk iruḥen s ucawaḍ n uselmed n tmaziɣt di tegnit n ddiq.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-tt: Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Nnig n yimaynuten n tsekla tazwawt i d-yettaffaɣen seg teswiɛt ɣer tayeḍ, am wammuden n tullisin, n tmedyezt, akked ungalen, tella tuffɣa n yiḍebsiyen n ccna daɣen. Yiwen seg yiseɣraz-nni (albums) ihi, d win n umedyaz, mass Xalifi Mhenni, umi yefka azwel « TIFRAT », i d-yeffɣen deg duǧember 2015. Deg uḍebsi-nni ad d-naf ṭam n tezlatin i d-yettmeslayen ɣef ṭam n yisental, meḥsub yal tizlit s usentel-ines. Deg tezlit tamezwarut « Imawlan », anaẓur yerra-tt d tajmilt i lwaldin-is iɛzizen, aṭas n yimeslayen iweznen, iẓiḍanen, i d-yenna fell-asen neɣ ɣef yimawlan-is s umata. Tizlit tis snat « Tifrat n usefru », yehḍer-d umedyaz s tmuɣli-s ɣef xilla n tɣawsiwin, deg-s yettluɛa albaɛḍ ad ifiq i wayen ahat i t-yesdereɣlen, amzun yettakk-as isemtar… Tizlit tis kraḍ « Amdan igerrzen », d tajmilt nniḍen sɣur-s, maca tikkelt-a i unaẓur-nneɣ ameqqran Lwennas Meɛtub. Deg-s iwennaɛ awal fell-as s wayen akk i d-yeǧǧa leɣyab-is d lqerḥ deg wulawen, d wayen i d-yeǧǧa d timsirin mazal ad ilint, ulama yemmut. Yerna-s ccbaḥa s usirem i ilaqen ad yemɣi ɣur-neɣ. Dɣa yenna deg yiwet n tseddart « Akka i d tamurt/ i neẓra mazal ad nẓer/ ula d tazemmut/ nwan ad as-qelɛen aẓar… ». Tizlit tis ukuẓ « Taluft-nneɣ », i yecna umedyaz akked unaẓur Zeddek Lmulud, d tin i ilaq ad isel yal azwaw. Ad naf deg-s awalen n usḥissef, d uzɣan ɣef waddad n uzwaw, neɣ n tmetti s umata i iḥuzan swaswa anaẓur, ɣas ma yessekcem-d deg-s ciṭṭuḥ n usbens. Deg tezlit tis semmus « Abruy », Mhenni yesseɣzef awal deg-s ugar n tid nniḍen, imi d-yekka acḥal d tamsalt i t-iceɣben, yemmeslay-d ɣef yiɣilifen n tmurt amek zemren ad ṭṭuqten ma yella neɣfel fell-asen, deg-s yettwessi ayetma-s ɣef lasel, daɣen ad wexxren seg wanda llan send ad tettwaɣ s lekmal. Tizlit tis sḍis « Taḍsa n ddunit » i yecna umedyaz akked unaẓur n taddart-is Wali ɛebdelɣani, ad naf deg-s kra n ttuḥid d usfelsef ɣef ddunit-a ideg nettidir, seg tama nniḍen ad negzu ayen i d-yeqqar umedyaz, amzun nekni ziɣ nessenɛat-d amezgun i ddunit, s wayen akk i d-tettak… Deg tezlit tis sa « Tizlit n unelmad », yerra unaẓur ddhen-is i tecriḥt tameẓyant; i yigerdan i yellan d imal (futur). Yerna-s ccbaḥa ugar, ladɣa mi d-yessenṭeq deg-s agrud, i yellan d gma-s amecṭuḥ Meẓyan Xalifi, ad d-yemmeslay s yisem n unelmad i iḥemmlen tɣuri. Yettwessi inelmaden ad ḍefren isemtar (conseils) ɣef tmussni. Tizlit tis ṭam « Anwa i as-yennan », taneggarut deg uḍebsi « TIFRAT », win i as-yeslan ad yegzu srid dakken teččur d asirem, yal taseddart tettmeslay-d ɣef lecɣal n lɛali i yettwaxedmen, wid swayes numer imi d abaɣur kan i aɣ-d-rennun. Ayyuz i mass Mhenni Xalifi ɣef yiseɣrez-ines amenzu, afud ijehden i netta, i wid akk iqeddcen ayen yezdigen ɣef yidles.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">   Kaysa Xalifi 

  
 Tessɣer-it ddunit akked tẓuri, mmeslent-t leɛwayed n teqbayelit, yezga-d d tizdit gar tsuta n yinaẓuren imezwura d wid n tura.

 D bab n wawal urẓin akked uẓawan aḥnin, anwa ur yessuzen, xas ulamma s yiwet kan n tezlit, ucennay Taleb Tahar ? Xas ulamma yesḥassef ɣef kra n yicennayen n tsuta-agi taneggarut, xas ulamma zgan-d sdat-s aṭas n wuguren, ladɣa, lehlak-is (Lehlak n ssker i ireṣṣan deg-s azal n 30 n yiseggasen-aya), acu kan, ur yebri ara i ṭṭbel deg waman, akken qqaren yimezwura uɣur i d-yuǧew tabɣest. Yekkat akken yufa, s wayes yufa, xas ulamma yezga yettawi-tt-id deg nnican, yal tikkelt. Deg album-agi aneggaru anda i yecna akked waṭas n yicennayen-nniḍen, yecban Ali Ideflawen deg tezlit ‘’Layas’’, Kheloui Lounes deg tezlit ‘’Dadda’’…atg, Yuɣal-d Taleb Tahar ɣer unnar n ccna s 9 n tezlatin igerrzen : Later, Dadda, Layas, Yeggugem yiles-ik, S lɛezzat-iw, A medden, A Newwara akked tezlit Nebda. Deg-sent, yewwi-d awal ɣef wayen akk i iceddun timetti ɣer umdan, ama dayen yelhan, ama dayen ixussen deg-s. Nezmer ad d-nini, tizlatin-agi n Taleb Tahar, d akemmel i umecwar-is, d tallit-nniḍen deg tmeddurt-is imi tizlatin-is, seg tazwra, cuddent am tezrart, am yixfawen n udlis i d-mmseḍfarent. Yal tasfift neɣ album, d aḥric deg tudert-ines : deg-s urar, deg-s iɣeblan. D ta i tamɛict n unaẓur akken i aɣ-d-yenna. Yekker-d s iwellihen n yicennayen imeqqranen i as-yemlal lesrar n tẓuri. Yecna s umeslay azeddgan i irefden idles n tmurt-is. Yella-d d inigi ɣef tsuta, d amezgar gar usirem akked layas, d amsebrid ‘’deg ubrid yeǧǧan later, di lḥif i ak-yedda uḍar’’, akken i as-yeqqar deg tezlit-is. Am wakken i d-yefka tamuɣli-s ɣef kra n yimdanen, yenna-d : ‘’yiwen iles-is qeṭṭeɛ, ihedder ɣef wid i t-yifen. Yezmer ad yesqiṭṭeɛ, yettaddu i yigellilen’’. Acu kan, deg taggara, yemmekta-d, kamim ussan igerrzen. Xas ulamma, akka tura, aqerru-s yessa-t udfel, ɣer ccib n leɛmer-is, akken i as-tenna tinna i Ait Menguellet, mazal ul-is d aleqqaq, mazal-it yettmektay-d Ṭawes, ɣef wakken i d-yeḥka :

  <em>’’Ah a Newwara, mi akem-walaɣ di lḥara, tettakeḍ acbi ɣur-s.</em> 

  <em>Ah a Newwara, ul-iw ur yesbir ara, mmektiɣ-d Ṭawes.</em> 

  <em>Kemm d axalaf amecṭuḥ,</em> 

  <em>Nettat, teǧǧa-d ccama.</em> 

  <em>Tessendafeḍ-iyi leǧruḥ,</em> 

  <em>Lebɣi, neɛzel-it di tama.</em> 

  <em>Cfiɣ mi lliɣ d amecṭuḥ,</em> 

  <em>Ɣer ɣur-i i d-tettɣima.</em> 

  <em>Tura, kra din iruḥ,</em> 

  <em>Ddunit, tedda di nneqma’’.</em> 

 Ihi, win yebɣan ad yegzu tadyant n unaẓur, ad isel i win iɛefsen tirgin ḥafi. Tizlatin-agi n Taleb Tahar, zemrent ad ilint d iḍrisen n tɣuri deg uɣerbaz. Deg-sent amawal iwulmen akked ttrebga yebnan ɣef temsirin n ddunit. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.Moula  

  
 Tusut takiwant (toux sèche), tettawi ddeqs n yimdanen s amejjay. Akken tezmer ad tili d ccira taxfifant, tezmer diɣ ad teffer kra n waṭṭan nniḍen labeɛda ma tɛedda 3 n leddwaṛ neɣ temlal d ccira nniḍen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tusut takiwant ? 

 D tusut yekkawen, ur d-ngellu ara s yičexṛuṛen. Akken tezmer ad tili kan weḥd-s, tezmer diɣ ad temlil akked ccirat nniḍen am tawla, asiḥḥi n tanzarin, aqṛaḥ n tedmart……atg. Ur ilaq ara amdan ad yestehzi deg yiman-is, imi di ddeqs n tikkal, tusut takiwant tetteffer kra n lehlak labeɛda ma tɛedda tlala n leddwaṛ.

<p style="text-align: center;"> D acu-tent sebbat n tusut-a ? 

 Tusut yettɣimin kra n wussa kan, sumata tettemlili d lehlak n ubeḥri, aṭṭan n twermin, tamsalmit n tɣanimin n turin. Ur telli ara d aɣbel, imi tzerri s ḥellu n lahlakat-a.

 D acu ma tella tusut-a d tin yezgan, iɛeddan tlala n leddwaṛ ( toux chronique), isefk ɣef umejjay ad inadi s telqey di tudert n umdan s ddeqs n yesteqsiyen ammer ahat ad yaf kra n waṭṭan.

 Imi ma yenna-s-d umuḍin tusut-a tettlal-d mkul tafsut ( timlilit d yidqi (pollen) neɣ mkul m’ara yennal kra am umcic, amejjay ad inadi ɣur-s aṭṭan u uḥerbal (allergie), ma yufa-tt diɣ tettlal-d deffir yal ljehd yessexdam umdan, yezmer ad inadi ɣur-s aṭṭan n buneggaf (asthme). Ula d asiḥḥi n tanzarin ɣer deffir, wazi (reflux gastro-oesophagien), axenzir (cancer) n turin lebeɛda ɣer win yettkeyyifen, aṭṭan n wul, tusut taseɛqit ( coqueluche) ttaken-d ccira-a.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Acu n wugur id-tettawi tusut-a i tudert n umdan ? 

 Tusut teččeṭṭin tudert, imi tettuɣal d ugur i umdan. Dɣa ma tettili deg yiḍ, tessefraɣ-as iḍes. Dayen ara t-yeǧǧen ad yefcel ṭṭul n wass. Ula d aṭuqqet-ines yessenṭarray tiɣanimin n turin. Aya yezmer ad yesḍul ḥellu n umdan ɣas sebba d taxfifant.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Kra n yiwellihen: 

 Tusut takiwant d ccira mačči d aṭṭan ɣef waya ur ilaq ad d-nettaɣ ddwawi melba lemcawṛa n umejjay ɣas zemren ad tt-ḥebsen di kra n wussan. Di yal tikkelt, ilaq ad nerzu ɣur-s akken ad iẓer ma d tusut taxfifant yuklalen kan ddwa, neɣ ad aṭṭan nniḍen yuklalen anadi d uwelleh ilaqen s amejjay nniḍen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima Dali 

 
  
 Ad d-nuɣal ɣer deffir s rebɛin n yiseggasen. Lliɣ tt-ḥewwiseɣ di temnaḍt «les alpes de haute-Provence». Lliɣ di laɛli n 1200 neɣ 1300 n lmitrat. Di tallit-nni, ulac amerray id i tezzin ɣer dinna. Ulac d acu id imeqqin dinna ala amezzir. Lqaɛa terɣa am tniri, teɛra tessewḥac. Azal n tlata wussan n tikli, ḥebseɣ deg yiwet n taddart, taddart-nni ttun-tt medden, ixxamen-is hruran, ur d teqqim ara deg-sen tudert. Sarameɣ ad afeɣ cwiṭ n wamman akken ad kkseɣ acayaḍ n fad-iw, ur d-ufiɣ ara, dɣa kemmleɣ abrid-iw. Lḥiɣ azal n xemsa n tsaɛetin, ur d-ufiɣ ara aman, ulac akk ayen d-yesskanayen lǧerra n waman, laqaɛa tekkaw, anda ma mmuqleɣ terɣa lḥala…

 Akken akud, waleɣ s lebɛid lexyal d aberkan. Di tazwara nwiɣ d aqejmur n ḥedd isekla, tedduɣ ɣer ɣur-s ad ẓẓreɣ d acu-t, ziɣen d ameksa d weqjun-is, akked d tlatin wulli ṭṭsent ɣer yidis-is ɣef lqaɛa yessreɣ yiṭij. Ijebd-d taḥellabt-is n waman, yefka-id ad ssweɣ. Aman-nni d isemmaḍen, ttarran-d tarwiḥt. Ameksa-nni ur iḥemmel ara ad yutlay aṭas, Aqjun-ines daɣen yelha, yerna d asusam am netta. Yezdeɣ yiwen wexxam d netta i t-yebnan s wedɣaɣ, sseqf-is yeǧǧhed yettqabal aḍu n tegrest i d-yettsuḍun akked d ideflawen-ines. Taddart iqerben ɣer dinna, tebɛed ɣef umkan-nni s waṭas, ɣef waya nniɣ-as ad iyi-ssens deg uxxam-is, ad sɛeddiɣ iḍ-nni yid-s. Ɣef yimensi, yebḍa yid-i tiremt-is. Imi nekfa imensi, yewwi-d acarraɛ yessers-it-id sufella n ṭṭabla, yessmar-d iɛeqqayen n ubelluḍ yellan sdaxel-is, ifren-iten, yekkes-d widen-nni yelhan, iḥesbiten yiwen yiwen , yal taɛemmurt yerra deg-s ɛecra n yiɛeqqayen. Imi yekfa, ijemmeɛ-d meyya n yiɛeqqayen n ubelluḍ d iwfayanen, dɣan yeḥbes lxedma-s, imir nruḥ neṭṭes. Azekka-nni qqimeɣ diɣ yid-s, bɣiɣ ad arnuɣ ass-nni. D tanezzayt imi newweḍ ɣer umkan i yebɣa, neḥbes. Yebda yeqqaz ixemjan, ad iɣezz axemmuj ad iger aɛeqqa n ubelluḍ ɣer sdaxel-is, syinna akkin ad yerbu axemmuj-nni s wakal. Yeẓẓa azal n meyya n yiɛeqqayen n ubelluḍ. Nniɣ-as : 

 -Ma inek akal-agi anda akka t-ttezzuḍ.

 Yerra-id, yenna-id :

 -Ala

 Nniɣ-as :

 -Ma teẓriḍ anwa id bab-is

 Yerra-id, yenna-id :

 -Ala, ur ẓriɣ ara ?

 Nniɣ-as :

 -Acḥal-ayagi seg wasmi tebdiḍ tetteẓẓuḍ akka.

 Yerra-id, yenna-id :

 -Tlata n yiseggasen-aya.

 Nniɣ-as :

 -Acḥal n yiɛeqqayen n ubelluḍ i teẓẓiḍ.

 Yerra-id, yenna-id :

 -Ɛecra alaf, maca kra uɣen, kra mmuten.

 Nniɣ-as :

 -Acḥal di laɛmer-ik ?

 Yerra-id, yenna-id :

 -Xemsin n yiseggasen.

 Wagi isem-is Ilziyar BUFYI (Elzéard Bouffier), zik yella yezweǧ, yesɛa mmi-s. Tagara temmut tmeṭṭut-is yerna yemmut mmi-s, yegrad waḥd-es, ikemmel akken ddunit-is waḥd-es, yettidir ala netta d weqjun-is akked wulli-ines. Iwala xussen isekla di temnaḍt-nni, dɣa yebda i teẓẓu abelluḍ. Nniɣ-as :

 -Tibelḍin-agi i teẓẓiḍ akka, ad uɣalent ad imɣurent gar-aneɣ akka d tlatin n yiseggasen.

 Yerra-id, yenna-id :

 -Ma yebɣa Yillu, ma yella mazal ddreɣ, ad arnuɣ ad ẓẓuɣ aṭas, ayen twalaḍ akka ass-a, d tiqit n waman deg yilell. 

 Azekka-nni ǧǧiɣ-t ruḥeɣ.

 Yekker ṭṭrad amezwaru n umaḍal, anda ttikiɣ. Zrin iseggasen, yekfa ṭṭrad dayen. Mmekt-aɣ-d ameksa-nni akken i teẓẓun isekla. Nwiɣ ad t-afeɣ yemmut. Ufiɣ-t mazal-it yeǧǧhed ugar n zik-is. Mazal-it kan akken i teẓẓu isekla. Yezznez ulli-nni-ines acku tt-ɣeẓẓent isekla-nni, ssexsarent isegmi n yisekla-nni. Yuɣ-d deg umkan-nsent tiɣrasin n tzizwa. Nḥewwes akken di sin di teẓgi-nni id yesslul. Tesɛa azal n aḥdac ikilumṭren di teɣzi, akked tlata ikilumiṭren deg tehri. Wahmeɣ mačči d kra, akka ay d amdan ! Acḥal i yuklal n leqder. Ibeggen-d waḥd-es, war ttawil-at atraren nesɛa ass-a, ala ifassen-is d wallaɣ-is, ibeggen-d akken amdan ma yebɣa ad yexdem s wul-is, yezmer ad yexdem awezɣi.

 Tanmirt i Mass Ilziyar BUFYI (Elzéard Bouffier). Yuklal tajmilt tameqrant.

 D’après Jean Giono, L’homme qui plantait des arbres.

 Yerra-tt-id ɣer teqbaylit Bussaɛd ḤEMAR, 

 Win i teẓẓun isekla 

  
 Itikkelt tis snat, “Tidukkla n Bab lxir” n Ayt Sidi ∑li, tessawed ad theyyi yiwet n tmeɣra yesdduklen atas n tirmad n lxir deg wahil-is. Tameɣra-yi, tella-d s tallelt n yi¥allen n lxir, Leqdic agejdan i d-ittuhyan i ssehra-yi d lextana neɣ d ṭṭhara n warrac n twaculin ur neskfi ara iman-nsent, deg temnaḍt-a n Yiberbacen. Tidukkla–ayi tessaweṭ ad tessewjed neɣ ad tessuddes i lextana n wazal n 35 n warrac deg tɛecret taneggarut n Remṭan ; akken i d-aɣ d-tenna Massa Dihya lɛemrani (d taɛeggalt neɣ d timṭebert n Tidukkla-yi). Ṭṭhara-yi tella-d baṭel deg sbitar n «Le Rameau d’olivier», s tallelt n Mass Nait Ali lbachir, anemhal n sbiṭar-a. Aṭas n tirmad i d-yettuhyan i ssehra ilmend n tmeɣra-yi. Tazwara, seld neɣ membeɛd aserḥeb s kra n win i d-yerzan ɣer din d tiwaculin n yimeṭhar, d yimḍebren yemxalafen, neɣ d yineɣmasen tameɣra tebda s ccna. Gar yicennay-a n Yiberbacen i yebdan ssehra : mass Ainsri Salim, Nadjim Alouache i d-yewwin aṭas n tezlatin, ayen yesferḥen, yeszhan inebgawen iḥedren din. Syin, tkemmel ssehra s urar n yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun “SSber n uẓawali” i d-tesewjed terbaɛt n Lḥemmadiyin. Taceqquft n umezgun : “ssber n uzawali», d tin yura umeskar Oueret Zahir d yiɛegalen n ugraw-is, yal yiwen s yisem-is : Hakima Abbas, Laalaoui Wisam, Aadjelia Fareh, Ammaruc Yanis, Aabas Belaid, Idri Said, Boutekka Abed Elhadi. Asentel iɣef i d-tewwi tceqquft-a d tanifit yekkan nnig tẓawalit, d ayen icudden s waṭas ɣer wayen ttidirent d lḥif d tinneɣnit twaculin yenḥafen deg tmetti. Imi, ɣas akken, aṭas i yettseddiqen i yigellilen maca, deg tegti, aya i wakken ad d-sseknen kan iman-nsen, annect-a d ayen i yettḍurun tiwaculin s tidet, yetthuddu akter ma yebennu. Taceqquft-a tessmektaya-aɣ-d daɣen, s teqbaylit-nni n Leqbayel, s yimenzayen-is : am uɛiwin, tanifit, atg. Ɣef ttawilat n lxedma-nsen d wadeg anda qeddcen yinaẓuren-a, mass Ouret Zahir, yemmeslay-aɣ-d ɣef lixsas n ttawilat imi ur sɛin ara ttawilat ilaqen akken ad xedmen ladɣa i wallus n tcequfin-nsen. Ɣas akken agraw-a yebda seg 2001 maca, ar ass-a ur isɛi ara ttawilat i asen-ilaqen am wadeg anda ar xeddmen lxedma-nsen. Seg wadeg ɣer wayed, ggran-d deg yiwen wammas i asen-d-tessummer massa Aissou. D acu kan imi, d ayen i yeḥemmlen, mazal-iten ttkemmilen deg ubrid-a n tẓuri, annect-a iban-d deg ssehra imi wweḍen ɣer yiswi-nsen s usiweḍ n yizen i yimdanen tikkelt s taḍsa, tikkelt s cwiṭ n ddrama. Tidukkla-yi n bab lxir tefka daɣen, arazen i wid i d-yufraren deg yikayaden n uɣerbaz amezwaru, uɣerbaz alezmmas, d wid n BAC. Tameɣra, tkemmel almi d rrebɛa n ssbeḥ s waṭas n tirmad-nniṭen yemxalafen ; d ayen i yessferḥen akk tiwaculin-a d warrac-nsent. Aselway n tidukkla-yi Mass Zahir Tabia yemmeslayaɣ-d ɣef waṭas n tirmad n wahil n tidukkli-ayi ama d ayen yettwaxdmen ussan-a yezrin neɣ d ayen ara yettwaxdmen deg wussan i d-iteddun : aḥelli n kra n «les formations» am useḥfeḍ n lgaṭu deg uxxam n yidles n Yiberbacen ara yebdun seg Ctember i d-iteddun i tlawin i ibɣan ad iḥefḍen lḥirfa-yi ; asiweḍ n «Qufat ramadan» i waṭas n twaculin i tt-yuklalen ; asewjed n “Qufat lɛid” ; asewjed n tmeɣra i rebɛa n yislan deg Tuber i d-iteddun …atg. Ɣer taggara, nezmer ad d-nini, belli leqdic-a d ayen i yezmren ad yezeṭ tagmat, tadukkli, tallelt gar yimdanen, gar yimezdaɣ n yiwet n taddart, n temnaḍt. lxir, dima yestabaɛ deffir-s lxir ; a win yufan ad tili yal aseggas ama axir ! 

<p style="text-align: right;"> K.R 

  
 Γas akken taγiwant n At-Zikki tesfaydi-d s wudem unṣib s lxedma usenfar n lgaz n temdint i ittewεegnen niqal ad yebdu s wudem unsib deg aggur n yennayer 2014 useggas yezrin, maca yella-d laεḍil meqqren di lxedma sebba iεewiqen n kra n imezdaγ n tudrin yetabaεen taγiwant n Wizgan ideg-ittewεeggen ad-εeddin iqudas n usiweḍ n lgaz deg akkal-nsen, i yuggin rray-agi. Γef aya, di tagara useggas yezrin 2014 ass n 31 dujambar, imezdaγ n 08 n tudrin tesεa tγiwant n At-Zikki, begnen-d lγiḍ-nsen s waγlaq n yexxamen n Dayra n Wizgan d tkebbanit n « Sonelgaz », anda id-lḥan azal n 15 n yikilumitren γef uḍar sebba n yibardan i yergal wedfel. D aγbel iwmi sḥasfen aṭas imezdaγ n temnaḍt n At-Zikki, i yettidiren yiwen wuggur meqren imi asemmiḍ d win iten-yettaṭafen s waṭas yal tallit n cetwa, imi taγiwant n At-Zikki tezga-d deg yidurar εlayen n tmurt n leqbayel γef laεli n 1400 lmitrat. Γer tagara imezdaγ n tγiwant-agi sutren deg yemḍebren εlayen taεna temsalt akken ad-ggren iman-nsen γef zik lḥal i tifrat n wugguren-agi, akken ad-sfaydin s usenfar n lgaz n temdint ara yesneqen taεkkemt meqren fell-aen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ass n Sem akked Sed yezrin, 07-08/10/2016, i d-tesuddes tiddukla tadelsant “Imniren” (les guides) n tama n Uεfir n Bujima&amp;epsilon,; s tallelt n tenmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, tazrigt tamezwarut n rreḥba n udlis ilmed n warrac imecṭaḥ. Yella-d leqdic-agi adelsan deg uɣerbaz amezwaru “Addar Belaid” yellan deg tama-agi n Uεfir. 

 D reḥba n udlis deg tezrigt-is tamezwarut, ideg ttekkint 08 n tezrigin, ad d-nebder gar-asent: La pensée, Tamagit, Richa Elsam, Numidia, Syir…atg. Am wakken, daɣen , i llan yimyura i yessenzen s ubuddu idlisen-nsen, gar-sen: Zoulikha Touati, Ahcène Merriche, Nekkar Ahmed, Idi Bellal… Imsuddsen n rreḥba-a, heggan-d leqdic-nniḍen i lmend n temlilit-a. Akka ara naf, taceqquft n umezgun i d-tga terbaεt n umezgun “Ivtouren tama n Larebεa n At Yiraten, tirebbuyaɛ n tira akked usuneɣ, am wakken i d-yella, diɣ, useḥḥar…

 D tagnit anda fursen yiɛeggalen n tiddukla i wakken ad fken arrazen d igerdasen n usebɣes i warrac i d-yufraren deg kraḍ n temsizliyin: ama d tira, taɣuri neɣ unnuɣ 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani. 

  
 n Murad Irnaten

 “Di lǧerra-k ay awal…” d amud n tullisin n Murad Irnaten d-yefɣen ussan-a ɣer tezrigin Achab.

 Atan cwiṭ deg wayen yuran deg usebtar aneggaru : 

 “Tira d tala yettaken  aman I tara n ccfawat  i waken ad tegmu.  Aya d ayen n wala di tmettiyin ibeddent  ɣef idelsan-nsent, tutlayin-nsent,  d umezruy-nsent yettqadaren imyura-nsent, anida akken yal adlis yeḥrez amur si ccfawat, yal awal yeqqel i bab-is d ayla . Yal t ira d tirmit, d rreḍma n tudert i tutlayt. D tudert s unamek-ines ubriz, alqayan, ahrawan. Yal asekkil yella d aẓru  amenzu i wawal yesrus umyaru ɣef lkaɣeḍ, yettfuki,  yettnerni am waken yettfuki uɛeqqa  n yirden di teɣzut yerẓa lmaɛun i tikkelt tamezwarut. 

 Yal tira tettak inzi ɣer tiɣwist-nni tamenzut swayes d-ikeččem umdan ɣer tudert. Yal awal d taẓunẓut , d aẓar i wejgagal n usenlfu”

  
 Yemmut Rachid Aliche ass n 18 deg meγres 2008. Tlul-d deg taddart-is, Taguemount Azouz, yiwet n tiddukla iwumi  yefka netta s timmad-is isem ‘’Tiziwit’’. Amur ameqqran n yiεeggalen-agi γran γur-s tamaziγt. Ihi, ass-nni n 18 deg meγres-agi iεeddan, tiddukla-agi terra-as tajmilt deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mεemmri n temdint n Tizi Uzzu anda i nemlal akked uletma-s n Rachid Aliche, Fazia, nesmekta-d yid-s kra seg umacwar n umeγnas-agi ameqqran n teqbaylit.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen :Amek i d-tekkrem di taddart ? 

 <span style="color: #ff0000;"> Fazia: </span> Asmi i d-nekker di taddart, mezziyit mi negguğel. Baba-tnegh yemmut. Rachid d amecṭuḥ ur yessin ara baba-s. iḥemmel ad iruḥ γer teẓgi. Akken kan tefra lgirra, nruḥ γer Lezzayer tamaneγt, yuγ yemma tuγ din axxam. Netta yekcem srid s aγerbaz. Yeqqar mačči d izli am wakken iḥemmel mliḥ taqbaylit. Asmi yesεa 9 n yiseggasen di leεmer-is, mi d-tusa jida-s s axxam, ad tt-yawi γer yiwen umekkan di lḥara u ad as-yini ad as-d-teḥku timucuha netta ad yettaru. Sya γer da  ad-tt-yesteqsi γef wamek i as-qqaren s teqbaylit i wawal-a neγ awal-a. Imir netta yettaru ma nekni ndes. Ur nfaq ara s lqima n wanect-nni. Akken kan, dγa, ay tt-ikemmel. Yuγal yemmlal d Dda Lmulud di tesdawit, syin yezga γer yijufar-is.  Di 1978, mi iruḥ ad d-yawi turegt-is, yuγ lḥal ttnadin fell-as. Ur as-tt-id-fkin ara. Syin iruḥ γer tmurt n Fransa (Lyon). Iruḥ γer wid-nni i t-yesseγren dagi. Yeqqar di tesdawit Lyon 3.

  Melmi tfaqqem yekcem s telqayt deg unnar-agi n umennuγ γef tmaziγt ? 

 Nekk faqqeγ-as si zik, axater nekk yid-s neεdel mliḥ. Ayen i tt-yesbanen nezzeh d akken ur yettmeslay ara s taεrabt di Lezzayer, ala s teqbaylit : ama di lkar neγ di tḥanut. Yiwet n tikelt yenna-as i yiwen mi i t-ixelles :’’nekk xelse&amp;gamma,; kečč fhem neγ qqim’’. Mi ruḥeγ ad d-neṭṭqeγ ad d-yini :’’kemm ttsusum kan.’’ Di tḥanut ad yekcem ad as-yini : ‘’awi-d aya rnud aya. Ma ur tefhim ara ad ruḥeγ ad d-awiγ γer wid ara yi-d-ifehmen.’’ Syin yuγal snen-t akk, qqaren-as ‘’Aqbayli’’. Ula d yemma teẓra ileḥḥu γef tmaziγt. Teqqar-as kan : ‘’a mmi γur-k, taswiεt ur telhi ara.’’Meεna ula d yiwen deg uxxam ur as-yini tixer i lecγal-agi.

  Γef tira ? 

 Asfel, yebda-t dagi, d nekk i as-yettarun s tmacint. Syin ikemmel-it di Fransa. 

  Ayen i d-yeğğa ? 

 Aṭas n tira i yellan. Yella ungal-nniḍen yekfa-t, meεna tagi d tamsalt-nniḍen.

  Tamettant-is ? 

 Bniγ γef wanect-nni n lγaci. Zriγ ukud ileḥḥu. Zriγ anect yettwaqader γer medden.

  Amennuγ-is di taddart? 

  Yal taggara n ddurt, ad d-yas si Lezzayer tamaneγt γer tmurt i wakken ad yesselmed tamaziγt. Yettawi arrac imecṭaḥ γer lexla yesselmad-iten dinna. Ma d imeqqranen ttemlilin deg uxxam. Iruḥ γer sseḥra netta d Badi Dida, xedmen ammud n yisefra n tlawin. Yettwarres γer ONDA, Badi Dida fkan-as yiwen, nekk ar tura ur d iyi-d-fin ara. 

  Nudan fell-as irebraben i wakken ad t-nγen ? 

  D tidet, ttnadin fell-as deg waggur n maggu 1995. Nγan yiwen urebrab, ufan isem-is gar wid i d-ttheggayen ad ten-nγen. Nnan-as-d. Meεna netta ur as-yini ula i yiwen. I wakken ad yeffeγ seg uxxam, yesnulfa-d cwal ur nelli. Auc kan , yemma ur tumin ara s cwal-nni, ula d nekk ḥulfaγ. Ikemmel yettidir seg umekkan γer wayeḍ. Deg useggas n 1997, nniγ-as ilaq ad d-truḥeḍ ad teẓreḍ yemma-k, ha-tt-an teεya. Ad iyi-d-tafeḍ dinna deg uxxam. Yekcem-d, yeswa lqahwa akked yemma, yeqqim ciṭ, yuγal iruḥ. Kra n lweqt kan segmi yeffe&amp;gamma,; ṣsunin-d s axxam. Fγe&amp;gamma,; nniγ-asen d anwi-ken kunwi, nnan-iyi-d d imeddakal-is. Nniγ-asen ur ken-ssineγ ara, imeddulal-is akk sneγ-ten. 

  Awal aneggaru.

 Ferḥeγ imi llan wid i t-id-yettmektayen. Ur tettun ara. Llan wid iqeddcen deg lecγal-agi. Yerna tura εinani mačči s tuffra.

<p style="text-align: right;">yesteqsa-tt H. Moula

  
 Di yal tallit, di yal tamurt aferdis amezwaru ɣef acu tbedd tadamsa( économie) d tafellaḥt. Yal lqum i tetten ayen ur d iḥar-ara , leqrar-is d tlaba, akked d ucuḍ ɣer uzbuq n nnger. Akka ula deg tallit –agi tamirant anda tagula tikwal tettili d leslah gar ifassen n tinezmarin tidamwsiwin( puissances économiques). Aya neẓra-a acḥal d abrid, imi yal tikelt deg timura-agi umi teǧǧḥed tadamsa seqdacen rhina n tagula ( le chantage alimentaire) i wakken ad seknunt neɣ ddilent timura grent gar w allen-sen-t. Amedya aneggaru d tifegwit tadamsant (sanction economique) weqment timura n tidukkla n Europe mgal tamurt n Rrus s ssebba n taluft n tmurt Lukraniya. Anect-a wehḍes yessebgen-d azal tesɛa tfellaḥt t deg useḥbiber ɣef lḥeṛma akked leqder n timura. Win izemren ad iniwel tarbut-is s yiman-s werǧin ad yesqizzib i lǧar-is , am akken id yenna lemtel. Taluft n tagula si zik is kkren imawlan-nneɣ imi qqaren deg awal: “ axxam-is ur as yezmir , ɣef lǧameɛ yeṭṭef amezzir.”. Qqaren diɣen: 

<p style="text-align: center;"> “ tis sebɛa seg lmeɛnat aya n lxiṛ d aṛeṭṭal win izerɛen di lǧil yufa-t Ɣer leǧwad ad as yuɣal”.  

 Tidet ɣer yifen yal tidet imawlan-nneɣ d akal. Nnif d axxam. Lɛaz d lḥeṛma. Ɣef aya ur ilaq ara ad aɣ teḍṛu am win yellan deg axxam , ma d nnif-is yeǧǧa-t di ssuq, neɣ am win yellan di ssuq , nnif deg uxerduq. Ur ilaq ara acku taqbaylit teqqar: ttif lmut di nnif wala tudert di lḥif. A n t-ixf-is ugdud yezzin s uɛrur i wakal. A nnger-is lqum yettun ad yerr tiseɣlit ɣef iqwiren? A lhemm-is waɣref yettun anamek n wurtan. Aḥlil-is tasuta yettun belli qettu d aɣuru, a zreɛ d ddwa ḥellu. Tafellaḥt d tijegdit n yal tadamsa di yal tamurt. Ɣef aya timura ineflen akkin ggan-as leqrar. Tafellaḥt am yal aḥric di tdamsa tesɛa illugan-ines. Tamussni-ines akked tussna –ines. Iferdisen-agi simmal tettaẓ tamussni ɣer zdat simmal ttembaddalen akken simmal akal ad yefk ugar n lɣella. Lɣella ara yeččaṛen adamus. Ɣef aya, ass-a nettwahim ayen iɣerbazen n lḥirfat ( CFPA) ur sɛin ara tigezmiwin ( sections) yeɛnan tatiknulujit n tfellaḥt. Tasuta n wass-a ur tesɛi ara afus yettleqqimen , neɣ yesnen i wafras n isekla. Arrac-nneɣ ur ẓrin-ara amek ara reklen tigusa deg akal. Amek ara fernen tiskar id yettawin igeḍman n leḥlu . Iṛuḥ-asen w-aya acku tasuta teqburt ur asen tesselmed ara amek d acuɣer n wencet-a. Wamma d deg iɣerbazen leqṛaya icuden ɣef wakal d lqifar. Xudi ha-ten acu id yenna umedyaz ɣef iɛebden aɛeddaz: 

<p style="text-align: center;"> “ lemmer s unyir i tkerzeḍ nneɣ ɣef tigecrar I tzerɛeḍ tili ha-ten yemɣi-d yal lxiṛ.”  

  I wacu ara d yesseɣres meɣṛes ma yella ur d nhegga ara tiregwa? I wacu agani n igefuren ma yella ur yenqic ara wakal? Amek ara telhu lliqa di tzemmurt ma yella meɛwaju i tefres? Tazemmurt akken ttaɣ leqrar ilaq ad tili d tanaṣlit acku tazemmurt s isem-is id awal-is. Di tzemmurt tella tezmert tella tmurt! <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis yezrin 17 deg waggur-agi n ɣucet, tasebḥit n wass i tebda s wudem unṣib tezrigt tis ṭamet n tmeɣra n tẓerbit n taddart n Ait Hichem. Tuɣal-d tmeɣra-agi, aseggas-agi, ɣer taddart-is tanaṣlit, mebɛed mi tewwin niqal ɣer Uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. D tadwilt ara idumen xemsa wussan, imi tebda asni n amhad iɛeddan, temdel tiwwura-s ass-agi n arim 21 deg waggur-agi n ɣuct ideg nella. D ttiɛad anida i d-ttemlilin waṭas n yinaẓuren i ixeddmen azeṭṭa n tẓerbit, i wakken ad d-siknen amahil-nsen i yimẓuren i d-yettasen deg rebɛa n tɣemmar n tmurt n Leqbayel i wakken ad walin taẓuri-agi, wa ad aɣen ayen ḥwaǧen s ixxamen-nsen, ama d wid n ccbaḥa neɣ d wid sexdamen deg tudert-nsen n yal ass. D tafaska ideg ttilint aṭas n temsikniyin, yecban tin n uzeṭṭa n tẓerbit n taddart-agi n Ait Hichem akked tẓerbiyin n temnaḍin-nniḍen, timsikent n talaɣt, tin n wallalen n tẓuri yettwaxdamen s ufus…atg. Am wakken i d-yella uskan n waṭas n tewsatin neɣ leṣnaf n uzeṭṭa. Seknen-d daɣen amek i d-yettili uzeṭṭa n tẓerbit segmi tebda alamma tekfa. Ayen yessefraḥen aṭas imẓuren n tmeɣa-a, imi ttwalin s wallen-nsen s lqerb amek i d-yettili umahil-agi iweɛren aṭas, neɣ mi ara ttwalin tilmeẓyin n taddart-agi ṭṭfent deg tẓuri-agi. Tella-d temsizzelt n uẓeṭṭa igerrzen, ideg ttekkint akk tnaẓurin i ixeddmen azeṭṭa. Tameddit n wass-agi, ara tesali tmeɣra-a deg tezrigt-is tis 8, s tukci n warrazen i 3 n yiẓeḍwa i d-yufrar deg temsizzelt. Am wakken daɣen ara ad tili tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i widak akk yettekkin deg tezrigt-agi tis ṭamet. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella wahil adelsan d anesbaɣur, i lmend n yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi d yimẓuren n tmeɣra-agi n tẓerbit. “Tuget n twaculin n taddart-agi n Ait Hichem ttidirent s uzeṭṭa n tẓerbit, imi ayen xeddment i yiman-nsent iban, ayen-nniḍen snuzent-t, ttawint-d idrimen, ttɛawanent yis-n ixxamen-nsent”, akka i d aɣ-d-tenna yiwet n tmeṭṭut n dina. Tkemmel tenna-d: “Acu kan deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura, nettmagar-d aṭas n wuguren, gar-asen: lexṣas n usenzi n tẓerbit, leɣla n yisufar imenza swayes nxeddem, lexṣas n yimukan d tegnatin n usenzi…atg”. Imḍebbren i d-iheggan leqdic-agi, bɣan ad ẓẓun imɣi n usefti d ulmud n telmeẓyin i urmud-agi yesεan azal d ameqqran, imi si tama ad ṭṭfent deg wansayen, deg tgemmi d yirmad iqburen, si tama-nniḍen d axeddim adamsi (économique), i lmend n wayen i d-yessekcam n udrim. Γer taggara ad d-nini belli, ula d taẓerbit tesɛa izamulen-is yesɛan assaɣ d yidles d tudert akked tgemmi s umata, d allal i sexdament tlawin n taddart-agi i wakken ad snefsusinten ɣef wul-nsent, yerna ad d-senfalint ayen i asent-yehwan.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Seg ṭuber-aya n useggas yezrin i d-yessawel Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa lwaḥi d Tdukkla « Iqra » n Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, i wid yebɣan ad jerrden iman-nsen bac ad lemden tutlayt-nsen tanaslit; tutlayt tamaziɣt. Ilmend n waya ihi, kra llan ttraǧun tagnit-a akken ad tt-farsen war isteqsiyen, imi ɣur-sen tutlayt-nsen tezwar. ɣef waya i d-iban waṭas n lebɣi ula ɣur wid ibeɛden seg uxxam n yidles n Bgayet neɣ d wid iɛeddan akkin i uzgen n tasut deg umdur. Maca tella yiwet n taluft i d-ibanen d aɛewwiq n yimdanen-a i iɛewwlen ad tthennin i tewreɣrit(analphabétisme) deg tutlayt tayemmat: wa d lexsas n wallalen akked usuddes iwatan. «Iḥun Rebbi tura nuɣal-d d tawacult nekk akked terbaɛt n 35 n yiterrasen i ṭṭfeɣ. Wamma taluft ur telli twenneɛ xilla ɣas nettqabal-itt akken i d-tusa». I aɣ-d-yenna mass Zidan Yasin, yiwen seg wid yesselmaden tamaziɣt i yimeqqranen, send ad d-yernu: «Tikwal nxeddem ugar n tzemmar-nneɣ, ama s tiɣin n tɣawsiwin neɣ s uḥebber sey-a ed sey-a ɣef wamek ara nessefreḥ inelmaden-nneɣ imeqqranen. Maca, nesḥassef kan amek almi werɛad d-wwḍen yidlisen swayes ara nesɣer. Atan aql-aɣ deg furar mazal ur ten-neṭṭif. D ayen ilaqen akken ad tefsus teɛkemt ɣef wid ilemmden ladɣa». Iban-d d awal n win yebɣan ad lḥun yiqeddicen akken ilaq. Imi aselmed n tmaziɣt drus-as timmeɣnest akken ad d-tawi akk ayen yetturaǧun, wanag ilaq-as ugar n uwelleh sɣur uwanek deg wakud ideg zun tura d tutlayt d tunsibt. Ihi amek deg Bgayet weḥd-s ḥaca deg yiwen n umḍiq i tt-sselmaden ar tura?

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, taddart d taddart-ik a winnat. Xas tezgiḍ-d akkin i lebḥar, meɛna ‘’Tassa tamcumt’’, akken qqarent temɣarin-nneɣ, ur ak-tetthenni ara. ‘’Aẓar yettabaɛ tara’’ i as-nnan, diɣ, yimeɣnasen. Inzan-a, ad ten-naf s ttbut ɣer yiminigen iqbayliyen imi mazal-iten la seḥbibiren ɣef wassaɣen i ten-yezdin akked tudrin-nsen : tafekka-nsen dinna, ul d yiḥulfan da. Ihi, ula d iminigen n taddart n Tala Athmane ddan deg umecwar-a imi tiddukla-nsen ‘’TALA’’ iqeddcen deg Fransa tettɛawan, yal tikkelt, imezdaɣ n taddart-nsen deg yisenfaren i d-ssewjaden. Tikkelt-a, wwin-d arrazen imeqqranen i yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg ukayaḍ n uswir wis5 n uɣebaz amenzu ‘’Atmaten MOULA’’. Ɣef waya, dɣa, i fursen yimḍebbren n tiddukla n yimawlan tagnit i wakken ad d-heggin yiwen n temlilit anda i rran tajmilt i yinelmaden ifazen n uɣerbaz-a. Am yal tikkelt u tura tuɣal d tannumi, d tanelmadt Anais yettmeslayen 3 n tutlayin (Tamaziɣt, tarumit d taɛrabt) akken igerrez i iseddan leqdic n temlilit seg tazwara ar taggara. Am wakken, diɣ, tella temlilit-a d taswiɛt i yimḍebbren n taddart i wakken ad ṛeggmen(ad fken awal) tifrat i yal ugur i d-yettmagar uɣerbaz, ladɣa imi d imḍebber deg tɣiwant i t-id-yennan. Ma d aselway n tiddukla n yimawlan n yinelmaden, yessnemmer aṭas akk ixeddamen n uɣerbaz, ama d anemhal-is aqdim, ama d ajdid-a akked yiselmaden. Yesmekta-d, s yiseɣ, d akken snat n tnelmadin n uɣerbaz i d-yezgan gar tmezwura deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu s tezmilt : 9,90/10. Tigi d, BENKANOUN Tifinagh d HANNOUCHE Ines. Gar yiminigen i yellan deg temlilit, ad naf : Boumala Mourad d gma-s Rezzak, Moula Ramdane akked Ouanouche Yasser. Wigi, beggnen-d lferḥ-nsen imi i d-uɣalen ɣer umekkan anida ɣran yakan. Wehmen, daɣen, deg udem ajdid i yesɛa uɣerbaz-a akka tura. Yuɣal igerrez nezzeh ɣef wakken i d-nnan. Tekfa temlilit s tukci n warrazen i yinelmaden deg yiwet n tegnit n unecraḥ d lmakla n kra n tẓidanin. Ma d arrazen, zyada ɣef les télescopes i d-wwin yiminigen n taddart, tefka-d tenmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu idlisen i yinelmaden akken ma llan. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Mbeɛd mi d-tella yiwet n tsuqqilt n tmendawt iɣef d-yella uƐiwed n tmuɣli deg yennayer yezrin, Asqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa iger-d tiɣri deg yimas yezrin i kra n yimassanen iwakken ad ad sbedden yiwet n tesqamut ara d-yelhin s usuqqel n sin n yikaramen yettuneḥsaben d lsas deg umezruy n tmurt.

 Wigi, yiwen d ulɣu n umenzu n wunbir 1954 yettwajerden deg Yiɣil Imula, wayeḍ d lemcawrat-nni iɣef ibedd Ugraw n Summam i d-yellan deg Yifri ass n 20 di ɣuct 1956. Deg temlilit-a ihi, Assad Si Lhachemi, s yisem-is d amaray amatu n HCA yenna:”ccɣel-a iɣer nekker ass-a ur yelli d ayen ixulfen ayen iɣef tettwabedd tmendawt n tmurt-nneɣ. Imi tura tutlayt-nneɣ tessaweḍ ad tili d tunsibt deg tmendawt, d lawan ihi ad ilin yiḍrisen igejdanen iɣef tettekka tmurt s yis-s. Ayen i aɣ-yefkan afud ass-a iwakken ad neddu ugar deg unnar d axeddim i d-ssewjaden yisdawanen n tmurt-nneɣ.”Mass Assad yesseḥres deg wawal-is ɣef wazal n tsuqqilt mi d-yenna dakken “aḥric-a yesƐa azal meqqren deg usnerni n tutlayt, ihi yuklal ass-a lwelha I usnerni-s. d acu kan, ilaq ad d-nini belli asileɣ n wid ara d-yelhin ye-s ilaq ad d-yili melba leƐḍil.”Amaray amatu n usqamu unnig n Timmuzɣa ixebber-d dakken axeddim-a d win ara d-iwejden uqbel asfugel s ugraw n Summam ara d-yili deg 20 ɣuct I d-iteddun. Imi di taggara n temlilit-a tella-d yakan yiwet n tɣuri tamenzut n wulɣu n umenzu n wunbir 1954. Seg tama-s, Hamid Grin, aneɣlaf n taywalt, yeḥḍer timlilit-a anda I d-yenna;”Tamaziɣt tuɣ amkan-is deg unnar n taywalt, ladɣa seg wasmi tuɣal d tunsibt deg tmendawt yettwabeddlen deg waggur n yennayer yezrin.”yenna daɣ uneɣlaf n taywalt belli “25 ar 30% n rradyuwat n tmurt-nneɣ sƐant ahilen s tmaziɣt.”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail. M 

  
 Zrin rebɛa n yiseggasen seg tmecreḍt taneggarut i tga taddart n Tizi Tlakh, i_d yuzgan rrif n Tewrirt Musa Weɛmar, deg Lɛerc n At Meḥmud. Aseggas-agi, s lmendad n yimsewqen n taddart, nnejmaɛen imezdaɣ, heggan-d timecredt n hertadem.

 <span style="text-align: justify;">Taṣebḥit n wass-nni n lǧemɛa, nerza ɣer Tizi-Tlakh, nufa aṭas n tkerrusin, i d-yusan berra n Tizi Uzzu, aṭas n yimezdaɣ i illan berra, usan-d ad ḥedren i tmecredṭ.Tuget deg-sen, unagen, ffɣen taddart di lgirra-nni mi tt-isedrem lɛesker akken i aɣ-t-id-yenna Hmed At Lewnis neɣ Matoub Ahmed : «Aql-aɣ nemlal-d, aṭas n wid ur ẓriɣ ara acḥal aya, ass-a tessemlal-aɣ-id tmeccreḍt macci d lǧanaza. Nekni, taddart ffɣen akk, ffɣen di lgirra-nni, asmi i tt-hudden lɛesker». Xas akken taddart d taqrart, mezziyet, ulac deg-s aṭas n yimezdaɣ, acu kan wid d-iqqimen ṭṭfen deg leɛwayed n lejdud. Ɣef tmecreḍt n tikkelt-a, yiwen n uɛeggal seg yimsewqen taddart, Akli yenna : «timecreḍt d lḥaǧa i d-ǧǧan lejdud, niqal nxeddem-itt yal aseggass, mbeɛd neǧǧa-tt kra n yiseggasen. Ssebba d kra n wuguren tettidir taddart. Tikkelt-a, nenna-as ur ilaq ara ad tt-neǧ axaṭar ma deg yella neǧǧa-tt, nuggad ad aɣ-ruḥent terkizin n taddart. Timecreḍt d yiwet seg terkizin ɣef i tbedd tmetti n leqbayel. Ihi, nemcawar nekni s yiɛerḍiyen n taddart, nenna-as issefk ad nexdem timecreḍt am watmaten-nneɣ n Tewrirt Musa Wewɛmer , nenna–as, ilaq ad nexdem timecreḍt weḥd-neɣ. Asmi nennejmeɛ s yimsewqen n taddart, neṭqen-d kra, nnan-d ilaq ad d-nerr timecrepdt n lfuruḥ. Yal lweqt s tmecreḍt-is. Timecreḍt n lfuruḥ, d acu-tt ? Mi ara yesɛu yiwen lfaṛḥ ittseddiq i taddart, mi ara d-njmeɛ lfuruḥ-nni akk n sadaqa ad d-nessiwed azgar neɣ sin, nxeddem timecreḍt n lfuruḥ. Tagi n wass-a, d timecreḍt n ḥartadem, nxeddem-itt i lmend n tfellaḥt, nessutur di bab igenwan ad d-tili saba, ad d-tessew tmurt, ad issebɛed tixessarin imi d lawan n lɣella n uzemmur. akken ad iḥareb ɣef yimezwayen. Timecreḍt d tagnit deg ttemlilin imdannen. Ass-agi, llan agad ur nwala ara seg tmecreḍt taneggarut, d tagnit ihi deg ara ad nemmwali, ad temlil tasa d way turew…».Si tama-s, aselway n tɣiwant n At Meḥmud i d-yerzan ula d netta ɣer Tizi-Tlagh yenna : «Usiɣ-d ɣer Tizi-Tlakh s lfarḥ ameqqran, am iterrasen-nniḍien, usiɣ-d mačči kan imi lliɣ d aselway n tɣiwant. Nekk seg wid ittḥaraben ɣef wansayen i d-ǧǧan lejdud, ferḥaɣ aṭas s ccɣel-agi i xedmen Wat Tizi-Tlakh. Timeceredt, deg-s i tettemlil tasa d way turew, tesnernay tagmat. Akka ttwaliɣ, imezdaɣ n tudrin-nneɣ, uɣalen ɣer leɛwayed n zik, d ayen igerzen aṭas. Akka nwala ass-a, aṭas i d-yusan si berra akken ad ḥedren, ad mlilen d wid-nsen,..». Si tama-as Mehrez, yiwen n yilemzi yenna : «Nekk ferhaɣ s tmecredt-agi; d tagnit n lfarh , mlalen akk imezdaɣ, usan-d si yal tama, Aql-aɣ s yilmezyen nefka-d ula d nekni afus, nqeddec ayen iwumi nezmer». Ma d Massa Khorsi, yiwet n tmeṭṭut n Cahid tenna : «Timecreḍt, tella si zik n zik. Jemmɛen-d lwaɛadi n lfuruḥ : win uɣur yerna uqcic, ad iseddaq, win i d-yewwin tameṭṭut neɣ win isɛan kra n lfarḥ ad iseddaq i tejmeɛt. S yisurdiyen n lfuruḥ, ttaɣen-d timecreḍt. Zellun akraren neɣ izgaren. Ittusemma d asfel akken ad d-tili talwit, akken ad d-iwwet ugeffur, ad tili saba. Ifraḥ umeẓyan, ifraḥ umeqqran am lɛid tameqqrant» .Akka i t-id-nnan wid nesteqsa, ansay n tmecredt d yiwen unsay i yellan seg zik, d asfel akken i t-id tenna temɣart i nesteqsa. Asfel, akken i aɣ-t-id ssfehmen imusnawen, ixeddem-it umdan yal tikkelt deg ara isbedd kra d ajdid , ama d axam, ama d lǧama, ama d abeddel n useggas neɣ n tsemhut (saison) am ḥartadem. Issaram ad ibnu ɣef wayen zeddigen am wasmi i d-tebda ddunit, kullec ibda d ajdid, d azedgan. Qqaren-d, amdan mi ara ixdem asfel, issazal idamen am wakken d ddunit tajḍidt ara d-ilalen. Asmi d-texlaq ddunit, bab igenwan ixelq-d irebbiten. Wigi ur ssawḍen ara ad ḥekmen alammi uzlen idammen, alammi inɣa, issazel idammen n kra n lerwaḥ. Tamcahut n usfel, deg yal tamurt amek i tt-id-ttawin. Wa ihedder-d ɣef tlafsa n sebɛa iqerray, wa ihedder-d ɣef yiwen leɛǧeb izedɣen lebḥur…atg Timecreḍt, tesɛa azal ameqran deg tudert n yiqbayliyen. D tagnit ideg ttemlilin yimdanen, ideg, imezdaɣ ttakken-d rray-nsen, ttemjadalen d wiyid mi ara nnejmaɛen ɣef tmecreḍt. D tagnit ideg lemden tugdut : lemden izerfan-nsen wala ayen i d-yewwi ad xedmen. Si tama-nniḍen, timecredt d tagnit ideg tettemlil tasa d way turew, d tagnit ideg tettnerni tegmat , ttiǧhiden wassaɣen gar imezdaɣ . Timecreḍt tessmektay-d, temmal i yimezdaɣ n taddart yal yiwen, d aẓawali neɣ d bab n cci d akken isɛa amur. Zik, akken ibɣu tili taddart meẓẓiyet neɣ meqqret ttgen akken timecreḍt. D lɛib ɣef taddart, ɣef imsewqen ma ur xdimen ara timecreḍt. Qqaren-d d ’’tamsalt n nnif’’. </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="text-align: justify;"> R. L.</span> 

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: ma tzemreḍ ad d-temmeslayeḍ cwiṭ ɣef usurif-im amezwaru deg tmedyazt?  

  Aït Gherbi Ouiza:  Bdiɣ amecwar-iw deg tmedyazt seg wasmi meẓẓiyeɣ (deg yiseggasen n 80), asmi liɣ sɛiɣ 15 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-iw. Ussan-nni, liɣ qqareɣ deg uɣerbaz alemmas n Mekla. Maca, ur d-baneɣ ara ɣer unnar alarmi d ass n 15 meɣres 1995, ass-nni ideg i d-ɣriɣ isefra-w i tikkelt tamezwarut deg ddunit-iw. Ferḥeɣ aṭas imi seg uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu i bdiɣ amecwar-iw deg uḥric n tmedyazt. Dɣa, seg wass-nni ar ass-agi, yal mi ara i yi-tettunefk tegnit, qqareɣ-d isefra.

  Ahat tella tfaska ideg tewwiḍ arraz, neɣ werǧin? 

 Tasiɛt-a, ala yiwen n warraz n umḍiq amezwaru i wwiɣ deg umecwar-iw. Arraz-agi, wwiɣ-t-id ass n 16 seg furar 1996, deg tfaska n tmedyazt i d-ihegga Uxxam n yilmeẓyen n Mekla, i lmend n wass aɣelnaw n umeɣras. Syin akkin ttekiɣ deg tfaskiwin n tmedyat i d-yettilin kan deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, maca berra n temsizzelt, alarmi d aseggas n 2000 hebseɣ ur ttekkaɣ ara, imi lhiɣ-d d uxxam-iw d warraw-iw.

  Acu n yisental iɣeftessefruyeḍ? 

 Ssefruyeɣ ɣef sin n yisental igejdanen, wigi d tayri akked d tyemmat. Imi seg temẓi i bdiɣ ssefruyeɣ. Uriɣ ɣef tayri d iḥulfan d wayen akk icudden ɣur-sen. Ttaruɣ diɣen ɣef tyemmat, imi gujleɣ seg temẓi; zik i temmut yemma iwumi ṣawaḍeɣ rreḥma. Maca, ssefruyeɣ diɣen ɣef temsal-nniḍen yecban: tamagit, tamaziɣt, tagrawla, imeɣrasen…atg.

  Anta talɣa n tmedyazt swayes tettaruḍ isefra-m? 

 Ssefryeɣ s umata s snat n talɣiwin-agi ideg yal taseddart tseɛɛu 6 n yifyar, tameɣrut-is AB AB AB, neɣ talɣa ideg yal tseddart tseɛɛu 9 n yifyar, ma d tameɣrut-is d AAB AAB AAB. Yella wanida ssefruyeɣ s talɣiwin-nniḍen, maca d snat-agi i d-bedreɣ yakan i d-yufraren deg wayen uriɣ ar tura. Imi ula d nekk ḥemmleɣ-tent u ttafeɣ iman-iw deg-sent.

  Ahat yella wakud d wadeg i themmleḍ i tira? 

 Am nekk am tuget n yimedyazen d yimura, nesmenyif tira deg yiḍ wala deg uzal. Imi nekk s timmad-iw imir i ttafeɣ iman-iw, imir i yi-d ttasent tikta igerrzen. Tettili tsusmi, yettrusu wallaɣ…atg. Yella wanida ssefruyeɣ ula deg uzal. Ma deg uzal s umata, deg yiwet n lqahwa isem-is “Le Choc”, yellan tama n sbiṭar Med Nadir n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, ma deg yiḍ iban kan deg uxxam.

  Acḥal n yisefra turiḍ ar imir-a? 

 Seg wasmi bdiɣ tira ar ass-agi, zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ belli uriɣ ar tura azal n 250 n yisefra, gar teqbaylit d tefransist. Aṭas n yisental iɣef i d-wwiɣ awal deg-sen s talɣiwin yemgraden.

  Ma tettalseḍ-asen taɣuri i yisefra-m, neɣ ala? 

 S umata mi ur ttɛawdeɣ ara taɣuri i tmedyazt-iw, xas akken kan i d-ttasen yisefra i ten-ttaruɣ. Maca, ulamma ɣriɣ-t tikkelt-nniḍen, ulac d acu i ttbeddileɣ deg-sen. Imi isefra akk ttasen-d weḥd-sen s tmeɣrut, yecbaḥ uɣanib-nsen, dɣa ur ten-ttbeddileɣ ara. Ula d aciwer ur ttcawareɣ ara imedyazen-nniden, i wakken ad yi-d-fken tamuɣli-nsen ɣef yisefra-w. Tikkwal ttɛawadeɣ kra n yimeslayen i yisefra imezwura akk uriɣ deg yiseggasen-nni n 80.

  Ma tettagmeḍ-d ɣer yimedyazen-nniḍen neɣ ala? 

 Ḥemmleɣ ad ɣreɣ idlisen n tmedyazt, yal mi ara d-yeffeɣ yiwen qqareɣ-t i wakken ad ẓṛeɣ ayen yellan deg-s. Ḥemmleɣ diɣen ad sleɣ i waṭas n yicennayen-nneɣ meqqren, ad d-bedreɣ kan deg-sen: Hamid Ath Lounis yettwassnen s yisem n Hamid Matoub, Lounes Matoub, Lounes Ait Menguellat…atg. Annect-agi, yettɛawan-iyi deg tira-w, imi ttasent-iyi-d tikta mi ara asen-sleɣ neɣ ad qqareɣ ayen uran.

  Ma yella ucennay iwumi tefkiḍ isefra-m ad ten-yecnu deg tezlatin-is? 

 Ih, xedmeɣ-as ttesriḥ i yiwen n ucennay ilemẓi, wagi d Moula Mohand Ameziane, i wakken ad iɣenni mraw n yisefra-w deg tezlatin-is. Maca ar tura ur yessaweḍ ara ad d-yessufeɣ tasfift, imi xusen-t wallalen iwulmen, imi s timmad-is d anelmad n uẓawan, ṣṣenf n caɛbi deg uxxam n Yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer. Ar tura, ma llan yicennayen-nniḍen yebɣan ad cnun isefra-w, mreḥeba yis-sen.

  Ma tzemreḍ ad d-temmeslayeḍ tura ɣef wayen txedmeḍ yakan? 

 Gar 2015 d 2016, xedmeɣ sin n yimahilen s wazal-sen. Amezwaru d aheggi n sin n wammuden n tmedyazt yiwen s tmaziɣt, ad d-fkeɣ azwel-is “Tirɣi n Tasa”, Wayeḍ s tefransist s uzwel “Les Flammes éternelle”. Yerna wwiɣ-d izerfan n umeskar seg l’ONDA deg useggas n 2015. Ma d amahil wis sin, d album i xedmeɣ nekk d ucennay Louizini, i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2016 s uzwel “D asawen”. Isefra n tesfift-agi nexdem-iten deg sin yid-nenɣ, yella wanida yal yiwen ad d-yexdem asefru, yella wanida yal yiwen ad d-yaru wayeḍ, akken alamma yemmed d asefru.

  Ayen tessarameḍ sya d afella?  

 Ssarameɣ yiwen wass, ad d-fɣen wammud-nni n tmedyazt i heggaɣ deg useggas n 2015. Heggan, kfan yeqqim-d kan ad d-fɣen ɣer tezrigin. Aṭas n tikkal i qqesdeɣ ixxamen n tezrigin, maca ilaq d nekk ara ixelṣen, maca nekk ur zmireɣ ara imi ur xeddmeɣ ara. Lmaɛna-s, ur zmireɣ ara i lexlaṣ-agi. Mazal ar tura, la ttnadiɣ ɣef tizrigin ara yi-ten-id yessufɣen.

  D acu tettheggiḍ sya ɣer sdat? 

 Tura akka, heggaɣ yiwen n wammud-nniḍen n tmedyazt s teqbaylit, i iqqimen deg rrif yettraǧun asufeɣ-is. Am wakken diɣen nettheggi yiwet n tesfift-nniḍen ara d-yeffɣen deg useggas-agi n 2017, akked ucennay Louizini.

  Awal-im n taggara… 

  Tanemmirt tameqqrant i uɣmis «La Dépêche De Kabylie» imi i yi-iga azal. Sslam-iw i widak i yi-ḥemmlen d wid i yi-issnen. Ad siwḍeɣ diɣen sslam-iw i warraw-iw yal yiwen s yisem-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Yesteqqsa-tt Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Iḍelli n lhed ɣef 10h n sbaḥ i tebda s wudem unṣib tezrigt tis tmanya n Tfaska “taɣuri deg tmeɣra”, deg temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n Tizi Uzzu. D leqdic i d-thegga tenmehla n yidles ɣef teɣzi n ddurt, imi tebda iḍelli 26 deg meɣres ad tekfu ass n sebt amenzu deg waggur n yebrir. Ad d-tili tezrigt-agi deg 6 n yimukan n yidles d tmussni deg wakal n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu yecban: Axxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri d Umaruz-is n Azazga, tamkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, Tazeqqa n ssinima, Ulmis adelsan Matoub Lounes n Ain El Hemmam. Yettwahegga-d yiwen wahil d amerkanti, ideg ara d-tili rrehba n yidlisen (timsikniyin sɣur 20 n tezrigin, d isenza s yibuddan sɣur waṭas n yimura), ama deg Uxxam n yidles ama deg Umaruz-is n Azazga neɣ deg Temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, seg 9h n ssbaḥ alamma d 16h n tmeddit ɣef teɣzi n ddurt, d usenɛet n yimuhal n yiskiwen n yilmisen-agi. Ad d-ilin daɣen sin n yisaragen deg Temkerḍt tamaynut n Tizi Uzzu, ussan n 26 akked 27 meɣres. Ad ilin diɣen waṭas n yisikwan (uraren isegmiyen, asuneɣ, timucuha d teḥkayin) deg temkerḍt-agi tamaynut. Ma deg Uxxam n yidles n Tizi Uzzu d Umaruz-is, ad d-ilin waṭas n yisikwan-nniḍen yecban: asnulfu, tira mebla tilisa (s tamaziɣt, s tefransist d taɛrabt), asuneɣ, tullsa d tira n tmucuha…atg. Am wakken diɣ ara yili useḥḥar d imseḍsi, ama deg Uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine ama deg Uxxam n yidles n Tizi Uzzu d win n Azazga. Ma deg tzeqqa n ssinima, ad yili ass n 27 deg meɣres, usenɛet n yiwen usaru s uzwel “Les Aventures de Tintin”, ma deg Ulmis adelsan Matoub Lounes, tella-d turart tcequft n umezgun “La Cigale et la Fourmi” sɣur tiddukkla “Itri Areggal” n D B K. Ass n umenzu n waggur n yebrir, ad d-tili tmeɣra n taggara deg uxxam n Yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer, ideg ara ttunefken yigerdasen n uttekki i yimekkiyen deg tfaska-agi, d warrazen i warrac ara d-yifriren deg yal asikew.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ghani Amazigh 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Izimer yeswan gar 25 000 ar 65 000 n yidinaren, d ayen ur-iqebbel laεqel, imi ass am wass-a, axeddam azzayri, ur yezmir ara ad yelḥeq imman-is : yebra i tawsa maca ulac d acu i d-yeqḍa. Tewweḍ tfidi γer yiγes. Dayen i ideggren kra n yimdanen i wakken ad rewlen γef lbiε n lmal amecṭuḥ, aγelmi d umaεiz. Xelqen-d tirebbuyaε n 07 ar 09 n yimdanen, ttaγen-d igendyaz d tgendyaz. Dγa, nesteqsa kra n yimdanen i d-icurken aεejmi n lεid di temnaḍt n Wizgan, nnan-d :’’s 20 000 n yidinaren (02 n yimelyan n sentim), ad d-tawwiḍ gar 30 d 35 kilu n uksum, mebla ikruεen, dewwara d uqerru, maca ass-a ulac izimer yeswan 02 imelyan n sentim’’.

 Si tama-nniḍen, nnan-d kra n yifellaḥen d akken d tidett lεelf n lmal ɣlay aṭas, maca times-agi iceεlen di leswaq n lmal d isemsaren i tt-iceεlen, d ayen yesḥissifen aṭas.

 Dγa, yewwi-d lḥal γef tnaγlaft n tjara n tmurt-nneγ akken ad sḥarsen u ad gen tilas i wugur-agi n leγla i d-yettuγalen yal talit n leεwacar, xerṣum di lεid tameqrant, akken imdanen ad-sεeddin lεid di lehna d talwit.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Tlul Lilia Saâdi, ass n 22 deg yebrir aseggas n 1989, di uzeggan(Tizi Wezzu). D tilemẓit d tamedyazt tuḥdiqt, i yettnadin ɣef tmussni d wawal n lmizan s tektiwin-is i yettqudduren deg yixef-is. Newwi-d yid-s ameslay ɣef tmedyazt d wayen-nniḍen.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: ini-aɣ-d tazwara seg melmi d-telḥiḍ amecwar-im n tmedyazt d wamek i d-yella waya? 

  Lilia Saâdi:  di tazwara, ad am-d-iniɣ azul fell-am. Amecwar-agi-inu n tmedyazt, lḥiɣ-t-id seg wasmi sɛiɣ 16 n yiseggasen di leɛmer-iw. Yuɣ lḥal imir-n qqareɣ di tesnawit. Lweqt-nni seg wakken lliɣ ur heddreɣ ara aṭas, lliɣ i yiman-iw kan, ur ttmeslayeɣ d ḥedd. Dɣa, ttarraɣ-tt kan i tira, ufiɣ imru d amwanes. Acu kan imir-n lliɣ ttaruɣ s tutlayt n taɛrabt, syin akkin ɣer sdat ttasent-iyi-d tektiwin s teqbaylit. seg lawan-nni i bdiɣ tekkseɣ-as amkan-is i teɛrabt imi d tutlayt-nneɣ i d tutlayt n tyemmat, dɣa qqimeɣ kan deg-s.

  D acu d taɣawsa i kem-ijebbden s waṭas ad tessefruḍ? 

 Deg usteqsi-a a uletma, zemreɣ ad am-d-iniɣ mačči d yiwet, mačči d snat n tɣawsiwin i yi-ijebden I wakken ad ssefruɣ. Ɣas akken ur ẓriɣ ara amek i d-ufiɣ iman-iw ssefrayeɣ, maca taɣawsa akk i yi-ijebden s waṭas, ahat seg wakken ḥemmleɣ tamedyazt, ḥemmleɣ ad sleɣ i yisefra, ttakkeɣ azal d ameqqran i tmedyazt. Si temẓi-w xas ulamma ahat ur fehmeɣ ara lmeɛna n usefru-nni, maca win iwumi sliɣ yewwi-d asefru, ijebbed-iyi kan akken yid-s. Dɣa, gar-i d yiman-iw la qqareɣ: ayɣer nekk ur ssefrayeɣ ara? Ayɣer nekk ur iyi-yessefra Rebbi aqerru akka am nutni? Lliɣ ttmenniɣ lemmer d nekk i yellan deg umkan n win i d-yewwin asefru, almi d asmi bdant wallen-iw lddint-d cwiṭ cwiṭ. Uɣaleɣ ttwaliɣ akk ayen iḍerrun di tmetti-nneɣ d wayen akk icudden ɣer tudert n umdan. Ttḥulfuɣ, dɣa, ula d nekk ttaruɣ ayen akk yettḥussu wul-iw, ayen akk ttwalint wallen-iw d wayen akk yettaɣen yimdanen s umata. Ayen akk yettɛeddin fell-asen amzun fell-i i yettɛedday, acku nekk d amdan yettḥulfun s wiyaḍ. Dɣa, ula d nekk uɣaleɣ ttaruɣ, ttasent-d tiktiwin weḥd-sent, ttasent-d war ttiɛad xas ulamma tikwal ur testafi, maca ma tusa-d tikti zgiɣ ujdeɣ i tira.

  Efk-aɣ abruy seg walbaɛḍ n yisefra-m… 

 Ihi kan akka ad farseɣ tagnit ad d-awiɣ yiwen n ubruy ara yilin di lxaṭer n yimeɣriyen s umata, ad yili daɣen di lxaṭer-im a Kaisa. D asefru iwumi qarreɣ “Taḍsa n wuglan”: 

 Ddmeɣ-d ad aruɣ s wurfan 

 Ad ssefruɣ ɣef teḍṣa n wuglan

 D laman i fkiɣ i medden

 Lliɣ yid-sen ḥemmleɣ ussan

 Ɣilleɣ am nutni ulac win yellan 

 Ziɣ d iman-nsen i sɛeddayen

 Ssem-nsen d ssem izerman

 Ɣer daxel kan i ttarran

 Ziɣ d timest i ttheggayen

 Limer llin seg wid yecfan

 D nekk i asen-ixedmen leḥsan

 Ziɣ nutni ur uklalen

 Aḥeqq nniya yeṣfan

 Ula yiwen umdan

 Ma yettwaman seg-sen…

  Nnig n tmedyazt tettaruḍ ayen nniḍen? 

 Ur qqimeɣ ara kan di tmedyazt. Ttaruɣ tikwal tullisin, maca mačči s waṭas acku ur maleɣ ara mliḥ ɣer wannar-agi. Uriɣ yiwet n tullist ɣef sin yilmeẓyen, Muḥ d Dunya. D tullist i d-iheddren ɣef tayri, yeḍra-d gar-asen lefraq, maca lmektub iɛawed yessemlal-iten. 

  D acu d awal-im ɣef tmedyazt d tira tazwawt s umata? 

 Dagi ad d-fkeɣ kan rray-iw d tmuɣli-inu. Ttwaliɣ tamedyazt d ddwa yesseḥluyen imuḍan. S tira d tmedyazt yettrus wallaɣ, yettrus lxaṭer, yettifsus umdan. Nekk ttafeɣ iman-iw ala deg-s. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ win iwumi yefka Rebbi tamedyazt neɣ ayen i tt-icuban deg wayen akk yeɛnan taẓuri, yefka-as tilelli I wakken ad d-yini ayen akken ur zmiren ad d-inin wiyaḍ. Am nekk am wid yellan am nekk, iḥemmel-aɣ Rebbi imi aɣ-d-yefka swayes ara nḥemmel tudert, acku nekni s tmedyazt i nettɛici. Ma tettwakkes-aɣ tmedyezt-agi, tekfa tudert, tekfa lbenna. Ɣas ulamma mačči ala tamedyazt i yellan di tudert n umdan maca nekni d tagi i nesɛa deg yidammen-nneɣ. Tamedyazt s umata, telha i tmenna, telha i tmeslit, yertaḥ win i tt-id-yettawin, yertaḥ win i as-isellen.

  Kra n yisenfaren ɣer sdat? 

 Isenfaren d ayen ibanen. Ulac amdan ur ten-yesɛi, neɣ ur nesɛi ara iswan di dunnit, maca nekk asenfar-inu ad yeqqim kan akka deg wannar-agi n tmedyazt. Ad leḥḥuɣ kan ciṭ ciṭ, neɣ amek qqaren akken didac didac kan hhhhh i wakken ad d-ssufɣeɣ ma yebɣa Rebbi ammud-inu n yisefra sya ɣer sdat.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Testeqsa-tt: Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Tamezwarut lɛeslama-k a mmi ɣer fransa. Ini-yi-d kan kečč a Aɛmer, amek i t-tɛeqleḍ belli d mmi-k, kečč werǧin t-twaleḍ ? Yenna-as Aɛmer:

 -A taɛzizt, anekcum d-yekcem s axxam mačči am unekcum n ubeṛṛani, ikcem-d am win ara ikecmen s axxam-nsen.

 Aɛmer ijaḥ mebla lebɣi-s di Paris. Tlata n wagguren mbaɛd mi izweǧ d yelli-is n ɛemmi-s, yuɣal ɣer lɣerba. Seg wass-n, ur yezzi ɣer tmurt, tjaḥ teɣribt-is di Paris. Di tazwara, mi yuɣal si tmurt ixeddem deg ucanṭi, ibennu. Yal tlata n wagguren ad iceyyeɛ cwiṭ n yidrimen s axxam, baba-s inejmaɛen si lɣerba, ifraḥ nezzeh yis. Yewwi-tt akken azal n useggas alammi d asmi i d-yeɣli, ireẓz deg wammas. Ass-nni, d ass n lḥed, d ass n ustaɛfu, Aɛmer i wakken ad isiger cwiṭ isuṛdiyen ara d-iceyyeɛ ɣer tmurt i lɛid tameqqrant, irennu kra n tseɛtin n zyada: ixeddem ula deg wass n usteɛfu. Amɛellem ifraḥ, lxedma ad tessali, axeddam diɣen si tama-s, ad d-iḥelli cwiṭ swayes ara iqabel lmesruf n tmurt. Ass-n d asemmiḍ, agris igezzem ifassen, xas tagnawt teṣfa. Aɛmer s ufella n safuṭaj imdarkel uḍar-is, iḥlujeg, iberttex-d ɣer tmurt. Amkan ansi i d-iɣli ur tqeṭɛen-t ara wallen. Uzlen ixeddamen, ufan-t ifser ɣef waɛrur, allen berɛent s igenni, ulac ṣsut, ulac ambiwel. Nnan-as akk d ayen lamana tewweḍ bab-s. Di sbiṭaṛ mi d-yuki, mi d-yelli allen-is, yufa-d zzin-as imdanen ur yessin ara s tbentiwin ticebḥanin, iwhem kan ur izmir ad t-id-yali wawal, wala ad imbiwel, isreɛ iqqim kan. Tuẓa-d yiwet n tmejjayt ɣer-s, tezmume²g-as, tebda tettlaɛi-t. Teqqar-as : “ur ttagad aql-ak di sbiṭar gar yifassen n yimejjayen, teɣliḍ wwin-k-id ɣer da srid. Ur ttagad ad teḥluḍ. Tura ma tesselleḍ-iyi-d, smermec-d ma tzemreḍ”. Aɛmer iqqen allen-is illi-tent. Imejjayen-nni i as-idewṛen, dduqsen-d akk ferḥen. Yuẓa umejjay-nniḍen ɣer-s yenna-as : “tesɛiḍ zher, i kečč d-yeɣlin seg wanda d-teɣliḍ ulac d acu i ak-yuɣen deg uqeṛṛu. yenna-as: “Deg wagguren-agi imezwura, ur tzemreḍ ara ad tekkreḍ seg wusu, ilaq-ak usteɛfu d tujjya n yiɣsan yeṛzen. Teɣliḍ-d ɣef wammas-ik”. Allen n Aɛmer ččurent-d d imeṭṭawen…Ɣer-s iɣli-d yigenni ɣef tmurt, izder lbabur yis-s di tmurt tabeṛṛanit, iqqen allen-is, iruḥ di ttexmam weḥd-s. Xemsa n yiseggasen d alawi, sbiṭar ittak-it i wayeḍ netta yiwen ur izri s lexber-is…<em> Yettkemmil </em>

 <em> Ramdane Lasheb </em>

  
 Mazal ar ass-a necfa γef wasmi yeḥzen ğerğaer, 34 n yiseggasen i yezrin γef wasmi i d-teḍra txazzabit n tmenγiwt tamezwarut n yimṭurfa deg tesdawit n Ben-Ɛeknun Lezzayer tamanaɣt, ass n 2 deg unbir 1982. Kamal Amzal, yemmut d ameγras γef tugdut, γef tmaziγt. Ilul Kamel amzal di tmunnent n tmurt n Lzzayer, deg useggas n 1962 di Tiferdud (At-Buyusef), d anelmad deg tesdawit n Ben-Ɛeknun, iruḥ d asfel amenzu s ufus n yimṭurfa i iqeddcen i lfayda n ukabar-nsen daxel n tesdawit. Tasaεet, tella d 8 tmeddit, Kamal Amzal iεelleq yiwen n wulγu di lḥiḍ. Ulγu-agi, yessawal i unejmuε n yinelmaden i usbeddi n tesqamut ara yessuddsen leqdic. Imeccaḥen n yidammen ur t-zgilen ara, acku muḥal umnen s tidet, umnen s uγurru.Di tjeğğigt n temẓi swezlen-as leεmer, anagar 20 yiseggasen i yesεa. Nγan-t s ujenwi wid ur nettuggad Rebbi. Kamal Amzal, muḥal yekna i yimesbaṭliyen-agi, yettḥarab γef tiktiwin-ines i icudden γer yidles amazi&amp;gamma,; γer tlelli d tidet, γer tugdut akked yizerfan n umdan, dγa yemmut fell-asen. Iεdawen n tmurt, mačči n wass-agi kan neγ n yiḍelli kan. Wid i issexnunsen Kamel Amzal iḍelli i ixenqen tamurt ass-a. Ggulen ur yuli yiṭij γef tmurt, ggulen akken ad gezmen yal axalaf, ggulen ad sexsin yal taftilt iceεlen. Wid i d-iγeḍlen rrehba γef tmurt n Lezzayer εzizen sexdamen ddin n tneslemt akken ad samnen imdanen, ad ddun deg lğerra-nsen. Ssaγen ajeǧğiḍ-nsen i yal tamnaḍt n tmurt, dγa reṣṣan iman-nsen maca nutni ur tt-bnin ara γef tidet, yal taγawsa-nsen d akellex. Wid yeččuren d tayri n tmurt wwten s tezmert-nsen, begnen-d ayen yellan deg-sen akken ad bnun tamurt, ad teddu γer sdat.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ddurt-nni yezrin i d-bannen yigemmaḍ ineggura n temsizwert-agi n tmedyazt, ha-t-an ihi amek myezwaren yimedyazen-agi: Mass Boualem Mohand Arezki deg umḍiq amezwaru s tezmilt n 14,33, deg umḍiq wis sin d Mass Djoudi Fahem s tneqiḍt n 14,16, ma d amkan wis tlata tewwi-t Massa Taarkout Kassa s wazal n 13,83, deffir-s kan yella Mass Sikadir Belkasem s tezmilt n 13,33.
