Ad d-nesmekti belli timsizzelt-agi n tmedyazt, thegga-tt-id tiddukkla tadelsant “Smaɛil Azikiw” n taddart n Tewrirt n War, yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n At Ziki, akked waṭas n yimsuddsen-nniḍen gar-asen: Tasqamut n taddart Tawrirt n War, Asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n At Ziki, Asqamu unnig n timuzɣa, Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, Asqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. S tallelt n waṭas n yimallalen n tɣamsa yecban: aɣmis n “La Dépêche de Kabylie”. Heggan-d akk yimsuddsen-agi tazrigt tis ukuẓ n tfaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt “Smaɛil Azikiw”. D timsizzelt i d-yellan gar 10 alamma d 12 deg waggur-agi n ɣuct ideg nella, deg taddart n Tewrirt n War yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n At Ziki. Aseggas-agi, gan-tt d tajmilt i yiwen umedyaz ameqqran n tama-agi n At Ziki, wagi d Dda Lounis Azzi, yettwassnen s umennuɣ-is s ttawil n tikta d yisefra ɣef yidles d tmagit tamaziɣt. Am wakken, daɣen, ara d-nesmekti belli, d tafaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt, imi tiwwura-s ldint i yal amedyaz amaziɣ. Ttilin yimedyazen s tantaliyin yemxalafen, yecban: tacawit, tamẓabit, tatergit… Ma d ahil, yella-d d anesbaɣur ɣef teɣzi n 3 wussan, imi i d-tella deg-s temsizzelt n tmedyazt, ccna, isefra berra n temsizzelt, amezgun, isaragen, timussniyin ɣef tudert Smaɛil Azikiw akked Mass Lounis Azzi i wumi tuɣal tejmilt aseggas-agi, isenza s ubuddu n yidlisen, timsikniyin n yidlisen…atg.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Yenɣa iman-is, tameddit n letnayen iɛeddan, yiwen n umdan deg tɣiwant n Melbu, i d-yezgan s wazal n 36 n yikilumitren ɣef waɣir n Bgayet. Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i aɣ-d-yewwḍen seg temnaḍt-nni, s uɛelleq s temrart ɣer ttejra i iga umdan-a talast i tudert-is deg yiwen n wadeg i yexlan cwiṭ. Ad d-nesmekti dakken argaz-a, d aberrani, ur yelli seg twilayt n Bgayet. S twaɣit-a tinmettit, aṭas n medden i yeṭṭef leḥzen deg leǧwahi-nni, ladɣa. D asḥissef ameqqran ɣef wamek i d-ggran yilemẓiyen ttaysen seg liḥala n tudert.Akken ad d-banent ssebbat n wanɣiman-a, yemmug unadi sɣur ssrabes i teɛna taluft.

  M. K 

  
 Tazrigt tis 03 n temzizelt n uẓawan aklasiki γef araz n Muḥammed Igerbucen id-tessudes tmahla n yedles n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu s lemεawna n wexxam n yedles n Lmulud At-Mεemmar n Tizi-Wezzu akked tiddukla tadelsant Muḥammed Igerbucen d tin id-yesduri wexxam n yedles Lmulud At-Mεemmar n temdint n Tizi-Wezzu ussan n 13 d 14 unbir ideg nella, s yiwen n wahil d amesbaγur. Timzikniyin yemgaraden γef tudert d umecwar n tẓuri n unaẓur Muḥammed Igerbucen, azenzu s ibudan n yedlisen n ssin n yemyura Dr Mouloud Ounnoughene akked Hocine Ouaguenini. Akken i jarden deg ahil n leqdic ssin n yisaragen, amenzu n n Dr Mouloud Ounnoughene id-imeslayen γef udiwani n yedles n uẓawan n Igarbucen. Ma yella d Hocine Ouaguenini yemeslay-d γef Uẓawan di tallit n tegrewla. Syen ad-tebεent temzizla n waraz n unaẓur Muḥammed Igerbucen, ad-tekfu s tmaγra n cnawi d tikci n warazen γef wid ara d-yufraren di temzizelt.

 Muḥemmed Igerbucen d taεwint n tẓuri, drus n medden i d-yettmeslayen fell-as di tmurt n Lzzayer. D anaẓur ameqqran yettwasen aṭas di tmura n lbarani walla di tmurt-is. Muḥemmed Igerbucen d aqbayli, ilul deg Temgut, taddart n At Wuccen, di tγiwant n Uzeffun aseggas n 11907. Muḥemmed wwin-t imawlan-is γer Lzzayer tamanaγt ass-mi yella d ilemẓi, dγa dinna i yemlal d yiwen n Weglizi isem-is L.Roth, d yiwen unesbaγur ameqqran. Ass mi yewweḍ 12 n yiseggasen di leεmer-is, yelmed aẓawan (Lmuziga), dγa imawlan-is ğğan-t acku mmi-tsen yezmer i yiman-is, tteklen fell-as aṭas, yeqqim γer Weglizi-nni ddeqs, syen yuγal γer uγarbaz n uẓawan (Lmuziga). Ass amenzu yelmed γur aselmad Living. Yuγal irruḥ γer tmurt n Lutric anda ikemmel ulmud-is n uẓawan. Aseggasn 1923, Muḥemed Igerbucen yesεa 16 n yiseggasen di leεmer-is, yura deg yiwet n temlilit n uẓawan (Lmuziga). Ixdem-d yiwet n lmuziga i d as-d-yesmuzegten. Igerbucen yewwi-d yiwen n wudem amaynut i uẓawan (Lmuziga) i waṭas n yisura am « La Fontaisie Algérienne », « Découverte du Sahara », « L’appel du sud »..atg d waṭas niḍen. Ihi Muḥemmed Igerbucen d tala ideg ara yagment tsutiwin i d-iteddun.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Tagi cfawat n Boussad yiwen umezdaγ n Taddart n Tala Athmane. Ayen yexdem deg useggas-nni 1987, ur yeẓri ma yenddem fell-as neγ yezga-as-d d leṣlaḥ ? Acu as-yeḍran deg lweqt-nni ? Yenna-d :’’ lliγ uḍneγ. Kkes-d amek ur luwaγ ara ugiγ ad ḥluγ. Ihi weṣṣan-iyi ad awiγ asfel γer Sadat : ad awiγ ikerri γer Sidi Boubekeur. Kkreγ xedmeγ ayen-nni.’’ 

   Yekker urgaz yewwi ikerri, tacekkart n uwren d xemsa n litrat n zzit n uzemmur. Akken kan yers deg umekkan, yewhem deg wayen iwala, ikemmel yenna-d : ‘’akken kan i d-slan i yikerri yesbabe&amp;epsilon,; d tazla γur-s am yigerfiwen : wwin-t rnan ayen akken i wwiγ yid-s. Ula  d nekk, yeṭṭef-iyi yiwen deg ufus-iw am yikerri-nni,  yezzuγer-iyi d akessar. Γilleγ imi i yi-yewwi i wakken ad d-zreγ ameqqran-nsen ad iyi-d-yefk zyara d ddaεwa n lxir meεna yeḍra-d wayen γef wacu ur bniγ ara : yewwi-iyi γer yiwet n tsendduqt i wakken ad iyi-yezwin ula d lğiban-iw. Cfiγ rriγ γer daxel-is 100 idinaren, d lakaγeḍ-nni azegzaw, cfiγ am wass-a fell-as.’’   D ayen i t-id-yessenddekwalen γef wakken i d-yeḥka : ‘’din din, faqeγ belli nekk d ikerri am winna i d-wwiγ. Dγa, nniγ-as weḥd-i ‘’Ikerri yewwi-d ikerri i Sidi Boubekeur’’. Ma d tura ukiγ-d seg tnafa, abrid n leslak d lmasiḥ.’’<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>    

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M

  
 Taggara n ddurt yezrin, thegga-d Tdukla n yigujilen ‘’Ixulaf’’’ n Uqbu yiwet n temlilit n useεlem mgal leqher i ttidiren yigerdan s sseba n yimenɣiyen i d-yettilin di twacult, gar yimawlan-nsen, deg tudert n yal ass. Timlilit –agi, ḥedren deg-s yisdawaniyen imussnawen n tussna n tmetti, neɣ d les psychologue akked yibugaṭuten i d-yemmeslayen ɣef wayen i d-yeqqar lqanun d craɛ n tmurt n Lezzayer deg taɣult-agi. Am wakken, ḥedrent daɣen waṭas n tduklin i d-yerzan si tamiwin n tmurt yemxalafen n tmurt n Lezzayer, ladɣa tid yettḥaraben ɣef yizerfan n yigerdan. Asarag amenzu, yewwi-d deg-s awal Docteur Farid Trik , d aselmad di tesdawit n Bgayet ɣef wayen i d-gellun yinebran gar yimawlan ɣef ugrud, yenna-d : ‘’luɛara i d-yettbinin ɣef kra n yigerdan di lakul neɣ di tmetti s umata, tettuɣal ɣer liḥala deg ttidiren yigerdan-agi deg yixxamen-nsen, ladɣa wid imi msebḍan yimawlan-nsen’’, ikemmel deg wawal-is yenna-d yiwet n tikti s wazal-is :’’ ilaq asileɣ i uheggi n urgaz d tmeṭṭut i tudert n zwaj uqbel ad xedmen tameɣra’’. Deg usarag wis-sin, yella-d wawal ɣef leqher s umeslay i d-yettilin di twacult i d-gellun s lemḍerra meqqran ɣef tudert n yigerdan : ‘’aṭas n yigerdan i reglen deg yixxamen s sseba n umeslay qessiḥen sellen deg yimi n yimawlan’’, i d-yenna Mass Bouiche Mehrez, d asdawan d amnadi di taɣult n tfelsafit. Ma yella deg uskasi, yezzi usteqsi s waṭas ɣer wayen i d-yenna lqanun n tmurt n Lezzayer ɣef uzref n ugrud. Ma tezmer tdukla ad tessiwed acetki s axxam n craɛ ? D isteqsiyen iɣef i d-yerra imḍebbar n sandika n yibugaṭuten n lwilaya n Bgayet , Mass Idjed Mokrane anda i d-yenna : ‘’lqanun iban, aḥareb n uzref n ugrud s wazal-is , maca d aḥesses d usaɛlem i ixussen , aṭas ur nettruḥu ara ad cetkin, wa d leḥya , wa d lxuf’’. Ma yella d icetkiyen n tdukliwin, yenna-d belli ur sent -yesmiḥ ara lqanun :’’ tiddukkla, tezmer kan ad tseɛlem kan iɣallen n laman neɣ le procureur s wayen yeḍran d ugrud’’. Tekfa temlilit s kra n lewsayat uɣur i d-fɣen wid iḥdren, ama d imussnawen i d-yefkan isaragen, ama d wid n lɣaci –nniḍen, imi ula d lɛama iḥedren rran-d ɣef kra n yisteqsiyen i asen-yettunefken mi tebda temlili . ‘’ilaq –aɣ, ad naki wa ad d-nekker ɣef zik mgal aqhar n yigerdan, imi leqher yella deg umdan, ilaq ad iɣelleb iman-is, ib wakken ad seḥbiber ɣef tarwa-s d twacult-is’’, i d-yenna Mass Zaidi Djarah, aselway n tdukla Ixulaf. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> B.Benhamouche 

  
 Tiwaɣiyin n yiberdan d uṭṭun yesexlaεen: Azal n 3000 I yemmuten ar tura. Ugar n 3000 n yimedanen i yemmuten seg tazwara n useggas-agi n 2016, deg laksidat n yiberdan; i mazal ar ass-a la ttawint tirwiḥin n medden. Ihi alaḥsab n yisalen ineggura i d-yuwḍen ddurt iεeddan, seg tenmehla tamatut taɣelnawt n laman (DGSN), d akken jerden deg wakal akk n tmurt, ugar n 22900 n laksidat n yiberdan d wazal n 3164 n lmuta, d 35952 n yimejraḥ. Tenna-d daɣen deg wulɣu-nni i d-tefka ussan iεeddan, d akken yella-d unqqas s lqidar n 17,10% deg twaɣiyin n yiberdan, d 12% deg widak yettmettaten, d 20% deg yimejraḥ. Mi ara nettwali uṭṭunen yecban wigi d ayen yesexlaεen aṭas, imi yal aseggas d lluluf n terwiḥin i itett wakal, d imelyan n yimejraḥ, n yimeεḍar, n yigujilen…

<p style="text-align: right;"> A. Abdelghani 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Menbeɛd ungal « Bururu » id yewwin ɣef taluft n rebrab iḥuzan tamurt deg iseggasen 90 , Tahar Ould Amar amaru akked uneɣmas yettarun s teqbaylit akked trumit , yessufeɣ-d deg ussan-a yezrin ɣer tiẓrigin « Achab » adlis nniḍen ddaw uzwel « tafunast i tezgen Lpetrole » yellan d taḥawact n tneḍuryin yura gar useggas 2010/2011 deg uɣmis n imaziɣen. Ɣef wamek id ilul wedlis-agi, d wamek yettwali Tahar tasekla taqbaylit tamirant akked tira tineɣmest s teqbaylit, id yella gar-nneɣ wawal deg tadiwennit agi yellan d ddemma n twafɣa n wedlis-agi ines amaynut

  Yeffɣed ɣer tizrigin Achab udlis-inek «tafunast i tteẓgen pètrole” , awal ɣef udlis-agi? Ayen azwel-agi ?  

 Adlis-a d taḥawact n «tneḍruyin» (chroniques) d-yeffɣen gar 2010 – 2011, dɣa deg weɣmis-a. Akken teẓriḍ, «taneḍrut» d annay, tamuɣli n uneɣmas ɣer tedyanin d-yufraren deg tallit. D acu , deg iḍrisen-a, anni n tmeti yella-d s wecmumeḥ d unecrah. Asmi d-fɣent deg DDK, «tineḍruyin-a» semmaɣ-asent Ulac mmaḥ, ulac». Asmi kreɣ ad ten-d-reɣ s adlis, walaɣ belli azwel «tafunast i tteẓgen pètrole” ad yesleḥ, imi , si tama yella yiwen weḍris isem-is akka, si tama nniḍen tawaɣit n tmurt tcud ɣer tfunast-a i yeksan melba ameksa.

  Acu n isental yak yellan deg adlis-agi ?  

 Ddeqs i yellan. Ayen akk i ceɣben timeti di tallit-nni (2010-2010). D Abibiḍ i d amsiwel – awudem (personnage –narrateur). Yettmeslay-d ɣef ayen d-yezzin yes-s . yeḥḍer i 20 di Yebrir, i tmeɣra n tmeṭṭut, i leɛyud, yefka-d rray-s ɣef sonatrach, ɣef lakul … lḥasun mačči d yiwet. Ayen akk i iwala yerra-t-id s uɛekki d unecraḥ 

  Wissen ma yella yella di lbal n Tahar ad ɛiwed asezrireg u ungal-ines Bururu? 

 Tagi d taluft n tezrigin. Tezriḍ belli tizrigin d tikubaniyin n tdamsa, lmaɛna-s, ad gnet irebbi ḥala i wayen walan deg-s nfeɛ. Lḥasun, nek, si tama-w ulac aɣbel. D acu, aqli caxex d yiwen u ngal ara yeddun di later n Bururu. Ɣuri tura ugar n sin n yiseggasen segmi I d as-begseɣ. Wissen milmi ara ifak.

  Amek yettwali ¨Tahar tasekla teqbaylit tamirant ? 

 Tettedu dac dac. Maɛna tetteddu. Ad tejuǧǧeg ugar lukan dɣa wid akk yettarun suffuɣen-d u wid yeqqaren ttaɣen-d. tat cud ɣer ta. Rnu daɣen ilaq ayen d-itefɣen ad yemɛen, ad yesɛu lbenna. Acku akken nebɣu nberreḥs wayen nettaru ma ulac deg-s ayen imeɛnen ad t-ɣunzun cwṭ n yimeɣriyen yellan. 

  Awal ɣef liḥala n wedlis amaziɣ? 

 Adlis amazigh ? Tidet kan ur t-ssineɣ ara. Tamaziɣt i sneɣ d taqbaylit. Tutlayin nniḍen n tmaziɣt (ma d ayagi i d-qesdeḍ) ur tent-lemdeɣ ara. Rnu ɣas ma lemdeɣ-tent, ur ttafeɣ ara idlisen ara ɣreɣ, slid ahat yiwen umawal neɣ sin.

  Amek yettwali Tahar tineɣmest s teqbaylit? Anda id tesewwed? Amek id imal-ines? 

 Taɣamsa s teqbaylit milmi kan i d-lul, rnu s wulac. Taluft-a tcud aṭas ar tedrimt d rray i iwenɛen i usebded n tɣamsa. Mi d-nejmeɛ ayen akk I ilaqen n ttawil d tedrimt, ad nwali anwa akka ara yeɣren d wacu I yettraju ad t-yaf deg uɣmis. Axater win ara d-yaɣen aɣmis (akekn tebɣu tili tutlay), yettnadi iman-is d wayen t-inefɛen daxel. Ayen nettaru tura deg cwiṭ n yiɣmisen yellan texneq-it tsekla, tijmilin, cwiṭ n usali ssemḍen d waṭas wawal i icuden ɣer usentel identitaire. Tifaɣ, deg wa, l’APS lukan I san vwiṭ n rruḥ isallen-is u lukan daɣen i tesɛa tilelli. Asmi ahat taqbaylit ad d-feɣ seg wul d wawal u ad tt-id-saḥ s tidet wamkan-is di yal aḥric n temetti, ass-nni ad d-yili uɣmis s uzal-is imi d netta I d lemri n tmeti.

  Deg acu temgared tira taseklant akked tira taneɣmest?  

 Tira di tɣamsa teččur d leqyud. Amezwaru deg-sen d tigejdit (la ligne éditoriale). Mara tettaruḍ deg weɣmis ur tettḥessiseḍ ara i rray-ik: d-tiniḍ ayen twalaḍ, d wayen tesliḍ. Rnu ad tarud akken ara k-tefhem lɛamma, ama win yeɣran , ama win i ixussen.

 Di teskla ulac akk leqyud-agi. Tira taseklant tettak aṭas azal, i wamek ara d-tinniḍ. Di tsekla d talɣa(la forme) i yisibninen aḍris. Di tɣamsa d asali (le fond) I –yissibninen.

  Awal aneggeru n tahar I yimeɣriyen n uɣmis n imaziɣen 

 Ɣas ulamma nḥar ad naweḍ, ad nessiweḍ tutlayt nneɣ anda wweḍent tutlayin nniḍen, ilaq ad as-nelḥu s ttawil, ad nezwir tigzi (l’intelligence). Ilaq daɣ ur nḥebbes ara tira. Ad d-snulfu di yal aphric. D asunlufu kan i yessawaḍen, ad issiweḍ tutlayt anda ur tezmir ad t-tesiweḍ tmendawt.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Yessufeɣ-d ussan-a iɛeddan unaẓur Muḥend Ayt Ceɛlal aḍebsi n ccna amaynut wis 6 deg umecwar-is n tẓuri, s uzwel n « Lɣaci i yenfa listiqlal ». Deg sa (7) n tezlatin i d-yeddan deg-s, ad naf yezzi-d ucennay ɣef waṭas n tlufa i t-iceɣben netta d amezwaru, i iceɣben daɣen timetti tazwawt d ugdud s umata. Tilufa-a, rzant liḥala n tmurt, tin n tudert, lɣerba akked ddunit. Akken i d-usan yismawen n tezlatin, ad naf « Lɣaci i yenfa listiqlal », « Yelli », « A wi iruḥen », « Tasusmi », « Ccetwa n leɛrur », « Aḥeq nekk » akked « Nfiɣ am lefḥel ». Deg tuɣac i yellan deg tezlatin tedda-d tin n tcennayt Nasira Mesbaḥ. « Kkiɣ aseggas akken kfiɣ asekles n uḍebsi-a amaynut. Wid ukud nwiɣ ad xedmeɣ, ur llin heggan merra-nsen. Rnu-as tamettant n gma-s n Nasira Mesbaḥ ayyuren iɛeddan. Aya iḥettem-d fell-aɣ ad nerǧu azal n 4 n wayyuren ». D awal n Ayt Ceɛlal mi t-nesteqsa ɣef tegnatin n usekles. Ma ɣef taluft n tuffɣa n umaynut-a-ines d tnezzut-is yenna-aɣ-d mmi-s n Tuǧa: « Ar tura yella walbum-a deg tɣerɣar n uzdam deg Internet, am iTunes, d Amazon. Ma deg tmurt, ulac amaẓrag i yi-d-yessawlen. Ulamma ur ḥebbreɣ ara ula d nekk ad afeɣ, imi beɛdeɣ ɣef wayen iḍerrun deg taɣult-a dinna ». Akkem yesnum i wid i t-iḥemmlen, yewwi-d Muḥend Ayt Ceɛlal amaynut ama seg tama n yimeslayen neɣ seg tin n uẓawan. Ɣas ahat mačči aṭas n wallalen i yettwasqedcen, meɛna s uqeɛɛed yelhan, tban-d tezmert n uẓawan ma yeddukkel d wawal iweznen.

  M. K. 

  
 Tibḥirt n tsekla n tmaziɣt d tin i yeğğuğugen deg ass γer wayeḍ, annect-a yella-d s tebγest d lebγi n tarwa-s itt-yeswayen yal ass s tusna d tektiwin yemgaraden, imi yal yiwen iẓemmi-d allaγ-is akken ad-yefk kra yesεa i usnarni n tutlayt n tmaziγt.

 Deg ussan-agi yezrin, tasedawit Abdaraḥman Mira n lwilaya n bgayet tesdduri-d Akatay n tagara n master n tnelmadt Sonia AHFIR, taγult n tsekla, s usentel Aglam n yiwudam d wadeg deg tullist Taqbaylit, akatay-agi yella-d s lmendad n uselmad n tmaziγt mass Takfarinas BELLACHE, anda tanelmadt Sonia teffeγ-d s ugardas n Master taγult tasekla n tmaziγt i yuran s uswir ifazen.

 Tasekla Taqbaylit tamensayt tedda-d aṭas s ubrid n timawit, zik (lqern wis 19) ala anawen imensayen kan i yellan : timucuha d temɛayin, inzan, timseɛraq d tmedyazt, tiwsatin-is d tid yettruḥun seg yimi n wa ɣer wa. Ihi deg ṣṣenf-a n tsekla ad naf taywalt tusridt. Maca tasekla-ya tuɣ udem nniḍen, imi ur teqqim ara s wudem-nni n timawit akken tella seg tallit yezrin (1830), am akken i d-ibeggen K. Bouamara : «Tasekla tazzayrit s tenfalit taqbaylit ur teqqim ara am wakken tella deg lqern wis 19, akked d wasmi i d-tewwi tmurt Lzayyer timunent-is». Abeddel-agi yella-d s ssin n wudmawen ɣef wacu i d-t-ɛedda tsekla n tmaziɣt sumata : tira akked teywalt tatrart anda ad naf deg-s taywalt tarusridt.

 Am wakken i d-yura daɣen K. Bouamara : «Tigin* taseklant taqbaylit tbedd ɣef tsekla timawit akked tsekla yuran. Tasekla timawit tefka-d, tasekla timawit yettwajerden, ma d tayeḍ tasekla timawit s wallalen n teywalt». Deg tezrawt-a mačči tasekla timawit i as-yerzan maca tasekla yuran. Ihi aɛeddi ɣer tira deg tsekla taqbaylit tefka-d snat n tsekkiwin n tira : tira nuḥraz akked tira n usnulfu. Tasekla nuḥraz (asekles), tesɛa tawuri n usemnaɛ anect-a yella-d s ugmer n wayen yellan deg timawit. Ma d tsekla n usnulfu (tira), ilmend S. chaker, (1987) d Titouche (2002), Belaid At Ali Les cahier de Belaid ou la kabylie d’antan, d amenzu i d-yellan deg tsekla-ya n usnulfu. Am akken i d-ibeggen S. Ayad : «Seld timunent n Lezzayer, asnulfu aseklan deg tutlayt-a, yella-d deg tazwara deg taɣulin n tsuqilt akked umsasa s teqbaylit». Ihi deg wasmi id-tewwi lzzayer timunent, tira ɣef tsekla taqbaylit s teqbaylit neɣ s tefransist simmal yettnerni gar wid d-yufraren : M. Mammeri, R. Alliche, A. Mouhya atg. 

 Seg tira n Belaid At Ali, aṭas i d-tid-iḍefrren gar asen R. Alliche yura ungal amenzu i d-yellan s wudem aḥeqi Asfel deg useggas n (1981), Askuti n S. Sadi deg useggas n (1983). Ma yella d tullist tamezwrut tella-d s ufus n K. Bouamara deg useggas (1998) Nekkni d wiyaḍ. Swakka ad naf tasekla taqbaylit ṭuqqtent deg-s tewsatin ama d tid n tmedyazt neɣ tid n tesrit. Deg tewsit-a taneggarut i d-yella umaynut anda d-banen aṭas n yimyura iqeddcen ɣef tsekla-ya, ssawḍen snulfan-d ungal, amezgun, tullist atg. Ihi tazrawt n tnelmadt Sonia AHFIR tella-d ɣef tullist, imi tawsit-a d tamaynut id tekcem ɣer tsekla taqbaylit, yerna ulac fella-s aṭas n yidlisen d tezrawin, almi d iseggasen-a ineggura ibdan kra n yimura ttnadin fella-s. 

 Dakken teẓra lweqt ur as-isuref ara iwakken ad tezrew akk tullisin i d-yellan seg 1998 ar tizi n wass-a. Textar-d tullisin-a id-ittedun, acku d tid i as-d-yefkan lebɣi ad ten-t-ɣer, rnu ɣef waya dayen yettidir wemdan sdaxel n tmeti-s, zemren-t ad ḍrunt i yal yiwen deg-nneɣ, akken daɣen i as-d-yettbin umgired i yellan gar timetti taqburt* (tansayt) d tmetti tatrart (tamirant*) 

 Swakka tazrawt-is tella-d ɣef tullisin-a : Gamel Arezki Akal d wawal nfern-d tullist ; «Irgazen yekkaten uzzal» akked «Taqsiṭ n ugellid d wakli» ; «Tadyant n Ccix» ; Islam Bessaci «Deɛwessu n yimawlan» ; Abdelaziz Hassani «Yir tuɣalin» ; Noufel Bouzeboudja «Muḥend amattar» ; Mourad zimu «Zwina».

 Tizrawin d tkerrist : 

 Gar tezrawin i d-yellan ɣef tewsit-a taqbaylit ad naf ur ugten ara, imi Sonia AHFIR tebder-d tazrawt n magister n S. Mohand Saidi (2011), Le Récit tafunast igujilen de Belaid At Ali du conte à la nouvelle, tessaweḍ ɣer taggara n leqdic-a tenna-d dakken Tafunast i gujilen d tullist mačči tamacahut, taneggarut-a tesɛeb i waken ad d-nini d tullist neɣ tamacahut, acku deg-s tullmisin n tmacahut akken i llant deg-s tullmisin n tullist, ma neṭṭal ɣer talɣa ines d tamacahut, imi taneggarut-a tesɛa inaw s-yes itbedu Macahu ! Ahu Rebbi ad tt-yesselhu ad tiɣzif anect usaru, akken itesɛa inaw s–yes i tkefu « Tamacahut-iw lwad lwad, wwiγ-tt-id i warraw n llwad, uccanen ad ten-yeqqed Rebbi Ma d nekkni ad aγ-yeεfu Rebbi ». Ma neṭṭal ɣer ugbur, tamacahut-a isental i ɣef d-tewwi d wid yesɛan assaɣ d tudert n yal ass, i neḍruyen-is zmeren ad ḍrun i yal yiwen seg-neɣ, ma nefka-d amedya, lekruhya id yellan gar tmeṭṭut d yerbiben-is, tigujelt, tamuḥqranit atg. Isental-a id yebder Belaid At Ali deg tmacahut-a llan wid nezmer ad naf deg tmucuha, llan wid ur nettaf ara, maca netta ifka-yas i uḍrsi-a udem ilaw, imi tamacahut tebna ɣef wayen yefɣen i tilawt yeṭṭuqut deg-s umakun d wayen ur iqqebel wallaɣ n umdan. 

 Tazrawt tis snat n magister, d tin n A. Boudia (2012), Contribution à l’analys textuelle d’un corpuce de nouvelle d’expression Kabyle, ixdem tasleḍt taḍrisant i snat n tullisin n A. Mezdad «Tuɣalin d yinebgi n yiḍ-nni», ixtar deg tesleḍt-is ukkuẓ n yiferdissen gar-assen, tasleḍt n yizewlan n tullisin-a, tazrawt n wullis d tsiwelt, amyeḍres d usentel. Ma yella d tazrawt n master n R. Hamoum d F. Nessah (2013), Tazwart ɣef tullist taqbaylit, nettwali dakken tazrawt-a txuṣṣ, acku mi d-meslayent ɣef tullmisin i tesɛa tullist taqbayit ur bdern-tt ara tullmist n tsiwelt akk d tullmist n usentel, imi tineggura-a d tid yesɛan azal d ameqqran, d tigejdanin deg uḥric n tesleḍt n tullist taqbalit. Tazrawt nniḍen tella-d sɣur W. Sebbah K. Hamali (2015), Allalen n tsuqilt d useɣred n yinaw deg tullist Ahmed Hamoum “Amneṭri», Tasdawit n Tubiret, xedmen-t tasleḍt i tullist i d-yettwasuqlen seg tefransist ɣer tmaziɣt «amenṭri» i yura Aḥmed Ḥamum, i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2009. Tullist-a d tasuqilt n tullist yettwarun s tefransist s ufus n umaru afransi Guy De Maupassant iwumi isemma «Le vagabond», deg tezrawt-a ɛerḍen-t zerwen-t, allalen n tsuqilt id-yeddan deg tullist «amenṭri», gar-asen : areṭṭal, arwas, ankaz, tagdazalt d umsasa. Ihi gar tezrawin-a merra i d-tebder Sonia AHFIR, kra wwint-d ɣef tasleḍt n yizewlan, tazrawt n wullis d tsiwelt, amyeḍres d usentel akked d wallalen n tsuqilt. Ha-t-aya s umata leqdicat id -yellan ɣef tullist, imi twala dakken yella lixṣaṣ n tezrawin ɣef tewsit-a tamaynut, ur d-tufi ara aṭas n tezrawin i yettwaxedmen ɣef tewsit-a taqbaylit, terna amur ameqqran ur rrin ara lwelha-nsen ɣef ṣṣenf-a. Am akken daɣen ur d-tufi ara tizrawin ittwaxedmen ɣef tullmist n uglam n yiwudam akked wadeg. Swakka ayen tebɣa ad texdem deg tezrawt-a d tasleḍt n uglam n yiwudam d wadeg deg tullisin i d-tebder yakan. Ahat ad tili seg imenza ara ixedmen tazrawt ɣef teṣleḍt n uglam n yiwudam d wadeg.

 Asteqsi agejdan id-tefka i usentel-a : Dacu-ten yittewlen igelmanen n yiwudam deg tullist taqbaylit ? Neɣ s wacu i d-ufraren yiwudam n tullist taqbaylit akked wadeg n tewsit-a ?  

  Ilmend n waya, turda-s tebna ɣef :

 Ahat tullisin sɛan-t tulmisin n tullist taqbaylit ? Neɣ ahat seg tullisin i d-tefren , mmalent-d amgired yellan gar tmetti taqbaylit tamensayt d tmetti taqbaylit tatrat ?.

 Iswi-s mi tefren asentel-a, tebɣa ad beggen udmawen d wadeg seg tullisin id tefren, akken itebɣa ad tẓer amek id-yella usqedec-nsen seg umyaru ɣer wayeḍ. Am wakken daɣen itebɣa ad beggen udem atrar n tullist ladɣa deg wayen yerzan aglam n yiwudam akked wadeg.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Imariren Youcef Belaili (USM Lezzayer) d Rafik Boussaid (RC Laṛebɛa) ay d-yettwakecfen d akken sqedcen iseǧhaden, ḥekmen fell-asen aḥbas n wurar i tallit n 4 n yiseggasen, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna Temɣunt n Tcirt n Uḍar Tasadurant (iḥtirafiyya) (LFP). «Taseqqamut n ladeb n Temɣunt n Tcirt n Uḍar Tasadurant temlal ass n ttlata yerna tɛuqeb Youcef Belaili (USM Lezzayer) d Rafik Boussaid (RC Laṛebɛa) ɣef lǧal n usseqdec n tnegwa (mawadd) yellan gar yifarisen yettwamenɛen», ɣef wakken ay d-tenna Temɣunt-a. Taseqqamut teɣra-d i yimariren-a deg sin yid-sen akken ad ḥedṛen deg temlilit-a, maca Rafik Boussaid ur d-yusi ara. Youcef Belaili d alemmas amenṭag n USM Lezzayer, yerna sfeqden-t deg temlilit n wass wis 5 n Temɣunt 1ut n Mobilis, mi turar teɣlamt-nnes mgal CS Qsenṭina deg usarir (malɛab) n Hamloui deg Qsenṭina ass n 19 Ctembeṛ. Timlilit-nni terbeḥ-itt USM Lezzayer s 2 ɣer 0. D tikkelt tis snat aydeg ara d-afen Youcef Belaili yesseqdec iseǧhaden, imi tikkelt tamezwarut tettwakcef-d deffir temlilit n Temɣunt n Yilɣuɣen ay d-yellan deg Ɣuct n 2015. Aqebṭan n teɣlamt n USM Lezzayer yebda-d, naqal, tasemhuyt-a (mawsim) akken igerrez, maca yettwakcef-d asmi ay t-sfeqden war aɛeyyen deffir temlilit n MCE Lɛelma-USM Lezzayer ay ifuken s 0 ɣer 1, ass n 7 Ɣuct yezrin.

  APS 

  
 Ussan n tmedyazt n At Wasif id yellan, di tadwilt-is tamazwarut , dduṛt yezrin deg At Wasif s ddemma n tɣiwant n At Wasif akked usqamu unig n timuzɣa, ibegned i tikelt nniḍen d-akken terwa n umedyaz Lḥaǧ El Muxttar ɣef id yerna Ben Mohamed, Belḥanafi, Mourad Rehmane mazal-iten d at wawal yerna ressan deg akal yellan d aɛrqub n wawal.

 Azal n tlata wussan tuzzel tmedyazt ddaw leɛnaya n taleṭṭaṭ id yefken tameẓẓuɣt i wayen n thuski, n ccbaḥa n tmenna, n sser n tugniwin, akked d talqay n usekkud. Ussan-a n tmedyazt yellan d tajmilit i ucennay Slimane Chabi, yellan diɣ d-smekti n bab n wawal lḥaǧ El Muxtar fkan-d irebbi i wazal n 60 imedyazen id yekkan si yal tama n tmurt n leqbayel (Bgayet, Tizi, Tubiret) akked imedyazen imaziɣen id yekkan seg udrar n ccenwa akked Chlef. Kra n win iḥedṛen yedda di nexsma n wussan-nni acku ayen yuzlan d tamedyazt deg imi n imedyazen yefka d ttbut d akken awal n Si Muḥend U Mhend iccuq tignewt akken, war tilas, ad yeɣzu annar n tidmi, ad yezwi tindaw ɣef umyag aqbayli akken ad iɛebbi timessalin n tudert s umata d tid yellan d tuɣrsin yeqqnen ɣer lhejna n tidmi akked tinfit (esprit). Imedyazen am Ahmed Lehlou, Ahmed Khattabi, Aba Farez, Selmi Moussa, Dali salima, Cheli Leila, Sadi Kaci d wiyad ssawḍen tamedyazt taqbaylit ɣer yiwen yiswir ɣef werǧin nebni ma nsukk tamuɣli ɣef iseggasen yezrin.

 Mebla ccekk imedyazen-agi d ixulaf id yefrurin seg useklu n tsekla taqbaylit swan s tidi n lmux-sen imedyazen am Youcef Ou Kaci, Ccix Muḥend u Lḥussin, Si Muḥend u Mhend, Slimane Azem, Lala Xedija Tukrift, Lounis Ait Menguellet, Ben Mohamed, Mohya, Matoub Lounes, Zdek Mouloud. Ɣeff aya yezga-d yesɛeb ɣef tseqqamut n waktazal akken a tani gar imedyazen-agi, anwa ara yawin arazen id ttuhaggen s ddemma i timzizlit am akken id yenna Mass Halwan Ḥasen aselway n tseqqamut. Maca imi ayen ilaqen ilaq, arazen ttunefkan i xemsa n imedyazen : Sadi Kaci( Arraz wis xemsa), Cheli Leila( arraz wis rebɛa) Ahmed Xeṭṭabi ( arraz wis tlata) Selmi Moussa (Arraz wis sin) Dali Salima arraz (arraz amenzu –lḥaǧ El Muxṭṭar). Ayen yeṭṭfen lbal diɣen deg ussan-a n tmedyazt n At Wasif, d tajmilit yuɣalen I Slimane Chabi id yewwin ayen din d-isefra d imaynuten yesferḥen izumal n wid id yussan akken ad as sslen yerna as rran tisemɣert. Ala win ara as yinin ayuz i unaẓur-nneɣ id tezzin deg imawen n imayaten n wid iḥadren i leqdic-nni. Si tama nniḍen Ahmed Lahlou yeɣṛa-d isefra-ines yesduqqusen ulawen dayen id yernan deg azal n temlil it-agi n at wawal deg akal n at wawal. Tamugent tettunefk i yimedyazen ass-n n 5 Ɣuct deg at Ziki Akked deg ussan n 22/23/24/25 Ɣucut I tadwilt tis maraw sin (12) n wussan n tmedyazt Yusef U Qasi d Si Muḥend U MḤend .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Ass-nni n 27 meɣres 2017, mazal ur d-yuli yiṭij mi neffeɣ nekni s yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas Lɛerbi At-Ɛmer n At-Yanni d abrid ɣer lwilaya n Nnɛama.

 Si 04:30 i neṭṭef abrid, simi yeflali wass, neǧǧa-n adrar n Ǧerǧer deffir-nneɣ, nekcem timdinin ur nessin yakan, am Blida, Ɣilizan, Mɛesker, Ɛin Defla, Clef akked Sɛida. Akka i nesɛedda ass amezwaru deg ubrid. Armi d 07 n tmeddit i aɣ-d-tban tizzegzewt n tebḥirin n temdint n Nɛama iɣer nerza. Mi newweḍ, qublen-aɣ-d imḍebbren n Uxxam n yilmeẓyen, din din mlan-aɣ anda ara nili, acku isseɛya-aɣ ubrid iḍullen. Azekka-nni ṣbeḥ, aqerru n terbaɛt Mass Ɛadel Arezqi, d tnelmadin ittekin deg usuddes n tejmilt-agi : Deḥlal Canez, Urak Lameyya, Bumendil Mekyusa, akk d unemhal n uxxam n yilmeẓyen Mass Buxaṛi, msefhamen ɣef wamek ara yili wahil n ddurt. Ɣef 10, neẓra-d Asalay n yimjuhad i d-yesmektayen amezruy n tmurt. Syin, nuɣ abrid ɣer Uxxam n tẓuri tamensayt ; maca s usḥissef i d-nezzi imi aṭas n lexṣaṣ i yellan deg-s. Ɣef 5 n tmeddit, nuɣ abrid n Ɛin ben Xlil d Sidi Musa i yessufuɣen ɣer temda tameqrant n dayra i ibeɛden azal n 45 km ɣef temdint n Nnɛama. Dayra-agi teṭṭef gar tnezruft n udrar n Geɛlul, i d-yezgan am ufrag gar Lezzayer d Lmerruk. Inelmaden necraḥen, ferḥen s wayen akk walan, ṭfen aṭas n tugniwin i cfawat d usmekti. Mi d-nekcem tameddit, nebḍa ɣef 4 trebbaɛ n leqraya. Snat ad ilint i tɣuri, snat-nniḍen i tira. Taṣebḥit n wass 29, terza-d ɣur-nneɣ tneɣmast n radyu n Nɛama, Massa Suɛad Mensuri. Temlal d inelmaden deg Uxxam n yilmeẓyen, testeqsa-ten ɣef wacu xedmen meṛṛa d wahhil n ddurt. Ɣef 10, nerkeb ad nissin tamiwin-nniḍen. Mi nteddu, tezzi-aɣ-d tewṛeɣ si yal tama, nettwali tijlibin n wulli ččurent inurar, imi ttrebga-agi n wulli d yiwen si lerẓaq s wayes tettwassen tama-agi n Nnɛama. Akken yewweḍ yiṭij ɣer tlemmast igenni, banent-aɣ-d tezdayin n ttmer, i d-irennun cbaḥa i tneẓruft. Neẓra-d lemqam-nsen iwumi qqaren Sidi Ḥmed Lmeǧdub. Qqaren belli aẓar-is si ṭejara n Abu Bakker Seddiq. Cbaḥa i as-rnan inelmaden-nni-nneɣ i tnezruft siwa ayen teẓra tiṭ d wayen ɣef icfa walleɣ. Di leɛwayed-nsen, rezzun-d imezdaɣ, ad ẓuren mi ara tɛeddi tẓallit n wass lǧemɛa. ttemlilin-d daɣen din ad ɣren leqran yal aseggas gar 15 d 18 tuber. Nessen-d daɣen amek ssalayen iɣraben s yijdi d ursan n tezdayin. Nwala-d amek swayen iqwiren-nsen, yal yiwen s nnuba-s, yal yiwen s umur-is. Nuɣal nedda d uɛeggal-nsen Mass Meftaḥ Muḥemmed Amin ɣer leqser iwumi ssawalen « Asla ». Dina nufa-n Mass Mustafa Buzid, imeslay-aɣ-d ɣef umezruy n leqser-nni, inna-aɣ-d belli ittwabna di 1220. Ula d imusnawen André Basset d René Basset, uran ɣef umezruy d yidles amaziɣ n tama-agi. Aɣrem-agi, zzin-as-id kraḍ n yidurar (Afzuz, taneda, tanut) ; i wakken ad tkecmeḍ, llant semmus n tewwura. Aṭas i d-lemden inelmaden ɣer Mass Buzid i isedduyen tiddukkla ittḥaraben ɣef yiɣerman-agi. Mi d lawan n tanalt, nwala-d amek ttheggin latay. S yin nerza ɣer Ɛin Werqa, d yiwet n tama n yidurar, ur tt-rewwunt ara wallen. Twehha ɣer yiwen n ugelmim iwumi d-zzint leḥwari. Din i yella lḥemmam i wumi qqaren daɣen Ɛin Werqa. Nedda ɣef uḍar ɣer udrar i deg d-tekksen lemleḥ, maca ttawilat ssexdamen, ttaǧǧan-d abbu isseqbaren. Illa ula d yiwen ufurnu d ttbut ɣef wayen i aɣ-d-ḥkan. Nwala-d daɣen later i d-yeqqimen si tallit-nni n waẓarmezruy ladɣa di taddart n Tiyut. Din, ɣef yidɣaɣen mazal tugniwin n yifis, ayrad, uccen uqabac, i yettwaneqcen azal n 7000 yiseggasen uqbel talalit n Sidna Ɛisa. Ittuɣaḍ lḥal immi illa wayen ittwakren d usexsar si later-agi n umezruy aqdim. Nerza daɣen ɣer yiɣrem n El Ɛatiq, i yettwabnan azal n 9 leqrun aya. Iḍ n wass-nni nɛawez armi d 3:30 n ṣbeḥ, i lmend n usenfali s tira iwumi d-neqqim jmiɛ. Yal yiwen ifka-d rray-is d wayen t-iɛeǧben neɣ ur t-neɛɣib ara deg wayen i d-nwala deg ussan-nni n tirza. Simmal nrennu ussan iɛeǧǧeb-aɣ yiɣimi dina di Nnɛama. Ass wis 4 ɣef 11:00 n ṣbeḥ, nɛawed-as i tenfalit-nni i nura, nesqerdec-itt gar yinelmaden, nṣeggem-itt. Mi iɛedda imekli, nesɛedda lweqt igerrzen deg umraḥ n Uxxam n yilmeẓyen s uqesser d urar n temseɛraq gar-aɣ. Yerna heggan-aɣ-d kawkaw d latay. Ɣef 15:00, neffeɣ ɣer Mecriya, nuɣ-d kra ara aɣ-yilin d asmekti n tirza n tikkelt-agi. Dinna di Mecreya, nedda ɣef uḍar, aṭas i nedda d wamek i d-nufa ayen nebɣa. Mi d-nuɣal si Mecriya ɣer Uxxam n yilmeẓyen, nḥewwes di temdint n Nnɛama. Mi d-nennejmaɛ, nemlal-d am wakken nxeddem yal ass akken ad naru acu nesɛedda ass-nni. Akka i d-tezzi ddurt, tessuli tirza-nneɣ ɣer Nnɛama. Ass aneggaru neẓra-d di tama n Meɣrar lqelɛa n Ccix Buɛmama. Deg yiɣrem-agi, ssersen tiɣawsiwin i ssexdamen zik di leqser-nni am, txabit, taqlilt, tisirt d kra n dduzan n tallit-nni n tegrawla. Syin, neggra-d ɣer uẓekka n Isabelle Iberhart. Tlul ass n 17 furar 1877 di tmurt n Swis, temmut di 21 tuber 1904. Nnig uẓekka-s, nexdem dqiqa n tsusmi, nerra-as tajmilt. Akka i nessuli imuras-nneɣ s lfeṛḥ, s tmussni d ccbaḥa i d-nwala seg yidurar n ṛmel, n tezdayin, d yijdi-nni ittemcberriq mi ara tewwet tafat n yiṭij fell-as. Din, neṭṭef aṭas n tteswayer s unecreḥ d teḍsa, ad d-qqiment d amekti. Ayen akk i d-neẓra, ad yezgu deg wallaɣ d aktay icebḥen i lebda. Ass-nni aneggaru, nessuli tanfalit-nni i nettaru yal tameddit mi ara nennejmaɛ. Akka i nesɛedda imuras s unecreḥ d tmussni. Nwala-d timura yimaziɣen-nniḍen ur nessin yakan, nelmed-d tamussni fell-asen yerna nennecṛaḥ. Nessaram ad ɣ-d-ḍefṛen wiyaḍ deg ubrid agi.

  Agraw n yinelmaden 

  
 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Isufar </span>

 1/2 n tebselt 1 n wuraw n yibawen yellexsen 1 n ṭumaṭict 2 n tdeggar n ticcert 1 n tɣenjawt n lmakla n zzit uzemmur 1 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n zzit-nniḍen 1 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n yifelfel azeggaɣ aqerḥan 1 n lkas n uwren azuran n temzin 1 n tmeqqunt n uẓegḍuf -lmelḥ

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Rret yakk isufar ɣef tmes, slid awren akked nnaɛnaɛ, azal n. Rnut-as aẓgḍuf i yellan yettwagzem yakan. Rwit kullec, syin ternum-as ṭumaṭič d waman yeḥman. Mi yuzyagen waman-nni, terrem ɣer daxel-is awren azuran n temzin, u treggim-t s tɣenjawt tameqqrant. Ilaq ad yeww daxel n ttawil iɣelqen azal n 15’ ddaw n tmes taḥlawant. Mi yewwa, tesuzzrem-as nneɛneɛ aquran. Tzemrem ad tbeddlem ibawen-nni s lubya, ma tebɣam. S tezmert-nwen.

   Daya 

  
 Taɣiwant n Bechloul i ibeɛden s wazal n 20 n yikilumitren ɣef Tubiret tessewjad i ufraq n 50 n yixxamen n ṣṣenf “LPA” deg wussan-a i d-iteddun.

 Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i d-newwi sɣur yimḍebbren n tɣiwant, asenfar-a yebdan yakan azal n sin n yiseggasen yewweḍ ɣer taggara-s, yerna ixxamen wejden akken iwata imi skecmen-asen aman, trisiti d lgaz. Seg tama-s, imḍebber n usenfar-a yettukelfen s lebni d ufraq ijmeɛ-d wid yesfaydan s yixxamen-a iwakken ad yessenɛet i yal yiwen axxam-is. Iwakken ur d-yettili ara lxiq, yella-d ujbad n tesɣart, yal wa yusa-d anda i as-d-yefka zzehr-is. Seg tama nniḍen, nnan-aɣ-d yimḍebbren n tɣiwant dakken qqiment-d tḥuna mazal ur ttwaferqent ara, imi aselway n tɣiwant yugi ad yeqbel afraq mebla ma tesfayda-d tɣiwant s wazal n 14 n tḥuna. Rray-a ibeggen-it-id uselway imi akal ideg ttwabnan yixxamen-a d tikci i t-tefka tɣiwant I “l’agence foncière”. D acu kan, iwulem i tneggarut-a ad teǧǧ seg leḥq-is kra n 14 n tḥuna ara yettunefken i wid iwumi hudden asmi fkan akal i lebni n yixxamen-a.

 Dima ɣef leḥsab n wayen i aɣ-d-nnan yimḍebbren n tɣiwant, afraq n tḥuna ad d-yili asmi ara d-tili tifrat i uɣbel-a icudden snat n tamiwin. Seg tama-nniḍen, yettunefk ad d-nini dakken ssuma n yixxamen-a d tin yellan ɣer tezmert n wid yesfaydan, imi nnig n lemɛawna i d-tefka ddula s wazal n 70 n yimelyunen i yal yiwen, win yewwin axxam fell-as ad yernu kan 150 n yimelyunen n ssantim. Tadrimt-a yezmer daɣ ad t-id yawi d areṭṭal seg lbanka i yessasehlen taluft i yimdanen.

<div> 
  
 “Amnir-iw deg tmaziɣt” wis 2, d adlis-nniḍen wis sin i d-yessufeɣ Adaoun Abdelghani, mebɛed mi yessizreg “Amnir-iw deg tmaziɣt 1”. Yusa-d d akemmel u d aseǧǧhed i temsirin i d-yellan deg udlis amezwaru, ɣef wakken i d-yenna umeskar. Adlisfus-agi, “Amnir-iw deg tmaziɣt 2, n ukayad n BA, ideg llan 85 n yirmad d useɣti-nsen, d akemmel i yettkemmil asuneḍ-nni amezwaru, ideg llant 31 n temsirin d 35 n tbaduyin akked 100 n yimedyaten. Yebɣa umeskar ad yesleɣmu anelmad, dɣa yerna-as-d 85 n yiluɣma yerzan 31 n temsirin-nni yellan deg umezwaru-nni.Yal tamsirt tebna ɣef sin neɣ kraḍ n yirmad n uktazal, yemgaraden seg urmud ɣer wayeḍ. Llan deg-s ula d irmad n temsirin i yelmed unelmad yakkan deg yiseggasen yezrin. Tuddsa n udlis-agi tedda akka : Aḥric amezwaru d irmad yerzan (Tamawalt, tajerrumt, taseftit akked tirawalt). Aḥric wis sin d aseɣti n yirmad-agi akked tesleḍt n 8 n tefyar.

  Ayen i d-yessazreg yakkan: 

 • Tala n yinzan (d ammud n yinzan), yebrir 2016, tizrigin Richa Elsam, Tizi Uzzu. 

 • Amnir-iw deg tmaziɣt, akayad n BAC, asuneḍ -1-, Γuct 2017, 

 tizrigin Art Plume, Tizi Uzzu.

 • Amnir-iw deg tmaziɣt, akayad n BEM, asuneḍ -1-, Γuct 2017,

 tizrigin Art Plume, Tizi Uzzu.

  Farida Elharani 

  
 Ass n 15 deg waggur n furar aseggas n 1995, Nabila Ǧaḥnin, taselwayt n tiddukla “Tiɣri n tmeṭṭut», teɣli s terṣaṣṣin n terbaet n 03 n yirebraben ɣef 10 d wezgen di temdint n Tizi-Wezzu. Tasebḥit tamcumt, Nabila teffeɣ-d deg wemkan n uxeddim-s, akken ad-truḥ ad-teḥder “La sustenance de these” n yiwet n temdakkelt-is di tsedawit n Tizi-Wezzu. Yiwet n ṭumubil tessarked imman-is deg yiwet n wemḍiq, syen 03 n yirebraben I yettwaselḥen fɣen-d akken ad-xedmen lebɣi-nsen. Nabila tettnadi amek ara-tessarwel imman-is, ad-tḥareb ɣef tarwiḥt-is, ur tufi-ara win ara tt-iɛetqen. Yiwen ger yemcumen-nni yeṭṭef-itt-id, yewwet-itt s tarṣaṣt ɣer twenza, iḍlaq-itt di lqaɛa, syen arebrab niḍen yesmar aɛbar n tarṣaṣin ɣef qaru-is. Ass-mi tettwenɣa Nabila Ǧaḥnin, tesɛa 29 n yiseggasen di laɛmer-is, tella “Architecte», terna ɣer watmaten-is izzayriyen d tizzayriyin i iruḥen d asfel ɣef tmurt n Lzzayer. Yura d akken issem n Nabila Jaḥnin ad-yenǧar di lluḥ ad-yeqqim i lebda. Nabila, teqdec aṭas deg umussu n yinelmaden di tsedawit, anda i tuka deg uslluli n yiwet n sindika taɣelnawt n yinelmaden. Syen tlul-d yiwet n tiddukla n tlawin “Tiɣri n tmeṭṭut” i yetwasnen aṭas di tmurt n leqbayel. Imi kra n temliliyin, kra n leqdicat d tmesbaniyin id-thegga tiddukla-agi n tlawin tettejmaɛ-d d lewluf n tlawin, imi tiddukla-agi tesmaḥssis i yal tameṭṭut yenḥafen, naɣ tin yesɛan ugguren akken bɣun illin. Nabila tesɛedday tagara n yal ddurt di tudrin n leqbayel, anda I tettmeslay akked tlawin yef yal taɣawsa, u tettemlili d tdukliwin ama n tlawin ama n yargazen sqardacen iɣeblan yellan u gellun-d s tifrat. Akka, ɛeddan tura 21 n yiseggasen ɣef ɣef tmenɣiwt n Nabila Ǧaḥnin, maca xas truh issaɣ-is yegra-d d anagi ger-annaɣ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Tutlayt akken yebɣu lḥal atteqim d ttutlyat, mači d-aɣbel. Yelha i wemdan akken ad yissin akk tutlayin n-umaḍal. D-acu kan, asmi ara attres deg weḥric n t’sartit tettuɣal dayen nniḍen. Dayen yaɛnan tutlayt taɛrabt deg t’murt nneɣ. Adabu seg wass n timunent ar ass-a yesnulfa-d tasertit n-uɛareb. Tasertit-agi « teḍla » ɣef t’metti nneɣ, ama deg uɣerbaz neɣ deg weḥricen nniḍen. Akken ẓran wid i faqqen i t’sertit-agi n-udabu, iswi-ines d-aɛerreb n weɣref Amaziɣ, acku ur yettmeslay ara tutlayt n-udabu. Tikta n « el umma el ɛarabiya » tewwi abrid-is…Arrac imaziɣen uḍenen deg yiɣarbazen. As-tini-ḍ ttidiren snat n tudartin. Deg wexxam, neɣ deg berra ttmeslayen s teqbaylit, ma deg yiɣerbazen ttbeddilen tutlayt akken ad meslayen s taɛrabt. Akken i ngar tamawt, arrac nneɣ uɣalen garen-d aṭaṣ n yimeslayen s taɛrabt, cennu-n cna s taɛrabt, llan kra zemren ad ak-inin: » d-acu-tt akka tamaziɣt-agi? ». Ayagi yusa-d seg t’sertit n-uɛarreb! Adabu ur yaḥbis ara dagi kan, yewweḍ alarmi id yesnulfa yiwwet n lɛefsa akken ad « yemḍel » aɣref Amaziɣ. As mi yewweḍ ad « izaɛzaɛ » allaɣen n warraw nneɣ s t’sertit-agi n-uɛarreb, yewwet lsas n t’metti taqbaylit s yiwwet n tikli yecban tin n lafɛa. Aɛerreb yewweḍ tura ɣer yimɣaren d temɣarin nni ur nekcim laɛmar nsen ɣer uɣerbaz. D wigi kan id yegran deg t’metti nneɣ ttmeslayen taqbaylit yeṣfan, s tikta n teqbaylit n zik. D wigi id yegaren lemɛun lakked d yisefra n Si Muḥ Umḥand, lakked Ccix Lḥusin, tagi d Tassekla taqbaylit taqburt, tin ur lemden ara warraw nneɣ deg uɣerbaz aɛrab! Lukan mazal Muḥya ad yini : » Ah a ddin uqabac ! ». Akka, myal aseggas, iɣerbazen ssawalen-d i yimɣaren akk d temɣarin akken ad lemden tira d-umeslay n taɛrabt. Tagara-agi, ssiwlen-d deg taddart n Tuɣezza, id yezgan deg t’ɣiwant n Cerfa deg lwilyaya n Tubirett, timɣarin akken ad ruḥen-t ad mmarkin-t iman-nsen-t deg uɣerbaz akken ad lemden-t taɛrabt ! Akka ihi, timɣarin nni tiḥninin i ḥarzen taqbaylit n lejdud ad ruḥen-t ad lemden-t taɛrabt ɣer tagara llaɛmar nsen-t, akken « ad s’hetrifen-t » s tutlayt n El Mutanabi ! Nutenti yennumen isefra n zik nni lakked d timucuha, ad bedlen-t tikta akk d yidles i yiles ! N’na zwina attelmed « ellif d-elba », netta-t yennumen tettgalla s « waḥeq n Sidi el mufaq » ? N’na Ǧeǧiga attaru « baba » d « mama » s taɛrabt, netta-t tennum t-cerru azemmur akken at ssisen zzit d yiniɣman? N’na Megduda yennumen icewiqen s taqbaylit attecnu « ṭalaɛa elbadru ɛalayna » ? Ṛuḥ a a taqbaylit ṛuḥ…

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax.Y 

  
 S ddaw laɛnaya n useqamu unnig n timuzɣa, theyya-d t ɣiwant n At Wasif d comité des fêtes n temdint n At Wasif rreḥba tamezwarut i tmedyazt n At Wasif (premières poésiades d At Ouacif). Tameɣra-agi ara i dumen tlala wussan d tajmilt i umedyaz n temnaṭ Lḥadj El Mokhtar Ait Said.

 Mebla tameɣra-agi i wumi iga irebbi Usqamu Unnig n Timuzɣa, ad d-tessekfel acḥal d amedyaz n temnaḍt n At Wasif.

 Ad d-nesmekti belli ussan-a n tmedyazt ad faken azekka n tlata

  
 Mi ara alin-t tseddaṛin n lḥamu yelha kan i yiwen as-yerwel ɣer yil. Dinna xarṣum ulac tisiqas n lḥamu. Ula d lxater yeggar-ed nnehta. Wa yesɛedda aseggas allen-is ur d-tteksen-t ara deg ittafsaren d yedlisen, kra nniḍen d tazla s axeddim. Tallit n unebdu d tin n westaɛfu n wallaɣ lak d tfekka. Di tmurt nneɣ, anebdu, tineggura-agi, yettekkes-as amkan-is i tefsewt. Werɛad ara tekkaw tmiqqewt taneggarut n lehwa, iṭij ad d-icɛel tiṭ-is. Uqbel anebdu, imdanen ttarran lwelha-nsen ɣer tẓegwa. Din ttwaɛṛaḍen ɣer ubeḥri d tili. Xas akken imḍebren n tmerrit ur ttaken ara azal i wayen tekseb tmurt, maca tineggura-agi imdanen bdan ttarran lwelha-nsen ɣer imekwan yuklalen zyara. Atas n twaculin i yrezzun ɣer tzegwa. Ulac d acu yifen aya, di tagara n ddurt, ladɣa ma ddan yak iɛeggalen n twacult. Tizzegzewt ur s-ibeddel ara udem yiṭij. Imɣan glan-d yak s ujeǧǧig ɣef ayeg ttezzin yeglafen n tzizwa. Ifrax sriffigen ɣef isekla, ma walan-d abelɛuc, neɣ kra yettenbiwilen ɣef lqaɛa ad d-qemɛen fell-as. Di Tizi Wezzu d Iɛekkuren id d-ijebden tamuɣli n yemdanen. ɣef teɣzi n useggas, rezzun-d akken ad ksen lxiq w’ad d-agmen seg tala id d-yezgan nnig n webrid. Tettazalen am yiḍ am zal. Di tefsewt neɣ deg unebdu imdanen ur d-ttafen ara abrid ɣur-es. Adeg-agi yettwassen s cbaha-s lak d tezdeg-is. ɣef teɣzi n webrid, ama ɣef yidis ayfus, neɣ ɣef zelmaḍ, afexxar yetteɛraḍ-ed imesberdan ad d-hebsen. Ibekkan, ula d nutni, zgan tama n webrid, ttqabalen imesberdan s wezmumeg, ayen yettaǧǧan atas n lɣaci ad d-hebsen ɣur-sen akken ad d-etfen ttsawer yidsen. Di tallit n remḍan, tiwaculin, mi rzan-t lmeɣreb rezzun-t-ed ɣer tezgi n Iɛekkuren akken ad sɛeddin-t tameddit deg umkan-agi iselken deg icekkaren n zbel d wafrasen yettnemḍaren deg teɣmert ɣer tayeḍ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Fatiha K. 

  
 «Awal d wawal» d wa i d azwel i yefka umedyaz aqbayli atrar i udlis-is wis sin n tmedyazt, i d-yeffɣen deg taggara n wagur n ɣuct yezrin. D ammud n yisefra ideg i d-yura 24 n yisefra s tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Deg tazwara imi d azwel ad as-yefka i usefru amenzu deg udlis-a. Tis snat imi asefru-a «Awal d wawal» uqbel ad yilli d asefru, yella-d d adiwenni ger umedyaz dda Muḥend d yiwen n umɣar deg taddart, yesteqsa-t ɣef umezruy azzayeri, yeḥka-as-d tidet n tedyanin akken ḍrant, seg rebεa uxemsin armi d tafsut taberkant (1954-2001). Dɣa yules-d ayen i d-as-id-yenna deg usefru. Ma d isental iɣef i d-yewwi awal deg wammud-a n yisefra-ines, mačči d yiwen neɣ d sin gar-asen: amezruy, tameṭṭut, lbaṭel, tirrugza, ameɣras, tuggdi, tajemilt i Mulud Mεemmri, d ugerawliw Ʃmiruc, d Lewnnas Maεtub, Lla Kahina, tutlayt n tmaziɣt, leɣrba, lḥif, taneḥyaft, taεecret taberkan n rrebrab… Muḥen n Ayt Ʃebdella d amedyaz, d ameɣras u d amaru. D amedyaz imi yebdan tira n yisefra deg yiseggasen 1974-1975, lḥaṣun azal n 40 n yiseggasen n usmedyez. D ameɣras imi yenḥaf aṭas ɣef tutlayt n tmaziɣt, afakul i d-yesbganen tayri-is i tmaziɣt, acku nettat d yiwen gar 24 n imdanen-nni iwwin ɣer deg tedyanin n 80, d ayen i d-yeskanen d akken d yiwen gar wid inuḍḥen ɣef tugdut d tmaziɣt akken ad tidir ass-a. U d amaru imi yura sin n yidlisen n tmedyazt s tmaziɣt. Ad d nesmekti imeɣriyen d akken Muḥend n Ayt Ʃebdella yessazreg-d yakan yiwen n wammud n yisefra di tefsut n 2013, d win i wumi isema «Aḍref».

<p style="text-align: right;"> ADAOUN Abdelghani. 

  
 23 n yiseggasen-aya segmi yettwanɣa uneɣmas, ameɣras Smail Yefsah, yiwen umaziɣ n taddart n Tala Amara deg tɣiwant n Tizi Rached, lwimaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ilul deg 29 tuber aseggas 1962 , yelmed deg Tizi Uzzu , deg yiɣerbazen yemgraden gar-asen: aɣerbaz n Hamoutène , yuɣal s aɣerbaz n Mouloud Feraoun, syin, ikemmel leqraya-s deg Larbaa N Ath Yirathen, taggara deg tseddawit n Lezzayer. Yelmed tussna n tsertit. Mi yekfa leqraya, yebda lxedma deg tiliẓri n Lezzayer, d yiwen iḥemmlen lxedma-s. Ala taḍsa ɣef wudem-is yeččuren d asirem d tafat , d bu-tebɣest. Smail yefsah, mi yella ixeddem, ul-is yeḥreq imi tutlayt n taɛrabt d tefransist ṭṭfent adeg ma d tamaziɣt ur tt-id-yewwi umeddaḥ deg teqsiḍt. Asirem-is, ad ilint tedwilin s tmaziɣt, acku asmi i t-id-teɛreḍ Massa khadidja ɣer umaṭṭaf wis sin, aseggas n 1991, iɛedda-d deg tedwilt n War isem ideg iqeddec Belaid Ath Mejkane, yeseteqsa-t amek yuɣal d aneɣmas dɣa yerra-as-id belli iruḥ am netta am wid yekfan leqraya ur d-ufin ara axeddim, iqbel-it Crif Mammeri yenna-as: ‘’neqbel-ik’’. seg wassen, yeṭṭef amekkan –is, ixeddem deg 21 boulevard des martyrs, yerra-d akk ɣef yisteqsiyen n Belɛid, ɣer taggara yenna-as: ‘’asirem-inu ad ilin Yiqbayliyin deg tiliẓri s waṭas, imi tutlayin-nniḍen i yeṭṭfen amkan’’ , yenna-d, diɣ: ‘’ sya ɣer sdat, ad ilint tedwilin s tmaziɣt , imi akka am wakken d iɣriben di tmurt-nneɣ’’. Yerna yemmeslay-d ɣef wayen i d-yettheggi ɣef Dda Lmulud , yenna-d daɣen: ‘’ur nqebbel ara win ara ad aɣ-yarren deg rrif’’. Yiwet n tikkelt, ggulen deg-s, suɣen fell-as At ičumar ɛinani srid ,ɣas akken ittkemmil axeddim –is mebla tuggdi. Am yal ass tanezzayt , Smail yeṭṭef abrid-is ɣer lxedma , ur yeẓri ara d acu ara t-yettrağun , maca agraw n yiɛdawen n tudert akken yeqqar Lwennas, sqaṭɛen-as-id sdat n uxxam-is, deg Bab Ezzouar, wten-t s ujenwi , rnan-as tlata terṣaṣin , ddmen tarwiḥt-is deg wass n 18 tuber 1993 , deg lbaṭel smaren idamen n yilemẓi n 31n yiseggasen akken yebda yeğğuğğug , seggden-t yimcumen, yerna akken yewweḍ wass wis 40 ɣef zzwağ-is. Isali, yuɣ-d akk tamurt n Lezzayer. Aneɣmas yecban wagi, yettwanɣa di lbaṭel, ur yukir ur yenɣi. Ulac win ur nettru ara fell-as. Ass n temḍelt-is, ttnadin akk medden anida i d-tezga taddart n Tala Amara, akken ad t-walin i tikkelt taneggarut. Yeqqar Lwennas: ‘’ruḥen-aɣ yirgazen ur nuklal’’. Ur ilaq ara ad nettu. Tajmilt ara as-rren Leqbayel, d asirem i yessarem : tamaziɣt ad tt-nelmed , ad tt-naru, ad tt-nesselmed , wa ad teṭṭef adeg -is am tutlayin-nniḍen ad ak-yerḥem Rebbi a Smail Yefsah.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia  

  
 Agerruj iɛerqen n Yuba II, d azwel n udlis yura Frank Joseph s teglizit ɣef yifri n ugerruj issewhamen n Illinois n unẓul, akked wamek wwḍen Ifriqiyen n ugafa neɣ Imuritaniyen – Inumidiyen ɣer umenẓaw (continent) amarikani, aṭas n leqrun uqbel Christophe Colomb.

 Deg-s ugar n 100 tiwlafin n tɣawsiwin i d-sskeflen.Yewwi-d awal ɣef usikel amezruyan n ugellid Yuba II d yiwlanen-is (marins) Imuritaniyen -Inumidiyen seg ugaraw Aṭlasi, i wakken ad ɛiwden lebni n tmetti-nsen deg umaḍal amaynut. Issefhem-d adrug (mystère) n Washitaws, yiwen udrum n yifriqiyen, i temlal tanemzagt (expédition) n Lewis d Clark deg tazwara. Deg 1982 Russell E. Burrows, assegaḍ n yigerrujen deg Illinois n unẓul, yemderkal deg yiwen umkan anda ttwaffren imrigen iqburen, isɣunen d yisebdar (sarcophages) n wureɣ deg yiwen yifri ubɛid. LLant deg-s, daɣen, tiblaḍin n udɣaɣ yettwarun s tugniwin n yiserdasen n ṛṛuman, ihudiyen, imasiḥiyen imezwura d yiwlanen n tefriqt n utaram. Tiɣawsiwin-agi, glant-d s ummenuɣ ameqran gar yimusnawen n tsenzikt (archéologie) : ma d tiɣawsiwin n tidet neɣ n uɣurru. Ayagi, yeǧǧa Burrows ad yessedrem anekcum n yifri-nni. S unadi deg ugar n 7000 n tɣawsiwin i d-yettwakksen seg yifri uqbel assedrem-ines, Frank Joseph, yesfhem-d amek wwḍent tɣawsiwin-agi alarmi ttwameḍlent deg tlemmast n Yiwunak Yeddukklen n Marikan. Yebda-d s Cléopâtre Séléné tameṭṭut n ugellid Yuba II yeseddan Tigelda n Muritaniya – Numidya. Mbeɛd timenɣiwt n mmi-tsen Ptolémée sɣur Umenkad (Empereur) Caligula, kkren-d Imuritaniyen – Inumidiyen mgal udabu n ṛṛuman ad ṭṭfen abrid-nsen ɣer tmurt ittusemman imir-a Ghana. Din, bnan tanawt n yiɣerruba i wakken ad ssiklen seg ugaraw Aṭlasi ɣer tmurt i ibeɛden ɣef ṛṛuman, anda ssarmen ad ɛiwden lebni n tgelda-nsen. Wwin yid-sen agerruj ameqran llan ttnadin fell-as sin yimenkaden n ṛṛuman mebla tkubbert (succès) : isɣunen n ureɣ n Cléopâtre d temkerḍit taqburt n Yuba II. Adlis-agi, deg-s xilla n tewlafin timaynutin n tɣawsiwin i d-yettwakksen seg wadeg n Illinois n unẓul. Agerruj iɛerqen n Yuba II, d yiwet n temɛayt yesseqnaɛen i izemren ad aɣ-teǧǧ ad nɛiwed tamuɣli ɣef umezruy aqbur n Temrikt d wakken yezmer lḥal ad illin Imuritaniyen – Inumidiyen wwḍen ɣer umenẓaw amarikani azal n mraw d semmus (15) n leqrun uqbel Christophe Colomb.

  T. Umaziɣ 

  
 Mohamed Oudiai, d yiwen gar imeɣrasen imeqqranen i yefka udrar n Ait Aissa Mimoun, yesɛa azal d ameqqran deg tegrawla tazzayrit 1954-1962, ladɣa deg temnaḍt-agi n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Ulamma ur nesɛi ara aṭas n yisallan fell-as d yimuhal-is deg wakud-nni n lgerra, maca nra ad as-nexdem tajmilt swayen nessen kan fell-as. Ilul ass n 04 seg waggur n furar deg useggas n 1921 deg taddart n Tahanouts, yetabaɛen ussani-nni ɣer udewar n Djbel Aissa Mimoun. Yebda yettnaḍaḥ deg yiseggasen n 1940 deg Umussu aserti aɣelnaw azzayri. Deg useggas n 1948, yunag i tikkelt tamezwarut ɣer tmurt n Fransa. Syin ceggɛen-t yimḍebbren n tmurt i wakken ad ittekki deg unejmuɛ (congrès) n Bruxelles yellan deg tmurt n Lalman i d-yellan deg waggur n meɣres 1954. Ussan 29, 30 akked 31 seg waggur n yulyu1955, ittekki deg uheggi i unejmuɛ n Tahanouts i yuɣalen yettwassen s yisem n(Congrès de la Soummam) imi deg temnaḍt n Soummam i yettwaxdam ass n 20 ɣuct 1956. Ur ssawḍen ara ad xedmen deg taddart n Tahanouts, imi werɛad kfin anejmuɛ mi yewweḍ lexbar s irumyen. Deg tallit-nni, yella tama akked yimḍebbren n lwilaya tis tlata, yecban: Krim Belkacem, Amar Ouamrane, Yazourene iwumi qqaren (Briruc), Mohamed Issaid akked Bessalah Amar iwumi qqaren Amar n Baṣ. Syin akkin yuɣal d imḍebbar amezwaru ɣef tama n At Wagennun.Yettwanɣa sɣur yirumyen ass n 07 deg waggur n yennayer n useggas n 1957, tlata kan n yiseggasen mebɛed mi tendeh tegrawla n 1954, yeɣli deg unnar n umennuɣ deg tama n Isseklaouiyene deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Tajmilt i ssawḍen wat tmurt-is ad as-tt-ren d asemmi s yisem-is i yiwen d sin n yiɣerbazen imenza, yiwet deg Tikoubaine wayeḍ deg Ikhelouienne, akked tesnawit n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Akked tira n yisem-is deg sin yisebdaden n yimeɣrasen yettwaxdamen, yiwen deg Thaguemount wayeḍ deg taddart-is Tahanouts. 

  Adaoun Abdelghani  

  
 Ma yella uɛeṭtel deg waṭas n yisenfaren deg yiḥricen yemxalafen n lebni deg Uqbu, icudd ɣer lexsas n tedrimt d leɣla n sselɛa, maca aɛeṭṭel n usenfar n useggem n unnar n ddabex uḍar n tɣiwant n Uqbu dayen-nniḍen. 15 n yiseggasen n uraju,umazal. Mebɛed imi hebsen lecɣalat deg-s s sebba n uḥebbus n tkubanit i d-yelhan s useggem-is. Xas akken uɣalen-d lecɣalat n useggem-s di tuber 2008, seld I as-d-fkan tadrimt ilaqen yiɛeggalen n Usqamu i wakken ad ikemmel useggem-ines , maca ar ass-a, kullec yeḥbes. Ma, zik, sebba-s, d lexsas n tedrimt i d-yellan deg tɣiwant , segmi i d-yella lxilaf gar lmir d yiɛeggalen n tama taxsimt deg yiseggasen iɛeddan. Ma d tura, ur neẓri ara d acu i d sseba. Win tetsteqsaḍ deg yimdebbren n tɣiwant akk, yeqqar ur zriɣ ara!. Aya dayen i d-yeglan s lemḍara i waddal di tiɣiwant s umata. Yeǧǧa inaddalen d ttrebuyaɛ n ddabex uḍar n tɣiwant yemxalafen , ur ttafen ara amkan i deg ara heggin iman-nsen i temliliyin i ten- yettrajun di talɣuɣin ideg ttekkin .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim.Ben 

  
 Ass n amhad-a (lexmis) n sdat-nneɣ, 26 deg wayyur n meɣres i ara tebdu tfaska taɣelnawt n tmedyezt tamaziɣt deg teẓrigt-is tis mraw ed kraḍ. Deg sin n ⁯ wussan kan, ad d-yaweḍ uzemz i yettwarǧan seg wacḥal-aya sɣur kra wid i tecɣeb tutlayt-is, mačči kan imedyazen i terza srid temlilit, maca daɣen ula d imeɣnasen, iselmaden, imnadiyen, imyura, inaẓuren s umata, akked yineɣmasen daɣen. Deg teɣzi n kraḍ n wussan ihi (26, 27, 28 seg meɣres), ad asen-d-tili tegnit i wid ara yilin deg Udrar n Fad ad ḥeḍren i wahil s wazal-is, send ad d-nini d amerkanti. Deg wass amenzu ihi, ad ttwaldint tefsarin zik alama d tazeggant n wass. Aya ad t-id-teḍfer temzikkent n tewlafin n tnaẓurt Suzan Guhot. Deg kra n wakud syin akkin, ɣef 13s30, ad tili teldayt tunsibt n tfaska. Send ad d-yawi mass ɛli Syad asarag ɣef Tutlayt n tlawin. Syinna, ad tettunefk tegnit srid i yimedyazen deg uḥric amezwaru n umsiẓwer, alama d asteɛfu n yimensi ad tkemmel tegnit n tmenna n yimedyazen. Deg wass wis sin, sem 27 deg meɣres, ad yili tasebḥit uḥric wayeḍ n umsiẓwer alama d imekli. Mara d-uɣalen yiɛebbaḍ ččuren, ad d-tesken Massa Buxellu Malika asarag ɣef: Udmawen n twetmin deg tira n Mulud At Mɛemmer. Mara d-yili kra n usteɛfu s tecrift, ad d-ternu Wataḥ Linda asarag nniḍen ɣef: Wurar n lxalat. ɣef 17sr30, ad tili teywalt ɣef tnebgit n yiseɣ n tfaska massa Malika Dumran, i ara igen tameɣra n ccna ɣef 21sr00 deffir n yimensi lwaḥi ed yilemẓi Wali ɛebdelɣani. Ma deg wass aneggaru, 28 deg meɣres, send ad ttwaberḥen yigmaḍ n umsiẓwer n tmedyezt, ad ttwasɛeddin yirupurtajen n wid i d-yufraren deg tfaska yezrin. Tamdelt n tfaska taɣelnawt n tmedyezt tamaziɣt ad d-taweḍ dinna mettwal 13sr00 seld imekli.  ⁮

<p style="text-align: right;"> M.K 

  
 Ilmend n usmekti n wass n yiminnig d umuli wis 53 γef tmesbaniyin n 17 tuber 1961, anda id-ffγen deqs n Yizzayriyen di tmanaγt n tmurt n Fransa (Paris), suturen tilelli d yizarfan-nsen. Syen iγallen n laman i yellan seddaw laεnaya n Maurice Papan, nγan nnig n 200 imesbaniyen, neqren-ten γer wasif n « la seine », imi Fransa ur tummin-ara s ubaxix yeḍran ass-nni n 17 tuber 1961, ur umminen-ara s waḍu n tlelli id-issuḍen. 53 n yiseggasen id-yezzin γef tedyant-agi tamazrayt, izzayriyen anda ma llan gzin swayen i yeḍran i yeγriben-nnaγ. Γef aya deqs n tmesbaniyin id-yellan di yal timnaḍin n tmurt n Lzzayer d tmurt n Fransa.

 Taγiwant n Yiεekkuren tella di tiεad, imi ass n 16 tuber, yella-d usemmi n yiwen n webraḥ n baylek id-yezgan s zdat n wexxam n tγiwant iεekkuren γef yisem n tedyanin « 17 tuber 1961 », s leḥdur n yemḍebren n tγiwant n Yiεekkuren, tawacult tagrewliwt ger-asen tudsa taγelnawt n yimjahden, tiddukla tafidiralit n tirni n uslelli aγelnaw n fransa, d tdukla n tarwa n Cuhada d waṭas niḍen. Iswi n tmesbanit-agi tamazrayt, d asfaḍ uγebbar γef umezruy n Lzzayer zeddigen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Amenzu n yennayer d ixef n useggas ɣer Yimaziɣen. D tawwurt n useggas akken i as-qqaren yimɣaren. Yetta-as-d yal ass 12 deg yennayer n uzemz agraɣlan (seg tlallit n Ɛisa ar ass-a). llan wid i d-yeqqaren, yettas-d deg 13 neɣ 14 deg yennayer.

 Acu kan, ɣer taggara, sfugulen-t s waṭas deg wass n wis 12 deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Awal ‘’Yennayer’’, d awal uddis : yen=yiwen ; ayer=aggur (aggur amezwaru). D aggur amezwaru n useggas ɣer yimaziɣen, acu kan mačči d ass asmi tebda tfada (calendrier) n tmaziɣt, axater amenzu n yennayer neɣ tawwurt n useggas ɣer yimaziɣen, d ayen yellan seg zik n zik, meɛna tafada-agi, tennulfa-d kan deg useggas n 1980. Ayen ara nwali ɣer taggara n uḍris-a. Yettili-d usfugel n umenzu n yennayer seg yal tama n tmazɣa neɣ ɛad akkin : seg Tegzirin Tiknariyin alamma d amda n Siwa, seg yilel agrakal alamma d Tinirit. Acu kan, yal wa d wamek i t-yesfugul. Deg tama n tlemsan, ttgen ayen iwumi qqaren ‘’Ayrad’’ (Izem). Ad kkren warrac, ad rren isɣumen yecba izmawen i wudmawen-nsen, syin ad d-ttezzin i yixxamen n taddart, ad d-jjamaɛen isufar n wučči. Tameddit, ad ten-awin ɣer yiwen umekkan anda ara ten-id-sewwent tlawin u ad ten-ččen yimezdaɣ ara d-yemlilen ɣer din. Seg tama n tmurt n leqbayel, ttgen uftiyen akked seksu s uyaziḍ, neɣ seksu bu sebɛa n yisufar. Tikwal, sebɛa n ssenf n tgella. Ass-nni, ad d-tennejmaɛ twacult akken ma tella u ad d-tezzi i yimensi n yennayer. Ula d iminigen, wid yemmuten neɣ tullas i zewǧen, ttgan-asen amur-nsen deg terbut : ad asen-d-seddun tiɣenjawin. D taswiɛt, diɣ, anda ttqerricen i warrac imecṭaḥ. Ma ɣer yicawiyen, zyada ɣef yimensi-a, ttbeddilet tlawin iblaḍen n yinyen akked tgejda n yiqiḍunen. Ihi, Asfugel n yennayer, neɣ tiwwura n useggas, mačči dayen i d-yennulfan deg yiseggasen-agi kan ineggura. D asfugel i yellan seg zik n zik, ur yeqqin, diɣ, ɣer Cacnaq,akken bɣan ad t-sneṭṭḍen kra n yimdanen i d-yettawin awal ɣef umezruy n yennayer. Tamsmalt n yennayer, weḥd-s, tamsalt n ugellid Cacnaq, d tayeḍ. Amek i d-tennulfa tfada (calendrier) n yimaziɣen. Tafada tamaziɣt, d ayen i d-yennulfan deg useggas n 1980 sɣur umeɣnas acawi Amar Negadi i yettwassnen s yisem Amar Acawi. Yella umeɣnas-agi i ilulen deg usegas n 1943 deg Tbaten, deg Ugraw n Yimaziɣen (Académie Berbère) deg tmurt n Fransa. Yeqdec deg-s kra n lweqt kan deg yiseggsen-nni 1970. I wakken ad yefk izamulen i umennuɣ d leqdic ɣef tmaziɣt, ixemmen ad yesnulfu tafada n yimaziɣen imi iwala tella tfada n yimasiḥen akked tin n yinselmen. Ihi, inuda acḥal d aseggas i wakken ad d-yaf ansi ara t-yebdu. Yuɣal, yefra-tt d rray-is, u yewwi nnican seg wasmi yuɣal Cacnaq d agellid ɣef yiferɛunen (yesbedd tagelda tis 22) deg useggas n 950 uqbel tallalit n ƐIsa. Aya, ɣef wakken i t-yufa netta deg unadi-ines, imi ar tura mazal ur tefri temsalt-agi n wazemz-agi. Ihi, yekker Amar Negadi, yexdem-d tafada tamaziɣt deg useggas-nni 1980 u yebda amenzu n yennayer 2930, ass-nni 1 deg yennayer 1980. Syin, uɣalen sseɣtan-t, rnan-as ussan ɛlaḥsab n umgarad yellan ǧar tfada Julien akked tin Grégorien. Teffeɣ-d tfada-agi i tikkelt tamezwarut deg tesɣunt Assaɣen n Tiddukkla n Uɣref Amaziɣ anda yella Amar Amaziɣ. Akka, i d-ttlalent ula d tanfusin ɣer yigduden-nniḍen. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Asenǧaq n yimaziɣen 

 Ula d asenǧaq n yimaziɣen yettwaxelq-d sɣur iɛeggalen n Ugraw n Yimaziɣen deg useggas n 1970. Syin i d-yennulfa. Yesɛa tlata n yiniten i tesɛa tmurt n tmazɣa : amidadi, yemmal-d ilel (lebḥar), azegzaw neɣ aḥcayci, yeskan-d aẓaɣar d yidurar, awraɣ, yesban-d sseḥra. Deg useggas n 1972, rnan-as asekkil-nni ‘’Z’’ 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Azamul n usekkil  

 Am wakken yexdem Amar Negadi, yekker-d, diɣ, wayeḍ i wakken ad d-yernu azamul-nniḍen i tmaziɣt. Wagi d Hocine Zekri i ixedmen s wuzzal asekkil ‘’Ж’’ n ugemmay n tifinaɣ. Yefka i talɣa n usekkil anamek n urgaz ilelli imi i yettak cbih ɣer umdan. Yerna awal amaziɣ, yebɣa ad d-yini ‘’Amdan ilelli’’. Syin ɣer wass-a, aṭas n umecwar i d-telḥa temsalt-agi n tmaziɣt. S tuffra akked tmeḥqranit, ɣer uselmed-is deg yiɣerbazen, ɛinani. Yenna umedyaz deg wawal-is :’’rriɣ tajmilt tameqqrant i wid-ak-nni, alef akked tteɛmeyya, i d-ḥesben segmi nettwaɣ. Limmer ur aɣ-t-id-nnin ara, ur neẓri ara d acu-aɣ. Sḥesbet-aɣ-d ar ass-a, wid i d-yeggran yid-s ad nennaɣ. Anwi wigi? D imeqqranen ɣef yimeqqranen, d imecṭaḥ s ddaw Rebbi. Qisset, feṣslet, xiḍet, selset-asen isem i aken-iɛeǧben, fell-asen i d-nettɣenni’’. 

  <em>Ihi, Aseggas ameggaz ara d-nnini nekni.</em> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine Moula 

 
  
 Akka ihi, imi i ɛedda waggur n Ṛemḍan, timeɣriwin uɣalen-t-d s ṭaqa. Yal ass ttamaɣra, dagi deg tama n Ṣummam. Yagi ussan n lǧemɛa lakked d sebt, anda cna, zhir akk d cḍiḥ « ttfeggiḍen » deg tuddar d temdinin n Ṣummam. D-acu kan, deg zhu-agi n t’maɣriwin, yella yiwen « umgaru » neɣ ma tebɣam « iniɣ » ger…iḍebbalen lakked, iwumi qqaren, « Idiǧiyen » (les DJs) ». Ɣas akkeni, iseggasen-agi ineggura, les DJs yewwin aḥric muqren, imi ssawalen-asen-d sya u sya akken ad xedmen timaɣriwin. Akka i d lɛada tamaynut i d-yennulfan deg t’metti nneɣ yewwin abrid ɣer tatrara, ɣas akken abrid mazal-it iḍul ! Maca, cna aqbur yeṭṭafar ɣer deffir idiǧiyen-agi » (les DJs). Akka, mazal iḍebbalen lakked ẓurna, « kečmen » ɣer wannar neɣ ɣer t’qaɛett n t’maɣriwin, ɣas ma yella idiǧiyen ewwin aḥric muqren. Ɣas akken, llan-t aṭaṣ n t’waculin yessawalen i yiḍebbalen akken ad xedmen timaɣriwin am zik-nni, s laqder, s lḥerma lakked lɛezza. Lukan adenini tidett, cna n-iḍebbalen yesɛa sser, s lɣiḍa d ṭbel. Ulac kra n-imeslayen i ǧerḥen, neɣ ur n laq ara aten slen tiwaculin am kra n tezlatin i srusun idiǧiyen, akka am tid n Ṛay ur nesɛi azal. Aẓawan n-iḍebbalen yeṣfa am aman, ulac degs imeslayen, ḥaca aẓawan yesɛan sser d lhiba. Yerna dayla nneɣ, d-idles nneɣ. « Ɣuri, nekkini, d-iḍebbalen axiṛ n idiǧiyen. Iḍebbalen sɛan sseṛ, aẓawan nsen yefɣed seg yidles nneɣ. Ulac imeslayen uṛ nlaq aṛa, d lmuziga kan. Nek ḥemleɣ-ten, imi ssaḥmayen taqaɛett, ṛennu-n acuddu i tegmatt. Awah a ṛebbi kan ad qqimen akka i lebda uṛ ttṛuḥu-n aṛa! » iɣ-d yenna yiwen n mas. D-acu kan, medden xedmen aṭaṣ n laḥsab geṛ iḍebbalen lakked d-idiǧiyen. Tadṛimt tezga-d gaṛasen, imi idiǧiyen rexsen ɣef iḍebbalen. Ɣef ayagi ahat medden uṛ asen-d ssawalen aṛa s waṭaṣ. Maca, ɣas akkeni, iḍebbalen mazal sɛan azal muqṛen, yagi deg tuddaṛ i d-yezgan nnig iduṛaṛ, anda wwin amkan muqṛen geṛ imezdaɣ!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Mazal ar ass-a, cfawat n temẓi ẓẓan deg wallaɣ-iw. D tagara n smayem n unebdu, ɣlint-d kra n tmiqwa n ugeffur, yessemḍi lexrif. Msired inurar, tessared akk inurar. Kkreɣ-d zik, ddiɣ d yemma ɣer wurti n tneqlin, ad d-nelwi. Mazal nnda ɣef yiferrawen n yimɣan. Lsiɣ tamḍelliwt, wwiɣ taqecwalt deg ufus-iw. Yemma, tesbur abeḥnuq ɣef uqerruy-is. Tbubb aqecwal ɣef uzagur-is, teṭṭef amextaf deg ufus, tesɛukkuz fell-as, deg ufus-nniḍen, teṭṭef taqecwalt. Nɛedda tamazirt qbel. Nekkes-d akermus. Sder n ukermus, iruḥ s teɣzi, yeṭṭef akk aḥdid n tmazirt. Teddem-d yemma tameḍṛact, teɣzi-ines tugar lqedd-is s uzgen. Tebda tqerrem-d tikeṛmusin yentan deg yiḥbulen. Tin i d-tekkes, ad tt-tessers di lqaɛa. Tettruḥ deg uḥbul ɣer wayeḍ. Tesrusuy-itent di lqaɛa d tiɛemmurin. Tferren-d tikeṛmusin tisewwaɣin, tettaǧǧa tiwraɣin akked tzegzawin. Terra tameḍract s amkan-is. Teddem-d kra n tseḍwa n umageraman, tebda tseffeḍ syis-sent tikeṛmusin-nni yellan di lqaɛa, akken ad ɣlint tsennanin-nsent. Mi tekfa, tettaṭaf-itent-id s tqernit n yiḍudan-is, teggar-itent ɣer tqecwalt. Ur nɛeṭṭel ara nṣubb ɣer wurti n tneqlin, iṭij mazal ur d-yesṭuṭec ara. Nelqeḍ-d axuj d tiɛemmurin, nger-it s acekkaṛ waḥd-s akken ad t-nawi i lmal ad t-yečč. Nebda alway akken kan la d-yesṭuṭec yiṭij. Yemma, tiṭ-is fell-i, tettmal-iyi-d amek i ilaq ad d-lwiɣ. Uqbel ad kseɣ tabexsist seg uqeḍmir-ines, ilaq ad tt-ṭṭfeɣ ma terḍeb neɣ teqqur. Ma terḍeb, ad tt-id-kkseɣ, ma teqqur ala, mazal-itt d tagurbizt. Mi ara d-kkseɣ tabexsist sentayeɣ accaren n yiḍudan-iw deg uqeḍmir akken ur d cellxeɣ ara taclimt-ines. Ma yella d iniɣem, tekkes-aɣ-t-id s uqeḍmir-ines. Yemma, ur tezmir ara ad tali tineqlin, tettemlelluy. Tettɣimi seddaw, tesseknay-d ifurkan s umextaf. Ma d nekk ttaliɣ ar sufella, ttnadiɣ gar ifuṛac, tekkseɣ-d tibexsisin ffren iferriwen. Deg yiferrawen i d-yettquccumen, tneggi-d lliqa ɣef yifassen-iw, tečča-yi taglimt-iw, kemzeɣ. Yemma tettmal-iyi-d akk ismawen n tneqlin, yal tikelt mi ara nruḥ ad d-nelwi. Yettban-d umgarad-nsent di tbexsisin i d-ttaǧǧant : ta d tiberkanin, ta tibelbaḍin, tiyaḍ d tibelbulin…atg. Ula d tineqlin, yal taneqlet tesɛa isem-is. Yella imelwi, tabakurt, acamlal, tabelɣenjurt, tajenjart, tamuḥbult, ajanjar… Sneɣ amawal n urti seg uqerquc alarmi d iniɣem. Mi d-neččur aqecwal, ad d-nezzi s axxam. Deg ubrid-nneɣ, ntekkes-d tizwal deg yinujjal i d-iḍeggren tiriwa ɣer ubrid, nsenni-tent deg yiguza di tɣedducin n yimɣi n ubsis. Deg uxxam, yemma, tefren ayen i d-nelwi d tiɛemmurin. Tettḥizi-d tibexsisin ara nečč ma d iniɣman, tefser-iten i yiṭij akken ad qqaren, d tazart. Taggara n lexrif d taḍuṛi n yifer, nettruḥ nesseɣlay-d ifer n tneqlin, nfetter-it iḥeṭṭem, nettak-it i lmal i tett-it.

  Fahim Messaoudène 

  
 Ussan n umezgun wis 9 ara d-yilin d tajmilt i Muḥend u Yeḥya deg tezrigt tis rrebɛa n warraz n Muḥya i wureɣ n uḍris n umezgun ifazzen s tmaziɣt, ad d-ilin aseggas-agi ass n larebɛa 6 deg waggur n duğamber 2017, akked uzekka-yin n lexmis. Ad d-tili timsizzelt-agi deg tezrigt-is tis ukkuẓ n tmezgunt Muḥya n wureɣ i yuran s tmaziɣt, deg uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yasin n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. I wid yebɣan ad ttekkin deg temsizwert-a, mazal-asen ddurt-agi sdat-nneɣ i ujerred deg wunuɣ n uttekki. Imi ass n letnayen-agi sdat-nneɣ 20 deg waggur n unbir i ttiɛad aneggaru n ujerred, ihi ilaq ad sersen iḍrisen-nsen n umezgun send 20 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Ttunefken-asen tlata n yimukan i usersi n tmezgunin-nsen, ad xtiren gar: Tenmehla n yidles d Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer neɣ deg Uxxam n umezgnu amniḍan Kateb Yasin n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yellan tama n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan (APC) n Tizi Uzzu. Ad d-bannen yigemmaḍ ineggura n temsizwert-a, yerna ad d- tili tukci n warrazen i tlata n yiḍrisen ara d-yufraren deg temsizzelt-agi, ad tili ass n lexmis 7 deg buğamber 2017, deg Uxxam n umezgnu amniḍan Kateb Yasin n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli deg tezrigt-agi tis tlala n warraz n Mouhia n wuraɣ i uḍris n umezgun i iffazen, ilaq ad yili yura s tmaziɣt. Ma dayen yeεnan arrazen ad ilin kraḍ, i tlata n yiḍrisen ara d-yufraren. Yella win n wuraɣ s wazal n 150.000.00 DA, ma d wis sin n lfeṭṭa s wazal n 100.0000.00 DA, ma d wis tlata d win n udrenz (Bronze) s wazal n 50.000.00 DA. Ad d-nsmekti idisan idelsnen i d-iheggan leqdic-agi, gar-asen: Tanmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, akked Usqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya ( A.P.W) n Tizi Uzzu, s tallelt n Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu, s lemεawna n Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yasin. Ma d tura ad d-nuɣal ɣer tmeddurt d yimuhal n urgaz-agi ameqqran. Ilul Mass Muḥend u Yeḥya s yisem-is neṣṣaḥ Abeddlah Muḥya, deg wass amenzu n waggur-agi n unbir deg useggas n 1950 deg Yiεezzugen, yemmut deg tmaneɣt Paris deg tmurt n Fransa, ass n 7 deg waggur n duǧamber 2004. Yettuneḥsab d ababat neɣ d tigejdit n umezgun s teqbaylit, am wakken daɣen i yeqdec aṭas deg tmedyazt. Am wakken daɣen i ixdem tasuqqilt d tserwest i waṭas n tceqqucin seg tutlayin-nniḍen, gar-asen-t: “Am win yettraǧun Ṛebbi” (En attendant Godot) n Samuel Beckett, “Aneggaru ad d-yerr tawwurt” (La Decision) akked “Llem-ik, ddu d uḍar-ik” (Exception et la règle) n Berthold Brecht, (La jarred) neɣ “Tacbaylit” swayes yettwasen aṭas…atg.

  Adaoun Abdel Ghani 

  
 Ugar n umelyar n yinselmen seg umaḍal i iqublen lɛid tameẓyant ddurt-a. Limer d lebɣi, ass n lɛid, yettuneḥsab d ass n tmeɣra, d ass n tegmat, d ass n smaḥ akked talwit.

 Anda yebɣu yili uɛeggal n twacult, ad d-yerzu s imawlan-is i wakken ad ɛeggden akken lwaḥid. Ɣer Leqbayel, zik-nni, d taswiɛt anda ferrun uguren i d-ttmagaren ɣef teɣzi n useggas. Xas mɣunzan iɛeggalen gar-asen, maca ass-nni n lɛid, ad mlaɛin, ad msamaḥen : ur ttḥiwwisen ara anwa i iḍelmen wayeḍ, ad walin kan amek ara zḍen tagmat-nsen. Ula gar twaculin, yetti-d waya. Ass-a n wussan, kra din iruḥ, yečča-t zzman. Mačči kan d tagmat deg wayeg i tent-uɣen, ula d leɛwayed, bɣan ad ten-beddlen imi la d-ttawin kra n tikerkas anda-nniḍen. Ttagin ad neṭṭqen ula ɣer win ur ten-necbi. Acḥal n twaculin i yuɣ iceqqiqen s ssebba n lefɛayel-agi. Limer yal yiwen ad yeg aktazal i yiman-is, ad iwali d acu yexdem n wayen yelhan ɣef teɣzi n waggur-agi n Remḍan, ahat ad as-d-iban ma yella dɣa d aggur n rreḥma akked talwit neɣ d aggur n wurrif akked cwal ? Ma yella d aggur n umɛiwen akked useddeq neɣ d aggur n tkerkas akked txidas ? Acḥal n terwiḥin i iruḥen deg waggur-agi n Remḍan, ama seg twaɣiyin n yiberdan, ama seg umennuɣ gar yimdanen. Aya seg tama, seg tama-nniḍen, ad naf ula d taxriṭ n twacult tezwi. Ɣef wakken i d-yenna Mass Zaki Hariz, aselway n Tiddukla tazzayrit n yimsidiren (FAZ), tserref twacult gar 80 000 idinaren ar 100 000 idinaren deg waggur-agi n Remḍan. Ladɣa deg llebsa n warrac imi ɣef wakken iwali, tewwi-d ɣef twacult ad tserref gar 30 000 idinaren alamma d 35 000 idinaren i wakken ad taɣ iceṭṭḍen i dderya-as. Aya, ma tella twacult-a tesɛa kan tlata n yiɛeggalen. Wameg tadrimt tettzad ɣef wakken ttzidin iɛeggalen. Zyada ɣef tlaba-agi, laqen-as, diɣ, i warrac-agi imeẓyanen ilellucen s wayes ara leɛben, axater ma ulac-iten mačči d lɛid ɣur-sen. Syin akkin, wulmen warrazen i wid meqqren, yal aɛeggal s tɣawsa-s. Ɣef wakken nwala deg ssuq, 80% n llebsa yettnuzun deg tmurt, tekka-d seg tmura n Cinwa, n Ṭṭurk, n Lhend akked Sebbunyul u yerna ɣlayet mačči d izli. Tawaɣit deg yiceṭṭiḍen-a, ttwxedmen s lexyuḍ n istitik. Xas akka, mazal lmesruf ur yekfi ara, laqent tẓidanin i wass-nni n lɛid. Yettili-d uheggi n lgaṭu kra n wussan uqbel lɛid. Aṭas n leṣnaf n tẓidanin i d-tewwi ɣef twacult ad d-theggi i yiɛeggalen neɣ i trezzaf. Rnu ɣer wanect-a, imensi n wass n lɛid. Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, lɛid tameggazt.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Youcef YEFSAH d amjahed u d netta i d-yewwi tikti n lǧameɛ-agi asmi yella d aselway n tɣiwant n Tizi Rached. Xas akken yemmuger-d aṭas n wuguren fell-as, meɛna ur yebri ara i ṭṭbel deg waman. Yedder armi iwala asenfar-is yemmed. Nemmlal-it deg taddart-is, Tala Amara, newwi-d awal ɣef yiɛewwiqen i yesɛa asmi i bennun lǧameɛ-agi d wayen akk i as-d-xelqen imi yugi ad yeḥbes lebni-nni s yizamulen imaziɣen.

  Aɣqmis n Yimaziɣen : amek i ak-d-tusa tikti n lebni n lǧameɛ-agi ? 

  Youcef YEFSAH :  ɛeddaɣ-d seg Hydra deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt, walaɣ yiwen n lǧameɣ yebna s yizamulen-agi n tmaziɣt dɣa, nniɣ-as i wacuɣer ur nxeddem ara yiwen am wagi deg taddart-nneɣ. Din din, nudaɣ ɣef win i t-yebnan, Mass Chabane Dahmane, wwiɣ-t-id ɣer taddart i wakken ad aɣ-yebnu yiwen am winna. Ha-t-an, ihi, amek i d-tusa tikti-agi.

  Asmi i t-tbennum, tesɛiḍ uguren. 

  Youcef YEFSAH :  lǧameɛ-agi d asenfar gar waṭas n yisenfaren i xedmeɣ i taddart n Tala Amara asmi lliɣ d aselway n tɣiwant n Tizi Rached. Tella taddart, ulac d acu i tesɛa : la abrid wala ayen-nniḍen. Ihi, deg 4 n yiseggasen i sɛeddaɣ deg tɣiwant, bɣiɣ ad xedmeɣ aṭas n lecɣal i tɣiwant n Tizi Rached s umata.

  Lebni n lǧameɛ yettwaḥbes kra n yiseggasen akken, acu n sebba ? 

  Youcef YEFSAH : y ettwaḥbes asmi i yi-wwin ɣer lḥebs. Selkeɣ kan 4 n yiseggasen n tselwayt, wwin-iyi ɣer lḥebs. Sɛeddaɣ-d 13 n wagguren, ffɣeɣ-d : l’amnistie n Chadli. Teqqim akken teswiɛt temmenḍar kra n yiseggasen armi d asmi i d-kkreɣ, nniɣ i yimezdaɣ n taddart ilaq ad d-nexleq taseqqamut n taddart. Nexleq-itt-id, dɣa ikemmel lebni n lǧameɛ-nni.

  Llan wid yugin udem i as-tefkam i lǧameɛ-nni ? 

  Youcef YEFSAH :  llan wid i d-yennan d lǧameɛ n yiṛumyen ara tbennum. Xelqen-d ula d taseqqamut n lwilaya, tusa-d ad twali amek ara t-thudd. Nnejmaɛen i wakken ad d-afen ttawil isehlen i uhuddu-ines. Acu kan ur ṣsawḍen ara imi i asen-lliɣ d axsim. Akka i nessaweḍ ɣer taggara n lebni n lǧameɛ. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M  

  
 Lḥemla n wefraq n tleqamin naγ ṭjur n uzemmur γef ifellaḥen, id-heggan yemḍebren n waḥric n tfellaḥt n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu  d win id-yellan deg annar ddurt-agi yezrin, di merra timnaḍin Dγa srabes n waḥric n tfellaḥt n temnaḍt n Wizgan sfaydin-d deg ahil n useggas-a 2015 s wazal n 44500 n tleqamin naγ ṭjur n uzemmur ilfayda n 1780 n yifellaḥen i ittewfarqen γef 05 n tγiwanin, tigi d Wizgan, At-Zikki, At-yeğğar d Yillulen n Umalu yetabaεen dayra n Wizgan akked tγiwant n Yifiγa yetabaεen dayra n Yiεeẓẓugen. Iswi n lḥemla-agi n wufraq n ṭjur n uzemmur d asebγes n wuẓẓu n uzemmur i usnarni n waḥric n tfellaḥt deg yidurar, imi deqs n tzemrin i inegren deg yiseggasen yezrin sebba n tmeswin yeččan tamurt n leqbayel. D tagnit yelhan daγen iwesnarni n tdamsa n tmurt leqbayel, imi asafar-agi n uzemmur d lγella n lebda swayes ttidiren imezdaγ-is u d azamul n tmurt leqbayel.       <span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 I lmend n usmekti n wass agraɣlan n ugrud , tiddukkla “Tafat” n taddart Awrir At Hesyun akked tiddukkla Ixulaf n Uqbu, heggant-d, taggara n ddurt–agi yezrin, sin wussan n uḥesses d useɛlem ɣef lemqadra n yizerfan n yigerdan i wass n 18 d 19 deg unbir 216. Leqdic, yella-d deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen n tɣiwant n Ukfadu. <span style="text-align: justify;">Ahil d amerkanti , llan deg-s yisaragen , timsikniyin , amezgun akked anecrah”clown”. Ass-nni amenzu n temlilit, yella-d beddu n tmeɣra s uledduy n temsikent ideg i d-ttwasnaɛten yimahilen ixedmen warrac d teqcicin. Atas n tugnatin i d-yettwaṭṭfen ɣef liḥala deg ttidiren yigerdan n ddunit s umata, ladɣa wid n tefriqet .” Di lawan-agi tura i nettmeslay akka deg Ukfadu ɣef yizerfan n yigerdan , atas n yigerdan i d-yesserwel akka ṭrad di tmura-nsen ɣer tmurt-nneɣ. Amedya: wid n Nnijer i d-yusan ɣer dagi ɣer lwilaya n Bgayet , atas deg-sen i yegganen ddaw n tqenṭyar war taduli neɣ učči yelhan deg ussan-agi n tegrest. Nessaram ad d-lhun yis-n yimdebbren n Yitri Azeggaɣ Azayri akked wid terza temsalt ”. Akka i d-yenna yiwen ubabat, allen-is ččurrent-d d imeṭṭawen. Ɣef lewhi n 10h30, yella-d umeslay gar kra n yimejjayen n tnefsit akked d kra n yimussnawen n lqanun d yimawlan, ɣef wamek ilaq ad yili uqadar n yizerfan n yigerdan. ‘’Iswi n temlilit-agi, d aqader n yizerfan n ugrud. Wamma iḍrisen banen si zman aqdim , ulac kan wid ara ad ten-iqadren. Di tilawt, ass-a aqlaɣ nettwali ttilint-d ttaɛdiyat ɣef lḥerma n yigerdan yal ass nebla akukru. Nessaram ad ifak waya di tmurt-nneɣ” i yettweṣṣi Mass Ziyad Djarrah s yisem-is d aselway n tiddukkla Ixulaf n uqbu. Deg wass wis-sin, ikemmel leqdic s tqufet i d-heggan i warrac. Ferqen-asen arrazen , lsan akk warrac d teqcicin tiqelmunin , xedmen ticraḍ s yiniten ɣef wudmawen-nsen. Tameddit n was, tekfa tmeɣra s ccḍeḥ , d unecraḥ. Nessaram, ad ifak zzur ɣef yigerdan anda ma llan deg umaḍal. </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim benhamouche 

  
 Četkayen imezdaɣ n temnaḍt Thameur id-yezgan ɣef leb3ed 5 yikilimuṭren ɣef tmanaɣt lwilaya n tubiret lexsas ameqqran di lkiran usiweḍ imi sɛan kan 3 lkiran dayen yettnerni di leɛtab n yimezdaɣ ladɣa ixeddamen ixeddmen di temnaḍin nniḍen anda ttafen uguren akken ad ruḥen ad qḍun lecɣal nsen neɣ ad rzun ɣer tɣiwant , Si tama nniḍen tettuneḥsab tamnaḍt-a n tamar seg temnaḍin timeqqranin di lwilaya n tubiret am wakken daɣen lexsas -agi yettili s tuget di lweqt n warrac mi ara ruḥen ɣer uɣerbaz acku ur ttawḍen ara di lweqt iwilmen dayen iten-yeǧǧan ad kren tafeǧrit akken ad ruḥen di tsaɛet ilaqen , ɛlaḥsab nsen akken ttrajun azal n tsaɛet neɣ ktar deg ubrid akken yerra d imsebriden iten -yettawin imi d yiwen ubrid , ɣef waya ssuturen akken ad asen-rrun lkiran yesawaḍen ɣer lwilaya d temnaḍin nniḍen iwakken ad sifsen leɛtab nsen ladɣa lkiran yettawin ɣer uɣerbaz i warrac lakul rnu s annect-a ssuturen akken ad d- afen tifrat s lɛejlan d usnerni n wakud yesawaḍen ɣer temnaḍt nsen di yal lweqt . 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas Abdelhak 

  
 Ur as-nsell akka deg Wehran neɣ deg Seṭṭif, kra n yiɣermanen (citoyens) n Tmurt n Yezwawen yeqqel-asen ugzam n ubrid ugar n tannumi dɣa teddun ad t-sserbun d idles. Seg wacḥal-aya tura, taluft-a n usekker yiberdan tban-d d aɣilif amezwaru n yal yiwen seg-neɣ. Anehhar yuɣal iɛuff abrid imi sanda yeffeɣ ad yaf asergel ara t-id-yerren s axxam-is. Deg Bgayet ladɣa, aseggas-a n 2014, yezga ugzam n ubrid am wakud fell-aɣ, almi yeqqel d anezgum daɣen d amezgun. Seg Lberj n Mira ɣer Yiderginen, ɛeddi akin i Suq Letnin, Aweqqas, tsemmḍeḍ alama d Bgayet neɣ d Aqbu, yal mara sɛan yimezdaɣ aɣilif akked yinesdabuyen idiganen (autorités locales), ur asen-yewwiḍ lgaz n lḥiḍ, neɣ ur asen-muggen yiberdan, neɣ wissen d acu llan sutren ur ufan win i d-yerran i tiɣri, ad ruḥen ad ččaren abrid d iblaḍen ad t-gezmen i yiman-nsen, i wayetma-tsen. Lɛada-ya ur nemɛin iban ur d-tettawi ayen iwatan, imi dɣa taggara-ya imezdaɣ n yiwet n temnaḍt qeflen abrid, iwacu? Acku ttnarafen ɣef wiyaḍ i igezmen abrid daɣen. Akka a Tamurt n Yezwawen! Ɛni d tidet wi ixeddmen akka ur ufan ara tabadut (lḥel) nniḍen bac ad sutren kra neɣ d kra, almi i tent-yuɣ usaɛdi ɣef umcum? Ur d amuḍin yewweḍ deg wakud i sbiṭar, ur d amzenzu yessaweḍ sselɛa-as ɣer tḥuna, ur d axeddam ǧǧan-t ad iɛeddi akken ad yexdem ɣef tarwa-s, ur d asdawan yelfa tasdawit i tezrawin-is (études) ɣef yiman-is. Ihi am wakken seḥbasen tudert ɣef waytma-tsen ed yiman-nsen. Rnu-as ttḍurrun tadamsa (économie) n twilayt-nsen send takkit (kullec). Acku ma nesteqsa: ɣef anwa gezzmen abrid? ɣef lwali? ɣef uselway n tdayra? Win n tɣiwant? Ah ! nutni ur nṭerren ara seg wanect-nni, d ayen yerzan kan iɣermanen. Rnu atan yennulfa-d ula d agzam deg yiḍ akken gan tikkelt iɛeddan imezdaɣ n Tenia deg yiberdan iɣelnawen wis 21 ed wis 26. Ihi yewwi-d tura ad nesteqsi iman-nneɣ, sanida akka nteddu s lɛada-ya? Acimi mačči d ayen nniḍen ara neḍfer? Acku send ad yeg walbaɛḍ kra yessulef tazwara ad isenned ɣef lkaɣeḍ, meḥsub ayen yessutur, amedya, ma i tɣiwant-is, ad yaru tabraṭ n tisutriwin, syinna ma yufa-d amtawa (accord) akked yemḍebbren yelha, ma ulac ad iɛeddi ɣer tigawt nniḍen, maca a win yufan mačči d agzam n ubrid.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Samir Ait Belkacem d yiwen ixeddmen asisleg (le doublage) ɣer teqbaylit n waṭas n yisura yettembiwilen, tura, ha-t-an ad d-yettheggi ad, yerr asaru l’Opium et le baton ara yuɣalen Asebsi d uɛekkaz.

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen : Amek i tebdiḍ amecwar-ik deg wannar n usisleg ?  

  Samir Aït Belkacem :  Asisleg, mačči d ayen i d-nesnulfa, d ayen i yellan si zik. Asmi nebda, nebda s uqessar : nexdem-d Pučči akken kan anekkes lxiq, ur neẓri ara d akken ad yeɛjeb i medden anect-nni akk. Nella neqqim di taddart, dɣa tusa-d tikti akken ad nexdem asisleg n usaru yettembiwilen, imir nextar-d Pučči. Ad rreɣ tamawt d akken mačči Pučči i d-as-nsemma, azwel-is d Agni n udfel, maca imdanen semman-as Pučči imi d isem n wudem agejdan deg usaru yettembiwilen. Dagi i nebda amecwar, dɣa imiren yeffeɣ wawal fell-as, imdanen d ayen i wumi yeɛǧem imi ur nummin ara ad walin taqbaylit di tugniwin am tida-k ,dɣa nenna-as ayɣer ala ur nettaɛraḍ ara ad nexdem wis ssin, nessuli cit deg uswir , syin nexdem takebbanit n usisleg i yellan d tamezwarut di tmurt n Lezzayer. Qqareɣ-d yal tikkelt d akken mačči d tasuqqilt i xedmeɣ, meɛna d amsasa (adaptation): nettawi-d tugniwin, nessekcam-as tutlayt. Tura ma yella nessiked ɣer uxeddim-agi, d acu i t-yerran akka mucaɛ ? Axater d taqbaylit i nesuzzur daxel. Imdanen mi ara ttwalin? tettun belli yettwaxdem s tutlayin6nniḍen, ɣur-sen amzun akken s teqbaylit i d-yettwaxdem acku newwi-d ayen akken i nettidir di tmetti taqbaylit s teqbaylit i yigurdan imectaḥ. Lukan i d-as-nexdim asisleg n sinima, ahat ur iseɛu ara amkan-a , mi xedmeɣ asisleg, walaɣ d akken imdanen, ttaken azal i uḍris i tenfaliyin i d-yettilin daxel n usaru ugar n tugniwin, acuɣer ? nekni nettnadi awal, iswi-nneɣ mačči kan ad nesseḍs, maca nessuzur taqbaylit s yisura , nesqucuḍ-d, nettawi-d inzan, isefra ayen yugaren akk anect-a, imi aql-aɣ nxeddem s waṭas i ugrud : ayen akk ara d-yini uwudam deg usaru i yettembiwilen, ttalsen-as-d yigurdan.

  Syin txedmeḍ Narniya, Li Mučuču d Ɛli d waɛli , Ḥku-aɣ-d ugar ɣef yisura-agi ?  

 Asmi xedmeɣ Narniya, ṭṭfeɣ deg-s tlata n wagguren akken uriɣ ɣef uḍris. Di tagarra, ulac ur d yewwi kra. Ɛli d waɛli daɣen kifkif, syin yenna-yi-d yiwen ur i yi-ɛjiben ara imi ulac deg-sen tinfaliyin-nni, ulac deg-sen aẓawan-nni, dɣa dagi fehmeɛɣ d acu i ttnadin lɣaci. Syin nexdem Li mučuču i ixeddmen taḥbabart (succès) ɣer yigerdan, imi giɣ tamawt d akken d tinfaliyin-nni i d-squcḍeɣ si tmetti taqbaylit i d-ttalsen, dɣa d anect-a i d iswi-nneɣ nekni, mebla ma nettu daɣen taḍsa i ttnadin imectaḥ.

  Tettafem-d iɛewwiqen di amsasa (adaptation) ?  

 Aɛewwiq amezwar i d-ufiɣ mi ara tiliḍ d amezwaru ara yebdun di taɣult anda ara tiliḍ d amenzu i t-ikecmen , si tama n l’ONDA mi ara sen-iniɣ ‘Asisleg’ ur iyi-d-fehmen ara d acu-t uxeddim-agi, ɣur-sen am wakken d tasuqqilt, nekk qqareɣ-asen ur lliɣ ara d win ixeddmen tasuqqilt , si tama-nniḍen azayez (le public)) ur yezri ara d akken le doublage d axeddim mačči d tukksa n lxiq. Sɛiɣ zher imi si tazwara mi bdiɣ deg wannar-a leqdic, yefka-d lɣella-s , di tmurt-nneɣ ixus aṭas uxeddim-a

  Tewwiḍ arraz n Ostana, mmeslayeɣ-d fell-as?  

 Di tefriqt xtaren Lezzayer, di Lezzayer xtaren tamurt n leqbayel, di tmurt n Leqbayel xtaren Samir ait Belkacem. Ihi, Ostana d yiwet n temnadt di tmurt n Ṭelyan (Italie), tagi d tiddukkla Chambre do i ixeddmen ɣef tutlayin ur nettwassen ara, neɣ tutlayin tidersiwin (minoritaire), ssnulfan-d arraz-agi i ttmuddun i wid ixeddmen ɣef tutlayin-agi .

  La d–tettheggiḍ yiwen usenfar d ameqqran, wagi d tirirt n L’opium et le baton ɣer teqbaylit. 

  Amek i ak-d-tella tikti-a?  

 D yiwen usenfar meqqren, d iseɣ, tikti tamezwarut, tella-d deg useggas n 2009 mi nella deg yiwen usarag, steqsan-iyi-d ineɣmasen ɣef yisenfar i d-ttheggiɣ, dɣa nniɣ-asen d akken ad d rreɣ asaru l’Opium et le baton ɣer teqbaylit.
