Asmi lliɣ mezziyeɣ, nella nettwali asaru-agi dɣa qqareɣ-as a win yufan asaru-agi s teqbaylit i yella. Aya, d tajmilt ara as-nerr i Umussnaw Mulud Mɛemmri. Asmi i d-yeffeɣ usaru deg useggas n 1970, yenna-as : “Limer d lebɣi-k a wul ha-t-an ad d-yeffeɣ s teqbaylit “. Ha-t-an ihi yewwḍ-d wass-nni anda ara nexdem akken i yebɣa Umussnaw. Ass-a, sawaḍeɣ-as tanemmirt i Ahmed Rachedi ɣef uxeddim i yexdem, deg useggas n 1969 ur yufi ara ad yexdem ugar imi imiren d ayen i yellan. Ma yella nuɣal-d ɣer uḍris i uriɣ i usaru, ṭṭfeɣ deg-s sin wagguren anda uriɣ s teqbaylit-nni n yimiren tinna n yiseggasen-nni n 50. Imi asaru yettmeslay-d ɣef tedyant n yisuggasen-nni n 50, ur zmireɣ ara ad sxedmeɣ tinfaliyin-nniḍen. Ddmeɣ-tent-id akken kan llant imiren, amedya yella : salam aɛlikum, yella llahu akbar, tinfaliyin-a akka ara qqiment, deg usenfar-a, ad ɛerḍeɣ ad skecmaɣ iwudam i ixeddmen i yidles-nneɣ ahat ad yili Lewnis At Mangellat, Idir, Malika Domran, Karim Abranis, akken daɣen zemren ad ilin imyura imi Mulud Mɛemmri d amyaru, bɣiɣ ad tekkin di leqdic-a akken ad-as nerr tajmilt i Umussnaw-nneɣ. Deg usaru s tutlayt n taɛrabt, yella uwadem isem-is Abbas, nekni awadem-a, ad-as nefk isem n Ɛmirruc , ma yella d asdukkel n leṣwat (le montage) ad yili di tmurt n Canada imi dinna i llant ttawilat ugar n da , imi d asaru ara d yeffɣen di sinimma. Ma yella d Mass Ɛessad si tama-s, yenna-d d akken ad as-nexdem i usaru snat n tufɣiwin: yiwet d taɣelnawt, tayeḍ d tagraɣlant. Ihi, ilaq ad yili d ayen igerrzen. Ma yella d asisleg, ha-t-an akka ɣef 15 n wussan ad yebdu leqdic deg ustudio. Uqbel aya, ad tili temsizzelt deg Uxxam n yidles n Mulud Mɛemmri akked Bgayet anda ara d-nextir tuɣac ara d-yesneṭṭqen iwudam .

  Yella kra n umaynut i d-theggim ?  

 Ih, yella Haydi ara nedbu deg yiwen n wakud d “l’Opium et le baton “, dagi dɣa ara sslemdeɣ axeddim-a i yiwen ugraw. Yella daɣen usaru s tutlayt Tahendit isem-is Veer Zara ara d-nerr ɣer teqbaylit.

  Awal-ik n taggara…  

 Ssarameɣ asenfar-a ad ten-yeɛjeb, ssarameɣ daɣen axeddim n usisleg ad yettwassen akken ilaq di tmurt-nneɣ. Amedya kan, isura-nni n Yiṭurkiyen i d-ttaran ɣer tutlayin-nniḍen, ttarbaḥen aṭas deg-sen aṭas n udrim, mačči kan daya, imi ssawḍen ad aznen idles-nsen d laɛwayed-nsen di tmura-nniḍen. Nettwali ass-a timɣarin-nneɣ snent amek i ttidiren di tmura-nniḍen imi ṭṭafarent isura-nsen. Ayɣar ala ula d nekni ur nessawaḍ ara ɣer uswir-a. Souhila Yamani

  
 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Isufar </span></span>

 1 n tebṣelt tameqqrant – 3 n tfenza n ticcert – 1 lkas n 150 ml de n leɛdes – 1 n tedgert n zrudiya – 1 n texsayt taleqqaqt – 1 n tbaṭaṭat lɛali – 1 n tedgert n lleft – lkas n lḥemmez – 2 à 3 tomates râpées – 1 n tɣenjawt n ṭumaṭic yeẓdan – lmelḥ, filfel aberkan d teḥcict  

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;">  </span>

 

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Sewwet aksum daxel n zzit akked lebsel, ticcert, thcict akked yifilfel aberkan, syin ternum-as lxedra-nni yettwagezmen. Tanfem-as kra n ddqayeq, imir terrem ṭumaṭic akked leḥdes, ternum-as 2 n litrat n waman d ṭumaṭic yeẓdan. Ǧǧet alamma yuzyag-d, imi sneqqset i tmes alamma yewwa s ttawil-is. Mi ara yeww uksum, rret lxedra-nni-nniḍen akked lmaqarun, ur t-ttxummut ara. Yettmačča d aḥmayan, terrem s ufella-s zzit uzemmur. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;">  </span>

  
 Ilmend n umulli wis 36 n tefsut Imaziɣen 20 di yebrir 1980/2016 agraw n yinelmaden d yiselmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas Lɛerbi At ɛmer n At Yanni xedmen akk ayen yellan ger yifassen-nsen iwakken ad ssiwden ad ggen yiwet n tmeɣra igerrzen aṭas iwakken ad rren tajmilt i lerwaḥ n widak-nni iruḥen d asfel akken ad teḥyu tutlayt-nneɣ d udles amaziɣ ihi ilaq fell-aɣ yal asseggas ad ten-id-nettmektay. Agraw-a ihegga-d yiwen n wahil d amerkanti. Di tazwara, bdan-d s tɣuri n yiwen n udris « Tafsut Taberkant  » s ɣur Belḥuas Tilelli tamekfaḍut n tmeɣra, di tis snat, yiwet n terbaɛt n cna n yinelmaden  » Polifonie  » cnnan-d tizlit n  » Ideflawen  » isem-is  » Ma tecfam a yatma ?  » id ifɣen deg usseggas n 1982, cnnan-d tizlit n Yidir  » Tawrirt yettwattun « . Xedmen isteqsiyen ger tneɣriyin n uswir wis ukuẓ ɣef tengayin-a: Tamaziɣt, Tarumit, Taɛrabt, Amezruy, Tussna, Tinglizit, Tusnakt akked Tsengama. Di tayed, ɣran-d kra n yisefra: “Mulud At Mɛemmer « ,  » A macahu…! « ,  » Tamaziɣt  » akked  » Tafsut imaziɣen  » Yiwen n ugraw n yinelmaden xedmen yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun id yeqqaren belli lǧil n tura ur yessin ara azal n 20 yebrir; tafsut imaziɣen! Ttɣilin d ass n cdeḥ. Tagrayt n tceqquft-agi tettweṣid imdanen akken ur tettun u rnnekren ara laṣel-nsen axaṭer ay-agi d lɛib. Ɣran-d daɣen yiwen n udris  » Amager n tefsut  » d yiwen n unsay seg yensayen n Leqbayel, ula d unuɣ yella deg wahil. Inebgawen id yerzan ɣer uɣerbaz d yiwen n ugraw n tiddukla Tafat n umzel d ubddel n yilmeẓyen n Tizi Uzzu. Tarbaɛt n cna rnnan-d yiwet n tezlit taneggarut  » Izumal « . Di taggara, nwala-d asiher n lmakla tamensayt d usiher n tussna.Tannemirt s tusda i yakk inelmaden d yiselmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas ɣef leqdic-agi igerrzen. Deg usayrar adelsan  » Mulud At Mɛemmer  » xedmen asiher n yidlisen d win n tqendyar n leqbayel.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Daḥlal Canez 

  
 Ass-nni n ssebt, 29 deg maggu 2017, i d-yeffeɣ Album amaynut n ucennay ameqqran Lounis Ait Menguellet. Ffɣent-d tezlatin-a i lmend n usfuggel n 50 n yiseggasen n ccna n unaẓur-agi n teqbaylit. Ha-t-an akka tura, dɣa, deg Canada anda i yexdem ass-nni n lǧemɛa yiwet n tmeɣra tameqqrant i yeddan deg usfuggel-agi –ines. I usmekti, bdant tmeɣriwin n Ait Menguellet i lmend n xemsin n yiseggasen-agi, deg Tzeqqa Le zénith n tmurt n Fransa, ass n 15 deg yennayer, syin, ikemmel ccna-s s tmeɣra tameqqrant i yexdem deg Tzeqqa la coupole n Lezayer tamaneɣt, ass n 24 deg meɣres iɛeddan anda i yefka tadrimt i d-yewwi deg tmeɣra-agi i tdukla El Fadjr i yettḥaraben ɣef waṭṭan n uxenzir (le cancer). Mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut anda i yefka ucennay-a idrimen n tmeɣriwin i yexdem i tdukliwin neɣ i tudrin. Akka i iɛawen, deg yiseggasen yezrin, imezdaɣ n Barbacha deg lwilaya n Bgayet i wakken ad bnun yiwet tsebbalt tameqqrant n waman. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer tezlatin-agi-ines tineggura, ad tent-naf ttmeslayent-d ɣef waṭas n temsal n ddunit, meɛna asentel agejdan deg Album-agi, yeɛna amecwar n unaẓur : seg wasmi yebda ccna armi d taswiɛt i deg-i nella. Sebɛa n tezlatin ara naf deg Album-a : Tudert-nni, Taqṣiṭ-nniḍen, I wigad-iw, Ẓer kan, yella wass, Tajmilt i tayri d Slam i temẓi. Tudert-nni, yewwi-d awal deg-s ɣef umecwar-is xas ulamma ur yezmir ara ad d-yemmeslay ɣef 50 n yiseggasen n ccna deg yiwen n tezlit, deg kra n ddqayeq, akken i d-yenna : « Ur zmireɣ ara ad d-iniɣ deg yiwet n tezlit, 50 n yiseggasen n ccan. Meɛna, ferneɣ-d terra tmara». Akka, yefka-d agzul n wayen i iwala d agejdan deg tezlatin-is. Am wakken yerra tajmilt i wid akk i d-iḍefren amecwar-is seg wasmi yebda ar ass-a. ‘’D tajmilt i wid i yi-iḍefren seg wasmi bdiɣ ccna ar tura. Bɣiɣ ad asen-rreɣ tajmilt ula d nekk. I wid-nni i ḥemmleɣ, ḥemmlen-iyi ». I d-yenna seg yiwet n tdiwennit i as-yexdem uɣmis La Dépêche de Kabylie. Ula d tayri, tuɣ amekkan gar tezlatin n Lounis Ait Menguellet imi i tt-yecna. Yerna d tayri-nni n tura mačči d tinna n zik kan. « Ur tesɛi ara tayri lweqt. Nḥemmel deg yal tallit. Ihi, cniɣ ɣef tayri s umata. Anwa ur nḥemmel. ɣef wanect-a dɣa i as-rriɣ tajmilt », i d-yenna. Xas yecna-d ɣef temẓi deg tezlatin-agi-ines tineggura, meɛna d « Slam » i as-yessaweḍ i temẓi-s mačči d nndama i yendem deg-s acku ɣef wakken i d-yenna « Ur yendim, ur yenkir akk ayen yexdem ». S uẓawan s wayes yettwassen zik-nni, yerna-as kra n wallalen n tura d useqɛed n kra n temsal n uẓawan i yexdem mmi-s Djaffer, yeffeɣ-d Album-agi n ucennay ameqqran d ayen kan, ama i yimecṭaḥ, ama i yimeqqranen. Akka i d aḥeddad n wawal, ayen yelhan yelha. Asmuzget igerrzen i yal yiwen.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Yewwi Fouad Meslem tazibba n uraɣ (médaille d’or) deg talɣuɣa tagraɣlant n waddal n Karaté i d-yellan deg ussan iɛeddan deg Liverpool, tamdint n tmurt n Legliz. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, iruḥ ilemẓi-agi i yesɛan 29 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is ɣer temnaṭ n Liverpool deg tmurt n Legliz s tedrimt i d-wwin ifassen-is d wayen i as-fkan yimdukal-is. Yekcem unaddal-agi n temdint n Uẓeffun, talɣuɣa tagraɣlant n waddal Karaté (Championnat International de Karaté open) kata deg uswir ameqqran (senior). Swaya i d-ibeggen dakken win yesɛan lebɣi, ad yaweḍ sani yebɣa, ulac kra ara yilin d awezɣi. ‘’ibegden-d i umaḍal s umata dakken Aqbayli ur yezmir yiwen ad as-yerr tilist d amnaṛ’’. I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n temdint n Uẓeffun. Ma d wayeḍ iwala dakken Fouad Meslem “ yura isem-is gar yismawen inaddalen agraɣlanen s tidi n laɛtab-is, s yiḥulfan n tgeswaḥt-is, , s ifeddixen n tizert-is. Amezruy ad as–id-ittader i tsutwin i d-itteddun, ad asen–yuɣal d anza di tmeẓẓuɣin–nsen, yal mi ara ɣlin deg yirebbi n facal, ad ten-id-yessakki’’. Tajmilt I unaddal akked terbaɛt-is USA n Uẓeffun, d wid akk i as-yefkan afud. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kader Belaidi 

 
  
 Yal tiddukla amek id-ttheggi leqdic i wesfugel n tmeγriwin d tmesbaniyin n yedles n teqbaylit d tmaziγit s umata. Dγa Tiddukla Tadelsant Tiεwinin n Wizgan lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, sudusen-d yal seggas yiwen n leqdic s wazal-is i usebγes n tutlayt n tmaziγt, imi aseggas-a, tella-d temzizelt tis snat n tzabut s tutlayt n tmaziγt deg wexxam n yedles Colonel Muḥend Welḥağ n taddert n Wizgan, d timzizelt n waraz Mhenni Amroun, yiwen n unaẓur i tewwi tmettant ass n 19 yebiri 2012. Dγa imlend n usmekti n umuli wis 03 γef tmettant-is, d usmekti n umuli wis 35 n tefsut n yimaziγen, sudsen-d tamesbanit-agi n temzizelt n tzabut anda i yukkan 79 n yinelmaden n weswir alemmas d 52 n yinelmaden n weswir amezwaru, i yettmetilen 38 n yiγarbazen yemgaraden. Akken iḥedren nnig n 20 n yiselmaden n tutlayt n tmaziγt n temnaḍin yemgaraden n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, id-yeldin ulawen-nsen i leqdic-agi yesεan azal meqren.

 Dγa di temzizelt-agi tufrar-d tamsiwt Chaker Kamilia n uγarbaz alemmas  «Azoug Arab d mmi-s Saïd» n taddert  Ḥura akked Younsi Abdellah n uγarbaz amezwaru n umaγras « Belabbas Mohand Tahar» n taddert Ahriq. Di tagara n temzizelt-agi tella-d tikci n warazen n usebγes yesεan azal meqren, anda inelmaden merra iḥedren timzizelt-agi saramen akken ad-tuγalent yal tikkelt tmesbaniyin-agi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Deg wass d laz d fad, deg yiḍ ulac zhu ! Akka i d liḥala i nezra deg tuddar n tama n lɛarc n’At Ɛebbas, yesduklen 3 tɣiwanin: At Ṛẓin, Iɣil Ɛli lakked Buǧlil. Mti i yedden ccix n lǧamaɛ akken medden ad rẓen Ṛemḍan, wigi, ttruḥu-n s lemɣiwla ɣer yixxamen nsen akken ad « ɛemren » iɛebbaḍ nsen. As ma yeččar uɛebbuḍ d-učči, ilaq aqerru ad « iɣenni » ! Akka attebdu ṣahra n Ṛemḍan. Yal yiwen akken i ttisɛeddi, yal yiwen akken yezmer. Newwi abrid ɣer waṭaṣ n tuddar n lɛarc n’At Ɛebbas, anda nwala lixṣaṣ yaɛnan allalen n zhu (moyens de distraction). Ama deg Buǧlil, Iɣil Ɛli neɣ At Ṛzin -wigi ɛad d-iqerra n t’ɣiwanin-, medden ur ufin ara axir n leqhawi akken ad sɛeddin akud nsen lakked ṣahrat n Ṛemḍan. Ayat laɛraḍ, leqhawi n tuddar-agi lakked d tiyaḍ, ttuɣalen-t as t-iniḍ d leswaq ! Ččuren-t alarmi i « twezziɛen-t ». Laɛyaḍ, axbaḍ n diminu (Dominos), lgazuz, lqahwa, taḍṣa, askaɛkaɛ,duxan,…ulayɣar ad rnuɣ! Deg berdan lɣaci ttfeggiḍen am isaffen. Tikli akken ad serḥen-t lmaɛidat nsen. Arrac tturaren, ǧǧelliben sya u sya am cwaṭen. Ula d leǧwamaɛ ččuren alarmi « ttiqqin » seg imezalliyen (fidèles). Ulac ula d littaɛ akken ad ẓallen msakit. Akka, qwan lmumnin…leǧwamaɛ ulac. Deg tiddett, tuddar-agi ur sɛin-t ara ttawil s wacu ad sɛeddin imezdaɣ nsen-t ṣahrat n Ṛemḍan. Ulac akka timaɣriwin (galas) neɣ ticeqqufin neɣ ayen ara yessedhun lɣaci. D ttanezruft n yidles (Désert culturel) ! Ɣas akken zik nni (deg iseggasen n 1990) asmi yeqwa rebrab, ttilin-t deg tuddar-agi ticeqqufin, timaɣriwin yeksen iɣeblan ɣef ulawen n yimezdaɣ n tama-agi n’At Ɛebbas. Iseggasen-agi ineggura begnen-d akken medden uɣalen d yigellilen n yidles ! Ur asen d-yecliɛ ara yidles, awid kan učči i uɛabuḍ lakked tadrimt. Zik nni, ɣas akken uklac allalen, llan ilmeẓyen yessaḥmayen annar, i qedcen deg yidles akken ur yettɛuggun ara yiles ! Tura, ilmeẓyen n wass-a uɣalen d wiyaḍ, ur ssinen tiqqit !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Iruḥ-d yiwen n ubeɛɛuc yenna-id : -Kečč-i-nni d aḥeqqar, tḥeqreḍ-iyi ass n lǧemɛa yezrin deg uɣerbaz alemmas n at Yeǧǧar, anda i t-xeddmeḍ.

 Nniɣ-as : -Ass n lǧemɛa d ass n usgunfu, lliɣ deg uxxam-iw di Buzgan, tt-ferriǧeɣ addal di tiliẓri. Ma tebɣiḍ ak-d-awiɣ inigan iḥedren, taḍeggalt-iw, tameṭṭut-iw akked mmi -Teskiddibeḍ ay aselmad n tegnizit ! Kunwi s iselmaden teskiddibem aladɣa widen yesselmaden amezruy. Dɣa yeqqes-iyi yerwel, teffeg ur ẓrɣ anda iruḥ, teccuf tiṭ-iw ad as-tiniḍ d albaɛḍ iyi-wwten. -Imi kkfiɣ axeddim, ttxemmimeɣ wehmeɣ, amek-it akka ubeɛɛuc iyi-ḥeqqren sdat inelmaden-iw, yeqqes-iyi yerna yenna-id teskiddibeḍ. Ixus kan ad iyi-d-yini ur tessineḍ ara ad tt-sslemdeḍ. Cwi kan inelmaden-nni-inu maɛnen, ur ḍsin ara fell-i. Yiwet n tnelmadt tenna-id : -Aɛni d tameṭṭut-ik ik-yewwten ? Nniɣ-as : -Amer d tameṭṭut-iw iyi-wwten ad iyi-d-jemmɛem d iɣsan deg lqaɛa. Uɣaleɣ-d ar tikti-w tamezwarut, nniɣ-as : -D acu d-yeqqimen tura di tmurt-a. Zik-nni ḥeqren-iyi inemhalen, iselmaden akked inelmaden, tura arnan-d ula d ibeɛac. I ma ruḥeɣ ad inigeɣ ɣer tmurt anda ulac ibeɛɛac ? ahat ad kkfun wuguren fell-i neɣ ahat ad nnulfun imaynuten ? Amer ahat ad iyi-ḥeqqren ula d «les consulat» ad d-inin : -Ur nettak ara lviza i ubeɛuc am kečč-i-nni… Wwḍeɣ s axxam temmuqel-iyi-d tmeṭṭut-iw, as-t-iniḍ d l’extra-terestre i t-wala, tenna-id : -Anwa akka i ak-yesbezgen tiṭ-ik, Dɣa walaɣ-tt txemmel lekmam-is, nniɣ-as : -Arǧu, win iyi-tt-yesbezgen yuffeg deg yigenni, ur tezmieḍ ara ad t-qeḍɛeḍ. Yesla-d mmi yuzzel-d, dɣa yenna-as i yemma-s : -Argaz-agi yettak anzi ar baba !

<p style="text-align: right;">   Busad Ḥemar 

  
 azal n 34 n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt ara yebdun amahil-nsen deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt aseggas-a aɣurbiz 206/2017. Isalli-a, yefka-t-id umaru amatau n Useqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, Mass Si El Hachemi Assad i l’APS, smana-agi iɛeddan. ‘’Texdem tneɣlaft n leqraya asurif meqqer deg uselmed n tmaziɣt. Ha-t-an yewweḍ ɣer 34 n yimekwan n uselmed n tmaziɣt deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt, mebɛed mi llan kan sin yiselmaden dinna.’’ Yemmeslay-d, diɣ, yimḍebber n HCA, ɣef wazal yesɛa Uɣebaz Aɣelnaw Unnig n Bouzeréah i d-yessufuɣen iselmaden n tmaziɣt. Seg leɛḍil ara d-yili uselmed n tmaziɣt deg yal tama n tmurt n Lezzayer, ɣef wakken i mmsefhamen akked tneɣlaft n leqraya, akka tura, sselmaden tutlayt-a deg 32 n lwilayat. Deg tazwara n useggas, yella wugur n uselmed n tmaziɣt deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt imi xas llan yiselmaden iwumi fkan imekwan i wakken ad slemden, meɛna ufan-d iɛewwiqen akked kra n yinemhalen. Ɣe wanect-a, dɣa, i yeḍleb Useqammu Unnig n Timmuzɣa yiwet n temlilit akked yinemhalen n leqraya n lezzayer tamanaɣt i wakken ad frun akk timsal i d-icudden ɣer uselmed n tmaziɣt. I usmekti, 711 n yiselmaden ijdiden i d-yellan seg sin yiseggasen-agi iɛeddan i uselmed n tmaziɣt deg tmurt s umata. Ma ɣef wuguren i d-ttmagaren yiselmaden n tmaziɣt s umata, ha-t-an yettwaxleq-d Ugraw Aɣelnaw n Yiselmaden d Yinelmaden n Tmaziɣt i yennejmaɛen ass-nni n 12 deg unbir 2016 deg Tizi Uzzu anda i mmeslayen ɣef wuguren i d-ttmagaren deg unnar, ladɣa, wid-nni yellan berra n tmurt n leqbayel. Agraw-a, yessutur tifrat n yal aɛewwiq, ama d wid yeɛnan iṣudaf ama d wid i d-yettwaxelqen sɣur inemhalen n yiɣerbazen. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben Yahia 

  
 Iban ur d ayen yessefraḥen ad t-id-yini yiwen, maca d ayen i d-ijebden awellih n tiṭ ed wallaɣ taggara-ya almi ur yezmir ad yessusem yimi n win yesnuzgumen, deg wakud ideg ayen akka yettbeddilen s tazzla yeɛna tigemmi, idles ed tmagit. Ass-a deg wussan deg Tmurt n Yizwawen yuɣal yeṭṭixxir wayen akken ttuɣ d tuzzigt-is: iqennucen ed ufexxar. Sanda ma terriḍ ad tafeḍ kra n tlawin ǧǧant dayen tiwin n yideqqi seg lexla, ma d aṭas, ladɣa seg tesliyin timaynutin, ur ssinent ulama d amek i d-yettwakkas seg tmurt, neɣ amek ara herrsent afrur s uzdud. Ula deg umsiẓwer aneggaru n yiqennucen deg Ayt Smaɛel, i yettwassnen s yideqqi-yis ed yiqennucen-is, tella-d tegnit ad iẓer yiwen acḥal n tlawin i mazal ṭṭfent deg lɛada, bennunt teqqdent iqennucen. Ɣas ma ahat llant tid ur nebɣa ad ttekkint – acku ur bɣant ad fkent ayla-nsent ad t-xesrent, ad xesrent daɣen – maca seg umḍan ameẓyan n tlawin i yekkin, i ur nɛedda 13 deg tɣiwant merra, yezmer umdan ad iqis ad yektal d acu i d amḍiq i as-d-yeggran ass-a i tgemmi-ya tangawt (patrimoine matériel). Ɣur yiɛeggalen n Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad yezmer ad yili waya yekka-d seg uḥbas n tfaska deg sin n yiseggasen yezrin, dɣa tiḥerrazin-a n tgemmi-ya tangawt deg Ayt Smaɛel ufant iman-nsent ur heggan amek iwata i tikkin. Maca ideqqi ur yettzemmil yiwet n temnaḍt kan, ma tbedreḍ-t-id ad tbedreḍ Tamurt n Yizwawen merra. Rnu ula d imsizwar neɣ d tifaskiwin n yiqennucen-a ur llant s waṭas, imi ayen izemren dɣa tura akka ad d-yas deg yimi: amsiẓwer n yiqennucen deg Ayt Smaɛel, Tafaska n ufexxar deg Mɛetqa. Aya ad d-yesbiyyen ugar amek simmal yettuqqa uqeddic n tgemmi-ya yettruḥu d asfel n tudert tatrart, ɣas ma yella nezmer ad neṭṭef deg tgemmi, deg nukni, ad nedder daɣen tudert tatrart.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 (Aḥric aneggaru)

 Aṭas i la yettmaggan daha ed dihin i ubaɣur n tmaziɣt deg yal aḥric. Nefren dɣa ad nessesten yiwen i iqeddcen deg usisleg 

 (doublage) n yisura igreɣlanen ɣer tezwawt. Wa d anaẓur n Racid Tiɣilt, ukud i d-newwi awal s telqey ɣef umaḍal-a n yisura ed usenfar n usaru « Troy ». Hatta tdiwennit. 

 Tella daɣen tmuffirt tettraǧu wid iḥemmlen tutlayt-nsen, imi dɣa tekkan deg usenfar-a aṭas n wudmawen. Awal ɣur-k…

 Asisleg usaru-yagi, nga-yas tiwizi umi dduklen ddeqs n yismawen mucaɛen yesfuktiyen idles-nneɣ. Ttekkin deg-s kra imeskaren d inaẓuren n ssinima d umezgun, icennayen, inaẓuren n tuklut, imedyazen, imyura, d kra inerdalen idelsanen.  Lḥasun nenced-d yakk imeddukal/timeddukal nessen, neɣ nufa i lmendad, ger wid/tid yesmeɣnisen, ger cwiṭ d waṭas, deg taɣult n yidles amaziɣ. Ad asen-nini merra tanemmirt yemmden imi yaɣ-d-ddan di llza, gren-d afus n tallelt deg usenfar-agi s wecrah imi ula d nutni tella-yasen teqbaylit deg wul. Iswi-nneɣ, d iswi-nsen(t) ula d nutni/nutenti. Tajmilt-nsen(t) d tameqqrant.

 Di tazwara yessefk ad ḥsun medden belli tuget inaẓuren-agi yettwasnen aṭas, i iqeblen ad ttekkin yid-neɣ, xas ma llan wid ur d iyi-nessin ara mliḥ, wa yessen yakan Ḥasan (Yousfi), wa yessen Ǧamal (Ait Iften) bu twuri timgerrezt, ẓran azal n leqdic-is (isura yeskaray ɣef yidles-nneɣ). Tin ɣer-s teɛǧeb-asen nezzeh tikti n twizi akk d teqbaylit  nesseqdec di tsuqqilt usaru-yagi “Tadyant n Ṭeṛwa”. Ur d wid/tid ileḥḥun s tjeɛɛal neɣ ɣef uɛebbuḍ am wezrem. Yerna ur ngi ara maḥyaf ger iwaziwen. Nessekki deg umahil-agi daɣen ula d kra inaẓuren i la d-yettnekkaren, ad farsen tagnit yid-neɣ iwakken ad yettwagerrez umahil. Atmaten/tiyessetmatin-agi i d-yuraren s wecrah n wul deg usisleg n usaru-yagi, usan(t)-d si yal tama. (Yal yiwen(t) ansi-t(tt), wa si lwilaya n Tizi, wa si Tubiret, wa si Bgayet…). Tessemlal-iten(t) twizi-yagi am wakken tesddukel tedyant n Ṭerwa iqerra n tgeldiwin n Grik merra mgal acengu yekksen fell-asen sser deg irebbi n Spart.  Ula d imeskaren usaru n Troy, ssekkin deg-s inaẓuren n ssinima agraɣlan (yal wa/ta, ansi-t(tt) : Marikan, Irland, Usṭrali, d Legliz). Ssekkren-t s ttawilat imeqqraḥanen yerna sḍeffren-as adellel annect ilat. 

 Asmi nwala tasuqqilt usaru-yagi, yuklalen a t-id-nernu s irebbi n teqbaylit, twenneɛ (ka n win/tin tt-yeẓran a ɣ-yessebɣes neɣ a ɣ-yessenmer seg wakken i sen(t)-teččur tiṭ twuri-nneɣ), ihi nenna-yas, imi akka, yessefk ula d nekkni ad as-ner tajmilt ifazen i tutlayt-nneɣ; ad as-nessemɣer ccan i usisleg-agi s twizi. Ma ngerrez-as tazibba, s yismawen n at ifassen d yilsawen yeccebbiḥen idles-nneɣ, ahat a ncebbeḥ yes-s taqbaylit ugar. Taqbaylit ma icebbeḥ-itt wayla-s, ad tecbeḥ yes-s tedfert-is, ad tt-ḥemmlen tarwa-s ugar iwakken ad tidir, ad tt-id-afen ineggura am akken i yaɣ-tt-id-ǧǧan imezwura. Meqqar ma nzux yes-s cenna… 

 Tella daɣ tayeḍ: Negra-d deg yiwet tizi yessanafen tikkwal abrid i webrid. Teqqel ssɛaya tugar llyan. Adrim d cciɛa n yir ssekka yella wanda ssufuɣen leɛqel i bab-is, sluɣuyen tamuɣli  almi yerra tiqit baḥwasu di kra n teswiɛin. Aql-aɣ deg yiwet tallit anida yeqqel leqdic n terbaɛt am ccɣel yettgallan di bab-is. Tadukli yessifsusen tilufa tuɣal amzun d taɛkkemt ẓẓayen. Mi ara nessiked ɣer deffir, ad naf dakken Taqbaylit werǧin telli d ugur yettɛekkiren tikli neɣ d taluft yettbexxisen widak-is. Seg zik tcebbeḥ s twizi akk d tcemlit. Matter i tcerreh teqbaylit s warraw-is d yessi-s mi ara ten-tezdi tegmat neɣ mi ara temlil tasa d way turew. Zik, qqaren-aɣ-d: “Kra n win/ayen iwumi zzin, nɣan-t/rnant”. Tura, simmal ɛemmal, yal wa aqerruy-is di tcacit-is neɣ awi-d kan ad yaker taqejjirt, ad yessenser iman-is amzun di lqaɛa i ttrusunt tyitwin icaɛen deg-s… Ihi, am akken t-id-nniɣ yakan, nenna-yas, nekk d Ǧamel akk d Ḥasan d yemddukal n westidyu “Nova films», ad yelhu mliḥ usenfar-agi limmer ad as-nezzi d tarbaɛt iwaziwen s yemeddukal/timeddukal yessnen azal n twizi. Ma nessaweḍ iwsi-yagi ɣer tiɣilt, ahat aṭas ara d-yuɣal wul ɣer tcemlit d wayen yettgerrizen s tdukli. Nessaram targit ad teffeɣ. Lḥasun ma yelha uqeddic-agi, nneɣ merra; acku taqbaylit ur telli d taɛezzult n yiwen. 

 Imi amahil ur d win isehlen, meslay-aneɣ ɣef wansi i d-tettɛeddayem merra akken ad yaweḍ usaru ɣer tuffɣa. 

 Asentel-agi, ɣezzif umecwar-is yerna  mmeslayeɣ-d fell-as yakan geddac n tikal, snefliɣ-t-id di kra n yeɣmisen. Ma ulac uɣilif, fiḥel ma ssugteɣ-d awal daɣen. Win iran ad yegzu amek d wansi i s-nttekk i usisleg usaru seg tazwara alamma yessufeɣ-it-id umaẓrag d isidiyen, yezmer ad yedlu, di “Internet», ɣer tansiwin-agi ukessar abaɛda di tiririt-iw ɣef westeqqsi wis 3 di tdawennit i d-yeffɣen deg usebter wis 13 n weɣmis “Reporters” ass n 09/02/2013. Azwel n umagrad: “ Notre langue est capable d’accéder à la culture universelle” deg tansa-yagi: 

 http://fr.calameo.com/read/00078188439610570ae0d

 Wissen ma temlalem-d uguren deg wayen yerzan allalen neɣ d tadrimt ?

 Ur cukkeɣ ara ad tafeḍ di tmurt-nneɣ imeskaren (yettmeɣnisen ɣef yidles) ur d-nettemlili ara uguren, ladɣa wigi akka i d-tbedreḍ. A wi yufan ad ttemɛanaden ula d “at wedrim” ɣer twizi, (am tagi i s-nesker i “Tedyant n Ṭerwa”) iwakken ad allen inaẓuren d yimyura neɣ imeskaren yakk yesnernayen idles amaziɣ. Wanag wid/tid terza taluft, am tuget n yemḍebbren n yedles n tmurt, fiḥel ma nenna. Ladɣa segmi akka yuder wallaɣ s aɛebbuḍ. Ma nzuṭ, ma nxuṭ! “Amzun ɣur xwal-nsen i yekkat ṭṭbel” neɣ “ amzun d At Ɛli i d-yewwin tislit”…

  Nessaram ahat ad ilin kra iɛerḍiyen ara d-iwalin imeskaren n yidles s umata xersum s yiwet tiṭ. Ma yella kra n “sponsor” neɣ imerkantiyen i izemmren ad aɣ-d-ɛiwnen cwiṭ iwakken ad nesssiweḍ ad t-id-nessufeɣ usaru-yagi akken iwata, ur nettagi ara. Awi-d ukan ad t-walin medden s wudem icebḥen tuklal tmaziɣt.  Neɣ ma ulac, “akken yella wass, ad t-yesk umeksa”. Tabeɛ nennum. 

 Racid Tiɣilt, ur tmaleḍ kan i lecɣal-a n yisura, imi d amedyaz, d amsuneɣ i telliḍ daɣen, amek ttilint akk tẓuriwin-a akked-ik? 

 Mi tenniḍ, ǧǧiɣ asunneɣ acku aṭas n temsal I yi-ceɣben abaɛda segmi walaɣ tutlayt-nneɣ tra-yas i yal win/tin i izemmren ad as-d-yernu kra n wayen ara s-yessinfen aḥemmal yessengaren tutlayin ttaǧǧan imawlan-nsent am wulli yeǧǧa umeksa i wuccen ma ad s-tent-ikes. Taggara-yagi, ḥulfaɣ d yiman-iw am win d-yeffɛefɛen si yir targit. Nniɣ-as, akken s-qqaren at uyiɛeddan: “Aɛekkaz d-yewwten s axxam, awer d aɣ-yezgel!” Acku ma neǧǧa tutlay-nneɣ, amzun neǧǧa tanaslit neɣ negzem ɣef cceḥ iẓuran seg d-nefruri. Ma teḍra-d akken dɣa, ugadeɣ ur nettban d acu-yaɣ. “A lhejna n win yennejlan, asmi i s-nnan wi k-ilan?” yeqqel am lmal agugam ula ansi ad s-yekk wawal.

 Yenna-yas umedyaz, Lewnis A.M. “Si yal lǧiha nettwet, ayen ufiɣ ad wwteɣ yes-s”. Ihi, am kra n win/tin yečča wul-is, tewwi-yi-d ula d nekk ad ɛerḍeɣ tijja-w; ad aruɣ ayen umi d-cfiɣ, ad geɣ ayen ssneɣ akken zemmreɣ s wayen ufiɣ i lmendad. 

 Ger isenfar umi kkreɣ, yella yiwen umud n tullisin, wayeḍ n tmedyazt yebḍan ɣef sin yeḥricen; amezwaru, deg-s azal n 50 isefra. Aḥric wis sin, d asegzawal neɣ d tamawalt i usegzi n wawalen akk d kra n tenfaliyin-nni sqedceɣ deg isefra, imi ddeqs seg-sen ur zgin ara di tmeslayt n yal ass. 

 Ɣur-i daɣen kra imuhal, am tsuqqilt n isura (documentaires) yesker wemddakel Djamel Ait Iften. Gar-asen wid yezrin yakan am “Tiɛwinin” akk d “Usensi n Weẓru n Ṭṭhur”. Llant daɣen kra n tektiwin yeggunin amnar am tin i yi-d-yessumer “wayaw-iw” amyaru amedyaz Sɛid At Mɛemmar ukud qedceɣ yakan kra n tmucuha n watmaten Grimm i d-yerra si talmanit ɣer teqbaylit n Muḥya. Tikta-yagi, ahat a d-nemmeslay fell-asent asmi ara d-yas wass-nsent. 

 Lḥasun mačči d yiwet! Yenna-yas Ssi Funi i Ssi Nistri di tmezgunt-nni n Muḥya: “Tayerza, kerzeɣ akk tamurt; ssaba a sidi wissen?”  Tikkwal, seg waken ugten yigran ideg la meggreɣ yakk d inurar ideg sserwateɣ, ugadeɣ ur ssawaḍeɣ ara yal tirni ɣer talast-is neɣ ur ferrunt ara tirac ssarmeɣ. Tikkwal tḍerru yid-i am tgeswaḥt-nni iɣef d-yeqqim wawal: “Azeṭṭa yegren tettu-t, wayeḍ teṭṭef-as tasegrut”.

 Terriḍ tajmilt s tɣara tucbiḥt i umeɣnas n tmaziɣt Ferḥat At Muḥend, fell-as talwit. Awal ɣef urgaz ed wunuɣ i as-tbuddeḍ. 

 Ferḥat At Muḥend, iɣsan-is di talwit, d ameɣnas n yidles akk d tugdut yerna cenna. Ur ṭṭuqqten ara yergazen am netta yekkaten ɣef teqbaylit s tsertit war ma yettu tutlayt-is am waken i sen-teḍra i tuget n warrac n 80. D aselmad n tmaziɣt yesɣarayen seg wul mačči ɣef weɣrum s yettnuz wedrum. D aɛebbaj n tira yettarun am tala yettfin deg iɣurar. D bu imru qeṭṭiɛen igezzmen awal yessiffif seg ukerfa n tutlayin n wiyaḍ. Ɣur-s, taqbaylit mačči d aqemmuc kan, d tigawt neɣ d lefɛayel. Ula mi t-yekref waṭṭan-nni amcum i t-yewwin s anda a naweḍ, ur s-yebri ara i ṭṭbel deg waman. Yezga yettwanas-aɣ di facebook s imagraden d-yettaru. Usmeɣ s tebɣest d as-fkan. 

 Di Lɛid-nni iɛeddan, mmektaɣ-d tawacult-is. Ɣlin-iyi-d imeṭṭawen am akken ten-ruɣ asmi yenṭel. Ad d-yazen Rebbi ssber i widak-is akk d wid/tid merra i t-iḥemmlen. 

 Ferḥat, xas ulac-it gar-aneɣ ass-a, yeǧǧa-d isem-is d azedgan, am tgejdit ur nrekku, ama ger ijerriḍen yura ama deg tizza umeɣnes ɣef yidles-nneɣ akk d tugdut.

 Tegra-d deg wunuɣ s-buddeɣ i gma-tneɣ Ferḥat At Muḥend, ad iniɣ yuklal ugar. Dɣa ma yella wamek, riɣ ad as-rreɣ tajmilt s tukkist usefru-yagi i d as-iɛeǧben nezzeh asmi i sen-rra tajmilt i wemddakel-nneɣ Lǧilali At Welḥaǧ deg Wegni n teslent (taddart n Dda Qasi Ibudraren); ula d nutni, iɣsan-nsen di talwit:

 Tukkist seg usefru: “TAJMILT I UMEƔNAS”

 Talwit fell-awen a d-testeqsi

 Xas am ubeḥri i d-yeffalen

 Tiyersi icudden ar d-tefsi

 Asirem iteg-d ifadden

 D imru-w ay rriɣ d iẓḍi

 Yellem-aɣ-d awal d ifyiren

 Mi ssulin i usefru tiddi

 Ad t-nettel ad idel yis-sen

 A wi iḍallen ɣer ddaw Wegni

 Ad yerzu ɣef wid yemmuten

 Ad ten-id-yenced d tirni

 Ad d-asen akk yiwen yiwen

 Ad asen-igerrez imensi

 Ad cerhen akk wudmawen

 Ad yeṛwu yid-sen iɣimi

 Ad d-nesmekti wid yeddren

 Wid yeddren deg wesmekti

 Iseɣ-nsen deg yilsawen

 Ɣas akka xsin am yetri

 Teqqim-aɣ-d tafat-nsen

 Isem-nsen yeggar-d imɣi

 Udem-nsen ha-t ger wallen

 Nettader-iten-id s nnhati

 Mi nxaq a nerzef ɣur-sen

 Ttakin-d deg wesmekti

 Wid nemḍel amzun ṭṭṣen

 Deg uẓekka ddurin tiɣli

 Iṭij d asigna i t-yeffren

 …

 Ttxil-wet ssurfet-iyi

 Ma ur d-bdireɣ ara ismawen

 Xas ulac-iten dagi

 Ṭṭfen tasga deg ulawen

 Win yemmuten a t-yerḥem Rebbi

 Yal yiwen swayes yumen

 Yazen-d ṣṣbeṛ i tdukli

 Awer yekkes ayen ẓrant wallen

 D ul-iw i d-yegren tiɣri

 I watmaten-iw a tt-refden

 Awal a s-bruɣ dagi

 Sima ara yaweḍ ɣur-sen.

 Tanemmirt mi tqebleḍ asqerdec, d acu i d awal-ik n usekker?

 Di tazwara ad ak-iniɣ tanemmirt ula i kečč imi yi-d-tefkiḍ tagnit s yesteqqsiyen-agi i yi-d-yeldin daɣen tawwurt n Weɣmis imaziɣen. 

 Tin ɣer-s, ssarameɣ ad ftin imeɣriyen n tmaziɣt d ad ttaɣen idlisen, isidiyen d wayen akk ɣef ttɛettiben inaẓuren d imeskaren iqeddcen ɣef yidles-nneɣ…

 A wi yeddren a nwali isura yecban Troy ad ttwaskren s tmaziɣt anda ara nẓer Yugurten deg wadeg n Acil, neɣ Masinisa deg wadeg n Ulis…

 Yenna-yas umedyaz Ben M. “Tezreɛ, d ad temɣi!”

 Ǧǧiɣ-awen talwit akk d tayri d usirem yessibninen tudert.

<p style="text-align: right;">Yesteqsa-t: Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Aɛmer-u-yidir d lamin n yiwet n taddart deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Ulac win isewqen ɣef taddart-is am netta. Fernen-t imezdaɣ d aqerru ɣef taddart-is acḥal n yiseggasen. Aɛmer-u-yidir d yiwen ur nettcuḥu ara di lweqt-is. Yeqqar:‘‘lecɣel n taddart zwaren akk lecɣel’’. Anda i as-d-ssawlen, iruḥ d amezwaru. Ɣef waya, ttqadaren-t u ḥemlen-t medden aṭas. Yiwet n tikkelt, ikcem-d deg yiḍ s axxam, ieeṭṭel di tejmaet, ṭṭfen-t lecɣel n taddart. Yufa-d mmi-s n mmi-s uread igen, yenna-as-id: leeslama a jeddi, tεeṭṭleḍ aṭas ass-agi! Acu-t i txeddmeḍ akk di tejmaet? Yenna-as jeddi-s: a mmi iṭṭef-iyi cɣel n taddart, yak nekk d lamin! D imsewwaq n taddart. Lecɣel n taddart zwaren akk lecɣel. Nekk d ṭemman i yi-ttḥamin, nettsewwiq ɣef taddart: nettḥarab ɣef nnif n yimezdaɣ, wa ur iḥeqqar wayeḍ, wa ur ittaweḍ wayeḍ. Nferru uguren d-ttemlilin imezdaɣ, nteddu deg ubrid n lḥaq, ntekkes lbaṭel… Aqcic: amek tferrum taluft gar sin n yimdanen ilhan a jeddi? Lamin: a mmi ma lhan di sin ur d-ttruḥen ara ɣer tejmaεt. Taluft nsen ur d-tettaweḍ ara ɣer-neɣ, ur tt-nettissin ara, ferrun-tt i yiman-nsen weḥd-nsen.Wa ad yeǧǧ cwiṭ i wayeḍ dɣa ad tt-frun. Aqcic: a jeddi i mi ara yili yiwen ilha wayeḍ dirr-it! Lamin: a mmi, tamezwarut, nessawal-asen-d ɣer tejmaet i sin yid-sen. Nessel-asen, yal yiwen ad d-yini amek teḍra tedyant illan gar-as d uxṣim-is. Ssyin win iḍelmen ad t-nsenṭaq ɣef ccada. Nessenqas cwiṭ i win iḍelmen nrennu-t i win-a nniḍen, dɣa ttasen-d swaswa, mtawan ɣef ṛṛay n tejmaet. Ttaken lwaεda di tejmaɛt, Ccix ittak-asen lfattiḥa, ssyin ttuɣalen s axxam ferḥen di sin yid-sen imi tefra tedyant-nsen mebla ma yeɣli-d weeḍur wala tugra-d lexsara gar-asen. Aqcic: a jeddi, i mi ara n-ruḥen sin n yimdanen dir-iten i sin? Lamin: a mmi, dɣa d ayen i yi-isεeṭṭlen ar tura ass-agi! 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane LASHEB 

  
 Baylache d anaẓur yellan di tllalit deg umenzu n unbir deg useggas 1983 di tɣiwant Ukeffadu yeṭṭafaren tawilayt n Bgayet, assag-is n tidet «Ԑbalac yazid» seg twacult n yinaẓuren anda yella bab-as Yidir Akfadu d netta i as-imuden taselfast-a B «Baylache» . Seg imi yella d amecṭuḥ ira ad d-yurar ɣef wallalen uẓawan , dɣa asmi yesεa deg uwtay-is 09 n yiseggasen din i yebda taẓuri ,yekcem ɣer talilt (chorale) di lakul anda yeqqar, yella daɣen deg ugraw «Inuẓar»anda yella mass Redwan Yazid , syin iḥulfa iman-is yezmer ad yecnu ɣur-s ssut yettaken taneffut i wul ,yelmmed ɣer bab-as amek ad d-yawi asentel akken ad yaleɣ usefru d userkeb uẓawan, deg useggas 1997 yecna d bab-as deg tezlit «imusnawen». ula di lakul yeẓwer anda deg useggas 2002 yewwi-d agerdas n usaḍuf di tesdawit, snitra ur tt-yeǧǧi , yegna yal aceqqiq n uẓawan , yelmmed amek ara yurar ɣef wallalen anda yella d amsiwen «musicien «i ddeqs n yinaẓuren imi yekkat akken iwata di lawan-nni gar-asen «Lwiza, Idurar, tarbaεt Akfadu ,Farid Brayek ….., syin deg useggas 2007 deg udebsi n bab-as «Tidyanin n wul» id-yexdem tizlit-is tamezwarut «d lawan ad ruḥeɣ» s yes i yettwasen , yes i yexdem aɣray i tẓuri-is .Deg useggas 2008 yessekles adebsi-ines «Abrid ur d-ttuɣaleɣ» , ikemmel tazrat n tisemsawit d usekles anda deg 2011 yerna-d wayeḍ «ḥesbeɣ-tt innu» anda id-yufrar yeṭṭef annar, icennu di tfaskiwin , irmad idelsanen, tijmilin anda yella d amaha i yal tadrut , yella di tfaska n tezlit taqbaylit di yal aseggas , tafska tis n 50 n yiseggasen n tmunent deg useggas 2012 , macci anager taẓuri ula deg yidles amatu, anda yeṭṭef tidukla n tɣiwant , yella d aselmad n uẓawan deg uxxam n yilemziyen ukeffadu acku yewwi-d agerdas n uẓawan deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt «A.N.S.M anda yemlal d mass Kwider Bouzayen. Amahil asaḍar yekcem deg-s anda deg 2013 yessufeɣ-d wayeḍ «Taqbaylit-nneɣ», anda i as-yerra tajmilt i tmeṭtut taqbaylit , nwala-t acḥal n tikkal di tesgilin n tiliẓri taɣelnawt, ugten yisuhar yesεa» deg uḍebsi-a llant deg-s 08 n tezlatin gar-asent «lexyuḍ-im»anda is-yesserkeb tagrart , dɣa teṭṭef» azwil amenzu di BERBER TV , aneggaru deg 2015 win yefka azwel «ibeddel usirem»deg-s llant tezlatin icebḥen ad d-nebder «imawlan-is , urar…. , tura yebda leqdic-nniḍen anda ara yeg tigrarn i tezlatin yecna «clip vidéo DVD»ɣur-s 08 n tegrarin gar-asent «Lexyuḍ-m , zzerb i tmuɣli-m, udem ajdid , imawlan-iw….d tiyaḍ , anda ara tili tfarest deg waggur-a id-yuẓẓan ɣer umnar «Mayyu»ɣur-s amaynut anda yesεa deg waggur n Meɣres-a ttiεad , ad yili deg Yiɣzer Ameqqarn deg wass agreɣlan n tmeṭṭut , di tfaska uderyis di Tifra anda ara as-tuɣal tejmilt i bab-as «Yidir Akfadu» , daɣen di tejmilt n tnaẓurt Crifan n Uqbu deg Sidi Ԑic ….aḍebsi amaynut deg useggas id-iteddun 2017 anda ara yili uɣnib amaynut di ccna d yisental yecban timetti , tayri , …..

 Baylache d iziɣer n tẓuri di tmurt n Leqbayel , d tawrikt yesεan azal , ccna-s d tinafusin n tayri i yettawin ɣer thuski n tudert umaray , tamedyazt-is d aɣbalu n tmussni , d izuray yefren di tsenduqt n tayri , tasemmunt-is d snitra n lexyuḍ id-yettaken tizmilin n cbaḥa i yellan si temḍḍirt-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Azedine Abdous 

  
 Ddurt yezrin i teɣli yiwet gar tgejda n ccna n teqbaylit, wagi d acennay ameqqran Azerzur. Ilul Mouhand Bouzerzour, isem-is aḥeqqani, deg useggas 1945 di Sedduq Ufella tama n Bgayet. Yeǧǧa-d 05 n yiḍebsiyen i yellan d agerruj meqqren deg umezruy n tẓuri n teqbaylit. Aḍebsi amezwaru, yesuffeɣ-it-id deg useggas n 1989, yefka-as azwel “ Tamɛayt i d-yeḥka Baba”, syin “Ddu, Ddu deg useggas1995, “Ziruru netta d yelli-s lwiza, 1999, “Ulac snat, 2008, ma d aneggaru iwumi isemma “Tidet”, yeffeɣ-d 2015. S kra n win i as-yeslan, yewhem u yesteqsay: amek s uẓawan am wa akked d imeslayen am wigi, ur yewwiḍ ara ucennay-a ad yettwassen berra n tmurt-is? Deg tilawt, Aẓerzur yexdem taẓuri i teqbaylit ,mačči i cciɛa d yidrimen yakan. Ad d-nesmekti yella unaẓur d aselmad n tefransist; yettrebbi tisutwin , yettleqqim tamussni , yezzuzen s snitra-s ula d leḥyud n uɣerbaz i deg yesselmad. Ixleq-d tirebuyaɛ n ccna n teqbaylit deg uɣerbaz akked d taddart-is deg lawan-nni n leḥris, asmi akken yegdel wawal n teqbaylit deg uɣerbaz. Mačči yiwen n usentel neɣ sin i ɣef yecna: tilelli , tayri , tamaziɣt, tugdut , tṛad n timunent n Lezzayer…atg. Iimeslayen-is, kkaten ɣer wul.

 <em> yebda-tt-id s yimeṭṭawen  </em>

 <em> Tajnant deg yiwet n lɣaba  </em>

 <em> asmi akken ur tt-yerkiḍ yiwen  </em>

 <em> Kul rbaḥ deg-s yella,  </em>

 <em> kul lxir deg-s yella  </em>

 <em> Tfuk s yimeṭṭawen… </em>

 Xas akka yemmut ucennay Mouhand Bouzerzour, maca tamedyazt -is d uẓawan-is, ad yecfu fell-asen umezruy n tmedyazet d ccna n teqbaylit, ad qqimen d aɣbalu i tsutwin n uzekka.

  B. Benhamouche 

  
 Tettidir ussan-a ineggura taddart n la Crête-Rouge neɣ Tawrirt tazeggaɣt deg tɣiwant n Leɛǧiba yiwet n teswiɛt qessiḥen anda ixusṣen waman n tissit. D ayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ-is ad refden yiwet n ucekti ɣer yimḍebbren ɛlayen n tmurt, imi deg yiwet n tebrat i yuran i uneɣlaf amenzu Abdelmalek Sellal ssutren deg-s ad d-yefk yiwen n lamer i usiweḍ n waman n ubaraǧ n Tilesdit ɣer taddart-a. Iwulem ad d-nesmekti dakken lɣiḍ n yimezdaɣ-a iban-d mi akken bdan waman ttxaṣṣan yal tikkelt almi wwḍen ttasen-d tikkelt deg xemsa n wussan. Taluft yernan reffu deg yimdanen mi akken tiwilayin tiǧiratin akked temnaḍin nniḍen sfaydant seg waman-a ḥala taddart-a xas akken tebɛed kan seg ubaraǧ-a s wazal n yiwen n ukilumitr. «D ayen ur nessaweḍ ara ad t-nefhem, imi wid ibeɛden wwḍen-ten waman seg Tlesdit, nekni yellan ɣef rrif-is yenɣa-aɣ fad.” I d-yenna Abdelghani.B, yiwen seg yiɛeggalen n tesqamut i yettwabedden ɣef ddemma n unadi n tifrat n u$qbel-a n waman. 

 Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i aɣ-d-yewwḍen, taggara n yimalas yezrin yerza-d yimḍebber n Dayra n Beclul akked uselway n tɣiwant n Leɛǧiba ɣer taddart-a anda walan dakken lbir i d-yettakken aman n tissit yezder s waṭas ayen i t-yeǧǧan ur d-yessalay ara alamma ɛeddan kra n wussan iwakken ad d-yeččar. D ayen i yeǧǧan taddart-a ur tsess ara yal ass. 

 Ɣer taggara, ɣef leḥsab n yimeslayen n yimezdaɣ n Tewrirt Tazeggaɣt, “asiweḍ n waman seg ubaraǧ yettuḥettem ass-a, ur nezmir ad nerǧu nnig n waya, imi d awezɣi yiwen n lbir yecban wa ad yessiweḍ ad yessew azal n 2500 n yimezdaɣ. Rnu, ur d-nessuter ara lmuḥal, nebɣa kan ad nili am nekni am medden.”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail. M 

  
 Akud yettɛedday, ileḥḥu ur iḥebbes. Yal tikkelt d anwa lawan i d-yessiwiḍ, yettili deg tudert n umdan akken ad yezri, yettak tagnit i kra-nniḍen ad d-yelḥeq, ad yesɛu nnuba-s gar wiyaḍ. Dɣa, skud aql-aɣ deg tsemhuyt n umwan, taswiɛt ideg ttewriɣen wafriwen n ṭṭjur, simmal tettqarab-d tegrest i ineqqen ḥamu, i d-igellun s teqseḥ n usemmiḍ. Am yal aseggas ihi, am yakk lɣaci n tuddar-nniḍen, imezdaɣ n taddart n Ayt Smaɛel, bdan ttheggin i unneqlab n waddad n tegnawt i ara yilin deg wayyur n duǧember i d-iteddun. Imi qrib ad d-tekcem ccetwa, xeddmen seg tura leḥsabat i yiman-nsen, ttnadin war araǧu d uɛeṭṭel swayes ara zemren ad ɣelben tuɛert n usemmiḍ. Amek iban lḥal, mačči d yiwen n ttawil i yellan akken ad tecɛel tmes deg yixxamen-nsen, acku ifurnuyen yal wa s usenf-is, yal wa s wacu i d-yekkat s ḥamu. Ma yehwa-asen, ad ceɛlen s lmaẓuṭ, lgaz, trisiti akked yisɣaren, maca nutni seg ukuẓ-a n wagnayen, tuget seg-sen, fernen ad sserɣen isɣaren. Ayen i ten-yeǧǧan ad ḍefren agna-a, yekka-d seg waṭas n tmentilin. Ma nemmeslay-d fell-asent, ad d-nebder leɣla n lmaẓuṭ i irennun ssuma, yettzid seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ. Lqella n laman i yettilin deg yifurnuyen n lgaz, imi zgan dima snernayen-d tugdi ɣef wayen i izemren ad yeḍru, ad d-yessegri nndama. Ur ntettu, daɣen, ḥamu n yifurnuyen i ijebbden, i tetten xilla n trisiti, lameɛna ur ttqenniɛen wid i ten-ikesben amek ilaq. D annect-a i iqeddmen imezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel d kra seg wid i ten-iqerben, qeblen leɛtab n uzdam d ujmeɛ n yisɣaren seg tẓegwa n temnaḍt-nsen. Smenyifen tiɣin n yikumyan n yiqejmuren, wala ma ssuffɣen adrim-nsen deg ttawilat-nniḍen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: S uselmed n tsengama (la physique), ɣer uselmed n tamziɣt, sakin ɣer leqdic fell-as? 

 Malek Houd : Ala, send akk amahil ama deg Arzyu (Wehran) deg useggas 1977 neɣ deg tesnawit Ḥefsa d tin Debbiḥ Crif n Uqbu anda i seɣreɣ tasengama seg 1978 ar 1983, ttwaḥebseɣ deg yimxeddim ɣef yirmad-iw ɣef tmaziɣt, lliɣ yakan qedceɣ deg yedra n tmaziɣt segmi lliɣ d anelmad ama deg Tezmalt ama deg Bumerdas.

  S usmedyez tuɣaleḍ ɣer usizreg n yidlisen?  

 Kra n win yettarun ama d tamedyazt, ama d tullisin neɣ d iḍrisen, yettnadi amek ara d-yeffeɣ wayen yura akken medden ad ḥsun azal n tira-s neɣ ɣef wacu yettaru… D tamiwin i as-d-yettuɣalen ara t-yerren ad yaru ugar n waya. Akka i tetteddu tsekla deg ddunit akken ma tella, ladɣa mi d-rnan akka wallalen atraren n teywalt. 

  Amek armi tessawḍeḍ ad tedduḍ deg ubrid n Yusef U Qasi d Sidi Qala? 

 Yusef u Qasi, Sidi Qala, Si Muḥend u Mḥend, Muḥend Saɛid Amlikec, ma nebder-d kan wigi, d tiqucac n tmedyazt taqbaylit deg tallit-nsen. Qarren-d: “lmeḥna tettrebbi-d irgazen”. Nekk zemreɣ ad beddleɣ i tenfalit-a, ad as-iniɣ: “lḥif, miḥyaf, tamuḥeqranit, ajujru, ankar n wayeḍ, tifuhrit… ttrebbin-d imedyazen” . Asefru yettḥuddu, yeggar leɛnaya, yessiɣzif tudert i tutlayt yettarra-tt tettidir ur tettmettat. Ahat d ayagi akk i d-isnedhen ul-iw d wallaɣ-iw ad ssefrun, ad d-inin ayen i ten-iqerḥen.

  Amek i d-yettili ufran n yisefra deg tesqqamut n uktazal, imi kečč d aεeggal deg-s? 

 Limer terbiḥeḍ ay ul, asefru, ur d-tewwi ara ad t-nektazel. Σeddi kečč ktazel afrayen n umdan imi asefru ittlal-d seg yiḥulfan n umedyaz, maca afran nessebdad-it ɣef kra n tulmisin (critères), am tugniwin deg usefru, asentel ma d amaynut, talɣa n usefru, asiwel-ines, aqader n yilugan n tira n tmaziɣt akken imedyazen ad issinen amek ara arun tutlayt-nsen taqbaylit…atg. Akken bɣun ffɣen-d yigemmaḍ n temssizzelt n tmedyazt, ttilin yimedyazen ur ten-yettaɛǧab ara lḥal yis-sen. Wa d azref-nsen acku lufan d yiwet n tesqqamut-nniḍen i yellan, tezmer ad d-tfek igemmaḍ-nniḍen yemgarraden ɣef yimezwura, ad ilin diɣen wid ara iɣaḍ lḥal, meɛna akka, ɣef waya i d-zwareɣ awal: asefru ur yettwaktazal ara. 

  Si tmedyazt ɣer tmacahut, syin ɣer tullisin, acuɣer ala ungal?  

 Seg tkeddart ɣer tayeḍ, cwiṭ cwiṭ kan. Akka i d tikli n win yettarun. Nekk zwareɣ seg tmedyazt d tmucuha, ddeqs i qqimeɣ akken ad uɣaleɣ ɣer tira n tullisin (11 n tullisin). Ma d ungal asmi ara d-yesṭebṭeb tawwurt-iw, ad as-tt-id-ldiɣ i sin n lelwaḥ ɣas ma qrib i d-ilul deg tullist tamezwarut “Terẓeg n tament” dɣa d tagi, tessaweḍ azal n 60 n yisbetren, lufan i tt-smeɣreɣ tezmer ad d-teffeɣ d ungal. Meɛna, ad nessuter kan deg ugellid ameqqran, ad isseɣzef tudert, ayen-nniḍen yeshel.

  Acuɣer d izwal-agi i textareḍ i yidlisen-ik? 

 Azwel n ummud amezwaru “ Timsirin n yiḍ” d amaẓrag n teẓrigin TIRA n Bgayet, diɣ d ameɣnas aqdim, d amaru s tmaziɣt i as-t-yefkan mi i yi-d-icawer. Ufiɣ-t d yiwen n wawal yezdin akk tullisin yellan deg udlis-nni. Ma d ammud wis sin i d-yeffɣen dima deg tesrigin Tira deg 2016, ma ɛerḍeɣ ad d-sfehmeɣ amek i as-fkiɣ azwel-a “ Terẓeg n tament” diɣ d azwel n ummud akken ma yella, am wakken d leqraya ara d-ɣreɣ tullist-a i yimeɣriyen, ihi ad ten-ǧǧeɣ kan ad tt-ɣren i yiman-nsen, ad faqqen ayɣer d azwel-a i ferneɣ i tullist-a.

  I di tsuqqilt tezwareḍ deg medden, teğğiḍ iman-ik? 

 Nekk ad ssuqqleɣ ayen uran wiyiḍ ladɣa s tutlayt tafransist, ma d ayen uriɣ ha-t-an deg umraḥ azayez, win yebɣan ad yerr tira-w ama ɣer tefransist, ama ɣer taɛrabt, ama ɣer teglizit neɣ tayeḍ, ha-tt-an sdat-s.

  Amek armi kraḍ n yidlisen s tewsatin n tsekla yemxalafen? 

 Nekk, d tamedyazt i yi-yeččuren tiṭ imi ɣas yiwen n ummud kan n tmedyazt i d-yeffɣen, win iwumi fkiɣ azwel “Asirem yessaramen”, llan 4 nniḍen rsen deg tesga ttrajun assizreg. Ḥemmleɣ diɣen ad aruɣ iḍrisen imecṭaḥ i nessexdam d isulal n tɣuri deg uɣerbaz deg yiseggasen n 90 imi mazal ur llin ara yidlisen n tɣuri n tmaziɣt imiren-nni. Ɣef wayagi i yeshel fell-i ad ɛeddiɣ ɣer tira n tullisin. Ma d ayen yerzan tasuqqilt, nessen cwiṭ tutlayt tafransist, dɣa zemreɣ ad d-rreɣ asefru seg tefransist ɣer teqbaylit, akken i xedmeɣ d tmedyezt n Jean de la Fontaine, Lamartine, Smail Ait Djaffar d wiyaḍ.

  Acimi tεeṭleḍ deg usizreg n yidlisen-ik imaynuten, imi tenniḍ yakkan belli wejden? 

 Nniɣ-d deg tazwara, ɣur-i kra n yidlisen heggan i teẓrigt, maca qqimen deg teɣmert wissen ar melmi. Uguren n tezrigin ar tura ur frin ara. Zik, drus maḍi n yidlisen i d-iteffɣen, tura ddeqs i yellan, acu kan ilaq aṭas n tedrimt i ussufeɣ-nsen. Imazragen ttmmagaren-d ula d nutni uguren imeqqranen, amezwaru deg-sen: ulac aṭas n yimeɣriyen n tmaziɣt. Tamentilt n waya, drus aya i tekcem tutlayt-nneɣ s aɣerbaz. Ahat sya ɣer sdat ad ggten.

  D acu i d rray-ik ɣef tmedyazt s umata u ɣef tmedyazt taqbaylit? 

 Qqaren tamedyazt d nettat i d tameɣbunt deg tewsatin n tsekla, anda-nniḍen ayagi d tidet, maca deg tmurt n Leqbayel ɣur-s azal d ameqqran ɣef waya ahat deg yal taddart nettaf aṭas n wid yettarun tamedyezt, nettwali-ten deg tfaskiwin n At Jennad, deg Udrar n Fad, deg Uqbu, ttasen-d ttekksen-d ɣef wul-nsen. Tamedyazt taqbaylit akka tura tufa iman-is, ma d tizlit yeɣlin deg sshala, teɣḍel tizlit ibedden ɣef uḍris n tmedyazt tuntimt, tin yessulin tanegmit tamagant s igenni deg yiseggasen 1970 d 1980. Llan yimedyazen imecṭaḥ, ttawin-d amaynut deg wawal-nsen, snulfuyen-d talɣiwin n tmedyezt meɛna aṭas deg-sen ur ttwassnen ara, ttrajun ass-nsen. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer tsekla d tultayt n tmaziɣt.

  Amek tḥulfaḍ i yiman-ik, asmi i ak-tuɣal tejmilt deg Uqbu? 

 Ad snemmreɣ aṭas aṭas iɛeggalen merra n tiddukla Itri Adelsan n Uqbu i iyi-fernen gar kra n yimedyazen akken ad iyi-rren tajmilt. Ala lferḥ ara yefreḥ win iwimi ara d-teḍru temsalt am tagi iɣef ur yebni ara.

  D acu tessewjaḍeḍ ɣer sdat? 

 Ɣur-i akka tura 4 n yimmuden n tmedyezt urɛad i d-ffiɣen, ad ɛerḍeɣ ad d-ssufɣeɣ yiwen yiwen mi waεeɣ. Ma d ungal yettezzi deg uqerruy.

  Awal-ik n taggara? 

 Ad ak-snemmreɣ kečč akked yimeɣriyen n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen n “La Dépêche de Kabylie”. ad as-iniɣ i ugdud amaziɣ: “Ala nekkni i tesɛa tmaziɣt…”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ttettwaxeleq-d tdukli-a, ass n 03 deg yunyu deg usuggas yezrin. Sedduyen-tt yilmeẓyen n taddart n Tewrirt Meqqran yetabaɛen taɣiwant n Larebɛa n At Yiraten. Yal mi ara d tili tedyant , ttqabalent. Tikkelt-agi, heggan-d yiwet n tmeɣra i lmendad n yinelmaden i d-yewwin ikayaden, ama n uswir amenzu, alemmas neɣ n win n BAC . Ad tili tmeɣra deg ussan-agi i d-iteddun , anda ara fken arrazen i yinelmaden i d-yewwin ikayaden s tezmilin ifazen imi deg ukayad amenzu yufrar-d yiwen unelmad s 9,40 , ma yella deg uswir alemmas, ad naf tazmilt i yeṭṭfen taqacuct d 17,21, ma yella deg ukayad n BAC, d tazmilt n unelmad d 18,31. Anect-agi, d ayen i yessfarḥen iɛeggalen n tdukla imi s teɣzi n useggas, heggan-asen-d ahil n uselmed : xedmen-asen timsirin i yinelmaden imi sɛan 18 n iselmaden deg tangiwin yemxalafen. “Ihi ass-a yeffeɣ laɛtab ɣer tafat imi i d-nemeger tizmilin-agi” i d-yenna yiwen uɛeggal . Si tama-s, iberreḥ-d Mass Zeggar Malik, netta d yiwen n uɛeggal di tdukla-agi d akken sɛan aṭas n yiɣeblan ladɣa seg tama n tedrimt imi ur sɛin ara allalen i ilaqen akken ad seddun tidukla , akken daɣen i d-yenna d belli ur sɛin ara axxam anda ara tili tdukla. Dɣa, ttafen-d aṭas n iɛewwiqen ladɣa mi ara d-yeḥḍer unejmuɛ n yiɛeggalen n tdukla. Yerna-d ikemmel deg wawal-is belli tidukla, ttɛawanen-tty imawlan n yinelmaden akked tejmaɛt n taddart, maca mačči d ayen s wayes ara texdem tdukla akken iwata isenfaren i d-tettheggi . Asirem-nsen, d akken ad sɛun amkan anda ara selḥun tiddukkla di tugnatin iwulmen . I usmekti, leqdic-a ad yili deg yiwen n uxxam n tmeɣriwin n taddart n Tewrirt Meqqren . 

  S. Yamani 

  
 Yerra uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri ass-nni n sem d sed 22 d 23 deg yulyu 2016 tajmilt i uzamul ameqqran n ccna Ccix El Ḥesnawi , s yiwen leqdic d anesbaɣur. Xedmen timsikent, timsizzelt, isefra d waṭas n leqdic imi d yiwen yestahlen tajmilt. Ilul Lḥesnawi ass n 23 deg yulyu 1910 deg taddart tameqqrant Taɛzibt deg yiḥesnawen deg lɛerc n Wat zmenzer n Tizi Uzzu. Asmi ila (yesɛa) sin yiseggasen temmut yemma-s , yekker-d ɣer twacult-is , s zawiyat d temɛamrin. Deg useggas n 1930, iruḥ ɣer Lezzayer akken ad yexdem , yuɣal yetteki d uzamul-nniḍen n ccna Lḥağ Mḥamed Lɛenqa ,( deg l’orchestre) , yesuffeɣ-d tizlit-is tamezwarut : «Ayemma yemma» , deg useggas 1936. Iruḥ ɣer Fransa, yeqqimen seg useggas n 1939 almi d tazwara n yiseggasen n 1950, uqbel tagrawla n 1954. Yessekles 29 n tezlatin s teqbaylit, 17 s taɛrabt . Ccix Lḥesnawi, d ameskar, d amedyaz (auteur/compositeur), d amẓawan ( musicien ), sɣur-s i d-ugmen yicennayen imeqqranen yecban Maɛṭub Lwennas d Ayt Mangellat d Kamel Mesɛudi. Yesɛa ṣṣut aḥlawan , aḥninan, win i as-yeslan i yiwet n tezlit-is, ad yessirem ad isel i tayeḍ. Acennay-nneɣ ameqqran aqbayli deg tezlatin-is, yecna ɣef wayen akk icudden ɣer tmetti d tmurt, yecna ɣef tayri, ɣef teqbayliyin, Ccix ameqqran, maca ugar n tezlatin-is yecna-tent ɣef lɣerba imi aɣrib ur yeshil ara fell-as ad yeğğ tamurt n Lezzayer aɛzizen : idurar n tmurt ; abehri n tmurt ; leḥbab d imawlan aɛzizen . Azamul n ccna Ccix Lḥesnawi, d agerruj ur nfennu. Yuweḍ umḍan n tezlatin-is ɣer 70. Yuweḍ leɛfu n Rebbi ass n 06 deg yulyu aseggas n 2002 , deg la Réunion, deg Saint Pierre , deg leɛmer-is 92 n yiseggasen, ad t-irḥem Rebbi , ɣas yeğğa-aɣ, yeğğa-aɣ-d .<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 Macahu !Ahu ! Ṛebbi ad tt-yesselhu ad tiγzif anect usaru. Llan sin n watmaten, aqcic d teqcict d igujilen, temmut yemmat-sen, babat-sen iεawed zwaǧ, yewwi-d yiwet n tmeṭṭut d taweεrant, tekreh-iten msakit. Yambabat-sen-agi ula d nettat tesεa snat n yessi-s. Ihi arrac-nni igujilen, sεan tafunast, ttawin-tt kessen-tt. Yambabat-sen ur asen-tettak ara ad ččen ḥaca uraw n yiniγman ixerbucen, i ttaken medden i lmal, d tceqqimin n uγrum. Ad ffγen seg uxxam seg ṣbeḥ alamma d lmeṣbeḥ ad ksen tafunast-nsen di lexla. Yambabat-sen tewhem, yessi-s simmal ṭṭaεifent, irbiben-is simmal ttafen iman nsen. Almi d yiwen wass, tenna-as i Σica, yellis-nni tameqṛant, ad ten-tetbeε ad ten-tqareε d acu i xeddmen. Taqcict tetbeε-iten tewweḍ-d γer yemma-s tεawed-as akk ayen twala:’‘A yemma walaγ-ten la teṭṭḍen tafunast di lexla’‘. Dγa tameṭṭut tamcumt tenna-as i yelli-s ad teddu d warrac nni:’‘ Anda i ṛuḥen ad tṛuḥeḍ, anda qqimen ad teqqimeḍ ayen xedmen ad txedmeḍ’‘. Taqcict tetbeε-iten, akken temmeγ ad teṭṭeḍ tafunast am warrac-nni, tafunast tewwet-itt-id s uḍaṛ-is γer deffir tesseγli-as-d tiṭ-is. Akken twala yemma-s yelli-s tuγal d taderγalt, tettmeǧǧid ar tafunast yesdreγlen yelli-s ala akcam ara tekcem ssuq. Yewweḍ-d wass n ssuq, yekker urgaz yewwi yid-s tafunast ad tenz. Tafunast-nni telha mačči d kra. Akken kan yewweḍ ssuq, imsewqen akk zzin-d fell-as ad tt-sawmen. Cwiṭ kan akka iεeddi-d ṭṭiṛ deg yigenni yessawal s lqeḍra n Ṛebbi:’‘Tafunast igujilen! ur tettnuzu ur tṛehhen ! Tafunast igujilen! ur tettnuzu ur tṛehhen ! Akken i d as-slan yemmsewqen-nni, mkul yiwen s anida i yerra, wa yeqqar i wa: ‘’Ad aγ-yemneε Ṛebbi si deεwessu n yigujilen!’‘. Yettawi-tt akken-nni urgaz tlata ledwaṛ γer ssuq, yettara-tt-id γer uxxam, ur tt-yettsawam ḥedd.Tameṭṭut-is teggul, tenna-as: ‘’Ala tuγalin ur d-tettuγal tfunast isdreγlen yelli, zenz-itt i uksum, efk-itt i ugezzar!’‘. Akken i tt-yewwi urgaz i ugezzar, arrac-nni imeγban ṛuḥen γer uẓekka n yemmat-sen ttrun, ttrun , ttrun ar almi d-yenṭeq γer-sen yiwen n ṣṣut yenna: – Ṛuḥet γer ugezzar, tessutrem deg-s ad awen-d-yefk akerciw-nni-ines, awit-tt-id akken yeççur d leγbaṛ, tessarsem-t γef uẓekka-inu….

  Tettkemmil Seg tgemmi n teqbaylit 

  
 Semmus n yiseggasen aya i as-iruḥ yiwen uzamul i tmaziɣt, wagi d Nour Ould Amara. Ilul ass n 10 deg ctember 1968 deg Ʃin El Ḥemmam , yeɣra deg uɣerbaz amenzu deg taddart n Koukou gar useggas 1974-1980. Yuɣal s aɣerbaz At Hicem, gar useggas 1980-1984 yewwi-d akayad n BEM , yuɣal ɣer tesnawit n Ben Boulaid deg Ʃin El Ḥemmam anida i d-yuwi akayad n BAC. Sakin ikemmel almud deg tseddawit. Deg useggas n 1988 d 1989, yesselmed tutlayt taɛrabt, deg uɣerbaz alemmas n Wat Hicem, seg useggas 1989 yetteki deg tiddukkla : «Si Mohend ou Mhend» deg Ʃin El Ḥemmam. Gar 1995-2000, yesselmed tamaziɣt deg uɣerbaz n Wat Hicem, almi yexdem deg tseddawit yiwen usileɣ (une formation), deg tseddawit n Ben Aknun. Mass Ould Amara Nour, d ameɣras n tmaziɣt, yennuɣ fell-as. Deg useggas n 2000, yexdem d imceyyaɛ deg Uɣmis l’Hebdo-n-tmurt. Yexdem, daɣen, deg yiwet n tedwilt n temsirin n tmaziɣt deg Berbère Télévision seg useggas 2003 almi 2011. Yewweḍ leɛfu Rebbi ass n 20 deg ctember 2011 s yiwen waṭṭan, fell-as yeɛfu Rebbi, ur ntettu ara d acu i d–yenna ɣef tmaziɣt, akken ad tidir tmaziɣt ilaq-as tira , ilaq ad tuɣal d taɣelnawt, Nour Ould Amara, ulac axxam ur yekcim ara s temsirin n tmaziɣt , yerna mačči hala inelmaden i itebɛen tadwilt-is ula d imawlan-nneɣ neɣ wid ur nessin ara tamaziɣt. Ɣef waya, ilaq ad neddu deg ubrid-is akken tamaziɣt ad tidir ad tt-naru.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 D ayen i d-yellan akken ilaq ddurt-a iɛeddan deg uxxam n yilemẓiyen n tɣiwant, imi ma drus azal n 22 n yilemẓiyen i d-yerran i tiɣri n Tiɣri, usan-d ad d-fken seg yidammen-nsen i yimuḍan i asen-yesran.

 Am wakken tuɣ tannumi s yiqeddicen-is alsanen, tga Tidukkla Tinmettit i Yimeɛḍar d Yimuḍan Idumen Tiɣri, n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, taẓrigt tis kraḍ n tigawt n tukksa n yidammen. D ayen i d-yellan akken ilaq ddurt-a iɛeddan deg uxxam n yilemẓiyen n tɣiwant, imi ma drus azal n 22 n yilemẓiyen i d-yerran i tiɣri n Tiɣri, usan-d ad d-fken seg yidammen-nsen i yimuḍan i asen-yesran. D leqdic i d-yettwasḥeḍren lwaḥi d sbiṭar n Xerraṭa uɣur ara rren idammen i d-yettunefken. Ɣer taggara ihi n warmud, lqidar n 35 n yimdanen i yesɛeddan, armi ččurent ddeqs n tculliḍin d idammen ara d-isellken tudert n waṭas n yimuḍan yenṭerren. Ilaq ad d-nesmekti dakken, am yilindi am send-is, tesmurrus dima tdukkla Tiɣri deg ccɣel-a i d-tessuddus, imi tesɛa amḍiq yesfan deg taddart. Ɣef waya, seg teswiɛin timezwura n tnezzayt i bdan yimdanen tisin i tikci n kra seg yidim-nsen, armi d 12:00 n wass. D ayen ilaqen ad d-yettili seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ iqerben, awi-d ukan mi ttarran yidammen-nni n at lxir srid ɣer wid ihelken, war axelles.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Aɣbel-a, yeḍra-d di taddart n Teslent i d-yezgan deg Yilulen n usammer di tama n Uqbu , imi lḥir n useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt d ugama taggara-agi, yuzzel wawal fell-as aṭas di tmurt n Leqbayel.

 Lemḍara-s, tebda tettawweḍ ɣer tezmert n yimezdaɣ , dayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ n Teslent ad d-heggin lḥemlat n usizdeg n yizenqan d tliwa d temqabrin n yiderma n taddart .”Di yal taggara n ddurt, tettilid tcemlit d lufeq i d-ttheggin kra yilmeẓyen i iḥemlen agam’’, i d-yenna Amar Madawi, ameddakkel n ugama. Simal zerrin wussan , simal yettzad lebɣi , simal rennun-d lɣaci i itekkin di lḥemla n tezdeg i d-yettilin deg wass n lǧemɛa.

  I wakken ad d-yili uselḥu n leḥmla –agi akked useddu n yiɣeblan n yimezdaɣ s utekki d lemcawra, sbedden Wat Teslent tajmaɛt n lɛuqqal am wakken xedmen lejdud-nsen zik-nni. Syin akin, sullin-d tiseqquma: tin n twennaḍt , tin n yiɣeblan n tmetti akked d tin n waddal . ‘’Armi i d-tuɣal tejmaɛt n taddart i nemyaɛqal d atmaten s At Teslent. Wama zik, bḍan-aɣ yikabaren n tsertit d tdulkiwin tunṣibin, almi tfuk twizi gar yimezdaɣ ,dɣa ula d iḍuman, zin-aɣ-d s ya u sya’’, I d-yenna Ali Teslent, yiwen yilemẓi i iqedcen ɣef taddart. Ayen ara d-ijebden lwelha n win ara yerzun ɣer teslent d ttawilat xedmen i yiḍuman: yal ssenf n yiḍuman yers weḥd-s, deg umekkan-is. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan yiɛeggalen n taddart , deg wussan i d-teddun, ad tkemmel lḥemla n useɛlem ula ɣer tlawin n taddart. Ad d-ilin yisaragen ideg ara ḥedrent ula d nutenti , imi tezdeg tbeddud deg uxxam, d tameṭṭut i d lsas. ‘’Nessaram tudrin n udewwar n Yiɣram, ad d-ɛandent , iswi nneɣ d tezdeg n udewwar, isaffen-is, tiliwa-s ,akked tzegwa-s. Aya, ad yili ahat, ad yejbed lwelha n yimḍebbren n tmurt-agi, ad seftin deg uḥric n tmerrit’’, i- yenna Dda Lmaǧid At Gana, d leɛqel n taddart deg wawal-is .

<p style="text-align: right;">   Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 Faire trembler mes peurs d azwel i as-yefka umyaru Makhlouf Boughareb n udlis-is-nniḍen i d-yeffɣen yakan ɣer tezriginLes Editions de l’Embellie iwumi tga tugna akked tezwart Marie de Coeur. Deg udlis-a, ad naf ameskar snat n talɣiwin n tsekla i wakken ad d-yini ayen i t-iqerḥen, ama dayen yettidir netta, neɣ dayen yettḥulfu ɣef wiyaḍ. Seg usefru ɣer uḍris, seg targit ɣer tilawt, yettawi, yettarra umyaru, i yellan yakan d anaẓur, d amedyaz u d accenay, uqbel ad yedhem annar-agi n tira, deg usentel ɣer gma-s i wakken ad d-yezzi i Lxuf-is, i Lḥebs ur nesɛi tilisa, i Usiref, i ccna, i Aktayen n temẓi, i Tayri-nni, i Tmagit d tmurt, i Lmut…atg. S tutlayt n tefrensist i yesseraqas akken iwata, yessaweḍ umyaru ad yeg assaɣ gar yisefra akked yiḍrisen, ad d yerr taɣuri d azrar am tmacuhut-nni i d-ttawint temɣarin n zik. Ilul Makhlouf Boughareb deg useggas n 1955 deg Wat Yanni. Yura aṭas n tullisin, isefra d yimagraden n tɣamsa, ama d tid n tmurt ama d tid n berra. Yettaru s snat n tutlayin: tamaziɣt d tefrensist. Gar wayen yura nezmer ad d-nader: “Le chant des larmes”, 2010; “Les cygnes de l’aube”, 2011; “L”Enfer un peu”, 2012; “Moi! Errant, vagabond fourbou…”, “Faire trembler mes terreurs”, d wiyaḍ. Am wakken yewwi arraz n Mulud Mɛemmri s tmaziɣt.

  M. H. 

  
 Ahat llan wid yecfan mi sqedcen iseggasen-a ineggura aɣḍem (timbre) amaziɣ deg tebratin-nsen, mbeɛd mi ten-id-tessufeɣ tesreqqest n Lezzayer (Algérie poste) s tdukkli n Useqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, deg mayu n useggas n 2014. Deg teswiɛt-nni, aṭas i ten-inudan, aṭas i ten-yesqedcen, imi i tikkelt tamezwarut i d-yella deg tmurt n Lezzayer usufeɣ n uɣḍem-a amaziɣ. Maca, kra n wakud kan segmi ttnuzun, wwin-ten lɣaci, uɣalen kfan seg tesreqqas ur ttwawfayen! Amḍan (nombre) n wannect i d-yeffɣen imir-nni, wwḍen almi d 90 n yigiman (alef) ɣef leḥsab n teɣbalut-nneɣ i iqerben i ccɣel-a. Seg wakken jebden-d awellih n umsaɣ (client), ttwasqedcen u kfan s tazzla. Seg wass-nni ulac later n uɣḍem-a, gar wid akk yettwassexdamen ar tura. Ɣef waya, kra n wid i teɛna taluft seg yiɣermanen (citoyens) yeggra-d yettmesteqsay, amek almi ur d-tɛawed tesreqqest n Lezzayer asufeɣ n ukemmic-nniḍen seg uɣḍem amaziɣ ? Ladɣa mi d-iban akken iwulen belli yelḥa imir-nni mi d-yeffeɣ tikkelt tamezwarut, aniɛad tura mi yettwassen. «Ɣas annect-a d azamulan kan (symbolique), lameɛna ulac acu ara d-yewwḍen aḥulfu-nni mi ara ceyyɛeɣ tabrat s uɣḍem amaziɣ. Ula deg tmurt, ad ḥulfuɣ nesɛa amkan am nekk am tutlayt-iw». D awal-a i d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel. Ma newwi-d awal ɣef uɣḍem-a s timmad-is, ad d-nini tewqem ayen din tɣara swayes i t-iga unaẓur. Ama d asuneɣ n aza amaziɣ, neɣ d tasna-nni (surface) d ucebbeḥ-ines. Ugar n sin n yiseggasen tura seg usufeɣ-ines amenzu, zemrent tamiwin i yeddukklen imir-nni ad uɣalent ad zdint i usufeɣ-ines i ti

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni KHalifi 

  
 Akken i d-yettban, tasnawit n Maɛuc Idris n Lberj n Mira, i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Tsexriwt s wazal n 50 n yikilumiṭren ɣef Bgayet, werǧin temlal-d taswiɛt iḥersen am tin deg tella imir-a. Nnig n ddiq ameqqran deg tesmilin ɣef sebba mi ur thegga ara tesnawit n Ayt-Smaɛel, inelmaden akk itetten yettunefk-asen wahil d amaynut n tgella. Seg tcarit n tesnawit ihi (ugar n 1600 n yinelmaden), llant tesmilin i yettawin almi d 40 d anelmad, ladɣa seg wid iḍefren afurek n tussna. Ma yella d asečču n uɣerbaz, segmi teḥres akken s umḍan (nombre) n warrac umi ur tezmir tasnawit, tamehla txemmem ur tesseččay ara yiwen n wass deg ddurt yiwet n tesmilt. Anect-a, acku segmi caḍen warrac, ixeddamen ufan d awezɣi ad ččen merra deg wakud ilaqen. Ihi tifrat-is, yal ass anta tasmilt ara kksen seg wahil. Seg wuguren nniḍen, llan-d daɣen wid i d-yekkan sɣur warrac i d-yettwaḍeggren seg uɣerbaz. Wiyi llan ssuturen tuɣalin-nsen almi ttagen tiganin (grèves) yal ass. Aɣilif-a idum kra n wussan almi i d-yesuddes unemhal n tesnawit anejmuɛ akked uselway n tɣiwant n tsexriwt ed yibabaten n warrac. Mi sqerdcen awal ɣef taluft yellan, ssawḍen i ugemmuḍ igerrez acku seg wass-nni tsemmed tɣuri deg tesnawit am dima. Tiganin llant ḍurrent akk inelmaden ladɣa wid n uswir wis-kraḍ i yesɛeddayen BAK, acku akken i d-tenna tneɣlaft n usegmi, BAK n useggas-a ibeddu mara yebdu useggas skud ikraḍyuren (trimestres) merra, ad ttwiḥesben deg leḥsab aneggaru. Ihi yal akayad s wazal-is seg tura ma bɣan meqqar warrac ad rren ddhen-nsen seg tura ugar i tɣuri-nsen. Akken i t-id-nenna tazwara, aḥcar-a yakk yella-d imi ur tewjid ara tesnawit n Ayt Smaɛel akken ad tesduri tarwa-s i yeɣɣaren deg tesnawit n Maɛuc Idris. Asenfar n tesnawit n Ayt Smaɛel yettwajerred ugar n 6 n yiseggasen ɣer deffir, maca ar tura werɛad tekkis, meḥsub ala 60% seg lecɣal i yemuggen ar ass-a. Aselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel yenna i tiliẓri Djayer Tv dakken tasnawit-a tɛedda-d seg waṭas n yiɣilifen, ma yella acimi ur thegga ar tura akken i d-yewwi lḥal, ɣef leḥsab-is, acku yal yiwen ixeddem ayen i as-yehwan war ma yella d amasay (responsable). Tinermisin (entreprises) merra i d-iɛeddan syinna ur d-wwint ayen yellan yetturaǧu deg-sent. Ɣef waya, imḍebren n tɣiwant ufan ur d sswab ad ldin tasnawit i yiwen n uswir neɣ sin, netta iqeddicen mazal tsemmiden dinna. Taɣellist n yinelmaden tezzwar takkit, ɣas ma tḥeyyiren s waṭas rnu tebɛed cwiṭ tesnawit deg ɣɣaren tura. Ad d-nefk aneɣmis belli tasnawit n Ayt Smaɛel ad theggi d abrid i qabel akken i aɣ-d-yenna uselway n tɣiwant. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Ussan yezrin, 7 deg wayyur n yulyu, i d-uɣalen yigemmad ineggura n umsizwer n yiselmaden deg waṭas n taggayin (catégories). Deg wayen yeɛnan anadi ɣef yimeḍqan n uselmed sɣur wid yesɛan turagt deg tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ, imi yimɣur azuḥ wazal n tmaziɣt deg tmurt. Ddeqs n yilmeẓyen iwumi d-yezmummeg lḥal tikkelt-a, ttwaqeblen dayen i uselmed n tutlayt n Lmulud At Mɛemmer seg tuɣalin tiɣurbizin i d-iteddun deg ctember, i lmend n useggas amaynut 2016/2017. Ɣas llan wid i wumi i d-tsaḥ tegnit ad sseɣren nutni ur sɛin aseggas segmi i d-wwin turagt, llan wiyaḍ d iseggasen ttraǧun taswiɛt-a, nutni war axeddim. War ma nettu wid ur d-nedda akk tikkelt-a deg wid irebḥen. Seg wid i d-teṭṭef dɣa tegnit n tumert ussan-a yezrin, nesteqsa kra, fkan-aɣ-d tinagiyin-nsen. Am tin n Ḥsen seg Tizi. «Ferheɣ aṭas seg ugemmuḍ. Ulama llan diɣen wid yuklalen ad d-awin amsizwer ur t-id-wwin, maca mazal asirem ɣer sdat. Ayen yeɛnan amsizwer di tmaziɣt iɛedda di teswiɛin igerrzen, ama d tira neɣ d adiwenni».

 Ma yella d Nawal seg Bgayet, tban-d am tin i d-yessufɣen «ukit», ladɣa mi d-iban umsizwer n useggas-a yexḍa i urbaḥ-nni n seddaw ufus, mi d-tenna: «Akken walaɣ, ikayaden d yisteqsiyen sehlen i yal aselmad. Seld leɛtab meqqren d miḥyaf i d-yellan di teɣzi n waṭas n yiseggasen, deg temsizzelt-a, ladɣa di temnaḍt n Bgayet, umreɣ imi d-yelḥeq wass nwala iselmaden wwin-d imukan n uselmed war tijeɛɛal, war timusniwin yeffɣen annar n tmussni n wannar. Ma d asirem-iw, nessaram ayen i nelmed deg tesdawit, ladɣa sin n yiseggasen n Master di taɣult n tusnalmudt n tutlayin, ur yettruḥ ara di rrayeḥ. Nessaram ad nesnerni aselmed n tutlayt-nneɣ, ad tt-ḥemmlen yinelmaden ad tt-lemmden akken iwata».

 Afud igerrzen ihi i wid i t-id-iḥellan, ttiɛad deg ctember i beddu n termit tameqqrant deg wannar-a n usker n tsutiwin.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Tiddukkla tadelsant “Smaɛil Azikiw” n taddart n Tawrirt n War, yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n At Ziki, akked waṭas n yimsuddsen-nniḍen gar-asen, Tasqamut n taddart Tawrirt n War, Asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n At Ziki, Asgamu unniɣ n timuzɣa, Tenmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, Asqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, s tallelt n waṭas n yimallalen n tɣamsa yecban, aɣmis n “la Dépêche de Kabylie”, heggan-d tazrigt tis ukuẓ n tfaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt “Smaɛil Azikiw”. D timsizzelt i d-yellan gar 10 d 12 deg waggur-agi n ɣuct ideg nella, deg taddart n Tawrirt n War yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n At Ziki. Aseggas-agi, gan-tt d tajmilt i yiwen umedyaz ameqqran n tama-agi n At Ziki, wagi d Dda Lounis Azzi, yettwassnen s umennuɣ-is s ttawil n tikta d yisefra ɣef yidles d tmagint tamaziɣt. Imedyazen d tmedyazen ara yettekkin deg temsizzelt-agi n tmedyazt deg tezrigt-is tis ukuẓ, yuɣ lḥal uznen kraḍ n yisefra-nsen ɣer tansa-agi: <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="c3b0aea2aaafa2b9aaa8aab483a4aea2aaafeda0acae" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a>. Tallit n uceggeɛ n yisefra tedda ɣef teɣzi n waggur s lekmal-is, imi bdan ttaznen isfra-nsen yimedyazen seg wass-nni n 10 yunyu 2017 alamma d ass n 10 yulyu 2017. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, imedyazen ara yettekkin ilaq ad ilin ceggɛen isefra imaynuten, ttwarun s tlatinit s ttawil n uselkim, yerna ur yettaru ara isem-is neɣ uṭṭun n tilifun-is deg yisefra-s. Ilaq yal amedyaz ad sɛun 18 n yiseggasen d asawen di leɛmer. Am wakken daɣen ara d-nesmekti belli, d tafaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt, imi tiwwura-s ldint i yal amedyaz amaziɣ. Ttilin yimedyazen s tantaliyin yemxalafen, yecban, tacawit, tamẓabit, tatergit…

 Ma d ahlil i d-yellan ɣef teɣzi n 3 wussan, yerza temsizzelt n tmedyazt, ccna, isefra berra n temsizzelt, amezgun, isaragen, timsiniyin ɣef tudert Smaɛil Azikiw akked Mass Lounis Azzi i wumi tuɣal tejmilt aseggas-agi, isenza s ubuddu n yidlisen, timsikniyin n yidlisen…atg.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Taggara n talɣuɣa taɣelnawt n ddabex n uḍar tella-d s usuref n terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n Leqbayel s amkan wis krad, mi akken medden rǧan akk amkan wis 2 i d-tḥella uqbel ad tecceḍ deg unnar n Ṣtif d umɛadal i d-tewwi sdat tarbeɛt n Wehran deg Tizi Ouzou.

 D acu kan, di tizwar, tuget n wid iḥemmlen JSK irkeb-iten lḥir imi walan tarbeɛt-nsen tetturar ma ad teqqim deg uḥric amenzu neɣ ad tṣub ɣer wis 2. Wicqa ! Awidukan imi tessaweḍ s aswir-a. Iwakken ad yessuzef lḥif ɣef terbeɛt, aselway Moḥ Cherif Hannachi yessejhed JSK i useggas I d-iteddun s kra n tgejda yecban benkablia d Herbache i d-yusan seg ASMO, rnu ɣur-sen Yettou yellan yakan deg Larebɛa d uɛessas n ucebbak Malik Asselah i d-yuɣalen ɣer terbaɛt-is n zik. Ɣas akken imyurar-a d wid ara ibeddlen udem I JSK ɣer sdat, maca ur qniɛen ara yimḍebbren d ayen i ten-yeǧǧan ldin tiwwura i Adel Djerrar n terbaɛt n Relizane akked Redouani n USMA iwakken ad d-yernu tirmit-is ɣer tlemmast n unnar. Ɣef leḥsab n waṭas n wid yeṭṭafaren aḥric-a n waddal, d tikkelt tamenzut i d-yessefsi Hannachi tadrimt iwulmen i tiwin n yimyurar iwulmen, acku iseggasen-a ineggura nwala dakken tuget n wid i d-yenced ur d-wwin kra n umaynut i terbaɛt ma mačči d tiggulelt ama deg yiswan ama deg wurar icebḥen. Seg tama nniḍen, sin n yimyurar iberraniyen n tmurt n Burkinabé Diawara akked Malo yuzzel fell-asen wawal dakken ad uraren deg useggas i d-iteddun di tmurt n Maser. Diawara i d-tessuter terbaɛt n Zamalek ata-n ad iruḥ ɣer Semouha netta d mmi-s n tmurt-is imi tarbeɛt-a d tin i yessulin tafaṭurt i tella tettraju-tt JSK. D ayen ara d-yeskecmen mebla ccekk tadrimt meqqren i s ara tqabel terbaɛt n Leqbayel taswiɛt-a n uncad n yimyurar imaynuten. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> S. M 

  
  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen: ma tzemreḍ ad aɣ-d-temmeslayeḍ ɣef tudert-im, uqbel leqdic-im?  

 Touati Zoulikha: Uqbel ad bduɣ tira, lliɣ ḥekkuɣ timucuha i warrac n tadart-iw, tid n zik akked tid i d-snulfuyeɣ nekk s timmad-iw. Lawan-nni, ad yili deg leεmer-iw 13 neɣ 14 n yiseggasen kan. Syin akkin timucuha-agi i d-snulfuyeɣ, tettuɣ-tent, imi ur tent-ttaruɣ ara. Mi ara i yi-d ssutren warrac ad asen-d-εiwdeɣ tamacahut, qqareɣ-asen timucuha-nni mačči n ssaḥ. Akken alammi i wwḍeɣ 16 n yisseggasen, dɣa ḥebseɣ-d leqraya n uɣerbaz deg useggas 1982, qqimeɣ deg uxxam. D acu kan selleɣ aṭas i umaṭṭaf amezwaru s tutlayt n taɛrabt akked wis sin s teqbaylit, selleɣ i tedwilin i icudden ɣer tmedyazt d tmucuha, dɣa ufiɣ iman-iw iεjeb-iyi lḥal, nniɣ-as i yiman-iw: ayɣer ala ur ttaruɣ ara ayen xeddmeɣ?

  Amek I d-yella usurif-im amenzu deg tira? Lliɣ qqareɣ-as ɣef wacu ara aruɣ? 

 Amek i zemreɣ ad aruɣ? Imi tira mačči d ayen isehlen. Tettban-d i win ur nettaru ara d ayen yessewhamen. Maca refdeɣ imru, giɣ deg-s laman, rniɣ tattafttart tazeddgant, bdiɣ tira s tutlayt taεrabt. Imawlan-iw ur qbilen ara ayen xtareɣ, nutni ad qqimeɣ deg uxxam am nekk am tezyiwin-iw, ula d asmi zewǧeɣ, ttaruɣ s tufra. Ilḥa zzman, uɣaleɣ d tayemat n 6 warraw-iw, ma yella d mmi wis sebεa d tira. Lmektub yura, ad d-yeffeɣ wayen uriɣ, xas akken asmi lliɣ ttaruɣ ur rǧǧiɣ ara ass yecban ass-a. Lliɣ ttaruɣ kan i yiman-iw, tekkseɣ lxiq mi ara iliɣ weḥd-i, neɣ mi ara iliɣ d leḥbab-iw, suturen-iyi-d ad asen-d-alles taɣuri i yisefra iwumi i slan yakkan, dɣa d annect-agi i yi-gan afud ad kemmleɣ amecwar-iw.

  I umecwar-im deg tira, amek i t-tebdiḍ?  

 Bdiɣ tira s tutlayt taεrabt, imi d tin i ɣriɣ deg uɣerbaz. Asmi i kecmeɣ s axxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, i wakken ad lemdeɣ tameslayt-iw. Dɣa dinna i yi-id ldint tewwura, ufiɣ iman-iw ttaruɣ s tutlayt tmaziɣt, syin uɣaleɣ uriɣ tamedyazt d tmucuha s teqbaylit. Ma d amecwar-iw n tira ar ass-a, ssuffɣeɣ-d tamacahut tamezwarut, s teqbaylit tewwi azwel n “Inuda ɣef zzher-is, yufa-t”, i d- yeffɣen deg useggas n 2012 ɣer tezrigin EL AMEL n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Syin akkin, d ammud n yisefra s taεrabt, giɣ-as azwel “Acmumeḥ deg teṭṭucin iḥeznen”, i d-ssasergeɣ deg useggas n 2013 ɣer tezrigin Tirroir. D ammud ideg llan 47 n yisefra, bḍan ɣef sin n yiḥricen; aḥric amezwaru s tmeslayt n tɣerfant n teɛrabt, yettwassnen s yisem n “derǧa”, ma d aḥric wis sin s tmeslayt takadimit n teɛrabt, yettwassnen s yisem n “lfusḥa”. Sakin, qqimeɣ armi d 2014, i wakken ad rnuɣ adlis-iw wis tlata, i yellan d tamacahut tis snat, xedmeɣ-as azwel “Yelli-s n yiɛiqer” , i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin n EL AMEL. Aseggas mebɛed, rniɣ-d ammud-iw wis sin n yisefra, acu kan, tikkelt-agi s teqbaylit, yewwi azwel “Awal ibennu, yetthudu”, i d-ssasergeɣ ɣer tezrigin Tirroir, llan deg-s 35 n yisefra, s teqbaylit. Ihi ar imir-a, ɣur-i ukkuẓ n yidlisen, sin d snat n tmucuha s teqbaylit, ma d sin-nni-nniḍen d ammuden n tmedyazt yiwen s taɛrabt wayeḍ s tesqbaylit.

  Amek armi s snat n tutlayin i tettaruḍ?  

 Ula ma bdiɣ tira n tmedyazt s tutlayt n taɛrabt, imi s tina i d-kreɣ i ɣriɣ deg uɣerbaz, maca deg uḥric n usizreg zwareɣ-d s teqbaylit. Imi d nettat i d tutlayt n tyemmat, kecmeɣ deg yiseggasen yezrin ɣer usikew n tmaziɣt, yellan deg Uxxam n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, dinna i d-lemdeɣ amek ara aruɣ tamaziɣt. Dɣa uɣaleɣ ttaruɣ tikta-w s teqbaylit-iw.

  Amek tettwaliḍ kemm tira?  

 Tira tessekcam-iyi deg yiman-iw, qqareɣ-d yis-s ayen i yi-qerḥen, ayen i yi-jerḥen, ayen i yi-sferḥen…atg Ttafeɣ iman-iw deg-s, surugeɣ iḥulfan-iw deg-s, d timuɣliwin-iw. Ḥekkuɣ-d yis-s lhem-iw gar-iyi d yimru d kra ttefttarin.

  Jmel-aɣ-d isental igejdanen iɣef tettaruḍ?  

 Isental ɣef wayef ttaruɣ ama s taɛrabt neɣ s tmaziɣt, ama deg tmedyazt neɣ deg wayen-nniḍen, mxalafen seg usefru ɣer gma-s neɣ s tmacahut ɣer tayeḍ. Ihi ttaruɣ ɣef tmurt, tmeṭṭut, twennaḍt, tmetti…atg.

  Tettiliḍ deg yal tafaska n tmedyazt, acu n sser n waya?  

 D tidet, ttekkaɣ deg waṭas n tfaskiwin akked d temliliyen n tmedyazt deg ddeqs n yimukan, deg tmurt-nneɣ. Ad ad-bduɣ seg Tizi Uzzu, ttekkaɣ deg tfaska n tmedyazt n Si Muḥ u Mḥend akked Yusef u Qasi deg Ubizar, seg useggas n 2007 alammi 2011, tafaskan n Smaεil Azikiw deg Buzeggan, daɣen timliliyen i d-yettilin s umata deg Uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer. Am wakken diɣ i ttekkaɣ deg tfaskiwin-nniḍen i d-yellan berra n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yecban lwilaya n Nεama d lwilaya n Tlemsan,Tisemsilt deg 2013 akked 2015. Deg Bgayet, ttekkaɣ deg tfaska n Udrar n fad deg At Samaɛel, seg 2007 alammi d 2013, tafeska Itri adelsan n Uqbu seg 2008 alammi d 2013. Ula deg Tubiret, ttekkaɣ deg tfaska texdem Tiddukkla n Tigejda deg 2012, daɣen tafeska i d-yellan deg Mecdellah deg useggas iɛeddan. Nekk, ur ttruḥuɣ ara i wakken ad d-awiɣ arraz n tfaskiwin n tmedyazt, d ayemi qqareɣ: “Uqbel arraz, tafaska d aɣerbaz, i win yebɣan tamussni d unadi”.

  Tuɣal-am tejmit ass-nni n 08 meɣres iɛeddan, amek i as-tḥulfaḍ I wanect-a?  

 Uqbel ad d-mmeslayeɣ ɣef tejmilt i yi-yuɣalen i nekk d 4 n tlawin-nniḍen, ass-nni n 08 meɣrs 2017 deg Uxxam n yidles n akked Uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine, ad snimmreɣ wid i yi-tt-yerran, ama d Tanmehla n Yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ama d Axxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer, ama d Axxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine. S ferḥen-iyi aṭas, gan-iyi ccan, fkan-iyi azal d ameqqran, sersen-iyi gar tlawin i ikecmen deg umezruy. Tanemmirt-nsen s tussda akken ma llan, yal aεeggal s yisem-is.

  Ma llan yisenfaren akka ɣer sdat?  

 Xas akken aṭas n yisenfaren i sεiɣ, ama deg tmedyazt, timucuha, amezgun…atg, maca tura, ad hedreɣ kan ɣef wungal-iw amezwaru, iεerkeɣ, inni-d yekfa mazal-as kan kra ureqeε d uwenneε. Ssarameɣ ad d-yeffeɣ ɣer taggara n useggas-agi, giɣ-as azwel “Tidet deg targit”. D yiwet n teqsiḍt yeḍran, meεna ulac aṭas i as-yecban, hedreɣ-d ɣef kra n leεwayed yellan gar yimdanen n zik-nni, s yiwen wudem yeččuren d tafelsafit.

  Imi d taselwayt n Tiddukkla tadelsant Ixulaf n Ǧerǧer, mmeslay-d ɣef wahil-nwen…  

 S yisem-iw d yisem n yiεeggalen n Tiddukkla tadelsent “Ixulf n Ǧerǧer” n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i d-ilulen aseggas-agi n 2017, i iqeddcen i lmend n yigerdan, yesεan leεmer gar 5 n yiseggasen alammi d 16 n yiseggasen. Tiddukkla, tebɣa ad d-tesban imura yettarun i lmend n warrac, wiyaḍ xuṛsem ad rren lwalha-nsen ɣer tira n yigerdan. Ma d ahil n tiddukkla, nessaram ad yili d amerkanti, amecwar-is ɣezzif, xas mačči d ayen isehlen, nesaram-asen afud iǧehden, leqdic iwenεen, teɣzi n leεmer i tiddukkla-agi.

  D acu n lexsas i d-tmuger tiddukkla-agi-nwen?  

 Tiddukkla tadelsent “Ixulaf n Ǧerǧer”, mazal-itt d tamaynut, akken kan i d-tlul, warεad teẓri ayen i tt-ixuṣen, taswiεt-agi ulac ugur i d-temuger.

  Amek-it leqdic deg umussu asddukkan deg tmurt-nneɣ?  

 Seg ucrured ɣer tikli, ur yeshil ara imi win iqeddcen deg umussu asddukklan, tewwid fell-as ad yeqbel ayen ara as-sbibben xas ma yella dir-it. Ilaq ad yeǧǧ aṭas lecɣal-is, yezmer ad innal ula d lebɣi-is ma tewwi-d ayɣer ala.

  Awal-im n taggara…  

 Awal n taggara, ssarameɣ talwit idumen, leqdic azeddgan, i yal azzayri, ncallah kra n win yebɣan kra neɣ yessarem kra, ad t-yawweḍ. Ad iniɣ tanemmirt i uɣmis « La dépêche de Kabylie » i yi-fkan tagnit-agi i wakken ad d-mmleɣ ɣef leqdic-iw deg yiḥricen-agi n tmedyazt akked tira. Ssarameɣ, ad nernin yisebtar n tmaziɣt deg uɣmis-agi-nwen iwumi ssarameɣ afud ameqqran u ad yili i lebda.

  Yesteqsa-tt Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 I lmend n usmekti n tmettant n Mouloud Mammeri, thegga-d Tiddukkla n yiselmaden n Tizi Uzzu, am yal aseggas, timsizzelt n tzabut i yettilin d tajmilt i Lmulud At Mɛemmer. Ɣef wanect-a, ttaznen iɛeggalen n tiddukkla-agi ɣer yiɣerbazen tinnubga anda ṭṭalaben deg yiselmaden n tmaziɣty i wakken ad d-heggin anelmad yesnen ad yaru tamaziɣt. Ttaznen-asen daɣen snat n tferkiyin akken ad tent-id-ɛemren, yiwet i yimawlan n unelmad ma d tayeḍ i unemhal n uɣerbaz. Yettili-d uheggi i tzabut-a ugar n sin wagguren uqbel. Ass n timsizzelt ad yili ass n 11 deg furar, ad d-asen yiselmaden neɣ yimawlan n yinelmaden-agi ara yettekkin , ad asen-xedmen timsizzelt n tzabut. Timsizzelt-agi, ad tili uxxam les œuvres sociales i d-yezgan tama n wadda n sbiter Neddir Mohmed. Ma d tiririt n wid i d-yufraren ad tili ddurt taneggarut n furar, imi yewweḍ leɛfu n Rebbi Lmulud At Mɛemmer ass n 26 deg furar 1989, ad fell-as yeɛfu Rebbi. Tettili tikci n warrazen i yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg Uxxam n yidles Mouloud Mammer, acu kan taggara–agi kra n yiselmaden ur d-ttawin ara inelmaden-nsen : ‘’qqarren amek ara sɛaddin azal n 400 ad d-ufraren kan 3’’. Bɣan ad ilin ugar n 3 acku drus. Ma yella d wiyaḍ, ttawin-ten-id s tumert deg-s anelmad ad imlil d yinelmaden n yiɣerbazen-nniḍen, deg-s ad ressin deg-s tayri n tira. Ad yefk azal i tira am wakken i d-yenna Dda Lmulud : ‘’win yebɣan tamziɣt, ad yissin tira-s’’. Yenna-d daɣen Nour Ould Amara : ‘’tamaziɣt akken ad tidir ilaq-as abrid n tira’’, d wagi i d abrid i as-ilaqen akken ad teğğuğeg wa ad tennerni.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia At yahia  

  
 ‘’Timussniwin d usnerni-nsent deg tefriqt ugafa’’, d asentel agejdan iɣef mmeslayen yiselmaden d yimnuda, i yemlalen ddurt iɛeddan deg tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu.

 Ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan, wwin-d awal yimussnawen-agi, i d-yusan seg yal tama, ama dagi deg tmurt neɣ deg berra, ɣef yimekwan d wamek i d-yettili wulmud akked uleqqem n tmussniwin deg umezruy deg tmurt n tmazɣa. Asarag amezwaru yefka-t-id Hugh Roberts n tesdawit n Marikan, deg umeslay-is netta, ur yeqbil ara tamuɣli n yimussnawen Bourdieu, Jeanne Favret akked Gellner i d-yeqqaren d akken d assaɣen n timarawt ɣef wayeg tebna tmetti deg tmurt n leqbayel. Sebba n waya, ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna Hugh, d akken imussnawen-agi ur nudan ara s telqayt i wakken ad zren belli llant tuddsiwin-nniḍen ɣef wayeg tebna taddart. Netta yeqqar seg zik d tasertit i iḥekkmen deg tmurt n leqbayel : deg tejmaɛt mačči d assaɣen n timarawt i iferrun timsal. Seg tama-s Anaris Mohamed n tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmri, netta yewwi-d awal, dɣa, ɣef ubeddel akked wudem-nniḍen i yuɣen wassaɣen n timarawt deg tallit-agi i deg-i tettidir taddart n leqbayel anda i d-yella wayen yettḥettimen ɣef yimdanen i wakken ad brun ciṭ i tid n zik u ad ddun akked d tigi n tura. Ma d Karim Salhi n tesdawit, diɣ, n Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, yefka-d amek i d-tlul tɣermi deg tudrin n leqbayel. Deg yiwen unadi i yexdem ɣef yiwet n taddart deg tama-agi n Yiǧer, yufa-d d akken ‘’tettlal-d tɣermi-agi deg leqdicat i txeddem taddart. Leqdicat i yettḥatmen fell-as deg tudert-is, yecban asiweḍ n waman, aseqɛed n yiberdan, aseḥbiber ɣef ugama d wayen-nniḍen. D irmad-agi i d-yeslulen tiɣermi deg tallit-agi i deg-i nella’’, i d-yenna-d Mass Salhi Karim. Seg tama n tmeslayt, d Mass Kahlouche Rabah i yerran ddehn-is ɣef umawal n teqbaylit anda i d-yenna d akken ‘’46% n wawal i d-yeqqar umdan yessnen kan taqbaylit, kkan-d seg taɛrabtn, xas ulamma wid i d-yettasen zedɣen deg yidurar n tmurt n leqbayel, i yellan heddren taɛrabt, ttuɣalen ttutlayen taqbaylit’’, i iwala uselmad-agi n tesdawit MMTU. ‘’Tala deg tmurt n leqbayel’’, d asentel-nniḍen i ɣef i temmeslay Halit Sadjia i d-yennan d akken tala mačči kan d amekkan anda i d-ttagmen aman, acu kan d amekkan anda ttemlilint tlawin, heddrent u xeddment leqdicat-nniḍen. ‘’Xas ulamma stehzan deg-sent yimezdaɣ n tmurt n leqbayel seg wasmi i kecmen waman s axxam, acu kan ha-ten-in la ttuɣalen ɣur-sen, u ad tent-seqqɛaden imi i tent-ḥesben d izumal akka tura’’ i twala temsaragt. Deg yimekwan-a u s leqdicat-a i d-ttilint tmussniwin akked usnerni-nsent deg tmetti s umata, zyada ɣef yiɣerbazen akken walan yimussnawen deg temlilit-agi.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Am yal anebdu, tamurt n Leqbayel yettrajun tallit-a i tmeγriwin d tisin n warraw-is seg lγerba, tettuγal d amraḥ i lhem n tmes i d-ittfeggiden d iɛeğğağen, tesseblaɛ mebla tawant ayen akken akk i tesɛa d lxir.

 Akken kan yendeh uzγal n unebdu, yekker uhetwir deg yimezda&amp;gamma,; imi ajajiḥ n tmes yewweḍ-d s ixxamen. Dγa, akken kan ara tkecmed Dreɛ Lmizan, mi ara d-tekkeḍ seg Tubiret, nnig neγ ddaw n ubrid, ulac amkan i tezgel : yerγa uzegzaw, yegla s uquran. Urtiyen imerra beddlen ssifa, tizzegzewt tdel-itt tebrek n tmulin, akal d amellal seg yiγiγden. Jbu akken alamma d ilel, Timizar qrib i kfant. Ulamma iγallen n usellek ur γfilen ara, maca ttawilat i kesben ur zmiren ad qablen yis-sen tawaγit i d-yersen. D imezdaγ s timmad-nsen i ibekksen, yal wa s wacu i wakken ad rren tilas i ujajiḥ. D azγal yewwḍen s ayen ur iqebbel leɛqel, akessar d usawen rnu ddiq n yiberdan ! S wacu ara iqabel umdan nnger i d-yersen γef tmurt ? Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i nesɛa, d luluf n yihiktaren i yerγan seg yimγan d yisekla. Tiγrasin n tzizwa ur yelli leḥsab, iγersiwen ama d wid n lexla ama d wid yettrebbi umdan. Meɛna tamsalt n terwiḥin ur tesɛi tawwurt. Dγa akka tura, deg uzeṭṭa imetti i d-yewwedḍ yisalli n tmettant n yiwen n yilemẓi n 17 n yiseggasen di leɛmer-is deg taddart n At Lqayed deg Yiwadiyen. Ilemẓi-a, yellan yuḍen buneggaf, ur yessaweḍ ara ad yizmir i unaγur d ddexxan i d-tettak tmes, dγa yessufeγ tarwiḥt. Ula d amγar-nni meskin yuzzlen ad d-isellek aγersiw-is, ur t-zgilen ara yilsawen n tmes. Ayen iḥuzan ass-a azamul n tmurt n Leqbayel d tazemmurt-nni yuγalen d iγed ! Ur telli d aseklu yecban wiyad, imi yis-s i yettwassen, seg-s i d-yettawi rrezq-is. Ur nezmir ad d-nini acḥal i yerγan, meɛna lexsara meqqert. Deg tama n wadda, lewhi n Bgayet, liḥala ur tgerrez ara, dγa d taddart n Tigrin deg Yiγzer Ameqran i yettkuffuten akka tura. D tiγri akka i d-gren waṭas n yimdanen i usiweḍ n waman γer dinna. Maca, akken yebγu Uqbayli yili, deg teswiɛin n ddiq yekfa wuγal γer deffir. Aya, beggnen-t-id deg yal taswiɛt, almi ula d times qublen-tt s ttawilat meẓziyen meɛna s tebγest iǧehden. Ass-a, awal yuzzelen deg yilsawen : γer melmi ara tettidir tmurt n Leqbayel lihḥala-a n tmes n yal aseggas ?

  M. S.
