 Deg ass n 19 meɣres, yerza-d ɣer lwilaya n Bgayet uneɣlaf n tenzut mass Amara Benyounes anda i yessefqed aṭas n yisenfaren icudden ɣer tdamsa. Tirza-agi i d-yeɣlin deg ass n usmekti n lɛid n ternawt (19 meɣres 1962), ifures deg-s tagnit mass Amara Benyounes akken ad yerr tajmilt i yimeɣrasen n tegrawla n tmurt d yimeɣrasen n tugdut.  Deg Usebded n Umeɣras n temdint n Bgayet, mass Amara Benyounes yessers tamuqint n yijeǧǧigen, yerna daɣen yeḥḍer i tmeɣra tamezwarut n tfaska tis tesɛa n ccna agrawliw n yilmeẓyen i d-yettilin yal aseggas di lwilaya n Bgayet. Mbeɛd tajmilt i iga i yimeɣrasen, mass aneɣlaf n tenzut, yessefqed ɣef yisenfaren icudden ɣer uḥric n tdamsa anda i yeldi yiwen n ssuq yellan tama n ubrid n Wawras, yerna daɣen yessefqed ɣef lecɣal n useggem n ssuq n ujemmal yellan di Sidi Ɛli Lebḥer. Am wakken daɣen i yeldi axxam amaynut n tenmehla n tenzut  yerna  yessefqed ɣef ssrabes d tdeblin-nniḍen icudden ɣer uḥric n tenzut di lwilaya am labuṛatwaṛ CACQE yellan deg ubrid Krim Belkacem. Di tirza-ya daɣen, mass aneɣlaf n tenzut yessefqed ɣef tkebbaniyin timeqqranin yellan di lwilaya ama d CEVITAL neɣ takebbanit Ifri yellan deg tɣiwant n Wawzellagen d tkebbanit n yisufar n uyefki  Soummam yellan deg Uqbu anda  yemlal d yimḍebbren d yixeddamen n tkebbunay-agi yerna yesla i yiɛewwiqen d wuguren i ttmagaren di lxedma-nsen.   <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>          

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mokrane Chikhi  

  
 Thegga-d ass n acer 20 ɣuct iɛeddan Tdukkla Agraw Tigawt Ilemẓiyen (Raj) yiwen n usarag akken ad d-tberreḥ s yigemmaḍ n uḥedqis (sondage) i tga gar 25 mayu d 15 yunyu, i lmend n tefranin tisaḍufanin yezrin. Asarag-a, i d-yellan deg tmaneɣt, yemmug-d sɣur uselway n tdukkla-a i d-nebder Mass Ɛebdelwahab Fersawi, akked Mass Ḥmed Helfawi, d amazzag deg uḥedqis n rray. Ɣef wawal-nsen, ilemẓiyen n tmurt n Lezzayer beɛden aṭas ɣef tsertit, am akken ɣunfan akk ikabaren isertanen. Amedya seg yigemmaḍ-nni, ad naf ala 19% n yilmeẓyen i kecmen deg walbaɛḍ n yikabaren deg tudert-nsen. Rnu ɣer-s iban-d d akken azal n 43% ur nettamen ikabaren d tigawt-nsen. Ma yella d wid ur d-nenni ayen yelhan ɣef yikabaren, yewweḍ leḥsab-nsen ɣer 30%. D ayen i d-yesbegginen s uwekked amek ɛuffen yilemẓiyen annar n tsertit. « Nekni nella nebɣa ad nẓer amek yettwali yilemẓi tasertit di tmurt. Dɣa neffeɣ ɣer unnar deg 41 n twilayin, anida nesteqsa azal n 1462 n yilmeẓyen n yal taggayt ». I aɣ-d-yenna uselway n tdukkla Raj, Mass Fersawi Abdelwahab, send ad d-yernu: « Ɣer taggara, iban-d d akken ilaq ɣef yimdebbren d yikabaren ad ɛiwden tamuɣli d tikli i tsertit-nsen. Aya d ayen i d-yettnebbihen s wayen n diri meskud ilmeẓyen ttbeɛɛiden ttahdan seg tsertit ».

  M. K. 

  
 Aṭas i la yessuturen, deg yiseggasen-agi iεeddan, i wakken tamaziγt ad tuγal d tutlayt tunṣibt deg tmendawt i d-iteddun, ladγa, wigi ixeddmen tasertit. Xas ulamma amennuγ  γef tmaziγt s wudem-agi asertan yeṣsaweḍ ad d-yerr azal i yidles amaziγ deg yixemmimen d yiḥulfan γer yimdanen s umata, meεna aseqdec n tutlayt deg unnar ur d-yegli s kra : si zik, ‘’ anda akken i tufeg i ters’’. I wacuγer i tugi teqbaylit ad treṣṣi deg yinaw asertan ? D acu-tt  tyersi-agi i tt-icudden deg tmetti imi tugi ad d-tessenser ?

 Zik, mi ara temmeslayeḍ s teqbaylit deg temdint, qqaren-as d amdan n udrar ur neγri ara. Ihi, i wakken bab-is ad yezger aεewwiq i as-d-xelqen neγ i d-yexleq, ahat,  netta deg wallaγ-is, ad yekker ad yemmeslay tutlayt-nniḍen. Ma yeγra, ad yesseqdec taṛumit, ma ur yeγri ara, ad yettmeslay taεrabt i wakken ad yerr iman-is neγ ad d-yesbin dakken deg temdint i yezdeγ mačči deg udrar. Yella ula deg lemtel :’’win ikecmen tamdint yiwen wass, yerra iman-is d aḥeḍri (citadin). Aṭas i yeddan deg lεeb-agi armi yuγal d tannumi deg tsertit. 

 Amdan aserti mi ara yeffeγ γer taddart, deg lawan n tefranin, ad asen-yettmeslay i yimezdaγ-nni s teqbaylit. Acu kan mi ara yeg asarag daxel n tzeqqa, ad ibeddel udem, ad yerr iman-is d wayeḍ : ad yesseqdec tameslayt-nniḍen i wakken ad d-iban yeqfez, yeγra. Xas ulamma amur ameqqran ur t-id-fhimen ara, ur t-id-tewqiε ara lmeεna, ur d-yecliε ara deg-sen. Awi-d kan ad d-yesbin, ‘’yeḥrec, yeγra’’. Ula d anejmuε gar-asen deg usqamu aγerfan n tγiwant neγ deg usqamu aγerfan n lwilaya, taqbaylit-nni ur tt-id-yettawi umeddaḥ deg teqṣiṭ alamma zzint-d tefranin.

 Ass-a, imi tekcem tmaziγt γer uγerbaz, win yettmeslayen, ihi, taqbaylit d win yeγran. Ilaq ad tt-yettmeslay umdan-nni i wakken ad d-yesbin iman-is yeγra. Meεna ula deg teswiεt yecban ta, imdanen ur tt-sseqdacen ara. Mi i ten-tesseqsaḍ i wacuγer ur tt-sseqdacen ara, ad ak-d-inin :’’ur nezmir ara ad d-nini kulec s tmaziγ. Ulac awal n waya neγ waya.Yerna d tagi i d tugdut, yal yiwen ad yemmeslay akken yebγa ’’ Ha-tent-in llulent-d sebbat-nniḍen γur-sen i wakken ur sseqdacen ara taqbaylit. Tigi d sebbat kan γef wuguren n wawalen n teqbaylit imi deg Uγmis n Yimaziγen nessaweḍ nemmeslay-d s teqbaylit γef yal asentel, ama d win icudden γer tmetti, tadawsa, tadamsa, asegmi d tezmert…atg

 Nesteqsa kra n yimḍebbren deg usqamu aγerfan n lwilaya γef yiswi-nsen imi xedmen yiwen wass γef tmaziγt anda imtafaqen ad tuγal d tunṣibt. Ha-t-an usteqsi i asen-nefka : Iwumi ara tuγal d tunṣibt deg tmendawt  imi ula d kunwi i ur tt-tettmeslayem ara dagi ?

 Nnan-aγ :’’wid iwumi nhedder (lwali d kra n wiyaḍ) ur fehmen ara taqbaylit. Ihi, ur nezmir ara ad tt-nehder. Ilaq ad aγ-d-fehmen d acu i asen-neqqar’’.

 Nenna-asen : nefren-iken, i wakken ad aγ-d-fehmen nekni, neγ i wakken ad ak-nefhem kunwi ?  Akken i as-yenna winna :’’laṣel-ik yezgel-ik, win tebγiḍ yugi-k, mmel-iyi-d wi(n) k-yilan.’’  Ṭṭef deg tjaddit, mmeslay taqbaylit-ik, a Mu !!!

 Hocine.M  

  
 Kkes aɣilif kra n wayen ḍsan fell-ak wayetma-k d wiyaḍ ad ak-tekkseɣ tura kan, dɣa ma tebɣiḍ ad ak-rreɣ tifeḍ akk igdaḍ yellan deg ddunit merra. Afrux ameɣbun yeldi kan deg warquqen-is, issenhezz kan aqerruy-is, tikkelt d akessar tayeḍ d asawen akken ad as-yerra : Ih ! Teɛzem abrid, afrux-nni azeggaɣ yuɣal d amellal am udfel yerna yettdeggir-d yiwet n tafat tamellalt d taqessḥant yettḍurrun allen n win tt-iwalan. Tenna-as : ‘’Qmec tura allen-ik ad ak-ssiwḍeɣ alamma d imawlan-ik’’. Teɛzem diɣen abrid wis sin, yufa-d iman-is gar yemma-s d wayetma-s. Tazwara ur t-ɛqilen ara, tuɣal yemma-s tḥulfa i tasa-s n tyaziḍt tefrawes-d, tɛeggeḍ seg lferḥ : ‘’Lɛeslama-k ay afrux-iw amecṭuḥ !’’ Temlel-nni n wafriwen-is seg wakken d taqessḥant, tesdderɣel merra atmaten-is yusmen seg-s, ma d yemma-s, teqqim tẓerr acku tḥemmel mmi-s nezzeh, maca seg wass-nni tuɣal teḥzen am wakken yeḥzen netta ussan yezrin. Ula d igdaḍ-nni-nniḍen d arraw-is, ɣaḍen-tt imi uɣalen ur ttwalin ara. Agdiḍ ameɣbun, yeggra-d deg liqliq, yeɛweq d acu ara yexdem. Ixemmem, ixemmem, yuɣal yebren ɣer teẓgi-nni, yessawel i tewkilt-nni n teẓgi. Teffeɣ-d deffir n yiwet n tmadaɣt tameqqrant tenna-as : ‘’D acu i ak-id-yewwin diɣen ? Yenna-as : ‘’Bɣiɣ ad i yi-d-terreḍ tiɣmi-inu tazeggaɣt, terreḍ-d diɣen timeẓriwt i watmaten-iw i tesdderɣel temlel-nni i yi-d-tefkiḍ akken ad d-yezzi lferḥ s ul n yemma. D ayen i as-yenna i texdem mebla ma txemmem, acku teḥṣa s kullec. Dɣa netta yuɣal-d akken yella umayna, d afrux azeggaɣ, ma d atmaten-is uɣalen ttwalin am zik. Seg wass-nni, ifrax-nni merra ččan tamsalt akken i ilaq, gzan tamsirt i asen-yefka ugdiḍ azeggaɣ, fehmen d akken mačči d tiɣmi i yettakken azal, mačči d tiɣmi i d tidet. Akken tebɣuḍ tiliḍ, d amellal, d azeggaɣ, d awraɣ neɣ d aberkan neɣ gar-asen, ala azal n lecɣal-ik i itekkin. Yelha ma ɣur-k ul yeččur d tayri, tayri ara tbeṭṭuḍ ɣef medden merra. Tamacahut lwad lwad mliɣ-tt-id i warraw n lejwad.

  Seg tgemmi n teqbaylit 

  
 Irgazen n Tala Zeggaɣen, wid iwwḍen ttufiq, wid iwwḍen i unejmuɛ n taddart, meṛṛa udren-d ɣer Tewwurt n Tmadaɣt, ɣer tmeqbert anda ttnejmaɛen, seg wasmi akka i ǧǧan lǧama n Ufella. Zik, asmi tesɛa taddart sebɛa meyya iterrassen akken i t-id-immal leḥsab n tmecreṭ, ttnejmaɛen, ttẓallen di lǧama n Ufella. Tura mi akka izad lɣaci tuɣal tedyeq xas akken tesɛa snat n tzeqqiwin dduklent d useqqif. Ur tessaweḍ ara ad tawi annect n lɣaci ittnejmaɛen. Ǧǧan-tt kan i tẓallit.Tawwurt n Tmadeɣt deg ttnejmaɛen ass-a Wat Tala-Zeggaɣen zik tella d amadeɣ. Deg-s, aẓẓebbuj, deg-s tametwala, imliles, idmim, uzzu yerna izḍa isberber fell-as inijel ssya u ssya. Ur ikeččem yiṭij wala umdan, yeqqim kan d ayla n lewḥuc. Qqaren-d d taddart n At Lhaǧ I asen-tt-ifkan mi d-guǧǧan d akessar si taddart taqdimt. Taddart taqdimt n Tala-Zeggaɣen zik tuzga-d usawen sufella n yiwet n tewrirt. Ddren din alammi d asmi i asen-d-tusa teqriḥt sɣur tudrin i asen-d-izzin. Akken ad smenɛen iman-nsen guǧǧan-d d akessar, ɣer wanda llan tura, ɣer wakal n yimrabḍen, llan ddaw laɛnaya-nsen. Zenzen-asen akal deg bnan ma d timeqbert fkan-asen akal n Tewwurt n Tmadaɣt. Qqaren-d seg wakken d amadeɣ wadeg-nni deg meḍḍlen, iseggasen-nni imezwura, mi meḍlen yiwen, azekka-nni ad t-id-afen skeflen-t-id lewḥuc. Ass-a d wussan, taddert tennerna akin akka ur d-tegri lmitra n wakal ur nebni, aniwer terriḍ d ddiq. Lɣaci yegget alammi imezdaɣ ur ufin ara anda ara qqimen wala anda ara nnejmaɛen. Xas akken arrac zgan tturaren di tmeqbert tuqqna tawaffra, xas akken imeqqranen zgan ttɣimen, ttẓallen ɣef yiẓekwan, maca di tazwara imezdaɣ ugin meṛṛa annejmuɛ n taddert di Tewwurt n tmadaɣt ttnaṣfa n yiẓekwan. Ugaden ddeɛwessu. Acḥal i wumi ara tesleḍ seg wid izgan ttẓallen neɣ ttɣimin sufella n yiẓekwan qqaren: “ad aɣ-imneɛ Ṛebbi seg ddeɛwessu n wid iẓẓlen dagi.” Maca, uɣalen akk ttnejmaɛen din imi ulac anda ara ruḥen. Seg ttnejmaɛen din, mi ara yili ur yefri ara unnejmuɛ, aṭas i wumi ara tesleḍ daɣen qqaren: “waqila newwi ddeɛwessu.” Imezdaɣ n Tala-Zeggaɣen am nutni am wiyaḍ ttnejmaɛen yiwet n tikkelt i wagur neɣ mi ara d-iḥder cɣel iḥemqen i wumi tlaq tɣimit d umatu ma ulac ad ifat. Wid ikecmen ttufiq n taddert , ttaǧǧan lecɣal-nsen ttasen-d ttezdin d agraw daxel n lǧama n lemqam mi ara yekkat ugeffur am wussan usemmiḍ di tegrest neɣ berra i ubeḥri mi ara ilhu lḥal am wussan unebdu, ttmeslayen, ferrun timsal d lecɣel n taddart mi ara d-ilin

  …yettkemmil 

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Yiwen n uqcic iǧǧa-t-id baba-s meẓẓi mi yemmut. Yemma-s tsebbel temẓi-s, fell-as, trebba-t-id s lḥif alammi meqqer. Mi yewweḍ d ilemẓi iḥemmel yiwet n teqcict d leɛmer-is maca nettat ur tecliɛ ara deg-s aṭas. Ɣer-s d ameddakel kan n temẓi. Mi ara tt-imlil yeqqar-s melmi ara d-awiɣ yemma ad kem-texḍeb. Nettat teqqar-as kan d lɣerḍ-k, rju cwiṭ. Alammi i tt-iḥres, yal tikkelt deg ara as-yini, nettat teqqar-as ma tḥemleḍ-iyi seg wul awi-iyi aya d waya. Akken yal tikkelt d acu ara as-tsuter. Netta ad as-tt-id-yawi, akken yebɣu ɣlay neɣ inqedwa cci-nni ad t-id-yaɣ neɣ ad t-id-idebbeṛ. Xas yemma-s ixla-tt. Ayen akk tesɛa d leqṛar n uxxam yella yewwi-as-t. Armi teɛya teqcict-nni deg-s tenna-as, aqcic-a issefk ad d-afeɣ amek ara gezmeɣ yid-s ma ulac wagi ad iyi-inṭeḍ am uselluf, wagi ad iyi-sderwec. Tikkelt-a i wakken ad iyi-iṛuḥ akin, ad iyi-xḍu, ad as-sutreɣ ayen i wumi ur yezmir ara ad iyi-d-yawi. Ass-nni mi t-temlal yid-s, taqsiṭ yiwet, am zik, aqcic iqqar-as kan melmi ara d-awiɣ yemma. 

  Tenna-as teqcict :  

 -Ma dɣa s tidet-ik tḥemleḍ-iyi am tfekkert n wul-ik, ugar n yemma-k, ad ak-in-sutreɣ i tikkelt taneggarut yiwet n lḥaǧa ma tewwiḍ-tt-id a rbaḥ a tafat ma ur iyi-tt-id-tewwiḍ ara fiḥel awal. Aqcic allen-is ceɛlent am tmes, inna-as :

 – Cṛeḍ kan a taɛzizt aɣbel deg-i, illa wasmi qqimeɣ ur am-d-wwiɣ ara ayen d-tcerḍeḍ! 

 -Ihi nekkini tura, tikkelt-a taneggarut i bɣiɣ d tasa n yemma-k, ad iyi-tt-id-tawiḍ ad tt-skenfeɣ, ad tt-ččeɣ. Aqcic isusem, iruḥ. Taqcict tezmumeg tenwa d ayen aqcic ad tt-ihenni i lebda. 

 Azekka-nni kan, aqcic izla yemma-s, ikkes-as-d tasa-nni-ines, yewwi-tt-id deg uqelmun-is d tazla ɣer teqcict. Tazla-nni d-ittazal iɣli igrareb. Tasa-nni tenṭew-d seg uqelmun n uqcic, tettegririb zdat-s. Alammi ḥebsen deg ugrireb, tenṭeq-d tasa-nni n yemma-s ɣer-s, tenna-as : 

 -Ulac d acu i ak-yuɣen a mmi !Akka i d tasa n tyemmat, akken tebɣu tili teswaɛt, tayemmat tezga tetteqliliḥ, tettergigi tasa-s ɣef tarwa-s

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Ahat tikwal ttmaggan da ed din kra n yiqeddicen s wazal-nsen, s waṭas n unadi ed unɛettab, maca ur ttawaḍen ɣer yifassen, ur yettizmir daɣen yiwen ad ten-yaf deg tnedlisin ɣef tsebba-ya neɣ d ta. Adlis i d-yessufeɣ, s tallelt n Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad, gma-tneɣ amedyaz anaẓur Lxeyyer Brahimi s uzwel n « Yal azamul yesɛa azal » d yiwen i ur ilaq ad yezgel kra n win yebɣan ad yeṭṭef deg tgemmi-s tangawt (patrimoine matériel) s xilla n uḥraz deg teɣzi n tsutiwin. Deg-s ad yaf yimeɣri ayen akk icudden i uqennuc; swacu i yelha ad t-tebnu tmeṭṭut, anwi d allalen i yettwaseqdacen deg tẓuri-ya alama i ihegga i tuqqda deg uɣud, maca daɣen d acu i d anamek i yesɛa yal azamul yettwareqmen, imi akken i d-yeqqar uzwel, yal azamul yesɛa azal, yal irit tebɣa ad d-tini tmeṭṭut kra yes-s, ama ɣef tudert, ɣef lḥif i tettidir, ɣef tumert, ɣef tmussni, neɣ ɣef lebɣi-s yeffren ed wayen akk yellan d tigezzi (lbaḍna) ; d amawal n rrqem, skud zik mi ulac tira ed usenfali ɣef ukaɣeḍ, rrqem yeṭṭef mliḥ amḍiq-nsen. Deg udlis-a, yeɛreḍ umeskar-is, s tallelt n kra n yimdukkal, ad d-yegmer seg temnaḍt n Ayt Smaɛel, sɣur temɣarin ladɣa, ugar n 40 d azamul i d-yettbinen deg tugniwin s usemmi ed kra n usegzi-nsen. D aqeddic i yemuggen deg teɣzi n wayyuren, almi ɣer taggara tefren tdukkla n Udrar n Fad ad t-id-tessufeɣ, imi anezgum n tneggarut-a yezga kan d asekfel n wayen akk yellan d idles, n wayen akk yellan d tigemmi, d tangawt neɣ d turtangawt. Ass-a deg wussan ur d-qqimen waṭas seg-s, maca win i t-yebɣan yezmer ad yesnermes (contacter) tidukkla ɣef i d-newwi awal, i ara igen amek ad yaweḍ s ifassen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi  

  
 Taɣiwant n Uqbil d yiwet n tɣiwant gar tɣiwanin n Ain El Hammam, mazal teṭṭef deg leɛwayed n tjaddit , d yidles n tmaziɣt. Tesɛa ṭam (8) n tudrin. Gar tudrin-is, ad naf taddart n Wat Ṣellan i d-yefkan Ferḥat Ait Mouḥend, d yiwen n unelmad n Mouloud Mammeri. Yekker-d deg yiwet n twacult taqbaylit, baba-s d yiwen umǧahed ameqqran iwumi qqaren si Wakli, yemma-s Jeǧǧiga At Yusef. Yella gar yimezwura yennuɣen ɣef tmaziɣt netta d yimeddukal-is,Nour Ould Amara d wiyaḍ. Nuḍḥen akken tamaziɣt ad teṭṭef adeg i as-ilaqen. Iswi-nsen, ad tili d tutlayt tunṣbt. Yeselmed Ferḥat Ait Mouḥend deg sin yiɣerbazen : aɣerbaz alemmas Amar At Chikh, d uɣerbaz alemmas n Waɣzen deg Ain El Ḥammam, acku imir ulac iselmaden n tmaziɣt, dɣa yettawi yettara seg uɣerbaz ɣer wayeḍ, awi-d kan tamaziɣt ad teǧuǧǧeg. Iḥemmel aṭas acennay-nneɣ ameqqran Maɛṭub Lwennas. Yekcem deg ukabar n RCD deg useggas (1994-1995), akken bdan ijeǧǧigen n tmaziɣt fettun almi d-tusa lmut tqeccem-iten. Ferḥat yewweḍ leɛfu n Rebbi ass n 26 deg ɣuct 2014, sin yiseggasen-aya i aɣ-yeǧǧa. Yenneɛtab s yiwen waṭṭan ur nḥellu almi yegla yis-s. Akka yettwamḍel deg taddart-is At Sellan. Usan-d ad ɛezzin tawacult-is seg yal tama Lmut-is qqerrihet, maca ayen qerriḥen s waṭas , d gma-s Massinissa yenɣan iman-is yerna yella d amezwaru deg leqraya-s asmi d-yewwi akayad n bem deg useggas 1998 yesɛa 19 /20, yewwi-tt d amezwaru deg Ain El Ḥammam ; yerna yemmut baba-tsen mazal ttun tiyita terna-d tayeḍ, tiyita taneggarut d lmut n Ferḥat , ad d-yazen Rebbi sber i twacult-is , tajmilt tuɣal-as ilindi d useggas-a s trusi n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka-s, ad t-irḥem Rebbi 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia  

  
 Taɣlift n Usegmi taɣelnawt terra lwelha-s deg yimalas yezrin iwakken ad d-tessewjed yiwet n temlilit ɣef uselmed n tmaziɣt deg umalu n tmurt n Lezzayer ladɣa deg twilayt n Relizane. Dɣa d tasweḍt tamatut tabidagujit I yesseddan lecɣal n temlilit-a anda I d-mlalen yimaswaḍen n tmaziɣt ukkud yiselmaden n Twilayin yecban Saida, Chlef, Tlemcen, tissemsilt akked Relizane. Ass amenzu d iɣeblan I d-ttmagaren yiselmaden iɣef yezzi umeslay imi deg temnaḍin-a n tmurt anekcum n tmaziɣt s aɣerbaz mačči d win I d-yemmugren lebɣi. Deg wayyur amenzu, iselmaden rwan amḍerkel, yal anemhal n uɣerbaz ixeddem akken yebɣa. Tagut tettifrir, asalu yerrez, tamacint ters ɣef rrayat. Iselmaden kkan-d nnig n yiɣeblan iwakken ad ṣṣerṣun ajerrid n tuqqna. Deg wass wis sin, tella-d akka yiwet n temsirt n tɣuri I d-tessewjed yiwet n tselmadt deg Relizane. Inelmaden akken ma llan ulac deg-sen win yessawalen tamaziɣt. Maca, kkin akken iwata deg temsirt, ssawḍen ttalsen-d, ttarran-d ɣef yiseqsiyen mebla ma sxedmen tutlayin nniḍen. Yiwet n tsaɛet ideg dehcen aṭas n wid yellan deg tzeqqa n tesnawit Ben Aouda , imi tamehla n Usegmi tesseḥḍer ula d imaswaḍen n tutlayin nniḍen iwakken ad ten-tger deg usenfar-a n useddu n tmaziɣt. Askasi I d-iḍefren d win yerzan tarrayt neɣ tarrayin I ilaqen ad tent-ḍefren yiselmaden n temnaḍin-a iwakken ad sseddun tamaziɣt s wudem usnan. D ayen yeǧǧan ama d iselmaden neɣ d imaswaḍen ad kemmlen amahil ula deg yiḍ iwakken ad d-ffɣen s kra n yiwellihen neɣ ahat tiferkiyin n useddu n temsirin. D acu kan, di yal tiukkelt, awal n yiselmaden yezga itezzi ɣef usbeddi n kra n ttawilat ara yilin deg lmendad I useddu n tmaziɣt. Aḥric agejdan d win icudden ɣer uḥric n tesweḍt imi ulac akka yiwen n umaswaḍ ara sen-d-yilin deg lmendad deg uselmed. D ayen yeǧǧan Mass Ouguellal, s timmad-is d imḍebber deg tesweḍt tamatut ad yessuter seg yimaswaḍen n tmaziɣt yellan deg temlilit-a iwakken ad ttruḥun ɣer twilayin-a iwakken ad d-ffken afus n tallelt I yiselmaden. Seg tama-nsen, imaswaḍen qeblen ad bḍun gar-asen timnaḍin. Iwulem kan ad d-nesmekti dakken imḍebber n tesweḍt d usileɣ deg tmehla n Relizane, Mass Ould Ali d d win I d-yellan deffir uxeddim ameqqran deg temlilit-a, imi ama s tmusni-s neɣ s wallalen, yessaweḍ yessemlal-d wid I terza taluft, aya d ayen I d-yenna fell-as Mass Ouguellal deg wawal-is ɣer taggara n temlilit:”Ḥṣut dakken ma yella nessaweḍ s axeddim yecban wa, tajmilt ad tuɣal I Mass Ould Ali I nufa deg teswiɛt-a.”

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. Smail 

  
 Am wakken i d-ttilin warmuden (activités) s wazal-nsen yal ddurt deg Tmurt n Yezwawen, ayen i d-yellan taggara n yimalas yezrin deg Yiḥeddaden ed uxxam n yidles Ṭawes Ɛemruc d yiwen seg-sen. Aya, mi yerra unalas-amedyaz Fares Idir s « ih » i uɛraḍ n Tdukkla Taɣect n Ugrud akked n Tdukkla n Yimuḍan n Uqerruy i iqeddcen deg waɣir n Bgayet, iwakken ad asen-d-yawi kra n tmucuha seg ugerruj aqbur n yimaziɣen, ed swayes ara ten-iger s uwenneɛ deg umaḍal n tirga, asugen, ed talwit. Yuɣ lḥal, am tikkelt iɛeddan mi iga amlaqi deg Sid Ɛli Lebḥer lwaḥi ed yimuḍan nniḍen ilmend n wass agreɣlan n yimeɛḍar, Fares yesmurres (il a réussit) ula tikkelt-a taneggarut mi yessaweḍ yessekcem imuḍan deg umaḍal-nni icebḥen rnu yessenṭeq-iten-id yal wa s tigawt-is, akken ad d-yeg tasedmirt (réaction). Yezuzzen akken iwata arrac imecṭaḥ i as-yettḥessisen s tmucuha yettwassnen yecban «Mḥend Uccen» neɣ d «Belɛejjuṭ», akked wunuɣen deg tferrawin ed ubendayer deg yifassen. Deg teɣzi n wakud, analas Fares Idir yewwi-asen-d s telqey akk ayen yeḍran deg tmucuha d ayen i d-ijebbden awellih s temsirin-is n tudert yemgerraden. Kraḍ n ttiɛadat dɣa i iga Fares gar Aweqqas, Iḥeddaden, ed uxxam n yidles n bgayet seg umhad 11 deg yunyu almi d sed 13, gar-asen wid yebda seg tsebḥit almi d tazeggant n wass, wiyaḍ yebda-ten mi yewweḍ ureqqas n temrint (ssaɛa) deg 13sr, kfan mettwal tameddit tamzikt. «Am temliliyin akk n usiwel n tmucuha i ttageɣ deg waɣiren yemxalafen n tmurt i ɛeddant tid n ddurt yezrin. D acu kan, tin n warrac imuḍan deg Yiḥeddaden tella d tuzzigt i nekk. Ladɣa mi d-ttafaren akk tigawin xeddmeɣ, am ccna ed tiyita n ubendayer. Ma d tin n uxxam n yidles Ṭawes Ɛemruc, akked usiwel n Uweqqas i d-giɣ i tlawin tseqqef am akken ssaramen yimeḥḍar». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yilemẓi analas Fares Idir.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Tuget n yinelmaden n tesnawiyin d yiɣerbazen ilemmasen Tizi Uzzu, ḥebsen ɣef ulmud n temsirin i wazal n ddurt. Imi seg wass-nni n lḥed 02/10/2016, ur uɣalen ara ɣer tneɣriyin-nsen n tɣuri, i wakken ad kemmlen aseddu n temsirin. Tamentilt akk n wanect-a d ulɣu-nni n yimuras i d-tefka tneɣlaft n usegmi taɣelnawt Massa Benghebriṭ ideg tekkes 5 n wussan i lfayda n yinelmaden. Acku deg yiseggasen yezrin, ttɣimin warrac deg yimuras n tegrest snat smant (15 wussan), gar taggara n buğamber d tazwara n yennayer. Ma d aseggas-agi, tefka-asen-d kan 10 wussan, imi ad d-fɣen ass n lexmis 22/12/2016, wa ad uɣalen ass n letnayen 02/01/2017. Maca inelmaden xelfen-as i wanecta s lekdub ur nesεi ara lsas, armi uɣalen umnen belli ur d-ttawin ara imuras n unebdu alama d 06/07/2017. Am wakken daɣen ara d-awin kan 10 wussan daɣen deg tefsut. Ɛlaḥsab n yisalen ineggura i d aɣ-d-yewwḍen seg tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, d akken ala ciṭ n ubeddel i yellan deg wussan n yimuras, imi d tidet deg wid n ccetwa ad awin kan 10 wussan, maca deg widak n umwan (wid n unbir) ad awin 7 wussan mačči 4 wussan, seg 27/10/2016 alamma d 02/11/2016. Daɣen widak n tefsut ad ten-awin i 15 wussan, ula d imuras imeqqranen, ad ten-awin deg lweqt-nsen, deg taggara n waggur n Mayyu. Aṭas n tesnawiyin n Tizi Uzzu i iḥuza uneḥbus-agi ɣef leqraya, gar-asent: tasnawit n Ssuq, tin Lxensa, Faḍma n Ssumer, tasnawit tamaynu…atg. D waṭas n yiɣerbazn ilemmasen ,yecban: Saεid Babuc, Saεid Derder… D ayen i d-yeglan s waṭas n tmesbaniyin d tikliwin deg tlemmast n temdit-agi. Am wakken daɣen ixedmen tirza ɣer tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i wakken ad as-siwḍen izen srid i unemhal n usegmi d tneɣlaft n usegmi. Ma d ayen akk yessewhamen deg wanect-a, imi tiddukliwin n yimawlan n yinelmaden n tesnawiyin-agi d tid n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen, ur d-girent ara afus-nsent adas-tiniḍ ur d ten-teεni ara taluft-agi n warraw-nsen yeqqimen ddurt ur ɣrin ara.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Mazal ɣer Yicawiyen, ar ass-a, yiwet n lɛada i xeddmen deg lɛid tameẓẓyant. Xas ulamma aṭas deg-sen ur ẓrin ara ansi i d-tekka tsisrit-agi, meɛna tasuta tettaǧǧa-tt-id i tayeḍ.

 Ihi, yal mi ara yemzl ikerri, ad d-yeddem ubabat alemsir-nni, ad yesfeḍ yis-s udem-is. Syin ad t-yefk i mmi-s ameqqran i wakken ad yexdem am baba-s. Akken alamma ɛeddan-d akk iɛeggalen n twacult : xeddlent ula d tilawin. Acu kan, amur ameqqran, ttgen mebla ma ẓran azal-is. Ɣef wakken i d-nnan kra, lɛadda-a, tesɛa assaɣ akked ugellid Aksil (Kossaïla). Asmi i irefden tagelda mebɛed Dihia, ssemlalen-t akked OkBA, winna i d-yewwin aɛraben ɣer tmurt n ugafa, kra n lweqt mebɛed amennuɣ mgal-is. Yeḍleb Okba deg Aksil i wakken ad yezlu u ad yazu ikerri. Aksil, ur yebɣi ara, yenna-as ad t-xedmen yiqeddacen. Acu kan, iḥettem Okba fell-as i wakken ad t-yexdem. Ihi, yexdem-it Aksil berra n wul-is. Mi yezla ikerri-nni, yesfeḍ tamart-is s yidammen-nni. Yella yiwen dinna, yefhem tamsalt-agi n usfaḍ, u yenna-asen d akken d tamsalt n ttar. ¨hedret-it-id kan ad d-yerr ttar. Dayen i yeḍran. Kran kan n lweqt, inuda Aksil ɣef Okba, dɣa yerra-d ttar-is : yenɣa-t. D tidet neɣ tamacahut, lḥaṣun akka i tt-ḥekkun. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.Moula  

  
 Tacennayt Tafinlandit, Stina tesmekta-d ass n ttlata tameddit di Lezzayer agerruj n ccna n teqbaylit s ucewwiq-is d-yecnan akken iwata tizlatin n inaẓuṛen imeqṛanen n ccna n teqbaylit zdat n yemfeṛǧen yennecṛaḥen. Tameɣṛa, d-yellan di tzeqqa n Ṛadyu tazzayrit almend n tfaska turubit  tis 16 d-yellan di Lezzayer, tewwi-d aṭaṣ n medden d-yusan ad slen i Stina sen-d-yecnan tuɣac mechuṛen, ayagi tesḍefr-it s ccḍaḥ n teqbaylit yettwasnen.Tkecm-d s ṛṛubba n teqbaylit, tacennayt, s taɣuct-is n Lupiṛa, tesmektay-d akken ilaq tacennayt tamyarutt Taos Amrouche, yettwasnen s icewwiqen-is n wansayen n temnaḍt n leqbayel i terra ɣer ccnawi n lupiṛa. Ḍeffṛen-tt-id yimaẓwanen-agi, Akli Remili d Chilla Hafid (amesdinen) Betbtoub Mohand (bassiste), Maouche Samir, Mermouri Ahmed (dderbuka), Stina tecna-d tizlatin n inaẓuṛen imeqṛanen n yedles amaziɣ, am Djamal Allam, Idir, Ait Menguelet neɣ ccix ameqṛan n Chaâbi El Hadj M’hamed El Anka ladɣa tizlatin yecna s teqbaylit. Ger wayen akk ay d-tecna, « Mi ara d-yuɣal, Tella » n Djamal Allam, « Amedyaz » n Lewnis Ait Menguelet, « Ay-a lxir inu » n unaẓuṛ Idir, akk d  « Iẓṛi-w yeɣleb leḥmali » n El Hadj M’hamed El Anka, yules ucennay ameqṛan n Chaâbi n teqbaylit, Matoub Lounès. Am wakken ay d-tecna zdat n yemfeṛǧen tizlatin s tutlayt tafinlandit am « Valiaikainen » d « Malja ». <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>                            <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>              

  NSL(APS)

  
 Tenna-d tneɣlaft n usegmi aɣelnaw Massa Noria Benghebrit, deg yiwet n tedwilt deg tiliẓri, d akken: akayad-agi n taggara n uswir amenzu (5ème A.P) n useggas aɣurbiz 2016/2017, ad t-sεeddin yinelmaden deg yiɣerbazen-nsen. Deg wawal-is tenna-d, daɣen, d ayen negzem-itt deg rray, d akken akayad-a ad t-sεeddin am useggas iεeddan deg yiɣerbazen anida qqaren, mebla ma rzan ɣer yiɣerbazenn-niḍen. Anect-gai, i wakken ur d-ttmagaren ara uguren i d-ttemlilin yal aseggas yinelmaden, gar-asen: ugur n laman, ugur n usiweḍ akked win n lweqt… Tenna-d, daɣen, belli tansa-nni tunsibt n umaris (ddiwan) aɣelnaw n yikayaden d temsizzliyin, ha-ta-n yelli tiwwura-s ass-nni n 16deg tuber 2016 alamma d 16 deg unbir2016. I wakken ad izmiren akk ad jerrden iman-nsen deg unuɣen n usεeddi. Ma deg wass 20 deg maggu 2017 d asawen, zemren akk yinelmden ad d-jebden tiseɣrayin-nsen (convocation) n usεeddi. Ma seg 15 di yennayer 2017 alamma d 15 di furar, ad tili tensa-a telli yakan i wakken ad tḥeqqen ma yella inelmaden-agi jerrden iman-nsen neɣ ala. Yerna ad seɣtin tucḍiwin ma llant deg yisallen i yuran daxel n tansa-a.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Saɛid Ḥammum d aselway n tiddukla n yimaɛder d yemddukal-nsen n temnaḍt n Wizgan. Xas akken iruḥ-as yiẓri, i wala axir n wiyaḍ abrid yessufuɣen ar tafat. Iwala s wul-is ayen ur walan ara wiyaḍ s wallen-nnsen. “Timuɛḍert” ur t-tcekkel ara, ur t-tessefcel ara. Ibedd s lqedd-is i ddunit, yeṭṭef afus i twacult-is almi tt-yessaweḍ ɣer lber n laman. Ur d asyenni ara “dayen tura ad rtaḥeɣ”, yelha-d d yiɣeblan n yimeɛḍar, yessebded-d tiddulal ara ten-ijemɛen. Nemlal-it, ussan-a, nemmeslay yid-s. Atan d acu i d aɣ-d-yenna :

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Anwa i d Saɛid Ḥammum u d acu n sebba n tiderɣelt-ik? 

  Saɛid Ḥammum :  Luleɣ-d deg waggur n yulyu 1956, di taddart n Wizgan, di tallit n tegrewla, dɣa ass-nn i seryen axxam n Muhend Welḥaǧ, deg lawan-nni yuget laẓ d lḥif. Kreɣ-d am nnek am tezyiwin-iw. Ass-mi sɛiɣ 18 wagguren di laɛmer-iw, d tallit n tegrest, yemma wwin-tt lɛesker ɣer tejmaɛt n taddart am tlawin niḍen. Dɣa yiwen uxabit yeddad d lɛesker n Fransa, yefka-asen tikti akken a yi-ksen fell-as i waken ad-zzenz, imi sɛiy 04 n laɛmum-iw d imjuhad. Yemma teqbel a yi-teǧ d amecṭuḥ ɣef udem n tlelli ula ad-tezenz. Teǧǧa-yi nekk d 02 watmaten-iw d imenṭaḥ, yiwen yesɛa 07 n yiseggasen wayeḍ 04 n yiseggasen, tturaren di tɣarɣart n wexxam tabaɛey-ten s deffir, ɣliɣ ɣef qaru ɣer lkanun. Assen I tbedel tudert fell-I, ttṣuɣuɣ, atmaten-iw ulr-zmiren ad-xedmen kra, qqimaɣ azal n 10 n dqayaq sufella n tqaṛumt yerna ɣef udem. Yiwet n temɣart d tajarett-nnaɣ, nna Feṛṛuja At-Ɛli, tesla-d i ussuɣu, tuzzel-d tekkes-iyi-d, maca ifut lḥal, imi allen-iw wwant di lkanun.

  Amek i muggren imawlan-ik tawaɣit yeḍren yid-k?  

 Tawaɣit yeḍṛan yid-I teseqlalaḥ imawlan-iw aṭas, thus-iten tyita, yal ass ttezmen deg imman-nsen. Di tallit-nni n ṭrad, kra n tlawin nnant i setti (Jida) akken ayi-cegɛen ɣer Fransa, imi yuɣ lḥal baba yunnag ɣer din. Setti teqsed imjuhad, tenna-yasen s wayen yellan, maca uggin ad-ṛuḥaɣ ɣer Fransa, nnan-as-d ad-idawi dagi di tmurt, xedmen-iyi 03 n tikkal dwa i wallen-iw, maca deg-asen yura Rebbi akken ad dreɣlent wallen, maca ḥamdullah, ttwaliɣ s wallaɣ-iw.

  Yuɛaṛ aṭas win mi dreɣlent wallen, maca keč muḥal tfecleḍ, ḥkkud ciṭuh ɣef amek tesɛeddaḍ tudert-ik ? 

 D tidet yuɛar aṭas win ur nesɛi iẓri, maca nek ḥamdullah ulac d acu iyi-ḥebsen di tikli, deg umennuɣ-iw, qeblaɣ ayen iyi-d-yefka Rebbi, u netta ur yeffek-ara afus deg-i, muḥal yeǧǧa-yi. Tedduɣ d warrac n taddert-iw, d tnuda-w akked yemddukal-iw. Imawlan-iw muḥal seḍḥan yis-i, suffuyen-iyi ɣer berra, tedduɣ ɣer tmeɣriwin, ɣer lexla, ɣer temdint, ddiɣ yid-sen anda bɣun ṛuḥen. Dayen iyi-ǧǧan snaɣ merra ibardan, kraɣ-d ur-ḥusseɣ-ara s lexṣaṣ sɛiɣ, turaraɣ, tqeṣiṛaɣ,cennuɣ d yemddukal-iw, tudert-iw ur-temgarad-ara ɣef tizya-w. Mbaɛd timmunent, muḥal kecmaɣ s aɣarbaz i ittewxeṣen i yimaɛder ɣes akken tettewnnefk-iyi tegnit deg seggas n 1966, anda niqal ayi-cegɛen ad-ɣreɣ deg uɣarbaz n yimaɛer id-yezgan di tama n Lɛacur di Lezzayer tamanaɣt, macda yemma tegguma ad-tefraq fell-I,d tagi id tassa n tyemat. Syen deg seggas n 1980, deg aggur n maggu zewǧaɣ, aggur kan uffiɣ-d axeddim. Xedmaɣ taḥanut n yissufar n wučči, farzaɣ idrimen u snaɣ ad-rraɣ ssarf, rnu imezdaɣ n taddert-iw ttɛawanen-iyi aṭas, ttaɣen ɣur-i. Mbaɛd 03 n yiseggasen, ubayen deg seggas n 1983, kecmaɣ yer luzin n yibaliyen “ ENABrosse” I ittewxeṣen I idarɣalen id-yezgan di temdint n Tizi-Wezzu, xedmaɣ 26 n yiseggasen, tuɣal luzin-nni teɣlaq I lebda deg seggas n 2009.

  Amek ik-d-tusa tekti txelqeḍ-d tiddukla n yimaɛder? 

 Deg ass-mi snaɣ d acu id nffaɛ-iw, ttxalaṭaɣ deqs n tiddukliwin, akken i kecmaɣ di kra, imi lliɣ d aɛeggal n tiddukla n yidarɣalen n Tizi-Wezzu, maca wallaɣ lexṣaṣ meqqren di temnadt n Wizgan deg ayen icuden ɣer izarfan n yimaɛder. Dɣa deg 22 ɣuct 1998, lliɣ d inebgi n Radyu taɣelnawt n teqbaylit (Amaṭṭaf wis 02), di tedwilt n Xadiǧǧa Cixi akked ǧahida, asentel n tedwilt “ D amsebrid mačči d amenṭaṛ. Din i yid-tusa tekti, graɣ-d srid tiɣri akken ad-nexlaq tiddukla n yimaɛder d yemdukkal-nsen n temnaḍt n Wizgan, maca tiddukla tḍul, ur d-tlul-ara imiren. Cfiɣ yiwen n wass, imḍebren n tɣiwant n Wizgan heggan-d ilmend n wass aɣelnaw n yimaɛder, ass n 14 maɣres 2000, deg uɣarbaz alemmas Hammadi Muḥend Saɛid n Wizgan. Rruḥaɣ melba tinubga, akken wḍaɣ, yiwet n teqcict tugi ad-kecmaɣ. Nniɣ-as d acu-t wass-a, d acu i tagnit? Tenna-id ass-a 14 maɣres ass aɣelnaw n yimaɛder. Dɣa uɣalaɣ nniɣ-as; ihi kem ad-tefɣeḍ a yi-teǧǧeḍ amḍiq-im, imi kem mačči d tamaɛdurt, ur kem-taɛni ara temsalt. Kecmaɣ nnig wul-iw, imi llan merra yemdanen ala imaɛder. Dayen iyi-fkan tabɣest akken ad-nexlaq s lɛejlan tiddukla n yimaɛder d yemddukal-nsen, anejmuɛ amenzu yella-d ass n 29 maggu 2000, cfiɣ llan 12 n yimaɛder akked 03 n yemddukal-nsen. Imiren I nebda nettazal sya u sya I usenṣeb n tiddukla, dɣa ass n 03 furar 2001, tiddukla-nnaɣ tesɛa lekwaɣeḍ s wudem unṣib

  Di 2001 ar tura, deqs n yisenfaren i txedmet, tzemreḍ aɣ-d-tiniḍ amek id-wwit amecwar, almi id-tewdem ɣer wannar-agi ?  

 Di tazwara, ad-rraɣ tajmilt I uselway n tɣiwant n Wizgan n tallit-nni mass Muḥend Aɛrab Kessai, iɣ-d-yefkan axxam naɣ lemqar n tiddukla deg “Ex S.A.S” n Wizgan, acu kkan di 2001 d tafsut tabarkant, yella laxṣaṣ meqqren di lxedma, leqdic ur iteddu ara akken iwata. Maca di 2005, nebda leqdic iṣeḥan, tiddukla n yimaɛder nerra-tt n temnaḍt n Wizgan ideg ttekant 04 n tɣiwanin, ger-asent; Wizgan, At-Zikki, Illulen Umalu akked At-Yeǧǧar. Asenfar amenzu i nexdem, njared merra imaɛder n 04 tɣiwanin tesɛa temnaḍt n Wizgan, anda i neqsed ixxamen n tɣiwanin iɣ-d-yefkan lejridat n yimaɛder, syen neqsed tudrin, netruḥ axxam axxam, nesteqsay ɣef yimaɛder ur nettewjared-ara, anda id-nuffa nnig n wezgen n lejridat iɣ-d-ffkan di tɣiwanin, imi nutni fkkan-d azal n 450 n yimaɛder, nekni nerna-d 574 niḍen, laḥsab unṣib yuɣal 1024 n yimaɛder i tesɛa temnaḍt naɣ dayra n Wizgan. Dayen iɣ-idegren nettnadi d acu id asenfar amenzu ara-nexdem, nuffa-d illaq anexdem aɣerbaz n yimaɛder (CMP). Di 2008, yiwet n tudsa n lurup (ONG 02), tgger-d tiɣri i usbeddi n yisenfaren ilfayda n yimaɛder, dɣa nerra i teɣri, asenfar yettwaqbel s wudem unṣib, u d asenfar id-yesqamen 600 melyun sentim, 80% txelleṣ-iten tiddukla n Lurup, 20% d lemɛawnat n yemḍebren n tɣiwanin n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu akked iɛarḍiyen. Dɣa imḍebren n tɣiwant n Wizgan fkkan-d aɣarbaz amezwaru n taddert n At-Sidi Amar I ittewɣelqen, tura nxeddem deg-s.

  Acu n yisenfaren niḍen i txedmet ? 

 Aseggas n 2010, nxelqed asenfar niḍen, tagi d leqraya i merra imaɛder “ L’Education exclusive “, annact-a d amaynut di temnaḍt n Wizgan, imi aṭas n yemdanen ur uminnen-ara dakken amaɛdur ad-yuɣal ad-yeqqar deg yiɣarbazen n baylek. Maca ɣer-nnaɣ annect-a mačči d awezɣi, nwala imaɛder yeqqaren deg uɣarbaz isen-ittewxeṣen (CMP) di 2008 almi d 2010, zewṛen, aṭas deg-sen id-yukkin, dayen iɣ-yeǧǧan numen s usenfar-agi. Nebda tazla, nerwa laɛtab d lmerta, nesuddus-d timliliyin n usaḥbiber d usaɛlem ɣef leqraya n yimaɛder, isaragen, asenɛt n yisura d waṭas niḍen. Dɣa ad-farsaɣ tagnit ad-rraɣ tajmilt i imejjayen d yiselmaden I ittewxeṣen iɣ-d-yefkan afus n tallelt, imi nelḥa aṭas ɣer zdat, newweḍ ɣer yeswi-nnaɣ. Dula teqbel asenfar-agi n leqraya n yimaɛder deg iɣarbazen n baylek, annect-a ibban-d di tnaɣlaft n ttrebga id-ixelqen tizeɣwa i ittewxeṣen i yimaɛder. Asenfar wis ssin, nexlaq-d aɣerbaz amecṭuḥ i uɛiwen n yimaɛder di lxedma (Centre d’aide par le travail), anda i nesbed 0» n yisakwanen unṣiben i yimaɛder yesɛan nnig n 17 n yiseggasen, isakwanen-agi ( Les ateliers) ad-nnaf deg-sen lxedma n yibaliyen (Brosserie), Axaṛaz nnaɣ win ixedmen isebbaḍen d lexedma di tebḥirt, u ɣas akken ibban-d lexṣaṣ maca asenfar iteddu yettkemil, nteddu akken nufa mačči akken nebɣa, rnu yeqqar yenzi aḍar I teddun yeṣawaḍ.

  Acu n lexṣas yellan ? 

 Mačči d yiwen wuggur, gten aṭas. Di tazwara, ur nesɛi-ara aṭas n lewsaɛ ideg ara nexdem, nxeddem di ddiq, si tama niḍen ibban-d lexṣaṣ deg allalen n lxedma, akken id-ibban wuggur n yiselmaden n lḥirfat-agi id-bedraɣ, am isebbaden d ibaliyen, dɣa ttewḥetmaɣ akken ad-xedmaɣ snat n lexdayem, d aselway n tiddukla, u d aselmad I ittewxesen deg usuffeɣ n ibaliyen, imi ala nek i yellan. Syen i tebɛed wuggur niḍen, wagi d azenzu n yibaliyen I xedmen imaɛder deg uɣarbaz, ur-nesɛi ara lekwaɣeḍ (Les factures) swayes ara nezenz. Akka tura nesɛa 3400 ibaliyen qqimen ur nzin-ara. Maca muḥal nefcel, ankemmel lxedma n usenfar-agi lemɛana n yimaɛder deg uxeddim, imi kra n tawilat d wallalen llan, si tama nidwaɛden-aɣ kra n yiselwayen n tɣiwanin, am Wizgan, Ifiɣ d Yillulen n Umalu akken aɣ-d-fken tizeɣwa ideg ara nesbed asefar-agi ( C.A.T) s wudem unṣib.

  Amek d-yettili leqdic gar-awen d tenmahla n ttrebga ?  

 Leqdic icuden ger-aɣ akked tmahla n trebga d win igarzen aṭas, imi fkan-aɣ-d aṭas n wafud I usebɣes n waḥric n trebga n yimaɛder, xarsum deg ayen icuden ɣer usenfar “ Leqraya i merra “ naɣ “L’education pour tous», anda tamahla n trebga tesbed 03 n wussan I useggas anda I nxeddem timliliyin meqqren akked iselmaden I ittewxeṣen.

  Acḥal n yimaɛder i tetabaɛet ? 

 Zik netabaɛ 218 n yimaɛder di temnaḍt n Wizgan, tura nessaweḍ ɣer 1027, d laḥsab I yullin s waṭas, imi aṭas n yemdanen i yumnen s wayen I nxeddem.

  Acu n wassaɣ i tesɛat akked tiddukliwin n tmura n lbarani ?

 Nniɣ-d di tazwara dakken asenfar amenzu i nessuli, nexdem-it akked tiddukla n Lurup, syen nuɣal nekcem s lxedma akked tiddukla tagreɣlant n yimaɛder, iɣ-iɛawnen aṭas deg usbeddi n deqs n yisenfaren id-bedreɣ di tazwara, si tama niḍen tiqedemt (L’Ambassade) n tmurt n Fransa, nexdem yid-s asenfar n lemɛawna ɣer uxeddim (A.T naɣ (Aide au Travail). Akken I nexdem tura yiwen usenfar akked yiwet n tiddukla n yimaɛder (PCPA) I teselḥay tiddukla NADA, wagi d asekfel n waṭan n laɛqel, anda I nexdem yiwen n wexxam n tujya ɣef dema, annect-a yella-d s tallelt n tmahliwin n tmetti d tezmert n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu.

  Yettkemmil deg usebtar  

  Amek id-yettili ukewen n yiɛeggalen n tiddukla-nwen di tmurt-nnaɣ d tmura n lbarani ? 

 Deqs n yiɛeggalen-nnaɣ i nceggaɛ ɣer tmurt n Fransa xedmen-d tannant n ukewen ɣef imaɛder d izarfan-nsen, akken I nettceggiɛ yal seggas kra n yiɛeggalen n tiddukla-nnaɣ ɣer temnaḍt n Tipaza, I ukewen-nsen di trebga i ittewxeṣen i imaɛder (Education spésialisé), si tama niḍen nettxelliṣ tannant n ukewen iɛeggalen-nnaɣ deg iḥricen yemgaraden ɣer wid ixedmen imman-nse (privé), akken id-nettawi ɣer uɣarbaz-nnaɣ iselmaden d imejayen I yettewxeṣen xedmen tannant n ukewen ama i ixeddamen n uɣarbaz ama i iɛeggalen n tiddukla.

  Acḥal akka tura n ixeddamen yesɛa uyarbaz n yimaɛdar-nwen (CMP) ? 

 Nesɛa 28 ixeddamen, tuget deg-sen d tiḥdayin (timejayin n tnefsit d tid i ittewxeṣen deg lahdur), acu kan d tamahla n lumur n tmetti n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu iɣ-d-yefkan afus n tallelt, s tikci n les contrats (D.I.S) (P.I.D), u d nutni I yettxelliṣen ixedamen.

  Tura anef-aɣ ciṭuḥ i uḥric-agi n tmeti, imi berra n waya tkecmeḍ s tehri ɣer wannar n tẓuri di temẓi-k, amek i d-telḥiḍ amecwar ? 

 Si temẓi-w ḥemlaɣ taẓuri, cfiɣ tedduɣ d amecṭuḥ d yelmeẓyen n taddert-iw, imi ara cennun s tgitaṛin-nsen bera naɣ di lexla. Cfiɣ deg seggasen n 1979 / 1980, rruḥaɣ ɣer Radyu taɣelnawt n teqbaylit (Amaṭṭaf wis ssin), ɣer tedwilt iɣennayen n uzekka, dɣa Muḥamed Racid akked Ḍrifa nnan-iyi-d acu n tezlit ara d tecnuḍ? Nniɣ-asen “ Iḍelli id-nlul, neɛya ur nessin ddunit ” d tizlit xedmaɣ nek. Dɣa nnan-d mačči ass-a tagi, cnu-d tizlit n Lewnis n At-Mengellat. Cniy-d tizlit “llulaɣ-d wḍaɣ d ilemẓi», syen nnan-d rruḥ tura mbaɛd akin-nceggaɛ. Dɣa ḥṣiɣ bli muḥal ayi-d-cegɛen, imi di tazwara uggin tizlit-iw, deg assen xedmaɣ tizlatin imman-iw kan.

  Tzemreḍ ad-bedred kra n tezlatin-inek ? <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

 Tamezwarut “Uqbel ad-nlal naɛya, urɛad nessin ddunit», “Lukan tura ara d-lallaɣ, as-inniɣ I Rebbi xaṭṭi” , “Ayitbir bedd-as ɣef ṭṭaq” , “Assif meqqren” , “Wissen” , “Gmu deg issem” atg…

  Ɣer tama n ccna telliḍ ger wid yeṭfen deg yiwen n wansay yesɛan azal meqqren, wagi a azenzu n lḥeni. Amek ik-d-tusa tekti ? 

 Zik gten wid yeznuzuyen naɣ i yettawin lḥeni, xarsum di temnadt-agi n Wizgan, maca deg seggasen n 1990 irruḥ qrib yengar wansay-agi, imi imɣaṛen yeznuzuyen lḥeni fukken, wa yemmut wa ur yezmir, yella tallit-ni yiwen n yilemẓi yeznuzu lḥenni s ssuma ɣlayen, dayen i yeǧǧan imdanen wexṛen I wansay-agi maca mačči seg ul. Deg akken i walaɣ ansay-agi i teddu deg ubrid n ngar, nniɣ-as i yiwen n wamddakel-iw d amedyaz akken anxeddem lḥeni am zik, yerna baṭel. Dya I tewqennaɛ, nebda leqdic deg seggas n 1992, di taddert-nnaɣ Wizgan, syen netruḥu ɣer waṭas n tudrin d temnaḍin niḍen, u nesawed nxeddem nnig n 100 n tmeɣriwin yal anebdu. Dayen i yesefraḥen imi ansay-agi yebda yettuɣal-d di deqs n temnaḍin, amedya di tɣiwant n Yillulen Umalu, ḥebsen ansay-agi n lḥeni deg seggas n 1966, tura yuɣal-d.

  Awi-d yiwen seg isefra-inek 

  Xas ma xuṣṣaɣ deg allen  

  D adarɣal ur lliɣ-ara 

  Xas tesɛeb fell-I tikli 

  Maca ur ḥebseɣ-ara 

  Taɛekkazt tezga yid-i 

  Syes id-ttafaɣ iẓṛa 

  Am nek am Izzayriyen 

  Ukkaɣ di lebni n tmurt-a 

  Sɛiɣ idamen n wudem 

  ɛiɣ tayri yettḥussu wul-iw 

  Mebla lemziya-nkent a yallen-iw 

  Skud yeǧhed wallaɣ-iw 

  Awal-ik n taggara ? 

 Ad d-ggreɣ tiɣri i telmeẓyin d yelmeẓyen akken ad-sɛun asirem d tebɣest, ad-sudsen imman-nsen I uzeṭṭa n tdukli ger-asen, imi qaren zik taddukli teḍmen lɛez, ma neddukel an-iɛziz,a nexdem tamurt-nnaɣ imi ala tagi i nesɛa, rnu tudert d amennuɣ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Tadiwanit n Islam Bessaci 

  
 I lmend n usmekti n umulli wis 60 seg mi tendeh lgerra n 01 nuvember 1954, axxam n yilmeẓyen “Keddac Ɛli” n At-Yanni ihegga-d asarg ass nni n lǧemɛa 31 tuber. D Mass Bacuci Ɛli i d-yemmeslayen ɣef Wat Yanni ass mi d-kecmen ifransisen tamurt n Leqbayel.  Tameddit-nni mi yessuli usarag, rzan warrac n uɣerbaz alemmas d wid n tesnawit ar tama n yicerriḍen, ẓran-d amekkan d wayen d-yegran d later si tegrawla nni. Mass Bacuci yesmekta-d s wayen yeḍran d wamek d-kecmen ifransisen ar tmurt Leqbayel. Deg useggas n 1830  ikcem-ed uɛdaw afransis ɣer tmurt nneɣ seg mi tɛedda tedyant n temsebuḥrutt i d-ufan d tasebba; maca iswi-nsen n tidett d asteɛmer n Lezzayer. Ẓedmen-d s 567 n lembaber, i d-yewḍen ar lmersa n Sidi Ferreǧ ass n 14 yulyu 1830. S yin llin abrid s lemdafeɛ, dɣa wḍen ar “l’Etat du gra” di lberǧ n Day. Imir-nni Lezzayer tella ddaw leḥkem aṭerki. Uqbel ad d-tekcem, yuɣ lḥal Fransa teɣra yak timsal d iberdan n tmurt. Di lweqt n Marical Bijou, yugi ad yesteɛmer tamurt n Leqbayel imi s-yenna belli ur telli ara deg-s lfayda s yidurar-is. Dɣa iṛuḥ ar Lmeruk i wakken ad iḥkem dinna, s yin Marical Rondan i yeṭfen amekkan-is.  Imir, mi d-heggan leslaḥ d lɛesker-nsen ẓedmen ɣef tmurt n Leqbayel. Kecmen-tt-id seg Tedmayt di yebrir 1857. Zwaren-d seg Iɛeẓẓugen d Buɣni. S yin, yesla belli llant snat n tmura weɛṛit, At-Yanni d Larebɛa n At Iraten, ma yella yeṭṭef-itent, ad tuɣal lezzayer akk ines.  Di yunyu 1857, ṭfen ssuq n Laṛebɛa i wumi d-zzin s leswaṛ, s yin kecmen-ed  amekkan iweɛren aṭas, umi qqaren Icerriḍen. Dina i ten-tqubel Faḍma n Summer aked Bubeɣla. Ass n 25 yunyu 1857 mlalen-d leɛrac n At-Yanni, Iwaḍiyen d win n tizi-wezzu akken ad ten-qablen. Din i ɣlin azal 167 n iterrasen n lɛerc n At-Yanni, am “Saɛid At Lmuhub», “Ḥasen n imceddalen», “Ṛemḍan n At Laɛrbi», d waṭas nniḍen.

 Teɣleb Fransa leqbayel imi tesɛa aṭas n ttawilat d leslaḥ. Di tallit nni netni yessaweḍ-iten lḥif ar almi tetten ula d leḥcic, s wakka i terbeḥ Fransa lgirra n Icerriḍen. Seg tama nniḍen, tebna lberǧ ad yesɛu azal n 25 ikilumitren di teɣzi, d 5 lmitrat di leɛli, i wumi rran snat n tewwura. Yiwet ɣer “Micli” ma d tayeḍ ɣer Tizi-wezzu.  Mi d-yuli Marical Rondan ɣer Laṛebɛa, yenna: “ṭfeɣ nefṣ n tmurt n Leqbayel, mazal-iyi kan At-Yanni dɣa ad ṛessiɣ deg-s”.

 Acku At-Yanni d tamurt n iḥeddaden, zik nni xedmen uzzal, xedmen leslaḥ, dɣa qqaren i Wat Laṛebɛa “asekkak», aya ibɣa ad yini “fausse monnaie”. Ar tura siwa At Yanni i yeznuzuyen lfeṭṭa yeṣfan, sɛan azal n 600 n tḥuna tt-ixedmen. Lgerra n At-Yanni tella-d deg “Ugni” gar wat Leḥsen d Wat Laṛbɛa deg yulyu 1857. Wḍen-ed ɣer-sen lɛesker n Fransa seg mi d-zegren seg wasif n Barekmuc.

 S yin i yuli usenǧaq n uɛdaw afransis deg Wat Yanni. Aɛdaw i yerẓan lhiba n tmurt n Leqbayel.

 Inelmaden n tesnawit n At-Yanni:

 Budlal Kamilya,  Bumendil Mekyusa, Ǧender Litisya, Remal Aysa d Xennaf Abdelmalek.

  
 Mazal teṭṭef tneɣlaft n usegmi aɣelnaw, Massa Nouria Benghabrit, deg yizemzan n yikayaden n taggara n useggas-agi 2017, i d-tefka yakan deg waggur n cutember 2016 deg tansa (le site) n tneɣlaft-is. Ihi ha-ten-in amek ara d-asen: akayad n taggara n uswir amenzu 5e, ad d-yili ass n 28 deg waggur n maggu 2017, deg yiɣerbazen-nsen am useggas iɛeddan. Ma d win n taggara n uswir n ulmud alemmas BEM, ad d-yili gar 04 ar 06 seg waggur yunyu 2017. Ma d win n taggara n uswir n tesnawit BAC, ad d-yili gar 11 ar 15 deg waggur n yunyu. Ma d akayad n waddal i yinelmaden imyunan, yebda iḍelli 19 deg meɣres, ad idum alamma d ass n lexmis 23 seg waggur-agi ideg nella.

<p style="text-align: right;"> A. A. 

<div> 
  
 D tumert i yettekcamen deg wulawen n Yiqbayliyen, i iḥemmlen tutlayt-nsen, ladɣa tira-s d tsekla-s, yal mi ara d-yennerni udlis d amaynut. Aṭas n yimyura d yimedyazen i d-yessufuɣen ayen ttarun akken ad t-ɣren wiyaḍ. Dɣa, taggara-a, d tamedyazt tilemẓit Massa Katiya Tuwwat i d-yesferḥen ayetma-s Izwawen s tuffɣa n wammud-is n tmedyazt amenzu ɣur Teẓrigin Achab, iwumi tefka azwel: « Ijeɣlalen n tudert ». Tameskart, yelli-s n taddart n Buzeggan, mm 28 n yiseggasen, tesres-d deg tewriqin timellalin 27 n yisefra iɣezfanen, d 6 n tseddarin n drus n yifyar, neɣ isefra iwezlanen amek i asen-tsemma. Mi ara yeṭṭef yiwen ammud-nni, ad t-yeldi kan ad yaf isekkilen n temɛemrit ttraǧun ad ten-tettbeɛ tmuɣli alamma fukken. Deffir tezwart tummidt i as-d-tura temnadit Massa Nacera Abrous, d wawal i d-tenna tmedyazt i yimeɣriyen d tmeɣriyin, ad d-taweḍ nnuba n yisefra i yebnan ɣef wazal d lmeɛna n wawal. Mačči d yiwen neɣ d sin n yisental iɣef tesselḥa Katiya Tuwwat imru akken ad ijerred tiktiwin s tsusmi d war akukru. Ɣas ma win i yegren tamawt i tkemmict n yisefra i d-tefren, ad yaf belli tesmedyiz s waṭas ɣef tayri, maca llant temsal d tlufa-nniḍen i d-tebder. Imi tessefra daɣen ɣef tyemmat, tameṭṭut, tudert…, atg. Deg yal asefru, ad yekcem yimeɣri deg tugniwin n umeslay i tesseqdac tmedyazt deg lebni n yisefra-s. Tenna deg yiwen n usefru:

  Ma ɣaḍeɣ-ken mi mmuteɣ 

  Mmektit-d mmuteɣ yakan 

   Mmuteɣ asmi akken i d-luleɣ 

   Qumren-iyi-d imukan 

   Yal ass deg-sen ttfateɣ 

   Ttsifeɣ wissen d lukan 

   Xas tettrum fell-i ḍelqeɣ 

   Nekk ttruɣ ɣef wid i d-yeggran 

   Nekk d lmut i s i ferḥeɣ 

   Kerheɣ tudert am qeḍran. 

 Aṭas n tmussni i yellan daxel tduli n wammud « Ijeɣlalen n tudert!” Win iḥemmlen awanes n tira, ad d-yemlil deg-s asegzi n tlufa ur fhimen kra n medden. Ad as-nini i Katiya ayyuz fell-am! Nessaram ammud-ines ad yili d talalit ara d-yeglun s yidlisen-nniḍen i temkarḍit taqbaylit. Afud igerrzen i yimyura!

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Lmut tettruḥ s nnuba am yizid γer tesirt, yal yiwen at-id-yawweḍ wass-is. Tikkelt-a lmut terza-d γer tyemmat n medden merra, tewwi-tt ur bnin fell-as. Tameddit n wass n lexmis 14 yebrir 2016, isali yeγli-d am siεqa di taddert n Wizgan, lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, temmut Jeğğiga n At-Ferḥat, i yetwasnen s yisem Ḥağğa Tafarhatt, sebba n waṭan i dwi tennuγ γef teγzi n useggas. Tlul deg seggas n 1926, tezweğ acḥal d tikkelt, aneggaru γer taddert n wizgan, tezweğ akked Belqasem At-Ḥend acu kan ur-sεin ara ddarya (Tarwa), tamḍelt-is tella-d ass n 15 yebrir di tmeqbert n taddert n Wizgan. Ḥağğa Tafarhatt, d tayemmat n medden merra, snen-tt meden sumata di temnaḍt n Wizgan (Buzgan), d tamγert n lbaraka, tettembaraz d tudert s tebγest d lḥerma, acḥal id-rebba n tsutiwin, acḥal i tezzuzen n yigardan, acḥal i twunes imuḍan d temnifriyin, acḥal i tesfeḍ imeṭṭawen n yigujilen, acḥal i tεawwen imeγban, acḥal i tessared n tfekkiwin n tid yemmuten, acḥal d wacḥal….. Ḥağğa Tafarhatt, d tigejdit n yal axxam, d taftilt igardan. d-adif n taqbaylit. tella dima γer yidis n tlawin yettlawin d yergazen n at-lbaḍna, teččur d leḥrara n teqbaylit id-yernan sser i tudert, tefka laεtab imman-is akken ad-tesefraḥ wid yenḥafen. Ihi ayen id-nenna fell-am drus, tuklaleḍ tajmilt, tuklaleḍ akem-id-nebder γas s tewzel n wawal. Lmut-im tcuba tameγra, taddert n Wizgan meẓẓi meqqar bedden merra akken ad-cebḥen tamḍtelt-im, imi d kem id-yeğğan lewṣaya, nexdem ayen id-tenniḍ. Xas temmuteḍ maca deg ulawen tedderḍ. Sgunfu di talwit a Nna Ḥağğa.

<p style="text-align: center;"><em> Semmaḥ-aγ a Ḥağğa ɛzizen Semmaḥ-aγ ɣef kra im-nexdem Semmaḥ-aγ a tawemmuct n wallen Semmaḥ-aγ a taɛzizt i nḥemmel </em>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Uriɣ-am-d tabrat seg ul, meɛna ur kem-id-tewwiḍ ara, acku…Acku tettenququl-iyi nniya, ɛewqeɣ amek ara m-d-iniɣ deg-s ma ḥemleɣ-kem neɣ ala ! Wissen ahat kemm ma ad temmektiḍ tabrat iyi-d-turiḍ, din iyi-d-tenniḍ:”Iɛedda-d fell-i

 uɛeṭṭaṛ yeznuzun lemḥan, uɣeɣ-d ɣur-s !”  Nekk di tebrat-iw nniɣ-am:  “Mi d-yewweḍ ɣur-i uɛeṭṭaṛ-agi amcum, ṭɛeɣ deg-s, ddiɣ yid-s ɣer wansa i d-yettawi lehmum yeznuzay. Ɣas akken netta yugi-yi ad dduɣ yid-s, yenna-yi-d: Ala a mmi, amkan-agi yuɛeṛ, atan ad tendemmeḍ !

  Maca nekk ṭṭfeɣ di ṛnana-w ddiɣ, mi wḍeɣ ɣer dinna dehceɣ deg wayen akk i ufiɣ: Amkan-nni d asif n yidammen, ttɛummun deg-s yimdanen iyi-icuban . 

 Ɣef yiran n wasif-agi i yellan ḥaca idmim d teɛfeṛt d unajel ideg mcubbakent tɣiṛdmawin d tlafsiwin d yizerman di mkul ṣṣenf. Tagnawt dinna tezga teṛɛed, ini-s d aberkan deg-s zgan ttnaɣen lejnun akked lmalaykat, lḥaṣun amkan-agi yessewḥac, yessagad…”

 Bɣiɣ mliḥ limer di kem-id-tewwiḍ tebrat-iw, akken ad teɣreḍ anda akken i am-d-mmeslayeɣ ɣef tmiqwa :

 Timiqwa n lfeṛḥ,

 Timiqwa  n yimeṭṭawen.

 Tid rriɣ d itran,

 Deg-sent i ẓeṛṛeɣ,

 Amek ggan wussan.

 Yiwen wass deg ussan, mi ɛeddaɣ ad muqleɣ  deg yitran-iw d acu ara yilin, mlaleɣ d tmiqit-inem, tin akken i d-ixelḍen ger tmiqwa-w, ɛeqleɣ-tt, yura fell-as s tira iḍebɛen:”TAYRI”.

 Tayri i d-yeffɣen seg ul

 Teffel-d ɣef acḥal n leqyud

 Iwakken ad tas ɣur-i.

 Seg lɛaqel ɣer umexlul

 Win deg ur sudent dwawi.

 Tayri i d-yeglan s ccfawa

 I win umi xeṛbent tirga.

 Tayri yessawalen i tidet

 I win yeddren di tkerkas.

 Ariḍa ul-iw mazal-it akken, yugi ad yekkes leḥjab-nni iss iɣeṭṭa iwakken ad am-d-yini: “Ḥemleɣ-kem ula d nekk akken iyi-tḥemleḍ”. Ɣas ulama yessen, yesselmad i medden dakken: WIN I K-IḤEMLEN ḤEMMEL-IT, WIN I K-IKEṚHEN KṚEH-IT.

 Mokrane Chikhi

  
 Tasebḥit n wass n lexmis 18 deg maggu i deg-i nella, teḍra-d yiwet n twaɣit deg ugezdu n tutlayt n taɛrebt di tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu. Yuɣ lḥal inelmaden di tzeɣwa-nsen mi teṭṭerḍeq yiwet tqarɛet n usexsi n tmes ( extincteure ) deg wannag ( étage) wis sin n ugezdu n tutlayt n teɛrabt. Cwi kan ulac lemḍerra tameqqrant ɣer yinelmaden. Yella-d kan wid iɣesfen s lgaz i d-yeffɣen s daxel n tqerɛet-nni. Acu kan, yegla-d s tugdi meqqren ɣer yinelmaden imi ur zrin ara ansi i d-yekka ṣṣut-nni. Tugget deg-sen nnan-d belli di tazwara nwan d lbumba i yeṭṭreḍqen . Inelmaden akked wid ixeddmen deg ugezdu, mi slan i ṣṣut-nni yeffeɣ-iten laɛqel fɣen-d ɣer berra s lemɣawla d ayen i d-yeglan d ɣelluy n waṭas deg sen. Ur ɛeṭṭlen ara yiɣalen n usellek wwḍen-d ɣer umkan i wakken ad awin azal n 38 n wid ifesxen, tugget deg-sen d tiqcicin .

  S. Yamani 

  
 Anwa ur nessin Aẓeffun , anwa ur nerzi s Aẓeffun ? Ḥemlen-t akk, ladɣa deg wussan n uẓɣal, neɣ ahat wid i d-yettmennin učči n yiselman, neɣ ahat i tukksa n lxiq rrif n lemwaji n yillel, tikli ɣef rmel n tenfusin-is. Wid i t-id-yettwalin si lbeṛṛa, neɣ wid i d-yetterzafen ɣur-s di teswiɛt d tayeḍ, ɣur-sen amzun d lǧennet, amzun d tibḥirt n targit. Am wakken i as-isemma umedyaz d unaẓur muccaɛen Kamel Ḥemmadi di tezlit-is: ” Aẓeffun, tibḥirt inaẓuren” . Ih, d tibḥirt n yinaẓuren, imi aṭas i d-yefka, aṭas n tgejda n tẓuri tazzayrit n temnaṭ-a, yecban : Igerbucen, Isyaxem, Ṛwiced, Ḥnifa, Ḥilmi, Ɛabed, Faḍila Zziriya, Ǧawut d waṭas yid-sen. Yefka-d imeɣrasen, inaddalen, imawlan n tsekla, ula d imeɣnasen n umennuɣ ɣef tinzert am mMass Belɛid i yettwasnen s yissem n Bacaɣa n taddart n At Ṛhuna i yeslemden Tifinaɣ deg yiseggasen 1963 deg uxxam-is n temnaṭ-a. Maca, imezdaɣ n temdint n Uẓeffun, ttwalin-t akken-nniḍen, imi kra n tmecṭuḥt neɣ n tmeqrant, nutni ddren-tt, telha, neɣ diri-tt , tecbaḥ neɣ tecmet. Am wakken i as-yeqqar yinzi :” s ufella, yecbaḥ yerqem . Daxel, mi i as-tegliḍ yerka”. Deg unebdu d ddiq, di tegrest d lxiq, am wakken i yeqqar Dda Ɛmer . Ladɣa ass n ssuq i d-yettilin d lexmis . Aḥlil ma yella-d umuḍin, aḥlil ma tɣesbeḍ tikli, aḥlil-ik ay amsebrid deg wass n lexmis di temdint n Uẓeffun . Ur yelli wansi ara trewleḍ, ur yelli wansi ara tɛeddiḍ, yal tiɣmeṛt d ẓdiḥ, ma teɣli-d tsegnit, ur tettnal lqaɛa, imi iɛum umdan, d wid yesnuzun neɣ d wid yettaɣen. Ssuq-agi n lexmis, xas ɣer wiyiḍ ttwalin-t d agrruj ladɣa wid-nni i d-irezzun ɣur-s akken ad senzen tiɣawsiwi –nsen, maca ɣer imezdaɣ -is d ugur, d amihi, d lɛella. Kra n yimḍebber i d-yusan, yugi ad as-d-yaf tifrat, imi ur bɣin ara ad as-d-afen tifrat. Ugin ad walin uguren n tidet n yimezdaɣ, ugin ad seddun tamdint-agi ɣef wayen sefran yimedyazen d tmedyazin ɣer sdat. Ugin ad zwin fell-as aɣebbar n tkerkas. Ttwalin kan taclimt n s ufella. Dabrid i d-yeǧǧa yimekcem afṛensis i mazal ar ass-a. Ulac amṛaḥ amaynut, ulac abrid n talwit, ur yelli uzrug i tuffɣa . D agi i tella tuttra . Wissen acimi i t-ǧǧan akka? Wissen acimi ur bɣin ara ad yennarni am netta am temnaḍin-nniḍen ? Wissen acimi d ayen yezrin xir n wayen i d-itteddun ? Tiririt, tban , teshel, ur teḥwaǧ ara ad tnadiḍ aṭas deg wallaɣ-ik. Aẓeffun, rran-t yimḍebbren–is d allal i wurar , d asafar n tjaṛa di tefranin . Yuɣal d takurt gar yifassen n yimsartiyen, rran-t d ččir gar yiḍarren n yikabaren. Aẓeffun, brin-t yiɣuraf n tsartit taderɣalt , gezren–t wid yettṛebbin lullu, snarnayen yis-s sɛaya n tedrimt-nsen . Am waken i d-yeqqar yiwen seg–sen : “ Aẓeffun yessefk ad yeqqim akka, am tfelwit-nni i yesunneɣ unaẓur, yal mi ara tiqdim, irennu wazal-is “. Yah, timdinin ttnarnint di yal tama, deg yiberdan, di lebni, deg yisenfaṛen ara d-yawin lfayda i warraw-is …Aẓeffun, bɣan ad t-ǧǧen d axrib gar yixerban n umezruy, gar yixerban n tatut.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kader Belaidi 

  
 Deg ubrid n tudert, akken yebɣu yili umdan, yettaf-d anda ara yesres iḍarren ed ɣer wanda tansa ara yerr. Amedyaz Ḥmed Ɛezzun, yezmer ad yili d amedya n waṭas n wid i teǧǧa tafat deg wallen. Ɣas seg temẓi i d-yemlal ed waṭṭan i as-yekksen iẓri, yeḍfer s tafat n wul abrid-is deg ddunit almi yuɣal yennum addad-is, ileḥḥu weḥd-s deg taddart-is. Nnig n waya, Ḥmed degmi yemlal ed tmedyezt mm yiḥulfan, yettekka deg waṭas n tfaskiwin i d-yettilin deg Tmurt n Yizwawen; am Bgayet, Aqbu, Tizi Wezzu, Tubiret, ed ideg yewwi kra n warrazen deg umecwar-is ar tura. Mi i as-d-tura tegnit ad yeg asileɣ ɣef umaḍal n tilifun urkid s tallelt n Tdukkla n Wid ur Nferrez n Bgayet, ukud yemyussan aṭas-aya tura, ifures Ḥmed Ɛezzun tagnit-a, imi iga asileɣ-is yerna yeffeɣ-d ɣer taggara s ugerdas i as-yeldin tiwwura n uqeddic deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, ddaw leɛnaya n Tmehla n Tigawt Tinmettit (DAS) n Bgayet. Deg tillin-is akked tdukkla-ya, yenwa daɣen ad yesɛu abiru seg Yiderginen almi d Tsexriwt ed Ayt Smaɛel, ideg ara iqeddec i ubaɣur n yiderɣalen n temnaḍt, wanag ur yufi anda ara as-d-isiḥ. Almi d-yeḥḍer wass ad d-tennulfu Tdukkli i Yimeɛḍar ed Yimuḍan Idumen «Tiɣri», yeqqel-d deg-s i Ḥmed umḍiq n uselway wis sin, neɣ n unmazul n uselway, i yeṭṭef s tumert akken i aɣ-d-yenna: «mi yi-d-yemmeslay Ɛebdun Smaɛil ɣef tekti n usnulfu n tdukkla-ya, cerheɣ ayendin nniɣ-as nekk aql-i heggiɣ, imi d ayen igerrzen aṭas. Dɣa, mi nɛedda ɣer tigawt, ɣer umsegraw ilmend n usnulfu-ines unsib, rniɣ ferḥeɣ mi qeblen merra isem i as-fkiɣ “Tiɣri“.» Yufa ihi Ḥmed Ɛezzun amkan i yeddem s tumert, imi ɣas akken iga s waddad-is, anda texdem armud (activités) tdukkla-ya tiɣri atan din, am tikkelt iɛeddan mi rzan ɣur yimuḍan n Txerraḍt (Xerraṭa). Ma yella d asemmed n wahil i useggas-a, aṭas i yettraǧun Ḥmed d yimdukkal-is, imi ma drus llant kraḍ n tigawin (actions) ara yemmaggen send ad d-yelḥeq 2016.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Asmi akken ulac di tqelmunt-nsen , qeṭṭun-d di tḥanut n winna –akken tura jeɛlen d ulac. Mačči d izli i ḥamlen immir ad ḥnunnefen ɣer wemkan anda yettɣimi. Tezla d uqlaqal ɣer din s lmeqṣuḍ imi ayen ɣef acu ttnadin ḥala ayen ara d-aɛwin si lǧiha-s. Qeṭṭun s ukridi. Netta ur d yecliɛ ara , yettmmuddu mebla cceḥa, acku ṭṭbiɛa aken i taga. Yettbuddu medden , werǧin iɣull yiwen seg cwiṭ-nni akken yesɛa deg ikufan-is. Gar-as d yiman-is yeqqar kan : “ awi-d ad afen medden acu ara wwin ad nefɛen iman-nsen yerna ad nefɛan wiyaḍ. I wumi ara jemɛeɣ yak ayen kesbeɣ dag-i kan i yiman-iw? ”. Taḥanut-is mezziyet mačči d kra . Tella deg-s llamba tettreqqriq akken tefk tafat s lqis-kan. Fiḥel zzyada n ṭṭya ,acku yeẓra yezdeɣ deg taddart anda qqwan iderɣalen i umi ula id tegga tafat. Ma d-sin-nni , lferḥ-nsen mi ara d yelli zdat-sen azmam-nni deg yura timussniwin ines . Din id squccuḍen , yal-ass, ayen s w-acu ara seḥmun wallaɣ-nsen ɣef yeqfel uqerrif n war tamussni. Maca, xas akken wwin, ayen akken wwin ran-t d-ayla. D Nutni it-id nawlen. Anda ddan medden wehmen seg isefra akked timucuha id ttawin. Si ssuq ɣef ssuq, si tejmaɛt ɣer tajmaɛt , zzuzren awalen id wwin deg tiktabin ɣṛan ɣer bab n tḥanut-nni armi yuɣal lqum ala yisen i yettgalla. Yebda yettali itri-nsen ( neɣ ahat nwan dayen yuli) deg igenni. S-ya d s-ya la sen -id sawalen ama ɣer timeɣriwin, neɣ ɣer lewziɛat, neɣ tebyitat akken ad cebḥen teswiɛt. Yiwen seg-sen ( gar sin-nni) yefhem ula d netta yezmer ad yaru yerna ad yesnnulfu. Inuda ɣef lecyax ara s yeslamden kra n ilugan n tira, immir yeddem leqlam yebda asmiri deg awalen ɣef tiwriqin. Da d-taqenuẓt, da d-asefru, dihin d lexwaṭer. Werdin yufa ziɣ seddu awal ad yarew awal. Yenna i yiman-is : “ih tura nekk zemreɣ , yeɛfa Ṛebbi fell-i, uma sriɣ i tirzi ɣer bab n tḥanut-nni!” Ma d wis sin-nni yeɣwa-t cḍeḥ, yuɣal d-aferraḥ i teddu i zedwa n iḍebbalen. Maca mazal i teddu d umezwaru-nni,. Yiwwas kan m-safhamen yenna win-a i wayeḍ ; “ tura nekk ad qqareɣ , ma kečč sefru. A nuɣal d tayuga, lwaḥid ad nejmeɛ ṣṣaba mačči d kra!” Zrin wussan, ttun yak win ɣef akken id qeṭṭun asmi akken di tqelmunt-nsen yezdeɣ w-ulac. Ttun ayen i sen-yettales, ttun ayen ɛebban fell-as.Anda ddan qqaren-as “ Ah win-a? Anef-as kan anef-as, mazal-it d nniyya. Xas aɣ yeṭṭef lḥwaj ɣer ɣuṛ-s akka ɣer zdat , yeshel a t-id n-serḍeb… yelha kan w-aya…i tuẓga…” Bab n tḥanut-nni , ɣef ur yexfi kra , yettwali s w-allen amek tizikert tebɣa a tt-ɛaned tamrart. Ihuz tuyat-is yenna:  » cwiṭ a nɛeddi fell-as a win yebɣan deg-s yimɣur/ ma d aṭas ur nettaǧǧa amer win i teddun meɣṛur”

 Yefka amrar, yessawzel lemrar… acku deg ul-is yeẓra yewɛer i umdan umi i tt-tekkes lekyasa ad yecbu ales!

<p style="text-align: right;">  Aït Slimane Hamid  

  
 Nnig n tfaska tamaynut n Tubiret akked umsizwer n temyaɛt s usefru n Tdukkla Lbacir Amellaḥ n Yicekkaben i ara yemaggen, ad d-nesmekti, yiwet seg 26 deg yulyu almi d 30, tayeḍ akken-nni deg unekcum n ɣuct, atan grant-d tiɣri i yiḥeddaden n wawal snat n tamiwin nniḍen ara d-yessudsen timliliyin-a, yiwet d tidukkla tadelsant Smaɛil Azikiw n At Ziki, tayeḍ d taɣiwant n At Wasif s ullethi n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa ed ugraw n tmeɣriwin n taddart-nni. Aṭuqqet akka n ttiɛadat-a idelsanen yecban annaren-a n usnerni n tmedyezt tazwawt neɣ tamaziɣt akked temlilit war ssuma gar yimedyazen-a at iḥulfan, d ayen yernan, d ayen yelhan almi drus n tigawin i d-yettilin ttmeẓrant s tidet am tigi. Daymi annect-a ur yessecreh ara imedyazen kan i yefudden amlaqi seg winna n Udrar n Fad aya deg meɣres yezrin, maca daɣen ula d tutlayt tezmummeg seg ul mi akken ttwafesrent tiɣriwin, ladɣa, am wakken neẓra akk, mi teḥbes tfaska nniḍen n Tmizar iseggasen-a iɛeddan, i d-yeglan s ddeqs n yisteqsiyen. Tafaska n At Ziki d tajmilt i Smaɛil Azikiw, win yebɣan ad iceyyaɛ isefra-yis i tikkin yella yiznil-a i walmend-nsen s ttawil n internet: <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="402123336d213a292b2b2937002f35342c2f2f2b6e26322c" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a>. Isefra ad ilin tlata d imaynuten, ad ttwaceyyɛen send azemz-a: amenzu n ɣuct 2015. Ad nesselɣu kan wid ara yerzu yisalli, dakken tiɣri i tikkin n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa akked tɣiwant n At Wasif iɛedda lawan-is n uceyyaɛ n yisefra ass n sed 4 deg yulyu-ya. Timlilit-a d tin umi semman «timezwura n tmedyezt n At Wasif» ad d-tili ussan n 12, 13 akked 14 yulyu 2015, d tajmilt i Lḥaǧ El Muxṭar Ayt Sayd «amedyaz ur neggan». Ma seg tama n yimedyazen mi i ten-nesteqsa ɣef yisiharen-a llan ḥman i tikkin llan smiḍen: «ur ḥsiɣ ara ma ad ttekkiɣ deg umsizwer imi i yi-tt-yekkes wakud. D acu kan zemreɣ ad ḥewseɣ yiwen n wass ad waliɣ imdukkal». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n umedyaz.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Tmenṭac iseggasen aya i aɣ-yeǧǧa Maɛṭub Lwennas , d yiwen seg tgejda yeɣlin ; Lwennas d yiwen unaẓur yettwassnen ama deg tmurt-nneɣ neɣ deg tmurt n berra. Ilul ass n 24 dg yennayer, aseggas n 1956 deg taddart n tewrirt Musa waɛmer deg tɣiwant n At Meḥmud deg Wat Dwala n Tizi Uzzu ; Lwennas d yiwen uwhid i tesɛa twacult-is imi yekker-d baba-s yella deg lɣerba d netta i d argaz amecṭuḥ deg uxxam. Yesɛa tawacult tamecṭuḥt yemma-s Nna Ʃalǧiya d weltma-s Malika d yaya-s. Zedɣen, mi d-yusa baba-s deg Fransa, deg Berǧ Mnayel. Baba-s, yella d aqerru ɣef yiwet tkuzint. Lwennas sawlen-as-d akken ad yesɛaddi lɛesker iruḥ s tumert , yefreḥ yesɛadda-d lɛesker mebla ugur, maca yettnaɣ dinna d wid yettmeslayen taɛrabt. Dayagi kan ur yeḥmil ara. Ihi segmi meẓẓi i yebda ccna , yebda s tbidunt cwiṭ cwiṭ almi yuɣal d afennan ameqqran. Lwennas, ur yesɛi ugur n ccna wala n twacult. Lwennas ugur-is d yiwen kan : tamaziɣt ilaq ad tili d tutlayt taɣelnawt d tunṣbt. Ur iḥemmel ara aqbayli ara yettmeslayen s taɛrabt neɣ s tutlayin niḍen, Lwennas d win ur nettaggad ara , ur yessedrag ara iman-is, ihedder tidet.Tizlatin –is, d tid yeseḥlayen imuḍan. Yecna ɣef tayri , yecna ɣef tmurt, ɣef tegmat, ɣef udabu amesbaṭli, yecna ɣef terbeɛt n JSK, yecna ɣef tsertit. Iḥemmel ad iɛiwen imeɣban. Lwennas yettwassen s tezlatin-is ḥlawen akked d umennuɣ-is ur neḥbis ara ɣef tmaziɣt. Seg wasmi i as-ugin i Dda Lmulud Mɛemmri ad yexdem asarag, dɣa, yeḥreqq akken ilaq, ikemmel yesbeggen-d lɣiḍ-is netta d yiqbayliyen akken ad lḥun imi imṣulṭa yal mi ara d-ffɣen leqbayel i wakken ad d-beggnen lɣiḍ-nsen, ad ten-wwten neɣ ad ten-awin ɣer lḥebs. Lwennas, yecna aṭas di tmurt n Fransa, yewwi atas n warrazen, gar-asen araz i as-tefka Danielle Mitterrand deg 06 duǧember 1994, arraz wis sin yettunefk-as ass 22 deg meɣres 1995 «Prix de la liberté d’expression» , ma d arraz wis kraḍ ass 19 duǧember «Le prix Tahar Djaout de la fondation Nouredine Abba .» Maɛṭub Lwennas, yettwet sɣur yijedermiyen deg Micli , jerḥen-t yekcem ɣer sbiṭar n Micli, syin ɣer Tizi, syin ɣer Lezzayer. Iruḥ ɣer Fransa akken ad idawi iman-is akken iwata. Yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt akken ad yexdem tameɣra deg unnar n Tizi Uzzu. Ul-is yeččur imi yettwet di lbaṭel, yecna-t deg tezlit «Ay amsebrid s At yanni ḥbes ad ak-steqsiɣ ɣef ujedarmi n Micli iyi-gzem-n ɣliɣ…». Lwennas, yettwaṭṭef sɣur yiwet terbeɛt timselleḥt wwin-t xemsṭṭac n wussan seg 25 deg cutember 1994 almi d 10 deg tuber 1994. Leqbayel selben fell-as , ula d leqraya tettwaḥbes aseggas –nni. Deg useggas 1995, yessuffeɣ-d adlis deg-s yura-d tudert-is d wayen yesɛedda qerriḥ akked leqbayel mi llan akken ɣer tama-s i as-ixedmen afud , imi ur teǧǧin ara akken yeqqar «Leqbayel ay d leɛmer-iw». Deg useggas n 1998, yusa-d seg Fransa, yuɣ lḥal yessuffeɣ-d tizlatin tineggura, «Tabrat i lḥukkam, ilḥeq-d zhir…atg. Ass n 25 deg yunyu yeffeɣ netta d tmeṭṭut-is Nadiya akked snat n teslifin-is akken ad ččen imekli deg Tizi Uzzu , deg ubrid n tuɣalin, yettwanɣa deg Tala Bunan deg uzal qayli. Tikkelt-agi ur t-zgilen ara d ayen i d-yesɣeḍlen ṭṭlam aberkan ɣef twacult-is taqbaylit : ulac win ur nru <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>ara fell-as. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 Deg tama n At Ɛebbas, i d-yezgan deg unẓul n twilayt n Bgayet, asnefli ixuṣ deg waṭaṣ n yiḥricen. Krad n tɣiwanin cuddent ɣer tama-agi: At Ṛẓin, Buǧlil lakked Iɣil Ɛli. Tiɣiwanin-agi xuṣent aṭaṣ deg wayen yeɛnan aman n tissit. Ulac taddart anda tcercuren waman deg laɛyun yal ass, acku aman xuṣen deg yiqudas. Wid yesɛan akka zher seɛun aman yiwen wass deg krad n wussan deg yixxamen nsen. Llant tuddar ttilin waman degsent tikelt deg 15 n wussan, am taddart n Lqelɛa i d-yezgan s kra n 25 ikilumiṭren ɣef uqerru n tɣiwant n Iɣil Ɛli. Lḥaṣun yiwen n lḥif d-amuqran. Medden zemren ad ṣsebren i waṭaṣ n lixṣaṣ, maca aman lakked d wučči d-awezɣi. Deg tama nsen, imḍebren n tɣiwanin-agi ur xdimen ara ttawil akkeni ad ksen tazɣent-agi n waman n tissit, yettuɣalen d-agnu amuqran yagi deg unebdu! Medden yeṭaṭṭaf-iten fad deg unebdu, imi aman txuṣun deg iqudas n userbi. Ayagi, yettdemir aṭaṣ n twaculin akken ad d-aɣent aman n sitirnat i ttxelliṣen akka ger 1000 d 1200 idinaren. Llant tiwaculin ur sɛint ara tadrimt ilaqen, ɣef ayagi tagument-d aman am zik-nni s yicmuxen. Ayagi i gellu-d s kra n waṭanen, imi aman i d-tagumen medden ur zeddig-it ara akkit. D-acu, llant kra n tuddar deg tama-agi n At Ɛebbas, ur ruǧan-t ara imḍebren n tɣiwanin nsent akken ad skeflen aɣubel-agi n waman, i d-yettuɣalen seg wezɣal ɣer wayeḍ. Llant tuddar, ma d-nini akka d-imedyaten ilaq wiyaḍ ad ḍefren. Tella taddart-agi n Muqa, i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Iɣil Ɛli. Asmi nḥafen imezdaɣ n taddart-a seg lixṣaṣ n waman, kren akka deg yiwet n twizi anda i d-rran tiɛwinin ɣer yiwet akken n tbettit n siman i bnan s yifassen-nsen. Aman-nni « cuden-ten » ɣer yiqudas i kecmen akk ixxamen n taddart-agi n Muqa, seg wass-nni, imezdaɣ ur sɛin ara aɣubel n waman. Wigi llan yal ass, yal saɛa deg laɛyun n waman! Amedya nniden: taddart n Tigrin yellan deg tɣiwant n Buǧlil am akken teḍfer Muqa, terna i lǧehd n waman imi imezdaɣ-ines ɣazen yiwen n lbir s ttawil n « ṣunda », akken ad ssufɣen aman n tissit ar ad cudden ɣer yiqudas yettawin ɣer yixxamen nsen. Tigrin tenḥaf ula d nettat seg lixṣaṣ n waman, imi aman llan ttasen-d tikelt kul 15 n wussan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 -PESCARA (Ṭṭalyan) – Afran n temdint n Wehṛan akken ad tessuddes taẓrigt tis 19 n Wuraren Igrakalanen deg 2021 d ayen ara yeǧǧen Lezzayer ad tessuddes uraren-a i tikkelt tis snat deffir tin aydeg ay ten-tessuddes deg 1975 deg Ldzayer Tamaneɣt.

  Agraw amatu n Useqqamu Agraɣlan n Wuraren Igrakalen d Wehṛan ay yefren s 51 n tuɣac mgal 17 n tuɣac ay ifernen tamdint tatunsit n Sfaqs.

  Ma deg Ldzayer, tella-d tumert d tameqrant mi d-iban ugmuḍ n tefrant n Useqqamu Agraɣlan n Wuraren Igrakalanen, yerna afran-a ur ixeyyeb ara assirem n tmagla tazzayrit ay iḥedṛen deg tefrant-nni deg temdint taṭalyanit n Pescara.

 Aneɣlaf n yilemẓiyen d waddal s timmad-nnes, El Hadi Ould Ali, yedda ɣer Pescara ass n laṛebɛa akken ad idafeɛ ɣef ukaram n temdint n Wehṛan, yerna iban-d yesɛa laman dakken d Ldzayer ara tt-yawin. 

 Assuddes n Wuraren Igrakalanen deg Wehṛan d ayen ara yeǧǧen Lezzayer ad tessuddes uraren-a i tikkelt tis snat deffir taẓrigt-nni ay tessuddes yagi akken igerrez deg 1975. 

 Idzayriyen mazal cfan ɣef wuraren-a ay d-yellan deg usuddis ulimpi imgerrez n 5 Yulyu, deg useggas aydeg Lezzayer tesfugel amulli-nnes wis 13 n uzarug. 

 Deg temsizwert-nni tagraɣlant tameqrant, ttekkan 2444 n yinaddalen seg 15 n tmura, yerna agdud adzayri yumar (yefṛeḥ) mliḥ s yigmaḍ igerrzen n unazzal Boualem Rahoui (3000 n lmitrat s temda), d yinaddalen Betrouni, Draoui, Keddou, Safsafi d wiyaḍ, d yileggamen Mohamed Missouri d Nini Hocine. 

 Tikkelt-a, d tamdint n Wehṛan ay yessefken ad d-tessewjed mliḥ iman-nnes akken ad temmager tadyant-a tameqrant. Tamdint-a tesɛa akk tizemmar akken ad teqqel d tamdint s wazal-nnes deg Yilel Agrakal: tezga tettmagar abeddel s tefses, llan deg-s yisenfaren d imeqranen, tesɛa imukan d ucbiḥen yerna tidumṣukiwin-nnes jebbdent-d inerzafen. «Wehṛan ad tili deg ttiɛad yerna ad tili deg uswir. Aya d acqirrew ameqran i nekkni. Aya lɛahed ara neg i yiman-nneɣ akken ma nella, ama d iɣermanen, ama d iduba, d inedbalen neɣ d udblien», ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked uɣella n uslekman n twilayt, Abdelghani Zaalane.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> APS 

  
 A ziγen lγaεa ur teddewwir ara ! Akka i tt-id-ibeggen yiwen Usuεudi deg yiwen usarag i yexdem di …tesdawit n Suεudiya. Yenna-asen : ‘’lukan lqaεa teddewir, tili mi ara tafeg tmesrifegt si sya alamma d tamaurt n Ccinwa, ad teḥbes deg yigenni dγa tamurt-nni ad d-taweḍ γer ddaw n tmesrifgit-nni.Aya, ma yella teddewir γef uyeffus. Ma yella teddewir γef uẓelmaḍ, ur tettaweḍ ara tmesrifegt γer umekkan axater timesrifegt tleḥḥu, tamurt-nni tleḥḥu. ’’ Ma γef wid-nni yewḍen aggur, yenna-asen ulac deg-s, d tikellax, tagi s sinima n Hollywood.

 ‘’ Ad teẓreḍ i ixeddem usexser mi ara yaγ amekkan di tmussni’’ i as-yenna umedyaz. Yiwen am wagi tura ad ak-d-yemmel amek ara tedduḍ di ddunit-ik. Yenwa meskin imi as-ḥebsen allaγ-is ur yettxemmim ara ula d lqaεa teḥbes. Wissen kan amek i d-yettili ṭṭlam akked tafat, εlaḥsab-is ? Yezmer ad d-yini, mi ara d-yeγli ṭṭlam, d lqaεa i yersan nniqab. Mi ara tekcem s axxam lqaεa, ad t-tekkes, dγa ad d-tban tafat. Yaxi qqaren-d γef yicciwen n uzger i tbedd lqaεa ! Aḥlil…

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M      

  
 Akken tebɣu teqsiḥ teswiɛt-is, ad tafeḍ anaẓur dima yeskanay-d teḥdeq ed yiwellihen s wayen yesɛa d tamussni, imi daɣen ma iruḥ uḥulfu ad t-tafeḍ ɣur-s. Akken i d Ḥmed Neccaf, ɣas ar tura ur yewwiḍ lebɣi-s deg umecwar-is n ccna, maca werǧin teṭṭaxer tẓuri seg wallaɣ-is. D asqerdec yid-s ɣef waṭas n tlufa deg tdiwennit-a, ɣret-tt!

  Ḥmed Neccaf yedder d iseggasen akked tẓuri ed uẓawan. Ma tzemreḍ ad aɣ-d-temleḍ tamɛeyt-a? 

 Ahat d tamɛayt neɣ ahat d amecwar yeddan s lebɣi ur d-newwi kra ɣas lebɣi yezdeɣ ul-iw. Akken bdan akk icennayen n tezlit taqbaylit s tcabcaqin, mi tt-yerẓa wemɣar n baba ad nadiɣ tayeḍ tedda kan akken, ma d tazwara s wudem ideg yeqwa usirem di tegnit i aɣ-yefka Unaẓur ameqqran i nettɛuzu aṭas Dda Meǧahed Ḥamid ideg nebda nettmelil d tezmert-nneɣ di ccna, dɣa tikkelt tamenzut ideg i d-ɛeddaɣ di tedwilt nni «Icennayen n uzekka» deg useggas n setta u tmanyin ( 1986 ) dɣa s tezlit umi i semma-ɣ Laɛbeɣ tiddas (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FRpcOvMz8uM ) . Dɣa syin i bdiɣ ttakeɣ lebɣi i ccɣel-agi i yi-yellan deg ul . 

  Akken iyi-d-tenniḍ tikkelt yezrin, telliḍ tenwiḍ ad teskelseḍ tasfift wanag ur d-yella waya. Acimi?  

 D tidet, akken i ak-nniɣ, imi lebɣi n yal taɣawsa d asiweḍ ɣer umenni n umdan, skelseɣ tasfift s lqella n tezmert di 91 nni deg ustidyu Yougourten di tallit-nni d Mhenna Tigrini i yellan din. Acu, imi ttawil akken i d-nniɣ ulac akken ad greɣ tiɣri i yimussnawen n uẓawan teqqim kan akken d ssut d asmekti, ssarameɣ ad wwḍeɣ ɣer lebɣi-w ɣas yeɣlay ssenf-agi n l’acoustique, ilaq-as tadrimt meqqren akken ad txedmeḍ ccɣel azedgan dɣa truḥ kan akken.

  Deg yiwet n tewlaft d taqburt, tettbineḍ-d tcennuḍ ɣef usayes (scène) kečč d ilemẓi. Deg wanwa ttiɛad imir-nni? 

 D tidet agma Mhenni, teẓriḍ acennay aqbayli ur nettwassen ara deg umecwar-is neɣ di tazwara-s deg yeqriben-is kan ideg yessaram akken ad yekki ama di tmeɣriwin n twaculin neɣ di tejmilin umi neqqar «les galas».

 Seg tesɛa ed tmanyin ( 1989 ) d asawen armi waqila d waḥed ed tesɛin ( 1991 neɣ 92 ?) imi d lǧar n taddert n Unaẓur ameqqran Sliman Azem ttilint-d tejmilin di tallit-nni dɣa neccden-iyi-d yal tikelt, dayen iyi-yefkan aṭas afud akken twalaḍ tawlaft-nni, d wayen i d-yernan akk sey-a ed sey-a .

  D ttawil kan i yettaǧǧan icennayen akka am kečč ur d-ttbinen ara neɣ tella sebba nniḍen?  

 Yal yiwen amek yettwali ccna ed wanda yesɛa uguren. Di tallit-nni lliɣ ttnadiɣ timussniwin deg uẓawan ladɣa, lemmer telli tegnit akken ad yexdem umdan kra deg yiɣerbazen n uẓawan ( conservatoire ) asekkur timellalin, imi aṭaṣ n yefeṭṭiwjen i d-iteqqsen, rnu ad d-iniɣ uguren n tudert ad tt-nerr i lmektub (yettaḍsa). Deg wayen iyi-yeɛnan ad d-iniɣ d uguren n tudert iyi-yeǧǧan ur uẓiɣ ara ɣer sdat, wamma tadrimt ad yili ttawil akken yebɣu yili lḥal. 

  Ahat ula d kra n tamiwin ur as-d-wehhant afus i unaẓur? 

 Ad d-iniɣ meqqer ccɣel-is wayagi : Yella yiwen umaṭṭaf s teqbaylit iɣer terra tmeẓẓuɣt s waṭas, acu acennay ilaq-as ad yawi leqdic-is yewjed akken ad yesɛu amkan din, ɣas ma yella akken yebɣu yili lḥal yettɛawan. Ma d tama n ssuq d isem, ma tesɛiḍ-t hatan, ma ulac aɣ-it-id s yal udem.

 Ma d tama n usekles, acennay ilaq-as ad yesɛu akk timussniwin-nni ula di tetiknikin akken ad yexdem ccɣel-is akken i yebɣa, wigi akk d uguren i d-yettasen s lweqt d uxeddim .

  Amek tettwaliḍ kečč tizlit tazwawt n wass-a ? 

 Yal yiwen akken i yettwali tizlit taqbaylit, nekk ɣur-i ur tt-yuɣ kra, teqqim s lqima-s d ccan-is. Ma yewweḍ-d wass-a ad nerr di ccek ayen akk yettwaxedmen sɣur Yinaẓuren-nneɣ imeqqranen d lɛib fell-aɣ, ilaq kan ad as-nefk udem i tuklal Tizlit taqbaylit : aɣerbaz-nni i yettwehhin amdan ɣer terẓen ed laɛɣel. Ma d aḍu i d-ihubben… yal tallit ad tesɛeddi nnuba-s.

  Acimi am wakken tbeɛɛdeḍ cwiṭ seg wannar n tẓuri taggara-ya? 

 Win ixedmen di tament ur yetteɛraḍ lbenna-s d lmuḥal ! ladɣa udem-agi n taẓuri, bab-is d amuḍin ma yexḍa-t am win umi truḥ lḥaǧa ad yettnadi fell-as nettat sdat-s, ad yeqqim kan ireffed yesrur (yessusem taswiɛt) lḥasul d aṭṭan yelhan.

  Gar yinaẓuren i tḥemmleḍ yella Abcic Belɛid, dɣa tecniḍ yiwet seg tezlatin-is deg tvidyut i d-yettwasersen deg yutub…  

 Aṭas n yinaẓuren i ḥemmleɣ ɣas ḥemmleɣ akk wid yettqadaren tizlit taqbaylit s umata. Abcic Belɛid fell-as rreḥma d leɛfu, d timlilit gar-iyi ed ccna-s, dɣa tewwi-yi lhawa-s akken i diyi-wwint akk tid n wid uɣur i d-lemdeɣ kra n tɣawsiwin yaɛnan ccna s umata.

  Telliḍ gar terbaɛt i d-yesnulfan asebter n yiḍrisen n tezlatin tizwawin, ɣas ma tura ur iqeddec aṭas. Mmeslay-aneɣ-d fell-as…  

 Asebter i d-yellan deg Faysbuk meqqer ccɣel-is ula d winna. Acu, ad rreɣ tajmilt meqqren i yimeddukal i yellan deffir ccɣel-agi s lebɣi d adrar, imi tin n wul tettak afud nettawi-d tisebḥiyin akken ad as-nefk udem icebḥen i tezlit taqbaylit. Garasen : Amar Ɛmimer, Ɛezdin Ḥamaduc, Deḥman Muhubi, di tazwara llan-d daɣen Tansa N Talsa, Hass Mess, Zahir At Qasi, Amedyaz azwaw mass Merric Ḥsen, Ḥakim Ḥamani d wiyaḍ akk, tajmilt-nsen meqqrit.

  Tanemmirt a Ḥmed Neccaf mi d-terriḍ i yisteqsiyen-nneɣ. D acu d awal-ik n taggara ? 

 Tanemmirt i kečč a Mhenni ɣef uncad-agi i qebleɣ i tikkelt tamenzut akken ad yeḍru imi aṭas i yi-d-inecden wanag ur beqquɣ ara, ahat s tin n leḥya neɣ n tezmert ɣer tririyin-iw imi ur ddiɣ ara d lweqt ( ad d-iniɣ yeǧǧa-yi ), neɣ ahat d ayen nniḍen, win yeẓran ?

 Ad d-iniɣ tanemmirt i wid i yi-d-yettakken afud ɣas kkawen yifadden, akka am kečč akked umedyaz i ur tettuɣ ara, d aḥbib ukud bdiɣ akken yiwen n leqdic mazal iɛelleq, wa d Mass Muḥend Ɛrab Ben Teyyeb. Tanemmirt akk i yimeɣriyen n tdiwennit-agi. Tanemmirt-ik a Mhenni ɣef tegnit-a.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t : Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 WASHINGTON – Amsenselkim amarikani, Ray Tomlinson, amesnulfu n e-mail, yemmut, i d-yura ɣef usebter n Facebook akked win n Twitter Vinton Cerf, amesnulfu ucrik n TCP/IP rnu ɣer-s, ass-a d anmazul n uselway deg Google. Ilul deg useggas n 1941, yewwi-d agerdas-is seg tesdawit mechuren n MIT (Massachusetts Institute of Technology) Asudu n tesnatwilt n Massachusetts, Ray Tomlinson yura izen-is n e-mail amezwaru deg umezruy deg useggas 1971. Iɣnew-d ahil i yes-s yessaweḍ ad yazen iznan-is mi yella yettmahal ɣef Arpanet, d aẓeṭṭa, yettwaɛezlen i yinagmayen akked yiserdasen, d anagraw-a i d-yurwen Internet. D netta i umi d-tusa tekti n usekkil @ akken ad yebḍu gar tmagit n umdan akked uẓeṭṭa iɣer yeqqen. ‘’Seg yimezwura deg wayen yerzan tasnatwilt, Ray d argaz i iɣewnen e-mail deg tazwara-nni ideg d-nnulfan yiselkimen yeqqnen’’, i d-yesseɣru umsemhel-is, taṛmist tamarikanit n temḥaddit Raytheon, deg yiwen n ulɣu. ‘’Amahil-is ibeddel tamuɣli n teɣwalt deg umḍal, ɣas akken d anǧaḥ ameqqran, maca ur syuli ara s aqerru, ur yettzuxxu ur icuḥ i yiman-is, yeǧǧa-yaɣ-d ilem d ameqqran’’, i yerna yenna-d Raytheon. Ɣef ublug-is, Ray Tomlinson yura-d akk amezruy n uɣnaw n @, akken ur yettanef i tenfust ad teṭṭef amḍiq n umezruy. ‘’e-mail amezwaru i yuznen gar sin iselkimen i yellan wa sdat wa’’, qqnen s Arpanet, i d-yessegzi. ‘’Izen amezwaru d win akken iɣef ur nezmir ad necfu ɣef waya i t-ttuɣ, i yerna yenna-d. ‘’Yezmer ad yili akka QWERTYUIOP (isekkilen imezwura n unasiw anglizi) neɣ ahat d ayen icuban s aya…’’. ‘’Ur ttamnet ayen akk i teɣɣarem deg web. Mmektit-d kan, d imdanen i yellan deffir yisebtar-a, imdanen tecḍen’’, i d-iweṣṣa.

<p style="text-align: right;"> APS 

  
 Ungal Arrac n tefsut n Youcef Oubellil, yura-t deg yiseggasen 1994/1995, yeffeɣ-d i tkkelt tamezwarut s lmendad n Ugraw adelsan amaziɣ s tallelt n Tiddukkla n Marikan ACAA imi dɣa yewwi arraz amezwaru n temsizzelt n Lmulud At Mɛemmer i ixeddem ugraw-agi. Yewwi-d awal Mass Youcef Oubellil deg ungal-agi ɣef temsalt n tayri, acu kan d sebba i wakken ad d-ihder ɣef tedyanin n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen. S waya i yezmer umeskar, ɣef wakken i d-yenna, ad yejbed imeɣriyen, ladɣa ilmeẓyen ɣer tɣuri n wungal-is. Ilul Youcef Oubellil deg taddart n Ubizar, taɣiwant n At Jennad, d amaru, yura ungal Arrac n tefsut u ihegga sin wungalen-nniḍen akked wammud n yisefra, mzal ur d-ffiɣen ara. 

  A. A. 

  
 Ɣef tnaga n waṭas n medden, ur d-yelli ara iseggasen-a ineggura usihar n ccna am win i iga Zedek Mulud deg Buǧima ass n 16 yunyu iɛeddan. Ugar n 4500 n lɣaci i d-yusan seg waṭas n temnaḍin, n Tizi Wezzu ladɣa, akken ad mlilen s teqreb bab n « Taqbaylit-nni ». Deffir tmeɣriwin n Canada d Filadilfi iɣef i d-yenna unaẓur « ɛeddant akken ilaq », tusa-d nnuba i wat tmurt akken ad ilin akked win i ten-yezzuzunen s wawal n tnaslit d tjaddit. « Am yal tikkelt, zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ iɛedda usihar n Buǧima am tergit yelhan. Igerrez s waṭas ». I aɣ-d-yenna Zedek Mulud mi yesteɛfa cwiṭ seg tmeɣra i yekkan azal n 3 n yisragen. Ma yella ɣef ttiɛadat n ccna i yellan deg wahil n tuzzya tamaḍlant « D Abrid kan », niqal tturaǧun ad mmaggen di Bgayet d Zzayer, nesteqsa Zedek Mulud yerra-aɣ-d s usḥissef : « Ar tura, ur nufi ara amek ad nheggi igalaten-nniḍen di Bgayet. Acemma ur yelli d unsib. Ad nemlil ahat di tfaska n ccna amaziɣ ». Deffir tirza-a n kra n wussan kan ɣer yidurar, yuɣal Zedek Mulud ddurt iɛeddan ɣer Fransa ilmend n yigalaten-nniḍen i t-yettraǧun dinna.

  M. K. 

  
 Amazday imani n ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ di tseddawit n tubiret xeddmen ass larebɛa iɛeddan yiwen leqdic d amerkanti s wazal-is anda rran tajmilt i yiwen umeɣras ilmeẓi , ameɣas n tmaziɣt akked tugdut iwumi qqaren kamel amẓal inɣan watmaten imselmen di 2 wumber deg useggas 1982 di tseddawit n ben ɛknun , leqdic-agi id-heggan inelmaden n umazday-a yella s yisaragen akk d uskasi ɣef yilemẓi-agi s lmendan inebgawen id-ɛerden ɣer timlilit-a ama d imddukal-is neɣ d ineɣmasen yellan di tallit nni ladɣa yiwen n umddakul-is imi yessen kamel amẓal acku akken i yeɣran waggi Amar Nait Messaoud d yiwen uneɣmas ,yewwi-d awal fell-as s telqayt amek yemmut akked wanwa it-yenɣan , tajmilt-a tebda s dqiqa n tsusmi s ɣur yinelmaden akk d wid yellan dina s-yin akkin tebda s usarrag id-yewwi amar nait messaoud ɣef sebba n lmut-is yenna-d belli kamel amẓal nɣant watmaten imselmen imi kamel d yiwen ilemẓi d yiwen umeɣnas yettenaɣen ɣef tmaziɣt ɣef tlelli akked tugdud iwakken ad tilli tugdut di tmurt , imi kamel yexddem anejmuɛ netta d yinelmeden ad asen-yisiweḍ tikti neɣ izen i yemddukal-is belli yebɣa ad d-yesnulfu amazday yetabaɛen ɣer tnezduɣt n tseddawit ara d-yawwin izerfan yinelmaden s tugdut ,imi di lweqt nni n unejmuɛ i yexddem sllan inelmaden iselmaẓriyen (islamistes) s wayen yebɣa ad yexddem ur bɣin ara seg imiren yal tikelt s gallan fell-as ami d yiwet n tikelt yufa tabrat ddaw tewwurt n texxamt-is ceyɛen-tt iselmaẓriyen anda gullen deg-s s lmut , ami d ass n unejmuɛ ara yexddem di tseddawit yeẓṛa ɣer lmut ara teddu acku s gallan fell-as yal tikelt akken iruḥ ur yeggid ara , akken kan yewweḍ ɣer tseddawit ẓeḍmen akk fell-as iselmaẓriyen s isekinen imi llan ula d wid ur yeqqaren ara dina meḥsub d iberaniyen nɣant dayen yeǧǧan ad yili umennuɣ d ameqqran gar yinelmaden imeɣnasen n tmaziɣt d tugdut akked yinelmaden iselmaẓriyen ( iɛdawen n tudert) , ayaggi akk yewwit-d amar messaoud ɣef umeɣnas iruḥen d asfel gar yifasen iɛdawen n tudert , Si tama nniden nezmer ad d-nini d tikelt tamezwarut ara yili leqdic yecban waggi di tubiret ,am wakken ssaramen yinelmaden akken yal aseggas 2 wumber d asmekti i uzamul kamel amẓal yemmuten ɣef tidet ɣef tugdut ɣef tamaziɣt .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas Abdelhak 

  
 Armi d timlilit taneggarut, tis 15, i terbeḥ tarbaɛt n JSK deg unnar-is, annar n umenzu n unbir n Tizi Uzzu.

 Deg tizi uzzu, temɛadal JSK 6 n tikkal u texser yiwet n temlilit. Ulac s wacu ur wwiten ara i wakken ad tbeddel fell-asen, ulac amek ur yexdim uselway-is Hannachi i wakken ad terbeḥ meqqar meqqar yiwet n temlilit deg unnar-agi : yestaxer asleɣmay Mouassa d kra n yimyuraren, yewwi-d raqi seg Skikda, meɛna mebla lfayda. Teqqim tarbaɛt n JSK gar tneggura n tneggura. Aṭas i d-yewwin awal ɣef yimyuraren ur nleɛɛeb ara deg wulawen-nsen ‘’Imyuraren-agi, bɣan kan tadrimt, ur cliggen ara deg JSK, ama texser, ama terbeḥ. Rnan ttnaɣen gar-asen’’. I d-yenna Ramdane, yiwen n yimferreǧ n tarbaɛt-agi. Ma d wayeḍ iwala d akken ‘’Ur leɛben ara ɣef nnif yimyuraren n JSK, ulac deg-sen Leqbayel. Anda-kem a JSK n zik !’’. i yessḥassef Djamel. Amur ameqqran deg yimferǧen akked yimyuraren-nni n zik n JSK, sseḍlamen yal tikkelt aselway-s u ṭṭalaban rwaḥ-s, acu kan Hannachi, ireṣṣa, u yal mi ara texser JSK, yettawi-d ssebba tajdidt : ma mačči d anefray d imḍebber amezwaru n ddabex uḍar Raouraoua, neɣ dayen-nniḍen. Lḥasun, seg tazwaru n telɣuɣa ar tura, d cwal deg uxxam n JSK. Wa, yesmendag times, wayeḍ yessensay-itt, ma d amur ameqqran ttfarriǧen deg-s, ur d-nnin hemma, am wakken yeɛǧeb-asen lḥal deg-i i tella JSK neɣ ten-teɛni ara temsalt.
