Cwi kan llan kra n yimferǧen i yesɛan nnif deg wulawen-nsen, u yekcem-iten lḥir ɣef JSK, kkren-d, ssawlen i yimferǧen i wakken ad ruḥen s waṭas ɣer unnar n umenzu n unbir, ad ilin ɣer tama n terbaɛt-nsen. Aya, yella-d ass-nni n ssebt mi turar tarbwt n JSK akked tarbaɛt n CRB deg unnar n umenzu n unbir n Tizi Uzzu. Tiɣri n yimferǧen akked tisin-nsen s waṭas ɣer unnar n JSK, yegla-d s yiswi-s imi terbeḥ tarbaɛt-nsen yiwen ɣer ulac sdat n tarbaɛt n CRB. Akka, yuɣal-d ciṭ n usirem ɣer wulawen n wid iḥemmlen JSK. Tarbaɛt-agi i yellan gar tneggura deg yigimmaḍ u tezmert ad tṣub ɣer uswir addayan. Acu kan, akken i d-yenna Ali Bencheikh, yiwen n umyurar n zik ‘’JSK, muḥal ad tṣubb’’. Ihi, akken i as-yenna Zedek, diɣen : ‘’Yid-m ass-a d-uzekka, nekni dayem akka, ma d urar i aɣ-d-yettawin. Ma trebḥeɣ nttekka, ma txesreḍ d JSK, acḥal i yecbeḥ yisem-im’’.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Hocine Moula 

<div> 
  
 Ikhelouiène, d yiwet gar 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i d-yezgan deg ugafa n tɣiwant-agi u deg ugafa n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tebԑed ɣef temdint-a azal n 15 km.

 Taddart-agi, mazal ar ass-a n wussan tedder aṭas n yiɣeblan d wuguren yecban: lgaz n temdint, tawenaḍt, imḍiqen n yilmeẓyen, Internet d uɣbel n waman… Imezdaɣ n taddart-agi, ctaqen ad wallin taqqudirt n waman tettuddum-d seg tberninin n uxxam-nsen, ula deg tallit n tegrest neɣ n cetwa. Uɣalen-asen waman am win yettrağğun agur n lԑid, melmi ara d-ilal. Imi ttɣaman 15 neɣ 20 n wussan i wakken ad d-uɣalen waman yiwen ubrid. D ayen yeğğan imezdaɣ n taddart-agi n Ikhelouiène, ad gren tiɣri i waṭas n yidisan teεna temsalt, gar-asen Axxam n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, takebanit n Lezzayer i Waman (ADE), d tkebanit n waman (L’hydraulique) n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Acu kan am win iceṭḥen i uderɣal, ulɣuyen ur ğğin ara, lmaεna ulac. Lukan mačči d cwiṭ-a n waman i d-ttawin medden deg leԑwanṣer d tliwa, tili aṭas ara yemten i fad, am iɣersiwen, imɣan d isekla. Nnan-d imezdaɣ n taddart-agi: «Mačči d awezɣi i d-awen-d ḍleben, neɣ d aman 24h/24h neɣ ahat 7j/7j, maca nebɣa kan ad nseԑu aman am nekkni am tudrin-niḍen, daya kan i nebɣa a wid teԑna temsalt-a. Sugent-d a medden, aman s 10 wussan ar 15wussan i d-ttesrriḥen (tikwal ttelḥaqen 20 n wussan; akken ad serrḥen yiwet n tikkelt). Nebɣa kan aman tlata n tikal, neɣ xarsum snat i ddurt». Ugur n waman deg tmurt n Lezzayer d lmuḥal ad yekfu neɣ ad yefru; acku mačči d aman ur d-neɣli ara s xilla neɣ ulac aman deg yiɣezrawen d yisaffen, maca d afraq i ferqen ur nelli ara deg umkan-is.». 

<p style="text-align: right;"> ADAOUN Abdelghani 

  
 Yiwen n ufellaḥ segmi ara d-ikker, segmi ara yali wass alamma d ɣelluy n yiṭij, netta yezga d takerza i medden s tyuga i d-ikra. Akken ur iqḍiɛ ara, ur issekkfi ara iman-is. Yiwen was, mi qrib ad ifak takerza, yufa yiwen n ugerruj, issekfel-it-id s lmaɛun. Amek ara ixdem akken yiwen ur iẓer? Yeddem-it-id, iffer-it deg yiwet n tesraft. Tameddit, inher-d izgaren ittxemmim ma ad as-yini i tmeṭṭut-is neɣ ala, yugad ur tjemmeɛ ara lbaḍna. Iwweḍ-d s axxam, issared, ičča imensi, iqqim rrif n lkanun netta d tmeṭṭut-is. Twala-t iggugem am yisɣi dɣa tenna-as : “D acu i ak-icuɣben ay argaz ! Tessusmeḍ ur d- tenniḍ awal?” Yerra-as-d: “Ih ! D tidet yella kra i yi-icuɣben, ɛewqeɣ ma ad-t-id-iniɣ neɣ ala. “Ini-d kan ay argaz d acu ara teffreḍ ɣef tmeṭṭut-ik. Ma d ayen ilhan ad t-necrek, ma d ayen n diri kifkif”, i as-tenna. “Uqbel ad am-d-iniɣ acu yellan, cubek-iyi s Ṛebbi akk ayen ara am-d-iniɣ ad iqqim kan d lbaḍna gar-aneɣ. Yerna ad kem-ɣnuɣ, ma iɣna-kem Ṛebbi!, i yeḍleb deg-s. tenna- tmeṭṭut: “Cubkeɣ-k, cubkeɣ Ṛebbi ar ayen ara d-tiniḍ ay argaz arda ad iqqim d lbaḍna gar-aneɣ”. Yekker urgaz yeḥka-as: “Ihi a tameṭṭut d ayen ma yebɣa Ṛebbi ad ikfu laẓ fell-aɣ, ass-a mi i kerrzeɣ di lmuḍa n leflani, ufiɣ agerruj deg-s ureɣ deg-s lfeṭṭa. Ffreɣ-t deg yiwet n tesraft, azekka uqbel ad yali was, ad nruḥ akken ad t-id-nawi di lbaḍna, akken yiwen ur aɣ-iẓer, akken ur ittaweḍ ara lexber sselṭan, akken ur aɣ-t-ittekkes ara”. Azekka-nni tafrara, kkren wwin tacekkart, rnan amrar ruḥen anda ikerrez urgaz. Abrid teḍwa-t-id tziri n waggur. Mi wwḍen ɣer umekkan mazal urɛad yuli wass, mazal aggur iḍwi-d tiɣaltin d yizuɣar. Wwḍen ɣer din ɣer tesraft-nni deg iffer urgaz agerruj-nni, yenna-as urgaz: “ihi nekk ad ṣubbeɣ ad t-id-ddmeɣ ad t-id-cuddeɣ deg umrar, kemm, mi am-nniɣ jbed-it-in, jbed amrar sali-t-id. Tameṭṭut ikcem-itt cciṭan llah ineɛl-it tenna-as : “Ala ay argaz d nekk ara iṣubben ma tṣubbeḍ kečč ugadeɣ ad t-tawiḍ weḥd-k” Yerra-as-d urgaz: “Xzu cciṭan a tameṭṭut, lukan d i nwiɣ ad t-awiɣ weḥd-I, yili ur am-d-qqareɣ ara ! Ma yebɣa Ṛebbi ad kem-iɣnu, ad kem-ɣnuɣ. Wiyyam a tameṭṭut ! “Nniɣ-ak-in d nekk ara iṣubben ! Win i ken-yumnen ɣas nɣet-t”, “Akken i am-ihwa ihi”, i as-yerra uegaz-nni…

 <em>Yettkemmil… </em>

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Tameṭṭut tamcumt tenna-as i yelli-s: – Mi tewwḍemt ad testaεfumt, ddmemt ad teççemt, ḥader anida i as-tettakeḍ aman ad tsew alamma tekkes-am-d tiṭ-is, ilaq d kem ara yaγ ccix!. Tiqcicin ṭfent abrid γer taddart n ccix, leḥḥunt, leḥḥunt, leḥḥunt ar almi εyant, ḥebsent ad staεfunt, ddment ad ççent, yiwet teddem-d ad teçç ayen i as-tefka yemma-s di mkul lxir, ma d tayeḍ teçça cwiṭ deg uγrum-nni amerγan. Tuγal tenna-as: – A weltma, efk-iyi ad sweγ cwiṭ n waman. Tenna-as: – Ur am-ttakeγ ara alamma tekkseḍ-iyi-d tiṭ-im. Tenna-as: – Ah! A weltma ad iyi-tefkeḍ d taderγalt γer tmurt n medden?!. Tuγal teqqim cwiṭ tessuter-as daγen cwiṛ n waman. Tin terr-as-d am tikkelt-nni tamezwarut. Taqcict tameγbunt tcaḍ si fad ur tezmir ara ad tesbeṛ. Tekker tekkes-as-d tiṭ-is, tefka-as aman, ula akken ur tt-teǧǧi ara ad terwu. Kemmlent abrid-nsent, lḥant ddeqs, uγalent ḥebsent, ddment ad ççent, tagujilt-nni teçça daγen seg uγrum-nni amerγan ; tuγal tessuter-as i tikkelt niḍen ad as-tefk ad tsew, taqcict tugi. Tenna-as: – Ur am-ttakeγ ara alamma tekkseḍ-iyi-d tiî-nni inem tis snat. Taqcict tameγbunt tekkes-as-d daγen tiṭ-nni ines tis snat. Lḥant akken, tin ur tettwali ara abrid. Leḥḥunt ar almi wwvent γer yiwet n teẓgi, tekker Σica tessegrareb weltma-s, ma d nettat tkemmel abrid-is γer taddart. Tewweḍ deg yiḍ γer uxxam n ccix, tenna-asen: – A yat wexxam nekkini d weltma-s n umeksa. Dγa skecment γer uxxam. Ma yella d ultma-s nni tettegririb, tettegririb almi i d-teṭerḍeq deg uxxam n yiwen n ufeḥḥam. Akken i tt-id-yufa ufeḥḥam, yewhem, yenna-as: – A tamexluqt-agi d acu ara txeddmeḍ dagi weḥdem?!. Taqcict teḥka-as-d taswiεt amek i tella, tessuter deg-s ad tt-yawi s axxam. Argaz yugi ad tt-yawi, yenna-as: – Sεiγ snat n tlawin deg uxxam, lukan ad kem-awiγ yid-i, ad aγ d-wwtent s teqjemyaṛ. Taqcict tettḥellil deg-s ar almi i tt-yewwi. Akken yewweḍ γer wexxam, yekcem kan wtent-t-id tlawin-is, nnant-as: – Nekkunti di snat ur d aγ-tezmireḍ ara terniḍ tis tlata!?

  Tettkemmil seg tgemmi n teqbaylit 

  
 Am yal taddart neɣ tamenaḍt seg temnaḍin n Leqbayel, yal ta amek tesfugul ansayen-is (Taεacurt, Lmulud, Yennayen…). ussan-agi nerza ɣer tadddart n Ait Illoul deg tɣiwant n Azeffoun, i wakken ad nẓer amek xeddmen timecreḍt. Deg taddart-agi n Ait Illoul, yal aseggas txeddem lewziεa deg ass n Lmulud. Tebda ass-nni n lğemεa 09/12/2016 tameddit n wass, menbeεd taẓalit n Ṭhur. D tasqamut n taddart d yimezdaɣ-is i tt-id-suddsen, anida seččen akk taddart s uksum. Uɣen-d tlata n yizegaren, zlan-ten ass-nni n sem, ma d azekka-yin ṣṣbaḥ 10/11/2016 ferqen aksum-nni ɣef wazal n 210 n tesɣar. Ma d imeɣban neɣ wid ur nezmir ad xelṣen sehma-nsen, ttawin-tt baṭel. Yal tasɣart tesεu gar 6 ar 7 kg, s wazal n 4500 DA . Am wakken neẓra belli lewziεa tesεa azal d ameqqran deg tmetti taqbaylit, ama zik ama tura. D tagnit ideg ttemlilin medden, imi yezmer lḥal aseggas ur ttemyagaren ara, imi yal yiwen yelha kan deg ccɣel-is, am wakken qqaren zik:“ temmlal tasa d way turew”. D tagnit daɣen, ideg ttemεawanen yimdanen way gar-asen, imi yal yiwen ad yexdem ayen iwumi yezmer. D ass ur necbi wiyaḍ, imi taddart si rrif armi d rrif ad tečč akk yiwen n yimensi s uksum, am ugellil am unesbaɣur, yiwet n lmakla ara ččen. D tagnit anida tettnerni tegmat, anida daɣen ttiğhidden wassaɣen gar yimezdaɣ n yal taddart. Ad nesmekti kan belli, timecreḍt-agi yal aseggas xeddmen-tt deg ass n Lmulud, maca tikkelt-agi gan-tt uqbel s sin wussan.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Amazigh Ghani 

 
  
 Berrḥen-d ddurt iɛeddan yisebtar Asdawan d Iḥulfan s yismawen n wid i d-yufraren s yiḍrisen igerrzen deg teẓrigt tis kraḍ n umsizwer uzzig Dda Lwennas, d tajmilt i umdan-a agrawliw i yefkan tudert-is ɣef yidles-is. Akken walan yimheggiyen, mačči kan aṭas i yettɛuzzun amdan-a n lɛali armi I as-ttarran tijmilin s yal abrid, maca ula d amḍan n yimekkiyen i ireffden imru irennu seg teẓrigt ɣer tayeḍ. Ulamma arrazen mačči s yimelyan, wid akk yekkin gzan awal n tiɣri i iḍebɛen s « Ad aruɣ tutlayt-iw, ad rreɣ tajmilt i uzamul ». I lmend n waya, usan-d yismawen n yifriren am wakka: Amḍiq amezwaru d Ǧeɛfer Crifi, d amedyaz seg Uqbu. Xaled Ɛecwi, mmi-s n Sidi Ɛic, d aselmad n tmaziɣt deg Wehran. Akked Mhenna Halit, mmi-s n Tizi Uzzu, d aselmad diɣ n tmaziɣt. Ma yella d amḍiq n yiseɣ d leqder yuɣal-d i umedyaz Mbarek Gamar. Aḥulfu n wid i d-yufraren:

  Ǧeɛfer Crifi:  « Walaɣ igmaḍ lliɣ gar yimenza. Ur rǧiɣ ara annect-a acku ass-a aṭas n wid yettfeṣṣilen taqbaylit ama s tira neɣ s usiwel! Si tama-nniḍen, tidet kan, afran-agi ad aɣ-d-yernu tabɣest akked lebɣi i tira. Amsizwer i aɣ-icudden ɣer Lwennas Meɛtub d iseɣ ».

  Xaled Ɛecwi:  « D ayen yessefraḥen ama i wid i iḥemmlen ad arun neɣ i wid i iḥemmlen ad ɣren. Ma ur tt-neɣri ara nekni s Leqbayel neɣ s Yimaziɣen s umata aniwa ara d-yasen ad tt-iɣer neɣ ad tt-yaru. S leqdicat yecban wigi ama d imsizwar ama d tifaskiwin neɣ d ayen-nniḍen, wid yettarun s wul i tutlayt n tmaziɣt, ad sεun afud meqqren sya ɣer sdat ad kemmlen tira-nsen. Seg tama-w, ferḥeɣ nezzeh s umḍiq-agi wis sin, ɣur-i d iseɣ. D win ara yi-d-yefken tabɣest akken ad kemmleɣ tira ».

  Mhenna Halit:  « I lmend n umsizwer uzzig Dda Lwennas Maɛtub, di tazwara ad asen-iniɣ tanemmirt tameqqrant i wid i d-iheyyan leqdic-agi. Nessaram d leqdic ara idummen imi d asnerni n yidles-nneɣ. Tis snat, ferḥeɣ imi d-ufrareɣ deg umkan wis kraḍ, imi i tikkelt tamezwarut ara tekkiɣ deg temzizelt. Afud igerzen i leqdicat i d-iteddun ».

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 <em> La nluqqeḍ azemmuṛ. </em>

 <em> D abeṛkan yibwa. </em>

 <em> Akal ɛzizen. </em>

 <em> Tizemṛin n baba. </em>

 <em> La nluq-ḍ azemmuṛ. </em>

 <em> Di cetwa i usemmiḍ. </em>

 <em> La nṛuḥ-d ass-a </em>

 <em> D-iṭij neɣ lahwa. </em>

 <em> Kemini a weltma. </em>

 <em> Tamedyazt uzekka. </em>

 <em> La nluq-ḍ azemmuṛ. </em>

 <em> Ad yeddu yifeṛ. » </em>

 Akka i cnan-t tisukṛin n taṛbaɛt n « Djurdjura » deg yiwet geṛ tezlatin nsen-t, yeqqimen deg umezṛuy n cna Amaziɣ. Akka ihi, alqaḍ n-uzemmuṛ yebda ussan-a deg tama n Ṣumam. Imelqaḍen uɣalen-d ɣeṛ yiḥeṛqan nsen yeččuṛen d tizemṛin, akken ad ǧemɛen lɣella. Icellafen, imaxtafen, tigelzimin, tiqfacin, icwaṛiyen, iɣyal,…uɣalen-d akk ɣeṛ wannaṛ n welqaḍ. Imelqaḍen tezzin ɣef tzemṛin am izuṛaṛ ɣef yiduṛaṛ. Uṛ tṛuḥu-n ɣeṛ tzemmuṛt nniḍen alama kfan alqaḍ. Llan kṛa n yimdanen ttṛaǧun tallit-agi n-uzemmuṛ am wagguṛ n lɛid, acku ḥemlen ad luqḍen. Degs lfayda muqṛen i tezmaṛt n yimelqaḍen: d-« addal » akked zzit i d-ṛebḥen ɣeṛ taggaṛa. D-acu kan, yesɛa laɛtab…Ihi, ussan-a, ulac taddaṛt anda uṛ leqḍen aṛa medden. Azemmuṛ yewwa, awid tuṛa iɣallen aken ad leqḍen! Aseggas-agi, ɛla ḥsab akken i nwala deg waṭaṣ n yiḥeṛqan deg tama-agi n Ṣumam, tizemṛin uṛun-t dayen kan, alaṛmi « celxen-t » tciṭa! Ad yili zzit s lkutṛa. D-acu kan, yella yiwen waɣbel: xuṣṣen iɣallen i ulqaḍ n-uzemmuṛ. Agnu-agi yettuɣal-d myal aseggas, imi ulac aṭaṣ n yimelqaḍen. Medden ulamek, d-ixeddamen, neɣ qqaṛen deg yiɣṛbazen. Aṭaṣ n twaculin deg lǧiha-agi n Ṣumam ttṛaǧun-t imuṛas n tagṛest (γacances d’hiγer) akken ad luqḍen-t tizemṛin-nsen-t, imi aṛṛaw nsen-t ad ṛnu-n afud i welqaḍ. Deg tama nniḍen, lemɛinṣṛat ẓẓunẓan-t, ussan-agi, deg luḍa n Ṣumam. Aṭaṣ degsen-t bdan-t tuẓḍa n-uzemmuṛ. Annaṛen anda ttṛusun-t tiṛac n-uzemmuṛ bdan ttaččaṛen. Sya ɣeṛ kṛa n wussan, lemɛinṣṛat-agi, ad xedmen-t ass d yiḍ akken ad qeḍɛen-t (ahat xaṭi) ṭuẓḍa n-uzemmuṛ. Lawan-agi, daɣen, it faṛaṣen kṛa n yilmeẓyen akken ad ǧemɛen aṭaṣ n tedṛimt, imi deg lecḍuḍ n webṛid aɣelnaw wis 26, wigi znuzun azemmuṛ. S lmizan ilikṭṛuni, ilmeẓyen-agi weznen azemmuṛ i ttaɣen akken at zenzen. Ɣef ayagi, deg kṛa n wussan kan, ssuma n-uzemmuṛ azegzaw yebdan s 40 idinaṛen i lkilu, deg wagguṛ n-unbiṛ yezṛin, tewweḍ ɣeṛ 65 idinaṛen i lkilu tuṛa! Yeṛna, mazal ahat ssuma-agi atteṛnu nnig waya. « Tezmeṛ ssuma-agi at ɛeddi i 100 idinaṛen i lkilu » ɛla ḥsab tamuɣli n waṭaṣ n yimdanen ! « Ih, zik-nni, ulac win i d-yennan azemmuṛ a d-yas wass ad yetnuzu. Ass-a, dayen i ḍeṛṛu-n » akka i d-yenna yiwen wemɣaṛ i laḥqen tallit-nni n zik! Akka i d-« amuṛ » a ddin uqeṛdac !<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax 

  
 Ass n lǧemɛa yezrin, imezdaɣ n La Crête-Rouge deg tɣiwant n Leɛǧiba myefken ttiɛad s aɣerbaz amenzu n taddart-nsen iwakken ad xedmen yiwet n twizi n usizdeg d useggem n yiwet n terga i d-iɛeddan zdat lakul ideg qqaren warraw-nsen.

 D ilmeẓyen neɣ d imeqranen, d tirebbaɛ i d-ttasen yal wa s wacu i d-yegla d ttawil iwakken ad sbeɛden s kra yellan d amihan ɣef yinelmaden. Imi d yiwen n cɣel yuḥwaǧen aṭas n wallalen, imezdaɣ n Tqaɛet yeɛyan deg uraǧu gezmen-tt deg rray iwakken ad d-swejden ayen i iwulmen s tedrimt-nsen. Ɣef waya, yal amezdaɣ yewwi-d ayen iwumi yezmer, wa d rrmel, wa d ssima, wa d uzzal wayeḍ d iɣil-is. «Nefra-tt gar-aneɣ iwakken ad nekkes tifxet-a yettwandin i warraw-nneɣ. Yal ass nettraǧu aniwa ara yeɣlin deg uxemmuj yecban wa, mi akken imḍebbren terza temsalt qqnen allen-nsen zdat tudert n yinelmaden. Newweḍ ɣer tallit anda ala win yenṭerren ara yeḥrirten ! Wamma, limer d lebɣi llan srabes yettuxessen I cɣel-a ara xedmen acḥal aya. Meɛna, skud I mazal tagmat, agerruj I aɣ-d-ǧǧan imezwura-nneɣ ur inegger-a. Tacemlit d tin yessuzufen lḥif di tudrin, ihi ass-a nekni nerra-as azal, nemlal-d !” Dɣa d wigi I d imeslayen I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n ubabat yerfan zdat tsusmi n yimḍebbren ɣef lḥif ideg ttidiiren yinelmaden. Imezdaɣ n Tqaɛet heggan-d daɣ iwakken ad bnun zdat n uɣerbaz kra n tseddarit I yinelmaden iwakken deg wussan-a n tegrest ur ttɣimin ara I lehwa d usemmiḍ. D yiwen n usenfar s wazal-is iɣer kkren yimezdaɣ n taddart. Ayen I d-ijebden lwelha-nneɣ mi nerza ɣer twizi n yimezdaɣ n taddart-a, d anabit n yimḍebbren ama n tɣiwant neɣ n srabes nniḍen.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Smail. M 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Xas ulamma yuẓ deg leɛmer, imi ha-t-an nnig n 80 n yiseggasen deg tudert-is, meɛna, aya, ur yelli d ugur i wayen iḥemmel d wayen i swayes i d-yekker ucennay Hadjloum Mohammed Said n taddart n Trihant tama n Boudjima. Xas armi i meqqer i yebda yesseklas, acu kan temɣer ur as-tessenɣes deg lebɣi n ccna akked uqesser s ugabar. Deg taggara-a, qrib yal aseggas, ad d-yessufeɣ album ajdid. Mebɛed mi yessekles deg useggas 2016 album iwumi yefka azwel ‘’Lɣerba’’ anda llant 6 n tezlatin i d-yewwin ɣef waṭas n yisenrtal yecban Lexla, Tin ɛzizen, yegguma wul, Lɣerba, Ttruḥun, Aqcic anda yesseqdec kra n uẓawan yemmalen ciṭ ɣer ccaɛbi, aseggas-a 2017, yuɣal-d s album amaynut s uzwel ‘’Arraw n leqbayel iḥruren’’. Yessekles-d 5 tezlatin i yexdem netta ama seg tama n wawalen neɣ seg tama n uẓawan. Tizlatin i d-yettmeslayen ɣef yisental yemxalafen i d-yessers ucennay ɣer unnar i wakken ad d-yefk fell-asen tamuɣli-s nreɣ iwellihen-is imi netta yettuneḥsab gar tsuta timezwura n ccna aqbayli. Tizlit tamezwarut iwumu isemma ‘’Arraw n leqbayel’’, yerra deg-s tajmilt i yimeɣnasen n tmaziɣt s umata. Yettwessi, diɣ, tisuta i d-yettnekkar i wakken ad ḍeffren abrid n yimezwura-nsen. Tis snat, tewwi-d ɣef yir awal i yettilin gar yimdanen, neɣ tiyita n wa deg wa akked usemɣer n yiman ɣer kra n medden. Yal tazlit, tettili-d tezwert s umaslay, tettak-d tikti ɣef uḍris n tezlit s umata. Tizlit tis rebɛa, d tajmilt i yiwen gar sadat i yellan seg tama-agi n Wagennun, wagi Sidi Boubekeur. Yesmak-d amek yella d wamek i d-rezzun ɣur-s wid-nni ihelken, ṭṭalaben deg-s ḥellu. Am wakken i d-yesban azal-is deg tmetti taqbaylit imi d izgaren i as-ttawin wid i t-yettzuren, ɣef wakken i d-yeqqar. Ula d netta, Hadjloum Mohammed Said, yessuter deg-s i wakken ad -tyerr ɣer lǧennet. Deg taggara, yessegra-d ccna-as s yiwet n tezlit n tayri iwumi isemma ‘’Tenniḍ-iyi-d, nniɣ-ak’’. D tizlit anda i yecna ɣef tayri n yiwen n teqbaylit tuzyint i imenna ad tt-yesɛu. Xas ulamma iḍal deg leɛmer, acu kan mazal ul-is d aleqqaq. Yekfa album-is s yiwet n terbaɛt n yiḍebbalen degtmeɣra.

  Farida Elharani 

  
 Terza-d seg tmurt n Finlande, i wakken ad texdem tameɣra n ccna deg Tezmalt yetabaɛen ɣer lwilaya n Bgayet. D yiwet n tlemẓit, yesɛan ṣṣut ḥninen, ḥlawen akked zzin yufraren, tagi d tacennayt Stina n tmurt n Finlande i ḥemmlen waṭas leqbayel yellan deg lɣerba, tettwassen s tuɣac n yicennayen imeqqranen, yecban: Cherif Kheddam, Matoub Lounès, Slimane Azem, Idir d wiyaḍ-nniḍen. Ass-nni n larebɛa 30 deg waggur n ɣuct 2017, tusa-d ɣer lwilaya n Bgayet, texdem yiwet n tmeɣra n ccna meqqren deg tɣiwant n Tezmalt. Tella-d tmeɣra-agi seg 18h00 n tmeddit d asawen, deg unnar aɣiwan n waddal n tɣiwant n Tezmalt, terza-d s Tinnubgga n tiddukkla tadelsant “Timitar” i iqedcen deg unnar n yidles deg tɣiwant-a. Yella-d unekcum ɣer tmeɣra-agi meqqren s wazal n 200 DA kan, d ayen i yeǧǧan tiwaculin akk n tɣiwant n Tezmalt rzant-d s waṭas i wakken ad wallin u ad slen i tcennayt Stina, i ten-izuznen aṭas s ṣṣut-is rqiqen u icebḥen. Tecna-d aṭas n tezlatin n teqbaylit n waṭas n yifennanen yettwassnen deg unnar n ccna, ladɣa tid n Matoub Lounès akked Idir, tettawi-tent-id s rruḥ-nni n teqbaylit, alamma tcukeḍ belli d taqbaylit tanaṣlit, maca netta tcennu kan yis, ur d tettmeslay ara ala kra n wawalen kan. Ɣef wakken i d-tenna, belli tessen idles d tutlayt taqbaylit i tikkelt tamezwarut deg tmurt-is, mebɛed mi tesla i yiwen ugraw n ccna n teqbaylit i d-yettawin kra n tezlatin n ucennay Idir, dɣa syin imir tuɣal tcennu yis-s. S wakka ara teffeɣ tezlit taqbaylit ɣer tmura n umaḍal merra, i wakken ad tt-issinen wiyaḍ, ad d-nesmekti kan belli mačči d nettat i d tamezwarut i icennun s teqbaylit ulamma ur d tettessin ara, maca d netta ara d-yerzun ɣer tmurt n leqbayel i wakken ad tecnu deg-s, yerna d tiddukkla tadelsant kan i tt-id-inecden, tusa-d. Ahat daɣen ad ttwasuqlent tezlatin n teqbaylit ɣer tutlayin-nniḍen, ladɣa mi ara tent-cennun yifennanen iberraniyen.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Imezdaɣ n temnaḍt taddart i yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n ccefra ladayra mceddalah id-yezgan ɣef lebɛed 50 yikilumiṭren deg usammar lwilaya n tubiret ɣelqen ass larebɛa yezrin taɣiwant sabba liḥala ideg ttidiren di tmeddurt nsen akked lmizirya iten-yeṭṭafaren acḥal iseggasen-aya ttrajun melmi ara tifsist teɛkumt ɣef yizugar- nsen imi ttafend iman nsen ččuren d iɣublan , gar yiɣublan i četkayen lexsas n waman tisesit akked wallalen usiweḍ ladɣa wid uɣerbaz anda inelmaden ttruḥun ɣef uḍar azal 6 yikilumiṭren ama d aɣrbaz i qqaren rnu ɣer wannect-a iberdan yettawin ɣer temnaḍt akk reglen axatar xesren ur qɛiden ara ččuren d ixujḍan d wayen yeɛnan iṣenfaren unegmu iwilmen di tudert n yal ass ,tamnaḍt-a tettuneḥsab si temnaḍin ur yesɛin ara i yettwaɛezlen di lwilaya i yeḥwaǧen iṣenfaren uxeddim xersum ad tenqes lmeḥna iten-ixenqen , dayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ ad ɣelqen taɣiwant akken ad ten- zren yimḍbren ɣef lmiziriya ideg llan anda ssuturen seg yimḍebren s tikči n yisenfaren am wayen icudden ɣer tnezduɣin , axaṭar ma yella qqimen akka tudert nsen ad tkemmlen deg yir liḥala . 

<p style="text-align: right;">Menas Abdelhak

  
 Ttɛeddin yiseggasen, ttemgaraden, yal wa s wacu i d-yegla d aɛwin. Remḍan n useggas yezrin, ahat ma ad qerrin yimdanen, ad yeqqim d aktay deg wallaɣen imi azzayri yuɣ isufar n wučči s ssuma iwumi yezmer. Di tallit-nni, taɣlift n tjara tbedd akken iwulem deg unnar iwakken ad tɛass isemṣaren-nni I iwulfen ssalayen, srusuyen di ssuma akken I bɣan. Terra zzerb I tḥila d tukerḍa iwakken ssuzef lḥif yettmagar umdan yal mi ara d-yejdu waggur n Remḍan. Mačči kan d asexdem n yisuḍaf iɣer terra lwelha-s taɣlift-a n tjara, maca teldi leswaq deg waṭas n temdinin anda azzayri ad d-yaɣ ayen yebɣa, s ssuma yettwaqbalen yerna deg tezdeg. Aṭas, di lawan-nni I yuḥmaden meɛna mebla ma bedren-d wid d tid yellan deffir n uxeddim-a. Aseggas-a, yeqqel uqelmun s iḍarren, nuɣal am zik-nni, yegguma uḍar ad yeddu ɣer ssuq, imi yeqqel yesserhab ! Amek ur yettebbluhmut ara umdan imi yiwen n wass kan uqbel aggur-a n “rreḥma” ddellaɛ yellan s 40 n yidinaren yesrafeg ɣer 130 DA deg yiwen n yiḍ ? Mačči ḥala asafar-a I tḥuza tmerna, maca akken llan yisufar ttwaḥuzan. Lbaṭaṭa-nni yellan tettnuz deg yiberdan, di kra n yimuan ssawaḍen-tt-id alamma d tiwwura n yixxamen, tuɣal irkeb-itt lḥir ula d nettat tennerna deg wazal s tlata n yiḥricen. Tuget n yisufar zaden seg tlata ar rebɛa n yiḥricen mebla ma tella-d akka kra n lɛessa neɣ asendeh seg tama terza taluft n tiɣin d usenzi. Lḥasun teksa mebla ameksa ! Yal wa ad yexdem akken yebɣa, ulac win I yerkeb lḥir ɣef liḥala yettidir uxeddam, ur neẓri anida ara tt-iger I yixef-is. Ayen yessewhamen ugar, dakken ttaɣen madden mebla cceḥḥa, ad twahmeḍ tikwal anisi I asen-d-tekken yidrimen. Deg yilsawen, yezga wawal: “yella Rebbi ad d-yefk sɣur-s”. D asiksel ɣer yiḍellaɛen, amzun akken terkeb-iten tawla n tiɣin. Ddan almi I ttnaɣen ula ɣef lebsel d zrudiyya, yal wa yeqqar d nekk I d-yezwaren. Ɣas ulamma yella-d waya, ass amenzu n Remḍan, leswaq imerra ɛemren d lɣaci, ayen yeǧǧan imetjaren ceɛlen times deg swami yerna ur yesɛi umdan azref ad yefren as afar ara yawi: aɣ neɣ qim ! Amzu akken imdanen yeṭṭef-iten-id Rebbi ɣer yifassen n yimessenza-a, ad ɣmen igelman-nsen. Ur d-telli lɛassa ɣef swami, ur llin leswaq n tamiwin neɣ «les marchés de proximité», yal wa iteddu akken yebɣa. D acu kan, akken ias-yeqqar umedyaz-nni: “ɣas nettaɣ-itent, negguma ad necfu”. Akka, iles ɣezzif ɣer win yettilin ɣur-neɣ, gar-aneɣ, yetteḥbibir ɣef tudert-nneɣ. Wamma, win I aɣ-yeǧǧan deg yimi n tlafsa ur aɣ-yecqi ad nemmeslay fell-as, nefka-as lehna d talwit, ad yesserwet akken yebɣa.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail. M

 Werğin yexdim Ali AMRANE tameγra am tin n wass-nni n lexmis iεeddan deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mεemmeri di temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Si tama n lγaci, ugaren wid i d-yeggran di berra wid ikecmen γer daxel n tzeqqa n tmeγriwin n uxxam n yidles. Ula d netta s timmad-is ur yumin ara deg wayen yettwali. ‘’Ur urğiγ ara ad d-yas wanect-agi.Nessarem ad yili lγaci, meεna ur bniγ ara γef wanect-a’’ i d-yenna mi t-nesteqsa di taggara n tmeγra. Uqbel ad d-yekcem ad yecnu, yakan, tazeqqa tella tetthewwel : teẓẓif, aṣeffer d ccna. Wamag mi d-yekcem, tebbazeq s yisuγan d lkef. Ula d netta, ixleḍ-as lferḥ d lewhama ayen i t-yeğgan ad d-yini :’’amek i teslam akk, s Facebook neγ s wayen-nniḍen ?’’ Wehmen ula d iγallen n laman wid ur nelli d Leqbayel s ucennay am wa uγur i d-usan anect-a n yimdanen.  Yebda  tameγra s tezlit yecna akked Idir ‘’Sfina’’ anda i as-yeqqar :’’ aḥlil win ihenna wul-is, yusa-t-id nadam yeṭṭes.’’ Akken kan i d-yenṭeq, bdan ccna yid-s. seg yimir, dγa, i icennun yid-s armi d taggara : snen akk tizlatin-is. Amur ameqqran n wid i d-yusan d ilmeẓyen, d inelmaden n tesdawit xas ulamma llant akk tsutwin. Akken ma llan kkren ad ceḍḥen : yal wa s uleγwi ines ; yugar ujelleb cḍeḥ ; ‘’d tukksa n yiderwicen’’. Kra tekka tmeγra, ur terris teγma. Sya γer da ad bdun ad cennun, gar tezlit d tayeḍ, ‘’Imaziγen, Imaziγen, Imaziγen.’’ Selsen-as ula d senğeq n Yimaziγen i Ali Amrane mi akken yerra tajmilt i Matoub s tezlit ‘’A tulawin’’.

 Tekfa tmeγara meεna lγaci ur ffiγen ara ayen i t-yeğgân ad d-yuγal i tikkelt-nniḍen ad d-yernu tizlit ‘’A xali Sliman’’.

 Di taggara nesteqsa-t γef ujdid akked d icewwiqen yecna deg  usaru Faḍama n Sumer, yenna-d :’’ amaynut,aql-i deg-s la xeddmeγ. Ma γef yicewwiqen n usaru-nni, d nekk i ixedmen isefra d uẓawan.’’

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Ass n 04 deg yunyu 2017 yezrin i sɛaddan yinelmaden n uswir alemmas BEM deg TIZI UZZU. Yella-d ukayaḍ-a, deg tegnatin igerrzen ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan yinelmaden, isestanen n yal tanga sehlit. Wwin-d ɣef wayen akk i lemden aseggas ummid .Akayad –agi, yella-d deg yal tama n tmurt. Yella-d uɛassi-nsen sɣur iselmaden n uswir alemmas , yekfa ass n 06 deg mayyu 2017. Ad yebdu ass n 11 deg mayyu, ad yekfu ass n 15 mayyu . Ma d imukan anida ara seɣtin, ttwaheyyan deg tesnawiyin d yiɣerbazen imenza, am tesnawin Fadma N’Soumer d Stanbouli, deg-s ara seɣtin ikayaden-agi. Yettwaheyya-d akk wayen ara hwijen yiselmaden ara yesseɣtin, yerna isnawiyen-agi ur yezmir ara yiwen ad yekcem ma mačči dinna ara yeseghti.

  Z. B. Y. 

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: deg tazwara, efk-aɣ-d agzul n umecwar-ik deg ccna… 

 Farid Ferragui : Azal n 36 n yiseggasen-a segmi bdiɣ cennuɣ, imi tuɣac-iw akk timezwura cniɣ-tent deg useggas n 1981. Acu kan, nekk segmi bdiɣ cennuɣ ala tamedyazt i xeddmeɣ nekk s timmad-iw i xeddmeɣ deg tezlatin-iw. Aḍebsi-iw amezwaru, iffeɣ-d deg useggas 1981s uzwel «Ay ul yebɣan tullas». Seg useggas n 1981 almi d aseggas n 1994, yal aseggas suffuɣeɣ-d album, llan-d akka (1981 «Ay ul yebɣan tullas», 1982 «A yemma», 1983 «Taxatemt», 1984 «Lḥara», 1985 «Tagmat», 1986 «Tidet», 1987 «Mačči d leqraya», 1988 «Ay imḍebbren», 1989 «Akal d yiẓuran», 1990 «Udem n tlelli», 1991 «Mi ara d-tezi tefsut», 1992 «Akessar d akessar», 1993 «Ad necnu tayri», 1994 «Tamurt-iw»). Syin deg 1996 d «D kemmini i d-iyi-yuran», deg 1998 snat n tesfifin i d-suffɣeɣ d «Targit» akked «Iceqqaq udrar». Ruḥ akkenni alama d 2001 i d-rniɣ album wis 18 s uzwel «Terram-iyi ɣer tayri» Deg useggas n 2003, sazergeɣ aḍebsi-iw wis 19 s yisem «Lebḥer». Di 2004 ur xedimeɣ ara armi d 2007 i xedmeɣ CD wis 20 s uzwel «Asif n tudert». Syin daɣen qqimeɣ armi d 2012, rniɣ-d album-iw wis 21, s yisem «Nekk d yiman-iw». Qqimeɣ alarmi d 2016 i wakken i d-rniɣ CD aneggaru wis 22 s uzwel «Itri areggal».

  Anida yewweḍ uswir n tezlit taqbaylit tatrart? 

 Aswir n tezlit taqbaylit, kra qqaren-ak yuli, kra-nniḍen qqaren-ak iṣub. Ma d nekk ttwaliɣ belli ur iṣub ara, ur yuli ara, d alemmas kan. Yal ccna deg umaḍal tḥuza-t twaɣit-agi n wallalen itiknulujyen. Nekk s timad-iw ur ḥulfaɣ ara i lexsas-agi, imi mazal sɛiɣ imferǧen i yi-ḥemmlen aṭas aṭas. Ar tura, mazal ifennanen i ixeddmen timeɣriwin deg tzeɣwa yeččuren armi d ulamek. Ttwaliɣ si tama-nniḍen, yuli-d cwiṭ uswir-is, imi llan wid mazal ṭṭfen deg uqdim, llan daɣen wid i d-yeglan s umaynut. Ilaq diɣen ad ilin imeslayen ẓiden, zeddigen, icebḥen, iweznen, axaṭar tura, imdanen d ayagi i bɣan ad slen. Llan ar tura wid ixeddmen tizlit n umeslay, tizlit taqbaylit, ḥemmlen-tt yimawlan-is ma yella izeddig umeslay-is. Si zman aqdim, ɣur-nneɣ nekkni d imeslayen i yufraren ɣef uẓawan.

  Amek-it usizreg n tesfifin deg tmurt-nneɣ? 

 Asizreg n tesfifin deg tmurt-nneɣ, zik i yewɛer ɣef tura. Deg yimir-a, llan yicennayen i yesɛan ttawil, xeddmen asekles deg uxxam. Acu kan daɣen mačči awi-d kan ad d-tessufɣeḍ tasfift, imi tura yeshel maḍi, maca awi-d ad telḥu, ad tenz…atg, tura yerna d tamsalt n yidrimen kan, mačči am zik.

  D acu-ten wuguren i d-ttmagaren yinaẓuren s umata? 

 Imi nekk d acennay, zemreɣ ad d-meslayeɣ kan ɣef yicennayen i yi-icuban. I d-ttqabalen waṭas n wuguren d yiɛewiqen. Deg tazwara ur ten-fehmen ara medden, aɣbel n yidrimen d ttawilat iwulmen, lexsas n tmeɣriwin n ccna, ugur n usenzi n tesfifin-nsen.

  Acu i d-wwint tmeɣriwin n ccna i tezlit taqbaylit? 

 D timeɣriwin n ccna i d-isebganen ma yella acennay ḥemmlen-t medden s waṭas, neɣ cwiṭ kan . D imferǧen-nni i d inigan ɣef wanect-a. Ma llan s xilla, lemaɛna-s afennan-agi yeɛziz ɣur-sen. Timeɣriwin-agi, zemrent ad ad as-xedment tadlelt neɣ abaɣur i ufennan. Ulac acennay ara k-yinin belli nekk sɛiɣ imferǧen, ma yella ur ixeddem ara timeɣriwin n ccna. Ala afennan-nneɣ ameqqran Chikh El Hesnaoui, ur nxeddem ara timeɣriwin ɣef usayes, yerna ḥemmlen-t akk medden.

  Acimi d isefra-k kan i tettɣeniḍ? 

 Segmi bdiɣ asizreg deg useggas n 1981 ar ass-agi, leεmer ɣennaɣ asefru n yiwen deg tezlatin-iw, ula d lmusiqa diɣen, ala ayen kan i d-iteẓẓem wallaɣ-iw i cennuɣ. Acu kan mačči i wakken ad d-sbegneɣ iman-iw belli sneɣ neɣ zemreɣ. Aṭas n tikkal i d-ufiɣ isefra n waṭas n yimedyazen i yi-iɛejben aṭas, maca ur zmireɣ ara ad cnuɣ asefru n yiwen, akken ad d-iniɣ belli inu. Imi daɣen isefra d tazlagt n tikta, yal asefru d asemmad n tikti n gma-s. Isefra-w diɣen, mseḍfaren wa deffir wa, akken iten-ttidireɣ i ten-ttaruɣ i ten-cennuɣ. Γef wannect-agi, ur cennuɣ ara isefra n wiyaḍ deg tezlatin-iw.

  D acu i d iswi-inek deg yisaragen txeddmeḍ? 

 Ḥemmleɣ isaragen, imi ttakken-iyi-d tagnit i wakken ad meslayeɣ d yineɣmasen, d wid akk i yi-ḥemmlen nekk s timad-iw, d wid iḥemmlen tizlatin-iw. Ttfraseɣ diɣ deg-sen tagnit i wakken ad d-rreɣ ɣef yisteqsiyen iceɣben allaɣ n tɣamsa neɣ n yimferǧen-iw. Yal tikkelt ideg ara xedmeɣ tameɣra deg uxxam n yidles, xeddmeɣ asarag uqbel-is. Taggara n ddurt-agi, ass-nni n sem 10 akked sed 11 deg waggur-agi n meɣres, xedmeɣ snat n tmeɣriwin deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu. Maca uqbel-is, giɣ-d asarag ass-nni n lḥed 05 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n uxxam n yidles.

  D acu ara d-tiniḍ ɣef snat-nni tmeɣriwin i t-xedmeḍ deg taggara n ddurt-agi? 

 Ad asen-iniɣ i yimsuddsen n leqdic-agi tanemmirt-nsen tameqqrant, am wakken daɣen ara awen-iniɣ tanemmirt-nwen tameqqarnt i kunwi s yixeddamen n Uɣmis n La Dépêche de Kabylie, i d-yusan ɣer tmeɣra-agi tameqqrant. Ad asen-iniɣ diɣ tanemmirt i kra n win i d-iruḥen i wakken ad i yi-nezzah. 

  D acu i d ahil-ik i useggas-agi n 2017? 

 Ma d ayen yerzan ahil-iw i useggas-agi amaynut n 2017, yebda s snat n tmeɣriwin-nni iɣef i d-nmeslay yakan tidak n 10 akked 11 seg meɣres deg Tizi Uzzu. Akka tura banent-iyi-d snat n tmeɣriwin-nniḍen, yiwet ass n sed 01 deg waggur yebrir 2017 deg Le Théâtre des Sablâtes deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt. Tis snat ass n 15 deg waggur n yebrir i d-iteddun deg temdint n Montréal di tmurt n Canada. 

  Ma yettili-d umεiwen gar yicennayen n tmurt-nneɣ neɣ ala? 

 Ulac amεiwen gar-nneɣ s yinaẓuren, ladɣa icennayen. Imi ur sɛan ara s wacu ara mɛawanen gar-asen, imi daɣen ur ttemyagaren ara s waṭas. Ma d nekk ayen iwumi zemreɣ ttɛawaneɣ yis-s icennayen-nniḍen, yerna nekk ulac win i yi-ɛawnen. Nxuṣ cwiṭ deg ccɣel-agi. Acu kan mačči d tuccḍa-nneɣ, imi si zzman aqdim, nufa-d belli icennayen-nneɣ imezwura ur ttemεawanen ara gar-asen, ama dagi deg tmurt ama deg tmura tibaraniyin. 

  Ma tumneḍ belli yezmer ucennay aqbayli, ad yuɣal d acennay n umaḍal? 

 D tamsalt n ttawil, imi ulac idles neɣ taɣerma yufraren ɣef tayeḍ. Ma nwala belli ass-agi idles s umata d tezlit s wuzig n tmura n lɣerb n umaḍal, tennerna s waṭas, imi i asen-xedmen ttawilat imeqqranen i yinaẓuren-nsen. Zgan d radyuwat d tilibizyuwa-nsen, deg youtube…atg. Deg tmurt-nneɣ diɣen yeǧhed aṭas yidles aɛrab, iɣleb win n tmazɣa, imi d ddula i yebɣan annect-agi. Fkan aṭas n ttawilat ilaqen i yidles aɛrab, ǧǧan win n yimaziɣen ɣer ṭṭerf. Lukan ad as-tefkeḍ ttawilat i d-as-iwulmen i yidles d yicennayen imaziɣen, zemren ad xedmen leɛǧeb.

  Ma yella win ukkud tesqerdiceḍ isefra-k? 

 Yal tikkelt mi ara xedmeɣ asefru, ad t-seɣtiɣ weḥd-i ad as-alseɣ taɣuri aṭas n tikkal, maca ur d tettakkeɣ ara i wiyaḍ i wakken ad iyi-d-fken tamuɣli-nsen, ama d imedyazen neɣ d imdanen-nniḍen. Tikwal mi ur tḥeqqeɣ ara deg takti, seqsayeɣ win ufiɣ sdat-iw, akken ibɣu iga neɣ yella.

  Ma yella wayen tessewjadeḍ? 

 D tidet, sewjadeɣ yiwen n album amaynut, maca wellah ma ẓriɣ i melmi ara yewjed i wakken ad d-yeffeɣ.

  Awal-ik n taggara? 

 Tanemmirt-ik ɣef tdiwennit-agi i yi-texdmeḍ i nekk d leqdicat-iw idelsanen. Tanemmirt tameqqrant i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen imi i yi-iga azal, ad awen-iniɣ afud igerrzen i kunwi d uɣmis-nwen. Ad iniɣ tanemmirt s tussda i wid akk i yi-ḥemmlen, d widak yesmeḥsisen i tuɣac-iw. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Terra tesdawit n La Sorbonne tajmilt i unelmad-nnes adzayri yemmuten deg txazzabit n Paris PARIS– Yerra tesdawit n Paris-Sorbonne tajmilt meɣɣren, ass n ttlata tameddit, i unelmad-nnes adzayri, Kheireddine Sahbi, yemmuten deg txazzabiyin tirebrabin n Paris ass n 13 Nwembeṛ yezrin. Deg tejmilt-a, gan-d abaraz n uẓawan andalusi sdaxel tesdawit-nni, d win d-yellan s ṛṛay n Lynda-Nawel Tebbani, d tanelmadt n uduktuṛa deg tsekla d Redha Benabdallah, d aduktur deg tsenẓawant, yernu yella-d asmekti i unelmad-a yellan yettheyyi-d amastir deg tsenẓawant. Tajmilt-a tessewlawel ulawen n wid iḥedṛen deg-s deg tzeqqa n Richelieu, yernu gar wid iḥedṛen, tella twacult n umeṛḥum ɣer yidis n yimeddukal-nnes, imaslaḍen n tmahelt (safara) n Ldzayer deg Fṛansa, yiwen n uneṣṣaḥ n tselwit tafṛensit d waṭas n lɣaci aydeg llan ama d Idzayriyen neɣ d Ifṛensisen. Amkan-a aydeg d-tella tejmilt d «azamul n tmussni, n tezrawin d yimenɣi mgal lqella n tmussni d teẓrallest beṛṛa i yemgerraden n ddin d yedles», ɣef wakken ay d-nnan yemsuddsen. Uqbel ma yebda-d ubaraz-nni, gan wid iḥedṛen 3 n tedqiqin n tsusmi deg wakud aydeg ay d-sɛeddan tiwlafin n umeṛḥum Kheireddine d cwiṭ seg uẓawan ay d-iwet seg yiwet n nnuba n uẓawan andalusi ayɣef yella yetteg anadi deg tesdawit n Sorbonne, d nnuba ay yella iḥemmel-itt aṭas, ɣef wakken ay d-nnan wid ay as-yettilin. Deg yiwet n tinawt wezzilen, yenna-d uselway n tesdawit, Barthelemy Jobert, dakken tajmilt-a «tusa-d seg wul» s webrid n uẓawan andalusi yellan d tigemmi tucrikt n sin n yigemmaḍen n yilel Agrakal. «Amɣiwan n tesdawit n la Sorbonne tḥuza-t tmettant n yinelmaden-nnes» yernu ccfawat-nsen «ad d-teqqim deg wul-nneɣ», ɣef wakken ay d-yenna. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> APS 

  
 Ddurt-agi yezrin, tiddukla n yimaɛder d yemddukal-nsen n temnaḍt n Wizgan, s lemṣawna n tɣiwant n Wizgan akked 03 n tmahliwin yemgaraden n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, ger-asent timetti, tazmert d trebga, heggant-d ssin n wussan n tusna s usentel «Asekfel n yal aṭan n laɛqel d wamek ara d-yilli uḥareb fell-as» i yebdan ass n 24 almi d 25 furar yezrin, d leqdic i yeddan ɣef teɣzi n ssin n wussan. Ahil n leqdic yebḍa ɣef ssin yaḥricen, aḥric amenzu d timlilit meqren id-yesduri wexxam n yedles Ferrat Remḍan id-yezgan di temdint n Wizgan tasebḥit n wass n 24 furar almi d tamedit n wass, anda id-meslayen 05 yimusnawen n tmurt n Fransa i ittewxeṣen deg aḥric n yimaɛder ɣef isentalen yemgaraden, gar-asen Olivier ANTOINE, yiwen umusnaw id-yemeslayen ɣef assaɣ n iselmaden deg yiɣarbazen i ittewxeṣen i yimaɛdar. Syen Leturny CATHERINE, temeslay-d ɣef usnarni d unegmu n lahdur ɣer weqcic id-illulen almi d 04 n yiseggasen. Ma yella d Debieve CATHERINE, temeslay-d ɣef uwennaɛ n tegnatin n leqraya d usekfel n wṭanen n laɛqel deg yiɣarbazen. Si tama Niḍen, mass Teiry Martinez, anemhal n yiɣarbazen n tamiwin i ittewxeṣen i yimaɛder di tmurt n Fransa, u d aɛeggal n tiddukla tagreɣlan n yimaɛder, yessaḥreṣ ɣef usejhed n lemxalṭat d leqdic ger tiddukliwin n tmurt-nnaɣ d tmurt n Fransa, i usebɣes n waḥric n yimaɛder. Ma yella d aḥric wis ssin, d timlilit id-yellan ger 05 n yimusnawen-agi n tmurt n fransa akked ixeddamen n uɣarbaz n yimaɛder (CMP) n temnaḍt n Wizgan, i ubeddel n tikta, timuɣliwin d tmusniwin i usnarni n waḥric n yimaɛder. Iswi n tmesbanit-agi d asekfel n yal aṭanen n laɛqel i yettḥazen arac imecṭaḥ, d uḥareb fell-as.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ad ttekkin 14 n yinaddalen idzayriyen deg telɣuɣa n umaḍal n tatlitit n 2015 ara d-yilin deg Pikin deffir ma tesɛedda tfidiṛalit n IAAF Khaled Benmahdi d Abdelhamid Zerifi ɣef wakken ay d-tenna ass n lexmis Tfidiṛalit tadzayrit n Inaddalen Khaled Benmahdi (800 n lmitrat) d Abdelhamid Zerifi (3000 n lmitrat s temda) tesɛedda-ten Tfidiṛalit tagaɣlant n tatlitit imi ay d-zgan gar yimxeyyren deg umaḍal deg waddalen-nsen, ɣef wakken ay d-tebder teɣbalut- D acu kan, Zerifi ay yellan ussan-a deg Fṛansa yerna ur yesɛi ara lviza, yezmer ur yetteddu ara, ula ma Tafidiṛalit tadzayrit n tatlitit tɛuhed ad teg akk ayen umi tezmer akken ad t-teǧǧ ad d-yuɣal ɣer tmurt ɣef zik lḥal yerna ad d-iheyyi lekwaɣeḍ iwatan i lviza tacinwat, ladɣa imi addal-nnes (3000 n lmitrat s temda) ad d-tili temsizzelt-nnes tamezwarut ass amezwaru n telɣuɣa (22 Ɣuct). Seg yidis niḍen, tamagla tadzayrit ad teddu ɣer Pikin deg 4 n tegrawin. Tagrawt tamezwarut ssefran ad teddu ass n lexmis 13 Ɣuct yerna llan deg-s Abdelmalek Lahoulou, Saber Boukemouche d Miloud Rahmani (400 n lmitrat s yifergan), Hicham Bouchicha d Bilal Tabli (3000 n lmitrat s temda), Yacine Hathat (800 n lmitrat), Larbi Bouraada (adikaṭlun) d Amina Bettiche (3000 n lmitrat s Tagrawt tis snat ad teddu ass n 16 Ɣuct yerna ad ilin deg-s unaddal Salim Keddar d yimḍebbren n tmagla tadzayrit. Tagrawt tis kraḍt ad teqleɛ ass n 18 Ɣuct yerna ad teddu deg-s Souad Ait Salem (amaraṭun), Khaled Benmahdi (800 n lmitrat) d ulɣuɣ ulimpi n 2012, Taoufik Makhloufi (1500 n Ma d tagrawt tis kuẓet yerna d taneggarut, ad teddu ass n 20 Ɣuct yerna ad tili deg-s Barkahoum Drici (amaraṭun) d yiwen n Talɣuɣa n umaḍal tis 15 n tatlitit ad d-tili gar 22 d 30 Ɣuct 2015 deg Pikin.

<p style="text-align: right;"> APS 

  
 Durt iɛeddan i d-teḍra tfaska tis6 n uẓeṭta neɣ taferṣadit n Ath Hichem deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri deg Tizi Uzzu. Tafaska-agi, tella-d i tikkelt tis snat berra n taddart n Ath Hichem. Ayagi ur yessefreḥ ara imeskiniyen d tmeskiniyin i yellan deg tfaska-a imi ur yelli kra n lfayda i asen-d-yuɣalen seg tirza-agi ; ur senzen, ur steɛfan. Acu kan, tamsalt n usenzi d wa i d ugur ameqqran ɣef teɣzi n useggas n tnaẓurin-a. Ɣef waya, dɣa, d wayen-nniḍen i nestaqsa Massa LAKROUT Ghenima, nettat yellan d tanelmadt deg lḥirfa-a, syin tuɣal d taselmadt deg uxxam n lḥirfan n Boukhalfa.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : amek i d-tufiḍ iman-im d tanaẓurt ? 

  Massa LAKROUT :  lliɣ ḥerceɣ deg uɣerbaz, meɛna mi walaɣ yemma txeddem aẓeṭta u tettḥellay-d idrimen yis-s, ihi, nniɣ-as i wacuɣer ara ɣreɣ ? Ad refdeɣ kan lḥirfa-agi n yemma asmi ara tt-tessers. Syin, kecmeɣ ɣer uɣerbaz n lḥrfat n Ath Hichem, lemdeɣ lḥirfa-agi 3 n yiseggasen. Akka i bdiɣ aẓeṭta armi d aseggas n 2000, uɣaleɣ d taselmadt deg uxxam n lḥirfat n Boukhalfa deg Tizi Uzzu. ‘’Yessers uḥeddad afḍis, yerfed-it mmi-s.’’

  Mačči d yiwen wugur i d-tettmagaremt deg unnar ɣef wakka nettwali. Acu-ten iɛiyyiqen-a ? 

  Massa LAKROUT :  ugur ameqqran, d lbiɛ n wayen nxeddem : ur nettaf ara win ara t-yaɣen. Dagi, limmer d lebɣi, ddewla ad teg ttawil i wanect-a. Ad aɣ-tɛiwen deg lbiɛ.

 Ugur wis sin, d taḍuṭ. Ur d-nettaf ara taḍuṭ tazedgant dagi deg leqruba-agi. Nettawi-tt-id deg Ghardaia neɣ deg Tiaret. Daymi, tikwal, nxeddem kan akken nufa, swayen nufa u aya yessenqas deg wazal n uẓeṭta.

  Tafaska-agi, axir mi tella deg Ath Hichem neɣ axir deg Tizi Uzzu ? 

  Massa LAKROUT :  limmer d lebɣi, tafaska ad teqqim deg taddart-is. Dinna i tesɛa amezruy-is, dinna i d aɣbalu-ines. D tigemmi n Wat taddart. 

  Ɣef wakken i d-yenna uneɣlaf n yidles Mass Azeddine Mihoubi, tafaska-agi ad tuɣal taɣelnawt. Ad d-yili kra ara ibeddlen ? 

  Massa LAKROUT :  dayen igerrzen mi ara tuɣal d tafaska taɣelnawt. Aql-aɣ, dɣa, ad d-nettheggi tiddukla taɣelnawt n yinaẓuren. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqqsa-tt Hocine. M  

  
 Ddunit merra atten di cceda-s. Cwal yettenfufud di yal tama. Ulac tamurt ihanen. Ulac amdiq  imenɛen si tyita. Sseba-t gtent. Mcuddent. Qnent ta ɣer ta, xas akken deg udem tt-banent  mbadalent. Netta di tillawt trad icebblen ddunit xas yezdew ɣef tɛakazt n ddin( am ayen iḍerun di Afɣanistan, Lɛiraq, Lyamen, Libya)  neɣ n timadit (Lukranya) ixef-is yiwen : d tadmsa d usewsaɛ n tezmer sɣur tamurt n Marikan akked Rrus. Zrin isaggasen, seg asmi yegrareb uɣrab n Berlin, seg asmi tenqedwa tmurt n URSS (tadukli n tigduda tinamlayin tiṣubyatiyin). Amaḍal yiɣil yergel yiɣisi yellan gar usamer akked  umalu. Leǧnas nwan trad uffir ( trad aṣemaḍ) yellan gar Rrus akked Marikan, gar tasnakta tazduklit (idéologie communiste ) akked tasnakta tasihrant (idéologie capitaliste) ifuk  dayen-nni. Igududen di yal tamurt nwan ddunit tekcem akkud amaynut  ara d yawin talwit akked  rbeḥ ddew usekud ((vision) umu qqaren «amezday agraɣlan» (mondialisation). d tidet, imi kra n isaggasen  akken mqrabent tmuɣliwin akked tikta  gar tamurt n Marikan akked Rrus. Tanagarut –agi tefka affus ɣef waṭas n txazabiyin texdem tmurt n marikan d iwaziwen-is (timura n umalu)  am zedmat ɣef Lɛiraq, ɣef Lbusni Hezrigubin di lber n Europe. Nnig waya tamurt n Rrus tuɣal d aɛagal deg «ugraw m seɛa n tmuar akked yiwet» (groupe de 7 plus un) yesduklen  timura timerkantiyin deg umaḍal. Di ccew annar aserti agraɣlan  yuɣal i teddu s yiwen uqaru : tamurt n Marikan. Xas akken kecmen leǧnas di lqaleb-agi amaynut izewen ɣef tmuɣli tasihrant, cwal werǧin yekkis neɣ yenqis di ddunit. Ddew yiɣden n trad yellan gar tasnakta tazduklit akked tansnakta tasihrant, tenfufded times nniḍen yuɣen s-isufa n tasnakta tineslemt( idéologie islamiste). Ahat lhem-agi ameynut yuffa annar anda id irebba ifaden (akken ilaq ? Akken is yehwa ?) dagi di tmurt n Lẓẓayer deg isaggasen iberkanen n 90 id ixulfen ugar n 200 000 d lmuta. Yuɣ lḥal  tulemda n  yir cwal  tuffa aɣerbaz-is di trad yesegrarben tamurt n Afɣanistant men beɛd mi teffeɣ seg-s tamurt n Rrus teǧǧa-tt gar ifasen n isradasen n OTAN ddew leɛnaya n Marikan. Tiyita meqran n tasnakta tineslemt, tella-d ass n 11 septembre 2001 armi tettwet tamurt n Marikan deg ixef-is. D tadyant agi, ɣef acu senden imdebran n tmurt n Marikan akken ad ɛiwden aslaɣ i usamer alammas xas ulama  d tibuhelt n Seddam Hussein (ur neṣawed ara ad yeɛtaq tamurt-is) i yellan d allal amenzu akken Marikan a tesexrab tilisa di tmanaḍt –agi n ddunit. Seg assen cwal ur yensi. Tamurt n Rrus , yeḥnunfen di tdmasa-ines, tettwali menbaɛid ayen id iḍerun melba ma tḥarek i wakken a tqeraɛ ayen id yettnulfun. Di tillawt tella tesewjed iman-is akken ad tuɣal s ljehd ɣer annar aserti agraɣlan. Aya yella-d ddew leɛnaya n Poutine. Seg asmi id yullu unagaru-agi ɣer ukersi n leḥkem di tmurt n Rrus, tamurt-agi  tebda aɛiwed n lebni n tdamsa -ines. Tebda tesijhid ugar leslaḥ-is anaɛur. Taḥajurt ɣer tayeḍ, tuɣal treba-d ifaden. Tbedd ɣef iḍaren-is  armi teṭṭef timura n Europe di tgarjumt s ttawil n lgaz. Poutine yesufɣed timajatin-is; igzem-itt d ṛṛay : asefsax n tisertit tagraɣlant isenden ɣef yiwet n tmezmert( puissance), asefsax  tisudsa n umaḍal i teddun s yiwen uqaru.

 timesbaniyin id yellan di tmura umu qqaren timura tiɛrabin am Tunes, Libya, Maṣer (id yeglan s ɣellu n iduba imesbatliyen am  Ben Ali, kadafi akked Moubarek) d wamek skecment timura n umalu (Fransa, langliz) yuɣalen d tiqadacin n tmurt n Marikan iman-sent di tadyanin-agi, id yeṣawḍen Poutine ad yinni ala (yerna  s ljeh)  i usekcem n timura-agi  tucar-nsent di cwal ihuzen tamurt n Surya. Seg assen terki liḥala gar tamurt n Rrus akked Marikan. Trad uffir  yuɣaled s-agni i tikelt nniḍen. Ddunit m yiwet uqaru( monde unipolaire) tɛedda nnuba-s.

 Ass-a  timura n  umalu ukint ɣef yiwet  n tidet qariḥen: ifuk wurar-nsen-t awḥid ( ddew tacḍaḍt n Marikan) deg annar aserti agraɣlan. Tamurt n Rrus tezdi ɣer tmurt n Ṣṣin, tettnamar timura n ugraw aṭalanti( OTAN) di yal aḥric: win n tdamsa, win n tadrimt( imi lqesd n Rrus akked Ṣṣin d asegrireb n dollars akked Euro), di tisertit tagraɣlant imi ṭfen nuqma i yal aḥarek id yekkan sɣur Marikan neɣ l‘Europe deg umḍal. Tadyant n Ukraniya tesbened akken ilaq rekku yellan gar usamer akked umalu. Cwal ur yeqqim ara kan ddin, imi di tili yenulfa-d yiwen umusu umu qaren “daɛec” yesenquqlen amaḍal wakali. Amusu-agi isenden ɣef taskana tineslemt  akken ad yeserwet, ad inneɣ, ad yezlu, ad yexdem lmenkar di tlawin yesdukel  ixef n talsa si rrif ɣer rrif. Maca cax akken (s wawal) timura n umadal wtent s leqseḥ amusu-agi, amenuɣ-ines ur yexḍi ara I leḥsabat yellan gar ltimura tinezmarin( puissances)  di ddunit.  Am yal tikelt lehṣabat-agi  swexrent tifrat n  wugur n daɛac s lɛajlan imi deg annar asriti( a beɛda deg ugraw n leǧnas yeduklan) wa ijeb wayend ikaref. Ahat astehzi n tmurt n Turk, neɣ asneɛmel n timura tiɛrabin(yuggin a ttiki deg umenɣu magal amusi-agi) yesbanayed amek tcud liḥala n tsertit tagraɣlant. Yal wa yettraǧǧu ansi ara d iṣud waḍḍu: wissen  ma si ljiha n Rrus neɣ si ljiha n Marikan. Di tmerǧiwt yellan, timura iweɛan tthagint iman-sent i kra i-izemren ad yenulfu. Amedya ɣef aya yekka-d si tmurt n Rrus id yesnulfan( tagara-agi) leslaḥ amaynut am lbumba war taneɛurt( bombe non nucleaire) yesɛan ljeh n lbumbat  tinaɛurin. Amazan iban i wumi yettwacyeɛ: I timura n ugraw atlanti a beɛd t-id yellan deg l’Europe. Tamurt n l’Almane( werǧin teɣfil) yesutren di tmurt n Ṣṣin akken ad gerr iman-is i usemsawi gar lemxlṭat yallan gar-asen-t, ur d yelli ara s ugacur. Uḥdiq yeẓra, ungif yuṛga!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
  Ilmeẓyen n tɣiwant n at leqsar grren tiɣri i yimḍebren tɣiwant ɣef wayen yeɛnan tazeqqa n waddal yemgaraden iɣelqen azal n sin iseggasen-aya iwakken ad ɛaweden ad lddin tiwwura-is imi ttafend iman nsen gar yiberdan yettruḥu lweqt kan akka ulac akk d acu ara xeddmen acku iɣab akk ayen icudden ɣer waddal xersum ad sɛeddin lweqt nsen , ɣef waya yal tikelt ssuturen seg yimḍebren akken ad segmen tazeqqa-a ixerben s usizdeg -is yerna acḥal-ayagi nutni četkayen ameɛna yiwen ur d-yerri s tiɣri n yilmeẓyen dayen id yeglan ula s lxuf n yimawlan ɣef warraw nsen imi ttwalin akken ulac d acu ara xeddmen warrac-a di lweqt n usteɛfu imi gadden ad tebɛen yir iberdan acku ilemẓi ma ur yesɛi ara iqiḥ deg ussan usteɛfu neɣ di lweqt-nni n tmeddit mi ara d-yeffaɣ seg uɣerbaz ayen ara t-icuɣben ttruḥun deg iberdan n ddiri d wid id yettawin cwal d lexsara ɣef waya ssuturen seg yiɛeggalen n tɣiwant ad d-rren i tiɣri nsen s lɛejlan . 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Abdelhak Menas 

  
 Sendiḍelli n ssebt, 14 deg waggur-agi n tuber ideg nella, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, tella-d temlilit deg Uzday adelsan Rahmani Slimane n Aokas deg lwilaya n Bgayet. D timlilit ideg i d-temmeslay tmarut d tneggalt akked tmedyazt Massa Lynda Koudache i d-yewwin awal s telqay ɣef wungal-is aneggaru i wumi tga isem-agi “Tamacahut taneggarut” i d-yeffɣen deg useggas yezrin ɣer tezrigin Routnahcom, yerna yis-s i tewwi arraz amezwaru n Assia Djebar n tsekla tamaziɣt deg useggas n 2016. Temmeslay-d, diɣen, s umata ɣef wungal-is wis sin, ama deg wayen yeɛnan awdem agejdan n wungal-agi akked yiwudam-nniḍen yellan deg-s. tewwi-d daɣen awal ɣef tira n wungal s teqbaylit d tirmit-is nettat imi s timmad-is d taneggalt. Yella-d daɣen uskasi sɣur wid i iffuden tamussni d d yidles, imi nettat teɛreḍ amek ara d-terr akk i yisteqsiyen i d as-yettunefken ɣef teɣzi n ssaɛa. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli Lynda Koudache, d taneggalt n sin wungalen s tmaziɣt, amezwaru tsemma-as “Aɛecciw n tmes”, wis sin d aneggaru-agi “Tamacahut taneggarut”. D nettat i d tameṭṭut tamezwarut i yuran ungal s tmaziɣt deg tmurt n Lezzayer.

   G.A. 

  
 Taṣebḥit n wass-nni n ttlata 3 deg waggur n tuber 2017, ɣef 09h00 deg tzeqqa tameqqrant n yisaragen n tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu, yettunefk-as i unaẓur Lewnis Ayt Mengellat ugerdas n “Doctorat Honoris Causa”.

 Tebda tejmilt-agi i d as-yuɣalen ass-nni n ttlata yezrin, s tezlit-nni “Ur d-ǧǧiɣ” n ucennay-agi ameqqran Lewnis Ayt Mengellat, s yiwen ṣṣut ḥninen n yiwet n teqcict meẓẓiyen deg leɛmer, yeqqaren deg tesdawit-agi. Mi d-yekcem unaẓur-agi bu 50 n yiseggasen n ccna ɣer tzeqqa-agi, tebɛent-tt teɣratin ɣezzifen sɣur tlawin akk yellan din. Ikcem-d ɣer tzeqqa-agi akked waṭas n yiwudam, gar-asen: aselway n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, lwali n Tizi Uzzu, amaray amatu n Usqamu unnig n timuzɣa, aneɣlaf n yidles. Am wakken daɣen aṭas n yiwudam-nniḍen yecban: tanemhalt n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, aselway n tɣiwant n Tizi Uuzzu M, anemhal n Uxxam n umezgun, anemhal n Temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant…atg. Ɣef 09h30, yella-d umeslay s telqay sɣur aṭas yiwudam, d Mass Tessa Ahmed anemhal n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, i d-yebdan awal ɣef urgaz-agi ameqqran, syin akkin d amaray amatu n HCA Mass Si L’Hachmi Assad, yenna-d belli uṭṭun wis 15 n tesɣunt “Tamaziɣt tura” ad yili d uṭṭun uzzig i ucennay n teqbaylit Lewnis, ɣef umecwar-is d yimuhal yettwaxdamen fell-as sɣur yisdawanen. Menbeɛd mi gan uṭṭun wis 14 ɣef tesmiḍent n Lmulud At Mɛemmer. Syin ɣer-s d lwali n Tizi Uzzu Mass Mohamed Bouderbali i d-yefkan tanagit-is ɣef unaẓur-agi i yesɛan azgen n lqern deg umecwar n ccna. Am wakken daɣen i d-yewwi awal fell-as uneɣlaf n yidles Mass Azeddine Mihoubi, syin ɣer taggara maḍi d Mass Djelaoui Mohamed, s yisem-is d aselmad i d-tessufeɣ tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, yewwi-d awal ɣef tezrawin yettwaxdamen deg tsedawiyin n tmurt fell-as. Mi kfan ameslay ɣef ucennay mucaɛen deg tmurt neɣ berra n tmurt, yettunefk-as ugerdas n usebɣes “Docteur Honoris Causa” i lmend n wayen i d-yefka i tezlit i yidles, i tmagit, i teqbaylt d tmurt s umata. D agerdas i d as-yettunefken s yifassen n uneɣlaf n yidles akked unemhal n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, ɣef lewhi n 10h30h. Deffir-s kan ddeqs n warrazen-nniḍen i d as-yettunefken, gar-asen yiwet n snitra i yettunefken sɣur tilawin n Imzad deg lwilaya n Ilizi, yewwi-as-t-id umaray amatu n Usqamu n unnig n Timuzɣa. Yiwet n tfelwit n teklut, yexdem unaẓur Ali Debiane, d waṭas n warrazen-nniḍen. Ɣer taggara n tmeɣra-agi, yeɣra-as-d yiwen uqcic yiwen n usefru yura fell-as, wagi d Youcef Benoufella, syin d yiwet n tezlit i cebḥen aṭas sɣur tarbaɛt Ideflawen. Ɣer taggara maḍi yettunefk-as umeslay i netta, ideg yerra tajmilt i wid i d-yellan deffir n leqdic-agi meqqren. D tameɣra i ḥedren waṭas n yimdanen, ama d inaẓuren gar-asen ameddakkel-is Kamel Hemadi, Rabeh Ouferhat..atg. Iselmaden d yisdwanen n tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmri, iɛeggalen n Usqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya (APW), wid n usqamu aɣerfan n waɣlan (APN), d yimdanen-nniḍen. D ayen i yeǧǧan tazeqqa n yisaragen n tesdawit-agi teččur armi d ulamek, ur tettafeḍ ara anida ara tbeddeḍ. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, agerdas-agi, yennulfa-d i tikkelt tamezwarut deg useggas n 1918, yettunefk-as i umaru d umnadi Mulud At Mɛemmer sɣur tasdawit n “La Sorbonne”. D tikkelt tamezwarut ara yettunefk i unaẓur aqbayli sɣur yiwet n tesdawit seg tesdawiyin n tmurt.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Sɛnan Leqbayel isufar ttdawin yis-sen seg tallit taqburt ar tura. Gar yisufar-agi, ad naf zzit ur kkin waman. Llan wid i as-yeqqaren zzit n tfarract neɣ zzit yeqqaṭren. Zzit –agi, seg zzman aqbur ttdawin yis-s aṭṭan n taɣect neɣ tiwarmin, telha i tɛebbuḍt. Maca, ad naf tasuta n tura ur tt-ssinen ara, mi helken ad azlen ad d-aɣen les antibiotiques. zzit –agi teksen-tt-id mi ara yili uzemmur d aleqqim, uqbel ad iɛeddi ɣer temɛessert, ur tesɛi ara aman. Zik, d tagi kan i sexdamen Leqbayel i udawi, abeɛda i warrac imecṭaḥ. Win ileqḍen azemmur, ad t-yawi ɣer lemɛinṣra, itekkes-d litra neɣ snat i dwa. Ma yella d tura, qlil anwi i tt-id-itekksen imi tettawi aṭas uzemmur dɣa smenyifen ad tili d zzit n dhan, yerna tura ɣlayet zzit ur kkin waman tewweḍ ɣer 150 idinaren i litra. Mazal kra n temnaḍin am tɣiwant n Uqbil i tt-isewun d dwa. Mazal tettnuzu deg lemɛinsra , acku taɣiwant–agi ur ttun ara ayen i d-ğğan lejdud-nsen, ama d leɛwayed neɣ d isufar–agi n udawi am zzit ur kkin waman.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Z.A.Y 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Zik-nni asi terwa tmurt yerna ulac takerḍa, yal yiwen s tqeṭṭiḍt-is. Yečča lmal yefreḥ bab-is. Tusa-d tallit deg-i telluẓ teswiɛt, uɣalen kksen-aɣ aksum. Cwiṭ-nni i d-ttawin xedment i teccuyt i wakken kan ad yiziḍ useqqi. Mi yewwa ad tebḍun gar-asen agad isewwayen. Ma d nekni s imuḍan n sett aseqqi d waɣrum. Yiwen wass, ɣefflen agad isewwayen akken, seddan taqeṭṭiḍt-nni imi ɛemren i yimuḍan. Imuḍan-nni faqen-as gubren-tt akken ma llan, yal yiwen yebɣa ad t-id-siḥ. Wa yettawi amḍiq n wayeḍ, wa yettbeddil taḍebsit n wayeḍ, ttnadin ɣef tqeṭṭiḍt. Taqeṭṭiḍt tamcumt tesker harwel. Wa yekkat wa, ma d taqeṭṭiḍt yiwen kan id tt-yeččan. Rfan imuḍan mačči d kra, nnejmaɛen din-din. Mmɛezbaren, tagara msefhamen ad ceggɛen yiwen dg-sen ɣer unemhal ad yehder yid-s s yisem n yimuḍan. Taren-d yiwen, cuffen-as aqendur… -Kečč tesdukkleḍ tamusni d lefhama. Ad tt-ruḥeḍ ad tt-ssutreḍ izerfan-nneɣ. Ad nili deffir-k, aql-aɣ yid-k am yiwen ur ttagad ak-neɛɛiwen. Iruḥ umuḍin-nni bu nniya ɣer unemhal, ur as-d-yessemḥes ara. Winna yerẓa aqerru-is. Dɣa anemhal-nni yessawel i yemsulta, cuddent s snesla, wwint ɣer lḥebs.

 – Tagi warǧin teḍri deg umezruy, ala imuḍan i d-yeqqimen ad rẓen iqerray n yemḍebbren akked yemsulta. Imuḍan-nni imi sslan s wayen yeḍran, rfan aṭas, uɣalen ad nnejmaɛen. Bdan ttemsawaben, yal yiwen yefka-d rray-is, ɣer taggara unejmuɛ, fernen-d yiwen n umuḍin nniḍen akken ad iruḥ ad iẓer anemhal. Nnan-as :

 – Kečč tesɛiḍ nnif akked tirugza, ala kečč i yizemren ad tt-ḥebseḍ cedda-aya.

 Iruḥ umuḍin-nni ɣer unemhal, yebda yettmeslay-as yessṭebṭub ɣef ṭṭabla :

 – Nekkini neɛya di lbaṭel, aɣ-d-ffkem izerfan-nneɣ neɣ ma ulac ad nesker tagrawla.

 Xezren yemḍebren, meyzen, walan mačči d yiwen ad tegren ɣer lḥebs.

 – Kečč teḥliḍ mačči d amuḍin. Di zzin tifeḍ aferteṭṭu, di sswab tɣelbeḍ bugaṭu. ad k-nefk axxam, ak-neɛɛiwen, ak-nezweǧ akked tinna ay tebɣiḍ.

 Fkan-as aksum, ccrab, lfakya… Yečča alarmi yeqber. Yuɣal yettu akk ɣef wacu i d-yusa.

 Imuḍan mi sslan ayen yeḍran, zaden wurfan ɣur-sen. Nejmaɛen, wa yenna-as ad nexdem «la grève», wa yenna-as ad nexdem timesbaniyin, wayeḍ yanna-as ad nexdem «un suicid collectif» 

 Dɣa yekker-d yiwen ɣur-s yenna-as :

 – Kečč thebleḍ, teččiḍ lekwaɣeḍ-ik.

 Di taggara mmsefhamen ad xedmen tamesbanit.

 Uran ibeḥnaq s trumit. Bdan tikli di sbiṭar alarmi d «la wilaya», ttsuɛun : «Nebɣa aksum ! Neɛya di lmaqarun !»

 Lwali mi yeẓra imḍebren n syndicat n yimuḍan, yenna-asen :

 – Tikli-agi-nwen teffeɣ abrid n lqanun. Acimi ur turim ara ibeḥnaq-agi s tutlayt taɣelnawt ?

<p style="text-align: right;"> Boussad Hemmar 

  
 Ssuq n tunzut n Bab Ezzouar, yellan deg tlemmast n temdint n Lezzayer tamaneɣt, yessudes-d ass-nni n lǧemɛa 07 akked wass-nni n 08 yerbrir 2017, yiwet n rreḥba n udlis ɣef teɣzi n yumayen-agi, s usentel “Tafsut n udlis”. Ayen i d-yufraren deg wahil d isenza s ubuddu sɣur 10 n yimura n tmurt-nneɣ wigi d: Ahcene Mariche, Idir Bellali, Mohand Nait Abdellah, Rabah Ben Amghar, Ouarda Akif, Nadir Benseguenni, Fouzia Lardi, Tarik Djerroud, Zoubida Tazerout, Ahcene Begriche. Am wakken diɣen i d-tella tɣuri n yisefra sɣur 5 n yimedyazen gar yimura-agi i d-nebder yakan, wigi d: Ahcene Mariche, Idir Bellali, Mohand Nait Abdellah, Rabah Ben Amghar, Zoubida Tazerout, yella-d diɣ yiwen usarag d uskasi sɣur umaru d umedyaz Idir Bellali.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ghani Amazigh  

 
  
 Win ara ikecmen ɣer waddad azayez n tɣiwant n Uqbu ad yewhem di lɣaci yettraǧun.Yal ass tazeqqa n useffeɣ n lekwaɣeḍ n Uqbu tenfel n lɣaci i d-yettassen si yal tama akken ad xedmen ayen tteḥwiǧin. Xas akken nnig n 400 n tkerḍiwin n nnuba i yettserbayen deg wass, maca ɣef 10 tteffɣent akk. « I wakken ad d-yexdem yiwen iccer lkaɣeḍ, ilaq ad d-ibekker, ad d-yawi ajiṭun. , i wakken ad d-yexdem lkaɣeḍ yeḥwaj. Acu kan aḥric ameqqran n lekwaɣeḍ yettwaxdam, ttilin-d s tufra mebla ajiṭun » i d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ i nesteqsa. Zyada ɣef wanect-a, yella daɣen lixsas n tulya n lbiruwat di tudrin timeqranin i d-yezzin i temdint n Uqbu, akka am Urafu, Laɛzib akked taddart n Riki. I wakken ad d-nesmekti amḍan n yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant iεedda 60 000 n yimdanen.

  B. Ben 

  
 Tezd-ɣ ulawen, ɣas ulama temmut. Tagi d Nna Cherifa, tacennayt yettwassenen aṭaṣ deg tmurt nneɣ. Akka ihi, Nna Cherifa ɣur-s sin iseggasen aya segmi iɣ teǧǧa. Tensa am teftilt ass n 13 Maɣres deg useggas n 2014, di lɛemris 88 iseggasen. Truḥ tin akken yettwassenen s waṭaṣ n tezlatin n-uraɣ am: « Bqa ɛla xir ay Aqbu », « Ay aẓerẓur », « Sniwa d yifenǧanen », « Anẓur lwali », « Lward ifires », lakked tiyaḍ i yeqqimen akka deg umezruy n cna aqbayli. Nna Cherifa, deg yissem-is n tidet Wardiya Bucemlal, tlul ass n 9 yennayer 1926 deg taddart n yilemayen i d-yezgan deg twilayt n Burǧ Bu Ɛririǧ. Zik i tebda lmaḥna d lḥif. Teff-ɣ-d seg taddart-is lɛemr-is imiren 16 iseggasen kan, imi iɛedda lbaṭel fell-as. Yuɣ lḥal nettat tebɣa ad d-tuɣal tacennayt, imi tesɛa taɣuct ifazen aṭaṣ yerna tḥemmel urar n lxalat. Deg tallit-nni, yella d lɛib at ɣenni tmeṭṭut. Akka, deg tmacint-nni itt-yewwin ɣer Leẓẓayer tamanaɣt i tessefra tizlitt « Bqa ɛla xir ay Aqbu », d tin ar att-yessalin ɣer « igenni » n cna aqbayli. Nna Cherifa tuɣal tettwassen, tcennu, txeddem urar n lxalat deg umaṭaf wis sin, bdu deg yiseggasen n 1940, seddaw n « laɛnaya » n-unaẓur « awaɣzniw »Ccix Nourddine akked tcennayin nniḍen am Lǧida, Wenissa, lla Yamina, Nuwara. Tessekles aṭaṣ n tezlatin, deg yiḍebsiyen lakked tesfifin. Ama d-icewwiqen, d-aḥiḥa neɣ ttizlatin yettmeslayen ɣef ayen yaɛnan iɣublan n dunnit, Nna Cherifa tesdukliten-t akkit. Aṭaṣ n lemḥayen i ɛeddan fell-as, imi, Nna Cherifa tenna-d yiwwet n tikelt: » Nekki, dayen i yeḍran yidi i cennuɣ! ». Tettsebir ul-is, « tesdubbuz » urfan-is s cna d yicewwiqen. Ayen ittiḥuzan at id d-cnu, ama d lferḥ neɣ d lqerḥ. Tacennayt-agi, iwumi semman tagellidt n yicewwiqen, teǧǧa-d i cna aqbayli nnig n 200 tezlatin. Deg yiseggasen n 1990, Nna Cherifa tuɣal-d s tezmart muqren ɣer cna, imi aṭaṣ n tmeɣriwin i texdem deg Fransa, Canada, Marikan,…Ssawalen-as-d akkit sya u sya, imi tizlatin-is ɛeǧben-t aṭaṣ n yimesfliden, yettwalin d-akken tizlatin n Nna Cherifa d-agerruj, d-udem unṣib n yidles aqbayli. Imi acewwiq, aḥiḥa lakked wurar s-userfeq, s-uslillu, s derbuka lakked yimenduyar fɣen-d srid seg yidles aqbur aqbayli. Nna Cherifa, am akken d tin i ɛussen ɣef laɛwayed akked cna n zik-nni, imi terra-y-asen-d rruḥ. Aṭaṣ n yicennayen i yecnan yid-s, uɣalen am akken « tnaɣen » fell-as anwa ar ad yecnun yid-s. Nna Cherifa, deg yiseggasen-is ineggura, ɣas akken muqqer-t deg laɛmer teqqim tcennu deg tmeɣriwin (galas, concerts, festials,…), ama dagi di Leẓẓayer, neɣ di Fransa. Taɣuct-is ur « terriẓ », ur tebeḥbeḥ. Ussan-is ineggura iɣaḍ-itt lḥal imi tettwattu, ur as ɛdilen ara ccan. Temmut akkeni tettwattu ass n 13 Maɣres 2014, d-acu teǧǧa-d deffir-s, mači kan nnig n 200 n tezlatin, maca amezruy s lekmal-is. Staɛfu deg telwit ya Nna Cherifa.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Tesmekti-d ddurt iɛeddan taddart n Ayt Tɛisiwt deg Ayt Smaɛel yiwen seg yizamulen n usegmi deg temnaḍt i d-irebban acḥal d tasuta, i aɣ-yeǧǧan 6 n yiseggasen tura ɣer deffir; wa d amerḥum Dda Lḥamid n Ayt Icemciwen. Anemhal aqbur n uɣerbaz amenzu n Tarwa n Xennic i yeṭṭef acḥal n yiseggasen deffir Muḥend Ṭaher Amir. S uḥḍar n waṭas n wudmamen, ama d imḍebbren n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, imeddukkal-is neɣ d wid yellan yakan deg unnar n usegmi, tɛedda deg tegnatin igerrzen tejmilt-a i d-thegga Tdukkla tamaynut « Asirem n Krun ». S waṭas n waktayen n lɛali d yiḥulfan yelhan i d-mmeslayen yimeḥḍar ɣef umdan-a i yuɣen amkan deg wul n umeqqran d umecṭuḥ. Imi Dda Lḥamid d win i d-yesseknen dima amek i yelha ad yili yiwen, ama deg teɣzi n yiseggasen ideg yeṭṭef aɣerbaz amezwaru Tarwa n Xennic, neɣ ula mi yewwi tastaɣt (lantrit). Deffir tnagiyin n yal yiwen ɣef urgaz-a n lɛali, tekfa temlilit s tuččit n kra n tiẓeḍt tafessast. Ma seg tama n yiɛeggalen n tdukkla-a, snemmiren kra n win i d-yusan, neɣ i d-yefkan afus, bac ad temmag tejmilt-a i win i yuklalen.

  M. K. 

  
 Mazal taqcict-nni tamecṭuḥt iruḥen acḥal-aya, ur d-tban ara. ɣef wakka i yezmer ad d-tili tikli deg ussan i d-iteddun, ɣef wakken i d-nnan yimawlan-is i yennejmaɛen akked yiqerra n tudrin n tama-nni n Ait Toudert. Seg tama n HCA (Aseqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa), ad d-yili ujdid deg ussan i d-iteddun. Mebɛed mi i d-rran tamendawt ɣer tmaziɣt, ha-t-an la ttxemmimen amek ara d-rren akk iḍrisen igejdanen n tegduda ɣer tutlayt tamezwarut n Tefriqt Ugafa. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 I lmen-d n wass agraɣlan n ugrud i d-yettuɣalen yal amenzu n yunyu, ihegga-d yiwen uɣerbaz n temdint n Tizi Uzzu yiwen n wahil i lmendad n warrac anda llant-d tizeɣwa n wuraren i icudden ɣer usexdem n wallaɣ, tizeɣwa n wunnɣ, akken daɣen i fkan amur i unecraḥ d taḍsa. Aɣerbaz-a, d yiwen uɣerbaz amezwaru deg Tizi Uzzu anda selmaden i yigerdan i wakken ad sɛun tabɣest deg yiman-nsen, akken ad qablen timetti, imi sewjaden-ten i tudert anda ttaɛraḍen ad ẓẓun deg ugrud tiktiwn ibennun akken ad nɣent tid yetthudun. Nesteqsa anemhal i yellan ɣef uqerru-s, yenna-d : “igerdan d nutni i d tafat n uzekka, ilaq ad ten-nɛawen, ad walin abrid, d nekni ara sen-ineǧǧren abrid, nutni ad t-ḍefren, ladɣa igerdan yesɛan iɣeblan. Nekni nessefham-asen d akken lewɛara n tɣawsa d ayen i as-yettaken azal d ayen i as-yettaken tiẓedt i wayen akken i nexdem imi nessaweḍ ɣer yiswi i nebɣa “, yerna-d deg wawal-is :” i wakken ad nessiweḍ ɣer yigemmaḍ yessefraḥen, ilaq ad nessexdem urar deg uselmed, akka agrud neɣ anelmad yetturar yettelmad s lebɣi-is, imi nettwali aṭas n yigerdan ur nḥemmel ara aɣerbaz. Smenyifen urar, ihi uqbel ad ten-nḥettem i wakken ad iruḥ ɣer uɣerbaz, ilaq ad d-nexleq deg-s tabɣest akken ad iḥemmel ayen akken ixeddem.

  S. Yamani 

  
<p style="text-align: center;"> Isufar 

 <span style="text-align: justify;">250gr n seksu, 50gr n wudi , sskeṛ ma tebɣam , 1 n tremmant, ½ n tɣenjawt tamectuḥt ( tijɣelt ) n lmelḥ, 2 n tɣenjawin timeqqranin n zzit n uzemmur, 1 n tɣenjawt tameqqrant n waman n ujeǧǧig n ččina.</span>

<p style="text-align: center;"> Aheggi  

 1- Smir seksu ɣer tbaqit , rucc-it s waman, rwi-t , eǧǧ-it ad ikkaw , sakin err-it ɣer tsekksut , ad ifur.

 2- Mi ifur, kkes-it-id , err-as lmelḥ , zzit, smir-as aman, eǧǧ-it ad yessuddem aman (alset-as 2 n tikkal )

 3- Err-it ad ifur tikkelt tis 3.

 Mi ifur dayen , dhen-it s wudi , rnu-as aman n ujeǧǧig n ččina akked yiɛaqqayen n ṛemman .

 Tzemreḍ ad as-ternuḍ sskeṛ akkken ad yiẓiid.

 S tezmert-nwen

<p style="text-align: right;"> Sɣur DAYA 

  
 Ɛemmi Lḥaǧ : anwa aggur deg-i nella ?

 Bab n tḥanut : aql-aɣ deg waggur n rreḥma

 Ɛemmi Lḥaǧ : acḥal i lleft-agi ?

 Bab n tḥanut : 100 idinaren

 Ɛemmi Lḥaǧ : 100 idinaren ! zik-nni, asaru n diri neqqar-as lleft, ihi ilaq ass-a asen-beddel isem. I lqares-nni acḥal yeswa ?

 Bab n tḥanut : 150 idinaren

 Ɛemmi Lḥaǧ :150 idinaren ! ad tafed ihi, yettmeslay lqares-agi-inek ? ffek-iyi-d di laɛnay-ak yiwet n tqarest ad tt-ṭṭfeɣ kan cwiṭ deg ufus-iw.

 Yessers-itt s lemḥadra s afus-is am twizet, yebda yesslufuy-as, dɣa yebda ihedder-as:

 -Acḥal aɛzizeḍ a taqarest maca yewweḍ-d lweqt ad nemfaraq. Suref-iyi, nekk surfeɣ-am. Axen taqarest-ik, tannemirt s tusda.

 Bab n tḥanut : ulac uɣilif a Ɛemmi Lḥaǧ.

 Iteddu Ɛemmi Lḥaǧ deg ubrid, yettxemmim weḥd-es : “Nniɣ-as anwa aggur ideg-i nella, yenna-yi-d deg waggur n rreḥma. Cukkteɣ yeɣleḍ. Ad steqsiɣ amdan nniḍen. Ih, ammer ɣriɣ ur t-ṭṭerru yid-i akka !ula d agguren ur ten-ssineɣ ara.”

 Dɣa yesteqsa yiwen n wemdan :

 -Mass !di laɛnay-ak ini-yi-d, anwa aggur ideg-i nella ?

 Amdan-nni : Awi-d 50 idinaren ad k-in iniɣ ! «il n’ y a rien pour rien, akka i ak-nnan Irumyen, yerna ula d nekk bɣiɣ ad aɣeɣ taqarest.

 Ɛemmi Lḥaǧ : axen 50 idinaren.

 Amdan-nni : aggur-agi qqaren-as akk medden aggur n rreḥma, ama d isertiyen, ama d ineɣmasen…

 Ɛemmi Lḥaǧ : saḥit a mmi, nekkni zik mačči akka. Wissen ma d zman i ibeddlen neɣ ahat d awalen i ibeddlen anamek. 

 Ha-t-aya yiwen n Lqari yewwi-d yid-s asegzawal. Yessteqsat Ɛemmi Lḥaǧ, yenna-as :

 -Di laɛnaya-k a Mass, kečč iban fell-ak teɣriḍ, d acu i d anamek n wawal «rreḥma».

 Lqari-nni : Rreḥma d isem n yiwet n tǧaret-iw.

 Ɛemmi Lḥaǧ : suref-iyi, bɣiɣ ak-iniɣ aggur n rreḥma.

 Yeddem-d lqari-nni asegzawal-nni gar ifassen-is, yesferfuc deg yisebtaren-is, alarmi d yemlal ɣef wayen yettnadi, yenna-as :

 -Ha-t-aya «aggur n rreḥma» d aggur n lxir, n tdukli, n tegmat, n leḥnana akked smaḥ…

 Ɛemmi Lḥaǧ : dayen a mmi fehmeɣ, tannemirt s tussda, ziɣ ur kcimeɣ ara ɛemrayen, d zman kan i ibeddlen mačči

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ḥemmar Bussaɛd 

  
 Yiwen n uneḥkam, iḥkem s ẓzur ɣef yimezdeɣ-is, ur iḥemmel ara wi t-ittnamaren wala wi ittruẓun awal-is. Mi meẓẓi, mi yella d anelmad di temdint n Qayrawan, anda ilemmed leqran, tajerrumt, tusnakt d ccraɛ n Sidi Xlil, isɛa yiwen n umeddakkel, iḥemmel-it am gma-s. Mtawan, ddukulen am yiḍuden n ufus, werǧin ifferkra fell-as. Illi-as ul-is, lbaḍna-s akkiẓra-tt. Yiwen wass, akken ad imsex, ad ixelleṣ imezdaɣ n yiwet n taddart, i t-iserfan mi t-numren di leḥkem, iceyyeɛ lɛeskeṛ-is, kecmen akal-nsen, ẓedmen fell-asen. Urɛad yenṣif wass, isla I yiwen ittnaji lqedṛa n Ṛebbi d ṣelṭan.Yenna-as uneḥkam : d acu i k-id-icqan akka mi tettnajiḍ Ṛebbi d lawliya ? Yenna-as urgaz :-nekk d leflani, mmi-s n leflani. D ameddakkel-nni-inek n Qayrawan, win akken ɣef tettnadiḍ acḥal-aya. Iḍfer abrid n din, issedreg iman-is, ilha-d kan d ttuba. Aneḥkam ifreḥ nezzeh mi t-id-imlal.Seg lfeṛḥi t-issefṛaḥ, lemmer I as-yenna ɛfu I yimezdaɣ n taddart-a, urwaleɣ ara amek ur as-ittaɣara awal, ɣef wudem-is ad yeɛfu I yimezdaɣ n tmurt-is. Ɣur-s isɛa azala meqqren. Iwala-t ittwaqelleq, udem-is iḥzen, yeččur d anezgum. Mi yeɛreḍ ad as-ikkes aqelleq akken ad t-yamen, d timerna I yerna. Ittban-d am yiwen inṭaṛren aṭas, am win icɣeb kra. Yenna-as uneḥkam : – D acui k-yuɣen ?Yella wi k-iḍelmen ? Argaz :-Rnu-iyi-d, tilawin akk n tiɣremt akk wwin-tent, ṛuḥent ur d-banent ara, ttuɣebbant. Gar-asent tella yelli. Aneḥkam :-S Ṛebbi ! Lemmer d-tusiḍ ɣur-I iḍelli tameddit, ɣef wudem-ik yili ɛfiɣ akk I yimezdaɣ. Argaz :-d lmektub, d lweɛd I yebɣan tigi. Ulac d acu yezmer ad t-ixdem umdan ma yura kra n diri deg unyir-is. Imiren kan, aneḥkam issendeh wid i t-ittḥamin ad ruḥen ad d-awin akk tilawin ay ḥebsen. Wwḍent-d tlawin-nni, beddent zdat n urgaz d ṣselṭan, argaz iɛqel yelli-s. Yenna-as, ha-tt-n yelli ! Aneḥkam din yessendeh ad as-fken aḥurim swayes ara tɣumiman-is, ad as-d-rnun aɛawdiw ad tt-ǧǧen ad truḥ d baba-s. Mi tesla teqcict I yimeslayen-a, tɛeggeḍ : – «ala a Ḥemmad ala! Ur ttruḥuɣ ara, ur tedduɣ ara d baba wala d wid yekksen sser fell-i !» Aneḥkam yewhem d acu yesla seg yimi n tlemẓit, yenna-as : – D acu I tebɣiḍ ihi ad txedmeḍ a tameɛḍurt ! – Laqeɣ kan I walbaɛḍ n sselṭanat, ula d acu ara xedmeɣ d yemdanen ur neswi ara.Baba-s yewhem di yelli-s, tbeddel aṭas, yenwa tnekkeṛ-it, ur t-tḥemmel ara, imi tugi ad teddu yid-s. Imiren kan mi yesla I yimeslayen n yelli-s, leḥzen ikkes ɣef wudem-is, yenna-as a win ɣef I ttruɣ netta ur yettru. Yezzi ɣer-s uneḥkam, yenna-as :”acu meḥsub I tebɣid ad d-iniɣ deg yimeslayen-a “nekk ala iṣelṭanat Iwumi laqeɣ !” Taqcict :Ɣur-I yiwet n lbaḍna, ulac win izemren ad izux yesɛa-tt ala nekk ! Aneḥkam :-Tzemreḍ ad aɣ-tt-id-tiniḍ ! D acu-tt ? Anɛam ! Af-d yiwen yebɣan ad as-gezmen aqeṛṛu, awi-t-id ɣer da. Ternuḍ-iyi-d ajenwi iqeḍɛen, nekkini ad as-id-ɣreɣ kra n tṣuret, iles n ujenwi iqeḍɛen ad yuɣal yeḥfa am ufus n ujenwi-nni. Ur cukkeɣ ara yella yiwen dagi yebɣan ad as-gezmen aqerr u ad yemzel, ad yemmet a yelli ! Xemmem cwiṭ a Sidi, ahat yella win yebɣan ad yemmet ! Ur cukkeɣ ara !Nekk ad qebleɣ ad iliɣ deg umkan-is, yerna akken i t-id-nniɣ, ad as-id-ɣreɣ tasuret I ujenwi iqeḍɛen ad yuqqel yeḥfa. Ɛeddi ad kem-n wali ihi ! Tefren-d teqcict ajenwi iqeḍɛen, teɣra-d tasuret, tmekken amgerḍ-is I wakli, tenna-as : aha ! Winn-a s yiwet n tyita yesuffeg-as aqeṛṛu-is, inṭeg akin zdat n uneḥkam. Iɛeggeḍ, yeqqar :texdeɛḍ-iyi, ! Texdeɛḍ-iyi ! tkelxeḍ-iyi !Tilawin yellan din sɣertent, ferḥent imi I d-terra ttaṛ ɣef wayen iɛeddan fell-asent.Tcemmet aneḥkam. Mi d-yuɣal uneḥkam ɣer leɛqel-is, ifaq d acu i as-tebɣa teqcict, yečča times, tzuzen-it tkellex-it alammi i t-tcemmet terra-d ttaṛ. Baba-s, xas tɣaḍ-it yelli-s, tejraḥ tasa-s fell-as, yefraḥ yis-s imi tesɛa nnif d tirugza, tefren ad temmet wala ad tegri d yir tudert. Terra-d ttaṛ tessames-as ilebda I uneḥkam. Iɣewwes ɣef tfekka-s imrareɣ deg yidammen-is. Medden akk slan s wayen I texdem teqcict, tadyant-is ttawin-tt-id d amedya ɣef tirrugza d nnif. Aneḥkam werǧin I tt-yettu.Tadyant n teqcict tezdeɣ allaɣ-is I lebda. Awal sin ad ak-yini : ula yiwen ur iyi-iḥetterm neɣ ur iyi-ikellex slid yiwet n tlemẓit yesɛan laṣel n Yimaziɣen!

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Ramdane LASHEB 

  
 Ilul uselway Boudiaf ass n 23 deg yunyu 1919 deg lwilaya n Msila. Yeɣra dinna, syin yuɣal d axeddam deg tedbelt.

 Mebɛed ṭrad wis sin n umaḍal anda yella d aɛsekri s ddaw n tmehrest n Fransa, u mebɛed mi d-ḍrant twaɣiyin n 8 deg maggu 1945, yekcem amennuɣ aserti deg ukabar n MTLD, syin yuɣal d imḍebber n tama n Qsenṭina deg OS. Aṭas n temsal i yessemsawi gar Messali d wiyaḍ deg yiseggasen 1953-1954. Am wakken ittekki deg unujmuɛ n 22 i d-yeslulen amenzu n unbir n ṭrad azzayri, u yekka, diɣ, deg CRUA. Yettuneḥsab gar yirgazen i d-iheggan lecɣal-a. Syin, yettuceyyeɣ s yisem n FLN ɣer Fransa deg useggasbn 1954 i wakken ad d-iheggi dinna tuddsa i FLN. Yettwaṭṭef akked yimdukkal-is ass n 22 deg tuber 1956 mi yella deg tmesriffegt. Yeqqim d aɛeggal n Usqamu aɣelnaw n tegrawla seg 1956 ar 1962. Yuɣal d aneɣlaf deg useggas n 1958, d aɛeggal n GPRA 1961. Yella d aselway Tesqamut HCE, u yettuneḥsab d aselway n Lezzayer seg 16 deg yennayer 1992 ar 29 deg yunyu 1992. Yettwanɣa srid deg tilivizyu deg yiwen usarag deg lwilaya n Ɛennaba. Deg kra kan n wagguren i yeḥkem, yebda yettarra-d asirem i tmurt u gar yimezdaɣ. Gar wawal mechuren i d-yeǧǧa, ad naf : «S wacu i aɣ-ifen leǧnas ? S leqraya d tmusni !» Awal-a, yenna-t-id ass n 29 di yunyu 1992 deg Uxxam n yidles n Ɛennaba. Am wakken i d-yenna-d diɣen : « Wagi d afus-iw, ẓleɣ-t i yimdanen i merra. » Lameɛna, imdanen-nni yellan ttrajun lxir deg ufus-nni ur idum ara usirem-nsen ula kra n ddqayeq, imi leḥǧab yellan deffir n uselway yedreg deg-s leɛǧeb ! Boumaârafi, yiwen seg wid ilaqen ad yesseḥbiber ɣef tudert n Boudiaf, yessureg fell-as aɛbar i wakken ad iqemmeḍ lɛemr-is. Mačči kan d aselway i yenɣa, maca d asirem. Ula d Lwennas, ameɣras n tlelli yeɣlin ula d netta s leɣder deg waggur n yunyu, yecna fell-as:

 <em>D lesnin tefɣeḍ tamurt </em>

 <em>Tnufqeḍ, tugiḍ leɣlaḍ </em>

 <em>Deg-k i nerǧa ttbut </em>

 <em>Deg wayen i hemjen wiyaḍ </em>

 <em>Tḥelli-d deg-k lmut </em>

 <em>Wwin-tt-id widen ur turǧaḍ </em>

 <em>Awwah, awwah a tuǧǧal </em>

 <em>Ruḥen-aɣ yirgazen ur nuklal. </em>

  H. Moula 

  
 Lḥars mazal-it yettkemil di tesdawiyin n tmurt n Lezayer. Yettwanɣa yiwen n uselmad, Karoui Serhan di tesdawit n Xmis Melyana di tmeddit n wass n 19 Yunyu ,sɣur sin yinelmaden-is. Ɣef wakken yeffeɣ wawal, sebba n waya d agdel i yegdel i wid yebɣan ad sxedmen tijɛal mi llan sɛeddayen akayad. Wwten yInelmaden aselmad s tefḍist armi i t-seɣlin ɣer lqaɛa. I usmekti kan, ḍrant-d yakan twaɣiyin am tigi di tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu anda i ruḥent acḥal n terwiḥin n yinelmaden d tisefla , akken daɣen yettwaḥqer yiwen uselmad di tesdawit n Msila ddurt iɛeddan , imi ɛarḍen yinelmaden-is ad t-nɣen , d ayen i d-yeglan s unekcum-is ɣer lkuma . Dagi i d-iban anda yewweḍ uswir di tesdawit n tmurt .

  S.Yamani 

  
 Tameṭṭut deg ddunit, anect tebɣu tettḥezzib drus, anect tebɣu tella d tamasayt (responsable) drus, anect tebɣu tefhem daɣen, drus. Acku ɣef-s ay senndent aṭas n tɣawsiwin n umaḍal-a deg nettidir. Acimi i d-yettban belli d tameṭṭut ay d lal n ssber ugar n urgaz, ɣas ma zun d aneggaru-a i yesɛan tabɣest fell-as. Maca imi tayi ɣef i d-newwi ameslay ilaq ad teqqim tfaq akken ilaq, yal mara tebru i yiman-is ad tettu dakken nettat d tameṭṭut, ad d-terzu fell-as yiwet n twaɣit i yellan gar tiwuɣa timeqqranin i izemrent ad tt-ḥazent. Tadyant-a i d-yettilin, d mi ara terfed teḥdayt s tadist nettat ur tercil ara. Yettusemma d taɛeẓrit deg uxxam n baba-s. Deg Tmurt n Yezwawen, am umaḍal merra, yal aseggas ad yeḍru ubaxix-a inmetti (catastrophe sociale), d timrawin n tullas ay teffɣent s uɛebbuḍ nutenti ur llint deg uxxam n urgaz-nsent. Tayi tettwakellex s nniya-s, tayi tedda di leɣlaḍ mi tt-yewwi zzhu, tayeḍ tesref-as tegzi n tmeṭṭut tewwi-tt-id ɣef uqadum. Ihdumen-a i d-yettmarayen akka ɣef twacult-a neɣ d ta, ulac win ara d-yinin, ur sekkfen ara talwit seg wagnes ed ubraḥ. Ulac daɣen win ur neẓri dakken isallen am widak, zellzen At taddart merra, acku ayen ara isel umeẓẓuɣ ur yelli d aneɣmis (information) n menwala, ur t-yennum dɣa, yeẓẓay, yeẓẓay mačči d kra, skud ad d-yawi dindin analkam(conséquences) ɣef yimal (future). Taqcict mu teḍra twaɣit-a nezmer ad as-nini d tasfelt deg yiwet n tegnit, wamma tignatin nniḍen, teḍlem, teḍlem. Tagnit ihi anda ur tt-yettlummu ara yiwen: ḥaca mara yettɛedda fell-as yiwen d attɛeddi, deg ubrid neɣ anda nniḍen. Meḥsub netta ur tedmi ur tedri almi i d-teɣli deg tuccar n tmetti ixesren, i ur nettwarebba daɣen. Ma deg tegnatin tiyaḍnin, d taqcict i iḍelmen ansi tebɣuḍ ekk-as-d, skud mačči d ddunit i tt-ikellxen, wanag terẓa lɛehd i yellan gar-as-d ed yiman-is s yiman-is. Am mara tesɛu assaɣ ed walbaɛḍ n yiqcicen, i ara ad tt-yessamnen dakken ad d-yehḍer fell-as deg uxxam, dɣa seg yimir-nni ad as-tefk tafekka-s nettat isul (mazal) ur telli d tameṭṭut-is. Neɣ mara tḥemmel aṭas isem « argaz » i tseddart anda ara tezger tilisa n yiseɣ neɣ n lḥerma n tmeṭṭut i yellan d nettat.  Mara d-yeḍru lɛar-a deg uxxam n ḥedd, deg tuget n tlufa, imḍebber n uxxam, d ababat neɣ d ayetmat, ttilin d irgazen mara ẓran yelli-tsen teḍlem tesseɣli deg yiseɣ-nsen, dɣa tellfen-tt seg twacult ed wakal-nsen i lebda. Aya, yeḍra-d deg waṭas n twaculin yakan, ala kra n umḍan n yexxamen i tent-iqebblen mara llant ad rwent nutenti d tiqcicin ɛad. Syinna, yal mara trew neɣ tesseɣli-d tadist d asseɣli, ad tkemmel tudert-is tesulles mi teẓra dakken asaḍuf-is amenzu tesquccem-t. Ma d tid nniḍen, i yettwanfayen seg uxxam, seld tawaɣit-a, tudert-nsen tesulles ugar ɣas ma deg umaḍal n udrim. Amek ihi, skud beqqan sslam i yiɣimi ed yimawlan ed twacult, gezment amrar i yellan icudd-itent ed uẓar-nsent. Yuɣ lḥal, mara ttwatelfent, ur ttwalint ara ma llan yiberdan nniḍen, dindin ad rzunt ɣef yixxamen n yiḍ anda tettnuzu tfekka n tewtemt i uwtem. Taqcict-nni ihi, deg temẓi ad d-yeɣli waɛjar n layas fell-as, ɣas ad terwu idrimen ed tkerrusin, maca iseɣ-is yeɛfa Rebbi fell-as, tawacult-is, i yellan d tiẓeḍt n ddunit, tennebḍa yid-sen i yifeḍ. S yiwen n wawal, terẓa asaḍuf n ddunit, dɣa terẓa-tt tneggarut-a. Yerna ayen yesseḥzanen ugar deg-s, mi ala nettat i yettenṭerrayen, i tent-iɣerrmen. Ma d argaz i yellan d sebba n waddad deg tella, ulac wid i t-id-ibeddren amzun ur yeḍlim netta seg tama-s. Ad iqennaɛ yes-s lebɣi ad tt-yeǧǧ tuḥel. Ɣef waya ay d-nniɣ tazwara, anect tettḥezzib tmeṭṭut d drus, skud ala nettat i tent-yettaɣen mara temmag tuccḍa, ladɣa am ta.

<p style="text-align: right;">   Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Aṭas n yimezdaɣ n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i yeffeɣ leɛqel, ddurt iɛeddan, imi slan d akken aman n tissit n tbernint gellun-d s lehlak n Typhoïde, ladɣa imi d-ttbanen tikwal am wakken d iwraɣen. Asali-agi ur yesɛi ara lsas u d lekteb, ɣef wakken i d-nnan yimḍebbren, ama d wid n tenmehla n waman neɣ wid n sbiter. Ufan-t kan yimdanen yettwasuzer deg uẓeṭṭa anmetti (Internet), ussan-agi kan yezrin. Ayen yessekkren ahetwir deg twaculin, d assaɣ ay cudden wid i d-yefkan isallen-agi n lekteb, deg Internet, ɣer tmettan n snat-nni n teḥdayin tisetmatin i yemmuten ussan iɛeddan. Ihi, s kra n win yeslan s lexbar, yeḥbes srid ɣef tissit n waman n tbernint, yuɣal ɣer wid n lbiɛ u yerna yefka asalli i wid akk yessen. Akka i yemmeɣ lexbar, ‘’yezzi-d i udrar’’, yal wa irennu-as ciṭ n tecrurt i wakken ad t-icebbeḥ mebla ma inuda ɣef tidet anda tella. Seg tama n unemhal n ADE n Tizi Uzzu, Mass Berzoug « Aman yellan deg tbernint zeddigit, ur yelli d acu i ten-yuɣen, kkan-d seg ubaraj n Taxuxt. Ur nezmir ara ad nestehzi deg tezmert n yimdanen. Ihi, aman tessen medden, nettɛassa-ten ɣef tezdeg yal ass. Ass-a, nezmer ad d-nini, xas ad ten-swen yimezdaɣ n lwilaya mebla tugdi ». Si tama n unemhal n sbiter, Mass Abbes Ziri, yenna-d : « Ur yelli lehlak i d-yekkan seg waman n tissit. Ar tura, ur yelli umuḍin n lehlak n typhoïde i d-ikecmen ɣer sbiter neɣ ɣer yimekwan n usejji i yellan deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ihi, wid i d-yeqqaren d akken glan-d waman s lehlak, mačči d tidet ». Ula d lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tessuffeɣ-d yiwen n ulɣu anda i d-tenna s ttbut d akken ur yelli d acu yuɣen aman n tissit n tbernint. Teṭṭalab, diɣ, deg yimezdaɣ n lwilaya akken ur ɣellin ara deg lecɣal am wigi ur nebni ɣef tidet u zemren ad swen aman n tbernint mebla tugdi ». Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, tebda tugdi i ikecmen imdanen la tneqqes u tennefsusi imi i d-mmeslayen yimḍebbren-agi ɣef liḥala n waman deg tbernint. Llan ugaden mliḥ, ladɣa, imi i d-ttbanen tikwal d iwraɣen, rnu qqnen tamsalt n tmettant n snat-nni n tsetmatin yemmuten ɣer lehlak n typhoïde i d-itekken seg waman. 

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Deg ussan-agi yezrin i d-yeffeɣ wungal amaynut n uneggal d umaru aqbayli Mass Rachid Boukherroub iwumi ifka azwel “Bab n wa ad yekkes wa” i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin « El Amel » n temdint n Tizu Uzzu. D adlis n 144 n yisebtar, yettnuzu deg tnedlisin s wazal n 250DA. D ungal-nniḍen i d-yernan ɣer ugerruj n temkerḍit d tsekla tamaziɣt, d win ara d-yawin abaɣur i tutlayt-nneɣ. Yemeslay-d deg-s ɣef yiwent n tedyant i d as-id-yeḍran i yiwen n yilemẓi isem-is Mekhlouf, d netta i d awudam agejdan deg wungal-agi-ines wis sin, s tmaziɣt dima. D taqsiḍt n yiwen n uqcic i yeǧǧan yemma-s dagi deg tmurt n Lezzayer, netta yunag ɣer tmurt n Franca, mi d-yuɣal, yufa-d yemma-s temmut, yerna xedɛent wat taddart-is…atg. Ad d-nesmekti imeɣriyen belli, Mass Boukherroub mmi-s n tɣiwant n Boudjima, yella d aselmad n tfelsafit, tura akka ha-ta-n d anemhal n tesnawit n Ait Aissa Mimoun. D aneggal diɣen n sin wungalen s tutlayt n tyemmat, amezwaru yeffeɣ-d deg n 2015, i yewwin arraz amenzu n wungal amaziɣ deg temsizzelt taɣelnawt n Assia Djebar n wungal, deg useggas n 2016. Ma d wis sin-agi, akken kan i d-ilul, d wagi iɣef i d-newwi awal. Ungalen-agi-ines i sin yid-sen, ffɣen-d ɣer tezrigin “El Amel”.

  A. A.
