 Ass wis kraḍ : sed 28 di meɣres 2015

 09h00: Projections :  – Documentaire :

 – Reportage Lauréats de la précédente édition

 11h00:    Tikci n warrazen i wid i d-yufraren deg umsizwer.  

 12h30:     Imekli.

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Mbeɛd xemsa n yiseggasen i yidis n uselway aqbur n tɣiwant Mass Ɛebdun Nasir, i yuɣalen tura d amazan (député), tbeddeḍ-d i tikkelt-nniḍen i uselḥu n tɣiwant. D acu i ak-ideggren ladɣa ɣer waya ? 

 Sadeq Rebbaɛi: Annar asertan deg tmurt-nneɣ s umata neɣ deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel ladɣa, yettimɣi deg-s yinijel, asennan, akicaw, uzzu, idmim d wayen-nniḍen seg tɣawsiwin n diri. Ihi ala ma ncemmer i yiɣallen, ad nekker s afras swayes nqaɛed taferka ma nebɣa ad nidir deg-s akken iwata ɣef teɣzi n xemsa n yiseggasen i d-iteddun. Ɣur-i, ala ddiɛaya n lvuṭ i yellan d tagnit i useggem n yimal. Deg-s dɣa ad neɛreḍ ad nessefhem i medden ayen ineṭḍen timetti n wass-a d tnegrawt i d-leḥḥun ɣer-s ma ur teccenṭuṭṭef ara deg ubrid n umennuɣ. Ihi, nekk d yimdukkal-iw deg ukabar n Tirni n yiɣallen inemlayen, nger-d iman-nneɣ i tefranin-a, acku numen belli imḍebbren n yikabaren n udabu ur xdimen ara ayen ilaqen, ur gin amkan i usegmu n tmurt. Ur ilaq ara ad asen-neǧǧ amkan ad rnun ad ṭṭfen tisura n udabu deg tɣiwanin d lwilayat. Ma yella i usawen, snegren taluft n tsertit, gan ayen merra yettarran Azayri ad yerr aḍar ɣer deffir deg temsalt n tsertit, ilemẓiyen n FFS deg Ayt Smaɛel, begsen akken ad d-kksen leḥkem n uɣref seg waccaren n yimesbaṭliyen-a, akken ad yeqqim d ayla-nsen, imi nekni seg wid yettcawaren agdud deg wayen i t-yerzan d wayen yebɣa.

  D acu i d asenfar i d-tewwiḍ i xemsa n yiseggasen i d-iteddun ma yella trebḥeḍ?  

 Aḍu n rrbeḥ ncallah ad d-yali fell-aɣ, am yal tikkelt. Ulamma neḥsa s lewɛara n taluft d lexsas n tedrimt deg teswiɛt-a, maca nesɛa limin deg uɣref d yilemẓiyen n taddart belli ad ilin i tayet-nneɣ. Nekni ad nennaɣ s wayen iwumi nezmer akken ad nessifsus taɛkemt ɣef yimezdaɣ. Ɣef waya isenfaren caḍen deg uqerruy. Maca gar lecɣal igejdanen, nezmer ad d-nebder deg tazwara taluft n waman i yellan d taɣawsa i ixussen nezzeh imezdaɣ. Deg waya ilaq ad d-nini belli mbeɛd mi tga tɣiwant tazrawt n usejhed (étude de renforcement) AEP n Ayt Smaɛel akked taddart n Rrif seg Lɛenser Azegza seg Tsexriwt, nessaweḍ newwi-d asenfar-a s 45 n yimelyaren, i wakken ad sɛun aman merra yimezdaɣ d tuddar n tɣiwant. Rnu ɣer-s aman yellan deg Leɛnaser ara d-nessiweḍ ayyuren i d-iteddun. Nga daɣen tazrawt n ureqqeɛ n uẓeṭṭa AEP n tudrin n Ayt Tɛisiwt d Tala Ɛṭa d wayen mazal ur ifukk deg tɣiwant, imi tadrimt-nsent s wazal n 9 n yimelyaren nettraǧu ad tt-id-fken deg wussan-a. Asenfar-nniḍen d ayen yeqqnen i twennaḍt d usizdeg; annect-a ad t-nexdem seg leqdicat imezwura imi nessaram ad neg afus deg ufus lwaḥi d yimezdaɣ i wakken ad nessiweḍ ɣer lmerɣub. Wis tlata d afud (énérgie) ama n Lgaz neɣ n trisiti. Wis rebɛa d lakulat-nneɣ i ilaq ad nesnerni aseggem d useqɛed deg-sent. War ma ttuɣ ilemẓiyen d wayen i ten-iceɣben, d tlawin, iɣef ara neqdec deg xemsa n yiseggasen i d-iteddun

  Mi d-tbedreḍ ilemẓiyen, nwala umuɣ n FFS d ilemẓiyen deg tuget…  

 D tidet! Deg waya nesɛa iswi. Nekni nɛewwel ad nefk tagnit i yilemẓi, acku ayen i aɣ-yerran i deffir mi nẓerr bu εecrin d aṭufan netta zik 13 n yiseggasen d argaz. Yak mačči d amɣar ara iqedcen, ara yazzlen? Ilemẓiyen i d-newwi deg umuɣ n FFS d irgazen yesɛan tirmit deg waṭas n taɣulin, yal wa anda iqeddec d wanda ixeddem, maca merra-nsen sɛan lebɣi n umennuɣ d tismin ɣef tɣiwant-nsen. Ilaq ad nẓer d akken imdanen i yesɛan imukan n uxeddim, d imḍebbren deg tkebbaniyin timeqranin, mačči d lexsas n uxeddim neɣ kra-nniḍen i ten-id-yewwin bexlaf lebɣi i umennuɣ i usnefli n tɣiwant-nsen.

  Aṭas i yeqqaren ulac later n tlawin deg ukabar-nwen. D acu i d ssebba?  

 Akabar deg-s aṭas n tlawin, aṭas n tlemẓiyin d waṭas n tmeɣnasin. Ttbut ɣef waya, nesɛa aṭas n tlawin i yellan d tiqerra n wumuɣen n FFS deg waṭas n tɣiwanin. Ma nebder-d kan tamurt n yiqbayliyen, ama deg Buǧlil neɣ deg Ayt Tudert di twilayt n Tizi Uzzu, d timeɣnasin-nneɣ i d-yekksen imukan-nsent s temmeɣnest d tezdeg n umennuɣ. Maca, ɣur-neɣ deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel ad d-nini yella lexsas deg wannect-a, ɣas ma tebda tettifrir-d tmeṭṭut, tebda tettara awellih i wannect-a tugart deg tdukkliwin. Gar yisenfaren-nneɣ ɣef tmeṭṭut dɣa, nenwa ad nɛiwen s tirmit i wakken ad d-nesbed tidukkliwin ara ixedmen ɣef tlawin, imi numen belli d yiwen n ubrid i d-yettrebbin timmeɣnest, d allal ara icudden gar tlawin akken ad d-ffɣent seg tsusmi i tent-yewten deg tizi n wass-a. Ula d rray-nsent aql-aɣ nettxemmim i usenfar ara t-yeǧǧen ad d-yaweḍ i tɣiwant, ur yettɣimi ara kan deg uxxam.

  Meskud tjerrbeḍ yakan deg 5 n yiseggasen asefrek n tɣiwant. Yaḍra tumneḍ d akken isenfaren igejdanen ad maggen deg Ayt Smaɛel ulamma txuss tedrimt?  

 Ma yella unbir n 54 d tanekra i tukksa n uzaglu ɣef yizayriyen, d amennuɣ mgal tamḥeqranit, akken ula d ass-a. Unbir n 2017, d amennuɣ s wudem-nniḍen, d ibeddi i tayet n tmetti deg teswiɛt n ddiq akken ad nessegmu s wayen i nezmer taɣiwant-nneɣ. Ihi s timmad-iw umneɣ yella waṭas n wayen nezmer ad nexdem, yella wacu yemmuggen ilaq ad yettwaḥrez, yella wacu ilaqen ad yemmag akken i ak-d-nniɣ seg llina. Syin ɣur-s taɣiwant d tsertit, d tmetti, d yidles d wayendin n temsal i yezmer umdan ad yeẓẓu s drus n ttawilat. Asmi yeṭṭef ukabar n FFS tisura n tɣiwant, uɣalen imezdaɣ ssnen d acu yellan, ssnen d acu ilaqe, ssnen aselway n tɣiwant-nsen. Meḥsub yerẓa zzerb yellan gar yimezdaɣ d yimḍebbren-is armi qqlen am yimdukkal! Annect-a ur ilaq ara ad aɣ-iruḥ!

   M. K. 

  
 Mḥend d yiwen uzzayri ikerhen iman-is. Netta akked lmeḥna  d tizyiwin, akken id lulen, ur yessin ad iɣer neɣ ad yaru. Asmi yekcem ɣer uɣerbaz yezga weswir-ines ulac, yettɛawad kan i iseggasen, ɛyan deg-s ula d iselmaden-ines dɣa ḍeggrent ɣer uzniq yerwa nemḍar deg yiberdan. Asmi yeɛya deg umeṭar  deg yiberdan n taddart iqelleb ùef uxeddim. Maca ala lexdayem yenɛettaben i t-id isaḥḥen. Yendem alarmi dayen kan imi ur as-yefki ara azal i leqraya. Maca ndama tettas-d taneggarut. Mḥend yettidir tudert n uydi. Ixeddem aṭas, yettaɣ ciṭuḥ n yidrimen. Yesɛa 40 n yiseggasen, ad t-waliḍ ad as-tiniḍ 80 n yiseggasen i yesɛa. anyir-is yeččur d tiregwa ad as-tiniḍ d amekraz itent-ikerzen. Allen-is nexrent ɣer sdaxel, lqedd-is yekna, arqiq m umesmar, iɣsan-is ttbanen-d ɣef uglim-ines. Asmi yewweḍ tizi n zwaǧ, yettqellib tinna d wara yezdi lmeḥna-s. anda yewweḍ, ɣer tinna yewweḍ ad d-tefk 3 yesteqsiyen

  -Ma teɣriḍ ?

 -Ala

 -Ma txeddmeḍ ?  

 -Ih

 -Ma tettaɣeḍ aṭas ?

 -Ala

 -Ur teɣiriḍ, ur tettaɣeḍ aṭas, yerna t-ḍemɛeḍ ad taɣeḍ yelli. Tenwiḍ ad tidireḍ tayri d waman isemmaḍen, ruḥ ad tt-leɛbeḍ ɣef yiman-ik.

 Alarmi yerwa tid-ak yuran i yufa tameṭṭut icuban ɣur-s. ur teɣri, ur tezyin, ad as-tiniḍ teffeɣ-d srid si ǧahennama. Yesɛa-d ṭeẓẓina n yigerdan yid-s. 

 Mi ifukk lxedma-s, yekreh ad yekcem s axxam acku yal 

 yiwen yettsuɣu :

 -Aɣ-iyi-d aqrab !

 -Awi-yi-d ayefki !

 -Awi-yi-d zzit !

 -Xelles aman akked trisiti !

 Mḥend yezga yettazal deffir texbizt, anda tella ad tt-yeḍfer, nettat treggel fell-as. Yerwa lemrar fell-as, tectaq-as iḍes.  Yal ass yettnekkar send ad yecreq yiṭij, fell-as yedda ḥafi, yeqbel ddel. Yezga yettsuɣ fell-as umɛellem-ines, netta yessussum kan akken ad tt-dum fell-as texbizt-is, acku axeddim ixus, fell-as ur yeǧǧi amkan, yexdm di seḥra i iṭij yesserɣayen, yexdem deg udrar i ugris igezzmen imeẓẓuɣen. Fell-as yexdem acḥal n tɣawsiwin. Yexdem d imaswaten, yessareǧ isebbaḍen, iferreɣ acḥal n tzebbalin, yenɣec acḥal d isekla, iɛebba ayen ẓẓayen, asɣar, lyajur, ssiman… 

 Tagara teǧǧat tezmert, laɛqel-is yexser, yuɣal i teddu dg ubrid yeshetrif, yettcuddu taxbizt s lxiḍ ɣer wammas-is, yezzuɣur-itt, yekkat-itt yeqqar-as :

 -Acḥal-aya ṭafareɣ-kem kemm treggleḍ fell-i, tura tezzi-d nnuba-m d kemm-i ara iyi-d-iḍefren.                            

<p style="text-align: right;">  H.B

  
 Ṭawes d yiwet n tmeγnast tameqrant n d yIdles Amazi&amp;gamma,; ayagi tbeggen-it-id s yinnawen-is imi tenna-d : «iswi-inu di tudert d aḥareb γef yIdles Amaziγ akken ur yettruḥ ara di tatut…» d leqdic-is, imi tella ger imenza i yukan deg usbeddi n ugraw n yimaziγen ( Académie Berbère ) γer tama n Bessaεud Muḥend Aεrab d Sliman Σazem di wiyiḍ nniḍen. Ṭawes tezga tettili taywalt gar-as akk d imeγnasen Imaziγen yecban Dda Lmulud.Tawes d yelli-s n Faḍma AT MENṢUR d Belqasem ΣEMRUC, d wetma-s n umyaru, amedyaz ameqran s tutlayt n tefransist Jean Lmuhub ΣEMRUC, tlul ass n 04 maγres 1913 di Tunes. Tudert-is d tin yuεren aṭas, imi tella di Tunes, syen uγalen-d γer Yiγil Σli, i tikkelt nniḍen uγalen γer Tunes, syen tunag γer Lpari anda i tufa abrid i usenfali n taktiwin-is d ugerruj n tsekla timawit s-d-teğğa yemma-s. Dinna daγen i tesεedda yiwen umsizwer akken ad tekcem γer uγerbaz amagnu aεlayen i d-tewwi, maca γer tagara ur tkemmil ara leqraya-s.Ṭawes d tacennayt tamenzut tafriqit di ṣṣenf n Lopera. D tamyarutt tamenzut n tefriqt ugafa. D tamselγutt n Radyu n Fransa. D tameṭṭut n tsekla tazzayrit s tutlayt n tefransist. Di lawan anda tugti n tlawin deg umaval ur zmirent ara a d-refdent iqerray-nsent, Ṭawes terẓa asalu i yal aḥric n tẓuri . Di tsekla Ṭawes tefka-d aṭas i tutlayt n tefransist imi tura 5 wungalen, tira-ines tebda-tt deg useggas 1935 s ungal mi tsemma «Jacinthe noire» i d-tessuffeγ deg useggas 1947, deg-s temmeslay-d γef yiwet n teqcict yeddren di tmetti ur nelli ara d ayla-s, ur teṣṣaweḍ ara ad taγ tannumi yid-sen d wansayen-nsen. Tezga tettḥulfu i yiman-is d tajenṭaḍ. Tezga tεezzel iman-is γef yemdanen. Ungal wis sin d win d tessuffeγ deg useggas 1960, tsemma-yas «Rue des tambourins»(Abrid ibenduyar) tettmeslay-d deg-s γef twacult taqbaylit yunagen γer Tunes, iεeggalen-is ur wiḍen ad ttun iẓuran ideg d-frurin, deg wungal-agi tbeggen-d amek tettwaḥqer twacult-nni imi tufrar-d nnig-sen merra, γef waya zgan qqimen d iberraniyen i lebda γas ddren acḥal d aseggas dinna. Ungal nniḍen Aεeqqa yessawalen «Le grain magique» ideg d-tessuqel akk timucuha i s-tesselmed yemma-s, d tid mazal hekkunt-t ar ass-a di temtti taqbaylit, tessuffeγ-it-id deg useggas 1966. Adlis iwumi tsemma amesri n usugen «Amant imaginaire» i d-yeffγen deg useggas 1975, deg-s temmeslay-d γef yiwet n teqcict i zewğen maca teεceq deg yiwen umyaru, tagara, tegra-d di ndama . Deg useggas 1972, Ṭawes tessewjed yiwen udlis iwumi tsemma Tawḥidt a yemma «Solitude ma Mère», maca ur t-id-tessuffeγ ara acku tra ad tbeddel kra di talγa-s, adlis-agi tebḍa-t γef 9 yeḥricen, yal aḥric tefka-yas isem n wemdan, deg useggas 1995 suffγen-t-id wedlis-agi γer tezrigin Maspéro . deg wayen akka yakk tura, a nwali d akken γas tettidir berra i wakal n lejdud-is maca ul-is, tamuγli-s zgan welhen γer iẓuran d wakal ideg d-tefruri. Γer tama n tira, Ṭawes tcennu icewwiqen s tmaziγt i d-telqeḍ sγur yemma-s, i s-yuγalen d tamkerḍit n tsekla di tgemmi taqbaylit. Yefka-yas Rebbi inzizen n taγect iğehden, rnu udem swayes tcennu, d udem ameγrad. Di lawan ideg tella di Abrid ibenduyarFransa yečča-tt lxq γef tmurt-is tqubel ugur-agi s ccna, deg useggas 1937 i tebda txeddem timeγriwin. Deg useggas 1939 sawlen-as-d di tmurt n Lmaruk anda i tuka deg uswir n ccna n Fes anda i d-tḥella taggazt swayes ara tnadi deg wayen d-yegran s tmaziγt di lfolklore Ibirique.Aḍebsi-yis amenzu tessekles-it deg useggas 1966, d win mi tsemma Ccna Amaziγ n Tmurt n Leqbayel, s yes-s i tewwi arraz ameqran n uḍebsi. Deg useggas-nni yakan aselway n tmurt n sinigal (Sénégal) Léopold Sedar Senghord yenced-itt akken ad tiki deg tfaska n tẓuri iberkanen di tmaneγt n Dakar. Deg useggas 1967 tessuffeγ-d aḍebsi-ines wis sin iwumi tsemma Cnawi ikalan, tikrebba d cḍaḥ uγrusen Imaziγen «Chants de processions, méditations et danses sacrées berbères».Deg tfaska tadelsant Panafrica d-yeḍran di tmaneγt n Lzzayer, Ṭawes ur-d-tettwanced ara, adabu n Bumdyan iγunza idles Amaziγ. Ayagi iḥuza-tt aṭas imiren i d-tenna : «Isγunen-nne&amp;gamma,; isefra, timucuha, cnawi-nneγ banen-d, ufraren-d deg tmura n umaḍal merra i wacu-ten iṣuḍaf-nwen d yinnawen-nwen ? «Nos bijoux sont exposés, nos poèmes, contes et chansons sont répertoriés partout ailleurs à l’étranger, à quoi serviront alors vos lois et vos discours ?».Deg useggas 1970 tecna d Venis di tmurt n Ṭelyan, di lawan-nni daγen i texdem yiwen usarag di Lmuḥamadya di tmurt n Lmaruk. Adebsi-ines wis kraḍ d Cnawi n Laṭlas i d-yeffγen deg useggas 1971. Aseggas kan mbaεd terna tessuffeγ-d wayeḍ iwumi tsemma Cnawi n Spenyul arkayik n Alberka «chants Espaniols archaiques de la Alberca». Deg useggas 1974 terna tessuffeγ-d adebsi wis 4 iwumi tsemma «Incantations, méditations et danses sacrées berbères». Aḍebsi-ines aneggaru d win wumi tsemma Cnawi n tmaziγt n tessirt d dduḥ «Chants berbères de la meule et du berceau», i d-tettsuffeγ deg useggas 1975. Ṭawes texdem tidwilin di Radyu, deg useggas 1937 γer 1940 tessewjed-d tidwilin tidelsanin di radyu n Tunes. Deg useggas 1944 γer 1945 di radyu n tmurt n Lzzayer i teṭṭef tadwil γef yedles.Nettat d Gma-s Lmuhub ttwanecden deg useggas 1952 sγur Jean Giono γer radyu n Fransa, anda i sen-yexdem tadiwennit, 5 iseggasen kan γer zdat, rradyu n Fransa tessawel-as-d, texdem tadwilt s teqbaylit γef yedles imawi d tsekla n tefriqt ugafa di 1957 γer 1963 i tessewjad yal ddurt. Ṭawes tezweğ deg useggas 1940 d yiwen unaẓur n teklut Aspenyuli mi qqaren André Bourdil, tedder di Spenyul 2 iseggasen, di lawan-nni i d-tesεa taqcict mi tsemma Laurence, syen uγalen γer tmurt n Fransa anda i tkemmel tudert-is alarmi d ass n 02 yebrir 1976 i tt-tewwi tmettant .

 Taddart n Ikhelouiène d yiwet seg 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i d-yezgan deg ugafa n tɣiwant-agi u deg ugafa n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tebԑed ɣef temdint-a azal n 15 km. Taddart-agi, mazal ar ass-a n wussan tettidir iseggasen-agi ineggura lexsas d ameqqran, deg yiḥricen d yisenfaren yemgarden n tudert tatrart gar-asen: ttawil n Internet, lgaz n temdint, yir liḥala n yibrdan, asezdeg n twennaḍt, imḍiqen i yilmeẓyen, d uɣbel n waman…

 Ssuturen imezdaɣ n taddart-agi n Ikhelouiène deg yimḍebren teεna temsalt, ama d wid n usqamu aɣerfan (APC) n Ait Aissa Mimoun ama d wid n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i wakken ad d-rren lwelha-nsen ɣer yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi yenḥafen aṭas si yal tama. Menbeεd mi ttidiren akka tura deg tegnatin qessihen. Alaḥsab n yimezdaɣ-is, nnan-d d akken taddart-agi si zik tettwaεzel, yerna mazal ar tura tettwaεzel; acku ulac tadrimt yettwaxesen i yisenfaren n unegmu i lfayda n taddart-agi ara yessifsusen taεkumt ɣef tudert-nsen.. Ma d iɣeblan i d-ttmagaren yal ass, ad naf deg tazwara aɣbel n waman n tisit, imi ufan-d iman-nsen ttnadin ɣef tiqit n waman anida ara tt-id-awin. Acku ttɣaman 15 neɣ 20 n wussan i wakken ad d-uɣalen waman yiwen ubrid, d ayen iten-yeğğan ad d-aɣen tisitirin n waman. Anect-a, yegla-d s uɣlaq n tkebbanit n Lezzayer i Waman (ADE) n tama n Wagennun i wazal n ddurt sɣur imezdaɣ n taddart-agi deg ussan iεeddan. Ugur wis sin, d Internet, mazal ur yefri ara. Ma yebɣa yiwen ad yazen neɣ ad d-yawi kra seg Internet, ilaq fell-as ad yerzu arma d tamdint n Tizi Uzzu. Ay-agi, yebɣa ad d-yini d akken ilaq ad ilḥu 15 km, neɣ yezmer lḥal ad isruḥ yiwen wass, ɣef liğal n ssaεa. Maca lukan i d-tewwiḍ s ixxamen tili mačči akka. Cetkayen, daɣen, ɣef uεeṭṭel n uṣiweḍ n lgaz n temdint s ixxamen-nsen,; imi ṛwan lḥif ladɣa deg tesmhuyt n tegrest, neɣ deg ussan n ccetwa, imi acḥal n tikkal i leḥḥun d likumiṭer i wakken ad d-awin taqqerԑat n lgaz, uɣur ara sewwen neɣ uɣur ara seḥmun. D ayen i ten-yeğğan ad d-gren tiɣri yerna ad ssuturen deg wid teԑna temsalt gar-asen imeḍberen n tɣiwant Ayt Σissa Mimun, d Tanmehla n Imuhal Izuyaz (Direction des Travaux public), i wakken ad yefru wugura-a deg wussan i d-iteddun. Aɣbel wis ukuẓ, d win n yiberdan; imi aṭas n yiberdan yellan deg taddart-agi, ha-ten-an deg yir liḥala, yecban abrid ameqqran yeqqnen gar-as d Laԑzib n Ugni n Σmer, rnu ɣur-s abrid yellan daxel n taddart.

 Aḥric n tedwest d ṣṣeḥa (la santé) d win yenxesen ugar n yiḥricenn-niḍen imi axxam n tujjya Muḥamed Saεil n Tala Illillan, ur yesԑi ara aṭas n ttawilat n udawi, yerna ur yesԑi ara takkerust n tujjya (ambulance) ara yettawin imuḍan. Yerna ula netta iḥuza-t uɣbel-nni n waman, imi ur yesεi ara tisitirin ideg ara yejmeε aman, aṭas n tikkal i yettɣama mebla aman.

 D annect-agi akk n yiɣeblan i yerran tudert n twaculin n taddart n Ikhelouiène, ttidirent deg lḥif d lmeḥna, ɣef waya ssuturent deg yimḍebren ad d-lhin deg wuguren iceɣben allaɣ-nsen, u ad d-afen tifrat i yiɣeblan s tazzla.

 I lmend n umulli wis 50 segmi yebda ccna, Lounis Ait Menguellet yella-d d inebgi n Tubiret ass n lğemɛa yezrin deg uxxam n yidles Ali Zamoum.

 Am wakken i yetturaju, tazeqqa n uxxam-a ur tessaweḍ ara ad tawi imdanen akk i d-yusan iwakken ad walin amedyaz-nsen. γef lehsab n wayen i nwala, ayen i yeqqimen deg berra yugar ayen i ikecmen, imi azal n 1200 n yimdanen kan iwumi i d-isah umkan. Uqbel akka ad d-yali, d lwali n Tubiret Mass Mouloud CHERIFI, i d-ilehqen d amezwaru anda i d-ddan yid-s watas n yimdebbren n twilayt. Ur iɛettel ara Lounis iwakken ad d-yejbu ula d netta anda i t-mmugren yimezdaγ n Tubiret s ufus d teγratin. Am wakken i yesfulef wigad-is, yebda s kra n tezlatin yeccuren d anamek, tid yecban « d aya i nesɛa d ayla-nneγ sani i tebγan ad nruh » neγ ahat d aγrib ur zeggreγ lebḥur. Meɛna s ya γer da, ad yezzi agambar-is γer tid yessuzunen ulawen, tizlatin i s-yebda amecwar-is. Sliγ i utaksi, Djamila, telteyyam di leɛmer-iw, ğğant ahat tuget n yimnezhen deg lebhat, imi d wid i d-yeddren yes-sent. Lounis, ur yezmir ad iqabel wigad-is mebla ma yuzen-asen-d kra terzeft lqayen, mi akken i d-yewwi tizlit-nni γef tmettut, dγa ifures tagnit mi akken taqaɛet imerra tettuγu : « Imaziγen, Imaziγen » iwakken ad d-yini : « Timaziγin, timaziγin » iwakken daγ ad yawed γer tinna akken iγef yuzzel atas wawal, « a lmusiw ». Ait Menguellet, yerra seg tama-s tajmilt tameqqrant i wid id-yellan deffir n uheggi n tmeγra-agi anda i d-yenna : « Ad rreγ tajmilt i unemhal n yidles n Tubiret, mebla ma ttuγ tanemhalt n uxxam Ali Zamoum, Massa Saliha CHERBI i n-yusan γur-i γer Tizi Wezzu iwakken ad iyi-d-tenced γer da γer Tubiret. » Dγa ikemmel deg wawal-is srid i lwali, mi as-yenna : « ferheγ atas imi d-ufiγ yiwen n yimdebber d ilemzi ! ». γer taggara n tmeγra yeddan almi yebda wass, Mouloud CHERIFI d uselway aγerfan n twilayt selsen abernus i Lounis iwakken ad as-rren tajmilt imi i d-yerra i tiγri n tmehla n yidles ladγa deg lawan-a n waggur n Remdan.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Yennayer d awal yebḍa ɣef sin yen : d yiwen neɣ amezwaru , d ayer :d aggur, anamek –is amezwaru n useggas .Yennayer d tiwwura n useggas llan wid i as-yeqqaren ixef n useggas d ansay tesfugul Tefriqt n ugafa d acu asfugel-is yal tamnaḍt amek i tesfugul , ttqabalen-t s tumert acku ansay-agi n yimaziɣen d asmekti n ugellid Cacnaq asmi yeɣḍel imnamaren-is , deg-s ttmektayen-t-id akken ur tettun ansi d-frurin yimaziɣen . Ass n yennayer iɣelli-d ass n 12 deg ( janvier ) , sewwayen tagella swayes ttwasnen leqbayel seksu , zellun iyuzaḍ qqaren s yidim ad yeffeɣ lhem,sewwayen berkukes ,acebbaḍ , aheddur, tiɣrifin, d waṭas n tẓidanin, d ass anida d-ttemlilin i eggalen n twacult ɣer yiwet ṭerbut , ma llan wid iɣaben ad d-seddun tijeɣlin-nsen deg tbaqit d azamul n tdukkli d tegmat , Yella wanida tteṭṭilen i warrac imecṭah acku agrud am useklu mi tferseḍ ad yexlef , ma d tullas timecṭaḥ tturarent s t elğetin tislit n unẓar ; ad naf daɣen ɣer yicawiyin ass-nni n yennayer ad d-ferḍen lkanun ad arren inyen amaynut d azamul n tugti n lɣella, anamek –is ad terbeḥ tfellaḥt ad sewwen ɣef yinyen-nni tagella yifen tin i eddan.tella daɣen yiwet n tsirit (legende) n yennayen ttalsen-d belli ass aneggaru n yennayer teksa yiwet temɣart taɣaḍt-is tenna-as : «teẓk a emmi yennayer teffɣeḍ ur texdimeḍ acemma !!» , yennayer amek yexdem akken ad d-yerr ttar-is ,iruḥ ɣer furar yenna-as : «ttxil-k a emmi furar , rḍel-iyi yiwwas d nhar ad d-rreɣ ttar n be za m l» furar yerḍel yiwen wass i yennayer dɣa ter tebreq ,tagnawt tenhewal , adfel d sixṭṭa dɣa tamɣart d taɣaḍt-is mmutent ɣef waya ass aneggaru n yennayen qqaren-as amerḍil ( l’emprunté),qqaren-d daɣen mi ara yekcem yennayer keččmen wussan n tafat teffɣen wussan n ṭṭlam.Yennayer lbenna-s zik ilaq ur nettağğa ara ansay-agi , ad naf deg Tizi wezzu mazal ṭṭfen deg-s sfugulent ama deg uxxam n yidles n Lmulud At M emmer d tameɣra tameqqrant, ad naf daɣen deg kra n yiɣerbazen ttawin-d yinelmaden tigelliwin yemgaraden d-sewwent tyemmatin –nsen , xeddmen timsikent n yisenfaren uran , ttlusunt tullas tiqendyar n leqbayel, iseggasen i eddan xeddmen akagi deg uɣerbaz n L erbi Mezzani n wat yanni, aseggas-a ad xedmen akka deg uɣerbaz n Tact n Rğawna deg Tizi wezzu,ɣer taggara ad nini aseggas ameggaz 2966 i yimuḍan yellan deg sbiṭarat, i yime der, i twacult tanaẓurt, iwumi ɣlint tgejda , i yimaziɣen ur nettu ara leṣel-nsen.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Zakia Ben yahia  

  
 Ɛeddan wussan, iṛuḥ urgaz-nni ittnadi tameṭṭut ad isbedd axxam. A tin uɣur yewwet ad tt-yaɣ, imawlen ad agin imi d aderɣal. Tesla yelli-s n yiwen n umerkanti tenna-as i baba-s ma di tiṭ-ik ad zewǧeɣ, nekk efk-iyi kan i leflani a-ta-n ittnadi tameṭṭut. Yenna-as baba-s : ‘’Awwah a yelli ! Amek ara kem-fkeɣ i uderɣal ! Wagi d lmuḥal a yelli. Ad ɛemdeɣ ad tesxesreḍ iman-im ɣef uderɣal’’. terra-as: Awal d win i wumi teslid, ma di ṭit-ik ad zewǧeɣ efk-iyi kan i wagi. Baba-s n teqcict-nni issawel i urgaz-nni ittnadin tameṭṭut, yenna-as a-tt-an yelli ma tebɣiḍ-tt ur ak-tt-tekkseɣ ara. Argaz-nni yuɣ yelli-s n umerkanti-nni. Cwit n lweqt mbaɛd, inna-as urgaz-nni i tmeṭṭut-is : ‘’a tameṭṭut ad d-nawi kan acrik ad aɣ-iɛawen di lecɣel. Tenna-as: ‘’awwah ay argaz ! Ayen, zaden fell-ak aɛni isurdiyen ! Ur neḥwaǧ ara acrik. Nekk ferẓeɣ kečč tzemreḍ ad telḥuḍ. Ma yella kra n cɣel neɣ n lqeḍyan i nesɛa, ad neddukkel akken ad t-id-nexdem. Ur nessexsar ara idrimen deg wayen i nezmer ad nexdem nekni’’. Argaz ifraḥ s tririt n tmeṭṭut. Tettaṭṭaf-as afus teffɣen akken, xedmen-d cɣel-nsen. Tameddit mi ara d-iḥder ad ṭsen tettbexxir-as, tdeɛɛu Ṛebbi ad as-id-yefk tazmert d ssbeṛ u laɛqel. Argaz itebɛa-tt alammi yufa-tt d tameṭṭut itturebban, d yelli-s n tfamilt. Assen qqimen di lḥara seḥmuyen i yiṭij inṭaq ɣer-s inna-as : ‘’A tameṭṭut waqila ttwaliɣ-kem ! Telsiḍ taqendurt tazeggaɣt, teṭṭefeḍ gar yifassen-im aqerdac. Tameṭṭut ur t-tumin ara terfed, twehha-as afus-is, tesbedd sin n yiḍuden tenna-as : ‘’ay argaz acḥal da ! yerra-as-d: ‘’sin’’ Tameṭṭut tekker tesserreḥ i teɣratin, tessiɣrit, tesslewliw alammi d-iččur uxxam d tilawin. Iwweḍ lexber imawlen n teqcict-nni, ruḥen-d wwin-d yid-sen izgaren, gan tameɣra n ssebɛa n wussan d ssebɛa n lyali.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Asmi ara yettxellis umdan leɣrama ɣef wawal i d-yeqqar, ass-nni ahat ad yessiwzel iles-ines, ad yissin azal n tsusmi akked yinzi d-yeqqaren : « Awal d lfeṭṭa, tasusmi d uraɣ ».  Akken i as-yenna yiwen n umusnaw :« Awi ufan amdan ad yesɛu amegreḍ d aɣezfan am win n ulɣem ». Dɣa akka, ur d iberru ara i wawal alamma yemeḥes-it, i meyyez-it, i wezzen-it. Ad ixemmem sedis iberdan akken ahat ad d-yeffeɣ wawal deg yimi-s yecbeḥ, yesɛa anamek, yesɛa azal. Ad d-yeffeɣ yiff tasusmi, yiff uraɣ.  Yiwen yinzi yeqqar : « Awal ma ɣezzif yeffra, ma wezzil ad d-yawi ( ad d-yarew ) kra ». Ma d yiwen n umusnaw yeǧǧa-d awal, yenna : « Igenni wis sin ahat yesɛa tilas maca tiwaɣiyin n umdan ur sɛint ara tilas ».          <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   B.H          

 Tteswira-a tedda de uzeṭṭa n facebook. Win tt-yezan i yimeddukal-is isemma-as : “tudert d laxart”

  
 Acḥal aya keč tettrajuḍ ad tqefleḍ xemsa n yiseggasen. Tḥareḍ, ad d-yaweḍ wass-nni. Teqareḍ-d : ”ad uɣal d argaz !”. Atan ihi, lexmis-a yezrin gerzen-ak tameɣra deg lakul ɣer “Tata madame”. Ass-nni d tafsut, am tefsut-nni ssaramen “les adultes-nni”. Ass-ni d tafsut yIfsan, d tin ar d-snulfuḍ keč, Salas d yimecṭaḥ-agi “d-meqqin” di tudrin. Salas, yemma-k, baba-k, tiyayatin-ik, leɛmum-ik, xwal-ik … qqaren-ak : “amulli ameggaz, tafsut-ik ar sdat !!” 

  
 Axxam n lbusṭa n tγiwant n Wizgan d win i yettidiren deg acḥal n yiseggasen-aya uggur meqqren, sebba n waman n uggefur id-ikečmen s waṭas di sqef-is, xarṣum deg tallit-agi n wedfel. D ayen i yeğğan axxam n lbusṭa yettwaγlaq ddurt(agi, imi ixeddamen ur zmiren-ara ad-xedmen di tegnatin-nni. Γef aya anemhal n « Algérie Télécom » n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu mass Yaḥyaoui, yerza-d γer tγiwant n Wizgan, anda id-isefqed γef waγbel-agi i yettidir wrxxam n lbusṭa n tγiwant n Wizgan deg acḥal iseggasen-aya, syen yemlal akked uselway n tγiwant-agi mass Mourad Bessaha, anda isqardcen aγbel-agi s telqay, anda itt-gezmen di rray d akken axxam n lbusta n tγiwant n Wizgan ad-yettwaγlaq almi yella-d uṣeggem-ines, u srabes n lbusṭa uγalen s lxedma s axxam n yedles Ferrat Remdan di laεḍil ad-kfun lexedma d useggem n sqef n lbusṭa-agi deg ussan id-iteddun, imi yuγ lḥal lxedma n usenfar-agi d win i yebdan s lxedma deg ussan yzrin. Γef tagara, imezdaγ n 04 n tγiwanin tesεa dayra n Wizgan, ger-asent Wizgan, At-Zikki, Illulen n umalu akked At-Yeğğar id-itteqsaden yal ass axxam-agi n lbusṭa, sarmen akken ad-γiwlen s lxedma d ureqqaε-is, i tifrat n wugguren d usenqes n taεkkemt fell-asen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessac

  Aggni Filkan iεzel-itt Wedfel 

 Adfel id-yeγlin s tuget di ddurt-agi yezrin, d win id-yeglan s deqs n wugguren akked iγeblan, sebba n wargal n waṭas n yibardan n tudrin xarṣum tid id-yezgan γef yidurar εlayen n tmurt n lqbayel d tγaltin iεeddan 600 lmitrat. D yiwen n waγbel meqqren iwmi sḥasfen imzdaγ n taddert n Wegni Ifilkan di tγiwant n At-Zikki, imi imḍebren n tγiwant-agi ṣawḍen ldin merra ibardan n tudrin ala taddert-agi n Wegni Ifilkan, id-yezgan γef laεli n nnig 1400 lmitrat iwmi ur-ldin-ara abrid. Di tirza-nneγ γer temnaḍt At-Zikki, nemlal akked yimezdaγ n taddert Aggni Filkan id-yussan γer wexxam n tγiwant-nsen γef uḍar lḥan-d azal n 07 ikilumitren, ruḥend meẓẓi meqqar begnen-d lγiḍ-nsen s zdat n miḥyaf-agi xedmen yemḍebren n tγiwant n At-Zikki fell-asen. Mass BACHA Mohand Larbi i yettmeslayen s yisem n taddert n Weggni Ifilkan, yenna d akken aselway n tγiwant i yuggin s yimmad-is i unehar n tmacint i teksen adfel, tulya n webrid n taddert n weggni ifilkan annect-a yennat-id s zdat imazda&amp;gamma,; dayen i yernan zzit i tmes, imi lεula tekkfa. Syen nemlal akked uselway n tγiwant n At-Zikkii mass Buεlam Musawi, yenna « …Nekkukra ineldi abrid n taddert Aggni Ifilkan, imi abrid yuεar aṭas i uεeddi, imi adfel yewwet azal n lmitra d wezgen, u yezmer ad-teḥṣel tmacint…. » Maca imezdaγ n taddert Aggni Ifilkan wekkden-aγ-d d akken yella-d tulya n webrid n taddert-nsen s tmacint-agi deg seggasen yezrin mebla kra n ukkukru. Dγa sḥasfen aṭas γef miḥyaf yellan, d ccḥani yellan mgal taddert-agi. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> I.B

  
 Ass-nni n sed 05 deg unbir 2016, tella-d yiwet n temlilit i usileɣ n yiselmaden n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen n tɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu. Tannant-agi, teḍra deg uɣerbaz n Watmaten Oukal deg taddart n Azib Ahmed. Asentel n tannant, yeɛna tarrayt n uselmed s ttawil usenfar (La pédagogie de projet). Tella-d temlilit s lmendad n umaswaḍ n yiselmaden-agi, Mass Abdellah Arkoub akked sin-nniḍen n yimselɣen, Mass Bekhti Ali d Mass Hocine Moula. Ahil n wass, yebḍa d iḥricen. Yebda ɣef tesɛa n ssbeḥ, yekfa ɣef tlata n tmeddit. Deg wawal n tazwara, yemmeslay-d Mass ARKOUB ɣef usedwel n usenfar (la pédagogie de projet) akked iswi n temlilit. Ma d Mass BAKHTI, yesmekta-d amecwar n usileɣ-nsen deg useggas n 2007 netta d Mass MOULA anda i d-yenna d akken mačči d ayen isehlen akken ad truḥeḍ srid ɣer unnar. Yal wa, melmi i yezmer ad yessexdem tarrayt-a. Yesmekta-d, diɣ, d Mass MOULA i d amezwaru i iruḥen srid s annar s tebɣest. Ayagi i yeğğan Mass BEKHTI ad t-yeḍfer ula d netta akken ad yessileɣ iselmaden n tmaziɣt. Ɣef wakken i d-yesmekta, almi i iɛedda useggas segmi yebda Mass MOULA i yebda netta. Syin, walan yimunan sin n yisenfaren i xedmen yinelmaden n Mass Moula deg uɣerbaz n Tala Athmane, yiwen xedmen-t-id ɣef waman ; amek i d-ttawin aṭṭanen. Ufan-d belli d yir aman i yettruḥun srid ɣer wasif u yis-s i tessen yifellaḥen tibḥirin–nsen, mi ččan izegza d yigumma–nni yimdanen, ad helken. Segmi walan yimezdaɣ tugniwin–nni, rran aḍar wid-nni yessamasen. Ma d asenfar wis sin, wwin-t-id ɣef tmeṭṭut taqbaylit d lḥif i tesɛedda. Ruḥen yinelmaden–agi ɣer yiwet n tmeṭṭut iwumi qqaren OUARDIA. Terra-d ɣef yisestanen–nsen, tefka-asen-d isallen ɣef ccɣel i xeddment, ama deg uxxam ama di lexla : ad sewwent ; ad sirdent ; ad neqcent : ad leqḍent azemmur ; ad zḍent nneɛma s tessirt n leqbayel ; ad rebbint, ɣas akken ‘’ɣer urgaz-is d tiyita, ɣer temɣart d tiẓẓift, ɣer tmetti d tamḥeqranit’’. Taggara, tesbuɣer-asen-d. Ɣas akken d inelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas n uswir amezwaru d wis sin neɣ wis kraḍ d ukkuẓ, maca sawḍen ad d-xedmen isenfaren-agi s tugniwin, s tira, s usteqsi. Mi yekfa usenɛet n sin n yisenfaren-agi, sgunfan iselmaden ciṭ, ččan imekli lwaḥid , ddukklen am wakken ara teddukkel tasa d way turew. Uɣalen ad kemmlen askasi ɣef yisenfaren n yiselmaden, dɣa, yefka-asen Mass ARKOUB tagnit ad ferqen d igrawen am yinelmaden. Yal tarbaɛt temsefham ɣef usumer n tikta. Taggara, yal agraw yefren asenfar ara yexdem. Llan wid yextaren, ammud n tmucuha (tugnisin), llan wid yextaren lehyuf, asewwi akked useḥbiber ɣef uɣerbaz. Ɣer taggara, ṭṭfen-d tugna akken ad teqqim deg ccfawat. Iselmaden, ferḥen imi amaṣwaḍ-nsen, yefka-asen lxetyar, yerna yettkel fell-asen, yal tikkelt yisebɣas-iten. Ttiɛad-nniḍen n usileɣ, ad d-yili ass n arim 7 deg unbir 2016 deg uɣerbaz n Azib Ahmed 2. S wanect-a i ttilin yinelmaden n Tizi Uzzu d imezwura yal aseggas, imi ula d iselmaden-nsen, ttilin deffir rbeḥ-nsen, abaɛda iselmaden n tmaziɣt. ‘’Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-iban usenfar deg uselmed, d akken d ttawil i uselmed mačči d iswi kan. S ttawil usenfar, anelmad ad yeɛreḍ ad inadi ɣef tmussniwin ara yessqdec i wakken ad ireṣṣi yis-sent tizemmar-is. Yettnadi ad yerr timussniwin d tizemmar, amčči am wakken uɣen tannumi yinelmaden d leḥfaḍa i ḥefḍen timussniwin mebla asexdem-nsent, syin ad tent-rren deg ukayaḍ akken kan, am wakken d lamana i asen-yefka uselmad-nsen, rran-tt-id akken tella.’’, i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen uselmad i iḥedren i temlilit. Ad d-nesmekti belli d tarrayt-agi i textar tneɣlaft n usegmi i uselmed deg tmurt. Afud igerrzen i yiselmaden akked wid i d-yellan deg lmendad-nsen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben Yahia 

<div> 
  
 Ass-a i d ass aɣelnaw n yimeɛḍar. Ilmend-is, ddeqs n tdukkliwin tilsawiyin neɣ tinmettiyin, i d-iheggan ahilen s wazal-nsen, grawlen ɣer tecriḥt-a i yuḍnen n tmetti, ussan-a n usteɛfu n sem ed sed. Gar tdukkliwin-a ihi, tella Tdukkla Tinmettit i Yimeɛḍar ed Yimuḍan Idumen n tɣiwant « Tiɣri » n Ayt Smaɛel, akked Tdukkla taɣelnawt “Asirem Guraya“ n Bgayet. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef tmezwarut i d-iheggan aqeddic d amerkanṭi deg uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Ayt Smaɛel, ideg d-yella usiwel n tmacahut i yigerdan sɣur unalas Fares Idir, tanezzut s ubuddu n wungal Asdawan ed uḍebsi Tifrat n Mhenni Xalifi, afraq n kra n dduzan i yimeɛḍar am tɛekkazin ed tceryulin, tagnit n yisefra, rnu ɣer waya, amsizwer n usuneɣ (dessin) ɣef usentel n umeɛḍur ed twennaḍt-is. ɣer tmeddit, yella-d usarag sɣur uselway n tdukkla Tiɣri, mass Smaɛil Ɛebdun, ɣef wayen ilaqen i umeɛḍur, ed wayen mu itessra. Send ad ttunefken warrazen i yiqcicen i d-yewwin tizmilin n lɛali. Ma yella d Asirem Guraya, deg uqerruy-is mass Ɛmer Rabḥi, ɣas deg yiḥricen nniḍen i tqeddec ugar, wanag tezzi-d ssebt-a yezrin ɣer umeɛḍur, mi tga tiwizi akked tdukkla Awrir n Usalu n At Ǧlil, akken ad smersen ahil-nsen. Gar wayen i gant, tella-d tirzi lwaḥi ed yimeɛḍar ɣer kra n yimeḍqan, asenɛet n temzikknin, amsizwer n usuneɣ i warrac n taddart-nni, tuẓut n yisekla akked yimeɛḍar, yiwet n tsaragt s uzwel n « Tigzi n tiɛudert i yibeddi yelhan ». Rnu ɣer-s, tikci n warrazen ɣer taggara i warrac imeɛḍar.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Mhenni Xalifi 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 I lmend n yiremad n waddal i d-yettheggi ugraw n waddal, yettwassnen s yisem n “Kick boxing” n taddart n Akaoudj, ihegga-d kra n temliliyin deg ṣṣenf-agi n waddad. Llant-d temliliyin-agi ass-nni n sem 23 seg waggur-agi n yunyu ideg nella, bdan yimenɣiyen s wudem unṣib ɣef 21h30 n yiḍ deg umraḥ n uɣerbaz amenzu n umeɣras Mohammed Amenache 1, imi llan sin yiɣerbazen imenza deg taddart-agi n Akaoudj. D tagnit ideg i d-seknen yinaddalen-agi ayen akk ssnen i yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi d tuddar i d as-id-yezzin.

   A. A. 

  
 Ayen akken yezgel uɣerbaz azzayri deg uhuddu n yidles n tmurt n leqbayel, kkren-as-d ixemmasen n Wat Ṭṭlam i wakken ad t-snegren. Imi ula d Rebbi d ayla-nsen, ihi, yeshel usedrem yis-s : awal sin ad ak-inin ‘’ad nezreɛ awal n Rebbi’’. 

 Mebɛed mi ḥellen ayen i asen-yehwan u ḥermen ayen ur neffiɣ ara fell-asen, neɣ ɛad ayen xeddmen s tuffra deg temdinin, deggren-d, deg tallit-a, tilisa n tudrin i wakken ad ssiɣen times-nsen deg-sent. Mebɛed mi ḥermen idles deg uxxam n yidles n Bgayet, ussan-d ad ḥellen lebni n yiwen uɣerbaz n leqran deg Ait Abdelmoumene. Acu kan, akken yebɣu yili lḥal, mazal irgazen deg tudrin n yiqbayliyen. Mazal wid ifehmen s anida teddunt temsal, mazal wid yettxemmimen ɣef uzekka n tmurt. Akka, dɣa, i d-kkren yimezdaɣ n taddart n Ait Abdelmoumene mgal lebni n yiwen uɣerbaz n leqran deg taddart-nsen. Deg yiwen ulɣu i d-ssufɣen ass-nni n 29 deg yunyu, nnan-d d akken asenfar am wa ur yelli gar lexsas n yimezdaɣ imi sɛan sin leǧwameɛ imeqqranen yakan. Ɣef wakken d-nnan, taddart-nsen teḥwaǧ ayen-nniḍen. 22 n yimelyaren n uɣebaz-a, zemren ad xedmen isenfaren-nniḍen ara inefɛen imdanen yeddren. Kemmlen sḥassfen yimezdaɣ-a.

 Ihi, i lmend n waya, tennejmaɛ taddart, xelqen-d yiwet n tesqamut ara d-yezgen mgal asenfar-a. Tasqamut-a teṭṭalab deg yal amezdaɣ i wakken ad yili mgal lebni n uɣerbaz-a imi ẓran d akken iswi n lebni dayen-nniḍen : iswi n wid yellan deffir n usenfar, d asenger n yidles akked tutlayt n yiqbayliyen ; d aṛeṣṣi n taɛrabt akked leɛwayed n Suɛudiya. Ihi, akken i as-yenna winna-nneɣ : ‘’nɛemmed ad negrent tudrin wala ad yenger laṣel.’’ Ipisitu.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Deg wayen yellan deg wahil n wid akk iḥemmlen awal ed uqeddic adelsan ; d imedyazen, d imeɣnasen, d iselmaden neɣ d wiyaḍ, tettwamdel ass n 8 n ɣuct yezrin tfaska n tmedyezt tamaziɣt Smaɛil Azikiw deg At Ziki, i d-yellan, ad t-id-nesmekti, ddaw leɛnaya n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa. Ad d-nerr awellih dakken tella-d temlilit-a n usqerdec adelsan deg urebbi n kraḍ n wussan, s wahil i nezmer ad d-nini yelha, imi send asnubget n yimekkiyen, akked wawalen n teldayt sɣur kra n wudmawen, gar-asen mass Aziri Buǧemɛa, anemhal deg unadi deg usqamu-ya i d-nebder, tɛedda-d talilt n Tdukkla Smaɛil Azikiw ɣer usayes. Syinna, mettwal 16sr n tmeddit yella-d uttḥesses i yizlan ed yicewwiqen, i d-ssawlent kra n tlawin n taddart n War. Kra n wakud akken, yemmug usarag-askasi s usentel n «Tudert ed umecwar n Smaɛil Azikiw», sɣur Musawi Amuqqran, d abugaṭu, d amnadi deg tesnilest tamezrayt. Mi yewweḍ usrag ahaqel-it d 21sr n yiḍ, sneɛten-d yilemẓiyen n umezgu n Yiferḥunen taceqquft s uzwel «Yenna-yi-d Jeddi». 

 Deg wass wis sin, nnig n umsizwer n tmedyezt seg usteɛfu ɣer wayeḍ gar 40 n yimzilen n wawal i yettekkan, tettwasuddes ṭṭabla timezdit sɣur tesqamut n yinezzurfa, Aziri Buǧemɛa ed Kahina Azi, ɣef «timawit ed tsekla taqburt». Segmi telḥeq 21sr almi tɛedda 22sr, llant-d snat n tceqqufin n umezgun sɣur Xaled ed Dalila tazwara akked warrac n Yiferḥunen deg tis snat, umu semman «Iḥerraqen».

 Deg wass aneggaru, iga-d umazray ed umnadi Ferrad Mḥ Arezqi yiwen n usarag s wazal-is ɣef «Tamedyezt n Smaɛil Azikiw». Syin akkin ttwaberrḥen-d yismawen n yimedyazen i d-yufraren, imi dɣa d agmuḍ-a i d-ibanen: arraz amezwaru i t-yewwin d Cili Lila, arraz wis sin yettwaccelqef s yifassen n tmedyezt n Buciba Fatiḥa, ma yella d wis kraḍ iḥella-t-id umedyaz Xeṭṭabi Ḥmed, seg waɣir n Bumerdas. Mi ttunefken dayen warrazen i d-yeggran ihi ala tamdelt, ɣas ma deg yiḍ n wass-nni gedged, sbeɛzqen lḥala kra n yinaẓuren yecban Ṭaleb Ṭaher, Rabeḥ Uferḥat, Ḥarzi Ḥusin akked Mestafa.

 «Ad d-iniɣ tɛdda tfaska-ya di tegnatin igerrzen. D timlilit ideg yuzzel wawal ɣef yisental mgerraden. Akken diɣen ad d-iniɣ tajmilt d tamuqqrant i yimezdaɣ n taddart Tawrirt n War i d-yefkan Mebla cceḥa ma d ljehd neɣ d akud, neɣ d ttawilat nniḍen ilmend n tfaska-yagi. Mazal lxir ar sdat… ad tidir yemma-tneɣ i yellan d taqbaylit, d tamaziɣt. Tuklal ugar n wayen nexdem». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna Ǧilali Ḥadduc, aselway n Tddukla Tadelsant Smaɛil Azikiw.

 D asmekti kan ɣef umḍan ageɛmir n tfaskiwin n tmedyezt uɣur i d-ssawlent aṭas n tdukkliwin ed tamiwin, am tin n Udrar n Fad, tin n At Wasif, tin n Tubiret, tin n Yicekkaben, tafaska-ya n At Ziki, tinna n Yiflisen Umellil, tin n At Jennad, akked tin ara d-ileḥqen deg ukuẓ n wayyuren: tafaska n Uqbu, ma yella ur nettu daɣen tiyaḍ…

 Taggara n yimalas yezrin, M.Cherifi, lwali n Tubiret isers-d ɣer unnar n uskasi taluft yerzan aman deg yiwet n temlilit ideg i d-yesdukkel imḍebbren n twilayt. Aḥric-a, yettmagaren iɣeblan mačči d kra yella-d fell-as umeslay anda imḍebber n Tubiret inuda ad iẓer aẓar n tlufa d wamek ara d-yaf tifrat ara yessuzfen lḥif n fad ɣef yimezdaɣ n tamiwin yemgaraden. D tamnaḍt n Ain Bessem i yettwaddmen d amedya. Deg-s i d-iban lixsas meqqren imi d tin yesɛan ḥala yiwen lmexzen yettawin azal n wagim (1000 m3 ) mi akken tuḥwaǧ azal n (6000m3) i wass. Lixsas-a d win yesɛewqen tudert i yimezdaɣ yezgan ccektayen yal tikkelt. Ulamma aman ttasen-d seg ubaraǧ n Kudiat Aserdun s yiwet n tesmekta iqadden, maca fad yezdaɣ ixxamen. Deg tama-nniḍen, anda aman ttasen-d s ṭṭaqa deg Saharidj, imi lɛinser aberkan yettfeggiḍ am unebdu am tegrest, deg Tqerbust ctaqen medden tiqqit zeddigen. Dɣa, d ayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ-is medlen tiwwura n tɣiwant ass n temlilit-a i wakken ad ssutren aman n tissit. S kra n tuttriwin i d-yefka lwali i yimḍebber n uḥric-a n waman, tiririyin zgant idel-itent kra n wagu, imi aman llan maca ur wwiḍen ara ɣer yimezdaɣ. Iɣisi n lixsas meqqer mačči d ayen ara yessedreg cɣel meẓẓiyen, imi d tadrimt tameqrant i ilaqen ad tettwaheggi mi akken liḥala n tmurt tessutur leḥder deg umeṣruf. Lḥasun, aḥric-a yeḥwaǧen aseggem d ureqqeɛ yesɣuluf mačči d kra imi M.Cherifi yenwa ad yili deg lmendad i yimezdaɣ. Iwulem, daɣ, ad d-nesmekti d akken tamsalt-a n waman, kkren-d yimezdaɣ n la Crête-Rouge deg tɣiwant n Leɛǧiba uqbel kan kra n wussan ad iruḥ lwali Nacer Maâskri anda ssutren i wakken taddart-nsen ad tt-id-iṣaḥ uḥric-is seg waman n ubaraǧ n Tilesdit. Taddart-a, i d-yezgan azal n yiwen n ukilumiter ɣef ubaraǧ-a, ar ass-a ur tt-id-ṣaḥen ara waman-is mi akken timnaḍin ibeɛden neɣ ahat tiwilayin yecban M’sila d Bordj wwint aḥric-nsent. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail. M 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 I lmend n wass agraγlan n tutlayt n tyemmat (21 furar), Tiddukla Tigemmi n Tefrit, tessewjed-d sin yisaragen , i d-yellan ddurt iɛeddan, deg tnarit n tiddukla, deg taddart n Tefrit, deg Uqbu. Asarag amezwaru, iga-t Mass Larbi Yahioun, (aselmad – amaru), γef wazal n uselmed s tutlayt n tyemmat d usudder n teqbaylit deg unnar n tsekla d tussna. Deg wawal-is, yenna-d dakken “Tutlayt tamezwarut i ilaq ad nesselmed i ugrud, d tutlayt-is n tyemmat. Acku, yekker-d deg-s, u nettat tekcem deg-s send talalit. Ilemmed-itt u yettmeslay-itt s wudem agaman, war uguren, xas ur yessin ara tajerrumt-is d yilugan-is. Yerna ur yezmir ara ad yegzu neɣ ad yissin tutlayin-nniḍen ma yella ur yessin ara tutlayt n tyemmat i yellan d aḥric agejdan seg tudert-is d yidles-is.” Seld mi d-yessegza, s wudem asensegmi, tixutert i tesɛa tutlayt n tyemmat deg uselmed d usedwel (ttrebga) s umata, yezzi Mass Yahioun γer uẓayer asertan n tutlayt taqbaylit d umḍiq i teṭṭef deg tmetti, ladγa γer yimsiwal-is d uswir-is n ufares, ama deg taγult n tsekla, ama deg taγult n tussna. Ibder-d izwal n kra n yidlisen d yimawalen ussnanen uzzigen i d-yeffγen s teqbaylit (aṭas n medden ur ten-ẓrin ara), amedya :

 Amawal n tussnakt, tasɣunt Tafsut, uṭ. 4, Tizi Wezzu, 1984.

 Amawal n tfizikt tatrart n Dahman Mazed, Tiẓrigin asafu, 2003.

 Amawal n tussniwin n wakal n Yidir Ahmed Zayed, HCA, 2004.

 Amawal n tsenselkimt n Samia Saad Bouzefrane, 2004.

 Amawal n tussniwin n ugama n Omar Kerdja, HCA-ANEP, 2006.

 Iɣsan s teqbaylit, (Vocabulaire kabyle de l’ostéologie et de l’orthopédie) n Mohamed Zakaria Benramdane, HCA, 2010…

 <span style="text-align: justify;">S wakka i d-yefka ttbut dakken taqbaylit d tutlayt n tussna, tezmer i yiman-is am nettat am tutlayin-nniḍen yellan deg umaḍal. Maca, ilaq kan imussnawen-nneγ ad d-kecmen s annar-a n tussna akken ad tennerni u ad temhaz ugar. Asarag wis sin, iga-t Mass Muḥend BELQACEM, (amuzzig deg tsenselkimt d tetiknulujit). Netta, yuwi-d awal γef wayen i zemrent ad d-awint tetiknulujiyin timaynutin i teqbaylit d wazal n usekcem n tutlayt-nneγ deg Web. Mass Belqasem, yezzi-d awal γef tixutert n usekcem n teqbaylit deg umaḍal umḍin (monde numérique) d tmental i t-yeǧǧan akken ad yerr lwelha-s γer leqdic-a, imi yenna-d dakken ‘’tutlayt ur nekcim ara deg taγult-a n tsenselkimt, ur tezmir ara ad tennerni’’. Dγa ibder-d kra n yiswan n usideg s teqbaylit, gar yiswan-a yuder-d : Asnerni d usnulfu n umawal n teqbaylit (amawal atikniki), amedya : iseγzanen (logiciels), ifecka (outils), isnasen (applications), amassal (format), tuqqna (connexion), asizzel d usudder n teqbaylit deg uẓeṭṭa (Firefox, Skype, Facebook…), asnulfu n yiḍrisen ussnanen/itiknikiyen ara yesselmed uselmad i yinelmaden-is deg uγerbaz, ladγa imi ulac iḍrisen yeqqnen γer taγult-a. Syin, yefka-d isenfaren i iwejden, zemren medden ad ten-id-zedmen u ad ten-sqedcen am (Mozilla Firefox, Evernote, oppensource, skype …) akked yisenfaren i mazal xeddmen deg-sen, ttkemmilen-ten am (Libreoffice, Linux …). Ayen i yessefraḥen ugar, mi ara neḥsu dakken gar n 6000 n tutlayin yellan deg umaḍal, ahil n Mozilla Firefox yella kan s 45 n tutlayin, u gar-asent tella teqbaylit. Ula d ahil Mozilla Focus i d-yennulfan deg useggas-a 2017, yella akka imir-a s 27 kan tutlayin, u taqbaylit tella gar-sent. Γer taggara n usarag, iger-d tiγri akken Iqbayliyen ad sqedcen allalen-a, akken ad sen-fken tudert, acku ma ur ten-sseqdacen ara, ad qqimen kan deg tesga amzun ulac-iten. Ihi axeddim ameqqran yettwaxdam, ilaq kan ad teddu tmetti d temhazt n tutlayt taqbaylit i yettnernin gar yiḍ d wass, acku tutlayt i tt-ixeddmen d imawlan-is mačči d wiyaḍ.</span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yugurten At Wejɛud 

  
 Am yal asḍisyur, yessufuɣ-d Uḥuddu Aɣarim (Protection Civile) n waɣir n Bgayet ulɣu aɣamsan ideg i d-yettawi isallen ɣef yineḍruyen i d-yettilin seg tallit ɣer tayeḍ. Dɣa, deg win i d-berrḥen ussan-a yezrin, llan-d s umata 6654 n tuffɣiwin sɣur yirgazen-is n usellek. Ma yella d leḥsabat n yisehwa (accidents) n yiberdan, wwḍen ɣer 403. Seg-sen selken azal n 447 n yimejraḥ, ideg tuget d irgazen, mmuten 9 nniḍen. Ɣer tama n tnezduɣin d tudrin n yakk aɣir n Bgayet, ḍran-d ugar n 193 n yindaren n tmes. Maca tiḥerci n yirgazen n usellek n Uḥuddu Aɣarim, teǧǧa ad d-neqsent xersum txessar. Deg wayen yeɛnan tiwaɣiyin i d-iḍerrun akkin i berra, gar tɣelyawt deg yimeḍqan n uxeddim d wayen-nniḍen, ttwajerden ugar n 554 n yisellken war ma yella-d d ameẓyan umḍan n usaɛef n yimuḍan ɣer tzeɣwa n udawi, imi yesqer ɣer 3176 n tuffɣiwin. Ma nga aserwes (taqrint) gar usḍisyur-a d win n yilindi 2016, ad naf zadent aseggas-a akk twaɣiyin i d-iḍerrun. Ilaq ihi aṭas n uḥezzeb d uḥader. 

 M. K.

  
 Tanemhalt n uxxam n yidles Lmudud At Mεemmer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, Massa Kemmar Dalila, tberḥ-d belli yelli yiwen n usikew ajdid tiwwura-s seg wussan-agi iεeddan i uselmed n yiderɣalen. Deg-s ad asen-sfehmen amek i d-yettili usexdem n uselkim s ttawil n tira n “Braille”. Ajred yebda yakkan ass-nni n ttlata 7 deg waggur-agi n furar ideg nella. Ad d-yettili deg usikew-agi, yiwet n tikkelt i ddurt uselmed n linfurmatik d wayen icudden akk ɣur-s. Iswi n usikew-agi d aseḥfeḍ i taggayt-agi n yimuḍan amek ara seddun aselkim, s ttawil ara sen-yesishilen i wakken daɣen ad ddun d lwaqt-agi n wallalen itiknulujiyen itraren. Dɣa ɣef wayagi tenna-d Massa Kemmar Dalila: “nessaram asikew-agi ajdid ad d-yawin iseɣ d ubaɣur i yimdanen-agi ur nettwali ara, imi ula d nutni sεan azref deg ulmud, deg usnerni n tussniwin-nsen, ladɣa tura mi yuɣal umaḍal d taddart, ula d nutni zemren ad yewlen (communiqué) akked umaḍal merra.”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ghani Adaoun  

<div> 
  
 Krad n yitran i yettfeǧǧiǧen deg yigenni ,ǧǧan-d ismawen nsen deg umezruy axaṭar mgaraden ɣef wiyaḍ s waṭas n tɣawsiwin . Nutni,ɣran,ssnen aṭas n tutlayin .Wiyaḍ, ur ssinen yiwet. Nutni, ssnen ad cnun, ad arun ungalen, idlisen,inzan,isefra,timucuha…

 Wiyaḍ ,ulac d acu i d-yurew wallaɣ nsen anagar tismin d lebɣeḍ .

 Nutni, d imasiḥiyen, xedmen ddin s tsusmi.Wiyaḍ ,d inselmen ,s aɛlayen ṣṣut nsen .Asmi i ḥulfan i yiman nsen d iɣriben di tmurt nsen, unagen ɣer tmura tiberraniyin.

 Faḍma at Menṣur tlul deg at Dwala , di 1882.Tezweǧ d Belqasem Ɛemruc n Iɣil Aɛli ,di 1899.Di 1910,ruḥen ɣer Tunes.Zedɣen di temdint n Rades. Di 1946,Faḍma tura adlis s wezwel : «tadyant n tudert-iw» .

 Maca ,ur d-yeffiɣ ara armi d 1968.Temmut di 1967 di Fransa ,di tudert-is 85 iseggasen. Argaz-is Belqasem yemmut deg Iɣil Aɛli ,di 1959.

 Lmuhub illul di 1906.Yura ammud n isefra : «iɣden»di 1934.Yura diɣen «itri uffir»di 1937.Di 1939,yura «cnawi imaziɣen di temnaḍt n leqbayel».Di 1958 ,ixdem d aneɣmas di RTF,di Fransa.Di 1946,yura «yugurten i lebda» . Yemmut di 1962, di Fransa .

 Ïṭawes tlul di 1913 , di Tunes .Di 1936,tebda tleqqeḍ cnawi it tɣenni yemma-s. Di 1941,tezweǧ d unaẓur Andre Burdil .Tesɛa-d yides Laurence. Di 1945 ,truḥ ɣer Fransa .D inna,texdem di RTF gar 1959 d 1963. Di 1947,tura ungal «imɣi aberkan» .Di 1960,tura «abrid iḍeballen».Di 1966, tura «aɛeqqa yesawalen» .Tewwi aḍebsi n wewraɣ di 1967. Di 1975, tura «amdakkel usugen» .Tjemɛed azal n 95 cnawi .Tecna ɣef umdan di dduḥ alama d aẓẓekka .Temmut di 1976 di Fransa.

 Faḍma ,Lmuhub d Ïṭawes ɛetben aṭas akken ad smenɛen idles amaziɣ di tatut .Uklalen tajmilt Sgunfut di tawit d lehna ! 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Boussad Hemmar  

  
 Ihi, nnan-as ad tt-nεass. Ṛğan-tt armi tṛuḥ, tebεen-itt s deffir, ffren-as. Tṛuḥ γer teγzut anda tkess lmal, slan-as amek i la tcennu. Nnan-as: « Ndeεεa-kem s Ṛebbi ar d aγ-d-tiniḍ d acu-kem a lxelq-agi ? ». Teḥka-asen-d tamacahut si tazwara am wakka i tt-id-nessawel. Yiwen deg-sen ur tt-yumin ara, yenna: « Efk-aγ-d ttbut belli d uletma-tneγ ay telliḍ mačči d taklit ». Tessawel i uεeqqa yessawalen, yaweḍ-itt-id imir-n. Ddan yid-s sakin armi d tala-nni n tḥerṛiyin, tessared deg-s, tuγal-d am zik-is. εeqlen-tt akk watmaten-is deg wudem-is, tcuba yemma-tsen, dγa umnen, feṛḥen yakk yis-s. Ddmen kkren-as s teγrit i taklitt-nni armi tettfuḥu, uγalen-d sakin d uletma-tsen s axxam. Mi d-wwḍen, imawlan-nsen, ula anda ad ak-gen a lfeṛḥ, gan tameγra n sebεa wussan d sebεa waḍan. Armi iεedda lḥal, zzuγren-d Sstut-nni seg ucebbub-is, nnan-as i uletma-tsen: « D acu ara am-yeqqden tasa?». Tenna-asen: « Sukket-tt-id i sebεa tẓegwa n yiwaγezniwen d sebεa temqebrin ar temmet. Afus-is ad ttεemmiṛen yis-s iγiγden, aḍar-is ad t-geγ d tamezzirt ad ssufuɣen yis-s leγbar si tzuliγt, ma d aqerru-s ad t-geγ d inyen. Ddmen, xedmen-as akken i Sstut. Uγalent akk Sstutat ceεfent. Ma d nitni yegra-asen-d liser, ddren di lehna armi mmuten. Ha-t-an wamek tella tmacahut n uεeqqa yessawalen. Tamacahut-iw lwad lwad sawleγ-tt-id i warraw n leğwad Uccanen ad ten-yeqqed Ṛebbi Ma d nekni ad aγ-yeεfu Ṛebbi Ad ntett irden n ukufi Ma d wid n teylut ur ten-nufi.

  seg tgemmi n teqbaylit 

  
 Gar-aγ d kra n lweqt, tarbaεt IDEFLAWEN ad d-tessufeγ yiwen n Album  mebεed mi teqqim ugar n 10 n yiseggasen mebla ma yella-d ujdid.   Nemlal acennay n terbaεt-agi, Ali, deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mεemmri n Tizi Uzzu anda yella d inebgi n tedwilt ‘’Awal i unaẓiur’’ i d-yettheggi yal aggur Slimane Belharet, newwi-d ula d nekni awal yid-s γef kra n yisental: Album-agi-ines ajdid, ccna amḥaddi gar zik d tura, tizlit taqbaylit di berra d wayen-nniḍen…

  Azul a Ali, yella ujdid ? 

 Ajdid yella acḥal-ayagi ulamma, d ṣṣaḥ, aṭas-aya ur d-nessufeγ ara : ugar n 10 n yiseggasen. Ur neẓri ara ma d asteεfu neγ d iseggasen-nni iberkanen i nesεedda ! Akken yebγu yili, tella dima ssebba acu kan, tarbaεt n IDEFLAWEN ur teḥbis ara ccna u nxeddem timeγriwin dima.

  Isental n tezlatin-agi timaynutin. 

 Am wakken nuγ tannumi, yella ciṭ sya u sya : tajmilt i Muḥend U Yaḥya, i Meksa, asmekti n tgejda n umennuγ γef tmaziγt deg umussu aγelnaw, gar-asen Laïmeche. Mačči d tayri kan weḥd-s. Ad ğğeγ wid ara as-yeslen ad smeḥsen…

  Γef ccna-agi amḥadi (chanson engagée), dγa, d acu twalaḍ gar zik d tura ? 

 Ccna amḥadi gar zik d tura neγ rbeε n lqern akka γer deffir. Mi ara d-nini ccna amḥaddi, mačči kan d ccna aserti. Ma necna γef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut, nekk γur-i d ccna amḥaddi. Ma necna γef wuguren n tmetti, d ccna amḥaddi. Acu imir i nettḥussu kter s yisental-a wama tura. Akka tura, ad nesḥissef imi d wid isellen i yettaken afud i ucennay. D nutni i d-yessifriren win bγan : ma bγan ccna n cḍeḥ, ad yili,ma bγan wayeḍ, ad yili. 

  Kečč yellan d iminig, ameki d-tettwaliḍ tamurt n leqbayel ? 

 Wagi d asteqsi yelhan mliḥ axater ma tebγiḍ ad twaliḍ axxam-ik akken ilaq,ruḥ mebεid, wali-t-id. Mi ara nili di tmurt, am wakka nella ass-agi, yezmer ur nettḥussu ara i lxilaf nettεeci zik akked tura. Alamma neffeγ γer berra i d-nettwali amgarad i yellan gar tmurt-nneγ akked tmura tiberraniyin i yuẓen γer sdat.

  D acu ara d-tiniḍ, ihi, γef tezlit taqbaylit di berra ? 

 Tizlit neγ ccna aqbayli yettwassen di ddunit merra. Ad d-nefk d amedya Idir, ulac anda ur yecni ara,inuda-d amadal d tirni.

  Nnan-d d akken s tezlit-ik i yettwamḍel Kateb Yacine, d tidet ? 

 D ayen yellan, d tidet. Mi t-newwi γer uẓekka-s, nteddu ncennu tizlit ‘’Eğğet-aγ abrid ad nεeddi…’’

  Am wakken i d-nnan, daγen, Mulud Mεemmri iḥemmel mliḥ tizlit-a. 

 Akka. Mi t-steqqsan γef tezlit n ucennay i iḥemmel mliḥ, yenna-asen d tinna n Ideflawen ‘’Eğğet-iyi abrid ad εeddiγ…’’

  Txulḍeḍ aṭas Muḥya, anwi icennayen i t-iqurben mliḥ ? 

 Wid ixulḍen mliḥ Muḥya, yella Idir, Ferhat akked Ideflawen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Awal aneggaru. 

  Nessaram taqbaylit ad taẓ γer sdat. 

  Yesteqsa-t : Hocine.M 

  
 Ha-t-an d aseggas wis 9 segmi i teṭṭef Tizi Uzzu amḍiq amezwaru deg yikayaden, ladγa winna n BAC.

 Aṭas n wawal i d-yellan u mazal yettili-d γef lesrar n waya. Kra, gan-t d ise&amp;gamma,; kra, rran-t d abluleγ. Aṭas i as-yennan, deg yiseggasen-nni iεeddan, d akken igemmaḍ i d-wwin yinelmaden n Tizi Uzzu, ur ten-uklalen ara, imi, γef wakken i d-qqaren, usan-d s txidas akked tkerkas mačči s tzemmar n warrac. Γef wanect-a, dγa, ula d adabu, icuk ciṭ. Yal aseggas, ad d-ceyyεen imeyyaten n yimaṣwaḍen i wakken ad εassen iγerbazen anda sεeddayen yinelmaden. Acu kan, mi yuγalen yineggura-a γer Lezzayer tamanaγt, nnan-asen : « Tettwaḥras tεessit deg Tizi Uzzu ugar n lwilayat-nniḍen. Ihi, mačči daya i d ssebba ». Am wakka, deg lweqt i ilaq ad walin amek teddun lecγal deg unnar i wakken ad leqmen ciṭ n tmussni, kra nwizligen, lhan-d, am leεwayed-nsen, la fettin. Neεreḍ, ad d-nessifrir, s yiwet n tsestant, kra n tririyin γef lesrar i yeğğan inelmaden n Tizi Uzzu ad ttaṭṭafen, yal tikkelt, amḍiq amezwaru. Deg temsalt am ta, llan, ma drus, 3 n yiḥricen i yesεan assaγ akked uγerbaz : imdanen (inelmaden, iselmaden, imḍebbren d yimawlan) ; tarrayin d wahilen n uselmed akked timetti. Seg tama n yimḍebbren, nnan-d d akken « lesrar n yigemmaḍ-a icudd γer lxedma igerrzen i idummen deg uḥric-agi n usegmi deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu », imi γef wakken i d-nnan, ixeddam-sen, xeddmen seg wul d nneyya. Seg tama n yiselmaden, amur ameqqran, walan d akken sseqdacen tarrayin iwulmen deg uselmed-nsen. Fehmen, di&amp;gamma,; akken iwata ahil i sseqdacen. Rnu, γef wakken i d-nnan, temlilin yiselmaden deg yigrawen anda i d-yettili leqdic gar-asen. Seg tama n yinelmaden, aṭas i yeḥsan s leqraya d nettat i d tasarut n yimal-nsen. Aya, ur d-yekki ara kan akka, imi segmi i d-kkren ttweṣsin-ten yimawlan-nsen γef leqraya. Ihi, tuγal-asen d tisirit mebla ma faqqen yis-s. Seg tama n tarrayin n uselmed, ad naf amur ameqqran n yiselmaden, ttnadin i yiman-nsen γer tarrayin timaynutin i d-yettnulfun deg tmura yeṭṭfen taqacucut. Aṭas, daγen, i iḥeddren i yal tannant n usileγ i yetilin i lmend-nsen, ama seg tama n uγlif n usegmi, ama seg tama n tdukliwin n yiselmaden imi qrib yal tanga tesεa yiwet n tdukla. Seg tama n wahil, ad naf tizmilin n tutlayin-agi, tamaziγt, tafransist akked teglizit, ufraren-tent nezzeh γef tid n lwilayat-nniḍen. Aya irennu-d deg yigemmaḍ n yikayaden. « Nezmer ad d-nini, d akken tamaziγt weḥd-s, tesnerna s waṭas igemmaḍ-a, imi qrib akk inelmaden, ttawin-d tizmilin igerrzen nezzeh deg-s », akka i aγ-d-yenna yiwen umaswaḍ n tmaziγt n Tizi Uzzu. Ma seg tama n yimawlan, ad naf leqraya n dderya-nsen, tezwar kulci. « Γur-i, leqraya n warraw-iw d nettat i d tamezwarut. Ad stehziγ deg yal tama, acu kan seg tama-a, ulac tmesxir. Ad qqimeγ i laẓ i wakken ad d-aγeγ ayen ilaqen i leqraya. Ad dduγ ḥafi i wakken ad sseγreγ arraw-iw », akka i aγ-d-yerra yiwen ubabat mi i t-nestaqsa γef leqraya n dderya-s. Netta iwalan d akken yal leqdic ara yexdem uqbayli, ixeddem-it akken iwata, akken i as-iwulem, imi lxedma d iseγ akked trugza, yufa-tt-id d lεada γer yimezwura. Ula d tiseqquma akked tdukliwin n tudrin, lehhunt-d deg uεiwen n uheggi n yikayaden. Akka ara naf imekwan i d-yettwaheggan i uselmed n yinelmaden sγur inelmaden n tamawin-nni, yerna baṭel. Akken yebγu yili, wagi d agzul kan amecṭuḥ γef wamek i d-yettili uselmed deg tama-agi n Tizi Uzzu, wamag mazal timsal-nniḍen i yeεnan iḥricen-nniḍen, ama seg tama n yiselmaden, n yinelmaden neγ n tmetti. Mi ara nwali inelmaden n kra n tamawin, la ttẓallan s ufella n ṭṭablat daxel uγerbaz yal mi ara yedden cix, neẓra aṭas seg wahil-nsen ara asen-iruḥen. Mi ara nẓer acḥal n yiselmaden i yeffγen d irebraben s amadaγ deg yiseggasen-nni n 1990, γef wakken i d-yenna Mohamed Harbi i yellan d aneγlaf s ddaw Boudiaf, ad nefhem tarrayt d wahil i ḍeffren yiselmaden am wi. Mi ara tafeḍ deg tesnawit yecba tinna Wergla anda ula d yiwen gar 44 n yinelmaden i yesεeddan, ur d-yewwi akayad n BAC, ad tfehmeḍ timsal. Imawlan n yinelmaden n tesnawit-a, rran-tt akka tura imi ifut lḥal, γef lexsas n ttawilat. Ur ḥsan ara d akken inelmaden n Bujimaε deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i d-yezgan deg umḍiq amezwru n BAC deg wakal n Lezzayer, ur sεin ara tasnawit. Llan qqaren deg yiγerbazen ilemmasen mi akken i ttεawaden lebni n tesnawit-nsen.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Deqs n leqdicat id-ittewhegan γef dema n wass agreγlan n tlelli n tγamsa, id-yettuγalen yal ass n 03 maggu di yal seggas, di yal tamurt n umaḍal. Dγa imḍebren n 03 n yexxamen n yelmeẓyen n temnaḍt n Wizgan, wigi d axxam n yelmeẓyen Aziri Mḥend n tγiwant n At-Zikki, axxam n yelmeẓyen Chellah Mohand n tγiwant n Wizgan akked uxxam n yelmeẓyen n tγiwant n Yillulen n umalu sudesen-d yiwen n leqdic s wazal-is ilmend n wass agreγlan n tlelli n tγamsa deg wexxamn yelmeẓyen Aziri Mḥend n tγiwant n At-Zikki, s yiwen n wahil d amesbaγur,anda i rran tajmilt i yineγmasen n temnaḍt n Wizgan sumata.

 Leqdic-agi yella-d s leḥdur n twacult n tγawsa d yimawlan-nsen, imḍebren n 03 n yexxamen n yelmeẓyen n temnaḍt n Wizgan, imḍebren n tγiwant n At-Zikki Ddeqs n yinebgawen n lḥerma. Dγa deg ahil n leqdic, llant-d cnawi s trebuεa n yelmeẓyen, tinigiyin n yinaγmasen d twaculin-nsen, syen tella-d tikci n yigardasen d warazen n usebyes i yineγmasen, anda i rnan afud d ubaḥri i turett i twacult n tγamsa.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Aγiwan n tusniwin n talsa d tid n tmetti, n tsedawit n Lmulud n At-Mεemmar n Tizi-Wezzu di tama n Tamda, yessudes-d ass n 21 yennayer ideg nella, yiwet n temlilit n unadi γef lfayda id- wwint tdukliwin i iqedcen deg aḥricn tmetti i warac imaεder. Leqdic-agi yella-d s tallelt n 02 n tdukliwin n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu i iqedcen deg annar-agi n tmetti, tigi d tiddukla n yimaεdar d yemddukal-nsen (AHLA)n temnaḍt n Wizgan akked tiddukla n warac imaεdar n At-Umalu tamnaḍt n At-Yiraten. timlilit tesddurit-id tzeqqa n leqdicat n tseddawit n Tamda,anda iḥedren deqs n yinelmaden d ttnelmadin, iselmaden d iεeggalen n tdukliwin n tmetti. Mass Lamara Muḥamed Smaεil aselmad deg uγiwen n tusniwin n talsa d tid n tmetti, i ittewxeṣen deg umsali « lahdur », yemeslayed γef assaγen n tdukliwin n tmetti d lfayda s wayes id-glant i warac imaεdar, anda i yessaḥres deg yinelmaden n tagara n wulmud, wi yebγan ad-xedmen inadiyen-nsen γef lexṣas n yimaεder akken ad-qesden tiddukliwin n tmetti, akken ad-aggmen di tmusni. Aselway n tiddukla n yimaεder d yemddukal-nsen n temnaḍt n Wizgan,mass Saεid Hammoum, akked d mass Rezzik Muḥend Akli yemeslayen-d γef ahil n tdukliwin-nsen, amezruy d umecwar id-wwint. Syen Baya hammoum, tamarayt tamatant n tiddukla n yimaεder d yemddukal-nsen n temnaḍt n Wizgan, temeslayed γef yisenfaren ixedmen akked tdukliwin n tmurt n Lzzayer akked tigreγlanin d lfayda id-wwin. Iswi n temlilit-agi dasebγes n leqdic ger tdukliwin d tsedawiyin, itifrat n wugguren id-ttmagaren yal ass imaεder, akken ad-lemden di tegnatin yelhan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Deg unebdu-nni, akken kan i ifuk waggur n Remḍan, yewwi-d baba lkunji. Dɣa nniɣ-as, ad neṛwu acali d umerreḥ : ad nruḥ ɣer Tgejda ad ẓreɣ iddawen, ɣer la plage ad sbezgeɣ timeccacin-iw, ɣer taddart ad rwuɣ aɛrur n yaya, ɣer Lina ad nemmyeḥku tilufa n yibibiḍen… Rien de tout cela ! En fait, yewwi-d baba lkunji bac ad…yexdem. Ih, yerra-yaɣ axxam d chantier. Remarkiɣ, seg wasmi nernaɣ s kra n les neurones, belli ttaqa deg les adultes xeddmen mara yilin kunji. Ljar-neɣ, par exemple, yeznuzuy les glaces. Et comme netta d ccix n lakul, lkunji-s iḍul. Mais, tura imi yenerna lexlaṣ-is, ad yeḥbes ur yeznuzu ara lakrim. Akka i as-yenna i baba : “tura, lḥemdulelah, dayen ur znuzuyeɣ ara les glaces ! Ad tt-dewṛeɣ d…akraren”. Nniɣa-awen belli les adultes-agi d lewhayem ! Toujours deg unebdu-nni, et sous pression n yemma, yeddisidi baba ad aɣ-yawi ɣer lebḥer pour une journée. Aussitôt décidé aussitôt fait. sbeḥ zik neddimari ɣer la plage. Et comme di tmurt-agi ula tagnawt teteddu nneqma, ass kamel ur teḥbis ara lehwa. “D acu tenniḍ lukan ad nruḥ ad d-nẓur imaziɣen-nni, dagi i nejmaɛen ?», i tprupuzi yemma i baba. “Géniale ton idée !», i d as-yerra baba. Akka, ḥala ɣef tmaziɣt i ttemsefhamen. Mi newweḍ s axxam unejmuɛ, naf-n nna Crifa tecarji d ittafttaren, temmal i yinebgawen (dont nekni) amek ara ddunt temsal. D nna crifa i timḍebbert n ujemuɛ. tenna-k : “deg temlilit-agi ilaq ad mmttafaqen imaziɣen n tmurt ɣef tira !”. Zzin-d iṭabla inebgawen n nna Crifa. Gar-asen dda Allaoua, dda Meḥmud, dda meksem, dda Youcef, dda remḍan d wiaṭas n yimaziɣen nniḍen. Llan daɣen icawiyen. ula d nutni d imaziɣen. Maɛna, ur fehmeɣ ara mara d-heḍren. et comme aṭas ur ten-nefhim ara, uɣalen hedren akken ttarun tamaziɣt. c’est à dire s taɛrabt. Et moi qui pensait belli imaziɣen akk ttmeslayen taqbaylit !? Et ben non ! llan même imaziɣen yettmuzuɣen s tɣumit !

<p style="text-align: right;"> S.O.A 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yeffeɣ-d 

  
 Tiddukkla tadelsant Itri n Uzekka n taddart n Ikhelouienne, thegga-d deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen Dib Ali n Ait Aissa Mimoun, yiwen n wahil s wazal-is i lmend n usmekti n umulli wis 37 n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen akked wis 16 n Tefsut taberkant. Aseggas-agi, suddesen-d ahil d amerkanti, ideg xedmen yiwet n temsizzelt gar sin yiɣerbazen ilemmasen yellan deg tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Wigi d « Tellal Mohammed » n taddart n Uqawej akked « Abboud Mhammed » n taddart n Yixelwiyen. Timsizzelt-agi tewwi azwel « Seg umennuɣ ɣer tira », tella-d ass-nni n ttlata 11 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, ɣef 13h30 n tmeddit deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen dima. D timsizzelt ideg ttekkan 24 n yinelmaden, 12 i yal aɣerbaz, yella-d useɣti-ines ass n ssebt 15 deg yebrir, sɣur tasqamut n uktazal. Annect-agi dayen i d-yeḍran uqbel ass 20 yebrir. Ma d ass-nni n lexmis 20 yebrir 201, yella-d wahil d anesbaɣur. Yebda ɣef 10h n tṣebḥit s temsikent n teklut d usuneɣ n Massa Messadane Hannan, d temsikniyin-nniḍen icudden ɣer umezruy n 20 yebrir. Llan-d diɣen yisenza s ubuddu n yidlisen, sɣur ukkuẓ n yimura d yimedyazen : Ahcene Mariche, Idir Bellai, Mohand Nait Abdellah, Zoulikha Touati. Am wakken diɣen i d-tella ɣef 13h30 tulsa n yiwet n tmacahut, sɣur tiddukkla tadelsant n Tizi Uzzu « Ixulaf n Ǧerǧer. Ma ɣef 14h00 d afella tella-d tɣuri n yisefra, sɣur ukkuẓ-nni n yimura d yimedyazen i d-nebder yakkan. Γef 15h00 d asawen yella-d yiwen n usarag ɣef tedyanin n 20 yebrir 1980 akk 2001, sɣur umeɣnas Mohand Nait Abdellah. Syin ɣer-s ɣef 16h00 tella-d tukci n warrazen i yinelmaden ara d-yufraren deg temsizzelt n 20 yebrir, iwumi nefka isem-agi : “Seg umennuɣ ɣer tira”. Igemmaḍ n temsizzelt-agi fɣen-d ass-nni n ssebt taṣebḥit n wass, yal aswir yufrar-d deg-s yiwen unelmad. Deg ukayad n useggas amezwru yufrar-d uḍris n unelmad Bettouche Rayane, seg uɣerbaz alemmas n Ikhelouienne. Ma deg ukayad n useggas wis sin neɣ wis tlata neɣ wis rrebɛa d iḍrisen n yinelmaden n uɣerbazn Akaoudj i d-yufraren, akka Kettab Manal, Sbihi Lina akked Trif Lydia. Ad d-nesmekti belli, iḍrisen n ukkuẓ-agi n yinelmaden ad ddun deg yisebtar n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen n La Dépêche de Kabylie, yal ass n letnayen ad d-yeddu yiwen deg-sen, ad bdun ad ad-tteffɣen seg wass n letnayen i d-iteddun.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Zemrent ad ḥulfunt tlawin n taddart deg Yiɣil Ɛli, i d-yezgan s wazal 95 n yikilumiṭren ɣer unẓul-amalu n Bgayet, d akken ayen yakk i d-yenneɣlen d ageffur ddurt-a yekfan, d tiririt kan n Unẓar ɣur-sent. Dɣa, deg wussan-nni n taɣart i yesḥeyyren afellaḥ d uremmas, ameqqran d umecṭuḥ, kkrent tlawin n temnaḍt-a i d-yefkan aṭas n yinaẓuren, grent ttrent Anẓar, ɛennant ɣur-s ad d-iruc akal yekkawen. S uheggi n tdukkla tilemẓit « Ssut n yidurar », i d-yennulfan iseggasen-a ineggura kan, yettunefk wazal i wansay-a aqbur, yettwasider-d s uḥḍar n yakk lɣaci n udrum. « Mazal neṭṭef nekni deg lɛada-a. Nwala kan liḥala n tegnewt teqqur, nenna ad nekker ad netter Anẓar ad d-teɣli lgerra ». D awal n yiwet n teḥdayt i yekkin deg uheggi. Deg unejmuɛ n waṭas n tlawin d warrac, ɛeddant merra tmekkiyin seg tiddiwin n tuttra n Unẓar. Akken s ccna s yiwet n taɣect n  » Anẓar Anẓar, a Rebbi ssew-itt ar aẓar », tella-d tiɣri ɣef waṭas n yixxamen i usuter n wayen yettwaheggnen d tagella. Ilaq ad d-nini d akken ur mazal yeṭṭuqqet wansay-a ɣur leqbayel am zik. Simmal ttidiren deg zzman atrar, simmal berrun i wayen yeqqnen ɣer yidles d teflest-nsen (liman).

  M. K. 

  
 Ass-nni n 6 deg waggur-agi n furar ideg nella, yella-d leqdic d anesbaɣur deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mεemmri n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Armud-agi, yella-d d amulli amezwaru n uṣenṣeb n tmaziɣt, s usentel “ Aṣenṣeb n tutlayt tamaziɣt, d aseğhed n tumast taɣelnawt akked yidles azzayri”.

 Aṭas n yidisan i d-isuddsen leqdic-agi, ad d-nebder gar-asen : Tanmehla n yidles, axxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer, tamkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, s tallelt n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu akked umussu asdukklan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ma d ahil i yettwaxdamen i lmend n umulli-a, yebda taṣebḥit n wass-nni n letnayen 6 deg furar, s waṭas n yirmad d temsikniyin (tin n tutlayt n tmaziɣt, tin n yidlisen akked tezrigin. Llan-d diɣen sin n yisaragen i d-yewwin awal ɣef tutlayt n tmaziɣt d uṣenṣeb-is. Amezwaru iga-t-id taṣebḥit n wass Mass “Ahmed Nekkar” (d ameɣnas d aneggal), ma d wis sin iga-t-id Mass “Rabah Boucetta” (d aneɣmas deg APS, d aselmad aqdim n tmaziɣt), deg tmeddit n wass, ma ɣer taggara-s yella-d usenεet n usaru-nni “Adrar n Baya” n Azzedine Meddur. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ayen i d-nan 

  Goumeziane Nabila, d tanemhalt n yidles:  

 “nesmekta-d ass n 6 di furar 2017, i nga d asmekti amenzu n uṣenṣeb n tmaziɣt. Tura ula d adabu yebɣa ad isddukkel tumast neɣ tamagit n tmurt n Lezzayer, yettban-d wannect-a imi yerra tutlayt n tmaziɣt d tunṣibt deg tmendawt. Ihi tura ad nger tiɣri i yimyura d yimnadiyen, i wakken ad d-rren idles d tsekla-nneɣ seg timawit ɣer tira”.

  Kemmar Dalila, d tanemhalt n uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer:  

 “nga ass n tezrawt uzzig, ɣef uṣenṣeb-agi n tutlayt-nneɣ. Aṭas n yiwudam d yimdanen yemgaragen n tmetti i d-yusan, ferḥen s wayen nexdem, ula d nekkni nefreḥ yis-sen, nessaram aseggas i d-iteddun ad nexdem ugar”.

  Boucetta Rabah, d amsarag d aneɣmas: 

 “Aseggas-aya segmi tuɣal tmaziɣt d tutlayt tunṣibt deg tmendawt n tmurt-nneɣ. D amennuɣ, d timeɣnest, akked d tazzla-nni n yidamen i yessawḍen ɣer yiswi-agi n uṣenṣeb. Nezmer ad d-nini belli yeffeɣ leεtab ɣer tafat, yerna tefsus teεkumt fell-aɣ, tura yeqqim-d kan uṣenṣeb-is deg unnar n uxeddim (s tira, s usizreg, s unadi…)”. 

<p style="text-align: right;">   Ghani Amazigh 

 
  
 Anwa ur nessin  ara Dda Maḥmud  BUƐRABA di temnaḍt n Buzgan?

 Imi ara i teddu deg ubrid-is s nwaḍar-is akked učapun yezga ɣef uqerruy-is. Ad as-tiniḍ d asegbar n ssinima, yrsdukel lqedd d ssifa.

 Ilul-d deg taddart n Takuct, d amjahed, d win yettikin di tegrawla 1954 n tmurt n Lzzayer mgal Afransis. Asmi tewwi tmurt-nneɣ timunnent-ines, Dda Maḥmud, yufa-d axeddim di tɣiwant n Buzgan, xas ma tazayezt-ines meẓẓiyet, yessaweḍ yesseker-d  arraw-is, irebban akken iwata. Lbaṭel n ucengu Afransis yeǧǧa-d cwami di tudert-is, d cwami ijerḥan ul-is, mazal zedɣent cfayat-ines, d aya  it-yerran yessenfali-d  akk  ayen izedɣen ul-is s tẓuri-ines, ass-a yuɣal d aserqat, ineǧǧer tiɣawsiwin s usɣar.

 Asmi yeffeɣ tastaɣt , akud-is akk yefka-t  i tẓuri n wayen iḥemmel, ijemmaɛ tiqqaraɛtin n plastic, ineǧǧer deg usɣar ixeddem-d s yess ibeckiḍen , timucarin akked imrigen akk yessexdem ucengu Afransis  mgal aɣref Azzayri, akken ad yessenger agdud-is.

 Dda Maḥmud d yiwen yesseḥbibiren ɣef twennaḍt war ma yeẓra, imi tiqqraɛtin akk ittḍeggiren lɣaci n taddart-is, netta ijemmɛ-itent ar tberrakt-is, yettales-asent talalit, yettara-tent d tiɣawsiwin n ucebbeḥ neɣ d ssenf n yimrigen yesseqdac lemḥella Afransis di tallit-nni n tegrawla n 54.

  Ma nesteqsa Dda Maḥmud ɣef wayen ixeddem, yeqqar-aɣ-d: 

 &lt;&lt;Bɣiɣ ilmeẓyen n wass-a, akked tsuta id i teddun, wid-nni ur d necfi ara i tegrawla, ad ẓẓren akken Afransis ur aɣ-d-yefki ara timunnent d tikci, aṭas n yi-dammen i yuzzlen deg wakal-nneɣ aɛzizen, aṭas n miḥyaf  i iɛeddan ɣef imezdaɣ n tmurt-nneɣ sumata, aṭas i nenɛettab akken ad d-nḥelli tilelli&gt;&gt;. Ass-agi, ad naf yexdem ufus-is ugar n 200 n tɣewsiwin, tabarrakt-is tettak anzi ar usalay amecṭuḥ. Tiddukliwin iqeddcen deg yidles Amaziɣdi temnaḍt-agi n Buzgan, warǧin ttunt Dda Maḥmud, zzgant ssawalent-as akken ad icebbeḥ timzikniyin d tt-heggin yal tafaska, akken ad yernu aɛeqqa n lemleḥ i leqdic-nsen.Dda Maḥmud s lferḥ-is dinna i yella, warǧin yegdil tinnubga, yezga yeḥder netta akked tɣawsiwin-ines di yal tafaska. Ayen yessewhamen ass-agi, ugar n 80 n yiseggasen di tudert-is, Dda Maḥmud mazal iqeddec di tẓuri s tebɣest n yilemẓi n 20 n yiseggasen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> ḤEMMAR  BUSSAƐ 

  
 Segmi i d-tella ilindi teẓrigt-ines tamenzut, tebda tettekcam deg wallaɣen tikti n usmel-a (forum) am wansay amaynut deg dduḥ n Udrar n Fad. Ɣef waya ihi, yesres-d taggara-ya uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel ulɣu ideg i yesneɣmes iɣermanen, ed tdukkliwin ladɣa, dakken asmel-a ara d-yettwassudsen s twizi gar tɣiwant-a iɣef nettmeslay akked umussu-yis asdukklan, ad yili ass n 28 ed 29 deg wayyur-a n ɣuct. Iswan i yettwaneyycen ilmend n warmud-a ṭṭuqtent, gar-asen amciwer gar tdukkliwin n tɣiwant ɣef kra n tlufa, tallelt i tid i d-yettnekkaren.

 Yelha ayendin mi d-ttilint tektiwin-a n ttiɛadat-a, maca ad igerrez ugar lemmer ad yettwagem ddeqs n ubaɣur seg-sen, daɣen, ad yettwassemras deg teɣzi uqeddic n tdukkli, n twizi, gar tdukkliwin n taddart merra. Dɣa, am tegnit n yilindi, tturaǧun yisaragen, aṭas n tigawin ed umbaddal n tektiwin deg uxxam n yilemẓiyen.

 D ameslay ɣef wamek ad ilin, ed ad wennɛen warmuden n tdukkliwin i inuḥen deg taddart, qeddcent deg waṭas n taɣulin: ama d tidukkliwin tidelsanin, tinmettiyin, tinaddalin, tid n twennaḍt neɣ d tiyaḍ. Ilmend n waya, llant-d sɣur uselway n tɣiwant tnubgiwin i wwḍent i yakk iselwayen n tdukkliwin n temnaḍt imi mgarawen snat n tikkal ar tura. Deg ttiɛad-a wis-sin, yelha ma yessarem yiwen ad d-ffɣen yigmaḍ d wid yelhan ugar ɣef ɣuct n yilindi, ara d-ineǧǧɛen daɣen iɣallen n kra n tdukkliwin i yeddurin taggara-ya ɣef tmentilt-a (sebba) neɣ ɣef waṭas. Acimi ihi i yewwi-d afares n temlilit ideg tidukkla yettferrsen tezmer ad tesken s tirmit-is i tbujadt-nni. Ula d imezdaɣ, war ahat, xilla seg-sen i ur neẓri acḥal gedged i tesɛa tɣiwant-nsen d tidukkla, aniɛad d anti-tent !. «Simmal yettmagga usmel-a simmal nettwali lebɣi ɣur yilemẓiyen akken ad kecmen deg umussu asdukklan. Dɣa, aseggas-a nnulfant-d rebɛa n tdukkliwin d timaynutin ɣur-neɣ. Nessaram kan ad yili sey-a ɣer sdat ugar n umciwer ed umɛiwen gar-asent». I aɣ-d-yenna uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel mass Ɛebdun Nasir.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Taggara n ddurt yezrin deg uxxam n yidles n Tawes Amruc n temdint n Bgayet, medlent tiwwura n tmeɣra n tizizwit d tament. Degf reḥba n tikelt-a, kkin 44 n yifellaḥen yettrebbin tizizwa, ussan-d si tɣiwanin n lwilaya i wakken ad d-snaɛten lɣella-nsen: tament , ideqqi , tanalt n ugellid…atg. Ayen i d-yufraren deg tmeɣra n useggas-agi, d leṣnaf n tament akked lɣella n waṭas i d-wwin yid-sen ifellaḥen yekkin di Reḥba-agi.”Aseggas-agi, yella lxir, llant teɣrasin i d-yefkan almi d 7 n litrat n tament. Rnu ɣur-s, llan waṭas n lesnaf n tament : tament n tlegit d uzeggar , tament n ukalitus, tament n ččina, tament n teẓgi “tin n ubelluḍ d lexrif” …’’ i d-yenna yiwen n ufellaḥ n temnaṭ n uqbu‘’. Ula d ssuma daɣen tudred aseggas-agi ma nqerren-itt ɣer yilindi 4000 i DA kg, i deqqi 3000 DA i kg, tanalt ugellid 1000DA i 10 gramme. Iwakken ad yenerni usefrek deg urebbi n tzizwa”Apiculture», tidukkla ifellaḥen n lwilaya n Bgayet, gren tiɣri i uneɣlaf n tfellaḥt i waken ad d-yefk afus n tallelt i wid yebɣan ad seftin deg uḥric-agi : tiɣrasin, neɣ duzan iseqdacen deg unnar . Seg wakken tizizwa llant s wazal-nsent deg tmeddurt n talsa d ugama, afessuy n ujeǧǧig n tjur d lɣella s umata, neɣ deg tujjya n umdan, ihi ilaq ad nesseḥbiber fell-as . am wakken i as-yenna Albert Einstein :” asmi ara tenger tzizwit… ad tenger ddunit’’ . 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Brahim.Benhamouche  

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis 23 unbir 2017, imezdaɣ n tmurt n Lezzayer s umata rzan ɣer wammasen n udber i wakken ad xedmen lwajeb-nnsen n tefranin tigidanin, yerzan Isquma iɣerfanen iɣiwanen (APC) akked Yisquma iɣerfanen n lwilayat (APW). Deg umagrad-agi, nextar ad d-nmeslay ɣef wayen akk i icudden ɣer tefranin-agi n 23 unbir 2017, deg ladayra n wagennun. Tikkelt-agi, neɛreḍ deg tirza-nneɣ tasebḥit n wass-nni n lexmis iɛeddan, i d aɣ-yewwin ɣer ladayra n wagennun, yetabaɛen ɣer lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D ladayra ideg llant tlata n tɣiwanin: Taɣiwant n At Ɛisa Mimun, yesɛan 19 n yikersiyen, taɣiwant n Timizar, yesɛan 19 n yikersiyen, akked tɣiwant n Wagennun, yesɛan 15 n yikersiyen. Nerza ɣer 3 n wammasen n udber, yal taɣiwant nɛedda ɣer yiwen deg-sen. Ha-ten-in wugar n yisallen ɣef tefranin, deg tlata n tɣiwanin-agi. Ad d-nezwir deg tɣiwant n At Ɛisa Mimun, ideg jerden wazal n 11 838 n yimdanen iman-nsen deg lejridat n lbuṭ, i yettwaferqen ɣef 08 n wammasen n udber akked 16 n yinirawen n udɣar. D taɣiwant iɣef myeḥzwaren 6 n wumuɣen n yikabaren-agi: RND, RCD, FLN, FFS, MEN, MPA. Ma d igemmaḍ n tefranin-agi imenza, llan-d akka. Ɣef 10h30, leḥsab yerzan taɣiwant yewweḍ ɣer 7,05%, ma d win n usqamu n lwilaya yewweḍ ɣer 6,04…

  Yettkemmil deg usebtar 13 

  
 Asen n 22 deg aggur –agi n Maggu &amp;nbsp,; tuɣal tajmilt i sin n inaẓuren yettwasnen tirni di tmurt n Leqbayel  Meksa Abd El Kader akked Ali Ideflawen.

 Tajmilit id yellan ddaw leɛnaya n Tɣiwant n Timizart i lmend n was agreɣlan n tigemmi, tusa-d di lawan-is  imi ahat ma llan inaẓuren deg temnadt n At Jennad yuklalen tisemɣert  ur d nettaf-ara am sin icennayen-agi id yewwin ayen din  i  tizlit taqbaylit &amp;nbsp,; imi ɛebban amennuɣ fell-as seg imezwura. Akka dɣa Meksa Abdelkader ilul asen n 4 yunyu 1954 deg At jennad ( taddart n Mira) . Yebda ccna asmi i tuɣ di Fṛansa deg useggas 1976 anda  yemyusen netta d Nathalie. Ayen icna d wayen yenna yewwi d ɣef tamagit n tmurt . Anwa deg-nneɣ ur necna-ara yid-s yiwwas tizlatin –is am” Massinissa” , “ Loundja», “Anẓar, “Timecreṭ»,” tafsut” ? Meksa Abdelkader yella seg imezwura iḍefṛen ccna atrar s teqbaylit &amp;nbsp,; yesnerna  leqdic-is ɣer win n Yidir, Noredine Chenoud, Djamel Alem , Ferhat Mhenni, Les Abranis, Inasliyen, tagrawla, Brahim Iziri….

 Aḍebsi amezwaru n Meksa “Lunja” akked “ tafsut ‘  fɣen-d dagi di tmurt. Sin akkin yunag ɣef tmurt n Fṛansa anda id yeskeles aḍebsi nniḍen “ asif” deg id ddan-t tizlatin-is yeččuṛen d sser am “ Anzar “ neɣ ɛad “ anda-ken a wid yesfrun,”. Deg useggas n 1979 Meksa yeɣza ugar deg unadi  ɣef tajaddit deg uḍebsi-ines “ tafunast igujilen” anda ara d nnaf tuɣac-is ur nettwattu am “ Zelgum” , « Arzez d tzizwa ». Aḍebsi-ines wis tlata ifɣ- d deg useggas 1980 ddaw uzwel” amnekcem” .  Deg useggas n 1981 yecna di Sidi Frej ɣer tama n tiqucac n ccan n tmurt n Fṛansa “ Leo Férré d Gilbert Lerroux. Tasfift taneggarut n Meksa Abdelkader tella-d  deg useggas 1988 ddaw uzwel “ Amɣar azemni”. Meksa yemmut di lɣerba deg useggas n 1988.  Yettwemḍel deg taddart-is Mira.

 Ali Ideflawen si tama-s ilul deg useggas n 16 yennayer 1957 deg taddart Nat Garet ( ddaw mira) di tɣiwant n Timizart . Amecwaṛ id yewwi di tẓuri yebda deg iseggasen n 80 . Ali ideflawen seg wid ifernen tizlit tatrart  tamaḥadit. Deg anect-a yeḍfer amecwar   n Ferhat Mhenni armi kra n tizlatin yecna wagi iɛawed-asen-t wihin . Amedya tizilit n   « Berwagiya » neɣ tizlit «  Oui Oui Monsieur ». Maca Ali ideflawen yettwasen ugar s tizlatin-is timenza id yeddan deg tasfift «  a lawan yettazzalen » imi sked anwa ur ḥuzan-t deg akken tuɣac yellan deg umezday-agi ( album)  zdin-t isefra lqayen ɣer uẓawan ifazen id yecna Ali s taɣect-is yeččuṛen. 

 Kra yecna d kra id yewwi d tizlit , icudd ɣer taqbaylit  d-useḥbiber ɣer yimal n tmagit n tmurt. Ɣef aya werǧin iccuḥ seg uneḥḍur-ines akken ad ɛiwen tidukkliwin tidelsanin i t-yessuturen yal mi ara d swejdent tameɣṛa, a beɛda seg asmi id teldi tawwurt i leqdic sdaxel n tidukkliwin tidelsanin  deg useggas n 1989.

 Akka dɣa  deg At jennad,  Ali ideflawen yelḥa amecwar akked tadukli tadelsant Youcef Ou kaci , imi tameɣṛa  tamezwarut id yellan deg axxam n yidles «  Youcef Ou Kaci » deg useggas 1990  yecna deg-s Ali Ideflawen mebla ttawilat n uṣiweḍ( la sono) yerna ɣef ticamuɛin,  acku aɛdawen yidles gezmen lexyuḍ n trisiti akken ur d telli-ara tameɣṛa-nni id tesewjed tadukli tadelsant Youcef Ou kaci id illen yakken. Xas akken , tazeqqa tareɣreɣ si lɣaci id yusan si yal tama akken ad walin wa ad slan i Ali Ideflawen. 

 Ali Ideflwen deg anect-a werǧin iɣull tidukkliwin tidelsanin, imi anda is-id sawlen yenna “ yerbeḥ” . Aṭas diɣ id yettmektayen  tameɣṛa yexdem deg annar n  Freha i lmendad n tfaska n tmedyazt  tamenzut  « Youcef Ou kaci » id yellan deg At jennad( Aghribs, Freha, Timizart)  deg useggas n 1991. 

 Ɣef aya  d wayen nniḍen,  tajmilt tunṣibt id hegga  taɣiwant n Timizart i sin icennayen-agi d ttin ara iressin( mebla ccekk)   ansay n usemɣer n kra n win id yernan adɣaɣ ɣef uɣlad n lebni n tnaṣlit-nneɣ.

 Ait Slimane Hamid

  
 Issem-is Sabrina Mokhfi. Tesεa 16 n yiseggasen di laεmer-is, d tanelmadt deg uswir wis ssin, aseggas wis 04, deg uγarbaz alemmas n Yirjen, tamnaḍt n At-Yiraten. D tamelḥant u d tacmmumḥant, tufrar-d deg umḍiq amenzu n  » Lalla-s n Tullas n Tizi-Wezzu n useggas 2016″ di tezrigt-is tis 04.

 Tettwafren lalla-s n tullas di temzizelt-agi s thuski (ṣṣifa), deg tikil d wadduy, Sabrina tefraḥ aṭas s umzizwer-is, maca ur tumin-ara ad-tufrar deg umḍiq amenzu, d asebγes n yimawlan-is « baba-s d yemma-s » itt-idegren tewweḍ γar tqacuct.
