<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 I lmend n useggas wis 26 seg wass mi yemmut Dda Lmulud At Mɛemmer, ad d-nezzi am yal tikelt i wakken ad neḥyu awal-is, tamusni-s d ubrid i ɣ-d-yenǧer.

 Ass-a, ilaq ad t-id-nessukes si tatut yecban lmut; am akken ɣ-d-yessukes si tillas (ṭṭlam) n umezruy. Acku d tatut i ineqqen igduden. Win yettun amezry-is, tutlayt-is, idles-is d wakal-is,….. acu ara s-d-yeqqimen? S wacu ara yesɛu isem gar yegduden nniḍen n dunit ? I tmudi n tudert-is, Dda Lmulud yufrar-ed gar imusnawen imeqranen. Yerra-aɣ-d ccan d wazal, s wayen yura d wayen yenna. 

 Si tmurt n Leqbayel ar Icelḥiyen, seg Waṭlas ar Lgurara, seg wedrar ar Tniri, seg Umalu ar Usammar,…Tamurt imaziɣen yekka-tt-id i wakken ad yesdukel tagamat d yidles amaziɣ. Ur t-yecqi acu ara t-id-iṣaḥen, ur t-yecqi ad yeṭṭef kra n wemkan di leḥkem, ad yali d aneɣlaf neɣ bitta d lwali.  D tutlayt d yidles n Tmazɣa i t-yrḥan, i ɣef yefka ddunit-is meṛṛa. Xas ayen yuklal ur s-yuɣal ara s wudem unṣib, maca wid-is, igduden imaziɣen anda ma llan ttqadaren-t, ttɛuzzun-t, ttgalan-yes, smektayen-t-id am nekni ass-a.Ass-a, ayen ara yessidren Dda Lmulud, bab n tmusni d wawal yesɛan azal, d idlisen-is ma neɣra-ten, d tamaziɣt ma nettaru yes deg yiɣerbazen, deg yidlisen, deg yiɣmisen d lbiruwat.     Acku, agdud ur nesɛi ara iles d yidles, am ṭejra nebla iẓuran. Cwiṭ kan n waḍu ma ihubb-ed ad tt-yeqleɛ. Akken ur rekkun ara iẓuran-nneɣ, ilaq ad ten-nesway s usefti d usnerni n tutlayt d yidles nneɣ. 

 “Afus deg ufus, Taɛkemt ad tifsus”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Agraw n inelmaden  

  Tasnawit si Lḥasen Utaleb n At-Yanni 

  
 Aqejmamar d azwel i yextar umsefɣul « caricaturiste » ilemẓi Mass Kamel Bentaha, i tesfift-is tis snat n wunuɣen, i d-yessuffeɣ deg ussan-agi kan iɛeddan ɣer tezrigin Asirem n Tubiret. Ula d tikkelt-agi s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, mbeɛd mi d-yessazreg yakan yiwet deg 2015, s uzwel «Ʃeẓẓi akked Ʃezzul ». Yewwi yis-s arraz amezwaru deg Tfaska tagraɣlant n tesfifin n wunuɣen n Lezzayer « FIBDA » deg useggas n 2016. D adlis n 16 n yisebtar, llan deg-s 80 n yifɣal s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, yettnuzu s wazal n 200DA deg tnedlisin. Tasfift-agi n wunuɣen, tebna ɣef xemsa n yiwudam d igejdanen (aqejmamar akked tmeṭṭut-is), d tlata-nniḍen (iseɣ, azger d uzrem). Issefek, ad d-nini belli d netta i ixedmen asuneɣ n yifɣal, d netta diɣen i ten-id-isenṭaqqen s tmaziɣt. Lḥasun d taqsiḍt yelhan aṭas i warrac, tesshel i tɣuri, yerna tesɛa izen. Ad d-nini diɣ belli d netta i d amaziɣ amezwaru deg tmurt n Lezzayer i yerran ddhen-is ɣer tesfifin n wunuɣen s tmaziɣt. Nezmer, ad d-nefk agzul n tedyant-agi deg kra tefyar. Yella uqejmamar d amecḥah, yiwen wass iserfa tamɣart-is. Netta yewwi-d iɣes deg tidet, la as-yeqqar d aksum i d-nefqeɣ. Mserfan tuɣal truḥ s axxam-nsen. Yerǧa uqejmamar ad d-uɣal ulac. Γer taggara iceggeɛ azrem yerra-tt-id s axxam. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, Mass Bentaha Kamel, yettwassnen s yifɣal i yella i xeddem-d yal ddurt deg uɣmis « Le Pays ». Ilul ass n 15 deg waggur n tuber 1968, deg taddart n Cerfa n Behlul deg tɣiwant n Yiɛeẓẓugen deg lwilya n Tizi Uzzu. Yexdem yakan diɣen ifɣal deg uɣmis « Les nouvelles confidences » s tefransist, akked deg tesɣunt i lmend n yigerdan « Nounou ».Yessarem s uxeddim-agi-ines, ad yessiweḍ ad d-yefk timussniwin-ines timeqqranin i yidles d tutlayt n tmaziɣt, akken ad yessbuɣer tamkerḍit n ugdud amaziɣ. Am wakken daɣen ara t-yeg d ttawil swayes ara yessiweḍ tikta-s s arrac imeẓyanen, yerna ad asen-yessiḥmmil taɣuri s tutlayt n tyemmat-nsen. Imi daɣen igerdan ḥemmlen ad walin unuɣen, yerna kerhen adlis meqqren, neɣ yeččur d tira s uberkan.

  A. A. 

  
 I lmend n wass agraɣlan n tmeṭṭut, i d-yettilin yal aseggas ass n 08 deg meɣres, tawacult n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tsuddes-d leqdic adelsan s wazal-is. D armud yeddan ɣef teɣzi n 4 wuassan, imi yebda ass-nni n lḥed 05 deg meɣres, yekfa ass-nni n lexmis 09 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Γef teɣzi n ukkuẓ n wussan-a, lland waṭas n yirmad yecban timsikniyin (tiqnedyar, talaɣt, lḥelwa, iẓeḍwa n taḍuṭ…) timsikniyin n usuneɣ d tid n yidlisen, yella-d diɣ usenzi s ubuddu sɣur kra n yimura. Ma d ayen yerzan ahil yettwaxedmen, yella-d akka : ass n 7 deg meɣres, deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri tella-d tɣuri n yisefra d yicewwiqen n tlawin, yella-d diɣ usenɛet n usaru-nni «Tutlayt n Zahra». Ma deg tzeqqa-nni «Axxam-nneɣ» n uxxam n yidles, tella-d rreḥba n tlawin akked tiddukkla tadelsant Faṭma n Sumer n Illula Umalu. Ma deg Umaruz n uxxam n yidles n Azazga, tella-d tɣuri n yisefra d tajmilt i tmeṭṭut, yella-d diɣ uskan n usaru-nni «Le vent des Aurès». Ma deg temkerḍit taqejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, tella-d yiwet n temlilit neɣ d asikew n tira n tlawin sɣur Ben Mouhoub Djouher, Naima Si Mohand, Kenza Djurdjura, Zoulikha Touati, Ouarda Cherifi. Ass n 8 di meɣres, deg uxxam n Yidles n Tizi Uzzu, tella-d yiwet n temlilit ɣef tẓuri n tmeṭṭut. Tella-d diɣ yiwet n tmeɣra n ccna, ideg iɣenna Mourad Guerbas, Siham Stiti, Khaled Par hasard. Ma deg umaruz n Azazga yecna Guerbas, Rachid Hemmouche, Said Mhelmi d wiyaḍ. Deg tzeqqa n ssinima n Tizi Uzzu, yella-d usenɛet n usaru «Lalla Faḍma n Sumer» n Belkacem Hedjadj, am wakken daɣen i d-tella turart n yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun sɣur tarbaɛt «Fertuna». Ma d ass-nni n lexmis 09 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, tella-d tmeɣra n taggara deg uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine n Tizi Uzzu, d tajmilt i tlawin-agi : Nna Faḍma, Touati Zoulikha, Nna Ouardia Cherrak, Nna Tassadit d Farida Gueroub.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Deg wussan-agi yezrin i d-yeffeɣ udlis amaynut n tmarut d tmedyazt Massa Sadia Bounadi iwumi tsemma “Macahu s usefru 1” d taḥkayt n temqerqert akked tifirɛqest, i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin n Aframed. D wagi i d adlis wis tlata ara d-tessuffeɣ tmedyazt-agi tilemẓit. Yettnuzu s wazal n 150DA, deg-s 32 n yisebtar. Aḍris-agi n tmacahut n temqerqert d tifirɛqest, yella yakan deg timawit s tewsit n tesrit, ma d Sadia Bounadi, tamezwarut, terra-t-id ɣer tira, , tis snat terra-d s lmizan n usefru, tis tlata terna-as-d unuɣen i icebḥen aṭas. Iwudam n teqsiḍt-agi d tifirɛeqest akked temqerqert. Ad d-nemekti belli Sadia Bounad, tlul deg taddart n Rafour deg lwilaya n Tubiret. D tamarut n sin yidlisen-nniḍen : Lxir n Uxellaq deg 2009, i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin n Usqamu unnig n timuzɣa (HCA). Syin akkin terna-d adlis-is wis sin Gar yiḍelli akked wass-a, i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin dima n HCA. D taselwayt n Tiddukla « Iswi » yesseḥbibiren ɣef tgemmi d yidles. Tura akka, ha-tt-an la d-tettheggi aḥric wis sin n tmacahut-agi ara d-yefɣen deg wussan i d-iteddun. Taɣuri igerrzen i yimeɣriyen, afud iǧehden i yimeskaren!

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Aneḥkam Ziri yuɣ snat n tilawin, ittidir akken yid-sent deg iɣrem-ines. Tamezwarut ssawalen-as Meḥjuba, teɛeqqer, ur tesɛi ara dderya. Faḍma yerna-tt-id d takna ɣef tmezwarut akken ad yesɛu tarrawt. Segmi i d tekcem axxam-is Faḍma, werǧin ikcim taxxamt n Meḥjuba. Ziri iḥemmel kan Faḍma imi tezyen, tesɛa ṣṣifa yerna meẓẓiyet. Aneḥkam ur iẓri ara d acu iḍerrun deg uxxam-is. Mi yeffeɣ tanezzayt ur d-yettuɣal ara alamma d tameddit. Faḍma ad terju mi yeffeɣ uneḥkam seg uxxam, nettat ad teɛnu ihen n uxeddam, ad tekcem ad teqqim dinn-a yid-s. Akken kulles. Meḥjuba tameṭtut-is tamezwarut kullec ɣef tiṭ-is. Yiwen wass teḍfer-itt, tenna-as ar ass-agi ad ẓreɣ s ttbut acu ara txeddem tmexluqt-a daxel n yihen n uxeddam-is. Teǧǧa-tt alammi tekcem ɣer yihen truḥ deffir-s s tuffra, tesṭuṭec-asen si lejqayeq n uqiḍun. Twala Faḍma tekkes akk iceṭiḍen-is, teqqim akken i tt-id tesɛa yemma-s. Axeddam ibedd sdat-s. Tebren-d ɣer deffir, tuɣal-d s axxam, terra iman-is ur teẓri acemma deg wayen ara iḍerrun. Teqqim kan weḥd-s, tetḥeyyeṛ amek ara texdem. Ma ad tekcef takna-nni-ines neɣ ala. Yiwen n wul iqqar-as anef-as i Ziri ad yeṛwi ṛṛay-is, ad yeṛwi Faḍma I d-yerna d takna fell-as, yiwen n wul daɣen iqqar-as kcef-itt ad twali temɣer ara tessemɣar iman-is. Tenna-as iwweḍ-d lwaqt deg ara d-rreɣ ula d nekk ttaṛ, d nettat akk i d sebba n lmeḥna-w. Assen, terra iman-is tuḍen, teskeṛ-d tawwurt si daxel, teṭṭes deg texxamt-is akk ass, ula d imekli ur t-tečči ara. Mi d-yewweḍ Ziri tameddit ur tt-id-yufi ara sdat-s, ur t-tqubel ara ɣer tewwurt akken txeddem zik. Isteqsa tameṭṭut-nni tis snat Yenna-s : ‘’a tameṭṭut, acuɣer akka leflantegga ulac-itt da ? Amek akka, ayagi iɛeddan d nettat iyi-d-ittmagaren ɣer tewwurt, ass-agi ha-tt-an ulac-it. Yella kra i tt-yuɣen aɛni ?’’ Terra-as tekna-nni : ‘’ur ẓriɣ ara, mi uliɣ ɣer-s ɣer texxamt-is, ufiɣ-tt teɣleq-d tawwurt si daxel, mi as-wwteɣ, tenna-yi-d erẓ-iyi akin. Ur ẓriɣ ara acu i as-xedmeɣ.’’ Imiren, yuli Ziri ɣer texxamt n tmeṭṭut-is tamezwarut, ibedd sdat n tewwurt. Alammi d imiren i d-imekta-d belli seg wasmi d-yerna takna fella-s ur ikcim taxxamt-is, ur igin d Meḥjuba, ittili kan d Faḍma. Iwwet-as ɣef tewwurt, yenna-as : ‘’lli-tt-in d nekk, d argaz-im. Telli-as-tt-id, ikcem iqqim ɣer tama-s, yenna-as : ‘’d acu i kem-yuɣen, thelkeḍ? Yella wi kem-iḍelmen?’’ Meḥjuba ters-d seg umeṭraḥ, tenna-as : ‘’kkes aɣbel ay argaz, ur tufiḍ d acu iyi-yuɣen. Xedmeɣ akka i wakken dɣa ad d-tkecmeḍ ɣer texxamt-a, ad nili xerṣum kra n ddqayeq weḥd-neɣ. Sɛiɣ yiwet n lbaḍna, bɣiɣ ad ak-tt-iniɣ. ‘’D acu a tameṭṭut ! Aql-aɣ weḥd-neɣ, ulac win i aɣ-id-isellen, ini-yi-d kullec, hdeṛ.’’ I as-yenna urgaz. Terra-as-d: ‘’ay argaz, tamezwarut ɣur-k ad ak-iffeɣ laɛqel, ayen ara ak-in-iniɣ ad ijraḥ tasa-k. I wakken ad tt-tebteḍ iman-ik deg wayen ara ak-iniɣ, ilaq-aɣ laɛqel d lmeɛqul. Ihi tameṭṭut-ik tis snat, tin tḥemmleḍ am leɛmer-ik ha-tt-an tetteqqed-ik, txeddeɛ-ik d uqeddac-is. Akken ara teffɣeḍ seg uxxam, nettat ad t-teɛnu ɣer uqiḍun-is, ad teqqim din-a acḥal. D ayen wallent wallen-iw iḍelli. Ḍefreɣ-tt deffir s tuffra sakdeɣ si lejqayeq, walaɣ ayen ur tettamneḍ ara. Ɣur-k ad as-tiniḍ d tismin i yusmeɣ deg-s. Ttbut ma ihwa-ak d kečč ara t-id-yawin s timmad-ik. Argaz isussem yuɣ-itent mkemmed. Yenna-as : ‘’susem, ɣur-m i wumi teqqareḍ, jmeɛ lbaḍna ma d tin-a zemreɣ-as. Iṣubb-d urgaz ittaḍsa, irra iman-is acemma ur iḍri. Teḍfer-it-id Meḥjuba terra iman-is tuḍen, tettṣubbu-d s ttawil tiṭrejtin. Ččan imensi akken, necṛaḥen gar-asen am zik… Azekka-nni sbeḥ, inna-asen Ziri ḥelset i uɛewdiw-iw ass-a ad ffɣeɣ ad t-id-sɣareɣ cwiṭ. Iffeɣ d yemnayen i t-ittḥamin. Izwar-asen, yenna-asen ad I yi-d-leḥqem, ad sazleɣ cwiṭ aɛewdiw-iw. Ijbed algam, aɛewdiw isfezwi am lebṛaq, iḍal i tizi, idreg ɣef wallen n yemnayen i iddan yid-s. Mi yeffeɣ idreg ɣef tiṭ, iḥbes irs-d seg uɛewdiw, iẓẓel di tmurt, isteɛmel iɣli-d seg uɛewdiw, yerreẓ ur izmir ara ad ikker. Akken d-ḍallen yemnayen i tizi, walen Ziri di tmurt uzlen ɣur-s. Yenna-asen:’’ ɣliɣ-d seg uɛewdiw, tura refdet-iyi, awit-iyi s axxam. Ziri yerra iman-is ur izmir ara ad issers aḍar-is wala ad isembiwel ifassen-is. Refden-t s leḥder yemnayen, wwin-t ɣer uxxam-is. Iẓẓel deg umeṭraḥ kecmen-d ɣer-s wid ara t-ilawin, rnan-d tlawin d yirgazen. qqimen yid-s alammi inṣef yiḍ. Ssyin inna-asen, issuter deg-sen ad t-ǧǧen d tmeṭṭut-is ad isteɛfu. Mi ffɣen akk lɣaci-nni d-yusan ɣur-s, yerra iman-is irẓa-t nadam, iɣleb-it yiḍes. Iẓẓel, isteɛmel iṭṭes iṛuḥ di tnafa. Faḍma terna cwiṭ, teqqim alammi tumen belli argaz-is yeṭṭes, teddem aɛwin, teffeɣ-d seg uxxam terra srid ɣer uqiḍun n uxeddam-is. Ziri integ-d seg wusu iḍfer-itt s tuffra. Nettat tekcem, netta yewweḍ ɣer tama n uqiḍun, ifka tameẓẓuɣt ismeḥsis. Yenna-as uxeddam-nni : ‘’d acu i kem-iṭfen ɣer tura a Faḍma? Tɛeṭṭleḍ akken ad d-taseḍ, teǧǧiḍ-iyi mebla imensi?’’ Terra-as Faḍma : ‘’ceɣleɣ deg urgaz-inna i d-iɣlin seg uɛewdiw, d aya i yi-sbeɛden fell-ak. Kkes seg wul-ik ur I yi-tezzem ara acku d kečč i ifren wul-iw, d kečč i ḥemleɣ. Netta d ababat kan n warraw-iw. Ziri isla i yimeslayen n tmeṭṭut-is, isussem, itebbet ayen i as-tenna Mehjuba, ibren-d s axxam, yuɣal s usu, iṭṭes. Ijmeɛ lbaḍna i yiman-is. Ziri ur iɛeṭṭel ara ikker iɛna lecɣel-is, am wakken ixeddem zik. Deg wussan-nni kan mi yekker ɣer lecɣel-is, berḥen, taqbilt ha-tt-an iẓdem-d fell-as uɛdaw. Uzlen akk lɣaci ad qablen aɛdaw. Ziri d amezwaru, yelsa, iddem leslaḥ, irkeb aɛewdiw yezwar-asen i teqbilt. Isendeh axeddam-is, ameɛcaq n tmeṭṭut-is d yemnayen-is ad t-id-ḍefren. Iwweḍ sdat n uɛdaw isendeh axeddam-nni, yenna-as: ’’ zwir keččini, nekk ad ak-in-ḍefreɣ.’’ Ilemẓi-nni ur isɛi ara kra n lxetyaṛ, icerreg, ikcem talemmast n uɛdaw. Ziri ibren-d ɣer deffir iǧǧa-t weḥd-s ttnasfa n uɛdaw. D netta i d-nɣan d amezwaru ass-nni. Mi yekcem s axxam ɣer tmeṭṭut-is tis snat tɛeggeḍ mi t-twala tenna-as : ‘’a lxir-inu, ḥemdeɣ-k a Ṛebbi cekṛeɣ-k imi d-tuɣaleḍ s axxam ur ak-yuɣ wara.’’ yenna-as Ziri:’’ yelha wayen i d-teqqareḍ, maca win i tḥemleḍ seg wul, win ifren wul-im immut. I d-yuɣalen d ababat kan n warraw-im.’’ Tameṭṭut tefhem d acu ibɣa ad d-yini Ziri, teẓra tura belli iḥṣa d acu yellan gar-as d uxeddam-is, iffeɣ-itt leɛqel. Tunez-as, tessutur deg-s ad tt-yawi ɣer yimawlen-is. Yenna-as Ziri: ‘’ yirbaḥ, ad kem-awiɣ d ayen isehlen. Yewwi-tt ɣer yimawlen-is. Iǧǧa-tt din mebla ma iseɛlem iḍulan-is d acu iḍran. Iqqim alammi teqqim ddeqs n lwaqt deg uxxam n baba-s, iṛuḥ ɣur-s yenna-asen:’’ acuɣer ur d-tuɣal ara tmeṭṭut-iw s axxam.’’ Nnan-as-id: ‘’nenna-as ruḥ, tugi. Ulac amek ur tt-nḥellel ara ad n-tuɣal tugi.’’ Nettat ur asen-tenni ara acuɣer, teqqar-asen kan d lmuḥal ad uɣaleɣ. Yenna-asen Ziri:’’ nekk ur zmireɣ ara daɣen ad ṣebreɣ fell-as. Ssyin qqimen mmeslayen mesfhamen ɣef berru . Ziri ad as-ibru i tmeṭṭut nettat ad tsemmeḥ lḥaq n berru. Akken d-yerra uneḥkam lḥeq n berru d wayen akk icṛeḍ i yimawlen n tmeṭṭut, yenna-asen: ‘’tura mi lliɣ di leḥq-iw, ad awen-d-iniɣ d acu iḍran . Iḥka-asen tadyant amek tella, amek yelli-tsen tcemmet-iten. Imawlen n tlemẓit-nni ḥetcen nudan, ufan ayen akk I d-yenna Ziri d tidet, tcemmet-iten di teqbilt. Kkren nɣan-tt. Swakka, s leɛqel d lmeɛqul aneḥkam Ziri yerra-d ttaṛ n wayen i as-texdem Faḍma d uxeddam-is mebla ma ixser kra, mebla ma icemmet iman-is. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane LASHEB 

  
 Samir Ait Belkacem d yiwen gar izumal n yidles d tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Ilul deg taddart n Agni n Teslent deg Ʃin Elhemmam. Seg wasmi yella meẓẓi i iḥemmel ad yettales i wunuɣen yettembiwilen (doublage) s tutlayin-nniḍen, abeɛda s tmaziɣt.

 D netta i d amenzwaru deg tmurt n leqbayel i yessawḍen ad ixdem Pučči. Ixdem-it kan akka tazwara, syin ulac win ur t-nwala ara, ama d imecṭaḥ, ama d imeqqranen. D ayen yesferḥen Leqbayel. Yettwassen aṭas segmi i d-yerna ɣer warrac imecṭaḥ segmi i d-yerna Limučuču d wid-nniḍen. Yebda leqdic-a deg useggas n 2004, yerna-d, sakin, iḥricen-niḍen n Pučči, Nerniya , Da Spilu, Iferfucen,Limučuču , Aɛli d Waɛli , Ipespusen , Črak d waṭas-nnniḍen . Isura-a n Mass Ait Belkacem, tettili-d d allalen i sseqdacen yiselmaden deg waṭas n yiɣerbazen imi i ten-ḥemmeln yinelmaden. Rnu ɣef wanect-a, lemmden-d aṭas n umawal n teqbaylit, ladɣa arrac i izedɣen timdinin. Samir Ait Belkacem, ixeddem seg wul-is, iḥemmel ad ineqqi ccɣel-is, yerna xuṣṣen aṭas n wallalen. Xas akken, meɛna axeddim-is ur as-teqqareḍ ara seg ulac i t-id-yessuffeɣ. Usan-d ɣer-s ula si Marikan walan amek ixeddem, wehmen deg-s. Yesɛa yiwet n terbeɛt xeddmen yid-s s tumert. Tetteki ula d tameṭṭut-is d yelli-s. Yeqqar-d Samir d akken axeddim-agi ur yeshil ara, imi tikwal ur yettwali ara tawacullt-is acḥal n wussan. Yal win ara d-yuraren, ilaq ad d-yettales alamma yeffeɣ-d ṣṣut-is akken ilaq. Aya, yettaṭṭaf aṭas n wakud. Ha-t-an, tikkel-a la d-yettheggi Samir limučuču 4 ara d-yeffɣen ussan-agi n yunyu. Ttekin deg-s ama d icennayen , imyura, inaẓuren, imedyazen, d win iqeddcen deg umezqun gar-asen : zedek Mouloud,Abdelhak sahel ,Hamid Mouali, Brahim Medani, Yousef Hessas, Ali Amrane, Hadjira Oubachir, Massi lewhama, Belaid tagrawla, Tawes Arhab, Nouriya, Mohamed Allawa…atg. Mlalen-d akk akken ad awḍen ɣer yiwen yiswi : asefraḥ n wid i yettraǧun acḥal aya acu ara d-yesuffeɣ Samir.Tikkelt-a, am akken i d-yenna Samir, yefreḥ imi leɛtab-nni yeffeɣ ɣer tafat. Nessaram-as afud igerrzen imi mazal-as amecwar ɣer sdat. Abrid i d -nejren imezwura , ad neddu deg-s akken tamaziɣt ad tennerni , ad teǧuǧǧeg. I usmekti, Samir Ait Belkacem yewwi arraz amezwaru deg tfaska n usaru amaziɣ i d-yettheggay, yal aseggas, Useqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa. 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Zakia Ben yahia  

  
 Tagi d yiwet n tdukla i d-ilulen deg useggas n 2015 di Tubiret. Fkan-as isem n yiwen umeɣras “ Leulmi Belkacem “. Teqeddec tdukla i lmendad n yigerdan ixussen, imi ahil d amerkanti. Talalit n tdukla tusa-d akken ad tuɣal d tajmilt i umeɣras Leulmi Belkacem , syin ad ɛiwnen igerdan, wid ixussen d wid yuḍnen. Xedmen yilmeẓyen n tdukla yakan yiwet n tirza ɣer yigerdan i yellan di sbiṭar n Draɛ El Mizan, wid n sbiṭar n Tizi uzzu anda i d-asen-wwin aṭas n warrazen akken ad-ten-sferḥen, ad ttun aṭṭan-nsen. Akken, daɣen, i xtaren yiwet n taddart di tɣiwant n Frikat i d-yezgan di tqacuct n udrar anda yella aṭas n lexṣas, ama si tama n ttawilat n usiweḍ neɣ ayen-nniḍen. U lac d acu id asen-yettawḍen ɣer din. Ihi, tejmeɛ-d tdukla ayen akk ara yesbaɛden asemmiḍ ɣef ugrud di tallit n tegrest, ama d acettiḍ ama d ssiwan neɣ d isebbaḍen ara yemmelsen deg udfel iwaɛren di temnadt-agi , akken daɣen i sferḥen azal n 120 n yigerdan di taddart n Qalus (di lwilaya n Tubiret ) imi wwin-asen arrazen i lmend n lɛid tamezyant. Ad d-nader daɣen ttawilat i d-fkan i i wulmis psychopédagogique i d-yezgan di tɣiwant n Buɣni. Mačči d aya kan, imi iɛeggalen n tdukla wwḍen ula ɣer tnezruft deg yiwet n taddart di tama n Tɣerdayt , akken ad ɛiwnen 400 n yigerdan igujilen imi ffkan-asen lbus i lmend n lɛid. Mazal-iten qeddcen , akken i d-tberraḥ tselwayt n tdukla Massa Fariza Leulmi i uɣmis : “Aql-aɣ nettheggi-d lemɛawnat i wazal n 180 n yigerdan ara nefk di temnadt n Tissemsilt akken ad qablen yis-sen tagrest n useggas-a. Igerdan-a, d wid ixussen, d igellilen, d igujilen , d wid yuḍnen , terna-d deg wawal-is d akken ḥwajen lemɛawna si yal amdan akken ad yali umḍan n yigerdan ara d yesfaydin s lemɛawnat-a. Massa Leulmi tger-d tiɣri s yisem-is d taselwayt n Tidukla Leuli Belkacem akken ad d-ffken medden afus n lemɛawna i lmendad n igerdan-a i ixussen. “Limer yal yiwen deg-nneɣ, ad d-yefk cit, agrud ur t-yettxaṣa wara , d lwajeb fell-aneɣ ass-a ad nili d tiyemmatin d ibabaten n igujilen-a”, i tettweṣsi tselwayt-a. Wid yebɣan ad ɛiwnen tiddukkla di leqdic-a, zemmren ad ssiwlen ɣer wuṭṭun : 07 70 53 10 06 akken, daɣen, tzemrem ad twalim leqdic-nsen ɣef uɣarab-nsen di Facebook : Association du martyr Leulmi Belkacem . 

  Souhila Yamani 

  
 Ddaw leɛnaya n tɣiwant n Timizart, id yezgan deg tamnaḍt n At Jennad, tella-d yiwet n timllit assen n lerbaɛ yezrin deg axxam n tmkarḍit ( bibliothèque) tamaynut-t ɣef demma n twennaṭ (envoronnement ) akked uguren iccuden ɣer liḥala-s yerkin tagara-agi ama di tamnaḍt n Tmizart neɣ di tmurt n Leqbayel wakali. Timlilit-agi, id yussan di lwan-is, tezdi tidukliwin tidelsanin yellan deg annar, akked d wid teɛna talluft s wudem usrid iqedcen deg aḥric-agi. Ayen id yufaren di tamlilit-agi d- akken amur ameqran n-iḍuman yasamasen agama (la nature) d-iḍuman n twaculin imi azal-is yugar 60%. Ɣef aya imusnawen teɛna talluft-agi n-tezdeg n-lexlawi-nneɣ akked leḥwari –nneɣ wekden ɣef useqdec nwafrsen-agi akken nniḍen. Meḥsub lemmer tiwaculin ttanin-t iḍuman-nsen akken iwata, ayen yellan d–agmani (organique) yelha lemmer ad yetwejmaɛ weḥdes di ṭerḥa akken ad yerku ad yuɣal d leɣbar si ara d sfaydin-t tiqwirin akked timazirin d-ifalahen sumata. Nnig waya anect-an ad yesenqes lḥawj ɣer leɣbar akruran (engrais chimique) n luzinat yesluɣuyen ugar tawennaṭ almi d-ulamek! 

 Maca akken ad yedru waya (targit ad tuɣal d tidet), ilaq iɣermaniyen (mačči kan wid n tiɣwant n Timizart, imi taluft terza yakk leqbayel) ad nedkawelen ɣef cceda deg gren agama-nsen, ad sehbiren fell-as uqbal wiyaḍ acku anect-a yeqqen ɣer tadawsa-nsen ( santé) akked tadawsa n-wakal s timad-is. 

 Tidet! Ayen akka nettawali tagara- agi yugar leɛjeb imi anda ma nedda iḍuman mberezwaɛen akkin akka deg iberden, gar leḥwari, deg iqwiren, deg tiẓgwa, ɣef taftisin… ulac tamnaḍt imeɛen i reks-agi yeṭṭeqqir umdan s-ustehzi anda yuffa. Mačči kan d lɛib fellaɣ wanect-a n wer ttrebga, meɛna aya yettecmit ayen iɣ d-yezzin, yesenqaḍ imeḍqan n-usgunfu, inaq imɣan akked tuga, igelu s-iɣersiwen, yettawid yal aṭan i yimdanen. Yewweḍ lḥal alarmi xas tizmrin yeɣlayen aṭas ɣer wul n ibabaten d tyamatin-nneɣ yewwet-iten-t ujeǧiḍ n “wacɛendifih” nerra d-lqaleb i tudert –nneɣ nekni (meḥsub) s-ljil n tura yettaren iman-sen ɣran, fehmen, snan neɣ d-at nnif. Xudi zik, xas akken imawlan-nneɣ werǧin yeṭṭef-iten dderz n ṛwah ɣer iɣerbazen neɣ tisdawiyin, ǧǧan-aɣ-d tudrin d-tizdganin, tiliwa tibaḥanin, tizegwa d-imeḍqan n laman, tiftisin d-timsunin nnig wakal.

 Ahat anect-a n uɛamed ɣef usefsed n twannaṭ yekka-d deg yiwen uḥulfu uffir iɣ yesafhamen belli ayen yezdin medden “d- ayla n baylek” mačči nneɣ. Ɣef aya yerɣa, neɣ yexla, yummes neɣ yemečč ur aɣ-id yecqi-ara; Ahat diɣ aya( n-ustehzi akked uzaylal) d lumayer ɣef yir aṭan iɣ-yeblan yugaren wiyaḍ : lkerh n yiman-nneɣ, aɣanfi n timadit-nneɣ sgusfen tijɛal akked tmaɛ n tudert tushilt wer acemer n- iɣalen. Lejwab ahat leqay, aya d-aɣbel n imesmmatiyen (sociologues) akked imusnawen n yiman (psychologues) ammer yiwwas aɣ-id sefrun ayen akka iɣ texreb targit. Lḥir amenzu d-addud s lɛajlan ɣef ugama akken ad t-id nesukkes deg yir liḥala deg yeẓẓl yesmurḍus. Ɣef aya lemmer yal yiwen deg-nneɣ ad yecrew kan zdat waxxam-is, di tuqna n tiṭ reḥba a tizdig irkeli. Ahat tagara n wawal d-amek is yenna Lounis Ait Menguellet : “win yebɣan a tt-seggem.. iseggem iman-is!”

  Iḥemziyen Tafaska n tqenqurt n Leqbayel 

 S ddaw leɛnaya n uselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Tiddukkla tadelsant “Tagmat” n taddart n Yiḥemziyen, Tasqamut n taddart-agi akked Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Yilula Umalu, s tallelt n waṭas n yidisan gar-asen: Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Tanmehla n usegmi taɣelnawit n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu…atg, heggan-d ussan-agi yezrin tafaska n tqendurt n Leqbayel deg tezrigt-is tis ṭam, deg taddart n Yiḥemziyen deg tɣiwant n Yilula Umalu deg ladayra n Buzgan. D tadwit tis 8, yeddan ɣef teɣzi n 2 wussan, imi tebda ass-nni n lexmis 10 deg waggur n ɣuct tasebḥit n wass, temdel tiwwura-s azekka-in n lǧemɛa 11 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Deg tezrigt n useggas-a, yella-d usenɛet n waṭas n tewsatin (leṣnaf) n tqendyar n tmurt n leqbayel, am wakken daɣen i d-llant aṭas n temsikniyin-nniḍen. Aseggas-agi gan-tt d tajmilt i temɣarin akk n taddart i iɛeddan 70 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer.

  Saḥel Tameɣra tamniḍan n tkermusin 

 S ddaw leɛnaya n uselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzz, Tiddukkla tadelsant “Saḥel” , tasqamut n taddart-agi n Saḥel akked Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Buzgan, s tallelt n waṭas n yidisan gar-asen: Agraw anaddal n Saḥel, Tiddukkla n tlawin, tin n useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt “Tudert di twennaḍt”, Tiddukkla n yiseyyaden n taddart-agi, heggan-d ddurt-agi yezrin tameɣra tamniḍant n tkermusin deg tezrigt-is tis seddis, deg taddart n Saḥel deg tɣiwant akked ladayra n Buzgan. D tadwit tis 6, yeddan ɣef teɣzi n 3 wussan, imi tebda ass-nni n lǧemɛa 11 deg waggur n ɣuct tasebḥit n wass, temdel tiwwura-s selazekka-in n lḥed 13 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Deg tezrigt n useggas-a, iwumi fkan asentel-agi “Lhiba-k d asennan, i lɣella-k amek igan yinnan”, yella-d usenɛet n waṭas n tewsatin (leṣnaf) n ukermus n tmurt n leqbayel, d wayen akk i d-ittekken seg-s am wakken daɣen i d-llant aṭas n temsikniyin-nniḍen.

  Aḥriq Tafaska n tamemt d tzizwa 

 S ddaw tecḍaḍt n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Tasqamut n taddart n Uḥriq akked Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Buzgan, s tallelt n Tenmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, suddsen-d smana-agi iɛeddan tafaska n tamemt d tzizwa deg tezrigt-is tis semmus, deg taddart n Uḥriq akked ladayra n Buzgan. D tadwit tis 5, yeddan ɣef teɣzi n 3 wussan, imi tebda s wudem unṣib tasebḥit n wass-nni n ttlata 15 deg waggur n ɣuct, temdel tiwwura-s ass-nni n lexmis yezrin 11 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Deg tezrigt n useggas-a, yella-d usenɛet n waṭas n tewsatin (leṣnaf) n tamemt n tmurt n leqbayel, am wakken daɣen i d-llant aṭas n temsikniyin-nniḍen, yecban timsikent n ufexxar, tin n teɣrasin, tin tqendyar n Leqbayel, tin n lfeṭṭa…atg. Llan-d diɣ yisenza s yibudduyen n yidlisen n tmaziɣt, am wakken daɣen i d-yella umeslay sɣur ifellaḥen ixeddmen tizizwa deg tamaḍt-agi n Buzgan, meslayen-d diɣ ɣef wazalen tesɛa tamemt d wanda i tt-ssexdamen medden. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella wahil adelsan d amerkanti ɣef teɣzi n kraḍ n wussan-agi ideg i d-teḍra tfaska-agi, ɣer taggara maḍi, tella-d tmeɣra n taggara s tukcci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i yimsikniyen d usebɣes n yifellaḥen.

  Mzeggen Tafaska n yimɣan n usejji 

 S ddaw tecḍaḍt n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Tiddukkla tadelsant “Tigemi n Mzeggen” akked Tesqamut n taddart-agi n Mzeggen, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Yilula Umalu, ladayra n Buzgan, s tallelt n waṭas n yidisan gar-asen: Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, iɣef tella Massa Goumizaine ɣef uqerruy-s, Aseqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Yilula Umalut, suddsen -d ddurt-agi deffir-nneɣ tazrigt tis ukuẓ n tfaska n yimɣan n usejji, deg taddart n Mzeggen, yellan deg tɣiwant n Yilula Umalu deg ladayra n Buzgan. Tazrigt n useggas-agi gan-tt yimsuddsen-agi d tajmilt i Mass Messaoudane Mohand Oussalah n taddart-agi n Mzeggen. D ttiɛad-agi adelsan, deg tezrigt-is tis 4 yeddan ɣef teɣzi n 3 wussan, imi yebda s wudem unṣib tasebḥit n wass-nni n letnayen yezrin 10 deg waggur n ɣuct, temdel tiwwura-s ass-nni n larebɛa iɛeddan 11 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Ma d ahil yettwaxdamen deg 3 wussan-agi n tfaska-agi, yella-d d anesbaɣur , yedda akka: Deg wass amezwaru 14 ɣuct 2017, ɣef 09h00 n ssbaḥ tella-d tulya tunṣibt n tezrigt-agi, syin ɣef 10h00 tuɣal-as tejmilt meqqren i umejjay Messaoudene Med Oussalah. Am wakken i d-llant waṭas n temsikniyin, yecban tin n yimɣan n usejji, tin n useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt d ugama, timsikent n tẓuri, tin n yisekla d yijeǧǧigen, timsikent d usenzi n yidlisen yerzan imɣan n udawi…atg. Mebla ma nettu snat-nni n temsizzliyin i xedmen imezdaɣ n taddart-agi. Γef 14h00 n uzal, yella-d usarag ɣef yimɣan n usejji, sɣur sin n yimussnawen, wigi d Mass Zennichi Hennachi akked Mass Mellal Hassan. Ma ɣef 16h00 n tmeddit, tella-d tirza ɣer umḍiq “Alma”, anida i d-ttawin imɣan-agi n udawi. Syin akkin seg 21h30 n yiḍ d afella, tella-d terbaɛt n ccna n warrac “Tigmi” n taddart-agi, syin ɣer-s d tukcci n warrazen i yinelmaden i d-yewwin ikayaden n taggara n useggas, ma ɣer taggara maḍi, tella-d urar n tceqquct n umezgun n terbaɛt n taddart-agi “Tamuɣli”. Ma deg wass wis sin, i d-yellan ass-nni ttlata 15 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, ɣef 09h00 n ssbaḥ llant-d temsikniyin n wass-nni amezwaru, ɣef 10h00 yella-d usarag ɣef useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt, sɣur tlata n yimussnawin deg uḥric-a, wigi d Mass Mesbahi Mohamed, Tamsiwt Hellal Fatiha akked temsiwt Hellal Dahbia. Ma ɣef 17h30 n tmeddit, banen-d yigemmaḍ n snat-nni n temsizzliyin i xedmen iḍelli-nni n ttlata, syin ɣef 19h00 tella-d zedwa n cḍeḥ aqbayli, ma ɣer taggara yella-d cwiṭ n umezgun sɣur Massi Lewhama. Ma deg wass wis kraḍ, i d-yellan ass-nni larebɛa 16 deg waggur-agi n ɣuct ideg nella, ɣef 09h00 n ssbaḥ llant-d temsikniyin n wass-nni amezwaru d wis sin, ɣef 10h00 yella-d usenɛet ɣef useḥbiber ɣef terwiḥt n umdan sɣur iɛeggalen n Waggur azeggaɣ azzayri n Azazga. Ma ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, yella-d uskan n zzwaǧ d tmeɣra n leqbayel n zik, syin ɣef 15h00 tella-d zedwa n wurar n lxalat sɣur tilawin d temɣarin n taddart, ma ɣer taggara tella-d tmeɣra n ccna.

  Iḥiṭussen Tafaska n tmeẓla (la forge)  

 Taseqqamut n taddart n Yiḥiṭussen akked Tiddukkla tadelsant “Sebɛa Zbari” n taddart-agi n Yiḥiṭussen, heggan-d tazrigt tis kraḍ n tfaska n tmeẓla (la forge), i yeddan ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan. Imi tebda tasebḥit n wass-nni n lḥed 06 deg waggur n ɣuct, tekfa tameddit n wass-nni n ttlata 08 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Tazrigt-agi tis tlata fkan-as asentel n “Times deg lkir, tazmert n ddkir”. Llan-t ddeqs n temsikniyin, yecban: tamsikent n wallalen n uḥeddad neɣ n umzil d usegzi n twuri n yal yiwen seg-sen, sɣur iḥeddaden n taddart-agi i mazal ṭṭfen deg tefḍisin-nni i d asen-ǧǧan imawlan-nsen. Am wakken yella deg yinzi: “Yessers uḥeddad afḍis, irfed-it mmi-s”. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella umeslay s tewzel ɣef umahil n uḥiṭus, imi qqaren isem n taddart-agi anamek-ines d iḥeddaden. Mebla ma nettu timsikniyin n lfeṭṭa , n talaɣt, n yidlisen, n tamemt, zzit…atg. Bɣan yimsuddsen n tfaska-agi, ad ssiwḍen taẓuri-agi d umahil-agi i tsutwin-agi timaynutin, i wakken ad ẓren amek tga lxedma n wuzzal d wamek xeddmen allalen n wuzzal sexdamen yal ass, ama d agelzim, taqabact, afḍis…atg. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer wazal tesɛa tẓuri-agi deg tmetti, ad naf teṭṭef amḍiq d ameqqran, d ayen i d-yettbanen deg waṭas n yinzan, gar-ase: “Xeddmen uzzal mi yeḥma”, yella wina i d-nebder yakkan. Tella daɣen tenfalit i d-yekkan seg umahil-agi, daymi qqaren: “Gar zzebra d yifḍisen”.  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – I lmend n wesfugel n umulli wis 400 n tmettant n umaru aspenyuli Miguel de Cervantes, yebda-d, ass n lexmis, wesɛedi n yifetrawen (acriṭa wata’iqiyya) ɣef tmeddurt n umaru-a deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt. Tadyant-a tella-d deg Usudu n Cervantes n Lezzayer Tamaneɣt s wemɛawen d wenmahal n Spenyul deg Lezzayer. Asudu n Cervantes ad d-yesɛeddi 4 n yisura tikkelt i dduṛt, yernu ad ikemmel waya arma d ass n 28 Yebrir. Asaru amezwaru ay d-sɛeddan d «Tisselbiwin n Don Quijote» ay d-yessawalen ɣef wemsudem-nni (caxṣiyya) mechuṛen ay d-yesnulfa umaru-a. Asaru-a tfures-it-id tliẓri taspenyulit, yettaḍḍaf snat n tsaɛtin yernu yesɛedday-d tidyanin tixatarin (hamma) n Don Quijote d tuqqna-nsent ɣer umezruy d tsertit (tagara n lqern wis 16 d tezwara n wis 17) ay yeǧǧan Cervantes ad yaru ɣef waya. Adlis n Don Quijote yebder-d 5-nni n yiseggasen ay yekka Cervantes d ameḥbus deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt asmi ay tella ddaw udabu aɛetmani. Tadyant-a n wesɛeddi n yisura semman-es «Allus n terzi ɣef Cervantes» yernu tella-d ɣer yidis n yermuden (nacaṭat), gar-asen awway n yibalmuden (talamid) akken ad ḥewwsen deg Lezzayer yernu ad ssnen amkan aydeg yeqqim Cervantes seg 1575 ɣer 1580, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna tnemhalt n Usudu n Cervantes, Raquel Romero Guillemas. Tirzi-a d-yellan i lfayda n yibalmuden n yiɣerbazen inagduden d wusligen s wemɛawen d tɣiwant n Mohamed-Belouizdad, ad teqleɛ seg Leqṣer n Ṛṛeyyas (Bastion 23), ad tekk ɣef Teqṣebt n Lezzayer, sakkin ad taweḍ ɣer Yefri n Cervantes d-yusan deg wegmam (ḥayy) n Lḥamma, anda ay yeffer umaru-nni d 13 seg yimeddukal-nnes asmi ay yeɛreḍ ad yerwel. Ifri-nni ay yeqqimen acḥal yettweǧǧ, yuɣal yesɛa taɛessast yernu tṣeggem tɣiwant n Belouizdad aḥric seg-s s lemɛawna d tmahelt (safara) n Spenyul deg Lezzayer. Nnig waya, seg yimir-n ɣer wass-a, uɣalent ttilint-d din tnemsal (waracat) i yigerdan.Ass n 23 Yebrir yellan d amulli n tmettant n Cervantes (yemmuten deg 1616), ad yili daɣ d ass n «tɣuri yettkemmilen» n wedlis n «Don Quijote de la Mancha» s tutlayin yemgerraden deg Usudu adelsan aspenyuli.

<p style="text-align: right;"> APS 

  
 Taɛacurt, am wakken ẓran tuget n yimdanen, d tameɣra n wudayen. Ttuẓumen deg-s yiwen wass d tajmilt i Musa i ten-id-iselken seg uɣraq, ɣef wakken i d-ḥekkun.

 Syin, refden-tt ula d inselmen u ttuẓumen sin wussan mačči kan yiwen, i wakken ad mgaraden nutni d wudayen. Tettas-d deg wass wis 10 n waggur n muḥaren. Xas ulamma d yiwen uẓar-is, meɛna yemgarad wamek i tt-sfugulen yinselmen : ɣer Wat n sunna, d tameɣra n yigerdan, ma ɣer Wat n cciɛa, d ass n leḥzen imi i d-smektayen tamettant n Ḥusayn mmi-s n Ɛli, aggaw n Nnbi. Deg tmurt n leqbayel, tettuneḥsab Tɛacurt d ass n lferḥ akked talwit imi i as-rnan kra n tɣawsiwin deg usfugel-is. Ayen i tt-yeǧǧan ad tekcem deg yidles aqbayli s umata. Zyada ɣef wuẓum n tɛacurt, ttheggint twaculin n leqbayel imensi-is. Yettili imensi n tɛacurt d seksu s ucedluḥ neɣ aksum melḥan, akken i as-qqaren deg kra temnaḍin. Aksum-a, d win akken i d-kksen seg yikerri-nni n lɛid tameqqrant, melḥent u ǧǧant i tɛacurt. Ihi, ass n yimensi n tɛacurt, d ass n lferḥ ɣer yiqbayliyen imi i d-nnejmaɛen akk yiɛeggalen n twacult. Azekka-nni, sewwayen lesfenǧ akked lemsemmen i ttefraqen i lǧiran neɣ ttmuddun-t d lwaɛda ɣer lǧameɛ. D ass, diɣ, anda i ttṣeṭṭilen i lufan mi ara d-yezzi fell-as useggas. Seg wakken fkan azal leqbayel i tɛacurt, ula d agrud mi ara d-ilalen deg tɛacurt, ttsemmin-as Ɛcur. Ass n Tɛacurt, ttawin agrud yenneḍ daxel ubernus n baba-s neɣ n jeddi-s ɣer lemqam i ten-iqerban. Mi wwḍen s amekkan, ad t-sneqlabayel deg lqaɛa u ad as-dɛun s ddaɛwa n lxir ɣer uɛessan-nni. Taɛacurt, diɣ, d ass anda ttɛecciren yimdanen, meḥsub ttseddiqen amur wis 10 n wayen sɛan, ɣef wakken i d-qqaren. Aya, seg tama n twacult. Ma seg tama n taddart, d taswiɛt anda i ttgen timecreṭ u xeddmen lwaɛda, ladɣa deg yimekwan n Sadat. Mazal ar tura, llan wid yettamnen d akken aya-agi igellu-d s ddwa i wid yuḍnen, wid ur nettarew ara neɣ wid ɛad ur nezwiǧ. Qqaren-d, diɣ, ur ilaq ara ad txedmeḍ deg wass n tɛacurt, ma ulac ad tuɣaleḍ ad ttergigiḍ. Llan kra ar tura, mi ara walin yiwen ittergigi, ladɣa ma yehlek lehlak ‘’Parkinson’’, qqaren-as yexdem Taɛacurt. Zik, ttemɣen warrac ɣef yixxamen, ssuturen leɛcur, ama d tagella neɣ d idrimen, ttgen buɛfif i wudem-nsen, ad leḥḥun, ad ttɣennin. Deg kra n temnaḍin, ayen akk ara d-jemɛen, ad ferqen i yigellilen. Xas ulamma kkren-d kra n tammiwin timḍerfin mgal asfugel n Tɛacurt imi deg tmurt n Suɛudiya tettɛedday kan akka, acu kan uɣalent-d waṭas n tudrin n tmurt n leqbayel ɣer usfugel n Tɛacurt deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura.  Hocine Moula 

  
 Tameddit n wass n lḥed yezrin 24 yulyu 2016, tella-d tulya tunṣibt n tezrigt tis 13 n tfaska Ḥkku-d aẓuri “Raconte-arts”, s usentel "Ales-iyi-d Tagelda n Kuku " di taddert n Ṣwamaε lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu,

 Anda iḥedren nnig n 250 n yinaẓuren i d-yussan si temnaḍin yemgaraden n tmurt n Lezzayer d wazal n 50 n yinaẓuren i d-yussan si tmura n lbarani, am Fransa, Tunes, Congo, Muritani, Lmaruk d waṭas-niḍen. D leqdic ara yeddun γef teγzi n 08 n wussan, alamma d 31 yulyu 2016. Tulya tunṣibt n tfaska-agi, tella-d deg ubraḥ n baylek n taddert n Ṣwama&amp;epsilon,; anda imḍebren yellan γef lmendad n tfaska-agi fkkan-d kra n wawalen am Ḥassen Metref akked Denis Martinez, akken i d-meslayen kra n yimḍebren n tγiwanin am Ṣwama&amp;epsilon,; illulen Umalu, inaẓuren, syin Mass Meẓyan Sadji aselway n tesqamut n taddart n Ṣwamaε iberraḥ-d s tulya tunṣibt n tfaska-agi. Si tama niḍen, Massa Ladeddou Taseεdit, tamγart tazemnit n taddart n Ṣwamaε i yesεan qrib 100 n yiseggasen, tella d lqibla i d-yefkan limara amenzu n beddu n leqdic n tẓuri. Deqs n twaculin d imezdaγ n tudrin n leqbayel i d-yussan, fursen tagniti ad gzin s yidelsan n tmura n lbarani. Si tama-nniḍen, inaẓuren n tmura n lbarani, snaεten-d idelsan-nsen, ugmen deg yidelsan-nneγ. Ahil i yettwajerden d amesbaγur, anda llant temsikniyin yemgaraden, isaragen, isura, ticeqqufin n umezgun, timucuha, tamedyazt, ccna, timliliyin…atg. Uraren deg yiberdan akked yizenqan. Iswi n tfaska-agi d asnerni d unegmu n yidles amaziɣ akked tefriqt s umata d wuẓẓu n tayri deg wulawen n yimdanen, asebγes n tẓuri i tudrin n leqbayel, aẓeṭṭa n tegmatt gar yigduden d usbeddi n tqentyar gar tmura n wagerakkal.

 I usmekti, tafeska-agi, tsuddes-itt-id tdukla n tẓuri n sinima n Tizi Uzzu, s lemɛawna n Useqqamu aγerfan n ugerzu n Tizi-uzzu, imḍebren n tγiwant n Ṣwama&amp;epsilon,; taseqqamut n taddart Ṣwamaε d tidukliwin tesεa, akked yimezdaγ n taddart-a. 

 Leqdic iteddu akken iwata lḥal imi gren irebbi i leqdic-agi γef teγzi n useggas-aya.

Yesufɣed aserɣrez (album) i umi isemma Tifat. ɣer rezrigin “Edition Guraya-Music”. <p style="text-align: right;"> Lasheb Ramdane 

 
  
 Si Lḥafiḍ isem-is aḥeqqani Yaḥa Ʃabd Lḥafid d ameɣras ameqqran ilul ass n 26 deg yennayer aseggas n 1933 deg Texliğt At Ʃettu ( taɣiwant n yiferḥunen ) lɛerc n Wat Yililten ibeɛden s 65 ikilumitren ɣef Tizi Wezzu , d azamul n ṭṭrad d amğahed ameqqran ixeddmen aṭas ɣef tmurt –is , seg wasmi meẓẓi i yebda akafaḥ ɣef tmurt n Lzzayer , deg useggas 1954 ikcem-d ɣer tmurt akken ad yexdem ( L’ALN) deg Ʃin El ḥemmam ( Micli ) yella d aqerru (officier) , n yiserdasen iṛumyen , si Lḥafiḍ yuwi abrid azeddgan n yigrawliwen i yessen umaḍal tabɣest –is id-yuwin tilelli n tmurt , yella d aɣella n temnaḍt gar Ʃin El ḥmmam d Dreɛ Lmizan ixuleḍ yakan 21 n yiseggasen wid yellan d imeqqran deg temnaḍt tis kraḍet ( wilaya 03) d wiyaḍ gar-asen : Ʃmer At Ccix , Aɛmiruc , Aɛli Mellaḥ, Uɛamran , Ʃabban Remḍan , Krim Belqasem , Yucef Xaltib, Muḥend Ulḥağ , Ʃabd Reḥman, Mira , yerna d netta d watmaten-is igrawliwen i yeṭṭfen la sécurité de la délégation (tamagla) yesedda Ʃabban Remḍan , mi yettruḥu ɣer Ifri akken ad xedmen akken ilaq le congré de la soummam , d aɣella ( chef) ger yigrawliwen , si Lḥafiḍ ikemmel abrid-is d umenneɣ , mebla ma yebra i ṭṭbel deg waman , iḥureb ɣef yizerfan n umdan , yedda deg ubrid n tlelli almi tuwi tmurt timunent-is ,yella d aqerru ɣef ukabar n FFS, yexdem netta d Muḥend Ulḥağ mgal adabu n Ben Bella d ugraw n ( d’oujda ) , ɣas akken yella deg Fransa si Lḥafiḍ ul-is ur yeği ara tamurt , yerna ar tura imdanen isertiyen snen d acu i d azal –is d wayen akk yexdem seg wul –is , ɣer taggara ad d-nini ayen id-nenna fell-as drus , yemmut deg furar 2016 , mmi-s iger-d tiɣri i yimdanen it-yesnen neɣ ur t-nessin akken ad d-asen s waṭas ad ḥedren 40 wussan iɛeddan ɣef lmut-is ad d-yilin ass n 18 deg meɣres-agi ad d-iteddun , akken tɛedda tyita n uzamul Ḥusin Ayt Ḥmed terna-d tyita n si Lḥafiḍ , wigi tefka-ten-id Ʃin El Ḥemmam i tmurt n Lzzayer , yefkan tudert-nsen akken Lzzayer ad as-yekkes lbaṭel wa ad tesfeḍ imeṭṭawen, ad ten-yerḥem Rebbi. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia yahia 

  
 Amuḍin yesteqniɛ ma yella tsubb-as tawla xas aṭan werǧin i t-yeffiɣ. Akka i d-teḍra d kra n teẓrigin akked yemyura ɣer-nneɣ d agi di tmurt. Ṛewwun s tunṭict amzun akken yella kra gran gar tuɣmas akken a t-feẓẓen. Xuḍi teḍṛa-tt yid-sen am win umi zaden ggaren-as awren. Lferḥ-nsen mi ara walin sin neɣ tlata n yidlisen i d-sufɣen i useggas sɛan rreḥba di ssuq –agi n wedlis (SILA) i d- yettilin yal aseggas di lẓẓayer tamanaɣt. D ahdum ! Di tmura irebḥen tiẓrigin sufuɣent-d idlisen i lmend n tsekla i tazwara, mačči akken ad ttikkint s yidlisen-nni deg welbaɛd n leswaq agraɣlanen i d- yettilin sya d sya di tmura n ddunit. Tasertit n teẓrigin-agi tebna ɣef ṣṣwab: aṣsiwed n wedlis i yimeɣṛiyen anda ma llan di yal lawan . Yal yiwet anwa aḥric di tira i tɛebba. Llant teẓrigin yesɛan d cɣel tasekla s wudmawen-is ( ungalen, tullizin, tamedyazt, amezgun) am akken llant tiyaḍ amahil-nsent yeqqen ɣer tira ɣef umezruy, ɣef tussna, ɣef tsertit, ɣef tasnametti. Nnig waya deg yiwet n teẓrigt ad naf aṭas n taneklisin( collections). Amedya tiẓrigin n Harmathan tesɛa taneklist n wungalen , tin n tullizin, tin n tmedyazt … S wakka yal aḥric di tira yesɛa tansa-ines i wakken ad yaf abrid ɣer tawafɣa yerna ad yaweḍ ɣer imeɣṛiyen teɣzi n useggas s lmend n tinedlisin( libraries). 

 Maca ɣer-nneɣ nekni kulci yemgared. Tuget n teẓrigin, ma yella izad, sufuɣent-d xemsa ɣer setta n tektabin deg useggas yerna merra ttraǧunt lawan deg i d-yettili ssuq-agi n wedlis( SIlA) akken ad sufɣen tiktabin-agi acku yis-sent i d- ttafent tagnit akken ad sbucɛent iman-nsent di rreḥba-agi. Mi yekfa ssuq ad tezzi takka ɣef ayen i d-sufɣen..war ma yesla yis-s yiwen neɣ yuɣ-itent wayeḍ. Ahdum nniḍen ula d imyura ddan deg urar-agi( anda aqlileḥ iɛuned tikli) imi lferḥ-nsen mi ara d-ttwanecden ɣer din( Ɣer SILA) amzun wissen acu n warraz agreɣlan n tsekla i d-wwin. Ziɣ daymi i qqaren deg awal:  » laẓ ur i seččaya ara baba »! Ajeǧǧîḍ-agi( i taggara-agi) iḥuza ula d wid yettarun s teqbaylit imi nwan dayen ḥerren-d amḍiq acku ggan-asen abziz n nuba di rreḥba-agi n wedlis(SILA) xas ulamma ziɣ llan kan d ajɣed n zyada neɣ iqfafen n taggara . Ziɣ llan wid iḥamlen aɣebbaṛ s allen .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 “Ma s yedmaren ka, ulac s wacu gar ifassen, tebɣes ara yeffuktin sdat rrsas, mačči d tebɣes, d tisselbi ! Ilmeẓyen bernen-d syin, ɣilen tarewla temneɛ baba-is. Usan-d kan ad inin, d igerjyam  i d-ineṭqen. Usan-d ad d-seknen d beqqu i bɣan taɣdemt. Usan-d ad d-seknen amenni deg usugdu meqqer, umnene yes-s, amenni deg tlelli meqqer, umnene yes-s !  Ur d-usan ara ad nɣen , twalam ifassen d ilmawen.  Ur d-usan ara ad mmten, ssnen azal n tudert.   Ulac win i d-teǧǧa tuzuṭ, d tisednan i ten-id-yurwen !  Akken ma llan din, ɛzizit ɣef imawlan-nsen yettraǧun, msakit, deg uɣedlalaf ideg zzren.  

 Ilmeẓyen bernen aɛrur, ddzen igerzan abrid, yerna s tazla, tiṭ ɣer zdat tayeḍ ɣer deffir !

 Ageffur n waldun ur yewwi ara, ibeddel tanila, tura yekkat d akessar neɣ d aglawan.

 Arrac ur mniɛen ara !  Amek ara menɛen ?” 

  tettwakkes-d tunṭičt seg usebtar aneggaru n ungal

  
 Deg ddurt-agi iɛeddan, ḍrant-d ukuẓ n twaɣiyin anda, sebba-nsent tamenzut, d amdan. Tamezwarut d tin i d-yeḍran deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt, anda yiwen n urgaz yenɣa tameṭṭut, syin yegzem ljessa-s d iceqqufen. Tis snat, deg tmanaɣt daɣen, yiwen urgaz yezla yiwet n tmeṭṭut deg ubrid sdat n tmuɣli n yemdanen. Tayeḍ, teḍra-d deg temdint n Sṭif , yiwen urgaz ad yili yesɛa 60 n yiseggasen yejreḥ 8 n yiɛeyyalen si twacult-is yerna yewwi tarwiḥt n 3 n wiyaḍ. Ma yella d taneggarut d tin yessewhamen, d tin ara yeǧǧen amdan ad yessteqsay : Anda yella umḍiq n uɣerbaz ? Anda tella ttrebga n twacult ? Uɣalen warrac amzun amzun akken deg umadeɣ i d-kkren, amzun akken ulac tawacult ara sen-islemden ayen yelhan d wayen n diri? Ihi, tagi d yiwet n teqcict i yesɛan 15 n yiseggasen kan mi i tewwi taǧaret-is i yesɛan 8 n yiseggasen akken ad tt-texnaq s yiwen n tcelwiḍt. Ugar n 250 n tlawin i icetkan ɣef tmuḥeqqranit i yedrandeg-sent deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu deg yiseggasen 2016/2017.

  Souhila Yamani 

  
 Deg yiḍ n wass n 14 ṭuber iɛeddan i yuɣal yettwasbed usebdad Meɛtub Lwennas deg tɣiwant n Suq Letnin, i d-yezgan s wazal n 35 n yikilumiṭren i usamar n waɣir n Bgayet, d tajmilt sɣur Ugraw Aɣerfan Aɣiwan n temnaḍt-a. Azekka-nni tasebḥit, 15 deg ṭuber, mi d-ufan asebdad-a deg umkan yimezdaɣ n Suq Letnin d yiseqdacen n ubrid aɣelnaw wis ṭẓa, yal yiwen ɣer wanda imal rray-is, yal yiwen amek iqubel udem amaynut i d-yefka usebdad mbeɛd mi yettwaɛiwed. Am wakken aṭas n wawal i d-yellan deg yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen mi walan medden tiwlafin. Nezmer ad d-nini d akken rray amatu n yimḥemmalen n urgaz-a n umennuɣ, iruḥ i tikkelt-nniḍen d asḥissef d wurrif. Ttwalin lɣaci asebdad-a ajdid am usebdad amezwaru seg tama n umcabi ɣer unaẓur i yettzemmil. Tuget n wid i d-yessenfalin awennit, walan d akken ula d anqac-a wis sin ur yettak akk anzi i Lwennas Meɛtub. Maca, llan seg tama-nniḍen wid iwumi yeɛǧeb uqeddic am acemma, rnan sterḥben si tazwara s tigawt-a n lɛali i walan tif udem ara d-yesken usebdad, ama yecbeḥ neɣ uhu. Armi ceyyɛen ula d isnemmar n wul i yimḍebbren n tɣiwant n Suq Letnin i yellan deffir tekti-a n usebdad. « Nebɣa lemmer i nwala xir n waya, imi asebdad d ayen ara d-yeqqimen i tsutiwin. Meɛna ma d ayen iwumi zemren, ad nwali i wazal d tejmilt i as-yuɣalen i Dda Lwennas ». D awal n yiwen seg yimḥemmalen n bab n « Aɣurru ». Ilaq ad d-nesmekti belli asebdad-a yella yettwasbed abrid amezwaru ass n 20 yebril yezrin i lmend n usfuggel n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen, maca yettwakkes ussan-nni seld mi d-yewwet deg-s uzayez (public) i yennan fell-as yessexser maḍi udem d ssifa n uɣewwaɣ Lwennas Meɛtub. Seg wass-nni, yella ɣur unaẓur i t-imeslen, armi d talemmast n ṭuber-a, dɣa, i yuɣal yennerfad deg temdint n Suq Letnin. M. K.

  
 Yiwen wass, lliɣ kesseɣ nekk d tmeṭṭut-iw kra n yiɣersiwen i nesɛa deg akud-nni. Aqelwac d aberkan bernen wacciwen-is, taɣaṭ d tuzyint d tacebḥant, sin yiɣiden d iberqacen, d imelḥanen, tturaren, ṭṭinigen am uḥbac, tixsi, tebra kan i yimezzuɣen-is akk d yiwen yizimer yeṛwa. Ttaggadeɣ ad i yi-cckeḍ acku win yeṛwan yexdeɛ Rebbi. Nniɣ-d, ad ɛeddiɣ ad cerweɣ aslen, ad att ččen deg iḍ d imensi. Uliɣ sufella n teslent. uffiɣ tiweḍfin ttzzalent ɣer umahil. Qeddcent s nniḍam d lferḥ. Yal yiwet d acu n tɣawsa i d-tezuɣer yid-s. Ta tewwi-d aɛeqqa n yirden, ta tebbubbed abeɛɛuč yemmuten, ta tewwi-d aḥbub, ta d aɣrum… Hebseɣ axeddim, ttmuquleɣ-tent, wehmeɣ di tebɣest, di tuddsa, di leqfaza i asent-yefka Rebbi !ɣelbent tizizwa ! Tiweḍfin, imi iyi-d-wallant, yeṭṭef-itent lweswas, uɣalent « aggressiγes ». Zzint-iyi, grent-iyi di tlemmast, dɣa bdant ttsuɣunt fell-i: -Acimi aka i-id-ttmuquleḍ? Nkkenti mačči d ssinima ! Kečč t-banneḍ-d « l’espion »! -Xaṭi, nekk d ameksa. Ceɣleɣ kan d laẓz-iw, ur xeddmeɣ ara tasertit. Bɣiɣ kan ad zreɣ amek i ttidirent tweḍfin. Ma ulac uɣilif, sɛiɣ kra n yisteqsiyen. Ẓedment-d fell-i, Cuddent-iyi s snasel, dɣa wwint-iyi zdat n uselway nsent: -Mass! amdan-agi yesɛa tawnafit anect ilat.Yesɛa aṭas n yisteqsiyen. Cukteɣ d aselmad neɣ d aneɣmas. -Hḍer ɣiwel! d acu tebɣiḍ? -Tamezwarut bɣiɣ ad zreɣ ma tesɛamt « Syndicat » Ha ! Ha ! Ha ! d acu-t akka wagi ? neɣ d agraw-nni n Sidi claɣem ? Nkkenti ur nuḥwaǧ ara « Syndicat ». S uxeddim kan i nettqabel uguren. Nxeddem syimenzayen n-Jean de la Fontaine i yeqqaren : « Ulac acemma n rrebeḥ ma ula cwiṭ n uxeddim. » ur gziɣ ara belli tiweḍfin sɛant anect-a n tmussni ! Tenwiḍ ihi tiweḍfin tiɛeggunin ay amdan aḥeqqar ! Ticki id-yeɣli yiḍ, ad nebdu taɣuri n yidlisen ɣer tafat n tcemaɛt .Amer nesɛi trisiti am kunwi, ad nexdem awezɣi! -Acḥal …? -Dayen !berka isteqsiyen! T-deggreḍ-iyi acḥal n lweqt ! Assmi ara tissinem s izzayriyen azal i yesɛa lweqt d uxeddim, ad cbun timura yettazzen ɣer zdat yecban tamurt n Legniz i yeqqaren &lt;&lt;time is money.&gt;&gt; -fket-as kra n tyitwin ɣer tuzert n weksum i wezzayri afanyan, imir err-as tileli, ad yuɣal ɣer twacult-is ! Fkant-iyi-d azal n mraw n rkulat.Azagur-inu mazal iqreḥ-iyi ar ass-a.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Busad ¨Hemmar 

  
 “Idammen-nwen cemmεen amennuγ-nneγ γef tlelli, lweεd-neγ d akemmel deg yiseγ-nwen’’  Awalen-a, ttwarun s tefrensist deg tsebdadt i tga tγiwant n Tizi Uzzu s lemεawna n tiddukla n yineγmasen n Tizi Uzzu. Akka i bγan ad sen-rren tajmilt wid i d-yeggran i yineγmasen yemmuten : ladγa, wid-nni yenγa arebrab.

 Amekkan-a, yefteḥ-it lwali n Tizi Uzzu Mass Abdelkader  Bouazghi i lmend n leqdic i d-yettwaheggan  γef useggas wis 60 n tegrawla n tmurt n Lezzayer.

 I usmekti, amekkan anda tebna tsebdadt-agi tajdidt yella yakan seg yiseggasen-nni n 1990 : d aεawed i as-εawden akka tura, sqaεden-t akken iwata.

 Mebεed asebdad n Matoub, arrac n tefsut taberkan, Djaout d wiyaḍ, tamdint n Tizi Uzzu la tettuγal d takatawt (mémoire) n tmurt n Leqbayel.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Tiddukkla tadelsant n yinaẓuren n Yiwaḍiyen, s tallelt n waṭas n yidisan gar-asen, Axxam n yilmeẓyen n Yiwaḍiyen, Asqamu Aɣerfan Aɣiwan (APC) akked umussu addukklan…atg. Suddsen-d ddurt tadelsant i lmend n usfugel n useggas n yimaziɣen amaynut «Yennayer 2967», gan-tt d tajmilt i win isbedden takadimit tamaziɣt deg tmurt n Fransa deg 1966/1967, wagi d Mass Bessaoud Mohand Arab. Ad yeddu leqdic-agi ɣef teɣzi n 5 n wussan. Yeldi tiwwura-s s wudem unsib ass n ssebt iεeddan, 8 deg yennayer 2017, ad yekfu ass n, 13 deg waggur-a ideg nella. Ma d ahil yettwajerden i lmend ddurt-agi d amerkanti, imi tella-d iḍelli ssbaḥ deg uxxam n Yilmeẓyen n Yiwaḍiyen tulya tunsibt n leqdic-agi s tezrigt tis snat n temsizzelt n uẓawan di tewsit n «Ceεbi», tettekemmil ula d ass-agi n letnayen 9 deg waggur n yennayer. Ma i uzekka 10deg yennayer2017, ɣef 10h00 ssbaḥ alamma d 13h00, ad yili usarag sɣur tlata n yimussnawen d yimeɣnasen n tamaziɣt ; Brahim Ben Taleb, Bekkouche Said, Sidir Omar. Ad d-awin awal ɣef umecwar n tudert d imuhal n Bessaoud Mohand Arab. Ma ɣef 13h00 alamma d 16h00, ad d-yili usenεet n yiwen n usaru s tamaziɣt. Ma d selazekka 11 deg yennayer2017, ad d-yili ɣef 09h00 alamma d 12h00, tɣuri n yisefra sɣur aṭas n yimedyazen. Ma ɣef 12h00 d imekli n yennayer (sseksu s yiyuzaḍ), ad t-id yetbeε yiwen n warmmud amensay i warrac imecṭaḥ. Ma ɣef 13h00 d asawen, ad d-tili tmeɣra meqqren n ccna, sɣur aṭas n yinaẓuren. Ass n yennayer 12 deg yennayer2017, ɣef 08h00 n ssbaḥ, ad d-ruḥen seg Yiwaḍiyen ɣer taddart n Uqawej, i wakken ad sersen tameqqunt n yijeğğigen ɣef uẓekka n Bessaoud Mohend Arab, imi dina i yettwamḍel. Tameddit n wass, ad d-yili wurar n tceqqufin n umezgun, sɣur tarbaεt n Ait Ergane akked tiddukkla n yilmeẓyen n usirem n Ait Abdelmoumen. Ma d ass aneggaru 13 deg yennayer2017, tasebḥit n wass, ad d-yili wallus n tmacahut n yennayer, ma di tmeddit, ad d-tili tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes d tmeɣra n taggara. Am wakken daɣen i d-ilint waṭas n temsikniyin ɣef teɣzi n 5 wussan-agi, gar-asent iselsa iqburen, tiqenddurin, lfeṭṭa, talaɣt, taklut, isenza s ubuddu, akked temsikent n wayen i d-yeğğa d wayen yuran ɣef Bessaoud. Mass Amar Mokrani, d aselway n tiddukkla yenna-d: “Ad snimmreɣ aṭas tiddukkliwin tidelsanin i d-yerran i teɣri-nneɣ. D tagnit daɣen anida i d-nsemlal aṭas n yinaẓuren i d-iseknen axeddim-nsen i yimezdaɣ n Yiwaḍiyen, u nerra tajmilt meqqren i yiwen n urgaz ameqqran deg timeɣnest n tmaziɣt”.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ghani Amazigh 

 
  
 Segmi d-tecfa ddunit, yettwasteɛmer, yettwaḥqer ugdud amaziɣ. Deg talliyin-a, zgan yimaziɣen ttnaɣen mačči kan akken ad idiren, maca akken ad yidir yidles-nsen daɣen.

 Almi d tallit n ukcam n Fransa deg Lezzayer seg 1830 d asawen, mlalen-d Yimaziɣen d tsetratijit tamaynut n usehres. Tebda Fransa teɣɣar idles n yizwawen, deg umedya-nneɣ, syin thegga-d ahil amek ad t-tessedrem s wuẓi n yidles aberrani, abnaw n yiɣerbazen, timesgida…atg. 

 Deg zzman-nni dɣa, ufan yimesdurar tettbeddil tudert-nsen n yal ass, ula seg tama n tutlayt, imi d win i d asentel-nneɣ tura.

 Simmal iteddu zzman, Fransa mazal-itt deg wakal azwaw, simmal yettekcam-d umawal d amaynut i werǧin slan yis-s yimesdurar. Tamezwarut d tameslayt n yifransisen n yal ass am : «bonjour», «évidemment», «en tout cas», «soirée». Da, ur ufan yizwawen iman-nsen deg uḥettem ad ten-ddmen imi, yiwet sɛan igdazalen-nsen iheggan am: «sbaḥlxir», «niḥqa», «aredmani», «tameddit». Tayeḍ, bɣan ad ḥerzen ayla-nsen daɣ nutni.

 Tkemmel tegnit akken almi yettwaseqdac yiwen n umawal d atrar, ixulef win n yal ass i ssnen. Ladɣa deg wayen yerzan ttawilat n tudert d wayen i d-yettwabdaɛen.

 Lameɛna ɣas akken, ufan Yizwawen n zik ttawil amek ara qablen akcam n wawalen-a war ma ḍeggren tutlayt-nsen: rran-ten d imaziɣen! Am «agidrun», «abyun», «abrusi», «astillu», «akamyun»…atg. Aya ɣef tasut (lqern) iɛeddan d tin n deffir-s. Ulama drus i yeɣran imir-nni tafransist, aṭas i yesqedcen tutlayt s wudem azedgan.

 Ma yella d At tura, ahat seg wakken ɣran qrib merra tafransist, nwan d anṭaq-ines akken ilaq i d tifrat, almi sseqdacen awalen-is amek i d-usan, tettruḥ tutlayt tettahda. Deg wadeg n «asirjwan», tura ad tesleḍ i «le serre-joint». Deg wadeg n «agidrun» ad tesleḍ i «le goudron», «quand même», «le tout-venant». «La puce»…atg. Tettwammeslay dɣa tefransist deg yidurar-nneɣ !

 Akka ihi i tnegger tutlayt i ugdud ; yal mi ara as-yebru ulamma cwiṭ ad d-iteddem tin nniḍen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Texsi tirgit n lferḥ ɣer waṭas n Yiqbayliyen yettrajun s ccuq rrbaḥ deg unnar n umenzu n wunbir n Tizi Uzu gar terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n Leqbayel d Lmuludia n Wehran. Taneggarut-a tessewɛar-as tagnit i JSK ur nessaweḍ ara ad d-helli rrbeḥ deg wakal-is ɣas akken ɣef umkan wis sin iɣef tettazzal. Iswiyen iɣaben di temlilit-a sxesren mačči d kra leḥsab i JSK yenwan dakken ad turar talɣuɣa tafriqit. D tidet, tuɣal-d seg yimi n llafɛa imi di tazwara tettnadi ma ad teqqim deg uḥric amenzu acku tegguma ad terbeḥ timliliyin ama deg wakal-is ama di berra. Ad d-tiniḍ d kra n uḥeckul i ččan yimyurar. Tisin n Kamel Mouassa tbeddel udem I terbaɛt i d-iḥallan amḍiq yettuqadren imi tuli-d JSK s amḍiq wis sin. D acu kan, lexsara i d-temger di Sṭif ur tt-yeǧǧi ara ad tkemmel deg umecwar-is akken iwata almi ula di Tizi ur tessaweḍ ara ad terbeḥ sdat MCO. Wicqa ! Awidukan imi tessaweḍ s amkan yecban wa, teffeɛ tidi tasemmaḍt i wid i tt-iḥemlen ! 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Nabila. B 

  
 Ussan-a ḥala nekk d gma Muṭṭiḍ i itetten deg uzal qaylal. Les adultes ɣunzan učči, alamma yekna yiṭij. Maɛna iḍ kamel tefẓen. Imi s-nniɣ i yemma acimi akka ur tetettem ar deg wass, tenna-yi-d d Rebbi i yebɣan akka. Tessefhem-iyi-d belli plus les adultes ttuẓumen plus ils ont des chance ad ruḥen ar lǧennet. Alors nniɣ-as :

 – d acu i d lǧennet ?

 – euh… mara d-yekcem baba-k ad k-id-yessefhem… 

 Dɣa atan ikcem-d baba. Stteqsaɣ-t, yerra-yi-d : 

 – ur tt-sineɣ ara, maɛna sneɣ ǧahennama

 – i tagi d acu-tt ?

 – tagi d Taɣerdayt.

 Dɣa yessefhem-iyi-d d acu-tt tɣerdayt, anwi-ten yimẓbiyen, d acu-tt ǧahennam yuɣen din. 

 Sxedmeɣ cwiṭ n les neurones-inu, ufiɣ belli imẓabiyen-agi sûrement ur ttuẓumen ara am yemma, baba, yaya akked anisati n tteḥḍiri. Autrement, ad ten-id-ṣaḥ lǧennet n yemma. 

 J’ai tout faux : tenna-k yemma belli imẓabiyen-agi ttuẓumen plus que les autres. Uɣaleɣ ɣer baba.

 – c’est pas normal a baba, yemma tenna-k ttuẓumen plus que les autres. Mais anwi-ten les autres-agi ?

 – euh… d aɛraben !

 – am anisati n tteḥḍri?

 – ih!

 – mais nettat tettuẓum. En plus, ɣas tikwal teqqers, elle est gentille. Tenniḍ les autres-agi d aɛraben, i yimẓabiyen d acu-ten ?

 – d atmaten-nneɣ. D imaziɣen am keč d nek !

 – mais nek d aqbayli et puis yiwen n gma i sɛiɣ: d Muṭṭiḍ.

 Alors yessefhem-iyi-d d acu i d imaziɣen d acu i d aɛraben. Plus ihedder, moins je comprends.

 – Safik a baba di ddunit llan waɛraben, llan imaziɣen ?

 – ala mačči di ddunit akk. Di Lezzayer

 – i Lezzayer-agi d acu-tt ?

 – din i yi-d-ufiḥ weḥleɣ !!

 I lmend n usmekti wis 63 n tegrawla n tmurt n Lezzayer , aṭas n leqdicat i d-yettuheyyan deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Leqdicat-a, llan-d ddaw n leɛnaya n Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri, Tanmehla n yimeɣrasen, Tasdawit n Mulud Mɛemmri, tidukkliwin i iqedcen deg unnar akked twaculin n yimeɣrasen. Yebda wahil seg wass n letnayen 30 di tuber deg Uxxam n yidles s temsikniyin n yidlisen n umezruy d yimagraden i d-yettmeslayen ɣef Kateb yacine, Mhamed Isyakhem, Ali Zamoum. Ma yella deg Uxxam n umezgun Kateb yacine, tella-d yiwet n tecquft n umezgun “La poudre d’intelligence “ sɣur tdukla n yilmeẓyen n Yiɛekkuren. Am awkken i d-iɛedda, diɣ, deg Uxxam n sinima usaru “L’étoile d’Alger” n Rachid Belhadj, syin yella-d uskasi ɣef usaru-a. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer Uxxam n yidles (centre culturel) Matoub Lounes n Ain El Hammam, ad naf d urar n yiwet n temzgunt s yisem-is “ Yenna-iyi jeddi”. Ass n tlata 31 di Tuber, tella-d yiwet n tuffɣa ɣer taddart Iɣil Imula di tɣiwant n Tizi n Tlata , syin yella-d umeslay, deg tzeqqa tamecṭuḥt n umezgun n Uxxam n yidles, ɣef wudmawen-nni i wumi tuɣal tejmilt wigi Issiakhem, Kateb akked Zamoum, Sɣur Mass Zamoum Rabah, Massa Boukhelou fatma, Massa Kabla djamila, Mass Yacine Si Ahmed akked Massa Zamoum Ouiza (taǧǧalt n umeɣras Ali Zamoum) . Ma yella d axxam n yidles Krim Belkacem n Azazga, llant-d temsikniyinn yidlisen d yimagraden n yiɣmisen i d-yettmeslayen ɣef umezruy. Akken daɣen i d as-tuɣel tejmilt ama i twaculin n yimeɣrasen, ama i unaẓur Akli Yehyaten sɣur Axxam n yidles . Ma yella ass n umenzu n unbir : llan-d, deg uxxam n yidles, isaragen s yisental i icudden ɣer umezruy n tmurt, akken daɣen i d-uraren yilmeẓyen tamezgunt ‘Le foehn’ s tmaziɣt ‘’Ha-t-a lquḍ hata uqamum’’ n Mouloud Mammeri deg usmekti n meyya n yiseggasen ɣef tlalit-is. Ma yella d Tiddukkla tazazrayt n taddart n Tamda s tama-is, ur tezgil ara tagnit n usmekti-a imi tettwanec-d ɣer CLS n lwilaya anda i d-xedmen ahil-nsen ama d amezgun ama d cnawi, akken ad rren tajmilt i yirgazen i yefkan idammen-nsen ɣef tlelli n tmurt.

   S. Y. 

  
 Mačči d aṭṭan n sskeṛ i d ugur imi tujjya tesnulfa-as-d ddeqs n ttawil n usejji, aɣilif ameqqṛan d uguren s wacu i d-igellu ma amdan ur iɛawen ara iman-is akken ad yesseqɛed sskeṛ-is . Ɣef waya ilaq amdan, ad yissen s kra d ugur i d-yettawi unerni asusam n lehlak-as yezgan di tfekka-

<p style="text-align: center;"> Allen 

 Aṭṭan n ssker yettḥaz allen. D asusam imi alamma yegla-d s unnqas n yiẓri yeddan ara d-iban. Ɣef waya, ilaq amdan ad yerzu, ma drus yal aseggas, s amejjay n wallen i wakken ad inadi kra n wugur.D yir alluy n ssker deg yidammen i yettḥazen tiṭ, i d abalat n yal ugur, armi ula abeddel n nnwaḍer, ur yenfiɛ ara imi ala aseqɛed-ines i izemren ad yeḥbes anerni-s i d-yeslalayen ula d tidderɣelt ur nḥellu. Akken, diɣ, igellu-d ssker s kra n lehlakat, am rriḍa, laṭansyu n wallen (glaucoma) akked karuf n yifessugan-is.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tigeẓẓal 

 Yessefk ɣef yal amuḍin, ad ixeddem ikayaden n waman n tasa akken ad inadi ɣef tiprutiyin i d-yettbegginen lehlak n tegẓelt, imi s teɣzi n lweqt, aṭṭan n ssker, mi ara yemlil akked waṭṭan n yidammen, ttḥazen iẓuran n yidammen n tegẓel dayen ara tt-yeǧǧen ur tessizdig ara tafekka si lewsax. Aya, ad d-yeslal ɣur-s lexsas n tegẓelt u s teɣzi n lweqt, ma yestehza umdan, tezmer ad taweḍ armi d lmut-is.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ul d yiẓuran n yidammen 

 Yettimɣur wugur n lehlak n yiẓuran, yettḥaz waṭṭan-a ma yemlal akked lehlak n tassemt n yidim, imi slalayen-d argal n ddeqs deg-sen, labeɛda wid n wul. Daya ara yeǧǧen amuḍin ad yesɛu di tuget n tikkal ccirat n waṭṭan n wul i izemren ad as-d-awint ula d lmut. Ɣef waya, ilaq amuḍin s lemɛawna n umejjay, ad yettnadi ɣef yal tagnit i izemren ad as-d-teslal ugur u ad ixeddem tikkwal rradyu n wul (TCG) akken ma yella kra yeffren, ad d-iban.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Iẓuran n lḥess 

 Iẓuran n lḥess, yettruḥun ama s afessug, s aglim neɣ igmamen n daxel, yezmer waṭṭan-a, ad ten-iḥaz. D ayen ara d-yeslalen anbeddal deg-sen. Ɣef waya, ma iḥus umdan s kra n uqraḥ neɣ n facul yezgan, anemmel deg yiḍarren neɣ tikkwal ula d war aḥussu di kra n umḍiq deg tfekka-s, d war tazmert akken ad yeṭṭef aman n tasa, ilaq ad yerzu s amejjay-is imi ccirat-a, ttbeggint-d belli iẓuran n lḥess, uḍnen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Taggara 

 Skud aṭṭan n sskeṛ ur yeqɛid ara, skud abrid i tlalit n wuguren-a, yeldi, ɣef waya ilaq amdan s lemɛawna n umejjay-is, ad yesseqɛed sskeṛ-is , u ma iwala kra n ccirat yessawalen i yiwen seg wuguren i d-nebder, ilaq ad yerzu s amejjay–is ara t-iwellhen ɣer win ilaqen. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Dali Salima 

  
 Tamacint-a, mačči d tamacint kan n menwala : tesεa amezruy, neγ εad d nettat i d amezruy s timmad-is. Tamacint-agi, yis-s i ttwarunt akk tesγunin ‘’Tasfut’’ i d-iteffγen deg yiseggasen-nni n 1980.Yewwi-tt-id Ramdane Achab di Fransa. Acu kan uqbel ad tt-id-ya&amp;gamma,; yessuter di bab-is ad as-d-yernu kra n teqfiflin i wakken ad yaru yis-s isekkilen n tmaziγt (&amp;gamma,; &amp;epsilon,; taneqqiṭ, akafu…). Yeḍra-d waya, yewwi-tt-id γer tmurt. Dγa, syin i bdan ttarun yis-s, akka i d-uran akk tisγunin ‘’Tafsut’’ n lweqt-nni.

 Ass-a, Mass Ramdane Achab yebγa ad tt-yefk i win ara as-yefken azal, am usalay neγ tiddukla… ’’Tamacint-a, tesεa azal meqqer. Ilaq win ara tt-iḥadren. Ad d-teqqim d tanagit deg umezruy γef tira n tmaziγt.’’ Akka i aγ-d-yenna.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
  Isufar i urekti  

 – 1 Kg n lfarina

 – Tisent ( lmelḥ)

 – Aman

 – 4 n tmellalin

 – Zzit i usewwi

 – Sirru neɣ tament

  Aheggi n urekti 

 Sureg lfarina ar lḥila , ernu-as awazwaz n lmelḥ , rruc-it s waman alamma temlal lfarina ad tuɣal d arekti , ɛarek-it alamma yuɣal d aleggaɣ .

 Dlu s arekti, egg takurin timectaḥ , del-itent , eǧǧ-itent ad rsent azal n 20’ .

 Di lḥila –nniḍen erz timellalin , rrwi-tent .

 Dlu ar takurin ; yiwet yiwet , jbed-itent , ḍlu-asent timellalin , sers-iten ta ɣaf ta ( 7 tissiwin = 7 couches) , sakin gzem-itent d imkuzen ( carrés ) , tegreḍ-tent ar tseḥḥant n zzit iwwlen .

 Wi wwant , ger-iten ar sirru neɣ tament .

 S tezmert-nnwen (t)

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  S ɣur Daya 

  
 Tallit n ccetwa, d tallit n tasmuḍi. Lǧessa n umdan, labeɛda win meẓẓiyen neɣ win ihelkan aṭṭan yezgan, tettmagar aṣemmiḍ akk d lqella n tikli ara tt-yerren hcicet. Anect-a, ad yelli abrid i ddeqs n waṭṭanen ara tt-ḥazen. Ɣef waya, nextaṛ ad awen-d-nefk iwellihen-a ara yesseḥbibren fell-awen.

 1 – Acṛaḍ mgal aṭṭan n ubeḥri: yezmer umdan ad yecṛeḍ melmi i as-yehwa ɣef teɣzi n tallit n tasmuḍi imi yettḥarab deg ugar n 70% n tikkal seg ubeḥri.

 2 – Aṭixxeṛ ɣef ubeddel ‘’aderɣal’’ n llebsa : ɣas d lɛada taqdimt, ǧǧan-tt-id lejdud, ad teqqim d lsas n usḥbiber, labeɛda ɣer yimeẓyanen. Imi timelsiwt n ddeqs n tduli d twakksa-s ‘’taderɣalt’’ mkul mi ara yeccef umdan tessefcal tafekka.

 3 – Aṭixxeṛ seg yimeḍqan ur nebbuḥri ara: imeḍqan ur nebbuṛi, rnu ɣur-s ddexxan, lḥamu, lewsax, ssehlaken tiɣanimin n turin (poumons).

 4 – Tarewla seg yimukan yeččuṛen: tiḥuna n wučči, tizeɣwin n tmeṛiwin, ifurguten…atg, d imeḍqan anda ttanṭaḍen ivirusen gar madden. Ɣef waya, ilaq amdan ur yesṭuqqut tiɣimit deg-sen. 

 5 – Asizdeg n tanzarin: yesfek ɣef yal yiwen yesɛan kra n wugur n tanzarin, ad yerzu s amejjay uqbel ccetwa akken ad as-yekkes kra n wugur.

 6 – Mi ara izad uṣemmiḍ, ilaq uɣummu n yifassen d yiḍaṛṛen: adfel, d aṭṭan yeṭṭuqten labeɛda ɣer tlemẓit, yettḥaz iḍuḍan d tfednan. Ala s uɣummu azuran i nezmer ad nḥader seg-s.

 7 – Učči n telqimin yeḥman: ilaq amdan ad yettextiṛi talqimt yeḥman akken ad yizmir ad iqazem aṣemmiḍ.

 8 – Atixer i yir leɛwayed: ddexan, ccṛab, ɛawaz, tellin tawwurt i facul n turin d tlalit n lehlakat-is. Ɣef waya ilaq amdan ad asen-yettixeṛ.

 9 – Aciweṛ n umejjay: asiḥi n tanzarin, lehlak n tɛebbuḍt, tlaq tiwin n umuḍin s amejjay iqerben akken ad iẓer ṛṛay-is, tikkwal, akken ad t-idawi.

 10 – Tarusi n lxaṭer: yal awellih i d-nebder, ilaq ad yemlil akk d trusi n lxaṭer imi d lsas n useḥbiber.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima Dali 

 
  
 I tikelt tis snat deg useggas-agi aγurbiz, 2014/2015, i mlalen yiselmaden imunan, wid i d-yewwin, yakan, akayaḍ-nni n uselmed n yal aswir (amenzu, alemmas d tesnawit) u n yal tanga. Mlalen deg ussan-agi n yimuras, seg 23 armi 30 deg duğember 2014 deg uγerbaz alemmas ‘’Derder Said’’ n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Gar yimunan-a, ad naf azal n 70 n yiselmaden n tmaziγt. Tikelt iεeddan iselmaden-a xedmen tannant-nsen di lwilaya n Bgayet ayen yeğğan kra deg-sen ur ttruḥen, akken i aγ-d-nnan. Ma γef wayen yeεnan ahil n usileγ-a, tenna-d H.F, yiwet gar yimunan : ‘’nelmed-d aṭas n tγawsiwin ara aγ-iεiwnen deg uγerbaz, ladγa nekni s yijdiden-agi ; nwala timsal i d-icudden γer useddi n tneγrit, izerfan-nneγ d wid n yinelmaden, assaγ gar twacult n leqraya. Am wakken i d-tella tannant-a, d taswiεt anda i nbeddel tiktiwin akked yiselmaden i d-nemmuger.’’ Ma γef yimuras i fkan d asfel, tkemmel tenna- :’’ussan imezwura, ẓẓayit ciṭ, acu kan syin mi nemyusan, nexleq-d tawacult gar-ane&amp;gamma,; tessufsusi leεtab-nni.’’ Nessaram, wwin tarzeft s wayes ara qablen inelmaden deg uγerbaz acku aṭas deg-sen i yesεan uguren deg uselmed-nsen…ladγa, deg tarrayt n uselmed.

  Isufar 

 3 n tbeslin timeqqranin, 3 n ṭumaṭicin,1 n tfelfelt tazggaɣt, 2 n tɣenjawin n lmakla n zzit n uzemmur, lmelḥ akked yifelfel aberkan,4 n tmellalin.

  Aheggi 

 Sqecret tibeslin, gezmet-tent d icfiren ireqqaqen. Gezmet ifelfel-nni d amecṭuḥ. ma d ṭumaṭic, ad get-tt e azgen. Deg yitmeqqlet, rret snat n tɣenjawin n zzit, smiret lebsel-nni u ɣumset-t, tanfem-as ad yeww azal n 10’ s tmes taḥlawant. Syin, sxelḍet ṭumaṭic akked yifelfel, terrem-ten s ufella n lebsel-nni. Anfet-as alamma yewwa. Rnut-as, ma tebɣam, timellalin. 

  S tezmert-nwen 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Sɣur Daya 

  
 T aɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun i d-yezgan deg ugafa n lwilaya n Tizi Wezzu, i ibaԑden fell-as azal n 15 km, taɣiwant ideg llant 23 n tudrin, mazal tettidir iseggasen-agi ineggura lexsas ameqqran, deg yeḥricen d yisenfaren yemgarden n tudert. Gar-asen ttawil n Internet, lgaz n temdint, yir liḥala n yiberdan…atg

 Tuddar n taɣiwant-agi nḥafent aṭas imi ar ass-a n wussan mazal ugur n Internet ur yefri ara. Ma yebɣa yiwen ad yazen neɣ ad d-yawi kra seg Internet, ilaq fell-as ad yerzu alamma d tamdint n Tizi Uzzu. Ilaq ad yelḥu 15 km, neɣ yezmer lḥal ad isruḥ yiwen wass ɣef liğal n ssaεa. Maca lukan i d-tewwiḍ s ixxamen, tili mačči akka. Ugur wis sin i d-irennun lḥif i yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant-a, d win lgaz n temdint; imi mazal ar ass-a n wussan aɣbel n usenfar-a ur yefri ara. Aṭas n tudrin yeddren aɣbel-agi, acku di ttnaṣfa n useggas 2015 I yebda, mazal ar ass-a urԑad yekcim ixxamen , anida Leqrar-is ? . Imezdaɣ n tuddar-agi ṛwan lḥif, ladɣa deg tsemhuyt n tegrest, neɣ deg wussan n ccetwa, imi acḥal n tikkal i leḥun d likumiṭer i wakken ad d-awin taqerԑat n lgaz, ama d aggefur, neɣ d adfel. Tikwal ttuɣalen-d ifasen d ilmawen. D ayen iten-yeğğan ad d-gren tiɣri yerna ad sutren deg wid teԑna temsalt gar-asen imeḍbbren n tɣiwant Ait Aissa Mimun, d Tanmehla n Imuhal Izuyaz (Direction des Travaux public). Aɣbel wis kraḍ, d win iberdan. Aṭas i yellan, deg tɣiwant-agi, deg yir liḥala, yecban abrid n Laԑzib n wugeni n Σmer, arnu ɣur-s abrid n taddart Iɣil n Wuccen, win n Uqawej, win n Tizi…atg Mebla ma nettu ugur wis ukuz, wagi yeεna ttawilat n usiweḍ (moyens de transport), Ladɣa wid yettawin ɣer yiɣerbazen. Llant tuddar yesԑan ,llant tiyaḍ ulac. Maca tid-k yesԑan lukan kan ay axir ur sԑan-t ara acku aṭas n ttawilat-a ad-ten-tafeḍ ԑyan, neɣ ur teddun ara. Aḥric n tedwest d sseḥa (la santé), yenxes, diɣ, ugar n yiḥricen-nniḍen, imi axxam n tujjya n Tala Ilillan ur yesԑi ara aṭas n ttawilat n udawi, yerna ur yesԑi ara takerrust n tujjya (ambulance) ara yettawin imuḍan. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Tameṭṭut tṣubb, akken i iḥulfa i umrar inefsusi, iserreḥ umrar, tameṭṭut tessers iḍarren-is, argaz igzem-it, yuɣal-d s axxam. Iqqim yumayen, sag i t-tɣaḍ ad temmet, yuɣal ɣur-s. Yuɣ-d amrar-nniḍen, yuɣal ɣer tesraft-nni. Iḍegger ixef n umrar ɣer daxel, ixef-nniḍen iṭṭef-it deg ufus-is. Cwiṭ kan iḥulfa win ijebbden amrar. Ibda ad d-ijebbed, yufa ẓẓay mačči d taẓẓayt-nni n tmeṭṭut-is. Ijebbed, ijebbed, ittuɣal ɣer deffir akken alammi ikfa umrar. Inṭeg-d yiwen n urgaz annect-ila-t yenna-as-id : “Ad ak-yeɛfu Ṛebbi yaɛfu lwaldin-ik ! Tesselkeḍ-iyi-d si lmeḥna » Argaz iggugem deg wayen ittwali, isussem isell i lxelq i d-yulin si tesraft. Ikemmel deg wawal-is win-a yenna-as : “Qrib lqern i sɛddaɣ di tesraft, mačči helkeɣ neɣ ttwaqelqeɣ akken helkeɣ yumayen-agi seg i d-terna tmeṭṭut-agi-inek. Yumayen-a i sɛeddeɣ yid-s, uɣalent-iyi d lǧihenamma. Laɛnaya-k ma ur iyi-d tenniḍ amek akka i tsebreḍ, ad tidireḍ d tmeṭṭut am ta acḥal n yiseggasen?”.

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 « Ttbut, ttbut, mṛaḥba yissem a tafsut/ Lhu, lhu, ass-a yidem aṛa nezhu! », akka i yecna unaẓuṛ amuqṛan Meksa deg yiwwet geṛ tezlatin-is. Akka ihi, ussan-a d tafsut, ddunit akk ttazegzawt deg tama-agi n Ṣummam, i d-yezgan deg twilayt n Bgayet. Ijeǧǧigen, tizegzewt, tizizwa i gemṛen, tafukt iṭij yeḥma, ifṛax cennun,…d-ussan i geṛzen. Yal yiwen yufa iman-is deg tefsut-agi, imi aṭaṣ n yimdanen i meṛḥen akka deg tiẓegwa akken ad ksen ɣef ulawen nsen. Deg wussan n tɣimit (jours de repos) medden ttefɣen aken ad magṛen tafsut. D-imdukal neɣ d ttiwaculin s lekmal nsen-t, ttṛuḥun ɣeṛ lexla akken ad meṛḥen ad feṛḥen. Yuɣ lḥal ussan-a d-iṭij, ageffuṛ iɛedda seg syagi, yeṛṛa ddunnit akk ttazegzawt. Ihi wid yettṛuḥu-n akka ɣeṛ lexlawi ttawin yid-sen aɛwin akken ad sɛeddin taswiɛt yelhan. Ayagi dayen yessefṛaḥen aṛṛac imeẓyanen, imi wigi tteksen-d ijeǧǧigen, tteglilizen deg wadal (laḥcic), ttuṛaṛen tuqqaṛ lakked dabex. Tafsut-agi mači d-imdanen kan i ssifeṛḥen, ula d yiɣeṛṣiwen ufan iman-nsen, imi amɛic nsen yella s lkutṛa. Laḥcic, tuga, aman, yella kulec awid kan lmal-ik ad ikes. Imeksawen feṛḥen aṭaṣ imi yegma laḥcic deg laxla ɣeṛ wanda ttawin lmal-nsen aken ad ksen. Tugdi-nni i ten-yewwin imi tɛeṭṭel taɣaṛt (la sécheresse) deg lexṛif akk d tegṛest-nni i ɛddan, tefsi am wedfel seddaw yiṭij, imi tuṛa ageffuṛ yewwet s waṭaṣ ussan-agi inegguṛa. Ayagi yeǧǧa ssumat n wemɛic n lmal udeṛ-ent-d ussan-agi deg leswaq. Akka lbuṭa n-uṣaɣuṛ yenzan 650 idinaṛen tudeṛ-d ussan-a alaṛmi d 500 idinaṛen. Mači d-imeksawen kan i yufan iman-nsen deg tefsut-agi, ula d-ifellaḥen feṛḥen aṭaṣ. Ccek-nni iten ikecmen imi xuṣen igeffuṛen yekkes tuṛa, imi tafellaḥt-nsen temnaɛ seg taɣaṛt. Igṛan n yiṛden lakked ttemẓin « ḥlan », tiyedṛin, tizellafin ttizegzawin, ttaččaṛen-t cwiṭ cwiṭ d lḥeb, waqil tamegṛa attelhu aṭaṣ deg wagguṛ-agi n magu. Ulac ccek! Ula d-azemmuṛ yeḥla-d ussan-agi, imi wten igeffuṛen s waṭaṣ deg tmuṛt-nneɣ. Taggaṛa-agi tizemṛin ǧǧuǧegen-t, dayen yessefṛaḥen aṭaṣ. Lebyuṛ, issafen, tiliwa, d laɛwanṣeṛ zaden deg-sen waman ayagi yegla-d s wayen yelhan i tfellaḥt deg tama-agi n Ṣummam.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 D lewhayem! mazal ar ass-a timetti-nneɣ tettwali aṭṭan-agi n sida d ucenna neɣ d aṭabu ɣas ulamma aṭṭanen i merra tettmeslay fell-asen, ula d aṭṭan-nni n lkunsir tekkes-as awal-nni: ad aɣ-yenju rebbi yenju lmumnin! yettɣid win ara ihelken di tmurt-nneɣ ,imi si tazwara iban kan ad yettuxeṭṭi ama sɣur medden ama sɣur-s, waya ad t-ncudd qbala ar nekkni ur nezri tidet n waṭṭan-a n abribus n VIH i yuɣalen ass-a seg waṭṭanen yezgan s dwawi d-snulfant tmura yeddan d wamek yettanṭaḍ imi nekkni ɣur-neɣ ma nemmeslay d win ihelken ad aɣ-yenṭeḍ,ma neḍsa-as ad aɣ-yenṭeḍ?dɣa ma nemsalam yid-s tenger fell-aɣ, Xaṭi!abirus n VIH yettanṭad s tuzzuft (sexualité ),s tsegnatin-nni yettwasnen deg uksum n win yuḍnen,ula ljerḥ amectuḥ yezmer ad as-yili d tawwurt i ubirus-a ma yemlal yid-s war ma nettu tyemmat t-issenṭaḍen i mmi-s ama di tadist neɣ s usuṭṭeḍ. Deg useggas n 2014 iban-d wazal n36,9 n yimelyan n wid ihelken sida maca mačči d leḥsab iseḥḥan imi aṭas n wid iteffren leḥlak-nsen, Dɣa ma nesteqsa acimi? tiririt tban kan imi s yes i d-nebda ameslay d acu kan imi nekkni nettwali ala s yir tiṭ , mi nesla s walbaɛd ihlek neqqar-as yekcem iberdan -nni n yir tuzzuft war ma nezra d acu n sebba s tidet imi yezmer ad tili d ayen nniḍen s wakka nettkemmil i taluft am wakken i as-yettkemmil win yuḍnen imi sida ur d-yettban ara s amdan arma f kant 7 ar 10 n yiseggasen d asawen bexlaf ccirat-nni timeẓyanin ur nettawi lewhi ɣur-s d ayen ara t-yeǧǧen ad yezzuzur deg ubirus -agi. D acu kan ayen yessewhamen imnadiyen d tamurt-a tageswaḥt tineslemt akk d tid i tt-icuban anda tuzzuft d leḥram ma teffeɣ i lɛada n zwaj meɛna mazal yettnerni sida deg-s! u acimi ur d-tettili ara tikci n yiḥaraben (préservatifs ) baṭel am wakken xeddment tmura irebḥen? i wakken ad nessenɣes talilit n waṭṭan-agi icudden deg ugar 80% n tikkwal ar tuzzuft.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima.D 

  
 Ayen yeḍṛan di Fransa ass-n lǧemɛa 13 deg Unbir-agi , Timesrifegt n tmurt n Rrus yettwaɣḍlen nnig sseḥra n Sinna di tmurt n Maṣer glant-d s lmut n izumal n yemdanen ur nednib ur nexdim kra. Ɣer wanect-a nezmer ad nadder tadyant n Lubnan akked d ibaxixen iḍeṛṛun di lberr n Tefriqt. Telsa si rrif alamma d rrif tbedd zdat lḥir-is, zdat isteqsiyen-is: acu-t yak waya? Sani i la iteddu umaḍal?

 Ayen nsel yugar ayen nettwali. Yeqwa wawal , yeqwa «qiluqal», yal wa anta tamuɣli yefka i taluft. Xuḍi tuget n umeslay d tunnḍa ɣef miḥlal. D aɛiwwed n wayen id nnan yakka uqbel sɣuṛ imesjeṛnanen akked isertiyen , d isenqaden n lumur n tsertit seg asmi i-iḥuza rebrab timura n l’Europe. Awal ɣer wayeḍ ad yas win ara ak-yinin ṭṭayfa –agi n Rebrab d timnufaq texḍa ddin n l’islam, l’islam mačči akka id udem-is. Aya nesla t mačči d abrid mačči d sin. Netta di tilawt asteqsi iwulmen ad yeɣli s annar uskasi d wagi: ayen iduba n tmura tinselmin ur d tt-heggin-ara zzedmat iwulmen akken ad mḥun irabraben anda ma llan ? Ayen ur ttnaɣen-ara taskana( idéologie) tamṭṭerfit s tawil n tmussni yebnan ɣef ṣṣeḥ, s tikta yettleqqimen adif n telsa deg ixf n yemdanen ? Ayen imussnawen n wasɣan ineslem ( religion) ur tt-frasen –ara ddin-agi seg ayen yesmendigen amdan ɣer lkerrh n kra n wales i ten -ixulfen deg tmuɣli ?

 Ahat aɛazzel n umussnaw am Arkoun d tiririt ɣef isteqsiyen-nneɣ. Kra n win yebɣan ad yezwi yir takka ɣef wasɣan-agi yettweɛzzel, yettaf iman-is di rrif. Ṣṣut-is yettɣummu-t zzhir n wid yesekrasen dɣel akked lkerrh ɣer tamrart n tudert. Xuḍi anda neqdent tikta yettawin imdanen ɣef tafat, ṭṭlam yettaf lebɣi-s. Tuɣalen ulawen d irebbi i ccer. Ahat iduba n tmura tinselmin d lawan tura ad ndekwin amer ad ɛiwden tamuɣli akken ad ressin deg timura-nsen iɣerbazen yettleqqimen i derya –nsen tamussni yessufuɣen ɣer tafat . Am akken ahat diɣen d lawan akken timura-agi ad ferqen ddin ɣef tsertit yerna ad ḥarfent leḥcic ddaw iḍaṛan n irebraben s- usnerni n udmawen temɛict n yegduden-nsen imi llaẓ akked nḥaf d nitni i d- ttra yettqawiten akal n tsertit tarebrabt. 

 Ur d teqqim ara deg umajed , neɣ deg tuzzma deg wigi ixedmen tixazabiyin-agi s wacu ttmettaten d imeyyaten n yemdanen imelsiyen( innocents) . Tagnit teɛjel tessutur tifrat s wadda neɣ m ulac akken qqaren di lemtel ad yeglu uzegzaw s uquṛan, a nemmečč ad temmečč tamurt ɣef ayeg n teddu. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Ait

<p style="text-align: right;"> Slimane Hamid  

  
 Aql-aɣ deg tsemhuyt n umwan, lawan ideg beddun yiɛeqqayen n uzemmur ttebriken, tewwan. Deg yiseggasen yezrin, imezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel d kra n temnaḍin tijartin, ttafen, ttwalin tiferkiwin-nsen ideg sɛan ṭṭjur n uzemmur, urwent aṭas, fkant-d lɣella n lɛali. Lameɛna lḥal yemgerrad aseggas-a, imi llan yifurak n tzemrin, ad ten-naf ɛebban ciṭṭuḥ n yiɛeqqayen, llan wiyaḍ d ilem. Azemmur ihi ur yessefreḥ lɣaci n Ayt Smaɛel, Tasexriwt, Rrif, Iderginen… atg. Yessewhem-iten imi ur d-yefki ayen niqal ttraǧun sɣur-s. Anagar ileqqamen yellan sdat neɣ deg rrif n yiberdan i yurwen s ccyaḍa, acku, ɛlaḥsab ayen i d-qqaren wid yessnen, azemmur itesra i uɣebbar. Meḥsub, d annect-nni i iɛiwnen tizemrin iqerben abrid ad ftint aṭas. 

 Ɣas ma simmal yettɛedday wakud, tettaẓ-d tegrest, yettaẓ-d lawan ideg ggaren yimdanen deg ccɣel n usram d tleqqaḍt, maca tuget n yiterrasen n Ayt Smaɛel d tid-nniḍen, ur ttqellqen melmi ara d-yawweḍ wass-nni. Sḥassfen imi drus maḍi i yefti aseggas-a, ur ẓrin d anta i d ssebba taḥeqqanit, neɣ d anwa d ugur. Ɣef wamek nettwali, daɣen, addad n uzemmur, atan iban seg tura ad yekkes leqdic-ines s tazzla, ur yettɛeṭṭil ara ad yefru. Ladɣa imi aṭas i d-yetteɣlayen ɣer lqaɛa, yettwajmaɛ tikwal send lweqt n usram. Daymi yettenqas ccɣel-is kra kra, yessewzal tawala (période) i yezmer ad yekk yiwen deg-s. 

 Skud azemmur ur irew ahat aṭas deg kra n temnaḍin n leqbayel, yiwet seg-sent d tin n Ayt Smaɛel, iban belli ssuma n zzit-is tetteddu ad tzid, ad teɣlay ugar n wamek tella tura. Seg 800 n yidinaren, yezmer ad teɛlay alama d 1000 n yidinaren. Ula d taǧǧawt-ines llan wid i tt-yebdan yakan, imi ḥsan ma yeqqim waddad akka, ad tettenqas zzit seg lexsas n uzemmur. Ɣef waya i ilaq ɣef wid ikesben littaɛ di tferkiwin-nsen, ad teẓẓun ṭṭjur-a n uzemmur, ad asent-xedmen ttawilat iwulmen akken ad yeṭṭuqqet deg yidigan, ad d-yeqqel am zik. Acku zzit n uzemmur, tettwawfay i qeddac n tɣawsiwin, ulayɣer astehzi deg-s.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 ‘’Tahanutt n uḥeddad d lakul n teqbayli, axater d amakan i d-qesden yifellaḥen n yal tamnaṭ, ttemlilin-d ɣur-s deg wass n ssuq, nekni nettleqqim-asen tiɣawsiwin, nutni ttleqimen-aɣ taqbaylit, nlemmed ɣur-sen …” Zik asmi tcud tudert n umdan ɣer wakal di tmurt n leqbayel, ulac taddart ur nesɛi ara aheddad n wuzzal; d netta i yettleqqimen dduzan n tfellahet”igelzyam, tigersiwin tiqubac…atg. Sumata, ixeddem-d tiɣawsiwin i seqdacen yifellaḥen deg yimahilen-nsen . Ass-a, segmi nejlan madden, ǧǧan lxudma n wakal, tejla yid-s ula d lḥirfa n uheddad. Qrib ad tenger , drus maḍi n wid mazal ṭfen di lḥirfa-agi . Azwaw Heddad, 65 n yiseggasen di tudert-is, gar yineggura di temnaṭ n Ṣsumam tama n Uqbu i imazal yeṭṭef di lxudma–agi . Mazal yeṭṭef deg-s. Nemlal yid-s, nesteqsa-t. yeldi-aɣ-d ul-is.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : acḥal aya i tebdiḍ lxudma –agi, anwa i ak-tt-islemden ? 

 Azwaw Haddad : bdiɣ-tt deg useggas 1968, asmi sɛiɣ 16 n yiseggasen. Lemdaɣ ɣer baba. Di tazwara, ttaṭṭafeɣ-as-d kan afḍis mi ara yekka-t s ufella n ẓẓebra, yettwellih-iyi cwit cwit almi i lemdeɣ, uɣaleɣ ttleqqimeɣ igelzyam, tigersiwin, netta yettili-iyi-d kan s lmendad. Tedduɣ daɣen yid-s ɣer tudrin nettsemmir i yifellaḥen lehwayec. Nekk slemdaɣ gma Lḥusin ha-t-an tura d netta ara yeṭṭfen amkan-iw . 

  Zik, uqbel carbun, s wacu i tsefsayem akka uzzal.? 

 Zik, nella nxeddem di taddart. Nettawi-d tirgin ubelluḍ ɣer yifellaḥen. Nessaɣay-asent times, irrij-nsent ur yettnusu ara, s yis-s i nettleqqim dduzan n tfellaḥt .

  I usellek, neɣ lexlas amek i d-yettili ? 

 Zik-nni, iḥeddaden xeddmen s rrezeq. Afellaḥ yesɛan tayuga, yettelḥaq-as-d i uheddad snat lgelbat n temẓin i useggas, llan wiyad d ibawen, irden , tazart neɣ tament.

  Zik-nni, ttruḥun iheddaden ttisilen di tudrin , kečč d baba-k gar wid ixeddmen akka di tudrin. Amek i ttilin wassaɣen gar-awen d Wat taddart-nni? 

 Ad ak-iniɣ, nekni nexdem di taddart n Tiɣilt Mexluf di tɣiwant n Yiɣram, cfiɣ baba iḥedder deg yinejmuɛen-nsen lbaḍna-nsen, isell-itt, ttqadaren-t mliḥ mliḥ. Netta d ccix n taddart. D acu kan, aḥeddad ur as-d-zeddmen ara isɣaren. Netta yessasay-d aɣrum-is s lxudma-s.

  Aṭas n tɣawsiwin i d-ixeddem uḥeddad, kecment deg wansayen. Ma tzemreḍ ad d-tadreḍ kra? 

 Tella tin iwumi neqqar “tahanut” ttɛalliqen-tt i umextan, deg-s 7 tɣawsiwin n tfellaḥt : tagersa, tamgert, tasmirt, tagelzimt, taqabact, agelzim akked tjenwitt. Llan daɣen yimdaneni i ixeddmen tisemmirt ɣef tewwura n yixxamen neɣ ula ɣef tkeryasin-nsen , qqaren tettara tiṭ.

  D acu-tent akk tɣawsiwin yessqdac uḥeddad di lxudma-ines ?  

 Yella win iwumi neqqar: lkanun, agectum, ẓẓebra, lvila, tafḍist…atg. Qqaren tahanut ideg ixeddem uheddad d lakul , d acu i d sser yellan deffir waya? Tahanutt n uḥeddad d lakul n teqbaylit, axater d amakan i d-qesden yifellaḥen n yal tamnaṭ, ttemlilin-d ɣur-s deg wass n ssuq. Nekni nettellqim-asen tiɣawsiwin, rnu nlemmed ɣur-sen taqbaylit. 

  Amek i t-lmedem akka ɣer yifellaḥen taqbaylit ? 

  Yal mi ara d-kecmen yifellahen ɣer tḥanut n uḥeddad , ttawi-d awal ɣef ddunit, ḥekkun-d timɛayin n zik. Yal wa d acu i d- yettales: wa d taqsiṭ, wa d asefru neɣ lemtel. Nlemmed ɣur-sen taqbaylit. Nekk, ass-a, ataṣ n yinzan i d–lemdaɣ ɣer yifellaḥen i d-ikeccmen ɣer thanut-iw. Yal ass, rennuɣ-d awal ajdid , nettisin timeslayin n temnaḍin yemxalafen.

  Awal-ik n taggara 

  Ilaq lhirfa-agi ad tili di lakula-t n uselmed n lḥirfat i wakken ur tneggar ara. Ttmenniɣ, daɣen, imdanen ad uɣalen ɣer uxeddim n wakal d lɣella i wakken ad yili uxeddim i uheddad. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Yesteqsa-t Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 Send iḍelli, 14 seg meɣres, i d ass aɣelnaw n yimeɛḍar deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Tidukkliwin merra, n tal tamnaḍt n yal aɣir, i yesseḥbibiren ɣef yimdanen-a imuḍinen sfugglent ass-nni s tumert akked wid terza taluft, maca daɣen s usirem-nni wissen ahat yewwas ad ttunefken i yimdanen-a at wasrayen uzzigen (besoins spécifiques) akk izerfan i yewwi-d ad sɛun deg tudert-nsen tayallast tuwɛirt. Ur d ameslay kan ɣef wuguren n ukcam deg tmetti, n tuffɣa, n uqḍaw n uqeddic-a neɣ d wa, imi sanda yerra umeɛḍur ad d-imager ugur. Maca daɣen, d ameslay ɣef uẓayer (statut) i as-d-isaḥen deg tmurt-is, skud tadrimt tamayyurt i d-yettawi d tin n menwala-tt almi aṭas, dɣa ur tezmir ad t-tqid ula deg tgella-s n yal ass, aniɛad adawi, isafaren akked kra n dduzan i t-yessefken. Rny ɣer-s, ula d takalict i t-ilaqen akken ad yessiweḍ ad iḥerrek, alama yerwa aḥebber ed umqellaɛ akken ara as-tt-id-sersen i walmend-is yimḍebbren i terza taluft. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Ahat wwḍen d igiman n yimdanen i d-yerran i tiɣri ssebt n ddurt yezrin deg Uweqqas, akken ad lḥun ɣef tlelli n umeslay d useḥbiber ɣef yidles.
