Wid akk yeččuren iberdan usan-d seg waṭas n temnaḍin n Tmurt. Akk-nsen ɛewwlen ad inin i udabu: « uhu i uḥbas n yidles, uhu i tmenɣiwt n udlis ». Gar yiberriḥen (slogans) i refden dɣa yimekkiyen, ad nɣer: « Awit idrimen, ǧǧet-aɣ-d idles », « Ma nsusem ad aɣ-mḥun », atg. Ilmend n tigawt-a, aṭas seg yimeḥḍar i yeddan adlis deg yifassen-nsen, imi aberriḥ n tikli yella: « Afus deg ufus, adlis deg ufus ». Ma nesmekti-d ayen i d-yewwin tanekra-a yeddukklen n ugdud, d agdal n wacḥal d asarag i d-tettheggi Tdukkla Azday Adelsan n Uweqqas yal ddurt. Aneggaru-is d win n umaru-amaẓrag Remḍan Ɛeccab i niqal ad d-yawi awal ɣef liḥala n usiẓreg n udlis amaziɣ, maca ugin-t s tekriḍt yinesdabuyen idiganen. D ayen dɣa i yeǧǧan medden iɣaḍ-iten lḥal ula akkin i yilel. Yal wa ibeggen-d ibeddi-ines akked yimheggiyen n temlilit taseklant n Uweqqas.

  M. K. 

  
 Seg wacḥal d akud, ama d iberdan neɣ d imeḍqan di berra, ččarayen d ahicur n yal taɣawsa, qrib ad ttɣummun akal. Iban dakken deg yakk timnaḍin, yettili-d uɣilif-a i itekksen tezdeg i twennaḍt-nneɣ. Maca, imi yal aɣbel yesɛa tifrat, yezmer umdan ad yeg leḥsab-is i waya: ad yessenqes xersum kra n ustehzi, ad yeḥbes aḍegger n tɣawsiwin ur yeḥwaǧ anda yufa kan. Annect-a, dɣa, ur t-ḍfiren ara yimezdaɣ n tuddar skud zgan qqaren ulac anda ara nessers agudu-nni, anagar abrid i asen-d-ibanen zun d asellak. Daymi teɛreḍ tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, ad d-tefk ttawil i yimdanen seld mi d-tesres deg lweqt yezrin kra n tfesrin (poubelles) d timeqqranit, tefreq-itent deg yidigan seg wanda ttɛeddayen lɣaci s waṭas, am Iɣil Aɣezfan, Tigratin, Lmerj n Yiɣil, Tizwal, Taregragt d wiyaḍ. D tigawt yelhan i d-yekkan sɣur-sen, imi d yiwen n yiswi i yezdin, d asuter deg uɣref aqader n twennaḍt d temnaḍt. Segmi i d-mmuggent tfesrin-nni deg yiberdan, nezmer ad d-nini, ur yenqis ara uhicur akken ilaq. Aya, imi llan wid i igan ccɣel-is i yettwali d aɣan fell-as, llan wiyaḍ amzun d tewsex i asen-yehwan imi ugin ad ttekkin deg ucebbeḥ n taddart, d usebɛed n waṭṭanen. Ɛlaḥsab ayen i aɣ-d-yenna uselway wis sin n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, Mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi, ‘’Segmi ttwasersent tfesrin, rran tamawt i umgarad n lɛali i d-ibanen. Imi ur yezmir ḥedd ad yenker abaɣur-nsent skud jemmɛent ayen i ur nesliḥ. Rnu, mazal llant deg uxxam n tɣiwant tiyaḍ ttraǧunt aseqdec. Amedya ma rrẓent walbaɛḍ seg tid yersen deg yiberdan ad tili tin ara tt-ixelfen dindin. Ula d imezdaɣ ma yehwa-yasen, ma msefhamen gar-asen, zemren ad ssutren deg tɣiwant ad asen-d-ternu tifesrin-nni, ad rnun ad sneqsen agudu seg temnaḍt-nsen. Meḥsub ttawilat ur xussen ara, awi-d ukan ad yamed lebɣi n yiwet n tekti ɣef usizdeg n twennaḍt’’.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Anwi i izemmren ad yettu ameɣnas-nneɣ Maξṭub Lwennas d-ilulen ass n 24 deg yennayer aseggas n 1956 , deg taddart n Tewrirt Mussa Waξmer deg wat Dwala n Tizi Wezzu deg wasmi yella d amecṭuḥ i iḥemmel ccna , iḥemmel ad yefk tamezzuɣt i tezlatin n yifennanen imeqqranen am ccix Lḥesnawi, d Sliman ∑azem d Ţaleb Rabeḥ , asmi yebda ccna d afennan Yidir i as-ixedmen afud dɣa cwiṭ cwiṭ almi yuɣal yettwasen , icennu deg tmeɣriwin , iḥemmel ad yesefraḥ imeɣban , iḥemmel akk medden , iḥemmel tamaziɣt d yidles –nneɣ , yennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt ula d asmi yella d anelmad ad d-yaru uselmad-is s tutlayt-niḍen yettagi ad d-iɣer yettaru tamaziɣt yeqqar-as ma teɣriḍ-d ayen d-uriɣ s tmaziɣt ad d-ɣraɣ ayen d-turiḍ ɣef tfelwit, ula d asmi d-yesξada lξesker yettnaɣ d waξraben yeqqar-asen ad mmeslayen tamaziɣt .Deg useggas n 1988 wten-t ijedarmiyen deg Micli , dɣa yessuffeɣ-d tizlit-nni anida i as-yeqqar : «Ma d lkumiṣar neɣ ajadarmi ur-sekniɣ i ddel», d win ur nettaggad ara, yettmeslay ayen yellan deg wul-is , ur yettara ara aḍar ɣer deffir , tizlatin-is yecna-tent ɣef tayri , lɣerba, ɣef tmurt, ɣef yiman-is ayen d-yenna yevra-as ɣer sdat , yettwaṭṭef sɣur yiwet n terbaξt timselleḥt deg useggas n 1994 yeqqim ɣur-sen , kkren-d akk yeqbayliyen yewwi-ten nnif , iɣaḍ-iten yuḥal serḥen-as-d , inuḍaḥ akken ilaq ɣef tmaziɣt , yecna ɣef wid yettwanɣan uqbel-is , asmi yemmut Muḥmed Buḍyaf , anida i as-yenna : «A kanza a yelli , ur ttru ara , d iseflan neɣli ɣef Lzzayer uzekka», yecna ɣef udabu ameṣbaṭli , Maξṭub Lwennas d win yeɣran ddunit , ur yeḥwağ ara aɣerbaz imi d netta i d aɣerbaz ; yezweğ snat n tikkal tamezwarut d Ǧamila tis snat d Nadiya , maca ur yesξi ara dderya , yeqqar deg yiwet n tezlit : «Di nger ara mmteɣ azekka» , yecna ɣef waṭṭan –is ,Lwennas iḥemmel leqbayel, idurar, yeqqar-as : «Leqbayel ay d leξmer-iw, d idurar ay d leξmer-iw», ikemmel amecwar-is netta ur yessusem d ameslay ɣef tmaziɣt almi dayen tekcem ɣer uɣerbaz , maca ɣer taggara yettwanɣa deg Tala Bunan Deg uzal qayli sdat n tmeṭṭut-is Nadiya ar ass-a n wussan ur d-iban anwi t-yenɣan ass n 25 deg yulyu 1998 , tamurt n leqbayel tenhewwal am wakken d zlezla d-yewten , ulac win ur nsuɣ ara fell-as , ad t-yerḥem Rebbi , awal yenna-t-id mazal ṣṣut –is ad yebbeξzeq , yerṣex deg wulawen-nneɣ, deg wallaɣ-nneɣ nḥemmel-it , ur nezmir ad nettu amuli –ines 24 deg yennayer, ur nezmir ad nettu azumul n tmazɣa d nnif Maξṭub Lwennas , izem aɣilas am wakken i as-teqqar yemma-s nna ∑alğiya , ad yili Rebbi yid-s amek ara tettu mmi-s !, ur yukir ur yenɣi yebɣa kan tamaziɣt ad teṭṭef adeg-is am tutlayin niḍen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 Am wakken ḥsan akk wid yellan deg wannar n umennuɣ adelsan, tafaska n tmedyezt tamaziɣt, d tajmilt i Dda Lmulud n At Mɛemmer, i yettmaggan deg Ayt Smaɛel d ttiɛad n wawal i d-yettuɣalen yal aseggas, imi ur yezmir ad yettwakkes seg ucḍaḍ n umezruy akken tebɣu tella teswiɛt. Daymi bdan seg tura yiɛeggalen n Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad afras ed ufraẓ n yiqeddicen ilmend n temlilit-a tadelsant n meɣres i d-iteddun, i d-yessegrawayen acḥal d ameɣnas; gar imedyazen, iselmaden, inaẓuren, at yimussuyen idelsanen, ed wid iḥemmlen idles-nsen s umata. Dɣa, ameslay yella yezzi ussan yezrin ɣef yinebgi n yiseɣ n teẓrigt-a ed ɣef wanwa ara tuɣal tejmilt, imi seld kra n umciwer, gezmen-tt di rray yilemẓiyen n tdukkla dakken ad tili i Lwennas n Ayt Lewnis deg tefsut n 2016, ɣas ma tella tettwar-as tejmilt yakan sɣur tdukkla n Udrar n Fad, maca s tefses ahat. D tagnit ihi ad twekked tdukkla-ya ibeddi-ines ɣer kra n wid yeggulen ad ilin kan d nutni, ad asen-tanez daɣ nettat s ulama tejmilt tamecṭuḥt. Yuɣ lḥal, ma nesmekta-d inaẓuren akk uɣur terra tiṭ tdukkla-ya i d-yennulfan 21 n yiseggasen ɣer deffir, ad d-nebder Karim Branis, Ɛli Ideflawen, Zedek Mulud, akked Malika Dumran.

 Akken i aɣ-d-yenna uselway n tdukkla-ya iɣef nettmeslay mass Fares Bakkuc, tura deg wallaɣen ɣas ini telḥeq-d tfaska, imi irupurtajen n kraḍ n yimedyazen i d-yufraren deg tedwit iɛeddan ur ttɛeṭṭilen ad kfun, tisɣunin n useggas atan ad ttwaceyyɛent i usiẓreg daɣen, war ma yella-d ustehzi ɣef uxemmem i tbadut tayeḍ neɣ tarrayt tamaynut ara as-yefken ugar n tiẓeḍt i usihar-a agejdan. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Lalyam Ṣuneyya d yiwet n tnelmadt n uɣerbaz alemmas Lɛerbi Mezzani n At Yanni. Tlul ass n 30 yulyu 2002. Aseggas-agi, d nettat i yewwin arraz usebγes n temsizzelt tis snat “Meɛtub Lwennas” i d-tettheggi tiddukla Tirza. Tewwi arraz ɣef wudem i d-tefka d tufrarin i d-tufrar tullist s wyes tettekki di temsizzelt.

 Tullist-agi tefka-as azwel “Inig aneggaru”. Deg-s temmeslay-ed ɣef sin yemḥemmalen; maca imawlan n teqcict ur qbilen ara. Yiwen wass, mi mlalen sin nni yemḥemmalen yesla baba-s n teqcicit ur s-yeɛǧib ara rray-nni, ar almi yewweḍ yenɣa yell-is. Ma d win akken tt-iḥemlen, si lxelɛa nni yuɣal d aggugam, yerna cwiṭ yemmut ula d netta, ma d baba-s n teqcict nni yegra-d di tisselbi.

 S tullist ines, Lalyam Ṣuneyya, tga assaɣ d umennuɣ n Lwennas i yennuɣen akken ad tifrir tmaziɣt d tutlayt taɣelnawt, tunṣibt di lezzayer akken ad iban laṣel. Ass n 25 yunyu 2015, yezzin-d 17 iseggasen seg mi yettwanɣa Meɛtub Lwennas, i demma n waya i thegga tiddukla Tirza timsizzelt-agi n tira s tmaziɣt.

 Arraz-agi fkan-as-t Lalyam Ṣuneyya deg uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi-Wezzu. D inazuren, Ḥamid Meɛṭub d Karim Baca i d-yusan ad s-rren tajmilt i Lwennas Meɛtub i s-t-ibedden ɣef lɛecra d uzgen n yiḍ s uḥdar n ugraw n wazal n 25 n yinelmaden n At Yanni. Ayen i ten-yesfeṛḥen aṭas.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Daḥlal Canez 

  
 Imḍebbren n Unaris n waddal d umerreḥ n Tikjda, llan-d deg ttiɛad ass n lexmis yezrin i wakken ad sfuglen s umulli wis 11 n tlalit n Unaris-a. I wakken ad yennekmal lferḥ, wid yellan ɣef uqerruy n “Cnlst”, necden-d aṭas n yinebgawen, gar-asen iɛeggalen n tɣamsa am wakken i yeldin tiwwura i wid d tid yebɣan ad d-asen, ladɣa wid iwulfen amkan-a. Deg yiḍ n lexmis, mi d-yella akka usmekti d wazal yesɛa unaris-a deg usnerni n tmerrit deg temnaḍt-a, tella-d yiwet n tmeɣra anda tanaẓurt Nesrine tessuzen inebgawen. Tasebḥit n wass n lǧemɛa, ama d inebgawen ama d imerriyen i d-yerzan ɣer Tikjda, ttwanecden ɣer yiwet n tirza n kra n yimukan deg udrar n Ǧerǧer. D tikli n uḍar d umerreḥ ɣef tɣaltin i d-yellan, anda imusnawen n yimukan-a, skanayen-d i yimdanen agerruj n temnaḍt-a. D tirebbaɛ neɣ d tiwaculin, tiɣilt tettak-itent i tayeḍ, deg yiwet n tegnit n lferḥ d ccna. D tagnit ihi i fursen yimḍebbren n unaris-a i wakken ad d-neddhen s wudem unṣib tulya n tsemhuyt n unebdu, anda yettuhegga yiwen n usenfar meqqren i uqabel n yimerriyen, tirebbaɛ tineddalin d wid iḥemmlen agama.

  M. Smail 

  
 Yella yiwen n ufellaḥ ittidir d twacult-is deg yiwet n taddart d-yuzgan deg tlemmast n yidurar n Ǧerǧer. Ittrebbi lmal, ikerrez akal-is, iteẓẓu, immeger, lḥasul tafellaḥt-is d tafellaḥt n udrar. Ittidir kan s wayen d-tefka tferka-s. Tameṭṭut akked isɛa tlata n warrac tezga tettnamer-it, ayen ixdem neɣ ayen i as-d-yewwi ad as-id-taf lɛib. Yiwen wass deg wussan n tmegra, akken issers iman-is urgaz-nni ad yečč imekli, tenṭeq-d tmeṭṭut-is tenna-as : 

 -Ay argaz teẓriḍ akka d lawan n tmegra, nekk ḥwaǧeɣ amger ajdid, mačči d win iḥfan swayes ara mmegreɣ.

 -Aha tura err-ikem ɣer umger, azekka d ssuq, ad am-d-awiɣ ajdid, daya ! 

 -Awal d win i wumi tesliḍ, nekk nniɣ-ak bɣiɣ amger ajdid. 

 -Yirbaḥ a tameṭṭut ! Azekka ad am d-awiɣ amger. Anef-iyi tura ad sebleɣ cwiṭ-agi n tgella. Azekka-nni tanezzayt argaz isewwaq ɣer ssuq yuɣ-d ayen ɣef i t-tweṣṣa tmeṭṭut-is. Ikcem-d s axxam lawan n yimekli, urɛad d-ters tgella tameṭṭut teɛna-t, tenna-as : I yak tewwiḍ-d ayen ɣef i k-weṣṣeɣ ? Yak tewwiḍ-iyi-d amger-nni ay argaz ? Wwiɣ-t-id a tameṭṭut, wwiɣ-t-id ! 

 -Anda yella akka? Bɣiɣ ad t-waliɣ tura kan. Argaz issebleɛ snat n tleqmatin, aqemmuc-is iččur ur izmir ara ad-as-id-yerr awal, irfed afus-s iwehha-as-id i tmeṭṭut-is amkan deg yella umger. Tameṭṭut truḥ akin ad twali amger-nni, netta ittkemmil učči. Cwiṭ akka a-tt-a tuɣal-d tenna-as : 

 -A nnger-ik ma d wagi i d amger ! Wagi d-tewwiḍ akka d lemqes ay argaz mačči d amger ! Ah ! A tameṭṭut! D amger i d-uɣeɣ mačči d lemqes ! Ikker-d urgaz-nni iruḥ ad iwali s wallen-is ma s tidet ayen i as-teqqar tmeṭṭut-is. Iddem-d ayen akken deg yenneḍ umger-nni, ifsi-t-id issawel-as yenna-as : 

 S leɛqel-im i telliḍ a tameṭṭut ! Acu t-akka ara d-teqqareḍ ? I wagi mačči d amger ? Argaz irfed-d amger seg ufus-is isneɛt as-t i tmeṭṭut-is. -Wagi d lemqes ay argaz mačči d amger ! 

 -Xzu ciṭan inɛel-it a tameṭṭut, wagi d amger ur yelli s nnig-is ur yelli ddaw-as.

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Amezruy n wasmi terγa taddeart n Tewrirt, taγiwant n Wizgan ass n 11 γuct 1871 mazal yersex deg wallaγen n yal tasuta d yimezdaγ n temnaḍt n Wizgan s umata, imi yal amdan yesεan tigzi neγ win iwumi tejhed cfaya, ad as-innin « Tecfiḍ-d i wasmi terγa Tewrirt », dγa imdanen akk gzan s talluft n truγi n Tewrirt sγur lεeskker n tmurt n Fransa. Maca, ass n sebt 30 yulyu 2016 n ddurt yezrin, imezdaγ n temnaḍt n Wizgan d temnaḍin i as-d-yezzin, dren tallit-ni n wasmi terγa Tewrirt, 145 n yiseggasen mbaεd. Taddart Tawrirt n tγiwant n Wizgan tedder yiwet n teswaεt yuεṛen nezzah. Sebba, d tmes meqqren i yekkren di teẓgi n taddart-agi almi tekcem γer daxel taddart, anda imezdaγ n tudrin, iγallen n usellek, takebbanit tazzayrit n wamman (ADE), ixeddamen n 04 n tγiwanin Wizgan, At-zikki, Illulen Umalu akked At-Yeğğer, fkan-d afus n tallelt almi ṣawḍen sexsin times. Acu kan times-agi, tegla-d s lemḍara meqqren imi ddeqs n tjur n uzemmur i yuγalen d iγiγden, tamettant n lmal, izamaren d tγeṭṭen d tizizwa. Ma yella d lexṣara di tarwiḥin n yemdanen ulac, llan kan kra n yimejraḥ d wid iḍaqqen s dexxan.

 Si tama-nniḍen, ddeqs n temnaḍin-nniḍen i yeddren ussan iweεṛen aṭas deg tallit-agi n unebdu, ladɣa, deg waggur-agi n γuct s sebba n tmes i yebdan tecεel deg yal amḍiq u mazal tettenfufud ar ass-a. Ayen yeǧǧan tiṣeddarin n lḥamu ulin-t s waṭas. Ddeqs n tẓegwa i yerγan, yečča-tent ujajiḥ n tmes, d ihigtaren n tzemrin i inegren, d ayen ara yeǧǧen zzit, asafar-a swayes ttidirent acḥal n twaculin di tmurt n leqbayel, ad yiɛziz, ad yeɣlay.Gar waya, d isufa i tedhem tmes, ɣer tama n uxerrub d yisekla-nniḍen. Ula d tizizwa ur slikent ara imi mačči drus n teɣrasin i yerɣan. Ulac tama i tezgel tmes, ama deg Wat Yeğğar, Illulen Umalu, Ifiγa d waṭas-nniḍen. Limer mačči d iɣallen n laman akked yimdanen iɛerḍiyen, ula d ixxamen ad rɣen ! Deqs n yihigṭaren i tečča tmes gar yisekla i d-yettakken lγella d wid-nniḍen. Lixsas n ttawilat iwulmen yeǧǧa iɣallen n usellek ur zmiren ara ad tt-ssexsin imi ulac aṭas n yiberdan i seg ara ɛeddin. Acu kan yewwi-d lḥal akken ad nḥezzeb, imi qqaren ‘’aḥezzeb yugar leqḍaε’’, i uḥareb γef twenaḍt d wayen i d as-d-yezzin.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Yal taddart neɣ tamnaḍt seg temnaḍin n leqbayel neɣ n tmurt n lezzayer s umata, yal yiwet deg-sent amek i d-tesmektay ansayen-is (Taεacurt, Lmulud, Yennayen…).

 Tikkelt-agi neɛreḍ deg tirza-nneɣ ɣer waṭas n tuddar n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, ad d-nessiken i medden amek nuɣɣen tannumi sfugulen ass n Tɛacurt deg tuget n tudrin n temdint-a. Ansay-agi i d-yekkan seg tedyanit tineslemt, yettili-d yal 10 deg waggur n Muḥarem n leḥsab n Lhiǧri, aseggas-agi yemtawa-d d wass-nni n lḥed yezrin 01 deg waggur n tuber 2017. Tuget n tuddar, sufuɣen yimezdaɣ-is lewɛadi ɣef yimeɣban d uxeddim n lewziɛa, maca nekkni nebɣa ad d-nesken irmad d leɛwayed xeddmen wiyaḍ deg unsay-agi.

  Nebda-d seg ladayra n Ʃin El Ḥemmam… 

 Taṣebḥit n wass-nni n umenzu n waggur-agi ideg nella, neṭṭef abrid ɣer tɣiwant n Uqbil, ladɣa taddart n Wat Ṣallan, nufa dinna inesbaɣuren n taddart taṣebḥit n wass-nni n lǧemɛa uqbel taɛacurt, sufuɣen yakkan lewɛadi, ẓuren-d lemqamat yellan deg tɣiwant-agi. Ma d ass-nni n lḥed nufa-ten akken kan ttheggin iman-nsen i wakken ad zlun izgaren n tmecreḍt n tɛacurt. Syin akin, nkemmel abrid-nneɣ ɣer tɣiwant n Ʃin El Ḥemman, neqsed lemqam n Jeddi Mangellet n taddart n Tewrirt Mangellet, neẓra-d belli bdan irmaden-nsen seg sendiḍelli-nni n tɛacurt, yal ass sewwayen-d seksu s uksum, ferrqen-t ɣer yinebgawen i irezzun ɣer dinna, ma d wid i ibeɛden ttnusun deg yisensa. Nnan-aɣ belli yella umkan n zzerda n tlawin weḥd-s, win n zzerda n yirgazen weḥd-s. Am wakken daɣen i d-ttasen yimdanen-nniḍen i d as-ittṣeddiqen i Jeddi Mangellet ikraren, izgaren, iqelwawen, zellun-ten deg lweɛda n tɛacurt. Wiyaḍ ttasen-d kan i wakken ad ẓuren u ad as-ḍelben ḥellu n yimuḍan neɣ lbaraka deg lerzaq-nsen. Am wakken daɣen llan yimdanen-nniḍen yettruḥun s axxam n Ccix Muḥend u Lḥussin, xeddmen daɣen akka.

  …Taɣiwant n At Xellili 

 Mi yezgen wass, yuɣ-aɣ lḥal newweḍ ɣer tɣiwant n At Xellili, i wakken ad nẓer d acu merra n leqdicat idelsanen d yimettiyen i xeddmen deg snat n tuddar-is, i lmend n usmekti n unsay-agi aqdim. Dɣa nezwer-d seg taddart n At Xir, mi nelḥaq, nufa yebda yakkan usfugel-ines ass-nni n lǧemɛa 29 deg waggur n cutember 2017, tedda alarmi d ass-agi amenzu n waggur-agi n tuber 2017. Dɣa ixdem-aɣ-d uselway n tiddukkla tadelsant “Isselqam n talaɣt” n taddart-agi n At Xir, Mass Karim Taguein agzul n wayen yeḍran: “Nexdem ass-nni n larebɛa ɣer yiḍ 27 deg waggur n cutember 2017, lewziɛa neɣ timecreḍt, ideg nezla 07 n yizgaren i d-seddqen wat taddart deg ussan-agi iɛeddan, syin ass-nni n lexmis nefreq akk aksum-nni ɣef yimezdaɣ n taddart. Ma d sendiḍelli n lǧemɛa 29/09/2017, akked yiḍelli n ssebt aṭas n leqdicat idelsanen deg tlemmast n taddart sdat n tqubet yellan rrif n ubrid. Ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan-agi yezrin (lǧemɛa 29/09/2017 akked ssebt 30/09/2017), nga aṭas n temsikniyin: lfeṭṭa, idlisen, tamemt, afexxar, tiqendurin n leqbayel, ijeqduren n usɣar, zzit n uzemmur, allalen iqburen, idlisen, isenza s yibuddan(…). Am wakken daɣen tella ccna, isefra, ticeqqufin n umezgun, iḍebbalen…atg”. Ma d ahil ufṣil yella-d akka: deg ass amezwaru 29/09/2017, tella-d yiwet n tmeɣra n ccna s wazal-is, ideg ccnan waṭas n yicennayen n taddart-agi n At Xir. Rnu ɣur-s timsikniyin-agi i d-nebder yakkan. Ma deg ass-nni wis, i d-yellan ass-nni n ssebt 30/09/2017, tella-d tejmilt meqqren i sin n yicennayen-nneɣ imeqqranen wigi d Atmani akked Taleb Tahar. Dɣa cnan-d kra n tezlatin-nsen, yerna wwin awal ɣef umecwar-nsen d tnagiyin fell-asen. Am wakken i d-yella Massi Lewhama deg lmendad, anida necraḥent aṭas twacul.in i d-yusan ad tnezhent. Ma ɣef 12h00 n uzal tella-d lweɛda, anida seččen merra taddart d yinebgawen s seksu d uksum. Ma deg wass-agi n lḥed 01/10/2017, nelḥeq deg lawan n lweɛda, syin akkin kfan-tt s yiwet n tmeɣra meqqren, ideg ccnan aṭas n yinaẓuren gar-asen: Yousef Guerbas, Ahitous, Dehmani Bilaid…atg. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella Attaf n Lewhama ɣef lmendad n tsaɛet n unecraḥ d teḍṣa. Syin ɣer-s, tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n uttekki i wid ittekkan deg usfugel n tɛacurt-agi n useggas-agi. Syin ɣer-s newwi abrid metwal taddart n Leɣrus, dima deg tɣiwant n At Xellili, anida nelḥeq ɣef ddqayeq tineggura n lewziεa i xedmen taṣebḥit n wass-agi n lǧemɛa, ideg seččen akk taddart s uksum. Anida i d-tella yiwet lweεda, ideg i d-fkan wat taddart sin n yizgaren i wakken ad ten-zlun d waṭas n yidrimen ara tessexdem taddart d useddu n yisenfaren n unegmu. Ilmeẓyen n taddart-agi n Leɣrus, εeddan-d akk ɣef yixxamen n taddart tawwurt s tewwurt, jemεen-d timellalin d ufḍir (aḥeddur), d yidrimen. Syin akkin, wwin-ten akk ɣer tejmaεt n taddart. Aksum-nni, ferqen-t ɣef wat taddart, yal yiwen yewwi amur-is ula d timellalen d ufḍir yal yiwen s leḥqq-is. Ma d idrimen-nni, gan-ten deg texriḍt n taddart, mi ten-ḥwajen ad ten-id-kksen.

  Ɣer taggara, nezger ɣer tɣiwant n Tizi Raced 

 Nessaweḍ ɣer taddart Yicerɛiwen, taddart n Si Muḥend u Mḥend akked Laimache Ali, yellan deg tɣiwant n Tizi Raced lewhi n ṭṭhur. Nufa-ten xedmen yakan lweɛda ɣef 12h00 n uzal, dɣa zlan 23 n yikraren i ten-id-ikecmen s yisem n ṣṣaddiqa, seččen akk At taddart si rrif alamma d rrif, syin aksum-nni yugaren ferqent ɣef yixxamen. Am wakken daɣen i xedmen tameɣra n ccna, ideg ccnan kra n yilmeẓyen n taddart-agi, yecban: Lallouche Salim, Ladjani Cherif, Hacen Oukid, Lamhene Arezki…atg. Am wakken daɣen i d aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n uɛeggal seg tesqamut n taddart-agi, mazal-asen 7 n yizgaren ad xedmen yis-sen timecreḍt deg ddurt-agi sdat-nneɣ. Ihi s wakka i tekfa tirza-nneɣ ɣer tuddar-agi i d-nebder yakkan, i wakken kan ad twalim ay imeɣriyen amek i d-yettili usfugel n unsay n tɛacurt deg yal tama deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Di zzman n yiɣil, asmi ttnaɣen leɛrac d tudrin, di taddart n Tala-Ixlan deg lεarc n At Aysi, yella yiwen n udrum ssawalen-as At Waḍu. Qqaren fell-asen, d at ufud. Segmi ara d-kkren d imenɣi d yiderma niḍen, ladɣa d yiwen n udrum isan ula d nutni irgazen n at yiɣil. Yiwen wass, deg wussan n ḥartadem teffeɣ yiwet n teslit n udrum ittqamaren adrum n At Waḍu ɣer tala, ad d-tagem tacmuxt tamezwarut, ass n seba n wussan seg d-tedda (ass n seba yam). Tislit tcebbaḥ, tesbur tabniqt i uqerru ines, teddem asagem, tewwi abrid n tala akked d tlawin n udrum-is. Iṭij iḥma, ifures tagnit ad as-tiniḍ d anebdu, lɣaci ffɣen akk ɣer lecɣel-nsen. Akken izgen wass, igenni iɣli-d ɣef tmurt. Ssayqa seg yigenni tayeḍ si lqaɛa. Aḍu ittsuḍu-d d izumal, iqelleε ula d iqermuden n tnezduɣin. Tislit iffɣen ad d-tagem mazal-itt deg ubrid, ula d nettat ur temniɛ ara. Isuffeg-as waḍu tabniqt-is, iwwi-tt akin, tεelli deg yigenni. Tislit, aqerru eryan, tsetḥa, tḥar deg yiman-is. Tilawin-nni i iddan yid-s sekkrent laeyaḍ ssawalent qqarent: Ikkes-as waḍu tabniqt i teslit! Ikkes-as waḍu tabniqt i teslit! Alammi kra n lɣaci fehmen belli d yiwen seg udrum n At Waḍu i ikksen tabniqt i teslit. Tuɣ lḥal, adrum n At Waḍu d udrum n teslit ɣur-sen taedawt. Lexbar yewweḍ imawlen: yiwen n uɛeggal seg udrum n At Waḍu, ikkes sser fell-asen. Irgazen n udrum n teslit qqnent wallen-nsen seg wurrif, refden lemkaḥel, ffɣen ad d-erren ttar. Akka i ikker imenɣi gar udrum n teslit d udrum n At Waḍu. Gren-d iman-nsen iderma niḍen, rnan-d imrabḍen n At Lḥaǧ, usan-d fran-ten. Qqaren, lemmer ur d-uzilen ara ɣur-sen, yilli msengaren. Kkren amek ara asen-ggen! Nnan-asen: “taddart-a yessefk ad tt-teǧǧem imi ur terbiḥem ara fell-as. Ad tesbeddem taddart niḍen ukessar ihin, deg umalu, deg wakal n At Lḥaǧ”. Imezdaɣ uɣen-asen awal, ssbedden taddart niḍen di tama-nni i asen d-nnan slid adrum n At Waḍu. Qqaren-d wigi ruḥen si taddart, guǧǧan anda niḍen. Akka i trab taddart n Tala-Ixlan. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane LASHEB 

  
 Taɣiwant n ddecmiya d yiwent n tɣiwant id-yezgan deg unẓul lwilaya n tubiret anda imezdaɣ n tama-agi ttidirin di yir liḥala d lexsas n wallalen tudert deg yal taɣult akk d yiɣublan iten-yeṭṭafaren acḥal iseggasen-aya imi imḍebren ur xddimen acema di tama-agi dayen yeǧǧan taɣiwant ur tesɛi iqiḥ texla ,Acku mazal tiwaculin n temnaḍt-agi ttemxebiḍent di tegnatin qessiḥen d lmerta iten izedɣen di tmeddurt nsen axaṭar tuɣal temɛict ɣur -sen tewɛar aṭas ala seg wugguren yellan am wayen yeɛnan tiḥuna yesnuzun ulac ladɣa ɣer wayen icudden isufar lmakla , leqhawi , mebla ma nettu leswaq lxuḍra ,ɣef waya imezdaɣ ttruḥun ami d ṣur lɣuzlan i yibeɛben acḥal di kilumiṭren ɣef tɣiwant nsen akken ad d-awwin ayen bɣan ,Ma yella d iɣublan nniḍen anaf ur sɛin ara iberdan iqeɛden imi reglen akk , leɣyab n trisiti iberdan akked imukan umerraḥ ladɣa ixxamen ilmeẓyen , ɛlaḥsab ilmeẓyen sbegnend lɣid nsen ɣef yimḍebren usqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant ɣef usnulfu imahilen unegmu d yisenfaren di temnaḍt d usnulfu imukan uxeddim i lfayda n yilmeẓyen i yerwan leɛtab , ɣef waya gren tiɣri i yimḍebren lwilaya ladɣa lwali s timad-is ad d-yar lwelha nes ɣer lmerta ideg llan s tifrat n yiɣublan d tikci n yisenfaren i lfayda yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant . 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas Abdelhak 

  
 Deg yimalasen yezrin teḍra-d tigawt twenneɛ deg tesnawit Maɛuc Idris n Lberǧ ‎n Mira, aselmad n tmaziɣ deg tesnawit-a mass Nabil Xaldi, akked kra n yimdukkal-is analas Fares Idir, Muqrani Meqran, Wadi Saleḥ, llan fesren-d tanazalt (affiche) i teqcicin tisnawanin akken xersum ad d-lsent taqendurt-nni d abrid ass n 19 deg yebrir iɛeddan. D ayen i d-yeḍran ihi, ɣas ma mačči merra, ddeqs n tezwawin tilemẓiyin i d-yerran i tiɣri usant i uɣerbaz-nsent s tkebrin-nsent tinasliyin. Rnu aṭas i yesnagan belli ass ideg i d-lsant tlemẓiyin tiqendurin, werǧin tecbeḥ tesnawit n Maɛuc Idris annect-n. « Atan aseggas-a d tigawt tafessast kan i d-yesbeyynen belli ziɣ tizwawin ḥemmlent taqendurt, wajdent ad tt-ttlusunt deg tudert-nsent n yal ass am nettat am yiselsa-nniḍen. Ihi nessaram seg tuɣalin n tɣuri i d-iteddun deg ctember ad teqqel tmelsi n tqendurt d ansay, d lɛada ɣur tezwawt ». Aya yenna-aɣ-it-id Nabil Xaldi, d aselmad deg tesnawit i d-nebder yakan.  Ilaq ad d-nini dakken ass-a tizwawin ur llant ara d nutenti akken i d-yewwi, skud aselsu-nsent ansayan i yellan d taqendurt atan yettwasres s yifassen-nsent ɣer tesga. Rnu, ula sɣur wayeḍ tella tebɣa ad d-tekk tiyita, imi ula deg yiɣerbazen llan kra nwan ad tt-gedlen i teqcicin tizwawin ad as-tiniḍ taqendurt ur tecbiḥ ayendin ama ɣef tin i tt-yelsan, ama i wallen yettwalin. D ayen i yeǧǧan ihi ddeqs n tezwawin tikkelt yezrin mmeṭlaqent ɣer uselsu-nsent ansayan  deg umaḍal merra, gan-t d tajmilt i yiwet n tesnawant i d-yettwaqeccɛen ilindi seg uɣerbaz-is deg Tmezrit acku telsa taqendurt n tezwawin. Deg Kanada, deg Lezzayer, deg Taruft, deg Tezwawt, llant di ttiɛad deg yiberdan, deg yimeḍqan n uqeddic, bac ad d-sbeyynent dakken d zzman kan i tent-ikellxen ma yella ur neccdent taqendurt-nsen ala deg tmeɣriwin.  Ɣef waya, la nettmesteqsay lemmer ɛni tizwawin merra n Tezwawt (Tamurt n Yizwawen) ad refdent taqendurt-nsent akken ilaq, acḥal ara tecbeḥ tegnit n tuɣalin ɣer uẓar i yellan d leqrar n tudert n yal aɣref. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Deg ussan-a i d-teddun ad d-yeffeɣ udlis ara yezdin “tanfult n tazrawin n tmaziɣt”(bulletin d’études berbères) sɣur tiẓrigin Amar Achab. Azal n udlis agi meqqer mačči d kra, acku ad yezdi merra uṭṭunen ( seg yiwen alamma d 12) id yeffɣen gar useggas 1973 armi d 1977.Am akken neẓra tanfut-agi tella s ddaw amezday n tazrewt tamaziɣt n tesdawit n Paris VIII- Vincennes. I w-akken ad tishil taɣuṛi n isebṭaren yellan deg zzmam , amur ameqqran seg tewriqin-is yettuɛawed-asen-t tira ( uran-t s wudem atrar) ama deg ayen yeɛnan asekkil neɣ tirawalt( ortographie). Amaynut diɣen deg tḥawact-agi n tezrawin d akken amsizṛeg( éditeur) yerran ismawen n imawalen n isebṭaṛen yellan deg tanfult –agi imi niqal deg azmam anaṣli ulac azmul-sen ( signature) . Xuḍi nekni s tsuta n tafsut n 80 nectaq( di lawan-nni) ad naf tizrawin-agi i tɣuri imi medlen fellaɣ meṛṛa tiwwura. Nectaq a nɣeṛ ayen iɣ yecqan xas akken nfud tamussni , xas akken nereɣa a nissin ugar ɣef yiman-nneɣ, ɣef yidles-nneɣ , ɣef tjaddit-nneɣ. Deg lawan- nni, ddaw leḥkem amesbaṭli n Bouemdienne tamaziɣt ala win yellan d ameslub ara yeḥnunnfen ɣer ɣer-s. Ismawen am wid n Mouloud Mammeri, Slimane Azem, Besaaud Mohand Aɛrab, Salem Chaker, Taous Amrouche, Lmouhoub Amrouche … d leḥram d aseṭṭaf a ten di yedder umdanen. ( lehdur-nwen s ddaw ufus i tt-ɛeddin…id yenna Lounis Ait Menguellet). Deg lawan-nni teẓmek si yal tama ɣef teqbaylit , wamma isem umaziɣ win it-id yudren amzun ihudd aɛessas. Ɣef aya asenfaṛ-agi n wezrireg n tizrawin-agi yussa-d deg lawan-is deg amkan-is ( imi aql-aɣ ɣef tewwura n tafsut n imaziɣen akked tafsut tberkant) akken imeɣṛiyen ( wid ur nessin ara tizrawin-agi) ad mmɣen deg tussna-nsen, ma d wid i ten-yeɣran( s wudem uffir ) zik-nni ad ɛiwden tyessawt deg isebṭaren ara ten id yesmektin acu tura Mbarek Redjala, ,Mohya, Boussad Ben Belkacem, Hend Sadi, Said Boudaoud, Remdane Achab, Mohand Ouamer Ousalem, Said Yacine, S Mou nira. Ɣef aya azal n wedlis agi yekka-d deg aṭas n tamiwin: tamezwarut d -a sekfel n imenɣi n imezwura ɣef yidles amaziɣ( aqbayli) imi aṭas n tanagiyin( témoignage) i yellan deg adlis ( amedya amek di tella tsuqqilt n tmezgunt n Kateb Yacine : “ Muhend ddem tabalizt-ik akked tallalit n tarbaɛt umezgun yuraren tamezgunt-agi s teqbaylit…) , t-is snat d-smekti n kra n win inudan amek ara d yernu tehajjurt-is ɣer lebni n tamagit-nneɣ ( amedya Ben Mohamed, Muhya, Remdane Achab, …)tis tlata amezday-agi n kra n w-ayen yak yuran s wudem uffir deg lawan-nni ( iseggasen n 70) ɣef yidles nneɣ yussa-d akken ad yili d rkiza i kra win yebɣan ad yissin ugar ɣef amek yelha leqdic ɣef tutlayt-nneɣ: amek tella s anda tewweḍ deg ass yecban ass-a. Mebla ccekk imeɣṛiyen n tmaziɣt (deg tesdawiyin) aṭas n tmussni ara d megren seg adlis-agi, am akken diɣ kra n win iḥamlen teqbaylit aṭas n wayen yelhan ara t ihuzen asmi ara yedlu ɣef leqdic-agi . Ɣef aya asenfar –agi n tizrigin Remdane Achab d win id yellan di lawan akken ad yeḥyu n umennuɣ ɣef yidles nneɣ nekni yettheggin iman-nneɣ akken ad neḥyu tafsut n tmanyin akked tafsut taberkant. Asfilet-nneɣ diɣen d wagi : lemmer tiẓrigin-agi ad alsent I umawal n Dallet s tira teqbaylit tatrart imi ula d win d agerruj yettraǧǧu s ccuq yal aqbayli yesexdamen taqbaylit-is I lmendad n teqbaylit

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Awi-aɣ-d awal ɣef Tdukkla Tadelsant Imedyazen ideg aql-ik d amaray amatu, am usnulfu d yiswan-is… 

  Ɛumar Mufuq:  Tiddukla Tadelsant Imedyazen d yiwet seg tdukliwin tiqburin akk i ixeddmen ɣef tmaziɣt deg Lezzayer Tamanaɣt. Tennulfa-d deg tallit n lḥeṛs d tuggdi, deg yiseggasen n 1980, deg tesdawit n Bab Zzewwaṛ. D inelmaden i tt-id-yesnulfan. Niqal, d tagrawt (deg 1984) sakkin d amazday (deg 1986), deg tallit-a ideg tuggdi ur telli seg uwanek kan neɣ seg tedbelt n tesdawit, wanag nella nɛus iman-nneɣ ula seg tegrawin tisertanin i yellan sdaxel tesdawit yernu llant mgal tamaziɣt (imeẓrislamen, isduklanen, atg.). Yella yegget lḥeṛs ama daxel n tesdawit, ama beṛṛa, maca ɣas akken, nefren ad d-nini ayen i aɣ-yerḥan, ad d-nessuffeɣ ayen i aɣ-iqerḥen, ad d-nessken tutlayt d yidles-nneɣ amaziɣ. Ad newwet fell-asen ulamma nugad ayen i nugad, ama ɣef tezrawin-nneɣ, ama ɣef tlelli n yal yiwen deg-neɣ, ama ɣef tudert-nneɣ. Armi d 1989, asmi tɛawed tmurt tamendawt, ay tuɣal tegrawt-nneɣ d Tidukkla s lekwaɣeḍ-ines. Seg wasmi ay d-tennulfa (sdaxel tesdawit), txeddem tdukkla-a ɣef tirawt, aselmed n tirawt n tmaziɣt d weḥraz n tutlayt-a s ulqaḍ n tgemmi tanimit d usuffeɣ n yidlisen. Iswan-ines d aselmed n tirawt n tmaziɣt i wannect iumi tezmer n medden, gar-asen ula d aɛṛabwalen neɣ imsiwlen n taɛṛabt. Am wakken ay tekkat akken ad d-tban tmaziɣt deg yakk inurar ideg tezmer ad d-tban deg-sen (deg uzniq, deg tuddar, deg tḥuna). Yernu nezga netteg taḥemla akken ad nessebɣes medden, ladɣa imaziɣwalen, ad ssawalen ala s tmaziɣt, ad ttarun ala s tmaziɣt gar-asen.

  Nwala tessufuɣem-d ula d idlisen s ubrid n teẓrigin Beɣdadi. Amek i d-yettili waya? 

 Theyya-d tdukkla idlisen-agi i usufeɣ, uqbel ad taf ixxamen n teẓrigin ara as-ten-id-yessuffɣen. Deg 1990 agi ay d-heyyan Hamid Oubagha d Nadia Yarmeche adlis n temsirin d yiluɣma swayes nella nesselmad tamaziɣt. Yella yewjed ifuk, yernu d Mass Salem Chaker ay as-d-igan tazwart, maca yeqqim acḥal ur d-yeffiɣ, am netta, am kra n wammuden n yisefra, n tmucuha d tira-nniḍen. Armi d aseggas n 2000 ay d-nemlal d teẓrigin n Baghdadi anda i nfureṣ nessufeɣ-d adlis-nneɣ n temsirin (Iluɣma i Tira n Tmaziɣt) ay nkemmel nesseqdec-it d allal i uselmed, sakkin nerna-d aṭas n yidlisen-nniḍen d teẓrigin-a (azal n 20 gar wid ay d-yeffɣen yagi d wid i d-iteddun ad d-ffɣen aseggas-a). Qrib akk idlisen i d-nessufeɣ ɣer teẓrigin n Baghdadi, uran ala s tmaziɣt. Gar-asen ammuden n tmucuha i d-yettwaleqḍen seg temnaḍin yemgaraden n tmurt n leqbayel (amazrar n Tizi n Tira ay d-yuɣalen d adlis n Tacemlit i yuwin arraz n tmaziɣt n Tmesrit tagraɣlant n uddlis n Lezzayer deg 2008). Tullisin (gar-asen «Ger Zik d Tura» n Said Chemakh) d wungalen («Ijeǧǧigen n Ccwal» n Youcef Achouri) d kra n wammuden n yisefra. Yella ula d adlis ɣef tẓuri n wurigami (aḍfas n lkaɣeḍ) n Mass Smail Abdenbi I lmend n usmal n usufeɣ n yidlisen yerzan timussniwin-nniḍen. Imi nettwali dakken mačči d ccerḍ ad naru s tmaziɣt ɣef tmaziɣt kan, wanag yessefk ad nesseqdec tamaziɣt akken ad naru yis-s ɣef yakk timussniwin. Ma d imawlan n uxxam-a n teẓrigin, tugar akken ay xedmen yid-neɣ d imeɣnasen i lmend n usmal n tmaziɣt, wala akken ay xedmen yid-neɣ i lmend n tedrimt d rrbeḥ.

  Mmeslay-aneɣ-d ɣef usenfar n usuqel n wunuɣen yettewliwilen ideg tekkiḍ… 

 Nuwi-d kra n umecwaṛ d yistidyuten isliẓranen i ixeddmen unuɣen yettewliwilen s tmaziɣt. D acu kan, nesḥissif imi istidyuten-a, ur ssawḍen ad ssenzen ifarisen-nsen akken iwata. Astidyu amezwaru ukud nexdem d Arram Productions i d-iga Mass Mohamed Arram, d imsuneɣ yernu d anaẓur azzayri i yellan niqal ixeddem deg tiliẓri n uwanek, yerna yessufeɣ-d deg yiseggasen n 1960 d 1970 kra n yizawagen n wunuɣen. Nessuqel-d yerna nurar-d ledwaṛ deg wugar n 30 n wunuɣen yettewliwilen ɣer ustidyu-a gar 2002 d 2004. Amur ameqqran seg wunuɣen-a d imazraren i yesɛan iḥricen d iwezzlanen (gar 5 d 10 n temricin), nga-ten-id i yigerdan imeẓyanen, am wakken i yella yiwen n usaru n usewliwel, “Argaz n Yijdi”, d asaru aɣezzfan. Yettekka ustidyu-a tikkelt deg Tfaska n usaru amaziɣ n Ɛennaba (2004), sakkin yerbeḥ-d arraz d azamulan deg yiwet n tfaska n ssinima taḥeffaḍt i tessuddes Tdukkla n yimeddukkal n tiliẓri deg Um Lebwaqi deg 2005, asmi ay yettekka s wunuɣ yettewliwilen n “Ikerri n Lɛid”. D acu kan, nesḥissif imi taṛmist Arram Productions ur tessaweḍ ad tessekru neɣ ad tessenz ifarisen-ines akken ara d-terr akk idrimen i tṣerref ɣef waya. Seg yidis, tiliẓri n uwanek, ula ma tekra kra seg wunuɣen-a yerna txelleṣ-iten-id, ur ten-id-tesɛedda ara. Seg yidis-nniḍen, llant, imir-nni, tregwa-nniḍen beṛṛa n tmurt n Lezzayer i iḍemɛen ad d-sɛeddint unuɣen-a war ma xellṣent lekra-nsent, yili astidyu-a ameẓyan ur yezmir ara ad yexdem baṭel, ladɣa imi i yessexdem yagi ixeddamen i yesrin ad ttwaxellṣen. Astidyu wis sin, d astidyu n Tafat i d-sbedden sin seg yimaslaḍen n Tdukkla, Massaw Smail Abdenbi d Belkacem Chellouche deg 2009. Astidyu-a yelha-d ladɣa s usisleg neɣ asuɣel n yisura iwerdaniyen ɣer tmaziɣt, yerna yettekka deg 2012 deg umsizwer n warraz n yisura i d-yettwassiselgen deg Tfaska n usaru amaziɣ n Tizi Uzzu, s yiwen n usaru n ussewliwel azwel-ines “Amtiweg n Hulk”. Nessaram ifarisen imaynuten ara d-yeffɣen seg ustidyu-a, ad d-ɛeddin deg tregwa n tiliẓri, acku ala tiliẓri i izemren ad tezreɛ unuɣen yettewliwilen d tutlayt tamaziɣt i yigerdan. Yerna ma ulac axeddim d tregwa n tiliẓri (ukud yewɛeṛ uxeddim imi llan wuguren n lexlaṣ), unuɣen yettewliwilen s tmaziɣt ad qqimen dima ffren, ur ttwassnen, amzun werǧin i d-ttwasekren.

  Amek iga uɣawas-nwen i useggas-a amaynut? 

 Dima nettḥaṛaf tikli i uheyyi d usufeɣ n wugar n yidlisen. Kra n yimeskaren am Hamid Oubagha (aselway n tdukkla) neɣ Ahcene Begriche, la d-ttheyyin ad d-ssuffɣen ammud n yisefra wis sin. I lmend n useggas-a amaynut, daɣ, la nettḥaṛaf ad d-nerr adeg-nneɣ n Internet i nebɣa ad yili, am zik, d taɣbalut i wid ara yeɣsen ad lemden tamaziɣt, wid i iḥemmlen ad ɣren s tmaziɣt akked yiselmaden n tutlayt-nneɣ.

  Amek tebɣiḍ ad tt-nseqqef? 

 Ad tt-id-nseqqef s kra n tɣawsiwin iɣef nezga nettweṣṣi. Mačči d cciɛa d tidet. Ma tella tmaziɣt d tutlayt tunṣibt neɣ d tagraɣlant maca ǧǧan-tt yimawlan-ines, aya ur yesɛi anamek. Ɣef waya ay nezga nettweṣṣi-d imaziɣwalen akken ad ssawalen yerna ad ttarun s tutlayt-nsen gar-asen, am wakken ara tt-slemden i warraw-nsen. Seg yidis-nniḍen, aṭas n ccɣel i aɣ-yeggunin. Timɣarin i yecfan ɣef tgemmi ha-tent la ttmettatent. Llan aṭas n yilemẓiyen i yebɣan ad lemden tirawt, maca daɣ llan aṭas n yilemẓiyen i izemren ad slemden neɣ ad arun. Dɣa ggareɣ-d tiɣri i yakk wid i izemren ad gen kra akken ad d-ssukksen tutlayt-nneɣ neɣ ad tt-semlen, ad xedmen ɣef waya war cceḥḥa, war leɛḍil. Ma d awal aneggaru netta tiwwura n tdukkla-nneɣ mazal-itent reẓment (ledyent) i kra n win i yebɣan ad t-nalel deg wayen yerzan tutlayt tamaziɣt.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Sidi Lḥaǧ Lḥusin seg uxerrub n At Saɛdi, si taddart n Tala Xlil deg lɛerc n At Dwala. Immut baba-s, netta iǧǧa-t-id d amecṭuḥ. Tewwi-t yemma-s ɣer xwali-s ɣer Ɛedni deg Larebεa n At Yiraten. Akken meẓẓi skecmen-t ɣer temɛemmert ad iɣer awal n Rebbi. Si Ɛedni iruḥ ɣer Lmaεetqa syin ɣer Wat Lḥaǧ. Ar taggara, yugra-d di Busɛada. Ilmed settin ḥizeb, ccraɛ n Sidi Xlil yerna tajerrumt d susi. Asmi yekfa almud-ines, ssawlen-as, ruḥen wwin-t-id wat Taddart-is akken ad asen-yuɣal d Ccix. Qqaren-d, netta d axeyyaḍ, ittxiḍi ibernyas, ittawi-d aɣrum-is s tifucal n yiɣallen-is. Mi ara as-awin leɛcur neɣ sadiqa, ittagi ad iṭṭef, iqqar-asen: ‘’Ad awen-ibarek Rebbi n lεalamin, awit-t, fket-t i wid ixuṣṣen, i yigellilen. Reḥmet wid yellan di lqaεa, ad ken-yerḥem win yellan deg yigenni’’. Ttqadaren-t, ḥemlen-t medden aṭas, ttasen-d ula seg tudrin-nniḍen, ttẓallen ɣur-s lǧumueɛa. Yiwet n tikkelt, yiwen si Taddart Ufella iruḥ ɣer Lezzayer, imlal netta d Sidi Lḥaǧ Lḥusin, nsan deg yiwen usensu. Mi d-yennulfa, yezzi-d s axxam si Lzzayer, ḥebsen-t iǧadeṛmiyen n Larebɛa n At Dwala. Nnan-as: ‘’D kečč i inɣan leflani ?’’ Cukken-t netta imi kra n wussan kan uqbel, innuɣ d urgaz-nni immuten. Mi asen-yenna nekk d Ccix Sidi Lḥaǧ Lḥusin i insiɣ di Lzzayer, ulac-iyi dagi di taddart mi yemmut wagi, iǧadaṛmiyen ur t-umin ara. Ur nudan ara ad fehmen, qqaṛen-as kan d kečč i t-inɣan. Ssawḍen-as lexbeṛ i Sidi Lhaǧ ɣer Tala-Xlil, yuli-d ɣer Larebɛa s iǧadeṛmiyen. Yenna-asen: “Ma yella tḥekmem s lḥaq, serḥet-d i leflani, ur inɣi ara. Ad d-cehdeɣ, akken i nensa di sin deg yiwen usensu, deg yiwet n texxamt di Lzzayer”. Iǧadeṛmiyen ɣur-sen lexbeṛ, slan ɣef Sidi Lhaǧ d argaz n sswab i ttqadaṛen medden. Tameddit-nni kan, serḥen-as-id iǧadermiyen i urgaz-nni si lḥebs. Mi immut Sidi Lḥaǧ, ssefran medden fell-as.

 A Sidi Lḥaǧ Lḥusin

 A ticrurin ubeṛnus

 Asmi yella di ddunit

 Yekkes-d medden si leḥbus

 Mi yewweḍ leɛfu n Rebbi

 A-t-an di lǧennet am lferdus 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

 
  
 Ihegga-d Uɣlif n usedwel aɣelnaw timlilt taɣelnawt n usileɣ i lfayda n yiselmaden imaynuten n tmaziɣt (aɣerbaz amenzu, aɣerbaz alemmas d tesnawit). Teḍra seg wass n 01 alamma d ass n 15 deg yulyu 2017, deg uɣerbaz alemmas Atmaten Drir n Leqser– Bgayet. Tannant-a, tesdukel 68 n yiselmaden n twilayin n Lezzayer merra – usan-d ula seg tneẓruft. Deg-sen, 33 n uɣerbaz amenzu, 18 n uɣerbaz alemmas, 17 n tesnawit. Melmi i kfan ussan-nsen n usileɣ, ad bḍun ɣef yimukan n uxeddim ay d-yeldin aseggas-a deg kra n twilayin ideg tettuselmad yakan tmaziɣt akked tid-nniḍen d timaynutin ɣer temsalt-a. Taseqqamut n tikkelt-a, terza tiwilayin n Bgayet, Tizi-Uzzu, Tubiret, Bumerdas, Lberǧ, Sṭif, Batent, Tibeskert, Ilizi, Blida, Clef, Iɣil Izan, Msetɣanem, Wihran, Tisemsilt, Sidi Belɛebbas akked Tbessa. Deg tannant-a, d imaswaḍen n tmaziɣt ay ufan yimunan-a deg unnar, ṭṭfen-asen afus. « Amahil yella s lbenna imi yedda s tegmat d teflest, d iselmaden i iqedcen, d nutni i ittnadin, ferqen imanen-sen d igrawen suffɣen-d isenfaren. Ddren ayen ara slemden. Walan, ddren tasnegmit s yisenfaren (la pédagogie de projet), mačči d awal kan. Tannant tɛedda deg tegnatin yelhan ɣas akken azɣal yesfunzur alɣem », i aɣ-d-yenna umaswaḍ Ali Boufrouche. Ula d iselmaden si tama-nsen, cerhen mačči d kra. Tamsiwt Teguig Naima d taselmadt n tmaziɣt, d taɛrabawalt n Clef, tesnemmer aṭas imsilɣen d yiselmaden n tannant. Tenna-aɣ-d : ’’Deg tannant-a, ufiɣ-d atmaten i yi-d-yefkan tayet d wafud , wwiɣ tamussni, tarrayt d tmussni n yimdanen. Sɛiɣ zher imi d tamaziɣt i ɣriɣ, imi d tamaziɣt ara slemdeɣ. Ad d-ssakiɣ tamaziɣt yettwattun di temnadt-nneɣ di Clef, ncallah ad tnerni, wa ad teǧǧuǧeg’’. Massa Loukkad Kahina, seg At Ziki, ad tselmed tamaziɣt di lwilaya n Msetɣanem. Tenna-d : ’’Ḥareɣ melmi ara qableɣ inelmaden-iw, melmi ara kecmeɣ s aɣerbaz, ur ttḥulfuɣ ara kan i yiman-iw d taselmadt, ttḥulfuɣ sɛiɣ taɣḍaḍt (mission) d tameɣdaḍt ara d- yeskeflen tajaddit. Di tazwara, d tidet tekcem-iyi cwiṭ n tugdi, skud ttɛeddayen wussan di tannant, iwellihen n Mass Boufrouche rennun-iyi-d tabɣest, serwalen tugdi nni”. Mass Gheouar Bilal Seg Ukefadu, netta ad yesselmed di Wihran. Yufa tannant-a “tessawḍaɣ ad tsemlil aṭas n yiselmaden, myussannen, mmeslayen s telqayt ɣef taɣult n uselmed”. Ikemmel yenna : “ Nedder am yiwet n twacult , tezga deg yimawen-nneɣ teḍsa d ucmumeḥ, awi yufan tannant-a d tin ur nettfaka ara. Ɣer taggara, nessaram ad nili d wid ara d-yessiɣen tiftilin-nniḍen i tutlayt n tmaziɣt, akken ad taẓ ɣer sdatdeg umalu n tmurt n lezzayer”. Tezzi tannant n ubrid-a ɣer tiram n ulmud n yinelmaden, ɣer tarrayin n uselmed akked yizerfan n uxeddam. Tannant n 2017, akken I tt-walan yimekkiyen, tewwi-d aṭas n lfayda, ama deg wayen yeqqnen ɣer tarrayin n uselmed, ama ɣef tmussni n yiberdan n ulmud n unelmad d tin n yizerfan. Aya yusa-d yeshel ɣef yiselmaden imunan, yejbed-iten umahil, ɣas weɛrit tegnatin n tudert, ẓẓay wakud ideg teḍra tannant. Imekkiyen merra, rran ssebba n waya ɣer tpidagujit n usenfar i asen-isettun aẓɣal n unebdu d tmes i d-yezzin i yidurar n Leqser.

  B. Benhamouche 

  
 Deg wussan-a n unebdu-a, uɣalen yimdanen ur ufin ara iman-nsen ɣef ssebba n waddad n tegnawt. Yal mi ara yesteqsi yiwen gma-s ɣef wamek yettili, ad as-d-yezwir s tririyin-a: « Yeḥma lḥal maḍi », «yečča-aɣ wurɣu », neɣ «yessefcel-aneɣ uzɣal-agi ». Imi teqseḥ n lḥamu, tettaweḍ alamma d ugar n 45 n tfesniwin. D lḥal ur wulfen yimezdaɣ n tuddar deg yiseggasen yezrin, ur zmiren ad rren taluft-is d wicqa kan. Ladɣa imi aɣamac am wa, yettḍurru tafekka n umdan, ama deg wayen yerzan ɛeyyu d faccal i d-yesnulfay, neɣ zzɛaf d tteqlaq i d-yettlalen weḥd-sen nnig lebɣi. Ɣas ma seg zik, yettaf umdan aman swayes itekkes, neɣ xersum yessenqas tidiwin i d-yettukkayen seg uzɣal, maca taggara-a, ur tent-mazal ara d isellaken deg tegnit-a. Di tegnit anda ula ma yebzeg uceṭṭiḍ ur ilaq ad yettwafser i yiṭṭij akken ad yeqqar, meɛna deg kra n temrac kan, ad t-tafeḍ yettwaskef yekkaw weḥd-s. War ma nettu, ad d-nebder ula d tagella i ixessren s lemɣawla ma yella ur temmečč, neɣ ur tettwaxzen daxel umsismeḍ. Yuɣ lḥal, ɣas ma aṭas n twaculin i yettḥewwisen ɣer teftisin anda sbennayent s tadfi abeḥri n yilel asemmaḍ, ttɛument deg waman-is akken ad ḥulfunt s tesmuḍi iɣef ttnadint, acu kan, idigan-nni ur qennɛen wid i irezzun ɣur-sen, skud ur tdum tɣimit deg-sen. Meḥsub, iban yal mi ara yuɣal yiwen s axxam-is, ad as-d-yeqqel uzɣal-nni amzun ur yeɛfis ijdi n teftist. Ula d imesbuḥruyen d yisnezwayen (climatiseurs) kkaten-d s lḥamu tikwal imi d win i ufan ad t-jebden.Yeggra-d ihi umdan, simmal yettwali timḍerrit s yezmer ad as-d-yeglu uɣamac i yettidir deg tazwara n tsemhuyt-a. Yerna send ad yesɛeddi ukuẓ n tmerwin n ssmayem i yettwassnen s teqseḥ d tuɛert n uzɣal-nsent i yugaren ussan-nniḍen n unebdu. Aya skud yella-d ubeddel deg tudert-is. Amedya, yuɣal ur yesbennay taguni deg yiḍ ɣef tmentilt n wurɣu i ihewwlen idammen-is. Lebɣi i tgella itekkes imi ḥala tissit n waman isemmaḍen i d-tessutur tɛebbuḍt s waṭas. Akukru ihi yebda yakan yettekcan deg yimdanen ɣef waddad-a n tegnawt i yugin ad ten-id-yessefreḥ s tɣelyawt n ugeffur, imi ala lehwa-nni i izemren ad treqqeɛ kra seg wayen ur nehwi i lɣaci.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Ass n 11 di tuber 2014  ay fkan, s wudem unṣib, isem n Slimane Azem i yiwen umekkan di temdint n Paris, deg tγiwant n (14ème arrondissement).  Leqdic-a i d-heggant kra n tdukliwin s lemεawna n tγiwant-a, yella-d tajmilt i umecwar n ccna n Slimane Azem. 

 Deg wahil, ad naf : tisfifin tiqdimin d yiḍebsiyen-nni n zik n ccna-s, kra di leḥwayeğ ines. Teṣwirat n twacult-is ur ẓrin medden yakan, isefra sγur arrac imecṭaḥ.Am wakken ad yili, di&amp;gamma,; uwali n yiwen ufetray (documentaire) s yisem ‘’Slimane Azem, une légende de l’exil’’ syin, ad d-yili umeslay γef usaru-agi.

 I usmektu, Slimane Azem ilul ass n 19/09/1918 deg Ugni Geγran, di tmurt n Leqbayel. Yedder di twacult n 5 warrac d 2 n teḥdayin. Yunag deg useggas 1937 γer gma-s Ouali. Deg useggas 1945, yekra lqahwa u yesbedd-d yiwet n terbaεt n ccna. Yessekles i tikelt tamezwarut tasfift i wumi isemma ‘’ Ma ad tedduḍ ad nruḥ’’ deg useggas n 1958. Syin i yebda umecwar n ccna-s yettnerni u yettmuccuε armi yewwi aḍebsi n ddheb, netta d tcennayt Noura, deg useggas n 1970.

 Yemmut Slimane Azem ass 28/01/1983  di tmurt n lγerba, di Moissac anda yesεa tibḥirt n tneqqlin d tzemrin i as-yellan d rriḥa n tmurt. Seg wakken sugten fell-as awal, yenna-d :’’xir ad idireγ d Azzayri di berra  wala d aberrani di tmurt-iw.’’ 

<p style="text-align: right;">Hocine.M 

  Tamaziγt di Maruk  Anda i tufeg i ters !  

 Xas ulamma tamaziγt d tutlayt taγelnawt u d tunṣibt di tmurt n Maruk, meεna ur yelli d acu ibeddlen di liḥala n tutlayt-a d yidles-is. ‘’Yiwen uḍar γer sdat, sin γer deffir’’ akken qqaren.  Akka, dγa, deg ussan-agi iεeddan mi akka i uγalen yinelmaden γer uγerbaz i d-yenṭeq uneγlaf n leqraya n tmurt-agi n Maruk u yenna-d :’’ d akken mačči imi tamaziγt d tutlayt tunṣibt (2011) lmeεna-s ad tettuselmed’’. U ikemmel yenna : ‘’d tutlayt taεrabt s wayes ara d-yelhu uγerbaz n uzekka’’. D aya kan !!!Akka i yegzem usiren n wid-ak yenwan d akken Tamaziγt ad taf iman-is di Maruk ma ulac meqqar deg uγerbaz.  Uqbel, yakan, yettban usigna s wayes tekkat. Di tazwara, tettuḥezzem tira n   tmaziγt s yisekkilen n Tifina&amp;gamma,; syin mi d-xelqen aseqqamu IRCAM, yella-d uṭixer n 7 n yiεeggalen-is deg yiwen ubrid. Aya, yeḍra-d imi as-d-xelqent kra n tamiwin n leḥkum uguren i useddu n wahil n tesqamut-a xas ulamma llan yiwellihen n ugellid i yettweṣṣin γef usnerni  n tamziγt deg useggas-nni n 2011. Meεna, di lweqt-nni d tamsalt n tsertit ! Σlaḥasb n yirgazen n lqanun, qqaren-d Tamaziγt ilaq ad tesεu leqwanen-nniḍen zyada γef tmendawt i wakken ad tt-tettuḥettem deg uγerbaz. D anect-a, dγa, i yeğğan aneγlaf n leqraya n Maruk i wakken ad yini lehdur-nni.  Wissen kan ma tella tririt i wanect-a i sγur yimeγnasen n Tmaziγt neγ dayen bran i ṭṭbel deg waman. Akken i aγ-d-yenna yiwen :’’wissen ma mazal uklalen Yimaziγen isem-agi ‘’Imdanen ilelliyen ‘’? <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>              <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>              

<p style="text-align: right;">Hocine.M  

  
 Ilmend usmekti n umuli wis 42 γef tmettant  lkulunel Muḥend welḥağ, iwmi sawalen « Amγar » di tallit-nni n tegrewla, i yellan d imḍeber n lwilaya tis 03 tamazrayt i tewi tmettant ass n 02 deg aggur n ujamvar aseggas n 1972, tasqamut n waggur azeggaγ azzayri n temnaḍt n Wizgan smektan-d tamesbanit-agi tamazrayt, anda is-rran tajmilt meqren. Dγa ma yella ngger tamawt γer s deffir, ad-nnaf dakken aggur azeggaγ azzayri illul-d ass n 20 yulyu 1962 s ddaw laεnaya n lkulunel Muḥend Welḥağ.  Γef aya rran ad-suffγen yiwet n tarbeεt n yemselken tis 30 idegi llan 20 yemdanen ger yelmeẓyen d telmeẓyin, i yewwin isem n Si Muḥend saεid Akli mmi-s n lkulunel Muḥend Welḥağ, imi d yiwen wemdan i yettaken afus n tallelt meqren i waggur azeggaγ azzayri.  Leqdic yesdurit-id wexxam n yedles Ferrat Remḍan n tγiwant n Wizgan, s laḥdur n yemḍebren d srabes yemgaraden n tγiwant n Wizgan, syen tekfa s tikci n warazen d igardasen n usebγes i tarbeεt-agi n yemselken.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Tiddukla tadelsant «AẒAR» n taddart n Ugni Ḥmed i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n At Yanni, thegga-d tazrigt tis mraw ṣa n tfaska unezgum. Tafaska-agi i d-yettuɣalen d tajmilt i Nazim METREF akked Ɛebdereḥman MECWAT ad tili seg 05 (semmus) alarma deg 10 (mraw) deg waggur n yulyu 2015, i deg tettekki tɣiwant n At Yanni, Tmehla Tadelsant n Tizi wezzu d Umezgun n KATEB Yasin akken daɣen llan wid nniḍen d-yefkan afud am: Tamhla Timerḍit d Waddal(DJS), Tamahla Tanezzut (D.commerce), ”Jardin-Secret», “Yannicom “, “Facebook At Yann ’’.

 Yal iḍ seg wuḍan-agi ad tili yiwet n terbaɛt umezgun d yiwet n tmezgunt ara d-yurar yiwen kan n unazur (monologue), dayen ara yesferḥen tiwaculin ara d-yerzun ɣer tfaska-agi. Ma ilmend n wass aneggaru thegga-d yiwet n lficṭa anida i d-te3reḍ kra n yinaẓuren nniḍen. Ahhil d anesbaɣur imi imdanen iɛǧeb-asen lḥal mačči d kra imi d-kksen ɣef wul-nsen.

 Ɣer taggara ad d-nini ur ilaq ara ad aɣ-ruḥent tmliliyin tidelsanin am tigi. Acku, amezgun d ayen yellan seg zman aqbur, d netta i tazuri tis seddis, s yes i ilemmed wegdud aṭas n lewqama ɣef tlufa n ddunit.

  
 Yiwen ufellaḥ seg At Lḥaǧ, ɣur-s yiwet n tyuga, ikerrez yis deg yirqab, deg wasif n At Ɛisi i Wat Iraten d Wat Meḥmud. Tameddit mi ara ifakk, yettali-d s axxam, tayuga ittaǧa-tt, isnusu-tt deg yiwet n tzeqqa, berra n taddart, di lexla. Ass-nni, yiwen yilemẓi n At Iraten, idefr-it-id, iwala anda ittaǧa tayuga. Yuɣal ɣer wasif, yewwi-d imedukkal-is, ulin deg yiḍ ɣer wanda tella tyuga. Tazeqqa tebɛed ɣef taddart, di lexla. Tebna s wakal d uzru, tseqqef s uqermud aqdim. Yuli yiwen ɣef lqermud, isenser-d kra n yiqermuden, igzem aɣanim, iga aḥnac akken kan ara iɛeddi umdan. Ikcem, illi-asen-d tawwurt. Kecmen, bran-d i tyuga, nehren-tt akken deg yiḍ, wwin-tt ɣer ssuq srebḥen-tt. Azekka-nni, iffeɣ uberraḥ, tettwaker tyuga i leflani seg taddart n At Lḥaǧ. Bdan ttnadin alammi ufan anwa i tt-yewwin. Kkren yimɣaren n At Lḥaǧ, ruḥen ɣer taddart n win yukren tayuga. Wwḍen ɣer dinna, steqsan ɣef uxxam n winn-a, wwten-as ɣef tewwurt. Iffeɣ-d, nnan-as, ad aɣ-d-terreḍ tayuga s ttubat n lxaṭer, nekni ad d-nini d areṭṭal kan i ak-tt-nerḍel i tyerza. Yerra-asen-d s laɛwej: ‘’nekk mačči d amaker!’’ Ḥellen-n deg-s alammi yugi, zzin ɣur-s ɣer deffir, nnan-as: ‘’akken i ak-ihwa.’’ Adrum n win yewwin tayuga meqqer. Qqaren-d, seg wass-nni ur ufin iman-nsen, ttmettaten yilmeẓyen-nsen yir lmut. Di taddart-nni, wa iḥekku-d i wayeḍ, wa ittaǧǧa-d awal i wayeḍ alammi d aseggas 2002. Tennejme taddart-nni, mmeslayen, smektan-d tadyant-nni. Kkren-d kra nnan-as, yessefk ad nruḥ, ad nessuter leɛfu i Wat Lḥaǧ. Taddart merra twufaq ṛṛay-nni. Ceyyɛen kra n yirgazen ɣer Wat Lhaǧ, zṛan imɣaren-nsen, ḥkan-asen tadyant. Nnan-asen yimɣaren: ‘’d tidet, ula d nekni akka i tt-id-nufa, ḥekkun-tt-id yimɣaren-nneɣ.’’ Nnan-asen yirgazen-nni: ‘’ayen d-iḍran zik ur t-neqbil, ur t-nebɣi ara s wid yellan tura, nusa-d ad nessuter deg-wen smaḥ. Nnan-asen yimɣaren n At Lḥaǧ: ‘’yirbaḥ, akken i awen-yehwa, ala smaḥ ara yilin, init-d kan melmi ara d-tasem.’’ Wid-nni uɣalen ɣer taddart-nsen, nnejmaen, mcawaṛen ɣef wass deg ara d-asen. Ceyyɛen-d yiwen s At Lḥaǧ, inna-asen melmi. At Lḥaǧ swejden-asen: qḍan-d, ggan-asen imekli. Usan-d argaz, tameṭṭut wwin-d yid-sen tayuga n yizgaren d lwaɛda. Wwḍen-d ɣer taddart, At Lḥaǧ mmugren-ten akken iwata. Qqimen alammi ččan, kkren yimɣaren n At Lḥaǧ fkan-asen ddewa n lxir, wid-nni ttrun. S wakka, At taddart-nni, kksen ɣef yiman-nsen ttselbiba d taɛekkemt i iebban acḥal aya .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Yiwen n uqcic iǧǧa-t-id baba-s meẓẓi mi yemmut. Yemma-s tsebbel temẓi-s, fell-as, trebba-t-id s lḥif alammi meqqer. Mi yewweḍ d ilemẓi iḥemmel yiwet n teqcict d leɛmer-is maca nettat ur tecliɛ ara deg-s aṭas. Ɣer-s d ameddakel kan n temẓi. Mi ara tt-imlil yeqqar-s melmi ara d-awiɣ yemma ad kem-texḍeb. Nettat teqqar-as kan d lɣerḍ-k, rju cwiṭ. Alammi i tt-iḥres, yal tikkelt deg ara as-yini, nettat teqqar-as ma tḥemleḍ-iyi seg wul awi-iyi aya d waya. Akken yal tikkelt d acu ara as-tsuter. Netta ad as-tt-id-yawi, akken yebɣu ɣlay neɣ inqedwa cci-nni ad t-id-yaɣ neɣ ad t-id-idebbeṛ. Xas yemma-s ixla-tt. Ayen akk tesɛa d leqṛar n uxxam yella yewwi-as-t. Armi teɛya teqcict-nni deg-s tenna-as, aqcic-a issefk ad d-afeɣ amek ara gezmeɣ yid-s ma ulac wagi ad iyi-inṭeḍ am uselluf, wagi ad iyi-sderwec. Tikkelt-a i wakken ad iyi-iṛuḥ akin, ad iyi-xḍu, ad as-sutreɣ ayen i wumi ur yezmir ara ad iyi-d-yawi. Ass-nni mi t-temlal yid-s, taqsiṭ yiwet, am zik, aqcic iqqar-as kan melmi ara d-awiɣ yemma. Tenna-as teqcict : 

 -Ma dɣa s tidet-ik tḥemleḍ-iyi am tfekkert n wul-ik, ugar n yemma-k, ad ak-in-sutreɣ i tikkelt taneggarut yiwet n lḥaǧa ma tewwiḍ-tt-id a rbaḥ a tafat ma ur iyi-tt-id-tewwiḍ ara fiḥel awal. Aqcic allen-is ceɛlent am tmes, inna-as :

 – Cṛeḍ kan a taɛzizt aɣbel deg-i, illa wasmi qqimeɣ ur am-d-wwiɣ ara ayen d-tcerḍeḍ! 

 -Ihi nekkini tura, tikkelt-a taneggarut i bɣiɣ d tasa n yemma-k, ad iyi-tt-id-tawiḍ ad tt-skenfeɣ, ad tt-ččeɣ. Aqcic isusem, iruḥ. Taqcict tezmumeg tenwa d ayen aqcic ad tt-ihenni i lebda. Azekka-nni kan, aqcic izla yemma-s, ikkes-as-d tasa-nni-ines, yewwi-tt-id deg uqelmun-is d tazla ɣer teqcict. Tazla-nni d-ittazal iɣli igrareb. Tasa-nni tenṭew-d seg uqelmun n uqcic, tettegririb zdat-s. Alammi ḥebsen deg ugrireb, tenṭeq-d tasa-nni n yemma-s ɣer-s, tenna-as : -Ulac d acu i ak-yuɣen a mmi !

 Akka i d tasa n tyemmat, akken tebɣu tili teswaɛt, tayemmat tezga tetteqliliḥ, tettergigi tasa-s ɣef tarwa-s

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Ass-nni n lǧemɛa i d-eyyfeɣ album amynut n ucennay ameqqran Idir iwumi yefka isem ‘’Ici et ailleurs’’. Gar 11 n tezlatin-agi tijdidin, yecna 9 akked d icennayen mechuren deg ddunit, ladɣa wid-nni icennun s tefrensist.

 Tizlatin i d-yerra ɣer teqbaylit umedyaz ameqqran Ameziane Kezzar «Yefka-asent anamek i asent-iwulmen s teqbaylit» i d-yenna Idir . Akka ara naf tizlit ‘’La Bohème’’ n Charles Aznavour i yextar idir imi tessuzen-it asmi meẓẓi. Ma tizlit ‘’Corrida’’ n Francis Cabrel, yeddem-itt imi tettak cbih ɣer uẓawan n Caɛbi ɣef wakken i d-yenna. Tizlit ‘’Matins d’hivers’’ n Gérard Lenorman, yefren-tt acku d asentel i iɛac ucennay Idir. ‘’Tettmeslay-d ɣef udfel deg cetwa. Ula d nekk leḥḥuɣ deg udfel asmi ttruḥuɣ ɣer lakul’’, akka i d-yenna Idir deg yiwet n tdiwennit i yexdem akked yiwen uɣmis. Ɣef wakken iwala ucennay Lenorman, Leqbayel d imdanen igerrzen, iḥemmel aṭas aẓawan n Idir. Ula d tizlit n Patrick Bruel, yextar-itt imi teqqen ɣer tmurt n leqbayel. Tizlit ‘’Les larmes de leurs pères’’ n Patrick Bruel, tewwi-d ɣef tefsut n Tunes. Imi ula d tamurt n leqbayel tesɛa tafsut taberkant, ihi yefren-itt Idir ɣef usenta-a, ɣef wamek i d-yenna. Ula d Patrick bruel i yellan d Amaziɣ, yefreḥ imi yewwi idir yiwet deg tezlatin-is, yenna-d : ‘’Ferḥeɣ aṭas imi yextar yiwet deg tezlatin-iw. D timlilit n Uqbaylit akked Umaziɣ. D ayen igerrzen, d tagmat i yemlalen». Ula d tizlit n Bernard Lavilliers, tettwafren-d imi tesɛa assaɣ akked tmagit tamziɣt. ‘’On the road again’’, tettmeslayt ɣef tmurt Irland. Tesɛa assaɣ d ameqqarn ɣef umennuɣ-nneɣ ɣef tmagit i wakken ur tneger ara’’, i iwala idir. Ɣef wayen yeɛnan tarbaɛt Tryo, yenna-d Idir dakken tizlit ‘’Hymnes de nos compagnes’’, thuza-yi aṭas imi tettmeslay ɣef ugama. Ma d tizlit ‘’Avancer’’ n Garnd Corp malade, d netta i as-tt-id-yessumren. ‘’Né quelque part’’ n Maxime le Forestiers, yextar-itt imi igerrez uḍris akked uzawan. Deg aggara, ‘’Lettre à ma fille’’, nnan-as-d fell-as yimḍebbren n uxxam uɣur yesseklas tizlatin-is. Yextar Idir ad yecnu akked yicennayen-agi i wakken ad yessali ccan n tmurt n leqbayel. Ma ɣef yisem n album, yenna-d Idir, niqal nnan-iyi-d ad as-nsemmi Racines, acu awal yezga deg yeṭṭafar-iyi-id deg umecwar-iw, acḥal-aya. Syin, nwala ‘’Ici et ailleurs’’ i iwulmen ugar imi nekk n da, kkiɣ-d dihen. 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Hocine Moula 

 
  
 1956-2015, ass-nni n 24 deg yennayer 2015 i d amulli wis 59 n Lwennas Matub. Lwennas, am wakken ẓran akk yimdanen, d acennay agrawliw γef tmaziγt d tugdut, d anazbay mgal At ṭṭlam rrebrab d udabu. Tudert-is, yefka-tt d asfel i umennuγ-is : tessa akk d isennanen, wa yekkes-it deg ubrid-is, wayeḍ yelḥa fell-as, iεemmed-it armi i as-qemmcen yiğadermiyen iḍerran tikelt tamezwarut deg useggas 1988 uqbel ad qemmḍen ,maḍi, ṣṣut-is, deg wass n 25 deg yunyu 1998. Wis anwi ?

  Tikelt-a, nebγa ad nẓer udem-nniḍen n ucennay : tirrugza-s akked teqbaylit-is. Aṭas n temsal i d-smektayen fell-as di tmetti. Nefren-d kra deg-sent, ha-tent-in.

  Lwennas d waman n lbir. 

 Lwennas yesεa lbir deg uxxam-is. Seg wakken ttxaṣṣan waman i Wat taddart, yebna tala deg tmazirt-is yessalay-d aman seg lbir-nni ines u ttasen-d medden ttagmen γur-s.

 Yiwen wass, mi d-ileḥḥu s axxam yemmuger-d tilawin uγalent-d mebla ma wwint-d aman. Yesseqsa-tent γef sebba, nnant-as-d :’’ la d-teqqar yemma-k, yeqqur lbir-nni.’’ Mi yewweḍ s axxam, yufa yemma-s la tettess tamazirt s waman n lbir. Si zεef-nni, deg-i yella, yekker yerkeḍ-as akk tibḥirt-is.

  Lwennas deg wass lεid. 

 Iruḥ Matub γer tejmaεṭ deg wass lεid tameqqrant. Yufa din yiwen n urgaz yeqqim weḥd-s. dγa yenna-as Matub : ‘’nekk aql-i da axaṭer weḥd-i i lli&amp;gamma,; i kečč acuγer mačči deg uxxam-ik i telliḍ γer warraw-ik ass-agi n lεed.’’ Yerra-as-d urgaz-nni :’’ad ak-iniγ kan ṣṣaḥ, setḥaγ ad qableγ tawacult-iw imi ur zmireγ ara  ad d-aγeγ ikerri n lεid.’’

 Lwennas, yuγ lḥal yuγ-d, yakan, ikerri i yiman-is. Dγa, din din, iruḥ yewwi-as-t-id i urgaz-nni.

  Lwennas d yiselman. 

 Yiwen wass, iruḥ Matub ad d-yaγ iselman deg taddart-nsen. Mi yewweḍ, yenna-as i winna yesnuzun ad as-d-yewzen azgen n kilu (arḍel). Yefka-as-t-id, meεna yessegra-as-d awal winna, yenna-as :’’ Matub s timmad-is yuγ kan azgen n kilu. Yuγ lḥal Matub yefka-as 1000 n yidinaren, ihi mi iruḥ ad as-d-yerr ṣṣerf winna yenna-as Matub : ’’aγ-d yis-sen lefhama.’’

 <span style="color: #ff0000;"> Nnnan-aɣ-d ɣef Matoub </span>

 Am wakken,  nebγa ad nẓer, daγen, d acu ttxemmimen yilmeẓyen γef ucennay-a ? Nebγa ad nsel sser i ten-yeğğan ad t-ḥemmlen xas akken ur tessin ara mliḥ imi llan nutni d igerdan deg lweqt-nni. ihi, nefka awal i kra deg-sen, nnan-aγ-d 

  Drifa  seg Wat Wagennun  

  ‘’yemmut γef tiktiwin-is. Ayen akk i d-yenna Matub yeḍra. Ahya a lukan ad d-yuγal ad iwali anda tedda Tizi. Tizi-nni γef wacu i d-yecna ZEDEK di taggara-a. Matub d iseγ n leqbayel. D azamul n timmuzγa d Yimaziγen.Isem-is yura deg umezruy γer tama n yimeqqranen’’

  Razika seg Wat Dwala  

 ‘’seg wasmi lliγ d tamecṭuḥt ay sneγ Matub. Sellen-as yimawlan-nneγ. Yettγenni, di&amp;gamma,; di taddart. Ihi, ass-a ayen nexdem i Matub drus u ayen yelhan ur yettmettat ara. Lukan kan yeddir, tili wigi yesbeγbuγen ulac win ara d-ineṭṭqen deg-sen. La smaḥ ur as-ğğan ara lweqt ad d-yini kulec xas ulamma yecna γef yal aḥric. Ḥemmleγ akk tizlatin-is ula d awalen-nni s trumit gerrzen, ladγa anda akken i as-yeqqar : ’’ni les droits de l’homme sous toutes les formes, ni aucune opposition n’ont pris part à mon malheur, sauf le peuple qui, comme un seul homme, a  osé défier la peur…’’

  Mehdi seg Tala Σetman  

  ‘’nessen Matub s tuγac-is, s tirrugza-s : ihedder-d ayen yellan. Tizlatin-is, lhant dayen kan, ḥemmleγ ad asent-sleγ. Lukan kan i t-mazal, tili mačči akka ara teḍru yid-neγ. Seg yimir ar tura, aṭas n tγawsiwin i ibeddlen, aṭas n lbistat i iqelben. Akken yebγu yili lḥal, ass-a ad as-nini tanemmirt γef wayen i aγ-d-yeğğa.’’

  Amar seg Meqleε 

 ‘’nekk γur-i Matub d agellid n tmurt n leqbayel. Yenna-d tidet, yemmut γef tektiwin-is. Ala netta i d-yennan nekk mačči d aεrab u mačči bessif ara uγaleγ d ineslem. D izem, iγenna γef kulec : tasertit, tayri, JSK, lγerba, iγenna ula γef tqucciḍt n yisγaren…iḥettet tarbut i yicennayen.

 Ayen akk i t-iqerḥen, yeqqar-it-id ‘’s wacu ara ak-ḥelleγ ay ul-iw, i wakken ur yi-tt-id-tettaddreḍ ara.’’ Neγ anda akken i as-yeqqar ‘’ad reggmeγ uqbel iman-iw, uqbel ad d-zziγ γur-wen’’. Matub d mmi-s n ugdud, ur yebγi ara cciεat daymi i t-ḥemmlen medden. D acu kan lukan ad d-yuγal akka tura ‘’ula d as-d-yeg imeṭṭi’’.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 D igiman n medden ay d-yerzan, ass n ssebt, deg yeɣrem n Yeḥbacen (Kendira, 60 n yikilumitren deg wenẓul n Bgayet) ɣef tmeɣra n tjujet yellan d aseklu-azamul n temnaḍt-a. Llan-d aṭas n yermuden i lmend n tmeɣa-a, gar-asen uraren (am temsizzelt i yigerdan), timsizewrin, ladɣa tid n ussewwi d ussuneɣ, d tzikknin n yifarisen inkerrazen n tmurt, ladɣa iniɣman d yigumma, lɣella n tebḥirin n yigumma n tsemhuyt am waḍil d tbexsisin. Tella-d daɣ tzikkent n yifarisen n tenḍi am yijeqduren yettwaxedmen s wesɣar n ujuj (taẓiwwa, iḍebsiyen d tɣenjayin) d tqecwalin n temnaḍt-a ay yettwassnen. Inerzafen ɛerḍen ifarisen ay d-yersen deg tzikkent-a am wakken ay merrḥen deg wurtan, am wakken ay ttekkan deg yimekli ay d-yellan deg uɣerbaz n yeɣrem-a. Tella-d tedyant-a amzun d tiɣri i yiriri n tmeddurt i tkerrazt, ladɣa imi ay ggten wuguren ay d-ttmagaren wid ay yeskurruzen akal-nsen deg temnaḍt-a imi ay la neqqsen yimezdaɣen n yiɣerman, la d-tettili taɣert yernu ur la d-ttwaxlafen ara yisekla n wurtan. Ula ma llan wid ay la yetteẓẓun isekla imaynuten, maca maci aṭas n yisekla ay la tteẓẓun. Ɣef leḥsab n Ɛemmi Said, yiwen seg yenfarasen yettwassnen deg temnaḍt-a, urtan ǧǧan-ten yimawlan-nsen yernu qqlen am yimudaɣ, dɣa d aya ay yerran lɣella ur terkid ara.

  
 I kunwi d kunnemti ay imedyazen d tmedyazin. Tiddukkla Tadelsant Tafat n Ayt Lqasem teɛreḍ-iken i tikkelt tamezwarut ɣer teẓrigt-is tamenzut n tfaska n tmedyazt taqbaylit ‘’Tabburt n Lɛenser.’’ Tafaska-a tamaynut d tin ara yilin deg teɣzi n ukuẓ n wussan. Ad tebdu ass n 13 yulyu ideg nella tura, ad tkemmel alamma d 16. Ad d-nesmekti kan dakken tafaska-a ara yettwaxedmen deg Tizi Uzzu, taddart n Buɣni, Taɣiwant n Ssi Yusef, d tajmilt i umedyaz ageɛmir Attab Said i yewwin acḥal d arraz n tfaskiwin ideg niqal yettekkay. D ameɣnas ameqqran i aɣ-yeǧǧan deg wayyur n ɣuct, deg useggas n 2009. Tafada(délai) n uceyyaɛ n yisefra d uttekki teḥbes ass n 28 seg yunyu yezrin, ihi tiɣri mačči kan i Wat usefru, maca i wid daɣen i t-iḥemmlen, i yebɣan ad isel i wawal n sswab d leɛqel, i wid umu tehwa tmenna n rruḥ d yiḥulfan n wul. Ilit di ttiɛad, am umeqrab, am ubeɛɛad. Nessaram ad ṭṭuqtent tfaskiwin am ti, ad gent azal i usefru, ad ssalint ccan n umedyaz azwaw. Afud ijehden i kra tid d wid i yettekkan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaïsa Khalifi 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 ‘’Tidderwect n Wat Uẓeffun, d taẓuri anda-nniḍen’’. Azeffoun, d taddart taqdimt i d-yezgan deg tewrirt, ɛlayet ɣef lebḥar s 465 n lmitrat. Mazal ar ass-a tewwi isem-agi. Ma d tamdint yettusemman akka tura ‘’Azeffoun’’ u d taɣiwant n 51 n tudrin, d Fransa i tt-yebnan deg yiseggasen n 1870. Tsemma-as ‘’Port-Gueydon’’ d tajmilt i l’amiral Comte Louis Henri de Gueydon. Taddart-a ɣef wageg ad d-nawi awal, tebna s ufella n later n Ṛruman. Imir-nni, qqaren-as ‘’Ruzazus’’ (Grand Cap). Uqbel, ḥerran-tt Ifniqeyyen. Syin, yekcem-itt-id Ṛruman. Ar tura, later-nni mazal yettmenṭar u yettengar seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ: ur yelli win i d-iceɣlen deg-s. Seg tama-nniḍen, ur tezmireḍ ara ad d-taddreḍ Azeffoun mebla ma txemmeḍ ɣer kra n wudmawen, yecban: Didouche, El Anka, Iguerbouchène,Issiakhem, Djaout, Fellag, Lalmas, Hilmi d waṭas-nniḍen. Ɣef sser n wanect-a, daɣen, ara d-nawi awal. Azeffoun mačči d lebḥar kan deg unebdu. Azeffoun yesdukkel amezruy d tmucuha, cbaḥa d iberḥriyen.

  Takerḍa n taddart. 

 Tezga-d taddart-a deg tewrirt. Tetabaɛ lɛerc n Yibeḥriyen. Tebɛed ɣef lebḥar s 7 n kilumitr. Ɛlayet fell-as s 465 n lmitrat. Tebɛed ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu s 65 n kilumitr, ma ɣef Bgayet s 82n kilumitr. Amur ameqqran n yixxamen-is d iqdimen, bnan s uẓru, seqfen s lqermud. Iberdan, daxel n taddart, d izenqan, ur hrawit ara. Yal tama, ad temmagreḍ later n Ṛruman, am lḥemmam, tasebbalt n waman, lɣiran, iqudas d tregwa n waman…atg 

 Ur yelli d acu tesɛa taddart-a. Ulac ula d aɣerbaz amenzu. Leḥḥun warraw-nsen ugar n 5 n kilumitr i wakken ad awḍen ɣer yiwen uɣerbaz i cerken nutni d 4 n tudrin-nniḍen. Ula d tiddukla tadelsant ‘’Tigemmi’’ i d-yelhan s tkurmit n later (aseḥbiber) teḥbes seg useggas n 1998.Tesɛa taddart 4 n yiderma: At Ḥewali, At Ramḍan, Ijanaten akked Iqejuɛen. Ɣur-s tilisa akked Iḥemziwen seg usamar, At Rhuna seg umalu, Lebḥar seg ugafa d Tidmimin seg unẓul. 

 Zik, tesɛa taddart tlata n tiwwura. Ur tezmireḍ ara ad d-tkecmeḍ ɣur-s ma yella ur d-tekkiḍ ara seg yiwet n tiwwura-a: Tawwurt n temdint, Tawwurt n Ɛisa d Tewwurt n usiweḍ. 

 Azeffoun (taɣiwant), tesɛa 500 n yimeɣras n 1871 (Ccix Aḥeddad) akked 716 n yimeɣras n lgirra 1954-1962.

  Isem ‘’Azeffoun’’. 

 Isem Azeffoun, yal wa uɣur i t-yeqqen. Llan kra qqaren-d awal Azeffoun, qqaren-t s tmeslayt tatergit i umekkan anda yettnejmaɛ waḍu. S tcelḥit, ad t-naf d taseǧǧigt neɣ d islem (La langouste). Ma d wiyaḍ, nnan-d yekka-d seg wawal ‘’Uzzaf’’, d tawrirt iɛezlen. Wwḍen armi i qqnen awal Azeffoun ɣer taɛrabt, nnan-d yekka-d seg ‘’Ɛaazifun’’, meḥsub wid yekkaten agambar. Ula d acennay El Ankis, d wa i d rraw-is. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Amar Aridj, aselway n tiddukla ‘’Tigemmi’’. Imezwura ɣer taddart d Ifiniqeyyen, semman-as ‘’Ressirin’’. Syin d Ṛruman , semman-as ‘’Ruzuzus’’ (Zus=Grand, Ruz=cap). Tettwabna deg 200 n yiseggasen uqbel talallit n¨ Ɛissa. Gar useggas n 248 d 251, yella yeḥkem-itt Decius. Ad t-naf deg ( Comptes kabyles n Camille Lacoste Dujardin)

 Ma d tamdint n tura yellan ɣer rrif n lebḥar i yewwin ula d nettat isem-agi ‘’Azeffoun’’, tebna-tt Fransa deg yiseggasen-nni 1870. Tsemma-as ‘’Port-Gueydon’’, d tajmilt i l’amiral Comte Louis Henri de Gueydon. Llant ttidirent deg-s 367 n twaculin n yirumyen, Iṭelyanen d Isbenyulen, 24 n twaculin n wudayen d 7 n twaculin n yiqbayliyen. 

  Amezruy d tmetti. 

 Qqaren ɣef yimdanen n tama-nni: ’’lɣaci, ḍeɛfen, tamurt, teḥma.’’ Meḥsub tesɛa daɛwessu. Taddart-agi teččur d later n Ṛruman, ǧǧan-t kan akken mehmel. Ur yelli yemḍebber i d-yelhan s tkumit-is, ur yelli win yeqqaren hemma i usdergel-is. Ula d tiddukla tadelsant ‘’Tigemmi’’ i d-ilulen ɣef lǧal n waya, tebra i ṭṭbel deg waman imi ur tufi ara afus n tallelt ɣer wid teɛna temsalt. Akka ara reqqen yisebtar n umezruy sdat wallen n yimdanen mebla ma ẓzlen-d afus-nsen i wakken ad tt-sensen. Dayen ur iqebbel leɛqel. ‘’Iṣurdiyen iqdimen d leḥwal i d-ǧǧan yimezwura, ama d Ṛruman, Ifiniqyen neɣ leqbayel, ttwabeddlen-d s yigerra n duxxan, zik asmi nmeẓẓi. S yiẓra-nni n later swayes i nekkat lmal neɣ iqejjan’’ i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Aridj. ‘’Deg yiseggasen-nni n 1990, mi d-nexleq tiddukla ‘’Tigemmi’’, nufa-d yiwen umekkan yeččur d icbula. Mi d-nufa amezwaru, nugad ad yerrez. Ur nessin ara amek ara t-id-nessekfel. D ameqqran, nekcem deg-s deg tlata yid-neɣ. Ihi, nessawel i wid teɛna temsalt. Nettraǧǧu, nettraǧu, ulac. Syin, negzem-itt deg rray: nexdem ticemlit, nerra-ten akken llan. Nerra-asen tidima-nsen, nerra-asen akal, uɣalen akken llan. Mazal-iten ar tura deg umekkan-nni. Ur yelli win i d-inudan.’’ Ikemmel yenna-d Mass Amar Aridj. 

  Lḥemmam n Ṛruman. 

 Ar tura mazal kra n leḥyuḍ-is ttwabedden. Mazal tasebbalt-nni d tregwa ansi i d-ttruḥun waman ɣur-s. Nnan-d ttruḥun-d tlata n leṣnaf n waman: isemmaḍen, wid yemmuzeɣlen akked yiḥmayanen. Xedmen ttawil i wanect-a. Ṛruman, ḥemmlen asteɛfu akked lḥemmamat.

  Imɣi ‘’Tajrumit’’ akked Ṛruman.   

 S kra n wanda i yella yimɣi-agi n tejrumit, ḥṣuk-id ɛeddan syin Ṛruman. Acuɣer?

 Nnan-d d akken xeddmen yis-s aṭas n leṣnaf n tissit, ladɣa, Ricard. Nesteqsa ɣef wamek i t-xeddmen, ur d-nufi ara tiririt. Tessen-tt, diɣ, am latay d ddwa neɣ i uqraḥ n uɛrur.

  Lǧameɛ lekbir. 

 Lǧameɛ-agi, yebna-t winna yebnan lǧameɛ lekbir n Lezzayer tamanaɣt akked winna n Bgayet. Acu kan, taqubbet n wagi, tesqef s uqerrum. Ala netta i yellan deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Asmi i tella Fransa deg taddart-a (1958), tesseqdec taqubet-a, d taɛessast imi tzemreḍ ad twaliḍ ɣer yal tama. 

  Lǧameɛ n Sidi Abderrahmane Bnu Djaffer (Sidi Abdellah). 

 Timeqqbert n taddart-a, tettusemma ɣef umrabeḍ-a. Ɣef wakken yura deg lǧameɛ-a, yusa-d deg lqern wis 9. Ibeddel isem-is, yuɣal Sidi Abdellah, i wakken ad yessedreg iman-is. 

 Nnan-d yettwanṭel deg yiwen umekkan, syin azekka-nni, ufan-d aẓekka-s deg umekkan-agi n tmeqqbert anda i as-gan taqubbet. Ḥekkun-d, diɣ, ɣef wasmi xedmen lembat (asensi) deg tqubbet-agi, nnan-d nawlen seksu s uksum. Acu kan, ass-nni lɣaci yusa-d s waṭas. Ur d-tekfi ara lmakla. Iruḥ yiwen ɣer daxel n tqubbet u yenna-as i yiwen: ‘’ha-t-an netwakcef, tekfa lmakla.’’. Winna, yerra-as-d:’’ruḥ awi-yi-d snat n tḍebsiyin tilmawin, yiwet anda rran aksum, tayeḍ anda yella seksu.’’ Yewwi-tent-id winna. Akken i tent-yerra ɣer umekkan anda nawlen, uɣalent ččurent-d leǧfun.

  Ṣelṭan akked yelli-s. 

 Nnan-d ṣelṭan n taddart-agi yesɛa kan yiwet n yelli-s. Ihi, i wakken ad tt-yefk, yecreḍ d akken argaz i yebɣan ad tt-yaɣ, ad yexdem ayen yessewhamen. Kkren sin mecqarwen gar-asen: yiwen yenna-as, ad ak-d-ssaliɣ aman seg lebḥar s tɣunam, wayeḍ yenna-as, ad ak-d-awiɣ aman seg Temgudt, azal n 50 n kilumitr. Kkren bdan lecɣal-nsen. Iɛedda lweqt, winna i d-yewwin aman seg Temgudt, yebda la d-yettqarrib. Ihi, yekker winna n tɣunam, isekker ahraḥu deg taddart am wakken dayen yessaweḍ-d aman. Mi yesla winna-nniḍen, dɣa, yeḥbes. Acu kan, yelli-s n ṣelṭan ur tt-yuɣ yiwen. Tenɣa iman-is. Wissen ayen ?

  Taqṣiṭ n umcic d ubehlul. 

 Mi nerza ɣer tmeqqbert-nni n taddart, nufa azal n 25 n yiẓekwan n yiwet n twacult meḍlen deg yiwen umekkan, weḥd-sen. Nesteqsa, nnan-aɣ-d taqṣiṭ-a. Ur d-nettader ara isem n twacult. 

 Tella yiwet n twacult, tedda d Fransa. Iɛeggalen-is, zgan tteḥqaren yiwen akken ubehlul. Anda i t-id-mmugren, ad ttmesxiren yis-s. Armi d yiwen wass, yerfed-d amcic, iḍegger-it s ufella n sqef n yiwen uxxam u yenna-as: ‘’ur d-tettṣubbuḍ ara syin alamma mmuten akken ma llan iɛeggalen n twacult-a.’’ Syin, ttmettaten yiwen, yiwen. 

  Kra n wudmawen. 

 Mačči d yiwen neɣ d sin i yellan d anaẓur ameqqran n tama-agi. Nebɣa ad nẓer sser n waya. Yenna-d Mass Amar Aridj, yella ɣur-i, yerna mačči sser, ha-t-aya: ‘’ ihi, ad d-greɣ tiɣri i wid yebɣan ad uɣalen d inaẓuren imeqqranen, ad d-rzun ɣur-neɣ seg 24 duǧember i wakken ad sɛeddin yid-neɣ 40 n yussan n lyali. Agemmuḍ d yiswi, yettwaḍman. Deg lyali-a, llan 40 wussan, ferqen ɣef sin. 20 wussan, llant tcebḥanin n wass, llant tberkanin n yiḍ. Syin, 20 wussan-nniḍen, llant tberkanin n wass, tcebḥanin n yiḍ. Agu, ur tettwaliḍ ara sdat-k. Ad tefɣeḍ deg leɛqel-ik. Nuɣal akk d iderwicen. Acu kan, tidderwect n da, d taẓuri anda-nniḍen. Inaẓuren-agi akk imeqqranen, fɣen lawan n lyali-agi. Syin, s kra n win ara d-yuɣalen, leqrar-is deg Lwed Ɛisi.’’

  Tamedyazt d tsekla :   Tahar Djaout, Bachir Hadj Ali, Med Aouine.

  Aẓawan :  Boudjemaâ El Ankis, El Hadj El Anka, Mohand Iguerbouchène, Meziane Rachid, Boualem Chaker, Med Allaoua.

  Amezgun d Sinima :  Rouiched, Fellag, Said d Med Hilmi, Med Ifticène.

  Addal :  Lalmas, Younes Ifticène.

  Taklut:  M’hamed Issiakhem.

  Lgirra n 1954:  Didouche Mourad, Yacef Saâdi, Taleb Abderrahmane, Ourida Meddad, Capitaine Si Abdellah.

  Ddin :  Chikh Mohand Ouamer (Sadou).

 Deg taggara, ad snemreɣ ameddakkel Kader Belaidi, Amar Aridj, aselway n tiddukla ‘’Tigemmi’’ d Ali Bekacemi. Tanemmirt, daɣen, i Nacer Oukacha. 

 <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M  

  
 D ungal Tamacahut taneggarut n Lynda Koudache i yewwin arraz ameqqran Assia Djebbar n useggas-agi 2016. Tettuneḥsab Lynda Koudache, d tamyarut tamezwarut s tutlayt taqbaylit s wungal-is Aɛecciw n tmes i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2009. Uqbel aya, tessuffeɣ-d Lynda Koudache ammud n yisefra s tefransist d teqbaylit aseggas n 2006. Tewwi arraz amezwaru s tullist-is «anagi n tudert» deg temsizzelt n ungal n tlawin n ugrakal deg Marseille .Tura ammud n yisefra s tefransist «Comme une forêt de mots dits» deg useggas 2001 ɣer tezrigin le petit pavé di Fransa , ammud n yisefra s tefransist «L’aube vierge» deg useggas n 2003 di Lezzayer , amud n yisefra : «lliɣ uqbel ad iliɣ» deg useggas n 2005.Nessaram-as afud igerrzen i linda , taɣuri igerrzen i yimeɣriyen n tmaziɣt.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia  

<div> 
  
 Yuɣal  ssqef n tugdi ɣef iqqera n yimdanen deg iseggasen n 70. Boumedienne yesselḥa tamurt  s w uzal akked udebbuz. Win id yennan kra ad yettwaḥbes ,neɣ ad yettwenɣa neɣ ad yenfu. Srabes  ḍelqen tuccar-nsen ɣer yal taxlijt di tmeti am akken i tt-id yenna Matoub Lounes deg awal-is “ sin leḥruf ḍelqen tugdi”. Akabar n FLN yeḍleq  aɛdil-is ɣer yal amkan,armi yuɣal  ulac acu i-izemren ad yeḍṛu neɣ ad yennulfu  di tmurt mebla ccwaṛ-is. Akken medden ad

 fehmen( ad gzin akken ilaq)  belli ifukk urar xas acennay  Slimane Azem ttwakksen iḍebsiyen-is di ssuq, yettwagdel di radyu( 1967). Krim Belkacem yettwenɣa di Lalman . Ismawen n-igarwiliyen id yellan  deffir tanekra n umenzu n-unbir am Boudiaf, Ait Ahmed, Khider, Krim ɣaben ismawen-sen yuɣal  d-aseṭṭaf win ara ten-id yadren. Imeɣnasen n FFS kecmen di tudert tuffirt. Yekfa wawal, kfan inejmuɛen  neɣ  axxamem yuɣal d-awezɣi. 

 Maca akken yebɣu yeɣli d yigenni ɣef iqqera n yergazen akked tlawin, di lɣerba llan wid id yakren i cɣel aserti. Seg wakka id yella    deg useggas n 1964  usbeddi n ugraw n imaziɣen s ddemma n-Mass Rahmani Abedelkader, Mohand Said Hanouz, Naroun Amar, Khelifati Mohand Amkrane, Taous Amrouche, Mohand Arab Bessaoud. Anejmuɛ akken ad tili talalit n ugraw-agi tella-d deg axxam n Taous Amrouche. Ɣer ugraw-agi yenerna-d deg useggas 1968 Youssef Achour, Hamici Hamid. Agraw n-imaziɣen aṭas n tesɣunin id yessufeɣ akken ad yesfiq agdud ɣef yidles amaziɣ yettmettaten amer ad yeddekwel  akken as yerr  leɛnaya. D anec-t-a ara d yawin di tazwara n iseggasen n 70 ad yili uḥerkel ɣef yidles ɣer tama n Mouloud Mammeri yesɣarayen niqal tamaziɣt di tasdawit n Lẓayer tamanaɣt. Maca adabu n yimiren ur iqal-ara imalasen n yidles yesṭṭuqet fell-asen taganit akked lḥerṣ. S w-akka ad nnef belli ulmud n tamaziɣt n Mouloud Mammeri yesḥesbs-it  Boumedienne deg useggas n 1973-1974. Mačč kan daya imi ula d-isammi i terwa-nneɣ  s-yimsawen imaziɣen    ttwagedlen deg tadbelt ( administration) . Dima deg useggas n 1974 adabu yegdel  tameɣṛa n treḍlimt( fête des cerises) deg Larbaɛ n at Iraten anda id zedmen  ijadarmiyen s-ẓẓur akken ad s xerben leqdic yellan i lmendad. Tadyant-agi tegla d s w aṭas n lmeyytin gar wid id yefɣan ɣer timesbaniyin id yellan imiren. 

 Gar anect-a n-tamḥeqranit akked ẓẓur kran-d kra n-imeɣnasen  am Smail Medjeber ( yellan deffir tisɣunin AB Amazigh, Iṭij, Atmaten) , Hocine Cherradi, Mohamed Haroun, Ferḥat Mhenni, Lounes Kaci, Rachid Hammiche akken ad ɛebbin taluft n tmaziɣt.  D -anect-a yak ara ad yawin tafsut n-imaziɣen n 1980. 

 Maca uqbel ad tebbeɛzeq Tizi-Ouzou deg ibrir n 80, mačči d-izli n tidukkliwin tuffirin am “tidukkla tamazɣa” neɣ “ tidukkla taferka” id yakren mgal lbaṭṭel id yesseɣli udabu ɣef tmaziɣt akked imeɣnasen-is . Ayen-nni n cckama sɣur leḥkem yesṣawed kra seg-sen( seg imeɣnasen-nni) ad aɣen abrid n takriḍt s ddemma n-usersi zdat tisudsiwin n dewla ( institution étatique) am uɣmis El Moudjahid  lbumbat.  Imeɣnasen yellan deffir tadyant-agi  id yeḍṛan deg useggas n 1976 d Smail Medjaber, Mohamed Haroun, Hocine Cheradi, Lounes Kaci. Meɛlum adabu yeḥkem ɣef imeɣnasen-agi s lḥebs s ṭul leɛmer am akken i ten id yesmekta  Matoub Lounes  :

  tawwurt n lḥebs fell i tzemm,

  fell-as tewriqt-iw tewcem

  tura testenya tseggem, 

 ṭṭul leɛmer id timerka”. 

 Si tama nniḍen , dima deg isaggasen n 70, llan imeɣnasen iḍefṛen abrid-nniḍen. Abrid-agi d win umi ara nsemmi amennuɣ adelsan ɛebban ɣef tuyat-nsen icennayen am terbaɛt imeziɣen imula, acennay Idir, Lounis Ait Menguellet  wuɣur ara d yernu ɣer deqal Matoub Lounes. Ɣer tama n-icennayen-agi llan diɣ ineɣmasen n radyu t-is snat am Ben Mohamed, Meziane Rachid, Mohamed Guerfi, Tassadit Tituh  id yernan leqdic-nsen srid si radyu ɣer umennuɣ ɣef yidles Amaziɣ.  D anect-a ara d yawin ttnaṣfa n iseggasen n 70 talalit n tizlit ara yesduqqesen agdud d lekmal-is “ a baba inouba”. Tizlit-agi yezdin acennay Idir akked umedyaz Ben  Mohamed d taseddart  temenzut akken ad yewwet  ugdud s-ugrez akken ad iẓer anda akka i teddu lasel ines. Amzun d ṣṣḍa i tizlit-agi Ferhat yerra-d lejwab akkin s yifyar-agi anda i s-yeqqar: 

 Ɣef leɛyun ttmeslayen

  nekni ur neẓri d acu

 wissen d timmi neɣ d allen

 neɣ dayen nniḍen nettu

 akit a widen yeṭṭṣen

 idles-nneɣ la irekku”. 

 Ur iɛaṭṭel Lounis Ait Menguelletara ula d-netta si lǧiha-s yefka-d tergit-is di tezlit aɛeṭṭar anda is yeqqar :

  urgeɣ am akken d-ṣṣeḥ

 ass-a mačči am yiḍeli 

 urgeɣ am akken d-ṣṣeḥ

  ḥadreɣ i udrar yuki

 urgeɣ am akken d-ṣṣeḥ

  agris  i t-yedlan yefsi.

 Tallit tebda tettbeddil. Aqbayli yessadren i w allen yebda yezdi s lqedd. Idir, Ait Menguellet rnu ɣer-sen JSK id yettawin tilɣuɣa aseggas deffir wayeḍ rran-d lɛaz -nni yenquqlen  niqal . Anekiw yellan yekcem deg ujeɣlal-is , yufa ttra, yebda yekkat akken ad ɛiwed  talalit. Taḥjuṛt ɣer weltm-as, adɣaɣ ɣef wayeḍ yebda yettali uɣlad n lḥeṛma win ara ifergen ɣef sser n teqbaylit .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Lexmis-agi sdat-nneɣ, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit ara tebdu s wudem unṣib tezrigt tis snat n rreḥba n udlis i lmend n warrac imcṭaḥ deg uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Tazrigt n useggas-agi, fkan-as asentel: “Agrud d aɣerman n uzekka”. D leqdic i d-thegga Tenmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu akked wulmisen n yidles, yecban: Axxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer d win n Krim Belqasem n Azazga, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan n lwilaya, akked temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant s uttekki n Tenmehla n usegmi aɣelnaw, ddiwan aɣelnaw n usizreg aɣurbiz (ONPS), Amussu addukklan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D tazrigt ara yeddun ɣef teɣzi n ddurt, imi ad telli tiwwura-as ass n lexmis 07 deg waggur cutenber ad tekfu ass n ttlata 12 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Ad d-tili rreḥba-agi deg 5 n yimukan n yidles d tmussni deg wakal n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu yecban: Axxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri d Tneḍfart-is n Azazga, Tamkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, Tazeqqa n ssinima. Am wakken ara d-ilin yirmad deg ṣbiṭer Mohamed Nedir akked Wulmis n yigerdan yenxeṣṣen n Boukhalfa. Yettwahegga-d yiwen wahil d amerkanti, ideg ara d-tili rrehba n yidlisen (timsikniyin sɣur ugar n 20 n yixxamen n tezrigin n yidlisen, d yisenza s yibuddan sɣur waṭas n yimura, ladɣa wid yettarun i warrac), ama deg uxxam n yidles ama deg tneḍfart-is n Azazga neɣ deg temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, seg 09h00 n ssbaḥ alamma d 16h00 n tmeddit ɣef teɣzi n setta wussan, d usenɛet n yimuhal n yiskiwen n wulmisen-agi. Am wakken ara d-tili tullsa n 4 n tmucuha deg tzeqqa-nni yellan deg uxxam n yidles, yettwassnen s yisem “Axxam-nneɣ”, sɣur tiddukkla tadelsant “Ixulaf n Ǧerǧer” n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ad ilin diɣen waṭas n yisikwan (urraren isegmiyen, asuneɣ, timucuha d teḥkayin, tira, taɣuri…atg.) deg temkerḍt-agi tamaynut akked temkerḍit taqburt n uxxam n yidles. Ma deg tzeqqa n ssinima ad yili ass n 10 deg cutenber, ɣef 10h00 n ssbaḥ deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun, usenɛet n yiwen usaru i lmend n warrac imecṭaḥ, ma deg uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine, ad d-tili turart tceqquft n umezgun “Ccna n Leḍyur”, i yexdem netta s timmad-is. Am wakken diɣen ara d-yili usenzi n yidlisen iɣurbizen, yerzan aɣerbaz amezwaru, aɣerbaz alemmas akked tesnawit, sɣur Ddiwan aɣelnaw n usizreg aɣurbiz (ONPS), mebla ma nettu timsizzelt yettwaheggan i warrac, tewwi asentel-agi: “Mi ara yuɣalen wafrasen d amahil n tẓuri”. Ad d-tili diɣ temsikent tuzzigt. Ad d-tili daɣen, ass n letnayen i d-itteddun 11 deg waggur-agi ɣef 09h00 n ssbeḥ, tirza n yinelmaden ɣer sin n yisalayen iɣelnawen “El Moudjahid” akked “El Djaich” yellan deg Lezzayer Tamanaɣt. Am wakken daɣen ara d-tili tɣuri n tmucuha, imseḍsi akked useḥḥar, ass n lhed 10/09/2017 deg yiɣerbazen n taddart n Ath Rahmoun akked Ait Atella, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant Ait Yahia Moussa. Ma d ass letnayen-nniḍen deg yiɣerbazen yellan deg Cheurfa akked El Kalaa, i d-yezgan deg tiɣiwant n Tigzirt. Ma d ass n ttlata 12 deg cutenber, ad ilin yirmad-agi i d-nebder yakan deg uɣerbaz n Bouhinoune, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu. Ass n 12 seg waggur-a, ɣef 14h00 ad d-tili tmeɣra n taggara deg uxxam n yidles Krim Belqacem n Azazga, ideg ara ttunefken yigerdasen n uttekki i yimekkiyen deg tfaska-agi. Ad yili wahil daɣen i yigerdan, yecban aseḥḥar d yimseḍsi, akked ccna n warrac sɣur Fella Bellali”. Ad salin leqdic-agi s tukcci n warrazen i warrac ara d-yufraren deg temsizzelt-nni, yewwin asentel-a: “Mi ara yuɣalen wafrasen d amahil n tẓuri”.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ass-nni n sed, 17 deg duğember 2016, ɣef 16h n tmeddit i tebda s wudem unṣib tezrigt tis 15 n tfaska tadelsant taɣelnawt n usaru amaziɣ deg uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine n temdint n Tizi Uzzu.

 Yella-d leqdic-agi s ddaw leεnaya n uselway n tegduda Mass Abdelaziz Bouteflika d lwali n Tizi Uzzu Mass Med Bouderbali, s lemεawna n tenmehla n yidles akked d tesqamut n tfaska-a. Leqdic-agi, ad yeddun ɣef teɣzi n 6 n wussan, imi yebda s wudem unsib ass n sebt iεeddan, ad yekfu ass n 22 deg waggur-a ideg nella. Tazrigt-agi tis 15 gan-tt d tajmilt i tnaẓurt tameqqrant “Ourida Mezaguer” yettwassnen s yisem n “Anissa”, tefka-d aṭas i ssinima d tezlit taqbaylit, am wakken daɣen tettcebiḥ isura ideg i d-urar, amedya: Axxam n Dda Meẓyan, Itij n Zira, Tawrirt yettwattun…atg. Wid i d-iheggan ttiεad-agi adelsan, fkan-as asentel : «Ssinima tamaziɣt : Tanfalit n wazalen n uktuyen iɣelnawen». Ma d ahil yettwajerden i lmend tezrigt-agi d amerkanti, imi yettili-d usenεet n wazal n 26 n yisura, 12 seg-sen ttilin-d deg uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer, ma 14 niḍen ttilin-d deg tzeqqa n ssinima n Tizi Uzzu. Am wakken daɣen i d-ttilin 8 n yisaragen i d-yewwin awal ɣ ssinima d usaru amaziɣ s umata.
