Syin ɣer-s ɣef 10h00 yella-d usikew n tira i warrac yesɛan gar 10 alamma d 14 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-nsen, yewwin azwel n Ass n Rrbeḥ. ɣer taggara n wass, wwin-d yiwen n yimseḍsi, i wakken ad zhun cwiṭ warrac. Ma deg wis tlata, i d-yellan ass-nni n larebɛa 05 seg yulyu 2017, tella-d deg-s dima temsikent n yidlisen n umezruy, ɣef 10h00 deg umḍiq n yigerdan tella-d temsizzelt n tira s yisem n waṣaḍen n tegrawla tazzayrit. Ideg i d-tufrar Ziram Damia deg umḍiq amezwaru, syin d Basline Emilia deg umḍiq wis sin, ma d amḍiq wis kraḍ tewwi-t Djebouri Zineb. Syin ikemmel wahil ɣef 11 s yiwen n usarag n umjahed Si Ouali, i d-yewwin awal ɣef tegrawla tazzayrit seg 1954 alammi d ass n timunent. Ma d ass-nni n lexmis, 06 yulyu 2017, xedmen yigerdan tirza ɣer Usalay amniḍan n yimjuhad, yellan deg tama n M’douha.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Yeḍra-d ddurt iɛeddan unmuggar amezwaru n tgemmi tadelsant tamensayt deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n temdint n Tizi Uzzu.

 Yettuhegga-d leqdic-a sɣur Tanmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu ɣef teɣzi n rebɛa n wussa : seg 6 ar 9 deg duǧember 2016. Anmuggar yella-d d tajmilt i Mass Youcef Nacib, amnadi deg tsekla taqabaylit neɣ n tmaziɣt s umata. Wid i d-iheggan timlilit-a, ffkan-as asentel ‘’Tigemmi tadelsant gar aylayni d uzzewzel’’ ɣef wayeg i d-gan yimussnawen d yimyura ddeqs n yisaragen. Nezmer ad d-nebder, wid-nni n yiselmaden n tesdawit Mass Cheimakh Said akked Djellaoui Mohamed i d-yemmeslayen ɣef wamek i d-yella useḥbiber ɣef tgemmi seg tira n Youcef Nacib. Syin yella-d usarag-nniḍen sɣur Mass Lasheb Ramdane akked Mass Bentaleb Brahim ɣef tgemmi tadelsant tamensayt. Zyad ɣef wanect-a, llant aṭas n temsekniyin deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri, ama d tid n llebsa, tagella, afexxar, idlisen…Am wakken i d-yella, diɣ, usenɛen n leqdicat yettilin zik deg uxxam n leqbayel, am ussewi n seksu, tameɣra n tlalit n ugrud, ahuzzu-ines deg dduḥ, rwaḥ ɣer lexla d uẓeṭṭa. Yella-d leqdic-a sɣur Tiddukkla Tadelsant Yessi-s Idurar. Aṭas n wayen-nniḍen i d-yeḍran deg ussan-agi n unmuggar. Wid i d-yusan slan i tmucuha, isefra akked lemtul i d-tenna Djamila Bouanem. Yella ula d nwal n iwejjiben akked tmeɣra n Unẓar i d-heggant tlawin n Tiddukkla tadelsant Yessi-s Idurar. Ma d Tiddukla Tadelsant Iselqam n Talext, nettat tessnaɛt-d amek i d-tettili tuqda n ufexxar. Deg taggara, yella-d usenɛet n yiwen n usaru ɣef unamek n yizamulen n rrqem deg talaxt, timenna n kra n tdemyazt taqdimt, timseɛraq akked ccna n ddin sɣur lexwan n Draa Ben Khedda.

  Nnant-d : 

  Massa Kemmar, d tanemhalt n uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer :  “Ad snimmreɣ aṭas tiddukliwin tidelsanin i d-yerran i teɣri-nneɣ, gar-asent: Yessi-s n Yidurar, Iselqam n talaɣt…atg. Ayen yesefrahen imi nwala gar wallen-nneɣ mazal wid yeṭṭfen deg leεwayed d tẓuri-nneɣ taqburt, ama d talaɣt, ama d aẓeṭṭa, ama d tagula n zik… Nessaram ahat yiwen wass ad siwḍen yimɣaren d temɣarin, ad asen-slemden i yilmeẓyen d tlemeẓyin insayen d tẓuriwin n zik. D tagnit daɣen anida i d-nessemlal aṭas n yinaẓuren i d-isiknen axeddim-nsen i yimezdaɣ n Tizi Uzzu. Nezmer ad d-nini, belli newweḍ ɣer yiswi-nneɣ i nejred i leqdic-agi, imi ama d imezdaɣ n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu iεejbab-asen lḥal aṭas, ula d inaẓuren d tiddukliwin tidelsanin ferḥent daɣen, ihi d wagi i d iswi-nneɣ nekni.”

  Massa Goumeziane Nabila, d tanemhalt n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu  : “nessuddes-d ussan-agi timlilit tamezwarut n tgemmi tadelsant tamensayt, i nga d tajmilt i umnadi d umaru-nneɣ ameqqran Youcef Nacib, ɣef teɣzi n rebɛa n wussan. Nebɣa ad nseḥbiber ɣef wayen nesεa, ama d ansayen, ama d idles, ama d tigemmi-nneɣ s umata. I wakken daɣen ad d-nesken i medden ayen nekseb n ugerruj deg tɣerma-nneɣ taqbaylit, wa ad t-nesken, ayɣer ala, i leğnas merra n umaḍal”.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Hocine Moula  

 
  
 D yiwet n tunṭict s wazal-is ara d-yazen seg At Leqser azekka umedyaz Ahmed Menas, i kra n wid iḥemmlen tamedyazt. D yiwen n ummud n 20 n yiḍrisen isuman akka aṭas n tlufa anda yeɛred mmi-s n Boumnazel ad t-id-yawi s yiwen n ubrid ixulfen, acku s kra mi ara d-yebder aγbel ikeffut s usirem. D amdan yebγan ad yeckenṭeḍ di tudert, yugin berru n ṭṭbel deg waman. Ɣas ulamma seg temẓi-s i t-yewwi wadu n tmedyazt, maca yegguma ad i ɛeddi s abrid n tira, imi d amdan yettwalin ahat d yiwen n ccγel i d-yekkan nnig tezmert-is. D acu kan, asmi yekker sseɛd n udlis-a amenzu, yufa-d γer tama-s wid d tid ara s-d-yefken afus n tallelt rnu d wid mehsub yellan deg unnar. Ahmed Menas, yezzi tamuγli-s γer umedyaz n taddart-is yewwin yakan arrazen deg tmedyazt rnu d aselmad n tsekla tamaziγt deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu. Wiyaḍ, d iselmaden n tmaziγt i d-yeğğan adlis-a yura akken iwata. D ayen ahat i d-ibeggnen axeddim zeddigen yebnan γef ccwer. Ma nezzi-d akka tamuγli s ammud-a, ad naf asefru amenzu d win iruḥen srid γer Lwennas, imi d tajmilt di tizwar, d asmekti n teγri-s i yimaziγen di tigat. Deg wagi dγa, yeqqen imeslayen n Matoub γer wid n Djaout s wudem-nniden, mi d-yenna : « d lmut ara mmte&amp;gamma,; ma hedreγ-d, ma nniγ-d tidet, γas limer ssusme&amp;gamma,; achal ara kkeγ ? Labud ad d-tehder twerqet, ah….imi rwaḥ ad ruḥe&amp;gamma,; akka ay tt-xtare&amp;gamma,; tudert heret-tt ». Amedyaz-a, yeɛred yessenteq-d Lwennas seg uzekka γef tedyant n lmut-is, iruḥ mebɛid deg usugen almi i d-yenna : « ticerket i yi-d-undin, ula d win yellan deg udaynin, yezra anisi i d-tekka». Isefra n Ahmed Menas ruḥen am lexyud deg uzeṭṭa, seg tedyant n Lwennas ɣer lḥeqq, imi d tajmilt i yerra i yiwen seg yimeγnasen n taddart-is, wagi d Berkani Ahmed, yettwasnen deg unnar n umennuγ γef yizerfan n tlelli. Asefru-a yekfan akka s wawal « yeǧǧa-aγ-d tteswira » inuqel yis-s srid asefru-nniden iwumi isemma tteswira, meḥsub awal aneggaru yezga-d d azwel i usefru i d-iḍefren. Awal n umedyaz simmal iteddu, yettiqsiḥ, imi deg usefru n « ttrika » yerra srid lfuci-s γer wid yessawḍen tamurt γer liḥala ideg tettidir, tin akken iγef yesberber lxuf, timenγiwt d tazzla n yidammen. Tagmat, tuγ amkan-is deg yisefra n Ahmed Menas, imi yewwi-tt-id s yiwen n wudem mi d-yenna : « tewɛer tyita n lemri, ma yuγ lekdeb di tegmat ». Imi, yugad ma yella lekdeb yudeg tagmat, d zzerb kan ara d-yuγalen γef wallen, i wakken γer taggara ad ferqen wid yemḥemmalen. Dima akka deg yisefra-s, amedyaz iger tiγri i wid ara yessuzfen lḥif mi akken yetti zzman γef medden. D asefru i yekfa s kra n yinzan ara yilin di lmendad i umeγri anda i d-yenna : « win yebγan ad yekkes lhif, ad yekker mi ɛziz yides. Win yebγan ad yehrez nnif, s yidammen-is ad t-ixelles».

  M. Smail 

  
 Asmi bab ixelqen lerwaḥ, ixelq-d amdan iḥud-as-d kan ɛecrin n yiseggasen. Iseɛdel-it netta d wezgar, d uqjun, d weɣyul akked yibki. Akken ṛuḥent ad fakkent ɛecrin-nni n yiseggasen n tudert-is, amdan yufa-d iman-is ur yeṛwi ara ddunit. Alammi d imiren i yufa iman-is, i as-teɛǧeb ddunit. Issuter i bab n txelqit, ad as-iseɣzef ddunit-is. Yenna-as : “Anɛam a bab ixelqen n leṛwaḥ, nekk tseɛdelḍ-iyi d uzger, d uqjun…nutni segmi ara d-kkren d lmerta di ddunit, tudert-nsen d taberkant, suturen lmut ur tt-ufin. Ma d nekk alammi d tura i as-ufiɣ lbenna, alammi d tura i wwḍeɣ ad xedmeɣ !” Bab n txelqit yerra-as-id : “Nekk ḥekmeɣ s lḥeq, saɛdleɣ-ken akken ma tellam, fkiɣ-awen akk ɛecrin n yiseggasen, wagi ur ttuɣaleɣ ara deg-s. Tura tegra-d kan yiwet, ma yella yiwen deg-sen i iqublen ad ak-yefk cwiṭ si tudert-is nekkini ur d-qqareɣ ara ala.” Amdan yerra srid ɣer uzgar, yufa-t akken kan i d-inejmeɛ seg uzaɣar si tkerza. Yenna-as : “Amek tettiliḍ ay azger ? Waqila tufiḍ iman-ik !” Azger yerra-d nnehta inna-as : “Berka-k askeɛrer fell-i ttif lmut wala tudert icban tagi.” Yenna-as umdan : “D tidet ɣur-k lḥaq ! Si ssbaḥ d takerza deg yizuɣar, akken yal ass, yerna ɣer taggara ulac lxir. Ad ak-zlun, ad ččen aksum-ik yerna ad rnun aglim-ik d icifaḍ. I yak tessneḍ awal-a : lemmer ittuɣal lxir, ad yuɣal i uzgar. Akka ara tettwaliḍ ay azgar bezzef fell-ak ɛecrin n yiseggasen n lmerta. D acu-tenniḍ lemmer ad nsuter bab n txelqit ad ak-d-issenqes nnefṣ si tudert-ik, ad tent-rnuɣ i yiman-iw !” Azgar iqbel. Akka amdan issaweḍ tlatin n yiseggasen di tudert-is. Amdan isɛa afud, ixeddem deg yiḍ, deg uzal akken ad isbedd axxam. Wwḍent tlatin-nni n yiseggasen, amdan mazal ur yeṛwi ara ddunit, alammi d imiren i as-id-banen lecɣel. Iṛuḥ issuter i tikkelt nniḍen bab n txelqit ad as-iseɣzef tudert. Am tikkelt tamezwarut, yenna-as-id: “wali ma yella win ara ak-yefkan cwiṭ n yiseggasen si tudert-is?” Amdan ileḥḥu imlal-d aqjun yenna-as : “Kečč ay aqjun Rebbi ur ak-izgil ara, tudert-agi-inek axir fiḥel. Segmi d-tekkreḍ kečč d aseglef iḍ am wass, d tazla akin akka ad tettnadiḍ ma yella wi ara ak-id-iḍegren telqimt ad tekkseḍ laẓ-ik neɣ ad tettnadiḍ deg yiguduyen ma yella kra iḍegren ad t-id-tjemwɛeḍ ad t-teččeḍ. Akka ɛecrin n yiseggassen bezzef ! D acu tenniḍ lemmer ad tesneqseḍ nnefṣ si tudert-ik ad tent-rnuɣ nekk akken ad saliɣ lecɣel-iw ?” Aqjun am uzgar ittwaqenneɛ, iqbel ṛṛay n umdan. Amdan issaweḍ rebɛin n yiseggasen di tudert-is. Lecɣel wa deffir wa, lweqt ittazal ur ifaq ara amek d-yufa iman-is ɣer taggara n tudert-is. Lecɣel mazal ur kfin ara, iččur d amenni, d asirem. Iṛuḥ daɣen ittnadi wi ara as-id ifken cwiṭ n yiseggasen si tudert-is. Ileḥḥu imlal-d aɣyul deg ubrid n teẓgi yuɣal-d iɛebba-d isɣaren, iḥbes-it, yenna-as : “Lɛeslama ay aɣyul ula d kečč ddunit-a ur ak-teǧǧi ara, ur ak-tcuḥ ara. Segmi d-tekkreḍ d lmeḥna, rekben fell-ak, ttɛebbin fell-ak, xas ur tezmireḍ ara ad telḥuḍ, teɛyiḍ, ẓehḍen deg-k mebla ccḥa s umehtaf akken ad telḥuḍ. Neɛlen deg-k, ttawin-k d awal “ay aɣyul”. Ula d tagella-k d tisugar n uɛejmi d yikerri. Bezzef akka fell-ak ɛecrin n yiseggasen ! Ma tebɣiḍ ad ḍebreɣ fell-ak, akken ad tesneqseḍ cwiṭ si lmeḥna efk-iyi ɛecra n yiseggasen, kečč ad tafeḍ iman-ik, ad inqes fell-ak laɛtab d cedda nekk ad kemmleɣ ayen nwiɣ ad t-xedmeɣ di ddunit.” Aɣyul ifṛaḥ am win i t-id-iselken si tesraft, iqbel ifka-as i umdan ɛecra n yiseggasen si tudert-is. Akka, amdan issaweḍ xemsin n yiseggasen di tudert-is. Wwḍent-d xemsin, amdan mazal ur isteqneɛ ara, mazal ur yeṛwi ara nnɛayem n ddunit, iṛuḥ ittnadi win ara as-id-yernun xerṣum ɛecra n yiseggasen. Ass-nni iffeɣ ɣer teẓgi ad d-izdem isɣaren yufa ibki isteɛfa sufella n useklu. Ittban-d am win yeɛyan, am win terẓa lmeḥna, am win ittrajun kan deg wussan-is. Inṭaq ɣer-s umdan yenna-as : “Aql-ak-id tettbaneḍ-d am win tewwet ddunit, d acu i k-yuɣen ay ibki ?” “Susem kan ur iyi-tezgil ara, lmeḥna deffir tayeḍ…” “D tidet ! Tudert-ik ur teshil ara di tẓgi. Seg wasmi d-tekkreḍ d anṭag seg useklu ɣer wayeḍ, ad tettnadiḍ kra ara terreḍ ddaw tuɣmest. Adfel fell-ak, asemmiḍ iḥuza-k. Aql-ak-id tekniḍ udem-ik izwi akk si lemḥani, aṭas fell-ak n laɛtab akka ɛecrin n yiseggasen. Yya ad ak-iniɣ ! Efk-iyi ɛecra n yiseggasen si tudert-ik, kečč ad inqes fell-ak laɛtab nekk ad saliɣ akk lecɣel-iw.” Ibki iḥeznen acḥal-aya, iɛuhden taḍsa, icmumeḥ-d, iqbel ayen i as-isuter umdan. S wakka tudert n umdan tɛedda si ɛecrin n yiseggasen alammi d settin. Ɛecrin n yiseggasen i as-id-iḥud bab ixelqen leṛwaḥ, amdan ad d-ikker d llufan ad ittimɣur ad yuɣal d aqcic, d anubi. Di ɛecrin-a imezwura amdan ad yečč ad issew, ad yurar, ad iḥemmel ad ittu iman-is, ad idder di lehna d tumert. Tudert-is tgerrez imi ulac fell-as uguren. Seg ɛecrin ɣer tlatin amdan ad ixeddem am uzgar akken ad d-iḥelli swayes ara isbedd axxam. Si Tlatin ɣer rebɛin, amdan isbedd axxam ɣur-s dderya, ad ugten fell-as wuguren. Ad ittazal ɣef uɣrum, ad ittɛeggiḍ ɣef dderya-s ɣur-k wa, hemma wa, xdem wa …Lḥaṣun ad iseglaf am uqjun. Si ṛebɛin ɣer xemsin amdan ad t-id-ibdu ɛeggu, ur ittnamer ḥed, ad iberru kan i yimeẓẓuɣen-is am uɣyul, ayen i as-nnan ad yini ih. Si Xemsin ɣer settin, amdan ad t-id-tebdu tewser, tuyat-is ad knunt, udem-is ad yezwi am am yibki. Akka yihi i d tudert n umdan ara iddren settin n yiseggasen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane LASHEB 

  
 Tidukla n yitri Iburayen daymen tezga ɣer usfugel n wass umenzu n tefsut neɣ s umata i win qqaren «Aderyis»d ansay , d imɣi yellan di twennaḍt. Tidukla Itri melmi yagi kan i tebda telli tiwwura akken ad tawi taɣda n yidles ,dɣa amahil ɣur-s anabaz gar yilemẓiyen anda yella gar-asen mass Mourad Touak d aselway n tdukla, d tawrikt id-igerrun ɣef yizuray n yildes , nudan-d asentel nezmer ad d-nini d taselfast i leqdic-nsen anda xtaren tameɣra uderyis , maca tamesɣara-nsen temgarad ɣef temnaḍin-nniḍen. Tafaska n useggas-a tewwi-d azwil n teẓrigt wis semmus (5),daɣen ttafen annar anda ttaken-as azal d tejmilt i unaẓur yettwasnen d win yecnan ɣef teqbaylit , anda aseggas yezrin tuɣal-as i Budjemaa Agraw , win akkin i Amour Abednour, assag n tfaska useggas-a tuɣ assag i Yidir Akfadou anda ara tili ɣef teǧzi n kraḍ (3) n wussan 17/18/19 deg waggur-a n Meɣres, ahil daymen yettili d anesbaɣur d aɣbalu ifeggḍen d tamussni , d taɣzut n n yidles, anda ara tebdu deg wass 17 di Meɣres 2016 d ass amezwaru n tfaska uderyis , mi ara yefnu uzizwu ɣef 14h :d tiɣrayin tunsibin yirmadyellan deg-s timzikent«exposition»anda deg-s idlisen d ttqendyar n Leqbayel , syin akkin d talilt «chorale», ccḍeḥ , leqbayel «danse Kabyle», tamedyazt , syin d asarag ara ad d-awin Mass Younes Idli d Karim Chikh, di taggara d taceqquft umezgun. Ass wis sin azemz 18 di Meɣres ɣef 13h: d amuqqel n teggrarin ɣef teẓrigt yezrin, syin d tagrumma n kraḍ n yinaẓuren Kaci Boussad , Ouazib Ameziane , akk d Idir Akfadou , d asbudu ɣef umecwar-is n tẓuri , akkin d ameltaɣ «Monologue»taggrayt n wass d inubaz n uzawan «soireé musicale». Ass aneggaru 19 d armud n taggara n tfaska , ɣef 10h :tarbaεt n unziz d lɣiḍa , afraq n warrazen , akkin d seksu i yezzin s tmellalin akken ad srebḥen , wa ad sirmen ussan d uwlaɣ d tdukli ; tameddit n wass ɣef 14h d anabaz «gala artistique», anda ara tili d tagnit n ccna , d tuget n yinaẓuren anda ar Yili Idir Akfadou , Boudjama Agraw, Kaci Boussad , Louiza, Ouazib, Amour Abdenour, Kamal n’Ali, Malek Bachi, Anza. Tafaska uderyis deg Iburayen d amager n tefsut s tumert , d anaruz i wid iḥemmlen tasusmi , d ussan n tafukt , d awlaɣ i lɣella. Itri Iburayen d tidukla n teɣda ɣer dzat, zegren akkin i tmuɣli gnan aceqqiq n wansayen, s tebɣest i llin tiwwura n yidles , rran-d tayti i yiseɣ n lejdud 

<p style="text-align: right;">   Azedine Abdous  

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Aṭas i sɛeddan deg tallit yezrin wid iḥemmlen amaḍal uhlis n Internet. Imi tuqqna (la connexion) tezga d tin ixussen, d tasellawt, ɣur yimdanen s umata, ladɣa imesdurar. Ala win izedɣen deg waɣir (tamdint), neɣ yesɛan tagnit yemmug-as-d lxiḍ n ADSL, i yesnuffsen cwiṭ deg tmerwin n yiseggasen iɛeddan. Ma d wid-nniḍen, ckunṭṭḍen kan deg kra n wallalen n Tcinet (La Chine), am yimudimen-nni iberkanen, swayes xersum ad ḍillen d aḍilli ɣef umaḍal amaynut. Ulamma tesɛa tmurt tizemmar ad tgerrez aṭas n tlufa, acu kan almi d 2014 i tebda tetiknulujit n 3G tleḥḥu mi d-uɣen yimahalen (opérateurs) n tilifun turagt i usefti deg umaynut-a n tsuta tis kraḍ. Tebda tettwaseqdac tetiknulujit-a s waṭas sɣur yimsaɣen, ɣas s ssuma teɣlay ciṭṭuḥ, maca drus i yerran ddhen i waya sdat n tiẓin ɣer tuqqna ara ten-yeǧǧen ad azlen cwiṭ deg uḥufu-nsen. Dɣa, mi rnan ɛeddan kra n wayyuren seg userreḥ n tsuta tis kraḍ, terna tessaweḍ-d Lezzayer Tilikum amaynut n tuqqna n tsuta tis ukuẓ (4G), i tesenz nettat s timmad-is. Dindin, acḥal i irewlen sɣur Dezzy, Oredoo , neɣ Mobilis, ruḥen uɣen-d imudimen-nni i ara asen-yefken ad qqnen s tuqqna twata rnu s ssuma meɛqulit cwiṭ. Imir-nni, ahat, rfan yimahalen-nniḍen seg tsertit n Lezzayer Tilikum, maca, taggara-a kan, atan tefka-asen ula i nutni ttesriḥ ma bɣan ad jiren deg tsuta-a tatrart. Dɣa, ɣas amek segmi i tt-yeɛreḍ umahal n Oredoo deg yiwet seg twilayin n tmurt.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Segmi d-yeḍra deg-sen ilindi useyyax d ameqqran, i ireglen abrid ddeqs n wussan i waṭas n yimezdaɣ n tɣiwanin n Ayt Smaɛel ed Tsexriwt, uɣalen medden akken ma llan ttkukrun daɣen ttaggaden aɛeddi seg yiberdan-a iwḥiden ɣas ma llan-d deg-sen lecɣal n useggem ed ussemsawi n wakal i iruḥen imir-nni. Tulacit n laman ɣur yinehharen tettzid lawan-a ladɣa, mi d-tettaẓ s tazzla tegrest; akud n yigeffuren ed waman. Yuɣ lḥal, ilindi deg furar i tegla yes-s lberṭa, mi akken ttnernayen ttahdan yiḥemmalen. D ayen i yeǧǧan yal ukrid bu tkerrust deg tama-ya n usamar-anẓul n Bgayet yetthabi ad d-leḥqen wayyuren-a n ccetwa netta ilaq-as ad yesseqdec abrid-nni. Inehharen i terza taluft, yal yiwen amek yettwali; wa iẓerr d tiqenṭrin-nni timeẓyanin i ur nemmug amek ilaq, wayeḍ yettwali dakken akal-nni merra d amihi (danger) deg tegrest imi yezmer ad iseyyex yal mara as-yehwu. Daymi ssaramen lemmer zun yella ubrid nniḍen yessufuɣen nnig n uqbur-nni. «Iberdan n wadda atan bdan berrṭen. Ass-a azekk-a ad teḍru lberṭa tayeḍ. Ɣef waya nettraǧu melmi ad iheggi ubrid asellak n Tecruft ara aɣ-yessawaḍen srid i Uweqqas war ma nekka seg Lberj n Mira». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n yilemẓi seg Ayt Smaɛel. D wa i d-yeqqimen d asirem n yiseqdacen n ubrid-a ubriḍ d

<p style="text-align: right;"> <em>M..X</em> 

  
 Zrin 35 iseggasen ɣef tafsut n-imaziɣen id yellan deg useggas 1980. Tadyant    id yegren  i tikelt tamezwarut ,s- lejher ,tamsalt n-timmadit  n Lẓẓayer ɣer unnar n-uskasi seg-imi tewwi tmurt tamunent –ines di 1962.  Am akken zrin diɣen 14 n-iseggasen ɣef tafsut taberkant n 2001 id yeǧǧen ccwami-is deg ixfawen n-leqbayel wakali imi lejruḥ-is mazal ɣman. Imenɣi n-umussu n-leɛrac akked  win n-warrac n-tafsut taberkent  yesenquqel ( ahat i lebda?)  tamuɣli n-imezdaɣ n-tmurt n-leqbayel  ɣer tisertit  imi ɣer wamur ameqqran deg-sen  amennuɣ aserti s- wudem aqbur(akken i t uɣen imeɣnasen n-ssin ikabaren  FFS d RCD d-umussu adelsan amaziɣ-MCB-)   yeǧǧa-t lawan, ttwalint d-abrid ireglen ur nsufuɣ. Maca uqbel a nsuk tamuɣli ɣef  taluft-agi , yelha lemmer ad nneg    ṭelqa ara aɣ-yewwin si tazwara  n-tamsalt  alamma d taggara-s. Anect-a ad yilli   s-lmendad n kra n-tuttriwin ara yillin d-timwelhin i uskasi nebɣa ad neger s-annar teɣzi n-waggur-agi n yibirir  yellan d-amuli n-snat n- tegrawliwin-agi . Ɣef aya  yelha ad nsuter seg tidmiwin-nneɣ aya-gi:  Acu-tt ssebba n   snat n-tafsutin-agi , yellan d yiwen umennuɣ xas ma mgaradent di ṣṣifa? Acu s-wacu id glant i yidles amaziɣ ? Amek  yella  udem n-umennuɣ ɣef timadit tamaziɣt ass-a d-wamek ara yilli azekka?  

 Tamurt n-leqbayel deffir timunent:

 Asmi yeffeɣ uṛumi deg useggas 1962 , tamurt n-Leqbayel yufa-tt-id lḥal tezwi .  Ur yelli id teǧǧa Franṣa seg-s. Amur ameqqran n-tuddar d-leḥwaṛi nhudent , ixxamen rraben, iberdan nexren, irgazen ya yemmut, wa iɛab, wa yenfa… ( hudden ḥerqen yixxamen, nɣan-aɣ izmawen, listiɛmar bu lemḥayen, yeǧǧa-d igujilen) . Ifaden n-tmurt n-leqbayel merra tezwi-ten Fṛansa. Tadamsa( l’économie ) ulac, allalen n-tdawsa ( santé) d-asafar, iɣerbazen  drus maḍi, iberdan  xerben yerna xuṣṣen, Tizi-Wezzu s timad-is tella kan d-Lbilaj …kulci ixus.  Ɣef lexṣaṣ-agi  yenerna llaẓ akked lmiziriya imi  imeḍqan n- lexdma , tafat, aman d-axayel kan  i ten-ttxayalen imezdaɣ n-tmurt imiren. Di Lẓẓayer tamanaɣt aɣbel d-ayen nniḍen. D- amḥizwer ɣer ukersi n-leḥkem gar  GPRA akked tarbaɛt  yellan di Tunes .  Amḥizwer  yesyazeg   tasilit n-lfetna. Widen yezdi umennuɣ ferqen  myuɣalen d-icenga, s ddaw tiṭ i ttemyaxẓaren.  Snat n-trabuyaɛ banent-d : tin n-Tlemcen ddaw tacdac-t n-Benbela, tin n-Tizi-Wezzu ddaw  leɛnaya n  Hocine Ait Ahmed . Maca lkil n-limizan imal ɣer terbaɛt n-Tlemcen acku  iserdasen-is d wid id  yekkan si tilist n Tunes (yellan ddaw leḥkem n Houari Boumedienne) . Isardasen-agi ur ten-issum ara umenuɣ akked  Franṣa, yerna    ttuhaggen akken ilaq , begsen akken iwata ɣer yimenɣi.  Ma yella d tarbaɛt n Tizi-Wezzu tsened ɣef yimjuhad id yesgra ṭrad akked  Fṛansa. Tufa-ten-id tagnit aɛyen, ifaden kkawen.  Rrnu ɣef anect-a  tadyant n war amsefhem gar ssin imdebren n tmurt n leqbayel n yimiren  Krim Belkacem akked Hocine Ait Ahmed imi temgared tmuɣli-nsen ɣef amek ara yilli umennuɣ mgal lbaṭṭel id teddun akken  yesbur tacḍaḍt-is ɣef tmurt wakali. Ahat amennuɣ, ɣef akken id qqaren yimsenqaden  n-unemzruy,  ɣef tugdut d tilelli   txesr-it tmurt n-leqbayel uqbel timunent s timad-is imi irgazen-is iṣaḥen, izemren ad qazmen taswiɛt,  am Amirouche, Abane Remdane, Ali Mellah d-waṭas nniḍen,  ɣlin d-imeɣrasen  uqbel a tefru lgira. Deg aya tamurt n leqbayel tenzef irekeli. Tidyanin am “ l’opération jumelle” ur d ǧǧin kra   deg  tanezmert tesɛa niqal( lawan n-trad akked urumi) tmurt n-leqbayel. D-anect-a d wayen nniḍen ( lexdaɛ, wer amsefhem gar imeɣnasen )  i-yeǧǧan tamurt n-leqbayel a tteknu i  lweɛd , xas ulama teɛrreḍ amek ara terr aman ɣer tiregwa-nsen  ddaw tacḍaḍt n-ukabar n-FFS deg useggas n 1963. Iswiyen yeḍfeṛ imiren ukabar n tirni n-iɣalen  inemlayen ( FFS) d-aressi n-tugdut akked izerfan n- umdan d tilelli n-tidet di  tmurt n Lẓẓayer  wakali.   Meɛna xas lebɣi yella, ifaden ulac. Amenuɣ ifuk s  tweṭṭfa n- Mass Hocine Ait Ahmed ɣef lḥebs. Yemmut win yemuten di trad-nni, yettujeggeḥ win yettujegḥendi lwan  deg  daxal uderbuz n tsertit   llant-d lemcawrat gar akabar FLN akked FFS  ɣef wamek ara  tefru  tamselt-nni . Maca ur iɛaṭel-ara yezzi-d Boumedienne d-tarbaɛt-is ɣef uselway amenzu n tigduda n Lezzayer  Benbela, iɣedel-it azekka-wen-nni  n luffaq id yellan akked ukabar n FFS di 19 juin 1965.

 Seg assen treṣa tasnaṛeft ( dictature) n-ukabar awḥid ( FLN) iman-is ɣef ukersi n-leḥkem . Ddaw leḥkem n Boumedienne tamurt tesbekt deg-s tsertit. Yekfa lmenṭad. Isaggasen n-tugdi delqen ussu-nsen ɣef tigduda.  Tamurt telḥa s-lebɣi n-yiwen urgaz :  Boumedienne.

 Xas akken yerwel Hocine Ait Ahmed si lḥeb-s , akabar n FFS yekcem tudert tuffirt. Krim Belkacem yettwenɣa( 1970), Boudiaf Yenfa, iɣmisen wakali fkan annuz i udabu isedduyen timsal yecqan  tmurt s-uzal akked tugdi ddaw leɛnaya n-wayen umi qqaren imiren asqamu agrawliw ( consiel de la revolution) . Akabar n FLN yesenta tuccar-is tirni , armi ulac acu i-izemran ad yeḍṛu neɣ ad yennulfu mebla rrda n-ukabar-agi. Tamurt tesburr talaba n-tinemla tulmist( socialisme spécifique) . D-anecta-agi yak  id yufraren  armi d-tagara  n- isaggasen n 60. Maca di ttnaṣfa n-iseggasen  n 70 bdant timsal tenfufuden-t.  Tuɣalen waman ɣer lǧedra n-useklu n- umennuɣ ɣef izerfan  d-wayen  yeqnen ɣer-sen . S-tufra, s-lemḥadra s-ttawil n ccna  akked isefra d-tisɣunin i teddun ddew  uffus  amenuɣ aserti yuɣal-d s-annar maca tikelt-a s-wudem nniḍen . lmeqṣud n-umenuɣ-agi  d tigrin  s-annar  askasi  mačči kan   tikti n tugdut  d-izerfan n-umdan  imi ayen si ara d-yeglu aḥerkal n-isagassen n 70  d-tamselt n-nekwa n-tmurt yeqqimen tettuɛalaq seg asmi feclen igrawliyen iqbaylien  n-umusu aɣelnaw ( mouvement national ) imesmaziɣen( berbérites) n-iseggasen n 1940/1950 am Benai Ouali, Mbarek Ait Menguellet, Ouamrane Idir, Laimeche Ali , Ali Yahya Rachid , Hocine Ait Ahmed ,Amar Ould Hamouda….

 Yettkemil  

 Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 D amezyan, Matoub Lounès yettagi ad yeqbel ayen ur sen-yehwi ara. Ur yettagad yiwen, ayen s wayes ur ituqqenneɛ ara wallaɣ-is ur t-ixeddem ara, xas akken array-is yesɛedday-it, deg kra n tikwal, deg teswiɛin d tiberkanin, yessawaḍ-it ɣer lmut. Tinna yerran tilas i wussan-is ass n 25 di yunyu 1998 di Tala Bounane. Tilelli d kullec i Lwennas. D nettat i d tafat, d tudert. Amdan icekkel ddin, tasertit, ansayen, d wayen nniḍen ur ten-ettaǧǧa ara ad d-yini ayen s yehwan, neɣ ad s-yeddu i dunnit akken s yehwa. Tilelli i Lwennas mači d awal kan. Lukan akka i tella, tili tamurt terra-d “tilelli”-ines di 62 «62 ma ad sen-ecfu, nɣil d amzeyyed n lehna, nerfed leɛlam la ncennu, aqlaɣ nsufeɣ Fransa, Bu waɛmam assen id-ten-ettu, yezreɛ burekku, yenṭeḍ di mkul tama…”

 Lounes ur icud ara tilelli ɣer tmunnent, acku tamurt-is, tamurt-nneɣ tseɣli azaglu tsers fell-as Fransa di 62, maca ddel lak d lbatel mazal qehren imdanen yettɣennin mi teffeɣ Fransa. Imenɣi n wegdud, idammen-is yuzlen deg wennar n tegrawla, lbaṭel yesɛedda, deg usirem akken ad yeffeɣ ɣer tafat, ur d-eglin ara s wayen yettmenni: Tilelli d tugdut. Adabu d aɛdaw-is. D netta i yugin tamaziɣt, tutlayt-is, tilelli n wawal, n llebsa d wayen nniḍen, d netta daɣen i yerran aɣummu ɣef umezruy-is akken ad iḥettem fell-as tiɛurrebt lak tinneslemt yugi ar almi d asmi yemmut. S usefru neɣ melba, Matoub yeqqar-ed, melba tugdi, ayen yellan deg wallaɣ-is, srid. Iɛdawen-is yettebdar-iten-id s yissem-nsen. Mi yečča tiyita seg ifassen-nsen, tin yettaǧan, yal tikkelt, deg-s cama ur n- ḥellu, ad d-yejmeɛ ifadden-is, ad d-yesbed lqed-is, akken ad iqabel ixṣimen-is, iɛdawen n tmusni d tlelli d wayen yak icebhen tudert. Asmi yella d aqrur, yugi ad yelmed taɛrabt deg uɣerbaz, asmi d imeqqer yufa-d amek ara ihareb ɣef tutlayt-is akken ur tettuɣal ara deg wemkan-is taɛrabt. Abrid yextar, ur yeshil ara, wayeḍ-nniḍen deg wemkan-is ur yeggar ara ameckaḍ n zyada ɣer zdat mi bḍen-t tlufa ɣer tudert-is, ad yerr aḍar melba axemmem. Netta yedhem abrid-is ar almi rran tilist i wussan-is.

 Lwennas, yuɣalen d azamul n tlelli, yecna daɣen ɣef lejdud-is, ɣef tayri, iɣeblan n dunnit, d wid n tudert-is. ɣef umezruy yessefra. ɣef imusnawen snegren iṣeggaden n tmusni yenna-d awal-is d tmuɣli-s. S leǧher yewwi-d asefru akken ad yessaki wid yeṭsen, akken daɣen ad d-yini ayen ttxemmimen wiyyaḍ deg tsusmi. Maca akken d-yenna deg wawal-is “ ma d ṛsas I iyneqqen, ur mmuteɣ ara”. Xas akken tafekkas terka ddaw wakal, maca isem-is, tizlatin-is mazal-iten ur muten ara. Ur ttmettaten ara.

<p style="text-align: right;">

  Fatiha K. 

  
 I lmend n wass aɣelnaw n yimeɛḍar i d-irezzun yal 14 deg wayyur n meɣres, aṭas n tdukkliwin i igan leqdicat igerrzen. Deg temnaḍin yemgaraden deg tmurt, llan wid yesfuglen ass-nni deg wass-is, llan wid i t-yessihlen seld mi zrin fell-as kra n wussan. D annect-n dɣa i tga Tdukkla n Yimeɛḍar n At Mensur Afus Iserrḥen, n twilayt n Tubiret, di tazwara n ddurt iɛeddan. Tiddukkla-a i d-ilulen deg taggara n 2014 i wakken ad teqdec i lfayda n yimeɛḍar n taddart-nsen, ur tunif ara i ttiɛad-nni, ur t-teǧǧi ad ifut war ma texdem leqdic-is. Ahil i d-yellan deg tmeɣra-nni d anesbaɣur seg yal tamiwin n uheggi. Mbeɛd tigawin timezwura n userḥeb s yinebgawen d uttḥesses i yimseɣret (hymne) aɣelnawn metwal ttesɛa n tnezzayt, tettunefk tegnit i uselway n tdukkla n tɣiwant n At Mensur Mass Rabiɛ Bacuc ad d-yini awal-is i wid iḥeḍren. Syin, d limam n lǧameɛ Mass Bumeqwaz Farid i d-yennan ula d netta awal-is i yimeɛḍar i tuɣ dinna. Deffir wawalen n uselway d limam, tewweḍ-d nnuba n umezgun d tmedyezt d urmuy (monologue), s tceqquft n umezgun i d-turar terbaɛt Ixulaf, d yisefra i d-yewwi Mass Ɛadel Bacuc i yimeɛḍar akked urmuy sɣur Mass Ɛli Merzuq. Iɛeggalen n tdukkla n yimeɛḍar fkan 113 n warrazen i yimeɛḍar s tɣawsiwin iwumi tteḥwiǧin am tkalicin, tiḥuyak, tisumtiwin n nnefs&amp;hellip,; atg. Terna tbudd 67 n tangiwin i wid i asen-yefkan afus n tallelt akken ad yemmag ttiɛad-nni, d kra n yinebgawen iberraniyen i d-yerzan seg yidigan yemxalafen. Gar-asen tanemhalt n DAS Massa Saliḥa Ḥerkat d kra n wudmawen nniḍen. Mi qrib ad yekfu wahil dayen, yefka-d uselway n tdukkla, i tikkelt tis snat awal-is n taggara. Ma d tigawt taneggarut metwal 13:sr d iɣimi i tuččit n yingulen d tissit n tgazuzin. «Iɛedda akken iwata ttiɛad i d-nhegga. Numer aṭas imi d-iban lferḥ deg wudmawen n yimeɛḍar, acku d win i d iswi-nneɣ. Numer daɣen imi aṭas n yinebgawen i d-nenced ama seg tɣiwant-nneɣ, neɣ seg berra, rran-d i tiɣri». I aɣ-d-yenna Mass Ɛadel Bacuc, yiwen seg yiɛeggalen n Tdukkla n Yimeɛḍar n At Mensur. Ad d-nebder kan dakken leqdic n tmeɣra-a iwennɛen, mmeslayen-d fell-as ula deg umaṭṭaf n Tubiret, i yellan dinna akken ad d-yessaweḍ srid isalli i yimsefliden. Anda i d-yemmeslay uselway n Tdukkla d kra n yiɛeggallen-is. Afud ijehden i Tdukkla n Yimeɛḍar n At Mensur Afus Iserrḥen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi  

<div> 
  
 Mazal ar ass-a taluft n lexlas n tfaṭurin n trisiti tettenfufud. Deg yiwen n usarag i d-yellan deg yimalas yezrin, imḍebber amenzu n tkebbanit-a deg twilayt n Tubiret yefka-d yiwen n rrabul lqayen ɣef liḥalat tettidir tmehla i yessedduy. Ɣef leḥsab n yimeslayen-is, azal n 43 n yimelyaren n yidinaren i tettalas tkebbanit, d tadrimt i yesɛewqen acḥal d asenfar. Awal wwint-id yimḍebbren n tamiwin n Tubiret, yal wa seg tama-s, anda i d-fkanleḥsab n tfaṭurin ur nettwaxelles ara. Maca, amur ameqqran tewwi-t tama n M’chedallah anda kra n tudrin bubbent ṭṭlabataẓayant. Tigi d tid i iḥuzant tedyanin n tefsut taberkant mi akken gguman yimdanen ad xellsentifaṭurin-a. D yiwen n rray i ikemmlen almi tuɣal ṭṭlaba tekka nnig n tezmert n yimezdaɣ. D acu kan, ɣef leḥsab dima n yimḍebber-a, aṭas n yimdanen i d-ibeggnen lebɣi-nsen i wakken ad xellsen tifaṭurin-a sujrad n yiwen n letfaq ara yilin i lmend n tezmertneɣ ahat n tjarnant n umezdaɣ. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> S. M 

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis 09 tuber, aɣerbaz alemmas Lɛerbi At Ɛmer n At Yanni, iga timlilit i deg ḥedren inelmaden, iselmaden, wid isedduyen tanemhalt, iɛeggalen n tdukliwin tidelsanin d wid n tɣiwant.

 Wigi meṛṛa rzan-d i demma n usenmer d ubuddu n warrazen i yinelmaden ittekkin deg temsizzelt n tsekla tis 05 i d-thegga tnemhalt n yidles n tizi-wezzu gar 06 ar 19 cutember, umi qqaren “Taɣuri s Wurar”.

 Tin yewwin arraz amenzu n temsizelt-agi d yiwet si tnelmadin n uɣerbaz agi n At Yanni. Tagi d Ǧennan Milisa, teqqar deg weswir wis 4 (4éme AM). Tettekki di temsizelt-agi umi fkan asentel “sebrireḥ ttexmam-ik”.  

 Yal anelmad yettekkin di temsizelt agi iwwi arraz n usebɣes. Am wakken tuɣal tejmilt s warrazen i tselmadin n tmaziɣt n uɣerbaz-agi. 

 Tella-d leqraya n yiwen weḍris i d-yesmektan meṛṛa aya, yerna tettuɛelleq tḥacit (banderole) i yerran azal i temlilit-agi. 

 Arraz-agi i d-tewwi Ǧennan Milisa, hdant d tajmilt i dda Mɛemmer Metref. Imi ad yezgu yedder s yedlisen yura, ad yedder di cfawat n uɣerbaz agi alemmas i deg yella d aselmad, s yin d anemhal. 

 Aɣerbaz alemmas “Lɛerbi At Ɛmer” 

  
 Amezgun s tezwawt mačči d ayen i d-yettuɣalen s waṭas deg ttiɛadad neɣ deg tɣamsa. Mazal txus tfarest-ines (production) deg yal aḥric, ladɣa ɣur yilemẓiyen i yetturaǧun ad d-snulfun ugar deg tẓuri-ya, deg umaḍal-a n tsekla. Dɣa, ula d idlisen n umezgun s tutlayt n Lmulud n Ayt Mɛemmer ur d-teffɣen s ddeqs ma nga aserwes akked wammuden n tullisin, neɣ n tmedyezt, neɣ ulama n wungalen. Bab-as n tẓuriwin, akken i as-ssawalen, nezmer d tidet ad t-nesseqdec d allal n usneɣmes, n urebbi, n ussawki, lemmer ad as-nefk azal i ilaqen akken ad d-ineǧǧeɛ, ad yuɣal s annar n wallaɣen. Deg waya, ulac abrid i iwulmen ugar ala win n tdukkliwin ; d tineggura-ya i ilaq ad t-id-nejrent s lebɣi i yilemẓiyen akk i yessaramen ad ddmen asenfar i ttuɣ yeddem Muḥend Uyeḥya, awi-d ukan ad yettwarar umezgun s tutlayt tayemmat n mmi-s n yidurar. Dɣa, deg wassan n umezgan deg taẓrigt tis 7, ed iwakken ad muqlent i umezgun-a, ad rrent daɣen tajmilt i win i d-yesnulfan amezgun azwaw, heggant-d kra n tamiwin «arraz Muḥya n umezgun» d amsizwer n tmezgunt igerrzen s tezwawt i yilemẓiyen akked yimɣaren i d-yesnulfayen deg uḥric-a n tsekla. Wid iran ad kkin ilaq kan ad ssiwḍen akaram-nsen (dossier) ɣer Tmehla n Yidles n Tizi Wezzu, Axxam n Umezgun Kateb Yasin, neɣ ɣer Uxxam n Yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer, aya send 31 deg wayyur-a n ṭuber. Ma yella d ttiɛad n temlilit ad yili seg 6 alama d 7 deg wayyur n duǧembr. I wugar n yisallen, qerrbet ɣer walbaɛḍ n yixxamen i d-nebder yakan.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Mazal imezdaɣ n 197 tnezduɣin deg umkan ajdid di tubiret ttrajun tamuɣli n tnemhalt uṣiweḍ ɣef wugur-agi uṣiweḍ imi ur sɛin ara lkiran yettawin ɣer tlemmast n temdint tubiret anda ttafen iɛiwiqen ama di rwaḥ n yimezdaɣ ɣer lecɣal neɣ uxeddim nsen neɣ mi ara d-uɣalin ur , yerna ulac ulac ula s imukan nniḍen yerra ur tebɛid ara ɣer tmanaɣ n tubiret azal 5 ikilumiṭren kan ayagi d ugun i yettmagaren ula d arrac lakul imi ur ttawḍen ara di lawan ɣer uɣerbaz , Meḥsub d aɣbel icuɣben aṭas imdanen n tama-agi ma yella d imdanen yesɛan tikeṛusin ur ttafen ara ugur imi ttruḥun kan di tkeṛusin nsen . Imezaɣ n tama-agi yal ttafen uguren di rwaḥ imi xeddmen leḥsab yal ass i uɣbel-a ladɣa ixeddamen , ɣef ttwalin akken d lawan ɣef tnemhalt uṣiweḍ ad d-afen tifrat deg ussan-agi kan maca ama umbaɛd anda ara mmuden lamaṛ i lkiran ad sawaḍen neɣ ad ttawin seg umkan-a imi allalen uṣiweḍ yettwaḥsab d lsas di yal anegmu .<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  A.M 

  
 Ass n 26 seg waggur n Maggu 1993, Tahar Ǧaɛut iṛuḥ d asfel. S snat n terṣasin deg uqerru i t-wwten wid ur nezmir i tissas d tektiwin n uneɣmas n tlelli. Issufeɣ tarwiḥt ass n 2 yunyu 1993 di sbitar n Baïnem. Tahar Ǧaɛut d aneɣmas, d amedyaz, d amyaru. Ilul ass n 11 yennayer 1954 di taddart n Wulxu deg uẓeffun. Xas ittwassen s tidett qerriḥen i d-yettaru deg yiɣmisen, maca aṭas n yidlisen i d-yessufeɣ: tamedyazt am L’Arche à vau-l’eau di 1978, tullisin am Les Rets de l’oiseleur di 1984, ungalen am Les Chercheurs d’os di 1984, timlilit d Dda Lmulud di 1987, atg. Di tudert-is n yal ass, am akken i t-id-teglem yelli-s, yella d argaz lɛali, ur iqebbel ara lbaṭel d miḥyef. Ass-a zrin 24 n yiseggasen segmi i aɣ-yeǧǧa win iḥerzen tabɣest n tɣamsa. D netta i d-yeǧǧan awal belli tasusmi am lmut, win yeddren ur ilaq ara ad issusem sdat lbaṭel yettwali. Ass-a yeqqim deg wul n kra win iffuden tudert n tlelli, tudert n tugdut. Ǧaɛut yuɣal d azamul n wid iteddun ɣer sdat di tmurt n lezzayer. Acku imla abrid i ugdud-is, yeqqim-asen-d di cfawat-nsen am bu tissas-nni n tmacahut, neɣ agellid n umezruy. Sgunfu di talwit ay amussnaw ilelli.

  Labraoui Sekkoura 

  
 Yella yiwen umdyaz iḥḥaṛ yiwet n teqcict, inna-as i yemma-s ɣur-m taqcict-agi ad tt-tefkeḍ ad teddu d tislit, teεjb-iyi-d ad tili d zzwaj-iw. Terra-as yemma-s n teqcict : yirbaḥ a mmi, kkes aɣbel ad ak-terju. 

 Ar taggara, seg iṛuḥ urgaz-nni ɣer lɣerba, yemma-s n teqcict-nni tɣemmeq tegzem-as amrar d sser, texdeε-it, tefka-tt i wayeḍ.Mi d-yusa si lɣerba umdyaz-nni yufa-d taqcict-nni deg uxxam-is tezwej. Yemma-s n teqcict-nni, yuɣal amzun mačči d win-a, ur tecliε ara akk deg-s. Ssyin iwwi asefru yenna-as:

<p style="text-align: center;"> <em>Aql-i seddaw inijwel</em> 

  <em>Lmekla-w d tizwel</em> 

  <em>Idda-yi usennan weḥd-i </em> 

  <em>Bellak wi ittamnen tuǧǧel</em> 

  <em>D lqewm n teǧǧel</em> 

  <em>Mi as-nnan awal ad t-tefdi</em> 

  <em>Tefka-as-ten deg ufenǧal</em> 

  <em>Ad iṭṭes deg yinijel</em> 

  <em>Alamma ihdeṛ i Rebbi</em> 

 Lḥan acu lḥan iwweḍ-d lweqt ad terbu teqcict-nni, tehlek ulac anda ur tt-wwin ara ur as-d-ufin ddwa. Yemma-s n teqcict temmekta-d amedyaz-nni, tenna-as, ahat, iḍefṛen-tt-id- d wul-is , ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer-s, ad ḍelbeɣ deg-s ad d-yas, ad as-isemmaḥ, ahat ddwa ɣer-s i yella. Assen, yemma-s terǧa alammi iffeɣ urgaz n yelli-s, truḥ tessawel i umedyaz-nni. Iwweḍ-d, yaf-itt-id tettqliliḥ di tesga. Mi tt-iwala akken di liḥala-nni tɣaḍ-it nezzeh yenna-as:

<p style="text-align: center;"><em> Leɛmeṛ ur t-inqis ur t-irad </em>

 <em> A tuzyint wer ttagad </em>

 <em> Seg wul-im kkes ttexmim </em>

 <em> Ay aḥnin ay ajewwad </em>

 <em> A feteḥ muhab </em>

 <em> Tekkseḍ i tuzyint leɣmim </em>

 <em> Taṛwiḥt a tt-a di lḥisab </em>

 <em> Taqcict tenneεtab </em>

 <em> Yettkemmil… </em>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Lasheb Ramdane 

  
 Azemmur d azamul n tmurt n leqbayel, γef aya  tiddukla tadelsant tawwurt n at-γebri n taddert tawwurt, s lemεawna n tesqamut n taddert-agi, taγiwant n Yifiγa, asqamu aγerfan n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu, sudsen-d tazrigt tis 02 n tmeγra n uzemmur i yeldin tiwwura-s tagara n ddurt yezrin ass n 20 furar 2015 γef teγzi n 02 n wussan. Asentel n tfaska n useggas-a « Azemmur ger uγbel d usirem », id-yesduri  uγarbaz amezwaru n taddert n tawwurt, anda i yukkan s nnig n 20 n yemzikniyen id-yussan si temnaḍin yemgaraden n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu. Ahil id-heggan γef dema d amerkanti yerna d amesbaγur, anda llant temzikniyin zzit uzemmur s leṣnaf-is yemgaraden, timliliyin d isaragen anda id-wwin awal imusnawen deg uḥric n tfellaḥt γef azal yesεa uzemmur di temnaḍt leqbayel d wamek ara d-yilli uḥareb fell-as akken ad-teqqim d lγella n lebda, d temzikniyin niḍen n lḥirfat ufus, am talaxt, aẓeṭṭa, d wayen icuden γer useḥbiber γef twenaḍt. Dγa tameddit n wass n 21 furar 2015 yezrin, tessuli tezrigt tis ssnat n tfaska uzemmur s yiwet n tmeγra meqren. Iswi n tfaska-agi d tikci n tebγest d wafud i wuẓẓu n uzemmur akken ad-yenarni yedles n teqbaylit, d tikci n wazal i tgemi. Akken tella d tagnit yelhan i yemdanen akken ad-sεun tamuγli yelhan γef lγella n uzemmur d uḥareb fell-as. Leqdic d win iεeddan di tegnatin yelhan nezzah.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"></span> Islam Bessaci 

  
 ɛedda waggur tura segmi qqimen warrac mebla leqraya s sebba n usunded  n yiselmaden. Agur deg yal teṣebḥit tiḥdayin d warrac  i ten-yettawin ɣer uɣerbaz  i ten-id-yettaren melba almud. Ageffur, aṣemmiḍ , aḍu iɛedda fell-asen, aya melba   ma neseḥseb tadrimt ttṣerifen deg ifurguten  i ten-yeṣṣawaḍen, i ten-id-yettaran s amdiq. Aggur s lekmal-is, tanekra-nsen ɣef setta  neɣ ɛad uqbel ɣef izedɣen tuddrin  ibeɛden ɣef tasnawit akked uɣerbaz alemmas i wakken mi ara wwḍen s amkan  ad afen tiwwura medlent,  iselmaden ččḥen. 

 Aya iḍeru zdat n wallen n yimawlan n yinelmaden-agi. Iḍeru zdat  n wallen n  tneɣlaft n ttrebga , zdat wallen n tiduklwin n yimawlen n yinelmaden. Meɛna xas akka yal yiwen yeẓra yerna iwela , truḥ am akken ḥedd ur d-yecqi deg  ayen akka ttidiren warraw-nneɣ  nefka d asfel  i useḥseb anṣaf n yiselmaden  si tama akked  win n tmuḥaqranit n udabu si tama nniḍen.  Anta akka tamurt deg  yettdum  usendad n yiselmaden ugar n waggur ? Anta akkka tamurt deg adabu ur iferu ara tamselt yecban tagi deg yiwen waas neɣ sin? Anect-a  d ayen  ur iqbel leɛqel am akken i ɣ-t-id-yenna yiwen uɣerman yečča wul-is.  Ayen yerzan teneɣlaft n leqraya d amek ara d-illin ikayaḍen n ukradyur –agi wis sin i teddun ɣer taggara-s.  Amzun akken yella wacu ɣran inelmaden deg ussan-a yezrin ! Amur ameqran seg-sen, ttun tikarniyin-nsen, ttun idlisen-nsen , ḍeqren-ten  akkin amzun wwin ussan n usgunfu. Yerna  xas ma yella uɣalen yinelmaden( deg ussan-a) ɣer leqraya &amp;nbsp,; amek ara yilli lḥal-nsen imi di tilwat  ṭelqa n ulmud dayen tendaq di ttneṣfa. Ilaq ad zrin wussan akken asen-id-yuɣal wul ɣer leqraya. Meɛna anwa yenḥarwan deg anect-a? Xuḍi  tizelgi n ulmud di tmurt-agi mačči n wassa-tt!

 Aɣbel-nneɣ deg aḍris-agi mačči akken a nesḍlem wa neɣ wihin, acku yeqqar wanzi “ wa meɛḍur wayeḍ d lheqq-is.” Aɣbel-nneɣ  i wakken kan ad neger tuttra-agi : “ anda akka ddan imewlan n yinelmaden?  Ayen  ttun lwajeb-nsen mgal dderya-nsen?” Kra seg-sen  sneɛmilen tt-ceyyiɛen arraw-nsen akken ad ɣran deg ussan n usgnufu deg yigarajen s  yedrimen lqider deg ara  nnaɣen akken ad raṣṣin di tmurt lakul izemren ad ileqem tamusni n tidet deg allaɣen  n yinelmaden-neɣ  melba ma rnan  taẓayet n tɣuri-agi n ukamel ( cours suplémentaires) amek aken …. D anect-a ahat i yeǧǧan kra n yiselmaden stehzayen deg uɣerbaz akken ad jmɛan aṭas n yinelmaden ɣer  temsirin ttmuddun( berra n uɣerbaz )  s tedrimt  … akken qqaren tjra  telha  ula deg aɛrur n igujilen ,  awid akn ad tili  tadrimt-ik xas  s uznezi n yeblaḍen . Maca taluft teleqay, lehlak-is d lehlak n tmeti s umata. Timeti  anda grarben ifridisen n yiseɣ, ǧǧan nnuba i yir aserwet akked d yir tikli. Am akken is-yenna Zdek Mouloud deg usefru-ines

 Yiwen akken i d-yuki

 Igiru n lqehwa

 Ccuruq yeldi

 Ziɣemma yeɣra

 Acenfir yulli

 S uqeluẓ n ccemma

 Ɣer deffir yezzi

 Yessusef di lqaɛa

 Yiwen a yettbipi

 Ur as d terra-ara

 …

 Yiwen a yettleɣwi 

 Yefɣed si ttberna

 Yiwen ibeɣlleli

 Txuṣ ẓẓeṭla

 Yiwen qenduri  

 Tezla ɣer lǧama

 Wayeḍ derɣali

 Ɣer ljamiɛa

 Nekni a nettwali

 Ur d nneni kra!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Aït Slimane Hamid  

  
 Iɣsan iqburen n umdan atrar "Homo Sapiens" i d-ufan deg Lmerruk, zemren ad beddlen tikta i nesεa ɣef temhazt talsant (évolution humaine) deg Tefriqt…

 Tagrut-agi (découverte) n 2017, tessembawel timussniwin. Iguraz ilsanen (restes humains) i d- sskeflen deg utaram n Amurakuc swexxren s 100 000 n yiseggasen ubani n telmest-nneɣ (espèce) : ad tuɣal sya d asawen tesɛa 300 000 n yiseggasen. Semmus n yiterrasen, kraḍ imengaḍen, anubi d ugrud n ṣa ar ṭam iseggasen i d-sskeflen. Drus deg-sen, maca ssembawlen timussniwin ɣef umezruy n yirgazen imezwura. Mačči d tifin n yiɣsan-nsen, i d-sskeflen deg udrar Iɣud – Lmerruk (Jebel Irhoud), i yesɛan azal s timmad-nsen, maca d isallen i d-wwin seg-sen anda ssaẓen laṣel n umdan ɣer Ugafa-ataram n tefriqt mi nella nɣall dduḥ n talsa (humanité) yezga-d deg Tefriqt n usamer. Maca s 300 000 n yiseggasen-nnsen, ugaren s waṭas Iɣsan iqburen maḍi n urgaz atrar (Homo sapiens) yettwassnen. Ulac deg-s ccek : aqadum n « Irɣud 10 » yiwen deg semmus n yiterrasen i d-ufan deg wadeg amerruki, ibeggen-d belli mačči d argaz amezwaru yessqedcen times (Homo erectus) u mačči d argaz amezwaru i iɛacen deg Tuṛuft d Asya (Néandertalien), maca d argaz atrar (Homo sapiens). Adeg n udrar Iɣud, ufan-t i tikkelt tamezwarut deg 1961. Llant deg-s aṭas n yidrizen (traces) n useqdec n tmes. Ixefawen n yifecka yerɣan, fkan-d tagnit i yimussnawen i wakken ad kecfen leɛmer n yimsukfilen (fossiles) s yiwet tetwilt (technique) yettektilin ilikṭrunen deg twerdamin (minéraux) mi ara yili ttwasseḥmant yakan. Ɣer tama n yiɣsan-agi, uffan-d daɣen iguraz n yiɣersiwen d yifecka yettwassnen deg temnaḍin-nniḍen n tefriqt. Ayagi ibeggen-d afraq n telmest deg yiwet n tallit ɣef yal umenẓaw (continent) n tefriqt. Tagrut-agi tameqrant n umnadi deg temhazt talsant (paléoanthropologue) Jean-Jacques Hublin akked d terbaɛt-is, teffeɣ-d deg tesɣunt n tussna « Nature » ass n 07 yunyu 2017.

  T. Umaziɣ 

  
 Tanzayt n wass-nni n 1u n wunbir i iεeddan, snat n tuddar seg tudrin n tɣiwant n Ait Assia Mimoun gant timeceḍt n ḥartadem. Tuddar-agi d Iɣil n Wuccen d taddart n Uqawej. Imi deg taddart n Uqawej zlan aseggas-agi 9 n yizgaren, acku d taddart meqqren aṭas. Ma deg taddart n Yiɣil n Wuccen zlan 4 n yizgaren. Ma yella deg taddart n At Ttxelfat zlan kan yiwen n uzger ass-nni n lğemεa 04/11/2016, imi taddart-agi meẓẓiyet aṭas aṭas.Tuddar-agi, mazal ṭṭfent deg wansayen iqdimen, i d-ğğan lejdud-nneɣ. Ma d iswi n lewziεat-agi n ḥartadem, ɣef wakken i d-qqaren yimɣaren, xedmen-tent i lmend n tfelaḥt, ssuturen deg Sidi Rebbi ad d-tili ṣṣaba deg nneεma, ad d-yessew wakal s waman n ugeffur, ad issebεed tiwaɣiyin n twenaḍt. Am wakken neẓra belli lewziεa tesεa azal d ameqqran deg tmetti taqbaylit, ama zik ama tura. D tagnit ideg ttemlilin medden, imi yezmer lḥal aseggas ur ttemyagaren ara, imi yal yiwen yelha kan deg ccɣel-is, am wakken qqaren zik: “ temmlal tasa d way turew”. D tagnit daɣen ideg ttemεawanen yimdanen gar-asen, imi yal yiwen ad yexdem ayen iwumi yezmer. D ass ur necbi wiyaḍ, imi taddart si rrif armi d rrif ad tečč akk yiwen n yimensi s uksum, am ugellil am unesbaɣur, yiwet n lmakla ara ččen. D tagnit anida tettnerni tegmat, anida daɣen ttiğhidden wassaɣen gar yimezdaɣ n yal taddart. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

<div> 
  
 Tuɣal tberḥ-d ussan-agi iɛeddan tneɣlaft n usegmi aɣelnaw Mass Benghabrit Nouria, belli ad ad tili tegnit tis snat i uɛiwed n ukayad n taggara n uswir n tesnawit, yettwasnen s yisem n BAC, seg 13 alamma d 17 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, mebɛed mi d-tenna aniqal deg wussan imenza n waggur n cutenber. Leḥsab n wid ur nesɛeddi ara akayad-agi deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yewweḍ ɣer 2 558 n yisnawiyen, alaḥsab n yisallen ineggura i d aɣ-id-yewwḍen seg Tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya-agi. Gar 2 558 i izeglen akayad-agi, llan deg-sen 392 n yinelmaden iɣurbizen (wid yeqqaren deg tesnawit), ma d leḥṣab n yinelmaden imunan (ileliyen) yewweḍ ɣer wazal 2 166. Inelmaden-agi, ad ɛiwden, ad sɛeddin akaya-d-agi deg 9 n wulmisen n yikayaden, yellan deg tlemmast n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, am wakken daɣen ara d-ilin ɣef lmendad-nsen wazal n 1 000, gar yiselmaden akked yimɛiwen n usegmi. Ma ttiɛad n tririt n yigemmaḍ, ad d-yili sya ɣer taggara n waggur-agi, ama i wid i sɛeddan tikkelt tamezwarut i d-yellan gar 11 alamma 15 seg yunyu iɛeddan, ama i wid ara i sɛeddin deg tegnit-agi tuzzigt ara d-yilin seg wass n lexmis d afella.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Teḍṛa-tt d tira n Muḥya akked leqdic-ines am tneqlet-nni n webrid, win kan i d-iɛeddan ad ixarref. Akka dɣa seg-mi yemmut, yuɣal wayla-s d carraɛ neɣ d lmecmel . Kra n win, yenwan iman-is d amuggay( dramaturge) neɣ d amsufeɣ( metteur en scène) yettnadin ɣef taceqquft umezgun ad yazzel ɣer ukufi n Muḥya akken ad yeddem , la ccwer la ḥezzeb. Zzun akken ayen yura Muḥya d ayla n taddart ur nesɛi bab. Awal ɣer wayeḍ ad ak inin at imalwayen-agi ,yedman imextafen, yenwan taẓuri d tazemmurt, cerw-tt-id kan ak id-tefk iɛeqqayen: “d tajmilit i nebɣa as nner i Muḥya deg akken i t-nettɛuzzu. Nekni nettnadi ad nerfed isem-is akken yiwen ur t-itettu.” Xuḍi nutni ayen i ten- yecqan d tadrimt( tin n les subventions id ttawin s ya d s ya) ara d skecmen ɣef ɛrur n win yefnan tudert akken ad yerr lɛez i wawal n teqbaylit. Di tudert-is deg leɛmer inuda ad iɣalet ayen id yesnnulfa , neɣ ad yessekcem asurdi s wayen id yesqucceḍ deg tibḥatin n tsekla d isefra, d tullizin neɣ tinfusin. 

 Mačči kan d aya , ula d-asmi yedder mačči yufa-d iman-is ɣer rrif , ɛezlen-t widak is yeqqaren nekni tura dayen nessaweḍ? Meɛna deg akken sellaw yifer n iwezlanen-agi, yebɣan temɣer xas bessif, uɣalent timseḍsay timucuha-nsen ! 

 Tefra-tt d Muḥya am Muḥ n Muḥ-nni yedman aqabac xas yeẓra si zik tabaɛ ulac. Muḥ n Muḥ swan tid-is isihranen, Muḥya swan tidi n lmux-is ideɣṛan n tẓuri. Acu- n tajmilit i-ilaqen i Muhya nnig aḥarreb ɣef leqdic-is. Niqal nniɣil u leqrar kra yura, d kra yexdem ad yuɣal deg adlisen ara icebḥen tinedlisin( librairies) tinkeṛḍiyin( bibliothèques), ziɣemma iqerrs-aɣ wul nekni s iyennat-en –agi! Netterggu anṣib deg ixmir. Teḍṛa-tt yid-nneɣ am win yebɣan ad yeṭṭeḍ ilili , neɣ am win yejguglen deg ufruk ameclux. 

 Akkin akka , zzhir yeṭṭuqet. Kra nwan yisen i tbedd tmurt, kra ɣilen ma ɣaben ad yeɣli igenni, kra sefruyen ad awin tilelli, kra tt-ggalen ur ḥenten ad ɣeḍlen lbaṭṭel, yal wa anwa amendayer yesseḥma akken aɣ yezuzen. Netta ziɣ teḍṛa-tt yid-nneɣ am akken is yenna Lounis Ait Menguellet : “nettnadi ɣef tisura / tawwurt werɛad i tt-nufi!”

 Susem kan a wlidi! Id yenna Muḥya. Yak Ṛebbi aɛziz lebṣel qerreḥ, ulamma iggiru yezga ɣef yimi ur nxeddem ara lbulitik nekni.Ala nexḍa yerna ur neččiḥ-ara! Awin i lḥun deg yid a win ilḥun deg uzal…xas tettban teqreb, ur ttamen, inni mazal!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Aït Slimane Hamid  

  
 “D ccbaḥa n teẓgi, tin ur nennum amdan, i yirran lewhi n Yuba d Tiliwa (tawacult tabestuḥt) iwelleh ɣur-s. Dɣa yal tikelt i deg ara qesden asikel neɣ aḥewwes, d uguren i ten-immugren : yal acuriq iqubel-it undeqqac. Maca, anect-a ur yirri lebɣi n yiman deg rrif. Yal andeqac yewi-d aɣbel, yal aɣbel yewwi-d amennuɣ, yal amennuɣ yewwi-d tifrat ; leɛtab a d-yawi asteɛfu. Anda tifrat tessaweḍ sin n wassaḍen-a deg yiwen usikel ɣer leslak n Nunda, tilemẓit yettwaḍelmen, i bɣan yemcumen ad rren deg-s ttar. D amennuɣ i tezdeg d tayri, ger wussan semmḍen deg teẓgi.”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Tukkist seg usebtar aneggaru 

  
 Tanelmadt Moussaoui Melissa, n uɣerbaz alemmas Akli Amar n tɣiwant n Wizgan, tufrar-d deg umḍiq amezwaru di lwilaya n Tizi-WUzzu deg ukayad n uswir wis sin B.E.M s ugemmaḍ 18,93 di leɛmer-is 14 n yiseggasen. Tanelmadt Melissa, d yelli-s n taddart n At-ɛica taɣiwant n At-Yeǧǧar. Tlul ass n 23 yulyu 2002, aswir-is amezwaru telmed-it deg uɣerbaz amezwaru Buda Muḥend Saɛid n temdint n Wizgan, syin tuli ɣer uswir wis sin, telmed deg uɣerbaz alemmas Akli Amar n temdint n Wizgan. Dɣa tanelmad-agi Melissa Moussaoui, tfures aṭas tagnit ɣer imawlan-is deg ulmud-is, imi nutni d iselmaden di sin deg uswir wis sin. Melissa tessaram akken ad tkemmel amecwar-is yelhan deg ulmud, akken ad d-teffeɣ d tamejjayt. Syin terra tajmilt meqqren ama imawlan-is, ama i yiselmaden-is i ibedden aṭas ɣer yidis-is, u dayen I tt-yeṣṣawḍen texdem agemmaḍ-agi yelhan u tḥar-d amḍiq amenzu. I usmekti kan, uletma-s n Melissa, Dihya Moussaoui tḥella-d amḍiq amezwaru di lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu deg ukayad n B.E.M deg useggas n 2002, s ugemmaḍ 18,39.Nesaram-as i Melissa afud igerrzen di leqraya-s d umecwar yelhan di tudert-is, imi leqraya d tafat n ddunit.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ɣef wamek ẓran yimdanen, aṭas n Yiferkanen at teglimin tiberkanen i d-ikecmen tamurt seg wacḥal d aseggas tura. Ɣas ma llan ur caḍen ara, maca simmal irennu yettzid umḍan-nsen armi uɣalen ttwamẓaren deg qeddac n yidigan. Ladɣa deg yiberdan ansi ttɛeddayen lɣaci, imi ssuturen deg-sen tallelt n tuččit neɣ n tedrimt. Ɣas ma Iferkanen-a, ttuneḥsaben d iberraniyen gar tarwa n tmurt, lameɛna ineggura-a wulfen-ten degmi zgan ttwalin-ten. Acu kan, iban-d d akken iberkan-nni ur qqimen ara kan deg yiberdan, maca uɣalen ttawin iḍarren-nsen ula ɣer tudrin. Dɣa, aya yeḍra-d ussan-a deg temnaḍt n Ayt Smaɛel, i ibeɛden s wazal n 70 n yikilumiṭren seg waɣir n Bgayet, mi d-kecmen kra n Yiferkanen ɣer taddart, lfan tiferkiwin n yimezdaɣ. « Wehmeɣ ussan yezrin mi walaɣ deg tferka n yiwen seg taddart-nneɣ tameṭṭut d taberkant tbubb agrud, tettekkes rreman ɣas werɛad yewwa swaswa, teggar deg teckart war ma tcawer bab-is! ». I aɣ-d-tenna yiwet d Tasmaɛlit. D ayen i d-yessegzayen belli d ccer i d-yewwin Iferkanen ad lfun ayla n wayeḍ. Imi qqaren: “laẓ d akafer, win yelluẓen ad iker”. Daymi imezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel ur ɛriḍen ara, ad menɛen i Yiferkanen-nni ad nnalen igumma n ṭṭjur-nsen. Aha d ayen i iɛejben i yiberraniyen-a, yeǧǧa-ten ad qqimen deg temnaḍt n Ayt Smaɛel. Armi uɣalen mmeẓren leḥḥun sdat tḥuna, tama n yimezdaɣ. Kra seg Yismaɛliyen yusa-asen-d uḥulfu n uɣiḍi i Yiferkanen-a i d-yeggran deg ucali akken kan ad afen ayen ara ččen, neɣ anda ara sɛeddin uḍan. Kra-nniḍen, d akukru i d-yerzan ɣur-sen, imi tilin n yiberkanen-a, ttuggaden ad d-teglu s wayen ur nelhi.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Akken ẓran wid akk yeṭṭafaren tilufa n udlis, tettwaldi di Lezzayer tamaneɣt, ass n 26 deg ṭuber iɛeddan, rreḥba tagraɣlant tis 22 n udlis, ara yekfun ass n 5 deg unbir-a. Am dima, ur iban ma tettmagga tedwilt akken ad ternu ccan i umeskar d udlis, neɣ akken kan ad teg kra n leswaq n tedrimt n wa d winna. Aya, acku tuget n yimeskaren, i d-yessufuɣen ladɣa ɣef ddemma-nsen, ur ufin tawwurt tettwaldin ma bɣan ad ssisnen ayla-nsen neɣ ad mlilen imeɣriyen, meskud ur sɛin tadrimt swayes ara xellsen timeḍqatin n uzzenz. Rnu, ula d wid i d-yessufuɣen ɣer teẓrigin, ur teɣzif nnuba-nsen din ugar n sin neɣ kraḍ n wussan. « Ttruḥuɣ tikwal d aḥewwas ɣer rreḥba-a n udlis deg tmaneɣt, maca werǧin ufiɣ tsaḥ-iyi-d tegnit iwulmen ad zzenzeɣ ayen uriɣ ». D awal n yiwen n umeskar amunen. Ahat mačči s waṭas n wawalen ara yegzu yiwen liḥala ma neẓra belli ula d imaẓragen, ččan tiyita seg tsertit n rreḥba-a n udlis, anef ɛad ihi amaru ayiwen. « Ula aseggas-a, iban-iyi-d ur ttiliɣ deg SILA. Ur sɛiɣ idrimen ad xellseɣ amḍiq n tnezzut i yeɣlayen mačči d kra ». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n umaẓrag seg Bgayet. Di lawan ihi ideg adlis yettili yal aseggas d asentel n rreḥba n udlis, nezmer ad d-nini mazal ur yettunefk i umaru umkan-is, netta war-is ur ttnuḥent tira. Deg waya, ulamma kkin seg tɣemmar yemxalafen ddeqs n yixxamen n usiẓreg s wayen i d-ssaẓragen, ayendin n yimeskaren ara iɣiben i tikkelt-nniḍen ɣef tegnit-a i d-yessemlalayen imḥemmalen n udlis. 

  M. K. 

  
 Tamaziɣt, d awal i d-yemmalen tutlayt i ttmeslayen ugdud amaziɣ di tama n Ugafa n Tefriqt, am wakken i d-yemmal idles, amezruy d tsekla n uɣref yimaziɣen s umata. Awal-a n tamaziɣt ɛziz ɣur-nneɣ mačči d izli, acku yuɣal d azamul n tfenṭazit, tidet, tissas d lḥerma, tutlayt n tyemmat, idles … Dayen i yeğğan imawlan-is ad as-gen amur deg uḥric n tsekla timawit d tin n tira (inzan, icewiqen, tamedyazt, timucuha, timsaԑraq …) .Acu kan ass-a, tamaziɣt teḥwağ tira i wakken ad d-teqqim i tsutwin (générations) i d- teddun ɣer sdat. D ayen i yeğğan dda Mulud At Mԑemmer ad d-yini yiwen wawal s wazal-is, imi yeqqar deg-s: «Win yebɣan tamaziɣt, ad yissin tira-s.» Amek nettwali tamaziɣt deg uɣerbaz Azzayri mebɛed 20 n yiseggasen n uselmed-is S umata?. Acu n wuguren i d-temmuger s umata di 20 n yiseggasen-a yezrin?. Tura ma nmuqel ɣer cwiṭ-agi, yellan deg tallit-a ideg nella, ad-d-naf uguren d imeqqranen deg uḥric n uselmed, ad-d-nadder seg-sen: Deg tazwara, ad-d-nebder ugur i d-ttemlilin iselmaden akked kra n yinelmaden, acku ɛeddan-d, yineggura-a, ɣer tesnawit , werğin ɣran tamaziɣt, ama deg uɣerbaz amezwaru neɣ uɣerbaz alemmas .Ugar n waya aṭas seg-sen ur ssinen la tira, wala timawit. Ugur ameqqran ɣer yinelmaden iɛerbawalen ala tutlayt n taɛrabt i swayes i ttmeslayen, ala tin-a igezzun (fehmen). Tamentilt n waya, imi ur tt-lmiden ara la deg uɣerbaz amenzu, wala deg uɣerbaz alemmas, yerna ttekkin ula d imawlan deg wugur-. Deg tis snat, ad-d-ncud asentel n uɣbel n wahil d yidlisen n leqraya, dima deg tesnawit, ad-d-naf d yiwen wahil i d-iɛawden, ulac deg-s amaynut. D ahil-nni n uɣerbaz alemmas i d-iɛawden deg tesnawit, yerna d isenfar-nni, d timsirin-nni n wahil n uɣerbaz alemmas i d tid n tesnawit. Mebla ma nettu aɣbel n yidlisen, imi deg tesnawit ur nessexdam ara adlis aɣurbiz, acimi? .Acku ahil uselmed deg tesnawit ur iwulem ara ayen yellan deg yidlisen-a. Deg tis kraḍet, ihi mi ara as-nɛeddi i wugur-agi, anelmad ur yeḥwağ ara kan tira-ines, neɣ xerṣum ad yissin ad-tt-yemmeslay (timawit) , neɣ ad yissin kan Amezruy-is,. Acu kan d lawan ad yelmed s tutlayt n tmaziɣt ; acuɣer ur ilemmed ara Amezruy s tmaziɣt? Neɣ tarakalt, tafelsafit d tiyaḍ s tutlayt n teyemmat. Acuɣer d tutlayin- nniḍen i yuɣen amekkan deg uselmed? Amedya d asexdem n tutlayt n taɛrabt deg kraḍ n yeswiren-a, ma deg tesdawit d tafransist i yuɣen amekkan-i ?. Acuɣer ur ttmeslayen ara yinelmaden s tmaziɣt, ama deg tneɣrit, deg unnar n uɣerbaz, akked unemhal…atg?. Tamaziɣt teḥwağ aṭas n rray (rray ibnnun, mačči win yetthuddun), ilaq-as aṭas n uxeddim ɣer sdat, teḥwağ ad ddukklen iɣallen, imi akken qqaren imezwura :«Yiwen n ufus ur yekkat ara lkeff». <span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> ADAOUN Abdelghani 

  
 D tikkelt tis snat aya i d-tuwi tdukkla iqeddcen ilmend n yimuḍan n tgeẓẓal deg Tizi Wezzu, asarag deg uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mɛemmer ass n ahad 04 deg mayyu 2016 , akken ad ẓren yakk yimdanen belli tikci n tegẓelt seg umdan yeddren , neɣ s tfekka n win ixeddmen tawaɣit maci d ayen yellan d lmuḥal imi ilaq ad kksen axemmem-nni n diri , bɣan ad d-segzun i lɣaci a,leqqem n tegẓelt seg umdan ɣer wayeḍ ur yeḥwaǧ ara lxuf wala akukru imi imejjayen-agi d –yemmeslayen ama d mass Belɛasla, ama D Badawi d wiyaḍ, nnan-d ur ttagadet ara aqlaɣ ilmend –nwen ! , llan wid yeḥlan nduwa-ten ur d-yelli kra n wugur , yerna win ur neẓri ara d acu ara yexdem ad iruḥ ɣer tdukkla –agi ad as-mlen d acu ara yexdem sani ad iruḥ , ula d win ur nesɛi ara adrim swayes ara idawi, ad t-ɛiwnen imi aselway n tɣiwant n Tizi Wezzu mass Mangellat yefka-d tadrimt i wigi yuḍnen, yella-d uskasi dinna deg uxxam n yidles ,rran-d imejjayen-agi ɣef yisteqsiyen ama n yimuḍan teɛna temsalt ama d wid iduwan ɣer-sen neɣ ara idawin ɣer-sen ɣas akken llan kra n yimuḍan yesḥasfen aṭas imi ula d imawlan-nsen neɣ atmaten-nsen kukran akken ad asen-fken tigẓelt, ɣef waya tadukkli –agi tekkat akken ad tqenneɛ imdanen , ad fken tigẓelt, neɣ xersum wid ixedmen kra n twaɣit ad mmten ad fersen tagnit akken ad asen-d-kksen tigẓẓal-nsen ,imi win yemmuten yemmut meqqar ad d-ḥyun win i tent-yeḥwaǧen, akka tidukkla –agi tekkat akken ad nuɣal am tmura n lberrani anida ur yelli ara yakk n wugur-agi n tikci d uzraɛ n tegẓelt, yerna aqerru n tdukkla –agi d win ijerben aṭṭan-agi ɣer taggra yeḥla ,ɣef akken iqarren win ijerben ara testeqsiḍ uqbel amejjay.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia  

  
 D tumert i yettɛeddayen berdayen ɣef wul mi ara nwali imura d yimedyazen-nneɣ rẓan asalu i usider n tutlayt. Ṭṭfen abrid n tira d usufeɣ, ulamma weɛrit tegnatin ideg yettnuzu udlis. Dɣa, ɣas d timerwin n yiseggasen-aya segmi yebda aɛaned n tewriqt tacebḥant s yisefra-s, acu kan armi d ussan-a kan i d-yessufeɣ umedyaz-nneɣ Ḥamid Ayt Sliman ammud-is amenzu n yisefra s tutlayt tayemmat. Adlis i iɛeṭṭlen akken ad d-ilal, s uzwel n«Gar wul akked tasa», deg-s azal n 120 n yisefra. Tuget seg-sen ttawin-d ɣef tmagit, tifelseft, timetti, ddunit, atg. Yeffeɣ-d udlis-a deg Internet ɣer teẓrigin Lulu.com, imi ur wɛiren lecɣal deg-s, di leɛḍil ad d-yeffeɣ ula da deg tmurt ɣef wawal n umeskar. «Deg wammud-a, wwiɣ-d taḥawact n kra seg yisefra i uriɣ gar 1977 d 2016. Llan xedmeɣ-ten deg Mustɣanem, Yellel d Гilizan, ayen i d-yeqqimen deg Tmurt n Yizwawen». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna bab n udlis. Ad d-nini belli amaru Ḥamid Ayt Sliman d bab n waṭas n yidlisen s wazal-nsen. Amur ameqqran seg-sen s tutlayt tafransist, maca ɣef taluft tamaziɣt, d tezwawt. D asmekti kan, deg yisefra n wammud-a, ad naf wid swayes yewwi arraz n uxxam n yidles Naǧi Neɛman n Lubnan, deg useggas n 2012.

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

 
  
 Soraya HadjArab tlul di tmurt n Wawras deg useggas n 1976. D taselmadt deg agezdu n tutlayt tefṛansist di tesdawit n Batna. Ttewwid doctorat ines deg weḥric icudden ɣer tussna d tmeslayt( sciences du langage) di 2012. Mačči d izli n tagmiwin ( recherches ) i texdem s ddemma deg uḥric-agi n tmeslayt akked d win tasnilesmetti( sociolinguistique). Am akken diɣen i texdem aṭas n isaragen( conférences) ama di tmurt-nneɣ ama di tmura nniḍen ɣef tussna-agi . Nnig amahil-agi, Soraya tesɛa tamedyazt (ama s teqbaylit neɣ s tṛumit) deg idammen-is, dayen-nni i tt-id yewwin ɣer ugni n yedlisen imi deg aggur n fuṛaṛ-agi yeffeɣ-d wammud amenzu isefra-ines « Periple d une nostalgie » ɣer tiẓrigin edilivre di Franṣa. Ɣef udlis-agi , ɣef tasekla summata yella-d gar-nneɣ uskasi-agi :

  Yeffeɣ-d yekkan udlis-inem amenzu ddaw uzwel “ periple d’une nostalgie” , amek id ilul wedlis-agi, acu n isental yeɛna? 

 Ammud-agi n isefra ula d nekk yella ɣer ɣuṛ-i amzun d tammufirt( surprise). Dayen ɣef ur bniɣ-ara. Asmi bdiɣ ttaruɣ, ur yelli ara d lbal-iw ad iffeɣ d taktabt. Ddiɣ-as kan i lebɣi i lxaṭer acku ttafeɣ tadfi di tira. Ulac ayen yifen tira! Ulac ayen yifen tayri n tira. Xas amur ameqqran n isefra yellan deg adlis-agi ( azal n 48 n isefra ) aɣbel-nsen d tayri d wayen icudden ɣer tayri. D tamedyazt yesburr-n nnesma n leḥmala , tilellit yuran s yiwen uɣanib afessas amer ad yesnefsusi kra ɣef wul-awen n imeɣṛiyen.

  Amek id t-ussa Soraya ɣer tira ? Ales-aɣ-id inig –agi ɣer ugni n tmedyazt. 

 Si zik n zik hemleɣ tamedyazt. Temẓi-w tefrawes i yisefra n imedyazen imeqranen am Lounis Ait Menguellet akked Matoub Lounes. Wid iyi ṭṭfen afus( diɣen-nni) akken ad rzuɣ ɣer tmurt n isefra akked tira d Paul Eluard, Baudelaire…d wayen akked id mmlaleɣ deg umecwar n tudert –iw ama di tasdawit neɣ anda nniḍen. Acu kan niqal rriɣ zerb gar-i akked tmedyazt acḥal d aseggas acku amahil-inu (tasnilesmetti) d agni akerfat.. ur yesɛi ara leɣṛi neɣ ttra n tirga yettawin lexwaṭer ɣer isefra. Zziɣ-d ɣer isefra asmi ɣriɣ i tikelt tamezwarut isefra s teqbaylit. di ccaw teḍṛa-tt yid-i am yeduqqsen , yufa ziɣ yella wacu ixuṣen ixf-iw akked iman-inu. Tella deg-i tɣawsa tuffirt tessutur ad tifrir ad twali tafat. Ṣṣuṛa-yak tefrawes acku Ḥulfaɣ ufiɣ-d lebɣi-w ufiɣ-d tutlayt-iw ( di Batna tamaziɣt ur tuɣ ara aẓar akken ilaq). Ɣef aya taɣuṛi n isefra s teqbaylit tella ( i nekk) d tuɣalin ɣef lɛinser n tnaṣlit, ɣer tmurt n leqbayel!

  Yeqqar Kateb Yacine : tameṭṭut yettarun teswa azal-is n wewṛaɣ…amek tettwaliḍ kem.. wis ma teshel taluft i tameṭṭut yettarun di tmeti-nneɣ ? 

 Awal-id yenna Kateb s wazal-is…maca di tmeti yecban tagi-nneɣ, anda argaz yerra kulci ddaw ugrez-is..anda tiseɣlit n leɛwayed terna-d taẓẓayt-is, anda yir tamuɣli akked d yir awal rnan-d lhemm-nsen, ur as yeshil ara i tameṭṭut ad tekcem annar n tsekla akked tira a beɛɛda ma yella teɛna isental yeḍfer “ ahama akked didi”! Ilaq tabɣest akked tasa akken ad yini yimi; akken ad yaru yimru ɣef timsal-agi. Mačči d izli n tilawin ( i zemren i tira) rrant rreẓẓa i leqlam-nsen-t, ggumant ad arun-t acku yewɛer usweɛdi , yewɛer mi ara k-yeḍfeṛ yir awal.

  Turiḍ isefra s teqbaylit .. am akken diɣen terriḍ isefra n kra imedyazen si teqbaylit ɣer tṛumit…acu n lfayda yellan deffir n usuqel –agi? Acu ara d yawi i tsekla-nneɣ? 

 Tidet , iḍṛisen imenza yak uriɣ-ten s teqbaylit, acku d win i d-abrid iwulman i wakken werǧin ad yegzem umrar gar-i akked tmurt n leqbayel. Maca ayen iyi ttɛeṭṭilen( di cɣel-agi) d aḥulfu d akken taqbaylit-iw txus kra..a beɛɛda deg ayen yeɛnan illugan n tira s teqbaylit. Meɛna ay akken yebɣu yili , ttafeɣ tutlayt-nneɣ( taqbaylit) tzad, tezmer a tt-ɛebbi merra isental yecqan amdan ama da neɣ anda nniḍen.Tasuqqilt d yiwen ubrid ara yezdin tameslayt-nneɣ akked yidles –nneɣ ɣer talsa , ɣer umaḍal s lekmal-is. S tsuqqilt nezmer a nessiweḍ asekkud aqbayli i wid ur nessin ara teqbaylit .

  Acu ara d tiniḍ ɣef tmedyazt tartar n teqbaylit? 

 Ttwaliɣ-tt simmal tettnerni, imal-ines yenǧer. Di lǧerra-s d tutlay-t-nneɣ i yettafen ixf-is, id yettafen lliqa s wacu ara timɣur akken ad tili nned ɣer nned akked timeslayin-nniḍen. Ass-a tamedyazt n teqbaylit tezmer i yal acqirew i yal asentel.

  Kra n win yettarun amzun iger isem-is ɣer ssuq yeznuzu deg imeṭṭawen-is … I kem amek im id tettban tamsalt ? Acu i kem-yesmendagen akken ad taruḍ? 

 Nebɣa neɣ nugi tira teggar “ Inekiw” ( le Je) deg urar. Ilaq amdan ad yaf tilist gar ayen yellan n yiman-is d wayen yellan beṛṛa n yiman-is. Ayen yellan d aferdis seg-s , d wayen yellan d aferdis di lmecmel( wiyaḍ). Yella weḥric deg iman-nneɣ i tteffeɣ afus, ur yesɛi ara lqid neɣ acekkal…ay akken tebɣu tegga ifergan neɣ tilisa tifrit-nneɣ( notre conscience) leqrar-is ad yenser . Mi id yeffeɣ wedlis.. iban kan kra nura yuɣal d ayla n wiyaḍ…ttikkin deg-s merra imeɣṛiyen.

  Acu id tettheggi Soraya akka ɣer zdat? 

 La ttaruɣ adlis-nniḍen ara yilin yemxallaf ɣef umezwaru agi , imi ayen s wacu ara yeččaṛ d udem nniḍen n tsekla . Dayen umi qqaren “le haiku” . Le haiku ( kradifyar) d yiwen uɣanib n tira id yekkan si tmurt n Japan yuklalen ad yettwassen ɣer-nneɣ a beɛɛda s teqbaylit. Acku le haiku yeccelqaf di kra n wawalen (tlata n yifyar) iḥulfan id teslal tegnit neɣ teswiɛt amzun d tugna akken ad tqazem lawan d wemkan i leslaf.

  Awal-im i yimeɣṛiyen n weɣmis n imaziɣen? 

 Sermeɣ ad ɣṛen “«périple d’une nostalgie» i w akken ad leqḥen deg-s tudert. Sarameɣ ad ddun yid-i deg inig-agi I sen id siɣ. Xuḍi d Elsa Triolet id yennan : «imeɣṛi d netta i tigejdit ɣef yebna ungal. Di tilawt yezga-d yemsawa netta d umyaru, mebla imeɣṛiyen ula id yexdem umyaru”.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Annect d ayen i yeswehmen ilemẓiyen ladɣa i yesran ad slen i umaṭṭaf-nsen, maca daɣen ad ḍefren isallen ineggura n temnaḍin n Bgayet skud ala win n Ssumam i ten-id-yettawin s wugar n tazzla. Rnu, aɣilif-a n tuṭṭfa n lemwaji n rradya-ya inuḥ seg wayaqeddac. Ma nemmeslay ɣef tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel i iggugen (ibeɛden) s wazal n 60 n yikilumitren ɣer usamar-anẓul n waɣir n Bbayet, imezdaɣ-is d wid umu yettwaffer yimesli n umaṭṭaf-a deg teɣzi n wass. Yettusemma, ur ssawaḍen, s wallal i bɣun ɛerḍen, ad d-ṭṭfen asɛeddi n wahil-is war iɣilifen igeɛmura d urxerxec yizizen-nni yessefqiɛen. Ad d-neg ugar n usegzi i uneɣmis,  dakken ayen i d-yernan ugar n usiḥissif i yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel, d mi ssawaḍen mebla uguren ad slen i yimaṭṭafen nniḍen, am umaṭṭaf wis sin, amezwaru d wis kraḍ, akked win n Seṭṭif, ma d win n tama-nsen n Ssumam alama ɛyan deg uqeɛɛed, rnu werǧin tezdig am wakken yezmer walbaɛḍ ad yegzu awal. Ma d win n Tizi, akken teqqar tenfalit: ruḥ anig i ak-nniɣ. Ɣas ma taggara-ya kan, yefka-d uneɣlaf n teywalt, mass Ḥamid Grin, awal n asirem dakken sey-a ɣer yimal iqerben ad yettwazuzzer umaṭṭaf-a n Ǧerǧer ɣer ddeqs n twilayin. Aredmani, ɣas ma araǧu n yiɣermanen n temnaḍin-a yettwaḥeggzen deg tmaḍlarant yewweḍ s aḥdid, maca asirem n unuḥ n umaṭṭaf n Ssumam mettwal Idurar n Udrar n Fad ed Takkuct mazal-it ibedd ɣas s lḥir, skud aql-aɣ deg tallit ideg ineɣmisen n tamiwin ttwasmenyfen sɣur medden. 

 I usneɣmes kan, amaṭṭaf-a n Ssumam ilul mraw ed tẓa (19) n yiseggasen tura ɣer deffir, yettusemma deg 1996,  s lebɣi n udabu alemmas n Lezzayer tamaneɣt. Maca ar ass-a ur yelli wayen i d-ibanen deg-s d tiẓin ɣer sdat ladɣa deg wayen yerzan ttawilat n usiweḍ, wamma ahil n wussan nezmer ad d-nini yettɣentir cwiṭ seg wass ɣer wayeḍ, mačči ala di remḍan. Akken i d-yeqqar wadeg internet n umaṭṭaf-a, aneggaru-ya yettceyyiɛ zun lemwaji-s s yinzizen n 300 n yikilumiṭren, wanag ar tura yerwa usenqeḍ yisalli-ya skud ula d kra n yimeḍqan n waɣir anda yettwaẓẓa umaṭṭaf-a tezga d tunẓirt tuṭṭfa-ines iwennɛen, tesḥissif deg yiɣermanen i d-yessuturen ad d-rren yinesdabuyen i tsutriwin-nsen. « Nekk sgumaɣ ad fehmegh amek ssawaḍegh ad d-ṭṭfeɣ ugar n xemsa n yimaṭṭafen nniḍen n tmurt war acxerxec maḍi, ma yella d win n Ssumam, win n twilayt-iw, yuɣal d awezɣi ad as-sleɣ seg taddart-iw ala ma ɛeddiɣ seg Lberǧ n Mira akkin ». Aya yenna-yaɣ-t-id yiwen n yilemẓi seg Ayt Smaɛel.   Seg tama nniḍen, ɣas ma yella ufran tikwal gar yifassen n uɣerman, mi inuḥ dɣa umaṭṭaf-a iɣef nettmeslay ula deg ugensa (satellite) iseggasen-a yezrin, maca allal-a iban-d yeẓẓay ɣur kra, yeggug ɣur wiyaḍ, ma neẓra belli ala deg uxxam i yezmer yiwen ad as-isel s udimu-ines. Rnu tella yiwet n taluft mtanwan fell-as aṭas n medden, tin i d-yeqqaren dakken ableɣ (volume) n umaṭṭaf n Ssumam din yenqes ma nga aserwes akked umaṭṭaf amenzu neɣ d wis kraḍ s tefransist. Ɣef waya, ad gen amliḥ wid terza taluft lemmer ad d-gren iman-nsen ad frun aɣilif-a n tuṭṭfa n umaṭṭaf n Ssumam, n waɣir n Yemma Guraya, deg kra n tɣiwanin, am tin n Ayt Smaɛel dɣa.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Abrid yessawen ɣer uɣerbaz ‘’Talah Mohamed’’ n taddart n Yiɛellalen akken yessawen umecwar n umennuɣ i d-tuɣ tmaziɣt seg tefsut n tmanyin ar ass-a. xas ulamma amennuɣ yettkemmil, meɛna tamaziɣt-nni ha-tt-an di lakul, neɣ ɛad deg uɣerbaz, akken i ḥemmlen yinelmaden ad t-id-inin. Nerza ɣer taddart n Yiɛellalen yellan deg tɣiwant n Ait Yahia Moussa acku dinna aselmed n tmaziɣt mačči taḥerfi, mačči d tajerrumt kan deg temsirin : dinna d aselmed n yidles amaziɣ s umata ; d ttrebga ɣef leɛwayed n lejdud, ‘’ayen i d-nnan d wayen i d-ǧǧan’’ ; d tirrugza n yizem n udrar Krim Belkacem i d-ilulen deg taddart-nni. S yiwen wawal, d taqbaylit-nni. Aya, yella-d s lmendad n yiwen uselmad netta d urfiq-is i yefkan azal ameqqran i wayen tettawi tutlayt deg yijifar-is mačči kan d tasnilsit taḥerfit. Tajmilt ad tuɣal i Mass Meziani Mohamed. Deg uɣerbaz-agi, nufa igrawen yettɣennin, yessunuɣen, yetturaren tamezgunt, ddabex uḍar, agraw i d-yelhan s useḥbiber ɣef ugama…lḥaṣun dayen kan i d ttrebga, i d aɣerbaz ara tessirmeḍ i tsuta i d-iteddun, acu kan s…teqbaylit. ‘’Ma ad ɣren warrac-nneɣ tamaziɣt am taɛrabt, ulayɣer ! Neẓra sani ara teddun : ad d-ffɣen d irebraben imaziɣen.’’ Akka i ttxemmimen kra. Mi nekcem ɣer daxel n tneɣrit, nufa inelmaden ḥedqen dayen kan. Tturebban armi ! mi ten-nesteqsa ɣef tmaziɣt, ha-t-an wacu i d-nnan :

  Boudia Ali :  tamaziɣt walaɣ-tt belli d tutlayt lɛali, tuklal ad tili d tunṣibt deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Mi qqareɣ tamaziɣ, aṭas n temsal i lemdeɣ, ladɣa ɣef ledjud-nneɣ d wamek ttidiren. Lemdeɣ amezruy n yimaziɣen. Ihi, ass-a, tewwi-d fell-aneɣ ad tt-nesnerni, ad nessali azal-is. 

  Celia :   ttafeɣ mliḥ iman-iw mi ara qqareɣ idṛisen s tmaziɣt. Tamaziqt, teshel, mačči am wakken ttxemmimen wiyaḍ. Ihi win yebɣan ad tt-iɣer, yezmer. D tamaziɣt deg uɣerbaz i yi-d-yeskeflen lejdud-iw, d nettat i yi-d-yemlan amezruy-iw. Batatache Thinhinane nettat tefka-aɣ-d aḍris i tura. Terra iman-is deg umekkan n ubabat i yettweṣṣin mmi-s. ha-t-an uḍris n Thinhinane :

<p style="text-align: center;"> “Lehyuf (lkif) 

 Lehyuf neqqen yal aseggas ugar n 200 000 n yimdanen deg umaḍal, ttruḥun d asfel. D ayen i yi-ǧǧan ad ugadeɣ fell-ak, am nekk am yimelyan n yibabaten i yettagaden ɣef tarwa-nsen. Ihi, ad ak-id-mmeslayaɣ i wakken ad ak-nhuɣ. Lehyuf, lhan kan i wid i ten-yesnuzun, i yettrabaḥen adrim s uɛemmur. Iqettalen-agi, urǧin tessen-ten nutni i wakken ulac d acu ara ten-yaɣen, ad izmiren ad ak-d-ssiwḍen rraj-agi-nsen. Ma d arraw-nsen, ttḥadaren-ten akken ilaq, ama s wučči, ama s lebsa neɣ s tmezduɣt. Lehyuf, ttarran tudert n wid i ten-itessen d ahawec ur nettfakka. Ttekksen-as i umdan nnif-is, sseɣlayen-as leqder-is. Netta ites-iten i wakken ad iḥas s tumert, maca ur tettdummu ara. Ur yeẓri ara belli la ineqq iman-is, la yetthuddu tudert-is ilhan. Yal tikkelt, ul-ik, aqerru-k, aksum-ik, si tama, la ɛeyyun. Ma d wid i ten-yeznuzun, si tama-nniḍen, la ttrabaḥen. Imsixesren-agi ur ssinen la cbaḥa, la rreḥma, ur sɛin tayri deg ulawen-nsen. S ciṭ n rraj-agi ssawaḍen ula d imecṭaḥ ur nesɛi zher ad ɣilen la ttidiren tudert ssaramen. La ak-d-ttmeslayeɣ i wakken ad ak-ḥadreɣ, xas akka meẓẓiyeḍ, ẓriɣ tfehmeḍ-iyi-d.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Thinhinane” 

 Ha-tt-an ihi amek nebɣa ad tili tmaziɣt deg uɣerbaz : ad d-arun yinelmaden ɣef wayen bɣan mačči ad d-ttɛawaden ayen kan i asen-d-qqaren yiselmaden-nsen am les perroquets. Yenna-as winna ‘’Amek ara irebbi uselmad ur netturebba’’. Afud igerrzen i yinelmaden d yiselmaden n uɣerbaz Talah Mohamed. Mebla ma ttuɣ anemhal-is akked yixxadem akken ma llan.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> H.Moula  

  
 Seld iseggasen n uraǧu deg unezgum d layas n wayen ara asen-iḍemnen tignatin yelhan n udawi, a-t-an yusa-d umaynut ara yessifsusen am acemma taɛkemt ɣef yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, i yeggugen s wazal n 70 n yikilumiṭren ɣef waɣir n Bgayet. Dɣa, ulamma mi d-leḥqen ussan iɛeddan dduzan n rradyu i tzeqqa n udawi n Tizwal ur tmid tumert, tura mi d-tewweḍ tkerrust n usaɛef snuffsen Wat tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel asnuffes n talwit. Isalli-a yessefreḥ akk imezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel d tuddar i as-d-yezzin am Ayt Rrif i yettabaɛen deg tedbelt taɣiwant n Tsexriwt. « Yelha, ad d-nini d akken ur d-tusi ara tkerrust-a n usaɛef akka kan, wanag d leqdic n terbaɛt n Usqamu aɣerfan n Ayt Smaɛel i d-yewwin agemmuḍ-is ». I d-yenna uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel Mass Sadeq n Ayt Urbaɛ, send ad d-yessegzi kra n tlufa i yerzan liḥala n udawi deg tzeqqa n Tizwal. « Segmi i d-yella usnadi (laboratoire) n uslaḍ akked tmacint n usɛeddi n rradyu, a-t-an terna-d tkerrust n usaɛef i usiweḍ n yimuḍan-nneɣ. Maca ur imid uqeddic da! Nettraǧu ad yettwaldi ussan-a i d-iteddun uqeddic izerben akken ad ḥulfun yiɣermanen-nneɣ di laman i llan s tidet ». Yewwi-d ad d-nesmekti belli aqeddic izerben (Service d’urgence) d ayen i llan suturen seg waṭas-aya yimezdaɣ deg yimḍebbren n tɣiwant. Imi amkan ideg i d-zgan ur as-tlaq ara kan tmenḍayt ara yettawin amuḍin di lawan ɣer tzeɣwa n udawi d sbiṭarat iqerben, am win n Umrij d Xerraṭa, maca ula d aqeddic-a izerben iḥettem-it-id lḥal. Ayen yakk ttidiren Wat Smaɛel d uguren n udawi deg wakud, ladɣa deg tsemhuyt tasemmaḍt ideg regglen yiberdan, iban-d d afakul uɣdim i waya. Daymi a-en-an akka yimezdaɣ ttɛussun s ccuq tagnit ma ad yettwaldi dayen uqeddic-a tama-nsen deg Tizwal. Ladɣa imi taggara-a ur neccden s waṭas tazeqqa-a seg wakken txus deg ttawil, ḥaca i tukksa n tuɣmas d udawi n tiggest (ljerḥ). « Asmi ara nesɛu aqeddic izerben, imir-nni nezmer ad d-nini nesɛa tazeqqa n udawi deg Tizwal. Wamma tura ḥala nettaf-itt deg tfessasin-nni kan ». D awal n yiwen n umezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel.

  M. K. 

  
 Ccfawa n teqcict d tullisin nniḍen” d adlis amezwaru n Lkaysa Xalifi. Yeffeɣ-d ar Tezrigin Tira.

 Tlul-d Lkaysa Xalifi di taddart n Ayt Smaɛil , di Bgayet, di yunyu 1991. Tettaru tamedyazt , akken daɣen tettaru s-ya ar da di kra n yeɣmisen.

  
 Yerna-d Mhenni Xalifi ammud n tullisin (“Nna Geltum”) ɣer tezrigin Tira. D wa i d adlis-is wis krad. Amezwaru d ammud n yisefra i wumi isemma “ Nnehda n uḥulfu”. 

 Wis sin d ungal i wumi yefka azwel “Asdawan”. 

  
 Ɣas yettelḥam-d ukayad n BAK, aṭas n wussan i beṭṭlen yinelmaden n tesnawit Maɛuc Idris deg Tsexriwt. Dɣa, s yisem-is d aselway n tdukkla n Krun (asqamu n taddart), daɣen d aselmad deg uɣerbaz alemmas n Tizwal, nesteqsa Idris n Ayt Ɛmer ed Ḥmed (Gemmac) ɣef rray-is deg tegnit-a!

  D acu akka i la iḍerrun deg tesnawit Maɛuc Idris?  

 Akken i t-id-uriɣ yakan deg yiwet n tiɣri ; d inelmaden n useggas amezwaru ed wis sin i xeddmen tagant (grève) ur ttaǧǧan ḥedd ad yekcem, acku ur qbilen asɛeddi n yikayaden-nsen deg yunyu, yettusemma deg remṭan. Netta ur yezmir unemhal ad asen-d-yeg kra. Taɣtest-a (décision) tekka-d seg uɣlif (le ministère).

  Ma yella akken-nni, yaḍra iban-asen-d wahil n usɛeddi deg remṭan?  

 Ur ẓriɣ. Ẓriɣ kan belli ula d inelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas ad sɛeddin akk deg wayyur-n. Ihi, yettban-iyi-d ad asen-d-yili ttawil ed tegnit igerrzen i waya.

  Acimi deg wussan n tagant ur tettsubbum, kunwi s yibabaten, ad teskecmem tarwa-nwen? 

 Nella nettaṭar i wannect-nni maca ur as-nezmir yal ass. Mačči d tidak i d tifrat. Aya d ccɣel n tedbelt (administration) n tesnawit i yugin ad d-tesbeyyen iman-is ma tella. 

 Rnu, tagnit-a ur teffiɣ ɣef yiwen… D wid ara yesɛeddin aBAK i yenṭerren ugar. Maca tura waqila atan msefhamen belli wid yesɛeddayen aBAK ad ɣren, ma d wid n yiswiren nniḍen ur ttekcamen alama i asen-tban. 

  Anwa i sebba almi ur ɣrin warrac-nneɣ aseggas-nsen akken ilaq? 

 Nniɣ-t-id ad as-d-alseɣ, d tadbelt n tesnawit i yellan d sebba almi aṭas n wakud i iruḥen i yinelmaden-is. Ihi ala nettat i d sebba seg drus n tzemmar-is.

  Amek tettwaliḍ lḥal n yisnawanen i yeɣɣaren deg tesnawit n Ayt Smaɛel ? 

 Tura akka, sliɣ uɣalen i tɣuri, rnan xeddem asečču segmi i d-yeɣli akken ublaḍ. Maca ad d-nuɣal ɣer wanda ed wamek yebna s uzrab, lemmer mačči akken ur d-iḍerru wayen yeḍran. 

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Yesteqsa-t: Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Ǧamal d Ǧamila ɣran akken deg uɣerbaz amezwaru armi d tasnawit. Ǧamal yeḥrec aṭas deg leqraya maca yecmet deg ṣṣifa. Ǧamila teqreṣ deg leqraya maca tezyen dayen kan . Ǧamal iḥemmel Ǧamila axaṭer tezyen aṭas.Ǧamila tekreh Ǧamal axaṭer yecmet aṭas. yiwen wass, yenn-as Ǧamal: “Nekk drewceɣ fell-am a tuzyint.Disem-im i d awalim.Bɣiɣ ad zewǧeɣ yid-m akken ad ffɣen warraw-nneɣ d uzyinin am kemm, d uḥricen am nekk”. Terra-as Ǧamila: “Ma te-ddrewceḍ, ruḥ ad t-ruḥeḍ s axxam n yimehbal ma d igerdan zemren ad d-ffɣen d ucmiten am kečč yerna d iɛeggunen am nekk.» Asmi sɛeddan akayad n l BAK, Ǧamal yezger ɣer tesdawit gar yimezwura ma d Ǧamila tuɣal s axxam. Zrin yiseggasen, Ǧamal yeffeɣ-d damejjay n wulawen (Cardiologue). Yiwen wass, Ǧamila tesɛa uguren n tdawsa deg wul-is. Truḥ ɣer umejjay d Ǧamal i ixeddmen di temnaḍt-nni n at wuccen. Imi itt-wala Ǧamal, yuɣal-d lehlak-is n tayri d amaynut. Ǧamila ilaq-as ucerrig (l’opération). Yekkes-d ul-is iduwat, yerra-t s amkan-is, yura fell-as “I Love you” Yenna-as Ǧamal: “Ilaq ad, tuɣaleḍ aggur id-iteddun akken ad waliɣ ma teḥliḍ akken iwata.” Yezri waggur, tuɣal-d Ǧamila. “Azul fell-am a Ǧamila ! Teḥliḍ mliḥ neɣ ala ?” “Azul fell-ak a ṭṭbib ! Ḥliɣ maca tikwal ttḥulfuɣ amzun akken yettmeslay-d yid-i wul_iw maca ur fhimeɣ ara d acu id-yeqqar.” “S wacu tutlayt id-yettmeslay?” “Cukteɣ s tegnizit” “Twalaḍ a Ǧamila, lukan i teɣriḍ tagnizit tili i tfehmeḍ d acu i yebɣa wul-im! Cfiɣ asmi i neqqar deg uɣerbaz alemmas. Mass. Ḥemmar yettawi-d tamsirt, kemm tettmuquleḍ udem-im deg lemri ddaw n tdabut.” «I kečč d acu i tettmuquleḍ?” “Nekk ttmuquleɣ lemri deg udem-im. Uɣal-d aggur niḍen, ad waliɣ ma teḥliḍ. Maca, abrid-a, sell mliḥ i ṣṣut-nni, amer ahat d ṣṣut n wul-iw imi tesliḍ mačči d ṣṣut n wul-im.” “Iwqet akka i tuɣaleḍ d amedyaz? Qqim kan d amejjay, ad tnefɛeḍ meqqar timetti, ad tdawiḍ meqqar timetti , ad t dawiḍ imdanen.” “Akka a Ǧamila, ad dawiɣ ulawen n yimdanen ma d nekk ulac win ara idawin ul-iw.” “Aɛni ula d kečč thelkeḍ ? Dawi imani-ik neɣ teḍra yid-k am uḥeddad nni ur nesɛi tafrut?.” “Kellex kan ɣef wul-iw a Ǧamila! Acḥal n yiseggasen aya akka i txeddmeḍ!” “Ruḥ ad twaliḍ amejjay niḍen!” “Ul-iw yebḍa d iceqfan, ur yelli umejjay i izemren at idawi !”.

<p style="text-align: right;"> HEMMAR BUSSAƐD 

  
 Iweǧǧiben d ansay aqdim ɣer leqbayel, d ass amenzu n tyerza ɣer yifellaḥen, ttmagaren-t medden s lfuttuḥ n lxir, ssaramen ad yelhu useggas n tyerza am wakken sfiliten, ad yili lxir d ṣṣaba deg yigran.

 Gar wayen xeddmen lejdud, nezmer ad d-nebder aya: sufuɣen izgaren, ad tezwir tyuga n uxxam At lxir n taddart, ad teddu tmeṭṭut tameqrant n uxxam, ad tawi aɣerbal deg-s remman , ibawen , tajilbant, irden , tazart d lmesbaḥ. Ad dehnen tagersa , ma d arrac ad ṭṭfen deg ufus n tsilet. S umata, akka i d-yettili uɛeǧǧeb di tmurt n leqbayel . Imezdaɣ n taddart n Teslent di tamnaḍt n Ssumam, di tɣiwant n Yiɣram gar wigad i mazal ṭṭfen di leɛɛwayd. Ass-nni, 26 di tuber yezrin i weǧben , muggren ass amenzu n tfellaḥt. Amek i d-yella uweǧǧeb di taddart n Teslent ? Ddurt uqbel aweǧǧeb, nnejmaɛen deg taddart, msefhamen i wakken ad d-ssufɣen tirbuyin n seksu n ubisar ɣer umraḥ n taddart iwumi qqaren ‘’Sidi Abdjlil d Uɛetman’’ ass imensi n iweǧǧiben , yal axxam ad d-inawel seksu n temẓin neɣ n yirden, ma ulac d smid , abiṣar ad yili d asafar agejdan . «Nebɣa ur yettemgarad ara nwal gar uxxam d wayeḍ , acku iswi–nneɣ d ajgugel deg wansayen n lejdud , mačči d timsizzelt gar yixxamen, anwa ara ad d-inawlen a xir n wayeḍ» i d- yenna Mass Boualem Iskounen s yisem-is d lɛaqel n taddart . Imi i d-yewweḍ lawan-nni n usečči , mlalen-d Wat taddart, win-d tirbuyin n ubiṣar, llan wid i d-yusan ula si berra n taddart, ttidiren di temdinin-nniḍen. Gar-asen, ad naf Mass Buyusef i d-yusan seg Uqbu. Nnig n 70 n yiseggasen-aya i yezdeɣ di temdint-nni , maca yal mi ara ad d-tili tegnit am tagi, yettas-d igellu-d s tarbuyt-is. Mi i t-nessteqsa , yenna-k : «deg tignatin am tigi, tettuɣ abɛad ɣef taddart. D akal akked wansayen n lejdud i yi-d yessawalen yal tikelt . Rnu, ttawiɣ-d arraw-iw i wakken ad myussanen d Wat taddart. ‘’Aẓar yettabaɛ tara’’…» Imensi ass n yiweǧǧiben, yessemlal-d arrac, tiqcicin , imɣaren akked ilmezyen di Teslent. : «nessaram, d ass ara yesdukklen cmel, wa ad qqiment leɛwayed i tsetwin i d-iteddun, acku d nutenti ara ad tent–ikemmlen», i d-yenna Ali Teslent yiwen uɛeggal n taddart. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim Benhamouche  

  
 Si Wyidir d lamin n yiwet n taddart deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Qqaren-d ulac win isewqen ɣef taddart-is am netta. Fernen-t imezdaɣ d aqerru ɣef taddart-is acḥal n yiseggasen. Si Wyidir d yiwen ur nettcuḥu ara di lweqt-is. Yeqqar:‘‘lecɣel n taddart zwaren akk lecɣel’’. Anda i as-d-ssawlen, iruḥ d amezwaru. Ɣef waya, ttqadaren-t u ḥemlen-t medden aṭas.

 Yiwet n tikkelt, ikcem-d deg yiḍ s axxam, ieeṭṭel di tejmaet, ṭṭfen-t lecɣel n taddart. Yufa-d mmi-s n mmi-s uread igen, yenna-as-id: leeslama a jeddi, tεeṭṭleḍ aṭas ass-agi! Acu-t i txeddmeḍ akk di tejmaet? 

 Yenna-as jeddi-s: a mmi iṭṭef-iyi cɣel n taddart, yak nekk d lamin! D imsewwaq n taddart. Lecɣel n taddart zwaren akk lecɣel. Nekk d ṭemman i yi-ttḥamin, nettsewwiq ɣef taddart: nettḥarab ɣef nnif n yimezdaɣ, 

 wa ur iḥeqqar wayeḍ, wa ur ittaweḍ wayeḍ. Nferru uguren d-ttemlilin imezdaɣ, nteddu deg ubrid n lḥaq, ntekkes lbaṭel…

 Aqcic: amek tferrum taluft ger sin n yimdanen ilhan a jeddi?

 Lamin: a mmi ma lhan di sin ur d-ttruḥen ara ɣer tejmaεt. Taluft nsen ur d-tettaweḍ ara ɣer-neɣ, ur tt-nettissin ara,

 ferrun-tt i yiman-nsen weḥd-nsen.Wa ad yeǧǧ cwiṭ i wayeḍ dɣa ad tt-frun. 

 Aqcic: a jeddi i mi ara yili yiwen ilha wayeḍ dirr-it! Lamin: a mmi, tamezwarut, nessawal-asen-d ɣer tejmaet i sin yid-sen. Nessel-asen, yal yiwen ad d-yini amek teḍra tedyant illan gar-as d uxṣim-is. Ssyin win iḍelmen ad t-nsenṭaq ɣef ccada.
