 Nessenqas cwiṭ i win iḍelmen nrennu-t i win-a nniḍen, dɣa ttasen-d swaswa, mtawan ɣef ṛṛay n tejmaet. 

 Ttaken lwaεda di tejmaɛt, 

 Ccix ittak-asen lfattiḥa, ssyin ttuɣalen s axxam ferḥen di sin yid-sen imi tefra tedyant-nsen mebla ma yeɣli-d weeḍur wala tugra-d lexsara gar-asen.

 Aqcic: a jeddi, i mi ara n-ruḥen sin n yimdanen dir-iten i sin?

 Lamin: a mmi, dɣa d ayen i yi-isεeṭṭlen ar tura ass-agi!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane LASHEB 

  
 Tajmilt i as-yuɣalen i yiwen uɣyul n tmurt n leqbayel, d tajmilt i yettuɣalen kan i yimdanen mechuren deg ddunit.

 Anemhal n’’Le Cabaret Sauvage’’ i yellan deg tmurt n Fransa, yusa-d ɣer Makuda, taddart-is  i d-yezgan seg tama-agi n Tegzirt i wakken ad yawi aɣyul ɣer Fransa. Ihi, yexdem-as apaspur, yewwi-t yid-s. Mi yewweḍ, yerra-as tajmilt tameqqrant daxel n’’Le Cabaret Sauvage’’ i imechuren aṭas deg tmurt n Fransa, ladɣa ɣer Leqbayel.  Akka, ihi, mebɛed tajmilt i as-yuɣalen i uɣyul s tezlatin sɣur Slimane Chabi akked Zedek Mouloud, tewweḍ-d tejmilt s uḥewwes. 

  Yuklal-itt imi d netta i yebnan tudrin n leqbayel, akken ẓran akk yimdanen. Mazal lxir ɣer sdat. Wissen kan acḥal Visa i as-d-fkan ?

 Hocine.M

  
 Yiwen umzuxxu seg uxxam n Lḥaǧ Meẓyan, yettruḥu netta d tmeṭṭut-is ɣer lexla, ɣer Tasift ddaw taddart n At Xelfun. Itteddi taqerrabt n Sidi Xaled Abḍella. Ass-nni, iruḥ-d weḥd-s, yuɣal-d seg lexla, ur d-teddi ara tmeṭṭut-is. Yersa-d abernus bu sin yiqelman, tamekkḥalt ɣef tayet-is, zzux, ttnefxa, iedda-d taqerrabt. Akken kan i d-yewweḍ ɣer tqerrabt, iffeɣ-d yiwen lewǧeh si Buria. Abbu-nni akk ɣer uebbuḍ-is, isseble-it. Ilḥa cwiṭ dɣa yeɣli. Wwin-t s axxam deg uferrug. Ulac anda ur tewwin ara, ad t-dawin, ur as-d-ufin ara ddwa. Qqaren, d tiyita i d-yettewwet. Alammi yewweḍ useggas i as-ikkes waṭṭan. Dɣa qqaren-as : “Sidi Xaled Abdella Bu tnezduxt deg Talata Ur iḥemmel abeṛṛani Mi ara d-iṣub s ttnefxa Tiyita terza ul-is D lbaṛud i d-yettara”

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Am wakken yella deg wahil n Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad, ussan n amhad ed sem n sdat-neɣ, 30 ed 31 deg wayyur-a n yulyu, yetturaǧu ad yemmag yiwen n warmud (activité) s wazal-is deg urebbi n Udrar n Fad. Ttiɛad-a i yellan deg wahil seg wacḥal-aya d win i nnument yakan tlawin n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel iseggasen-a ineggura: d amsizwer adigan (local) n yiqennucen n Ayt Smaɛel. D tagnit yettwaḥemmlen nezzeh sɣur waṭas ideg sut tiɛellamin skanayent-d acu ṭra ssnent ad gent s yideqqi n yidurar deg umaḍal wayeḍ. Daymi, tal yiwet dɣa tettwanced ad tesres deg uxxam n tdukkla aqennuc i as-yehwan, win i d-tebna s ufus-is s tɣara tansayant. Syinna mara d-yaweḍ wass n tririt n yigmaḍ, imi tella tesqamut tuzzigt tessen i yiqeddicen-a – gar-asen Zahir ed Lxeyyer Brahimi – ad d-binent tid i d-yufraren s wacu i d-gant, i ara yawin arrazen n wannuz ed usebɣes, ɣas tidak nniḍen ad asent-yettunefk kra ula d nutni ilmend n tikkin-nsent. Ɣur tsednan n Udrar n Fad, tesɛa amḍiq ed wazal d igeɛmura tagnit-a, ɣas ma mačči xilla i mazal ttherrisent afrur, neɣ ttqellibent azdud. Ma neẓra dakken tatrara i d-ileḥqen iseggasen-a ineggura teɛfes s yilebbazen-is ddeqs n wansayen seg wid-nneɣ. Dɣa, d ayen i yeǧǧan Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad tesnulfa-d amsizwer-a iɣef nettmeslay: akken ad tessebɣes tid i mazal ṭṭfent deg tnaslit, daɣen ad teǧǧ tiyaḍ sɛant lebɣi ad grent ula d nutenti ad d-skeflen tigemmi-ya tangawt (patrimoine matériel) seg tama-nsen, i isadden tnegger. «Nessaram ad ilint aṭas ara d-yaznen iqennucen-nsent ad ttekkint, mačči kan ala timɣarin, awi-d ukan ad ilint ula d tisliyin. S wakka, yal yiwen seg-neɣ ad eg amur-is i uḥraz n tgemmi-nneɣ». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna Fares Idir, amasay n usuddes n umsizwer-a n yiqennucen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 TIZI WEZZU – Tettunefk tnattalt 450 imulyunen n yidinaren i twilayt n Tizi wezzu akken ad ṣegmen iberdan n tɣiwanin, i d-yenna, umaray amatu n uɣlif agensu d tenbaziyin tidiganin. Ahmed Adli, i yesselwin tasqamut tagraɣlift mm uswir unnig, akken ad walin liḥala n tneflit deg twilayt, yenna-d daɣen tanattalt-a ‘’teḍfer iwellihen i d-yefka uneɣlaf n Uwanek, aneɣlaf n Ugensu d Tenbaziyin Tidiganin deg tirzi-s ɣer Tizi Wezzu, ass n 13 Yebrir yezrin. Tanattalt-a, i yerna yenna-d, d ‘’tiririt ɣef wayen iceɣben iselwayen n tɣiwanin n twilayt’’. Ad tili daɣen terza aṣeggem n uẓeṭṭa n yiberdan n tɣiwanin. Akka, ad tezmer twilayt ‘’ad tesseddu akken yessefk ahil-is n tuksa n uɛzal’’.

<p style="text-align: right;"> APS 

  
 Lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu teṭṭef amḍiq amenzu deg usefti deg waḥric n uyefki. Annect-a yettased s tebγest n yifellaḥen i yefkan laεtab iman-nsen akken ad-refden aḥric-agi, i wesnarni n tdamsa n tmurt. Maca deg seggasen-agi ineggura, ifellaḥen ttmagaren-d ugguren iwmi ur zmiren-ara, sebba n leγla n yisufar n wučči n lmal naγ lεelf, leγla n dwawi, rnu lexṣaṣ id-yettbanen di ttawilat, am trisiti, amman, ibardan d waṭas niḍen. Γas akken gten wugguren, maca ifellaḥen yettrebin lmal xarṣum wid yeseftayen deg uyefki dduklen afus deg ufus, xelqen-d tiddukliwin akken ad-mεawanen ad-affen tifrat s tdukli i wugguren-agi merra. Si tama niḍen, Tafidiralit n yifellaḥen yettrebin lmal tameqrant « Aksum azeggaγ d uyefki », n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, tesḥasef aṭas γef yiεewiqen d wugguren id-ttmagaren yal ass. Γef aya sutren timliliyin akked yemḍebren taεna temsalt, ad-qqimen wa ad-sqardcen iγeblan s telqay i tifrat-nsen, s wudem yelhan. Tasqamut taγelnawt n tiddukla ifellaḥen izzayriyen, sḥasfen ula d nutni γef iεewiqen-agi id-ttmagaren yal ass ifellaḥen yettrebin lmal n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, imi tugget seg-sen ur-zmiren-ara i taεkkemt, dayen i ideggren kra seg-sen zenzen lmal-nsen. Γer tagara, ifellaḥen yettrebin lmal n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, sutren deg yemḍebren εlayen taεna temsalt, akken ad-ggren iman-nsen i tifrat n wugguren-agi s lεejlan ilfayda usnarni n tdamsa n tmurt

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 « D tikkelt tamenzut ara xellseɣ 17000 n yidinaren deg yiwen n ukraḍyur. Cukkeɣ ahat nwan belli acu n lluzin i kesbeɣ, ladɣa ur ksibeɣ ara kra ttawilat ifazen ara yesserɣen ugar.» D ayen i aɣ-d-yenna Kamel, yiwen n umezdaɣ yerfan ɣef wayen i yettidiren tikkelt-a.

 Akka ihi, awal yuzzel ittezzi deg wussan-a ɣef tfaṭurin n lgaz d trisiti i d-yersen ɣef yimdanen d taɛkemt meqqren, imi tabzert mačči d tin xfifen, tin akken iwumi ara yizmir uxeddam. Imezwura i d-yekkren i wakken ad d-beggnen lɣiḍ-nsen d imezdaɣ n Haizer, i ixedmen yiwet n tmesbanit anda suɣen, ɛeggḍen mgal ayen akka i d-yersen fell-asen ɣas ulamma imḍebbren, nnan-d d akken ur d-tettili kra n tmerna deg ssuma n trisiti. Maca, tifaṭurin beggnent-d ayen-nniḍen, imi kkant nnig n tezmert n yimezdaɣ. At Haizer, ssutren aɛiwed n tmuɣli deg tfaṭurin-a, i d-yusan deg yiwet n tallit anda amdan yesseḥzab amek ara iqabel ameṣruf n waggur n Remḍan i d-yellan akka ɣef tewwura. Tabzert-a, tḥuza akk timnaḍin n twilayt, ladɣa deg Beclul anda imezdaɣ dehcen mi ṭṭfen tifaṭurin. « Ulac win iwumi i d-ssutren ddaw n umelyun n ssantim, » i aɣ d-yenna Rabah, yiwen n umezdaɣ n temnaḍt-a. Deg Tewrirt Tazeggaɣt, taluft tɛedda tilas, imi tifaṭurin ssuzfent tixerḍin n yimdanen. Tuget n wid i d-nemmuger, d wid yeccektayen ɣef leɣla, imi tabzert tejba nnig n sin n yimelyunen, mi akken ixeddamen ttrajun tajernant-nsen s ccuq. « Dagi di temnaḍt-a n Beclul, imḍebbren n Sonelgaz ttaǧǧan kan 15 n wussan-nni yellan d azref i wakken ad ixelles umezdaɣ. Ass wis 16, ad d-jbun fell-aɣ ɣer yixxamen, ma yella ur txellseḍ ara, ad ak-gezmen trisiti. Tura akka, ur neẓri ma yella ad nexdem ɣef warraw-nneɣ, neɣ ɣef trisiti, ma yal akraḍyur ad nxelles nnig n sin n yimelyunen ? “ Ɣer tama n taddart-a, anda kra n yimdanen sɛan akka lebyur i ssexdamen i tebḥirin-nsen, tafaṭurt mačči d tin ara iwali umdan: ẓẓayet ! Di temnaḍin-a, ulac s ddaw n tlata n yimelyunen, ayen yesxesren nniya i waṭas n yimdanen yebɣan akka ad d-ssekren kra n yisekla deg tferkiwin-nsen. Ulamma, yella wawal-nni n umedyaz anda yeqqar « Tettban-d lqima n tafat mi ara ken-yewwet wugur n ṭṭlam3, maca mi ara d-taweḍ tallit ara yessuzfen lǧib, ad yeɛreq leḥsab.

  M. Smail 

  
 Ad yazzel yimru, ad yenǧer  tiregwa ɣef lkaɣeḍ. Ad yeqwu wawal, alama yeseɛzeg widen ur nsel. Nennum addud ddew iɣerban  yegrarben. Ddew ixerban. Ddew tizeɣwa yeɣlin. Ddew lemqmat yegrarben.   Nennum amejed zdat iɛamuren n wakal. Nḥamel ṛṛiḥa n lɛefan.  Nḥamel isɣaren imerka.  Nḥamel tucga  ɣef izuliɣen n leɣrur. Akka id nekni  alama iɣ-faten yemdanen i netteqliliḥ ad sen nerr  azal.  Yella deg awal “ asmi yedder yecqaq aɛaqqa n ttmer, tura mi yemmut ɛalqen-as aɛarjjun”. Nesla yella wacu id  tt-heggin akken ad as rran tajmilt. Nekni s yinaten-agi nenna: “tidet mačči kan d tajmili i yuklal, imi am netta ulac timital.”Meɛna nugi a neddu d ẓẓiyar yesṭṭqten zhir ɣer tuqubtin tilmwain ,  imi werǧin nessin tikli uẓerẓur  werǧin nelmid tikli ufaruj. Win iwahmen xas ad yesteqsi. Ur nelli seg widen I teččḥen.  Lejwab iban.  Ur yelli n wass-a, ur yelli n yiḍelli. Telha tajmilit  limer yewweḍ lxid ɣer tisegnit.  Yelha usemɣer n wamdan limer mačči d tulsa n wawal akn  am win tewet tmagert. Netta s zikk  id yenna : “ ddu d-ubrid-ik  ay uhḍiq, wama  d agi, yeqwet uɛiwed n yiɣes asewwi. Fihel tuzya d ttunḍa ,  ur yelli d acu ara twaliḍ.  A win ileḥḥun deg yiḍ a win ileḥḥun deg uzal, i tezzi lmux-iw”.  Nesla , slan,  ahat a teslem ula d kunwi  acu id sewjaden. Timḥermin tiberqacin , lefwaḍi  turqimin ad nḍent i tṣaddarin akken ad ɣument leɛyub akked timenqas.  Si zik ne neẓra tismin terwent-d ala nḥas.  Meɛna tecmet werǧin a tt-iɣum ukaḥal, adaṛ uzlig ula id-as d yega uxelxal. Ma ṭas as yuɣal d ackal. Akka ula d leɛib-nneɣ.  ur yelli-ara  d imṣeḍhi.  Yessen  amek ad yeflali akken ad yaf abrid ɣer tqaɛet. Yettenfal-d  gar yinzizen imqerṣa. Tafawet werǧin tewwid d  tenqedurt, u teqendurt yellan werǧin i s-nnunef melba tifuwta. Neɛbbed asmerqaɛ!  Amek ara yeddu wul ɣer reḥba meskud  tasa tnegi s tewla? Hum u ɣum ṛebbi ɛaziz lebsel qareḥ. Yeɣli yicer ɣef akal, ahat  dayemmi akka sliɣ la ttmejident  lxalat . Wama yelha ad nemekti. Yelha ad neskfel tiden n yiḍeli. Yelha ad nemkti  asmi akken,  awalen-is s tufra, iten-nettawi. Wihin deg qelmun-is , tihin deg iciwi-s.  Seg tasfift ɣer tayed, nnḍen  yisefra-s ɣef  tudert d lexlawi.  Kecmen leḥwari  cergen aɛjar n tsusmi.  Ddin yufa wejṭuti  abrid ɣef unnar akken ɣef allen ad yezwi tindal.  meɛna acu tebɣa-m:  taqabact id yeddem teḥfa,dayemmi Na Fati tewet-itt lwehma. Lewehma iɣ yeǧǧen nebehba, ur negzi tin ur nebri I ta.   Inni-as kan i bab n wawal: “ afurk ɣef nejgugel yerka.” Ansi akken i-iɛedda lɛez ad immeɣ ddel. Awal ur yelli d asmiri, imi adif-ines d-aciri. Ulas imesli yuɣen leqrar seg yimmi. Ulac affus icebken ɣef ubeḥri. Imezwuya neǧran tira ɣer ublaḍ. Reqmen tudert-nsen ɣef usɣar. Tifinaɣ d lewcayer. Times ma telha i tuqda, aḍar yelha i twefɣa. akken ad ttdum lḥamu di tẓeqqa ilaq asɣer ara yesmeɣren tafa. Awal-nneɣ neǧǧa-t iruḥ seg imi akka nebḍa am ibawen ɣef lluḥ. Acu n tajmlil a bu tajmilit, acu n tebḥirt a bu teqwirt? Yella deg awal lebɣi-nneɣ meqqer , ul-nneɣ meẓẓi. ahat limer ad yuɣal ad yinni:” Acu-t sirk-agi?Ayen akka tɛebdem ṣelṭan n mejbada? Ayen akka teddam d iqanen? Ayen akka  iwen yeṭṭef asawan Si Qeddur u rbaɛtu? Aɛni tettum belli albeɛd akken izebbel yerna mačči d aɛdaw ayen-nni, wayeḍ akken id yesukes yerna mačči d aḥbib ayen-nni? Meɛlum a tettum imi izzi kan iwen-id yecnan kunwi ad taɣem disk-ines:”  Iḍelli leɛca, mi txeraq yis-nneɣ targit, nuffa amdan yettneẓma. Mi ten-lluɛa  nnena-as acu-t waya? Iself  i-wudem-is yenna: “ ḍemɛaɣ tubit  n lewqam seg widen ur nessin lewqam. Tura zrin leɛwam, anda iyi tebra-m iyi-d tuffa-m. D lexyal yeddurin lexyal. Ɛabbeɣ am uɛarrus ajeɣlal. Ur tegziɣ d -axxam neɣ d lḥebs i ledwam”. Limer id ak-terbiḥ ay ul, ass-a kra yura Muhya aten yefɣed d-adlis. Yettnuz anda ttnuzun tektabin . Yeččur timrefɛin anda ttrusun yedlisen.  Limer di tebḥent tinedlisin n yidlsen n Muḥya, tili ad yili s wacu ara nezdi lqed. Meɛna akken qqaren : ay atma llah lḥedd, imi lewqam ur as-yezmir ḥedd, aqleɣ am wid ur  neɣli ur nbedd! 

<p style="text-align: right;">Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Amezdi n At Mesbaḥ i d-yettaken tawacult “Ḥannaṭ” yellan di taddart n Tewrirt yettabaεen taɣiwant n Ukeffadu . Di tmida tis 20 uɣen akal deg uẓaɣar yellan di temnaḍt n Uzellagen aɣlad aɣelnaw uṭṭun 26 ,deg taddart “Bu Tagut “ɣef umhares Aṛumi “Tṭiṭaṛ”d win I yekksen amur-is i tmurt , yezzenz azaɣar i kraḍ n yirgazen deg udrum-nni , ṭṭfen agemmaḍ azal n 19 n igeṭṭaṛ , yesseɣ d aẓebbuj d tidekt , leqmen-t , yebra-d aṭas n yisufar “abu tteffeḥ , alemli, acemrar , abraraq&amp;hellip,;bḍan angalus ɣef sin ,yiwen yewwi-t d yiwen ,wayeḍ wwin-t d sin acku sin-nni d atmaten , llan-t ugar n 3000 n thatimin, ma d aleqqem yezga yal aseggas . Deg unekcum n waggur n tuber azemmur ibeddu iɣelli-d seg tzemmrin ,ass i deg ttruḥun ttawin asdar, deg wass n 28 tuber neɣ deg umenzu n yemrayen i wumi qqaren “leḥlal”d akud i deg azemmur d lawan-is ad-yenfel imi n taylewt , akken kra n waggur d imuras n umuwan din i ttafen tagnit ad mεawanen akken yella deg wawal “ afus deg ufus , taεekkumt ẓayen ad t-ifsus” , yal wa s uxxam-is ɣur-sen ugar n 27 yixxamen . Tanezzayt zik ad d-akin ad heyyin alallen n umahil , yecban imeḥbaken , iswalen ,…Mi d-llin icciwen n tafukt teḍwa tafat i tɣaltin ufella yal yiwen yelha s usaḍur-is , zdin iɣallen ,aεeqqa amenzu yekcem ɣer taswalt, meslen yiwen unnar d win i tadukkli , d azdi , leqḍen-t beṭṭun-t d iswalen d aεcaṛ wa i umɣid , kra i txxamt n udris , neɣ siğğwen-t ttaɣen ayen yuqan deg uḥriq ,mi yebda uzizwu ifennu , tagella ad d-tres ɣer lqaεa ad derwen ɣef yiwen imekli , tettban-d taḍsa ɣef ugam-nsen , tellef tifawt deg wallen-awen ,win ur nekfi ara alqaḍ xeddmen-as tiwizi d anabaz ad yemmed leqdic-is ,igerdan ttaken-asen tiswalin timeẓẓyanin ttagen-asen timzizwer akken ad yili umussu anwa ara ad tt-yeččaren d amenzu d alɣuɣ ,win mazal ttawin-as-d amegda “kkiɣ-d sswada , wwiɣ-d imeqyasen ,kečč ay aneggaru a leḥna-k n tberda iɣeṛsen” tameddit n wass tasmuḍi mi ara ad d-teɣli , ad jamεen taffa n uzemmur ɣer yiswalen ad berken seg yixxamen, iḍ-nni inaragen ad d-zzin ɣer yiwen uxxam aqbur “axrib” ,ameslay ɣef uzemmur n useggas-nni yal aεeggal s tambaṭ-is ma yurew neɣ xaṭi ,imɣaren tbub tesnagt ttaken-d tamseɣara i temsalt yuglen , ttalsen-d tinafusin yesseḍsayen i d-yettaran taktawt ɣer deffir amek sεeddan timeḍḍirt-nsen. Akken ussan n uzewwi alma cerwen-ten , di taggra “Furar “ isalayen alqaḍ mi ara ğğuğgen-t, azemmur ad d-yaẓeḍ di lmεisra ttağğwen-d i umgassu azal 1800 litrat n zzit , llan kra flen akkin .Mi ara ad uɣalen seg uzaɣar d rrbeḥ, d nneεma , d aɣbalu n uwlaɣ, d ameɣlid , akken i d as-qqaren :” zzit n uzaɣar , d asɣun “.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Abdous Azedine 

  
 Aseggas-a yella-d unbeddal n tnmehla anda acḥal d anelmad I d-yegren isuɣan ilmend n tuffɣa n tnemhalt-nni taqburt yesεan 10 n yiseggasen di tesnawit-a .Dɣa rran-d yiwen unemhal ‘’Ḥassayem’’ ikcem-d akken d yinelmaden di tuɣalin ,ɣur-s yakan tirmi deg uḥric usedwel. Ilugan iḥerkel-asen i yinelmaden d yiselmaden akk d inuwar ,tuɣal am uneqqas ,iteddu di tama-s kan , yefka azal i tmussni anda widak ifazen yewwi-ten ɣer temkerḍiḍt taɣelnawt di tmaneɣt id-yellan deg waggur n Tuber, yerra azal daɣen i yidles anda tidukla uɣerbaz usirem n tesnawit deg umenzu-nni n Yennayer yezrin sfuglen armud-a ɣef yiwen n wass s tallelt unemhal , anda yella wahil d ameẓyan ‘’timzikent d tiɣawsiwin n zik akk d yidlisen s tfarest n Tmaziɣt’’ , yella-d daɣen usarag s ɣur «Ɛezdin Zirem» , di taggara d tegnit d akud n ccna d anabaz d ilemziyen-nsen.Deg uḥric n tsekla anda ussan-a iselmaden n Tmaziɣt sewjaden-d aɣmis anda ara meslen d yinelmaden irran ad kkin akk d yiselmaden n tingawin-nniḍen ,wid yeṭṭfen aseɣti n yimagraden d useḍru-ines d iselmaden n Tmaziɣt anda yella gar-asen mass “Ɛecwi Ɛezdin” d netta id-igan amahil-a akk d tselmadin-nniḍen n tanga-a ,anda ara yili ugbur d anesbaɣur deg-s «isefra, inzan, azeṭṭa n wawalen , tullisin ,tamedyazt , timseεraq , tusnakalt ɣef kra umussnaw…..dɣa tadbelt ur teğği ara, fkan-d afus akken taεekkumt ad t-ifsus , ṭṭfen tasmilt n umsuded i uɣmis , ass ara tsisnen deg snat n tmerwin (20) di yebrir anda i tettuɣal tafugla n tefsut n umaziɣ. Tasnawit Uğeddi yellan di temnaḍt Ukeffadu daymen deg uɣlad n tmussni , tettak tabɣest i unelmad akken ad yaẓ ɣer dzat ama di tussna neɣ deg yidles.

<p style="text-align: right;">   Azedine Abdous 

  
 Tafaska tis 12 n Iwennan naγ ḥkku-d taẓuri “Raconte-arts», teldi tiwwura-s s wudem unsib ass n 24 almi d 31 di yulyu di taddart n Yigersafen taγiwant n At-yeğğar γef teɣzi n 08 wussan. Tafeska-agi tsuddes-itt-id tdukla n tẓuri n sinima n Tizi Wezzu, s lemɛawna n usqamu aγarfan n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu, taɣiwant n At-Yeğğar akked imezdaɣ n taddart n Yigarsafen. Tafaska agi ussand ɣer-s deqs inaẓuren, nnig n 300 n yinaẓuren izzayriyen xarṣum wid n tmurt n leqbayel d wid n tmura n lbarani id-yussan di Fransa , kamerun, Tunes d tid niḍen. Ahil n leqdic d amerkanti, anda llant temzikniyin, isaragen, isura, ticeqqufin n umezgun, timucuha, tamedyazt, ccna, timliliyin, uraren deg yiberdan akked yizenqan. Iswi n tfaska-agi d asnerni d unegmu n yidles amaziɣ d win n umaḍal, d umbadal ger tγarmiwin. Asentel n tfaska-agi d “Ger Yiḍelli d wass-a, Aḍar iteddu d Tara”. Tafaska ḥkku-d taẓuri yes-s ay d-tbedd tejmaεt n taddart n Yigarsafen anda iḥedren merra yimezdaɣ. Ḥasen Metref aselway n tdukla Inaẓuren n Tizi Wezzu yesefhem-d iswi n tfaska-agi, u yerra tajmilt meqqren i taddert n Yigarsafen i iggan irebbi i leqdic-agi, imi d yiwet n taddert id-yefkan amedya di tezdeg n twenaḍt di tmurt n leqbayel sumata, anda i tewwi arraz n taddert zeddigen di Tizi-Wezzu, n useggas 2014. Syen tasqamut n taddert n Yigarsafen rran tajmilt i kra n win i d-yusan ɣer tfaska-agi. Anazur Denis Martinez, yerra tajmilt i kra n wid iqedcen γef tfaska-agi i yettnarnin deg seggas γer wayeḍ, imi wa yettagem wa yettajew di tẓuriwin yemgaraden n umaḍal.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ɣas ttidirin akkin i yilel, akkin i tmurt n yizwawen, llan kra zgan deg-s s wallaɣ d wul almi i as-d-ttakken ddeqs n usnulfu d tarzeft, d abaɣur. Noufel Bouzeboudja, yedda deg umedya-a i d-newwi imi snagayen (cehden) yiqeddicen-is. Taggara-a, dɣa, yessufeɣ-d ammud n tullisin "D Tayri kan&amp;quot,; yerna iḥella-d arraz s yiwen n usaru i yemmuggen ula s tezwat. Newwi-d awal yid-s deg tdiwennit-a!

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Ad as-nebdu s warrazen i d-tḥellaḍ ussan iɛeddan deg kra n tfaskiwin s usaru n Allegoria i tgiḍ s tezwawt. Mmeslay-aneɣ-d ɣef tikkin-a akked umecwar n usaru-nni… 

 Noufel Buzeboudja: Allegoria d asaru i d-nhegga nekk akked 4 n yinaẓuṛen-nniḍen : Nobilis Bellator ɣer ufares (production) d aspanyuli ; Bamboocha ɣer uẓawan seg tmurt n Seṛbya am Nenad i imudden afus deg ufares ; ma d taɣuri s teglizit iga-tt Conrad Harvey ; s tespanyulit Alicia Manzanares : s teqbaylit d nekk. Nobilis Bellator d amedakkel-iw, iḥemmel ayen uwumi qqaren Timelapse (tugniwin i yettɛeddayen s tazzla). Ihi, iwala acu ttaruɣ, acu ttxemmimeɣ, yessuter-iyi-d ad xedmeɣ yid-s. Lliɣ ussan-nni di Spanya, nqesser, nehḍer, bdiɣ qqareɣ-as-d kra n yiḍrisen i uriɣ s tezwawt, ladɣa yiwen n uḍris anda ttmeslayeɣ ɣef tmagit s unamek afelsafi, anda uriɣ ‘’Ur lliɣ n da, ur lliɣ n dihin, tumert i d tamagit-iw.’’ Yenna-ak ihi, d wagi ! Bdiɣ asuqel d tira s teglizit almi d-yeffeɣ uḍris semmaɣ-as ‘’Allegoria’’, acku yemwata akked tugnatin i yellan deg usaru-agi anda amzun akken d ixef n umdan i d-yettmeslayen. Syin akkin, nceggeɛ-it i waṭas n tfaskiwin deg umaḍal, nettu-t acemma. Almi d asmi d-newwi arraz amezwaru di Vimeo (Awardeo) di Internet. Bdant akk tifaskiwin-nniḍen ttceggiɛent-aɣ-d icaggen n ufran unsib (Lauriers de sélection officielle), rnan-d warrazen-nniḍen seg Hollywood Independant Documentary Film Festival, seg Los Angeles, seg Sesimbra di Portugal, Best Short Timelapse di Timelapse Network… Lḥasun, ur nebni ara akk fell-asen. Ussan-a yezrin nella nekk d Nobilis Bellator di Portugal anda i d-newwi arraz di yiwet n tfaska n Umerreḥ d Yidles ideg ttekkint ugar n 22 n tmura. Ma d Conrad yewwi-yaɣ-d arraz-nni seg Hollywood.

  Ɣef tmuɣli-k, d acu i as-yefkan tazmert almi i d-yufrar? 

 Cukkeɣ yufrar-d acku imudd tamuɣli-nniḍen i tewsit-agi (genre) n tẓuri. Akken i d-nnan di The Monthly Film Festival: «Allegoria d awal anezmar ɣef talsa d tuffirin-is lqayen. D tiɣri ɣer teɣdemt, ɣer uzref d tlelli. D asuɣu i yellan di yal yiwen. D tiɣri i usirem, i tnekra.» Ma d Gary Yost d anfaras amarikani, yenna belli «newwid amaynut i tewsit-a n Timelapse, anda nefka anamek i umaḍal d tudert. Allegoria d asenfar i yettwaxedmen seg wul» i d-yerna. D tidet, s waṭas n wafud d wul i d-nesnulfa asaru-agi. Zemren ad t-walin imeɣriyen-nwen di Youtube neɣ di Vimeo s tutlayin-nni i d-nebder yakan. 

  Ad d-nuɣal ɣer tira. Terniḍ-d taggara-a ungal s teglizit «A pebble in the river» akked wammud n tullisin «D tayri kan». Tazwara melmi i as-tenniḍ ad d-ssufɣeɣ ungal s teglizit? 

 Taglizit d tutlayt i ɣriɣ di tesdawit. Uriɣ yis-s yakan di 2004 yiwet n tceqquft i d-nurar deg Uxxam n Yidles di Tizi ilmend n usenfar aneggaru n Licence-inu. Akka, tuget nniyya di tira-w tallit-nni. Werǧin nwiɣ ad ssufɣeɣ ungal ladɣa s teglizit. Maca akka, bdiɣ ttaruɣ ungal-a (Aẓru deg wasif) deg yiseggasen n 2004, ur t-fukkeɣ ara, rriɣ-t ɣer leqǧer almi d aseggas n 2010, rniɣ-as tira. Ttuɣ-t kra n tallit, akken almi d 2014, aseggas melmi i as-qqimeɣ s tidet. Ayen yeṭṭef annect-a akk n wakud? Acku lliɣ ttraǧuɣ udmawen i yellan deg-s ad teddu tudert-nsen i wakken ad iyi-id-tban taggara-s, acku d taqsiḍt i yeḍran s tidet. Ahat azal n 90% deg-s. Yeffeɣ-d di Cameroun akked Legliz. 

  Akken i d-yettban, ixulef aṭas wammud «D tayri kan» winna n «Ayha ssimra». D tidet? 

 «Ahya Ssimra» yettawi-d awal ɣef wudmawen i yellan di tmurt n yiqbayliyen. Ɣef Ɛemmi Klucar, ɣef Dda Ḥemmu, ɣef tudert n kra n yimdanen di tmurt. Ma ‘’D Tayri kan’’, udmawen i yellan deg-s seg waṭas n yimeḍqan deg umaḍal, wwet seg tmurt almi d London, Ssin, Ikwadur, Marikan, Sinigal… Riɣ deg-s ad aruɣ ɣef tayri, mačči kan tayri gar urgaz d tameṭṭut, tayri gar yimdanen, gar yimdanen akked yinurag-nsen, gar yimdanen akked yimdukkal-nsen, imdanen d uẓawan…atg. Iwakken ad nelmed si tɣermiwin-nniḍen, seg yimdanen-nniḍen. Akken i ak-d-nniɣ, bɣiɣ ad aruɣ s teqbaylit mačči kan ɣef yiqbayliyen, ɣef yimdanen deg umaḍal. Ahat annect-a ur t-nennum ara di tira s teqbaylit. Yerna yewɛeṛ wannect-a acku ɛerḍeɣ ad qqimeɣ deg unagraw n tidmi (système de pensée) n yigduden-a ur t-id-ttarraɣ ara ɣer unagraw n tidmi aqbayli. Amedya: Nekkni di taddart-nneɣ mi ara yezweǧ walbɛaḍ, dɣa ur d-yettbin ara akk, ad as-nini: ‘’seg wasmi i ak-qqnen tagust ur ak-nettwali ara akk.’’ Di Ssin mačči akka i ttxemmimen, ihi, nekk ferneɣ ad aruɣ akken iwata timetti d yidles-nsen: ‘’seg wasmi i ak-ceɛlen ticemmaɛin n dragon d phoenix iḍ amenzu n zzwaǧ-ik, dayen, nuɣal nettwali-k seg waggur ɣer waggur.’’ Ur sxedmeɣ ara taserwest (Adaptation) acku di Ssin i teḍra teqsiḍt.

  Ayyuren iɛeddan telliḍ deg Paris i kra n tedwilin n tmedyazt, am tin lwaḥi d Rezki Rabia. Amek tettwaliḍ timliliyin am tidak? 

 Aql-i di Paris. Dagi i zedɣeɣ tura. Aṭas n yiqbayliyen i yellan da, dɣa tella teqbaylit yerna mliḥ. Ama d ccna, ama d tamedyazt, yerna awal d ilelli ur ttwaggaden at yičumar, ur ttwaggaden at udabu, ur ttwaggaden wansayen-nni ur nemɛin. Ma d Rezki Rabia, d argaz i ttqadareɣ aṭas, d bab n wawal, aṭas i d-yerna i tsekla taqbaylit. Tira-ines, ama d amezgun, ama d tamedyazt, lemmer di tmura yeǧǧuǧgen, tili ahat ad tesɛu amḍiq d cciɛa n yimeqqṛanen. Lameɛna tira di tmetti taqbaylit d tagujilt xas akken yeṭṭuqet «usuɣu d zzux ur nemɛin». Tikwal nxeddem tuɣuriwin di leqhawi, di ttbernat, di temkarḍiyin. Aṭas n yimdanen i d-yettasen ad aɣ-d-slen, ad slen i teqbaylit, i usefru ilelli (war takmamt, war tilas, war tilisa), i tmedyazt-nneɣ i nebɣa d tatrart, ama deg yisental ama di tektiwin. Nekkni nettaɛraḍ ad nefk udem-nniḍen i tmedyazt. Udem n usirem, n umennuɣ n tidet, n’’positivisme’’. Ur nesṭuqqut ara tiyita deg yiman-nneɣ, neɣ deg watmaten d tsetmatin-nneɣ. Nesbanay-d ayen yelhan di ttexmam n ugdud-nneɣ. Ur neɛni ara rregmat d karuhi n yiman, acku nessen d acu-yaɣ, nessen ansi i d-nekka, neẓra d acu nebɣa. Ncennu tayriwin. Tayri n tudert, tayri n teksumt, tayri n umaḍal. Nekkat deg wat laxert, wid i yugin ad nili akken nebɣa. Aṭas i d-lemdeɣ sɣur Dda Rezqi, mačči kan di tmedyazt, ula di tussna n leḥdaqa d lefhama. Neḥḍeṛ anebdu-ya iɛeddan di tfaska n Raconte-Arts akked Temsizzelt n Yiflisen n Umellil deg Uxxam n Tmussni di Ayt Yeḥya Musa, neɣra-d kra n yisefra d yiḍrisen. 

  Tanemmirt ɣef tririyin-a a mass Noufel. Ma yella kra ur nemmeslay fell-as… 

 Tanemmirt i kečč. Afud yelhan i wid akk i yettarun, ladɣa s teqbaylit. Ur nettayset ara xas abrid yewɛer, ɣezzif. Ma nessexser ass-a, azekka ad nesselhu, ad nesnerni tira, axemmem, tiktiwin-nneɣ. Akka i d amdan yettmuqulen ɣer sdat.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t: Mhenni khalifi 

  
 Tekcem yir tawla deg ikesman n lqum yennumen iɣimi ɣef ugertil n ttkal akked d waɣẓaẓ n w accaren zdat lemwaji n wussan. Ahdum-nsen (taluft i ten iceɣben) : sani tessaweḍ ssuma n Petrole. Di ṛṛeḥba umeslay( leqhawi, di tejmaɛt, deg axxam, deg uzeṭṭa n intenet, deg aɣmisen…) awal yetti yenneḍ ɣef taluft-agi: amek ara nexdem tura , acu ara nečč ma yella tɛeṭṭel ur d yuli ara di ssuma Lpetrol?

 Teḍṛa-tt d lqum am win t-wwet lbaɣa ( neɣ win ɣef iɛedda uzaylal) ur yufi amek ara sen t-yeddu i temsal! Dɣa am akken is yenna wanzi: « win yeṭṭef inijel, yufa ssebba i yiɣimi », yal wa isenned ɣef lḥir yeqwim di tesga yeṭṭunnec neɣ di teɣmeṛt yesseḥseb amek ara yili uzekka( ma dɣa s tidet ad yili uzekka) …xuḍi lɣella n yal agdud ɣer yal aɣref d irgazen-is akked tilawin-is.

 Asmi id kecmen iṛṛumyen tamurt n Lẓẓayer( deg useggas n 1830) ur d ufin lgaz akked Lpérole yettazzel deg tirgwa neɣ deg iɣeẓran n tmurt( Lebyur imezwura id skeflen yella-d deg useggas 1954). Xas akken ulac asafar-agi( i ɣ -id yettbanen ma yella ixus d nger) iṛrumyen ccemren ɣef yiɣallen-nsen , bnan timdinin, neǧǧren iberdan, sersen ssekka n tmacinin( ccmindiffir) , xedmen luzinat, wind triciti , ssulin asaganen( ports) akked d inurar n tmesrifgin, ggan lakulat d tisdawiyin, bedden ɣer tfellaḥt …lḥasun ggan ccan i tadamsa ɣnan iman-nsen , ɣnan tamurt-nsen ( Franṣa) . Akkin mačči d izli n tmura ur nesɛi ula d tiqit n Lgaz akked Petrole yerna beddent , sufuɣent-d lerbayeḥ s wacu ɛeccen yigduden-nsen-t…ma d nekni…mazal yeqqan yimal-nneɣ ɣer leswami n Petrole.

 Targit-nneɣ tedhen s Petrole, tidmi-nneɣ tettecceg ɣef Lpetrole armi qṛib yal azzayri yuɣal d amestajer yeznuzu iqeṭṭu s tibettit n Petrole. Kerfen wallaɣen gglan s iɣallen. Ttun yemdanen belli lɣella ur n fennu d akal… xuḍi ha-ten acu id yenna uɛabbaj n wawal ɣef taluft : lemmer neẓri acu teswiḍ / a takemmict n wakal/ ur kem nettaǧǧa a teɣliḍ/ di lǧib ad tiliḍ d lfal/ a kem nexdem ass akked yid/ deg-m yečča lɛeb lmal…

 Di taxriḍt kra n duṛu yellan teqqen ɣer lpetrole. Deg ukufi( tura a frigidere) kra n -iniɣem neɣ ired yellan yeqqen ɣer lpetrole. Di lkanun kra n wesɣar neɣ asafu yellan yeqqen ɣer lpertole…nuɣ , nzenz, nečča neswa si zzit n iselman yezḍa lawan akken ad aɣ iɣuṛ…dɣa din iɣur-aɣ: neqqen tawenza-nneɣ ɣer usafar ubrik armi xas tebrek tuɣal-aɣ d tafat…

 Di ccaw akal yuɣal d lbur… ala aẓegḍuf id meqqin. Di ccaw igenni yeṭṭef aman-is, aɣuṛaṛ ibedd ɣef umnaṛ…meɛna ḥedd ur d yeclig.. afellaḥ yettu igenni, axeddam yettu tidi,anelmad yettu tamussni.. uma sriɣ i ugeffur , uma sriɣ i ucemmar n iɣallen, uma sriɣ i tira yellan skud ittuddum lpetrole( am zzit n usqiṭṭer) , skud yettazzal deg iẓuran n tmurt..is yeqqar wihin akked wagi…akka i tessedhuy targit…akka i yettɣuṛ ugdud iman-is…itett ayen ur d iḥerra , deg ayen ur ur d lɣellat-ara!

 Meɛna si zik n zik i d nnan imezwura : deɛwessu mačči d aɛekkaz i teṭṭef!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Dda Belεid d isem-is n tẓuri, isem-is aḥeqqani Muḥend Uyidir Buεraba, yurar di ddeqs n yisura s tutlayt n teqbaylit deg tilizri n Lezzayer amaṭṭaf wis 04 n tmaziγt, ger-asen  » Axxam n Dda Meẓyan ».

 Dda Muḥand Uyidir Buεraba Ilul ass n 22 yennayer 1947, di taddert n Sidi Yaḥya, taγiwant n Cemini, lwilaya n Bgayet. D amecṭuḥ yekcem γer temεemmart n taddert-is anda id-yelmed leqran, syen yekcem γer uγarbaz n Fransa almi d tagar n ulmud-is. Deg seggas n 1958, lεeskkar n tmurt n Fransa yexdem yiwet n zeḍma qessiḥen γef taddert-is, anda itt-hudden s lekmal-is, dayen i idegren tawacult-is fγen zedγen deg yiwet n taddert, uγalen rruḥen γer Lezzayer tamanaγt.

 Mbaεd timmunent, yexdem deg aṭṭas n yimukan, syen yekcem s wudem unṣib γer radyu taγelnawt n teqbaylit, amaṭṭaf wis 02 deg seggas n 1965. Yurar di deqs n tedwilin ger-asent  » Arrac n Lğennet » n Σebdelḥamid Bali, dγa Dda Muḥend Uyidir yufrar-d ger imeqranen, imi ibeggen-d lxedma-s s tayri, s laḥdaqa d tmusi-s, yefka azal i wayen ixeddem. Yurar daγen di deqs n tecqqufin n umezgun i yetwasnen aṭas di tallit-nni, ger-asent « Amek id leslak-is » n Zubir Talbi, « Don quichotte » n Muḥamed Unis. Deg seggas n 1966, ibban-d i tikkelt tamenzut di tilizri n Lezzayer di tecqqufin unecraḥ akked Σli Σebdun, Muḥamed d Saεid Ḥilmi. Aseggas 2007, yekcem annar n ssinima s tahri akked yemddukal-is Mhenni, Acruf Yidir, Salaḥ Waεmer, Sid Σli nAt-Qasi d waṭas niḍen.Yurar-d di deqs n yisura s tutlayt n teqbaylit deg tilizri n tmaziγt, amaṭṭaf wis 04, ger-asen « Axxam n Dda Meẓyan » s yisem n Dda Belεid, « Yak Nniγ-ak »,  » Aḥlil-Aḥli », « Bu-Tqurdac ». Akken id-yurar deg isura niḍen id-yettεeddayen deg 04 n yimaṭṭafen n tilizri n Lezzayer ; » Σemti tafssus, les aventures de khalti Mounira, Dar Elbahğa akk Ḥabit Netzeweğ ».

 Anaẓur, Muḥen Uyidir Buεraba, yemmut tasebḥit n wass n lexmis 03 dujambar 2015 di Lezzayer tamanaγt di laεmer-is 68 n yiseggasen, mbaεd aṭan it-yeṭfen deg acḥal n yiseggasen. Tamṭelt-is tella-d di tmeqbert n Lεalya di lezzayer tamanaγt, mbaεd taẓalit n lğumuεa, s leḥdur n deqs n yemḍebren n tnaγlaft n yedles tawacult n tẓuri d yemddukal-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Tawennaḍt d tagruma (ensemble) n tassuyin neɣ iferdisen (éléments) i as-d-yezzin i umdan neɣ i talmest yeddren anida kra seg yiferdisen-a, ttekkan srid di tegmi-nsen. Neɣ nezmer ad d-nini d tagruma n tewtilin (conditions) ( tifizikiyin, ikruranen, tudersent “ biologique”) tidelsanin ( tisenmettiyin) i izemren ad d-gent kra ɣef wayen yeddren d warmuden ilsawiyen. Tamiḍrant n twennaḍt tamgamant, i d-sefran s yiwen wawal kan «tawennaḍt», tegma aṭas di leqrun-a iɛeddan, ladɣa deg yiseggasen-a ineggura. Tawennaḍt d tagruma n yisgiren(composants) imgamanen n umaval, am uzwu, aman, tignewt, adɣaɣ, ticektin, iɣersiwen d tagruma n wayen ixeddem umdan. Di lqern-a aneggaru, aseḥbiber n twennaḍt yuɣal di tlemmast n tsertit, d netta i yuɣal d asrus* (enjeu) meqqren, imi amaḍal ad ineggi si twaɣit i tt-yettraǧun, acku timura n utaram d tid n usammar ugmiḍ, ur bɣint ara ad dduklent ɣef yiwen n rray…. Tamsalt n tdamsa tekcem di tlemmast, tesluɣ lebɣi n kra n tefritin i yerran tawennaḍt d ugur meqqren , acku ma nkemmel akka, tazɣelt ad ternu deg walluy, dɣa ideflawen n yisegrisen n usfaylu, ad rennunt di fessi. Aya, ad d-yeglu s walluy n waman n yilel, dɣa ad yečč aṭas seg wakal yekkawen. ugur-nniḍen , lpitrul yuqel d tamacint n uṣurdi, yuqel d tigejdit n tdamsa, ladɣa, wid yesseččay wala wid i t-yettawin. Akk atemguri tebna ɣef wagi, meɛna imi amdan werǧin yerwa, awi-d kan , am wakal yekkawen, ur nerwi aman, tiderɣelt tewtiten armi ttwalin di kullec aṣurdi, aṣurdi. Aseḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt, d yiwen si tlata n yigigen (pilliers) n tegmi yettdumun. D wis 7 si tmanya n yiswiyen n Tiqicewt Tamgimant i Tegmi. Yettwaḥseb d amimidag i usmures n yiswiyen-nniḍen i d-nnan di tseɣrut (déclaration) n tiɣilt n umgiman. Maɛna i nekni s Yiqbayliyen, amek i teḍra di tmurt-nneɣ? Mi d-nniɣ, yakan, ɣef lpitrul , ad awen-d-iniɣ tidet, seg-s ara tetteɣ aɣrum. Ihi , ur ssusufeɣ ara ɣer tbaqit, meɛna aferdis-a, s wayen ixeddem yis umdan , yurew-d aṭas n waṭṭanen, meɛna mačči d wagi i d asentel n wass-a. Anda ma ddiɣ di tmurt iqbayliyen, ttwaliɣ icekkaren, ipuciḍen, tiqraɛtin n waman, n lgazuz, n yiẓem, deg yal amḍiq , deg yala taddart, deg yal tamdint… maɛna anisi i d-yekka waya? Si lpitrul. D wigi iwumi qqaren , imukkisen n uwreɣ aberkan. Maɛna mačči d lpitrul i d-yennan ḍegret da , neɣ dihin. Tella ttṛebga, ttṛebga-a d tin i d-nettaêw ama di twacult, deg uɣerbaz neɣ di tmetti. Maɛna aɣerbaz ur yesselmed ara, neɣ xas ma yesselmad ur sɛi ara anɣud ( rigueur) deg ayen isselmad, acku ula d lecyax tessaɛyaten liḥala tamatunt i yerzan tamurt. Lemkain, aya mačči d ssebba iwakken ad ndum deg ayen ur d-yefki ara uɣerbaz. cfiɣ zik , tiwaculin ttawint iḍuman neɣ turṣaḍ ɣer tferkiwin-nsent, ayen ireqqen ad yerɣ , ayen ara yečč wakal ,ad yuɣal d leɣber. Maɛna tura , d ayen nniḍen. Amedya i zemreɣ ad d-fkeɣ d taddart-iw, ugar n 3 imeḍqan di taddart yuɣal d tazebbalt ibrarḥen. 

 Nemmeslay akked wat taddart, maɛna tiɣri-w sɛuẓgen-as. ihi, timetti i d-yekkan si twacult, ula d nutenti ttekkant di twaɣit yerzan tamurt iqbayliyen. Cwi kan, llan yilfan , tetten ayen ttafen iwulem-asen… wagi rniɣ-t-id kan i cwiṭ n unecraḥ. Ass-a neḥṣel di twennaḍt ur nḥuder ara… arrac di taddart ṭṭeggiren ticulliḍin n “Flash», ikelkam (emballage) n teḥlawanin d wayen akk nniḍen… iberdan uqlen d agudu. Zik di taddert , yal tawacult tettḍumu azniq i as-d-yezzin , ass-a , tulawin mačči d imeṣleḥ i ttedment, d tacluḍt (sac) d ubrid yettawin ɣer temdint. Zik , argaz yettawi aḍella ɣer ssuq, tura: aḍella yuqel d leḥya, yeqqim-ed ucekkar ad isewweq meqqar. 

 I tura, ad d-neg tiɣri , neɣ ad neggugem? 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mourad Mazri  

  
 Ɣas ma deg waya qeddac, ufan yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel amek ad ɣelten akken ilaq tiliwa-nsen ed waman i d-izerrqen sey-a ed sey-a deg temnaḍt-nsen tamsedrart war anezgum-nni. Maca tella-d akken yiwet n tallit ideg muggen yimesḍanen (ikunturen) deg tbernint n yal axxam deg Udrar n Fad, syinna, ur iḍul waya xilla, uɣalen yimezdaɣ ur ttxellisen ayen ttasun ed wayen sseqdacen d aman. Imi llan dɣa ula d wid yerẓan ikunturen ɣef sebba n uxelles-a gedged. Maca, akken i aɣ-d-tenna yiwet n teɣbalut (source) iseḥḥan seg uxxam n tɣiwant, taluft ad tbeddel seg tazwara n useggas-a i d-iteddun n 2016. At Udrar n Fad ad uɣalen akken ma llan ttxellisen akk aman i asen-yettawawḍen i yixxamen, rnu aya s uḥettem. Aɣilif ageɛmir n waman i d-ibanen deg temnaḍt-nni iseggasen-a ineggura abeɛda, yeǧǧa imḍebbren n tɣiwant ad xemmen ɣef waya, send ad ɣetsen ɣef uxelles n wuzzil-a n tudert sɣur yiɣermanen (citoyens) sey-a d tasawent, segmi ara ttwasbedden yimesḍanen – wid iḥessben. Yewwi-d ad d-nini dakken ccɣel-a d win igerrzen. Imi, deg teɣzi n useggas aṭas n umennuɣ akked tḥeyyaft i d-yettasen seg waman-a. Ma neẓra belli llan yixxamen seɛɛun ugar n uzgen n usrag (ssaɛa) i tcarit n waman, wiyaḍ werǧin iɛedda wakud n snat n tmerwin n temrac (ɛecrin n deqqayeq). Ihi, aya d ayen ara d-igen taɣdemt tinmettit (justice sociale) skud d ayen tesqedceḍ i ara txellseḍ. Yuɣ lḥal, ula d asenfar n AEP ara d-yemmaggen seg Lɛenser Azegza, mazal ttraǧun lɣaci n Ayt Smaɛel beddu-yis am akken tettraǧu temɣart ayyur n lɛid.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi  

  
 Akken iban lḥal, tettili tikwal temḍerrit seg wayen ixeddem ugama. Tikwal iḍerru-d kra ur ihewwu i yimdanen, imi d taxessart i d-yetteggrayen, ur d abaɣur i yettwawfayen. Nnig n zznezla, times d waḍu i izemren ad gen asewwiɣ, ad bedlen s ndir addad i d-ufan, yella daɣen uḥammal n waman. Aḥammal-a, ihi, neɣ iḥammalen-a, am wayen-nniḍen i d-iḍerrun di kra teswiɛin n ddunit, snernayen-d tuggdi deg wulawen n lɣaci. Ɣas ahat ur d-ttsebbiben tikwal deg temḍerrit i terwiḥt n umdan, lameɛna mi ara tent-yaɣ wakal, yettaɣ-iten ula d amdan s timmad-is. Dɣa, deg Ayt Smaɛel, akal deg tegrest ireṭṭeb, yettmagga d amihi i tikli. Amedya. Ad d-nemmeslay ɣef Uneqquc d wayen yeḍran deg umkan-nni aseggas yezrin, asmi yeɣli yexser ubrid, tmentilt, d aman i yesɣelben ɣef tɣarit n wakal. D ayen yeǧǧan inehharen ad ttɛeddayen seg Rrif di leɛḍil almi yettwaseggem ubrid-nniḍen n Uneqquc, mbeɛd mi teqdec deg-s termist (entreprise) s ubellez. Acu kan, ɣas iban-d zun uɣilif yefra, maca mazal yezmer ad d-yennerni ma llan-d yiḥammalen iweɛren. Ula d lxuf, ur yefsi seg yiterrasen, ladɣa inehharen. War ma nettu adeg n Leɛnaser, acku aneggaru-a, aṭas n txessar i d-yessegra imi xilla daɣen i ibedlen deg-s seg kraḍ n yiseggasen yezrin, ar ass-a. Aya, yuɣ lḥal yekka-d seg yigeffuren i d-yettmarayen s ccyaḍa yal tagrest. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Kaisa Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Ass n tlata yezrin mmyefken ttiɛad  inelmaden , tiselmadin n Tsedawit n Tubiret  akked d iselmaden n tmaziɣt akken ad d-begnen lɣiḍ nnsen ɣef yimekwan d-isaḥen  n tmaziɣt, imi ḥala 209 d amkan seg 19000 i yeɛnan aselmed n tmaziɣt. Tikli n wass n tlata tella-d daɣen d tagnit akken ad d-gen tiɣri inelmaden d tselmadin bac ad tuɣal tmaziɣt d tunsibt deg tmendawit d-iteddun. Tiɣri-agi tebda-d seg tesdawit, tfuk di tkadilt n Tubiret anda yettunefk wawal i kra n win yebɣan ad d-yini kra. gar wid d-yemeslayen yella Nureddin Belal, d aselmad deg tesdawit. Yesmekta-d de awal-is bell tamurt-a d tamaziɣt, tamaziɣt d tamsalt n wegdud… ḥala tilin ara tili. Tfuk tikli deg talwit akken d tt-sarmen widen i s-d- yellan d lmendad am unelmad Bouaklin d imeddukal-is d tmeddukal-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> A.I 

  
 Aneḥbus n usekcem n yisufar n wučči yecban igumma seg tmura n lberrani yeldi tiwwura i usali deg ssuma n tuget n yisufar deg leswaq.

 Ɣas akken deg tizwar d lbanan d tudeffaḥ i tsuma taluft-a n leɣla, maca taggara-agi iɛum ula deg wayen i d-yettwakkasen deg tebḥirin. Ṭumaṭic yellan tettnuz s 30 n yidinaren, tuɣal ɣer 150, mi akken ticcert tewweḍ s anda ur tt-yessawaḍ umdan: 1400 n yidinaren i kilu ! Ma d lbaṭaṭa tettlawaḥ gar 90 d 100 n yidinaren ɣas ma yella akka tignawt teṣfa, acku yal mi ara yili ugeffur ttafen-d tamentilt dakken ulamek ara tt-id-kksen degmi tuli deg ssuma. Abesbas ur neḥwaǧ ula d kra n ttawil meqqren, yerna deg ssuma s wazal n krad n yiḥricen imi seg 30 yuli ɣer 90 n yidinaren. Tura akka mi d isufar n tmurt wwḍen ɣer tizi yecban ta, ur d-yeqqim useqsi ɣef wayen i d-yettasen seg lebɛid. Lbanan, win akken yellan ɣef wudem ufus i yal yiwen, yekka akin i tizi: 900 n yidinaren i kilu, ma d atteffaḥ yewweḍ ɣer 1250 n yidinaren i kilu. Lkiwi ulamek ara akk ara t-id-yebder umdan imi a-ta-n deg tqacuct s 1500 n yidinaren i kilu. Tuget n yimdanen i d-nemmuger deg ssuq n temdint n Tubiret ur bhiten ara seg leɣla iḥuzan isufar-a i d-yettasen seg berra, maca lɣiḍ-nsen mi walan ula d ayen yettwaxdamen deg tmurt-nneɣ yewweḍ akka. “ Amek i yezmer umdan ad yidir s tjernant-is sdat leɣla yecban wa? “ I d-yenna s usḥissef yiwen n ubabat deg ssuq. Ameddakkel-is, aḍellaɛ d ilem, itezzi, yeṭṭafar s wallen, yenna-d:” Negguma ad nqerreb ɣer yimsenza, imi yal taɣawsa ara tsamiḍ ad ak-id-teqqes. Amek ara nawi lbaṭaṭa s 100 n yidinaren d ṭumaṭic n 150 n yidinaren ? Ɣef wakka i ttwaliɣ, s kra n win yettɛicin s tjarnant-is, ad d-yers fell-as ṭṭlam deg wass. Ulac s wacu ara nqabel tarwa.” Akka tura ssuma n yisufar tewweḍ sanda ur as-izemmer umdan, aṭas n yimdanen i yekcem uɣilif ɣef wamek ara teḍru yid-sen mi ara d-yaweḍ waggur n Remḍan, yettwasnen s leɣla.

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. Smail 

  
 Adlis d yiwen n wallal n tmusni iyselmden atas n tsutiwin uqbel-neɣ. Tagara yagi, “sebba n unerni n tiknulujit», yebda yettenqas wazal I s-ttaken yemdanen. Yella wanda adlis ur d-ijebbed ara maḍi tamuɣli n yemdanen. Llan wid tyettmuqulen s yir tamuɣli.   Aseḍlem n tiknulujit ɣef wayen yuɣen azamul n tmusni, maci d sebba yettqenniɛen atas, acku maci d yiwet n tmurt iyetfen I snat-agi n tɣawsiwin akken ad sbaɛden-t amecwar-nsen-t deg webrid n tmusni.  Deg webrid-nsen ɣer uxeddim, neɣ deg win n tuɣalin, uqbel taguni, mi yella cwit n lweqt ger cɣel d wayeḍ, ad twaliḍ adlis ger ifassen. S ibeddi neɣ s iɣimi, ayagi ur yesɛi ara ats n wazal.  Ama d ayen icudden ɣer wayen i lemden,  ɣer uxeddim-nsen, neɣ d ayen niḍen ur yesɛi ara daɣen   atas n wazal. Ilaq kan ur yettɛedday ara was melba ma ur yelli ara wedlis. Xas akka aqlaɣ deg yiwet n teswiɛt anda ayen yak nettnadi nezmer ad tnaf deg l’”internet», maca mazal ttnadin tamusni deg wedlis. Wigi d wid yesnen azal n tektab I wumi mazal ttaḥarrin-as amḍiq wessiɛen deg yexxamen-nsen. Deg temkarḍiyin, imdanen ttemderkalen akken ad d-aɣen idlisen d wungalen. Mezzi neɣ meqqer, taɣuri ur tesɛi ara laɛmer ilaqen neɣ ur nlaq ara. Imɣaren, ula d wid ikarkfen, ttatafen ger ifassen-nsen, adlis s wayen n ifadden sen-d-yegran. Nekni, ur yehwaǧ ara wayagi timenna, acku d ayen nettidir yal ass, adlis ur yeswi ara tibṣelt ɣer tugett n yemdanen. Ameqran ur yesselmad I wmezyan. Deg ttawilat n usiweḍ, imdanen axir ad ttmuqulen gar-asen wala ad dmen adlis akken ad d-gemren cit n tmusni. Ar timkerḍit abrid ur tessinen. Deg yexxamen, ungalen d yedlisen ttafend iman-nsen deg lqaɛ n ikarṭunen anda ttafen iɣerdayen iman-nsen. Mi ur d-yegri ara deg-sen wayen ara yettwaɣren, ad ddun am nutni am ukerṭun deg wayeg llan ɣer iḍumman.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Fatiha K. 

  
 Imezdaɣ n yiɣil mḥella di tɣiwant leqsar ɣelqen ass lexmis iɛeddan abrid anda id -sbegnen lɣiḍ nsen ɣef kra n yiɣublan ideg ttidiren acḥal d iseggasen-aya nutni d araju d acu kan ulac kra n umaynut ɣef tifrat n yiɣublan , dayen iten-yeǧǧan ɣelqen abrid imi četkayen si lexsas n tisit waman di taddart nsen s waṭas acku llan tikwal ur d-ttasen ara akk waman imi llan ayagi ttasend tikelt di ddurt uɣallen ulac akk ɣef wannect-a yesefk ɣef yimezdaɣ ad d-aɣen tiṣiṭrin n waman s suma yeɣlayen anda tettaweḍ ɣer 1200 idinaren ayagi d ugur ameqqran ɣef twaculin-a , Si tama nniḍen ssuturen daɣen trisiti n yiberdan di tama -agi imi tuget n tuddar id -yezgan deg leqsar sɛan trisiti n yiberdan ɣef waya yenerna lɣiḍ nsen yerna qrib ad yekcem unebdu imi teddun akk medden deg iḍ di tama-agi , dacu kan maci d tikelt tamezwarut i četkayen seg yiɣublan-a ameɛna imḍebren teɛna temsalt gar-asen aselway n tɣiwant tɣab tmuɣli nsen ɣer yiɣublan-a ideg rwan lmerta . 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas.A 

  
 Yewwi-d Uḥuddu Aɣerman (Protection Civile) n waɣir n Bgayet agzul n yineɣmisen ɣef yindaren n tmes i d-yellan seg umenzu n yunyu alama d 31 deg ṭuber n useggas-a n 2015. Gar yindaren n tẓegwa ed wid n tmizar, llan-d 624 s umata, gar-asen 68 d wid iweɛren, i yerran d iɣed ugar n 497, 80 n yihikṭaren n tɣemmayt, azal n 3956 n yisekla at igumma, akked 2463 n tbaliwin n lqerḍ neɣ n walim, rnu-yas kra n teɣrasin n tzizwa. Ma yella seg tama nniḍen, ilmend n tsemhuyt yesmiḍen, ad d-yettwaheggi wahil n uḥesses sɣur Tmehla Tamatut n Uḥuddu Aɣerman, akked Tmehla n Uḥezzeb, ɣef usujed i tegrest i d-ileḥḥmen. Aya, ad yili ladɣa ɣef twuɣa merra i d-iḍerrun deg yixxamen, ladɣa ɣef ululeɣ (risque) n uxnaq i d-yettasen seg umunuksid n karbun. Ahil-a i d-yettwaheggan ad idum teɣzi n ccetwa-ya. Ad d-nesmekti dakken, akken i d-yenna Uḥuddu Aɣerman deg ulɣu-yis, aya ad yili s uttekki n Tmehla n Usegmi daɣen, bac ad ttwaḥazen ula d isɣuren iɣurbizen (établissements Scolaires) n uswir alemmas. Ma yella d iferdisen n temhelt (unités opérationnelles), yenna-d wulɣu dakken ad d-lhunt ed uḥesses n yimezdaɣ, akken ad ẓren waṭas seg-sen ɣas deg temnaḍin ibeɛden, imi aya ad yili s tallelt n umɛiwen-nsen n SDE, am Sonelgaz. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Sidi Xaled Abdella, d mmi-s n Abdella Weḥsen si taddart n At Buyeḥya. Izdeɣ, iceyyex di taddart n At Buɛli deg lɛerc n At Dwala. Sidi Mḥed Lḥaǧ, netta si taddart n At Lḥaǧ deg At Maḥmud. Asmi, ikker ad d-iḥuǧ, irza ɣer taddart n At Buyeḥya ɣer Sidi Abdella Weḥsen, amɣar lbaraka, akken ad t-id-iẓur send ad iruḥ s axxam n Rebbi. Yenna-as : ‘’aqli bɣiɣ ad ruḥeɣ ɣer uxxam n Rebbi, bɣiɣ ad tedduḍ yid-i’’. Yerra-as-id : ‘’imi d annect-a i tebɣiḍ, ruḥ kan ɣer mmi Xaled, d netta i izemren i tigi . Sidi Mḥend Lḥaǧ, yuder srid ɣer Wat Buɛli, anda yettili Xaled, yeẓra-t-id. Netta yenna-as-id : ‘’ruḥ, ad isahel Rebbi fell-ak, ayen illan gar yifassen-iw, ur ak-ttɣulaɣ ara yis-s’’. Sidi Mḥed Lḥaǧ, yuɣ abrid n lḥiǧ, yedda deg uɣeṛṛrabu d lḥeǧǧaǧ. Mi wwḍen ɣer tlemmast n lebḥar, ibda la iḥeccar yillel. Lemwaji simal rennunt-d, simal ttimɣuṛent, alammi aɣeṛṛabu yeččur akk d aman. Ibda la ibella. 

 Lḥeǧǧaǧ akk bdan, ssawalen, nedhen s wid d-iddan yid-sen slid Sidi Mḥend Lḥaǧ. Aɣeṛṛabu simal la ibellaɛ. Neṭṭqen ɣer-s, nnan -as: ‘’i kečč ur tessawaleḍ ara?’’ Dɣa Sidi Mḥend Lḥaǧ, irfed ifassen-is s igenni, yendah s Sidi Xaled Abḍella, ibda la yessawal. 

 Netta, Sidi XaLed Abḍella, Yuɣ-it lḥal di taddart-is, deg At Buɛli, ittẓalla lǧamuɛa. Imiren, Tala-Ixlan ur sɛin ara Ccix, ttẓallen ɣer-s deg Wat Buɛli. Qqaṛen-d, Ccix ibedd sdat imẓulla, tafekka-s tella, netta ulac-it. Israffeg deg yigenwan ɣer wanda ibellaɛ uɣeṛṛabu, isellek-it-id. Mi-d yuɣal lexsen-d akk yijufaṛ-is. Imẓulla n TaLa_Ixlan i illan din, ttaḍsan mi walan Ccix yettqudduṛ d aman; qqaṛen gar-asen s teɛrabt : “ Bulɛlih” ! Seg i ten-iwala ttaḍsan fell-as, inṭaq, yenna-asen : ‘’ihi, ɣileɣ mačči akka!

 Ruḥut ! 

 Ddyun, war timira

 Ayla ar tiwwura

 Ad tettem ur trewwum

 Ad txeddmem ur tɛeyyum .

 Ɣef wakken d-qqaren, ayen idεa Ccix iffeɣ. Ass-a, taddart n Sidi Xaled Abḍella ssawalen-as At Buɛli. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Lasheb Ramdane 

  
 Am yal amenzu n wayyur n wunbir, tamurt n lezzayer , tessmektay-d Tagrawla n 1954. Seg wass-nni ar ass-a, 62 n yiseggasen segmi i d-kkren Yizzayriyen akken ad qablen acengu amesbaṭli i yebɣan ad yesteɛmer tamaurt, ama s yidles –nsen ama s tutlayt –nsen.

 Ulac acu ur xdimen deg lejdud-nneɣ: nɣan, tilawi, irgazen akkedd yigerdan ; serɣen iɣerbazen, xedmen ayen ur yezmir yiwen ad yettu. Usan-d ad aɣ-fakken, ad aɣ-snegren. Maca, imir banen-d yirgazen i tesɛa tmurt n Lezzayer myuṭṭafen afus deg ufus s tebɣest, d tiḥerci , banen-d belli deg teswiɛt n ddiq, Izzayriyen, ttuɣalen d yiwen : d agdud ur nqebbel ara lbaṭel ; ur nettsusum ara i wayen yebɣa Uṛumi ad t-yexdem. D amezruy i yellan d inigi i wayen yuɣen Izzayriyen. Yerna ar ass-a, mazal wid i d-yecfan, llan imir d imjuhad, menɛen seg yir ifassen. Mi ara d-ḥekkun, d ayen ur iqebbel leɛqel ɣef wayen srewten Yiṛumyen deg yizzayriyen. Mazal later-nsen ar ass-a n wussan. I lmend n usmekti n tegrawla n 54, yal tama n tmrut n leqbayel , yal taddart, ad ruḥen ɣer yisebdaden( monuments) akken ad sersen ijeğğigen , ad sterḥmen ɣef lerwaḥ n cuhada. Dɣa, deg taddart n texliğt At Ʃattu deg Micli ad xedmen asebdad s yisem n umeɣras Si Lḥafiḍ Yaḥa yewḍen leɛfu n Rebbi kra n wayyuren aya. Deg taddart At laɛziz, yal aseggas mi ara yekcem umenzu n wunbir kkaten lbarud. Deg tɣiwanin-nniḍen, am Yiɣil Imula deg Waḍiyen, tettaččar taddart-nni imi dinna llan aṭas n wallalen i d-yesmektayen ṭṭrad, ttasen-d seg Wat Yanni, ttawin-d inelmaden akken ad walin later n yiṛumyen. Amenzu n wunbir 1954, ulac win i izemren ad t-yettu. Ad yerḥem Rebbi imeɣrasen n tegrawla. Ad d-nebder kra deg-sen : Abane Ramdane, Ḥassiba Ben Bouali , Mustapha Ben Boulaid, Krim Belkacem, Amirouche Ait Hamouda, Abderrehman Mira , Si Lhouas d waṭas-nniḍen, mačči d yiwen ad t-id nebder. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Zakia Ben yahia  

  
 I usmekti kan, llan ttmaggant temliliyin-a kra n yiseggasen tura ɣer deffir maca yusa-d akken-nni kan wayen i asent-igan tilas almi yezri ddeqs n wakud. Dɣa, gar wid ixemmen i tuɣalin n temliliyin-a ed wazal-nsent, almi i d-teḍra teẓrigt tamenzut ass n 30 deg yennayer iɛeddan, yella umedyaz-amsuqel Buɛlam Messusi, i yellan, yuɣ lḥal, d amekfaḍu n temliliyin-a lwaḥi ed mass Kader Saǧi deg wanida i d-ttilint; deg uxxam n yidles Ṭawes Ɛemruc n Bgayet. Ma newwi-d asmekti ɣef tedwilt tamezwarut ideg llan d inebgawen yimedyawen Ǧudi Fahem akked Caybi Faysel, ad d-nini kan d tin iɛeddan deg tegnatin igerrzen akken ur ssarmen kra. «I teẓrigt-a tamenzut ur nella ara nettraǧu annect-nni d lɣaci ad aɣ-d-qublen. Aṭas n uzayez ay d-usan ad ḥeḍren i ttiɛad, ad slen i tmedyezt n yimedyazen-nneɣ. Aya d ayen yessefraḥen». S wawal-a i aɣ-d-yerra mass Buɛlam Messusi mi as-nessuter tamawt-is. Atan ihi ma kemmlent akka temliliyin-a, i yesnubguten yal ayyur sin n yimedyazen seg wid i d-yufraren yakan seg walbeɛḍ n tfaskiwin n tmedyezt tamaziɣt, ala ayen yelhan i umedyaz ed tmedyezt i s ara d-glunt deg yimal (avenir) iqerben. Deg waya, tetturaǧu ihi teẓrigt tis snat n temliliyin i wass n 27 deg wayyur-a n furar, dima deg uxxam n yidles n Bgayet. Ma d imedyazen i n-yettwanecden abrid-a d massen Xeṭṭabi Ḥmed ed Ayt Busaɛd Akli. Ilit di ttiɛad!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Taddart n Yilyiten I d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Saharidj tettidir ar ass-a mebla ma yewweḍ-as lgaz n temdint. Imezdaɣ-is I yegren tiɣri I yimḍebbren terza taluft ferḥen di tizwar, imi tettuɛeggen-d yiwet n tedrimt s wazal-is ilmend n usiweḍ n wallal-a I yal axxam. Azal n 350 n yixxamen I yettujerden, din din lecɣal bdan, aɣizi, asiweḍ n yiqudas, almi nwan At Yilyiten dakken ad fɣen s tidet seg lmeḥna. Maca, ur ḍulen ara wussan almi texsi tirgit n ṭṭmeɛ. Yeḥbes uxeddim, mebla ma ẓran yimezdaɣ ifukal n tedyant-a. Ulac tawwurt ideg ur wwiten ara, meɛna ssebbat ur d-banent ara. Qrib n sin n yiseggasen aya, ur tuɣal tkebbanit yebdan axeddim iwakken ad tkemmel lecɣal-is. Asenfar mazal-it iɛelleq ar ass-a. Ilaq kan ad d-nesmekti dakken taddart-a tettidir lixsas meqqren n lgaz n tqerɛet imi ulac yiwet n tḥanut I waya, d ayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ-is ttaqen-d as afar-a seg tudrin tiǧiratin, ayen yesseɛwaqen fell-asen taswiɛt mi ara teqseḥ tegrest.

<p style="text-align: right;">  S. M 

  
 Γas ma tella gar temnaḍin i yettwassnen aṭas deg Tmurt n Yizwawen, ladɣa s umazzer-is ameqqran ed ucercur n waman i d-yettawin tadfi i wallen, maca tama-ya n Kefrida aql-itt tesɛedday iɣilifen yesmeḥḥinen yal aseggas imi ur asen-d-muggen i yimezdaɣ-is akk allalen n tudert i ilaqen deg tallit-a ideg d-nesqer. Ur d ameslay ɣef tesnawit, ɣef tesreqqest (la poste), neɣ ɣef tkerrust n usellek, i yellan zun d isenfaren igeɛmura, deg wadeg anda ula d tiɣiwanin yettwaḥsaben zun sɛant azal werɛad i asent-ttwabnan tebnayin-a, maca d ameslay ɣef wayen yessefken i medden merra deg twala-ya: aẓeṭṭa (réseau) n tilifin. D wa ihi i d aɣilif amenzu tura n yiɣermanen n Kefrida. Γas ma yiwen n umahal (opérateur) – Mubilis – yewwi anezgum-nsen mi i asen-d-yerra i tsutert, wanag lɣaci n Kefrida ẓran drus-asen skud tettwanfa sɣur-sen tlelli n ufran n umahal, yettusemma at Kefrida ṭṭalaben ad sɛun ula d aẓeṭṭa n Jizi akked Uridu bac ad izmiren ad d-aɣen ticriḥin swayes ara afen iman-nsen ama seg tama n tdamsa neɣ n rraḥa n yiman. «Acḥal-aya nekkni d acettki ed tira maca ur tesɛiḍ anwa i d-yerran i tiɣri-nneɣ. Nekkni ɣur-neɣ ala yiwen n umahal i yellan deg tmurt, imi wid-nniḍen ur aɣ-d-saḥen ara». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n Kefrida.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Tezga-d Temda Userɣi deg taddart n Wat Lqayed. Tebɛed ɣef tɣiwant-is Iwaḍiyen s wazal n 7 n yikilumitren, ma ɣef Tizi Uzzu llan 30 n yikilumitren.

 Kkan-d waman n Temda Userɣi seg udrar n Lalla Xdiǧa. Ruḥen-d d asif gar snat n ddarrat n yiẓra imeqqranen. Llant 7 n tmedwin deg tama-agi : 6 n tmedwin, lqayit, tis 7 ala, dɣa deg-s i sucufen warrac imeẓyanen. Skud tettaliḍ asif-agi d asawen s adrar n Lalla Xdiǧa, ttḍeyyiqen ciṭ ciṭ yiẓra-nni, akken alamma tmuggreḍ Ifri n Tteryel. Din, yeɛɛer nezzeh neɣ ɛad d awezɣi ad tkemmleɣ. Xas ulamma tettuneḥsab Temda Userɣi gar tgemmi taɣelnawt, acu kan ur d-yelhi ḥedd seg useḥbiber-is, ǧǧan amekkan yecban win i mehmel. Yella-d ustehzi d ameqqran seg tama n yimḍebbren. Amekkan am wa i icebḥen aṭas, i bdan la tteqsaden yimdanen s imal seg yal tama deg wussan n lḥamu neɣ i usgunfu, mazal-it ur yettawessen ara deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, wamag deg berra, werǧin, ahat, i t-id-yewwi umeddaḥ deg teqsiḍt. Amḍiq am wa i izemren ad yesnerni u ad yesnefli aḥric n tmerrit deg tmurt n leqbayel, ǧǧan-t akken d asuki : ur bnin kra ɣer tama-s. Ur telli la tḥunut, wala asečču neɣ asensu. S kra n win i iqesden Tamda Userɣi, tewwi-d fell-as ad yawi yid-s tarzef ma yebɣa ad yesɛeddi kra n wakud dinna. Ula d arrac imecṭaḥ i yessucufen deg Temda-agi, ulac anwa i ten-yettɛassan, ksan mehmel. Limer ad yeɣreq yiwen, ur yelli ḥedd, ad t-id-yejber. Ula d tiwaculin, ttkukrunt ad qqiment dinna imi amur ameqqran i iqesden amekka-a, d irgazen, xas ulamma ur d-yettili cwal neɣ tukksa n sser deg tama-nni, imi seḥbibiren yimezdaɣ n tamiwin ɣef talwit d liser n umekkan. Seg tama n teqbaylit, ur d-yelli kra n ustehzi sɣur imesdurar n temnaḍt-nni. Tzemreḍ ad truḥeḍ deg yal tallit, u ad tekleḍ, ur yelli kra ara yeḍrun yid-k. Ttruḥun-d waman n wasif-a srid ɣer win n Taxuxt, syin ttilin-d d aɣbalu i irennun aman i ubaraj n Teksabt. Tamda Userɣi, d amekkan-nniḍen igerrzen i tekseb tmurt n leqbayel. D agerruj i d-yefka ugama i umdan limer ad as-yeg leqrar.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Tamsalmit n twermin(angine), tettḥaz ddeqs n yimeẓyanen, labeɛda di tallit n cctwa. Aya, ad t-ncudd ɣer lexṣas n tezmert n uḥareb di tfekka-nsen. D acu kan, ssebba n waṭṭan-a, d abirus ur nuklal ara ddeqs n ukukru. Tezmer, diɣ, ad tili ssebba-s d tabaktiritt i d-yeslalayen ddeqs n wuguren ɣer umeẓyan ma ur ttusejjint ara twermin-is akken ilaq. Ayen akk i itezzin ɣef waṭṭan-a, nessaram ad tafem deg umagrad-a, kunwi ay imeɣriyen-nneɣ

<p style="text-align: center;"> Amek i d-yettban lehlak-a ɣer yimeẓyanen? 

 S umata, tamsalmit n twermin tettban-d s tawla, anbeddal (talɣa d yinit) n twermin , d uqraḥ di lweqt n usebleɛ n yimetman.Tikkwal, llant kra n ccirat am uqraḥ n tɛdebbuḍt, tifidi deg uglim, ccirat n waṭṭan n turin d kra n yiwelsan di temgaṛt, yettefren neɣ i d-yettbegginen akken iwata lahlak-a.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Amek i d-tettban temsalmit n twermin s tbaktiritt? 

 S umata, tettḥaz win yesɛan gar 5 d 15 n yiseggasen. Tettbini-d s tawla yettɛeddin 38 n tṣeddarin, iwelsan qerṛiḥen di temgaṛt, ulac tusut, tiwermin beddunt-d d tizeggaɣin s umata, syin s teɣzi n lweqt, ad uqqlent d timellalin neɣ ad d-ilal deg-sent waṛṣeḍ, d ayen ara yessekkren lḥerǧ ɣer yimawlan akk d ṭṭbib akken ad idawi s lɛeǧǧlan amuḍin, imi talalit n waṛṣeḍ d ccira tameqqṛant d akken tabaktiritt telḥa di twermin.

<p style="text-align: center;"> D acu n wuguren i d-yeslalay ustehzi sdat n waṭṭan-a ? 

 Tamsalmit i d-yeslalay ubirus (adénovirus, virus Influenzae … atg), d tin i d-yettbanen deg ugar n 70% n tegnatin, u s umata tzerri war aɣilif ɣas ur tettusejji ara, imi tikkwal ula d tawla ur d-tgellu ara s yis-s. Acu kan, tamsalmit n tbaktiritt(streptocoque A), d aɣilif n yal amejjay, adawi-s ilaq ad yili s lɛeǧǧlan, imi tezmer ad d-teglu s ddeqs n wuguren ɣer yilemẓi am ṛṛumatizm n lemfaṣel, aṭṭan n tgeẓẓal, tikli n tbaktiritt ɣer ddeqs n yigmamen n umuḍin.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Taggara: 

 <span style="text-align: justify;">Tamsalmit n twermin ɣer imeẓyanin, d aɣilif ameqqṛan di tmurt-nneɣ, imi ar ass-a n wussan mazal ttbanen-d lehlakat id-tesseggra temsalmit-a, ɣef waya ilaq imawlan ur stahzayen ara sdat waṭṭan n twermin ma iban-d s arraw-nsen.</span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima Dali 

  
 Matoub : ‘’ma tγileḍ a Ğami ad kem-ayseγ…’’

 Djamila : ’’muḥal ad t-ḥemmle&amp;gamma,; akken i ak-ḥemmleγ…’’<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

  ‘’Asmi ara d-yaweḍ lmijal, 

 Ddaw wakal ad d-nemqabal,

  Mi ara neṭṭef abrid γer Rebbi…’’ 

 Akka i as-d-yerra asmi ay tenwa lmut-is d asteεfu. Netta xas akken ur yemmut  mi yemmut, yenna-as-d :

 ’’ Tγileḍ fniγ dayen thenna&amp;gamma,; 

 Di laxert steεfa&amp;gamma,;

 Tγelṭeḍ di leḥsab-im…’’    

 Tizlit (Tiγri-w) yecna deg useggas n 1993, d aciri γef wass-nni mi ara yemmet. Yeqqar-d amek i tt-yettrağu s ccuq melmi ara d-ternu γur-s i wakken ad mḥasaben dinna. Kra n lweqt mebεed tanṭel n Matub, truḥ Ğamila s aẓekka-s, tbedd din, la awal, la imeṭṭi, tettmektay-d tizlit-agi, ladγa anda i as-yeqqar :

 ’’Tγileḍ fniγ dayen thenna&amp;gamma,; 

 Nekk mazal uḍne&amp;gamma,;

 D aṭṭan-im i d iyi-yewwin.

 Si ṭṭhur, γer ṭṭhur zgiγ εusse&amp;gamma,;

 Ameğğed ad as-sle&amp;gamma,;

 S amḍiq-iw mi ara kem-id-εebbin.’’

      Ahya a ddin uqabac a win iḥedren d acu ara as-yini neγ ahat d acu n tezlit ara as-d-iγenni mi ara mlilen. Meεna, iḥqa, wissen dγa ma ad mlilen, axater ‘’ulac anwa i d-yuγal, di lmut, i wakken ad aγ-d-yini…’’ Tadyant n Matub d Ğamila ulac-itt di tsekla n ddunit. Ula d Paulo Coello deg ungal-is ‘’Le Zahir’’ inuda-d akk amaḍal, kkes-d  anda ur inuda γef tmeεcuqt-is meεna werğin yewweḍ γer laxert. 

    Tadyant n Matub d Ğamila tebda s ciṭ n dreε. Mi tt-id-yexḍeb, tella yakan, tettwaxḍeb. Meεna yenna-asen i yimawlan n Ğamila :’’tettwaxḍeb neγ ala, d nekk ara tt-yaγen.’’ Syin yuγ-itt. Acu aḥettem-a, tella sebba-s. uqbel ad yissin Ğamila, yessen yiwet n teqcict d tağaret-is (F). iḥemmel-itt, tḥemmel-it. Asmi yella di Fransa, tceyyeε γur-s teqcit-a u tenna-as ma s neyya-k ay telliḍ yid-i, ruḥ-d ad tt-nefru, neγ nekk yid-k berka, win i d-yusan ad zewğeγ. Ihi, Matub yefka-d tabrat i yiwen n’’umeddakel-is’’ anda i as-yenna ur ttεeṭṭileγ ara ad n-aseγ ad kem-id-xeḍbeγ. Winna, yeγra tabrat icerreg-itt. Iruḥ γer teqcict yenna-as d akken ur d-yettas ara u yenna-yi-d ur kem-yettaγ ara. Taqcict terkem seg urfan, winna yufa abrid γur-s. Zzin dayen kan, dγa yuγ-itt.

     Ma d tamsalt n Ğamila, tebda s laεḍil : ass-nni n lexḍubegga-s, mi ttheggayent snat n twaculin, tawacult n Lwennas d tin n Ğamila, i lferḥ, Matub yesla s tmettant n Slimane Azem. Dγa, din din yeddem taqrabt-is, iruḥ γer Fransa. Lexḍubegga teqqim armi i d-yuγal. Am wakken neẓra Lwennas d win yettqadaren aṭas Slimane Azem. Yiwet n tikkelt yewwi-as akal n tmazirt n Slimane Azem i as-d-yeḍleb. 

    Amecwar-is d Ğamila yecna-t di tezlatin-is. Tudert-nsen ur telli d tuffirt. Di 7 n yiseggasen i sεaddan ‘’qlilit tmeqqwa n lehna…’’Akken armi d aseggas n 1988 mi t-yewwet uğadermi s ṛṣas, tkemmel tluγ liḥala gar-asen. Lwennas, yeẓra ur yezmir ara ad yesεu dderya. Seg wakken i tt-iḥemmel, yeḍleb-as ad t-teğğ ‘’Rwel skud teğğuğgeḍ, urez n lğedra yerka.’’ (Tarewla 1989). Γef tezlit-agi, dγa, i d-yella umqelleε gar-asen : nettat ur tebγi ara ad tt-id-yessufeγ. Tenna-as ma teffeγ-d d acu i d-yeggran gar-aneγ ? Netta, yettwassen d aqerru n umcum, γer deffir ulac ! 

    Xas d aqerru n umcum meεna d aḥeqqi, yesṭeεrif s tucḍiwin-is. Ayen akk i as-yexdem i Ğamila, yecna-t-id, yessenṭeq-tt-id di tezlatin. Gar-asent,(Ayen iraden 1989) 

 ‘’Sebεa n lesnin i nesεedda,

 Qqlilit tmeqqwa n lehna,

 Ussan irkel d aγilif.

 Deg uzal ur ak-ẓerreγ ara,

 Deg yiḍ ur d-tkeccmeḍ ara,

  Ay akken i ak-hedreγ kif kif.’’

     Xas akken terwa-tent, meεna tḥemmel-it. Am wakken yemmut, tefka-as izen ad as-t-yawi i baba-s, tenna-as :

 ‘’Ma teẓriḍ baba,

  ini-as Ğamila,

 leεteb-is yesfeḍ γer lqa (ε),

 teffem-iyi s wid yemmuten.’’     

     Syin, Ğamila tezweğ akked…umeddakel-nniḍen n Lwennas. Truḥ d urgaz-is γer Kanada. Din, tesεa dderya. Ma d Lwennas yeqqim  ugar n 3 n yiseggasen d uzgen netta d waṭṭan-is. D yiwen n umeddakel-is i t-irefden.

    Iruḥ γer Kanada i wakken ad d-iẓer Ğamila. Yettγimi deg yiwet n lqahwa, yettrağu-tt din alamma tεedda-d i wakken ad tt-iwali. Mi d-yuγal, yuγ lḥal iruḥ γer Marikan. Nnan-as warraw n taddart-is : ‘’ansi akka i d-tekkiḍ a Lwennas ? Yerra-asen-d : si ddunit ay At laxert !’’

    Seg wasmi i t-teğğa Ğamila, Matub werğin yeḥbis ccna fell-as. Uzzu n tasa/tuzzma n temγart (1991). Si ddaw uẓekka/ Imsefraγ/A lmeḥna (1993).Tatut/Tannumi (1994). Tameddit n wass/Tuzzma/ Tiγri n tağğalt (1996). Qqurent tregwa/Ay iẓri-w yesriddimen (1997). Ula album-is aneggaru (1998), tella rriḥa n Ğamila. 

 ‘’Mi as-nniγ ad kem-kerhe&amp;gamma,;

 Ad kem-ḍummeγ seg wul-iw.

 Dγa din i ttenṭarraye&amp;gamma,; 

 Ssekraseγ lecγal-iw…’’ 

     Tayri n Matub d Ğamila tuγal d amedya i medden. Mi yugi yiwen ad yettu tin iḥemmel, ad ak-d-yini ‘’Teḍra yid-i am Matub, ugiγ ad tt-ttuγ’’. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Hocine.M 

  
 Sed-a (ssebt) iɛeddan, 14 deg wayyur n mayu, i d-tella teẓrigt taneggarut n temliliyin n tmedyezt n Bgayet i tsemhuyt-a (saison), ideg d-ttwaɛerḍen kraḍ n yimedyazen izwawen: Samira Mehdi, Ǧilali Xaled, ed Salim Benxlifa. Ddeqs n wayyuren tura segmi ẓẓan tikti-ya sin n yimeɣnasen, Buɛlam Messusi ed Kader Saǧi, aṭas i walan timliliyin-a d tid i d-yewwin ulama d kra n ubaɣur i umedyaz, skud yessawaḍ yettmagar-d win umi d-yeqqar tiktiwin-is; i yellan d azayez. Dɣa, ɣef wawal n Messusi Buɛlam, yiwen seg yimekfaḍuyen n temliliyin-a deg uxxam n yidles Ṭawes Ɛemruc n Bgayet, d winna gedged i d iswi n usuddes n ttiɛad-a; d asileɣ n uzayez ara iḥemmlen tamedyezt sey-a ɣer sdat, akken i d-yenna. Ilaq ihi ad d-yini yiwen belli tiẓrigin-a wwint-d i wugar n 14 n yiḥeddaden n wawal i yekkin deg-sent, ulama acemma seg wayen ssaramen. Ɣas ma tuget seg-sen ttwassnen, maca ufan tagnit ideg ara yettwasenqeḍ uqeddic-nsen, ideg ara zzenzen daɣen kra seg yidlisen-nsen. Seg tama nniḍen, yella yiwen n ugraw n yimedyazen yezdin, i d-yennulfan ilindi seld tadyant n Mɛetqa, i ahat ɣran-tt kra ussan yezrin deg yisebtar-a. Imedyazen-a ssuturen ladɣa ad as-yuɣal wazal i tmedyezt am tẓuriwin nniḍen yecban ccna ed umezgun. Imi ma nuɣal-d i wawal n yiwen seg yiɛeggalen-is, mass Salmi Musa, timliliyin-a n Bgayet ad rnunt lḥif i tmedyezt ed umedyaz skud ttilint-d ddaw leɛnaya n uxxam n yidles war ma yettunefk-as kra ɣef tẓuri-s. Am wakken ara yili lḥal lemmer d timliliyin n ccna, n umezgun, neɣ ulama n ccḍeḥ! Ɣef taluft-a ihi n waddad n tmedyezt tazwawt, neɣ tamaziɣt s umata, i ara yeɣzif wawal. Imi amcawer fell-as yessefk s uzrab, ɣur yal idis!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Tama n’At Ɛebbas tesɛa amezruy. Tetwassen, yagi, s tagelda n’At Ɛebbas (Royaume des Ath Abbas), yellan deg lqern wis 16 alarmi d-anekcum n yifransiyen deg 1830. Imezdaɣ n tama-agi mazal-iten ṭfen deg laɛwayed n yimezwura, ɣas akken tatrara aṭaṣ i tekkes, i « tsettu » degsent. Yiwwet ger laɛwayed-agi d ttin yaɛnan ass n-umezwaru n tefsut. Qqaren-as daɣen amezwaru n rbiɛ. Ass-agi ttraǧunt medden am wass n lɛid, acku yettawid yides lferḥ, tiẓeṭ akk d-usfili ɣer wayen yelhan. Amenzu n tefsut d-ass iwumi ssawalen: Ass n-umager n tefsut. Ass-agi yettuɣal-d mkul 28 Féγrier n tafada agriguri (28 féγrier du calendrier grégorien) icuban ass n 15 di furar deg umagan Amaziɣ (15 urar du calendrier agraire amazigh). Ihi akka, amezwaru n tefsut theggin-as ussan-a deg tama-agi n’At Ɛebbas i cudden tiɣiwanin n Buǧlil, At Ṛẓin lakked Iɣil Ɛli. Ɣas akken mazal ddurt kan akken ad yekcem wass-agi n-umezwaru n tefsut, maca tiwaculin theggint ayen ilaqen akken ad yili lferḥ muqren. Deg tuddar n tɣiwant n’At Ṛẓin, i umedya, ikumirṣiyen bdan znuzun isufar s wayes i xedment twaculin urar-agi n tefsut. Ihi laḥlawat, aderyis, lluz, lǧuz, ibawen iquranen, tiqecwalin,…aṭaṣ n yisufar bdan tnuzun s waṭaṣ deg tuddar-agi, imi ikumirṣiyen ẓran belli aṭaṣ n yimdanen ar a yessutren laḥwal-agi ilaqen i umezwaru n tefsut. D-acu kan ssaramen ad yili yiṭij akken ad fɣen s ṭaqa ɣer laxlawi. Deg tama-agi n’At Ɛebbas xedmen imekli ass n umenzu n tefsut iwumi qqaren čiwčiw. Anda nniḍen ssawalen-as ameqful. D seksu ifuren s yizegza, neɣ lxuḍra, iwumi rennun yiwwet n taḥcict iwumi qqaren Aderyis. Taḥcict-agi t ttemɣid deg laxla, tesɛa aṭaṣ n lfayda i tezmart n wemdan. Ass ma d-yaweḍ umezwaru n rbiɛ tiwaculin ttruḥunt ɣer laxla akken ad magrent tafsut s yiceṭṭiḍen imaynuten, s lferḥ d wurar. Dinna, tettent ameqful, neɣ čiwčiw, s tmellalin, d-ucedluḥ, neɣ lexliɛ. Ṛennunt daɣen lesfenǧ, lgaṭu, laḥlawat… Mti kfan tuččit, xedment urar s yibenduyar anda ceṭḥent tilawin, teksent ɣef ulawen nsent. Ma yella sɣurṣen, arrac tettent laḥlawat, tneggizen sya u sya deg laḥcic azegzaw. Teksen-d tiǧeǧǧigin, tnadin ɣef tmellalin n tsekkurin. Daɣen, teglillizen deg wadal (la γerdure) akken ad awin lbaraka n tefsut, ad gmun am isura. Lɛada-agi teqqim-d, aḥun a rebbi, ur tengir ara. Acku tesfili i wayen yelhan. Ma d-ičumar, anef ad-inin d laḥram. Nukni, d wa i d-abrid nneɣ ya ddin uqabac !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 D win yezgan yeqqar-d s yisefra-s ayen yettḥulfu war takmamt almi ikeccem irennu deg wulawen n wid i t-iḥemmlen. Yenwa tikkelt-a Rezqi Rabiɛ ad yessejhed assaɣ n teywalt akked medden, mi i aɣ-d-yemmeslay deg tdiwennit-a.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Ma yehwa-yak, s usteqsi amenzu, ad d-nuɣal ɣer deffir. Amek i d-yekker Rezqi Rabiɛ? 

 Rezqi Rabiɛ : Luleɣ deg useggas n 1960, ass n 14 deg cṭamber, deg yiwet taddart ger Tigejda akked Mayu. Taddart isem-is Tawrirt Tazeggaγt. Zzint-as-d kraḍ n yisaffen d yiwen n udrar. Am aṭas n tudrin n tmurt, tagrest tettarra tawwurt γef yimezdaγ n taddart. D taddart i ttun yemdanen, ttunt-tt ula d igenawen. Dinna i d-kkreɣ ger yimawlan-iw: baba d yemma, snat n tyestmatin akk d kraḍ n watmaten. Aɣerbaz amenzu yella-d di Lezzayer Tamaneγt acku ulac aɣerbaz deg tadart. Aγerbaz alemmas di Mayu sakkin ɣriɣ deg tesnawit n Tubiret.

  Ma nuɣal-d ɣer tmedyezt, imi ɣur waṭas, yeqqen yisem-ik i ɣur-s srid. Amek tettilim akka tura ? 

 Tamedyezt !! wissen ma d nettat i d-yeqqnen ɣur-i neɣ d nek i yeqqnen ɣur-s, neɣ ahat werǧin i d-nemlal. Ma yella d tira s umata… ttaruɣ acku ugadeɣ ad ttuɣ, ttaruɣ acku ḥemmleɣ awalen. Skud ttafeɣ azuzwu n wul deg tira ad aruɣ. Ass ideg ara yeǧ uzuzwu tira ass-n ahat ad rreɣ imru ɣer tama.

  D acu d tamuɣli-k ɣef tmedyezt tazwawt tatrart n wass-a ? 

 War ccek tamedyezt n wass-a tger asurif d ameqqran ɣer sdat acku tisutiwin i d-yekren ufan-d iɣbayluyen imaynuten anda i d-ttagmen. Ffɣen-d si tinna n baba d yemma, ffɣen-d si tinna yenna-d ccix leflani. Ḍallen ɣer umadal, ḍallen ɣer wayen yellan akkin i ẓẓerb n tudrin.

  Neɣɣar kra n yisefra-k, ladɣa wid i d-tesrusuyeḍ deg uẓeṭṭa n faysbuk. Tuget seg-sen cuddeɣ-iten nekk i timmeɣnest. Ahat i yisental-a i tmaleḍ ugar? 

 D tidet, ttaraɣ ahat ugar deg unnar n timmeɣnest acku aɣref-nneɣ werǧin yufi iman-is akken ad yaru neɣ ad yecnu ayen nniḍen.Yal tallit tewwi-yas-d taεkemt n yimesbaṭliyen; ihi yezga deg umenɣi. Nekk d amdan seg uɣref-agi, tira-iw zgant qqnent ɣer umennuɣ ɣef yizerfan n Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen ɣef uzref-is akken ad temmeslay tutlayt-is ad tidir idles ,ad tidir «ddin»-is war ma nnan-as : «kem d taεrabt kem d tineslemt». Llan yisental nniḍen i d-yewwi ad nennaɣ fell-asen am yizerfan n tmeṭṭut, n umdan, n yigerdan akked d yixeddamen n tidi. Maca deg wayen ttaruɣ llan yisental nniḍen i icudden ɣer talsa s umata. Ttaruɣ ɣef tayri, ɣef teḍṣa d unnecreḥ. Aredmani, annar n yisental-iw iruḥ s teɣzi s tehri…

  Deg unebdu yezrin tessawlem-d kečč d Nufel, ed kra n yimdukkal, i umsizwer n tmedyezt deg uxxam n tmussni. ɣef wacu yella ibedd yiswi-nwen? 

 Ih, asmi nesla s uxxam n tmusni i d-yellan deg «Iewnisen», axxam-agi dɣa d tazeqqa i d-yefka Dda Ḥmed i yettidiren deg Telmant akken ad tilli d axxam n tmussni i taddart. Deg-s aɣerbaz, timkeṛdit i yimezdaɣ. Annect-a s wazal-is acku lemmer yal yiwen seg-neɣ ad d-yefk amur-is ahat timetti-nneɣ ad taf iman-is.

 Timzizelt n tmedyazt ideg nettekki nekk d Nufel tella-d s ufus n tallelt n kra n yimdukkal i yettidiren di tmurt am Σmer Lεufi d wiyad…

 Iswi-is d asebded n wansay ara d-yettilin yal aseggas,, ed ideg ara d-ttemlilen wid yettarun, ladɣa ilemẓiyen. Iswi-is d asebɣes n yilemẓiyen akken ad arun, akken ad ɣren….

  Nwala-k tettakkaḍ s kra n tefyar deg tejmilt i as-yettwarren i Nur At Ɛmara. D acu d awal-ik ɣef umeɣnas ed ɣef tejmilt-nni? 

 Ttekkiɣ deg tejmilt i yerra K. Iflis i Nur at Σmara acku ḥemmleɣ leqdic n Kamal rnu yur-s mi yi-d-yenna d tajmilt i Nur tirirt-iw tella-d war leεḍil. Nur d amdan lεali d ameɣnas n umenzu, aṭas i d-yewwi i teqbaylit s uxeddim-is, ama deg tilibizu neɣ deg wannaren nniḍen. Teεǧeb-iyi tidmi n usdukel n waṭas n yinaẓuren ilmend n yiwen n usenfar.

  Wid i k-iḥemmlen ad bɣun ad aɣ-d-tawiḍ ulama taseddart seg yisefra-k imaynuten… 

 Atan ihi tagi d tunṭict i kenwi akken ma tellam

 P<em> ARI MM LEQWAS </em>

 <em> Di lpari mm leqwas </em>

 <em> Mm yigenni aberkan </em>

 <em> I kellu yal ass </em>

 <em> Tifekka n tsednan </em>

 <em> Afus s umeqyas </em>

 <em> Ameṣṣaḍ εeryan </em>

 <em> Terqeq n wammas </em>

 <em> D temlel n wuglan </em>

 <em> Di Lpari mm leqwas </em>

 <em> Mm yigenni war itran </em>

 <em> Icennu ɣef tullas </em>

 <em> Γer yiri n yizenqan </em>

 <em> S wawal afessas </em>

 <em> Yeddan d uẓawan </em>

 <em> Yettraǧu ma d-tas </em>

 <em> Tinnna akken i t-yerḥan </em>

  Tessufɣeḍ-d taggara-ya ammud n yiḍrisen deg lulu. Wiss tettmuquleḍ ad yili ula deg tmurt, neɣ tesɛiḍ isenfaren nniḍen? 

 D taswiεt i aɣ-yerran nessufuɣ-d deg tmura n berra ayen nettaru s teqbaylit i yiqbayliyen, mačči d afran i nefren aya maca d tamara. Nekk aṭas n yiseggasen aya i ttidireɣ di tmurt n beṛṛa ulac ɣur-i akud akken ad azleɣ deffir teẓrigin ilmend n waya. Ma d wid umi ssutreɣ… ar ass-a ulac tiririt.

 Ihi asirem-iw, ad tili yiwet si teẓrigin-a i ara d-yerren i tiɣri akken ad d-yeffeɣ wayen ttaruɣ di tmurt.

  Awal n taggara ɣur-k! 

 Tanemmirt i kečč, tanemmirt i uɣmis-nwen umi ssarameɣ tudert ɣezzifen. Tabɣest i kra yettarun, i kra ixeddmen s teqbaylit d kra yenneεtaben fell-as.

  Yesteqsa-t :  Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Qasa TAΣERQUBET d yiwen n yilemẓi n taddart n Tefritin, d win yeddmen agerdas n tmaziɣt seg wul,  d aselmad n tutlayt tayemmat deg uɣerbaz amezwaru, daɣen d amedyaz yekki deg tfaska n tmedyet n Udrar n Fad aṭas n tikal, tikelt-a yewwi arraz amezwaru deg tmenna (arraz n yimsefliden), mi yesεa deg tmenna igemmaḍ-a 4,35/5, tettunefk-aɣ tegnit   ad t-nesseqsi. D acu d assaɣ yellan gar tfaska d tmedyezt ?

  Qasa d aselmad n tutlayt tayemmat daɣen d amedyaz. D acu-tt tmedyezt ɣur-k ?  

 <span style="color: #ff0000;"> Qasa : </span> Uqbel ad meslayeɣ ɣef tmedyezt ɣur-i ad meslayeɣ ɣef tmedyezt sumata:  Tamezwarut d tawsit gar tewsatin n teskla, tis snat yes-s i tedder tutlayt akken neẓra  dles-nneɣ yebna ɣef timawt dayen yeǧǧan tutlat-nneɣ ad tidir. Ihi tamedyezt ɣur-s taẓayt deg tmetti imi timetti-nneɣ d tin yesseqdacen awal s tuget, tettak azal iwawal, ferrun timsal s wawal ɣur-sen awal maci d awal kan ama d tamedyezt, d inzi… ma nefka-d amedya kra n yinzan i d-yettbeyyinen azal i yesɛa wawal : “bu yiles medden akk ines», “argaz yetteqqan deg yiles”… tamedyezt yes-s i tbedd tezlit taqbaylit, meḥsub d tin yesεan azal d ameqqran imi timetti-nneɣ tesnufus awal. Ma yella d tamedyezt ɣur-i, d yiwen n ttawil gar ttawilat n tẓuri swayes yezmer yiwen  neɣ amedyaz ad d-yini ayen yettḥulfu neɣ ayen yettwali akken yebɣa war lqid, d ilelli. Tamedyezt tecbeḥ s waṭas tesεa yiwen n rruḥ acekkit ladaɣa s teqbaylit.

  Ma nenna-d tamedyezt d iḥulfan, d acu d tamuɣli-k ɣef waya? 

 Tamedyezt nezmer ad d-nini d iḥulfan. 

  Nnan-d imussnawen dakken tamedyezt d lemri n umdan. D acu tenniḍ deg waya ? 

  Tamedyezt mačči kan d lemri n umdan neɣ n tmetti, maca ɣur-i aha  tesdukkel-iten-tt-id i snat , acku tamedyezt d ilel imi deg-s aṭas n yisental, ad d-ttnulfun daɣen umazal akka ɣer sdat.  

  Deg yal aseggas aswir-ik yettaẓ ɣer sdat deg tfaska n Udrar n Fad. Dacu d sser n waya ? 

  Sser n waya qqaren-tt-id yakan imedyazen  i d-yerzan ɣer  n udrar n fad, dakken d aɣerbaz n tmedyezt tamaziɣt, ma yella ɣur-i iεedda akkin i uɣerbaz axaṭer yal mi ara d nerzu yettili-d umaynut nesfaya-d deg-s ama deg tmedyezt ama deg yisaragen  neɣ deg wayen yellan akk d leqdic dina, aswir-iw n tmedyezt nekk s timad-iw ḥuseɣ yettnerni acku yal aseggas ttaliɣ-d akka deg umyizwer, tikelt-a d wis ukuẓ safi yettnerni uswir. Ma yella d acu yettaran amedyaz ad yesnerni aswir  d iεeggalen n tseqqamut axṭer deg uskazel-nsen i tmedyezt d asɣerbel i ttesɣrbilen, ma tufrar-d kan tuklal d ayen ara yeǧǧen amedyaz ad         d-yefk ugar, rnu daɣen tafaska tleddi-d allen, amek?  Ad teḥsuḍ ziɣ tzemreḍ ad yiliḍ dayen i ak-yehwan d wa ad t-id-tiniḍ akken i ak-yehwa, d ilelli ulac lqid ma terniḍ-as taɣuri sumata.

  Tazmilt-ik deg tmenna 4,35/5 .D acu d tarrayt tessemraseḍ alammi tesεiḍ tazmilt tunigt deg tmenna ?  

 Mačči d tarrayt mačči, meḥsub mi ara d-qqareɣ asefru ttakkeɣ-as rruḥ d ameqqran, ttawiɣ akk akud-inu yal awal ttakkeɣ-as azal-is, rnu daɣan  imir n tmenna ttεiciɣ-t, degmi yettruḥu srid ɣer tmeẓẓuɣt. Aya ur d-yelli ara kan akka, yella-d s lmendad n tfaska imi kkiɣ aṭas n tikkal.

  Dacu yettwali Qasa deg tseqqamut n yinezzurfa imaynuten? 

 Yelha ad ilin yixulaf wid ara ikemmlen abrid, tanemmirt i wid yezwaren. Dacu kan tamuɣli-w lemmer ad rnun cwiṭ axaṭer tamedyezt tesεa taẓayt d tameqqrant, daɣen ula d imezwura sεan taẓayt deg tseqqamut xersum ad d-yeqqim yiwen deg-sen alamma ḥulfan iɛeggalen imaynuten belli zemren ad ddmen, ad refden leqdic yecban wa. 

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen : D acu d asirem n Qasa ɣer sdat ? 

 Qasa : Asirem-iw ad tufrar tutlayt n tmaziɣt akka am tutlayin-nniḍen deg umaḍal, ad nuɣal, ad nettzuxu yes-s wa ad tesεu amkan-is deg tmurt-is. Ssarameɣ tidukkla tadelsant Adrar n Fad ad tkemmel deg ubrid-a imi yes-s ara d-yecreq yiṭij ɣef tutlayt. Tanemmirt-ik s tussda.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t:  Nacer-Akouche 

  
 Larebɛa yezrin, yettunebeg-d Racid At Ali UqasiI, aselway n Tiregwa (Tasebddit Takanadit i Tmaziɣt), ɣer tesdawit Akli Mohand Oulhadj n Tubiret. Tirza n uneɣmas ar yinelmaden d yisdawiyen tella-d d tagnit, i wakken ad d-yawi awal ɣef umecwar akked d yiswiyen n Tiregwa.

 Yufrar-d deg wawal-is belli s umata tlul-d tsebddit takanadit i wesnerni d iccan n yidles d tutlayt tamaziɣt. Tasebddit tebna tlata yeḥricen i twala ad ssedunt timsal : Isenfaren, isaragen d tejmilin.

 Yal aḥric s lqima-s, maɛna azal n yisenfaren yugar-iten. Ayagi akk ur d-ttas ara kan akka : aṭas n tedrimt i tehwaǧ taluft. 

 D acu kan, xas ulamma , akken s-yenna win “lecɣal n taddart meqqrit nukni mezziyit», Racid At Ali Uqasi d yimeddukal-is ttafen iberdan n tifrat. Ɣef temsalt-a i wekked-d belli d tezdeg n yiɛeggalen n Tasebddit d tiqqa i gan deg-sen lɣaci i d-yettawin.

 Deg temlilit, awal yettawi-d wayeḍ, almi d-yufa iman-is yinebgi n Tubiret yerfa ɣef wid i izemren, ur xdimen. Xas ulamma adabu i ban webrid-is, iwala Racid belli ula d timeti taqbaylit tefka afus, tebra i ṭṭbel deg waman.

 Iwalla belli aṭas n temsal i isehlen ad tent-nexdem ur nebegges ara ɣur-sent. Yefka-d amedya n tilibizyu u yenna-k d lewhayem amek wigi akk i izemren u sɛan tadrimt ur d-sbedden ar tilibizyu ara d-yelhun s tmeti tamaziɣt !? Aya qqaren-s s teglizit d tefransist “lobby”. Lobby-agi am akken ara d-iniḍ d tarbaɛt i i jehden s yidrimen-is d yimekwan teṭṭef di tqucac n udabu (taɣamsa, tasertit, tadamsa…) . ljehd n terbaɛt-a yesseday timsal almend n wayen i wala inefeɛ-it u yenfeɛ agdud-is. Deg temsalt-a n usenfeɛ n wegdud ad d-yufrar, lobby n wudayen: d takemmict maɛna s tedrimt nnsen d imekwan ṭṭfen sselḥayen ddunit akken bɣan. Ɣur-neɣ tella tedrimt, llan ula d yimekwan, maɛna ulac targizt : lebɣa ad nnil.

  Yesbegen-d daɣen lɣiḍ-is ɣef wigi akk ur nesselmad ara i tarwa nsen taqbaylit u mmsemyafen ad sen-slemden tafransist. Tawaɣit-agi i icudden ar wayen i wumi qqaren s tefransist “la haine de soi” i wala-tt Racid d sebba n nnger. Taluft-nniḍen uɣur d-yewehha d lewhi, d udem-agi “folklorique” i la nettak i tmaziɣt.

<p style="text-align: right;"> SOA 

  
 Iḍelli acer, 8 deg yennayer 2017, ddmen warrac iqraben, qqlen ɣer tɣuri-nsen. Mbeɛd mi d-wwten ugar n sin n wayyuren nutni qqaren, rnan kra n wussan d asɛeddi n yikayaden, tewweḍ-d teswiɛt n usgunfu i llan ttraǧun.

 Fukken ihi wussan n yimuras imezwura n tsemhuyt n ccetwa i d-yettunefken i yinelmadeni wakken ad ten-farsen gar twaculin d wayen-nniḍen i asen-yehwan. Yuɣal-d lawan n uxeddim d useqdec n wallaɣen. Yuɣ lḥal imuras n useggas-a aɣurbiz, mgaraden ɣef watmaten-nsen : yella-d ubeddel deg-sen tikkelt-a. Imi yettwarna umḍan n wussan n yiɣimi i warrac deg tmurt. Seg 15 alami d 18 n wussan. Aya yella-d d rray i d-yekkan seg Uɣlif n usegmi, neɣ sɣur tneɣlaft-is massa Nouria Benghebrit i d-iberrḥen s yisalli amaynut. Ad d-nebder kan belli ɣas ma teɣzif cwiṭ twala n yimuras, wanag arrac ur bran i leqraya, ur tt-rran ḥala i tɣimit. Amedya, deg wussan yezrin, llan yinelmaden deg Ayt Smaɛel i yernan isragen n temsirin n useḥfeḍ ɣur kra n yiselmaden i yebɣan ad ten-ɛiwnen. Imi asen-d-gan ahil d amecṭuḥ akken ad sneflen aswir-nsen ugar. Ladɣa wid ara yesɛeddin akayad n BEM. Ccɣel-a i asen-d-yefkan abaɣur, iban yerna-asen-d ayendin n lebɣi, yessebɣes-iten ad ɣren ula deg yixxamen, ad heggin iman-nsen i tuɣalin. Ass-a ihi, d ass wis sin n yinelmaden deg uɣerbaz, deg tsemhuyt talemmast n useggas-a aɣurbiz. Afud igerrzen i warrac-nneɣ!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaïsa Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Ɣas akken tamuɣli ar ɣur-s d tin i neqsen kra, tameṭṭut n rrif, neɣ tin yettɣimin deg wexxam, tesɛa azal muqren deg t’metti nneɣ. Acku tettrebbi dderya, t sewway, tessirid iceṭiḍen, ma wezzil wawal: Tqeddec kan deg wexxam, maca ayen i txedem i t’metti muqer dayen kan. D acu kan, tilawin yettɣimin deg wexxam, sɛan-t ciṭ n tismin ɣer tlawin i xedmen, ama deg t’kubaniyin neɣ deg iɣerbazen, acku tineggura-agi ttawin-t ed tadrimt, xedmen-t akken id asen-t yahwa ! Ula d-irgazren nesn-t « ẓuɣuren-ten deg meẓẓuɣen! ». Aḥlil ! Ihi, tilawin-agi n rrif, yagi tid ur nekcim ara yiwen wass ɣer uɣerbaz, neɣ ɣran-t kan kra n yiseggasen, kkaten-t ad lemden-t kra n lḥirfat, akken ad fɣen-t. Tagi ttamezwarut, daɣen ad « xedmen-t » deg yixxamen nsen-t am nutenti am t’lawin i xedmen deg berra. Ihi, dagi deg temdint n Tazmalt (85 ikilumiṭren ɣef Bgayet, tamanaɣt n lwilaya) tella akken yiwwet n tiddukla imuwi ssawalen « Tiɣr n t’meṭṭut ». Tiddukla-agi teǧhed dayen kan, tekkat s tezmart-is ɣef izerfan n t’lawin yettɣimin deg wexxam. « Tiɣri n t’meṭṭut » tekkat akken atterreẓ asalu n lɛeqliya taqburt id yeqaren belli tameṭṭut ad tili deg wexxam kan! D acu ur texdim ara tiddukla-agi akken ad beggen udem n t’meṭṭut i zedɣen « lḥabs » n wexxam-is? « Tiɣri n t’meṭṭut » tluled iseggasen-agi kan ineggura. Iswi ines :attewet ɣef izerfan n t’meṭṭut n wexxam, neɣ tameṭṭut n rrif s wudem amatu. Yal aseggas teggar-ed tiɣri i t’lawin akken ad ruḥen-t ɣer wexxam n t’ddukla-agi iwakken ad ɣren-t yerna ad lemden-t lḥirfat. Akka, i lmend n-useggas amaynut n 2015, tiddukla « Tiɣri n t’meṭṭut » tessiwled i t’lawin n tama-agi n Tazmalt, akken ad ruḥen-t ar wexxam n t’dukkla-agi id yezgan deg « le CSP », iwakken ad markin-t ad xedmen-t tannanin (stages). Deg umuɣ n-usileɣ (La liste de formations) llan-t lḥirfat-agi: Lgaṭu d lḥelwa, laxyaḍa lakked uṭareẓ, tuččit taqburt (plats traditionnels), aṣeṭṭel n lxalat akk d tt’furmaṭikt (l’informatique). Tiɣri id ger tiddukla attan tewweḍ ɣer waṭaṣ n yixxamen deg Tazmalt lakked ttudar is-ed yezzin. Aṭaṣ n t’lawin d ttlemẓiyin bɣan-t ad lemden-t kra n lḥirfat akken ad ɛiwnen-t iwaculin nsen-t, yagi imi laɣla yiwweḍ ɣer yigenni ! Deg yizri iqarben, aṭaṣ n t’lawin yellin akka tiḥuna akken ad zenzen-t ama d lgaṭu, neɣ tiqendyar. Akka, ula d tameṭṭut n wexxam tesɛa azal-is tura. Anwa id yennan mgal waya ?    

<p style="text-align: right;">Syphax.Y

  
 Inelmaden n tɣiwant n Yiɣram yeqqaren di tesnawiyin n uqbu, nṭarren nezzeh seg lexsas n ttawilat n usiweḍ akk d leɣla n wazal n rekba, acku , segmi taɣiwant ur tesɛi ara ula d yiwet n tesnawit dayen yeǧǧan tuget n yinelmaden n tudrin am Wat Sellam d Tiɣilt Mexluf d iɛemmuren teddun deg les 404 bachées am lmal i smadiḥ n usemmiḍ ubeḥri d ugris, i wakken kan ad awḍen deg lawan ɣer tneɣrit. Wama aɣbel n tuɣalin tameddit akter, ladɣa deg wussan n ccetwa imi ussan wezzilit, rnu d dḥis yettilin deg yimukan n rekba lawan deg ttefɣen yixeddamen. Ur ttawḍen ara s ixxamen-nsen alma d 07 n yiḍ. Sseba n waya d lexsas n ttawilat tesɛa tɣiwant imi i taɣiwant n Yiɣram tettuṣennef gar tɣiwanin tiẓawaliyin n lwilaya n Bgayet.
