Ur tesɛi ara akk kra n lmedxul-nniḍen anagar n wayen i tt-id-yettṣaḥen di tedrimt d-tferreq ddula ɣef tɣiwanin yal aseggas. Ɣeɣ waya, ula d inelmaden yeqqaren deg uɣerbaz alemmas, anagar tiqcicin i iteddun deg umesni aɣurbiz. :’’deg wussan n ccetwa macki akken ara teḥres tallit,yeqwa udfel s axxam n xwali deg Uqbu i ttarraɣ, ttnusuɣ dinna ‘’i d-yenna yiwen n unelmad nesteqsa . Ad yeqqim win ur nesɛi ara kra n uxxam deg-i ara yer, amek ara as-teḍru ?

<p style="text-align: right;"> B.benhamouche. 

  
 Izegzawen (les verts) n tiddukla AJIE  (Association pour la Jeuness Innovatrice et l’Environnement) ttrun akken ma llan imi ten-teğğa tselwayt-nsen.Taselwayt yessiḥbibiren γef ugama ugar n yiman-is. Tufa-d aṭas n tefrat i twennaṭ meεna ur d-tufi ara tifrat i lehlak i tt-yewwin ddurt iεeddan. Tezzuγur deg waṭan-agi amcum seg useggas 2001. Amur ameqqran n yiεeggalen n AJIE, anda lliγ di  tlemmast, ur slin ara s lehlak-is axater ur d-tettmeslay ara fell-as, ur t-id-sbanay ara deg umahil-is. Tella d taselmadt deg uγerbaz alemmas di Tizi Uzzu. Tewwi-d lintrit uqbel ad taweḍ i wakken ad d-telhu kan s leqdic-is di tdukli-a i d-texleq nettat d terbaεt-is deg useggas n 1998.

 Ma d ayen i tt-yeṣṣawḍen ad d-texleq tiddukla-a, tenna-aγ-d yiwet n temḍebbert :’’yiwen wass, twala iḍumman ttwaḍeggren-d si le batiment γer lqaεa. Dγa tezεef. Yella-d wawal akked uletma-s i as-yennan i wacuγer ur d-txelqem ara tiddukla ara yessiḥbibiren γef ugama. Syin, ihi, i d-tusa tikti-a.’’  Ma γef wayen yeεnan isenfaren n tiddukla, aṭas i d-yellan. Llan wid yeεnan iγerbazen d inelmaden. Wid i d-iceddun γer ufran n wammus. Lebni n yimekwan n yidles d yixxamen n tẓuri. Asileγ n yilmeẓyen deg yiḥricen n umahil d waṭas n temsal-nniḍen.  I wakken ad as-rren tajmilt iεeggalen n tiddukla AJIE i Massa Lamrous, ssawlen-d i tikli ara d-yilin ass n 8 deg meγres 2015 seg uxxam n tiddukla AJIE alamma d timeqebret n Mdouha anda ara ssersen tameqqunt n yiseğğigen γef uẓekka-s.

 Gen di talwit a Massa. Imγi-m yemγi-d di Tirmitin akked Tala Athmane d wanda-nniḍen.  

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Deg waggur yezrin , xedmen yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas Malek Qadum n Uqbu yiwet n tufɣa tusnant ɣer tuddar n Lmecta d At sellam i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Yiɣrem, tama n Uqbu , Deg taddart n At Sellam, mlalen yinelmaden, deg tejmaεt, akked yimɣaren. Mmeslayen-as-d ɣef laεwayed, tajmaεt d wazal-nsen deg tuddsa n tmetti taqbaylit. Akka, dɣa, i tettunefk tegnit i teqcicin ad qqiment i tikkelt tamezwarut deg tejmaɛt. Mebɛed mi i slan yinelmaden i kra n yiwillihen yeɛnan tudert sɣur imɣaren, ṭṭfen abrid-nsen ɣer taddart n Lmecta anda i sersen, deg tazwara, tameqqunt n yiseǧǧigen deg tmeqqbert d asteḥem ɣef 74 n yimeɣrasen n taddart-agi. Mi kecmen taddart n Lmecta, ufan yiwen n ugraw n temɣarin yettraǧu-ten dinna. Wwint-d tlawin-agi awal ɣef ttawilat n lebni d yimɣan n usejji i yellan deg tama-agi n tmurt n leqbayel. Am wakken i d-wwint awal, diɣ, ɣef usewwi n kra n yisufar yecban, ameqful, tarnast, abazin…atg. Deg taggara n tirza, yenna-d Mass Brahim Benhamouche : ‘’tamaziɣt, ha-tt-an deg unnar, deg berra ɣer yimɣaren akked temɣarin. Tamaziɣt d leɛwayed, d leqder, d aseḥbiber ɣef ugama mačči kan d tajerrumt.’’<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

  Z. B. Y. 

  
 Iruḥ yiwen wass Ǧeḥḥa ɣer ssuq, yuɣ-d aɣyul icudd-it-id s umrar la t-id-yezzuɣur. Tebɛen-t-id sin yimakaren. Iruh yiwen yefsi-d amrar-nni, iga-t i temgarḍt-is, wayed yeṭṭef aɣyul-nni, yerwel yis-s mebla ma ifaq Ǧeḥḥa. La ileḥḥu abrid, abrid, cit kan yezzi ɣerdeffir, dɣa iwala d amdan iicudden ɣer umrar-nni mačči d aɣyul, yewḥem, dɣa, yenna-as :-Anda-t uɣyul-nni ? -Yerra-as-d winna : d neek.-Yenna-as Ǧeḥḥa :Amek akka yeɛni ?-Yenna-as : Ur ttaɣeɣ ara awal i yemma dɣa tedɛa-yi, tenna-d : ad ak- yer Rebbi d aɣyul. Mi d-ukiɣ ssbeḥ ufiɣ-d iman-iw d aɣyul, dɣa, tewwi-yi ɣer ssuq tesenz-iyi i winna uɣur i yi-d-tuɣed.Ma tura aql-i ad ḥemdeɣ Rebbi imi i yi-tsemmeḥ yemma uɣaleɣ-d d amdan.Ynna-as Ǧeḥḥa : Ceyleleh a ddunit, amek ad ak-sqedceɣ kečč d amdan! Ruh ddu d ubrid-ik. Yefsi-as amrar-nni, yenna-as : maɛni ɣurek ur tettaɣeḍ ara awal i yemma-k ! Yerfed allen-is s igenni yenna : ad d-yefk Rebbi xir n wayen i yi-yekkes. Tezzi-d ddurt, yuɣal Ǧeḥḥa ɣer ssuq ad d-yaɣ aɣyul, dɣa, yufa aɣul-nni i d-yuɣ ddurt iɛeddan. Yuẓ ɣur-s, imekken imi-s ɣer umeẓẓuɣ-is, yenna-as : ayamcum, yak nniɣ-ak aɣ awal i yemma-k, ɣurek ad tt- tesserfud!Ccah deg-k, tuklaled ayen yeḍran 

 yid-k.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Said Bouda 

  
 Inelmaden n tesnawit « fréres Ait Betta » n tɣiwant Timizart yetabaɛen ɣer ladayra n Ouaguenoune i d-yezgan deg umkan iwumi qqaren Ahriq Ouattar, ḥebsen ɣef leqraya seg tazwara n ddurt yezrin. Uɣalen qqaren : « Ma ulac lkiran uṣiweḍ, ulac tuɣalin ɣer tneɣriyin ». Isnawiyen-agi, ugin ad uɣalen ɣer tzeɣwa-nsen n tɣuri, i wakken ad kemmlen aseddu n temsirin. Imi ḥebsen ɣef leqraya, ma d tamentilt akk n wannect-a d ulɣu-nni i d-yefka Usqamu Aɣerfan Aɣiwan (APC) n Timizart ideg yekkes akk lkiran yettawin ɣer tesnawit. Inelmaden-agi d yimawlan-nsen, ssuturen tuɣalin n lkiran-agi n uṣiweḍ ɣer tesnawit-a, imi i d- ttafen iman-nsen gar sin wuguren. “Aɣbel amezwaru d lexlaṣ i nettxeliṣ yal ass gar 100 ar 120 DA i wass. Ma d aɣbel wis sin d win n wawwaḍ s aɣerbaz ɣef 08h n ssbaḥ. Imi acḥal n tikkal ur newwiḍ ara deg lawan ɣer tesnawit”, akka i d aɣ-yenna yiwen n unelmad n tesnawit-agi. Am akken daɣen nesteqsa yiwen n unelmad, yeqqar deg uswir wis kraḍ 3 yenna-d: “Skud mazal ur d-uɣalent ara lkiran n uṣiweḍ ɣer lxedma, ur nettuɣal ara ɣer tneɣriyin-nneɣ”. D ayen yeğğan isnawiyen-agi d yimawlan-nsen ad d-gren tiɣri, yerna ad ssuturen deg wid teԑna temsalt gar-asen imḍebberen n tɣiwant n Timizart, i wakken ad d-afen tifrat i wugur-a n uṣiweḍ. … Yeɣleq ula d aɣerbaz alemmas Aomar Metrek Tiddukkla n yimawlan n yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas Metrek n Tizi Rached, teɣleq ddurt yezrin aɣerbaz-agi ideg qqaren warraw-nsen. Ɣef leḥsab-nsen, inelmaden yeqqaren deg-s ha-ten-in deg yir liḥala, qqaren deg tegnatin i iweɛren aṭas. Imi aɣerbaz-agi, 4 n yiseggasen-agi tura ur yesɛi anemhal unṣib, azal n 10 n yinemhalen i iɛeddan ɣef uqqeruy n uɣerbaz-agi seg useggas n 2013 ar unekcum aɣurbiz n useggas-agi. Am wakken i cetkayen ɣef liḥala n usečči n yinelmaden yeqqaren deg-s, imi tanawalt taɣurbizt yellan deg-s ur tessawaḍ ara ad tsečč inelmaden-agi. D ayen i yessawḍen tiddukkla n yimawlan n yinelmaden n uɣerbaz-agi Metrek Aomar, ad gren tiɣri i wid teɛna temsalt, ideg i d-tsebgen asḥissef ɣef yir liḥala n uɣerbaz-agi alemmas. Ssuturen yiεeggalen n tiddukkla-agi deg tuttra-a i d asen-gan, tifrat n waṭas n wuguren d lexṣaṣat i yellan deg-s, imi yenṭer mačči d izli. I lmend n wannecta, yenna-aɣ-d yiwen ubabat: “Aɣerbaz-a, ur yesεi ara anemhal, imi yal aseggas ad d-awin yiwen neɣ sin n yinemhalen. Tin ɣur-s, lexṣaṣ n yiεessasen d imallalen n usegmi, yella ula d lexṣaṣ n yiεessasen”. Ikemmel yenna-d: “Am wakken daɣen i neṭṭalab deg tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i wakken ad aɣ-d-aznen anemhal unṣib i iwulmen i uɣerbaz-agi, yerna ad yexdem lxedma-s akken ilaq lḥal, yerna d win ara idumen. Ur nebɣi ara arraw-nneɣ ad setten lqut asemmaḍ deg berra, imi tanawalt yettwaxdamen i lmend n warrac tella”.

  A. A 

  
 I lmend n umecwar aɣezzfan n ccna i d-yewwi unaẓur ameqqran Akli Yeḥyaten, tuɣal-as tejmilt meqqren ass-nni n ttlata 31 deg waggur n unbir 2017, deg Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yasin n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D ttiɛad i d-yettwassuddsen sɣur Tenmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu akked Umazday n yirmad idelsanen d yinaẓuren. D yiwet n tejmilt s wazal-is i unaẓur ameqqran n tezlit taqbaylit. Wagi d Akli Yeḥyaten, yesɛan akka tura 84 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is. Yettuneḥsab d yiwen gar lecyax deg uẓawan n tmurt taqbaylit. Yella-d leqdic-agi adelsan deg Uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yasin n Tizi Uzzu. Imsuddsen n leqdic-agi, heggan-d yiwen wahil d anesbaɣur; imi ass-nni n larebɛa 31 tuber 2017 ɣef 10h00 n ssbaḥ, tella-d tulya tunṣibt n tejmilt-agi sɣur tnemhalt n yidles n Tizi Uzzu. Dɣa deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin, tella-d yiwet n temsikent n tesfifin-is tiqdimin d yimagraden n tɣamsa yettwarun ɣef tudert-is d leqdic n urgaz-agi ameqqran, akked yiwet n temsikent n wayen yerzan tagrawla tazzayrit d umussu aɣelnaw. Am wakken daɣen i d-sneεten yiwen usaru i d-yewwin ɣef tudert n ufennan-a aqbayli aqbur. Ma ɣef 20h 30 d afella, tella-d temlilit d unaẓur d uskasi d tririt ɣef yisteqsiyen n wid akk i t-iḥemmlen neɣ i as-isellen. Tekfa tejmilt-a s tmeɣra n ccna meqqren, ideg cnan waṭas n yifennanen, am wakken diɣ i d-fkan yimeddukal-is akked twacult-is kra tnagiyin ɣef tmeddurt d umecwar-is. Am wakken tella d tannumi deg tejmilin n yifennayen, ula deg tejmilt-agi aṭas n yicennayen imeqqranen d yimeddukkal-is akked waṭas n yiwudam n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i iḥedren timlilit-agi.

  Ghani. A 

  
 ’Win iteddun ɣer tidet, yessawaḍ’’. Seg wanzi-agi, mebla ccek, i d-yugem ucennay Cheikh Yahia, netta yellan deg uḥric-agi n ccna ugar n 30 n yiseggasen. Acu kan armi d tura i as-tettunefk neɣ i d-tewweḍ tegnit i wakken ad yessekles tizlatin-is. Tizlatin i d-yeskanen aḥric seg tudert-is, ama d tin yellan d tuffirt neɣ tin iḍehren. Nemlal-it deg uxxam-is deg taddart n Tala Athmane, newwi-d yid-s awal s telqayt ɣef Abum -is i d-yeffɣen deg ussan-agi kan iɛeddan.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : acḥal-aya segmi tebdiḍ ccna, acuɣer armi d tura i teskelseḍ ? 

 Cheikh Yahia : ansuf yis-k ɣer uxxam-iw. Bdiɣ ccna seg zik. Asmi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ, cfiɣ yettawi-d xali un Tourne-disque, nsell i Slimane Azem, Idir. Ihi, syin i bdiɣ tteḥmalaɣ ccna. Mi wwḍeɣ, diɣ, s aɣerbaz alemmas, yessekkar-iyi-d maître d’internat i wakken ad asen-d-ɣenniɣ. Ma dagi deg taddart, ncennu timeɣriwin deg yiseggasen n 1980, lliɣ cennuɣ akked Youcef Guerbas, Brahim Mekidèche d wiyaḍ, ad ten-iḍekker Rebbi s lxir, ttsellimeɣ fell-asen. Syin, telḥeq-d tallit-nni taberkant, dɣa neḥbes. Nekk, yuɣ lḥal, qqareɣ deg tesdawit. Ma nuɣal-d, tura, ɣer tezlatin-agi, uriɣ-tent deg tazwara n yiseggasen n 2000. Acu kan ur tent-skelseɣ ara. Ruḥ a zman, rwaḥ a zman, armi i d-yewweḍ wass anda i as-nniɣ : i wacuɣer ur tent-id-ssufuɣeɣ ara ? Ladɣa, yella yiwen uḥbib i yi-iɛawnen deg lecɣal-agi, yefka-yi afud d ameqqran. Wagi d Lounici Saïd. Nruḥ ad nessekles ɣer Moh Oubelaïd. Mi newweḍ ɣer dinna, ufiɣ-n yiwen umdan lɛali, fell-asen i icennu Matoub, u yeqqar ‘’Tarwa lleḥlal’’, wagi d Madjid Halit, iɛawen-iyi dayen kan deg usekles akked useqɛed n tezlatin.

  Azwel n Album-inek ‘’Imeṭṭi Umeɣbun’’, i wacuɣer azwel am wa ? 

 Cheikh Yahia : asmi i nsellek asekles, nnan-d amek ara as-tsemmiḍ tura ? Fkiɣ-d kra n yizwilen, gar-asen ‘’Tayri-m tesɛa lhiba’’. Acu kan mi newweḍ ɣer bab n tezrigin, yenna-d d akken yelha limer ad yili uzwel-is ‘’Imeṭṭi Umeɣbun’’ imi tanfalit-agi ur tezgi ara. Ma d tizlit ‘’Imeṭṭi Umeɣbun’’, tewwi-d awal ɣef tmetti d wayen i iḍerrun deg-s. ad tafeḍ tamḥeqqranit, taḥraymit d yir tamussni i tt-isedduyen, ma d ameɣbun meskin, yezga yeṭṭurfi, aṭas i iɛeddan fell-as : tayri, lemḥayen, tadukli, uguren n twacult…atg. Deg tmurt n Lezzayer, ayen yuɣen ameɣbun, yewɛer aṭas : kullec d idrimen tura akken i as-yenna Cherif Hamani :’’tuɣal tirrugza s adrim’’. Acu kan, daɣen, akken yebɣu yili lḥal, ilaq bnadem ad iwali ɣer wid yenṭerren kter-is. Am wakken, diɣ, i as-qqaren zik ‘’Ṭṭef deg Rebbi’’. Meɛna au sens propre : ur tettɛebbiḍ ara Rebbi i wiyaḍ, axater tura sxerben akk taswaɛt.

  Tizlatin-agi, nezmer ad d-nini d aḥric deg tmeddurt-ik, ma tebɣiḍ, ad tent-neḍfer yiwet yiwet i wakken ad nissim ciṭ akka seg tudert n ufennan. Tizlit tis snat deg Album, d tajmilt, i wacuɣer ur d-tuddireḍ ara ismawen ? 

 Cheikh Yahia : tizlit ‘’Anida tellam’’, tewwi-d ɣef lɛibad lɛali i d-yeǧǧan later-nsen. Mačči d yiwen ad t-id-taddreḍ, xemmeɣ-as yakan. lɛibad yelhan akk s umata : wid yeṭṭfen deg nnif-nsen, deg tirrugza-nsen, ttɛawanen imeɣban. Wid-nni yessaɣen tafat i wakken ad walin wiyaḍ. ‘’A win i ɣeḍren’’, tagi, tewwi-d ɣef tallit-nni-inek, tayri-k, tban ! Teqqareḍ : ‘’ Tinna akken i tḥemmleḍ, Tbuddeḍ-as lxir. Kullas teqqareḍ, D nettat aya xir. Qrib i tselbeḍ, Di leɛqel-ik tefɣeḍ. Sdat-k tḥeḍreḍ, Mi tedda akked lɣir’’.

  Cheikh Yahia :  sliɣ-as yiwet n tikkelt i ucennay ameqqran Idir, yeɛǧeb-iyi aṭas mi d-yenna : ‘’ccna mačči d les calculs’’. Ihi, nekk, dayen ɛaceɣ i d-nniɣ. Tusa-d tmedyazt, nniɣ-tt-id, yusa-d uẓawan, cniɣ-t-id. D ayen ɛaceɣ, d ayen i yi-iḍran. Et puis, ur ndimeɣ ara ɣef tayri-nni i ddreɣ lweqt-nni.

  Tzemreḍ ad as-tɛiwḍeḍ i tayri-nni akken teddreḍ, xas ulamma yettraǧu lfiraq ? 

 Cheikh Yahia : wellah ara ak-d-iniɣ, cɣel-agi yewɛer mliḥ (s teḍṣa). Tzemreḍ ad testeqsiḍ, diɣ, d Cherif Hamani amek i as-yeqqar, yenna-d :’’ Ad ak-yenɛel Rebbi a lfiraq, ay aɛdaw n yimdanen. Win teǧǧiḍ tasa-s teḥreq, tariḍ-t am uqejjun yeṣḍen’’. Ça veut tout-dire. Lefraq, d ayen iweɛren mliḥ, rnu-as ma yella tezweǧ teqcict. Limer d lebɣi, ilaq tayri ad taweḍ iswi. Acu kan, wagi d lebɣi mačči d tilawt (réalité). Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, ddunit tebna ɣef tayri. Anda ulac tayri, ulac akk d acu ileḥḥun. Ad nesḥissef aṭas imi timetti-nneɣ dagi i tent-tuɣ. Ulac leḥma la gar yimadanen, neɣ deg lxedma…atg. Ula d ddin, yettweṣṣi ɣef wanec-a.

  Tizlit tis rebɛa (4), ‘’La Ilah illla Llah’’, nezmer ad tt-nṣennef ɣer ddker. Llan kra qqaren lexwan d leḥram, wammag ccna, qqaren-as ‘’Mizmar ccayṭan’’. D acu ara d-tiniḍ kečč yettẓallan ? 

 Cheikh Yahia : nekk ttẓallaɣ u mazal ttẓallaɣ. Asmi i d-ssufɣeɣ Album-agi, yusa-d yiwen ɣer ɣur-i, mebla ma uddreɣ-d isem-is, yenna-yi-d tura a weldi ɣur-k ad ak-kelxen. Rriɣ-as d akken nekni d Rebbi i nettɛebbid, ur ugadeɣ yiwen. Lǧamuɛa, ttẓallaɣ s uqendur. Wwḍen yimdanen armi fettun ayen ur ẓrin ara, c’est vraiment, très grave ! Ad yili yiwen ixeddem ddin, i wakken ad t-id-walin wiyaḍ ; wayen ixeddem ddin meɛnaz ur ixeddem ara ayen i d-yenna ddin. Ayen iḍerrun timetti, ur t-id-yettawi ara umeddaḥ deg teqṣiḍt, ama deg tilibizyu neɣ ɣer wigi ifettun. Ad d-addreɣ yiwen wugur i iqerḥen mliḥ wagi d asentel ‘’lekdeb’’. Lekteb, yessenger timetti, ihi, win yeskeddiben, ur yumin ara. Ad d-rnuɣ wayeḍ ‘’Ddɣel’’, ala netta i yeṭṭuqten, yeččur ulawen. Tis snat, yerna ad twehmeḍ, wigi i ak-yeqqaren lexwan d leḥran, teẓriḍ, jerbeɣ-ten-id, nekk s timmad-iw, deg unnnar. Mi ara d-taweḍ tegnit n ddiq, ɣebbun lḥeqq. Ma d lexwan, d lɛada n lejdud-nneɣ, ttwanasen bab n lǧanaza. Yaxi d isem n Rebbi i d-ttaddren. Acu kan, aya yekka-d s ccerq, wwin-aɣ-d ayen mačči-nneɣ.

  Anwi-ten wigi i d-tuddreḍ deg tezlit ‘’Kra n yimdanen’’ ? 

 Cheikh Yahia : akken yeqqar Si Muḥ U Mḥend ‘’Win ceggbent lemḥan, mi i iger aqeddim yeɣli’’. Tewɛer tiyita n laman. Mi ara tent-taɣeḍ deg laman, dayen yesseqqraḥen mliḥ, mliḥ. Yerna tin i tent-yugaren merra, mi ara as-fken lḥeqq i winna i ak-iɣeḍren.

  Deg tezlit ‘’Mmi-s Umaziɣ’’, teqqareḍ-as : ‘’nekk d Azzayri, d mmi-s Umaziɣ’’. Yella win i d-tqesdeḍ s wanect-a, ladɣa MAK ? 

 Cheikh Yahia : ur yelli win i d-qesdeɣ : la MAK, wala wayeḍ. Xas zuxxeɣ-d s laṣel-iw akked yiẓuran-iw, ur zmireɣ ara ad as-iniɣ i wayeḍ kečč d aɛrab ur tettɛiciḍ ara yid-i. Acu kan, akken ara ten-qaddreɣ, i ilaq ad i yi-qaddren, daya. Uddreɣ-d, diɣ, Abane Ramdane imi i t-nɣan tikklet-nniḍen s ucemmet n umezruy.

  Tizlit taneggarut ‘’Tayri-m tesɛa lhiba’’, acuɣer d taneggarut ? Yerna ma tebɣiḍ, dɣa, d tidet tebɣiḍ ad ak-texḍu imi i as-teqqareḍ : ‘’tayri-m tesɛa lhiba, ar tura tugi ad i iy-texḍu’’ ? 

 Cheikh Yahia : akka, ihi, asmi ruḥeɣ ɣer Studio, ur seddaɣ ara tizlit-agi. Acu kan mi akken nessekles, nniɣ-asen tella tayeḍ. Nnan-d, rnu-tt-id, yuɣ lḥal tella niqal tis tmanya. Tḥekku-d tezlit-agi taqṣiḍt n tayri-iw akked teqcict-nni. Ur nddimeɣ, ur ṭṭifeɣ cceḥna. Mi iɛedda lweqt, ayen yeḍran yuɣal d smaḥ. Mazal lxir ɣer sdat, bnaden ur ilaq ara ad yayes.

  Seg tama n uẓawan tura, acu uɣur temmaleḍ, neɣ anwi i icennayen iwumi tessemḥaseḍ s waṭas ? 

 Cheikh Yahia : llan tlata (3) : Lounis Ait Menguellet, lounes Matoub d Kamel Messaoudi. Wigi i wumi ssemḥaseɣ mliḥ. Bɣiɣ kan ad rreɣ tajmilt tameqqrant i Matoub yefkan aqerruy-is ɣef tmaziɣ, Matoub mačči d awal kan, ayen i d-yeqqar, ixeddem-it.

  Awal-ik aneggaru 

 Cheikh Yahia : ad selmeɣ ɣef warrac n taddart-iw akken ma llan, nnan-d d ayen lɛali i txedmeḍ, d wa i d rbeḥ-iw. Ttsellimeɣ, daɣen, aṭas, aṭas ɣef Madjid Halit, Lounici Said, Dahmane Bendahmane, Djamel Ben Boucherit, Rabah Oukrine, tizrigin Akhalaf Music d yimaziɣen anda ma llan, mebla ma ttuɣ ixeddamen n tkebbanit Lounici. Evidemment Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen ‘’La Dépêche de Kabylie’’.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqqsa-t Hocine.M 

  
 Yuzzel wawal, yeṭṭuqqet uqejjem, ɣas azeṭṭa n facebook yettwarhen s umeslay ɣef…snat n tgejda n yidles amaziɣ. Idir d Lounis At Menguellat uɣalen d llazuq deg yimi n kra n yimdanen. S tidet, yal yiwen yesɛa azref ad d-yini ayen i yettxemmim maca llant kra n tilas ur ilaq ara umdan ad tent-yaweḍ. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer uẓar n taluft ad d-nesmekti dakken Idir d Lounis ttunecden ɣer yiwet n temlilit i d-tessewjed l’ONDA anda ara ḥeḍren i usenger n nnig n umelyun n yisiditen yettwaxedɛen. Deg ugraw-a, ttekkin kra n yineɣlafen ɣef uqerru-nsen Abdelmalek Sellal i d-yewwin awal dɣa ɣef taluft-a n tukerḍa yebɣan ad teqḍeɛ aɣrum i waṭas n yinaẓuren deg yiḥricen yemxallafen. Asmi kan i d-banen sin n yimdanen-a deg tiliẓri, yekker wah ruḥu…Ilaq ad nesselmed i Idir amek i ixeddem udabu, daɣ i Lunis amek ara yeddu. Kra n yimeslayen qerriḥit, ččuren d ddɣel d leḥqed i neqqar ar ass-a di Facebook. Cwiṭ n sswab maḍi maḍi ! Iḍelli kan I d-ssawlen yimḍebbren-a i Lounis iwakken ad yettekki di tfaska n Qsenṭina yerra-asen:” ur zmireɣ ad iliɣ i twiɣa yecban ti. Lukan i d-tennam belli Qsenṭina d tamaneɣt n yidles azzayri ad qebleɣ, imi i as-tefkam udem n tmanaɣt taɛrabt ur ttiliɣ gar-awen.” Anida-ten 

<p style="text-align: center;"> D ayen i yeǧǧan Idir yenna-d deg umaṭṭaf n rradyu taɣelnawt dakken” tagi d timlilit ideg ara d-nḥelli azref n unaẓur. Nella-d di lmendad I l’ONDA  

 imi d abrid n swab, ma d ayen nniḍen yal wa ad tt-yessefru akken I wala.”

 wigi yessiɣzifen iles zdat tidet yecban ta ? Imi ass-a iruḥ yeḥḍer deg wanda ara d-yawi azref i unaẓur, ur ilaq ara. Ɣef leḥsab n waya, inaẓuren-nneɣ, s ya d afella, mi bɣan ad xedmen kra ilaq ad d-ciwren, ma ulac terwi fell-asen. Ttuḥermen seg tlelli, tura ad ten-ssedduy am “yirubuten”. Seg tama nniḍen, ayadra yella wass ideg i nesla i sin yimdanen-a ad d-ḍebbren fell-aɣ ma ad neddu d tama n ufella neɣ d tin n wadda ? Yella wass ideg i nnan ttekkit di tefranin neɣ ala ? Yeɛreq swab i tifin ! D ayen i yeǧǧan Idir yenna-d deg umaṭṭaf n rradyu taɣelnawt dakken” tagi d timlilit ideg ara d-nḥelli azref n unaẓur. Nella-d di lmendad i l’ONDA imi d abrid n swab, ma d ayen nniḍen yal wa ad tt-yessefru akken i wala.” Yeḥsa ad d-yeḍru yid-s waya. “Tenna-as a taqabact tḍurreḍ-iyi, tenna-as afus seg-m.” Ma d Lounis, ɣas akken yerra-d akka s yiwet n tririt tuḥdiqt, meɛna yewhem kan yeqqar : «waqila mazal ur d-tufrar ara fell-aɣ tafat.” Ma neɛreḍ ad nesɣerbel imeslayen-a n Lunis, inumak mačči ḥala yiwen ara d-nemmager. Amezruy lqayen ibeggen-d dakken kra mi ara d-teḍru twaɣit d Uqbayli, tiyita tekka-d seg…gma-s. Yak yenna-s ucennay Zedek deg yiwet seg tezlatin-is:” a tiyita iyi-ḍurren mi d-tekkiḍ seg win ḥemleɣ.” D acu kan, ashissef meqqren di tizi n wass-a, d tiyita deg watmaten-nneɣ s leqsiḥ yerna nessutur tadukli. “Qeḍran ma yezwar s imi, tament ma teggra iwumi !” I as-yenna winna n zman. 

<p style="text-align: right;">   Radhia. B  

  
 Iẓi (vésicule biliaire) iseḥḥan, ilaq ad yili di tfekka. D acu kan imi iẓi d tacekkaṛt tameẓyant yettilin ddaw tasa, ddeqs n yimdanen ur ẓrin ara tella, u tesɛa azal ameqqṛan. Iẓi yezmer ad yili d amkan n tlalit n yiẓra yeṭṭuqqten ugar ɣer tlawin yesɛan gar 20 d 60 n yiseggasen. Ɣef waya, issefk fell-aɣ ad nissin ccirat n waṭṭan-a.

  Acu n wazal yesɛa yiẓi? 

 Iẓi d tacekkaṛt tameẓyant yettilin ddaw n tasa, teččur d imirẓig ( bile) i d-itekken seg-s. Tessurug-it deg yiẓerman s ttawil n targa n yimirẓig akken ad yishil usefsi n tassemt deg-sen.

  Anwi imdanen yettḥaz ugar waṭṭan n yiẓra n yiẓi? 

 Ttilin yiẓra n yiẓi ugar ɣer tlawin yesɛan gar 20 d 60 n yiseggasen labeɛda tid yellan s tadist neɣ tid itessen tihurmunin yecban tiɛeqqacin n uḥbas n dderya. Imdanen yesɛan aṭṭan n sskeṛ neɣ tuzert, wid itetten učči yeččuren d sskeṛ neɣ d tassemt, s umata, nettaf iẓra deg yiẓi-nsen. Tikkwal, aṭṭan-a, nettaf-it ɣer ddeqs n yimdanen n yiwet n twacult. Ɣef waya i d-tbeggen tussna dakken llan yiẓra n yiẓi yettawraten.

  Acu-tent ccirat n waṭṭan-a? 

 Acuffu n tɛebbuḍt akked d uṭuqqet n lgaz : Aya icudd ɣer lexsaṣ n usefsi d uqzam n tassemt. Imi, iẓra yellan ama deg yiẓi ama deg targa čeṭṭinen asureg n yimirẓig deg yiẓerman.

  Amɛuqqu akked tuzzya n leɛqel :  labeɛda di ttnaṣfa n wass, snat n tsaɛtin deffir telqimt.

  Aqraḥ deg uɛebbuḍ, azagur akked yiɣallen, labeɛda si lǧiha tayeffust :  imi neẓra dakken iẓi yusa-d ddaw tasa yellan si tama tayeffust deg uɛebbuḍ. Ɣef waya, ilaq amdan, ad yettara lewhi-s ɣer uqraḥ-a ma yeqqim ugar n 15 n tedqiqin.

 Lembwaser (hémorroïdes) akked uberriḍ.

  Sawraɣ (ictère) :  d aɣbel ameqqṛan imi ccira am ta, tettbeggin-d dakken iẓra regglen targa n yimirẓig. Aneggaru-a, yettawi abrid-nniḍen deg yiẓuran n yidammen, d aya ara yefken init awraɣ ama i uglim neɣ i wallen.

  Tawla d yimi yettfuḥun :  ma qqiment ccirat-a ugar n 10 n wussan, ilaq amdan ad inadi ɣef sebba imi tezmer ad tili d aṭṭan-a.

 Iẓi yezmer ad yili d amkan n tlalit n ddeqs n yiẓra yeṭṭuqten aṭas ɣer tlawin. Aṭṭan-a yeslalay-d ddeqs n wuguren. Yessefk ɣef yal yiwen ad yissin ccirat-ines akken ad as-yekker ɣef zik lḥal uqbel ma yegla-d s wayen meqqṛen yecban tamsalmit neɣ azzug n yiẓi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima Dali 

  
 Mazal ur ɣman waggasen n temdint n Paris mi tekcem Bruxelles ula d netta-t di ccedda-s. Azal n xemsa n wussan akked wuḍan addad n leḥriṣ ( état d’urgence) yeqfel ɣef iɣermaniyen izedɣen tamdint-agi. Di ccaw tenneqḍaɛ tawafɣa n unekcum, iɣerbazen, tisdawiyin medlent tiwwura imdanen kemnen deg ixxamen-nsen. Tugdi tẓerreb ɣef leḥwari, yal wa yettraǧu melmi d wanda ara yeḍṛu ubaxix s wacu id yergem Daash.

 Wid yeṭṭafaṛen tasertit ( menbeɛd mi id teḍṛa taxazabit id yeglan s wacḥal d lmuta deg tmanaɣt n tmurt n Fṛansa) nwan ad yili, tikelt-a, kra n-umǧazi gar di tmuɣliwin gar timura tutrimin ( pays occidentaux) yezdin ɣer umezday n l’OTAN akked tmurt n Rrus ikecmen s iɣalen-is akken ad tqazem ddewla tneslemt n dash yeglan s-uzegzaw akked uquṛan i tamnaḍt n Ccem akked Lɛiraq. Tirza n François Hollande ɣer tmurt n Marikan akked ɣer Mouscou, ɣer waṭas n isenqaden d-abrid yessawaḍen ɣer lmerɣub-agi. Maca ur teddun iɣerruba ala akken yecehwa waḍu imi ziɣ tella tḥaejurt yefran deg tdakemt n wurar. Taḥajurt-agi d tamurt n Turk id iɣeḍlen ass-n tlata 24 deg unbir-agi timesrifegt taḥerbit n tmurt n Rrus s leɣder. Werdin tekcem tawla deg ulawen n timunaɣin n umaḍal wakali imi ayen-nni umi isemma Poutine “tiyita n lmus s deffir n weɛrur” iban kan d awezɣi ad tesɛeddi Mouscou kan akken mebla tiririt.

 Ɣef tikelt Lavrov yessanef tirzi-ines ɣer tmurt n Turk. Aneɣlaf n tiɣensi’ ministre de la defense) n tmurt Rrus yegzem amṣiweḍ gar- iɣalen n tmurt-is akked wid n-iɣalen n Ankara. Si tama nniḍen Poutine igezm-itt d ṛṛay ad iceyaɣ Lbabur n trad “Moskva” yerna ad yefser tinaɛurin mgal les missiles S-400 Triumph deg akal n Ssurya akken ad yeɣḍel kra n tɣawsa ad yekren d tiɛekkrin mgal timesrifgin n tmurt-is yettnaɣen din-a di tmurt n Ccem.

 Zun ayen-nni yak drus, di tmeddit n yiwen wass-nni ( ass-n 24/11/2015) ha-ten diɣ twaɣit nniḍen tḥuza tamurt n Tunes imi id teḍṛa ẓeḍma ɣef lkar yettawin n imsulta igdudanen n tmurt-agi. Azal n 15 n yemdanen i yettwanɣen deg tadyant-agi id yesseɣlin llhul ɣef imezdaɣ n temdint n Tunes . Di ccaw yeffɣed rrabul id yessen liḥala n ccedda ɣef tmurt wakali akked umteddu ddaw lqanun n waddad uḥris ( état d urgence) azal n waggur s lekmal-is. Ɣef akken id yenna uselway n tmurt n Tunes : tamurt-is ha-ten ddaw umihi ameqqran.

 Daya irekeli id yewwin tuget n wid yeṭṭafaṛen tasertit tagraɣlant ad gren s annar asteqsi-agi: “ sani akka i-iteddu umaḍal?”. Ɣer waṭas n iserten neɣ imsenqaden n tsertit, isufar akken ad yili traḍ amaḍal nniḍen wejden di tbaqit n ccwal. Ssebba ahat d astehzi n tmura tutrimin irebban afud i dash armi yuɣal talafsa m sebɛa iqeṛṛa. Yella di lbal awal n Poutine id yenan: “ amek tamurt n Marikan izemran ad twali aman akkin di tkurin n tignaw ibeɛden, izemren ad teɣḍel leɛsakker n Sedam Hussien di rebɛa n wussan ur tezmir ara ad tini anda tefren irebraben n dash neɣ aselway-nsen Lbaɣdadi?” . 

 Gar ajbed n wigi d wakref n wigi, liḥala tcudd dayen kan..simmal zrin wussan simmal tettɛeṭṭil tifrat n tadyant n tmurt n Ccem, simmal tettuddum zit ɣer tmes.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Aït Slimane Hamid  

  
 Adlis-a, d ammud n yinzan i d-yerra Adaoun Abdelaghani seg timawit ɣer tira, ɣef wakken i d-yura gar yiswiyen n leqdic-is, ladɣa imi netta d anelmad n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu. Ad naf deg udlis azal n 950 n yinzal yemseḍfaren ɛlaḥsab n yisekkilen n ugemmay. Anelmad-a, yerran anadi deg uḥric-agi n tmaziɣt d iswi, yeẓra azal n yinzan deg tmetti, ama seg tama n ttrebga, ama seg tama n tsekla neɣ n umezruy imi yal lemtel d inigi ɣef tallit-is, d aseḥbiber ɣef tutlayt, d tiẓedt n wawal. Yeffeɣ-d udlis ɣer tizrigin Richa Elsam, yettnuz s 150 DA. Taɣuri igerrzen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M   

  
 Mačči d drus ayen i d-iḍerrun d tiwaɣiyin yal ass deg yiberdan-nneɣ, gellunt s terwiḥin n umeẓyan d umeqqran, sgujjulent arrac. Ɣas tikwal tasebba n yisehwa (accidents) tettekk-d s berra n ufus n umdan, maca neẓra xersum amur ameqqran seg-sen d amdan i ten-id-yesseḥḍaren, ladɣa ilemẓi. Ama s war aqader n wangal n tenhert, neɣ s yir almad n tenhert deg uɣerbaz ansa i d-yewwi ttesriḥ (permis). Imi neẓra aṭas n yiɣerbazen n tenhert ass-a, i d-yessufuɣen yir inelmaden ɣer ubrid, akken d nutni ara yilin deffir yibaxixen azekka. «Heḍreɣ s timmad-iw i yiwet n tegnit n uttɛeddi ɣef usaḍuf, tessewhem-iyi ar tura. D bab n yiwen n uɣerbaz n tenhert i as-yessutren 3000 n yidinaren i win yesɛeddayen ɣur-s ma yebɣa ad yeḍmen rbaḥ n yiwen n ukayad !». D aya i aɣ-d-iwekked yiwen n yilemẓi seg usamar n Bgayet. Daymi ara tettwaɛiwid tmuɣli ussan i d-iteddun ɣef yiɣerbazen-a n tenhert d wid i ten-yesselḥayen, ɣef wakken i d-tewwi tɣamsa. Am uswir n win ara yeldin sya d tasawent aɣerbaz, i ilaqen ad yili d aɛlayan seg tama n tegzi d tmussni tadelsant akked tarrayt n uselmed ur ttqadaren akken ilaq at yiɣerbazen-a.

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K 

 
  
 Segmi tbeddel Algérie Télécom i tsumar-is (offres) n Internet n 4G LTE seg tuqqna idummen ɣer tin iḥebbsen, uɣalen yimezdaɣ n twilayt n Bgayet ḥaren ɣef ubrid ara ḍefren akken ad keccmen ɣer umaḍal-a uhlis. Ulamma wid izedɣen timdinin ur ḥulfan s waṭas n temḍerrit skud sɛan tiferni n ADSL, wid n yidurar, ufan iman-nsen nnḍen deg uɣilif. Imi tasuta n tallit-a i nettidir teqqen merra-s ɣer Internet. Deffir waya, yuɣ lḥal, ddeqs n tiɣriwin i d-yeffɣen sɣur tdukkliwin d tuddsiwin i ubeṭṭel n tuqqna-a alama i d-subbent sswami-s xersum. Ladɣa ɣef uẓawali i yesɛan azref ad yeqqen s ttawil-is am netta am wiyeḍ. Ula d tineggiwin (agences), rwant asiwel d uccekti sɣur yimsaɣen. « D ayen ur nedmi maḍi ad d-yili, imi mačči ɣef waya i nestenya ass n tiɣin. Ttwaliɣ ccɣel-a d attɛeddi ɣef yizerfan n umsaɣ d umsider s umata ». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n useqdac aqbur n 4G LTE. Ar tura, ilaq ad d-nini amur ameqqran seg yimsaɣen, ǧǧan ttawil-a n 4G LTE ɣef ssebba n leɣla. Ladɣa imi xilla i yellan ssaramen deg 4G voLTE tamaynut, meɛna ula d nettat yewweḍ lqidar n unnezdi (abonnement) amayyur ɣer 3500 n yidinaren. Ulamma telḥa cwiṭ ɣef yiɣarimen Tdukkla Taɣelnawt n Uḥuddu ɣef Yimsidren (consomateurs), maca ur yefri ubeddel i d-yellan, skud tuqqna tḥebbes mi ara kfun 8 n yijigaten. Ɣef waya, mazal tettkemmil taluft gar Algérie Télécom d yimsaɣen-is, ma neẓra ineggura-a ur ttuqennɛen ar tura.

  M. K. 

  
 Amer ad d-ḥkuɣ ɣef tin aɛzizen ad tt-wahmem. Dayen ur tettamnem. Asmi tt-waleɣ deg uɣerbaz qqleɣ d amedyaz. Mi d-zmumeg tefrari tagut, tcerq-d tafukt, tḥebbes tegrest, tefsa tefsut. Tesɛa allen d tiberkanin am iɛeqqayen n uzemmur, tawenza-s yeffer-itt wemzur-is, udem-is d amellal am udfel, tettfeǧǧiǧ am twizet. Ad as-tiniḍ d amekla yecban Isyaem i tt-ineǧren.

 Seg wasmi tt-waleɣ, yerwel fell-i yiḍes, ḥettbeɣ itran deg yigenni. Ul-iw yal ass, yessaram ad tiwali i wakken as-yini acḥal aɛzizet fell-i, yerna ad as-d-ɣreɣ isefra isefra n tayri. Acḥal i tturǧiɣ deg urɣu n yiṭij, deg yicercuren n ugeffur, i ubeḥri yettcelwiḍen, deg udfel aqesḥan, i uqerrif n ugris d ubruri… Ɛeddan wussan rrnan iseggasen, iḍaq wul-iw yugi ad yesber. Xemmemeɣ ad as-ceggeɛeɣ tabret. Uriɣ-tt ulseɣ-as taɣuri acḥal n tikkal, seggmeɣ-tt akken iwata. Buxxeɣ-tt s leɛṭer, rniɣ-as tajeǧǧigt. Uzneɣ-as-tt, qqimeɣ ttraǧuɣ tirit. Ttraǧuɣ tḍul tmerǧa, ruḥ ay Aɛrab ar tafsut. Ul-iw yuyes tirit. Nniɣ-as i wul-iw, tikelt-a ma yella mmugreɣ-tt-id deg ubrid, ad ḍeggreɣ akin leḥya-agi ad as-iniɣ akk ayen tt-ḥulfuɣ, d wayen akk iqerḥen ul-iw, d wayen icebblen allen-iw. Yiwwas mmugreɣ-tt-id waḥd-s, ɛeddaɣ ad as-hedreɣ sqewqiweɣ, ɛerqen-iyi imeslayen. Ttergigiɣ, tafekka-w tekfel-itt-id tidi. Tɛedda-d zdat-i imi-w yelli maca awal ur t-id yuli. Mi dayen tɛedda, bdiɣ tt-lummuɣ deg yiman-iw :”Ayen a Bussaɛd i k-tenɣa leḥya, tɛedda-d waḥd-es, yerna abrid d ilem, ur as-tenniḍ acemma ?”

 Yiwwas mmugreɣ-tt-id waḥd-s. Walaɣ-tt t-tteddu-d deg ubrid-iw. Hegga-ɣ-d akk ayen i bɣiɣ ad as-tiniɣ. Hegga-ɣ-d ungal n tayri xedmeɣ-t am usefru. Mi d-wweḍ ar zdat-i, d ul-iw i as-yutlayen mačči d nekk-i :

 -Nekkini d itri, zgiɣ ttidireɣ waḥd-i, asmi kem-walaɣ deg yigenni, ul-iw yeddegdeg, yerreẓ iruḥ d iceqfan. Steqseɣ wid-nni ijerben, inaẓuren, imusnawen, nnan-d akk ala kemm i izemren ad tt-dawiḍ ul ijerḥen.

 -Tettmeslayeḍ am umedyaz.

 -D kemm i yirran d amedyaz.

 -Nekk ur umineɣ s tmedyazt, d awalen kan, wa sdeffir wa, xas seggmen yerna cebḥen.

 Temmuql-d s afus-iw, twala-d aqrab, tenna-d :

 -Keččini d aselmad. Iselmaden ur sɛin ara azal ameqran di tmetti n wass-a acku ur ttaɣen ara aṭas n yidrimen. Nekk ad aɣeɣ ajenyur, amejjay neɣ bugaṭu.

 -Mačči d idrimen i d tumert.

 -Nekkini d idrimen i bɣiɣ. D wigi i yessefraḥen. Ma d isefra akked d ijeǧǧigen, d timucuha kan, ḥku-tent-id kan di tmedyazt-ik.

 Dɣa truḥ teǧǧa-id abeḥri.

<p style="text-align: right;">Boussad Ḥemar

  
 Tifra, d taddart deg lɛerc n yiflisen n yilel (lebḥar). Tesɛa tilisa akked Tigzirt. Zik, d nettat i d taɣiwant n temdint-agi. Deg taddart taqdimt, mazal ar ass-a ibedd uxxam amezwaru. Xas ulamma ulac anwa i t-izedɣen, meɛna yeqqim akken d inigi i tsuta i iɛeddan syin. D taddart, diɣ, n temjahedt tameqqrant Louisette Ighilahriz iqublen ljiniral Paul Aussaresses, udem ɣer wudem deg Fransa.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Takerḍa n Tifra. 

 Tella Tifra d taɣiwant armi d aseggas n 1963. Aseggas anda nɣan aselway-is deg tedyanin-nni n FFS. Syin tuɣal tetabaɛ taɣiwant n Tigzirt. Zedɣen deg-s ugar n 8 000 n yimezdaɣ. Ɛlayet ɣef lebḥar s wazal n 600 n lmitrat. Mazal deg taddart taqdimt, axxam amezwaru i yebnan s uẓru azal n 300 n yiseggasen-aya. D axxam n twacult Tabourga, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan. Tebda tettɛemmir taddart n Tifra deg lqern wis 17. 

 Tifra, d taddart mm 7 n sadat. Nnan-d amezwaru i d-yusan ɣer din, yesɛa 7 warraw-is. Syin win yemmuten, ad as-bnun taqubbet. Ɣef wakken i d-nnan, amur ameqqran n yimezdaɣ frurin-d akk seg-sen : sɛan assaɣen yid-sen. Yeldi uɣerbaz amezwaru i warrac deg taddart-a deg useggas n 1898. Ma d aɣerbaz i teḥdayin, yeldi tiwwura-s deg useggas n 1935. Mazal ar tura lǧameɣ n Uṛumi neɣ n yimasiḥiyen xas ulamma medlent tewwura-s. Am wakken yella, diɣ, uẓekka n yiwen uṭerki, Yahia Benyahia, i d-irewlen u yetneṣṣel dinna : yesɛa tawacult. Am wakken tella tmeqqbert n wid-nni yemmuten deg ṭrad n 1871 neɣ uqbel. Rnu ɣer wanect-a, 57 n yimeɣras i yeɣlin deg tegrawla n 1954-1962. Ireṣṣa lɛesker n Fransa deg Tifra deg useggas 1956. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Isem ‘’Tifra/Iflisen’’ 

 Ɣef yisem Tifra, nnan-aɣ-d snat n turdiwin. Tamezwarut, Tifra tekka-d seg umyag ‘’Ffer’’ imi taddart tamezwarut teffer : ansi i d-tekkiḍ, akken yebɣu yili ubrid ara d-tawiḍ, ur tt-tettwaliḍ ara. Ma d turda tis snat, yezmer tekka-d seg umyag ‘’Fru’’ imi ferrun din timsal n leɛrac, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan. Awal ‘’Iflisen’’, yebɣa ad yini ‘’Les pirates’’ imi i d-kkan seg lebḥar.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Amezruy d tmetti. 

  Yal axxam s tmazirt-is. 

 Deg taddart n Tifra, yal tawacult tesɛa tamazirt i txeddem. Amek ? Yella umekkan n tfellaḥt, d lewḍa, kkren Wat taddart, ferqen-t d timizar, yal tawacult s umur-is. Akka, yal yiwen yessasan-d lɣella-s. Ugar n 60 n yiḥricen i nufa ttwaxedmen asmi i nerza ɣer taddart-agi : yal wa d acu i yeẓẓa deg tmazirt-is. 

 Zik, amur ameqqran n yimezdaɣ n Tifra, d iḥeddaden. Xeddmen leslaḥ. Mechurit, ladɣa, s ssif n yiflisen. Am wakken i fkan azal, diɣ, i tazart, azemmur d tfellaḥt-nniḍen. Ɣef wanect-a i yella ssuq n ttlata deg tama-nni armi d aseggas n 1871 i yettwakkes. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Kra n yisekkilen n tifinaɣ (Libyque) akked wunuɣen ɣef yiẓra n Yifran. 

  Deg yiwet n teẓgi, yella umekkan qqaren-as Ifran, asget n yifri. Yewwi isem-a imi llan deg-s yifran. Deg tama-a, ad naf yiwen yifri yesɛan 9 n lmitrat deg teɣzi, 6 n lmitrat deg leɛli u 4,50 deg telqayt, yiwet n tɣerɣert ttwarun fell-as kra n yisekkilen n tfinaɣ, am L, M, Z, U…atg akked kra n wunuɣen d taklut (Peinture ruprestre). Am wakken llan kra n yizamulen, cban wid-nni seqqdacen deg talaxt deg tama-agi n yiwaḍiyen. Ar ass-a, ur yelli win i d-yelhan s useḥbiber n yifran-a. Ha-ten-in qqimen akken, la ttraǧun nger. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Kra n teqsiḍin akked tmucuha. 

  Youcef uday d Wat Tifra neɣ taddart n jmaɛliman. 

 Deg yiseggasen-nni n lgirra tamezwarut n umaḍal, teqqim taddart n Tifra i laẓ imi ceyyɛen Iṛumyen lɣellat-nsen ɣer Fransa. Ihi, yekker yiwen seg taddart iruḥ s Aẓeffun ɣer yiwen wuday yesɛan taḥanut tameqqrant i wakken ad iɛiwen taddart s kra n rreẓq. Yekker Wuday-nni, iɛawen-ten akken ilaq. Asmi i d-yezzi useggas, rzan Wat Tifra ɣer din, rran aṛeṭṭal-nsen. Syin, teɣli-d lemḥibba gar Uẓeffun akked Tifra. Yiwet n tikklet mi tennejmaɛ taddart, yekker ccix n lǧameɛ yenna-as : ‘’ilaq ad iruḥ yiwen deg-wen ɣer Youcef n Uẓeffun i wakken ad as-yerr tajmilt imi i aɣ-isellek deg teswiɛt n ddiq. Ayen yexdem, yelha, acu kan ad igerrez ma yella nerra-t-id ɣer tneslemt’’. Ihi, truḥ yiwet n tesqamut ɣer Uẓeffun. Mi wwḍen, ikuber-iten-id dayen kan, ččan seksu. Syin, snemren-t u ḍelben deg-s ad yuɣal d ineslem. Winna yenna-asen :’’limer ad uɣaleɣ d ineslem, ihi, ad uɣaleɣ am kunwi. U ma yella uɣaleɣ am kunwi, anwa ara aken-iselken deg tegnit n ddiq ‘’? Syin uɣalen-d ɣer taddart u seg yimir, uɣalen Wat Tifra ttqadaren tameddinit. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Taqsiḍt n lǧameɛ. 

 Nnan-d asmi kkren ad bnun lǧameɛ deg taddart-a, ur msefhamen ara ɣef umekkan anda ara t-gen : wa yeqqar da, wayeḍ yeqqar dihen. Yal ass, yettzid ucerrig gar yimezdaɣ. Seg wakken tḍul tifrat, yiwen wass kan armi i d-ufan lǧameɛ-nni yebda lebni-s. Dɣa, kkren kemmlen fell-as u theddnen ixemmimen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Deg lǧerra n umcic 

 Yella yiwen umcic, yezga deg yiwen umekkan : iḥemmel amḍiq-nni d leɛmer-is. Yal mi ara t-id-awin yimawlan-is, azekka-nni ad yuɣal ɣer din. Akken-nni yal ass. Yuɣ lḥal tawacult-nni tebɣa ad d-tali d asawen, teɛya deg tama n wadda. Ihi, tmeyyez u tefra-tt d rray-is. Tenna-as :’’ad netbeɛ kan lǧerra n umcic-nneɣ. Ad nruḥ ɣer din, ad nezdeɣ. Syin ulin-d ɣer tama n ufella anda akken iḥemmel uɣersiw ad yeqqim.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Kra n wudmawen. Louisette Ighilahriz 

 Ha-t-an wayen i aɣ-d-yenna fell-as, uneɣmas Ferhat Tizguine. ‘’Louisette Ighilahriz, d iseɣ n tama-agi-nneɣ, ladɣa, taddart-is Tifra. D azamul n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit yecban Fadma n Soumer d tiyaḍ. Tqubel Fransa mebla lxuf xas akken sɛeddan fell-as lbaṭel am ljiniral Bigeard d Massu deg useggas n 1957 mi tt-ṭṭfen deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt’’.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Kra deg tmeddurt n Louisette Ighilahriz. 

 Laṣel n Tifra, deg tmurt n leqbayel. Tlul deg Oujda ass 28/08/1936. Truḥ ɣer Lezzayer deg useggas 1948 anda tella d tanelmadt. Tebda lgirra ɣef 20 n yiseggasen deg useggas n 1956. Tell agar ‘’Les porteuses de valises’’ deg ‘’La bataille d’Alger’’. Tejreḥ deg yiwen umennuɣ, syin tettwaṭṭef. Iceyyeɛ-itt yiwen n ṭṭbib ɣer Fransa. Syin lḥebs yettak-itt i wayeḍ armi d asmi i d-terwel, deg waggur n yennayer 1962. Akka tura, tettwafren ‘’sénatrice’’, sɣur aselway Bouteflika.

  Kra n wudmawen n umezruy : Ouzaïd Mohamed, Tadjadit Amar.  

  Amussu n tmetti : Malik Ouhaddad. 

  Idles d teywalt : Said Tifra, Chaou Abdelkader, Ighilahriz Med Lounes, Fatma Tilikete, Leila Nekchati, Ferhat Cherkit, Said Ait Ameur… 

  Tadamsa : Mohamed Medjkan (Tifra lait)   Deg taggara, ad snemreɣ ameddakel Ferhat Tizguine, Akli Slama d Moh Oua li.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Hocine.M 

  
 Ass n aram yezrin, 11 deg yulyu 2017, i yemmut uselmad Mass Aoued Handel deg Wat Yanni i yellan d aselmad acḥal n yiseggasen deg ugherbaz alemmas Larbi Mezani deg Tewrirt Mimun. Mass Handel, d yiwen uselmad yettwasnen aṭas s umahil-is akked leqcic-is adelsan neɣ anaddal. Am wakken i iḥemmel medden , i t-ḥemmlenula d netta, ladɣa iselmaden d yinelmaden n Wat Yanni. Yezdegh dinna deg uɣerbaz anda yella d aselmad n waddal, maca melmi i t-ḥwaǧen, yella . Iitelli-asen i yinelmaden tazeqqa n waddal i wakken ad heggin leqdic adelsan neɣ asmekti n talliyin yettwassnen deg tmurt n leqbayel, yecban Tafust taberkant neɣ tin n tmanyin, yennayer…atg. Sin kan yiseggasen segmi i yewwi tastaɣt (retraite), maca ikemmel leqcic akked yinelmaden. Lexbar n tmettant-is, yesseɣli-d leḥzen d ameqqran ɣef yimezdaɣ n Wat Yanni akked wid i t-yessnen merra. Teɣli-d kan akka fell-as lmut imi d ul-is i iḥebsen seg yiwet n ddqiqa. Yemḍel ass-nni n ahad, 12 deg yulyu, deg Tewrirt Mimun. Sḥassfen akk imi yeɣli Mass Handel Aoued. Yeǧǧa-d tamettut, ula d nettat d taselmadt dinna s tefransist akked sin warraw-is, aqcic d teqcict.Gen deg talwit a Mass Handel, sber i yimawlan.

  Z. B .Y. 

  
 Zzin-d 54 n yiseggasen γef tedyanin n 17 tuber 1961, i yeqqimen d cfawat deg allaγen n yizzayriyen, anda lεeskkar n tmurt n Fransa xedmen yiwet n tmecret meqqren, marren yidammen n yizzayriyen.

 Ass n 17 ṭuber 1961, d luluf n yimesbaniyen, fγen-d γer yiberdan, suγen mgal taεessast yesbed yimḍebber amenzu n yimsulta « Maurice Papan ». Ugar n 200 n yimesbaniyen ttwanγan, ttwaḍegren deg wasif n « La Seine » sγur iγallen n laman n Maurice Papan.

 Ayen yeḍran di tlemmast n « Paris » d ayen ur iqebbel wallaγ n umdan. 54 n yiseggasen id-yezzin γef tedyant-agi tamazrayt, izzayriyen anda ma llan gzin swayen i yeḍran i yeγriben-nnaγ. Γef aya deqs n tmesbaniyin id-yellan di yal timnaḍin n tmurt n Lzzayer d tmurt n Fransa. Taγiwant n Yiεẓẓugen tella di tiεad, imi ass n 15 tuber, yella-d usmekti n tedyanin-agi s tririt n tejmilt i 12 n yemjuhad n temnaḍt-agi n yukkan di tedyanin, annect-a yella-d s uεellaq n ciεat, syen llant-d temliliyin tinigiyin s leḥdur n yemḍebren n tγiwant d dayra n Yiεeẓẓugen, tawacult tagrewliwt ger-asen tudsa taγelnawt n yimjahden, tiddukla tafidiralit n tirni n uslelli aγelnaw n fransa, d tdukla n tarwa n Cuhada d waṭas niḍen. Iswi n tmesbanit-agi tamazrayt, d asfaḍ uγebbar γef umezruy n Lzzayer.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Yuzzel ussan-a ineggura wawal ɣef tisin ɣer terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n Leqbayel yiwen seg yimyurar n Tadjenant. Wagi d amḥaddi Ali Guitoune I yebɣa uselway Hannachi ad d-yawi iwakken ad yessejhed ugar tamḥaddit n terbaɛt-is. Ɣas akka amḥaddi n DRBT d win yebɣan ad d-yass ɣer Tizi, maca yiwen n uɛewwiq n tesriḥ-is ur t-yeǧǧi ara ad tt-yegzem dir ray akken I yebɣa. Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen I aɣ-d-yewwḍen, Ali Guitoune yessuter seg uselway Hannachi iwakken ad yaɣ ayen iwumi neqqar tabrat n ttriḥ. Amyurar, yenna dakken “ma yella dɣa yella-d waya, s lferḥ d ameqqran ara yurar di terbaɛt mucaɛen di ama di tmurt ama di Tefriqt”. Seg tama nniḍen, ilaq ad d-nesmekti dakken asleɣmay Kamal Mouassa d netta ara ikemmlen di terbeɛt-a I useggas I d-iteddun imi d yiwen n usleɣmay I d-yessukksen JSK seg tlaqa n uɣelluy s aḥric wis sin, yerna yessuli-tt-id s amḍiq ur yerǧi ula yiwen. D ayen yeǧǧan Hannachi yerra deg-s yiwet n teflest mebla aɣbel. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Radia B. 

  
 Yenna-d umalal n udumaru n uwanak amarikani i tugdut d yizerfan n wemdan, Tom Malinowski, ass n lexmis deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, dakken taɣemsa «tejhed» yernu d «tilellit» deg Lezzayer. Iwekked-d umasay-a (mas’ul) amarikani aya i tɣemsa deffir udiwenni ay iga d uneɣlaf n teɣwalt (ittiṣal), Hamid Grine. Yenna-d daɣ dakken yessefk ad tettwassebɣes tɣemsa «ijehden» d «tlellit» akken ad ilin yiwanaken (duwal) «jehden ugar» am wakken ara «hennint» tmettiyin. Ma d Mass Grine, yessukk-d tiṭ d Mass Malinowski ɣef ttejṛibat n Yiwanaken Yeddukklen d Lezzayer deg tɣemsa, am wakken ay d-yenna dakken ttejṛiba tadzayrit temgerrad ɣef tin n Yiwanaken Yeddukklen, ladɣa imi ttejṛiba tamarikanit tesɛa 2 n leqrun seg wasmi ay d-tebda, ma d Ldzayer tesɛa ala 30 n yiseggasen aya seg wasmi ay terẓem anrar i teẓruggta (taɛaddud). «Iwufeq Mass Malinowski dakken tella tlelli meɣɣren n tɣemsa deg Lezzayer», ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked Mass Grine, am wakken ay d-yerna dakken deg wakud ay yekka deg Lezzayer, ifuṛes tilelli-a, maca, «iban dakken maci kullec ifaz yernu taɣemsa (tadzayrit) mazal la tetteddu ɣer sdat». «Ssarameɣ dakken seg-a ɣef kra n yiseggasen, ad nessiweḍ ɣer weswir n tezdeg n ṣṣenɛa d wetwal ay nessaram, am wakken ara d-tili tlelli tameqrant n tɣemsa», ɣef wakken ay d-yerna. Yenna-d daɣ Mass Grine i Mass Malinowski dakken tella teẓruggta deg tɣemsa yernu ur yelli akk wedras (raqaba) ama ɣef uneɣmas, ama ɣef tɣemsa.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

  
  Isufar 

 100 g n lluz

 100 g n tamamt

 100 ml n zzit n urgan

  Aheggi 

 slilet u skawet lluz-nni. Zzut-t akken llan s uclim-nsen, syin terrem-t ɣer tmeqqlit. Ur ilaq ara ad yerɣ. Mi yewwa, ẓdem-t u ternum-as tamamt, terwim-t. deg taggara, rennut-as, ciṭ ciṭ, zzin n urgan, txelḍem-t akken iwata. Ssisinen-t s uɣrum, yettmačča akked llatay deg tiremt n ssbeḥ. Yezmer ad yeqqim kra n wussan mebla ma yuɣal deg tasmuḍi. D arekti i d-yekkan seg tmurt n Marruk.

  S tezmert-nwen 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Sɣur Daya  

  
  Tameγra n zwağ: 

 Aṭas n tmaγriwin i d-iḍerun di tudrin n leqbayel, tugti deg-sent d tid n zwağ, tassemhuyt i fernen akken a d-teḍru tmeγra d anebdu acku imiren i d-ttemlilen akk yemdanen ama d iγriben ama d wid ixedmen imi d imuras. Ma yella d ass, di tugti fernen ass n lexmis d wass n lğemεa. 

 Ass n lexmis i tbeddu tmeγra, imawlan n uqcic yuγ-iten lḥal heggan iman-nsen, swejden akk ayen ilaqen. Ihi di tsebḥit zellun azger, tayemmatt a d-tenced tilawin n taddart akken ad ssifent smid, ad heggint taqufett ara iruḥen γer uxxam n teslit ad awin tabarizt ideg ara rren lqec i teslit, amedya; rebεa tqendyar, tabakitt n lhennin aqaleb n sabun … ayen uwumi qqaren tisnit, ad rnun tameccact uεejmi d wayen d-qḍan akken .

  Lḥenni: 

 Ass n lḥenni, tislit ilaq ad tessired tarda yemgaraden atas γef tardiwin d wi tuγ tannumi. Tagi d tarda s tneffalin. Tinefalin d kra isufar ara d-yawi wemγar n teslit. Uqbel ad tebdu tarda ad tecεel tacemmuεt, d asfilet i wussan n talwit i wakken tislit d wargaz-is ad izmiren ad sεun dderya. Ihi tislit ad d-teddem tineffalin ne isufar i s-d-yewwi wemγar-is a ten-texleḍ γer waman i wakken ur tseεu ara uguren zdat-s. Llant kra n tudrin n leqbayel anda tislit tettruẓ γer lemqam ad d-tẓur. Tameddit n wass n lḥenni, yiwen ger yergazen n twacult n yesli ad iruḥ γer tejmaεt a d-yenced imezdaγ n taddart a d-ruḥen ad ččen imensi. Ayen iwumi qqaren asečči n taddart. Llant tudrin anda asečči yettili-d azekka-nni γef imekli uqbel a d-teddu teslit. Yella anda bab n tmeγra ad iεeddi axxam axxam akken a d-yeεreḍ taddart. Imezdaγ n taddart a d-asen merra ad ččen imekli neγ imensi, a d-asen γer wurar, a d-asen ad walin tislit, ad ttikkin di lferḥ di beddu n tmeγra armi tagara-s. Ula d-imawlan n teslit ttencaden-d wid sen-yettilin γer tmaγra. Melmi yekfa usečči, yal wa yewwi tiremt-is, ad ruḥen merra yemdanen γer wennar neγ tebraḥt anda ara d-yeḍru wurar. Argaz tameṭṭut, aqcic taqcict, amectuḥ, ameqran….atg. Melmi imawlan n tmeγra swejden i lḥenni d wurar, tayemmatt n yesli ad tawi lemlaḥ deg wurawen-is syen ad tessuzar i tebraḥt akken ad yimliḥ wurar. Syen tilawin timedyazin neγ tibuγarin yettawin isefra, a d-asent γer tlemmast n tebraḥt, ad bḍunt γef snat n-trebbuεa. A d-zzint d agraw, ad cennunt, ad ttawint izlan, ad sefrayent γef yesli akk d imawlan-is, ad ttcekkirent isli, imawlan-is, adrum-is, sellaḥ, tarbaεt at tessefray tayeḍ a d-ttεawad.

  Amedya : 

 <em>Ad ṣelliγ γef nbi, a d-yers lḥenni</em>

 <em>A d-rnunt lemluk, yellan deg igenni</em>

 <em>A t-yeqqen yesli, Rebbi a t-ihenni</em>

 <em>Ad ṣelliγ γef nbi, a d-yers lmetred</em>

 <em>A d-rnunt lemluk, Rebbi ad iḥareb</em>

 <em>A t-yeqqen yesli, ageṭṭum n dheb</em>

 <em>Ad ṣelliγ γef nbi, a d-rsen waman</em>

 <em>A d-rnunt lemluk, yellan deg igenwan</em>

 <em>A t-yeqqen yesli, lbaz ameẓyan</em>

 Llant tudrin anda i d-yettili ccna n tbuγarin s ibeddi, yarna ad teddunt ad tezzint am umeqyas di tebraḥt n lḥenni. Melmi kfant tbuγarin icewwiqen-nsent, imawlan n yesli a d-sersen ṭabla, a tt-γumen s lfuḍa neγ s tmeḥremt n zriru. Syen a d-sersen lmetred n lḥenni, daxel-is ad rren irden akken ad sεun dderya, timellalin akken ad umlulen wussan-nsen, tabakitt n lḥenni ideg ara s-qnen i yesli, ad rnun axelxal neγ ameclux n lfeṭa akken ad yerr tiṭ neγ yir lbas. Ar yiri lmetred ad yili lmeṣbaḥ s tcemmaεin yettfeğğiğen akken ad tifrir tafat-nsen si tama nniḍen ad yili ubuqal n waman acku qqaren aman d laman. Isli ad yeqqim s ubernus amellal ar lḥenni, a s-d-zzin imawlan-is d wid s-yettilin. Ma yella d imdanen nniḍen i d-yusan ama si taddart neγ berra n taddart akken a s-ferḥen, ad sastin fell-as s tedrimt, ayen iwumi qqaren lxir neγ tawsa. A d- yekker baba-s n yesli a d-yawi amγar ameqran n udrum a s-yeqqen lḥenni i yesli. Ad yeddem, ad yessimes iḍudan-is dγa a s-t-yeḍlu deg ufus ayeffus, di lawan-nni tibuγarin ad ttawint isefra, ad ssiγritent. Melmi iḥebsen tbuγarin, ad iεeddi umedyaz a d-yezzenz lḥenni, a s-yeqqar: 

 <em>Ad ṣelliγ γef nbi, akka la neḥder</em>

 <em>Yers-d lmetred am wagur id-idewwar</em>

 <em>Daxel-is timellalin yurew ṭṭir lḥar</em>

 <em>Rnan-d yirden i d-nemgar deg uzaγar</em>

 <em>Terna-d lfeṭṭa i yexdem uḥeddad lḥar </em>

 <em>Rnan-d waman i d-ugmen di lεinṣar</em>

 <em>Rnant-d tcemaεin fkant-d tafat a nẓar</em>

 <em>Ad cekreγ isli a lbaz lmiṣar</em>

 <em>Ad rnuγ baba-s d argaz yesεan leqdar</em>

 <em>A d-rnuγ yemma-s d tasedda mi d-tγewwar</em>

 <em>A d-rnuγ tislit d lqed n tezdayt n ttmar</em>

 <em>Lḥenni ad-yuγal ar lmetred a t-yeqqen lbaz γef lecfar</em>

 <em>Γur-m tiγratin a lmesk n lεembarr.</em>

 Lant tudrin anda d amγar-nni n udrum i s-yeqnen lḥenni i yesli ara t-yezzenzen. Llant tudrin nniḍen anda sin imedyazen ad ttemxaṣamen s isefra (amεezbar), win iγelben wayeḍ ad yawi timellalin. Melmi yekfa lḥenni urar yettkemmil alamma qrib ad yali wass. Azekka-nni d ass wis sin n tmeγra. A d-teddu teslit s axxam-is. Taṣebḥit n wass, a d-tekker teslit, ad-truḥ d temγart tameqrant n udrum γer tala taneṣlit, a d-tagem aman swayes ara tessired, melmi d-uγalent si tala, tamγart a s-teqqen lḥenni i teslit, syen ad teccucef. Imawlan n yesli a d-swejden imdanen ara yeddun a d-awin tislit, ayen iwumi qqaren iqeffafen. Syen ad sarğen asardun naγ aεudiw, a s-rren lḥaf n leḥrir akk d uceṭṭiḍ n rqem akken a d-awin fell-as tislit. Yiwen ger imawlan n yesli ad yezwir γer zdat ad yezzuγar aεudiw, ma d taqefaft ad tetbaε sdeffir ad ruḥen srid s axxam n teslit. Melmi i wḍen iqeffafen s-axxam n teslit, yiwet ger tlawin s-yettilin i yesli, ad truḥ γer teslit ad tt-tẓer, yerna ad tt-εiwen deg ucberber n teslit . A s-selsent tajellabt d tkessiwt, a s-begsent agus n leḥrir, a s-qnent timeḥremt . Uqbel acbarbar, tislit tesaxdam kra isufar ilmend n cbaḥa-s. Ad terr agusim i yimi-s akk d lğuz akken ad icbiḥent tuγmas-is, ad tkeḥḥel i wallen-is s taẓult. Syen ad teqqen imecluxen akk d imeqyasen n lfeṭṭa deg yifassen, ixelxalen deg iḍaren, trennu ibrac d tefzimt γef yedmaren, tettεelliq γef tamgarṭ-is tazlagt akk d taqlaṭ, trennu timengucin i imeẓẓuγen-is, d taεeṣṣabt i twenza-s. Syen d acbarbar. Ad sburent aḥayek neγ timleḥḥeft γef yiri-s, ad γument udem-is s tmeḥremt, ad rren sufella uqaru-s tabniqt neγ akerzi. Akarzi-yagi d aggus n leḥrir ara s-rsent sufella uqerru n teslit. Llant teslatin yettlusun abernus ttγument-d aqerru-nsent s uqelmun. Tislit tewjed ad teddu, maca uqbel a d-teffeγ seg uxxam imawlan-is, a s-refdent acbarbar i wakken a s-yessew baba-s aman s wurawen-is, i wakken ad treṣṣi deg wulawen imawlan-is i lebda. Γas ad tbeddel axxam sser-is d wazal-is ad yegri ar itwacult-is, mi ara s-issew baba-s aman, tilawin ad cennunt:: 

  Ssew-as a baba-s aman 

  Tislit ad truḥ di laman  

  Ass-a ad tbeddel axxam 

 Yemma-s n teslit ad tessuter deg yiwet ger tlawin tt-iqerben, tin i d wi tesεa laman, akken ad tessureg neγ ad truc s waman lebḥar ar iḍarren n teslit imi ara teffeγ de uxxam. Llant anda i ttruẓunt ula d abuqal nni ufexxar swayes tettrucu, qqaren d akken aman n lebḥar sefsayen neγ yal taγawsa n diri, ama d aḥeckul ama d iεekkir.

 Melmi teffeγ teslit deg uxxam n baba-s, ad tt-salin sufella uεudiw, ad yerkeb γur-s win tt-iqerben ama d εemmi-s ama d xali-s, ad taγ abrid srid s axxam n wargaz-is. Ma yella γef uḍar i tedda a s-ṭṭfen afus wid s-yettilin ama d gma-s, weltma-s, xali-s, εemmi-s..atg. Taqeffaft a tt-teḍfar deffir, s ccna, ttegnas azal d ameqran, tibuγarin ad-ttawint isefra ad qarent : « A tislit, akem-yeg Rebbi d-tasaεdit », ubayen tislit attili d-tamarbuḥt, attawi saεd itwenza. Ma yella dirgazen lan wid yettawin ibeckiḍen, sufuγen iεbaren n lbarud, tilawin niḍen ad sγiritent.

 Mi teweḍ teslit s-axxam, tamγart-is a tt-id-magar γer umnar n tewwurt s uγarbal akk d ubuqal n waman. Tamγart ad tesmir γer wurawen n teslit aman a d-truc yis-sen γer deffir 3 n tikkal., syen γer-s, tamγart a d-tefk i tislit aγerbal ideg llan yirden d temẓin, ibawen, timellalin, tiẓidanin yecban ttmer d leḥlawat. 

 Qqaren zik irden akken ad tesεun irgazen, timẓin akken ad tesεun tiḥdayin, ibawen akken a tt-teğğuğeg tudert-nsen, timlalin tuftiyin akken ad umlulen wussan-nsen yerna ad tefti teslit, ma d laḥlawa aken attiẓid tudert-nsen. Dina tislit a tt-tger ifassen-is daxel uγarbal, a d-tεemmer akkemic s wurawen-is, a d-tḍegger ayen i d-yeddan deg ifassen-is γer deffir. Llant kra laεwayed nniḍen i tudrin leqbayel anda tislit uqbel anekcum-is γer uxxam ad terẓ tamellalt γer lḥiḍ neγ ar yiri n tewwurt d wamek ara tekcem. Anekcum ad yili s uḍar ayeffus ara yezwiren, ma d tilawin i d-yeddan d teslit xarṣum tid s-yettilin ad kecment yid-s γer texxamt. Mgaradent laεwayed i temnaḍt γer tayeḍ, yella anda tislit melmi tekcem s axxam tettbedil lbus sebεa n tikkal. Yal tikkelt mi ara tbeddel ad teffeγ a tt-walin yemdanen yellan ttrajun-tt s ccuq. Yella anda tislit ur tettekes ara lbus alamma yeγli-d yiḍ, yiwen ur yezmir ad tt-iwali uqbel argaz-is, ala tilawin tid tt-iεawnen mi tekkes acbarbar. Tuksa n ucbarbar tettili-d s ccna, tilawin ad ttawint izlan ad qqarent:

  Siγemt taftilt 

  A d-tefk tafat 

  Ad tezremt taqcict  

   I d-rebbant lxalat 

 Dγa mi d-yeγli yiḍ, inebgawen akk d imawlan n teslit ad ččen imensi. Syen yal yiwen ad yuγal s axxam-is. Yella wanda tameγra tferru s wurar. Llant tudrin anda tislit azekka-nni a d-teṣbeḥ. A d-ters takessiwt tamaynut, a tessexdem kra isufar i cbaḥa-s, ad teqqen lfeṭṭa, ad tεelleq sxab γef umegreḍ-is, ad teqqim di tesga n uxxam, amγar-is a s-yebges agus n leḥrir γef wammas-is, syen a s-yegzem tamzurt d wamek ara tels amendil γef uqerru-s. Tamzurt-nni i d-yegzem, a tt-sersen γer wejgu alemmas n uxxam, akken ad tuγal d tigejdit n uxxam. Imawlan n teslit akk d wid s-yettilin a s-fken adrim nettat ad tettanez γef iqerra-nsen. Syen tislit ad truḥ γer tala taneṣlit n taddart akken a d-tagem. Ad tawi yid-s abuqal a t-id-teččar, a tt-ḍefren yemdanen, tibuγarin ad cennunt ad qqarent:

  Tislit tugem-d di tala 

  Tewwi-d agazu yewwa 

  A t-tefk i win i s-yahwa 

  Tislit tugem-d tiεwinin 

  Tewwi-d agazu n tẓurin 

  A t- tefreq i tnuḍin 

 Mi d-tuγal s axxam ad teqqim deg ufrag, iḍebbalen ad tezzin γef teslit 7 n tikkal yerna ad kkaten. Ma d tibuγarin ad cennunt fell-as εarus ad qqarent:

  Aεarus a bu jaγlal 

  Tifi-k lala-k s uxelxal 

  Aεarus a bu sḥirqus  

  Tif-ik lala-k s ubarnus 

  Aεarus abu ljebba 

  Tifi-k lala-k s lfuḍa 

 Asmi ara εeddin sebεa wussan, imawlan n tmeγra ttgen imekli ṣṣbaḥ. Ad necden adrum d wid i ten-iqerben akk d imawlan n teslit a d-asen ad ččen, dγa tislit ad teqdec ass-n fell-asen, ad tili tesεa amḍid di twacult-is tamaynut.

<p style="text-align: right;">Islam Bessaci

  
 Tanmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tsebɣes akk inelmaden-is n kraḍ n yiswiren n ulmad, i d-yufraren deg yikayaden n taggara n useggas (5eme, BEM, BAC). Tella-d tmeɣra n tukci n warrzen i yinelmaden-agi ass-nni n letnayen iɛeddan 31yulyu 2017, deg uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine n Tizi Uzzu. Tɛedda tmeɣra-agi deg tegnatin n tumert d unecreḥ, ḥedren dina inelmaden d yimawlan-nsen akked twacult n usegmi s umata. Fkan azal n 161 n warrazen i lfayda n yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg yikayaden-agi i d-nebder yakkan. Ad d-nezwir deg uswir amenzu n ulmad, fkan arrazen i 37 n yinelmaden iḥercen aṭas. D Ait Amar Léiticia, Saïghi Sofia akked Hammoudi Lydia I d-yufraren deg umḍiq amenzu n umyezwar n yinelmaden deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, imi i tlata deg-sen sɛant tazmilt n 10/10 deg ukayad n 5eme. Am wakken daɣen i mudden 6 warrazen seta n yiɣerbazen yeṭṭfen taqacuct, wigi d : aɣerbaz Dahmane, atmaten Berkani, Hamouténe Ali akked Oukasi Boualem, Mehlal Saïd n Azazga, Abane Remdane n Yiwaḍiyen. Melba ma nettu 28 n yinelmaden-nni-nniḍen i d-yufraren. Am wakken diɣen i mudden 56 n warrazen yinelmaden ifazzen deg leqraya-nsen. Ma d amḍiq amezwaru deg uswir-a yuɣal i tnelmadt Djaouti Lydia, yeqqaren deg uɣerbaz alemmas Hadjeb Mohammed Iloula, s tneqiṭ n 18,72. Ma amḍiq wis sin tḥara-t-id tnelmadt Nacer Lyna, yeqqaren deg uɣerbaz alemmas Loutfi n Tizi Uzzu, s tenqiṭ n 18,72 ula d nettat. Ma d inelmaden i yewwin ugar n 18 wwḍen 15 n yinelmaden. Ma deg wayen yeεnan amyezwar n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen: d aɣerbaz alemmas Nacaf Mohammed Akarou deg Afezzoun i yewwin amkan amezwaru. Syin deg umḍiq wis sin uɣerbaz alemmas uzzig “Tafsut”, syin akkin d aɣerbaz n umeɣras Ahmed Youcef n Mecṭras deg Buɣni. Syin deg umḍiq wis rebɛa d aɣerbaz uzzig “ijeǧǧigen n tefsut”, syin akkin d aɣerbaz n umeɣras Yahi n Tala Tgana n Azazga, d amḍiq wis seddis yeṭṭef-it uɣerbaz uzzig Chérifi Ali n Azazga. Am wakken diɣen i fkan arrazen i yinelmaden-nniḍen yesɛan tanzmilt yufraren.

 Tura ad nuɣal ɣer ukayad n taggara n ulmad deg tesnawit (BAC), ideg feqen ugar n 30 n warrazen i yinelmaden. Deg umyezwar n yinelmaden, amḍiq amenzu, yuɣal i tnelmadt Boustoua Nesrine, yeqqaren deg tesnawit n Stambouli Rabah n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, s tneqiṭ n 18, 86/20. Ma d amḍiq wis sin tḥara-t-id tnelmadt Tinhinane Chafaï, yeqqaren deg tesnawit Mohamed Said Diouanin n Makouda, s tenqiṭ n 18, 69/20. Amḍiq wis kraḍ n umyezwar teṭṭef-it temddakkelt-is Lilya Sab yeqqaren yid-s deg tesnawit-agi n Makouda, tewwi-d akayad-agi s 18,67/20. Tullas-agi i tlata yid-sent qqaren-t deg teska n tussna (scientifique). Ma d inelmaden i yewwin ugar n 18/20 wwḍen 13 n yinelmaden, ma d uṭṭun n wid i d-yewwin ugar n 17/20 leḥqen 68. Ma deg wayen yeεnan amyezwar n tesnawiyin: d tasnawit n Mohamed Said Diouani n Makouda i yewwin amkan amezwaru, ma d amḍiq wis sin tewwi-t tesnawit n Beni Zmenzer yellan deg Beni Douala, ma d tasnawit Ladlani Amar n Maâtkas tḥela-d amḍiq wis kraḍ. Tasnawit Khoass Ahcene n Lrebɛa NatYiraten teṭṭef amkan wis rebɛa deg umyezwar, ma d Ouerzzedine Achour n Tizi Γennif, ma d amḍiq wis seta yuɣal i tesnawit n Omar Toumi n Tegzirt.

  Adaoun Abdel Ghani 

  
 Teḍra-d yiwet n tedyant ass n sebt 17-06-2017 di temdint n Bab Zuwwar (di tmanaɣt) imi d-yessuzar yiwen n yilemẓi tawlaft i d-yexdem i yiwen ugrud i yesɛan aseggas d nebs deg leɛmer-is ɣef ṭṭaq n uxxam akken ad t-id-yessers di Facebook . Iswi-is d cciɛa ara yexdem gar yisebtar n Facebook , ur iɛeṭṭel ara lexbar, yekka-d akk isebtar . Tekkar teḥbabart deg-sen , ttemxalafen leryuy gar yimdanen ɣef wayen yexdem ilemẓi-a i ugrud-nni, imi yella deg wunnag (étage) wis 12, syin isuffeɣ-it-id seg balku akken ad yeṭṭef tawlaft swayes ara yesɛu cciɛa , d ayen i yeǧǧan ama d imdanen ama d tidukliwin yettḥaraben ɣef yizerfan n yigerdan, ad d-beggnen lɣiḍ-nsen mgal tadyant-a , imi ilemẓi, yella yetturar s tudart n ugrud aneggaru-a ɛla ḥsab n wayen i d-yenna d : mmi-s n xalt-is. Lexbar yewweḍ ɣer wid teɛna temsalt . Ilemẓi yettwaṭṭef. Mi yewweḍ ɣer uxxam n craɛ, yenkar ayen i yexdem , yenna-d belli ur yessufeɣ ara agrud-nni seg balku, meɛna tawlaft yeṭṭef-it-id sdaxel. Maca tugna teqqar-d ayen-nniḍen ɛla ḥsab n isenselkimen (les informaticiens). Iɛedda sdat n uxxam n craɛ n Dar El Biḍa akken ad yeffaɣ leqrar d akken ad yettwaḥkem fell-as s sin yiseggasen n lḥebs.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Deg ussan-agi i d-yeffeɣ wungal amaynut n tmarut d tneggalt Lynda Koudache iwumi tefka azwel “Tamacahut taneggarut ”. Yeffeɣ-d wungal-a ɣer tezrigin Routnahcom.
