<p style="text-align: right;"> A. A. 

  
 Imezdaɣ n tɣiwant ɛin leḥǧar id- yezgan deg umalu lwilaya n tubiret ɣelqen ass larebɛa yezrin abrid yettawin ɣer tamanaɣt lwilaya n tubiret sebba lkiran yettawin ɣer tama-agi acku rran di ssuma n usiweḍ anda tewweḍ ɣer 30 idinaren imi ayagi yella s ssuma n 20 rran 10 idinaren , ayagi ttwalint imezdaɣ d lbaṭṭel dayen iten- yeǧǧan ad xeddmen timesbaniyin s uɣlaq n ubrid anda ur ǧǧin ara imawlan n lkiran-agi ad 3eddin imi ur qbillen ara anerni n ssuma-agi meḥsub d tikurḍa si leǧyub iẓawaliyen ɣef waya sbegnen-d lɣid nsen am wakken welhen imḍebren n tnemhalt usiweḍ di lwilaya n tubiret akken ad d-rren tamuɣli nsen imi d nutni d iɛeggalen imezwura i teɛna temsalt ɣef wannect-a ttwalin akken fɣen i lqanun imi rnan aṭas xersum lukan 5 idinaren d annect-agi uggin ad truhun s ssuma -agi ur iqebbel ara leɛqel . 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Timesbaniyin ɣef tnezduɣin n rrif  

 Umbaɛd mi d -yesbeggen uselway n tɣiwant leqsar ussan-agi iɛeddan s lejrida n tnezduɣin i yemdanen i d-yesfayden s tnezduɣin ur tɛedda ara di tegnatin igerrzen imi teglad s lɣid meqqren s -ɣur wid ur yesfayden ara s tnezduɣin anda i d-llan aṭas n tmesbaniyin anda wḍen imesbaniyin ami ɣelqen taɣiwant acku nnan-d akken lejrida-agi llan yemdanen ur uklalen ara s tenzuɣin axaṭar ttwalin akken d nutni i yezwaren ilaq ad awwin imi ur sɛin ara yerra yal amdan tezziy- as twacult meqqren, Si tama nniḍen aɣbel-agi mazal-it yettnerni d acu kan ddurt-a tuɣaled ɣef tnezduɣin n rrif imi d aɣbel wayeḍ id-yenulfan di leqsar anda imdanen iwumi ur d-saḥ ara tnezduɣt n rrif ɣelqen ula d nutni taɣiwant ass n tlata iɛeddan ur ǧǧin ara ixeddamen ad kecmen s axeddim nsen sebba lejrida imi ttwalin tt akken d tawaɣit , acku acḥal d iseggasen -aya mazal werɛad wwin imi llan yemdanen yessutren tinezduɣin seg iseggasen n 2003-2004 ar ass-a d wussan ttrajun tanezduɣt ma yella d wid yessutren deg iseggasen -agi kan ineggura sfayden ɣef waya imdanen-a teɣlid lwehma fell-asen ɣef uɣbel-a i mazal yeṭṭafar -iten ar ass-a , d wagi i yeǧǧan imdanen-a ad ɣelqen taɣiwant anda ssuturen seg yimḍebren n tɣiwant ad ɛawden tamuɣli ɣef lejrida-agi , am wakken id -yella daɣen uɣlaq n tɣiwant n at menṣur deg usammar lwilaya n tubiret s-ɣur waṭas twaculin sebba uɣbel-agi n tnezduɣin i mazal yettnerni di yal tamnadt di tubiret anda xeddmen timesbaniyin ttuɣun zdat tɣiwant ɣef lejrida azal n 30 tnezduɣin id -sbegnen usqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant imi steqsayen amek ttwaferqent tnezduɣin-a acku ur d-yelli ara ufraq-agi akken iwata , ɣef waya ssuturen si lwali lwilaya ad tuɣal tmuɣli ɣur-s ɣef lejrida-a imi ttwalin-tt akken ur tuklal ara wiggi yesfayden acku llan wid yettidiren deg yixxamen lmizirya d ixerban bɣan ad aɣlin ur sfayden ara . 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Taddart n Semmac tenḥaf  

 Ttidirent twaculin di temnadt n semmac i yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Ɛjiba i d-yussan deg usammar lwilaya n tubiret di tegnatin qerriḥen anda ɣaben wallalen n tudert i yeǧǧan imezdaɣ n semmac ssaramen s yiṣenfaren unegmu acḥal -ayagi , am wakken ɣabent wallen imḍebren ɣer taddart-agi imi ur rrin ara lwelha nsen ɣer yimezdaɣ-a d acu kan ttuɣalen ɣer tama-agi ḥaca di tefraniyin n tɣiwant i rezun ɣer dina , yerra taddart n semmac tettwasen s waṭas imezdaɣ ma yella d iɣublan iten -izedɣen gar-asen liḥala n yiberdan reglen ttwaɣen ansi id-kkid yergel ubrid ladɣa mi ara d-yewwet ugeffur iberdan ad uɣallen akk d iḥemmalen n waman akk-d ixujḍan d yedɣaɣen imi ur tezmired ara akk ad d-ɛeddid seg-sen acku iberdan-a ur sen-ɛiwden ara akk , d acu kan iɣublan-agi ur ḥbisen ara kan dda imi yella uɣbel nniḍen d win iten-icuɣben s waṭas waggi d lexsas n waman ur d-yettasen ara yal ass yerna d asafar agejdan iseqdacen s tuget ɣef waya ttrajun asiweḍ uṣenfar waman seg ubarraǧ n tilesdit acku yeqreb ɣer taddart nsen am wakken četkayen daɣen ɣef trisiti iberdan imi d yiwen uṣenfar id -sfaydent akk temnaḍin iten-iqerben ḥaca tamnadt n semmac dayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ steqsayen d acu sebba n wannect-a , Ma yella d tikubaniyin ixusen di tama-a am yawen icudden ɣer tzeqqa n tujya ɣas akka tella ameɛna amzun ulac i tt – imi xussen deg aṭas n wallalen iwilmen i umuḍin yerna sɛan ala yiwen umeǧǧay amatu id -yettasen tikelt neɣ snat tikwal di ddurt ayagi sḥisfen aṭas tiwaculin n taddart-a ɣef waya yesefk ɣef yimezdaɣ ad rzun ɣer mceddallah d ɛjiba iwakken ad awwin imuḍan , Si tama nniḍen ula d ilmeẓyen ttafend iman nsen ttidiren deg yiwen weɣbel d ameqqran acku ur sɛin ara tizeɣwa n waddal yemgaraden am wayen yeɛnan annar n dabax ladɣa deg ussan usteɛfu imuras s umata ulac d acu ara xeddmen Rnu ɣur wugguren id -yesmagaren arrac lakul d likiran yettawin ɣer uɣerbaz imi sɛan ḥaca yiwen l kar ameɛna inelmaden llan aṭas di taddart d annect-agi i yeǧǧan imawlan n yinelmaden ssuturen seg uselway n tɣiwant ad asen – yerru yiwen lkar nniḍen , am wakken ttuɣun imezdaɣ i yemḍebren s tikci iṣenfaren unegum i lfayda n twaculin-agi yenḥafen acḥal iseggasen aya d araju melmi ara tifsis teɛkumt fell-asen ad frun iɣublan iten-ixenqen . 

<p style="text-align: center;">  Lgaz n temddint ttrajun-t Yilyiten 

 Ttrajun imezdaɣ n taddart ilyiten i yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n saḥariǧ di lwilaya n tubiret aṣenfar n lgaz n temdint am tcemaɛt umbaɛd mi yewweḍ usafar-agi ɣer tudrin itent-iqerben meḥsub tuget n temnaḍin di tɣiwant-a sfayden akk imezdaɣ nsen s lgaz n temdint , dayen yeǧǧan tiwaculin n tama-agi ssarament ula d nutni melmi ara d-yawwed imi acḥal d leɛwam iɛeddan mazal ttrajun ad yifsis leɛtab n teqraɛtin lgaz i asen-yeserwan lmeḥna anda ara afen tiqraɛtin lgaz am wakken tettwasen taddart-agi s yidurar ɛlayen d ugeffur qessiḥen di temnadt-a deg ussan n tegrest acku ciṭ udfel kan iberdan akk ɣelqen yerra d asemmiḍ mliḥ ɣef waya ttafen-d iman nsen di lexsas n wallalen useḥmu axaṭar tuget deg-sen seqdacen tiqraɛtin lgaz dayen id-igellun s wuguren di lexsas usafar-agi anda ara tafen , Rnu s uguren id-ttmagaren aṭas deg unadi nsen ttruḥun ami d timnaḍin nniḍen akken ma d-afen neɣ ala meḥsub si leɛtab ɣer wayed acku icuɣbiten s waṭas di tmeddurt nsen d aɣbel-agi i yeǧǧan imezdaɣ n taddart ad ggren tiɣri i yimḍebren teɛna temsalt akken ad d-afen tifrat s lɛejlan i wugur-a s uṣiwed uṣenfar-a i ttrajun acḥal-ayagi xersum ad yeffeɣ leɛtab nsen ɣer tafat . <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Abdelhak Menas 

  
 Ilmend n wass aγelnaw n unaẓur i d-yettilin yal assegas ass n 8 yunyu, yal tamnaḍt n tmurt n Lezzayer sewjaden-d timeγriwin yemxalafen, d tajmilt i unaẓur. Di tegnit am tagi yessulef fell-aɣ ad d-nebder anaẓur xersum s tewzel n wawal, acku akken nebɣu newwi-d awal fell-as, ur nezmir ara ad d-nezzi akk ɣef wayen yexdem. Taẓuri d lebḥer lqayen, d lebḥer wessiεen, ur yezmir yiwen ad t-yelḥeq akken yebɣa. Ihi taẓuri d tafat n wallaɣ, d iṭij n wass, d tiziri n yiḍ, d tilelli n umdan. Taẓuri tessakay amdan yellan yeɣfel, tettak tisura swayes ara ldint tiwwura n unekcum s ulawen anda teẓẓun tayri. Taẓuri ur tesεi ara tilisa, tessenguga idurar, tzegger lebḥur, tettcerrig igenwan, ur tettağğa amḍiq, yal tiɣmert di ddunit tewweḍ-itt.Anaẓur yessen d acu i d azal n tẓuri, yeẓra d acu i ilaqen ad t-yernu i tussna n tẓuri ara iɣellten wid yessaramen ad ifriren gar leğnas. Anaẓur yettḥussu, d anafray, ismendag allaɣ-is, iẓemmi-t akken ad iniwel taẓuri swayes yezmer ad d-icekti, ad yessufeɣ afrayen-is, syin ad yezreε tamussni-s d tẓuri-s.Taẓuri d tilleli, ur tcudd ara ɣer yiwen n umḍiq, tleḥḥu, tessuruf tilisa, trezzef si wa ɣer wa, ur tkeffu ara deg-s lɣella, ur tesεi ara taggara. Dima yettlalay-d umaynut ɣef umaynut. Maca i tmurt-nneγ izerfan n unaẓur ulac-iten, sserwaten, ttεebin wiyaḍ. Teḍra yid-sen am tcemmaεt, treqq tettfaka, tettak tafat i wiyaḍ. Ihi anaẓur yuklal ayen yugaren tajmilt-agi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Di cetwa, mi tezdi lehwa, neɣ isenna-tt udeffel, ulac d acu yifen iɣimi tama n lkanun, anda tṛeqq tqejmurt, akken ad qden-t tjujar. Di tallit-agi, asemmiḍ iseɣlay-ed axlul, isdubbuz iḍudan, tifednin ma dagella aman ufan-d abrid ɣer werkas. Imezzuɣen ma yella ur yuɣal ara fell-asen uqelmun ad uɣalen d izeggaɣen am ṭumaṭic. Leḥnak, ula d nutni, ur ten-yezgil wara. Di tallit-agi n tegrest, ulac d acu yecban aseḥmu ɣer lkanun. Lḥamu d-yettekken seg-s tettɛedday aglim, tettawaḍ ɣer yiɣes. Lkanun iseḥmuy tafekka lak d wulawen. D amekkan d-isejmaɛen yak iɛeggalen n twacult and isqerdicen iɣeblan-nsen, ayen ten-iceɣben, d wayen temsal nniḍen icudden ɣer tudert-nsen n yal ass. Taqejmurt tettruɣ deg lkanun, irrij iceɛɛel deg-s. Iɛeggalen s d-yezzin am umeqyas, leḥnak zerɛen-ten idammen. Allen berqen-t-ed sebba n dexxan, maca imɣaren qaren-d d akken d ayen isen-t-yelhan  acku d tagnitt akken ad d-iriden-t.   Lehwa tsers ixef-is di berra, abruru alama s tenniḍ ad d-yeflu sqef. Maca ulac tugdi, acku imdanen yak heggan-d ttawilat ilaqen akken ur ten-yettxaṣṣa wacemma. Ikufan čuren d tuččit, ayen ara ten-isefɣen alam d tafsewt m ijeǧǧigen. Aheggi ibeddu di tagara n unebdu. Deg tama n lḥara ttrusen-t tqejmurin lak d tqucḍin n yesɣaren d tid n wezzu  akken ur ten-id-ittqerrib ara usemmiḍ. Mi yekfa imensi, ad d-yaweḍ lawan n tmucuha, timseɛaq lak d temseḍsay. Tagnitt itteksen ɣef wulawen. Taḍsa d unnecreḥ uqbel ad refden iman-nsen akken ad sersen amezzuɣ ɣef tsumta. Iberra ageffur yettseryix d leḥmali, lqermud yettarra-d ṣewt-is. Ayen d-yesrusuyen iḍes deg tkanna mbaɛid ɣef uqedduḥ n yirrij.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Fatiha K. 

  
 Am wakken yella lḥal deg tudrin n tmurt n yizwawen s umata, timecreḍt d yiwen n wansay (lɛada) amaziɣ i yellan seg umezruy aqdim, mazal-it ar tura. Deg-s lmeɛna n tudert d tdukkli gar lɣaci, akken ad ṭṭixren seg tikkelt i tayeḍ i kra n tlufa tirqaqin, ad zdin kra n lewqat n lferḥ d talwit. Dɣa, ahad-a (ttlata) kan iɛeddan, yezzi-d useggas ɣef zzerd i yemmuggen ilindi deg taddart n Ayt Tɛisiwt d Tecruft, taɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel. Kkren ihi yimezdaɣ ulsen-as-d i lewziɛa-nniḍen deg lǧamaɛ n Tizi n Lwali akked lǧamaɛ n Ucruf seg tsebḥit-a. I lmend n waya, ttwaheggan-d kra n yizgaren i tmezli akken ad d-iqid uksum i wat tamnaḍt merra. Maca, ilaq ad d-nini belli ssuma n tunet, am yal tikkelt, aṭas i tt-iwalan bezzaf teɣlay ɣef texriḍt-nsen imi i tt-ssalin wid i d-yelhan d leqdic ɣer 2100 n yidinaren i yiwet. Almi dɣa ttuḥettment kra n twaculin ad d-aɣent azgen n tunet. Meḥsub ufant win ukud ara d-cerkent yiwet. Aya, ɣef leḥsab n yimezdaɣ. Yekka-d segmi drus n medden i iɛudden, wamma tili terxes cwiṭ tunet. «Teɣlay d tidet tunet n uksum aseggas-a. Maca nenwa ad d-naɣ seg zzerd akken ad nesɛu amur-nneɣ dinna». I aɣ-d-tenna yiwet n tmeṭṭut, imi aṭas i yettwalin lfal deg tlufa-a. Ayen yessefraḥen, ahat aṭas, seg zzerdat-a i mazal sekfalent-d tudrin, dakken kra n win i ixussen seg tama n temɛict, ur yezmir ad ixelles tunet-is, d agujil d amuḍin neɣ d aẓawali, yettsiḥi-as-d umur-is am netta am wiyaḍ. Seg waya ara d-nefhem iswi amezwaru alsan n wansay-a aqbur. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Iḍelli uliɣ ɣe taddart, ufiɣ yiwen wemɣar di tejmaɛt yettmeslay d yilmeẓyen, yeqqar-asen :

 – Bɣiɣ ad iyi-t-inim ma tella lehna neɣ ulac-itt di ddunit ? Wa yenna-as tella, wa yenna-as ulac. Taggara yeḥka-asen-d tamɛayt. «Yiwwas at lǧennet xaqen, bɣan ad walin at ǧahennama amek i teḍra yid-sen. At ǧahennama cedhan at lǧennet, mlalen, msefhamen i wakken ad xedmen tiqenṭert gar-asen, ad yili wamek ara qesren, ad belen isallen gar-asen. At ǧahennama bnan-d azgen n tqenṭert, ma d at lǧennet ur d bnin ara azgen-nsen, acku ur sɛin ara ibennayen ( imaṣwaten ).Nniɣ-as : «ula d nekk ad ruḥeɣ ad nadiɣ, ad steqsiɣ widen yessnen ad iyi-mmlen ma tella lehna neɣ ala ? Bdiɣ steqseɣ di tmurt n Lzzayer, mmugreɣ-d Mḥend deg ubrid ɣef lewhi n wazgen n wass, bezgent wallen-is, iban imir id yekker. Send ad t-steqsiɣ, yenna-iyi-d : -D acu n ddunit-a, aman ulac, axeddim ulac, asirem ulac. S kra n win steqseɣ, ala uguren id yettmagar. Nniɣ-as ad subbeɣ ɣer tmurt n Muriṭani, ahat ad afeɣ dinna lehna ? Imi wwḍeɣ ɣer tmannaɣt-is, ufiɣ imdanen reglen sya u sya, sliɣ i rrsas yedeqdiq, iserdasen ččuren iberdan. Nniɣ-asen : «d acu i yeḍran akka ?». Nnan-iyi-d : «tarewla temneɛ bab-is!». Ziɣ-nni d «coup d’état» i yeḍran.Rewleɣ ɣer tmurt n Nijer, ufiɣ imdanen ttrun ttirni. Nniɣ-asen : -D acu i ken-yuɣen ? -Nelluẓ, ur yelli wacu ara nečč. Neffud, ur telli tiqit n waman ad tt-nessew. Aman ulac, imɣan qquren, isekla bedden am lexyalat. Lqaɛa tekkaw. Igerdan ttsuɣun ttrun, idmaren n tyemmatin-nsen kumcen, deg yiffan-nsent ur d neggi tiqit n uyefki. Kra n yemdanen akked lmal-nsen mmuten, ur ufan wien ara ten-imeḍlen, fell-asen tezzin yizan, ččan-ten igerfiwen d igudar. Ma d nekni swigi d yeqqimen ddren, yal wa yettraǧu tasaɛet-is ad d-ass, aqleɣ ala aglim ɣef yeɣsan. bDeg yiḍ-nni tugi ad tt-qqmec tiṭ-iw, urgeɣ yir targit, am wakken uɣaleɣ d tafunast, teẓẓegeɣ-d idammen… Frewseɣ-d si yir targit-nni, beggseɣ nniɣ-as : «Ad inigeɣ ɣer tmurt niḍen». Ssbeḥ zik, unageɣ ɣer tmurt n Legniz. Nwiɣ dinna kan ara afeɣ lehna ? Bḍeɣ ɣer tmannaɣt-is dɣa, xedmen-iyi «l’intérrogatoire» n 24 n tsaɛtin, ṭṭfen-iyi «en detention preventive» n 48 n tsaɛtin. Nniɣ-asen : «ayen akka ?» Nnan-d : «acku kečč d Azdayri» Imi id iyi-d-serḥen «en liberté surveillée», imi ɣriɣ iɣmisen, gziɣ d acu i yeḍran. «Les frères vigilants» akken i asen-yeqqar Taher ǦAƐUṬ, ɣeẓẓen ula d ifassen i asen-yeslufuyen. Isallen imaynten qqaren-d : «aselway n tmurt n Marikan, Buc, ad yexdem tugdut di tmurt n Lɛiraq. Ihi anda tella tugdut tella lehna.» Srafgeɣ srid ɣer tmurt n Lɛiraq, di tmannaɣt-is ufiɣ ixammen ɣlin, iberdan regglen, imdanen sselqafen, idammen ttazzalen am iḥemmalen n waman. Rewleɣ ɣer «le parlement» n Iɛiraqiyen, nwiɣ a ten-afeɣ ttmeslayen ɣef tugdut akked lehna. Wahmeɣ imi ten-ufiɣ ttnaɣen ɣef Cciṭan. Yekker-d yiwen u «député», yenna-asen : -Ad yexzu Rebbi Cciṭan… ? Yekker-d u «député» nniḍen igezm-as awal, yenna-asen : -Nekni ɣer-neɣ ur nekrih ara Cciṭan, ur yelli d aɛdaw-nneɣ, nḥesb-it d agellid n lmalayekat. Yekker ccwal wa yekkat wa yettwat, wa yekkat s ukersi wa yessḥillif s ufus. Rewleɣ-d s-yinna : -Dagi meqqar s ikersiyen i ttnaɣen, mačči s rrsas. Iwala-yi-d yiwen yenna-yi-d : -Akk iniɣ, ruḥ ad tt-ruḥeḍ neɣ ma ulac akk ṭṭfen «en otage», zemren akk nɣen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Busad ¨Hemmar 

  
 Ayen d-teǧgâ tesnilest  tafrabnsist,  tasertit n wesɛurreb n uɣerbaz azzayri, aɣanzu n tmaziɣt, uqbel akked sen 1962,  akked d kra n timsal nniḍen  i yeǧgân anexluḍ n tutlayin (le code switching) yuɣ amkan ɣer widen yettmeslayen snat n tutlayin. Ass-a n wussan, mara tesleḍ i rradyu neɣ ad tnezheḍ i tilibizyu neɣ daɣen ad tḥeḍred iwelbaɛḍ n temliliyin ad ak-d-iban unexluḍ n tutlayin yewwi amur-is, ɣas ina-s ḥala anexluḍ-nni i yessawaḍen tiktiyin di lihalat-nni.

 Tazwert-a temmal-d acimi d wamek d-yella unexluḍ n tutlayin di Tmurt n leqbayel.

 Dɣa ibeggen-d umaru lihala tasnilesmattit (situation sociolinguistique) di tmurt n  leqbayel. Sakin deg uḥric nniḍen , aḥric n tatiknit (partie technique), yelha-d umaru s tesleḍt talɣasnayt (analyse morphosyntaxique). 

  Amaru: 

 Ilul-d Farid Benlokhtar di Tizi n Lenneɛ, taɣiwant Amalou, di Bgayet.Ɣur-s Master II di tesnilest (linguistique). Seg 1995 netta yesselmad tutlayt taqbaylit. Ass-a, yettheyyi-d doctorat di EPHE (Ecole Pratique des Hautes Etudes) n Lpari.

<p style="text-align: right;"> S.O.A 

  
 Ass n lǧemɛa yezrin, lewhi n rrebɛa n tmeddit, teḍra-d yiwet n twaɣit deg temdint n Beclul anda yemmut yiwen n urgaz bu 50 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is. Tamettant-a mačči d tin i d-yellan tetturaju imi amdan-a d tamacint yessawaḍen isufar i d-yekkan seg tmanaɣt i t-iḥuzan mi yenwa ad yezger i ubrid. Tiyita I t-iḥuzan d tin ur as-neǧǧi ara tagnit ahat ad yeslek imi yerra tarwiḥt deg umkan. Ɣef leḥsab n wayen i d-nnan wid yellan tama n umkan-a, tamacint tesseqzuzem tafekka. Din din, iɣallen n usellek d wid llaman wwḍen-d s amkan ideg teḍra twaɣit-a, imi imezwura ssawḍen lǧessa teǧǧa terwiḥt ɣer sbiṭer n Tubiret, ma d wiyaḍ ldin yiwen n rrabul n unadi ɣef tmentilt n tmettant-agi. Iwulem kan ad d-nesmekti belli argaz-a d win i d-yeǧǧan tameṭṭut d tlata n dderya, yettwassen deg taddart-is d wanda ixeddem s ṭṭbiɛa lɛali ur yelli d win yuḍnen. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  M.Smail 

 
  
 Tiddukkla n yimuḍan “Hémodialyses” n tɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu, thegga-d ass wis sin n useɛlem d uwllah ɣef waṭṭanen n turin, i d-yellan ass-nni sed 6 seg maggu 2017, deg tzeqqa tameqqrant n uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Meslayen-d deg-s waṭas n yimejjayen uzzigen deg lehlakat n turin, i d-yusan seg ulmis asdawan n tujjya “ssbiṭar” Mohmed Nadir n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Fkan-d ddeqs n yisragen ideg i d-wwin awal ɣef lehlakat-agi, ansi i d-ttkken, d wamek i yellaq ad asen yebɛed umdan, neɣ amek ara ten-ilawi. Fkan-d diɣen aṭas n yiwellihen i yimuḍan n waṭṭanen-agi, am wakken diɣen i d-rran ɣef yisteqsiyen n yimuḍan n lehlakat-agi yettaɣen turin n umdan.

  Taceqquft n umezgun “Tawrnet n tiḥerci” 

 Tiddukkla tadelsant n uxxam n yilmeẓyen n Yakourene, turar-d ass-nni n sed 6 seg maggu 2017, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun deg uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Taceqquft-agi n umezqun i d-uraren 8 n yilmeẓyen, gar-asen Nordine Maouchi i d-yuraren d awadem agejdan deg tceqquct-agi. D aḍris yura urgaz n umezgun azzayri Kateb Yacine s tutlayt n tefransist s uzwel “La poudre d intelligence” i d-yerra ɣer teqbaylit u yexdem-it ɣef usayes Mass Houche Salah, s uzwel “Tawrent n Tiḥerci”, ma d aẓawan n tceqquct-agi iɣenna-tt Mass Tahir Moh.

  Amazigh Ghani 

  
 Taddart n Tigrin tezga-d deg tɣiwant n Buǧlil deg lwilaya n Bgayet. Taddart-agi tesɛa sser, tecbaḥ dayen kan. Yiwen wass, nerzef ɣer din, nesaqsa kra n yimezdaɣ, garasen imɣaren. Aṭaṣ iɣ d ḥkan ɣef umezruy n taddart-agi. Nnan-d belli yella yiwen lemaqam ibɛed azal n 10 ikilumiṭren ɣef taddart-agi, anda yemṭel yiwen n lwali iwumi ssawalen Sidi Mesɛud. Ɣef akken iɣ d ḥkan, lwali-agi « yussa-d seg tama n Aḥnif deg lwilaya n tubirett tura, sin neɣ krad n leqrun aya. Argaz-agi yella d-abudali. Asmi i d yiwweḍ ɣer Tigrin, imezdaɣ ttaken-as učči d wayen yeḥwaǧ. Wagi yella deg lxelwa, iɛebbed illu. Asmi qrib ad yemmet, iweṣṣa imezdaɣ n Tigrin at meṭlen deg yiwen wemkan yessewḥacen aṭaṣ. Asmi yemmut, imezdaɣ xedmen akken isen-d yenna: Meṭlen-t gar sin yissafen, anda yessewḥac. ». Nekni akka, n ruḥ alarmi d lemqam-agi n Sidi Mesɛud, ssuɛfen-aɣ sin n yimezdaɣ n Tigrin alarmi d dinna! Daqes i nedda ass-nni ! D yiwen memkan akken yexla, tella ḥaca taqubett n lwali-agi anda yemṭel. Tayedwa, azimba lakked d yissekilen n uzemmur zzin-d ɣef umkan-agi. Yenna-d yiwen degsen: »Seg asmi it meṭlen dagi, medden uɣalen ttẓurun-t akken ad dɛun. Xedmen zzerdat, ɛɛarḍen-d tuddar, lakked d yiɛissawiyen (Tariqa n lɛissawiya) akken ad ǧedben. Tilawin sewwayen-t din seksu d weksum.Llan kra n yirgazen znuzun din laḥlawat i warrac. Lḥaṣul yiwet n t’meɣra…! » akka id yenna Lbacir yiwen umezdaɣ n Tigrin. Aṭaṣ n t’mucuha id ḥekku-n At Tigrin ɣef lwali-agi, ɣef wumi id qaren belli yesɛa « lmuɛǧizat ». Ɣef akken iɣ d ḥka yiwwet n temɣart qrib yeslemden lqern: »Sidi Mesɛud yesɛa lburhan. Mti qquren-t tiliwa, ulac aman, ulac lahwa, n ttruḥu ɣer lemqam n lwali akken aneḍleb aman d lahwa. Lukan att-ẓẓer-ḍ ur neṭṭixir ara syen alarma tebda lahwa tekkat s lgehd, issafen ttaččaren d-aman! » ɣef akken i ɣ d nna xalti Ǧuher yumnen s lburhan n Sidi Mesɛud. D’da Laxḍer yenna-d si tama-ines: » Zerda taneggarut i nexdem dagi deg taddart n Tigrin deg aseggas n 1993. Asmi i yebda rebrab medden ugaden ad ṣuben ɣer laxla, yuɣ lḥal ičumar g inyan ḥarmen anect-a ɣef medden. Din qessam nsen ! ».Akka ihi lɛada-agi tuɣal teɣli deg t’metti n Tigrin. Ula d yimezdaɣ ur ttgallan ara s yissem n Sidi Mesɛud am zik nni!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax.Y 

  
 Ass-nni n larebɛa iɛeddan i aɣ-yeǧǧa Mass Mohamed Brahim Salhi, mebɛed mi yella yehlek acḥal aya. Yemmut deg sbiter Frantz Fanon n temdint n Blida.

 Yella Mass Salhi d aselmad deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, anda i d-yella d imḍebber amezwaru ɣef Ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ deg yiseggasen-is imezwura, syin yuɣal, diɣ, d imeḍebber deg Tamda. ilul Mohamed Brahim Salhi deg Tizi Uzzu deg useggas n 1952 anda yeɣra almi i iruḥ ɣer Lezzayer tamanaɣ anda i ikemmel amecwar-is n leqraya, deg tesdawit, ɣef tussniwin tisertanin deg yiseggasen n 1970. Syin ikemmel deg Fransa armi i d-yewwi Ductura-ines deg Sorbonne deg useggas n 2004. Mass Salhi, d amnadi u d amaru. Yella, yakan, d amnadi deg Crasc (centre de recherche en anthropologie sociale et culturelle). Yesɛa aṭas n tmussniwin akked tzemmar, ɣef waya, dɣa, i as-d-tessawel Massa Benghebrit, taneɣlaft n leqraya, i wakken ad asen-yefk afus n tallelt i uḥric-agi n ttrebga. Yura aṭas n yimagraden isdawanen akked yidlisen. Nezmer ad d-nader ‘’La tariqa Errahmania, de l’avènement à la resurrection de 1871’’, ‘’Algérie : citoyenneté et identité’’, dɣa, adlis-a aneggaru, yeffeɣ-d ɣer tezrigin Achab deg useggas n 2010, yewwi-d awal deg-s ɣef umussu aɣelnaw sumata, anda i d-yemmeslay s telqayt ɣef umussu adelsan amaziɣ (MCB) n 1980 akked d umussu n Leɛrac. Deg udlis-s, Mass Salhi, inuda s telqayt ɣef wamek yettnerni umussu aɣelnaw, ɣef wacu yettnadi d wacu i t-yeǧǧan ad d-ilal. Yeɛreḍ ad d-yesbin assaɣen d umgarad yellan gar umussa n zik akked umussu i d-yeslalen win n 1980, ladɣa, seg tama-agi n tmagit (l’identité) akked tmetti. Iga tadiwennit d tameqqrant, deg udlis-a, akked wid yellan deg umussu n 1980. Yextar ad d-yawi awal akked Said Khelil d Oussalem Mohand Ouamar i mazal ar tura yesselmad deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu(yesselmed tamaziɣt mebla lexlas deg tesdawit). Yedder Mass Salhi tidyanin akk i iɛeddan deg tmurt n leqbayel : seg tmanyin armi d amussu n leɛrac, daymi i yella udlis-agi-ines d inigi n tidet ɣef snat n tedyanin-agi. Adlis-a, yella-d, diɣ, d tazrawt ɣef ubrid i d-yewwi umussu aɣelnaw akked unkar n yidles amazɣ s umata. S leqraya n udlis ‘’Algérie : citoyenneté et identité’’ i nezmer ad as-nerr tajmilt i Mass Salhi. Gen deg talwit a Mass.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.Moula  

  
 Taggara n ddurt-agi iɛeddan, tella-d tfaska n uderyis deg ulmis adelsan “Hami Arezki Assam” n tɣiwant n Tifra, deg lwilaya n Bgayet. Tameɣra-agi deg tezrigt-is tis setta, thegga-tt-id Tiddukkla tadelsant “Itri n Yiburayen” d tajmilt i tcennayt tameqqrant Nna Louiza. Tedda tfaska-agi ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan, teḍra-d gar 24 akked 25 meɣres 2017. Ass amezwaru, tella-d deg-s tuffɣa n yimezdaɣ n taddart n Yiburayen ɣef 9h, i wakken ad d-gemren u ad d-megren iẓuran n uderyis, swayes ara sewwen seksu n uderyis. Ma ɣef 14h00, tella-d tulya tunṣibt n tfaska-agi, s kra n temsikniyin yemgaraden akked yisenza s ubuddu n yidlisen. Γef 14h30, tella-d tɣuri n yisefra sɣur yimedyazen, azgen n ssaɛa mebɛed, tella-d temlilit d tcennayt Louiza. Seg 17h00 d asawen, tella-d tceqquft n umezgun, sɣur tarbaɛt “Jose Sedouk”. Ma d sendiḍelli 25 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, ɣef 10h00, tella-d yiwet n tqaɛet n ccḍah aqbayli sɣur wat Ukefadu, azgen n ssaɛa mebɛed, tella-d diɣ tɣuri n yisefra. Ma ɣef 11h00, tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n uttekki d usebɣes. Mi yezgen wass, yella-d ufraq n seksu n uderyis i wid iḥedren dinna. Syin akkin seg 14h00 d afella, tella-d tmeɣra meqqren n ccna, ideg ɣennan 10 n yicennayen gar-asen: tin iwumi tuɣal tejmilt Louiza, Farid Ferragui, Karim Khelfaoui, Karim Abranis, Mouh Oubelaid…atg.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Amazigh Ghani 

<div> 
  
 Am wakken yella deg wahil-is, taɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel tesfuggel ass agreɣlan n tutlayt tayemmat i d-yettasen deg wass n 21 furar n yal aseggas. Timlilit yella ad tili d sed, maca tettwasselḥem-d ɣer taggara s yiwen n wass ɣef kra n tsebbiwin. Seg 09sr00 n tnezzayt, tella teččur yakan tzeqqa n umsegraw n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel anda ara maggen warmuden (activités) n wass. Gar wid iḥeḍren, d irgazen n yidles s umata, nnig imḍebbren n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, imedyazen, icennayen, akked kra n tugniwin nniḍen. I teldayt ihi, gan imeḥḍar tazwara ddqiqa n tsusmi ɣef yiẓiɣer n umeɣnas n tmaziɣt Leḥsen Beḥbuḥ, talwit i yiman-is. Dɣa, seg Ayt Smaɛel llan wid yeɣran ɣur-s tajerrumt-is deg yiseggasen n 90. Syin, yeɛreḍ uselway n tɣiwant mass ɛebdun Nasir anmazul-is mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi akken ad d-yini awal n ukcam deg wahil. Sadeq dɣa, yesnubget s tekyes akk wid i d-yerran i tiɣri n tɣiwant, s yisem-is ed yisem n ugraw aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel. Send ad yekcem deg wazal i sɛan wussan am wid n wass, skud d tutlayt tayemmad i aɣ-d-yezdin akkit. Send ad yerr awal i uselway n tɣiwant, yessarem ad yettak yal yiwen azal ugar i tutlayt-is imi d nettat i d aẓar n tummast-is. Seg tama-s, yebda tazwara yimḍebber amenzu n tɣiwant awal-is ɣef umezruy n wass agreɣlan n tutlayt tayemmat, yesmekta-d dakken yettili-d usfuggel n wass-a segmi yettwaḥqer yiwen Umussu n Tutlayt deg Bangladac deg useggas n 1952. Dɣa yenna-d belli azal n wass-a d ageɛmir, daymi yessarem ad d-yettili yal aseggas uqeddic-a sɣur tɣiwant. Nnig waya, yerra tajmilt i win i aɣ-yeǧǧan, Leḥsen Beḥbuḥ, rnu yessuter deg mass Arɛun Lexḍer, i yellan ixuleḍ-it, ad d-yini cwiṭ fell-as. Seg yimir-nni, yettunefk wawal i umaru mass Mhenni Xalifi, i d-yemmeslayen kra ɣef temlilit, akked kra n wuguren i yellan mara nettmeslay ɣef tutlayt n tlalit, i d-qqaren tettara ɣer tmagit(identité), akked d tutlayt tayemmat i yettarran ɣer yidles. Rnu daɣen yewwi-d ɣef uɣilif nniḍen, i d-yettmaggar tikkelt-a ugrud mi ara ilin baba-s ed yemma-s ttutlayen snat n tutlayin mgerradent. Nnig asexreb n umenzay n yidles-is n tidet. Agrud, ad iɛeṭṭel deg umeslay seg wuguren n yiles i yufa netta ilemmed, rnu ad yesɛeṭṭel taggaɛmert n tizemmar n tegzi-s. Anect-a, send ad iɛeddi ɣer usissen n wungal-is amaynu Asdawan, deg urebbi n wussan. Deg kra n wakud, tettunefk tegnit i yimedyazen n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel ad d-awin yal yiwen asefru, skud akud yella d win i d-iḥerrsen. Syin akkin, ɛeddan yitarawen ɣer kra n temrac d askasi ideg i d-wwin awal ladɣa ɣef wazal n tutlayt akked uselmed-ines deg yiɣerbazen i yuqan ar tura. ɣer taggara yewwi-d umedyaz Sadeq Rebbaɛi yiwen n usefru d alqayan s wazal-is, ma d aselway n tɣiwant yesneɣmes-d ɣef kraḍ n teɣtas (décisions) i teṭṭef tɣiwant: tamezwarut, d alday n tneɣriyin i uselmed n tmaziɣt i wid iran ad ɣren tutlayt-nsen. Tis snat, d asɣay n 52 n wungalen Asdawan sɣur umaru Mhenni Xalifi. Ungalen-a ad ten-tazen tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel i 52 n tɣiwanin i yellan deg waɣir n Bgayet akken ad ten-sersent deg temkarḍiwin-nsent. Ma yella d taɣtest tis kraḍ, aselway n tɣiwant yesneɣmes wid iḥeḍren dakken atan ad yaru tisutriwin s yisem n ugraw aɣerfan n Ayt Smael i yinemhalen n mraw n yiɣerbazen imenza n temnaḍt bac ad sɣarayen tamaziɣt sey-a d asawen. Send ad nnebḍin yimeɣnasen n yidles ttwaɛerḍen ɣer yiwet n tgella tafessast rnan gan kra n tewlafin i ccfawa. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Di tezrigt-is tis 10, Tiddukkla tadelsant Amgud n tɣiwant n Draɛ El Mizan, s lemɛawna n Lsas Maɛtub Lwennas, thegga-d yiwen leqdic ass n 15 Yulyu 2017, wagi d arraz : Mɛtub Lwennas mgal tatut.

 Teḍra-d temlilit-a deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen “Mensuri Arezqi”. Yebda leqdic tasebḥit n wass s yiwet n temsikent n ubrid i d-tewwi tiddukkla. Akken, daɣen, i d-sekknen kra n tewlafin n unaẓur Lwennas. A wakken i d-yella yiwen usarag anda i d-mmeslay deg-s Malika Maɛtub ɣef tɣelnaẓri (Le nationalisme) deg yisefra n Maɛtub Lewennas. Ula d tanemhalt n Ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ n Bgayet, Massa Linda Utaḥ i yellan, ula d nettat, gar wid yewwin arraz Matub Lwennas mgal tatut, temmeslay-d awal ɣef tiktiwin i d-yettuɣalen deg tmedyazt n unaẓur Matub. Yessuli leqdic s ufraq n warrazen i yiwudam i d-yufraren deg umsizwer, wigi d : Mass Acab Remḍan ( Anemhal n Uxxam n usiẓreg Acab) , Mass : Usalem Muḥend uɛmer : d aselmad n tdamsa , d ameɣnas , Massa Linda utaḥ : d tanemhalt n Ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ n Bgayet . Nesteqsa-d Anemhal n tdukla Amgud Mass Karim Lɛarbi ɣef wamek i d-tusa i tikkelt tamezwarut tikti akken ad xedmem araz-a. Yenna-d : « Deg useggas n 2007, nejmaɛen iɛeggalen n tdukla akken ad as-nerr tajmilt i Maɛtub Lwennas, syin yiwen seg yiɛeggalen, yenna-d d akken Da Lwennas d ameqqran ilaq–as ayen meqqren , s wanect-a , tlul-d tikti n warraz n Maɛtub Lwennas mgal tatut i nettak yal aseggas i yimeɣnasen d wid ixeddmen ɣef tmaziɣt d yidles-is . Ma ɣef wayen yeɛnan afus n tallelt deg umsizwer-a, yerna-d : « Aṭas n wid i d-nufa bedden-d ɣer tama-nneɣ. Ass-a, ad asen-iniɣ tanemmirt-nwen. Bɣiɣ kan ad d-rnuɣ, yiwen wawal. Aql-aɣ la d-nettheggi yiwen n usenfar-nniḍen iwumi nefka azwel Tafzimt n massinissa». Deg taggara, testeqsa Mass Said Chemakh , D amyaru , d aselmad n tutlayt n tmaziɣt di tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmri, imi ula d netta seg yimezwura i yewwin arraz n Maɛtub Lwennas mgal tatut deg useggas n 2010, yenna-d : « Assa-a, nessaweḍ nesɛa tajerrumt n tmaziɣt, asegzawal s tmaziɣt, tura ilaq ad nessiweḍ ad nekcem di tiknulujiyin timaynutin ama d Internet, neɣ tilizri s ttawil n Internet , asiẓreg n tesɣunin d yidlisen , wigi i d annar i d aɣ-yeggunin .

  Souhila Yamani 

  
 Ass n ssebt 29 yulyu, yella-d wass n twizi, timlilit n tdukli, tuffɣa n yiseɣ i usizdeg n Ugelmim Aberkan i d-yezgan deg tlemmast n teẓgi n Ukeffadu. D leqdic i d-tessuddes terbaɛt « Arraw n Tlelli ». Qrib aggur-aya deg mi i d-berḥen ɣef temlilit-a deg uzeṭṭa inmetti.

 Rzan-d seg rebɛa n tɣemmar n tmurt n Leqbayel, ugar n 500 n n yimdanen i d-yusan, ilmeẓyen, tilmeẓyin, wid meqqren, wid meẓẓiyen maḍi deg leɛmer, tiwaculin, akken ad kkin, ad d-sbeggnen aneḥḍur-nsen deg tuffɣa yelhan yecban tagi. D ass igerrzen i sɛeddan merra wid i d-yusan, temlal tasa d way turew. Dɣa seg wass-nni n lǧemɛa, llan wid yezwaren ɣer din, sɛeddan iḍ-nsen dinna, gan iqiḍunen i yiḍes ddaw ubeḥri ḥlawen n yisekla d waman n Ugelmim yesfan. Ass n ssebt, deg sswayeɛ timezwura, bdan ttawḍen-d wiyaḍ, mi akken i neffeɣ seg temdint n Udekkar, neṭṭef abrid yettawin ɣer din, nettmagar deg ubrid wid ileḥḥun d tirebbaɛ ɣef uḍar, wid i d-yusan s tkeryas, s yifurguten, s yikamyunen, s yimuṭuyen. Llan ula d wid i d-yusan s yiɛudiwen. Tidet i nwala ass-a, adrar yuɣal-it-id sser, yettwakkes-as lweḥc. Aya akk yella-d s tegmat d umbaddal n teḍsa d wazul gar yimdanen merra, s tumert meqqren. Mi newweḍ ɣer din, kullec yettwahegga. Amkan yeččur d imdanen, kullec yella. Di tazwara, yella-d wawal sɣur imsuddsen n temlilit. Syin bḍan lɣaci ɣef kraḍ n yigrawen i ujmaɛ n yiḍuman d wayen yettwaḍeggren acḥal-aya. Yal yiwen, acekkar aberkan deg ufus, syin msefraqen. Agraw yuli metwal tiẓgi gar yisekla ɛlayen i d-yezgan nnig n Ugelmim. Agraw wis sin, iruḥ metwal abrid i seg d-ttɛeddayent tkeryas. Ma d tarbaɛt tis kraḍ, jemɛen-d dinna yakan ɣef tamiwin n Ugelmim Aberkan. Llan wid iɛellqen kra n tɛellaqin (plaques) ɣef yisekla, ttwarunt s tutlayt n Mɛemri, ttwessint ɣef leḥmala n ugama d useḥbiber fell-as. Syin, aṭas n leqdic-nniḍen i d-yellan. Llan wid yecnan s tgambarin-nsen, wid iceḍḥen s lferḥ. Akken kra n wakud, bdan ttawḍen-d yinebgawen n yiseɣ, d inaẓuren, d imyura, d inaddalen i ileḥḥun ɣef uḍar,…atg. Gar-asen tella uletma-s n Lwennas Meɛtub, Malika d mmi-s d kra seg yiɛeggalen n twacult-is; kra n yimyura d yimedyazen; udmawen ixeddmen ssinima; amezgun am Masi Lewhama; Amira Meqrani, tucbiḥt n tmurt n Leqbayel i useggas n 2017, d waṭas-nniḍen. Akken kan kra n wakud, terna-d terbaɛt n yiḍebbalen s lɣiḍa, ṭṭbel d ubendayer, rwin-tt, ceḍḥen yilmeẓyen, zhan wulawen, kksen lxiq yimdanen. “Ilaq ad nili di ttiɛad yecban wagi, d nekni ara d-yefken amedya i useḥbiber ɣef ugama. I tikkelt tamezwarur ara d-aseɣ ɣer dagi, tidet kan ttwaseḥreɣ s ccbaḥa yekseb, d yisekla ɛlayen. Wehmeɣ amek i t-yeǧǧa udabu ur d-yelhi ara deg-s, cukkeɣ amer yezga-d deg tmanaɣt ur t-ttaǧǧan ara akka” I aɣ-d-yenna Dda Ceɛban, i d-yewwin yid-s akamira (caméra), yexdem tugniwin d tbidyutin d yidiwenniyen seg mi yewweḍ ɣer din. Alami d tameddit n wass, yella-d wawal sɣur imsuddsen ɣef yisenfaren i sɛan sya ɣer sdat. Rran daɣ tajmilt i Dda Mesɛudan yemmuten deg useggas n 2016, ameddakkel n ugama, acḥal i iḥemmel adeg-nni, aṭas n yilmeẓyen i d-irebba yid-s ɣef leḥmala n ugama. D nnuba n seksu. Ččan wid i d-yerzan kra n tɣenǧawin i lbaraka, xedmen aṭas n tugniwin n usmekti. Jemɛen-d icekkaren-nni ɣer sin n yikamyunen, kkren ad ruḥen. Alami qrib i d-yeɣli yiḍ, mazal llan wid yeqqimen din, ur bɣin ara ad yekfu wass imgerrez am wa neɣ ad farqen agerruj yecban winna deg tlemmast n udrar. Sɛeddan ass yelhan, nnecraḥen, qessren, ḍsan, cnan, ceḍḥen. A wi yufan ad gtent temliliyin yecban tigi i usnerni n tdukli gar yimdanen, d useḥbiber ɣef ugama i icebḥen i tekseb tmurt n Leqbayel. 

  Khaled Achoui 

  
 Iberdan ččuren d tugdi, d tugdi i yettawin srid γer lfinga, lfinga tettawi s aẓekka. Iberdan di Tmurt uqlen am lmus di temgerḍt, win icḍen ad yeglu yis, dγa leqrar-is d atnezduγt n lebda. Dγa iseflawen i tefkka ddunit deg yiberdan-nneγ ur nezmir ad asen-neg leḥsab. Mačči d leḥrir i asen-d-ssan, mačči d lebsa n ubeṛnus i asen-rran γef uεrur-nsen, meεna s yisen i γummen tifekkiwin-nsen. Akka, yal aseggas, akken i t-id-nnan waddaden, 4 igiman ttmettaten yal aseggas deg yiberdan-nneγ. Deg waya ur nufi anwa ara nesseḍlem, d acu kan amḍan-a meqqer nezzeh. D ayen i d-yura Murad Mazri deg udlis-is “Abrid n Twaγit” i deg i d-iḥekku γef yiwet n terbeεt n yilmeẓyen i iran ad fγen akkin i temnaḍt n tmurt iqbayliyen γer utaram n Lezzayer Tamanaγt anida bγan ad sgunfun cwiṭ. Seld ad ssiwḍen γer Wehran, iqubel-iten-id yiwen n lḥid i yeskukuten takerrust deg ddan. Tlata deg-sen mmuten, ma d wis Rebεa wwint γer sbiṭar anida cwiṭ cwiṭ tettuγal-it-id tezmert. Tudert γlayet. Aεli, mi d-yeffeγ si sbiṭar, tqubel-it-id tilawt taqesḥant, dγa si terẓeg d lemrar yerra-tt kan i uqlaḥ. Asirem am ifeṭṭiwej, yal taṣebḥit ad ireqq, tameddit isensay-it s lkas n lemrar. Akken yal ass, isedhuy ul-is, meεna werğin iqḍeε layas, yerna yal ass mi ara d-icreq yiṭij, ifeṭṭiwej n usirem yettuγal d target, target ad d-tecεel times n tayri, n beqqu n tudert γas akken ineẓman d wid iqeddḥen di tasa-s. Murad iddem-d tadyant-a i yerra d ungal, d tadyant i d-yekkes si tilawt. Di Tazwara ur ibγi ara ad d-yesmekti ayen iεeddan, meεna ma yella nesgugem ul i d-ittmeslayen amek ara ferzen wid i d-yettankaren? Mačči d lḥeq fell-aγ ad nessusem, ur d-neqqar ara kra γef wayen irzan timetti. Γas lğerḥ ur yeḥli, γas tasiwin ttwaqdent s beṭṭu d lfiraq, γas akken arrac ruḥen d ilmeẓyen, di telqeq-nsen, iwulem ad d-nesmekti wid yeddren d akken abrid ur ireḥḥem ara, ilaq ad nissin amek ara neddu di laman, acku ma yella neffeγ seg yixammen-nne&amp;gamma,; ilaq ad neḥṣu d akken yemma-tne&amp;gamma,; tameṭṭut-nne&amp;gamma,; dderya-nneγ ttrağun deg-nneγ. Murad Mazri i aγ-d-ismektan tiyita n yiberdan, yewwi-aγ-d γer tilawt, yewwi-aγ-d γer wayen ttwalint wallen yal ass, d acu kan yewwit-id s teqbaylit i yettεuzzu aṭas, d acu kan iḥekku-d daγen γef wayen akk ttidiren imdanen di tallit-nni, d wayen akk i ten-iceγben. Murad Mazri ilul deg useggas n 1973, iḥemmel ayen akk icudden γer imesliẓri, ixdem yakan d awellaf, iḥemmel tugna, dγa s ttawil n yimeslayen isseknaγ-d tugna n tilawt taqesḥant i iqeden acḥal d tasa. Ungal-a, d ayen ara d-ifken i imeγriyen acḥal telha tlalit, meεna i rẓageḍ a lfiraq. Deg-s ad nwali d akken ddunit ur terḥim yiwen. Deg-s ad naf imektiyen d usirem n yal yiwen. Ad naf daγen timlilit n sin n yimdanen i yessawaḍen ad gen asaγ lqayen, s yis ad zdin di tdukli ara ten-yawin ad cerken lmeḥnat-nsen d wayen akk i ttεuzzun.

<p style="text-align: right;"> YAHIA YANES 

  
 Ma nerra awellih, ad d-naf dakken yella kra n umgerrad gar yiḍelli d wass-a seg tama n tmuɣli i tlufa. Kullec yelḥa ɣer sdat, ur yeqqim waddad amek akken i t-id-ǧǧan yimezwura, acu kan s lexsas.

 Tidukkliwin d tid ifettin taggara-ya deg temnaḍin, s lesnaf-nsent merra, ama d tidak n yidles, addal ed tiyaḍ nniḍen merra, lameɛna s lexsas. Ur ilaq ara tidukkliwin-a ad cuddent kan i yimeqqranen, neɣ ilemẓiyen, acku mačči anagar nutni i ttalasen attekki deg tfaskiwin ed temzizzilin n wayen ssnen, bac ad t-id-ssuffɣen, meḥsub ad d-sbeyynen yes-s iman-nsen, ad d-inin belli aql-iten llan. Imeqqraren-agi akked yilemẓiyen, ɣas kra seg-sen ayen ssnen ur t-id-lemden ara seg tdukkliwin, ulama asmi llan d imecṭaḥ ahat ur nuḥent akk trebbuyyaɛ i yettakken afus n tallelt i tmernit n tmussni, wanag ufan-d tifrat i taluft-a s lebɣi i sɛan i tmazzagin (spécialités) i ten-yeɛnan, simmal ttgeɛmiren gezzun azal n tikci akked ussenfel n tiktiwin yelhan. Wamma aqcic ameẓyan i ur newwiḍ leɛmer n tnubi, ur yeḥsa ara s ubrid i yessefk ad yettbaɛ nnig tɣuri, meḥsub deg wakud n yiɣimi-s ur yufa kra iselḥen ad t-yexdem yezmer ad as-d-yernu abaɣur. Ihi wagi d anza i d-yesbeyyinen lexsas n tdukkliwin i warrac n wass-a, irgazen n yimal, tettuqqet lqella n uqeddic fell-asen. Tidukkla yessefk fell-as ad tesɛu ahil i walmend n yigerdan yal aseggas. S umedya, ulac aseḥfeḍ n wuraren iwakken ad d-ffɣen ssnen i nutni akked tmurt-nsen sey-a ɣer yimal, acimi ur d-snulfayen ara tidukkliwin n wurar n txessarin (échecs) i yimecṭaḥ-nneɣ? Acku akken iban, urar-nni d yiwen seg wuraren i d-ixellqen tigzi i umdan s umata, am umeqqran am yilemẓi, ladɣa amecṭuḥ imi akken yebɣu yili lḥal, d netta i as-yessran s waṭas, a win yufan ad d-kkren wiyaḍ ad xemmemen fell-asen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Neḥsa tuḍen taggara-a tcennayt Louiza armi d-tger tiɣri i wat d wid-is deg yiwet n tvidyut ad tt-ɛiwnen i udawi. Dɣa, ddurt-a iɛeddan mi d-tuɣal si Fransa, yella-aɣ-d wawal d afessas yid-s.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: amek tettiliḍ akka tura a Nna Lwiza?  

  Nna Lwiza:  Tura usiɣ-d kan, kra n wussan ad uɣaleɣ ɣer Fransa. Idaq lxaṭer-iw. D ṭṭbib i yi-d-iserrḥen. Nniɣ-as ma yehda-k Rebbi, serreḥ-iyi ad qqimeɣ kra n wussan deg uxxam-iw. Ma yella kra i yi-yuɣen, a-t-an ẓriɣ-d tamurt.

  Nwala-kem tettwaḥuzaḍ, yehwa-am lḥal mi d-ddan yid-m Yiqbayliyen?  

 Ih! Amek ihi! Yis-sen i ttqabaleɣ aṭṭan-a. Ɣilleɣ ur i yi-ḥemmlen ara annect-a Yiqbayliyen, nniɣ-as ur swiɣ annect-a ɣur-sen, a ziɣ ḥemmlen-iyi s tidet.

  Yella win i d-yesteqsan fell-am seg yimḍebbren n ddula neɣ ulac?  

 Ala, yesteqsa-d uneɣlaf n tezmert. Yenna-d kcem-d ɣer Tizi Uzzu ad kem-ndawi. Nniɣ-as mi lliɣ dinna ur yelli win i d-yessawlen, tura mi aql-i di Fransa tebdam… Tanemmirt tameqqrant i Yiqbayliyen! Asmi i yi-d-usan kra n yilemẓiyen s tkamiratin nnan-iyi-d ur kem-nettaǧǧa a Nna Lwiza, ilaq ad tegreḍ tiɣri i temɛiwna. Dɣa teẓram yakk amek i d-ssawleɣ. Mačči d ayen isehlen ad tgeḍ askanir s 5000 neɣ 6000 n yiyuruten.

  Ula d ccna terriḍ-t ɣer tesga, ad d-telhuḍ d tezmert-inem…  

 Ih. Yella umaynut i bdiɣ send ad d-ɣliɣ deg waṭṭan, a-t-an tura deg ustudyu. Ur zmireɣ ara ad as-kemmleɣ lawan-a. Ula d taɣect-iw tuḍen.

  Yesteqsa-tt: Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Deg tmurt i irebḥen, xemmen u xedmen amezgar i lmal i wakken ad yezger seg tama ɣer tayeḍ mebla teḍra-d twaɣit : ad zeggren yiɣersiwen-a seg talwit. Sɛan azref deg tudert am nutni am wiyaḍ. Awi-d kan ad neqqsent twaɣiyin u ad sseshilen tikli i lmal akked yimdanen deg yiberdan, ladɣa, wid-nni ileḥḥun s tkeryas. Ma deg tmurt-nneɣ, mačči ur ssishilen ara kra n yimdanen tikli i lmal, meɛna ttɛewwiqen ula d imdanen deg ubrid-nsen. Ladɣa, mi ara tili temsalt terza ṣsenf-agi n yimeɛḍar. Ayen yellan, yakan, d ttawil i izemren ad yessnefsusi tudert-nsen, ixus aṭas, meɛna ula d winna ttgen-as aɛewwiq. Acḥal n tikkal i nwala abrid-agi n yimeɛḍar ɣelqen-t medden s ṭunubil neɣ s wayen-nniḍen. Wagi mebla ma nemmeslay-d ɣef wameg gezzmen medden iberdan xas ulamma yella umezgar neɣ tiqenṭert. Acḥal n twaɣiyin i yeḍran ɣef ustehzi-a. Ar melmi ? Neɣ i wacuɣer akka ? Yelha limmer ad d-lhun yimussnawen deg unadi n uḥric-a. Ahat, deg usegzi n temsalt i tella tifrat ? 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Yennayer d azamul n yimaziγen, d yiwen n wansay i d-yelḥan d leqrun, d ass amezwaru n useggas imaziγen, yebdan lewhi n 950 uqbel talalit n sidna Σisa, aseggas-nni i yerbeḥ ugellid Cacnaq ṭrad i d-yellan gar-as d ifarεunen di Maṣer, mbaεd tagelda tis 22. Yennayer d agur yesfilliten i lxir, rrbeḥ, lerẓaq, talwit, imi t-sfuggulen yimaziγen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Amek i d-yettili usfuggel n yennayer?  

 Aṭas n wansayen i d-icudden γer yennayer. Xeddemen imensi n yennayer neγ llan wid yeqqaren imensi bu sebεa yisufar. Zellun iyuzaḍ, dγa zik yal aεeggal s uyaziḍ-is, yernu yal yiwen deg-sen ma yewweḍ 17 neγ 18n yiseggasen, ad yezlu i yiman-is. Xeddmen lwaεda swayen zemren. Mačči d aya kan, llan wansayen-nniḍen am ttesḍila tamezwarut i uqcic amectuḥ akken ad yeğhed ucebbub-is. Xeddmen tasewwiqt anda aqcic, ad d-yawi aqerru n uzger akken, ad yuγal d aqerru n uxxam. Deqs n tmeγriwin i d-ittewheggan aseggas-a sγur tiddukkliwin yemgaraden, ama di tmurt-nneγ ama di tmura n lbarani d tmura n tmazγa s umata, ilmend n useggas amaynut n yimaziγen 2967, imi d ass i yesddukulen imaziɣen meṛṛa anda ma llan. D ass n tegmat i aɣ-d-yesmektayen amezruy d wakud i deg d-telḥa tmazɣa. D ass i yessemlalayen tassa d way turew, d ass n usirem d lferḥ ara yeẓẓun talwit deg ulawen. D ass, anda i nessikid ɣer umezruy lqayen, d anagi ger tɣermiwin d leǧnas meṛṛa i aɣ-d-yezzin. Yennayer d ansay εziz fell-aɣ meṛṛa, acku d amezruy-nneɣ d tinettit-nneɣ. Nessaram Yal aseggas d anerni deg iseɣ d tlelli, d usebγes n tutlayt n teqbaylit.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

 
  
 Timlilit Tis 8 N Tmedyazt tamaziɣt N Sumam ara ad yilin gar 25 ɣar 28 decmbre 2014.  Ikra n tin neɣ win yebɣan ad yettikii deg temlilit n tmedyazt tis 08 tamaziɣt n summam i d tesuddus yall aseggas Tiddukla Itri Adelsan N Weqbu ad d yazen qrad (03) n yisefra ara d yettwarun s tlatinit s ttawil n uselkim send 15 decembre 2014, akken ad ara d aɣ tessifsem fell-aɣ yewwi-d ɣef kra n win ara d yaznen ur d isedday ara isemi-s ɣef iseffra, ad yernu ad aɣ-d imud (fiche technique) tikkist n tlalit-is anida ara d yini isem-is, tansa ines, utun n telefu, ma yella yettiki ya deg tfaskiwin n tmedyazt, ma yella yewwi arrazen neɣ ala, ma yessufeɣ-d imuden n yisefra, ad irnu d izwal n yeḍrisen ara d yazen. yettili wefran amezwaru send timlilt taseqqamut n wefran d nettat ara aɣ d imudden ismawen n wid imi ara nazen akken ad d tikkin.

 Azen-t-d ɣar tansa a <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="0357626e66677a62797731333237437a626b6c6c2d6571" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a>

  
 « Tafrara, tikwal tcellex–iyi, tessergagay ul-iw am yife . Am umemmay n wassif iɣef i d-yemmeɣ waḍu. D acu i yi-yettaɣen akka ? D iɣilifen i igan tadrest neɣ d lferḥ n udriz ? Wi iẓran, acku ttinigeɣ alamma d tilisa n kra yellan, ama d ayen yettemḥebbin neɣ d ayen yettemxezzaqen. Aql-i, ttakeɣ anzi ɣer uɣersiw. Winna akken ttagaden neɣ winna akken ibran i yimeẓẓuɣen-is, aql-i uɣaleɣ d ifer azegzaw, tikwal d burekku i yettalin fell-i. Ttuɣaleɣ d leɣbar deg wakal. win akken ara yessegmun imɣan . Uɣaleɣ deg yigenni d ajerriḍ yettcalin , mi t-id-yettaǧǧa lebraq gar tafrara am waggas n tleḥmuṛegga n tsebḥit akk d yiḍ i d-yedlan . D afrux i d-yukin tafejrit i wakken ad ḥedreɣ i tlalit n ddunit i d-tettarew tafrara. D Afrux i d-tessaki rriḥa n lqahwa akked lhul yesskaray lmal deg udaynin. Aql-i am uɣersiw yeffren di tillas ,win yettagaden lexyal .Kra n yimasanen mazal ariḍa ttarguɣ-ten, ṭṭafaren-iyi ar ass-a « . Tahar Djaout. in l’invention du désert, le seuil, Paris . « Iganyen n yigenni, gren-d ifassen qubleɣ iḍ s meyya ifassen iḍ yeddel wadal i d –yekkan si lqifar n ddunit Daɣen, ad d-ssiwleɣ S taɣect tabeḥbaht n tillas alamma snezfeɣ Isireg n yiḍ Ad cnuɣ alamma seḥḥreɣ Yakk ayen yessewhamen alamma teɣli-d tsusmi Ɣef wahiten iderɣalen Ad cnuɣ alamma tejba-d tafrara ad teẓẓaɛ itri aneggaru Wissen ma ad izmireɣ ad rnuɣ ad idireɣ s wudem –agi ureṭṭal neɣ ad i yi-d-iṣaḥ umur gar yitran Tura akka , yeggugem yimi qqujṛen yinzizen gar yitran yulwan » Tahar Djaout in Les rets de l’oiseleur.

  Makhlouf Boughareb 

  
 Deg wass n 11 deg unbir 1956, deg taddart n Ighil n Boukiassa i d-yezgan di tγiwant n At Yeğer, i tessenger Fransa tinezduγin-is.Ala yiwet n temγart i yeqqimen dinna, imezdaγ akken ma llan rewlen γer tuddar i asen-d-yezzin imi Fransa tessegrareb-asen akk ixxamen-nsen. Γef sebba n  wanect-a, nesteqsa yiwen inigi n tedyant. Wagi d Mass Remidi Nacer, i nemlal dinna u netta d aselmad deg tesdawit n Mulud Mεemmri n Tizi Uzzu, yenna-d :’’ imdanen n taddart-a, kkren-d mgal Fransa. Nnan-as d lmuḥal ad neqbel ad tili lkazirna n Fransa di taddart-nneγ. U gan yiwet n l’embuscade dagi, daγen, i lεesker n Fransa anda i asen-nγan aṭas deg-sen. Ihi, syin i teggul ad d-terr ttar deg-neγ. Imir i teggul ad temḥu zarriεa n les fellagas n taddart-a, akken i aγ-qqaren. Fkan-aγ snat n swayeε i wakken ad neffeγ si taddart. Syin bdan-d tiyita s ruplanat akked les obus armi i tt-sseγlin. Seg yimir i texla taddart armi tewwi Lezzayer timunent ay bdan ttuγalen-d yimezdaγ yiwen, yiwen.’’ I wakken ad asen-rren tajmilt i yimeγras n tama-agi d wid-nniḍen, thegga-d tiddukla n taddart n Ighil n Boukiassa yiwen wass n usmekti n tedyant n 11 deg unbir 1956. Ayagi, yella-d ass-nni n 14 deg unbir 2014 anda i d-tella yiwet n temlilit  tameqqrant gar yimjuhad i d-yeqqimen akked yimezdaγ n taddart d yinebgawen-nsen. Di temlilit-a, tettunefk teswiεt i kra n yimjuhad i wakken ad d-smektin tidyanin yeḍran yid-sen, ladγa, di tama-agi n Yeğer. Gar-asen ad naf Mass Si Ouali, imḍebber n tuddsa n yimjuhad n lwilaya i yessutren seg yimezdaγ n taddart-a i wakken ad semmin i yiberdan d yimekwan s yismawen n yimjuhad. Aya, yeḍra-d mebεed mi sersen tameqqunt n yiseğğigen γef yiẓekwan n wid yemmuten. Syin, ggran-d di tsebdadt i tga taddart i yimeγras. Ma γef leqdic-a, yenna-d uselway n tiddukla Mass Hadjal Ahcène :’’ tajmilt-nsen d tameqqrant, amek ur ten-id-nettmektay ara !? D nutni i aγ-yeğğan ad nettidir di tlelli. Ihi, ayen i asen-nexdem drus.’’ Tajmilt tameqqrant, di&amp;gamma,;  i yilmeẓyen n taddart-a imi qublen akken iwata timlilit akked yinebgawen. Nessaram ad yili d amedya i tudrin-nniḍen. Afud igerrzen.

 Am wakken i t-id-nɛeyyen yakan deg yisebtar-a imalasen iɛeddan, tella tettheggi Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad i useqleɛ n umsizwer n tullisin ara yilin d tajmilt i umussnaw Lmulud At Mɛemmer. D ayen ara d-yernun i umsizwer n tmedyazt i yebdan deg useggas n 2003. Dɣa, taggara-a n wayyur-a n cutember i d-tberreḥ s tiɣri s wudem unsib i walmend n yakk imura imaziɣen i iran ad kkin s wayen i d-snulfuyen. D asurif-nniḍen deg umennuɣ imegzi d useḥbiber ɣef tutlayt-a iɣef ɣlin acḥal d irgazen. I waya, yessefk kan ɣef yal yiwen ad d-yazen tullist-ines i yuran s walbaɛḍ n tutlayin timaziɣin ɣer tansa-a n tdukkla: Tidukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad Cidex N° 03 BP 105 Ayt Smaɛel 06044 Bgayet. Neɣ s ubrid n Internet, ɣer tansa-a taliktrunant: <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="8feeeceee9ebf5cff6eee7e0e0a1e9fd" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a>, send 15 deg wayyur n duǧember i d-iteddun. Ilaq ad d-nesmekti d akken tiddi n tullist, yewwi-d ad tili deg wammas n 10 n yisebtar, s talɣa A4, tasefsit Times New Roman, temɣer n yisekkilen 12. Wammag asentel, ad yeqqim d ilelli akken ad izmiren yilemẓiyen ad farsen akk tizemmar-nsen n usnulfu, imi d wa i d iswi n tdukkla. Dɣa, i yiɛeggalen n Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad, ilul-d warraz-a ad yessebɣes ilemẓiyen ɣer tira iwennɛen, d usider n usekkil amaziɣ ugar deg tsekla. Gar tewtilin n utekki, ad naf ladɣa amagrad i d-yeqqaren d akken amsizwer yeldi kan i wid yessemden 18 n yiseggasen akken yal yiwen ad yili d amasay ɣef yiḍrisen-is. Am wakken, ilaq ad tettwaru tullist s tira tumrist tamirant. Ma yella d aberreḥ s yigemmaḍ, ad d-yeddakkel akked win n umsizwer n yisefra i lmend n tfaska n meɣres 2018 i d-yettaẓen.
