 Lehyuf d ugur n yal timetti deg umaḍal ass-a, ulac tamurt yezgel, u tamurt-nneɣ d yiwet seg-sent. Imi Taxxamt Taɣelnawt n Usnerni n Tedwest d Tezrawin «Furm», tefka-d leḥsab n 30% n yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas (C.E.M), d wid n tesnawit iḍefren abrid-a n lehyuf. Ugur-agi iḥuza s waṭas ilmeẓyen, ama d arrac ama d tullas. Ihi acuɣer d iεrimen i yettḥaza ugar n wiyaḍ? Ayɣer ur yelhi ara i sseḥa n umdan d tmetti-ines? D acu n yifukal i yezmer ad yefk I umdan? Timental i yettağğan aṭas n yilmeẓyen, ad aɣen abrid-agi n dir mačči d yiwet, gar-asent:Tamezwarut: imi llan kra n yiεrimen i d-ittmagaren uguren di tmetti, yerna ur d-asen-nezmiren ara. Md: berru n yimawlan, iɣeblan n tudert, tayri (…),dɣa ṭṭafaren-t. Γef leḥsab-nsen ttkkeyyifen-t, iwakken ad ttun iɣeblan-nsen. Tis snat: llan wid iwumi ttenṭṭaḍen sɣur imeddukkal-nsen, neɣ s nnefḥa, akken ad ten-εerḍen, dɣa alamma neṭṭḍen-ten. Ma d ayen yeεnan lemḍerra swayes id-gellun, ad naf: Deg tazwara: tissit n lehyuf s yal lesnaf-is: (ccrab, lkif, ccira, kukayin, ẓẓeṭla, tisegnatin, tikaciyin, dexxan…), tgellu-d s txessart d tameqqrant ɣef sseḥa n umdan. Imi swaɣayen neɣ sdubuyen ixef n umdan i ten-itessen, imi daɣen ssenqasen ccfawat deg wallaɣ n bunadem, yerna ssefqqaεen-t bihbih. Win urzen lehyuf, ttaran-t am umeslub neɣ am uderwic, ur yeẓri ara d acu i ixeddem di tallit-nni. Tis snat: gellun-d s twaɣit ɣef tezmert n win iten-iḍefren, imi win iten-issexdamen ineqqiman-is s yiman-is. Acku gellun-d s waṭas n waṭṭanen yecban; Sidda, lkunsir, xelḍen d yidammen n umdan, aṭṭan n turim… Tis kraḍet: amdan iεebden lehyuf, neɣ win iwumi yekcem deg yidammen-is, ala fell-as ara ixeddem, ur yettwali la tarwiḥt-is, la tawacult-is, wala timetti-ines. Ad d-yaf iman-is ur iḥriz ara la lğib-is, la tadwest-is. Tis ukuẓet: yezmer ma yeṭṭef-it lḥal, ur yesεi swacu ara d-yaɣ asafar-a, yezmer ad d-yaker, neɣ ad ineɣ medden ɣef liğal-is. Imedyaten ggten deg wayen yeεnan anect-a, imi yal ass nsel neɣ neqqar deg yiɣmisen, tidyanin yecban tigi. Aṭas i yenɣan imawlen-nsen ɣef yiεeqqaren-a, uɣalen ggran-asen-d wussan deg leḥbus. Tis semmuset: wid I ten-itessen, gellun-d ula s txessart ɣef tezmert n tmetti, imi ur ṭṭurun ara kan iman-nsen, maca ṭṭurun ula d imdanen yellan ɣer tama-nsen. Ladɣa de gyimukan iɣelqen, ur ten-ikccem ara wuzwu. Tis sat: ula d timetti ur d-as-tetteg ara azal wala ccan, I win i tebεen abrid-a. Imi ad d-yaf iman-is weḥd-s kan, yerna ad t-id-tettwali tmetti-ines s yir tamuɣli. Tis ṭamet: imdanen-a gellun-d s twaɣiyin ula ɣef ugama d twennaḍt, acku mi ara iḍeqqer yiwen lbunt n yiggirru neɣ tisegnit ɣer wakal, ad t-tḍur. Ma yella daɣen iḍeqqer-iten ɣer waman, ad ten-issimes ula d nutni.Ihi taggrayt n wawal d ta: yuwi-d ɣef yilmeẓyen-a yesnuffuren isafaren-a, ad ten-ğğen, ma bɣan ad sseḥbibren ɣef tdawesa-nsen, ɣef texriḍt-nsen, ɣef twenaḍt-nsen (…). Γurwat a medden lehyuf d acengu i ineqqen neɣ d lmut iḍulen.«Asseḥbiber xir n udawi»

<p style="text-align: right;">  <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>ADAOU Abdelghani 

  
 Ayen yerzan tifranin n Ugraw aɣerfan n twilayt n Bgayet, ideg i d-rsen merra yikaramen (dossiers) n 14 n yikabaren, d akabar n Tirni n yiɣallen inemlayen i yeglan s tuget n yikersiyen i tikkelt-nniḍen, am deg 2012, imi yewwi 21 seg-sen. Deffir-s, srid d RCD i d-iḥellan si tama-s 10 n yikersiyen. Ayen i d-yeqqimen yebḍa ɣef ukabar Ilelliyen (Lwaḥi ad nebnut imal) 5 n yikersiyen, d FLN 7 n yikersiyen.

  Yuɣal yebrez-d FFS deg Ayt Smaɛel 

 Ass n amhad iɛeddan, 23 deg unbir, aṭas i yekkren d lḥers seg 19:00 d asawen mi yebda ufran n tsendyaq n lvuṭ, bdan ttbinen-d yigemmaḍ n tefranin tidiganin. Deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, i tikkelt tis ukuẓ i d-yufrar s umur ageɛmir ukabar n Tirni n Yiɣallen Inemlayen deg uqerruy-is Sadeq n Ayt Urbaɛ, s 7 n yikersiyen yessaweḍ iḥella-d tuget, sdat RND 4 n yikersiyen, RCD 2 yikersiyen, FLN 2 nniḍen. Ulamma ur llint tsewham ɣef FFS ɣef tmuɣli n yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel, meskud yennum yettawi-d tuget, ma d akabar n Hmed Uyeḥya, aṭas-aya ur as-d-isaḥ deg Ayt Smaɛel umḍiq i as-d-isaḥen lexmis-a. Ula deg tɣiwant n Tsexriwt d akemmel i d-yellan. Yewwi-tt i tikkelt-nniḍen s tuget ukabar n Ugraw i Yidles d Tugdut s 5 n yikersiyen. Ḍefren-t-id Yilelliyen n Sidani s 4 n yikersiyen, 2 i FFS, 2 i FLN, 2 nniḍen i ukabar n TAJ. D akemmel dɣa i d-yellan ula deg tɣiwant n Yiderginen imi yuɣal yebrez-d din ukabar n FFS.

  M. K. 

  
 Aɛmer yunag meẓẓi ɣer lɣerba. Yewwi-t umɣar n baba-s Meẓyen, iserwel-it si tmurt di lgirra-nni yugad ad t-yawi uṛumi ɣer lɛesker neɣ ad iddu d yimjuhad. Ayen tekka lgirra ur d-yekcim tamurt. Iwwet sebɛa snin ɣef ubeṛdi.Yelmed lḥirfa n lebni, ibennu, ixeddem deg icenṭiyen. Tefra lgirra yezzi-d ɣer tmurt, izweǧ d yelli-s n ɛemmi-s Faḍma. Iqqim azal n tlata n wagguren dɣa yuɣal ɣer lɣerba. Iwweḍ kan ibda axeddim deg ucanṭi, ibennu. Seg wassen-nni ur d-yezzi ɣer tmurt, la tabrat, la lexbar-is. Nwan akk medden yemmut. Urɛad d-yezzi useggas segmi iṛuḥ Aɛmer yerna ɣer-s uqcic. Semman-as Meẓyen s yisem n jeddi-s iwwḍen laɛfu n Ṛebbi sin wussan kan uqbel ad d-ilal. Akka yiwen immut wayeḍ ilul-d, fkan-as isem n win yemmuten am wakken d aɣram ara t-id ɣermen. Qqaren mi ara d-asent, ttasent-d ɣef tikkelt, ula d Aɛmer deg wussan-nni deg yemmut baba-s i d-yeɣli deg ucenṭi, yerreẓ deg wammas iḥbess ur iteffeɣ ara, iqqim kan di sbitar. Meẓyen tesseker-it-id yemma-s Faḍma s lḥif. Akken ad iɣer ad icbu akk arrac, yemma-s teffeɣ d tamecṭajerṭ ɣer medden… A tta-n teffeɣ ɣer uzemmur, a tta-n ɣer usaɣur… D adfel neɣ d urɣu Faḍma ur tessin laɛfu. Akken iwweḍ d argaz, ifukk leqraya-s di tesdawit, iruḥ ɣer Fransa ad iẓer baba-s. Yiwen n yiminig n taddart-nsen yusa-d ɣur-s yiwen wass yenna-as ma tebɣiḍ ad truḥeḍ ad tezreḍ baba-k ad ak-mleɣ anda yezdeɣ nekk deg wussan-a ad uɣaleɣ ma tebɣiḍ ad tedduḍ yid-i. Idda Meẓyen d urgaz-nni ɣer Fransa, iwweḍ alammi d Paris, imla-as anda izdeɣ baba-s. Meẓyen ur issin, ur iwala baba-s ula di tugna. Ur iẓri amek yegga wala amek ara t-yaf. Iɛzem ad iruḥ ɣer-s imiren kan mi yerkeḍ taqaɛet n Paris. Iwweḍ zdat tewwurt, ibedd, irra-d nnehta, ul-is yekkat amzun d amutur. Iwwet ɣef tewwurt ulac wis-id-yerran awal, wala wis-id-illin tawwurt. Iɛawed tikkelt nniḍen, ifassen-is d yiḍaren-is ceṭḥen. Isla kan i ṣṣut inna-as-id kcem. Ildi tawwurt ikcem. Akken kan i t-id-iwala Aɛmer inna-as-id kečč iban d mmi Meẓyen ! Meẓyen ur as-yerri ara awal iɣewwes isellem ɣef baba-s. Ttemsalamen ttrun, temlal tasa d way turew. Tarumit tewhem deg wayen tettwali, teḥṣa Aɛmer belli izweǧ zik di tmurt u ɣur-s aqcic maca werǧin i t-yessen Aɛmer, teqqim kan tettweḥḥid amek iwala-t kan iɛqel-it d mmi-s ! Tenna-as …

 <em> yettkemmil </em>

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Ussan εeddan urwen-d wiyaḍ, almi mden 05 iseggasen γef tmettant n yiwen wejjgu ger yejjga n ccna n teqbaylit, deg ass n Ssebt 13 furar 2010, texsi teftilt i d-yefkan tafat d cbaḥa i tayri, yemmut ujeğğig di tebḥirt n tẓuri taqbaylit swayes i zzuzunen wulawen n wid yuḍnen, wagi d-acennay-nneγ ṚaḤim. ṚaḤim yeḥbes wulis i tyita deg-wul n temurt n Leqbayel, i tlemast n temdint n Tizi-Wezzu, yesεa 47 issegasen di laεmer-is. Tamḍelt-is tella-d ass n 15 furar 2010 di taddert-is Imqecren, tamnaḍt n At Σissa Mimun (At-Wagnun, Tizi-Wezzu).

 Dγa ilmend n umuli wis 05 γef tmettant n ucennay Raḥim, tamahla n yedles n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu d wexxam n yedles n Lmulud n At-Mεemmar s lemεawna n twacult n Raḥim sudsen-d yiwet n tejmilt meqren ddurt-agi yezrin ussan n 12 d 13 furar deg wexxam n yedles n Lmulud n At-Mεemmar s yiwen n wahil d amesbaγur anda llant temzikniyin yemgaraden n ttsawar d yeγmisen id-imeslayen γef tudert d umecwar n unaẓur. Akken id tella tirza γer uẓekka n Raḥim di tmeqbert n tadert-is  Imkecherene, di tγiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun (Ouagnoun).

 Syen tella-d yiwet n temlilit tinigit meqqren sγur tawacult n unaẓur akked yemddukal-is ass n 13 furar tamedit, syen tekfa s yiwet n tmeγra n ccna ideg ccnan deqs n yinaẓuren.

 Issem-is aḥeqqani Raḥim Mohammed, ilul ass n 07 dujember 1963 deg irebbi n tmurt n leqbayel, taddert n Imqecren, Raḥim mucaε yur yemdanen s tezlit-is mucaεen nezzah “Yya-d ad m-iniɣ, yecnatt ukud d Yasmina. Ass n tmettant n ucennay Raḥim, isalli yeγli-d am siεqa γef yedanen acku d axalaf meẓẓiyen i yemuten, maca ayen yexdem ad-yeqqim ilebda.

<p style="text-align: right;">Islam Bessaci

  
 Deg wayyuren-a imenzwura n useggas n 2015, ilemẓiyen n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel (60 n yikilumiṭren ɣer usamar-anẓul n Bgayet) atenan kkren ɣer tigawin n yimussuyen isdukklanen, mi d-snulfan snat n tdukkliwin ta deffir ta i ara iqedcen i ubaɣur (lfayda) n wid yenḥafen, ixussen, neɣ yenṭerren deg tudert n yal ass. Tamezwarut isem-is « Tafat n Lɛali » i d-yennulfan deg taddart n Ayt Tɛisiwt, ttesriḥ-ines tewwi-t-id s wudem unsib ass n 29 seg wayyur-a n yebrir yezrin. Akken i d-yettban dɣa, ddeqs n yiswan i uɣur terra ddhen tessaram ad ten-tessemres deg wannar. Dɣa, gar waqqayen imenza n yiswan-nni, ad d-naf tallelt n yiẓawaliyen, n yimuḍan, axdam n ttawil s tedrimt ladɣa i kra win yuḍnen yewwi-d ad icerreg, akked uheggi n kra n ttiɛadat n lxir. Deg wawal n yiwen n yilemẓi seg yiɛeggalen-is mass Rafiq Sadu yenna-aɣ-d: « Ayen i aɣ-yesbeɣses akken ad d-nesnulfu tidukkla-ya d kra n tektiwin i nwala deg wannar. Ɣef waya, ad d-iniɣ i yilemẓiyen ad zdin iɣallen i tdukkli. Acku llan yiẓawaliyen, llan yimuḍan sran i kra seg tama-nneɣ ». Awal-a iban ad iruḥ srid ɣer yilemẓiyen i ilaq ad ilin d imeltaɣen deg tidukkla-ya tameẓyant imi ar tura ala 13 n yiɛeggalen i tesɛa, gar-asen 7 deg ubiru n tigawt yakan. Tin nniḍen d Tidukkla n Yimeɛḍar ed Yimuḍan Idumen mu yettunefk isem « Tiɣri ». Ar tura werɛad i as-d-yettunefk s wudem unsib ttesriḥ . Ɣef uqerruy-is mass Ɛebdun Smaɛil. Yessaram netta ed terbeɛt-is i iɛeddan 30 ad taweḍ tdukkla-nsen tamaynut ɣer yiswan-is s tigawin yemgerraden deg teɣzi n useggas, imi gar wayen tesres deg wahil icaḍ s ddeqs lemmer ad ilin warmuden seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ. Ma nebder-d iswan n tidukkla-ya Tiɣri : yella yibeddi ɣer tama n yimeɛḍar s wayen tla tdukkla d ttawil, asekcem-nsen deg tudert n yal ass, aseḥbiber ɣef yizerfan-nsen s uncad n tamiwin i terza taluft. Tikci n yisafaren i wid yeṭṭfen aṭṭanen idumen, akked waṭas n tigawin i tɛewwel ad teg tdukkla-ya. « Ssarameɣ ilemẓiyen-nneɣ ad d-asen ad d-kecmen deg tidukkla-ya imi tekkat ɣef wayen i d-tessutur telsawit (l’humanisme) ». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna uselway-is mass Ɛebdun Smaɛil.           

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Am yal tamnaḍt deg umaḍal, tqubel tmurt n leqbayel aseggas amaynut s lferḥ n uncreḥ, ama deg yixxamen gar iɛeggalen n twacult, ama deg berra gar yimeddukkal neɣ deg yimukan i yettwaggan ɣef ddema n wanect-a. Kra n wassan kan uqbel ad yekcem useggas ajdid, tebda temdint n Tizi Ouzou tcebbeḥ iman-is, ladɣa, deg urti 17 deg tuber neɣ deg umraḥ n usalay anda i rezzunt s ṭṭaqa twaculin s warranw-nsent, i wakken ad d-ṭṭfent kra n teṣwirat s ufella n tcariṭ n Papa Noël neɣ ɛad yid-s s timmad-is. Imi, llan kra n yilmeẓyen i yerran iman-nsen d Papa Noël s lebsa u yewwin-d yid-s tacariṭ yezzuɣur yiwen uɛidiw amecṭuḥ. Zyada ɣef wanect-a, ad naf amekkan, yeččur d tiẓdanin akked kra n yisafaren n tuččit ifessasen. Am cakula, leḥlawat n yal ssenf, lgaṭu. Tella ula d la barbe à papa. Lḥasun, ayen akk swayes ttqabalen aseggas ajdid. Xas ulamma ḥussent twaculin s leɣla n temɛict, meɛna awi-d kan ad sɛeddin kra n lweqt deg unecraḥ d lferḥ akked warraw-nsent. Xas ulamma yal wa s tezmert-is, iswi yiwen : d amagar n useggas amaynut s wudem amaynut, akken xeddmen akk yimdanen deg yal tama n umaḍal. Aṭas i iɛerḍen ad sfeclen imezdaɣ n tmurt n leqbayel, i wakken ad ǧǧen timeɣriwin-agi n taggara n useggas imi i as-neqqaren yimṭurfa-nni n ddin d akken timeɣriwin-agi d leḥram, ur ilaq ara ad tent-xedmen, acu kan imdanen ur fkin ara awal neɣ azal i tiktiwin yecban tigi. Yella ɛad anda sxedmen yimṭurfa-agi iɣil i wakken ad gedlen timiɣriwin-a u sugaden imdanen, meɛna ur ṣsawḍen ara. Ula d aselway n yiwet n tiddukkla taɣelnawt, yessawel-d i yizzayriyen i wakken ad ttgen ara timiɣriwin-agi n taggara n useggas imi, ɣef wakken iwala netta, ayagi akk d leḥram, ulac-it deg ddin. Aṭas, diɣ, i t-id-yufan d ssebba i wakken ad d-ssiwlen s ttawil n Internet ɣer unuḥbus n lxedma d uneɣluq n tḥuna ɣef teɣzi n smana. Acu kan imadanen-agi, neɣ amadan-agi, ur d-fkin ara ismawen-nsen i wakke,n ad ten-ḍefren yimdanen. Nnan-d kan ad yili unuḥbus imi ɣlayet temɛict. Ayagi ur iqenneɛ ara lɣaci xas ulamma ɣlayet tudert s tidet imi ur ẓran ara sani teddun, ma ur ẓrin ara ukked leḥḥun. Ɣef wanect-a, i tt-fran d rray yimawlan n tḥuna n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i yennejmaɛen ass-nni n lǧemɛa deg Uxxam n yidles, Mulud Mɛemmri, d akken ad fetḥen akk tiḥuna-nsen imi ayen ssuturen deg ussan-agi iɛeddan yettwaqbel-d sɣur wid teɛna temsalt. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Hocine Moula 

  
 Mi yekfa wawal ɣef tmaziɣt deg BEM 2016 s usekkud n usirem, s tmuɣli ɣer yiḍrisen ma ttarran-d azal i tmaziɣt, ma sedduyen-tt ɣer zdat, ad d-uɣaleɣ ɣer usatal n ukayad-a akken ad ttreɣ talɣa ines d telqey ines. Awal-iw ass-a ad-t-id-awiɣ ɣef usentel n ukayad akked tseqqamut i t-id-igan.

  1. Asentel n ukayad: 

 Yal tanga tesεa aɣawas ines unsib i d-isuffeɣ uɣlif n usedwel aɣelnaw; yettwellih-d amek ara d-yettunefk ukayad i unelmad. Win n tmaziɣt yebna-tt ɣef uḍris d yirmad n tutlayt d usenfali s tira. Aḍris isefk ad yili d ullis; tuttriwin d yiwellihen ad d-ttwikksen seg-s. Amek i d-usant tɣawsiwin-a deg usentel n tmaziɣt ?

  1.1. Aḍris:  

 Arra n MEN/ONECI yefka-d s ttfasil talɣa n uḍris : “Ad yers yirem ɣef yiwen n uḍris n kra n umaru yettwassnen. Aḍris-nni ad yili d ullis ideg zemrent ad d-ilint tewsatin n yinawen i yellan deg yihallen n ulmud alemmas; ad yesεu azal n 250 n wawalen.” Iselmaden yuɣen tannumi d ikayaden walan acḥal i yecceḍ usentel n ubrid-a : Aḍris meẓẓi, ur yuwiḍ ara ɣer 150 n wawalen; mačči d ullis; tuttriwin ur d-usint ara merra seg uḍris. Aḍris-nni yettwakkes-d seg wungal, d acu kan amur i d-yettunefken deg ukayad mačči d ullis; ha-t gar uglam d usegzi. Ticraḍ-is d tid n usegzi imi yeskan-d amek i ttbeddilen medden tidmi d tigawin nsen i lmend n wakud d usatal ideg ttidiren. Deg-s kraḍet n tseddarin d timecṭaḥ, ttwakkesent-d seg sin n yisebtar n wungal. Acimi d tidak-nni i d-yettwafernen ? Amek i d-ttwabnant akken i d-ttunefkent akken deg ukayad ? D ṭṭlam sari !

  1.2. Tuttriwin :  

 Ula deg umur n tuttriwin yella wucuḍ. Tuttra tis- II-3 tbedd ɣef yiwet n tefyirt ( “ Ḍefren-ten Leqbayel” ) ulac-itt deg uḍris; terna-d d abandu, tuɣal d tasalelt i ulaɣmu n tjerrumt. Tin n ufares s tira tbedd ɣef usegzi / usfukel, mačči ɣef wallus.

  2. Taseqqamut i d-igan asentel –a :  

 Aswir n ukayad, s umata, yezmer ad yili iwulem win n yinelmaden; yezmer ad yili yuli neɣ yuder cwiṭ. Awal wezzil, yefra. Ayen ara yesɣezfen awal, ma nebda-t, d aswir n tseqqamut i d-ifursen asentel n tikkelt-a. Amek armi teɣli deg udernu n yigulen yerna deg tmussniwin n uswir aɣurbiz ?

  2.1. Gar wallus d usegzi: 

 Deg useɣti, iban ad yili umčeqlel gar yiselmaden ɣef tuttra I-4 (anaw n uḍris). Ad ilin wid ara yeddun d ufakul n tseqqamut tunsibt n tmaziɣt i tt-yefran di rray belli aḍris-a d ullis mačči d asegzi; ad ilin diɣen wid ara d-yinin d aḍris imsegzi, mačči d ullis. Aniwa ara tt-yefrun ma yella d imezwura ara d-yemlen i yineggura ?

  2.2. Aktazal n umahil n unelmad : 

 Inelmaden ttuheggan akken ad d-inin d ullis acku, deg yiluɣma n wallasen send akayad, xedmen kan ɣef wullisen imi d ayen i yellan deg yiwellihen n uɣawas n BEM n tmaziɣt. Ma tettunefk-asen tezmilt d takemmalit, ha-t-an uwin ayen ur ttalasen ara (réussite abusive); ma tettwakkes-asen, d lbaṭel acku ttuwelhen ɣer wullis s tuttra tis I-5. Wamma ma yella ttuxeṭṭan wid i d-yefkan tiririt iseḥḥan, d ayen kan !

  2.3. Ticki tuttra tessanaf : 

 Tuttra tis I-5 (ɣef unallas: “Anallas deg uḍris-a, d agensay neɣ d azɣaray ?”) teṭṭef afus i yinelmaden ad ffɣen akkin i unnar. Amek ? Inelmaden ssnen tamacahut agi n unallas; anida yella, ha-t dinna wullis. Iban-asen ad d-inin d ullis wanaw n uḍris mi ara d-rren ɣef tuttra tis I-4 ( “D acu-t wanaw n uḍris-a ?”). Ugur ha-t deg tririt ɣef umur wis sin n tuttra tis- I-5 ( “Suffeɣ-d seg uḍris sin n yimedyaten i t-id-yemmalen.” Da, inelmaden ad nadin, ad refden, ad sersen, ur d-ttafen ara ayen ay ulac acku aḍris-a ur yebni ara ɣef uɣawas n wullis, akken i t-ɣran deg uɣerbaz. Ulac anallas deg tugzimin n uglam d usegzi. Tikkelt-a, imyura n ukayad iban ɣlin deg sshil. Ur stufan ara ad d-afen neɣ ad d-fernen ullis, ullis ideg llan iferdisen n tutlayt i iwulmen i yirmad n ukayad : aya yeskan-d nniya ideg yeḍra umahil. Walan anallas (i yerzan kan ullis / récit) deg yinaw (discours) : aya yexḍa i tussna n yiḍrisen. 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Yahia Bellil, amaswaḍ n tmaziɣt 

  
 Taḥanut d yiwet gar 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Tezga-d ɣef ugafa n tɣiwant-agi, tebԑed ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu s wazal n 15 km.

 Taddart-agi, mazal-itt ar ass-a n wussan tettiddir deg waṭas n yiɣeblan d wuguren, imi tuget n yisenfaren n unegmu i tt-id-yeṣuḥḥen , mazal urεad bdin. Deg wayen yeεnan isenfaren i mazal ur ttwaxedmen ara deg taddart-agi, ad d-nebder di tazwara asenfer n Lgaz. Mazal ṣsawḍen deg-s 10%. D ayen yeğğan, dɣa, imezdaɣ n taddart -agi nḥafen aṭas, ladɣa deg wussan n cetwa , imi acḥal n tikkal i leḥun d likumiṭer i wakken ad d-awin taqqerԑat n lgaz. D ayen iten-yeğğan ad d-gren tiɣri, yerna ad ssutren deg wid teԑna temsalt, gar-asen imeḍberen n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun d Tenmehla n Imuhal Izuyaz (Direction des Travaux publics), i wakken ad ɣiwlen ad frun tamsalt-a, acku temdel tewwurt n tḥanut yesnuzun Lgaz di taddart-a. Gar yisenfaren, daɣen, yellan deg wahil i mazal ur ttwabdan ara imuhal-nsen, ad naf aεiwed n kra n yiberdan yellan daxel n taddart s ssiman, i wakken ur yettilli ara uɣebbar deg unebdu wala axmir neɣ aluḍ di ccetwa. Mazal, diɣen, akemmel n tqentyar yesuffɣen aman ugeffur i yiberdan-agi imaynuten i wakken ur tesyixen ara deg tegrest. Wigi d wid yellan deg wahil, maca mazal kan ur ttwaxdamen ara. Mazal aṭas n yisenfaren i ilaqen ad ttwaxdamen, gar-asen: axxam n yilmeẓyen, ideg ara dhun yilmeẓyen n taddart-agi. Tiwin n ttawil n Lantirnat (L ‘Internet) s ixxamen, i wakken ad sifsusen taεkumt ɣef yimezdaɣ-is. D lbenni n lğameε n taddart, am tuddar akk-nniḍen. Aẓrab n tmeqbert n taddart s yiɣaladen neɣ s ugɣeryağ i wakken ur ikeccem ara lmal ɣer daxel. Rnu ɣer-s, asebdad n uḥeddad ara yettwabnun deg tlemmast n taddart.

<p style="text-align: right;">   ADAOUN Abdelghani 

  
 Ass n 20 yebrir 2015 a d-tili yiwet n temlilit di Tgemmunt ∑azzuz. 20 yebrir d amulli wiss 35 n Tefsut n 1980 –Tafsut imaziɣen. Timlilit agi heggan-tt-id yelmeẓyen n taddart akken ad yili degs umekti. D acu ara d-nemekti ? A d-nesmekti yiwen n wergaz yemmuten. Argaz agi isem-is Maεmeṛ At Buxtuc, umi qqaṛen di nekkwa “Berdous  Mamar”. Ass-agi n 20 Yebrir i nextaṛ i waken a d-nebder eṛṛuḥ n Maεmeṛ At Buxtuc d ass isεan azal d ameqqran deg umezruy-nneɣ. Ata-n ihi nerra ass-a d tagnitt i deg ara t id-nesmekti ad fellas yeεfu ṛebbi. Ama d arraw n taddart-is i d-ḥelsen i leqdic agi, ama d nekwni s imeddukal-is d-tnecdem; yal yiwen segneγ iḥus lḥaoa ar zdaxel-is. Lḥaoa yagi d llzem yers-ed fellaɣ akken a d-nebder  ṛṛuḥ n Maεmeṛ. Llzem-agi aɣ yessiweḍ ɣer Tgemmunt ∑azzuz a d-nemlil i wesmekti. S tefṛansist, llzem agi qqaren-as: le deḍoir de mẓmoire et d’ẓḍocation. Llzem n webdar yettili ɣer loiha n win iɣaben yellan aεziz neɣ isεan azal i as yefka-n ccan n temγer. Assa mi nerra Maεmeṛ di temkant agi, yuklal-itt. 

  ∑addan wussan, εaddan isseggasen ilmeẓyen ttimγuren ḥdaoen ad slen i cfawat akken ad issinen amezruy. Llzem n webdar am akken d talast a tt fken wid d-icfan i wid meẓẓiyen, neγ bitt akw ur d lulen ara, akken a sen  mlen tidyanin umezruy i wumi ur d-cfin. Ilmeẓyen n wass-a, ma walan ansi d-ekkan, ad ẓran sani teddun.  

 Di tefsut n 1980, nek lliγ d anelmad di tesdawit. Ma nebder-ed tafsut n 1980 ass-a, ur nezmir ara a nettu widen iqublen amennuγ nni d-yeḍran. Aṭas degsen γaben fellane&amp;gamma,; garasen  Maεmeṛ yellan di lweqt nni ixeddem di lluzin “SONELEC” di Wed Aysi, umi qqaren ass-a “l’ENIEM”. Illa ger imezwura deg ixeddamen d-yersen γer ṛṛeḥba n umennuγ. Ama d l’ENIEM, takwebbanit deg ixeddem Maεmeṛ, ama d « LA SONITEX » n Dra Ben Xedda akw d sbiṭaṛ n Tizi Wezzu fkan-d tayett i Tesdawit s amennuγ mi d-yerna weγref di loeṛṛa-nnsen; yedwi-d am yiwen n wemdan ad sγersen asalu n ubrid n tlelli. 

 Ass n 20 yebrir d amulli yuγen amkan d ameqqran deg umezruy n timuzγa (la berbẓritẓ), deg umezruy n umennuγ γef Tmaziγt, γef izerfan, γef yiseγ. Maεmeṛ ad fellas yaεfu ṛebbi seg widen yeṭfen amkan d ameqqran deg umennuγ agi; seg imezwura i t id-yebdan. Ihi ass-a, yuklal ma neẓẓa isem-is deg umulli n tefsut n tmanyin: 20 Yebrir 1980.  

 Leqdic n wigad agi i aγ d-inecden γer Tgemmunt ∑azzuz akken a d-nebder Maεmeṛ, d ttalast nni i aγ ttalasen akw imeγnasen iγaben fellaneγ ass-a. Garasen Maεmeṛ. Ad a s nessiweḍ ṛṛeḥma γer laxert-is, a d-neched fellas s lxiṛ di ddunit-is. D ṭṭlaba id aγ ttalasen imeγnasen yecban tamtilt n Maεmeṛ,  akken a-nerr azal i wmennuγ-nnsen n yiḍelli, akken ad yuɣal d amennuɣ n lebda n yelmeẓyen n wass-a.

 Maεmeṛ d mmis n Tgemmunt ∑azzuz, nekni d ameddakel-nneγ. D ameddakel-nneγ deg umennuγ n tsertit  (le combat politique).  D ameddakel yeswan. Yeswa s tirugza, d bab n tidett, ddunit-is tebna γef tidett. Widak akk i t yessnen, i t ixulḍen ufan γur-s ayagi d-qqareɣ-fellas. Ssnen-t s wa-ya. Yesbur leqder di ddunit, assa yerna ccan di laxeṛt-is.  Yuklal ayagi i s yuɣalen ass-a. 

 Deg wasmi i t ssne&amp;gamma,; ur as d-jebdeγ lekdeb, neγ ayen n diri. Ala ayen yesfan i yettawi di lǧeṛṛa-s. S waya, zemreɣ a d-iniɣ Maεmeṛ d sides n yergazen. Ama d isem-ines ama d tameddurt-is, tewwi-d ad ilin d amedya i yelmeẓyen n wass-a. S tefṛansist qqaren-as: une valeur d’exemple. 

 Maεmeṛ At Buxtuc ilul deg aseggass n 1945. Deg useggass n 1980 yella d argaz alemmas di laεmeṛ-is ala 35 iseggwasen kan, ixeddem di lluzin SONELEC di Wed Aysi. Ur ṭṭuqtent ara tezyiwin n Maεmeṛ di lweqt nni  i d-yersen γer ṛṛeḥba ad ennaγen. Maεmeṛ seg imexḍa i d-ikecmen di tfejrit γer tlemmast n umennuγ. Yella seg imezwura iggulen ur ḥniten, ur qebblen ad yaγ lεaṛ di tecḍaṭ n tmurt n Leqbayel. Di tefsut 1980, yezga-d seg imezwura id-yersen s amennuγ γef yiseγ (le combat pour la dignitẓ). S lmaεna n yiwet n tezlitt n teqbaylit n zik, nezmer a d-nini: Maεmeṛ seg widen yelsan abernus asmi yesbur yizem taḍuṭ. Maççi d leqdaε ma nenna-d fellas ayagi ass-a. 

 Di tefsut n 1980 i yesεadda Maεmeṛ lmerta tamezwarut n lḥebs. Yettwaḥbes di tsebḥit n 20 yebrir 1980. Seg wexxam-is i t iwin, zdat n tmeṭṭut-is d loiran-ines. Ddmen-t seg wussu ɣef lxemsa n tsebḥit. Syin akin yegra-d di lḥebs n Beṛwagiya netta d 23 imeddukal-is. Iṛuǧa dinna  akteṛ n sin wagguren akken ad icaṛaε di Mdiya. Di tagara, serḥen-as-ed, am netta am imeddukwal-is ass n 26 juin 1980; segmi yekker lehwel d ameqqwṛan di lweqt nni. 

 Xas ulama lhem yuγ akk medden, lmerta n lḥkem ucertuḥ tezga γef  Maεmeṛ. Aseggass kan akken d-yeffeɣ si lḥebs n Berwagiya, dlan-ed ɣer ɣures diɣen. Tikelt-a s nnefu i t ewwten. Ssufɣen-t si lxedma akken a d-sersen fellas laẓ, rnan-as nnefu ɣer Öṛwiba netta d kra n imeddukwal-s, garasen Said SADI si sbiṭaṛ, Rabah BENCHIKHOUN d BENTALEB Brahim si SONITEX n Dra Ben Khedda akk d MOUSSAOUI Khelaf  n l’ENIEM. Iqubel  diɣen  Maεmeṛ lmeḥna d-yeɣlin fellas alarmi tettwarfed neffyan nni i d-seɣlin fellas. Yenfa di tmurt-is ur yenɣi ur yukir akken is yenna Slimane AZEM.

 Maεmeṛ, ass-a atan di laxeṛt. Öebεa ger 23 imeddukwal nni yettwaḥebsen yides di tefsut n 1980 uɣen amkan ula d nnitni di laxert. Ma nebder-ed ass-a eṛṛuḥ n Maεmeṛ deg wass n umulli n 20 Yebrir, ur nezmir ara a-nettu wigad agi diɣen iɣaben fellaneɣ : Mhamed ROCHDI, BOUKRIF Salah, BACHA Mustapha, BENGHEZLI Mohend Achour, 

  Xas iεaddan fellas wanect-a n lehmum, Maεmeṛ iṭṭef di lḥeṛma-s. Ibedd am tgejdit yeṛsan, laεmeṛ imal neɣ yenquqel. Aṭas imedyaten ɣef tirugza n Maεmeṛ i zemreɣ a ten id-bedreɣ. Maççi d izli n cwiṭ. Maεmeṛ seg yergazen nni ur nesṭuqqut awal. D win yumnen s wayen ixeddem. Ixeddem lewqama s tmuγli n ubrid n sswab i deg iteddu di yal taswaεt. Nniɣ awen-d tirugza, yes-s i yebges tasebḥit m id-ikker. A d-bedreɣ yiwet si tegnatin umi ḥedreγ deg useggwass 1989, γef tiruggza n Maεmeṛ. Öamdane Achab yetthegi imir a d-yessufeγ adlis n tγuri n Tmaziγt umi isemma “Tira n Tmaziγt”. Maεmeṛ mazal-it imir ixeddem di lluzin “l’ENIEM” n Wed Aysi. D netta i ixedmen ttawil γer tkubanit n  “l’ENIEM” akken adlis nni a d-yettwaḍbaε dina di lluzin n “l’ENIEM”. Mi d-yeḥḍeṛ yestenya laεqed n wedlis nni, wulmen yedrimen a ten yezzwer Öamdane Achab i “l’ENIEM”. Maεmeṛ d amezwaru i yewwten γer loib-is ijbed-ed xemsa  imelyunen akken ad awḍen 22 imelyunen nni ilaqen i tkubbanit n “l’ENIEM”.

 Deg useggass nni 1989, mi d-serreḥ ddula i tlelli n ikabaren ntsertit, Maεmeṛ seg imezwura i d-yersen diγen γer ṛṛeḥba umennuγ akken ad nesben l’FFS. Netta d kra imeddukal-is a d-bedreγ garasen Nait Djoudi, Amar Zentar, Med Lahlou, Arezki Lakabi, …..yuzzel; ulac taxliot yeooa alarmi yuγal l’FFS d akabar unsib. Ulac tiγilt i d-iqublen Maεmeṛ, ur yuli yara fellas a d-yessisti lḥeqq-is. Yal cedda d-γeḍlen fellas iqubel-itt, yesseblε-tt. A wi t id-yerra-n d aεquq n zzariεa n yergazen ad frurxen am netta.

 Tameddurt n Maεmeṛ tεabba tidett  terna tissas, laxeṛt-is tecεel am lefnaṛ d-yiwwin tafat i webrid n yelmeẓyen n wass-a ad ddun di lewqama. 

 Tizi Wezzu, ass n  12 Yebrir2015

<p style="text-align: right;">Aṛab Aknine             

  
 Deg tdiwennit-a, newwi-d awal ɣef umecwar n umedyaz Tchamouh neɣ Zatri Mohammed s yisem-is aḥeqqani, akked wayen icuɣben amedyaz aqbayli s umata.

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen: Deg tazwara, anwa i d Tchamouh, ciṭ seg umecwar-ik ? 

 Tchamouh Zatri: Bdiɣ seffruyeɣ deg temẓi-iw. Deg useggas n 1978 i bdiɣ ttcudduɣ imeslayen, imir-nni lliɣ qqareɣ deg uɣerbaz alemmas n Tegzirt. Syin ɣer-s deg useggas n 1983, i ttṣeggimeɣ isefra-w akken iwata lḥal. Syin akkin, ɣriɣ adlis-nni “Isefra n Si Muḥend u Mḥend”, i yura Mulud Mɛemmri. Deg-s i d-refdeɣ tamussni yeqqnen ɣer tmedyazt, dɣa xedmeɣ isefra s tmeɣrut, xedmeɣ isefra s tesɛa n yifyar…atg. Tin ɣur-s, rniɣ ɣriɣ isefra n Muḥya. Yerna imir-nni yewɛar lḥal, ula d adlis-agi s tufra i t-id-wwiɣ. Seg 1983 d asawen, bdiɣ xeddmeɣ tamekfaḍut (animation) n tmeɣriwin. Cfiɣ ɣef tmeɣra tamezwarut akk i xedmeɣ deg yiseggasen n 90, deg taddart-iw Tahanouts, d nettat i yi-fkan afud i wakken ad kemmleɣ. Deg useggas n 1987, nexdem-d yiwet n terbaɛt n ccna n yilmeẓyen nekk akked ucennay Karim Khelfaoui, cwiṭ cwiṭ armi i d-ufiɣ iman-iw d amedyaz n 660 n yisefra.

  Acimi i tbeddleḍ isem i yiman-ik? 

 Mačči d nekk i ibeddlen isem-iw. Am wakken teẓram akk, belli deg temẓi nettsemmi gar-nneɣ s warrac ismawen n imnugra neɣ isem amzayed. Ulamma nekk isem-iw “Mohammed” maca imeddukkal-iw n temẓi ssawalen-iyi “Tchamouh”. Dɣa ula deg tesfifin i xedmeɣ semmaɣ-asent s yisem-agi amnagru. Tura akka, deg temnaḍt-iw n Ouagenoun, ssnen akk Tchamouh ur ssinen ara Mohammed Zatri.

  I limer ur d ak-semman ara akka, ma ad teggeḍ isem n unaẓur? 

 Limer qqimeɣ kan deg tmedyazt, ahat ur ttsemmiɣ ara i yiman-iw isem amzayed, maca imi xeddmeɣ timeɣriwin dɣa ṭṭfeɣ deg yisem-agi n Tchamouh. D icennayen iqdimen i ibeddlen ismawen-nsen s lebɣi-nsen, ma d nekk mačči d lebɣi-w, iɛedda-iyi rray akken qqaren.

  Acu n tewsit n tmedyazt swayes tessefruyeḍ? 

 Asmi bdiɣ akk, lliɣ xeddmeɣ isefra s tarrayt taqdimt, tinna sexdamen waṭas n yimedyazen-nniḍen. Ssefreɣ aṭas s lqaleb-nni n Si Muḥend u Mḥend, Ccix Muḥend u Lḥusin, syin akkin s lqaleb n Muḥend u Yeḥya. Ma d tura akka, ssefruyeɣ s tmedyazt-agi tatrart, i swayes ssefruyen ddeqs n yimedyazen.

  Ulamma deg useggas n 1983 i tebdiḍ tessefruyeḍ, maca armi d 1996 i d-tessufɣeḍ album-ik amezwaru? 

 Tewɛer tmedyazt mliḥ i usuffeɣ, ama zik ama tura. Ulamma uqbel aseggas n 1983 i bɣiɣ ad d-ssufɣeɣ tasfift-iw tamezwarut “Scorpion”, ideg llan 29 n yisefra n tmetti akked teḍsa. Imir-nni daɣen ur d- suffuɣen ara imazragen idlisen s tmaziɣt neɣ tikasiḍin, ladɣa tamedyazt.

  Syin akkin daɣen, teqqimeḍ 10 n yiseggasen i wakken ad d-ternuḍ tis snat, i wacuɣer? 

 Am tmenzut-agi kif kif, d amazrag i yi-sɛeṭṭlen mačči d nekk, tili ur ttɣamaɣ ara 10 n yiseggasen i wakken ad ssufɣeɣ tasfift iwejden yakan. Maca, qqimeɣ alarmi d 2006, i d-ufiɣ amazrag i iqeblen, i yi-d-yessuffeɣ tamedyazt-iw. Tasfift-agi tis snat i wumi semmeɣ “Lḥenni”, tagi sekecmeɣ-d cwiṭ n tsertit deg yisefra-agi.

  Neẓra belli tamedyazt-ik, temmal aṭas ɣer uɣanib n Meɛtub, amek armi? 

 Teɛjeb-iyi aṭas tmedyazt n ucennay-nneɣ ameqqran Lwenas Meɛtub, ladɣa tizlatin-nni-ines n tewsit n cceɛbi. Imir teshel i wakken ad txedmeḍ asefru fell-as, teshel daɣen i lefhama. Dɣa xeddmeɣ s lmusiga-nni imeslayen, i wakken mi ara d-yas yiwen ad yawi asefru, ad as-iniɣ ḍfer kan lḥen n tezlit filan seg tezlatin n Meɛtub, ma d lmusiga ad as-yexdem netta.

  Ahat d timesliwt i tselleḍ aṭas i Lwennas, daymi teddiḍ deg ubrid-is? 

 Ala, limer d lḥaǧa n tmesliwt, tili smeḥsiseɣ aṭas deg temẓi-w i At Mengellat. Tili ad Ssefruɣ s uɣanib-nni-ines, imi taẓuri am ṭṭejra, yal wa ad yawi afurk-is. Llan wid i xeddmen s lqaleb n Fahem, s win Sliman Ɛazem…atg.

  Aṭas n yisefra-inek i yettwacnan deg tezlatin n waṭas n yicennayen… 

 Awal tezwareḍ-d deg-s, d tidet aṭas n yicennayen n temnaḍt-iw Ouageunoun i wumi fkiɣ isefra-w, cnan-ten deg tesfifin-nsen, maca ur d-qqareɣ ara ismawen-nsen. Ur ttakeɣ ara ula d ismawen n tezlatin-agi, axaṭer ma ulac iban win i tent-iɣennan, ulamma llan wid yeẓran annect-a. Yerna zik awi-d kan ad as-tefkeḍ i ucennay asefru, ur nessin ara izerfan-nneɣ, mačči am tura, mi nessen l’ONDA, yettḥaraben ɣef yizerfan-nneɣ.

  Acimi ur d-teqqareḍ ara ismawen-nsen? 

 Ma nwala tuget n tesfifin n waṭas n yicennayen, ttarun s ufella imeslayen (isefra) akked lmusiga d ayla-s. Maca, tikkwal isefra yewwi-ten-id ɣer umedyaz-nniḍen, acu kan ur d-yeqqar ara, amek i tebɣiḍ nekk ad ak-id-iniɣ. Acku daɣen ma nniɣ-d ad ten-iɣiḍ lḥal aṭas, imi am wakken ad asen-d-tesneqseḍ seg lqima-nsen. Ma tenniḍ-as ad yeddu yisem-iw ad yagi, limer d lebɣi-k ay ul ma yesɛa yiwen ṣṣut yelḥa, ur yesɛi ara imeslayen yelḥan, ad d-yawi ɣer wayeḍ, yerna ad iseddu isem n winna, meɛna ifennanen-nneɣ kulec-ines.

  Ihi tɛemdeḍ ad immečč lḥeqq-ik? 

 Ɛemdeɣ s tidet ad yemmečč lḥeqq-iw, imi am wakken i d-nniɣ yakan, zik nferreḥ aṭas mi ara as-nefk i ucennay asefru, yerna nqebbel ur d-yetteddu ara yisem-nneɣ deg tesfift-nni. Nekk d yiwen ferḥeɣ ayen din mi ara sleɣ i usefru-inu yecna-t yiwen deg tezlit, maca ur inekmal ara lferḥ-iw imi ulac isem-iw deg-s. Dɣa deg kra n tmeɣriwin i xedmeɣ d kra n yifennanen i wumi fkiɣ isefra-w, ṭṭalaben-iyi-d i nekk i wakken ad tent-id-awiɣ, imi ẓran belli-inu.

  Ma tzemmreḍ ad aɣ-tefkeḍ kra n yismawen n yifennanen ukkud txedmeḍ timeɣriwin? 

 Xedmeɣ aṭas n tmeɣriwin akked waṭas n yifennanen, bdu-tt-id seg wid n temnaḍt-iw, yecban: Fahem Mohammed Said, Ali Ferhati, Karim Khelfaoui, Mouh Oubelid…atg. Am wakken daɣen i xedmeɣ d yicennayen imeqqranen yecban: Akli Yehiaten, Rabah Asma, Belkhir Mouhend Akli, Chikh El Mahdi, Slimani, Raoues…atg.

  Neḥsa belli, tesmenyifeḍ isefra n yimeṭṭawen d wid n teḍsa ɣef wiyaḍ-nniḍen? 

 Ḥemmleɣ ad ten-id-awiɣ aṭas deg tmeɣra. Imi d lferḥ, ttawiɣ-d wid n teḍsa, wid lferḥ, wid n ddunit, wid n tayri. Maca ur d-ttawiɣ ara wid n leḥzen, wid n lefraq akked wid n tsertit…atg. Wigi s umata, qqareɣ-ten-id deg rradyu, deg uxxam n yidles akked tmeɣriwin n tiddukkliwin tidelsanin. D tidet s sin-agi isental iɣef ssefreɣ aṭas deg 660 n yisefra i yuriɣ ar tura, maca llan wiyiḍ, yecban wid n tegmat, wid i d-yettawin ɣef watmaten, ɣef tudert n umdan…atg.

  Tenniḍ-d yakan deg useggas yezrin, tesɛiḍ album amaynut, acimi iɛeṭṭel? 

 Limer ufiɣ tili yeffeɣ-d deg useggas iɛeddan, maca mazal ur d-ufiɣ ara amazrag ukkud ara xedmeɣ, win i wumi tenniḍ, ad ak-yinni tamedyazt ur tettnuzu ara deg ssuq. Maca sya ɣer taggara n 2018 ad yili deg ssuq, imi d tamsalt kan n lweqt mačči d tamsalt n yidrien.

  Ma txemmeḍ ad tecnuḍ isefra-k deg tezlatin, neɣ tira-nsen deg yidlisen? 

 Deg tazwara, xemmeɣ ɣer usuffeɣ-nsen deg yidlisen, imi imir-nni nekk ur ssineɣ ara tamaziɣt yerna ur d-ufiɣ ara win i yiɛawnen deg wannect-a, dɣa ǧǧiɣ tira. Maca yezmer lḥal ad yaweḍ wass ad d-fɣen d idlisen. Ma d tamsalt n ccna, asmi akken ara cnuɣ ur cniɣ ara, imi deg temẓi-w d nekk i d amezwaru deg yifennanen-agi n temnaḍt-agi-innu i yesɛan tagiṭart, mi walaɣ belli ur d as-ssineɣ ara dɣa senzeɣ-tt. Yerna tura yeǧǧa-iyi ṣṣut ḥlawen imi wessreɣ deg leɛmer.

  Awal-ik n taggara… 

 Tamezwarut, ad awen-iniɣ tanemmirt s tussda i kunwi d uɣmis-nwen « La Dépêche de Kabylie », tis snat tanemmirt i wid iqeddcen akk deg uḥric n yidles ladɣa idles aqbayli neɣ amaziɣ s umata. Tanemmirt daɣen i wid i yi-iḥemmlen d wid i yi-slen, ssarameɣ ad iliɣ fessuseɣ fell-asen yerna ad xeddmeɣ ayen ara ten-yessefraḥen.

  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Fɣend ass larebɛa iɛeddan sbaḥ azal 200 twaculin id-yesfayden si tnezduɣin AADL 2001,2002 xeddmen timesbaniyin zdat lwekla AADL di temdint n tubiret anda ssuturen seg yimḍebren lwilaya n tubiret iwakken ad ggren iman nsen ɣef yiṣenfaren -agi n tnezduɣin i mazal werɛad bdan lecɣal yerna aṭas-ayagi mi ten-mmuden uṣenfar ,ɛlaḥsab imjerden di lwekla n AADL nnan-d akken ceyɛen akk lekwaɣeḍ nsen seg useggas n 2002 dacu ami d 2013 ssutren-d seg -sen ad ɛiwden lekwaɣeḍ s yin akkin meḥsub ar ass-a d wussan ur d-ceyɛin ula d lkaɣeḍ ɣef wayen yeɛnan lexlas n uḥric amezwaru ara xellsen imi tuget lwilayat bdant lexlas n wid yesfayden si tnezduɣin-agi n AADL imi xellsen akk aḥric amenzu , dayen yeǧǧan imesbaniyin sbegnen-d lɣiḍ nsen ɣef uɣbel-a i mazal ttrajun acḥal d iseggasen-aya imi zedɣen akka tura d yir liḥala am wakken ssuturen seg yimḍebren teɛna temsalt ladɣa lwali n tubiret ad asen-d sfehmen dacu n tsebbiwin yeǧǧan aṣenfar-agi 13 iseggasen ur d-iban yiqiḥ fell-as nutni ttrajun amaynut n tnezduɣin-agi iten-icuɣben imi tinezduɣin ideg ttidiren akka tura tuget deg-sen d lkerya i yekran yerna s suma yeɣlayen ma d wiyaḍ zedɣen deg ixerban akk d iqdimen bɣan ad aɣllin ttazalen akk d aman di tallit-agi n tegrest ɣef waya ttuɣun i yimḍebren lwilya ad ggren iman nsen akken ad d-afen tifrat di beddu lebni tnezduɣin . Si tama nniḍen yella-d ass larebɛa daɣen uɣlaq n tɣiwant deg at leɛziz id -yezgan deg ugafa lwilaya n tubiret s ɣur wid ur d-yesfayden ara si tedwilt 47 tnezduɣin anda ssuturen si lwali akken ad iceyaɛ si lwilaya wid ara iɛawden tamuɣli lejrida n tnezduɣin id- sbeggen tɣiwant azal 15 wussan aya fell-as , acku ttwalin akken llant kra n twaculin ur zwarent ara ad sfaydint si tnezduɣin imi llant tiwaculin i yuklalen fell-asent imi ttidiren daw iqiḍunen ixxamen akk xerben ur zmirzn ara akk ad idiren deg-sen yerna d tikelt tis snat iɣelqen taɣiwant anda ssutren s uɛiwed lejrid n tnezduɣin nniḍen . 

  
 Muḥya : isem-is aḥeqqani : Muḥya Ablellah neɣ Muḥend u Yeḥya, ilul deg umenzu n unbir 1950 deg Yiɛezzugen. D amyaru n tecqufin n umezgun, d amedyaz, d win i d-yessuqlen aṭas n leqdicat si tutlayin tibarraniyin ɣer teqbaylit. Yesɛeda Muḥya tallit n temzi-is deg Yiɛezzugen, syin uɣalen yimawlan-is i wakken ad idiren di Tizi Uzzu. Yeẓwar aṭas deg uɣerbaz : yeɣra di tesnawit n Amirouche n Tizi Uzzu. Yewwi-d akayad n Bac deg useggas n 1972 akken iwata, d ayen i t-yeǧǧan ad ikemmel leqraya n tusnakt deg tesdawit n Lezzayer. Syin, ijarred deg yiwet n temsizzelt akken ad yekcem ɣer uɣerbaz n tkebbanit n waman di tmurt n Fransa di temdint n Strasgourg. Mi yella di lɣerba, yekcem ɣer ugraw anda lemden ɣef Yimaziɣen , syin yeṭṭef asebtar deg yiwet n tesɣunt i d-yessufuɣ ugraw-a (Buletin d’etude berbère ) , syin yesselmed tamaziɣt deg ACB. Asmi i yella di tmurt, yeɣra timsirin n tmaziɣt i d-ixeddem Mulud Mammeri di tesdawit. Muḥya, d win yettarun aṭas isefra gar-asen : Taḥya berzidan, A mmarezg-nneɣ , wigi ffɣen-d di tesɣunt Tisuraf. Aṭas n yisefra-s i yecnat Ferḥat Imazighen imula. Ula d Takfarinas yecna asefru Awid iheddren fell-i. Ma d Malika domrane tecna Aḍellaɛ yeqarsen. Ay arrac-nneɣ sɣur Yidir, asefru “Tarebget” i yexdem Ɛmer Mezdad di tazwara n tmacahut Tafunas yigujilen. tugget n yisental n Muḥya d ayen icudden ɣer tnemgit Tamaziɣt . Ma yella nuɣal-d ɣer tullissin d tmucuha, ad nemmagar tullissin i yettwaseklen di tkasiḍin : Tamacahut n Lqannan , Asmi nxeddem le théatre , wwet. Akken daɣen, llant aṭas n tid ur d- nettusekles ara ar ass-a. Ma yella deg umzgun, yexdem tasuqqilt i waṭas n tecqufin n umezgun gar-asent : En attendant Godot i yerra s yisem Am win yettrajun Rebbi n Samuel Beckett , La decision yerra-tt-id : Aneggaru ad d-yerr tawwurt , L’exception et la régle n Bertolt Brecht , la Jarre tuɣal Tacbaylit n Luigi Pirandello , Le Ressuscité n umyaru Lu Xun n tmurt n la chine ifka-as azwel n Muḥend U Ceɛban. Taneggarut-a, tettwasen aṭas , d ayen i tt-yeǧǧan teffeɣ-d d asaru. Yewweḍ Muḥya leɛfu n Rebbi ass n 7 duǧember 2004 di temdint n Paris. 

  S.Yamani 

  
 Taggara n ddurt-a yezrin – amhad, sem, ed sed – tella tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel d rreḥba n yimeɣnasen n yidles amaziɣ i d-yerzan seg waṭas n tamiwin n Tmurt n Yizwawen akked temnaḍin timaziɣin nniḍen. Kraḍ n wussan-n ihi llan d wid yeččuren d armuden idelsanen; seg umsiẓwer n tmedyezt ɣer yisaragen yemgarraden, ɣer temzikknin yeṭṭuqten, ɣer tnezzuyin n ubuddu n ddeqs n yimyura, war ma nettu asenɛet n yirupurtajen akked ttiɛad n ccna i as-d-yellan i tnaẓurt tinebgit n yiseɣ massa Malika Dumran. Deg teldayt tunsibt ihi yezzwar deg wawal uselway ilemẓi n Tidukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad mass Fares Bakkuc anida i yesnubget s yisem n yiɛeggalen n Tdukkla s wid akk i d-yerzan ɣer Udrar n Fad, rnu yesmekta-d ayen tettag akka tdukka s wudem n tejmilt i Dda Lmulud At Mɛemmer d asemmed deg umennuɣ i d-tewwi seg wacḥal-aya. Anmazul n uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel mass Sadeq n Ayt Urbaɛ yella-yas-d daɣen wawal, imi dɣa netta yemmeslay tazwara s yisem n Usqamu Aɣerfan n Ayt Smaɛel send ad yesnemmer imedyazen mi ɛewwlen s timmeɣnest-nsen ad rzunɣer Ayt Smaɛel ɣas xesren yiberdan, syin ɣer-s iceyyeɛ tiɣri i yimedyazen ad kemmlen aqeddic ugar deg usnerni n tutlayt-nneɣ. Ma yella Malika Dumran ur d-telḥiq ara ass n lexmis zik, almi i d-tenna awal-is ass n lǧemɛa, d win swayes tesnemmer ladɣa Tidukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad ɣef wayen tettag deg wannar n yidles. Gar wayen i d-yellan d armuden, llant-d ddeqs n temzikknin i walmend, am tin n tnaẓurt n uplastik Suzzane Gouhot i yeslemden ddeqs n tlufa i warrac. Seg tama n yisaragen, ad d-naf dakken mass Ɛli Syad, i d-yewwin ɣef wawal n tlawin, akked massa Buxellu Malika Faṭima i d-yewwin ɣef wudmawen n twetmin deg wayen yura Mulud At Mɛemmer, rnu-yas Wataḥ Linda i d-yewwin ɣef wurar n lxalat ama n zik ed tura, akked yisefra i d-ttawint. Wi merra d wid i yesmursen deg wayen i d-gan, ma neẓra dakken azayez yeḍfer akken ilaq isragen n yisaragen-a i yeɣɣentren d abaɣur. Tameɣra n ccna n Malika Dumran i yellan tettwarǧa aṭas, tella-d taggara deg wass wis sin mettwal 21sr30 sdat n twinas n medden i d-yerzan seg waṭas n tamiwin akken ad walin tanaẓurt tettawi-d deg Udrar n Fad tizlatin-is icebḥen. Tameɣra tdum isragen lwaḥi daɣen d kra n yicennayen ilemẓiyen n taddart n Ayt Smaɛel am mass Wali ɛebdelɣani. Ma yella deg wass n sed, win n useqqef, yella-d ladɣa usenɛet n yirupurtajen n yimedyazen i d-yufraren deg teẓrigt n 2014. Ma d igmaḍ (résultats) unsiben n temzizzelt, deg wakud-a gedged ideg nettaru amagrad, werɛad i d-banen yismawen n yimedyazen i d-yufraren. Ad d-nuɣal s wugar n yisallen ddurt i d-iteddun. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Tameɣra n lfetta teldi tiwwura-s ass-nni n lhedd 03 seg aggur n yulyu s unehdur n umgensas n tnemhalt n tmerrayt, aselway n tghiwant n umièur d win n At yanni Mass Deɣul smaɛil d kra n yimuzar. ‘’tindi d tdamsa’’ d azwel is as-yettunefken i tezrigt-agi tis 12.Aseggas yezrin, azal n 40000n yimerrayen id-yerzan ɣer tmeɣra n lfetta anida ttekkan ugar n91 n yiheddaden id-isersen timzikniyin-nsen akken i llant lhirfat-niden di ttiɛad am tala$t, taqendurt n leqbayel… d wayen niden. Ma d ass n Acer(lhedd), yerza une$laf ntmerrayt d tindi ’’ɛemmar el £oul’’ ɣer t$iwant n At yanni, ibda tirza_ines seg uxxam n yilmezyen Keddac ɛli, iɛedda $ef iheddaden, syin ikemmel abrid-is ɣer uɣerbaz alemmas’ ’Lɛerbi Mezzani’adeg agejdan anida id-sersen iheddaden lfetta-nsen.Din i as yettunefk i Mass El £ul asawad, yenna-d deg awal-is belli ad yeldi axxam n lhirfat d usalay di tazwara n Tuber i la d-iteddun akken ad tessehbiber tenmadt–-agi id-yettaooa ubabat i mmi-s. Akken i d-yemmeslay ɣef usefeɣ n sselɛa -agi ɣer berra n tmurt.Di taggara, yeddem Mass Deɣɣul Smaɛil yefka-as asefk i uneghlaf,syin kemmlen s asensu ‘’ameclux n lfetta ‘’anida i fetren, deg ubrid-nsen ɛeddan $ef temdelt n uzamul n tmazɣa Mulud at Mɛemmer, sterhmen ɣef rruh-is. Yella-d usali n tme$ra n lfetta ass n loemɛa 07 seg aggur –agi aneggaru n $uct deg u$erbaz alemmes ‘’Lɛerbi Mezzani’’anida i fkan igerdasen i yiheddaden i yettekkan di tmeɣra- –agi akken id-sbegnen lferh –nsen imi tɛedda tmeɣra-agi di sser d liser ɣas akknen maci atas imerrayen i d-yusan aseggas-as ɣef tezrigin iɛeddan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Lameyya Urak  

  
 Tanmehla n yidles, tanmehla n Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer, tasdawit Mulud At Mεemmer, Tiddukla tadelsant “Said Boulifa” n Adni d tiddukla tadelsant “Isseɣ” n Souama. Suddsen-d ass-nni n lḥed, 10/10/2016, yiwet n tezrewt deg uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, ideg i d-wwin awal sin yiselmaden n tutlayt n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu: Said Chemakh d Ali Bekhti ɣef ‘’Tesnarayt n uselmed n tutlayt n tmaziɣt’’, ɣer umaru ameqqran Si Amar ou Said Boulifa. Meslayen-d ɣef wayen yura d wayen i d-yefka i tutlayt n tyemmat, d tarrayt-is deg uselmed n tmaziɣt.

 Am wakken daɣen, i d-tella temsikent d usenεet n yidlisen yura Boulifa, d wayen tura tɣamsa fell-as, ama ɣef tudert-is, ama ɣef tira-s neɣ tmussni-is i d-thegga tiddukla tadelsant yewwin isem “Boulifa”. Tella-d, diɣen, yiwet n tnigit sɣur Boulifa Chabane, yiwen uεeggal gar yiεegglan n twacult n Said Boulifa, u d aεeggal, daɣen, deg Tiddukla tadelsant “Boulifa” n taddart n Adni, deg tama n Larbâa Nath Irathen (LNI). 

 Ma ɣer taggara n wass, yella-d usenεet n yiwen n usaru i d-yewwin ɣef tudert n umaru-agi ameqqran, d wayen akk yura. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli Si Amar ou Said Boulifa, ilul deg useggas n 1961 deg taddart n Adni, deg tama n Larbâa Nath Irathen (LNI). Yeɣra aṭas n leqran d tefransist. Gar yimezwura i ixedmen deg wannar n tamziɣt, yura aṭas n tewsatin n yidlisen. Gar wayen yura deg tsekla tamaziɣt, ad d-nebder, ammud n tmedyazt n teqbaylit, Lezzayer 1904. Deg tesnalsit: tarrayt n tutlayt n tmaziɣt (timsirin n useggas wis sin), Lezzayer 1913. Deg umezruy “Djurdjura à travers l’histoire : depuis l’Antiquité jusqu’en 1830», Lezzayer 1925. Yemmut ass n 08 deg yulyu 1931.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Tasebḥit n wass n 27 maγres 2016, tella-d tulya tunsibt n tezrigt tis 07 n tfaska Taγuri s wurar, deg wexxam n yedles n Lmulud At Mεemmar n temdint n Tizi-Wezzu, s leḥdur n umaray amatu n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu mass Zineddine Tibourtine, tanemhalt n yedles n Tizi-Wezzu massa Nabila Goumeziane, akked twacult n yedles d ttrebga, akken ifursent deqs n twaculin tagnit anda id-wwin tarwa-nsen akken asen-d-aγen idlisen. Imawlan n yinelmaden ḥedren s tuget tafaska-agi Taγuri s Wurar, i yellan temgarad γef tid yezrin, imi aseggas-a yella-d umaynut, anda id-skecmen yiwet n terkkent yesεan azal aṭas, taggi d tarkkent n tusna. Imḍebren n tfaska-agi jarden yiwen n wahil wessiεen u d amesbaγur, ara yeddun γef teγzi n 07 n wussan, u yebḍan γef aṭas n yaḥricen, akken ad-ṣiwḍen ad-sqarben adlis γer yemdanen s lεamur yemgaraden xarṣum arac imecṭaḥ, imi aqcic yeqqaren d argaz n uzekka, d tafat n tudert, d tasarut swayes ara-ldint tewwura usirem. Timzikkent n yedlisen id-yesduri wexxan n yedles n Lmulud n At-Mεemmar ukkan deg-s nnig n 15 n tezrigin yemgaraden, id-yewwin idlisen yemgaraden i ittewxeṣen i warac imecṭaḥ, am tmucuha, tullisin id-ijebden lwelha i warac imecṭaḥ s yisental yemgaraden. Akken llan yedlisen s yisental niḍen, id-yettmeslayen γef umezruy n tegrewla tazzayrit i uressax n cfawat deg allaγen n warac akken at-id-affent tsutiwin id-iteddun, rnu idlisen n tusna i usebγes n yedles sumata. Akken ijarden deg ahil leqdic deqs n tmesbaniyin tidelsanin, ger-asent timliliyin γef amek id-yettili tira n tmucuha anda ara-d-yilli timzizelt n tmacahut yelhan di tfaska-agi, ara-d-yufraren deg wemḍiq amenzwaru. Γer yidis n waya, llan isaragen γef uḥareb d usaḥbiber n warac mgal cwal d imarẓi. Tamesbanit-agi ad-tennal deqs n temnaḍin niḍen n wakkal n Tizi-Wezzu, akken arac imectaḥ i izedγen deg idurar ad-sfaydin s wahil n tfaska-agi, iwesbγes-nsen di tγuri d tmusni. Axxam n leqbayel i yettwebnan deq wefrag n wexxam n yedles n Lmulud At-Mεemmar,yerna-d cbaḥa nezzah, imi deg-s id-tillint temliliyin ideg id-wwin timucuha i warac sumata. Ula d arrac imuḍan i yellan d isbiṭarat ad-sfaydin s tfaska-agi, imi tisquma n warac imecṭaḥ d yemḍebren n wexxam n yedles n Lmulud n At-Mεemmar, rrzan γer sbiṭarat yemgaraden yellan deg akkal n Tizi-Wezzu, akken ad-ksen lxiq. Tagara n tfaska-agi ad-tilli ass n 02 yebrir 2016, u leqdic yettεedday di tegnatin yelhan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

<p style="text-align: right;">

  
Γas akken llan wid yebγan ad-xelqen takna i wegraw n Ṣummam, maca deqs n leqdicat id-ittewheggan γef dema n 20 γuct di temnaḍin yemgaraden n tmurt n leqbayel, ass ideg id-yeḍra wegraw n Summam deg yefri uzellagen lwilaya n Bgayet deg seggas n 1956, d tamesbanit tamazrayt i iṛeṣṣan lsas iṣeḥan i tegrewla Tazzayrit. Tasqamut n taddert Acallam, taγiwant n Yifiγa, s lemεawna n tiddukla tadelsant « Ḥend Ulqaḍi » n taddert Acallam, sudsen-d yiwen n leqdic meqren s usentel,  » Acallam, Taddukli, Laεtab, Lḥerma… », anda id-tella tulya n sin n yisebdaden imazrayen, amenzu d asebdad n 28 n yimeγrasen i yeγlin deg ugni n liser di tegrewla n 54/62, wis sin d asebdad n Ḥend Ulqaḍi, agellid n Kukudi lqarn wis 16, i illulen deg akkal n taddert Acallam. Ḥend Ulqaḍi meqqar ccan-is, imi di tallit nni deg tebda txetti teftilt n Yimaziγen yeṭṭfen adabu ( di Spania, di Fas, Di Tlemsan akk di Tunes, kkrent-d snat n tmura bγant ad ččent ddunit, tigi d Spanya n Imasiḥiyen akked Turk n Yenselmen. Asmi yella akken i tarεed tegnit, rraεden yergazen izmawen, gar-asen id-iban Ḥend Ulqaḍi. Imi aken id-yeẓdem Spenyul γef tefriqt ad tt-yečč, yekker Ḥend Ulqaḍi, yella lawan nni d lewkil Uḥafṣi di Buna ad d-iqqurre&amp;epsilon,; yusa-d Baba Σerruğ aterki ad iεiwen Ḥend Ulqaḍi di lweqt ideg ttnaγen meddeen s yemguğa, netta yessawal i wegdud γer lğihad seg 1514 ar 1520.Ḥend Ulqaḍi ijemeε-d akk tamurt n Lzzayer d tamanaγt armi d 1527 neγ 1529, yeεna-t-id Xeyr-ddin, gma-s n Baba Σarruğ, s lemḥella yefka-yas-tt-id ugellid n Aterkki, maca Xeyr-ddin yugad Ḥend Ulqaḍi id tt-yesεeddan yakan fell-as, dγa ixelleṣ win ara t-yenγen. Deg ass-en yuγal yeṭṭef adabu di Lzzayer. 
<div style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci  
  
 Deg wussan-agi iɛeddan i d-yessufeɣ Mass Kader Bouacherine yiwen udlis n tirawalt. Deg udlis-a, ad naf yal asentel s temsirt-is, anda i d-yessegza s telqayt amahil-agi-ines. Leqdic am wa, yezmer ad yili d ttawil i wid yebɣan ad lemden tira n tmaziɣt, ama d inelmaden neɣ wid-nniḍen imi d-yewwi ɣef wuguren n tirawalt n tutlayt s umata. Timsirin-a, d tid yesselmed asmi yella Mass Bouacherine d aselmad n tmaziɣt u d tid yesselmad akka tura deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri. Gar yinelmaden yellan akka tura ɣur-s, ad naf : isdawanen, imedyazen, d wiyaḍ i d-yusan kan akka ad lemden tira… Afud igerrzen i Mass Bouacherine.

<p style="text-align: right;"> H.M 

  
 Ma yella imennuɣen akked ṭṭradat i d-yellan di talliyin tiburin neɣ tura, gellunt-d s twaɣiyin neɣ lmut n yimdanen, ad naf dakken ugur n lehyuf, yeɣleb s uzgen tiwaɣiyin-a imi tḥuz akk imezdaɣ yettidiren deg umaḍal. D acu i d lehyuf ? S wacu i d-igellu? Amek ara t-nessenger neɣ ara t-nessenqes deg tudert n umdan ?

 Lehyuf, d yiwen n uɛeqqar i d-yettak ugama neɣ i d-xeddmen yimdanen i wakken ad t-smersen di tegnit n wugur. Awal-a, yella seg zik, d awal i d-yekkan seg tutlayt n ‘’Neerlandais’’ di tmurt n ‘’ la Hollande’’. Ma nuɣal kan cwiṭ ɣer deffir, ad naf deg uwines wis 20, deg useggas n 1909, aslagan yefka azref n ufaris d tnezzuyt n lehyuf , d rray-a swayes i d-ssuffɣen isaragen i d-yellan deg yiseggasen 1961, 1971 d 1988. Ma nɛedda ɣer tewsatin n lehyuf, ad tent-naf bḍant ɣef sin n yiḥricen Aḥric amenzu: lehyuf afessas neɣ ur nqesseḥ ara. Amedya : (Caféine): yettili deg usafar n lqahwa (Théine): yettili deg latay (Cannabis): d win i wumi neqqar “lkif” (Nicotine): yettil deg dexxan akked cemma Ssenf-agi n lehyuf, xas fessusit, maca mi ara yesṭuqqet umdan seg-sen, ad ten-neṭṭḍen.

 Aḥric wis sin, d lehyuf qessiḥen. Tagi d tawsit i ttagaden akk yimdanen, d isem-is i d awal-is, ad naf seg-sent cocaïne akked héroïne. Asafar-a neɣ aɛeqqar-a n lehyuf ẓran akk yimdanen, ama d wid i t-ixeddmen, ama wid i t-itessen, dakken diri-t, yettawi-d anagar uguren i umdan s timmad-is akked tmetti ideg yettidir. Tamuɣli-a, tebna ɣef yifukal-agi: Tamezwarut, yessafag leɛqel seg wallaɣ n umdan, yettuɣal am uɣersiw neɣ ahat ugar, imi annect-a, yessawaḍ ɣer umennuɣ, tiwaɣiyin n tenhert, lmut…atg Tis snat, aɛeeqqar-a, yetthuddu tadawsa n umdan imi yezga idux, d awraɣ, tikwal ur itett ara, acku tettruḥu-as lmuna. Tis kradet, yesseɣlay azal i umdan “ xas ma yella d uḥric am yizem, ad yuɣal ad t-nehren medden am uɣyul” Akken i d-yenna Slimane Azem deg wawal-is. Tis ukkuzet, lehyuf, ixellu lǧib imi ayen i d-yewwi wass ad t-yečč yiḍ. Annect-a, yettawi amdan ɣer utɛeddi ɣef yixxamen akked tukerḍa, i wakken ad d-aɣen asafar ara ten-yessersen si tussḍa. Ɣer taggara, i wakken ad d-yili usenqes seg yiɛeqqaren-a di tmetti, yessefk ɣef uwanak d yimawlan ad d-fken afus n tallelt i yimdanen-a s usedwel yelhan iwenɛen, ama deg yiɣerbazen neɣ deg twaculin akked tmetti.

<p style="text-align: right;">   Benmouhoub Houria d Djirou Faiza  

 
  
 Ass-nni n lexmis yezrin 05 tuber 2017, i mden 29 n yiseggasen ɣef tedyanin n tnekra n 05 tuber 1988. Ffɣen-d yilmeẓyen n Bab Lwad deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt s iberdan, akken ad iẓẓifen, ad xedmen timesbaniyin, ad reglen iberdan…atg, i wakken kan ad ssiwḍen izen neɣ tmsalt-nsen ɣer uselway n tegduda Mass Chadli BenDjdid. D tabrat ideg ssuturen tifrat i ddeqs n yiɣeblan i iceɣben allaɣ n ugdud azzayri, kra n wayen ṭṭalaben nezmer ad d-nebder: tamuḥqranit d lbaṭel i d-yettilin ladɣa ɣef yilmeẓyen, leɣla n temɛict d yisufar n wučči, izerfan-nsen yettwarekḍen, izerfan isertiyen, tadamsa n tmurt…atg. Ma sseba tagejdant n tnekra-agi n yilmeẓyen-a, taṣebḥit n wass-nni n 05 tuber 1988, d asuter n ubeddel n tsertit iɣef tetteddu tmurt imir-n, ttnatin tugdut, tilelli n umeslay, n uxemmem, n tira…atg. Imi walan belli teɛya tallit-nni n ukabar awḥid, d netta kan i yessedduyen tamurt. Ulamma ilmeẓyen-agi ur sɛin ara kra n umrig neɣ leslaḥ swayes ara wwten, ara nnaɣen, maca d taflest d leḥmmala n tmurt-nsen i ten-yeǧǧan ad wwten swayen sɛan d afud akked tezmert, i wakken ad d-gren tiɣri i yilmeẓyen n temdinin-nniḍen akken ad ddun deg ubrid-nsen. Syin akkin, amennuɣ yuɣ akk tamdint n Lezzayer tamanaɣt, bdu-tt-id seg ubrid n umeɣras Diduc Murad, Lebyar, Lḥarrac…atg. Din din, yemmeɣ umennuɣ deg ddeqs n lwilaya-nniḍen timeqqranin, yecban: Tizi Uzzu, Wehran, Annaba, Qeṣenṭina, Ṣeṭif…atg. Tendeh tmes deg yiberdan, d ayen i d-yeglan s tukci n ttesriḥ i lɛeskkar n tmurt i wakken ad d-yeffeɣ ula d netta s iberdan azekka-in n 06 deg waggur n tuber 1988, i wakken ad iseɣsi times iceɛlen deg wulawen n yilmeẓyen, i iqublen s yidmaren-nsen rrṣas n lɛeskkar, uggin ad uɣalen s ixxamen-nsen bɣan ad kemmlen amennuɣ alamma wwḍen lmerɣub-nsen. D ayen i d-yeglan s lmut n waṭas yilmeẓlyen d waṭas n yimejraḥ, akked tlalit n tmendawt tamaynut n 23 yebrir 1989, i d-yeffɣen s wudem unṣib ass n 05 yulyu 1989. Aṭas n yimdanen i iruḥen d asfel n tlelli, n tugdut, d teɣdemt…atg. Maca mmuten tamettant n yimeɣrasen n tmurt, d imeɣnasen n tugdut d tlelli. D ayen i d-yeglan s uɛiwed n tmuɣli deg tsertit n tmurt, d lebni-ines ɣef tugdut i iṣeḥḥan. Deg kra n wagguren kan, tbeddel tmendawt n tmurt n Lezzayer, dɣa fkan ttesriḥ i yimdanen i wakken ad d-slalen ikabaren isertiyen-nniḍen tama n ukabar awḥid seg 1962, ad d-xedmen tiddukkliwin tisertiyin, yal amdan yesɛa azref deg unejmuɛ, deg tmesbaniyin, deg uneḥbus ɣef uxeddim (grève) . Dɣa deg kra n wussan kan, bdan ttefruruxen-d ikabaren isertiyen imaynuten, s wakka i tuɣal tmurt n Lezzayer d tamurt tagdudant i tikkelt tamezwarut deg umezruy-is. Deg useggas n 1995 aṭas n leǧridat n yikabaren-agi ijdiden i d-yenulfan i ittekkin deg tefranin n tselwit.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Ddurt-agi iɛeddan i d-tella yiwet n tannant n usileɣ i yineɣmasen i iqeddcen s tmaziɣt. Timlilit-a, tella-d sɣur Asqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa u s lmendad n uneɣlaf n taywalt Mass Hamid Grine akked lemɛawna n tneɣlaft n ttrebga. D tadwilt tamezwarut i d-yessemlalen ineɣmasen yesseqdacen tamaziɣt deg umahil-nsen, ama d wid n tilivizyu akked rradyu neɣ wid n tɣamsa yettwarun. Deg ussan-agi n tannant i yebdan ass-nni n 01 deg cutember, yella-d wawal ɣef wuguren i d-ttemlilin yineɣmasen deg lxedma-nsen, ladɣa, taluft n umawal imi aṭas deg-sen, ɣef wakken i d-nnan, i d-yettmagaren aɣbel n wawalen ara sxedman deg umahil-nsen. Yella-d leqdic deg tannant-a s uskasi akked yisaragen gar yisdawanen d yineɣmasen. Ma d iswi agejdan n temlilit d taḥawact n wazal n 850 n wawalen ara d-yeffɣen sya d afella dg yiwen udlis. Nesteqsa, wid teɛna temsalt-agi n usileɣ, ama d iselmaden n tmaziɣt ama d ineɣmasen. Nefren-d, tikkelt-a, wid yettmeslayen s teqbaylit. Nesteqsa yal yiwen ɣef wamek yettwali tannant-a. Nesteqsa daɣen Mass Assad Si El Hachemi, imḍebber amezwaru (amaru amatu), n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, i wakken ad aɣ-d-yemmeslay ugar ɣef temlilit.. Ha-t-an wayen i d-nnan:

  Mass Samir Haddad, aselmad n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu : 

 d tikkelt tamezwarut i mlalen yineɣmasen yesseqdacen tamaziɣt, wid n rradyu akked tilivizyu neɣ wid n tɣamqa yettwarun. D ayen yelha. Yelha, daɣen, imi ttekkin yid-sen yiselmaden n tmaziɣt. D agnit ideg nemmeslay ɣef wuguren i d-ttmagaren deg unnar. Ladɣa, seg tama n umawal akked usenfali (taseddast) d tira.Ugur-a, yal yiwen amek i ten-yettwali. Nekni, tecɣeb-aneɣ temsalt-agi n usuɣel awal s wawal, asexdem n yiṛeṭṭalen kan akka (le calquage), asnulfu : menwala ad d-yesnulfu awal. Am wakken nesḥassef aṭas imi amur ameqqran n yineɣmasen ur lmid ara tamazit. Ɣef wanect-a, i d-nefka kra n yiwellihen. Ilaq ad ṭtuqqtent temlilyin yecban tigi. Ilaq ad d-tger iman-is tneɣlaft n teywalt. Ilaq ad lemden yineɣmasen tamaziɣt.

  Mass Benmohamed :   yal yiwen ad yemmeslay tameslay-is. Meḥsub mačči ad tekkseḍ ameslay seg tmeslayt-ik, ad t-tbeddleḍ swayeḍ. Dɣa ulac anwa ara t-ifehmen. Ihi, d asnerni n tmeslayt mačči d asenqes. Akka i ilaq ad fehmen timsal yineɣmasen.

 Mokrane Chikhi , aneɣmas ‘’Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen ‘’ (La Dépêche de Kabylie) I wumi-tt tmaziɣt ma tettmeslay kan ɣef yiman-is ?

 I tikkelt tamezwarut i mlalen s lǧemla yineɣmasen n tmaziɣt ama d wid n ṛṛadyu neɣ n tilibizyu . I yessefṛaḥen di temlilit-a imi zeddin deg-s yerna s lketra yineɣmasen yettarun deg yiɣmisen akked wid yettarun isallen s tmaziɣt deg usmil n l’APS . Ttwaliɣ dakken Asqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa i d-yessudsen timlilit-a, yelha-d akken ilaq d temsalt n tɣamsa tamaziɣt i yuɣalen di rrif deg yiseggasen iɛeddan, ɣas ma azal-is meqqer deg usnerni d useḥbiber ɣef tutlayt. Timlilit-a, tessefṛeḥ-aɣ aṭas nekni s wid yettarun deg Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen i yesɛan tura sebɛa n yiseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is. Asmi d-ilul deg 2009, yufa-d iman-is weḥd-s, wid i t-id-yezwaren yuɣ lḥal ḥebsen neɣ negren. Yerna iɣmisen-a i aɣ-d-yezwaren, ur d-lhan ara d wayen iḍeṛṛun, ugar n tira n yimagraden i d-yettawin s umata ɣef umennuɣ adelsan akked wayen yerzan tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Ihi tarbaɛt-nneɣ iɣef yella i lmendad mass Tahar Ould Amar, tekka-d ansa-nniḍen, newwi abrid i nwala iwulem akken tamaziɣt ad tuɣal s tidet d tutlayt n tɣamsa am tutlayin-nniḍen, akken ur tettɣimi ara kan tettmeslay ɣef yiman-is beṛṛa i wunnar n taywalt. Tirmit-nneɣ teɣra-d i tiyaḍ, ɣer zdat tlul-d Teɣremt, isebtar n Soummam News d usebter n Echaâb, ɣer taggara ula d l’APS tessufuɣ-d isallen s tmaziɣt mebla kra n wugur . Ɣas aya, labud lexṣaṣ ad yili imi walaɣ tuget n wayen i d-yettefɣen deg yiɣmisen-a i aɣ-d-iḍefṛen d isallen n yidles, yewwi-d ad fken azal i yisallen-nniḍen i yuḥwaǧ yimeɣri ama d isallen n temnaḍin, addal, tasertit, tadamsa…S wakka ara yemmed ugar lfeṛḥ n tmeɣriyin d yimeɣriyen n tɣamsa tamaziɣt i yettnernayen seg wass ɣer wayeḍ.

  Yacine Zidane, aneɣmas n’’Tiɣremt’’ (La Cité) :  tirmit-nneɣ tecba tin n La dépêche de Kabylie.Azmam-nni, yella-d d asileɣ amezwaru i yineɣmasen imaynuten imi neẓra i wakken ad d-yaru yiwen ilaq-as lmul deg uqerruy-is. Ma d uguren n tutlayt icudd aṭas ɣer umawal imi aṭas n yineḍruyen i yeḥwaǧen aya. Asdukkel n umawal n tɣamsa d yiwet n temsalt i izerben akka tura daymi nezmer ad d-nini timlilit-a tusa-d am wakken d tifrat i wuguren i d-nettmagar. Ihi, deg-s yella-d umbaddal n tiktiwin u adlis ara d-yeffɣen ad yili d amnir i tɣamsa. 

 Slimane Ziani, aneɣmas n ṛradyu tis snat : yelha ad nemmeslay ɣef wuguren akked tifrat-nsen maca nruḥ ad nefru ugur, nufa-d ugur. Deg uskasi n ugraw, nerran-tt kan i wawal.

 Taqbaylit tuẓ aṭas ɣer sdat. Ihi mačči deg-s i yella wugur. Ugur yella deg yineɣmasen imi ur qqaren ara idlisen. Lukan ɣran ayen yellan deg tsekla taqbaylit, wama ugur n umawal ad yifsus. Ma d asnulfu n ywet n tutlayt tamaziɣt, abrid-is iḍul nezzeh, mačči n tura.

  Nourredine Saad, aneɣmas n TV4 :  tanemmirt i HCA ɣef temlilit-a. Acu kan ilaq ara ad neḥbes dagi. Deg umahil-nneɣ, yella umawal izeben, yeḥwaǧ tiririt s wass-a daymi i d-nniɣ d ayen igerrzen imi nemlal. Ass-a, nemlal d wid akk yettmeslayen tamaziɣt n yal tama n tmurt, niqal nenna-as dayen tenger. Ilaq ad neḥṣu taɣamsa mačči d tamsalt n umawal, tamsalt n usileɣ, daɣen.

  Linda Haddad, taneɣmast n ṛradyu tis snat :  seg wasmi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ i bɣiɣ ad iliɣ deg ṛṛadyu n teqbaylit.Ihi, wwteɣ armi wwḍeɣ s iswi-w. Ma d timlilit n wass-a, d ayen yelhan acu  kan yif-it lukan nemlal d igrawen :  leqbayen i yiman-nsen, icawiyen i yiman-nsen…atg axater uguren mxalafen. Yal wa ad yesnerni tameslayt yesseqdac syin ad d-yaweḍ wass, ahat, anda ara d-yili usdukkel.

  Abdellah Kherif, aneɣmas n ṛradyu n Boumerdès :  ugur ameqqran d lexsas n umawal di kra n yiḥricen yecban, tadamsa, tadawsa…atg Ma nessexdem awalen itraren, ad aɣ-d-inin, mačči d taqbaylit, ma neǧǧa-ten akken s tutlayin-nniḍen, ad aɣ-d-inin, diɣ, mačči d taqbaylit. Ula d ameslay ma newwi-t-id di temẓabit, ur tqebblen ara ahat wid-nneɣ…

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-ten Hocine.M 

  
 Ass n 16 yunyu iɛeddan, yettwaldi s wudem unsib umezgun n tezzegzewt n Buṭeɣwa, deg Taddart n Ayt Ɛisa, tadayra n Uweqqas. I lmend n waya, ttwararent-d kra n tceqqufin n umezgun seg 22:00 n yiḍ d asawen, ɣef teɣzi n kraḍ n wuḍan. 

 Am wakken tuɣal tejmilt i unaẓur Ɛezdin Berquq, sdat imeyyaten n lɣaci i d-yerzan seg waṭas n yimeḍqan n twilayt n Bgayet. Ugar n setta n wayyuren n ubnaw d leɛtab, yewweḍ-d dayen qrib ihegga ubraḥ-a ara d-yawin timerna i temnaḍt n Uweqqas, d Bgayet merra. 

 « Ulamma ur yekfi merra, maca nufa ilaq-aɣ ad t-neldi ad nessenqes fad i lɣaci. Fad n umezgun d tmussni. Annect-a yakk yefka-aɣ azref imi aṭas i d-yerzan seg yal tama. Ahat wwḍen 2000 n yiterrasen deg wass wis kraḍ ». 

 Akka i aɣ-d-tenna Massa Farida Ǧabri, taselwayt n tdukkla « Tadukkli n Ayt Ɛisa » i yellan i lmendad n usenfar-a. 

 Deg kraḍ n wussan-a n teldayt, aṭas n yimura d yicennayen i d-yerzan ɣer Buṭeɣwa ad ḥeḍren i teswiɛiwin yelhan n umezgun deg uberreḥrar, am Akli D d Racid Ulebsir. 

 Amaru-a dɣa yefka azal n 100 n yidlisen-is i tdukkla-a, d tallelt sɣur-s ɣef wayen akk txeddem. Ad d-nerr awellih dakken mazal ad kemmlen lecɣal n umezgun akken ad yamed. 

 Am yifergan, tixxamin n usizdeg,… atg. Ɣef taluft-a, terna-aɣ-d tselwayt: « Tazwara, ilaq ad nesnemmer merra iwaziwen i t-yebnan, i t-id-yessawḍen ɣer wamek yella tura. Ma yella d akemmel mazal ad ilint twiziwin-nniḍen skud nesɛa ilemẓiyen». S wakka yettwabna i tikkelt tamezwarut umezgun deg ugama s yidrimen n ugdud. 

 D ayen ara yelhun i yilemẓiyen iḥemmlen taẓuri-a tamenzut, bɣan ad d-beyynen tizemmar-nsen deg usnerni n yidles azwaw.

  M. K. 

  
 Umbaɛd mi d-ibeggen uselway n tɣiwant leqsar s lejrid n yemdanen id -yesfayden s tnezduɣin tegla-d s lferḥ n wid iwumi tettunefka tnezduɣt anda id- ban lferḥ ɣef udmawen nsen imi nnan-d akken ami d ass-a ineẓra ass amellal acku acḥal ayagi ttrajun melmi ara d -ban lejrid-agi iten-icuɣben acḥal -aya ,Si tama nniḍen lejrid-a tesbegned imdanen yesḥisfen meḥsub d wid ur yewwin ara tanezduɣt anda nnan-d belli ula d nekni nuklal iwakken ad nawwi tinezduɣin imi nettidir deg yixerban ttazalen akk d aman akk d iqiḍunen anda id-ttawin ula d lehlak ɣef yilmeẓyen am wakken id begnen belli azal n 10-12 iseggasen-aya nutni ttrajun melmi ara as-nefken tinezduɣin , Ssuturen daɣen seg uselway n tɣiwant ad iɛawed tamuɣli-is mliḥ ɣef lejrida -agi id yeglan s lɣiḍ n waṭas twaculin i yettrajun acḥal iseggasen-aya nnan-d daɣen llan yemdanen ssutren deg iseggasen-agi kan ineggura 2012-2013 wwin ma yella d wid yessutren seg 2000-2001 ar ass-a d wussan mazal werɛd ur d-snefkin ara dayen yeǧǧan imssutren-a sbegnen-d lɣiḍ nsen ussan-agi iɛeddan zdat usqamu n tɣiwant .

 Inelmaden i yellaqen ad ɣren deg tesnawit n Bujima&amp;epsilon,; gren tiɣri i tnemhalt n ttrebgga akked usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Bujima&amp;epsilon,; i wakken ad tili tesnawit-nsen, yettwabnan yerna yettwaheggan. Tura daɣen la ak-qqaren ar aseggas i d-teddun. Neṛwa rray-nneɣ mačči d izli, imi kra deg-nneɣ qqaren deg uɣerbaz alemmas n Yiεeffağen, wiyaḍ-nniḍen deg uɣerbaz alemmas n Ceεllal. Ma d lmakla ntett deg yiwen uɣerbaz amenzu, yerna ur ntett ara alamma ččan akk yinelmaden-nsen, i wakken ad nečč nekkni. Acḥal n tikkalt ur nettlhaq ara ɣer tneɣrit deg lawan, tikkal-nniḍen nettɣama mebla amaččiw. Nessaram aseggas i d-iteddun ad siwḍen ṣṣah, ad aɣ-llin tasnawit-nneɣ am nekkni am ladayrat-nniḍen n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, nessaram diɣen aseggas aɣurbiz 2017-2018, ad t-nɣer deg-s». D ayagi akk i yerran tudert d ulmud n yinelmaden-agi deg yir liḥala, amek i tebɣiḍ ad d-awin igemmaḍ igerrzen, ma nmuqel ɣer ttawilat i sεan wiyaḍ, maca imi sεan tabɣest ttifriren-d deg yikayaden n taggara n useggas.

 Mbeɛd amezwaru-ines i d-yeffɣen ɣur teẓrigin Tamazɣa, deg useggas n 2014, yessufeɣ-d ussan-a iɛeddan ucennay Qasi Ifaraten, mmi-s n temnaḍt n Buɣni, aḍebsi n ccna wis sin ɣur teẓrigin Yen Music. Iseɣrez-a amaynut, yewwi mraw n tezlatin s wawalen yemgaraden, ama deg tmeɣrut neɣ deg talɣa, d kra n yisental i yeqqen wa ɣer wa. Ma nmuqel-d i yizwal n tezlatin-nni, ad negzu kan ɣef wacu i d-ttmeslayent, maca ma yesla-asent yiwen, ad yefhem d anwa izen i yebɣa ad yessiweḍ ucennay i yimdanen, d wamek yettwali netta kra n tlufa. Deg tezlit tamezwarut iwumi isemma “Aḍar ɣer sdat”, d tezlit tis 5 iwumi isemma “Yeḥfa yiẓri-w”, yettcektay-d Qasi Ifaraten s uɣiḍi ɣef yir addad ideg i d-ggran watmaten-is Izwawen. Iban-d d win yesḥassfen daɣen s waṭas ɣef kra n ubeddel i d-yellan gar yiḍelli d wass-a d ɣef wansayen n tjaddit i yettruḥun. Tezlit tis 9 i umi isemma “Nufa anda truḥ”, ur yebɛid ucennay ɣef taluft n ucekti, maca s tɣara-nniḍen i d-yemmeslay. Deg-s yebder-d tamentilt n lḥif i ttidiren Yiqbayliyen, mi yenna:

 <em> Nufa anda truḥ Gar lluban akked uǧilban Muḥ yerfa ɣef Muḥ Ixeddem lfayda ur tban Mazal-it mecṭuḥ Aqerru-ines d aciban Γlin-as wuglan… </em>

 « Ayen xedmeɣ deg uḍebsi-agi amaynut, icuba wid iɛeddan; s wul i cennuɣ ama ɣef teqriḥin i nettwali di tudert n wiyaḍ, ama ɣef tid i nedder, neɣ ɣef wuguren n tdukkli di temtti-nneɣ ». I aɣ-d-yenna ucennay send ad ikemmel: « Ssarameɣ ad yehwu i waṭas n wid ara as-yeslen. D win i d iswi-iw ameqqran ». Aṭas n yimeslayen ara isel win yettḥessen i yiseɣrez n Qasi Ifaraten i yecna s uɣanib n cceɛbi. Ideg yesseqdec tirmit i d-yesɛa deg umecwar-is aɣezfan i d-yelḥa seg wacḥal d aseggas tura. Dɣa, yewwi-d ad d-nesmekti d akken acennay Qasi Ifaraten yella deg yiseggasen n 80 deg Ugraw Ifaraten i yettwassnen zik s yismawen n wid yellan deg-s. Gar-asen amaẓwan Salem Qerruc d wiyaḍ. Maca kra n teswiɛt msebḍan, yuɣal icennu i yiman-is imi iḥemmel ccna.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Tifranin i usqamu aɣerfan aɣelnaw n 04 seg maggu yezrin llant-d deg Tubiret di tegnatin yessefraḥen seg tama, yesseḥzanen seg tayeḍ. Tamenzut dakken tuget n tamiwin n twilayt ddrent asihar-a deg lehna, yella wanda I d-rren yimbuṭiyen I teɣri tasebḥit n wass. Tayed, d tin ur d-nefki ara udem iwatan, imi llan-d cwalat deg kra n yimekwan anda tewweḍ liḥala ɣer truẓi n yisendyaq d uḍegger n lejridat deg yiberdan. D ayen I yessawḍen ahat amḍan n yimbuṭiyen ur yewwiḍ ara s aswir yetturajun. Ihi, I 12 n ddayrat yellan deg Tubiret, amyizwer yeḍra-d ɣef 09 n yikersiyen deg usqamu aɣerfan aɣelnaw n Zighout Youcef. S tidet, segmi kan I tebda ddiɛaya n tefranin, lḥers yella-d gar yimrecḥen n 17 n lejridat I sersen yikabaren, imi ulac ula d yiwet n yilelliyen. Ɣef teɣzi n ddiɛaya, yal tama acu I d-tewwi d amrig iwakken ad tqenneɛ imdanen ad ddun yid-s, seg lehna d taɣdemt alamma d amwati aɣelnaw tɛeddiḍ-d ɣef yizerfan n umdan, yal akabar s tezlit-is iwakken ɣer taggara d akabar n Ahmed Ouyahia I d-ḥellan 03 n yikersiyen, iḍfer-it-id FLN s 03 n yikersiyen nniḍen iwakken ad ttwaferqen tlata ineggura yiwen i MEN, wayeḍ ANR aneggaru i FFS. Tikkelt-a, d akabar n Mohcine Belabbes I yuɣen tiyita imi ur yessaweḍ ara ad d-iḥelli amkan-is am waken I iwulef deg yiseggasen yezrin. Tikkelt-a, mebla ccekk, d cwalat yellan anda akken I iwulef yettawi-d leswat I t-yessawḍen ɣer yir liḥala. Ayen I yeswehmen diɣen, d amkan n Boualem Zidane ur d-nelli ara, imi amdan-a yettwasnen deg unnar n umennuɣ mgal rrebrab ibedde-d s yiwet n lejrida deg ukabar n Amara Benyounès. Aṭas I t-yurjan ad d-yifrir, maca ɣer taggara ur yessaweḍ ara ad d-iḥelli azal n leswat iwulmen. Tamsalt daɣ yefɣen I tanumi deg Tubiret d tin yerzan ikabaren inselmawiyen, iwulfen ttawin amur-nsen. Tikkelt-a, ur ssawḍen ara ad d-awin ula d yiwen n ukersi, ɣas akken ama HMS neɣ Taj neɣ ahat akabar n Djamel Abdeslam, ur ssawḍen ad d-ḥellin imukan-nsen deg twilayt I nwan d ayla-nsen. Deg tefranin n useggas-a, iwulem ad d-nini belli RND yekcem ddiɛaya ɣef tefdent, iruḥ amzun deg tuffra slid kan agraw I d-yellan mi d-yusa Ahmed Ouyahia. Ma d imrecḥen-is, ur ǧǧin ula d yiwet n tama ur wwiḍen ara ɣur-s d acu kan mebla ma yella-d uhetwir n yisawaḍen d yigrawen. D yiwet n tsetratijit I yeḍfer Dr Bouha, iwakken ad yessiweḍ s agemmuḍ n 03 n yikersiyen ɣas akken I yeḍmeɛ ugar ɣef leḥsab n wid I d-ibedden ɣur-s. Ilaq kan ad d-nesmekti belli iɣallen n laman llan-d di lmendad ɣef useḥbiber ɣef tefranin-a, imi ɣas akken llan-d cwalat, nutni qublen-ten s umeyyez iwakken ur d-ḍerrunt ara txeṣṣarin. Wissen kana hat tifranin I d-iteddun, tid yerzan asqamu n twilayt, d wid n tɣiwanin ma ad d-ilint deg tegnatin am ti neɣ ad tbeddel teswiɛt ?

  Smaïl Merzouk 

  
 Ass n 7 deg yennayer iɛeddan, yella ujenyur deg tsenselkimt Mass Muḥend Belqasem d inebgi n Tdukkla Tadelsant Tiɛwinin i usenɛet n yiwen n usarag s wazal-is. Asarag-a, yewwi-d ɣef tsenselkimt s tezwawt. Imi simmal yettili-d uqeddic sɣur kra n trebbuyaɛ, simmal tbeddu tezwawt, tseɛɛu amkan deg umaḍal n Web. Yemmeslay-d mass Muḥend Belqasem ɣef yifecka isenselkamen(outils informatiques ) d yiseɣẓanen i d-yettwasuqlen taggara-a kan ɣer tezwawt; am Mozilla, LibreOffice, Thunderbird , Skype, atg. ‘’Newwi-d awal s umata ɣef wazal n useqdec n tsenselkimt s tezwawt. S tezwawt dɣa, mačči s tmaziɣt. Nesken-d ula d ttbut s wudem ussnan acimi ilaq isekkilen ilatiniyen mačči d wiyaḍ», i aɣ-d-yenna win igan asarag. Ugar n waya, iberreḥ-d umsureg ula ɣef yisenfaren isenselkamen i yellan deg ddhen, neɣ deg ubrid n beddu. Ɣas ahat ttwalaqayen-d ayendin d ugur, am ttawilat d tuɛert n usuqel n kra n tenfaliyin, meɛna anda yella lebɣi, ɣelbent-t tzemmar. Ma ɣef tegnit s umata i d-yellan ddaw tecḍaḍt n Tdukkla Turmidt Tiɛwinin, yenna-aneɣ-d Muḥend Belqasem: ‘’zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ tgerrez s waṭas. Ur urǧiɣ ara ad d-asen wannect-nni d imdanen, ad ḥeḍren, gar yilemẓiyen d yimɣaren. Yiwen n umɣar ɣlin-as-d ula d yimeṭṭawen imi yeẓra sanda tewweḍ tutlayt-nneɣ’’. S wakka, yemlal uqeddic n Tdukkla Tiɛwinin, i as-yekkren i usuddes n yisaragen, akked yiwen n umeɣnas d umussnaw deg wannar-a n tsenselkimt, almi d-fkan agemmuḍ yelhan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

  
 Ddurt kan segmi sfugglen ass aɣelnaw n yimeɛḍar, kkren yiɛeggalen n Tdukkla Tadelsant «Idles» i uheggi n tigawt-nniḍen akked yimdanen at asrayen uzzigen (besoins spécifiques). Tikkelt-a, d tuffɣa seg Xerraṭa i d-yellan d ahil, akken ad yebbuḥri wa, ad yettwakkes uxiqi ɣef wa. Tanezzayt n tazwara n ddurt yezrin, ṭṭfen yiɛeggalen n tdukkla d yimuḍan abrid ɣer waɣir icebḥen n Jijel. D tirza ur nezmir ad tettwattu ɣef wakken i d-yenna yiwen seg wid i d-yessuddsen asihar, imi ala azmummeg i izedɣen udmawen. S wayen akka i d-yettilin deg unnar, d lebɣi merra i iɛemren at tidukkla-a, nessaram ad yili usemmed n leqdic deg Draɛ Lgayed ula ɣef yidles i tettawi d isem tdukkla-a. Afud igerrzen!

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Uqbel tirza-ya n yixeddim, mass Amara Benyounes s yisem-is d amaray amatu n ukabar n Umussu Agdudan Azzayri (MPA), yexdem timlilit akked yimeɣnasen n ukabar-is anda i d-yefka awal ɣef waṭas n temsal icudden ɣer tsertit n tmurt. Timlilit-a i d-yellan tameddit n wass n laṛebɛa 18 meɣres, usan-d ɣur-s aṭas n yimeɣnasen n ukabar seg yakk tiɣiwanin n lwilaya n Bgayet. Deg awal i d-yefka i yimeɣnasen n l’MPA, mass Amara Benyounes yerra di tazwara tajmilt i yimeɣrasen n tegrawla taɣelnawt ladɣa ilmend n lɛid n ternawt ( 19 meɣres). Yesmekta-d wid iḥeḍṛen s umennuɣ n yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt n Leqbayel ilmend n tlelli n tmurt imi tamnaḍt-agi tezga  d nettat i d adif n Lezzayer : «  Ulac tamurt n Leqbayel mebla Lezzayer, ulac Lezzayer mebla tamurt n Leqbayel », i d-yenna deg awal-is. Mass Amara Benyounes iwekked-d deg awal-is ɣas ma d ṣṣeḥ tamurt n Lezzayer mazal tettemlil uguren maca : « Tif aṭas timura n Tmazɣa i yaɣ-d-yezzin », anda iwehha ɣer Tunes d Libya i yenhewwalen segmi i d-iɣum fell-asent wayen umi semman « tafsut taɛṛabt ». Ɣef temsalt-agi daɣen, mass Amara Benyounes yesmekta-d s tixuṭṭert n umennuɣ aserti imi d netta i d lsas n tugdut, amennuɣ ideg d-yewwi ad gtent tmuɣliwin mačči ilmend n uhuddu n tmurt maca ilmend n lebni-s. Ɣef waya, deg awal-is yefka-d tiɣri i wudmawen n tsertit n tmurt ur nelli ara deg udabu akken  leqdic-nsen ad yebnu ɣef tdukli d usibɛed n tmuɣli ilmend n lmaṣlaḥa n tmurt n Lezzayer. «  Mačči   win i wumi ɛeṛqent ad iṛuḥ ad d-yessufeɣ ilmeẓyen ɣer ubrid. Tasertit ilaq ad tbedd ɣef wahilen iṣeḥḥan d tɣimit ɣer ṣṣwab. Ma d wid yenwan abeddel ad d-yekk seg tuffɣa ɣer ubrid ɣelḍen, nwala acu i yeḍran di tmura taɛṛabin ideg teɣli ddula, ufan umbeɛd abrid yimeṭṭuṛfa akken ad ldin abrid n ccwal war tuɣalin». Dɣa ɣef tneqqiḍt-a n tuɣalin n yislamawiyen imeṭṭurfa ɣer unnar aserti di Lezzayer, iḥedder-d kra n yikabaren d wudmawen n tsertit i yettnejmaɛen yid-sen, ɣas ma ẓran dakken at Icumar-agi zgan ttilin d ugur i unegmu n tmurt. Da mass Amara Benyounes yefka-d amedya n tuffɣa-nsen mgal n tukci n yizerfan i tmeṭṭut ɣas ma ddula tazzayrit tger asurif di temsalt-a, iswi ɣer zdat d aseɛdel gar-as akked urgaz am wakken yella lḥal di tmura yetqeddmen.  Nnig n waya, mass Amara Benyounes yemmeslay-d ɣef waṭas n temsal icudden ɣer tsertit n tmurt, ladɣa  tamsalt n usufeɣ n lgaz n uẓrar anda i d-iwekked dakken aya ur yelli ara deg wahil n udabu di teswiɛt-a ideg nella.                               <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>                

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mokrane Chikhi   

  
 Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Bgayet, akked Tiddukkla Tadelsant Itri n Akbou, s tallelt n usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Akbou, suddsen-d timlilit tis mraw d kraḍ (13) n tfaska n umezgun amaziɣ n Soummam, i d-yellan deg wussan-agi. Tebda ass-nni n lexmis 15 yunyu, tekfa ass-nni n ahad 21 seg waggur-agi n yunyu ideg nella. Tettili-d temlilit-agi deg tezrigt-is tis 13 deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen Abderrhmane Fares n Akbou, deg lwilaya n Bgayet. Ass-nni n ahad 21 deg yunyu 2017, tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i wid yettekkin deg temlilit-agi tis 13, am wakken daɣen i fkan arrazen i tceqqufin i d-yufraren, akked d tmeɣra n taggara i d-yellan si 21h30 d asawen. Ihi ha-ten-in wid i d-yufraren; arraz n uhanay amaway ( Meilleur spectacle) yettunefk i 03 n tmezgunin: taceqquft “Taɣdemt taqudart” n Tiddukkla Itran n Tqerbuzt. Ma d arraz n uhray yufraren (Mise en scène) yuɣal i Mass Abderrahmane Houche s tmezgunt “Tawrent n tiḥerci” akked Mass Okbaoui Cheikh s tmezgunt “Jules César”. Arraz n tsifrant n tmeṭṭut (Meilleure interprétation féminine) wwint-tt snat n tlawin-agi; Massa Benkhider Dina akked Massa Madi Wissam. Ma d win n urgaz ḥelant-id sin yirgazen wigi d; Mass Dahmani Kamel akked Fellag Malek. Ma d arraz n tesqamut yettunefk i tmezgunt “Le monde fou” n uxxam n yilmeẓyen.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
  7 n yiɣrbazen deg Tubiret…  

 Tella-d tulya tunṣibt n 7 n yiɣerbazen deg lwilaya n Tubiret, taṣebḥit n wass-nni n larebɛa yezrin, i d-yellan d ass amenzu n tuɣalin n warrac ɣer leqraya. Gar sebɛa-agi n yiɣerbazen, llan setta deg-sen d iɣerbazen imenza. Sin seg-sen deg tɣiwant n Tubiret, tlata-nniḍen deg Ṣur Lɣezlan, wayeḍ deg Lexḍariya. Akked yiwet n tesnawit tamaynut deg tɣiwant n Meɛla, i d-yezgan tama n ugafa-amalu n lwilaya n Tubiret.

  … Rebɛa-nniḍen deg Bgayet… 

 Deg wass amenzu n unekcum n yinelmaden ɣer tneɣriyin-nsen i useggas-agi aɣurbiz amaynut 2017/2018, ula deg lwilaya n Bgayet, yella-d uftaḥ n ukuẓ n yiɣerbazen ijdiden, i d-yernan aseggas-agi. Iɣerbazen-agi d wigi: sin n yiɣerbazen imenza ldin tiwwura-nsen i yinelmaden ass-nni n amhad iɛeddan lewhi n 07h30 n ssbaḥ, yiwen deg tɣiwant n Bgayet, wayeḍ deg tɣiwant n Amiẓur. Tella-d diɣ tulya n yiwen n uɣerbaz alemmas deg Tiniri, yetabaɛen ɣer ladayra n Ukfadu, akked tesnawit tajdidt deg tɣiwant n Tuja, deg ladayra n Leqsur. Am wakken daɣen i bnan azal n 32 n tzeɣwa n waddal akked wazal n 23 n yinurar n wurrar i lfayda n yinelmaden yeqqaren, ladɣa wid n uɣerbaz alemmas d wid n tesnawit.

  … Deg Tizi Uzzu, llin tlata n yiɣerbazen 

 Ula deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, llin kraḍ n yiɣerbazen-nniḍen tiwwura-nsen i yinelmaden ijdiden n useggas-agi. Yiwen deg-sen d aɣerbaz amenzu n tama n Uẓeffun, akked tririt n sin n yiɣerbazen-nniḍen ilemmasen d tisnawiyin .

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 I lmend n umulli wis 37 n tefsut n yimaziɣen, d umulli wis 16 n tefsut taberkant, aɣerbaz alemmas n sin yimeɣrasen Tellal Mohamed n taddart n Akaoudj smektan-d tidyanin n 1980 d 2001. Ihi leqdic yella-d ass-nni n ahad tameddit n wass, deg tlemmast n uɣerbaz-agi. D leḥrara-nni n tnemhalt d kra n yiselmaden, ladɣa wid n tmaziɣt i yesawḍen ad xedmen ahil s wazal-is, ulamma ur heggan ara iman-nsen armi d ddqiqa taneggarut, yerna ur sɛin ara aṭas n wadeg anida ara xedmen leqdicat. Armud-agi, yebda si 13h00 n uzal, imi tasebḥit ɣran warrac. Bdan leqdic-agi s kra n temsikniyin i icudden ɣer yidles d tmagit tamaziɣt, gar temsikniyin-agi llant tid n tgella (lmakla) : tiɣrifin, lemsemen, lexfaf, aɣrum aqquran, sseksu, berkukes, abisar…atg. D lemwakel i d-wwin yinelmaden s timmad-nsen seg yixxamen-nsen. Llant tid n yidlisen, tid n tɣawsiwin tiqburin, tella-d diɣ temsikent ɣef tudert d yimuhal n Lmulud At Mɛemmer, tella-d temsikent n wumuɣ n yismawen n 24 n yimdanen yettwaṭṭfen ɣer lḥebs deg 1980. Yella-d usrag d amecṭuh sɣur Massa Saddallah Farida, d taselmadt deg uɣerbaz-agi, i d-imeslayen cwiṭ ɣef tefsut n yimaziɣen (ssebba-s, ineḍruyen, s wacu i d-tegla…). Am wakken diɣen i d-tella tɣuri n yisefra sɣur kra n yinelmaden yeqqaren dina. Ayen iggerzen aṭas deg leqdic-agi, imi tuget n tselmadin lsant-d tiqneddyar n leqbayel, ula d tanemhalt n uɣerbaz-agi s tqenddurt n leqbayel i tettawi tettara. Mebla ma nettu tinelmadin diɣen i d-yerzan seg uxxam ɣer uɣerbaz s tqenddurin, ma d inelmaden s yibernas icebḥanen. Massa Ait Taleb, d tanemhalt n uɣerbaz-agi tenna-d : “Nessarem iɛejba-asen i warrac leqdic-agi ameẓyan, nessaram tikkelt i d-iteddun ad nexdem ugar. Neɛreḍ ad d-nsiken iman-nneɣ belli d Leqbayel , d Imaziɣen ama s umeslay, ama s lebsa, neɣ s lmakla…atg. Nexdem kan ayen iwumi nessaweḍ imi ur nesɛi ara amkan iwessiɛen ideg ara txedmeḍ kra n leqdic meqqren. D tikkelt tamezwarut ideg ara nessfugel 20 yebrir, ncallah mačči d taneggarut, nessaram diɣen ad nili d amedya i yiɣerbazen-nniḍen, i wakken ad xedmen ayen iwumi zemren swayen sɛan d ttawil”.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Llan kra n yimdanen, nwan awi-d kan ad d-afen tifrat i wugur xas ulamma ad d-xelqen wayeḍ yugaren amezwaru-nni. Ɣur-sen, meɛlic d tayerza n ulɣum, ayen akk i d-yekrez ad t-yerkeḍ. D ṣṣaḥ, imdanen sḥassfen imi iberdan n tmurt ččuren d ammus, uɣalen d igudiyen mebla tilas. Aṭas i yettlummun wid-nni iḥebbsen s ṭunubilat ɣer tama n ubrid, tessen, syin ṭtaǧǧan tiqreɛtin dinna, ttembbabbayent ta ɣef ta alamma tewweḍ d taffa. Aya yettak udem n ddir i twennaṭ akked yimezdaɣ-is. Acu kan, ilaq ad iwali bnadem tidet s yiwet n tmuɣli, mačči s tneḥyaf neɣ s wuden n ddin kan. Ugur n wammus mačči d tamsalt n wid itessen kan, d tamsalt n yimezdaɣ akken ma llan. ‘’Wid itessen, ṭeggiren tiqreɛtin, wid yettẓallan, ṭeggiren iḍuman’’ i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen umezdaɣ. 

 Llan kra, ɣillen ufan-asen-d tifrat i wugur-a. Kkren ssan akk leryaf n ubrid d tiqreɛtin n lbirra i wakken ur ḥebbsent ara tkeryas dinna. Ɛlaḥsab-nsen, ma ur ḥbisent ara ur d-yettili ara uḍegger n teqreɛtin. Acu kan, ttun yiwet n lḥaǧa : d nutni i yeččuren rrif n ubrid s teqreɛtin, ayen icemten nezzeh iberdan. Ula d wid yebɣan ad ḥebsen ma yettuḥettem fell-asen, ur d-ttafen ara amek, ur d-ttafen ara ciṭ n umekkan ilem. Daymi qqaren : ’’ad yekkat aɣyul, ad yettdari taberda’’. 

 Yerna, tifrat, tella ɣer tudrin n tmurt n leqbayel. Tella ɣer taddart n Zoubga akked Yigersafen d tiyaḍ-nniḍen. D imedayaten limer yella ‘’cit n ṣswab maḍi, maḍi’’.

  Et puis, akken i as-yenna winna :  

 ‘’Ḥemmleɣ tayri d waman ṣemmneḍ,

 Ḥemmleɣ ajeǧǧig n tefsut,

 Ḥemmleɣ lemwansa n tmeṭṭut.

 I merde i win iruḥen,

 Ɣer lgirra yegla s tefruyt.

 Awit-d un coup, awit-d sin,

 Di lxater n wid yemḥemmalen,

 Di lxater n wid yessefruyen.

 I merde i wid iruḥen, 

 Ɣer lgirra akken ad nɣen,

 Ɣer lgirra akken ad mten.’’

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M   

  
 D ayen i yerran tanmehla n yidles n Tizi uzzu, ad tefren Taddart n Ceṛfa i yebbaɛden azal n semmus (5) ikilumtren ɣef temdint n Uẓeffun i beddu n usfuggel n dduṛt tadelsant n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen

 Yal tamnat di tmurt n leqbayel s wansayen–is, maca llan wid i tent–id–icudden, i tent–id- isegrawen . Yennayer , lɛineṣla , iweǧǧiben… Amager n tefsut, neɣ am wakken i as-qqaren : Tiririt Uzal, d yiwen seg wansayen i d-yessegrawen tamurt n leqbayel s umata, ahat mgaraden deg usiwel–is, d unamek n usfuggel-is, maca, azal yiwen . Tamnaṭ n Uẓeffun , asffuggel n umager n tefsut mačči d awal kan , d azamul seg yizamulen n yidles amaziɣ, idles Aqbayli i yessiǧhiden tagmat gar yimezdaɣ n tudrin. D aseḥbiber ɣef yiẓuran n tudert tazedgant i d-ǧǧan imarawen imezwura, d asfillet i yimal n tmeddurt wer uguren . Tiririt Uzal, d tafelwit i yettusunɣen s tecraḍ n tsednan. Mi yeffeɣ uḥeggan amezwaru neɣ win i wumi ssawalen : “ Aḥeggan n wakli” i d-yettasen di sebɛa n wussan ineggura n meɣres ɣer leqbayel, ad yekcem uḥeggan wis sin, neɣ aḥeggan aḥurri, dduṛt tamezwarut n yebrir.
