Timɣarin, ad bdunt aheggi i usfuggel n Tiririt uzal .D ayen i yerran tanmehla n yidles n Tizi uzzu, ad tefren Taddart n Ceṛfa i yebbaɛden azal n semmus (5) ikilumtren ɣef temdint n Uẓeffun i beddu n usfuggel n dduṛt tadelsant n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen . Ahil, d amesbaɣur , imi ɣer wayen i d-thegga tenmehla n yidles d wayen i d-heggan imezdaɣ n taddart, d ayen isefṛaḥen . Azal n 250 n yinelmaden d tnelmadin n yiɣerbazen imenza d yiselmaden–nsen n lwilaya i d-yerzan , am wakken d aɣen i d-rzan aṭṭas n yinebgawen n lḥerma , imawlan n yidles , ineɣmasen , imeɣnasen, imedyazen akked yimḍebbṛen n tɣiwanin d uselway n wasun n Uẓeffun . Inelmaden n uɣerbaz (les beaux arts) n Iɛeẓẓugen , xedmen yiwet n tfelwit meqqren , tafelwit ara yeqqimen d asmekti i taddart . Ayen i d-ijebden lwelha n kra yellan dinna, d tigelliwin–nni i d-heggant tsednan n taddart n Ceṛfa: iwzan, seksu d ibawen s yikil d wudi n tfunast, ameqful (asfuṛu) s yimɣan yemgaraden s zzit uzemmur ur kkin waman , amerɣennis, tarnest, aɣeddu n wakli, tiffaft… Am wakken daɣen i d-nnawlent aɣrum n leḥwal i yecban aɣrum n bibṛas, imi d win i d-ttnawalent di Tiririt Uzal, seksu s tɣeddiwt d uqeddid (acedluḥ), seksu s tmellalin tuftiyin d ucebbaḍ …Temlal tẓuri tatrart d tẓuri n tsednan. Inebgawen n taddart, ksen lxiq i tmuɣli d uɛebbuḍ. Ayen i yernan cbaḥa, d asbuɣer d yizlan n temɣarin, d icewwiqen n yiggerdan d tggerdatin, yal yiwen yufa ayen yebɣa. Imḍebṛen n tɣiwant n Uẓeffun, ur stehzan ara deg uheggi, fkan-d ttawilat i iwatan, Tiddukkla tadelsant Taher Ǧawut , rnan-d iman-nsen ɣer leqdic . Tameddit n wass, rzan yinebgawen n taddart n Caṛfa ɣer taddart n Wulxu, taɣiwant n At Cafaɛ , sersen tamuqqint n yizeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka n uzamul n tsekla, aneɣmas n tinzert, win yugin ddel d usmundel n yiɛdawen n tudert, aẓekka n Taher Ǧawut i yettwanɣan s terṣasin n at tmenqas d txidas . S yin, yal yiwen, yewwi abrid n tuɣalin , yewwi tifenda n yizeǧǧigen yemgaraden di tɣara d yiniten.

   Kader Belaidi 

<div> 
  
 Ass-nni n lɣemɛa iɛeddan, i d-tella yiwet n temlilit tameqqrant deg taddart Ait Allaoua,deg tɣiwnat n Iboudrarene i wakken ad semmin s wudem unṣib i yiwen n usebdad i yebnan s ddemma i yimeɣrasen Mbarek Ait Hammouda, Salem Ait Mohand Said akked Amar Ould Hammouda. Aṭas i iḥedren temlilit-ag, ad naf gar-asen : tiwaculin n tlata n yimeɣrasen-agi, imjouhad, tuǧgal d yessi-s n yimjuhad, amaru amatu n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, iselwayen n tɣiwanin n Ighil Bouamas, Iboudraren, Akbil akked Tizi Uzzu d yimdanen-nniḍen i d-yusan s lketra. Llant-d kra n tnagitin d wawal ɣef umecwar n yimeɣrasen-agi sɣur yimjuhad akked twaculin-nsen. Akka, dɣa, i d-yenna Ouahab Ait Menguellet, mmi-s n Mbarek Ait Menguellet : ‘’ferḥeɣ aṭas imi i d-tusam s waṭas ɣer temlilit-agi. Ayagi, yesbanay-d d akken imawlan-nneɣ ur ruḥen ara kan akka d asfel ɣef tmurt », i d-yesmekti uselway n tɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu, O. Ait Menguellet. Ma s tama n Tuddsa taɣelnawt n yimjuhad, yenna-d Si Ouali : « Akken kan tefra lgerra, steɛrfen yimḍebbren d akken Mbarek Ait Menguellet akked Ould Hammouda Amar d imeɣrasen. Aya, ulac fell-as. Ma yella seg tama n Salah Ait Mohand Salah, ar tura ulac arrat i d-ffkan yimawlan-is i wakken ad yettwasteɛref yis-s. Ihi, teqqim ɣer imawlan-is i wakken ad t-awin ɣer Kasma n Yattafen, syin ad yettwaceyyeɛ ɣer tneɣlaft n yimjuhad i wakken ad yettwasteɛref yis-s». Uqbel ad d-tili temlilit-agi, yerlla-d unejmuɛ deg Tasaft Ugemmun anda sersen timeqqunin n yijeǧǧigen ɣef yiẓekwan n Mustafa Bacha, Djaffer Ouahioun, Kaml Ait Hammouda d AzeddineYousfi.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Mazal imezdaɣ n taddart ben Ɛli i yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n wad lberdi ibeɛden azal 11 yikilumiṭren ɣef unẓul lwilaya n tubiret ṭṭfen deg yiwen n usirem d ameqqran akken aten-d wallin imḍebren tɣiwant s uṣenfer lgaz n temdint imi aṭas ayagi nutni ttrajun melmi ara d-yecraq yiṭij fell-asen , yerna d aɣbel yerran lwelha n 250 twaculin di temnaḍt-agi mebla ma nettu akken imezdaɣ-a ɛlaḥsab imeslayen-nsen ttidiren di tegnatin qessiḥen ɣef unadi n tqreɛtin lgaz acku trenu di leɛtab-nsen ladɣa deg ussan n tegrest imi asafar-agi ixus s waṭas di taddart yerra tettnerni di suma anda tettaweḍ ɣer 1000 idinaren i yiwet n tqerɛt , Si tama nniḍen wekkden-d akken ttruḥun ɣef uḍar azal 6 yikilumiṭren akken ad d-awwin taqerɛet n lgaz , Ma yella d wiyaḍ nniḍn yesefk fell-asen ad kerrun tikeṛṛusin akken ad ṣawḍen ad d-awwin asafar-agi imi iwilem , ɛlaḥsab kra n twaculin wekkden llan iɣublan nniḍen am lexsas n waman imi ur sen-ttawḍen ara yal ass imi ttasend tikelt di ddurt , dayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ ssaramen seg yimḍebren teɛna temsalt ad d-afen tifrat akken ad sifsen taɛkumt ɣef twaculin-agi akked keffu yisura iɣublan .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas Abdelhak 

  
 Tezga-d tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa deg unzul n usamer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, tebɛed fell-as s wazal 21 n yikilumitren. Tesɛa tɣiwant-agi 35 000 n yimezdaɣ d 45,29 km2 n wakal.

 Taɣiwant n lemɛatqa, ɣur-s lexsas d ameqqran deg yal iḥricen n tudert n yal ass, ama, daɣen, deg yisenfaren n unegmu yemxalafen. Dayen i d-yessekkaren lɣiḍ meqqren gar yimezdaɣ.

  Taɣiwant mebla iɣallen n usellek ( Protection civile) 

 Ayen iɣef tezzi lwelha deg temnaṭ-agi lemɛatqa, d iɣalen n usellek ur tesɛi ara ar ass-a, ladɣa deg lwaqt anda yewweḍ lgaz ɣer yal taddart. Am neẓra, d yiwen usafar i yesɛan lxuf meqqren deg tudert n yimdanen. Rnu ɣef aya, times yetḥazen tamnaṭ-agi, imi deg unebdu iɛeddan, tečča ulla d ixxamen s sebba n uɛeṭṭel n iɣallen n usellek i d-yussan seg lebɛid.

  Mebla sbiter neɣ axxam n usejji 

 Xas ulamma deg tɣiwant llan ugar n 35 000 n yimezzdaɣ, meɛna ur tesɛi ara sbiter. Ula d axxam-nni n usejji, ur yesɛi ara ttawilat iwulmen neɣ ɛad atraren. I wakken ad dawin yimezdaɣ-is, yettuḥettem fell-asen ad ruḥen ɣer tɣiwant n Ssuq Letniyen. Ɛlaḥsab n yimḍebbren n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa, nnan-d d akken yeffeɣ-d usenfar n lebni n sbiter ameqqran deg yiseggassen-agi iɛeddan, maca mazal ar ass-a urɛad bdin lecɣal-is.

  Mebla annar n ddabex uḍar 

 sḥassfen aṭas yilmezyen d tdukliwin tinaddalin n tɣiwant ɣef yir liḥala i yettidir uḥric-agi n waddal deg tɣiwant-nsen. Aṭas-aya segmi ssuturen deg wid teɛna temsalt i wakken ad asen-xedmen annar n ddabex uḍar, acu kan ar ass-a, ur yelli d acu i d-ibanen deg-s.

  Mebla lbankat Gar yisenfaren igejdanen deg tuddert n yimdanen d lbni n lbankat, acku, aya yessishil tuder-nsen. Lexsas n wakal n lebni 

 D aɣbel meqqren deg unegmu. Ɣer yiɛeggalen n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan, aɣbel ameqqran i d-ttmagaren d lexsas deg wakal n lebni, imi yal tikkelt mi ara d-yettunefk usenfar, ur d ttafen ara amḍiq i lebni-ines.

  Aneḥbus n usenfar n temkerḍit n tɣiwant 

 Asenfar-agi yettujerden deg useggas 2007 deg wahil n usenduq acrik n tmazdayin tiɣiwanin, yeḥbes azal n 9 n yiseggasen-agi ɣef sebba n lexsas n tedrimt. D asenfar i d-yewwin, deg wahil-nsen, kra n yikubar n tseritit i d-ibedden ɣer tefranin-agi n 23 deg unbir i deg-i nella. Ahat, ad as-d-afen tifrat sya d afella. 

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Tala Amara, d taddart tameqqrant gar 17 n tudrin n tɣiwant n Tizi Rached, tezga-d ɣer tama n usamer n Tizi Uzzu, tebɛed fell-as s 15 n kilumitr. Zedɣen deg-s 2189 n yimdanen. Llant deg-s 5 n tliwa d ugar n 8 n yiḍwaren : Tileqqamin, Iwexliǧen, Tazrut, Tiɛerbiyin, Taqrabt n ugemmaḍ, Agni n Yisulan akked Tbelluḍt. Tesɛa sin yiɣerbazen : aɣerbaz amenzu d ulemmas, tesɛa axxam n yilmeẓyen, lbusṭa, axxam n usejji…atg 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Isem n tala Amara 

 Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, mazal ur tefri s ttbut ɣef wansi i d-yekka wawal-agi ‘’Tala Amara’’. Nezmer ad d-nader 4 n turdiwin : tamezwarut, Tala Amara, bnan-tt iṭerkiyen deg useggas n 1690 ; tis snat, yekka-d wawal uddis Tala Amara seg Tala i iɛemmren imi teɛmer mačči am tliwa-niḍen ; tis tlata, d yiwen isem-is Amar U Yebrahim i iḍelben deg Yiṭurkiyen ad bnun tala-agi, dɣa, semman-as ɣef yisem-is ; ma d tis rebɛa, nnan-d d yiwen urgaz isem-is Amara i d-tenfa yemma-s iwumi qqaren ‘’Taɛbiṭ’’ netta akked gma-s Athmane seg tama-agi n Tamda imi xedmen tawaɣit. I wakken ad asen-semḥen u ad xelṣen tucḍiwin-nsen imi ulac leḥbus deg tmurt n leqbayel, ilaq ad d-afen tiliwa. Yal yiwen yufa-d tala, tettusemma ɣef yisem-is : Tala Amara, Tala Athmane.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Imezwura ɣer Tala Amara. 

 Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Youcef Yefsah, tiwaculin timezwura ɣer Tala Amara d Yefsah akked Seklaoui. Acu kan llan wid i d-yennan d akken tawacult tamezwarut d Rakem, akka i d-yeffeɣ deg temlilit n tezrawt i d-ihegga uxxam n yilmeẓyen n Tala Amara.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Amezruy d tmetti n Tala Amara. 

 Taddart n Tala Amara, d taddart i d-yufraren seg yal tama n tmetti : ama seg tama n tdamsa, idles neɣ tafellaḥt. Tettuneḥsab d amuggar n tudrin : ttemlilin-d yimsebriden deg-s mi ara ttɛeddayen ɣer yixxamen-nsen neɣ ara qessden adrar i uḥewwes. Tuli ɣef lebḥar, neɣ ɛlayet s wazal n 300 n lmitrat. Tettwassen aṭas s uneɣmas n tilibizyu Smail Yefsah i yettwanɣan ass 18 deg tuber 1993 deg Bab-Ezouar. Am wakken ttetwassen, diɣ, s lǧameɛ-is i yebnan s yizamulen n yimaziɣen. Yesɛa, aṭas n ziyyar umekkan-agi. 

 Deg tlemmast n taddart, tella yiwet n teẓrut iwumi qqaren ‘’Taẓrut n lfatiḥa’’. Taẓrut-a, yal wa d taqṣiṭ i d-yettawi fell-as : llan kra qqaren-d d akken d Ccix i yeɣran lfatiḥa deg umekkan-agi asmi i yemsefraq akked yiwet n terbaɛt n ziyyar iwumi yefra ugur-nsen. Ma d wiyaḍ, qqaren-d d akken aẓru-a, yeɣli-d seg yigenni (météorite) deg useggas 1770. Aẓru-a, yemxalaf mliḥ ɣef wid n lqaɛa, ayen yeǧǧan amur ameqqran n yimezdaɣ ad amnen s turda-agi taneggarut. Kran n yisalifiyen, bɣan ad t-rẓen imi tettẓuren medden u ssaɣayen fell-as ticemmuɛin, cwi kan ur ṣsawḍen ara ɣer lebɣi-nsen imi i asen-tugi taddart ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen yimḍebber n taddart. Mechuret, daɣen, taddart n Tala Amara s’’Tqerrubt n Useklawi’’(Deg-s lemqam, deg-s timeqqbert) akked ‘’Taxxamt n lǧir’’ i ttẓuren yimdanen s waṭas. Am wakken mazal ar tura ‘’Lǧameɛ n ṭṭelba’’ anda qqaren zik ṭṭelba u sɣaren deg-s Yirumyen deg lgirra-nni. Ɣer tama n lǧameɛ-a, yella yiwen uxxam aqdim yegrarben i yezdeɣ lɛesker n fransa anda yella ar tura lefḥem ‘’le charbon’’ n useggas 1957. 

 Deg Tala Amara i teḍra tfaska tamezwarut taɣelnawt n umezgun, aseggas 1998. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Kra n wudmawen n Tala Amara.  

  Smail Yefsah :  d aneɣmas deg tilibizyu tazzayrit (1987-1993). Ilul ass n, 29 deg tuber 1962, nɣan-t ass n 18 deg tuber 1993 ɣef 8 n ṣbeḥ, 39 n wussan mebɛed zwaǧ-is. 

  Sidi Hend Aseklaoui :  d amrabeḍ n taddart. Mazal ar tura ttẓurun ‘’Taqerrubt n Useklawi’’. Nnan-d yenfa ɣer tmurt n Suriya imi ur iɛedda ara wawal-is deg temlilit-nni n Meqleɛ asmi mlalen ‘’Sḥab n ṭnac’’, imeqqranen n tmurt n leqbayel i wakken ad kksen lewrata i tmeṭṭut akken ur ttewraten ara Iṭerkiyen i yettaɣen tiqbayliyen ḥala ɣef lǧal n wakal.

  Amar Ouyacoub :  yettwassnen aṭas deg radyu tis snat s tmezgunin-is. Yurar netta d Jean Gabin deg yiwen n usaru. Yesɛa ugar n 1000 n tmezgunin timecṭaḥ, yurar deg 90 n yisura. 

 Ilul Amar Ouyacoub deg Tala Amara, isem-agi Ouyacoub mačči imi n Wat Yaqub. Nnan-d d isem n zyada. Yella yettrebbi uccen, yettawi-t ɣer lexla mi ara iruḥ ad yeks. Iwala-t-id  yiwen, dɣa yenna-as :  ‘’Amar akked yaqub, meḥsub Amar akked wuccen. Syin ṭṭfen-as-t’’Amar Ouyacoub’’.

  Abelkader d Abederrahmane Yefsah :  d imyura. Gar wayen yura Abderrahmane, ad naf : ‘’…et Cain tua Abel, 2012 i yewwin arraz wis sin n Taher Djaout, ma d adlis wis sin i d-yefɣen ɣef demma n usmekti n tmettant n gma-s Smail, isemma-as ‘’Souvients-toi, O Algérie, de Smail et de tous les autres’’

  Koceila Hamadini :  yewwi talɣuɣa n tefriqt deg lkarati (Karaté).

  Lyes Izri :  amyurar i yellan ɣer terbaɛt n JSK. Yekker-d akka tura mgal uselway n JSK, Hannachi.

  Ramdane Chibani :  d amedyaz n taddart.

 Mebla ma nettu snat n tlawin yettdawin imuḍan s leḥcawec i yesɛan ccan d ameqqran,ɣef wakken d-nnan.

 <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Araz amenzu n Muḥya n wewraγ di tezrigt tis snat n useggas 2015, n tira yelhan n umezgun s tutlayt n tmaziγt yuγal i yilemẓi Kamel Dahmani i tecqquft yura s usentel « Taxelwit n Cciṭan » anda is-ffkan (300 000DA). Tamesbanit-agi tadelsant tella-d γef teγzi n ssin wussan, 07 d 08 dujambar yezrin deg wexxam n yedles n Lmulud n At-Mεemmar n Tizi-Wezzu d wexxam n umezgun Kateb Yassin. D tajmilt i unaẓur Muḥya ilmend n usmekti n umuli wis 11 γef tmettant-is. Tagara n tezrigt-agi tis snat, yesdurrit-id wexxam n umezgun kateb Yassin s leḥdur n unaγlaf n yelmeẓyen d wadal mas Uld Σli Lhadi, lwali n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu mas Brahim Merrad, aselway n wesqamu aγerfa n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu, tawacult n Muḥya d twacult n tẓuri. Σumar Feṭmuc, anemhal n wexxam n umezgun n bgayet yerra tajmilt i wid yellan γef lmendad n temzizelt-agi, i ixedmen lxedma-nsen akken iwata lḥal ger-asen, Saεid Cemmax, Nurdin At-Sliman, Hassen Ḥelwan, Rabah Boucetta, Lyes Mokrab, Abdellah Arkoub d M’hana Boudinar. Dγa ma yella n uγal-d γer umzizwer n temzizelt-agi, araz amenzu n Muḥya n wewraγ yuγal i Kamel Dahmani i tceqquft-is « Taxelwit n Cciṭan », araz wis ssin n lfeṭṭa yewwit Sellami Djelloul i uḍris-is « Lanina », araz wis kraḍ yuγal i Mezghoud Nacer i tceqquft-is « Am win yettrajun tayri ». Ma yella d ssin n warazen n usebγes uγalen i Naït Sidnas Muḥand-Lεarbi i tceqquft-is « Rreḥba n imcenaf » akked Hamid Hamour i uḍris-is  » yewḥec lfil rrnu-d ggma-s ». Tamesbanit-agi tekfa s tikci n warazen u ttiεad di tezrigt id-iteddun.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tudert n Muḥya 

 Muḥend Uyaḥya, isem-is aḥeqqani Muḥya Σebd Llah, ilul ass amenzu n Yunbir deg useggas n 1950 deg temnaḍt n Yiεeẓẓugen, taddart-is taḥeqqanit d At Rbaḥ tamnaḍt n Yibudraren. Yelmed deg Σeẓẓugen deg uγerbaz amezwaru d ulemmas, syen yekcem γer tesnawit n Σmiruc n Tizi-Wezzu.Ass mi d-yewwi akayad n lbak, yekcem γer tesdawit n Lezzayer tamanaγt deg useggas n 1968 anda yeḍfer tusnagt, almi d 1972. Syen yunag γer tmurt n Fransa anda ikemmel ulmud-is di tesdawit n Paris VIII, dγa imir kan yekcem gar terbaεt n ugraw n tezrawin γef tmaziγt « GDB », din i yebda asuqel n tceqqufin n umezgun seg tutlayin tiberraniyin γer tutlayt n teqbaylit, gar-asent Brecht «L’exception de la règle» yerra-tt-id γer teqbaylit s usentel «lldi imi-k, ddu d uḍar-ik» deg useggas 1974, yeskels-itt-id di tezrigin «Tala», syen yerna-d tiyiḍ deg useggas n 1975, amedya «Tacbaylit» akked «Sinistri». Leqdic n Muḥya ur yeḥbis ara deg umezgun kan, yura daγen tamedyazt s waṭas, γef tsertit, timetti, tigawt…. Ddeqs n yicennayen i d-icerwen seg-s, am Yidir, Ferḥat imaziγen imula deg usefru-nni i d-yessuqel Muḥya γer Boris Vian «Le déserteur» «Amẓarṭi», Barwagya i tecna terbaεt n yideflawen, «Muḥ n muḥ» i cnant tullas n ğerğer. Tewwi-t tmettant ass n 07 dujamber 2004 di tmanaγt n tmurt n Fransa Paris, yesεa 54 n yiseggasen.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ass-nni n larebɛa yezrin 18 deg waggur n tuber 2017 i mmden 24 n yiseggasen ɣef tmenɣiwt n uneɣmas akked umeɣnas meqqren Smail Yefsah. I ilulen ass n 29 tuber 1962 deg taddart n Tala Amara deg tɣiwant n Tizi Rached, deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Yelmed deg waṭas n yiɣerbazen n Tizi Uzzu, gar-asen; aɣerbaz n amenzu Hamouténe Ali, aɣerbaz alemmas Mouloud Feraoun, syin akkin deg tesnawit deg Lɛarc n Larbaɛa n At Yiraten, ma d almud-is asdawan, yella-d deg tesdawit n Lezzayer Tamanaɣt, anida yeɣra tussniwin n tsertit. Syin ɣer-s mi yekfa leqraya yekcem ɣer tɣamsa, deg tiliẓi n Lezzayer. Smail Yefsah, yella d aneɣmas yesɛan tabɣest akked tissas. Imi iwala belli tutlayt tayemmat n uɣref azzayri tettwaḥqar deg tiliẓi gar snat n tutlayin-agi taɛrabt akked tefransist, iɣaḍ-it lḥal aṭas imi tutlayt n lejdud tuɣal deg rrif. Yella yessaram ad d-yaweḍ anida ara teṭṭef amkan-is am tutlayin-nniḍen, dayen i d-yenna deg yiwet n tedwilt deg umaṭṭaf wis sin deg useggas n 1991, dɣa yenna-d: “Asirem-iw ameqqran ad waliɣ tidwilin deg tiliẓri n tmurt n Lezzayer s tmaziɣt, i wakken ur nettili ara d iɣriben deg tmurt-nneɣ…”. Tugdi mačči d ayla-s, ayen yellan deg wul-is yettban-d deg tigawin-is d uxeddim-is. Imi ula ma ggulen deg-s wat n yiččumer, nnan-as ad tḥebseḍ ayen txeddmeḍ, netta ur yerri ara aḍar ɣer deffir, maca d akemmel i ikemmel deg leqdic-is d timeɣnest-is ɣef teqbaylit d tmaziɣt s umata. Ass n 18 tuber 1993 deg Bab Ezzouar deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, i wwin tarwiḥt-is s leɣder yiɛdawen n tmussni, i t-yurǧan akken kan i d-yeffeɣ seg uxxam-is, wwten-t s ujenwi akked terṣaṣin, din i ddmen leɛmer-is. Ad nesmekti kan belli, asmi yemmut ɣur-s ala 31 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, yerna akken kan i wwḍen 40 n wussan ɣer tmeɣra n zzwaǧ-is. Asmi yemmut, bih bih isali yuɣ akk tamurt n Lezzayer, yettwanɣa urgaz deg lbaṭel ur yenɣi ur yukir. Ass n temḍelt-is i d-yellan deg tmeqbart n taddart-is Tala Amara, ur ufin ara medden anida ara ddun, ussan-d seg yal tama, ttnadin akk ad t-ẓren i tikkelt taneggarut ulamma zzement wallen-is. Seg wassen ar tizi n wass-a, yal mi ara d-yezzi 18 tuber n yal aseggas, tettuɣal-as tejmilt deg taddart-is, i wakken ur tettun ara irgazen yecban wigi.

  G. A. 

  
  Taɣiwant n Bechloul mazal-itt ar ass-a tettqabal aɣbel n tḥuna tiqdimin ur d-nefki ara udem yelhan i temdint. Ttwabnant acḥal d aseggas aya s wuzzal d uḥelyiw, kran-tent yimetjaren anda yal wa acu yesnuzuy. Almi d aseggas yezrin, yettwaddem yiwen n rray s- ɣur yiɛeggalen n usqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant iwakken ad hudden akk tiḥuna-agi iwakken deg ubdil-nsent, ad yettwaxdem wayen ara d-yesnernin ama deg wudem neɣ lmenfaɛa n yimezdaɣ. D acu kan, rray-agi iqubel-it-id reffu n yimetjaren i yegguman ad ffɣen. D axxam n ccreɛ i tt-igezmen deg rray iwakken ad d-yili usedrem, maca aya ur d-yelli ara deg yiwet n tikkelt. Tigawt taneggarut tella-d ass n lexmis iɛeddan, imi yiwet n tḥanut yellan tettusexdem d asečču uqbel ad tuɣal i usenz n yisufar yemxallafen tettwahud s reffu n wid i tt-yekran. Limer ahat mačči d iɣallen n laman i yellan deg umkan, yezmer ad yili uɛewwiq ameqqran ara iḥebsen aserdem. Seg tama-nsen, wid yekra akka tiḥuna-a, bedden ɣef yiwen n wawal ideg qqaren: “ I tura, amek ara d-nawi lqut i tarwa-nneɣ ma yella neḥbes lxedma?” Meḥsub, ssuturen ad asen-d-taf tɣiwant abdil anda ara kemmlen lḥirfa-nsen. Ma seg tama n yimḍebbren, rray d win ireṣṣan ɣef uḥric n useḥbiber ɣef tudert n yimdanen imi d tiḥuna tiqdimin seg tama, si tayeḍ, tigi ccemtent udem n temdint.” Akka tura, mazal azal n tlata n tḥuna i yetturajun ad d-taweḍ nnuba-nsent mi ara tt-yegzem deg rray uxxam n ccreɛ, iwakken ad bdun wiyaḍ yesɛan tiḥuna d ayla-nsen dima deg umkan-agi. Wigi, yessuter deg-sen uselway n tɣiwant ad sdermen iwakken ad bnun akken iwulem, netta seg tama-s ad d-yefk afus n lemɛawna s usewjed n lekwaɣeḍ iwulmen.

<p style="text-align: right;">  M. Smail 

<div> 
  
 Ulac anwa i izemren ad yettu as n 25 deg yunyu 1998, d ass qerriḥen s waṭas, acku anaẓur ameqqran, Matoub Lounes yettwanɣa s tersasin n leɣder deg Tala Bounan deg uzal qayli, sdat n tmeṭṭut-is Nadia d uletma-s. Akken kan i d-yusa seg tmurt n Fransa ɣer tmurt-is , yessufeɣ-d adebsi aneggaru Tabrat i lḥekkam , mazal yesgunfa deg uxxam-is, deg ussan n yimuras, yettwaɣder , yettwanɣa. Yeɣli i twacult-is, yeɣli i ugdud amazigh, yeɣli-as i tmazight. Yal aseggas seg 1998 ar ass-a n wussan, mazal ur d-iban anwa i t-yenɣan, uletma-s Malika teqqar-as : « ilaq ad d-iban assa-a neɣ azekka win yenɣan gma awḥid ». Ma d yemma-s, teqlalaḥ akken ilaq. Tezga tettɣimi sdat tewwurt am wakken tettraǧu ad d-yas mmi-s ; ulac anwa ur neẓri ara d akken Lwennas icennu ɣef tmazight, ɣef tlelli, tadukkli , leqbayel, tayri d waṭas n yisental i icudden ɣer tmetti taqbaylit. Ur iḥemmel ara tamḥeqqranit.Tajmilt i Lwennas, tettuɣal-as yal aseggas sɣur Axxam n yidles Mouloud Mammeri, sɣur taddart-is Tawrirt Moussa , sɣur tiddukkliwin yemgaraden am Tddukkla Mouloud Feraoun. Isem Matoub Loune, yettwassen deg tmurt n Leqbayel, yettwassen deg tmurt n Fransa. Isem-is yettunefk i waṭas n yimekwan neɣ n yiberdan, am Uxxam n yidles yellan deg Micli, neɣ abrid yellan deg Fransa. Tella Tugna-ines deg waṭas n tuddar am taddart n At Hamsi deg Uqbil , imi Lwennas ḥemmlen-t aṭas lLeqbayel acku ula d netta iḥemmel-iten. Aseggas –agi, tusa-d tmettut-is Nadia s axxam-is imi acḥal i teqqim ulac-itt, tusa-d akken ad as-terr tajmilt i urgaz-is Lwennas , tusa-d twacult-is. Ma d Leqbayel, sumata, ddurt uqbel ass n 25 i bdan aheyyi i tejmilt n usalas d uzamul n tmazɣa Matoub Lounes.

  Z. B. Y. 

  
 Melmi ara tagad tmeṭṭut? Ɣas yuzzel wawal taggara-a ɣef ucelleqluq n waskiw (kyste ovarien) gar tulawin, d timexḍa tid yessawḍen ad fehment tidet-ines; i mi mačči texṛeb tarda(les règles) neɣ ad d-teddukkel d uqṛaḥ ad tt-tcudd tmeṭṭut ɣer waṭṭan-a. U mačči mi tfaq tesɛa-t ad testehzi deg-s neɣ ad tt-yarez uɣilif fell-as. Ɣef waya nebɣa ad d-nefekk kra n tmusniwin ɣef waṭṭan-a. Asegzi n ucelleqluq n waskiw . D talɣa tamaynut icuban taculliḍt yeččuṛen d aman. Tezmer ad d-tlal daxel n waskiw neɣ beṛṛa-s. Sumata, yettili kan deg yiwet n tama. Tignatin ideg i d-yettban waṭṭan-a . Ccirat yezgan ɣer tlawin am : aqṛaḥ ameqqṛan s ddaw n tɛebbuḍt, ladɣa di tallit n tarda; anexṛub n tarda ara d-yettasen war ttiɛad, tikkwal ma meqqeṛ ucelleqluq yezzmer ad d-iban s usebren n waskiw. Iseggasen-a ineggura, tussna tbeggen-d d akken aṭṭan-a, yezmer ad yili d sebba n uɛeṭṭel n dderya. Tikkwal yezmer ad yili d asusam, war ma banent-d ccirat-a, meɛna s l’echographie n usefqed ad d-iḍḥu. Acu n tewsatin n ucelleqluq i yellan ? S ttawil n l’écographie, amejjay yezmer ad yegg amgarad s lebyan gar snat n tewsatin n ucelleqluq n waskiw : acelleqluq icudden s anerni n tmellalt i d-yettlalen seg waskiw yal ayyur, imi ma ur tessaweḍ ara ad d-teffeɣ seg-s, tettuɣal d acelleqluq deg waskiw, d tawsit-a i yeṭṭuqten aṭas (25% n tilemẓẓiyin), sumata kṛaḍ n wagguren ar sdat, ad iɣab war ma yewwi-d kra n wugur neɣ n tugdi. Yella daɣen ucelleqluq agmaman (kyste organique), ur yeṭṭuqqet ara am umenzu (5% n tilawin), yettlal daxel n waskiw gar tesririn-is(cellules), yesɛa tazmert meqqṛen, ad yeqqel d lkunṣir s teɣzi n wakud, d win ur nettruḥu ara seld kṛad n wayyuren. Acu n ttawil n usejji uɣur tessawed tujjya ass-a? Asejji yettemgarad seg tewsit ɣer tayeḍ, seg uswir n waṭṭan ɣer wayeḍ, maca s umata acelleqluq icudden s anerni n tmellalt ur t-ittudawi ara imi yettṛuḥu s wakud, maca llan wid yettakken tihurmunin (hormones *pilule*) akken ad tṣeggem tarda n tmeṭṭut. Ma d asejji n ucelleqluq agmaman s umata d acerreg (chirurgie), ama s twakksa n ucelleqluq kan, ladɣa ɣur tin werɛad nesɛi dderya ,neɣ s twakksa n waskiw i meṛṛa ɣur tin iɛeddan 50 n yiseggasen. Taggara. Acelleqluq n waskiw, d aṭṭan yeddan ass-a di tmetti. Ɣef waya, yessefk ɣef yal tameṭṭut ɣas ur tesɛi kra n ccirat icudden ɣur-s, ad terzu s amejjay, ad texdem l’échographie n usefqed akken ad tekkes aɣbel. U ma yeḍḥa-d tesɛa acelleqluq agmaman? ad t-id-tekkes ɣef zik lḥal uqbel ad yeldi tawwurt i lkunṣir. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Sali Dali 

  
 Imezdaɣ n Tizi Uzzu, ḥemmlen u ttqadaren s umata aberrani. Ɣef wanct-a, dɣa, i d-ttasen-d ɣur-s ula seg tmura tiberraniyen, ladɣa tigi n unẓul. Yal wa d acu i t-id-yewwin. Wa yerwel-d seg ṭṭrad n tmurt-is, am yimezdaɣ n tmura n unẓul, Isuriyen d win-nniḍe, wiyaḍ d axeddim i ten-id-yewwin. D acu kan, ussan-agi ineggura, s imal yettimɣur umḍan n yimezdaɣ n tmura-agi n unẓul, neɣ wid iwumi qqaren akka iberkanen. « Bdan-tt s sadaqa, uɣalen win i asen-yefkan duru, ad d-tazzel terbeɛt n 10 yid-sen, ɣer ɣur-k. Tullas, dɣa, d tawaɣit : ad ttaṭṭafent imdanen seg yiselsa-nsen, yerna mačči yiwen umkan i ṭṭfen , llan tama n la garre sewwayen dinna, gganen dinna. Smesxen akk tawennadt » akka i d-icetka yiwen n umezdaɣ n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Aṭas i yettcetkin seg-sen, maca ulac acu i d-yeḍran akka s wudem unṣib i tifra-nsen. Ttugaden yimdanen ad ṭṭfen aṭṭanen seg lǧiha-nsen imi ttruḥen ɣer yiɣerbazen, ttalin ɣer ttawilat n usiweḍ, nutni gganen deg yimekwan iwumi ssamasen s timad-nsen, ɣef wakken i d-iban wanda ttilin. Wamag aɛiwen, ttɛawanen-ten akken ilaq. « Ilaq imḍebbren, ad dafen tifrat i taluft-a. Mačči d akrah i ten-nekreh, meɛna d tamsalt n tdawsa d tmetti » i iwala yiwen umezdaɣ-nniḍen. Wiyaḍ, walan d akken ma yella kra n unujmuɛ n usurdi, ilaq ad iruḥ ɣer yimezdagh n Tizi Uzzu i yeṣɛan aṭas n yimeɣban akked yimuḍan. « Ula deg lemtel yella, win yebɣan ad iẓur lemqam, ad yezwir deg wat uxxam », labeḍda imuḍan n tgezzal i yeḥwaǧen afus n tallelt. Kra n yimezdagh n Tizi Uzzu, iɣaḍ-iten lḥal « Imi arrac n tmurt yettinigen ɣer tmura lberrani, ur ttidiren ara ma yella ur xdimen ara, maca wigi ufan kullec baṭel, ttruhun gganen ula deg leǧwameɛ, ad buhrun.

  Z. B. Y. 

  
 Segmi telḥa teṭiknulujit ɣer sdat, kra seg wayen i d-yeqqersen seg-s yewwi-d aɣilif i tmetti s umata. Gar yiɣilifen-a ihi, i icewwlen amdan, yella win n yisawalen imegziyen i d-yennulfan taggara-ya. Yuɣ lḥal, llan tura wid i asen-yessawalen iselkimen imeẓyanen (mini-ordinateurs), segmi yettwawef deg-sen, qrib, wayen yakk yettilin deg uselkim. Ladɣa ayen ɣef yettḥebbir umeqqran, aniɛad amecṭuḥ: am tvidyutin, internet, iseɣẓan(logiciels), akked wurar n video. Ihi, segmi nuḥen wallalen-a, uɣalen ttmeẓran deg waṭas n yifassen, ula deg wid n warrac. Netta, ɣur yineggura-ya i d-nebder, aṭas i yettwalin dakken ayen izemren asen-d-yili d timḍerrit seg tilifunat-a, yugar s waṭas abaɣur(lfayda). Yettusemma, mi ara yili d agrud, ala aɣraq ara yeɣreq deg yilel n tilifun-a imegzi, ala aḥsal i ara as-yeḥsel wayen ara as-d-iwehhi. Settwaɣayen, ttḍurrun, ssuḍunen. Ma ǧǧan yimawlan agrud i ur nɛedda 15 n yiseggasen ad yekseb asawal imegzi, ilaq ad ḥsun belli atnan d imasayen (résponsables) ɣef waṭas n twuɣa i izemren ad yili. Acku, ma yufa ugrud tama-s kra, ɣas ma ad t-iḍur ur yeẓri. Ama seg tama n usegmi-ines (tterbiya) skud ad yuɣal yettwanas s waṭas asawal, dɣa ad yeṭṭixxir simmal seg tmetti, neɣ seg tama n tɣuri-ines, imi ad itettu ma yesɛa aqrab yal mara d-yeffeɣ seg tneɣrit (classe), dɣa ihi ad yettader yettahda deg uswir-is deg uɣerbaz. Neɣ seg tama nniḍen s wazal-is daɣen, tin n tdawsa-s (sseḥḥa), acku iban-d belli agrud bu tilifun imegzi yessenqes aḥerrek, tetekkes-as tɣawsa-nni-nnes akud n waddal. War ma nettu dakken ɣur kra n yimsujjiwen, uraren n yisawalen-a snulfuyen-d tikwal ɣur warrac ahraj-nni neɣ ayen mu qqaren s tefransist l’épilepsie . Ula d isawalen nniḍen ttḍurrun. anect-a mačči kan deg tilifunat i ileḥḥun s unagraw android, maca ula d isawalen-nni isehlanen ur laqen i uqcic amecṭuḥ. Ma neẓra dakken s tiɣriwin, iznan, ed wurar, ttagen-as-d timḍerrit deg teɣzi n wakud s tɣara-ya neɣ s ta. Meḥsub, d ayen ara d-nini, belli asawal i ugrud ur ilaq ara maḍi alama yessaweḍ tillumẓit (adolescence). Aredmani, yewwi-d ad d-tbin da nnuba n yimawlan i ur yewwi-d ad ddreɣlen ɣef tlufa-ya.            

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Taḥanut d yiwet gar 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i d- yezgan deg ugafa n tɣiwant-agi u deg ugafa n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tebԑed ɣef usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan yellan deg Lebḍaḥi s wazal n 10 km. Taddart-agi, tettidir iseggasen-agi ineggura lexsas d ameqqran, deg yiḥricen d yisenfaren yemgarden n tudert tatrart gar-asen: ttawil n Internet, lgaz n temdint, yir liḥala n yiberdan, asezdeg n tawennaḍt, imḍiqen i yilmeẓyen, d uɣbel n waman tissit…atg, tura yerna ula d win n yiḍuman. Seg wasmi i d-yewwet udfel, ur d-εeddan ara ikamyunen-nni yettawin iḍuman. Azal n 15 n wussan-agi, iḍuman-nni i d-suffɣen yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi, mazal-iten deg tewwurt n taddart, s daxel n yicelwiḍen iberkanen. D ayen i d-yeglan s rriḥa d iqejan yesḍen, ladɣa deg yiḍ. Imezdaɣ n taddart-agi n Tḥanut, ssuturen deg yimḍebbren teεna temsalt, ladɣa aselway n Usqamu aɣerfan n Ait Aissa Mimoun, iɣef yella mass Aki Chabane ɣef uqerruy-is. i wakken ad uɣalen s tazzla yikamyunen yettawin iḍuman-agi, d tiwin n yisnedyaq-nniḍen ijdiden n yiḍuman, imi iqdimen-nni gezmen akk, uɣalen ur slihen ara.

<p style="text-align: right;"> A.A 

<div> 
  
 Seg yilemẓiyen i d-yeffɣen seg tesdawit s ugerdas (diplôme) deg yifassen, drus maḍi umi d-tsaḥ tegnit ufan amahil deg walbaɛḍ n yimeḍqan. Amur nniḍen akk, ma d tiqcicin atentan ttwanasent axxam, ma d iqcicen rwan iɣimi deg leqhawi. Tuffɣa seg tesdawit mbaɛd ugar n 15 n yiseggasen d taɣuri, ur telli ara akken i tt-yessaram unelmad tazwara. Ad iɣil ad d-yawi kan turagt (licence) neɣ d majister, ad yaf dindin aqeddic. Netta taggara, ma d-yaweḍ ɣer uswir-nni ad yesres agerdas-is bac ad t-tɣum takka deg uxxam. Wis d sin n yiseggasen, tlala neɣ rebɛa akken ad yaf lxedma. Am umsiẓwer n uselmed i d-yellan deg wayyur n yulyu iɛeddan, 13710 n yimyizewren i yesɛaddan seg Bgayet, ala i 356 n yimukan kan. «Yewɛer aṭas akken ad trebḥeḍ amsiẓwer n uselmed, deg-s zzher, deg-s tamussni, ed waṭas n tɣawsiwin nniḍen. Ɣef waya, llan wid i yettɛemmiden ad sɛeddin berra i twilayt-nsen ɣas ad beɛden». Ay d-tenna yiwet n tesdawant. Rnu i waya daɣen, aɣilif n yinelmaden-a yerza ula d tadamsa-nsen n yal ass, acku ma yella ttuɣ ttawin-d taggazt-nni takraḍyurt (bourse trimestrielle) mara kfun taɣuri ad tekfu yid-s.

  
 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Isufar </span>

 125 g n lfarina Ciṭ n lmelḥ 1 n tcelwidt n yiɣes 2 n tmellalin 25 g n zzit uzemmur 50 g n uyefki 500 g n tbexsisin

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Seḥmut lkuca ɣer à 185°C neɣ ɛad ugar. Sxelḍed akk isufar slid tibexsisin. Dehnet lmul-nni, ternum-as ciṭ n lfarina, syin terrem ɣur-s arekti-nni. Gezzmet tibexsisin ɣef sin neɣ ɣef rebɛa ɣef laḥsab n wakken meqqrit, terrem-tent s ufella n urekti, aglim-nsent ɣer s ddaw. Anfet ad yeww azal n uzgen n ssaɛa. Akka, ad twalim yuɣal d ameqqran xas ma iban-d deg tazwara meẓẓi maḍi. Agatu-agi, nezmer ad yemmečč deg tiremt n ssbeḥ neɣ deg taggara n lmakla.

  Daya 

  
 Akken iban, sed aneggaru n wayyur n meɣres yezrin i tettwaseqqef tfaska n tmedyezt tamaziɣt deg Udrar n Fad s tikci n warrazen i yimedyazen i d-yufraren deg tecwawt n umḥizwer. Dɣa nella nefka-awen ttiɛad i wass-a i wugar n yineɣmisen. Deg wayen yerzan tameɣra n ccna, yewwi-d ad d-nini dakken tga-tt Malika Dumran lwaḥi ed win i d-teɛreḍ, anaẓur  Waɛzib Muḥend Ameẓyan, war ma nettu acennay n taddart mass Wali Ɛebdelɣani. Ma ɣef yimedyazen i d-yufraren, ad d-naf Kaṭiya Tuwwat tewwi arraz amezwaru, mass Yunsi Mulud i d-yerzan seg waɣir n Seṭṭif isaḥ-as-d warraz wis sin, ma yella d ilemẓi n Saleḥ Luni yettunefk-as warraz wis kraḍ. Arraz n tmeṭṭut d win i teddem Buciba Fatiḥa, win n tantala yuklal-it Seḥrawi Ɛebdelwehhab. Ma yella d arraz n yilemẓi tḥella-t-id Tumert Masisilya, win n yimezgi yeggra-d gar yifassen n Neccaf Muḥemmed, ma d arraz n umɣar yuɣal-d i mass Saɛid Fellag seg Tizi. War ma nettu, yuɣ lḥal, arraz n uzayez i d-yennulfan ilindin, ed i tefka tesqamut n yimedyazen aseggas-a i umedyaz Kassa Taɛerkubt. Deg temlilit daɣen, tettwar tejmilt i yiwen n uɛeggal urmid n Tdukkla mass Yusef Azemmur.

 Nnan-d ɣef tfaska

 Katiya Tuwwat (arraz amezwaru) 

 Ttḥulfuɣ i lferḥ d ameqqran, d ameqqran armi ahat ur zmireɣ ara ad t-id-weṣfeɣ s imeslayen, farḥeɣ-asen ugar i yisefra-inu imi d awal-nsen i yewwin araz mačči d nekk. Nekk ɣef wakken walaɣ yuli uswir n tmedyezt deg Udrar n Fad. Tidukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad d leqdic, d amennuɣ, d tirrugza, d tayri, d ccbaḥa, d tilelli, d asirem, d taqbaylit… ».

 Mulud Yunsi, ( arraz wis sin ) 

 « Taqbaylit i yewwin arraz imi d nettat i d iswi n tsekla ideg nqeddec, ma d Tiddukla Adrar n Fad d aɣerbaz n leqdic aseklan imi ass-a, yewweḍ yisem-is ɣer tɣemmar n tmazɣa..Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ tezger asawen yessefcalen s lexsas n wallalen… ».

 Saleḥ Luni ( arraz wis kraḍ ) 

  «  Cerheɣ aṭas mi wwiɣ arraz di tikkin-inu tamenzut di tfaska n tmedyezt acku yuli deg-s uswir aṭas. Ad snemreɣ iɛeyyalen n tdukkla Udrar n Fad s umata ɣef leqdic-nsen ama d aselway ilemẓi Fares ama d Sadeq REBBAƐI, akked yimezdeɣ n At Smaɛel  merra».

 Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Yiwet n tikkelt, yiwen umerkanti n Tgemmut Ukerruc, <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>yewwi-d tameṭṭut i mmi-s seg At Aysi. Mi d-uɣalen, <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>ɛeddan-d si Larebεa, rsen-d seg yiserdyan, kecmen ɣer yiwet n lqahwa, ixeddem-itt yiwen n At Ḥed Waɛmar seg taddart Ufella. Sswan lqahwa, ruḥen ur xliṣen ara. Syin Awmar Muḥed Waɛmar iwwi asefru fell-asen :

 Taddart iznuzun iẓerman

<p style="text-align: left;"><em> I teḥsiḍ ad iyi-fken(…) Rret-as lfarḥ d ineẓman </em>

 <em> I Muḥed u RemḍanD ccɣel-is i ixesren </em>

 <em> Xas qqed-iyi s yimegran I asen-yerran ccan </em>

 <em> I yat tḥeṣṣabt n tɣeṭṭen Ḥaren-d amzun d lfursan </em>

 <em> Nɣil d At MeqqranAsmi llan di zik-nsen </em>

 <em> Ula d Muḥed d aṭeḥḥan Yid-s i d-ddan </em>

 <em> Rran-t d udi gar-asen A sserbayaɣ di lkisan </em>

 <em> Amzun d lbizan D dduxan la ttkeyyifen  </em>

 Asmi yewweḍ wawal ɣer Tgemmut Ukerruc, Akli Iḥeddaden, mmi-s n Lḥaǧ Aεli, iɣaḍ-it lḥal, iruḥ-d azekka-nni ɣer Larebea netta d Lmulud Muḥed u Lεarbi. Kecmen ɣer lqahwa-nni deg swan lqahwa iḍelli-nni Wat Tgemmut Ukerruc, mi d-wwin tislit. Isuter lqahwa. Inṭeq-d yiwen, yenna-asen: ‘’tuɣalem-d a lqahwa n Dda Awmar! Iḍelli i yewwi fell-awen asefru!’’

 Yenṭṭeq Wakli iḥeddaden yenna:

  ‘’Di baba ara ireggemD lfeṭṭa i ixeddem 

  Tecbaḥ ula ṣsenɛa-s Asmi yella zzman yewqem 

  Aṭas i ikarrem Ččan medden nneɛma-s 

  <span style='font-family: "times new roman&amp;quot,; times;'>I Sumar d acu d-ixdem </span>Tagenza n lhem 

  Ur yeḥyi ula d dderya-s  

 Dɣa Lḥaǧ u Caban n At Amran si Tgemmut Ukerruc yewwi-as-d cwiṭ n lwaɛda, yenna-as : ‘’d ayen, ur d-rennu ara! Kečč tenniḍ-d iḍelli, netta yenna-d ass-agi. Wellah ma tɛewed-as!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Aṭas i yettazzalen tura akka d awal ɣef yimal n ubrid n Ɛecba deg Xerraṭa. Imdanen ttmesteqsayen ladɣa ɣef lweqt i mazal akken ad kfun lecɣal n ureqqeɛ d ussuseɛ n ubrid-a i yebdan deg 2013, akken ad tthennin, dayen, xersum ciṭṭuḥ kan, i lḥers i d-yettnulfayen yal ass deg ufalu (tunnel). Ula d lwali n Bgayet, mass Uld Saleḥ Zituni, yella yerza ɣer din ɣef demma, yebrir iɛeddan, ad yessefqed ɣef lxedma, ad yessuter, diɣ, kra n uɣsab deg yimḍebbren n usenfar. Tazwara, mi akken teṭṭef tkebbanit Haddad, lwaḥi d teṭurkit asenfar, yella-d umsifham ɣef 30 n wayyuren i keffu n lecɣal. Maca, taggara-a, iban-d am wakken tbeddel taluft. Aya, segmi ḥebsen yiqeddicen kra n lweqt akken, imi d-llan wuguren n lxedma d tedrimt, uɣalen kemmlen. Dɣa, yenna-d imir-nni yiwen seg yimḍebbren n termist dakken ssaramen ad asen-ternu lḥukuma i ssuma-nni tamezwarut swayes ṭṭfen lxedma.Ɣef leḥsab-nsen, ma yella qqimen akken atan nṭerren, ad xesren ɣer taggara. Seg waya, ussan-a kan, aṭas i d-sḥebsen deg yixeddamen d txeddamin mi walan ur asen-sran tura i waṭas n yifassen akken ad qedcen. Ur zmiren, daɣen, ad ten-ttxellisen deg waṭas deg-sen. Seg tama n Tsexriwt d Ayt Smaɛel, ma drus snat n teḥdayin i d-sṭaxxren seg lxedma, wiss ad uɣalent neɣ uhu. Imi, akken i aɣ-d-yewweḍ yisalli, yella win i d-sṭaxxren d asṭixxer, yella win i sersen ad yesgunfu war axelles di leɛḍil alama i d-teḥḍer tegnit ad yuɣal. Ad d-nesmekti kan, belli azgen seg lecɣal n ubrid-a, yemmug dayen, ur d-yeqqim ihi xilla. S teldayt n ubrid-a n Ɛecba qabel neɣ wabel, ad d-yawi ayendin d talwit d userreḥ i ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9, ladɣa, deg ufalu aqbur iwumi ssawalen yinehharen merra « Afalu n lmut ».

<p style="text-align: right;">   Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Azal n 10 n wussan, akka tura, ttasen-d waman i d-yekkan seg ubaraj n Ticiḥaf i d-yezgan di tɣiwant n Buḥamza ɣer yixxamen, luɣen. Aya d ayen i izerɛen lxuf ɣer yimezdaɣ n tɣiwanin n lwilaya i tessen seg waman-agi. Seg yimir-n, ttazalen u ttnadin yimezdaɣ ɣef waman zedigen i tissit. win izemren ad d-yaɣ yettaɣ-d , wiyaḍ ttruḥun ɣer tliwa d leɛwanser i d-yezgan deg tudrin d yidurar i wakken ad d-agmen aman. Xas akken deg ulɣu i d-tefkan tkubbanit tazayrit n waman ɣef lehhu n tissit n waman-a, maca imezdaɣ, ttɣunzun-ten. Ala win terra tmara i ten-itessen. Nesteqsa imḍebbren n tkubbanit tazayrit n waman, nnan-d belli “aman-agi lhan i tissit’’, ma d sebba n uluɣu-nsen, d lixsas n waman deg ubaraj, acku yuder s waṭas uswir n waman yellan deg-s. D sebba n lixsas n waman aseggas-agi, aladɣa di tallit n unebdu, rnu ɣur-s imdanen seqdacen s waṭas aman deg tallit-ag, ɣer waya daɣen, ad d-nernu aɣurar, imi tagrest iɛeddan ur ččuren ara deg-s maḍi yibarajen n waman, gar-asen win n Ticiḥaf. Yeɣri useggas.

  B.Ben. 

  
 Am yal tiddukla n tmurt n leqbayel, Tiddukla Tadelsant n taddart n Tewrirt-Mimun «ASAKA», tesfuggel Yennayer 2965. I lmend n useggas-agi amaynut tefka arrazen i inelmaden n weswir wis 5 n uɣerbaz amenzu i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt n tsuqilt. Inelmaden-agi d wid n iɣerbazen imenza n tɣiwant n At-Yanni: Seddur Anayis, Lewaǧ Ṣara, Urak Lina, Cami Ɣnima, Neddil Litisya, Ǧennan Alsan, Ǧennan Sufi , Waza Abdelqader. 

 Aya illa-d i lmend n usebɣes nsen i wakken ad issinen ccan d wazal i yuklal yidles d umezruy nneɣ : amaziɣ.  Gar imeẓyanen-agi, yettunefk-as warraz n usebɣes n 50 000,00 da, i Deḥlal Canez, tanelmadt n tesnawit, imi tessaweḍ ad tawi arraz amenzu di Tfaska tagraɣlant n tsekla n imeẓanen, ass nni 20 yunyu 2014. Tewwi arraz-agi s tmacahutt n tmaziɣt i tura i lmend n temsizzelt n tsekla n imeẓyanen i d-tetthegi tfaska-agi n Lezzayer. Timlilit-agi n tikci n warrazen i d-yellan deg wexxam n yidles Mulud At Mɛemmer n At Yanni, ḥedren deg-s iɛeggalen n tɣiwant, imawlan n inelmaden. S yin, Mass Bacuci Ali, iwwi-d awal ɣef umezruy d wazal n yennayer di tmetti tamaziɣt. Amek daɣen ara s-d-yuɣal wazal d lficṭa i deg ur yettili yixeddim yerna ad tili tettwaxleṣ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Tiddukla Asaka 

  
 Mbeɛd ayendin d ameslay yeḥman ɣef yir ssifa i d-yefka usebdad n Lwennas Meɛtub deg tɣiwant Ssuq Letnin, ama deg tɣamsa neɣ deg yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen, kkren yimḍebbren n tɣiwant-a, qelɛen-t akken ad as-yettwaɛiwed ureqqeɛ. Ad d-nesmekti dakken llan cetkayen wid iḥemmlen Lwennas Meɛtub seg usebdad-a, i yettwasbedden I lmend n umulli n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen, acku walan-t yessexser ama d udem n unaẓur i yettzemmil, ama d tiddi-s. Dɣa imi teṣfa nniya n tɣiwant n Ssuq Letnin, tessufeɣ-d ulɣu ass n 23 yebrir, ideg i d-nnan, kksen-t akken ad as-iɛiweḍ amsal unaẓur i t-ixedmen. Ad t-id-yerr yettcabi ugar ɣer win yefkan tudert-is ɣef yidles-is. Ulamma sḥassfen ɣef kra n tmuɣliwin n diri, ur nelli d tibennayin, sɣur kra. Ma yella d asbedd-ines tikkelt-nniḍen, ad yili ass n 25 deg yunyu, ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i aɣ-d-yewwḍen.

  M. K.  

  
  Agouni n Teslent 

 Agouni n teslent d taddart tamezwarut n tudrin n Ain El Hammam. Ala nettat i d taddart anda ur tessen ara aman n tbernint (deg tudrin anda llan waman n tbernint). Aman-agi n tbernint, sseqdacen-ten kan i tarda. Ma d ayen yeɛnan asewwi d tissit, sexdamen aman n tliwa imi sɛan 6.Tella tetabaɛ lɛerc n Akbil, syin Abu Youcef, tuɣal taggara-a deg lɣerc n Michelet. Tella, taddart-a, uqbel ad tili temdint n Michelet neɣ Ain El Hammam. Deg-s, dɣa, ara bnun, niqal tamdint-agi n Michelet limer mačči d imezdaɣ-is i yugin. Agouni n Teslent, qqaren-as ‘’Le village rebelle’’ imi seg zik yesseqdac ‘’Taqbaylit’’ deg tudert-is : d At wawal d tirrugza ; aṭas n temsal i ssemsawan gar tudrin neɣ, ɛad, gar leɛrac. Qqimen-d kra n yinzan ar tura. ‘’Agad ay Agouni n Teslent, amer Akaouj ad ak-yexlu…’’, neɣ, ‘’Awer yekkes Igoufaf i Taqa’’. Gar taddart n zik d tin n tura, d acu i ibeddlen, d acu yeqqimen deg Agouni n Teslent ? Neɣli-d deg taddart-agi, gan-aɣ irebbi, ḥkan-aɣ-d kra n lesrar…deg taddart-agi i yezdeɣ Oumokrane Omar winna yewwten Boumediène s rṣas deg useggas n 1967, rrif-nni n taddart-agi, daɣen, i yufan anda meḍlen ‘’yirebraben’’ Hervé Gourdel.

  Takerḍa n Agouni n Teslent. 

 Tebɛed taddart-a s wazal n 50 n kilimitr ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Ɛlayet ɣef lebḥar s 850 n lmitrat. Zzint-as-d tudrin-a : seg usamar, Taourirt Amrane ; seg umalu, Tamejjut ; seg unẓul, At Hemsi ma seg ugafa, ad naf tamdint n Michelet.

 Zedɣen deg-s qrib 4000 n yimdanen. Tesɛa 4 n yiderma : At Tabet, At Salah Ouhmed, At Telha d Ikadoumen. Deg yiseggasen-nni n 90, kkren-d mgal rrebrab : gan tasqamut ‘’l’autodéfense’’ deg taddart. D nutni i d taddart tis snat, mebɛed Igoujdal, i d-yekkren ad ḥerben ɣef nnif d lḥerma n tudrin am yimezwura-nsen.

 I wakken ad tkecmeḍ, zik, ɣer taddart, ilaq ad tɛeddiḍ s umekkan n tɛessast iwumi qqaren, dɣa, ’’Taɛessast’’, llant snat : yiwet n ufella, tayeḍ n wadda. Ala syin i yella ubrid ɣer taddart imi ixxamen neṭṭḍen akk gar-asen, wa icudd ɣer wa. Zik mi ara yebnu yiwen irennu kan 3 n leḥyuḍ, wis rebɛa n lǧar-is, ɣur-s ara yessenṭeḍ axxam-is. ‘’D izurar ɣef yidurar’’ akken i as-yenna At Mengellat. Tesɛa taddart-a, aɣerbaz amenzu, axxam n usejji, annar n ddabex, lemɛinsra, lǧameɛ aqdim, sin n yixxamen n yilmeẓyen, snat n tjumuyaɛ akked tḥuna i tebna taddart. 

  Isem-agi ‘’Agouni n Teslent. 

 Agouni n teslent, d awal uddis : Aggouni (agni) + taslent. Semman-as ‘’Agni imi d lewḍa xas akken deg tawrirt i d-yezga. Ma d ’’Taslent’’ d tejra yellan dinna. Nnan-d asmi i tt-gezmen, kkan deg-s 7 wussan. 

  Si Tala n Sila neɣ n Wudi , syin Michelet ar Ain El Hammam. 

 Michelet (Jules Michelet. 1798-1874) d isem n yiwen umusnaw i yefkan Yiṛumyen i temdint-a asmi i tt-bnan deg useggas n 1881. Yella umekkan-nni qqaren-as ‘’Tala n Sila’’ neɣ ‘’Tala n Wudi’’. Syin asmi tefra lgirra, tuɣal semman-as Ain El Hammam. Isem-a (Ain El Hammam), yekka-d sɣur Hocine Ait Ahmed, ɣef wakken i heddren deg tmetti. Akken kan tefra, Ait Ahmed, yesɛa awal-is deg tennaṭ-agi n Ǧerǧer. U netta seg zik ur yebɣi ara ad tban tama-agi n tmurt n leqbayel d akken temgarad deg yidles ɣef tiyaḍ. Yura-t s timmad-is deg udlis ‘’Mémoires d’un combattant’’ ɣef wasmi yugi Rachid Ali Yahia tamuɣli-nni ‘’Lezzayer d aɛrabt tineslemt’’, ha-t-an wacu yura : »A partir de cette épisode, la Kabylie trainera … la casserole du «berbérisme» avec toutes les connotations irrationnelles, négatives et ironiques, attachées à la fonction d’épouvantail. Il y a comme ça des grains de sable, des personnages insignifiants, qui entraînent dans la vie politique des conséquences démesurées. » P.179

  Amezruy d tmetti. 

 Icudd umezruy n taddart, am tudrin n tmurt n leqbayel, s waṭas ɣer tmucuha n ddin akked tirrugza. Xas yella wacu yemgaraden gar zik d tura, meɛna lsas ɣef wacu tebna tmurt n leqbayel mazal ur irab ara, xas yenquqel ciṭ akka deg kra n tamawin. Akken yebɣu yili wugur n tmurt, imezdaɣ-is ttafen-as-d tifrat. D tamsalt kan n lweqt. 

 S lqanun n taddart-a, i tella Fransa tesselḥuy ccreɛ-is. D win n taddart n zik i mazal ar tura xas ulamma yella-d deg-s usnerni i yettabaɛen tudert tatrart. Imezdaɣ-is akken ma llan ttqadaren-t. kra n yimedyaten ɣef uqader n lqanun n taddart.

  Taqsiṭ n yiǧadarmiyen n fransa. 

 Deg lqanun n taddart n Agouni n Teslen d akken s kra n win ara ikecmen taddart, ad yelḥu ɣef uḍar : ulac rrekba ɣef uɣyul neɣ ɣef uɛidiw. Ihi, yiwen wass, kecmen-d yiǧadarmiyen taddart s ufella n yiɛidiwen. Yekker Dahmouche Belaid iwumi qqaren Bubɛic, yesres-iten-id ɣer lqaɛa. Yugi-asen ad lḥun deg taddart nutni s ufella n yiɛidiwen. Deg taggara, cudden-t wwin-t ɣer la brigade n Michelet. Rran-t ɣer lḥebs. Tameddint mi d-yusa Lamin n taddart, ḥkan-as ayen yeḍran. Iruḥ ɣer yimḍebber n yiǧadarmiyen, yenna-as tadyant. Syin suffɣen-d Bubɛic deg lḥebs, meɛna lamin yugi ad d-iruḥ. Mi as-nnan, d ayen tura yeffeɣ-d, d acu i tettraǧuḍ ? yenna-asen : ‘’ilaq ad xelsen lexṭeyya i yiǧadarmiyen-nni i yelḥan deg taddart ɣer yiɛidiwen.’’ Ihi, ur d-iruḥ ara almi xelsen 4 aṣurdi.

  Taqsiṭ n uneɣlaf Ahmed Ali Ghazali.  

 Tagi teḍra deg yiseggasen-nni n tmanyin. Yal mi ara d-yeḥder ad fersen aqabuc (la décharge), imḍebren n taddart ad d-siwlen i kra ad kksen iḍumman-nni. Ass-nni, yedda-d yisem n Ahmed Ali Ghozali (Mačči d Sidi Ahmed Ghozali) i yellan d aneɣlaf deg lweqt-nni. Tekker twacult-is, tewwi-as lexbar. Seg wakken yefraḥ imi ur tettun ara, yerra-asen tajmilt deg yiwet n tebrat u yenna-asen-tt-id deg unejmuɛ akked Boumediène. Yiwen wass, yeḥder Hamrouche d Bitat mi as-yewwi Ahmed Ali Mohend Said timecreṭ seg taddart, dɣa, nnan-as ad tt-nečč kan akken.

  Taqsiṭ n Sidi Mohend Arab. 

 Wagi n taddart yerna d ccix dinna. Ihi, d ticemlit i wakken ad d-awin ṛmel deg wasif ɣer taddart. S kra n win yesɛan aɣyul yettawi-d fell-as. Ma Sidi Mohend Arab, ur yesɛi ara. Amek ara yexdem ? Yekker yettawi-d ṛmel ɣef uɛrur-is. Mi asen-nnan i wacuɣer akka ? Bezzaf fell-ak ! Yerra-asen :’’aql-i deg umekkan n uɣyul’’.

 Yiwet n tikkelt iruḥ ɣer Fransa, yejmeɛ-d akk imjaḥen n taddart-nni. Netta, mi yewweḍ ɣer din, s kra n win i t-yessnen, yefka-as-d idrimen. Ihi, yefreq tadrimt i d-yejmeɛ ɣef yimjaḥen-nni, kren uɣalen-d ɣer taddart.

  Amek tetteddu taddart akka tura. 

 Seg zik n zik ar tura, s lqanun i tetteddu taddart.Tesɛa tasqamut i d-yelhan s lecɣal n taddart. Xeddmen ticemlit i yal asenfar n taddart. Ur ttraǧun ara kan seg dduwla ad asen-d-tefk kra. Amur ameqqran n yisenfaren i xedmen kkan-d s ɣur yimezdaɣ n taddart : rran ssiman i yiberdan, bnan axxam n yilmeẓyen, ttɛawaden akka tura i tliwa-nsen, xedmen sin yixxamen, yiwen i ccix n taddart wayen i ṭbib i yebɣan ad d-yas s axxam n usejji. Xedmen tiḥuna, ssekruyen-tent i yimlmeẓyen-nsen. Mazal ɣur-sen lɛada-nni iwumi qqaren ‘’Leḥmigga’’. Tagi, d tisirit i sɛan zik-nni Lebayel. Mi ara yegrireb lmal i yiwen u qrib ad yemmet, ad kkren ad t-zlun u ad t-ferqen tisɣar i Wat taddart. Syin, yal yiwen ad ixelles amur-is. Akka, bab n uɣersiw, ur ixetter ara seg twaiɣt-nni. Ansi i asen-d-tekken yidrimen ? Yal aggur, ttxellisen 100 DA i yal win yewwḍen 18 n yiseggasen, ala imeɛdar d wid yeqqaren. Acu kan mi ara yili d asenfar, yettbeddil lqanun. Din d tabzert, ad walin acḥal ara asen-d-yesqam usenfar, syin ad t-bḍun ɣef yiɛeggalen : xas ass-nni i d-ilul, tewwi-d fell-as ad yebzer.

 Zik, Agouni n Teslent mechur s lḥeb lemluk (les cerises). Nnan-d, yal ass ttawin 3 n yikamyunen ɣer Tunes. Ass-a, ur d-teggri ula d yiwet n tejra. Ala, azemmur i mazal seg yitjur-nsen ma yella yemneɛ seg urɣu.

  Kra n ’’tmucuha’’ n zik-nni. 

  Aɛessas n lǧameɛ d uɣerrabu (lbabur). 

 Yeḥka-aɣ-itt-id Mass Chabane Said Lhadj, d aselway n tesqamut n taddart u yettamen ar tura s uɛessas n lǧameɛ-nsen. Yeṭṭalab deg-s tifrat, yal tikkelt. Yenna-d : ‘’rekben yimdanen deg lbabur deg Tigzirt d abrid ad ruhen ɣer lḥiǧ, syin, yugi ad yemmbbiwel uɣerrabu-nni imi ulc aḍu. Kkes-d amek ur ɛennan ara, ulac.Neṭṭqen-d akk wid yellan dinna, ulac. Yiwen n dagi ɣur-neɣ (Agouni n Teslent), yeqqim deg teɣmert, ur yelli d acu i d-yenna. Nnan-as : ‘’i kečč d acu ara d-tiniḍ, ahat ɣur-k i tella tsarut ?’’ , yerra-asen-d s usefru-a :

 ‘’Bellah ay ak-uzneɣ a ṭṭir,

 Ruḥ deg ubrid la talef.

 Ɣer lǧameɛ n Ugni n teslent,

 Dinna i tt-weddin ṣṣef.

 Init-as : rret-aɣ-d lmeɛruf,

 Sfina, nebɣa ad tt-ḥerrek.’’

  Din din kan, yebda waḍu, aɣerrabu yeqleɛ. Taqsiṭ teggra-d deg umezruy. Ha-t-an amek tella’’. 

  Taqubbet n Sidi Mohend Aberkane d tqubbet n Sidi Youcef. 

  Deg taddart n Agouni n Teslent, llant snat n tqubtin : yiwet tebna akken iwulem, tayeḍ d aẓru kan. Nesteqsa ɣef ‘’tneḥyaft-a’’ gar ssadat. Nnan-d : taqubbet n Sidi Mohend Aberkan, tebna tsellek, teqqim akken. Ma d taqubbet n Sidi Youcef, yal mi ara kkren ad bnun kra deg-s, azal, akken ara d-uɣalen, sbeḥ, ad tt-kemmlen, ad d-afen kra din irab, yeɣli. Akken-nni, yal tikkelt. Ɛyan seg-s, dɣa ǧǧan-tt akken trab. Nnan-d, Sidi Mohend Aberkan, ttanint-as-d tsekkrin mi ara yeṭṭes deg lexla. 

  Kra n wudmawen. 

  Ahmed Ali Ghazali :  yella d lwali n Tizi Uzzu, syin n Ɛennaba deg yiseggasen s 1967 ar 1979. D aneɣlaf seg useggas n 1979 ar 1987.

  Kaci Iboudrarène :  d aḍebbal mechuren aṭas. Netta n taddart n Ugni n Teslent mačči n yibudraren. d isem-is i Boudrarène Kaci.

  Said El Hadj Djillali :  d ameɣmas ameqqran deg unnar-agi n tmaziɣt d tugdut. Yemmut deg useggas n 1997, deg leɛmer-is 37 n yiseggasen.

  Samir Ait Belkacem :  yettwassen s yisura n Limuččuču d wiyaḍ. Yefka zal ameqqran i yisura n yimecṭaḥ. yewwi arraz amezwaru deg tfaska n yisura yettwanṭaqen s tmasiɣt.

  Mouloud Tighilt :  d amjahed, d afus ayeffus n Hocine Ait Ahmed. D amedyaz, daɣen.

 Ha-t-an kra seg usefru-s i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Achour Ould Si Said.

 ‘’A taddart-iw ɛzizen,

 Tuɣaled-iyi d ilili.

 Yeɣli-d fell-am leḥzen,

 Izenqan-im, qqlen d lxali.

 Llan deg-sen yilmeẓyen,

 Llan yigerdan maḍḍi.’’

  Tabourichte :  d tameṭṭut ijebbren u yettdawin yal aṭṭan. Aṭas n terwiḥin i d-tekkes i lmut. Temmut deg leɛmer-is 102 d aseggas.

 Deg taggara, tanemmirt i yimezdaɣ n taddart akken ma llan, gar-asen : Said El Hadj Chabane, Ahmed Ali Mohend Said, Ould Si Said Achour d Ait Ben Youcef Kamel, Samir Ait Belkacem. Mebla ma ttuɣ Nacer Oukacha i yettilin yid-i yal tikkelt.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M  

  
 Xas ma aṭas ik-yettun, mazal zman yecfa fell-ak. Xas asefru-k ur t-turiḍ ara deg wadlis, imi-k yenna-t sslan-as yimdanen. Xas yebɣa yiwen ad k-yettu, yal amḍiq teǧiḍ isem-ik akked ṣṣut-ik, mazal aktayen ak-id-ttadren, yal amkan teǧǧiḍ deg-s tugna-k, yal amkan teṭṭfeḍ-as-d tugna, d tugniwin ara yeqqimen d inagan. Xas ma ulac win d-yuran fell-ak ass-a, ass-a ad yeqqim d inigi n uzekka, deg umezruy ad arun fell-ak acku amedyaz d awezɣi ad yemmet.

 Iles-ik aḥlawan yessebɣasen yal d anaẓur, yettak afud i yal d amdan ara d-temmlileḍ deg ubrid-ik. Afus-ik teẓẓleḍt akk i yimdanen, taxriḍt-ik tessmareḍ-tt-id i yemmdukal-ik, teḍṣiḍ-as i yal win yettrun, taḍṣa yezgan ɣef udem-ik tettawi-d asirem i yal win d temmugreḍ deg ubrid-ik. Isefra d yessufuɣ yimi-k, ffɣen-d di lqaɛ n wul-ik, uzzlen deg yiẓuran-ik, zzuznen yal tameẓẓuɣt i asen-yeslan, am kečč mačči aṭas i yellan.

 Wagi d Ǧaɛfar CIRIFI, d amedyaz i ur walan ara medden. Di thuski, yettak anzi s acennay-nneɣ n teqbaylit, Mass Crif ḤAMANI, netta yid-s am snat n tmeqwa n zzit. Nemlal-it-id, nesteqsa-t, yerra-aɣ-d

  Nessen-ik d amedyaz, mmeslay-d ɣef yiman-ik di kra n wawalen.  

 Ǧaɛfaṛ CRIFI : Ǧaɛfaṛ CIRIFI d-yiwen i ilulen deg useggas n 1959,  di taddart n At-Ṣalaḥ, d taddart d-yezgan di tɣiwant n Buzgan. Yella baba, ad fell-as yaɛfu Rebbi, icax dinna, dɣa asmi i temmut yemma, ad fell-as yeɛfu yeṛḥem, deg useggas n 1962, dɣa nemḍel-itt dinna, deg At-Ṣalaḥ. Deg useggas-nni i d-nuɣal ɣer Taddart-nneɣ, Iɣil n Tizi n wa. Dinna sɛeddeɣ temẓi-w, ɣriɣ  dinna alarmi d aseggas n tmanyin (1980). Deg useggas-nni ikecmeɣ ɣer tesnawit n Yiɛeẓẓugen, CIHANI Bacir ( Chihani Bachir ). Aseggas-nni  amenzu, fkan-iyi-d takerḍiwt n temkarḍit (carte bibiotèque ). Deg useggas wis sin rran-iyi d anemhal n waɣmis id i tefɣen dinna deg tesnawit. Deg  usggas wis kṛaḍ, kkrent tmesbaniyin-nni n tmanyin, tafsut n Yimaziɣen, dɣa nerr-att i tmaziɣt, nettu akk leqraya-nni, dɣa ɣef waya ur d wwiɣ ara akayad n lbak. Deg useggas-nni i uɣaleɣ d aselmad n tutlayt n taɛṛabt alarmi d aseggas-a i d-ffɣeɣ tastaɣt ( la retraîte)

  Si temẓi-k ar ccib-ik tettaruḍ isefra, ayen ur ten-id ssufɣeḍ ara deg wadlis ? 

  Niqal fkiɣ-ten ar Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa ( HCA ). Asmi yella Mass Crif Mesɛuden, anemhal n twinest tadelsant IGELFAN n Buzgan, fell-as yeɛfu yarḥem, rran-iyi-t-id, nnan-iyi-d : « Qqwant tucḍiwin n tira». Ɛawedeɣ-t, uzneɣ-asent tikelt nniḍen, nnan-iyi-d :« Tura ur d-nessufuɣ ara isefra, nessufuɣ-d ayen nniḍen, ungalen, tullisin…», dɣa dayen, ǧǧiɣ-t deg yidis. Ma yella ad t-id ssufɣeɣ s-yidrimen, ur weɛɛaɣ ara akka tura.

  Kečč iḥeddren aṭas di tfaskiwin n tmedyazt. Amek i tettwaliḍ tamedyazt n teqbaylit ass-a ? 

  Ih, tennerna s waṭas. Yiwet n tikelt di yiwet n temzizzelt, yenna-aɣ-d yiwen n unezraf ( jurist ) : «Amer d Lewnis At-Mengelat ara d-yassen ad yiki di temzizelt mebla ma neẓra d netta, d awezɣi ad yawi araz, acku ass-aa, aṭas n yillugan i tesɛa tmedyazt n wassa.

  Tetteggeḍ tabɣes aṭas i inaẓuren akked icennayen, tikwal tettettuḍ iman-ik ula d kečč d anaẓur ?  

 Ak yeḥrez Ṛebbi, dɣa acḥal d-wid ddiɣ ɣer umaṭṭaf wis sin, mačči fell-i. Xas ahat d nnuba-inu maca ttakeɣ-tt i wiyid i yettu zman, neɣ ma ulac, ẓriɣ ulac win ara ten-iwalin. D tagi i d tudert-iw ččaṛ ul-ik d lxir, ula d imdanen ad teččaṛen akken. D tagi i d tamuɣli-w.

  Tḥemmleḍ aṭas “lkamiṛa”. Mmeslayeɣ-d fell-as ? 

 Ǧafar CRIFI : Ufiɣ-tt,  d yiwen n wallal s-awyes ara d teǧǧeḍ axeddim-inek akked uxeddim n wiyad. Taswiɛt taɛjel, ilaq ad tt-neḍfeṛ, ma ulac ad neqqim d ineggura. Asmi i walaɣ mmi, i yesɛan 3 n yieggasen rrif n uselkim ( ordinateur ), yetturar s-yess, nekk ur ẓriɣ kra deg-s, yerna nekk d aselmad. Wwḍen-iyi-d imeṭṭawen, dayen-nni id iyi-dggren ad issineɣ wa d-kecmeɣ deg waya.

  Ass-agi teffeɣ-d tastaɣt ( la retraite ), d acu n yiṣenfaṛen i tesɛiḍ ? 

 Ǧafar CRIFI : Ilaq ad ǧǧeɣ axxam-iw akked warraw-iw, tagi d tamezwarut. Ttuɣ aṭas iman-iw akken d-tenniḍ lina,  akken ad ɛeṛḍeɣ ad d-sbineɣ akk inaẓuren yesɛan igarrujen deg wallaɣ-nsen, wid yefren, wid ur yesɛin ara ttawil s-wayes ara ad d-binen akken ad ten-issinen yimdanen.  Ad nadiɣ ad jemɛeɣ deg yigerrujen-nneɣ send  ad ṛuḥen, send ad ten-yawi ubeḥri  tatut. Ad skefleɣ deg yilmeẓyen-nneɣ i yuklalen asebɣes akked d waṭas n wafud akken ad kkren. Ad ẓẓleɣ afus-iw ad iliɣ d tama-nsen, akken ad  begnen leqdic-nsen, akken daɣen ad fessren  tikta-nsen i wiyaḍ.

  S tewzel kan, ma nniɣ-ak : Tamedyazt ?  

 Tamedyazt d-abrid s-wayes ara d-beggneḍ ahulfu-inek, i s-wayes ara tessiwḍeḍ tikta-k i wiyid. D abrid s-wayes ara d-beggneḍ  lɣiḍ-ik ɣef wayen i iḍerrun di tmetti sumata.

  Adlis?   

 D yiwen ubrid nniḍen ideg-i ara teǧǧeḍ tikta-k ad tent-id-tafent tsutiwin d iteddun, d anda ara tesqerdceḍ daɣen tiktiwin-ik d wayen akk tettxemmimeḍ, d wayen d txemmimen wiyaḍ.

  Tameṭṭut?  

 D amdan iyi-icuban,  yal wa s izerfan-is, d cbaḥa n tudert, d tuṣṛa n wargaz. Am wakken yella daɣen netta d tuṣṛa n tmeṭṭut. Ayen d-yenna umdan ɣef tmeṭṭut drus.

  Tayri ?  

 D tafat n ddunit, ma yella ulac-itt ur bninet ara tudert. Yerna tayri tebḍa ɣef wacḥal d aḥric, tella tayri n Rebbi, ṣubḥanu, tella tayri imawlan, tayri n teqcict, tayri n tegmat…

  Ddin ?  

 Yelwa amek i t-yettwali. Nekk d-ineslem umneɣ s-yes, maca yal wa s uẓekka-ines, Rebbi ṣubḥanu, izmer iyi-iman-is. Asmi ad nawi yiwen ad ten-mmḍel, ad nṛuḥ deg waṭas yid-neɣ. Imi ara d-nuɣal ad yeqqim waḥd-s dinna, ala lfaɛl-is kan ara t-iselken.

  Taqbaylit?  

 D tameslayt n yemma, s-yes i ṭṭḍeɣ ayefki, d nettat id  iyi-slemden lḥeṛma, d nettat iyi-d-yefkan amenni, fell-as ad ḥaṛbeɣ ayen ibɣun yili.

 yesteqsa-t Tansa n Talsa

  
 S uzwel n "Agaraw yezdigen" yella-d umlaqi i umeslay ɣef kra n tiddiyin timaynutin n useḥbiber mgal axmaj n ugama.

 Thegga-d, ddurt yezrin, Tenmehla n twennaḍt n waɣir n Bgayet akked tɣiwant n Melbu, yiwet n temlilit s wazal-is gar yinesdabuyen akked wid iqeddcen i lfayda n twennaḍt, abeɛda ilemẓiyen. S uzwel n « Agaraw yezdigen » yella-d umlaqi i umeslay ɣef kra n tiddiyin timaynutin n useḥbiber mgal axmaj n ugama. Gar-asent allus neɣ iwmu qqaren « Arusiklaj ». Am wakken yella-d usizdeg n lqiɛan n yilel sɣur trebbuyaɛ tuzzigin. Ugar n tdukkliyin i yekkin deg usihar, am tdukkla “Awal Yessawal” n Melbu akked « Oxy-jeunes » n Yiderginen, ttwaɛerḍent-d kra n tkebbaniyin i yellan deg unnar n uqeddic ɣef twennaḍt. Seld tallit n usizdeg n kra n yimeḍqan n teftist, ɛeddan-d ɣer taggara kra n yilemẓiyen i yesɛan luzinat n wallus akken ad d-sneɛten kra seg wayen qeddcen, d termiyin-nsen deg uḥric-a n usizdeg n ugama. « Yehwa-aneɣ aṭas wudem i aɣ-d-seknen yimasayen ɣef wayen icudden i twennaḍt-nneɣ d tezdeg n waɣir n Bgayet. Ilaq ad nezdit iɣallen akken ad naweḍ ɣer wayen nessaram ». Akka i d-tenna Sabrina Xalifi, yiwet seg tmekkiyin deg usihar-a.

  M. K. 

  
 I lmend n tallit-agi n Remḍan, ilmeẓyen n taddart n Tahanouts, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, heggan-d yiwet n tmeɣra n ccna meqqren. Tebda tmeɣra-agi ɣef 22h00 n yiḍ alammi d ṣṣḥur, ccnan deg-s ugar n 10 n yicennayen imeẓyanen n taddart-agi n Tahanouts. Tella-d, ddurt iɛeddan, deg umkan iwumi qqaren Ighil Badhou, tama n unnar n Sidi Slimane. Ayen igerrzen maḍi deg tmeɣra-agi, imi kulec yettwaxdam sɣur ilmeẓyen n taddart-agi, ama d ifennanen i d-yecnan gar-asen Marsghsan (Amar Yarkel), Kasdi Kamel d gma-s Belaid, Kasdi Djamel, Jouba Touat, Oudiai Nassim d gma-s Farid, Korichi Hocine…atg. Tella-d diɣ tɣuri n yisefra sɣur yimedyazen yecban: Tchamouh (Zateri Mouhamed) akked Brahim Cherdi. Ula d wid yuraren ɣef wallalen uẓawan d arraw n taddart-agi, ama d wid yewten dderbuka neɣ wid yewten abendayen neɣwin yewten tagitart. Korichi Hocine, yenna-d: “ D tikkelt tamezwarut ara d-aliɣ ɣef usayes deg ddunit-iw, cniɣ-d tlata n tezlatin n teqbaylit, ulamma s tugdi d ukukru n yimferǧen, maca cukeɣ fɣent-d akken yelha. D tameɣra n taddart-nneɣ, ad asen-iniɣ i yimsuddsen-agi tanemmirt-nsen s tusda, ssarameɣ-asen afud igerrzen”.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ligzima, gar waṭṭanen n uglim yeṭṭuqten ama s argaz, ama ɣer tmeṭṭut, labeɛda di tmurt-nneɣ. Acu kan yettemxallaf seg umdan ɣer wayeḍ imi yesɛa sin n leṣnaf i ɣef ara d-nemmeslay s telqayt deg umagrad n dduṛt-a, d waṭas n tmussniwin icudden ɣer lehlak-a.

<p style="text-align: center;"> D acu-t ligzima ?  

 D aṭṭan n uglim yeṭtugten, yesɛan akmaz ameqqṛan. Yettbeddil ṣṣifa ɣef teɣzi n unerni-s. Di tazwara, yettban-d uglim d azeggaɣ, syin ad d-banent tcellibaḍ yeččuṛen d aman. Aṭerḍeq n tcellibaḍ-nni ama s ukmaz-nsent imi ɣeẓẓent aṭas, ama mebɣir akmaz, igellu-d s tfidi n uglim ara yeḥlun di kra n wussan war ma teǧǧa-d ccama.

<p style="text-align: center;"> D acu n leṣnaf yesɛa waṭṭan-a? 

 Tussna tessiweḍ ad d-tbeggen dakken yella ligzima n usami n kra n tɣawsa , yettḥaz s umata win meqqṛen, am win ibennun, tin yessexdamen kra n ddwawi i ssbiɣa n ucebbub labeɛda takwaffurt, yettili diɣ ɣer wid ixeddmen di sbiṭarat yettlusun ijirbaten. Sṣenf-a, yettɣab mkul mi ara yeṭṭixer umdan i tɣawsa i as-d-islalayen lahlak-a. Yella diɣ, ligzima n uḥerbal( aḥerbali, allergique), d ṣṣenf mucaɛen ɣer yimeẓyanen . Nettaf di ddeqs n tikkal aṭṭan n buneggaf, neɣ aḥerbal-nniḍen ama s ameẓyan ama di twacult-is. Ɣas yettɛeṭṭil aṭas di temẓi, yettṛuḥu wer tuɣalin ma ifat meqqeṛ umdan.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Acu n ttawilat n usejji i yellan mgal lehlakat-a? 

 Lsas n useḥbiber si ligzima n usami d aṭixxer ɣef yal taɣawsa i t-id-yettakken. Ma d adawi-s, ilaq ad yili s amejjay n uglim, imi d netta i yeẓran acu n ddwawi i ilaqen d yiwellihen iwulmen akken ad yeḥlu uglim. Ma d asejji n ligzima aḥerbali yebna ɣef ddeqs n ddwawi i d-yettakk umejjay yenxaṣṣen i yimawlan, ad ten-sxedmen s ttawil i umeẓyan, akken diɣ ur ilaq ara ad as-ssiriden s ṣṣabun amḍiq n ligzima. Ma di tallit anda lahlak-a ur d-iban ara, ilaq imawlan ad ssexdamen kra n ddwawi i telweɣ n uglim n llufan akken ur t-ikemmez ara imi akmaz irennu deg ugur-ines.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima Dali 

  
 Deqs n temnaḍin d lwilayat yemgaraden n tmurt n Lzzayer i yedren tignatin yuεren di ddurt-agi yezrin, sebba n usemiḍ d uγelluy n tusniwin n lḥamu γer ddaw yilem, dayen id-yeglan s uγelluy n wedfel γef idurar εlayen d tγaltin iεeddan 300 lmitrat, ger-asen lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu i iḥuza usemiḍ d uγelluy n wedfel s waṭas.

 Tamnaḍt n Wizgan d tγiwanin is-yezzin, ger-asent At-Zikki, Illula n umalu akked At-Yeğğar d tid yedren tagnit-agi, anda adfel yessa mačči d kra, yegla-d s wargal n deqs n yibardan icuden ger tudrin, maca tikkelt-agi yemgarad aṭas γef useggas 2012, γas banen-d kra iεewiqen maca , imḍebren n tγiwanin-agi beggsen-d aken iwata lḥal, anda i sxedmen tazmart-nsen, allalen d ttawilat sεan i tuksa n wedfel. ṣawḍen jarden ahil n lεejlan, i ixedmen 24 γef 24 n tsaεtin i tuksa n wedfel deg ibardan imeqranen, am webrid n lwilaya uṭun wis 251 icuden ger Wizgan akked Yiεeẓẓugen, abrid icuden ger tγiwanin d kra n tudrin. Maca adfel-agi ixelqed yiwen n wuggur, imi imawlan n yinelmaden n yeswiren yemgaraden di 04 n tγiwanin tesεa temnaḍt (dayra) n Wizgan, ger-asent ; Wizgan, At-yeğğar, At-zikki d yillulen umalu, uggin ad-sarḥen i waraw-nsen γer yiγerbazen ad γṛen sebba n warggal n waṭas n yibardan icuden ger tudrin-agi d yiγerbazen yemgaraden, rnu tella tegdi γef ugeffur sawayes yezmer ad-yeglu wedfel-agi. Si tama niḍen, deqs n yixeddamen ur yeqsiden-ara imeḍqan uxeddim-nsen sebba n lexṣaṣ di ttawilat n usiweḍ, dayen i yeğğan deqs n tkebbaniyin ttewγelqent. U ger n yibardan imeqranen iregglen ideflawen dagi ti temnaḍt n wizgan, ad-nnaf abrid aγelnaw wis 26 icuden ger Tizi-Wezzu d Bgayet i iεeddan tama n yicellaḍen d Wizgan, abrid n lwilaya wis 251 icuden ger tγiwant n Wizgan d criεa u yessufuγ srid γer yefri uzellagen tawilayat Bgayet, abrid n lwilaya wis 09 icuden ger tγiwant n yillulen umalu d tizi icellaḍen. Ma yella d ibardan niḍen d wid yuεren i uεeddi sebba n wucuḍ yellan. Ma yella d isufar n wučči d wid yellan, acu kkan yella yiwen n wuggur meqren id-muggren imezdaγ n mara tudrin n tγiwant n At-Zikki di ttawilat n usaḥmu.

<p style="text-align: right;"> I.B 

  
 Tacemmaɛt-nni n 14 yunyun mazal-itt tuɣ deg wexxam-nneɣ. Wehmeɣ amek i tt-tettu yemma. Pourtant, tettagad aṭas times, lgaz d tristi. Akk ass tettbirifyi ma yella kra i yuɣen. 

 – Wa yemma, atan tettuḍ tacemmaɛt-nni !

 – Ala a mmi, ur tt-ttiɣ ara.

 -Tɛemdeḍ !

 -Aggur-a n cfawat. Deg yunyu-a i d aɣ-nɣan win akken s-yennan “ma ulac tamaziɣt, ulac…”

 Dɣa temmesla-yi-d ɣef Lwennas: milmi d wanida d-iulul, amennuɣ-is, tuɣac-is…

 Mi d-tewweḍ s ass-nni n 25 yunyu teṭṭerḍeq d imeṭṭi. Ula d nek ruɣ. Ruɣ mi walaɣ yemma tettru, waqila almi d ass-nni tt-walaɣ tettru. 

 Amecwar akka ikcem-d baba. Yaf-d imeṭṭi mzal yesfiḍ.

 – Acu akka yellan ?

 -Tella d-ttmeslay ɣef Lwennas, i d as-rriɣ

 Yerra-d nnehta, yerra ɣer lbiru. Cwiṭ akka ibeɛzeq-d : “afalku n wuzṛu n leɣrib, ad kkesɛuɣ d aḥbib…”

 Iḍ-nni, disidiɣ ad aruɣ tabrat i lwennas. Atan d acu s-nniɣ

 “ Azul a dda Lwennas ! Asmi akken i d-lulɣ,qbel ad qaɛdent tgucrar-iw akken ad fɣeɣ seg wexxam, lliɣ très bien di dduḥ-iw nek, yemma, yaya, jeddi akked d dduḥ-iw. Zhiɣ, urareɣ, swiɣ abibru, ččiɣ les compotes… Akken kan nernan les neurones, ḥulfaɣ s ddunit i d iyi-d-yezzin. D’abord, Ḥsiɣ belli nella nukni llan wiyiḍ. Wiyiḍ-agi ur heddern ara taqbaylit. Heddren taɛrabt am anisati, lmudir , lǧiran akked tilibizyu. Syin akkin, mi kecmeɣ tteḥḍiri, yexreb lmux-iw. yekker wahruḥu gar-i d dduḥ-iw. Qareɣ-as dduḥ-agi inu d lekdeb, d tteḥḍri i d tidet. Azul-nni yuɣal d “salamɛlikum” ; “čiw čiw čiw ḥiḥa” d “qessamen bi nazilat” ; “tafunast n yigujilen” d “suratu el baqara”… Lḥasun kulec yuɣal-iyi uqelmun s iḍaren. Ayen akk i yi-sxerben lmux-iw ugar d les adultes. Qqersen almi kan dayen. Pourtant, di dduḥ i d-kkren am nek. Uɣalen, presque akk, am tteḥḍiri, lmudir akked d tilibizyu. Dɣa ussan-agi n remḍan, je te dis pas. Ulac akk ayen yeddeqsen deg-sen ḥala aɛebbuḍ. Yessufeɣ-asen tellement leɛqel uɛebbuḍ alarmi d-snulfan tilibizyu n wučči. Je te promets a dda Lwennas ar d ad riziztiɣ i wayen akk yexḍan dduḥ-iw. Je te promets ar akken kan ad nernin cwiṭ n les neurones ad qelbeɣ fell-ak, ad defreɣ later-ik… ad…” 

<p style="text-align: right;"> S.O.A 

  <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="f682d899839a92979b9784b68f979e9999d89084" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a> 

  
 Deg wahil-ines n uwenneɛ n uqeddic-is, aserḍi n umsaɣ, ed ussuseɛ n tesna (surface) n ubḍaw n ugaz, takebbanit taɣelnawt n ufraq n ugaz tɛewwel ad tessiweḍ ijeɛbuben-is ɣer tɣiwanin n usamar ed unẓul-asamar n Bgayet, am Suq Letnin, Iderginen, Ayt Smaɛel ed Tsexriwt, sey-a ɣer taggara n useggas-a deg nella 2015. Maca daɣen i waṭas n tɣiwanin nniḍen n waɣir n Bgayet. Aya ira ad d-yini dakken seg yiɣzer n Bgayet aẓ akkin, akk timnaḍin ad ttwaqqnent s yijeɛbuben n ugaz n teɣrabt i ttraǧun yimezdaɣ am win yettraǧun win ur d-nettas. Yuɣ lḥal, ɣef taluft-a n ugaz n temdint gedged i mmugent aṭas n tiganin (grèves), i ttwabellɛen acḥal n tikkal yiberdan iɣelnawen i yinehharen. Ɣef waya, wid yerza uqeddic nwan ad ɛeddin ɣer tigawt, ad sbensen aḥeyyer n yiɣermanen s usiweḍ n ugaz i yixammen-nsen deg teɣzi n useggas-a deg nella. Lḥasul, 55 n tkebbaniyin i yeṭṭfen taggara-a tasunḍa (ordre) n uqeddic akken ad bdunt amahil-nsen. Ad d-nesmekti dakken ugar 2780 n yikilumiṭren n tuqqna i yellan, tettwafreq ɣef ddeqs n temnaḍin. Akken i d-yedda deg ulɣu n tmehla n ubḍaw n lgaz, i icudden ɣer tkebbanit n ufraq n usamer, ddeqs n tuddar i yeɛna usiweḍ-a n ugaz, am Ayt Smaɛel, Tasexriwt, Iderginen, At Ksila, Tamrijt, Tifra, Tawrirt Larbɛa, Cmini, Akeffadu, Tiban, Tawrirt Iɣil, Ayt Mendil, Adeqqar, Bulimaṭ, Fenya, Saket, Buxlifa, ed Msisna. Deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, yetturaǧu ad d-tekk tuqqna seg n Seṭṭif, ad d-tɛeddi seg umḍiq mu ssawalen Aswel i yellan deg tilisa gar Bgayet ed Seṭṭif. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Ulac taddart ur nesɛi ara tala. Tala d amkan n tlawin, teḥrez lbaḍna-ines. Yecmet ad yekcem ɣer s daxel-is, aladra deg urgaz. At zik, snen ad ḥerzen aman, ur swaɣayen ara deg-sen tiqit. Yal tiqit ara d-yeqqiṭṭren, snen amek ara tt-jemɛen. Aman n tliwa, ussan-d di leɛwanṣar i d-yeṭṭreḍqen deg yidurar, ttawinten-id yimezdaɣ n tuddar deg ijaɛbuben s ddaw tmurt, alarmi d taddart ideg zedɣen. Lebni n tliwa, yemgrad si taddart ɣer tayeḍ, maca yella wayen i tent-yesddukklen. Ad naf Lebni n tliwa-agi, yebḍa ɣef krad (3) yiḥricen : Acercur , amraḥ n tarda , asariǧ n lmal. 1. Acercur : d amkan deg-i i d-ttagment tlawin aman, ttaččarent-d tiḥellabin-nsent. 2. Abraḥ n tarda : d amkan yeṭṭɛen ɣer tesga n ucercur. Lqaɛa-ines tqeɛɛed, tesleɣ s yejdi d ssiman. Deg-s i ssirident tlawin iselsa, iceṭṭiḍen. Yezzi-as-d ṣṣur azal n lqedd n umdan, akken tulawin ad ssirden-t s tuṣṣra. S daxel-is, yella usariǧ d aɣezfan, maca ur lqay ara. Deg-s i d-tteffint aman i tarda. D aman n ucercur yettruḥun di rrayaɛ i yettačaren asariǧ-agi. 3.Asariǧ n lmal : d asariǧ yeṭṭɛen ɣer ubraḥ n tarda, ur ɣezzif ara, ur lqay ara. D amkan deg-i i itess lmal, izgaren, tisita, iɣyal, ulli, tiɣeṭṭen… Yettili-d ɣer tama n ubrid, d aman i d-yettfeggiḍen deg usariǧ yellan deg ubraḥ n tarda i t-yettačaren. Aman yettcercuren deg usariǧ n lmal, ttruḥun di terga ijmaɛay-iten ugelmim. Aman ugelmim, swayen s yis-s tibḥirin deg unebdu. Tessen deg-s iɣersiwen n teẓgi, ibeɛɛac d yijeqqiwen.

  Fahim Messaoudène 

  
 Tazwara n ddurt iɛeddan, yettwagdel usarag n umaru Zubir Zrarga, mmi-s n Xerraṭa, deg Uweqqas. Ur iban s wanwa udem i yettwasemres ugdal-a, maca iban-d dakken ur d-tessufeɣ tdayra ttesriḥ mi ara as-t-ssutren yimheggiyen n tɣellust taseklant n Uweqqas. Am wakken i yeḍra waya deg wussan yezrin mi yettwagdel temlilit akked umaru afransis Armand Vial,i yellan yettraǧu ad yessefti awal ɣef udlis-is amaynut. Rnu-as wid i yettwagedlen ayyuren-a ineggura ɣef waṭas n yimura-nniḍen. Dɣa seld tugin-a n yinesdabuyen, tessufeɣ-d Tdukkla Azday Adelsan n Uweqqas yiwen n ulɣu ideg i d-tewwet ɣef yir rray-a. Ideg i d-uran ladɣa: «… La nettmesteqsay acimi isaragen yettwagedlen deg Uweqqas ttwasurgen anda-nniḍen?». D lḥir i yettziden yettahda ɣur wid yebɣan ad seḥbibren ɣef yidles deg temnaḍt, ladɣa imi isaragen i yettwagdalen deg Uweqqas, ttwasuragen deg Bgayet, Tifrit, Wizgan d wanda-nniḍen. Am waken ara nɣer deg ulɣu aqbur diɣ: « …Syin ɣer-s, Massa taɣellat n tdayra tugi ad aɣ-d-tefk tanaga n wawwaḍ i d-yettwekkiden tarusi n ukaram i ummag n usarag, aya si tama, si tama-nniḍen, tugi ad aɣ-d-tesselɣu s ugdal n usarag». Ilaq ad d-nini ṭṭabeɛ n tɣellust taseklant n Uweqqas mi d-yuɣal s wudem ajdid yella yeɛna s waṭas imura izwawen i yettarun s tezwawt. Maca taggara-a, xemmen yimheggiyen, ad d-seddun ula d wid yettarun s tutlayin tiberraniyin.

  M. K. 

  
 I lmend n lficṭa n useggas amaynut amaziɣ 2966, ass nni n 09 Yennayer 2016, aɣerbaz alemmas n tɣiwant n At Yanni, s lemεawna n tnemhalt n yidles n Tizi-Wezzu, thegga-d tirza i yinelmaden d tnelmadin ɣer wexxam n yidles Mufdi Zakariya di Lezzayer. Din ḥedren i wass amenzu n leqdic adelsan i d-ihegga Useqqamu Unnig n Timmuzgha i deg yeḥder uneɣlaf n yidles Σezzedin Mihubi d yiwen n uεeggal n tneɣlaft n ttrebga. Azal n 50 n warrac d teqcicin i d-yufraren s igemmuḍen n leqraya-nsen deg uḥric amenzu n useggas-agi n leqraya i d-yettwafernen akken ad ddun. Tiddefcect i dmen abrid akken ad awḍen ɣer Lezzayer ɣef lɛecra n Sbeḥ. Din, deg umraḥ n Uxxam-agi n yidles Mufdi Zakariya myufan-d d warrac d-yusan si tamiwin nniḍen : Imzabiyen, Icawiyen, Icenwiyen d icelḥiyen……….

 Mi d-yewweḍ uqerru n HCA Si Lhachemi Σessad d uneɣlaf n yidles, tendeh tmeɣra s iḍebbalen, d cḍeḥ ansay. Mi tɛedda zzedwa-nni, rzan meṛṛa ɣer tzeqqa tameqrant. Din, Mass Σessad ifka-d awal n tazwara i temlilit-agi, i deg d-yesmekta belli deg iɣerbazen n 48 n lwilayt llant-d lficṭat i lmend n Yennayer. Ula d Mass Σezzedin Mihubi, inna-d belli ad yelhi deg tneɣlaft-is s usnerni d usefti n Tmaziɣt. S yin mi d-yemmeslay uɛeggal n tneɣlaft n ttrebga, bdant trebbaɛ n cḍeḥ, ccna, d usenɛet n tmeɣra n uyrad. Akken tessaweḍ temrilt d lweḥda uzal, ɛeddan inelmaden-nni rẓan tanalt. S yin rzan ɣer tebḥirt umi qqaren s tefransisit « jardin d’essai » n El Hamma. Walan-d meṛṛa ayen yellan deg-s, n cbaḥa n twennaṭ, igḍaḍ d iɣersiwen nniḍen. Tuɣalin tella-d ɣef rebɛa n tmeddit, s waṭas n lferḥ d unecreḥ deg ulawen d udmawen. Yerna aṭas n tugniwin i xedmen akken ad sen-d-teqqim lficṭa n Yennayer 2966 d asmekti. S yin i teɣzi n ubrid ɣer tmurt, tella-d s ccna, aqesser ɣef wayen walan d wayen ḥulfan. S yin, mi wḍen s At Yanni, yettwasuter deg warrac nni ad d-arun agzul ɣef wass-nni, d wamek t-sɛeddan. Tajmilt ad tuɣal i wid meṛṛa d-yefkan afus akken ad iɛeddi wass-nni di liser d tumert, ladɣa Tanemhalt n Yidles n Tizi-Wezzu, Mass Iften Ḥamid, anemhal n uɣerbaz alemmas n tɣiwant n At Yanni, d wid meṛṛa i yessudsen yerna bedden i inelmaden-agi akken ad sɛeddin ass igerzen di laman d liser. Nessaram ad ifriren warrac-agi, yerna ad nessiweḍ ad s-nelli tiwwura n tmusni. 

 <em> sɣur:: NEDDIL Litisya, URAK Lina, ḤAMEDI Mira, BETTAN Nadeyya, SEDDUR Anayis, BUǦEMΣA Liza, LEWAǦ Sara, ǦENNAN Sufi, DERDAḤ Nazim.  </em>

  
 I lmend n twinest segmi d-ilul win i d-isellken tutlayt tamaziɣt deg nnger, Lmulud At Mɛemmer, ihegga-d Useqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, s tikkin n waṭas n tkebbaniyin d tdukkliwin, yiwen n wahil d ageɛmir ara idummen s teɣzi n useggas-a n 2017. Ahil i d-yemmugen, yebda yakan seg 28 deg furar yezrin, ar 31 deg duǧember 2017. Ad d-nebder kra n yisiharen seg wayen ara yilin, imi yetturaǧu ad yettunefk d tamsirt uḍris « Tabrat i Muḥend Azwaw » i akk inelmaden n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen d tesnawiyin deg 48 n twilayin. Asmekti d tirza ɣer tesnawit anda yella yesselmad Dda Lmulud. Ugar n tezrawin deg tesdawiyin, ad tili tuzzya taɣelnawt n tmezgunt  » Le foehn » seg 10 ar 24 deg yunyu. Akken kra n wussan, ad temmag tuzzya-nniḍen i temkarḍiyin n yidlisen n Dda Lmulud. Deg waya, ad yili yuɣ lḥal usiẓreg d usuqqel n waṭas seg wayen yura. Deg wayyur n ctember, ad d-ttwasuddsent ddeqs n temsikkniyin ɣef umussnaw-a, ama ɣef wayen yenna, yura neɣ inuda. Am wakken ara d-yettwaheggi deg rreḥba n udlis n Lezzayer, seg 31 deg ṭuber armi d 5 deg unbir, yiwen n wahil yettwabudd i Dda Lmulud At Mɛemmer, gar yisaragen, tiɣuriyin, asenɛet n yisura…atg. Deg wussan-nni dɣa, ad tili temlilit tagraɣlant ɣef ubabat n tmaziɣt, s uzwel  » Mulud At Mɛemmer, amussnaw yezdin gar tɣermiwin’’. Tettwajerred daɣen i taggara n useggas tfaska taɣelnawt n « Ahellil », d tajmilt i Dda Lmulud, deg Timimun. Ma yella d ayyur-a n meɣres ideg nella, ad yili ttiɛad deg Udrar n Fad i lmend n teẓrigt tis 15 n tfaska n tmedyezt i iḍebɛen s yisem n Dda Lmulud. Dɣa, din ara ḥeḍren d inebgawen at Useqqamu. I usmekti kan, tekki Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad deg wahil-a n twinest ɣef tlalit n Dda Lmulud At Mɛemmer.

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

  
 Sidi Aɛli Bunab d lwali, iteddu si tama ɣer tayed, anda i t-yewwi uḍar-is, iḍda. Inuda-d akk tamurt n Leqbayel. Anda i t-yessers uɛessas, yesteɛfa. Ulac tama neɣ taddart anda ur tettafeḍ ara isem n Sidi Aeli Bunab. Anda i t-id-ufan medden istafa, ama ɣef uzru, ama ddaw teslent neɣ ddaw tzemmurt, yella umkan- nni yewi isem-is. Qqaren : 

 Ǧǧan-d Ccix aḥeddad

 Tariqa-s tzad

 D lefnaṛ deg yiḍ n ṭlam

 S lexwan ihegga lmiehed

 Kul yum tezha

 D timeemrin deg yal amkan

 Wannag Sidi Aɛli Bunab

 Lwali muhab

 Kul tizi ibedd lburhan

 Ttqabalen medden Sidi Aeli Bunab s wannuz, ttqadaren-t nezzeh. Qqaren, ma yenna awal ssbaḥ, tameddit ad yeffeɣ. Assen, yewweḍ ɣer yiwet n taddart, tesea yiwen n ṛṛay-is isem-is Weeliya. Ɣur-s irgazen, cci akked ddreɛ uma d aḥeddad n wuzzal. Ttagaden-t medden aṭas. Akken ad d-isken lǧehd-is, skud yekkat di taggunt, yessawal : a lǧehd, a lǧehd n Weeliya! A lǧehd, a lǧehd n Weeliya!

 Ass-nni, ibedd-d ɣur-s Sidi Aɛli Bunab, ikcem ɣer tḥanut n uḥeddad s udarbali. Akken yufa, yekkat tettergigi tmurt, inna-as: ‘’mačči akka ara tessawaleḍ!

 Ssawal: a lǧehd, a lǧehd mulana, lǧehd d win a Rebbi.’’

 Inna-as Weliya: ‘’ffeɣ-iyi akkin, acu ara tebidieeḍ akka?’’

 – Inna-as Sidi Aɛli Bunab: ‘’ur d I yi-tettakkeḍ ara afḍis-nni, ad uwteɣ cwiṭ?’’

 Ifka-as-t Weɛliya, dɣa yekkat, yessawal: 

 ‘’A lǧehd, a lǧehd n Weɛliya

 Lebladi yebqa xaliya

  ala qayem ddenya.’’

 Qqaren-d seg wassen, imezdaɣ n taddart-nni, ttinigen, ttgaǧǧan anda-nniḍen alammi tuɣal taddart-nni d amadaɣ, d ayla n beylek, trab taddart i lebda.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane LASHEB 

  
 Seg tama-nniḍen, mi yekfa uneɣlaf n yidles tirza-ines, yerra-d lwali n Bgayet, Ould Saleh Zitouni, i yellan yid-s, srid ɣer Ayt Smaɛel, ad yessefqed ladɣa ɣef temkarḍit n tɣiwant. Mi tt-iwala, yezzi-as-d akken ilaq, iban-d am wakken yeɛjeb-as s tidet wayen yemmugen deg-s, ladɣa imi yella yerna-d yakan kra n tedrimt i usiweḍ n usenfar-a ɣer taggara. Ɣas ur thegga temkarḍit-a akken ilaq, ladɣa s dduzan n daxel, am yidlisen, ṭṭwabel d yiselkimen, maca iɛeyyen-d Mass lwali s teldayt-is tunsibt. Yerna yessarem ad tesleḥ i waṭas n lecɣal am umezgun, isaragen, atg. Seg Ayt Smaɛel, yeṭṭef abrid lwali ɣer Yiderginen, akked tselwayt n tdayra i d-yusan yid-s i Udrar n Fad. Deg Yiderginen, iɛedda yimḍebber n twilayt ɣer uxxam amaynut, anda yessuk tiṭ ɣef liḥala n lebni d wayen yellan din d ttawilat.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

 
  
 Taggara n ddurt-agi yezrin, i d-teldi tfaska tis 8 n tqendurt taqbaylit i d-tettheggi yal aseggas Tejmaɛt n taddart akked tdukla Tagmat n taddart Iḥemziyen deg temnaṭ n Yilulen Umalu di lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu . « Iswi-nneɣ d aseḥbiber d usnerni n tqendurt taqbaylit i wakken ad tuɣal d taksiwt n yal ass, nessaram ad tuɣal tmeɣra-agi d tafaska taɣelnawt ‘’. I d-yenna uselway n tidukla Tagmat Mass Hsen Merzoug. Ahil n useggas-agi s wazal-is, yebda leqdic ass-nni n lexmis ɣef lewhi n 11H00 . Teldi temsikent n tqendurt taqbaylit ideg i d-snaɛtent tulawin i d-yewwin yal lesnaf n tqendyar yemxalafen ( tin Yiwaḍiyen, At wasif, Tigzirt akked d tiyaḍ-nniḍen n temnaḍin n leqbayel). Syin akkin, yella-d wawal ɣef unegmu d wazal n tqendurt taqbaylit, am wakken i d-tewwi yiwet n tmedyazt n taddart Iḥemziyen, Tinhinan Dahmani, yiwen usefru s wazal-is ɣef tqendurt:

  « Acḥal i kem-ḥemleɣ 

  Ḥemleɣ cbaḥa-m 

  Ula d iḍes yessem i gganeɣ

  A taqendurt a taqbaylit,…atg.

 Ɣef lewhi n tmeddit, tuɣal tejmilt i temɣarin n taddart iɛeddan 70 n yiseggasen, ttunefken-asent warrazen sɣur allagen-nsent. Am wakken i ttunefken warrazen i warrac d teḥdayin i d-yufraren deg yikayaden , deg yeswiren yemxalfen. ‘’Nekfa arrazen i yigerdan-agi i wakken ad ḥulfun i yiman-nsen sɛan azal ɣer yimezdaɣ n taddart, aya d ayen ara asen-yernun afud di leqraya-nsen’’. I d-yenna lɛaqel n taddart 

 Deg wass wis-sin, tella-d temzizwert n ccna n trebuyaɛ n theḍayin d yigerdan. Tameddit n was, yella-d ucali usenɛet n leṣnaf n tqendurt taqbaylit. I wakken ad d-yili ufran n tqendurt ifazen. Tekfa tmeɣra s yiwet n tmeɣra tameqqrant ideg i d-cebḥen yiḍebbalen tagnit s uẓawan n teqbaylit aqbur. Temdel tfaska s tezlit n Zedek Mouloud ɣet tqendurt anda i as-yeqqar:

 <em> “Anda-kem am ufzim  </em>

 <em> Anda-kem am ubruc </em>

 <em> Lfuḍa d tesfifin  </em>

 <em> Abendayer ihuc  </em>

 <em> I ixeddem wawal  </em>

 <em> As- ternuḍ awal” </em>

  Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Isufar </span>

 – 3 n tbatenjalin – 1 n ṭumaṭict – 200 ml n zzit – 1 n tedgert n ticcert – 1 n tɣenjawt n lmakla n zzit n uzemmur – 1 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n lkemmun – 1/2 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n lmelḥ – 1/4 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n yifelfel aberkan – 1/2 n tlimet

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Sirdet tibatenjalin u tgezmem-tent di leryaf-nsent, tesqecrem-tent adar s udar. Gezmem-tent d timḍewwrin. Seḥmut zzit di tmeqqlit, syin terrem tibatenjalin ɣer daxel, tanfem-asent azal n 10’. Imir tessudmem-tent mi ara tent-d-tekksem. Syin, tgezmem ṭumaṭic akked ticcert, terrem-ten ɣer daxel n tmeqqlit akked tbatenjalin, lkmemmun, ifelfel aberkan, lmelḥ, taḥcict, tanfem ad wwen azal n 10’ s ddaw n tmes taḥlawant, trekcem sya ɣer da tibantenjalin-nni. Rnu-t iẓmi n uzgen n tlimet.

  S tezmert-nwen Daya 

  
 D anwa d wa ur nḥemmel izeǧǧigen, d anwa ur nebɣi ad yettwali tugna-nsen-nni tacebḥant yerḥan allen. Niḥqa, iban yal yiwen seg-neɣ yehwa-as uzeǧǧig s yisenfan i yesɛa d yiniten-is (couleurs) daɣen. Acku, izeǧǧigen s umata, ttakken-d ula d nutni amur-nsen n ubaɣur i ugama d tudert n umdan. Maca yesḥissif lḥal aṭas imi mgaradent tmuɣliwin ɣef uzeǧǧig : yal wa amek i t-iẓer. Llan wid ur nessin d acu i yezmer ad d-yessenfaɛ seg yizeǧǧigen d ccbaḥa-nsen imi ur ttqadaren azal-is, ur xeddmen ayen iwatan fell-as. 

 Nerra tamawt deg tmurt-nneɣ ṭṭuqten wid i ten-ikesben deg yixxamen-nsen, teẓẓan-ten akken ad behhin yis-sen tizniqin… Wanag tikwal, ttilint-d teswiɛin ideg stehzayen lɣaci, lxalat neɣ irgazen s yizeǧǧigen-nni, ur lehhun yis-sen swaswa. Aya iḍerru imi tettun ahat medden belli amek sran nutni s timmad-nsen i tgella, aman d wayen-nniḍen akken ad idiren, ad zemren ad ḥerrken ad qedcen, ad gen ayen i asen-d-tessutur tmeddurt n yal ass. Ula d azeǧǧig ilaq ad xedmen leḥsab-nsen fell-as. Yessefk ad ḥsun dakken am yimɣan akkit, azeǧǧig yesra i win ara yelhun yis-s bac ad d-yefk seg tama-s ayen yettraǧu umdan sɣur-s. 

 Rnu, acimi ɛni di berra, drus maḍi i yellan d imukan n uzeǧǧig? Ad ttnuzun deg tḥuna, neɣ ad ttwaẓẓan deg yiberdan i ccbaḥa d tfenda (rriḥa). Ilaq ad ftin deg xilla n yidigan, ad ttwawfen yal mi ara ten-yeḥwaǧ yiwen, acu kan deg tidet xussen. «nruḥ d agraw ad nerzu s axxam n Lwennas Meɛtub, ad nẓur aẓekka-s. Deg ubrid nemmekta-d ad nawi yid-neɣ izeǧǧigen ad ten-nesres ɣef uẓekka-s-nni. Neḥbes deg kra n yimukan nesteqsa ma ttnuzun ad d-naɣ, lameɛna ur nufi ara. Dɣa, nesḥassef ass-n imi nruḥ war ma newwi-ten». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen seg Ayt Smaɛel. Akka ihi, yettban-d ɛinani lexsas n wadeg n uzeǧǧig di tmurt-nneɣ. Lemmer zun ad ilint tḥuna, ad ttnuzun yizeǧǧigen di yal amḍiq, imi ccbaḥa-s tuklal ama d leɛtab fell-as, ama d adrim.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaïsa Khalifi 

  
 Gar-aneɣ sin wussan kan, 28 deg duǧember, ad d-nesmekti talallit n yiwen urgaz agejdan i yefkan tudert-is akked tmussni-s i tsekla tamazight s umata, wagi d Lmulud At Mɛemmer i ilulen ass n 28 deg duǧember 1917. Ass-a, ihi, xas ‘’ulac-it, yella’’, akken yeqqar s timmad-is.

  Tameddurt 

 Mulud Mɛemmri, neɣ Mulud At Mɛammar, d amaru, d aneggal, d amnadi ameqqran deg yidles d tutlayt n tmaziɣt. D netta i d aselmad amezwaru n tamaziɣt deg tesdawit n Lezzayer. Ilul ass 28 duǧember 1917 deg taddart n Tewrirt Mimun deg tɣiwant n At Yanni deg lwilaya n Tizi Uezzu. Yettaru s snat n tutlayin: tamaziɣt d tefransist, imi tafransist yis-s i yeɣra, ma d tamziɣt, d tutlayt n tyemmat. D amussnaw mucaεen dagi deg tmurt n Lezzayer, ladɣa deg uḥric n tesnalsit (la linguistique) d talsasent (anthropologie).

  Tudert d imuhal 

 Yekcem Mulud At Mɛemmar, deg useggas n 1927, s aɣerbaz yellan deg taddart-is i wakken ad yelmed dina. Maca deg useggas n 1928, yunag ɣer xali-s yellan deg temdint Ribaṭ n tmurt n Lmerruk. Rebɛa n yiseggasen, syin yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt n Lezzayer i wakken ad ikemmel almud-ines deg tesnawit iwumi qqaren “Bugeaud” deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt (tasnawit n Emir Abdelkader , deg Bab-El-Ouad).
