Syin akin, yuɣal ɣer tesnawit “Louis-le-Grand” n Paris deg tmurt n Fransa i wakken ad yuɣal d aselmad. Sakin, yekcem ɣer ugezdu n tsekla n Lezzayer tamaneɣt deg Tuber 1940. Deg 1942, mebɛed awwad n Marikan ɣer Tefriqt Ugafa, Mɛemmri yetteki deg yigran n yimenɣi n Ṭelyan, Fransa akked n Lalman.

 Deg taggara n 1945, yeswejd-d iman-is deg Paris ɣef tamenyugart n yiselmaden; mebɛed ayagi, yuɣal-d ɣef Lezzayer deg Ctember 1947. Yesselmad deg Lemdiya akked Ben Σeknun. Maca deg useggas n 1957, yeǧǧa-d tamdint n Lezzayer, sakin yuɣal yunag ɣer tmurt n Lmerruk i tikkelt tis snat. Iqqim dina armi tefra tegrawla tazzayrit deg 1962, d wakken i d-yuɣal s akal i t-id-issekkren.

 Seg 1965 armi 1972, yesselmed tutlayt n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit n Lezzayer tamaneɣt, deg ugezdu n umezruy n yigduden. Yesselmed-itt mebla tugdi, yerna deg sser d tufra ɣef temsulta d udabu n Lezzayer. Seg useggas n 1969 armi 1980 yella d anemhal n umḍiq n unadi n yidlesen n yimdanen amezruy atrar akked amezruy n yigduden (CRAPE), yellan deg temdint n Lezzayer tamaneɣt.

 Deg useggas n 1982, islul-d deg temdint n Paris, Tuddsa n tezrawin d Tegmi n Tamaziɣt (Centre d Etudes de Recherches Amazighes, CERAM), am wakken yesbedd daɣen tasɣunt-nni Awal. Deg 1988, Mulud Mɛemri fkan-as arraz n Docteur honoris causa deg tesdawit n la Sorbonne. Mulud At Mεemmar yemmut ass 26 deg furar 1989 deg Σin n Defla deg ubrid n tuɣalin-is seg tmurt n Lmerruk. Mulud At Mamar, yeǧǧa later akked tikta meqqren

  Tira d idlisenUngalen 

 A. La colline oubliée i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigi n «Plon» n temdint n Paris, deg Fransa deg useggas n 1952. Tazrigt tis snat, deg Paris ɣer tezrigin Tiddukkla Tamatut n Tezrigin «Union générale d’éditions», deg useggas n 1978.

 B. Le sommeil du juste, i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigi n «Plon» n temdint Paris, deg Fransa deg useggas n 1955. Tazrigt tis snat, deg Paris ɣer tezrigin Tiddukkla Tamatut n Tezrigin «Union générale d’éditions», deg useggas n 1978.

 C. L’opium et le bâton i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigi n «Plon» n temdint n Paris deg Fransa deg useggas n 1965. Tazrigt tis snat deg Paris ɣer tezrigt Tiddukkla Tamatut n Tezrigin «Union générale d’éditions», deg useggas n 1978.

 D. La traversée, i d yeffɣen ɣer tezrigi n «Plon» n temdint n Paris deg Fransa deg useggas n 1982.

  Tasekla

 e) L’Ahellil du Gourara, Paris, MSH, 1984.

 f) Yenna-yas Ccix Muhand, i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigi n “Laphomic” n Lezzayer, deg useggas n 1989.

  Tutlayt, Tajerrumtd tesnawalt 

 Tajerrumt n tmaziɣt (tantala taqbaylit), i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigi n Maspero n temdint n Paris, deg useggas n 1976.

 Précis de grammaire berbère, «Usdid n tjerrumt n tmaziɣt» i d-yeffɣen deg tesɣunt n Awal deg temdint n Paris, deg useggas n 1988.

 Lexique français-touareg «Amawal n tmaziɣt d tergit», s tallelt n mass J.M. Cortade, i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigi n «Arts et métiers graphiques» n Paris, deg useggas n 1967.

 Amawal n tmaziɣt – tafransist akked tafransist – tamaziɣt, i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigi n Imedyazen n temdint n Paris, deg useggas n1980.

 Cahiers d’études berbères, «Azmam n tezrawin timaziɣin», i d-yeffɣen tesɣunt n Awal n temdint n Paris, seg 1985 armi1989.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
  Aɣmis n Yimmaziɣen: Amek tebdiḍ ccna? 

  Malik Kezoui:  Bdiɣ ccna mačči s lebɣi, acku leɛmer ad as-niɣ nekk ad uɣaleɣ d acennay neɣ ad sefruyeɣ. Seg wasmi meẓẓiyeɣ ḥemmleɣ ad sleɣ aṭas i rradyu d wayen akk i icudden ɣer tẓuri. Qqaren-iyi-d imawlan-iw zik asmi mecṭuḥeɣ deg yiḍ ma ur sliɣ ara i uẓawan ur gganeɣ ara, acku d ayen wulfeɣ-tt, s yis-s i d-tturbbeɣ. Asmi leḥqeɣ ad ɣreɣ deg uɣerbaz n yimeɛdar yellan deg Boukhalfa, ufiɣ imeddukkal-iw llan deg-sen wid yeqqaren deg tesdawit, syin ttawin-iyi ad cnuɣ deg tmeɣriwin i d-yettilin daxel n tesdawit. Bdiɣ timeɣriwin deg tesdawiyin seg useggas n 1999, syin akkin cniɣ akked tiddukkliwin tidelsanin, syin ɣer sdat uɣaleɣ xedmeɣ aṭas n tmeɣriwin deg uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu.

  Ma yella win i d ak-id-yefkan afus n tallelt? 

 D tidet llan wid iyi-ɛawnen deg umecwar-iw n ccna, amezwaru seg-sen d acennay-nneɣ ameqqran i ḥemmleɣ aṭas wagi d “Ahcene Ahris”, lukan mačči d netta tili ass-agi ur ttawḍeɣ ara s andaka wwḍeɣ ass-a. Imi d netta i d-isulin ɣef usayes i wakken ad cnuɣ yid-s i tikkelt tamezwarut deg 2006, yerna d tameɣra-s taneggarut i yexdem. Syin akkin d aneɣlaf n yilmeẓyen d waddal Mass Ould Ali Lhadi, yellan imiren d anemhal n uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Aṭas n tikkal iyi-id-yessawel i wakken ad ɣeniɣ uqbel ad d-sufɣeɣ tasfift-iw tamezwarut. Syin akkin daɣen iɛwen-iyi ucennay-nneɣ nḥemmel aṭas, wagi d Ferhat, imi timeɣriwin-is tineggura yexdem deg tmura n Leqbayel (Tizi Uzzu, Bgayet akked Tubiret), cniɣ deg-sent yid-s ɣef usayes. Mebla ma ttuɣ tameɣra taneggarut i yexdem Si Moh deg useggas n 2004, yessuli-iyi-d daɣen cniɣ yid-s.

  Ma d isefra-k kan i tcennuḍ? 

 Tidet kan, mačči ala isefra i xeddmeɣ nekk s timmad-iw i cennuɣ deg tezlatin-iw, xeddmeɣ-d tasuqilt i kra n tikta s tutlayt n tefransist, ttaraɣ-tent-id ɣer teqbaylit d isefra. Imi daɣen nekk ttnadiɣ aṭas u ḥemmleɣ ad suqleɣ tinfaliyin n yimura imeqqranen iyi-tteɛjaben. Am wakken daɣen i cniɣ yiwet n tezlit n Taleb Rabeh.

  Amek tessawḍeḍ, ad teɣreḍ wa ad tecnuḍ, yerna kečč d amuḍin? 

 Deg temsalt-agi, nekk liɣ mgal widak ik-yeqqaren belli aẓawan neɣ ccna tettɛewiq inelmaden ɣef lqraya-nsen. Nekk lukan mačči d ccna ur cukkeɣ ara ad ɣreɣ, lukan daɣen mačči d leqraya cukkeɣ ur cennuɣ ara. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ belli ta tettkemmil ta, ulac am wakken mi ara ddukklent. Nekk ttafeɣ aṭas iman-iw deg ccna, yis-s senqaseɣ ɣef wul-iw, senfalayeɣ ayen bɣiɣ…atg. Imir-nni yeɛni liɣ qqareɣ yerna cennuɣ tura akka selmadeɣ deg uɣerbaz n yimeɛdar n Boukhalfa, yerna mazal-iyi ttɣeniɣ. Ma d aṭṭan-iw d tamesalt-nniḍen akk, acku ḥemmleɣ tamussni d unadi dɣa lemdeɣ tura uɣaleɣ selmadeɣ, ula d ccna ḥemmleɣ-tt aṭas dɣa rebḥaɣ fell-as. 

 Ula d tamsalt n uselmed deg uɣerbaz, laɛmer xemmeɣ ɣur-s, armi i d-ufiɣ iman-iw d aselmad ur ḥtameɣ ara.

  D acu n yiɛwiqen i d-tettmagareḍ deg ubrid n ccna? 

 Ugur amezwaru i d-ttmagareɣ nekk s timmad-iw d aṭṭan-iw, imi ulamma tura qqwan ttawilat imaynuten, maca ur nezmir ara ad nexdem kulec i yiman-nneɣ akken ilaq lḥal dima. Yerna lukan mačči d imeddukkal-iw d twacult-iyi iyi-ttɛawanen aṭas aṭas, tili ass-agi ur ttiliɣ ara gar-awen d afennan. Ma iɛwiqen i d-yettmagar ufennan s umata, imi afennan deg tmura-a ur ixeddem ara deg useggas kamel, imḍebbren ttɛassan kan tignatin akked tmeɣriwin, yecban yennayer, 20 yebrir, uḍan n remḍan…atg. Ḥesben-aɣ am tɣawsiwin melmi kan isen-yehwa ad aɣ-d-ssiwlen i wakken ad necnu, ayɣer ala ur d-ttilint ara tmeɣriwin n ccna ɣef teɣzi n useggas. Ulac daɣen imazragen d yimsuffɣen yesɛan ssaḥ. Ilaq daɣen ɣef yimdanen uzzigen ad d-gren afus-nsen, acku ddula weḥd-s ur tezmir ara i wannecat-a. 

 Ulamma yerna nekkni dagi deg Tizi Uzzu tanmehla n yidles txeddem ayen i wumi tezmer, lḥasun ulac tin itt-yugaren deg tmura-nneɣ deg temsalt n leqdic.

  Ma tcennuḍ kan ɣef tudert-ik, neɣ ɣef wayen ttidiren wiyaḍ? 

 Tamezwarut, cennuɣ ɣef wayen ttidireɣ nekk deg tudert n yal ass, syin akkin sefruyeɣ ɣef wayen ttḥulfun wid yettidiren yid-i deg tmetti. Imi nettɛici deg yiwen umkan dɣa uguren-nneɣ ttemcabin ama d tayri ama d aṭṭan ama ɣef yidles-nneɣ d teqbaylit-nneɣ, acu kan cennuɣ timsal-agi akken i tent-walaɣ nekk s timmad-iw. Imi daɣen suquleɣ-d cwiṭ seg tefransit ɣer teqbaylit, iban kan ad sefruɣ wa ad cnuɣ ɣef wayen ttḥusun wiyaḍ. Cniɣ daɣen ɣef yiwen n uderɣal i yettwalin tilufa akken-nniḍen mačči akken i d tent-ttwalin tuget n yimdanen, taɣuct iwumi semmaɣ “ssemhaɣ-am”.

  I kečč tettwaliḍ timsal akken itent-ttwalin medden, neɣ temxalaf tmuɣli-k fell-asen? 

 Deg tuget n temsal ttemgiridaɣ ɣef medden-nniḍen deg wamek i ttwaliɣ kra n tlufa n ddunit, yerna nekk uɣeɣ tannumi qqareɣ ayen ttwaliɣ ula ur yetteɛǧab ara lḥal imdanen, imi qqareɣ-tent-id akken qqariḥit, tikkwal ur ttaṭṭfeɣ ara iman-iw, ulamma ur bɣiɣ ara ad tent-id-iniɣ maca iaedda-yi lḥa mačči d lebɣi-w. Dɣa tura ttaɛraḍeɣ amek ur d-qqareɣ ara kulec ɣef wayen ttxemmimex d wayen ttwaliɣ deg tudert n yal ass, ilaq ad sawḍeɣ ur d-qqareɣ ara ayen yellan deg-i. Ulamma yeɛni ur cliɛeɣ ara deg yimdanen ur nbeɣɣu ara ayen i d-qqareɣ maca friɣ-tt d yiman-iw xas akken ẓriɣ ur zmireɣ ara ur d-qqareɣ ara kulec, maca ayen sneqsaɣ d aṭas.

  Ma yella wayen txeddmeḍ berra n ccna? 

 Am nekk am tuget n yicennayen neɣ n yinaẓuren s umata nxeddem ayen-nniḍen, yerna mačči d ccna i xeddim n uɣrum deg tmurt-nneɣ, nennu-tt kan d zyada. Ihi uqbel ad iliɣ d aselmad n tefransist deg uɣerbaz n yimeɛdar n Boukhalfa, asmi liɣ d anelmad deg tesdawit liɣ xeddmeɣ ɣer yiwet n tezrigt i wumi qqaren “Llala Moulati”, seɣtayeɣ-asen idlisen n tmaziɣt i d-tessufuɣ s ttawil n tira n “Braille”. Gar wayen sextaɣ adlis-nni n Kateb Yacine, adlis-nni n Mouloud Feraoun, akked tmucuha i warrac imeẓyanen. Menbeɛd mi tamurt teṭṭef-itt ccedda n lexsas n yidrimen, dɣa yenna-iyi bab n tezrigin-agi nekk ad ḥebseɣ imi ulac idrimen. Dɣa seg yimiren ar tura aql-iyi-n d aselmad n tefranstist deg uɣerbaz n Boukhalfa.

  Mmeslay-aɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef umecwar-ik deg ccna? 

 Deg ccna aql-aɣ nruḥ-as kan s ttawil, nxeddem ayen i wumi nezmer wayen kan nesɛa. Ulamma bdiɣ ccna deg useggas n 1999, maca ur d-sufɣeɣ ara tasfift alarmi d aseggas n 2010, armi ɛeddan 11 n yiseggasen n tmeɣriwin ɣef usayes i skelseɣ tasfift-iw tamezwarut, i wummi semmaɣ “Tiktabin”, ideg llant 7 n tezlatin. Tis snat giɣ-as isem “Africa”, llant deg-s 8 n tuɣac, yiwet s tefransist ma d sebɛa-nni-nniḍen s teqbaylit. D tasfift ideg cnan aṭas n yicennayen, gar-asen: Djafer Ait Mengullat, yiwen n ucennay n tmurt n Coungou, nekkini…atg. Deg useggas n 2014, rniɣ-d aḍebsi-w wis tlata, d winna i wumi fkiɣ azwel “Tamurt-iw”, llant deg-s 9 n tuɣac. D aḍebsi daɣen ideg cnan waṭas n yicennayen n tmurt n Leqbayel, yecban Rabeh Ouferhat, Karim Abranis, Malek Bachi, Nouria…atg. Syin ilindi rniɣ-d tasfift-iw taneggarut, i wumi giɣ azwel “Tujmiwin”.

  Acimi d “tujmiwin” i textareḍ d azwel i tesfift-nni n 2016? 

 Imi uɣaleɣ-d aṭas ɣer temẓi-iw, mektaɣ-d ayen akk ddreɣ deg tallit-nni d wamek i tt-ddreɣ deg teswiɛt-nni. Yerna azwel-agi fkiɣ-t i tesfift s umata, acku ulac tizlit i wumi semmaɣ tujmiwin, ulac ula d afyir ideg i t-id-uddreɣ. Nekk tura friɣ-tt d rray-iw belli izwal n tesfifin-iw ilaq ad ilin jemlen-d akk isental n tuɣac-nni yellan deg-sen.

  Neẓra belli tɛedleḍ aṭas akked ucennay Taleb Rabeh, amek armi? 

 Ulamma semḥaseɣ i tuɣac-is yerna ḥemmleɣ-t uqbel ad tissineɣ, maca deg yennayer n 2006, ssawlen-as-d akken ad yexdem tadwilt deg tiliẓri tazzayrit “Canal Algérie”, yuɣ ula d nekk nan-iyi-d ad dtecnuḍ yiwet n tezlit n 5 ddqayeq kan. Yuɣal yenna-as i uneɣmas-nni ilaq ad yili yid-i deg leblaṭu, ad imeslay am nekk, dɣa yefreḥ uneɣmas-nni s tigawt-agi igrrzen. Yerna imiren ur iyi-ssin ara, mi nekfa tadwilt-nni niɣ-as ayen txedmeḍ akken yenna-iyi-d lukan d nekk i yellan deg umkan-ik iyi-ɣaḍ lḥal mliḥ, dɣa deg wass-nni nuɣal d imeddukkal n tidet, netta iḥemmel-iyi seg yimir nekk tezad aṭas leḥmmala-w ɣur-s. Syin akkin niɣ-as ma maɛlic ad cnuɣ tizlit-ik, yenna-iyi-d ulac fell-as. Maca llan kra n yicennayen lliɣ ḥemmleɣ-ten mačči d izli, ḥemmleɣ ad asent-smuzegteɣ i tezlatin-nsen, maca mi iyi-tettunefk tegnit ssneɣ-ten uɣaleɣ kerhaɣ-ten aṭas.

  Ma yella wayen tsewjadeḍ? 

 D tidet, sewjadeɣ yiwen n album amaynut, maca wellah ma ẓriɣ imelmi ara yewjed i wakken ad d-yeffeɣ. Ẓiɣ kan belli ad ilint deg-s 12 n tezlatin, yiwet s tefransist tiyaḍ akk s teqbaylit. D tasfift ideg daɣen ara ɣenin waṭas n yicennayen, gar-asen: yiwet n tcennayt tacenwit yettwassnen aṭas, yiwen n ucennay d uneɣmas i xeddmen akka tura a “El Watan”, d wiyaḍ. Ad d-tuɣal deg-s tezlit-nni Africa.

  Ma yella wayen ara d-ternuḍ? 

 Bɣiɣ kan ad weṣṣiɣ icennayen-agi ilmeẓyen, i wakken ur ten-yetteffeɣ ara leɛqel i wakken ad kecmen ɣer ustudu, i wakken ad skelsen tasfift. Ilaq qbel ad cnun deg tmeɣriwin aṭas n tikkal, imi asayes iselmad aṭas n tɣawsiwin, i wakken ad d-tjemɛeḍ imferɣen-ik, i wakken ad txedmeḍ tadellet i yiman-ik d yawen ara d-tesuffɣeḍ ɣer sdat.

  Awal-ik n taggara? 

 Tanemmirt-ik ɣef tdiwennit-agi iyi-texdmeḍ s tmaziɣti nekk d leqdicat-iw idelsanen. Iɛǧeb-iyi lḥal imi tadiwennit-agi tettwaxdam s tutlayt n tyemmat. Tanemmirt tameqqrant i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen imi i yi-iga azal, ad awen-iniɣ afud igerrzen i kunwi d uɣmis-nwen. Ad iniɣ tanemmirt s tussda i wid akk iyi-ḥemmlen, d widak yesmeḥsisen i tuɣac-iw. Ma nebɣa tamaziɣt ad taẓ ɣer sdat, ilaq ad tili deg yal iḥricen n tudert-nneɣ, deg tɣamasa, deg tira, deg ccna, deg yidles s umata…atg.

  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Tiddukla Tadelsant Imeddukal n Sliman Σazem n temnaḍt n Moissac di tmurt n Fransa, thegga-d leqdic wessiεen i lmend n usmekti n umuli wis 34 γef tmettant n uzamul n ccna n teqbaylit Sliman Σazem, i tewwi tmettant ass n 28 yennayer 1983. Ahil i yettewjarden γef ddema d amesbaγur, anda i llant temsikniyin yemgaraden γef tudert n unaẓur, timlilit tinigit γef umecwar n tẓuri n Dda Sliman, tirza γer uẓekka-s d ubraḥ yewwin issem-is, cnawi, tibuγarin, tamedyazt d waṭas-nniḍen. Leqdic-agi, yesdurit-id usenssu Le Chapon Fin n temnaḍt n Moissac ass n sebt 28 yennayer 2017, anda i ḥedren deqs n yicennayen d imni gen n tmurt n leqbayel.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tudert n Slimane Azem 

 Sliman Σazem, d amedyaz, d anaẓur , d tigejdit n ccna n teqbaylit. Ilul ass n 19 ctember 1918 di tmurt n leqbayel, di taddart Agni-Geɣran, Lɛerc n At-Sedqa, deg tama n Yiwaḍiyen. D mmi-s n Leɛmara d Yamina, yesεa 3 watmaten-is Bujemɛa, Waɛli d Ali, akked 2 n tsetmatin, Ḥǧila d Wardiya. D mmi-s n ufellaḥ am netta am leqbayel n lawan-nni. Ur izad ara deg uɣerbaz. Yella d alemmas. Aqerru-is iwehha sanda-nniḍen. Si temẓi, Sliman Σazem iḥemmel ad yecnu γas akken tallit-nni d lεib win icennun.Yella iḥemmel aṭas timucuha n umaru afransis Jean de La Fontaine. Dɣa, annect-a, yeǧǧa-d later deg umecwar-ines n tẓuri d ccna, imi deg tezlatin-is yessenṭṭaq-d aṭas n yiɣersiwen. Tamedyazt n Sliman Σazem d tazedgant u d talqayant, yeṭṭef-d afus i tmedyazt taqbaylit di tsuta yezrin. Yeṣṣaweḍ-itt-id i tsutiwin i d-iteddun, yerna deg ubrid hrawen. Sliman Σazem, yeffeɣ taddart-is meẓẓi. Yesɛa 11 n yiseggasen di lɛemr-is asmi i iruḥ ɣer Lezzayer tamaneɣt I wakken ad yexdem ɣer Yiṛumyen deg tama n Sṭawali. Asmi yewweḍ 19 n yiseggasen, yezger agemmaḍ ɣer Fransa. Iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Logway anda yexdem deg yiwet n lluzin, uqbel ad as-d-ssiwlen ad yels, akken ad yettekki deg ṭrad-nni iwumi qqaren Issoudun. Deg 1940, yeffeɣ-d seg lɛesker, yeffeɣ tamdint n Logway, yekcem tayeḍ, ɣer Paris anda i ixeddem dinna deg umitṛu sdaxel uderbuz (akken yeqqar deg yiwet n tezlit-ines). Sin yiseggasen mbeɛd, wwin-t lɛesker n Lalman ɣer Rhénanie deg tama n umalu n Lalman, ur d-yeffiɣ armi d asmi tewwi Fransa tilelli-s, deg 1945. Kra n yiseggasen syin, yeṭṭef yiwet n lqahwa. Dɣa din yella icennu i yiminigen am netta. Taɣect-is tamezwarut ‘’A Muḥ a Muḥ’’, yessuffeɣ-itt-id ɣef yinig. D tizlit i d-yeldin abrid i tamudi n 50 n yiseggasen n ccna igerrzen.Asmi i tewwi Lezzayer timunent deg useggas n 1962, Sliman Σazem ur yeṭṭif ara imi-is ɣef wayen i iḍerrun deg tmurt. Dɣa, I lmend n waya, gedlen tuɣac-is ur d-ttɛeddint ara deg Rradyu n teqbaylit seg useggas n 1967 ar 1988. Sliman Σazem, d anagi ɣef tallit ideg yedder, d anagi ɣef ddunit ur nban s anda i tetteddu, akken yeqqar deg yimeslayen-is,‘’Llah ɣaleb, kulci yeqleb, Zzman tura yexxerweḍ’’… atg. Tuɣac-is d tugniwin n temetti i d-yesnuqul. Yemmut ass n 28 yennayer 1983 di Moissac, tamurt n Fransa.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

 
  
 D adlis wis xemsa i yura Ramdane LASHEB seg useggas n 2009 ar tura xas ulamma ayen yellan deg tira n Mass LASHEB d anadi n waṭas n yiseggasen-aya : d anadi iwumi ixeddem yal tikkelt tazrawt i wakken ad t-id-yessenṭṭeq ; tazrawt i aɣ-d-yettawin yal tikkelt ajdid ɣef tgemmi akked tɣerma tamaziɣt s umata s wudem ussnan. Tazwert i udlis-a, tella-d sɣur Rachid BELLIL. Yebḍa umahil ɣef 5 n yixfawen. Ixf amezwaru yewwi-d ɣef umezruy d usuddes n yismawen. Wis sin, d nadi ɣef wansi i d-yekka wawal-agi ‘’Tala Khellil’’. Ixf wis tlata, yemmal-d tuddsa n Taddart Tala Khellil seg tama n tsertit, tadamsa d tmetti. Wis 4, d tazrawt ɣef tẓuri d tsekla. Ma d aḥric aneggaru, yelha-d s uglam n yimdanen mechuren n Taddart Tala Khellil. Adlis ‘’Monographie d’un village, Tala Khellil, yeffeɣ-d ɣer tezrigin L’ODYSEE, 2015. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Hocine.M

  
 « Mačči d tikkelt neɣ snat I d-nettas nettaf-d timacinin ḥebsent. Imḍebbren ttawin-d win ara tent-iseggmen seg tmanaɣt, tikwal nettraǧu alamma qrib d tameddit iwakken ad ndawi, tikwal nettuɣal akken ɣer yixxamen-nneɣ. Taswiɛt qessiḥet fell-aɣ, mačči d ayen iwumi nezmer ad as-nesber. »

 Taggara n yimalas yezrin, imuḍan n tgeẓẓal beggnen-d lɣiḍ-nsen sdat n liḥala i ttidiren yal ass s yiwen n yibeddi azal n tsaɛat deg sbiṭer Mohamed Boudiaf yellan di temdint n Tubiret. Imuḍan-a iɣef yettwaḥettem usizdeg n yidammen rfan seg waṭas n temsal yesseɛwaqen adawi-nsen, imi d wid ur nezmir ad idiren mebla ma ttɛeddin ɣer tmacinin n usizdeg yal tikkelt. Dɣa, d tamsalt-a n tmacinin i ten-yesserfan s waṭas, acku, ɣef leḥsab n yimeslayen-nsen d tid ur nteddu ara akken iwata. «Mačči d tikkelt neɣ snat I d-nettas nettaf-d timacinin ḥebsent. Imḍebbren ttawin-d win ara tent-iseggmen seg tmanaɣt, tikwal nettraǧu alamma qrib d tameddit iwakken ad ndawi, tikwal nettuɣal akken ɣer yixxamen-nneɣ. Taswiɛt qessiḥet fell-aɣ, mačči d ayen iwumi nezmer ad as-nesber.» I d-yenna uselway n tiddukla n yimuḍan-a, Rabah Izem. Mačči kan d yiwen n uɣbel I yerḥan imuḍan-a, maca ggtent tlufa, imi ula d amsejjay yettuxeṣṣen deg waṭan-a ur yettili ara. “Ad d-naweḍ, ad aɣ-ar zen ɣer tmacinin azal n kra n wakud, syin ad nuɣal, mebla ma yella akka kra n win ara inadin liḥala-nneɣ ma twenneɛ, neɣ ahat iwulem akka ad nexdem kra n rradyu neɣ ilaq –aɣ ddwa nniḍen.” I d-yenna yiwen seg yimuḍan iɣef i d-iban reffu. Taluft tis tlata d tin yerzan imḍebber n uḥric-a. Ɣef leḥsab n yimuḍan-a, win yellan deg umkan-a ur yesɛi ara kra n tirmit deg udawi neɣ n usewjed n ttawilat I wid yurez waṭṭan n tgeẓẓal. “limer d lebɣi, win ara yilin deg umḍiq-a ad yili meqqar yesɛa tikta ɣef wamek ara ibedd s amuḍin d wayen I as-ilaqen. Maca, nekni ur nufi win ara d-yezzin ɣur-neɣ tamuɣli, ahat ad yessixfef fell-aɣ taɛkemt.” Mass Izem, yenna-d dakken ddula ur tesxas ara di ttawilat I ḥwaǧen yimuḍan, maca deg unnar, nettwali ṭṭuqten wid yettɛewwiqen lecɣal. Imḍebber yellan yakan ɣef uqerru n tmehla n usejji yewɛed-aɣ ad d-yawi timacinin timaynutin, maca netta iruḥ, nekni neqqim nettgani. Ɣer melmi ara tifrir fell-aɣ tagut ?” I d-yekfa awal-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail. M 

  
 Tajmaɛt ass-nni teččur am tmellalt. Asrugmet d leɛyaḍ, ad send-tesleḍ anda i telliḍ. D acu yeḍran akka ? D izgaren i yennejmaɛen d agraw. Ɣef wacu akka i ttemceqlalen segmi d-yuli wass ar tura, alaḥal ad yezgen wass, iṭij ad yeṭṭef talemmast n yigenni. -Amer yettuɣal lxir talfi yuɣal i nekkni s yizgaren i d-yenna yiwen seg-sen. -Segmi ara d-nekker d takerza, laɛtab yezga d amwanes, yettagi ad yeṭixxer fell-aneɣ, ma d asmi ara aɣ-tfakk tezmert ad d-ɣlin fell-aneɣ yijenwiyen ur nettḥezzib. Aksum, ad t-aɣen d tarbaɛt, ad t-ččen, ma d aglim, ad t-lsen d icifaḍ, i d-yerna wayeḍ. -Wellah ar nettuɣaḍ, neɛteb nezzeh, azaglu acḥal d aẓayan ires ɣef umgerḍ uḍbir nekkni ad nernu asiker n lemmaɛen s tgersa yentan deg wakal yeqquren. Wa d lbaṭel, ilaq ad nerfed yiwen wawal ɣef tikkelt swayes ara nesṭixxer wa i aɣ-d-ittenǧaren akka lemmaɛen. Dayen, tiyita tewweḍ ɣer yiɣes, neɛya mačči d kra, ilaq ur tettɣimi ara kanakka fell-aneɣ, ilaq ad tt-tbeddel. -Ih! Ih! Ilaq ad t-nesṭixxer! Akka i d-neṭqen ɣef tikkelt yizgaren tezdeɣ tnekra. Yiwen n uzger yeqqimen deg teɣmert n tejmaɛt, yemmed ɣef wiyiḍ, ar tura ur d-igir yiwen n wawal. Mi kkren fell-asen akk ad rzun ɣer win akken i d-ixeddmen lemmaɛen i wakken ad as-inin: «dayen teṭaxxreḍ !» amɣar-nni n yizgaren yerfed awal i tikkelt tamezwarut : «D acu i ken-yuɣen akka ? Rret-d ɣur-wen leɛqel i tesruḥum s yiffasen-nwen, xemmemet kan cwiṭ, kunwi tekkrem-d am tmes-nni n teẓgi, tesreɣ aqquran tegla s uzegzaw. Xzut cciṭan i ken-izedɣen ɣef tikkelt, tuɣalem-d ad tɛiwdem leḥsab i taluft, akken qqaren : «Deg ugraw, mi ara ilin ḍelmen akk, lmaɛna-s ma nnan nesɛa lḥeqq, sɛan akk lḥeqq». -Ihi, tgezmem-tt ad tawḍem ɣer win i aɣ-d-ittenǧaren lemmaɛen i nezzuɣur seg wasmi akken i tebda ddunit, ad as-tinim: «Dayen, neɛya deg-k, nebɣa wayeḍ». -Tbegsem-d merra ad as-tinim ad k-nbeddel s wayeḍ. Ẓriɣ, teẓram akk mi ara yezɛef yiwen, yesserwat berra i unnar. Ayen ara s-yelhun, ur t-ittwali, yezga yedderɣel fell-as, maca ayen ara s-d-yeglu s lmaḍerra yettarra-as-t Rebbi d ayen kan. Ihi, ma ad iyi-taɣem awal, i nekk i d-ilulen mačči iḍelli, slet-iyi-d d acu ara wen-d-iniɣ: «D tidet, lemmaɛen njebbed mi ara nkerrez ẓẓay, jerbeɣ-t acḥal d aseggas, nekk d umeddakel-iw i d-yeggran ass-a d icifaḍ, maca ḥṣut bellik amdan-a i aɣ-d-ittenǧaren allal-a n tkerza, nessen-it akk, neẓra amek i iga lemmaɛen ara ɣ-d-iheggi akka d tasawent, wanag win ara d-yasen d amaynut, ad yeṭṭef amḍiq-is, ur t-nessin ara, lemmaɛen ara ɣ-d-yeqqen ad t-nzuɣer, ahat d lǧedra n useklu s lekmal-is mebla ma inǧer-itt-id».

<p style="text-align: right;">  Malek Houd 

  
 Lḥaǧ Saɛid si taddart n Tala-Ixlan, isɛa kan snat n teqcicin yiwet d tuzyint, ssawalen-as Lǧuhar, tayeḍ ur tesɛi ara ssifa, ssawalen-as Tasaɛdit. Tuzyint, Lǧuhar, yuɣ-itt Aɛmer-Waɛli si taddart Gefran. Semmi-s, Muḥ Lḥaǧ Awmer, ibɣa ad d-yawi uletma-s, Dehbuca, tuzyint-nni. Nettat d agur, tezyen tif uletma-nni. Semmi-s, Aɛmer-Waɛli, ur yebɣi ara, yugi, yussem, issefreɣ-it ɣer uḍeggal-is imi ula d netta yebɣa-tt zik. Iwwet ɣer-s Muḥ Lḥaǧ Awmer, yugi baba-s, inna-as mačči Aɛmer ugiɣ ad as-fkeɣ Lǧuhar, fkiɣ-as taberkant, ur tent- semliliɣ ara deg yiwen uxxam. Ifka-tt i wayeḍ.

 Asmi Aɛmer-Waɛli imlal-d ɛemmi-s-nni, yenna-as: ‘’a Muḥ Lḥaǧ Awmer! Seg wasmi truḥ yelli-s n Lḥaǧ Saɛid ur d-tekcimeḍ s axxam. Zik, d aḥbib, tettaseḍ-d, tura ur d-tettaseḍ ara’’.

 Yenna-as:’’ ur nettaseɣ ara’’!

 Tɣaḍ-iyi lalla Tasaɛdit

 D aqadum n tayeddit

 Terna-d d takna ɣef Lǧuhar

 Tamezwarut tugi-k

 Taneggarut teqbel-ik

 Ttif lmut teɣzi leɛmer

 Ma zziɣ-n s axxam-ik

 Teḥṣiḍ d lmetl-ik

 D ul-ik xas ad iyi-iḥqar

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Tazaɣart d yiwet n taddart gar tudrin n Yilulen n usammer iteddun ɣer tɣiwant n Yiɣram tama n Uqbu. S ufella n tiɣilt i d-tezga am tuget n tudrin n leqbayel, ur tesbur ara i yicuḍaḍ-is ur tferdaɛ ara.

 Di tama n usammer ugafa n tɣiwant i d-tezga, zzint-as-id tlata tudrin: At Amar Uzeggan ɣer ugafa , Tiɣilt n Mexluf deg umalu, di tama n wadda d taddart n Teslent. Semman-as Tazaɣart acku amkan ideg tezga yeḥma , rnu ur yessawen ara mliḥ. Zik imezdaɣ n taddart-agi, llan deg udrar ‘’Tinqict Aḥiǧa’’ syin akin di tallit-nni n Ahmed Ulqaḍi udren-d ɣer At Amar Uzeggan , uɣalen qarben-d ɣer wanda llan tura. Imi zik amkan-agi anda akka tella taddart tura, d lemluk kan d iḥerqan ɣer dinna i tt-ɛazziben di lawan n tegrest.

  Tajmaɛt n taddart 

 Tajmaɛt n taddart n Tzaɣart, mazal-itt ar tura am tjemmuya-nni n zik n tudrin. Tbedd ɣef leqwanen n teqbaylit; yella ubarreḥ, ttilin-d inejmuɛen. Yal 15 n wussan, ttemlilin-d Wat taddart ɣer tejmaɛt i wakken ad sqerdcen timsal. Yettili leɛdad, yella lḥeqq: win ifɣen i lqanun, ad isellek tabzert. Ttgen,daɣen, yimezdaɣ lufaq: xeddmen tacemlit i usizdeg n yiberdan d wadeg n tejmaɛt , ttreqqiɛen iqudas n tliwa d lebni n wayen ixussen. Amedya lebni n ubduz d useggem n uxxam n tejmaɛt. Ma d amahil yettili-d d igrawen , Ferqen d igrawen n 10 medden , yal ddurt anwa agraw ara d-tsaḥ nnuba-s n tcemlit.

  Tagrawla n 54-62 

 Ma nuɣal ɣer umezruy n taddart-agi, ad naf xas akken d taddart tamecṭuḥt , maca ccan-is meqqar , teqdec ayen iwumi tezmer di lawan n tegrawla; 88 n yimeɣrasen i yeɣlin deg unnar n lḥerma. At taddart merra xedmen ayen iwumi zemren. Terra Fransa ttar deg-sen, tesserɣ-asen ixxamen-nsen. Ɛran, lluẓen , ggujlen warrac, ǧǧlent tulawin , ma d wid i d-yeggran ttwanfan ɣer temdinin.

  Taḥanut n uḥeddad 

 Si zik ar ass-a, ad teqqim Tzaɣart d yiwet taddart i deg mazal llan yiḥeddaden n wuzzal deg udewwar n Yiɣram akked d lɛerc n Yilulen n usammer . Zik-nni, d nutni irezzun ɣer tudrin i wakken ad leqmen duzan n tfellaḥt n i yifellaḥen n tudrin n Yilulen n usammer. Ass-a xas udren ɣer temdint n Uqbu, maca mazal ṭṭfen di lḥirfa-agi; ar ass-a n wussan, qesden-ten medden i wakken ad asen-xedmen ayen ḥwaǧen: d leqma n tgersiwin, neɣ n tgelzyam d iqubac.

  Tiwizi 

 At Tzaɣart mazal ṭṭfen di tjadit , ar ass-a n wussan mazal lemɛana gar madden. Di lawan n uzemmur, tilawin neɣ tiwaculin ur nesɛi ara win ad asent-id ijemɛen azemmur, teddukul taddart ɣef yiwen n ufus, ttruḥun d tirebuyaɛ , irgazen tulawin, ttɛanen win ur nesɛi nnayeb deg uxxam “ Anect-a izeṭṭ tagmat, itekkes lwaḥc ɣef yimezdaɣ n taddart yenḥwaǧen afus n lemɛawna’’ i d-yenna Hakim At tsellamt s yisem d aɛeggal n tidukla .

   Timecreḍt n yennayer 

 Yal mi ara qrib ad d-yawweḍ yixef n useggas n yimaziɣen i d-yettasen deg umenzu n yennayer, yettili-d usfugel-is di taddart n Tzaɣart. Tetthegi-t-id tesqamutt n taddart s lemɛawna n tidukla Amaynut, amek id-tettili? Yettili ubarreḥ , tettnejmaɛ-d taddart jemɛen-d idrimen ɣer yimezdaɣ , tettili daɣen ssadaqa , sadaqat-nni s yes-sent i tettqabal taddart tixxamin n uksum i yettruḥun ɣrr yimeɣban n taddart. Ass n tmecṛedt di taddart n Tzaɣart d ass n tumert , ttasen-d medden sya u sya, tettmlil tasa d way turew. Uqbel faruq n texxamin n uksum, yettili yiwen n wahil s wazal-is, tilawin, teffɣent-d s leksiwat n teqbayliyin , yettili ucali di tzenqatin n taddart, xeddment urar , yettili ucewwiq d usbuɣer, iḍebbalen s ṭṭbel d lɣida ttgerrizen tagnit. Ma d irgazen, kkaten lbarud. D ayen i as-d-irennun di ccbaḥa i tmecreḍt. Am wakken daɣen i d-yettili usarag ttawin-d awal ɣef leɛwayed d wass n yennayer d wazal-nsen ɣer yimaziɣen. ”Iswi-nneɣ d asemlil n yimezdaɣ , d usenɛet n leɛwayed i tsuta n wass-a i wakken ad tent-issinen , wa ad kemmlen deg ubrid nejren lejdud-nsen’’, i d-yenna Mass Fenniche Belkacem d aselway n tiddukkla Amaynut.

  Lbaraka n si Lḥaǧ Lḥusin 

 Ccix lḥaǧ Lhusin n tecfurt akken i as-ssawalen Wat taddart, d yiwen n umɣar n Lbaraka, 97 n yiseggasen di tudert-is, d ameqqran n taddart, d aḥeddad n wawal , yeɣra awal n Rebbi. Uqbel ad teǧǧ tezmert, icax deg taddart n tzaɣart , yella d ccix lǧameɛ , ar ass-a, tettcawar-it taddart deg waṭas n tlufa : iferru timsal gar yimdanen , yettelḥaq ddaɛwa lxir, di yal tagnit.Ula deg tudrin-nniḍen, ssawalen-as-d imi iferru tila ,d bab n sswab, yettleqqim taqbaylit, yettlawi lxir gar tudrin d yimdanen .

  Aseḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt 

 Imezdaɣ n taddart n Tzaɣart, fkan azal meqqren i ugama. Lemluk d yiḥerqan, zgan d izedganen. Imḍebbren, xedmen axxam i ugudu berra n taddart, ɣer dinna yakk i ttruḥun yiḍuman. Yettas-d ukamyun n tɣiwant tikelt di ddurt, yettawi-ten ɣer ugudu aɣiwan. Ulac tizuliɣin deg yiberdan, yekfa uḍeggar n lewsax deg uzrib, tezdeg tuɣal d aɣbel n medden akk: yal axxam yesizdig sdat n tewwurt-is. Tajmilt ad tuɣal i tlawin n taddart imi d nutenti i d-yelhan s waṭas s tezdeg n tzenqatin.

  Tamkerdit n taddart 

 D yiwen n usenfar i iceɣben s waṭas iɛeggalen n tidukla tadelsant “Amaynut” i wakken ad sbedden axxam icuban wagi, lecɣalat qrib ad kfun deg-s: Ad tili tzeqqa n tɣuri, aḥric-nniḍen ad ttrusun deg-s lesnaf n yidlisen yemxalafen : ‘’ Imi taɣuri n yidlisen d tafat , azal-is meqqer di ttrebga d usaki n tsutwin, tamkerdit n taddart d iswi n yal amezdaɣ, nessaram ad nessiweḍ ɣur-s s lɛejlan’’, i d -yenna Mass Brahim ifis d amedyaz n taddart. Ad teqqim taddart n Tzaɣart d amedya i tudrin n leqbayel di tama n Yilulen n usammer di temnadt n Bgayet ama deg useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt d yidles neɣ di tuṭṭfa n leɛwayed yellan d lsas n tɣerma. Nessaram tudrin-nniḍen, ad ɛandent ɣur-s, ad nekfu tirza-nneɣ s wawal i d-yenna yiwen gar lɛaqal n Tzaɣart Azeddine At tsellamt deg awal-is : ‘’Ma yenger laṣel ula ayɣer nedder ‘’.

  Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 I lmend n usmekti wis 63 n umenzu n tnekra n tegrawla n 1954, tiddukkla tadelsant Amaynut akked tejmaɛt n lɛuqqal n taddart n Tzaɣart, iteddun ɣer tɣiwant n Yiɣram, heggan-d yiwen n leqdic s wazal-is anda ara naf timsikent, awal ɣef umezruy, tulya s wudem unṣib n temkerdit n taddart. Di tazwara, yella-d usterḥem ɣef yimeɣrasen n tegrawlan s usrusuy n tmuqint n yijeǧǧigen d dqida n tsusmi di tmeqbart. Syin akin yettunefk wawal i umjahed aqdim Omar At amar i d-yulsen cfawat-is. Yewwi-d awal s telqey ɣef wasmi tebda tegrawla n 54, yenna-d :’’Deg yiseggasen-nni imenza, imjuhad ur d-ttqerriben ara ɣer taddart, drus yid-neɣ i neɛlem, nettawi-asen tagella i lmujahdin ɣer berra n taddart. Aseggas mbaɛd, ussan-d yimḍebbren n FLN Amirouche d wiyaḍ, xedmen-d lxeṭba di tejmaɛt, ferqent tseqquma: 10 n taddart, ad ddun d yimjuhad, wiyad ad ilin d lmuseblin, ad qedcen di taddart, ad ɛiwnen. Seg yimir-n i ẓran akk medden yebda umennuɣ mgal acengu afransis…”. Am wakken i d-mmeslayen kra n yimjuhad ɣef umennuɣ i d-yeḍran deg udwar n yiɣram ddaw taddart n yiɛemmuren deg unebdu 1958. Ɣef wanect-a, dɣa, i d-yemmeslay umjahed amyaru n umezruy Djoudi Attoumi deg udlis-ines ɣef umezruy n n lwilaya 3. ɣef lewhi n 11h30, tella-d tulya n temkerdit n taddart d yiwet n tzeqqa n usenselkim i lfayda n yilmeẓyen n taddart : ‘’ Tamkerdit n taddart-agi yeldin ass-agi, d asirem n yal amezdaɣ, nettraǧu-tt s ccuq, imi taɣuri d ajlal n tmussni, d tafat n umdan , adlis d amawanes. Nessaram s temkerdit-agi, ad nezraɛ yis-s tikti n tɣuri di yal axxam, wa ad d-nzarreb i yigerdan d yilmeẓyen n taddart-nneɣ ɣef yir iberdan d wayen i asen-d-igellun s lemḍerra’’, i d-yenna Mass Belkacem Fenniche d aselway n tdukla Amaynut. Tameddit n wass maḍi, yekfa leqdic s usenɛet n yiwen n usaru i d-yettmeslayen ɣef umennuɣ n tilawin n taddart di tegrawla n 54.

  B. Benhamouche 

  
 Tiddukkla tadelsant Itri n Uzekka n taddart n Ikhelouienne, thegga-d deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen Dib Ali n Ait Aissa Mimoun, yiwen n wahil s wazal-is i lmend n usmekti n umulli wis 37 n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen akked wis 16 n Tefsut taberkant. Aseggas-agi, suddesen-d ahil d amerkanti, ideg xedmen yiwet n temsizzelt gar sin yiɣerbazen ilemmasen yellan deg tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Wigi d « Tellal Mohammed » n taddart n Uqawej akked « Abboud Mhammed » n taddart n Yixelwiyen. Timsizzelt-agi tewwi azwel « Seg umennuɣ ɣer tira », tella-d ass-nni n ttlata 11 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, ɣef 13h30 n tmeddit deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen dima. D timsizzelt ideg ttekkan 24 n yinelmaden, 12 i yal aɣerbaz, yella-d useɣti-ines ass n ssebt 15 deg yebrir, sɣur tasqamut n uktazal. Annect-agi dayen i d-yeḍran uqbel ass 20 yebrir. Ma d ass-nni n lexmis 20 yebrir 201, yella-d wahil d anesbaɣur. Yebda ɣef 10h n tṣebḥit s temsikent n teklut d usuneɣ n Massa Messadane Hannan, d temsikniyin-nniḍen icudden ɣer umezruy n 20 yebrir. Llan-d diɣen yisenza s ubuddu n yidlisen, sɣur ukkuẓ n yimura d yimedyazen : Ahcene Mariche, Idir Bellai, Mohand Nait Abdellah, Zoulikha Touati. Am wakken diɣen i d-tella ɣef 13h30 tulsa n yiwet n tmacahut, sɣur tiddukkla tadelsant n Tizi Uzzu « Ixulaf n Ǧerǧer. Ma ɣef 14h00 d afella tella-d tɣuri n yisefra, sɣur ukkuẓ-nni n yimura d yimedyazen i d-nebder yakkan. Γef 15h00 d asawen yella-d yiwen n usarag ɣef tedyanin n 20 yebrir 1980 akk 2001, sɣur umeɣnas Mohand Nait Abdellah. Syin ɣer-s ɣef 16h00 tella-d tukci n warrazen i yinelmaden ara d-yufraren deg temsizzelt n 20 yebrir, iwumi nefka isem-agi : “Seg umennuɣ ɣer tira”. Igemmaḍ n temsizzelt-agi fɣen-d ass-nni n ssebt taṣebḥit n wass, yal aswir yufrar-d deg-s yiwen unelmad. Deg ukayad n useggas amezwru yufrar-d uḍris n unelmad Bettouche Rayane, seg uɣerbaz alemmas n Ikhelouienne. Ma deg ukayad n useggas wis sin neɣ wis tlata neɣ wis rrebɛa d iḍrisen n yinelmaden n uɣerbazn Akaoudj i d-yufraren, akka Kettab Manal, Sbihi Lina akked Trif Lydia. Ad d-nesmekti belli, iḍrisen n ukkuẓ-agi n yinelmaden ad ddun deg yisebtar n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen n La Dépêche de Kabylie, yal ass n letnayen ad d-yeddu yiwen deg-sen, ad bdun ad ad-tteffɣen seg wass n letnayen i d-iteddun.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Qrib i d-yeḍra deg tmurt, taggara-a, ubaxix ɣer medden, ɣas teḍra-d ccuha deg wayen yerzan amaḍal n tesnujjya d ddwawi. D yiwen n usafar « Rahmat Rebi », neɣ s yisem-nniḍen n « RHB », i d-yeffɣen ɣer ssuq akken zun ad yessenqes asɛeddi d tiqraḥ i yimuḍan n ssker. Maca, deg kra n wussan kan, iban-d belli win yellan deffir usnulfu n ddwa-a, mass Toufik Zaibet, yeɣleḍ aṭas deg leḥsab-is. Dɣa ddurt-a i iɛeddan i yessawel uɣlif n tnezzut ɣer tukksa n usafar-a seg leswaq. Ma d ulɣu deg yettwagdel s wudem unsib, yeffeɣ-d ttlata yezrin. Ula d Tamehla tamatut n tensafart d dduzan n tezmert, tger tiɣri dindin i wid yesnuzuyen ddwawi akken ur t-ttakken i medden. Di leɛḍil ideg ula d axdam-ines deg luzin yeḥbes yakan.Ilaq ad d-nessefhem dakken deg taluft-a, llum ameqqran yeɣli-d ɣef mass Tufiq i d-nebder yakan, imi rray azayez iberreḥ-d s lexsas n tzemmar ɣur-s akken ad yessiweḍ ad d-yeg asafar am wa. Ussan imenza yuɣ lḥal, ur ǧǧin wid ihelken aṭṭan n ssker amkan deg uḥebber ɣef usafar-a amaynut. Nwan zun ad ten-yenfeɛ ma uɣen-t. Netta, simmal yettḍurru-ten yessewɛar deg lḥala-nsen, ɣef leḥsab n wayen i d-tewwi tɣamsa. Mazal ad yili wawal ɣef taluft-a imi tazmert n umdan d tamezwarut. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Mhenni Khalifi 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Inaṣliyen, d yiwwet n tarbaɛt n yinaẓuren, id yeǧǧan isem-is deg cna aqbayli atrar. Tennulfa-d deg useggas n 1973. D ilmeẓyen akken ifuden tilleli, yeččuren d tirga, it id yesnulfa-n, ɣas akken xuṣen wallalen. Ilmeẓyen-agi n tallit nni, d Ṛabaḥ, Murad, Fayṣal, Ḥsinu, Yusef lakked n Nacida. Wigi, krend mgal tamḥuqranit yella-n deg tallit nni, « anda ameslay s t’maziɣt deg Leẓẓayer tamanaɣt yeqwa fella-s leḥriṣ n-udabu n lweqt nni! » akka id yenna, i yiwwet n tiliẓri, Ṛabaḥ, aqerru n tarbaɛt-agi. Ayagi ixelqed yiwwet n tiɣewwewt  (réγolte) deg ulawen n yilmeẓyen-agi, yewwin abrid srid ar umenuɣ ɣef t’maziɣt, tilleli akk d yizerfan n wemdan. D-acu i nezmar aden ini ɣef tarbaɛt-agi, ɣef ayen yaɛnan axeddim anaẓur nsen? Inaṣliyen ssufɣen-d tasfift tamezwarut deg useggas n 1978. D-acu, am yir zher, tasfift-agi ur tenzi ara. Deg useggas n 1983, Inaṣliyen ssufɣen-d tasfift tis snat, anda « zehren » am yizmawen. Uɣalen ttwasnen aṭaṣ s tesfist-agi iwumi semman: « Le printemps d’un homme libre » (Tafsut n umaziɣ). Deg tesfift-agi, Inaṣliyen arẓan asalu, begnen-d lɣiḍ  nsen ɣef ayen yaɛnan tutlayt tamaziɣt akk d wayen yeḍran deg tefsut n 1980. Deg tezlit n « Tilufa », Inaṣliyen cnan ayen yeḍran deg Ibrir 1980, timesbaniyin d tiyita i ččan imaɣnasen n t’maziɣt deg yifassen n-udabu ameṣbeṭli n tallit nni (Maḥsub win n tura yelha!). « Yessusem » cna n tarbaɛt-agi, iseggasen yezrin, maca wid iten iḥemlen rǧan alarmi d-aseggas n 1990, akken ad slen i tesfift tamaynut, anda Inaṣliyen rran-as tajmilt i unaẓur n uweccem Muḥemed Iseyaxem. Tajmilt-agi akken i yecna Murad Inaṣliyen deg taɣuct-is « Ttamezwarut, ttanegarut ! » yebɣa ad yini belli tajmilt i rran nutni i yisyaxem ur s ttaran ara wiyaḍ. D tidett, 25 iseggasen zrin, yiwen ur yerri tajmilt i yisyaxem ! Akka, tarbaɛt n Inaṣliyen teqqim acḥal n yiseggasen ur d ssufeɣ ara ula d tizlit. Maca, deg useggas n 2007, yekker Ṛabaḥ, iman-is kan mebla wiyaḍ, yessufeɣ-d yiwen uḍebṣi n 8 n tezlatin. Aḍebṣi-agi yelha daɣen yelḥa, imi tizlatin d uxeddim-ines qaɛden dayen kan. Deg uḍebṣi-agi, Inaṣliyen gren-d tiɣri deg yiwwet n tezlit iwumi semman « Ilemẓiyen », akken ad kren, ad ṣefḍen aɣebar ɣef yiman nsen. « Axannab » (Axeddaɛ), d yiwwet n tezlit anda anaẓur-agi aqbur yewwet-d s leqsaḥ mgal wid ixedɛen amenuɣ ɣef t’maziɣt. D wagi i d-axeddim aneggaru n Inaṣliyen. D-acu kan, wid iten iḥemlen ssaramen akken tarbaɛt-agi ad ssufeɣ aḍebṣi neɣ sin !

<p style="text-align: right;">Syphax.Y

  
 Kra n wussan kan segmi i d-tlul, thegga-d tdukkla tinmettitadelsant « Asirem n Krun » yiwen n wahil s wazal-is i idumen teɣzi n wass n 21 yebrir i iɛeddan, ilmend n usfuggel n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen d Tefsut Taberkant. Gar wayen i d-yellan, ttwasneɛtent-d tanezzayt timsikknin ɣef yidles d umezruy n umennuɣ amaziɣ, am wakken yella-d usarag sɣur yilemẓi Hebbac Yasin, i d-yewwin awal ɣef tedyanin n tefsut n tmanyin. Ula d tanezzut n ubuddu tettwaheyya-d sɣur Mass Lxeyyer Brahimi, am tannumi-s.Akken i tmeddit, ttwasiwlen-d yisefra sɣur yimedyazen Lxeyyer Brahimi d Ɛezzun Ḥmed. Syinna d tagnit n ccna iwumi fkan nnuba kra n wid iḥeḍren. « Nesɛa yiwen n yiswi seg usnulfu n tdukkla-a, yezdi-aɣ akken ma nella. Ilaq ad d-nerr kra n uḥerrek n leqdic i taddart-nneɣ. Ha-t-an nettwali ula d taɣuri n tutlayt-nsen ur tt-yessin umur ameqqran». I aɣ-d-yenna Ḥalim n Ayt Ɛmer d Ḥmed, anmazul n uselway (vice-président) n tdukkla. Yuɣal yerna-d tiɣri: « Ssarameɣ aṭas ara d-ikecmen d imeltaɣen i tdukkla akken ad neddut lwaḥi i ubaɣur n tmetti ». D aya i yewwi-d ad yili d iswi deg temnaḍt i yenṭerren nezzeh seg yir liḥala tadelsant, imi tezzin wayyuren acemma ur d-yettwaheggay d armud adelsan, seg tmettant n umussu asdukklan.

  M. K. 

  
 I lmend n 40 n yiseggasen n ccna n unaẓur ameqqran Taleb Tahar, suddsen-d tenmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, axxam n yidles Mulud At Mεmmer n temdint-agi akked umazday n yirmad idelsanen d inaẓuren, ass-nni n sed 25 seg meɣres 2017, yiwet n tejmilt s wazal-is i unaẓur ameqqran n tezlit taqbaylit. Wagi d Taleb Tahar, yiwen gar lecyax deg uẓawan n tmurt taqbaylit. Yella-d leqdica-agi deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Heggan-d yiwen wahil d anesbaɣur imi sendiḍelli ɣef 10h00 n ssbaḥ i tebda tejmilt-agi s wudem unsib sɣur tanemhalt n yidles n Tizi Uzzu Massa Goumeziane Nabila. Dɣa deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin tella-d yiwet n temsikent n tesfifin-is tiqdimin d imagraden n tɣamsa yettwarun ɣef tudert-is d leqdic n urgaz-agi ameqqran. Am wakken daɣen i d-sneεten yiwen usaru i d-yewwin ɣef tudert n ufennan-a aqbayli aqbur, ɣef 11h00 n uzal deg tzeqqa n umezgun. Ma ɣef 14h 00 d afella, tella-d temlilt d unaẓur d uskasi d tririt ɣef yisteqsiyen n wid akk i t-iḥemmlen neɣ i as-isellen. Tella-d diɣ tnigit sɣur tawacult-is d yimeddukkal-is<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"></span>A. Ghani 

  
 Mačči d taberrakt neɣ d snat i llant ttbanent-d deg rrif teɣzi n ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9, d tafsut neɣ d anebdu, d amwan neɣ ulama d tagrest, tiḥuna-ya n usɣar zgant jebbdent-d awellih n umecṭuḥ ed umeqqran deg Bgayet. Akka i tella d iseggasen tura, almi i d-yusa mass Uld Saleḥ Zituni, lwali amaynut n waɣir n Bgayet, tebda tettbeddil dɣa taluft. Aya, mi iger tiɣri, deg ṭuber yezrin, i yakk tiɣiwanin anda tcaḍ tnezzut-a i « yeffɣen i usaḍuf », akken ad sḥebsent kra n win yesbedden taberrakt tama n ubrid. Imir-n dɣa i bdant tɣiwanin ttaznent tisutriwin i wat tiberrakin-a akken ad kksen s timmad-nsen ayen sbedden neɣ ma ulac ad ttwaqelɛent s uqezzul sɣur yinesdabuyen (autorités). «S yisem-nneɣ d imḍebbren n tɣiwant, nceyyeɛ imir-nni aɛeyyen i wid yeznuzuyen rrif n ubrid. Syinna, kra n wakud akken, nwala tettwagza tiɣri mi ttwakksent merra tberrakin-nni». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n yimḍebber n tɣiwant n Tsexriwt.

 Seg yiwet n tama ihi, aṭas i iwalan abeddel-a d ayen yelhan, ladɣa imi i d-tettbin akken ilaq ccbaḥa n ugama, rnu yenqes ddiq deg waṭas n yimeḍqan. War ma nettu tumert n yimsenza (commerçants) i llan ccettkayen seg wat tiberrakin-a mi snuzuyen war ma ttxellisen acemma i uwanek (Etat), akken yella lḥal fell-asen nutni. Maca, s tmuɣli nniḍen, llan wid iẓerren belli tukksa n tberrakin-a ad tḥaz cwiṭ tadamsa (économie) tamatut n tmetti, ad ternu aḥebber i umsaɣ (client) ma yettnadi taɣawsa-ya neɣ d ta. «Nekk ttwaliɣ mačči d ayen igerrzen aṭas. Seg wacu ara idiren tura at tberrakin-nni? Ladɣa ma neẓra dakken xussen deg yakk ttawilat n tudert, ur tesɛiḍ d acu llan rebḥen ala tudert-nsen». I aɣ-d-tenna s usḥissef yiwet n tlemẓit. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Tura akka dayen ḥebsent tirza i ɣur-s, ulac win i t-ileffun seg wakken yeḥma lḥal ayendin, teṭṭaxer tefsut teǧǧa akken ilaq amḍiq i unebdu ed ssmayem i ur nettɛeṭṭil ad d-kecmen.

 Maca, annect-a d awexxer kan i qabel mara d-tekcem tefsut ttenqasen yigeffuren, wamma imezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel werǧin ǧǧin amḍiq-a mu ssawalen «Afalu n Telɣemt», i d-yezgan deg tecwawt n Udrar n Fad (azal n 1650 n tmiratin nnig yilel). Ɣas ma d adeg d amihan i wawwaḍ, ɣas yewɛer i ulbas xilla mačči drus ubrid i yettawin i ɣur-s, skud la nettmeslay ɣef tecwawt n udrar, maca iɣermanen n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel zgan ttḍillin fell-as imi i t-ttwalin d Sellaḥ. Dɣa, segmi i d-cfan ttgallan yes-s deg tudert-nsen n yal add akken ad wekkden tidet-nsen mara d-inin: «aḥeq Afalu n Telɣemt».

 Ttruḥun ihi i ɣur-s segmi ara d-tekcem tefsut ladɣa alama d mayu neɣ d yunyu ma ulac azɣal ameqqran. Akken ma llan, d tulawin, d irgazen, d arraz neɣ d imɣaren, merra ttafen iman-nsen deg tikti n urzaf ɣef ufalu-ya, ma neẓra, yuɣ lḥal, dakken tal tikkelt qqaren «ad nẓur», yettusemma ad ruḥen ɣer Uɛessas, ɣer Sellaḥ. Ma nemmeslay ɣef tlawin, nutenti aṭas n uqeddic i sɛant din, imi yiwet ttawint lweɛda i leffṭent i Ufalu-ya n Telɣemt deg teɣzi n useggas, tayeḍ ttawint-d syinna akal-is i uqcic-a neɣ i teqcict-a. Ma yella d ilemẓiyen, ttalin ladɣa i ɣur-s akken ad kksen fell-asen s wadeg acebḥan am win, i d-yettakken yiwet n tmuɣla tuqa, d taxlaft, n taddart n Ayt Tɛisiwt ladɣa, akked kra n tuddar nniḍen n Ayt Smaɛel ed Tsexriwt. War ma ttun tigawt n tewlafin ama daxel neɣ berra n ufalu-nni yessebhaten, tama n tzeggzewt n yidurar.

 Afalu-ya d win yessewhamen s tidet, ama ameqqran ama amecṭuḥ, imi deg teɣzi yewweḍ azal n 14 n tmitratin, deg tehri yessawed ahat 15 nniḍen. Ma yella daxel-is ɣas ini d axxam deg udrar, seg wakken wessiɛ s waṭas. Ula d tasmuḍi akked waman nuḥen dinna almi tikwal ttḥulfun s usemmiḍ alqayan wid akk yettɣiman deg-s. Ttfacayen akken ilaq mara ten-yezlef yiṭṭij deg ubrid n udrar yesfadayen. Dɣa ula d anamek n yisem i as-yettunefken «talɣemt», ma neḍfer tussna n wawalen ad d-naf dakken ur ira ad d-yili «chamelle» s tefransist akken tɣil tuget n yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel, imi aẓar n wawal-a «talɣemt» ad yili d gma-s n wawal «allaɣen», imi i ten-zdin yiẓuran L ed Ɣ. «Allaɣen» d awal aqbur deg temnaḍt n Ayt Smaɛel, anamek-is d tasmuḍi-nni akked waman i d-yettnekkaren deg tesrafin anida ttxemmilen at zik ayen akken i d-srewten. Ma yella d asusru, anṭaq-ines, yewwi-d ad yili akken i d-yettban d aḥerfi, yettusemma akka [talɣemt] ur akka [talɣ°emt]. Ta d tiṭ d tamecṭuḥt ɣef Ufalu n Telɣemt i izemren ad yili ɣer sdat d amḍiq n tmerrit s wazal-is, ahat ad d-nuɣal ɣer sdat s walbeɛḍ n yimagraden ed wugar n unadi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Ur zmiren ad ttun yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel ass n 26 yebrir n useggas n 2009, asmi tettwabeɛɛej s lmus tuḥdiqt n Sunya Idir mi d-teffeɣ seg uɣerbaz alemmas Zemmuri Ɛmer ideg tella teɣɣar. Ṭam n yiseggasen tura ɛeddan, mazal ccama n uneḍruy arẓagan tersex deg wulawen. Dɣa, lǧemɛa-a iɛeddan, 22 deg cutember, yerra tajmilt d tameqqrant Ugraw Tigawin Ilemẓiyen (RAJ) n Ayt Smaɛel i teqcict-a i iruḥen d tasfelt i uttwaɣ n tmetti d yir taɣellist. D ahil d amerkanti i d-yettwaheggan seg 07:30 n tnezzayt armi d 17:00, deg-s d tajmilt deg-s d asḥulfu n tmetti ɣef yir tikliwin. Yebda wahil s tazzla deg yiwen n uzgen n umaraṭun n uqader d talwit i warrac ilemẓiyen ladɣa. Syin, ɣer 10:00, yella-d usenɛet n usaru-untim s uzwel n “Tiqeffet n tehyuft”, i d-yessufeɣ Mass Muḥemmed Mesɛudi.Ayen yeɛnan isaragen, llan-d tlata seg tzeggant n wass. Amenzu yemmug-d sɣur Massa Muḥemmadi Xadiǧa s yisem-is d tamsujjit n tnefsit, i d-yewwin ɣef ssebbat akked yisafaren n ubsal n warrac. Kra n wakud akken, iɛedda-d uselmad deg tesdawit Mass Meḥrez Buɛic, i usayes (scène) n uxxam n yilemẓiyen akken ad yessiweḍ kra n tektiwin ɣef « Amussu asdukklan d ucqirrew n umennuɣ mgal tekriḍt deg tmetti ». Ma yella d aneggaru-nni, iga-t-id uselmad Mass Rebbaɛi Racid ɣef tekriḍt deg yiɣerbazen. Mettwal 16:30, mi d-tettqarab taggara n warmud, temmug tekci n warrazen i wid i d-iberzen deg tikli-nni tazamulant. Armi ahaqel-itt d 17:00 n tmeddit, kkren yimheggiyen ad sbedden yiwet n teplakt n usmekti i yiseɣ n Sunya, tama n yimawlan n teqcict d waṭas n lɣaci i yebɣan ad ḥeḍren. Nezmer ad nɣer deg teplakt-nni tanaga ɣef wayen akken yeḍran, akked ubruy seg usefru i as-iga Mhenni Xalifi. « Nebɣa s ttiɛadat-a, nekni s Ugraw Tigawin Ilemẓiyen n Ayt Smaɛel, ad nḥesses ugar imezdaɣ-nneɣ akken ur yettɛawad akk ad d-yeḍru ɣur-neɣ wayen akken i d-yeḍran. Am wakken nekkat ad neg talast i wayen akk yettkellixen inubiyen d yilemẓiyen am tissit n yiɣisem d ukeyyef n tehyuft. Imi aql-aɣ nettwali acu i d-yettnulfun taggara-a ». D awal n Mass Samir Ɛerrar, aselway n tgezmi Raj-Ayt Smaɛel.

  M. K. 

  
 Seg wayyur n yunyu n useggas yezrin 2014 alama d taggara n win n ṭuber, iban-d dakken tiẓegwa-nneɣ ttwaḥeqrent almi bezzaf seg yibelbulen n tmes i ur nreḥḥem i inedren da ed din deg twilayt n Bgayet. Aṭas seg tizzegzewt n leɣwabi-nneɣ i yerɣan uɣalent akk d iɣuɣad ed bufsus. Rnu, ayen yesseḥzanen aṭas, am wakken i d-tekka sebba seg ugama neɣ seg waddad n twennaḍt, akken ay d-tekka srid sɣur umdan daɣen. Ihi, segmi tebda Tmehla n Uḥuddu Aɣarim n waɣir (Direction de la Protection Civile) n waɣir n Bgayet tadwilt n useḥbiber mgal times n tẓegwa ed tmegra, tjerred-d deg yiwen n wulɣu dakken seg yunyu almi d ṭuber 2014, gran-d iman-nsen yiqeddacen-is, s tallelt n wukriden n Teḥrezt n Tẓegwa (Conservation des Forêts), bac ad ssexsin azal n 1327 n tnekkriwin n tmes, gar-asen 292 n yibelbulen d imeqqranen i d-yeglan s ḥawla n lexsarat. Iqlaɛen-a n tmes mɣuren almi ssawḍen rran n 2256 ha n tɣemmayt akk berrik ur tesliḥ i wacemma. Rnan ččan ugar 11000 n tseḍwa i d-yettakken igumma, 4000 n taffiwin n walim neɣ n lqerḍ, akked yiwet n tesna n tzizwa daɣen. Akken i d-tenna teɣbalut-nneɣ, anect-a iḥettem-d tuffɣa n 1580 n yikumyan n usexsi n tmes. Ma yella nga aserwes (comparaison) gar useggas n 2014 d win n 2013 deg yiwen n wakud i d-nebder, ad naf dakken ala 681 n tnekkriwin n tmes i yettwaskelsen, yettusemma aseggas-a qrib yettwat umḍan ɣef sin mi neẓra yakan anda yewweḍ. Anect i tent-uɣent tẓegwa n Bgayet yella fessus cwiṭ ɣef win n 2014 i neǧǧa neɣ i aɣ-yeǧǧan ussan-a kan. Skud ala lqidar n 541 ihikṭaren i yerɣan, ur mident 6000 n tseḍwa i yuɣalen ulac-itent, akked ugar n 3000 n taffiwin n walim neɣ n lqeḍt, ttwaḥuzan seg undar-a, rnu daɣen kra n tesniwin n tzizwa. Ad d-nerr awellih dakken ula taggara-ya deg wayyur n yunbir, llan-d 235 n wandaren n tmes deg tlemmast n yimudaɣ n temnaḍin yemgerraden n waɣir n Bgayet, i yeglan s wazal n 582 ha d taɣemmayt, ed ugar n 1907 d aseklu n yigumma. Yesḥissif waddad imi ameqqran seg-sen d tizemrin. Anect-a merra yesruḥ akk ugar n 441 n tesniwin n tzizwa. Dɣa ɣef waya, tceyyaɛ tmehla-ya ɣer wannar 301 n yikumyan n yindaren. Ihi, akken nettwali, ini neɣ ssusem, ḥesses n qqim, amdan yesɛuẓẓug i takkit. Simmal tezzin yiseggasen, simmal tettenṭerray trennu twennaḍt-is netta yettmuqul. 

  Ula deg yiberdan ulac aḥezzeb 

 Seg tama nniḍen, ula d taɣellist (laman) deg yiberdan tuɣal ur tnuḥ skud d timerwin n yimdanen i yettruḥun ɣer umaḍal wayeḍ seg yir aḥezzeb ed tulacit n usegmi n ubrid. Ɣas anect-n d tidwilin n uḥesses ttmaggan deg useggas s wallalen yemgerraden n teywalt – am tiliẓri, amaṭṭaf ed tɣamsa yuran, maca ziɣ ur tlemmed tuget n yemdanen seg tuccḍiwin-nsen. Aredmani, ibaxixen deg ubrid mazal ttilin s waṭas yal ass. Ur yendekwal unehhar, ur d-yelli ihi wayen yessecrahen. Skud akken i d-tenna dima Tmehla n Uḥuddu Aɣarim n Bgayet ugar n 998 n yisehwa (accidents) ay d-yeḍran deg yiberdan n Bgayet deg ukuẓ n wayyuren ineggura n useggas 2014, seg yunyu alami d 13 seg duǧember gedged. Tiwuɣa-ya n yiberdan llant deffir n uggas (n ujraḥ) n 1459 n yimdanen s waddaden yemgerraden deg umihi (danger), rnan glan s 28 d iẓiɣer. D ayen ara d-yefken segmi yebda useggas n 4014 alami d 13 seg duǧember, agemmuḍ n 1705 n yisehwa, ideg jerḥen 2335 n yiterrasen, mmuten 53 nniḍen daɣen, ama deg umḍiq anda teḍra twaɣit neɣ deg ubrid n usiweḍ ɣer sbiṭar. Ad d-nernu i waya, dakken, ma nmuqel i useggas n 2013 deg yiwen n wakud netta d win n 2014, seg yunyu alama d 13 seg duǧember. Ad t-naf dakken yesnaga ɣef ugar n yisehwa wala win n 2014. Amek? Imi i d-llan deg-s 956 n yisehwa, ideg ttwajerrden 1308 n yimejraḥ, maca daɣen, 47 n yimattanen. Ma yella seg yennayer alama d 13 seg duǧember n useggas n 2013 dima, skelsen wid terza taluft 1533 n yisehwa deg yiberdan n tkeryas, 1981 jerḥen seg-sen, ma d 67 nniḍen wwḍen aɛfaw n Bab n yigenwan. Izwilen (chiffres) am wi, ḥaca ttaǧǧan amdan yesḥassef daɣen yebhet ɣef wamek qqlen yiberdan-nneɣ d annu n tmettant. Anehhar, akken yebɣu yili, ad yeqqim d netta i d amasay (responsable) amezwaru n yibaxixen-a n tikli. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 “Ur as-yelli akka neɣ akkin. Yemmekta-d tadyant i d-yessewjed d tifrat taneggarut i as-d-yeggran. Dta kan i ila d abrid i wugur i d-yemsel s ufus-is. D tarẓagant, d lḥentit, d ilili, d qaḍran sdat n tiẓeṭ uɣur yuzzel ussan yezrin . Dɣa yemmuqel ɣer tmeṭṭut-is yegnen s idis-is…”

 Cwiṭ seg usebtar aneggaru

  
 Tafaska-agi deg tezrigt-is tis sat, tebda iḍelli 23 deg tuber 2016 deg uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Aṭas n yidisan i yettekkin deg usuddes n leqdic-agi ameqqran, gar-asen : Taneɣlaft n yidles, tanmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu d usqamu n tfaska tadelsant n uẓeṭṭa n At Hicem, s tallelt n tenmeḥla n tmerrit d tẓuri, tanmehla n uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer. Ad tili tfaska-a ɣef teɣzi n 5 wussan, imi tebda iḍelli n Letnayen 23 deg tuber 2016, ad tdum almi d ass n 27 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Deg tezrigt-agi tis sebεa, ad ttekkint azal n 7 n lwilayat, ara d-yesneɛten axeddim-nsent, ad naf: Xencla, Ґerdaya, Tlemsan, Tamenraset, Tipaza, Um Lbawaqi d temdint n Tizi Uzzu i d-heggan leqdic-agi. Ma d ahil i yettwajerden i wanect-a, tella-d iḍelli u mazal ad ilint temsikniyin s usenzu n uẓeṭṭa n 7 lwilayat-agi i yettekkin deg tfaska. Iḍelli ssbeḥ i tebda s wudem unsib tezrigt-agi tis sebεa n uẓeṭṭa n At Hicem. Dɣa tella-d yiwent n terbaεt n uẓawan i d-iccnan kra n tezlatin, am wakken, daɣen, i d-yella usenεet n tceqquft n umezgun, d umeslay sɣur yimḍebbren d idisan i d-iheggan tazrigt-agi tis 7 n uẓeṭṭa. Ma deg ass uqbel aneggaru 26 deg tuber 2016, ad d-tili temsizzelt n uẓeṭṭa igerrzen. Azekka-in tameddit, ad medlent tewwura n tfaska-a s tukci n warrazen i tlata (3) n yiẓeḍwa i d-yufrar deg temsizzlt, am wakken daɣen ara d-tili tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i widak akk yettekkin deg tezrigt-agi tis sat. Imḍebren i d-iheggan leqdic-agi, bɣan ad ẓẓun imɣi n usefti d ulmad n yilmeẓyen i urmud-agi yesεan azal ameqqran, imi si tama ad ṭṭfen deg wansayen , tgemmi d irmad-nneɣ iqburen, si tama-nniḍen d axeddim adamsi (économique), i lmend n wayen i d-issekcam n udrim. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Di zzman n Awdi n Burnan, mi yella d lamin n taddart, At Xlil tttawin-d lɣella tammeqrant n zzit. Imiren iḍebballen ḥemlen-ten medden, ttqadaren-ten, ttuzun-ten: ttaken-asen cwiṭ si lɣella ittusemma d lacur. Ar taggara n lɣella, di Meɣres, tteddin iḍebballen ɣef tudrin isan zzit, tekksen lacur. Assen tusa-d nuba n At Xlil. Tanezzayt, send ad d-yali yiṭij, iḍeballen udren ɣer At Xlil, wwḍen ɣer Uzniq Iḍebbalen deg tlemmast n taddart, sersen lqellab bdan kkaten. Arrac dewṛen-asen, ttnezzihen. Kkaten, kkaten ulac win i asen-d-yewwin tiqqit n zzit. Lḥaǧ Amer Akli d ilemẓi, mazal ur yercil ara, ur yewwiḍ ara i ssuq, isetḥa ineḥcam nezzeh. Taddart n At Xlil d taddart n zzit, qesden-ten-id ad asen-ffken lecuṛ, ur asen-d wwin ara. Ineḥcam, isa azgen n duṛu d lmesṛuf-is, ifka-asen-ten-id d lwada. Imiren, zzit teswa reba surdi i litra. Yuɣal, yewwi-d yiwen uḍebbal asefru:

  A yetma leḥya tekfa 

  Si lebad meṛṛa 

  Ffkan-d azgen n duṛu 

  Amer ur yettiki ara 

  N udrum ufella 

  D Buṛnan i d aqeṛṛu 

  Rrif deg Wat Urwala 

  Ulac timira 

  At Xlil, ixla waḍu. 

  Ramdane LASHEB 

  
 Laɛca, deg wexxam, tecɛel yemma tacemmaɛt. Dɣa, ferḥeɣ. Nniɣ-as mebla cek d l’anniversaire ara neffiti. Iḍ-agi, ad nečc agaṭu n ccakula, ad nsew jus d’orange n lbanan.

 – N wumi-t umilli a yemma ? Ur d iyi-d-nniḍ ara akken meqqar ad d-naɣ cwiṭ n ukadut

 – D amulli n tikli ur newwiḍ

 – D acu-tt ?

 Dɣa temmeslay-id ɣef tikli-nni d-yellan deg uzal qaylal, acḥal n lesnin-aya. Imir, nek ur d-luleɣ ara. Ula d aprugrami ur d yi-prugramin ara imawlan-iw, imir. Autrement-dit, nek d yibibiḍen i d iyi-cban n berra !

 Atan i kcem-d baba. Iḥewes-as awal i yemma seg yimi : “ad nef d nek ara t-yesfehmen. Tuɣ-iyi à la tête n carré n taddart, di 14 yunyu-nni !” . Nnɛem ih, baba d azaktur n tmaziɣt, n ujerrid n tuqqna, n autonomie, n tugdud n les droits de l’homme… mačči d yiwet. Ulac anda ur yelḥa, anda ur isuɣ “ma ulac, ulac, ulac..” Iḥḍer-asent akk. Maɛna baḥ, ulac i d-yewwi, yeffeɣ-asen akk !

 Yanna-yi-d d acu-tt tikli-nni. yemmeslay-id ɣef yilmeẓyen-nni i iruphen d asfel, ɣef Nounou la gaffe, ɣef yiɛeggalen n leɛrac, ɣef yiɛeggalen n taiwan, ɣef la platforme n Leqser…

 Ziɣ anect-a akk i yeḍran ! Jamais tehḍer-aɣ-d ɣef waya anisati n teḥḍiri. Slid baba, yemma d twacult-iw, jamais daɣen sliɣ i les adultes nniḍen mmeslayen-d ɣef tikli-agi ur newwiḍ. Les adultes-agi mmxallafen. Kr,a am anisati, lmudir akked lǧiran-nneɣ, ttmeslayen ḥala ɣef remḍan. Remḍan-agi deg-s 30 wussan, yettas-d tikkelt deg useggas. Tenez-vous bien, deg waggur-agi, les adultes ddisidin ad qqqimen i laẓ si sbeḥ alamma d tameddit !!

 Mi steqsaɣ baba akked yemma

 ɣef acimi akka, nnan-yi-d steqsi anisati-k.

 Alors steqsa anisati : “

 – Acimi les adultes ttɣimim i laẓ anisti ?

 – euh… d’abord mačci d laẓ. D liman !

 – I wagi d acu-t ?

 – Liman-agi, mara yili tumneḍ s kra, d acu kra-agi ur t-tettwaliḍ ara..

 – D ayen fehmeɣ. Liman-agi am papa noêl i stettamen Luna

 – Anta-tt Luna ?

 – D tameddakult-iw ! mais nettat, ɣas akken tettamen s papa noel, jamis teqqim i laẓ

 Sliman Ɛazem(1918-1983) amedyaz yerẓan tiwwura n tugdi s wawal d ccna amḥaddi , yecna ɣef tlufa n tmeddurt yiwet ur tt-yezgil timetti (ṣaḥa di lweqt aɣeddaṛ) tasartit (19 di meɣres) idles (ɣef teqbaylit yuli wass) lɣeṛba ( d aɣrib d abarrani di tmura medden) , tizlatin-ines di lwaqt-is ǧǧant later meqqar ɣef tsuta tirni ,aṭas n yilmeẓyen i ḍefren abrid-is di tezlit tamḥaddit am Lwennas MaƐtub d Lewnis at Mengellat d waṭas nniḍen. imi anaẓur-a yennan-d tiqerḥanin asmi Lxuf yegguni tudrin asmi telelli umeslay tella targit, 32 iseggasen mbaɛd lmut-is mazal-it d azamul i kra yellan mgal lbaṭel d wid yugin lqid , tuɣac-is timsirin i wid ifuden taqbaylit.

  Ccfiɣ am ass-a ass-mi d-ṛuḥaɣ 

  Mi d-refdaɣ tibalizin 

  Ḍfaṛn-iyi-d widen akk ḥemlaɣ 

  Yemma akked baba d isin 

  Nitni ttrun ma d nekk ḥeznaɣ 

  Mi d-nem-sefṛaq ǧiɣ-ten din 

  Am zun d-lmut ay mmuteɣ 

  Mi d-iḥaṛ lebḥaṛ akin 

 Amecwaṛ n Dda Sliman d anesbaɣur ugar n 90 iḍefsiyen akked d uḍefsi n wurraɣ deg useggas n 70 ɣef tesfift-nni yettwasnen nezzah  » a win yellan d lfahem » , taqbaylit-is taḥarrit yarnu tecbaḥ akken i d-qqaren wid t-yessnen s lqerb yesdukel anamek lqayen d thuski n umeslay d tmuɣli n umesnaw.

  Awin yellan d lfahem 

  Sfahm-iy-d amek akka 

  D acu d sebba iniɣem 

  Mi tezdeɣ deg-s twekka  

  Sufella yecbeḥ yeṛqem 

  Daxxel mi t-lldiɣ yerka 

 Sliman Ɛazem mmi-s n agenni Geɣṛan (Iwaḍiyen) yemmut d aɣrib ɣef tmurt-is iḥemmel ,yemḍel di Moissac di Fransa mačči deg akal t-id-rebban , ulac tizlit anda ur d-yebdir taddart-is neɣ Lezzayer-nni ɣef yennuɣ (iffeɣ ay ajrad tamurt-iw) d teqbaylit-nni imi yarna cbaḥa i yuɣen irgazen ur uklalen.

  Tamurt-iw a tin aɛzizen 

  Ǧǧiɣ-kem mebla lebɣ-iw 

  Mačči d nekk ay yextaṛen 

  Akka ay yura di lbext-iw 

  Nekk zedɣeɣ anda niḍḍen 

  Ma d kemmini tezdeɣḍ ul-iw 

 Wissen ahat yiwwas bab n tezlit « ffeɣ ay ajrad tamurt-iw » a d-yuɣal ɣer wedrar n ǧerǧer ad yesgunfu lebda , imi agrud ala deg irebbi n yemma-s i s-d-yettaweḍ nadam.

  Seg asmi i d-yexleq zzman 

  I mmsefhamen lḥiwan 

  Weḥd-sen ḥedd ur yeẓri 

  Bab n yiɣil ad d-iban  

  Ad yuɣal d sselṭan 

  Yettuɣaḍ win ur nezmir 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Dahmani Bilal 

  
 Sendiḍelli n ssebt, 30 deg waggur-agi n cutember ideg nella, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, tella-d temlilit deg Uzday adelsan Rahmani Slimane n Aokas deg lwilaya n Bgayet. D timlilit ideg i d-yemmeslay umaru d uselmad deg tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu akked Usudu (institut) aɣelnaw n tutlayin d tɣermiwin n usamar “INALCO” n Paris deg tmurt n Fransa, wagi Mass Saïd Chemakh i d-yewwin awal ɣef usentel-agi “ Tasekla tamaziɣt yettwarun, (amedya n tsekla taqbaylit). Imeslay-d s telqay ɣef wayen yellan d aqdim deg-s d wayen i d-yenulfan deg yiseggasen-agi yezrin. Am wakken daɣen i d-yebder aṭas n yiwudam n tsekla taqbaylit, yebda-tt-id seg yimezwura alarmi d wid n yiseggasen-agi ineggura. Am wakken daɣen i d-imeslay ɣef tewsatin n tsekla tamaziɣt ladɣa taqbaylit d wanida yewweḍ leqdic deg-sen, d wayen akk i d-yellan d amaynut deg tewsatin-is yemgaraden.

  A. A 

  
 Aḥric n sinima n teqbaylit simmal yettnerni deg seggas γer wayeḍs lmendad n yinaẓẓuren n teqbaylit iqedcen xas akken yeṭṭuqet lexṣas, imi ulac lebɣi sɣur yimṣulta akken ad sbedden yiwet n tisertit tadelsanit ara iɛabbin timsal yecqan idles s umata, imi lsas amzwaru akken ad ibedd uḥric n sinima ɣef ifaden iṣaḥen

 Wicqa deg wuguren , imi skud lebɣi yella, allaγ iẓemmi-d tiktiwin, i yesnnernin aḥric n sinima. imi llan inaẓuren yesfiliten akken ad-tilli saba deg ayen xedmen, jban-d isufar s wacu ara yekker uḥric n sinima ad yecbu idelsan n leǧnas iḍen.

 Ger inaẓuren-agi, ssin n yisebgaren i yetwasnen deg annar n sinima n teqbaylit, imi fkan-d aṭas i uḥric-agi; wigi d Yidir Sai akked Yunes Muḥammadi n temnaḍt n Wizgan (Buzgan) agerzu n Tizi-Wezzu, i ikecmen annar-agi n tẓuri deg seggasen n 1990, imi urraren deqs n tmezggunin deg tmeγriwin d tmesbaniyin tidelsanin, syen deg ucrured γer uḥrured kecmen annar n sinima n teqbaylit s tahri anda id-urraren di deqs n yisura imeqranen id-yettεedayen di sinimat akked Tilizri taγelnawt amaṭaf wis 04, s yisental yemgaraden, ger-asen « Faḍma n Summer, Axxam n Tajjalt, Tiqellaεin, Caεban di Remḍan, Aḥlil Aḥlil, Bu-Tqurdac, Bu-Tqurhatin, Ussan di tefsut ».

 Maca, asaru n teqbaylit d win yetnarnin deq ass γer wayeḍ s lebγi n yinaẓuren icuban Yidir d Yunes, imi ussan-agi kkan kfan asekles n yiwen n usaru amaynut s usentel « Tidyanin Yesewhamen », d asaru yebḍan γef 20 n yaḥricen, yal aḥric yesεa 10 n dqayeq s yisental yezwal yemgaraden, imi id-wwin awal γef tudert di tmetti n wass-a akked iγeblan yettidir uqbayli ger-asen « Ṣyada n Yemqqarqar ». Asekles yella-d di temnaḍt n Wizgan d tudrin-is, yerna s ttawilat sεan, imi xedmen akken i uffan mačči akken bγan, awwid kkan ad-yennarni yedles n teqbaylit.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Sɣur Daya 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Ɣef wakken i d-yenna Idir deg yiwet n tedwilt n Berbère Télévision i d-ɛeddan ass-nni n ssebt 19 deg unbir 2016 , deg album-agi, ad cnun s teqbaylit yinaẓuren-a: Charles Aznavour, Patrick Bruel, Francis Cabrel, Maxime Le Forestier, Bernard Lavilliers, Henri Salvador…

 Yal yiwen deg-sen, ad d-iɣenni tizlit-is s teqbayli, tizlit i d-yerra umedyaz ameqqran Meziane Kezzar ɣer tutlayt-a. Mačči d asuɣel i yexdem i tezlatin-a, meɛna yefka-asent azal-nsent s teqbaylit unelmad-agi n Muḥia. Ɣef wakken i d-yenna ucennay Idir, yezmer ad d-yeffeɣ album deg tefsut i d-iteddun ɣer tezrigin imi qrib ad isellek asekles-is. Album-agi ad t-id-yessufeɣ ɣer tezrigin Sony. Ma ɣef wamek i d-tella temlilit akked yinaẓuren-a ara yecnun yid-s, yenna-d :’’yebda-d kulec mi yesla Charles Aznavour i tezlit-nni-inu ‘’Lettre à ma fille’’, teɛǧeb-as u yessarem ad yecnu yid-i. Mi sliɣ s waya, nniɣ-as ula d nekk d ayen i bɣiɣ, ladɣa imi ḥemmleɣ aṭas tizlit-is La Bohème.’’ Ha-t-an,ihi, amek i d-tebda temlilit akked yiccennayen-agi. Syin yemlal yiwen wass deg uxxam n Yanik Noah, Gérard Lenorman i as-d-iḍelben i wakken ad cnun akken. ‘’Ad tɣileḍ mmsefhamen yicennayen-a fell-i’’. i d-yenna Idir. Akka i tkemmel akked Bruel, Maxime Le Forestier, Bernard Lavilliers, Francis Cabrel…Mi skelsen tizlit La Bohème s teqbaylit, yeɛǧeb-as aṭas ubendayer i Charles Aznavour i yesɛan kra n yiɛewwiqen i wakken ad yini asekkil (ḥ). Ula d Patrick Bruel yeɛǧeb-as usexdem n umundul deg tezlit-is. Zyada ɣef yicennayen-a, ad tecnu yelli-s n Idir, Tanina, deg CD tizlit i tecna yakan Lettre à ma fille. Xas akken yeɛya seg kra n temsal, meɛna Idi ur iberru ara i ṭṭbel deg waman ‘’Llan kra ssefcalen, acu kan nekk ad kemmleɣ amecwar-iw xas ulamma yenqes wafud. Sya d afella, ad uɣaleɣ ɣer yiɣbula-nneɣ i wakken ad agmeɣ syin kra i ccna-w.’’ akka i iwala temsal.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.Moula 

  
 Kkrent-as Tdukkla Tinmettitadelsant Asirem n Krun d Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad, deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, i yiwet n tekti s wazal-is urɛad i d-tella deg tuddar-nneɣ. Dɣa, ussan-a kan, sufɣent-d tiɣri i tlawin n temnaḍt ma bɣant ad ɣrent tamaziɣt, ad jerrdent iman-nsent i temsirin ara d-yettmaggan sɣur walbaɛḍ n tselmadin i d-yeffɣen s ugerdas n tmaziɣt ur ufint ara axeddim. D asurif i yuklalen asebɣes meskud tiddukkliwin-a fernent ad ddment imanen-nsent s yimanen-nsent di lawan ideg Aseqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa iɛeṭṭel deg ussuseɛ n wahil-is n usegmek (alphabétisation). « Nebɣa s tigawt-a ad nqis sin n yiswiyen ɣef tikkelt; deg-s ad nessegmek tulawin-nneɣ deg tutlayt-nsent, deg-s ad nefk tagnit i kra n teqcicin ad xedment ». I d-yenna yiwen seg wid yekkin deg ccɣel-a. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ssuma n ujerred i tɣuri-a, yewweḍ ɣer 800 DA i wayyur. D ayen swayes ara tettwaxellas tselmadt ara yeṭṭfen tilawin-a. Ma d azemz aneggaru n ujerred yettwaɛeyyen-d ɣer 15 deg wayyur n wunbir-a ideg nella. Ulamma telha tigawt-a seg uwellih amezwaru, iɛeggalen n tdukkliwin-a yezdeɣ-iten ukukru ma ad tesmurres neɣ uhu. Ma ad taweḍ dɣa tiɣri akken ilaq i tlawin d yirgazen-nsent neɣ yal yiwen amek ara yestehzi. « Nekk ḥaca taɣuri ara ɣreɣ lemmer ad nili deg waṭas yid-nteɣ. Amek mi tuɣ d asegmek s teɛrabt ɣriɣ, tura mi d tamaziɣt ad ggamiɣ? D awezɣi ». D awal n yiwet n tmeṭṭut seg Ayt Smaɛel.  M. K. 

  
 Akka tura, yella kra n lxuf deg wulawen n medden ɣef wayen tetten i yiɛebbaḍ-nsen. Seg taluft n yiyuẓaḍ yettnuzun iɣef mazal yekker uberraḥ ar tura, dakken llan wid i d-yettrusun di ssuq ur sliḥen i tuččit. Ladɣa segmi d-banent kra n tvidyutin deg Internet ideg nezmer ad nwali amek ttwasuḍayen yiyuẓaḍ s tmacinin. Yal mi ara sɛeddin tissegnit ɣef uyaẓiḍ ad icuf dindin, ad yernu deg temɣer d lmizan. Annect-nni dɣa, yeǧǧa aṭas n twaculin ad ḥebsent tiɣin n uyaẓiḍ iheggan neɣ iruṭin, ala ma yedder. Ha-t-an tura ihi, tezzi-d taluft ɣer yisafaren-nniḍen iɣef i d-qqaren xesren i tgella, am rruẓ, aksum akked lqahwa. Isafaren-a dɣa, ttekcamen-d abeɛda seg Ccinwa deg Tesga. Ɣef leḥsab n Tdukkla taɣelnawt n yimsenza, ad yili rennun i lqahwa zzayed yettḍurrun, i izemren ad yili deffir waṭas n waṭṭanen, am uxenẓir (cancer) akked tezɣint n wallaɣ neɣ ayen iwumi qqaren AVC. Seg tama tayeḍ, ɣef wakken i d-wwin kra n yidigan n Internet, ad yili usafar-a i d-yettekcamen seg tmurt n Ccinwa, yesɛa ssker ixesren. Ugur ameqqran i d-ibanen deg mi d-nnan wid i teɛna taluft n tɛessast d uḥuddu, dakken yewɛer ad teẓreḍ d anta sselɛa i ixesren d anta uhu seg tid i d-yettrasen deg usagen. D ayen i yellan d aɣilif ameqqran. ihi ma ttaɣen-d medden aṭṭan-nsen nutni ur ẓrin! 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Mhenni Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Léa Si Salah d tanelmadt deg uγerbaz uslig (privée) deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Tettekki deg temsizzelt n tmaziγt i d-yellan deg rreḥba tis 6 n tfaska tadelsant ‘’Taγuri n wurar’’ deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mεemmri anda i tewwi arraz amezwaru n tmaziγt. Γef wanect-a, dγa, tenna-aγ-d : ‘’ttekkiγ deg temsizzelt i yellan deg rreḥba tis 6 n tfaska tadelsant ‘’Taγuri s wurar’’ anda i d-wwiγ arraz amezwaru deg tmaziγt. Neγra, nessawel-d tiqsiḍin, timseεraq yerna nexdem iluγma. Imuras-iw akk sεaddaγ-ten dinna. Dayen yelhan, ssarameγ ad tili rreḥba tis 7 aseggas i d-iteddun.’’

 Aṭas n yinelmaden i yellan aseggas-agi deg tfaska-agi. Ugar n 1250 i yekkan deg-s.

   Afud igerrzen i yal yiwen, tanemmirt i Léa

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 I lmend n teẓrigt tis snat n temlilit n tmedyazt tazwawt Tawwurt n Lɛenser, ara yilin d tajmilt i umedyaz d ucennay Muḥ Saɛid Ubelɛid, tuɣal-d tdukkla tadelsant Tafat s tiɣri-s i yimedyazen i iran tikkin, neɣ i ijerrben yakan ttiɛad-a deg tedwilt tamenzut. Aya, ad d-yili s tallelt n usqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya (APW) n Tizi Uzzu, Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, Asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Assi Yousef akked tesqamut n taddart n Ait El Kacem, D timsizzelt ara d-yilin gar 12 alamma d 15 deg waggur n yulyu i d-iteddun, deg taddart n Ait El Kacem deg tɣiwant n Assi Yousef, yetabaɛen ɣer ladayara n Boughni. Neɣ ad yessiwel ɣer wuṭṭunen-a n tilifun i wugar n yisallen : 0781 47 36 92/ 0554 59 19 44. Aya send 25/06/2017. Ssaramen yimheggiyen, ad yeḥsu yal amedyaz s usaḍuf n tikkin, akken ad ilin akk deg tegnatin igerrzen mi ara d-yaweḍ usihar. Ladɣa imi ɣur waṭas n yimedyazen, timliliyin i yecban ta mačči kan d tagnit i usɣerbel d uktili n uswir n yisefra-nsen, maca d rreḥba ɣlayen i umlaqi n yimedyazen-nniḍen d umbaddal n tektiwin yid-sen. Ad d-nesmekti dakken ta d tiddi tamezwarut n useɛlem n yimedyazen. Ma d azemz n uxdam n temlilit-a yetturaǧu i wussan n 12, 13, 14, 15 deg wayyur n yulyu i d-iteddun.

  M. K d A.G 

  
 ALMAGUECHTOUM, d taddart n tɣiwant n AKERROU. Tezga-d gar Uẓeffun akked Yiɛekkuren : deg Temgudt ɛlayen. ‘’Ulamma lebḥar yehwel, zegren-t am Sidna Nuḥ…’’. Akken i d-yenna Dda Youcef deg yiwen usefru, (s ciṭ n ubeddel). Ula asen-tezmir Fransa, ur as-knin i rebrab. Seg tjaddit i d-uɣen aẓar, ddlen abernus n tlaba n sser, akken teddel adfel Temgudt-nsen. Seg lɛerc n At Fliq, uɣalen, din din, ɣer tɣiwant n Akerrou…d taqsidt !

<p style="text-align: center;"> Takerḍa n taddart. 

 Zik, Almaguechtoum, yetabaɛ taɣiwant n Yiɛekkuren. Llan deg lɛerc n At Fliq, syin uɣalen xelqen-d Akerrou d taɣiwant-nsen. Zedɣen deg taddart-a azal 1 200 n yimdanen, ɛlayet ɣef lebḥar s 820 n lmitrat. Ɣef usamar-is, ad naf Tiguenatine, ɣer umalu, Tamgudt, ɣer ugafa, Azeffoun ma ɣer unẓul, ad naf Tifrin. Tesɛa aɣerbaz amenzu i yeldin tiwwura-s deg useggas n 1969 akked uxxam n usejji. Ɣur-sen tiddukla n yilmeẓyen akked tesqamut n taddart i isedduyen lecɣal am zik-nni.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Isem ‘’ALMAGUECHTOUM’’ 

 Almaguechtoum d awal uddis. Alma+ Aguechtoum (Alma n uctum) : Alma d amekkan anida gten waman. Ma d Actum, d asɣar neɣ aqeccuḍ. Zik, deg umekkan-a yettusemman Almaguechtoum, ṭṭuqqtent deg-s tjur. Dɣa, yewwi isem-agi n yiwet deg-sent.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Amezruy d tmetti. 

 Usan-d yimezdaɣ n taddart-a seg Wat Weɣlis yellan deg Bgayet deg lqern wis 12. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, imezyura-nsen zedɣen amekkan iwumi qqaren akka tura Aẓru imi iget deg-s uẓru. Asmi tmeqqer taddart, kkren kra ruḥen ɣer umekkan-agi iwumi qqaren Almaguechtoum, zedɣen dinna. Ihi, taddart tamezwarut isem-is Aẓru. Deg taddart-a, mazal ixxamen-nni iqdimen, xas ulamma redmen ciṭ, meɛna mazal-iten d inigan. Mazal leḥyuḍ n tejmaɛt-nni anda ttnajmaɛen. Mazal yiwen ubraḥ iwumi qqaren tisyar, nufa ula d yiwen uɣaref din. Amekkan-a, deg-s i ixeddmen tisyar zik, ama d tid n uzemmur neɣ tid n uwren. Gar tzeɣwin i nwala, nufa yella umgarad neɣ lxilaf gar lebni-nsent, gar uẓru swayes bnant. Ɣef wanect-a, dɣa, nnan-d : ‘’tid yebnan s uẓru ineǧǧren akken ilaq, tid-nni n yimerkantiyen. Yella ula d lbir deg ufrag-nsent. Ma d tid yebnan kan akka s uẓru n menwala, tid n yimezdaɣ-nniḍen.’’ Am wakken, nufa, tala n tama-nni, lǧamaɛ akked tmeqqbert i yellan d lmecmel d wid izedɣen deg taddart tajdidt. D At taddart, Almaguechtou, i d-yewwin aman i yiman-nsen : wwin-ten-id seg Temgudt, ugar n rebɛa (4) n kilumitr ɣef taddart. Syin, ferqen-ten ɣef yiderman. Amur ameqran n yisenfaren n taddart, d imezdaɣ i ten-ixedmen, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan yimḍebbren n tama-agi. Xas ulamma, tebna-asen dduwla tasebbalt n waman (château d’aeau), acḥal-aya, meɛna ‘’yefka-t unebdu i lexrif’’, akken i d-nnan.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Taqṣidt n tɣiwant n Akerrou ? 

  Aṭas i as-yeqqaren acimi ur as-semman ara i tɣiwant-a At Fliq ? Neɣ acimi i d-jebden iman-nsen seg Yiɛekkuren ? Ihi, tamsalt-a tcud ɣer trisiti, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan. ‘’Deg yiseggasen yimezwura n tmanyin, yeffeɣ-d usenfar n trisiti ɣer Uqerru Buyeɛla. Ihi, i wakken ad d-nesfaydi seg-s, nerra d tama-agi-nneɣ iwumi qqaren Aqerru.Syin, rran-aɣ d taɣiwant deg useggas 1984, wwin-aɣ trisiti deg useggas 1985. Wameg ur yelli kra i icudden ɣer yisem-agi Akerrou. Ur telli tama n dagi ɣur-neɣ i yesɛan assaɣ akked wawal-a. ha-t-an d acu yellan’’. Akka i aɣ-tt-id yefra yiwen n uɛeggal n tiddukla n yilmeẓyen n taddart-a.

<p style="text-align: center;"> I yuɣen irgazen ur ttrun, neɣ ɛad tilawin. 

 Dagi ula d akal ijuhed. Akken i aɣ-d-yenna Salah. 99% d imjuhad, am uqcic am teqcict, am urgaz am tmeṭṭut. Iɛedda syin aṭas n tikal Amirouche. D adrar u d amekkan yeṭṭurfin. Ɣlin din 63 n yimeɣras n taddart, acu kan ayen yerḥan kter imezdaɣ-is d taqcict-nni tamecṭuḥ n 2 n yiseggasen i tenɣa Fransa akked yemma-s, deg useggas 1958. Tella ɣef uɛrur n yemma-s mi wwint azger ad d-yessew deg tala. ‘’Win yemmuten, ahat yertaḥ’’, i as-qqaren. Acu kan, tella yiwet n tmeṭṭut, mazal-itt akka ar tura, ha-tt-an s warraw-is. Ayen i as-yeḍran, d laɛǧeb, ‘’awi-d kan ad tidir’’, i as-tenna yemma-s asmi i as-tefka aman n tasa-s ad ten-tesew imi ur yelli kra deg yidmaren-is. ‘’Acḥal d abrid ay sliɣ, i yemma tenna-d : annaɣ ! A mmi ur tesɛiḍ ay ččiɣ deg yidmaren ad ak-id-rreɣ. Ula d akerfa ur terwiɣ, amek ara ak-id-smeɣreɣ ? i as-teqqar Nouara deg tezlit-is. Ihi, tameṭṭut-nni, tedder ass-a, acu kan amek i tga tudert-is ? D acu-ten yiḥulfan-is d yixemmimen-is ? Syin ɣer da, ɣillen tefra. Acu kan mi ara tbeddeḍ ɣef tizi n wass-a deg Lezzayer, ad tafeḍ ayen ‘’xedmen warraw-is, Fransa ur t-texdim ara’’. I as-yenna Zedek. Axir, diɣ, lgirra d Fransa, meqqar tban, wala ayen sɛeddan akked rebrab : ɣer sdat 30, ɣer deffir 40. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Izem aneggaru. 

 Ɣef wakken i yettwaru, d Irumyen i yenɣan izem aneggaru deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Nnan-d nnɣan-t deg temdint n Tébessa deg useggas n 1912. Acu kan, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan yimezdaɣ n taddart Almaguechtoum, izem aneggaru mačči d wagi n Tébessa imi yiwet n temɣart ilulen deg useggas n 1913, teḥka-d i warraw-is tamsalt n yizem. ‘’Teḥka-d setti i yemma tamsalt-agi n yizem akked baba-s. Tenna illeḥu-d deg ubrid, syin yesmaḥleq-as-d yizem. Yekker, iḍegger-as arkas-is, dɣa, yedha deg-s yizem-nni, netta yeṭṭef-d abrid-nniḍen. Aya, yezmer ad yili deg yiseggasen n 1920 imi setti tlul deg useggas n 1913’’ Akka i aɣ-tt-id-yessaweḍ yiwen ilemẓi. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Imɣan n usejji n tama-agi. 

 Tamgudt, d amekkan zegzawen, gten deg-s yimɣan : llan kra tetten-ten yimdanen, kra d amur n yiɣersiwen. Acu kan gar wa d wa, ad naf amur ameqqran deg-sen lhan i ddwa, i usejji n waṭas n waṭṭanen, ɛad llan i yal lehlak, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Smail. ‘’Seg wayen yellan iḍelli, ara d-nejbed i uzekka’’. Akka i tt-iwala ufremli-agi. Yefka-aɣ-d kra n yimedyaten, ha-ten-in i wid i ten-yebɣan : Aẓegduf, yelha i l’arthrose ; Bu Imezran, yesseǧhidd iɣes ; Asisnu, yettserriḥ idammen ; Aslen i la goute…atg. Lḥaṣun, yal aṭtan, yella imɣi-ines. Aṭas n wid iwumi yemla imaɣan-a yerna ufan ɣur-sen, akka i d-yenna. ‘’Ceyyɛen-d ɣer ɣur-i sin yimuḍan seg tmurt n Tunes imi iwala ṭṭbib-nni s wallen-is amuḍin yeḥlan s yimɣan, nutni ur ṣṣawḍen ara ad t-sejjin.’’ Ikemmel yenna-aɣ-d Smail afremli i ixeddmen deg Uẓeffun. Afud igerrzen i Smail, cfa i wid yuḍnen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Sidi Ali akked ubernus-is. 

 Sidi Ali d yiwen n Ccix deg taddart-agi. Yiwet n tikkelt, tebɣa ad as-tẓeḍ tmeṭṭut-is abernus. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Almaguechtoum 

 ..Syin tekker truḥ ɣer Sut Taddart, tessuter deg-sent ad tt-ɛiwnen. Tin iwumi tenna, ad as-tini ur stufaɣ ara, yal ta d acu i as-d-tettarra : ta ad truḥ ad tezdem, tayeḍ tesɛa cɣel deg uxxam. Mi d-tuɣal s axxam, tenna-as i ccix d akken ur telli tin ara tt-iɛiwnen i wakken ad tger abernus-nni. Yekker Ccix, yenna-as ad truḥ ɣer taddart n Uẓru, mi tewweḍ ɣer din, tin iwumi tenna, ad as-d-tini, yirbeḥ. Mi d-tuɣal s axxam, teḥka-as i ccix, dɣa, netta, yedɛa, yenna ;’’Sut n Almaguechtoum, ad ttagment, Sut n Uẓru, ad ssenɣalent. Sut n Almaguechtoum, ad zeddmen, Sut n Uẓru, ad sserɣayent’’. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Mas Missoum Youcef, ddeɛwa-agi mazal-itt ar tura : ‘’nutni sɛan 20 n tliwa, ur ten-kkfint ara, nekni nesɛa yiwen lɛinser, nerwa aman. Tis snat, nekni, taqucciḍt n yisɣaren, ad tesɛeddiḍ cetwa, nutni la benne ur ten-tkeffu ara i yiwen wass’’. Ula d ilmeẓyen i yellan ṭṭurfin ɣef tiktiwin-agi, ḥekkun-d ɣef lberhan n urgaz-agi. Ad nsel i uselway n tiddukla n yilmeẓyen : ‘’Sidi Ali, nnan-d, yettqerreɛ tiwaɣiyin. Leɛmer yewwet six deg taddart, leɛmer tecɛel tmes dagi ɣur-neɣ. Ula lawan-nni n lgirra, leɛmer i d-ṭṭreḍqent lbumbat deg taddart, qqaren-d d Sidi Ali i icufɛen fell-aneɣ’’. Deg taggara, ad snemreɣ, Founas Samil, Founas Abdellah, Derouiche Chafaa dit Salah, Houmel Seddik, Aouichiche Hocine, Djettou Mohand, Missoum Youcef, Djettou Mohand Arezki, Founas Mohand, mebla ma ttuɣ ameddakel Zaatri Ramdane i yellan deg tirza. 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Hocine.M  

  
 Imezdaγ n Tewrirt tazeggaγt i d-yezgan deg tγiwant n Leɛğiba, mmugren s lferḥ asenfar n usiweḍ n waman seg ubarağ n Tilesdit γer taddart-nsen. Lecγal yebdan yakan deg wussan-a ineggura, rran-d asirem i yimezdaγ yettidiren taswiɛt qessiḥen seg lixsas n waman, imi lbir yettwaxedmen i taddart-a yegguma ad d-yelḥeq ayen i ssuturen yimdanen imi azγal n unebdu-a, ur yeğği ara aman ad d-ilin s waṭas. Iwulem ad d-nesmekti d akken taddart-a, tezga teccektay yal mi ara d-yaweḍ unebdu, imi d tallit ideg i d-yettban lixsas n waman almi i ssawḍen deg useggas yezrin ad suγen akken ara d-slen yimdebbren ahat ad d-tili tifrat i uγbel-nsen. Tikkelt-a, d tiddukkla n taddart i yemlalen akked yimḍebber n Ddayra n Beclul i wakken ad as-ssiwḍen aγbel-nsen. D timlilit i d-yewwin igemmaḍ, imi tuffγa γer unnar n yimḍebber-a akked srabes yella yid-s, tessaweḍ γer beddu n lecγal n usenfar n usiweḍ n waman seg ubarağ n Tilesdit. Ayen yerḥan s waṭas imezdaγ n taddart-a, d akken abarağ-a d win i d-yezgan γer tama-nsen, mi akken wid ibeɛden sfaydan acḥal d aseggas-aya seg waman. γef leḥsab n wamek i teddun lecγal, asenfar-a d win ara yekfun uqbel taggara n useggas ideg nella, ayen ara yeğğen imezdaγ n Tewrirt Tazeggaγt ad yekfu fell-asen lḥif n usiweḍ n waman s tsitirnin yerna s ssuma γlayen.

  S. M. 

  
 Gar wayen i d-yettawin ibaxixen deg ufalu-a n ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9, tella tazzla, yella uɛeddi. Maca daɣen ula d yir liḥala-s, tettaǧǧa tikwal anehhar yettawi-d asehwu (accident) i netta d wiyaḍ. Am tafat i ixussen ayendin daxel-is akked takka i yesderɣilen tamuɣli n yal yiwen. Rnu-as iḍumman i yettenḍeggaren deg-s amzun d agudu. Ɣef waya i d-ihegga ussan-a yezrin n remḍan Uḥuddu Aɣarim, s tallelt n waṭas n yilemẓiyen, yiwet n tedwilt n ubraz d usizdeg n ufalu-a i yettwasseqdacen buhan sɣur wat tkeryas n waṭas n twilayin. D ayen yelhan akken xersum ad yessenqes waya seg twuɣa i d-yettilin deg-s teɣzi n useggas.

  M. X. 

  
 Aẓru n thur, yezga-d deg taddart n Wat Ʃadella deg tɣiwant n yililten n yiferḥunen i ibeɛden s 75 km ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Isem-agi, yebḍa ɣef sin : azru d yiwet n tnicca tameqqrant ; thur lawan n tẓallit.

 Ḥekkun-d Wat zik belli yella yiwen yeẓẓul dinna lawan n ṭhur deg tezrut-agi, yemmut dinna mi yella ideɛɛu. Seg wass-nni, tuɣal d tasirit d lɛada , ttẓuren-t-id yimdanen i d-yettasen seg yal tama. Yezga-d Uẓru n Thur deg tewrirt (taqacuct) n udrar n Ǧerğer ɛlayen s 1884. D adeg icebḥen nezzeh deg udrar ,yettwasnen. Aẓru n thur ,am yal aseggas lawan n ɣuct, ttẓuren-t-id , am wakken qqaren ilaq kraḍ n tikkal deg waggur –agi n ɣuct. Yal ass n sem (lǧemɛa), lɣaci ttasen-d s waṭas imi deg-s d aḥewes d tukksa n lxiq. Deg udrar n Ǧerğer icebḥen s ugama–ines , abehri azedgan, deg-s ttemlilin leḥbab , deg-s d asmeki n lɛada –agi i d-ğğan lejdud,imi llan yimuḍan yeḥlan imi i d-ttasen ɣer din , tessen aman iẓidanen yellan dinna. Ttasen-d yal aseggas ɣur-s s waṭas yiminigen imi d ussan n yimuras ttfarasen tafulki n udrar n Ǧerǧer .Ula d At taddart–agi n Wat Ʃadella, qqaren i wid yebɣan ad d-rzun ɣer Uzru n Ṭhur ansuf yis-wen, Deg umkan-agi zik i llant temɣarin xetbent-d i warraw-nsent, llant, daɣen, tid yettdekkiren isem n Rebbi dinna, cennunt sliliwent, ferḥent. D tagi i d yiwet n lɛada ideg ṭṭfen yimaziɣen, imi timetti taqbaylit d tanesbaɣurt s wansayen-is. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 Seld ugar n sin yiseggasen n unadi, n uxemmem akked uheggi, yuɣal-d ucennay aqbayli Sɛid Kessas, mmi-s n taddart n Wat Xelfun, tawilayt n Bumerdas, s yiseɣrez d amaynut, win iwumi isemma « Ilelli ». D aḍebsi-ines wis ukuẓ i ara d-yeffɣen deg wayyur n yulyu i d-iteddun, ideg llant ṣa (7) n tezlatin s yizwal yemgaraden. Tizlit tamezwarut, isemma-as « Yekker ccwal di tudrin », tis snat « A baba wwten-aɣ », tis kraḍ « Tutlayt-iw », tis ukuẓ « Temẓi-w », tis semmus « Seg Ilizi ɣer l’Elysée « , tis sḍis « Nekk yid-m dayen », ma d taneggarut tis sa isem-is « D acu i nettnadi ». Ayen ixulfen iseɣrez-a ɣef yimezwura, d tilin n taɣect n teqcict Anya i yecnan amsin (duo) akked unaẓur di tezlit n tayri « Nekk yid-m dayen », d uttekki-ines s talilt (chorale) ula di tezlatin-nniḍen. Tikkelt-a, daɣen, yefren Sɛid Kessas, ad yesseqdec ala aẓawan atrar deg uḍebsi-a “Ilelli”. « ssarameɣ aḍebsi-a amaynut ad as-slen lɣaci, ad asen-yehwu… Aql-i leḥḥuɣ ar sdat, mazal ad xedmeɣ alamma wwḍeɣ ɣer wanda bɣiɣ, d wanda bɣan wid i yi-iḥemmlen ». I aɣ-d-yenna Sɛid Kessas. Yuɣ lḥal, acennay-a, yettwassnen imi amecwar-is deg ubrid n ccna yebda-t deg useggas n 1992, anda i d-iban s tesfift tamenzut « D acu i nettnadi ». Ddeqs n wakud, yuɣal-d di 2000 s tis snat iwumi yefka azwel « Cfiɣ i wass », syin, mbeɛd tlata n yiseggasen yerna-d aḍebsi wis kraḍ s uzwel aspenyuli « Los sordos » neɣ Iɛeẓẓugen. Ɣas ma yella Sɛid Kessas d yiwen i yecnan ɣef waṭas n yisental, gar-asen wid n ddunit, layas, timetti, jsk…atg, maca, win i as-yeslan ad yegzu srid d akken icennu s waṭas tizlit tamḥaddit. Imi ad naf tuget n yisental i d-yettawi ttmeslayen-d s uɣiḍi d usirem ɣef tmurt-is d tutlayt-is i yezga iḥemmel-iten seg wul, yettɛebbi-ten d anezgum. D tilufa-a i iceɣben allaɣ-is ugar n tiyaḍ, acku yella, mazal-it ar tura d ameɣnas i yekkaten ɣef yizerfan n ugdud-is aqbayli, ama deg ccna-ines neɣ deg wayen-nniḍen. Annect-a dɣa, yeǧǧa-t ad yesɛu tinnubgiwin n ccna sɣur kra n tmura n Tmazɣa, am Tunes d Libya. Yerna-as-d daɣen leḥmala d leqder sɣur yimeɣnasen i t-yessebɣasen ad isemmed abrid-is, i yettraǧun s lḥir, am wiyaḍ, tuffɣa n yiseɣrez-a-ines i d-iteddun akken ad asen-slen.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Amek i d-yella umecwar-ik deg tira ? 

  Ahcène Mariche  : Amecwar-iw deg tira yebda asmi lliɣ di tesnawit deg useggas n 1984 di Larbɛa Nat Yiraten. Syin kemmleɣ ttaruɣ almi d asmi i yi-d yura yiwen usdawan di Marikan i wakken ad d-ssuffɣeɣ isefra-w dinna. Asizreg-iw amezwaru yella-d di tesdawit di « Marikan » di tefsut n 2005. Ssuffɣeɣ-d ammud-iw amezwaru «IḌ YUKIN» s tmaziɣt akked tefransist di yunyu 2005.
