Syin ɣer-s yal aseggas ssuffuɣeɣ-d. «TAƩEZZUL-IW», « TIDERRAY » , « TIBERNINT D SSELLUM », akked « TAZLAGT n TIKTA » wigi akk s tmaziɣt. Akken i d-rniɣ tasuqqilt i yal ammud s tefransist. Tlata wammuden s teglizit, akk d yiwen s taɛrabt.

  Amek armi idlisen-ik ttwarun s 4 tutlayin?  

 Nekk seg wid iḥemmlen aṭas tutlayin, yerna d tutlayin i ssneɣ ayagi yeǧǧa-yi ad xemmeɣ akken ad d-ssuffɣeɣ yis-sent (taqbaylit, taɛrabt, tafransist, taglizit), imi llan yimeɣriyen i yebɣan ad ɣren yis-sent. Akken daɣen llan yimeddukkal-iw ukkud qeddceɣ akken ad d-nessufeɣ tasuqqilt i yidlisen-iw yellan s teqbaylit. Aṭas n wid yessuqqulen tamedyazt ukkud xeddmeɣ, gar-asen Ouiza Idir, Muhamed Mellaz, Lounes Améziane, Idir Bellali, wigi s tefransist. Ma s teglizit, d Dalila Ait Salem, Camelia Ben Maamar, ma s taɛrabt d Mass Abdelkader Abdi akked Arezki Keteb.

  Tira-k, tcudd kan ɣer tmedyazt, neɣ llan leṣnaf-nniḍen n tsekla ideg tettaruḍ? 

  D tidet, tamedyazt teṭṭef aḥric d ameqqran di tira-w, maca ttaruɣ di leṣnaf-nniḍen. Imi bdiɣ yakan tira n yiwen wungal acku ur sɛiɣ ara akud i wakken ad t-kemmleɣ xas ma deg uqerruy-w yekfa. Am wakken daɣen uriɣ kra n tullisin d kra n tmucuha. Jemɛaɣ-d diɣen ugar n 5000 n yinzan ara d-ssuffɣeɣ di kra n lwaqt kan akka ɣer sdat.

  Anida tewweḍ tsuqqilt n yisefra-k ?  

 Ass-a, sɛiɣ 09 n wammuden n yisefra gar tefransist, taglizit akked taɛrabt, u aql-aɣ la nettheggi i wakken ad d-nessuffeɣ sin-nniḍen s taɛrabt, sin s teglizit. Am wakken daɣen imeddukkal-iw la yi-id-ttheggin kra wammuden s ṭelyanit, talmanit akked tesbenyulit. Asefru n « Sidi valentin », netta daɣen yettwassuqel ɣer waṭas n tutlayin-nniḍen. Ar ass-a, yettwassuqqel ɣer 15 n tutlayin.

  D acu i d-iswi-k s yisenza s yibuddan i txeddmeḍ ?  

 Asenzi s ubuddu, d yiwen n ttawil izad mliḥ, yettak tagnit i umaru d yimeɣriyen ad mlilen, ad myussanen, ad mbeddalen tikta, ad d-slalen isenfaren. D ttawil yefkan afud meqqren i yimura di tmurt nneɣ, yessiɛziz leqraya ɣer yimdanen am wakken i d-yettaǧǧa ccfayat i yal imeɣri mi ara yemlil d umaru. Akka i kecmeɣ tuget n temnaḍin n tmurt n Leqbayel, fkiɣ tagnit i yal yiwen akken ad yissin ayen ttaruɣ, ad i yi-yissin…atg. Akken daɣen i d-mlaleɣ aṭas n yimedyazen d yimura iwumi fkiɣ afud akken ad d-suffɣen ayen uran. S ttawil-a, nessaweḍ idlisen anda ur ttawḍen ara s ttawilat -nniḍen, yerna dinna i ɛzizet leqraya n tektabt u tira d tudert.

  Ma yella imeɣri n tmedyazt deg tmurt-nneɣ, neɣ ixus?  

 Aɣbel-agi n yimeɣriyen yella, meɛna mačči d imeɣri i ulac, d tiktabin ur tnettaweḍ ara, d wid yesɛan timkerḍiyin ur nelli deg uswir ilaqen, akken daɣen ddewla ur delhi ara s wannect-a… Yal mi ara xedmeɣ asenzi s ubuddu, ttafeɣ-d belli llan yimeɣriyen, ttbut d akken ɛawdeɣ-d asizreg i tektabin-iw aṭas n yiberdan , “Tiderray” ɛawdeɣ-as-d 5 n yiberdan, “Tibernint d ssellum” 3 n yiberdan , “La toupie et l échelle” 03 n yiḍerdan, sin-nni s teglizit sin n yiberdan, ula d “Tazlagt n tikta” sin n yiberdan…atg.

  Amek armi tessawḍeḍ ad d-snetqeḍ kra n tɣawsiwin deg yisefra-k?  

 Akken uɣeɣ tannumi qqareɣ-d, werǧin xtareɣ ad aruɣ ɣef lḥaǧa, kullec yettas-d war tamugent, d ttiɛad. Acku deg uxemmem-inu, mi ara taweḍ tɣawsa, neɣ allal ad yenṭṭeq neɣ ad yeccetki, ad nefhem belli tewweḍ tfidi s iɣes…atg. Mi ara teɣreḍ ɣef lmus, neɣ tessegnit, tawwurt, lemri ad tcetkin ɣef nnekran n lxir n umdan, tezriḍ kan d akken amdan ad iḥus mliḥ, ad as-yini amek allal yeccetka d acu ara d-iniɣ nekk neɣ winn-a iwumi xedmeɣ ccer, i ḍelmeɣ neɣ ideg stehzaɣ.

  D acu i d iswi-k seg yizamulen tesseqqdaceḍ deg yisefra-k?  

 Seg wakken nekk d aselmad n la physique u si temẓi ḥemmleɣ timseɛraq, akken ula di tmedyazt-iw, yufa-d waya amkan-is. Ḥemmleɣ ad ǧǧeɣ imeɣri ad inadi ad yerẓ aqerruy-s akken ad yefhem acu yellan deffir yal azamul. U yal mi ara d-yaf tiririt yettḥemmil aṭas lḥaǧa-nni, ma ur d-yufi ara, ad yeqqim ad yettnadi, annect-agi daɣen d ayen yelhan ad yesnerni tiḥḥerci n umdan, daɣen ad yettak azal i yal lḥaǧa ara iɣer mačči wwet kan ɛeddi.

  Ma yella kra tettheggiḍ sya ɣer sdat?  

 Teẓriḍ belli afennan ur yeggan ara, yezga yetteker-d seg yiḍ-is cwiṭ n lwaqt, mi ara isell i tehregt i d-irezzun ɣer ɣur-s. Ayen akk i d-yessuffuɣ d cwiṭ seg waṭas seg wayen yexdem imi yeḥwaǧǧ aṭas n wakud, tazmert, allalen d yedrimen…atg. Di kra n ssmanant kan ad d-yeffeɣ yiwen n “CD” n yisefra-w s lmusiga, d isefra yellan di tektabt, “TIDERRAY” ideg llan 33 n yisefra, s ttawil n setta wallalen n lmusiga. Am wakken daɣen ara d-teffeɣ tsuqqilt n wamuden “Taɛezzult-iw” s taɛrabt sɣur Abdelkader Abdi akked tsuqqilt n “Tazlagt n tikta” s taɛrabt sɣur Arzeki Keteb. Ad d-ɛiwdeɣ daɣen asizreg n wammud “Taɛezzult-iw” s tmaziɣt akked tefransist imi iɣab si lesxwaq ugar n 10 n yiseggasen. Ula d “Tazlagt n tikta” akked “Collier d’idées” ad asen-d-ɛiwdeɣ asufeɣ imi ula d nutni kfan-iyi . Di kra n wagguren daɣen ad d-ssuffɣeɣ ammud n yinzan s tmaziɣt ideg llan 5000 n yinzan. D wid i d-leqḍeɣ anda akk ruḥeɣ di tmurt n Leqbayel imi nesɛa agerruj ur nfennu. Yiwen wammud amaynut s tmaziɣt daɣen mazal kan ur kfiɣ ara izwel, ur tekfi ara tira s uselkim.

  Awal-ik n taggara ?  

 Tanemmirt-ik a gma, tanemmirt i uɣmis-nneɣ i aɣ-d-yeldin tiwwura-s, tanemmirt i yakk imeɣriyen-iw d wid akk i yi-ḥemmlen d wid akk ḥemmleɣ. Tiɣri-iw i yal yiwen yettarun akken ad yessizreg leqdic-is imi tamaziɣt teḥwaǧǧ-aɣ irkul.

  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ar tura, mazal ur nwala ara tira n tmaziɣt ɣef lebni n Lezzayer berra n tmurt n leqbayel. Wamag deg tmura taɛrabin, werǧin i tt-id-yewwi umeddaḥ deg teqsiṭ. Wissen, ahat, ad tt-arun, alebɛaḍ n wussan deg tmurt n Qurayc. Anwa ara tḥesbeḍ d gma-k ? D win i ak-yefkan azal, neɣ d win i yesneqsen deg lqima-k ? Imezwura-nneɣ, qqaren-d : ’’win i ak-ibeddlen s yibiw, beddel-it s yiclem’’. Deg Fransa, ugar n 10 n yiberdan i yettusemman s yisem n ucennay ameqqran Matoub d wiyaḍ. Aṭas n tiddukkliwin iwumi fkan afus n tallelt ameqqran i wakken ad qedcent ɣef yidles amaziɣ, gar-asent ‘’Agraw n Yimaziɣen’’. Aṭas n tesdawiyin, daɣen, i d-yelhan s unadi deg uḥric amaziɣ, am l’INALCO. Mačči d yiwet n tɣawsa ad tt-id-yader bnadem. Ula d tira n tmaziɣt fkan-as azal ameqqran imi uran yis-s ɣer tama n tutlayin-nniḍen deg yiwet n tfelwit n sbiṭer deg Paris : uran s tifinaɣ ‘’ansuf s yis-wen’’. Sbiṭer-a yella d aqdim n lqedma. Yefteḥ tiwwura-as ass 22 deg meɣres 1935 s yisem ‘’Hôpital franco-musulman de Paris. Yella i yimuḍan kan inselmen n la Seine. Deg tazwara, kra yellan d amuḍin deg sbitrat-nniḍen, ad t-id-awin, s ddreɛ, ɣer din. Deg useggas n 1978, yewwi isem ‘’Avicenne’’ s taɛrabt ‘’Ibn Sina’’ i yellan d amussnaw ineslem deg tujjya, tamedyazt akked uẓawan (musique). 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M  

  
 Aṭas n Waɛṛaben ara yessefṛeḥ yisalli-a ɣas ma cukken deg nniya n uwanek Aɛebri almend n umennuɣ ger Yisrayliyen d Yifalasṭiniyen. D yiwen n udipiti n ukabar n Likoud ay d-yessumren yiwen usaḍuf ara yerren almad n taɛṛabt d tamara i yigerdan deg wakk iɣerbazen imenza n Israyil. Yuɣ lḥal tutlayt taɛṛabt d yiwet seg tutlayin tunṣibin deg tmendawt tasrayilit.

 Teqbel tseqqamut taneɣlifant tasuḍfant (comité ministériel législatif) tasraylit asaḍuf-a ara iḥettmen taɛṛabt i yibalmuden (écoliers) iɛebriyen seg 6 yiseggasen d asawen. Maca seg tama nniḍen asaḍuf-a ad iḥettem daɣen igerdan aɛṛaben ad lemden taɛebrit.

 Ma ɣef tsebbatin iɣef qeblen yidipitiyen ama d izelmaḍen ama d iyeffusen asaḍuf-a yenna-d uneɣlaf n usegmi aɛebri Naftali Bennett belli annect-a i wakken ad yesnerni amsefhem ger Waɛṛaben d Yiɛebriyen :  » Asmi ara mmeslayen Wudayen taɛṛabt, ara mmeslayen Waɛṛaben taɛebrit imir-n ad lhun wussan « …

 Nukni deg tmurt-nneɣ, Ldzayer, mazal tuget n  » Waɛṛaben  » n Ldzayer, yugin ad lemden tamaziɣt ula i wakken ad issinen ugar aɣref-agi  » nniḍen  » ukud cerken tamurt. D tameḥḥeqranit tamettit (mépris de société) mgal tamaziɣt. Ula s yisem n takti-nni n  » win ilemden tutlayt n uɣref ad yessinef i cceṛ-is « … Mi ara nwali amahil n tneɣlaft n usegmi Nouria Benghebrit, ad naf belli tura d adabu ay yuẓen ɣer sdat wala timetti imi llan ula d kra n Yiqbayliyen ay tt-yugin ula i ulmad!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Tiddukla Tadelsant Imedyazen 

  
 Ass n ttlata, 03 deg waggur n tuber, i as-tuɣal tejmilt i ucennay ameqqran Lounis Ait Menguellet anda i as-yettunefka warraz n Doctorat Honoris Causa di tseddawit Lmulud At Mɛemmar n Tizi Uzzu. S lfarḥ d ameqqran d-yerra ɣef yesteqsiyen-nneɣ.

  La Dépêche de kabylie: Acu iwumi tḥulfaḍ imi i ak-yettunefk ass-a warraz-agi n Doctorat Honoris Causa?  

  Lounis Ait Menguellet:  Ferḥeɣ mačči d kra. Aqeddim-agi d ayen yessefraḥen s waṭas, ibeggen-d d akken axeddim-iw n 50 n yiseggasen, ur iruḥ ara kan aka. Ass-agi, ahat zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ d akken tamedyazt-iw tessnarna tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Ferḥeɣ s akken d wid ḥemmleɣ d wid i yi-ḥemmlen, i yi-yerran tajmilt-agi ass-a.

  Akka tura, isem-ik yura s yisekkilen n dheb deg umezruy n yiqbayliyen, bḥal Lmulud At Mɛemmar. Acu ara d-tiniḍ deg waya?  

 Aya d iseɣ meqqren imi ad afeɣ iman-iw cubaɣ argaz ameqqran am Dda Lmulud.

  Tamedyazt-ik, nufa-tt deg waṭas n leqdicat deg tesdawit. D acu i ak-d-yerna waya ?  

 Ssarameɣ d akken aseqdec-agi, ad yili d ayen ara yessnernin tutlayt d yidles-nneɣ amaziɣ.

  Yella-d wass ideg txemmeḍ ad tefkeḍ kra n temsirin neɣ yisaragen i yinelmaden d yimedyazen-agi i d-yettnekkaren i wakken ad asen-tessiwḍeḍ tamussni-inek neɣ ahat ula d tafiluzufit-inek ? 

  Tamussni ara asen-siwḍeɣ s way-agi xeddmeɣ kan i izemreɣ ad asen-tt-ssiwḍeɣ. s tmedyazt-iw, s yiḍrisen-iw d tezlatin-iw. Ad d-iniɣ d akken ur sawḍeɣ ara i wakken ad iliɣ d aselmad. I wakken ad tiliḍ d aselmad, ilaq ad tissineḍ amek ara tessiwḍeḍ acu i ilaqen ad t-id-tiniḍ. Nekk zemreɣ kan ad t-id-ssiwḍeɣ s ssut-iw, s uẓawan-inu d tezlatin-iw. Mazal ad kemmleɣ deg waya u mazal lxir ɣer sdat…

  Acu ara d-tiniḍ ɣef wayen yeɛnan lwelha-agi i d-terra ddewla ɣer wudmawen n teqbaylit, ladɣa kečč akked Lmulud At Mɛemmar iwumi i d-tettwahegga tmeɣra tameqrant i lmend n 100 n yisegassen n tlalit-is?  

 Ad d-iniɣ kan d akken nekk ur qedceɣ ara di tsertit, ur tnadiɣ ara ad fehmeɣ neɣ ad sfehmeɣ lecɣal-agi s wuden n tsertit. Ayen yelhan deg waya, d akken ass-a aql-i da gar-awen, gar wigad i yi-iḥemmlen d wid ḥemmleɣ. S yis-sen i d-nemlal ass-a nelfarḥ. Ad rreɣ tajmilt tameqqrant i kra n wid i d-yusan s tikti n usnerni n yidles amaziɣ. Ass-a usan-d i wakken ad i yi-d-ssiwlen tayri-nsen, ad asen-iniɣ mreḥba yis-sen, tanemmirt-nsen imi i d-ussan.

  Ass-a imi tessawḍeḍ ɣer tqacuct, Acu n wudem s wayes ara d-yeglu i umecwar-ik?  

 Ur yelli kra ara ibeddlen seg wayen yeɛnan leqdic-iw. Si zik ssarameɣ ad xedmeɣ ayen iwumi zemreɣ aken iwata lḥal. Mazal ssarameɣ daɣen akken ad izmireɣ sya d afella aken ad rnuɣ ad xedmeɣ ayen igerrzen. Tajmilt-agi d tabɣest ay d-terna, d asnimmer i wayen xedmeɣ. Iqeddimen am wigi, ttilin-d d asnerni n tutlayt d yidles-nneɣ.

  Sya ɣer sdat, d acu n yisenfar i d-yessewjad Lounis Ait Mengeullet?  

 Seg wasmi bdiɣ ttaruɣ, 50 n yisegasen-aya, di leɛmir i d-heggaɣ ayen ɣef ara d-aruɣ. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ d akken iḍrisen-inu, ttaruɣten melmi i d-usan kan aka weḥden-sen, s yiḥulfan. Ttaruɣ ayen ttḥusuɣ d wayen ttwaliɣ di tmetti. Ssarameɣ d akken mazal ad yili wayen s ara d-yilin y-ḍrisen-nniḍen.

  Tira n Lounis Ait Menguellet, tusa-d ahat seg leqdic n unadi ?  

 Tamedyazt-iw, tekka-d seg wayen fehmeɣ d wayen ttwaliɣ. D aya swayes qeddceɣ s waken ttwaliɣ isentalen ɣef ttaruɣ, imi ilaq ad sen-tefkeḍ azal d lmeɛna i wayen ara taruḍ.

  Deg wussan yezrin, si Bgayet, tenniḍ-d d akken ur as-tessineḍ ara akken ilaq i tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Acu lmeɛna n wawal agi?  

 Nniɣ-d awal-agi, i wakken ur ilaq ara ad as-yini yiwen dayen sneɣ kulec. Amdan, ilaq ad yettnadi yal ass, ad yesteqsay . S waya ara sɛuɣ lḥir ad nadiɣ akter. Nekk ur seqqareɣ ara dayen ḥuddeɣ-d tutlayt n teqbaylit s telqayt. Tutlayt d lebḥer lqayen. Yal ass, nettissin kra, yal yiwen ad yernu si ljiha-s tamussni-nniḍen. Tamussni ur tesɛi ara taggara. GM.

  Tadiwennit-a, teffeɣ-d s tefrensist Terra-tt-id ɣer teqbaylit Farida Elharani 

  
 Nufa ayen din n yimdanen i d-yusan ula d nutni ad ttun i kra n teswiɛt zzhir d uɣamac n temdinin d tkeryas. Amekkan yecbaḥ mačči d kra. Tasusmi d ubeḥri azeddgan srusun-d talwit d usteɛfu ɣef ṣsurra n bnadem. Sya ɣer da, alamma tesliḍ i temqerqar, neggzent ɣer daxel n waman, neɣ cergent tasusmi s ṣsut n usqerqer-nsent. Imdanen, qqimen ɣer tama n temda, yal wa s wacu i d-yelha : wa itett, wayeḍ yettnecraḥ ; wa yeṭṭes, wayeḍ iceṭṭeḥ… Nemmlal akked kra n tdukliwin i d-iqesden amekkan-agi. Akka, dɣa, i d-newwi awal akked kra n yimḍebbren-nsent. Dalila (AJIE) : tirza-a, tekcem deg wahil-nneɣ. Nebɣa ad nẓer imekwan, syin ad nwali amek ara nḥareb fell-asen. Amekkan-a, dayen igerrzen, yuklal ad nessiḥbiber fell-as akken iwata. Ania : Agelmim Aberkan d amekkan igerrzen, aṭas ur numin ara dakken deg tmurt n leqbayel i yella mi t-walan deg Internet. Ihi, iswi-nneɣ d wa : ad d-nessekfel imekwan am wigi i wakken ad ten-walin wiyaḍ. Ad nwali d acu n ttawilat i ilaqen i useḥbiber ɣef yimeḍqan am wigi. Kosseila : ur nwiɣ ara ad d-afeɣ amekkan am wagi. Yecbeḥ mačči d izli. Acu kan ilaq ad nesseḥbiber fell-as. Imdanen ilaq ad ḥṣun dakken agama yeḥwaǧ ad t-nqader, ma nebɣa ad aɣ-iqader. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine Moula 

  
 Tazwara n ddurt iɛeddan, yella d uḥzin ɣef kra n yinehharen akked yimdanen i iwalan asehwu-nni deg Lberǧ n Mira, taɣiwant n Tsexriwt. D yiwen n urgaz i yegrarben s ukamyun-is seg tqenṭert ɣer lxali, mi d-yeffeɣ seg ufalu aneggaru, iteddu-d ɣer Lberj n Mira. Ɣef wawal i yuzzlen deg yilsawen, yella umdan-a, iɛebba aṭas, dɣa mi qrib ad d-yeffeɣ seg ufalu mettwal 07:30 n tnezzayt, yeqqers-as umawaɣ (aḥebbas). Dɣa, i wakken ur yettawi tirwiḥin yexḍan d tiseflatin, yeɛreḍ ad d-yeṭṭef akamyun-is. Armi d-yewweḍ i tafat, yerwel-as ukamyun ɣer wadda n tqenṭert i ibeɛden s wazal n 70 n tmitratin ɣef lqaɛa. D ayen i yeǧǧan ilemẓi amerḥum yemmut dindin, akamyun-is yebḍa d iceqfan. I tikkelt-nniḍen, yella-d uḥebbas deffir ubaxix-nniḍen deg umḍiq-nni gedged am win n wayyuren iɛeddan. D acu kan, yefren unehhar tikkelt-a, ad yeɛreḍ ad tt-yefru akken-nniḍen, wala ma yewwet akamyun-is ɣer tkeryas i yellan deg lemsaq-is. Ɣef waya ihi i ilaq asɛeddi n lḥala n tezmert n ukamyun war astehzi, akken ur d-iɣelli yiwen deg tuccḍa iweɛren.

  M. K. 

  
 Kra n wussan kan send ad ḥebsent ddiɛayat n lvuṭ, ttkemmilen wat ikubar tirza-nsen ɣer tuddar i temlilit n yimezdaɣ. Deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel dɣa, xemsa n yikubar i d-ibedden i tefranin tidiganin. Wigi d RCD, FFS, RPR, RND d FLN. Yelha ad d-nesmekti d akken seg 2005 d FFS i d-iberzen deg-s. Akabar n Ugraw i Yidles d Tugdut ad yeqqim yettnaɣ ulamma ugar n 20 n yiseggasen ur yeṭṭif tisura n tɣiwant deg Ayt Smaɛel. « Nesɛa yiwen n wahil i ubeddel asertan deg Ayt Smaɛel. Ala agdud i d ljuj awḥid. Skud tasertit ur d tussna tusdidt, numen nezmer ad d-nerbeḥ ikursiyen n tɣiwant. Ula d leqder, s anda nerza yezga yella ». D awal n Nabil Xaldi, wis sin deg wumuɣ n RCD. Ma yella d taɣiwant taǧaret, Tasexriwt, ahat amḥizwer gar wumuɣen i d-yersen i tefranin-a tidiganin n twilayt n 23 unbir ɣer umur ameqqran n yikersiyen, ad yili am yal tikkelt gar RCD d FFS. Ulamma deg ɛecra n yiseggasen ineggura d RCD i d-yettḥellin tuget n tuɣac i uselḥu n temnaḍt-a tamazrayt n Tsexriwt. Ma nessuk-d awal ɣef tɣiwant n Yiderginen, i yellan d tadayra daɣen, ad naf d akken amezruy-is iqerben n tefranin-a, yeqqen ɣer ukabar n Taj seg 1997 armi d 2007, syinna d FFS i d-yettawin rrbeḥ armi d tura. Tamawt i yewwi-d ad d-nger d lɣiba n ukabar n RCD deg tɣiwant-a aseggas-a, imi llan kan xemsa n wumuɣen deg-s: FFS, RND, FLN, TH d TAJ.

  Ɣef tefranin n twilayt deg Bgayet 

 Akkin i twilayt, i lmend n tefrarin-a n 23 unbir, sersen yikaramen-nsen (dossiers) i tikkin 14 n yikabaren. Dɣa usan-d akka deg wumuɣ i aɣ-d-yewwḍen: FFS, Ilelliyen (Lwaḥi ad nebnut imal), RCD, ANR, RND, PT, MEN, FLN, PST, Ilelliyen ( Azwur Aɣerman), MPA, HMS, Tadukkli TAJ Akked FM. Tura akka yal yiwen yesseqdac tasertit-is deg ddiɛayat i wakken ad as-d-siḥent tuget n tuɣac.

  M. K. 

  
 “Neɛya deg uraǧu !” Dɣa s wawal-a I d-usan kra n yimezdaɣ n temdint n Tubiret ɣer zdat uxxam n twilayt iwakken ad d-beggnen lɣiḍ-nsen zdat leɛḍil I d-yellan ɣef ufraq n yixxamen yettwaheggan yakan. Tasebḥit n wass l larebɛa iɛeddan, ddeqs yid-sen I d-usan, dedden iwakken ad d-jebden lwelha n yimḍebbren terza taluft. “tlatin n yiseggasen aya I ttrajuɣ melmi ara iferrej Rebbi fell-I ad sɛuɣ axxam am nekk am madden.” S waya I d-yebda awal-is yiwen n urgaz iɛeddan xemsin n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is yessarmen dakken imḍebber amezwaru n twilayt I d-yusan melmi kan ad as-yefk leḥq-is. Imdanen-a yettidiren ɣef leḥsab n yimeslayen-nsen deg yir tignatin sbabben agellel-a I uselway n tɣiwant n Tubiret d yimḍebber n Dayra I yegguman ad tt-gezmen dir ray ad fken tisura I yimdanen yuklalen ɣas akka ixxamen wejden.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail. M 

<div> 
  
  Ddaw tacḍaḍt n tugdud. 

 Tagara n isaggasen n tmanyin  tegla-d s tedyanin n tuber anda ɣlin d imayaten n yelmeẓyen ddew tirṣasin n ẓẓur n -udabu n ukabar awḥid n yimiren  FLN. Tidyanin n Tuber , xas akken qeriḥit , glant-d s-uɛiwed n tmendawt ( constitution) n tmurt yefkan azref i usbeddi n ikabaren isertiyen akked tidukliwin tidelsanin neɣ  timetiyin. Yal wa yenwa ahat s  leɛnaya n tugdut ad ldint tiwwura ɣef yidles amaziɣ s umata akked yidles aqbayli. Ussan zrin,  ayen ɣef iccaren imedyazen ( am Lounis Ait Menguellet deg tezlit-is mechuren “ ccaɣlet-aɣ tafat, nfud a nwali, a neẓẓeṛ ɣer zdat , amek ara nilli” d Matoub Lounes deg tezlit  id yefɣen dɣa di lawan-nni anda is yeqqar : “ ur sefcaleɣ imadanen, d teswiɛt i-iharcwen , ur aɣ-tesuɛed ara, mmarent  tiregwa n idamen, mejden imdanen ad mejden, ur yefri wara, azeglu win i t-inumen , i wakken a s-yedleq dayen, a tt-yercerw terɣa”) ur nɛeṭṭel ara  nuffa-t am tiderit deg abriḍ yettraǧǧun aḍar.  Widen tezdi tamselt( idles d tutlayt tamaziɣt) msebḍan, wa iɣereb wayeḍ icareq armi  uɣalen s ddew  tiṭ i ttemyaxẓaren. Awal yuɣal d asamem, yegursel ɣef karuh d tismin  akked nḥas ur d nettawi.  Yuɣal yal llem da ijebbed akkin ikaref. Win ur neddi yid-nneɣ i ttusema d axṣim-nneɣ. Deg akken yeqwa ujbad d –uḍlaq n ubeḥnuq  deg yezdew yidles, yekerkar si yal tama. Taɛdawit yekran gar ssin ikabaren FFS d RCD  tesdegded acmux n teqbaylit, terra-t d iceqfen ur nedukul. Uɣalen  imawlan n yidles iḍfer-iten wawal. Ma ur d nnin ara akken yebɣa ukabar-ina neɣ wagi, ad temmir fel-asen lehwa n uɣunzu akked uɣanfi. Deg abdil n usefti n yidles yir lehwa id imaren  tesefti  tabenɛamet. 

  Tuɣalin n tizlit taqbaylit ɣer deffir. 

 D anect-a i yerẓan ( uqbel ssebat nniḍen acku llan-t) tizlit taqbylit . Yereẓ   waffug ines id tewwi seg tazwara n isaggasen n tmanyin. Si lǧiha-as adabu ur yeɣfil ara imi iwazeɛ tadrimt ( melba cceḥa) akken ad yesali ṣṣenf n ccna umu qaren ṛṛay id yekkan si tama n umalu n tmurt. Ṣṣenf-agi n ccna yellan yettexnunus deg  yir umuraj , yellan igemmu di tegnatin n wammus  di ccew yuɣal d ccna  yesɛan azal, zwin fell-as takka  yesemɣid afriwen  armi yerra tili i ccna n teqbaylit. Di lawan-nni i nehḍer i kra akken n yimesneɛmalen  yettɛawaden i yiɣes asebbi.  Wigi ufan-tt teddez tebrez , lhem-nsen d asufeɣ n tesfifin ta deffir ta s-uɛiwed n tezlatin tiqburin. Yenquqel lsas n ccna n teqbaylit. Yenqeḍ usnulfu  imi bexlaf Matoub Lounes akked  Lounis Ait Mengullet ulac acenay id yettawin amaynut ara yesferḥen wid iḥamlen tizlatin yelhan. Deg tudrin akked temdinin n tmurt n leqbayel  ccna n ṛṛay yuɣ leqrar yecrew tizlit nḥamel seg tesga , seg usqif, seg leḥwari. Deg akken terki lihala xas Matoub Lounes isuɣ deg tezlit-is  “ihadaden n wawal” yenna: inni-asen ay afrux i yiḥadaden n wawal/widen yemuten neɣ wid id mazal, ccna n leqbayel  wissen anda akka i-imal/ inni-asen ay afrux”. Di tallit-nni diɣen i susmen aṭas n icanayen n teqbaylit am Ṣofiane, Malika Domarane, Amghid, Amar Kobbi, Ouazib Mohand Ameziane d waṭas nniḍen.

  Ifeṭiwej n ṭmaɛ. 

 Tulya ɣef tugdut ur d-tegla ara kan s wayen n ddir i yidles aqbayli. Di  tɛajajt n ccek akked usirem  id iṣsuḍen ɣef tmurt  ddan-d yijda n ṭmaɛ, imi i tikelt tamenzut tizrigin Bouchene  teldi annar   ɣef udlis s teqbaylit. Di lǧera n leqdic n tizrigin-agi, i tikelt tamenzut uɣalen idlisen (yellan d leḥram d aseṭṭef di dewla n ukabar awḥid FLN) ttnuzun di tmurt-nsen melba lxuf melba tugdi. Necfa amek nzan yidlisen n Mouloud Mammeri “ isefra iqburen s teqbaylit», wid n Tasadit Yassin “ izlan” , “ Lounis Ait Menguellet chante»,  wid  n Hocine Ait Ahmed “ tamselt n Mecili/ l’Affaire Ali Mecili ” &amp;nbsp,; “ aktay n ugrawli/ mémoire d’un combatant ”  am uɣrum.   Gar ifeṭṭiwjen –agi n tafat yella-d diɣ  usnulfu n yeɣmisen imenza  s teqbaylit gar-asen “ aɣmis asalu», aɣmis amaynut», “aɣmis tamurt”.  Meɛna ayen-nni yakk  tedra-tt yid-s am usigna unebdu:  timeqwa id yewwi wergin neǧren-t tiregwa. Kra din yexsi deg yiwwas. Iɣmisen-nni i meṛṛa ɣaben , tizrigin n Bouchene medlent  tiwwura.Gar ih akked wah n yimir, tella-d diɣ tuɣalin  n uccanay Idir s tesfift «  isaggaden n tafat” urǧan leqbayel meṛṛa s ccuq. Taḥawact n isaggasen n tesɛin(90) tɣelb-itt tmara wala nmara.

  Zzman n tidukliwin tidelsanin. 

 Akken yebɣu yella  lḥal, fad n tugdut, n tilleli akked yidles yesmendig lebɣi deg ulawen xas akken lweɛd i teqqes. Tazwara n isagassen n 90 tebda s usbeddi  n tidukliwin tidelsanin. Tadukli tamezwarut id yegran s annar  d ttin n Si Muḥend u Mhend i-illan deffir  tafeska tamezwarut n temdyazt tamaziɣt I yuɣen leqrar azal n ddurt  di tlata n tɣiwanin: Michelet, Larba Nat Iraten d Tizi Rached.  Tafeska-agi (yewwin isem n umedyaz n leqbayel Si Muḥend U Mḥend ɣef yella di lmendad Mass  Agaruj Rabah n umeṭṭaf wis ssin)  tezdi azal n 300 imedyazen id yekkan si  tmurt n leqbayel, tmurt n icawiyen, tamurt n-itergiyen, tamurt n Lmaruk.  Wid iḥadren i tefska-agi ttmektayen-d leɛnaya id as-fkan iɛggalen yettikin ama deg uheggi ama deg tmezizelt . Aniwel yettaw-id cihwat akken qqaren, imi di lǧera n tadukli tadelsant Si Muḥend  u Mḥend tenerna-d ɣer idisan-is tadukli tadesant Yusef U Qasi deg At jannad id isbedden ula d netta-t tafeska tamenzut n tmedyazt tamaziɣt “ Yusef U Qasi” id yeḍran di tlata n tiɣiwanin : Freha, Aɣrib, Timizart. Tagrayt n leqdic n snat n tdukliwin agi , d tulya n ubrid zdat tmedyazt taqbaylit tartart. Iguma n leqdic nsen-t  ufraren-d akken ilaq gar isaggasen n 2003/2010  imi di reḥba n tfeskiwin agi id yufrar wudem amaynut n teskla taqbaylit tamirant. Tsekla tamirant  refden imedyazen ur nessin ara d acu i d-asider n wallen zdat lhejna n timena  am Ahmed Lahlou, Ahmed Khetabi, Kiki, Dali Salima, Mehdi Samira, Hamid Ibri, Selmi Moussa…. D waṭas nniḍen….

<p style="text-align: right;">Hamid Ait Slimane 

<p style="text-align: right;">(Aḥric wis sin )

  
 I lmend n usmekti n wass agraɣlan n tutlayt n tyemmat, i d-yettilin yal ass 21 deg waggur n furar deg umaḍal, tefugel lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu ttiɛad-a akken ilaq lḥal tikkelt-agi. Aṭas n yidisan i d-iheggan ass adelsan i lmend n usmekti-agi. Gar wid itt-id-isuddsen ad d-nebder: Tanmehla n Yidles, Axxam n Yidles n Tizi Uzzu, tasdawit n Tizi Uzzu, Tanmehla n usegmi aɣelnaw, Taṣweḍt n tmaziɣt… atg. Heggan-d yiwen leqdic d anesbaɣur, i d-yellan ass-nni n ttlata 21 deg furar 2017, deg tzeqqa tameqqrant n uxxam n Yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Aseggas-agi, gan-as tajmilt i umedyaz d umussnaw ameqqran Mass Si Mouhand ou Lhocine Sahnouni. Gar wayen i d-yufraren deg wahil yettwaxedmen asegga-agi sɣur yimsuddsen-agi d anesbaɣur,iImi llan-d aṭas n leqdicat idelsanen ɣef teɣzi n wass-nni n 21 deg furar. Ad d-nebder tlata-nni n yisaragen i d-gan kraḍ n yimussnawen d yimnadiyen deg uḥric n tmaziɣt; wigi d Said Chemakh, Hassen Halouan, Brahim Ben Taleb, akked tnagit d ugzul, i d-yefka mmi-s Rachid Sahnouni, i d-yewwin awal ɣef tudert d yimuhal n baba-s. Llant-d diɣen waṭas n temsikniyin, yeεnan tutlayt n tyemmat, am wakken daɣen i d-yella usiken n yimuhal d yirmad n 4 n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen n Tizi Uzzu, wigi d Haiche Hocine, atmaten Qerqach, Tassadourt, d uɣerbaz alemmas Rakem n Tala Amara. yella-d diɣen usenεet n waṭas n tɣawiwin yecban: amezgun, ccnawi, ccḍaḥ d zwağ aqbur n Leqbayel…atg. Mebla ma nettu, asenzi s ubuddu n udlis «Ameslay inna baba», i d-yessuffeɣ mmi-s Racid Sahnouni, ɣer tezrigin n CNRPAH.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ayen i d-nan 

  Goumeziane Nabila, d tanemhalt n yidles:  

 “nga as-agi d asmekti n wass agraɣlan n tutlayt n tyemmat, nebɣa ad d-nsiken i yimezdaɣ n Tizi Uzzu azal i tesεa tutlayt n tyemmat deg uḥraz n yidles d tɣerma-nneɣ. D tamaziɣt i d tutlayt-nneɣ n tyemmat, imi yis-s i d-yettneṭaq ugrud amaziɣ i tikkelt tamezwarut. Nerra diɣ tajmilt i yiwen gar wid i d-yerran tasekla timawit ɣer tira, limer mačči d nutni, tili wis ass-agi ma ad d-nmeslay yis-s…”

  Said Chemakh, d amnadi d duktur deg tmaziɣt:  

 “tajmilt tameqqrant ad tuɣal i UNESCO, imi iga ass agreɣlan i tutlayin akk n tyemmatin n umaḍal. Imi walan belli di 6000 n tutlayin yellan deg ddunit, sya ɣer 2050 azal n 3000 seg-sent ad negrent, amur ameqqran deg-sent d timawiyin. Nutni ḥesben tamaziɣt gar tutlayin i qrib ad suffɣent tarwiḥt, ihi ilaq fell-aɣ ad nseḥbiber fell-as, uqbel ad ifat lḥal. Imi akka tura ddeqs n tantaliyin n tmaziɣt i inegren deg tmurt-nneɣ”.

  Rachid Sahnouni, d mmi-s n Si Mouhand :  

 “nefraḥ aṭas s tejmilt-agi i d-as-yuɣalen ussan-agi iεeddan i ubabat-nneɣ, acku tura netta mačči n twacult-is kan, maca d ababat n Lezzayer merra. Tanemmirt s tussda i wid akk i d-yefkan afus n tallelt, deg tejmilt-agi meqqren, tanemmirt daɣen i yinebgawen n lḥerma i d-yerzan ɣer uxxam n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, ass-nni n 21 di furar 2017. Ssrameɣ imnadiyen d yisdawanen ad qerben ɣer ugerruj i d-yeğğa Si Mouhand, i wakken ad as-xedmen tasleḍt d tezrawin”.

  Hassen Halouan, d aselmad deg tesdawit d amnadi:  

 “d iseɣ i tutlayt-nneɣ n tyemmat, imi ula d nettat tesεa amkan-is gar tutlayin akk n umaḍal .Yal aseggas negrent wazal n 200 n tutlayin, ladɣa timawiyin. Yerrna tutlayt mačči d imeslayen kan, maca d tamuɣli n ugdud-is ɣer ddunit, ɣer talsa…atg”.

  Arkoub Abdellah, d amaswaḍ n tmaziɣt:  

 “d tikkelt tamezwarut ideg ara d nsuddes timlilit yecban tagi deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, imi ḥedren yid-nneɣ yinelmaden n 4 n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen. Nessaram yal aseggas ad nxeddem ugar, i wakken ad nessiweḍ ad d-nsebgen azal n tutlayt n tyemmat deg unegmu n uqcic, deg unegmu n tnefsit-is, n timadt-is…atg”.

  Brahim Ben Taleb, d amnadi d amaru: 

  “ferḥeɣ aṭas s wass-agi agraɣlan, neεreḍ ad d-nesken deg-s i warrac azal tesεa tmaziɣt deg tmetti, imi tesεa amkan-is deg uḥric n uxeddim. Nniɣ-d yakan belli agrud yessnen tamaziɣt, yezmer ad yelmed, ad d-yesusru akk tutlayin n umaḍal”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ghani Amazigh  

 
  
 Iṛuḥ uqcic nni. Armi yewweḍ ɣer yiwet n taddart-nniḍen, tḍal-d yiwet n teqcict seg ṭṭaq, twala-t. Tenna-as teqcict-nni i yemma-s : « A yemma, a-t-an yiwen uqcic ansi d-ikka. Aqcic-nni ad t-aγeγ ; ad d-ǧǧeγ yid-s yiwen uqcic. Aqcic-nni ad yeγli sya seg ṭṭaq-a, ad immet! » Qiment ttrunt am nettat am yemma-s. Aqcic-nni, iwweḍ γer-sent, yaf-itent ttrunt, inna-asent: “Acu kent-yuγen imi akka la tettrumt ?”. Tusa-d yemma-s n teqcict-nni, tenna-as:”A mmi, taqcict-a-inu d nettat i ak-iẓran imi d-tusiḍ i tama ihin akk-in. Tenna-yi: A yemma, aqcic-nni d-yusan seg tama ihin akk-in ad t-aγeγ; ad d-ǧǧeγ yiwen uqcic yid-s. Aqcic-nni ad iγli seg ṭṭaq-a, ad immet! Tura d ayen imi ala nettru akka.” Inna uqcic-nni deg ul-is:”Ti diγen ugarent wid iɛeddan akk!” Inna-asent:” Xas, ad immet! Maca awimt-d idrimen; ad nefk lweɛda fell-as i wakken ad aγ-fken ddeɛwa lxiṛ wid-nni iwumi ad nefk lweɛda; ad iqim uqcic-nne&amp;gamma,; ur ittmmettat ara.” Fkant-as idrimen. Inna-asent:”Tura, aqli ad ṛuḥe&amp;gamma,; ad awḍeγ ɣer yiwet tmurt ɣer yiwen umeddakkel-iw, ad t-ẓreγ amek illa. Imir-nni ad d-zzi&amp;gamma,; ad aγeγ taqcict a.” Iwwi idrimen, iṛuḥ. Armi iwweḍ ɣer yiwen umḍiq, yufa sin medden ttnnaγen. Wayeḍ yusa-d , irekb-d taserdunt. Armi d-iwweḍ ɣer sin-nni ittnnaγen, inna-asen:”Acuγer akka tettnnaγem ?” Inna-as yiwen:”Nekkini akk d wa d imeddukkal, nusa-d armi i d-newweḍ ɣer da, nniγ-as nekkini : Limmer agni-a inu, ad t-kerzeγ d-irden, ad ččaṛeγ yis-s axxam. Ikker-d netta, inna-yi: Limmer-inek, nekkini ad d-aγeγ ulli, ad ak-t-kseγ. Nniγ-as nekkini: Amek ! Armi nekk yid-k d imeddukkal, tura tγulḍ iyi! Ad tṛuḥeḍ ad d-taγeḍ ulli, ad yi-tekseḍ irden! Tura , γef anect-a i nennuγ.” Ikker-d bab tserdunt-nni. Iṭṭef ajenwi, iwwet taserdunt-nni-ines s aɛebbuḍ, inγel-d ijeγdan-is, inγa-tt. Inna-as i winna akken-nni i as-innan: Ad d-aγeγ ulli, ad ak-kseɣ irden i umedakel is:”Ad d-isseγli Ṛebbi ijeγdan-iw am wid n tserdunt ihin! Ar d keč i iḍelmen!” Inna-asen uqcic-nni, gma-s n teqcict nni i d-irḍan sdat izimer: “Amek ! Kunwi tleḥḥum deg ubrid d-imeddukkal. Yiwen inna: Ad kerzeγ irden. Wayeḍ inna: Ad aγeγ ulli, ad sent-bruγ deg yirden-a. Tennuγem γef ulac! Wis kraḍ(3) inγa taserdunt-is γef ulac i wakken kan ad iggal yis-s” Tura nekkini rewleγ-d γef kra n yibuhalen ; γileγ ad afeγ wid iḥedqen acemma. Taswiɛt, aqli, deg wass-nni deg i d-fγeγ γef wid-nni i d-rewle&amp;gamma,; nekkini ttafeγ-d akka wid i ten-yugaren deg tibuhelt! Tafakit-is, d kunwi immenγen γef ulac. Tura, nekkini yif-it ad uγaleγ ɣer yimawlan iw.” Wid-nni iǧǧa-ten dinna, netta yuγal ɣer tmurt-is…

  Tettkemmil 

  
 Ilul Brahim izri ass n, 12 deg yennayer 1954, deg taddart n At Leḥsen deg Wat Yanni. Segmi yesɛa sebɛa n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is ur ifureq tagitart-is, am wakken id-yenna deg wawal–is : ‘’luleɣ-d, ɣliɣ-d ɣef tgiṭart’’ imi i d-yufa iman-is deg zawiya n jedd-is Lḥadj Belqasem anda yella uẓawan. Iruḥen jeddi-is ɣer Mekka ɣef uḍar. Yeqqim azal n 15 n yiseggasen. Asmii d-yuɣal, xtaren-t ad yuɣal d aqqerru ɣef zawiya-agi i d-yezgan deg Wat Yanni. Yelmed Brahim Izri aẓawan imir deg zawiya sexdamen amendayer, tijewwaqin d tẓemmarin. Ma yella d agiṭar ulac anwi yessnen ad t-yeseqdec, dɣa yextar–it jeddi-s akken ad yili d netta ara t-yekkaten. Asmi yella deg tesnawit n Larebɛa n At Yiraten, ugar ayen yesɛaday deg uẓawan ɣef leqraya, netta d sin yimeddukkal-is : Nait Abdelaziz akked Aziz Berrahma. Faqqen-asen deg tesnawit, dɣa rran-ten d iqerra dinna, cennun deg-s mi ara tili tegnit. Cwit cwit, uɣalen xedmen agraw iɛawen-iten ucennay idir. Agraw-agi, semman-as Igudar, imir aṭas n yigrawen i ikecmen ɣer ccna. Yal agraw s yisem-is. D tirebbuyeɛ yebdan imenɣi ɣef yidles d tutlayt. Nezmer ad nebder Isulas , Inaṣliyen, Abranis , Imaziɣen Imula. Deg yiseggasen n 70 , yuɣal iruḥ ɣer Fransa yekkat agiṭar i yidir, neɣ i Ait Menguellet d Ferhat. Mi yuweḍ ɣer Franca, yebɣa ad yecnu, ur yettɣimi ara kan d amẓawan, yerna ur yezmir ad yexdem ayen-nniḍen. Yexdem timsirin n ccna, yelmed, yuɣal yessekles tizlit tamezwarut deg yiseggasen n 80. Yecna netta d Idir d Maxime le Forestier tizlit «Tizi Uzzu». Brahim Izri, yessen mliḥ i uẓawan , ṣṣut–is d aḥlawan , yerna iḥemmel akk medden. Yettawi deg ccna-s ɣef yisentan yecban izerfan n tmeṭṭut, lɣerba, tamaziɣt… Yeqqar deg wawal-is : ‘’ur tettili ara tlelli mebla tameṭṭut, ur tettili ara tmaziɣt mebla tameṭṭut ilaq ,tameṭṭut taqbaylit ad tili am urgaz deg yizerfan-is’’. Deg wussan n tefsut taberkant, asmi ɣlin 127 n yilmeẓyen, yefka-d afus n tallelt i wid ijerḥen, ama s udrim ama s dwawi. Brahim Izri, iḥemmel tagmat s waṭas, ur yeḥmil ara taɛdawt gar watmaten. Yebɣa ad yexdem deg Bgayet taḥanut n uẓref ( lfeṭṭa ) swayes i ttwasnen At yanni, maca ur yuwiḍ ara ɣer yiswi-s . Gar tezlatin –is, ad naf : Sacrifice pour un enfant ( 1981) ; D Acu-iyi (1983) ; Ala ala (1986) ; D Ifrax i nella (1988) ; A Lbudala ( 1995) d tiyaḍ-nniḍen. Limer mačči d lmut i t-iḥewsen s yiwen waṭṭan iḍullen ass n, 03 deg yennayer 2005 deg sbiṭar n Fransa di Paris , yili ad yexdem ugar. Ad fell-as yeɛfu wuzmir. Maca yeğğa-d agerruj, ilaq ad as-negg leqrar, rran-as tajmilt tameqqrant deg uxxam n yidles Mouloud Mameri d taddart-is At Lehcen , s yisem-is xedmen timsizzelt n ccna amaziɣ aseggas yezrin, ayen yeğğan imdanen ad skecmen iman-nsen gar yicer d uksum acimi ur d-yusi ara yidir. Yal wa d acu i d-yeqqar. Ma d Berbere TV , ttmektayen-t-id yal aseggas, ama s tezlatin-is, ama s udiwenni i d-yellan gar-as d Kamal Tarwiht asmi i t-id-yeɛreḍ. Yecna Allaoua fell-as deg yiwet n tezlit ( Yella yella, ur temuteḍ ara ), nesaram-as rreḥma d lğennet.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia  

  
 Deg lawan deg tamurt n Lhend( inde) tefra-tt d ṛṛay akken ad ẓẓun azal n xemsa imelyan n isekla , deg lawan deg nejmaɛen leǧnas, ddaw tacḍaḍt n l’ONU di tamdint n Lparis, akken ad afen tifrat i weɣbel n zyadda n lḥamu deg tizeɣlin( temperatures deg umaḍal, nekni d agi ɣer-nneɣ ur d ufin ara anda ara weqmen abudu i wafrasen bexlaf tiẓgi n Bouhalou id yezgan deg aɣrib deg lɛerc n At Jennad. Tiẓgi agi id yezgan ddaw ubrid aɣelnaw 71 mačči kan d aɣbalu n ubeḥri ḥlawen i yimezdaɣ n temnaḍṭ -agi, tella diɣ n amḍiq n usgunfu anda imdanen ḥamlen ad rzun akken ad ksen cwiṭ n lxiq, ɣef tiṛwiḥin-nsen, mebla ma nettu lfayda-s tadamsant imi mačči d izli n-iqqecci id yettwaksen seg-s. Xuḍi lɣaba-agi tettuneḥsab gar tiẓegwa mechuṛen deg tmurt n leqbayel.

 Isalen iɣ yettawḍen qqaren-d d akken Lwali n Tizi-Wezzu yeɛzzem ad yebnu din-a asarij i yiḍuman akked wafrasen ara yeččen azal n 8 yikatren- héctares- seg teẓgi-agi ur nuklal. Ɣef aya imezdaɣ n lɛerc n At jennad ikcem-iten reffu, ugin taxazabit-agi ara d yeglun s lemḍera i wayen ɛzizen ɣef ulawen-nsen: isekla akked tagant( la nature). Azal n 2000 n yemdanen id yestenyan rrabul( petitions) akken yir asenfaṛ( projet)agi ad yettwakkes, imi ɣef akken ttwalin nitni a yagi d-atɛeddi neɣ d anɣa( crime) mgal agama. Timacinin yettwaceyɛen ɣer umkan akken ad bdun-t lebni n ubudu-agi, ttwaḥabsen-t sɣuṛ imezdaɣ n Uɣrib mačči d yiwet n tikelt. D ayen id yewwin ula d lwali s timmad-is ad yerzu ɣer din ass-n n 16 deg aggur agi deg nella akken ad yesɛeddi, s ssif, asenfar-agi ugin medden . Zzun d zzit ɣef tmes, tirza-agi n Lwali terna tesmenteg reffu n imezdaɣ n At Jennad yugin lmenker yecban wagi.

 Amek id ixf-is, amek id tifrat n tadyant-agi? D ussan kan ara d yinin. Maca yettɣaḍ nezzeh lḥal ad iwali umdan ayen ɣef seḥrarben lejdud-nneɣ d leqrun aya, ad yenger kan akka s ssebba n yir amteddu n lecɣal akken iwata. Meɛna di tmurt anda amdan s timmad-is yella kan d war azal, anwa ara yeggen ccan neɣ leḥsen i tiẓgi neɣ i useklu: agrireb ( ɣelluy) uqbel ad yili deg ifri yella di ṛṛay id nnan imezwura.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Ass n lhedd- nni yezrin tessuli tedwilt tis 06(seddis)n tfaska «uḍan idelsanen»i d-suddes tdukla tadelsant «asafu»n taddart n tewrirt n Lḥeǧaǧ i yezgan deg at yanni di tzeqqa n u$erbaz amenzu «Smadḥi muḥemmed ameqqran». S lemɛawna n tɣiwant n at yanni ,axxam n yilme²éyen,tanmehla n yidles ; d tdukliwin niḍen. Tafaska-agi yella-d di lmendad_is 16n yicennayen n teqbaylit,gar-asen : ḥusin waḥyun, silya uld muḥend ; Tawes Arḥab… atg, d terbaɛt n legnawi i d-cebbhen tameɣra s zedwa, yella-d daɣen uneḥdur n warmuy(monologue) ; ticeqqufin umezgun ,d terbaɛt n cna n yigerdan imezyanen ; d ayen yellan d amaynut aseggas-a.akken i yessenmer di taggara mass Yasef Arezqi ; aqerru n tdukla- –agi yakk i wid i d-yefkan afus n tallalt akken i yefka igerdasen $ef tselmadin i d-yufraren.

 Lqdic-agi yebḍa s wudem unṣib ɣef 03 wussan, si 03 almi d05 seg aggur-agi n Yulyu. £as akken xussen wallalen i as d-yettunefken i tdukla tadelsant «Asafu»maca tessaweḍ ɣer yisw-is ɣas akken abrid-is mazal-it iḍul imi tessaweḍ azal n 750n yimerza i d-yusan ɣur-s yal ass aseggas-a d ayen $ef acu ur bnin ara. Ahil n tdukla tadeksant «Asafu»d amerkanti ,yessefreḥ imezdaɣ n tewrirt n L heǧaǧ imi deg-s tawaksa n lxiq $ef wulawen aladɣa mi yulint akka tfasniwin n lḥamu ussan- –agi ineggura, deg-s da$en afares n tegnit n usgunfu d timlilit ger twaculin n taddart amek i d-yusa di lemtel’’ ass yifen ussan mi ara temlil tasa d wayen turew.”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Lameyya URAK 

  
 Imi yettili-d umussu asdukklan deg yirebbi n tmetti, simmal ḍerrun-d uḥerrek d uqeddic, simmal yuttuɣal-d wannect-nni s ubaɣur (lfayda) i temnaḍt merra. Tesɛa tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel ugar n 20 n tdukkliwin, yal yiwet deg wanwa annar i tqeddec. Ta tmal ɣer yidles, ta ɣer tmetti, ta ɣer waddal, tayeḍ ɣer usegmi, ɣer ddin…atg. Maca, wiss ma nmuqel amek i d-yettili warmud (activité) sɣur-sen deg teɣzi n useggas, ma ad naf ahil d win yeččuren, d alemmas, neɣ d ilem cwiṭ s umata ? 

 Akken i d-nenna, ɣas aṭas n tdukkliwin i d-yennulfan deg Ayt Smaɛel yal yiwet deg taɣult, maca gar tid iqeddcen akka tura drus i yellan. Ad d-nebder Tiddukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad s umsizwer-is n tmedyezt, win n yiqennucen, asfuggel n yimulliyen imaziɣen, asebɣes n yinelmaden, asker n trebbuyaɛ n uẓawan, d waṭas n yiqeddicen nniḍen. Tiddukkliwin «Tiɣri» d «Tafat n Lɛali» (Nur El Iḥsan), ɣas nnulfant-d ilindi kan, aṭas i xedmen i lfayda n tmetti, n umeɛḍur, n umuḍin, d uẓawali.

 Deg wayen yeɛnan aḥuddu ɣef twennaḍt, ala Tiddukkla Tussnant Takulujit Takkuct i yettḥerriken cwiṭ ayyuren iɛeddan. Deg uḥric n waddal daɣen, aṭas n tdukkliwin i ɛerrḍen ad ddunt i yidis n yilmeẓyen, am Terbaɛt Tanaddalt Tabujadt Asirem, s taggayin-is (catégories) n ddabex n uḍar, Hapikidu, d uqdac n tmaẓwalin. 

 Tiddukkla Tanaddalt Tadukkli n tazzla, Tarbaɛt Tanaddalt n Karaṭi, Tarbaɛt-nniḍen n waddal n YusikanBudu. Yuɣ lḥal, nger tamawt dakken d leqdic n tdukkliwin n waddal i yezgan wala win n tdukkliwin-nniḍen.

 Deg yiwen n waqqa, llant tdukkliwin d timeẓyanin bdant la d-tteffɣent i wannar, am tdukkla Tinmettit Tadelsant Tamellaḥt. Tarbaɛt Tanaddalt Tabujadt Itri, Tidukkla Tinmettit Timɛiwna. Akked Tdukkla Tadelsant Tinmettit Tagmat. Imi i d-iban wazal n tdukkla d wayen tettag deg taddart, yessefk anadi ɣef wahil n tdukkliwin-a d wuguren i tent-yettaǧǧan senqasent deg warmuden.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Tamnadt leqsar d yiwet si temnaḍin leqbayel i d-yezgan di tubiret , d yiwet n temnadt tettwasen s uzemmur anda imezdaɣ n tama-agi tuget deg-sen sɛan azemmur am wakken tettwasen s tfellaḥt , ɣef waya tiwaculin n leqsar bdan acraw uzemmur ussan-agi iɛeddan imi ṭṭaqa n twaculin fɣent ɣer uḥriq uzemmur ɣas akka yella usemmiḍ d ugris dacu ayagi nnument ɛlaḥsab nsent wekkdent akken acraw uzemmur d yiwen seg ansayen yettwasnen i mazal ṭṭfen deg-s yimezdaɣ n tama-agi , Nnan-d akken ttrajun lawan uzemmur am waggur n lɛid imi d tagnit anda ttemlilen akk iɛeggalen n twacut ttezind akk ɣef lqaɛ d yicagwen n tzemmurt am zun d tabaqit n seksu i wumi dezzin , Si tama nniḍen ayen id-yufraren di lawan uzemmur ɛlaḥsab kra n temɣaren ula d rrac imecṭah hemlaen tallit uzemmur ladɣa ussan n yimuras imi ttafend iman nsen ttezin di lqaɛn tzemrin leqḍen ula d nutni iɛeqqayen yeɣlin yerna ttaken afus lemɛawna seqdacen-ten mi ara ḥwaǧen taɣawsa , Am wakken id aɣ-d wekked yiwet n temɣart tennad ɣas akka nettefɣ-d s azemmur tikwal nettaf d asemmiḍ ur nettuɣal ara ɣer yixxamen nettruḥu mi neweḍ s amkan anda ara necrew ad nejmaɛ isɣaren d yiceɛwawen ad nceɛel timest ad neseḥmu cwiya umbaɛd ad nɛeddi ɣer ucraw uzemmur s yin akkin almi d lawan imekli ad ḥebsen ad ččen imekli ad steɛfun dacu kan lmekla id-ttawin imi tettwaḥsab si lemwaken n wansayen d aɣrum n temẓin d zit akked yiḥbuben d ttmar i s wayes ara ččen , Si tama nniḍen nsteqsa yiwet n temɣart ( xalti ḥedda ) ɣef lmakla -agi ma yella ayagi tufam ɣur wat zik neɣ ami ttura kan tenna-d belli ayagi nufat-d si zik si lejdud-nneɣ , ihi yesefk fell-aɣ ad neṭṭef di leɛwayed d wansayen id-ǧǧan lejdud , am wakken nesteqsa xalti ḥedda ɣef uzemmur aseggas-a di tama -agi ma yurrew neɣ ixus tenna-d belli asegga-s ixus mliḥ ma yella nmuqqel ɣer yiseggasen iɛeddan ad d-naf asegga-agi ur yurriw ara mliḥ yerra llant kra n tzemrin ur sɛint ara ula d aɛeqqa , Ma yella d tizemrin nniḍen am tid yurwen cwiya anaf aɛeqqa- nes d arqqaqan acku txus lehwa iseggasen-agi ineggura s waṭas yerra llan wid ur ixeddmen ara tizemratin nsen ur ten-tfersen ara , Tenna-d daɣen azemmur di temnadt-agi yuɣal deg iseggasen-a ineggura yal aseggas amek ara yili imi aseggas ad yarew mliḥ ma d aseggas nniḍen yettxasa meḥsub aseggas ad tilli lɣella ma d aseggas nniḍen ulac , ayen yerran lwelha -nneɣ deg unadi –agi nneɣ ad d-naf akken tamnadt-agi tesɛa azemmur ula d tisyar uzemmur llant s waṭas dacu ɣas akken bdan xeddment maci acḥal-ayagi yerra yal yiwet seg-sent sɛant tirac uzemmur ṭṭaqa seg-sent ččurent d tirac uzemmur , Si tama nniḍen anaf ula deg iberdan ilmeẓyen s teckarin uzemmur imi ttaɣen ttɛawaden-as lbiɛ s ssuma 60 -70 idinaren i kilu ttawint ɣer temnaḍin ur yesɛin ara azemmur ttnuzunt s ssuma 150 idinaren alami d 200 idinaren i kilu dayen yettuɣalen s lfayda tameqqrant i yilmeẓyen , am wakken id aɣ-d wekkdent kra n twaculin mi ara d -zḍen zit xedmen tiɣrifin s zit ajdid daɣen dehnen i warrac id-ilulen imiren i wid ur yesiwḍen ara aseggas di lɛemr-is , ɣef wannect ad d-naf di temnadt-agi sexddamen zit uzemmur s waṭas deg useggi nsen meḥsub d yiwen usafer agejdan . 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Abdelhak Menas 

  
 Abrid aγiwan yettawin γer taddart n Yilyiten deg tγiwant n Saharidj yekkan seg wasif Asemmaḍ a-t-an deg yir liḥala, imi mačči d yiwen neγ d sin n yimekwan i yenṭarren deg-s. Segmi kan tɛedda tegrest, aṭas n yikettiren i d-ibanen deg-s d ayen i t-yessawḍen ass-a yebda yettax almi ur yeshil ara uɛeddi deg-s. Ggten akka yicektiyen γer tamiwin yemxallafen almi i d-teffeγ yiwet n tesqamut tamcarekt gar tγiwant d twilayt i wakken ad as-swejdent ayen iwulmen i useggem-ines. D acu kan, ar ass-a mazal ur d-iban kra, γas ulamma deg tizwar taγiwant n Saharidj tessebgen-d ula d takebbanit ara ixedmen uqbel ad d-yili uɛiwed n tmuγli deg ubeddel n kra n lecγal. Ayen i yerḥan tura imezdaγ n taddart-a dakken simmal yettɛeṭṭil lhal, simmal abrid yettzad deg usyax-is. 

  M.Smail 

  
 tebda tmeɣra n talaɣt ass n 25 deg yulyu 2016 deg Lexmis n Mɛatqa. Akka am yal aseggas, xeddmen timsikiniyin , srusun-d akk allalen i d -yeffɣen seg talaɣt. Deg-s ad walin wid i d-yettasen lxedma txeddem tmeṭṭut taqbaylit , deg-s d tuṭṭfa deg leɛwayed n tjaddit . Ad teqqim lxedma–agi n ufexar, tasuta ad tt-id-tettağğa i tayeḍ imi leḥwal i d-itteffɣen d wid icebḥen s waṭas. Ayen i as-yernan ccbaḥa, d isekkilen n tifinaɣ swayes i tt-zewwiqen , d kra n usuneɣ icudden ɣer timuzɣa d teqbaylit. Ttasen-d ɣer tmeɣra-agi seg yal tama n tmurt n Lezzayer. Deg-s ttwalin ccbaḥa n wallalen-agi, deg-s ttaɣen-d akken ad cebbḥen yis-sen axxam, neɣ ad ten-sxedmen i wučči , ama d tiḍebsiyin, tiqbucin d waṭas n leḥwal. Yal tama, amek i asen-ttsmemin, tameɣra-agi ad tdum yiwet n ddurt kan , ayagi sḥasfent fell-as kra n tlawin ixeddmen talaɣt, am akken i d-tenna yiwet n tmeṭṭut ixeddmen armud –agi neɣ lḥirfa-agi Massa Caɛlal Tasaɛdit n lexmis. Limer tettaf, ad tdum ugar n wussan, mačči yiwet n ddurt kan. Tebɣa ad as-fken afud, ad tkemmel deg lxedma –agi mačči d taruẓi ara as-ṛzen ifadden . Tebda ass n 25 deg yulyu tekkfa ass n 29 deg yulyu-agi drus , nessaram irmuden n leqbayel d wansayen , ad qqimen i lebda wa ad nernin imi idles-nneɣ akken ad yennerni ilaq-as wafud , yerna timetti-nneɣ d agerruj i tesɛa, am akken yeqqar umedyaz Ayt Mangellat «Idles , ḥadret ad terrem gar yiɣuraf akken ad aɣ-teṛzem»

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia  

  
 Ass n lexmis yezrin, tamehla n Usegmi n Tubiret tessewjed-d yiwet n temlilit anda myagaren inemhalen n 53 tesnawiyin, imaswaḍen, tajmaɛt n yimawlan n yinelmaden, isandikiyen d yiɛeggalen n tɣamsa. Deg beddu n unejmuɛ-agi, anemhal n Usegmi Mass Mourad Bouziane yenna-d : “ Timlilit n wass-a d tin ara ɣ-yeǧǧen ad d-nessuk tamuɣli ɣef yigemmaḍ n lbak iɛeddan, s yin ad nwali igemmaḍ i d-ḥellan yinelmaden deg ukradyur-a amezwaru». Dɣa d yiwen n uxeddim lqayen i d-iheggan kra n yilmeẓyen d telmeẓyin yellan deg unaris n uwelleh. S ya ɣer da, anemhal n usegmi yeggar-d iman-is iwakken ad d-yessebgen kra n yiɛewwiqen d leɛyub I yellan deffir n uwexxer n uswir n leqraya. Almi d taggara n ubeggen n yigemmaḍ, yebda yiwen n uskasi qessiḥen yerzan aserwes gar yigemmaḍ n lbak iɛeddan d wid n ukradyur amenzu. S Tidet, assaɣ mačči d win i d-ibanen d uɣdim, acku gar snat n liḥala I nwala, ur d-yelli wayen yeddan akken I yetturaju. Aya, nwalat deg tesnawit n Lakhdaria i d-ihellan amkan wis sin deg lbak iɛeddan, meɛna deg ukradyur tella-d gar tneggura. D ayen yeǧǧan aṭas seg wid i d-yemmeslayen ad d-inin dakken igemmaḍ-a ineggura mačči d wid I d-yettbegginen aswir aḥeqqani n yinelmaden. Ama d inemhalen n tesnawiyin neɣ d imaswaḍen, awal yezga itezzi ɣef wamek ara d-ssalin igemmaḍ s usnerni n uswir ? Yal tikkelt ad d-yennulfu rray, meɛna llan akka wid i d-yemmeslayen ɣef wazal I tesɛa lɛessa d uheggi n yikayaden, am yiwen n unemhal i d-yennan : «Nekni nettmagar taluft n lɛessa i yettaǧǧan inelmaden ttemɛawanen deg lawan n yikayaden mebla ma yella-d fell-asen kra n lḥers. Mi d-wwḍen ɣer tesnawit, yettban-d uswir-nsen aḥeqqani. Ɣef waya, aqel-aɣ, s lebɣi-nneɣ, mi d lawan n yikayaden, ad neffeɣ seg temnaḍt-nneɣ iwakken ad nexdem anda nniḍen, iwakken s ubeddel-a ahat ad beddlent kra n leɛwayed yeccemten udem n uswir n yinelmaden-nneɣ.» Dɣa ayen yessetḥeyren s waṭas anemhal n usegmi mi d-tettwabeggen tfelwit amek I d-usant twilayin deg lbak yezrin, anda Tubiret yeṭṭfen amḍiq wis 28. Yenna ɣef waya : «Amek akka i aɣ-ifent twilayin yellan deg tneẓruft ur nesɛi ara ttawilat I nesɛa nekni ? Tiǧiratin-nneɣ yecban Tizi Ouzou, Boumerdès d Médéa zgant deg yimeḍqan imezwura, i nekni acimi ur nettaweḍ ara ?» Ɣer taggara n temlilit-a, iɣerbazen yellan akka deg taggara n tfelwit deg yigemmaḍ n ukradyur amenzu qqimen deg tzeqqa iwakken ad kemmlen axeddim ukkud tseqqamut n yimaswaḍen anda yeḥḍer ula d anemhal n usegmi. Dɣa da, yella-d wawal ɣef ubeggen n yiɛewwiqen i ttmagaren yinemhalen-a almi igemmaḍ xuṣṣen. Askasi d win ɣezzifen imi aṭas n tlufa i d-yettwaskeflen tid ahat yellan deg waṭas n liḥalat d iɛewwiqen i leqraya. Seg tama, tasqamut n yimaswaḍen tbeggen-d lebɣi-s iwakken ad tɛawen ama d iselmaden neɣ d inemhalen deg unnar iwakken ad tessizdeg tagnit I uxeddim iwulmen. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli ass n letnayen iɛeddan, yella-d uxeddim yecban wa yerzan aswir alemmas, am wakken yetturaju ad d-yili daɣ unejmuɛ ukkud uswir amenzu deg yimalas-a ideg nella. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Smail. M 

<div> 
  
 Ayen yeḍran ilindi i terbaɛt n ddabex n uḍar n Tuddsa Tanaddalt n Ayt Smaɛel (USAS) atan amzun ur tettwalmed temsirt-is, ur yessecɛef ama d wa neɣ d win. Ma neẓra belli d asinaryu n yilindi i umi i d-tettales terbaɛt-a n yilemẓiyen n Udrar n Fad i yetturaren deg talɣuɣa n uḥric n yiseɣ n waɣir n Bgayet. Segmi tebda deg wass amenzu nettat txeddem ala igemmaḍ i yessefqiɛen wid i tt-iḥemmlen, almi ur iban anda-t uɣilif, ma deg uswir n talɣuɣa, neɣ deg tedbelt, neɣ deg yimyuraren, neɣ wissen d acu. Daymi nefka asteqsi-ya i yimḍebber amezwaru n terbaɛt, aselway-is mass Zuṭaṭ Kader, i aɣ-d-yennan dɣa: « sebba mi tella ass-a terbaɛt n tuddsa tanaddalt n Ayt Smaɛel deg yizireg azeggaɣ mačči d yiwet. Tazwara, ayen mi nexdem aqlaɛ d iri-t ussan imezwura. Tis snat d allalen, ilaq ad teẓreḍ dakken tirebbuyaɛ merra i iẓewren deg talɣuɣa-ya sɛan-tt ayendin d adrim, ttaɣent-d imyuraren ifazzen, rnu ttxellisent-ten akken ilaq. Seg waya ihi, tella sebba nniḍen; tin n uswir n yimyuraren ed telɣuɣa s umata ». Negza seg wawalen n win i aɣ-d-yettmeslayen dakken tarbaɛt n Ayt Smaɛel ur thegga iman-is akken ilaq, seg lexsas n wallalen, bac ad tqabel aḥric-a n yiseɣ n ddabex n uḍar deg twilayt n Bgayet. Ma yella ɣef yimal n terbaɛt-a, meḥsub ma tezmer ad teslek seg usubbu, skud d ayen i iceɣben imezdaɣ inaddalen n Ayt Smaɛel, Kader yenna-d ɣef wanect-a: « mazal nesɛa tawenza-nneɣ gar yifassen-nneɣ akken qqaren. Acku mazal ad nurar 14 n temliliyin. Maca ilaq ad ilin yid-neɣ wid terza taluft bac ad neg i warrac ttawil ad rnun ad qedcen. Tikwal ula d aman ulac swacu ara asen-d-naɣ ad swen ». Akken i d-yettban, llan kra n wuguren i as-yugin i terbaɛt ad tecceɛceɛ, maca ur ifut wakud ma bɣan ad zdin yifassen bac ad teṭṭixxer seg tura terbaɛt seg umḍiq aneggaru, war ma tesɛedda arjuj n yilindi i tt-yeǧǧan temneɛ kan s tmara seg tɣelyawt. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi  

  
 Tewḍed tagrest , tewwid yid-s  ssem-is.  Isɣaren yembarzaɛen di lexlawi  bezgen. Ma d wid yedurin lḥid , ḥadmen. Aten-nni di tesga ḍelqen.  Liqa-nsen  yeqquren  tebda-t targagit. Ẓran acu iten-yegunin : leqrar-nsen  d lkanun. Taggara-nsen d iɣiɣden. Tikwal ay aḥbib, ttif lexlawi m yegris wala tizeɣwa m times.  Allaɣ isebken , yebɣa ad yaf abrid ɣer tafat. Dderz n tsusmi yetthuddu iɣulad n lefhama. Ayen yettwaskelsen ɣef tasfift n waktayen yewwid zhri-is ɣef lemwaji n ccuq. Timucuha-ak a wul dirit-ent! Ddnub-is d-asmi akken ifaq belli  afurk ɣef i nejguggel yerka. Widen yettmeyizen gzin anamek n wawal: “ ma tesuliḍ… d ilem i terniḍ. Ma tesgrarbeḍ..d-ilem i tesnerniḍ”. Iniɣman ifesren di ṭerḥa, lxuf-nsen werǧin yelli d taweka.  Netta la d yettmeslay. Ɣef yinyen teɣalayt tesbuxur  iragen-is. Wissen medden ma ẓran acu akken id ttewwen? Leqwa yeɣunza ufenjal, tesṛuḥ lbena-as deg yimmi n lqum yeččan deg uɣunja. Nesla-as asmi id yenna : “a bab n leqdra, dawi neɣ awi s lemɣewla”. Oh ay aḥbib, ur iduwa ur yewwi. Ayen iɣ-yewwin d-ahdum. Ayen iɣ-yerwin d zyada n unezgum. Tisirt mi aren ten-taɣ deg leryac, ula id-as d-  is xedmen yiɣuraf. A bu yiwet bru i snat amer tis tlata ad –ak texḍef! Yeɣli lmizan i wawal. Annef ihi ad rɣan yisɣaren. Akka id d-udem n tagrest. Tesiɣzif di lxiq n umawan. Win iɛabden cyaḍ…yemuger iṭij s tesmeḍ. Ugin ad neflan yissafen. Ctaqen deg urɣu ad rran ttar. Aman yettazalen lemden aḥnunef n wazrem. Wama d-kečč neɣ d-nekk nessen lhejna n wawal: “ asmi akken yettṛaḥ lbarud, timerkaḥin ttlent deg meɣrud. Tura mi yettraḥ ulaɣmud,bgensent timerkaḥin ɣer leqyud”. Iban tura amek akken i t-cudd. Siwa tislit is-yesnan i usennni n yizuraz. Lqid-ik a gma d-iman-ik, lḥebs-ik d yir tikli-k. Akka i d udem n ctawi. Wa ihamel adari wa yettraǧǧu deg leḥmali. Tecfa-m asmi i t-id-yenna: “ argaz yedreɣlen yesla/ I ugugam yenna/ aten ssem di tarbut”. Ulac tislit deffir uẓeṭṭa. ulac amɣar nnig tasga. Ulac  arrac ara d yezzin i tamɣart ad annin timucuha. Tura lemqud ɣer tiqfilin. Tagamin ɣer timudiyin. Yelha ẓwic deg lyali. Rɛacen yizilan ɣef ayen ite-yeǧǧan.  Amerḍil tikelt-a wissen ma ad yerḍel?   Xas yebɣa ad yerḍel  ur d yegri acu ara yerḍel.Nesla kan mi id as yenna: “ ma nedda nendem, ma neqqim newhem”. Ay aḥbib dari lḥiḍ , xas nnig-as ulac Ṛebbi. Akka  i d-cetwa. Yal taqenuzt s nnuba-s.Ɣef ufagag n lḥir-ik tdelqeḍ ulman n lɛedz-ik. Sebba tella : Sebken yidamen. Qujren yiḍaren. Ddubzen wallaɣen. Gersen wulawen. Xas akken, ahat,tecweḍ tasa! Lhiba tamaɛlalt tecba tasa uyaẓiḍ. yak nniɣ-ak: “ anida teqras…deg amdiɣ deg ik-teɛkkes”. Ma yekrez unyir s lmeɛun n tizelgi-k , lɛib deg tiregwa-s i yedewir. Nnan-ak si zzman:  “a bu watmaqen, win ik-yukren arkas d atmaten”. Ayen tumza ɣef yixef , ma yella win is yunnin tiklin deg uqaru d icc n yilef? Ay aḥbib ɛaḍf-as neɣ xelfa-s, ṭelqa ik yurzen yiwet!  Akka i d-tagrest. Tssettu leqher n tmes. Tecfiḍ asmi rɣant tizegwa. Isekla negren , kečč thuzeḍ tuyat. Deg ufezqi n “wacɛendi fih”  i tkemneḍ lebɣi-k. Tegzem-ḍ –as ula d nnefs. Teqdeɛḍ-as aḥarek. Yecbek!  Tedra-tt yid-s am uferṭeṭu yedewiren ɣef lambat. Ur yeseḥama, ur iwala. Yeknef kan yerɣa ur d yeseweḍ ṛṛuḥ a teɛeddi  cetwa. Ahat  lemnaɛ yella di tmettent … anda neẓra nekni? Widen yesnan , xas akken snan, ayen akken snan ur d yegli s tusna. Tusda mačči d –asmed neɣ d adukku.  Asmed, tikwal, dzyada n  taẓayat ɣef yixef. Akka id as-nnena asmi akken akk d  tugdi nemyufa. Aciwen xas ma bernen, werǧin suksen-d lefrisa deg yimmi n yizem. Ḥnunfent tigecrar. Iles yemceḥ aɣebar. Maɛna yelha uɣabar , yessen ad yesmundel allen. I wumi allen i lqum yuɣunzan awali? Ayen yefran deg ikufan, d yir cḥani a win id –ak-yeḥkan. Siwel tamacahut…neɣ mulac taqṣit-ik ɣer twamust n tmucuha bru-tt! Seɛbent ctawi  ɣef win yettun tebrek n tafsut. Seɛbent ctawi ɣef win ur neddir izilan unebdu deg ḥarqen n Busɛadda. Seɛbent ctawi ɣef win ur nerssin d acu I d-ndma. Deg umawan id yettmektay lmal ayen yexdem deg-s leḥṣum. Walli  a gma tuga, xas teqqur ad tenunet. Walli a gma tizegwa , xas rɣant ad leqḥent. Walli a gma tiregwa, xas fudent  ad jemɛent. Walli a gma lɛinṣer, xas yeqqur ad ifegeḍ. Iggeni ur yelli d aɣedar, yewwi-d asigna s lqis. Akal ur yelli d anekar, yefka-d amud-is s lqis. Ulayɣer ad nesetɣfer , nekni ur d neǧǧiw ur ken-nettxeliṣ.  Akka i dudem nesɛa. Akka i nemuger cetwa. D asḥurejdel i d- tikli-nneɣ. D asfrefed i d-anadi-nneɣ. D asseɛillew i d-tamuɣli-nneɣ. Nɛamed leɛyub ɣef yixef. Nɛamed yir awal ɣef yiles. Newwi yir tesmin d aggus. Agusim am lḥirqus nettnadi isufar-nsen  deg idmim. Nezwi akarmus s umelway, nelqeḍ azemur s uqarac. Anda-tt, imi akka,  lwehma ma nelleɣwi, anda-t lɛar ma  nemyezwi?

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Akka, am yal tikkelt, tamkerdit n tmaziγt tettnerni s yidlisen i d-yettefγen. Deg wussan yezrin, d Rachid Adjrane, i d-yernan azru n lebni n tutlayt-a s yiwen n wammud n yisefra i d-yessufeγ. Azal n 18 n yidrisen iwumi yerna tasuqqilt s tutlayt tafransist. Deg yisefra-agi, ad naf ahric ameqqran yurez γer tayri, degmi dγa i as-yefka azwel n ugerruj n tayri. Ma neɛred akka ad nγer kra seg-sen, ad naf dakken Rachid d win thuz atas taluft-a n lehmala, imi di yal tikkelt yettarra llum γef yiman-is amzun akken ur yesɛi ara zher. Ayen akka yura umedyaz n Tubiret, ur yehbis ara dagi, maca iruh mebɛid i wakken ad d-yessukk tamuγli-s γef yisental-nniden. Lγerba, tin akken ijerhen taswin, tessebɛad ulawen, yefka-as azal deg wawal-is. Tamaziγt, tin akken ɛzizen fell-as, yerra-as azal deg usefru mi d-yenna : ‘’d kemmini i icebbhen iles-iw’’. Taggara, d lmehna i d-yebder Rachid, imi d tin i yezgan tessikir deg yimdanen almi ttawden ttidiren deg lmerta.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail M.  

<div> 
  
 I lmend n umecwar ɣezzifen n ccna i d-yewwi unaẓur ameqqran Slimani, suddsen-d wulmisen n yidles, yecban; Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Axxam n yidles Mulud At Mεmmer n temdint-agi, d Umazday n yirmad idelsanen d inaẓuren, Asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Tizi Uzzu, s tallelt n Tiddukkla tadelsant “Anẓar” n At Yanni, sendiḍelli n sed 20 seg maggu 2017, yiwet n tejmilt s wazal-is i unaẓur ameqqran n tezlit taqbaylit. Wagi d Slimani, yiwen gar lecyax deg uẓawan n tmurt n leqbayel. Yella-d leqdica-agi deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu.Heggan-d yiwen n wahil d anesbaɣur; imi sendiḍelli ɣef 10h00 n sbaḥ i tebda tejmilt-agi s wudem unsib sɣur tanemhalt n yidles n Tizi Uzzu Massa: Goumeziane Nabila. Dɣa deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin tella-d yiwet n temsikent n tesfifin-is tiqdimin d imagraden n tɣamsa yettwarun ɣef tudert-is d leqdic n urgaz-agi ameqqran. Am wakken daɣen i d-sneεten yiwen usaru i d-yewwin ɣef tudert n ufennan-a aqbayli aqbur, ɣef 10h30 n uzal deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun. Ma ɣef 14h 00 d afella, tella-d temlilt d unaẓur-agi, syin d tameɣra meqqren n ccna, sɣur waṭas n yifennanen. Tella-d diɣ tnigit sɣur twacult-is d yimeddukkal-is

  A. A. 

  
 Sidi Lḥaǧ Saɛdi, yusa-d netta d gma-s Mḥend Saɛdi si Terga Zeggaɣen deg unẓul n Lmerruk ar taggara n lqern seṭṭac. Tamurt tettak-iten i tayeḍ alammi d-wwḍen ɣer Delles, syin kemmlen ɣer Mizrana. Mḥend Saɛdi, iqqim iṭneṣṣel din di Mizrana, ma Lḥaǧ Saɛdi ikemmel abrid-is, iwweḍ alammi d taddart n Tala xlil deg At Dwala. Isbedd axxam deg udrum n At Turtit. Imiren, At Fayed d Wat Turtit llan ttnaɣen, ur mtawan ara, yal wa i yiman-is, Taḥeccaḍt di tlemmast n taddart, tuɣal d talast gar-asen. Yiwet n tikkelt, iɣli-d lehlak n ttarka ɣef udrum n At Fayed alammi iruḥ ad inger. Sekkṛent tewwura, gten lmeytin, mi ɣzan i yiwen, ad uɣalen ɣer wayeḍ akken azal n ddurt. Akken ad ḥerzen ɣef terwiḥin-nsen, kra ffɣen ixxamen-nsen, ruḥen rewlen ɣer lexla, zedɣen deg yitemma, wiyaḍ guǧǧan ɣer wanda-nniḍen, ǧǧan taddart. Sidi Lḥaǧ Saɛdi, iwweḍ ɣer Tḥeccaḍt, ɣer tlemmast n taddart, anda tella talast gar udrum n At Fayed d Wat Turtit, irfed taεekkazt-is s igenni, iwwet-itt s lǧehd, irṣa-tt di tmurt, syin yenna-as: “Wellah! Ar ttarka, ad teḥbes da. U sya d asawen fkiɣ aqeṛṛu-iw fell-asen”. Kra n wussan, tterka teḥbes, At Turtit ur ten-tḥuza ara, menɛen. Ma d Sidi Lḥaǧ Saɛdi, yerna snat n ledwar dɣa immut. Almend n usmekti n wass-nni, imezdaɣ rṣan tlata n yizra n tnicca deg wadeg-nni deg irṣa Sidi Lḥaǧ Saɛdi taɛekkazt-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Ugar n 10% n wid iɛeddan 40 n yiseggasen, yettḥaz-iten lehlak n wazi (reflux gastro-oesophagien). Tikkwal, aneggaru-a, islalay-d ddeqs n wuguren di tudert n umdan imi ad yettuḥettem fell-as, ad yeṭṭixer i ddeqs n leṣnaf n wučči neɣ ad iteddu s tɛeqqacin n lisṭuma i lebda.

 D acu-t wazi? Acu-tent ccirat –ines? Amek nezmer ad t-nekkes? d isteqsiyen i ɣef ara neɛreḍ ad d-nerr dduṛt-a. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> D acu-t waṭṭan n wazi ? 

 D aṭṭan yeṭṭuqten, yettnernin mkul aseggas. Itekk-d seg walluy n wučči si lisṭuma ɣer ugerjuj, umbeɛd aṣubbu-s ɣer din, deffir telqimt. D lehlak yettruḥun yettuɣalen, s umata d axfifan. D acu, llant kra n tegnatin timengar, anda yezmer ad d-islal axenzir (cancer) n ugerjuj, labeɛda ma amdan ikemmel i yiman-is s yir tannumi n wučči .

<p style="text-align: center;"> Acu-tent ccirat n lehlak-a ? 

 Wazi, s umata, yettban-d s uqraḥ akked imirẓig. Aqraḥ-a, amzun d urɣu, yettḥaz tifkert n wul, yettili umbeɛd talqimt, labeɛda ma yeṭṭinnez umdan neɣ yuɣal d tinnegnit. Ma d imirẓig, d aman iwraɣen, imerẓuga, ttalin-d arma d agerjum neɣ d tanzarin. Terẓeg-nsen tečeṭṭin ayendin tudert. Acu kan, llant kra n ccirat-nniḍen iteffren lehlak-a: aqraḥ n uɛebbud, aseblaɛ iweɛren, iriran, tuzzya n leɛqel…atg. Tikkwal, arma yennerna wazi, ara as-ifaq umdan.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Amek nezmer ad t-nekkes?  

 Ɣas yettili-d usnulfu, mkul aseggas, di ttawil n usejji mgal wazi, ad yeqqim lsas n uḥareb seg-s d aqader n ddeqs n yiwellihen am tikli deffir telqimt d uṭixxer i uṭinnez akked d tguni, tiririt n lewhi ar yal učči i d-yeslalayen wazi, d usenɣes-nsen syin tawakksa-nsen seg telqimin n yal ass am, ccrab, ddexxan, tassemt, lqahwa, ccakula, laḥrur, ayen qessiḥen (ifelfel aqesḥan, lahrisa akked tlimett d lgazuz. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima Dali  

  
 Tebḍa Rğawna ɣef snat n tuddar. Seg sbiṭar Sanatorium d asawen, d taddart n Lbour, anida yella uɣerbaz alemmas atmaten Malki d uɣerbaz amenzu, kra n tḥuna d leqhawi. Ad tkecmeḍ taddart tis snat Tacht, ad tafeḍ dinna lemqam n Sidi Beloua uɣur i d-ttasen aṭas n lɣaci. Am wakken yella, daɣen, uɣerbaz alemmas aqdim d uɣerbaz amenzu Bounar Belkacem , llant tḥuna yemxalafen, xas ma Rğawna d snat n tuddar ɛlayen , yesɛan tafulki , teqreb ɣer temdint, maca aṭas i d-yettasen n yimdanen ɣer dinna , yal wa sani i d-yettruḥu abeɛda imuḍan i iqesden sbiter n Balwa maca ad naf iberdan-nsen d udyiqen mliḥ , ɣzen yakk. Dɣa ddurt kammel, inehharen beddlen abrid, acku taddart n Lbour xedmen deg-s iqadusen n usufeɣ n waman, uɣalen ttasen-d seg taddart n Tacht. Bḍan ifurguten, llan wid yettawin kan ɣer sbiṭar akked Tacht, llan wiyaḍ, ttawin ɣer sbiṭar akked Lbour ayen i yestqelqen imuḍan d yixeddamen imi i d-yettili-d cwiṭ n leɛḍil. Ɛyan yinehharen seg ucetki akken ad d-yili useggem n yiberdan-agi, maca yiwen ur d-yerri i teɣri-nsen nnig n semmus n yiseggasen-aya, nutni d acetki ulac. Zgan inehharen d imenɣi anwa ara yeğğen wayeḍ akken ad iɛeddi. Msefhamen yimezdaɣ n Rğawna akken ad ɣelqen iberdan deg ussan i d-iteddun, maca ayagi ad d-yawi lemḍara ama i yimuḍan ama i yinelmaden ara yesɛeddin irmawen n ukradyur wis sin. Llan wid yebdan ass n ahad , llan wid yebdan ass n acer 26 deg furar, ɣef waya mi d-nesteqsa inehharen d yimezdaɣ n Rğawana, tiririt-nsen yiwet : «neɛya , neṣber, neṣber ulac d acu ixedmen iberdan, simmal ttkemmilen xessren, ar melmi ara nettrağu, tewweḍ tfidi s iɣes’’, i d-nnan

<p style="text-align: right;"> Z.A.Y. 

<div> 
  
 Wid akk yettidiren i qerben ɣer umaḍal n tzizwa, seg yimrebbiyen-nsen ɣer medden i tetten tamemt, gren tamawt amek yewɛer taggara-a, ad tafeḍ tiẓeḍt i d-ixeddem ubeɛɛuc-a aseɛdi. Am wakken yewɛer ugar, akken ad tt-id-taɣeḍ, abeɛda ɣur kra n yiterrasen. Aɣilif amenzu, n tuqin n tamemt, yekka-d seg tallit-a i nettidir gedged, ideg tettheggi tegrest i tuffɣa, tettqarab-d simmal tefsut, tasemhuyt n tzegzewt d yijeǧǧigen i beqqunt tzizwa. Awal n kra n yimrebbiyen n tzizwa yezzi kan ɣef waya; ur d-tettili aṭas n lɣella deg tegrest, armi tettxussu deg yal amḍiq n yidurar. Ma yella d ugur wis sin n teɣlayt n tamemt, ula d win icudd ɣer wayen i d-glan wayyuren-a yezrin, imi aṭas seg wid yesɛan tamemt senzen-tt deg umwan iɛeddan. War ma nettu wid i itekksen i yiman-nsen. Ihi mi ulac-itt, yewɛer ad tt-tafeḍ, teggra-d kan ad teɣlay. Tettawaḍ ssuma-s ɣur kra n yikerrazen armi d 7000 n yidinaren i ukilu. Seg tama-nniḍen, ur yeǧǧi lḥir wid yennumen tamemt, ɣef wamek ara afen tamemt taqurant. Imi imɣaren-nneɣ qqaren-d: ‘’akken ad d-fkent tzizwa tamemt yelhan, ilaq ad ksent aṭas deg lexla, ur ilaq ad asent-tettakkeḍ aṭas n ssker’’.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

<div> 
  
 Tezzi-d tura ddurt neγ ahat yiwen n yimalas segmi uγalen yinelmaden γer uγerbaz. Wiyaḍ i tikkelt tamezwarut ara yawḍen γer twacult-nsen tis snat.Ɣer leḥsab n yigemmaḍ i d-tefka teγlift n usegmi, ad naf d akken 4 373 222 n yinelmaden deg uγerbaz amenzu, 2 820 172 deg uswir alemmas, 1 222 687 deg tesnawit. Seg twilayt n Ouargla i d-tefka Massa Benghabrit licara n unekcum s wudem unṣib s aγerbaz anda i teḥder i temsirt tamenzut yerzan ttrebegga d uḥareb γef twennaḍt. Tamsirt-a d tin i d-yettunefken ass amenzu deg merra n yiγerbazen n tmurt, imi d tallit iwulmen i wakken ad tennerni deg yiman n unelmad leḥmala n twennaḍt, tezdeg d useḥbiber γef ugama. D tagnit daγ i tneγlaft n usegmi i wakken ad d-tbeggen abrid i d-tenjer d wayen yetturajun ad yaweḍ γur-s uγerbaz azzayri. Aḥric agejdan d win yerzan aswir ilaqen n yinelmaden, win ara d-yasen s lxedma d ubeggen n lebγi. Ɣer tama n waya, Massa Benghabrit, tressa tikli n useggas-a aγurbiz γef « Aγerbaz aγerman amerkid » win ara yefken tagnit i yizzayriyen i merra ad γren deg uγerbaz anda ara d-awin tamussni d tussna. I useggas-a, am wakken i yetturaju, deg uγerbaz amenzu, ad d-yili umaynut deg wahil yerzan aswir wis kraḍ d wis ukkuz, imi tullsa n tira n wahilen tella-d yakan s teγzi n useggas yezrin. D ayen ara yeğğen imaswaḍen ad ilin deg lmendad i yiselmaden ara yeṭṭfen iswiren-a i wakken ad ssifsen fell-asen taɛkemt. D acu kan, ayen ttaggaden yimawlan d lixsas n yiselmaden i tarwa-nsen. Ɣef leḥsab n wayen i aγ-d-yewḍen d isallen, deg waṭas n temnaḍin, iγerbazen ur ten-tḥuz ara taluft-a, maca yella wanda i d-yella lixsas, labeɛda deg tudrin ibeɛden. Ulamma tella-d akka temsizzelt deg waggur n γuct yezrin, mazal kra n yimukan ur ttwaṭṭfen ara. Aya, d ayen ara d-yilin s uɛeggen-nsen seg lejrida n leɛdil. Ma d ayen yerzan adlisfus, am yal aseggas, mazal akka ddeqs n yiγerbazen i yettrajun ad t-n-yawed, ahat d yiwen n uɛewwiq i d-yettuγalen yal tikkelt.

  M. Smail 

  
 I lmend n usmekti n umulli wis mraw (10) n tmenɣiwt n Aissat Rabah, deg 12 tuber 2006 , tella-d tezrigt tis 4 n temsizzelt ‘’Aissat Rabah n taddart tazeddgant n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu’’.

 Ɣef waya, anemhal n twennaḍt, Mass Messella Mohamed , yemmeslay-d amek i d-tella temsizzelt-agi. Aseggas ummid, nutni ttruḥun ad d-walin tuddar yettekkin. yYewweḍ umḍan n tudrin i ixedmen timsizzelt-agi ɣer 73, aseggas-agi. Ma deg useggas n 2013 llant 39. Yettili-d usizdeg ama deg yiberdan, tiliwa, d tajmeɛt, lemqamat , lebni n yixxamen n yilmeẓyen , timkerḍiyin d waṭas nniḍen. Cebḥen –tent s yijeğğigen , sbiɣa. Lxedma –agi n tezdeg deg yal taddart, xedmen-tt s tcemliyin , d axeddim igerrzen n yilmeẓyen , iḍefren abrid i d-ğğan lejdud. Timsizzelt-agi, texleq-d tismin gar tuddar anta ara d-yufraren d tamezwarut . Ayagi, d ayen yesefrahen imi tismin ɣef tezdeg d uɛaned , d useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt, rnu ɣer waya, tafulki n tuddar n leqbayel, cebḥent seg zik. Maca s uwennaɛ d ureqqaɛ-nsent, kemmlent ccbaḥa. Anemhal n twennaḍt yenna-d dakken yewɛer akken ad textireḍ anta i izeddigen imi 73 d tid yettekin, 25 d tid ixedmen ayen iwumi zemrent akken iwata , maca seddis kan i d-yufraren. Drus , gar tuddar-agi i d-yufraren, ad naf tamezwarut d taddart n Boumessaoud deg tɣiwant n Imsouhal , deg Iferhounen, taddart tis snat Aourir ouzemmour deg tɣiwant n Akbil, Ain El Hemmam, taddart tis kradet taddart n Bouaouen n Idjer, tis ukkuẓet taddart At Adella deg Abi Youcef n Michli, tis semmuset taddart n Boudjellil n Irdjen, tis seddiset d taddart n Ait Izid deg Souk Letnin Aneɣlaf n tezdeg n twennaḍt i iḥedren i tikci n warazen deg uxxam n yidles Mouloud Mammeri ass n umhad, 13 deg tuber 2016, netta seg tama-s, yefka i taddart tamenzut i d-yufraren, Boumessaoud, 10 n yimelyunen n yidinaren, semmuset i d-yegran daɣen, wwint amur-nsent. Aṭas i d-yusan ad walin , ama d tidukkliwin, ama d imdebbren n tɣiwanin d tudrin. Yerna aneɣlaf n tezdeg n twennaḍt iṛeggem-asen belli iseggasen i d-iteddun mačči kan seddiset n tudrin , s kra n tin ara yettekin ad tesɛu arraz , ɣef leɛtab ittɛattiben, abeɛda ilmeẓyen. Ayagi d ayen yessefraḥen s temsizzliyin yecban tigi , ma qqiment zeddigit tudrin, ur neḥwağ ara timdinin , ilaq ad neseḥbiber ɣef ugerruj i nla ( nesɛa), akken ad nhader tawennaḍt ur ttnesebluluɣ ara.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 I lmend n usfugel n wass aɣelnaw n useklu d wass agraɣlan n teẓgi, Tiddukkla tadelsant «Tigejdit» n taddart n Ait Zaim, yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Maâtkas, tesuddes-d tazrigt tis sebɛa n tfaska n tzemmurt. Tella-d tmeɣra-agi deg tlemmast n taddart, tedda ɣef teɣzi n 4 wussan, imi tebda ass-nni n ttlata 21 seg meɣres, temdel tiwwura-s ass n sem 24 seg waggur-agi ideg nella. Aṭas n yidisan i d-isuddsen leqdic-agi, gar-asen , Tiddukkla tadelsant «Tigejdit» akked Tesqamut n taddart n Ait Zaim, Taneɣlaft n yidles, Aseqqamu aɣerfan awilaw n Tizi Uzzu, Aseqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Maâtkas, d waṭas n tesyar n uzemmur ama d tiqburin neɣ d titrarin…Ahil yettwaxedmen, yella-d d amerkanti sɣur imsuddsen-agi, aṭas n yirmad i yellan deg ttiɛad, gar-asen tirza ɣer tesyar n uzemmur tiqdimin d tejdidin n tama-agi. Sneɛten-d amek i d-yettili uleqqem n uẓebbuj i wakken ad yuɣal d tazemmurt. Aṭas n temsikniyin i d-yellan, ideg i d-seknen leṣnaf n zzit n uzemmur yellan, d wid n uzemmur, tin tewsatin yemxalafen n tamemt, d tin n talaɣt. Am wakken diɣen i d-llant temsikniyin-nniḍen yecban : tiqnedyar n Leqbayel, isufar i d-ittekken seg zzit n uzemmur, lfeṭṭa, idlisen…atg. Yella-d daɣen usenzi s ubuddu sɣur waṭas n yimyura d yimedyazen, d waṭas n temsikniyin n yidlisen sɣur kra n tezrigin n tmurt-nneɣ. Mebla ma nettu isaragen i d-fken i yifellaḥen d wid yellan deg taɣult-agi n tfellaḥt. Llant-d diɣ tmeɣriwin n ccna sɣur waṭas n yicennayen iqbayliyen. D waṭas n tɣawsiwin d yirmad-nniḍen i d-yellan ɣef teɣzi n 4 wussan-agi, ideg i d-yella ttiɛad. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>
