<p style="text-align: right;">   Azzedine Abdous 

  
 Mazal yettkemmil umaru, amedyaz, Mass Abdelnasser Rabia asufeɣ n yidlisen n yisefra. Seld sin yimezwura i d-yessaẓreg ilindi kan, neɣ deg useggas n 2016, yiwen s teqbaylit iWumi isemma: « Abrid n usirem », wayeḍ s tefransist, yefka-as azwel: « Les blessures du temps », yuɣal-d aseggas-a mmi-s n Tubiret, n temnaḍt n Cerfa, s udlis-is wis kraḍ i yesɛan isem: « Les espoirs perdus ». Taktabt-a tamaynut, teffe¥-d ass n 17 deg wayyur-a n ṭuber, ɣur teẓrigin Merabten n Tezmalt. Ma nemmeslay-d ulamma cwiṭ ɣef udlis-a i d-ilulen, ad d-nini d akken yettawi ddeqs n yisebtar, iɣef rsen 31 n yisefra, ttwarun ɣef qeddac n yisental yemgaraden, yessetna-ten umeskar am tezrart s wawalen d yisekkilen. Gar yisental-nni, ad naf wid n lɣerba, tayri, timetti, akked tejmilin. Maca tuget seg-sen, d wid iɣef yettwaḥuza umedyaz Abdelnasser Rabia, neɣ d wid i yesnernan asḥissef d ameqqran, ama deg wul-is, ama deg wulawen n yimdanen s umata. «Ssefriɣ aṭas ɣef leḥzen d yiɣeblan n tudert deg tektabt-iw tamaynut. Yal amdan, iban ur yelḥiq ayen yebɣa merra di ddunit. Ɣas yella wayen yessarem yiwen yewweḍ-it, lameɛna yella usirem ur yezmir ad t-yelḥeq. Dɣa yettili-d wass ideg yettruḥu usirem-nni seg wulawen n wid yessaramen», i d-yenna Mass Abdelnasser Rabia. D aya i t-yeǧǧan ad yefren i tektabt-is azwel-a: « Les espoirs perdus ». Yuɣ lḥal, adlis « Les espoirs perdus » yella tura deg tnedlisin, yettnuzu s wazal n 100 n yidanaren. 

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Uggur n lexṣaṣ n tedrimt tabaranit (Euro), d win id-ibbanen di deqs n lbankat n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, di ssin wagguren yezrin (yennayer d furar). Annect-a ibban-d deg yemdanen i itteqsaden lbankat yemgaraden, am BDL n Wizgan, BADR n Yiɛeẓẓugen d tid niḍen, xarṣum wid yefɣen tastaɣt, ttcetkin ɣef lexṣaṣ-agi d laɛḍil id-yellan di laxlaṣ-nsen, imi llan yemdanen ger-asen imɣaren meqqren ttasen-d ɣef 03 n ssbaḥ d araju s zdat n lbankat rnu kkaten-d amecwar ɣezzifen di temnaḍin ibaɛden akken ad-qḍun tiɣawsiwin-nsen, maca ttuɣalen d ilmawen.

 Ɣef annect-a, imdanen-agi id-ijebden tadrimt-nsen di lbankat sarmen akken aɣbel-agi n lexṣaṣ n tedrimt tabaranit, ad-yefru ɣef zik lḥal i usenqes n taɛkkemt fell-asen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Anwa uṛ nessin aṛa Louiza tanaẓuṛt taqbaylit yesɛan taɣuct yesfan am aman? Tacennayt-agi yesɛan amezṛuy deg cna aqbayli, tekcem ɣeṛ umaḍal n cna deg useggas n 1978. D dda Slimane AZEM is-d ixedmen lkuṛaǧ imi yesla i taɣuct-is, tɛeǧeb-as aṭaṣ ! Seg tezlit ɣeṛ tayeḍ, seg tesfift ɣeṛ tayeḍ, Louiza texdem yakan isem, tewwid amkan-is geṛ inaẓuṛen imuqṛanen. Louiza iwumi yenna yiwen wass unaẓuṛ Idiṛ: « Mti t-cennuḍ as t-iniḍ d-iduṛaṛ n tmuṛt leqbayel i yecennun! ». Tanaẓuṛt-agi tecna ɣef yidles Amaziɣ, ɣef yizeṛfan n tmeṭṭut, ɣef yiɣublan n tudeṛt, ɣef tayṛi lakked timeɣṛiwin. Imesfliden ufan ayen bɣan deg tizlatin-ines acḥal ḥlawet yeṛna s ṣṣut-is ḥninen aṭaṣ. Akka, aṭaṣ i d-yennan belli Louiza d taɣuct geṛ tuɣac n tcennayin ifazen aṭaṣ deg cna aẓẓayṛi. Tizlatin-is ttwasnent aṭaṣ deg wannaṛ n cna aqbayli. Abṛid i d-tewwi ɣezzif. Ɣuṛ-s akka azal n 40 iseggasen deg waḥṛic n cna. Teskles azal n 25 tesfifin neɣ n-iḍebṣiyen. Nna Louiza tettaṛu isefṛa, txeddem aẓawan, tesseklas tizlatin-ines. Ttacennayt s wazal-is. Tikkelt-a, tessufeɣ-d aḍebṣi amaynut ass n 8 deg Maɣṛeṣ yezṛin. Textaṛ-d ass-nni n lɛid amaḍal n tmeṭṭut, imi d-azamul n-umennuɣ ɣef yizeṛfan-is. Louiza d yiwwet akkeni n tmeṭṭut tagṛawliwt, yekkaten ɣef yizeṛfan n tlawin s-umata. Ɣef ayagi i textaṛ ass-nni n 8 deg Maɣṛeṣ akken ad d-ssufeɣ aḍebṣi-ines wis 25. Wagi t-semmay-as : »Afus-ik deg ufus-inu ». D tiɣṛi i waṛgaz, azgen nniḍen, akken ad mmuqlen imal di sin yidsen, imi ddunit tebna fell-asen. D tiɣṛi daɣen i waṛgaz, i gma-s, i wemɣaṛ-is akken ad dduklen afus deg ufus akken ad idiṛen deg telwit, mebla caḥnat, mebla iniɣ geṛ tmeṭṭut d waṛgaz. Aḍebṣi-agi id d-tessufeɣ Nna Louiza llant degs azal n 10 tezlatin. Geṛ-asent nezmeṛ ad nebdeṛ: « Dayen uṛ ttamen-ɣ yiwen », « Aṛqiqes! », »Uṛiɣ-ak tabṛatt », »Usiɣ-d ɣuṛwen », »Ttɣiḍen-iyi yilmeẓyen », »Anef-t-iyi! ». Tizlitt-agi taneggaṛut, « Anef-t-iyi! », d yiwwet akkeni n tezlitt anda Louiza tegeṛ-d tiɣṛi i tmetti akken att-fek tilleli i telmeẓyin, iḥussen iman-nsent am akken ttuaṛzent s laɛwayed lakked d ttɛessast. Deg tezlitt-agi, Louiza am tnaẓuṛt yeṛfan, tecna: » anef-t-iyi uṛ ay ttɛassa-t aṛa. Anef-t-iyi kṛa uṛ texdim-ɣ aṛa. Anef-t-iyi ɛeẓṛayen uṛ t-ugad-ɣ aṛa. Anef-t-iyi ulac win yemmuten yuɣal-d. Akken aɣ-id yawi lexbaṛ. Aɣ-i-d-yini f-ayen yeẓṛa. Ma d elḥaq neɣ d elbaṭel ». Ayagi d tiɣṛi n tiɣuwwewt n tmeṭṭut yebɣan atteṛṛeẓ ackal i as d-yexdem weṛgaz seg zik. Louiza uṛ t-ttezzi aṛa iles-is sebɛa tikkal deg yimi-s akken ad d-ini ayen yellan ɣef wul-is. Yuɣ lḥal d nettat, am tinaẓuṛin nniḍen, i d-iles n tlawin yettuḥeqṛen deg yixxamen nsent, neɣ deg yixeddim nsent. Ma newwid awal ɣef tezlit nniḍen, tagi d « Aṛqiqes! ». D yiwwet n tezlitt yelhan aṭaṣ aṭaṣ, imi tessawal i cḍaḥ d lfeṛḥ. Akken medden ad ksen ɣef ulawen nsen yeččuṛen, yagi deg yiseggasen-agi n tezɣent, anda tamɛict tuɣal tuɛeṛ aṭaṣ ɣef yiẓẓayṛiyen. Ma wezzil wawal, ad d-nini kan belli aḍebṣi-agi aneggaṛu n Nna Louiza yelha dayen kan. T-geṛz-it mliḥ deg yal tama, ama d-aẓawan, d-isefṛa neɣ d taɣuct. Imesfliden uṛ nedmen aṛa ma slan i uḍebṣi-agi n Louiza, yeqqimen akka ttilemẓit.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syohax.Y 

  
 Yemma-s tεuhed Ṛebbi, tedda-as di lebγi. Tuγ-as aεeqqa issawalen, terna-as alγem d taklitt. Taqcict teddem-iten, tuγ abrid-is, tṛuḥ ad tnadi γef watmaten-is. Teggul, tenna-as: «Ɛahdeγ-k, a Ṛebbi, ur d-nṭiqeγ alamma d asmi ara d-nnulfun watmaten-iw». Tṛuḥ, tiγilt iwumi tfel γas ta, tiγilt iwumi tfel γas ta. Armi qrib ad taweḍ, taf-n yiwet n tala n taklatin. Yuγ lḥal, txutel-itt deg ubrid taklit, tuker-as aεeqqa-nni yessawalen. Mi tfaq teqcict-nni, yaf-d lḥal ur tezmir ara ad as-tsiwel imi tεuhed Ṛebbi ur d-tenṭiq alamma nnulfan-d watma-s. Mi wwḍent γer tala n taklatin, tenṭeq γur-s taklit tenna-as: «Sired tura dagi». Taklitt teẓra d acu i d lmeεna-s. Teddem teqcict tessared di tala-nni, dγa tuγal d taklit taberkant ula d nettat. Ddant, ddant, ddant… armi wwḍent γer tala n tḥerṛiyin, teddem talkit-nni aεeqqa-nni yessawalen, tessared yis-s din, dγa tuγal taklitt d tacebḥant. Mi d-kkrent ad kemmlent abrid, tettu-n aεeqqa-nni yessawalen di tala. Armi wwḍent γer watmaten-is, taklit-nni terra iman-is d nettat i d uletma-tsen. Feṛḥen yis-s, rran-tt d tamṛayt n uxxam. Ma d uletma-tsen rran-tt d taklitt, tkess-asen ileγman. Ttaken-as taḥbult n uqecquc. Kul sṣbeḥ, ad teddem taḥbult-nni, ad tenheṛ tajlibt-nni n yileγman γer teγzut ad ksen. Mi tewweḍ γer din, ad tali s ufella n yiwen uẓru, ad tcennu: «εlay! εlay! εlay! Ay aẓru! Ay aẓru! Ad waliγ tamurt n baba d yemma! Ad waliγ baba d yemma! Taklit rran-tt i uxxam! Uletma-tsen rran-tt i yileγman! Rut ay yileγman ma ad trum! » Dγa ileγman-nni msakit ad ttrun, ala yiwen, d aεeẓẓug. Akken, akken, akken armi d yiwen wass, yenna-asen yiwen deg watmaten-is : « Ileγman-inna-nneγ simmal ḍeεεfen. D acu ten-yuγen akka? » Wayeḍ, yenna-asen: « Wissen acu i sen-tettak εni taklit-nni? »… Tettkemmil…

  Seg tgemmi taqbaylit 

  
 Ur tgerrez ara liḥala n udawi deg sbiter n Uqbu. Gten wid yimauḍan yettrajun, xussen aṭas n ttawilat, ladɣa imekwan akked tzeɣwin. I wakken ad iwali umuḍin uamejay, ilaq ad iraju ugar n tlata n tsaɛtin, acku ttilin kan sin n yimejjayen i wacḥal n medden. Agemmuḍ n yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Uqbu, yettnerni seg wass ɣer wayeḍ : nnig 1OO alef, ma d sbiṭar yeqqim d win akken kan i t-id-teǧǧa Fransa. Tikwal imuḍan ur ttafen ara amkan ideg ara ḍelqen iman-nsen, wama tezdeg, dayen-nniḍen, mačči tikelt neɣ snat i d-rbant tlawin deg yixxamen acku ulac imukan. Ma nmuqel akka ɣer wallalen yellan di tɣiwant, ad naf belli tezmer ad tbeddel liḥala deg i yella sbiṭer ass-a. Ma fkan-d afus n tallelt. Maca, aya werjin yella d aɣilif-nsen, yettawi-t-id umeddaḥ di teqsiṭ di lawan n tefranin kan. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> B.B 

<div> 
  
 Llant ussan-agi deg tmurt n Fransa aṭas n tedyanin i yerzan ladγa aswir aɣerfan akked usertan imi, deg tefranin n uḥric amezwaru, bedden-d kra n yimakdaren n tama tazelmaḍt akked teyfust, llan daγen wid i yellan deg teyfust d tqernit akked wiyyaḍ. I wakken ad d-nessefhem aya, ilaq ad nẓer amek i leḥḥunt tefranin deg tmurt-agi. Taselwit n « François Hollande » qrib ad tekfu imi tebda seg 2012, tasgagt n uselway n tmurt-agi, tettaṭaf 5 n yiseggasen. Deg tegnit gar 2012 akked 2016, ḍrant aṭas n tedyanin; aṭas gar yiγerman n Fransa ur asen-teεǧib ara tselwit n Hollande imi tasertit-is teḥres-iten deg texlaṣ n leɣramat n yal ṣṣenf akked temεict i yernan ɣlayet, rnu ɣer waya, caḍent tṣerrifin, ladɣa rrebrab i yewten ussan-agi i yezrin deg tmanaɣt « Paris » akked « Nice » d yimeḍqan-nniḍen; izeggad deg lxuf n yifransawiyen yerna ixleq-d « Tislamufubit ». Tasertit n Fransa s umata tebḍa ɣef 03 n yiḥricen igejdanen : 

 
 1- Win n teyfust deg wacu i llan « Igduden » i yettsenεit umakdar « Fillon ». 

 2- Win n teyfust taqernit i d-tettsenεit « Marine Le Pen » 

 3- Win n umur aẓelmaḍ i d-yettsenεit « Jean Luc Mélenchon ». Llan widak n tlemmast d aɣen, maca ur sεin ara azal sdat n wid i d-nebder aya. Deg umur amezwaru, bedden-d 11 n yimakdaren, gar-asen ilaq ad d-bedden sin seg-sen. Imi fukkent, tuγ bedden-d « Emanuel Macron » akked « Marine Le Pen », sin-agi, bedden-d i wakken ad sneεten iman-nsen i umur wis sin n tefranin yellan ass n 7 Maggu i iɛeddan. Macron, iqqar : « Nekk ur ttekkiγ d yiwen seg-sen » imi aṭas i as-yeqqaren d akken d « Hollande » i t-iεawnen s yimeɣnasen i t-id-yettcekkiren i wakken ad ikemmel deg tsertit-is (« Macron » yella uqbel d aneɣlaf n tiẓraf n « Hollande »), maca lxuf n wiyaḍ yella deg « Marine Le Pen »; ugaden ad tawi amur wis sin, acku ahil-ines, ẓẓaren belli deg-s ccek, gar tenqiḍin n wahil-agi : Tuffγa seg uttekki n udrim n « Euro », aεiwwed n leqwanen i yeεnan timinigt ..atg. Abrid-agi deg wacu i t-tewwi « Marine Le Pen » amur amezwaru, yesmektay-d asmi i t-yewwi baba-s « Jean Marie Le Pen » deg 2002 sdat n uselway afransawi « Chirac », imir-n d aɣen qrib yewwi-tt baba-s deg umur wis sin. Ass-nni n Larebεa 03 deg Maggu, mlalen « Macron » akked « Marine Le Pen » i wakken ad gen inaw d uzɣan gar-asen sdat n yimeɣnasen i ten-yessteqsan ɣef wayen i bɣan. Idelli n lḥedd i fernen aselway n tegduda n tmurt n Fransa, akka i xtaren Macron i wakken ad yili d aselway n tmurt.

  Abdennour Hamitouche 

  
 Ilmend n tuγalin n yinelmaden γer leqraya useggasen 2015/ 2016, imawlan n yinelmaden tteqsaden s waṭas tiḥuna ideg iznuzuyen dduzan d tγawsiwin n leqraya, akked tiḥuna i ittewxeṣen i lebsa n warac imecṭaḥ. Maca tuget n yimawlan n yinelmaden sḥasfen aṭas γef leγla id-ibanen di lbiε n dduzan n lakul, imi adlis n 120 n yisebtar yeswa 45 n yidinaren, tafelwit 300 idinaren, aqrab ger 1500 d 2800 idinaren, imyuyen n wannuγ ger 120 d 200 n yidinaren…atg. Γef yiles n kra n yemdanen, nnan dakken amdan yesεan ger 03 d 04 n yinelmaden, ur-yezmir-ara ad-iqabel taswaεt. Γef aya mera imawlan n yinelmaden sarmen ad-tuγal rrxa, syen sutren deg yemḍebren taεna temsalt akken ad-gren tamawt i weγbel-agi, akken ad-tenqes taεkkemt γef yimawlan n yinelmaden, d usebγes n waḥric n leqraya.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Mebɛed mi nerza, ddurt iɛeddan ɣer Tala Amara, smana-a, nkemmel srid d asawen, i wakken ad d-nawi awal, tikkeklt-a, ɣef taddart n Tala Mahriz. Tezga-d taddart n Tala Mahriz deg tɣiwant n Irdjen, deg lɛerc n Wat Yiraten deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ɣef usamer-is, ad naf snat n tudrin : Adouz d Ighil n Yifri, ɣef umalu, taddart n Adni, ɣef ugafa, Tala Amara, ma ɣef unẓul, llant,diɣ, snat n tudrin : Boudjelil d Ibehlal.

  Takerḍa n Tala Mahriz. 

 Tebɛed Tala Mahriz ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu s wazal n 16 n kilumitr. Zedɣen deg-s, qrib, 1500 n yimdanen. Llant deg-s rebɛa n tliwa : Tala Mahriz, tala n ufella, tala n wadda akked taɛwint Ou Amar Ou Achour. Am wakken llan deg-s 3 n yiḍwaren : Tazeqqa n Wat Zitoun, Mahriz akked Wat Salah. Ma d aḍwar wis rebɛa, ‘’Tiɛerbiyin’’, yuɣal ɣer tɣiwant n Tizi Rached. Ɣef uḍwar-agi, dɣa, i aɣ-d-yenna Dda Ramdane :’’zik aḍwar ‘’Tiɛerbiyin’’, d aḍwar aqdim, yettabaɛ Tala Mahriz. Deg useggas 1986, kkren-d yimezdaɣ-is, bɣan ad d-kksen iman-nsen seg tɣiwant n Irdjen u ad uɣalen ɣer tɣiwant n Tizi Rached. Ihi, iruḥ uselway n tɣiwant n Tizi Rached akken ad d-iẓer aselway n Irdjen ɣef temsalt-agi. Syin, yerra-as-d uneggaru-a :’’lɣaci ma tebɣiḍ ad ten-tawiɣ, ha-ten-in ɣur-k, ma d akal ula i k-yawin’’. Tala Mahriz, akka tura, ur yelli kra i tt-ixussen : lgaz, iberdan, aman d trisiti. Tesɛa, amekkan n usejji, aɣerbaz i tebna Fransa deg useggas n 1955, lbusṭa, 3 n leǧwameɛ, acu ur ttẓallan ara akk deg-sen akked temkarḍit i tebna tiddukla ‘’Le Défi’’ 

  Isem n Tala Mahriz. 

 Semman-as Tala Mahriz imi winna i tt-yebnan isem-is Mahriz. Deg taddart-a, tamsalt n yisem tefra seg zik. Ẓran akk ansi i d-yekka. Acu kan, taddart ur tewwi ara isem n tala neɣ n tliwa timezwura. Tala-agi i yettusemman ɣef Mahriz, kkan-d waman-is seg tala yellan nnig-s, Tala Ufella. Yebna-tt Mahriz, i yellan d amdan aberran, dɣa semman-as Tala Mahriz. Syin, tɛawed-as lebni Frasa. Tiliwa teqdimin mazal-itent ar ass-a xas ulamma yiwet txab, tayeḍ tergel. Zik, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, tala n ufella, ttagmen seg-s aman n tissit, ma d tala n wadda, ssirident tlawin deg-s iceṭṭiḍen. 

  Imezwura ɣer taddart-agi   

 Amur ameqqran n yimezdaɣ n taddart Tala Mahriz, kkan-d seg Tmazirt i yellan akka tura deg tɣiwant n Irdjen. Uqbel ad zedɣen din, meḥsub deg Tala Mahriz, xeddmen lexlawi-nsen deg uzal, melmi i d-tewweḍ tmeddit ad alin ɣer taddart n Tmazirt ad ṭṭṣen deg yixammen-nsen. Ɣef wakken i d-nnan, imezwura i d-iṣubben zedɣen din d tiwaculin n Wat Zitoun, At Salah d Ibendawden.

  Amezruy d tmetti n Tala Mahriz. 

 Zik, Tala Mahriz tella d azaɣar, d akal n yimezdaɣ n Tmazirt. Ṣbeḥ, ad d-ṣubben ad xedmen tafellaḥt-nsen, tameddit ad uɣalen ɣer yixammen-nsen akken armi d asmi i yebdan zeddɣen dinna. Tala Mahriz, mechuret s tazart, azemmur d ukermus. Tella ar ass-a, deg taddart, tissirt taqdimt n uzemmur (ha-tt-an deg tizi n nger). Nnan-d wwin-d iɣuraf-is i iweznen acḥal d aqendar, seg Wat Dwala. Ṣubben-d adrar, ulin wayeḍ. Llant, diɣ, ugar n sebɣa n tesyar n waman ɣer tama n tassift : teddunt s waman mačči s yiɛidiwen neɣ s yiserdyan. Ẓẓaden yis-sent irden d temẓin. Yeqqim-d ala later-nsent, akka tura : Ur d-yelli kra n useḥbiber fell-asent ; yečča-tent yinejjel. Akken i as-yenna winna :’’am rrezg-ik a mmi, ad d-tekkseḍ tizwal si ṭṭaq’’. 

  Mechuret, diɣ, Tala Mahriz s Ccix-is Sidi Ali Abehlul, i d-yusan seg taddart n Yibehlal. Nennuda fell-as imi yella usefru-a :  

 A Sidi Abehlul amɣar 

 A win iwumi caben yiɣallen.

 Sebɛasnin yedduri lɣar,

 S ddaw n tmurt i yettili.

 Yefka-as jeddi-s lesraḥ,

 Yerkeb ɣef yizem ɛari.

 Imi nesteqsa ɣef teqsiṭ n usefru, nnan-aɣ-d : ‘’ yella Sidi Ali Abehlul yettrebbi izem. Yewweḍ lḥal anda yeṭṭes deg yiwen yifri 7 n yiseggasen mebla ma yeffeɣ-d.Ihi, nebɣa ad nwali ifri-a, ladɣa, imi i aɣ-d-nnan mazal llant tarkiḍin-is ar ass-a. (lmeqsud-nneɣ mačči d asekfel n tidet neɣ n lekdeb. Nekni, iswi-nneɣ d asiweḍ n yisallen akken i aɣ-ten-id-nnan. Syin, yal ameɣri s tikti-ines). Nedda d ṭṭbib Nadir Kechabia. Deg ubrid ɣer yifri i yellan ddaw n taddart ɣer tama n tassift, yal mi ara d-nemlil d yimɣi neɣ d ufrux, ad aɣ-d-yini ṭṭbib-agi ameẓyan isem-is. Akka i d aɣ-d-yesmekti ismawen-agi ur ssinent ara tnuda-s, am : tidekt, uzzu, inejjel, ufni, azeggar, ummad, ulmu, taɣeddiwt…neɣ ismawen n yifrax, am : abuḥeddayed, sibbus, amergu, ajeḥmum, isɣi,tagerfa, lbaz…atg

 Mi newweḍ ɣer tassift, mebɛed mi nelḥa deg teẓgi akked yicerfan amecwar, neṭṭerḍeq srid ɣer umekkan-nni anda yella yifri n Sidi Ali Abehlul. Uqbel ad nṣub ɣer yifri, nwala kra n later i aɣ-d-nnan d tirkiḍin n Sidi Ali Abehlul. D’’tirkiḍin’’ daxel n ublaḍ, meqqrit nezzeh, ad as-tiniḍ n udinuẓur. Syin, nekcem s uḥrured (yedyeqq maḍi) armi newweḍ ɣer yifri-nni anda i d-nnan yeṭṭes 7 n yiseggasen mebla ma yekker-d. Nufa d amekkan i ttẓurun s waṭas, ssaɣen deg-s ticemmaɛin. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Kechabia, tlata n tlawin i yeɣlin seg syin-a ɣer tassift. Yenna-d mi ara d-teffeɣ tmeṭṭut seg lɣar-nni, ilaq-as ad d-teffeɣ temendeffirt, ur ilaq ara ad tezzi s uɛrur. Ihi, mi ara d-tettuɣal ɣer deffir, ad teɣli ɣer tassift i ibeɛden s ugar n 30 n lmitrat : d ilem.

  Nkemmel d akessar ɣer daxel n tassift,anda ttazzalen waman s ddaqa, i wakken ad nwali amekkan-nniḍen ɣef wayeg i aɣ-d-wwin ‘’tamacahut’’(Mythe). Nnan-d, yewweḍ-d lawan n tẓallit acu kan Sidi Ali Abehlul ur yufi ara aman ad yestenǧi. Ihi, iweḥḥa-as-d Rebbi yiwen, yenna-as-d :’’tebɣiḍ agerruj, neɣ aman ?’’. Yenna-as Sidi Ali Abehlul : ‘’bɣiɣ aman i wakken ad ẓẓaleɣ’’. Yerra-as-d winna : ‘’ruḥ wwet taɛekkazt-ik deg uẓru ihen.’’ Ihi, yewwet-itt, syin fekkḍen-d waman, i d-qqaren. Ar tura akka yella yiwen uẓru ameqqran yeflan, tteffɣen-d waman seg ṭiṭuc-nni. 

 Acu kan xas llant tmucuha-agi n zik yessewhamen, llant tid n tura yesseḥsafen u yerna d ṣṣaḥ ḍrant. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, yella yiwen yebɣa ad yebnu, yufa timeqqbert n Ṛruman neɣ n Yiṭerkiyen deg wakal-is. Ihi, yekker yeddem-d yesseftatek iẓekwan-nni, yeddem-d timedlin d uẓru akken ma llan, yebna yis-sen. Yella, diɣ, yiwen umekkan iwumi qqaren ‘’Aẓru ibabben wayeḍ’’. Iẓra-a, meqqrit ayen ddin. Tessewham talɣa-nsen d wamek mmbubben. Ruḥen, daɣen, i wakken ad ten-rẓen, ad bnun yis-sen. Seg tama, la d-ttẓurun kra n yiẓra u ttaken-asen lewɛadi, si tama-nniḍen, la ttruẓun wiyaḍ i wakken ad bnun yis-sen !!! D asteqsi kan.

 Imezdaɣ n Tala Mahriz, mazal-iten ṭṭfen deg leɛwayed-nsen : sɛan ttufiq, xeddmen timecreṭ yal aseggas, ticemliyin yal mi ara as-d-tawi…atg Kra n wudmawen.

 Tala Mahriz, tesɛa aṭas n lecyax n ddin. Nezmer ad d-nader, Ccix Meziane, Ccix Ali n At Salah, Ccix Mohand Ouamer d Ccix n At Moula.

 Sidi Ali Abehlul : yusa-d seg taddart Ibehlal i yella deg tama-nni kan n Wat Yiraten. Yesɛa leqder d ameqqran ɣer Wat Tala Mahriz. Wissen kan awal-agi abehlul ma yesɛa ara aẓar akked Beni Hilal ?

 Mouloud Achour : d aselmad, d aneɣmas,d amyaru. Yura aṭas n wungalen akked tullisin. Gar-asen: Le Survivant et autres nouvelles, Jours de tourments, Le Vent du nord, Le Retour au silence… atg Mohand Amokrane Kheffache : d aneɣmas, d aselmad. Yella deg Fransa, syin yuɣal ɣer Irland.

  Ramdane Chibani : d amedyaz yessawalen lḥenni ar tura. Yessekles azal n 4 CD.  

 Dr Nadir Kechabia : d ṭṭbib n n lmal, d aselway n tiddukla ‘’Le Défi’’, d amedyaz. D amdan yettuqaddren aṭas deg taddart-is imi yezga ɣer tama-nsen deg tesqamut n taddart neɣ deg tdukliwin n tama-nni. Yesɛa aṭas n yigerdasen n leqraya.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Taɣiwant n Tnebdar, d nettat ara yawin arraz i d-tettheggi tesqamut n lwilaya n Bgayet n temsizwert n tezdeg gar tɣiwanin n lwilaya. Aya d ayen i d-berreḥ lwali n Bgayet ddurt yezrin i tɣamsa imi d-yerza ɣer Sid Aich. Tettuɛeggen yiwet n Tmeɣra deg wussan i d-iteddun i tikci n warraz-agi .

 Win ara yerzun, ass-a, ar tudrin n ṭɣiwant n tnebdar i teddun ɣer lɛerc At weɣlis metwal adrar Ukfadu, ad d-yawi ttbut ɣef waya, imi imezdaɣ n tudrin Tala Tagut , Iger Aɛmar , Tiɣezratin, Cbirdu, Tinebdar, sazedgen tudrin-nsen, fkan amedya di tezdeg, fkan-d tamsirt I wiyaḍ. Tidukliwin, xedment lḥemla-t n useɛlem i yimezdaɣ , tijemmuɛa n tudrin ur stahzant ara , yekfa uḍeggar n yiḍumman deg yiɣezrawen d yiberdan, fuken iqerɛunen deg yiberdan . Ula d imḍebbren n tɣiwant d yixeddamen-is ɣef uqerru-nsen, Mass Benaǧin Braham, xedmen tazmert-nsen, heggan imukan deg ara ttwajmaɛen yiresḍan, ikamyunen n usiweḍ n yiḍumman, rezzun ɣer tudrin deg lawan. Ttwaxedmen iqudas n waman n yizuliɣen, ttwaberzent tliwa ..atg . Nessaram, ad tuɣal tɣiwant n Tnebdar d amedya i tɣiwanin-nniḍen n Bgayet I wakken ad ḍefren deg ubrid-is. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> B.Benhamouche 

<div> 
  
 Amaɛḍur deg tudert-is n yal ass yettmagar-d sin n wuguren: yiwen d win n waṭṭan-is s timmad-is, wis-sin d win n yiberdan n tmurt-is. Deg berra, anda ma yerra umaɛḍur ulac aɣerbaz neɣ d tanegga (agence) neɣ d taska (antenne), neɣ d tadbelt (administration), neɣ d asečču (restaurant), neɣ d axxam n tẓuri (am yimaṭṭafen, axxam n yidles, win n umezgun), i ixemmemen fell-as ad as-d-gen amkan send ad ttwabnun. Dima d taɛkemt i as-d-rennun ma yebɣa ad d-yeqḍu ccɣel seg walbaɛḍ n yimeḍqan neɣ yenwa ad yezdi iman-is i wiyaḍ deg tudert n berra. Uguren-a ladɣa s tseddarin (escaliers), iɣeẓran, imedwan, akked yiberdan ur nemmug (non entretenus) i nutni. Ula d tizeɣwin n yimejjayen yewɛer aṭas lḥal fell-asen iwakken ad awḍen ɣur-sent ad gen tirzi (visite). Imḍebbren n tmurt-a ur ten-id-mmektayen ara akken i d-yewwi lḥal ad as-tiniḍ tamurt n Lezzayer ur tesɛa d amaɛḍur. Amek seg tama tadrimt tella, tettruḥu deg yal asenfar, ma yella d ttawil i umaɛḍur deg yiberdan, deg temdint, akked yimeḍqan sanda irezzu ulac ad d-yili? Deg tmura tiberraniyin, amaɛḍur yettḥulfu s timanit (autonomie) tagaɛmirt mara yezger amnar n uxxam-is akken ad d-yeg kra, acku i wanda yebɣa iruḥ llan yiberdan ttwaqaɛden bedemma i tkalict-is neɣ i ukursi-is yettḥerriken. Ula deg tedbelt neɣ deg uxxam n tkebbanit, ma ur yelli wamek ad yefru ccɣel-is seg uqaɛ (rez-de-chaussée) yella umsali (ascenseur) ara t-yeddmen alama d aswir i yenwa. Acimi ihi imasayen-nneɣ (responsables) ur ttekkaren ad gen akken xersum deg yixxamen i inecced s waṭas umaɛḍur, am tdeblin, tikebbaniyin, rradyuyat…atg. Acku, ma newwi-d amedya n Texzant Taɣelnawt n Ṭṭmana Tinmettit (CNAS) n Xerraṭa, amek seg tama tesnubgut s waṭas imdanen-a i tent-yuɣen deg tfekka-nsen, seg tama ula d anekcum-is (entrée) yuɛer ula ɣef win iteddan s yikessulen, aniɛad ɣef win yettkalayen ɣef tkalict. Mi yettwabna uxxam-nni ilaq tili ssemsawan aswir n unekcum akked win n ubrid n baylek skud sdat-s i tella dɣa. Rnu ɣer-s, ayen yesḥissifen ugar amek almi taxxamt anda sɛaddayen asefqed (akuntrul) i yimuḍan-a tezga-d deg uswir anji (1er étage) mačči deg unedda-yen? Lḥasul, ixxamen i ur nefka azal i umaɛḍur caḍen, ɣef waya yessefk s teɣseb ad yettwaɛiwed leḥsab ed tmuɣli i tceqquft-a n medden ifeclen, anda ara asen-yemmag ttawil deg tal tibnit (construction). 

 Imesdurar ttḥeyyiren ugar

 Tudert n yimaɛḍar n temdint akked wid n udrar ur tsawa ara. Imi, akken yebɣu yili, amaɛḍur n waɣir teshel-as tuffɣa akkin, imi sdat n uxxam-is i yella ubrid, ma yella d amaɛḍur n udrar, deg yimi n tewwurt n tnezduɣt-is ad yaf aɣilif amezwar, i yellan, aha d taksart d aḥecrarruf, neɣ d tasawent mm laɛtab. Yettusemma d taɛkemt taẓayant ama ɣef wid i t-yettawin neɣ ɣef-s s timmad-is. ɣef waya, yewwi-d ɣef yixxamen n tɣiwanin s yiwet, ad ttarran kra n tedrimt i tama swayes ara xedmen iberdan i yimaɛḍar-a bac ad asen-ssisehlen tuffɣa ɣer yibilajen. Ur d ayen yelhan ma yeḍḥa-d umaɛḍur d ameḥqur ula deg taddart-is, ed sɣur wid-is. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Tberreḥ-d ussan-agi iɛeddan tneɣlaft n usegmi aɣelnaw Mass Benghabrit Nouria, belli ad tili tegnit tis snat i uɛiwed n ukayad n taggara n uswir n tesnawit, yettwassnen s yisem n BAC, si 13 ar 17 yulyu 2017. Leḥsab n wid ur nesɛeddi ara yugar 70 000 n yisnawiyen deg 48 n lwilayat n tmurt, d lwilaya n Lezzayer tamaneɣt ideg yella wuṭṭun ameqqran deg wid izeglen akayad-agi, imi llan 1248 n yinelmaden i ixedmen agellel (retard), deg-sen 782 n yinelmaden d iɣurbizen, ma d 466 d imjerden imunan (ileliyen). Ma d lwilaya n Tamenraset i yellan deg “lqern n ddunit”, yerna yeḥma lḥal ala 21n yinelmaden i t-izeglen, 9 deg-sen d iɣurbizen ma d wiyaḍ d imunan. Takti-agi, tusa-d mebɛed mi yessuter uselway n Tegduda Mass Abdelaziz Bouteflika deg tneɣlaft n Usegmi aɣelnaw Massa Benghabrit, nettat si tama-s tennad-d ihi, imi aseggas-agi ma tezgel ddqiqa ɣef tsaɛet n ukayad, ur ikeccem ara unelmad-nni, ulamma deg lqanun n yikayaden tella nnefṣ n ssaɛa d azref-is ad d-yekcem uqbel-is, ma d tura ksen-tt ɣef ssebba n tufɣa n yisental n yikayaden-agi. Ad d-nsemkti, belli d tikkelt tis snat ara d-tili tegnit tuzzigt i yinelmaden n ukayad n BAC seg yiseggasen 2000 ar ass-agi, imi tella-d yakkan deg useggas n 2001, ussan-nni n Tefsut taberkant, imi aṭas ur nesɛeddi ara tikkelt-nni deg tmurt n Leqbayel.

   Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Zrin 58 n yiseggasen ɣef wasmi ttwanɣan Amirouche d Si El Haoues. Ɣlin yizumal-agi n lgerra deg unnar n yiseɣ ass 29 deg meɣres 1959, deg udrar Sidi Thameur deg lwilaya n Busɛada.

 Ugar n 11 000 n yiserdasen i d-tessewjed Fransa deg txezzabit i as-d-thegga. Xas akken yesserwa-asen lemrar i lɛesker n afransis, maca ttqadaren-t ɣef liǧal tebɣest d trrugza i yekseb. Aṭas, dɣa,i d-yefkan tinigitin ɣef tissas-is akked tiḥerci-s lawan-nni n ṭrad. Am wakken i uran fell-as yimyura izzayriyen. Ad dènebder kra : «Akfadou, un an avec le colonel Amirouche» n Hamou Amirouche, «Le colonel Amirouche, entre légende et histoire» n Djoudi Attoumi, «Amirouche, une vie, deux morts, un testament» n Saïd Sadi…atg Ilul Amirouche Ait Hamouda deg taddart n Tasaft ougemoun, zik d taɣiwant n Ath Ouacif, tura tedda ɣer tɣiwant n Iboudraren, Ath Yanni. Yewwi isem n baba-s Amirouche, yemma-s d Fatima Ait Mendes yelli-s n Ramdane. Yemmut baba-s, yeğğa-ten-id netta d gma-s. Tewwi-ten yemma-tsen ɣer Ighil Bwammas. Teskker-iten-id dinna ɣer xwal-nsen. Yezweğ d yiwetn tmeṭṭut tettili-as. Yexdem deg Relizane anda yella yesnuzuy lfeṭṭa n At Yanni. Yekcem ɣer tsertit, yeğğa Relizane yuɣal ɣer Lezzayer. Deg useggas n 1955, yella d aqerru n Lwilaya tis 03, netta d krim Belkacem. Yeṭṭef tamnaṭ n Micli ( Ain El Hammam). Segmi yemmut Amer At Chikh, yeqqim deg Ililten. Ttruḥun ɣer At Ouacif ɣef uḍar. Iḥemmel Amirouche ad yelḥu seg taddart ɣer tayeḍ, ur itegg ara akk leḥsab xas beɛden yiberdan. Iḥureb Amirouche aɛdaw arumi s tebɣest meqqren armi wehmen deg-s yirumyen acku ur as-zmiren ara. Ar ass-a n wussan mazal yella yiwen uɛsekri arumi yemlal yid-s Said Sadi mi yella yettaru adlis –s ɣef umeɣras ameqqran Amirouche, yefka-as-d ula dayen i d-yeggran seg ubeckiḍ-is iseggasen-agi kan ineggura yettunefk i usalay n Tizi Uzzu akken ad as-gen leqrar am wakken i as-iga urumi acḥal iseggasen leqrar d wazal. Yemeslay-d ula ɣef tmettant–is i d-yellan deg unẓul n Bousaada netta d Si El Haoues ass n 28 deg Meɣres aseggas n 1959. Mebla ma nettu ameɣras Si El Haoues, daɣen, iḥureb acengu arumi. Isem-is n tidet Ahmed Ben Abderrezzak Hamouda. Ilus aseggas n 1923 deg M’ Chouneche deg Aures, tura d lwilaya n Biskra. Yekker-d deg yiwet twacult tanesbaɣurt, yettwanɣa netta d Amirouche Ait Hamouda deg unẓul n Bousaada sɣur yirumyen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Z.A.Y 

  
 Deg wussan-agi yezrin i d-yeffeɣ udlis n umaru ameqqran d uselmad n tesdawit Mass Moussa Imarazene, iwumi isemma “Awfus n jerrumt n teqbaylit” ( taseddast), i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin « El Amel » deg n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. D wagi i d adlis wis ṭam (08) ara d-yessuffeɣ uselmad-agi n tmaziɣt, ideg i d-yura 46 n temsirin n tseddast taqbaylit. D adlis ara iɛawnen inelmaden n tesnawit d wid n tesdawit, ladɣa wid yeqqaren tamaziɣt. D adlis n 78 n yisebtar, yettnuzu deg tnedlisin s wazal n 250 da. Ad d-nesmekti belli, amaru-agi yewwi-d agerdas Doctora deg tmaziɣt deg useggas n 2007, d aselmad n tesdawit deg ugezdu n tmaziɣt deg tsedawit n Lmulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Yura yakkan sebɛa n yidlisen gar-asen : timɛayin n Leqbayel deg useggas n 2007, awfus n tseddast n tmaziɣt deg 2007, timɛayin-nni 2016, tanmegla n waddad deg tmaziɣt. Taɣuri igerrzen i yimeɣriyen, afud iǧehden i yimeskaren

  A. A. 

  
 Deg wussan-agi iɛeddan, i d-yessuffeɣ Mass Semmani Akli yiwet n tefda n tfellaḥt n tmurt n leqbayel, yessuffeɣ-itt-id ɣertezrigin “Aures Emballages” n Braa Ben Khedda. Iger-d deg-s, aṭas n tugniwin i d-isenfalayen tudert d tɣerma akked wansayen n tmurt n tmazɣa. Llant deg-s ttsawer n kra n yigelliden imaziɣen yecban: Dyhia d Massnssen, akked sin n yirgazen yiwen d agrawliw wagi d Abane Remdane, wayeḍ d azamul n tmussni wagi d Mulud Mɛemmri. Yal tasemhuyt, yefka-d akk ansayen xeddmen medden deg-s s tugniwin. Yefka-d diɣen ussan n ddurt, wid n wagguren, tinilwin s tmaziɣt, yal tasemhuyt yenna-d azemz melmi tbeddu d melmi tettfaka. Ad d-nesmekti belli, Mass Semmani Akli d mmi-s n Trihant, yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Boudjima. D wagi i d amahil-is amezwaru deg unnar n usizreg, tura akka ha-t-an la yettheggi yiwen n udlis ideg ara d-isefhem s wuzig tafda-agi, d wacu xeddmen medden deg yal tasemhuyt n useggas.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ghani Amazigh 

  
  * Tawaɣit deg ubrid aɣenaw asammar-amalu 

 Mmuten sin yemdanen akked ujraḥ n kraḍ yemdanen nniḍen deg yiwen ubaxix id- yellan ass larebɛa ɣef 11:00 n sbaḥ deg ubrid aɣenaw asammar-amalu ɣer tama n temnaḍt talyubin id-yezgan gar sant n temdinin lexḍariya d lqadiriya di lwilaya n tubiret ,anda yiwen n ukamyun yekcem deg yiwet n tkeṛṛust tamecṭuḥt i yellan teddun deg ubrid yemgaraden , dayen id-yeglan s lmmut n sin yilmeẓyen (17/25 di lɛemr nsen) imi mmuten deg umkan -nni kan d ujraḥ n kraḍ yemdanen nniḍen ,dacu kan imejraḥ-agi wwuin-ten s lɛejlan s-ɣur srabes uselek ɣer sbiṭṭar n Ɛmar uɛemran di lexḍriya ,Si tama nniḍen srabes laman tettnadi ɣef uḥeqaq n tedyant-agi acku yal ass ttilint tedyanin yecben tagi deg ubrid-a yettawin ɣer lexḍariya d tmanaɣt n lwilaya , Rnu ɣer s annect-a yettili-d lecɣal deg ubrid-agi aṭas ayagi werɛad it-kemmlen . 

  * Imezdaɣ n yiṣulaḥ ssuturen aseggem n ubrid 

 Mazal imezdaɣ n taddart n yiṣulaḥ di tɣiwant n at leɛziz id-yezgan deg ugafa lwilaya n tubiret ttrajun acḥal iseggasen ayagi aseqԑed n waṭas iɣublan ideg ttidiren di tudert nsen d wugguren iten -yettmagaren ,am wayen yeԑnan abrid yettawin ɣer taddart imi weԑden-ten imḍebre s u

 ɛiwed dacu kan ur d-iban wacema di tilawt ɣef uṣenfar-agi, ɛlaḥsab imezdaɣ wekkden-d akken taddart nsen tettwaɛzal yerra tezgad gar yidurar yeɛlayen i yettwasnen deg at leɛziz ladɣa deg ussan n tegrest cwiya kan n udfel abrid akk ad yeɣlaq dayen irenun di leɛtab nsen ,Si tama nniḍen četkayen si leɣyab n trisiti n yiberdan id-rennun ṭṭlam i taddart imi acḥal-ayagi ur d-uffin yimḍebren tifrat i wannect-a , dayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ četkayen s waṭas i yimḍebren akken ad d-rren lwelha nsen ɣer taddart-a yettwaɣen di yal taɣult s tifrat n yiɣublan akked usemres iṣenfaren di tilawt . 

  * Aseɣḍel n tḥuna ixerben di lhacimiya 

 Yella-d ass larebɛa yezrin yiwen leqdic s-ɣur yimḍbren n tɣiwant lhacimiya akked ufus n lemɛiwna ijadarmiyen s useɣḍel n tḥuna ixerben i yellan di lḥemmam kessana di tubiret ,anda ɣeḍlen azal 15 tḥuna yettnuzun isufar yemgaraden imi ttwaxerbent ur ԑdilent ara akken iwata akked lexsas n usizdeg umkan ,dayen yeǧǧan imḍebren aten-sɣeḍlen iwakken ad d-rren cbaḥa d usizdeg n temnaḍt d usewsaɛ n ubrid ,Si tama nniḍen tella tmesbanit s-ɣur wid yettnuzun imi ur bɣin ara annect-agi .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas Abdekhak 

  
 Qqaren Wat zik. ‘‘I telhiḍ a ṭṭyab lemmer tesseččayeḍ aɣrum”. Akken ula d iberdan n waɣir n Bgayet seg usamar ɣer umalu.

 Ulamma yefka-asen ugama ccbaḥa, ama rrif n yilel neɣ deg yidurar, maca yekkes-asen ugudu kra yellan din i iɛeǧǧben i tiṭ. Amedya n ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9 iɣef ttɛeddayen yigiman n yinehharen yal ass, yuɣal taggara-a, d acekti n medden i yesḥassfen ɣef yir liḥala ideg i t-id-ttafen, ideg i d-ggran yiberdan n Bgayet merra. Ula d iɣriben i d-ikecmen tamurt anebdu-a yezrin, beggnen-d aɣiḍi-nsen seg wayen i ten-id-iqublen deg wakal anda lulen, ama deg yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen neɣ ula deg rradyuwat. Ugar n yiguda d uhicur i yettenḍeggaren teɣzi n ubrid, ama sɣur yimezdaɣ n lemsaqat-nni neɣ sɣur wat tkeryas s timmad-nsen, ad iger umdan tamawt d akken ula d imukan n uḍegger n yiḍumman s ṭṭaqa, ḍḥan-d d ugur awennaḍan inmetti ameqqran. Amedya n temḍiqt n usras n yiḍumman n Uweqqas iwumi ssawalen yiɣermanen n temnaḍt-nni « Agudu n lɛib ». Ama truḥeḍ neɣ tuɣaleḍ-d, yal mi ara ad d-tekkeḍ deg umkan-nni i yumsen, ad ak-d-tewwet yiwet n tziffurt iwumi ur zmiren akk wanzaren. Acḥal i d-yellan d awal ɣef taluft-a, ama i yimḍebbren n tɣiwant n Uweqqas neɣ i wid n twilayt, maca ur d-wwin ara tifrat i tmukrist. Seg tama n umussu asdukklan, ulamma ɛerrḍent ddeqs n tdukkliwin ttheyyint-d tiwiziwin n usisdeg seg usihar ɣer wayeḍ, wanag mačči d ayen i d-igellun s ugemmuḍ i yettsuddun. Meskud akk iḥricen n tmetti uɣen tannumi ẓerren yal akal d amkan n uḍegger n yiḍumman, ur yettishil ara utthenni seg uɣbel-a.

  M. K. 

  
 ’D isem-is, i d lefɛayel-is’’ i qqaren deg umedya. Ihi, tiddukla ‘’Le Défi’’ tjebbed-d tilin-is seg yinzi-a. Mazal wwḍen ɣef tlalit-is sin yiseggasen (tettwaxleq ass n, 28 deg furar 2014), ha-tt-an texdem acḥal d asenfar ladɣa ayen akk i icudden ɣer useḥbiber n tezmert n umdan neɣ n ugama imi aselway-is d ṭṭbib, Dr Kechabia. 

 Tiddukla-a, mačči am tiyaḍ. Tiddukla ‘’Le Défi’’, telha-d s yal aḥric : timetti, addal, idles akked ugama. Tefka azal d ameqqran, diɣ, i teywelt imi i d-tessufuɣ tasɣunt yal 6 n wagguren. Teqqedec deg wakal n tɣiwant n Irdjen, tesɛa tansa-s deg taddart n Tala Mahriz. 

 Deg wahil-is, ad naf : tijmilin i Lmulud Mɛemmri, Smail Yefsah d Matoub Lounes…atg, asbeddi n yiwet n temkerḍit tameqqrant anda i bɣan ad rnun yiwen usaly (le musée), aɛiwen n yimeɣban, ladɣa, deg waggur n remḍan, asileɣ d useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt, temsirin i yinelmaden n yal aswir, isaragen sya ɣer da, timliliyin n waddal akked tmezgunin mebla ma nettu ticemliyin d lewziɛat…atg

 Tiddukla ‘’Le Défi’’, d amedya i wid yebɣan ad mmlen abrid yessufuɣen i yilmeẓyen n tmurt. Iɛeggalen-is, jebden-d i uzekka seg wayen yella iḍelli akken i as-yenna Idir ‘’Seg wayen yellan iḍelli ar d-nejbed i uzekka’’.

 Afud igerrzen i yal yiwen deg-sen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Deg yiwen n ulɣu i d aɣ-d-yewwḍen seg Tmehla n Uḥuddu Aɣerman (Direction de la Protection Civile ) n waɣir n Bgayet ddurt iɛeddan, yedda-d yisalli n teldayt tunsibt n tsemhuyt n unebdu deg Bgayet, ass n 16 deg yunyu, sɣur lwali Mass Uld Saleḥ Zituni.

 ɣas ma ddeqs-aya segmi bdan medden asefqed i teftisin imi lḥal yewwi-d aya. Tigawt-a d tin i d-yeḍran deg teftist n Uweqqas, deg Tala Xaled, sdat waṭas n yimḍebbren idiganen (locaux) akked ddeqs n medden. Akken nezmer ad nɣer deg ulɣu-nni, deg 34 n teftisin n twilayt anda yettuserreḥ uɛumu, iga-d Uḥuddu aɣerman akk ayen ilaqen, ama d irgazen neɣ d ttawilat, akken ad tɛeddi tsemhuyt n useggas-a deg tegnatin igerrzen. Ad d-nebder seg wallalen-a azal n 357 n yiɛessasen n teftisin, 65 n wid yettferrsen deg uɛumu, d imsellken isadaren (professionnels) n Uḥuddu aɣerman, rnu-as 25 n yiɣeṭṭasen isadaren. Ma yella d dduzan i d-yettwaheggan i usellek sɣur Tmehla-a i d-nebder, llan, gar waṭas-nniḍen, 10 n teflukin timecṭaḥ, tikerrusin n usellek, …atg. I usmekti daɣen, ad d-iheggi Uḥuddu aɣerman deg teɣzi n unebdu-a tabniqt (cellule) n uḥesses deg teftisin n waɣir akken ad sɛelmen lɣaci ɣef wayen ilaq ad xedmen imir mi ara d-teḍru twaɣit, ama deg yilel, deg tẓegwa, am undar n tmes, neɣ d isehwa (accidents) n ubrid. Am wakken ara ferqen tiferrawin i d-yessefhamen ugar ɣef yimihiyen (dangers) i d-yettasen seg yibaxixen-a.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi  

  
 Akka, kul ma tiweḍ-d tallit n welqaḍ n-uzemmur tettuɣal-d yiwet akkeni n temsalt ger yimdanen. Tagi d tin yaɛnan lemɛinṣrat, neɣ tissiyar n-uzemmur. Akken neẓra, llant snat n lemɛinṣrat: Tiqburin lakked titrarin. Medden bḍan ɣef sin ɣef ayen yaɛnan tamsalt-agi. Llan widak i d-yeqqaren belli tissiyar tiqburin axir n tmaynutin. Wiyaḍ qqaren-d mgal aya. Garasen, azemmur « yaḥṣel » ger iɣuraf. « Ur yeẓri » anta lemɛinṣra is ilaqen ? Tin nzik? S teqfacin-is, s yiɣuraf-is n wedɣaɣ, s lḥuḍ-is, s lquqna-ines, s userdun-is…? Neɣ d tin n tura yeččuren d timacinin titrarin yettɛewiqen amdan? Tirririt i waya tuɛer, acku lemɛinṣrat-agi di snat yidsen-t sɛant udem yelhan d wudem n diri. Maca, iniɣ s-umeslay yewwi kra n yimɣaren deg tama-agi n’At Ṛẓin i d-yezgan deg wenẓul n twilayt n Bgayet. Ass-nni n aram yezrin, ǧmaɛ liman as t-iniḍ ar d-amgaru yekren ger kra akkeni n yimɣaren deg yiwet n lqahwa. Llan kra qqaren-d i wiyaḍ belli lemɛinṣrat tiqburin « axir », acku, ɛla ḥsab nsen, « ssufuɣent-d zzit azedgan. Ɣas akkeni ur yeṣfi ara, maca ẓẓay yesɛa amureǧ d dwa i bnadem! ». Ayagi mači d rray n wiyaḍ i d-yenan belli zzit n tissyar timaynutin « axir, acku zzit i tefɣ-d yeṣfa, d-awraɣ. ». « Nek ɣer ɣuri zzit ur nesɛi ara amureǧ, mači d zzit! » i yerfa yiwen akkeni n wemɣar. Lḥaṣun, qqimen imɣaren-agi « ttemwaten » s yimeslayen. Ulac wid i ɣelben wiyaḍ. Ma deg tidet, ma wezzil wawal; tissiyar-agi n uzemmur tiqburin d ṣṣaḥ ur teẓment ara akken ilaq azemmur, ɣef ayagi zzit ur d iteffeɣ ara akkit. Yerna azemmur yettwaẓḍen deg lemɛinṣrat-agi i tefɣed ẓẓay, yuɣ lḥal yeččur d-amureǧ. Wagi, d tidet yelha i tezmart n wemdan, ɣef ayagi llan wid i ḥemlen zzit n tissiyar n zik. Yella yiwen wudem ameggaz: zzit-agi n lemɛinṣrat tiqdimin ur ireq ara, ɣef ayagi zzit-is yetɣimi akkeni s lbenna-s, yerna tɣimin degs « Les vitamines », ur reqqen ara. Ma yella d tissyar timaynutin, tigi d tidet t ṣeffint zzit akken ilaq, i tefɣed yeṣfa, ur isseɛu ara amureǧ. Yerna teẓment mliḥ azemmur akken ad ifek akk zzit-nni yesɛa.Dacu kan, timacinin titrarin sruɣuy-ent zzit-agi, ɣef ayagi tettruḥuy-as lbenna, yerna « Les vitamines » reqqen neɣ neqsen aṭaṣ. Syphax Y.

  
 Ass-nni n ssebt iεeddan i yebda leqdic adelsan i d-yettwaheggan i lmend n yimuras n tegrest iɣurbizen, ama deg Uxxam n Yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu, ama deg umaruz-is n Azazga.

 Ttiεad-agi, yella-d gar 24 alamma d 28 deg duğamber 2016. D tagnit ideg ara faṛsen yilmeẓyen imuras-nsen n ccetwa. Ma gar wid i d-isuddsen leqdic-agi adelsan, ad d-nebder: Taneɣlaft n Yidles, Tanmehla n Yidles, Axxam n Yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, d umaruz-is yellan deg Azazga. Ma d ahil yettwajerden sɣur yimsuddsen-agi, d anesbaɣur, imi ttilin-d aṭas n leqdicat deg n Uxxam n Yidles, gar-asen: 4 n yisikwan (unuɣ, taklut, n tira n tifinaɣ, tin n tugniwin), asenεet n yiwen n usaru i wrrac, imseḍsi d useḥḥar…atg. Ma deg umaruz n Uxxam n Yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Azazga, ttilin-d waṭas n leqdicat-nniḍen gar-asen 4 n yisikwan (imuhal n ufus, tira, sbiɣa, unuɣ), taɣuri n tmacahut i wrrac, imseḍsi d useḥḥar…atg.Bɣan imsuddsen n leqdic-agi, ad sεeddin yinelmaden imuras-nsen deg tegnatin yelhan, gar usgunfu d temlilit n wayen akk ḥemmlen.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Abdelghani Adaoun 

 
  
 Ad idir temdint n Montreal 123 ddqayeq n tewlafin n usaru amaziɣ deg tfaska ara d-yilin ass n 30 deg wayyur anda nella deg uxxam n sinima n Québec. Ahil d amesbaɣur imi ad ɛeddin 6 n yisura imeẓyanen, wigi d asaru n Tahar Houchi s uzwel n ‘’Yidir’’ anda i d-yettmeslay ɣef Jugurta d yiwen umeɣnas i igedlen i mmi-s Yidir lmerwaḥ ɣer uɣerbaz. Asaru-a, yesɛa 12n ddqayeq. Asaru wis ssin isem-is ‘’Regards ‘’ wagi yessuffeɣ-it-id Noureddine Kebaili. Yettales-d taqsiṭ n Marie-Louis d yiwet i yettidiren di tmurt n Fransa, laṣel-is d azayri, teṭṭef di rray-is akken ad tuɣal ɣer tmurt-is i wakken ad twali tamḍelt n baba-s. Dinna, ad temlil d Lwennas anda ara d-tessekfel aṭas n temsal. Asaru, ad yeddu 26 ddqayeq. Ma yella d asaru wis kraḍ, wagi n Reda Amrani. Yesɛa 14 nddqayeq s uzwel ‘‘D wagi i d asirem’’. Dagi, Mass Amrani, yerra tajmilt i tmeṭṭut taqbaylit imi tesɛa azal meqqren, acku d nettat i iḥudren ɣef tutlayt d yidles aqbayli mgal aɣebbar n tatut , syin d asaru i ysɛan 20 ddqayeq i d-yessufeɣ Ali Reggan iwumi yefka azwel n ‘Rose Hallal’. Am wakken ad iɛeddi yiwen usaru isem-is ‘’Un kabyle de palestine’’ n Tahar Houchi d yiwen n uglam u wudam nuqbayli i yettidiren di tmurt n Liban , yessaram ad yuɣal ɣer tmurt n lejdud-is , asaru-agi, yesɛa 20 dqayeq . Mi i d-nesteqsa Mass Houchi Madjid ɣef wamek i d-tussa tikti i tikelt tamezwarut ɣef tfaska yenna-d : “Aseggas-aya nekni nettmeslay, nesqardic tamsalt d unemhal n tẓuri n FIFOG Mass Houchi Tahar. Syin, tlul-d tdukkla Fifam anda i d-nhegga leqdic-a n usaru agraɣlan amaziɣ i tikkelt tamezwarut. Yenna-d d akken aṭas n uxeddim i mazal deg ubrid-a n sinima Amaziɣ .

  S.Yamani

  A. A. 

  
 Yiwen yilef yezga yessexsar ixammen n tweḍfin, imi ara yessres iqejjiren-is imeqranen ɣer lqaɛa, ur yettxezzir ara ɣer sdat-es. Yiwwas rrfant fell-as aṭas, mcawarent akken as-zzint ad ten-ɣent . Imi d-yuɣal yilef-nni, tiweḍfin-nni uzlent ulint s ufella-s. Yal yiwet d acu teɛna, kra rrant s imeẓẓuɣen-is, kra s aɛebbuḍ-is, kra nniḍen s azagur-ines. Ilef yerǧa alarmi qqaɛdent akk iman-nsent, yesfezwi, ad as-t-inid yenhez wedrar, dɣa aɣlint-d akk ɣer lqaɛa. teqqim-d yiwet teckenteḍ, tesɛa tabɣest, tugi ad tamen ifukk umennuɣ, timdukal-is ttsuɣunt, ttceqqirent-as : -Xenq-it a lla Faḍma ! Nneɣ-it a lla Faḍma !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Busad Ḥemar 

  
 2014 yeggar nnhat-is tineggura. Cetwa s wacu i d-yegla, d tmeɛlalt. Ur teqqim d amwan ur tewwiḍ d tafsut. Gar snat n tmiqwa aqqaren n yiṭij, amɣulu, yeseḥraq tuga. Teḥced tignawt am akken heḍcen wulawen n yimdanen. Qquren  ifurkawen ur d-ufin ara lliqqa iqewten  iguma n yiseɣ!  

 Win tufiḍ ad ak-yini lehwa tɛaṭṭel, xuṣen waman ur d-wwiten ara. Tamazagt n yigenwan tekkaw.  Tizemrin, isenden ɣef akal yewwi usyax, ur d uffin ara  ansi ara d-jebden ttra amer zzit ad tenɣal ɣer ucbayli. Teqḥeḍ am akken qeḥḍen wallaɣen n yimdanen. Qquren leɛwenṣer , d cyaḍ kan i d-yeqqimen.

 Acu ara d nemekti deg ussegas–agi  iteddun ɣer taggara-s? Di tsertit leryac ddawaren deg ilem.  Teḥbes tsaɛett anda akken i teǧǧen yilaxaxen ur necqi ur negzi amek teddunt temsal. Tewser, xas fuken deg-s ifaden, teluqeb temẓi yeknan( s wanuz?)  zdat lweɛd imḥettem. Ur yemmut Muḥ ur d yezzi Muḥ. Teḥced llulend mmuten lefḥul, teqqim ṣrima ɣer bu waxlul.

 Acu ara d-nemekti deg useggas-agi yesuḥuben iman-is ɣer tawwurt n twafɣa , netta ur d-negli s umeynut, ur d newwi tbut? Leǧnas  di ddunit ttemɛantaren. Twaqɛitt gar Rrus akked Marikan , si mbaɛid yettfariǧ ccinwa. Trad aten ɣef tewwurt n L’europe yuɣalen d taqdact n i tidukla n tmura n Marikan. Tamurt n Rrus tebɣa as t-tekki i lmizan akken ad iɛiwed lmil. Tamurt n Ṣṣin teznuzuy terqar mazal. Gar « ih d wah » yellan, tamurt n Tunes tebuṭi, tera tewser ɣef ukersi. Qqaren a win yeddan d win it-yiffen….meɛna ulamek  imi tehčeḍ , yegursel ṣṣwab, lhikma tuɣal ɣer iderwiḍen. 

 Acu ara d nemkti deg useggas agi unḥis ? Acu yesefraḥen ? Ahat yelha ad nemekti aḍebsi amaynut n Lounis Ait Menguellet “isefra” . Widen yegzin ayen imeɛnan ẓran acu umu sslan, ma d ungifen mazal senduyen aman. Acu diɣen yesefraḥen? Yelha ahat ad nebder aḍebsi n Zedek Mouloud “asderfef”. Aḍebsi yussa-d di lawan, imi d tidet s-usferfed ila n teddu deg akken tizedyin n ṭlam mɣent ɣef allen. Adar ɣer zdat ssin ɣer deffir, neseɣzef abrid i ttmesxir. Taḥced , ɛaqren wallaɣen i usnulfu , ɛazgen yimezuɣen  i usmuzget. Ahuzu n wammas , yir awal gar tullas aten yidles wuɣur neṣṣaweḍ.

 Acu ara d nemekti deg useggas-agi i teddun akken ad yeɣbu? Netta ad yeɣbu nekni aktay-nneɣ yekcem di lhejna  n wulac. Ahat llan wid ara yestqenɛen s  ssin neɣ tlata  n yedlisen id yefɣen s teqbaylit…meɛna anda –t ṣṣḍa-nsen ? Ulac win yeẓran ulac win iwalen. Tqariḥ tidet. Ahat ad illint wid ara yeḍṣen alama yeclex uɣeṣmar s-usaru id yenulfan. Faḍma  d Faḍma kan xas n ssumer… yiwen yitbir ur ixeddem ara  tafsut. Ad grin widen yeznuzun urfan.  Widak ččuren tilibzyu s tqulhatin yerran taqbaylit d cbiha n  taklit. Teḥced, imi ula d nnbi  mačči seg-nneɣ.

 Acu ara d nmekti deg useggas id yewwin lwaswas ɣer wulawen? Akkin d tajmilit dihin d tefska. Nerra tajmilit  i tajmilt.Newqem tafeska i tefeska. Am allim ma din yerɣa , ula d iɣden ulac. Teṛẓa tisirt deg laryac.  Yeɣli-d uɣṛum aquran deg yimmi ufermac. A tin yettun amek i-iteddu uqerdac, aslef mačči d tixebbac!  Ahdum d ahdum, meɛna qqaren yelha ɣellu gar lqum. Win iḥadqen yessusem, win iɛugnen yetewhem, win yeṣden la ireggem…

 Ger yinzizen n yiseɣ  ixef yunnag akken ad yamekti wid iɣ yeǧǧan. Noura. Mohya. Slimane Azem. Matoub Lounes. Bougermuh. Mouloud Mammeri. Chrif Kheddam.  Waqila yeqqim unar d lxali. Widen yettrabin ansis di tili ur gganen ur ttnudumen. Anda tella tafat ad s-id sɣamen. Isuɣ ccix n lebqul am akken yečča aḥeckul. Isuɣ ɣef widen yenwan belli tidmi ur tettbbibi ajeɣlal. Menɛa ziɣen stufan. Acu umu yezmer leqlam n Kamal Daoud, n Lounis Ait Menguellet , n Zedek Mouloud magal asfuǧǧeɣ n win ur neɛrif? Ufal d awezɣi ad yeseftutes uzal. Yella deg awal! 

 Gar awi terreḍ, agujil d tgujilt simmal tḥitilen deffir tayemet. Yenna wina akken iwalen : “uqbel ad tegrem asurif , ilaq a tezwirem nnif, ma ulac tamaziɣt ulac .. ulac .. ulac…”. Aqlaɣ deg-s. Ɣer ass-a n wussan ulac aɣmis s teqbaylit, ulac  tizrigin n tidet i udflis s teqbaylit, ulac sinima imeɛnen s teqbaylit, ulac amezgun ibedden s teqbaylit … armi i d as-yenna umedyaz yegren addaz deg umehraz: 

 A yat ccna deg leccaen 

 An ccenu azekka wizran

 Anda-ken a widak nessen

 Anda-ken a wid iɣ-icuban

 Acimi akka udrent wallen

 Ay imddukal ay iḥbiben

 Ay atmaten d imawlan

 Ur sliɣ i nnan yaɛdawen 

 Sliɣ-as i tsusmi-nwen

 Tenna-yi ayen ak din yellan..!

 d-yeffeɣ deg yebrir d-iteddun ɣer tezrigin “Music Pro”

<p style="text-align: center;"><em> Meqqreḍ a taddart nneɣ </em>

 <em> Yal tama refden leswar </em>

 <em> Meẓẓiy-eḍ a taddart fellaɣ </em>

 <em> Nekni yedha-d nessamɣer </em>

 Asmi id kecmeɣ tamurt n Leqbayel , i tikelt tamezwarut deg iseggasen-nni n 80 , taddart tella tewwi anamek-ines aḥeqqi xas akken iɛumm deg-s lexṣas. Ulac iberdan yelhan, ulac tafat( tirciti) ulac lebni amaynut, ulac azeṭṭa yessufuɣen aman n tzuliɣin, ulac aman deg tiseballin. Tudert n immiren tbedd ɣef lxedma n wakal, ɣef uhareb ɣef nnif akked lḥerma. Mi ara d yekcem umdan ɣer taddart yettḥulfu s yiman-is ha-ten deg axxam-is , gar ayetma-as , gar lehbab-is anda yedda d laman , d tagmat, d lemḥadra.Tudrin , di lawan-nni, mazal teddunt s lqanun n teqbaylit ressan imezwura-nneɣ di tmeti. Leɣrazi s wacu tebna taddart d tawacult, d adrum akked tajmaɛt. Taddart tekka-d nnig yal yiwen u yal yiwen iqeddec i taddart. Dayen-nni i yeǧǧen, xas akken yeqwa lexṣas, imdanen ɛeccen di talwit, ttemyarfaden, temḥabaren, wa yesfqed ɣef wa akken lweḥc n tudert ad yerr aḍar. 

 Maca zrin wussan , isufer n tenfalit kecmen tudrin-nneɣ armi weccmen ɣef udem-is leɛyub ur nelli. Ass-a teqqa si tudrin-nneɣ ur qqiment d tuddar u wwiḍen-t timdinin. Leɛwayed beddlen , imi allalen-agi atraren bḍan gar medden, rran yal yiwen yeskuccer ɣer yiman-is am iɛarrusen yettwakeblen deg ujeɣlal. Yell-ad waya , acku yal wa yeqqar-as :  » nekk zemreɣ iyi iman-iw, ihi uma sriɣ i udrum neɣ i taddart. » Beṭṭu-agi id wwin wallalen atraren( am taskawin- paraboles- azeṭṭa n linternet) yekcem ula ɣer ixxamen imi xas iɛaggalen n yiwet n twacult qṛib ur t temlaɛin-ara. Ifukk lkanun –nni yezdin gar watmaten , i ten id ttejmaɛen yal yiḍ akken ad m walin ,ad meslayen , ad m yafen ad m yaɛqqalen. Allen atraren bḍan tassa d wayen turew! 

 Tudert tatrart ( xas akken tesishil udem n temɛict) teɣza iɣisan deg umiṣiwed( communication) yellan zik –nni d rikiza n tmeti di tmurt n Leqbayel. Terra imdanen d anṣafen( egoistes ) yal yiwen yettnnadi kan amek ara yejbed tagertilt i yiman-is( d baḥwaṣu i tt-ileɛben) . D tussfa-agi( l’égoisme) id yewwin tismin, dɣel gar watmaten, d netta-t i zerɛen ccwal gar tiwaculin armi : ( am akken id yenna Zedek Mouloud) 

<p style="text-align: center;"><em> Tagmatt tettu d wi tettnaɣ </em>

 <em> Tedda-tt ɣaf ayen ilhan yeffeɣ </em>

 <em> Cceɣl n taddart meqqar </em>

 <em> Telhi-ḍ a taddart yiseneɣ </em>

 <em> Diri- kem a taddart yis-nneɣ </em>

 <em> D nekni ikem yarran d axeṣṣar </em>

 Tekcem taddart deg iɣilifen asmi ifukk wawal di tajmayɛit. Asmi fukkent timucuha ɣer lkanun. Asmi ilemẓiyen ɣunzan lehḍur n imussnawen. Tekcem taddart di leɣlaḍ asmi i tzad leqṛaya i ɣ yerwin lɛeqliya armi bab-as inekr-it mmi-s. Fṛuṛxen leɛyub deg tudrin-nneɣ, aseklu yellan d leḥlu beddlen -as telqim ran-t d aḥeccad . Anda-t ( imi akka) leɛǧeb ma yella ass-a aseklu n tjaddit yefka-d yir iguma ? Anda –t leɛǧeb ma yella lḥeṛma-nni n zik tekfa, ma yella leqder n zik yeɣli ?Amedyaz werǧin yeskaddeb netta i d-yennan:

 1 n tɣenjawt n tumatic yerkin 

 4 n tfednan n ticcert
