 Takemmict n yiḥemmuẓen 

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Sired dewwara ( tikerciwin ) akken issefk ( s waman izeqqalen ), err-itent , ad uddument , gzem-itent d iftaten imectaḥ, ad uɣalent ɣef tmes ad awlent. Seqcer tidal ( legumes ) , sired–itent , gzem-iten , err-itent ɣer tuggi ( taccuyt) ad qlunt . S yin ɣer-s , Ales , suddem tikerciwin –nni yewwlen , semlil-itent nutenti d tidal , rnu ɣer-sent tuga ( lekrafez, lemɛadnus ittwagezmen . ), zuzzer-asent ifelfel aberkan , lqerfa , akked yiwet n tɣenjawt n tumatic yerkin . Rnu–asent 2 n litrat n waman yewwlen ( iḥman) , terred-asent ad wwent . S tezmert-nnwen(t) . 

<p style="text-align: right;"> S ɣur Daya  

 
  
 Seg Tefsut n 80 ar ass-a, aṭas i d-yellan deg tmurt-nne&amp;gamma,; neqqar-it-id yal tikelt deg ara aγ-tettunefk tegnit. Nezmer ad d-nini aṭas s d-tegla Tefsut n 80 i tmurt s umata, macci kan deg wayen yerzan tamaziγt. Tegla-d s usekfel n tutlayt i niqal tetteddu srid s imi n nnger: wa s tidet, wa s nnif, wayeḍ s tmara, uγalen akk rran-as azal i tmaziγt. Ass-a, ukin-as akk i tutlayt-nneγ deg Tmazγa, ama deg tmurt n Lezzayer, ama deg Tmazirt n Umalu (Lmerruk), ama deg Libya. Deg Libya ass-a, ttnaγen ugar n Yimaziγen akk γef uẓayer n tmaziγt, deg Lmerruk. Deg Lezzayer, nesselmad-itt deg tesdawit, nesselmad-itt deg yiγerbazen, amzun akken tekcem deg wallalen n teywalt, tteffγen yidlisen (isegzawalen, idlisfusen n tjerrumt, tira tiseklanin), amzun akken yettunefk-as uẓayer n tutlayt taγelnawt. Gar Tefsut n 80 d wass-a, d ayen ibanen, meqqer usurif i tger tmaziγt γer sdat deg ubrid n unerni, llan yidisan igerrzen. Maca yessefk ad nissin, ama deg unnar n uẓayer n tutlayt (annar n tsertit) ama deg unnar n tfekka n tutlayt (annar ussnan, asensegman), innin abrid γezzif, yessawen ; s ayen nebγu naweḍ ass-a, yessefk ad netteddu γer sdat, ad nettseggim yal tikelt tarrayin-nne&amp;gamma,; ad nesseγtay tuccḍiwin i d-yettilin deg usnerni d uslugen d useqdec n tutlayt-nneγ. Akken ad yili, ad yettili wanect-a, yessulef ad tili tefra taluft n yiswi γer nra ad naweḍ, syin akin ad ilin fran yiberdan yessawaḍen s iswi, d wamek ara ttunefken wallalen iwatan i usiweḍ s iswi. Anwa i d iswi?

<p style="text-align: center;"> D acu twalaḍ deg tmaziγt tutlayt taγelnawt tuniṣibt ? 

 Deg wayen yerzan aẓayer n tutlayt, neẓra dakken yettunefk-as yakan i tmaziγt (ugar n 10 n yiseggasen) uẓayer n tutlayt taγelnawt maca ar tura yiwen ur yeẓri azal, yiwen ur yessin anamek n uẓayer am wa deg unnar. Ass-a, mayella daγen aẓayer n tutlayt tunṣibt, ad yili d awal kan, war azal deg unnar, war azal deg tmetti. Yelha ma yettunefk uẓayer unṣib i tutlayt maca ma deg unnar, deg tmetti amzun acemma ur yeḍri, dγa ulayγer. Iswi-nneγ niqal, d aselmed n tutlayt-nneγ deg tizi tamezwarut, syin akin kked d aselmed n tangiwin-nniḍen s tmaziγt, d useqdec-ines deg wallalen n teywalt akked tsuddwin n uwanek (institutions de l’Etat). Deg taluft am ta, yella uwanek (i yeṭṭef udabu), tella daγen tmetti (wid yesselmaden, wid yettarun, imeskaren, inaẓuren, imsiwlen s umata) ad begsen i usebded n tutlayt-nneγ (s usegged n yilugan n tira, n tjerrumt, s yisegzawalen ummiden, s yiḍrisen irennun ccbaḥa i tutlayt), ad d-fken afus n talelt akken ad tt-nessefrek, ad tuγal d tutlayt izemren i yiman-is, d tutlayt izemren ad d-tini, ad d-tessenfali yal tikti, deg yal taγult, deg yal tagnit, i yal amseflid. Acku, akken walaγ taluft, akin i uẓayer unṣib ara d-yasen seg ufella, tutlayt-nne&amp;gamma,; yif-it ma teqqar-d tirga-nne&amp;gamma,; ma tessenfalay-d uguren-nne&amp;gamma,; iγeblan-nne&amp;gamma,; urrifen-nne&amp;gamma,; akked tumert d usirem d tifrat n wuguren : ad tili d tutlayt tagamant, ara nettiri, ara nessawal, ara nettaru war akukru, war ugur.      

 Yesteqsa-t  Hocine.M

  
 Deg wass-nni n lexmis almi d tagara n ddurt , tella-d tmeɣra n tazart deg Wat Jlil, lɛerc n Yiẓnagen , lwilaya n Bgayet. Azal 75 yifellaḥen i d –yesnaɛten leṣnaf n tazart yemxalafen i d-lwin di tferkiwin-nsen: Ajanjar, Taɛemrawit , Imelwi…atg. ‘’zik-nni, asmi yella lxir , mi ara yeffeɣ ufellaḥ ɣer lexla, yettawi yid-s uraw n yiniɣman di lǧib, ur yesnagar ara alma yuɣal-d s axxam-is tameddit , deg-s leqniɛa’’ i d-yenna yiwen n umeksa n temnaḍt-agi. Di tezrigt tis 05 n tikkelt-agi, d tamerkantit, ataṣ n lesnaf-nniḍen lɣella s wayes tettwassen temnaḍt-agi, ama d zzit n uzemmur, tament , awren, ifelfel , tiẓemmit d yisufar nniḍen. Am wakken i d-yella wawal sɣur kra n yimussnawen akked d yimḍebbren n texxamt n tefellaḥt n Bgayet ɣef wazal tesɛa lɣella-agi deg usnerni n tdamsa n tmurt. Ṛeggmen i yifellaḥen ad asen-d fken allalen swayes ara snernin deg usefti d lxedman n tneqlin, am uledduy n yiberdan ɣer tferkiwin i ibeɛden d lebni n yibusal n waman i tissit n yixulaf lawan n unebdu…atg. Seg wakken tettussenef tazart n Wat Jlil gar tid i d-yufraren ɣer tama n tazart n Wat Imɛuc, ayɣer ur tettili ara timenziwet-is deg leswaq igraɣlanen, imi ddula tefka, yakan, tesriḥ n usuffeɣ n tazart n Wat Imɛuc d temnaḍin i as-d-yezzin ɣer tmura n berra . 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim .Ben 

  
 Deg ddqiqa-nni i deg d-yeffeɣ lexbar n usenṣeb n tmaziɣt di tmendawt, ulac ahat aqbayli ur d-nemekta ara imeɣnasen-nni n tmaziɣt d tugdut d umennuɣ nnsen i tt-isḥersen ɣef udabu d yeɛdawen n tugdut, alarmi d-isaḥ, ass-a, wemkan i tmaziɣt di tmendawt n Lezzayer.

 Tɛedda ddqiqa-nni, yal wa amek yesfra tamaziɣt di tmedawt.

 Iɛdawen n Tmaziɣt d tlelliyin, ladɣa at iččumar, nnan belli ur friḥen ara s tmendawt-a axaṭer tefka azal i “la Laïcité” (akka i d as-yenna Djabellah).

 Nnan daɣen ur qbilen ara asenṣeb n tmaziɣt ḥala ma twekked-d tmendawt belli ad tettwaru s yisekkilen n taɛrabt. Atan ihi rray n Djabellah De Saussure !

 Llan daɣen isertayen (widen i d aɣ-yesserwan taḍsa n wuglan) i iḥemlen tamaziɣt “ka afaq taqafi” (d adles mačči d nekkwa). 

 Llan daɣen kra seg yimaziɣen i yesraḥen tikerkas deg article 3 bis-agi. Wi ur fhimen ara amek taɛrabt d “luɣatu ddula ar lebda», “tamaziɣt d tunsibt” ? Amek akka l’article 3 bis-agi u yili ara gar les artciles-nni n lebda (1 caractère républicain de L’Etat. 3 l’ordre démocratique, basé sur le multipartisme. 3 islam en tant que religion de l’Etat. 4 L’arabe comme langue nationale et officielle. 5 libertés fondamentales, droits de l’homme et du citoyen. 6 intégrité et unité du territoire national. 7 l’emblème national et hymne national en tantq eu symbole de la révoilution et de la République. 8 le Président de la République réeligible une seule fois.) ?

 Llan daɣen wid ara yafen deg uzeṭṭa n article 3bis ayen yugaren aya. D acu, akken k-yehwa ɣer-it, ad ak-d-iban ayen yecban lmuḥal : “tamaziɣt daɣn d tutlayt taɣelnawt, tunṣibt”. Yennayer d inigi ɣef waya.

 Rnu “keč i yetturebban i cwal», ur tberruḍ ara i ṭbel deg waman. Seg Juba yuran s tutlayin nniḍen ara ass-a, tedda tmaziɣt, ladɣa tantal taqbaylit. 

 I d aɣ-yettrajun d asenulfu deg yal aḥric. D abrid-a kan i yessufuɣen. Ihi win yebɣan tamaziɣt, “ad tt-yaru, ad tt-yecnu, ad tt-yurar, ad tt-yecḍeḥ, ad tt-yecbeḥ», ayen nniḍen d awal.

<p style="text-align: right;"> T.Ould amar   

  
 Yal mi ara d-yaweḍ waggur n Ṛemdan, igellu-d s umur-is n ccwal gar yimdanen γef tγawsiwin ur nesɛi azal meqqren, ara yessiwɣen γer liḥala yecban ti.

 Aseggas-a, deg Tubiret, Tikreḍt tettban tɛedda tilas, imi ccwal yellan kan d reffu yenneqlab γer terwihin. Amek ihi, deg yimalas yezrin, deg yiwet n taddart i d-yezgan deg tγiwant n Teγzut, yiwen n urgaz bu settin n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is yerra lḥedd i tudert n tlata n yimdanen ukkud yecrek aẓar. Tagi d tawacult n gma-s i yessenger, imi yenγa-as mmi-s, yelli-s d tmettut-is s usexdem n tmeghelt. Mi yesseγli tirwihin-a, yeṭṭef abrid metwal tiẓgi anda yeffer. Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i nesɛa ar ass-a, amdan-a mazal ur d-iban ara anda yessedreg iman-is. Mi akken yekker uhetwir deg taddart, yal wa yeqqar-as waqila yebγa ad ineγ wiyaḍ uqbel ad d-yuγal. Ass n lexmis tasebhit, lawan n 11h, neḥder daγ i yiwet n tedyant anda yiwen n yilemẓi yesɛan azal n 30 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, yeslek seg lmut taḥeqqanit mi akken yennuγ d yiwen-nniden. Tadyant-a, daγ teḍra-d sdat n uγerbaz alemmas Haddouche Said n temdint n Tubiret mi akken sin n yilmeẓyen, ttemxasamen gar-asen s wawal almi, qqen tiṭ teldid-tt, tenneqlab tegnawt yiwen yebda yekkat axsim-is s lmus anda i t-ihḥuza deg waṭas n yimekwan deg tfekka-s. Amzun akken ur yessasmeḍ ara tasa-s, yemme&amp;gamma,; yeddem-d yiwet n tehrawt n wuzzal i wakken ad as-yesmed tiyita, dγa winna ineggez yerwel γer daxel n uγerbaz anda yessutur lemneɛ. Axsim-is, yedda-tt deffir-s, ulamma yufan daxel iγallen n laman meɛna qqnent wallen-is, yebγa ad t-ineγ. Din i d-skecmen iman-nsen yimesulta, selken-d ilemẓi-nni seg lmut mi γedlen axsim-is. Din din, usan-d yimesulta-nniden akked yiγallen n usellek anda ldin yiwen n rrabul n unadi i wakken ad d-beyynen tamentilt yessawḍen sin n yilmeẓyen-a ad mmenγen gar-asen. Win akken yeγlin, uqbel ad t-awin γer sbitar yenna-d dakken wagi i d-yusan i wakken ad t-ine&amp;gamma,; mačči d aberrani fell-as, imi d acrik-is n lxedma, sɛan yiwen n ukamyun xeddmen yis-s.

  M. Smail 

  
 Ɣas ma yella acḥal tura segmi tettwafren termist (entreprise) ara iseggmen sin n yiberdan n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, rnu teffeɣ-d yakan ssuma swayes ara yemmag usenfar-a, maca lecɣal ulac ad ten-walin yimezdaɣ n taddart dayen bdan akken ad tthennin. Ɣef wawal n uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, mass Ɛebdun Nasir, mi i t-nesteqsa tikkelt iɛeddan, yewwi-d tili qelɛen yiqeddicen tazwara n wayyur-a n ṭuber deg nella, rnu sɣur yiwet n termist i iḥercen akk deg Ayt Smaɛel. Lameɛna, iban-d d kra n uɛeṭṭel i ur nettwafham i d-igan annect-a n wakud d ilem war ma yemmug wacemma, netta ulac win ur neẓri belli tagrest (ccetwa) ur tettcawar ḥedd mara tɛewwel ad d-tger isurifen n sin-is n yiḍarren. Ad as-tiniḍ nennum dayen nekni akka i gan lecɣal-nneɣ, akken bɣun ilin wallalen i nesɛa, neɣ akken tebɣu tga tegnit deg nettidir. Ad d-nesmekti dakken iberdan-a iɣiwanen iɣef d-nettmeslay d win i iteqqnen Taɛinsert ɣer Tigratin ed Lmerj n Yiɣil s teɣzi n 1900ml. Ma d wis sin nniḍen yeɛna Taregragt-Bumejber-Burafaɛ s teɣzi n 1400ml. D iberdan i yettwasseqdacen aṭas ama sɣur yiɣermanen (citoyens) n tɣiwant, neɣ ula sɣur yiberraniyen tikwal.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Asantus Akuku n tmurt n Kenya, yemmut ussan-agi kan iɛeddan, deg leɛmer-is 91 n yiseggasen. Yectel-d deg yiwen uẓar ‘’Luwu’’ netta akked Barack Obama. Yezweǧ akked 130 n tlawin, yesɛa-d ugar n 300 n warraw-is. Mmi-s ameqqran d ṭṭbib, yesɛa 70 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is. Yebra i 85 d tameṭṭut i t-ikelxen deg nnif-is. Ɣef wakken yeqqar, lḥerma n tmeṭṭut tugar kulci, nnif-is yeṭṭef taqacuct. Iḥemmel, diɣ, ad izux s yiman-is imi d-yenna : ‘’nekk am ddkir, ulac tameṭṭut i izemren ad tejbed iman-is ma yella uẓeɣ ɣur-s.’’ Yesɛa cci d ayen kan : tiferkiwin n wakal, tiḥuna, tafellaḥt d ttawilat-nniḍen i ixeddmen warraw-is d twacult-is. Yebna sin yiɣerbazen anda qqaren warraw-is, d netta i yettxellisen iselmaden-nni. Yemmut, meɛna yeǧǧa-d ugar n 1500 n dderya n dderya. I limer, yal Aqbayli ad yaɣ 130 n tlawin mačči yili deg kra n yiseggasen kan ad nili majoritaire ? Dɣa ad nevuṭṭi, ad nerr ‘’Taqbaylit’’ akken i aɣ-yehwa. Ad nevuṭṭi la séparation, le divorce n tmurt n leqbayel melmi i aɣ-d-tenfeḥ !!! Eyyaw, ahaw, s ciṭ n ṣwab maḍi, maḍi ! 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Ma tessecraḥ sseba yemɣin, akken ula d ilmeẓiyen i ikecmen annar n tẓuri d useqdec n tutlayt-nsen. D ayen i iga Azedine Abdous, ilemẓi n 19 n yiseggasen kan. Akken ad nẓer ugar ɣef wannect-a, ad as-nefk tagnit ad d-yessenfali i yimeɣriyen n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen, nenced-it yerra-aɣ-d deg tdiwennit-a.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Anwa i d Azedine Abdous? 

  Azedine Abdous:  d ilemẓi kan i yesεan 19 n yiseggasen. D anaẓur amecṭuḥ, d amaẓwan, d amedyaz, d aneɣmas imezgi, d anelmad di tesnawit di tanga n tfelsuft. Ilul deg udrar Ukeffadu , taddart n Tewrirt.

  Amek tɛedda temlilit n ccna deg Ifri?  

 Tezri akken iwata anda necna dinna nekk d gma n ugraw ITRAN, d wanda nemlal d waṭas n yinaẓuren am Medjahed Ḥamid , ƐAbbas Nait Rzin…d waṭas n yineɣmasen , imyura. D tagnit yelhan s waṭas!

  Seg melmi tebdiḍ tetturareḍ snitra?  

 Bdiɣ tturareɣ snitra d wurdin (guitare &amp; mandole) asmi ɣur-i 17 nyiseggasen. D acu kan, si zik i ḥemmleɣ aẓawan.

  Anwi-ten yinaẓuren i tḥemmleḍ, wid i tettwaliḍ d amedya-k ? 

 Ḥemmleɣ icennayen akk i yellan deg umaḍal. Yal aɣnib ḥemmleɣ-t! Deg umedya : Flaminku, Jazz, Caɛbi, Atrar…atg. Gar yinaẓuren izwawen i ḥemmleɣ llan : Si Mouh, Idir, Lani, Brahim Ṭayeb, Mḥend, Takfarinas, Slimane Azem, El Ḥasnawi.

  Amek tgam Agraw Akeffadu?  

 Ih. Deg ugraw-a, lliɣ nekk d gma Ɣilas, acku si zik i nxeddem talilt (chorale). Syin nebɣa ad necnu i yiman-nneɣ, nga-t-id deg useggas n 2012. Nexdem yiwen n tezlit (Lydia) deg 2013, syin aḍebsi 2014 (Lezzayer). Nekki deg waṭas n tfaskiwin, irmad idelsanen, tisgilin, tigrarin…atg. Akka tura nesεa yiwet n tfaska tagreɣlant n uẓawan amaziɣ di Fransa ara yilin deg wayyur n ṭuber i d-tessewjad tiliẓri n tmaziɣt BRTV. Ɣur-neɣ daɣen yiwet n temlilt deg Montréal deg Canada, deg yimuras-a n tegrest .

  Tettheggim-d dɣa aḍebsi-nniḍen n ccna…  

 Ih, aql-aɣ deg tzeqqa n usekles Irat di Tizi Uzzu. Ad yili d amaynut, d aɣanib atRar s usekcem n waṭas n wallalen. Deg-s ad ilint 08 n tezlain , d ayen icudden ɣer unfaray (sentimental). Ula d isental mgaraden gar tayri , timetti…atg. Iḍrisen d nekkni i ten-yettarun. Ɣur-neɣ yiwen n uselmad Idir Saad , d netta i aɣ-d-yefkan afud akken ad nekcem di tẓuri tasusamt.

  Ulama meẓẓi, nnig n uẓawan, tettaruḍ daɣen s tezwawt. Mmeslay-aneɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef waya…  

 Akka! Tira wiss amek akka i yi-tekcem ur gziɣ ar ass-a. Wiss ahat degmi qqareɣ tafelsuft , ḥemmleɣ ad aruɣ ayen ur nelli , ayen ur nettwafham. Dɣa, ttaruɣ deg yiɣmisen, tisɣunin. Tura akka, aql-iyi ssewjadeɣ yiwen udlis iwumi fkiɣ azwel “ Akkin i tirga”. Deg-s ammud n tullisin n wayen yellan ala di tirga, ur nelli di tilawt. Ahat bɣiɣ akka aɣanib amaynut, ideg maleɣ nezzeh ɣer tenfusin n tayri, leḥzen, imeṭṭi, tiselbi, tasusmi… wiss ahat d ayen ibeεden akkin i tmuɣli , 

  D acu teɣɣareḍ seg wayen yuran?  

 Qqareɣ ungalen, inzan, isefra, iɣmisen, d acu, ḥemmleɣ ad ɣreɣ nezzeh tafelsuft. Isenfaren i sεiɣ akka ɣer sdat, ad semmdeɣ taɣuri n uẓawan, ad kecmeɣ ɣer uɣerbaz “Neɣma” di Bgayet, ad d-suffɣeɣ adlis, akked d uḍebsi-a amaynut. Tanemmirt-ik a Mass Mhenni!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t: Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Timetti taqbaylit ur tefka ara azal i tmeṭṭut deg tmeddurt, ulama ula d nettat s ccan-is. Fell-as i tbedd akk ddunit. Akka yerna mazal tettemririɣ deg tɣerɣert n tneḥyaft imi argaz-is yeḥrem-as tuffɣa. Yerra-tt d taqeddact-is, ad texdem deg uxxam, ad ternu tiqwirin. Deg tazwara, ur tesԑi ara izerfan am urgaz deg twacult: tezga tettwaḥqqer imi ur tt-id-yettali wawal gar watmaten-s. Zik, llant ula d tiqcicin i meḍlen d timuddirin. Llant tlawin iwumi berrun imi i d-seԑԑunt kan tullas. Llant tiyiḍ zewğent 3 neɣ 5 yiberdan, daymi qqaren: «Taqcict ma tedder tenfa&amp;epsilon,; ma ulac, timeqbert tewsaε».

 Tis snat, tameṭṭut ur teswi, ur terri, deg uxxam-is. Ur tesԑi rray ala argaz i yesԑan awal. Werğin tella d tilellit deg lecɣal-is. Ilaq ad texdem kan ayen yeffɣen ɣef urgaz-is, yerna axeddim-is d axxam kan, Ma teffeɣ, ad teffeɣ kan ɣer tmazirt. Ulamma truḥ ɣer yimawlan-is, xas ma llan deg taddart, ilaq ad yeddu urgaz-is, am wakken qqaren: «Taqcict mm tɣaltin, ur tbennu tixxamin». Tis kraḍ, tallest segmi ara d-tlal nettat tettwaḥqar, ama deg uxxam n baba-s neɣ win n urgaz-is. Leqbayel n zik, mi ara yernu ɣur-sen uqcic, ad sɣerten neɣ ad xedmen urar. Ma d taqcict I d-sԑan ad yeḥzen uxxam am akken d tamḍelt. Mi ferqen ttrika, ama d idrimen neɣ d akal, yal awelli (ilemẓi) ad yawi amur-is, ma d tawellit lḥeq-is ad t-rnun watmaten-is, acku ɣur-sen, d lԑib ad tewret teqcict. Ma deg uxxam n urgaz-is, akken kan bɣan nutni ara tili, limer ad tԑeddi deg rray, ad as-d-brun neɣ ad rnun fell-as takna. Ulamma yella way-agi zik, maca ass-a d tamuɣli-nniḍen. Imi d tameṭṭut i d agerruj n tudert, d nettat i d tigejjdit n uxxam-is. Nezmer ad d-nini belli ulac aɣref iɣef teԑziz tmeṭṭut nnig n uɣref Azwawi, axaṭer yegza d akken, amer ur tettili ara nettat, ddunt-is ur teswi ara neɣ ur tesԑi ara lebna. Ayen ara d-yessebganen aya-agi d inzi-a i d-ğğan wat zik: «Axxam mebla tameṭṭut, am lebḥer mebla lḥut». 

 Deg tama, kra n lbaḍna d sseriya yellan, ur teԑlim ara yis-s tmeṭṭut tazwawt imi aṭas n yirgazen i yettcawaren tilawin-nsen deg yiḍ. Ɣef-aya-agi i qqaren imezwura-nneɣ:«Ulac d acu nettugad am lehdur n tsumta». Deg tama niḍen, xas akken ur heddrent ara deg tejmaԑt, maca aṭas n tikkal i yettԑeddi rray-nsent deg-s s tuffra, yerna iferru timsal ur frin yirgazen. 

 Mebla ma nettu, tilawin-nneɣ asmi sԑant tilelli, ulac agdud i tt-yefkan i tlawin iwakken ad seknen tidet-a, yerna ad sfesxen lekdeb yellan ɣef tmeṭṭut tamaziɣt. Tagellidt Dihya d Tinhinan d amedya ɣef tlelli tekseb tmeṭṭut-nneɣ imi mačči siwa i uxxam iwumi tezmer, ula d agdud yella itteddu ddaw ufus-is, yerna tessebgen-d iman-is d akken tezmer i wayen iwumi yezmer urgaz neɣ ugar. Ihi, ddunit-a, tebna ɣef urgaz akked tmeṭṭut, d nutni i d sser n tudert, daymi ilaq tameṭṭut d urgaz ad kesben izerfan kif kif-iten. Imi ulac amgarad gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut di tmendawt, ilaq d lḥeq n urgaz i d win n tmeṭṭut. Ihi, ha-ten-in deg yiwen n umḍiq, dɣa qqaren: «Argaz d llsas, tameṭṭut d ajgu alemmas» 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani  

  
 Gar-aneɣ d kra n wayyuren, neɣ ahat n yimalasen, ad tili tutlayt tazwawt deg uẓeṭṭa inmetti (réseau social) arusi VK, tama n waṭas n tutlayin n ddunit, yiwen seg yimeqqranen n yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen deg umaḍal. Tura akka, ileḥḥu akken ilaq usenfar n usuqel ɣer tutlayt n Mulud At Mɛemmer, iumu yekke ujenyur deg yinagrawen isenselkamen Muḥend Belqasem akked terbaɛt-is. Seld tasutert i yimḍebbren i urnay n tutlayt tazwawt ɣer tutlayin i inuḥen deg uẓeṭṭa-a, tuɣal-d tririt s « ih », syinna yeḍfer-it-id uqeddic. «Yesɛa waya azal d ameqqran. Ad tekcem tutlayt-nneɣ, am tutlayin-nniḍen, ɣer wanida ara tidir lebda. Kra n win i d-yekkren ad tt-id-yaf deg Internet». I aɣ-d-yenna Sliman Amiri, seg terbaɛt n usideg (localisation) azwaw. Syin, yerna-d: «ad greɣ kan tiɣri i wayetma ad sqedcen ifecka-a, i d-nerra i tutlayt-nneɣ, I wakken ad idiren». Deg tallit-a n tetiknulujit d umaḍal aliktrunan umḍin, d ayen izaden ayendin i tutlayt mi ara taf iman-is tekcem deg wanida yettwaḍmen uḥraz. Ihi, ahat mačči d taggara n Facebook i Yizwawen s tidet, maca skud ur d-yerri i tiɣri n usuqel-ines ɣer tezwawt, ha-t-an ad yesruḥ aṭas. Mačči kan deg umḍan n yimsaɣen ara ibedlen idis, wanag ula deg tdamsa-ines n yal ass.

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

<div> 
  
 Amar Sghir, s yisem-is aḥeqqani Outoudert Amar, ilul ass n 27 tuber 1943 deg taddart n Tala n Tazert, yetabaɛen zik ɣer tɣiwant taqdimt n Tassaft, ma d tura deg tɣiwant n Iboudrarene. D tamnaḍt i d-yefkan aṭas n yinaẓuren yecban: Kamel Hamadi, Lounis Ait Menguellet, Idir, Amar Ezzahi…atg. D amedyaz, d acennay yerna d ameskar, annect-agi isebgan-d belli d anaẓur s timmad-is.

  Tudert-is 

 Isɛedda temẓi-is deg taddart-is, armi yewweḍ 8 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, syin yedda d baba-s ɣer Souk Larbâa deg tmurt n Tunes. Yeqqim dinna 3 n yiseggasen, dɣa ifuṛes tagnit yeɣra deg uɣerbaz tutlayt n tefransist akked tin n taɛrabt. Syin akin mi d-yuɣal deg useggas n 1954 ɣer taddart-is, yesselmed cwiṭ n taɛrabt. Syin mi yunag baba-s ɣer Fransa, yuɣal netta s aɣerbaz yellan deg taddart, i wakken ad ikemmel almud-is, dɣa dinna i d-iḥfeḍ kra n tezlatin yecban: Tarix n tmurt-nneɣ, Ɣur-i yiwen n umeddakkel, Min Jibalina…atg. Deg useggas n 1957, iruḥ ad d-iẓer baba-s deg tmurt n Fransa. Syin yexdem dinna kra n yiseggasen, tettunefk-as daɣen tegnit i wakken ad yissin icennayen-agi imeqqranen: Cheikh El Hasnaoui, Slimane Azem, Zerrouk Allaoua…atg. Dɣa yeḥfeḍ-d tizlatin-nsen s sshala tameqqrant. Deg tuber 1959, yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt-is mebɛed aggur kan ɣef wasmi yemmut baba-s, syin yuɣal yexdem dagi deg tmurt kra n yiseggasen deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, seg useggas n 1962 d asawen.

  Ansa i d-yekka yisem-agi “Amar Sghir” 

 Isem-agi n unaẓur Outoudert Amar, yettwassnen s yisem n tẓuri “Amar Sghir”, d ameddakkel-is acennay You cef Abdjaoui i d as-yefkan, imi deg lawan-nni yella meẓẓi deg leɛmer-is. Ma d anamek n yisem-agi Amar Sghir s teqbaylit d Amar amecṭuḥ neɣ ameẓyan.

  Amecwar-is 

 Yebda amecwar-is n tẓuri deg rradyu n t ruplan, Balak balak, Tajeǧǧigt lwerd yefsan. Syin akin, yessekles 4 n tezlatin gar mraw d sin-agi (12) i d-nebder, deg snat n tkasiḍin n “45 tours”, imi yal yiwet yexdem deg-s snat n tezlatin. Tizlatin-agi, d rrebɛa-nni timezwura yessekles deg umaṭṭaf: Ay ayetma acḥal itt-cedheɣ, Ttxil-k ay itbir xebber-itt, Lfiraq ay ayetma yewɛer, Snat n leḥwayeǧ ɛuhdeɣ-tent. Snat-agi n tkasiḍin n “45 tours”, issekles-itent ɣer tezrigin n Philips. Ma deg useggas n 1969, yessuffeɣ-d snat n tkasiḍin n “45 tours”, mebɛed mi yessekles 4 n tezlatin timaynutin deg ustudyu “Laḥen El Djazair” deg useggas n 1969. Tizlatin-agi, d tigi: Slam n llah fell-awen, Ahlellu, D baba-m akked baba, Je vois tes yeux qui brillent. Syin ɣer-s deg useggas n 1978, yessuffeɣ-d takasiḍt-is taneggarut, yewwin snat n tezlatin-agi timaynutin: Ttruɣ ɣef zzher-iw akked tezlit-nni Lmut taɣeddart swayes yettwassen aṭas.

  Tijmilin i d-as-yuɣalen 

 Axxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri s timmad-is, yerra-as snat n tejmilin ta deffir ta, i netta d kra n yicennayen-nniḍen. Tamezwarut, tella-d deg useggas n 2006, tayeḍ deg useggas n 2011. Ma deg useggas n 2014, d tiddukkla n taddart n Tala n Tazert, i d-as-ixedmen tajmilt meqqren, yeddan ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan.

  Lmut d temḍelt-is 

 Yewweḍ leɛfu Ṛebbi ass-nni lḥed 12 deg waggur n unbir 2017, yettwamḍel deg tmeqbert n taddart-is, ass-nni n letnayen 13 deg waggur-agi n unbir ideg nella. Tamḍelt-is, ḥedren-tt waṭas n yiwudam n yidles d wiyaḍ, yecban: Rabah Ouferhat, Salah Ait Ziane, lwali n Tizi Uzzu Mohammed Bouderbali, Atmani, Nabila Goumeziane, Ait Menguellet Abdelouhab…atg.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Gar tigellayin akk i yeɣlayen akka lawan-a deg ulzuz (ssuq), am tal tagrest, d aslem (lḥut). Iɣermanen (citoyens) merra ccetkayen amek almi tewweḍ ssuma n yiwen n ukilu ɣer 400 n yidinaren? Almi ufant iman-nsent tuget n twaculin tiẓawaliyin terra-tent tmara ad cedhent, ad sbilliment deg tagella-ya tanesbaɣurt skud ur tt-ɛerrḍent.  Lḥut-a ihi, wid i d-yeggran ttaɣen-t-id taggara-ya, ala ixxamen i d-yessekcamen tijernanin s wazal-nsent i wayyur, dɣa nutni ma suffɣen 40 neɣ 45 alef i ukilu ur ttḥulfun s wacemma. Akken i aɣ-d-yennan yiwen n useyyad i iqeddcen deg tama n Saket deg Bgayet, ma yella lḥut tikwal yettaɣlay almi ur as-yezmir uẓawali, «aya mačči d rray-nneɣ, acku nekni neznuzuy s waṭas i medden nniḍen i yellan d imzenza (commerçant), syinna nutni ad as-ɛiwden tanezzut akken i ten-isaɛed lḥal». I aɣ-d-yenna win i aɣ-d-yettmeslayen send ad d-yernu ɣef taluft tayeḍ : «ilaq daɣen ad teẓrem dakken ssuma n lḥut mara ad d-nesṭaḍ aṭas neɣ ad d-nesṭaḍ drus tettbeddil, yettusemma mačči kifkif». Akka ihi, ssuma n lḥut tettali d ayen i d-tewwi war ma tessen asubbu. Ma d amsider (consommateur) aredmani yegra-as-d ala layas skud d netta i tent-yettawɣen dima seg taɣlayt n ulzuz. «Nekk s timmad-iw ur semmḥeɣ ara idrimen-nni izaden ara fkeɣ i bu lḥut, maca mara ad t-bɣun warrac-iw ttawiɣ-t-id akken yebɣu yili, amzun yettḥettim-iyi lḥal». Aya yenna-t-id yiwen n ubabat seg Ayt-Smaɛel.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalif 

  
 Yanis Uğeddi d ilemzi yesεan deg uwtay-is 28 n yiseggasen ,yekker-d deg twacult n tẓuri, gar-asen Tahar d anaẓur, baba-as Xellaf d amedyaz win id-igan tarbaεt Akfadu, d win ikecmen deg umussu adelsan .

 Yanis seg wasmi yella d aqrur iḥemmel aẓawan , dɣa asmi yesεa 14 n yiseggasen fkan-as-d arraz d “snitra” din i yebda almud-is ɣef wuarar n lexyuḍ , bab-as ur t-yeğği imi yezga s idis-is, deg wussan n tesnawit icennu deg yirmad idelsanen neɣ inubaz id-yettag uxxam n yilemziyen Ukeffadu anda yecna tizlit-is tamenzut d tajmilt i xali-s Tahar deg useggas 2008 “ajeğğig iruḥen” ,nnan-as-d wid it-iḥemmlen tettcabaheḍ ɣer Tahar fell-as yaεfu yarḥem , ɣur-k ssut ḥlawen yettaken iman i wul yugsen,d taneffut i tudert n yimarayen , d izen i yimsefliden-ik , dɣa deg useggas 2010 yessewjed-d yiwen uḍebsi netta d bab-as anda ṭṭfen asaḍur lwaḥid , deg-s llant 08 tezlatin gar-asent “tiziri yezgan di tiliẓri n umaziɣ s userkeb n tugniwin “Berber TV” , atin iḥemmleɣ ,aεyiɣ, ɣas ḥsu…..llant ugar n waya, s tezlatin-a i yelli aɣlad-is n tẓuri ,yekka deg waṭas n temzizlin ,tifaskiwin , irmad, timeɣriwin …yemmed akken deg ubrid n ccna s uẓawan yugten d iziɣer , d tmedyazt n bab-as lqayen yesεan tadrut .

 Dɣa yeqqim sdis(6) n yiseggasen yeffer ɣef tfarest , yebda yesseklas amaynut imi deg waggur yezrin id-yessisen di teẓrigt s ɣur “Star Plus», d win ineflen d tifawt, d tafuɣalt, d asmekti, d timsirin i wid yellan di tnafusin n tayri,azwan ires ɣef yifyar n tmedyazt , isemsawiyen gren-as-d cbaḥa i useqεed ,anda llant deg-s 08 n tenziztin ,azwel “Thuz ul-inu” gar-asent “Urgaɣ tamurt-iw, ruḥ a tayri, iwacu-tt tayri, tamakurt….). 

 Yanis yecba azwu i ufarnu mi qrid ad yexsi , la isuḍ yellef acku yesεa aɣnib d win yettawin ɣer yidles, tutlayt, thuski, d iwellihen i umaray……

<p style="text-align: right;">Azedine Abdous

  
 I lmend n usali n tfaska tis 6 n « Taɣuri s wurar » n Tizi-Wezzu, i d-yellan deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemri, inelmaden n At-Yanni rzant s lferḥ imi ugar n warrazen i ten-id-iṣaḥen :

 Tlata n tnelmadin n uɣerbaz alemmas Lɛerbi At-Ɛmer :

 •<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Tamsiwt BUƔAREB Silya

 •<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Tamsiwt BECCAN Lina

 •<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Tamsiwt BEṬṬAN Nadeyya

 Rebɛa n inelmaden n weswir wis 5 n uɣerbaz amenzu :

 •<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Tamsiwt LEWWAǦ Ṣara

 •<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Tamsiwt NEDDIL Litisya

 •<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Tamsiwt CAMI Ɣnima

 •<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Mass WAZAR Abdelqader

 Ufraren-d inelmaden d tnelmadin-agi s yeḍrisen igerzen i d-uran s tmaziɣt.

 Nessaram-asen ad ddun deg ubrid-agi, ad cbun:

 • Tamsiwt LABAWI Yasmin, 

 i yewwin Arraz n usebɣes i s-yefka weɣmis La Dépêche de Kabylie aseggas nni n 2011.

 • Mass BEṬṬAN Taǧ,

 i yewwin arraz amenzu n tfaska tadelsant tagraɣlant « Abalisa Tinhinan” deg useggas n 2012.

 • Tamsiwt URAK Lameyya,

 i yewwin arraz wis 3 n tfaska tagraɣlant n tsekla d udlis, deg ussegas n 2013.

 • Tamsiwt DEḤLAL Canez,

 i yewwin arraz amenzu n tfaska tadelsant tagraɣlant n tsekla d udlis, deg useggas n 2014.

 • Tamsiwt Ǧennan Milisa,

 i yewwin arraz ameqran n tfaska tadelsant “Taɣuri s urar », deg useggas 2014.

  
 Hadjimi Mohamed, d amedyaz d amaru. Ilul deg taddart n Chendar deg tɣiwant n Naciria deg lwilaya n Boumerdest. Deg tdiwennit-a, ad d-yewwi awal ɣef umecwar-is deg uḥric-agi n tira d wayen-nniḍen…

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen:Amek i ak-id-tusa tikti tamezwarut deg ubrid n tmedyazt? 

 Hadjimi Mohamed : Ahat tura wwḍen 60 n yiseggasen segmi bdiɣ tira n tmedyazt , ar tura mazal ttaruɣ isefra. Imi isefra-w imenza uriɣ-ten asmi sɛiɣ 16 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-iw. Deg useggas n 1957, refdeɣ imru i tikkelt tamezwarut i tira n yisefra. Imi deg lweqt-nni d ṭṭrad, dɣa ttaruɣ kan s tufra, imi s teqbaylit kan i ssefruyeɣ. Syin akin, asmi wwiḍeɣ 22 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-iw, ttruḥuɣ ɣer umaṭṭaf wis sin, ttiliɣ d inebgi n tedwilt “Iɣennayen iḥeffḍen” n Chikh Nourdine. Ʃerḍeɣ ad cnuɣ, maca ur ṣṣawḍeɣ ara, imi tamezwarut yebɛed umecwar ɣer Lezzayer, tis snat bezzaf ɣef lǧib-iw, imi yeqwa umesruf. Kemmleɣ akkenni alammi sawḍeɣ 28 n yiseggasen dɣa ḥebseɣ leqdic deg unnar-agi. Uɣaleɣ selleɣ i yicennayen-nneɣ imeqqranen, yecban Slimane Azem akked Kamel Hammadi…atg. D nutni i yi-yesḥefḍen tamedyazt d leqwanen-is. S tmedyazt, ttafeɣ iman-iw, ɣur-i tezga d ddwa. Acimi d ddwa? Lukan i ǧǧiɣ ayen d-nniɣ yeqqim daxel-iw, ha-t-an 40 n yiseggasen aya, ur d-yeffiɣ ara.

  Acu n yisental iɣef tettaruḍ tamedyazt-ik?  

 Mačči yiwen, mačči sin, ggten. Tuget n yisefra-w, tezzin ɣef tnegmit n tegrawla tazzayrit, tijmilin, uriɣ ɣef wuguren n tmetti-nneɣ, ɣef lḥif, ɣef tmuḥqranit, ɣef liḥala n unaẓur, ɣef ddunit, ɣef yiẓuran-is (laṣel-is), ɣef yimru swayes sefruyeɣ…atg.

  S usmedyez tuɣaleḍ ɣer usizreg n yidlisen?  

 Ilaq ɣef kra n win yettarun ama d tamedyazt, ama d tullisin neɣ d iḍrisen-nniḍen, ad inadi amek ara d-yeffeɣ ayen yura i wakken medden ad ḥsun ayen yettaru neɣ ɣef wacu yettaru…atg. Ula d nekk d abrid-agi i ḍefreɣ, ssazergeɣ-d sin n yidlisen n tmedyazt i wakken ad ẓren yimdanen d acu i ttxemmimeɣ s ttawil n tmedyazt. D tamuɣli-w kan i d-fkiɣ deg-sen, ssarameɣ d wid ara d-yeglun s watmaten-is.

  Mmeslayeɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef sin-agi n yidlisen?  

 Deg unnar n tira, ɣur-i akka tura sin n wammuden n tmedyazt. Amezwaru ssufɣeɣ-t-id ɣer tezrigin Richa Elsam n Tizi Uzzu, s uzwel “Tudert umedyaz” . d adlis ideg llan 22 n yisefra ɣef waṭas n temsal, tazwert-is yexdem-iyi-tt Mass Rachid Alliche (aselmad, aneggal). Ma d wis sin, d win iwumi fkiɣ isemn “Kcem sya, tefɣeḍ syin” . Ula d netta d ammud n tmedyazt, llan deg-s 20 n yisefra s teqbaylit. Ssufɣeɣ-t-id deg useggas n 2012 ɣer tezrigin n El Amel n Tizi Uzzu.

  Ayɣer d wigi i textareḍ d izwilen n yidlisen-ik? 

  « Tudert umedyaz » d ammud ideg ara naf isefra i uriɣ deg talliyin d tugnatin yemxallafen, d aymi ara ad d-naf deg-s- isental yal wa ɣef wacu i d-yettawi. Gar-asen : tudert, temɣer, timetti, leɛyub n ddunit,…atg. Ma d azwel Tudert umedyaz d awal yesɛan azal ameqqran, imi yal amedyaz amek yettwali timsal d tlufa n ddunit. D tamuɣli-ines s lebɛid i t-yessemxalafen ɣef yimdanen-nniḍen. Dɣa deg wammud-agi « Tudert umedyaz », fkiɣ-d tamuɣli-w ɣef tudert n umedyaz i yi-cban, amek iṭṭeqqir tiṭ-is ɣer sdat, ɣer wayen ur ttwalin ara yimdanen-nniḍen…atg. Yal amedyaz amek yettwali, amek yefhem tilla n tudert, dɣa nekk fkiɣ-d rray-iw deg kra n tlufa. Ma d ammud « Kcem sya, tefɣeḍ syin » d adlis n 20 n yisental yemgaraden, seg usefru ɣer wayeḍ, mmeslayeɣ deg-s ɣef : yimcumen, tafat, ddunit, temẓi d temɣer, ddin…atg. Ferneɣ-as azwel-agi imi ttwaliɣ belli ddunit am uxxam bu snat n tewwura, mi tkecmeḍ seg yiwet, ad tefɣeḍ seg tayeḍ. Neɣ akken-nniḍen tudert d m snat n tewwura ta tessekcam tayeḍ tessufuɣ. Bɣig kan ad d-greɣ tamawt, nekk mačči seg wid-ak i d-yettekksen azwel n udlis seg yiwen gar yisefra yellan deg-s, ilaq ad yeṭṭef talemmast n udlis, ilaq ad as-id-yexdem agzul i wammud-nni.

  Ma yella wayen txeddmeḍ berra n tmedyazt?  

 D tidet, qeddceɣ deg waṭas n yiḥricen-nniden n yidles amaziɣ berra n tira n tmedyazt. Ihi ttalseɣ-d timucuha mi ara i yi-tettunefk tegnit i wakken ad d-ḥkuɣ timucuha n zik i d aɣ-d-ḥkan yimawlan-nneɣ. Tura d nnuba-nneɣ i wakken ad tent-neḥku i warraw-nneɣ. Uriɣ daɣen yiwen n usinaryu n usaru s teqbaylit, semmaɣ-as « Yewret tiqeccar n lḥif», deg tira yesɛa azal n 152 n yisebtar. Am wakken daɣen i yurareɣ deg rrebɛa n yisura s teqbaylit, sin deg-sen ɛeddan-d deg tilibizyu n teqbaylit “TV4”. Amenzu nexdem-it deg Boudjima, fkan-as isem n “Lexḍubegga gar sin watmaten”, wis sin nexdem-it deg Boumerdes, fkan-as azwel-agi “Abrid Yessawen”. Ma d wis kraḍ nettraǧu melmi ara d-iɛeddi. Ma d aneggaru yenna-d umsuffeɣ-ines ahat sya ɣer taggara n waggur n wunbir ad yekfu usaru-agi i wumi isemma “Tanekkra”.

  Amek tettwali tmetti taqbaylit a rgaz i d-iḥekkun timucunha?  

 Am wakken neẓra irkeli belli deg tmetti taqbaylit taqdimt, ur d-yessawal ara urgaz tamacaḥut, d tameṭṭut neɣ d tamɣart kan i d-yettalsen. Maca tura ibeddel lḥal, ulamma qqlilit yirgazen i d-iḥekkun, maca llan kra, nekk d yiwen seg-sen. Igerdan mi ara asen-ḍ-ḥekkuɣ timucuha neɣ timseḍsa, yetteɛjab-iten lḥal aṭas, dɣa mi kfiɣ yiwet i yi-d-ssutren, ad asen-d-rnuɣ tayeḍ. Ula d imeqqranen deg leɛmer ttefraḥen mi ara walin argaz neɣ tameṭṭut yeṭṭfen deg leɛwayed n tjaddit.

  Ulamma twessreḍ yerna tuḍneḍ, maca mazal tqeddceḍ tazmart-ik?  

 D tidet, ulamma uḍneɣ yerna lḥiɣ aṭas deg leɛmer, imi tura ɣur-i 76 n yiseggasen, maca mazal qeddceɣ akka i d-tenniḍ tazmert-iw. Tturareɣ deg yisura, ttaruɣ tamedyazt, ḥekkuɣ-d timucuha d temseḍsa…atg. Ahat d tamedyazt d wayen i ttaruɣ i ufiɣ d ddwa i waṭṭan-iw, nekk tettuɣ-t netta i tettu-iyi ma dhiɣ-d di tira.

  Neẓa belli tewwiḍ yakkan arraz n tmedyazt deg yiwet n tfaska?  

 Aṭas n tfaskiwin n tmedyazt i d-yellan deg tmurt n Leqbayel ama deg Tizi Uzzu, Bgayet, Boumerdes…atg. Ttekkaɣ deg tuget deg-sent, ad d-bedreɣ kra seg-sent: Ussan n tmedyazt n Ath Djennad, Timlilit n tmedyazt n Akbou, Tafaska n tmedyazt n Ait Samil deg Bgayet…atg. Dɣa, deg useggas n 2014, wwiɣ arraz deg tfaska n tmedyazt, i d-yellan deg Udrar n Fad, deg lwilaya n Bgayet.

  Awal-ik n taggara…  

 Ad ak-snemmreɣ kečč a Abedlghani akked yimeɣriyen d yixeddamen n Uɣmis n yimaziɣen n “La dépêche de Kabylie”. Ad asen-iniɣ i yinaẓuren-nneɣ d yimedyazen-nneɣ : “Ilaq ad nefk afud i yiman-nneɣ, yerna ad neg laman deg yilmeẓyen-nneɣ i wakken ad yeddu yidles amaziɣ ɣer sdat…”

   Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ass-nni n larebɛa, 16 deg ɣuct yezrin, i d-yeffeɣ album ajdid n tcennayt taqbaylit Yasmina. Deg uḍebsi-agi i tessekles assegas-a, ad naf 12 n tezlatin tijdidin akked yiwen n ddker anda i d-ttwabder sɣur tamɣart-nni i t-id-yecnan. Tewwi-d Yasmina awal deg wamur ameqqran n tezlatin n album ɣef tmeddurt-is, ladɣa, talliyin i tt-yesnuɣnan s waṭas. Am lehmum n temẓi-is, zwaǧ-is netta d tameẓyant, lexdeɛ n wid tḥemmel, tuzzma d wayen-nniḍen. Ad naf, diɣ, kra n tejmilin. Gar tezlatin i tura ɣef tmeddurt-is d wayen i tt-yerḥan, ad naf : Ucmiten, Ifat lḥal, Lḥiɣ di leɛmer, Axxam n waḍu, Tilufa, Ini-as i yemma. Deg umaynut-agi n ccna n tnaẓurt-agi taqbaylit, ddeqs n tejmilin i terra i yimdanen i yellan deg wul-is, yecban, Jida-as, Kheloui Lounes d JSK. Ula d tameddurt-is, teɛreḍ ad as-d-teg agzul deg yiwet n tezlit iwumi tefka isem « Taddart-iw ». D asmekti n wayen tesɛedda deg ddunit-is : seg wasmi tella meẓẓiyet armi tunag ɣer Fransa. Tebda aktayen-is seg Ugni n Uɛayed anda yella lǧameɛ i yebnan s uẓru. Syin, teṣṣaweḍ slam i warrac n Yizarugen tenna : «ɛeddi ɣur-sen, huzz afriwen, deg yigenni zzi, afeg ɛelli. Siwel-asen i warrac n Yizarugen, d tiɣri n temẓi i d-yesmektan Zaɛzi ». Dinna i d-temmekta aṭas n tɣawsiwin. Temmekta-d abeḥri n tɣaltin, ajenjel timrict, Tala n Tzeɣwin anda tedduri timidkin imi tewḥec deg ṭṭlam. Temmekta-d ula d asmi i tettbedda ɣef yimnaren n yixxamen mi tessutur leɣbar i txeddem d ticcict. ‘’I telḥiḍ ay aḍar, adrar aẓaɣar, teṣɛeb ddunit. Asusi, d uḥemmer, asewwi, aseqcer, semman-iyi tuḥrict ». i d-tenna deg wawal-is. Tecfa am zun d iḍelli ɣef wayen i as-yeḍran, i wayen tesɛedda. Tecfa ɣef umezzir i d-tekkes, ɣef ulemsir iɣef teqqim, ɣef gerninuc i tečča. Tecfa ula ɣef lbir-nni anda i d-tugem aman deg Tgemmunt n Ukerruc. Wamag ɣef wasmi i tettruḥu ɣer uɣebaz, tules-as-d s teɣzi akked tehri, d tajmilt ahat i temddakkalt-is Saliha, teqqar : « Akken i neddukul d Saliḥa ɣer lakkul. Abrid Umegdul, yusa-yi-d ɣef wul, amzun d iḍelli. S rrekba n uɣyul, ttawiɣ lemtul, s sḍa d cnawi. Dagi mi d-nlul, amennuɣ iḍul, ay Iɣil n Yifri ». Deg taggara, tudder-d s usḥissef uguren i tt-yeǧgân tunag ɣer lɣerba, ad teǧǧ tamurt-is mebla lebɣi. « Ay abuneqqar, i yi-yentan deg uḍar, di tegrest n Tulmut d Lḥedd n Sliman. Aslen deg ucekkar, aqejmur iqedder, anwa ara irun fell-i, ɛebbi rnu kan. Grirbeɣ deg yiɣzer, uliɣ asawen meqqer, ḥedd ma tɣiḍeɣ, luleɣ-d di lemḥan. Cerkeɣ lebḥar, abrid-iw yenǧer, ruḥeɣ ǧǧiɣ-ken, d lɣerba i yi-yeččan ». Terra tezlit-agi d asaru ameẓẓyan (Clip) i yellan akka tura deg uẓeṭṭainmetti. « Jida » d azwel n tezlit anda i d-tesmekti timenɣiwt n jedi-s sɣur lɛesker n Fransa, mmi-s mazal ɛad ur d-ilul. « Kheloui » d tajmilt i ucennay, ladɣa ɣef tebɣest-is imi yessekles tizlit taneggarut netta yuɣ lḥal yella deg sbiter. « Ucmiten », d tizlit anda i d-tesmekti Yasmina wid-nni i tt-ikelxen ass-a mi telḥa deg leɛmer am wakken i t-id-tecna deg tezlit-nniḍen « Lḥiɣ di leɛmer ». «Ḥrez-iyi tarwa », « JSK », « Ifat lḥal », « Pharell », « Axxam n waḍu », « Tilufa », « Ini-as i yemma » akked « Ddker », d isental i d-tecna tcennayt tameqqrant Yasmina. 

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Ihegga-d sem-a iɛeddan “Ugraw Tigawt Ilemẓiyen” yiwet n tedwilt n ubraz d usizdeg n twennaḍt deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, i ibeɛden s wazal n 70 n yikilumitren ɣef waɣir n Bgayet. S uberriḥ n « Ayt Smaɛel, taɣiwant tezdig », iɛeggalen n tdukkla Raj n temnaḍt akked ddeqs n yimezdaɣ iwumi tehwa tekti-a, kkren-asen afus deg ufus i yiberdan d yizenqan n tnezduɣin akken ad asen-kksen neɣ ad asen-sneqsen, xersum seg yiguda i yeṭṭenḍeggaren setwaɣen lḥala. Imi akken ẓran wid yesseḥbibiren ɣef unagraw akuluji, ixuss nezzeh uwkay ɣur medden ɣef temḍerrit i tettidir twennaḍt sɣur umdan, am wakken ixuss usḥulfu daɣen. Ladɣa imi uqant tdukkliwin i yekkaten ɣef twennaḍt d tezdeg n ugama. « Nessaram ad d-ttwaheggayent tigawin am ti seg teswiɛt ɣer tayeḍ iqerben. Akken nlehhu d twennaḍt d wayen i aɣ-d-yezzin, i nlehhu d tudert-nneɣ ». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel. Ad d-nesmekti d akken tigezmi n Raj Ayt Smaɛel, tella tɣab seg unnar taggara-a, maca sidren-tt-id ussan-a kan kra n yilemẓiyen i yebɣan ad xedmen i ubaɣur n tmetti s umata.

  M. K. 

  
 Akka i d-yettwafren, s wudem unṣib, Ablehamid Sadmi, ass-nni n lexmis 7 deg cutember 2017, d aselway n terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel.

 Deg tejmaɛt tamagnut i xedmen yiɛeggalen n tesqamut n tedbelt n umcawer, ass-nni n lexmis 7 deg cutember ɣef 14h, fernen-d amyurar aqdim n Jumbo-Jet, Sadmi, i wakken ad yili d aselway ɣef tesqamut n yimḍebbren ara yilin deg tselwayt n terbaɛt n Les Canaris. Ihi, akka i teṭṭef deg wawal-is tesqamut n yiɛeggalen n tedbelt n umcawer imi i d-tenna ass-nni n temlilit n 7 ɣuct, anda i d-yella ustixer n Hannachi d aselway n JSK, d akken ad tili temlilit-nniḍen, ass n 7 cutember 2017, i ufran d usbeddi n uselway ajdid n terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel. Imi ala Sadmi i d-ibedden, deg unejmuɛ-a, ɣer tselway n JSK, ihi fernen-t kan yiɛeggalen n tesqamut s wudem unṣib i wakken ad yili d aselway n JSK. Lumur banen-d uqbel tifranin i yeḍran deg temlilit-a. Uqbel ad ldin asenduq n tefranin, ssawlen-as i Sadmi i yellan kan deg leqruba-nni, imi 10’ n ddqayeq kan yelḥeq-d, i wakken ad yeḥder i tulya n tsenqut u ad iwali s timmad-is agemmuḍ. S wakka i yettwafren Sadmi Abdelhamid i wakken ad yuɣal d aselway n JSK deg umekkan n Hannachi i yettwakksen s terbaɛt-agi, dɣa, i yerran Sadmi ɣef uqerru n terbaɛt n leqbayel. Deg wawal awezzlen i d-yenna uselway amaynut i tɣamsa, ass-nni n 7 deg cutember 2017, iwala d akken « d aḥemmel n terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel i t-id-ideggren ɣer tselwayt. D aseḥbiber ɣef yiniten n JSK i yi-d-yewwin i wakken ad d-uɣaleɣ. Acu kan, JSK teḥwaǧ akk wid i tt-iḥemmlen ». Am wakken yesnemmer iɛeggalen n tedbelt n umcawer i yerran deg-s taflest, yessaram ad yefk udem akked tmuɣli-nniḍen i terbaɛt n JSK. Iḍelli-nni, uqbel tajmaɛt tamagnut-a, yemlal Sadmi akked Francesco Cavallo, yiwen umɛellem aṭenlyani n tkabbanit n yixxamen i yebɣan ad yesnefli deg terbaɛt n JSK , deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt, anda i d-mmeslayen, deg yiwem usarag, ɣef wahil i d-heggan gar-asen i JSK. Gar yisenfaren i d-ihegga Cavallo, s wazal n 35 yimelyan n dollars, ad naf lebni n sbiter ameẓyan, asensu akked ummis n usileɣ. Am wakken i d-yenna, diɣ, : « Ad nefk akk ttawilat ilaqen i terbaɛt n JSK i wakken ad tuɣal ɣer umḍiq i tuklal, yakan. Am wakken ad d-nelhu s lesnaf-nniḍen n waddal mačči kan s ddabex n uḍar ». I usmekti, yella Hannachi ɣef uqerru n terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel JSK, ɣef teɣzi n 24 n yiseggasen, syin yettwakkes s ɣur iɛeggalen n tesqamut n tedbelt n umcawer ass n letnayen 7 deg waggur n ɣuct ɣef lewhi n 14, deg uxxam n JSK. Yekka-d umtawa gar akk iɛeggalen n tedbelt, ula d imeddukkal-is, Azlef d Chioukh, qeblen s shala astexxer-a imi ɣef wakken i d-nnan « Xas ulmma yexdem aṭas i JSK, meɛna yal tadyant tesɛa taggara u Hannachi d lwan kan ad yeǧǧ tarbaɛt n JSK. Acu kan mazal-t ad yeqqim d aselway n yiseɣ n terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel JSK ». Uqbel, ihi, ad d-yili usbeddi n uselway amaynut i JSK, d Malik Azlef d Med Zeghdoud i isedduyen timsal deg uxxam n JSK. Gar iɛeggalen n tedbelt ad naf : Mellal, Azlef, Chioukh, Azouaou, Kana, Bouzit,…atg. Astixer n Hannachi ɣef uqerru n JSK, ur d-tusi ara kan akka, aṭas n temsbaniyin, tikliyin akked ucetki i d-yellan deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu sɣur wid iḥemmlen JSk, anda ssuturen astixer n Hannachi ɣef uqerru n terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n JSK. Ladɣa imyurar-nni iqdimen, yecban Fergani, Belahcène, Adghigh d wiyaḍ, acu kan ur ssawḍen ara ad t-sbeɛden ɣef umekkan-is. Akken yebɣu yili, yuɣal-d lferḥ ɣer yimferǧen n JSK imi i t-id-sbanen deg yiberdan n temdint n Tizi Uzzu.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Dduṛt-a, nebɣa ad yili umeslay ɣef ccira n ufunzer (épistaxis) , yettawin ddeqs n medden ar ttbiṭar s lɛeǧǧlan, imi akken yezmer ad yili ufunzer-a xfif, izerri wer ugur, izmer diɣ ad d-yeglu s tlufa timeqqṛanin labeɛda ma yeṭṭuqqet neɣ yedda di lweqt. D tazzla n yidammen seg tanzarin, am ar beṛṛa, neɣ ar daxel (ɣer yimi neɣ s agerjum). Yettban-d aṭas di tallit n teṣmuḍi ɣer wid yesɛan gar 20 d 49 n yiseggasen. Yezmer ad yili xfif, izerri wer ugur. Yezmer diɣ ad yili d ssebba n ddeqs n wuguren imi yettawi-d tikkwal tamettant n umdan.

  D acu i d-yettakken afuzer? 

 Ssebba-s mucaɛen gar madden, d tacriḥt yellan gar tanzarin, yettazzalen d idim mkul mi ara tt-yennal ufus neɣ mi ara yili lḥamu.Maca llant ddeqs n ssebbat nniḍen ara d-nebder: taṛuzi n yeɣsan n tanzarin umbeɛd amennuɣ neɣ uɣelluy, axenzir neɣ tamsalmit yettḥazen tinzert akk waṭṭan ubeḥri ma yedda di lweqt. Ddeqs n waṭṭanen n yidammen zemren ad d-fekken afunzer, aneggaru-a yeṭṭuqqut, yettuɣal-d acḥal n tikkal d ayen i yettawin amejjay ad inadi ɣef ssebba deg yidammen n umdan. Ula d tallit n tarda ɣer tlemẓit, aṭṭan n sskeṛ d lehlak n turin zemren ad d-glun s ccira-a.

  Amek ara neɛqel afunzer iweɛṛen? 

 Afunzer iweɛṛen d win yeṭṭuqten, yettazallen s waṭas si tanzarin i snat, yettiɣzif ddeqs di lweqt. Ula d amdan tettbeddil liḥala-s, imi yettiwriɣ, yettergigi, yettemlelli tikkwal ikeččem di lkuma ma iɛeṭṭel afunzer-a wer ma yettusejji di lweqt.

  Acu ilaqen ad t-yexdem umdan zdat n ufunzer? 

 Di tazwara, ur ilaq ara amdan ad yettqelleq, ula d win yellan ɣur-s ilaq ad as-yekkes aɣilif. Akken diɣ, yesfk fell-as ad yeqqim ɣef tqeṣrit-is, ma ur yeṣṣaweḍ ara, yezmer ad yeẓẓel cwiṭ kan iman-is akken ad as-yekkes facul. Syin , ad yeddem sin iḍuḍan imezwura, ad ten-isers s uẓeyyeṛ ɣef tiwwura n tanzarin-is azal n 10 n dqayeq. Yezmer ad iɛawed aya i tikkelt nniḍen, imi ma d tacriḥt-nni i ɣef id-nemmslay yakkan i d ssebba , izerri ufunzer imiren. Ma iwala umdan dakken tazzla n yidammen tettkemmil ilaq-as ad yerzu s lɛeǧǧlan ɣer ttbiṭar, u ad yerr tameččimt n leqṭen azeddgan deg tinzert yettazzalen d idammen neɣ i snat imi din i llan ttawilat ifazen akken ad yettusejji ufunzer, syin ad yili unadi s telqay ɣef ssebba-s. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

 NETTRAJU AD MUQLEM ƔUR-NNEƔ 

 S USIREM D AMEQRAN

 TANMIRT NWEN !

  
 Seld mi d-tekcem tefsut, yecreq-d yiṭij-is aqesḥan, yesɣar akal d yimɣan, yusa-d deg wayyur-a-ines n mayyu, lawan n tuddma n umger i lqerḍ. Imi aql-aɣ deg wayyur aneggaru n tsemhuyt-a, ḥeḍru-d ad d-yaweḍ unebdu, walan yimezdaɣ n usamar n Bgayet, gar-asen wid n temnaḍt n Ayt Smaɛel d tuddar tiǧartin am Rrif, Talaɛṭa d Kefrida, yessefk fell-asen ad lhun d ccɣel n tmegra uqbel ad ifat wakud-is. Acku, lqerḍ-nni ẓran-t yemɣi-d yeɣzif, yewriɣ, ihegga i tukksa. Rnu, seg tama-nniḍen, llan wid i iɣiwlen deg-s imi nwan ad frun leqdic-is send ad d-kecmen wussan-a n wayyur n remḍan. Imi leɛtab n tmegra n walim-nni iban yettiwɛir ugar deg tseɛtin n wuẓum, mi ara ixeddem yiwen netta yelluẓ neɣ yeffud. Ladɣa, ma yettuḥettem, ad yemger ddaw lḥamu n tafukt i iḥerrqen. Dɣa, skud aseggas-a irew, yefti lqerḍ s waṭas, mazal ar ass-a kra n twaculin ttbekkirent tasebḥit i tmegra send ad d-yecreq yiṭij, ttuɣalent tameddit mi ara tɛeddi tafukt kra n yimukan, ad tili tili. Ma d wid i yesɛan drus n tferkiwin ideg yella walim, kksen yakan amgar imi yeshel ccɣel-is. Yuɣ lḥal, ula d tamegra n wayen niqal yettwazerɛen, am temẓin, ajilban d yimɣi n bu leqrun, tusa-d deg yiwen n wakud akked tin n lqerḍ. Ad yeqqim leqdic-a d win yelhan seg zik, acku ad yesfaydi seg-s uɣersiw, ad yernu umdan ad yaf abaɣur deg lmal-is.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Ddurt-agi yezrin, ass n umenzu n furar, tella Massa Saεida Benhabiles, taselwayt taγelnawt n Waggur azeggaγ azzayri d tinebgit deg Tizi Uzzu, anda i d-tewwi lemεawnat i lfayda n 300 n twaculin i izedγen deg yidurar εlayen n tmurt n leqbayel, ladɣa tid yenṭarren di tallit-nni n udfel. Mbaεd imi temlal akked lwali n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu Mass Muḥamed Budarbali deg uxxam n ugerzu, terza γer temnaḍt n Yiferḥunen anda itewwi lemεawnat (isufar n wučči, lebsa neγ iceṭṭiḍen, taduli akked 5 n yimuturen n trisiti (groupes électrogènes) i lfayda n twaculin yenxaṣen n 3 n tγiwanin, Iferḥunen, At Yilliten d Imesuḥal. Syin, tameddit n wass, terza-d γer temnaḍt n Wizgan, taγiwant n Yillulen n Umalu, anda i d-tewwi lemεawnat i lfayda n 40 n twaculini yettewfarqen γef 2 n tγiwanin, Illulen akked At- Zikki. Tekfa tirza tameddit n wass di taddert n Bunaεman taγiwant n Zekri, yiwet n taddart i yegren irebbi i tegrewla n Lezzayer. Iswi n tirza-agi, d aẓeṭṭa n tegmat akked tdukli gar yimdanen.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Islam Bessaci 

<div> 
  
 Ayen i iḍerrun deg yinurar n ddabex uḍar, d ayen ur iqebbel leɛqel. S imal yettɛeddi lweqt, s imal ttnernit twaɣiyin deg yinurar armi tturarent, taggara-a, temliliyin timeqqranin, anda ttilint zik d timeɣriwin n ddabex n yurar, mebla imferǧen.

 Uɣalent temliliyin am win iiceṭṭḥen i uderɣal. Ma tkemmel akka, ad uɣalen ad uraren mebla imferǧen. Syin ma yella ulac anwa ara iwalin timliliyin, i wacuɣer ara leɛben? Acu kan, asteqsi i yellan akka tura deg wallaɣ n yimdanen d wa : i wacuɣer i yella waṭas n ccwal-agi deg yinurar ? Ansi i d-yuɣ aẓar ? Aya, ur d-yusi ara kan akka. llant ssebbat, llan wid i as-yefkan azuɣer, ama s lebɣi, neɣ mebla lebɣi. Ma nuɣal kan ciṭ ɣer deffir, ad naf d akken ilmeẓyen-agi yettruḥun ad ferǧenn timiliyin, amur aeqqran deg-sen lulen lweqt-nni n rrebrab. Ihi, ufan-d ccwal deg tmetti, nwan s ccwal i teddunt temsalt. Tis snat, mi ara nwali imḍebbren n trebbuyaɛ, ad ttnaɣen gar-asen neɣ akked yimḍebbren n ddabex uḍar n Lezzayer s wawalen qessiḥen u yal wa ad yesseḍlam wayeḍ, aya yesnernay lebɣeḍ d lkerh gar yimferǧen. Ulac anwa yettlumen iman-is. Ulac anwa iqebblen lexsara: ttwalin kan igemmaḍ, ur d-cligen ara deg wayen-nniḍen : la deg urar neɣ deg ttrebga. Aya, ad naf ula ɣer trubbayaɛ timecṭaḥ i yetturaren deg lwilayat, neɣ ɛad deg tudrin imi yal ddurt, yettnekkar ccwal deg yinurar, ayen i d-igellun s luǧruḥ n yimyuraren akked lemḍerra meqqran i yinurar. Deg yiwen usarag i ixedmen yimḍebbren n yiɣallen n laman deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt, nnan-d d akken afus yekka-d seg yimḍebbren n trubuyaɛ imi iɛessasen-nni ssexdament deg yinurar, amur ameqqran deg-sen sɛeddan-d lḥebs. ‘’Amek ara iṛebbi, uselmad ur netturebba’’, i as-yenna winna. Ma ɣef temsalt-nni n ccwalat i d-yellan gar MAC d CRB, nnan-d d sin n yixaddamen n unnar 5 yulyu i asen-iɛemden yimferǧen ad kecmen s llḥerraqa akked iḥerban s umata. Ugar n 1 400 n fumigènes i ṭṭfen iɣallen n laman ɣer win i ten-yesnuzun. Mačči kan daya. Deg useggas 2012, ufan iɣallen n laman 164 n tḥerraqiyin, 99 n fumigènes d wayen-nniḍen deg texxamt n umyurar n MCA, Fawzi Chaouci, deg usensu n 5 yulyu. Ma d ass-nni n lexmis iɛeddan, d Adel Bougueroua, amyurar n CRB, uɣur ufan iɣallen n laman lkif akked tqerɛetin n ccrab deg tkerrust-is. Ha-t-an iɛedda iḍelli deg craɛ. Anwa i d abrid ay abrid ma yella d imyurar i ileqmen ccwal-agi. D ccwal, diɣ, i yeglan s lmut n umyurar n JSK, Albert Ebossé i mazal tɛelleq sin yiseggasen-aya. Mebla ma nettu ayen yeḍran deg ussan-agi kan iɛeddan gar MOB akked MCO anda kkren ccwalat d imeqqranen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine Moula 

<div> 
  
 Iẓuran n tfaska tadelsant « Taγuri s Wurar » n usegga-a 2015 s usentel « Adlis d Nekkni », i yebdan s wudem unṣib ass n 21 maγres almi d 02 yebrir n useggas ideg nella γef teγzi n 13 n wussan, d wid yemden, imi ahil n leqdic d amesbaγur yennul timnaḍin niḍen am temnaḍt n Yiεeẓẓugen. Dγa ahil n leqdic id-heggan yemḍebren n tfaska-agi « Taγuri s Wurar » deg wexxam n yedles n tγiwant n Yiεeẓẓugen d win id-ijebden tamuγli i warrac imecṭaḥ d yimawlan-nsen id-irruḥen s tuget ḥedren. Deg ass wis 02 n tfaska-agi tadelsant, yella-d yiwen n leqdic s wazil-is deg aḥric n yisakwanen yemgaraden γef wedlis, am taklut d wannu&amp;gamma,; ideg yukkan deqs n warrac imecṭaḥ s lεamur yemgaraden di 06 almi d 14 n yiseggasen, id-ibegnen lfarḥ-nsen deg sakwanen-agi, imi d tagnit yelhan akken ad-sufγen afrayen-nsen d wayen i ttḥulfun. Akken id-yella usekfel n tmucuha i yellan d azamul n teqbaylit, imi tamacahut d aγarbaz n tudert, syen tella-d temilit d wemyaru, taγuri n umezgun, aselmed n umezruy d waṭas niḍen. D tagnit yelhan imi deqs n warac imecṭaḥ d yimawlan-nsen id-iqesden axxam n yedles n yiεeẓẓugen, fursen tagnit deg ussan-agi n imuras.

<p style="text-align: right;">islam Bessaci

  
 Iberreḥ-d ussan-a kan Uḥuddu Aɣerman (Protection Civile) n waɣir n Bgayet s kra n leḥsabat ɣef tuffɣiwin-is ɣer wannar deg useggas-a yekfan n 2016, akked userwes (taqrint) gar-as d sendilindi, neɣ 2015. Deg useggas-a yekfan ihi, n 2016, gren-d iman-nsen yirgazen n usellek azal n 33913 n tikkal. Gar wayen yexḍan ilel, akked teftist-nni deg unebdu s lqidar n 7932 n tuffɣiwin. Yettwajerred daɣen usiweḍ ɣer udawi s 12523 n tiwin, 1827 d azrab ɣer yiberdan ɣef ssebba n yisehwa. Rnu-as tid n usexsi n tmes s wazal n 2252. Iban dakken zaden ladɣa yisehwa (laksidat) n ubrid ma nwala i useggas n 2015. Imi deg useggas-n ḍran-d kan 1708 n yisehwa. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef tẓegwa i tečča tmes, ahat ɛeddan 44 n yihikṭaren. Ɣer da, yewwi-d ad d-nesmekti belli, deg teɣzi n tegrest-a, ad yeg Uḥuddu Aɣerman n Bgayet deg waṭas n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen yiwet n tigawt n uḥesses ɣef yimahiyen n umunuksid n karbun i d-iteffɣen seg wallalen n useḥmu s wurrig (lgaz). Aqeddic-a, ad yili s tallelt n Tanmehla n usegmi (tterbiya). <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  M. K. 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Akka tura, segmi i d-yekcem useggas amaynut n 2016, imezdaɣ n twilayt n Bgayet, akka am wid n tmurt n Leẓẓayer s-umata, tatafen iɛebbaḍ nsen ɣef ayen yaɛnan timerniwt n ssumat n yisufar n wučči lakked d-usiweḍ. Ussan-a, mazal ɛad ur d-iban ara kra ɣef ayagi. Ama d yizegza, igumma, neɣ tuččiyin nniḍen s-umata ulac akka amaynut deg ssumat taswiḥt-a ! Ula d-aṣiweḍ ulac d-acu yernan. Asikel ɣer yal tama dagi deg twilayt n Bgayet ur i beddel ara ssuma. Akken neẓra, liṣunṣ d lmaẓut rnan seg wass-nni n 1 yennayer yezrin. Ayagi, iban, dayen ar ad-yawin timerniwt deg waṭaṣ n yeḥricen. Maca, ɣas akkeni ussan-a ulac kra n laɣla, imezdaɣ n twilayt-agi ẓran belli ttamsalt n kra n wussan kan. « Aqlaɣ n ttfaraṣ ussan. Zriɣ belli kulec ad yali. An xelleṣ ayen ur nečči. ahaw-t kan! » akka iɣ d-yenna yiwen n bab twacult deg tama n Weqbu. Akka, am Mas-agi, medden ẓran belli timerniwt ad d-tili assa neɣ azekka. Ussan-agi kan, imeṣiwḍen n yisufar (transporteurs de marchandises) gezmen abrid aɣelnaw wis 9 akken ad begnen lɣiḍ nsen ɣef timerniwt n liṣenṣ yagi. Sya u sya, nesla belli wid ikesben ifurguten lakked lkiran aten-ad temcawaren akken ad rnun summat n-usikel (γoyage). Wagi dayen ibanen, imi zyada deg liṣunṣ akked lmaẓuṭ taɛna-ten srid, imi nutni s yisufar-agi i teddun ikumya-nsen ! Trisiti, ula d netta-t terna. Wid i « tetten » nnig n 250 ikiluwaṭen i useggas ad xelṣen laɣrama. Akka, tikubaniyin i xedmen deg twilayat-agi yezmer lḥal ad rnun-t i yisufar id ṣenɛen-t. Acku, timacinin i ssaxdamen-t teddun-t akkit s trisiti. Tiwaculin ɣurṣen-t daɣen timerniwt-agi n trisiti, ilaq kan ad cuḥen-t i tafat! Ula d leqhawi n Net waqil ad rnun-t i ssuma n-ucuddu ɣer linternet (connexion à l’Internet). Ma nessiwzel ameslay: aṭaṣ n « tlufa » traǧun-t » imesuddar (les consommateurs) acku, aṭaṣ daɣen n yisufar ar ay-rnu-n. Cuddet kan ibugas nwen a ddin uqabac !<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y 

  
 Ulamma 23 n yiseggasen i yezrin segmi iɣab Tahar Djaout, s kra n win i t-yesnen neɣ ahat win yeɣran agerruj-nni i d-yeǧǧa d awezɣi ad t-yettu, imi tikta-s mazal ttenfufudent di tmetti, tid ileddin allen i lɣaci amzun akken d tafat deg yifri

 Tira-s, ama deg wungalen neɣ deg yiɣmisen anda yeqdec, tecba tayeggirt yuɣen deg yiḥerqan, tefka-d ṣṣaba, tin akken ara yessuzfen tagut ɣef wallaɣen n yimeɣriyen. «les chercheurs d’os, Les vigiles d L’exproprié» d waṭas n wayen akk yura ad ilin d inagan fell-as, d amusnaw yerran tamusni-s gar yifassen n yimdanen, am akken daɣ yella d amedyaz n tallit-is. Mmi-s n Wulxu, ilul ass n 11 deg yennayer 1954, yekcem s aɣerbaz di taddart-is almi d aseggas n 1964, imir yegguǧ ɣer tmanaɣt anda ikemmel leqraya. Deg 1970, imi lwelha-s terra ɣer tira, yewwi arraz ɣef yiwet n tullist iwumi isemma «Les insoumis» deg yiwet n temsizzelt taseklant. Segmi i d-yewwi turagt-is deg tusnakt deg useggas n 1976, yebda tira deg uɣmis n El Moudjahid. Ɣas ulamma d tusnakt i yeɣra, d tin i yeḍfer deg tesdawit, maca tira tezdeɣ allaɣ-is, ahat deg-s i yettaf ddwa. S yin, yuɣal ɣer Algérie Actualités, anda iqeddec deg tesga n yidles. Din i ifures tagnit iwakken ad yerr tajmilt i waṭas n yimyura Izzayriyen yuɣalen di rrif. Yal tikkelt, aniwa iwumi ara yeldi tawwurt, ad d-yemmeslay fell-as, ad t-id-yessufeɣ seg tatut. Abrid-is injer-it s yimru, yessa-t s tikta ireṣṣan ɣef tusna d tugdut. Acḥal d tafaska ideg d-yufrar am yitri ilmend n wayen yura, ama d ungal, d asefru neɣ d tullist. Asmi yeldi unnar di 1988, yeslal-d yiwen n uɣmis iwumi isemma «Ruptures» tama n yimeddukal-is Metref akked Djaâd. Imi tallit-nni kkren-d yimesḥaf ad aɣ-beddlen tikli, ṭṭfen iberdan d leǧwameɛ, ɛebblen ad d-sersen buberrak ɣef yimdanen. Wa yeffer, wa yerwel, wa ɛerqent-as ! Imi yeggugem, ula d amɣar azemni ara nciwer iɣab seg lqum-a. Tahar Djaout, yegguma ad yeqbel ṭṭlam i d-yeɣlin deg uzal, yugi ad yanez i llafɛa. Dɣa di lawan-nni i d-yenna : Ma tessusmeḍ ad temteḍMa tenniḍ-d ad temteḍ Ihi, ini-d temteḍ Segmi walan yeɛdawen n tudert acḥal i yezmer ad ten-yerreẓ s tikta d ṣṣwab, kkren ɣur-s s lǧehl d yiɣil. Uznen-as yiwen n yilemẓi, mazal ur temlal ara tmelɣiɣt-is, yessureg-as kra n terṣaṣin ɣer uqerru-nni yeččuren d tamusni. Ass-a, ad d-nemmekti kan dakken d ameɣnas amenzu i yeɣlin s ufus n rrebrab di 1993. S kra n win i t-yesnen, yeḥsa azal-is, yerra-as tajmilt akken yufa. Matoub, ad fell-as yeɛfu yerḥem, yerra-as yiwet n tejmilt anda yemmeslay i Kenza, taqcict tamaẓuẓt n Djaout, anda yenna :A Kenza yelli ur ttru ara D iseflan neɣli ɣef Lezzayer uzekka. D acu kan, awi yufan idammen n wid yeɣlin akka d iseflan ur ttruḥun kan akka, imi ilaq abrid i d-nejren ad t-neḍfer. Akka i d tajmilt i ttrajun seg-neɣ. Am wakken i as-yenna Didouche : «Ma neɣli, ḥader-t ɣef wayen iɣef i d-nekker.» 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Nabila. B 

  
 Aɛmer Awma seg taddart n At Buɛli r Yiwet n tikkelt, issekra Aɛmer Awmer aserdun-is i yiwen ad yawi tislit s At Ḥelli. Netta, iḍḥa-d ur as-fkin ara lekra. Iwweḍ alammi d talemmast n ubrid indeh i userdun ibedd, yenna-asen ar da d-ters teslit-a. Nnan-as wid-nni, ar naweḍ s axxam, ad ak-n-nefk lekra userdun. Yenna-as Aɛmer Awmer: “ A ḥeq wihin d wihin ar da d-ters teslit-a!” Alammi i as-ten-id fkan i s-isseraḥ i userdun. Yenna-as :

 Issers-itt ddaw At Ḥelli

 Issers-itt ddaw inijel

  Qebḍen-as lajel

 Ikkes-as akk lesdaq-nni

 Iggul Si Aɛmer Awmer

 Ass-a d axeṣṣar

 Lekra n userdun ad d-teɣli.

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Tettkemmil deg Uweqqas tdukkla Azday Adelsan aheggi n yisaragen-is, iseklanen yal taggara n ddurt. D ttiɛad i ttraǧun tura mačči ala imezdaɣ n Uweqqas, wanag ula d imḥemmalen n tsekla deg Tmurt n Yizwawen merra. Ladɣa imi simmal neccden imura s tutlayt n Mulud At Mɛemmer. Ass n 11 deg unbir iɛeddan dɣa, d amaru Aweɛmer Uleɛmara i d-yettwanecden i Tɣellust taseklant akken ad d-yawi awal ɣef yidlisen i d-yessufeɣ. Ulamma ur telli tgerrez liḥala n tegnewt, meɛna ddeqs n yiterrasen i d-yerzan ad ttḥessen i win i yesɛan amezruy yelhan deg umaḍal n tira. Ula d askasi i d-iḍefren asarag, yella igerrez, ɣef tnaga n umsarag s timmad-is. « Yeɛjeb-iyi aṭas usnubget d uswir aɛlayan n uskasi deg Uweqqas. Ssarameɣ asken-iw yerra-d i wayen tettraǧu terbaɛt n « Tɣellust taseklant » d uzayez. Ad d-uɣaleɣ s tedfi ɣur-wen ɣer sdat, i lmend n tsufaɣ (publications) timaynutin ». D tanaga-a i d-yura Mass Uleɛmara i wat Azday Adelsan. I usmekti, Aweɛmer Uleɛmara d amaru, d amazzag amecciwer deg usefrek. Ilul deg taddart n Budafal, tazwara n yiseggasen n xemsin. Deg temẓi-is yeɣra tasengama, tussna d tjerrumt tamaziɣt. Deg 1985, yella gar yiɛeggalen i d-yesbedden tamɣunt (ligue) tazayrit n uḥuddu ɣef yizerfan n umdan. Yessufeɣ-d ar tura 7 n yidlisen, ad d-nebder seg-sen »Akkin i udrar » d ungal. « Iberdan n tissas » d adlis ɣef tmeddurt n umǧahed Mesɛud At Ɛemmar. « Tullianum » – Taggara n Yugurten », d ungal. « Timlilit di 1962 », d ungal daɣen.

   M. K. 

  
 Send ad tili taddart n Tmaɣuct, tuɣ llant kra n twaculin, mfarzaɛent, yal yiwet tettidir weḥd-s. Zedɣen di Tɣerfet, zedɣen di Tala Bezru…Ma d Sidi Salem-U-Mexluf, yusa-d si Terga Zeggaɣen deg unẓul n Lmaruk. Tamurt, tettak-it i tayeḍ alammi d-yewweḍ ɣer Umecras deg tmurt Leqbayel. Yella ikess i yiwen uxxam, nutni ur faqen ara yis-s. Ass-nni, issefqed bab lmal, yufa-t yeṭṭes, tisekrin la as-ttanint, uccanen la as-d-ttaran lmal. Yuɣal-d s axxam, inna-asent i tlawin: ‘’yyamt, ad tfetlemt seksu, wagi ara i aɣ-ikessen mačči d ameksa. Mmugrent-t ɣer tewwurt s teɣratin. Yenna-asent acu-t akka ? Acu-t akka yeḍran ? Nutenti, qqarent-as kan: ‘’cuffaɛa a Ccix’’ ! Cuffaɛa a Ccix’’! Inṭaq, yenna-asen: ‘’tura ad awen-d-iniɣ: Lukan ad i yi-teṣrem, yili ad awen-ṣṣerwiɣ lmal, imi akka, bqa laxir’’. Iṭṭerḍeq ɣer Tmaɣuct, yiwet n taddart deg At Dwala. Iwweḍ, yufa tama n yiwet n tḥeccaḍt tasedda, indeh fell-as tekker. Yelḥa ɣer sdat, d izem, indeh fell-as ikker. inna-asen: ‘’d ayen, dagi ara nezdaɣ’’. Syin, isgerw-d tiwaculin-nni imferzaɛen, yenna-asen: ‘’a yatmaten! i wakken ad yeddukel ṛṛay-nwen, ad yiǧhid yiɣil-nwen, yessefk ad tesbeddem taddart di tama-a’’. Qqaren-d, ulin-d si Tala n Uzru, ulin-d si Tɣerfet, bdan a ferrsen, sbeddayen ixxamen di tama-nni i asen-d-inna. Akken akk agur n ɣuct, yella d lxedma alammi tbedd taddart n Tmaɣuct . Akka, qqaren yimezwura:” Ur d-sbedden tudrin alammi ǧǧan tineswin”. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

<div> 
  
 Dda Mḥend : azul a Sriffeg ! d acu i t-xedmeḍ akka?

 Sriffeg : Aql-i teẓẓɛeɣ izan, aɛyiɣ deg yiman-iw mačči d kra, ula d leḥyuḍ aɛyan deg-i.

 Dda Mḥend : acimi akka i teɛyiḍ deg yiman-ik ? ddunit telha mačči d kra.

 Sriffeg : telha ddunit ! waqila teskeɛrireḍ fell-i ?

 Dda Mḥend : ad iyi-imneɛ Rebbi deg daɛwessu-k. tesneḍ ddadda-k Mḥend yettkellix ɣef medden, ruḥ steqsi akk at taddart ttirni, ak-d-inin akk dda Mḥend d aḥcayci. Yal yiwen yefka-as lkar-iis, yerna s taḍsa d lehcaca.

 Sriffeg : Tenniḍ-iy-d ddunit telha ! anda akka tettwaliḍ lhu-agi-ines di tmurt-a di laɛnaya-k ? imdanen regglen ɣer tmura tiberraniyin, llan wiyaḍ zeggren ilell s teflukin, wa yewweḍ ɣer yeswi-s, wa yeǧǧa din tarwwiḥt-is. Lxedma ulac, tamezduɣt ula, keččini ad qqareḍ telha ddunit-a!

 Dda Mḥend : Amek akka lxedma ulac ! tella, ahat ur –nudaḍ ara kan, «la forge» n taddart ha-tt-an temdel tewwurt-is, yuli-tt uɣebbar. Yya-d ad tt-neldi ad tt-xedmeḍ d aḥeddad. 

 Sriffeg : waqila ḥeqqrent-iyi wallen-ik. Widen ur neɣri ugin ad xedmen d iḥeddaden, nekkini imi d fɣeɣ di tesdawit, ad qqleɣ d aḥeddad.

 Dda Mḥend : Akka tt-waliɣ akka, d kunwi i iḥeqqren amahil-agi n uḥeddad s tsuta-agi d yettnekkaren. Zik-nni s umahil-agi i s-wayess yettwassen yisem n uḥiṭus. At yeǧǧer akken llan si taddart n Mḥaga alarmi d taddart n Ḥura tt-gallan s tenfalit-a : «Aḥeqq sebɛa n zzbari n Yiḥiṭusen», ma d tura imi i ibeddel zmantettgallam s icelɣumen neɣ s tlawin. D «les chômeurs» acḥal d iseggasen-aya yerna tɣunzam amahil-agi n iḥeddaden. 

 Sriffeg : anda sneɣ ad xedmeɣ amahil-a.

 Dda Mḥend : aya mačči d aɣbel, ak-sslemdeɣ, xas akka meqqreɣ di leɛmer, ad iliɣ ɣer tama-k, ayen akk i ssneɣ ak-temleɣ. 

 Sriffeg : tannemirt-ik a dda Mḥend, telliḍ-d allen-iw, lliɣ am win akken yeṭṭsen. Ur ẓriɣ ara akken «la forge»-nneɣ tesɛa amezruy.Dda Mḥend : mazal ur ak-d-nniɣ ara kullec, maca ad as-nruḥ s laɛqel kan. Di tazwara, ak-mmleɣ amek ara tettsuḍuḍ lkir d wamek ara tekkateḍ afḍis ɣef zzebra, d uḍerraq n tgelzyam, d wamek ara tneɣceḍ imegran, d wamek ara temziḍ tifruyin d ijenwiyen, ad arnuɣ ak-sslemdeɣ amek ara tettsemmired iḥwicen.

 Sriffeg : nnan-d t-xedmem ula d ibeckiḍen. Ad iyi-teslemdeḍ a dda Mḥend di laɛnaya-k ?

 Dda Mḥend : imir-nni yella ṭṭrad mgal acengu Afransis. Agdud yuḥwaǧ ibeckiḍen. Ass-a acengu yeffeɣ. Tezzi-d talwit nettidir di lehna, iwumi-ten ara ibeckiḍen ass-a ? Ad nexdem allalen i imekrazen, ad yili ahat ad iḥwiǧen imegran, iqubac, tiglezyam… i wakken ad megren, ad neɣcen… imegrazen ttiḥwiǧen iḥeddaden.

 Sriffeg : ah tesmektaḍ-iyi-d ɣef yiwet n tenfalit, acimi i qqaren mi sɛerqent i uḥeddad ad yekkat ɣef zzebra ?

 Dda Mḥend : i kunwi iwumi ɛerqent mačči i nekni, ur teẓrim ansi id tekkam neɣ sani t-tteddum, ur iban d acu tebɣam. Di leɛmer tɛeddam akk 30 n yiseggasen, ur tezwiǧen, ur t-xeddmem. Nekni zik ur nessin ara d acu id lweswas, ur nettrebbi ara «les chômeurs» di taddart. Imal-nneɣ iban am yiṭij, win yeɣran iban yeɣra, win ur neɣri ad yuɣal d aḥeddad. Yečča lmal yefreḥ bab-is. Cfiɣ am wass-a asmi tzehher tḥanut, amzun d taɣrast n tzizwa. Sebɛa zzbari sṭenṭunent, yal yiwen iban cceɣl-is. Ass-a teɣli-d tsusmi, tessewḥac ula deg uzal qayli. A sidi Rebbi, ttɣilek jemmeɛ-iyin ad iliɣ gar wid ḥemmleɣ. Amkan-iw gar wid yemmuten…

<p style="text-align: right;"> Bussad Ḥemmar 

  
 Tettseḍ neɣ tesmeɛẓgeḍ, ur tebɣiḍ ara ad d-qessreḍ yid-i. Ssneɣ-k ! mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut ! akka i teggiḍ d acu i yuɣen «la mémoire»-inek.

 -Ulac, sussmeɣ ur d tt-wajebeɣ ara, acku ẓriɣ ur tettamnen ara ma nniɣ-as, steqsa-ɣ-d amejjay ɣef «la mémoire»-inu.

 -Aṭṭan-ik mačči d «la mémoire», aṭṭan-ik d «l’égoïsme». Susem ma tebɣiḍ ! ula d nekk ur bɣiɣ ara ad ssleɣ i ssut-ik.

 -Teffer aqadum-is s tfersadit, terna tezzi-d aɛrur-is. Terfa acku nettat tebɣa ad nexdem «le shopping» nekk bɣiɣ ad d-ẓẓreɣ amejjay, acku ixemjan-agi sɛiɣ deg wallaɣ-iw, xdemen-iyi-d aṭas n wuguren, tt-xemmimeɣ aṭas yerna tqelliqeɣ, asrirem yebda yettaǧǧa-yi waḥd-i. Uɣaleɣ tettuɣ akk ayen ilaqen ad cfuɣ fell-as. Senṭerren-iyi yimdanen mi ara d ḥekkun tiqsiḍin n zman aqdim. Ceffun ula ɣef «les détailles» imecṭaḥ. Ma d nekk, tettuɣ ula d isem n tmeṭṭut-iw. Tiswiɛin ticeki ur terfi ara testeqsay-iyi-d teqqar-iyi-d :

 -Amek isem n tmeṭṭut-ik ?

 -Nekk imir-nni ad uɣaleɣ d azeggaɣ, tt-ḥireɣ d acu ara d iniɣ, i wakken ad iyi-d-ɛiwen, teqqar-iyi-d isekkilen yiwen, yiwen. Maca ur zmireɣ ara a ten-id-ssdakleɣ akken ad d-iniɣ isem-is, ad as-tiniḍ yekka-d si tɣerma ur nessin ara isemi-is. Ar tagara tameṭṭut-iw ad terfu, ad iyi-tini :

 -Aɛni warǧin tekcimeḍ s aɣerbaz ! aɛni agemmay-inek ur yesɛi ara isekkilen s-wayess yettwaru yisem-iw ? neɣ ahat isem-iw ur yesɛi ara azal deg wul-ik akked wallaɣ-ik !

 -Tudert-iw tuɣal d taberkant, nekk ur ceffuɣ ara, tameṭṭut-iw tenwa ur tt-ḥemmleɣ ara. Nniɣ-as : «Kemm d tarwiḥt-iw, d tudert-iw maca ur iyi-tumin ara.»

 -ttnadim amek ara tt-qennɛeɣ akken ad iyi-tamen. Nettat tesɛa lḥeqq nekk daɣen sɛiɣ lḥeqq, mačči s lebɣi-w ma yella ur ceffuɣ ara, neɣ ma yella ttuɣ isem-is. Wamma, zik-nni asmi lliɣ d ilemẓi isem-is yettazal deg yiles-iw am usefru, tayri-nneɣ teǧǧuǧug trennu, am yemɣi n tefsut. Ass-a nezga d amenuɣ am uzal am yiḍ, ah ! a wi d-yerran iḍelli, ad yesfeḍ imeṭṭi n wass-a. I wakken ad mmektiɣ isem-is, sɛeddayeɣ-d ismawen n tlawin deg wallaɣ-iw wa deffir wa, Zwina, Crifa, Ṭawesn Feṭṭa…. Maca isem-is yezga ireggel fell-i am tili. Cfiɣ asmi d tedda d tislit, di lɛemer-is ɛecrin n yiseggasen. Nekk ssawaleɣ-as s yisem-is, nettat kifkif, tessawal-iyi-d s yissem-iw. Tayri-neɣ ur tesɛi cekk, tuɣ tafat n wussan-nneɣ. Ass-a axxam n tayri-nneɣ yegrurej, amzun aken ur asen-hegga ara lsas. Yiwen wawal d amecṭuḥ ur as-cfiɣ ara, ula d isem n tmeṭṭut-iw ttuɣ-t. Tatut texdem tawaɣit di tayi-nneɣ am arẓaẓ ikecmen taɣrast, neɣ am uccen ikecmen tagrurt n wulli.

 -Tiswiɛin tt-xemmimeɣ, qqareɣ-as : «acimi ur ttruḥeɣ ad ḍelbeɣ «le diorce» maca d acu ara as-iniɣ i «le juge» ? argaz-iw yettu isem-iw, imdanen ad ttaḍsa fell-i, ma d «le juge» ad iyi-d-yini tagi mačči d sebba n beṭṭu-nwen. Ruḥ uɣal s axxam-im, ḥmed Rebbi tesɛid argaz. Aṭas n tlawin ur ufint ara ula d rruḥa-s. irgazensɛan uguren d imeqranen, yerna sebbren, ssusmen ! Nniɣ-as yiwwas : «kemmini d ul-iw, ɣur-m i tcudd tarwiḥt-iw» Terra-yi-d, tenna-yi-d : «lukan nekk d tarwiḥt-ik, ur tettuḍ ara isem-iw xas ma tunageḍ, anda ma tebɣuḍ truḥeḍ. Ur d yeqqim ara wacu ara k-id-yessmektin isem-iw. Zzin-iw iruḥ ččant wuguren, temẓi-w truḥ ɣedren-tt iseggase, lwert yugit baba, yenna-d tilawin ur ttawint acemma. 

 -Yiwwas di tergit ttnadiɣ isem-is ur tufiɣ, qellbeɣ deg yigenni, qellbeɣ di lebḥer akked tniri, ulac. Steqseɣ itran akked iselman, ijdi akked waman… Tagara ferḥeɣ ufiɣ-d isem n tinn aɛzizen. Ttaḍsa-ɣ waḥd-i di tergit, sawaleɣ s yisem n Ǧamila, Ǧamila… Ziɣ d isem n tayri-w tamezut id mmekta-ɣ. Tessaki-yi-d tmeṭṭut-iw, ssliɣ-as tenna-yi-d :

 -«d acu n Ǧamila-agi id mmektaḍ akka s taḍsa ? tagi ha-t-an tugid ad tt-ttuḍ isem-is !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Tullist n Abed el-hamid BENHEDOUGA. yerra-tt-id ar teqbaylit Boussad HAMMAR 

  
 Tanmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu akked Usqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya ( APW) n Tizi Uzzu, s tallelt n Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu, s lemεawna n Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, suddsen-d ussan n umezgun wis 8 gar 5 d 7 deg duǧember 2016 anda gan timsizzelt tis tlata n tmezgunt Muḥya n uwreɣ I yuran s tmaziɣt. Ass-nni n ahad 7 deg duğember 2016, i d-banen igemmaḍ n temsizelt-agi umezgun n Muḥya deg Uxxam n umezgnu amniḍan Kateb Yacine n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Tella-d tukci n warrazen i tlata n yiḍrisen i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt-agi. Yufrar-d uḍris n “Faḍma” n Nait Sidnas Mohend Larbi n taddart n Tifilkout, d netta i yewwin arraz n Muḥya n uwraɣ, s lqidar n 300.000.00 DA. Ma d arraz n lfeṭṭa yewwi-t Amran Salem s wazal n 200.0000.00 DA. Ma deg umḍiq wis tlata d win n udrenz (Bronze) s wazal n 100.000.00 DA isaḥ-d Sakhi Arab. Tella-d tmeɣra-agi n taggara s tilin n waṭas n yiwudam, ama d tawacult n yidles ideg tella Massa Gouméziane Nabila d tanemhalt n yidles, d Mass Farid Mahiout d anemhal n uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine. Llan daɣen watmaen n Muḥya Mohamed d Mouloud, am wakken diɣen llan yiwudam n tsertit yecban: Ouahab Ait Menguellat, aselway n tɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu, d uɣella n ladayra n Ath Yanni…atg. Ad d-nesmekti belli ttiεad-agi, yella-d ass n 6 d 7 deg duğember 2016. Ma d asrusi n yiḍrisen n umezgun yettekin deg temsizzla-a, sersen-ten imawlan-nsen uqbel n 24 deg Unbir iεeddan. Yella-d usersi-nsen ama deg Tenmehla n yidles d Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer neɣ deg Uxxam n umezgnu amniḍan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ilul Mass Muḥend u Yeḥya s yisem-is n ṣsaḥ Abeddlah Mohia, ass n 01/11/1950 deg Yiεezzugen, yemmut ass n 7/12/2004. Yettuneḥsab d ababat neɣ d tigejdit n umezgun s teqbaylit. Gar wayen i d-yeğğa deg umezgun nezmer ad d-nebder: Si Nistri, Tacbaylit, Muḥ n Muḥ…atg. Ma d ass-nni n lğemεa tasebḥit n wass, yella-d usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeğğigen ɣef uẓekka-s, yellan deg At Rbah deg tɣiwant n Iboudraren.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdel Ghani 

 
  
 Deg umagrad-a, ad neɛreḍ d d-nawi awal (ɣas d awezlan) ɣef wamek i yebna ujgu n uɛrur, acu d aṭṭanen i t-yettḥazen? Syin, ad d-nefk kra n tmusniwin d wamek ara iseḥbiber yiwen fell-as.

 Yebna ujgu n uzagur s 33 n teɣlalin (vertèbres), yeṭṭef seg uqerruy seg tama n ufella armi d imessaḍen i icudd ɣer wammas. D ayen ara yefken ljehd i tfekka n umdan, ad yezdi lqedd-is, ad iqeṭṭeb. Gar 33 n teɣlalin-agi ad naf 24 ttembiwilent :7 n temgarḍt (cervicales), 12 n uɛrur (dorsales) ma d 5 n wammas (lombaires). Ad d-grint 9 n teɣlalin rṣant, ur ttḥerrikent ara: 5 n tesmart(sacrées) ma d 4 n tbaqit n tqesrit(coccygiennes). Tarusi n yal taɣlalt ɣef tayeḍ i yaɣ-d-yettaken ajgu n uzagur, ma d tarusi n yal tiṭ ɣef tayeḍ tessufuɣ-d targa ideg yettili wadif (moelle épinière) i ɣef yesseḥbibir yiɣes n ujgu. Gar teɣlalt d weltma-s ad naf aḍebsi alwawaḍ (disque élastique) akked yidded (ligament). D ttawli-a i d-yettakken i tfekka n umdan ad tqeṭṭeb, ad tali ad tader, ad tmil akkin d wakka war ugur ilmaend n uḥerek n ujgu n uzagur.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Aṭṭanen d wamek ara nḥader iman-nneɣ seg-sen. 

 Gar waṭṭanen i yettḥazen s waṭas ajgu n uɛrur, ad d-naf lbeɛj (hernie discale). D aṭṭan iseg ttuɣun aṭas n yimuḍinen deg tizi n wass-a. D ssṭer neɣ d aqraḥ i d-yettlalen seg yal tikkelt ara yenser uḍebsi n gar-teɣlalalin ad d-yeffeɣ i umdiq-is, d ayen ara igen laḥris ɣef iẓuran yellan ar tama-s, Dɣa ad yebdu ssṭer irennu yal tikkel ara yenɛettab umdan neɣ ad iɣli ɣef uzagur-is neɣ ad yerfed ayen ẓẓayen mliḥ… Aqraḥ-a irennu kan,labaɛda win n tammast akked d win n zellim (sciatalgie), ɣef waya, ur ilaq ara yestehzi yiwen ma yesɛa leqiḥ acku yezmer s ad yennal adif, dɣa d taluft-nniḍen ara d-yilin. Ar tama n lbeɛj, ad naf tizelgi n temgarḍt (torticolis), d lahlak n yifessugan(muscles) akked teɣlalin n temgarḍt, akken daɣ i yezmer ad d-teddu di tlalit n llufan . Aselsul n uzagur yezmer ad t-ḥazen waṭas n waṭṭanen nniḍen : axenzir(cancer), lberd (tuberculose), aduz (anesthesie). Yella daɣen umu neqqar aɛawaj (déformation) i nettaf ama s ameqqran neɣ s yilemẓi ara d-yawin uguren meqqren deg tudert-is ara yesɛeddi akken d amaɛdur.

 Acu kan, aɣbel ameqqren ad t-naf deg yisehwa (accidents) i d-yettmagar umdan deg tudert-is n yal ass. ama deg ubrid, deg lxedma neɣ deg turart (addal) amdan izmer ad yerẓ neɣ ad ileɣẓem. Taruẓi n teɣlalin izmer ad tili d iɣisi kan neɣ tikkwal d tubbya n yiɣes. Aleɣẓem (luxation) yettilin deg uɛrur akked tammast anda tiɣlalin ttaẓent-d ɣer zdat. Mebla ma nettu aneftal(entorse) id-d-teslalay tɣersi n yidded. Isehwa-ya mgaraden, zemren ad d-ilin xfifit imi ttḥazen kan aselsul s timmad-is,am akken zemren ad nnalen adif ara yilin d sseba n karraf(paralsie). Aḥareb seg karraf-agi ad d-yebdu seg tegnit-nni ideg ara yexdem umdan asehwu am wid id-nebder imi yewwi-d fell-aneɣ di tazwara ad ncudd tamgarḍt s wayen nufa, ur nreffed, ur nessembiwil win yeɣlin acku nezmer ad as-nkemmel i tyita, ad d-yeḍru ubaxix. Ma terra tmara ad as-nbeddel amḍiq ilaq xersum 5 yimdanen akken ad t-ddmen ɣef tikkelt (ramassage en bloc). Win yesɛan ssṭer, iqerḥ-it uzagyr-is, ilaq ad d-isɛeddi fell-as ar ṭbib, ma yeɣli ujgu trab tfekka. ur d-teqqim ara tudert.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Dali Salima 

  
 Yella Udrar n Fad ddurt iɛeddan deg tegnit temgerrad ɣef wakkussan mi tesfuggel Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad amenzu n Yennayer s ddeqs n warmuden (activités), terna tga zzerd (timecreḍt) ilmend n waya. Gar wayen yemmuggen ihi deg wahil, yella-d umsizwer n wunud (plat) ansayen, akked umsizwer adelsan i warrac. Timzikknin daɣen ttwafesrent, s kra n wayen icudden i yidles ed umezruy, i wid merra i d-yernan i uxxam n yilemẓiyen. Ugar n waya, ttwaferqent terqiqin (tiɣrifin), tanezzayt n aram, i yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel deg wul n tɣiwant. Ma yella ɣer taggara n wass, d acennay yettwaḥemmlen nezzeh deg taddart, Wali Ɛebdelɣani ilemẓi, i yesdendnen taqaɛet n ccna s tuɣac n Lwennas n Ayt Lewnis almi i tt-tessaweɣ tallast. Seg tama nniḍen, nesteqsa kra n yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel ɣef wamek ddren ttiɛad-a, dɣa tenna-yaɣ-d yiwet n teḥdayt : «Ulayɣer ma neqqel ɣer deffir ad d-neḥku ayen ur nelli d uffir. Meḥsub yezmer ad yettwasseɛreq kra s leɣlaḍ ed ukellex, ma d winna d awezɣi ad teḍru yid-s ; amezruy-nneɣ nekkni imaziɣen, win yettwarun i lebda n ddunit, seg wasmi d-yebda. Aql-aɣ nella iwakken kan ad as-nernu aseɣzef s umaynut ara ikecmen deg-s, s uḥraz n tɣawsiwin i d-nufa asmi d-nessen d anwa d lasel n yidim i ileḥḥun daxel n tfekkiwin-nneɣ». Iban-d s telqey deg wudmawen wazal i yesɛa yennayer-a ɣur Yizwawen, almi ahat tuget seg-sen tura kan i ẓran belli ussan-a zrin fell-aneɣ 2966 deg teswast-nneɣ. «Amenzu n yennayer d win i d-yettawin aṭas n wansayen i aɣ-d-ǧǧan lejdud, ladɣa seg tama n tgella. Tal tamnaḍt seg temnaḍin n Tezwawt ad theggi kra n yisenfan n wučči, am nekkni deg Ayt Smaɛel yal axxam, tal tameṭṭut ad d-tessew ayen umu tezmer d tagella taqburt, am umeḍluɛ i yettwaččayen akked zzit amaynut, tirqiqin, lesfenǧ, akked seksu ed tɛesbanin (tkerbabin) i d-itewwan daxel n teyyint n nnafaqa, ed waṭas n yisenfan nniḍen». I aɣ-d-tessefhem yiwet n temɣart. Akka ihi, amenzu n yennayer ur yettwalaqay s wulac, ur yettwaɣunzay.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 D ayen yessefraḥen wayen i la ixeddem umsideg (localisateur) aqbayli Muḥend Belqasem deg umaḍal n usideg n tɣerɣar d yifecka isenselkamen ɣer tutlayt n Mulud At Mɛemmer. Deg umecwar wezzilen, yessaweḍ yebrez-d netta d terbaɛt-is s usili n tutlayt taqbaylit deg waṭas n yigrudmawen (interfaces) web. Ulamma, llan kra n yilmeẓiyen i iɛerḍen ad gren deg wannar n usideg s teqbaylit, am Yasin Belkadi, wanag ur ssawḍen ad d-ufraren s uqeddic akka am Muḥend Belqasem. Imi ma nemmeslay kan ɣef tkebbanit yettwassnen Mozilla, ad naf d akken Muḥend Belqasem, yedda-d deg umuɣ n 100 n yimekkiyen ifazzen (top 100) deg Mozilla, rnu daɣ yezga-d deg umḍiq wis 16, sdat waṭas n yimsidag seg umaḍal merra. Deg teɣzi n umecwar-is ar tura deg yigrudmawen Mozilla, yessuqel Muḥend Belqasem ugar n 8,056 n tewwura, yerna isumer-d azal n 792 nniḍen. D ayen isehlen ala i win yesɛan lebɣi n wul i usnerni n tutlayt-is d tigin n waɣan ameɣnasan. Muḥend Belqasem, akka tura, aql-it d ajenyur deg yinagrawen isenselkamen. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, ussan-a yezrin, tuzen-d tkebbanit Mozilla kra n tɣawsiwen i yimsidag iqbayliyen. D asebɣes sɣur-s i wid akk yettakken akud-nsen akken ad ssiwḍen Mozilla i yal agdud deg umaḍal. 

  M. K. 

  
 Yelli-s n wedrar εlayen Fadhma Aït Idir, d tilemẓit n 23 n yiseggasen di laεmer-is n temnaḍt n Σin el Ḥemmam, d tanelmadt di tsedawit n Lmulud At-mεemmar n Tizi-Wezzu deg seggas wis ssin (mathématiques), n temna

  tufrar-d d tucbiḥt n teqbayliyin n useggas-a 2015, deg umzizwar id-tesduri tzeqqa meqqren n leqdicat n wexxam n yedles n Lmulud n At-Mεemmar n Tizi-Wezzu

  Taẓrigt tis 10 n miss kabyle useggas 2015, tella-d s lemεawna n tmahla n yedles n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu akked uγarbaz n usensu « Jardin Secret »

  Tafaska-agi tettili-d yal aseggas, ass n 12 n Yennayer, ixef n useggas n yimaziγen.12 n teḥdayin i d-yufraren ger 48 id-yusan deg yal tamnaḍt n tmurt n leqbayel, Bgayet, Tizi-Wezzu. Imḍebbren n Miss Kabylie i fernen ass n Yennayer i wakken ad gen tameɣra ideg ara tettwafren teqcict i ifazen di thuski (ṣṣifa), deg tikil d wadduy. Yella-d daɣen ccerṭ amaynut i d-yeqqaren tiḥdayin yebγan ad-ttekint deg tfaska, ilaq ad isinent ad mmeslayent taqbaylit akken iwata, rnu γef waya ilaq ad-tesεu aswir yelhan deg ulmud (un bon niveau d’études), i wesebγes n tutlayt tamaziγt. . Ad d-nesmekti belli llala-s n tullas n useggas 2014, d Hamel Damia. Deg tfaska n useggas-a, ḍefrent-d deg wemḍid wis sin, tamsiwt Numidya d yiwet n tlemẓit n temnaḍt n Σin El Ḥemmam, ma yella d amḍiq wis krad tḥarit-id temsiwt Tassaεdit n Wizgan i yesεan 18 n yiseggasen di laεmer-is. Tazrigt tis 10 n Lalla-s n tullas (Miss Djurdjura) useggas 2015 tεedda di tegnatin igarzen aṭas, anda iḥedren deqs n yemdanen d yemḍebren.

<p style="text-align: right;">Islam Bessaci

  
 Ccix Arezqi iceyyex di Buɛaṣem, isedduy timɛemmart illan din. Iteffeɣ daɣen ɣef leswaq am ssuq n Letnayen di Lmaɛtqa, ittemlili d lɣaci, iferru timsal. Isɛa yiwen n uqeddac d aqudac, ittɛaṣi-t, iqqar-as tisura-k ha-tent-i ɣur-i. Ass-nni idfer-it uqeddac ɣer Letnayen, ad t-ineɣ. Ccix yeqqim, dewren-as lɣaci, iferru timsal. Inna-as uqeddac:’’efk-iyi tisura-w! Ccix yeqqar-as:’’ṛuḥ a mmi d lɣarḍ-ik, ad selkeɣ medden.

 Aqeddac: ‘’ṛwaḥ ḥwaǧaɣ-k!’’

 Ccix:’’ d lɣarḍ-ik, ad selkaɣ medden!’’

 Tikkelt-nni, idegger lɣaci-nni idewren i Ccix, iwwet Ccix s tɛekkazt ɣer uqeṛṛu, inɣa-t.

 Wwin fell-as asefru.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : deg tazawara, ma tzemreḍ ad aɣ-d-temmeslayeḍ, ciṭ, ɣef leqdic-ik? 

  Khellaf Mezouani  : ddima d leqdicat idelsanen, yal tikelt anida : tikelt d taɣuri n yisefra, tikelt-nniḍen d tidwilin n Radyu d Tiliẓri, tikelt d urar n yisura, tira n lisinaryu…atg. Deg uḥric n tẓuri, qedceɣ deg waṭas n yiḥricen yemgarden n lfen, xas ma bdiɣ s yisefra d tmedyazt u mazal-iyi deg-s ar ass-a. Tturareɣ deg yisura s tmaziɣt amedya : asaru n « Leɣrur di ddunit » d usaru « Iɣeblan deg tayri » . Am wakken daɣen i yuriɣ isefra d tezlatin i waṭas n yiccenayen, d wayen-nniḍen.

  Amek i d-yella usurif-ik amezwaru deg unnar tẓuri ? 

 Seg wasmi meẓẓiyeɣ, ḥemmleɣ ad sleɣ i yisefra n umedyaz-nneɣ ameqqran Si Muḥend u Mḥend, d wid n temɣarin d yimedyazen-nniḍen. Syin akkin, ufiɣ-d iman-iw tettunefk-iyi-d tmedyazt nekk ur faqeɣ. Almi d aseggas n 1974 i bdiɣ ttaruɣ isefra-w imenza. Ussan-nni lliɣ sεiɣ 17 n yiseggasen di leԑmer-iw. Am tuget n yinaẓuren neɣ n yimedyazen i ibeddun tira neɣ ccna n yisefra , deg tallit n temẓi gar 15 armi 22 n yiseggaen.

  D acu i d ak-yeğğan ad tefreḍ abrid n tmedyazt? 

  Ma d tamentilt i yi-ğğan ad awiɣ abrid n tira n tmedyazt, d iḥulfan-iw d wayen akk ttidireɣ deg twacult-iw, imi yis-s i tteqdeɣ ul-iw. D yir tagmat i sεiɣ i yi-d- yeldin allen i tira n tmedyazt, imi yis-s kan i nezmer ad nessiweḍ izen-nneɣ srid ɣer win yellan d axṣim.

  Ma yella wakud i tḥemmleɣ i tira? 

 Am wakken neẓra, asnulfu n usefru, yettas-d mebla ttiεad wala akud, maca nekk ttafeɣ iman aṭas deg tira ticki tedduɣ deg ubrid iḍullen. Imi uɣeɣ tannumi xeddmeɣ imecwaren meqqren seg wasmi xedmeɣ unẓul n tmurt.

  Acu n yisental iɣef tettaruḍ tamedyazt-ik? 

 Isental iɣef ttaruɣ tamedyazt-iw, wwiɣ-ten-id seg tudert-nneɣ : tagmat, imawlan, tameṭṭut, tawennaḍt, timetti, tajmilt i tyemmat, tayri, ddunit, laxert…

  Neẓra belli tettekkiḍ deg tuget n tfaskiwin deg tmurt n Leqbayel, meslay-aɣ-d ɣef wanect-a? 

 D tidet, ttekkiɣ deg waṭas n tfaskiwin d temliliyin n tmedyazt, i d-yettilin deg wakal n tmurt n Leqbayel. Ttemliliɣ-d imeddukkal-iw imedyazen, senεateɣ, diɣen, tamedyazt-iw i medden. Gar tfaskiwin n tmedyazt i xedmeɣ i mazal ressan-t deg wallaɣ-iw, ad d-bedreɣ: tazigt tis 12 n tfaska “Poésiade” n Bgayet (2000), tin n Si Muḥend u Mḥend d Yusef u Qasi (2003) deg Tizi Uzzu, tin n Timizert (2009)…atg.

  Tamedyazt-ik ,d ayen igerrzen, d ayen i ak-yeğğan ad d-tawiḍ aṭas n warrazen deg tfaskiwin n tmedyazt. Hedreɣ ɣef warrazen-agi i d-thellaḍ… 

 Seg 2007 ar ass-a, wwiɣ-d 6 n warrazen deg 6 n tfaskiwin n tmedyazt. 3 seg-sen d arrazen imezwura ama deg tfaska i d-yellan deg Boughni deg useggas n 2014, ama deg tfaska n Matoub Lounes i d-yellan deg tesdawit n Abderrhemane Mira deg Bgayet deg 2007, ama deg tin Messousi Boualem. Am wakken daɣen i d-rebḥeɣ 3 n warrazen-nniḍen n umḍiq wis tlata, gar-asen win n tfaska n Ath Ziki deg 2016, ama deg Itri Iburayen (Aderyis) deg 2014…atg. 

  Ma tzemreḍ ad d-tefkeḍ agzul ɣef udlis-ik i d-yeffɣen yakan? 

 Deg useggas n 2013, i ṣsawḍeɣ i tikkelt tamezwarut ad d-sizergeɣ adlis. D win iwumi semmeɣ  » Les plus beaux messages d’amour « .
