Seg uzwel-is yettban belli d ammud n yinzan n tayri ifazzen, neɣ akken-nniḍen d agraw n tenfaliyin d tnebdarin n waṭas n yimaruyen d yimussnawen yellan deg ddunit, wid yecban: William Shakespeare, Victor Hugo, Omar Khayyâm, Henri Fréderic, Voltaire, Alfred Musset, Paul Eduard…atg. D adlis amezwaru i d-suffɣeɣ deg useggas n 2013, ɣer tezrigin n “Ma culture” n Bgayet.

  Acimi mazal ur d-tesuffɣeḍ ara ammud n tmedyazt? 

 D ssaḥ ula ma bdiɣ tira n tmedyazt deg yiseggasen 1974-1975, mačči d asiweḍ ur sawḍeɣ ara ad sizergeɣ, maca ttemyezwaren leccɣal. Adlis wis sin ara d-yeffɣen deg useggas-agi n 2017 i d-teddun, ad d-yili d ammud n tmedyazt.

  Ma d tidet tefkiḍ isefra-k cnnan-ten yinaẓuren deg tezlatin?  

 Yella wagi s tidet imi galεum n yinaẓuren iqbayliyen, iwumi fkiɣ isefra-w ccnan-ten deg tuɣac. Lḥaṣun mačči d yiwen neɣ d sin, acu kan ur bɣiɣ ara ad d-bedreɣ ula d yiwen n yisem.

  D acu i d tamuɣli-k ɣef tira n tmedyazt s tmaziɣt? 

 Deg tallit-agi taneggarut, la nettwali belli aṭas n yidlisen ara d-itteffɣen deg yal aḥric n tẓuri neɣ n yidles, d ayen yessefraḥen aṭas aṭas. Ladɣa tamedyazt d tin ara d-ittfeɣen mliḥ iseggasen-agi ineggura, imi nesԑa aṭas n yimedyazen, yesԑan aswir adelsan d usegmi meqqren deg tussna. Am wakken daɣen i ugtent tfaskiwin n tmedyazt i d-yettilin deg tmurt n Leqbayel, ԑawnent asnerni n tmedyazt. 

  D acu i d tamuɣli-k ɣef yidles amaziɣ atrar? 

 Idles amaziɣ s umata ula d netta ha-t-an yeğuğğeg s leqdic n yal yiwen seg-nneɣ di tmetti, ama d afennan ama d imyura, ama d tiddukliwin tidelsanin, tifaskiwin, n tmedyazt, ama d Asqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa ( H C A)…atg. La nettwali belli aṭas n leqdicat i yellan deg unnar, ama d isura, ticeqqufin n umezgun, idlisen n tmaziɣt, tamedyazt, ungalen… 

  Amek i ilaq ad yili umedyaz neɣ umaru? 

 Nekk ttwaliɣ belli amedyaz neɣ amaru, ilaq ad yili d lemri n tmetti-nsen d inigi ɣef tallit-is. Ilaq ad iεiwen timetti-ines s wayen iwumi yezmer, d wayen yessen. Ilaq daɣen ad yili ɣer tama n ugdud-is ama deg tallit n lferḥ neg deg tallit n leḥzen. Ilaq diɣen ad yettḥussu swayen ttḥussun yimdanen yellan ɣer tama-s. Ilaq ad asen-d-yelli iẓri, ad asen-d-ikmeze anida bɣan nutni, ad asen-d-immel abrid usrid. 

  D acu n yisenfaren i d-tessewjadeḍ sya ɣer sdat ? 

 Isenfaren mačči d yiwen mačči sin, am yal tikelt u di yal aḥric n yidles amaziɣ. Deg tmedyazt, heggeɣ-d yiwen n wammud-iw amezwaru n yisefra s tmaziɣt d tefransist, ad d-yeffɣen gar-nneɣ d kra n wagguren. semmeɣ-as “Le parfume de passé” . Am wakken daɣen ara d-suffɣeɣ ammud-nniḍen n yinzan d unamek-nsen, ad yettwaru s tefransist d tmaziɣt. Deg uḥric n ssinma, ttheggiɣ yiwen n usaru ara xedmeɣ nekk s timad-iw. Deg wussan-agi i d-teddun ad ttekkiɣ deg tfaska tagraɣlant n tmedyazt, ara d-yilin deg tmurt n Fransa.

  Awal-ik n taggara… 

 Tanemmirt-ik a mass Adaoun imi tgiḍ azal i nekk d leqdic-iw adelsan, tanemmirt s tussda i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen, imi i yi-iga amkan deg yisebtar-is. Slam-iw ɣef wid i yi-iḥemmlen d imeɣriyen-inu di yal amkan. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t: Adaoun Abdel Ghani 

  
 Asmi, tlata n yirgazen seg yimezwura n Ugemmun, Abdelkrim, Ḥeggun d Aεmer bɣan ad d-zuren Sidi Mḥed Wehlal, bdan, ttmeslayen gar-asen. Yenna-as Aεmer: A wi yeččan tacebbaḍt, ara d-ggent tlawin-nsen! Inṭaq-d Abdekbir ittafgen: A wi izṛan tilawin-nsen ! Nnan-as: i kečč a Ḥeggu? D acu i tebɣiḍ?

 Yenna-as: Nekk bɣiɣ ad d-ẓureɣ, ad d-awiɣ lbaraka i warraw-iw. Netta Sidi Mḥed Wehlal, isseelem-as Rebbi. Tilawin n At Hlal d timrabḍin ḥejjbent, ur tteffɣent ara.

  Mi d-wwḍen s At Hlal, ifraḥ yiss-n, yenna-asen mreḥba, leeslama-nwen. Inna i tlawin, sewwemt tacebbaḍt a ten-in usan-d zziyar. Ta tetteg, ta tesewwa, yal yiwet tena cɣel-is. Alammi yewwa, ceyyeent aqcic ɣer baba-tsent, nnant-as a t-a yewjed lqewt. Iruḥ-d, inna-yasent: awimt-tt-id kunemmti, ta ad d-tawi lqewt, ta ad d-tawi aman. Nnant-as amek ara neqdec sdat zziyar, yak nekennti nḥejjeb!

 Yenna-asent: a yess-i, tmeẓremt di tbaḍnit, ad teiwdemt di tḍahrit. Ruḥent s tergagit, sersent lqewt d waman sdat zziyar, uɣalent. Zzeyyar ččan alammi ṛwan, nnan ḥemdullah, sersen tiɣenǧawin. Issawel-asent i yessi-s, yenna-asent: ṛwaḥumt, ad tawimt ijeqduren-agi. Ddment ijeqduren-nni, kkrent ad uɣalent inna-asent : beddemt, teslemt. Izzi ɣer wid-nni, inna-asen: A win isutren tacebbaḍt, teččiḍ, terwiḍ! Fkiɣ-ak lεella, ad tetteḍ ur trewwiḍ, ad txeddmeḍ ur teeyyuḍ! 

 A win isutren tamuɣli, atent-in wali-tent! Ruḥ, tekkseḍ sser ɣef yess-i, fkiɣ-ak leema u lekḥel.

 I kečč a Wḥeggu tsutreɣ lbaraka! Fkiɣ-ak lbaraka deg warraw-ik, ggiɣ-ak am ubelluḍ n uɣanim, mi iruḥ ad iqqar, ad d-ixlef, ad d-ikker.

 Iḥya-k lḥeg, win isutren tamuɣli, tarrawt-is ffɣen d iderɣalen. Win isutren učči, ayen ččan, ur iban ara fell-asen. Ttmettaten ɣef ueebbuḍ-nsen. Ma d win isutren lbaraka, amur-is iburket, inerna . Mi ikcem anda llant yessi-s yufa-tent ttrunt. yenna-asent: ‘‘Ruḥumt, win i kent-ieuzen, d tigellalin, ma ulac d tiklalin. Anda ara tḥejbemt ur teseumt ara dderya” .

 Yeǧǧa-d awal, qqaren:

 <em> A wer tesɣar </em>

 <em> A wer tedden, a wer teẓẓal </em>

 <em> Ur tḥeǧǧeb, ur nseḥjab. </em>

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Deg yiwet n tfaska n ccna d cḍeḥ i d-yellan, yakan, deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mεemmri n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, tecna-d u tecḍeḥ-d yiwet n terbaεt n Falistin. Ass-nni, necden-d yimḍebbren inelmaden n yiwen uγerbaz alemmas i wakken ad ḥedren.  Ar da, nezmer ad d-nini d ayen yelhan, tεedda-d am nettat am trebbuyaε-nniḍen. Acu kan mi selken cḍen, nutni yuγ lḥan cnan-d tizlit tagrawliwt d taneggarut anda i sxedmen leslaḥ. Akken selken, fkan-d leslaḥ-nni akked taεellamt-nsen i yinelmaden u arrac-a bdan sexdamen leslaḥ-a am wakken d tidet.

 Kra yellan din d amdan yeqqur γef ukersiw-is. ‘’Akka i d-yettwaxlaq rrebrab, meḥsub drus lakul alamma rnan-d wigi’’ i d-yenna yiwen seg yimawlan n yinelmaden.

 Ma d wayeḍ yenna-asen :’’d imru i yeḥwağ unelmad mačči d taneggḥelt.’’

<p style="text-align: right;">Hocine.M   

  
 Seg wasmi i yettwareṣṣa d lwali ɣef Bgayet di taggara n yulyu 2015, mass Ould Salah Zitouni yerra-d aṭas n ussirem i yimezdaɣ n lwilaya mbeεd acḥal n yiseggasen n useεḍel n yisenfaren n unegmu i d-yellan s sebba n ustehzi n yimḍebbren n lwilaya. Deg tdiwennit i as-iga uɣmis La Dépêche de Kabylie ddurt yezrin, mass Ould Salah Zitouni yessebgen-d lebɣi-s akken ad yekkes leεḍil ɣef yisenfaren n unegmu di lwilaya. Yessebgen-d ladɣa abgas-is akken ad yekfu s lεejlan asenfar n ucuddu n lwilaya n Bgayet ɣer ubrid ameqqran Asammar-Amalu, rnu ɣur-s leqdic-is d tazliwin-is akken sbiṭer Khelil Amrane ad yuɣal d ammas n udawi asdawan CHU ideg ara setnefεen ladɣa yinelmaden n tmezdayt n tujjya n tesdawit Abderrahmane Mira n Bgayet. Deg tdiwennit-a mass Ould Salah Zitouni, yemmeslay-d ɣef waṭas n yisenfaren i ijerred akken ad mmagen deg yiseggasen i d-iteddun ladɣa deg uḥric n tewnaḍt d lebni n tmezduɣin di leṣnaf yemxalafen. Akken ad d-nesmekti, di kra kan n wussan ideg yettwareṣṣa mass Ould Salah Zitouni d imḍebber amezwaru n lwilaya n Bgayet, yuɣal yisem-is mucaε ɣer yimezdaɣ, ilmend n tarziwin i ixeddem yal tikkelt ɣer tɣiwanin . Rnu ɣer waya, imi d netta i yellan d sebba ɣef tuɣalin n usqamu n lwilaya ɣer lxedma, segmi asqamu-ya yeqqim yeḥbes i waṭas n wayuren s sebba n war amsefhem ger yiεeggalen-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mokrane Chikhi 

  
 Mazal kan kra n smanat akken ad yaweḍ waggur n Remḍan ! Ɣef ayagi, tiɣiwanin i d-yezgan deg twilayt n Bgayet theggint akken ad ferqent idellaɛen n Remḍan. Aseggas-agi, ahat aṭaṣ n twaculin ara yessutren adellaɛ n Remḍan, acku tamɛict tuɣal ɣlayit tagara-agi. Tezad trisiti, izad liṣanṣ, laɣramat, asiweḍ,…ayagi ḥulfan akk yes tiwaculin, yagi tid yettaɣen tadrimt ger 18 000 alarmi d 25 000 idinaren i waggur. Cahriyat-agi uɣal-ent ur d-keffunt ara i twaculin yesɛan nnig n sin n medden! Ihi, yezmer lḥal ad kecment tiwaculin « timaynutin » ɣer wannar n-usuter n lemɛiwna n ddula, yellan akka deg yiḍellaɛen n Remḍan. D-acu kan, nezmer ad d-nini belli idellaɛen n Remḍan ur d keffun ara, imi isufar i yellan s daxel-nsen ur d-keffun ara i waggur akk n Remḍan. Ayagi mači dayen yessefraḥen… Deg Remḍan-agi, llan kra n yimerkantiyen ad ldin iwumi ssawalen « Asečču n raḥma » (restos de la rahma) deg tɣiwanin, anda mti yedden ad ččen igellilen akked yimsebriden. D-acu kan, ngar tamawt, isegassen-agi ineggura, asečču-agi n raḥma yenqes aṭaṣ, yagi deg tama n tɣiwanin, i d-yeqqaren akken « ulac tadrimt » akken ad ldin asečču i yigellilen ! Si tama-ines, Agur azeggaɣ Aẓẓayri i qeddec, i rennu-d afud i lemɛiwna n twaculin yenḥafen. Iseggasen-agi ineggura, aṭaṣ n tzeqqiwin n wagur azeggaɣ i yeldin tiwwura nsent, am tin n Iɣil Ɛli, i ferqen akka idellaɛen n Remḍan ɣef yimdanen yeḥwaǧen. Ussan-a, aten-ad ǧemɛen isufar akken aten ferqen ɣef iḍellaɛen ara i ruḥen srid ɣer tiwaculin yellan akka deg lixṣaṣ. Ula si tama-nsent, tiddukliwin tthegint ula d nutenti i waggur n Remḍan. Aṭaṣ degsent ferqent iḍellaɛen d-ilmawen ɣef ikumirsiyen akken ad gren tiɣri i medden ma yella kra n yisufar ara sedqen! Akka ihi, tagmatt i waggur-agi n Remḍan tebda « s-uẓeṭṭa » ussan-a akken tiwaculin ur nesɛi ara ad sɛeddint aggur n Remḍan mebla lixṣaṣ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax.Y 

  
 Yella yiwen yesεa sebεa warrac. Teddem tmeṭṭut-is tadist, yeḥdeṛ-d ad d-tarew. Heddṛen medden di tejmaεt, nnan-as: « Leflani ad yernu γur-s uqcic, yerna atmaten-is di sebεa usmen, ur t-bγin ara ». Mi tesla Stut i medden heddṛen akka lehduṛ-agi, teddem tessaweḍ-iten-id i warraw n urgaz-nni. Msefhamen di sebεa yid-sen, ggullen, nnan-as: «Nεuhed-ik a Ṛebbi ar ma tesεa-d yemma-tneγ taqcict, ad neddem isuḍaf, ad nγenni, ma tesεa-d aqcic, ad neddem isuḍaf ad nennejli. ». Lmeεna-s, ma tesεa-d yemma-tsen taqcict, ad kkren s urar d ccnawi, ma tesεa-d aqcic, ad refden ifassen-nsen d yiḍarren-nsen, ad kken tawwurt, ad nnejlin. Tesla-asen Stut mi ttgallan akka, tṛuḥ tqusem-asen tameddit n wass i deg d-turew yemma-tsen, teqqar-asen yiwen, yiwen: « Ay a leflani, yemma-k terna-d aqcic! » Ihi, ur nudan ara ula d anadi ad ttḥeqqen ma d tidet, ddmen isuḍaf, nnejlan. Yemma-tsen d taqcict i d-tesεa mačči d aqcic. Nutni nnejlan, ğğan imawlan-nsen. Tru yemma-tsen armi teεya, tuγal teṣber s tmara. Armi d asmi tewweḍ teqcict d tamazzalt. Ass-n deg wussan n Ṛebbi, tṛuḥ teqcict γer tala. Tqusem-as daγen Stut, tawi yid-s tayedḍiḍt n uγerda, ternu taγerbalt, tessendi-ten s amizab ad ččaṛen. Taqcict, tuṛğa, tuṛğa, tuṛğa armi twala tugi ad as-teg Stut nnuba ad teččaṛ, tuγal tenna-yas: « Ttxil-m a yemma tamγart, eğğ-iyi ad ččaṛeγ. Tenna-yas Stut s ttiha d ulaqeb : « Ṛuḥ a timnejlit n sebεa watma-s! » Tuγal-d teqcict sakin s axxam tettru. Tettḥellil-itt yemma-as ad as-d-tini d acu tt-yuγen: ulac. Taqcict tegguma. Armi d yiwen ubrid, tuγal tenna-yas: « A yemma, bγiγ askaf. Tenna-as yemma-s : « -Yirbeḥ! » Tγil fell-as i tettru, tekker tmeṭṭut s askaf. Armi tebda amsal, tekkes-d snat ar tlata n tcufftin, teddem turez-as yelli-s afus-is γer daxel n teṛbut-nni. Tameṭṭut tettsuγu, tettḥellil yelli-s ad tt-tessukes si teṛbut yerγan. Taqcict-nni teqqar-as: « Alamma tεuhdeḍ-iyi ar kra ad am-ssutreγ ad iyi-t-txedmeḍ. Tenna-yas yemma-s: « Ssukkes-iyi-n kan seg wurγu, εahdeγ-kem, εahdeγ Ṛebbi ar d am-xedmeγ kra n wayen tebγiḍ. Tebra-as sakin i ufus-is, yeccelfex, yettnezluluf. Armi ččan imensi, tuγal-d γur-s tenna-as: « Mel-iyi tura acuγer i yi-txedmeḍ akka? ». Tenna-as yelli-s: « Ad iyi-taγeḍ aεeqqa yessawalen! Ad i yi-ternuḍ alγem d taklitt! » Tettkemmil…

  Seg tgemmi taqbaylit 

  
 Tadwilt tis tam (8) n tfaska taɣelnawt n uẓawan amaziɣ, yettwabudden akk i tantaliwin n uẓawan-agi azzayri, ad d-yili ger 19 d 24 duǧambeṛ d-iteddun di Tamenɣest, id-aɣ-d-nnan imsuddsen.

 Timlilit-agi d-yettilin yal aseggas tuɣal d tagnitt iwatan i trebbuyaɛ timaynutin tilmeẓyin n uẓawan n wenẓul dɣen d tagnitt iwatan i ubeggen n uẓawan amensay n temnaḍt n uheggaṛ am tindi neɣ limzad. Tafaska yettnadin asekfel n yitran imaynuten d uḥareb ɣef yiwen n ṣṣenf n tnettit tazzayrit, tessuddus daɣen timaɣriwin di tamiwin ibaɛden n Tmenɣest am In Guezzam d Tahabort. Deg wussan n tfaska, tamanaɣt uheggaṛ ad d-tessuddes daɣen tafaska tageraɣlant tis seddis Abalessa Tin-Hinan yerzan taẓuṛi n uheggaṛ, tamesbanit tageraɣlant tawhidt d-yettilin deg wenẓul n tmurt niqal tettuhegga-d deg wayur n wember.

<p style="text-align: right;"> APS 

  
 D ayen i d-yettuɣalen dɣa tal tikkelt lawan-a, ama deg ulzuz (ssuq) aɣerfan, neɣ d winna amecṭuḥ n taddart. Kra n win yesɛan tiqeḍɛiyin-a n wulli ed wakraren, ur yesruḥu ara tagnit ad yessali ɣer yigenni ssuma n yiwen n uqerruy ilmend n lɛid tameqqrant i d-iteddun s yisurifen iɣesben, iɣezfanen. D ayen i yeǧǧan dɣa iẓawaliyen i ur nesɛi ttɣiman kan weḥlen ccettkayen ansi ara asen-d-yekk udrim i tiɣin n tesɣit n lɛid ? Ladɣa imi tameɣra-ya ass-a, llan wid i tt-yegren deg umuɣ n tigawin i yettafaren tasreḍt, wiyaḍ deg winna i yettabaɛen ansay ed tannumi. Daymi i yewɛer ɣef yiwen d aẓawali ad yeqqim akken ur izellu ara war ma iɛeyyed am netta am medden merra, deg tmetti ideg simmal ttuqan wid i yettarran ddhen i umeɣbun. Deg waya ihi, yewɛer s tidet ad iqerreb yiwen ssuma n yikerri imi ulac win i d-isubben seddaw n tlata n yimelyan ma yerxes, rnu ad t-tafeḍ d ameẓyan ur irebba ulama d atentuf n tassemt. Ini-d ɛad i umdan i yessaramen ad iɛeyyed akken iwata s yiftaten ed yikanifen, iban yuɣ lḥal belli ma ur yessufeɣ nnig xemsa n yimelyan ur yettawaḍ ara lebɣi-s. «Ur rǧiɣ ara almi d ussan-a deg ikennef wazal n yikerri akken ad d-aɣeɣ tisɣit, rnu mbeɛd xilla n yinezgumen. Aya yeḍra-d yakan send remḍan s ssuma tettwaqbal.» I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel. Deg tegnit-a ihi ideg lɣaci ttazzalen ad d-heggin ixef n lɛid, yelha yiwen ma ixemmem i wid icedhen aksum akken xersum ad asen-d-isiḥ deg wass n lɛid. Ula d tidukkliwin neẓra ad ilint tid ara ixemment ɣef twaculin i ur nesɛi ttawil n tudert bac ad ɛeyyden.

<p style="text-align: right;">Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Yella yiwen n lqayed d amerkanti, isɛa cci d ayen kan. Isɛa ula d acrik ixeddem fell-as. Iɣli-d di lehlak azal n tlata wagguren. Akken iḥus ḥemmun waman-is, iwweḍ-d wass-is, ikker izweǧ-as i yiwen-nni n uqcic i isɛa. Ixdem-as tameɣra annect-illa-tt : mmezlen yizgaren, ččan medden, tefraḥ yemma-s n uqcic d ayen kan. Yerna cwiṭ kan dɣa yemmut. Mmi-s nni Yufa-d iman-is kullec fell-as. Yiwen wass, ikker-d sbaḥ zik yenna-as deg uqeṛṛu-s wellah ass-a arda ad ffɣeɣ ad lḥuɣ cwiṭ. Iffeɣ ilemẓi-nni, iṭṭef abrid ileḥḥu, ileḥḥu alammi i d-imlal yiwen n umɣar.Yenna-as ilemẓi-nni : ‘’a sbaḥ lxir a baba amɣar’’, yerra-as-d winna: ‘’ssbaḥ lxir d rrbaḥ a mmi ! Anda akka i tettedduḍ tanezzayt-agi ?’’. ‘’Niqal wellah ma nwiɣ ad ak-iniɣ d acu iyi-icuɣben taṣebḥit icban ta ! Imi i yi-d-testeqsaḍ wellah arda ak-in-iniɣ kullec’’, i as-yenna uqcic. ‘’Ini-d kullec a mmi, ad ifsus wul-ik’’, I t-iweṣṣa umɣar-nni. Ilemẓi-nni, iḥka-as tadyant-is, yenna-s: ‘’segmi yemmut baba griɣ-d deg uxxam d yemma, weltma, tameṭṭut-iw d ucrik-nneɣ. Ttbanen-iyi-d am wid ur nebɣi ara ad asen-iliɣ d amsewwaq imi meẓẓiyeɣ. Wa ijebbed wa ikerref. Ugadeɣ ayen akk isbedd baba, ad iɣli deg yiwwas. Yenna-as umɣar : ‘’ruḥ, qeddem ɣer sdat ad teɣreḍ’’. Ilemẓi-nni, ikemmel abrid ɣer sdat, ileḥḥu, ileḥḥu, yufa yiwet n tmeṭṭut tbedd am wakken d netta i tettraju. Tessawel-as-id, tenna-as: ‘’qerreb-d ɣur-i, sɛiɣ yiwen n wawal ad ak-in-t-iniɣ’’. Yuẓa ɣer-s. Tameṭṭut-nni mezziyet mliḥ, tezzyen d ayen kan, d aggur deg yigenni nettat di lqaɛa. Iwweḍ ɣer tama-s, tjebed-it, tzemḍit ɣer yidmaren-is, tettuɣu. 

 Yettkemmil…

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Ass-nni n lǧemɛa tasebḥit n wass, tuɣal-as yiwet n tejmilt s wazal-is i yiwen uselmad aqbur yewwḍen leɛfu Rebbi deg useggas iɛeddan,wagi d Mass Aissaoui Belaid yettwassnen s yisem n Djamel. D kra n yiselmaden n uɣerbaz amenzu n taddart-agi n Tahanouts d kra-nniḍen d imeddukkal-is deg uselmed, s tallelt n waggur azewwaɣ azzayri n n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i d-issuddsen leqdic-agi i d- yellan ass-nni n sem 06 seg maggu 2017, deg uɣerbaz amenzu “Hacmi d warraw-is” n taddart n Thanouts, ideg yexdem akk amecwar-is n uselmed. Ma d ayen i d-yufraren deg wahil yettwaxdamen, yella-d akka; ɣef 8h n ssbaḥ yella-d usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka-s yellan deg taddart-is tanaslit deg Igounene Amoure. Syin ɣef 10h00 i bdan yirmad n tejmilt-agi, sɣur unemhal n uɣerbaz-agi Mass Boundaoui Omar. Ma ɣef 10h20 tella-d yiwet n terbaɛt n yinelmaden d tnelmadin yeqqaren deg uɣerbaz-agi, wwin-d yiwet ccna iwumi sseman “Tanemmirt-ik aṭas ay aselmad-iw” neɣ “Choukrane wa alf choukr ya oustadi” s tutlayt n taɛrabt. Syin akkin ɣef 10h30, umeslay d tnagiyin sɣur aṭas n yimdanen i-yessnen aṭas, gar-asen: amaswaḍ n uɣerbaz-agi, tameṭṭut-is, iselmaden ukkud yesɣar, anemhal aqdim n uɣerbaz-agi, yiwen n uɛeggal deg waggur azewwaɣ azzayri, akked yiwen n umddakkel-is n temẓi d mmi-s n taddart-is, wagi d Guendouz Arezki. Ma ɣef 11h00 d afella, tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i yinelmaden n udawi amezwaru “secouristes” yewwin-is, syin d tukci n teqbucin i trebuyaɛ i d-yufraren deg temlilinyin n waddal, deg ssenf n ddabex uḍar, i d-yellan taggara n ddurt yezrin deg unnar n aɣiwan n Ait Aissa Mimoun yellan deg Tiplakin. Tella-d diɣ tukci n yiwet n cciɛa “médaille” imi itt-yuklal uselmad-agi i d-irebban aṭas n tsutwa.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Qqaren abrid n trugza yuεaṛ aṭas, γef waya tuget n yirgazen regglen fell-as, ttaγen abrid n cmayet imi d abrid-nni i d afessas. Maca, irgazen n trugza am Muḥamed Budyaf d Lwennas Matub, muḥal ddan deg ubrid n cmayet yesburen lεaṛ. Annect-a merra iban-d deg yiseggasen n 90 n lqarn yezrin, imi tamurt n Lezzayer teddar tazγent n tsartit tuεar aṭas, anda yeεreq cced n uyeddid, yuεar laḥsab i tifin, tegdi tezdaγ yal amdan, rrebrab yesqiṭṭiε deg uzal, agdud azzayri yettawi lewhi s wallen anda ara d-ibban urgaz ara d-yarren asirem, d ifadden d tebγest. Lwennas iqubel lwafaε s cna, awal ma ifat yeffeɣ-d deg yimi-s, yecba aɛbar, yeγleb tirṣaṣin. Muḥal yessusem γef tidet, muḥal yedda deg ubrid n lbaṭel, muḥal iεebba azaglu akken i t-ttεebbin wiyaḍ. Yezga d amennuγ γef tmaziγt, γef Lezzayer tagdudant tamagdayt. Yezga iteddu deg ubrid n tidet, deg ubrid n yimaγban imi ibardan-agi suffuγen γer tafat. Syin, yuγal-d niqal rbaḥ tamurt ass n 14 yennayer 1992, yerna-d usirem-nniḍen ara ijebren iγisi yewwten, yuγal-d Muḥamed Budyaf. Lawan-nni, yal tazγunt tettεummu di Lezzayer, imḍebbren n tallit-nni, teffeɣ-asen afus, ggumman ad d-afen abrid ara yessufɣen ɣer tifrat, imi zzhir yuɣ tuddar d temdinin. Dγa, Mohamed Boudiaf yellan yettwanfa mi akken tufrar tagut ɣef tmurt imi tiktiwin-is mgaradent aṭas γef tid n wid yeṭṭfen adabu s yiɣil, yugi leḥkem n leγder, leḥkem n ukabar awḥid, yerra-d i teγri n tmurt-is, yenna dakken talwit d tifrat n tmurt n Lezzayer ad ilint s tugdut. Yewwi-d yid-s amecwar γezzifen, yebda lebni n tmurt γef tidet. 166 n wussan kan iruḥ niqal yerra-d asirem i ugdud azzayri, yerra-d ifadden i yimdanen i ifeclen niqal, yerra-d tayri γer wulawen, yesfeḍ asigna γef tmurt. Maca iεdawen n tmurt akked tudert, zgan εussen di yal amḍiq di yal lawan. Imi, ass n 29 yunyu 1992 γef 11h15, tamurt n Lezzayer yeγli-yas ujgu alemmas, yeγli yiwen n urgaz yesεan azal, yesrafeg usirem, imi Muḥamed Budyaf nγan-t yemcumen di temdint n Σennaba. Amennuγ d win yettkemilen, imi Lwennas, yebges s tidet d tebγes γer umennuγ mgal wid yebγan cwal i tmurt, wid yebγan ad siγen iẓuran n tεarbubt d tneslemt tamṭarfit s rrebrab, wid yebγan ad skecmen tugdi i yizzayriyen, lwennas iquzzem-iten s trugza d yise&amp;gamma,; imi yumen s wayen ixeddem. Maca, iεdawen n tudert, zgan εusen-t azal iḍ, di tallit-nni n rrebrab, tajmaɛt n tegmat n yinselmen, FIS akked GIA, i d-yujwen lhem i tmurt, ḥekmen s lmut γef Lwennas deg useggas n 1992, imi muḥal yeğğa-ten ad xedmen lebγi-nsen, yezga-asen-d am zzarb yuεren. Deg wass 25 n Ctember 1994 yettwaxḍef s yifassen n tegmat n yinsleman, maca 15 n wussan seld aya, serrḥen-as-d imi walan belli agdud aqbayli s umata bedden am yiwen n urgaz, ḥṣan γer yiqerra-nsen i d-teteddu. Maca tikkelt-agi, ur t-zggilen ara, ass n 25 yunyu 1998, ggulen ur ḥniten ad-yemmet, nγan-t yeεdawen n tudert, wid ineqḍen itran deg yigenwan di laεmer-is 42 n yiseggasen. Xas ğğan-aγ yirgazen-agi at lbaḍna, ğğan-aγ-d agerruj ur-netfakka, ayen xedmen d timsirin n tudert, deg-sent i d-nelmed tamussni, deg-sent i d-nugem, nekkes fad, mazal ad neddu deg ubrid-nsen, imi d abrid yessawaḍen srid γer yeswi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Mačči aṭas n wakud segmi yebda yessefraw, yekcem amaḍal n tmedyezt. Wagi d amedyaz Ḥamid Ɛabed i ilulen ass n 28 seg wayyur n ṭuber aseggas n 1954, deg taddart n Tqerbust, taɣiwant n Aɣbalu. D mmi-s n Tubiret i d-yufan tikci-ines ɣer tmedyezt seld imi yeffeɣ leɛmer n uxeddim, yeḥbes-it dayen. Yella uqbel yettaru seg wacḥal-aya iḍrisen ɣef ddunit d yiɣeblan-is, wanag alami d taggara-a kan i yerra tiɣri i yimru i as-d-yessawlen i usefru. Iruḥ, yeddem-it-id ad yeččar yis-s tiwriqin timellalin s tira taberkant. Ad yesres deg-s ifyar i as-d-tettak tegregt s tallelt n wallaɣ-is. Ad yebnu deg-s tiseddarin s ccbaḥa n wawal iweznen. Ḥamid Ɛabed, d bab n yisefra s tutlayt tafransist, d tin i yefren ad yezwir yis-s tamedyezt-is acku seg zik mi tt-yeɣra yessen-itt, iḥemmel-itt tezdeɣ ul-is, ladɣa tasekla-ines. Aya, ɛlaḥsab ayen i d-yenna. Azal n ukuẓ n leɛwam segmi yura asefru-ines amezwaru. Deg twala n useggas kan yessaweḍ ad d-yejmaɛ xilla, ad d-yessamed ammud. Dɣa, d annect-nni i iga umedyaz Ḥamid Ɛabed, mbeɛd ahat mraw d sin (12) n wayyuren segmi yebda yessefraw, yessufeɣ-d ammud n yisefra sɣur teẓrigin EL AMAL n Tizi Uzzu. D ammud i wumi isemma “Images et sensations», neɣ “Tugniwin d yifrayen”. Deg wammud-nni ad d-naf isefra ɣef ugama, tayri, ddunit, tijmilin i Lwennas Meɛtub, Ḥnifa d wiyaḍ. War ma yettu lasel-is azwaw. Ur yezgil Ḥamid Ɛabed ad yessefru daɣen ɣef tmeṭṭut taqbaylit. Amedyaz-a i yesɛan tura sḍis n tmerwin d sin n yiseggasen (62) deg leɛmer, yegra yekcem ula deg tmedyezt s tutlayt-is tazwawt. Yexdem kra n yisefra s teqbaylit, yeqqar di yiwen seg-sen i wumi yefka azwel “Ur d-yeggri lmenṭeq”: Mačči d aɣfal i neɣfel, mi akka nessusem ur d-nenṭiq. Neɣ ma d alwet i nelwet, d lweqt i qerriḥen am yifelfel. Awal ur as-d-yeggar umḍiq, ma yeggul urgaz yeḥnet,.Yessusem lfahem yerwel, yeqqel umeslay d aɛewwiq, Yekker-d ubhim ad t-yewwet… Akka ihi, Ḥamid Ɛabed ɣas ma yebda tira s tmeslayt tarumit, yesṭuqqet yis-s leqdic-is, lameɛna yusa-d wass ideg yefka amur i tutlayt-is daɣen. Rnu ɣef waya, yenna-d umedyaz-a dakken yettxemmim ma yebɣa Rebbi ad yexdem tasuqqilt i wammud-is. Meḥsub yebɣa ad t-id-yerr seg tefransist ɣer tezwawt. Afud ijehden i Ḥamid Ɛabed deg ccɣel-ines.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaïsa Khalifi  

  
 Seld sin n wagguren segmi fukken wussam n ḥertadem,igenni iɛuqqer. Tiqit n waman ur d-teɣli di tuget n tamiwin n Tefriqt Ugafa. Azemmur, yebren ɣef tzemmrin, igran ur mɣin akken iwata. Laɛwanser, kawen,d aɣurar, almi bdan yifellaḥen, ttaysen. Ha-t-a yejba-d yennayer, yegla-d s lxir-is. Terɛed, tebreq. Yeddel ubernus n udfel tiqucac n yidurar. Izeblac, ttqiṭiren-d am tnififet di leqram-d. Lemwared akked laɛwanser fin-d. Tiwaculin, zint-d i lkanun. Yennayer, d lfal amerbuḥ i useggas.”Zik asmi neṭṭafar leḥsab n uwatay n lejdud-nneɣ, werǧin i neqḍiɛ layas ɣer tegnewt. Nettraju yennayer ma ur d-ɣlin ara waman di tewwurt useggas-nneɣ, ɣellin-d di laɛqab , deg umerḍil n temɣarin’’, i d-yenna Dda salah, d amɣar ameqqran n taddart n Lmecta, 94 n yiseggasen di tudert-is. Aya, ad yili d tbut ɣef wazal yesɛa uwatay n yimaziɣen di temnaḍt n yilel agrakal . 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 Am yal leεwayed, imezdaγ n tudrin n temnaḍt n Wizgan, rran lwelha-nsen ussan-a γer weḥric n tfellaḥt akk d lecγal i ten-yettganin. Ula d ameslay yezga i tezi γef uzemmur, lγella d ttawilat iwulmen i wejmaε-is, imi tizemrin wḍent i wecraw, d tallit iwatan n lqeḍ uzemmur. Dγa ussan-a, imezdaγ n tudrin n temnaḍt n Wizgan bdan ttefγen γef tẓegwa d tfarkiwin-nsen akken i yuγen yakan tanumi anda i kkren i yefrasen i wejmaε n lγella uzemmur akken iwata lḥal, imi asafar-agi d rreẓq-nsen n yal ass. Lḥemla n lqeḍ uzemmur tbedu deg aggur n wunbir; tettfaka deg aggur n furar s teγzi n 04 wagguren, anda i saxdamen laεwayed i d-ğğan lejdud, imi deqs n twaculin i yettikin di twiziwin n lqeḍ uzemmur, anda i ttefγen d tirebbuεa, meẓẓi meqqar, argaz tameṭṭut, anda i d-yettak udem n tdukli d tegmat ger imezdaγ. Maca aseggas-a yella-d lexṣaṣ meqren di lγella n uzemmur dagi di temnaḍt n Wizgan d temnaḍin niḍen n tmurt n Leqbayel, anda tamentilt n lexṣaṣ n lγella uzemmur tcud γer 03 n wugguren : ugur n tmes i yeččan acḥal n yihiktaren n tẓegwa deg tallit-ni unebdu yezrin.,  ugur n  lexṣaṣ n waman  ur d-yeγlin-ara deg lawan d wugur icuden γer wemdan, imi deqs n yemdanen i γeflen γef tfarkiwin-nsen, ur xedmen-ara akkal, ur bden-ara s lxedma γer tzemrin-nsen akken iwata lḥal, am afras d umenγac. Γer tagara, γas akken lγella ur teqwi-ara am iseggasen yezrin, maca imezdaγ n tudrin n temnaḍt n Wizgan, tteqsaden s waṭas tifarkiwin-nsen, i wejmaε n lerẓaq yellan d wefras n tzemrin.                                                                                                       

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci

  
 Deg smana-agi i d-yeffeɣ udlis ‘’L’écriture romanesque kabyle d’expression berbère’’ n Dr Nasserdine AIT OUALI ɣer tezrigin l’Odyssée. 

 Adlis-a, d asenqed ɣef wayen yuran s teqbaylit seg useggas n 1946 armi 2014, ama d ayen yeɛnan ungalen neɣ tullisin.  Mebɛed mi d-yefka deg tazwara amezruy n tira n tmaziɣt s umata akked tmukrist n wullis, Nasserdine AIT OUALI yudder-d sebbat i yeǧǧan tasekla n tmaziɣt ad tidir deg yiɛewwiqen, ladɣa, seg tama n tsertit akked lexṣas n tzemmar n tira ɣer kra n yimruya. Acu kan, xas ulamma yewwet-d s leqseḥ deg kra n tira ur nebni ɣef yilugan n tsekla meɛna yenna-d d akken llan kra ttarun akken igerrez u yis-sen i tezmer ad tenefli tira taqbaylit. Am wakken i d-yefka, diɣ, kra n yiwellihen i ilaqen i usnerni n tsekla taqbaylit. Tazrewt-a, tebḍa ɣef sin yiḥricen. Aḥric amezwaru yettmeslay-d ɣef ungal deg 6 n yixfawen, ma d wis sin yewwi-d ɣef tullis deg 3 yixfawen. Deg uḥric amezwaru, yenna-d d akken d Belaid Ait Ali i d bab n wungal amezwaru ‘’Lwali n wedrar’’. Syin yudder-d imyura imenza Rachid Aliche d Said Sadi d wayen uran. Ikemmel deg useqed-is i yimyura i d-yusan umebɛed, am Amar Mezdad, Salem Zenia, Aomar Oulamara, Lynda Koudache, Said Iamrache, tahar Ould Amar Akked Boualem Rabia.

    Deg uḥric wis sin, yessenqed tullisin i yuran : Meziane Ou Mouh, Idir Ahmed Zayed, Meziane Boulariah, Kamel Bouamara, Lynda Koudache, Djamila Mimeche, Dihya Lwiz, Rabha Aissou, Djamel Arezki, Said Chemakh, Zimu akked Abdelaziz hassani.

 I usmekti, Nasserdien AIT OUALI yesɛa duktura deg tsekla tafrensist n tesdawit Paris 8. Am wakken i d-yella deg lmendad deg udlis i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2013 ɣer tezrigin L’Odysée, ‘’De la pédagogie de projet et de l’enseignement de la langue amazighe en Kabylie.’’, d ayen ara yefken afud ameqqran i yinelmaden n tesdawit akked wid akk tecɣeb tsekla taqbaylit.

<p style="text-align: right;">Hocine. M 

  
 Ɣas ahat nekni mi nettwali s wallen ur neẓra d acku i d-yettilin d isiḍnen, wanag, akken i d-yenna uxxam n teslaḍ IDC, deg ukraḍyur (trimestre) wis 4 n useggas 2014, tenqes s waṭas tnezzut n yiselkimen imawiyen (ordinateurs portables) deg umaḍal, rnu mazal-itt tettader, maca kra kra.

 Aya iban ansi i d-yekka, segmi ttwaferqen deg ukuẓ n tɣemmar n ddunit tilifunat imegziyen (intelligents) akked tṭabliyin, yuɣal umdan yesmenyif ineggura-ya skud ssishilen-as tudert ugar. Am usawal i ileḥḥu s uḍaḍ, s kra n yiḥerriken ad t-tḍebbreḍ akken i k-yehwa, ad ak-d-yesken ayen tebɣiḍ, ad ak-yawi ɣer ugernit (internet). Anect-a ed waṭas, rnu anda tebɣiḍ ili, war ma terniḍ taẓayt i yiman-ik daɣen. Skud isawalen-a ur ttawaḍen tikwal arḍel deg taẓayt, ur d-teṭṭfen daɣen listaɛ imi ur ttɛeddayen temɣer n ufus ɣur kra. Deg wayyur n wanber ihi n yilindi, axxam n teslaḍ IDC yessken-d kra n leḥsabat i iga, amedya, ma yella deg 2013, 315.1 n yimelyan n yiselkimen i yenzan deg umaḍal merra, deg 2014 nzan 306.2 n yimelyan. Seg waya, yezmer deg useggas n 2018 ad nzen ḥala 291.9 n yimelyan. Meḥsub tettsemmid tettahda tadert.

 Ma deg useggas imed n 2014, ala 80.8 n yimelyan n yiselkimen i yemmesɣen sɣur yimsaɣen. Aya yefka-d tadert 2.4 % i useggas. D ayen i yeǧǧan dɣa ulzuz (ssuq) yesɛedday tagnit teḥres taggara-ya, acku wid i ten-ixeddmen ur dman dakken akka ara ilint tuɣalin i deffir n tnezzut n wayen i d-ssufuɣen. Ma yella d tanezzut s umata, ad tt-naf tenṭer aṭas deg Tjapent (Japon), ɣas ma tleḥḥu cwiṭ deg tama nniḍen n Tesga (Asie) ladɣa deg ttiɛadat n tmeɣriwin. Tamerka daɣen, segmi tɛedda seg 16.88 n yimelyan iselkimen i yenzan, almi 17.67 n yimelyan, teslek akken iwata. Daɣen ula d Taruft (Europe) nezmer ad d-nini ur telli d tin i tent-yuɣen taggara-ya. Aredmani, tban dakken tsuta-ya tefren yakan acku i tebɣa, imi simmal tettaẓ tetiknulujit simmal tjebbed-d ddhen n umdan. D amedya kan, tura iselkimen yersen ḥaca ttmeẓran s waṭas ɣur tkebbaniyen neɣ deg yixxamen s umḍan d ameẓyan kan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Yiwen umɣar isa si warrac d teqcict ibɣa ad iẓer anwa i iḥercen. yiwen wass, kkren-d warrac ssbaḥ zik, swan n lqahwa, ffɣen ɣer lexla. Yiwen iruḥ ad yeks, wayeḍ iṛuḥ ad ikrez, ma d taqcict-nni teqqim deg uxxam. Tessuli sin n yiẓedwan, tseww u texdem ccɣel n uxxam. Tameddit mi d-mlalen deg uxxam isteqsa-ten baba-tsen d acu xedmen ass-nni. Inṭeq-d yiwen seg warrac-nni yenna-as: ass-agi wwiɣ lmal ɣer yiwen umekkan iččur d leḥcic, ččan armi ṛwan, rniɣ ḥucceɣ-asen-d leḥcic. Inṭaq wayeḍ yenna: ass-agi, wellah a baba, xas yeqqur wakal, ulac aman, kerzeɣ urti llah ibarek d ameqqran. Inna-as i yelli-s: i kemm a yelli d acu txedmeḍ? Tenna-as yelli-s: nekk a baba ulac acu i xedmeɣ, ẓdiɣ kan sin n yilawen dayagi. Inna-yas: ṛuḥ a yelli ad am-t-id-ǧǧeɣ akka si tmeṭṭut ɣer tayeḍ, anida tella tmeṭṭut ur yettali cɣel. Teffeɣ teqcict-nni ɣer tala, teḥka i tiyaḍ ayen i s-yenna baba-s. Nnant-as: d ddewessu a tinnat, ta ad tt-id-tettaǧǧa i tayeḍ, cɣel-is ur yettali. Tuɣal-d s axxam, teffeɣ ɣer tmazirt teqqim din tettru tettru… Tekkes-d iffer n texsayt tebda la teṭṭebbiq deg ufus-is u teqqar: wellah ad xedmeɣ kra swayes meqqar ara yi-d-ttadren medden. Ssbaḥ zik tekker, tena aẓeṭṭa. Mi d-yekker baba-s iwhem deg-s yenna-as : d acu ara txeddmeḍ a yelli ssbaḥ zik? Tenna-as: a ẓeṭṭeɣ abernus a baba. Tẓeṭṭ, tẓeṭṭ, nettat tettwali ɣer yifer-nni n texsayt. Ass-nni mi yekfa ubernus, tella lǧanaza di taddart-nni. Akken ikker baba-s ad iffeɣ ad ieẓẓer deg uxxam lǧanaza, tenna-as yelli-s suffeɣ abernus-agi, a-t-an ifukk. Iffeɣ urgaz ad ieẓẓer, ilsa abernus-nni. Icḍaḍen-is annect-ilaten, iḥar amek ara asen-ixdem. Yewweḍ, iqqim. A win d-yeqqimen ɣef tama-s ad as-yini jebden si tecḍaḍt-a ad tɣummeḍ. Akken alammi dlen meyya. Dlen, ɣummen maca yiwen ur as-yenni anta i t-yeẓḍan abernus-a. Akka, ula tura ccɣel n tmeṭṭut, yiwen ur t-id-ittader.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Ramdane Lasheb 

<p style="text-align: right;">

  
 Yella umdan d azuran, yella wayeḍ d amirqiq. Maca, llan yimdanen i ikerhen lqedd-nsen, ttcedhin deg tfekkiwin n wid ur ten-necbi. Seg zik i yettwassen waddal d ccɣel i yessenqasen lmizan i win iɛebban aṭas n uksum, yebɣa ad yifsus. Si zik daɣen i ssugguten wid iḍeɛfen asebleɛ n tgella akken ad sɛun tacriḥt, ad rnun deg taẓayt. Dɣa, ma nmuqel ɣer tallit n wass-a, ad naf amur ameqqran n medden smenyifen ad d-banen d izuranen i ikesben aksun, wala d imuḍɛifen. Abeɛda tilawin i yettwalin tezher-nni tettak-d ccbaḥa i wudem d tfekka. Ɣef waya i zgant ttnadint amek ara xedment bac ad jjint, ad asent-tettwakkes terqeq i yuɣalen s tmuɣli-nsent d lɛib neɣ d aɣwes. Taggara-a, mi d-nnulfant ddwawi i d-ixeddmen tezher i tfekka s lemɣawla, neɣ s unamek-nniḍen tid i yescuffuyen aksum n yiwen neɣ n yiwet, ladɣa tiḥnakin n wudem, d ferru n uɣilif i d-ibanen ɣur kra n yimdanen i nezmer ad d-nini ahat ttsetḥin s lqedd-nsen amirqiq, ttrummun iman-nsen. Aṭas n wid i yesseblaɛen ddwawi-nni, i d-yettekcamen seg tmura tiberraniyin, am Ɣana, i yellan d uzzil neɣ d tiɛeqqacin, war ma ẓran d acu-tt temḍerrit i d-ttaggent. Ɣas ma ur ttnuzunt tura deg tensafarin imi ur tent-id-ttarun yimsujjiyen i wid irezzun ɣur-sen, ulamma ttilint kan deg tḥuna n usenzi n yiḥcicen d yiɛeqqaren, maca ttɛemmiden ad tent-id-aɣen, yerna s leɣla, akken kan ad cuffen tifekkiwin-nsen. « Nekk mgal tid d wid i itetten ddwawi n tujit. Sliɣ yis-s, ẓriɣ tesnulfay-d qeddac n waṭṭanen i umdan. Ssarameɣ ad ttwaḥebsent tiɣin-nsent, acku ɣas ma tazwara tessefraḥ, meɛna taggara tesseqraḥ ». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen d Asmaɛli. Ad yeqqim ihi umihi yettabeɛ kra n tin neɣ n win i yettawin ddwawi-nni ɣer yiɛebbaḍ, i yeṭṭfen deg rray-nsen nutni, ugin ad ḥessen i wiyaḍ send ad asen-ifat ahat lḥal.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 “D tayri kan ! D acu i cerken imdanen deg umaḍal ? D anadi ɣef tayri. Waɛli d Magnus, wa di Tizi, wayeḍ di Conpenhagen, xas akken ur myussanen ara tecrek-iten tayri n lmuziga, tayri n tudert, tayri n tmeddula-nsen. Ana d David, Muḥsin d Raja, imezwura di London, wiyaḍ di Naḍur, xas akken yal yiwen amek i tt-yettidir, d tayri kan i ran a idiren.. Tayriwin mgaradent akken mgradent tirga. Targit n Alexandra, yaǧǧan lḥif n tmurt-is Ikwaṭur, targit tamarikanit, ma d Saṛa d targit n tlemẓit tamarikanit yebɣan a d-tekk amḍal i tukksa n lxiq.”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Tukkist seg usebtar aneggaru 

  
 <em> Rẓageḍ ay awal  </em>

 <em> Deg imi n yirgazen at nnif </em>

 <em> Lbaṭṭel aderɣal </em>

 <em> Yewwi d di lǧerra-s urrif </em>

 <em> Ha-ten la ttgallen s ccwal </em>

 <em> Lḥif s adrar id imal </em>

 <em> Agujil ad yettiẓẓif </em>

 S tidet yerzag wawal, ɣef aya tecceḍ tqamumt n yimru , tuggi leḥzen id tettnawal. Ɣef tikelt lmut tenneḍ i tudrin, tɛedda nnig leḥwaṛi, tezgel afrag, tebded di tesga. Ṛuḥen di sin qṛib afus deg ufus. Iṛuḥ win akken is yeqqaren: “ ma tecfam ay igudar, fell-awen iɛedda lexrif ” , iḍfeṛ-it win akken yettwennissen s tezlit-agi ur nesɛi tamtilt asmi i tuɣ d anekruf deg di lḥebs deg useggas 1964. Akken iṛuḥen lwaḥid Mass Hocine Ait Ahmed akked d Mass Taleb Rabeḥ. Di ccaw ur nufi lḥila i yimeṭṭi, ur nufi abrid i ssbeṛ. 

 Tenhuz tmurt n leqbayel. Widen yeẓran fren aggas deg iciwwi, wid ur nessin wehmen , imi allaɣ -nsen ur yegzi taluft. Taddart ɛzizen a Michlet tesnehtit taguni arraw-is. Arraw-is yeggullen ur ḥenten ad ksen lhem ɣef udem-is. Xuḍi lhem si zik nessen-it. Xuḍi lhem si zik nxuleḍ-it. D lhem yesfezwin imawlan-nneɣ ɣef timura n beṛṛa, yewwin imawlan-nneɣ deg iberdan n treḍ, d win i mazal ineffu arraw-nneɣ, tiḥdayin-nneɣ akkin d agemmaḍ. D Lhem-nni id yewwin lmut n warrac-nneɣ di tefsut n 80 , di tafsut taberkant. Wisen kan acu iɣ-id yessewjjed akka d asawen. 

 Iṛuḥ Taleb Rabeh..ttrun-t wallen , jerḥent d idammen. Iṛuḥ Hocine Ait Ahmed, cfan igudar, ẓran lbizan azal n wemdan yellan d ilelli. At wawal ẓran azal n wawal ulamma ass-a rẓag deg imi. At leɛli ẓran ulamek ara yili lbaz d lbaz ma deg yir luḍyat i yettawi. Armi teɛzizeḍ a Michelet id tewwi nneqma tiɣratin. Awal d bab n wawal i t-yennan: 

 <em> Tilawin adrar n ssbeṛ </em>

 <em> Xas iẓri iɛamer </em>

 <em> S nneqma bdan-t tiɣratin </em>

 Ihi siɣret a taqbaylit s wid id rebbeḍ, ma d win nɣant tismin d awezɣi ur ten yessawaḍ!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Asmi id tegger iman-is tamurt n Rrus ɣer unnar n traḍ mgal rebrab di tmurt- n Surya , aṭas id as yennan ulaqṛaṛ Poutine ad yewqaɛ di tcerket ( yecban tin yeṭṭfen l’URSS deg tmurt n Afɣanistan) id as udin-t timura tutrimin( pays occidentaux) iḥazen ddaw ssenǧaq n Marikan. Xuḍi imanayen isertiyen ( observateurs politiques) yenwan ayen-nni, ttun( neɣ rran iman-sen ttun) awal id yenna uselway n fideralit n Rrus : «tuɣadt ( mission) iserdasen-nneɣ d yiɣallen-nneɣ deg akal n Surya ur tettɛedday ara nnig setta wagguren !». Ɣer taggara dayen id yellan ,imi war ma yuḥtem ( neɣ yesḥesb-as) yiwen , akken kan bdant lemcewrat tisertiyin gar udabu unṣib n tmurt n Surya akked tanmegla( opposition) i t-yettqazamen di Genève, iɣawel Poutine ijebbd-d amur ameqran n timesrifgin-ines n traḍ si tmurt n Surya. Taɣtest-agi tasertit ( décision) n Poutine d yiwet n temsirt tagdudant i tinezmarin tutrimin( puissances occidentales) yetturaren yir urar d yegduden n tmura ama di Ccem neɣ di Lɛiraq. Ɣef aya aṭas n wid yeṭṭafaren tasertit tagraɣlant id yennan : «Akked Poutine ula d tasertit d tuqyist amzun d taẓuri !». Ahat deg agim-agi amaynut( nouveau millenaire) Poutine d tasureft( exception) acku aṭas n ims enqaden yettwalin deg-s d aneggaru deg iselwayen n tmura i-yerran azal i w-ayen id yeqqar, i w-ayen yettwali, i w ayen yettxemmim. Asmi yeṭṭef zzmam n timsal yecqan tamurt-is, yuɣ lḥal tamurt n Rrus terdex ama di tdamsa ama deg tanezmert. Ccan –is yeqluqel seg-mi tegrurreb l’URSS. Maca tissin n Poutine terra tiregwa ɣer usu-nsent. Dac- dac , taḥejjurt ɣer weltm-as , tewet tamurt n Rrus s ugerrz armi id tuɣal am akken tella zik: d tanezmert yesɛan awal-is di ṛṛeḥba n leǧnas, d tanezmert ttkukrun-t tinezmarin nniḍen yeddan di llem n umezday atlanti( alliance atlantique). S w-akka nettw ali belli s-unekcum n tmurt n Rrus ɣer traḍ mgal ayen umi qarren ddewla tineslemt n Ccem akked Lɛiraq , imal lmizan akken ur tebɣi n wid yellan deffir taruẓi n tmura-agi n usamer alemmas am Fransa , Lengliz akked Marikan. S tsertit yeḍfeṛ Poutine mgal taluft n Surya, yessegrureb lmissa n wid yenwan teddez tebrez, imi ɣilen ayen wuɣur ssawḍen di Libya neɣ di Masser zemren as id alsen diɣen di tmurt n Ccem. Di ccaw anekcum agi n iɣallen Irrusiyen iḥettem ɣef Obama akken ad iger di lkil n usujer -ines taẓẓayt akked tanezmert n tmurt n Rrus. Yettuḥatṭem fell-as ad yeg azal i timuɣliwin nniḍen yemgaraden ɣef t-id yedderdes netta d- ugraw—ines. Di ccew tuki d Marikan, tufa ziɣ mačči ala netta-t id yellan deg annar n u serwet aserti. Si tama nniḍen anekcum n iɣallen irrusiyen gar ugni n traḍ di tmurt n Surya, yessenqer dayen kan tazmert n wayen umi sawalen daach. Yerra-as lluḍa d asawen. Am akken id yesken diɣen, unekcum agi arrusi ɣer ugni n traḍ, yir urar tturarent kra n tmura di temnaṭ-nni bḥal tamurt n Turk akked Suɛudiya. Anekcum-agi anezmar n Rrus deg umennuɣ mgal Rebrab agraɣlan yerra tamawt ɣef tanezmart tameɛlalt n tmura n l’Europe yettemxelbaḍen gar lemwaji tinemgalin( contradictoires) n tisertit ḍefṛen segmi rehnan leqrar-nsen ɣer tamuɣli n tmurt n Marikan. Am win yetturaren s tiddas , Poutine yerra yal yiwen zdat n tidet-n yiman-is . Zzun akken yedda di lebɣi n wawal aqbayli is yeqqaren : a win ijebden amrar, ixf-is ha-ten da ɣuṛ-i! Ayen i la iḍeṛṛun di ṛṛeḥba n leǧnas , yettwakkid d-akken s kra win yetturaren s tmes u leqrar ad ṛɣan iḍudan-is. Ayen akka id yettnulfun n txazabiyin di tmurt n Turk neɣ deg L’Europe d aciri n lehmum war tifrat i ten yeggunin . L’europe tufa iman-is di tcerket. Uguren id neɣlen fell-as, si lǧera n wayen iḍerrun deg usamer alemmas, mačči d izli . Leḥmali n” les migrants” id rrubbin ɣef umenzew-agi ( continent) yerra timura n tidukkla n l’Europe deg uɛewiq ademsan mebla ma nettu uguren imetiyen id iḍefr en ayen-nni. Iiguden n tmura-agi bḍan d leṣfuf: wa yebɣa wayeḍ yugi zedm a-agi n ibeṛṛaniyen id ihuǧṛen ɣer-sen. Ahat tadyant n Charlie Hebdo , tixazabiyin ihuzen tamdint n Paris d twaɣit taneggarut id yeɣlin ɣef tamdint n Bruxelles ddurt-agi , d tazwert i ccwal( war taggara?) yettraǧun tadukli-agi n l’Europe akka ɣer zdat. Iɣisan ɛnan si yal tama aɣarrabu n tmura tutrminin, imi ccekk ikcem ula d tamagit-nsen( leur identité). Deg urar aserti agraɣlan, ,alqafen ttawin akkin akka. Win yeɣlin wayeḍ ad yeddem. Maca di tegnit n wass-a i tikelt nniḍen telsa yengugi ixf-is. Tuki-d ɣef tidet yellan : i w akken lmizan ur yettmil, ilaq aṭas n tnezmarin deg ann ar . Dayen wuɣur yesflit Poutine , dayen i la ibennu Poutine. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Yeffeɣ-d wammud n tmedyezt « Lbenna n usefru » n Kenza n Ǧerǧer, deg useggas iɛeddan (2015), ɣur teẓrigin « Aframed ». D adlis amecṭuḥ i yettawin ugar n 60 isefra, yal yiwen yemgerrad ɣef wayeḍ seg tama n yimeslayen i d-tesres deg-s tmedyazt. Aṭas n yisental iɣef tessefra Kenza deg wammud-is amenzu, ama ɣef nnif, lmeḥna, lasel, ddunit, tijmilin i wid yeɛzizen fell-as… Ladɣa ladɣa ɣef tayri. Win yeɣran adlis-nni, seg uwellih amezwaru, ad yerr tamawt dakken ṭṭuqten deg-s yisefra n yiḥulfan d leḥmala, am zun ala deg uɣanib-nni (style) i tettaf iman-is ugar tmeskart. Dɣa, tenna ɣef waya deg yiwet n tdiwennit: «Ḥemmleɣ ad ssefruɣ ɣef yal taɣawsa, wanag ttafeɣ iman-iw ugar deg yisfra n tayri acku yes-sen i d-lḥiɣ amecwar-iw». Kenza deg wammud-is daɣen tbudd-d i yimeɣriyen ala aɣanib aqbur n tmedyezt, imi deg yal asefru ad d-naf annect-n, ama seg tama n talɣa neɣ n tmeɣrut. «Tamedyezt tatrart i d-yennulfan taggara-ya teččur d amcubbek, akked usderwec-nni bu tegniwin n usugen, dɣa nekk ur kcimen akkit deg-s, maca ur mgal-is i lliɣ daɣen. Seg zik maleɣ ɣer uɣanib aqbur, yehwa-yi dɣa d abrid-is i mazal ṭṭafareɣ». I d-tenna Kenza. Isefra akk i yellan deg udlis-n sɛan akk inumak-nsen s ccbaḥa n wawal i ten-yebnan, ɣas ma qrib d imecṭaḥ neɣ d iwezzlanen i yellan merra, azal n sa(07) seg-sen kan i yettawin aṭas n yifyar, lameɛna yal ameslay seg-sen ijebbed imiɣri akken ad t-yekfu. Ma d ayen icudden ɣer uzwel n wammud « Lbenna n usefru » i as-tefka tmedyazt, s tmuɣli-s nettat tudert ur tesɛi maḍi lbenna war asefru, daymi tefren isem-nni i wammud-is, dɣa tenna deg yiwen n usefru: Lukan mačči d asefru, Amek ara nqabel uguren, Lukan mačči d asefru, Tayri d acu ara tt-icebbḥen… Ayyuz i Kenza, nessaram-as afud ijehden ɣer sdat.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaysa Xalifi. 

  
 I lmend n 45 n yiseggasen n ccna n unaẓur ameqqran Rabah Ouferhat, Tiddukkla tadelsant “Tirza”n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tesuddes-d ass-nni n sed 13 deg maggu 2017 yiwet n tejmilt s wazal-is i unaẓur ameqqran n tezlit taqbaylit. Wagi d Mass Rabah Ouferhat, yiwen gar lecyax deg uẓawan n tmurt n leqbayel. Yella-d leqdica-agi deg tneḍfart n uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Azazga. Tella-d tejmilt-agi s tallelt n Tenmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, u s lemɛawna n waṭas n yidisan yecban: Axxam n yidles Mulud At Mεmmer n temdint-agi d Tneḍfart-is n Yiɛeẓẓugen, Aɣerbaz n tẓuri tifuklanin n Yiɛeẓẓugen, Taneɣlaft n yilmeẓyen d waddal d tenmehla-ines n Tizi Uzzu, akked Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Tizi Uzzu…atg. Heggan-d yiwen wahil d anesbaɣur; imi tasebḥit n wass-nni n sebt ɣef 09h00 i tebda tejmilt-agi s wudem unsib s yiwet n temsikent n tugniwin akked yimagraden n tɣamsa yettwarun fell-as d wayen yexdem, n tesfifin-is tiqdimin. Am awkken daɣen i d-yella yiwen n usarag i d-yewwin ɣef tudert n ufennan-a aqbayli aqbur, ɣef 10h00 n uzal deg tzeqqa n umezgun. Tella-d diɣ temlilt d unaẓur d uskasi d tririt ɣef yisteqsiyen n wid akk i t-iḥemmlen neɣ i as-isellen. Tella-d diɣen tnigit sɣur twacult-is d yimeddukkal-is, d yinaẓuren-nniḍen akked usenɛet n yiwen usaru/afetray i d-yemmeslayen ɣer tudert-is. Ma ɣef 14h 00 d afella, tella-d tmeɣra n ccna meqqren dima deg tzeqqa n umezgun n tneḍfart-agi. Γer taggara tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i wid yettekkin deg tejmilt-agi.

  A. Ghani 

  
 Akken kan i yewwet ugeffur deg yennayer-nni i ɛeddan, tiqenṭart n yiciqar, i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n’At Ṛẓin, yewwitt wassif n Saḥel. Tiqenṭart-agi tettecuddu ger tiɣiwanin n’At Ṛẓin lakked Aqbu. Imezdaɣ n’At Ṛẓin maḥsub d tiqenṭart-agi kan i ssexdamen akken ad ruḥen ɣer temdint n weqbu. Abrid, yuɣ lḥal wezzil, ɣef ayagi i tɛeddayen fell-as s lkutra. D-acu kan, seg wass-mi i teɣli tiqenṭart-agi, ṭunubilat uɣalen-t ur tɛedayen-t ara. Ayagi yerra imezdaɣ n’At Ṛẓin tezzin-d akk i « ddunit » akken ad ruḥen ɣer weqbu, s tama n webrid aɣelnaw wis 106, i tcuddu-n lakked d win n 26. Akka, syagi abrid iḍul. Nestaqsa ɣef ayagi aselway n tɣiwant n’At Ṛẓin, Mas.Daḥmani, yenna-d i lmend n waya: » Tiqenṭart-agi cuɣlis muqqer. Ar ass-a ur ɛad texdim, acku xuṣṣen walalen. D-acu, negred ifassen nneɣ nreqɛitt cwiṭ. Maca, ur cukeɣ ara ad d-tteṭef zdat n yiḥemmalen id iteddu-n deg tagrest! ». Akka ihi, tiqenṭart-agi n yiciqar teqqim « tɛelleq » ger yigenni d lqaɛa. « D-acu kan, mazal tteɛedayen fell-as kra n ṭumubilat! » akka iɣ-d yerna aselway n tɣiwant n’At Ṛẓin. Deg tama nniḍen, is ɛelmaɣ-d Mas.Daḥmani, aselway n’At Ṛẓin, belli takubanit n cinwa (crcc) i xedmen asenfar-agi n webrid ger Ɛǧiba lakked Bgayet, attan la tbennu yiwwet n tqenṭart nniḍen tamaynut, dinna kan, zdat n tqenṭart taqburt n yiciqar. D-acu kan, Mas Daḥmani yenna-y-ak « txuṣ cwiya tqenṭart-agi n cinwa ! ». Akka ihi, tiqenṭart n yiciqar tuɣal d-aɣbel amuqran i yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n’At Ṛẓin, imi d ttin iten -isuɛden akken ad awḍen srid mebla aɛeṭṭel ɣer temdint n weqbu.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y 

  
 Ssuturen ilmeẓyen n tɣiwant at leqsar di lwilaya n tubiret aseggem n temkerḍit ixerben acḥal ayagi imi tella teldi azal n 2 iseggan tuɣal teɣlaq dayen yeǧǧan arrac n taddart četkayen yal tikelt ameԑna ulac win id -yerran i teɣri nsen acku ttafend iman nsen ulac akk anda ara lemden ladɣa imi id -qerreb ikayaden yemxalafen ama d BAC , BEM , ladɣa inelmaden n ukayad n taggara BAC axaṭar ttnejmaԑen qqaren d tirebbuyaԑ gar-asen akken ad mԑawanen d acu kan ayagi ur d-yelli ara ttafen uguren aṭas , am wakken tamkerḍit -a tella tesԑa akk ttawilat ama d tiktabin, neɣ d tizeɣwa n tɣuri s yin akkin tuɣal texreb akk tuɣal ur tesԑin walu ayagi ktar n 2 iseggasen ar ass-a d wussan mazal di yir liḥala , ɣef waya sḥasfen ilmeẓyen n tama-agi ɣef yimḍebren n tɣiwant imi ur tt qeԑden ara d annect-agi iten-yeǧǧan ttuɣun i wid-teԑna temsalt akken ad d-rren lwelha nsen ɣef weɣbel-a s useggem-ines deg ussan-agi meḥsub ssuturen tifrat s lԑejlan . 

  
 Imi yal ccɣel yelha ad yili, ad yemmag deg lawan-is, imezdaɣ n temnaḍin n Ayt Smaɛel am yakk tamiwin timsedrarin n tmurt n Leqbayel, gran deg tzerraɛt n tferkiwin-nsen. Seld imi d-yewwet ugeffur, yerwa wakal yerṭeb, yuɣal yeshel i tneqqact. Mmektin-d yimdanen aqeddic i nnumen xeddmen-t, ferrun-t yal aseggas. Yuɣ lḥal, uqbel ad bdun deg tzerraɛt-a, imezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel, lhan d wuẓẓi n kra n ṣsenf n lxeḍra, am cclaḍa, baṭaṭa, aẓalim, lbesbas d wiyaḍ. Dɣa, skud amdan ilaq ad yexdem, ad yesseqdec tazmert i as-d-yettunefken, mi gan kksen ayen niqal i asen-d-yemmenden, qqlen ɣer lecɣal-nniḍen. Daymi ussan-a, kra n yimdanen, ceɣben deg tneqqact d tzerraɛt n tferkiwin i yesɛan akal yesleḥ i wannect-n, akken ad d-yessemɣi, ad d-yefk lɣella n lɛali i ara yessettun leɛtab d ccqa. Skud aqeddic-a n tzerraɛt yettili, ɛla ḥsab ayen yesɛa yiwen d lqaɛa, neɣ d listaɛ, llan wid izerɛen akal-nsen d timẓin, llan d ajilban neɣ d aẓekkun… Mačči aṭas n wakud segmi bdan yimezdaɣ tazerraɛt. Ɣef waya drus n lɣaci i tt-yekfan yakan, ma d tuget seg-sen tura kan i as-d-qqimen. Wiyaḍ mazal ur grin deg-s ɛad. Imi yeṭṭef-iten wahil n yimahilen-nniḍen, urɛad i d-stufan i llhu d tzerraɛt n yireẓẓwan. Lameɛna ula d wid-nni mebla ahat ur stehzayen, ur ttɛeṭṭilen deg ferru n wayen ḥemmlen ad t-xedmen, imi yekka-d seg wansayen iqburen i ileḥḥun deg yidammen. Ayen yessefraḥen ugar, d ankcum n warrac imecṭaḥ, seg tura, deg wannar-a n tfellaḥt. Acku llan wid i yettɛiwinen ibabaten-nsen, lemmden taneqqact d tzerraɛt.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaïsa Khalifi 

  
 Nella nura-d yakan deg yisebtar n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen acḥal n wayyuren tura ɣer deffir, ɣef waddad ur nessecrah deg tella deg-s tutlayt tamaziɣt. Iɛedda akk wanect-nni d akud, yal anelmad yettraǧu, yal aselmad (ula n tangiwin nniḍen) yessarem, ma ɛni d tidet ad tbin tafat ɣef tmaziɣt deg uɣerbaz-nni. Maca, mačči d ayen i d-yellan, iɣilifen-nni mazal nuḥen ar tura: iselmaden, ala yiwen i yellan din, yesɣaray inelmaden n yeswiren amenzu ed wis-sin, i iḍefren kan afurek n tsekla (littérature), tamkarḍit n uɣsur (établissement) daɣen, ar ass-a n wussan aql-itt d tilemt. Anelmad i yebɣan ad d-yawi syin adlis, akken yebɣu yili usentel-is, ur yettaf ara din yura s tmaziɣt. Aya acku tamehla n uɣerbaz ur tewwi ara aya d anezgum bac ad ilin yidlisen n tmaziɣt ttmeẓran am wiyaḍ ? Ihi, d wa i d asteqsi: anwa i d-yekkren mgal tutlayt-is ed yiman-is deg tesnawit-a tamezrayt n Maɛuc Idris? Ɛni d tamehla (direction) n uselmed n waɣir n Bgayet? Maca tili mačči ala tasnawit-a i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Tsexriwt i ara tent-yaɣen, ad d-nini d Takadimit n Bgayet? Maca atan werɛad ttwasutren yiselmaden wiyaḍ i tmaziɣt bac ad nẓer ma d-teqbel neɣ ad d-tagi. Ɣef waya ass-a, kra n win nesteqsa yefka-aɣ-d rray-is yeqqar-d dakken d anemhal n tesnawit s timmad-is ur nxeddem amek ara tecceɛcaɛ deg uɣerbaz-nni tmaziɣt, ad as-tiniḍ ur deg-s ay tella, neɣ zun tetekkes-as aɣrum seg yimi. Isallen ineggura i d-nḥewwec qqaren-d dakken atan ad tettwar ɣer tesga tedrimt n wazal n tiɣit n kra n yedlisen i temkarḍit. Maca anect-nni drus, iban-d seg tazwara dakken tesra tmaziɣt i ugar n ukuẓ n yiselmaden dinna, nettat aql-itt kan s yiwen. Yewwi-d daɣen ad d-nini tidet, dakken ibabaten n warrac, ulac win yesteqsayen mmi-s ma yeɣɣar tamaziɣt neɣ uhu, ɣas ma yella ur tt-ugin. Seg tama-a ihi, iban-d cwiṭ n ustehzi seg tidukkla n yibabaten n warrac (APE), i werǧin testeqsa amek iga uselmed n tmaziɣt deg uɣerbaz-a. Aya, ahat ur d ayen yessewhamen aṭas, imi ula deg tiganin (grèves) anida ur ttekcamen warrac s aɣerbaz, teskanay-d udem yulway aṭas almi i tt-ttwalin merra war tizemmar. Iɣilifen aseggas-a ur xussen ara deg tesnawit n Maɛuc Idris, skud ttfeggiḍen ttahdan, akken qqarent temɣarin : ad yesṭer Rebbi kan ; wayi n uselmed ɣef i d-newwi awal, rnu-as winna n ddiq (surcharge), winna n usečču n uɣerbaz (cantine), akked winna n lexsas n wallalen (moyens). D ayen i yeǧǧan taluft teḥres nezzeh almi tewweḍ ɣer umennuɣ gar yinelmaden, ahat imi kra bɣan ad ɣren wiyaḍ ttsekkiren-asen awwur n unekcum. Ad d-nuɣal i sdat ɣer taluft-a.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni. X. 

  
 Asmi tekker deg useggas n tmanyin, akkin akka qqaren-as : “acu i ten- yuɣen leqbayel-ina?” Lemxiyyer seg wid yettmeyyizen yeqqar-as : “ssḍen , d imcewwlen, ur ḥamlen ara tamurt”.Nekni s Leqbayel yuɣ(di lawan-nni) lḥal beṛṛa n tmurt n leqbayl neṛwa asweɛdi akked rregmet seg wid nenwa d atmaten. Atmaten ɣef yeqqar Lounis Ait Menguellet: 

<p style="text-align: center;"> “leɛnaya-ak tecba amesmaṛ Yerṣen di tesga yeqqim Nekk ad ganniɣ amnaṛ Seg ufus-ik ma ad ččeɣ alqim”. 

 Xuḍi ayen yeḍṛan deg Ibirir n Tmanyin( tafsut n imaziɣen) ur yelli ara d tuṣḍa, ur yelli ara d tiselbi. Tafsut n imaziɣen tusa-d di lmendad akken ad tefsu taǧeǧǧigt n tneṣlit. Akken ad terr aman ɣer tiregwa n umezruy-nsen. Imeyyaten n ilmeẓyan akked telmeẓyin yelḥan deg iberdan , isuɣen s lǧehd n tuɣac –nsen zdin ɣef yiwen yiswi: a sekfal n iẓuran n tmurt, a leqqem n ufurk n usirem ɣef lǧedra n tjaddit am akken i t-id yenna Ferhat : 

<p style="text-align: center;"><em> “Tafsut n Tizi-Wezzu A llufan-nneɣ ur negzim Yemla-aɣ amek a neddu Deg ubrid n tegrawliwin”. </em>

 Ilaq tasuta n wass-a a tegzu d akken deg lawan-nni (ddaw tasnareft yeḍleq udabu yeṭṭfen zzmam n tmurt si 62 ɣer immir) awal yexmet deg imi. Lmentaq d aseṭṭaf (uɣalen xemsa ɣef yimi) , izerfan d lewhi kan. S -ya d s-ya zzin-d iɣulad n tugdi ɣef yexxamen akked leḥwaṛi. Deg tallit –nni isem umaziɣ yezmer ad yawi lada i bab-is. Timesliwt n tezlatin timḥadiyin( Azem, Matoub, Lounis Ait Menguellet) neɣ taɣuṛi n yedlisen n umezruy n tmurt ( wid yura Yves Courrière, Ait Ahmed…) yezmer ad yessekcem win yeṭṭɣamen ɣef leḥbus. Abder n igrawliyen am Krim Belkcem, Ouamrane, Aɛmiruc Ait Hamouda, Benai Ouali, Mbarek Ait Menguellet d ssiɛqa , ala win umi yeqquṛ uqeṛṛu ara inamren tiseɣliyin id yesebded udabu zdat tidiwin-nneɣ akked lebɣi-nneɣ. Kra yellan d tidet yuɣal d uffir. Awal I teddu seg imi ɣer umeẓzuɣ imi asaḍuf n teswiɛt-nni d wagi: ha id teqqareḍ! Ha id tettnaleḍ!ha i tettqribeḍ! Am w-akken is yenna Matoub deg awal-is: “ Sin lehruf / Ḍelqen tugdi!”.

<p style="text-align: center;"><em> 20 ibrir n tmanyin yusa-d id lmendad akken ad tt-waksen xemsa ɣef yimi. Akken agdud yeffu den tidet ad igurraɛ urrif i t –izedɣen. Yenna Lounis :  </em>

 <em> “ Amachau … ɣer udrar mi id yerra ṣṣutLhiba-s tewdeḍ arraw-is Amachu… s idmaren i ttqabalen lmut Sɛerqen i weɛdaw later-is.” </em>

  Di ccaw ksen zrubat zdat w-allen. Ɣlin iɣulad id aɣ yenneḍen . Yezzi d lmenṭaq ɣer yilsawen. Yemɣi-d uɣeddu lḥeqq. Arrac d teqcicin yelḥan deg iberdan n Tizi ( ideli d wass-a ) swesɛen asalu akken ad yuɣal d abrid deg ara yeddu ugdud akken yebɣa, akken iwala, akken imena mačči akken kan yufa. Asafu werǧin yeɣli imi yettɛedday deg ufus ɣef ufus seg tasuta ɣer tayeḍ. Izumal n inelmaden akked tnelmadin yelhan deg umuli-agi wis 36 n tafsut n imaziɣen akked umuli wis 16 n tafsut taberkant d asmekti n tidet(i wid yettun) d akken amennuɣ werǧin yexsi deg ulawen n wid id yewwin lɛaz akked tirrugza seg tallit-nsen. Ɣef aya werǧin yeɣleḍ umedyaz is yennan “ win i teddun ɣef tidet yessawaḍ” am akken werǧin yecceḍ uɛebbaj n wawal i d-yennan: 

<p style="text-align: center;"> “ Xas ḥarni rebɛa leḥyuḍ Xas lfinga a tt-ttwaliɣ Xas lḥif ayi-d isuḍ Xas yecceḍ ubrid awiɣ Ma nnan iyi s anda i tettaduḍ Asen-iniɣ nekk d Amaziɣ”.  

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Zik, taddart n Agni-Buffal ssawalen-as Agni-Buzzal i lmend n yirgazen i tesɛa. Ggten yirgazen ikkaten uzzal din. Qqaren-d ɣer-s sebɛa meyya iterrasen. Ma d taddart n At Izid, illan ddaw n Agni-Buffal, rqiqit, drus yid-sen. Yiwen wass, deg wussan n ḥaṛtadem, kra n yirgazen n taddart n Agni-Buffal ẓedmen ɣef yiwen n uxxam n At Izid, kksen-as tayuga n yizgaren, wwin-tt, zlan-tt, ččan-tt. Uɣalen tikkelt-nniḍen, ḍefren axxam-nni alammi i t-xlan. Qesden, tikkelt-a, axxam-nniḍen, qqaren-asen, At Salem, sean kan yiwet n tyuga xeddmen yis-s. Ẓeḍmen fell-asen deg yiḍ, kksen-asen-tt, wwin-tt, zlan-tt, bḍan-tt gar-asen, ččan-tt. Mi yuli bab n uxxam ɣer taddart n Agni-Buffal, yufa-ten di tejmaɛt, ttawin fell-as tacawit, tihin fell-as. Wa yeqqar i wa, timecreḍt n yiḍelli werǧin i tt-nezli; yal wa d acu i s-d-yeqqar, akken ttkehinen fell-as. Yuɣal-d, iḍfer-d abrid areqqaq. ḍefren-t-id, ad t-wwten. Iwweḍ ɣer yiwet n tizi, ibedd, issawal:

 ‘’Aḥlima! Aḥlima!

 Ssebɛa miyya,

 Ad uɣalen d sebɛin

 Agni-Buzzal,

 Ad yuɣal d Agni-Buffal’’.

 Leḥqen-t-id, ad t-ṭṭfen, isenser-asen, irwel, imneɛ.

 Qqaren-d, seg wass-nni, taddart n Agni-Buzzal, teɣli-d fell-as tterka, ttmettaten, ɣellin wa deffir wa alammi ssebea miyya-nni iterrasen, uɣalen d sebein. Akka, taddart tuqqel rqiqet, afud isεan zik iruḥ, yuɣal i bab-is. Agni-Buzzal yuɣal d Agni-Buffal.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Aseggas-agi igeffuren xuṣṣen dayen kan deg tmurt. Cceḥa-agi n yigenni ur d-gli ara s wayen yelhan i yifellaḥen n tama n Ṣummam. Igenni yeṣfa, as t-iniḍ d-anebdu ! Ula d-aẓɣal yella am akken d tagara n tafsut ! Aman ulac, xuṣṣen mliḥ. Ayagi yewwi-d aɣilif i yifellaḥen, garasen wid yettrebin l’mal. Laḥcic ulac, tuga txuṣ deg laxlawi, ayagi yeǧǧa ifellaḥen-agi tteqliliḥen akken ad seččen ulli nsen. Lmal deg tama-agi as t-iniḍ yeṭfit ccer. Imɣi iruḥ am akken ixuṣ, ayagi yeǧǧa l’mal, i ketten, i tett iferrawen n tzemrin ɣef akken i nwala. As nni n laxmis, n erra ɣer ssuq n Tazmalt akken an seqsi ɣef umɛic n l’mal anda tewweḍ summa-s. Nesaqsa kra n wid yeznuzun asaɣur, nufa belli suma-s tuli s waṭaṣ. Acuɣar? « Aseggas-agi ixuṣ ugeffur. Ayagi yuɣal-d ɣef suma n lbuṭa n usaɣur. Tagi daɣen txuṣ deg leswaq. » ɣef akken iɣ d yenna yiwen ukumirṣi yeznuzun asaɣur. Ifellaḥen yettrebin l’mal yeṭef-iten uɣilif, ur ẓrin s-anda ad rren iqerray nsen. « Aseggas-agi ttawaɣit. Teẓriḍ belli lbuṭa n usaɣur tewweḍ ɣer 950 idinaren? Nek ur zmir-eɣ ara ad ɛegcaɣ ulli inu! Ɣlay-it aṭaṣ usaɣur. » Akka iɣ d yenna yiwen umrebi n l’mal n Tazmalt. Akka ihi, suma n lbuṭa n usaɣur tuli ussan-agi, ɣas akken tella t ttnuzu gar 450 lakked 600 idinaren igguren iɛeddan. D-acu kan, suma tezmar attali nnig n 1000 idinaren, ma yella ɛeṭlen igeffuren. Ifellaḥen n tama-agi n Ṣummam ttaṭafen iɛebbuḍen nsen, tmuqulen ɣer yigenni, am ahat ad yas usigna aberkan ar ad yawin ageffur ! « Jmaɛ liman, ma yella tkemel-itt akka, ad zenzaɣ akk l’mal-iw. Agma ɣlay aṭaṣ wemɛic-is. Ma yella ad xedem-eɣ s laxṣara, ihi ulayɣar! » Akka i yerfa yiwen n-umrebi n l’mal i nemlal deg ssuq-agi n Tazmalt. Akka, ifellahen ttgallan s din uqabac…!

<p style="text-align: right;">Syphax.Y

  
 Yiwen umerkanti, temmut-as tmeṭṭut-is, ibɣa ad iɛiwed zwaǧ, iwwet ad yaɣ yiwet n tlemẓit agur deg yigenni nettat di lqaɛa. Tezzyen d ayen kan, alammi wi, d-iwten ɣer-s ad tezweǧ ad tecreḍ deg-s ayen ur izmir. Iruḥ s axxam n baba-s, iẓra-t-id, yenna-as-id : “Di nekni s yimawlen aql-aɣ tenneqqbaleḍ, maca ṛṛay mačči ɣur-neɣ kan i yeqqim, iwwi-d ad nciweṛ taqcict. Ruḥ ! Lexbar s ɣur-neɣ”. Mi cawren yelli-tsen tenna-asen-id “aqbel ad qebleɣ ad iliɣ d tameṭṭut-is, maca s ccerṭ. Nnan-as: “d acu n ccerṭ-agi i d-tesnulfaḍ daɣen a yelli ?. Argaz d amerkanti, ikseb cci d ssraya, ayen akk ara as-tessutreḍ ad am-t-id-yawi, ad tiliḍ am tmeṭṭut n ṣelṭan neɣ ahat kteṛ”. Terra-asen: “siwlet-as ad d-yas ad t-ẓreɣ, seg yimi-w ara issel ccerṭ-iw”. Ssawlen-as i unesbaɣur yusa-d, nnan-as imawlen n teqcict:” yelli-tneɣ teqbel acu kan ɣur-s yiwen n ccerṭ, ad t-tesleḍ kan axir seg yimi-s”. Ssawlen i teqcict tusa-d. Tenna-as : Qebleɣ ad rnuɣ d tameṭṭut tis snat acu kan s ccerṭ”. Yerra-as-d: “ccreḍ akk ayen tebɣid, aɣbel deg-I”. tenna-as: ”ihi, nekk ur zmireɣ ara, ad gneɣ deg umeṭraḥ deg-i teggan tmeṭṭut-ik tamezwarut, ad tt-yerḥem Ṛebbi, suffeɣ-it-id seg uxxam, ḍegger-it neɣ efk-it, lḥaṣun nekk ur t-ttwaliɣ ara deg uxxam, eg-as akken i ak-ihwa. Tin ɣur-s ad i yi-d-txedmeḍ wayeḍ s rric akk n yigḍaḍ illan di teẓgi”. Amerkanti, izder di tsussmi, ad as-tiniḍ iggugem di dqiqa. Taqcict d yimawlen-is sikiden deg-s ttrajun melmi ara d-inṭaq. Am winn-a ara as-ifken abeqqa, idduqqes-d yenna-as i teqcict : “ Kkes aɣbel d ayen isehlen”. Amerkanti-nni, yuɣal s axxam-is, issendeh ixeddamen-is, suffɣen ameṭraḥ seg uxxam, syin iceyyeɛ ɣer yigḍaḍ ad d-asen akken ma llan, mejṭuḥ meqqer. Azekka-nni, wwḍen-d akk yigḍaḍ slid Bus. Akken tlata n wussan, netta d aceyyeɛ ɣer Bus ad d-yas akken ad d-yefk cwiṭ si rric-is. Ass wis rebɛa, yusa-d, yufa-d akk igḍaḍ illan di teẓgi ttrajun-t akken ad sencwen iman-nsen akken amerkanti ad ixdem ameṭraḥ i tmeṭṭut ara yaɣ. Yenn-asen Bus: ” Nekk ur sencaweɣ ara iman-iw i urgaz ittagaden tameṭṭut. Dɣa ula d igḍaḍ-nni akk i d-yusan ḍefren ṛṛay n Bus, uɣalen akk ansi i d-kkan, ugin ad kksen rric-nsen, ad scencwen iman-nsen. Seg wass-nni, Bus yuɣal d Si Bus, ttqadaṛent akk.

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 S wudem n unemhal-is, Laṭawi Racid, iberreḥ-d ddurt iɛeddan Uḥuddu Aɣerman (Protection Civile) n Bgayet s leḥsab n tsemhuyt n unebdu d leqdicat i yemmuggen segmi d-yebda useggas-a. Gar wayen i d-yufraren ad naf dakken irgazen n usellek, gren-d iman-nsen azal n 30141 n tikkal, ama i usexsi n tmes, i usellek n medden, i tiwin ɣer udawi, i yisehwa (accidents) deg yiberdan, i teftisin neɣ i wayen-nniḍen.Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef teftist, 14 n yimdanen i yemmuten deg waman. Ma d isehwa dɣa, tugi ad tenqes twaɣit deg yiberdan-nneɣ. Imi ttwajerrden aseggas-a lqidar n 2736 n tuffɣiwin i usaɛef deg yiberdan. D ayen i d-yesḥeḍren 64 n yimattanen d 1944 n yimejraḥ.Ayen iɣef ilaq ad d-nerr awellih, dima ɣef leḥsab n Tmehla n Uḥuddu Aɣerman, dakken tanekra mgal indaren n tmes deg tẓegwa ur telli teshel. Iban-d lḥal tewɛer ugar n tin n yilindi. Dɣa, ma drus 883 n yindaren i d-yellan gar yulyu d ṭuber, almi glan s 1958.61 n yihikṭaren seg umaḍaɣ d tuga, ɣas ukin yirgazen n usellek.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Deg tira n wawalen, send ad d-isuffeɣ yiwen adlis, yesefk ad ittaqqen amek i ttwarun wawalen i d-yefren deg tutlayt. Llan tura yidlisen iɣef tbedd tira n tmaziɣt. Yeqqim-d deg wayen ur yefrin εad, d aɣbel iḍen am ţ/tt, ε/â; imeɣriyen gzan tamsalt.

 Banent-d tuccḍiwin deg yal tama n tira. Ha-tent kra seg-sent

 – a/e : idas, sb. 11 (ilaq: iḍes), ad narǧǧu, sb. 12 (ilaq : ad nerǧu), tixar, sb. 35 (ilaq: tixer); meḍlaɣ, timeqbart , sb. 140 (ilaq: meḍleɣ, timeqbert)

 – tussda n usekkil : yettḥudu, sb. 35 (ilaq : yettḥuddu), ayfus, sb. 29 (ilaq: ayeffus), imeẓuɣen, sb.73 (ilaq: imeẓẓuɣen);

 – timerna n “a” ɣer tazwara n wawalen: amyag : arsan, sb. 11 (ilaq: rsan / lsan) ardubga, sb. 74 (ilaq: (r)rḍubegga);

 – Asemres n usekkil ameqqran d umeẓẓyan akked usigez seεraqen lǧerra, gar tatut d uεemmed.

 1.2.2. Gar wawalen :

 Ilugan n beṭṭu gar wawalen ur ttuqadren ara; ugur ha-t s tehri gar umyag d yiwsilen-is.

 Md : ur ten-taba&amp;epsilon,; sb. 26 (ilaq ur t-nettabaε), ur telḥiqeɣ, sb.132 (ilaq ur t-lḥiqeɣ);

 – I+amyag : it wwi, sb. 16 (ilaq i tewwi/tuwi);

 – I+amqim udmawan : ayen itt-iqaḥan, sb.27 (ilaq ayen i tt-iqerḥen);

 Tukksa n yigulen ur yekfi ara; aya i d-yettwabedren ur d-yessemḥalleq ara akk i udlis n R. Buxerrub.

 1. Igulen n tjerrumt:

 Deg yigulen n tjerrumt, ha-ten kra seg wid i d-yufraren, ulac amek ara ffren.

 – Tinzaɣ : asemres n tenzaɣ yesseεraq anamek ticki rsent deg yir amkan. Md : ad ḥefḍen fell-asent (tijewwaqin), sb. 13 ( ilaq: ad ḥefḍen yis-sent).

 – Amqim “i” : Ma mačči d tujrut yeskerkren…”, sb. 9 (ilaq: i iskerkren)

 – Asentel deg tefyirt tuddist ( s tɣuni) : Iɣezran skefkufen, skerkiwen isirwen…, sb. 9 (ilaq: iɣezran…, isirwen skefkufen). Asentel, deg umur amenzu d isem, ad ikemmel, deg wis-sin, d isem). Deg tesleḍt, qqaren-as “anammal n usentel”.

 – Asefti n yimyagen n tɣara mačči d win n teqbaylit : imeẓẓi, imelleḥ (sb.22)

 – Taguri n yinaw usrid: Amaru yezger akkin i yilugan i tsemras teqbayli.; yerfed yiwet n tarrayt nniḍen. Deg usebter wis 25, yura : (“ Ẓriɣ… tamcumt “ tenna-as Tmensurt). Tannumi temmed s talɣa “ i as-tenna “. D acu ara d-yini yiwen ? Yezmer ahat ad tuɣal d alugen imi tt-smersen yakan wiyaḍ send ad yeddem netta !

 Asenqeḍ (asigez) deg tiwin n yinaw d asafar qlilen yerna ur yebdid ara ɣef yilugan yellan d iqburen (md: sb.33)

 2. Tazḍawt n uḍris (ilugan n tjerrumt taḍrisant) :

 Tazḍawt teskan-d mek i iteddu uḍris, seg tefyirt ɣer tayeḍ, akken ad yesdukel isalan imaynuten d yiferdisen yettwassnen yakan.

 2.1. Anegzum n wassaɣ gar yimqimen iwsilen d tgejda uɣur qqnen :

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yettkemmil… 

  
 Zik-nni, deg yiwet n taddart, llan sin watmaten, yal yiwen s uxxam-is. Ameqqran-nni seg-sen, yeḥyat Ṛebbi mačči d kra imi yesԑa idrimen, yesԑa cci. Ma yella d amecṭuḥ-nni, yal tameddit, yettḥebbir i uzekka-yin. Acu kan ameẓyan-nni yefreḥ s wayen yesԑa, yezga wudem-is yennecraḥ, yeččur d sser. Ma d gma-s ameqqran yezga yekres unyir-is, yettxemmim yegguma ad yaf tifrat I wacu tezdeɣ teḍsa udem n gma-s. Armi d yiwen wass, iṛuḥ ɣur-s s axxam-is, iwala yir liḥala ideg yella. Syin yekker yefk-as taxriḍt n yidrimen deg-s azal n 200 yimelyan. Deg tazwara yugi gma-s amaẓuẓ, yuɣal yeṭṭef-iten. Akken d tameddit n was, nnejmaԑen-d warraw-is, dɣa yewwi-ten-d yebda ad ten-iḥesseb, ad asen-yettԑawad, yegguma ad d-yaf leḥsab i iṣeḥḥan acku yeffeɣ-it leԑqel mačči d kra. Syin bdan igerdan-is la as-qqaren: ‘’ad nexdem akka, ad nerr akka’’: yiwen ad-as-yini ad naɣ takerrust, wayeḍ ad nerzu ɣer temdint ad neɣ axxam, wayeḍ, wayeḍ (…). Armi uwḍen ɣer leԑyaḍ d yimerẓi. Yal ass akka i tḍerru deg uxxam. Uɣalen ur gganen ara uḍan, yezga dima yemcewwal wallaɣ-nsen. Tuɣal tɣab ɣef wudem-nsen teḍsa d ucmumeḥ. Ma d baba-tsen, yeḥbes lmux-is seg usali d usubbu n leḥsab, anyir-is dima yekres, yettafqaԑ bih bih. Yuɣal ixemmem weḥd-s, yufa-d d akken imal-as lmizan n teḍsa d uzmumeg d warraw-is, dɣa yenna-as: «Adrim yessexsar». Nekk yellan thennaɣ ferḥeɣ s warraw-iw d wayen kesbeɣ, ṛuḥeɣ uğweɣ-d aṭṭan s ufus-iw, nekk ur zmireɣ i tigi. Azekka-nni ṣbeḥ, uqbel tanezzayt, iṛuḥ s axxam n gma-s, yewwi-as idrimen-nni, yenna-as-d : «yakk fkiɣ-ak-ten !», yerra-as : «jmeԑ aṭṭan-ik ɣur-k, lḥaṣun tanemmirt-ik». Swakka i d-tuɣal talwit d tumert ɣer uxxam-is d warraw-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> ADAOUN Abdelghani 

  
 Ahat ayen i yesqelliqen ugar anehhar mi ara yili i tẓayert ɣef tkerrust, d amxudneq i d-yettilin deg yiberdan. Ladɣa ma yella akud n tikli ɣer uxeddim neɣ sanda-nniḍen ur ilaq ad iɛeddi i tilas. Deg ubrid aɣelnaw wis tẓa, i yeqqnen abeɛda tawilayt n Bgayet d tin n Seṭṭif, ttidiren wat tkeryas akk iɣeblan n ddunit seg teswiɛin timenza n tnezzayt armi d tameddit. Segmi i d-yekcem unebdu izad uḥras ɣef snat n tikkal ahat. Tasebba n wid akk i d-yettẓuren Bgayet i uɛummu deg teftist neɣ i umerreḥ deg tɣemmar-is-nniḍen. Nnig tkeryas i yettabaɛen ɣer Bgayet, aṭas ihi n tid i yettwajerrden s wuṭṭunen n waɣiren-nniḍen, am Um Lebwaqi, Tabatent, Lezzayer, Jijel,… atg. «D ayen yesḥissifen wayen nesɛedday yal ass deg yiberdan-nneɣ. Abrid ara d-lḥuɣ deg 20 n tedqiqtin, leḥḥuɣ-t deg tsaɛet. D lmeḥna n tidet! ». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n unehhar seg Bgayet. Ulama ur d-yeqqim waṭas akken ad kfunt ssmayem i yessawalen i umwan, yettusemma ula d tirza ɣer teftisin i d-ijebbden lɣaci, bdant neqqsent, mazal yeččaray ubrid-a aɣelnaw ama deg tisin neɣ deg tuɣalin. Ɣef waya llan wid yesmenyifen iberdan n twilayin, am win n Aweqqas-Kefrida, i wakken kan ad rewlen i ddḥis i asen-yettawin ayendin d akud. Deg uraǧu n keffu n lecɣal n ureqqeɛ d ussuseɛ n Ɛecba (les gorges) n Xerraṭa, i ara d-yeglun s wayen yessefraḥen i yimkerrusen.

  M. K. 

  
 L’Enfer un peu d azwel i yefka umyaru d umedyaz Makhlouf Boughareb i wammud-nniḍen n yisefra i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin Edilivre n tmurt n Fransa. Deg udlis-a, Makhlouf Boughareb yessuzer ciṭ n usirem anda ttarran wiyaḍ teqreḥ d uɣilif. Seg yisefra lqayen akken lqayit umawal yesseqdec, yezzi-d umedyaz i waṭas n yisental i wakken ad yefk tamuɣli-s fell-asen xas ulamma yessexdem aserwes gar wayen yettwali netta s timmad-is d wayen ttwalin wiyaḍ. Ilul Makhlouf Boughareb deg Wat Yanni. D amyaru, d amedyaz i ḥemmlen diɣ ccna akked teklut. Gar wayen yura, nezmer ad d-nebder: Le chant des larmes, 2010; Les cygnes de l’aube, 2011; Faire trembler mes terreurs, 2015, L’Enfer un peu akked waṭas n yimagraden deg tesɣunin. Am wakken yettaru, diɣ, s tmaziɣt.

  H. M. 

  
 Ilul-d ussan iɛeddan umaynut di tmedyezt taqbaylit. D ammud n yisefra i d-tessaẓreg tmedyazt, yelli-s n Tizi Uzzu, Massa Tinhinan Ben Rabeḥ, sɣur Tiẓrigin El Amal. Adlis-a iwumi yettunefk uzwel « Imeṭṭi d uḥulfu », iwumi iga tazwart uselmad n tmaziɣt Mass Arezqi Ɛewdiyya, yesnerna-d ayendin d tumert i yimura d yimedyazen, akked wid merra iɛecqen tutlayt tayemmat, ama i tira neɣ i tɣuri. Maca, lferḥ ageɛmir tḥulfa yis-s tmeskart tilemẓit i yegren nnehda n utthenni mi twala dayen isefra-s ufan tanezduɣt-nsen ara ten-yeṭṭfen i lebda, rsen ɣef tewriqin i ḥemmlen ḥemmlent-ten. « Tumert-iw d tameqqrant imi i d-yeffeɣ udlis-iw, imi ɣas ma segmi ceyyɛeɣ tamedyezt-iw i umaẓrag, rǧiɣ sin n wayyuren kan yeffeɣ-d, meɛna araǧu-inu yebda seg 23 n yiseggasen ɣer deffir, asmi uriɣ asefru amezwaru. Xellseɣ idrimen akken ad t-id-ssufɣeɣ acku nwiɣ seg wul ad d-fkeɣ ajdid i tsekla-nneɣ…». I aɣ-d-tenna Tinhinan Ben Rabeḥ, i yessaramen daɣen ad tehwu tmedyezt-is i yimeɣriyen bac ad yamad uḥulfu n lferḥ-is. Ammud « Imeṭṭi d uḥulfu » yewwi-d 24 n yisefra i yettwarsen ɣef 72 n yisebtar. Tuget n yisefra-nni, ttmeslayen-d ɣef tmeṭṭut taqbaylit, d wayen tesɛedday d iɣeblan d lmeḥna deg tudert-is. Deg-sen, tettcektay-d tmeskart s usḥissef d uɣiḍi ɣef tmetti ur nefki i tmeṭṭut-a azal-is, i yebɣan ad tt-tesserxes. Am wakken d tajmilt i terra Tinhinan i tmeṭṭut i tt-yecban s umata, ama d tayellit, tayemmat, atg. Tenna deg usefru iwumi tsemma « Asuɣu n tsusmi »:

 <em> Nniɣ-d ayen akk ur d-nniɣ  </em>

 <em> Ay mazal ad t-id-iniɣ  </em>

 <em> Xas tgezzmem deg ssut-iw  </em>

 <em> Tebɣam ayen akken ur bɣiɣ  </em>

 <em> Mi iyi-tekksem ayen akk bɣiɣ  </em>

 <em> Deg usefru i ttafeɣ lebɣi-w  </em>

 <em> Tessedreɣlem-iyi ur ttwaliɣ  </em>

 <em> Ayen akk bɣiɣ ad waliɣ  </em>

 <em> Tessebɛadem-t ɣef yiẓri-w </em>

 Yettnuzu wammud « Imeṭṭi d uḥulfu » 150 n yidinaren. Afud uzmir i Tinhinan Ben Rabeḥ, d wid i iqeddcen ɣef ubaɣur n tutlayt taqbaylit.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Zzin 33 n yiseggasen ɣef wasmi nɣan Watmaten Inselmen (Al Ixwan Al Muslimun) ameɣras ilemẓi, ameɣnas n tmaziɣt ed tugdut : Kamel Amzal. Deg wass n 2 wunbeṛ n useggas 1982 deg tesdawit n Ben Aknoun yekker umennuɣ d ameqqran ger yinelmaden iselmaẓriyen (islamistes) n umussu n Watmaten Inselmen (ixwanjiyen) akked yinelmaden imegdayen gar-asen Kamel yellan imir-n deg leɛmeṛ-is 20 n yiseggasen kan. Deg umennuɣ-nni dɣa ay t-id-nɣan. 

 Tamrawt kan n yiseggasen mbeɛd d igiman (milliers) n yimeɣnasen n tmaziɣt d tugdut ay d-nɣan Yiselmaẓriyen irefden leslaḥ mgal aɣref d uwanek. Asmi d-nɣan Kamel Amzal, amennuɣ yekker ɣef wamek ara sseddun tudert deg yiɣaramen isdawanen (cités universitaires) imi yal tama tebɣa ad teṭṭef aseqqamu n uɣaram (comité de cité). Asmi tekker deg 1992, amennuɣ yekker ɣef wamek ara sseddun tudert deg tmurt. Ass n 02 wunbeṛ 1982 nɣan-d Kamel ay d-yeqqimen d azamul maca deg temrawt-nni taberkant 200.000 n yimdanen ay d-nɣan gar-asen aṭas n yimeɣnasen n tugdut tmaziɣt. S usmekti d tajmilt ay as-nettarra : gen deg talwit a ameɣras ur ṛuḥen ara yidammen-ik.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Tiddukla n Yimedyazen 

  
 Ass n lǧemɛa yezrin, taɣlift n Usegmi aɣelnaw teldi tiɣerɣert n uttekki deg temsizzelt yerzan iselmaden n yiswiren i tlata: amenzu, alemmas d usnawi. Ɣas akka, mazal ur d-iban ara s wudem unṣib umḍan n yimekwan ara d-iṣaḥen yal tawilayt, maca ṭṭmeɛ d win izedɣen acḥal d ilemẓi d tlemẓit yettraǧun s ccuq tagnit-a ara asen-d-yeldin tiwwura s axeddim. Aṭas i yurǧan dakken timsizzelt ad d-tili deg taggara n wayyur-a ideg nella, maca taneɣlaft n Usegmi Massa Benghebrit twekked-d akka deg temlilit-is taneggarut akked yimaswaḍen belli timsizzelt ad d-tili ass n 29 deg yunyu i d-iteddun. Aseɣzef-a deg usiher ur d-yelli ara mebla leḥsab imi akka tura srabes n CNR sɣerbilen deg yikaramen n wid yebɣan ad awin tastaɣt. Ahat d ayen ara d-ibeggnen s tidet ayen ara teḥwiǧ yal tamnaḍt n yimekwan. Tubiret, d tin yettrajun dɣa taggara n wuddun (recensement) n wid ara yeffɣen iwakken ad d-banen yimekwan, iwakken ur d-tɣelli ara deg leɣlaḍ n useggas yezrin anda aswir asnawi ur d-telli fell-as temsizzelt. Kra n tangawin deg uswir alemmas ur teɛni ara temsizzelt qqiment deg beddu n useggas-a aɣurbiz mebla iselmaden almi i d-usan seg twilayin nniḍen. Tangawin-a, yecban tutlayt taglizzit, addal, d tussna tamagant ur ttuɣalent ara aseggas-a deg rrif, imi ḥwaǧent iselmaden. Ma d tutlayt tafrensist mazal tuɣal d aɛewwiq imi mačči aṭas I yettruḥun ɣur-s deg tesdawit, d ayen I d-yettaǧǧan imukan d ilmawen deg yiɣerbazen. Deg waggur n yennayer yezrin, mi akken yewweḍ lawan ad ɛeddin yikaramen n yiselmaden imaynuten ama d wid irebḥen deg temsizzelt neɣ wid ixeddmen s leɛqed ɣer yimsenqed n tedrimt yeḍra-d akka kra n leɛweq ɣef kra n wid ixeddmen s yiguta deg tutlayt tafrensist, imi ineggura-a ur ksiben ara turagt deg tanga-a. Ad d-nesmekti dakken timsizzelt-a ad d-tili deg tazwara s wudem n tira, iwakken wid i d-yufraren ad kemmlen s timawit. Igemmaḍ ad ten-walin s ttawil n l’Internet mebla ma rzan am zik alamma d takadimit. Widak ara d-yifriren deg temsizzelt, taɣlift n Usegmi ad asen-telli tiwwura i usileɣ deg waggur n yulyu iwakken xerṣum ad ẓren amek ara qablen inelmaden, acu i asen-iwulmen ad t-xedmen daxel n tneɣrit d kra n temsirin yerzan asader (la profession). <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. Smail 

  
 Ass n ɛecrin deg ɣuct-a, kra n yigiman n medden llan deg Yifri ilmend n usmekti n Ugraw n Ssumam, kra n yimedyazen llan deg Tizi n Berber i temlilit tamezwarut n tmedyazt tazwawt. Send mettwal azal n wass-nni, mlalen-d dinna deg udrar kra n wid iḥemmlen awal, ɣas mačči deg waṭas seg-sen, yal yiwen seg wanta tamnaḍt. Ɣef wawal n uselway n Unaray n Tmerrit (Office du Tourisme) i d-iheggan ttiɛad Mass Kamal, tadwilt-a tamezwarut d tin n uɛraḍ kan. Imi ɣur-sen tura ddeqs n yisenfaren i yellan deg wahil-nsen, am winna n umunulug.

 «Amsizwer mazal. Nenna-as lwaḥi d tɣiwant-nneɣ, ad njerreb taẓrigt tamezwarut. Syinna, ma tgerrez taluft, ad neɛreḍ ad as-nheggi akken ilaq i tis snat». i aɣ-d-yenna yimḍebber n leqdic-a. Yerna yenna-aɣ-d: «iswi-nneɣ d aqdac ɣef yidles-nneɣ. Imi nxeddem diɣ yal aseggas tafaska n tẓuri n usewwi (art culinaire). Maca, imi ulac idrimen, ur tt-nga abrid-a». Mi tɛedda terbaɛt-nni n yimedyazen, ttbaddaden s nnuba deg usayes, yal yiwen yebḍa d yimeḥḍar asefru s tmenna-is d usentel-is. Kra n tegnit tamedyazant, yewweḍ-d wakud n tikci n tnagiwin n tikkin sɣur tidukkla timsuddest i wid akk i d-yerran i tiɣri, usan-d ɣer Tizi n Berber.

 «Walaɣ-tt d timlilit yelhan ma nemmeslay ɣef ujerreb. Nemlal-d ɣas deg drus, snubegten yis-neɣ akken ilaq. Taggara, newweḍ iswi mi d-nessawel isefra-nneɣ». Awal-a n yiwen n umedyaz i yellan dinna deg temlilit-nni. Iban-d sɛan aṭas ul yilemẓiyen-a n Tizi n Berber. Ula d axemmem ttxemmimen deg wanwa ttiɛad adelsan ideg ara dumen. Ladɣa imi ayen ixussen tura deg temnaḍt-a n unẓul-asamar n Bgayet mačči d tamedyazt skud tella tfaska n Udrar n Fad, wanag d amezgun, d tira, d ccna, d ssinima, d taɣuri, d waṭas n wayen-nniḍen i icudden ɣer yidles.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Ula deg tɣiwant n Draɛ Lgayed deg Xerraṭa, i d-yezgan s wazal n 70 n yikilumitren seg waɣir n Bgayet, tesfuggel i tikkelt tamenzut tdukkla tadelsant « Idles » amulli-a amaziɣ. Yella-d waya s yisaragen i usissen n unamek n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen, iɣer yettwanced dɣa uɛeggal n Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad Mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi. Netta yewwi-d ameslay abeɛda ɣef termit n tdukkla n Udrar n Fad deg uheggi n yiqeddicen idelsanen. Ilaq ad d-nini simmal tettḥerrik tdukkla-a tadigant deg Draɛ Lgayed, simmal ttakin yimezdaɣ ɣef wayen yeɛnan tamagit-nsen.

  M. K. 

  
 Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, iɛedda yiwen n lweqt asmi tella tesqamut n taddart, yal taggara n ddurt tettili-d tecmilt n ussizdeg, maca seg wasmi tettwakkes yeḥbes umahil-agi i d-isenfalayen udem n lemɛawna.

 Ilemẓyen n taddart n Tahanouts, kkren-d tasebḥit n wass-nni n lǧemɛa bdan yiwet n twizi n ussizdeg n twennaḍt. Bdan afraḍ n tregwa, syin d iberdan, syin akkin d timeqbert. Tebda tecmilt-agi seg tṣebḥit n wass armi d tameddit n wass, yerna ayen yessefraḥen akk imi mačči d tasqamut n taddart i ulac acḥal-a neɣ d tiddukkla n twennaḍt i werɛad i d-nlul i d-yessawlen ɣer leqdic-agi igerrzen, maca d lebɣi n kra n yilmeẓyen iḥemmlen tezdeg d ccbaḥa n ugamma. Imezdaɣ ladɣa ilmeẓyen-nniḍen rran-d i teɣri n wid yecɣeb wugur n wammus. D ayen igerrzen imi i d-sebgnen udem n twizi d tallelt gar yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi, d useḥbiber ɣef cbaḥa n ugamma d twennaḍt. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, iɛedda yiwen n lweqt asmi tella tesqamut n taddart, yal taggara n ddurt tettili-d tecmilt n ussizdeg, maca seg wasmi tettwakkes yeḥbes umahil-agi i d-isenfalayen udem n lemɛawna. Teqqim taddart-agi azal n 3 n yiseggasen mebla ma tella-d twizi n ussizdeg neɣ tmecreḍ. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"></span> A.A 

  
 Tura mi akka i d-ffγen yigemmaḍ n temsizzelt yerzan iselmaden imaynuten n uswir alemmas d tesnawit. Yettwaddem rray sγur teγlift n Usegmi i wakken ad d-yili usileγ n yiselmaden-a deg waggur n γuct i d-iteddun. Deg yiwen n ulγu i d-texdem tneγlaft n tterebga, tallit-a n usileγ ad tebdu ass n 19 di γuct, ad tdum 12 n wussan. Deg Tubiret, anemhal n Usegmi Mourad Bouziane, yefra-tt i wakken ad d-tili temlilit-a deg tesnawit Ouamrane n temdint n Tubiret mi akken yennejmaɛ d yimaswaḍen ara yilin deg lmendad i yiselmaden-a imaynuten. Dγa, uqbel ad d-yawed ttiɛad, yettwasbedd Abdennour Mohamed, yellan d amaswaḍ n tnebdalt n uswir alemmas d imḍebber n tallit-a n usileγ am wakken daγ i d-ttwaheyyan akk ttawilat iwulmen i waya. Ad d-nesmekti d akken deg yimalas yezrin i tekfa temlilit n usileγ n yiselmaden n uswir amenzu, imi nutni ur ten-terzi ara temsizzelt, wigi d wid i d-yulin seg lejrida n leɛḍil n temsizzelt n useggas yezrin. Timlilit-a i d-yellan deg uγerbaz alemmas Doubaissi n temdint n Tubiret, tessemlal-d 592 n yiselmaden.

  M. Smail 

  
 Lemɛinsla, d ansay aqbur i mazal deg tmurt n Leqbayel ar ass-a. Yal mi ara d-yaweḍ wass n 7 deg yulyu, ad siɣen yimdanen times deg yiɛerqab-nsen neɣ deg yiqwiren-nsen. Ad d-jemɛen asaɣur akked wafrasen, ad rnun ɣur ticcict, syin ad asen-sekkren times. Ttgen lecɣal-a tasebḥit, ma yella deg umekkan n tneqqlin akked tzemrin, ma yella deg usuki neɣ umḍiq kan akka n menwala, ttecɛalen times-nni, tameddit. Ɣef wakken ttxemmimen yimezwura, nnan-d abbu n tmes-agi, yelha d ddwa : yessenqas deg uqerquc, meḥsub yettarra-t ad yaweḍ d tabexsist ; yessufuɣ-d ibeɛɛac izedɣen daxel n lfakya u yesnernay tilin-is. Ma ɣef wansi i d-yekka wansay-agi, ad naf gten turdiwin. Tamezwarut, teqqar-d d akken Lemɛinsal neɣ Lɛinsla d isem n tgeldunt i yefɣen i ubrid deg uḥric n tnefsit, syin kkren yimezdaɣ, jemɛen-d taffa tameqqrant n usaɣur akked yiqeccuḍen, rran-tt ɣer daxel u mekknen-as times. Yuɣal wabbu-nni d asigna, s kra n tejra i yennul, tefka-d lɣella dayen kan mi i tt-qernen ɣer tin ur iḥuzi ara wabbu-nni. Ihi, seg yimir, xeddmen Lemɛinsla. Turda tis snat, tenna-d d akken ansay-a, icudd ɣer yiwet n tgezzant neɣ taseḥḥar (Une sorcière) i yesɛan lǧehd meqqren. Ihi, mi temmut, bɣan yimezdaɣ ad sdummen lǧehd-agi-ines u ad t-ǧǧen am lḥerz. Ma turda tis tlata, tesɛa assaɣ srid akked umulli n tmettant n tgellidt Dihia. D asmekti n userɣi n yigran sɣur imnakcamen iɛraben n lweqt-nni. Seg yimir, ttgen yimaziɣen times d asmekti i umulli n tmenɣiwt n Dihia. Ula d acḥal n wassan i tesɛa Lemɛinsala, ur iban ara : kra qqaren-d, tetteṭṭaf kan yiwen wass ; wiyaḍ tettdummu smana kamel ; llan ɛad wid i d-yeqqaren , tettɣimi ɣef leḥsab n tallit. Akka yebɣu yili lḥal, aṭas i mazal xeddmen Lemɛinsa, ladɣa deg tmurt n Leqbayel, xas ulamma yemgarad wamek i ssaɣayen times d wayen ttgen ass-nni n Lemɛinsla. Deg taggara, llan wid i d-yessuddmen ula d amyag seg yisem-agi Lemɛinsla imi qqaren « Semɛinsel », neɣ iɛunsel, meḥsub yewweḍ d ameqqran yisegmi, iɛedda i uleqqem.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Tama n’At Ɛebbas yesduklen 3 n t’ɣiwanin: Iɣil Ɛli, At Ṛzin d Buǧlil, tenṭaṛ deg yideflawen akk d-yigeffuṛen nni iɛedan. Ibaṛdan ɣelqen, saxen, uṛ ṣliḥen aṛa i tenhaṛt. Llan kṛa uɣalen as t-iniḍ ttamalqa neɣ d-issafen. Aman tt-nejmaɛen am timedawin deg ibeṛdan. Ma nezmaṛ ad nebdaṛ kṛa n-ibeṛdan: Abṛid aɣelnaw wis 106, i gezmen snat n t’ɣiwanin: At Ṛẓin d Iɣil Ɛli. Abṛid-agi yettwaɣ ussan-a, acku aṭaṣ n yimukan anda id d-ɣlin yiẓṛa. Llan daɣen imukan saxen, ttuɣelqen ɣef tikli n ṭunubilat. Yella yiwen umedya anda iẓṛa ɣellin-d maḥsub yal ass ɣeṛ webrid : Tagi d ttadaṛt n El Qelɛa n’At Ɛebbas id d-yezgan s kṛa n 25 ikilumiṛen ɣef uqeṛṛu n t’ɣiwan Iɣil Ɛli. Maḥsub segmi id t-tekcem tagṛest abṛid-agi d netta d laɣliq fidṛa n-uɣelluy n yiẓṛa « iwaɣzniwen » ! Imezdaɣ n taddaṛt-agi am wid yettumeṭlen dṛen ɣeṛ daxel n taddaṛt nsen. Uṛ tt-efɣen, uṛ kečmen! Ɛemi Saɛid, d yiwen umḍebeṛ aqbuṛ deg useqamu aɣeṛfan n t’ɣiwant n Iɣil Ɛli geṛ 2007 d 2012, yeṛfan aṭaṣ ɣef yiṛ liḥala-agi.  » Yiwen lḥif ɣef leɣliq n webṛid…! Maḥsub kullas ɣellin-d yiẓṛa ɣeṛ webṛid-agi n El Qelɛa. Aqlaɣ n ttwaḥbes deg taddaṛt nneɣ. Awah a yillu aɣ bedlen azarig (Le tracé) n webṛid-agi s kṛa n-usenfaṛ amaynut! » akka i yessaṛam Ɛemmi Saɛid. Abṛid nniḍen yenṭaṛen daɣen d win n t’wilayt wis 42 yettɛeddin ɣef wakal n t’ɣiwant n Buǧlil. Abṛid-agi yettuɣal as t-iniḍ d-assif asma aṛ ay yekkat ugeffuṛ. Aluḍ d waman tt-nejmaɛen yeṛna ssaɛṛaqen tikli i ṭunubilat. Tigi bessif i teddun-t s t’jeṛṛayin nsen-t deg webṛid-agi yahṛuṛan. Iceqqeq akk ddin qessam-is sya wesya ! Acku takubanit it-ixedmen uṛ texdim aṛa tiṛegwa (caniγeaux) akken ad fɣen waman n yigeffuṛen. Wigi tt-efflen tt-feggiḍen deg webṛid.
