Aṭaṣ n widak yesɛan ikamyunen neɣ tunubilat tt-cetkin-d ɣef webṛid-agi yecban assif. « I wagi d-abṛid tura ? Ixumjan, iceqqiqen, aluḍ,…mači dayen ad nebdeṛ ! » akka i yeṛfa yiwen n bab ukamyun yessiwiḍen idɣaɣen yedzen (graγier). D-acu kan, fɣen-d kṛa n yissallen id yeqaṛen belli abṛid-agi n t’wilayt wis 42 ad yettwaxdem, maca kṛa n yikilumiṭṛen kan. Ahat 3 kan deg 15 n yikilumṭṛen, yaɛni anda yettwaɣ aṭaṣ!

  Aheggi  

 Sdaxel n lḥila , sdukel lfarina , tisent ( lmelḥ) udi, tamellalt . Rwi-ten akken yessefk rucc-iten s waman alamma yemlal , yuɣal d arekti , ɣumm-it , eǧǧ-it ad yers azal n 20’ Mi wwḍent 20’ , jbed arekti-nni s tesmeskurt ( rouleau à pâtissier ), gzem-it d tisfifin ( bandelettes ) n wazal n 7 cm ar 30cm , sakin ger-itent yiwet yiwet ɣer zzit yeḥman, berren-itent s tzarect ( fourchette) . Mi wwant, sureg-asent tament . 

  S tezmert-nnwen ( t) 

<p style="text-align: right;"> S ɣur Daya 

  
 Deg 10 deg meɣres 1980, yettwanecced-d Mouloud Mammeri ɣr tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu i wakken ad d-yexdem asarag ɣef udlis i d-yesuffeɣ Isefra iqburen n leqbayel. Deg ubrid-is ɣer tseddawit n Hesnaoua, ḥebsen-t yimsulta deg Draa Ben khedda, wwin-t ɣer lwilaya uggaden asarag-nni ad asen-id-yawi ccwal. Imi slan akk yiseddawiyin d leqbayel, kkren-d, beggnen-d lɣiḍ-nsen s tikli, d usuɣu ass n 16 deg yebrir 1980. Syin, kecmen yimsulta ɣer tseddawit n Tizi Uzzu, xedmen axessar deg yinelmaden, ɛadmen ula d tiqcicin, ayen i d-yeglan s 454 n yimejraḥ u yettwaṭṭef umur ameqqran. Akken cwit cwit, bdan Leqbayel ttfiqin dakken tutlayt-nsen, rran-tt udabu d tarbibt neɣ d taɛdawt-nsen : win i d-yennan ilaq ‘’tamaziɣt ad teṭṭef amkan-is’’ ad as-skerhen tudert, ama d anelmad, d acennay neɣ d aneɣmas. Acu kan, kemmlen Leqbayel amecwar-nsen. Yuɣal Mammeri yemmut, maca amennuɣ ikemmel armi d isegasen n 90 anida i d-icennu Lwennas Maɛtub ɣef tmaziɣt yettmeslay ɛinani yeḍfer abrid i d-yenğer Mouloud Mammeri ur yettaggad ula yiwen. Deg useggas aɣurbiz 1994/1995, yella-d unegzum ɣef leqraya. Yessuter Umussu adelsan amaziɣ i wakken «ad tekcem tmaziɣt s aɣerbaz neɣ ur ttruḥun ara warrac ɣur-s». Qqimen yinelmaden 8 n wagguren mebla leqraya, syin tekcem tmaziɣt deg uɣerbaz i tikkelt tamezwarut deg Lezzayer deg useggas 1995. Bdan-tt s 16 n lwilayat. Deg useggas Deg useggas 1998, mebɛed mi tezgel lmut Maɛtub Lwennas snat n tikkal, tewwi-t tis tlata sɣur yiwet n terbaɛt timselleḥt deg wass 25 deg yunyu 1998. Deg yebrir 2001, tella-d tin iwumi qqaren akka tura Tafsut taberkant. D taberkant imi mmuten deg-s ugar n 127 d ilemzi, jerḥen imeyyaten. 

  Z.A.Y 

  
 Četkayen inelmaden n master 1 di tseddawit n akli muḥend ulḥaǧ di tubiret seg ugur iten-yemmugren aseggas-a d win icudden ɣer tnezduɣt n tseddawit(la citè universite) imi tuget n yinelmaden n uswir-a uffand iman nsen ur sɛin ara azref akken ad sԑun tixxamin di tnezduɣt n tseddawit , abeԑda inelmaden izedɣen berra lwilaya n tubiret am tizi uzzu, bumerdas , bgayet ,msila dayen yeǧǧan inelamden-agi ar turra werԑad bdin leqraya alami id-uffan tifrat i uɣbel-a , ԑɛlaḥsab inelmaden wekden-d akken zedɣen di temnaḍin i yebeԑden azal n 30,40 yikilumiṭren ɣef tseddawit yerna ur zmiren ara ad as -ruḥun tisebḥiyin ad d-ttuɣalin tameddit ladɣa deg ussan n ccetwa am wid id-yezgan di tɣiwanin n seḥriǧ , at leqser , taqerbuzt , ṣur lɣuzlan , am wakken daɣen llan wid ara yeɣren ama d lxemsa n tmeddit ayaggi ur yettaf ara allalen n usiweḍ ɣer yixxamen nsen, ɣef wannect-a inelmaden ssuturen seg yimḍebren teԑna temsalt ad d-ggren iman nsen iwakken ad d-affen tifrat s lԑejlan akken ad bdun leqraya di tegnatin iwilmen mebla iɣublan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas Abdelhak 

  
 Ɣas ma seg useggas-a ad yili d aselway aqbur n tesqamut n yineẓẓurfa n tfaska n Udrar n Fad skud yefka taselwit i mass Zahir Meksem, maca isefra akk ɛeddan-d sɣur-s. Dɣa, ɣas ma yekkes-aɣ-tt wakud, yerra-yaɣ-d Ɛellawa Rabḥi, aselmad n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit n Bgayet, ɣef yisteqsiyen-a mi i d-nemlal deg uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Ayt Smaɛel.

 Ma tzemreḍ ad aγ-d-tefkeḍ tamuγli-inek γef tfaska n tmedyezt n useggas-a (2015) ?

 Tamuγli-inu deg tfaska n tmedyezt aseggas-a, d tamuγli n usefru, d tamuγli n usirem. D tafaska tis mraw-d-kraḍet, ur tunif i ubrid i d-tenjer seg tazwara. Am wakken i tuγ tanumi, tewwi-d yiwen n wahil d anesbaγur, yeččur yerna ila azal meqqren : amyezwer n tmedyezt, isaragen, tameγra n ccna i d-gan sin n yicennayen d imeγnasen imeqqranen : Malika Domrane akked Ouazib Mohand-Ameziane. Seg yimedyazen i d-yusan aseggas-a, aṭas d ilemẓiyen d tlemẓiyin, yerna simmal yettali uswir n usuefru : wid yewwin arrazen n tfaska (amezwaru, wis sin, wis kraḍ), d ilemẓiyen akk.  Γas akken abrid γezzif, yessawen, γas ggten wuguren, γas drusen wallalen, tizi-ya n tfaska teskan-d dakken simmal, simmal nettaẓ γer sdat, nger asurif d ameqqran deg ubrid-nneγ s iswi. 

 Tamuγli-inek γef tmedyezt ?

 Deg tfaska-ya, nniγ-d aṭas n yilemẓiyen d tlemẓiyin i d-yusan, yerna d ilemẓiyen i yewwin arrazen n tfaska. Anamek n waya, yettnerni usefru, yettimγur, teddem-it tsuta n tura, tesnerna-t, tger-as amaynut, ama deg wayen yerzan isental d tektiwin, ama deg taγult n talγa n usefru d tugniwin (tinγumnayin). Anamek n waya, deg tizi-ya, yennerna ugraw n yimedyazen, yennerna ugraw n wid yessebdaden tutlayt, tger tutlayt-nneγ asurif γer sdat.

  Yessesten-it: Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Taneggarut n tneggura, d tagi n Saint Valentin i iḥerrem usalafist Hamadache. La d-yeqqar d leḥram, d lεada yessufuγen i ubrid, meḥsub mačči s adrar i tettawi.Γur-sen, tayri d leḥram. Ur ilaq ara ad tḥemmleḍ, neγ meqqar ḥemmel s tuffra. Ala lkerh i d-yeddan deg ucwari-nni-nsen. yenna-as Slimane Azem :’’bγiγ ad xedmeγ lemziyya, fkiγ-as claḍa i uγyul’’. Efk-as tura tajeğğit i taγadt, wali ma d asriḥi ara tt-tesriḥ neγ d lmakla ara tt-tečč ? Ihi, ‘’azger yeεqel gma-s’’. Ussan-agi kan, Moussa Ismail i as-yennan ur ilaq ad heddren tamaziγt di lğameε. Yerna wagi d ccix zaεma. Meskin imi netta yessen kan yiwet n tmeslayt, iγil ula d Rebbi s taεrabt kan i yettmeslay. ‘’Muḥal ad fehmen, ur ssefhamen, d laẓ tilufḍa i d actil-nsen’’ i as-yenna Lwennas. Llan kra-nniḍen ufan-d akk ‘’lεilm anda yeffer’’. La ttεeddayen γer ttbaren, la asen-qqaren ur tennḍet ara crab daxel n lğernanat yuran s taεrabt axater yella wawal n Rebbi s daxel. Amek, ihi, ara as-yexdem win yeqqaren lğernan-agi n taεrabt ? Yeqqim-d kan ad t-yesserγ. Lğernan n taεrabt srid γer tmes, γer ğahennama. Telha tagi ! Neγ ma bγan ad qaddren leqran, ur t-id-ttarun ara deg yiγmisen. ‘’Wwin-d aγilif d yicwura n lkif,

 Γer tmurt n lejdud gren-d asurif, Σebblen-d ad beddlen leεyud n udrar n nnif.’’ Ikemmel Lwennas deg wawal-is. Akken yebγu yili lḥal, Saint Valentin igerrzen i wid iḥemmlen. Xas yella yiwen n umeddakel (Brahim) yekreh Saint Valentin imi ass-nni swaswa i t-teğğa temeddakelt-is tuγal γer wayeḍ. Smaḥ, smaḥ kan ay ameddakel.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Tikwal, nneqma tettawi-d ayen yelhan. Tikwal, nnmara tettṛuẓu ifadden i wayen yellan( neɣ yettban) d awezɣi. Tikwal nnif yettleqqim afriwen i lebɣi. Akka dɣa i d-tella deg iseggasen-nni n tmanyin n lqern yezrin imi kra n wagguren kan deffir tedyanin n ibrir 1980, ddaw leɛnaya n Mass Salem Chaker, zdin kra n yinelmaden n tesdawit n Tizi Wezzu akked d kra n yimusnawen refden acqirew : asnulfu n yiwet n tesɣunt ara yilin d lemri n umennuɣ ɣef yidles amaziɣ akked tutlayt-is. Asnulfu ara yilin d dduḥ n wayen umi qqaren imiren “ amussu adelsan amaziɣ( MCB)”. Akka i d-tlul tesɣunt “ Tafsut “ ɣef tecfa tsuta-nni ileḥḥun akken tufa mačči akken tebɣa. Tasuta-nni i d-nejren abrid i usekcem n tutlayt-nneɣ ɣer uɣerbaz. Iḥettmen s wammud n yiseflan( sacrifices) akked leɛtab ɣef udabu amesbaṭli yeṭṭfen zzman n leḥkem si 62 ɣer ass-a akken ad tuɣal tmaziɣt di tazwara d “tutlayt taɣelnawt” n tmurt uqbel ad tensex di tamendawt n tmurt , ɣer taggara agi, d tutlayt tunṣibt. Tasuta yeṛẓan isula ɣer tira n wungalen akked tulissin , ɣer tira timeɣnest, ɣer usebded n umezgun akked sinima s taqbaylit armi, ass-a tasekla akked tẓuri taqbaylit tufa abrid-is ɣer yimal, imi deg iseggasen-agi ineggura mačči d izli n tmezgunin , n isura akked yedlisen i d-yettnulfun s tutlayt-nneɣ. Ulamma s lketra n tidi akked idammen ( mačči d yiwen umeɣnas n yidles amaziɣ( aqbayli) i kecmen leḥbus, mačči d izli i yemmuten – abeɛda di tafsut taberkant- , mačči d izli i yenfan si tmurt ) ayen akken i d-yettbanen di tazwara n iseggasen n 70 d targit ( d asxurref ɣer icenga n tjaddit) yuɣal ass-a d tilawt zdat wallen-nneɣ , ttnallen-t ifassen ( «Ayen akken id yeǧǧa da Lmulud / deg igenni iban am rrɛud/ wissen ma tḥulfam I timiqqwa.» , i d-yenna Matoub Lounes). Mebla ccekk tasɣunt Tafsut tella d tazwart( ma yella ma mačči d llsas) akken ad tefsu tsekla teqbaylit , as id iban yimal akked iswiyen wuɣur ara tesfillit. Necfa amek nettraǧu s ccuq yal uṭṭun ara d yeffɣen akken a nemmeɣ deg isebṭaren-is yeččuren d tussna, d ameyez akked d usmendeg ɣer tikli dima ɣer zdat( ay iṭij ḥader a teɣliḍ/ la nleḥḥu madam telliḍ/ nuggad ad aɣ id yelḥeq yiḍ/ iḍul s anga ara nṛuḥ . Is yeqqar Lounis Ait Menguellet deg tallit-nni). Tasɣunt n tafsut id tteffeɣen s wudem uffir( ddaw ufus) tezdi ulawen n imeɣṛiyen –is ɣer imenɣi ɣef lasel, ɣer imenɣi ɣef nnif. Isebṭaren ttarun, deg-s, imussnawen imeqranen ( ama wid n tmurt am Salem Chaker, Ferhat Mhenni, Mouloud Mammeri,; Said Sadi, Hend Sadi, …neɣ wid n Libya, n Lmaruk, n Tunes.. ) d wid lqayen , i zeggin takka ɣef ayen ɣebban lesnin. D- idṛisen yerran tafat i wallen iffuden( niqal) awali( awali n tidet yefren). Yal taɣuṛi-nsen tettawi d askaksi gar inelmaden ɣef acuɣeṛ d wamek ddan timsal. Yal asebter i tekkes amendil rran icenga n lasel ɣef yidles amaziɣ s umata. Mačči kan d anect-a imi tasɣunt n tafsut tekcem diɣen aḥric n unadi deg annar n tanilest ( lingusitique) imi aṭas n w uṭṭunen id yeffɣen s ddemma i wayen-nni. Amedya uṭṭun n umawal n tusnakt( lexique des mathématiques ) neɣ amawal n tasegda( architecture). Tasɣunt n tafsut talla diɣ d tannagit ɣef iɣeblan iḥuzan imeɣnasen yellan deffir talalit n usqamu n izerfan n w umdan( ligue des droits de l’homme) yettwasnen s yisem « azerruy n Lemdiya » ( proces de media). Di tilawt tasɣunt n tafsut ( id yellan d aseɣzef n tanfult n tezrawin timaziɣin n tesdawit n Paris Vincent ) d aktay( mémoire) n umussu adelsan amaziɣ iɛabben acḥal d aseggas tanegmit n yidles amaziɣ. Tasɣunt n tafsut d aɣerbaz n umeɣnes akked usnulfu , d asurif ɣer yiseɣ, ɣer timlillit d yiman-nneɣ. Ɣef aya isekf i teẓrigin yeṣɛan teqbaylit d iswi ad alsen-t asiẓreg ( éditer) n uṭṭunen n tasɣunt n tafsut id yeffɣen i merra. Ilaq asufeɣ n wuṭṭun-agi akka tura amer tasuta tamirant ad tedlu ɣef uḥric ameqqran n umezruy-nneɣ atrar , amezruy ara sen-yilin d rkiza akken ad qazmen imal , acku xas nenwa yella kra , taluft ( tidet kan) Mazal tefri acku kra d kra kan werǧin yella d wakali.

<p style="text-align: right;"> A.S Hamid  

  
 Ddurt-a, lemdeɣ sin n wawalen ijdiden : “ineslem», “lǧameɛ” . D dadda Lḥusin i wumi sliɣ yettmeslay d baba ɣef waya. Ih, yerza-d ar ɣur-neɣ seg Tala Amara. “L’ancien», akka s-yessawal baba i dda Lhusin. Nek j’ai pensé sin yismawen i yesɛa. 

 – Akka i nessawal i wid yeddren ussan-nni, i d iyi-d-yenna baba

 -Anwi ussan ? 

 – Ad tuɣleḍ ad tezreḍ !

 Akka dima i d iyi-d-yettara baba, mara s-d-banen isteqsiyen-iw kumblikin.

 Lḥasun, dda Lḥusin yettmeslay ɣef lǧameɛ n yimaziɣen. Imaziɣen zriɣ d acu-ten, ma d lǧameɛ ur t-sineɣ ara. 

 alors, steqsaɣ dda Lḥsin :

 – D acu i d lǧameɛ a dda Lḥusin ?

 – D axxam i deg tẓalan 

 – Anwi wigi ?

 – Inselmen.

 – D acu-ten wigi ?

 -Euh… wigi d imdanen yettamnen s Sidi Rebbi akked d nnbi.

 – Am yaya ?

 – Akka am yaya-k !

 – Mais, yaya ur tettruḥ ara s axxam-agi akekn ad teẓal.

 – Tetẓala deg uxxam-is, kif kif

 – I lǧameɛ-agi acimi teqqareḍ n yimaziɣen? 

 -Axaṭar, yemxallaf ɣef win n waɛraben 

 – Safik unselmen ɛraben mmxalafen ɣef inselmen imaziɣen !!

 -Euh… 

 – I nek a dda Lḥudin d ineslem neɣ ala ?

 – D’abord keč d amaziɣ. 

 – Wagi zriɣ-t ! 

 – Ma d ineslem ? Mazal waqila ur iban ara

 -Lḥasun, ur tẓlaɣ ara, ur fhimeɣ ara tamsalt-agi n Nnbi d Sidi Rebbi i ɣef tezga tehedder yaya. Donc akka tura, nekk mačči d ineslem. Maɛna asmi ara nernin les neurones-inu zemreɣ ad t-uɣaleɣ, yerna ma yehwa-iyi ?

 -Yezmer lḥal !

 – ihi, nek d amaziɣ mebla lɣerḍ-iw, d ineslem ma yehwai ?

 – Très bien ! Akka presque i t-id-yenna dadda-k Lwennas 

 -Anwa-t wagi?

 -Ad tuɣaleḍ ad t-tisineḍ

<p style="text-align: right;"> SOA 

  <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="c8bce6a7bda4aca9a5a9ba88b1a9a0a7a7e6aeba" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a> 

  
 Ayen i aɣ-yesferḥen imi yella waya deg wahil n uswir-nneɣ (3AM) : asegzi n wansayen d urmud. I lmend n yennayer 2967, nerza, nekni s yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas Atmaten Imeɣrasen Kerkache akked tselmadt-nneɣ, s axxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu, anda i nufa ahil d amerkanti i d-heggan i lmend n yixef n useggas n yimaziɣen. Akken kan i newweḍ ɣer daxel, nufa timsekniyin n waṭas n wallalen d yirmad i xeddmen deg temnaḍt n leqbayel. Ayen i aɣ-yesferḥen imi yella waya deg wahil n uswir-nneɣ (3AM) : asegzi n wansayen d urmud. Nebḍa d igrawen, syin yal yiwen yefren asenfar ara yexdem ɣef waya. Nqerreb ɣer wid igan timsekniyin-agi, nemmeslay yid-sen u nexdem-d teswirat i tgelliwin i nessewway di yennayer, am seksu bu-sebɛa n yisufar, tiɣrifin, tamtunt n uferraḥ, timellalin, tuftiyin, lexfaf…atg. Nqerreb, daɣen, ɣer uẓeṭṭa, lfeṭṭa, tiqnedyar n leqbayel, talext, ɣer wid, diɣ, ixeddmen iqerdacen. Mi nekfa axeddim-nneɣ daxel, neffeɣ-d s amraḥ, nufa-d, din, iḍebbalen n leqbayel, n Ɣerdaya, n Xennecla, n Mɛesker akked wid n Ǧelfa. Imdanen akk mɛacaren gar-asen. Ferḥen, ceḍḥen, tilawin, seɣratent, timɣarin, sfuɣurent. Nkemmel akken zhu d cḍeḥ almi d lawan n wučči. Nečča seksu bu-sebɛa n yisufar s uyaziḍ. Lbenna-s, werǧin i tt-neẓra imi i t-nečča d agraw. Tameddit, nruḥ ɣer tzeqqa tameqqrant, nwala anaẓur-nneɣ ameqqran Taleb Tahar. Ass-a, nesɛedda lweqt igerrez, nefreḥ aṭas, newwi-d aṭas n tmussniwin, yerna nekkes-d lxiq. Ass-a, ur nezmir ara ad t-nettu. I lmend n wass-a, nessaram aseggas ameggaz i yinelmaden n uɣerbaz-nneɣ d wid akk i ixeddmen deg-s ɣef uqerru-nsen, Mass Bounoua. Aseggas ameggaz i yimaziɣen anda ma llan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Inelmaden n uɣerbaz Atmaten imeɣrasen Kerkache.  

  
 Ulamma yettwabdar-d uṭaksi s waṭas deg temdinin, ass-a deg wussan yesɛa azal-is ula deg tudrin. D acu, gar uṭaksi i yettwajerrden ɣer unabaḍ akked win yeffren, yella waṭas n umgarad. Amezwaru-nni yettwassen, ixeddem s wayen i as-d-ixeddem usaḍuf; ama d akuden n lxedma, axelles n tewsiyin, neɣ ladɣa ssumat n usiweḍ seg umkan ɣer wayeḍ. « Iṭaksiyen ibanen, ttafen-ten medden seg tama n tedrimt abeɛda. Imi akken ma llan deg teɣsar anda ḥebbsen, ɣas ini xeddmen yiwet n ssuma n usiweḍ. Ssuma-a, ur tezmir ad tɛeddi tilas skud tella tɛessast fell-asen». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n urgaz i ijerrben tuṭṭfa n uṭaksi. Aya d ayen yerzan iṭaksiyen yettwajerrden, i nezmer ad neɛqel s yini-nsen awraɣ neɣ s teplakt-nsen n ufella ideg yura « Taxi ». Maca, kra n wugur yettas-d seg yiṭaksiyen ur nettwaberreḥ; mi ara d-yaɣ yiwen takerrust, ad yili d aṭaksi uffir, ad yuɣal ixeddem deg ssuma i as-yehwan war ma yeẓra unabaḍ. « Iṭaksiyen uffiren, sxedmen tawaɣit deg lǧib n uɣerman. 10 n yikilumitren, zemren ad ssutren 400 n yidinaren. Meḥsub xeddmen ssumat akken bɣan nutni, d wamek ufan tagnit n umsaɣ-nsen ». D awal n yiwet n teqcict i d-yeffɣen taggara-a seg tesdawit. Iban-d ihi seg uwellih amezwaru wugur sɣur wat iṭaksiyen-a uffiren, ladɣa imi ar tura ulac fell-asen lḥers. Ulamma ɣef wawal n kra n madden, ufan ɣur-sen daɣen ula d tifrat. Aya, imi i ten-ttafen anda d melmi bɣan i usiweḍ. Tugart ma yella taluft tezreb. Rnu-as amkan n usiweḍ ur d-yettḥettim uṭaksi uffir. Ɣef tmuɣli-nsen, ɣas ma yessalay taqettunt n uxelles, yessawaḍ melmi tebɣiḍ, ɣer wadeg i tferneḍ kečč.

  M. K. 

  
 Annar n tẓuri n teqbaylit, am netta am wid nniḍen, ijerred ismawen n wid iqedcen deg-s s wul-nsen, wid yerẓan asalu ɣer tezlitt d uẓawan lak d wudmawen-nniḍen n weḥric-agi. Ger inaẓuren-agi nezmer ad d-nebder, kra ger watas i yettwassnen s leqdic-nsen, s tebɣest s wayes id d-ekren ad d-inin ayen ttḥulfun deg tmetti ur nelli ara d tin yettaken tamuɣli igerzen i tẓuri sumata, ladɣa ma seg yimi n tmettut. Hnifa yerẓan asalu ɣer tezlitt s wayes id d-enna ayen tettḥulfu, ayen tt-iqerḥen d wayen yak tettwali deg tmetti, ayen wiyyiḍ zemren kan ad t-id-inin s tsusmi nettat tennat-id s usefru, s leǧher akken yak imdanen as-slen, akken daɣen ad ẓren ayen umu tesber tmettut taqbaylit. Deffir-es ḍefren-t-ett-id tlawin-nniḍen am Zohra yugin tazaglutt n tmetti. Taneggarut-agi, ula d nettat, xas akken tudert ur s-tefki ara atas n lweqt akken ad d-efk ak ayen umu tezmer, tessaweḍ ad d-eǧ yiwen n ugerruj s wazal-is. Zohra tekker-ed deg yiwet n twacult taqbaylit deg useggas 1962  di taddart Agemmun yettabaɛen Larbɛa Nat Yiraten. Am nettat am tlawin yak n leqbayel n tallit-is, Zohra telqeḍ azemmur, texdem iqwiren, tezḍa icettiḍen d ibernyas. Uqbel ad teddu d tislit, kullec itedduy-as akken teddun waman. Iɣeblan bdan-as-d deg mi tezweǧ tikkelt tamezwarut, akken mazal-itt d tacawrart. Zwaǧ -is ur idumm ara atas. Tebra-d terna tewwi-d yides yiwet n teqrurt. Tezweǧ tikkelt tis snat. Maca ula d abrid-a ur terkid ara atas. Tufa-d iman-is tikkelt-nniḍen deg uxxam-nsen s teqrurt tis snat. Deg useggas n 1982, Zohra tessufeɣ-ed tasfift-is tamenzut. Tenna-d deg-s ayen tettidir tmettut, ayen umu tsebber d wayen s yettruzen ifadden. Tasfift d tin yelḥan atas. Ger izwal n tezlatin tecna, tid s ways tettwassen, ad d-nebder: “Zerɛeɣ ur mgireɣ ara», “Targmeḍ -iyi melba sebba», “As-ed», “Yefna-k sber ay ul-iw», “A taleb aru-iyi lḥerz», “Eyya-d ad k-eẓreɣ»,” Ayen ak urǧaɣ ifut», “A lward yefsan», “A yemma ad beddeɣ ɣer taq»,…D izwal d yettaken tikti ɣef wayen tettedir tmettut taqbaylit: asirem, ddel, sber,…Seg 1986, Zofra terza ɣer Fransa anda tcennu ar almi d asmi temmut di yennayer 1995 ɣef laɛmer n 32 iseggasen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Fatiha.K 

  
 Am wakken i yettuɛeggen, ass n larebɛa yezrin, yeldi Uxxam n yidles Ali Zaɛmum n temdint n Tubiret tiwwura-s i yiwet n temlilit i d-yesdukklen lwali amaynut n Tubiret Mustapha Limani akked Mouloud Cherifi yuγalen d lwali n Wehran anda i d-ddukklen akk yimḍebbren n twilayt s yiḥricen-is i merra, iɛeggalen n tγamsa d yimdanen-nniden. D aselway n Usqamu aγerfan n twilayt Brahim Sadali i yeldin rreḥba n umeslay s yiwet n cchada i d-yefka γef M. Cherifi d wayen akk yexdem di twilayt deg tesɛa n wagguren aya, mi d-yenna : « Ass-a d lwağef fell-aneγ akken ma nella ad d-nebder ayen i yexdem Mass Cherifi. Segmi i d-yusa γer Tubiret, yessenhez kra n uḥric yellan yegdel, yefka tamezzuγt i yimdanen di yal mi ara yeffeγ s annar. Tura, iwulem ad as-nessirem amecwar igerrzen deg Wehran, ad nessuter kan deg-s ur igezzem ara aẓar i aγ-yezdin. » Dγa deg lawan i d-yettmezlay yimḍebber-a, tebded-as teγbelt almi yegguma ad d-yessali awal. Syin, d Cherifi iwumi yettunefk wawal i wakken ad ireḥḥeb s lwali amaynut uqbel ad d-yessuter smaḥ deg yimezdaγ n Tubiret mi d-yenna : « Ala win ur nxeddem ara, ur nγelleḍ ara. Seg tama-w, ad d-ssutreγ i yimezdaγ n Tubiret ad iyi-semḥen ma yella kra yecceḍ yiles-iw γer yiwen deg-sen. Xedmeγ ayen iwumi zemre&amp;gamma,; ɛerdeγ i wakken ad ssedduγ lecγal n unegmu, ass-a ttekleγ ayen i mazal ad as-ikemmel Mustapha Limani». Uqbel ad tekfu temlilit-a, fernen yimḍebbren n Tubiret, ad sselsen abernus n sser i Mass Cherifi ara s-yilin am wakken i d-nnan « d talaba n sser ara s-yilin deg lmendad. » Tella-d daγ tukci n ubernus-nniden i Mas Mustapha Limani. Uqbel ad yeffeγ seg uxxam n yidles, Mass Cherifi ttunefken-as warrazen sγur waṭas n tnemhal d tukkliwin. Seg tama-s, lwali amaynut yemmeslay-d akka i yiɛeggalen n tγamsa anda i d-yenna : « Usiγ-d γer Tubiret i wakken ad kemmleγ deg umecwar i d-yuγ Mass Cherifi, ur γeffleγ ara deg wayen iyi-ttrajun, d acu kan, ttrajuγ lemɛawna n yal tama i wakken ad as-nefk i Tubiret udem i tt-iwulmen. »

  M. Smail 

  
 Tettseḍ neɣ tesmeɛẓgeḍ, ur tebɣiḍ ara ad d-qessreḍ yid-i. Ssneɣ-k ! mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut ! akka i teggiḍ d acu i yuɣen «la mémoire»-inek.

 -Ulac, sussmeɣ ur d tt-wajebeɣ ara, acku ẓriɣ ur tettamnen ara ma nniɣ-as, steqsa-ɣ-d amejjay ɣef «la mémoire»-inu.

 -Aṭṭan-ik mačči d «la mémoire», aṭṭan-ik d «l’égoïsme». Susem ma tebɣiḍ ! ula d nekk ur bɣiɣ ara ad ssleɣ i ssut-ik.

 -Teffer aqadum-is s tfersadit, terna tezzi-d aɛrur-is. Terfa acku nettat tebɣa ad nexdem «le shopping» nekk bɣiɣ ad d-ẓẓreɣ amejjay, acku ixemjan-agi sɛiɣ deg wallaɣ-iw, xdemen-iyi-d aṭas n wuguren, tt-xemmimeɣ aṭas yerna tqelliqeɣ, asrirem yebda yettaǧǧa-yi waḥd-i. Uɣaleɣ tettuɣ akk ayen ilaqen ad cfuɣ fell-as. Senṭerren-iyi yimdanen mi ara d ḥekkun tiqsiḍin n zman aqdim. Ceffun ula ɣef «les détailles» imecṭaḥ. Ma d nekk, tettuɣ ula d isem n tmeṭṭut-iw. Tiswiɛin ticeki ur terfi ara testeqsay-iyi-d teqqar-iyi-d :

 -Amek isem n tmeṭṭut-ik ?

 -Nekk imir-nni ad uɣaleɣ d azeggaɣ, tt-ḥireɣ d acu ara d iniɣ, i wakken ad iyi-d-ɛiwen, teqqar-iyi-d isekkilen yiwen, yiwen. Maca ur zmireɣ ara a ten-id-ssdakleɣ akken ad d-iniɣ isem-is, ad as-tiniḍ yekka-d si tɣerma ur nessin ara isemi-is. Ar tagara tameṭṭut-iw ad terfu, ad iyi-tini :

 -Aɛni warǧin tekcimeḍ s aɣerbaz ! aɛni agemmay-inek ur yesɛi ara isekkilen s-wayess yettwaru yisem-iw ? neɣ ahat isem-iw ur yesɛi ara azal deg wul-ik akked wallaɣ-ik !

 -Tudert-iw tuɣal d taberkant, nekk ur ceffuɣ ara, tameṭṭut-iw tenwa ur tt-ḥemmleɣ ara. Nniɣ-as : 

 «Kemm d tarwiḥt-iw, d tudert-iw maca ur iyi-tumin ara.»

 -ttnadim amek ara tt-qennɛeɣ akken ad iyi-tamen. Nettat tesɛa lḥeqq nekk daɣen sɛiɣ lḥeqq, mačči s lebɣi-w ma yella ur ceffuɣ ara, neɣ ma yella ttuɣ isem-is. Wamma, zik-nni asmi lliɣ d ilemẓi isem-is yettazal deg yiles-iw am usefru, tayri-nneɣ teǧǧuǧug trennu, am yemɣi n tefsut. Ass-a nezga d amenuɣ am uzal am yiḍ, ah ! a wi d-yerran iḍelli, ad yesfeḍ imeṭṭi n wass-a.

 I wakken ad mmektiɣ isem-is, sɛeddayeɣ-d ismawen n tlawin deg wallaɣ-iw wa deffir wa, Zwina, Crifa, Ṭawesn Feṭṭa…. Maca isem-is yezga ireggel fell-i am tili. Cfiɣ asmi d tedda d tislit, di lɛemer-is ɛecrin n yiseggasen. Nekk ssawaleɣ-as s yisem-is, nettat kifkif, tessawal-iyi-d s yissem-iw. Tayri-neɣ ur tesɛi cekk, tuɣ tafat n wussan-nneɣ. Ass-a axxam n tayri-nneɣ yegrurej, amzun aken ur asen-hegga ara lsas. Yiwen wawal d amecṭuḥ ur as-cfiɣ ara, ula d isem n tmeṭṭut-iw ttuɣ-t. Tatut texdem tawaɣit di tayi-nneɣ am arẓaẓ ikecmen taɣrast, neɣ am uccen ikecmen tagrurt n wulli.

 -Tiswiɛin tt-xemmimeɣ, qqareɣ-as : «acimi ur ttruḥeɣ ad ḍelbeɣ «le diorce» maca d acu ara as-iniɣ i «le juge» ? argaz-iw yettu isem-iw, imdanen ad ttaḍsa fell-i, ma d «le juge» ad iyi-d-yini tagi mačči d sebba n beṭṭu-nwen. Ruḥ uɣal s axxam-im, ḥmed Rebbi tesɛid argaz. Aṭas n tlawin ur ufint ara ula d rruḥa-s. irgazensɛan uguren d imeqranen, yerna sebbren, ssusmen !

 Nniɣ-as yiwwas : «kemmini d ul-iw, ɣur-m i tcudd tarwiḥt-iw»

 Terra-yi-d, tenna-yi-d : «lukan nekk d tarwiḥt-ik, ur tettuḍ ara isem-iw xas ma tunageḍ, anda ma tebɣuḍ truḥeḍ. Ur d yeqqim ara wacu ara k-id-yessmektin isem-iw. Zzin-iw iruḥ ččant wuguren, temẓi-w truḥ ɣedren-tt iseggase, lwert yugit baba, yenna-d tilawin ur ttawint acemma. 

 -Yiwwas di tergit ttnadiɣ isem-is ur tufiɣ, qellbeɣ deg yigenni, qellbeɣ di lebḥer akked tniri, ulac. Steqseɣ itran akked iselman, ijdi akked waman… Tagara ferḥeɣ ufiɣ-d isem n tinn aɛzizen. Ttaḍsa-ɣ waḥd-i di tergit, sawaleɣ s yisem n Ǧamila, Ǧamila… Ziɣ d isem n tayri-w tamezut id mmekta-ɣ. Tessaki-yi-d tmeṭṭut-iw, ssliɣ-as tenna-yi-d :

 -«d acu n Ǧamila-agi id mmektaḍ akka s taḍsa ? tagi ha-t-an tugid ad tt-ttuḍ isem-is !

 Tullist ne Abed el-hamid BENHEDOUGA. 

 Yerra-tt-id ar teqbaylit Boussad HAMMAR 

  
 Ad yeldi ubrid ameqqran ara icudden gar lwilaya n Bgayet ɣer ubrid ameqqran si tama n uḥnif di lwilaya n tubiret I yeqqnen gar usammer d umalu n tmurt n lezzayer, ɣef teɣzi n 1o5 KM. Aḥric amenzu deg usenfar-agi, yekfa. Azal 41 km di lecɣalat, wwḍen ɣer taggara di tama n umalu n lwilaya (seg Uqbu almma d aḥnif). Drus maḍi i d-yeqqimen, mazal kan azerreb d usufeɣ n waman n yiɣezran. Deg wawal i d-yefka unemhal n usenfar-agi Mass Afir ddurt yezrin ɣef lemwaji n radyu summam, yenna-d : ‘’aḥric yeṭṭfen gar Tḥaracet di tama n Uqbu almma d Aḥnif, ad yeldi di taggara n furar, ma yella liḥala n tegnewt ur teqlib ara, ur d–txelleq ara laɛdil i tkubaniyin n cinwa deg umahil-nsent. Ma d aḥric wis-sin, iɣzer ameqqran almma d tamdint n Bgayet, mazal ttkemmilen lecɣalat deg-s. Ahat alamma d aseggas 2018 ara kemlen”.Tulya n uḥric–agi, ad yeqqim d asirem ameqqran n yimezdaɣ n lwilaya n Bgayet, acku ad yessixfen taɛkemt ama ɣef yiminigen neɣ ɣef yimenharen i ileḥḥun deg ubrid-agi yal ass, am wakken ara yessishel asiweḍ n d usufeɣ n sselɛa gar luzinat n temnaḍt n Tḥarract tama n Uqbu akked lwilayat-nniḍen n tmurt. Anect-a, d ayen ara yefken afud i yemɛalmen d yimawlan n larzaq I wakken ad snernin deg usefti di temnaḍt n Summam d tdamsa n lwilaya n Bgayet s umata. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> B.Benhamouche  

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Iḍelli i tebda tfaska taɣelnawt tis tlata n unelmad di tesdawit n Bgayet. Tafaska-agi ara yilin d asmekti i wass aɣelnaw n unelmad 19 mayu 1956 d tedyanin n 19 mayu 1981, i tt-id-yessudsen d Aqusis ussnan n yinelmaden n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n Bgayet s lemɛawna akked tɣiwant n Bgayet . Wid i d-yeswejden tafaska-ya, xedmen-d yiwen n wahil d amerkanti ara yeqqimen i teɣzi n 04 n wussan (seg 17 ar 20 mayu), anda ara mmagen waṭas n warmuden idelsanen, ussananen d waddal ama deg wammas n tesdawit Ubudaw neɣ deg tmezduɣin tisdawanin yecban 17 tuber d Bercic 1. Taṣebḥit n wass-a, ad yemmag di ludiṭuryum n Ubudaw wass n tezrawin ɣef tmaziɣt d usexdem-is di ttawilat atraren n tiknulujiya iɣef ara d-yili i lmendad pṛufisur Kamel Bouamara. Deg urmud-a, ad d-ilin waṭas n yisaragen ara d-yawin ɣef yisental icudden ɣer tmaziɣt di tsenselkimt d lantirnat. Seg wid ara d-yefken isaragen, ad d-nebder : Nacer Mehdi d Mohand ou Ramtane Ighit i sin yid-sen d iselmaden deg ugezdu n tmaziɣt n Bgayet. Yella daɣen usarag ara d-yefk, Paul Anderson, netta d yiwen n umnadi agnizi i ixedmen aṭas n yinadiyen ɣef tmaziɣt di tsenselkimt. Ma d tameddit n wass-a, ttiɛad ad yili di tmezduɣt tasdawant 17 tuber, anda ara d-tili temlilit n ddabex n ufus ger tnelmadin, ad d-tili daɣen temzizzelt n umezgun anda ara d-yili umyezwer ger snat n tceqqufin i yettwafernen. Deg wass n ttlata 19 mayu, ad d-tili yiwet n tmeɣra ɣef lweḥda n tmeddit di Abudaw, ma deg yiḍ, leqdic ad yemmag di tmezduɣt tasdawant Bercic 1 anda ara tkemmel temzizzelt n umezgun, yerna ad d-tili temlilit n ddabex n uḍar ger yinelmaden.  Deg wass aneggaru, leṛebɛa 20 mayu, ttiɛad ad yili deg uxxam n umezgun n temdint n Bgayet anda ara ttunefken warazen i wid d tid i d-yufraren di temzizliyin. Rnu daɣen, ad d-tili temzizzelt n tira n tullist d tɣuri n tmedyazt. Akken ad d-nesmekti, aqusis Tumast d netta i d-yessudsen meṛṛa tifaskiwin yezrin n tmeɣra n unelmad di tesdawit n Bgayet. Aya yessebgan-d leḥrara d takayt i yellan ɣer yinelmaden iɛemṛen aqusis-a d yinelmaden n tmaziɣt s umata i d-yufrarin ɣef wiyaḍ ilmend n leqdic-a yesɛan azal. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>      

<p style="text-align: right;">  Mokrane Chikhi<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

  
 Taɣiwant n Yifiya d taɣiwant tamezwarut di lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu i yebdan s wudem unṣib asuffeɣ n nnekwat d (Les passeports), s ttawilat atraren (Biométrique) deg aggur n furar yezrin. Tamesbanit-agi tella-d s leḥdur n yemḍebren n dayra n Yiɛeẓẓugen d tɣiwant n Yifiɣa, anda i sbedden akk tawilat i wulmen i usuffeɣ n nnekwat d les passeports s shala, imi iswi n usenfar-agi d aseqreb n tebdelt ɣer yimezdaɣ. Asuffeɣ n nnekwat, zwaren deg yinelmaden ara yesɛeddin akayad n lbak.

 Imezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Yifiɣa farḥen aṭas s usenfar-agi i yesɛan azal meqqren, imi ad-yessenqes taɛkkemt fell-asen, d usuffeɣ n lekwaɣeḍ s shala u di tegnatin igarzen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Sendiḍelli 20 deg maggu 2017, deg taddart n Yimalusen yellan deg tɣiwant n Tmizar i yettabaɛen ɣer ladayra n Wagennun, xedmen tameɣra n uyefki. D tazrigt tis xemsa ideg ttekkan ddeqs n yifellaḥen d yimsikniyen n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu akked lwilayat-nniḍen. D leqdic adelsan i d-heggan waṭas n yimsuddsen gar-asen: Tasqamut n taddart-agi n Yimalusen, Asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Timizar d win n Tizi Uzzu, Asqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Tanmehla n yidles n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, Taxxamt n tẓuri d tin tfellaḥt n temdint-agi dima. S tallalt n waṭas n yimɛiwnen. Tazrigt-agi tis semmuset, gan-tt d tajmilt i yiwen n ufellaḥ meqqren deg taddart-agi, wagi d Mass Belhadji Tahar. i yellan yettwasen s urebbi n lmal ameqqran u s uyefki n tfunast d wayen i d-ittekken seg-s. Ma d ahil i yettwaxdamen ɣef teɣzi n wass-nni n sem iɛeddan, tasebḥit n wass ɣef 9h00 n ssbaḥ, yella-d usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef yismawen n 26 n yimeɣrasen yellan deg usebdad n taddart-agi, yesɛan azal deg tegrawla tazzayrit u deg umezruy n tmurt n Leqbayel. Ma ɣef 9h30, tella-d tulya tunsibt, d uɛeddi ɣef yimḍiqen n yimsikniyen. Syin ɣef 10h00, yella-d umeslay sɣur yimsuden-agi n leqdic-agi. Akken azgen n ssaɛa, yella-d yiwen n usarag s uzwel “Filière lait”, sɣur uselway n Tiddukkla n yifellaḥen n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, syin ɣer-s d lwaɛda i d-yellan deg uɣerbaz amezwaru n taddart-agi. Ma deg tmeddit n wass, yella-d ɣef 14h00 usenɛet n tceqquft n umezgun sɣur Tiddukkla tadelsant “Itran” n taddart-agi dima, tella-d diɣ tmeɣra tameẓyant, ma ɣef 14h30, tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n uttekki d usebɣes i yimsikniyen i d-yerzan s waṭas ɣer tlemmast n taddart-agi n Yimalusen. Am wakken, llan yimsikniyen i ixedmen timsikent n uyefki d wayen icudden ɣur-s, llant diɣen temsikniyin-nniḍen. Ma ɣer taggara akk, tella-d tukci n warrazen i wid i d-irebḥen deg Tombola, i xedmen dɣa ass-nni tasebḥit.

  Ghani Amazgh 

  
 Amenzu n yennayer 2016, d ass umezruy n tmurt n Lezzayer d tmurt leqbayel, imi nnig n 02 imelyunen n yemdanen id-yussan si temnaḍin yemgaraden n tmurt n Lzzayer( Batna, Xencella, wahran, Σennaba, Tamenraset…atg) d tmura n lbarani Lmaruk, Fransa, Tunes, rzan-d s waṭas γer taddert n At-Ḥmed di Σin Lḥemmam lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu akken ad-cebbḥen tamdelt n ugrawliw Ḥussin n At-Ḥmed. Imdanen yellan di tesirt n ccix, amḍiq ideg teḍlaq tfekka n ugrewliw Si Lḥussin fuden tilelli n wawal, fuden tagrewla, tṣuγun, cennun icewiqen yezzuzunen ul, icewiqen id-yettaken tabγest i umennuγ γef tugdut n tmurt, d tijmilin i si lḥussin γef ubrid id-yenjar. Talwit d tin id-yaγlin s waṭas ama di taddert n At-Ḥmed akked ibardan merra yessekcamen γer-s, imi yuγ lḥal γef teγzi n ddurt-aya yella d aheggi, anda iγallen laman d usellek ṭuqten s ljahd. Ddesqs n wudmawen n tsartit d tẓuri i yellan deg ttiεad n temḍelt n si Lḥussin, ger-asen aselway amenzu n tmurt mass Σebdelmalek sellal iwmi ugin yemdanen xarṣum ilmeẓyen ad d-yekcem, dγa dayen i t-idegren ad-yuγal. Maca udmawen niḍen ḥedren merra, am uneγlaf n ddin Muḥamed Σissa, Mulud Ḥemruc, Karim Ṭabu, Σli ben flis , Nasser Buḍyaf, Lewnis At Mengellat, Σli belḥağ, Mqari, ğab ellah d wiyaḍ. Maca wid icebḥen tamḍelt n si Lḥussin d izmawen n wedrar, d ilmeẓyen leqbayel, irgazen tilawin bden s tebγest akken ad-snarnin di ccan n baba-tsen, gmat-sen, amdakkel-nsen Ḥussin At-ḥmed id-yewwin amennuγ γef teγzi n 70 iseggasen. Mbaεd taẓallit n lğumuεa, tella-d tẓallit γef lmarḥum Ḥussin At-Ḥmed di tessirt n ccix, syen wwint γer taddert-is At-Ḥmed i ibaεden azal n 2 ikilumetren. Akken yeweḍ γer lemqam n Ccix Muḥend Ulḥussin, amḍiq ideg ara yettwemḍel Si lḥussin γer uẓekka n yemma-s, lγaci naγlen-d am uweṭṭuf, bγan merra ad-nnalen nεac, bγan merra ad-wallin tamdelt n si Lḥussin s lqarb i tikkelt tanegarut, bessif it-id-sarsen iγallen usellek di ṭumubil id-yewwin tafeka. Azal n yiwet n tsaεet d amdeggar d wamek iṣawḍen meḍlent, s uṣuγu n yelmeẓyen d taγratin n tlawin.Syen tawacult n Si Lḥussin d tesqamut n taddert At-Ḥmed rran tajmilt i kra n wid id-yussan ama s lqarb ama s lbaεd cebḥen tamḍelt n Dda Lḥussin ara d-yeqqimen d asmekti i tsutiwin id-iteddun. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 “Adlis-agi amenzu n Kra n tsura i tɣuri n tsekla yerza timsal n tɣuri taseklant. Deg-s tlata n tneqqiḍin. Tamezwarut : d awal ɣef tsekla d tmuɣliwin fell-as. Tis snat teɛna leṣnaf d yimenzayen n tɣuri n tsekla. Ma d tis tlata, tewwi-d ɣef kra n tɣuriwin di tsekla tamaziɣt (tamedyazt d wungal). Ad –yaf daɣen yiwen, di taggara n udlis, kra n yidlisen iseklanen yuran s teqbaylit.”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Seg usebtar aneggaru 

  Amaru: 

 Muḥend Akli Salḥi d aselmad n tsekla deg ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt di tesdawit Mlulud Mɛemri(Tizi-Uzzu), d aɛeggal deg usnidi deg usuken d uselmed n tutlayt tamaziɣt (tasdawit n Tizi-Uzzu). Yura-d yakan 03 n yidlisen : Poésies traditionnelles féminines de Kabylie, types et textes (Enag, Alger 2011), Etudes de littérature Kabyle(Enag, Alger 2011), Asezawal ameẓẓyan n tsekla (l’Odyssée, Tizi- Uzzu 2012) 

  
 Igemmaḍ n ukayad n usegmi alemmas yettwassnen s yisem n BEM, i useggas-agi aɣurbiz n 2016-2017, iberḥ-d yis-sen Ddiwan aɣelnaw n yikayaden d temsizzliyin ass-nni n ahad ɣef 11h00 n uzal. Azal n 566 221 n yinelmaden i isɛeddan akayad-agi deg 2234 n wulmisen n yikayaden, i d-yellan seg 04 alamma d 6 seg waggur n yunyu iɛeddan, leḥsab n wid i t-id-yewwin yewweḍ 56,33% deg 48 n lwilayat n tmurt. Yuli ugemmuḍ-agi s wazal n 1, 93% ɣef ukayad-nni n yilindi, imi deg useggas iɛeddan yelḥaq azal n 54,42%, ma d aseggas-agi, yewweḍ azal n 56,33 %. Ad d-nesmekti kan, belli inelmaden-agi i yesɛan tazmilt n 10/20 neɣ ugar ad ruḥen deg wussan-agi ad jerden iman-nsen deg useggas amezwaru deg tesnawit. Imi tuɣ yakkan xtaren d acu ara ɣren, llan deg-sen wid ara yeɣren tasekla wiyaḍ d tussna.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Rraḥba n tmurt teččur d imaɣban ur nesɛi adeg di tmurt-nsen neɣ dren arif arif d imnufaq deg ayla-nsen, remḍan ifuk maca ulawen qqimen akken win mellulen mellul ma d ubrik d awezɣi ad ibedel imi ur telli tamart neɣ d aqendur mellulen i seqraben amdan d yillu-ines maca d lefɛayel tigawt mačči d awal neɣ d asbarbar deg ilem yenna rebbi yenna nnbi-s melmi teḍliḍ ar tid-is ak d-iban cciṭan d meskin , anesbaɣur d igellil dren di yiwet n tmurt n lɛizza d lkarama n si Lɛaziz maca addad-nsen yemgarad am igenni d lqaƐa, anesbaɣur n Lezzayer tajḍiṭ d win yesbabbayen taẓayt ẓẓayen imi tiẓeṭ-ines mara iwali igellil icarwitt marriɣet. am akken lbenna n tudert-is ma yarked wid tettu tmeddurt , imi tugna deg-i llan yella yakk wayen yettmenni wul xxusen ala waklan dɣa ɣlin-d fell-aɣ s dɣala-nsen , tura zemren ad amnen tidet d igelliden i llan am wid-ak-nni n tmucuha d ṣlaṭen d wawal. Ma d amaɣbun mazal yettqabal tameddurt s lḥif d wurrif, arraw-is llaqen-asen iselsa , taccuyt tuḥwaǧ ciṭuh n weksum xas yiwen wass deg useggas ,tiwelliyin ilaq fell-as a ten-iɣafar yal yiwet s uḍellaɛ-is maca tajarnaṭ-nni yif ulac id d-iṭalayen yal tagara n waggur ur tt-id-yettaf yimalas amezwaru imi yegguni-tt bu tidelt d waman d trisiti arnu-as lgaz d ṭlaba n tḥanut taddart yeggulen ur iɛawed ad d-yezenz war tadrimt yaḥka-taqṣiṭ-iw akk i medden d akken deg udem-iw tfuk laḥya kraḍ wagguren aɣrum d uyefki ur xelleṣeɣ ara ttafaɣ-d ssebba d akken ur kcimen ara yedrimen neɣ ixeddamen lbanka mazal-iten en greve. Win yesɛan lwacul meqren d waṭas imectaḥ amek ara s-tiniḍ lɛid tamarbuḥt wa k-id-yar s uzmumeg n tmara tabarbuḥt lɛid-ik ula i keč agma, maca ul-is yezza yarɣa s wurfan imi tajarnaṭ n uxeddam aḥarfi tajarnaṭ yettaṭafen kan tudert deg ixef i wakken a texnunseḍ wa d yarwu fell-ak zman taḍṣa, ur tzahhuḍ ur tettidireḍ tameddurt n wemdan ahat telha kan ɣef allen n medden a seqqaren d axeddam a tiɛin rebbi ma tilawt susem kan. tuget n wegdud yeddar s nnif xas ur yesɛi ur yessin acekti, dɣa adabu amesbaṭli yufa iman-is yečča anezruf s yejdi-s yarna ayen yellan ilaḥḥun fell-as , yečča-aɣ s ibeddi yeswa idamen-nneɣ , ččan iḍelli arnan ass-a wa ad arnun azekka imi amaɣbun yedda kan deg ubrid-is ur d-yewwi ara s lexbar d akken llan wiyiḍ am netta neɣ ugar-is, wid yeččan ayla-nsen dduklen ma d wid ččan gullen ur d-mlalen imi d beṭṭu-nsen i yeǧǧan lḥif ifaɣ-aɣ-d ɛaryan di tmurt n lbitrul d lgaz n twaɣit.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Dahmani Bilal 

  
 Am yal aseggas di lawan-agi n taggara n ḥertadem, tiddukkla n yilemẓyen n Sidi Lmufeq, teswjad-d zerda n Si Lmufeq i d-yezgan deg At Mlikec tama n Tezmalt. di yiwet n zerda deg d-rezzun yimdanen seg waṭas n temnaḍin n tmurt n Leqbayel.

 Sidi Lmufeqd, d yiwen n lwali saleh. d mmi-s n Lxeyyar mmi-s n Mḥend mmi-s n Behlul Uɛaṣem wis sin mmi-s n Behlul Uɛaṣem amezwaru. mmi-s n Ɛaṣem i d-yusan seg Terga tazeggaɣt deg Lmeṛṛuk deg lqern wis 9 n Lhiǧra ( gar lqern wis 15 d wis 16 ). Asmi yemmed Sidi Lmufeq d ilemẓi, iruḥ yezdeɣ deg Lemǧaz, ddaw n Tɣalaḍt deg tɣiwant n At Mlikec. Yeqqim d acu yeqqim, yezweǧ yesɛa dderya. Yiwen wass, wissen amek, yemqellaε d yiwen urgaz qqaren-as Welğudi. Dγa yenfa (neγ nfan-t ?), iruh yeffer deg teẓgi tama n Lemṣella, deg Yiγil Leqrar amkan iwumi qqaren Lğamaε Lεinṣer. Qqaren-d yewwet tikklet s tɛekkazt-is, neffgen-d waman dinna. Dɣa yebna lǧamaɛ dinna, seg wasmi i t-walan kra n yiṣeggaden, suffɣen-d lexbar deg lɛerc n At Mlikec. Seg wassen yuɣal yesɣaray dinna, yettak ddaɛwa n lxir. Asmi iwala yeɛmer lɛerc, ijmeɛ-d akk lɛeqqal n udewwar, msefhamen amek ara ddsen tilufa-nnsen. Gar tlufa-agi, tella tinna i wumi qqaren Taɛellaqt i mazal ar ass-a n wussan. Taɛellaqt-a, d curuṭ n zzwaǧ; deg-s anagar sebɛa n leḥwayeǧ ara yawi yesli i teslit. Taɛmamt neɣ taseggirt, deg-s 25 duṛu gar At Mlikec kan ( seg wasif Aɛebbas s wadda, alamma d tilist gar At Mlikec d Yigawawen s ufella, seg Teɣza ( tilist gar Bgayet d Tubiret) seg utaram, alamma d tilsit gar Uqbu d Tezmalt seg usammar. D tigi i d tilisa n lɛerc n At Mlikec. Wid izedɣen akk dinna, neɣ win i d-yusan d ajdid, ɛeddan fell-as tlata wussan, yettusemma d Amlikec, ilaq-as ad iqader taɛellaqt-agi. Ma d win ur tt-nquder ara, ad yawi daɛwessu, akka i dɛan lɛeqqal deg tallit-nni. Tura, aɣbel yellan d akken ur yeshil ara ad yaf umdan ṣṣerf n 25 duru, ulac rebɛa duru d duru”. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> B Benhamouche. 

 

  Aɣbalu:  Le livre Mohand Said Amlikech (1812-1877) poète et résistant

  
 Tikkelt-a, nerza ɣer udrar, ɣer udrar n Ǧerǧer s timmad-is. Tirza-nneɣ ɣer Temda Ugelmim deg tlemmast n Ǧerǧer, d tamda n waman. ‘’Nesɛa tiɣilt neɣ snat’’ deg tmurt n leqbayel, meɛna ‘’idurar d tidet cebḥen, s uqerruy-iw ar cebḥen’’ akken i as-yenna winna.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Takerḍa n Temda Ugelmim 

    Tamda Ugelmim, tezga-d deg udrar n Ǧerǧer ɣef 1700 n limtrat ɣef lebḥar. Akal-is yetabaɛ taɣiwant n Ait Bouaddou, ɣer tama n ugafa. Ɣer tama n usamar, ad naf At Regane, ɣer umalu, llan At Bougherdane ma ɣef unẓul d lwilaya n Tuburet. Tamda Ugelmim, ɣur-s azal n 3 n igeṭṭaren deg tjuma-s. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Isem Agelmim akked At Buwaddu. 

 Ɣef yisem-agi Agelmim, llan snat n turdiwin : yiwet teqqar-d d akken awal-a, lmaɛna-s d tamda. Aya s tmaziɣt n Maruk. Ma ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Dda Mohamed Achour, Agelmim d leḥcic i d-yettemɣin deg umekkan-nni. Leḥcic-a, ḥemmelen-t aṭas lmal. Mi t-ksan u yuɣal d amecṭuḥ, yettak cbi ɣer uglim mi ara t-tennaleḍ. Ma d awal At Buwaddu, yettunefk-asen imi At tama-agi, ttkabaren aṭas wid i yettruḥun ɣer din. Aya, nwala-t nekni s timmad-nneɣ ɣer yimezdaɣ n tudrin. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tirza ɣer Temda Ugelmim Seg Tizi ɣer Wat Rgan 

  Nefka ttiɛad ɣer tmanya n ṣbeḥ ɣer Wat Wasif. Nebɣa ad as-d-nekk i Temda Ugelmim s tama n usamar i wakken ad d-nuɣal s tama-nniḍen. Dinna, diɣ, i nufa imnar (guides) ara aɣ-yawin ɣer umekkan-agi. Llan 3 yifurguten akked ṭunubil tamecṭuḥt : yiwen ufurgu, yusa-d seg Wat Yanni, wayen seg Tirmitin d Tizi Uzzu, ma d aneggaru, yekka-d seg Tala Athmane. Sin yifurguten-agi ineggura, ddan-d deg-sen yiɛeggalen n tiddukla yettḥaraben ɣef ugama (AJIE) n Tizi Uzzu. Nebda tikli metwal At Toudert. Abrid dayen kan, igerrez. Ass d ass n tefsut, teǧǧuǧeg tmurt. Ddaw ubrid, nnig ubrid, ččuren d imɣan akked tjur, ad as-tiniḍ d imjerǧen n JSK s tizzegzewt n leḥcic d uwraɣ n uzzu. Xas ulamma yenneḍ u yessawen ubrid, meɛna ur aɣ-d-yecqi kra deg-s imi iswi-nneɣ iban : awi-d kan ad naweḍ, ‘’leɛtab ur yettuneḥsab’’. Ihi, awal yettawi-d wayeḍ armi newweḍ ɣer At Rgane. Din ara bdun lecɣal n tidet, syin i nebda tikli mebɛed mi aɣ-weṣṣan yimnar ɣef kra tɣawsiwin-n : ilaq ad nelḥu d agraw, ur nettemfaraq ara gar-aneɣ ; ur ilaq ara ad nḍegger iḍumman ɣer lqaɛa ; deg taggara, weṣṣen-aɣ i wakken ad netbeɛ iwellihen ara aɣ-d-ttakken yal tikkelt. Abrid ɣezzif mačči d izli, laqen-as yiḍerran iǧehden akked tezmert iwulmen. Yerna nekni gar-aneɣ kra n tlawin yufayen akked sin yigerdan. Amur ameqqran deg-neɣ tikkelt tamezwarut ara yexdem tirza am tagi (la randonnée). Ha-tt-an a baba tyita !!! 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Seg Wat Rgan ɣer Tiwwura n udra. 

 Nebda tikli seg Wat Rgan ɣef tesɛa d uzgen (9h30). Akken kan nḍegger asurif amezwaru, bdan wid yesteqqsayen imnar-nni ɣef umecwar. Aql-aɣ deg wadda n udrar, llant tjur mačči am udrar i nettwali sdat-neɣ. Abrid yessawen, s imal yettiwɛir imi skud nettali, skud yessa d iẓra, yettenɣas wakal. Xas akken yezzi, yenneḍ ubrid, meɛna mazal tazmert tettarra-d tiɣri imi d tazwara n umecwar. Nezmer ad d-nini, deg uzgen-agi n ssaɛa tamezwarut, ulac anwa i d-icetkan s kra n wugur. Acu ɣef wakken i nettwali amek i teddun temsalt, ḥḍer-itt-id kan ad ak-inin. ‘’Leɛtab ur t-id-nettader’’ i aɣ-nnan yimezwura. Ihi, neṭṭef deg umedya-agi, nkemmel deg talin n udrar. Xas akka yebda-d ciṭ n ɛeyyu, meɛna ntettu-t mi ara nettwali cbaḥa n udrar : cbaḥa n talɣiwin n yiẓra-s, tizeggzewt n lqaɛa deg kra n tamawin, cbaḥa n lmal ikessen mebla ameksa, xas akken yella, imi ur yelli kra ara ḍurren. Ulin-d seg tudrin yimeksa-a s lmal-nsen. ‘’Segmi ara d-nessufeɣ lmal-nneɣ deg unebdu, ur yettuɣal ara alamma d ḥertadem. Nkess s nnuba’’. Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen umeksa i d-nufa, s tqabact, deg ubrid-nneɣ. Nuli azal n ssaɛa, syin newweḍ ɣer yiwet n tiɣit iwumi qqaren ‘’Tiwwura n udrar’’. Taqaɛet yellan din qqaren-as ‘’Tamestaɛfut’’ tuli ɣef lebḥar s wazal 1500n lmitrat. D awal-is i d lefɛayel-is. ‘’At uxxam, bɣan aksum, Rebbi yefka-d lewziɛa’’. Nestaɛfa kra kan n ddqayeq, syin nkemmel abrid. Sdat-neɣ, la nettwali tiɣilt-nniḍen, yerna tewɛer ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan yimnar-nni. Ula d Lounis yeqqar-as ;’’tiɣilt i yekfan fell-aɣ, ad aɣ-d-tban mazal tayeḍ’’. Dagi, ɣur-neɣ lxetyar : yella ubrid ɣezzifen yerna yenneḍ acu kan ur yessawen ara mliḥ, yella wayeḍ ad taliḍ adrar srid meɛna yessawen dayen kan, mačči d izli. Ihi, wid yettxemmimen, ẓran anwa abrid i asen-ilaqen, ma d ibujaden, xelṣen-tt din din. Dɣa, nekk ddiɣ deg yibujaden imi ‘’ḥman idammen i tikli, xas akken ifadden-nneɣ ɛyan’’. Abrid ɣer udrar d icerfan, yessa s uẓru ameqqran d umeẓzyan. Yettbanaɣ-d qrib ad naweḍ s igenni, de toute façon. D aḥric i aɣ-iweɛren kter i wiyaḍ, ladɣa i wid ixussen ciṭ akka deg tezmert. Yal aqeddim s nnehta. Mkul kra n lmitrat, llan wid yesteɛfuyen ama ddqiqa ama snat. Llan wid yewwin tiɛekkazin neɣ iqeccuḍen, tekkayen fell-asen, ttqerriɛent ɣef umili, ɣef ɣelli. Dɣa, d ɣelli-agi i nugad imi ttecgen yiḍerranen mi ara trekkḍeḍ iẓra-nni imecṭaḥ, neɣ anda llan waman. Ar tura, ur yelli kra yellan. Dayen tekfa tiɣilt-agi ‘’tamcumt’’. Xas ulamma mazal tayeḍ sdat-nneɣ, meɛna teshel ma nwala ɣer wansi i d-nekka. Nkemmel-itt s tin tirrugza yerna nnan-aɣ d taneggarut, syin tettban-d Temda Ugelmim. Newweḍ ɣer tqacuct-is, aql-aɣ 1900 n lmitrat ɣef lebḥar. Nerra-d nnehta, ur neẓri ma n lferḥ neɣ n ɛeyyu. Sya, abrid ɣer Temda Ugelmim d lewḍa neɣ ciṭ ukessar, dayen-nni i nettraǧu seg ṣṣbeḥ. Abrid ɣur-s ɣezzif ciṭ, meɛna nettwali-tt.Awi-d kan ad naweḍ ɣer din, nettu teqreḥ n usebbaḍ, neɣ n tfekka s umata. Ur nfaq amek i nessers iman-nneɣ ɣef leḥcic-nni aluggaɣ (Agelmim). D nufa n lmakla. ‘’Yeṭṭef-as yinejjel acḍaḍ-is, yufa-d ssebba i yiɣimi.’’ Newweḍ ɣef zzuǧ d rebɛin ddqayeq (14h 30mn). Armi nečča, nerwa i nwala d acu iḍerrun dinna, armi d imir i nfaq s cbaḥa n twizet i yekseb Udrar n Ǧerǧer : Tamda Ugelmim d agerruj n tmurt n leqbayel. Xas ulamma ulac abrid s ṭṭunubil ɣur-s, meɛna aṭas n yimdanen i yettruḥun ɣer din. Nufa ayen din n lɣaci : inelmaden n tesdawit, tiddukliwin tidelsanin, tiwaculin n yal tama. Llan yigerdan imɣaren, tilawin irgazen, lḥasun d Canada neɣ La d Suisse neɣ awer awḍent tmura-a. Lmal ikess, arrac turraren ddabex neɣ agiṭar, wiyaḍ ceṭṭḥen. Llan ula d wid yessucufen i tasmuḍi. Ruḥ tura kečč fhem-itt. Xas ulamma iṭij d aḥlawan, meɛna yessuɣalay aglim d azeggaɣ, aṭas i d-yebrunzan mebla lebḥar. Dagi, agama yugar amdan, teqqim twennaḍt akken tella. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Abrid n tuɣalin. 

 Neqqim deg Temda Ugelmim azal n ssaɛa kan. D abrid n tuɣalin s tama-nniḍen. Tikkelt-a nebɣa ad –d-nɛeddi s Wat Bouadou. Abrid yessekser (d akessar) yerna ur ɣezzif ara am win i d-newwi mi d-nusa. Acu kan aṭas diɣ i yekukran akessar, ladɣa, tilawin. ‘’Tura iswi newweḍ-it, yeqqim kan ubrid n tuɣalin’’ i ttsebbiren yimnar wid-nni iwumi ɛyan yifadden akked tfexsa deg yiḍarren. Newwi-d abrid yiwet, yiwet, dac, dac. Nedda-d deg ssira n win yettwaɣen gar-aneɣ. Ula d abrid-a, yessa d iẓra imecṭaḥ akked yimeqqranen. Deg ukessar-a i yeshel ɣelli. Aṭas, dɣa, i yeɣlin, cwi kan ulac tiwaɣiyin. Newwi-d amecwar nukni d iɣezran n waman, d icercuren, nedda-d yid-sen, yiwen ubrid i necrek. Deg tlemmast n ubrid, nufa-d tala i wumi qqaren ‘’Tala n Sidi Amar’’, aman-is d isemmaḍen deg unebdu, d iḥmayen deg cetwa. Akka i aɣ-d-yenna Dda Mohamed Achour i d-yennan, diɣ, ‘’mi ara d-twaliḍ ɣer tala-agi deg yiḍ, ad ak-d-banent tcemmuɛin tizegzawin.’’ Nfures tagnit, yeḥka-aɣ-d yiwet n tedyant ɣef Temda Ugelmim, ha-tt-an ‘’Zik, ttasen-d Wat Meddur n Wat Yeɛla n tama-agi n Tuburet. Ttasen-d ɣer tama-agi, tteksen sser ɣef yimezdaɣ. Syin, kkren yimezdaɣ-agi, udin-asen-tt : ffren-asen deffir n yiẓra, ceyɛen kra i wakken ad ten-awḍen, syin ad ten-tebɛen ɣef Temda Ugelmim. Mi d-wwḍen ɣer din, ffɣen-asen-d yimezdaɣ-agi, snegren-ten.’’ Ula d yelli-s n yelli-s n Dda Mohamed, Dihya n Ath Bouaddou i yellan d tanelmadt deg tesnawit n Tizi N Tlata , tewwi-aɣ-d awal ɣef yimɣan yessajjayen, akka i aɣ-d-tekkes imɣan-a u temmeslayaɣ-d fell-asen : imɣi isergel, yelha i win ihelken sker (le diabète), gerninuc, yelha i lehlak n yidammen (l’anémie), mmseludi, yettdawi lǧerḥ. Nessaram-as i Dihya amecwar igerrzen deg ubrid-agi n tujjya, ladɣa imi teqqar deg tneɣrit n tussna (scientifique). Akka, armi i d-newweḍ ɣer ddaw udrar, anda i nufa la aɣ-ttraǧun yifurguten acḥal-aya. Nekfa tirza-nneɣ ɣef sebɛa. D abrid ɣer uxxam. Xas ulamma nekkaw seg tirza-a, meɛna nefka ttiɛad i tayeḍ ɣer Temda Taberkant deg tama-agi n Udekkar. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.Moula 

  
 Taddart n At Ouabane d yiwet n taddart i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Uqbil tama n AEH. Mazal ṭṭfen ymezdaɣ-is deg wansayen n leqbayel d leɛwayed n lejdud-nsen. Gar wansayen-agi, ihi, ad naf Tiririt n terga. Wagi d yiwet n lɛada ixeddmen seg zzman aqbur, imi taddart-agi tettidiren s yimɣan d yizegza i tezzun, am yifelfel awaban, heblemluk d waṭas-nniden. Dɣa, yal aggurur n maggu, ttarran-d targa iwumi xeddmen tameɣra tameqqrant. Ttasen-d ad hedren seg yal tama n tmurt n Lezzayer. Mi ara d-rren targa i deg-i ttazzalen waman, yal yiwen ad yisew tibhirt-is s nnuba mebla ccwal, s tumert d nnecraha, acku hemmlen ad xedmen tibhirin i d-irennun ccbaha i udrar n Ǧerǧer. Ass n sem 20 deg maggu, rran-d targa s tmeɣra tameqqrant. Ferhen nnecrahen. Usan-d seg yal tama, ad walin ccbaha n ugama n temnaḍt-agi yeččuren d tafulki. Imezdagh n At Waban, $hemmlen idles-nseb, tafellaḥt, xeddmen timsikent n wayen akk i tezzun d tgella i sewwayent teqbayliyin n temnadt i yesɛan 3483 n yimezdagh. Tettwassen s tmecreḍt, diɣ, i ixeddmen yal aseggas. Mebla ma nettu tezdeg n taddart-agi u ddukkle am yiwet n twacult . Mi yewwed yiwen 18 n yiseggasen, ad yekcem gar wid yesseḥbibiren gɣef yidles d leɛwayed i d-ǧǧan lejdud.

  Z. B. Y. 

  
 Ass n larebɛa yezrin, sdis n yimezdaγ n tγiwant n Beclul, usan-d γer uxxam n Tnezzayt i wakken ad d-beggnen lγid-nsen imi ur ten-id-saḥen ara yixxamen yettwaferqen deg ssenf n LPA.

 I wakken ad ssiwden tiγri-nsen n lγid i tγiwant, imdanen-a, beggnen-d reffu-nsen s tγimit i laẓ rrif n uxxam-a n ddayra anda i d-usan γur-sen ddeqs n yimdanen. Mi nerza γur-sen, nufan-ten-in deg umkan i wakken ad aγ-d-inin : « Ayen i aγ-yessawḍen γer liḥala yecban ta, d ɛeggu seg tazliwin seg tnedbalt γer tayeḍ. » Dγa d Allawa.B, win meqqren gar-asen deg leɛmer i d-yennan : « Ssutreγ axxam am nekk am wiyiḍ deg useggas n 1990. Asmi idul uqnaq, ɛawdeγ asuter deg ssenf n LPA deg useggas n 2013. Tura akka, ffγeγ-tent yakk, ur wwiγ s lemɛawna n ddula, ur wwiγ s yidrimen-iw. D aya iyi-yessawḍen ad qqimeγ i laẓ, i yiṭij, ahat tiγri-w ad taweḍ γer wid i terza taluft». I wakken ad d-nawi isallen seg yal tama, nessaweḍ ad nemmeslay d yimḍebber n ddayra n Beclul i aγ-d-yennan : « Ttwabnan 50 n yixxamen deg ssenf n LPA dagi deg tγiwant, anda i d-yella usuter sγur 174 n yimezdaγ. Tasqamut n ddayra tefren 50 seg wid yuklalen ad ilin seg yimezwura. Uqbel ad d-yaweḍ ttiɛad n ufraq-nsen, yennulfa-d d akken 10 ur ilaq ara ad ilin imi yettwabeggen-d belli sfaydan yakan deg yiḥricen –nniḍen. Dγa, 40 ttwaferqen, qqimen-d 10 i yellan akka tura deg ubrid n unadi n liḥala n wid ara d-yalin seg 124 n yimdanen i d-yeqqimen ». Ɣef wayen yerzan awal yuzzlen, d akken 10 n yixxamen-a, yuγ lḥal ttunefken i yimdanen ur nelli ara d arraw n tγiwant. Mass Ait Ali yenna-d : « Ad ssutreγ seg wigi i d-yeqqaren belli ttwaferqen yixxamen-a deg tuffra, ad iyi-d-awin ismawen n wid i d-saḥen. Ad d-iniγ s wudem unṣib belli ixxamen-a, ur ten-yewwi ula d yiwen akka tura, yerna wid ara d-saḥen, d wid isersen ikaramen-nsen deg 2013 yellan deg lejrida». Tameddit n wass n lexmis, imdanen-a yeqqimen i laẓ, kecmen γer yixxamen-nsen.

  M. S. 

  
  Ttlata, 21 deg yunyu  La d-tettban ciṭ n talwit ɣef wugur-nni n waman seg tama n Yilelten. Ma deg Tigzirt, serḥen i waman ad lḥun: aɛummu deg yiḍ deg wass ɣas ulamma rrif-nni kan, deg Wat Wagennun, taswiɛt ur tessefraḥ ara ma numen aselway n tɣiwant Mass Chabane. 

  Larebɛa, 22 deg yunyu  Deg uẓɣal-agi, la d-qqaren ala Tamda Ouguelmim i d leslak : d lǧennet deg tlemmast n tmurt n leqbayel, tettak abriḥ i turin i d-nnan wid-nni i iruḥen ɣer din. Yal wa d abrid-is, kra n yimezdaɣ n Tubiret, rzan ɣer la Daira, bedden din. Ma d imyurar n MOB, ugin akk ad mmbiwlen, ugin ad sleɣmen, maḍi : tadrimt trebba aqacuc . Aldija, tacennayt taqbaylit, terza-d ɣer uxxam n La Dépêche de Kabylie n Tizi Ouzou. ‘’Tismin n tnuḍin, yenɣan argaz ur yuḍin.’’

  Lexmis, 23 deg yunyu  Deg unebdu, tettuɣal tmurt n leqbayel d la salle des fêtes : ha-t-an,ihi, tmeɣra n lfeṭṭa deg Wat Yanni, taggara n yulyu. Ula d times, texdem tameɣra deg ssuqq-nni 2000 n Bgayet, tesreɣ-it akken ma yella. Ula d ayefki tesreɣ-it ssuma-s : 30 idinaren kan. Cwi kan deg Amizour dewren-tt ɣer umeslay ɣef uselmed n tmaziɣt, unfen i lmakla.

  Ssebt, 25 deg yunyu  yuɣal-d Lwennas, uɣalent-d tid-nni : uletma-s akked tmeṭṭut-is. Yal ta, teṣseḍlam tayeḍ. Ma d l’enquête-nni, anda tuffeg i ters, wissen kan mi akka i d-yerna ɣer unnar Nordine Ait Hamouda., ma ad d-yili kra n ujdid. D BAC, ad d-yili ɣef wakken i d-nnan. 

  Lḥedd, 26 deg yunyu  D tijmilin i Matoub deg yal tama n tmurt, ‘’Si Tqubɛin ɣer Wat Ziki, idles-nneɣ d anagi…’’. Ihi, Si Tala Bounane ɣer Boudjima, tikkelt-a din i as-yerra Zedek tajmilt : yal wa s kra iwumi yezmer…Ma deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt, ihegga-d uselway n tɣiwant n Lezzayer talemmast, yiwen imensi anect-ila-t. Kra ttnadin ɣef win yeččan, ad t-wwten, wigi, ttwalin win yelluẓen i wakken ad t-seččen… 

  
 Smana iɛeddan i d-smektan yimezdaɣ n Wat Yiraten agrawliɣ ameqqran Abane Ramdane. D yiwen i isebblen ṛuḥ-is ɣef tmurt n Lezzayer .

 D netta i d-ixelqen agraw n Ṣsumam ass n 20 deg ɣuct 1956. Agraw –agi, iswi-nsen ad siwḍen ad yili udabu aserti : yal yiwen d acu ara yeṭṭef d wacu ara iseddu. Ama deg tsertit, tujjya, isalen, asefrek d waṭas n yiḥricen icudden ɣer tmetti tazzayrit sumata mgal acengu afransis. Ilaq ad ilint seddis (6) n lwilayat , yal tawilayt ad tebḍu ɣef ukkuz (4) n tamiwin , yal tama s ukkuz n yiḥricen. Sɛan tin iwumi qqaren lkatiba (bataillon) d 120 iserdasen (hommes armés). Yebɣa ad iseggem yakk iḥricen s wudem aserti . Ttekin deg ugraw–agi 34 n wudmawen gar-asen sin yigrawen yal agraw yella deg-s 17 iwudam. Ad d-nebder, gar-asen krim Belkacen, Amar Ouamrane, Si Mhamed Bouguerra, Yousef Zighoud , Lekhdar Bentoubal , Slimane Dehiles, Azeddine (commandant), Si Lekhder, Ali Khoudjaa, Ali Mellah, Amar Ait Chikh, yemmut uqbel s tẓa wussan (9 wussan), Mustapha Ben Boulaid, yemmut daɣen uqbel s semmus n wayyuren ( 5 wagguren) . Agraw n Ṣsumam, xedmen-t deg taddart n Iɣban d Ifri , tura d taɣiwant n Uzellagen. Akken bdant temsal ttseggiment, yebda Abane Ramdane, yettaweḍ ɣer yiswi-s, maca ziɣ llan wid yusmen deg-s imi d bu tebɣest , yeḥrec, yesuffeɣ ṛṛay. Qecmen-t yiɛdawen n tudert deg useggas n 1957 deg tmurt n Lmarruk , ad t-yerḥam Rebbi. Ɣef waya ur nezmir ara ad d-nemmeslay ɣef ugraw n Ṣsumam mebla ma nebder-d Abane Ramdane, win ur t-nessin ara , ilul ass n 10 deg yunyu aseggas 1920 deg Yiɛezuzen , taɣiwant n Larbɛa n At Yiratenn Tizi Uzzu. D yiwen ikufḥen s wallaɣ , s tiḥerci, s tayri n tmurt abeɛda iḥemmel tamurt n Leqbayel am akken i d-yenna deg wawal-is ‘’Nekkni d yiwet n ccetla ur telli di ccerq ur telli deg lɣerb, d Imaziɣen d ccetla qlilen, imi ayen qlilen yettiɛziz.’’ihi, Abane, ur yeḥbis ara amennuɣ ɣef tmurt almi i t-seggden iseggaden n tafat, ayen i d-nnan fell-as drus. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 Ilmend n tmeγra n tεacurt, deqs n tmesbaniyin id-yellan di 04 n tγemmar n wakal n lwilaya n Tiziwezzu. 

 Dγa imezdaγ n taddert n Mensuṛa taγiwant n At-Zikki, llan di ttiεad, imi id-sudsen yiwet n tmecreṭ meqqren u s wazal-isass n 03 unbir 2014, ayagi yella-d s leḥdur n yimezdaγ n taddert n Mensura d tudrin niḍen , imḍebren n tγiwanin yemgaraden am At-zikki d Wizgan, d inebgawen niḍen id-yussan sya u sya.

 Timecreṭ-agi yiwen n wansay ger wansayen leqbayel swayes ẓeṭṭen tagmatt d tddukli ger-asen. Γas εeddan acḥal n yiseggasen, imezdaγ n taddert n mensuṛa, mazal ṭṭfen deg laεwayed, imi heggan-d tamesbanit icuban timecreṭ id-warten γef lejdud-nsen imezwura, imi ayen id-ğğan lejdud d agerruj ur nettfaka, i wuẓẓu n cfawat deg allaγen n tsutiwin id-iteddun. Ansay-agi yelḥa-d ti tsuta γer tayeḍ, anda timecreṭ-agi xedmentt deg laεwacar akken ad-sfarḥen imaγban wa ad-sεedlen ger yemdanen, akken id-tettili d lfal yelhan swayes ttḍeggiren ayen n dir. Si tama niḍen, timecreṭ-agi tettili-d deg unebdu lawan n tmegra, akken daγen id-tettili lawan n ḥartadem naγ iwjiben, melmi id-yewweḍ lawan n tyarza, akken ad-temγi ṣaba. Timecreṭ-agi tella-d s tebzart  d lewεadi n yimezdaγ n taddert  Mensura swayes ṣawḍen uγen-d yiwen uεejmi i yemzlen di tmecreṭ-agi.Timecreṭ-agi d tagnit yelhan aṭas imezdaγ n taddert n Mansura imi temlal tasa d way turew.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Am leɛwayed-is, di yal ddurt taneggarut n waggur n ɣuct di 25 alamma d 27 , taseqqamut n taddart n lemsella akked d tidukla tadelsant Tiɣilt n taddart n Lemsella deg tama n Iloula Oumalou s lemɛawna useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu , ttheggin-d tameɣra n tbexsisin. Ahil n useggas-agi d amerkanti: timsikniyin, isaragen, uraren n yigerdan , amezgun , timsizwert n ccna…atg. Ass-nni n lexmis yella-d beddu n tmeɣra s wurar n tarbaɛet n yitran n Mulud At Mɛemmer d ucewwiq n lxallat I d-yezzin i yizenqan n taddart. Syin, yella-d usenɛet n leṣnaf n tbexsisin yemxalafen ideg ara ad naf: taɣliḍt, taɛemrawit, azanjar, abuqbus, taberkant, tisgemt, tifendaruct, amuḥli, abaran, debza, aqurci acebḥan, taɣanimt…at. Tameddit n was, ikemmel wahil s yiwet n temlilit iwumi semman “ inzan n lexrif”; deg-s mlalen-d yifellaḥen n taddart d kra n yijenyuren n tfellaḥt, yezzi wawal ɣef tneqlet d wamek ilaq ad yili usefrek d useḥbiber ɣef lxella-s di temnaḍin n yidurar n leqbayel. “iswi-nneɣ d asnerni n wuẓẓu n tneqlin d ufras n wayen yellan yakan , imi ass-a tazart tewwi-d azal-is di leswaq igraɣlalen , tesɛa amkan-is deg usnerni n tdamsa n tmurt, “ I d-yenna Mass Abdelakader Bouacherine, d imdebbar n taddart ”. Ilaq ad d-tili lxedma tdum ma nebɣa lɣella am akken qqaren lejdud :’’ur d-ɣelli tbexsist s imi ma yella bab-is yeqqim d iɣimi’’ I d-yenna Dda Mhand d afellaḥ n taddart. ɣer yiḍ ahil yekfa s umezgun d usbuɣer n lxalat. Ass n wis sin n tmeɣra, (26 di ɣuct 2016), ɣef lewhi n 10h, tennerna ccbaḥa n tmeɣra n tbexsisin di Lemsella s usenɛet n tqendurt taqbaylit I d-lsant tullas n taddart, zzint-d I yizenqan n taddart s wurar d ccnawi. Rran-tt wid I d–iheggan tameɣra ad tili d-tajmilt I tcennayet n teqbaylit Malika doumrane . Tameddit n wass ,tella-d temsizwart n ccna atrar gar yilmeẓyen’’Rock’’, d tajmilt i tarbaɛet ‘’Les Abranis” , iwumi tuɣal tejmilt ɣer yiḍ seld imi kfan ahil n wass wiss sin s ccnawi-nsen yettaken abeḥri turet. Ass-nni n sebt, 27 di ɣuct yekfa wahil n tmeɣra n s ufraq n warrazen i warrac n taddart i d-yufraren deg leqraya deg yiswiren yemxalafen, medlent tewwura n tmeɣra n ccna aqbur d ucewwiq ccdaḥ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 Tamurt n leqbayel gar temnaḍin anda yeṭṭuqqet uḥezqul n temgart (goitre simple) labeɛda ɣer tmeṭṭut. Aya, icudd s umata ɣer lqella n usafar n lyud (iode) deg učči-nneɣ. D lehlak iteddun s tsussmi wer ma yewwi-d kra n lemḍerra, d acu kan tikkwal, s teɣzi n lweqt , igellu-d s kra n yiɣilifen i umdan. D acu-t uḥezqul n temgart? Acu i t-id-yettakken? S wacu yezmer ad d-yeglu s teɣzi n lweqt? D isteqsiyen i ɣef ara neɛreḍ ad d-nerr deg umagrad n wass-a.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Acu-t uḥezgul n temgart ? 

 D talɣa tejḍiḍt, yecban takuret yettilin di temgart. Ur tqeṛṛeḥ, ur txenneq, ur teččeṭṭin asebleɛ n wučči, ur d-tgellu s kra n wugur icudden s alluy neɣ s aṣubbu n tesmekta n thuṛmunin i d-yettakk uḥezqul-agi. Teṭṭuqqet aṭas ɣer tmeṭṭut umbeɛd awwaḍ n tarda (puberté). D talɣa i d-yesbeggin ttawil n l’échographie neɣ la scintigraphie.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Acu i d-yettakken lahlak-a ? 

 Tussna yettnadin, tessaweḍ ad d-tbeggen ddeqs n ssebbat yellan deffir lehlak-a. Gar-asent ad d-nebder: lqella n wučči n usafar n lyud ( seddaw 150 u/ ass) yellan d ssebba tamenzut di tmurt n leqbayel am wakken i d-nenna di tazwara, aẓar n umdan (hérédité) imi nettaf deg yiwet n twacult ddegs n yiɛeggalen i yesɛan lahlak-a. Ddexxan akk d ddeqs n ddwawi n usejji, labeɛda wid n waṭṭan n wul (Cordarone) d thurmunin i tettett tmeṭṭut s ṭṭul, slalayen-d aḥezgul n temgart. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> S wacu yezmer ad d-yeglu <span style="text-align: justify;">uḥezqul-a s teɣzi n lweqt ?</span> 

 Yettemgarad unerni n talɣa-s seg umdan ɣer wayeḍ, si tegnit ɣer tayeḍ. D acu kan, ma iban-d uḥezqul-a ɣer win yesɛan tignatin am ssebbat i d-nebder yakan, ara as-yanfen ad yimɣur si littaɛ, yezmer ad d-iglu s ddeqs n yiɣilifen am: tamsalmit n uḥezgul, anbeddal di tesmekta n thurmunin-is; d anbeddal i d-yeslalayen ddeqs n ccirat di tudert n medden. Ccirat-a, ttawint ddeqs seg-sen s amejjay, aneggaru-a, ad yettuḥettem fell-as ad yerr amuḍin s ddwa. Am wakken, yettakk-d, taxennaqt, aceṭṭen n usebleɛ n wučči, aṭṭan n tnefsit, labeɛda ɣer tmeṭṭut imi tettwali-t d ugur i thuski-s. Maca , d imexḍa iḥezgulen i yettuɣalen d axenzir (cancer)

<p style="text-align: center;"> Kra n yiwellihen i kunwi: 

 Imi d lqella n wučči n usafar n lyud i yesṭuqqten aṭas lahlak-a, yessefk fell-aɣ ad ntett kra n učči-nniḍen yesɛan asafar-a ( lfakya n lebḥar, sserdin, ayefki d wayen yettwaxdamen seg-s, soja) , am wakken, diɣ, ilaq amdan ad yesseḥbiber si yal ssebba i t-yeslalayen. Ma ifaq belli isɛa-t, ilaq-as ad yerzu s amejjay akken ad iɛass aḥezqul-is, u ma iwala belli ilaq-as ucerreg, amuḍin ilaq ad yeqbel axaṭer yezmer ad as-d-iglu s ddeqs n wuguren

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima Dali 

  
 Lḥed iɛeddan ɣef 00:50 n yiḍ, tewwet yiwet n tnezlezt deg waɣir n Bgayet s tseddart n 3,3 deg sellum n ricter, ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i aɣ-d-yewwḍen sɣur Uḥuddu Aɣarim (Protection Civile) n Bgayet. D ayen iwumi ḥulfan dɣa ula d timnaḍin i as-d-yezzin, am usamar n twilayt-a. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ur d-tegli zzenzla-a s txessart, ddeqs n yimezdaɣ i teṭṭef tuggdi imi kra seg-sen ur uɣalen ɣer yiḍes armi iɛedda wakud seg zzenzla-nni. I useɛlem kan, deg twilayt n Bgayet nnumen yimdanen zznazel timecṭuḥin yal aseggas, ladɣa meqrub mayyu neɣ d ṭuber, imi imir-nni i d-yettili ubeddel deg ugama seg tefsut ɣer unebdu neɣ seg unebdu ɣer tegrest.

  M. K. 

  
 Tikkelt-agi, gan tajmilt i 4 yineɣmasen n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yettuneḥsaben seg tgejda n tɣamsa tazzayrit i mazal ttidirin gar-nneɣ ar ass-agi. Ineɣmasen-agi d wigi: Belkacem Messaoudi, Said Freha, Mohamed Haouchine d Rachid Hammoutene.

 Taneɣlaft n yidles, tanmehla n yidles, tanmehla n uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer, d tesqamut n leqdicat idelsanen d inaẓuren (C.A.C.A) n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, suddsen-d ass-nni n sed 22/10/2016 yiwen leqdic adelsan s wazal-is, deg uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu, i lmend n usmekti n wass aɣelnaw n tɣamsa. Tikkelt-agi, gan tajmilt i 4 yineɣmasen n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yettuneḥsaben seg tgejda n tɣamsa tazzayrit i mazal ttidirin gar-nneɣ ar ass-agi. Ineɣmasen-agi d wigi: Belkacem Messaoudi, Said Freha, Mohamed Haouchine d Rachid Hammoutene. Fkan-d aṭas i tɣamsa tazzayrit s umata, d tɣamsa taqbaylit s wuzig. Ma dayen yerzan ahil yettwaxedmen i lmend n usmekti-a, yebda leqdics wudem unsib ɣef 10h, imi gan deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin aṭas n yimagraden n tɣamsa i yuran s timmad-nsen, d waṭas n tugniwin (ttsawer) n yineɣmasen-agi d tmeddurin-nsen. Am wakken, daɣen, i d-yella usenεet n yiwen n usaru i d-yewwin ɣef tudert-nsen d imahilen-nsen deg unnar n tɣamsa, d wayen akk i d-yezzin i wass aɣelnaw n tɣamsa. Ma ɣer tmeddit n wass, tella-d yiwet n tigda timedwart (table ronde) ɣef tudertd imahilen n ukuẓ-agi n yineɣmasen imeqqranen. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, Belkacem Messaoudi akked Said Freha d ineɣmasen n rradyu, ma Mohamed Haouchine d aneɣmas n tɣamsa yura, ma Rachid Hammoutène deg tin yuran (iɣmisen) akked rradyu.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Aaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Si zik ɣer yimezdaɣ n tudrin leqbayel, tujya n waṭas n lehlak-ak tettili-d s yimɣan i d –tekksen di lexlawi, neɣ i teẓẓun deg tferkiwin. “Zik yakan, xussen wallalen udawi, nekni zik-nni ur nettruḥu ara ɣer yimejjayen, nettdawi iman-nneɣ s yimɣan nettaf ɣur-sen’’ i d-tenna Nna Werdiya .

 Ma nmuqel akka ɣer wazal yesɛa udawi s yimɣan, ad naf ula di zman n wass-a, aṭas n yimdanen i yettdawin s teḥcict, segmi i d-fkan yimnadiyin deg uḥric n tezmert ttbut n udawi s yimɣan ur d-igellu ara s waṭṭanen-nniḍen i umuḍin. I ubeggen n wazal sɛan yimɣan di tudert n yal ass, Tasqamut n Lɛuqqal akked Tiddukkla tadelsant Tigmi n taddart Mzeggen deg tɣiwant n Yilulen n Umalu, tama n Buzeggan, llin s wudem unsib ass-nni n 14 almi d 16 deg ɣuct deg nella tafaska tis 04 n yimɣan n usejji i rran ad tili d tajmilt tikelt-agi i umeddakkel n ugama n taddart n yigersafen, Mass Mouhand Ousallah Messaoudene, yewwḍen laɛfu Rebbi ilindi. Ahil n tezrigt-agi d amerkanti deg-s : isaragen, amezgun , ccna, timsikniyin n yidlisen usnanen i d-yettmeslayen ɣef usejji s yimɣan akked d yisufar-nniḍen.

  Ismawen n yimɣan d wazal-nsen  

 Ass-nni amenzu n tfaska nemlal-d kra n temɣarin n Mzeggen fkant-aɣ-d ismawen n kra n yimɣan n usejji, nnant-aɣ-d i wacu i ttwasxdamen.

  Imɣi: Asexdem-is d wazal-is 

 Qlilu: i tekkes aqraḥ n tɛebbudt

 Azebbuj : i wid i helken aṭansyu, d bu semmaḍ, aman-is daɣen lhan i bu mellal ɣer yigerdan 

 Marnuyet : Yettrus s ddaw n yiles, yelha i lqu

 Jaɛda n udrar : D asewwi deg waman, Telha i yiriran 

 Awarmi : Ttbexiren s yis-s i tfunast, i wakken ad tesɛu udi 

 Timija : Tteqnen-tent medden i tgecrar, mgal zellum

 Tifelɛulma : Qeṭṭɛen s yis-s iriran 

 Afaryis: Yelha i bumellal

 Tizaɛtranin : Lhant i ubeḥri

 Gerninuc: Tetten-t tlawin di tament tid ur nettarwen ara 

 Felgu : Yettwasway i waḍu

 Amagraman : Xeddmen-t d teḥmamet i uqerru , i tekkes leqriḥ

 Tuẓedla: Tessishil tuẓda I ukerciw

 Lkina : Tettesway deg waman, telha i lqu

  Imɣan i d –gellun s lemḍara 

 llan kra n yimɣan i ɣef i d-mmeslayent temɣarin n Mzeggen wigi ttwagedlen, kra deg-sen neqqen ula d iɣersiwen d yimdanen akka am umendekrar, ḥenṭeḍ n yizgaren, amerɣennis isarraɛ lmal mi ara ad t-yečč. Am wakken i d-mmeslayent ɣef yigersalen, wid i d-yemɣin di tulmut akked d tasaft, neɣ di lqaɛa weḥd-sen. Qqaren-asen igersalen n uqjun, wigi zemren ad nɣen win ara ad ten-yeččen.

  Kra n yinzan icudden ɣer yismawen n yimɣan di Mzeggen  

 Deg wayen i d-negmar ɣer temɣarin n taddart llan ula d inzan.

 -Akal ifilku senz-it, akal umadaɣ debɣ-it, akal n wafar ffer-it 

 -Amer mačči d tifelɛulma, ad nɣaɣ argaz s tmira.

 -A nger-ik agarninuc , aẓar-ik wwin-t waman kečč tettraɛriɛeḍ.

  Azal n yimɣan di lawan n tegrawla n 54 deg taddart n Mzeggen  

 Ur qqimen ara kan yimɣan d allal n usejji deg taddart n 49 n yimeɣrasen. ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-mmeslayent temɣarin yeddren di tallit-nni, nnant-d d akken deg umkan iwumi qqaren alma dinna i d-tettkesnet tulawin tiɣunam akked d gerninuc. Ad tent-xelḍent s cwiṭ n zzit n uzemmur, ad ten-fkent d azwar i lmujahdin mi ara ad d-rzun ɣer taddart.

  Taqsiṭ n teblaḍt n tejmaɛt taddart  

 Di tirza-nneɣ ɣer Mzeggen, nesgunfa di tejmaɛt n taddart, dinna i nemlal Dda Dahmane Adjoudj d aḥeddad n wawal, dɣa yules-aɣ-d taqsiṭ n teblaḍt. Yenna-k s ucmumeḥ: ”Tabladṭ-agi seg wakken tecbeḥ, ɣezzifet telha i usenned, ttalsen-aɣ-d imeqranen belli, zik-nni ussan-d Wat Tfilkut i d-yezgan di Lɛec n Yililten wwin-tt ɣer tejmaɛt-nsen. Azekka-nni, kkren-d Wat taddart, tekker temhawca ɣef teblaḍt. Asmi i tt-ufan di tejmaɛt n Tfilkut , dɣa rran-tt-id s amkan-is , yedda-d ula d inebgi Rebbi i yufan igen fell-as …’’ . 

 Seg yimir i wwint lemtel-agi tulawin n Mzeggen:’ 

 ‘’Mzeggen ma iger nnefxa , d abrid-is ayen “ 

 ‘’Ma txus tewrirt Ɛemrus, Tifilkut tɛus

  Tameɣra di tfaska  

 I wakken ad tili tfaska n yimɣan n usejji d tagnit n lferḥ, tella-d yiwet n tmeɣra s wazal-is, imi wwin-d tislit s teksiwt n leqbayel, argaz yelsa-d abernus, taqufet n yinebgawen defren-d deffir s yiḍebbalen d ilewlawen. Tilmeẓyin n taddart merra s teksiwin d lfuda , ttecrurudent di tzenqatin n taddart am tsekrin, teddunt ccennut, timɣrin ttembeddalent izlan di tala n Sidi Mhend Umouhend anda i d-tugem teslit. S wakka i yekfa leqdic adelsan ussnan i d-tettheggi yal aseggas taddart n Mzeggen, kra n win/tin i d-yerzan, iwala, yelmed, yennecraḥ, yekkes lxiq . D wigi i d lesrar n tfaskiwin n unebdu di tudrin n tmurt n leqbayel.

  Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 Aseggas –agi ulac tamnaḍt ur nesfugel ara yennayer , ad naf aṭas n temnaḍin deg tmurt n Lzzayer , ula deg yiɣerbazen s umata , tuzen-d tneɣlaft n usegmi Massa Nuriya Ben £ebriṭ ɣer yiɣerbazen akken ad d-segzun yiselmaden i yinelmaden d acu i d yennayer ? ger yiɣerbazen ixedmen tameɣra ad naf deg uɣerbaz alemmas n Tact ,qqaren-as Rğawna taqdimt , taddart n Rabeḥ ∑aṣma ,ferḥen s yennayer , yal anelmad yewwi-d tagella sewwayen leqbayel am seksu n yirden, tiɣrifin, aɣrum bu yisufar, lesfenğ, aɣrum aquran , iniɣman …. .cnan-d tizlit n Crif Xeddam «targit d laẓ», tizlit n Newara : «ad k-wessiɣ a mmi aξzizen d lξib ma tettuḍ laṣel-ik», d tezlit n yidir d tajmilt i Mulud Mξemmri tinna n «umedyaz», wwin-d kra n yisefra , uran-d isenfaren ɣef yennayer , fkan-d timseξraq,lsant-d tullas tiqendyan n Leqbayel ma d arrac lsan-d ibernyas , ṭfen-d tugniwin , ɣas akken d tameɣra tafessast maca tesξa sser ,arrac –nni s yiselsa n leqbayel cebbḥen aɣerbaz ,ma d anemhal n ddina yewhem deg leqbayel amek ttqabalen yennayer imi netta yusa-d seg Mila ,dɣa iwala arrac imecṭaḥ amek qqedcen deg tegnit –agi d ayen it-yesfarḥen yefka-asen arazen ɣer taggara.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben Yahia  

  
<p style="text-align: center;">« Si m kul lǧiha ttewtaɣ, ayen ufiɣ  ad wwet-aɣ yi s », is-yenna Lounis  Ait Menguellet deg yiwet deg tizlatin-ines. Akken i yella lḥal di tmurt n leqbayel di  taggara n-iseggasen n 70. Yal agni, yal abṛaḥ, yal annar  yuɣal d-afaras akken agdud ad yegguraɛ t-id yak i t-iqerḥen. Nekkwa-s tettwenker, amezruy-ines  yettwemḥa, idles-ines  yeggursel, izerfan ulac, d-ayen yak merra i fetlen deg ul-is urrif. Lɣiḍ yezḍan azeṭṭa-s am tissist deg ixfawen n-lɣaci iddeggir ɣer tanekra. 

 Kra n wayen yettqellib yufa-t-id ugdud deg ccna amḥadi n teswiɛt-nni igemmun  simmal simmal. Aẓemẓum ɣer uẓemẓum , aqeccuḍ ɣer uqeccud, times izehren d tuffirt tufa  tuga deg ara temmeɣ  akken a tendeh tirni. Ifeṭṭiwej amezwaru  ssebba d JSK yewwin  tilɣuɣa n Lẓẓayer acḥal d-abrid( 1973/1974/1977)  tuɣal d azamul n umennuɣ ɣer yidles amaziɣ. 

 S w akka ,  ayen yellan niqal d-awezɣi yuɣal d-tidet deg useggas n 77 deg annar n 5 juillet. Ssebba?  Taggara n tqabuct n Lẓẓayer id yeselmalen tarbaɛt n JSK ɣer tin NAHD. Am yiwen , merra imferjjen n JSK (id yusan d-imeyyaten si yal tama n tmurt n Leqbayel ɣef Lẓẓayer tamanaɣt)  suɣen s-yiwet taɣect “ nekni d-imaziɣen”.  Annar asen-nni trekb it tawla,  agdud yessufɣ-  urfan-is mgal  Boumedienne, mgal adabu, mgal akabar awḥid. I tikelt tamezwarut,  mebla tugdi mebla a kukru, yettwareggem uselway yesselḥan tamurt  s-udebbuz akked uzal si 65 armi 1978.Meɛna uqbel a tawi melḥeq , yerra-d ttaṛ-is imi aseggas deffir tadyant-nni yettwakkes isem n JSK tuɣal d JET acku di  lbal-is  yiɣil s w ayen-nni ara yeɣḍel azal n tizumla  n JSK ɣer wid-is. 

 Isem n JSK yezdi ɣer umennuɣ ɣef izerfan akked  yidles amaziɣ armi d-ulamek.  Ayen ccnan fell-as icennayen iqbayliyen yesbgan-d amek ufan  leqbayel iman-nsen ddaw ssenǧaq n terbaɛt-agi.  Lounis Ait Menguellet  ur icuḥḥ ara s wawal akked tugniwin akken ad yini amek yezdi yixef n yal aqbayli ɣer JSK:

 Yerbeḥ neɣ yexṣer

 D agma-t-nneɣ ayen 

 S-idis-is nehdeṛ

  A t-id nɛiwen

  Ɣef JSK 

 wwet afus a nṛuḥ

 Fṛeḥ a taqbaylit 

 S wid id rebba-ḍ

 Win nɣant tismin  

 Ur ten yessawaḍ

 Ɣelben taṣṣebḥit

 Zzemren i tmeddit 

 wwet afus a nriḥ…

 Ahat diɣen d-tizlit n Matoub Lounes “ kksen-aɣ la JSK” id yettwakkiden azal teṭṭef tarbaɛt n-ilmaẓyen iqbayliyen deg ul n-imawlan-is: “

 Ksen-aɣ la JSK

 Yerna awal ur aɣ-id yuli

 S wacu akka ara nqabel tura

 Aɛdaw fell-aɣ ad yeɣli 

 Isem-is gubṛen-t aɛdawen

 Faqen s lqum-is yuki

 JSK win i tt-yesnan

 Ṣṣuṛa-s tettergigi

  Sonelec id yennulfan 

 Tessufeɣ JSKabylie

 Aḥay aḥay.. d-acut waya…

 Tella-d tiɣeṛsi  t-amezwaru-t deg aɛdil n-lxuf yellan yenneḍ ɣef ulawen n yemdanen. Ilsawen yezzi-d-ɣer-sen lmenṭaq. Ccna amḥadi n teqbaylit  yettnerni simmal. Deg tegnit yetteyazagen bḥal tagi id yessufeɣ Mouloud Mammeri adlis-is” isefra iqburen n teqbaylit”.  Akken ad yawi asarag ɣef lmendad n wedlis-agi id yeskeflen iẓuran n tsekla taqbaylit, yettwenccad ɣer tasdawit n Tizi Wezzu. Maca adabu  i tikelt nniḍen yezga-d d-aɛakkiṛ  zdat idles n aheqqi ɣef yettqellib u ɣref. Reglen  abrid zdat n Mouloud Mammeri ur as-ɛamden ara ad yekcem tamdint n Tizi-Wezzu. Asarag yebṭel. Yeɣli ifeṭṭiwej n tmes ɣer tuga  iḥeḍmen, inelmaden n tesdawit ur susmen-ara, tafsut n-imaziɣen tebda tettenfufud. Aɣmis n « El Moudajhid » yerna ɣer times zzit s-usebṭar yura Kamel Belkecem  “ aselmad n temsirin/ le donneur de leçons”anda id iwwet s leqseḥ deg umussnaw Mouloud Mammeri. D ussan-kan tamurt n leqbayel tenhawel tirni si Bgayet alamma d tizi, si Tizi alamma d Tubiret. Tafsut n imaziɣen  nnig timesbaniyin s –id tegla, nnig tagmat tezdi gar watmaten, nnig imeɣnasen id yufraren ( Said Sadi, Djamal Zenati, Moqran Ait Larbi, Hend Sadi, Said Khelil…) id as yellan s deffir tella-d azamul n tnekra. Tella d-iseɣ id yewwin taruẓi n-iɣeṛban n tsusmi, tella  d asegrireb n iɣulad n-lxuf id yezzin si yal tama ɣef uɣref.  . Seg immir  ttwaksen xemsa ɣef yimi, awal aserti yuzzel ɛinani ɣef yilsawen, a suter n tmaziɣt d yidles-is akked tutlayt-is  ur d qimen ara kan s tufra. Anec-t-a sebganen-t-id isefra akked tezlatin id yefɣan menbeɛd tadyant n 20 ibrir amedya asefu n Lounis Ait Menguellet  anda is yeqqar:

 Amacahu

 Ɣef udrar mi id yerra ṣṣut

 Lhiba-s tewwḍeḍ s arraw-is

 Amacahu

 S idmaren I ttmagaren lmut

 Sɛerqen i uɛdaw later-s

 I tneggarut

 Amek ara yefru ssuq-is

 Waṣṣen si zik

 Ɣer temɛict n ddaw uḍaṛ

 Akken aneggaru ad yer ttar

 Matoub Lounes  si lǧiha-s yenna t-id yecqan leqbayel

 Si Skikda i ten-id fkan

 Ttcabin s-ilfan

 D tirebbaɛ ɣer Tizi lḥun 

 Ɣer tmes ur nesɛi duxen

 Isufa uẓan

 Mi id ṣṣuben wat-Wagenun

 Lhekam bedden nejmaɛn

 I ubhim nnan 

 Ad yini ayen ara sen yehwun…

 Qṛib ulac acennay  neɣ amsefru aqbayli ur d newwi ara ɣef tafsut imaziɣen n tmanyin. Gar wayen nnan d wayen sefran nezmer ad nedder  imeslayen-agi n Ferhat Mheni( Imaziɣen Imula): “Tafsut n Tizi-Wezzu/ A llufan-nneɣ ur negzim/Yemla-aɣ-d amek a neddu / Deg abrid n tegrawliwin.” Yal anaẓur aqbayli yerna-d asɣar-is ɣer taffa n umennuɣ  akken ad yessekfel lḥeqq yeɣben . Tarbaɛt ifegguren , Malika Domrane, Sofiane, Amɣid, Amar Kobi… yal wa amek yessemsd allaɣ-is akken ad yernu awal ɣer wawal id yewten s-ugerz .D-ayen-nni  i yeǧǧen amedyaz ad yini:

 Ul ma yella yenguga

 Tḥuss ṣṣuṛa

 Tikli-nneɣ terwi leɛqul

 Qqaren-as acu-t waya

 Ur fhimen ara

 Anwa lebɣi nettmuqul

 D tamaziɣt id yeḥyan ass-a

 Seg iẓuran tegma

 Ay itbir efk a-s azul.

   

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Tberḥ-d ussan-agi iɛeddan Tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, belli tuget n yinelmaden n uswir n tesnawit i ilaqen ad ɛiwden akayad n taggara n ulmud asnawi, yettwasnen s yisem n BAC, ugar n uzgen n yimjerden i tezrigt-agi tuzzigt, ur ɛawden ara asɛeddi n ukayad-agi. Ma d timental ur ẓrin ara acimi, akka i d aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n yimḍebber deg Tenmehla n usegmi. Tazrigt-agi tis snat i d-yellan seg 13 alamma d 18 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, jerden iman-nsen azal n 2963 n yinelmaden n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Amur ameqqran n yinelmaden-agi ur d as-nɛawed ara asɛeddi i ukayad-agi, d imunan, wid ur neqqaren ara deg tesnawit. Inelmaden-agi i iɛawden asɛeddi n ukayad-agi, ferqen-ten ɣef 9 n wulmisen n yikayaḍen, yellan deg tlemmast n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Am wakken daɣen i d-llan ɣef lmendad-nsen wazal n 1 000, gar yiselmaden akked yimɛiwen n usegmi. Aseɣti n tferkiwin n yinelmaden, yebda tasebḥit n wass-nni n lexmis 20 yulyu 2017, deg sin n wulmisen n useɣti, i yellan d snat n tesnawiyin deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Tigi d tasnawit n Fatma n Soumer akked tesnawit n Abbane Ramdane n temdint tamaynut. Tallit n useɣti, teqqim kraḍ n wussan, imi seɣtan yiselmaden ula deg taggara n ddurt. I uzekka 25 yulyu 2017, yetturaǧu ad d-binen yigemmaḍ n ukayad-agi n uswir n tesnawit, deg Ddiwan aɣelnaw n yikayaden d temsizzliyin. Ama i wid i sɛeddan tikkelt tamezwarut i d-yellan gar 11 alamma 15 seg yunyu iɛeddan, ama i wid i sɛeddan deg tegnit-agi tuzzigt ara i d-yellan seg wass n lexmis iɛeddan 13 alamma d ass-nni n lrebɛa 19 yulyu 2017.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Akken ur d-neqqar ara ɣef uɣrum. Maca taggara-ya deg yidurar n Tmurt n Yezwawen, am Ayt Smaɛel, ladɣa deg teswiɛt-a n yideflawen ed yigeffuren yezrin, wid i d-yeskarayen lmal ur ttaǧǧan amḍiq s uḥebber akken ad d-uǧwen tabaliwt n lqerḍ, n ujilban, n uẓekkun neɣ n walim, d ayen ara ččen yiɣersiwen-nsen deg usemmiḍ yessenzafen am win n wussan iɛeddan. 
  Am tnezzayt am tmeddit, am umecṭuḥ am umeqqran, kra n win yesɛan deg ugerbi-yis ixef ijewwa seg laẓ, yettwali ansi ara as-d-yaɣ imɣi-ya yeqquren yeẓḍan bac ad ten-yessusem. Maca, deg nnuba-ya, banen-d sin n wuguren: yiwen d tuqin (rareté) n tuga-ya i yeɛzizen ɣef lmal, wayeḍ d taɣlayt n ssuma n tbaliwin-a ɣur wid i tent-yesɛan. 
  Meḥsub, bab n lmal neɣ n wulli ad yewt ass imed netta yettqellib ɣef tgella n wid ileḥḥun ɣef ukuẓ n yiḍaren, alama yufa, ad t-id-iqubel ugur-nniḍen ; win n ssuma i ur tezmireḍ ad tqerrbeḍ, i yettawaḍen tikwal alami d 1200 n yidinaren i yiwet n tbaliwt. 
  « Akken xedmeɣ ḥesleɣ, ma ur uɣaɣ ara ad mtent wulli-yiw, ma uɣeɣ d tuqqda akka ɛinani ». Akka i aɣ-d-tenna yiwet n temɣart i iḥaren acu ara texdem deg tegnit am tin i tt-yeṭṭfen. Ma d yiwen seg wid yeznuzuyen leḥcic-a yekkawen yenna-aɣ-d: « Nekk tibaliwin-iw muggent ula s ujilban ed uẓekkun, ɣef waya teɣlay ssuma. Rnu, ur ilaq ad nettu dakken aql-aɣ deg tegrest ». 
  Akken yebɣu yili ihi, wid yesɛan lmal ttuḥettmen ad aɣen tabaliwt swayes ara ten-ɛelfen. Yal ass ad twaliḍ amdan-a neɣ d wa yettawi tabaliwt ladɣa sɣur at taddart, imi seg ssuq, aṭas i yettwalin dakken ur d asenf yelhan i ara d-tawiḍ syinna.                                
   Mhenni Xalifi 
   
  <em>n Rachid BUKHERROUB</em> 

 Mass BOUKHERROUB d anemhal n tesnawit deg tɣiwant n At Aissa Mimoun. D ameɣnas n tmaziɣt seg tazwara n tudert-is am netta am yilmeẓyen i t-yecban n tama –agi n Wagennun. Yessufeɣ-d adlis ‘’ Tislit n Uɣanim’’ i wakken ad d-yerr tiɣri i yinelmaden i yettnadin ad ɣren idlisen n tsekla taqbaylit. ‘’Ur ufin ara yinelmaden idlisen n tsekla ara d-aɣen. Ladɣa mi akka tettuneḥsab leqraya n yidlisen deg umecwar-nsen. Ɣef wakka i d-rriɣ tiɣri, nniɣ-as ad d-fkeɣ afus n tallelt deg uḥric-agi n tsekla tamaziɣt. Dɣa suffɣeɣ-d adlis-agi i uriɣ acḥal-aya.’’ Akka i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Boukherroub. ‘’Tislit n Uɣanim’’, d adlis i d-yewwin awal ɣef tudert n Leqbayel zik-nni : gar wuguren d leɛwayed ; gar yimɣaren d yilmeẓyen. Adlis-a, yezmer ad yili d yiwen gar ttawil i yinelmaden i wakken ad yesnerni s waṭas deg umawal-nsen imi yettuneḥsab d agerruj n wawalen iqburen. Yeffeɣ-d, yakan, ɣer tezrigin ‘’El Amel’’, 2015, s wazal n 250 DA.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Taɣuri iwatan. 

  Hocine.M 

  
 Deg tmesbaninyin mechuren deg tmurt n Lezzayer mebɛed Tafsut Yimaziɣen, ad naf tadyant n 5 tuber 1988 . D tadyant i iḥuzan acennay ameqqran Matoub Lounès imi yettwet s rsas deg ubris-is ɣer Michelet. Tebda-d tedyant mi i d-tella yiwet n temlilit di tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu i lmend n tmesbanin-nni n 5 tuber di tmaneɣt . Di temlilit i d-yellan yeffeɣ-d yiwen n wulɣu anda i d-yessawal ɣer userked d tsussmi mgal wid i d-yettenjaɛen , akked sin n wussan n ussended. Ihi Lounès Matoub akked sin yinelmaden, wwin ulɣuyen-nni ɣer Ɛin Lḥemmam akken ad ten-ferqen, akken ad sfehmen i medden ayen i yellan , deg ubrid ḍeffren-ten-id iǧadarmiyen, sḥebsen-ten, bdan rregmat. Ssulin sin-nni n yinelmaden ɣer tkerrust-nsen, ma yella d Lwennas qarsen-fell-as s 5 n terṣaṣin, teɣli ṣṣura-s, s yin wwin-t ɣer sbiṭar n Ɛin Lḥemmam, mbaɛd ɣer Tizi Uzzu, imir ɣer win n Lezzayer : sbiṭar n Les orangers , syin serḥen-as. Yeffaɣ tamurt iruḥ ɣer fransa imi dinna i llant ttawilat akken ad idawi , yedder 6 n wagguren anda i t-id-tettẓur lmut yal taswiɛt. Yenneɛtab aṭas imi ur yezmir ara ad inaqel afus-is neɣ aḍar-is. Ass n 09 di meɣres 1989, yecna deg wannar n Ukil Remḍan di Tizi Uzzu di tallit-nni yella iteddu s tɛekkzin , akken kan yessufeɣ-d aḍebsi iwumi isemma ‘’Ma yella d rṣas i ineqqen aqlin ur mmuteɣ ara’’, amzun akken d tiririt ɣef tyita. Ɛeddan 29 n yiseggasen si tedyant-a n Tuber 1988, tadyant i mazal deg cfawat n yal aqbayli , ihi akken ḥed ur itettu tadyant-agi amazday aɣelnaw i ustan n timant n tmaziɣt n Draɛ Lmizan ad-as yerr tajmilt ass-a i umeɣras i yefkan idamen-is d asfel akken ad tidir tutlayt d yidles ar ass-a, amazday aɣelnaw i ustan n timant n tmaziɣt, ihegga-d yiwen n leqdic deg umkan anda yettwaɣdar Matoub, deg umkan i yecfan i tyita, imi ad yili unejmuɛ ɣef 10 n tsebḥit n wass-a akken ad mmeslayen ɣef wayen yexdem d wayen i d-yeǧǧa unaẓur.

  S.Yamani 

  
 Yekfa lxuf n lehlak ‘’Newcastle’’ n yiyuzaḍ deg Tubiret, ɣefwakken i d-nnan yimḍebbren n tezmert. Acu kan, yiwen uḥelluf yesserwet akk Draa El Mizan. Yefka axessar i yiḍuman. Akken yebɣu yili, ur yewwiḍ ara ad yexdem am urgaz-nni n Japon yenɣan 19 n yimaɛḍar s lmus.
