 Tazrigt tamezwarut n talγuγa taγelnawt n waffug n tegnawt i d-tessudes tfidiralit tazzayrit n waffug n tegnawt, s lemεawna n tiddukla n wadal idurar d waffug n tegnawt n temnaḍt n Wizgan d tenmehla n yilmeẓyen d waddal n lwilaya n Tizi-Uzzu, i d-yeḍran ass n 26 maggu 2016 di temnaḍt n Wizgan anda i d-ttafgen seg udrar n Uswel deg tγiwant n At-Zikki γef laεli n 1580 lmitrat, almi d annar n waddal n taddart n Saḥel, taγiwant n Wizgan, tessuli leqdic-is ass n 31 maggu yezrin, anda i ttekan 38 n yinaddalen i d-yussan si 26 n lwilayat yemgaraden n tmurt. Amḍiq amezwaru iḥerri-t-id unaddal Ḥamouche Djaffar n tiddukla n waddal n yidurar d waffug n tegnawt n temnaḍt n Wizgan lwilaya n Tizi-Uzzu, yuγal d alγuγ aγelnaw n ṣenf n waddal-agi, affug n tegnawt n useggas 2016. Tameγra n tikci n ciεat, arazen d yigardasen n usebγes tesduri-t-id tzeqa n tmeγriwin « Tajeğğigt n Yires » n tγiwant n Wizgan anda iḥedren yimḍebren n tfidiralit tazzayrit n waffug n tegnawt, tanmehla n waddal d yilmeẓyen n lwilaya n Tizi-Uzzu, imḍebbren n 04 tγiwanin n la dayra n Wizgan, inaddalen d waṭas-niḍen. Inaddalen d yimḍebren n tmesbanit-agi tanaddalt, farḥen aṭas s tegnatin yelhan ideg-i tεedda talγuγa-agi, imi ttawilat akk iwulmen llan deg umkan. Acu kan, iban-d kra n lexṣaṣ n lembat, imi ulac assensu n yilmeẓyen « Auberge de jeunes », ara yesneqsen taεkkemt ama γef yinaddalen, ama γef imarayen d yilmeẓyen.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Imezdaɣ n temnadt n tiliwa yetabaɛin ɣer tɣiwant leqsar di tubiret ɣelqen lemqer n tɣiwant ddurt-agi iɛeddan tlata wussan (letnayen , tlata , larebɛa ) sebba liḥala ideg ttidiren d lexsas n waṭas wallalen n tudert i yerwan lḥif acḥal d iseggasen -aya ttrajun iṣenfaren unegmu ara d -iḥazen taddart nsen , d acu kan ayagi ur d-yelli ara dayen iten-yeǧǧan ad d- sbegnen lɣid nsen zdat n tɣiwant iwakken ad asen-slen imḍebren teɛna temsalt gar-asen aselway usqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant , Ma yella d lexsas n wallalen-a akked wugguren i četkayen lexsas n waman di temnadt-a imi ur d-ttasen ara yal ass ḥaca tikelt di ddurt ɣef waya yettilid lexsas usafar-a ladɣa deg ussan unebdu d lḥamu ,Rnu ɣer waya daɣen yella-d wugur n tnezduɣt anda ssuturen s tnezduɣin imi llan kra n twaculin ar ass-a d wussan ur d-sfaydint ara acḥal d iseggasen iɛeddan mazal tiwaculin -a zedɣnt deg yixxamen bɣan ad aɣlin xerben akk ttazal d aman ladɣa di cetwa , am wakken ssuturen s uzideg n temnadt nsen , Ssuturen daɣen trisiti iberdan imi taddart-a tusad ger yidurar yeɛlayen tebɛed ɣef tɣiwant . Meḥsub akk d iɣublan d wuguren iten-yeǧǧan ttidiren di yir liḥala di tmeddurt nsen yerna maci d tikelt tamezwarut anda id -sbegnen lɣid nsen imi xeddmen timesbaniyin acḥal n tikwal ameɛna ur d-iban yiqiḥ , ma d tikelt-a ssuturen s tifrat s lɛejlan i wuguren-a iten-ixenqen am wakken ssuturen seg yimḍebren ad d-rren lwelha nsen ɣer tama-agi s yiṣenfaren unegmu . <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Abdelhak Menas 

  
 Mxalafen medden ɣef ayen yaɛnan lemɛinṣṛat. Llan kṛa qaṛen-d aken d lemɛinṣṛat timaynutin i yellan xiṛ n teqbuṛin.Wiyaḍ ttaṛan-asen awal belli d lemɛinṣṛat tiqbuṛin axiṛ. D ttidett, iseggasen-agi inegguṛa aṭaṣ n lemɛinṣṛat titṛaṛin i kecmen aṛ wannaṛ n tuẓḍa n uzemmuṛ.Ass-a, d ttimacinin timaynutin i yellan deg lemɛinṣṛat, acku tuẓḍa n uzemmuṛ tṛebḥed aṭaṣ n wakud. Tuṛa, maḥsub ttimacinin i xedmen kulec, amdan yeggaṛed afus-is deg kṛa n tɣawsiwin kan. D ttidett daɣen lemɛinṣṛat-agi titṛaṛin ɛeṣṛen-t akken ilaq azemmuṛ aken ad yeffaɣ aṭaṣ n zzit, ttṣeffint-ett aken ilaq, ittefɣed yeṣfa, d-awṛaɣ am…uṛaɣ.D-acu kan, wid iḥemlen lemɛinṣṛat tiqbuṛin qaṛṛen-d aken ɣas ma yella lemɛinṣṛat-agi titṛaṛin ttakented aṭaṣ n zzit, maca lbenna n zzit nsen-t ulac! Qaṛen-d belli timacinin-agi titṛaṛin sṛuɣuyen-t zzit, tteksen-t-as lbenna lakked d « Les γitamines », aken neẓṛa belli wigi asmi ad yali weẓɣal xeṛben, ttuɣalen ulac degsen-t lfayda. Ma yella d lemɛinṣṛat n zik, tigi ɛeṣṛen-t azemmuṛ aken kan, mebla ma yeṛɣa deg tmacinin.Ayagi yettaǧa lbenna-s akk d « les γitamines » ččuṛen s daxel. Zzit n lemɛinṣṛat tiqdimin yettɣimi akenni kan, bnin, as tiniḍ d-azmmuṛ i tett wemdan. Maca, tuẓma n-uzemmuṛ txuṣ imi mači s tmacinin i tettwaxdam, s lǧahd n yiɣallen, aken ttẓeyiṛen lquqna ɣef teqfacin ansa id itteffeɣ zzit ubnin ɣeṛ wemdun. Aṛ ass-a mazal llan-t kṛa n lemɛinṣṛat tiqbuṛin deg tama n Ṣummam. Aṭaṣ n yemdanen yettawin aṛ din azemmuṛ nsen aken ateẓden am zik nni. D-acu kan, tigi bdant « negṛen-t », imi tatṛaṛa lakked d tmacinin timaynutin ksen-t-as aḥṛic meqṛen i lemɛṣṛat tiqbuṛin, yeqqimen d-azamul n tjaddit, neɣ nnig waya, d idles aqbuṛ.

<p style="text-align: right;">Syphax.Y

  
 Ass n ssebt, 16 deg cutember 2017, ad d-tili tmeɣra n ccna deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n temdin n Tizi Uzzu i wakken ad d-jemɛen kra n yidrimen s wayes ara ɛiwnen deg udawi ameɣnas ameqqran n tmaziɣt, n tugdut akked yizerfan n umdan, Said Boukhari, i yellan akka tura d amuḍin deg sbiter n Belloua (Sanatorium). Tettwahegga-d tmeɣra sɣur « Tasqamut n yimeddukkal n Said Boukhari » i d-yettwaxelqen kra n wussan kan mebɛed mi yehlek, i wakken ad ilin ɣer yidis-is akked yidis n twacult-is, u ad as-fken afus n tallelt seg yal tama, ama seg tama n tedrimt neɣ wallalen-nniḍen n tdawsa. Said Boukhari i yellan d aselmad uqbel ad yeffeɣ tastaɣt (retraite) akka tura, yesɛa xemsa n warraw-is. Deg ussan-agi kan iɛeddan i as-d-iban waṭṭan n uxenzir (cancer) n uḍiḥan. Ayen i t-yeǧǧan ad yekcem ɣer sbiter anda yettdawi aṭṭan-a. Ɣef wanect-a, diɣ, i tebɣa tesqamut n yimeddukal-is ad d-tejmaɛ tadrimt i as-ilaqen i udawi-ines, ama dagi deg tmurt, neɣ deg berra ma yewwi-as-d lḥal. Imi ula deg Fransa, tella terbaɛt n yimeddukkal-is i d-yettwaxelqen ɣef ddemma n wanect-a. Aṭas n yimdanen i ikecmen ɣer tesqamut-a i wakken ad ɛiwnen ama s tedrimt-nsen neɣ s tezmert-nsen. Akka, dɣa, ara naf ddeqs n yicennayen, n yisertiyen akked yimḍebbren n tkebbaniyin i irezzun ɣer uxxam n tesqamut akked tirza ɣer sbiter i wakken ad d-beggnen ibeddi-nsen ɣer tama n umeɣnas ameqqran Said Boukhari. Nezmer ad d-nebder, Lounis Ait Menguellet, Zedek Mouloud, Mouloud Lounaouci d wiyaḍ. Ula d aneɣlaf n waddal d yilmeẓyen Ould Ali El Hadi, yerza ɣur-s imi d ameddakel-is aqdim : ttwassnen s waṭas deg Umussu adelsan MCB, ladɣa deg useggas 1994/1995 lawan-nni n unuḥbus ɣef uɣerbaz imi llan di sin d imḍebbren deg MCB, xas ma yella yal yiwen seg tama. Am wakken yerza, diɣ, ɣur-s ddurt iɛeddan lwali n Tizi Uzzu, Mohamed Bouderbali, netta tanemhalt n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, Goumeziane akked unemhal n sbiter CHU n Tizi Uzzu, Pr Ziri. Ugar n yisallen ɣef liḥala n Said Boukhari, tzemrem ad ten-tafem deg « Amazday Said Boukhari » deg Facebook i ɣef i d-yella Said Chemakh deg lmendad.

  F. E. 

  
 Acḥal aya tura, d tamurt n leqbayel i d-yettazgen deg umekkan amezwaru deg yikayaden n yal aswir n leqraya deg tmurt n lezzayer. Yeṭṭuqqet wawal, sya u sya, ɣef wamek i tewwi lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu amḍiq amezwaru. Gar tismin akked leḥsed, mačči d kra i d-yennulfan, mačči d izli i ɛerḍen yimdanen n lwilayat-nniḍen, ad cemten lwilaya-agi. Netta, limmer i d ak-terbiḥ ay ul, tili ad walin u ad iḥfiḍen ɣur-s. Ad steqsin ɣef lesrar i tt-yeǧǧan ad teṭṭef taqacucut-a, mačči d tiyata ara kkaten deg-s. Aya, ur d-yusi ara kan akka. Mačči d tunṭict n dduwla neɣ sɣur Rebbi i d-yekka. Ilaq ad ḥṣun d akken tawacult taqbaylit tettaǧǧa iman-is i laẓ i wakken ad terr akk ttawilat gar yifassen n warraw-is mi ara yeqqar. Tadrimt n tyemmatin, tettruḥu deg leqraya n warraw-nsent mačči deg ddheb neɣ deg lḥemmamat. Ɣer yinelmaden iqbayliyen, tarumit akked teglizit d tutlayin n tussna mačči d tutlayin n lkuffar. Akken qqaren ‘’Ɛezrayen s taɛrabt ara aɣ-d-yemmeslay asmi ara nemmet’’. Ɣer yinelmaden iqbayliyen, taɛrabt am tmaziɣt : yiwet nsen, tayeḍ ahat ad tt-ḥwiǧen. Ur uɣen ara awal i Mokri imi i as-yenna ‘’ilaq ur tettili ara tmaziɣt akked trumit deg uɣerbaz azzayri’’. Mi ara sɣaren yiselmaden inelmaden iqbayliyen timsirin iwulmen tameddit, wiyaḍ ṭṭalaben deg yinelmaden-nsen ad ẓẓalen, tthur akked lɛaser, deg tneɣrit. Mi ara ilin yidlisen gar yiffasen n yinelmaden iqbayliyen n Boudjima (Tasnawit tamezwarut deg lwilaya), wiyaḍ ad tafeḍ ‘’Incallah d maca allah’’ gar yicenfiren-nsen. Mi ara tili tanga (matière), ɣer wiyaḍ, ‘’Muqaddasa’’ , ɣer yinelmaden iqbayliyen, ttwalin kan coefficient-nni i tesɛa. Mi ara tafeḍ tisqemmu akked tdukliwin n tudrin n leqbayel heggant-d iselmaden i wat taddart-nsen seg lmeɣreb alamma d lɛica , wiyaḍ qqaren-as ‘’baɛda lɛica, ifɛel ma taca’’. Anect-a akk, yerna leqbayel kerhen aɣerbaz imi yeḥfa, ihi lukan ad yemsed wissen <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>d acu ara yeḍrun !? Twalaḍ ! 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine M. 

  
 Yuɣal-d wugur n lexsas n usafar n uyefki deg wakal akk n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Aṭas n tuddart i iḥuza lexsas-agi. Niqal ttawin-d tlata n tikkal i ddurt ayefki ɣer ugafa n tɣiwant-a, s Uqawej d asawen (azal n 5 n tuddar), yuɣal snat n tikkal i smana. Ma seg tazwara n waggur-agi, yuɣal ala yiwet n tikkelt i d-ittṣaḥen tama-a, d ayen yessewhamen n ssaḥ. Tikkelt-agi, qqimen yimezdaɣ n tuddart-agi azal n ddurt mebla ayefki, imi tikkelt taneggarut ideg i t-id-wwin ass-nni n ttlata n 10 deg waggur-agi n yennayer, armi d ass-nni n ttlata iεeddan 17 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Yerna ala tlata n tcelwiḍin i yal axxam, ama d win yesεan aṭas n lwacul, ama d win ur nesεi ara aṭas n dderya. Am waken, daɣen, llan yixxamen i yewwin, llan wiyaḍ ur wwin ara ula d tacelwiḍt. Annect-agi deg tallit n tegrest d cceda, ideg yettzidi uḍlab n usafar-agi. D ayen i ten-yeğğan ad d-ttaɣen ayefki n tebwaḍt, yecban «Candia» s 80 DA i yiwet n tebwaḍt, neɣ win-a n Llaḥḍa. Ssebat ugtent ma d tifrat ulac; tikkelt d lluzin i iḥebsen ɣef lxedma, tikkelt ulac asafar i d as-sexlaḍen i d-ttawin seg tmurt n Fransa, tayeḍ tayeḍ… Imezdaɣ n tɣiwant-agi, la ttrağğun s ccuq, melmi ara ad d-tili tulya n lluzin-nni tamaynut, yellan deg Tala Athmane. Ahat d tifrat i wugur-agi n lexsas n lɣella deg tḥuna n tɣiwant-a i ttiḥwiğin yal ass. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

<div> 
  
 Ɣef wakken i d-yenna yimḍebber amezwaru n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, Mass Tessa, ad tettunefk cciɛa Doctorat Honoris Causa i yicennayen Lounis Ait menguellet akked Lounes Matoub, deg useggas-agi 2017. ‘’Gar-aɣ d kra n lweqt, ad d-nheggi yiwet n temlilit d yinaẓuren anda ara d-yawi Ait Menguellet awal ɣef umecwar-is merra. Dinna ara nfares tagnit i wakken ad as-nefk Doctorat Honoris Causa i unaẓur-agi-nneɣ ameqqran. Ma d tin n Matoub Lounes, ad tili deg taggara n useggas-a deg-i nella’’, akka i d-yenna Mass Tessa ass-nni mi tebda temlilit tussnant ɣef umecwar n Ait Menguellet, i d-yellan deg tesdawit Lmulud At Mɛemmer n Tizi Uzzu, ussan n 6, 7 d 8 deg meɣres 2017. Timilit tagraɣlant iwumi fkan asentel ‘’Lewnis At Mangellat : 50 n yiseggasen n usnulfu. Timuɣliwin ɣef wazal n tmedyazt-is i tutlayt d tsekla d yidles ‘’, i yellan d taslaḍt ɣef tmedyazt n ucennay ameqqran. deg temlilit-a, aṭas n yisaragen i d-wwin yiselmaden n tesdawiyin ɣef tmedyazt n ucennay-agi ameqqran, ad nebder Pr Tigziri, Pr Mohand Akli Salhi, Mohand Akli Haddadou, Sadi kaci, Amar Nabti n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu. Lahoucine Bouaakoubi n tesdawit n Agadir deg Maruk, Thiziri Bachir n tesdwit n Lezzayer tamanaɣt. Yahia Sadouni n tesdawit n Tubiert. Habib Hami n tesdawit n Bgayet…atg. Awal yezzi s umata ɣef uzɣan aseklan n tmedyazt n Lewnis At Mengellat, idles d tgemmi deg tmedyazt n Lewnis, tazrawt n tutlayt deg tmedyazt n unaẓur-a, tazrawt taḍrisant d yinaw deg tmedyazt n Lewnis, asuɣel deg tmedyazt n Lewnis akked teslaḍt n uɣanib deg tmedyazt n ucennay-agi. Seg tama-nniḍen, ur d-llin ara yisaragen i d-tewwi ad xedmen niqal yisdawenen-agi : Said Chemakh, Hacène Hireche akked Tassadit Yacine. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Said Chemkh, d netta s timmad-is i ijebden iman-is deg temlilit-a. Ma d sin-nni-nniḍen, ur yelli kra n ssebba i d-ibanen ar tura. I usmekti, yella-d, yakan, usuter deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu i wakken ad as-tefk Doctorat Honoris Causa i Lewnis At Mengellat deg temlilit-a. Meɛna ayagi ur d-yelli ara imi ulac-it deg wahil n temlilit asmi i t-xedmen, akka i aɣ-d-tenna Pr Tigziri mi tt-nesteqsa. Asuter-agi, yella-d ɣef uqerruy-is Mass Chemakh, aselmad des tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine Moula  

 
  
 Yal ass tamaziɣt tettaked amaynut , d agamu agejdan di tmetti , deg taddart n Uwrir Akfadu tuli tmenzit ilmend n tejmilt i yal ameɣmas yellan deg umussu adelsan neɣ yedda di lǧerra-s , d amaru , d amedyaz, d aneɣmas , d asertic , neɣ seg widak i yellan d imezwura i yesɣersen snesla n tatut , gar-asen Khelifa Amaziɣ , adrum At yidir tawacult Ihdan , anda yebda amennuɣ deg useggas n 1970 ugar n 46 n yiseggasen d asuɣu ilmendad n tutlayt ad tuɣal d tunsibt. Deg ungalus-is, adeg uwumi qqaren Mazku anda laln din yizuray n tirekkisent , yebna aẓayer n tmaziɣt anda yura fell-as tilelli ,asmekti,d tugdut, d izerfan , asenseb di tmendawt… Usan-d yinebgawen n yiseɣ akken ad tili tfugla i usbedad-a anda i d-rzan iselmaden n Tmaziɣt gar-asen Mohand Aklit , Azedine Achoui , imedyazen anda yella Khellaf Oudjedi , Hakim Ferkiwi , inaẓuren , imeɣnasen, tella-d daɣen tɣamsa n tira la dépêche de Kabylie , d ilemẓiyen iḥemmlen tutlayt akken daɣen ad agmen amezruy , tasekla, gar-asen Massi Seddaoui ….d wiyaḍ.Yella-d akken iwata s ddeqs n tezmert i yemmug , dacu d asdig i umezruy-nneɣ, d asmekti , d asuɣ , d tajmilt ….

<p style="text-align: right;">   Azedine Abdous 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Seg tazwara n wayyur-a n yunyu bdan yisteqsiyen n yikayaden ttqabalen inelmaden n yiɣricen ineggura n yal aswir akken ad d-inin yigmaḍ ɣer taggara anwa yuklalen ad ibeddel aɣerbaz deg umaḍal d amaynut anwa uhu. Akken neẓra, yella-d ttiɛad amezwaru akked warrac n useggas wis semmus deg uswir amenzu ass n 2 deg yunyu. Syin akkin, tewweḍ-d nnuba n yisnawanen i yesɛeddan ABAK ass n 7 deg yunyu. Cwiṭ n wakud ɣer sdat, seg 14 ɣer 16 deg yunyu, ttwaseqfen yikayaden n taggara n useggas sɣur warrac n uswir alemmas i yesɛeddan akayad n taggara n tɣuri. Maca tura mi kfan yikayaden amek i ten-walan wid terza taluft? Daymi dɣa i ten-nesteqsa ɣef tmuɣliwin-nsen i d-ibanen dakken ur mgerradent aṭas. Maca deg wayen yerzan imeẓyanen, skud ala kraḍ n tangiwin (matières) i sɛeddan, i yellan d tusnakt, tafransist akked teɛrabt, kra n wid nesteqsa nnan-d dakken akayad-nsen yeshel d aman, dɣa ass n 17 seg yunyu i asen-d-rran igmaḍ deg internet. Maca seg uswir alemmas d asawen ur ssefraḥent tmuɣliwin i aɣ-d-yettwannan, inelmaden n useggas wis ukuẓ walan tuttriwin i asen-d-yettunefken qellunt d aqlaw. «Nekk seg tama-s ur ufiɣ ara aṭas n wuguren akken ad d-rreɣ i yisteqsiyen n ukayad s umata ɣas ma weɛren, maca akk inelmaden ttmeslayen ɣef wayen i d-yusan dakken ur as-zmiren». I aɣ-d-tenna tnelmadt A. Sawsa. Yuɣ lḥal, d tamawt yettemcabin i nufa ɣur wid yesɛeddan akayaḍ n UBAK, imi dɣa ddeqs seg-sen i yesḥassfen seg tuɛert n yisteqsiyen aseggas-a, almi i tt-gezmen di rray kra belli ma wwin-t-id d tamkerra (miracle) i yeḍran, mačči d kra nniḍen. Wiyaḍ sekren-d kra n lhul gar-asen seg tuccḍiwin i d-yellan aseggas-a deg kra n tangiwin am teɛrabt ed tefransist, ladɣa imi ugaden belli annect-nni ur as-yettwamaggay ara leḥsab ass n useɣti (correction). «Akayad n BAK ulac win ara d-yinin yeshel, rnu daɣen ulac win izemren ad yeḍmen seg tazwara arbaḥ neɣ d axsar axaṭer tikwal deg-s ula d zzher». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n usnawan i yesɛeddan akayad-a n BAK netta yettbin deg wallen-is iḥar almi dayen melmi ara d-wayeḍ wass n 10 deg yulyu ideg ara d-rren igmaḍ s wudem unsib.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Amarir agraɣlan adzayri, Nabil Bentaleb, la yetturaren deg Tottenham, yezmer lḥal ad t-tawi Paris St German, ay yellan d talɣuɣt n Fṛansa, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna tɣemsa tadigant.

 Ussan-a, Bentaleb ur yemsefham ara d tmehla n teɣlamt n Tottenham ay la yetturaren deg Premier League (Tamɣunt Tamezwarut) n Langliz, imi taɣlamt-a mazal-itt tugi ad as-ternu

 deg lexlaṣ. Ɣef waya, amarir-a (yesɛan 20 n yiseggasen) la yettxemmim ad yeddu ad yurar anda niḍen, ula ma leɛqed-nnes d teɣlamt-a n London ad yeqqim arma d 2018. Aṭas n teɣlamin, am tin n Arsenal (Langliz) d Juventus (Ṭṭalyan) ay yebɣan ad awint amarir-a ay d-ilulen deg temdint tafṛensist n Lille, ɣefwakken ay d-tenna tɣemsa yemmuzzgen (yetxeṣṣeṣen). Bentaleb yurar 35 n temliliyin deg tsemhuyt-a deg teɣlamt n Tottenham, yerna yessadef yiwen n yiswi, am wakken ay yesɛedda takurt snat n tikkal i ussidef n yiswi. Amarir-a d amḥaddi n tlemmast yerna ass n lḥedd ad yebdu annan d teɣlamt taɣelnawt n Ldzayer akken ad uraren d Seychelles deg 13 Yunyu deg Leblida deg ukatar n wass amezwaru n temliliyin n waffas n Teqbuct n Tefriqt n yiɣlanen (CAN-2015).

<p style="text-align: right;"> NSL 

  
 Iberdan xeṣren, ččuren d iḥemalen n waman, aluḍ yessa, abruri « yesderbik » deg lqermud,, issafen ttfeggiḍen, aḍu yettṣuḍu,…s wayagi i d-yegla unaɣur n wass-nni n larbɛa i ɛeddan deg tama n Ṣummam. Imezdaɣ n tama-agi ur walan ara ageffur iǧehden am-agi. Igenni « yeqqarṣ-d » d yimurar n tmiqwa n waman d webruri. Din din, iberdan, ifergan n yixxamen ččuren d-aman n-ugeffur. Aṭaṣ n yixxamen kecmen-ten waman, yiwḍen nnig n 30 isentimitren! Medden trekb-iten tugdi, yagi imi ẓran igenni « yeqqars-d » d-aman. As tini-ḍ d-iḥemmalen, d-icercuren. Kra kan n dqayeq, ddunnit amzun teɣreq deg waman n-ugeffur. Iberdan uɣalen as tini-ḍ d-issafen, ur yezmir ara wemdan aten izger. Tikli n ṭunubilat teḥbes deg kra n yimukan, am Allaɣen, i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Tazmalt. Deg taddart-agi maḥsub lḥemla tettili myal tikkelt ad d-tiwwet ugeffur. Mi d-yerna webruri, medden ttaṭafen iɛebbaḍ nsen, acku ẓran belli ixeddem aṭaṣ n lmaḍerra, ama i yixxamen neɣ i tfellaḥt. Cwi, ixxamen menɛen, ulac wid yeɣlin akken i neẓra, maca azemmur yettwaɣ, ma nenna-d tidett kan. Akka, azemmur nni azegzaw, neɣ ammetur, yeɣli s waṭaṣ seddaw tzemrin. Dayen yeǧǧan medden nuɣnan ɣef ayagi. Ma yella ad rnun igeffuren nniḍen a win n larebɛa iɛeddan, ɛla ḥsab ayagi, azemmur ad yeɣli « akkit » ! Dayen ur nessaram ara. Dacu kan, aman i d-yeɣlin seg yigenni dayen yessefraḥen aṭaṣ, ɣas akkeni tella lmaḍerra deg uzemmur. Necfa-d aseggas-nni iɛeddan, imi akal yeqqur azal n waṭaṣ n wagguren, acku igenni « icuḥ » i waman-is! Aseggas-agi, ur ɛad ur d-yekcim umawan neɣ laxrif, tebda lahwa tekkat s ṭaqa. S wakka, tafellaḥt atterf-d iman-is, attili ṣaba, ama d-irden, d ttimẓin, d-igumma neɣ d-izegza, ma tkemmel akka ad yelhu useggas n tfellaḥt ma yebɣa wenẓar !<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: center;"> Aheggi n urekti 

 Rwi lfarina , ssmid akked yiɣes deg yiwet n lḥila. Di lḥila tis snat , rwi timellalin , ssker , lmelḥ , alamma yefsi ssker , ternuḍ-as zzit akked uyefki , sniger ɣur-s s llim . Mi ihegga, smir-as isufar-nni imezwura ( lfarina , awren , iɣes ) rwi-t akken yessefk, eǧǧ-it ad yers

 5’. Sakin smir-it ɣer lqaleb i tdehneḍ uqbel s wudi neɣ s zzit. Err-it ɣer lkuca ad yew azal n 30’ (alamma yuɣal d zeggaɣ s ufella. Sima ad yew, err aman, ssker , akked llim , ad awlen alamma neqsen waman ad yuɣal d sirru , eǧǧ-it ad yismiḍ. Mi yewwa ugaṭu, sureg-as sirru nni s ufella. Gzem-it d iḥricen. S tezmert-n(k)wen(t)

<p style="text-align: right;"> S ɣur Daya 

  
 Tamenametiw( sociologue) n yidles , tamnadit  deg  inumak n tudert n yimesdurar ,  fanny Colonna,tewwi-tt tmattent ass n tlata n ddurt yezrin . Tesɛa 80 n yisaggasen di lɛemer-is mi d tegger nehta tanaggarut.  Fanny  t-lluled di tmurt n Lẓẓayer imi imawlan-is rassen leqrar di tmurt-a di lqern siw 19 di tamnaḍt n Lewris.

   Tulemda-ines tasdawit akked d inadiyen-ines yezwaren uqbel , fkan-d tbut   ɣef telqay n tmusni tesɛa ɣef timeti taẓẓayrit akked idles aɣerfan ines. D netta-t is yellan di  lmendad i yedlsen-agi:  «  “iselmaden iẓẓiriyen gar 1889-1939 / »Instituteurs algériens: 1883-1939», “ imusnawen d yifalḥen, abruy n umezruy ameti ɣef Lẓẓayer/ Savants et paysans: éléments d’histoire sociale sur l’Algérie rurale », « bab n tisirt , lexwan akked umcum : timedurin n yal-ass deg Wawras di lqern wis XX/ Le Meunier, les moines et le bandit : des vies quotidiennes dans l’Aurès du XXe siècle », am wakken tella diɣ deffir n waṭas n yeḍrisen n tusna . Fannu Colonna tezdi ixef-is akked iḥulfan-is ɣer temeti deg id tekker s yiwet n tmuɣli tasdawant yesnan amek yega unar.a Leqdic-is yezwi   tiyerwas  akked  uqlileḥ  ur d nettawi. Kra tura  yussa-d  d leɛnaya i wid yebɣan ad gzin   amek t-tteddu timeti-nneɣ, ɣef acu tbedd,  anwi id  ilugan ɣef yer-s umtedu-ines.Tidi n lmux-is, yezdin  ṭelqa-s ɣer leqdic  n yimusnawen  am M’hamed Boukhobza, Liabès, Jacques Berque, Abdelkader Djeghloul, Pierre Bourdieu, Mouloud Mammeri, tella d terga id yewwin timeqwa n unerni i tmusniwn   yeɛnan amdan am « l’anthropologie  tadelsanit » ɣef tmurt n lẓẓayer. 

 Taɣuri n yidlisen-is, ɣef amek yella wudem n tmeɛict deg idurar akked tudrin n tmurt di tazwara n lqern wis 20,  yelli-id abrid akken ad yilli weḍris  slqis ɣef tazwara n tmedurt n Fanny Collona netta-t yesdukel leqdic akked umusnaw n tmurt n Leqbayel Mouloud Mammeri. Yuɣ lḥal texdem yiwen ugemmir( thèse) ɣef umyaru Mouloud Féraoun. Adlis-ines 

 « Instituteurs algériens: 1883-1939 » d yiwen unadi n « duktura  ahric wis qrad »  (doctorat de 3e cycle) texdem  ddew leɛnaya  Pierre Bourdieu id tefser di Lpari deg useggas n 1975. Yezdi-tt leqdic akked Mouloud Mammeri deg useggas n 1969 asmi yuɣal d anemhal n CRAPE. Asmi yemmut Mouloud Mammeri Fanny tera-as tajmilt s yiwen uḍris yeččuren d lmeɛna  id yefɣen deg tesɣunt «  tegrawla tafriqit/ révolution africaine » deg uṭun-is id yefɣen ass n 21 avril 1989. Adiris yella-d ddew yiwen uzwal : « ay ɛasas n lefjer..vous quiguettez l’aube ».

<p style="text-align: right;"> Nait Messaoud Amar/ tasuqilt Ait Slimane Hamid

  
 Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, d uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεmmer n temdint-agi d umaruz-is n Azazga, axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, tazeqqa n ssinima n Tizi Uzzu. S tallelt n waṭas n yimεiwnen yecban: aɣerbaz amniḍan n tẓurin iffazen n Azazga, tasqamut n leqdicat idelsan d wid n tẓuri, asalay n Sétif…atg. Suddsen-d iḍelli d wass-a d uzekka (07-08-09) deg maggu 2017, kra n leqdicat idelsanen swayes i d-smektan tidyanin d twaɣiyin n 08 maggu 1945. Yella-d leqdica-agi deg uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu, iḍelli n lḥed 7 maggu, deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin tella-d temsikent akked tezrigin n yidlisen yerzan amezruy, tella-d diɣ temsikent n yimagraden n tɣamsa, tugniwin….atg. Ma deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun, yella-d usenɛet n sin n yisura n trad, amezwar ɣef 10h s uzwel “La dechirure” ma d wis sin ɣef 14h00 s uzwel “Aqraḥ n tektut”. Ma d ass-agi, tella-d dima deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin yiwet n temsikent akked tezrigin n yidlisen yerzan amezruy, tella-d diɣ temsikent n yimagraden n tɣamsa, tugniwin….atg. Tella-d daɣen tin n yimuhal n yinelmaden n uɣerbaz amniḍan n tẓurin iffazen n Azazga. Am wakken diɣen i d-tella temsiken n ttsawer d yidlisen n Mass Mohamed Attaf. Ma deg tzeqqa n umezgun tameẓyant yella-d yiwen n usarag ɣef 8 maggu, sɣur yiwen kar wid it-yeddren. Ikemmel leqdic-agi deg uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, s tutart n yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun yesɛan assaɣ akked umezruy n tmurt, ula deg tazeqqa n ssinima n Tizi Uzzu yella-d usenɛet n usaru-nni “L’autre 08 MAI 1945”. Ma d umaruz n uxxam n yidles n Azazga, ad ismekti azekka tidyanina-agi, s temsikent akked tezrigin n yidlisen yerzan amezruy, d tin n yimagraden n tɣamsa, tugniwin….atg. D tɣuri n yisefra n tegrawla, sɣur aṭas n yimedyazen n tama-agi, ɣer taggara ad d-yili usenɛet n usaru-nni “Aqraḥ n tektut”

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Tuɣalin ɣer uɣerbaz i yinelmaden lakked yiselmaden ad d-tili ass n ačer 6 deg Cutember id itteddu-n. Ɣas akka, mazal kra n wussan kan i unekcum ɣer iɣerbazen, tiwaculin, yagi inelmaden, bdan aheggi, ama d-ayen yaɛnan iselsa neɣ isufar n leqraya. Deg tama n Ṣummam, « rriḥa » n-uɣerbaz tebda tettriḥi deg berdan. Timedlisin (Les librairies) bdan-t akkeni aheggi n yisufar n leqraya akken ad qablen-t imectariyen ar ad yilin s waṭaṣ ussan imezwura n tuɣalin ɣer iɣerbazen. D-acu kan, ɣef akken i neẓra deg t’medlisin, isufar n leqraya zad-ent cwiya ssumat nsen. Ama d tizmamin (Les cahiers), iqraben (Les cartables), idlisen, akked wiyaḍ…Tiwaculin, zran-t d-acu iten-t yettraǧu-n deg tallit-agi. Ẓran-t daɣen, ssumat n yisufar rnan-t kra. Ɣef ayagi, ttaṭafen-t iɛebbaḍ nsen-t, acku aṭaṣ n tedrimt ad d-tessufɣen-t deg unekcum-agi ɣer yiɣarbazen. Akka, tifamilin-agi i d-yefɣen « ttureycen-t » deg waggur n Remḍan d lɛid amectuḥ yezrin, mazal ad « ttureycen-t », sya ɣer kra n wussan, deg unekcum ɣer yiɣerbazen! Dayenni, ur zmiren-t ara…! Leɣla n yisufar n wučči rnu wid n leqraya, ahat-ent tiwaculin ɣer da, ttwaṭṭefen-t deg ugerǧum ! Aḥellil ! Win yesɛan deg wexxam-is nnig n 3 warraw ad iɛewweq amek ar ay-ixdem yidsen akken aten-isseč, aten-issels asen d-yaɣ isufar n lakul ! Ɣas akken tella « lmuɛawana » n ddula, tinna n 3000 idinaren i uqerru, maca ur d-keffu ara. Daɣen, imḍebren ttɛeṭṭilen akken aten-t ferqen ɣef twaculin yeḥwaǧen! Tallit-agi ideg i nella tuɛar i twaculin, yagi imi yuder lbiṭrul s waṭaṣ, acku tamurt nneɣ yes i tettidir ! Ass mi ar ad kecmen warrac ɣer yiɣerbazen, kra n snat smanat kan ad d-tyaweḍ lɛid amuqran. Dagi daɣen tiwaculin ttuḥetmen-t, i tikkelt nniḍen, ad gren-t ifassen ɣer leǧyub nsen-t « yeflan », akken ad ǧebden-t kra n tedrimt id asen-t id yeqqimen bacakken ad d-taɣen-t ikerri n lɛid, ma yella zemren-t-as, neɣ mulac kra n lkiluwat buksum akken ad ɛeyden-t! Akka ihi, uɣalen wussan ṣaɛben aṭaṣ i twaculin deg tama-agi n Ṣummam, neƔ akk di t’murt s-umata. Ussan n tmerkantit kfan ay at laɛrad, yugrad kan aden-aɣ ibugas akken an ẓeyyar ɣef iɛebbaḍ nneɣ yaxwan. Aḥellil, aḥellil !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y.  

  
 Youva Akfadou d ilemẓi i yellan di tlalit ass 17 Dujember 1994 deg tɣiwant Ukeffadu taddart At Ʃmara tawacult Yazid. Yekker-d deg udrum n tẓuri anda yella bab-as Yidir Akfadu d win ijebden amrar ugar n 40 yiseggasen ,gma-s Baylache d anaẓur i yufraren s ccna yugten d tahuski d yinefrayen , ula d netta yufa tagnit , seg wasmi yella d agrud mi yesɛa deg uwtay-is 08 n yiseggasen yelmmed aẓawan d wurar ɣef walalen ad d-nebder ardin (Mondole) , snitra (guitare , synthé percussion.. dɣa yella d amẓawan anda yurar i waṭas n yinaẓuren gar-asen : Kaci Boussaàd , Louiza , Akfadou , Slimane Amnay… Syin yebda iteddu d baba-as akken qqaren : wis ur nessin abrid yeḍfer lǧerra” anda ires uḍar n bab-as ula d netta ires , icennu deg yirmad idelsanen xersum di tama n Tizi Wezzu, deg useggas 2011 yexdem yiwet n tezlit icebḥen iselben arrac s wawalen i yettaken azwu i wul yugsen , d imeṭṭi , d leḥmala , d lxiq , d tafuɣalt , tin yefka azwel (Ayen it-xedmeḍ) , yes-s i yelli taɣda n tẓuri-s ,icerreg illel uẓawan , ula d tigrarin ixdem-as s tugniwin yuglen d cbaḥa anda i yella Farid Toutou ɣer tama useḍru ,yexdem abrug di tiliẓri taɣelnaw n tmaziɣt ,di Berbére Tv , di tesgilin yerzan imesli anda iԑedda-d di tedwilt n Mrehba , di radyu Summam gar yineɣmasen Nada , Fathi Melloul , yexdem abrug daɣen deg umaṭṭaf wis sin aɣelnaw , gar tezlatin n tesgilt yewwi arraz deg temzizlet , almad yezga s idis-is anda yebda yettaru tamedyazt yesεan asdig , anamek , iḥulfan , telqay , deg userkeb uẓawan d tizmilin yersen ɣef yal awal d yal asekkil, deg 2015 yerna-d tinzizt tis snat deg uḍebsi n baba-s Asmekti anda llant deg-s 08 tezlatin , yerna-d ayla-s Sabrina anda itt-yessekles di Tizi Wezzu ɣer imsekles Bouzid Ouhemou , d tanafust-is n tayri , d tanubi-s ,.. deg usayes ḥemmlent akk yimsefliden acku zedwa tezga teḥma ,, d tawrikt i d-yettaken agamu unaẓur , s tezlit-a iɛedda-d di tesgilt n Klik dagi sɣur Moumouh Oudiai. Syin yebda asenfar-is anda yessekles 11 n tezlatin yemgaraden iɣenniben , ccḍeḥ d uslig i tmeɣriwin d wiyaḍ,mxalafen isental deg-s ad d-naf ( tayri , tiɣri n yilemẓi , asirem , …gar tenziztin Ssifa-m d azwel i uḍebsi ,Leḥmala n temẓi , Tizlit-agi i kemmini, Lvisa , Tragit ,Yeǧǧa-kem lḥal , texdaɛ-iyi tayri , rrwaḥ, ayen it-xedmeḍ , Sabrina ..tazeqqa usekles tella-d di tddala n Yidurar (Kaci boussaàd) d mmi-s i yellan d imsekles , d amẓawan Kaci Mastia d ilemẓi i d-yekkren netta d Youva , d atamten , d tarwa n tẓuri , anda llan yimdukkal-is fkan-as-d tallelt akken ad d-iḥerkel uḍebsi-a n ccna anda yella Azeghough Nordine , Sofiane Taghzout , Boubekeur , Syfaxe Braik… afaris ad yili s tmeẓragt n Mélody + (Lounis Meziani) , deg unekcum n Mayyu ad d-yessien ɣer ssuq s wudem icebḥen , lqayen , igerrzen ,xersum di tsemhuyt n tefsut anda tayri teggar-d iɣallen ,asenfar-a n Youva d izen i yimarayen , d ageldun n tsusmi , d amahil anda yella deg-s wayen yesswan , d asɣun i ccna n teqbaylit , d ajgu i tgejdidt n ccna ,yessewjad I tfsakiwn d yibarazen di waggur n remḍan i yellan deg uswir aɣelnaw, i win yebɣan ad t-yissin ugar yella usebtar-is di ttawil n facebook (Juba Akfadou» Youva») . Youva Akfadou d anaẓur ikesben tawrikt yellin ɣer wid it-iḥemmlen, d udem yeččuren d asrad ,d ccna ,timeḍḍirt-is d tazmamt n tumert ,d aktay , d ayen yettcruruqen ,d tiregwa n tẓuri. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Azedine Abdous 

  
 Ɛni taluft-a tetturaǧu ad tili seg waṭas d aseggas-aya, imi dɣa i d-yeggra umaḍal yeḥsel deg unnerni s tazzla n yiguda seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ. Seg wannect-a, ɣas ma tal taɣiwant deg Tmurt n Yezwawen tesɛa aɣilif-a yesnuzgumen n uhicur ed uḍegger-nsen, maca llant kra n temnaḍin, kra n tuddar, kra n tɣiwanin ideg i d-iban wugur-a yesmeḥḥin xilla ugar n tiyaḍ rnu ibeddel tudert n yimezdaɣ akken ur tt-ssaramen maḍi. Amedya n ugudu n tdayra n Uweqqas i d-yezgan azal n 22 n yikilumiṭren seg waɣir n Bgayet, llan dɣa wid i as-yessawalen «agudu n lɛib», seg wakken yuɣal iseggasen-a ineggura d aqqa aberkan n Uweqqas ucbiḥ. Ameslay ɣef ugudu-ya drus-as ahat kra n yijurriḍen, imi ilsawen llan qqaren, mazal ttinin ur kfin. Amek uhu netta mara d-yaweḍ yiwen anda yettwaḍeggar ugudu-nni n Uweqqas sdat n teftist, ur yezmir ad n-yeǧǧ deg ubrid zziǧan n tkerrust ldin ma ulac ad d-yerr iẓerman-is, ma neẓra belli lfuḥa neɣ taziffurt i d-yekkaten syinna d tin i ur zmiren ad qeblen yinzaren, aniɛad amdan anehhar, aḥewwas neɣ amerray. «Yal mara d-awḍeɣ deg umḍiq-nni anda ttnejmiɛen yiguda sgumaɣ ad qableɣ almi meddleɣ ṭṭaq tikwal. Nessaram ad as-d-afen yimḍebbren tifrat s uɣsab». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n yilemẓi anehhar ɣef taluft-a.

  Ula d wid n Suq Letnin ceɣben iɣermanen 

 Ma yella ayen yessefqiɛen deg ugudu n Uweqqas d lfuḥa-nni i yettcabin ɣer tegnit n yimelyan n yimurdusen, tin n tɣiwant n Suq Letnin yella ucettki fell-as ladɣa seg wayen i d-tettawi srid d timḍerrit i twennaḍt : imi seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ mara sserɣen wid terza taluft iguda-ya, mačči kan d tiqraḥ ay d-rennun i ugama yellan din, maca daɣen d ddiq n twennaḍt i ssimɣuren. War ma nesha acewwel i d-yettwanulfayen i at tikeryas i d-yettɛeddayen syinna, deg leǧwahi n Yiderginen, mi d-ttafen abbu annect-ilat deg ubrid n tikli. D tidet, ur nuḥent ass-a waṭas n tbuda (solutions) tama n umdan, maca yewwi-d tili imasayen (responsables) ɛerḍen xersum ad suddsen tilufa, ad qeɛden iqeddicen n ujmaɛ ed tukksa n yiguduyen-a.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi  

  
 Asmi, tlata n yirgazen seg yimezwura n Ugemmun, Abdelkrim, Ḥeggun d Aεmer bɣan ad d-zuren Sidi Mḥed Wehlal, bdan, ttmeslayen gar-asen. Yenna-as Aεmer: ‘’a wi yeččan tacebbaḍt, ara d-ggent tlawin-nsen!’’ Inṭaq-d Abdekbir ittafgen: ‘’wi izṛan tilawin-nsen’’. Nnan-as: ‘’i kečč a Ḥeggu? D acu i tebɣiḍ ?’’. Yenna-as: ‘’nekk bɣiɣ ad d-ẓureɣ, ad d-awiɣ lbaraka i warraw-iw’’. Netta Sidi Mḥed Wehlal, isseɛlem-as Rebbi. Tilawin n At Hlal d timrabḍin ḥejjbent, ur tteffɣent ara. Mi d-wwḍen s At Hlal, ifraḥ yis-sen, yenna-asen : ’’mreḥba, lɛeslama-nwen’’. Inna i tlawin : ‘’sewwemt tacebbaḍt ha-ten-in usan-d zziyar’’. Ta tetteg, ta tesewwa, yal yiwet teɛna cɣel-is. Alammi yewwa, ceyyɛent aqcic ɣer baba-tsent, nnant-as : ‘’ha-t-a yewjed lqewt’’. Iruḥ-d, inna-yasent: ‘’awimt-tt-id kunemmti, ta ad d-tawi lqewt, ta ad d-tawi aman’’. Nnant-as :’’ amek ara neqdec sdat zziyar, yak nekennti nḥejjeb ?’’. Yenna-asent: ‘’a yess-i, tmeẓremt di tbaḍnit, ad tɛiwdemt di tḍahrit’’. Ruḥent s tergagit, sersent lqewt d waman sdat zziyar, uɣalent. Zzeyyar ččan alammi ṛwan, nnan ḥemdullah, sersen tiɣenǧawin. Issawel-asent i yessi-s, yenna-asent: ‘’ṛwaḥumt, ad tawimt ijeqduren-agi’’. Ddment ijeqduren-nni, kkrent ad uɣalent inna-asent: ‘’beddemt, teslemt’’. Izzi ɣer wid-nni, inna-asen: ‘’A win issutren tacebbaḍt, teččiḍ, terwiḍ! Fkiɣ-ak lεella, ad tetteḍ ur trewwiḍ, ad txeddmeḍ ur tɛeyyuḍ. A win issutren tamuɣli, ha-tent-in wali-tent! Ruḥ, tekkseḍ sser ɣef yess-i, fkiɣ-ak leɛma u lekḥel’’.I kečč a Wḥeggu tssutreɣ lbaraka! Fkiɣ-ak lbaraka deg warraw-ik, ggiɣ-ak am ubelluḍ n uɣanim, mi iruḥ ad iqqar, ad d-ixlef, ad d-ikker’’. Iḥya-k lḥeg, win issutren tamuɣli, tarrawt-is, ffɣen d d iderɣalen. Win issutren učči, ayen ččan, ur iban ara fell-asen. Ttmettaten ɣef uɛebbuḍ-nsen. Ma d win issutren lbaraka, amur-is iburket, inerna. Mi ikcem anda llant yessi-s, yufa-tent ttrunt. yenna-asent: ‘‘ruḥemt, win i kent-iɛuzzen, d tigellalin, ma ulac d tiklalin. Anda ara tḥejbemt ur tesɛumt ara dderya”.

 Yeǧǧa-d awal, qqaren:

 A wer tesɣar

 A wer tedden, a wer teẓẓal

 Ur tḥeǧǧeb, ur nseḥjab.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 yella-d taggara-a umaynut deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, i d-yezgan s wazal n 70 n yikilumitren ɣef waɣir n Bgayet. Icudd waya ɣer umaḍal n tkeryas d yinehharen. D taɣsert n sserbis (station services) tamaynut, tamezwarut deg umezruy i yettwasbedden deg tmiḍt n Ayt Smaɛel. Ulama seg tama n twennaḍt, mačči d ayen yelhan mi yettnernay wayen akk yesluɣayen agama, seg tama n tdamsa d wakud d ayen ara yesferḥen merra iseqdacen n ubrid n twilayt wis 06 i iɛeddan seg Ayt Smaɛel, yettawi ɣer Buɛendas deg Seṭṭif, atg. Dɣa, gar-aneɣ d kra n wakud ad tebdu teɣsert-a n sservis leqdic-is imi ttesriḥ yeffeɣ-d yakan. D isalli i d-yernan tumert i yinehharen, ladɣa wid n temnaḍt n Ayt Smaɛel, imi ḥsan dakken d ccɣel ara d-yefken tirni n ubaɣur. Ara yesbeɣsen ahat imezdaɣ-nniḍen ad gren deg yisenfaren iwumi i zemren i wakken taddart, ad tesɛu merra ttawilat n tudert i ixussen. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli aṭas-aya segmi yetturaǧu beddu n usexdem n teɣsert-a, maca ar tura urɛad i d-yella waya ɣef ssebba n kra n wuguren i d-yemlal bab-is. Ladɣa seg tama n tedbelt (administration).

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Annect-a yella-d deg ukemmel n wahil n uqeddic i tesɛa d tannumi Tdukkla Mgal Aṭṭan n Ufelluj (myopathie) n Bgayet, i yettwaẓẓan deg Tezmalt, ed ɣef uqerru-ines tamsiwt i yuklalen annuz, ta d Nura Ayt Ɛebderreḥman. Deg yiwen n wulɣu, tella tessawel tdukkla-ya i yimuḍan-is akken ma llan ma tekcem-asen deg ul ad ilin di ttiɛad n uḥewwes i temnaḍt n Tala Xaled deg tɣiwant n Uweqqas, aɣir n Bgayet, s urray n tririt ma d ih, akked uxelles n ssuma tameẓyant, tazamulant, n 200 n yidinaren.

 Asihar-a d win yebdan ass n aram 4 deg ɣuct, ad idum alama d 14 n yiwen n wayyur. Deg teɣzi n 10 n wussan ihi, ad izmiren yimeɛḍar-a, i ur nteffeɣ aṭas n tikkal deg useggas, ad farsen tagnit n temlilit akked yimdukkal, imuḍan ed yiɛeggalen n tdukkla, tirzi i teftisin ed ucuccef, tuffɣiwin n yiḍ ɣer yimeḍqan igerrzen, akked wurar daɣen n tigzi, i yetturaǧun ad d-yettwaheggi deg uɣerbaz anda i qeɛɛden iman-nsen, snusuyen. Ilaq ad d-nini dakken ssaramen akk yiɛeggalen n tdukkla-ya ad tili temgerrad ulama cwiṭ temlilit n useggas-a ɣef tinna n yilindi deg Tala n Uɣanim ideg i d-iban ladɣa lexsas ameqqran n waman. Maca tikkelt-a, ɣef wawal n tselwayt n tdukkla i d-nebder, yettwadma ad tili tegnit temgerrad seg waṭas n tamiwin. «Yezmer ad yili usikel n useggas-a deg Tala Xaled yugar winna n yilindi deg Tala n Uɣanib, ladɣa imi amḍiq anda ara neggan yeshel i wawwaḍ, asečču daɣen meqqer. Rnu-yas aman i inuḥen xir n yilindi mi ncaha tiqqit». I aɣ-d-tberreḥ Nura Ayt Ɛebderreḥman.

 Deg wussan-a ikennfen, ed tseddarin yessefsayen, tagnit ad tili d tin igerrzen nezzeh i yimdanen-a yuḍnen, i tfekka ed wallaɣ, ma ɛnan tiftisin n Uweqqas i ucuccef ed uttfaci, skud amlaqi-ya asdukklan yettuɣal-d kan yiwet n tikkelt i useggas deg unebdu. Awi-d ukan ad ḥulfun s urtaḥ ed tumert, wid umi d-yemmug wahil n usihar-a. Ad d-nesmekti dakken tidukkla-ya d tin i d-yennulfan 15 n tefsutin ɣer deffir, yettusemma deg useggas n 2001.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Seg assen ideg d-teɣli  gar ifassen-iw tebrat-nni iyi-d-tuzneḍ  nek simmal ttɛawedeɣ-as taɣuri. Ɣri-tt ass-a d yiḍelli. Ideli d seld iḍeli. Assegas-a d-yilindi. Ilendi  d seld ilendi. Iban ad  tt-ɣreɣ azekka d seld azekka. Nek nwiɣ gzin-tt yizwawayen iyi-ccuban. Meɛna yal mi ara s-ɛiwdeɣ leqraya, ttafeɣ ziɣ aṭas n wayen i d-tennid i iɛeddan nnig lfhem inu. Ttwehimeɣ ayen?

 Nek ɣileɣ taqbaylit yiwet … meɛna xas taqbaylit yiwet  yal wa amek yesefti imayag -ines. Nekk ɣileɣ tamuɣli yiwet… meɛna ziɣ yal wa s anida wahent wallen-is. Tikwal xas nettemlaɛi ziɣen i wakken kan yal  wa ad yesdelweḥ lxaṭer–is s imeslayen yettazalen deg immi-s. Tiɛazegt mačči d yiwen i d udem-is. Taggara-agi izwawen ḥemlen  tufra n uɣyul deg utemu.

 Tthuzuɣ aqeruy-iw mi ara ɣreɣ ayen i d-tenniḍ: “Eğğ timucuha n zik i yat zik ; nekni d arraw n wass-a, ass-a deg irgazen  ulin s aggur rsen deg-s, ass-a deg isufag semliliyen tamurt ɣer tmurt, ass-a deg yiwet n takurt tezmer ad tzebbwa tamdint tameqqrant deg usmenɣer n tiṭ.”… Izwawayen  yellan am nekini dessen… ur d-cliɛen ara deg tmucuha yesiǧhiden timadit. Deg isefra yeswayen iman. Deg inzan yettqawiten tidmi. Ur d cliɛen ara deg uẓar i d-jebden lliqa n tilin i yixef seg ul n wakal anda i d-nefruri. Ass-a izwawayen lhem-nsen d- innig ɣer timura tijenṭad akken ad mettren din alqim n ddel. Ass-a lhem-nsen d asermimec i tullas akken ad grirben yisen-t ɣer timdewa n leɣrur. Ass-a…  d yir assen…yenqedwa laṣel .. yebbertex ɣef yir anu…

 Tthuzuɣ aqerruy-iw yal mi ara d-mektiɣ amek ilaq asen-iniɣ  i yimxfaf-agi yesmenyafen tili ɣef tadla : “ Tamusni tekka nnig teswiεin. Ur ttilit ara ay imedhac d arrac yessedhec uclawa, yesmenyafen arelluc aberreqmuc i yiṭṭij ireqqen neɣ i wewreɣ yuli uɣebbar.” Wali-ten tura… ɛabden ahuzu n wamas. Reɣben tisit  mebɣir lkas. Cehwan tuzuft xas a ten-tawi ɣer leflas. Limer a  ttwaliḍ amek i tedra d tadart-nni anda akken zik-nni dehhun warrac.  Taddart tuɣal testewḥac . Xas ini d aẓekka deg akken tenqeḍ  tmusni di tjemuyaɛ.  Xas ini d tiniri deg akken ugin ad azlen waman d tliwa. Xas ini d tiɣaltin yuɣalen d ijdi deg akken yeqwa fell-asen uxbac  s tnaɛurin i d-yewwin axeṭṭar alama d amnar n uxxam.  Walli amek bezgent tewriqin n wadlis-nni  nebɣa ad naru. Lexsent tewriqin uqbel ad yemmeɣ lmidad ɣef udmawen-nsent. Qqaren lqeyad imiranen yeṭṭfen azmam n ṛṛay deg yir tagnit-agi deg nettidir: “adlis nebɣa d win yuɣen luḍḍu. Adlis nebɣa  d win deg  testenja  tira si  tmusni… seg assen yekcem wedlis akked yidles ɣer lɣerẓa uɣuru. 

 Tenniḍ diɣen “Awer teḍru yid-wen ay at tura am seklu mi gezmen iẓuran, di tazwara zegzaw yiffer-is, di teswiεt  sellaw iḍer. Ṭṭejra mebla iẓuran leqrar-is d tamettant. Awer tilim ay at tura am isekla war iẓuran.” Uh ay aḥbib ! Izwawen n tura ḥemlen ad gen afriwen ttɣunzun aẓar. Ssel-asen mi i d-qqaren: “ aẓar d lqid ikrefen. Nekni allaɣen-nneɣ ldin. Ldin i yal aḍḍu id ṣṣuden. I yal abeḥri id hubben. Leqrar d lḥebs nettɣunzu. Nekni nḥamel affug akkin akka.. nekni d arraw n dagi, n dihin, n dihin-a.” Ṣeg assen yendeq  umrar n tjadit  armi tettu timiṭ anda teɣli. Am tullas am arrac  rekḍen isem-nsen, cergen nekwa –nsen, sebɣen taglimt-nsen akken ad aɣen tirga i d-fetlen leǧnas   i ten-yerran d aklan, i ten- yesexdamen d iqadacen akken ad refden cci-nsen. Deɛwessu mačči d yiwen i d udem-is. Ula d tiyamatin ɛyant. Ur ufint ara  acu ara qerɛent ..ula d ibabaten knan i lweɛd.   Ur ufin anwa  nnif ɣef acu ara zerben…ifuk yiseɣ-nni … yenɣed yeftutes deg tisirt n timhujrit !  Bernen iɣuraf s yir leryac… yemmeɣ uwran n lbecna armi  ttun medden win  n yirden d timẓin…tikwal mi tzad leqraya.. tettuɣal d neqma. 

 Ad ak-inniɣ tidet-kan… mazal llan iɛerḍiyen. Wid yeseḥbibiren ɣef laṣel.. meɛna tadra-tt yid-sen am win umu yeɣli waggus. Tajmayɛit tuɣal-asen d aṣeṭṭaf. Deg akken negra-d ɣer lḥekma n wungifen…yekna ṣṣwab i ddel,  yeqbel azembil  n tsusmi.  Mačči d izli n wacaren i yerḥan akken ad hamjen cedluḥ n lḥeqq. Akken ad hamjen deg wid yugin lbaṭel akked ẓẓur. Meɛna azger mi yeɣli yesɛa lɣerḍ akken ad  yextir deg ijenwiyen? Susmen  neɣ smeɛdzen widen yesnan… acku awal-nsen, xas yella, mačči d yiwen neɣ d ssin n leṣwar i yezzin fell-as.Ɣef aya  iɣ-d  tufa tagnit nnuḍen. Nettraǧǧu ad hubben leryaḥ ammer ad yezwi lḥeb ɣef alim. Ɣef aya i nuyes deg ṣelaḥ ad zwin ammus s wacu nummes. Ɣef aya nekni s ilejlujen n umzruy mazal netterǧǧu melmi ara yefsi wagris ɣef idurar.

 Nettraǧǧu neɣ nettargu? Tasift yellan  d tasift kan  asmi testeqsa igenwan tenna: “amek ara geɣ i lɛemer-iw akken ad uɣaleɣ d asif? “ Yemuqel deg-s igenni , yezmumeg yenna: “ jemɛed aman seg tiregwa yellan!”; Ahat d wagi  dabrid a nekni s wid yettun abrid … meɛna  ɣer lqumur neɛṛif ziɣemma  d timucuha kan!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Aït Slimane Hamid  

  
  Ttlata, 05 deg yulyu  D asmekti n 05 deg yulyu 1962, asmi i tewwi Lezzayer timunent-is. Acu ɣer Remaḍan, mazal ccek, mazal ur d-iban waggur n Caban neɣ n…I wakken ad t-rǧun, amur ameqqran yerza ɣer leryaf n lebḥar, meqqar din, llan waman, wamag deg tberninin n Mâatkas, ulac ula d tiqit. Ɣelqen la station Wat n Tsadurt, ayen yeǧǧan anemhal n ADE n Tizi Uzzu, ad d-yini : ‘’ɣelqen aman, u nutni la d-qqaren ur nettruḥu ara sya alamma uɣalen-d. amek ara d-uɣalen, ma yella ur asen-serḥen ara ?’’ D taqnuẓt, anwa ara tt-id-yafen ?

  Larebɛa, 06 deg yulyu  D lɛid, dayen walan aggur. Walan-t deg Suɛidiya, donc, c’est fini d lɛid. ‘’Ma nnan-ak lba, d lba, llif mačči d lhemza.’’ Ula d Leqbayel, mmsefhamen nutni. Walan d akken ilaq ad uɣalen ɣer leɛwayed n lejdud. Ihi, kkren xedmen lewziɛa neɣ timecreḍt deg yal tama n tmurt-nsen. Xedmen-tt ula anda-nniḍen ɣef wakken i d-yenna uɣmis ‘’La dépêche de Kabylie’’. La d-yeqqar ‘’Aḍar la iteddu s aẓar’’. Meqqar ad ttun lǧib yeqqersen. 

  Lexmis, 07 deg yulyu  ‘’Si Tqubɛin ɣer Wat Ziki, idles-nneɣ d anagi’’ i as-yenna winna. Iḍelli kan i tewwi Lezzayer timunent, wiyaḍ la as-qqaren, ass-a deg Wat Wagennun, d nnuba-nneɣ. Cwi kan yekfa Remḍan, wamag ad terwi gar yimdanen akked yiɣallen n laman. Xas ulamma d lḥamu dinna, acu kan tella Albraü ! ‘’Smir, sgerger, feggeḍ.’’

  Ssebt, 09 deg yulyu  Terɣa tmurt mačči d izli. Deg tmura n medden akk, d tignawt i iḥekkmen deg uẓɣal, deg tmurt n leqbayel d imdanen : mi bɣan ad teḥmu, ad ceɛlen times, mi bɣan ad tismiḍ, ad tt-ssexsin. Ula deg taddart n’’Tazrout’’, tekker ‘’tmes’’ deg lǧameɛ ass-nni n lɛid. Ugin-asen i kra n yisalafiyen ad d-kecmen ɣer daxel n lǧameɛ. Usan-d deg seg tudrin-nniḍen. Yewwi-ten-id yiwen ɣer din. Wigi, snen-ten aṭas n yimdanen : d imṭurfa. 

  
 Ɣas yettwakkes-as yiẓri n wallen, maca ur telli d taderɣalt imi tettwali s wallaɣ d tmussni. Tagi d tamedyazt, d tamarut Fatiḥa Buciba, yelli-s n Tizi Uzzu. Deg tdiwennit-a, nesqerdec awal yid-s ɣef kra n temsal.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: tewwiḍ tikkelt iɛeddan arraz n usebɣes deg umsiẓwer n radyu tadelsant. Mmeslay-aɣ-d fell-as cwiṭ. 

 Fatiḥa Buciba: arraz-nni yessefreḥ-iyi imi mačči d nekk i t-yewwin, d tutlayt taqbaylit i t-yewwin. Umreɣ daɣen acku ttekkiɣ, ufrareɣ-d deg umsiẓwer-a di teẓrigt-is tamezwarut seld mi d-iberreḥ yis-s tikkelt iɛeddan uneɣlaf n teywalt seg twilayt n Adrar. Yenna-d dakken ad tili temsizzelt n yisefra d tullisin. Timlilit-nni, tusa-d dɣa d tagnit ideg llant tlata tutlayin: taɛrabt, tamaziɣt akked tefransist. Ihi, nekk yeɛǧeb-iyi lḥal mliḥ imi wwiɣ arraz-nni, acku ttwaliɣ am akken rriɣ-as azal i tutlayt tamaziɣt. Ulamma mačči kan d arraz i tuklal. Tuklal kṭer, maca nerra-yas xersum cwiṭ seg wayen i tuklal.

  Buciba Fatiḥa d tamedyazt i irebḥen aṭas n warrazen, ladɣa deg tfaskiwin. D acu ara tiniḍ ɣef waya? 

 Yal mi ara yawi umedyaz neɣ d amaru arraz, tewwi-t yid-s ula d tutlayt-is tamaziɣt neɣ taqbaylit. Nekk ad am-d-iniɣ ferḥeɣ mi ara awiɣ arraz imi irennu-as azal i tutlayt-iw, yessebɣas-iyi daɣen, irennu-iyi-d afud akken ad qeddceɣ ugar.

  Ɛla ḥsab-im, d anwa i d amedyaz n tidet? 

 Amedyaz n tidet d win yellan am ufellaḥ: izerraɛ ur tent-iḥesseb ara. Acku, afellaḥ-nni lemmer i as-yesseḥsab, ad as-yini wiss ma d-tewwet lehwa, wiss ma d-temɣi… Wissen akka, wissen akka, ilaq ur tt-izerraɛ ara. Ula d amedyaz yessefk ad yili akken-nni. Ilaq ur yettwali ara dakken ahat ad yenneɛtab, neɣ ur d-yettufrar ad yawi arraz,..atg. Ilaq dima ad yeqdec, fell-as kan leqdic. Ɣas llan wuguren, ad ten-yettarra i tama-nniḍen, ad yekker ad yeqdec. Imi leqdic-nni i teqbaylit-is i t-iqeddec. Amedyaz, daɣen, d win yellan d ameyyaz deg yal tamiwin.

  Ma neǧǧa isefra, d acu tḥemmleḍ ad txedmeḍ daɣen? 

 Dima deg tira, ḥemmleɣ ad aruɣ ula d tullisin, imi akka tura sɛiɣ ukuẓ (4) n tullisin fukkent, tis semmus deg ubrid, mazal ur tekfi ara. Kecmeɣ daɣen deg yiwen n ccɣel urɛad i t-kkseɣ, maca qrib. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ aql-i ttaruɣ, ttheggiɣ-d ungal. Ma yebɣa Rebbi, ur ttɛeṭṭileɣ ara ad d-ssufɣeɣ ammud n tmedyezt. D win umi semmaɣ “Imiqwa n tehregt”. Ad skelseɣ daɣen aḍebsi n tmedyezt.

  Tanemmirt, yella wayen tebɣiḍ ad t-id-ternuḍ? 

 Ssarameɣ ammud-iw n yisefra i d-iteddun, ad t-ɣren wigad i yefkan lqima d wazal i tmedyezt taqbaylit, d wayen merra yettwarun s tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Ungal daɣen ssarameɣ ad d-yeffeɣ di lweqt iqerben, ad yaweḍ ɣur yimeɣriyen. Afud ijehden i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Testeqsa-tt Kaïsa Khalifi 

 
  
 Ajemmaɛ n lmal n taddart n Tɣalaḍt meqqer, d aqḍar. Yal axxam yekki deg-s s yiwen n yixef neɣ ugar. Ilemẓiyen n taddart kessen s nnuba almend n umḍan (3) n waxfiwen i sɛant twaculin-nsen, ma ɣur-sent yiwen n yixef n lmal am taɣaḍt neɣ tixsi d tayessawt n yiwen n wass, ma ɣur-sent sin waxfiwen d tayessawt n sin wussan…atg.

 Imeksawen iwimi d-tewweḍ nnuba ttnekkaren-d zik send tafrara, ttɛeddayen-d ɣef yixxamen si tama wadda alamma d tin n ufella n taddart. Yal axxam iɣef d-kkan berrun-d wa i taɣaḍt wayeḍ i txsi d warraw-is, dɣa netta ajemmaɛ skudmal yettimɣur, yettuɣal d aqḍar ma yelḥeq ɣer ubrid aneggaru nnig taddart, win akken yettawin srid s adrar. Yidir d Leḥlu d nnuba-nsen, yal yiwen iɛleq-d leǧbira n wusran anda i d-iger aɣrum aquran d kra n yiniɣman d zzit n uzemmur. Asɣar n uẓebbuj aquran deg ufus ayeffus yis-s sɛukkuzen neɣ ttwehhin ɣer wulli ad d-uɣalent s abrid ma ffɣent-t. Leḥlu yezwar sdat n uqḍar ma d Yidir d sin yiḍan ggran. Aydi yetturebban yeẓwer i tyessawt, yessen ad d-yerr izimer neɣ iɣid ma yeɛzel ɣef tqeḍɛit ma ulac ad t-izuɣer wuccen ɣer yiɣẓer ad t-yečč. Mi ara awḍen yimeksawen ɣer wadeg (4) anida ara ikes lmal ttserriḥen i tɣeṭṭen d wulli ad calint akken ad d-nadint ɣef yimɣi i iḥemmlent ad t-ččent. Rrbiɛ yegget acku deg tsemhuyt n tefsut i nella. 

 Imeksawen ad d-bedden mebɛid ad ttɛassan ma ur d-ixutel wuccen iɣid neɣ ma ur yewḥil ara yizimer deg yinijel. Kra yekka wass d tagi i d lxedma-nsen. Imdanen imeksawen ssexdamen allen-nsen deg tyessawt ma d iḍan imeksawen ssexdamen allen d wanzaren-nsen, seg wanda i d-tejba rriḥa n wuccen ad tt-mmagren s useglef. Biccuḥ, akken i s-qqaren warrac, yeḥṣa ur yezmir ara i uqjun dɣa ad yerwel d taffugt. Maca ala tuɣalin ara d-yuɣal, wissen kan melmi. Ad yeǧǧ alamma yeɣfel uydi ad yeḥweṣ izimer amecṭuḥ, ad t-yawi ɣer wabɛaḍ icudax ad t-yečč deg lisser. Ḥacama kan dayen wanag imeksawen d yiḍan ur yettɛedday ara fell-asen uzaylal, aɣfal ur t-ssinen, zgan dima ukin, kra yeḍran sdat-sen ɣef tiṭ-nsen.

 Mi ara izeggen wass, Leḥlu d yiḍan ad d-dhun d tyessawt n lmal ma d Yidir ad iɛeddi ad d-iẓẓeg ulli alamma yeččur-d snat neɣ kradet n al ad d-ikkes aqurḍaɛ seg tenqelt ma yella neɣtegdurin n uyefki ad yu ifer-is. Liqa-nni tamellalt i d-iɣellin seg-sen ad isiqi snat ar kradet n tmiqwa seg-s ɣer daxel n uyefki-nni, wagi ad yuɣal yebbugla. Liqa n uqurḍaɛ ɣur-s tigawt takrurant (5) ɣef uyefki, tbeṭṭu-t ɣef sin n yiḥricen: aman d tedɣart (6). Tadɣart-agi neqqar-as abuglu. Lmal ad t-id-gren s asensu anda ara ixeggel deg laman ma d nutni ad d-ssersen ad ččen imekli. Ad d-qqimen i sin ad d-rnun yiḍan, ad d-refden leǧbirat-nsen ad d-kksen seg-sent tiḥedrin n uɣrum-nni aquran d zzit d man. Ttǧewwizen aɣrum s ubuglu i d-ihegga Yidir. Aseggri (7) dyini tibxsisin neɣ d tizwal ma wwant. Tameddit ad d-ssuffɣen lmal-nni seg yisensa, ad rnun cwiṭ n tyessawt alamma alaḥal ad yeɣli yiṭij imiren ad d-aɣen abrid n tuɣalin. Mi ara d-awḍen ɣer taddart, yal ixef yessen tawwurt n uxxam-is, yettarra srid ɣer din. Ma d azekka-nni ad d-tezzi nnuba n yimeksawen-nniḍen. Wissen n Mḥend, wissen n Mejɛer, wissen…

 Aḍris-a d tukkist seg tullist «Tadukli » i d-yeddan deg ummud n tullisin

  «Timsirin n yiḍ » n Malek HOUD 

  
 I tikelt tis snat, aseggas-a, i ttuwtent tselmadtin deg uγerbaz Mimoun n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Tikelt-a, glan ula s unemhal. Amek teḍra temsalt ? ddurt iεeddan, γef wakken i aγ-d-yenna unemhal n uγerbaz-a d akken yusa-d gma-s n yiwen n unelmad γer uγerbaz, yekcem γer tselmad n gma-s, yessawel-as teffeγ-d γur-s, dγa yewwet-itt. Syin yekker wahraḥu gar yiselmaden d yixeddamen. Mi d-iruḥ unemhal ad iwali d acu yeḍran, yemmuger-it yilemẓi-agi s tyitiwin ula d netta. Tekker ddunit ad telḥu. Iselmaden ḥefsen γef uxeddim s uzekka-nni (ass-nni n larebεa) ufan-tt-id dγa d sebba i wakken ad d-rnun γur-s liḥala taberkan ideg yettidir uγerbaz-nsen. ‘’Aγerbaz ixus si yal tama. Tiqit di yal tazeqqa, ammus γer tama n tneγriyin, lexsas n waman…atg. Lḥasun mačči d yiwet’’ i aγ-d-nnan yiselmaden. Win yewwten, ha-t-an akka tura di lḥebs n leεḍil. Llan wid i d-yusan, ssutren deg unemhal ad as-isemmeḥ, yella gar-asen ula d baba-s n yilemẓi-agi. Am wakken i d-usan, di&amp;gamma,; yimḍebbren, yinemhalen n yiγerbazen-nniḍen akked sandika. Tamsalt tebda, γef wakken d-nnan imi taselmadt-a tewwet anelmad-nni syin yugi ad d-yas γer uγerbaz.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Ffɣen-d ar suq kra n yadlisen n tmedyazt, gar-asen: “n uḥulfu”(tizrigin Tira) n umeddakul-nneɣ Mhenni Xalifi, “Turbulences” (d tamedyazt s tefransist. Tizrigin Mon petit Editeur) n umeddakul Hamid Ait Slimane akked “Ɣef yiri n usigna” n Djamila Taferka (Tizrigin Tira). Deg ssenf n tullist, d ameddakul-nneɣ Muqran Cixi d-yussufɣen “Akud n Yilem) ɣer AUT (Aseqqamu Unnig n Timuzɣa.

  
 Lixsas deg lemḥadra d uḥareb n tjara mebla ttriḥ yessaweḍ almi i d-fɣen kra n yimdanen deg Leɛǧiba iwakken ad bedden zdat n uxxamn n tɣiwant anda ara d-beggnen lɣiḍ-nsen zdat unerni n tjara-agi i d-yesseglan s waṭas n yiɛewwiqen. Ɣef leḥsab n wayen i d-nnan kra n yimdanen-a, azniq-nsen yuɣal ibeddel udem s lketra n yimetjaren I d-yesrusun sselɛa-nsen mebla ma ḥudren ɣef tudert n yimezdaɣ. Deg wass, akken i d-qqaren, d ṭṭiq deg ubrid, tameddit d iḍumman I yettuzzuren deg lqaɛa, d ayen i d-yessawaḍen ama d iqejjan ama d iɣersiwen nniḍen ddawaren dinna. Lḥers-agi yeǧǧa imdanen ssutren ad ssiwḍen lɣiḍ-nsen deg tazwara i yimḍebbren terza taluft. D ayen dɣa i yeǧǧan aselway n tɣiwant yemmuger kra deg-sen anda yeḥḍer ula d imḍebber n yiǧadarmiyen. Ɣer taggara n temlilit, yettuɛeggen dakken ad d-yili useḥres ɣef wid yeffɣen i lqanun iwakken s kra n win yebɣan ad yili d amessenzi, iwulem fell-as ad d-yessewjed ayen ilaqen i lḥirfa-agi, rnu ad yexdem deg umkan yettuxeṣṣen i waya.

 Yettwafren-d Emmanuel Macron d aselway wis 25 n Tegduda tafrensist ass-nni n 7 deg maggu 2017. Ɛla ḥsab n yigemmaḍ i d-fkan iɣmisen n tmurt-a, yewwi-d azal 66,1 % n leṣwat mgal Marine Le Pen i d-ijemɛen 33,9 %. Aṭas n yisteqsiyen i d-itezzin deg wallaɣen n wiud yeṭṭafaren isallen n tmurt n Fransa : d anwat uselway-a? D acu i yexdem yakan? Aselway-agi amaynut n tmurt n Fransa, yebda amecwar-is d amaras (diplomé) seg uɣerbaz aɣelnaw n tebdelt, syin yuɣal d amaswaḍ n usiẓṛef, mbaɛd yexdem di lbanka n’Rothschild , deg useggas n 2012, yuɣal d amɛiwen n umaray amatu di Elysée, syin yuɣal d aneɣlaf n tdamsa. Deg 16-12-2016, iberreḥ-d s wudem unṣib s utekki-is deg tefranin n tmurt n Fransa. Ass n 07-05-2017 yewweḍ ɣer ukersi n udabu.

  S. Yamani 

  
 Ass-nni n letnayen iεeddan, 26 deg yennayer, i d-iεedda usaru ‘’El Wahrani’’ n Lyes Salem di ‘’La cinémathèque’’ n temdint n Tizi Uzzu anda i d-yella umeslay deg taggara n usaru akked Lyes Salem d wid yurar deg-s γef teγzi  n snat n tsaεtin. Asaru yurar seg 26 ar 31 deg yennayer-agi deg-i nella. Aṭas n yimdanen i d-yusan ad t-walin : ama d ilmeẓyen d tlemẓiyen neγ tiwaculin, zyada γef yiselmaden d yinelmaden n tesdawit. 

 Akka, dγa, i yezmer umdan ad yesεu tikti d tmuγli γef usaru-agi mi ara t-iwali. Yezmer ad yesεu tikti γef wayen yeğğan kra n yimdanen ad wwten deg usaru-agi mebla ma walan-t, ladγa At ṭṭlam. Win yuran asaru-agi, yessers-d γer unnar timsal qerriḥit : timsal-nni yesdergen tidet ; asemγer n ccan ur nelli ; tuffγa γef yiswi n lgirra …atg.  

 Timsal i d-yerra s annar, d timsal yefγen γef lqaleb-nni n tannumi, am temsalt n tmagit (l’identité), taεrabt akked ddin…D anect-a i yeğğan At ṭṭlam, ladγa wid-ak ifettin deg tilibizyu ad d-smiren ssem-nsen γef usaru-a. Asaru i d-yeqqaren d akken imjuhad ur nnuγen ara i Rebbi neγ γef ddin, meεna nnuγen γef tlelli n Lezzayer , lgirra n tlelli mačči d lgirra n lislam. Am wakken i sḥasfen γef taεrabt, deg usaru-a, imi tettuḥettem γef tmetti i wakken kan ad d-snulfun tamagit-nniḍen u ad ğğen tamagit tazzayrit. Akka, dγa, ara naf yiwen n usteqsi n Farid deg usaru anda i asen-yenna i yimeddukal-is :’’yemma ur tessin la taεrabt wala taṛumit, d acu-tt, ihi ? D tamsalt-a, dγa, i as-d-yewwin lmut.

  Di taggara n usaru, yella-d umeslay akked Lyes Salem anda i d-yerra γef yisteqsiyen. Γef crab i tessen yimjuhad, yenna-d :’’  tamsalt-a d sebba kan i tt-id-ufan. Ayen yellan yella. Ulac anwa ur neẓri d akken llan wid itessen. Meεna ilaq nutni tissit s tuffra. Yerna ur d-nniγ ara Izzayriyen neγ imjuhad akken akken llan tessen !’’   

 Ma γef wawalen iqebḥen deg usaru yenna-d :’’ma tili tugdi akked zzεef, allaγ iberru-d kan i wawalen.’’ Γef wanect-a, dγa, i as-yenna yiwen d akken ur nezmir ara ad t-nwali akked twacult-nneγ. Lyes Salem yerra-as-d :’’yal yiwen ad t-iwali weḥd-s, anda yella wugur ?’’ Ma γef tmagit, yenna-d umseḍru n’’El Wahrani’’ : ‘’ulamek ad d-nemmeslay γef tmagit mebla tamurt n leqbayel. Ulamek ur d-teddu ara tmurt n leqbayel deg usaru ‘’El Wahrani’’. Aṭas i yesḥassef γef wazal ur tefki tmurt i tutlayin-nniḍen ayen yeğğan ilmeẓyen n tura, γef leḥsab-is, ur zmiren ara ad d-hedren kan s yiwet n tmeslayt.

<p style="text-align: right;">     Hocine.M

  
 War ma nemmeslay-d tazwara ɣef yiselmaden d tselmadin i iwalan annect-nni deg wannar, deg yiɣerbazen yemgaraden, ahat ula d wid yeṭṭafaren aḥric-a n usegmi (éducation), neɣ d wid iḍefren igmaḍ ineggura n BEM d BAC, walan amek i d-tufrar tewtemt deg tqacuct s yigmaḍ-is igerrzen. Aya, mi ara d-nuɣal ɣer deffir, ad naf yebda-d iseggasen-a ineggura kan. Neɣ s wawal-nniḍen, yebda-d segmi yettwakkes kra kra lqid i d-yettwaḥettmen deg wayaqeddac ɣef tmeṭṭut, yugi-as ulamma ad terfed allen-is deg wakud atrar, awessar. Ihi, seg yiwet n tama, aṭas i yettwalin ayen akka i la txeddem tewtemt yekka-d seg kra n tlelli n uxemmem d usenfali i as-yettunefken. Imi tura tekcem deg yiḥricen yemgaraden am nettat am urgaz: asegmi (éducation), tasnujjya (médecine), taɣellist (sécurité), tussna (science), akked tfelseft (philosophie) akka cwit, d waṭas n yiqeddicen wiyaḍ. Ɣef tmuɣli n yiwen n uselmad i nesteqsa, «yekka-d waya daɣen seg uɛaned i tettɛanad tmeṭṭut argaz ad t-tecbu. Am tin i yebɣan ad d-tbin, ad d-tbeggen iman-is, tella s wazal-is d tameṭṭut». Seg tama-nniḍen, iban-d ur teẓwir aṭas teqcict deg yifurak (filières) n tussna. Ɣas ma, ɣef wakken i d-yewwi wadeg n Internet Slate, ssawḍen deg tesdawit n Wacinṭun i yiwet n tezrawt i d-yeqqaren d aqcic i d sebba n waya. Iban-d llan kra n yisdawanen stehzayen s tzemmar n tesdawiyin deg uḥric-a n tussna, almi llant kra ttkukrunt, neɣ ur bɣint akk ad t-ḍefrent.

 Maca wissen lemmer ad d-nemmeslay s yisem n tussna anwa agmuḍ i ara d-naf i usteqsi-nneɣ amezwaru?

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 “Iḍelli-nni, tama n lagaṛ n Tizi-Wezzu ṭṭerḍqen sin ifaguten-nni ineggura n tmacint, d ifaguten n selɛa yedda-d  yid-sen lɛeskar. Lagaṛ di lweqt-nni, d nettat i igan tamast : laman agemmaḍ-a di tama n temdint, tawaɣit agemmaḍ-in di tama nniḍen, ɣer wid izedɣen d lenda akkin, ger iḥedren d isennanen n ukeṛmus, tayerza n lḥif d llun-nni aberzegzaw n tferkiwin uzemmur. Di tmacint, imsukal akken ma llan tezdeɣ-iten tugdi. Tugdi-nni, Yeḥya yessen-itt ula d netta, ulamma mazal ur tt-yessin ara akken  ilaq  iwakken ad t-teḥerrem seg wayen ttwalint wallen-is”

 Tukkist seg usebtar aneggaru

 *Ungal n Nabil Farès (“Yahia Pas de Chance, un jeune homme de Kabylie”)

 Yerra-t-id Ramdane Achab ar teqbaylit

  
 Ttawilat n taywalt i yebdan akka ttawḍen ɣer waṭas n temnaḍin n twilayt d wid yesferḥen ugar imezdaɣ labeɛda wid n tudrin yezgan ccektayen. Maca, ar ass-a, mazal wid yettraǧun s ccuq ttawilat-a iwakken ad idiren am nutni am wiyaḍ, rnu akka tura ula d aɣerbaz yessutur seg yinelmaden ad ḍefren kra n yisenfaren yezzuɣur l’Internet. Taqaɛet, yiwet seg tudrin n tɣiwant n Leɛǧiba tewwi amur-is taggar-agi deg uḥric n l’Internet n lxiḍ. D acu kan, amur-a mačči d win iḥuzan ixxamen imerra, imi qrib akka yiwet n tama ur tt-yewwiḍ ara usafar-agi. Nezmer kan ad d-nesmekti dakken seg tama-agi, udmawen yemxallafen n ttawilat-a ama d la 3G neɣ 4G, ur ssawḍen ara yimezdaɣ ad sfaydin imi akken i aɣ d-qqaren «ixxamen-nneɣ ur d-usin lewhi n tsekwa i sbeddent tkebbaniyin deg yimukan yemxallafen». <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   M.Smail 

 
  
 I lmend n wass agraγlan n uselmad, thegga-d tenmehla n leqraya n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu yiwet n tejmilt i kter n 300 n yiselmaden i yeffγen lintrit aseggas-a. Timlilit  tella-d deg uxxam n unezgum Kateb Yacine ass-nni n lexmis 30 di tuber iεeddan anda ḥedren yimḍebren n lwilya akken ma llan. Anemhal ajdid n leqraya n Tizi Uzzu yesnemmer aṭas iselmaden-agi γef wayen i d-fkan n tmussniwin d wayen εetben di lxedma-nsen. Di taggara, tella-d tukci n tnaga n yiseγ akked warraz i yal aselmad. Timlilit  tekfa s tmeγra sγur inelmaden n uγerbaz alemmas Mulud Ferεun.       <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>        

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M

  
 Deg uḥric-agi wis sin, ad nawi awal ɣef tezlatin s wayes yettwassen, tameddurt-is akked yimahal-is s umata.

  Tizlatin swayes yettwassen aṭas 

 

 Ayemma ṣṣber ur ttru, Afus deg ufus, A mmi-s n lɣerba, Zzher ulac, Ay ul-iw nehhuɣ-k kulass, A ttmeniɣ medden kessben, Ulac wi ɛzizen fell-i, Tura mi ɛeddant fell-i…atg.

  Tameddurt-is d yimuhal-is 

 Ilul ucennay d umjahed Farid Ali, s yisem-is aḥeqqani Khelifi Ali, ass n 09 deg waggur n yennayer 1919 deg taddart n Ikhelfounène deg tɣiwant n Bounouh akka tura, deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Deg useggas n 1935 yunag ɣer temdint n Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, yuɣal dina d axeraz yettxiḍi iṣebbaḍen d warkasen. Sin yiseggasen kan yemmut baba-s, dɣa deg useggas n 1937 isuhel ɣer tmur n Fransa. Ur iɛeṭṭel ara yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt, yemlal-d imeddukkal-is: Krim Belkacem, Lhocine Faâdjaben…atg. Deg useggas n 1956, iḥebs-it-id lɛeskar n tmurt n Fransa deg Bounouh, syin akin sɛeddan fell-as lbaṭel, kkes-d ayen ur sexdimen. Uɣalen serḥen-as deg useggas n 1957. Dɣa yekcem ɣer terbaɛt n tẓuri n ukabar n FLN, deg i d-iyeẓra ddeqs n tmura, yecban: La Tunisie, La Chine…atg, i wakken ad siwḍen tiɣri d temsalt n ugdud azzayri ɣer tmura n leǧnas. Deg useggas n 1964, yettwaḥbes deg lḥebs n Berouaguia, syin akin mi i d as-id-serḥen, yuɣal deg useggas n 1967 yunag i tikkelt tis snat ɣer tmurt n Fransa, yefka afus n tallelt i waṭas n yifennayen i yufa dina, ladɣa wid ur nettwassen ara. Syin mi d-yuɣal ɣer tmut deg useggas n 1976, yuɣal d amekfaḍu (animateur) deg umaṭaf wis sin, yella i sedduy tadwilt-nni n yicennayen n uzekka. Yunag i tikkelt tis tlata ɣer Fransa deg useggas n 1977, ssebba mi yehlek aṭas. Aseggas kan mebɛed yuɣal-d i tikkelt taneggarut ɣer tmurt, dɣa ass n 19 deg waggur n tuber 1981 yewweḍ leɛfu Rebbi deg sbiṭer n Boughni, imiren yella yesɛa kan 62 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is.  (taggara)  

  A. A. 

  
 ‘’Nekk d Wat Yanni, grent tesɣar, Nutni inu, nekk baneɣ nsen. Nekk ur lliɣ d aḥeqqar, Nutni, snen i yi-d-ttakken.’’ Asefru-a n umedyaz ameqqran Youcef Oukaci i yessnen akken iwata Ath Yenni imi yezga dinna deg tallit-is. ‘’Limer mačči d yennayer, ma ad sɛunt tuǧǧal ulli ?’’, limer mačči d Ath Yenni, ma ad yili Dda Lmulud, lukan mačči d Mɛemmri, ma ad taweḍ tmaziɣt, ass-a, ɣer uɣerbaz ? Zik-nni, Ath Yenni, mechurit s lfeṭṭa, lxedma n leslaḥ d usekkak (fausse monnaie) swayes selxen tadamsa taṭerkit. D taddart, diɣ, n ucennay ameqqran Cheriet Hamid yettwasnen s yisem Idir, n umssnaw Arkoun Mohamed d wiyaḍ… atg

  Takerḍa n Ath Yenni 

 Ath Yenni d lɛerc n sebɛa (7) tudrin. Yal taddart, tezga-d deg tewrirt. Tebɛed ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu s 35 n kilumitr. Ɛlayet ɣef lebḥar s wazal n 900 n lmitrat. Gar tudrin timezwura i yesɛan aɣerbaz, ad naf wagi n Ath yenni i yeldin tiwwura-s deg useggas n 1883. Ma d temdinin i as-d-yezzin, ad naf : Michelet,seg usamar ; Iwadiyen, seg umalu ; Larebɛa, seg ugafa et At Wasif, seg unẓul. Mechurit Wat Yanni, s lfeṭṭa. Uqbel iseggasen n 1990, llan 450 iḥeddden n lfeṭṭa, akka tura ggran-d kan 250, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Haouche Mohamed, aselway n tiddukla n yiḥeddaden n Ath Yenni. Lqella n sselɛa (lfeṭṭa d lmerǧan) akked arrebrab, selxen amahil-a : arrebrab, yesserwel imerriyin (les touristes), sselɛa, tenɣa axeddim. 

  Isem Ath Yenni (At Yanni) 

 Ar tura mazal ur tefri ara s ttbut ɣef uẓar n wawal-agi. Llan wid i d-yeqqaren d akken d isem n umdan amezwaru i d-yusan ɣer tama-nni. Wiyaḍ qqaren-d yekka-d seg wawal yen=yiwen. Ma d kra qqnen-t ɣer leɛli n umekkan anda i as-gan assaɣ akked umayag ‘’nni’’ (semnenni, igenni…atg), meḥsud yella nnig. Tella ula d yiwet n tenfalit i ssexdamen Wat Yanni mi ara ggalen : awal ɣer wawal ad yini : ‘’mi ur ak-xdimeɣ ara akka, ihi nekk mačči n At lqaɛa igenni !’’, meḥsub yella igenni, syin d nutni.

  Isem ‘’Tawrirt n Mimun’’ 

 Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Boughareb : ‘’zik, tewwet tterka (la peste) deg taddart iwumi qqaren akka tura Tawrirt Mimun. Teslex akk imezdaɣ-is. Kkren, ruḥen la ttnadin ɣef ddwa n waṭṭan. Slan d akken yella yiwen yezdeɣ deg wasif, yezmer ad idawi lehlak-agi. Mi wwḍen steqsa-t dɣa ma yezmer i waṭṭan am wa. Winna yenna-asen, zemreɣ. Syin, steqsa-t ɣef wamek ara txelsen ma yesseḥla wid-nni yuḍnen. Ihi, deg taggara, mi tekfa tterka, yeḍleb deg-sen ad as-semmin i tewrirt-nni anda llan ‘’Tawrirt n Mimun’’, akka i d-yeqqim isem-agi’’.

  Tigzirt n At Yanni d Sidi Ali Ouyahia 

 Xas ulamma mačči deg lebḥar i d-tezga, meɛna semman-as Tigzirt. I wacuɣer ? Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, mi ara twaliḍ seg lebɛid amekkan-a, yettban-d am wakken d tigzirt d axel n lebḥar. zik, imezdaɣ-is, kkan-d seg Wat Wasif. Syin, ruḥen-d s At Yanni ddaw leɛnaya n Sidi Ali Ouyahia i asen-yemlan amekkan-a. Nnan-d iḍegger taɛekkazt-is, syin yebna lǧameɛ deg umekkan anda i d-teṣbeḥ u bdan ttasen-d yimezdaɣ deg Wat Wasif ɣer din. Deg tazawara ɣer tama n lǧameɛ, syin tettimɣur taddart. Akka i yefra Sidi Ali Ouyahia taɛdawit i yellan gar-asen. Am wakken yesdukken cmel n tudrin-agi n At Yanni.

  Amezruy d tmetti Tanfalit ‘’At tmura’’ 

 Sseqqdacen yimezdaɣ n Ath Yenni aṭas tanfalit ‘’At tmura’’. Wid i as-isellen, ttaken-as anamek, lmeɛna-nniḍen : aṭas i iɣillen d acemmet neɣ d asenɣes deg wazal n yimezdaɣ n tudrin-nniḍen. Netta, yuɣ lḥal ssexdamen-t i wakken ad semgaraden gar iḥeddaden n lfeṭṭa akked wid ixeddmen akal (tamurt). Ihi, ur teqqaren ara kan i yimezdaɣ n tudrin-nniḍen, qqaren-t ula i wid ixeddmen tafellaḥt deg Wat Yanni. Akka i aɣ-tt-id yenna Makhlouf Boughareb i wakken ad yettwakkes, dɣa, leɣlaḍ i yellan seg zik. ‘’Ihi, ass-a, ad t-id-nini i wakken ad yettwakkes unamek i as-fkan kra. Ath Yenni, ur ssemɣaren ara iman-nsen ɣef yimezdaɣ n tudrin n leqbayel.’’ Ikemmel deg wawal.

  Lfeṭṭa n At Yanni. ‘’Tufiḍ-d At Ɛebbas rsen, nutni s dduzan-nsen’’ 

 Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Mohamed Haouche, taẓuri-agi wwin-tt-id yimezwura seg Wat Ɛebba, seg tama n Yiɣil Ali. Tella ula d yiwet n tenfalit i sseqqdacen ar tura, yenna-d : ‘’am wakken neẓra ɣer Leqbayel, yal wa iḥemmel ad d-yesbin belli d netta i d amezwaru ɣer umekkan anda yella. Ihi, dagi ɣur-neɣ mi ara d-tesbin tmeṭṭut i tayeḍ d akken tezwar-itt ɣer taddart, teqqar-as ‘’Tufiḍ-d At Ɛebbas rsen, nutni s dduzan-nsen’’, meḥsub tufiḍ-iyi-d dagi. Ayen, diɣ, i d-yemmalen belli d At Ɛebbas i d-yewwin lfeṭṭa ɣer taddart n Wat Larebɛa’’. Ma ɣef teswiɛ i deg tettidir lḥirfa-agi n lfeṭṭa, akka tura, yenna-d ur tessefraḥ ara maḍi : ‘’tallit-a, ur tessefraḥ ara. Arrebrab yesserwel akk imerriyen seg yiseggasen-nni n 1990. Zyada ɣef wanect-a, ur nufi ara sselɛa. Xas ulamma asmi tella, ɣlayet mačči d izli. Ugar n 10 imelyunen i kilu n lfeṭṭa, 25 imelyunen i kilu n lmerǧan, yerna ad txelsen din, din. Rnu-as tabzert i ilaq ad nxelles xas akka ur nxeddem ara’’. Ɣef wanect-a, dɣa, i d-xelqen Tiddukla n yiḥeddaden n lfeṭṭa anda i d-yemmeslay Amin Degheb ɣef yiswiyen-is, yenna-d :’’nexleq-itt-id, i wakken ad d-naf tifrat i wuguren i d-nemmuger, ama d wid yeɛnan sselɛa, tabzert neɣ asenzi. Tiddukla-agi, d aseḥbiber ɣef tẓuri n lfeṭṭa, nugad ad tenger ma tedda-tt akka : deg useggas n 1990, llan 450 iḥeddaden, tura neggra-d deg 250 yid-neɣ. Yerna d acu n lxedma ,d acu lḥala. Nebɣa ad as-d-nerr i lfeṭṭa ccan-nni n zik, nebɣa ad d-nerr s annar wid-nni yessexsin. Nebɣa ad d-uɣalen yimerriyen ɣer ɣur-neɣ’’. Ɣef zik-nni,dɣa, yewwi-d awal Mass Haouche, yenna-d : ‘’ulac leǧnas ur d-nusi ɣer da : usan-d seg Marikan, seg Ṭelyan, Beljik, Miksik, wammag seg Fransa, zgan da…imir, lfeṭṭa,tettnuz, tessidir acḥal n twaculin. Ma d tura, tewɛer teswiɛt, aṭas i yessersen tafḍist, beddlen amahilu fɣen tamurt, nesḥassef aṭas ɣef wanect-a daymi ara nekkat ad d-nerr azal i tẓuri-agi u ad as-nefk lumayer-is i lfeṭṭa n At Yanni, sya d afella’’. Arraz amezwaru n uḥeddad n lfeṭṭa n tmurt n leqbayel, yewwi-t Ourrad Salem n Tewrirt n Mimun, deg useggas n 1878. Izamulen n lfeṭṭa

  Taɛeṣsabt n lfeṭṭa 

 Taɛeṣsabt n lfeṭṭa, d azamul n talwit, n umsawi gar yimdanen : ama gar twaculin, tudrin neɣ, ɛad, gar yiderman d leɛrac. Zik, mi ara tili taluft gar twaculin neɣ yiderman, ad kkren ad myanasaben gar-asen i wakken ad tekfu teɛdawit : dayen uɣalen d iḍewlan. Syin, teqqim-d tɛeṣsabt n lfeṭṭa d azamul n talwit d usemsawi. Mi tekker ad teddu teslit, ad as-d-awin yiwet n tmeṭṭut yethennan deg uxxam-is i wakken ad tt-theggi : ad tt-tcebbeḥ, syin ad as-tessers taɛeṣsabt n lfeṭṭa ɣef uqerru-s. Ad teddu yis-s s axxam n urgaz. Akka, tewwi-d yid-s talwit u tebɣa-tt i tudert-is. Ma yella kra yellan icudd gar twaculin-nni, ad yefsi seg wass-nni. 

  Abzim n lfeṭṭa. 

 Abzim, d azamul n lferḥ ɣer leqbayel. Mi ara yernu uqcic ɣer tmeṭṭut taqbaylit, ad tewwet abzim i wakken ad d-tesbeggen lferḥ s mmi-s. Aqcic, yettneḥsab ɣer twacult taqbaylit d iseɣ, d lsas u d axalaf n uxxam. Ula mi ara yezweǧ uqcic, kkatent tlawin ibzimen. Tura, ur yesɛi ara lawan, ttlusent-t deg yal tameɣra neɣ taswiɛt n lferḥ…

  Kra n yismawen n yisɣunen (bijoux) 

 Deg Wat Yanni, ad naf isɣunen-a : ameclux, amecbuk, ameqqyas, tabzimt, axelxal, taɛeṣsabt, taziba, tazlagt, tigeḍmatin, azrar, tixutam, taḥzamt, …atg.

  Asekkak (fausse monnaie) akked lǧameɛ n yiṭerkiyen. 

 Deg yiwet n tallit, At Yanni xeddmen ula leslaḥ d usekkak, zyada ɣef lfeṭṭa. Xeddmen asekkak-agi s nneqma n yiṭerkiyen, bɣan ad ɣeḍlen tadamsa-s imi i ten-nɣan s tebzert. Akka, yal amnekcam s wacu i t-kkaten. Asmi ifaq Dey n Lezzayer tamaneɣt u iban-d d akken seg Wat Yanni i d-tusa tyita, inuda ɣef wamek ara yefru tamsalt-a. yenna-asen ad asen-yefk tiferkiwin timeqqranin i tfellaḥ deg Mitija, awi-d kan ad as-tixren i usekkak-agi.Syin, rran-asen-d Wat Yanni, nnan-as :’’ma tebɣiḍ ad nruḥ ɣer Mitija, awi-aɣ-in ɣer din adrar n Ǧerǧer, axater yal mi ara d-nekker sbeḥ, nettwali-t’’. Acu kan,deg taggara,ufan-d tifrat, bnan-asen Iṭekiyen lǧameɛ deg Wat Yanni i mazal ar ass-a.

  Kra n wawal ɣef Lmulud At Mɛemmer 

 Aṭas ur neẓri ara azal n Dda Lmulud armi d asmi yemmut. Asmi akken yemḍel, walan d akken mačči d izli n yimdanen i d-yeqqersen ɣer Tewrirt. Ussan-d seg yal tama n tmurt, ussan-d ula seg berra…Ass-nni, faqqen akken ma llan s wazal n urgaz-agi. Acu kan, tikwal ad as-tiniḍ sɛan ‘’lḥeqq’’ imi argaz-agi ur yessemɣar ara iman-is : yettɣimi deg leqhawi, ileɛɛeb duminu akked medden akken llan ; ur yessemɣar ara iman-is. Yettruḥu ɣer lexla-s ixeddem-itt. Yiwet n tikkelt mi d-yuɣal, dɣa, deg lexla, yuɣ lḥal inehher-d aɣyul, yewwi-d fell-as isɣaren. Deg ubrid mi iteddu s axxam, yemlal-d kra n yiṛumyen, ttnadin fell-as. Sseqsa-t ɣef wanda ara afen Mouloud Mammeri, meɛna netta ur asen-yerri ara. Ihi, dduklen yid-s ttqessiren. Acu kan mi akken ttmeslayen gar-asen, wehmen s tmussni n umeksa am wagi. Armi dayen yewwḍ Dda Lmulud s axxam-is i asen-yenna tidet. 

  Youcef Oukaci d Si Mohand Ou Mhand deg Wat Wanni. 

 Yezga Youcef Oukaci d Si Mohand Ou Mhand deg Wat Yanni, yal wa deg tallit-is. Youcef Oukaci ssawalen-as-d i wakken ad asen-yefru timsal. Mačči d imusnawen i xuṣṣen, meɛna netta ur yezmir ara ad yejbed ɣer tama, ad yeǧǧ tayeḍ imi mačči n dinna. Netta iferru-asen timsal, nutni ttkabaren-t s lɣella i iwejden.

  Ula d Si Mohand Ou Mhand, iḥemmel tama-nni. Yewwi-d ula d asefru fell-asen : 

 <em>Ttwab yeɣleb tamussni,</em>

 <em>Ttwab s At Yanni, </em>

 <em>Ɣur-sen d lɛadad kamel.</em>

 <em>Ɣur-sen d imezgi,</em>

 <em>Mačči d inebgi,</em>

 <em>Win tufiḍ, ad yessiwel.</em>

 <em>Ucbiḥ yeɣran di lemɛani,</em>

 <em>Mesbuɣ di lwali,</em>

 <em>Anda yedda d imsellek’’.</em>

  Kra n yismawen. 

 Mačči d yiwen neɣ d sin i d-tefka tama-agi, ama seg tama n tsekla d yidles neɣ seg tama n waddal. Nezmer ad nebder kra : Mouloud Mammeri, Ramdane Achab, Mohamed Arkoun, Hamid Cheriet (Idir), Arezki Metref, Brahim Izri, Slimane Hachi, Hakim Meddane, Maheddine Khalef, Kasdi Merbah, Brahim Zafour, Bitam…atg Deg taggara, ad snemreɣ tawacult Boughareb s umecṭuḥ d umeqqran, ladɣa ameɣnas ameqqran n tmaziɣt Makhlouf, Mohamed Haouche, aselway n Tiddukla n yiḥeddaden n lfeṭṭa n At Yanni, Amin Degheb, amaray amatu n Tiddukla, mebla ma ttuɣ imezdaɣ akken ma llan. 

<p style="text-align: right;">   Hocine.M 

  
 Tella, am tal tikkelt, Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad di ttiɛad ass n arim iɛeddan 1 n yennayer ilmend n usfuggel n wayyur-a ed useggas amaynut n yimaziɣen. Aṭas ihi n warmuden i yettwajerrden deg wahil deg teɣzi n wass-nni n umenzu n yennayer. Imi dɣa ɣef ttmenya n tnezzayt, ttwaldin yizenqan ed texxamin i temzikknin yemgerraden, ideg kra n yilemẓiyen hwant-asen tduba-nni (ṭṭwabel) i d-yeskanayen aṭas n tɣawsiwin: ama d tid n tgemmi tangawt (patrimoine matériel) n Ayt Smaɛel ed Tmurt n Yizwawen s umata, neɣ d idlisen seg temkardit n tdukkla, neɣ ulama d tiwlafin i d-yettarran amdan cwiṭ ɣer umezruy. Ɣef 09:00, imir-n i yebda umsiẓwer adelsan akked umsiẓwer n wunud (plat) akk ifazzen. Meḥsub, tismaɛlanin llant ttwanecdent i yiwen n ukayad: tin i d-inawlen unud n lɛali ɣef usiḍen n tesqamut, ad tawi arraz ɣef wanect-a. Yuɣ lḥal, d tawacult n mass Ɛebdun Smaɛil i yewwin arraz amezwaru ɣer taggara. Dima ɣef warmuden n umenzu n yennayer, Tidukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad tesbens iɛebbaḍ mettwal 11sr00 s yiwet n tgella tansayant, neɣ swayen mu neqqar tirqiqin(tiɣrifin). Kra n win i d-ibekkren yerra-d awellih-is ɣer wayen tga tdukkla, yeɛreḍ seg wučči-nni yessxafayen, i isemmɣen s zzit n uzemmur, sɣur ifassen n yiɛeggalen n Tdukkla. Mi iɛedda uččay n tzeggant n wass, wid yerza yidles ed tutlayt-nsen ḥeḍren i usarag i d-iga umaru Mhenni Xalifi ɣef wungal-is amaynut « Asdawan ». Ameskar-is yemmeslay-d s umata ɣef wayen i d-yewwi ungal-a d amaynu, akked yisental i yesqerdec agensu-s (daxel-is); ama d tasenmettit, neɣ d tifelseft, neɣ d taluft n tmagit, neɣ d tussna, neɣ d tasret…atg. Taqaɛet ur tella ara teččur aṭas almi i d-iban dakken ɣas ad yili usneɣmes (information), win ur nettak azal i wayen yesɛan azal drus i yellan ad as-txedmeḍ akken ad t-id-terreḍ s abrid. Timlilit-a n usarag teḍfer-it-id syin ɣer-s, tnezzut n ubuddu n sin n yidlisen n umaru-ya: ammud n yisefra « Nnehda n uḥulfu », i d-yeffɣen ɣer teẓrigin Tira. Akked wungal amaynut s uzwel n « Asdawan », i d-yeffɣen deg wayyur aneggaru n useggas yezrin 2014. Mi i d-tettekcam akken tmeddit kra kra, yezrurreq-d unalas ilemẓi Fares Idir i wudmawen n warrac ineglusen akked wid merra i iḥemmlen amaḍal n usugen. Dɣa mi ẓran kan bu tmucuha i ssnen yakan, bdan azmummeg send ad tebdu tmacahut. Fares yeẓuɣɣer-iten ɣer yiwen n umaḍal n setta seg settin s snat neɣ kraḍ n tmucuha. Ma yella d ccna n yilemẓi Yugurten Wali, i d-yessufɣen aḍebsi amaynut ula d netta, almi i d-yella sem-a (lǧemɛa) iɛeddan, mi akken i d-yetteɣlay yiḍ ɣef Udrar n Fad.

<p style="text-align: right;">Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Deg taddart n Ait Kheir, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Ait Kellili deg tama n Mekla, teḍra-d tezrigt tis snat n rreḥba taɣelnawt n ufexxar n taddart n Ait Kheir. D tajmilt i tlawin merrra n taddart-agi i ixeddmen talaɣt, am wakken daɣen i tt-gan d tajmilt i sin n yimnuda imeqqranen deg uḥric-agi, wigi Jean Bernard Moreau akked Hélène Balfet. Tella-d tfaska-a s ddaw leɛnaya n lwali n Tizi Uzzu, am wakken diɣen i ttekkin waṭas n yimsuddsen, gar-asen: Tiddukkla tadelsant “ Iselqam n Talaɣt” n Ait Kheir, tasqamut n taddart-agi, Tanmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu. S talellt n Usqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya (APW) akked ladayra n Mekla, tiɣiwanin n Ait Khellili, Mekla akked Souamaa. Aseggas-agi, ttekant deg-s 4 n lwilayat-agi : Tamanraset, Sétif, Ain Defla, Lezzayer Tamanaɣt, akked yimsikniyen i d-yerzan deg yal tama n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Tikkelt-agi, llan azal n 150 n yimsikniyen, i ixedmen ugar n 20 n temsikniyin yecban: Nnḥas, talaɣt, tiqnedyar n Leqbayel akked tid n Tamenraset, tamemt, lfeṭṭa, lxedma n usɣar, zzit uzemmur d ṣṣabun-is, llan-d ula d isenza s ubuddu n yidlisen. Tafaska-agi deg tezrigt-is tis snat, yeldi-tt s wudem unṣib, taṣebḥit n wass-nni n ttlata 18 yulyu 2017, lwali n Tizi Uzzu akked tnemhalt n yidles. Temdel tiwwura-s ass-nni n ssebt 22 yulyu 2017. Ma dayen i d-yufraraen deg wahil yella-d akka. Deg wass amezru, tella-d tulya tunṣibt ɣef 10 h 00 n ṣṣbaḥ, syin akkin ɣef 11 h 00 sneɛtent-d tlemeẓyin n taddart-agi amek xeddmen afexxar, ma ɣef 13h00 d afella tella-d tukci n warrazen i tlawin n taddart-agi i ixeddmen talaɣt, llan-d daɣen yiḍebbalen d tɣuri n yisefra. Deg wass wis sin, 19 yulyu 2017, seg 13h00 alamma d 22h00, llan-d yiḍebbalen i d-yewwin kra n zedwat, tella-d diɣ tɣuri n yisefra akked turart n yiwet n tceqquct n umezgun. Ma seg 22h00, tella-d tmeɣra n ccna sɣur Boualem Chakker akked Siham Siti. Ma deg tlemmast n wass, llan-d sin n yisaragen ɣef sin-nni n yimnuda iwumi tuɣal tejmilt, wigi d Jean Bernard Moreau akked Hélène Balfet. Isaragen-agi, xedmen-ten-id sin n yiselmaden deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, wigi d Mass Dahmani Mohamed akked Massa Saheb Djamila. Deg wass wis rebɛa, 20 yulyu 2017, seg 13h00 alamma d 22h00, llan-d yiḍebbalen i d-yewwin kra n zedwat, tella-d diɣ tɣuri n yisefra akked turart n yiwet n tceqquct n umezgun. Ma seg 22h00, yella-d usenɛet n usaru “Asaruf” n Younes Boudaoued. Ma deg tlemmast n wass, yella-d yiwen usarag ɣef yizamulen n rrqem yellan deg talaɣt, d asarag i d-yefka Mass Dahmani Mohamed, d aselmad deg tesdawit n Lmulud At Mɛemmer. Ma seg 17h00 alamma 20h00, yella-d usenɛet n wamek i d-yettili zzwaǧ n zik, d aḥric amezwaru, azekka-nni n lǧemɛa kemmlen-d aḥric wis sin. Ma deg wass uqbel aneggaru, taṣebḥit n wass, llan-d yiḍebbalen i d-yewwin kra n zedwat, tella-d diɣ tɣuri n yisefra akked turart n yiwet n tceqquct n umezgun. Ma i tmeddit, yella-d usarag ɣef tɣerma n Koukou, ixdem-it Mass Mohand Boukhetouche. Ma d ass aneggaru n tfaska-agi, yella-d sendiḍelli n ssebt 22 yulyu 2017. Ayen i d-yufraren deg-s d tukci n warrazen d yigerdasen n uttekki, akked tmeɣra n cca ideg ɣennan aṭas n yifennanen. Ad d-nesmekti belli timesikniyin-agi, yal ass beddunt ɣef 08h00 n ṣṣbaḥ alamma d 20h00 n yiḍ, ɣef teɣzi n 5 wussan.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 I lmend n umagger n tefsut, Amezday adelsan ussnan CCS n taddart n Yiger Ali akked Umezday n unadi d usekfel n At wnir di tɣiwant n Ferɛun di tama n Bgayet , heggan-d yiwen n wahil d amerkanti êf teɣzi n sin wussan si 17 ar 18 di Meɣres. Ass-nni n n lǧemɛa, teldi temsikent ideg i d-ttusnaɛ-tent waṭas n tugniwin ɣef tguliwin swayes ttmagaren tafsut di temnaḍin yemxalafen n tmurt n leqbayel, ladɣa seksu ifuren ɣef yizẓuran n uderyis. Ɣef lewhi n 14H, yella-d yiwen usarag sɣur Mass Karim Ccix ɣef udlis yura s uzwel «Aderyis». Yewwi-d awal ɣef yimɣi d wazal-is ɣef tezmert n umdan , syin akkin yeldi uskasi ɣef wayen i d-icudden ɣer wansayen n temnaṭ-agi s umata. Ar tagara, yella-d lbiɛ n udlis n umaru s ubudu. Ɣef lewhi n 16h, d asgunfu s yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun i tessuli «Tarbaɛt tiziri» n Tidukkla tadelsant Tifritin. Deg wass wis sin 18 di meɣres, ikemmel leqdic s yiwen n usarag i d-yewwi mass Rachid Oulebsir ɣef tgemmi n yimaziɣen gar zik d tura. Syin akkin, yella-d imekli s seksu d uderyis. Tameddit n wass maḍi, tettusnaɛt-d yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun s zwel «Taxelwit n cciṭan» i d-turar terbaɛt n yinemlayen n Umizur. Ɣer lewhi n tmeddit, ttunefken warrazen i wid iqedcen. Tekfa tmeɣra n tefsut s yisefra d ccnawi .iswi nneɣ : «d aseḥbiber ɣef wansayen d laɛwayed id-ǧǧan yimezwura-nneɣ, iwakken tisutwin id-yettnekaren ad tent-kemlen» id-yenna yiwen uɛeggal n tidukla Mass farid mellahi .

 Rwi timellalin , rnu ɣer ɣur-sent ssker , tawanilt, awren, akked yiɣes .Rwi kra din . Sizɣel-d zzit di tseḥḥant , smir arekti-nni , err-as tadimt , tesewweḍ-tt s tmes taḥlawant. <p style="text-align: right;"> Sɣur DAYA 

  
 I wakken ad yeɛmer tizeɣwa-s s yinelmaden i lmend n unekcum aɣurbiz deg ctember i d-iteddun, aɣerbaz “Inas” n Montréal deg tmurt n Canada yessewjed yiwen n wahil n taywaltbeddemma anda i d-yenced imawlan n warrac yettidiren di tmurt-a i wakken ad jerden tarwa-nsendeg uɣerbaz-a anda ara lemden tutlayt-nsentayemmat. Ɣas akka aɣerbaz-a yeldi yakan tiwwura-s seg useggas n 2009, mazal ur yewwiḍ ara lebɣi-s s ujmaɛ n waṭas n yinelmaden. Deg yiwen n ulɣu i d-iger,dɣa,beddemma, yesḥassef aṭas imi tazzla n waṭas n yimdanen tettili-d ɣer tmeɣriwin mačči s almad n tmaziɣt. Ulamma, tamurt n Canada d tin ur nessexdem ara iɛewwiqen sdat uselmed n tutlayin tinaṣliyin yecban mandarin, hindi, taɛrabt d tmaziɣt. D tagnit, ahat, i ilaq ad tettufares i wuẓu n tutlayt n Masensen, seg-s ahat daɣ ad d-ilin waṭas n yinadiyin usnanen n tarwa-s dinna. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>
