  <span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Aheggi</span></span> 

 Sqecret tibṣelt, terremt daxel n tmeqlit ad d-teqlu s zzit i wazal n 5’. Rnut-as aksum, tanfem-as ad yeww azal n n 10’. Rret kulec daxel n uḍebsi, ternum lbaṭaṭa (yuɣ lḥal tewwa), yettwagezmen d iḥricen imecṭaḥ. Gezmet nneɛneɛ tesxelḍem-t d isufar-nni-nniḍen, rnu tamellalt. Gezmet tawriqt n Brik ɣef sin, ḍebbqet-t i wakken ad tuɣal d amkerdis, syin terrem s daxel-is ayen akken i d-theggam. Qlut-t daxel n zzit azal n 3’ yal tama.

  S tezmert-nwen Sɣur Daya 

  
 Yessufeɣ-d ussan-a iɛeddan umaru Racid Ḥituc adlis-is amezwaru s tezwawt, mbeɛd wid i yura s tutlayt tafransist. D adlis n 99 n yisebtar i izewwel « Ammud n tlufa », i d-yeffɣen ɣer teẓrigin La Pensée n Tizi Uzzu. Deg-s, ad naf ddeqs n wayen yellan deg tneḍruyin-a. Ilul Racid Ḥituc ass n 9 deg mayyu n useggas n 1962. Yettwassen ladɣa s timmeɣnest-is d wawal-is urẓin segmi yella d ameẓyan.

  M. K. 

  
<p style="text-align: center;">Muḥemmed neɣ Masin Uharun, ilul deg Tefrit deg useggas1949. Yegujjel kanakken d ameẓẓyan mi yeɣli baba-s d ameɣras deg ugni n yiseɣ deg useggas 1958. Mi yella yettheggi duktura-ines deg tsengama taɣisant deg tesdawit n Lezzayer tamanaɣt, yekker-asen i yirmad isertanen deg Tuddsa n Yifadden Imaziɣen (OFB) ideg yella d yiwen seg wid i tt-id-isbedden. Mi d-teḍra taluft-nni n “wid isersen lbumbat” anda i t-id-ssekkin deg-s deg 1976, yettwaṭṭef, yuɣal gren-t ɣer usekref n Taẓult (Lambèse), almi d 1987 i as-d-serrḥen. Yella d aɛeggal amentam n Umussu Adelsan Amaziɣ (MCB), tudert-is, yefka-tt akk i uselmed n tutlayt tamaziɣt, d unadi deg tjerrumt tamaziɣt. Yemmut ass n 22 mayyu 1996, tamentilt n tmettant-is d ccwami i d-yeǧǧa uqehher i t-qehhren deg lḥebs. Kra n tejmilt ara s-Nerr drus.D argaz yuklalen ugar n waya imi TUDERT-est isureg-il ɣef tikkelt i wiyaḍ. Tamaziɣt yuɣen Abrid n nnger mebla lebɣi-s, isebbel-comme iman-est ad Akken d-tuɣal seg tmettant i as-d-Heggan u ar ass-a ttheggin-as-d wid urǧin UWIN-tt deg wul-nsen. <p style="text-align: center;">Malek Houd

  
 Ddurt-agi yezrin, taddert n Wagarsafen n tγiwant n at-yeğğar, dayra n Wizgan tufrar-d deg wemḍiq amezwaru n temzizilt Σissat Rabaḥ n taddet zeddigen. Leqdic-agi tesdurit-id tzeqqa meqren n wexxam n yedles n mulud At-Mεemmar n Tizi-Wezzu s leḥdur n deqs n yemḍebren taεna temsalt. Timzizelt-agi tettili-d yal seggas, yettheggi-t-id wesqamu aγerfan n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu, d asebγes n tudrin leqbayel akken ad-saḥbibrent γef tezdeg n twenaḍt d ugama.

 Timzizelt n useggas-a ukkant deg-s 62 n tudrin yemgaraden n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu d 12 n tγiwanin. Taddert n Yigarsafen tḥella-d amḍiq amenzu s ugemmuḍ n 97 n tneqiḍin γef 100. Ma yella d tudrin niḍen id-itebεen s deffir, Tizi-Umalu n tγiwant Abi-Yusef s 87 n tneqqiḍin, syen ternna-d taddert n Swamaε deg wemkan wis kraḍ (03), d taddert n At-Waεban deg wemkan wis ukkuz (04)

 AGARSAFEN,  tezga-d deg umalu n wedrar Ukfadu, di tɣiwant n At Yeǧǧar i d-yezgan deg usamar n temdint n Tizi Wezzu. Tezga-d ger isafen, deg irebbi n wakkal-is  i tella tɣiwant. Tebɛed azal n 70 i kilumitren ɣef temdint n Tizi Wezzu, azal n 25 ikilumitren ɣef temdint n Yiɛeẓẓugen, tajumma-s 3 n yigeṭṭaren. Aɛlayet ɣef yilel azal n 890 n lmitrat, ɣur-s ugar n 4000 imezdaɣ, ɣur-s 37 n yismawen n twacult, tebḍa ɣef semmus (05) n yiderma : Imarjanen, At Urabaḥ, Ibaxucen, Iqessuyen, Iẓeniɛen, yal adrum ad naf deg-s ugar n ukuẓ (04) n yisemawen n twacult.

 Taddart n WAGARSAFEN tezga-d gar sin isaffen, asif n Rridan i d-yettawin seg usamar, si teẓgi n Ukfadu, ɣer unẓul, akked d wasif n Lɛebd n lɛali i d-isubben deg ugafa ɣer unẓul. Sin n yisaffen-agi mlalen deg unẓul n taddart, deg umkan iwumi qqaren At Ḥendis, d asif yeffeɣ ɣer wasif usardun. Agarsafen d isem i d-yussan di sin wawalen : “Gar” akked “Isaffen», di sin wawalen-agi i d-yeffeɣ yisem n taddart AGARSAFEN.

 Taddart tecbeḥ s warraw-is, s tdukli n yimezdeɣ-is, s tayri i ten-icudden ɣur-s, yal wa s wayen i umi yezmer, yal wa swayen yessen. Wa yefka-d kra si texriṭ-is, wa yewwet s yiɣil-is, yefka-d tazmert-is, wa yefka-d tikti-s, wa yefka-d rray-is… Iɛeggalen n tesqamut iqeddcen ɣef taddart d wid yettazzalen sbaḥ tameddit fell-as, d wid iqeddcen ɣef taddart war iḍes, war asgunfu, bedden, sbedden ccan n taddart. Ɣer yidis n yirgazen, ad naf daɣen tulawin n taddart iqeddcen ɣer tama n wargaz, tt-id yeggaren afud akked tebɣest i yirgazen akked yilmeẓyen. Imezdaɣ n taddart sumata akken, si tqernit ufella ar taqenit n wadda, xarṣum ilmeẓyen, warǧin smeɛẓegen i teɣri n yiɛeggalen n tesqamut n taddart, ɣur-sen tabɣest am tyuga igerzen, yal ass wejden ad fken iɣallen-nsen d wayen akk iwumi zemren i taddart. Warǧin qqimen ur ḥdiren ara i lejmaɛ n taddart. Ula d igerdan imecṭaḥ ggaren iman-nsen akken ad xedmen ɣef taddart, ḥemmlen ad ikin deg lxedma d-yettilin, aladra ayen akk fessusen fell-asen, ttawin-d amedya seg yimeqranen iqedcen, acku azekka d nnuba-nsen ula d nutni ad refden taddart-nsen.

 Afud igarzen d tebγest iğğahden i taddert n yigarsafen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Hakim Allaoua, d ilemzi, ilul deg useggas 1976 deg tɣiwant n Uqbu, yeɣra deg uɣerbaz alemmas amaynut iwumi qqaren tura Yusef Ben Berkan, syin akkin yexdem asileɣ deg waddal akked umahil-is deg yiwen n lweqt. Akka tura d aselmad de CFPA u d aselmad n lkarati i warrac. Yebda ilemmed addal deg useggas, yewwi la première dan ɣer ORB Akbou deg useggas 1994 ma tis snat (2e dan) deg useggas 1997 s lmendad n yisleɣmayen ijupunen. Xelqen-d Tiddukkla SAMA (Sport et art martiaux d Akbou) deg useggas 2004, syin wwin-d arraz aɣelnaw amezwaru n teqcicin (cadette), amekkan wis tlata deg useggas 2006. Am wakken teṭṭef yiwet n teqcict-nniḍen amekkan wis tlata (Kumité individuel). Ma deg useggas 2013, ṭṭfen amekkan amezwaru deg talɣuɣa n Lezzayer (Kata-équipe) deg tzeqqa n Harcha. Yewwi-d, diɣ, yiwen unelmad arraz-nniḍen s timmad-is. Ɣer tama n Allaoua Hakim, tella tmeṭṭut-is Fouzia i yesɛan (2e dan) i d-yewwin arraz wis sin deg telɣuɣa n Lezzayer deg useggas 2004, tesselmad arrac imecṭaḥ, ma d netta yesselmad wid itekken deg temsizzilin u yettheggi akka tura (4e dan). Ma ɣef wamek i yessaweḍ ad yexdem sin yimahilen, aselmed akked waddal yenna-d Mass Allaoua : ‘’ aselmed n lkarati, yettili-d timeddiyin n wass akked taggara n ddurt, ma d aselmed di CFPA am nekk am ixeddamen. Bedduɣ ɣef 8 n sbeh, ttfakkaɣ ɣef 4 n tmeddit. Yuεer ad tent-tjemεed di snat, d acu kan yuɣal ɣer tuddsa n wakud n umdan. Nεeggu aṭas, d acu arrac-a uklalen ad yerr walebεed lwelha ɣur-sen’’.. Gar yinelmaden i d-yewwin arrazen, ad nebder : Ourtilane Fazia, Cherdouh Ldjida, Ourtilane Souhila, Ourtilane Yuba, Benadjaoud Lehlou, Mezrani Lekehel d wiyaḍ… 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hakim Ibaliden 

<div> 
  
 Am wakken texdem iseggasen yezrin mi ten-tebda, mazal taɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel tettsemmid ula d aseggas-a iqeddicen-is yerzan areqqeɛ n yiberdan yettwaɣen. Mbeɛd mi tefra yakan deg wayyuren iɛeddan aseggem n kra n yiberdan-nni, gar-asen wid n At Tɛisiwt yeqqnen ɣer Tɛinsert, Tigratin, Tala n Tewrirt, Burafaɛ, Bumeǧber&amp;hellip,; atg, tuɣal-d ussan-a ineggura ad telhu d widak i d-yeqqimen am Magaẓ, Leɛnaser, Talaɛṭa d wiyeḍ. Seld asuter n yimezdaɣ n taddart deg yimdebbren n tɣawant-nsen, d rray n lebɣi imezdi n yineggura-a, akked leɛtab n yixeddamen i yettarran aɛdaz deg tesga, ttilin di ttiɛad yal mara ttwasran, lecɣal n useggem n yiberdan n temnaḍt n Ayt Smaɛel simmal ttenqasen. Neɣ nezmer ad d-nini simmal tettifsus teɛkemt-nsen, teddun ad kfun merra yid-sen. Imi ɣef wawal n uselway n tɣiwant mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi yir iberdan qqelen-d qrib merra d lɛali-ten, ḥaca mazal amur amecṭuḥ maḍi i yettraǧun nnuba-nsen, am win n Tecruft yettawin ɣer Kefrida, akken ad yili uqeddic d ummid war lexsas. Asenfar-a yuɣ lḥal d win yeskecmen tumert deg yimezdaɣ n taddart n Ayt Smaɛel. Imi nnig ucebbeḥ n temnaḍt s yiberdan imaynuten, ula d ttawilat n tikli d nnqel n wayen iweɛren, seg d ɣer sdat tnezduɣin, neɣ seg d ɣer daxel yixxamen, uɣalen sehlen. Ma nefka-d amedya, ad d-nebder abrid yettawin ɣer Tala n Uregrag, i niqal yeččur d iẓra i yessewɛiren tiddi ama i umdan neɣ i tkerrust. Maca taggara-a yettwakkes wugur i waṭas n lɣaci i irezzun ɣer ɣur-s, ladɣa deg unebdu, mi d-yuɣal ubrid-nni am tmeḥḥart i yemmug.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Am yal taddart neɣ tamnaḍt seg temnaḍin n Leqbayel, yal ta amek tesfugul ansayen-is ( Taεacurt, Lmulud, Yennayen…). Ass-agi, nerza ɣer snat n tuddar deg tɣiwant n At Xellili, i wakken ad nẓer amek sfugulen Taεacurt.

 Deg taddart n At Xir, taɣiwant n At Xellili deg tama n Meqlaε i ibeεden azal n 60 n likilumitr ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu, yal aseggas txeddem taεacurt. Tebda ass-nni n larebeεa, 12/10/2016 almi d 15/10/2016, deg tlemmast n taddart-agi. Tettwassen taddart-agi s ufexxar, imi xedmen, yakan, tazrigt tamezwarut n tfaska n ufexxar deg taddart-a, seg 01-03/06/2016, imi, daɣen, azal n 70 n twaculin-is, xeddment afexxar. Tiddukla tadelsant “Isselqam n Talaɣt” n taddart n At Xir d tesqamut n taddart-agi, tanmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, dayra n Meqlaε d tɣiwant n At Xellil, suddsen-d yiwen n leqdic adelsan, ideg sfuglen ansay n Tεacurt. Deg-s, gan aṭas n temsikniyin: lfeṭṭa, idlisen, tamemt, afexxar, tiqendyar n leqbayel, ijeqduren n usɣar, zzit uzemmur, allalen iqburen…atg. Am wakken, daɣen, yella ccna, isefra, ticeqqufin n umezgun, llan ula d iḍebalen. Deg wass amezwaru, 12/10/2016, tella-d yiwet n tejmilt i uḍebbal ameqqran n taddart, “Dda M’barek Tidaf” ad t-yerhem Rebbi. Dɣa sersen tameqqunt n yijeğğigen ɣef uẓekka-as, ɣef 10h n ssbaḥ. D tinagiyin ɣef tudert-is sɣur yimeddukkal-is d twacult-is. Ma deg sin wussan-nni-nniḍen, 13-14/10/2016, llant-d aṭas n temsikniyin n lfeṭṭa, idlisen, tamemt, afexxar d waṭas n trebuyaε n yiḍebalen d kra n tezlatin sɣur aṭas n yifennanen. Ma deg wass aneggaru, 15/10/2016, tella-d yiwet n tejmilt s wazal-is i uḍebbal n taddart “Dda M’barek Tidaf», ideg wwtent aṭas n trebuyaε n yiḍebbalen. Syin akkin, kfan-tt s tmeɣra meqqren, ideg ccnan aṭas n yinaẓuren gar-asen: Karim Khelfaoui, Remdan Mechache, Yousef Guerbas… Di tirza-nneɣ ɣer taddart-agi, nemlal-d aselway n tiddukla tadelsant, Karim Taguine, yenna-aɣ-d: ‘’ad inniɣ Taεacurt tamerbuḥt i yal azzayri, ncallah s kra win i d-yusan ɣer dagi, ɣer taddart-nneɣ, ad as-yeεjeb lḥal. Nekni, si tama-nneɣ, nexdem akk ayen iwumi nezmer, i wakken ad d-asen ferḥen , u ad uɣalen ferḥen. Ad inniɣ tanemmirt s tussda i widak akk i d-iruḥen d wid akk i d-yefkan afus n tallelt i wakken ad d-tili tmeɣra-a meqqren. Tanemmirt, daɣen, i uɣmis n yimaziɣen. Ad d-nesmekti belli d tiddukla tadelsant “Isselqam n talaɣt” n taddart-agi n At Xir, i d-iheggan leqdic-agi adelsan. Tebda leqdicat-is idelsanen deg useggas n 1991. D nettat i d-ittheggin yal aseggas tameɣra-agi meqqren. Ma deg taddart n Leɣrus, taɣiwant n At Xellili deg tama n Meqlaε. i ibeεdn s wazal n 55 n likilumitr ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu, yal aseggas txeddem timecreḍt deg tεacurt. Taseqamut n taddart d imezdaɣ-is, suddsen-d yiwet n lewziεa, ideg seččen akk taddart s uksum. Anida i d-tella yiwet lweεda, ideg i d-fkan At taddart 2 yizgaren i wakken ad ten-zlun d waṭas n yidrimen ara tessexdem taddart deg useddu n yisenfaren n unegmu. Ass-nni n taεacurt, 12/10/2016, εeddan-d akk ɣef yixxamen n taddart s tawwurt s tewwurt, jemεen timellalin d ufḍir (aḥeddur), u ad rnun idrimen. Syin akkin, wwin-ten akk ɣer tejmaεt n taddart. Aksum-nni, ferqen-t ɣef wat taddart, yal yiwen yewwi amur-is ula d timellalen d ufḍir yal yiwen s leḥq-is. Ma d idrimen-nni, gan-ten deg texriḍt n taddart, mi ten-ḥwajen ad ten-id-kksen. Ad d-nesmekti belli taddart-agi, tettekki deg temsizzelt-nni n tezdeg “Aissat Rabah” n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, deg tezrigt-is tis 4.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Deg tɣiwant n Ain El Hemmam 

 Am yal aseggas, imezdaɣ n Michli sfugulen taɛacurt , ama s tmezla n yizgaren neɣ n wakraren. Ttawin lewɛadi ɣer lemqamat am Jeddi Mengellat neɣ Ccix Muḥend , imi seg zik ttasen-d ula seg temnaḍin nniḍen, ttasen-d ula seg Yiɛeẓugen , seg Tizi Uzzu, seg Lezzayer. Aseggas-a, yemxalaf ɣef yiseggasen-nniḍen imi seg zik lemqam n CcixMuḥend yettaɛmar, aseggas –a ikemmel yeɛmer, Dda Lḥusin Ayt Aḥmed yettwanṭel dinna , sdat tewwurt n lemqam n jeddi-s , fursen tagnit wid ur d-nusi ara asmi yenṭel imi ulac ula d abrid imir, dɣa d tagnit n zzyara n lemqam d uẓekka ɣef tikkelt. Yerna mačči ass n tɛacurt kan i d- ttasen ɣer din. Seg wass n tɛacurt, lɣaci, ur ḥebbsen alamma tezri ddurt neɣ snat : yal wa d acu i d-yettawi ɣer dinna ; llant tlawin i d-yerban, ttawint-d igerdan , suffuɣent lwaɛda, tarbut n seksu tameqqrant s uksum d imenda , ttawin-d daɣen tiẓidanin ; llan wid i d-yettawin akraren imuddiren, zellun-ten dinna , deg uxxam n Ccix ; ttasen-d wid yuḍnen, deɛɛun akken ad ḥlun. Wid i d-yettasen mi kecmen ɣer lemqam, ad sersen idrimen , ttubbun ɣer wanu ( lbir) i d-yezgan tama n wadda n uxxam n ccix, ttagmen-d aman, tella dinna tekwat saɣayen ticemmaɛin, ttalin ɣer twacult n Ccix, daɣen, i d-yezgan usawen nnig lemqam, ttawwin-d lfal, lemlaḥ d ssker i lbaraka akken id –qqaren seg leɛwayed n lejdud, yerna aṭas i yettamnen s zzyara-agi, imi d yiwen wansay seg wansayen n leqbayel yellan seg zzman aqbur.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani / Zakia Ben yahia 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Am yal aseggas, mi ara d-taweḍ lɛid tameqqrant, ttheggin-d yimdanen ikerri i tmezliwt. Ma yella tiwaculin n tudrin, ttaɣent-d ɣef zik lḥal ixef-a, neɣ ɛad sɛant-t deg uxxam yakan, ma tiwaculin i izedɣen timdinin, ttɣimint alamma d ussan ineggura i wakken ad d-aɣent ikerri.

 Aya, yesɛa sebba, neɣ ugar n yiwet, imi deg tnezduɣin n temdinin ur yelli ttawil yellan i wakken ad ssensent deg-s ikerri. Ihi, ttɣimint alamma d ussan ineggura uqbel lɛid tameqqrant. Ayagi, igellu-d tikwal s kra n yiɣilifen. Aɣilif amezwaru d akken amdan ara d-yaɣen s lemɣawla aɣersiw-a, ur yesɛi ara aṭas n lxetyar, ama seg tama n ssuma, neɣ seg tama n tezmert n yikerri. Seg wakken iḥar ɣer lbiɛ, anda yufa ad t-id-yaɣ mebla ma iwala lecɣal-nniḍen yerzan ɣer sseḥa n yikerri-nni. 

 Aṭas n yimdanen, dɣa, ur d-nettaɣ ara aɣersiw n lɛid deg yimekwan yettwaheggan s wudem unṣib i lbiɛ n wakraren n lɛid anda llan yimejjayen n lmal i yettɛassan ɣef tezmert n yikerri, meḥsub ma iwulem ad yemzel neɣ ala. Aṭas n wakraren i ihelken iwumi ugin yimejjawen i yimawlan-nsen i wakken ad ten-ssenzen, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen seg-sen. Ɣef wakka, dɣa, ttheggin-d yimawlan n yiɣersiwen imekwan n usenzi i yiman-nsen, deg tamiwin yeṭṭurfen, i ibeɛden ɣef wallen n yimḍebbren yettɛassan ɣef lecɣal-agi. Yerna, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n ubabat « Axir ad d-taɣeḍ deg yimekwan-agi yellan berra, deg yiberdan, wala wid-nni yettwaheggan ɣef ddemma. Axater ssuma, temxalaf. Yezmer ad tafeḍ alamma d 4000DA n umgarad gar ssuma n yiwen n yikkeri yesɛan tafekka- kif kif-itt ». Yewweḍ wazal n yikerri deg ssuq, aseggas-a, gar 20 000 DA alamma d 50 000DA d asawen. Acu kan aɣbel ameqqran i walan yimejjayen-agi n yiɣersiwen d akken aksum n wakraren-agi i d-yekkan seg tama n unẓul, ur ittaṭṭaf ara lḥamu mi ara t-tezluḍ. Ma teǧǧiḍ-t kra n tsaɛtin kan mebɛed timezliwt-is, ad yexser. Sebba n waya yekka-d « Seg leɛlaf i tetten. Ulac tuga i asen-ilaqen, tenqes aṭas. Ihi, tteɣramen-asen-tt s wayen-nniḍen, s yisufar-nni i tetten yiyuẓaḍ : akbal d kra n yisufar. Aya, igellu-d s ubeddel n tɣara n uksum n yikerri », i d-yenna yiwen n umejjay n lmal i yettweṣṣin wid-nni ara yezlun ikerri i wakken ad meḍlen deg wakal tacelwidt-nni n waman d yiẓerman n uɣesiw mačči d aḍegger ara ten-ḍeggren, acku ma ččan-ten yiɣesiwen, ad ssuzren lehlakat-nniḍen. « Win yebɣan ad yezlu ikerri-ines deg umekkan yettwaheggan i lemnd n waya, yezmer ad t-yawi ass-nni n lɛid sbeḥ », ikemmel yenna-d umejjay-a. Nessaram d lǧib kan ara tent-yaɣen mačči ula d tazmert n yimdanen. Lɛid tameggazt i yal yiwen.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Tura deg umaḍal n tsekla ed yidlisen, ur d-nettmaggar kan asnulfu n wa neɣ d wa, d tamedyezt, d tasrit, d amezgun neɣ d kra nniḍen, i d-yekkan seg tekti tudmawant. Maca ula d asenf nniḍen deg tewsit-a yuɣal yettbin-d s ṭṭaqa ɣef ṭṭwabel n tnedlisin: wa d asezgi (l’adaptation) neɣ tasuqilt (la traduction). Aṭas i nettwali taggara-ya d imyura izwawen suqulen-d idlisen n yimyura iberraniyen nniḍen, tarran-ten-id ɣer tmaziɣt neɣ ɣer tezwawt. Seg tama, llan wid ara d-yinin aya d ayen yelhan, yessebɣar tafarest (production) taseklant s tutlayt n Lmulud At Mɛemmer, rnu yettak tagnit i yimeɣri azwaw ad iɣer s tutlayt tikti n wa neɣ d wa seg umaḍal merra, war ma yerra ɣer tutlayt tawerdant i yezmer ahat ur tt-yessin, ladɣa ma d taglizit, neɣ d tutlayt nniḍen i ur nelli d tafransist neɣ d taɛrabt, imi tineggura-ya d tid i ɣran tuget n yizwawen.Maca wiyaḍ, ttwalin mačči d ayen ur nelhi, am wakken ur d ayen igerrzen daɣen tama n usnulfu. Yettusemma ma tuɣal i ufran gar usnulfu ed usuqel ulac wara d-yinin s tmuɣli tamatut d asuqel axir. Ḥaca ma yella ayen ara d-yettwasnulfun ad yesɛu aswir d ameẓyan, deg wadda, ma d ayen ara d-yettwassuqlen ad yili yuli uswir-is, ad yeɛjeb i waṭas n medden. Ihi, seg wannect-a ad nefhem belli ahat d tikci-nni, d aswir-nni amḍlan i ixussen deg wannar imi tutlayin d yiwet-nsent merra? Rnu, ɣas ad tili telḥa tutlayt-a ugar n ta, yak d ugur ara d-imager yiwen deg usnulfu ara d-yemlil deg usuqel !<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;">Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Tezga-d taddart-a gar sin yisaffen. Asif deg umalu, wayeḍ deg usamar. Tezdew s idis n teẓgi n Ukefadu. Tajumma-s meqqret mačči d izli, mačči dayen d ttaṭṭafent wallen. Lqaɛa-ines di tama, tuli, di tayeḍ, tṣubb, ulac aṭas n lemqiɛda.

 Abrid n ukeṛṛus neɣ abrid ameqran akken i as-qqarent temɣarin, yebḍa-tt ɣef snat n tamiwin : tama n ufella akked tama n wadda. Abrid-agi, ur yessufuɣ ara, yessawaḍ kan imezdaɣ n taddart ɣer taddart. Aṭas n yiberdan ireqqaqen i yicergen tizenqatin n taddart, ssufuɣen akken ma llan ɣer ubrid ukeṛṛus. Ixammen-is, sedṛen wa deffir wa, wa isenned ɣef wayeḍ, wa ɛlay, wa yerxa. Imezdeɣ n taddart, nnernan s waṭas, fɣen akk s lebni ɣer beṛṛa n taddart, ǧǧan taddart taqdimt. Ixammen imaynuten, meqqin-d am treɣla deg yigran. Tuɣal taddart, tettak anzi ɣer temdint s tmezduɣin-is ɛlayen akked tḥuna di yal amkan. Deg ubrid ɣer taddart taqdimt, ad ak-id-iqabel yiwen uxxam aqdim. Am yixxamen akk yellan dinna, iqermud-is yerdem, tasga-ines tcuff, kra n yidɣaɣen grurjen-d ɣer lqaɛa. Aɛric n tejnant, yerra tili i ubrid yettawin ɣer tewwurt n uxxam. Tajnant ur tufi afus ara tt-iẓebbren, kra n triwa, ɛelqent-d am iẓedyen, ma d iguza ulac, kra n tɛeqqayin kan i d-yettbanen. Lluḥ n tewwurt n beṛṛa, icudd s ileẓwi ɣer tmeddict n lluḥ wis sin i d-iqureɛ umder, taẓekṛunt-is teclex, tɛelleq. Di lferca, mazal tamuqqint n qlilu, tenta gar-as d ṛṛef. Afrag-is, tezdeɣ-it tsussmi, ulint-d teblaḍin-is. Tiɣemmar-ines, yuli-tent uberčečču n tissist. Deffir n tewwurt n daxel, mazal tasebbalt teččur d aman akked tseṭṭa n tidegt, iferriwen-is qquren. Tumlilt iselɣen tasga, teslex-d teɣli-d ɣef ulemsir yersen ɣef tesrirt. Tixmiṛt iselɣen tiɣerɣert, wwten deg-s iɣisan, teftutes. Mazal acbayli di teɣmert, taqruct tqeccem tɛelleq s ilni ɣer ujgu. Aẓeṭṭa, celxen ifeggagen-is, kra n wulman cudden ɣer tjebbadin, aqerdac yerres s idis-is. Mazal ciṭuḥ n yiɣed sdaxel n lkanun, seg yidisan-is, rsen yinyen, kra n yilɣan, kra n tseḍwa n uceṭṭub akked teqcert taḥeḍmant. Kra n yijeqduren, rsen wa ɣef wa deg wagens : taccuyt, taseksut, tabaqit, aɣenja, tabuqalt,…atg Takufit d ukufi ffuncen, mazal-iten rsen ɣef udebder war tidima. Adaynin, yeččur d timercalin n tuga, maca ulac tayuga. Takanna seg wayen tɛebba, tekna, taḍwiqt-is yetthuzzu-tt ubeḥri, tettẓenẓun. Deffir n uxxam, iban-d uqwir, xas akken lal-is teǧǧa-t, netta mazal yettaǧǧa-d, mazal taga akked tɣeddiwt tmeqqi-d deg wakal-is. Ma tkemmleḍ abrid, ad tɛeddiḍ nnig tala. Ad tt-tafeḍ d tilemt, teḥzen, deg ucercur-is ur d-tecerbubeḍ tiqit n waman. Di tesga-ines, tehruri, iqermuden-ines, ɛelqen gar yigenni akked tmurt. Abrid-is d ilem, yebda irgel-it inijjel, dayen ur tettawint ara tullas. Asariǧ deg i tessen yiqḍaren yudam, yeẓqef. Yessufuɣ ubrid n tala srid ɣer tejmaɛt, ula d nettat d tilemt, ula d amɣar ur yettnuḥ. Lkanun-is, yeččur d iɣed, mazal kra n yisufa tessager tmest. Ssqef-is, yessebrek-it duxxan, ttbanen-d kra n iṭiṭucen deg yiqermuden yerẓen, kra iqujjimen deg-s ɣlin-d ɣer tɣerɣert-ines. Tiɛettabin deg ttɣiman yimɣaren, yuli-tent uɣebbar.

  Fahim Messaoudène 

  
 Ameẓyan Lewnnas d yiwen umedyaz, umaru ameqqran deg tmurt Leqbayel, yesfra s tutlayt n tmaziɣt d tefransist. D imsuqel seg tutlayt n tmaziɣt ɣer tefransist, neɣ mgal s tefransist ɣer tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Yesuqel aṭas n yidlisen; ama d wid n yimyura n tmurt-nneɣ, neɣ d wid n yimyura iberranyen. Ilul ass n 10 deg agur n Furar 1968, deg Makuda, deg tmurt n Leqbayel, lwilaya n Tizi wezzu, deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Axeddim-is yella yakan d aselmad n tutlayt tmaziɣt, i wazal n 10 n yiseggasen, seg tallit-nni n usekcem n tutlayt n tmaziɣt ɣer uɣerbaz Azzayeri, si 1995 armi 2005. yesɣer deg uɣerbaz alemmas (C E M) Caεllal di lεarc n At Aṭṭuc, ma d tura d amεiwen n ttrebyya (Adjoin d’education) deg tesnawit Muḥmed Saԑid Ddiwani deg Makuda. D amedyaz d amaru atrar n tmedyazt d tmucuha, ama s tmaziɣt neɣ s tefransist. Deg uḥric n tẓuri, qedceɣ deg waṭas yeḥricen yemgarden n lfen. Yettaru daɣen timucuha s snat n tutlayin-a yezrin (tamaziɣt d tefransist), yettkki deg waṭas n tidukliwin tidelsanin n tmurt Leqbayel, gar-asent: Tidukkla Tadelsant « Idles » lwilaya n Tizi Wezzu, Tidukkla Tadelsant « Tala n Tusnna » n ugezdur n Tizi Wezzu, amaken daɣen yettekki deg waṭas n tfaskiwin i d-yettilin deg-s. Yebda tira n tmedyazt deg useggas n 1986, asmi yella yesԑa 16 n yiseggasen deg leԑmer-is, ussan-nni yella d anelmad deg tesnawit n Buxalfa. Ma si tama n usizreg n yidlisen-is, deg useggas n 2012 yesuffeɣ-d ammud n tmucuha-ines i tikelt tamezwarut, ɣer tizrigin « Richa Elsam », yeffka-as azwel « TIMUCUHA « . Seg 2012 ɣer ass-a yesazreg-d 5 n yidlisen n tmedyazt s 2 n tutlayin ; 4 seg-sen d ammuden n yisefra s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, amenzu yella-d usuffeɣ-is deg useggas n 2012, iwumi isma  » Timucuha » aḥric amenzu, yella-d d tasuqilt i tmucuha n « Jean de la Fontaine » . Ma d wis sin « Timucuha » aḥric wis sin, dima d tasuqilt seg trumit ɣer tmaziɣt n tmucuha n « Jean de la Fontaine ». Yesazreg-it-id mbaԑd mi yezri useggas ɣef uḥric-nni amezwaru. Ma deg uḥric n tmedyazt-is, yura kraḍ (03) n yidlisen n yisefra, sin seg-sen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Amezwaru d ammud n yisefra iwumi isma « Uḍan n temẓi » i d-yeffɣen deg useggas 2014. Ma d wis sin dima d ammud n yisefra iwumi yeffka azwel  » Tirga d Ccfawat, i d-yesazreg deg useggas-a 2015. Ma s tutlayt n tefransist yesuffeɣ-d kan yiwen n wammud n yisefra, iwumi yesma « Nuits de Jeunesse » , yella-d d tasuqilt i udlis-is « Uḍan n temẓi ». Adlis-is wis ukuẓ (04) d tacguft n umezgun n unallas ameqqran « Anton Tchekhov », i yura deg useggas n 1903, i d-yesuqel seg tutlayt n tefransist « Une demade au mariage » ɣer tutlayt n tmaziɣt « Lexḍubegga, i d-yellan deg useggas n 2013. Yesuqel daɣen i waṭas imyura idlisen-nsen seg tutlayt n tmaziɣt ɣer tutlayt n tefransist, gar-asen: « Kamal Sabi », d « Ḥsen Maric « ; seg tmaziɣt « Tibernint D Ssellum », ɣer trumit « La Toupie et L’échelle ». Ma d isental iɣef yettaru tmedyazt-is, tamuɣli-is tcud aṭas ɣer kraḍ (03) n yisental igejdanen : amenzu d Lḥif d lmeḥna, wis sin d Tayri-is, wis tlata d idles amaziɣ, tutlayt n tyemmat d umezruy-is. Ma d isental isnawiyen ( scoundrels) Tijmlin, Tidyanin n Tayri, Temẓi, Abujal neɣ Abujad, Lefraq…atg . 

<p style="text-align: right;"> ADAOUN Abdelghani. 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Gar-aɣ d kra n wagguren kan ad d-yeffeɣ umaynut n tcennayt tameqqrantYasmina. Deg album-agi ajdid, ad ilint azal n 12 n tezlatin i tessekles yakan. Am wakken i tuɣ tannumi tcennayt tettawi-d ugar n yisental ɣef lehmum n ddunit d wayen yeḍran yid-s, ula d tikkelt-a, ur tunif ara i lɛadda-agi-ines. Gar tezlatin i tura ɣef tmeddurt-is d wayen i tt-yerḥan, ad naf : Ucmiten, Ifat lḥal, Lḥiɣ di leɛmer, Axxam n waḍu, Tilufa, Ini-as i yemma. Deg umaynut-agi n ccna n tnaẓurt-agi taqbaylit, ddeqs n tejmilin i terra i yimdanen i yellan deg wul-is, yecban, Jida-as, Kheloui Lounes d JSK. Ula d tameddurt-is, teɛreḍ ad as-d-teg agzul deg yiwet n tezlit iwumi tefka isem «Taddart-iw». D asmekti n wayen tesɛedda deg ddunit-is : seg wasmi tella meẓẓiyet armi tunag ɣer Fransa. Tebda aktayen-is seg Ugni n Uɛayed anda yella lǧameɛ i yebnan s uẓru. Syin, teṣṣaweḍ slam i warrac n Yizarugen tenna : «ɛeddi ɣur-sen, huzz afriwen, deg yigenni zzi, afeg ɛelli. Siwel-asen i warrac n Yizarugen, d tiɣri n temẓi i d-yesmektan Zaɛzi». Dinna i d-temmekta aṭas n tɣawsiwin. Temmekta-d abeḥri n tɣaltin, ajenjel timrict, Tala n Tzeɣwin anda tedduri timidkin imi tewḥec deg ṭṭlam. Temmekta-d ula d asmi i tettbedda ɣef yimnaren n yixxamen mi tessutur leɣbar i txeddem d ticcict. ‘’I telḥiḍ ay aḍar, adrar aẓaɣar, teṣɛeb ddunit. Asusi, d uḥemmer, asewwi, aseqcer, semman-iyi tuḥrict». i d-tenna deg wawal-is. Tecfa am zun d iḍelli ɣef wayen i as-yeḍran, i wayen tesɛedda. Tecfa ɣef umezzir i d-tekkes, ɣef ulemsir iɣef teqqim, ɣef gerninuc i tečča. Tecfa ula ɣef lbir-nni anda i d-tugem aman deg Tgemmunt n Ukerruc. Wamag ɣef wasmi i tettruḥu ɣer uɣebaz, tules-as-d s teɣzi akked tehri, d tajmilt ahat i temddakkalt-is Saliha, teqqar : «Akken i neddukul d Saliḥa ɣer lakkul. Abrid Umegdul, yusa-yi-d ɣef wul, amzun d iḍelli. S rrekba n uɣyul, ttawiɣ lemtul, s sḍa d cnawi. Dagi mi d-nlul, amennuɣ iḍul, ay Iɣil n Yifri». Deg taggara, tudder-d s usḥissef uguren i tt-yeǧgân tunag ɣer lɣerba, ad teǧǧ tamurt-is mebla lebɣi. «Ay abuneqqar, i yi-yentan deg uḍar, di tegrest n Tulmut d Lḥedd n Sliman. Aslen deg ucekkar, aqejmur iqedder, anwa ara irun fell-i, ɛebbi rnu kan. Grirbeɣ deg yiɣzer, uliɣ asawen meqqer, ḥedd ma tɣiḍeɣ, luleɣ-d di lemḥan. Cerkeɣ lebḥar, abrid-iw yenǧer, ruḥeɣ ǧǧiɣ-ken, d lɣerba i yi-yeččan». Terra tezlit-agi d asaru ameẓẓyan (Clip) ara d-yeffɣen sya d afella. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine Moula 

<div> 
  
 Cwiṭ akka a-tt-a tuɣal-d tenna-as : 

 -A nnger-ik ma d wagi i d amger ! Wagi d-tewwiḍ akka d lemqes ay argaz mačči d amger ! Ah ! A tameṭṭut! D amger i d-uɣeɣ mačči d lemqes ! 

 Ikker-d urgaz-nni iruḥ ad iwali s wallen-is ma s tidet ayen i as-teqqar tmeṭṭut-is. Iddem-d ayen akken deg yenneḍ umger-nni, ifsi-t-id issawel-as yenna-as :

  S leɛqel-im i telliḍ a tameṭṭut ! Acu t-akka ara d-teqqareḍ ? I wagi mačči d amger ? Argaz irfed-d amger seg ufus-is isneɛt as-t i tmeṭṭut-is. 

 -Wagi d lemqes ay argaz mačči d amger ! 

 -Xzu ciṭan inɛel-it a tameṭṭut, wagi d amger ur yelli s nnig-is ur yelli ddaw-as. 

 -Nniɣ-ak-in wagi d lemqes, mačči kečč kelxen-k-id nekk ad iyi-tkellxeḍ. 

 Tameṭṭut tugi ad tebru i wawal, ttnaɣen akken, netta iqqar-as d amger nettat teqqar-as wagi d lemqes. Argaz issusem iruḥ am win ur numin ara iman-is.

  Azekka-nni ikker zik, iruḥ yuɣal ɣer win akken i as-id-izenzen amger-nni. Deg ubrid argaz d-yemlal ad as-isneɛt amger-nni ad t-isteqsi ma d amger neɣ d lemqes. Nnan-as-id akk d amger mačči d lemqes. A win isteqsa ad d-yezzi ɣer-s ɣer deffir ad -as-id-istebɛa tamuɣli, wehmen akk deg urgaz-agi d acu t-yuɣen neɣ d acu i t-id-ibdan akka ! Wa yenna aḥlil, wa yenna meskin wa yenwa maḍi d lweɛda i yebɣa… 

 Argaz, ikemmel abrid-is alammi yewweḍ ɣer win i as-id-izenzen amger. Ikcem ɣur-s, issers-as zdat-s amger-nni yenna-as : 

 -A leflani iḍelli xelseɣ-ak-in amger tefkiḍ-iyi-d lemqes. 

 -Wwah ay argaz ! D amger i ak-n-fkiɣ. Ma ihwa-ak ad ak-t-in-bedleɣ meɛna ur iyi-d-qqar ara kan wagi mačči d amger ! Yerna yak tessneḍ-iyi werǧin i k-zenzeɣ ayen ur nelhi ara. Ar taggara ma ur tebɣiḍ ara ad t-tawwiḍ ulac uɣilif ad ak-in-rreɣ isurdiyen-ik…Meɛna ay argaz n lɛali wagi i d amger.

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Tezga-d Tizi Hibel deg lɛerc n Wat Ɛisi, At Dwala akka tura. D taddart n Fadhma Ath Mansour akked Mouloud Feraoun. D taddart,diɣ, n Massinissa Guermah, ilemẓi amezwaru i yeɣlin deg tefsut taberkan, ass n 18 deg yebrir 2001, s terṣasin n yiǧadermiyen. Xas ulamma ḥemmlen yilmeẓyen tamurt, meɛna amur ameqqran deg-sen yunag ɣer tmura n berra : rewlen i yir tudert d lmizirya, akken i aɣ-d-nnan wid-nni yeqqimen. ‘’Taddart, sima tettenqas : deg useggas n 1963, llan 2000 n yimezdaɣ. Akka tura ur wwiḍen ara 1200 n yimezdaɣ’’. I d-yenna Mass Khelifa Guermah.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Takerḍa n Tizi Hibel 

 Akka tura, Tizi Hibel tefreq ɣef tlata tudrin : Agouni Arous, tagragra d Tizi Hibel. Zik, yeddukel cmel-nsent. Deg taggara-a,yal yiwet tewwi timanit-is. Tesɛa tilisa akked Takhoukht seg usamar, seg umalu ad naf Taguemmount Azouz, seg ugafa, Taourirt Moussa, ma seg unẓul, tqubel-itt-id Ouadhias. Yella uɣerbaz deg taddart-a seg useggas 1893. Iselmaden imezwura, d Mass d Massa Carrière, syin usan-d Mass Amhis d Djander seg Ait yenni d wiyaḍ. Zyada ɣef uɣerbaz-a, llan wiyaḍ-nniḍen n yimṛabḍen n yirumyen deg taddart n Taguemmount Azouz. Ruḥent temṛabḍin n yiṛumyen (Timasurin) deg useggas n 1975. Taddart n Tizi Hibel kan weḥd-s, tesɛa 3 n yiderman u yal adrum s lǧameɛ-is : Aït Hamdi,sɛan Ccix Tayeb ; Aït Amar Ou Abdellah, sɛan Sidi Hammou Ou Belkacem ma d Aït Hamza, ɣur-sen Sidi Amar Tafilalt. Ma dayen yeɛnan addal d yidles, ad naf snat n tiddukliwin tidelsanin akked snat-nniḍen n waddal: Tiddukla tadelsant Mouloud Feraoun d Tiddukla tadelsant Tigawt. Ma d tid n waddal, tella ESTizi Hibel d FCAgouni Arous.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Isem Tizi Hibel 

 Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, Hibel ur d-yekki ara deg wawal n taɛrabt ‘’yehbel’’ neɣ ‘’Tissirt n waḍu’’ akken nwan kra. Awal ‘’Hibel’’ d isem n yiwen n umdan i d-yusan seg Lmarruk, tama n rrif, netta akked wayeḍ-nniḍen iwumi qqaren ‘’Ufilali’’ neɣ ‘’Tafilalt’’. Aneggaru-a, yesɛa lǧameɛ ɣef yisem-is deg Tizi Hibel : lǧameɛ n Sidi Amar Tafilalt.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Amezruy d tmetti. 

 Deg taggara-a, Tizi Hibel tebḍa ɣef tlata n tudrin : Agouni Arous, Tagragra d Tizi Hibel. Acu kan, xas yal ta tessedduy iman-is s yiman-is, meɛna aṭas n temsal ay tent-yesddukkulen, ladɣa ayen yeɛnan izamulen n umezruy. Akka ara naf, taddart n Agouni Arous, tettarra tajmilt i yimjuhad yal 20 ɣuct, Tizi Hibel txeddem tameɣra n 5 yulyu, ma Tagragra txeddem tin n umezwaru deg unbir. Deg Tizi Hibel, amur ameqqran n yimdanen, unagen. Aṭas n yixxamen i nufa d ilmawen. Ixxamen iqdimen, raben u qqimen akken. Ula d Taqaɛet n yiḍebbalen i yellan mechuret, teččur d ablaḍ d wakal n zik. Tijummuyaɛ, zgant d tilmawin : ulac win ara yeqqimen deg-sent, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan. Kra deg leqhawi, wiyaḍ deg uxxam neɣ anda-nniḍen. ‘’Zik, nettɣimi deg tejmaɛt. Ma d tura ulac ukud ara teqqimeḍ. Tbeddel taddart udem. Ula d lɛaqiliya,nezmer ad d-nini tbeddel acemma’’. I aɣ-d-yenna Dda Chabane.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tajmaɛt zik-nni 

 Tajmaɛt zik-nni, mačči kan i yiɣimi neɣ i usteɛfu, tesɛa azal d yiswi deg tmetti. ‘’Tajmaɛt d lakul. Din i ilemmed umeẓyan ɣer umeqqran. Ama d ttrebga neɣ d amahil. Ad naf ttmeslayen ɣef wamek xeddmen tafellaḥt : amek d melmi kerzen, melmi d wamen teẓẓun. Xeddmen iqecwula, ttxiḍin tibardiwin u nekni nlemmed. Neɣ yal wa yesselmad i wayeḍ’’. Akka i d-yenna yiwen umɣar. ‘’Asmi meẓẓiyeɣ, iceyyeɛ-iyi baba ɣer tḥanut akken ad d-awiɣ skur d lqahwa. Taḥanut-nni, tella ɣer rrif n tejmaɛt. ihi, mi ɛeddaɣ sdat n tejmaɛt ur asen-nniɣ ara alxir fell-awen. Mi wwḍeɣ ɣer tḥanut, ilum-iyi akk bab-is. Yenna-yi-d : ’’amek ara d-tɛeddiḍ sdat n tejmaɛt, ur asen-teqqareḍ ara alxir fell-awen ? Zik yal wa yeqqar hemma i umecṭuḥ. d ttrebga’’. Ikemmel yenna umɣar-nni.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Ihellilen akked Tqaɛet n yiḍebbalen 

 Deg tlemmast n taddart, yella yiwen umekkan qqaren-as ‘’Taqaɛet n yiḍebbalen’’, yudder-itt ula M.Feraoun deg ungal-is. Acu kan netta yefka-as isem ‘’La place des musiciens’’. Ala isem-is i d-yeqqim akka tura. Teččur s ublaḍ n yixxamen-nni iraben. Aṭas i yesḥassfen ɣef liḥala-agi uɣur tewweḍ imi taqaɛet-agi tekcem deg waktayen n taddart. ‘’Xas ulamma, zik-nni, nxus deg cci, meɛna nedder deg lferḥ d talwit. Tudert, tesɛa lbenna. S kra kan n ttawilat, nexleq-d tiswiɛin n unecreḥ d lferḥ : ccna, iḍebbalen d uhellel deg remḍan’’. I yesḥassef yiwen umezdaɣ. Zik-nni, deg remḍan, akken kan ad d-yaweḍ lawan n ṣḥur, ad d-fɣen yilmeẓyen seg leqhawi, ad bdun, ad kkaten abendayer u ttcewwiqen (ad tthellilen), ad d-ttezzin i taddart i wakken ad ten-id-ssakin ɣer ṣḥur. D tagnit i ttfarasen yimdanen i ciṭ n unecraḥ d zhu : tekksen ciṭ ɣef wulawen u snefsusiyen leɛtab n yal ass.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Imezdaɣ n Tizi Hibel deg Verdun, lgirra-nni (1914-1918) 

 Azal n 14 n yimdanen n Tizi Hibel i iruḥen ɣer Fransa iwakken ad ttekkin deg umennuɣ-nni n temdint n Verdun deg lgirra n 1914-1918 anda mmuten d luluf izzayriyen, gar-asen 11 n Tizi Hibel imi ala tlata i d-yuɣalen ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan. I usmekti. Ruḥen ɣer temdint-a, 20 000 izzayriyen, yeqqim umennuɣ ugar n 300 n wussan.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Agouni Arous ass-a 

 Xas akken teḥres teswiɛt, txus lxedma u ilmeẓyen ḍaɛen ɣef wakken i d-nnan, meɛna imḍebbren n taddart-a, ttaɛraḍen akken ad as-fken udem-nniḍen i tudert-nsen. ‘’Taddart-nneɣ, tesedduy-itt tesqamut n taddart. Nettnejmaɛ am zik. Nettaɛraḍ ad d-naf tifrat s yiman-nneɣ i wuguren i d-nettmaggar. Nxeddem ticemlit, timecredt d kra n tmeɣriwin, tijmilin d tfaskiwin deg unebdu. Akken i as-qqaren : ‘’nteddu akken nufa, mačči akken nebɣa.’’ Akka i aɣ-d-yenna uselway n tesqamut n taddart-a, mass Grine Khaled. ‘’Dagi ilmeẓyen, rwan-tent. Ulac axeddim, ulac tafellaḥt-nni n zik. Ula d azemmur, yerɣa. Rwan msakit lmizirya. Win iwaɛan, yerwel, wayeḍ yedder s tmara’’. I d-yenna yiwen deg-sen. Ma d Madjid, anaẓur, mačči d tagi i d tamuɣli-s imi yesɛa sin n yimahilen : ixeddem d aɛessas u d anaẓur n yal taɣawsa. Akka ara t-naf yettleqqim tjur, ixeddem tiɛekkzin d tẓuri s umata, ayen yeɛna asɣar. 

<p style="text-align: center;">  Abruy seg teqsidt n Fadhma Ath Mansour 

 Ameslay ɣef Fadhma Ath Mansour deg Tizi Hibel, yettasa-d ẓẓay ciṭ ɣer yimezdaɣ. Xas ulamma ur yelli d acu texdem netta, meɛna tudert-is teqqen ɣer ‘’tucḍa’’ n yemma-s Aïni n taddart Taourirt Moussa Ouamar i d-izewǧen ɣer taddart n Tizi Hibel. Mebɛed mi yemmut urgaz n yemma-s, yeḍra-d wayen i d-yeḍran gar yemma-s d yiwen urgaz ukud temyeḥmal, syin tlul-d Fadhma Ath Mansour meɛna yugi wina ad yesteɛref yis-s imi yella yexḍeb, yakan, yiwet-nniḍen u ggulen yimawlan n teqcict, deg-s, i wakken ad tt-yaɣ. Syin i tebda lehmum n temẓi-s. Deg taggara tezweǧ ɣer Yighil Ali. Tlul Fadhma Ath Mansour deg useggas n 1882 deg Tizi Hibel. Tudert-is s telqayt, teḥka-tt-id deg udlis iwumi tsemma ‘’Histoire de ma vie’’ i tura deg useggas n 1946 i d-yefɣen deg useggas n 1968 ɣer tezrigin Maspero deg Fransa. Yella,akka tura, i win mazal ur ad t-yeɣri. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tadyant n Massinissa Guermah 

 Massinissa Guermah d ilemzi-nni nɣan yiǧadermiyen deg Wat Dwala deg wass n 18 deg yebrir 2001. Netta n taddart Agouni Arous. Ufan deg tfekka-s 24 n terṣaṣin. Syin i tendeh tefsut taberkant anda mmuten ugar n 127 d ilemẓi. ’’Win i t-yewwten, qqaren-as Mestani Fateh. ¨hekkmen-as sin n yiseggasen, meɛna llan wid i t-iwalan deg Annaba, ur d-yesɛedda ara lḥebs.’’ I aɣ-d-yenna ɛemmi-s Khaled. ‘’Tadyant n leɛrac teǧǧa-aɣ-d cwami. Mačči d dduwla i nettagad, meɛna d leqbayel. Yettuɣaḍ lḥal mi ara as-qqaren ṭṭfen-d tijjaɛal sɣur dduwla. Ddunit-nneɣ akk terwi. Lehlak, neǧǧa-d lxedma-nneɣ. Baba-s, ha-t-an iruḥ deg-sent’’. Ikemmel yenna-d ɛemmi-s-nniḍen Nacer. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Lkarmus deg yir lawan 

 Am yal taddart n leqbayel, tasekla timawit teččur d taḥkayin. Nnan-d d akken yiwen n Ccix iceyyeɛ yiwet n tmeṭṭut ɣer leɣrus i wakken ad as-d-tawi lkarmus. Tameṭṭut, tenna-as i Ccix mačči d lawan-is. Yenṭeq Ccix yenna-as : ’’ruḥ ɣer din, tawiḍ-iyi-d lkarmus i am-nniɣ’’ ! Mi truḥ ɣer umekkan, tufa din lkarmus, tewwi-as-t-id i Ccix. Acu kan mi tuɣal ad tekkes i nettat,ur tufi acemma. Ulac lkarmus-nni deg yir lawan.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Askeɛrer n Bougheraba d Ccix n lǧameɛ 

 Yella yiwen urgaz segmi ara d-yekker ara d tixidas, ala askeɛrer ɣef lɣaci armi amur ameqqran n yimdanen ur tettlaɛin ara : yesɛedda-tt fell-asen. Ihi, ass-nni iɛedda-d Ccix n laǧameɛ, yenṭeq ɣur-s Bougheraba s unecraḥ. Yerra-as-d Ccix : annaɣ a Boughera, yaxi ur nettemlaɛi ara ? yenna-as Boughera, wellah ar ak-urgaɣ a Ccix. Yenna-as Ccix : ‘’yaxi d lxir ‘’? Yerra-as Bougheraba : ‘’d lxir, urgaɣ nleḥḥu nekk yid-k, syin neɣli ɣer snat n tesrafin. Kečč teɣliḍ ɣer tesraf n tamamt, ma d nekk ɣliɣ ɣer tinna n yiẓẓan’’. Dɣa, yenṭeq-d Ccix-nni s lferḥ, yenna-as :’’ twalaḍ a Boughera, ula deg targit d nekk i yelhan ‘’! Yerra-as-d Boughera :’’aḥbeeeees ! Mi neɣli akken yessufeɣ-aneɣ-d lmelk, u yenna-d : ‘’kunwi d atmaten, ilaq yal wa ad yemceḥ gma-s’’. ihi, nekk mecḥeɣ deg tamamt, kečč tekkateḍ deg yiẓẓan-iw.’’

<p style="text-align: center;"> Kra n wudmawen 

  Imdanen n tsekla :  Mouloud Feraoun, Frik Mohamed, Ouahes Ramdane, Fadhma Ath Mansour, Guelmi…atg.

  Ccna :  Malika Domrane, Cherif Hamani, Amar Koubi, Aït Mourad, Sadek Djebbab, Kassia, Ratiba…atg

  Addal :  Derridj Mourad, Ferguene Mourad (Boxe), Domrane Djugutha, Guermoud Momoh…atg

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

<p style="text-align: right;">

  
 D tikkelt tamenzut ideg d-teḍra tannant n usileɣ yecban tagi i lfayda n yiselmaden n yiswiren yemxallafen. D yiwen n rray i teddem taɣlift n usegmi i wakken ad theyyi iselmaden-a ɣer yiwet n temsizzelt ara d-yilin deg 10 duǧember 2016 i d-iteddun. Deg Tubiret, taNmehla n usegmi tessawel-d ass n ssebt iɛeddan i wazal n wagim n yiselmaden yesɛan yakan ugar n semmus n yiseggasen deg umahil-nsen i wakken ad ɛeddin ɣer yiwet n taggayt ɛlayen iwumi qqaren: aselmad agejdan neɣ “Professeur principal”. Ɣef waya, tlata n yiɣerbazen i yemmuggren iselmaden-a: tasnawit n Boucharaine teldi tiwwura-s i wid n tesnawit; Haddouche Said i wid n uswir alemmas, ma d aɣerbaz n Doubaissi yemmugger wid n uswir amenzu. I wakken ad iɛeddi ttiɛad-agi deg tegnatin igerrzen, ulamma akud ur yessefk ara i yimḍebbren n tenmehla i wakken ad ddun akken iwata, d imaswaḍen n uswir amenzu d wid n ulemmas i d-yellan di lmendad i yiselmaden-a i wakken ad asen-ldin akka kra n teḍwiqt ɣer uḥric n tussna deg usegmi d wayen i d-yezzin i uɣerbaz s umata akked wassaɣen i tesɛa leqraya ɣer yiḥricen n tmetti d umecwar n usgam n unelmad. Ɣer ttiɛad-a, sin n yiselmaden n tesdawit n Tubiret i d-yusan i wakken ad d-rnun tamusni-nsen deg uḥric-a, imi d wid yettuxeṣṣen deg-s, i wakken ad snefɛen iselmaden ur neksib ara tirmi ɣezzifen deg unnar. Ulamma s ya ɣer da, aṭas n yiselmaden i d-yettbegginen ilḥir-nsen sdat kra n tɣawsiwin yerzan amahil-nsen neɣ talɣa n temsizzelt i ten-yettraǧun, imaswaḍen d yisdawanen ssuzfen fell-asen aṭas n tegnatin idel wagu, am wakken i aɣ-d-nnant snat n tselmadin: ”s tidet, limer ur neḥḍir ara timlilit n wass-a, ur nettizmir ara ad nissin ayen nugem ɣer yimaswaḍen i d-nemlal. Aṭas n yiḥricen deg useɣri i yeddurin fell-aneɣ, imi di tazwara mačči aṭas aya i nebda nxeddem, daɣ ur aɣ-tessefk ara tegnit ad nelmed deg uḥric-a n “la psychologie” yellan d ajgu deg uselmed.” Iwulem kan ad d-nesmekti dakken timlilit n wass n ssebt-a yezrin, tkemmel ddurt-a i wakken iselmaden ad rren lwelha-nsen ɣer wayen yerzan tarrayt n umahil i lmend n yal tanga. D ayen ara asen-yessisehlen aqabel n temsizzelt deg tazwara, acuɣer ala d allal i useddu n temsirin-nsen daxel n tneɣriyin. Di ddurt wis sin n tannant-a, yettuhegga-d yiwen n wahil anda iselmaden sqerdcen tamsalt n useddu n temsirin d uktazal. Aṭas n yiḥricen-nniḍen iɣef i d-yella umeslay ama d ayen yerzan assaɣ gar uselmad d unelmad, ama d assaɣ gar tangawin irkelli d tzemmart ara ireṣṣu uselmad neɣ d tudert n unelmad deg uɣerbaz. D tagnit i yiselmaden-a i wakken ad snernin tamussni-nsen, mačči kan deg wahil i sɣarayen, maca deg tlufa yerzan amahil-nsen d wassaɣ gar-asen d yinelmaden. Snat n temliliyin-a, ad ssisehlent i yiselmaden aqabel n temsizzelt ara d-yilin ass n 10 deg duǧember i deg-i nella. Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen I aɣ-d-yewwḍen, akayad-a, ad d-yili s tarrayt n yikayaden yecban BAC d win n taggara n uswir alemmas, imi iseqsiyen ttwaheggan-d sɣur tama yettuxeṣṣen deg cɣel-a. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail Merzouk 

  
 Deg yiwet n liḥala n leḥzen i d-tella ass n lǧemɛa tameddit yiwet n temlilit n tegmat n ddabex n uḍar deg taddart n Hagui deg tɣiwant n Leɛǧiba i d-yellan d tajmilt ɣef terwiḥt n Yuba.M, yewwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi deg wussan-a yezrin ɣef 15 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is. D aqcic awḥid deg twacult, Yuba yella d anelmad deg uɣerbaz alemmas Dahmani Slimane n Semmache mi d-yudef ɣur-s waṭṭan ur as-nefki ara tagnit i wakken ad yessenser seg-s. din yeɣli, din yunag ! Ama d imeddukkal-is neɣ ahat ilmeẓyen n taddart i merra kkren taggara n yimalas yezrin i wakken ad d-heggin timlilit-a, meqqar ad wansen tawacult-is deg teswiɛt-a qessiḥen i tettidir. Mačči kan d imezdaɣ n Hagui i d-yerzan ɣer unnar, maca At Yilyiten anda ma llan bedden ɣer yidis n yimawlan n Yuba i wakken ad d-inin:”Iruḥ-aɣ akk uqcic-a, mačči ala i twacult-is.” Imḍebbren n yiḥricen yemxallafen llan-d deg lmendad deg temlilit-a, imi aselway n tɣiwant, imḍebber n Ddayra n Beclul d waṭas n wudmawen-nniḍen rran-d i tinnubga n yilmeẓyen n Hagui, ḥeḍren i tejmilt yuɣalen i uqcic-a. Amenzu deg-sen d aselway n Ddayra Mass Ait Ali i iḥeḍren i temlilit almi tekfa. Imḍebber-a, ibeggen-d lferḥ-is sdat temlilit yecban ta mi d-yenna:”ad rreɣ tajmilt i widak i d-iheggan ccɣel yecban wa, imi d abrid ara yawin ilmeẓyen ɣer yimal igerzen, win n leqraya, addal d tikli lɛali. Ad farseɣ tagnit i wakken ad ɛezziɣ tawacult n Yuba, u ad niɣ aqel-i ɣer tama n yimezdaɣ akk n Ddayra.” Timlilit tella-d deg tegnatin yelhan imi ula d iɣallen n usellek llan-d deg lmendad i wakken ad tekfu temlilit s rbeḥ n terbaɛt n Hagui s rebɛa n yiswiyen ɣer sin i terbaɛt n Uzaknun. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. Smail 

<div> 
  
 Ass n aram 17 deg yennayer 2017 nruḥ nekni s yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas n Redjaouna Tacht, aswir wis, ɣer Massa Kahina Boudghaghen i ireqqmen allalen n talext, nesteqsa-tt ɣef umahil-is d wamek i d-yettili ufran n yizamulen i tesseqdac.

  Acu i kem-yewwin ɣer lxedma-agi?  

  Kahina Boudghaghen  : Asmi i d-newwi ussan n yimuras, mi lliɣ qqareɣ deg uɣerbaz amenzu Rğawna deg useggas n 2001, ddiɣ akked xalti ad d-nwali afexxar deg yiwet n tḥanut. Walaɣ allalen–nni dɣa seqḍaɣ ɣef wamek reqqmen yakk. Seg wass-nni ttuɣ leqraya-nni, uɣaleɣ fkiɣ-as azal i taleɣt. Ɣriɣ di Buxalfa, wwiɣ-d tanagit deg useggas 2004.

  Amek i txeddmeḍ taleɣt-agi ?  

 Ttaɣeɣ-d akal mexdum i taleɣt, yesɛa leɣri am urekti. Nessexlaḍ-it d waman, ad t-nugg, ad t-nebren, ad d-nessuffeɣ ayen nebɣa n wallalen. Ad t-nerr ad qqden, sakin ad bduɣ areqqem s sbiɣa mexdumen i taleɣt-agi?

  Ma tzemreḍ ad aɣ-tesfehmeḍ anamek n yizamulen-a i yellan seg ureqqem? 

 Yal yiwen s uzamul-is , wagi i igan am lmeqrut, qqaren-as ‘’Gâteau du miel’’ s uzewwaɣ d uberkan ,yemmal-d tumert d talwit , yella wayeḍ qqaren-as ‘’Filet de pêche’’, wayeḍ qqaren-as ‘’Aqjun’’. Mi ara d-tas zik tmeṭṭut, ad t-zer yelli-s deg uxxam-is, ad as-tini efk-iyi ad sweɣ. Deg wallal-nni, ad teɛqel yelli-s ma deg talwit neɣ deg ccwal i tettidir. Amedya : ma d unuɣen n uqjun, anamek-is tettnaɣ aṭas akked temɣart-is, ma d winna n ugaṭu n tament, tettidir deg talwit d tumert.

  D ayen i txeddmeḍ i tettarqameḍ, neɣ treqqmeḍ allalen i wiyaḍ ? 

 Reqqmeɣ i wiyaḍ, win yebɣan, yeqqar-iyi-d. Ha-t-an am bdiɣ. Yiwwas kecmeɣ ɣer tḥanut n tẓuri, iwala-d bab n wallalen–agi n ufexxar tawerqet deg ufus-iw sunɣeɣ deg–s izamulen-agi n rqem, dɣa yesteqsa-iyi-d ma yella d nekk i ten-isunuɣen, nniɣ-as :ih. Yenna-k ihi nekki ad am-fkeɣ allalen n ufexxar, rqem-iten, ad akem-xelseɣ. Seg wass-nni, win yebɣan ad yerqem allal, ad iyi-d-yini ad as-nreqqmeɣ ama d tabuqalt, timermiḍin, idebsiyen, tiqbucin, …atg.

  I uxxam-nwen, bɣan imi i txedmeḍ akka ? 

 Tazwara ur bɣin ara. Nnan-iyi-d tagi d lxedma n yimeɛḍar, ruḥ xdem ayen-nniḍen. Nekkini kemmleɣ , walan d ayen i ḥemmleɣ, dɣa dayen ur cliɛen ara.

  Awal-im n taggara…  

 Ssarameɣ ad kemmleɣ, ad xedmeɣ ɣer yiman-iw. Ad ldiɣ taḥanut i yiman-iw. Tanemmirt i kunwi i d-yerzan ɣur-i

<p style="text-align: right;">  Bellil Linda/Zidane Melissa/Aouimer Amal

  Isufar i useqqi

 – kra n yiferrawen n nneɛneɛ

 – ciṭ n felfel aberkan

 – lmelḥ

  Aheggi 

 Heggit arekti am win n lemsemmen, teǧǧem-t kra n lweqt akken. Rret deg tuggi, lebsel, akked ticcert, ternum-asen zzit. Kra n lweqt, rnut-as ṭumaṭic akked yisufar-nn-nniḍen, syin tɣummem tuggi-nni. Tura heggit arekti-nni. Get-t am temsemnin timecṭaḥ, d tireqqaqin, syin terremt-tent ɣer tuggi-nni ad wwent s ufella n useqqi-nni. Akken kan alamma kfant.

<p style="text-align: right;"> S ɣur daya 

  
 Sendiḍelli n sebt 03 di ctember i ldint tewwura n tezrigt tis 14 n temliliyin n sinima n temdint n Bgayet. Di temlilit-agi, 27 n yisura i yettujerden deg wahil ; ad d-ttusnaɛ-ten i wid i iḥemmlen taẓuri n sinima deg tẓeɣwa n temdint n Bgayet, ama deg uxxam n umezgun Bougermouh, neɣ di Tzeqqa n sinima, place Gueydon .

 Ahil d amerkanti , ad ilin yisaragen, timliliyin d yimyura n yisura (les cinéastes), am wakken ara yili uselmed n kra n tarrayin timaynutin deg uḥric-agi n sinima i yimunan i ttekkin di temlilit.Deg wahil, daɣen, ad yili usenɛet n yisura imeẓyanen tmura n tmazɣa : Lmerruk , Tunes Libya d Lezzayer. ‘’Afran n yisura ara i yekkin deg temlilit-agi ur d-yusi ara kan akka s shala. nefren-d ayen yeddan d smayem igraɣlanen , imi iswi-nneɣ d tiririt n yimferjen ɣer tzeɣwa n sinima di Bgayet ‘’, i d-yenna yimḍebber n ’’ Project’heurs’’ deg wawal i d-yefka i tɣamsa, ddurt yezrin. Gar yisura n teqbaylit ara d-yettusnaɛ-ten, ad yili usaru i d-yesuffeɣ Mouhamed yagui «Ṛegegmeɣ-am» ; asaru-agi s wazal-is imi yettales-d yiwet n teqsiṭ ideg i d-mlalent laɛwayed d ttmeslayin n temdint n Bgayet. Am wakken daɣen ara ad d-yili usenɛat n watas n yisura s tutlayt n tefransist , d wid ara d-yawwin ɣef yisental n tmetti deg tallit i deg nettidir “Tamḥeqranit , inig , trad, tayri …atg”.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 Aṭas n yismektiyen d tejmilin i yuγalen i deqs n yineγmasen n tmurt n lzzayer di temnaḍin yemgaraden ilmend n wass agreγlan n tlelli n tγamsa id-yettuγalen yal ass n 03 maggu di yal seggas. Tamnaḍt n Tizi-Wezzu tella di ttiεad, imi tiddukla n yineγmasen d yemcegεen n Tizi-Wezzu rran tajmilt meqren i yimaγrasen n tγamsa i yettwenγan s ufus n yirebraben, ruḥen d asfel γef tugdut d tlelli n umeslay akken tmurt n Lzzayer ad-yezdi lqed-is, anda id-tella tulya n usebdad n tlelli n tγamsa di tlemast n temdint n Tizi-Wezzu s leḥdur n twacult n tγamsa, imḍebren n yeḥricen yemgaraden, aselway n wesqamu aγarfan n ugarzu n Tizi-wezzu mass Ḥussin Harun,aselway n tγiwant n Tizi-Wezzu mass Ouahab Ait-Menguellet d waṭas niḍen. Dγa tiddukla n yineγmasen d yimcegεen n tγamsa n Tizi-Wezzu, fursen tagnit anda i rran tajmilt i 03 ineγmasen i yefγen tastaγt deg ussan yezrin, wigi d Hamid Makhlouf, Arezqi Hamla d mohammed Chabalah. Akken i tuγal tejmilt meqren i uneγmas n tlelli id-yefkan u mazal yettak-d amaynut i tγamsa s ticert-is qeṭṭiεen γas akken deg ussu i yeẓẓel acḥal wagguren-aya di tmurt n Fransa sebba n waṭan yuεren it-yeṭfen γef teγzi n 06 n yiseggasen-aya, wagi d mass Salem Hammoum, itri yeḍwan taγamsa. Tijmilin-agi yesduritent-id wexxam n yedles n lmulud At-Mεemmar n Tizi-Wezzu s leḥdur n lwali mass Abdelkader Bouazgui anda id-tella tikci n warazen usebγes i neγmasen-agi d twaculin n wid ur-neḥdir-ara, syen llant-d tnigiyin γef umecwar n yineγmasen-agi akken id-yella wesqardec s telqay n yiγeblan i ttidiren ineγmasen di lxedma-nsen n yal ass akked d yemḍebren n tmahliwin yemgaraden. Si tama niḍen tamahla n yedles n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu terra tajmilt i 02 n yineγmasen i tewwi tmettant deg seggasen-agi yezrin, wigi d Nadir Bensbaa akk d Abdelkrim Djaad, s leḥdur n twaculin-nsen, imḍebren n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu γef qaru-nsen lwali mass Abdelkader Bouazgui, Tidukla n yineγmasen d yemcegεen n tγamsa n Tizi-Wezzu d yinebgawen niḍen, anda yexleḍ lfarḥ d yimeṭṭi, maca d ass i yifen mera ussan imi temlal tasa d way turew.

<p style="text-align: right;"> I. B 

  
 Nekkni, s tnac n yimedyazen, Kaci SADI, Moussa SALMI, Hocine LOUNI, Mohamed AOUCHICHE, Salah LOUNI, Lyes GUECHTOULI, Fahem DJOUDI, Salima DALI, Mohand-Akli DJOUAHER, Toufik HESSAS, Rabah KADDOUR, Akli AIT BOUSSAD, neddukel d agraw amunen, ilelli, nsemma-yas : Agraw n Yimedyazen Yezdin. Neddem-d asekkil amezwaru n tunṭiqt tamezwarut n wawal amezwaru « Agraw » (A), nerna-d tlata n yisekkilen igan tunṭiqt tis snat n wawal wis sin « Imedyazen » (Med) akked tlata n yisekkilen igan tunṭiqt tamezwarut n wawal wis tlata « Yezdin » (Yez) dɣa nessufeɣ-d isem AMEDYEZ, d isem unṣib n ugraw-nneɣ yezdin ama deg yiswiyen, ama deg tmuɣliwin, ama deg tfelsafit n tmedyezt neɣ n tsekla s umata.AMEDYEZ, yesḥassef ɣef liḥala i deg i d-tegra tmedyezt tamaziɣt-taqbaylit akked wid i tt-id-yesnulfuyen deg tmurt-nneɣ, imi aya d uya n tfaskiwin n tmedyezt i d-yessifriren acḥal d amedyaz d tmedyezt yuklalen azal ɣur ugdud ɛeddant yiwen ur yeẓri, amzun acemma ur yeḍri ! Aya d uya n yimedyazen d tmedyazin yufraren i yuran acḥal d ammud n tmedyezt, ala ayen yuli uɣebbar ur yeffiɣ. Anda-tt taɣect-nni n ugdud yettzuxxun s yimedyazen d tmedyazin n leqrun yezrin ? Ad tzux ihi s wid n wass-a ! Anda-t umussu aduklan, s waya d uya d tidukla tadelsant, i yeqqaren nqeddec i yidles, netta yesmenyif ccḍeḥ d rrdeḥ ɣef tmedyezt ? Anda-t umedyaz ? Ɣer yigduden-nniḍen, imdanen s umata ttarun ; ahat ulac win ur nesεi ara tazmamt-is n waktayen anda yettaru yal tikkelt, ama d ayen yettεeddin fell-as, ayen yedder neɣ ayen yettḥulfu, ladɣa aktayen n tayri n temẓi d tedyanin qessiḥen. Wa yettaru i wakken ad yessenqes teqseḥ n wayen i t-iqerḥen ; wa i wakken ur itettu ara ayen iεeddan fell-as, ama d lferḥ, ama d lqerḥ. Wa yettaru amzun nnig lebɣi-s, amzun yettuḥettem fell-as ad yaru mulac ur t-yetthenni ara lxaṭer-is… ; ma d nekkni ɣur-neɣ, xas ma llan wid yettarun aktayen-nsen, ur ggiten ara. Yuɣ lḥal, win yesxerbicen akka kra yettusemma d amedyaz ! Ayen i tt-yessigren, llan ula d wid ur nessin ad d-arun ula d yiwet n tefyirt ttusemman d imedyazen ! Tawaɣit tameqrant : di kra n rradyuwat akked tilivizyuwat d tuget n teẓrigin akked tdukliwin tidelsanin, d wi i d-yufraren ! D wi i d-ttawin daɣen akken ad ɣren, ad sneqden, ad selḍen ayen uran wiyaḍ ! ( Di temsalt-a, tiddukla tadelsant Adrar n Fad n At Smaɛel n Bgayet txulef abrid i d-wwint tdukliwin-nniḍen imi ugar n 12 iseggasen aya nettat tettara tijmilin i Mouloud Mammeri akked yimedyazen ilmeẓyen n tura ! Tuklal tajmilt.). Tin yernan ɣer-sent, tasdawit, ma nekkes kra n yimnuda i nezmer ad d-neḥseb s yiḍudan n yiwen n ufus, ur tekkir ara i usenqed d usiffi n tmedyezt tamirant. Kra n unadi i d-yellan di taɣult-a, ma ur t-nufi yettawi-d ɣef yimedyazen n lqerun iɛeddan, ad t-naf ala tamedyezt yettwacnan i yerza. Xas ma llan yimnuda i d-ibedren neɣ wehhan-d ɣer wammuden i d-yeffɣen imir-a, awal nezwar-d deg-s : idlisen n tmedyezt yuklalen ad ffɣen yuli-ten uɣebbar. Ma d tifaskiwin n tmedyezt anda i yezmer umdan ad d-iḥawec neɣ ad d-yezdem, ayen ala, aṭas deg wayen yufraren, imnuda ur rezzun ara ɣur-sent. Lḥaṣul, d lḥers d ddel akked tsertit n usfulkleṛ i d-sseɣlin ɣef tmedyezt tamaziɣt-taqbaylit ama d imḍebbren n tmurt-nneɣ ama d agdud yefkan afus di tmeslayt d tsekla akked yidles-nneɣ i d-yesneṭqen agraw AMEDYEZ.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tamuɣli-nneɣ… 

 AMEDYEZ ihi, yebɣa ad yessaki, ad iwelleh imedyazen imaziɣen-iqbayliyen yettarun tamedyezt neɣ ayen nniḍen. Deg ugraw-a, tesdukel-aɣ tikti n tsekla deg tira-nneɣ. Nerra tikti d asefren amenzu seg yisfernen n tmedyezt. Ɣur-neɣ nekkni, tugna sufella i terna. Ma tugna d ssbiɣa, tikti d llḥiḍ. Ur tezmireḍ ara ad tsebɣeḍ leḥyuḍ ma ulac-iten ! Nekkni d itiktiyen, nxeddem tamedyezt tatiktit. Ma d acebbeḥ n tmedyezt s talɣiwin neɣ s yisental neɣ s tɣuri, yal yiwen s uɣanib-is. Tamuɣli-nneɣ daɣen txulef tid n wid i d-yeǧǧan awal : «Ur d-ǧǧin yimezwura ayen ara d-nebder nekkni», neɣ tid i d-ǧǧan leqrun di tektabin yettwaqeddsen almi i d aɣ-d-wwḍent s teqbaylit: «Ayen i d-iḍerrun, yeḍra-d zik yakan, ur tesɛiḍ d acu i d-yennulfan» !… Ayagi mačči d ankaṛ i nenkeṛ kra n wayen i d-fkan yimezwura, lameɛna d tamusni i aɣ-yecqan ad tt-nesnerni ɣef wat zik-nni, yernu s tmuɣli tamirant tatrart i nebɣa ad nwali, mačči akken i tt-walan nutni. Ula d ismawen n tẓuri-agi tis xemsa werɛad rkiden s tmeslayt-nneɣ. D leqrun aya, iles amaziɣ-aqbayli yettfeṣṣil initen n wawal i yetteẓẓu deg wurti n tmaziɣt-taqbaylit i deg i d-tettemɣi yal tawsit n tsekla timawit, tasekla yellan d taɣessa n tfekka tadelsant taɣerfant s wudmawen-is yemxallafen. Gar wudmawen-agi, ayen yettusemman tagara-agi « tamedyazt ». Awal-agi «tamedyazt» yeṭṭfen amkan n «poésie» s tefransist, nettwali yeṣweb ubran i t-yebren mass Kamel Bouamara i d-yessumren awal « tamedyezt » akken ad t-yessemgired akked tin yettarun « isefra ». Nerra-d awal « isefra » gar txebbicin imi i t-nettwali d awal ur nwulem ara. « Asefru », d yiwet gar talɣiwin n tmedyezt. D talɣa tamuḥendit. D tesɛa yifyar ifeṣṣlen ɣef tlata n tṣeddarin i deg yal yiwet tebna ɣef tlata yifyar : amezwaru d wis tlata d at-sebɛa tunṭiqin, alemmas d bu-xemsa tunṭiqin. Akka ladɣa i iɛeggen Mouloud Feraoun asefyer n Si Muḥend U Mḥend. Dɣa ula d Mouloud Mammeri, deg udlis Isefra n Si Muḥend U Mḥend, s trumit, yeǧǧa awal « Isefra » akken yella. Amzun d isem amaẓlay. Asefru d talɣa. Am wakken llant talɣiwin-nniḍen : izli, tizlit, aḥiḥa, lmudawala (talɣa n ddker/lemdiḥ), atg. Ihi, nekkni nettwali awal ara d-yezgen swaswa i wayen yesduklen talɣiwin-agi, d « amedyez ». (Neqqen kra n tunṭiqin n tefyirt « Agraw n Yimedyazen Yezdin » armi i d-fkant AMEDYEZ). Meḥsub, amedyez yezmer ad yili d izli, d asefru, d lmudawala, atg. Akka, ad yeddukel uẓar : tamedyezt/timedyaz, d ayen din d amedyez/imedyaz i yettaru umedyaz/imedyazen neɣ i tettaru tmedyazt/timedyazin. Ma deg uslugen n tira n tmedyezt, ad d-nsumer ad yettwaru ufyir iweznen akken yettwanṭeq ma yella ɛekkren yilugan lmizan-is. Akka i as-nufa ixef-is. Ulamek i neddu deg ubrid i deg i d-nelḥa armi d tura. Ɣef waya, AMEDYEZ ad yessuddus tidwilin d temliliyin i usetkaki d uselmed n wayen akk yeqqnen ɣer tmedyezt ama d tussniwin n tmeslayt d tsekla ama d tussniwin n umdan d tmetti. Yerna, ad d-yelhu d leṣnaf n tsekla merra : ungal, tullist, atg. Am wakken daɣen ara yeg azal meqqren i usuqel ɣer tmaziɣt-taqbaylit akked usenqed aseklan s tmuɣli tusnant. Ad tettili Tuffɣa taseklant yal tasemhuyt i deg ara d-nessufeɣ leqdic-nneɣ. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Leqdic ara yilin 

 D leqdic ara yilin deg uswir asdawan ara iɛerḍen ad isemmi kra n temsal n tmedyezt neɣ n tsekla s umata. Mebla ma yettu tudert n umedyaz di tmetti d yizerfan i t-id-iṣaḥen di tudert n tsertit d tfelsafit akked tẓuri. Ayen irkel ara d-yessufeɣ ugraw AMEDYEZ, d asnulfu neɣ d asenqed, ilaq ad yaweḍ ɣer medden ama s yiɣmisen d rradyuwat akked tilifizyuwat d Internet akked yidlisen, ama s uṭerjem ɣer tmeslayin-nniḍen. Ihi, ɣas akka AMEDYEZ ixulef at zik n leqrun akk yezrin s nitni s tmuɣliwin-nsen yebɣan ad qelɛen iẓuran neɣ ad ten-sserkun s yir tamusni akked ukellex i lɣaci, yelli tiwwura-s i wid yebɣan ad ḍefren tiktiwin-is ama d imɣaren d temɣarin ama d ilmeẓyen d telmeẓyin, d isdawanen-imnadiyen neɣ d imura-inaẓuren ; si tmurt n Leqbayel neɣ si temnaḍin-nniḍen n tmurt n Lezzayer neɣ tid n tmura n Tferka Ugafa yettmeslayen neɣ yettarun tamaziɣt-taqbaylit neɣ timeslayin timaziɣin-nniḍen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> AMEDYEZ Bgayet, ass n 21 yunyu 2016 

  
 D tismin i yesmentigen lebɣi deg ulawen n yemdanen akked d yegduden. Yal amdan neɣ aɣref yettmuqul ɣer win i t-yifen yettɛanad akken ad t-yaweḍ. Si zik n zik akka i yella lḥal: leǧnas temḥazwaren akken wa ad kkan wa nnig wa. D aya id yewwin lebni n tiɣermiwin si zzman n iferɛunen armi id nessawaḍ ɣer taɣerma tutrimt( occidentale) yefkan lɣerza i tmeddurt n yegduden imiranen.

 Aẓar n tɣerma tutrimt d taɣerma sbedden yigrigiyen akked ṛuman. Ɣef yidɣaɣen i lessen sin yigduden-agi id yuli uɣṛab n tidmi tutrimt armi tefka ifurkawen ɣer yal tama d umaḍal. Tzemnit s wacu teddun lketra n leǧnas ass-a, d ttin id yeswan si tala n tmussni id neǧren izemniyen imenza am Artistote, Thales ; Phytagore,Archimde d wiyaḍ…D tamussni agi s timmad-is i leqqmen deg ixf n yemdanen( yebnan igduden-agi) lebɣi ɣer tmussni, ɣer unadi, ɣer tifin, ɣer usteqsi, ɣer taruẓi n isula yettawin ɣef uɣbalu n yimal! Ihi ma yella timura tutrimin yis-sen-t i tebna tagrawla tamugrant ( revolution industruelle) di taggara n lqern wis 18 aya ur yeswham ara, imi ɣer tara tamenzunt yessen ɣef tidmi tagrigit akked d tidmi taṛumanit i-ijebed uẓar n waɣlan tezdi taɣerma tutrimt. Ahat tayajurt tamenzut s wacu tebna taɣerma d yidles. Mebla idles ulamek ara ad lalent tmuɣliwin irefden amdan akken ad yekk nnig liḥala deg yella akken as yewɛu i wayen ifazzen. Tanfalit ssellum-is d tidmi i teksen aɛjar ɣer tikta timaynutin yesfilliten i yimal yifen ayen yezrin. Idles annar-is meqqer, hraw, ɣezzif. icudd ɣer tasekla, ɣer umezgun, ɣer ccna, ɣer sinima, ɣer taklut…yal aferdis acu id yettawi, acu i yettleqqim deg ixf n umdan akked wegdud. Simmal yuli yidles n waɣref simmal iswir n temɛict –is ilehhu yettili di lmendad n lebɣi ifetel yal aɣe man deg ul-is. Ay akken nebɣu newwi neɣ nerra d yidles i d lemri n taneflit n yal aɣref di ddunit. Ma yella ass-a idles id yekkan s tmurt n Marikan d win id yeflalin ugar wiyaḍ, aya s ssebba, imi tamurt n Marikan d-idles i terra d leslaḥ-is amenzu akken tudert-is tazemnit a teɣzu yal timura deg umaḍal. Slid kra n tmura (am tamurt n Rrus neɣ Ṣṣin) ur yekcim ara uɣanib amteddu n tmurt n Marikan. Lemmer a negger tamawt ɣer timura iɣ yecban ad naf, deg iseggasen n 50/60/70, tamurt n Maṣer tella d tamnazmert tadelsant ( puissance culturelle) i timura tiɛrabbin. Ccna-nsen, sinima-nsen, amezgun-nsen, tasekla –nsen temmeɣ tirni deg tmura umi qqaren timura tiɛrabbin tinselmin. Itran id yefka idles-nsen am Farid El Atrach, Mohamed Abdlewahab, Oum keltoum( di ccna) Salah Abou Sief, Youcef Chahine, Henri Barrakat, Ahmed Badrakhane, Niazi Mustapha, Omar Sharif, Mahmoud Yacine, Nour el Cherif, Faten Hamama, Chadia,Nabila Ubeid, Adel Imam, Leila Alwi( sinima) Nadjib Mahfoud, Yousef Idris, Mohamed Husein Haykal( tasekla) sked anda ur ttwassen-ara. Aǧuǧǧeg yeǧuǧǧeg yidles n tmurt n Maser deg lawan-nni ur yekki ara s ugacur imi llan irgazen d tilawin deffir-s. Llan imawlan n wedrim iserfan idrimen-nsen deg aḥric agi n yidles s yal udmawen-is( amezgun, sinima, ccna, tasekla..) imi rran idles d yiwet n trekkizt s wazal-is di tdamsa n tmurt. Ass-a d lulluf n imeṣriyen i yettidiren deg aḥric n sinima kan.

 Ahat dayen-nni ( lqella n yergazen ɣer-nneɣ yebɣan ad skecmen adrim-nsen deg annar-agi n yedles ) ɣer-nneɣ i yeǧǧan idles-nneɣ yesḥurejdul ɣef lebɣi n inaẓuran war tazmert seg 62 armi d –ass-a. Xas ma taggara-agi lulent-d kra n tiẓrigin tusligin ( boites privées) yecqan adlis neɣ isura neɣ ccna maca mazal-iten-t ttraǧunt leɛnaya n ddewla akken ad afent adrim s wacu ara ssalin isenfaren-nsen-t( projets). Lqela n les sponsors, astehzi n-isihranen( les détenteurs de capitaux) deg idles yerra yal asenfar d taɛkemt. Ulac win wwin-t tismin as yini ad kecmeɣ annar-agi yellan d anubi- vièrge- akken ad weqmeɣ llsas i lebni yidles( win ara ibeden ɣef ifaden-is) ara yilin d rkiza i tdamsa di tmurt. Yak ttṛaǧun deg ddewla akken a sen- tebnu ixxamen idelsanen, tizeɣwa akked istidyuten n sinima, ixxamen umezgun… xuḍi di tmura anda idles yesɛa leɛnaya llan isemṣaren( producteurs) i- ibedden ɣer wanect-a. Amedya axxam n rotana di tmura lxalij d netta id yellan deffir qṛib yal « iklipen » id yettɛeddayen deg tilibizyuwat n timura-agi. Ticennayin am Nejwa karam, Nancy Ajram, Omar Diab, Nawal El Zughbi.. llan deffir-sen ispunsuren, iemaṣaren… dayen-nni i ten-yeǧǧan ttidiren s lḥirfa-nsen, s ccna-nsen… llan di tmura-nsen d itran ( stars) ɣer ttɛanaden ilemẓiyen akked tmeẓyanin akken ad cuqqen abrid i yiman-sen di tudert.

 Ulac ayen id yettasen kan akka… telqa ijebden idles d adrim… adrim yettawi-d adrim.. d tagi id tagda( équation) ur nefri ɣer -nneɣ. Ɣef uggur -agi i yemderkal yidles –nneɣ dag-i di tmurt. Ahat d anect-a yak id yewwin talalit n tidukkla n imedyazen ilelliyen ɣef yella Mass Louni Hocine amedyaz akked umyaru id yeflalin di taggara-agi akken as yuɣal ccan i umedyaz. Gar yiswiyen id tewwi tidukkla-agi: aseḥbiber ɣer izerfan n imedyazen n teqbaylit. Aya d lmeɛqul imi inaẓuren nniḍen yal mi ara d ɛaddin deg tizeɣwa n yidles neɣ di radyu ttwaxelṣen( seɛun un cachet) bexlaf imedyazen. sawalen-nsen kan i wakken ad ččaren ilem yellan gar iɛeddi n ucennay akked wayeḍ. Xas ticki ttwanecden ɣer radyu di nuba-t yellan s demma, werǧin uɣalen-asen-id izerfan-nsen( droits d’auteurs) ɣef ayen-nni.Simi ad iban wamek ara teddu tidukkla-agi akken tiɣri-ines a ttaweḍ wid tecqa taluft ( imedyazen akked imḍebbṛen n yidles) ahaqel targit n yal yiwen deg-nneɣ tesfillit ad zzint tismin ɣer wayla-nneɣ amer wid yesɛan adrim ad gzun ula d -idles d amur di tdamsa yemzer ad yessekcem adrim s waṭas, ad yegg imukan i uxeddim i wacḥal d ataras.., ad yewwi lfeyda i bab-is…i tmurt!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Muḥemmed Cami seg yirgazen i yuklalen aṭas n wannuz. Ilul di taddart n Tewrirt n Mimun deg At Yenni aseggas n 1959. Ar tura, amur ameqqran seg tudert-is yefka-tt i uḥraz n tezlit tazwawt (taqbaylit). Dɣa, imi taggara-ya yura-d deg uẓeṭṭa inmetti n faysbuk dakken atan ad yeḥbes afsar n yineɣmisen d tewlafin n yicennayen iqburen, nesteqsa-t ɣef sebba. Tadiwennit!

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Telliḍ tebɣiḍ ad teǧǧeḍ leqdic deg faysbuk, acimi? 

 <span style="color: #ff0000;"> Muḥemmed Cami : </span> Axaṭer aṭas n lɣaci i walaɣ ttsemmin tiwlafin i d-xeddmeɣ ttarran-tent ɣef yismawen-nsen, netta ur ilaq ara akk wannect-a, akken qqaren mkul lḥaǧa tesɛa bab-is. Ad ten-id-yehdu Rebbi kan, wamma amezruy ad iched ɣef win igan kra. Leɛtab-iw akk atan di les archives. Nessutur ihi kra n leqder kan.

  Aṭas n yinaẓuren i umi turiḍ tibratin akken ad tesɛuḍ ayen xeddmen. Mmeslay-aneɣ cwiṭ ɣef waya… 

 D tidet. Ahat azal n 150 n tebratin i yellan gar tid uriɣ i yinaẓuren akked tid i yi-d-uran. Am Ccix Nurdin, Muḥand Racid, Yusef n Bgayet (Abǧawi), Ayt Mengellat ed wiyaḍ nniḍen. Wid yemmuten ad ten-yerḥem Rebbi, wiyaḍ s tuɣzi n leɛmer-nsen. Tajmilt i ucennay i yi-iɛawnen aṭas deg uqeddic-iw: wa d Muḥand Racid umi ttmenniɣ ḥellu s uɣsab. 

  Acḥal n yiseggasen kečč d asegraw (ajmaɛ) ed wacu tesɛiḍ ar tura? 

 Seg useggas n  1972 ar tura jemɛeɣ ihi ɛeddan 40 n yiseggasen. Seg wayen xemmleɣ ugar n 6000 n yimagraden n tɣamsa yuran, nnig n 4000 lewsayef yemgerraden n yiḍebsiyen am wid n 45 tours 78 t ed 33 t. Sɛiɣ daɣen  aṭas n yipustiren ed tewlafin deg uxxam. Annect-a, iwakken lǧil i d-iteddun ad issinen amezruy n ccna n tmaziɣt, ad ẓren amek i d-yebda daɣen.

  Ar tura mazal ur tufiḍ tallelt (aɛiwen) sɣur ḥedd? 

 Ulac. Ar tura ur tesɛiḍ win d-yerran i uncad ed tiɣri-inu. Lameɛna nekk mazal ad kemmleɣ ccɣel-iw alama mmuteɣ, ɣas akka la nettwali ulac ulama d tajmilt skud akka nedder, ma nemmut ula iwumi-tt. Ad snemreɣ kan imdukkal n tɣamsa imi nutni ur ssineɣ tatut, akked yimdukkal n faysbuk i yi-d-irennun tabɣest ẓran azal n wayen qqdceɣ. Ẓriɣ lemmer d aḥerraz n tezlit taɛrabt i lliɣ ad iyi-iɛiwnen s tumert. Maca nekk akken yebɣu yili, imi nekk d azwaw ad mmteɣ d ilelli.

  Tanemmirt a Muḥemmed, d acu d awal-ik n taggara? 

 Ssarameɣ teɣzi n tmeddurt i yicennayen-nneɣ n teqbaylit. Afud igerrzen i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen. Tanemmirt i kečč a mass Mhenni akked widen merra yettnadin ɣef tmaziɣt. Nessaram ad d-tuɣal d tutlayt tunsibt di tmurt-is.

<p style="text-align: right;">Yesteqsa-t: Mhenni Xalifi

  
 S tinnubga n tiddukla tadelsant Tiεwinin n Wizgan, di tγiwant n Wizgan (Buzgan), id-yezgan azal n 60 ikilumitren γef usammer n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, Muḥamed Daḥmani d aselmad (Professeur) deg ugedzu n tdamsa di tsedawit n Mulud At-Mεemmar n Tizi-Wezzu yexdem yiwen n usarag s usentel « Ceḥḥa » naγ « Azmad n waggus ». Tazeqa n leqdic n wexxam n yedles Ferrat Remḍan id-yezgan di tlemmast n temdint n Wizgan,teččur d imdanen id-yussan si yal tamnaḍt, inelmaden, iselmaden tawacult n tẓuri d tsekla, imi fursen tagnit deg usarag-agi askasi i yekkan azal n 04 n tsaεtin di 02 n uzal almi d 06 n tmedit, mlalen akked yiwen n umusnaw meqren i ittewxeṣen deg uḥric n tdamsa, yessefhem-d s telqay uggur n tezγent n tdamsa n umaḍal i yennulen tamurt n Lzzayer. Ayen nnan leqbayel imezwura, muḥal at-bedlen leqrun, imi dren yakkan tagnitt-agi n tezγent n tdamsa, imi ar ass-a yegra-d yenzi id-yeqqarenk  » Win yufan lεula drus, yečč cwiṭ yezmed aggus ». Dayen if-id-yuγal mass Muḥamed Daḥmani, anda id-yenna d akken Ceḥḥa d tasartit n udabu, yewwi-d lḥal ad-yili leḥder d useḥbiber deg uselḥu n yal taγawsa, d umeyyez akken iwata lḥal γef uṣarref n tedrimt di lxedma n yal isenfaren ». Yenna daγen « ceḥḥa-agi tennul deqs n yidisan, adabu, yal timnaḍin n tmurt n Lzzayer d yemdanen sumata », syen yekkes-d aγilif, imi iwekked-d belli uggur-agi yebεed γef tezγent n tdamsa i yennulen deqs n tmura n lbarani, am Ṭelyan, Spanyul, la Grèce d tiyaḍ niḍen. Syen yuγal-d umsarag γef tedrimt i ittewṣarfen deg seggasen yezrin, imi yenna  » Almi d aseggas n 2014, lpitrul yewa ger 90 d 100 idullaren, u ddula tazzayrit tettṣarif azal n 90 melyar idullaren yerna mebla ceḥḥa. Akken id-imeslay γef yemεelmen n larẓaq id-yessekcamen selεa si tmura n lbarani, ma yella d selεa n tmurt baxṣen-tt teqqim. Dγa mass Daḥmani yessaḥres akken ad-yilli usebγes n wid yeseftayen di yal taγawsa, ad-seftin di tmurt i usnarni n tdamsa, akken izzayriyen ad-ttajwen γer-sen u ad-sajawen γer tmura n lbarani.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>    

<p style="text-align: right;">  Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ad tili tmeɣra-agi deg Zenith, deg tmurt n Fransa, ass n lḥedd 15 yennayer 2017, ɣef rrebɛa n tmeddit. Aya i lmend n usfugel n 50 n yiseggasen n ccna-s.

 Akken i d-yenna Lounes Matoub deg yiwet tezlit : ‘’ Lounis Ait Menguellet, tuɣac-is seggment, ttakent ddwa i yimuḍnan. Tiḥdayin yis-k i ferḥent, kul mi ara ak-slent , wamma ilmeẓyen akk selben’’. Ihi, Ait Menguellet, d yiwen unaẓur ameqqran. Isem-is aḥeqqani Abdenbi , ilul ass n 17 deg yennayer 1950 deg taddart n Ighil Bouammas , taɣiwant n Iboudraren, At Yanni. D d yiwen umedyaz , acennay aqbayli. Yekker-d deg yiwet n twacult iḥemmlen idles n tmaziɣt, d netta i d wis setta gar watmaten-is , yesɛa kraḍ n tyesetmatin d sin watmaten-is. D tawacult yeɣran. Seg wasmi yesɛa 17 n yiseggasen i yebda ccna, yerna icennu i yiman-is, ur yebni ara d akken ad d-yas wass ad yuɣal d anaẓur meqqren , d yiwet n tgejda n ccna s teqbaylit. I tikkelt akk tamezwarut i iruḥ ɣer umaṭṭaf wis sin, iɛedda-d deg nnuba n yicennayen uzekka anida yella iqeddec ufennan ameqqran Crif kheddam, yerna Ait Menguellet, yebɣa ad yissin wigi iqedcen deg umaṭṭaf wis sin imir d tagi kan i nesɛa d agerruj n teqbaylit, ur iruḥ ara akken ad yettwasen , yella deg tazwara isel i tezlatin n Taleb Rabaḥ ad fell-as yeɛfu wuzmir, am tezlit-nni ‘’Tezga ṣṣifa-m gar wallen-iw’’, ‘’Ma tecfan ay igudar’’… Aṭas i t-iɛawnen, fkan-as afud gar-asen Kamel Hamadi, yettaru-as tizlatin icennu-tent, maca Ait Menguellat ur yettkil ara kan ɣef kamel Hamadi, ula d netta yettaru iḥulfan-is icennu-ten iman-is. Yebda aseggas n 1966 s tezlit tamezwarut i d-yessekles deg wahran , yefka-as Ouahab Ait Menguellet afud , maca isem i as-fkan tazwara lḥesnaoui Ait Menguellet ur t-yeqbil ara akken ad as-fken isem unaẓur ameqqran netta imir kan i yebda ccna. Yuɣal fkan-as kan isem-is Ait Menguellet, rna-asLounis. Seg yimir, yuɣal xedmen agraw n yilmeẓyen anida yetteki deg seddis yid-sen isem-is ‘’Agraw n Yimaziɣ’’, yettwaɛreḍ sɣur uselway n temdint n Tigzirt akken ad xedmen tameɣra , llan kukran tazwara imi i tikkelt tamezwarut ara xedmen tameɣra , imir aselway n Tigzirt, yebɣa ad yesnerni ccna, yefka-asen azal imi imir tizlatin n Slimane Azem, ur ilaq ad asent –slen medden maca aselway n Tigzirt, icɛel tizlanin n Dda Slimane, s ṣṣut ameqqran yal tama yerna xedmen tameɣra anida yetteki Cherif Kheddam akked d Nouara. Llan akken i lmendad n ugraw–agi , taggara tameɣra tgerrez akken iwata imi s nnif i cnan mgal tamḥeqranit i d-yellan imir, asmi ur aɣ-d-iṣaḥ ara wawal s tutlayt -nneɣ aɛzizen. Ikemmel amecwar-is, acku ur yelli ara weḥd-s : s kra n win i t –yesnen deg yifennanen, ad as-yefk afud, netta simmal, simmal almi yuɣal selben fell-as yilmeẓyen imi icennu ɣef tayri, asmi tella d tuffirt mačči. Yenna-d u yecna-d iḥulfan n yilmeẓyen n tallit-nni. Aseggas segmi i d-yessufeɣ tizlit-is tamazwarut ‘’Ma truḍ ula d nekk kter’’, deg useggas 1967, yemmut gma-s. Yesɛedda leḥzen d ameqqran. Yenna-d limer uqbel i yemmut gma, yili ur ttruḥuɣ ara ɣer tedwilt n yicennayen uzekka. Si leḥzen yecban wagi, yerna limer i d-as-nnan deg twacult-is ur cennu ara, yili ur icennu ara, ahat, imi d win yettqadaren, yettseḍḥin, d urẓin . Deg useggas n 1974, iruḥ ɣer Fransa, meɛna ur yugi ad yecnu deg leqhawi. Yuɣal yecna deg tzeqqa tameqqrant deg Fransa ‘’Le Zenith’’. Akken amecwar-is n ccna yettaẓ ɣer sdat, mačči ɣer deffir , icennu tizlatin i yura, iwumi i iḥulfa, mačči kan akka. Tizlatin –is, tzemreḍ ad asent-tesleḍ sdat baba-k, yemma-k neɣ gma-k ur xsirent ara. Icennu ɣef tayri, lɣerba, tasertit, timetti, idles d tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Tizlatin-is, llant twezzlanin, llant tɣezzfanin anida tella tfelsafit. Win ur nessin ara taqbaylit, ur ifehem ara anamek n yisefra , ameyad ; ‘’a wid ifaqqen, yegra-d yiwen ulqaf, d idles ɣlayen. Di ddiq i t-nettaf , ḥader win ara t-yerren gar yiɣuraf, akken ad aɣ-t-rrẓen». Yenna-as daɣen : «Lekdeb yurew-d lbaṭel , lbaṭel d baba-s n lxuf, lxuf yurew-d tirugza , tirugza teɣleb-iten yakk’’. Lounis, d amedyaz i textar tmedyazt, d acennay yextar ccna, yessekles aṭas n tezlatin netta s timmad-is, ur yezmir ara akken ad tent-yeḥseb. Ait Menguellet, ur yettu ara lxir i d as-xedmen inazuren imeqqranen. Yerra-asen yakk tajmilt, ama i Kamel Hamadi asmi iwumi rran tajmilt deg taddart –is Ait Daoued n Yatṭṭafen, At Yanni , yerra-as tajmilt i Taleb Rabaḥ, i Cherif Xeddam d wiyaḍ-nniḍen. Tura tewweḍ-d nnuba N Ait Menguellat ad as-tuɣal tejmilt ass n 17 deg yennayer 2017, i lmend n umecwar n 50 yiseggasen i d-yewwi. Mebla ma nettu d akken Ait Menguellet, iɛawen mmi-s Djaafer akken ula d netta ad yeḍfer abrid-agi azeddgan. D mmi-s i d afus-is ayeffus. Nessaram–as i unaẓur-nneɣ ameqqran Ait Menguellet, teɣzi n tudert, yal aseggas ad t-id–yettaf s tezmert yeqqwan, am wakken i d-yenna ucennay Ali Amran ‘’Tajmilt ara as-nerr i Lounis, yuklal-itt’’ . Aṭas n tmeɣriwin akked tejmilin i d-yettuheggan i lmend n waya, ama tagi deg tmurt, ama deg berra. S teɣzi n leɛmer-is, ihi. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;">  Zakia Ben yahia   

  
<p style="text-align: center;">Yezwi lxuf seg ulawen n lɣaci. Asalu mgal tilelli akked tugdut yettwenǧer . Tafsut n imaziɣen id yellan deg ibrir 1980 tella d llsas i wayen ara d iḍefṛen kra n iseggasen akkin. Maca  di ddeffa n times yuɣen di Lwad Ɛisi ambeddel amezwaru id yellan s wazal-is d talalit n umussu adelsan amaziɣ(MCB). Ddaw leɛnaya n umussu-agi ara yili leqdic asertan neɣ adelsan ɣef dreɛ  n tmaziɣt.  Taɣarɣart tamezwarut s wacu ara d yeglu umussu adelsan amaziɣ d timlilit n Iɛekkuren ( séminaire d’Iakouren) id yellan  deg ass n 2 Aout 1980. Deg tamlilit-agi yezdin imnuda n umezruy, n tsertit d yidles yeṭṭfen azal n waggur yeffeɣ d yiwen wassaɣ  id wekden ɣef tamagit n tmurt isenden ɣef sin iferdisen: tamaziɣt akked teɛrabt. Gar wayen yessutur wassaɣ-agi( umi werǧin yegga azal udabu n immir yellan  ddaw taɣruṭ n Chadli Bendjedid) amteddu n tmurt s tutlayin-is : Tamaziɣt akked taɛrabt n Lẓẓayer ( tikti-agi tella deg ul n wacḥal d ameɣnas n umussu am Kateb Yacine, Ferhat Mhenni i-tti-d yennan qbala deg yiwet gar tizlatin-ines  : « tamurt a ttrefed-iman-is, terwas yak teɣra, tesɣar di tutalayin-is, teɛrabt n Lẓẓayer d tmaziɣt ».

<p style="text-align: center;">Deg iseggasen-agi n tmanyin ayen diɣen yeṭṭfen lbal d asbeded i tikelt tamezwarrut  n tidukkla n warraw n yimeɣrasen ( association des enfants  des martyrs ) deg Tizi-Wezzu ɣef yella di lmendad Ferhat Mhenni, Noredine Ait Hamouda d wiyaḍ .  D tiddukla-agi    ara yilin d asalu ɣer usbeddi n ijerrid n izerfan n umdan ( ligue des droits de l’homme) tamenzut di tmurt n Lẓẓayer. Ijerrid –agi yella-as di lmendad Said Sadi . Anejmuɛ yezdin iɛaggalen-is yella-d deg uxxam n Fettouma Ouzeggane  deg tazniqt n Didouche Mourad di Lẓẓayer tamanaɣt. Seg timlilit-agi id ilul ujerrid-agi n izerfan n umdan ɣef yella Mass Ali Yeḥya Abdenour d-aselway. Moqrane Ait Larbi d aselway wis ssin. Malika Ouzeggane d tamarayt. Gar iɛaggallen yettikkin ndi taseqqamut nezmer ad nedder Mass Arezki About, Rabah Baraka, Rachid Bellil,  Khaled Benmiloud, Said Doumane, Lounaouci Hamid, Ferhat Mhenni, Mimi Trakli, Hocine Zehouane .

<p style="text-align: center;">Asalalli n ujerrid-agi n izerfan n umdan yessekcem tawala deg ul n udabu n immir  . Aneggaru-agi iqubel  s leqseḥ   leqdic-agi. Dɣa ass n 5 juillet  snat n trabuyaɛ n warraw n imaɣrasen ( chouhada) yiwet di Tizi-Wezzu tayeḍ deg Lẓẓayer tamanaɣt   gezment-tt d ṛṛay ad sersen timqutin  n iǧeǧǧigen ɣef leṛwaḥ n widen yeɣlin ɣef tmurt di tmeqbart n Lɛaliya.Maca iserdasen n leḥṛis llan-asen di lmendad , gezmen fell-asen abrid ɣer tmeqbart.  D ayen id yewwin kra n tmesbaniyin . Maca adabu , umi ur yeɛǧib-ara wayen-nni, yecelqef-iten merra yera-ten ɣer lḥebs n Berwagiya uqbel a ten yesɛeddi di ccṛeɛ di tsenbart n laman aɣlan ( la cour de sureté de d’état)di Lemdiya. Aɣmis n « El Moujahid » n immir yewwid acḥal d asebter ɣef tadyant-agi ddaw yiwen uzwel “ tamsalt n Roubaine Ali Fawzi) .  Tuget seg wid yettwaṭṭfen yeḥkem fell-asen ad sɛeddin lḥebs gar 6 ɣer 3 iseggasen. Amur ameqqran seg inekrufen-nni ( détenus) wwin-ten ɣer lḥebs n Taẓult n Lembes.

<p style="text-align: center;">Zdat ayen-nni n lbaṭṭel Lounis Ait Menguellet yerra tajmilt i imeɣnasen yettwaṭṭfen  a baɛdda i warraw  n-yimeɣrasen gar asen Ferhat Mhenni, Noredine Ait Hamouda di tezlit “ teksem lmeḥna” .  Adabu ur iɛeṭṭel-ara yerra ula d Lounis Ait Menguellet ɣer lḥebs dima deg useggas n 1985. 

<p style="text-align: center;">Maca amussu adelsan amaziɣ ( M.C.B) yefka iẓuran imi mačči ala di tmurt n Leqbayel i-iressa leqdic ines . Amedya ula di temdint n Mostaganem anda llan aṭas n inelmaden id yusan si tmurt n leqbayel akken ad ɣṛen deg usday atiknuluji n tfellaḥt( I.T.A)  yal aseggas yettili-d usfuggel n 20 Ibrir akked yennayer deg aɣṛam( cité) anda ttilin.Aya yettil id ddaw leɛnaya n imeɣnasen n yidles am Djamel Mammeri, Nait Messaoud Amar, Ali Zoubar, Kais Hocine (d acennay) Radja Ahmed, Tighilt Rachid( d-anaẓur) Noredine d Hamid Ait Slimane ( d-imedyazen),Fodil Rachid d waṭas nniḍen.

<p style="text-align: center;">Xas akken amussu adelsan yezdi yak imeɣnasen n yiles amaziɣ , maca timuɣliwin gar iɛaggalen-is mgaraden-t , kra imal ɣer tazdukla( communisme) am Ferhat Mhenni ,kra ɣer tasihrant ( capitalisme) , kra ṭṭfen kan di tamsalt n yidles ( les culturtalistes) am Salem Chaker, Mouloud Mammeri, Kateb Yacine . Ahat d ayen-nni i iɛakren kra  leqdic amatu n umussu-agi  imi kra n imeɣnasen-is suturen leɛnaya n kra ikabaren yellan d ufiren am ukabar n tirni n iɣallen inemalyen( FFS) neɣ  akabar aẓelmaḍ( PAGS) neɣ akabar azelmaḍ amṭurfi( trokiste). 

<p style="text-align: center;">Ayen id yekkan sɣur idelsaniyen d tasɣunt « tafsut »  yesɛan azal ameqqran di lawan-nni . Di tasɣunt-agi, deg ttarun imussnawen  imeqranen am Mouloud Mammeri &amp;nbsp,; Salem Chaker  ttarun diɣen  isertiyen am Sadi  akked Ferhat Mhenni. Tasɣunt n tafsut teldi diɣ isebṭaren –is i yimeɣnasen n tmaziɣt n Lmaruk, Libya d ayen-is is yernan azal akked ccan. 

<p style="text-align: center;">Agemmaḍ, ayen yeṭṭfen lbal diɣen d timlilit id yellan gar Hocine Ait Ahmed akked Benbela id yegran tiɣri si Londre akken tamegla( opposition) ad tewwet s-ugerz ad mmeɣ di tmurt amer s wayen-nni ad yili u ɣḍel n udabu n ukabar awḥid FLN. Timlilit-agi tesewhem acḥal d ameɣnas amaziɣ imi ur fhimen ara amek ara yemlil Hocine Ait Ahmed netta d Benbala xuḍi d Benbela  id –amezwaru i nekren timuẓɣa n tmurt di 1962 asmi yettgalla “ nekni d iɛraben, nekni d-iɛraben. Matoub Lounes yewted s leqseḥ di temlilit agi deg tezlit-is “ les deux compères” :
