<p style="text-align: center;"> 

<p style="text-align: right;">Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Tennerna-d ussan-a deg tɣiwant n Draɛ Lgayed tdukkla tadelsant “Idles”, akken ad tili d aɛwin i yilemẓiyen n temnaḍt, ad tekki deg usawki seg tama n yidles d tmagit. D ayen ara d-yernun ugar n uḥerrek deg wayen yerzan amussu asdukklan, deg temnaḍt-a i d-yezgan s wazal n 70 n yikilumiṭren ɣef waɣir n Bgayet. Dɣa, akken ad yebdu wahil n useggas-a, ad yili warmud amezwaru n tdukkla-a ɣef ddemma n yimeɛḍar I lmend n wass-nsen aɣelnaw i d-yettuɣalen yal 14 di meɣres. Ihi azekka, send taldayt, ad yeqleɛ wahil n usihar-a amezwaru s yiwen n usarag ɣef wayen akk tessran yimdanen-a at asrayen uzzigen. Syin, d akud n usenɛet n yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun akked umunulug i ucmummeḥ. Deffir-s, ad d-ttwasseknent kra n tigawin icebḥen sɣur kra n yimeɛḍar i yesɛan tikci deg kra n taɣulin, gar-asent tamedyezt.Yetturaǧu, daɣen, ad ilin kra n ccnawi sɣur tarbaɛt n warrac inelmaden ɣef wakken i d-nnan yimḍebbren n tdukkla-a, i yessaramen ad yili usurif-a d win ara yeɣren i wiyaḍ meskud sɛan lebɣi. Akken ɣer taggara, ad yekfu wahil n wass s tikci n warrazen i kra n yimekkiyen. Afud igerrzen i tuffɣa-a tamenzut n tdukkla “Idles” deg Draɛ Lgayed. Nessaram, ad tesnerni idles deg taddart-nni, ad tessider kra seg wayen iruḥen. Imi ilaq ad t-id-nini, ma nemmeslay ɣef tutlayt, aṭas i d-ikecmen d tanfaliyin tijenṭaḍin ɣer tɣiwant. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  M. K. 

 
  
 Ixedamen n wexxam n tujya id-yezgan di tama n Lewḍa di tγiwant n Wizgan begnen-d lγiḍ-nsen ddurt-agi yezrin, ass n umenzu n yulyu ideg nella s waḥbas γef lxedma seba n uḍeggar n yiḍuman sγur imezdaγ n temdint tamaynut n Lewḍa. Dγa dayen id-ixelqen iεewiqen i yixedamen n wexxam-agi n tujya, imi ur zmiren-ara ad-xedmen deg tegnatin yecban tiden, d ugguren ara-d-yeglun s lemḍara meqren i twenaḍt d tezmert n wemdan.

 Iwesmekti kan, taγiwant n Wizgan tettidir yiwet n tezγent meqren γef teγzi n useggas-aya, sebba n weγlaq n umḍiq n uḍeggar n yiḍuman ur-nwulem-ara di tama n uzaγar sγur imezdaγ n waṭas n tudrin. Dγa deqs n tudrin id-yufan tifrat i weγbel-agi n wejmaε d uḍeggar n yiḍuman, imi tiddukliwin yesaḥbibiren γef twenaḍt d tesquma n tudrin grent irebbi i weγbel-agi, sawḍent sbedent imukan n uḍegar n yiḍuman s wefran, dayen i yesneqsen taεkkemt meqren. Maca tamdint n Wizgan d temdint tamaynut n Lewḍa mazal ar tura aγbel-agi yettizi yetteneḍ. Γef aya ixeddamen n wexxam n tujya n Lewḍa sarmen tifrat i wuggur-agi γef zik lḥal, imi tudert yelhan tcud γer tezdeg.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 I lmend n yennayer, nebγa ad nẓer anda tedda tmaziγt deg unnar, nebγa ad nesteqsi γef umecwar-is seg 1980 ar ass-a. Ihi, neqsed Ben Mohamed akked Allaoua Rabehi, wid-nni teεna srid temsalt n tmaziγt : amezwaru d amedyaz, wayeḍ d aselmad. S lferḥ d ameqqran i aγ-d-rran γef yisteqsiyen-nneγ. Nesteqsa daɣen Akli Kaci, d amaswaḍ seg wid yettnaḍḥen deg wannar n uselmed

  Ben Mohamed (d amedyaz) Anda tedda tmaziγt seg 1980 a ass-a ? 

 Nezmer ad d-nini, axir zik i as-fkan yimdanen azal, ay kkaten kter fell-as axater segmi i as-tefka dduwla ciṭ lḥeqq i tmaziγt, nwan yimdanen dayen, ur ilaq ara ad xedmen fell-as. Bran i ṭṭbel deg waman. Tagi d tamezwarut. 

 Tis snat,u ayagi zgiγ qqaraγ-t : tiyemmatin ur heddrent ara i warraw-nsent s tmaziγt, ama s teqbaylit, ama s tcawit neγ tameslayt-nniḍen. Meḥsub s tmaziγt s umata.

 Tis tlata, d lakul. Ur ṣseḥfaḍen ara timussniwin yelhan, ur sγaren ara amezruy n tmurt akken yella. Lakul, ur d-yessufuγ ara amdan yeṭṭfen di laṣel-is.

   D acu twalaḍ deg tmaziγt tutlayt taγelnawt tuniṣibt ? 

 Ma yella wacu ara d-yernun, mreḥba yis-s. Acu kan mačči d tagi i d tifrat. Imdanen ilaq ad qedcen deg yal aḥric, tira, aselmed, anadi, amezgun d usnulfu…Mačči d lqanun weḥd-s i izemren ad yesnerni annar-agi n tmaziγt. D nekni s warraw-is.  

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t Hocine.M 

  
 Yezmer ad d-yili ccwal deg wefraq n waman n tissit deg tɣiwant n Ɛin Lbenyan ɣef ussersi n yiwen n ujeɛbub agejdan n waman ara d-yilin seg wass n laṛebɛa ɣef tis 6:00 n tṣebḥit ɣer wass n ljemɛa ɣef tis 2:00 n tṣebḥit, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna, ass n letniyen, Teṛmist n Waman d Ussizdeg n Lezzayer (SEAAL) deg yiwen n welɣu (bayan).

 «Deg ukatar n usenfar n lebni n yizirig n webrid n wuzzal gar Birtuta d Zzradla, ad tessers Tnegga Taɣelnawt n Tezrawin d Weḍfar n Usseḍru n Yisseftiyen (ANESRIF) seg wass n laṛebɛa ɣef tis 6:00 n tṣebḥit ɣer wass n ljemɛa ɣef tis 2:00 n tṣebḥit, yiwen n ujeɛbub agejdan n umesni (naql) n waman», ɣef wakken ay d-yenna welɣu-a.

 Ad d-ilun yimahilen-a (acɣal) deg yiwen n usuddis n waman yellan deg tɣiwant n Mɛalma, yernu ad bdun ad d-ttuɣalen waman cwiṭ, cwiṭ, ɣef leḥsab n ufaki n yimahilen-a. Ad d-swejden tinuṭfiyin (xazzanat) n waman akken ur ttxaṣṣan waman deg yesbiṭaren d yeɣsuren inagduden ay yezwar lḥal d ussifses n lḥeṛs ɣef medden, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna welɣu-a. Taṛmist n SEAAL tenna-d dakken theyya-d akk ttawilat akken ad tfak ccɣel-nnes s tɣawla, am wakken ay d-theyya uḍḍun n «1594» i uxebber n medden ɣef wayen ara ḥwijen ad t-ẓren.

  
 Qqaren-as zik-nni di lemtel ‘’ansi i tekkiḍ i Uqbu d asawen’’, tura tbeddel tuɣal ansi tekkiḍ i Uqbu d rṣaḍ. Win ara d-yerzun ɣer temdint n Uqbu d tudrin i as-d-yezzin, ad yewhem deg remmuɛen n rṣad yersen di yal tiɣmert , deg yiberdan , di ssuq neɣ rrif n yiɣerbazen. Tettaweḍ rriḥa ula ɣer yimuḍan yeẓẓlen ɣef srayer n sbiṭar. Yettɣima ukamyun n rṣad n ṭɣiwant alamma d 25 n wussan I wakken ad d-yerzu ɣer kra n tuddar d tzenqatin i wakken ad yejmaɛ iduman. 

 Deg wussan-nni n Lɛid, d imezdaɣ i ixedmen tiwizi: wwin-d ikamyunen I wakken ad sufɣen rṣaḍ n rrif n yixxamen-nsen, wamma tili ɛeggden gar yiḍuman . ” ilaq ad tissineḍ kra n uɛeggal n tɣiwant neɣ ur teffɣen ara yiḍuman-ik “I d-yenna yiwen umɣar Dda boubkeur At Belqasem. Ma nmuqel akka ɣer ttawilat tesɛa tɣiwant n Uqbu, ad tt-naf gar tɣiwanin timerkantiyin n tmurt n lezzayer, tezmer ad tefru ugur n usizdeg n twennaṭ s shal : “ d imḍebbren n tɣiwant akked yiɛeggalen i ɛemren aseqqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant i ceɣlen d tsertit d lfayada-nsen kan’’les affaires’’, ḥemlen kan ad azlen ɣer lbusta di taggara n waggur, tettun ɣef wacu I d-bedden, almi teɛfen akka tegnit , wamma mačči d tadrimt i ulac ” I d –yenna Brahim At lḥusin d amezdaɣ n taddart n Riki iteddun ɣer tɣiwant n Uqbu. Ad teqqim tuɣalin ɣer twizi gar yimezdaɣ am wakken xedment tjemuɛa n tudrin leqbayel zik-nni, d allal i Wat Uqbu ma bɣan ad idiren di tezdeg, ur d-yegri littkal ɣef yimḍebren n tɣiwant d yiɛeggalen i tt-iɛemren.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Brahim benhamouche  

  
 Akken nuɣ tannumi, yal mi ara d-yawweḍ wass n 08 di meɣres, ttilint-d tmeɣriwin d yisaragen ɣef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut, yerkeḍ urgaz d tmetti s umata , maca ayɣer ur d-yettili ara wawal ɣef uzref n tmeṭṭut ɣer tmeṭṭut? Imi yella wanda tikwal, tameṭṭut trekkeḍ iman-is s yiman-is, amek? Anect-a, ibeddu-d deg wass n tlalit-is. ‘’Ar ass-a n wussan, mi ara d-terbu tmeṭṭut, terna ɣur-s teqcicit, mi ara nekcem s tlawin i wakken ad as-nessrebaḥ tarrawt, neqqaren-as: ‘’ lḥemdullah kan imi tmenɛeḍ. Ma yella d aqcic, neqqar-as: ad t-ig Rebbi d aɣezfan n laɛmer? rnu ttilin ilewlawen d tidet kan, d nkenti i yezwaren deg yiman-nteɣ” i aɣ-d- tenna Ǧuhra, yiwet n tmeṭṭut i nesteqsa. Ttbut, ad t-naf di cnawi n Newwara

 <em> Cfiɣ ɣef wasmi i d-luleɣ , </em>

 <em> Ur d-yelli wedriz felli. </em>

 <em> Yid-wen mi d-mqabaleɣ, </em>

 <em> Tezzim seg-i tamuɣli. </em>

 <em> Tennam i yemma selleɣ : </em>

 <em> Rebbi ad kem sebber a yelli. </em>

 ɣer waya , yella wanda mazal ar ass-a taneḥyaft daxel n twacult taqbaylit gar uqcic akked teqcict. Ad naf tayemmat d temɣert ttmalent aṭas ɣer warrac wala tiqcicin. Ula di tgella, ad tent-naf ttbudunt arrac ugar n teqcicin. Akken yenna umedyaz Ben mouhamed deg wawal-is “Tizlit tecna Nwara”

 <em> Asmi bdiɣ la ttnerniɣ , </em>

 <em> Ḥulfaɣ ziɣ yella leḥyaf. </em>

 <em> Taqaɛet-nni ideg ɣliɣ,  </em>

 <em> tettdeggir-iyi-d ɣer leryaf. </em>

 <em> Di mkul taswiɛt ttwaliɣ,  </em>

 <em> Ala arrac i nessmenyaf. </em>

 Ur yeqqim ara kan urkaḍ n yizerfan n tmeṭṭut di twacult-is n tlalit, ula mi ara tezwej aɛdaw-is amenzu n tmeṭṭut d tameṭṭut, imi ar ass-a amseččuy yezga gar temɣart d tesli. imi tamɣert tḥemmel ad tili dimma d timḍebbert ɣef teslit. Tislit daɣen, yella wanda ur tɛeffu ara i temɣart. Ihi yella wanda tikwal d tameṭṭut i yezwaren deg yiman-is uqbel ad d-awḍen wiyaḍ ɣur-s, am akken i as –tenna tgelzimt i tzemmurt:’’ afus deg-wen ay isɣaren ‘’.

  <em> “Lɛid amerbuḥ akk i tlawin n ddunit”.  </em>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim Benhamouche

Maca, ama d axxam n tγiwant neγ win n ddayra, ur d-yelli usuγu neγ aɛeggeḍ, imi tasusmi n yimdanen tbeggen-d swab yellan deg lejrida. D ayen dγa i aγ-d-yenna yimḍebber n ddayra n Beclul Mass Ait Ali : « Neɛred i wakken ad nili deg lmendad i wid yuklalen ixxammen-a. Zemreγ ad d-iniγ dakken nessaweḍ ad nqenneɛ imezdaγ n tγiwant n Lesnam belli lwelha-nneγ tettezzi γer wid yuklalen». Iwulem ad d-nesmekti belli deg tγiwant-a, yella-d akka deg waggur n yulyu yezrin, yiwet n lḥemla n usedrem n yixxamen iqdimen mi akken taγiwant tessewjed-d sanda ara uγalen yimdanen. D yiwen n ccγel i ittezzin itenneḍ acḥal d aseggas-aya. Aya yeḍra-d s lmendad n unegzun di rray sγur yimḍebber n ddayra mi akken yemcawar d yimezdaγ terza taluft n yigiji.

  M. Smail 

  
 Simmal izerri wakud, trennu tutlayt taqbaylit tesbeggin-d iman-is, tetteṭṭef adeg-is deg tmurt. Aya, iban yekka-d sɣur tarwa-s i tt-iḥemmlen, i tt-iteddmen imi ẓran d acu d azal-is ameqqran i tesɛa deg tudert-nsen. Assa, tutlayt ur tt-nettaf kan deg uɣerbaz, deg yidlisen, iɣmisen d yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen. Mačči anagar iselmaden, inelmaden, imura d yimedyazen i tt-yettarun. Maca, ula d Izwawen-nniḍen, kecmen deg unnar n useqdec-is s wudem i as-ilaqen. D ayen i yexdem dɣa Mass Tufiq Ɛ, yiwen n urgaz seg Bgayet, ussan iɛeddan, mi i d-ihegga tikarḍiwen n yinebgawen (cartes d’invités) i lmend n tmeɣra n yelli-s. Yura deg-sent awalen n uɛraḍ s yisekkilen n tutlayt n Lmulud At Mɛemmer. D tigawt igerrzen i yexdem seg wul Mass Tufiq Ɛ, iɣef yemsefham akked twacult-is, zdin tikti gar-asen. Tikarḍiwin-nni, ɣas ma llan ur tent-rǧan yinebgawen, ad tent-afen ttwarunt s teqbaylit, meɛna umren yis-sent ayendin imi teṭṭef tutlayt-nsen deg-sent amkan-is deg umkan n tutlayin tiyaḍ i nnumen qqaren-tent deg qeddac n yidigan. ZRray-a i iga Mass Tufiq Ɛ d wid yeddan yid-s, yessegzay-d leḥmala-nsen i tutlayt taqbaylit, d usirem i sɛan deg-s. D asurif ara yeǧǧen Iqbayliyen-nniḍen, ad d-akin seg tɣeffalt, ad d-mmektin, ad sqedcen tameslay-nsen di yal taɣult akken ad tettwaḥrez nettat, ad rnunt tmagit d tnaslit. Imi tutlayt teḥwaǧ arraw-is.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 I lmend n usmekti n tmettant n Aissat Rabah, ad d-tili teẓrigt tis 6 n’’Temsizzelt, Aissat Rabah n taddart tazeddgant, ass n 12 deg tuber 2017 i d-iteddun. Bdan yimḍebren n tɣiwanin srusuyen zmamat–nsen , ğarriden tuddar –nsen. Ad yili usrusa n zmam n utteki seg wass n 15 deg furar 2017 alamma d 10 deg yebrir 2017, i d-nnan yimḍebbren n tseqqamut taɣerfant. Aseggas-a, ad d-ufrarent 8 n tudrin mačči am tezrigt iɛeddan anda i llant kan 6. Ayagi, ixleq-d tismin d uɛaned ɣer wayen yelhan , imi asebluleɣ n twennaṭ, yettawi-d lemḍerra, ama i umdan, ama i uɣersiw d yimɣi, yerna tuddar n Leqbayel, cebḥent mačči d kra. Yal tasemhuyt tettak-as tafulki-s, ama deg tefsut, ama tagrest mi ara dlen yidurar s udfel, ama d amwan, ama d anebdu. Rnu ɣer waya, isekla i tezzun, deg-s abaɣur meqqren i tudert n umdan neɣ i uɣersiw. Ilaq ad yili useḥbiber ɣef wayen akk i d-yettawin ayen yelhan. Tamezwarut ara d-yufraren gar tudrin i ittekiin deg temsizzelt, ad tawi 800 melyun, tis snat 700 melyun, tis kraḍet 600 melyun, tis ukkuzet 500melyun , tis semmuset 400 melyun , ma tineggura ad awint 300 melyun. Mxalafent kan 0.5 deg tezmilt maca timsizzelt-agi ara d-yilin terra tuddar fkant azal meqqren i tezdeg, acku tezdeg tettawi-d tazmert, tessebɛad aṭṭanen, yerna d aselmed n tsuta timecṭaḥ, akken ad lemdent tezdeg n tudrin wa ad tt-id-yettağğa i wayeḍ, ad ilint d amedya am tudrin yewwin arrazen yakan am zoubga d Boumesaoud , Aourir Ouzemmour d tiyaḍ-nniḍen uɣur d-rezzun seg yal tama akken ad walin ccbaḥa-nsent .

<div> 
  
 Am wakken i yettuɛeggen,tifranin n yiseqquma n tɣiwanin akked twilayin ɛeddant ass n lexmis yezrin deg tegnatin n liser, mi akken tadbelt tsers gar yifassen n yimezdaɣ n Tubiret akk ttawilat ilaqen. Amḥizwer s akersi yeǧǧa atas n yikabaren d lejridat tilelliyin ad d-kecmen ɣer tazla i wakken ad d-ḥellin ahat imukan deg yiseqquma. Ma nezzi-d akka tamuɣli, ɣer lejridat n tɣiwanin, ulac anda ara naf ddaw n semmus seg-sent. Segmi i tebda ddiɛaya ass n 19 deg waggur ideg i nella, ulac taddart, neɣ ahat azrib yeqqimen ur yethewwel ara ama s tewlafin neɣ s yinejmuɛen. Inawen bnan akk ɣef lebni, lxedma, leɛdel almi ula d wid yellan deffir kra n lexsarat uɣalen-d s wudem d amaynut amzun akken acemma ur yedri. D acu kan, yella akka wayen yessefrahen, imi ayen akk i tekka ddiɛaya n tefranin-a, ur d-yelli kra n cwal ɣas ulamma yeḥres wurar. Ass n lexmis yezrin, kra n wayen akken yellan deg tasilt yessali-t-id uɣenja, imi uqbel azgen n yiḍ, igemmaḍ banen-d. ɣas ulamma ɣef uqerru n twilayt ur d-yelli kra yessewhamen, imi am akken i tuɣ Tubiret tannumi, d sin-nni n yikabaren FLN akked RND i d-yettilin d imenza s 14 ar 15 n yimekwan, d tiɣiwanin ideg i d-yella kra n ubeddel. Ddayra n Bechloul ikesben 5 n tɣiwanin yufrar-d deg-sent ukabar n Ahmed Ouyahia deg 4, d ayen dɣa i d-yedran i tikkelt tamenzut. Taɣiwant n Lesnam i yellan deg ufus n RCD seg 2005 tikkelt-a tenneqlab ɣer RND mi akken Leɛǧiba yezzi-d ɣur-s ukabar-a iwumi yettwakkes leḥkem seg 1997. Ma d akabar n FFS, yessaweḍ ad d-ihelli 6 n tɣiwanin. Iwulem kan ad d-nesmekti d akken tikkelt-a, taluft-nni n tefranin n 2012 ur d-telli ara, imi asaḍuf yedher, iban d win i d-iḥellan aṭas n leswat ara yilin d lmir. Dɣa d ayen ur d-nettaǧǧa ara lhem gar yimdanen.

  Adaoun Abdelghani

<p style="text-align: right;"> Amazigh Ghani 

 
  
 Am wakken yettwassen deg umaḍal n tira, mačči d tisewham ma yennerna-d seg tama-s umaynut aseklan. Ɣef waya, ilmend n usuffeɣ n usegzawal takatalant-tamaziɣt nefka-yas isteqsiyen-a !

  Yehwa-yak tazwara ad aɣ-d-tiniḍ amek yella waddad n yimaziɣen n Tespant, ladɣa n Tegzirin Tikanariyin? 

 Imaziɣen n Tegzirin ttnaɣen ɣef wayla-nsen, ɣef timmuzɣa-nsen, sawkayen medden ad issinen idles-nsen d uẓar-nsen, ad issinen ansi i d-kkan akken ad issinen anida ara ddun. Ddeqs n yiseggasen aya tura i ssuturen tilelli-nsen… abrid ɣezzif. Ɣas tejla-yasen tutlayt gguman ad brun i lleg. Idles-nsen d amuddur, yal ass sekfalen-d deg-s tiɣemmar yettwattun. Ayen iga deg-sen unekcum n Spenyul d izumal. Ɣas akken, zgan ttaken-aɣ-d timsirin akken ur nberru i ṭṭbel deg waman akken qqaren.

  Tessaẓergeḍ-d ussan-a yezrin amawal n takaṭalant-tamaziɣt. Mmeslay-aneɣ-d tazwara ɣef usenfar send ad yili d tilawt… 

 Amawal-a ugar n 5 n yiseggasen aya i as-nekker, nekk d Carles d yemdukkal-nneɣ imaziɣen seg Waṭlas, si Sus, si Rrif, i yettidiren da. Ddeqs n yimaziɣen i yellan da. Tayeḍ, ugar n 10 n yiseggasen aya i d-yeffeɣ usaḍuf n unabaḍ akatalan i yessulin tamaziɣt s aswir n tutlayt n Katalunya. D tutlayt ilan azal ɣur-sen, ɣef waya ggaren-d afus melmi zemren neɣ melmi ssawḍen. Amawal-a ad yili d asgu i wid yeqqaren, i wid yesɣaren tamaziɣt neɣ i wid iran ad issinen amek gan yimaziɣen s umata. Ddeqs n yisenfaren i nessaweḍ nessuli-ten yakan, ddeqs daɣen i aɣ-yettrajun.

<p style="text-align: left;"> Tẓemreḍ ad aɣ-d-tesbeyyneḍ kra n tafat ɣef wamek yella daxel-is? 

 <span style="text-align: justify;">Amawal-a ɣas ini nesmenyaf deg-s awalen itikniken d wawalen i nettnadi, ay din d tikkelt ur ten-nettaf melmi nra ad d-nini kra neɣ ad d-nesfugger kra n uḍris neɣ kra n tezrawt.</span>

  D acu d iswi-nwen amenzu mi i t-tgam akka s snat n tutlayin-a? 

 Iswi-nneɣ, nniɣ-d yakan, d asgu ama i yinelmaden d yiselmaden imaziɣen i yettidiren da ama i yikatalanen i ceɣben yimaziɣen.

  Akken nettwali, am deg tmura tiyaḍ, llant ddeqs n tdukkliwin i iqeddcen ɣef yidles amaziɣ dinna. Dɣa, tesfugglem ula d yennayer tikkelt-a iɛeddan… 

 Tuget n tdukkliwin i yellan da qeddcent akken zemrent, kkatent amek ara d-fkent udem n yidles amaziɣ i ɣumment tkerkas n yiduba n tmura-nneɣ (Lmerruk, Zzayer, Tunes…). Am dinna am da, ran ad aɣ-sefḍen. Mtuttlen yiḍarren-nneɣ deg ujellab n teɛrabt d tneslemt, nekkni ad t-ntekkes nutni ad aɣ-t-slusen.

  Aṭas i llan ttraǧun amaynut d ungal sɣur Salem Zenya, maca ɣer taggara yella-d d amawal. Ahat llan akka yisenfar ideg tqeddceḍ?  

 Di tmurt, nettraju asiẓreg n wungal-inu aneggaru «aẓar n tagut» ɣer teẓrigin Tira. Ma da, di lɣerba, greɣ-d ungal nniḍen d kra n yisenfaren… akken i as-inna winna ar d-ilal ad as-nsemmi hlal.

  Taggara, neẓra mačči d argaz asertan i telliḍ, maca nebɣa ad nẓer amek tettwaliḍ addud n uwanek n Tespant i ugdud-is amaziɣ. Yaḍra tefka-s ayen yessutur, neɣ am din am da?  

 Mi k-urzent tezlagin, ur yelli win ar ad k-tent-ifsin ma ur tent-tesɣerseḍ i yman-ik.

   Awal aneggaru ?.. 

 Yessefk ad nxemmel i yiɣallen. A win yufan yal yiwen ad yeqdec kan deg wayen yessen d wayen yezmer, ahat ad aɣ-d-yekk kra sɣur-s. Win i tent-yessexlaḍen ur yessawaḍ yiwet. Tanemmirt imi i yi-d-tefkam azal d teɣmert deg uɣmis-nwen i nessaram ad yidir, ad as-teɣzif tudert.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t : Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 ‘’Akken qqaren yimezwura ‘Nnig ubrid, ddaw ubrid, leqrar-is d abrid’. Neɛya nettwali amus deg yal amekkan u nekni nerra iman-nneɣ am wakken ur neẓri ara.’’

Akka i aɣ-d-yenna Amar, yiwen ilemẓi i nemlal deg tcemlit n usezdeg i xedmen yilmeẓyen n taddart n Tala Athmane, taɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu. ‘’Nella nhedder deg sin yid-neɣ ɣef wamus i nufa deg tala. Iqerrḥaɣ lḥal ayen din. Nenna-as ilaq ad nessizdeg taddart-nneɣ am nekni am wiyaḍ, ladɣa, imi imezdaɣ-is uɣen tannumi deg tcemlit zik-nni. Ihi, Nemmeslay akked kra n yilmeẓyen u negzem-itt d rray belli ad tili tcemlit ass n lǧemɛa. Dayen i d-yeḍran ass-a.’’ D wi i d awalen n Mokrane akked Hmidouche, sin yilmeẓyen gar wid i d-iheggan tacemlit-nni. Bdan tacemlit kra n yilmeẓyen kan axater ur tesli ara akk taddart, imi tasqamut-is ur d-thegga ara alɣu. Acu kan, akken qqaren ‘’Seg ucrured ɣer tikli’’, akken kan i d-walan Wat taddart leqdic, kkren-d u fkan-d afus n tallelt, ladɣa, ilmeẓyen d warrac imecṭaḥ. Yal wa d acu i d-yewwi, wa d aqabac, wa d lmesḥa, wayeḍ d amger…atg. Lḥasun, deg kra kan lweqt, yeččur-d ugraw ɣer ubrid uɣur fkan ttiɛad. Dinna, bdan tacemlit s nnecraḥa akked yiseɣ imi yal yiwen deg-sen iḥus dakken la ixeddem ayen yelhan i taddart-is akked twennadt. Rnu ɣer wanect-a, tabɣest tameqqrant i asen-ssawaḍen yimsebriden i d-iɛeddan seg ubrid-nni imi ass-nni d ssuq deg Tala Athmane. ‘’Ha-tt-an ihi tgerrez tikti-a. Ula d wid i d-iɛeddan deg ubrid-a, nessaram ad leqmen tikti-a u ad xedmen akka am nekni deg yal amekkan n tmurt n leqbayel. Bezzaf tenṭer tmurt-nneɣ, yal amekkan d aqabuc. Ad as-tiniḍ bran i ṭṭbel deg waman.’’ i yessaram Belaid. Ma d mouhend, iwala dakken tuddart n leqbayel, bdan la d-ttnekkarent ɣer leqdic am wakken llan yimezwura-nnsen. ‘’Uɣalen yimezdaɣ n tudrin ɣer leɛwayed-nni n zik. Meḥsub tacemlit akked tmecreḍt d wayen-nniḍen. Aṭas, dɣa, i d-yelhan seg uḥric-agi n tezdeg. Llant ula d tiddukkliwin i lmend n waya. Leqdic, yella-d, ahat, imi tewweḍ tyarza s aḥdid i d-nddekwalen.’’ Akken yebɣu yili wayen i ten-id-yesduqqsen, ayen xedmen yilmeẓyen n taddart n Tala Athmane, yuklal leqder d ucekker. Nessaram ad yili d amedya i wiyaḍ. D ta i taqbaylit i reṣṣan lejdud, d ta i d taqbaylit i tebɣa tmurt. Ilmeẓyen n Tala Athmane, beggsen-d ad kemmlen amecwar-agi n usizdeg yal ass n lǧemɛa. Afud igerrzen ay arrac. 
<div style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.Moula   
  
 Iḍelli n lhed 04 seg waggur n yunyu2017, tasebḥhit n wass i bdan yinelmaden n uswir wis rebɛa, akayad-nsen n taggara n uswir n ulmud alemmas, yettwasnnen s yisem n BEM. Akayad-agi d win ara d-yilin ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan, imi yebda iḍelli 04 yunyu ad ifak azekka 06 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Mebɛed mi i yetturaǧu ad t-sɛeddin wazal n 13799 n yinelmaden, gar-asen 6550 d arrac akked 7239 d tullas, ad xedmen ikayaden-agi deg 50 n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen. Ad ten-ɛasen wazal n 2779 n yiselmaden, llan ugar n 12996 n yinelmaden ara yesɛeddin akayad n tmaziɣt. Ma d win n taggara n uswir n tsenawit neɣ ayen iwumi qqaren BAC ara d-yilin gar 11 ar 14 deg waggur n yunyu, yetturaǧu ad t-sɛeddin wazal n 20955 n yisnawiyen, gar-asen 8754 d arrac ma d 12201 d tullas. Ad xedmen akayad-agi deg 70 n wulmisen n yikayaden, ad ten-ɛasen wazal n 4958 n yiselmaden. Ilaq ad d-nini belli wigi ijerden iman-nsen ɣer ukayad n BAC, llan deg-sen 14900 d inelmaden iɣurbizen (yeqqaren deg tesnawit), llan wazal n 6055 n yinelmaden imunan. Ma d ikayaden n waddal ama d win BEM neɣ d win BAC, yuɣ lḥal sεeddan-ten yinelmaden deg yiɣerbazen-nsen am useggas iεeddan.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Ayen akk i d-yettak ugama, nezmer ad t-naf deg kra, ad yili d win ara aɣ-d-yefken abaɣur. D ameslay ɣef wacḥal n yisenfan n teḥcicin i yettiren deg wakal, i yebda yessexdam-itent umdan i tujjya seg talliyin tiqburin. Seg zik ar ass-a, aṭas n yimɣan i d-yettwakecfen, banent-d deg-sen ddwawi n kra n waṭṭanen neɣ n lqerḥ d lejruḥ iweɛren. Am teḥcict n merẓgursa i ufan yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel d ddwa n urɣay, tesseḥlay aglim i tečča tmes, tesseqcar-it tettarra-t-id amzun ur t-ttuɣ yeḥreq! Ɣas ma llant ddwawi-nniḍen i d-yennulfan i useḥlu n tmes, maca merẓgursa tettsellik aṭas, imi tessujay, terna tessenqas ccama i d-yettegran deg umkan i tent-yuɣen. Tikwal daɣen tettekkes-itt maḍi i win i yesɛan aksum d lɛali-t, ur t-yettḍurru lǧerḥ. Yeshel wamek ara d-iheggi yiwen taḥcict-a ma yella yeḥwaǧ-itt. Seld mi ara d-tettwaqleɛ seg wakal, ilaq ad as-ttwaḍeggren wafriwen izegzawen akkit, acku mačči deg-sen i tella ddwa. Ad qqimen kan yiẓuran-is iberkanen, ad iriden s waman mliḥ. Syin, yessefk, ad ttwaherrsen iẓuran-nni akken iwata alamma ssufɣen-d aman-nsen izegzawen. Dɣa, aman-nni, ad ttwaẓmen deg lḥila, ad ttwaǧǧen dinna ddeq-s n yisragen. Di taggara, mi ara sebken waman-nni, ttuɣalen-d d aẓmu (pommade) d azegzaw, tin i yettrasen ɣef umkan yerɣan akken ad t-teg ccɣel-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Tasebḥit n wass-nni n lhed 02 seg yebrir, tella-d tulya tunṣibt n tesnawit n tɣiwant n Bujimaɛ i ttraǧǧun yinelmaden acḥal-a. Ḥedren tulya-agi aṭas n yiwudam n Tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, kra-nniḍen seg Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Bujima&amp;epsilon,; llan ula d imawlan n yinelmaden. Ferḥen aṭas yinelmaden d iselmaden imi yekfa fell-asen lḥif d yiɣeblan i d-ttmagaren. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, isnawiyen-agi gren yakkan tiɣri i Tnemhalt n ttrebga akked Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Bujima&amp;epsilon,; gan yakan yiwet n tikli ɣer tewwurt n tesnawit-agi tamaynut, yerna qqimen azal n ddurt ur ɣrin deg ukerḍyur wis sin. Niqal, fkan-asen-d ttiεad i useggas iεeddan, uɣalen nnan-asen-d alamma d akerḍyur amezwaru n useggas-agi aɣurbiz 2016-2017, i 25 di yennayer-agi yezrin, tura d ayen gezmen-tt deg rray, sḥersen timsal, armi i d-tella tulya-s deg tazwara n ukerḍur wis kraḍ. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Amazigh Ghani 

 
  
 Mi sliɣ i yisem-agi i as-fkan i tala-a ḍsiɣ mačči d kra, nniɣ-as: ziɣ leqbayel-agi tsemmin kan! Acimi ur as-semman ara tala n texlijt imi deg-s i d-tella, neɣ tala n ddwa imi aṭas n medden i tesseḥla s waman-is iḥlawanen, neɣ axir maḍi tala n zher imi qqaren-d aṭas n tlawin d yirgazen i wumi teldi tewwurt n zwaj neɣ n <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>dderya ?

 D acu mi stebtbeɣ tawwurt n yiwet n temɣart iyi-d-yemmeslayen yakan fell-as, tulles-iyi-d tadyant-is d lbaḍna n yisem-is, nniɣ-as ziɣ leqbayel-agi ur ttsemmin ara kan aka! dɣa rriɣ-tt ɣef yiccer n lkaɣeḍ, meɛna ass-a bɣiɣ ad awen-tt-id aruɣ i kunwi ay imeɣriyen n uɣmis-nneɣ: deg texlijt-nni n At bumehdi, di tallit n unebdu, jeddi aɛrab uyeḥya, yiwen n lwali yettwassnen s lbaraka-s yewwi-d ifellaḥen akken ad as-kerzen akal-is.

 Ḥulfan ifellaḥen s fad yurez-iten dɣa ssutren deg-s ad asen-d-yawi aman, yenna-asen: alit d asawen-inna ad tafem aman. Ulin d asawen, nudan armi d ayen ɛyan ur ufin ara, s yin subben-d ar ɣur-s nnan-as : *a jeddi aɛrab ur nufi ara, yerna aql-aɣ teqqur tyersi-nneɣ si fad*. yewhem jeddi aɛrab s yin yenna-asen: “qqimet da,ad aliɣ ad waliɣ amek akka ulac aman», yuli cwiṭ d asawen ,yeffer ger tzemrin, syin yewwet s tɛekkazt-is di tmurt, feggḍen-d waman, yessawel-d i yifellaḥen akken ad alin d asawen.Mi ulin,wehmen imi din ǧǧan ulac aman, nnan-as: “tagi si tidak-ik!” . Swan aman armi rwan dɣa ḥebsen tayerza,bnan-as yiwet n texxamt i mazal ar ass-a. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> S.dali 

  
 Imi almud deg usenfar d yiwen n wallal swayes yezmer unelmad ad yelmed ugar tutlayt tayemmat, ihi, ihegga-d uɣerbaz alemmas Kadum Malek n Uqbu, ddurt yezrin yiwet n tuffɣa tussnant I lfayda n yinelmaden n uswir wis-sin, ɣer taddart n Tzaɣart deg tɣiwant n Yiɣram tama n Uqbu .“Tirza-agi d akemmel, tcud ɣer usenfar amenzu yellan deg wahil amaynut d udlis amaynut n unelmad n uswir wis-sin i yettmeslayen ɣef taniyrawt n taddart : Amezruy, aglam, irmad, ansayen, tuddsa n tejmaɛt, tutlayt d yidles s umata”, i d-yenna yiwen uselmad n tmaziɣt.

  Tuddsa n taddart ‘’Tajmaɛt” 

 Mi wwḍen yinelmaden ɣer taddart n Tzaɣart , ufan amnir i ten-iwellhen. Wagi d Mass Ifis i asen-yemlan tizenqatin yettawin ɣer umraḥ n taddart, ideg i d-ttemlilint tqeḍɛa n lmal sbaḥ i wakken ad tent-ikess umeksa n ujemmaɛ n taddart. Armud-agi, ruḥen yenger taggara-agi deg tuget n tudrin n leqbayel. Syin akin, d abrid ɣer tejmaɛt n taddart anda ufan qqimen yimeqqranen n taddart. Dinna, inelmaden mlalen d lɛuqqal n taddart, fursen tagnit , steqsan-ten ɣef tuddsa n tejmaɛt d umahil-ines: Dagi inelmaden snen-d anwa i d ṭṭamen n taddart, anwa i d lamin n taddart, acḥal n yiɛeggalen i izemren ad ɛemren tasqamut-nni, i wacu ttxellisen tabzert wid ur d-nettasen ara ɣer ubaraḥ. Ɣer waya, mmeslayen-asen-d yimeqqranen n taddart ɣef tcemliyin i ixeddmen akked leɛwayed ideg mazal teṭṭef deg-sent taddart-agi. Ayen i d-jebden lwelha n waṭas n yinelmaden, d tiwiz n uzemmur i mazal tettili ɣer Wat taddart-agi; imi nutni jemɛen-as-d azemmur-is i twaculin ladɣa tuǧǧal ur nesɛi ara win ara yalin ɣef tzemmurt i wakken ad asent-id-yecrew. ”d tikkelt tamezwarut i kecmeɣ taddart, qqimeɣ di tejmaɛt, ferḥaɣ aṭas aṭas, ḥulfaɣ i usterḥeb n yimezdaɣ yis-neɣ. Qublen-aɣ-d s wudem yelhan, ur nwiɣ ara akka i ttwaxedmen yimezdaɣ n taddart. Ssarameɣ ad d-uɣaleɣ tikkelt-nniḍen, i d-tenna Lina yiwet n tnelmadt n 12 n yiseggasen..

  Tuddsa n uxxam n leqbayel 

 ɣef lewhi n 11H00, kecmen yinelmaden ɣer uxxam n leqbayel, walan-d amek yebna d wamek yeddes s daxel. Dagi inelmaden, zran d acu i d aseqqif n lḥara, afrag, kecmen s axxam, walan idekanen, s wacu tessa tɣerɣer n uxxam, ulin ɣer tkana(taɛrict ), walan adaynin, lemdawed, ẓran amek iseqqef uxxam n leqbayel : idisim d useɣwen yettilin ddaw n lqermud akked tyejga . Am wakan i walan akufi d ucbayli, tacmuxt n waman, gzan gar-asen. S umata mallen-d ayen ur walan ara yakan ɣef tuddsa n uxxam deg yedlisen.

  Irmad n tulawin: azeṭṭa 

 Deg uxxam n Nna jeǧǧiga ideg mazal armud n uẓeṭṭa . Wallan-d yinelmaden amek i xeddment tlawin aẓeṭṭa. Mmeslayen ɣef tegnatin ideg tettɛeddi taduṭ alamma tuɣal d abernus neɣ d aɛdil. Zyada ɣef waya, walan dduzan n uẓeṭṭa; zran anda ttilin yimukan-nsen , ama d axdir, afeggag , taɛekkast, iɣunam, tayazilt, tijebbadin, ustu,…atg. S umata, zṛan dduzan-agi , mmeslayent-asen-d tulawin ɣef wamek ttuseqdacen. Aya, slan yis-s yakan, ɣarent d taɣuri, neɣ d tugniwin, maca tuget deg-sen ur tent-walan ara di tilawt.

   Irmad n yirgazen 

  A) azeṭṭa n tdeknin  

 Deg tirza-agi , Dda Mezyan yiwen n ufellaḥ i d-yeqqimen iẓeḍḍ tideknin i ɣef fesren tazart di ṭerḥa leqbayel&amp;uml,; yezgza-d i yinelmaden d acu i d-tadkent? Amek itt-ẓeṭṭen. Tuget n yinelmaden urǧin slin s umahil-agi. D tikkelt tamezwarut i walan yinelmaden d acu i d tadkent. Tikelt-a, walan-d d acu i d-iẓenki, walan-d tagensa ideg i d-yettwakkes. Yemmeslay-asen-d ufellaḥ-nni i yinelmaden amek i ten-yettcudu d imuqqnen alamma yessufeɣ-d tadkent.

   b)-Taḥanut umẓil (aḥeddad)  

  Deg tirza-agi, inelmaden fursen tagnit, kecmen ɣer tḥanut n umẓil: taḥanut n uxxam n yiḥeddaden n wuzzal, d taneggarut i d-yeqqimen di tuddar n udewwar n Yiɣram. Azwaw Heddad, yemla-d i yinelmaden ismawen n dduzan akk i sseqdacen yifellaḥen. Dagi, leqḍen-d yinelmaden n wawalen yerzan lḥirfa-agi, walan: zzebra, ageccul, lfar, tirgin, lbila n waman, amentag, lmebred, tiɣemdin, afḍis, tiqecrin n ubelluḍ d lefḥem, tuẓẓalakanun , tagersa, tagelzimt, amger…Am waken isen-d-yules kra n yinẓan i icudden ɣer tfellaḥt.

  Abruy seg umezruy n taddart 

 Tirza tettkemmil abrid d asawen ɣer taddart taqdimt “At Amar Uzeggan”. Mlalen-d yinelmaden kra n yimeqranen, mmeslayen-asen-d ɣef umezruy n tegrawla n 54. Dda tayeb At bujemɛa d amjahed aqdim, yemmeslay-d ɣef wasmi tesreɣ fransa taddart n At amar uzeggan ass n 04 di yebrir 1955. Deg yiwen n was, nɣan 22 n medden. Am wakken i d-yefka Dda lḥusin Ait Bessai cfawat-is ɣef wasmi i d-teɣli tmesriffeget di tezgi iwumi ssawalen Tasal. Aya, tuget n yinelmaden ur slin ara yis-s. Tikkelt-a, tettunekf-asen tegnit i wakken ad walin imjuhad wa ad mmeslayen yid-sen. Tameddit n was, tekfa tirza, uɣalen-d yinelmaden s lferḥ, ugmen-d timussniwin, snernan amawal-nsen, walan-d imdanen, kksen lxiq, ḥulfan s leqder d usterḥeb n Wat taddart. D wigi i d lesrar n turziwin tussnanin ɣer tudrin n leqbayel. 

  B. Benhamouche 

  
 Ass n ttlata yezrin (25/07/2017) i d-banen yigemmaḍ n ukayad n taggara n uswir n tesnawit yettwassnen s yisem n (BAC) n useggas aɣurbiz 2016-2017. Alaḥsab n tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, azal n 14 899 i yejerden iman-nsen deg umuɣen n usεeddi n ukayad-a. Leḥsab n wid i t-i d-yewwin yelḥaq 10 595, s lqidar n 71, 82%. S wakka i d-tḥella amkan amezwaru deg umyezwer deg wakal aɣelnaw i tikkelt tis tẓa (09), imi seg useggas n 2008 d netta dima i d-yettifriren. Am yal aseggas, d tullas i d-yettifriren ɣef warrac, imi uṭṭun n tullas i t-id-yewwin, yewweḍ 6 722 ma d arrac ala 3 873 i t-id-yewwin. Ula d imeḍqan imenza n umyezwer deg lwilaya, uɣalen i tlata n teḥdayin yesɛan tazmilt yugaren 18/20. Amḍiq amezwaru n umyezwer n yinelmaden deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yuɣal i tnelmadt Boustoua Nesrine, yeqqaren deg tesnawit n Stambouli Rabah n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, s tneqiṭ n 18,86/20. Ma d amḍiq wis sin tḥerra-t-id tnelmadt Tinhinane Chafaï, yeqqaren deg tesnawit Mohamed Said Diouani n Makouda, s tenqiṭ n 18,69/20. Amḍiq wis kraḍ n umyezwer, teṭṭef-it temddakkelt-is Lilya Sab yeqqaren yid-s deg tesnawit-agi n Makouda, tewwi-d akayad-agi s 18,67/20. Tullas-agi i tlata yid-sent, qqaren-t deg teska n tussna (scientifique). Ma d inelmaden i yewwin ugar n 18/20, wwḍen 13 n yinelmaden, ma d uṭṭun n wid i d-yewwin ugar n 17/20, yelḥeqq ar 68, am wakken daɣen i d-wwin azal n 127 n yinelmaden tazmilt yugaren 16/20, ma d 646 n yinelmaden-nniḍen, wwin-d ugar n 15/20. Ma deg wayen yeεnan amyezwer n tesnawiyin, ad naf d tasnawit n Mohamed Said Diouani n Makouda i yewwin amkan amezwaru s wazal n 94, 23%, ma d amḍiq wis sin, tewwit tesnawit n Beni Zmenzer yellan deg Beni Douala s lqidar n 92, 75%, ma d tasnawit Ladlani Amar n Maâtkas, tḥela-d amḍiq wis kraḍ, s wazal n 89, 89%. Ad nesmekti belli, igemmaḍ-agi, rzan ama d inelmaden isɛeddan akayad-agi tikkelt tamezwarut i d-yellan gar 11 alamma 15 seg yunyu iɛeddan, ama d wid i t-isɛeddan deg tegnit-agi tuzzigt i d-yellan seg wass n lexmis iɛeddan 13 alamma d ass-nni n lrebɛa 19 yulyu 2017.

  ADAOUN Abdelghani 

  
 Tawennaḍt -nneɣ d tin i nerra deg rrif nettu-tt , nesebluleɣ-itt nefka afus nettekki deg-s, ad naf ama deg tudrin ama deg temdint n Tizi wezzu, nezmer ad d-nini llant kra n tudrin zeddigit ugar n temdint , ad naf tiɣiwanin akk fkant-d ikumya akken ad awin iḍuman , amedya dagi deg tɣiwant n uqbil yettas-d ukamyun ass n acer d wass n wahad ttheggint –d tlawin tanezzayt iḍuman -agi , sakin ttawin-ten ɣer At Wasif , akken yebɣu yili lḥal kksen iguduyen –nni n zik , sdat yixxamen , deg tferkiwin , maca mi ara ad ak-yawi ubrid ɣer Tizi wezzu , iberdan akk ččuren d icekkaren d tqerξunin n crab yerzen , ur yezmir yiwen ad yelḥu ɣef uḍar s wanec-ten n zğağ , ayen yesewhamen mi ara d-ttξaddint tkeryas ad d-ṭeggiren seg ṭṭwiqan mi kfan učči , yerna d tiwaculin ,mi ttwalin anecten n yiḍuman dɣa ttξanaden , d ayagi d-yettawin aṭṭanen d-yekkan seg yir riḥa , ma sdaxel n temdint , yella yiwen umkan d-yezgan deg temdint tajdiḍt ur tezmireḍ ara ad tbeddeḍ dinna ttaččaren ur ten-nettawin ara dɣa imdanen –nni yettrağun tifurgutin-nni rwan lḥif , ayagi akk yekka-d sɣur-nneɣ limer yal yiwen ad yendeh i warraw-is ɣef tezdeg yili ur nettaweḍ ara ɣer wanect-a , yerna Tizi Wezzu tla aṭas n yimukan lhan i tukksa n lxiq am iξekkuren , Tigejda , tala mellulen ,ilel n tegzirt, ilel n uẓeffun , aẓru n ṭhur , ttruḥunt twaculin mi ara telhu liḥala n tegnawt ttwalin-d tafulki n yidurar d ubeḥri azeddgan, ttaṭṭafen-d tugniwin , tettun taẓzeyt d ξaggu n ddurt , ilaq win yeččan yeswa ad yerr iḍuman s acekkar , yal wa ad yeğğ amkan-is d azedgan akken s-yenna umedyaz Ayt Mengellat win yebɣan ad tseggem iseggem iman-is , nesξa imukan ackki-ten i tukksa n lxiq limer ad tili tezdeg n twennaḍt ur tt-nesebluluɣ ara. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;">Hocine.M   

  
 Asnerni i d-yellan deg uselmed n tmaziɣt berra i temnaḍin ideg tt-ttmeslayen yimezdaɣ-nsent iḥuza Amalu n tmurt anda deqs n yiɣerbazen i yeldin tiwwura-nsen i umagar n tutlayt-a.

 Wehran, Clef, Iɣilizan, Ɛin Defla, Tisemsilt d Tlemsan grent irebbi i tmaziɣt iwakken ass-a ddeqs n yinelmaden I tt-yeqqaren. Ulamma amḍan n yiselmaden-a mačči d win meqqren iwakken ad yezdi iɣerbazen imerra maca ayen yessefraḥen dakken deg Si Busɛid, yiwet n temnaḍt ur nebɛid ara ɣef Lmerruk, yella-d deg-s uselmed n tmaziɣt. Dagi dɣa, nufa-n inelmaden n uswir amenzu ṭṭafaren aselmad-nsen am tyaziḍt-nni yessetbaɛen arraw-is. Anda yerra, zgan deffir-s, ayen i d-ibeggnen acḥal dɣa sɛan lebɣi ɣer tutlayt-nsen tayemmat, imi nutni mazal-iten ttutlayen tacelḥit n yimawlan-nsen. Deg Maɣnia, deg umkan iwumi qqaren Lḥemri, inelmaden qqaren-tt s lebɣi-nsen, rnu beggnen-d aya s kra n uxeddim i d-ssewjaden ladɣa di tfaskiwin yemgaraden am yennayer d tefsut n yimaziɣen. Lewhi n ugafa n twilayt-a, deg Rremci, aselmed n tmaziɣt yessefraḥ. Deg uɣerbaz-a dɣa i teḥḍer tneɣlaft n Usegmi Massa Benghebrit i yiwet n temsirt anda, Kouceila, aselmad n tmaziɣt ibeggen-d belli tutlayt-a tezmer ad taweḍ yal aɣerbaz azzayri ur yelli kra n uɛewwiq ara tt-id-iḥebsen awidukan ad yili lebɣi s-ɣur wid iḥekmen. Da, inelmaden qqaren-d ula d iḍrisen, lemden ad arun akken iwata. Rnu akin ɣer Ccetwan, neɣ Ssebra, Zennata neɣ ahat talemmast n temdint, iselmaden bedden, ssawḍen ad ẓẓun tayeggirt ara yaɣen. Tawilayt-a yessawḍen tesɛa akka 08 n yiselmaden, tessewjed iman-is iwakken ad d-teldi daɣ i useggas i d-iteddun 6 n yimekwan nniḍen, aya d isalli I d-newwi seg tkadimit n temnaḍt-a. S tidet, ahat yetturaju nnig n waya, maca iɛawwiqen mazal ur kkisen ara deg ubrid n usnerni n tutlayt-a ladɣa asaḍuf-nni n ufran, anda yettunefk lxetyar i yimawlan ma yella ad tt-ɣren warraw-nsen neɣ ala. Asmi ara yettwakkes waya, iban dakken tamaziɣt ad tifrir deg unnar imi lebɣi n wid i tt-yesselmaden yekka nnig leslaḥ n yiman.

  M. Smail 

  
 Leqbayel-nneɣ, am wakken uɣen tannumi yal ass n tɛacurt, ttmektin-d imeɣban, am lɛid, ur tettun ara amur-nsen , d tagnit anida sufuɣen lewɛadi, tẓurun lemqamat, deɛɛun s lxir. Amedya. Deg taddart n Wat Ṣellan i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Uqbil n Ʃin El Ḥemmam yal ass n lğemɛa uqbel taɛacurt s kra n wussan, zellum izgaren ttasen-d ɣer-sen ula seg tuddar-nniḍen. Deg-s sefraḥen igellilen, deg-s tasuta ad d-tettağa i tayeḍ ansayen , akken ur ten-tettun ara. Yella wanida sufuɣen ilufanen imaynuten i tikkelt tamezwarut. Ass n tɛacurt, d tagnit, daɣen, anida i d-ttemlilin iɛeggalen n tuddar mi ara xedmen timecreḍt-agi, qqaren-as daɣen lewziɛa, neɣ lwaɛda. Yerna mi ara ferqen aksum, ferqen-t ama i wid yesɛan, ama d wid ur nesɛi. Anamek-is, ulac amgired gar yimdanen. Qqaren awal timecreḍt, yekka-d seg wawal acraḍ, mi ara yecreḍ umdan akken ur tettḥazen ara waṭṭanen. Akken ula d timecreḍt s kra n win ad d-yefken adrim i tmecreḍt, yesibɛid Rebbi fell-as yir tignatin, tessebɛad tiwaɣiyin, i d-nnan. Ad naf, daɣen, tiwaculin deg Ʃin El Ḥemmam, ttawint-d lewɛadi ɣer uxxam n Ccix Muḥend d Jeddi Mengellat , imi xedmen zerda , ttdekiren awal n Rebbi. Maca neqsen wid yettẓuren, mačči am zik. Yessefk ad neṭṭef deg leɛwayed-nneɣ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

<div> 
  
 Ass-nni n sebt, 23 deg cutember 2017, i as-tuɣal tejmilt tameqqrant i Mohammed Haroun, ameɣnas ameqqran n tmaziɣt akked tugdut. Tella-d tejmilt-a deg unnar n ddabex uḍar Ath Ouamar Ath Mlikeche deg tama n Ukbu sɣur kra n tdukliwin tidelsanin. Yebda usiher ɣef 8:00 seg temsikent i d-yemmalen amecwar i d-yewwi Mass Haroun, ama d tudert n berra neɣ n daxel n lḥebs imi i d-isɛedda 11 n yiseggasen d uzgen (1976-1987), mi as-ḥekkmen lḥebs i lebda deg temsalt iwumi qqaren lawan-nni ‘’Wid yessersen lbumbat’’. Seg tama n wayen i d-yettwaheggan i tejmilt, tella-d tmezgunt i d-tefka tarbaɛt n Lewhama, syin llant kra n yisaragen sɣur Rachid Oulbsir d wiyaḍ. Tekfa temlilit s ccna akked Dahmani Belaid, Abbas Nat Rzine akked Boudjema Agraw. Yella, diɣ, inebgi n lḥerma, ucennay Atmani. I usmekti. Ilul Mohammed Haroun ass 13 deg yebrir 1949 deg Tifrit deg lwilaya n Bgayet. D mmi-s n umeɣras i tenɣa Fransa deg ṭṭran-nni deg useggas n 1958. Yebda amennuɣ imi yedder tamḥeqqranit xas akken tewwi Lezzayer timunent, ɣef wakken i d-yeqqar. Gar wayen i t-iqerḥen nezzeh, d tamḥeqqranit-nni i sɛeddan yiselmaden-is imaṣriyen deg tesnawit n Dellys, asmi i ḍelben deg yimḍebbren n uɣerbaz-nni i wakken ad t-stixren imi yettwellih kra n yinelmaden ɣer useḥbiber ɣef yidles amaziɣ. Seg tesnawit n Dellys ɣer tesdawit n Lezzayer tamaneɣt asmi i d-yewwi akayad n BAC. Ilemmed dinna, meɛna yettkemmil leqdic-is d umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt anda yessaweḍ netta akked yimeddukkal-is ad d-slalen yiwet n tesɣunt iwumi semman ‘’Iṭij’’. Syin, kecmen deg unnar n tsertit u xelqen-d yiwet n tuddsa tamḍerfit OFB (Organisation des forces berbères) akked tesɣunt-nniḍen ‘’Atmaten’’ ayen i ten-yeǧǧan ad ndin lbumbat i kra n yimukwan, gar-asen axxam n uɣmis El Moudjahed. Yettwaṭṭef ass n 5 deg yennayer 1976, yettḥekmen fell-as s lḥebs n lebda. Acu kan, yeffeɣ-d ass n 5 deg yulyu 1987 mi asen-yessenqes uselway n lawan-nni Chadli. Acu kan, diɣ, mi d-yewweḍ s axxam, yufa-t-id d ilem imi yuɣ lḥal temmut yemma-s deg ubrid mi truḥ ad t-id-tzer deg lḥebs n Lambèse. Axxam anda yeḍra Ugraw n Summam, d axxam n ɛemmeti-s Haroun Werdiya. Gar sin wawalen i yettaru Mohammed Haroun deg taggara n yal tira-s d wigi : Rǧu, tessirmeḍ.

  Farida Elharani 

  
 I lmend n 37 n yiseggasen i yezrin ɣef Tefsut n Yimaziɣen, tesmekta-d Tdukla tadelsant “Tazazrayt” n taddart n Tamda, tiɣiwant n Wagnun, ula d nettat am tdukliwin tidelsanin-nniḍen Tafsut n Yimaziɣen. Tesfugel tagnit-agi ass n 21-04 deg uɣerbaz amezwaru “At Mensur Muḥend ”, s yiwen n wahil s wazal-is anda i d-ussan azal n 300 n yimdanen akken ad walin wa ad d-smektin wid yemmuten deg waggur yecban aggur-a. Yebda leqdic s tɣuri n yisefra, syin d ticqufin n umezgun. Tamezwarut isem-is : “Wwet azrem s aqerru”. Tettmeslay-d ɣef tedyanin n yebrir. Ma yella d tis snat : d taceqquft n “Ṭbib” , anda i d-uraren warrac imectaḥ, syin d cna n tnazurt “Dalila Brahimi “ akked terbaɛt n uẓawan n uUxxam n yilmeẓyen n Tamda. Ssulin Lleqdic s ufraq n yiselkinen n uttekki i wid i d-yefkan afus n lemɛawna akken ad smektin tidyanin n 20 Yebrir.Mi i d-nesteqsa yiwen seg yiɛeggalen n Tdukla ɣef usmekti n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen, yenna-d : “Tiddukliwin sɛant azal meqqren deg uwellah n warrac imectaḥ, ladɣa s tceqqufin n umezgun. Anect-a, d ayen ara ten-yeǧǧen tasuta id-yettnekkaren, ur tettuttu ara amezruy“.I usmekti, Tiddukkla tettwaxleq-d deg useggas n 2014 , ma yella d isem i d-as-fkan ( Tazazrayt ), wagi d isem n taddart n Tamda zik .

  S. Yamani 

  
 Azekka ara tebdu temlilit tagraɣlant tis tlata ɣef tsekla tamaziɣt i d-tessudes tesdawit Akli Muḥend Ulḥaǧ n Tubiret. Timlilit-a ara yekken sin n wussan, ( ass n 04 d wass n 05 n unbir 2014), ad d-tawi ɣef usentel: «  Tamukrist n tewsatin tiseklanin n tmaziɣt seg tamma n : Tbadut, asemmi d usismel ». Ilmend n tifrat n tmukrist-a icudden ɣer leṣnaf neɣ tawsatin n tsekla tamaziɣt, wid i d-yessudsen timlilit-a necden-d aṭas n yimusnawen ara d-yasen ula seg tmura tibeṛṛaniyin ladɣa Lmeṛṛuk akked  Fransa. Ɣef wakken i yaɣ-d-yenna pṛufisur Mohamed Djellaoui amasay n temlilit-a daɣen d aselway n tmezdayt n tsekliwin d tutlayin di tesdawit n Tubiret : «  Sennig n yinagmayen ( imusnawen ) ara aɣ-d-yasen ɣer temlilit-a seg tesdawiyin yemxalafen n tmurt n Lezzayer ladɣa seg yigezduyen n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ ; ad aɣ-d-asen tesɛa n yinagmayen seg tmurt n Lmeṛṛuk , rnu ɣur-sen daɣen wid ara d-yasen seg tmurt n Fransa . Aya akk neḍmeɛ deg-s ad yili d tagnit ilmend n useqreb  n tmuɣli n yinagmayen-a  ara d-yeglun s usezdi n tikti ɣef temsalt n usemmi d usesmel n tewsatin n tsekla tamaziɣt ». I usmekti, tamsalt n usemmi d usesmel n tewsatin n tsekla tamaziɣt, yella deg-s umgired ama ger yiselmaden n yigezduyen n tmaziɣt neɣ inagmayen i iqeddcen di taɣult n tmaziɣt, aya d ayen i d-igellun s yiɛewwiqen ladɣa deg uselmed n tewsatin-a i yinelmaden. Yuɣ lḥal uqbel timlilit-a, tasdawit n Tubiret tessudes-d deg yiseggasen iɛeddan snat n temliliyin tigreɣlanin yerzan taɣult n tmaziɣt. Snat-a n temliliyin iɣef d-yella ilmendad pṛufisur Muhamed Djellaoui, tamezwarut tewwi-d ɣef  umawal n tmaziɣt d useqdec-ic deg uselmed ma d tis snat tewwi-d ɣef tmukrist n uselmed n tmaziɣt di tesdawit. Mass Mohamed Djellaoui, di temlilit i nga yid-s di tesdawit n Tubiret, iger-d tiɣri i wid terza temsalt-a n tewsatin n tsekla, d temsalt n tmaziɣt s umata, akken ad d-asen  ɣer ludiṭuryum n tesdawit n Tubiret ad ḥeḍren i yisaragen, am wakken daɣen i zemren ad zeddin deg uskasi. «  I kunwi n kunemti s wid neɣ tid i teɛna temsalt n tmaziɣt, lɛeslama s yal yiwen, s yal yiwet, aqli-ken (kent) tettwanecdem(t) s lǧemla akken ad tḥedṛem(t) i yisaragen d uskasi ara d-yilin di ludiṭuryum n tesdawit n Tubiret ». Ta d tiɣri n mass Mohamed Djellaoui, amassay n temlilit-a ara yebdun azekka ṣbeḥ.

<p style="text-align: right;">Mokrane Chikhi

  
 L’ange d azwel i textar tmedyazt tamarut tilemẓit, temsiwt Farida Siaci i wammud-is wis sin n tmedyazt. Acu kan tikkelt-agi s tutlayt n tefransist, mbeɛd mi d-tessazreg-d yakkan yiwen s tutlayt n taɛrabt deg useggas n 2008, s uzwel Nekk d umsebrid. D adlis n 30 n yisebtar, llan deg-s 10 n yisefra s tutlayt n tefransist, ɣef yisental yemxalafen, gar-asen : temẓi, aktayen, asirem, tiziri, tirmitin n tudert…atg. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, Farida Siaci, yettwassnen s yisem n tnaẓurt «Dida» i textar i yiman-is, tlul ass n 21 deg waggur n yulyu 1991, deg Draa Ben Khedda deg lwilya n Tizi Uzzu. D tasdawant deg useggas wis kraḍ deg tesdawit n Boumerdas. Tura la tettheggi ammud-is wis tlata n yisefra s tutlayt n tefransist, s uzwel «Les legs d’annem». Tḥemmel aṭas diɣen ssinima, aẓawan, taɣuri, ccḍah atrar…atg.

  A.A 

<div> 
  
 Yuzzel s ṭṭaqa wawal, ussan-a, ɣef usnulfu n Tkadimit tamaziɣt, d wanwa ara yilin ɣef uqerruy-is. Dɣa imi yella Mass Abderrazak Dourari gar wid i d-yettwabedren s waṭas, nesteqsa-t ɣef wanect-a u nfures tagnit newwi-d awal ɣef yid-s ɣef temsalt-nniḍen yeɛnan tamaziɣt.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Mass Dourari. Akken i d-tewwi tɣamsa aql-ik d aselwayn Tkadimit tamaziɣt i ara yettwasbedden ussan-a. Tazwara d acu i d awal-ik? 

 Abderrazak Dourari : ulac win i yi-d-yennan d nekkini i yellan deg uqerru n Tkadimit-a! Yettusemma yekker kan uberraḥ (rumeur) wamma nekk ur ẓriɣ ara. Akka i d-qqaren kra n medden, wissen kan ɣef wacu? Bɣan ad walin amek i bḍan medden, ma ḥemmlen-iyi neɣ uhu. Ma nekk ur ẓriɣ ara!

  Ihi, s wudem unsib, ulac win i ak-d-yessawlen neɣ i k-d-iluɛan? 

  Ulac win i yi-d-yennan. Ɣur-i, ar tura acemma ur yelli. Nekk tura aql-i di Tlemsan. Usiɣ-d ɣer dagi ilmend n temlilit ɣef Mohamed Dib. Nefka arraz n tsekla Mohamed Dib deg tmaziɣt. Dɣa tewwi-t yiwet n tlemẓit, ad tili deg 32 n yiseggasen deg tmeddurt-is. Lwiza Uzellag i as-qqaren. Texdem taɣawsa n lɛali. Lameɛna ayen-nniḍen, tikkelt-agini, aḥeq Rebbi ma selleɣ acemma. Ur ẓriɣ ara. 

  Temmeslayeḍ-d abrid iɛeddan deg, deg yiwen uɣmis, akked radyu tis kraḍ ɣef tpuligrafit. Maca yuzzel wawal dakken mass Dourari immal ɣer yisekkilen n taɛrabt. D acu i d awal-ik ɣef waya? 

 Tura tapuligrafit d ssem n tmaziɣt. Amek i tella tura tirawt n tmaziɣt? Ttarun-tt s tlatinit, ttarun-tt s taɛrabt, ttarun-tt kra-nniḍen s tfinaɣ.Ihi, d wagi kan i d lmeɛna-s; yal yiwen ad yaru akken i yebɣa. Icawiyen akked Yimẓaben ḥemmlen taɛrabt, ttarun s taɛrabt. Ur tezmireḍ ara ad asen-tiniḍ ilaq ad tḥebsem! Nutni ad kemmlen akken. Nekni Leqbayel, di tmurt-nneɣ, nettaru kan s tlatinit. Ur nezmir ad asen-nini ur ttarut s tlatinit! Ad kemmlen kan ttarun s tlatinit. Ma yella d atmaten-nneɣ Itergiyen ttarun s tfinaɣ. Ad kemmlen ad arun akken. Tura, acu i d-nniɣ deg wayen iɛeddan ? Nniɣ-d ilaq ad neǧǧ taluft-agi n tira i zzman. Umbeɛd, ur ẓriɣ deg wacḥal d akud, ad d-ifriren s leɛqel tira ara yettwaddmen, ara yesɣelben. Amedya, ma yella d talatinit i inejḥen, d tinna i ara yemlen abrid, i ara nefren. Lḥasul ur ilaq ad d-tger tsertit deg taluft-a. Mačči d isertanen ara d-yinin «aru akka neɣ akka». Ala! Tamsalt-agi d taɣerfant. Yal yiwen ad yexdem amek yebɣa. Mačči d lɛib ma llant aṭas n tira, yal wa s usekkil-is. D wa i d amezruy-nneɣ, ad t-neqbel akken yella. Lameɛna, sya ɣer sdat, yal tutlayt, ilaq ad tesɛu tafarest (production), deg tsekla d wayen-nniḍen. Mbeɛd, tin iɣelben mreḥba!

  Yettusemma d tilawt n unnar ara tt-igezmen di rray? 

 D annar i iferrun kullec! D tafarest deg tutlayt, d yiqeddicen idelsanen, i ara d-iḥettmen yiwen n usekkil. Dɣa, ɣas tura mxalafent tmeslayin, meɛna mqarabent seg tama-nniḍen. Ilaq, ass-a neɣ azekka, ad yettwaḍfer yiwen n usekkil. Akka i teḍra i teɛrabt mi llan deg tegzirt taɛrabt. Taɛrabt n Ugafa d tantala weḥd-s, tinna n Unẓul deg Lyaman d tantala nniḍen…atg. Maca tura tuɣal d amedya tin i d-yessufɣen Leqran, tasekla, axemmem afelsafan. Medden tura ttun taɛrabt-nniḍen. Yezmer lḥal akka i ara teḍru deg tmaziɣt-nneɣ, deg 50 n yiseggasen neɣ… ur ẓriɣ ara.

  Amek ɣef temlilit i yetturaǧun ad tili deg Tamenrast ɣef tmaziɣt deg unbir-a? 

 Atan ad tili deg Lezzayer. Acku llan sin n yimeddukkal, yiwen d amaheɣ, niqal d netta i yuzzlen aṭas ɣef unejmuɛ-a, yemmut meskin ad t-yerḥem Rebbi. Wayeḍ d André, d ameddakkel-nneɣ, d amussnaw, yessen mliḥ lecɣal-agi n tetergit. Ula d netta yemmut meskin ussan-a iɛeddan kan. Ihi ulamek ara t-nexdem dinna mebla wigad-agi. 

  Ɣef wacu ara yili uskasi? 

 Ad nemmeslay ɣef tira n tmaziɣt s tlatinit, akken ad tt-nessishel. Axaṭer akken tella akka tewɛer aṭas. Atan ula d tafransist tbeddel, taspenyulit (…) nenna-d ula d nekni ilaq ad nbeddel. Ahat tura keččini tettmagareḍ-d uguren deg tira-inek, ma yili ujerriḍ n tuqqna neɣ xaṭi (…).

  Ɣef taluft-a ara yili umeslay? 

 Ala. Mačči dayen.

  Efk-aneɣ kra n yimedyaten ma ulac aɣilif…  

 Llant kra n tenfaliyin ulamek ad ak-tent-id-iniɣ s teqbaylit. Am waddad amaruẓ daɣen yella wanida ur yefri. Rnu, deg umedya n wawal «Si Muḥ U Mḥend», anda ara nexdem « U »? deg tlemmast neɣ ad yenṭeḍ i wawal.

  Asteqsi aneggaru. Ma yella d kečč ara yilin d aselway n Tkadimit, d acu ara txedmeḍ? D acu i d asenfar-ik? 

 Ilaq ad iliɣ d aselway send. Medden la heddren… Nekk ad ak-d-iniɣ ur as-dmiɣ ara i wannect-a. Ilaq ad tili Tkadimit, maca mačči mḥettem d nekk ara yilin d aqerru-s. Zemren ad ilin wiyaḍ. Nekkini tura sɛiɣ 60 n yiseggasen. Ayen ḥettbeɣ, ad ruḥeɣ ɣer testaɣt (retraite). Ihi ma yella fkan-iyi-tt-id Tkadimit-a, ad tt-ṭebbɛeɣ, ad telḥu cwiya, mi telḥa ad tt-ǧǧeɣ i wiyaḍ. Aṭas n yilemẓiyen i ilaq ad nɛiwen, ad ṭṭfen tamasayt (responsabilité). Nekni tura d imɣaren! Ayen nexdem nexdem-it, maca ɣas njerreb aṭas n tlufa, ma ṭṭfeɣ-tt nekkini, mi teqleɛ tessen abrid-is, dinna bqaɛlaxir, ad tt-nefk i yilemẓiyen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Akken i d-nenna ddurt yezrin aṭas n tdukkliwinn temnaḍin yemgaraden i yesfugglen ass agraɣlan n tmeṭṭut i d-yettilin yal azemz n 8 deg wayyur n meɣres.

 Seld asarag “Tameṭṭut taqbaylit gar yiḍelli d wass-a” i d-tewwi ass n sed 4 deg meɣres, deg tmurt n Canada, Massa Farida Zerrar i lmend n tfaska n tmeṭṭut, ula deg tmurt llan wid i t-yesfugglen. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef ttiɛadat-nni ad d-nebder Tiddukkla Tadelsant Inaẓuren n Yiwaḍiyen i igan s tallelt n tdukkla “La Kabylie s’exprime” leqdic s wazal-is, ass n larebɛa iɛeddan, i lmend n lɛid n tmeṭṭut. Iɛeggalen n tdukkla-a, rzan ɣef lɛecra n tenzayt ɣer ulzuz Lbedḥa, anda mlalen d waṭas n tlawin n taddart n Yiwaḍiyen. Ruḥen dɣa akken d agraw, lḥan s tikli n uḍar azal n 3 n yikilumiṭren, ɣer tzeqqa n tmeɣriwin i asen-d-tefka tɣiwant ad tt-sxedmen baṭṭel. Daxel n tzeqqa-nni, wwin-d Mass Meqrani Ɛemmar aselway n Tdukkla Tadelsant Inaẓuren n Yiwaḍiyen akked umaru Benṭaleb Brahim awal-nsen ɣef tmeṭṭut d wazal-is di tmeddurt. Syin, tettunefk tegnit i kra n tmedyazin n temnaḍt, gar-asent Samya Mukaḥ, ad d-awint timenna d yisefra-nsent i wid i d-yusan s ṭṭaqa, ččuren amkan s tnaga n yiwen n uɛeggal. Deffir n tmedyezt, yella-d usenɛet n yiselsa sɣur tilawin i d-igan ccɣel-nsent s tumert d zzux. Ttiɛad-nni ur iɛeṭṭel ara, imi ur d-yelli deg-s usarag n Massa Urida Sider i tuɣ deg wahil. Daymi tekfa tmeɣra zik. Lameɛna send ad tefru, ttwaferqen yigerdasen i tlawin i yettekkan deg ttiɛad i tent-yeɛnan. Di taggara, s tallelt n tdukkla d tlawin i yesɛan tiḥuna n yingulen (gâteaux), yella-d ufraq n yigaṭuyen, iẓmi, lqahwa akked tay i tid d wid iḥeḍren i tegnit. Leqdic-a, yeḍra s umata akken iwata, yerna yessefreḥ tilawin, ladɣa Tiwaḍiyin.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi 

 
  
 Tasqamut n taddart akked tiddukkla tadelsant n taddart n Ait Abdelmouméne, suddsen-d ass-nni n lǧemɛa 19 maggu akked wass-nni n ssebt 20 maggu, yiwet n tejmilt meqqren i yiwen umeɣnas n tmaziɣt i lmend n umulli wis sin n tmettant-is, wagi d Ahcène Taleb n taddart n Ait Abdelmouméne. Yella-d leqdic-agi deg uɣerbaz amenzu n taddart-agi, ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan. Ma d ahil yettwaxdamen yella-d akka: ass-nni amezwaru, yella-d deg-s temsikent n ttsawer d yimagraden n tɣamsa akked usenzi s ubuddu n udlis yura uqbel ad yemmet, yefka-as azwel n “Ait Abdelmoumène, repères historiques”. Syin d iremad idelsanen i d-senɛet Tiddukkla tadelsant ilmeẓyen n usiren. Tella-d diɣ temsizzelt di tmaziɣt tewwi isem n Ahcène Taleb, ɣer taggara n wass, yella-d usenɛet d turart n kra n leṣnaf n waddalen sɣur Tiddukkla tanaddalt JSK Karaté. Ma deg wass-nni wis sin, tasebḥit n wass, yella-d usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka-s, syin meslayen yimawlan-is d yimeddukkal-is fell-as, syin akkin d lwaɛda n tgella i wid iḥedren dinna. Ma deg tmeddit n wass, tella-d yiwent n terbaɛt n ccna n warrac imecṭaḥ n Tiddukkla tadelsant Ilmeẓyen n usirem, llant-d diɣ tnagiyin ɣef tudert-is d yimuhal-is. Turart n yiwet n tmezgunt tameẓyant sɣur Tiddukkla tadelsant Ilmeẓyen n usirem dima, ɣer taggara n wass tella-d tukci n warrazen i wid i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt-nni n tmaziɣt yewwin isem-is, d tukci n yigerdasen n uttekki i wid yettekkin deg tejmilt-agi.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ass-nni lǧemɛa 05 deg yunyu 2015 i yemḍel umeɣnas ameqqran n tmaziɣt akked tugdut Mass Ahcène Taleb deg taddart-is Ait Abdelmoumene i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n yiwaḍiyen.

  Ḥeḍren aṭas n yimeddukal-is, ladɣa wid ukud i d-yewwi amecwar n umennuɣ seg yiseggasen-nni 1980 ar ass-a n wussan : imeddukal i yellan deg umussu adelsan amaziɣ (MCB) yecban, Said Sadi, Said Khellil, Mouloud d Hamid Lounaouci, Yidir Ahmed Zayed, Ali Yahia Abdennour, Dr Ounoughene, Med Loukad, Said Boukhari d wiyaḍ. 

  Tafekka n Ahcène Taleb, tella tettel s wannay amaziɣ seg-mi i t-id-wwin seg Fransa anda i yemmut ass-nni n 31 deg maggu 2015, mebɛed mi i d-yeɣli lehlak fell-as ugar n sin n yiseggasen-agi. 

 Ilul Mass taleb ass n 18 deg yennayer 1955 deg Wat Abdelmoumene. Deg useggas n 1983, yebda yesselmad  deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu. Ittekki akk deg leqdicat n umussu adelsan amaziɣ armi yuɣal uxxam-is deg taddart d tizrigin i tesɣunt ‘’Tafsut’’ mebɛed mi llant tmezwura ɣer Hend Sadi. Deg tsertit, yella yeqqreb deg tektiwin ɣer ukabar n FFS. Deg yiseggasen n 1990, yunag ɣer Fransa anda yeqqim netta akked twacult-is. 

 Yenna-d Mass Lounaouci : taggara-a, nettemlili kan gar-aneɣ mi ara yenqes yiwen seg-neɣ. 

 Ma d Djouher. Z,  tanelmadt n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit n Tizi uzzu tenna-d : xas d mmi-s n taddart-iw, meɛna ur ẓriɣ ara azal-is  armi walaɣ anect-a n yimdanen i d-yusan ɣur-s. D irgazen am wigi i yeṣṣawḍen  tamaziɣt ɣer tesdawit.    

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M    

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Ahat ɣur ddeqs n medden, yemmug ugḍiḍ akken kan ad yidir tilelli-yis d afferfer deg yigenwan, ɣur wiyaḍ d lɛali-yas kan tiqeffet yettɣurrun akken ad n-yeǧǧ dinna tarwiḥt. Maca ɣur kra nniḍen, ur d agna-ya (choix) ur d wa i smenyifen, imi nutni ur ten-ttaǧǧan ttebrariɛen deg yigenwan, ur asen-meddin tiqefftin daɣen ; wanag ttaɣen-ten-id s udrim sɣur yimrebbi-nsen seg ulzuz (ssuq) neɣ seg taddart, akken ad ten-id-ssekren ula d nutni deg uxxam, daɣen n tfergact (lqefs). Akken iban, mačči ɣef menwala n yigḍaḍ i la nettmeslay tura, zun ɣef uzeggaɛbur, abuḥeddad, neɣ d imdukkal-is. Maca, wid i d-ijebbden awellih n medden d wid yuqan, icebḥen, i yeɣlayen daɣen. Ɣef waya, imi babaɣayu ur yezmir yiwen ad t-iqerreb skud leḥsab n wazal-is s yimelyan, rnu wiss ma ad tafeḍ deg-s ayen akk tessarameḍ, rran ihi medden ɣer yigḍaḍ nniḍen i ten-yettcabin, ma neẓra belli qqersen-d seg yiwet n twacult, ed umi ssawalen tibiracin (tipirucin). Ɣas ur d-ttsaraxent ameslay n umdan am babaɣayuyat, maca deg ccna ẓewrent ayendin, deg ccbaḥa n tfekka-nsent daɣen skanayent-d ayen i asent-ihewwun i wallen n umecṭuḥ ed umeqqran. «Acḥal nekk d arebbi deg-sent almi uɣaleɣ nnumeɣ-itent, ur zmireɣ ad idireɣ ma ulac-itent». Ay d-yenna yiwen n yilemẓi yettrebbi-ten. Ma yella d ssuma n yibirucen-a, temgerrad seg yiwen ɣer wayeḍ, seg tewtemt ɣer uwtem, maca tettemtuttul gar 1500 n yidinaren almi d 2500 n yidinaren i uqerruy. Skud ur yewɛir usker-nsen, imi sran kan i waman akked tgella-nsen i yettnuzun, xilla n medden ttwalin deg-sen tadfi (plaisir) ugar n uqeddic.

<p style="text-align: right;">M henni Xalifi 

  
 ‘’Yal tikkelt i deg argaz isrennew iseɣ n rruḥ, yal tikkelt deg argaz inna-d ala i tawsest* (tentative) n tkelwa n win i t-icuban, lliɣ d awaziw n tigawt-is.’’ Ha-t-en wawalen n Frantz Fanon i d-yura deg udlis-is «Aglim aberkan, buɛfif amellal».

 Tudert wezzilet, Frantz Fanon d amyaru d amejjay, d afelsuf i ilulen di Fort de France d Martinik deg wass n 20 yulyu n useggas 1925. Ur yettwassen ara si tlata n tmura i t-irebban. Martinik iǧǧa-tt zik, ikcem Lezzayer i wakken ad yennaɣ mgal imsehres afrensis ɣer tama n FLN. Netta d agrud wis xemsa si twacult ixelḍen (Tafriqt-Takribit) n tmanya iɛeggalen. Ilmed di tesnawit Victor-Schœlcher n Fort de France anida i yesselmad Aimé Cesaire di tallit-nni. Ikcem ɣer lɛesker, meɛna ittwajreḥ. Ikcem-d s yin ɣer tmurt i deg ilul anida i isɛedda BAC, syin ikemmel leqraya-s di Fransa di Temdint n Lyon anida i d-yewwi agerdas n tujjya, ilmed daɣen Tafelsuft d teklisent* (psychologie). Tettunefk-as, syin, tagnit ad yuɣal d aqerru n yimejjayen n sbiṭar n yimehbal n tmedint n Blida, di Lzzayer. Tikli n urgaz tessebgan-d lebɣi-s. Awal n Fanon d awal lqayen, d awal n ugrawliw i talsa akken tella. Awal-is, d ixemmimen-is yerra-ten d iseɣ n tudert-is, d imi ur t-iǧǧi ara d awal kan, ayen akk iga, ayen akk ixemmem yura-t s lmidad di lkaɣeḍ. Isaẓreg-d yakan deg useggas n 1952 «Peaux noires, masques blancs». «Ayaddra ad d-serseɣ ugur-a n tidet taberkant, di lqaɛa-a, i yettaɛraḍen yakan ad tt-teffer?» i yura. Amennuɣ-s isɛa isem, d isem mgal tamuḥqranit, mgal lbaṭel d ddel i d-isrusu umdan ɣef umdan, i d-isrusu yiri ɣef wayeḍ, i d-isrusu uɣref ɣef uɣref wayeḍ. Ɣef waya, deg useggas , 1956, sin yiseggasen mbeɛd mi tendeḥ tmes n ṭṭrad di tmurt, Fanon, ixtar lemḥella-s, wid yettwaqehren s ddaw tamhersa tafrensist, ixtar amḍiq n wid yettwaḥeqren, wid idlen s tduli taqesḥant n lḥif d lbaṭel. Dinna ittaxer si sbiṭar deg i ixeddem I wakken ad ikcem ɣer Tirni n Tlelli Taɣelnawt (FLN) anida isɛa Tmasiyin* (responsabilité) meqqren. Ixdem deg uɣmis n « El Moudjahid ». Yella d imceggeɛ ɣer waṭas n tmura n tefriqt taberkant, yella d Lewkil n Unavaḍ Uɛḍil Azzayri ( GPRA) di tmurt n Ɣana. Islek seg waṭas n tixazabiyin di tmurt n Lmerruk, di Ṭelyan. Armi d lmut, Frantz Fanon , ifka tudert-is i tmunent n yiɣerfan ittwahersen. Yura aṭas n yidlisen, seg-sen : 

 – Peau Noire, Masques Blancs , Editions du seuil 1952 .

 – Les annales médico-psychologiques (1953)

 Congrès des médecins aliénistes et neurologistes de France et pays de langues française (1953) avec le Dr François Tosquelles

 – L’an v de la révolution algérienne, réédité en 1966 sous le titre  » Sociologie d’une révolution « 

 – Pour la révolution africaine, (1964

 Les damnés de la terre (1961)

 Frantz Fanon, iruḥ ad yennaɣ ɣef uktu, d acu yufa-d ugur n Usmaḥyaf n yiran (races) d tɣelnaẓrit. Tigawt n Fanon tella-d di tallit mbeɛd ṭṭrad amaḍlan i yettwaḍebɛen s yimenɣi asnektan gar utaram (Tamrikt) d usamer (Rruss). Beṭṭu d ayen i d-yellan gar ccerq d lɣerb, meɛna ha-t-an ikker-d umaḍal wayeḍ yettusemman timura n umaḍal wis tlata, i yettnaḍaḥen ula d netta ɣef umkan deg wasaɣen igreɣlanen deg yiseggasen n 1950-1960. Aneggaru-a, ibɣa ula d netta ad ittekki deg ufraq n Tarkuṭ * (richesse) n ddunit. Di tallit-nni, Amaḍal wis tlata, i tikkelt tamezwarut, inna-d ɣef tilin-is tasertant deg useggas n 1955 deg usarag i d-yellan di BANDOUNG, mi yugi ad tfreq ddunit ɣef sin iḥricen kan. Aṭas n yiqerra i d-ibanen akka deg umussuyen isertanen n Teslellit taɣelnawt dɣa wwin imenɣi seg uẓar ama di Tferka, di Asya neɣ di Temrikt n wadda. Aya iseḍfrit timenɣiwt n waṭas isertiyen i d-ibanen deg yiseggasen n 60. Aqehher di Indunisya deg useggas n 1965 ( azal n 500 igiman) i yettwanɣan. Timenɣiwt n Lumumba di Congo, Timenɣiwt n Che Guevara di Bolivia, Malcom X, Martin Luther King di Temrikt ufella, Mehdi Ben Barka di Lmerruk, Ccraɛ n RIVONIA d Tefriqt n wadda anida Nelson Mandela d iṛfiqen-is ttwaḍegren ɣer lḥebs i dayem. Di Martinik, tamurt n Fanon, tella-d tinnufqa azal n tlata wuḍan i d-iglan s tlata n lmeytin di Fort de france deg useggas n 59. Syin, d aḥabas d usnejli n yilmeẓyen n Martinik i yessawḍen ad d-ɛelqen kra n yinazalen* (affiches) anida nezmer ad d-nɣer: “Maritinik i Yimartinikiyen”. D awal ara aɣ-yawin deg yizri ibeɛden akken ad d-nemmekti awal-a i d-yenna Massnsen: Taferka i Yiferkiwen. Frantz Fanon, izga iswad i imussnawen ur neggar ara afus di tagrawla. “Amennuɣ agrawliw, tislellit taɣelnawt, tririt n tmurt i yimawlan-is, akken bɣun llan yismawen ifkan i umennuɣ-a, tukksa n ddel ɣef yiɣerfan izga-d d aqesḥan. Meɛna aya ur d-yettili ara d agmuḍ n tamhelt* (opération) ifazen, n uhuzzu amgaman neɣ n uqbal mebla cceḥna. ur nreggi ara timetti, akken tebɣa tella d tamezwarut, s wahil am wa, ma yella ur neqsid ara si tazwara, yaɛni abeggen n wahil-a, I wakken ad irreẓ akk iɛewwwiqen ara d-nemlil deg ubrid. Tukkist seg “ Imenɛulen n ddunit”. Ihi, tiɣri n Fanon mačči d tin kan issawalen i tlelli n Uberkan , meɛna i tlelelli n umdan. Mi ara tiliḍ d anmasi* (Responsable) di tmurt ur nerfid ara iman-is, d tamussni ara d-ternuḍ amek ara tessedduḍ taswiɛt akken ad lemden ihedman, ɣef usali n tedmi, ayen iwumi nessawal s tɣawla, tasertitant. Deg waya amaḍal wis tlata ilaq ad iɛawed amezruy n umdan. Ihi, Taslellit d ayen i d-snulfan imdanen ijdiden. Frantz Fanon, immut seg yir aḍḍan di laɛmer-is 36 d aseggas. Meɛna taxelqit-a ur tseɛu ara nṣib seg tezmert tawergamit, “taɣawsa yettwastɛemren ur tettuɣal ara d amdan siwa deg ukal seg waydeg ara d-ssenser iman-is. Ur d-cennuɣ ara izri i wakken ad sruḥeɣ tilawt d yimal. Ur bɣiɣ ara ad iliɣ d akli n tikelwa. Bɣiɣ yiwet n lḥaǧa kan, bɣiɣ ad tekfu tikelwa n umdan sɣur umdan’’.

 Imlal tikkelt d Jean paul Sartre di Ṭelyan. Aneggaru-a, iḥbes akk lecɣal-is i wakken ad yeqqim azal n tlata wussan d Fanon i d-innan d akken izmer ad ixelles azal n 25 ooo Frank i wakken ad iqqim d Sartre azal n 15 n wussan si tnezzayt* (taṣebḥit) alamma d tameddit, i d-tura Simone de Beauvoire. Jean Paul Sartre ula d netta istaɛǧeb ahat i tikkelt tamezwarut s wudem illan sdat-s, Frantz Fanon. ‘’Nesla i Frantz Fanon azal n tlata wussan.d ussan i aɣ-isɛetben, ama di tfekka ama deg yiman. Werǧin walaɣ Sartre istaɛǧeb yerna ishewwel-it umdan’’. “Le Lièvre de Patgonie” I YIfransiyen, Fanon yuqel d «Afelsuf amenɛul», akken i t-id-tura Alice Cherki. Dɣa yettwaɛzel, yettwaḥqer imi izga ittqejjim di Temharsa tafrensist. Deg useggas 1961, s lehlak afuḥan i yuḍen, Fanon iruḥ ad idawi di Moscou, s yin iruḥ ɣer Bethsada di Marikan anida yessufeɣ tarwiḥt. Frantz Fanon, yemmut mi isɛa 36 n yiseggasen s yisem Ibrahim Omara Fanon. Deg useggas n 1961 i yedda laɛmer-is s yir aḍḍan i t-inɣan di Temrikt.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mourad Mazri  

  
 Ddunit d aɣerbaz n umdan, yal asurif di tudert-is d tadyant, yal tadyant d tamsirt, yal tamsirt tesɛa azwel-is. Amdan si zik yerwa amdegger d ddunit, yerwa tilufa, yal taluft tesselmed-as amek ara yemmager uguren n tudert-is. 

 Seg wasmi turew tuccent

 Ur tekkfi asiweḍ n lqut

 Urǧin i tezgil tiremt

 Yal ass tettaččar-d tarbut

 Kra d ayefki, kra d aksum

 Urǧin lluẓen warraw-is

 Yal ass nettat deg unezgum

 Akken ad tidir twacult-is

  “Timisirin n ddunit” d adlis amaynut d-yeffɣen di teẓrigin n Sefraber di 01 di duǧember 2014, deg umaḍal meṛṛa di teẓrigin n “SEFRABER” s snat n tutlayin, Taqbaylit akked Tefransist. D ammud n tneqqisin (fables) akked tullisin (nouvelles). Ad naf yal taneqqist deg-s tamsirt, yal tullist deg-s anamek, d imedyaten ara yemmlen abrid i yal win ara yeɣren adlis-agi. A-tt-an tseddart seg yiwet n tneqqist, izem, aɣyul akked ubaraɣ, deg wadlis amaynut :

 Aɣyul i teddu yesteqsay

 Win d-yufa as-yemmeslay

 Akken as-d-yefk ṛṛay-is

 Yewweḍ rrif n yiɣzar

 Iwala yiwen n lɣar

 Iɛedda d tama-s, iḍeggeṛ tiṭ-is…

 Seg wammud n yisefra “Tiyersi” ar udlis amaynut “Timsirin n ddunit», amyaru yefka-aɣ-d tifrat i tyersiwin ikersen deg wadlis-ines amenzu, ad naf yesdukel-d akk tazdemt n tifrat deg wadlis-is amaynut, deg-s yessenṭeq-d iɣersiwen, yura ayen yellan zik d timawit, yefka-asen snat n talɣiwin, talɣa n uḍris akked talɣa n usefra. A-tt-an tseddart seg yiwet n tneqqist, tifireɛqest akked wuccen, deg wadlis amaynut :

 Deg unebdu ussan ḥman

 Agama yesseww-it unaɣur

 Tafukt teskef aman

 Kullec-i yeqqur d ahicur

 Isaffen ṛuḥen ẓeqqfen

 Aman ḥebsen ur teddun

 Di lqaɛ n tmedwa nnejmaɛen

 Yal tamda tuɣal d amdun…

 Asmi tessawal ddunit neɣ asmi yettmeslay kullec, amacahu… Anwa ur d-necfi i tenfaliyin-agi, xas ma ass-a ur tent-id-ttadren ara yimdanen, maca mazal ṣṣut-nsent yezdeɣ aṭas deg-sen. Fahim d yiwen seg-sen, yecfa fella-sent, yura-tent yenna : “Asmi tessawal ddunit, izimer temmut yemma-s, deg wakken ur yezmir ara iyi-iman-is, yegga izem d amdakel-is…”. Ugar aya, ad naf amyaru iɣezz s tektiwin-ines yesseqdec tamawalt n teqbaylit di tira-s, yeɛreḍ ad d-yessenfali s yimru-s akked uɣanib n tira-s, ayen akken yeffren deg wul n yal d amdan. S tira-s yebɣa ad yefsi tiyersi yurzen amdan d wuguren i d-yettmagar di tudert-is n yal ass, di tmetti ideg-i yettidir. Amek yettawli timsal, acu id asirem-is , acu n uguran yettmager umyaru s teqbaylit akken a ttawepd tira ɣer imeɣriyen d timsal id nesqerdec yid-s deg tadiwwenit –agi iɣ id yefka s zyada n tummert.

 Ini-d s kra n wawalen anwa id Fahim

 Fahim d yiwen n umedyaz, d amaru yettarun s tutlayt n teqbaylit. Yettidir di taddart n Wagarsafen, yiwet n taddart gar tuddar n tmurt n Leqbayel.

  Amek i d-yewwiḍ amecwar-is deg abrid n tira ? 

 Amecwaṛ-iw deg ubrid n tira, ad d-iniɣ : «da iṣubb da yuli». Nniɣ-d : «iṣubb» acku yuɛar ad d-tafeḍ taẓrigt ara ak-d-yessufɣen ayen turiḍ, ḥṣiɣ mačči ala nekk d-yettmagaren ugur-agi, tugget n yimedyazen ttmagaren-d uguren n usiẓreg. Ma yella ayen yettaru umedyaz yettaǧǧat kan ɣur-s, yiwwas tira-s yezmer ad temmet. Nniɣ-d : «yuli» acku tahregt tella yal ass, imi tawennaḍt deg-i ttidireɣ d aɣbalu n yisentalen, mi d-ffɣeɣ deg yimi n tewwurt n uxxam, ad d-mlileɣ asentel, ad d-mlileɣ taluft ara d-yessakin tahregt-inu. A ma dayen tettidir tmetti, a ma dayen yurzen ilmeẓyen-nneɣ akked tmurt. A ma daɣen, dayen d-yezzin i tmetti, tawennaḍt akked ugama… Si tama nniḍen, si zik-iw ḥemmleɣ ad aruɣ, tira nekk yid-s kan i neddukul, warǧin i as-fkiɣ ttiɛad. Ttaruɣ, ttaruɣ, alarmi d asmi d-yewweḍ wass anda ayen akk uriɣ sdukleɣ-t-id di sin yidlisen. Amenzu d ammud n yisefra, yeffeɣ-d ilindi, wis sin d ammud n tneqqisin akked tullisinyeffeɣ-d aseggas-a.

  Tesufɣed-d “timsirin n ddunit“ ɣer tizrigin Sefraber, meslay-aɣ-d ɣef udlis-agi? Isental ines? Aɣanib n tira-s Amazan yellan deg aḍris? 

 Akken i ak-d-nniɣ ssufɣeɣ-d sin yidlisen. Ammud n yisefra azwel-ines «Tiyersi», d ammud n yisefra yuran s teqbaylit, d win i iɛeǧben aṭas iselmaden n tamaziɣt i t-yeɣran, kksen-d deg-s kra n yisefra, am «Aseklu», «Tisemhuyin», «Tagrest»… slemden-ten i inelmaden-nsen deg uɣerbaz. Ammud n tneqqisin akked tullisin, d adlis-is wis sin i d-yeffɣen di teẓrigin n SEFRABER deg waggur-agi yezrin, yeffeɣ-d di tmurt n Fransa akka tura. D adlis bḍiɣ ɣef sin yeḥricen, aḥric amenzu, n tneqqisin wis sin n tullisin. Tineqqisin-a kra deg-sent dayen d ssnulfeɣ nekk seg yiferdisen n ugama akked iɣersiwen n tẓegwa, sqedceɣ deg-sent tamawalt iwatan, yal ta ɛerḍeɣ as-ffkeɣ imeslayen i tt-ilaqen. Llant tid uriɣ seg yimi n yimɣaren-nneɣ akked temɣarin-nneɣ, nutni aḥkan-iyi-tent-id d timɛayin nekk selseɣ-asent talɣa n usefru, rriɣ-asent tameɣrut, cebbḥeɣ-tent s uɣanib n tira-w. Deg-sent sqedceɣ, semlaleɣ imeslayen iqburen akked watraren. Ad naf snat deg-sent aḥkan-iyi-tent-id yimɣaren, maca mmugreɣ-tent-id di kra n wadlisen i ɣriɣ si tutlayt n tefṛansist, deg-s d ismawen n yiɣersiwen kan ideg-i mgaradent, ur ẓriɣ ara ma d ayla-nneɣ, neɣ ahat mačči nneɣ. Ɣef waya ad d-iniɣ kan d asmuḥyet i tent-id-smuḥyeteɣ si tultlayin nniḍen, rriɣ-asent lqaleb n teqbaylit, akken s kra n win ara tent-yeɣren ad yaf tella deg-sent unamek n teqbaylit. Ma d tullisin, kifkif am tneqqisin, ta d asnulfu, ta aḥkan-iyi-tt-id, ta smuḥyeteɣ-tt-id.

  Melmi ara d-yekcem udlis-agi ɣer tmurt a ? 

 Akka tura ur ẓriɣ ara melmi ara d-yeffeɣ, maca ur yettɛeṭṭil ara. Aqli ttḥerkiyeɣ ad ruḥeɣ ar Fransa, ad mlileɣ d umazrag-inu, akken ad nezmel agatu ( signé un contrat ), d tagnit daɣen deg-i ara as-xedmeɣ asmil (promotion) i wadlis-inu. Ad xedmeɣ tadwilt deg tiliẓri n Br-Tv akked kra n yimaṭṭafen n teqbaylit yellan di Fransa. Sɛiɣ daɣen tinnubga sɣur yiwet n tiddukla tadelsant n Lpari (AFKIF), d timlilit ara d-yilin ɣef tsekla. Ha-t-aya ! Timsirin n ddunit, d adlis i ilaqen ad d-yeffeɣ di tmurt-nneɣ, acku, akka tura iselmaden-nni yeɣran adlis-iw amenzu, Tiyersi, ssawalen-iyi-d, ttnadin anda ara t-afen akken ad t-id-aɣen. Imi iselmaden-agi, yella mmeslayeɣ-asen yakan yid-sen ɣef wadlis-agi n tneqqisin akked tullisin, ẓran acu yellan deg-s. Kra deg yiselmaden-agi ddmen tineqqisin d rriɣ ar ugernet ( internet ) wwin-tent i inelmaden-nsen, sseɣrent-as-tent-id.

  Amek tettwaliḍ liḥala n udlis aqbayli di tmurt-nneɣ? 

 Idlisen ass-a qqwan, di yal taɣult ad naf Leqbayel ssufuɣen-d, dayen yessefṛaḥen. Maca ugur ameqran, awi-d wid ara ten-yeɣren. D imeɣriyen i as-ulac, imdanen ur ḥemmlen ara ad ɣren idlisen yuran s teqbaylit. Ggreɣ tamawt mi ara xedmeɣ timlilit n uznaz d ubuddu, imdanen mi d ddmen adlis-iw, neɣ adlis yuran s teqbaylit ad d-tessersen, ak-inin : «Lukan axir t-turiḍ s tefṛansist…», wa k-yini : «Ayen ur t-id-terriḍ ara ɣer tefṛansist», llan wid d-yeqqaren ugar n waya : «Imi s teqbaylit i t-uriɣ ur yettnuz ara…» . Lḥaṣun d timucuha… Maca adlis ass-a yella deg uzluz s waṭas, xas ma ixuṣṣ di kra n taɣulin, maca ad d-yass wass ad d-ilin, seg ucrured ɣer waḥrured…. Tella kan yiwet, d asḥissef ameqran, imedyazen-nneɣ, awi yufan wid yettarun s teqbaylit, ad tt-qadaren illugan n tira-s, yewwi-d fell-asen ad lemden tira n tmaziɣt akken iwata, ur ilaq ara ad stehzin, akken ad ilin d amedya iṣeḥḥan di tsekla taqbaylit. S wakka d nutni ara yessalin aswir n tsekla, akken ad naweḍ ar yiwen wakud mačči menwala kan ad yaru, send ad yaru yiwen tiktiwin-is, ilaq ad yissin ad yaru tutlayt-is, am yimyura n umaḍal meṛṛa. Llan kra n yidlisen ass-a, ur yezmir ara umdan ad ten-iɣer, acku qqwant deg-sen tucḍiwin n tira. 

  Tasekla taqbaylit simmal tettnerni, kečč yettikkin deg aṭas n tfaskiwin amek i d ak-d- tettban ? 

 Mačči deg waṭas n tfaskiwin ideg-i ttikiɣ, maca timliliyin gar imedyazen gar yimyura, dayen yelhan, d acuddu n wassaɣen gar-asen d ambeddal n tektiwin gar-asen, d aqarreb ɣer sdat. Tasekla-nneɣ txuṣṣ deg yiwet n tama, ulac tasleḍt n yidlisen, xas tella ṭṭaqa n yimedyazen akked yimyura ur tt-qebblen ara. Netta amyaru sumata ilaq ad yeqbel taslaḍt, ilaq d netta ara inadin fell-as, akken ad iẓar aswir n leqdic-ines, akken daɣen ad iwali amek i tettwalin wid-nni yesenqaden tasekla, s wakka ad yaẓẓ ɣer sdat, tasekla daɣen ad tt-ttaẓẓ ɣer sdat, war tasleḍt ur nezmir ara ad nḥiz aclim d ukerfa. Maca si tama nniḍen am wakken d-nenna lina, nekk akken ttwaliɣ-tt tettaẓ ar sdat, ass n wass-a ad naf qqwan yidlisen, imawalen, isegzawalen … atg. D acu kan nniɣ-ak xas llan yidlisen ulac imeɣriyen, aṭas n Leqbayel ur as-ffkin ara azal i wadlis yuran s teqbaylit.

  Amek i ilaq akken leqbayel ad aɣen tanumi ad qqaren tasekla yuran s teqbaylit ?  

 Ur ẓriɣ ara amek ar ak-d-rreɣ ɣef usteqsi-agi. Maca akken gziɣ tamsal, ilaq taqbaylit as-t-ili i walbaɛḍ deg wul, win iḥemmlen taqbaylit ad iḥemmel ad iɣer idlisen yuran s teqbaylit, d netta ara yettnadin ɣef yidlisen-is. Win iḥemmlen taqbaylit ad tt-yelmed akken ad yissin ad tt-yaru, akken ad yizmir daɣen ad tt-id-yenṭeq yiles-is. Ad tt-yesselmed i warraw-is… Ma yella akk waya deg wul n yal d Aqbayli, Leqbayel ad aɣen tannumi ad qqaren idlisen yuran s teqbaylit, taqbaylit ad tt-ttazzal deg yidammen-is. Maca ass-a tugna n Uqbayli dayen nniḍen, tugget n Leqbayel, ur ttnadin ad ɣren tameslayt-nsen, ur ttnadin ad tesseɣren i warraw-nsen, am wakken ur tent-terzi ara taluft, am wakken mačči nsen. 

  Tamuɣl-ik ɣef iuḍebsi anagaru n Zedek Mouloud? 

 Aḍebsi n Zedek igarrez, d leqic n unadi, as-yefke Yillu tazmert n tzemmurt. Zedek yeffeɣ-d deg umeslay-nni afsasan, yefka-as azal i wawal sdaxel n tmedyazt-is. D tamedyazt n teqbaylit ḥesri. Awi ufan icennayen-nneɣ ad sqedcen tamawalt am wakka tt-yesseqdac Zedek, awi ufan icennayen-nneɣ ad sekcamen imeslayen atraren deg yisefra n tezlatin-nsen, ad fɣen deg umeslay-nni afsasan. Imi d-newwi awal ɣef tezlit, ak-d-iniɣ yiwet n temsalt. Ula d nekk llan kra n yicennayen iwumi xeddmeɣ isefra, mi ara as-xedmeɣ asefru i walbaɛḍ sekcameɣ-asen imeslayen atraren, llan kra qqaren-iyi-d fiḥel, xdem-aɣ-d kan isefra fsusen, acku imdanen ttnadin kan ad ccnun, ur ttnadin ara ad ccnun ɣef teqbaylit. Llan wiyaḍ ala, d nutni id yeqqaren di tazwara akken asen-d-xedmeɣ isefra s teqablit ḥesri. Ad nezzi, ad nezzi ad nuɣal alarmi dayen d nemmeslay lina.

  S tewzel ma nniɣ-akTamedyazt ?  

 A asenfali n iḥulfan akked tidet yefren.

  Adlis? 

 Tamusni, d aqarreb ar sdat.

  Tameṭṭut?  

  D tudert, d leḥnana, Tayri ?  

 D afrayen zeddigen, d asirem d talwit

  Ddin ?  

 Illu n yimdanen meṛṛa. 

  Tizrigin?  

 D tiwwura yeldin i umyaru, maca di tmurt-nneɣ d tiwwura imedlen, tisura-nsent wwin-tent yidrimen

  Taqbaylit? 

 D azwu, d abeḥri i turin

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Ulamma iɛeṭṭel ugeffur, ur d-yewwit ara, ayen yeǧǧan kra n tuddar kkrent ad ttrent Anẓar, kra n tdukkliwin ssutrent ɣer tẓallit.

 Dɣa, armi d ussan-a yezrin i d-tebra tegnawt i waman-is ɣer tmurt. Maca taɣelyawt n lehwa-nni, tesnerna-d uguren, imi d-iban d akken imesdabuyen idiganen (les autorités locales) ur heggan ad qablen tagrest i d-iteddun, ara d-ikecmen seld kra n wussan kan. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef wuguren i d-yellan, ad d-nebder ayen yeḍran ass n 6 deg wayyur-a n unbir, mi tuɣal temdint n Bgayet ad as-tiniḍ d tamda, neɣ d ayen icuban ilel. Imi qeflen yiberdan deg-s, ur ufin yinehharen amek ara ɛeddin. Llan ttwaḥezqen, ttuḥettmen ad beṭṭlen lexdami, ad ǧǧen lecɣal-nsen, llan daɣen wid iɛeṭṭlen deg tekcumi s ixxamen skud menɛen-asen waman i d-yettfeggiḍen seg tregwa ad bellzen tikli. D aɣilif i yeszeɛfen aṭas lɣaci, ladɣa imi nezmer ad d-nini yekka-d seg ustehzi. Imi yewwi-d tili deg unebdu yezrin i temmug lḥemla n usizdeg n tregwa d tqenṭrin n Bgayet i yettawin ageffur i wakken ass-a ur d-yettili wayen i d-yettilin. Ladɣa ma neẓra belli aql-aɣ ɛad deg tsemhuyt n umwan, wammag ccetwa taqesḥant urɛad tebdi. Mazal lehwa d yiḥemmalen imeqqranen seg duǧember d asawen. Aya ɣas d urrif ara d-yeg i yinehharen, maca daɣen d anezgum i t-ttɛebbin yimezdaɣ n temdint n Bgayet. Ma yella d imezdaɣ n tudrin, ɣas anezgum-nsen mačči d igeffuren skud zedɣen deg yidurar, maca d lexsas n ttawilat n useḥmu i ilan d aɣilif. Ladɣa ma neẓra d akken ula d ideflawen ttaṭṭafen-iten-id seg yennayer ɣer furar abeɛda. Amedya deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, ur zmiren ad ttun yimezdaɣ ayen sɛeddan merra d iḥeyyaren deg tegras iɛeddan. Mi ara d-yewwet udfel ur ttaffen abrid ulamma ad d-awin taqerɛet n lgaz. Ulamma d asenfar n lgaz n lḥiḍ (gaz de ville) yeqqim ccɣel-is d azgen, akken qqaren: ‘’Izu-tt armi d tidmert, yeǧǧa-tt’’. Imi taɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel ur tesɛi tadrimt swayes ara stemmed ayen i d-tebda. Ilaq ihi ad rǧun alamma ɛeddant tefranin n twilayt n 23 unbir i d-iteddun akken ad yettwakemmel usenfar. Ad yettwassemed leqdic n yijeɛbuben-nni i yettmaggan ddaw tmurt, i yettwaxedmen deg waṭas n tuddar, maca mazal tiyaḍ. D ayen i ilaqen ad yettwammag, imi tallit tbeddel. Acku zik zeddmen-d medden seg tẓegwa isɣaren i ukanun, ma d tura aṭas n leɣwabi i iruḥen. D ayen yesḥissifen ama i umdan neɣ i ugama. Ma d uguren-nniḍen i d-ttmagaren deg tɣiwanin n Ayt Smaɛel d Tsexriwt, d isyaxen n yiberdan i d-yettilin deg cctawi, am winna i d-yeḍran iseggasen yezrin deg Uneqquc, mi yegzem ubrid acḥal d ussan.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Tamdint n Tizi Uzzu, s umata tesfugel amenzu n yennayer, aṭas n yidisan i d-iheggan ddurt tadelsant i lmend n usmekti-agi.

 Gar wid itt-id-isuddsen ad d-nebder: Tanmehla n Yidles, Tanmehla n Tmerrit d tẓuri, tin n usegmi taɣelnawt, Axxam n Yidles n Tizi Uzzu, s tallelt n tesdawit Lmulud At Mεemmer, akked umussu addukklan…atg. Yella-d leqdic-agi deg waṭas n yimukan, ɣef teɣzi n 6 wussan, imi yebda ass-nni n lhed 08 deg waggur n yennayer 2017, yekfa sendiḍelli n sed 14 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Ad d-nebder kra n yimukan d wayen yeḍran deg wussan-agi. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Axxam n Yidles Mulud Mεemmri  

 Mugren ansay-agi n yennayer s wahil d amerkanti, imi d-llant wazal n 22 n temsikniyin n waṭas n tewsatin n tẓuri: tiqendyar, lfeṭṭa, aẓeṭṭa, lmakla, iselsa, tamemt, isekla, llant ula d tid n yidlisen d usenzi s ubuddu….atg. Ass n 09 akked 10 deg yennayer 2017, llan-d d sin wussan n unadi d umeslay ɣef tmedyazt taɣerfant tamaziɣt, smeknan-d seg-s tlata seg tgejda n tmedyazt tazwawt, wigi d : Yusef u Qasi, Si Muḥend u Muḥend d Ccix Muḥend u Lḥusin. Llan-d daɣen ass-nni n 9 deg yennayer, sin n yisaragen ɣef tmedyazt d tezlit tamaziɣt, sɣur: Mass Mouhaned El Aigoun d Massa Fatiha Hamdi. Am wakken diɣen i d-tella tɣuri n yisefra sɣur waṭas n yimedyazen, i d-yusan waṭas n lwilayat n tmurt: Tamenraset, Bumerdas, Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, Tipaza, Tizi Uzzu…atg. Ma d ass-nni n ahad 10 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, ḍran-d kraḍ n yisaragen, sɣur: Mass Messaoui Laarit, Mass Hamid Belik, akked Mass Arkoub Abdellah. Am wakken diɣen i d-tella tɣuri n tmedyazt sɣur waṭas n yimedyazen, i d-yusan 8 n lwilayat n tmurt: Ґerdaya, Skikda, Tubiret, Adrar, Batna, Bgayet…atg. Yella-d azekka-yin 11 deg yennayer, usenεet n usaru-nni Si Muḥend u Mḥend akked usaru-nni Adrar n Baya. Ma deg wass-nni n yennayer, tella-d lweεda n yennayer (sseksu s yiyuẓaḍ), ma ɣef 14h d tmeɣra n ccna sɣur Taleb Tahar akked Kamel Ouamar. Sendiḍelli 14 deg yennayer, i medlent tewwura n leqdic-agi s tbuɣarin, tirebaε n ccna n yilmeẓyen, akked tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes d uttekki,ɣer taggara n tmeɣra. Massa Kemmar, tanemhalt n uxxam n yidles tenna-d: “Neεreḍ ad nesken i yimezdaɣ n Tizi Uzzu, amek i d-yettili usfugel n yennayer, d usenεet n wayen akk nesεa d agerruj. Nessarem yennayer n useggas-agi nesεedda-t deg tumert d lferḥ. Neccallah d win ara d-yawin tazmert d sseḥa i yimezdaɣ n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, d yimaziɣen merra anida ma llan. Nessaram daɣen ahil n useggas-agi n 2017, ad yili d anesbaɣur s leqdicat. Nettmeni diɣ tutlayt-nneɣ tamaziɣt mačči d tunsibt kan deg lkaɣeḍ, maca ilaq ula deg unnar. Ihi aseggas ameggaz.” 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Axxam n yidles Azazga, axxam n umezgun akked temkerḍit tamaynut  

  Yella-d diɣen usmekti n n wansay-agi n yennayer, deg yimeḍqan-agi i d-nebder yakkan, s waṭas n leqdicat gar-asen: ticeggufin n umezgun (Aḥiṭus, Lalla Tucbiḥt, Tacbaylit, Massinissa et Sophinisbe, abrid n yimawlan), deg uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yasin n Tizi Uzzu. Ma deg umaruzn uxxam n yidles n Azazga, llan-t-d aṭas n temsikniyin, asenεet n usaru Macahu akked tceqquct n umezgun d tmeɣra n ccna sɣur waṭas n yinaẓuren. Am wakken diɣen i d-llan tlata n yisaragen deg temkerḍit n tɣuri taɣerfant n Tizi Uzzu, i d-yewwin awal ɣef yennayer, sɣur kraḍ n yimussnawen: Mass Hamid Bilek, Karim Salhi, Mouhand Oubelkacem Kheddam. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Annar n 1u n unber  

 Tanmehla n waddal yilmeẓyen akked lwilya n Tizi Uzzu, sfuglen ula d nuteni ansay n yennayer 2967, yella-d leqdic-agi tama n unnar 1uz n Wunber di tlemmast n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Yebda usmekti-agi ass-nni n lhed 08 deg waggur n yennayer, yekfa ass-nni n 12 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Llant deg-s aṭas n temsikniyin gar-asent : talaɣt, iselsa, lfeṭṭa, tiqendyar, allalen iqburen, tamemt, llan ula d iḍebalen….atg. Tella-d daɣen timsizzelt tadelsant i lfayda n yimezdaɣ n Tizi Uzzu (d isteqsin d trirrit fell-asen). Ass n 12 di yennayer, tella-d tikli n wazal 8000 n yimdanen, rsan-ak iselsa n yiɣersiwen, llan daɣen yiḍbalen ɣef 10 h d asawen. Ma deg tmeddit n wass tella-d tukci n yigerdasen d warrazen i yilɣuɣa n waṭas i waddalen i irebḥen deg tilɣuɣa n ddunit. Mass Belhout, d imḍeber deg Tenmehla n waddal d yilmeẓyen (DJS), i d-yelhan s leqdic-agi yenna-d : “Ad snimmreɣ aṭas tiddukkliwin d yixxamen n yilemẓayen i d-yerran i tiɣri-nneɣ, am wakken daɣen i d-yettili leqdic deg waṭas n yixxamen n yilemẓyen n Tizi Uzzu i iqedcen yid-nneɣ. Nessaram yennayer n useggas-agi iεedda deg tegnetin yelhan deg tumert d lferḥ. Iswi-nneɣ deg leqdic-agi d asemlili gar yinaẓuren, yinaddalen akked yimezdaɣ n Tizi Uzzu”. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Ghani Amazigh  

 
  
 Taɣiwant n Beclul yessawḍen teldi yiwen n ssuq ixeddmen deg wussan n lǧemɛa d lḥedd, tesnerna amecwar-is deg unnar n tdamsa imi deg yimalas yezrin amkan-a yettuxeṣṣen i ttjara yeldi tiwwura-s i tkeryas. Ass n letnayen yezrin, imi d ass i yettwafernen i uḥric-a n ṭumubilat, aṭas n yimdanen i d-yerzan ama d wid ara yaɣen neɣ wid ara yessenzen. Deg tafrara, ama seg temnaḍin n twilayt ama seg tid i as-d-yezzin, tikeryas msennadent ta ɣer ta, imi isalli yuɣ lḥal yedda akken iwata, ɣas akken ur d-yelli ara s ttawilat atraren.
