Seg tama nniḍen, yessefk ad d-nesmekti dakken ɣas ulama aṭas n tkeryas i yellan, maca ur nwala ara akka lbiɛ am waken yetturaju lḥal. Leɣla yuɣen leswaq nniḍen yecban Tijellabin, Aomar d Uqbu yewweḍ-d ula ɣer Beclul. D ayen dɣa i d-nnan kra n wid nemmuger:” s tidet, nefreḥ s ssuq yeldin tiwwura-s da ɣur-neɣ, maca nettwali dakken tecɛel tmes ! Gguman yimdanen ad aɣen, imi azalen n tkeryas iɛedda tilas.”Iwulem daɣ ad d-nesmekti belli ass amenzu ideg yeldi ssuq-a tiwwura-s ur d-telli tebzert I wid ikecme. <span> </span>

  <span> </span>M. Smail 

<div> 
  
 Sendiḍelli n ssebt, 28 deg waggur n tuber, i d amenzu n Leḥlal deg leḥsab n tfellaḥt ɣer yimaziɣen. Ɣef wakken i d-qqaren wat zik ur beddun ara medden lqeḍ n uzemmur alamma d amenzu n Leḥlal, yerna ad rǧun ass n ttlala neɣ lexmis deg ddurt tamenzut n waggur n unbir i wakken ad jemɛen iɛeqqayen imenza. Imi ɣef lehsab-nsen, mi ara bdun deg sin wussan-agi, tettili lɣella s waṭas, yerna ula d tissirt n uzemmur, ur tettciddi ara deg wussan-nniḍen n ddurt, ilaq d ttlata neɣ d lexmis. Dɣa deg temnaḍt n Ouaguenoun, mazal ar tura ṭṭfen deg leɛwayed-agi i icudden ɣer uzemmur. Gar-nneɣ d kra n wussan, ad d-yelḥaq lawan n ujmaε n lɣella n uzemmur, imi ha-t-an akken kan yebda isebbeɣ. Ulamma aseggas-agi izad uɣurar akked lḥammu deg unebdu-nni yezrin, maca ur d-yegli ara s txeṣarin ɣef tzemmrin. Am wakken daɣen i yeslek i yijajiḥen n tmes i yeččan azal n 90 000 n ṭṭjur n uzemmur deg wakal akk n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Yerna seg zik, tamnaḍt-agi tettwassen s lɣella n zzit n uzemmur, maca deg yiseggasen-agi iεeddan ur tessefraḥ ara tarewt n uzemmur imezdaɣ n tama-a, ma d aseggas-agi yeččur-asen allen-nsen, yerra-asen asirem, imi tudert n ddeqs n twaculin ɣur-s i tcudd. Dɣa deg useggas-agi, la nettwali lɣella n uzemmur tella s waṭas, d ayen i yessferḥen aṭas ifellaḥen n temnaḍt-a n Ouaguenoun, imi xuṣent tarewt ṭṭjur n lfakaya-nniḍen yecban : lexrif, aḍil…atg. D ayen ara yeğğen tuget deg-sen ur d-ttağğwent ara zzit n uzemmur s tmara, imi ula d wid yesɛan kan kra n tzemmrin, ad d-awin ahat ayen ara tent-ikafin ɣef teɣzi n useggas, neɣ ma uǧǧwent, ad d-aǧǧwent cwiṭ kan. Aṭas n lğihat n temnaḍt-agi ideg i d-iban belli lɣella-a n uzemmur tella s waṭas. Imi llant tzemmrin ur d-ngir ara ula d aεeqqa deg useggas iɛeddan, maca aseggas-agi urwent armi bɣant ad rẓent. Lɣella n tikkelt-agi, tesxreb-asen leḥsab i yimussnawen deg taɣult-agi n tfellaḥt, i yellan qqaren-d belli tizemmrin yellan tama n ubrid ttarwent s waṭas, imi aɣebbar-nni yettilin fell-asent yettqerriε aṭas n lehlakat. Tid ixeddmen daɣen seɛɛunt s waṭas, maca llant ṭṭjur n uzemmur aṭas-aya ur xdiment ara yerna urwent, ladɣa ɣef lecḍuḍ. Acu kan ala yiwen n umgired i yellan gar-asent, imi tid ixeddmen s waṭas, i ifersen akken ilaq, ad sɛunt ugar, yerna ad yelhu uɛeqqa-s. Ulamma deg useggas yezrin ixuṣ uzemmur, maca aseggas-agi yella lxir. Ilindi imi ulac aṭas dɣa tenza zzit n uzemmur dagi deg Ouaguenoun s 800 DA i litra. Ma d aseggas-agi yezmer lḥal ad tenz s 750 DA neɣ ahat s 700 DA, imi i d-yefka Rebbi deg lxir-is ur icuḥ ara. Am wakken daɣen lɣella-agi yellan s waṭas, afellaḥ tessferḥ-it seg tama imi tella lɣella, maca ur teffiɣ ara aṭas fell-as imi yeẓra belli ad d-ṣubb deg ssuma. Ma d inaǧǧawen ferḥen aṭas, imi s tama, yella wayen ara d-awin seg wayla-nsen, yerna ur d-ttaǧǧan ara aṭas am yiseggasen i iɛeddan, rnu ɣur-s s ssuma rxisen cwiṭ ɣef useggas yezrin. 

  Adaoun Ghani. 

  
  Mass Boukhalfa Bacha, d aneγmas di radyu tis snat seg useggas 1963 armi 2005. Zyada γef yisallen, yettheggi-d netta akked umeddakel-is, Mass Guerfi, tidwilin-nniḍen anda i d-yemlal aṭas n yimdanen yettwasnen, ama deg uḥric n ccna, n tira neγ tsertit. Deg wawal i d-newwi yid-s, yesmekta-aγ-d lewqat-nni : uguren d tmeḥqqranit i tettidir radyu tis snat, d zher yesεa imi yemlal d kra n yirgazen imeqqranen. 

  Melmi i tebdiḍ di Radyu tis snat? 

 <span style="color: #ff0000;"> Boukhalfa Bacha : </span> bdiγ deg waggur n maggu, aseggas 1963. Mi bdi&amp;gamma,; lliγ d abujad : ur γri&amp;gamma,; ur ssine&amp;gamma,; ur fhimeγ timsal. Ayen akk ḥefḍe&amp;gamma,; di radyu ay t-ssneγ sγur irgazen yecban Si Larbi, imḍebber n uḥric n yisallen, Mouloud Chikaoui, Si Mahmoud, Belkacem, Abdelkader d wiyaḍ.

  D acu i txeddmeḍ ? 

  lxedma-w, nekk, d lexbarat, d aneγmas. Meεna xedmeγ tidwilin : ama d ayen i d-icudden γer yisallen neγ d ayen-nniḍen. Lliγ xeddmeγ akked umeddakel-iw M. Guerfi.

  D acu n wuguren i d-tettmagarem imir γef teqbayli ? 

 γef teqbaylit, ass-nni kulci yeddez, kulci yebrez. Di lweqt-nni, sḥefḍen-aγ acu i ilaqen ad t-id-nini d wacu ur nlaq ara. Lweqt-nni, netabaε taswiεt. Qqaren-aγ-d lexbarat ur d-tewwi ara l’APS, ur t-id-qqarret ara. Xas ulamma walaγ s wallen-iw lexbar ur t-id-qqareγ ara ma ur d-yekki ara s l’APS. Acu kan yella wayen i d-nesεedday di tedwilin : aṭas n lecγal i nexdem, i d-neḥya, aṭas n tmucuha i d-nessawel anda i fehmen yimdanen lmeqqsud-nneγ axater neqqar-d d itidwimilt-nni :’’macahu, kul yiwen akken yebγu ad tt-yessefru’’. 

  I radyu, gar zik d tura ? 

 lxilaf gar zik d tura am yigenni d tmurt. Di lweqn-nni, nesεa kan 7 n swayeε deg wass. Tura nedder armi tleḥḥu iḍ d wass. Zik nella di εecra yid-ne&amp;gamma,; tura εeddan di 60, rnan-d tantalayin-nniḍen. Ttawilat mačči kif-kif. Zik, radyu n teqbaylit tettwaḥqer aṭas, aṭas. Gar wayen nxeddem nekni d wayen xeddmen wiyaḍ yella lxilaf d ameqqran : d ayen ur iqebbel leεqel xas ulamma si 1990 γer da aṭas n lecγal i yettwaxedmen, ladγa deg uḥafeḍ γef teqbaylit.

  Llant tezlatin ur d-nettεeddi ara, amek i tẓerrem anti ? 

 sliγ ussan-nni iεeddan wid i d-yeqqaren d akken ulac tira i imenεen acennay-a neγ wa ur d-yettεedday ara. Qqaren-d, d ixeddamen n radyu kan i ten-itekksen. Ayagi, d lekdeb. Xas ulamma ulac lkaγeḍ yuran meεna xas bγiγ ad d-sεeddiγ acennay-nni, ur ttafeγ ara tizlatin-is. Akka ay teḍra d Slimane Azem. Ur tettafeḍ ara tezlatin-is di lweqt-nni deg uxxam n radyu, yerna ur nesεi ara lḥeqq ad tent-id-nawi si berra. Dagi, tella tira i d-yeqqaren ur ilaq ara ad d-tesεeddiḍ tizlatin i d-yekkan si berra. Nuγal nefhem timsal mebla timenna. Ttwakkasent leḥwayeğ di tuffra.

 Acu tzemreḍ ad asen-tiniḍ, ass-a, i yilemẓiyen n radyu ? iwillehen, nefka-ten asmi nella din u aṭas i aγ-d-yesmeḥsen. Ha-ten-in ufraren-d. Ass-a, ad asen-ini&amp;gamma,; yiwet lḥağa :’’akken tebγum tesεam ttawilat, xas ssawaḍen γer tziri, γurwet γef teqbaylit. Ur ilaq ara ad ṭṭuqten s waṭas wawal-agi ijdiden ’’

  Temlaleḍ akked Mulud Mεemmri deg yiwet n tedwilt γef lecγal-a, dγa ? 

 Nexdem-as tadiwennit nekk d Guerfi deg useggas-nni n 1974. Nexdem-itt deg umekkan n lxedma-s. Cfiγ γef kra n lewṣayat i aγ-d-yenna. Yenna-d mi ara txedmeḍ lxedma ilaq ad tt-tḥemmleḍ, ad tt-tqaddreḍ. Ur ilaq ara daγen ad tḥettmeḍ γef yiwen i wakken ad yexdem neγ ad d-yini ayen ur yebγi ara.  Ass-nni, yemmeslay-aγ γef tektabt ‘’Yenna Ccix Muḥend’’. D acu kan, yefka-aγ-d kra n wawalen, cfiγ fell-asen : agdud, tilelli, tagrawla…atg. Xemsa neγ setta n wawalen-nni imezwura i d-nessekcem γer radyu. Nebda-ten-id yiwen yiwen, awal s awal. Kul ass yiwen wawal, mkul lexbarat ad d-nini yiwen. Amedya, neqqar : tilelli, lḥuriya. Cwiṭ, cwiṭ. Zik neqqar, leḥbab d ssamεin, nuγal neqqar imsefliden. Akka i tebda teqṣiṭ-agi n tmaziγt. Ass-agi telḥa aṭas, aṭas. Zriγ yiwet n tmeṭṭut, Djamila Addar, tettwaεaqeb di lweqt-nni imi i d-tenna awal ‘’Aselway’’. Yenna-as yimḍebber-nni :’’ d acu-t userwal-agi ? Rrayes n lğumhuriya, mačči d aselway n tegduda.’’ Ass-a, ur tesεiḍ win ara d-iruḥen ad ak-d-yini acuγer i d-tenniḍ awal-agi, acu kan ilaq ad t-id-tiniḍ anda ilaq, amek ilaq.

  Anwi akk ukud i d-temlaleḍ di radyu tis snat ? 

 Nekk sεiγ zher d ameqqran ur sεin ara akk yineγmasen. Tettunefk-iyi teswiεt mlaleγ d yirgazen imeqqranen. Gar yirgazen i d-mlaleγ di 42 n yiseggasen-agi, mazal lexyal n wasmi kecmeγ γer lbiru n Dda Lmulud. Lounis Ait Menguellet deg useggas n 1982, cher n remḍan kamel, nettmeslay yid-s ass s wass. Nεawed-as deg useggas 1992. Mlaleγ Taher Djaout, tlata neγ rebεa tikal. Ula d isertiyen, mlaleγ yid-sen, am Hocine Ait Ahmed d Said Sadi d wid-nniḍen ttuγ ad i yi-semḥen.

<p style="text-align: right;">Yesteqsa-t Hocine.M

  
 I wakken ad tuɣal tejmilt i tmettut tamsedrart taqbaylit akken i tt-tuklal deg wayen i tqeddec di tudert-is n yal ass, Tiddukkla Asirem n Guraya n Bgayet akked Tdukli n Yilmeẓyen n taddart n Yiceqfiwen tama n Leqser s lemɛawna n n tenmehla n Tẓegwa n Bgayet, rrant-asent tajmlit, ddurt yezrin deg wass-nni n 15 di tuber 2016, imi d yiwen n wass i tɛaggen UNESCO ad yili d ass agraɣlan n tmettut tamsedraret s Heggan-d yiwen n wahil d amerkanti deg-s timsikent ɣef yimahilen n tmettut am uzeṭṭa, iselsa, tugniwin n lecɣalat i t-xeddem berra n uxxam di temnaḍt n Leqser. Rnu, ɣef wanect-a, tirza s yiwet n tquffet n yilmeẓyen d telmezyin i gan ɣer lḥebs n Burbaɛwtac di lɛerc n Yifnayen i yesɛan amkan muqqren deg umezruy n tmurt-nneɣ, ttwaxemden ula d isura fell-as . Ameɣnas amyaru Karim Ccix akked Bailli Farid lmir n Yifnayen, uzllen aṭas i wakken lḥebs –agi ad yuɣal d asalay n umezruy; imi aṭas terwiḥin n yirgazen d tulawin i iruḥen deg-s s ufus n uccengu “le sergent Morvisa,” win iwumi ssawalen «Bu čamar» lawan-nni n tegrawla n timunent n lezzayer “1954-1962 “. Seld awal i d-yekfa s telqyt Mass Karim Ccix ɣef wayen yeḍran di lhebs n Burbaɛtac di ṭrad n 54-62, imi netta yakan yexdem yiwen unadi ɣef lḥebs-agi , win ara ad naf deg udlis-ines iwumi isemma:” La torture à Bourbaatache “, tkemmel tgeffet abrid-is, zzin-d i yiberdan n taddart n yicekkaben i wakken ad walin lebni n yixxamen n taddart i rran yimezdaɣ akken i ten-id-ǧǧan lejdud. Syin, mmeslayen d tulawin i ten-izedɣen, am wakken gan-d tugniwin akked d yimɣaren d temɣarin n taddart d yidurar Ii as-yezzin, ladɣa, Asif n Felden. Deg taggara, fkan kra n warrazen i lxalat mazal ɣer ass-a ṭfent deg yiẓeḍwan n tbernyas d tduli n zik… Tekfa tirza s tgella n seksu i d-nawlent tlawin n taddart s yisufar i d –ksent di tebḥirin-nsent. Ihi, akka: ‘’Win iqesden agama iwala , win izuren yeqḍa’’.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim Benhamouche 

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: deg tazwara, ma yella wamek ara aɣ-d-temmeslayeḍ ciṭ ɣef tmeddurt-ik? 

 Kader Bouacherine: luleɣ ass n 13 deg waggur n maggu deg useggas n 1957 deg taddart n Lemsella, deg tɣiwant n Illoula Umalou, deg temnaḍt n Bouzaguène, deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Liɣ yakkan d aselmad n tutlayt n taεrabt, almi d aseggas n 1995. Ussan-nni i d-yessawel usqamu unnig n timuzɣa ɣer tannant tamezwarut n yiselmaden imunnan n tmaziɣt. D aselmad amezwaru i yeffɣen ɣer tɣimit s tutlayt n tmaziɣt deg useggas n 2002. D aselway n tiddukla tadelsant “Tirza” n ugezdu n Tizi Uzzu, seg asmi i d-tlul.

  Ma tzemreḍ ad aɣ-dtemmeslayeḍ, ugar,ɣef uselmed n tmaziɣt? 

 Slemdeɣ tutlayt n tmaziɣt daɣen deg waṭas n yiɣerbazen n Tizi Uzzu yecban, aɣerbaz alemmas “Luṭfi”, aɣerbaz alemmas Mulud Ferεun akked uɣerbaz alemmas n Ugusim . Am wakken daɣen i tt-seɣreɣ deg waṭas n tiddukliwin tidelsanin n Tizi Uzzu, gar-asent: Tiddukla Tadelsant “Asirem” d Tiddukla n “Si Muḥend u Mḥend’’. Seg 2010 ar ass-a, aql-iyi d aselmad n tmaziɣt deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu.

  Turiḍ, diɣ, idlisen s tmaziɣt. D acu i d ak-yeğğan ad tefreḍ abrid n tira? 

 Ma d tamentilt i yi-ğğan ad awiɣ abrid n tira d wa: seg wasmi lliɣ d aselmad i wallaɣ belli yella lexsas ameqqran deg yidlisen n tmaziɣt, ladɣa wid yerzan aselmed. Imi daɣen aṭas i yettnadin ad lemden tutlayt-nsen, maca ur d-ttafen ara awfus ara ten-iεiwnen, dɣa xemmeɣ i wakken ad d-sizergeɣ timsirin i slemdeɣ, u mazal la selmadeɣ deg yidlisen, i wakken ad d-aruɣ ayen ara ten-iεiwnen, swayes ara d-sfaydin meqqar. 

  Ma tzemreḍ ad d-tefkeḍ, I yimeɣriyen, agzul ɣef sin yidlisen-ik i d-yeffɣen yakan? 

 Uriɣ yakan yiwen n udlis s tmaziɣt, semmaɣ-as ‘’Timsirin n tutlayt n tmaziɣt: Tirawalt”, i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2015. Wwiɣ-d deg-s awal ɣef timsirin n tirawalt, amedya gar temsirin xedmeɣ: Tussda, Tizdit, Tamsertit…atg. Ma d tikkelt-agi deg tazawra n 2016, rniɣ-d adlis-nniḍen n timsirin n tutlayt n tmaziɣt, acu kan abrid-a d “Tajerrumt”, uriɣ-d akk timsirin yerzan tajerrumt. Adlis-agi n tjerrumt, ibedd ɣef kraḍ n yiḥricen. Ad naf deg uḥric amezwau, timsirin n tjerrumt amedya : isem, amqim, asuddes…atg. Aḥric wis sin, jemεeɣ-d deg-s ugar n 300 n yinzan, ma d aḥric aneggaru, uriɣ-d deg-s 4 n tullisin.

  Ahat tirmit-ik deg uselmed n tmaziɣt tεawen-ik aṭas deg tira s tmaziɣt, meslay-aɣ-d ɣef wanecta… 

 D tidet, tirmit-iw deg uselmed n tmaziɣt tεawen-iyi i wakken ad aruɣ idlisen, yerna s tmaziɣt. Imi tuget n temsirin-agi i ssɣareɣ, ɣriɣ-tent yakan deg 1995. Syin sseɣreɣ-tent, ama deg yiɣerbazen, ama deg tiddukliwin tidelsanin. Lukan ahat ur ɣriɣ ara tamaziɣt tili ass-a ur ttaruɣ ara yis tura, maca imi i yi-tettunefk tegnit ɣriɣ, uɣaleɣ sseɣreɣ-tt, tura akka la ttaruɣ yis-s idlisen.

  D acu i d tamuɣli-k ɣef tira s tmaziɣt? 

 Deg tallit-agi taneggarut, la nettwali belli aṭas n yidlisen ara d-itteffɣen deg yal aḥric seg yiḥricen n yidles d tsekla tamaziɣt, d ayen yessefraḥen aṭas aṭas. Aṭas n yidlisen yuran s tezwawt ara d-yetteffɣen deg yiseggasen-agi iεeddan, yerna di yal tiwsatin n tsekla: tamedyazt, inzan, ungalen, amezgun, iwfusen (idlisen n uselmed), timucuha, tullisin…atg. Acu kan ilaq adlis amaziɣ, ad yili am netta, am watmaten-is-nniḍen, imi tamaziɣt d tunsibt deg tmendawt. Ihi ilaq adlis-ines ad yuɣal gar yifassen n ugdud akken ma yella, mačči ɣer yimaziɣen kan.

  Imi kečč mazal-ik d aselmad n tmaziɣt, d acu i d tamuɣli-ik ɣef uselmed n tmaziɣt deg uɣerbaz? 

 Ayen yellan d targit yuɣal d tidet, imi deg useggas n 1995 tekcem tmaziɣt s aɣerbaz azzayri, ma deg useggas n 2016, tuɣal d tunsibt deg tmendawt. D ayen yessefraḥen aṭas imi azal n 34 n lwilayat i tt-yeqqaren. Maca, mazal urεad tewwiḍ s amḍiq i as-iwulmen, imi teḥwağ aseggem, ama d ayen yeεnan akud- imi drus maḍi 3 n tikkal i ddurt- ama deg wazal-is…atg. 

  Amek i ilaq ad yili umaru? 

 Afennan di tmurt-nneɣ ass-a, mazal ur yewwiḍ ara ad yilli akken yebɣa, maca yexddem kan akken yufa. D leḥṛara i yesԑa deg wul akked tnefsit-is i t-yerran yesԑa-tt d aɣbel akken ur tettlumen ara medden azekka. Ilaq ad iεiwen timetti-ines s wayen iwumi yezmer, d wayen yessen. Ilaq daɣen ad yili ɣer tama n ugdud-is, ama deg tallit n lferḥ neɣ deg tallit n leḥzen. Ilaq diɣen ad yettḥussu swayen ttḥussun yimdanen yellan ɣer tama-s. 

  Awal-ik n taggara? 

 Tanemmirt-ik a Mass Adaoun imi tgiḍ azal i nekk d leqdic-iw adelsan, tanemmirt s tussda i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen imi yettak afud d ameqqran i yal amaru neɣ anaẓur s umata. D ineɣmasen-is i yettnadin ɣef yinaẓur (imyura, ifennanen, imedyazen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa- t: Adaoun Abdel Ghani 

 
  
 D ayen i yezmer ad iwali ula d agrud ameẓyan. Segmi yeḥbes Ugraw n Taddart n Krun deg Ayt Tɛisiwt, tuɣal temnaḍt-a teqqur, yeqqur kullec deg-s. Deg uqerruy-is yella deg-s mass Gemmac Idris, d aselmad deg Ayt Smaɛel, lwaḥi d kra n yilemẓiyen i yeddan akken yid-s kra n tallit. Maca, tidukkla-ya ur tdum aṭas n wakud; tɛedda kan ad d-terr ttmaggan deg wannar kra n yisenfaren igejdanen deg taddart, wid ɣef llan ccettkayen kra n yimezdaɣ, mi d-yekka wayen ara yesḥebsen armuden-is (activités) sɣur yimezdaɣ-nni gedged i yugin ad ddakklen yid-s. Ɣur uselway aqbur n tdukkli-ya n taddart, segmi yebberka ugraw aqeddic-is, uɣalent tlufa teddunt i twaɣit. «Lḥala n taddart segmi yeḥbes ugraw iban; aql-itt teqqur seg yal tama. Rnu ad ak-d-iniɣ belli azgen seg taddart yeɛjeb-asen lḥal». Akka i yesḥassef Gemmac Idris ɣef wid yettwalin deg umihi inmetti (danger social) nutni acemma ur bɣan ad t-id-xedmen. Send ad aɣ-d-yernu iwenniten-a s kra n usirem: «atan ma yebɣa Rebbi ad d-nerr ussan-a agraw s annar. Abeddel n lwali n Bgayet ed uselway n tdayra n Yiderginen, d tagnit i nekni akken ad nessuter izerfan-nneɣ s usaḍuf (lqanun)». Gar wayen seg nnuɣnan kra n yimezdaɣ n taddart, d asenfar n internet i iruḥen almi mazal mimuc ad d-yemmag, syinna bran kra i ṭṭbel deg waman, yeqqim akken d asirem. Maca yezmer ihi ad yili ubeddel sey-a ɣer sdat iqerben imi tella terbaɛt tenwa d tidet i waya. «Tarbaɛt-a tɛewwel d tidet i useggen, imi dɣa kra n wid yellan deg-s d ageɛmir. Ussan-a ad nexdem ikwaɣḍen i ilaqen seg tedbelt (administration)». I aɣ-d-yerna taggara win i aɣ-d-yettmeslayen. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Mi ara truḥeḍ seg temdint n Leqser, ad teṭṭfeḍ abrid-ik d asawen metwal Tuqbal (Adekkar).

 Neɣ mi ara d-taseḍ seg Yiɛeẓẓugen, Iɛekkuren gar yisekla i d-yettaken abeḥri ḥlawen, kif kif ; ad d-tafeḍ iman-ik deg Tuqbal. Seg Tuqbal, ad tawiḍ abrid d asawen metwal adrar, ad tdeffreḍ abrid n tkerrust tama n Teẓgi n Ukeffadu, ɣas ur yesɛi ara agudrun ubrid-nni, ɣef teɣzi n 11 n yikilumitren kan, ad d-tafeḍ iman-ik zzint-ak-d ṭṭjur deg tlemmast n udrar. Ad d-teldiḍ allen-ik, ad ak-d-iban Ugelmim Aberkan. Agelmim Aberkan, d adeg icebḥen mačči d kra. Yezga-d deg tlemmast n Teẓgi n Ukeffadu. D agelmim ameqqran yeččuren d aman, d imdewwer, ad yesɛu azal n 100 ar 150 n lmitrat seg tama ɣer tayeḍ, seg yal tama zzin-as-d yisekla zegzawen. Win ara d-yafen iman-is din i tikkelt tamenzut, ahat ad iɣil mačči deg tmurt n Lezzayer i yella, ad yenwu iman-is deg temnaḍt n l’Amazone i deg i t-yuɣ lḥal. D wid i irezzun ɣer din, i d-yeqqaren aya, d ayen ẓerren s wallen-nsen. Yetteɛǧab-asen lḥal, ttafen iman-nsen, ttḥewwisen, tekksen lxiq. Llan ula d wid yettɛummun dinna, tirebbaɛ n yilemẓiyen i d-yettawin tagella ad sewwen ama d aksum, lmergaz neɣ d ayen-nniḍen, s ufella n yirrij. Neɣ d tiwaculin d dderya-nsent i d-yettessun tiẓerbiyin ɣef lqaɛa ad steɛfun ddaw n sin n yisekla ɛlayen i yellan ɣer tama n Ugelmim, ad sriḥen abeḥri ḥlawen i d-yettarran rruḥ i turin, ddaw n tili tasemmaḍt. Ttawḍent tkeryas alamma d sdaxel n Ugelmim, ttekkent seg Udekkar, ɣas akken ur yelhi ara ubrid mliḥ, imi seg tama d idɣaɣen, seg tayeḍ d imrujen. Maca, ɣas akken, ttruḥun yimdanen s waṭas ɣer din, ladɣa seg tmurt n Leqbayel. Llan wid i d-yettasen ula seg tmanaɣt neɣ seg kra n twilayin-nniḍen n tmurt. Ula d tiwaculin, rezzunt-d akken ad kksent lxiq, acku d adeg zeddigen, d adeg icebḥen, d adeg yettuqaddren. D tamawt i nger ladɣa deg sin n yiseggasen-a ineggura, d imeyyaten n yimdanen i yettaṭṭafen iberdan-nsen ɣer din. Deg wussan n taggara n yimalas, almi qrib ur tettafeḍ ara adeg ad ak-d-isaḥ i tɣimit. Ttasen-d ula d inelmaden n yiɣerbazen d tirebbaɛ s tuddsiwin i d-ttheyyin yiɣerbazen-nsen, deg yifurguten imeqqranen, steɛfuyen din, ttmerriḥen. Ar tura mazal ur d-yelli ara usennef n Teẓgi n Ukeffadu d amraḥ aɣelnaw (Parc national), akken ara yernu wazal-is, ɣas aṭas n yisuturen i d-yettilin seg tama n waṭas n tdukliwin. Ɣas akka, d adeg ifazen di thuski, ad d-tiniḍ amzun d asuneɣ i yettwasuneɣ deg tlemmast n udrar sɣur kra n usebbaɣ ifazen. Ulac acemma n wafud i d-yellan seg tama n udabu neɣ n yimḍebbren akken ad sseḥbibren ɣef ugerruj-a, ad snernin di lqima-s. Ǧǧan-t kan akken d agujil. Ad xedmen ma ulac abrid-nni n tkeryas i yettawin seg Udekkar ɣer din (11 km), xersum akken ur d-ttmagaren ara yimdanen iɣeblan n ubrid. Ad d-nger tiɣri, daɣ, i kra n win irezzun ɣer Ugelmim Aberkan, ad t-ǧǧen zeddig. Akken yal win ara d-yasen ɣur-s, ad imenni ad yuɣal. Akken daɣen ara yeqqim d agerruj agaman seg yigerrujen d yidgan-nniḍen i tekseb tmurt n Leqbayel icebḥen. 

  Achoui Khaled  

  
 Ɣas ma aṭas n yiseggasen aya ideg tekcem tmaziɣt ɣer unnar n tira d uselmed, ur ggiten ara yidlisen n tutlayt i d-yewwin ɣef temsal n tenfalit s tutlayt-a.  Aya ɣas ma tanfalit d yiwet n taɣult yesɛan aṭas azal deg uselmed d usnerni n tutlayt imi teskanay-d amek ara yaru yiwen war tuccḍiwin, teskanay-d tawsatin yemxalafen n yiḍrisen. Deg wagur n fuṛaṛ yezrin, yeffeɣ-d ɣer teẓrigin El-Amel yellan di Tizi Wezzu yiwen n udlis s wazal-is di taɣult-agi n tenfalit tamaziɣt. Azwel n udlis-a : “Expression écrite en amazighe, ponctuation  et discours rapporté” ( Tanfalit tirewt s tmaziɣt, asenqeḍ d tullsa n yinaw ). Adlis-a i nezmer daɣen ad nɛud d awfus (manuel), d tunṭict n unadi alqayan i iga di taɣult n tenfalit d tutlayt umusnaw n tesnilest tamaziɣt Dr Mohand Mahrazi. Deg udlis-a  mass Mohand Mahrazi yewwi-d ɣef snat n temsal yerzan tira i werǧin wwin-d fell-asent uqbel yimazzagen (spécialistes) n tesnilest tamaziɣt : asenqeḍ (la ponctuation) d tullsa n wullis (le discours rapporté). Snat-agi n temsal i yesɛan azal di tira, zgan ttemlilen deg-sent iɛewwiqen wid yettarun ladɣa inelmaden n tmaziɣt, imi idlisen n tutlayt yellan ger yifassen n yiselmaden-sen neɣ i yettnuzen di tnedlisin ur d-wwin ara ɣef temsal-agi tixatarin. Deg uḥric amezwaru n udlis, mass Mahrazi yefka-d isumar (propositions) i iwala wulmen asenqeḍ di tira n tmaziɣt. Isumar-agi yessufeɣ-iten-id mbeɛd tasleḍt i yexdem i waṭas n yiḍrisen yuran s tmaziɣt. Yerna daɣen yefka-d tignatin d yimedyaten ideg ilaq ad yessemres win yettarun izumal yemxalafen n usenqeḍ. Rnu ɣef waya, mass Mahrazi yefka-d aṭas n yisumar i iwulmen tira n yisegzal (les abréviations) ama n wawalen neɣ n tayunin n usket (unités de mesure) d yizwilen (les chiffres).

 Deg uḥric wis sin n udlis, mass Mahrazi yefka-d akk tiwsatin n yinaw imawi (discours oral) yerna yessefhem-d amek i d-yettili uneqqel n yinawen yemxalafen ama d inaw usrid (discours direct), inaw arusrid (discours indirect) d yinaw yettwalsen (discours narrativisé). Rnu ɣur-s, yefka-d tabadut n yal tawsit n yinawen-a  i d-nebder, am wakken daɣen  i d-yefka imedyaten akken ad yizmir yiwen ad yessemgirred gar-asen. Deg uḥric-a anelmad neɣ win yettarun s tmaziɣt, ad yaf tifrat i wuguren i yezmer ad d-imager di tira n yinaw. Ladɣa, ad yissin iferdisen n tutlayt i yettbeddilen am wakud, tizelɣiwin, udmawen, imerna d yimeskanen mi ara ibeddel yinaw  seg tewsit ɣer tayeḍ. 

 Dr Mohand Mahrazi, d yiwen n umnadi di tesnilest d tussniwin n tmeslayt. Tura akka d aselmad deg ugezdu n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n Tubiret. Uqbel adlis-a i d-nessasen, yura aṭas n yimagraden d yidlisen-nniḍen icudden ɣer taɣult n tmaziɣt, seg-sen: Dictionnaire d’électrotechnique français/tamazight; Concepts de base en sciences du langage ; Lexique de la didactique et des sciences du langage français/tamazight et tamazight/français ; Tamazight face à son destin. 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Mokrane Chikhi

  
 Tuget n wansayen yellan deg tmetti n Leqbayel d uffiren; ahat imi ulac fell-asen tizrawin s ɣur wid teεna temsalt, neɣ ahat d ansayen yerzan tameṭṭut, d nettat kkan i tecɣeb temsalt; imi tameṭṭut taqbaylit d taḥerrazt i waṭas n wansayen. Gar wansayen-a yellan d uffiren ad d-naf adawi n uyefki ɣur wid yessendawen. Amek ttdawin ayefki yuḍnen ?

 Aṭas n yimdanen deg temnaḍt n Yismaεliyen i yecban timnaḍin n Leqbayel-nniḍen sεan tifunasin, yal yiwen acḥal yesεa, llan wiyaḍ ulac, wid yesεan semrasen ayefki-nni i tuččit ama d asewwi, neɣ d ikkil, neɣ d asendu. Mi ara yili uyefki yuḍen ulac deg-s lɣella semrasent tlawin tid yessendawen ansay-a iwakken ad d-yuɣal d aɣelli. Hata wamek yettili wansay-a.

 1-Timental n usuḍen n uyefki 

 Llan wid ur nersεi ara tafunast deg uxxam, suturen-d ayefki s ɣur wid yesεan, iwakken ad         d-t-smersen deg waṭas n yinumak n tuččit, ama d asewwi serkamen-t akked lqahwa, neɣ d tuččit akked seksu. Yal tikelt yettbeddil usemres n uyefki yettuɣal-d mačči d aɣelli.

 2-Allalen akked tarrayt semrasent i tujjya 

 Drus n lxalat i yessnen allalen-a, imi d uffiren daɣen ttruḥun seg tsuta ɣer tayeḍ, anagar tilawin terza temsalt i yessnen imɣan-a.

 Imɣan-a d imerẓagen ur d-segrayen ara aṭanen, imɣan-a d wi « amgersif, amagraman, tici n tkura, ẓaεter, timerzizwit » imɣan-a semrasent tlawin taṭiwin-nsen; ttekksent-d sa (07) n taṭiwin i yal imɣi, ma yella d imɣan-a « lbesbas n lexla, aẓar n uɣerda » sexdament anagar aẓar-nsen; acku yettriḥ, yessegray-d terẓeg s waṭas.

 Imɣan i wumi semrasent taṭiwin, ad d-ttwikksent taṭiwin ad ttwahersent, ad ẓment aman n yimɣan-nni ɣer daxel n uyefki, ttmagant lqidar n warm yiwen (21) n wussan , ma yella d iẓuran ad d-ters tuyi swacu sekfalen ɣef yiẓuran-nni, azal n yiwet n ddurt neɣ snat, ad ttwabedlen mi ara ttwiɣen, semrasent iferrawen n udafal, ttḥukkunt yis-sen taqruct (taxsayt) n usendu sberra akked sdaxel yal tikelt, mi ara tebɣu, ad tessend, dacu kkan iferrawen n udafal ttwabdalen-d yal tikelt.

 3-Acewwiq n tukksa n yimɣan : Imɣan-a ttwakkasen-d s yicewwiqen, yal imɣi yesεa acewwiq d ayla-s

 a-Amgersif: 

 Besmelleh ay amgersif

 Medden qqaren-ak amgersif

 Nekk qqareɣ-ak lqayed ssif

 Bɣiɣ iyi-d-rreḍ lɣella-w 

 Seg ugemmaḍ akkin i wasif

 b- Zaεter : 

 Besmelleh a zaεter

 Medden qqaren-ak zaεter

 Nekk qqareɣ-ak lqayed Aεmer

 Bɣiɣ iyi-d-rreḍ lɣella-w 

 S ɣur sit lεamber

 c-Magraman :

 Besmelleh ay amgraman

 Medden qqaren-ak amgraman

 Nekk qqareɣ-ak lqayed n laman

 Bɣiɣ iyi-d-rreḍ lɣella-w 

 Seg ugemmaḍ akkin i waman 

 d-Timerzizwit :

 Besmelleh a timerzizwit

 Medden qqaren-am timerzizwit

 Nekk qqareɣ-am tamdawit

 Bɣiɣ iyi-d-rreḍ lɣella-w 

 Seg ugemmaḍ akkin i temdawiyin

 Tagrayt:

 Ansay-a yettwagemr-d seg temnaḍt n At Smaεel. Yesεa azal d ameqqran deg tmetti. D allal s wacu tezmer tmeṭṭut ad d-terr lɣella ad as-yettwakksen sgar yifassen-is. Ansay-a mačči menwala ad t-yessemrasen, yettili ɣur tid yessendawen ayefki, daɣen tid yessnen imɣan akked yisefra seqdacent deg wansay-a. 

 Sɣur: Nacer-AKOUCHE  

  
 Ulama teǧǧa tamnaḍt iɛzizen ɣef wul-is anda tlul deg leɛmer n semmus n yiseggasen kan, terḥel nettat d yimawlan-is ɣer Lezzayer tamanaɣt, wanag tban-d tḥerci-ines deg unnar n tsekla asmi tekcem aɣerbaz, ula d iselmaden-is uhmen fell-as, ɛeqlen-tt d taqcict yemgerraden ɣef tiyaḍ. Tag d Kenza n Ǧerǧer i ilulen ass 10 di meɣres 1967 di Micli taddart n Σdella n At Buyusef, tin umi qqaren tura Σin n Lḥemmam. Nesqerdec yid-s aṭas n yisental ɣef waya d waya, aql-iten deg tdiwennit-a.

  Di tazwara amek yettili waddad-im akked tmedyezt ? 

 Addad-iw akked tmedyezt igerrez ma yeqqim akka, ttaruɣ di yal lawan, ɣas amedya ad iyi-d-yas usefru deg umkan anda ur zmireɣ ad t-aruɣ ceffuɣ fell-as alma t t-serseɣ ɣef tewriqt. Acku nekk asefru send ad t-aruɣ yettaru-yi netta d amezwaru, meḥsub yesseklas iman-is ɣur-i uqbel ad t-skelseɣ nekki.

  D acu d amgerrad i yellan gar Kenza n tura (tamedyazt), d tin n yiḍelli (send ad tkecmeḍ annar n tmedyezt) ? 

 Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ ulac amgerrad akkit, acku asmi bdiɣ xeddmeɣ isefra lliɣ d tamecṭuḥt aṭas, segmi d-ssneɣ akka cwiṭ kecmeɣ annar n tmedyezt, ihi Kenza ur nelli d tamedyazt tella-d deg teswiɛt n tnubi daymi d-qqareɣ ulac amgerrad. Maca amgerrad i yellan dakken zik ttaruɣ kan s teɛrabt kan imi niqal ur ufiɣ ttawil bac ad aruɣ s tutlayt-iw, wamma tura segmi d-yella umaynut ɣef tutlayt-iw tanaslit, tesɛa isekkilen n tira ttaruɣ daɣen yes-s.

  Amek i d-yeḍra unekcum-inem deg tmedyezt, d kemm i yellan tettnadiḍ-tt dɣa tufiḍ-tt, neɣ d anemgal ? 

 Seg zik nekk ssarameɣ ad ssefruɣ, maca lliɣ lawan-n ttwaceɣbeɣ s umezgun, acku yes-s i bdiɣ amecwar n tira, lliɣ ttaruɣ ticeqqufin i warrac imecṭaḥ nekk d tamecṭuḥt nezzeh, mbeɛd asmi kecmeɣ ɣer tesnawit ɛewwdeɣ abrid, uɣaleɣ ttaruɣ isefra s teɛrabt ɣef tayri acku ḥemmleɣ aṭas Niẓar Qebbani d Γada Samman. Deg uxxam yemma d setti d timedyazin di snat, uletma tameqqrant daɣen, maca isefra-nsent s tutlayt n teqbaylit cebḥen mačči d cwiṭ, yerna d acu i asen-d-yernan ccbaḥa d ssut n yemma n aḥlawan imi tettawi-ten-id d icewwiqen yes-sen i tezzuzzun atmaten-iw d yisetma di dduḥ. Aɣbal n yisefra n teqbaylit yella yugi ad iyi-yeffeɣ ɣas akken ttwasneɣ s yisefra-w akked tira-w s teεrabt iyi-yefkan azal deg ubrid n tira kan akken mecṭuḥeɣ, kecmeɣ tasdawit wwiɣ-d agerḍas-iw aseggas n 92, zewǧeɣ aseggas n 93 ḥebseɣ akk abrid n yisefra d tira seg wasmi zewǧeɣ ɣas akken ul-iw icudd kan akken ɣur-sen. Tikwal ttaruɣ s tuffra ad as-tiniḍ d tukkrḍa i d-ttakreɣ taɣawsa, sebreɣ akken ssber n tmara almi muqqer-it warraw-iw syinna friɣ-tt nekk d rray-iw, dayen ad uɣaley s abrid-iw i ḥemmleɣ imi wergin yeffeɣ ul-iw maca tikkelt-nni s ufud ijehden ataṣ acku qqleɣ ttaruɣ akken ssarameɣ asmi lliɣ mecṭuḥeɣ, s teqbaylit.

  Anta taɣawsa, neɣ asentel iɣef tessarameḍ ad tessefruḍ, lameɛna urɛad tessefriḍ fell-as ? 

 Bɣiɣ ad kkseɣ ẓẓerb ɣef kra n tɣawsiwin nniḍen werεad xedmeɣ fella-sent asefru. Tiɣawsiwin-agi mazal ttwarrzent yuɣal fell-asent umrar, yesberber uqelmun n lbeṭṭel fell-asent, d lεib di tmetti-nneɣ yezzi ɣef waṭas n temsal. Nekk ncallah ad fsiɣ kra n yimurar n lekdeb yezzin ɣef waṭas n tɣawsiwin yellan s wazal-nsent ladɣa di tudert n tmeṭṭut, nekk ad heḍreɣ fell-asent ama deg yisefra-w ama deg wungalen-iw ma yebɣa Uḥnin .

  Seg ddeqs n yisefra i turiḍ, anwa i kem-yehwan ugar, acimi daɣen ? 

 Ḥemmleɣ akk isefra-w, d acu kan ḥemmleɣ aṭas ayen i d-yusan ɣef tayri. Sεiɣ yiwen n usefru iwumi fkiɣ azwel “Acḥal», wagi ḥemmleɣ-t aṭas wissen acuɣer ?, (tettaḍsa).

 <em> Efk-aɣ-d taseddart seg-s…. </em>

 <em> Acḥal d abrid i gulleɣ </em>

 <em> Dayen ur k-id-ttaddareɣ </em>

 <em> Deg wul ad mḥuɣ tayri-k </em>

 <em> Ttafeɣ-d iman-iw ɣelḍeɣ </em>

 <em> Ass-nni ḥemqeɣ </em>

 <em> Simmal yettzad ccuq-ik </em>

 <em> Kra s i gulleɣ ḥenteɣ </em>

 <em> Gar-ayi-d d Ṛebbi ccḍeɣSsiḥnin-iyi-d lehḍur-ik </em>

  Aṭas i yeqqaren dakken tamedyezt skud tettwabnaw s tehregt ur tesɛi leɛtab, s yisem-im d tamedyazt d acu tenniḍ ɣef waya ? 

 Tamdyezt mačči d aserwet, maca ilaq yiwen ad yili d aḥeddad n wawal akken yeqqar Ayt Mengellat mačči win tufiḍ ad yughal d amedyaz, nekk mačči d menwala ara ikecmen deg-s. Nekk ɣur-i tesseɛtab nezzeh tmedyezt, tesɛa leɛtab d ameqqran iwakken ad d-tas d tin yessefraḥen ulawen, d tin ḥemmlen medden ad as-slen.

  Anwa ssenf n tmedyezt i tḥemmleḍ ad as-tesleḍ ne ad t-teɣreḍ. win n tfelsuft, n tidderwect, neɣ n uɣanib aqbur ? 

 Ttqadareɣ tamedyezt s lesnaf-is merra, maca ḥemmleɣ aṭas tin n tfelsuft imi d tinna i ḍefreɣ asmi ɣɣareɣ di tesdawit n Buzerriɛa. Ḥemmleɣ ladɣa ladɣa aɣanib aqbur, mačči kan imi t-ttaruɣ, maca ttwaliɣ-t yesbeggin-d iman-is ugar n uɣanib-a atrar i yeččuren d amcubbek.

  Amek tettwaliḍ aswir n tmedyezt tazwawt, d wamek tẓerreḍ tifaskiwin-is daɣen ? 

 Ulama nekk ur ttekkiweɣ akk deg tfaskiwin yettilin ɣef tmedyezt imi nekk ur iyi-d-iserreḥ ara lweqt ad ttekkiɣ deg-sent, maca ɛla ḥsab amek ttwaliɣ d ayen yelhan aṭas leqdic-agi i xeddmen. Rennun-d tamussni i umedyaz, ttakken azal i teqbaylit-nneɣ daɣen, ad asen-iniɣ tanemmirt d tameqqrant i wigi d-yessuddusen tifaskiwin-agi acku yeḥwaǧ-itent aṭas umedyaz. Bɣiɣ aṭas ad ttekkiɣ deg-sent, maca llan kra n yiɛewwiqen iyi-menɛen ad beddeɣ ɣef tqaɛet ad d-hedreɣ asefru, lḥasun ɣas ur ttekkiweɣ ara deg-sent, ttruḥuɣ znuzuɣ adlis-inu.

  Tessuffɣeḍ-d yakan ammud n yisefra win umi tsemmaḍ “Lbenna n Usefru», ahat tettheggiḍ-d wis sin, neɣ tesɛiḍ isenfaren nniḍen ɣer sdat ? 

 Ih! D tidet ssufɣeɣ-d aseggas-a n 2015 adlis-iw amzwaru s uzwel “Lbenna n Usefru», wagi d ammud n yisefra-inu uriɣ deg-s ɣef wacḥal d teɣawsa iceɣben temeṭṭut di tudert-is n yal ass ama deg uxxam-is ama di tmetti s umata. Yella wayen ara d-yeffɣen gar-aneɣ akka d kra n wagguren kan ma nedder ncallah wagi d ungal s teqbaylit, daɣen swejdeɣ-d kra n tmucuha d tullisin s teqbaylit daɣen ma yebɣa Uḥnin, am akken sεiɣ isefra nniḍen s teqbaylit akked teεrabt ssarameɣ ad ẓren tafat ula d nutni, akken tettwaliḍ kenza Ǧurǧura tesεa aṭas n umaynut ili-t kan di ttiεad yid-s daya.

  Tanemmirt-im a Kenza. D acu tebɣiḍ ad d-ternuḍ di taggara ? 

 Awal-iw n taggara ad ak-iniɣ tanemmirt i kečč i d-yerran lwelha-k ɣur-i, ssarameɣ lliɣ d tinebgit fessusen fell-ak. Tanemmirt i widak akk iqeddcen di tmussni, i yinaẓuren merra anda ma llan, tanemmirt d tameqqrant i wigad yettεawazen akken ad ssalin ass ɣef tmaziɣt ad kksen tagut i d-yezgan ɣef umezruy n teqbaylit. Ncalleh ccedda ad tefsus lḥeqq ad d-iban ad d-yeflali am yiṭṭij. Ad d-iniɣ daɣen dakken mačči nettaru kan bac ad nebnu kra, maca bac ad d-nefk daɣen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-tt: Mhenni Xalifi  

  
 D yiwen n yifri i d-yezgan deg taddart n Uqawej i yettuɣalen ɣer tɣiwant n Micli, wagi qqaren-as Ifri n Macchabée neɣ akken i as-qqaren Wat n taddart “Lɣar n temdint” neɣ “Ifri Meɣreb”. Yebɛed ɣef tɣiwant n Ɛin Lḥemmam s wazal n 2 yikilumitren. I wakken ad tawḍeḍ ɣer Yifri n Macchabée, iḍul abrid yerna yewɛar nezzah. Adrar anda i yella yifri-a, yuli s wazal n 1483 lmitrat , s daxel n yifri, tella tfekka n yiwen umdan i iɛeddan syagi, i yettuɣalen ɣer wacḥal n leqrun. Ar ass n wussan, ur d-llin yinadiyen akken ad ẓren d acu-tt teḥkayt n umdan-a. Aṭas n wid i d-yeqqaren d akken d yiwen umeksa i yeɣlin dinna, wiyaḍ, qqaren-d d akken d yiwen i d-yusan si tmurt n Lmerruk, ceyyɛent-id akken ad inadi ɣef ugerruj di temnadt-a, maca imi ur yessin aa iberdan, yeɣli deg yifri. Ur ẓrin ar ass-a d acu i d lbaḍna n umdan-a. Akken kan ad tkecmeḍ ɣer yeifri, ad ak-id-iqabbel ṭṭlam imi ulac win i as-ixedmen leqrar i tmerrit deg umkan-a. Daxel n Yifri, semmeḍ lḥal, akken daɣen llant « les stalagmites » akked « les stalactites » mi ara mlilent « les stalagmites » akked « les stalactites » ttefɣent-d aṭas n tugniwin amedya : tameṭṭut, agrud , d ayen ara yeǧǧen amdan ad yekcem deg yiwen umaḍal ibaɛden ɣef win i nettidir . Ma yella d ljessa n « Macchabée » ur d-yugri ara deg-s ala kra , imi ur tettwaḥader ara . Xas ulamma yewɛar ubrid yettawin ɣer dinna, imerriyen, ttasen-d si tmura yemxlafen ɣer umkan-a akken ad walin «Ifri n Macchabée ». Adrar yettak-d yiwet n tmuɣli icebḥen aṭas imi texleḍ cbaḥa n ugama d lhiba n udrar.

  S. Yamani 

  
 Di taggara n wenber neɣ di tazwara n duǧamber, azemmur ad d-yuɣal d aberkan, d lawan ad d-yebdu welqa ḍ-is. Imezdaɣ n yal taddart ad d-begsen iwakken ad d-jemɛen azemmur send ad d- ɣlin ideflawen neɣ at yečč uẓerẓur. Sbeḥ zik, ad d-ruhen digrawen ar yigran nsen.

 Yal yiwen dacu ara-yawi yid-s n ttawilat neɣ allalen ara yeseqdec I welqad, i wefras neɣ iw ɛebbi uzemmur.

 Wa ad d-yawi yid-s amextaf, wa ttagelzimt, wa ttamencart, wa d lbac, wa daɛewin, wa d ahwic……..

 Im-ara wḍen ɣer yigger, ad ferqen amahil, igad iceṭṛen ad d-allin suffela n tzemmurt, igad meqren neɣ izuranen ad d-leqḍen di lqaɛa. igad yessnen ad fersen, add-gezmen ifurkan n diri widak ur nettaréw-ara neɣ widak u yettaǧ ǧan-ara aseklu ad d-yegmu akken iwata axaṭer ttzagan-d i lhawa, i tafat akked d yitij akken ad d-awḍen ar wul useklu. ɣef lewhi n 12:30, ad d-zzin d agraw ɣef leḥcic ad ččen.yal yiwen dacu id yewwi. wa d berkukes, wa d seksu, wa d ameqful, wa ttaberbuct, wa ttiɣrifin, wa ttazart d zit…

 Deq ugama, ayen teččiḍ d aẓidan, yesɛa lbenna.

 Ticki fuken učči, add- uɣalen srid ɣer umahil, ulac asgunfu. Ad kemmlen amahil alama qrib ad d-yader yitij, imir ad d- uɣalen saxxam.win yesɛan aɣyul neɣ aserdun, ad yural dafessas ma d win u nessɛa-ra iɣersiwen, ad d- iɛebbi icekaren uzemmur ɣef tuyat-is neɣ ɣef uzagur-is. Im-ara wḍen s axxam, tidi tettcercur maca ɛeggu yettaffeg, lferḥ yettnerni im-ara walin zzit ittemcerqi am awraɣ di lemɛinṣra.

<p style="text-align: right;">Ḥemmar bussaɛd

  
 D-acu id yugran deg teẓgi nneɣ ? Yal aseggas d-annaren n teẓgi i yettruḥun kan akka « d-asfel » i timas yeččan azegzaw, aquran ! Ass-nni n sed iqubelen ass amaḍal n tiẓgi, tagi udem-is ur yessefraḥ ara deg t’murt nneɣ. Ma yella ad nebdar tama n’At Ɛebbas, anda tella tiẓgi muqren s kra n 8000 ihiktaren, izegren 3 n t’ɣiwanin, tigi d At Ṛẓin, Iɣil Ɛli akk d Buǧlil. D-acu kan, amur amuqran n teẓgi-agi yella-d deg wakal n t’ɣiwant n Iɣil Ɛli. Tiẓgi n Buni, akka i d-isem-is. Tama-agi tecbaḥ dayen kan. Ma yewwi-ken webrid ɣer teẓgi-agi, aken tezzuzen s lecbaḥa-ines. Acku ttazegzawt ṭul useggas. Attaf-em din isekla n: tayda, azimba, amadaɣ, taslent akk d-uxarrub. Ahat nettu kra n yisekla nniḍen…! Amkan-agi as-t-ini-ḍ d-ttamsunt (paradis). Llan degs iɣersiwen, am cebbirdu (écureuil), uccanen, ilfan, iḥiqelen akk d ttsekkurin, aruy, izerdliwen, isebseben, imeddiwen, etg. Iɣersiwen-agi rnan-as tahuski i teẓgi. Lhawa-ines d-edwa i yimuḍan, yagi wid yuḍnen idmaren nsen neɣ turin, am lazem (Asthme). Aṭaṣ n yimuḍan yettceyiɛ-iten-id umejjay ɣer tama-agi ɛlayen n’At Ɛebbas, acku lhawa n tiẓgi yettara-d rruḥ, yerna yeṣfa, yeččur d rwayeḥ am tin n tayda ! D-acu kan, tiẓgi-agi tečča « tiɣrit » sɣur imdanen ur nesɛi allaɣ. Buni-agi izeger-itt webrid aɣelnaw wis 106, akka ihi, llan kra n yimdanen yettɛedin s ṭunubilat nsen ttḍegiren rṣaḍ ɣer tayedwa, ssumsen-tt akkit. Nejba ɣer kra n yimḍiqen deg teẓgi,-uh tamsunt-agi- nufa aṭaṣ n yigudiyen yezzin ɣef isekla. Ayagi yeslufeḍ tiẓgi n Buni. Llan daɣen kra n yimdanen sekaren timas, ama s lebɣi-nsen neɣ ala, imi tt-ḍegiren isebsiyen icaɛlen ɣer teẓgi mara ɛeddin s ṭunubilat-nsen. Akka, i ceɛllen-t timas « tiwaɣzniwin » deg Buni. Ṛuḥ keč tura sens-iten-t ! Deg useggas n 2012, Buni truḥ attengar, imi ṭul n-unebdu d timas caɛlen-t ! Aṭaṣ n yimezdaɣ n tama-agi snaɛten-d s yiḍuḍan nsen iserdasen n taẓulli (ANP) am akka ɣurṣen « d nutni i ceɛlen timas-nni akken ad ssufɣen irebraben yefren deg tesrafin nsen »! Tura, Buni attan « testaɛfa » cwiṭ deg timas. D-acu kan, imezdaɣ n’At Ɛebbas ugaden asmi ar ad d-yaweḍ unebdu ad d t-uɣalen-t timas…!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y 

  
 Ayen i d-tesken ussan-a yezrin yiwet n tiliẓri tamarikant ɣef temsaklit (esclavage) i iḍerrun deg tmurt n Libya, yeǧǧa kra n win yettḥulfun s telsawit ad yenɛer, ad t-id-yečč wul-is seg wayen ttidiren Yiferkanen iberkanen deg yiwet n temdint n Libya .

 Imdanen-a, tikwal d arrac neɣ d tulawin s tadist, nwan zun tazwara ad rewlen seg laẓ d miḥyaf ideg mmɣen deg tmurt-nsen, wissen ahat ad afen tudert i ttargun deg Turuft (Europe), acku acemma ur asen-yeḍmin awwaḍ ɣer dinna d imudduren. Maca, deg ubrid-nsen aɣezfan n usikel deg uneẓruf, ɣlin-d deg yiwen n uẓeṭṭa n terbaɛt n yibandiyen i ten-yeṭṭfen d imeḥbas. Ugar n waya, ibandiyen-a, walan imdanen i d-ṭṭfen d lmal, ɛewwlen ad xedmen yis-sen ssuq n urbaḥ n tedrimt. Yal mi ara d-ṭṭfen yiwen, ad as-sutren idrimen i wakken ad as-serḥen, akken ur d-neqqar “ad t-senzen”, neɣ ma ulac ad as-serwun tiɣrit armi qrib yeffeɣ-it rruḥ. Ad rnun, ad ssiwlen i yimawlan-is mi ara yettɛeyyiḍ akken ad asen-d-ceyyɛen azal n yisurdiyen i d-suturen. Ulamma llan, akka tura, wid i d-yettwasellken seg waccaren n yiwaɣezniwen-a, maca aṭas n yimelsiyen (innocents) i mazal d imeḥbas ɣur-sen. « Dima d tiɣrit. Kkaten-iyi ssbeḥ deg uzal meddi, acku ur sɛiɣ idrimen ad asen-ten-fkeɣ». « Wigad-nni mačči d alsiyen ». Akka i d-snagan deg yiwet n tiliẓri tafransist sin seg wid i d-yettwasellken. Amaḍal, yettwali deg ubaxix iḍerru, maca irgazen isertanen, fernen tasusmi akken yiwen ur yettḥaz lfayda n wayeḍ. Dɣa, ɣef wawal n Lilian Thuram, amurar aqbur n terbaɛt taɣelnawt n Fransa, d tamḥeqqranit tasertant i yettwasmersen ɣef Tferka seg wacḥal-aya, i yellan deffir n wayen i d-iḍerrun di Libya. Iwala d akken turuft d tamasayt tameqqrant meskud tebɣa kan ad teqqim deg tqacuct, ur teqbil ad tebḍu tibuɣar (richesses), netta aṭas i tettawi seg umenẓaw-a (continent). Akken ad d-sbeyynen ibeddi-nsen akked yiminigen-a (les migrants), aṭas i yelḥan deg tmura n umaḍal. Yeqqim-d ad ḥerrken yisertiyen bac ad gen tilist i ccɣel-a aweḥci ur nelli akk n walsiyen. 

  M. K. 

  
 Deg yiwen n wulɣu i d-tessufeɣ tkebbanit TQ5 Media, ddan-d yisallen imaynuten i yerzan asenfar n tiliẓri taqbaylit i d-sbedden kra n Yizwawen deg tmurt n Kanada. Ayen i d-ijebbden din tazwara awellih d beddu n usenɛet n wahilen i d-ibanen ad yili ass n 12 yennayer 2018 ɣef 10:00, ɣef wakken i d-yenna wulɣu. Ugar n waya, rsent-d kra n telɣa ɣef wayen yeɛnan ladɣa tiɣin n ugensa (satellite), aheggi n wallalen n uqeddic, d usbedd n trebbuyaɛ ara yilin i lmend n uselḥu n tiliẓri-a. Imi dɣa agensa, yettwastenya dayen ugatu akked umessis-ines (fournisseur). Ula d awal ɣef wayen i d-yellan d aḥerrek n udellel i tiliẓri, yettwawi-d, gar-asen ad d-nesmekti timrawin n yisaragen i d-iga di Tmurt ussan iɛeddan umasay n teywalt deg tkebbanit-a Mass Racid At Ɛli Uqasi. Asuddes n yigalaten n ccna deg Muryal tikkelt iɛeddan d Fransa iḍelli 29 ṭuber. Rnu ɣer-s aɛeddi deg tiliẓriwin d rradyuwat yemgaraden, abeɛda di Tmurt n Fransa. 

  M. K. 

  
 Win ara yerzun ɣer Wasif n Ssumam di lwilaya n Bgayet, ad yewhem deg liḥala-s anda tewweḍ: yuɣal akk d agudu , d imerjan akked uɣebbar. Rnu iḍumman akked yizuliɣen i d-ittefɣen deg luzinat yal ass, zzin-as-d s ya u s ya.

 Asif-nni yellan zik yeṭṭefeggiḍ seg waman zeddigen, yuɣal d targa imejriwen. Rmel-nni, yettaṭṭafen aman yettṣefiten, irennun ɣer laɛwansar yellan Ddaw n tmurt ’’la nappe ’’ ineqqes seg wass ɣer wass . Ma d timental banent. Imdanen i yettdeggiren iḍumman-nsen ɣur-s akked d tkubaniyin yemxalafen, xas akken lqanun yemnaɛ anect-a. Ayen i as-yeqqimen i wassif, kemlent-tt, deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura, lewzayen yessafayen rmel akked d tkubaniyin n yimɛelmen n tmurt akked d tbarraniyin, ladɣa, tid n Cinwa yestukkelfen s lxedma n ubrid ara icudden Bgayet ɣer ubrid ameqqran yellan deg Uḥnif di Tubiret. Qqazent imdunen i wakken ad d-jemɛent rmel d udɣaɣ ara seqdacent deg lecɣalat n ubrid. Atas n yimerjan i yeqqqimen akken ur ten-rbin ara , imi nutenti iswi-nsent awi-d kan ad fakent axeddim n ubrid deg lawan, i wakken ad awin adrim. Aɣbel n twennaḍt d ayen-nniḍen. Akken qqaren di lemtel “Ečč ay aɣyul, azekka ad nruḥ”, almi yuɣal akk wasif d imdunen . Win testeqsaḍ deg yimḍebbren terza temsalt, ad ak-yini lecɣalat ad kfun s lɛajlan , awi-d kan ad ifak ubrid-agi ara iccuden Bgayet ɣer ubrid ameqqran ara iruḥen seg usamer ɣer umalu n Lezzayer. Di temnaḍt n umalu n tɣiwant n Uqbu, di tama n uzaɣar , metwal At Ɛebbas, llan yimdunen d imeqqranen, ttawḍen alamma d 5 lmitrat di telqayt. Amdan neɣ aɣersiw ara yeɣlin ɣur-sen, ad as-yewɛer i wakken ad d-isellek iman -is.

<p style="text-align: right;">   B Benhamouche  

  
 Gar iḥricen n tira mačči d izli n udmawen i yellan. Udmawen-agi ur ɛdilen-ara, yal wa aɣanib-is, ilugan –is , iswi-s akked imeɣṛiyen-is. Di tasekla s-umata( tamedyazt, amezgun, tullizin, ungalen) lebni n tira ibedd ɣef ccbaḥa n wawal, tugniwin , aḥiḥa n timenna. Lɣerḍ n umyaru ad yessiweḍ tikta-s s yiwen n tawil ara yeṭṭfen lbal ɣer-s akken win yeqqaren ad yekcem lɣerza n uḍṛis ur as iberru alamma yessaweḍ ɣer taggara-s. Maca tira deg aɣmisen temxallef, acku iswi amezwaru n umagrad aɣemsan ( article journalistique) d-asiweḍ n-isalen s tutlayt timserreḥt ara yegzu yal yiwen. Llsas n tira deg aɣmisen ibedd ɣef tlata n tuttriwin: “acu , anda , melmi” . D tlata n tuttriwin agi id telqa yessawaḍen aḍṛis ad ihatec deg timsal iḍeṛṛun di ddunit akken asali ad yemmeɣ ɣef medden, nnig waya ad fehmen ssebba-s d wayen yak id iccuden ɣer-s.Yal tameslayt tesɛa ilugan-is n tira, ɣef aya ur yeɛdil ara ad yaru umdan amagrad s teqbaylit am akken ara t –yaru s tutlayt-nniḍen acku yal tutlayt d amek tettɛebbi tidmi. Akken ad yaru umdan akken ilaq s teqbaylit ilaq ad yesɛu tidmi teqbaylit. Ma yella txuṣ tidmi-agi s teqbaylit lebni n wawal ad yuɣal dayen nniḍen, d-asxetrem ur nettwafhem. Ahat d wagi id ugur id tt-maggeren tuget n imesjarnan yettarun s teqbaylit ama deg “aɣmis n imaziɣen” neɣ deg aɣmis “tiɣremt”. Ɣef aya tuget n imeɣṛiyen ttlummun fell-aɣ tucdiwin deg lebni n wawal, n yifyar. Tikwal qqaren-aɣ-id aḍṛis ur yettwefhem-ara, ur iban ara lmeqsud yebɣa bab-is. Ahat aya yekka-d deg akken taqqa n ineɣmasen ur waɛan ara akken ilaq ad zdin tidmi s teqbaylit ɣer tira s teqbaylit. Ɣef aya nettaf amur ameqqran seg-sen ttxemmimen s trumit ttaren ɣer teqbaylit, din dɣa i ttemdarkalen ɣef ugur imi awal n teqbaylit yettɛebbi ṛuḥ n teqbaylit d aya-gi kan. Deg anect-a ur yelli id nesnulfa d amaynut imi akka yak i yella lḥal ɣer yal tameslayt( i yebɣun tili) awalen-is llan akken ad refden lɣerza n tidmi n imawlan-is. D-aya ahat a ara d yawin asteqsi amezwaru: amek ara d njab abrid ɣer tira tuɣmist mebla ma nḥur tameslayt n teqbaylit ɣef tidmi tajentaḍt?Lɛib ur yelli ara deg tmeslayt imi teqbaylit tezmer ad tini ayen id aɣ yehwanmebla ma nesexreb azeṭṭa-s( ungalen , tamedyazt tamirant, id tteffɣen taggara-agi d ttbut ɣef aya). Lexṣas yella deg imesjarnanen s timmad-nsen ur nessin ara ad snesren iman-nsen si rrebg n tutlayin nniḍen yal mi ara ddmen imru akken ad arun s teqbaylit.Uguren nniḍen id yettmagger uneɣmas( journaliste) s teqbaylit d amek ara yanni awalen yecqan tameddurt tatrart. Amawal n teqbaylit d aẓawali deg anect-a… xas ulamma amawal yexdem Mouloud Mammeri d akufi deg id nettawi ayen neḥwaj d irem( terme) akken a neddu d wakud deg nella. Tamara terra akken a nesxdem awalen-agi imaynuten( neologismes) acku awal n tineɣmest yerza akud atrar… maca tikwal asṭuqet deg awalen-agi ineqq lbenna n tutlalyt , yettarra-tt d ajenṭadt ɣef wid i tt-yeqqaren. Ahat yif-it lemmer s leḥder kan ara n ttleqqim tameslayt taqbaylit s wawalen agi imaynuten. Ahat yif-it a smenyaf n wawalen iqburen n teqbaylit izemren ad awin anamek atrar ɣef awalen-agi id nessukkus deg imawalen id yettlalen. Askasi yuklal a t-id negger s annar akken ad nezzi s tilist ɣef tunḍiwin yettilin, yesseɛraqen lewhi i tutlayt. Aṭas n wid yettarun smenyafen ad sxedmen awalen-agi imaynuten xas lḥawj ur yelli… kra n imeɣṛiyen ttlummun fell-aɣ qqaren-d :  » ur nefhim-ara ( d amedya) ayen kra seg wid yettarun sexdamen awal n “ azwaw “ deg abdil n wawal “ aqbayli”? » …dayen-nni ahat i yeserwalen imeɣṛiyen ɣef iɣmisen s teqbaylit acku ineɣmasen tt-nadin tezdeg ( pureté ) n tutlayt ɣef rẓana( efficacité) n wawal… Deg ayen iccudden ɣer iɣeblan n tira tuɣmist s teqbaylit , asqamu unig n timuzɣa ( HCA) yessewwjed yiwet n timlilit s ddemma deg Beni Houa deg lwilaya n Chlef seg umenzu alamma d 5 septembre. S wacu ara d teglu timlilit-agi ḥedd ur yegzi.. maca xas akka d tikti n lɛali, tuttriwin ad grint ɛalqen’t: ayen deg Lwilya n Chlef ara d yilli ugraw-agi? Anda akka tella tneɣmast s tmaziɣt deg tamnaḍt-nni? Ayen anzalen( affiches ) id swejden s ddemma uran s yal tutlayt( taɛrabt, tafṛansist) bexlaf tamaziɣt? Ahat ad ilin kra ara s yinin tamawin-agi ( les remarques) ur sɛin-t ara azal, awid kan ad yili leqdic-agi , xuḍi win ur nezwar( s lxiṛ /lehṣen) deg iman-is( tameslayt-is) ad yettu ulaqrar iman-is( tutlayt-is).

 Tizi wezzu yal aseggas d nettat i d amezwarut deg yigemmaḍ n uswir amenzu ,aswir alemmas d lbak ,iwakken ad snemren iselmaden ɣef tebɣest –nsen d laξtab –nsen , ass-nni tettun akk iselmaden Mass anemhal ama d win yezrin Mass Xaldi , neɣ win yellan tura Mass Belqaḍi d widak i yettawin arazen ,limer ur tt-ttawin ara d imezwura dagi d acettem d tyida deg yiselmaden ma rebḥen ur ten-id –yettawi umeddaḥ deg teqsiṭ, simmal ɣer deffir aselmad zik d tidet aselmad ila azal d ameqqran ma d tura win tufiḍ ad t-yerkeḍ seg tama d anemhal,seg tama niḍen d amaṣwaḍ , deg tama d imawalan n warrac ,yettwaḥres seg yal tama , ma tξaṭleḍ nefṣ n tamert anemhal ad k-id iqabel ɣer tewwurt, ma yusa-d umaṣwaḍ n tanga d asmencar ad k-yerr ur d-tξaddaḍ ara akk seg tseddawit , d netta i d amussnaw yerna ad ak-yesneḥcam wa ad ẓren akk wiyaḍ , ma d imawlan tura ttaken azref i warraw-nsen ,akka ad –as-qqaren aselmad yettaɣ kada wakada ,ur walan ara akk wigi i t-iqurξen ,abeξda iselmaden imaynuten ad yili n Micli ad t-aznen ad yeselmed deg Draξ Lmizan neɣ tirmitin , dɣa timezduɣin !! ad ɣelqen yixxamen n yiselmaden ,n yinemhalen iqburen wala ad d-arren tisura ad zedɣen imaynuten-agi, llan kra ffɣen ɣer Fransa d warraw-nsen ad ğğen akken ixxamen ɣelqen , win iwumi t-cetkaḍ ad ak-yini mačči d nekk ula d (cnapeste) ur zmiren ara ad d-frun taluft yecban tagi , amedya deg tesnawit n Stambuli llant tullas d tilmeẓyin gganent dinna , ta tusa-d seg Berğ Mnayel txeddem deg tesnawit n Mξatqa, tiyaḍ n uẓeffun yiwet tesselmad deg Beni Zmenzer tayeḍ deg Tizi, llant sut Micli d yiξeṭṭafen , d tebğawiyin akken ad as-neqqaren ad teffɣemt akken ad zedɣen imaṣwaḍen , nutni d ixeddamen n ttrebga ma d tiselmadin agi ttwaḥeqqrent aṭas , anida-t uzref n tmeṭṭut dagi , uqbel azref n tselmadt,amedya niḍen deg Rğawna axxam yeɣleq taselmadt n teglizit d -yettasen yal ass seg Tigzirt neɣ tayeḍ d-yettsen seg Micli d taselmadt n tmaziɣt , sutrent axxam-nni maca yiwen ur d-yesli, arran iman-nsen ξaẓgen , ma deg wat yanni yusa-d unemhal amaynut , yufa-d tiselmadin deg semmus yid-sent ukkuz n wat wasif tayeḍ n uqbil d yibudraren iξedda yesuffeɣ-itent yerna d tilmeẓyin akken ad yezdeɣ netta akked twacult-is anida-ten yiqbayliyin n zik ?? d –yettawin azref-nsen, neğğa aξrab ad yettewiq fell-aneɣ deg tlemmast n tqaξet n uxxam yiwen ur yezmir ad d-yenṭeq ,ɣer taggara d aselmad i yenṭaren s waṭas deg Tizi wezzu ? yettwaḥqar , ttwaḥeqqrent tilawin ur swint tibṣelt yerkan ,anect-a akk d aḥkim ur nesξi aḥkim i aɣ-ixedmen akka,ilaq anect-a ad tzer Massa Nuriya Ben ɣebriṭ mačči d taggara n useggas kan ara terğu , ad tẓer tamḥeqqranit n wigi d-yeseɣlin fell-aneɣ ddel , yerna mazal ad d-alsaɣ nesξa irgazen d wigi kan ara yekksen ṭṭlam-agi d-yeɣlin ɣef yiselmaden d tselmadin, ad as-neffken izerfan-nsen . 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Zakia Yahia 

  
 Seg useggas n 2007 i yettwajerred usenfar-is, maca kra n tlufa n syinna ed sey-a gant amek ara yili usnulfu n uɛeṭṭel, n uḥbas seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ, almi ttɛeddayen yiseggasen ttawin kan yid-sen asirem iɛelleq n yibabaten n warrac, n yinelmaden, ed yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel akken ma llan. Maca taggara-ya yekker uneɣmis i yesferḥen akk tuddar n tɣiwant, i d-yeqqar dakken iqeddicen n tesnawit-a tamaynut atan ɣas ini kfan, yettusemma thegga akken ad tesnubget inelmaden n kraḍ n yiswiren n tesnawit (aseggas amenzu, wis sin ed wis kraḍ) i tuɣalin n tɣuri i d-iteddun deg ctember-a n sdat-neɣ ara d-yawḍen seld imuras n unebdu. Dɣa, ɣef yisallen i aɣ-d-ileḥqen taggara-ya, ttwaceyyɛen-d yakan ddeqs n dduzan swayes ara yettwaldi uɣerbaz-a amaynut i useggas aɣerbazan 2015/2016, am ṭṭwabel, ikursiyen akked wallalen nniḍen i yessefken i teldayt tunsibt n tesnawit-a. Ad d-nesmekti dakken aṭas i yuzzlen d awal yeḥman tikkelt iɛeddan gar yimeɣnasen n yikabaren imḥaddiyen asmi i d-terza tneɣlaft n usegmi massa Nuriya Benɣebrit ɣer Bgayet ed Suq Letnin larebɛa aneggaru n mayu yezrin maca ur d-tewwiḍ ɣer Ayt Smaɛel akken yella yetturaǧu, yuɣ lḥal, sɣur yimḍebbren n tɣiwant. Ula d kra n yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel aṭas i mesteqsan ɣef sebba tidettit i yeǧǧan taneɣlaft-a n usegmi ur d-tusi ɣer Ayt Smaɛel akken ad tɛeyyen s wudem unsib taldayt n tesnawit-a i ctember i d-iteddan. Daymi tuɣal taluft-nni ussan-nni d asentel n kra n win i imalen i uḥric-a n tɣuri deg taddart. Ilaq ad d-nerr awellih dakken annect iḍul usenfar-a n tesnawit d ayen ur dman yiɣermanen n tɣiwant, almi i d-yesnulfa kra n yiɣilifen deg wagnes n wid akk terza taluft. Yuɣ lḥal, ula d inelmaden ilemẓiyen sɛeddan iḥeyyaren seg ddiq n tesnawit taqburt Maɛuc  Idris, almi ihi i d-ufan meqqar tamentilt (sebba) i usnulfu n wuguren wiyaḍ s tiganin (grèves) idumen, i ten-iḍurren ur ẓrin. « Mačči d ayen ur nennum taluft-a n uɛeṭṭel n lecɣal. Maca tura mi thegga tesnawit-a-nneɣ, nessaram kan ad yili qabel d aseggas war uguren i warrac-nneɣ ». Aya yenna-aɣ-t-id yiwen n ubabat seg  Ayt Smaɛel. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Abernus γlayet lqima-s, imi yeṣṣar argaz tameṭṭut, isbur iwargaz tirugza, tecbarbar teslit-yes yerra-yas-d lḥerma, γef annect-a is-qarren at-zikk talaba n sser. Rreḥba tis snat n tfaska n ubernus s usentel » Abernus Iseγ d Trugza », id-sudes tiddukla tadelsant Yakoubi Ferhat n taddert n Ḥura taγiwant n Wizgan s lemεawna n tesqamut n taddert-agi, Tidddukla n tmetti ASSA, tamahla n yedles n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, asqamu aγarfan n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu d tγiwant n Wizgan, d tin id-yellan s wudem unsib ass n 11 almi d 13 yunyu ideg nella, d leqdic i yeddan γef teγzi n 03 n wussan, anda ijarden yiwen n wahil d amesbaγur, ideg llant temzikniyin γemgaraden γef ubernus d wamek id-yettili uẓeṭṭa-ines, taqendurt n leqbayel, tallaγt, iẓeḍwan, taklut, Tiḥudeda, allalen iqburen, asenεet n zwağ aqbur, ccna n tmedyazt n tlawin, uraren, taγuri n tmedyazdt, amezgun d waṭas niḍen. Timzizelt γef wexxam leqbayel aqbur. Akken itella d tagnitt yelhan i wid iḥemlen taγuri d tẓuri, imi llan yemyura, imedyazen, imazragen i yellan deg tfaska-agi zenzen idlisen-nsen s ibuddan. Leqdic d win γezzifen imi id-llan isaragen yemgaraden γef umezruy n ubarnus d wazal yesεa di tmetti n wass-a d temnaḍt n leqbayel sumata. Nnig n 25 n yimzikniyen id-yussan si temnaḍin yemgaraden n tmurt leqbayel, ukkan deg leqdic-agi, akken id-tella tmaγra-agi ubernus s leḥdur n deqs n yinebgawen ger-asen; aεeggal n wegraw n luma mass Mussa Tamadartaza, iεeggalen n wesqamu aγarfan n ugarzu n Tizi-wezzu, timahliwen yemgaraden ama, n texamt n lḥirfat tiqburin, timarit, idles, addal d yelmeẓyen, aselway n dayra n Wizgan, iselwayen n tγiwanin yemgaraden n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu d yemḍebren n yeḥricen yemgaraden. Akken id-ussan deqs n yinebgawen niḍen si yal tamnaḍt n tmurt leqbayel, imi iswi n tfaska-agi ubernus, akken ad-rren azal i ubernus n sser d lḥerma, imi abernus d azamul u d tigemmi n leqbayel, u d tagnit yelhan i usebγes uẓeṭṭa ubernus akken ad-yeqqim i lebda. Tameγra ubarnus di tezrigt-is tis snat, tekkfa s yiwet n tmeγra meqren, u leqdic iεedda di tegnatin yelhan aṭas.<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> I.B 

  
 Aẓru d win yesεan amezruy meqren di tmurt n leqbayel, u dwin iwmi fkan azal imezdaγ-is, imi ixxamen n sser d lḥerma ttwabnan s weẓru , s yiwen n lqaleb, d ayen id-yernan cbaḥa meqren i tudrin leqbayel. Lḥirfa n wid yettruẓun aẓru di temnaḍt n leqbayel, ur telli-ara n wass-a, telḥad di seggasen, maca tura tenqes lxedma-agi s waṭas, sebba n laεtab meqqren id-ttmagaren deg-s itarasen, imi zik ttruẓun aẓru s wefḍis d tuẓẓal, dayagi id allalen yellan, rnu aṭas n yemdanen yettruẓun aẓru wexṛen i lḥirfa-agi sebba n waṭan meqqren id-taṭṭafen deg-s, wagi d aṭṭan n yedmaren (la silicose), d aṭṭan i yesrewten acḥal d amdan. Γas akken tawilat n lxedma d wallalen gten tura, am tmacinin, rnu ttawilat i saxdamen i uḥareb γef tezmert-nsen, maca aṭas i irewlen γef lxedma-agi tamentilt yemdanen ur nesaxdam-ara aẓru di lebni, imi yuεar rnu γlay aṭas di ssuma. Macca, ass-a deqs n yemdanen i yesaramen ad-bnun s weẓru, imi yesεa cbaḥa d sser swayes ijebbed tamuγli. Dayen i yeğğan deqs n yemdanen n lwilayat yemgaraden n tmurt n Lzzayer, am Lzzayer tamanaγt, Blida, Tipaza, Wahran, tteqsaden-d timnaḍin-agi n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu ger-asent Wizgan, Ifiγa, Iεeẓẓugen, ttaγen aẓru inejren. Si tama niḍen aṭas n yemdanen i yesḥasfen γef wid yettruẓẓun aẓru, imi xelqen-d ugguren meqqren i twenaḍt, am wesyax d wayen niḍen, dayen iyeğğan imsebriden ttkukrun aṭas i uεeddi xarṣum s ṭumubilat, amedya deg webrid n lwilaya uṭun wis 251 i icuden ger snat n tγiwanin, Wizgan akked Yiεeẓẓugen, anda iẓra γellin-d s waṭas, isyaxen sebba n yemdanen yettruẓun mebla tesriḥ, berra lqanun. Akka wa maεdur wa d lḥeq-is, llan yemdanen id-yessasayen amεic-nsen s truẓi n weẓru, acu kkan yewwi-d lḥal akken ad-ḥadren γef tezmert-nsen xarṣum aṭas n yedmaren. Γer tagara akken yeqqar yenzi « Aḥezzeb yugar leqḍaε », yewwi-d lḥal γef yemdanen yettruẓun aẓru, akken ad-harben ama γef tezmert-nsen akken id-yewwi lḥal ad-ḥarben γef twenaḍt d wayen id as-d-yezzin.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 D tikelt tamezwarut i d-mlalen yimezdaɣ , mmeslayen d imejjayen ɣef lehkak i ten-iḥuzan. Bedden yimjayen ɣur-sen akken ilaq, fkan-d di lweqt-nsen, gar-asen Mass Aḥsen Rekis ɣas akken yedda di laɛmar 80 n yiseggasen maca yusa-d.

 Taggara n ddurt yezrin, Tidukla Summam n Uqbu, iqeddcen i lemɛawna n yimuḍan akked wid yenxassen di temnadt n Uqbu, rzan ɣer taddart n Riki , mlalen d imezdaɣ akked yimuḍan. Yella-d uɛeyyer n lehlak yemxalafen, yecban aṭṭan n ssker neɣ n yidmaren, deg uɣerbaz amenzu. Ayen i d-jebden lwelha-nneɣ d tirza n watas n yimdanen ɣer yimejjayen-agi , i wakken ad d-awin ɣef zik lḥal ttbut ɣef liḥala n tezmert –nsen , ma yella ulac kra n waṭṭan uffir i ten-ikecmen . Di temlilit-agi, atas n yimejjayen i d-yeddan , ama d wid n wul , wid n yiɣsan , wid n wallen akked wid n tnefsit. D tikelt tamezwarut i d-mlalen yimezdaɣ , mmeslayen d imejjayen ɣef lehkak i ten-iḥuzan. Bedden yimjayen ɣur-sen akken ilaq, fkan-d di lweqt-nsen, gar-asen Mass Aḥsen Rekis ɣas akken yedda di laɛmar 80 n yiseggasen maca yusa-d. Yal amuḍin, fkan-as lweqt i t-wulmen, semḥessen–asen akken iwata. Imezdaɣ, si tama-nsen, cerḥen, ferḥen . ‘’ Iswi-nneɣ d aqerreb usejji n yimuḍan di tamiwin ibaɛden , atas n yimeɣban ur nezmir ara ad ruḥen ɣer temdinin i wakken ad dawin , teksasen-tt tezmert, neɣ ulac allalen , nekni d lwajeb fell-aɣ ad nerzu ɣur-sen’’, i d-yenna Nourdine Oulladj, s yisem-is d amaray amatu n Tidukla Summam. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> B. Benhamouche  

<div> 
  
 Ass n sem d wass n sed 26 d 27 deg furar tidukkla tadelsant n wat yanni talwit erran -as tajmilt i Dda lmulut At Mɛemmer , d yiwen n umedyaz amaziɣ ilul ass n 28 deg duğember deg taddart n Tewrirt Mimun deg wat yanni , d netta id-inejren abrid i wakken tutlayt n tmaziɣt ad tteɣren deg tmurt n Lzzayer ,s umata , seg wasmi tuwi tmurt-nneɣ timunent deg useggas n 1962 i yebda yesɣar-itt deg tseddawit acu kan imir mazal ur faqen ara yimdanen , ttasen-d kra n yisdawanen drus yid-sen akken ad asen-tt-yeselmed, maca imdebber n tseddawit –nni yenna-as a mass ayagi ara txeddmeḍ berra n lqanun imi ulac tultlayt –agi deg wahil n tseddawit , ur tesɛiḍ ara kra n lkaɣeḍ dɣa yura-as tabrat dda lmulud i lewzir deg-s yessuter ad as-d-yeqbel aselmed –agi n tmaziɣt s wudem unṣib maca 11 n yiseggasen am wakken yenna Mɛemmri ur as-id-yerri ɣef usuter-is , ɣas akken ikemmel amecwar-is ur yeqḍiɛ ara layas , yuɣal aṭas i ifaqen belli Mulud Mɛemmri yeselmad tamaziɣt u ira ad tekcem ɣer tseddawit,ixeddem isaragen akken ad d-yessaki leqbayel ad ɣren tamaziɣt, d netta i yuran tajerrumt n tmaziɣt , limer mačči d netta yili ur ttafen ara yiselmaden s wacu ara slemden tamaziɣt s umennuɣ n leqbayel ɣef tmaziɣt yeğğan ad azlen idamen wa ad ruḥen d asfel yilmeẓyen d telmeẓyin tuɣal tekcem ɣer tseddawit akken ad tuɣal tura d tunṣibt.Limer mačči d netta yili mazal-aɣ ddaw uḍar n ucengu , yunag ɣer tmura n berra akken ad d-yaru idlisen iswi-ines d asnerni n yidles n tmaziɣt imi d agerruj ur nkeffu , dda Lmulud ulac win ur tnessin ara yettwasen ama deg tmurt-nneɣ ama deg tmurt n lberrani ; aṭas i iḍefren abrid d-yuwi kksen akk akukru ufan-d tutlayt -nneɣ am wakken d terbibt ziɣ win d-yennan nekk d amaziɣ ass-a ad tafeḍ azekka –nni yeɣli ad ak-inin d abaxix it-yenɣan,am wakken yeɣli dda Lmulud d asfel ɣef tutlayt-is deg ubrid-is deg ɛin defla i as-nnan berka , ass n 26 deg furar 1989 , yettwamḍel deg taddart-is ass n 28 deg furar 1989, akken id-yenna Ayt Mengellat : «mi ara leḥḥuɣ ɣer At yanni ass n tenṭelt-is ur umineɣ ara ɣer tenṭelt n dda L mulud ara ttedduɣ», yennɣel-d weclim ɣef taddart-is imi mačči ala leqbayel id-yusan , ussan-d seg yal tama, am wakken d-tenna tdukkli agi talwit : dda Lmulud yuklal ugar n waya ,nettara-as tajmilt yal aseggas maca ayen nexdem fell-as drus mačči d menwala, yerna akken qarriḥet lmut-is i meqqer yiseɣ-is , ad t-yerḥem Rebbi , nessaram ad neddu deg ubrid-is , kra n yidlisen yura dda lmulud : tawrirt yettwattun (coline oubliée) 1952, le sommeil du juste 1955, l’opium et le Baton 1965, le Banquet 1973, tajerrumt n tmaziɣt 1975, le traversée 1982, le foehen 1982, l’ahellil du Gourara 1984, précis de grammaire berbere 1987, yenna-as Ccix Muḥend 1990, akka dda Lmulud ɣas Yeğğa-aɣ , yeğğa-aɣ-d, ɣas ulac-it yella. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Zakia yahia 

  
 Deg ussan-agi yezrin, i d-yeffeɣ wammud amezwaru n tmarut d tmedyazt tilemẓit Kattia Galou iwumi tefka azwel “ Tirga n usirem ”. Yeffeɣ-d udlis-agi n 18 n yisefra s teqbaylit, ɣer tezrigin Richa Elsam n Tizi Uzzu. Tudder-d deg-s aṭas n yisental yecban: tasertit, tayri, imawlan, tagmat, nnif, ddunit…atg. Ad nesmekti kan belli, d wagi i d adlis amezwaru neɣ d asurif amezwaru deg ubrid n tira i d-tenğer tlemẓit-agi n 25 n yiseggasen, i d- tefka temnaḍt n Ath Melikche, di Bgayet. Ulamma d taselmadt n teglizit deg tesdawit n Abderrhmane mira di Bgayet, maca teṭṭef di teqbaylt-is d lasel-is, d ayen itt-yeğğan ad taru s tmaziɣt. Tebda tira n yisefra deg useggas n 2008, asemi tesεa 17 n yiseggasen deg lεmer-is, ussan-nni tella teqqar deg tesnawit “Mohamed Boudiaf, seg ass-nni ara ass-a mazal-it tsefruy. Tanemmirt i tmeskart. Taɣuri igerrzen i yimeɣriyen!

<p style="text-align: right;"> A. A 

  
 Akken i d-teḍra twaɣit n ubrid i d-yellan ttlata iɛeddan deg tlemmast n temdint n Xerraṭa, anida yedhem ukamyun aẓayan ukuẓ n tlawin n yiwet n twacult, tberreḥ tenmehla n Uḥuddu Aɣarim n Bgayet s wulɣu ideg i d-tewwi ugar n yisallen ɣef tedyant. Ɣef wakken i d-uran, ssebba n usehwu-a i yeglan s 4 n terwiḥin, icudd ɣer uḥebbas yeqqersen n ukamyun-nni. Mi as-yerwel dɣa i unehhar, yufa iman-is yeẓdem ɣef ugraw n tlawin deg uneḥbus n yisakacen (bus) n Xerraṭa. Ad d-nesmekti d akken win yellan deffir ubaxix seg Sidi Ɛic, yesɛa 34 n yiseggasen. Mi yeḍra wayen i d-yeḍran, yerza dindin ɣer lkumisarya n Xerraṭa. S wakka i yewweḍ leḥsab n wid yemmuten deg yiberdan n Bgayet segmi i yekcem useggas-a n 2017, ɣer 40 n yimattanen.

 Taneɣlaft n yilmeẓyen d waddal, Tenmehla n yilmeẓyen d waddal n Tizi Uzzu, Asqamu aɣerfan n lwilya (APW) n Tizi Uzzu, s tallelt n Tfidiralit tazzayrit n ddabex ufus, agraw Anaddal Mouloud Mammeri d wiyaḍ, heggan-d tazrigt tamezwarut n temliliyin tigraɣlanin n telmeẓyin.   A. A. 

  
 “I nes ines’’, d azwel n Album ajdid n Farid MALKI ara d-yeffɣen deg ussan-agi i d-iteddun ɣer tezrigin ‘’Akbou Production’’. D tikkelt tis snat ara yessekles ucennay Farid Malki, mebɛed mi d-yessufeɣ, yakan, Album-is amezwaru iwumi yefka isem ‘’Le matérialiste’’. ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna, imeslayen d uẓawan n tezlatin-agi d imaynutin mačči d ayla-s, d wiyaḍ i as-tent-id-ixedmen. Netta, yecna-tent kan. Isental n tezlatin tezzin ɣef tayri d wayen swayes i d-tgellu. Ma d aẓawan d axfifan yekka-d seg tgemmi taqbaylit s wallalen-agi n uẓawan atraren. Farid MALKI, am netta am yinaẓuren-nniḍen, yesḥassef aṭas ɣef wanda tewweḍ liḥala n lbiɛ n yiḍebsiyen-agi n ccna imi i d-yettili le “piratage” n les CD deg Internet, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna. Ayen yessefcalen u yettruẓun afud i waṭas n yinaẓuren, ɛlaḥsab n tmuɣli-s. Am wakken yessaram ad yeg timeɣriwin deg waggur-agi n Remḍan i wakken ad d-yessifrir tizlatin-agi-ines tijdidin.

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Hocine.M 

  
 Akken ad teččar ahil n yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel deg wuḍan-a n remḍan, thegga-d Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad ahil n warmuden d ameqqran deg teɣzi n 30 n wussan. Yewwi-d uneggaru-a ɣef tmacahut, ladɣa, liḥala-s deg tmetti n wass-a. Yetturaǧu deg wussan-a i d-iteddun, ad kemmlen warmuden s yisaragen-nniḍen sɣur Mebruk Maliḥi d Mhenni Xalifi. Wayeḍ sɣur Sadeq Rebbaɛi d Nasir Ɛekkuc.
