 Seg umenzu deg yennayer 2017 armi d 14 deg furar-a ideg nella, tjerred Tmehla n Uḥuddu aɣerman (Protection Civile) n waɣir n Bgayet, azal n 3347 n tuffɣiwin i kra n wayen i d-yellan. Deg-sent ttwasiwḍen ɣer yimeḍqan n tujjya 263 n wid i tent-yuɣen, llan-d daɣen lqidar n 1730 d imuḍan. Akkin deg ubrid n tikli, ttwajerrḍen 147 n yisehwa, i d-yesseggran 156 n yimejraḥ, glan s 4 n terwiḥin. Ma seg tama n yindaren n tmes, llan-d s ujemmal 94 seg-sen, gar-asen wid yekkren deg temdint, s umḍan n 16, d wid n umkan n uxeddim s lqidar n 4. Ugar n waya, llant-d 854 n tmehlin-nniḍen yemgaraden, am usellek n wid ur nesɛi tadarit akked yimdanen imeqqranen di leɛmer. D awal ula ɣef liḥala n tegnawt imalasen iɛeddan, ideg i d-gren iman-nsen aṭas n tikkal yirgazen n usellek, akken ad sisehlen ladɣa tikli n yiḥamulen n waman deg yizenqan. Yelha ad d-nerr awellih belli segmi d-tekcem tegrest, txeddem Tmehla n Uḥuddu Aɣerman yiwet n tedwit i uḥesses n medden ɣef umihi (danger) n umunuksid n ukarbun, neɣ amenɣaw asusam, akken i as-ssawalen.    

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

<div> 
  
 Ass n sem 11 di yebrir 2015, tekfa teɣlamt tasnajyant i d-yerzan ɣer temnaḍt n At Smaεel, anda yewweḍ wuṭṭun n wid i d-yeddan ɣef yimsujjiyen azal n 1800 n yimdanen. Uṭṭun-a yugar s kraḍ n tikal ɣef tirza-nsen ɣer temnaḍt n Iɣil Aεli; anda deg Iɣil Aεli yewweḍ 600 n yimdanen.

 Taɣiwant n At Smaεel tεac ass d amerbuḥ s teɣlamt-a, anda i d-ddan deg-s aṭas n yimazzayen immuzag deg tujjya, ad d-naf deg-sen: imsujji n wallen, imsujji  n tlawin, imsujji n yigerdan, imsujji n wul, imsujji n yeɣsan…Akked yinelmaden yettafaren assileɣ asnajyan deg tesdawit n Bgayet. Iεeggalen n useqqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant qublen leqdic-a, s yiwen n lferḥ d ameqqran, ula d iεeggalen n tdukkliwin i qqedcen deg tɣiwant fkan-d afus n tallelt i leqdic-a; imi ḥsan, umnen s wazal yesεa leqdic-a deg tmetti. Tirza-ya n teɣlamt tasnajyant ɣer temnaḍt n At Smaεel ur d-telli ara, kan akka maca, llant deg-s tewtilin: lexsas n yimsujjiyen yimgaraden, lexsas n wammas asnajyan. Daɣen tettwaxtar tɣiwant n Yismaεliyen ilmendn tarakalt; imi tebεed aṭas ɣef waɣir n Bgayet s wazal n 75 km. Daɣen tebεed ɣef wammas asnajyan; ama d win yellan deg Xerraṭ, neɣ deg Umrij s wazal n 18 km. War ma nettu azal tesεa temnaḍt-a deg leqdicat yimgaraden; ama d adelsan, addalan, tawennaḍt.Taɣiwant tebded-as i leqdic-a akken ilaq; ama d ayen yerzan ammas anda gan leqdic-a, d ne$ d allalen smersen, ula d tuččit tella akken iwata lḥal. Ma d iεeggalen n tdukkliwin yellan fkan-d afus n tallelt, bedden akken iwata i yinebgiwen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Nacer-AKOUCHE 

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis yezrin, 24 deg maggu 2017, i yesbedd s wudem unsib uselway n tegduda, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, anavad amaynut.

 Asali, yefka-t-id yiwen wulɣu i d-yeffɣen seg tselwayt n Tegduda tazzayrit. Yella-d usbeddi n unabad-agi ajdid mebɛed mi d-ḍrant tifranin ass-nni n 4 deg maggu yezrin. D Mass Abdelmadjid Tebboun i yeffren uselway n tegduda d aneɣlaf amezwaru. Akka ara yili, ɣef wakken i d-teqqar tmendawt, d aqerru n unabad-agi anda i iruḥen 14 n yineɣlafen iqdimen u keccmen-d 12 n yijdiden. Gar yimaynuten i ikeccmen ɣer unabad, 4 seg-sen, kkan-d seg lwilayat n Wehran, Blida, Tlemsan akked Ɛennaba anda yella yal yiwen deg-sen d lwali ɣef temnaḍt-nni. Am wakken llan deg-sen ititknukratiyen i yesɛan tizemmar timeqqranin deg leqdic-nsen ɣef wakken ttwalin kra n yineɣmasen, yecban ineɣlafen yeṭṭfen tadawsa, tadamsa, amahil akked teywult imi wigi d wid yellan deg umahil-agi, uqbel ad uɣalen d imḍebbren deg unabad-a. Ma d udmawen mechuren i iruḥen seg unabad-agi ajdid, aṭas n teslaḍin i d-yellan ɣef sebba n waya i icedden ɣer rwaḥ-agi-nsen : yella Bouchouareb i d-yekkren, yakan, mgal Issad Rebreb, Boudiaf i iɛemden asenzi n ‘’ddwa Rahmat Rebbi’’ D Grine i tt-yettwaḥersen ɣef tlelli n umeslay…atg. Seg tama n yikubar n tsertit i yellan deg unabad-a, amur ameqqran n FLN akked RND, syin llan wid n TAJ d MPA. Seg tama-nniḍen, ad naf, yenqes umḍan n tlawin deg unabad-a ma neqren-it ɣer yiwen yellan uqbel-is.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Karim Addar, d anaẓur ameqqran deg cnna n teqbaylit tatrart. S ssut-is aḥnin i yettcebiḥ tizlatin-is, i yezzuzunen ulawen-nneɣ. D yiwen gar wid-ak yettnaḍaḥen, i wakken ccna n teqbaylit ad yaweḍ ɣer tqacuct. D yiwen n yilemẓi i d-trebba tezlit taqbaylit taqburt; imi iḥemmel aṭas tamedyazt i d-yefken afud i cnna n teqbaylit. Ilul ass n 05 maggu deg useggas n 1975, deg taddart n Uεfir, deg taɣiwant n Bujimaε deg temnaḍt n Wagennun, deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Yebda cnna asmi yesεa tẓa neɣ mraw iseggasen deg leεmer-is. Yeɣra aẓawan ɣer tiddukla n “Les Beaux Arts” n Lezzayer tamanaɣt, seg useggas n 1998 almi 2000. Iban-d ɣer unnar n tẓuri deg useggas n 2005 s uḍebsi-is (CD) amezwaru, iwumi isemma ‘’Tamedyazt’’. Ass-a, ilemẓi-agi n ukuẓ n tmerwin d yiwen (41) yiseggasen kan deg leεmer-is, ɣur-s semmus n yiḍebsiyen “CD” deg ssuq. Amezwaru d win-a n 2005 (tamedyazt), ideg llant 6 n tezlatin: Aεessas, tameɣra, awal-iw…atg Deg useggas n 2007, yerna-d aḍebsi-is wis sin, win-a iwumi iga “Fhem-iyi” d azwel, llant deg-s sa (07) n tuɣac. Ma deg useggas n 2009, yeslul-d aḍebsi-is wis kraḍ, iga-as azwel “Awi-iyi», ideg yecnna ṣa n tezlatin. Syin akkin deg useggas n 2011, yerna-d tasefift-is tis ukuẓ, iga-as isem: “Beddeɣ”. Sakkin, yeqqim ukuẓ n yiseggasen i wakken ad yernu aḍebsi-ines wis semmus (05) deg useggas n 2015, isemma-as “Ẓriɣ», iger-d deg-s 8 n tezlatin. Dɣa s uḍebsi-agi aneggaru n 2015 i swayes yettwassen aṭas, yis i d-yuwi amkan-is deg unnar n uẓawan atrar n teqbaylit. Ma d ayen yerzan isemtal iɣef yettaru tamedyazt-is neɣ i yecnnu deg tuɣac, ad d-nebder gar-asen: Tayri, Leɣreba, Lmut, Lmeḥna, Lefraq, d tmetti s umata … Tura akka ha-t-an la yettheggi aḍebsi amaynut, ara d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2017. D tajmilt i Ḥusin Ayt Ḥmed, isemma-as “Aẓekka, ajdid yessewḥac”. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken anaẓur-agi ameqqran Karim Addar, icennu tamedyazt yettaru netta s timmad-is, am akken daɣen i icennu isefra n imedyazen-nniḍen yecban: Ḥamid Mwalḥi d Urezqi Akruf. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Azekka-nni tanezzayt ilemẓi-nni ikker izwar ɣer umekkan-nni, ikcem deg uruz n useklu iffer. A tt-an tewweḍ yemma-s d tamezwarut tenna-as : ay aɛessas n umekkan-agi hdu-d mmi ad iyi-yefk i ɛemmi-s ad iliɣ d tameṭṭut-is. Netta iffer sdaxel n wuruz yenna-as-id : ṛuḥ, meqbuleḍ. Tuɣal-d yemma-s-nni s axxam teḥka-asen, ayen i aɣ-d-inna mmi iḍelli d tidet. Wwḍeɣ ɣer din ufiɣ aseklu-nni isɛa uruz, ayen i s-sutreɣ inna-yi-d meqbuleḍ. Azekka-nni daɣen truḥ weltma-s, tewweḍ tenna-as : Ay aɛessas umekkan-agi hdu-d gma ad iyi-yefk i ucrik-nneɣ. Netta iffer daxel n wuruz, yerra-as-id : ṛuḥ meqbuleḍ. Slazekka-nni d nuba n tmeṭṭut-is tewweḍ ɣer din-a tenna-as : Ay aɛessas n umekkan-agi efk-as laɛma u lekḥel i urgaz-iw akken ad xedmeɣ ayen i yi-ihwan. Am yimezwura yerra-as-id : ṛuḥ meqbuleḍ ! Kra n wussan yuɣal s axxam tenna-as yemma-s : anda i truḥeḍ a mmi ?

 -ruḥeɣ rziɣ s ameddakkel-iw ihelken, zureɣ-t-id.

 -ayen i tenniḍ a mmi ziɣen d tidet, ruḥeɣ ɣer umekkan-nni, sutreɣ-as ayen nwiɣ, yerra-yi-d inna-yi-d meqbuleḍ. Mmi-s isteɛmel ittu inna-as:

 -tettamneɣ dɣa s tigi ! Inna-as akka akken ur tt-isfaq ara. Ilemẓi-nni iqqim isussem akken yumayen irra iman-is am wakken yella kra i t-iceɣben. Ass wis teltyam tenṭaq yemma-s ɣer-s :

 -aɛni yella kra i ak-yuɣen a mmi ! ɣur-i yiwen n cɣel, wellah ar ɛewqeɣ amek ara am-d-bduɣ awal ! ini-yi-d kullec a mmi ulac d acu ara tefreḍ ɣef yemma-k ! bɣiɣ ad am-d-iniɣ awal ameɛna amek akken kan ! kfu-t-id kan a mmi akken ad ifsus wul-ik. ihi a yemma akka ara tettwaliḍ ɛemmi iḍaɛ weḥd-s ulac wi ara t-irefden d tewser ara d-iteddun, lukan ad tqubleḍ ad tesbeddem axxam di sin ulac am wakken.

 -a mmi mačči da ara ɛeddiɣ awal-ik, akken twaleḍ ilha ad xedmeɣ. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yettkemmil… 

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Ass-nni n lǧemɛa 24 deg meɣres deg-i i nella i d-tella tmeɣra tameqqrant n ucennay Ait Menguellet deg tzeqqa La coupole n temdint n Lezzayer tamaneɣt.

 Tettuhegga-d tmeɣra sɣur l’ONDA ɣef ddemma n usfugel n 50 n yiseggasen n ccna n unaẓur ameqqran aqbayli Lounis Ait Menguellet. Yebda usfugel n 50 n yiseggasen n ccna seg tzeqqa n Zenith n tmrut n Fransa ass-nni n 15 deg yennayer 2017. Yebda-tt deg Fransa imi ttiɛad n tmeɣra-agi n Fransa yeṭṭef-it acḥal-aya ɣef wakken i d-yenna deg yiwet n tdewwinit i d-yellan yid-s deg uɣmis n La dépêche de Kabylie, anda yella ula d netta d aneɣmas kra n lweqt. Ɣef wakken i d-yenna, diɣ, idrimen akk ara t-id-iṣaḥen deg tmeɣra-agi i yexdem deg La coupole, ad ten-yefk i Tiddukla «El Fedjr» yettɛawanen imuḍan n uxenzir (Cancer). Aṭas i yettraǧun ad d-yecnu ajdid deg tmeɣra-agi, acu kan ur d-yelli kra din imi ɣef wakken i iwala ‘’Tameɣra-agi d asmekti n umecwar-iw n ccna. Ihi, Ad d-cnuɣ ayen iɛeddan, mačči ayen i d-iteddun. D wagi i d ṣwab ɣer ɣur-i. Ad d-geɣ ciṭ n ugzul i wayen cniɣ, ma zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ akka. Axater, ur zmireɣ ad geɣ agzul i wayen akk cniɣ deg yiwet n teswiɛt am ta’’. Ikemmel yenna-d ucennay Ait Menguellet deg wawal-is deg tdiwennit. Akka, ihi i d-tella tmeɣra-agi tameqqrant i iga deg La coupole i yeččuren armi d ulamek. Usan-d ula seg tmura n berra, am Fransa, Beljik, Lmerruk…atg. Zyada ɣef wid i d-yerzan seg yal tama n tmurt n Lezzayer. D yiwet n teswiɛt anda nnecraḥen yimadanen akken iwata : ceḍhen, ḍsan u kksen lxiq imi ḥedren i tmaɣra tameqqrant am ta. Ladɣa wid i t-iḥemmlen u wwin-d amecwar yid-s. Segmi tebda tmeɣra, nutni d asekles n tezlatin i icennu akked ttuṭfa n ttsawir s yipurṭablen-nsen. Tettban-d tafat n wallalen-agi itiknulujiyin atraren am tcemmuɛin i ttecɛalen zik-nni deg usihar yecba wa. Yal tallit s wallalen-is, maca iswi yiwen. Ma ɣef album-is ajdid, yenna-d ad yewjed taggara n yebrir i d-iteddun. Gar yizwilen ara yilin, yefka-d azwel agejdan «Tudert-nni». Ad tili ula tayri deg album-agi imi ad yessekles snat n tezlatin daxel-is, s uzwel «Tajmilt i tayri» ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna. Ad tili diɣ tejmilt i wid akk i t-iḥemmlen, ukud i d-yewwi amecwar s uzwel ‘’Tajmilt i wigad-iw». Ad ikemmel ucennay timeɣriwin-agi ula deg berra n tmurt. tikkelt i d-iteddun ad yili deg Montréal syin ɣer temdint n Lyon…atg.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine Moula 

<div> 
  
 Deg tmeddit n wass n letnayen 23 deg waggur-nni yezrin, i d-bannen yigemmaḍ ineggura n tfaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt, deg tesfugla n taggara i d-yellan deg lwilaya n Ilizi. D Massa El-Adjla Boughedad n lwiyala n Tubiret, i d-yufraren s usefru-ines yeččuren d sser akked ccbaḥa n yimeslayen. Syin akkin, deg umḍiq wis sin, ad naf Massa Saâdia Benamara n lwilaya n Wehran, ma d amkan wis tlata yewwi-t Mass Jimmy Amazigh n Batna, deffir-s kan yella Mass Abdellah Kaïri n Tamanrasset, ma d amḍiq wis xemsa, iṣaḥ-d Mass Salah Tirichine n lwilaya n Ghardaia. Ad d-nesmekti belli tafaska-agi taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt, deg tezrigt-is tamezwarut, ihegga-tt-id Usqamu unnig n timuzɣa akked waṭas n yimsuddsen-nniḍen, yeddan ɣef teɣzi n 05 n wussan, imi tebda ass-nni lǧemɛa 20 deg tuber 2017, temdel tiwwura-s ass-nni n 24. Gan-tt d tajmilt ɣef tesmiḍent (100 n yiseggasen) n talit n uzamul n tmussni d yidles amaziɣ Mulud Mɛemmri (1917-1989). D timsizzelt yeldin akk tiwwura-s i yiḥeddaden n wawal d wat bu yiles amaziɣ, ugten yisental i d-wwin yimedyazen i d-yerzan seg rrebɛa n tɣemmar n tmurt. Llan leqbayel, icawiyen, itergiyen, imẓabiyen….atg. D isental akk i icudden ɣer tgemmi, tamagit akked yidles amaziɣ s umata.Am wakken, daɣen, i d-yella wahil adelsan d anesbaɣur i lmend n tfaska-agi, i yeddan ɣef teɣzi n semmus n wussan. Gar leqdicat idelsanen meqqren i d-yellan deg-s, ad d-nebder: Timsizzelt-agi n tmedyazt, isefra berra n temsizzelt, asikew n uselmed n tutlayt tamaziɣt deg kra n yiɣerbazen imenza n lwilaya n Illizi, timlilit n usileɣ s tmaziɣt i lfayda n yimniren n tmerrit n lwilayat Illizi akked Tamanrasset, isaragen, asarag ɣef Mulud Mɛemmri i wumi tuɣal tejmilt-agi, i lmend n wayen i d-yefka i yidles d tutlayt tamaziɣt…atg. D mass Si El Hachemi Assad, s yisem-is d amaray amatu n Usqamu unnig n timuzɣa, i d-yellan ɣef lmendad n tmeɣra n taggara, ideg i d-yenna: “Tafaska-agi taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt, tewwiḍ ɣer yiswi-ines agejdan. Imi nessaweḍ, ad nesseddukkel aɣref amaziɣ, yal wa s tantalit-is. D tagnit ideg i d-nsemlal imedyazen yettmeslayen tantaliyin akk yellan deg tmurt n Lezzayer…”.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Iwekded umaray amatu n usqamu unnig n timmuzɣ si el hachemi assad ass lexmis iɛeddan si paris d akken asqamu unnig yesewjed akk ttawilat ilaqen iwakken ad tennerni tutlayt n tmaziɣt am netta am tutlayin nniḍen ad telḥu ɣer zadt di tmurt lezzayer , assad ilmend n tyerza it -yewwin ɣer uɣerbaz agraɣlan lezzayer di paris yenna-d akken axeddim meqqren i yettrajun imawlan n warrac ad welhen arraw nsen d uḥeses n warrac akken ad lemden tamaziɣt d ufus lemɛiwna d tikci akk allalen i teḥwaǧ tutlayt n tyemmat d uselmed-is di tegnatin igerrzen di tmurt lezzayer , yenna-d daɣen lwilayat nniḍen ad illint di ttiɛad deg uselmed n tmaziɣt seg useggas ajdid id- i teddun meḥsub aseggas aɣurbiz (2016-2017) anda ara tilli deg yiɣerbazen am tbessa , tinduf , milla d usejhed- ines akken ad yili uselmed-is s tuget di fransa , am wakken id -yenna ɣef lxetyar n leqraya n tmaziɣt deg uɣarbaz azzayri ad yeqqim d ugur meqqren . imḍebar amezwaru deg usqamu yenna-d belli akka tura yettilid uxeddim s lmendad n tesqamut gar usqamu unnig n timmuzɣa akked tneɣlaft n ttrebga ɣef wayen yeɛnan aqeɛed lqanun deg uwellah aɣurbiz iwakken ad kssen lxetyar n tutlayt -a deg uɣerbaz meḥsub d almud agejdan yesefk ɣef warrac lakul ad tlemden , ayagi ad yili s uxeddim d ttawilat ilaqen , si el hachemi assad ilmend n tyerza-a it-yewwin ɣer fransa yemeslayed ɣef wahil i yettheggi usqamu unnig n timmuzɣa ad yeselmed tamaziɣt i yemdanen imeqqranen wid yebɣan ad issinen tutlayt-agi s lemɛiwna n tiddukla ( iqraa ) , ma yella ɣef tyerza it -yewwin ɣer fransa ayagi tella-d s uceyaɛ lemɛiwna n tneɣlaft ttrebga taɣenawt i yetabaɛen deg ahil uselmed n tmaziɣt di lezzayer d fransa di tkubanit uselmed d yidles n tyemmat ( Ilco-lezzayer ) d uɣerbaz agraɣlan lezzayer di paris d tikubaniyin iḍefren ɣer tneɣlaft n ttrebga , ɛlaḥsab imeslayen umaray amatu lecɣal-agi bdan seg useggas n 2014 lumur leḥun ɣer zdat di snat tkubaniyin-agi , si tama nniḍen asqamu unnig n timmuzɣa tezmar ad tesejhed aselmed n tutlayt seg unerni iselmaden n tmaziɣt d ukewen nsen ixeddem usqamu unnig . asqamu unnig n timmuzɣa ihegga-d 24 ttiɛad ukewen i lfayda iselmaden n tmaziɣt , am wakken id-yenna si el hachemi assad akken rwaḥ-is ɣer fransa ad yemlal d imusnawen neɣ wid iqedcen di tutlayt-agi iwakken ad as-jehden d tmerna n tmusniwin ilaqen deg uselmed n tmaziɣt. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas Abdelhak 

  
 Asqamu n tfaska tadelsant taγelnawt n usaru amaziγ yesudes-d Tazrigt tis 14 n tfaska n usaru amaziγ deg wexxam n yidles Mulud at Mεemmar di temdint n Tizi-Wezzu s usentel « amezruy n zik ɣef ljalt n yimal ». Leqdic yebda ass n ssebt 17 almi d 22 tuber 2015 γef teγzi n 06 n wussan. Azal n wis-23 n isura n sinima i yettekkan di temzizelt n tzemmurt n wure&amp;gamma,; s yisental yemgaraden i usebγes n yelmeẓyen ara d-yufraren. Dγa isura-agi bḍan γef 04 n yeḥricen, 06 n yisura γezzifen, 10 n yisura wezilen, 04 n ṛupurtajat akked 03 n isura yettḥariken. Akken i jarden deg ahil n tmesbanit-agi tadelsant ussan n tezrawt γef usebγes n sinima ara-d-xedmen imusnawen i ittewxeṣen deg uḥric-agi s uzwel « sinima s tamaziɣt, tagzult d yimal deg yimer n tiknulujyat n tɣamsa d uṣiweḍ » d « tiwetlin n usedder n sinima Tazzayrit ». i tama niḍen llan isakwanen n taklut, annu&amp;gamma,; taɣuri n sinima, lmanga, isenfaren n sinima d waṭas niḍen. Ad ner lwelha belli leqdic n tfaska-agi ad-yeddu di 04 n temnaḍin niḍen n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu, gar-asent; Wizgan, Larebεa nat iraten, Draε Lmizan akked Tigzirt. Tafaska -agi di Tizi-Wezzu d-akaz (Reconnaissance) n ttεebga ẓẓayen n tutlayt tamaziγt di tmurt n Lzzayer, d wayen id-tefka temnaḍt-agi n Tizi-Wezzu i yedles azzayri sumata. Tamesbanitt-agi d asnarni akk d unegmu n usaru amaziγ iwakken ad-yesεu amḍiq-is deg maḍal ger lejnas ». Leqdic n tfaska-agi d win ara yekfun ass n 22 tuber id-iteddun.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ass-nni n lğemεa iεeddan i d-teḍra yiwet n tcemlit i usizdeg n taddart n Tala Athmane. Yal aḍwar lhan-d deg-s yimezdaγ-is. Aya, yella-d mebεed mi d-yeffeγ yiwen wulγu sγur taseqqamut n taddart anda i tessuter di yal amdan i wakken ad yettekki di tcemlit-a. Zyada γef lfayda n leqdic am wa di tmetti, imḍebbren n tesqamut-a, bγiγ ad ṛessin leεwayed n yimezwura. Am wakken bγan, di&amp;gamma,; ad kkin, sya d afella, deg temsizzelt ‘’Taddart tazeddgant’’ i yettilin yal aseggas di lwilaya n Tizi Ouzou.

 Xas akken yessḥassef uqerru n taddart γef ustehzi n kra n tamawin, meεna amur ameqqran n yiḍwaren rran-d i tiγri u fγen-d sbeḥ zik γer ufras n tregwa akked yimekwan yumsen.

 Afud igerrzen i yimezdaγ n taddart-a u nessaram ad tili tcemlit-a d amedya i tudrin n leqbayel merra.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Seg zik ssran lɣaci i usnulfu. D lɛali fell-asen ma ufan kra n tɣawsa, neɣ n ttawil swayes ara xedmen i yiman-nsen abeddel. Meḥsub, amaynut ilaq ad yettili deg ddunit d tudert n umdan, ladɣa ma irennu-as-d abaɣur, yettakk-as tagnit ad yekcem deg wayen ur yekcim. Acu kan, tikwal, amaynut-nni igellu-d s temḍerrit i yiwen. Ad as-d-yawi kra s tidet, maca ad as-yawi kra-nniḍen, ad as-t-yesfeḍ seg tilin. Ma neddem-d amedya seg wayen i d-yettnulfayen, akken ad kksen ayen i d-yennernan send-is, i d-yettwawfen yella yakan, ad nefren tizeɣwa n tmeɣriwin. Aṭas-aya segmi ttwabnant, llant, heggant tzeɣwa-agi. Xilla n yimdanen i yumren yis-sent, yal mi ara asen-d-tas tegnit ttruḥun xeddmen timeɣriwin-nsen dinna. Qeddac n tmentilin i yeǧǧan lɣaci-agi ttanfen i tmeɣra deg yixxamen-nsen, ttbeddilen-tt s tzeqqa-nni. Llan smenyifen tazeqqa, acku din i yufan akk ayen bɣan; dduzan, listaɛ, iqeddacen, adeg i yelhan, i yettirriqen s ccbaḥa… Yettusemma, d amkan i iwulmen kan i tegnatin n lferḥ, ur yelli wayen ixussen deg-s. Llan ttexṭirin-tt daɣen, imi dinna ahat ur yettaf yiwen tilelli i walbaɛḍ n lɛadat i yennum yesɛa-tent, ixeddem-itent deg uxxam-is netta, neɣ deg uxxam n win i as-d-iqerben. Seg yiwet n tama d lɛali ma yemmug wannect-nni merra, yeɣli-d deg yifassen n wid i t-iḍefren, i t-yeḥwaǧen. Lameɛna seg tama nniḍen, ur d lɛali. Ma nmugel ɣer yigemmaḍ i d-ttakkent tzeɣwa-nni, ad naf d akken tekksen kra seg wansayen-nneɣ iqburen, wid i aɣ-d-ǧǧan yimezwura. «tizeɣwa n tmeɣriwin, d amaynut i yekksen ini ucbiḥ i tmeɣra tazwawt i yesɛan zik sser… Nekka-d akk i wansayen-nneɣ icebḥen s wadda, la ten-nessengar yiwen yiwen, zun neɣli-d seg yigenni, ur nesɛi la amezruy, la lasel. Nugi ad nissin ansi d-nekka am nekni am yigduden n umaḍal… D asḥissef ameqqṛan». I d-yenna Dda Mbarek seg Tizi Uzzu. Ihi, tameɣra, ma temmug deg uxxam n bab-is, ad telhu ugar s leɛwayed tiẓiḍanin am tgella n yinebgawen, ccna n tlawin s ubendayer d udebber iwatan am win n zik… Wamma tameɣra deg tzeqqa, tettwaxdam s wayen i d-yettwaḥefḍen seg tmura-nniḍen, s wayen i aɣ-yexḍan nekni s yizwawen. Amek ara yili waddad ma tkemmel akka? Sani nteddu ad newweḍ? Amek ara d-neggri azekka? Kra seg wayen niqal nekseb-it, nettabaɛ-it akkit, nesruḥ seg-s kra. Ula d ass-a, aql-aɣ nezmer ad nernu tiyita i yidles-nneɣ imi mazal-aɣ nleḥḥu deg ubrid n uɣlaḍ. Ur nessin d acu i aɣ-d-yettakken, neɣ d acu i aɣ-iteffren ayen i yeɣlayen fell-aneɣ. Daymi nessaram amer zun ad nesfaydi seg umaynut, war astehzi deg uqbur.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi 

  
  * Inelmaden ḥebsen ɣef leqraya 

 Inelmaden n taggara di tesnawit n krim belqasem di tubiert ḥebsen leqraya azal n sin wussan ( tlata d larebɛa ) sebba lexsas iselmaden deg kra n walmuden am wayen yeɛnan aselmad n tussna, imi tuɣalin ɣer iɣerbazen ktar n wayyur ar ass-a d wussan werɛad id asen-d wwin aselmad am wakken id-begnen almud-agi yettuneḥsab d almud agejdan deg ukayad n bac , ɣef waya inelmaden nejmaeɛn deg ufrag n tkubanit uggin ad kecmen ɣer tzeɣwa ssuturen seg unemhal n tesnawit iwakken ad asen- awwin aselmad yerra d win yesɛan tirmit , dayen id – yellan ula ɣur yinelmaden di tesnawit n ṣur lɣuzlan i yibeɛben azal n 35 yikilumiṭṭren ɣef unẓul n tubiret ula d nutni ḥebsen leqraya imi xusen kra n yiselmaden deg uswir wis kraḍ , dayen yeǧǧan inelmaden ad teɣli lxuf fell-asen d ushisef ɣef uɣbel .

  * Tiɣri n yimezdaɣ 

 Imezdaɣ n tiɣiwant n at raced di tubiret ssuturen seg yimḍebren n tɣiwant iwakken ad asen-xeddmen ixxamen n yilmeẓyen anda ara uraren warraw nsen am wayen yeɛnan tizeɣwa n waddal yemgaraden rnu ɣur-s annar n dabax , ɛlaḥsab imezdaɣ id -iwekden i uɣmis n yimaziɣen akken ilmeẓyen ttafen-d iman nsen ulac d acu ara xeddmen ladɣa deg ussan n ustefu , si tama nniḍen ula d ilmeẓyen begnen-d lɣid nsen nnan-d akken ulac anda ara sɛedin lweqt , ɣef waya imezdaɣ ggren tiɣri i yimḍebren n usqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant akken ad ɛejlen s tifrat n uɣbel akken ur ttruḥun ara warraw nsen deg yir iberdan .

  * Azal n 70 tnezduɣin di ttiɛad 

 Aṣenfar n tnezduɣin id -sfayed tɣiwant n at leqser acḥal ayagi ikemmel lecɣal imi yessali azal n 8 wayyuren , dayen yeǧǧan kra n yimdanen ssaramen melmi ara d-yecraq yiṭij fell-asen , ad yefru lhem iten yeṭṭafaren di tudert nsen akken ad sfayden s tnezduɣin imi aṭas ayagi sraqqaben melmi ara kemmlent tnezduɣin , wekden-d kra n yemdanen akken tinezduɣin ideg llan akka tura bɣant ad aɣlin imi d tiqdimint , ɣef waya ssuturen seg uselway n tɣiwant ad ibegen lejrida n yemdanen i d-yesfayden.

  * Belkeḍ berra n unegmu 

 Četkayen imezdaɣ n taddart n belkeḍ i yetabɛaen ɣer tɣiwant n lmesddur id -yezgan deg unẓul n lwilaya n tubiret ɣef liḥala ideg ttidiren d lexsas n wallalen tudert imi ttidiren di tegnatin qessiḥn d wuguren iten yettmagaren imi taddart- a tettwaɛzel aṭas ɣef tɣiwant , gar lexsas n wallal abrid yettawin ɣer temnaḍt-agi ur yɛedil ara yexsar yeččur d idɣaɣn , ixujḍan n waman ansi id as-tekkid yergel rnu ɣur-s lexsas n tḥuna yesnuzun isufar n lmakla , lexsas n waman ,asizdeg n temnaḍt , ɛlaḥsab imezdaɣ wekden-d akken ulac imḍebren id-yerzan ɣer taddart akken ad ẓren liḥala ideg ttidiren , ɣef waya ssuturen seg yimḍebren ad d-rren lwelha nsen ɣur-sen s yiṣenfaren n unegmu .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas Abdelhak 

  
 D tagara n uḥeggan di tmurt n Leqbayel . Asemmiḍ yettfaṛas ussan-is ineggura ɣef tɣaltin n tizi n Tizi . Yemllal wadal d uraɣ di tɣezza d yigran n tmurt n tinzert. Tafsut, tewweḍ-d imnaṛen n tzeɣwa n temdinin d tudrin. Temyagar tefsut m izeǧǧigen d tefsut n umennuɣ n ugdud. Yemyagar usfuggel n Tiririt Uzal (amager n tefsut =azenzi) , d usffuggel n tefsut n tmanyin (80) . D ansayen neɣ d aktayen, yiwen uxxam i zedɣen: zedɣen ulawen n wid-nni i yugin tudert n ddel d usmundel di teɣzi n tudert-nsen; ugin ad knun i turza n wid yettqemqimen fell-asen . Tizi uzzu, telsa talaba n sser d liser, imi yal mi ara d-taweḍ tefsut, ineggi-d yidim n yimeɣrasen-is, yuɣal d anza yesbuɣuren di tmeẓẓuɣt n warraw-is akken ur tteddun ara d ubeḥri n tatut, abeḥri n uɣuṛṛu, i d-yettasen si tmurt n tirga d yimezḥaf, si tmurt n wid yesnuzun n wid yerran tudert d awezɣi i kra n win yettnadin tudert n tezdeg. Aẓeffun d yiwet n temnaṭ ger temnaḍin n tmurt n leqbayel , tedda mebla laɛḍil, mebla akukru, mebla takkerḍa n tqejjiṛt. Tedda deg ubrid yettawin ɣer umṛaḥ n tjaddit, xas akken abrid-a, mazal ɣezzif, yeččur d ugulen. Dduṛt yezrin, tesfuggel ansay n Umager n tefsut . Dduṛt-a ,d asfuggel n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen, d asmekti n Tefsut taberkant. Neddfen-d ifeddixen n yiḥulfan n tyemmatin d yibabaten iwumi yuges wul-nsen. D tiseqquma n tudrin, d tiddukkliwin tidelsanin, d iɣerbazen, kkren am yiwen akken ad d-smektin i wayen yettujarden di tezrigin n umennuɣ aqbayli amennuɣ amaziɣ. Ceṛfa n yiger tala, At Rhuna, Iɛeggacen , Tiggnatin … tuddar-a, yal yiwet terra azal i wazal-is. Mass Racid Ayet Wakli, di taddart Iɛeggacen, yewwi-d awal ɣef tmesbaniyin n Tefsut n tmanyin, ɣef wayen yeḍran d Dda lmulud n At Mɛemmaṛ d yimesulṭa n tallit-nni, yewwi-ḍ awal ɣef yilmeẓyen i yemmuggren s yidmaren-nsen iḍan n udabu amesbaṭli d wayen yeḍran di tseddawit n Tizi. Yewwi-d awal ɣef umaɣras Kamel Amẓal, i yettwanɣan s ufus n yimezhaf d yiɛdawen n tudert. Yewwi-d awal ɣef imeɣnasen n umennuɣ akked ṛebɛa uɛecrin (24) –nni i yettukarfen deg unekraf n Barwagiya . Am wakken i d-yella wawal ɣef yimaɣrasen n Tefsut taberkan, tafsut i d-yeǧǧan aqraḥen deg wulawen n yibabaten d tyemmatin i wumi tenta tesnent di tgarjumt. Aẓeffun, di teɣzi n dduṛt-agi yezrin, yuɣal d abṛaḥ n tmaɣriwin , yexleḍ lqerḥ n usmekti n tdeyanin d lfaṛh n usfuggel n tefsut . Ass n lexmis 20 yebrir 2O17, tanmehla n yilmeẓyen d waddal, texdem yiwet n tmeɣra i lmend n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen. Azal n 400 n yiggerdan d tggerdatin n yiɣerbazen ladɣa wid n uɣerbaz Imuluden s tqqendyaṛ n leqbayel d yibeṛenyas, rnan-as tifulki i teftis n txerrubt (plage caroubier). Ccna, amezgun, tamedyazt, uraren. Yemlal ṣṣut n lemwaji d yizlan n telmeẓyin d yilmeẓyen i d-yerzan si temnaḍin-nniḍen. Akken llan, yiwen yiswi-nsen : Tiɣri n umaziɣ ad tembaɛzaq, ad teffel si yillel akin. Iles amaziɣ, ad yaweḍ yal tiɣmeṛt n takkert, tẓuri n warraw-is (Aẓeffun) , s yifyar n yimedyazen-is, s tira-s, s leqdic n yimeɣnasen-is. Aẓeffun yeɣli deg yirebbi n tefsut n umennuɣ, tafsut n tezdeg, tafsut n umennuɣ. 

  Kader Belaidi  

  
 Awras (s yisem n tẓuri) d yiwen n ucennay i ifernen ccna n cceɛbi seg temẓi-s. Yeqqim iḥemmel-it ɣas ma yeffeɣ Tamurt ideg yenǧer abrid-is, yuɣal d aɣrib fell-as. Deg tdiwennit-a, nesqerdec yid-s awal ɣef kra n temsal.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Di tazwara ini-aɣ-d d acu-t sser n leḥmala-k i ccna n cceɛbi?  

  Awaras : Azul fell-awen! Di tazwara, kkreɣ-d di Lezzayer tamanaɣt, tamnaḍt anda i d-yennulfa i d-yufrar uẓawan n cceɛbi. Dɣa anda ddiɣ, ɣer lqahwa, aseṭṭal neɣ ulamma ɣer yimdukkal-iw, selleɣ i ṣṣenf-agi n ccna sbeḥ meddi deg yiseggasen n 80-90. Mi wwḍeɣ ɣer tesnawit, bdiɣ ḥeffḍeɣ urar n umundul akked snitra s tuɣac n Meɛtub, Gerwabi, Mesɛudi, Ccix Lḥesnawi, Ezzahi akked Lɛenqa… Ttafeɣ tadfi deg ttewceyyat, astexbeṛ neɣ deg yicewwiqen i yi-iceɣben s waṭas. Wagi d ayen yeɛnan aẓawan. Seg tama-nniḍen, isefra n cceɛbi, bedden ɣef tmedyazt taquṛant, yesɛan azal meqqṛen deg tsekla s umata. Ayen i yura Sliman Ɛazem, Meɛtub, Xelwi Lwennas, Ccix Aḥesnaw d yinaẓuṛen-nniḍen d amedya n ttbut i yeqqlen d llsas n ccna aqbayli. Fiḥel ma nettu ayen i d-ǧǧan yimezwura am Muḥend u Mḥend d yimedyazen iqbuṛen i yefkan afud i tmedyazt d uẓawan aqbayli. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ ttṛebga d wazalen yellan deg yidles-agi n cceɛbi, ttafeɣ iman-iw deg-sen acku d agerruj n tigejdit.

  Amek tettwaliḍ tizlit n cceɛbi gar yiḍelli d wass-a. D wamek yezmer ad yili yimal-is?  

 Zik cceɛbi deg tmurt n Yiqbayliyen s wazal-is. Imsefliden-is, gten acku deg wakud-nni, tella nniya, leḥya, lḥeṛma, leqdeṛ, d tayri n ṣṣfa. Imdanen ɣas d iẓawaliyen, maca teṛwa tmelɣiɣt-nsen s tjaddit. Ma d tura, d akud-nniḍen. Ihi imdanen-is, bedlen akken ibeddel zzman acku kullec d idrimen. Yekcem-aɣ-d Utaram s tiliẓṛiyat d Internet. Dɣa, ilemẓiyen n tura, ṭṭafaṛen ayen yellan deg beṛṛa n tmurt taqbaylit, smenyifen ad sellen i uẓawan amaynut i yebnan ɣef ccḍeḥ d umeslay afessas neɣ amessas i wumi qqaṛen « ccna akumiṛṣi », neɣ ccna n uɣṛum i ibeɛden s waṭas ɣef ccna n tẓuṛi taḥeqqanit. Ɣas akka qesḥen wussan ɣef cceɛbi di temnaḍin-nneɣ, maca yella uɣeṛbaz n ṣṣenf-agi di Bgayet, deg Uzeffun, deg Tizi… Ula deg Tubiret ! D ayen yessefṛaḥen s waṭas. I wakken ad yeǧhid uẓawan n cceɛbi d uẓawan aqbayli s umata, yessefk ad ilin yimsizwar s waṭas, ad d-fken tabɣest i yicennayen, ladɣa wid ur nettwassen ara neɣ ilemẓiyen. Aya ilaq ad yili seg uɣerbaz amenzu alamma d tasdawit, Neɣ ula beṛṛa uɣerbaz; di yal tamnaḍt. Yessefk awanek ad yefk allalen i wannect-a, ma ulac imal n uẓawan n cceɛbi ad yekres.

  Imi aql-ik d aɣrib ɣef tmurt-ik, amek iga waddad n yicennayen deg tmura tiberraniyin. Neɣ d acu n lɛali d temḍerrit i d-ttmagaren deg ubrid n ccna?  

 Addad n yicennayen deg tmura tiberraniyin, seg yiwet n tama, igerrez imi llan wallalen i usekles ɣas ɣlayit ssuma-s. Llant daɣen tegnatin i wakken ad ttwassnen yicennayen deg umaḍal meṛṛa. Imi dinna, ttemlilin yinaẓuṛen seg yal tamurt, annect-a d ayen yettakken nnefs amaynut i uẓawan aqbayli. Si tama nniḍen, icennayen deg tmura tijenṭaḍin yewɛeṛ-asen lḥal ad d-banen acku yeǧhed umsizwer gar yiẓawanen imeɣṛadanen (universels). Tella ula d taluft n tutlayt, acku yessefk ccna ad yili s tutlayt tafṛansist neɣ s teglizit i wakken ad iɛeddi neɣ ad d-yufrar deg wakud.

  Nsell i tezlit taqbaylit ttwasseqdacent deg-s tutlayin-nniḍen am teɛrabt d tefransist. Tikwal ula d aẓawan n leǧnas yettwacnay s tutlayt tazwawt. Amek tettwaliḍ taluft-a? 

  Yella waya! Inaẓuṛen n tura ur sseqdacen ara awal. Wid n zik d imedyazen i yernan aẓawan i wakken ad t-sselsen i tmedyazt ad as-ḥessen madden. Ma d ayen yeɛnan aẓawan n leǧnas, yettwacnan s tutlayt tazwawt, mačči d aɣbel ameqqṛan ma yella inaẓuṛen ad as-nnḍen initen d leɛqaqeṛ n teqbaylit. Maca d acu d abrid? Akken i t-ttwaliɣ d aseqdec n uẓawan-nneɣ aḥeqqani. Amedya: icewwiqen n zik, cceɛbi, afulklur… Ad as-d-nger cwiṭ n uẓawan atrar amek yexdem Meɛtub Lwennas deg tesfift « A tarwa n lḥif », yefka-as ṛṛuḥ aklasiki i teqbaylit. Neɣ akken yexdem Kamel Mesɛudi d Xelwi Lwennas i cceɛbi, mi as-fkan ini n Flamenco… Tedduḍ akkin!

  Ad d-nuɣal ɣer usufeɣ n yidlisen i d-tettheggiḍ, d uḍebsi wis sin i d-iteddun. Mmeslay-aɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef yisenfaren-a imaynuten…  

 Idlisen i d-ttheggiɣ d idlisen n yisefra. 5 i yellan tasaɛet-agi. Yal adlis yettawi 100 n yisefra. Deg yiwen seg yidlisen-nni ad d-sedduɣ kra n yisefra n Dadda neɣ ɛemmi yemmuten deg ṭṭṛad wis sin. Dadda yellan d amedyaz n Wat Yanni, d amjahed, d amḥaddi n teqbaylit. S tikli-a ad as-rreɣ tajmilt iwulmen. Llant diɣen tullisin akked tsuqilin n kra n yiḍṛisen d yisefra ibeṛṛaniyen. Am Alain, Nietzsche, Maupassant, Rimbaud… Aya deg uḥric n tsekla s umata. Ma deg uḥric n ccna, aḍebsi wis sin i d-ttheggiɣ d taseddaṛt-nniḍen. Llant deg-s tɣawsiwin timaynutin. Amedya: Byt u syaḥ, neɣ tizlit ɣezzifen umi qqaṛen « Leqṣid » i uriɣ acḥal-aya ɣef tayri d yiɣeblan-is deg tmurt. Deg-s llan 4 n yicewwiqen, aẓawan yettbeddil yal tikkelt. Amedya n ccɣel-agi ad t-id naf deg: Lmeknassiya deg cceɛbi s teɛṛabt. Azwel-ines: « Tayri n temẓi ». Tella daɣen ttewceyya d unesraf-nniḍen akken i ten-yesseqdec Lɛenqa. Nekk rriɣ-ten-id ɣer teqbaylit. Azwel-ines: Di twenza-w. Akked snat n tezlatin-nniḍen. Seg ccna d yisefra tegreḍ asurif ɣer usnulfu n yinzan. Acimi d widak gedged i tferneḍ? Ferneɣ ayen iɣef iwumi ttḥulfuɣ mliḥ. Yezmer ad icudd ɣer usentel n tmetti, tasertit, neɣ ɣer wayen-nniḍen ulamma s yinzan. Acku inzan nettaf-iten deg yisefra, deg ccna, neɣ ula deg umezgun… Acuɣeṛ d inzan swaswa? Acku d cwiṭ i d-yeqqaṛen aṭas! Am wuṛeɣ; cwiṭ kan seg-s yesɛa azal meqqṛen. Diɣen inzan ttawḍen s lemɣawla ɣer yimsefliden, zemren ad ten-lemden di ddqiqa.

  Tanemmirt a Mass Awras. Awal-ik n taggara…  

 S tumert a Kaisa. Tanemmirt imi i yi-d-tefkiḍ tagnit i wakken ad mmeslayeɣ ɣef yisenfaṛen-iw. Ssarameɣ ccna-nneɣ ad yezdi lqedd-is, ad yefṛeḥ bab-is s lɣella n yidles ajaddiw i iteddun ɣer tatrara.

  Testeqsa-t Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Asekfel n umezruy n Lezzayer d win yettnarnin yal ass, imi ussan-agi yezrin amjahed Si Mohand Said Akli, mmi-s n Kulunel Muḥend Welḥağ, imḍebbar anegaru n lwilaya tis 03 tamazrayt, yesuffeγ-d adlis wis 02 n umezruy, s usentel  » La Glorieuse Révolution Algérienne », i d-iyefγen di tezrigin Sarah deg umenzu n wagur n yulyu 2016. Adlis-agi yebḍa-t γef 34 n yaḥricen, anda id-imeslay s telqay γef deqs n temsal d tlufa, ad-nebder ger-asent aswir n Ṣummam, tamesbanit n Jumel, tinigiyin n Kulunel Muḥend Welḥağ, tudsa n lbaḍna di tallit n tegrewla, tibezrin d waṭas niḍen. Akken id-yuγal γef lewfaq n EVIAN, lejrima i xedmen lεeskkar n tmurt n Fransa deg tama n Yiflise, tamesbanit n 11 d ujambar 1960 di Lezzayer tamanaγt, amecwaṛ n umyaru di tallit n tegrewla d waṭas niḍen. Adlis-agi yesεa 208 n yisebtar, yettnuzu s 450 n yidinaren, u yella di deqs n temkarḍiyin.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Awal γef umyaru 

 Akli Mohand Said d mmi-s n Kulunel Muḥend Welḥağ, ilul ass n 19 yunyu 1933 di taddert n Wizgan (Bouzeguène) lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu. Yelmed deg uγarbaz amezwaru n tlata seg At-yexlef, syen irruḥ γer Lezzayer tamanaγt akken ad-ikemmel ulmud-is deg uγarbaz alemmas n Vieux Kouba. Yunnag γer tmurt n Fransa deg seggas n 1952 anda i yebda ixeddem deg luzin n Coder Saint Marcel. Ass n 12 maggu 1954 yekcem ad-yesεeddi lεeskkar, Amenzu maggu 1956 yeffeγ-d di lεesker, imiren kan yuli s adrar, anda baba-s yummer-it ad-yekcem γer tarbeεt n Iken Mohand Said i yetwasnen s yisem n tegrewla « Σemmi Muḥ ». Iεedda d aγella u d imḍebbar di deqs n temnaḍin n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu.

 Mbaεd yiwet n txazabit meqren id-yeḍran di taddert n Wizgan ass n 05 γuct 1960, yetwajraḥ deg uqarru akked ufus-is, yettwaḥbes di lḥebs n Tizi-Wezzu anda is-saṛwan lemraṛ d laεtab,syen sarḥen-as-d aseggas n 1962 timmunent n tmurt n Lezzayer. Mbaεd 53 n yiseggasen, yesuffeγ-d ismektayen-is, imi yuγ lḥal deg seggas n 2011 yesuffeγ-d adlis-is amenzu s usentel  » Si Muḥend Saεid Iḥekku-d Amγar » id-yefγen di tezrigin n tira, tura yerna-d adlis-is wis ssin γef tegrewla Tazzayrit 54/62.

<p style="text-align: right;"> islam Bessaci 

  
 Yal taddart neɣ tamnaḍt seg temnaḍin n leqbayel neɣ n tmurt n lezzayer s umata, yal yiwet deg-sent amek i d-tesmektay ansayen-is (Taεacurt, Lmulud, Yennayen…).

 Tikkelt-agi neɛreḍ deg tirza-nneɣ ɣer waṭas n tuddar n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, ad d-nessiken i medden amek nuɣɣen tannumi sfugulen ass n Tɛacurt deg tuget n tudrin n temdint-a. Ansay-agi i d-yekkan seg tedyanit tineslemt, yettili-d yal 10 deg waggur n Muḥarem n leḥsab n Lhiǧri, aseggas-agi yemtawa-d d wass-nni n lḥed yezrin 01 deg waggur n tuber 2017. Tuget n tuddar, sufuɣen yimezdaɣ-is lewɛadi ɣef yimeɣban d uxeddim n lewziɛa, maca nekkni nebɣa ad d-nesken irmad d leɛwayed xeddmen wiyaḍ deg unsay-agi.

  Nebda-d seg ladayra n Ʃin El Ḥemmam… 

 Taṣebḥit n wass-nni n umenzu n waggur-agi ideg nella, neṭṭef abrid ɣer tɣiwant n Uqbil, ladɣa taddart n Wat Ṣallan, nufa dinna inesbaɣuren n taddart taṣebḥit n wass-nni n lǧemɛa uqbel taɛacurt, sufuɣen yakkan lewɛadi, ẓuren-d lemqamat yellan deg tɣiwant-agi. Ma d ass-nni n lḥed nufa-ten akken kan ttheggin iman-nsen i wakken ad zlun izgaren n tmecreḍt n tɛacurt. Syin akin, nkemmel abrid-nneɣ ɣer tɣiwant n Ʃin El Ḥemman, neqsed lemqam n Jeddi Mangellet n taddart n Tewrirt Mangellet, neẓra-d belli bdan irmaden-nsen seg sendiḍelli-nni n tɛacurt, yal ass sewwayen-d seksu s uksum, ferrqen-t ɣer yinebgawen i irezzun ɣer dinna, ma d wid i ibeɛden ttnusun deg yisensa. Nnan-aɣ belli yella umkan n zzerda n tlawin weḥd-s, win n zzerda n yirgazen weḥd-s. Am wakken daɣen i d-ttasen yimdanen-nniḍen i d as-ittṣeddiqen i Jeddi Mangellet ikraren, izgaren, iqelwawen, zellun-ten deg lweɛda n tɛacurt. Wiyaḍ ttasen-d kan i wakken ad ẓuren u ad as-ḍelben ḥellu n yimuḍan neɣ lbaraka deg lerzaq-nsen. Am wakken daɣen llan yimdanen-nniḍen yettruḥun s axxam n Ccix Muḥend u Lḥussin, xeddmen daɣen akka.

  …Taɣiwant n At Xellili 

 Mi yezgen wass, yuɣ-aɣ lḥal newweḍ ɣer tɣiwant n At Xellili, i wakken ad nẓer d acu merra n leqdicat idelsanen d yimettiyen i xeddmen deg snat n tuddar-is, i lmend n usmekti n unsay-agi aqdim. Dɣa nezwer-d seg taddart n At Xir, mi nelḥaq, nufa yebda yakkan usfugel-ines ass-nni n lǧemɛa 29 deg waggur n cutember 2017, tedda alarmi d ass-agi amenzu n waggur-agi n tuber 2017. Dɣa ixdem-aɣ-d uselway n tiddukkla tadelsant “Isselqam n talaɣt” n taddart-agi n At Xir, Mass Karim Taguein agzul n wayen yeḍran: “Nexdem ass-nni n larebɛa ɣer yiḍ 27 deg waggur n cutember 2017, lewziɛa neɣ timecreḍt, ideg nezla 07 n yizgaren i d-seddqen wat taddart deg ussan-agi iɛeddan, syin ass-nni n lexmis nefreq akk aksum-nni ɣef yimezdaɣ n taddart. Ma d sendiḍelli n lǧemɛa 29/09/2017, akked yiḍelli n ssebt aṭas n leqdicat idelsanen deg tlemmast n taddart sdat n tqubet yellan rrif n ubrid. Ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan-agi yezrin (lǧemɛa 29/09/2017 akked ssebt 30/09/2017), nga aṭas n temsikniyin: lfeṭṭa, idlisen, tamemt, afexxar, tiqendurin n leqbayel, ijeqduren n usɣar, zzit n uzemmur, allalen iqburen, idlisen, isenza s yibuddan(…). Am wakken daɣen tella ccna, isefra, ticeqqufin n umezgun, iḍebbalen…atg”. Ma d ahil ufṣil yella-d akka: deg ass amezwaru 29/09/2017, tella-d yiwet n tmeɣra n ccna s wazal-is, ideg ccnan waṭas n yicennayen n taddart-agi n At Xir. Rnu ɣur-s timsikniyin-agi i d-nebder yakkan. Ma deg ass-nni wis, i d-yellan ass-nni n ssebt 30/09/2017, tella-d tejmilt meqqren i sin n yicennayen-nneɣ imeqqranen wigi d Atmani akked Taleb Tahar. Dɣa cnan-d kra n tezlatin-nsen, yerna wwin awal ɣef umecwar-nsen d tnagiyin fell-asen. Am wakken i d-yella Massi Lewhama deg lmendad, anida necraḥent aṭas twacul.in i d-yusan ad tnezhent. Ma ɣef 12h00 n uzal tella-d lweɛda, anida seččen merra taddart d yinebgawen s seksu d uksum. Ma deg wass-agi n lḥed 01/10/2017, nelḥeq deg lawan n lweɛda, syin akkin kfan-tt s yiwet n tmeɣra meqqren, ideg ccnan aṭas n yinaẓuren gar-asen: Yousef Guerbas, Ahitous, Dehmani Bilaid…atg. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella Attaf n Lewhama ɣef lmendad n tsaɛet n unecraḥ d teḍṣa. Syin ɣer-s, tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n uttekki i wid ittekkan deg usfugel n tɛacurt-agi n useggas-agi. Syin ɣer-s newwi abrid metwal taddart n Leɣrus, dima deg tɣiwant n At Xellili, anida nelḥeq ɣef ddqayeq tineggura n lewziεa i xedmen taṣebḥit n wass-agi n lǧemɛa, ideg seččen akk taddart s uksum. Anida i d-tella yiwet lweεda, ideg i d-fkan wat taddart sin n yizgaren i wakken ad ten-zlun d waṭas n yidrimen ara tessexdem taddart d useddu n yisenfaren n unegmu. Ilmeẓyen n taddart-agi n Leɣrus, εeddan-d akk ɣef yixxamen n taddart tawwurt s tewwurt, jemεen-d timellalin d ufḍir (aḥeddur), d yidrimen. Syin akkin, wwin-ten akk ɣer tejmaεt n taddart. Aksum-nni, ferqen-t ɣef wat taddart, yal yiwen yewwi amur-is ula d timellalen d ufḍir yal yiwen s leḥqq-is. Ma d idrimen-nni, gan-ten deg texriḍt n taddart, mi ten-ḥwajen ad ten-id-kksen.

  Ɣer taggara, nezger ɣer tɣiwant n Tizi Raced 

 Nessaweḍ ɣer taddart Yicerɛiwen, taddart n Si Muḥend u Mḥend akked Laimache Ali, yellan deg tɣiwant n Tizi Raced lewhi n ṭṭhur. Nufa-ten xedmen yakan lweɛda ɣef 12h00 n uzal, dɣa zlan 23 n yikraren i ten-id-ikecmen s yisem n ṣṣaddiqa, seččen akk At taddart si rrif alamma d rrif, syin aksum-nni yugaren ferqent ɣef yixxamen. Am wakken daɣen i xedmen tameɣra n ccna, ideg ccnan kra n yilmeẓyen n taddart-agi, yecban: Lallouche Salim, Ladjani Cherif, Hacen Oukid, Lamhene Arezki…atg. Am wakken daɣen i d aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n uɛeggal seg tesqamut n taddart-agi, mazal-asen 7 n yizgaren ad xedmen yis-sen timecreḍt deg ddurt-agi sdat-nneɣ. Ihi s wakka i tekfa tirza-nneɣ ɣer tuddar-agi i d-nebder yakkan, i wakken kan ad twalim ay imeɣriyen amek i d-yettili usfugel n unsay n tɛacurt deg yal tama deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Deg yiwen n wulɣu i aɣ-d-yewwḍen larebɛa iɛeddan sɣur Uḥuddu Aɣarim (Protection Civile) n waɣir n Bgayet, yedda-d yisalli n uɣraq n yiwet n tmeṭṭut deg teftist n yiẓra deg Bulimaṭ. Tettwawef tmeṭṭut-a i yesɛan azal n 35 n yiseggasen ass n 29 mayyu mettwal 16:36, tzedder deg yilel meqrub rrif. Ad d-nerr awellih d akken ɣef wakken i d-yenna uḥuddu aɣarim, tameṭṭut-a, tella telsa iceṭṭiḍen-is. Ma d tignatin i d-yewwin aɣraq-ines, ur banent ara ar tura. Ɣef waya i yettwaldi yiwen n unadi I wakken ad d-binent tlufa ugar.

  M. K. 

  
 Ass n amhad-a sdat-neɣ, 23 meɣres, ara tebdu teẓrigt tis 15 n Tfaska taɣelnawt n tmedyezt tamaziɣt d tajmilt i Dda Lmulud At Mɛemmer, i d-tessuddus Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel. D tafaska ara yilin s lmendad n umasdawan Kamal Buɛmara. Ɣef tiɣri i tikkin, s i d-tberreḥ tdukkla mettwal yennayer, rran-d fell-as ugar n 120 n yimedyazen i ara yemsizewren ɣef wanwa ara d-yawin amaynut d uswir igerrzen, ɣef leḥsab n yisfernan i d-tga tesqamut. Deg wahil n kraḍ n wussan ara tdum tfaska, seld tirza n umaray amatu d yiɛeggalen n Useqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, ad tebdu tegnit n temsikknin ɣef sin n wudmawen n tsekla, Mulud At Mɛemmer d Kamal Buɛmara. Seg teldayt tunsibt ɣef 13:00, ad d-yettwaheggi usarag amezwaru, d tamuɣli ɣef sin seg yiqeddicen n Kamal Buɛmara, s uzwel ‘’Taɣuri tamaynut i «Nekkni d wiyeḍ»’’, akked « Aglam d usissen n usegzawal bu yiwet n tutlayt «Issin» ». Gar umsizwer n tmedyazt n tameddit, ad ikemmel wahil deg wass wis sin, ideg ad d-yuɣal ladɣa umsizwer n tmedyazt, d usarag sɣur Massa Buxellu, i tsemma: « Le désert, espace de la découverte du Pharmakon dans la traversée de Mouloud Mammeri ». Tameddit, ad d-yili usenɛet n terbaɛt Taɛessast, i d-yerzan seg ugezdu n tesdawit n Tizi Wezzu. Ugar n tegnatin n tmenna ara d-yettilin seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ, ad d-yili deg wass aneggaru usenzer ɣef yimifriren n tedwilt iɛeddan. Rnu-as asarag-nniḍen iwumi yettunefk uzwel « Tallelt n Buɛmara deg usmunyet n tezrawin tiseklanin », sɣur Mass Bellac Takfarinas. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> M. K. 

<div> 
  
 Akken ifukk asefru-s, taqcict tuɣwas tebda a tnehhi d lweqt ad terbu. Iffeɣ umedyaz, tessawel yema-s i tlawin ad tt-εiwnent di rebbu n yelli-s. Mi d-ikcem urgaz-is tameddit yufa, yerna ɣer-s uqcic, tameṭṭut-is ur tt-yuɣ wara. Argaz iwhem deg wayen ittwali. Mi isteqsa amek akka! Taḍeggalt-is terra-as-id: d leflani iwumi d-nessawel, iwala-tt kan dɣa Rebbi ifka-d liser. 

 Akken ifukk wagur inna-as urgaz-nni i tmeṭṭut-is: issefk, ad neg imensi, ad d-neεreḍ amedyaz ɣer yimensi, yuklal.

 Terra-as tmeṭṭut-is: anef i umedyaz deg umkan-is, ad aɣ-imneε Rebbi si ddnub-is !

 -Ala a tameṭṭut! Wellah ad yečč d imensi ɣur-neɣ!

 -ḍebber aqeṛṛu-k!

 Netta iffeɣ ɣer ssuq ɣer lqeḍyen, nettat teffeɣ ɣer tala ad d-tagem aman. Mi d-tuɣal si tala, tɛedda-d ɣef tejmaεt tufa-d amedyaz-nni, iqqim ɣef udekkan, aqerru-s gar yifassen-is. Mi tewwet ad tɛeddi isḍfer-as-d asefru, yenna-as:

  Lεeslama-m si tala  

  Leεyun n tnila 

  Taṭṭucin bḥal leḥcic 

  Ḥemdulleh mi teḥliḍ 

  Mebruk 

  Nseεdam aqcic 

 Yusa-d urgaz-is si ssuq, teftel seksu, teseww aksum i yimensi. Alammi d lawan deg ara yečč imensi inna-as urgaz-is heggi-d imensi. Tameṭṭut tessers-d tlata n tbaqyin n seksu d uksum, tenna-as: a ta-n dayen ihegga yimensi. Argaz iddem-d tacekkart n ssem ismer kra di ttneṣfa n yiwet n tbaqit inna-as i tmeṭṭut-is : anef-asent i tbaqyin-agi, akken llant. Tura ad ṛuḥeɣ ad d-siwleɣ i leflani. Argaz iruḥ ɣer tejmaεt issawel-d i umedyaz. Akken d-ččuren tawwurt, argaz izwar-d, amedyaz deffir-s, tbedd tmeṭṭut-is tenna i urgaz-is: ay argaz di leεnaya-k ma ur iyi-teǧǧiḍ ad d-awiɣ asefru! 

 Yenna-as urgaz-is : ad yeg Rebbi teččiḍ aqerru-m ! Ini-d. 

 Tenna-as:

  Ttxilek a lbaz meẓẓiyen 

  A win itεeffan 

  Ruḥ asif, enz-as ɣef rrif 

  D lεibad i d imcummen 

  ewwlen ad k-ɣedren 

  Ɣef zwaj-is ḥed ur t-iṭṭif 

 Amedyaz ifhem lmeεna n usefru yerra-as:

 A ta-n, a yelli-s ujeḥmum

 Azegzaw n ṛṛqem

 Ẓẓriɣ asigna-s tekkat 

 Qqimen ad ččen, amedyaz iddem snat n tleqmatin si rrif n tbaqit issers taɣenjawt inna ḥemdulleh. S wakka imne&amp;epsilon,; ur t-yuɣ wara. 

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Lqem aneggaru n unasiw « Gboard » n Google ɣef usawal n ufus s ddaw Android d IOS yefka-d abeḥri i turin n yimaziɣen merra imi i d-isedda Tamɛemrit d Tifinaɣ.

 Ɣas aṭas-aya i terǧa tmaziɣt, acu kan ass-a yeffeɣ-as leɛtab ɣer tafat. Agemmuḍ-agi yeḍfer iseggasen n usuter sɣur wid yesseqdacen tamaziɣt deg Internet akked yimeɣnasen-is. Ayen yessefraḥen daɣen, d afran n temɛemrit d tfinaɣ. Tamɛemrit, tira i d-yeǧǧa Dda Lmulud, d tin i sseqdacen tuget n yizzayriyen yerna d tin ara yeǧǧen win i tt-yesseqdacen ad kecmen taɣult tumḍint (domaine numérique) mebla uguren. Tifinaɣ, tira n lejdud d umezruy, d tin yextar Usinag Ageldan n Tussna Tamaziɣt (IRCAM) n Lmerruk. Neẓra merra belli ma nebɣa tamaziɣt ad tidir, ad tennerni, ilaq-as ad tekcem ɣer taɣult tumḍint. Imeɣnasen n tmaziɣt, fkan azal ameqran i temsalt-agi. Daymi asuɣel n yifecka illeliyen, asnulfu n yiḍrisen d yismal Web yeṭṭef-d abrid-is. Akken qqaren Wat-zik « Win yebɣan, yettnadi amek. Win yugin yeqqar kan ulamek ». Ihi, win yebɣan yezmer seg tura ad yesseqdec iminig ɣef Web Firefox n Mozilla, afecka n tirawt Skype d yifecka-nniḍen s tmaziɣt. Yezmer daɣen ad yerzu ɣer Wikipedia i wakken ad iɣer iḍrisen s tmaziɣt. Anasiw Gboard n Google yewjed i ussider baṭel deg Play Store (s ddaw Android) d App Store (s ddaw IOS).

  T. Umaziɣ 

  
 Sya d afella, imezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Leɛǧiba zemren ad d-ssufɣen ttriḥ n tenhart seg uxxam n tɣiwant mebla ma ruḥen alamma d ddayra n Beclul iwakken ad t-ssutren. Wagi d isalli I aɣ-d-yettunefken seg yimḍebbren n tɣiwant I d-yennan dakken “aqel-aɣ nebda nteṭṭef-d ikaramen n yimdanen I d-yessutren ttriḥ n tenhart. Di tazwara, ad awin yiwen n lkaɣeḍ ara ten-yeǧǧen ad ddun mebla akukru segmi ara d-nesmed lekwaɣeḍ akk yuḥwaǧ waya.”Ad d-nesmekti dakken tadbelt n tɣiwant-a d tin iseddan akken iwata asufeɣ n tkerḍiwt n tkerrust neɣ (la carte grise), terna asewǧed n ttriḥ n tuffɣa s ttawil imaynuten( passeport biométrique) , atta-n tura tessaweḍ ɣer ttriḥ n tenhert. Aya yella-d s usileɣ n wid yettukelfen s cɣel-a deg ddayra anda yella yakan usufeɣ n lekwaɣeḍ-a. Ma d ayen yerzan azmul n lekwaɣeḍ-a, d amaray amatu n tɣiwant i iwekkel lwali n Tubiret i waya. Smail. M

  
 Ali Makour d yiwen gar yirgazen n tẓuri d tsekla taqbaylit d yidles amaziɣ. D win yefkan tudert-is d temẓi-is i tira d tmedyazt n teqbaylit, d yidles amaziɣ s umata. Dda Ali ,d amedyaz, d aneɣmas, d amaru ameqqran n tmedyazt n tmaziɣt tatrart.

 Ali Makour, d yiwen seg tsuta n tegrawla tazzayrit. Ilul-d ɣer ddunit ass n 07 deg waggur n unbir n useggas n 1953, deg taddart n Laԑzib Bugeni n Σmer deg tɣiwant n At Ʃisa Mimun, deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, di tmurt n Leqbayel. Ur d-as-tettnefk ara tegnit akken ad isṭebṭeb deg tewwurt n uɣerbaz, imi i d-ilul d ameԑḍur n tfekka, laԑmer yekcim lakul, yerna yif aṭas deg tezyiwin-is yeɣran. Maca tesɣer-it ddunit, yelmed-d aṭas s timawit seg yimɣaren d yimusnawen n taddart-is. Yebda tira n yimagraden (les articles) s tutlayt n tyemmat tamaziɣt, deg uɣmis «Tamurt» deg useggas n 1991, yella yettaru s yisem « Ʃli Ayt Maceɣ ». Syin akin, yuɣal yettaru imagraden s uzwel « Tabrat », deg uɣmis umayur «Iẓuran», i yellan yetteffeɣ-d yiwet n tikelt i waggur. Dda Ali, d amaru u d amedyaz deg yiwen n lweqt imi yura yiwen n udlis d ammud n yisefra d tmedyazt s snat n tutlayin. D win i wumi yeffka azwel «Ul yerɣan», yesuffeɣ-it-id deg useggas n 2001ɣer tezrigin « El Amal » neɣ « Asirem » s tmaziɣt Dima deg uḥric n tira n tsekla tamaziɣt, maca tikelt-agi deg tewsit tesrit, imi yura yiwen n wungal s wazal-is i wumi isemma «Timlilit n Tɣermiwin». Am waken, daɣen, yura aṭas n tmucuha n zik, gar-asent «Ḥend Buṣṣelṭan» i d-yettusuzergen s ɣur Aseqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa « HCA ». Ali Makour, yuwi-d semmus (05) n warrazen n usebɣes, seg tfaskiwin n tmedyazt ideg yetteki, ama dagi di tmurt n Lezzayer, neɣ tid n tmurt n lmaruk. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> ADAOUN Abdelghani 

  
 Seg wass n 15 ar 18 unbir, ad temmag ṛṛeḥba tis tesεa n udlis d ugtalɣu amaziɣ  deg uxxam n yidles Ali Zamoum n temdint n Tubiret. Ṛṛeḥba-yagi  i d-yessudus yal aseggas di temdint n Tubiret Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣ, tettili-d d tagnit anda i ttemlilen yimyura d yimaẓragen akked yimeɣriyen n udlis amaziɣ. I useggas-a, amaynut ara yilin ɣef wakken i d-xebbṛen yimḍebren n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, ad yili ufsar n yidlisen imaynuten n tsekla i d-yeffɣen deg « teklensit Idlisen-nneɣ » ; rnu  ɣur-s idlisen ideg d-jemɛen isaragen i d-yettunefken deg temliliyin tussnanin i yexdem HCA deg useggas 2013 d 2014. Am wakken daɣen ara d-yili ufsar n yidlisen ussnanen ama n tesnilest neɣ n tesnalest tamaziɣt i d-yessufeɣ l’ HCA s lemεawna akked l’ OPU akked l’ONDA. Seg wayen daɣen yettwaregmen ad yili ilmend n ṛṛeḥba-ya tis tesεa, timlilit ara d-yawin ɣef ddublaj n yisura s tmaziɣt. Ad d-yili daɣen umeslay ɣef usaru amaynut i d-yessufeɣ Belkacem Hadjadj ɣef tmeṭṭut yellan d azamul n tegrawla d tlelli Lalla Faḍma n Sumer. Di ttiεad-a ara yekken ṛebεa n wussan, aṭas n umaynut ara yilin, imi sennig n yidlisen ara d-yefser Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, ad alin daɣen wid i d-yeffɣen ɣer teẓrigin-nniḍen ara d-yettwanecden ɣef demma, rnu daɣen d tagnit akken ad mlilen yimeɣriyen akked yimyura ideg ara ilin wid ara ibudden idlisen-nsen i yimeɣriyen. I zzyada n ttfaṣil ɣef ṛṛeḥba tis tesεa n udlis amaziɣ, tzemrem ad twalim asebter-a n lwab : <a href="http://hca-dz.org/hca-9eme-salon-du-livre-et-du-multimedia-amazigh-bouira/" target="_blank">HCA – 9ème Salon du Livre et du multimédia Amazigh – Bouira</a>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mokrane Chikhi 

  
 Dda Mḥend : azul a Sriffeg ! d acu i t-xedmeḍ akka ?

 Sriffeg : Aql-i teẓẓɛeɣ izan, aɛyiɣ deg yiman-iw mačči d kra, ula d leḥyuḍ aɛyan deg-i.

 Dda Mḥend : acimi akka i teɛyiḍ deg yiman-ik ? ddunit telha mačči d kra.

 Sriffeg : telha ddunit ! waqila teskeɛrireḍ fell-i ?

 Dda Mḥend : ad iyi-imneɛ Rebbi deg daɛwessu-k. tesneḍ ddadda-k Mḥend yettkellix ɣef medden, ruḥ steqsi akk at taddart ttirni, ak-d-inin akk dda Mḥend d aḥcayci. Yal yiwen yefka-as lkar-iis, yerna s taḍsa d lehcaca.

 Sriffeg : Tenniḍ-iy-d ddunit telha ! anda akka tettwaliḍ lhu-agi-ines di tmurt-a di laɛnaya-k ? imdanen regglen ɣer tmura tiberraniyin, llan wiyaḍ zeggren ilell s teflukin, wa yewweḍ ɣer yeswi-s, wa yeǧǧa din tarwwiḥt-is. Lxedma ulac, tamezduɣt ula, keččini ad qqareḍ telha ddunit-a !

 Dda Mḥend : Amek akka lxedma ulac ! tella, ahat ur –nudaḍ ara kan, «la forge» n taddart ha-tt-an temdel tewwurt-is, yuli-tt uɣebbar. Yya-d ad tt-neldi ad tt-xedmeḍ d aḥeddad. 

 Sriffeg : waqila ḥeqqrent-iyi wallen-ik. Widen ur neɣri ugin ad xedmen d iḥeddaden, nekkini imi d fɣeɣ di tesdawit, ad qqleɣ d aḥeddad.

 Dda Mḥend : Akka tt-waliɣ akka, d kunwi i iḥeqqren amahil-agi n uḥeddad s tsuta-agi d yettnekkaren. Zik-nni s umahil-agi i s-wayess yettwassen yisem n uḥiṭus. At yeǧǧer akken llan si taddart n Mḥaga alarmi d taddart n Ḥura tt-gallan s tenfalit-a : «Aḥeqq sebɛa n zzbari n Yiḥiṭusen», ma d tura imi i ibeddel zmantettgallam s icelɣumen neɣ s tlawin. D «les chômeurs» acḥal d iseggasen-aya yerna tɣunzam amahil-agi n iḥeddaden. 

 Sriffeg : anda sneɣ ad xedmeɣ amahil-a.

 Dda Mḥend : aya mačči d aɣbel, ak-sslemdeɣ, xas akka meqqreɣ di leɛmer, ad iliɣ ɣer tama-k, ayen akk i ssneɣ ak-temleɣ. 

 Sriffeg : tannemirt-ik a dda Mḥend, telliḍ-d allen-iw, lliɣ am win akken yeṭṭsen. Ur ẓriɣ ara akken «la forge»-nneɣ tesɛa amezruy.

 Dda Mḥend : mazal ur ak-d-nniɣ ara kullec, maca ad as-nruḥ s laɛqel kan. Di tazwara, ak-mmleɣ amek ara tettsuḍuḍ lkir d wamek ara tekkateḍ afḍis ɣef zzebra, d uḍerraq n tgelzyam, d wamek ara tneɣceḍ imegran, d wamek ara temziḍ tifruyin d ijenwiyen, ad arnuɣ ak-sslemdeɣ amek ara tettsemmired iḥwicen.

 Sriffeg : nnan-d t-xedmem ula d ibeckiḍen. Ad iyi-teslemdeḍ a dda Mḥend di laɛnaya-k ?

 Dda Mḥend : imir-nni yella ṭṭrad mgal acengu Afransis. Agdud yuḥwaǧ ibeckiḍen. Ass-a acengu yeffeɣ. Tezzi-d talwit nettidir di lehna, iwumi-ten ara ibeckiḍen ass-a ? Ad nexdem allalen i imekrazen, ad yili ahat ad iḥwiǧen imegran, iqubac, tiglezyam… i wakken ad megren, ad neɣcen… imegrazen ttiḥwiǧen iḥeddaden.

 Sriffeg : ah tesmektaḍ-iyi-d ɣef yiwet n tenfalit, acimi i qqaren mi sɛerqent i uḥeddad ad yekkat ɣef zzebra ?

 Dda Mḥend : i kunwi iwumi ɛerqent mačči i nekni, ur teẓrim ansi id tekkam neɣ sani t-tteddum, ur iban d acu tebɣam. Di leɛmer tɛeddam akk 30 n yiseggasen, ur tezwiǧen, ur t-xeddmem. Nekni zik ur nessin ara d acu id lweswas, ur nettrebbi ara «les chômeurs» di taddart. Imal-nneɣ iban am yiṭij, win yeɣran iban yeɣra, win ur neɣri ad yuɣal d aḥeddad. Yečča lmal yefreḥ bab-is. Cfiɣ am wass-a asmi tzehher tḥanut, amzun d taɣrast n tzizwa. Sebɛa zzbari sṭenṭunent, yal yiwen iban cceɣl-is. Ass-a teɣli-d tsusmi, tessewḥac ula deg uzal qayli. A sidi Rebbi, ttɣilek jemmeɛ-iyin ad iliɣ gar wid ḥemmleɣ. Amkan-iw gar wid yemmuten…

<p style="text-align: right;"> Busad Hemmar 

  
 Deg zik-is, Tala-Xlil d yiwet n taddart iǧehden nezzeh deg lεarc n At Dwala di tmurt n Leqbayel.Taddart deg-s aṭas n yiderma d yirgazen n at yiɣil d wat ufud, rebεin n yirgazen s tmira, rebεin-niḍen war timira. Qqaren-d ḥekmen s ẓẓur ɣef tudrin i ten-id-iqerben, tekksen-asen ula d timecṛaḍ. Mi ara ruḥen ad d-kksen timecṛeḍt i webεaḍ n tudrin ttceyyiεen kan rebεin n yirgazen. Ma ruḥen rebεin n yirgazen s tmira, rebεin-nni war timira ad qqimen, ad qablen ma yella-d kra n cekk fell-asen, ad inin nekni ur nesεi ara di taddart annect-a n yirgarzen isεan timira. Ma d rebεin-nni war timira i iṛuḥen, rebεin-nni n yirgazen isɛan timira d nutni iqablen, ad inin am yimezwura. Yiwet n tikkelt, mmsawalen yimeqqranen n tudrin-nni ɣef i iεedda ẓẓuṛ ad nnejmaεen, ad mcawaṛen acu d wamek ara xedmen akken ad ḥerzen ɣef yiman-nsen d nnif-nsen. Yal taddart, tuzen-d tlata n yirgazen, lamin d sin n ṭemman ad mlilen di Tala n At Dwala. Wwḍen s amekkan, qqimen zzin d agraw ttmeslayen yiwen, yiwen; mi yekfa yiwen ad yuɣal wayeḍ. Iṣella-d yiwen ɣef sin yiberdan yenna: ‘‘ llah mselli aεlik ya ṛasul llah, llah mselli aεlik ya ṛasul llah’’ dɣa ibda awal. ‘’Ay atmaten, ayen iḍran yid-neɣ teẓramt, iḍra ula yid-wen. Kksen lmal i yimeksawen-nneɣ, kksen-aɣ timecṛeḍt, ittwakkes sser fell-aɣ. Tura ma nnejmeε ass-agi dagi di Tala n At Dwala alammi tewweḍ tkerza s aḥdid, alammi tewweḍ tfidi ɣer yiɣes,ifukk ṣbeṛ, issefk akken nella, akken i d-nnejmeε ass-agi, ad nedukkel ur nettɣimi ara nemferwazeε am ibawen ɣef lluḥ, yak teẓram awal nnan-t imezwra: bḍu-ten terniḍ-ten. Ihi ass-agi issefk fell-aɣ ad nedukkel, ad nemtawa-t ɣef yiwen n ṛṛay, ad nbedd ɣef yiwen wawal, ad nekfu-t cedda i d-iɣlin fell-aɣ, nekk deg wawal kfiɣ, ma sxesreɣ εfut-iyi, ma uqmeɣ ḥemdullah.’’ Wid i-as-id-izzin, nnan-d akk d awal n lεali. Rnan-d di lǧeṛṛa-s wiyaḍ, mtawan ɣef yiwen n ṛṛay ad d-suddsen yiwet n tmecṛeḍt ara isdukklen akk tudrin-nni akken ara d-sbedden daɣen yiwet n taggayt n yirgazen n at yiɣil ara iqamren wid ad d-iṛuḥen ad asen-kksen timecreḍt. Ssuq i-d-iḍefren anejmu&amp;epsilon,; sewqen imeqqranen n tudrin-nni, uɣen-d izgaren ara immezlen. Yal taddart txelleṣ ayen i as-d-tewwi n yidrimen a laḥsab n wazal n yimdanen i tesεa. Lexbeṛ n tmecreḍt iffeɣ, iwweḍ tudrin d leεruc, slan-as yis-s di yal tama n tmurt. Mmlalen yirgazen n tudrin-nni di Tala n At Dwala, ggan timecreḍt am tid yezrin, qedcen akken uɣen tanumi qedcen. Mmezlen yizgaren, igzem uksum, ibḍa d idura d tuna. Syin, sbeddent yiwet n taggayt n yirgazen n at ufud, wa yewwi abeckiḍ, wa d acaqur, wa d ajenwi, yal wa d acu n leslaḥ i iṭṭef ger yifassen-is. Ddurin isekla ttrajun wid ara d-yasen ad asen-kksen timecraḍt akken ad d-ẓedmen fell-asen, ad d-rren ttaṛ, ad tekfu cedda fell-asen. Wwḍen-d wid itekksen timecṛaḍ, isegras ɣef tuyat, ḥaren-d amzun d imnayen. Inṭeq-d yiwen seg-sen yenna i wid d-yufa ɣer tmecreḍt-nni: ‘’salamuεlikum ’’ Rran-as-id kra: ‘’salam ureḥmatellah lεeslama’’ Inṭeq-d wayed seg wid itekksen timecraḍ yenna: ‘’ah! Timecreḍt n tikkelt-a, tzad, tgerrez aksum-is llah ibarek d ayen kan!’’ Yerna-d wayeḍ di lǧeṛṛa-s yenna: ‘’d tidet! Aksum-a d aleqqaq ala i nekni iwumi ilaq!’’ Refden awal imeddukkal-is qqaren s utihi: ‘’aksum-a d aleqqaq ala i nekni iwumi ilaq! aksum-a d aleqqaq ala i nekni iwumi ilaq!’’ 


<div style="text-align: center;"> Ttεeddin sin sin, mi kfan ad uɣalen wiyaḍ…  
<div>Nneṭqen ɣer-sen wid d-isuddsen timecreḍt nnan-asen: ‘’ad ken-ihdu Rebbi! Ruḥet ɣer cɣel nwen! Timecreḍt ur aken-terza ara’’ Sεuzgen, εeddan aεnan tuna, knan jemmεen deg uksum, ttacaṛen isegras. Wid iddurin isekla qersen-d fell-asen s ibeckaḍ d yijenwiyen d tqubac, zzin-asen-d si yal tama ḥaṛṛen-ten di tlemmast. Wid-nni i tekksen timecraḍ ḥaren deg yiman-nsen, mačči d ayen ara qablen, iffeɣ-iten laεqel, bran i isegras iččuren d aksum, tarewla temneε bab-is. Wid yemmuten, mmuten, wid ijerḥen kkemlen-asen nɣan-ten, ma d wid iṣawḍen rewlen, ḍefren-ten alammi d taddart-nsen. Kra n wakud mbaεd, deg yiwet seg tudrin-nni akked santadawt wat Tala-Xlil, yiwen uxxam issuddes-d yiwet n tmeɣra n rcel. Imiren, ttaren medden urar deg umṛaḥ n taddart, ttasen-d imeddaḥen ittwassnen, snuzun lḥenni. Mi ara tili tmeɣra deg umṛaḥ, d tameɣra n taddart meṛṛa, ttasen-d yilmeẓyen ad nezhen ula si tudrin nniḍen i d-iqerben. Tameɣra n taddart am lǧanaza tessemlili imdanen n lεarc. Iṭij iḍal i tizi, ṭlam icrured-d, isberber ɣef tɣaltin d yizuɣar, ass ifka nnuba i yiḍ. Amṛaḥ i d-yuzgan di ttnaṣfa n taddart, ibda la yettacar. Izrugen i d-ittawin ɣer umṛaḥ ččuren d lɣaci. Ttawḍen-d d tirebbaɛ. Irgazen, tilawin d warrac, ḥemqen akk deg usurif, yal wa ibɣa ad iṭṭef amekkan yelhan, win seg ara d-iwali akk ayen ara yeḍrun di tqaεet. Ad iwali ameddaḥ, aceṭṭaḥ…ad iwali isli. Usan-d yilmeẓyan, ad nezhen ula seg tudrin tiǧiratin. Iḍ ilḥa mi bdan imeddaḥen ttmeddiḥen, snuzun lḥenni. Ttεeddin sin sin, mi kfan ad uɣalen wiyaḍ, akken ttemjadalen s yisefra, anwa ara iɣelben wayeḍ ! Imeddaḥen, ttemseḍfaren, alammi d-yewweḍ nuba n yiwen ittwassen aṭas s yisefra uqriḥen. Ibda icekkaṛ bab n tmeɣra d taddart-is, icemmet at Tala-Xlil, ismekta-d tadyant n tmecṛeḍt. Lɣaci n taddart-nni wwten-as akk afus. Yuɣ lḥal, llan din yilmeẓyen n Tala-Xlil, ruḥen ad nezhen. Iɣaḍ-iten lḥal aṭas, nneḥcamen, uɣen-tent kan mkemmed. Mmyexẓaren gar-asen, msefhamen ɣef wayen d-yewwi ad t-xedmen. Qqimen alammi teḥma tmeɣra, lɣaci zhan akk, bdan ttensaren-d yiwen yiwen, ukren aḍar ɣer deffir, ffɣen-d, wexren-d seg umṛaḥ. Msefhamen, kra ad ruḥen ad d-kksen tislit, kra ad εassen. Ruḥen, kksen-d tislit-nni, wwin-tt ɣer taddart-nsen.Wwḍen ɣer taddart, sbedden taɛessast. Ugaden ma ḍefren-ten-id wat teslit ad ten-id-afen ur ukin ara. Assen, sayqa seg yigenni tayeḍ si lqaɛa, igenni yeɣli-d ɣef tmurt seg waḍu i d-ittsuḍun, i d-ittzuffun s lǧehd. Ayen i d-yufa sdat-s, iqleε-it neɣ irfed-it neɣ iḍum-it. Aḍu ajeffal irẓa-d ifurkawen n yisekla, iḍum iberdan d lexlawi, iqleε ifergan, isṭerḍaq tiwwura d ṭwaqi. Tizeɣwin n taddart, yerra-tent akk d tiεeryanin. Iqremyad i tent-idlen, isnefḍas-iten-id ɣer tmurt, uɣalen d iceqfan. Iferrawen n yisekla bernen deg yigenni am yifrax. Ddunit akk teshurru, tessawal. Yiwen seg yiɛessasen-nni, yesla i uskerwec n uqecquc n tmeɣrust mi t-id-iḍum waḍu, iɣil d imawlen n teslit i d-yewwḍen. Yugad, isuffeɣ aberraḥ : ‘’rwalut, at teslit a-t-in-in da ! Rwalut, at teslit a-t-in-in da !’’ Imezdaɣ ḥaren deg yiman-nsen, iffeɣ-iten laɛqel. Tarewla temnaɛ bab-is, d akessar s akal n At Lḥaǧ . Iffeɣ lexbeṛ, iwweḍ akk tudrin. Slan imrabḍen n At lḥaǧ, ruḥen-d wwin yid-sen ssif d senǧaq. Wwin-d s tedyant amek tella, slan i yal yiwen, semsawin gar-asen. Nnan-asen : ‘‘ Kunwi ma tuɣalem ɣer lexsaṛa, ur treffdem ara aqeṛṛu, ma d wigi ( At Tala-Xlil ) nezmer-asen ’’. S wakka, At Tala-Xlil, guǧǧan d akessar ɣer wakal n At Lḥaǧ, syin sbedden taddart tamaynut. Snuzun tiferkiwin-nsen yellan di taddart taqbuṛt i Wat Yidir d Wat Buɛli, ttaɣen ukessar ɣef Wat Lḥaǧ d Wat Buɛli. Seg yimiren, llan seddaw leɛnaya n At Meḥmud alammi d asmi i tt-id-rran Wat Dwala . Yugra-d wawal, qqaren :‘‘At Tala-Xlil s fṛank u nnefs i inzan ’’: Alammi fkan Wat Dwala frank d nnefs i Wat Meḥmud i d-tuɣal ɣur-sen. Almend n lxir, i asen-ggan Wat Lḥaǧ, yugra-d yiwen unsay: ar taggara n lɣella, jemmɛen-asen cwiṭ si lɣella, yettusemma d leɛcuṛ, ttawin-t d lwaɛda ɣer Sidi Mḥend Lḥaǧ. Uɣalen d iɛeccaṛen-nsen. Si lgirra ɣer da, ikkes unsay-a, maca rezzun ɣer Sidi Mḥend Lḥaǧ deg wass n taɛcurt, ttzurun-t u ttakken lwaɛda.  
<div>  
<div style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb  
 
  
 Annar n yedles d tẓuri tazzayrit yesḥasef aṭas s lmut n yiwen n yetri i yeḍwan tizlit tazzayrit ṣenf caεbi, wagi d Buğemεa Lεenqis, i tewwi tmettant tamedit n wass n larebεa 02 deg aggur n ctember 2015 di sbiṭar n Σin Naεğa di Lzzayer tamanaγt, sebba n waṭas it-yeṭfen acḥal n yiseggasen-aya. Buğemεa Lεenqis, issem-is aheqqani Buğemεa Arezqi, ilul ass n 17 yunyu 1927 di tama n La Casba di Lzzayer tamanaγt, deg yiwet n twacult id-ijebden iẓuran di tmurt n leqbayel, imi imawlan-is n tama n Uzeffun. deg seggas n 1939 yewwid agardas n tagara n wulmud, syen ixeddem γer Xali-s d amestejjar. Deg seggas n 1939 almi d 1945, Lεenqis yekcem annar n ccna s tahri, imi yewweḍ γer usirem-is, yewwi isem n tẓuri Lεenqis id-yuγen aẓar deg yisem n unaẓur ameqran El-Σenqa i yellan d mmi-s n tmurt-is di tama n uzeffun, anda i yekkat allalen n uẓawan n yicennayen meqren xarṣum imi ara seklasen. deg seggas n 1957, yelmed tutlayt n taεrabt, anda Cwiter akked Muḥamed Kibayli xedmen-as timsirin n ccna. Syen yessukes-d timusniwin d yinaẓuren i imucaεen tallit-nni, am Ccix Saεid el Meddaḥ, Mestafa Nadur. Di tegrewla Tazzayrit 54/62, Buğemεa Lεenqis yettwaḥbes sγur srabes n lbaḍna n tmurt n Fransa snat n tikkal. Tikkelt tamenzut deg seggas n 1957, tikkelt tis snat deg seggas n 1960. Deg tufγa id-yeffa&amp;gamma,; yuγal γer ccna, anda yessekles tizlit iwmi yeqqar « Djana El Intissar  » yecna γef tmesbaniyin n 11 dujambar 1961, anda i yesfallet i tmunnent n tmurt. Buğemεa Lεenqis yesεa ugar n 300 n tezlatin ger-asent « Ah Ya Ntya», “Rah El γali raḥ » akken i yecna kra n tezlatin s tutlayt n yemma-s taqbaylit « Mektaγ-d temẓi-w. Buğemεa Lεenqis d azamul n ccna d yedles azzayri s umata, yemmut di laεmer-is 88 n yiseggasen, maca xas yemut ayen id-yeğğa d agaruj ur nettfaka. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Islam Bessaci 

  
 Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, akked Tiddukkla Tadelsant Tamkadbut, s tallelt n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Ait Bouaddou, Asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, suddsen-d timlilit tis tẓa (09) n tfaska n umezgun n udrar, i d-yettilin deg wussan-agi. Tebda ass-nni n lǧemɛa 16 yunyu, ad tdum alamma d ass n lexmis 23 seg waggur-agi n yunyu ideg nella. Tettili-d temlilit-agi deg tezrigt-is tis 09 deg Tzeqqa n yidles n Tamkadbut, n Ait Bouaddou, deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D tazrigt i xedmen tikkelt-agi d tajemilt i sin wudmawen yettwassnen deg umezgun, wigi d: Sami Allam (yettwasnen s yisem n Bergaz) akked Ouabdesslam Fadhila (yettwassnen s yisem n Nna Zaazi). Ttiεad-agi, yebda s wudem unsib ass-nni n lǧemɛa yezrin16/06/2017 ɣef 22h00, s yiwet n terbeɛt n ccna i yessuznen akk imferǧen-nni akken ma llan. Tella-d diɣ, tɣuri n tmedyazt sɣur kra n yimedyzen. Ɣef 23h00, yella-d usenεet n tceqquft n umezgun tamezwarut “Yenna-iyi baba”, sɣur tarbaεt Macahu. Ma deg wass-nni n sed 17 deg yunyu 2017 ɣef 22h00, tella-d turart n tceqquft tis snat, s uzwel “Jugurta” sɣur Tiddukkla tadelsant Tigejdit n LNI. Ma d deg wass wis kraḍ d wis ukkuẓ, tella-d turart n 3 n tceqqufin timezgunin. Ass-nni lḥed 18 deg yunyu 2017, ɣef 22h00 uraren-d taceqquft-nni “Ṭaṭa Baṭaṭi”, sɣur tarbaɛt n Iferhounene. Snat-nni-nniḍen ad d- ilint ass-agi n letnayen 19 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, tina n 22h30 isem-is “Tawrent n tiiḥerci” telɛeb-itt-id terbaɛt n Yakourène, tina n 23h00 isem-is “Targit umaziɣ”. Ma deg wass wis semmus d wis seddis, ad d-tili turart n 4 n tceqqufin-nniḍen timezgunin, snat i yal ass. Azekka n ttlata 20 deg yunyu 2017, ɣef 22h00 ad uraren taceqquft-nni “Hassan amaggad”, sɣur Tiddukkla tadelsant Tala n (LNI), syin akin ɣef 23h00 ad d-ternu tceqquft-nni iwumi semman “Aḥiṭus”, sɣur Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine. Snat-nni-nniḍen ad d-ilin-d selazekka n larebɛa 21 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, tina n 22h00 isem-is “Bu tfuset ” ad tt-id-urar Tiddukkla tadelsant Noumidia n Oran, tina n 23h00 isem-is “Aɣerbaz”, ad tt-id-urar Tiddukkla tadelsant Imɣi n Iferhounene. Ma d as n lexmis, ad d-yili usenɛet n snat n tceqqufin n umezgun tineggura deg temsizzelt-agi. Tamezwarut d tina n 22h00, iwumi fkan azwel “Tagelda”, ara d-turar Tiddukkla Tigemmi n Tifrit n Bgayet, syin ɣer-s tis snat ad d-tili ɣef 23h00, isem-is “Seg wasmi ur tefri ara”, ad tt-id-turar Tiddukkla tadelsant Tagmat n Ait Ouaneche Ma d ass aneggaru 23 deg yunyu 2017, ad d-tili tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i wid yettekkin deg temlilit-agi tis 13, am wakken daɣen ara fken arrazen i tlala tceqqufin i d-yufraren, akked d tmeɣra n taggara si 21h30 d asawen.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Sebt-nni yezrin , Tiddukkla n yimaziɣen ABAAME i iqedcen di tama n usammer n tmurt n Fransa, thegga-d i lmend n usfugel n umenzu n yennayer n yimaziɣen useggas 2967. yiwen n leqdic d amerkanti. Tasebḥit, tella-d yiwet n terbaḥt n yiḍebbalen n tmurt n leqbayel akked timsikent n tlemẓyin s tqendyar n tlawin n temnaḍin n tmazɣa yemxalafen : Icelḥiyen, Leqbayel , Icawiyen, Imaziɣen n Waṭlas n Lmaruk..atg, yeddan di tlemmast n temdint almi d Amraḥ n Ssuq n Forbach. ’’ Iswi-nneɣ deg tmeɣra-agi , d abeggen n leɛyawed d wansayen-nneɣ, neɣ idles amaziɣ s umata i yimezḍaɣ yettidiren di temdint n Forbach, am wakken, daɣen, ara nesseɛlem tarwa-nneɣ i ilulen di tmurt n Fransa s yidles n lejdud-nsen, i wakken ad seḥbibren fell-as’’. Akka i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Ahmed Benhamouche, s yisem-is d imḍebbar di Tdukla ABAAME. Syin akkin, ikemmel leqdic s yiwet n temsikent n waṭas n tɣawsiwin ; idlisen n tmaziɣt, llebsa akked d tsawer n tudrin n tmurt n leqbayeld, tudrin n Rrif n Lmerruk d kra n yimagraden n tɣamsa yuran ɣef umezruy n yennayer. £er yiḍ, yekfa leqdic s yimensi n yennayer akked yiwet n tmeɣra n ccdaḥ d le défilé de mode i d-jemɛen tiwaculin timaziɣin akked d irumyen yettidiren di tama n usammer n fransa. S wakka, ad yeqqim wass n umenzu n yennayer d azamul n nekwa ɣer yimaziɣen deg umaḍal merra. Yennayer ameggaz i yimaziɣen anda ma llan.
