 Tafaska n sinima amaziɣ “ isni n wewṛaɣ “ id yettilin yal aseggas deg temdint n Agadir di Lmaruk di tedwilt-is t-is tesɛa, tessuli leqdic-ines menbeɛd tlata n wussan anda isura n tmaziɣt id yekkan si yal tamiwin n tmazɣa mɛabbaren bay-gar-sen ɣef arraz amenzu “ isni n wewṛaɣ/ la couronne d’or” . Wid iḥadren i tfaska-agi walan aṭas n isura di yal ṣṣenf n sinima ( isura ɣezzifen, isura wezzilen, imesliɣten-documentaires..). Yuɣ lḥal azal n 25 isura id yettikkin deg temzizelt-agi . Isura-agi yettikkin di tfaska n yisni n wewṛaɣ ɛadden deg aṭas n tzeɣwin n sinima di temdint n Agadir , dayen-nni is yernan azal imi s wakka aṭas n yemferǧǧên i sen-iwaɛan . 

 Taseqqamut yellan di lmendad n tfaska-agi tefka arraz amenzu i wemsarug ‘(cineaste) Mohamed Abaaram ɣef usaru-ines “Bu tfunast”. Si tama nniḍen arraz aɣelnaw n yidles amaziɣ n IRCAM yuɣal i bab-is Said Belli ɣef usaru-ines wezzilen “bab n Lpicakala”.

 Si tama nniḍen arraz amenzu n tamlilit ( meilleur rôle) yuɣal i usaru“ ccna n izeḍcen” n bab-is Mass Berkennou Ali. Ma yella d arraz n uzeffan ifazzen iṣaḥed Cherif Azrou yuraren deg usaru-agi. Am akken diɣ yuɣal warraz amenzu n isura wezzilen i usaru ‘ tiɣri n tsusmi”.

 Tazafent yewwi arraz amenzu d Sabrina akked Khadidja Amezyan yuraren tamezwarut deg usaru “ Tiɣeṛsi” akked usaru “ assegil”.

 Mass Berkennou Ali iṣaḥed-it-id diɣen warraz n siinaryu ifazzen ɣef usaru –ines “ ccna n izeḍcen”. Si tama nniḍen asaru imselɣet ( documenataire) ‘ tiɣri n tilawin”n Mass Sofiane Aaraichi d netta umi yuɣal warraz deg ṣṣenf –agi n sinima.

 Ma yella d arraz ameqqran “ isni n wewṛaɣ” iṣaḥed tarbaɛt yellan deffir usaru “ assigil’ id yessufeɣ mass Ouasih Abedelaziz. 

 Di taggara n tfaska tuɣal tajmlit i Mass Tarik cabbage” yellan i lmendad i tfaska-agi , am akken diɣen tella tmeɣṛa n uẓawan anda is tuɣal tajmilt i Matoub Lounes s lmendad n taɣect n tcennayt talmanit Uli Rohde id yecnan tizlatin n yitri n tmazɣa Mass Matoub Lounes, uqbel a tt-id yeḍfer ucennay Juba id yewwin ula d netta acḥal n tezlatin n unaẓur-nneɣ ameqqran.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Yal seggas, deg wass n 03 deg aggur n bujambar tettuγal tejmilt i yimaεder di 04 n tγemmar n umaḍal, imi yettewεeggen ad-yilli d ass agreγlan-nsen. Γef aya tiddukla n yimeεddar d  temzizelt n tinis n tabla ilfayda n yimaεddar n uγarbaz CMP n Wizgan. yemddukal-nsen n temnaḍt n Wizgan, tella di ttiεad imi id tessudes yiwet n tmeγra γef dema deg uγarbaz n yimaεder id-yezggan deg taddert n At Sidi Σmer, d tajmilt meqren i yuγalen i yimaεdar. Tamesbanit-agi ḥedren deg-s deqs n yinebgawen, am yimawlan n yimaεder id-yussan di tγiwanin yemgaraden, am Wizgan, At-Zikki, Imsuḥal, Ifiγa, Iεekkuren d tid niḍen, rnu kra n yemḍebren n tγiwanin. Maca, imawlan n yimaεdar, fursen tagnit, mlalen akked imejjayen n tnefsit d  yemḍebren n uγarbaz-agi, anda imeslayen γef ugguren  d iεewwiqen id-ttmagaren yal ass, am ayen icuden γer ttawilat n uṣiweḍ, laεḍil id-yettilin di laxlaṣ n yimaεdar. Si tama niḍen  ula d imaεdder begnen-d lγiḍ-nsen imi sḥasfen aṭas γef deqs n wugguren, anda isuturen zyada n tedrimt isen-d-ttakken yal aggur, asuter n yimukkan n lxedma d waṭas niḍen. Iwesmekti, tajmilt-agi tella-d s lemεawna n tfidiralit n waddal n yimaεder n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, anda id-sudsen tamesbanit n waddal, am tazla akked Γer tagar, imaεdder d yimawlan-nsen sutren izzarfan d uwennaε n tegnatin n tudert-nsen n yal ass, mačči n yiwen n wass.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Tettheggi Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel deg Bgayet i teẓrigt tis seddis n tfaska n uqennuc ansayan ara yilin ussan n taggara n wayyur n ɣuct i d-iteddun. Dɣa d tagnit akken ad tuɣal tejmilt i snat n temɣarin i aɣ-yeǧǧan taggara-a, Nna Taseɛdit d Nna Zineb, imi zgant ttbaddadent i yal tafaska n yiqennucen i d-tettheggi tdukkla. I lmend n waya, teɛna tiɣri akk tulawin n Ayt Smaɛel i iran ad kkint deg tedwilt n useggas-a, deg-s aḥraz n lɛada deg-s amennuɣ. Ilaq kan fell-asent, ad aznent ɣer uxxam n tdukkla kraḍ (3) n yiqennucen mgaraden, i yebnan s yideqqi, s wudem ansayan, send azemz-a: 15 ɣuct 2017. Tella tesqamut yessnen ara d-ifernen ayen yufraren seg wayen ixussen. Tid ara d-yufraren, ad asent-ttunefken warrazen, d asnemmer diɣ d asebɣes ɣef uwenneɛ n uqeddic n usider n tgemmi-a turtangawt. Imi seg zik n zik d tameṭṭut i yellan i lmend n uḥraz n tgemmi d yidles. « D ayen yelhan wayen i d-tettheggi tdukkla n Udrar n Fad. Aya, d ccan i yidles-nneɣ d ccan i nkenti. Ihi ilaq ad nekki s waṭas». D awal n yiwet n tmeṭṭut seg Ayt Smaɛel. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken ar tura asihar-a adelsan, d adigan kan, maca ɣer sdat yezmer ad yebdel uẓayer-ines, ad iḥaz tilisa ibeɛden n yidurar.

   M. K. 

  
 “Tamaziɣt mazal-itt di timawit. Ccna teṭṭef amkan d ameqran. Ma d tamedyazt ɣas akken nesεa imedyazen igerrzen, ifazen, maca ur nessaweḍ ara ad nejbed agdud-nneɣ. Qlil, ass-a, umdan ara yessiwḍen ad aɣ-d-iɣer asefru n tsuta-nneɣ, rnu mačči d idlisen i ixusen”

  Deg tazwara anwa i d Mass Ben Taleb Brahim ? 

 Lluɣ deg 20 yennayer 1947 deg taddart “Tiqiccurt», lεerc n At Wasif. Din i d-kkreɣ, ɣriɣ din alarmi d 1962. Syinna kemmleɣ deg Tizi Uzzu, Delles d tsedawit n Lezzayer 1973. Syin xedmeɣ d amessinen deg uɣlif n yilemẓiyen d waddal. Syin daɣen xedmeɣ d amassay n tsileɣt, tafrant d unekcum ɣer uxeddim (…). Qedceɣ d kra n tidukliwin tiɣelnawin n tmurt-nneɣ, alarmi d aseggas 1984. Lliɣ d ameltaɣ n Ugraw Imaziɣen n Paris (seg useggas n 1969) u d agdad asebbak n tsaɣent n yizerfan n umdan (1985) … Ma deg useggas n 1997, ffɣeɣ s tgellawt n tezwert…

  D acu i d tamentilt i d ak-yeğğan ad taɣeḍ abrid n tira ? 

 Ameksa mi ara yeqqim, ad ineğğer aεekkaz swayes ara yenher lmal-is. Nekk ttaruɣ I wakken ad sedhuɣ iman-iw, d win neɣ tin i iḥemmelen awal-iw d leqdic-iw. Ayɣer tira ? Alaxater siwa nettat ara d-yeqqimen.

  Ahat tadukli-k d Dda Lmulud d Muḥya i d ak-yellin allen i tira ? 

 Dda Lmulud, afud-is meqqer. D yiwen seg tgejda n tmussni n tmaziɣt. Rnu-d ɣur-s Dda Muḥend Arab uɣur nelmed tirrugza, am nekk am yimeddukkal-iw I yi-icuban. D tidet, imi tikti tamezwarut deg ubrid n tira, tusa-iyi-d seg wasmi I ɣriɣ ungal-nni «Mmi-s n yigellil» n Dda Lmulud n At Caban.

  I melmi tebdid tira s umata, ladɣa tamedyazt ? 

 Bdiɣ tamedyast am tezyiwin-iw di temẓi. Meḥsub asmi i d-bdant tlufa n ddunit, uguren n temẓi, lɣerba, tanessuft… D tamedyazt ideg uffiɣ ddwa d talwit.

  Acḥal n yidlisen i d-tessuffyeḍ yakan ? 

 Ar ass-a n wussan, suffɣeɣ-d yakan sebεa n yidlisen s tmaziɣt. Amezwaru isem-is “Timsal”. Ma d wis sin isem-is “Akala n ufaris n uceṭṭiḍ aqeṭni”. Ma d wis kraḍ isem-is “Tajerrumt n tmaziɣt s ccna», sazergeɣ-t-i-d snat n tikal. Ma ukuẓ d amawal n (40.000) n wawalen, uriɣ-t s snat n tutlayin, tamaziɣt -tafransist. Semmaɣ-as ‘’Ccix-iw’’, yerna sazergeɣ-t-i-d tlata n tikal. Ma d wis semmus, d amawal daɣen, semmaɣ-as “Amawal n tmeɣra s tmaziɣt”. Ma d wis seddis d “Amawal (6.000) n yinzan s teqbaylit”. Ma d aneggaru d amawal-nni n 90000 n wawalen, semmaɣ-as daɣen ‘’Ccix-iw’’. Uriɣ-t s snat n tutlayin, tamaziɣt / tafransist.

  S wacu n tutlayin i d-ffɣen ? 

 Am wakken yenna: J. Elmouhoub Amrouche : ɣas ttaruɣ s l’«A.P.I» ur zmireɣ ad ruɣ neɣ ad xemmeɣ siwa s teqbaylit. Ihi ula d nekk s teqbaylit i ttaruɣ, ula d idlisen-iw ffɣen-d s teqbaylit.

  Anwa adlis i d-ak-yuwin aṭas neɣ i yenzan aṭas deg ssuq ? 

 Idlisen i yi-d-yuwin aṭas neɣ I yi-ilḥan aṭas deg ssuq, d sin-nni n yidlisen: tajerrumt n tmaziɣt s ccna akked umawal-nni Ccix-iw (kter n 9000) imadyanen i yenzan.

  Ma nuɣal-d ɣer tmedyazt, acu n yisental iɣef tettaruḍ tamedyazt-ik ?  

 Isental iɣef ttaruɣ tamedyazt-iw, uwiɣ-ten-i-d seg tmetti-nneɣ taqbaylit, lḥasun mačči yiwen neɣ sin, gar-asen : tayri, tamaziɣt, timetti, tirugza…

  Amek i ilaq ad yili umedyaz ? 

 Amedyaz ɣur-i d amussnaw. Illaq ad iɣer ulawen n lɣaci, s awal-is ad ilawi, ad immel abrid ara nawi. Ilaq ad yili d amedya deg tmetti-ines, ɣur-s ara ttwalin medden i wakken ad ḍefren abrid-is.

   ara asen-tiniḍ i yimedyazen d yimyura imaynuten ? 

 Ur ttketiret ara awal, tameɣrut tettεawan ccfawat. Fukket asefru-nwen s yinzi akken ad as-alsen medden taɣuri. Ilaq s kra n wayen ara tarum, ad yesεu izen deffir-s. Ilaq daɣen ad tarum ayen swayes ara testenfeε tmetti-nwen. Ad asen-iniɣ afud igerrzen d tikli ɣer sdat.

  Ma nuɣal-d ɣer tira-k, yadra deg unadi ladɣa ɣef wawalen iqburen, neɣ imawalen i d-tessufɣeḍ, tufiḍ-d uguren ? Ḥkku-aɣ-d ɣef tiremt-ik deg leqdic-a ? 

 Uguren neğren abrid i umdan. Ttεawanen bab-nsen. Maca simal ttqellibeɣ, simal ttafeɣ-d u ttissineɣ idles n lejdud-nneɣ. Zehhuɣ, ferḥeɣ ɣef aya I bɣiɣ ad snezheɣ imerɣriyen-iw.

  Xas akken tettaruḍ tamedyazt, ungalen, maca tezwareḍ deg yimawalen, yadra i wacu ? 

 Sebba tamezwarut, imi agerruj-agi n lejdud-nneɣ skanayaɣ- d tadelsa d tɣerma n yimaziɣen. Tis snat imi imɣaren la ttmettaten u ttawin yid-sen kra din. Tis kraḍet, imi daɣen jmaɣ-ten-id i warraw n warraw-nneɣ akken ad ten-sqedcen, la ten-teẓẓuɣ, wa ad mɣin ma yebɣa Rebbi…

  D acu i d tamuɣli-k ɣef tsekla n udlis amaziɣ ? 

 Tamaziɣt mazal-itt di timawit. Ccna teṭṭef amkan d ameqran. Ma d tamedyazt ɣas akken nesεa imedyazen igerrzen, ifazen, maca ur nessaweḍ ara ad nejbed agdud-nneɣ. Qlil, ass-a, umdan ara yessiwḍen ad aɣ-d-iɣer asefru n tsuta-nneɣ, rnu mačči d idlisen i ixusen.

  Tamaziɣt tuweḍ ɣer uswir-is neɣ ɣer umkan-is i d as-ilaqen neɣ mazal ? 

 Mazal u mazal «Iḍul sanida ara nruḥ», maca akken yebɣu yili lḥal, nekkni ur nḥebbes ara. Iswi-nneɣ ad t-naweḍ i wakken, yal yiwen yal yiwet deg-nneɣ, ad ixdem ayen yessen d wayen yezmer.

  D acu tssewjaḍeḍ ɣer sdat ? 

 Nnig mraw d sin (12) n tsellayin i yigurdan d imawlan-nsen ur ttεeṭṭilent ara ad d-fɣent, aya s tmaziɣt. Ma s tefransist ɣur-i yiwen n wammud n tmedyazt n temẓi.

  Awal-ik n taggara… 

 Nekk seg wid-ak ismenyafen tigawt am tira, ɣefr lhedra n waḍu. Nettaru-d ayen nessen, win neɣ tin ibɣan ha-ten-in ɣur-s. Wid ibɣan xir n wakka, ad ten-id-yaru neɣ ad ten-id-yarrew. Ma segmeɣ lḥemdu Lleh, ma ḍelmeɣ staɣfir Lleh. Tanemmirt i uɣmis-agi-nwen ɣef leqdicat-is, tanemmirt i kečč daɣen a Abdelghani.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Tanmehla n yidles n temdint n lwilaya n Bgayet akked Tiddukkla Tadelsant Itri n Akbou, s tallelt n waṭas n yimεiwnen, gar-asen La Dépêche de Kabylie, suddsen-d timlilit tis mraw n tfaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt n Soummam, i d-yellan seg 22 alamma d 25 deg duğember 2016, deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen Abderrhmane Fares n Akbou, deg lwilaya n Bgayet. Timlilit-agi, gan-tt d tajmilt i sin n yimedyazen imeqqranen iqbayliyen: Mass Malek Houd akked Mass Salem Amrane. Ttiεad-agi, yebda s wudem unsib ass-nni n lexmis yezrin 22/12/2016 ɣef 14h 30m, deg Uxxam n Yilmeẓyen A. Fares s temlilit n d yimedyazen d umeslay sɣur kra n yimḍebbren d yiεeggalen n tiddukkla. Ґef 15h, yella-d usenεet n yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun “Jules César”, sɣur tarbaεt Asirem n Akbou. Ma ɣef 21h, tella-d temllilit gar yimedyazen d tesqamut n ufran. Ma deg wass-nni n sem 23 deg duǧember 2016 ɣef 10h, yella-d usarag n Zoulikha Moulai (d taselmadt n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit n Bgayet) s usentel «Asurif i d-telḥa tmedyazt taqbaylit deg umezruy d usnerni-ines». Ma ɣef 13h 30m, tella-d tmenna n yisefra sɣur Mass Salem Amrane, yetbeε-it-id uskasi sɣur wid iḥedren. Ma ɣef zzuğ d uzgen n tmeddit, yella-d uḥric amezwaru n temsizzelt n tmedyazt alamma d 19h, ma ɣef 20h 30m, yella-d usikaw adelsan ( d ameslay gar yiεeggalen n tesqamut d imedyazen ɣef talɣa, asusru, lebni n usefru…) deg Uxxam n Uselmed n Tẓuri.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>Ma d deg wass wis kraḍ 24 deg duǧember 2016, yella-d usarag n Massa Lynda Ouatah (d taselmadt n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit n Bgayet) s usentel «Tamedyazt n tmeṭṭut». Ґef 13h 30m, tella-d tmenna n tmedyazt sɣur Mass Malek Houd, yetbeε-it-id uskasi sɣur wid iḥedren. Ma ɣef 14h 30m, yella-d uḥric wis sin n temsizzelt n tmedyazt alamma d 19h. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella usikaw adelsan deg Uxxam n Uselmed n Tẓuri, am winna n wass-nni n lğemεa.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> Ma d ass aneggaru 25 deg duǧember 2016, tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i wid yettekkin deg temlilit-agi tis mraw, am wakken daɣen fkan arrazen i tlala i d-yufraren, akked d tmeɣra n taggara si 9h n ssbaḥ d asawen. Am wakken daɣen i d-yellan usenzi s ubuddu sɣur waṭas n yimyura d yimedyazen, ɣef teɣizi n 4 wussan-agi, nezmer ad d-nebder gar-asen: Ahcene Mariche, Adaoun Abdelghani, Yousef Harouni, Idir Bellali, Brahim Ben Taleb, Kenza Djourdjoura, Mohamed Nait Abdellah…atg. Ma d ayen yeεnan arrazen, llan-d tlata, i kraḍ n yimedyazen ara d-yufraren. Acu kan d arrazen imzumal (symbolique) kan imi iswi n temlilit-agi mačči d arraz, d asnerni n tmedyazt taqbaylit, ɣef leḥsab n yiεeggalen n tiddukkla-a tadelsant. Dɣa yal yiwen seg tlata-nni i d-yufraren, ad as-id-suffɣen kraḍ-nni n yisefra swayes i d-yufrar d adlis (ama i umezwaru ama i wis sin d wis kraḍ). Azal n 88 n yimedyazen i yemḥezwaren ɣef tlata n yimeḍqan imenza, usan-d seg ṭam n lwilayat: Tizi Uzzu, Tubiret, Lezzayer, Bumerdas, Blida, Sṭif, Tamenrasat d Bgayet. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli tiddukkla-agi “Itri Adelsan n Akbou”, tebda leqdicat-is s wudem unsib ass n 2 deg meɣres 1976. Ma d tafaska-agi, tebda deg useggas n 2005, yal aseggas yettili-d deg-s umaynut. Gar wayen txeddem tiddukkla-a yal aseggas ad naf tafaska n umezgun, tin tmedyazt, asfugel n Yennayer d 20 Yebrir…atg.

<p style="text-align: right;"><strong style="text-align: right;"> Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Ugar n 300 n terwiḥin n yizzayriyen i iruḥen d asfel ass n 17 deg tuber 1961 deg tmesbanit i d-yeḍran deg tmanaɣt n Fransa, Paris. Ass-nni, ssuturen yizzariyen tilelli s taɣect-nsen kan deg yiberdan, meɛna tqubel-iten-id Fransa s rsas

 Armi yeḍra wayen warǧin deg umezruy-is atrar. Akken i yeqqim yiḍ-nni n twaɣit, d uffir u d tacmat i talsa, ladɣa i Fransa. Armi ɛeddan ugar n 40 n yiseggasen i yebda i itekkes wadal ɣef twaɣiyin-agi n 17 deg tuber 1961. Itekkes uɣebbar fell-asent imi bdan ttarun kra fell-asent. Ula seg tama n Lezzayer, ur d-yelli ara umeslay fell-as s waṭas deg tazwara-nni n timunent imi ɣef wakken i d-qqaren kra, imḍebbren n yimir ur bɣin ara ad fken ccan ameqqran i wid yellan deffir n tnekra-agi. D iɛeggalen n tfidiralit n Fransa n FLN i d-yessawlen ɣer unejmuɛ i wass n 17 deg tuber 196, aya imi i d-yeffeɣ yiwen wulɣu sɣur imḍebber n yiɣallen n laman n temdint n Paris, maurice Papon, anda yegdel aḥewwes i yizzayriyen deg yiberdan n tmanaɣt akked leqrubat-is, deg yiḍ gar 20h ar 5H30. Ihi, tameddit n wass 17 deg tuber 1961, ugar 30 000 n yimdanen i d-yeffɣen s yiberdan n tmanaɣt n Fransa, Paris. Ffɣen-d am urgaz am tmeṭṭut, ffɣent ula tiwaculin s warraw-nsent imeẓyanen. Syin, ẓedmen fell-asen yiɣallen n laman n Fransa, u teḍra twaɣit. Azal n 327 n yimesbaniyen i yettwanɣan s rsas, rnu d luluf n yimejraḥ akked wazal n 15 000 n yimdanen i wwin ɣer lḥebs, mebla wid i d-nfan ɣef Lezzayer. Aṭas, diɣ, n tfekkiwin n wid ḍeggren ɣer wasif n La Seine i yufan umebɛed. I wacuɣer akk anect-a ? Sebba tameqqrant n waya, d leqdic ameqqran n tfidiralit n Fransa n FLN i yettɛawanen aṭas ṭrad n Lezzayer, imi i d-tejjamaɛ aṭas n yidrimen swayes tettɛawan amennuɣ deg tmurt. Ugar n 130 000 n yizzayriyen i yettbezziren imir. Amennuɣ ɣef tlelli n Lezzayer, yewweḍ ɣer tlemmsat n Fransa. Ihi, imḍebbren n yiɣallen n laman Fransa, ladɣa seg wasmi i yella ɣef uqerru-nsen Maurice Papon deg Paris, bɣan ad mḥun later n umussu-agi i yefkan afud ameqqran i tegrawla tazzayrit, seg tama, am wakken i tcewwel akken iwata tamanaɣt n Fransa, seg tama-nniḍen. Astqsi i d-yeqqim ar tura, amek tezmer Fransa ad tekbel ɣef twaɣit am ta ugar n 40 n yiseggasen : ur yelli win i tt-yewwin deg wawal, ama seg tama n tɣamsa, ama seg tama tasertit ?

  Hocine Moula 

  
 S yisem-a n “TV4“ i tettwassen s waṭas terga (chaine) tis rebɛa n tmaziɣt. Ass-a, ugar n sebɛa n yiseggasen segmi i d-tennulfa, yal yiwen amek i tt-yettwali d wamek i t-tejbed. Dɣa, ilmend n wayyur-a n remḍan i yekfan melmi kan, heggan-d yimḍebbren n terga-ya yiwen n wahil ara yeččaren uḍan n ɛawaz n wid yettwanasen lemri n tiliẓri. Yuɣ lḥal, ahat aṭas i yessaramen, ama d izeffanen (comédiens) neɣ d imferrǧen, lemmer zun tafarest (production) i d-yettilin meqrub remḍan, d usenɛet-nni, tecba winna n wussan nniḍen n useggas. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer yisura i d-iɛeddan deg remḍan, llan kra d inmettiyen (sociaux), llan kra d idelsanen, am wakken caḍen wid n unnecraḥ d taḍsa. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef tedwilt n usewwi n wučči, ɣas tehwa i waṭas n tlawin, maca ɣur wiyaḍ ula d azwel-is « Chef di tkuzint » yewwi-d yili yettwaseggem ugar ɣer tezwawt. Tadwilt n « Azrar n wass » i d-ilemden ɣer tinna n « Xatem Sulayman », ur d-ferrnen isteqsiyen n yidles amatu i yeɛnan medden merra. Ɣer 20sr30, tettɛedday-d tezrart « Bergaz », ideg i d-iban amzun yebɣa umsufeɣ-is ad d-yeg « Axxam n Dda Meẓyan » akken nniḍen. Dima yuder uswir imi wid yetturaren ttmuqulen kan amek ad sseḍsen, tefra tfukk. Meqrub 21sr00, tella tettɛedday-d tedwilt « Tixeffet n unecraḥ » d ayen yettwassnen s « lkamira yeffren », am tinna daɣen n « Almi d tura ». Dɣa, aṭas n medden i yesḥassfen amek seg tama d targa n tmaziɣt, seg tama ɛerrḍen-d wid ukud ara mmeslayen s tutlayt tayeḍ. Ɣur kra daɣen, asaru n « Asirem » yebɛed akken ad d-yaweḍ « Tinifift » ideg tella tmaziɣt d ucebbeḥ n wawal xersum. Nesteqsa kra n medden ɣef waya imi nwala yal wa yesɛa tamuɣli. Nebda-tt sɣur yiwet n tmeṭṭut deg Ayt Smaɛel. «Mi ara terẓeḍ remḍan, ad tebɣuḍ ad twaliḍ ayen iwatan, nekk d « Bergaz » i yi-d-yettqabalen». I d-tenna s ubhat. Ulama tuget n wid yettwalin targa-ya d tulawin neɣ d timɣarin, maca llan daɣen ula d ilemẓiyen d yimɣaren i yeṭṭafaren targa i ten-id-yettlaɛin s tmeslayt-nsen. Dɣa, yiwen n yimferreǧ seg Bgayet yebra-d i waya: «Nella nettmeslay ɣef yimasriyen, tura atan nɛedda-ten deg wurar adday !».

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Ilmend n ddurt n usmekti n wass amenzu n unbir n tegrawla n 1954 , imezdaɣ n taddart n Ulma Wagnan di tɣiwant n Yiɣram, ldin s wudem unsib timeqbert tamaynut i 40 n yimeɣrasen i d–tefka taddart n tegrawla n 1954. I lmend n waya, heggan-d yiwen n leqdic d amerkanti . Di tazwara, yella-d s usrusuy n tmuqint n yijeǧǧigen d dqida n tsussmi i usterḥem ɣef yimeɣrasen n tegrawla n 1954. Ɣer lehwi n 10h00, telli n yiwet n tzeqqa yettuheggan i timsikent ideg i d-seknen tṣawer n yimjuhad d yimeɣrasen n taddart d wiyaḍ-nniḍen akked kra n yidlisen d yimagraden yettwarun ɣef umezruy n tegrawla n lezzayer. Syin akin, yettunefk wawal i yimjuhad akked tulawin n yimeɣrasen; yal wa yefka-d taganit-is d cfawat ɣef umennuɣ n kra n umeɣras yessen di lawan-nni n tegrawla, am wakken i d-mmeslayen kra n yemjuhad i d-yussan di temnaḍin-nniḍen n tmurt ɣef umennuɣ i d-yeḍran deg udewwar n Yiɣram ddaw taddart n Yiɛemmuren deg unebdu 1958, ɣef i d-yemmeslay umjahed amyaru n umezruy Djoudi Attoumi deg udlis-ines ɣef umezruy n n lwilaya III. Yekfa leqdic i d-heggan Wat Ulma Wagnan s ufraq n kra n warrazen i twaculin n yimjuhad d yimeɣrasen d wid i d-yefkan afus n lemɛawna. Ad d-nebdar gar-asen imdebbar n luzin yaourt Soummam Lounis Hamitouch di lebni n tmeqbert-agi, am waken i ireggem s lebni n usalay ideg ara d-ttwajemɛen yimagraden , d iselsa akked d dduzan seqdacen yimjuhad di lawan-nni n tegrawla.”s yiwen n usalay am wa, asmi ara ifak, ad d-qimen cfawat n umezruy n tmurt-nneɣ d wansayen n lejdud—nneɣ i tsutwin i d-yettnekkaren akken ad zren ansi i d-kkan , I wakken ad asen-iban wanida teddun ‘’, i d-yenna Mass Sofiane Benkerrou d aɛeggal n lɛuqqal n taddart. 

<p style="text-align: right;">   Brahim Benhamouche  

<div> 
  
 Mi tekres , ttaḍnan iduḍan deg fettuy. Ulac tiyersi i iṣeɛben i tulya am tiyersi yurzen yixef. Ulac lehlak i iweɛran am ticki  d  “wayeḍ”  deg ubdil n  yiman-is. Lermi yettuɣal-as d aɛdaw, isem-is yezuɣur-it am yir aɛlaw. Timadit n umdan tesbedd rkiza-s ɣef “Nek” n yiman-is akked “ Nek’’ n tmeti-s tin deg i d-yefruri.  Mi yenqedwa wa, yegla s wa. Iɣisi yellan  yettak lemqud  i yiɣisan. Tiɣersi i d-yenulfan tesawel i tɣersiwin ad  d-yenulfun. Tajbirt d akellax, aslaɣ d asmerqaɛ. Lmenɛa, netta,  yettban d awezɣi.

  Anṣib   n wumdan yesruḥen  lǧera n yiman-is:  d lxiq akked ubqenaḍ. Xas nnig tmurt i teddu , ixef-is yekcem di tzuliɣin n wammus. “ Nek” ines yeblaɛ deg uzabuq n yilem. Afeggag ɣef wacu iẓeṭ  tudert-is, xerben wulman-is.  D tarigla n tizelgi i yesustuyen  lɣerza-s.  Deg allen n wallen-is, ala tugdi akked lweḥc i yesebraqen. Yedubbez  lebɣi deg ul-is. Wejir yurza asirem-is.

 Anwi i d netta?  D acu-t netta? Ansi i d-yekka ? S anda i teddu ( ma tidet yedda) ?  D tuttriwin ixebcen di lmux-is .  Xas akken yesteqsa, lejweb (xas ma yella) i tecceg ɣef yiles-is. Yezzi s weɛrur i tidet yellan.  Ibeddel taglimt s waglim, xas deg ul-is yeẓra  ayen iqedren isɣaren d-agelzim. Ccefra d leqdiɛ n ssif. Zebṛa d tablat  n lḥif. Afḍis d tiyita uɣilif. Awdec ma iḥur,  ayen i tt –iḥuren d lemhiba n bessif. Ur nuffi lḥebs iweɛran am  lqefs deg waḥlen  wallaɣen !

 Akka i tedra d wid yettraǧǧun anṣib deg alluḍ. Teḥfa tidmi. Nefqen-d ayen ur d- n-ttewwa. D awram n yir iɣsan wuɣur  iɣ-id sawlen. Yella di tmucuha:  “ffked awarum, ak rruɣ  s rrum”.  Tisedṣa ma ɣer Ɛica m yiɣden i tella , imeṭṭi ɣer Mḥend bu tkerciwt yugar . Nesla asmi id mlalen. Nejmaɛen , harden, nnan. Ayen ɣef acu nejmaɛen  allaɣ ur t-yegzi. Ayen id nnan lbal-nneɣ ur t-yefri.  Deg senqud n tqanuẓin , ala d imeweɣrad iḍ yefrurin. Arukti akken ad yalli ur d qqim deg aɛrak, tella-tt deg  iɣes ! 

 Aniwel ma tameɣra, tameɣra ur as neḥdir-ara. Aseɣret ma  d neqma, neqma ur as-mezmir ara. Zwin yifaden n widen yenwan. Rkan  ifurkawen n usaklu n laman. Amaynut  mi id yeflali, nuffa-t ziɣ  yif-it  watlef n yiḍeli. Anda ara tereḍ ay arwiḥ , kečč id sersen ass-a ɣer triḥ?

 Imɣaren izemniyen kecmen lhejna n tiderwect. Wa yesfilit wa  iqemeḍ deg ul  tafat. Nutni myezdin nekni nefraq. Nutni freqen-nneɣ nekni nezdi-ten. Tibernint ma temlleli, tuffa ssebba d tleqa, tettu  dnub n uffus  ijebden  ṭalqa. Telha tuzma ɣef allal, diri-tt ceḥna ɣef win yesqedcen allal. Yenna-tt umedyaz: “nekni mačči am madden!”. Asmi akken I n- teddu, abrid yeččeḥ mi t-nelḥa. Asmi akken nebrek  neqqim, abrid yewhem mi iten nugi. Tesleb tiselbi si tselbi-nneɣ. Anda ara tereḍ ay arwiḥ,  kečč id wwin ɣer ṭriḥ? 

 Hum u ɣum, rebbi aɛziz lebṣel qareḥ. Reffu d gma-s n deɛwessu. Muggad  uẓemẓum uḥḍim. Mačči d yiwen neɣ ssin n yifeṭiwjen i t-yeggunin. Xerṣum akka id qqaren wid yettraǧǧun  ad yekkes ɣef lbir lɣem.  Yella deg awal : “ a Briruc, ayen ik-yesebzgen aɣ-irruc”.Ɣef yiffer n leḥlu tuddem tiqit n sser, meɛna zik-nni. Iɛalaq-d uberwaq iles-is amzun akken yeddez yimmi-s. Awal mi yuɣal  d-askarkar, abeḥnuq n ṣṣwab  akin yekerkar.  Am ubeluḍ yeffer ucakar, ur iban d ibiw neɣ d leqhar. Anda ara tegreḍ ay arwiḥ, kečč iɛalqen ɣer ṭriḥ? 

 Jerri-tt neɣ anef-as kif kif !  Lmisa tebna ɣef lexdaɛ. “ Nekk “ ur neqqim d “ nnek” yedda d iḍuman. Iɣecta n nḥas zwin-t akkin berra n yixef-is. Abudu n temqas yuɣal d axxam-is. Awin i rrun a win yeḍsan kif-kif, xas lhem yezdi tizuraz-is. D awal newcem ɣer twenza asmi akken nella, iɣ-yerran gar lqum d teḍsa.  Zik niɣil  d umu dzent tfenza i yettun tikli  amek tega , ma tura iban:  d lebɣi umu yeɛraq lewhi. Mi yenza  yisem, ixef yetteǧǧwed leɛdem.  Ulac anda ara tegred ay arwiḥ, kečč yeddan mebɣir lebɣi ɣer triḥ!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid.  

  
 Seg wasmi immlal d mmi-s, Aɛmer isɛedday lweqt-is Meẓyen,. Teffɣen akken, tetten akken, keccmen-d akken am wakken Aɛmer yebɣa ad d-iɣremayen iɛeddan. Tarumit tḥus am wakken ḥuzan-tt di rrif. Ttɛeddin wussan, udem-is ittbeddil ɣef Meẓyen, tezga terfa u tettnaɣ d Aɛmer. Yal iḍ isell-asen Meẓyen mi ttnaɣen. Yiwet n tikkelt isla-as mi as-teqqar i baba-s tura xtiṛ gar-i d mmi-k. Azekka ssbaḥ ma ur iffiɣ ara seg wexxam xas ddem ula d kečč tabalizt-ik. Meẓyen yugad aṭas ɣef baba-s, ad yegri weḥd-s. Ur yebɣi ara ad as-yili d sebba n lmeḥna-s. Ikker ilsa, ijmeɛ lqec-is, iwwet-as ɣef tewwurt i baba-s yenna-as nekk aql-i ad ṛuḥeɣ issawel-iyi-d umeddakel-iw ad nruḥ deg yiḍ-agi ɣer lmuḍa leflani, ijuba-aɣ-d yiwen axeddim, issefk ad nili din ssbaḥ zik. Baba-s ifhem d acu yellan iḥewwet ad iqqim xerṣum ad yali wass, yugi. Iffeɣ-d Meẓyen ttnaṣfa n yiḍ srid ɣer Chatellet les Halles anda yuɣ tanumi ittɛezziṛ. D amkan di Paris, tamaneɣt n fransa anda ttemlilin ilmeẓyen d telmeẓyin n ddunit d-irezzun ɣer-s ad merḥen. Iḍ ilḥa mi yewweḍ ɣer umkan. Yufa ddunit akk teɛmer si lɣaci, tezher akk ddunit mačči am tmurt urɛad d-iɣli ṭlam ad nejmaɛen s ixxamen-sen ladɣa deg yiseggasen-nni n rrehba. Lɣaci zzin d tiseqquma dewren-asen i inaẓuren ttnezihen. Yal yiwen d acu ixeddem wa icennu, wa itturar agiṭar, wa iḥekku timucuha wa itturar d wid i as-id-dewren amezgun, yal wa d acu ixeddem. Zhan akk lɣaci, yal yiwen wa iqqim d ṛṛay-is i yiman-is. Iwweḍ Meẓyen alammi d yiwet n tseqqamut n yilmeẓyen d telmeẓyin i zzin d agraw i yiwet n teqcict tcennu tetturar agiṭar iqqim ittnezzih. Ixleḍ ucebbub awṛaɣ d uberkan sked tameslayt ur tselleḍ ara, taglizit, tafrensist, taspenyulit, taṭelyanit, tagrigit…Taqcict tcennu tizlatin s teglizit s tefrensist d tespenyulit…Tizlit deffir tayeḍ, ṣut-is aḥlawen ittak-d ddwa i umuḍin wid yettnezzihen. Mi teḥbes ad testaɛfu ad d-terr cwiṭ nnefs, Meẓyen iddem-d takakiḍt-is, ibda ad as-id-ijemmeɛ idrimen ɣer wid ittnezzihen, yal wa d acu n tepyist i d-yerra ɣer tkaskiḍt. Ifka-as-ten. Taqcict tefṛaḥ nezzeh s wayen ixdem Meẓyen, tuẓa-d ɣer-s tsuden-it tenna-as a tta-n tezlit-a ara d-cnuɣ tura di lxater-ik ay amelḥan. D tidet Meẓyen izyen iččur d sser d ayen kan, lqed llah ibarek d lqed usaru, tuyat d tihrawanin ur as teqqareḍ ara deg lḥif n udrar i d-ikker. Di ṣṣifa icba-d baba-s, d axemri, leɛyun d wallen tiberkanin. Leḥya d-ittbinin ɣef wudem-is tesmer-as di sser d ayen kan. Tin i t-iwalan ad t-tmenni i yiman-s, akka i qqarent tid i t-iwalan di tesdawit asmi iqqar. Taqcict, agiṭar gar yifassen-is, tezzi-d ɣer wanda iqqim Meẓyen, tedṣa-as-d terna tɣemza-as-id am wakken tebɣa ad as-tini sel-d i tezlit-agi…Tcennu-d, allen-is rṣant deg wallen n Meẓyen.

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Ass-nni n lğemεa ɣef 11h n uzal, i yebda umecwar n tikli deg udrar, i d-yellan deg tɣiwant n Yililten yetabaεen ɣer ladayra n Yiferḥunen, i ibeεden s wazal n 75 ikilumitren ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu.D leqdic i d-tettheggi yal aseggas tenmehla n yilmeẓyen d waddal (DJS) n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ideg ttekkin akk yixxamen n yilmeẓyen yellan deg wakal n temdint-agi. Acu kan, yal tikkelt anta tamnaḍt ideg i tt-xeddmen, dɣa tikkelt-agi iεeddan, xedmen-tt ass-nni n sem 25/11/2016 deg tɣiwant n Yililten.Ttekkint deg tikli-agi, tlata n trebuyaε i d-yusan seg kraḍ n yixxamen n yilmeẓyen n tlata n tɣiwanin-agi : Ait Aissa Mimoun, Tigzirt, Ouaguenoun. Tebda tmelḥiwt-agi seg taddart n Tirrurda armi uwḍen ɣer Uẓru n Ṭhur, lḥan azal n 35 ar 40 n yimdanen ɣef teɣzi n wazal n 20 n likilumiter, deg udrar zeddigen u cebḥen aṭas. Ma d akud n tikli-agi gar tlata n sswayeε d nnefṣ ar rebεa sswaye&amp;epsilon,; imi bdan tikli lewhi n 11h uwḍen ɣef 15h.Dɣa gar wid-ak yettekkin deg umecwar-agi n 20 Km, yella uselway n tiddukla tadelsant «Itri n Uzekka» n taddart n Ixelwiyen, d netta i d-yeddan d wid i d-iruḥen seg uxxam n yilmeẓyen «Dib Mouhamed» n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Nesenṭaq-it-id dɣa yenna-aɣ-d : «Ferḥeɣ aṭas s tikti-agi n tikli deg udrar, sarameɣ d tin ara d-yettilin yal aseggas. Imi nwala-d u nelmed-d deg ubrid-nneɣ aṭas n tɣawsiwin d tmussniwin, am wakken daɣen i d-nwala ccbaḥa n idurar-nneɣ ladɣa Aẓru n Ṭhur. Nesεedda-d ass deg teḍsa d tukksa n lxiq ɣef wulawen-nneɣ, d ttawil diɣen sways nexdem addal, mebla ma nfaq deg yiman-nneɣ…atg».

<p style="text-align: right;"> Amazigh Ghani

  Lḥedd, 19 degyunyu  

 d aɛiwed n ukayad n BAC. Tettwakkes Internet, uɣalenmedden d igujilen, d igugamen. Ass-a ara nẓerazalyesɛauẓeṭṭa-a degtmetti. Am umdan, winyebɣan ad yidir, yemmet. Ulaɣeflumt n Matoub, yella-d ujdid. Degyiwenwulɣu i d-tessufeɣtmeṭṭut-is, Nadia, ha-t-an ad tessiweḍHattabɣerccreɛ, ad as-d-tessufeɣlkar$ta. 

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   H Moula. 

  
 Anadi deg uḥric n tsekla taqbaylit s imal yettnerni deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura, ladɣa, ɣer yinelmaden n tesdawit. Akka, dɣa, ara naf uletma-tneɣ Drifa Fahem i yettarun deg Uɣmis n yimaziɣen s yisem D.Said Lhadj, telha-d s unadi ɣef tsekla taqbaylit deg yiwen ukatay n Master i d-qeddem deg tesdawit n Tubiret s lmendad n Mass N.Bellal.

 Akatay-agi, yewwi asentel : ‘’Ticṛaḍ n timawit deg tullisin tiqbayliyin. Amedya : ‘’Tuɣalin’’ n Ɛmer Mezdad’’. Anadi deg uḥric-agi d ayen ixussen aṭas daymi i yesɛa azal meqqren leqdic am wagi. Akatay-agi, yewwi-d awal ɣef wamek i yesseqdac Ɛmer Mezdad tasekla timawit deg tira-s. Ama d timucuha, inzan neɣ tumgist. I wakken ad tesselqay tnelmadt anadi-ines, teɛreḍ ad d-terr ɣef usteqsi agejdan i tefka deg tazwara : ‘’amek i d-ttbanent tecraḍ n timawit deg wamud n tullisin ‘’Tuɣalin’’ n Ɛmer Mezdad? Amek i d-yettili useqdec-nsent ɣer umyaru-a?

 yebḍa umahil ɣef sin n yiḥricen igejdanen: aḥric amezwaru, llan deg-s sin n yixfawen. Deg yixef amezwaru tebder-d tnelmadt kra n yiferdisen n teẓri (timiḍranin tigejdanin). Deg yixef wis sin, temmeslay-d ɣef usissen n wamud n umyaru. 

 Deg uḥric wis sin, tella-d deg-s tesleḍt.

 Deg taggara n umahil-a, tufa-d d akken amyaru yesseqdac tiwsatin yellan deg timawit d tiɣbula. Acu kan mačči s lekmal i yettuɣal ɣur-sent. Tiɣbula uɣur yettuɣal Ɛmer Mezdad, sɛant azal, tawuri akked uẓayer deg tmetti taqbaylit. Amedya: amusnaw, amedyaz akked ccix…atg. Tufa-d d akken amyaru yesseqdac aṭas tawsit n yinzan deg tullisin-a ‘’Tuɣalin’’. Maca aseqdec n tewsit-a, yettili-d s kra n talɣiwin. Yella anda i d-yewwi umyaru inzan-nni deg timawit akken llan , yexdem-asen kan akarif. Am wakken llan, daɣen, yinzan i d-yesseɣwel: ibeddel-asen deg umawal neɣ deg talɣa; llan yinzan i d-yesnulfa netta s timmad-is.

 Yuɣal umyaru ɣer kra n yizamulen n tgemmi n yidles n teqbaylit. Amedya: aseqdec n ’’uẓetṭa’’, ‘’ikufan’’d’’lfeṭṭa’’.

 Akka, ɣef wakken i d-tenna tnelmadt, s useqdec-a, yebɣa ad yessiḥbiber umyaru ɣef tgemmi n teqbaylit, am wakken, daɣen, yebɣa ad tt-yerr gar tigemmiyin tigraɣlaniyin.

 Leqdic am wagi, ɣef wakken i d-tenna tesqamut n uktazal, yezmer ad yili d amedya i yinelmaden, ladɣa wid-nni ara ikecmen deg uḥric n unadi. Ma d uletma-tneɣ Drifa Fahem, ha-tt-an, teggmen ad tkemmel deg unadi-ines am uxḍib-is, ameddakel-nneɣ Hakim, i yettheggi akka tura duktura-s. Afud igerrzen i sin yidwen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Tamehla n yidles  n Tizi-Wezzu tsudes-d aseggas-a yiwen n leqdic s wazal-is ilmend n wass aγelnaw n unaẓur id-yettuγalen yal ass n 08 yunyu, anda ijarden  yiwen n wahil d amesbaγur γef teγzi n 02 n wussan, d tijmilin i deqs n yinaẓuren n yeḥricen yemgaraden.

 Leqdic yebda ass n 06 yunyu anda i rran tajmilt i 11 icennayen n tarbeεt n uzawan atrar n leqbayel wigi «ABRANIS, AFOUS, AGRAW, DJURDJURA, IDEFLAWEN, IGENNADEN,IGOUDAR, IKHOULAF, IMAZIGHEN IMOULA, ISSOULAS, TAGRAWLA, YOUGOURTHEN »

 Dγa icennayen-agi s wayen sεan di tezmert-nsent almi d-sbanen ccna n teqbaylit, gan-as amḍiq ger cnawi n umaḍal, γas akken weεrit wuguren d-ttmagaren, xarṣum deg yiseggasen n lḥars 70 d 80 maca qublen tallit akken tella, dukklen afus deg ufus almi ṣawḍen sullin tizlitt taqbaylit tufrar-d ger tezlatin n tmura n lbarani. Dγa tabraḥt n leqdicat n wexxam n yedles n lmulud n at mεemmar, yesduri-d timzikniyin yemgaraden γef tudert d umecwar n tẓuri id-win, syen llant-d temliliyin tinigiyin. Ma yella deg ass n 07 yunyu i yellan d ass wis ssin n leqdic, tuγal tejmilt i yiwen n wejgu n ccna ssinima n teqbaylit, wagi d  AZEDINE MEDDOUR akked d 14 n yinaẓuren i yetturaren deg usaru-ines Adrar n Baya i yeseklas deg temnaḍt n Wizgan (Bouzeguène) i tewwi tmettant deg ṭarḍeq n yiwet n lbumba isaxdamen deg sekles n usaru-agi, deg seggas n 1995. Tajmilt-agi yesduritt-id tzeqqa n ssinima n Tizi-Wezzu s leḥdur n twacult n tẓuri. Yelha ma yella nebder-d anaẓur xersum s tewzel n wawal acku akken nebɣu newwi-d awal fell-as, ur nezmir ara ad d-nezzi yakk ɣef wayen yexdem. Taẓuri d lebḥer lqayen, d lebḥer wessiεen, ur yezmir yiwen ad t-yelḥeq akken yebɣa. Ihi taẓuri d tafat n wallaɣ, d iṭij n wass, d tiziri n yiḍ, d tilelli n wemdan. Taẓuri tessakay amdan yellan yeɣfel, tettak tisura swayes ara ldint tiwwura n unekcum s wulawen anda teẓẓun tayri. Taẓuri ur tesεi ara tilisa, tessengugga idurar, tzegger lebḥur, tcerrig igenwan, ur tettağğa amḍiq, yal tiɣmert di ddunit tewweḍ-itt. Anaẓur yessen d acu i d azal n tẓuri, yeẓra d acu i ilaqen ad t-yernu i tussna n tẓuri ara iɣellten wid yessaramen ad ifriren gar leğnas. Anaẓur yettḥussu, d anafray, ismendag allaɣ-is, iẓemmi-t akken ad iniwel taẓuri swayes yezmer ad d-icekti, ad yessufeɣ afrayen-is, syen ad yezreε tamusni-s d tẓuri-s.Taẓuri d tilleli, ur tcudd ara ɣer yiwen n umḍiq, tleḥḥu, tessuruf tilisa, trezzef si wa ɣer wa, ur tkeffu ara deg-s lɣella, ur tesεi ara taggara. Dima yettlalay-d umaynut ɣef umaynut. Maca i tmurt-nneγ izerfan n unaẓur ulac-iten, sarwaten ttεebin wiyaḍ, teḍra yid-sen am tcemmaεt, trreq tettfaka tettak tafat i wiyaḍ. Ihi anaẓur yuklal ayen yugaren tajmilt-agi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Teḍra-d rreḥba taɣelnawt tis7 n lḥirfat tiqburin seg 18 ar 23 deg waggur-agi i deg-i nella. Timlilit i d-ihegga useqqamu aɣerfan akked texxam n lḥirfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tella-d deg umraḥ ‘’Colonel Mohend Oulhadj’’ n temdint n Tizi Uzzu.

 Ugar n 150 n yimdanen i d-yusan deg 36 n lwilayat i ittekkin deg temsikent-a. Ussan-d seg usamar am Qsnṭina, deg umalu am Wehran, deg unẓul am Tmenɣast mebla ma nettu lwilayat n ugafa, Tizi Uzzu, Bgayet, Blida, Lezzayer…atg

 Ma ɣef yiswiyen n rreḥba-a, yenna-d Mass BERKI Abdelkrim, anemhal n texxam n lḥirfat n Tizi Uzzu : ‘’iswi amezwaru yeɛna tadamsa. I wakken ad tdum lḥirfa, ilaq bab-is ad yesnuzu ayen ixeddem. Tagi d tamezwarut. Tis snat, nefka tagnit i yinaẓuren i wakken ad mlilen u ad myussanen gar-asen. Ad mmeslayen ɣef wuguren-nsen akked tifrat i zemren ara yilin sya d afella. Tis tlata, d taswiɛt, diɣ, i yimezdaɣ i wakken ad issinen taẓuri n tmurt n lezzayer akken tella.’’

 Nnan-d wiyaḍ :

 Tiddukla n tlawin n tuddar : “d ayen yelhan. D taswiɛt anda ara nefk azal i leqdic n tlawin n tuddar xas ma ur d-yelli ara usnuzu s waṭas.

 Imeḥbas n Tizi Uzzu : taẓuri-agi, yesnulfa-tt-id yiwen daxel n lḥebs, syin nesselmed-itt i wiyaḍ. Akka tura aṭas i tt-ixeddem. Idrimen n wayen yenzan, yettawi-ten bab-is”

  Yiwen seg Biskra : “ imezdaɣ n tmurt n leqbayel, tturebban dayen kan. D tikkelt tamezwarut i d-usiɣ ɣer da, dayen igerrzen”

 Qsenṭina : “tanemmirt i yimḍebbren akked yimezdaɣ n Tizi Uzzu i aɣ-yessereḥben akken iwulem”

 Ɣardaya : “nekk, uɣaɣ tanummi dagi. Ttekkiɣ deg yal rreḥba. Uɣaleɣ d Aqbayli. Zureɣ-d akked tudrin n leqbayel.”

 Busɛada : “yelha, ad nemyussan gar-aneɣ. Acu kan ixus ciṭ deg uheggi-agi. Imdanen ur d-usin ara s waṭas acku ur slin ara, ahat. “

 Adrar : “ciṭ n usnuzu kan i yellan. Tanemmirt i wid i aɣ-d-inecden.“

 Tamenɣast : “imezdaɣ n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ḥedqen aṭas. Sterḥiben akken ilaq s yinebgawen-nsen. Freḥeɣ imi lliɣ dagi.”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Yettkemmilen leqdic adelsan deg yiɣerbazen d tesnawiyin n Tizi Uzzu, ama seg tama n temsizliyin i d-yettilin ɣef leqraya, i d-ixelqen amhezwer d anwi inelmaden ara d-yufraren akked anta tasnawit neɣ aɣerbaz, ama daɣen d addal iwumi i fkan azal d ameqqran i usnerni n wallaɣ n unelmad d uḥareb ɣef tfekka-s d tezmert-is.

 Addal-a, akken i d-nnan yimḍebbren, d ayen yessenqasen ccwal deg yiɣerbazen. Gar temsizliyin i d-yellan deg wuraren yemxalafen, am ddabex n uḍar, ddabex n uqecwal, ddabex n ufus d tciret n ufus, yella-d ass n 18 deg yebrir yezrin wurar gar tesnawiyin d yiɣerbazen n Tizi Uzzu. Ha-t-an amek i d-ufraren i wakken ad ɛeddin ɣer temlilit n tama n Boumerdes : 1-aɣerbaz amenzu M. Ou Rabah, Iguersafenes ; 2-aɣerbaz alemmas n Djennai Agoussim, Illoula oumalou ; 3-aɣerbaz Kaci Mohand, Freha ; 4-tasnawit Sahoui Aldjia, Azazga. Ma d ass n 26 deg yebrir 2017, uraren ddabex n ufus, ufraren-d yiɣerbazen-agi : 1-tasnawit n Tassaft Akbil, Ain El Hammam. Ma d sin i d-yeggran tasnawit n Chihani n Azazga d uɣerbaz alemmas n Souamaa, Mekla, wwin talɣuɣa n Tizi Uzzu, ad ɛeddin yiwet ɣer wurar uqbel taggara deg Boumerdes , wayeḍ ɣer wurar n tama n Bouira. Ass n 26 deg yebrir, daɣen uraren ddabex n uqecwal, ufraren-d akka : 1-aɣerbaz alemmas Oukal Azib Ahmed, Tizi Uzzu ; 2-Tasnawit n Beni Douala ; 3-aɣerbaz alemmas Halliche Said, Tizi Uzzu. Wigi, ad ɛeddin ɣer wurar n tama n Boumerdes. Ass n 27 deg yebrir 2017, uraren ticiret n ufus, ufraren-d wigi: 1-aɣerbaz alemmas Kaci Mohand, Freha ; Tizi Uzzu ; 2-aɣerbaz alemmas Bekkar, Tizi Uzzu ; 3-Tasnawit Ben Boulaid, Ain El Hammam ; 4-Tasnawit Abane Remdane, Tizi Uzzu. Wigi, ad ɛeddin ɣer wurar n tama n Boumerdes. Akka, leqdic mazal ad ikemmel ass n 07 anda ara uraren yiɣerbazen imenza timlilit n hand balle+kids athletect. I usmekti, uraren akk i d-yeḍran, llan-d deg tzeqqa tameqqrant n umenzu n unbir ( 1er novembre). Isallen-agi yefka-ten-id Mass Boukhalfi imdebber ɣef leqdic n waddal aɣurbiz n Tizi Uzzu d Mass Ali Ahmed d anemhal n leqdic adelsan deg tenmehla n Tizi Uzzu. Sḥssfen aṭas yimḍebbren-a ɣef kra n yinemhalen n yiɣerbazen d tesnawiyin ur nqeddec ara, ama deg waddal neɣ ayen yerzan nfeɛ n yinelmaden d lfayda-nsen. « Ttwalin yinemhalen-a dakken leqdicat-agi d adegger n lweqt » i aɣ-d-nnan. Ɣef wakken qqaren yimussnawen, addal yesrusuy leɛqel, yessenqas ccwal deg yiɣerbazen.

  Z.A.Y 

  
 Neẓra merra belli lqidar n tamemt i d-yettwakkasen seg teɣrasin yenqes almi dayen deg umaḍal merra iseggasen-a ineggura ladɣa. Imi llan ula d wid ixesren deg-sent, i ur d-ntekkes ula d akilu. Ladɣa wid ikeccmen ulzuz (marché) xeddmen tanezzut.Imrebbiyen n ubɛuc-a deg yettaf umdan abaɣur, zgan ḥaren ɣef wayen i d-yewwi ad gen deg teswiɛt-nni akken ad d-tuɣal lfayda, skud akken xedmen xesren. Maca, ɣas ahat deg tefsut-a ur yelli d aṭas n tamemt i d-kksen tuget, sey-a ɣer unebdu ttwalin yella usirem d ageɛmir belli tizizwa ad d-heggint ddeqs seg uɛenqud-nni ɣef waṭas n sebbat. Yiwet seg-sent imi tezher tefsut akken iwata ladɣa deg yidurar ɛlayen. Tizizwa ufant tagnit i ḥemmlent i leqdic ideg zemrent ad wennɛent, imi agama iferreɛ-asent-d iɣallen s yal asenf d ajeǧǧig. Sebba nniḍen, d mi d-iban urwent tzizwa, ftint deg waṭas n teɣrasin. Ihi simmal ttciḍent tqeddacin, simmal yettili-d uxdam n tamemt ugar, akken iwata. Awi-d ukan ur ṭṭuqquten yindaren n tmes send tawala-nni, ed yir iɛdawen am tnulya ed tnejdamin. Ma d tamentilt tis kraḍ, teɛna kan wid ur d-nekkis tamemt deg tefsut-a, akken ahat ad tt-ǧǧen i tzizwa ma yeḍra-d srant-as. Dɣa, widak i ur nḥuza taɣrast deg tefsut-a, nwan ad afen ddeqs n wayen ara d-kksen d tamemt sey-a ɣer unebdu, neɣ alama yewweḍ-d umwan.Aya, ad yili s waṭas n nnfeɛ ula i uɣerman, ma neẓra ad tsub ssuma n ukilu neɣ n litra n tamemt!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Deg yiwen n wulγu i d-ssufγen yiselmaden n tmaziγt n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu yennejmaεen ass-nni n 28 deg tuber akked sandika CPAPEST-E, nnan-d d akken ad ḥebsen γef lxedma ass 12 deg unbir 2014 u ad d-tili yiwet n temlilt d ibeddi sdat n tmehla n leqraya n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ass-nni dγa. Σlaḥsab n yiselmaden-a, ad d-yili wanect-a imi timlilit i d-yellan gar sandika CNAPEST akked unemhal n leqraya n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu ur d-tegli ara s ujdid xas ulamma iṛeggem-asen yimḍebber n leqraya i wakken ad yefru kra n temsal i t-yeεnan meεna deg unnar ur yelli wacu yeḍran. ‘’Yewεed-aneγ unemhal n leqraya d akken s kra n uεewwiq i d-xelqen yinemhalen n tesnawiyin, ad t-kksen u bab-is ad yettwaḥaseb fell-as. Llant temsal i t-yeεnan netta, am wakken llant temsal-nniḍen i d-yenna zgant-d nnig-i, ladγa ‘’Tamaziγt d tutlayt tunṣibt’’, neγ aḥettem n uselmed-is. Meεna, ar tura d awal kan, ur yelli kra yellan.’’ Akka i aγ-d-yenna yiwen gar wid iḥeḍren timlit-a. Liḥala n uselmed di tesnawiyin n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu mačči d tin yessefraḥen. Aṭas n wuguren i d-ttmagaren yiselmaden n tmaziγt seg useggas n 1995 ar tura. Amur ameqqran n yiεewwiqen-a xelqen-ten-id yinemhalen n yiγerbazen ladγa anda llan yiselmaden  ijdiden. Ayen yessawhamen, di&amp;gamma,; d akken uguren-a llan kan di tudrin d temdinin-nniḍen ulac-iten di temdint n Tizi Uzzu anda amur ameqqran n  yinelmaden ttmeslayen taεrabt !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Ass n letnin 12 di yennayre yufa-d lḥal isebtar n teqbaylit, i wumi tga La Dépêche de Kabylie irebbi, ssawḍen setta n yiseggasen di tudert-nsen.  Lulen-d isebtar-a d-itefɣen  tikkelt di ddurt (yal letnin), di yennayer 2959. Aya yella-d s lebɣi d “tɣennant” n yimḍebren n La Dépêche de Kabylie d ubegges n wid d tid i ibedden akken ad-aɣ-cebḥen yal ddurt  “Aɣmis n yimaziɣen”.  Ihi, amulli-agi wis setta d tagnit akken ad nini “amulli ameggaz!” wa ad nesnemer : Hamid, Akli, Dalila, Hocine, Malika,  Zénia, Mokrane, Salim,  Islam, Rachid (n Montréal). Ur ntettu ara daɣen wid d tid yelḥan yid-neɣ amecwaṛ, uqbel ad ten-cuden lecɣal nniḍen : Zira, Djamal, Drifa, Fatima, Smail. Ad nesnemmer daɣen, et surtout, timeɣriyin d yimeɣriyen-nneɣ i d  aɣ-yettraǧun yal ddurt. Ad asen(t)-nini tanemmirt ɣef ufud i d aɣ-d-ttakem(t) d tebratin i d aɣ-d-ttaznem(t).  Tanemmirt u afud i igerzen i yinelmaden d tenelmadin  n tesdawiyin yixtaren isebtar n teqbaylit d asentel n leqdicat-nnsen. Yennayer merbuḥ ! Teɣzi n leɛmer i yisebtar-a ara yuɣalen yiwen wass d aɣmis s lekmal-is !

<p style="text-align: right;"> T.OA 

  
 Mebɛed mi temyaɛaddal tarbaɛt n JSK akked terbaɛt DRBT, yiwen ɣer yiwen deg unnar n Tizi Uzzu, mačči d yiwen neɣ d sin n yimferǧen n JSK i yessteqsayen ɣef ssebat i yeǧǧan tarbaɛt am ta tettaṭṭaf yir amekkan, yal aseggas, deg telɣuɣa tazzayrit n ddabex uḍar.

 Ma nwala, aseggas-agi kan, 6 n temliliyin i turar deg unnar n umenzu n unbir n Tizi Uzzu mebla ma terbeḥ ula d yiwet. Aṭas n yimḍebbren i yessaḍlamen anefray ass-nni n temlilit, acu kan mačči d yiwet n tikkelt neɣ d snat i wakken ad nner akk ṭṭlima ɣef unefray xas ulamma ula d netta itecceḍ sya ɣer da. Seg tama n yimyuraren, ad naf d akken nutni sseḍlamen asleɣmay. Yal tikkelt llan wid i d-yettnekkaren mgal-is. Tikkwal ssawaḍen taswiɛt alamma terkem. Syin, yettban ubrid-is. ‘’Ṭṭlima yellan ɣef uccen, rran-tt-id ɣef uyaziḍ. Skud ara ssḍelmen iman-nsen nutni, imyuraren la sseḍlamen wiyaḍ’’ i d-yenna yiwen umferreǧ n tarbaɛt n JSK. Ula seg tama n yimyuraren iqdimen n tarbaɛt n JSK, amur ameqqran deg-sen, ssḍelmen imleɛben n tarbaɛt-a. deg yiwen wulɣu i d-yura yiwen deg-sen deg Internet, yenna-d :’’ imyuraren-agi n tura, ur leɛben ara s nnif, ur tturaren ara seg wul-nsen. Mačči am nekni asmi nella deg tarbaɛt n JSK. Nḥemmel tarbaɛt-a, ur netturar ara ɣef yidrimen am wakka tella tura. D tamsalt n nnif, JSK d azamul n Leqbayel’’. Llan kra yerfan nezzeh, ssawḍen armi i d-nnan ur ilaq ara ad ruḥen yimferǧen ɣer unnar mi ara telɛeb JSK, i wakken ad walin azal tesɛa tarbaɛt-a. Lḥasun, amur ameqqran n yimferǧen, sseḍlamen imyuraren ugar n uselway Hannachi, xas ulamma aṭas deg-sen i yebɣan rrwaḥ n yimḍebber-agi amezwaru. Aya, yettban-d deg wwassaɣen n ddir i yellan gar yimferǧen d Hannachi. Seg tama-s, aselway n JSK, yenna-d imferǧen ittergimen deg unnar, ur ten-neḥwaǧ ara. Ilaq-asen ad ttɣimin deg uxxam. Ɣef wakken i d-qqaren, ɣef rregmat-agi, dɣa, i yebɣa ad iruḥ umyurar Rial seg tarbaɛt n JSK imi kksen fell-as sser seg temlilit-agi taneggarut. Amyurar-a, yettuneḥsab ɣer usneɣmay i iruḥen, Mouassa, d aɣbalu n wuguren, d netta i d ssebbat n rwaḥ n yimyuraren yeṭṭaxren seg terbaɛt n JSK. Xas ulamma d amyurar iwulmen i terbaɛt n JSK, meɛna imḍebbren n terbaɛt-a, ɣef wakken i d-yeffeɣ lexbar, ur tettaṭṭafen ara ma yebɣa ad iruḥ. Ha-t-an Hannachi la d-yettnadi wayeḍ. Seg tama n usleɣmay, Hiddoussi, taswiɛt ur teẓmik ara dɣa mliḥ imi yelha wamek turar JSK, tuklal 3 tenqiḍin. S wawalen-a i yeɛreḍ ad isebber aselway Hannachi i izeɛfen nezzeh taggara n temlilit-nni gar JSK akked DRBT. Acu kan, iṛeggem ad d-yaf tifrat i twaɣit-agi i deg i tella tarbaɛt-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine Moula 

  
 Akken i am-ihwa a tameṭṭut ! Sewjed-it-id, sima ad saliɣ tirni ad n-aliɣ ad ččaɣ.Kkes aɣbel ay argaz, ad t-in-tafeḍ iwjed.Tameṭṭut-nni tuɣal-d s axxam tessew sardin-nni tečča-t d yilemẓi-nni. Mi d-yewweḍ urgaz-is, issers iman-is ad yečč sardin, tameṭṭut tessers-as-id ayen niḍen. Yenna-as urgaz-is :I sardin-nni a tameṭṭut, aɛni ur t-tsewweḍ ara !

 D acu n sardin ay argaz ?

 Win akken i d-tleqḍeḍ mi kerzeɣ !

 Sussem ay argaz ! Wi aɣ-id-isellen ! Wakka i teẓriḍ ikerrez-d di lexla sardin ittidiren di lebḥur!

 Argaz igugem, iskadeb iman-is isussem, iqqim ičča ayen illan sdat-s ssyin iffeɣ ɣer tejmaɛt. Tluɛa ilemẓi-nni yellan di teɛrict, yuder-d tenna-as :

 Yak tesliḍ-d akk ayen i nemmeslay nekk d urgaz-iw !

 -Sliɣ akk i wayen tennam !

 -Ihi tura, kemmel kan abrid-ik, qeddem ad tlemdeḍ. Ilemẓi-nni iffeɣ, ikkemmel abrid, ileḥḥu, imugger-d yiwen n umɣar yenna-as :

 -Ssbaḥ lxir ay amɣar n lbaraka!

 -Ssbaḥ lxir a mmi, anda akka i tettedduḍ mi akka teɣsbeḍ deg yisurifen ?

 Iḥka-as akk tadyant-is d wayen idder segmi d-iffeɣ seg uxxam. Yenna-as umɣar :

 Ihi a mmi tura uɣal kan s axxam. Mi tewwḍed ini-asen i iɛeggalen-ik, a tt-n yiwen useklu di lmuḍa n leflani isɛa uruz, ayen i as-tsutreḍ ad ak-id-yini meqbuleḍ. Ayen-nni ad-d-iḍru s tidet. Acukan mi i asen-tiniḍ kker zik zwir-iten ɣer din, kcem, ffer deg uruz-nni. Ayen sutren, qqar-asen-d kan meqbuleḍ. Yuɣal ilemẓi-nni s axxam iḥka-asen i wat uxxam inna-asen ufiɣ yiwen n useklu annect-illa-t di lmuḍa n leflani, isɛa uruz, ayen i as-tesutreḍ ad d-iḍru ! 

 Yettkemmil…

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Am wakken i yella deg wahil n tneɣlaft n usegmi Massa Nurya Benɣebrit, ad ɛeddin ussan-a, seg umenzu armi d 15 yulyu, yiselmaden imaynuten deg usileɣ n send beddu unsib n usɣer deg tuɣalin tiɣurbizin i d-iteddun 2017/2018. Yelha ad d-nesmekti dakken ilemẓiyen-a ara yuɣalen d iselmaden seg wayyur n ctember, d wid yellan wwin-d yakan amsizwer ilindi, maca ttwasersen deg wumuɣ n uraǧu alama i d-llan yimukan, akken i d-yewwi uɣlif n usegmi . Ihi tura yeffeɣ ssber-nsen ɣer tafat imi asen-d-ssawlen am wakken i asen-ṛegmen tazwara. « Aṭas-aya nekni nettgani taswiɛt am ta mbeɛd iseggasen n ulemmud d tɣimit war axeddim. Seg tama-nneɣ ilaq ad ngerrez amahil ». I aɣ-d-tenna yiwet n tlemẓit i yeɛna uselmed. Ɣef wayen yeɛnan tamaziɣt, ttwaldin kra n yimeḍqan d ijdiden i lfayda n wid i ttuɣ ttraǧun s ugerdas axeddim, maca ad yeqqim d drus maḍi ɣef wawal n yimeɣnasen d yiselmaden. Mazal ur tesɛi ihi amḍiq iwennɛen deg wakal-is.

  M. K. 

  
  Ttlata, 28 yunyu.  Yerwi-tt Zedek deg Wat Wagennun. D tajmilt i bab n wawal-a‘’Si Tqubɛin ɣer Wat Ziki, idles-nneɣ d anagi…’’. Meqqar netta iḥewwes ɣer Boudjima, wamag timerrit terwi deg tmurt n leqbayel ɣef wakken i d-yenna unemhal-is n Tizi Uzzu. Xas aḥewwes yelha, lemḥadra, diɣ, telha. Akken kan yebda lebḥar, yečča sin yimdanen.

  Larebɛa, 29 yunyu.  Alaṭif, temmut daɣen yiwet n temnifrit deg ‘’la clinique’’ Sbihi. Ma d ’’aman llan, meɛna yewɛer usiweḍ -nsen ɣer yixxamen imi xussen ttawilat akked yixaddamen.’’ Akka i aɣ-d-yenna unemhal n ADE n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Ula d aselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yemmeslay-d ɣef wugur-agi deg yiwen udewenni. Mačči am uselway n tɣiwant n Guerrouma n lwilaya n Tubiret i staxren imi yeḥkem fell-as ccreɛ s sin n yiseggasen n lḥebs. D asmekti n Slimane Amirat akked Boudiaf.

  Lexmis, 30 deg yunyu.  Teffud Tizi Uzzu. Nnejmaɛen i wakken ad as-d-afen, ahat, tifrat imi ala yiwen ɣef tlata i yettxellisen tafaturt-is. Ad neqqim kan daxel n waman imi tura tzemreḍ ad truḥeḍ ɣef lbabur seg Bgayet alamma d Marseille. Ula d Ali Amrane yusa-d ɣer uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri. Yerwi-tt am leɛwayed-is. Ma d asleɣmay ajdid n yerbaɛt taɣelnawt n Lezzayer, la d-yeqqar d akken yumen s’’Mondial’’ i d-iteddun. 

  Ssebt, 02 deg yulyu.  3 n yimdanen i yenɣan iman-nsen deg waggur-agi n remḍan deg tama-agi n yiɛeẓẓugen. Yiwet d taqcict ur neqbil ara lehlak-is imi i as-nnan ma ur temmuteḍ, ad tedreɣleḍ. Ass-a i ikemmel ukayad-nni n 20% n uselmed i d-yewwin tira. D thara n yigerdan deg yal tama, seg Souk El-tenine ar Chemini, ladɣa, ass-a n 27 deg remḍan. 

  
 Imezdaɣ n temnadt n tiliwa yetabaɛin ɣer tɣiwant leqsar di tubiret ɣelqen lemqer n tɣiwant ddurt-agi iɛeddan tlata wussan (letnayen , tlata , larebɛa ) sebba liḥala ideg ttidiren d lexsas n waṭas wallalen n tudert i yerwan lḥif acḥal d iseggasen -aya ttrajun iṣenfaren unegmu ara d -iḥazen taddart nsen , d acu kan ayagi ur d-yelli ara dayen iten-yeǧǧan ad d- sbegnen lɣid nsen zdat n tɣiwant iwakken ad asen-slen imḍebren teɛna temsalt gar-asen aselway usqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant , Ma yella d lexsas n wallalen-a akked wugguren i četkayen lexsas n waman di temnadt-a imi ur d-ttasen ara yal ass ḥaca tikelt di ddurt ɣef waya yettilid lexsas usafar-a ladɣa deg ussan unebdu d lḥamu ,Rnu ɣer waya daɣen yella-d wugur n tnezduɣt anda ssuturen s tnezduɣin imi llan kra n twaculin ar ass-a d wussan ur d-sfaydint ara acḥal d iseggasen iɛeddan mazal tiwaculin -a zedɣnt deg yixxamen bɣan ad aɣlin xerben akk ttazal d aman ladɣa di cetwa , am wakken ssuturen s uzideg n temnadt nsen , Ssuturen daɣen trisiti iberdan imi taddart-a tusad ger yidurar yeɛlayen tebɛed ɣef tɣiwant . Meḥsub akk d iɣublan d wuguren iten-yeǧǧan ttidiren di yir liḥala di tmeddurt nsen yerna maci d tikelt tamezwarut anda id -sbegnen lɣid nsen imi xeddmen timesbaniyin acḥal n tikwal ameɛna ur d-iban yiqiḥ , ma d tikelt-a ssuturen s tifrat s lɛejlan i wuguren-a iten-ixenqen am wakken ssuturen seg yimḍebren ad d-rren lwelha nsen ɣer tama-agi s yiṣenfaren unegmu . <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Abdelhak Menas 

  
 Seg wass-a mazal-ak-d 20 n wussan gedged ay anelmad akken ad tesɛeddiḍ akayad n Bakalurya, i ara ak-yeldin tiwwura n tesdawit i useggas amaynut. Imi neẓra-k ad tiliḍ tura theggiḍ seg tama n ulmad (aḥfaḍ) ed uɛiwed (arajaɛ), nefren ad ak-d-nemmeslay deg umagrad-a ɣef tnefsit ladɣa. Ad ak-d-nawi kra n waqqayen (points) igejdanen i yelha ad tḍefred ilmend n ttiɛad-a n wass n 29 n mayu-ya.

  Senɣes taɣuri tesgunfeḍ cwit:  Yettuneḥsab ɛeyyu gar yiɛdawen imenza n win ara yesɛeddin akayad. Imi aneggaru-ya ilaq ad yesɛu akk tizemmar n wallaɣ-is bac ad d-yefka kra. Ihi ur ḥerres ara iman-ik tura mi d-yettqarab ttiɛad. Mara d-imazal ssmana xemmem ugar ɣef useglullef (concentration) wala ɣef tɣuri.

  Ečč akken ilaq tesbuḥriḍ allaɣ-ik:  Deg kraḍ n yimalasen i d-yeqqimen, tzemreḍ ad tgeḍ aṭas n tɣawsiwin ara ak-inefɛen. Gar-asent tagella iwatan akken ad ijhiden wallaɣ-ik ed tfekka-k i wass-nni, akked tigawin n uttfaci am tuffɣiwin i ugama, aqesser ed yimdukkal…atg. Annect-a akk d ayen ara yessifsusen taɛkemt ma teẓẓay fell-ak.

  Tigzi n usteqsi d azgen n tririt:  Ama tjerrbeḍ yakan asɛeddi neɣ d amaynut i termit-a (expérience). Tella yiwet n tɣawsa i tlemdeḍ seg wass mi tkecmeḍ aɣerbaz; ur ilaq maḍi ad teǧǧeḍ attqelleq ad ak-yawi, ama tura neɣ deg tzeqqa n usɛeddi. Aṭas n yimussnawen n tnefsit i d-yeqqaren lemmer ad yesseɣleb uqcic ɣef uttqelleq i t-yettḍurrun, yezmer ad yernu ad d-yefk azgen n wayen i d-yefka yakan. Ihi teẓriḍ amek ilaq ad turareḍ nnuba-k! Tebbet kan allaɣ-ik tettekleḍ ɣef yiman-ik ed wayen akken tɛetbeḍ merra!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Yufrar-d i tikkelt-nniḍen ulɣuɣ n umaḍal deg wurar n Jeux d’échec , Anurviji Magnus Karlsen, mi yewwi ussan-a iɛeddan arraz n tedwilt tameqqrant n Paris n wurar-agi. Ulamma ur yebdi ara akken iwulem umezwaru deg ddunit armi i as-tt-yekkes deg tazwara Ufransis Maksim Vaciyi Lagrav, ihuz iman-is Magnus Karlsen armi d-yuɣal ɣer temsizzelt d ucqirrew n yilemẓiyen-nniḍen i d-yufraren iseggasen-a ineggura. Mi yerna Wesley Su, armi yesqelleq ixsimen-nniḍen ur ilaq ad xesren deg temliliyin i asen-d-yeqqimen. Akken ɣer snat n temliliyin n taggara gar Magnus Karlsen d Maksim Vaciyi Lagrav, yerna Magnus tamezwarut-nni s tepyasin timellalin, yuɣal iga amɛadal deg tis snat. Ihi teffeɣ fell-as. Ad d-nesmekti d akken tamdint n Paris tesnubget 9 seg yismawen i imucuɛen deg umaḍal-a n wurar-a, am Unurviji Magnus Karlsen, Amarikan Hikaru Nakamura bu lasel ajapuni, Arusi Serjey Karkajin, d waṭas-nniḍen. Merra-nsen qazmen allaɣ i tḥerci d turart n tazzla lqidar n semmus (5) n wussan i tdum tedwilt-a. S wakka i iḥudd akken ilaq uUnurviji Magnus Karlsen ɣef uẓayer-ines amiran, s yisem-is d alɣuɣ n umaḍal yuklalen.

  M. K. 

  
 Taɛcuct-agi taqdimt i d-yezgan nnig ucercur n udrar i icuffen s waman i d-yekkan seg ufsay n udfel, d tissirt n waman. D tissirt taneggarut n Ukeffadu. Maca azgen n tasut uqbel ass-agi. Llant aṭas deg-sent deg temnaḍt n leqbayel. Bab-is d Dda Tayeb, ɣas yuẓa deg leɛmer, ibedd akked Nna Ɛelǧiyya ɣer yidis-is, ɣef ugerruj i as-d-ǧǧan lejdud. Dda Tayed, d ameẓẓad , ur icerreḍ ara idrimen, maca itekkes tafkuẓt (quart) n lgelba n nneɛma yettwaẓḍen. Tissirt n waman, ttezḍen-yis-s irden, timẓin, ibawen, lḥemmeẓ, abelluḍ, akbal, lqahwa d isufar n usduzen (épices) daɣen. I wakken ad telḥu, tissirt teḥwaǧ aṭas n waman. Tezga-d terga n waman nnig tessirt. Amizab (ajeɛbub i ineqsen deg tehri) yessawaḍ-d aman ɣer uḥric n tessirt yellan s ddaw tɣerɣert. Aman-agi yellan s ddaw wadad, sedduyen rruḍa n lerya). Ayagi, igellu-d s tuzzya n yiɣuraf. Awren n tesirt yettfeǧǧiǧ am yiṭij, yuɣal d ddwa, yettak tujjya i umuḍin. Leryac, ɣas ur ten-nettwali ara, sɛan azal meqqren. Ttwabedren-d deg wanzi yesseqdec Lwennas Matub deg yiwet n tuɣac-is « Tissirt mi ara tent-taɣ deg leryac, ula as-d-gen yiɣuraf ». Tissirt-agi, d uzzan (merveille) n tebkect, n tmellit d tsefsit. Tazmert yettwaxlafen (l’énergie renouvelable) tettwassen ɣur lejdud-nneɣ seg zzman aqdim. Deg tallit ideg nella, yeṭṭuqqet wawal ɣef twennaḍt d useḥbiber ɣef wayen i aɣ-d-yezzin. Lejdud-nneɣ, zwaren-aɣ s waṭas ɣer wanect-a. Lemmer ad nmuqel ɣer wayen i aɣ-d-ǧǧan, yezmer lḥal ad naf tisura i yinezgumen n uzekka. Win yebɣan daɣen ad iwali tissirt n waman, ad yerzu ɣer Uxxam n wama n Tuǧa (Bgayet).

  T. Umaziɣ 

  
  Tlata, 12 deg yulyu. 

 D tameɣra n lberquq deg Laâlam, taɣiwant n Tamridjt. Ula d Sidi Bémol akked Idir ad ɣennin deg Lmaruk, d tameɣra seg tama-nni n Agadir xas ulamma uɣen tannumi, ttɣennin, dinna. Ma seg tama-agi n Lezzayer, UGTA tugi iṣudaf-nni n lintrit. Tebɣa ad qqimen kan akken. 

  Larebɛa, 13 deg yulyu. 

 Talɣuɣa n Lezzayer n Judo deg Tizi Uzzu. Meqqar ad teɛmer temdint, mebɛed mi texla seg Remḍan ɣer da. Nna Aldjia, yemma-s n Matoub, tekcem ɣer sbiṭer deg Tizi Uzzu. Salamat, kamim. Mačči am tẓegwa n Bgayet anda rɣan 2 200 n yigeṭṭaren. Win yebɣan, ad yerzu seg Jijel alamma d Lezzayer tamanaɣt, ha-t-an yella lbabur, srid lebḥar, lebḥar. Neɣ, ma ulac yella Moumouh s Album-is ajdid ‘’Dawi-yi’’.

  Lexmis, 14 deg yulyu. 

 Win iḥercen, yeḥrec. Win yeɣran, yeɣra. Tizi Uzzu deg umekkan amezwaru deg BAC i tikkelt tis tmanya (8). Wissen ayen akka ? Ula deg twaɣiyin n yiberdan, ladɣa, imuṭuyen, yuli ugemmuḍ. Iḍelli kan i mmuten 3 n yilmeẓyen deg twaɣiyin n yimuṭuyen. Iḍ-nni, kra ttrun, kra ttaḍṣan imi d-wwin BAC. Am tegnawt n furar : ad yili d iṭij, din din d ageffur.

  Sebt, 16 deg yulyu. 

 D tawaɣi deg tmurt n Fransa anda yiwen ‘’urebrab’’ yedhem lɣaci, s ukamyun, mi ttdifilin ass n 14 yulyu deg temdint n Nice, u yenɣa ugar n 84 n yimdanen d waṭas n yimejraḥ. Llan, gar-asen, 3 n yizzayriyen , ɣef wakken i d-nnan kra n yisallen. Wagi ixedmen tawaɣit-a, d Atunsi, yesɛa 3&amp; n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is. 

  
 Ttalsen-d, llan tlata n yirgazen seg yimezwura n taddart n Ugemmun, Abdelkrim, Ḥeggun d Aεmer bɣan ad d-zuren Sidi Mḥed Wehlal, bdan, ttmeslayen gar-asen. Yenna-as Aεmer : ‘’a wi yeččan tacebbaḍt, ara d-ggent tlawin-nsen!’’ Inṭaq-d Abdekbir ittafgen: ‘’a wi izṛan tilawin-nsen!’’ Nnan-as: ‘’i kečč a Ḥeggu? D acu i tebɣiḍ ?’’ Yenna-as: ‘’nekk bɣiɣ ad d-ẓureɣ, ad d-awiɣ lbaraka i warraw-iw.’’ Netta Sidi Mḥed Wehlal, iseelm-as Rebbi : Tilawin n At Hlal d timrabḍin, ḥejjbent, ur tteffɣent ara. Mi d-wwḍen s At Hlal, ifraḥ yis-sen, yenna-asen mreḥba, leeslama-nwen. Inna i tlawin, sewwemt tacebbaḍt a ten-in usan-d zziyar. Ta tetteg, ta tesewwa, yal yiwet tena cɣel-is. Alammi yewwa, ceyyeent aqcic ɣer baba-tsent, nnant-as ha-t-a yewjed lqewt. Iruḥ-d, inna-yasent : ‘’awimt-t-id kunemti, ta ad d-tawi lqewt, ta ad d-tawi aman.’’Nnant-as amek ara neqdec sdat zziyar, yak nekenti nḥejjeb ? Yenna-asent: ‘’a yess-i, tmeẓremt di tbaḍnit, ad teiwdemt di tḍahrit.Ruḥent s tergagit, sersent lqewt d waman sdat zziyar, uɣalent. Zzeyyar ččan alammi ṛwan, nnan ḥemdullah, sersen tiɣenǧawin. Issawel-asent i yessi-s, yenna-asent: ‘’ṛwaḥumt, ad tawimt ijeqduren-agi. Ddment ijeqduren-nni, kkrent ad uɣalent inna-asent:‘’beddemt, teslemt. Izzi ɣer wid-nni, inna-asen: ‘’a win issutren tacebbaḍt, teččiḍ, terwiḍ! Fkiɣ-ak lεella, ad tetteḍ ur trewwuḍ, ad txeddmeḍ ur teeyyuḍ! a win isutren tamuɣli, atent-in wali-tent! Ruḥ, tekkseḍ sser ɣef yess-i, fkiɣ-ak leema u lekḥel. I kečč a Wḥeggu, tsutreḍ lbaraka! Fkiɣ-ak lbaraka deg warraw-ik, ggiɣ-ak am ubelluḍ n uɣanim, mi iruḥ ad iqqar, ad d-ixlef, ad d-ikker. Iḥya-k lḥeg, win issutren tamuɣli, tarrawt-is ffɣen d iderɣalen. Win issutren učči, ayen ččan, ur iban ara fell-asen. Ttmettaten ɣef ueebbuḍ-nsen. Ma d win issutren lbaraka, amur-is iburket, innerna .Mi ikcem anda llant yessi-s, yufa-tent ttrunt, yenna-asent: ‘‘ruḥumt, win i kent-ieuzen, d tigellalin, ma ulac d tiklalin. Anda ara tḥejbemt ur teseumt ara dderya” .

<p style="text-align: center;"><em> Yeǧǧa-d awal, qqaren: </em>

 <em> A wer tesɣar </em>

 <em> A wer tedden, a wer teẓẓal </em>

 <em> Ur tḥeǧǧeb, ur nesseḥjab. </em>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Tura akka imi iɛedda uḥric wis sin n temsizzelt i d-yellan deg wussan seg waggur n yulyu, Tanmehla n Usegmi n Tubiret tessewjed ttawilan iwulmen i tannant ara d-yilin seg 19 d asawen n waggur n γuct i deg nella. D aγerbaz alemmas Slimane Smili ara yeldin tiwwura-s i uqabel n yiselmaden imaynuten n sin n yiswiren : alemmas d unsnawi. Iwakken ihi ad d-tili tannant-a deg tignatin igerzen, anemhal n Usegmi n Tubiret yessawel-d deg wussan-a yezrin i yimaswaḍen n uswir alemmas anda i d-yessuter deg-sen ad swejden iman-nsen i tikci n ufus n tallelt i tsuta-a tamaynut n yiselmaden yuhwajen iwellihen, ama deg tarrayt n uselmed ama deg usuddu n tneγrit neγ ahat deg wayen yerzan tanefsit n unelmad. Din dγa i yettwaddem rray i ufraq n yigrawen almend n tangawin, imi llant akka ti ara yesɛun drus n yimunan. Ass n lexmis yezrin ihi, lawan ideg i d-usan yimaswaḍen γer tkadimit i yettuɛeggen s wudem unṣib wid ara yilin deg tannant-a xas akka ulamma d tallit n yimuras n unebdu.

  M. Smail 

  
 Segran-d yijajiḥen n tmes yekkren deg tuddar d tɣiwanin n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu ɣef teɣzi n tlata waggur-nni n unebdu yezrin (yunyu, yulyu, ɣuct) n useggas-agi n 2017, s lmut n yiwen n umdan d ujraḥ n 17 n yimdanen-nniḍen yemxalafen deg leɛmer akked lexṣara deg wayen yeɛnan ixxamen, ṭṭjur, iɣersiwen n uxxam s wazal n 241 n yimelyan n Ddinar Azzayri. Ibeggen-d wulɣu-nni i d-yefka umaray amatu n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu ussan-agi i iɛeddan, deg umeslay-is sdat n yiɛeggalen n Usqamu aɣerfan n Lwilaya (APW). Ijeml-d deg-s tixeṣṣarin swayes i d-glan yijajiḥen n tmes, d wid i d-yessegran s tmerɣiwt n 79 n yixxamen n tmezduɣt, aserɣi n 90000 n tzemmrin, timerɣiwt n 340000 n ṭṭjur yettarwen lfakya d 50 igetaren n wakal i yeẓẓan d timẓin d yirden akked 2300 n teɣrasin n tamemt ideg llant tzizwa d 340 d tilmawin akked usraɛ d ufsax n waṭas n yiɣersiwen ladɣa lmal amecṭuḥ. Iberḥ-d umaray amatu n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu ddurt-nni yezrin, belli tixeṣṣarin-agi ttwajerdent merra deg yiwen n zzmam i yettunefkken ɣer tneɣlaft n ddaxel akked tijmuyaɛ timiḍranin i wakken ad asen-d-ɣermen s yidrimen i yifellaḥen akked yimezdaɣ-agi ḥuzant twaɣiyin-agi n tmes. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti belli yal amezdaɣ iwumi yerɣa uxxam-is, ha-t-an ad as-d-fken 70 melyun n ssuntim i wakken ad iɛiwen i uxxam.

   A. A. 

  
 Simmal zerrin yiseggasen , simmal yettaɣ aẓar wansay-agi n usfugel n taggara n useggas agraɣlan s tqejmeyar n cikula di tmetti nneɣ. Tin yernan ɣur-s, wid i tent-ixeddmen, tṣenniɛen, ttnewwiɛen di lesnaf-nsent,.dayen ahat i d-jebden lɣaci s watas. Dagi deg Uqbu, 20 n yiseggasen akka ɣer deffir , ad naf ala kra n twaculin kan i yettaran ddehn-nsent ɣer lbiɛ-agi n tqejmyar n cikula, i wakken ad sfuglent aseggas ajdid ladɣa tid yettidiren di temdinin, yal mi ara d-yaweḍ wass 31 di duǧember. Maca taggara –agi, izad wi izaden, yelḥeq zhir-nsent ula ɣer tudrin, almi yuɣal d amsizwer u amḥedwaq ɣer tkuwacin. Ad as-tiniḍ deg wusan-nni n Remḍan i telliḍ mi ara ad tkubrin ɣer lxubz aḥmayan lqirab n tadanin. Nessaram ula d yennayer ad yili usfugel-is s ṭṭaqa u di teswiɛin yelhan neɣ ma ulac ad yekcem di tatut.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Brahim benhamouche 

  
 Halim Behlouli, d yiwen n umedyaz ilemẓi atrar. D aḥeddad n wawal. D lmalaykat I t-id-yessenṭaqen asmi meẓẓi, imi i d as-id-yefka Rebbi tamedyazt d ayla.Isegmi-is yuɣ, yennerna u mazal ad inerrni imi d yiwen umedyaz yeččuren d tayri i tmedyazt d yidles amaziɣ.Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen:

  Azul fell-ak a Mass Behlouli, amek i tettiliḍdeg wussan-a? 

 Azul i yimaziɣen merra anida ma llan, u yizzayriyen s umata.Slam-iw ɣef leqbayel s lğmela, i yinaẓuren s wuzig. Aqel-aɣ labas lḥemdulleh am yimdanen merra, dima d leqdic.

  Deg tazwara anwai d Mass Halim Behlouli? 

 Luleɣ ass n 21deg Waggur n Buğamber 1975, di taddart n IɣilIԑEl wanen id-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Amizur, di lwilaya n Bgayet.D amedyaz u d amaru atrar n tmedyazt n teqbaylit. D yiwen i iḥemmlen tamaziɣt ugar n wakken iḥemmel iman-is, ayenni d-yessebganen aya,imi seg wasmimeẓẓiyeɣ ttekkiɣ deg waṭas n tmesbaniyin yeԑnan tamaziɣt.

  Ma tzemreḍ aɣ-d-temmeslayeḍ ugar ɣef yiman-ik, ladɣa deg uḥric n tẓuri? 

 Ttaruɣ s kraḍ (03) n tutlayin: taԑrabt, tafransist d teqbaylit, maca tura akka suffɣeɣ-d idlisen-iw s tefransist d teqbaylit, ma s taԑrabt mazal ur nwiɣ ara ad ssazergeɣ tura akka yis-s. Ttekkiɣ deg semmus (05) n tfaskiwin n tmedyazt deg tama n Udrar n Fad, deg AytSmaԑil di lwilaya n Bgayet, seg 2009 armi 2013.

  Seg melmi i tebdiḍ tira?D acu n ssebbaid-ak-yeǧǧan ad d-taruḍ tamedyazt? 

 Bdiɣ tira n tmedyazt asmi lliɣ 16 n yiseggasen di leԑmer-iw, ussan-nni lliɣ ɣareɣ (qreɣ) deg tesnawit ixelḍen »Ccix ElԑazizḤeddad».Asmi lliɣ sԑiɣ 10 n yiseggasen deg leԑmer-iw, xas akken bdiɣ ssefruyeɣ asmi ɣur-i mraw n yiseggasen kan di leԑmer-iw, maca tira n yisefra bdiɣ-tt ɣef 16 n yiseggasen. Ma d tamentilt iyi-ğğan ad awiɣ abrid n tira n tmedyazt, d aḥemmel n tsekla s umata akked yidles d tussna. D iḥulfan-iw d wayen akk nettidir d wayen nettwali deg tmetti-nneɣ.

  Anwa adlis i swayestettwasneḍ aṭas? 

 Adlis i swayes ttwasneɣ mliḥ, d win yuɣalen am nekkwa-w, d adlis-nni n tefransist iwumi semmaɣ »La Belle Vie Aux Yeux Du Créateur! »i d-yeffɣen deg 2014 di TiziWezzu, neɣ di Yunyu 2015 ɣer tezrigin «Edi Livre» n tmurt n Fransa.

  Acḥal n yidlisen i d-suffɣeḍ yakan?S wacu n tutlayin I d-ffɣen? 

 Ssazergeɣ-d yakan 3 n yidlisen ɣef yiwet n tikelt.Amezwaru d win iwumi semmaɣ«Tiwwura n Tafat»neɣ «Les Portes de Lumière», i d-yeffɣen s snat n tutlayin tamaziɣt d tefransist.D ammud ideg llan 34 n yisefra, 17 seg-sen s tmaziɣt, 17 nniḍen s tefransist. Ma d ammud-iw wis sin n tmedyazt d win iwumi giɣ isem »Leğhud n Tafat», neɣ « Les Forces de Lumière », i d-ssazergeɣ s tefranist d tmaziɣt. Giɣ deg-s 37 n yisefra, 18 seg-sen s tmaziɣt, ma d 19 nniḍen s tefransist. Ma d adlis-iw wis kraḍ (03) d adlis n tiklisen (La psychologie) s tutlayt n trumit, d win iwumi fkiɣ azwel : »La Belle Vie Aux Yeux Du Créateur ! ». 

  Anwa adlis i ak-yuwin aṭas, neɣ i ak-yenzan aṭas di ssuq? 

 Ma d ayen yeԑnan-ayal yiwen seg yidlisen-iw yuwi-d lḥeq-is di ssuq,imi azal n 2000 n yidlisen iyi-nzan ama da neɣ di Fransa. Maca adlis iyi-d-yuwin aṭas, d adlis-nni n tefransist iwumi semmaɣ«La Belle Vie Aux Yeux DuCréateur».

  Acu n yisental iɣef tettaruḍ tamedyazt-ik? 

 Isental iɣef ttaruɣ tamedyazt-iw uwiɣ-ten-i-d segt metti-nneɣ, d tudert-nneɣ n yal ass, gar-asen : timetti, tayri, amedyaz, timsal n ddunit, tidet, lehyuf, tudert-iw, lḥerma, zzin n teqbayli, atg.

  Ma tzemreḍ ad aɣ-d-tehduḍ tukkist seg yiwen gar yisefra-inek?. 

 Mačči d ugur, mebla lmezya. Ad awen-d-hduɣ tukkist seg usefru-nni « Ddwa n Lbaṭel » neɣ » Le Remède du Mèpris », seg udlis-nni » Tiwwura n Tafat  » neɣ  » Les Portes de Lumière », ha-t-anɣur-wen ihi.

  D acui d tidmi-ik ɣef tmedyazt s umata? 

 Ttwaliɣ d akken tamedyazt d izen n talwit, d win yettaԑraḍen ad yessakki wid tuwi tnafa, wid iɣur yiḍes. Iwakken ad d-tenddekwal tmetti, yerna ad tawi abrid n tebɣest ɣer lḥerma.

  D acu i d tamuɣli-k ɣef tmedyazt taqbaylit tatrart? 

 Tella tmedyazt deg ssuq imi nesԑa aṭas n yimedyazen, ttilint-d tfaskiwin n tmedyazt deg yal tama n tmurt n leqbayel, ԑawnent mliḥ anect-a.Aswir-is yettnerni yal aseggas, imi tuget n yimedyazen n wass-a sԑan aswir adelsan d usegmiԑlayen deg usegmi d tussna. 

  Acu ara asen-tinniḍ I yimedyazen imaynuten? 

 Ilaq ad ssiwḍen ad ssizergen ayen uran n tmedyazt iwakken ad t-ɣrenmedden, mebla akukru. Ma d wid urnezmir ara ilaq ad jemԑen isefra-nsen, neɣ ad ttekkin deg tfaskiwin n tmedyazt. Nekk ad d-inniɣ d akken d tifaskiwin-agi iyi-llin allen akken ad d-suffɣeɣ idlisen-iw. 

  D acu n yisenfaren i tessewjadeḍ sya ɣer sdat? 

 Ttheggiɣ aṭas n yidlisen, dɣa deg tmedyazt,heggaɣ-d yiwen n wammud amaynut n yisefra ara d-yeffɣen di kra n wagguren,am waken, daɣen, ara d-suffɣeɣ yiwen n udlis-nniḍen n tiklisen (La psychologie) s tutlayt n trumit. Am wakken daɣen ara d-suffɣeɣ yiwen n ungal.

  Awal-ik n taggara?  

 Tanemmirt s tussda i Uɣmis-agi-nwen, imi iyi-yiga amekkan deg yisebtar-is.Sslam-iw ɣef wid Iyi-ḥemmlen d yimeɣriyen n yidlisen-iw di yal amekkan.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Yesteqsa-t:Adaoun Abdelghani. 

  
 At taddart akken llan qqaren-d isem-agi n El Kelâa yettwanefk imi amezwaru-nsen, Braham Ouyekhlef, yekka-d seg El Kelâa Beni Hammad seg tama n Bgayet.

  Isem “El Kelâa” 

 Tettwabna Kalâat Beni Hammad deg useggas 1007 deg lwilaya n Msila. Yebna-tt Hammad mmi-s n Bouloughin u jeddi-s d Ziri win I d-ixelqen Lezzayer, tamanaɣt n tura. Yettwḥres Ihilaliyen, syin iruḥ-d ɣer Bgayet. Syin-a i d-yusa, ɣef waken I d-nnan, Braham Ouyekhlef. Mi d-yewweḍ ɣer tama n Uẓeffun, yeṭṭef amekkan deg tewrirt iwumi qqaren akka tura Misura. Ruḥ a zman, rwaḥ a zman, yuɣal yesɛa uguren imeqqranen akked sselṭan n Temguḍt. Cwal ɣe gma-s armi d asmi i t-yenɣa sselṭan-agi. Asmi i d-ufan warraw n Braham Ouyekhlef aman seg tama n wadda n Misura, subben-d deg 4 yid-sen ɣer din u xelqen-d taddart iwumi fkan isem-agi n tura El Kelâa. Ad naf deg taddart-a 4 n yiderma i wwin ismawen n warraw n Braham Ouyekhlef, yella udrum At ¨hmida, At Saɛdi, At Ɛli d Wat Buǧemɛa, rnu adrum wis xemsa n yimrabḍen. Zedɣen deg El Kelâa, azal n 1000 n yimdanen, ɛlayet ɣef lebḥar s wazal n 600 lmitrat. Tesɛa tilisa akked tɣiwant n At Caféɛ seg tama n usamar, seg umalu, ad naf taɣiwant n Tifrit, seg ugafa yella Uẓeffun ma ɣer tama n unẓul d Aqerru.

  Lǧameɛ Ufella neɣ tajmaɛt 

 Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen umaɣar, ɛeddan 10 leqrun seg wasmi yettwabna Lǧameɛ Ufella. Yettwabna s ufella n yiwen uẓru ameqqran, u sseqdacen-t, diɣ, d tajmaɛt anda ttnejmaɛen yimezdaɣ n taddart-a. Acu mačči ala i waya i t-sseqdacen. Ssexdamen-t, daɣen, d tazeqqa n creɛ anda i tettcaraɛ taddart wid i d-yettawin tilufa. “Mi ara d-yawi yiwen taluft, ad d-ibedd, dagi deg lǧamaɛ, sdat n taddart i wakken ad yettwacareɛ ɣef wayen yexdem. Syin, ad teḥkem taddart fell-as”, akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen umaɣar. Ɣef tama n lǧameɛ-a, tella yiwet n temduct tamecṭuḥt i ɣzan deg uẓru, mazal-itt ar ass-a n wussan tettacar d aman. Deg umekkan-a i reḥḥun s ablaḍ, zik, Wat taddart tiqubac, lemmus d wayen i ssemsaden. Sya ɣer da, mi yeḥma wuzzal-nni, ad t-rren ɣer daxel n waman i wakken ad d-yesmiḍ. Akka tura, Lǧameɛ Ufella, d amekkan qesden s waṭas yimezdaɣ deg unebdu, ttɣimen deg-s imi ttafen dinna tasmuḍ d tsusmi. Ma d amek i yettwabna, yules-aɣ-d taqsiḍt-is yiwen umɣar, yenna-d: “asmi kkren yimezdaɣ ad bnun lǧameɛ, ur mmsefhamen ara ɣef umekkan anda ara xedmen, yella-d umqelleɣ d umgarad gar-asen. Kra, bɣan-t deg tama n ideg yella akka tura, wiyaḍ deg tama-nniḍen. Ihi, imi ur d-ufin tifrat, deggren taluft i waken ad tt-kemmlen azekka-nni. Acu kan, sbeḥ mi d-kkren Wat taddart, ufan-d yebda lebni n lǧameɛ s ufella n uẓru. Ihi, imi wallan akken, ur yelli ɣef wacu ara kemmlen anejmuɛ: teddez, tebrez. Ɣef wakka, dɣa, i as-qqaren Lǧameɛ n lmalayka”.

  El Kelâa, taddart n yimeɣras  

 Tettuneḥsab El Kelaâ gar tudrin timezwura n tmurt n Lezzayer ur nesɛi ula d yiwen n uḥerki. Imezdaɣ n taddart akken llan, qeccuc-meccuc, ddan akked deg ubrid n tegrawla. Aya iɛawen aṭas imezdaɣ i wakken ad ẓden tagmat gar-asen xas ulamma xelṣen-tt s yidammen-nsen. “Nxelleṣ-it ɣlayet ibeddi-nni nbedd ɣer tama n tegrawla. Thudd u tesserɣ Fransa taddart-nneɣ imi ṭṭuqqten dagi yimjuhad”, i aɣ-d-yules tadyant yiwen umezdaɣ n taddart-agi.

  Tamsalt n yimsiḍnen (compteurs)  

 Am tuget n tudrint n tmurt n leqbayel, El Kelâa, sedduyen-tt yiqerra n taddart neɣ wid iwumi qqaren ṭemman i d-yettwafernen deg unejmuɛ n taddart. Gar yisenfaren i texdem taddart i yiman-is, nezmer ad d-nader: abelleḍ d uslaɣ n yiberdan s siman, afras n yiɣbula d bennu n tliwa i yal adrum deg taddart, asizdeg n yimekwan izamulen yellan deg tama-nni, beddu n lebni n yiwen lǧameɛ ameqqran…atg. “Kra n wayen akk nserref deg yisenfaren-a, yekka-d seg-neɣ; d nekni i d-ibezren gar-aneɣ. Wamma ula d asurdi yeflan ur d-yekki ɣer dduwla. Acu kan, ugur ameqqran, ɣef waken i d-nnan yimezdaɣ, d anekcum-nni n waman i ǧǧan deg tlemmas n umahil. “Ugar n useggas seg wasmi nxelles tura imsiḍnen (compteurs), ar tura mazal ur kcimen waman. Ur neẓri ma ssebba kan i d-ufan neɣ d ayen-nniḍen.Kulec isellek, mazal kan ad aɣ-xedmen imṣiḍnen. Nutni la d-qqaren ur ten-nufi ara i lbiɛ. Ruḥ fhem-itt tura kečč!”, i d-yenna s wurfan yiwen umezdaɣ.” Ɣef waya dɣa, i mazal imezdaɣ n taddart, ttagmen seg tliwa n taddart am zik-nni.

  Yettkemmil… 

  Hocine moula 

  
 Akken yella yenna-t-id aṭas n tikkal uselway-is ameɣnas mass Racid At Ɛli Uqasi, ilaq ad tezzi yewwas Tesbeddit-nsen Takanadit i Tmaziɣt i yimaziɣen nniḍen ladɣa deg wayen yerzan aseqdec n usnulfu ed tfarest iseklanen, wamma deg yiḥricen nniḍen tella terza yakan Tregwa ɣer kra n tmura n Tmazɣa I kra n yiqeddicen. Ihi, akken ad tɛeddi ɣer tigawt, tesnulfa-d ussan-a arraz Ɛli Azayku i uslal aseklan ed tẓuri n yimeskaren imaziɣen n lasel amerruki. «Iswi n warraz-a mačči kan d asebɣes i usefres aseklan ed tẓuri s Tmaziɣt, maca iwakken ad yerr tajmilt i wid ixeddmen deg wannar n usefres s tmaziɣt, ad ten-yerr ad ttwassnen ɣur yimaziɣen akked iberraniyen s umata, ladɣa wid i yettaken ccan i yidles amaziɣ». Deg tiɣri-nni i d-sersen i nezmer ad nɣer aya. S wakka ihi, arraz-a s wazal n 1000$ n Tkanada, i yeddmen isem n waggag, amedyaz d umezray Ɛli Azayku, i yemmuten sendilindi, ad yettunefkay deg 20 n yebrir n yal aseggas, d asmekti ladɣa ɣef wayen yesɛedda umeɣnas-a mi t-gren yinesdabuyen n Merruk deg tkurmut (lḥebs), maca daɣen ilmend n usmekti n tefsut n yimaziɣen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi  

  
 Mbeɛd mi d-tella temlilit n twilayt ɣef waman, taggara n ddurt yezrin Mouloud Cherifi, s yisem-is d lwali n Tubiret yessemlal-d inemhalen d yiɛeggalen n usqamu n twilayt I wakken ad d-gren s annar tamsalt n lebni d tnezduɣt. Di tazwara, d anemhal n uḥric-a d-yewwin agzul ɣef wayen yettwaxedmen deg yiseggasen yezrin, d wayen yetturajun ɣer sdat. Asmi yekfa awal-is, imḍebber amenzu n twilayt yuɣal-d ɣer yiɛewwiqen yellan I wakken ad iẓer ssebba yeǧǧan aṭas n yisenfar gellen acḥal d aseggas. D tinezduɣin, s ṣṣenf yemxallafen iɣef yezzi aṭas wawal, anda i d-iban uɛeṭṭel ameqran deg lebni-nsent. Ɣas ulamma ddeqs i yettwabnan, yettwaferqen, maca ayen i d-yeqqimen s wazal-is ! D ayen yeswahmen mačči d kra Mass Cherifi i yefkan iwellihen i wakken ad d-yili uɣsab deg useddu n lecɣal. Di yal tikkelt, yettuɣal-d wawal ɣef yimɛelmen i yesɛeṭṭlen deg yisenfaren, imi ssuturen-d tadrimt di yal tikkelt. Dɣa, lwali yessuter seg unemhal n uḥric-a i wakken ad iẓer imɛellmen-a anda ara ten-yethedden ɣef unekcum n tedrimt s asenduq n twilayt mebla leɛḍil. Yeqqim-d yiwen n usenfar deg temdint n Sour El Ghozlane, asmi kan yesla lwali d acu n ssebba yesɛeṭṭlen beddu n lecɣal, yerfa mačči d kra, imi d kra n ttawilat n uxeddim i yeǧǧa yiwen n umɛellem deg umkan-nni i d ssebba. Iwelleh s leqseḥ imḍebber n uḥric-a n lebni d tnezduɣt i wakken ad d-iheggi amkan-nni s lɛejlan. Timlilit, tekfa s waṭas n yiwellihen ara yeǧǧen aḥric-agi ad tekfu fell-as tuzzya d tunḍa, imi Mouloud Cherifi yebda yessekfal-d s kra d asenfar yuɣalen d rrif. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>   Smail. M  

  
 Azal n umalas (ddurt) aya, tiftisin n Uẓeffun uɣalen-t d lwelha i waṭas : ama d wid i tt-izedɣen neɣ d inebgawen ansi-nniḍen, xas akken tallit n tucfa tfuk. Maca tikkel-a, d agemmer i asen-yessawlen, degmi i yuzzel wawal ɣef tuffɣa n yiselman n n waynanaz ( la daurade ), anda akken i ten-ttrebbin. Iselman-a, rran-d ula i umeẓyan d umeqqran, akken ad ten-id-gemren, ama d win yessnen neɣ d ubujad d imeré anwa ara yeṭṭfen tagnit, anwa ara d- yessalin ugar n wayeḍ. Uɣalen medden akk d inegmaren, ssawḍen kra ǧǧan lecɣal-nsen,ha-ten-an ẓẓan din am wass am yiḍ. Dinna i ttnussun, ur d-cqin i kra gar wallen-nsen ala aslem n waynanaz. Dɣa, ula deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt, Bgayet, usan-d ula d nutni ad awin amur-nsen. Acku aslem-a s wazal-is, d ayen ara asen-yeččaren iẓewaḍen-nsen, aṭas i aɣ-d-yennan, deg wass tteffɣen almi d 5 n yimelyan neɣ ugar. Ma d wiyaḍ, ddan akken ddan waman, daya. Nessaram akken imerẓi-a ad yili yal ass, mačči kan deg yiri n yilel, di tlemmast, meqqar ahat ad yader wazal n yiselman di tmurt-nneɣ, ad t-nečč, ur t-nettargu ara.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Tamsaout Tarik 

  
 Mačči d ayen yessefraḥen ayen swayes i d-yegla useggas-a i waɣir n Bgayet d yimezdaɣ-is. Tazɣint tadamsant (crise économique), teskanay-d akken ilaq ssmamat d latarat-is. Aṭas n tɣiwanin n twilayt i yeccektayen ɣef lexsas n tedrimt deg texzanin-nsent, i wakken ad izmirent ad kemmlent neɣ ad kfunt lecɣal i yeqqimen d azgen. Nnig waya, ula d tidukkliwin yemxalafen nṭerrent ayendin imi ur asent-kcimen yidrimen swayes ara xedment kra. Akka dɣa ara naf dɣa tiddukkliwin yellan deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛil, ur asent-yewwiḍ kra n userdi ɣer texzant-nsent, aseggas-a. Si tama-nniḍen, ula deg lecɣal n baylek yettban-d wugur adamsan n waɣir d tmurt s umata ; imi asenfar n ususseɛ d ureqqeɛ n ubrid n Ɛecba (les gorges) deg Xerraṭa d amedya igerrzen i waya. Asmi yettwaṭṭef sɣur tkebbaniyin Ozgün-ETRHB yella-d umsifham ɣef tazwara n 2017 akken ad yamed. Maca seg wass-nni, acḥal n taganin i d-yellan sɣur yixeddamen ɣef ssebba n tedrimt. Imḍebbren n tkebbanit-a, ruḥen armi sṭaxren kra n yiqeddacen. Aṭas n yirgazen n tsertit d yisegbaren n tdamsa i d-yennan d akken aɣir n Bgayet, aql-it gar wid yenṭerren, i ixussen ayendin deg yisenfaren n tneflit. Dɣa ula d amḍan amecṭuḥ n yisenfaren seg wid yettwajerrden, aql-iten akka tura, kra yeḥbes, kra yettɛeṭṭil ugar n wamek i as-d-tewwi.

  M. K. 

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Deg kra n wawalen, mmeslayeɣ-d ɣef yiman-ik? 

 Yahia Yanes: Luleɣ ass n 03 deg waggur n yennayer 1967, deg Yiwaḍiyen deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Lliɣ yakan d aselmad n tutlayt n tmaziɣt deg tesnawit, syin deg uɣerbas alemmas n Hamida deg Buɣni. D amedyaz d amaru atrar s tmaziɣt, imi uriɣ yakan 02 n yidlisen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, iɣef ara d-nawi awal deg tdiwennit-agi. 

  Ʃecra n tesyar deg yiwen n ulemsir, amek-itent-teḥyiḍ akk a mass Yanes? 

 D tidet, xeddmeɣ aṭas n lecɣal deg tudert-iw, maca yal taɣawsa deg umkan-is u deg wakud-is. Qeddceɣ deg ddeqs n yiḥricen d taɣulin yemgraden, ad d-bedreɣ gar-asent: idles amaziɣ, tira n yidlisen, taɣamsa, addal, anadi, isaragen, timsikniyin, tiddukkliwin tidelsanin, aseddu n tezrigin…atg. 

  Ahat, tirmit-ik deg uselmed n tmaziɣt tεawen-ik aṭas deg tira s tmaziɣt, mmeslay-aɣ-d ɣef wannecta? 

 Asmi lliɣ d aselmad, ssarameɣ d akken tamaziɣt, ad tuɣal, ad tesεu amkan deg tudert-nneɣ n yal ass, ad tili d tutlayt ara yesseqdac umdan, i wakken ur tettɣimi ara d tuffirt. D tidet, tirmit-iw deg uselmed n tmaziɣt tεawen-iyi i wakken ad aruɣ idlisen yerna s tmaziɣt. Mačči d aselmed-is kan, maca uqbel anect-a, tella leḥmmala-nni i tmaziɣt, d timeɣnest-nni-ines i d aɣ-yeğğan ad naru u ad neqdec deg-s.

  Mmeslay-aɣ cwiṭ ɣef leqdic-ik deg unnar n tira d waddal? 

 Seg wasmi meẓẓiyeɣ, ḥemmleɣ tamaziɣt, bɣiɣ ad qqedceɣ fell-as u deg-s. Ḥemmleɣ diɣen tamedyazt, i bdiɣ deg useggas n 1986, asmi sɛiɣ 19 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-iw. Seg wass-nni ar ass-a, uriɣ ar tura azal n 1000 n yisefra s teqbaylit, ɣef yisental yemgraden. Deg useggas n 2012, sazergeɣ-d ɣer tezrigin Richa Elsam, adlis-nni wis sin iwumi semmaɣ «D kemm a tayri». D ammud n 75 n yisefra s teqbaylit, ideg riɣ tajmilt i tmeṭṭut taqbaylit deg waṭas n yisefra. Imi ula d nettat teḥrez tutlayt d yidles-nneɣ amaziɣ. Uriɣ yakan deg tɣamsa yettwarun s tmaziɣt d tefransist, imi uriɣ imagraden deg sin n yiɣmisen n tmurt-nneɣ wigi d La Dépêche de Kabylie, ideg uriɣ timucuha-w deg-s tmaziɣt. Am wakken diɣen i yuriɣ deg uɣmis-nniḍen. Ma deg waddal, lliɣ tturareɣ aṭas n tewsatin n waddalen yemxalafen. Syin, uɣaleɣ d asleɣmay ɣef leṣnaf-agi n waddal, d wiyaḍ.

  D acu i d tamuɣli-ik ɣef tira s tmaziɣt s umata? 

 Deg tallit-agi taneggarut, la nettwali belli aṭas n yidlisen ara d-itteffɣen deg yal aḥric n tẓuri neɣ n yidles, d ayen yesferaḥen aṭas aṭas. Ladɣa tamedyazt d tin ara d-ittefɣen mliḥ iseggasen-agi ineggura, maca llan ula d ungalen, tullisin, timucuha, timezgunin…atg. 

  Ḥku-ɣ-d taqsiḍt-ik akked tmedyazt? 

 Asmi lliɣ qqareɣ deg useggas wis rebɛa n uɣerbaz alemmas, lliɣ ḥemmleɣ ad d-ɣreɣ u ad ḥewwseɣ, ad nadiɣ anamek-nsen. Ladɣa isefra yura Victor Hugo, d wid n Charles Baudelaire…atg. Sakin uɣaleɣ sefruyeɣ . Ḥemmleɣ diɣen tamedyazt n ucennay-nneɣ ameqqran Sliman Azem, dɣa ula d netta xedmeɣ-as tajmilt.

  Ahat d timeɣnest-nni n tmaziɣt, I ak-idemren ɣer tɣamsa? 

 D tidet, tamaziɣt d rruḥ-iw, imi ssefraɣ yis-s, lemdeɣ-tt syin slemdeɣ-tt, tura la qqedceɣ fell-as. Uqbel ad iliɣ d aneɣmas deg tɣamsa, lliɣ yakan d ameɣnas deg yiseggasen n 1980. Ttawiɣ tamaziɣt deg wul-iw, yis-s i ttidireɣ. Uriɣ yakan deg sin n yiɣmisen n tmurt-nneɣ, syin kedmeɣ d imceggeɛ n radyu n teqbaylit Numidya n tmurt n Marikan. D tidet ur xdimeɣ ara asileɣ deg wayen yerzan taɣamsa, maca d leḥrara-nni akked d leḥmmala-nni n tmaziɣt, iyi-d-yellin abrid ɣer tira deg yiɣmisen.<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

  Amek i ilaq ad yili umaru neɣ umeskar deg tmetti? 

 Ilaq ad d-yawi ayen ara d-yaru iseɣ d ubaɣur i tmetti-ines, ladɣa ma yella wayen akken yura d amaynut. D netta ara d-yinnin ayen yebɣa d wayen yuggi ugdud, s ttawil n yizen yesεedday deg tira-s.

  Amek-it usizreg n yidlisen deg tmurt-nneɣ? 

 Asizreg n yidlisen deg tmurt-nneɣ, yenqes s waṭas mačči am zik, acku s unekcum n ttawilat itiknulujiyen atraren, sneqqsen mliḥ taɣuri. Zik, deg ubrid neɣ deg wallalen n usiweḍ ala win ara twaliḍ yeqqar adlis, ma d tura ala win ara twaliḍ yeṭṭef tilifun. Ma d adlis n tmaziɣt, ugur-is imi tuget n yimdanen ur ɣrin ara tamaziɣt. Ad yili yiwen yebɣa ad iɣer kra n udlis s tmaziɣt, ad as-yekkes lebɣi wugur-nni n tɣuri, imi ur yezmir ara ad d-iɣer ayen yettwarun s tutlayt-is n tyemmat.

  Imi kečč d amedyaz, yadra ma tettekkiḍ deg tfaskiwin n tmedyazt? 

 Tɛedda yiwet n tallit, ttekkaɣ deg kra n tfaskiwin n tmedyazt, i d-yettilin deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Syin, uɣalen nnan-iyi-d ilaq kečč ad tiliḍ d aɛeggal deg tesqamut n uktazal, imi walan belli isefra-w lhan s waṭas, imi d aselmad diɣen n tmaziɣt.
