S wul d lebɣi kan i nettnaɣ akken ad d-nawi ula d nekni taḥjurt-nneɣ deg lebni n wayla-nneɣ. Tamaziɣt tesra i usefru, asefru ilaq-as umedyaz, amedyaz tlaq-as tfaska ». Ayen akk icudden i yidles d tẓuri ad yili deg tfaska-a, gar-asen taklut, tasekla, isaragen, amezgun, ccna, timzikknin… atg. Ad d-nesmekti dakken tafaska-a i ara yemmaggen deg taddart n Tewrirt n War ɣef teɣzi n kraḍ n wussan, ad tili d tajmilt i umedyaz Smaɛil Azikiw, am wakken i d-yeqqar yisem n tdukkla.

  M. K. 

  
 Nabila Haliche d tamyurart n umezgun, d tamedyazt am waken tettaru, diɣ, isura. S lferḥ I d aɣ-d-terra ɣef yisteqsiyen-nneɣ.

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen: D acu-t umezgun ɣur-m? 

  Nabila Haliche:  amezgun ɣur-i, d tirmit yelhan, yesɛan azal d ameqqran i d-yewwi ad t-yissin yal amdan. Imi amezgun mačči kan yejmaɛ akk taẓuri s yisenfan-is yemxalafen: ccna, aẓawan, tamedyazt… Imi daɣen d tagnit yessufuɣen azeffan si tirga n tira ɣer tidet n ddunit anda yezmer ad iserreḥ i yiman-is, ad yessufeɣ ayen akk yellan deg wallaɣ-is d wayen akk yejmaɛ wul-is, akken ad t-walin medden, ad t-issinen. Amezgun, d tamussni wessiɛen lqayen, deg-s ddukkulen taḍsa d yimeṭṭi, leɛyaḍ d tsusmi. D win i d-yettawin awal ɣef kra yellan d tadyant, tasertit, tayri, d wayen akk iḍerrun. Ula d ayen yeḍran deg yizri iɛeddan nezmar ad t-id-neḥyu s tceqqufin n umezgun. Amezgun, ur yettwaktab akken ad t-ɣren madden, yettwaktab akken ad t-uraren, imi yal taceqquft tesɛa tabraṭt neɣ izen ilaq uzeffan ad t-yessiweḍ i yimferǧen. Amezgun, d abrid yessawaḍen tamussni seg umdan ɣer wayeḍ, neɣ seg uzeffan ɣer yimferǧen. Nezmer ad d-nini amezgun d lemri n tugdut .

  War ccekk urar n umezgun mačči d ayen isehlen, amek ilaq ad d-ibin uzeffan sdat-s n yimferǧen-ines ? 

 D tidet! Urar n umezgun mačči d ayen isehlen maḍi, imi yettḥettim ɣef uzeffan ad yeffeɣ akk seg yiman-is, seg tudert-is I wakken ad ibeggen tudert n wiyaḍ. Yeḥwaǧ aṭas n usfuggel (la concentration). Uqbel ad yeffeɣ ɣer yimferǧen, ilaq ad yili yettkalay ɣef yiman-is, yumen s wayen ixeddem, ad iheggi iman-is akken iwata lḥal am wakken ad yali ɣef usayes(sur scène). Ur ilaq ara ad iḥulfu s yimferǧen i as-d-yezzin. Di lmux-is, ilaq ad yili d awḥid akken ur t-yettaṭaf ara lxuf. Yewwi-d, ad yili d afessas ur nettɛawad kan i umeslay, ad yeqfiz, ad yewwet akken ad yejbed imferǧen ɣur-s, ama s umeslay neɣ s wurar-ines d teḍsa. Mi ara tekfu tceqquft-is, ilaq imferǧen ad fehmen lmaɛna-s, ad ffɣen ferḥen s wayen walan.

  Anda-t umgarad i yellan gar umezgun aqbur d utrar? 

 Amezgun yemxalaf di lweqt ɣer wayeḍ, seg lqern wis 16 neɣ 17 almi d tura. Amezgun di lweqt n yiɣriqeyen yettabaɛ kan ddin. Di temcarḍin-nsen, tettunefk-asen tegnit ad cnun icewwiqen n ddin. Bdan-tt-id yakan akka, imi ɣur-sen i d-yennulfa umezgun, uɣalen syin akkin sskecmen-d tasertit d wayen yeɛnan tugdut-nsen kan. Tturaren-t di berra anda i t-ttwalin akk lɣaci. Ma nuẓa akka ciṭṭuḥ ɣer lweqt n Ṛruman, amezgun ɣur-sen yettwaxdam i yigelliden kan d wid yesɛan ccan, rnu ur sɛin ara azref ad mmeslayen ɣef tsertit. Simmal ad nettaẓ ɣer sdat, ad naf aṭas n tɣawsiwin i d-yernan imi zik daɣen amezgun yettwaxdam kan i yirgazen, d lɛib tameṭṭut ad tetturar di tceqqufin n umezgun. Mi ara nwali lweqt-agi-nneɣ tura, yennulfa-d kullec, amezgun yetturar-it urgaz, tetturar-it tmeṭṭut. Di tzeqqa-ines, tettunefk tegnit i medden merra ad t-ttwalin. Aṭas n umgarad yellan, ur nezmir ara ad nemmeslay ɣef kullec imi amezruy n umezgun d win meqqren mliḥ.

  Ad nuɣal ɣer yisura, mmeslay-aɣ-d ɣef yisinaryuyen i d-turiḍ ar tura… 

 Deg tazwara bdiɣ s tira n teqsiḍin timecṭuḥin, syin akkin neqleɣ ɣer tmedyazt, mbeɛd uɣaleɣ ttaruɣ ticeqqufin n umezgun d wamek i ssawḍeɣ ttaruɣ isura. Taceqquft tamezwarut i yuriɣ ɣef tmurt, d tin iwumi semmaɣ (Tiɣri n wakal) i d-yeffɣen deg ulzuz(marché) ass n 01 ɣuct-agi iɛeddan sɣur Akfadou production ( Aomar chibi). Sɛiɣ daɣen tin iwumi semmaɣ (Tarwa n Lezzayer) i d-yettmeslayen ɣef wayen iḍerrun di tugdut-nneɣ. (Larbi igellil) i d-yesbegginen tamɛict d ssber n yigellilen. Mi ara d-nuɣal ɣer yisura, yella usaru iwumi semmaɣ (Yir targit) i d-yettmeslayen ɣef yiwet n tlemẓit yettnadin ɣef baba-s… Llan diɣ wiyaḍ gar wid iwejden d wid i werɛad kfiɣ s tira i ssarameɣ ad d-ssufɣeɣ yiwen n wass.

  Ɛlaḥsab-im, d acu n wuguren i d-tettmagar tmellaɣt tazwawt, d acu i d tifrat i asen-iwulmen? 

 Ugur akk ameqqran i d -tettmagar tmellaɣt tazwawt neɣ taẓuri arkelli di tmurt n leqbayel, d lqella n ttawilat d tmussni. Anaẓur n tidet ad t-tafeḍ ilul-d yewwi-d yid-s taẓuri. Ur yezmir yiwen ad yuɣal d anaẓur ma ur as-tt-yefki ara Rebbi. Ḥulfaɣ a Kaysa taẓuri ɣur-neɣ d asɛeddi n lweqt. Ma nmuqel kan ɣer ccna, d acu ara d-nini tura di tmellaɣt neɣ deg umezgun? Ur asen-nefki azal-nsen iwulmen, d ayen i yeǧǧan ulin-d wid yessuguten awal, ɣlin wid iweznen ameslay. A win yufan ayen ndir ad d-nini diri-t, ayen yelhan ad t-nessaɛli akken ad yemɣur. Yewwi-d fell-aɣ ad nettbaɛ idles-nneɣ alama d aẓar , ilaq ad nessugmu iɣerbazen, ad slemden amezgun, ccna , lmusiqa, I wakken ad nefk tagnit i wid yessnen ad d-ufraren. A win yufan ad tuɣal d axeddim yesɛan azal akken ad rren medden ddhen-nsen ɣur-s.

  Tanemmirt a Nabila ɣef wayen i d-terriḍ. Rnu-aɣ-d awal n taggara. 

 Tanemmirt d tameqqrant i kemm a Kaysa. Tanemmirt i uɣmis-nwen. Ssarameɣ taẓuri lqayen ara as-yernun ccbaḥa i yidles-nneɣ. Nettɛenni Rebbi tagmat ad tsiɣ iẓuran deg wakal n tmurt-nneɣ, akken ad aɣ-d-teldi tewwurt, ad neddu ɣer sdat.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Testeqsa-tt: Kaïssa Khalifi 

  
 Tarbaεt umezgun «talwit»d tin yellan deg tɣiwant Ukeffadu taddart n tewrirt , deg useggas 1997 i tebda tetturar, seg yimiren ɣer useggas 2013 tekki di tdukla , syin teffeɣ iman-is anda gan tiggezt i wid iran , neɣ wid iḥemmlen tamellaɣt, ɣef uqerru-is mass «Sadek Hannat «d yiwen umedyaz, d amaru, dɣa yessewjad yiwen udlis anda ara yili ugbur anesbaɣur d tazrart n tceqqufin umezgun d wammud isefra, deg useggas 2012 yewwi arraz amezwaru deg Ukeffadu deg temzizelt n tmedyazt , yuget umaynut yesεa. Taɣda tewwi-tt-id «talwit»deg umeccwar n sinima , isental i ɣef ttawin d asdig yugten d idles, ansay, timetti, tawennaḍt ,izerfan n tmeṭṭut…. imeltaɣen yellan azal n mraw semmus (15) yid-sen gar-asen Faysel hannat d win id-yuraren deg usaru «Amɣar amcum» akk d wiyaḍ , win i d asen-id-yattawin asayes d Ccix Yidir d anaẓur yekcem di tẓuri tamatut «taklut, tasreɣta, unuɣen, tamedyazt, aẓawan dɣa ussan-a ad lin tazeqqa n uẓawan deg Ukeffadu d netta i d aselmad.Kkin deg waṭas n yirmad idelsanen,tifaskiwin deg uswir n tɣiwant neɣ di twilayt , anda llan deg wahil n tfaska di tifra ,itri n uqbu, Bgayet di tesdawit , di Tizi Wezzu di temnaḍt Ilula…..gnan yal amḍiq s tceqqufin-nsen id-yettaran iziɣer d tumert i wul , id-yessakayin imdanen, llan deg temzizelt di tama n Cemmini wwin-s azwil gar mraw yiwen (11 imenza d acu yella wugur deg ufraq n warrazen acku s tmussni imi talwit s wul, s yiseɣ , s yidles id-segdalen iman-sen. Isenfaren ugar n sdis (6) sya ɣer dzat , anda kecmen deg umahil asadar , gren-d abergges anda it-yeṭṭef yeṭṭef unaẓur «Billal idir» win ixedmen tesreɣta unuɣen, sewjaden amazrar n tmellaɣt ɣezzifen anda deg-s aṭas n yiḥricen , tafarest ad tili s tuget.Talwit d agraw n tẓuri , yal wa d acu yeṭṭef wa d tira , wa d aserkeb d usali, wa d abergges…..

  Tarbaεt n «talwit» d amaynut i tẓuri , d aɣbalu, d ameɣlid, d taɣersawt, d idles .

<p style="text-align: right;"> Azedine Abdous 

  
 Aṛumi ikcem-d tamurt n Lezzayer deg useggas 1830, di ɛecra n yiseggasen imezwura yuɣ akk tamurt n Lezzayer slid tamurt n Leqbayel. D marical Randon s wacḥal n lɛesker d leslaḥ amaynut n yimiren i issawḍen i tikkelt tamezwarut deg umezruy n tmurt, ad yerẓ lḥeṛma n udrar n Ǧerǧer. Ikcem idurar n tmurt n leqbayel deg useggas 1957, 27 n yiseggasen seg d-yessers aḍar-is deg wakal n Lzzayer. Send ad yaɣ akk tamurt n Leqbayel s yiɣil, At Qasi d nutni i d leḥkem. Wid i ten-iḥemlen, wid iɛedlen yid-sen qqaren-d, d At Qasi i yerran tacḍat n lḥerma ɣef tmurt n leqbayel di lwaqt n Uṭeṛki. Maca wiyaḍ, qqaren-d fell-asen belli seɣlin-d rrehba ɣef yimezdaɣ. Xedmen akken i asen-ihwa, xelqen-d laɛwayed i yiman-nsen, ḥekmen s ljuṛ. Qqaren-d mi ara d-iḥdeṛ yiwen ad izger azaɣar-nsen s zayla issefk fell-as ad as-yerr ṣrima ma ulac ad yečč leḥcic-nsen. Azaɣar akk d ayla-s. Win ara ten-iɛaṣṣin ttawin-t ɣer Lǧemɛa n Sariǧ anda sɛan lbiru ad ḥekmen fell-as. Qqaren-d sɛan din yiwet n txerrubt ttɛelliqen fell-as wid i ten iɛuṣṣen. Ma deg yella win i ten-iɛuṣṣen akken-nniḍen, ttawin-t ɣer uzaɣar, ad as-cudden ifassen d yiḍaṛṛen, ad as-smiren ayefki, ad t-ǧǧen din i yiṭij ad t-ččen yizan. Di lawan-nni, llan kra n yimedyazen imusnawen d-yewwin awal ɣef wat Qasi icban Ccix Muḥend u Lḥusin, Aɛmer Uqasi.. Imiren yella yiwen n ubudali d aderɣal n Lḥed n Izarazen si Tmizar n Sidi Menṣuṛ di Letnayen n Uɣrib izdeɣ tajwameɛt d tamejṭuḥt nnig ssuq. Tebna s uẓru wa ɣef wa, isberber fell-as imidek. Mi d-yekker ssbaḥ ad d-iffeɣ, ad indeh :

 <em>  </em>

 <em> Ssbaḥ lxiṛ fell-awen  </em>

 <em> A seddat Izarazen  </em>

 <em> A cetla ifeṛzen </em>

 <em> Ssbaḥ lxir fell-awen </em>

 <em> A wi ɣ-d-iwalen </em>

 <em> Ur ten-nwala </em>

 <em> Meqleɛ teqleɛ </em>

 <em> Tamda teblaɛ </em>

 Win ibɣan ad asen-yini, yini-asen Seg d-ikcem uṛumi tamurt n leqbayel, leḥkem n At Qasi iɣli, irgazen-nsen wa nɣan-t wa nfan-t, cci-nsen akk yewwi-t uṛumi …

  yettkemmil  

  Ramdane Lasheb 

  
 Am wakken i yella lḥal deg waṭas n tɣiwanin n tmurt, iwala umdan taggara-ya yenqes maḍi uncad n wakal i tuẓut sɣur wid yettawassnen yakan d ikerrazen, neɣ d wid yennumen xeddmen kra n tbeḥyar, d timerjaɛ, akken ad ten-id-ɛinent ulama kra deg tudert-nsen n yal ass. Sebba n waya mačči kan d afus i ixussen neɣ i ulac. Imi simmal tettnekkar-d tsuta tayeḍ tettruḥu tin n wid yuɣalen d imɣaren ass-a, trennu ula d tayri-nni i ttuɣ tella gar umdan ed wakal-is. Ur inuḥ lebɣi ɣur yilemẓiyen ad kkren ad neqcen ad ẓẓun, akken azekka ad ɣelten. Skud iban-d d ayen nniḍen akk i ten-yecqan. Maca, yella seg tama nniḍen wugur d ameqqran, i nezmer ad d-nini d amezwar i yessentagen assaɣ i yesɛa umdan akked tyerza: wa d ugur n ubnaw. D lebni i d-yezgan taggara-ya d aɛewwiq deg ubrid n ukerraz neɣ n umdan menwala i yeṭṭfen deg yidles n tuẓut. Aya, imi yal mara tedduḍ kra n yimiṭren deg yimukan i ttuɣ xlan, ad tafeḍ tanezduɣt neɣ snat. Ihi, annerni n yixxamen yekki aṭas deg unqas n tyerza deg yidurar ladɣa, am umedya n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel deg unẓul-asamar n waɣir n Bgayet. Ur ufan tabadut (lḥel) nniḍen yilemẓiyen i yebɣan ad gen axxam ala aqlaɛ n tmizar-nsen, ama d tid iqerben neɣ d tid n tẓegwa, akken ad sbedden axxam d amaynut, ladɣa wid i d-tettak lḥukuma deg yiseggasen-a ineggura. «D tidet. Aṭas n temnaḍin i nella nẓerr d timizar, iḥettem-d lḥal ass-a ad uɣalent d tinezduɣin. Rnu aya yettḥaza lɣaci merra». Akka i aɣ-d-tenna yiwet n temɣart. Yewwi-d ad d-nesmekti diɣ belli ula d tillin n waman s drus yeḍḥa-d d aɣilif i wid ixeddmen akal-nsen, abeɛda deg unebdu neɣ deg ssmayem!

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Asfugel n tmeγriwin d tmesbaniyin n yedles n teqbaylit d tmaziγit s umata, am usmekti n umuli wis 36 n tefsut n yimaziγen, amuli wis 15 n tefsut tabbarkant, d umuli wis 04 n tmettant n unaẓur Mhenni Amroun i yemmuten ass n 19 yebrir 2012, yemḍel azekka-ni n wass n 20 yebrir. Dγa Tiddukla Tadelsant Tiεwinin n Wizgan lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, tesudus-d yal seggas yiwen n leqdic s wazal-is i usebγes n tutlayt n tmaziγt. Dγa aseggas-a, timzizelt tis 03 n tzabut s tutlayt n tmaziγt n waraz Mhenni Amroun tella-d ass n 16 yebrir 2016, i yellan d ass aγelnaw n tusna. Tamesbanit-agi yesduritt-id uγarbaz amezwaru Hammadi Muḥend Saεid, id-yezgan di tlemmast n temdint n Wizgan, anda i ttekan di temzizelt-agi nnig n 270 n yinelmaden n 03 yeswiren yemgaraden, amezwaru, alemmas d tusnawit naγ wis 03, id-yussan si 70 n yiγarbazen temnaḍin yemgaraden n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu. Akken iḥedren nnig n 30 n yiselmaden n tutlayt n tmaziγt n temnaḍin yemgaraden n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, id-yeldin ulawen-nsen i leqdic-agi yesεan azal meqren. Igemmaḍ n temzizelt-agi bannen-d s wudem unṣib ass n 20 yebrir 2016, anda iεeggalen n tiddukla tadelsant tiεwinin n Wizgan, heggan-d yiwet n tmeγra meqren n tikci n warazen i wid id-yufraren deg 03 n yimukan imenza, d igardasen n usebγes i merra inelmaden. Igemmaḍ n temzizelt-agi , deg uswir amenzu d tanelmadt Hammoum Kenza i yeqqaren deg uγarbaz amezwaru « Bouda Muḥend Saεid », id-iḥaren amḍiq amezwaru. Aswir alemmas d tanelmadt Brahmi Faṭima n uγarbaz alemmas « Azoug Arab d mmi-s Saïd » id-ufraren deg umḍiq amezwaru. Ma yella d aswir wis 03 di tesnawit, d tamsiwt Sadi Lyticia d tanelmadt n tusnawit Kulunel Muḥend Welḥağ. Tameγraa-agi yesduritt-id wexxam n yedles kulunel Muḥend Welḥağ n taddert n Wizgan, s leḥdur n nnig n 300 n yinelmaden n yeswiren yemgaraden, imawlan-nsen, iselmaden n tmaziγt, inemhalen n yiγarbazen, imḍebren n tmahliwin n trebga d yedles n lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, imḍebren n tγiwant n Wizgan d waṭas niḍen. Iswi n temzizelt-agi n tzabut d asebγest n tutlayt n teqbaylit d usnarni deg uswir n yinelmaden, akken tutlayt-nnaγ ad- tifrir ger tutlayin niḍen. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 D adlis wis sin i d-yessufeɣ Mass Bouacherine Kader deg useggas-agi n 2016. Mebɛed mi d-yessezreg adlis ‘’Tirawalt’’ i d-yeffɣen, yakan, seg wagguren iɛeddan, ha-t-an yuɣal-d tikkelt-a ɣer temsirin n tjarrumt i yerra d adlis. D timsirin i yesselmed asmi yella d aselmad n tmaziɣt deg <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>uɣerbaz u d tid yesselmad akka tura deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu. Adris-a, <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>yebḍa-t d iḥricen : ad naf, deg tazwara, aḥric n <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>temsirin i d-yessegza s yimedyaten, aḥric wis sin d inzan, ma d aḥric wis tlata d tullisin i d-yerna Mass Bouacherine d tarzeft i yimeɣriyen. <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"></span> H Moula. 

  
 Mebla akukru, s kra n win yettnaḍaḥen ɣef tugdudt d tlelli n wawal ad ibedd s lqed, ad d-yessebgen lɣiḍ-is u ad yessiweḍ laɛwfu i yiniɣmasen n Charlie Hebdo d twaculin-nnesen. 

 Deg  yiseggasen n 90,  ugar n 100 d aneɣmas i yinɣa rebrab. Amezwaru deg-sen d Tahar Djaout. Imir ur nesla i yiwen  yenn-ak “nekk d Djaout”. Di tallit-nni d akabar n  François Hollande (PS) i yellan deg udabu n Fransa. Imir, ur necfi ara i isertiyen n PS neɣ wiyaḍ begnen-d lɣiḍ nnsen. Ula d ineɣmasen n Fransa, imir, ur d asen-nesli ara.  Slid kran n “les intellectuels», ulac  di ddunit win ibedden tama n yizzariyen yettmettaten imir “à huis clos”. Wiyaḍ am PS n Fransa fkan azuɣer i FIS, ddan d tsertit tasertant n “qui tue qui?”

 Almi d-teḍra twaɣit n 11 ctember di New York i ḥsan “qui tue qui», i tbeddel tmuɣli nnsen ɣer tneslemt tasertant. Tadyant-a n Charlie Hebdo terna tessak-id wid mazal ssertayen s “l’angélisme”. Ḥsan, ma yella dɣa ur yeqqur ara wallaɣ nnsen, belli rebrab mačč d azzayri, mačči d atunis, mačči… Rebrab d  fascisme ur nesɛi tilisa. Rebrab d aɛdaw  n tudert, n tlelli d wayen akk icerken talsa di ddunit. Ɣef aya , yal tikkelt i deg ara iwet di ddunit, akken ma nella ad as-nini nek d Djaout, nek, d Mohamed, Nek d Levy, nek d Mamadou, nek, nek d Youri, nek d Mao…..<span style="white-space: pre;"></span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> T.O.A 

  
  Aɣmis n Yimmaziɣen: Amek i ak-id-tusa takti tamezwarut deg ubrid n ccna a Mass Idir Bellali?  

   

  Bellali Idir  : Abrid n ccna akked win n uẓawan, bdiɣ-ten deg yiseggasen n 1972-1974, asmi i d-yessekcem yiwen seg twacult-iw iwumi qqaren Slimane Mammeri i tikelt tamezwarut tagiṭart ɣer taddart-nneɣ. Ttedduɣ yid-s ɣer lexla u ttaṭṭafeɣ-as-d lmizan ɣef yiri n tgiṭart-nni-ines. Syin akin, yusa-d yiwen n uselmad n taɛrabt ɣer uɣerbaz n taddart-nneɣ seg tmurt n Surya acku laṣel-ines d azzayri, imawlan-is unagen syagi deffir tanekra n Ccix Aḥeddad d Lmuqrani. Yeḍḥa-d uselmad-agi mačči kan d win n uɣerbaz amenzu maca d win yeɣran aẓawan, dɣa d netta i yi-yeslemden aṭas n lecɣal ama deg lmizan(dderbuka) neɣ deg uẓawan, imi yesselmed-iyi ad urareɣ ɣef wallal n lɛud. Isem-is Hebbache Khelil, dɣa ad farṣeɣ tagnit-agi i wakken ad as-rreɣ tajmilt tameqrant. Syin ɣer da rniɣ lemdeɣ ɣef yimeddukkal-iw d inaẓuren ukkud mlaleɣ, asmi liɣ d asdawan deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt, aẓawan atrar d ccna amḥaddi. Dinna i lemdeɣ daɣen ad urareɣ ɣef tgiṭart. Asmi daɣen i mlaleɣ Mass Rachid Bellik deg Tizi Uzzu, kecmeɣ ɣer uɣerbaz-ines n uẓawan n ccaɛbi deg uxxam n yidles n Lmulud At Mɛemmer, dɣa ɣur-s i rniɣ lemdeɣ-d aṭas n lecɣal n uẓawan-agi. D ayagi daɣen i yi-wwin, ad tturareɣ ɣef wallal amundul. Seg temẓi-w daɣen i lliɣ d win i isellen aṭas i ccna n yal tama deg ddunit s leṣṣnaf -is u s tutlayin-is yemxallafen. Mebla ccek, d annect-agi akk i yi-ṣawḍen ad cnuɣ yiwen wass.

  D acu i d tameltilt I ak-yeğğan ad taɣeḍ abrid n tira n tmedyazt?  

 Ayagi icudd ɣer uẓawan akked ccna-nni i lliɣ xeddmeɣ, acku deg-sen llan wawalen i iweznen, isefra, inzan ayen akk iwumi nezmer ad nsemi tamdyazt s umata. Rnu ɣef annect-agi, ɣriɣ u mazal-iyi la qqareɣ aṭas n tmedyazt n yimedyazen n tmurt n Lezzayer d tin n yimedyazen n tmura tiberraniyin s tutlayin yemxallafen. Ayagi iɛawen-iyi s waṭas i wakken ad sɛuɣ timuɣliwin d tikta i ɣef ara sefruɣ.

  Ahat asefru-k amezwaru, turiḍ-t deg temẓi-k?  

 Am tuget n yimedyazen, deg imi lliɣ d acawrar i bdiɣ smudyuzeɣ, qqareɣ-d iḥulfan-iw, tirga-w, asirem-iw, mmaleɣ-d timmad-iw u ssutureɣ izerfan-iw…atg.

  S usmedyez tuɣaleḍ ɣer ccna sakin ɣer usizreg n yidlisen?  

 Am wakken iten-id tenniḍ msetbaɛend wa s deffir, n wa, wa icud ɣer wa, wa yettawi-d wa. Ccna akked uẓawan akked tɣuri sawḍen-iyi ɣer tira u tagi tewwi-iyi ɣer tsuqilt acku simmal ɣareɣ, ttafeɣ-d tikta i yi-ɛnan, i yi-ttaɛǧaben, i yi-ttqenniɛen dɣa qqareɣ-as ilaq-iyi ad tent-id-rreɣ ɣer teqbaylit i wakken ad tent-issinen u ad nesnerni tamussni-nneɣ. Am wakken daɣen tikta i yi-ttaɛǧaben s teqbaylit, ttareɣ-tent ɣer tefransist i wakken ad tent-ɣren wid ur nettutlay ara s teqbaylit.

  Anwi imyura iwumi tessuqleḍ idlisen-nsen ?  

 Ad d-bedreɣ kra n yimyura n tmurt-iw iwumi suqqleɣ idlisen-nsen, yella Youcef Merahi iwumi i d-suqqleɣ seg tefransist ɣer teqbaylit adlis iwumi isemma « A rebours d’Oran » « Tuɣalin si Wahran », adlis n Ahecen Mariche iwumi isemma « Tazlagt n tikta » i d-rriɣ ɣer tefransist « Collier d’idées ». Ma d ayen yaɛnan imyura iberraniyen ad d-bedreɣ tamedyazt u tamyarut n tmurt n l’Equateur « Rocio Duran Barba » iwumi i d-suqqleɣ sin seg yidlisen-ines ɣer teqbaylit, yiwen tsemma-as « Le verbe du désert » « Awal n sseḥra » wayeḍ tsemma-as « Qu’est-ce que le sacré?» « D acu i d uɣris ? ».

  Acimi d tamedyazt i d-sazregeḍ mačči d idlisen n tsusyulujit, neɣ ahat d ayen-nniḍen?  

 Tura akk ssufɣeɣ-d sin wammuden n tmedyazt, acku d wigi i yellan heggan. Sɛiɣ takti i wakken ad aruɣ ɣef tsusyulujit, imi nekk d tinna i ɣriɣ deg tesdawit, maca akken qqaren, ttemyezwaren lecɣal.

  Mmeslay-aɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef umecwar-ik deg tira akked ccna…  

 Ad d-nebdu s ccna imi deg-s i zwareɣ, ar tura akka ssazergeɣ-d tlata n tesfifin. Tamezwarut deg useggas n 1989, semmaɣ-as “Yewweḍ wass”, llant deg-s 6 n tezlatin. Tis snat deg useggas n 2003, semmaɣ-as “Asefru”, ideg llant 8 n tezlatin. Ma d tis kraḍ tella-d deg useggas n 2015, semmaɣ-as “Sidi Valentin”. Llant deg-s 6 n tezlatin. Tizlit-agi n “Sidi Valentin” tella d asefru n umeddakkel-iw Ahcene Mariche. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer tira, ɣur-i akka tura sin n wammuden n tmedyazt, i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2016 ɣer tezrigin “Arts et Plume” n Tizi Uzzu. Amezwaru d ajgagal ideg llan 32 n yisefra s teqbaylit. Ma d wis sin d “Perle d’Ineda” ideg llan 30n yisefra s tefransist.

  Ayɣer d “Ajgagal” akked “Perle d’ineda” i textareḍ d izwal n yidlisen-ik?  

 Ajgagal d ammud ideg ara naf isefra i uriɣ deg talliyin d tugnatin yemxallafen d aymi ara ad d-naf deg-s- isental yal wa ɣef wacu i d-yettawi, gar-asen : tudert, tayri, timetti…atg. Ma d azwel Ajgagal d awal yesɛan azal meqqer yerna d awal qrib ad yettwattu. Nekk kseɣ-d seg-s amyag « jgugel » i wakken ad greɣ tiɣri i wid akked tid i iqeddcen s tmaziɣt neɣ ɣef tmaziɣt, belli ilaq-nneɣ ad nejgugel deg umrar n yidles d umezruy ameɣradan i wakken ad neddu akken akk la tteddunt tmura i ileḥḥun ɣer sdat deg ubrid n tmussni d tussna deg yal aḥric. Ma d ammud « Perle d’Ineda » d win ideg ara naf kra n yisefra n wummud « Ajgagal » i suqleɣ ɣer tefranist u rniɣ-as-d isefra-nniḍen i yuriɣ s tefransist gar-asen asefru iseg i d-kseɣ azwel i d as-fkiɣ i wammud-agi. « La perle » iban d belli d taɛeqquct i d-yettenkaren deg yillel, ma d « Ineda » d isem i d as-fkiɣ i yillel ideg ara ttnadiɣ taɛeqquct-agi ur ufiɣ ara u ssarameɣ ahat yiwen wass ad tt-afeɣ, ayɣer ala !

  Acimi ur ak-nettwali ara aṭas n yiseggasen-agi deg tmeɣriwin ɣef usayes? 

 Ayen yeɛnan timeɣriwin tunṣibin neɣ tid i d-tssuddus ddula, ur I yi-tteɛraḍen ara, ur zriɣ ara acimi? Ma d timeɣriwin n madden, ttɣenniɣ anida i yi-necden, yerna nekk ḥemmleɣ aṭas ad cnuɣ deg tiddukkliwin tidelsanin d tesdawiyin.

  Awal-ik n taggara?  

 Ad iniɣ tanemmirt i uɣmis « La dépêche de Kabylie » i yi-fkan tagnit-agi i wakken ad d-mmleɣ leqdic-iw deg yiḥricen-agi n tmedyazt akked ccna. Ssarameɣ ad nernin yisebtar n tmaziɣt deg uɣmis-agi-nwen iwumi ssarameɣ afud ameqqran u ad yili i lebda.

  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 19 meγres 1962, nγil d amezyadu n lehna, tefra tegrawla n Lezzayer, Krim Belqasem yerra talast i lhers, yessufeɣ leɛtab n yizzayriyen ɣer tafat. Deg uzekka-nni n timunent n tmurt n Lezzayer, Krim yugi ad yeqbel asqamu yettwasbedden n FLN, imi yugi rray n Ben Bella. Deg useggas n 1965, asmi i d-yuli Bumedyen ɣer leḥkem, ibedd Krim mgal iɣil yettwasxedmen, d ubrid i d-wwin widen yewwḍen ɣer tqacuct. Deg useggas n 1967 yeslul-d yiwen n ukabar MDRA, maca gten fell-as wuguren, dγa deg useggas-agi kan yunag γer tmurt n Lalman mi akken i as-sbabben aɛrad n tmenɣiwt n uselway Bumedyen, almi i as-ḥekmen s lmut deg useggas n 1969. Deg wass n 18 di tuber 1970, Krim yettwanɣa di Franckfurt, tamurt n Lalman, daxel n texxamt n usensu anda yettidir, ufan-t yettwaxneq seg yiri!!!? Ass n 24 di tuber 1984, nuqlen-d iɣsan-is ɣer tmeqbert n yimeɣrasen i temnaḍt n Lεalya n Lezzayer tamaneγt. Ihi yura deg umezruy Azzayri dakken Krim d netta i ijerden timunent n tmurt n Lezzayer. Krim Belqasem, ilul ass n 14 dujember 1922, di taddart n Tizra Σissa, deg At Yaḥya Musa, di temnaḍt n Draε El Mizan. Yekker-d ger yiwet n twacult i yeqaden iman-is aṭas. Yelmed deg uγarbaz amezwaru di temdint n Lzzayer (1936), almi i d-yewwi Yezzi-d useggas, yewweḍ-d ad yesεeddi akayad akken ad ikemmel ulmud-is, maca tagara ur yesεedi-ara, γef aya Krim ur yelmid-ara deg uγerbaz afellay (Ecole superieure). Syen , yuγal unemhal n uγerbaz nni mass Herbelin, yeγtes at-id-yesuffe&amp;gamma,; γef aya, Krim yuγal-d γer taddart-is s war asenfar n taggara (Sans projet d’avenir). Deg seggas1940, Krim iruḥ ad yexdem d amaray di tγiwant tamassayt n Draε El Mizan, deg seggas nni kan yeγtes ad yezweğ, Krim yefren yiwet n teqcict takat-is d tamesbaγurt (riche) si temnaḍtn Lemεetqa (Tizi-Wezzu). Deg ussan imezwura n tefsut 1941, γlin-d yegna ger-as d unedbal, krim yeğğa Draε El Mizan, yuγal γer taddart-is deg seggas n 1942. Syen Krim Belqasem, yebda asennefrey (Sensibiliser) ilmeẓyen n taddart-is deg umenzu n yulyu 1943. Ass n 4 maggu 1943 yekčem γer lεesker di temnaḍt n Leγwaṭ. Dγa, yezzi-d useggas kkan cegεen-id γer temnaḍt n Blida deg seggas n 1944. Ass n 26 unbir 1944, iεellaq (Caporal), yezzi-d useggas, amenzu n yulyu1945, beddlen-t rran-t γer tγiwant n inemhalen Izzayriyen(RTA; Régiment des Travailleurs Algériens). Ass n 04 tuber εellqen-as (Caporal Chef), ssin n yiseggasen d wezgen γer zdat yelḥaq izirigen n Ukabar Aγerfan n Lzzayer (PPA). Meγres 1948, Krim ittwaṭṭef ssin n yiseggasen γer useckret (lḥebs) n Tizi-Wezzu.

 Ass n 03 yulyu 1954, tella-d temlilit ger sdis (06) n yiγellaten imazrayen (chefs historiques), syen Krim yuγal yeṭṭef tamurt n Leqbayel ; yuγal seg wid i d-yekkren ilmend n tegrewla n unbir 1954, ladγa yella yid-sen Σebban Remḍan d kra n waggagen (Intellectuels) nejmaεen di Lzzayer tamanaγt. Di temlilit n Summam, yedda d Uεemran, farnen amḍiq i deg tella teγllist (Sécurité). Annect-a yella-d sγur krad (03) n yergazen ; Krim, Σebban d Ben Mhidi, di tagara yella-d usebded ger tejmaεt n wesdukel d uselkem(CCE) d wesqamu aγelnaw n tegrewla Tazzayrit (CNRA). Di 1957 yeğğa Lzzayer yuγal yunnag γer tmurt n Tunes, iffeγ netta d Ben Ṭubbal, Ben Xedda, Σebban Remḍan d Deḥleb. 19 ctember 1958, di tmurt n Ccam, Ferḥat Σebbas igger-d tiγri i wakken a d-yesbed akabar iwumi semman; Anabaḍ Amazguz n Tegduda Tazzayrit (GPRA) a d-yilli γef yidis n tejmaεt n wesdukel d uselkem (CCE) di tmurt n Tunes, syen Aselway n tegduda n Tunes Mass Burggiba ifka-d unuγ (Liste) unṣib i wegdud n imasladen (Membre) n Unabaḍ Amaguz n Tegduda Tazzayrit (GPRA), dγa Krim rran-t d aneγlaf n yiγallen n ignan (Ministre des forces armées) maca, Krim yebγa taselwit (présidence) acku d netta i yellan d aγellat amazray (Chef Historique), siwa netta i yekkaten γef tlelli n tmurt maca Buṣuf d Ben Ṭubal rran a d-kksen aneγlaf n yiγallen n yignan, fkkan amḍiq-is i Bumedyen. Krim bγan a t-rren d aneγlaf n lecγal n berra deg wemḍiq n umejjay Lamin Debaγin, yerna di tmurt n Ccam aseggas n 1960. Di tagara n 1961 yeğğa Ccam yuγal yunnag γer tmurt n Russ d Ccinwa. Ass n 11 furar 1962 γef tsaεet n lwaḥda d wezgen n uzal (13h 30), tella-d temlilit ger uγella n tegrewla tazzayrit (Délégation Algérienne) akk d Luwis jux, dinna i bdan imastagen (Négociation) . Ass n 07 maggu 1962 γef 11h 15, Krim izmel, yekcem di «EVIAN». Tameddit n wass n 17 maγres 1962 tella-d yiwet n temlilit deg wexxam ameqran n tegrewla Tazzayrit. 18 maγres 1962, Krim izmel yiwen n umazrar n 39 n yisebtar. Krim yemmut deg usensu n Frankfurt di tmurt n Lalman ittwaxnaq seg iri!!!? <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Ass-nni n ahad iεeddan, 15 ɣuct 2017, i tebda tfaseka n umezgun, deg tezrigt-is tis 11, s wudem unṣib deg wulmis adelsan Malek Bouguermouh yellan deg tɣiwant n Amizour deg lwilaya n Bgayet. Tekkfa ass-nni n 20 ɣuct 2017 yezrin. Tella-d tfaska-agi yeddan ɣef teɣzi n seddis n wussan, i gan aseggas-agi, d tajmilt i Mass Malek Boukhiar, yellan d axeddam deg tenmehla n yilmeẓyen d waddal n Bgayet. D tafaska ideg ttekkint waṭas n liwlayat n tmurt n Lezzayer, ama s trebuyaε n umezgun, ama s yimura akked yinaẓuren-nniḍen i ixedmen timsikniyin yemxalafen, i d-yerzan seg: Batna, Tizi Uzzu, Tubiret, Boumerdés, Sétif, M’Sila…atg. Ma d lwilayat i d-yesnaεten imuhal-nsent idelsanen d: Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, Lemdiya, Tubiret…atg. Am wakken i d-yella leqdic adelsan d anesbaɣur, ɣef teɣzi n setta wussa ideg teḍra tfaska-agi deg tezrigt-is tis mraw d yiwen. Llant-d deg-s temsikniyin yemgaraden, isenza s ubuddu, isaragen, turart n umezgun…atg. “Deg tirza-nneɣ ɣer dinna, nwala belli ilmeẓyen n tɣiwant n Amizour neɣ n Bgayet s umata, ḥemmlen aṭas amezgun, imi yal taceqquft i d-yellan llan-d di tiεad, imi tezga teččur tzeqqa armi d ulamek”, I d-yenna yiwen yekkan deg tfaska. D Mass Ali Guettal i d-fernen yimsuddsen n tfasaka-agi i wakken ad yili d aselway n tesqamut n uktazal d usenqed n tceqqufin n umezgun, tama n waṭas yimussnawen deg umezgun. Ma d ass-nni n lhed 20 deg waggur n ɣuct 2017, tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i wid yettekkin deg temlilit-agi tis 11, am wakken daɣen i fkan arrazen i tceqqufin i d-yufraren. Ihi ha-ten-in wid i d-yufraren: arraz n turart ifazen ɣef usayes (mise en scene) yuɣal i terbaɛt “Tabrat n umezgun” n M’Sila. Ma d arraz n tsifrant n tmeṭṭut (meilleur interpretation feminine) tewwi-t Massa Benyoucef Tiziri, yettekkin ɣer terbaɛt n “Timesdurar” n Bgayet. Ma d win n urgaz iḥella-t-id Mass Ghanem Faïz n terbaɛt “Lferg” n Boumerdés Am wakken daɣen i yettunefk warraz n uẓawan anaṣli igerrzen i terbaɛt Budwaw n Boumerdès, d win n uḍris icebḥen, iṣaḥ-d tarbaɛt “Lemri” n El Kseur n Bgayet. Ma d arraz n tesqamut yettunefk i terbaɛt “Awal n umezgun” n Bouandas n lwilaya n Sétif.

  Amazigh Ghani 

  
 TIZI-WEZZU – Aneɣlaf n yemǧahden, Tayeb Zitouni, yessawel i yizzayriyen ass n lǧemɛa di Tassaft Ugemmun, taddart deg ilul ukulunel Amirouche, di tɣiwant Ibudraren akken ad refden tiktiwin n tegrawla taɣelnawt akken ad ḥadren tagmatt ger tarwa n tmurt. Mas Zitouni, yellan di tmesbanit n wesmekti wis 57 n tmettant ukulunel Amirouche Ait Hamouda, yeɣlin deg wegni umennuɣ ass n 29 maɣres 1959 di twilayt n M’sila, akk d wemdakel-is akulunel Si El Houas, yenna-d belli akulunel Amirouche d yemdukkal-is yemmuten ɣef tlelli, werǧin qeblen amḥeṛṣan ad yennal akal d tegmatt ger yizzayriyen. « izumal-agi n wemgaru n weslelli aɣelnaw yellan di yal tama n tmurt yezdin idammen deg wannar umennuɣ, am umedya n ukulunel Si El Houas d Amirouche, yeɣlin jmiɛ deg umennuɣ di M’sila, mmuten akken ad aɣ-d-ǧǧen tamurt teddukkel u terked, d lwaǧeb fell-aɣ nukkni akken ad nḥader fell-as », ikemmel yenna. Aneɣlaf n yemǧahden yemmeslayen akk d yimawlan isallen ɣer yidis n tirza-yagi, yemmeslay ɣef wazal n tɣamsa deg usaḥbiber ɣef tegmatt ger tarwa n tmurt, ayagi s usiwel ɣer tegmatt d uleqqem usirem ger yizzayriyen d ibeddi mgal wid yettnadin ɣef beṭṭu », i yessaḥṛeṣ. Di tirza-yagi di taddart n tasaft ugemmun, aneɣlaf d terbaɛt-is yemmuger-iten Nouredine Ait Hamouda, mmis ukulunel Amirouche, deg wexxam-is. 

<p style="text-align: right;">   aps 

  
 Deg tɣiwant n At Ṛzin, i d-yezgan deg wenẓul n twilayt n Bgayet, yella dinna yiwen weɣbel d-amuqran. Wagi icud ɣer rṣaḍ. Akka, taɣiwant-agi ur tesɛi ara, ar ass-a, amḍiq i uḍegger n rṣaḍ. Ayagi, yeǧǧa wigi « ttufen » d ttirac deg berra, deg zenqan yagi n taddart n Ginduz, yellan akka d-aqerruy n tɣiwant. Yir rwayeḥ, iḍan d yimcac tetten deg ilefḍan nni, lfuḥa,…mači d yiwwet ar ad nebder! Imḍebren n tɣiwant ḥeṣlen amek ar ad xedmen? Akal ar ay ǧemɛn iḍuman ulac. Ṛran-t tewwura! Weqbel yir liḥala-agi, llan rṣaḍ n tɣiwant-agi n At Ṛẓin ttuḍegren ɣer yiwen wemkan iwumi ssawalen: Icuqar, i d-yezgan ɣef rrif n wassif Aɛebbas (ssawalen-as daɣen assif n Saḥel). D-acu, imezdaɣ yellan din, yaɛni i qarben i ugudi-agi, ṣebren acḥal d-aseggas i dduxan lakked d timas i ceɛlen ixeddamen n tezdeg n tɣiwant-agi. Alarmi d yiwen wass (kra n sin iseggasen aya) rfan, dayen « tewḍiten-id ɣer yiɣes », kren, ihi, squqren ixeddamen n tezdeg asmi id d-usan ad ḍegren rṣaḍ. Akka gezmen abrid yettawin ɣer ugudi n yicuqar. Seg wass-nni, imḍebren n tɣiwant ččan iqerray-nsen. Iḍumman ččuren deg berdan, yir rwayeḥ, iḍan xeguḍen s yiḍaren nsen,..lḥaṣun mači dayen ar ad neḥku! Akka, i teqqim lḥala kra n sin wagguren (deg useggas n 2014), maca yekker yiwen n mas, deg taddart-agi n Ginduz, yefka i tɣiwant, deg laɛḍil kan, akal akka i uḍeger n rṣaḍ. D-acu, ɛeddan iseggasen, amkan-nni yuɣal yeččur, ulamek ad rnun rṣaḍ nniḍen ! Akka, teqqim tɣiwant deg tezɣent-agi n rṣaḍ, ar ass-a ur as tufi tifrat. Ihi, rṣaḍ deg uqerru n tɣiwant n At Ṛẓin tzaden, rennun, seg wass ɣer wayeḍ. Ayagi ur yessefraḥ ara, imi iḍuman-agi neẓra d-acu i d ttawin d-aṭanen yuɛren. Yagi, imi id d-gren iman-nsen yiḍan lakked yimcac akken ad sferfuden s tinzar nsen deg rṣaḍ-agi « yesṭaɛṭiɛen » deg yal amkan. Imezdaɣ rfan dayen kan, ɣas akken mazal ur d sbegnen ara lɣiḍ nsen mgal « udem » n yimḍebren. Tagnawt deg taddart-agi t ttriḥi, ur yezmir ara wemdan ad iɛeddi zdat n igudiyen-agi…

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Ulamma aql-aɣ tura deg tegrest tasemmaḍt, lemḥayen n waman ḍulent ur kfant ɣef umezdaɣ n Bgayet. Am wass, am yiḍ, imḍebbren n yixxamen zgan d accekti ɣef lexsas n waman i d-yettuɣalen i tberninin-nsen. Ma tuɣ zun ala wid izedɣen tamdint i tent-yuɣen s waṭas, tura ula d idurar – taɣbalut tamenzut n waman-a – ḥeslen am umenṭas, ur ufin tifrat i ssaramen. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef snat n tɣiwanin n Usamar-anẓul n twilayt n Bgayet – Ayt Smaɛel d Tsexriwt – ad d-nini dakken tewweḍ tfidi s iɣes seg waṭas-aya. Tezger taluft aḥdid war ma yella-d ubeddel. Ayen yesḥeyyren ugar imdanen daɣen, d amek llan sin n yibarajen sdat-sen, maca ur rwin aman! Ɣef leḥsab n uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, Mass Ɛebdun Nasir, mi yettwasteqsa ussan iɛeddan, d ADE n Bgayet i yestehzan ɣef ccɣel n usiweḍ n waman seg Lɛenser Azegza ɣer Ayt Smaɛel. Imi d iseggasen tura segmi ɣillen At temnaḍt-a, ad d-jebden taɣbalut-a n tudert, meɛna am win yettraǧun taḍsa seg lmeyyet. Ladɣa segmi yerna yeḥbes ur iban, usenfar-a n tiwin n waman seg Leɛnaser. Amḍiq-a, i usmekti kan, yesɛa aṭas n waman am wakken nezmer ad nefhem deg yisem-is. D acu, ur tessaweḍ ar tura tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, ad teɣlet kra n tiqqa seg umkan-a yebbeẓbẓen s waman.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaisa Khalifi 

<div> 
  
 Aṭas n wansayen i aɣ-yettruḥun, imezdaɣ n tuddar yebda yettensarasen wayen bnan Wat-zik. Yal tallit, yettili-d umbeddal deg wansay-agi, imezdaɣ ssenqasen deg-s, llant kra n tɣawsiwin yewwi-d fell-aneɣ ad tent-neḥrez.

 Deg umagrad-agi, ad ɛeṛḍeɣ ad d-awiɣ awal ɣef tmeɣra n zwaǧ zik di taddart-nneɣ amek tella zik, d umbeddal i d-yellan skud teddun wussan. Mi ara yesɛu yiwen tameɣra n zzwaǧ, yella umgarad amek i tt-xeddmen ticekki d aqcic ara izewǧen neɣ ma yella d taqcict. Tameɣra n uqcic, ssemɣaren-tt ɣef tin n teqcict. Tameɣra n uqcic, tettek kraḍ (3) wussan, tin n teqcic sin (2) wussan kan.

<p style="text-align: center;"> I. Tameɣra n uqcic ( n yisli ) 

 Uqbel ad d-yawed wass n tmeɣra, ilaq imawlan n uqcic ad ɛeggnen (fiançailles) taqcict. Ma fran awal ad mtawan ɣef wass deg-i ara tettwixdem tmeɣra. 

 Zik-nni, uqbel tameɣra s waggur, tulawin ttalint ɣer udrar i wakken ad d-zedment isɣaren swayes ara sewwen ass-nni n tmeɣra. Mi d-mazal ddurt, axxam n yisli ad d-necden tiwelliyin-nsen, imdukal, lwasila-nsen akk, akken ad d-asen ad ḥedren ass-nni n tmeɣra. Tulawin ad heggint, ad fetlent seksu ɣef zik lḥal. Irgazen, mi mazal sin wussan ad zzlun azger. Tagara-agi seg wakken ɣlayet teswiɛt, lɣaci mačči aṭas i izellun azger, ttawin-d kan aksum deg ugezzar. 

  1. Ass amenzu 

 Deg uxxam n uqcic, tettban d tameɣra: tilawin tawint izlan, slewliwent, iraggun n sekksu akked useqqi ɣummen lḥara. I yimekli, sewwayen tikerciwin n uzger-nni yemmezlen, deg-s ad ččen Wat-uxxam d yimeɛraḍ. Uqbel lfattiḥa, axxam n uqcic ad d-awin i uxxam n teqcict azal n wayen ara d-ččen wid ara yeɣren lfattiḥa. Ha-t-an wayen ttawin: taɣruḍt n uzger, awren, lxeḍra…atg

 Ass-nni deg-i ara ɣren lfattiḥa, axxam n yisli ad heggin wid ilaqen ad ddun, gar yirgazen akked tlawin, akken ad ddun s axxam n teqcict. Tilawin, ad awint tabalizt deg-s : taṣabunt, timeḥremt, tayuga n sebbaḍ, lḥenni, taqendurt. Irgazen, ad ssiwlen i ccix n ljamaɛ, ad t-awin yid-sen. Ass-a llan wid izewwiren lfattiḥa aladɣa wid ara d-yawin tislit anda yebɛed. 

 Tameddit n wass ad yili imensi, ad ččen akk Wat taddart, wid ur nezmir ara, seččayen kan adrum. Mi yekfa imensi d lawan n lḥenni n uqcic, ad yerres lmetred degs : timellalin ( ilaq snat ɣef snat mačči d timferdin : 2, 4 neɣ 6… ), lḥenni, tafzimt n lfeṭṭa. S yidis n lmetred tella : tmeḥremt i wid-nni ara yefken lxir (idrimen) akked tcekkart n lmelḥ ara suzzren i tebraḥt n urar, i wakken ad imliḥen wussan n yisli. Isli, ad as-yeqqen lḥenni win meqqren di laɛmer, jeddi-s neɣ baba-s. Ma ur yesɛi ara jeddi-s neɣ baba-s, ad as-yeqqen ɛemmi-s neɣ xali-s. D win ara as-yeqqnen lḥenni ara t-id-yessufɣen di texxamt-is ɣer umreḥ deg-i ara yeqqen lḥenni. Llan wid ixeddmen urar, urar n yiḍebbalen s ugerbuz, abendayer d lɣiḍa, llan wid yesɛeddayen kan tameɣra s usenzi n lḥenni akked teɣratin n tlawin neɣ s yizlan n tlawin. Zik urar yettili-d deg ufrag n uxxam, tikwal maḍi d lxalat i t-ixeddmen, win i wumi neqqar : urar n lxalat. Mi ara ɣren s imensi ad asen-inin : «ruḥ-ten ad teččem imensi u yerna ad tferǧem urar». Win ur nettwaɛrad ara akka, ur yettɣimi ara ad iferreǧ urar. Deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura, uraren xedmen-ten deg yimraḥ n taddart. Llan wid d-yettawin icennayen. Lɣaci, argaz, tameṭṭut ceṭṭḥen. Yella wanda i d-ttawin win yesnuzuyen lḥenni, netta ad d-yettawi isefra, tulawin ad as-d-siɣritent, kan akken alamma yekfa lḥenni. Asnaz n lḥenni : d isefra n ucekkar n Wat uxxam, isli, tislit akked wid akk iḥedren dinna. Yella wanda d tulawin i yesnuzuyen lḥenni s yizlan. Isli ad yeqqen lḥenni, imezdaɣ n taddart, imdukal-is d wid akk iḥedren dinna, ad as-fken lxir (idrimen). 

 Mi yekfa wurar, yal wa ad yuɣal s axxam-is. Yemma-s n yesli ad d-heggi tid ara ifetlen seksu i yiḍ-nni akked tid ara iɛerken uggi n lesfenǧ d tid ara yerren iccuyen n useqqi i tanzayt n wass. 

  2. Ass wis sin 

 Azekka-nni, ad yili imekli i iqeffafen ara yeddun ad d-awin tislit. Sewwayen lbaṭaṭa yeqlan, lubyan taleqqaqt d iḥendarcayen n uksum yeqqlan di zzit. Wiyaḍ, xeddmen seksu d useqqi s yiftaten n uksum.

 Mi kkfan ad ruḥen ad awin tislit. Zik tislit ttawin-tt-id s userdun, s uɛudiw, ass-a s tkeṛṛust. Tarbaɛt n tlawin yettawin izlan ad ḍeffrent deffir tislit ad ttawint izlan. Tettilid terbaɛt n yiḍebbalen, sya ɣer da, ttawin-d tazwayt, tulawin slewliwent, wa iceṭṭeḥ, wa yeṭṭafar anya d-ttawin iḍebbalen. 

 Mi ara awḍen s axxam n teslit. Tislit, ad tessew aman tlata (3) n tikkal deg urawen n baba-s neɣ gma-s, neɣ xali-s… Ad kecment tlawin ɣer texxamt n tislit, ad as-d-cebbḥent. Mi ara teffeɣ teslit deg uxxam n baba-s, ad tt-id-yessufeɣ netta neɣ gma-s neɣ xali-s… ad d-teffeɣ s ddaw laɛnaya n baba-s neɣ gma-s. Mi ara d-taweḍ ɣer tewwurt, baba-s ad yerfed afus-is ad d-tɛeddi s wadda n teɣruḍt-is. 

 Ad ḍfer lɛada deffir n teslit, deg-s ad naf ttawin : tiḥbulin ( llan wid yettawin lemsemmed), timellalin, asenqud i deg-i ara tawi lqecc-is. Mi tt-yessuli baba-s neɣ gma-s ɣef uɛudiw, ad yerkeb deffir-s, ad tt-yeṭṭef akken ur d-tɣelli ara. Tura lqecc n teslit ttawint deg yiḍ.

 Mi ara d-taweḍ teslit s axxam n yisli, ad tt-id-yemmager yesli ɣer tewwurt, ad iruḥ ad as-d-yeṭṭef afus, ad bedden sdat n tewwurt. Uqbel ad tekcem s axxam, lal n uxxam, tamɣart, ad d-tawi lḥila n waman ad tger deg-s lfeṭṭa, tislit d yisli ad gren ifassen-nsen deg-s. Ma ilul ugrud deg uxxam-nni neɣ tislit i ɣef ur d-yezzi ara useggas, daɣen ad gren ifassen-nsen di lḥila-nni n waman. Yemma-s n yisli, ad d-theggi abuqal yeččur d aman akked uɣerbal (ṭṭbeq). Deg uɣerbal-nni, ad naf deg-s : irden, ibawen, nnaɛma, sskeṛ, timellalin ( timellalin ilaq snat ɣef snat, mačči d timferdin 2 neɣ 4, 6… ) Lal n uxxam, ad tesmir ciṭuḥ n waman s urawen n teslit, tislit ad tanez fell-asen, ad tent-tettarra ɣer sdaxel n ubuqal kraḍ (3) n tikkal. S wurawen-is, ad tent-tɛelli ɣer deffir-s, ɣer lɣaci i d-iḍeffren krad (3) n tikkal. Aɣerbal-nni daɣen kifkif, ad tanez fell-as am waman-nni. S wurawen-is, ad d-teččar urawen-is, ad tanez fell-as, ad tent-tettarra ar sdaxel n uɣerbal kraḍ (3) n tikkal. S wurawen-is, ad tent-tɛelli ɣer deffir-s, ɣer lɣaci I d-iḍeffren krad (3) n tikkal. Lɣaci, ad refden ifassen-nsen akken ad d-cellqen timellalin, aladɣa timellalin. Tura deg uɣerbal ad naf daɣen, leḥlawat, lgaṭu…atg Lal n uxxam, ad d-tcudd isli d teslit s waggus, ad ten-terrnu alwes-is akked tnuḍt-is ma tella, ad tent-ssekcem akken cudden s axxam, ad asen-tini : «zwiret awlidi s uḍar ayeffus, ad isdakel Rebbi lxawa-nwen, ad awen-qaɛden wussan…». Lal n uxxam ad d-tessufeɣ snat lejfun n seksu d lḥemmez, lbaṭaṭa, zrudiya s zzit. D lweɛda i yimezdaɣ n taddart. Tameddit-nni, ad seččen daɣen imesni wis sin, am wass amenzu. Mi yekfa imensi, d ass wis sin n tmeɣra s iḍebbalen. Ass-a yiwen n yimensi kan ixeddmen. Tislit, ad d-tbeddel lqecc-is. Ass-nni ur ikeččem ara ɣer ɣur-s yisli, ad tgen di texxamt-is nettat d ultma-s, neɣ xalti-s. 

  3. Ass wis kraḍ (3)  

 Azekka-nni, imawlan n teslit ad d-uɣalen ad ẓẓren taqcict-nsen, wa ad ččen imekli. Mi d tameddit, tislit ad as-beddle lqecc-is, ad as-kksen akerzi, ad as-selsen taksiwt akked tjellabt. Ad as-beggsent s waggus ɣef wammas-is, ad as-selsent timeḥremt ɣef uqerruy-is, ad ɛelqent lfeṭṭa. Mi d-teffeɣ ad as-cberbren i uqerruy-is s tmeḥremt neɣ s lfuḍa. Ad teqqim akken, tulawin yettawin izlan ad as-zzint aɛarus. Mi i as-kfant tuzzya n uɛarus, ad iɛeddi umɣar-is neɣ alwes-is ameqqran, ad as-yegzem tamzurt (ccuca), tislit ad tanez ɣef uqerruy-is. Mi i as-kezmen tamzurt ad as-yefk tiẓri (idrimen) win i as-tt-igezmen, ad t-tebɛen ilewsan-is d wat-uxxam n yisli akked teslit, dɣa ad tent-tejmaɛ. Mi tent-tejmaɛ, ad teffeɣ teslit ɣer tala ad d-tagem. Ad truḥ temɣart-is, ad as-d-tawi abuqal d ilem, ad t-teṭṭef deg ufus-is ayeffus, ma deg ufus azelmaḍ ad tekmes takemmict n lemlaḥ, ad tetteddu deg ubrid ɣer tala, ad tessuzur ciṭuh ciṭuḥ, allen-is ad asent-tebru di lqaɛa. Ad as-teṭṭef afus uletma-s neɣ xalti-s, ɛemit-s n uqcic si tama. Si tama-nniḍen, uletma-s, neɣ xalti-s nettat. Tarbaɛt n tlawin, ad ddunt deffir-s, ad awint izlan. Mi tewweḍ ɣer tala, ad tḍegger lemleḥ-nni i d-yeggran deg ufus-is. Ad tessired mliḥ ifassen-is. Ad d-teččar abuqal-nni, ad tefk i warrac ad swen d imezwura. I warrac kan, akken ad tesfillet ad d-tesɛu amenzu-ines d aqcic, syinna ak-in, ad asent-tefk i teḥdayin. Uqbel ad uɣalent tlawin ad awint izli-agi, ad cekkrent aɛessas n umkan-nni. Mi d-uɣalen si tala, dayen tefra tmeɣra, yal yiwen ad yennejmaɛ s axxam-is. Deg yiḍ-nni ad as-d-tessu temɣart-is, ad as-tini : «Ha-t-an umḍiq-im, ssiɣam-id». Isli d teslit dinna ara ṭṭsen iḍ-nni. Azekka-nni, tafejrit uqbel ad yadan ccix, ad d-yeffeɣ yisli si texxamt akken ur yettemlil ara akk d wat-uxxam-nsen, acku ttsetḥin. Taṣebḥit, mi d-tekker teslit, ad ttruḥ ɣer temɣert-is akked xwalti-s neɣ ɛmumti-s n yesli i wakken ad walin cacc-nni acebḥan ma yumes d idammen, ad sɣertent. Ma ur yumis ara d idammen, ad ssiwlen i uxxam n teslit, ad ruḥen ad t-rren s axxam-nsen. Tislit, ur tetteffeɣ ara akken 7 wussan. Mi d-tezzi ddurt, axxam n uqcic ad xedmen sbuɛ. Tislit, ad terzef s axxam-nsen maca ur tettnusu ara. Mi ara d-tuɣal, ad tawi yid-s tarzeft ( seksu, lesfenǧ, skar…atg)Yettkemmil…

<p style="text-align: right;"> Fahim Messaouden  

  Lilia Ouchene 

  
 Ɣas akka 18 n yiseggasen segmi yettwaɣḍer Lounès di tala Bounane ass n 25 di yunyu 1998, mazal-it yezdeɣ allaɣ n kra n win yumnen s umennuɣ d ubrid I d-yenjer.

 Amulli n tmettant-is ibeggen-d acḥal I mazal teckenteḍ deg-s tmurt n Leqbayel iwumi iɣef yecna s ttnefxa d zzux, tin akken iɣef isebbel tudert-is asmi akken yeḥma useqqi, asmi akken aṭas I yettnadin anda ara sdergen iqerra-nsen segmi ara iɛeddi uɛeǧǧaǧu n tmes. Yak yezga yeqqar: “ d idurar I d leɛmer-iw”. Acu yeǧǧan asafu yessaɣ Matoub yettenfufud ar iḍ-a mi akka nettwali aṭas n yilmeẓyen ass-a usan-d s axxam-is, rzan-d ɣer uẓekka-s ɣas akken ur tessinen ara imi meẓẓiyit deg leɛmer ? D tizlatin-is I mazal d inigan ɣef tudert-is, d umennuɣ-is. Ass-a, mi ara nsel I wayen akk yecna, ad nesɣerbel ayen akk yexdem, d awezɣi ad yamen yiwen belli yedder kan 42 n yiseggasen. D amɣar azemni s timmad-is, imi yessefra, yessukkes-d ma drus acḥal d awal n teqbaylit seg tatut. Meɛna, yal ameslay yettawi ɣer tegmat, ɣer tdukli. Aya, ad t-naf deg tesfift-is taneggarut anda yenna: “imeslayen-nni n umeddakkel Lhachimi, d Dda Lhocine neɣ Sadi, yettakken abeḥri I turet.” Ayen daɣ ara d-ijebden lwelha n win akk yeṭṭafaren tizlatin-is, dakken yessezwar ineḍruyen amek akken ahat yeẓra ad d-ḍrun. D ayen ara naf deg tezlit-nni anda yeqqar: “Ass-agi lliɣ, azekka wissen, nniɣ-d ayen zriɣ d wayen I ttwaliɣ, cfut di terga ma ɣliɣ, d anzaw ara wen-d-yessiwlen.” Taggara-s yeẓẓel di terga di tala Bunan mi akken yemmar fell-as ubruri n rrṣas. D acu kan, ayen yettuɣaḍen ass-a n wussan d ayen iwumi neḥḍer deg umulli wis 18 n tmettant-is deg uxxam-is. Imdanen usan-d s ṭṭaqa ɣer Tewrirt, aẓekka-s idel s yijeǧǧigen, “la foundation” irefden isem-is tessewjed yiwen n wahil d amerkanti I usmekti-is. Maca, yella-d akka kra n yiceqqiq I izemren ad yaɣ aẓar ma yella mazal neṭṭafar abrid n tikreḍt. skud akka yal wa yeqqar d nekk ay d nekk ad nesluɣ tapwwint yessazdeg Lwennas. Anida-t yizen n Ugrawliw iteddun s uzday n lqedd ɣef tegmat mi neḥḍer I wid yeqqaren d nekkni ma ulac ala ? Ɣas ultma-s Malika ur as-ǧǧin ara awal deg…uxxam-is ! D leɛǧab. Nesla I yir ameslay yerran srid ɣer yiwen akken I tuḥwaǧ twacult n Matoub iwakken ad d-yefk cchada-s ɣef tmettant n Lwennas. Qqersen leqyud, yettwakkes sser ɣef yirgazen mi akken iwulem tixnefyac n lfuci ilaq ad rrent lewhi n yixṣimen yettwafeḍḥen. Lḥaṣun d awal-nni I d-yenna Lounis mi t-yeddem ula d netta uɛeǧǧaǧu n rregmat mi d-yenna:”on n’est pas encore sorti de l’auberge.” D lawan ad d-nesɣim i wawal imi d netta i iferrun tilufa iwakken «yal Aqbayli ad t-nesseḥḍer amek akka iteddunt temsal.” Yak d netta I t-id-yennan. Acku, abrid-a I d-nuɣ ad nebḍu am yibawen ɣef lluḥ ad as-ngerrez tamgerḍt uzaglu. Yewɛer ṣṣwab I tifin ! Ay tafat n tifrat, mmel-aɣ abrid ɣer sdat, ṭṭes di talwit ay agrawliw !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Smail. M 

  
 Azul fell-awen merra ! Acḥal aya i baɣ. Seg ass-nni ar ass-a, mačči d yiwet d-yenulfan. D’aborment, akken d as-yeqqar  da Racid, tuqqten les neurones deg uqerruy-iw. Tis snat kecmeɣ lakul. Lakul-agi qqaren-as s taɛrabt  ṭeḥḍiri, s tefransisit préscolaire, s teqbaylit, ur d  as-qqaren ara.

 Tis tlata, aseggas-a ad kecmeɣ lakul, le vrai lakul, anda akken ɣran akk les adultes yeqqersen.  Faut pas dɣa croire bellik les adultes akk qqersen. Llan wid i imeɛnen, am da Taleb Aḥacène. Wagi d argaz d nnefs d xemsa wacrin. Akka d-yenna baba. Lukan les adultes akk am netta i gan, ttili “ṭeḥḍiri” yesɛa isem s teqbaylit. Da Ḥsen i ba ddurt yezrin, yuli s itran. Yemma teqqar bellik kra seg les adultes ma ban, ttruḥun s itran. Kra nniḍen, ttban kan, yiwen ur yeẓri anda ttaran. Wiyaḍ, ur ban ur llin. Mais tagi n “ur ban, ur llin”  ur ttefhimeɣ ara.   ad tafeḍ anisati n ṭeḥḍiri seg wid-agi n “ur  ban, ur llin”. Ttuɣ ur d awen-d-nniɣ ara bellik ruḥeɣ ar Lpari. Nɛam ih ! Nek ɣileɣ ḥala lasiti, ṭeḥḍiri d ttdart -nneɣ i yellan di ddunit. Ayen nelḥ deg Lpari, ur tt-neqḍiɛ ara s tikli. D acu-ten iberdan-nni, tikerwas-nni, tiftilin-nni, lɣaci-nni, les manèges-nni, les Tour Eifel-nni…  Ayen i d-iyi-swehmen : ur walaɣ ara ibibiḍen deg yiberdan. Mi steqsaɣ yemma acimi akka, terra-yi-d : “din iyi-d-ufiḍ wehmeɣ”. Dɣa steqsaɣ baba, yenna-yi-d : “steqsi yemma-k”. s wekras n wenyir. Dɣa j’ai compris belli tecɛel gar-asen daɣen. imi dɣa i d-mmektaɣ taddart-nneɣ. Jmeɣ-tt même cituḥ. Ladɣa imi ur ufiɣ ara Črek d  Cnennu di lpari. A vrai dire ɣas ttuqten les manèges din, ḥareɣ ad d-uɣaleɣ. Maɛna, akken kan d-uɣaleɣ, neddmeɣ imi ur nudaɣ ara ɣe welbaɛḍ n tbibitin n Lpari ad qimeɣ din yid-s

 Deg ussan-agi yezrin i d-yeffeɣ wammud n tmedyazt amezwaru n umaru d umedyaz aqbayli, Mass Ali Menas iwumi isemma “Gar wallen d wallaɣ”, yeffeɣ-d ɣer tezrigin « Terroir » n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. D wagi i d adlis amezwazu ara d-yessuffeɣ umaru-agi n Tubiret, ideg i d-yewwi awal deg 20 n yisefra i yellan deg-s ɣef tejmilt i Lwennas Maɛtub, lḥeqq, aẓar d laṣel, ttrika, tudert-is, tagmat, tameṭṭut…atg.   A. A. 

  
 Umba3d aɛeṭṭel i yellan acḥal n wagguren tebda taggar-agi tkubanit n sonalgaz aɛawed neɣ aseggem n tirisit iberdan i yellan ula teddun ara di temdint taqdimt n tubiret xesren acḥal-ayagi, imi tiwaculin izedɣen di temdint-agi maci d tikelt neɣ d tis snat i četkayen ɣef uɛeṭṭel i texddem tkubanit n sonalgaz deg useggem n trisiti acku awexar-a yeglad s waṭas n tɛeddiyat d tkurḍa di tama-agi d lxuf s-ɣur yemdanen imi ttagaden ad d-ɛeddin seg umkan -a acku acḥal n tikwal id -yeḍra tkurḍa d utɛeddi ɣer yemdanen sebba n leɣyab trisiti iberdan, dayen yeǧǧan imdanen-a yettakren d tagnit is-faraṣen akken ad afen iman nsen akken iwata. Si tama nniḍen leɣyab n trisiti-agi yerra imezdaɣ iregbihen lxuf mliḥ ɣef tedyanin -agi n tkurḍa ladɣa ɣef yixxamen akked tḥuna, d acu kan aseggem-a i yebdan deg ussan-a yesifses cwiya n lxuf i yimezdaɣ. 

<p style="text-align: right;">  Abdelhak Menas 

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Yeffeɣ Issin di 2010, asegzawal n teqbaylit s teqbaylit, d amezwaru deg umezruy n tesknawalt n tmaziɣt. Uqbel, llan yisegzawalen at snat n tutlayin. D acu i d-yewwi Issin d amaynut i taɣult-a tussnant, i teqbayli akked tmaziɣt, s umata?  

  Kamel Bouamara:  Awal tenniḍ-t-id, uqbel 2010 isegzawalen i yellan, ama d widak n teqbaylit, ama d widak n tmaziɣt, d isegzawalen at snat n tutlayin, abeɛda wid n teqbaylit/tamaziɣt-tafransist. Lmeɛna-s: taqbaylit (tamaziɣt) tettwaɣray, tettwasegzay s tefransist. Dɣa akka i yella lḥal di tallit-nni n Fransa. Maca, tarrayt-a, tkemmel abrid-is, tuɣ di tmetti, di tesdawiyin ula seg 1962 d tasawent. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli ula d aselmed n teqbaylit (tamaziɣt) s tefransist ay tt-selmaden di tesdawiyin-nneɣ ar ass-a, s umata. D acu i d anamek n waya ? Lmeɛna-s : taqbaylit tezga d taɣawsa kan n uselmed akked d tagmi. D takti-a, d tarrayt-a ay riɣ ad tbeddel. Amek ? Yewwed-d wakud ihi ad nbeddel tarrayt, ad naẓ ɣer sdat, ad tuɣal teqbaylit (d tmaziɣt, s umara) d allal n uselmed akked d tagmi. Abrid-a d Dda Lmulud i t-id-ineǧǧren di tazwara ; d netta i d-yessufɣen Tajeṛṛumt deg yiseggasen n 1970, d netta i yuɣalen d lmendad i terbaɛt-nni i d-yessufɣen AMAWAL, d netta i yuran Inna-yas Ccix Muḥend s teqbaylit. Izen i (d)aɣ-d-yuzen Dda Lmulud s yidlisen-a (i d-bedreɣ) yeqqar-d : Taqbaylit ilaq ad telḥu s yiman-is, s teqbaylit ; ilaq ad tt-nerret ula d nettat d allal, d tutlayt i walmud d uselmed, i taywalt, i tussna … D abrid-a ay uɣeɣ, d tarrayt-a i ḍefreɣ asmi i riɣ ad d-ssufɣeɣ ISSIN deg 2010, ulamma ẓriɣ yessawen ubrid, am win yekkren i udrar s tuɣmas. Riɣ ad d-sekneɣ ihi, nezmer ad d-nessegzi, ad d-neglem taqbaylit s teqbaylit – ur as-nesri ara i tutlayt tis snat i wakken ad d-nemmeslay ɣef teqbaylit. I widak-nni yeqqaren “Taqbaylit ur tezmir ara i yiman-is !”, ad asen-rreɣ : “D kunwi ur nezmir ara i teqbaylit!. Takti tis snat i yellan deg ISSIN d ta : riɣ ad d-geɣ asegzawal n teqbaylit, mačči d asegzawal n yiwet n tmeslayt gar tmeslayin n Tmurt, am wakken iga Dallet i d-yewwin ɣef tin n At Mengellet. Amahil yecban wa, ḥsiɣ, yeḥwaǧ akud ɣezzifen, yeḥwaǧ allalen d wallaɣen : mačči deg kra n yiseggasen i yezmer umdan ad d-yejmeɛ amawal n taqbaylit, ad t-id-yesdukkel deg yiwen n udlis, ad t-iqeɛɛed.

  Sebɛa n yiseggasen seg wasmi i d-yeffeɣ “Issin”(2010) amenzu, ussan-a tessufɣeḍ-d “Issin wis sin”. Amek-it uḥulfu-ik akka tura ?  

 Ceṛheɣ imi i yeffeɣ leɛtab ɣer tafat, teffeɣ-d tsenfelt tis snat n Issin. Ma nedder, ɣezzif leɛmer ad d-rnunt tiyaḍ ara yifen timezwura ; ma ulac, aredmani aql-aɣ nenǧer-d abrid ara aɣen wiyaḍ.

  D acu i d amaynut i d-yettbinen s waṭas deg-s s yisem-ik d ameskar-is? 

 Amaynut mačči kan deg yisem « Issin wis sin » ! Amaynut, yella di yal aḥric. Di tazwara, sseɣtaɣ tucḍiwin i yellan deg tsenfelt tamezwarut, mačči ɣas tucḍiwin n tira : beddleɣ kra n yimedyaten, rniɣ-d inzan d tenfaliyin, rniɣ awalen-tiwwura.

  Ma nwala ɣer tallit i yezrin, nezmer ad d-nini iɛeṭṭel wis sin-a, neɣ d aqeddic i d-iḥettmen aya?  

 Di tazwara, qesdeɣ ad d-teffeɣ tsenfelt-a di luhi n 2014/15, maca ugten wuguren deg wannar ; llan wid i yi-yerzan nekki s timmad-iw, acku mačči ala asegzawal-a i sɛiɣ d amahil, d asenfar ; llan daɣen wid yerzan taẓrigt d usufeɣ n yidlisen di tmetti-nneɣ.

  Am teẓrigt tamezwarut, nwala tɛerḍeḍ s wayen akk tzemreḍ ad d-tessegziḍ akken ilaq anamek n wawal, ɣas tikwal s tutlayt-nniḍen. D acu-tt tmuɣli-k ɣef waya?  

 Aseqdec n tutlayin-nniḍen, am tefransist neɣ talaṭinit, yella anda i walaɣ wulment. Talaṭinit sqedceɣ-tt mi ara d-fkeɣ isem ussnan n uɣersiw, n yimɣi…Yessefk ad neḥsu belli deg taɣulin-a (tussniwin n yiɣersiwen d tin yimɣan), ismawen ussnanen s tlaṭinit ileḥḥun akk deg umaḍal. Ma yella d aseqdec n tefransist, rriɣ-t-id metɛemmed, acku ma iger yiwen agdazal n wawal s tefransist di Google, yezmer ad yaf ugar n yisallen d tewlafin ɣef wawal-nni.

  Aṭas i tesnemmreḍ ɣef tallelt i ak-d-yettunefken, gar-asen imdukkal-ik n Facebook. Yaḍra, tettuqennɛeḍ s wayen i d-tewwi teẓrigt-a tis snat?  

 Ur qniɛ ara, niqal amek ihi! – amdan yezga ur iqenneɛ ara s wayen yesɛa d wayen iga! Mazal yella deg-s umahil, daymi i d-nniɣ yessefk ad ilint teẓrigin-nniḍen, ma yella nufa tignatin n umahil i yifen tid deg wacu i xedmeɣ iseggasen-a iɛeddan. Akka d tasawent, yessefk ad ilin wallalen aṭas, acku tamurt n Leqbayel hrawet, ur yezmir ara umdan weḥd-s ad d-yekk akk timnaḍin, ad d-igemmer awalen.

  Ur tettwaliḍ ara d lawan ad ggten yisegzawalen izwawen aynutlayanen?  

 D tidet, ilaq ad ilin yisegzwalen-nniḍen, wid n tutlayt tamatut, d wid n tutlayt tamazzagt (Langue de spécialité). Tekkiḍ deg kra n yisenfaren lwaḥid d Paul Anderson, i tesnemmreḍ dɣa, gar-asen imseɣti n tira. Mmeslay-aneɣ ɣef tirmit-a d wayen ara d-ternu i tutlayt… Paul d ameɣnas ameqqran n teqbaylit, n tmaziɣt, s umata. War tallelt-ines, ur cukkeɣ ara ad fakkeɣ « Issin wis sin », acku d netta i yi-d-igan Tasbeddit n yisefkan tasenselkimt (Base de données informatiques) i as-xedmeɣ gar 2010 d 2016 ; lemmer s Word, am wakken i xedmeɣ uqbel 2010, tili ur zemmreɣ ara, ur sawaḍeɣ ara. Tin ɣur-s, am wakken i d-tenniḍ, nga-d nekki yid-s kra n yisenfaren am « Imseɣti n tira n teqbaylit », ulamma ur ifukk ara taswiɛt-a. Tis kṛad, Paul aṭas i iqeddec di tmetti, di temnaḍt n Bgayet, lemmer i yufi wid d tid ara as-id-yefken tameẓẓuɣt, d wid d tid ara t-iɛawnen deg yisenfaren-is, tili aṭas n yisenfaren i d-iga.

  Tanemmirt a mass Kamel Bouamara ɣef tririyin. Awal-ik n useqqef…  

 Tanemmirt i kečči i yi-d-yefkan awal ad d-mmeslayeɣ ɣef ISSIN wis sin. Tanemmirt i uɣmis i yi-d-yeldin tiwwura i tmenna.

  Yesteqsa-t Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Yenna ucennay di tezlit Imesdurar : ‘’Tullas-nsen am tsekrin, Leqraya, nnif, sser d zzin, D timesdurar. Deg uzemmur neγ di tsedawit, Neγ s lfuḍat deg tmeγriwin, D timesdurar…

 Akka ay d tameṭṭut taqbaylit. Akka ay nebγa ad tili. D acu kan deg unnar yettban-d, tikwal, wayen-nniḍen xas ma qqaren ulac tirect ur nesεi akerfa. Taqbaylit si zik d azamul n nnif, d agerruj n tmussni : d nutenti i yessehbibiren γef yidles d ttrebga ; d ajgu alemmas. Ass-a n wussan, wiss ma mazal anect-a?

 Ass n 8 deg meγres n yal aseggas d ass agraγlan n umennuγ n tmeṭṭut, meεna γur-neγ yal aseggas icuf gma-s. Ass-nni, d ass n uḥewwes n tmeṭṭut. ‘’Ad d-kkreγ sbeḥ, ad d-ṣṣubeγ γer Tizi Uzzu. Ad ğğeγ arraw-iw i urgaz-iw. D ass-iw, ad xedmeγ akken i yi-yehwa. Ad nadiγ anda tella tmeγra yelhan d icennayen ḥemmle&amp;gamma,; ad ruḥeγ ad kkseγ lxiq. Tameddit, ad afeγ argaz-iw ihegga-d imensi. Ha-t-an 8 deg meγres γur-i.’’ i aγ-d-tenna Massa Laribi d tasegbart (actrice). Acu kan ayen iwumi ur tfaq ara, ahat, Massa Laribi d akken terra akk ussan n useggas d 8 deg meγres imi tetturar deg yisura s teqbaylit. Am wakken neẓra, tameslayt n tyemmat d azref agejdan n tmeṭṭut. Aṭas n tlawin, di&amp;gamma,; ur nḥemmel ara ass n 8 deg meγres, ladγa tid-nni yeγran. Qqarent-d yuγal wass n umennuγ d ass n tannumi : cḍeḥ d uḥewwes.

 Akken yebγu yili, aṭas n tdukliwin i iqeddcen deg uḥric yeεnan tameṭṭut, ama dayen i d-icudden γer yizerfan neγ γer tmetti. Deg unnar-agi, dγa, ara naf Massa Hachemi nettat s yisem-is d taselwayt n tiddukla ‘’Femme Active’’ n Tizi Uzzu i d-iheggan yiwen wahil γef demma n waya deg waggur-agi n meγres. Γef wanect-a, tenna-aγ-d : ‘’nekni ur neqqim ara kan ar ass-a i wakken ad nhuc kra n tmuγliwin isebken. Neẓra tameṭṭut tesεa amḍiq d ameqqran di tmetti. Ihi, s leqdic-nneγ nettaεraḍ amek ara as-nili di lmendad imi tezmer ad d-tefk afus i lebni n tmetti. Si zik tameṭṭut taqbaylit fell-as i yebna uxxam, ama si tama n ttrebga, ama si tama n temεict. Si zik tessisiγ-d talqimt n twacult-is. Γef wanect-a i nebγa ad tt-nesdekwal, ad d-terr ddehn-is γer waṭas n temsal. Iswi-a, nebγa ad t-naweḍ s ttawilat n temliliyin i d-nettheggi yal tikelt u di yal amekkan. Nettheggi-d isaragen akked timsikniyin. Ur nqebbel ara ad tili tmeṭṭut d allal kan deg uxxam.’’

 Ihi, tameγra tameggazt d wafud igerrzen s teqbaylit.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 Moh Achour Belghezli d yiwen gar 24 yimeγnasen n tmaziγt yettwaḥebsen deg useggas n 1980, tadyant yewwin isem ‘’ Tafsut n yimaziγen, neγ Tafsut n 80.’’ Yenγa-t rrebrab ass 17 deg furar 1996 di Tizi Uzzu netta akked Dalila Dridèche, tarfiqt n lxedma-s. Yella d aneγmas deg uγmis ‘’Le Pays/Tamurt’’ uqbel ad yexdem i yiman-is. 

 Ass-nni n 17 deg furar 2015 i as-tuγal tejmilt sγur Tiddukla tadelsant Aguemoune n Wat Σisi, taddart-is, si tama n Wat Dwala akked Tiddukla n yineγmasen n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Tajmilt, tebda s usrusu n tmeqqunt n yiseğğigen γef tsebdedt i yellan deg umekkan anda yettwanγa ass-nni n 17 deg furar 1996. Aṭas n yimdanen i d-yusan γer din : imḍebren isertiyen, ineγmasen, imeddukal-is d wid-nniḍen. Usan-d ad ilin γer tama n twacult-is, γer tama n tmeṭṭut-is d warraw-is, Γilas d Nazim. 

 Tameddit n wass, yella-d usarag sγur imeddukal-is n umennu&amp;gamma,; wid-nni uked yettwaḥbes di 1980 : Said Khellil  d Rachid Ait Ouakli i d-yesmektan amecwar n Moh Achour Belghezli asmi llan akken di tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu akked wussan i sεeddan di lḥebs. Belghezli, mačči kan d ameγnas n tugdut d tmaziγt, meεna d anaẓur daγen : yella yekkat derbuka i Matoub d Kheloui Lounes. Γef wanect-a yanna-d Arezki Abbout :’’asmi i t-id-wwin γer lḥebs, rẓan-as akk iḍudan-is. Nniγ-as acimi akka ? Yenna-yi-id, steqsan-iyi-id γef wacu xeddme&amp;gamma,; nniγ-asen d adrabki, dγa rẓan-iyi akk iḍudan-iw s la règle n wuzzal.’’

 Di taggara n usarag, nfures tagnit nesteqsa Mass Khellil d Mass Ait Ouakli γef umsawa gar  tmaziγt d yinselmen imṭurfa u ma tella, di&amp;gamma,; tifrat. Nnan-d :

<p style="text-align: center;"> Said Khelli 

 “ur ttemlilin ara. Tamaziγt tesεa azal n tlelli, n tugdut ; ulac win ara iḥettmen γef wayeḍ. Tamaziγt tmal γer lbenna d ddunit, ma d imṭurfa-agi malen γer laxert, ad aγ-yenğu Rebbi. Yiwen ubrid kan i yellan γur-sen, yella ẓẓur yerna ur yeldi ara wallaγ-nsen γef wayen-nniḍen. Ihi, γef lmizan n tfelsafit, dayen ur neddukul ara.

 Ma γef tifrat, d tamεict ara ad tt-yefrun axater ur tezmireḍ ara ad tḥebseḍ amdan ur yettneffis ara, ur icennu ara d wayen-nniḍen. Llan kra bγan ad ak-ḥettmen amek ara tεiceḍ, amek ara tedduḍ. Idles am useğğig. Yenna-d Dda Lmulud deg wawal-is :’’idles-agi am ufrux, ur tezmireḍ ara ad t-terreḍ di lqefs ; idles twulem-as tlelli akken ad yeğğuğeg.”

<p style="text-align: center;"> Rachid Ait Ouakli  

 “imṭurfa-agi ur zmiren ara ad qeblen idles neγ tutlayt-nniḍen. Γur-sen, yiwen ubrid kan i yellan, ad t-tawiḍ s ẓẓur. Ma d tamaziγt, d tilellei n wawal d tugdut u aya ur d-yezgi ara i usenfar-nsen daymi yelha leḥder d uḥezzeb i wakken ur aγ-d-tḍerru ara am yiγerfan-nni inegren. 

  Ma  d tifrat, ilaq ad nefhem si tazwara wigi bγan nger-nneγ. Ihi, tewwi-d ad nemlil u ad nerr tamaziγt nnig n temsal. Aṭas d amnekcam γleb n wigi, nezmer-asen. Yelha ma nefhem timsal-agi. Ma nuγal γer umezruy, ad rgigin”

<p style="text-align: right;"> Hocine.M 

  
 “Ma tkemmel aka liḥala deg yella Wasif n summam, ad yeglu s twaɣit i ugama d temnaḍt-agi”.

 Aɣlaq n ugudu n Tḥaract, ideg ttaran iḍuman n yimezḍaɣ deg wagur n yulyu ar ass-a, ur d-yegli ara kan s lemḍara i tezmert n yimdanen d tezdeg n yizenqan n tudrin n tɣiwant n Uqbu akked Yilulen usammer, s umata tudrin Yicellaḍen d Yiɣram’’, imi lemḍara-s, tegla s twennaḍt ɣef tikelt: tiferkiwin, tiḥumal, iḥerqan n uzemmur,…atg. Gar yimukan i tḥuza s leqsaḥ twaɣit, d Asif n Summam i yuɣalen d rreḥba n yiresḍan. Imdanen d yimḍebbren n kra n tkubbaniyin, ɣer dinna akk i ttaran iḍumman-nsen . ‘’Win yessnen yakan asif-agi zik asmi i tecfen deg-s medden uqbel ad t-kecmen yiḍuman, ad tejraḥ tasa-s deg wayen i as-yeḍran’’ i d-yenna yiwen n umdan n 40 n yiseggasen. Ayen i ǧǧant tkubbaniyin n Cinwa i ixeddmen iberdan, kemelen-t lɣaci ass-a . Imdunen–nni i ɣzan Icinwanten, qqimen akk ur rbin ara s wakal. Asmi jemɛen rmel d udɣaɣ i ubrid ameqqran icudden Bgayet ɣer Waḥnif. Ass-a, uɣalen d tisrafin i yiresḍan ɣur-sent i ttdeggiren iresḍan. “Amdan ass-a yuɣal awi-d kan ad yessizdeg axxam-is, ma d tawennaḍt d ayen-nniḍen, mačči d aɣbel –is maḍi. Ma tkemmel aka liḥala deg yella Wasif n summam, ad yeglu s twaɣit i ugama d temnaḍt-agi”. I iwala yiwen umezdaɣ n temnaḍt-nni.

  B. Benhamouche 

  
 Taddart n lḥemmam i yetabaԑen ɣer tɣiwant n at raced id-yezgan deg usammer n lwilayt n tubiret d yiwet n taddart yettwasnen s wakal-is yelhan i tfellaḥt imi imezdaɣ n taddart-a xeddmen tafellaḥt ,ɣas akka tettwasen s wannect-a yella wayen ixusen deg-s dayen iccuden ɣer lexsas n wallalen n tudert imi tettidir s waṭas iɣublan seg uɣbel ɣer wayeḍ , ɛlaḥsab iɣublan id-wekden imezdaɣ i uɣmis n yimaziɣen akken aɣbel ameqqran iten-icuɣben d tazeqqa n tujjya ( udawwi) imi ur sԑin ara anda ara d awwin imi tazeqqa yellan teɣlaq tiwwura-is azal n 10 yiseggasen-aya ar ass-a d wussan mazal-i-tt teɣlaq dayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ n taddart-a ttafend iman nsen yesefk fell-asen ad ruḥen ɣer temnaḍin nniḍen iten- iqerben, imi ttruḥun ama d taɣiwant leqser iwakken ad sifsen liḥala ɣef umuḍin, si tama nniḍen wekden-d akken ayen yettnernin di leɛtab nsen lexsas n wallalen n usiwed dayen iweɛren ɣef twaculin ur yesɛin ara tikkeṛṛusin ilaq fell-asen kkeru n tkkeṛṛusin seg taddart nsen alami d sbiṭṭar n leqser s suma yettawḍen ɣer 500, 600 idinaren , ayaggi ur yeḥbis ara kan da imi aɣbel n lekwaɣeḍ yettkemmil ɣef yimezdaɣ iwakken ad d-yexdem yiwen lkaɣeḍ n leɛqed neɣ leԑmer neɣ ayen nniden ilaq ad trisiti n yiberdan i yeǧǧan tugdi ad teɣli fell-asen ladɣa deg ussan n tegrest , ula d inelmaden si tama nsen sḥisfen ɣef lmeḥna ideg llan imi rwan ula d nutni leԑtab sebba n lexsas n wallalen d
