  Menas Abdelhak 

  
 Akka i tra tmeẓla, simmal yettimɣur umḍan deg wadeg aḥeccran, simmal ara yettili ddiq ed uḥres. Deg tɣiwant n Ayt-Smaɛel, i d-yezgan s wazal n 60 n yikilumitren seg Bgayet, taddart n Tregragt i yellan d amḍiq n tɣiwant, attan tebda tettak-d ssmamat n temdint amzun ur d-tezga deg udrar ɛlay. Mara nili deg tmiṭ n temnaḍt-a ihi, ala zzhir n yikerrusen i isel umeẓẓuɣ, ed tziffurt n lmaẓuṭ i sraḥayen wanzaren, maca daɣen aṭas n umxudneq ed umcubbek deg ubrid i yessefqiɛen inehharen, deg wakud iruḥen seg tzeggant n wass alama d tameddit ladɣa. Tamentilt (sebba) tagaɛmirt n wanect-a imi ala yiwen n ubrid i zeddin tikeryas n yimezdaɣ n temnaḍin nniḍen n Ayt-Smaɛel i d-yettsubbun seg ufella, am wid n Tala Ɛṭa, Iɣil n Wulli, Burafaɛ ed  Bumejber… Atg. « Skud d amḍiq n tɣiwant, imezdaɣ merra n Ayt Smaɛel zgan ɣur-s, maca lḥers yellan din yebda d tidet yesnulfay-d aɣilif. Ilaq yal wa ad ixemmem seg tama-s bac ur aɣ-d-yettlaqa lḥiḍ ». Ay d-yenna yiwen n yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel. Ilmend n waya, txemmem tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel ad theggi tadegt neɣ tiɣsert (station) tayednin i yifurguyen n tama n Tala Ɛṭa anda ara sṭarayen iɣermanen i ttɛebbin. Yettusemma ad ttukayen seg ubrid wayeḍ bac ad yenqes zzdiḥ ed umɛunẓel deg tlemmast n Tregragt. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Mhenni Xalifi

  
 Yiwen n Ccix si taddart n At Buyeḥya ssawalen-as Si Saεid At Ccix. Netta, seg uxxam n At Ccix. Ɣur-s kan yiwen n gma-s isem-is Muḥ Crif. Ccix Saεid ilmed ɣer Ccix Muḥend u Lmexttar deg At Yenni, netta d umedyaz amenṭran si Muḥend u Mḥend myussanen d imeddukel. Si Muḥ Saεid-agi iqqar zik, akka i yi-ihwa imi d bab n ddree, yetteeddi wawal-is. Mi yuɣal d Ccix, iceyyex di taddart n Tgemmunt Ukerruc. Ttqadaṛen-t, ḥemlen-t nezzeh din, imi d bab n lefṣiḥ, iferru-tent. Ircel seg At Hlal, yuɣ yelli-s n Lḥaǧ Aεli u Saεid. Ssawalen-as Feṭṭa n Lḥaǧ Aεli u Saεid, agur deg yigenni nettat di lqaa. Qqaren-d, sut At Hlal mi ara ḥejbent ur seɛeunt ara dderya, d ddeewa n jedd-nsent. Seg tuɣ Ccix teḥjeb, ur tesei ara dderya. Myefken leahed netta yid-s, netta yenna-as, ma temmuteḍ d tamezwarut, ur rniɣ fell-am tameṭṭut. Nettat tenna-as, ur rniɣ fell-ak argaz. Assen, di taddart-nni n Tgemmut Ukerruc, yiwen uqcic akken kan yezweǧ bḍan-t d tmeṭṭut-is. Iwwi-tt baba-s s axxam-is: baba-s n uqcic d baba-s n teqcict nuɣen, msawaḍen ɣer lmuḥal. Nutni, aqcic d teqcict mtawan, myeḥmalen seg wul. Wigi, ceyyeen lejme ad tt-id-erren, wid-nni ugin. Wigi suturen tiririt, wid-ak berru. Nutni mtawan, bɣan ad ten-bḍun. Lḥan imṛabḍen ad tt-id-erren, imawlen ugin. Imiren Si Saεid At Ccix ḥemlent nezzeh din, ttqadaren-t aṭas. Iṭṭef deg-s uqcic, inna-as ad iyi-tt-id-terreḍ. Iwweḍ Ccix iḥawet, iḥawet, imawlen ugin. Iguni-t uqcic-nni alammi d-yeffeɣ, yenna-as: amek akka a Ccix? Yenna-as Ccix: beddel abrid a mmi, ugin imawlen. Mi t-iwala Ccix inuɣna, yenṭaq ɣer-s, yenna-as : tḥemleḍ taqcict-a! -Wwah a Ccix ! Ma ḥemleɣ-tt! D tudert-iw !. -Yenna-as Ccix : Ruḥ ! Ma ur n-tbedd ara weḥd-s, nekk mačči d Si Muḥ Saɛid. Iwweḍ Ccix s axxam, iddem-d azmam, yura-as taḥerzet, ifka-as-tt, inna-as eelleq-as-tt deg ubrid n tala u ɣur-k wi k-id-ittwalin. Aqcic ixdem akken i as-d-yenna Ccix. Mi d-tuɣal teqcict si tala terra srid ɣer urgaz-is. Iffeɣ lexbar di taddart, ǧǧan-ten weḥd-sen. Lḥan acu lḥan, di lexṛif, ssawlen-as i Ccix ad d-yas ad yaru i tmuḍint. Yaf tameṭṭut iwumi ara yaru, isem-is Meḥjuba. Iddem-d azmam, netta yettaru aqelmun alammi d allen . Yiwen urgaz iqqim-d ɣer tama-s, sin ddurin di tkenna, wayeḍ idduri-d addaynin. Win d-iqqimen ɣef tama-s, iereḍ ad t-ixnaq s uemam. Yerra-as ixebbic Ccix deg wudem-is. Rsen-d wid-nni n tkenna, yerna-d win n waddaynin, ddmen-d taqabact, qeddṛen-t, nɣan-t. Armi d iḍ, suffɣen-t-id di tcekkaṛt, sersen-t di Tezṛut n Aεmar u Buyeḥya di tlemmast n taddart. Deg yiḍ-nni, iffeɣ-d yiwen, ad isefqed ṭṭaṛḥa-s, yufa-d tacekkaṛt deg ubrid, illi-tt, yufa d Ccix i immuten. Yessaki-d Lḥaǧ Muḥend u Sliman, lamin n taddart . Sekkren-d taddart, eezṛen fell-as. Azekka-nni, nudan, ufan wid i t-inɣan . Si Muḥend u Mḥend tuɣ-it lḥal deg usammer n tmurt, iqqim di lqahwa. Ufan-t-id ixeddamen iḥzen, iggugem. Nnan-as : d acu k-yuɣen ? D acu i k-ixuṣen ? Yella wi k-iḍelmen ? Si Muḥ yerra-d nnehta, yenna-as : Yewweḍ-iyi-d lexber d uswid Ul-iw yettnehdil-d Lfahem irekb-it lɣac Tɣaḍ-iyi tarrawt n Sid Si Muḥ Saɛid Tamtilt-is beṛṛa ulac Iɣder-it lqum lyazid Wwten-t s lḥid Qeddṛen-t s uqabac. Iawed, inna: Ɣedren cbab Ur t-iklal Tamtilt-ik ur d-tettili Asmi ixeddem deg yir laεmalIleḥḥu s wuzzal Anda i s-ihwa i yettili Ma d tura itbe leḥlal Ittwaxdeε deg uzal Imzel timezla uḥuli. Wwin-t-id s Akal-aberkan, imḍel dinna. Ibedd gma-s, si Muḥ Crif At Ccix ɣer uqerru-s, inna-yas: «Ffkiɣ laεhed, ffkiɣ-t i Rebbi, ur seṭṭleɣ tamart, wala acebbub, ur kcimeɣ s axxam alamma rriɣ-d ttaṛ-ik neɣ rniɣ-n ɣur-k..» Lfuci ɣef tayet, iffeɣ d lmenfi. Iruḥ uqcic-nni iwumi tettwakkes tmeṭṭut ɣer-s, yeggul yenna-as, ma ǧǧiɣ-k, ara ak-iwneɣ. Assen, uɣalen-d sin seg wid inɣan si Tizi-wezzu, si ccṛae. Rekben-d ɣef yiserdyan deg Wasif n Lqennaṛ ger Teɣzut d Wat Mesbaḥ, wa yewwet wa, wa yewwet wayeḍ. Ɣlin-d di sin yid-sen. Aqci-nni, n Tgemmunt ukerruc yerwel d asawen, yemnee. Ma d si Ccrif, yerra d akessar, ɣer tɣezza; ikka-d fell-as laeyaḍ, ṭfen-t-id wid ikerzen din, wwin-t ɣer lqayed. Azekka-nni, usan-d ixeyyalen wwin-t yid-sen ɣer lḥebs. Iεedda di ccṛaε ḥekmen-as sebea n yiseggasen di lḥebs n Kayen. Yewweḍ ɣer din, iseedda xemsa iseggasen, tamurt-is akk tekfa s lbie. Yiwen wass, tekker tmes deg uxxam n tmeṭṭut unemhal n lḥebs, ala tettuɣu, ḥuzen-as sin warraw-is. Aqcic d teqcict ṭṭsen deg uxxam-nni deg tekker tmes. Wi ara ten-id-yekksen? Yuzzel Si Muḥ Crif, netta eeryan. Yewweḍ, yufa-ten ṭṭsen deg umetṛaḥ. Yenneḍ-iten-id di tfarṣadit, iccud-iten-id s umrar, isers-iten-id. Ufan-ten uread ukin. Teɣli yemma-tsen, tefsex. Yers-d si Ccrif, ibaṛdiyen-is rɣan akk, tḥelj-it tmes. Mi d-tefḍen tṛumit-nni, tenna-as: D acu i tebɣiḍ? Yenna-as Si Muḥ Ccrif : d acu i bɣiɣ! Akken tebɣiḍ arraw-im i ten- bɣiɣ! Tenna-as trumit: “D tuffɣa i tebɣiḍ ad teffɣeḍ! Ma ur teffiɣeḍ ara! Ma ur uɣaleɣ ara deg umkan-ik, nekk mačči d leflentega! Truḥ, tura fell-as, tenna-as argaz-agi inɣa yiwen, icfaε sin. Dɣa suffɣen-t-id. Tameṭṭut-nni n si Saɛid At Ccix truḥ-d s axxam n baba-s. La d-kkaten medden ɣer-s akken ad tezwej, nettat tugi. Tmekta-d laεhed i tefka i urgaz-is. Seg la d-kkaten yixxamen ilhan, inna-as baba-s, ad tzewjeḍ neɣ ad kem-selmeɣ. Iḥers-itt, iwwet ɣer-s lḥaǧ Belqasem, yuɣ-itt: A sidi Lḥaǧ Ali Nɣil-ik d argaz leali Tefkiḍ yelli-k i wakli Asmi yesla Si Muḥend u Mḥend, yewwi asefru, yenna-as: Awwah a lmut d-yettassen Ɣer lbaz meẓẓiyen Wagi d lwaed n Rebbi Zwaǧ-ik ara t-id-xeṭṭben Idawen-ik ferḥen Kul wa ansi d-yeṭṭili A Sidi Aεmar u Brahem Aql-aɣ netwehhem Yereq ubrid ara nawi. Teqqim ɣer Lḥaǧ Belqasem d acu teqqim, ssyin truḥ-d. Yuɣ-itt yiwen umerkanti n At Meḥmud ssawalen-as Muḥend At Allal. Teqqim d acu teqqim, daɣen truḥ-d. Ar taggara yuɣ-itt si Ḥmed u Lεarbi si taddart n At Buyeḥya. Netta yemmut d amezwaru, ma d nettat temmut d tamɣart di lgirra-nni n 54.

<p style="text-align: right;">   Tettwakkes-d seg udlis “Zik-nni seg At Dwala” n Ramdane LASHEB 

<div style="text-align: right;"> 
  
 Akken yella lḥal n tsemha, n yilel agrakal; ussan n tegrest wezzilit, uḍan ɣezzifit. Igenni d aberkan s usegna, idurar d imellalen s udfel, iɣezran d yisafen, ččuren d aman, taliwin d laεnaser ttazalen; aya d lxir n tegrest. Maca llan kra n yimukan anda teḍra twaɣit ama s waman n yiḥamulen; wid i xulfen adeg n tikli-nsen , neɣ s waman uffiren; wid yellan ddaw n wakal.  Gar temnaḍin, yenṭṭerren  s waman uffiren « Aneqquc, Rrif »  akked  tɣiwant n  At Smaεel d temnaḍin-is merra. Tadyant-a tella-d s tmental n waman wid yettazalen ddaw n tmurt, d tadyan i  d-yeǧǧan lǧerrat d ccwami, mačči kkan deg wallaɣ n yimezdaɣ n temnaḍin-a, yekcem uḥeyyir, d uxemmem amek ara tefru taluft ?  imi ur d-iban ara yixef-is; ɣas akken, yella-d unekcum n yiεeggalen n useqqamu aɣerfan n snat n tɣiwanin-a  «  At Smaεel akked Taskeryut », anekcum-a yella-d s wallalen n uqaεed n yiberdan, iwakken ad xiṭen acerreg n ubrid, maca « yeɣleb bu cerrig tafawet ». Ulac dacu ara xedmen? Ul yezmir yiwen ad yessergel tazmert n ugama; imi tazmert-is tif tazmert n umdan. Tadyant-a, tebda-d deg useggas yezrim, maca yella-d kra n ustehzi sɣur yiεeggalen n tenmehla n lecɣal n lbaylek « D.T.P » n Xerraṭa, ɣas akken εerḍen ad qaεden kra deg-s, uɣalen qqimen lecɣal d azgen, neɣ d ayen i sekfan deg usenfar-a. Abrid-a d win yeqqnen gar Bgayet d Sṭif seg tlisa n tɣiwant n At Smaεel. Uṭṭun-s 06 ( C.W 06).  Ass n 26 di furar 2015, ɣef tis 10 n tsebḥit; imi bdan yimdanen, la ttwalin abrid, yellan gar « Aneqquc » akked   « Burǧ Mira » la iḥedder, ḥsan d akken d tawaɣit i d-yewḍen; imi tawaɣit-a ad tuɣal d asergel n ubrid. Seg teswiεt ɣer tayeḍ, abrid,  yellan yelha yebda yettuɣal d amdun, iḥedder kkan d agsar; alammi yuɣal d tiseddarin, ur yezmir ula d yiwen ad yezger s ttumibil ( takerrust ), yuɣal ubrid ibellaε.   Γas akken  yella-d unekcum s temɣawla n yiεeggalen n useqqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Taskeryut, akked tin n At Smaεel d yiεeggalen n D. T. P n Xerraṭa akked  yimezdaɣ n snat n temnaḍin-a yenṭṭerren, maca ayen ad  as-rnan neɣ ad as-ssan d akal i umdun-a yugi ad iqeεεed; amkan-a mazal iḥedder kkan. Taluft ur teḥbis ara kkan da, maca abrid yettwaɣ merra, yal amkan yebda iḥedder, llan ula d kra n yimukan yegla s usyax n wakal d yisekla akked larsam n laryuf  n ubrid. Abrid-a yebḍa ɣef yiḥricen. Yuɣal ubrid d tiseddarin d  timducin war aman. Imezdaɣ n temnaḍin-a « Aneqquc, Rrif »  akked  tɣiwant n At Smaεel nṭṭerren s twaɣit-a, imi ẓẓran d akken d  taεkumt ẓẓayen ɣef tuyat, imi tifrart-is ur tban ara, ar tura.    

<p style="text-align: right;"> Nacer  Akouche 

  
 Ɣas addad n terwuri (chômage) deg tmurt n Lezzayer yewweḍ deg yiwet n tallit ɣer yiwet n tseddart ur tessefraḥ, almi aṭas n yilemẓiziyen ay d-yettafen iman-nsen rrif n ubrid mara d-ffɣen s ugerdas (diplôme) seg tesdawit, maca seg tama-nni iban-d yiwen n ubrid, ɣas yewɛer, i yettawin ɣer uxeddim deg waṭas n taɣulin (domaines): wa d win n sseḥra. Ma newwi-d amedya ɣef uḥric n usegmi (tterbya), ahat d igiman n yilemẓiyen i iruḥen seg ugafa ɣer unẓul anda ufan ttawil i yiman-nsen, leḥqen amkan n uxeddim, uɣalen tthennan seg tama-nni n uɣrum. Seld mi rwan aḥebber deg temnaḍin ed waɣiren anda zedɣen, walan dakken ala aneẓruf i asen-d-yeggran d tifrat ma bɣan ur yettrag d taxessart wayen ɣef ɛetben deg teɣzi n umecwar-nsen n ulemmud. Dɣa, acḥal d ilemẓiyen i yusan seg Bgayet iseggasen-a ineggura, ṭṭfen s usirem abrid aɣezfan n Sseḥra. Ass-a, din i sselmaden, din i zedɣen d iɣriben ɣef wat-nsen. Ulama zgan guggen ɣef wid i ḥemmlen ḥemmlen-ten , skud ula d tifaskiwin neɣ d leɛyudat sɛeddayen-ten tikwal weḥd-sen seg wakken teɣlay ssuma n rrwaḥ-tuɣalin ɣer Tmurt n yidurar, wanag terra-ten tmara ad sqenɛen kan s tegnit yellan, i ten-iḥettmen ad muqlen ɣer yimal-nsen. Seg tesga nniḍen, yenna-yaɣ-d yiwen n uselmad i iruḥen seg Bgayet belli, akken ad ssettun iman-nsen simmal ttnaman, kra n wid i yelfan deg uneẓruf, iger ad yeɣlet akken iwulen ccbaḥa n Uheggar ed tsusmi-s. Rnu-yas, war tatut, almad kra kra n tutlayt-nni tacebḥant i d-turew tmaziɣt, mu ssawalen: tamaheɣt.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Ideflawen d igefran id-yeγlin s lejhar d tuget d wid id-yeglan s deqs n wugguren, iγeblan, iεewiqen d twuγa meqren deg yibardan yegarden n tmurt leqbayel.

 Dγa, ass n 24 furar 2015 yezrin, teḍra-d yiwet n twaγit meqren deg webrid n wawqas di lwilaya n Bgayet mbaεd aγelluy n yedγaγen naγ iẓra meqren deg wedrar-agi n Uqas sufella n ṭumubilat, dayen id-yegla s lmut n 07 n yemdanen d nnig n 15 n yimejraḥ. Mbaεd 48 n tsaεtin γef tedyant-agi, teḍra-d twaγit niḍen deg webrid n Taxuxt lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, anda id-γlin yedγaγen imeqraren deg webrid-agi γef 02:00 n sbaḥ, yeṭṭef yiwet n ṭumubil ideg llan 03 n yemdanen, ḥamdullah selken si lmut maca jarḥen.

 Akken igezmen deqs n yibardan niḍen i uεeddi, am webrid n uzaγar icuden ger tγiwant n Wizgan d Bubhir di tama n wasif n uzaγar sebba n wenfal n waman nnig tqeddert-agi. Akken i yuεren ibardan niḍen i uεeddi, am webrid n lwilaya uṭun wis 251 i cuden ger Wizgan d Yifiγa, seba n uγelluy n yeẓra  s waṭas di tama n tewwurt, akken id-ibban weγbel-agi deg webrid aγelnaw uṭun wis 72 icuden ger Yiεeẓẓugen d Σin-Lḥemmam, di tama n At-Buεḍa sebba n wesyax id-ibanen deg acḥal n yiseggasen-aya.

 D iγeblan iwmi sḥasfen aṭas yemsebriden yettawin yal ass ibardan-agi, anda isutren deg yemḍebren taεna temsalt tifrat i γeblan-agi merra i wḥareb γef tudert n yemdanen.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Islam Bessaci 

  
 Deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu, aṭas n yimdanen i tt-id-ikecmen. Ad naf usan-d ama si tmurt n Mali neɣ Niğen ,isuriyen… Terra-ten-id tmara akken ad d-rewlen seg tmura–nsen : yal wa d acu i t-id-yewwin. Imezdaɣ n Tizi Uzzu , ttɛawanen-ten abeɛda ilmeẓẓyen. Ur ttwalin ara ansi d-usan , ttwalin-ten d imdanen yeḥwağen lemɛawna. Terza-d ɣur-sen lmeḥna , terẓa-ten ddunit, yerna mazal-iten meẓẓyit d igellilen. Sɛan azref am nutni am wiyaḍ imi d imdanen am nekni am nutni. Ad ten-tafeḍ s waṭas di ( la gare routière Bouhinoun), din i ttnejmaɛen, suturen tin n Rebbi, ttmetran win i asen-yefkan kra i wudem n Rebbi ad t-ṭṭfen. Ur ttakren, ur ttawḍen. Am wakka, dɣa, nufa yiwet n terbeɛt n yinelmaden n tseddawit Mulud At Mɛemmer, lemden deg tussna n tdamsa , fkan afus n tallelt d lemɛawna , imi i ten-ɣaḍen aṭas. Xedmen-asen tafelwit ɣummen-tt s tseddarit akken ur isefeḍ ara wayen ttarun ɣef tfelwit imi yekkat ugeffur. Selmaden-asen isekkilen akken ad issinen ad arun. Dayen yeswehmen imdanen. Fkan-asen afud i yinelmaden n Tizi Uzzu i ixeddmen i wudem n Rebbi, mačči d adrim i bɣan , ayen i ten-yessawḍen ɣer waya d lefhama d wul-nsen ḥninen, akken arrac –agi ur ttḥussun ara s temḥeqqranit. Sɛan izerfan-nsen ama d tamussni, ama d tujjya, ad dawin, ad ttekkin deg leqdic adelsan ayɣer ala ad uraren addal d wayen niḍen ? ul-nsen yeččur d asirem. Ahat imḍebbren n tmurt-nneɣ ad as-nefken tagnit akken ad kecmen ɣer yiɣerbazen imi d leqraya kan ara ten-yesukksen seg ṭṭlam n ddunit, akken qqaren imezwura , «ula i d-yexdem Remḍan, ula i d-texdem tẓallit, ḥala afus ireḥmen igellilen». Afud igerrzen i yinelmaden n Tizi Uzzu i yettalen iɣriben. Ahuddu aḥunnu fell-asen, akken i d-yenna umedyaz -nneɣ sliman Ʃazem ‘’D aɣrib d aberrani di tmura n medden, lweḥc u lemḥani d Rebbi i iraden’’.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 Ass-nni n larebɛa yezrin tasebḥit n wass, i uɣalen yinelmaden s wudem unṣib ɣer tɣuri i lmend n useggas aɣurbiz 2017-2018. Deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yecmen wazal 215 034 n yinelmaden tineɣriyin-nsen, deg kraḍ n yiswiren n usegmi yemxalafen (aɣerbaz amenzu, aɣerbaz alemmas akked tesnawit). D lwali n Tizi Uzzu, Mass Mohmed Bouderbali deg tesnawit n temdint tamaynut n Tizi Uzzu, i d-yellan ɣef beddu unṣib n useggas-agi aɣurbiz ajdid. Amḍan n yinelmaden iɣurbizen ara yeɣren aseggas-a, yebḍa akka: yella wazal n 113 337 n yinelmaden n uswir amezwaru n ulmad, ma d 65 606 n yinelmaden-nniḍen d wid n uɣerbaz alemmas, akked 36 091 n yinelmaden n tesnawit. Yella-d uqbal n yinelmaden-agi sɣur 903 n yiɣerbazen yellan deg wakal n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, gar-asen 657 n yiɣerbazen imenza, 179 n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen, akked 67 n tesnawiyin i yellin ass-nni n amhad tasebḥit n wass tiwwura-nsent i yinelmaden-agi i maynuten. Am wakken ara d tili tukci-nni n lemɛawna n yinelmaden inexṣen n (3 000 DA) i wazal n 105 000 akked yidlisen i yinelmaden-agi ur nezmir ara ad ten-id-aɣen d lbiɛ. Ma d iɣeblan i d-temlal tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, deg tuɣalin n useggas-agi d wigi: lexsas n yiselmadem, imi tuget n yiqdimen deg-sen fɣen ɣer tesɣimt. Lexsas n yinemhalen deg yiɣerbazen, ladɣa wid n yiɣerbazen imenza, imi mazal llan yiɣerbazen ur nesɛi ara inemhalen. Yella diɣ wugur n taččart n tneɣriyin s yinelmaden, ladɣa deg useggas amezwaru n uɣerbaz amenzu. Lexsas n yidlisen deg yiɣerbazen, ladɣa wid n uswir alemmas. 

  Azal n 94% n yiɣerbazen imenza, sɣaren tamaziɣt deg Bgayet 

 Ugar 187 700 n yinelmaden i yuɣalen s aɣerbaz deg lwilaya n Bgayet, i useggas-agi aɣurbiz ajdid 2017-2018, ass-nni n larebɛa 6 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Uṭṭunen n yinelmaden n uɣerbaz amezwaru yewweḍ ɣer wazal n 106 289, deg-sen 17 327 d wid ara yeɣren deg tneɣriyin n uheggi. Deg uɣerbaz alemmas jerden yiman-nsen wazal n 59 683 n yinelmaden imaynuten. Ma deg tesnawit leḥsab n yinelmaden yewweḍ ɣer 31 729 n yinelmaden. Ad d-ilin ɣef lmendad-nsen wazal n 13 283 n yiselmaden gar yijdiden d yiqdimen, i useddu n temsirin akken iwulem lḥal deg teɣriyin. Ma d amḍan n yiselmaden yesɣaren tutlayt n tmaziɣt deg lwilaya-a n Bgayet, yelḥeq ɣer 895 n yiselmaden, gar-asen 367 d iselmaden n uswir amenzu n usegmi, s wakka tessaweḍ tenmehla n usegmi n tama-a ɣer 94% deg usekcem n tmaziɣt ɣer yiɣerbazen imenza, ma d 5 017 n yiselmaden-nniḍen sɣarayen ayen-nniḍen. Ttwaheggan-d daɣen wazal n 4 817 n yiselmaden n uswir alemmas n usegmi, deg-sen 385 d iselmaden n tutlayt n tmaziɣt deg uɣerbaz alemmas, s lqidar 84% n yiɣerbazen yesɛan tamaziɣt. Ma d amḍan n yiselmaden n tesnawit yelḥeq ɣer 3 084 n yiselmaden, gar-asen 143 d iselmaden n tmaziɣt, s lqidar n 52% n yinelmaden yeqqaren tamaziɣt deg uswir asniwi

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ḥmed Ɛezzun, d amedyaz i iḥemmel umecṭuḥ ed umeqqran. Ɣas ma tettwaskef tafat seg yiẓri-is maca tnuḥ deg wul-is i yettxemmilen iḥulfan. Dɣa yeqqar deg yiwen n usefru : « wiyya-k a win yedreɣlen, mačči s wallen, i ẓerren ayen i d-iteddun ». Deg tdiwennit-a newwi-d awal yid-s war ifergan ɣef waṭas n tlufa. Hattan !

  Ahat ad ak-d-nini amek yettwali amedyaz Ɛezzun Ḥmed?  

 Amedyaz am tzizwit yettafgen, gar yijǧǧigen, tamemt-is d ddwa i txelqit, netta s tmedyezt icebḥen, yettwanas medden, iqeddec ssbeḥ tameddit.

  Segmi telliḍ d illumẓi kečč tesεiḍ tukci deg annar-a n usegrurrez n wawal, ḥku-aɣ-d ɣef ubrid-a ansi i d-tεeddaḍ deg ddunit-ik… 

 Nekk segmi lliɣ d amecṭuḥ, ḥemmleɣ ad sleɣ i tmedyezt ɣef sebba n tmeɣrut (la rime) n wawalen-nni icebḥen, yedukklen. Dɣa ula d assefru mi bdiɣ, bdiɣ s wid-nni n taḍsa i yesɛan yiwet n tmeɣrut kan. Cfiɣ deg useggas n 1986 qqareɣ deg uɣerbaz alemmas, lliɣ mazal ttwaliɣ. Nexdem yiwet n tmeɣra, ideg ssawḍeɣ sseḍseɣ imferrǧen merra imir-nni. Maca, rnu kra, mi d-yeɣli waṭṭan fell-i, ṭṭaxreɣ cwiṭ seg wannar n tẓuri bac ad lhuɣ ed tezmert-iw. Syin akkin, mi ɛeddan yiseggasen, ahat deg useggas n 1991, tuɣal tessawel-iyi-d tẓuri skud tella deg-i, rriɣ-as i tiɣri-s. Yuɣ lḥal, kecmeɣ deg Wammas Adelsan n Lberj n Mira, anda ufiɣ Arɛun Lexḍer d imḍebber dinna. 

  D winna. Aṛεun Lexḍer d yiwen seg yirgazen i k-iεewnen xilla deg uzgar n wasif n tẓuri ma nezmer ad d-nini, amek i d-yella waya? 

 D netta i yi-iɛawnen bac ad rnuɣ ad xedmeɣ, acku yenna-yi-d: tura mačči ala isefra n taḍsa ara txedmeḍ, ilaq ad tɛeddiḍ ɣer tidet. Yeskan-iyi-d ihi isefra-s akked wid n yinaẓuren imeqqranen, akken ad gzuɣ ugar awelleh-ines. Acku nekk imir-nni, ttageɣ kan tameɣrut, ma d lmizan neɣ talɣa neɣ d tunṭiqt, lliɣ ur ẓriɣ d acu. Ihi yesselmed-iyi ayen akk yeqqnen i usefru, rnu yettceyyiɛ-iyi ssawaleɣ-d isefra deg temliliyin, almi i yi-yettwakkes uxlaɛ-nni. Ssawalen-yi-d ula d ikabaren isertanen am FFS ed RCD, ttruḥuɣ akken ad d-awiɣ isefra ɣef tummast ed tmaziɣt. Syin ihi, nesnulfa-d Tidukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad deg useggas n 1994. Cfiɣ yella-d waya deg remṭan deg wazal n 20 deg-neɣ. Ihi, zgiɣ din, daɣen ttekkiweɣ deg temliliyin nniḍen, am tinna n Ssumam i d-theggi Tidukkla n Ssumam, tura teḥbes. Nnig waya, mi yettwaker Maɛtub Lwennas, i ḥemmleɣ aṭas, acḥal uzzleɣ i tesdawiyin, rnu kecmeɣ deg RCD anda t-tuɣ netta. Ma yella, mi as-d-serrḥen, cfiɣ ulac tadayra iɣef ur rziɣ mi nxeddem timeɣriwin n tumert. Aṭas i mlaleɣ lawan-nni, am Bujemɛa Agraw, Ɛebdelqader Buḥi Rebbi ad t-yerḥem, agraw Talsa…atg.

  Tettekkiḍ-d deg waṭas n tfaskiwin deg Tmurt n Yizwawen, tewwiḍ daɣen arrazen, d acu d lfayda n tfaska ɣur-k?  

 D lɛali tifaskiwin n tmedyezt, fazzent ɣef waṭas n tɣawsiwin: yiwet, acku ttemlilin yimedyazen s yiwen n uḥulfu. Nekk ulac anida ttgerrizeɣ ugar ḥaca mara qqimeɣ kraḍ n wussan neɣ ukuẓ yid-sen, acku nettemsifham. Tis-snat, yes-sent i tgemmu tmedyezt tazwawt tettimɣur. Tis-kraḍ, ala deg-sent i yettaf umedyaz tilelli n umeslay, war tikmamin-nni ed usnuttef. Izen ihi yettɛedday akken iwata.

  Seg zik nessen tamedyezt n Ḥmed anida tcaḍ tayri, timmeɣnest, tummast, maca daɣen ula d tasreṭ i d-ibanen taggara-a kan deg tegnant n yisefra-k… acu ara ad d-tiniḍ? 

 Ayen yeɛnan isefra n tesreṭ neɣ n ttuḥid, zemreɣ ad ak-d-iniɣ xedmeɣ yiwen neɣ sin zik, am winna “Rebbi Awḥid” i xedmeɣ ahat deg 26 n yiseggasen. Meḥsub mačči almi d tura, seg zik lliɣ d win yettamnen ɣas ur ssemraseɣ ara imir-nni. Dɣa mi ɣriɣ awal n Rebbi, rniɣ sɣerbleɣ ayen yellan deg wallaɣ-iw, uɣaleɣ ttuqennɛeɣ, kkreɣ ihi i tẓallit.

  Maca ttilin tikwal kra seg yisefra-k ssuren gar ttuḥid ed tfelseft am winna i tzewwleḍ “Rebbi Awḥid», aya ahat d lebɣi n wul-ik neɣ n wallaɣ neɣ deg sin ur dmin? 

 D lebɣi-nsen deg sin. Acku ul, din i tettili teflest. Allaɣ, axemmem ed uɣerbel. Asefru-nni dɣa, mi ttxemmimeɣ ɣef Bab n yigenwan ed wamek i d-yella, tḥuza-yi taluft ssefriɣ fell-as. Imi neẓra ur yebda ur yettfakka maca yella. Asefru-nni yeɣmeq aṭas, almi ad tḥulfuḍ dakken tiririt-is ayen d asgumi. 

  Ḥmed Ɛezzun seg gar wid i d-yesbedden Tiddukla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad, dɣa ula d isem-a n wedrar-nneɣ d kečč s timmad-ik i t-id-yessumren. Mmeslay-aɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef-s d wanwa aswir i tessarameḍ ad taweḍ, d wayen i as-ilaqen sey-a i zdat… 

 Akken i ak-d-nniɣ yakan, cfiɣ am ass-a mi tt-id-nesnulfa deg wazal n 20 deg-neɣ, s lebɣi, tagmat ed timmeɣnest. Ayen i as-ssarameɣ ed tikli ɣer sdat war aḥbas, mi ass-a aql-itt temɣur ddeqs, rnu tga-d aṭas n warmuden. Bɣiɣ daɣen ad tt-ḥadren yilemẓiyen 

 Tella temεayt gar Ḥmed ed tesdawit ed yisdawanen, siwel-aɣ-d kra seg-s akked warmuden (activités)  i ak-d-yettilin din.

 Nekk kecmeɣ tasdawit deg useggas n 1993. Ihi ugar n 20 n yiseggasen tura nekk ttxalaḍeɣ isdawanen. D ilemẓiyen i ufiɣ sɛan aswir, gzan tilufa. Nekk dɣa ugmeɣ-d sɣur-sen, nutni ugmen sɣur-i skud nettemsifham. Ruḥeɣ almi ufiɣ iman-iw am akken d asdawan i lliɣ ula d nekk din. Ayen i d-yellan din d armud ɛerrḍen-iyi ḥeddreɣ-as, ama d isaragen, neɣ d imunulugen, neɣ ladɣa d ttiɛadat n tmeɣriwin ideg i asen-d-ttawiɣ timenna. Tella daɣen tɣawsa: nekk segmi i ten-ssneɣ ttarmeɣ ad asen-neẓẓuɣ ugar lebɣi n yidles i win sɛan yakan, acku tasdawit ad teqqim d azamul n umennuɣ ɣef tummast, akken i as-yenna Lwennas: di tesdawit ad nemlil, tmanyin ad t-id-nemmekli. Dɣa dima s wawal-a i asen-d-smektayeɣ iswi n temlilit-nneɣ.

  Tessufɣeḍ-d yakan sin n yiṭebsiyen n tmedyezt, anaggaru-is deg 2009, azwel-is “Imeṭṭi n umedyaz” anida i d-tesdukkleḍ aẓawan akked yal asefru, amek tga tmuɣli n yimsefliden fell-as ed wamek i d-yella uselḥu-ines? 

 D tidet. Ssufɣeɣ-d tasfift n yisefra deg useggas n 2002, zewwleɣ-itt “Kker ay amaziɣ”. Almi d aseggas n 2009, ssufɣeɣ-d aḍebsi mu fkiɣ azwel “Imeṭṭi n umedyaz”. Aneggaru-ya, giɣ-as kullec akken ad yili igerrez ugar n umezwaru, ladɣa seg tama n usbedd ed uẓawan. Walaɣ yiwen yessnen, nniɣ-as xdem-iyi ayen igerrzen, yal asefru efk-as aẓawan mu yesra. Tikwal ttakkeɣ-as ula d nekk tamuɣli-w, acu ara yesres da neɣ da. Ma d tamuɣli n yimsefliden, yal yiwen amek: llan yehwa-asen war azɣan (critique), llan ssumuren-d taɣawsa-ya ɣef ta. Lḥasul, ssufɣeɣ 1500 n yiḍebsiwen seg win n 2009, ass-a n wussan kfan merra. 

  D acu d uguren i d-tmugreḍ deg annect-a ay tessarameḍ ad ttwikksen sey-a i zdat, neɣ anida tesḥassfeḍ ur tettuqennεeḍ? 

 Ugur amezwaru d win n yidrimen, meḥsub iwakken ad tgeḍ annect-a ilaq adrim. Ugur nniḍen d win n tnezzut: ilaq d kečč ara iwalin anda ara tezzenẓeḍ. Deg tmeɣriwin n ccna, deg tid n urcal, deg tfaskiwin, neɣ deg tesdawit. Ma texḍa akkenni tewɛer taluft, iwacu? Acku tura imaẓragen (éditeurs) ur ttaɣen ayen i d-yessufeɣ unaẓur. Steqsiɣ-ten acimi, ssegzan-iyi-d armi ufiɣ ur fell-asen aṭas n llum. D appirati i d-yewwin aya, imi seg yiwen n uḍebsi xeddmen-d aṭas. Maca seg tama nniḍen, llan yilemẓiyen ur sɛin ulama swacu ara swen lqahwa, ihi amek ad d-aɣen aḍebsi s 100 n yidinaren? Ɣef waya, smenyifen ad t-id-ɛemmren ɣer tilifun s 30 n yidinaren wala. Neɣ ad t-sɛeddin baṭel s blutut. Ihi nekkni ad nqenneɛ iman-nneɣ skud yettwaḥessas wawal-nneɣ, yettɛedday yizen. 

  Imi nlemmed alama nemmut, d anwi inaẓuren neɣ imedyazen neɣ ulama idlisen, uɣur yettaf Ḥmed kra n tmussniwin ad tent-id-yagem, neɣ i t-yessemlalayen akked tehregt (l’inspiration)?  

 Wid akk ɣur ttafeɣ iman-iw d inaẓuren imeqqranen am Lewnis Ayt Mengellat, Maɛtub Lwennas, Sliman Ɛazem, Zedek Mulud, akked Farid Ferragi daɣen, acku icennu tayri n tidet. Ma d idlisen, yeɛjeb-iyi aṭas winna ɣef yisefra n Si Muḥ Umḥend, i yi-d-ɣran yimdukkal.

  Taggara, iban belli wid iḥemmlen Ɛezzun Ḥmed bɣan ad ẓren d acu i d isenfaṛen i yesεa deg yimal iqeṛben… 

 Zemreɣ ad ak-d-iniɣ dakken atan banen-iyi-d sin n yiberdan. Yiwen, atan ssarameɣ ad d-ssufɣeɣ deg-s aḍebsi nniḍen n yisefra deg wayyuren-a n sdat-neɣ. Ma d wis-sin, ahat ad tili tuffɣa n wammud n yisefra gar-aneɣ d useggas ma yebɣa Rebbi. 

  Tanemmirt a Ḥmed ɣef  tnaga-ya, d acu d awal-ik n taggara ? 

 Awal-iw aneggaru, ssarameɣ a Mhenni ayen yelhan ad yeqqim yettmagga. Ssarameɣ abrid-a almi i aɣ-yeǧǧa netta ma d nekkni ur t-nettaǧǧa. Tanemmirt i kečč akked i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Iga-yas tadiwennit-a: Mhenni Xalifi

  
  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Meslayaɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef umezruy n tiddukkla-agi? 

 Amar Bedrani : Tlul-d tiddukkla-agi tadelsant Itri n uzekka deg useggas n 2008 deg taddart n Yixelwiyen, daxel n Uxxam n yilmeẓyen «Dib Ali» n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. D acu kan tlul-d deg tegnatin akked teswiɛin iweɛren aṭas aṭas, imi lexsas n tedrimt d wallalen-nniden. D acu kan, xas akken-nni lebɣi n yiɛeggalen-is ssawḍen i wakken ad tt-sbedden, ad taweḍ ad d-heggi kra n temsebaniyin ama i yi-iman-is, ama s uttekki n tiddukkliwin-nniden tidelsanin iqeddcen deg unnar n yidles.

  Amek-it leqdic deg umussu addukklan deg tmurt-nneɣ? 

 Seg ucrured ɣer tikli, ur yeshil ara imi win iqeddcen deg umussu addukklan, tewwid fell-as ad yeqbel ayen ara as-sbibben xas ma yella diri-t. Ilaq ad yeǧǧ aṭas lecɣal-is, yezmer ad innal ula d lebɣi-s ma tewwi-d ayɣer ala. Leqdic adelsan deg umussu addukklan, la ttcektin akk fell-as, yella wanida i d-nettaf iman-nneɣ d iwḥiden deg leqdical nxeddem.

  I ddula, ma tettɛawan-iken kra neɣ ala? 

 Akken tebɣu tella lemɛawna i d aɣ-yettasen sɣur wid teɛna temsalt, gar-asen Asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan, nekk ad iniɣ drus maḍi. Imi aḥric n yidles yeḥwaj aṭas n tedrimt d wallalen yemgaraden. Ass n wass-a, ur nezmir ara ad neqdec s 40.000 DA neɣ 100.000 DA. Dɣa deg useggas iɛeddan, Asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Ait Aissa Mimoun, yefka 27 melyun i tiddukkla n waddal, ma d tid n yidles ala 4 n yimelyan.

  D acu i d ahil txeddmem yal aseggas? 

 Ma d ayen yerzan ahil n yal aseggas, nxeddem ayen icudden akk ɣer yidles. S umata, nqeddec ama deg ussan n umezgun, ama d tijmilin yemgaraden, ama deg umezgun, timeɣriwin, timsikniyin…atg. Yal aseggas, yettili-d umaynut deg wayen yeɛnan leqdicat-nneɣ.

  Ahat teheggim kra n wahil i 20 deg yebrir? 

 D tidet nhegga-d yiwen n wahil s wazal-is i lmend n usmekti n umulli wis 37 n tefsut taberkant akked wis 16 n tefsut taberkant. Imi aseggas-agi, nesuddes-d ahil d amerkanti, ideg nexdem yiwet n temsizzelt gar sin yiɣerbazen ilemmasen yellan deg tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Wigi d «Tellal Mohammed» n taddart n Uqawej akked «Abboud Mhammed» n taddart n Yixelwiyen. Ad ilint daɣen temsikniyin yemgaraden ama d adlis ama d taklut, ama d isenza s ubuddu n yidlisen d tɣuri n yisefra, sɣur kraḍ n yimura d yimedyazen : Ahcene Mariche, Idir Bellai, Mohand Nait Abdellah. Am wakken diɣen ara d-ilint tceqqufin n umezgun, d yiwen n usarag ɣef tedyanin n 20 yebrir 1980 akk 2001, sɣur umeɣnas Mohand Nait Abdellah. Syin ɣur-s, d tukci n warrazen i yinelmaden ara d-yufraren deg temsizzelt n 20 yebrir, iwumi nefka isem-agi : “Seg umennuɣ ɣer tira”.

  Anida yewweḍ usenfar n tesɣunt n tiddukkla-agi? 

 Ayen i d-yettak wallaɣ i yifassen ur d as-zmiren ara, mačči d yiwen mačči d sin. D acu kan, yella usenfar-agi n tesɣunt n tiddukkla-agi-nneɣ i nettheggi i wussan i d-iteddun. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ ar tura nexdem deg wazal n 80%, imi tuget n yiḍrisen ara yilin deg-s ttwaheggan, mazal-aɣ 4 n yiḍrisen ara d-yufraren deg temsizzelt-agi n 20 yebrir, mazal-aɣ diɣen taduli-ines. Lḥasun mi nekfa leqdic-agi n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen, ad d-nezzi ɣur-s. ad d-semektiɣ kan belli, d tasɣunt n umkerḍur (ara d-ittefɣen yal 3 wagguren) s snat n tutlayin tamaziɣt akked tefransist. Yella daɣen usenfar n temkardit ma nessaweḍ ayɣer ala…atg.

  D acu tettheggim sya ɣer sdat? 

 Aṭas n wayen-nniḍen ara d-yilin sya ɣer taggara n useggas-agi n 2017. Ad nkemmel am wakken nuɣ tannumi deg ussan n umezgun n taddart n Yixelwiyen i nettheggi yal aseggas deg waggur n duǧember, aseggas-agi d tezrigt tis 04, ur neẓri ara ar tura iwumi ara ner tajmilt. Ncallah daɣen ad nessiweḍ ad as-nexdem tajmilt i umaru d umedyaz Ali Makur, s tallelt n tenmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu. Tasiɛt-a ala annect-agi i d-ibanen.

  Tura, meslay-aɣ-d ciṭ ɣef tirmit-ik deg usizreg n yidlisen? 

 S tidet, usiɣ-d ɣer uhric-agi n tira deg useggas n 2011 s yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun, ur nessaweḍ ara ad d-teffeɣ akken iwata. Ad nuɣal ɣur-s deg ussan i d-iteddun, maca xas akken yerna aql-aɣ la nettkemmil, ahat ad d-yaweḍ wass-nsent irkeli.

  Acimi d tamezgunt i textareḍ, mačči d ayen-nniḍen? 

 Imi ddeqs-aya segmi lliɣ tturareɣ amezgun deg Tiddukkla tadelsant aẓar n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i isedday deg lweqt-nni Mass Ahmed Mousa, dɣa din i d-refdeɣ takti i wakken ad tt-i-d-sizregeɣ d taceqquft n umezgun. Acu kan, yella wayen-nniden ama d iḍrisen yemgaraden, ama d tamedyazt…atg.

  Ma yella kra tessewjadeḍ kečč sya ɣer sdat? 

 Aṭas n wayen ara yilin, d acu kan ur zriɣ ara i melmi neɣ d acu ara yilin, ad neǧǧ akud ad yexdem cɣel-is.

  Awal-ik n taggara? 

 Zik wa ihedr-itt i wayeḍ, ass-a deg lkawaɣed ad tt-id-afen yineggura. Tanemmirt i wid iqeddcen akk deg uhric n yidles ladɣa idles aqbayli neɣ amaziɣ s umata. Tanemmirt i wid yefkan laɛtab i urwiḥ i wakken ad yidir d aɣref s tutlayt-is d yidles-ines. Tanemmirt i kunwi yessnarnan taɣamsa s tmaziɣt, tanemmirt i Itran n uzekka.

  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Taddart n At Xir yellan deg tɣiwant n At Xellili yetabaεen ɣer dayra n Meqla&amp;epsilon,; i yebεen azal n 60 n likilumitr ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Ha-tt-an la tettidir lexsas deg waṭas n yiḥricen d yisenfar yemxallafen n tudert tatrart. Taddart-agi, tettwassen aṭas s urmud n ufexxar, imi azal n 70% n yimezdaɣ-is d win i d aɣrum-nsen. Maca taddart-agi, yura deg unyir-is lḥif. Ar ass-a n wussan tettemririɣ deg txerxert n wuguren d yiɣeblan. Deg tazwara, ad nebder aɣbel n waman n tisit, imi ttuɣalen-d waman yiwet n tikkelt i 15 neɣ 20 wussan xas akken taddart-agi, tesfayed-id s yiwen n usenfar i yesneqqsen taεkumt i yimezdaɣ. Maca, azal n useggas-aya seg wasmi i d-yeffeɣ usenfar-a ara d-yawin aman n wasif ɣer taddart-a, ur iban yiɣef-is. Ma d aɣbel wis sin, d win n twenaḍt; imi taddart-agi, tezga txeddem tiwizi n usizdeg-is. D tidet deg tlemmast, zeddiget dayen kan, maca deg ubrid aɣelnaw wis150 yettawin ɣur-s, d tawaɣit. D ayen yeğğan imezdaɣ-is, ad gren tiɣri u ad ssutren deg wid teεna temsalt, aseḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt n taddart-a, gar-asen: axxam n tɣiwant, dayra n Meqlaε d tiddukliwin n twenaḍt. Ad d-nader, daɣen, aɣbel n lgaz n tmedint, imi nnefṣ n taddart-agi tesεa lgaz, ma d nnefṣ-niḍen ur yesεi ara. Ula d aɣerbaz amezwaru “At Lexmis” yellan deg-s ur as-wwin ara lgaz, yerna d tagrest ara d-iteddun. Aḥric n yidles yenxes ugar n yiḥricen-nniḍen, imi ur sεin ara tazeqqa n tɣuri i lfayda n yilemẓyen. Ssuturen, diɣen, lebni n uxxam n yidles n tama-agi n At Xellili. Mebla ma nettu ugur n ttawilat n uṣiweḍ, ladɣa win yettawin ɣer yiɣerbazen ilemmasen d tesnawiyin, acku, s umata, aṭas n lkiran-agi n uṣiweḍ, ad-ten-tafeḍ d tiqdimin, neɣ ur leḥḥunt ara. D ayen yeğğan imezdaɣ n taddart-agi, ad ssutren deg yimeḍbbren n tɣiwant-a iɣef yella ɣef uqerruy-is Mass Tebbiche Hadi, akken ad kemmlen ad bnun annar i yimyurar imeẓyanen n taddart-agi. Aselway n tesqamut n taddart n At Xir yenna-d s timmad-is i uɣmis n Yimaziɣen: “nessaram d akken ad tili tririt yessefraḥen ɣef ulɣuyen i d-as-nefka ama i uselway n tɣiwant neɣ win n dayra (…). Nessaram, daɣen, ad kemmlen ad as-nawin i yixxamen-nni yellan berra n taddart trisiti s bih bih, acku ṛwan rray-nsen. Nessutur, daɣen, deg usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n At Xellili, ad aɣ-iεiwen i wakken ad d-naf ttawil amek ara nexdem akk iberdan n taddart s ssiman”. 

<p style="text-align: right;"> Adaoun Abdelghani 

<div> 
  
 Seg send iḍelli i d-stufan les adultes i tjeǧǧigin n umenzu n unbir. Rnu, akka ara  ikemmel weḥdiqqer nsen azal n sin ledwar.  Ad smiren daɣen imeṭṭi-nni  circonstanciel ɣef yiẓekwan. Ad as-serḥen s lqed n taɣect  i “lɛeslama i lmuseblin…!” d “min ǧibal ina…!”.  Ad zzin s neǧma wehlal i tzniqin, tiberdatin akked texliǧin n Taddart. Ad qnen cciɛa i sin neɣ tlata yemɣaren i tezgel l’opération jumelle.  Ad d-ɛerḍen snat neɣ tlata n tuǧǧal asent-fken sserbis n lqahwa, uqbel ad sent-seččent  millefeuille s  Hamoud Boualem. Iḍ-nni n umenzu n Unbir, ad rren ibernyas ɣef ikustimen adidas, ad ɛelqen ibeckiḍen ɣef tayet u ad difilin alamma d lemqam n ccuhada. Mi tewweḍ ttnasfa n yiḍ ged, ged, ad sterḍqen aɛbar, sur fond de “allah wakbar! lxulud li cuhada-ina… !” … Akka i tabaɛen later n… “wis wit ilan», yal aseggas lawan-a.  Tidet kan, baba, ɣas ulamma ula d netta d l’adulte, yexḍa maḍi adifili d neǧma wehlal. D’ailleurs mi d-yewweḍ umenzu n Unbir d taguni i yeggan. Yeggan daɣen yal mara d-leḥqen ismektiyen nniḍen, am Xemsa Yulyu, Ttaɛṭac Tuber, congrès n Summan… Et c’est justement d taguni-nni n baba d tmital-is, yeǧǧan abrid   i… “les chercheurs d’os” <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>          

<p style="text-align: right;"> S.O.A

<p style="text-align: right;">Yeffeɣ-d yakan

  
 Iɣriben iqbayliyen i yettidiren di tmura yemxallafen n ddunit, ttnadin xerṣum cit ara teni-d-yesmektin di tmurt-nsen. Ma yella neṭṭef-d amedya n yiqbayliyen ula d nutni yettḥaz-iten waḍu-agi. Tikkelt-agi neɛreḍ akken ad nesteqsi yiwen seg widak yesselḥayen yiwen n umaṭṭaf i yellan di tmanaɣt n tmurt n Fransa.

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen: Amek id tusa tikti akken ad teldiḍ amaṭṭaf n tiziri di tmurt n fransa ? 

 Hamid Laamara: Yeldi umaṭṭaf deg useggas n 2015 , xeddmen deg yimaṭṭafen s tutlayt n trumit ktar n 30 n yiseggasen akka tura , ihi anect-agi mačči d amaynut fell-i. Asmi lliɣ deg yimaṭṭafen-agi dagi n tmurt n fransa sekcameɣ akka tikwal tidwilin s tutlayt n teqbaylit i yimsefliden iqbayliyen , ihi sya i d-tlul tikti akken ad xedmeɣ ‘Radio tiziri’ ara yilin i lmendad n yiɣriben.

  Radio tiziri d amaṭṭaf i nezmar ad neṭṭef s FM neɣ d amaṭṭaf n WEB ? 

 Radio tiziri yella d amaṭṭaf n WEB anda imsefliden zemren ad smuzeggten mi ara kecmen ɣer tansa tiliktrunit. Xas akken amaṭṭaf yella di le WEB kan, meɛna llan wallalen akken ad yeddu leqdic n usiweḍ ama d isallen ama d ayen akk ara inadi umseflid , ma yella d tura tuɣal ɣer FM , a-t-an sya ar ddurt i d-iteddun, ad nebdu, ad nesɛedday tidwilin deg Studio amaynut , ula d ahil ad yili d amesbaɣur.

  D acu n ṣṣenf n tedwilin i d-yettɛeddin ? 

 Ttemxallafen tedwilin i lmend n wayen ḥwaǧen d wayen ttnadin yiɣriben. Llant tid n tsertit, n yilmeẓyen, n tmedyazt, n waddal, n tẓuri, anda i d-rzan aṭas n yinaẓuren wid yecban At Manguellat d Yidir. Aṭas n wid i yebɣan ad tekkin deg wahil i d-yettuheyyan, nekni ad ten-nefren i lmend n tmussni-nsen, yal yiwen ad yexdem tadwilt, yal yiwen s tikti-is. Anect-agi, akken kan ad taweḍ teqbaylit ɣer yixxamen n yiɣriben n dagi.

  Ma yella nuɣal-d ɣer tutlayin i tessexdamen deg umaṭṭaf : d taqbaylit kan taḥerfit neɣ tejgugul-d akka tikwal trumit ? 

 Mačči d ayen ara d-neskideb nek d yiwen i yessexdamen kra n wawalen s trumit , nesḥassef aṭas , imi ur nexdim ara asileɣ ( formatin)n uneɣmas aqbayli : amek ilaq ad nefk isallen, amek ilaq ad nebnu tifyar-nni…atg. Dɣa akka cit s trumit cit s teqbaylit, meɛna aql-aɣ nettaɛraḍ akken ur d-yettili ara usexleḍ-agi. Daɣen ur nebɣi ara ad nesekcem awalen n tmaziɣt imaynuten ɣef yiwet n tikkelt. Acimi? Axater amaṭṭaf yettwaxdem akken ad ak-id-fehmen yimdanen. Ihi awalen imaynuten, ilaq ad kecmen ciṭ ciṭ akken ad twafehmen ugar, amedya : asmi i nebda nessexdam deg teywalt awal Azul. Yekcem-d d amaynut, yuɣal cwiṭ cwiṭ lemdent imdanen, syin sexdament.

  D acu-t wazal i zemren ad sɛun wallalen n teywalt s teqbaylit di tmurt n lberrani ? 

 Txus tutlayt-nneɣ dagi, ihi d lexṣas-agi i d aɣ-yewwin akken ad nexdem allalen-agi, ama d imaṭṭafen ama d tiliẓri. Acu kan tura ma yella nmuqel ɣer wakud, ibeddel, imi tura llan wallalen-nniḍen wid yecban : facebook, viber, d tansiwin-nniḍen n useɛlem, dɣa aɣrib ur yettḥulfu ara s lɣurba. Meɛna, nekni nxelqed amaṭṭaf akken ad nemmeslay ɣef waṭas n tiktiwin, d usmekti n wayen iɛeddan, d usuzer n yidles-nneɣ dagi. Akken daɣen nettaɛrad ad nelquḍ awalen-nni i yebdan la ttruḥun, dɣa nessexdam-iten deg umaṭṭaf akken ad uɣalen ɣer unnar.

  Mass Ḥamid Laɛmara, d aneɣmas , d iminig , yettmeslay tamaziɣt. Ɛla ḥsab-ik d acu i d amkan i tesɛa Tmaziɣt ɣer yiɣriben ? 

 Iɣriben xas ttmeslayen tutlayt taberrinit, meɛna tutlayt-nsen d lmuḥal ad tt-ttun, ladɣa iqbayliyen , imi llant tdukliwin anda llan iselmaden n tmaziɣt i yettaken timsirin i yigurdan ama ɣef yidles ama ɣef tira , rnu ɣer wanect-a, azal i sɛan wallalen n teywalt deg usuzer n tmeslayt gar yiɣriben.

  D acu-ten isenfaren-nwen, ahat radio Tiziri ad tuɣal d tilizri Tiziri ? 

 Ayɣer al! Akka tura, aql-aɣ akken kan nbeddel amkan n uxeddim. Ahil daɣen ad yili deg-s umaynut, nexdem yiwet n tiliẓri Web, nebɣa ad nernu ɣer ugraw-agi-nneɣ ineɣmasen ara yilin gar-aneɣ, meɛna d wid ara iqedcen syinna si tmurt n lezzayer.

  Awal-ik n taggara n tdiwennit 

 Ssarameɣ ad yennerni umaṭṭaf Tiziri, tanmmirt-nwen imi i d-temmektam iɣriben. Ad iniɣ : ‘’Anda nxeddem akken ad nečč, weḥd-s , anda i nesseččay Taqbaylit, weḥd-s’’.

    Yamani Souhila 

  
 Dda Qasi yesɛa kṛa n 65 isegassen di leɛmer-is. Kul ass, i tezzi ɣef temdinin yellan deg tama n Ṣumam am Tazmalt, Aqbu,…akken ad yizenz tiḥcicin. Iṛeffed tacekkart teččur d timequnin n teḥcicin akken aten-t yizenz. Tikli-ines as-tinniḍ d tin n yilemẓi, mazal-it yeǧhed ɣas akken muqqeṛ di laɛmeṛ. Akka i teddu deg beṛdan timuqinin n ẓaɛṭaṛ, taselɣa, cciḥ d naɛnaɛ geṛ ifassen-is. Ad d-iniḍ « taḥanutt » i teddun! Ikeččem ɣeṛ leqhawi, issečča, tiḥuna akken ad yizenz tiḥcicin. D’da Qasi mači d-amejjay ixedmen s teḥcicin, maca d-akumiṛṣi n teḥcicin kan. Tigi yeznuzu-ten-t s 250 idinaṛen i tmuqint, ama d cciḥ, d ẓeɛear, d naɛnaɛ neɣ d taselɣa. Akka, yiwen wass n mugeṛ-it-id deg Tazmalt, D’da Qasi, am wussan nniḍen n ṛebbi, yeznuzu tiḥcicin-ines. Yuɣ lḥal medden uṛ sɛin aṛa akud akken ad ṛuḥen ɣeṛ laxla akken ad ksen tiḥcicin, ɣef ayagi, Dda Qasi yewwi-asen-d « tasarut » (apporté la solution) yeznuzu-y-asen laḥwal-agi. »Nekki, dayagi i xedm-ɣ seg ṣbaḥ ɣeṛ tmeddit. Akka i d-ssasay-ɣ aɣṛum i twacult-iw. Uṛ sɛiɣ lantṛit, uṛ yelli kṛa n tedṛimt id d-tawi-ɣ ḥala s teḥcicin-agi i znuzu-ɣ i meddn deg yibeṛdan! » akka iɣ d-yenna wemɣaṛ-agi i ṣebṛen i myal lmaḥna. Aṭaṣ n yimdanen i tṛaǧu-n D’da Qasi akken asen-id yawi tiḥcicin. Llan widak i ḥemlen ad swen ẓaɛṭaṛ, acku aṭaṣ n lfaydat i yesɛa i tezmaṛt n wemdan, yagi aṭanen n yidmaṛe, lakked waḍu. Llan wiyaḍ ḥemlen ciṭuḥ n teṛẓeg, D’da Qasi yettawi-y-asen-d cciḥ. Wagi ṛẓig dayen kan, tessen-t wid iwumi yettali sukkeṛ deg yidamen-nsen. Wid yekkat lqu daɣen ilaq-asen ciṭuḥ n cciḥ. Ma yella d naɛnaɛ, wagi yettaṛṛa-d taṛwiḥt, imi xelḍen-t medden deg ttay akken ad yelhu. « Akka, ad zenz-ɣ tiḥcicin i medden alaṛma medlen-t wallen. » iɣ-d yenna D’da Qasi yeččuṛen d timucuha. D’da Qasi d-aɛeṭṭaṛ bu teḥcicin, am netta ulac sin !

<p style="text-align: right;">  Syfax. Y 

  
 Ger tayest d usenyif d ammud n yisefra i d-yessufeɣ Mass Fellag Said, deg useggas 2015, ɣer tezrigin El Amel. Ammud n yisefra-a, yerra-t-id Mass Anaris Arezki ɣer tutlayt tafransist. Adlis-a, deg-s 25 n yisefra i d-yewwin awal ɣef temsal n tudert s umata : tayri, timetti, uguren, tasertit akken-nniḍen…atg. Adlis, ad d-as d afessas ula ɣef win ur nessin ad iɣer mliḥ tytlayt taqbaylit imi yal asefru ad t-id-iqabel usuɣel-is s trumit. Isefra-a, kkan-d seg wuguren i d-yessekren Mass Fellag deg temnaḍt-agi n Uẓeffun. Yessuffeɣ-d, yakan, ammud amezwaru n yisefra ‘’Zrureq’’, deg useggas n 2012.

  
 Ass n ssebt 29 yulyu, yella-d wass n twizi, timlilit n tdukli, tuffɣa n yiseɣ i usizdeg n Ugelmim Aberkan i d-yezgan deg tlemmast n teẓgi n Ukeffadu. D leqdic i d-tessuddes terbaɛt « Arraw n Tlelli ». Qrib aggur-aya deg mi i d-berḥen ɣef temlilit-a deg uzeṭṭa inmetti.

 Rzan-d seg rebɛa n tɣemmar n tmurt n Leqbayel, ugar n 500 n n yimdanen i d-yusan, ilmeẓyen, tilmeẓyin, wid meqqren, wid meẓẓiyen maḍi deg leɛmer, tiwaculin, akken ad kkin, ad d-sbeggnen aneḥḍur-nsen deg tuffɣa yelhan yecban tagi. D ass igerrzen i sɛeddan merra wid i d-yusan, temlal tasa d way turew. Dɣa seg wass-nni n lǧemɛa, llan wid yezwaren ɣer din, sɛeddan iḍ-nsen dinna, gan iqiḍunen i yiḍes ddaw ubeḥri ḥlawen n yisekla d waman n Ugelmim yesfan. Ass n ssebt, deg sswayeɛ timezwura, bdan ttawḍen-d wiyaḍ, mi akken i neffeɣ seg temdint n Udekkar, neṭṭef abrid yettawin ɣer din, nettmagar deg ubrid wid ileḥḥun d tirebbaɛ ɣef uḍar, wid i d-yusan s tkeryas, s yifurguten, s yikamyunen, s yimuṭuyen. Llan ula d wid i d-yusan s yiɛudiwen. Tidet i nwala ass-a, adrar yuɣal-it-id sser, yettwakkes-as lweḥc. Aya akk yella-d s tegmat d umbaddal n teḍsa d wazul gar yimdanen merra, s tumert meqqren. Mi newweḍ ɣer din, kullec yettwahegga. Amkan yeččur d imdanen, kullec yella. Di tazwara, yella-d wawal sɣur imsuddsen n temlilit. Syin bḍan lɣaci ɣef kraḍ n yigrawen i ujmaɛ n yiḍuman d wayen yettwaḍeggren acḥal-aya. Yal yiwen, acekkar aberkan deg ufus, syin msefraqen. Agraw yuli metwal tiẓgi gar yisekla ɛlayen i d-yezgan nnig n Ugelmim. Agraw wis sin, iruḥ metwal abrid i seg d-ttɛeddayent tkeryas. Ma d tarbaɛt tis kraḍ, jemɛen-d dinna yakan ɣef tamiwin n Ugelmim Aberkan. Llan wid iɛellqen kra n tɛellaqin (plaques) ɣef yisekla, ttwarunt s tutlayt n Mɛemri, ttwessint ɣef leḥmala n ugama d useḥbiber fell-as. Syin, aṭas n leqdic-nniḍen i d-yellan. Llan wid yecnan s tgambarin-nsen, wid iceḍḥen s lferḥ. Akken kra n wakud, bdan ttawḍen-d yinebgawen n yiseɣ, d inaẓuren, d imyura, d inaddalen i ileḥḥun ɣef uḍar,…atg. Gar-asen tella uletma-s n Lwennas Meɛtub, Malika d mmi-s d kra seg yiɛeggalen n twacult-is; kra n yimyura d yimedyazen; udmawen ixeddmen ssinima; amezgun am Masi Lewhama; Amira Meqrani, tucbiḥt n tmurt n Leqbayel i useggas n 2017, d waṭas-nniḍen. Akken kan kra n wakud, terna-d terbaɛt n yiḍebbalen s lɣiḍa, ṭṭbel d ubendayer, rwin-tt, ceḍḥen yilmeẓyen, zhan wulawen, kksen lxiq yimdanen. “Ilaq ad nili di ttiɛad yecban wagi, d nekni ara d-yefken amedya i useḥbiber ɣef ugama. I tikkelt tamezwarur ara d-aseɣ ɣer dagi, tidet kan ttwaseḥreɣ s ccbaḥa yekseb, d yisekla ɛlayen. Wehmeɣ amek i t-yeǧǧa udabu ur d-yelhi ara deg-s, cukkeɣ amer yezga-d deg tmanaɣt ur t-ttaǧǧan ara akka” I aɣ-d-yenna Dda Ceɛban, i d-yewwin yid-s akamira (caméra), yexdem tugniwin d tbidyutin d yidiwenniyen seg mi yewweḍ ɣer din. Alami d tameddit n wass, yella-d wawal sɣur imsuddsen ɣef yisenfaren i sɛan sya ɣer sdat. Rran daɣ tajmilt i Dda Mesɛudan yemmuten deg useggas n 2016, ameddakkel n ugama, acḥal i iḥemmel adeg-nni, aṭas n yilmeẓyen i d-irebba yid-s ɣef leḥmala n ugama. D nnuba n seksu. Ččan wid i d-yerzan kra n tɣenǧawin i lbaraka, xedmen aṭas n tugniwin n usmekti. Jemɛen-d icekkaren-nni ɣer sin n yikamyunen, kkren ad ruḥen. Alami qrib i d-yeɣli yiḍ, mazal llan wid yeqqimen din, ur bɣin ara ad yekfu wass imgerrez am wa neɣ ad farqen agerruj yecban winna deg tlemmast n udrar. Sɛeddan ass yelhan, nnecraḥen, qessren, ḍsan, cnan, ceḍḥen. A wi yufan ad gtent temliliyin yecban tigi i usnerni n tdukli gar yimdanen, d useḥbiber ɣef ugama i icebḥen i tekseb tmurt n Leqbayel. 

  Khaled Achoui 

  
 Iselmaden imunan, ama d widak i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt yeḍran deg unebdu yezrin neɣ wid i d-yulin seg lejrida n leɛḍil, kfan ass n ssebt iɛeddan aḥric wis sin seg tannant-nsen yebdan yakan ass n 24 deg duǧember yezrin. Azal n 1011 seg wid yesselmaden deg uswir amenzu myagaren deg sin n yiɣerbazen n temdint n Tubiret.

 Wid n uswir alemmas, d tasnawit Mohamed Seddik Ben Yahia i asen-yeldin tiwwura-s i tannant. Deg tneggarut-a, iselmaden tettunefk-asen tegnit i wakken ad mlilen gar-asen, ad mbiddalen tirmitin, daɣ mmugren-d imaswaḍen d yiselmaden ikesben yakan tirmit deg unnar I wakken ad d-rren ahat ɣef kra n yiseqsiyen neɣ uguren i d-mmugren deg tneɣriyin-nsen. Seg wass amenzu n tannant, iselmaden ttasen-d s ṭṭaqa, ḥeddren akk i tangawin i wakken ad agmen kra n tarrayin d ttawilat swayes ara qablen inelmaden. Ma d aseddu n temsirin neɣ n tneɣriyin, iselmaden, usan-d s waṭas n tuttriwin, d ayen i ten-yeǧǧan zeggiren-d s wuguren, uqbel ad walin acu i ilaqen ad t-ẓren deg wass-nni. Seg tama-nsen, imaswaḍen ur ten-ɣullen ara, imi deg yal tikkelt, leddin askasi i waya, imi ḥsan d akken d tifrat n yiɣeblan ara yeǧǧen iselmaden-agi ad ddun ɣer sdat deg umahil-nsen. Seg tama nniḍen, iwulem kan ad d-nesmekti belli tannant n tikkelt-a, tefka tagnit i wid i d-yusan seg berra n twilayt ad ɣren anda bɣan, yeɛni yal wa ad yetbeɛ tannant deg lwilaya anda yezdeɣ. D acu kan, deg tmaziɣt, aṭas i d-yusan ɣer Tubiret ulamma xeddmen deg twilayin-nniḍen. Ɣef leḥsab n umḍan-nsen, ugar n 30 n yiselmaden i ixeddmen berra n lwilaya i iḥeḍren tannant-a. I wakken ad tixfif fell-asen teɛkemt, tanmehla n usegmi n Tubiret telli i wid d tid yebɣan ad nsen deg uɣerbaz tiwwura-s. D ayen dɣa i iɛawnen iselmaden-a, ad tebɛen tannant almi d taggara-s. Uqbel ad ruḥen, tettunefk i yal yiwen d yal yiwet seg wid i d-yusan berra n Tubiret yiwet n turegt n uttekki. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli amecwar-a n tannant, ad ikemmel deg yimuras n tefsut anda ara d-yili usɛeddi n yikayaden.

<p style="text-align: right;"><span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Smail. M<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

  
 Ala s ucṛaḍ iwatan i nezmer ad nḥareb aṭṭan n ubeḥri i d-yettbanen s littaɛ di tallit n tesmuḍi gar medden. Ɣas mucaɛ waṭṭan-a am lehlak axfifan, yezmer ad d-yeglu s ddeqs n twuɣa ɣer kra n medden i ɣef isefk lḥal ad ceṛḍen mkul aseggas. D acu-t waṭṭan n ubeḥri? Acu-t ucṛaḍ mgal-ines? Anwi imdanen yeɛna wucṛaḍ -a? D yisteqsiyen-nniḍen i ɣef ara neɛreḍ, ad d-nerr deg umagrad n dduṛt-a.

<p style="text-align: center;"> D acu-t waṭṭan n ubeḥri ? 

 D aṭṭan n tawla i d-yeslalay ubirus n Anflwanza (Influenza) yesɛan ddeqs n leṣnaf. Abirus-a ileḥḥu gar medden s ttawil n tusut, aḍas, amsalam, učči d tissit yesdukklen imdanen. Igellu-d s umata s tawla, ɛeyyu, asiḥḥi n tanzarin…atg. Acu kan, ɣer kra n medden, igellu-d s twuɣa timeqqṛanin i izemren ad ten-ṣṣiwḍent armi d lmut.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Acu-t ucṛaḍ mgal lehlak-a ? 

 D ttawil yettḥaraben si temsalmit i d-yettakk ubirus n Anflwanza. Acu kan, acṛaḍ-a, yettemxallaf seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ imi mkul aseggas yettili mgal yiwen n ṣṣenf mucaɛen gar medden. Ɣef waya, diɣ, llan kra n yimdanen, ur ttafen ara ɣur-s imi ṣṣenf i ten-iḥuzan mačči mgal-is i d-yella ucṛaḍ n useggas.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Anwi imdanen yeɛna ucṛaḍ ? 

 S kra n tmeṭṭut yellan s tadist neɣ win iɛeddan 65 n yiseggasen, win yesɛan kra n waṭṭan yezgan neɣ itessen kra n ddwa yesseɛyayen tafekka, issefk fell-asen ad ceṛḍen mkul aseggas akken ad ḥarben ɣef tfekka-nsen si twuɣa n waṭṭan n ubeḥri imi tazmert n tfekka-nsen tenqes. 

 D acu kan, werǧin ad yili ucṛaḍ ɣer llufan ur newwiḍ 6 n wagguren, wid yellan di tawla tameqqṛant neɣ win yesɛan aḥerbal (Allergie) ɣer ttawil-a n uḥareb.

<p style="text-align: center;"> S wacu yezmer ad d-yeglu wecṛaḍ ? 

 S umata, tallit-is tettɛeddi di liser bexlaf si tegnit ɣer tayeḍ, tgellu-d s kra n tezweɣ deg umḍiq n tyita n tsegnit d kra n walluy n tawla taxfifant i izerrin di sin wussan. D acu, llant kra n tegnatin, cwi kan imi d timexḍa, anda yezmer ad d-yeglu s uḥerbal i d-yettbanen ama s tezweɣ d ucuffu deg uqadum neɣ temgeṛt, atiqqef n nnefs, i izemren ad ssiwḍen ɣer lmut ma amuḍin ur yettusejji ara di lweqt. Ɣef waya, ur ilaq ara ad yili usufeɣ n umuḍin si tzeqqa n ucṛaḍ uqbel 15 n tedqiqin deffir tisegnit-nni.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Taggara 

 Ala s ucṛaḍ n yimdanen yesɛan tafekka yeɛyan i nezmer ad nḥareb aṭṭan n ubeḥri. Acṛaḍ-a, ilaq ad yettili mkul aseggas, imi ṣṣenf n ubirus yettḥazen amdan, yettemxallaf seg tallit ɣer tayeḍ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima dali  

 
  
 vUr iḥemmel ara aseɣzef n umeslay, maca ma yenṭeq-d s yiwen n wawal, ad d-yini yis-s aṭas n tlufa d temsal i win i t-ifehhmen akken ilaq. Wagi d amedyaz ameqqran Amirouche Amwanes i aɣ-d-yerran ɣef kra n yisteqsiyen. Deg tdiwennit-a, ad tafem ayen i d-yenna.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: D acu-tt tmedyazt ɣur Amirouche Amwanes ?  

 Amirouche Amwanes : Mi ara sleɣ i wawal « tamedyazt », d aḥulfu i yi-d-ikeccmen ad as-ḥulfuɣ. Ayen i d-ḥkiɣ fell-as ahat ur ikeffu. Maca, zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ tamdyazt ɣur-I, d taluft tameqqrant i ttidireɣ di tirga ur nettfakka. Tettak-iyi-d akk ayen ur sɛiɣ ara. Di taddart-iw yufa-tt wallaɣ-iw, tufa-t.

  Wiss ma d kečč i ifernen asefru, neɣ d netta i d-ikecmen deg-k ?  

 Nekk ɣur-i cukkeɣ ur yelli ufran deg waya, imi asefru yusa-d di tazwara s lebɣi-w. Akken ttwaliɣ, kullec yettas-d s leɛtab, axeddim, anadi akked umeyyez n temsal. Ulac ayen i d-ibanen mebla wigi i d-bedreɣ. Ɣas ad yesɛu yiwen tikti, ur tettidir ma ur yeqdic fell-as s wul. Acku ma yestehza yis-s, ur tettdum ɣur-s.

  Tbaneḍ seg wid iḥemmlen ad d-neṭṭqen asefru s tmenna, mačči s ccna. D acu d sser n wannect-a ?  

 D tidet. Nekk ḥemmleɣ asefru ugar n ccnna. Aṭas n tɣawsiwin i yi-jebbden ɣer timenna, imi tesɛa ayen i d-irennun ccbaḥa d lmizan i wawalen i d-yettini umedyaz s tɣariwin d tuɣac yemgaraden. Seg tama-nniḍen, d timenna i smenyifeɣ acku ufiɣ deg-s amek ara sɛeddiɣ izen-inu s wudem amaynut atrar. Imi taẓuri d asnulfu!

  Nerra tamawt i yisental iɣef tessefruyeḍ, nufa tmaleḍ s waṭas ɣer wayen yellan deg usugen d umaḍal uffir s unamek-nniḍen. Acimi ?  

 Asteqsi-agi yeḥwaǧ aṭas n wakud I wakken ad t-nemmeslay, ad d-sfehmeɣ fell-as. D acu kan, zemreɣ ad am-d-iniɣ aya: d nekk i t-yextaren. Yerna mačči d taɣawsa isehlen. Tamsalt-agi, teḥwaǧ daɣen aṭas n unadi akken ad tzemreḍ i luɛara-ines. Am wakken i am-d-nniɣ, taẓuri d asnulfu.

  Ar tura nessen-ik d amaru n yisefra. Yaḍra, yella kra-nniḍen i tettaruḍ ?  

 Ttaruɣ kan isefra. Ahat yella wayen-nniḍen i ttaruɣ tikwal, maca tira-nni ad tt-ǧǧeɣ, ad teqqim kan gar-i d yiman-iw.

  Tessufɣeḍ-d ussan iɛeddan ammud n tmedyazt. Ini-aɣ-d awal ɣef waya…  

 Ih, yeffeɣ-d udlis-inu “Ameksa n tteryulat”. Ferḥeɣ aṭas mi tamedyazt-iw tura aql-itt deg lkaɣeḍ, zemren ad tt-ɣren wid i tt-iḥemmlen. Ẓriɣ d ayen yelhan i xedmeɣ mi d-ssufɣeɣ ammud-nni, imi nekk walaɣ akken ad timɣur teqbaylit ilaq tira. Adlis yettnuzu di Amazon d yal tamurt i win i t-yebɣan. yura s snat n tutlayin: taqbaylit akked trumit.

  Tanemmirt ɣef tririyin. D acu i tebɣiḍ ad t-id-ternuḍ ?  

 Bɣiɣ kan ad asen-iniɣ tanemmirt i wid i yi-d yefkan afud n lemɛewna di lxedma-nni taneggarut “Aḍu d udrar”. Ama d anaẓur ameqqran Idir, Mhana Tigrini, Lɛerbi Muhub d wiyaḍ. Daɣen, ad farseɣ tagnit, ad snemmreɣ wid akk i aɣ-d-yettakken afud akken ad nkemmel. Ad am-d-iniɣ tanemmirt i kem… Tanemmirt-nwen.

  Testeqsa-t Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Tamdint n Tizi Uzzu, s umata tesfugel amulli wis 37 n tefsut n yimaziɣen, d umulli wis 16 n tefsut taberkant, aṭas n yidisan i d-iheggan ahilen i lmend n usmekti-agi.

 Yella-d usfgel-is ula deg tuddar, amedya n taddart n Tḥanut i d-ismeknan imulliyen-agi ass-nni n sem yezrin 28 deg waggur-agi iɛeddan. Yebda leqdic s 10h00 n ssbaḥ deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen «Yerkal Mohamed» n taddart-agi yellan deg Uwrir. Bdan yilmeẓyen n taddart-agi ahil-nsen seg 10h00 n tssebḥit s temsiken n tfelwitin n teklut d usuneɣ n Massa Hanane Messadane. Tella diɣen temsikent n yidlisen n tmaziɣt, tella-d diɣ tin n yiḍrisen d tmeddurin n waṭas n yimura imeqqranen n tmurt-nneɣ, yecban : Lmulud At Mɛemmer, Mulud Ferɛun, Kateb Yacine, Belaid Ait Ali…d wiyaḍ-nniḍen. Tella-d daɣen temsikent n tgella n taqburt n Leqbayel : seksu, berkukes, lexfaf, lmsemen…atg. Syin akkin, llan-d kraḍ n yisaragen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, sɣur kraḍ n yimsragen n taddart-agi n Tḥanut. Yezwer-d Mass Abderrahane Kasdi, imeslay-d s umata ɣef umezruy n tutlayin. Syin imeslay-d Mass Adaoun Abdelghani, s wuzzig ɣef tutlayt n tmaziɣt d wayen akk icudden ɣur-s. Ma d asarag aneggaru i yexdem Mass Zaif Salah, yeww-id awal deg-s ɣef wawal deg tutlayt n tmaziɣt, d wazal-is deg teywelt d umeslay. Γer taggara n leqdic-agi, tella-d yiwet n qqaɛet n umennuɣ gar yinaddalen n n waddal n lkarati n taddart n At Brahem.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Uẓenẓun ɣer uẓenẓun i yesalay ufrux lɛec-is, yella deg awal. Akka ula d tamaɣizt, taḥajurt ɣef tayaḍ tesebded iɣerban d yejga ara yeṭṭfen axxam-is. Xas akken d leqrun tekmen ddaw ufezqi n timawit, xas akken d-isaggassen acḥal,  tezdew deg ussu n lbaṭel akked timuḥaqranit, s lebɣi n warraw-is  tewwet s ugarz , yekes-as wajir tuɣal t-ttedu ɣef ifadden-is. Aya yebda di tagara n yisaggasen n 70 asmi kkren id kren  yiɛazamen am Lounis Ait Menguellet, Ferhat, Idir, Mouloud Mammeri, Salem Chaker, Matoub Lounes … akken ad zwin fell-as tindal.  Seg yimir tezraɛ liqqa di lǧedra n tmaziɣt, tebda tesemɣay-d  tiskar  id yettawin iguma. 

 Lsas amezwaru d tajarumt  akked  illugan n tira id as-yega Mouloud Mammeri I temslayt. Leqdic-agi ur nesɛi-ara tamtilt yewwi-d asnulfu n ungal imenza s teqbaylit s demma n Rachid Alich (asfel/ fafa), Said Sadi( askuti), Amar Mezdad( yiḍ d wass).  Ikuftawan-agi imenza,  zuɣren tutlayt ɣer ugni n tira. Di lhejna n waya nnulfan-d  yiɣmisen imezwura s teqbaylit am uɣmis ” amaynut»,” asalu», “tamurt», “iẓuran” d wiyaḍ…

 Si tama nniḍen amezgun n teqbaylit yebda yettefriwis ddew leɛnaya n tidukliwin tidelsanin id yefrurin deg isaggasen n 1990 menbeɛd tulya n tmurt ɣef ayen umu neqqar asget n yikabaren. Di lbal-nneɣ,  neḥlufa bden tthubbun-d leryaḥ ara yefrun lḥeb ɣef allim. Asaru amenzu n teqbaylit “ tawrirt yettwattun” id yettwaksen seg ungal yura Mouloud Mammeri  ɣef yella di lmendad Mass Bouguermouh, yussa-d i lawan  akken id iwakked ɣef aya. Ziɣema tebda tettfeɣ targit! 

 Di tagara n issaggasen n 2000 yenulfa-d uẓeṭṭa n Lweb yefkan affud nniḍen i tutlayt tamaziɣt. Ttawil-agi , ur iɛeṭṭel ara yuɣal  d allal gar ifassen n wid iḥamlen taqbaylit akken ad leqmen i tutlayt igeṭṭumen s wacu ara teǧuǧǧeg. Deg akka nettaf d akken  deg adagen ( sites) neɣ deg yiẓeṭṭa imetiyen ( réseaux sociaux) am Face book neɣ twitter bdan yeqbayliyen  ttemsawalen s teqbaylit bay-gar-asen. Mačči d-izli n yeblugen neɣ n wadagen id yellan i lmendad fkan lemqud i tasekla taqbaylit s yal udamawen-is. Anect-a yakk yenerna seg asmi id yenulfa unasiw Unicode n taqbaylit( clavier Unicode kabyle). 

 I wakken tira a tessɛu udem id as-ilaqen, di lǧera n uḥerkel-agi id nebder , yella-d diɣ tuzna n imawalen( lexiques)  ɣef uẓeṭṭa am usegzawal  “ taqbaylit/ tafransist- tafransist / taqbaylit “ yettwasnen i nezmer ad nnef s ttawil n usaɣwan agi: http://www.tutlayt.net/asegzawal-taf.php . 

 Di tagara-agi gren ɣer uẓeṭṭa n Lweb  yenulfa-d usegzawal amaynut umu semman : « asgzawal imezdi n taqbylit/   dictionnaire  encyclopédique kabyle » . Nezmer a nekcem ɣer usezgawal-agi s ttawil n tansa-agi:

  http://dukabyle.lescigales.org/.

 Asegzawal-agi amaynut yemgared ɣef wiiyad  imi iḥuzz yakk iḥricen n tusna ama di teskla, neɣ tusna, neɣ tanwalt, neɣ imɣan, inziyen, tusna n yiɣersiwen…dayen melba cekk ara yeǧǧen wid yettarun s teqbaylit ad affen kra suturen d awal akken ad sebɣen tikta-nsen s tmeslayt-nsen.

 Amaynut ur yeqqim ara kan ɣer usegzawal, imi tagara-agi diɣ nnulfan-d yiseɣẓanen( logiciels)  i usfti n imyagen n teqbaylit akked  d uqɛad n tucḍiwin  tijrumiyin deg tira s teqbaylit. Ahat d anect-a yakk i yesmendgen imyura am Mohamed Arab Ait kaci akken ad  yesuqel ɣer taqbaylit ungal “ amɣar d illel/ le viel  homme et la mer” n Ernest Hemingway akked d ungal “abarani/ l’étranger”  n Albert Camus. Am akken diɣ id yerra umyaru A.S.H  Rubaɛiyat n Khayyam akked  d adlis n Nietzsche  (akka i yettameslay Zaratoustra/ aini parlait zaratoustra) ɣer tagi nneɣ. Si tama nniḍen ad neff Louni Hocine yesuqel ɣer tutlayat n Si Muhend U Mhend adlis n Khalil Jibran “Nnbi” am akken diɣ id uɣalen kra n yungalen n yemyura iẓẓiyriren ɣer taqbaylit gar-asen : Ahlam Mestghenmi, Azedine Mihoubi, Mohamed Sari, Nouredine Louhal, Taos Amrouche,Hamid Grine.

 Tasuqlit n yedlisen ur telli ara kan s tqebalit,   imi ula d atmaten-nneɣ imaziɣen n Lmaruk kecmen annar agi . Gar yidlisen id yuɣalen ɣer tirifit tagara-agi nezmer ad nebder “Cehrazad” sɣur amedyaz n rrif yettwasnen Karim Kannouf. Melba cekk d anect-a yakk iɣ-yeǧǧan nesflit s uzekka yeǧǧuǧen i tutklayt-nneɣ imi s tidet d wa id abrid-is yettawin  mačči d isuɣan deg izenqan.

<p style="text-align: right;">Ait Slimane Hamid 

  
 Telha tagi ! Yura asaru γef tkellax, dγa yuγal yettwakellex deg-s. Ayen yeḍran i Mass Belaid Namane dayen, ahat, γef wayeg ur yebni ara :’’yekker-as-d creε di tferka-as’’ akken i aγ-d-yenna deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mεemmri n Tizi Uzzu mi d-yesεedda asaru-agi ines, i d-iεeddan yakan di tilibizyu TV4 s yisem-nniḍen (s tukerḍa). Amek i as-teḍra ?

 Asaru-agi, yura-t Mass Belaid Namane, yesseḍra-t (réaliser) netta meεna yessufeγ-it-id wayeḍ mebla ma yeẓra baba-is u mebla ma isedda-d isem-is.  ‘’Amakar-agi i d-yessufγen asaru inu, ur yi-d-yenna ara. Nella nxeddem akken. Ur ẓriγ ara armi i walaγ asaru-inu di tilibzyu TV4. Iεedda-d ass n 02 deg yulyu 2014. Syin, sawleγ-as, ur i yi-yerri ara. Ruḥeγ ar TV4, ḥkiγ-asen tamsalt u zgiγ-d mgal asεeddi-ines.’’ I aγ-d-yenna Mass Namane. Ula d ONDA testeεref d ayla-s meεna mebla lmeεna,(yefka-aγ-d lekwaγeḍ n ttbut). ‘’L’ONDA tbeggen-d d akken d ayla-w, skelseγ-t uqbel, yakan, γur-sen. Meεna TV4 tkemmel tesεedda-t-id i tikkelt tis snat. Ula d cre&amp;epsilon,; mazal ur tt-yefri ara.’’ Ikemmel yenna Mass Namane.

  Nemlal d yiwen yurar deg usaru-agi, ibeggen-d d akken d ayla n Mass Namane meεna yugi ad d-nader isem-is.

   ‘’Bγiγ lukan ad d-yas ass-a ad d-nemqabal, u ad  iyi-d-yini  i wacuγer yexdem akka ?’’ D wa i d awal aneggaru n Mass Belaid Namane i  yugin ad yamen s tikekkex  xas ulamma yura fell-asent s timmad-is !

 Ahad-a iɛeddan i yuɣal ɣur Bab n yigenwan ucennay amezwaru n temnaḍt n Ssaḥel deg waɣir n Bgayet Ɛezdin Berquq, ssebba n yiwen n waṭṭan i t-ilebsen acḥal-aya tura. Ugar n umeslay n umezruy fell-as, d ccna azedgan umi yebges segmi iger aḍar deg tẓuri, Ɛezdin Berquq d win i ḥemmlen aṭas lɣaci n Usaḥel, abeɛda wid n Uweqqas, ɣef ssifat-is n umdan. Ulama yebda ccna d ameẓyan deg yiseggasen n 1970, ideg yecna deg waṭas n tamiwin d tmuɣriwin n Tmurt, armi yessekles tasfift-is tamezwarut deg useggas n 1984. Syin yerna-d tayeḍ sin n yiseggasen ɣer sdat ideg d-yewwi ddeqs n yisakayen ɣef tmetti ladɣa. Tamuɣli-s ɣef kra n tlufa ǧǧan-t ad yeqqim kan d netta, wala ma yuɣ cciɛa s yir abrid. Steɛfu di talwit ay anaẓur!

  M. K.
