 Tuget n tuddar akked kra n temnaḍin di lwilaya n tubiret ttwaɛezlen ur ttwasnent ara s waṭas ama d tid yellan deg unẓul neɣ ugafa lwilaya ala ɣef liḥala ideg ttidirent akk d tegnatin n cedda d lexsas n wallalen tudert anda nḥafent s waṭas seg yiɣublan d wuguren iten- yeṭṭafaren di tmeddurt nsen , gar temnaḍin-agi ad d-naf tamnaḍt n Ben Aɛabed di dira deg unẓul lwilaya ur sɛin ara allalen usiweḍ imi imezdaɣ kkaten-tt ɣef uḍar ,ɛlaḥsab imeslayen nsen akken azal 70 yemdanen i yettruḥun deg yiwen n lkar ma yella d wiyaḍ ttrajun azal 2 tsaɛtin akken ara ruḥen ladɣa arrac lakul yal ass ur ttawḍen ara di lawan ɣer uɣerbaz acku ulac deg acu ara ruḥun hacca wid yesɛan tikkeṛusin , dayen iten-yeǧǧan ɣelqen abrid ussan-agi iɛeddan gar tɣiwant nsen akk d tɣiwant lmeɛmura sebba n wannect-a ɣef waya ssuturen seg yimḍebren s tikci lkiran yettawin s iɣerbazen akken ad teddun yid-sen rnu ad ttawḍen s axeddim d lakul di lweqt ,Si tama nniḍen gar tudrin yenḥafen tella taddart n ɛriqa di ṣur lɣuzlan i beɛden s wazal 35 yikilumiṭren ɣef unẓuln tubiret anda imezdaɣ četkayen seg waṭas iɣublan acḥal d iseggasen iɛeddan mazal-iten ur frin ara gar-asen asizdeg n temnaḍt rnu ɣur-s aɣbel n tnezduɣin acku tuget n twaculin ur sɛint ara tinezduɣin imi lejrida taneggarut tella-d s 220 i yesfayden i yellan azal 5000 imssutren am wakken daɣen sbiṭar isɛan mazal xuṣent imejayen yettwaxeṣen ɣef waya ttruḥun ama d sbiṭar ameqqran di lwilaya ,ad d-naf daɣen yiwet n temnaḍt iwumi qqaren at larebɛa i yellan di tɣiwant lqadiriya deg ugafa n tubiret ula d netta tettidir di tegnatin qessihit mlih imi ɣaben wallalen iwilmen i tudert i yerran ussan nsen d iberkanen seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ am waman anda rran kan lwelha nsen ɣur-s ansi ara d-awwin tiqit waman , Ma yella d taddart n teɣzut i yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n at raced rwan imezdaɣ-is leɛtab si yal tama acku taddart nsen tettwaɛzal tebɛed ɣef tɣiwant ayagi akk d ugur i yettuɣal fell-asen seg uguren i ttmagaren ladɣa ilmeẓyen yeqqaren acku ur sɛin ara aɣerbaz alemmas akk d tesnawit imi ttruḥun ami s at raced dacu kan ula d aɣbel n uṣiwed yerra di leɛtab nsen imi ixus mliḥ ma yella d win iten-icuɣben daɣen aɣbel lgaz n temddint ,rnu ɣer wannect-a ur sɛin ara ula d tazeqqa n tujya ɣef waya yesefk fell-asen ad ruḥen ama d taɣiwant leqser neɣ beclul , ayagi akk d iɣublan i yeǧǧan imezdaɣ ttafend iman nsen deg yir liḥala ur yesefraḥen ara ,ma yella d imḍebren ttaken lewɛud ur ten semrsen ara di tilawt am wakken nezmar ad d-nini ugint ad frunt tmucuha n lmeḥna d lmerta ɣef yemdanen imi d nutni kan i yettxeliṣen . <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>

<p style="text-align: right;"> Menas Abdelhak 

  
 Send iḍelli kan i yemden 18 n yiseggasen ɣef tibawt-is, ɣef wass-nni amcum i izelzen ulawen n yiqbayliyen, imaziɣen akked madden-nniḍen i t-yessnen, i t-iḥemmlen daɣen. Ass-a kra wid i t-iḍefren, i yeslan i yimeslayen-is ama deg tezlatin, neɣ deg tedwilin, ur yeqqar Lwennas yemmut. Anaẓur, agrawliw, amussnaw, yettɣib kan s tfekka d rruḥ, maca ayen i d-yeǧǧa, yettɣimi i lebda. Ɣas ma yettwaccelqef seg gar n wallen, aql-it yedder yettidir, yerna mazal ad yidir ɣer sdat. Ula d arrac imecṭaḥ i d-ilulen seld tibawt-is, atan ssnen-t ḥemmlen-t ulama ur d-ufan rruḥ-is yella. Ufan-d yiwen n yisem swayes i d-yennerna, yefti d xilla n yismawen. Yal yiwen seg-sen d lɛali-t imi iban dakken Dda Lwennas d amdan i yuklalen aṭas n lɛez d tayri. Daymi nezga d imekdiyen i yisem-is azedgan i yewwten ɣef tukksa n lḥif n yimeɛfan, i yesḥefḍen i yesseknen ayen i yettwaffren i ugdud n tmurt-is i yettawi dima d anezgum-is. Tabɣest i yesɛa, tewweḍ taseddart d tameqqrant, ula d aḥulfu n ukukru ur t-yeǧǧa ad as-yesseḥbes tikli i yebda, neɣ ad t-id-iwexxer ɣer deffir. Netta d argaz i yeččuren d irgazen, d win i d-irebban, i d-yessekkren irgazen, d bu temsirin ur d-ttakken yiɣerbazen, d wihin i yufraren i ifazzen. Acḥal i yesɛa d tarwa i as-d-irennun i ara as-d-yernun tarwa. Simmal ṭṭuqquten wid i t-yettḥibbin, ẓran dakken lemmer mačči d netta, tili ur telli akka. Ɣas ulamma lukan ur iɣab ara, iban addad-nneɣ ur yettili am wa n tura: ad ibeddel kullec seg yal tama. Lameɛna s wayen i d-yeǧǧa i nekker nelḥa. Yessexreb lecɣal amek i d-yenna, yesseɛreq awal s lehḍir d ccna. Atan mazal annect-nni ur yefni. Mazal aɣref-is yettkemmil ayen i yebɣa: ur tt-yefra s trewla, ur yettwaqqen s ssnesla. Akken tenniḍ: ‘’d lwajeb asirem ad yili, deg wulawen ad yefti, ɣas akka lweɛd la iteqqes.’’ Ihi s usirem iɣef tettwessiḍ i yettwanjar ubrid ideg telḥiḍ, yis-s amennuɣ yettkemmil alami i yettwaseggem lkil. S lexsas neggar tiɣri, nessiwil, ur nɣeffel ad aɣ-yesseɣli lmil, ur neẓẓuɣɣur ur nettɛeṭṭil akken ad neg ttawil. Ass-a, azekka, Dda Lwennas yella yella.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaysa Khalifi 

  
 Ttrajunt ktar n 100 twaculin i yittidiren di taddart n at yeḥya di tɣiwant n ssuq lexmis deg umalu lwilaya n tubiret asiweḍ lgaz n temdint i yellan deg ahil ara yesfayden acḥal d timnaḍin id-yezzin i tɣiwant-agi umbaɛd mi d-wekkden imḍebren akken 95 di lemya ad yawweḍ usenfar-a ɣer tuddar-a , dayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ n at yeḥya steqsayen d acu n tsebbiwin i yeǧǧan akken ur sfayden ara seg usafar-a i yellan acḥal d iseggasen aya nutni ttrajun melmi ara d-yawweḍ s ixxamen nsen imi taddart-a teqreb ɣer tɣiwant ssuq lexmis meḥsub sin yikilumiṭren i tebɛed ɣef uxxam n tɣiwant yerna zgand ɣef ubrid lwilaya yettawin ɣer ɛin bessam , rnu s annect-a akken imḍebren weɛen-ten ayyuren-agi iɛeddan s usiweḍ n lgaz imi ttwalin tamnadt-a tettwasen s usemmiḍ d ugeffur qessiḥen deg ussan n cetwa , Si tama nniḍen iwekded uselway n tɣiwant akken deg ayyuren -agi id i teddun ad asen-yaweḍ lgaz i yimezdaɣ-a imi yerra aɣbel-a yenna-d belli asenfar-a ur yebdi ara di lawan meḥsub iɛeṭṭel , ɣef waya imezdaɣ sḥasfen s waṭas ɣef uɣbel-a ideg rwan lmeḥna acḥal iseggasen di teqreɛtin lgaz isen-yesserwan lmeḥa d leɛtab imi tikelt ad afen tikelt ulac acku icuɣbiten mliḥ d annect ssuturen seg yimḍebren ad ṭṭfen di lweɛd nsen s usiwed usenfar-a deg ussan-agi kan xersum ad siwḍen s asirem nsen i llan ssaramen .

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tinezduɣin n “rrif” hwaǧent trisiti  

 Ssuturent twaculin i d-yesfayden si tnezduɣin i yetabaɛen s aḥric n tnezduɣin rrif di temnadt n dɣafla di tɣiwant lhacimiya id-yezgan deg unẓul lwilaya n tubiret s useɛjel usiweḍ n trisiti s ixxamen nsen xersum ad yefru ugur-a imi yeghlid lxuf ɣef twaculin-agi aṭas ayagi acku lexyuḍ n trisiti i yiwḍen s ixxamen nsen xerben akk ur qɛidden ara akken iwata ,Si tama nniḍen ssuturen imezdaɣ akken ad d- ggar iman-is tkubanit yettwaxesen di trisiti sonalgaz ad tesifses cwiya seg uɣbel-a s useggem lexyud-agi ixerben xersum ad yenqes lxuf i yimezdaɣ imi aɣbel n trisiti yeqqim d ugur ameqqran di tama-a , ɣef wannect-a ttuɣun imezdaɣ ad d-rren yimḍebren tmuɣli nsen s aɣbel -a i yellan acḥal-ayagi yerna mazal-it ar ass-a d wussan werɛad yefri akken as d-affen tifrat s lɛejlan asen d-siwḍen trisiti ad teḍwu tafat .<span style="white-space: pre;"> </span> 

<p style="text-align: right;">   Abdelhak Menas 

  
 Mazal ar ass-a timetti-nneɣ tettwali aṭṭan-agi n sida d ucenna neɣ d aṭabu ɣas ulamma aṭṭanen i merra tettmeslay fell-asen. Ula d aṭṭan-nni n lkunsir (axenzir) tekkes-as awal-nni: ad aɣ-yenju rebbi yenju lmumnin! yettɣid win ara ihelken di tmurt-nneɣ, imi si tazwara, iban kan ad yettuxeṭṭi, ama sɣur medden ama sɣur-s.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Tidet ɣef waṭṭan-a 

 Aya ad t-ncudd qbala ɣer nekni ur nezri tidet n waṭṭan-a n ubirus n VIH i yuɣalen ass-a seg waṭṭanen yezgan s dwawi i d-snulfant tmura yeddan d wamek yettanṭaḍ imi nekkni ɣur-neɣ nenwa ma nemmeslay d win ihelken, ad aɣ-yenṭeḍ, ma neḍsa-as, ad aɣ-yenṭeḍ. Dɣa, ma nemsalam yid-s tenger fell-aɣ, Xaṭi. 

<p style="text-align: center;"> Amek ittanṭaḍ ? 

 Abirus n VIH yettanṭad s tuzzuft (sexualité ), s tsegnatin-nni yettwasnen deg uksum n win yuḍnen. Ula d ljerḥ amectuḥ, yezmer ad as-yili d tawwurt i ubirus-a ma yemlal yid-s war ma nettu tayemmat i t-issenṭaḍen i mmi-s, ama di tadist neɣ s usuṭṭeḍ. Deg useggas n 2014 iban-d wazal n36,9 n yimelyan n wid ihelken sida maca mačči d leḥsab iseḥḥan imi aṭas n wid iteffren leḥlak-nsen, Dɣa ma nesteqsa acimi? tiririt tban kan imi s yis-s i d-nebda ameslay. D acu kan imi nekni nettwali ala s yir tiṭ , mi nesla s walbaɛd ihlek neqqar-as yekcem iberdan-nni n yir tuzzuft, war ma nezra d acu n sebba s tidet imi yezmer ad tili d ayen-nniḍen s wakka nettkemmil i taluft am wakken i as-yettkemmil win yuḍnen.

<p style="text-align: center;"> Melmi i d-yettban Sida ɣer umdan ? 

 Aṭṭan n sida, ur d-yettban ara s amdan alamma fkant 7 ar 10 n yiseggasen d asawen, bexlaf ccirat-nni timeẓyanin ur nettawi lewhi ɣur-s. D ayen ara t-yeǧǧen, ad yezzuzur deg ubirus-agi. D acu kan, ayen yessewhamen imnadiyen d tamurt-a tageswaḥt tineslemt akk d tid i tt-icuban anda tuzzuft d leḥram ma teffeɣ i lɛada n zwaj, meɛna mazal yettnerni sida deg-s! U acimi ur d-tettili ara tikci n yiḥaraben (préservatifs ) baṭel am wakken xeddment tmura irebḥen? i wakken ad nessenɣes tallalit n waṭṭan-agi i icudden deg ugar 80% n tikkwal ɣer tuzzuft.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Salima D 

 
  
 Mačči kan ala aṭṭan n uxenẓir i iweɛren i udawi deg tmurt. Ula d aṭṭanen-nniḍen i d-yettbanen zun d ifessasen, yuɣal yewɛer ad ten-tdawiḍ akka imir-a deg waɣir n Bgayet. Ugar n yiḥeyyaren i sɛeddayen yimuḍan seg lehlak-nni-nsen, ttidiren iɣeblan-nniḍen akken ad afen tazeqqa n udawi i walmend-nsen. Syin ad d-ṭṭfen ttiɛad ara ten-yeǧǧen ad gganin ayyuren deg tiqraḥ send tirza n usɛeddi. Amedya n waṭṭan n ubeḥri n yiɣsan d uzellum, ttmagaren-d yimezdaɣ n twilayt n Bgayet, ladɣa asamar-is, uguren d imeqqranen akken ad afen amsujji iqerben seg tnezduɣt-nsen, neɣ sɣur win ara d-sɛeddin war ma urǧan nnuba n waṭas n wayyuren. Iban-d mačči kan beɛden yimsujjiyen n waṭṭanen-a ɣef Wat usamar n Bgayet, am Ayt Smaɛel, Tasexriwt d Yiderginen, maca daɣen uqan ayendin sdat umḍan ageɛmir n yimuḍan n waṭṭan-a i yettziden yettahda. « Ṭṭfeɣ-d ttiɛad seg Uqbu, maca ilaq-iyi ad rǧuɣ sin n wayyuren d uzgen akken ad ɛeddiɣ. Ur nesɛi ara tiferni-nniḍen, wamma tili nefren win i aɣ-iseɛɛden ». D awal n yiwet n tmeṭṭut seg Ayt Smaɛel. Mi ara yili waṭṭan deg uswir i d-yessuturen adawi uzrib, tuget n medden i nesteqsa smenyifen amsujji abujad iqerben, wala win yettwassnen ibeɛden. D acu, ugur a-t-an ur ttwassnen ara yibujaden i yeddawayen aṭṭan-a neɣ wa. « Nekk s timmad-iw ssneɣ ḥaca yiwen n umsujji i yeddawayen aṭṭan-a. D win i yettwassnen, d win iɣef ttmeslayen lɣaci seg waṭas-aya ». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n urgaz. Ulamma ggten ttawilat n teywalt, am yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen, mazal ttɛeṭṭilent kra n telɣa akken ad awḍent i uɣerman. Rnu d tigejdanin maḍi, ma nsenneḍ ɣef umedya-a n tezmert n umdan d udawi-ines. Ugar n uraǧu iḍulen armi yenfel ssber, ula d ass n usɛeddi ur yelli d ushil ɣef umuḍin n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel d tɣiwanin i as-d-yezzin. Ɣas ma d tagrest i d-iteddun tura, ideg yettili usemmiḍ tettɛeṭṭil tafat n tnezzayt, yessefk ɣef umuḍin ad d-yekker ɣef zik lḥal i tisin deg yiḍ i wadeg yeggugen, ma yebɣa ad d-yeqḍu aqeddic-is akken yessaram.

  M. K. 

  
 Ttlalen yemdanen ddaw lebɣi n ugacur (hazard) deg tmura yemgaraden deg uɣanib n tmeddurt, deg idles, deg asɣan( la religion) deg ansayen( leɛwayed), deg lɛeqliya, deg tidmi akked tmuɣli ttawin ɣef timsal icudden ɣer tudert d lmut d w-ayen yellan akkin I lmut.

 Maca xas akken kulci yesebɛed amdan ɣef umdan nniḍen tella tidmi (la pensée), tella tinfit (l’esprit) d tifrit (la conscience) tzeṭṭ imurar gar iɣerfan wicqa amek llan leɛwayed-nsen d w-ayen s wacu yummen.

 Tikwal tidmi akked tinfit ttilin nnig wakud akken ad zdin tamuɣli n yiḍeli ɣer tin n wass-a. Ulac ayen yaẓẓaẓayen amdan n tama-agi ɣer win n tama yellan akkin am imedyazen, am imyura, am izemniyen, am inaẓuran.

 Ay akken yebɣu yella ttawil ɣef acu id yedda yinaw (discours) n timussnawin teɣzi n wakud yezrin d win yellan d amiran, tikta (xas tikwal ttemqazament, ttemgaradent, ttnaɣent bay-gar-asen-t) maca lebɣi n yal ameslay yiwen: tifin n unamek n tɣawsiwin yeggan lemqud I tudert d w-ayen yellan d amsdaɣ (parallèle) I tudert-nni.

 Aɣbel n umdan yiwen-it: acimi id yussa ɣer tudert, acu id iswi-s deg tudert-agi, acu I t-yettraǧun deffir tudert (sakkin i lmut). Ɣef aya mgaradent tiktiwin timenza id yewwi umdan ɣer unnar n usakasi ɣef t-id iḍefṛen seg immir ɣer tura. Acku I lɣerẓa uḥakker akked tizumna tenerna ɣer ugni n wawal tidet id tewwi tussna.

 Ahat llsas amenzu ɣef yebda lebni n usekkud azemni yeqqen ɣer wesɣan( la religion). Amdan amenzu yadren tallit n uzermezray (préhistorioque) ur yegzi ara ayen iḍeṛṛun di ddunit. Ur yessin ssebba n tamsalt acku tamussni tussnant( la connaissance scientifique) mazal ur d tlul ara. Ɣef aya yeqqen kra yellan ɣef usɣan. Tudgi akked war tamussni llan-t deffir w-ayen umi neqqar uɣris (le sacré).

 Amdan amenzu yeddan deg ubrid n usɣan (la religion) yesbedden iɣulad imenza yenwa d uɣrisen( sacrés) yerra iṛṛabiten d lqibla n ṭmana i tmeddurt-is war ma ifaq sw-akken yessa deg annar n tudert lḥawj ɣer unadi akken ad tili tuget n tmussni. Isula kkan-d (i merra) deg yiwen usteqsi aqbur : anwa id nekk ? Amek id nekk ? Amek ara yilli inekiw zdat inekiw n wiyaḍ?

 Anadi n lewǧeb ɣef tuttriwin-agi yellan d llsas n tizumna( philosophie) yeldi tawwurt I tidmi akken a tḥatec deg iman-is , beṛṛa n n yiman-is , deg akal deg igenni akken ayen yellan yeffer as yewɛu wallaɣ, ad yuɣal ddaw leɛnaya n lebɣi-s tefrit (la conscience) akked d- w-ayen yellan ddaw tefrit (l’inconscient). D-ayen id yewwin tarennwat (victoire/ suprématie) d tinfit ɣef tfekka.

 I tikelt tamenzut yegzi wabbaɣ n umdan d akken xas iɣab ( iɣab s unamek aɣaran/ la mort physique) maca yezmer ad yenfel akkin i tmettant s wudem n tinfit. Seg immir lecɣal yeqnan ɣef lyafuxa , ɣer wallaɣ, ɣer tidmi wwin azal ɣef necwa tuwzilt n tfeka (tafekka tudert-ines d tuzuft, lḥawej-ines d ccihwa-t).

 Seg immir yenǧer ubrid ɣer unadi ɣef taɣlalt (l’éternité). Deg ixf n yiman-is amdan yegrawel addad ines yellan d lfani. Ahat ulac inzikmir (douleur) yettɛebbi ixf n umdan deg tifrit-ines am lqeṛh yerzan aɣbel n lmut. Inekiw (le MOI) n umdan yugi tamettant. Kra yellan d aferdis deg iman-is yesflit ad idum ad yili d aɣlal( éternel). D tugdi-agi tuffirt yettawi yid-s i ldin tiwwura ɣer usɣan d w-ayen yeddan akked lɣerẓa n wasɣan. Imṛabḍen, ibudaliyen, ixewniyen, iderwicen, ihayaden, icawafen, imdawiyen ibaḍniyen yak d tugniwin ad yettmalen amek si zik n zik amdan yecqat- unadi ɣef wamek ara d yekk nnig iman-is( liḥala tamenzut it-yerran d lfani / état primaire de mortel) akken ad ibedd ɣef udasil nniḍen : addad alɣaɣ. 

 Amek? Acu n tawwil yesɛa umdan ameḍɛafu akken ad yezger seg addad n wadda ɣer win ufella. Seg liḥala-s n uɣersiw amenzu – animal primaire- ɣef liḥala timinegt (état superieur) ara t-yerran d-Ales (surhomme) mačči d-amdan( homme) ?

 Nnig tira tuɣris (écritures sacrées) nnig tira n iḥulfan( écrits spirituels) d tiregwa id tenǧer tinfit ( espṛit) id yewwin nuba i tixelwit n umdan akked yiman-is (la méditation).

 Nietsche akked ccix Muhen U Lhusin , xas tamgared tagnit, tallit, d yidles anda id lulen d wanda ɛacen, maca aɣbel-nsen yiwen-it: amek ara ibeddel lqum ad yaki seg lihala-s tazwarant deg akken yella akken ad yezger ɣef waddad n ufella ara t-yawin s asqif n ṭṭmana anda yettidir wales !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Ait Slimane Hamid  

  
 Dddurt yezrin, yell-ad wawal deg usebtar-a ɣef”tenfult n tezrawin n tmazight” (bulletin d’Etudes Berbères) d-yefɣen ɣer tezrigin Achab. Yura-d umeskar : “ wakken ad tishil taɣuṛi n isebṭaren yellan deg zzmam , amur ameqqran seg tewriqin-is yettuɛawed-asen-t tira ( uran-t s wudem atrar) ama deg ayen yeɛnan asekkil neɣ tirawalt( ortographie).” Dɣa da i d-tella tucḍa, imi ur tettuɛawed ara tira, teqqim kan akken yuɣ lḥal tura di tazwara. Ad aɣ-surfen imeɣriyen d tezrigin Achab

  
 Ayen yella-n d-aqbur yesɛa azal, ɣas ma yella ḥeqrent medden tura. Wigi d lḥirfat n zik nni i ruḥen ttwattun-t. Acku tatrara tewwi-d yides « daɛwessu » lakked tatut yewwin kra yella-n n zik nni. Lḥirfat-agi n-ufus ttruḥun-t yiwet yiwet, ḥaca ma negren-t! Ayagi, mači dayen yessefraḥen, imi nebra i yigerruǧen n leǧdud iɣ-d ǧǧan. Maca, nukni ur nessin ara azal n waya, imi iɣ iruḥ akk ayen nessen. Maca, llan kra n yimɣaren mazal-iten ṭfen deg lḥirfat nsen ɣas akkeni ur ssarbaḥ-ent ara bab-is tura, deg tallit nneɣ, anda kulec yuɣal d timacinin lakked d-irubuten. Nesɛa akken yiwen n-umedya: D yiwen umɣar akkeni yesɛan azal n 85 iseggasen, yerna mazal-it yeǧhed. Mass-agi, yuklal taǧmilt s wazal-is, imi ɣas akken muqqer deg laɛmar ifassen-is mazal-iten ttxiḍin, gezmen, feṣlen…timeḍraḥin n taḍuṭ (Les matelas traditionnels). Akka ihi, D’da Muḥand nufat-id yiwen wass deg t’ḥanut-is yettxiḍi imeḍraḥen n taḍut i kra n yimdanen. Yesɛa taḥanutt deg taddart n Ginduz, yella-n d-aqerru n t’ɣiwant n Ayt Ṛzin, ibaɛden azal n 85 ikilumiṭren ɣef Bgayet tamanaɣt n t’wilayt. Ass-mi i neẓra amɣar-agi i xedem timeḍraḥin ur n-umin ara, acku nenwa belli lḥirfa-agi tenger. Ulac ass-a win i xedmen timeḍraḥin s-ufus, acku medden akk ttaɣen-d tid n luzinat. Mi nekcem ɣer umɣar-agi nufa yeǧhed, ifassen-is txiḍin. Yenna-d : »Akken tettwali-ḍ d nek kan i d-yugran ixedem timeḍraḥin n zik nni deg tama-agi n’At Ɛebbas. Ɣuri 85 isegassen, maca ur bɣiɣ ara ad ḥebseɣ lḥirfa-agi n baba lakked jeddi! ». Neseqsa-t ɣef arraw-is ma yella refden asafu n senɛa-ines, D’da Muḥand yenna-d : »Ulac ! Arraw-iw ur ssinen ara lḥirfa-agi. Acku, ass-a ur tettɛeyic ara bab-is… ». Ih akka, zman aɣeddar. Ulac yiwen ger yilmeẓyen ilemden lḥirfa-agi taqburt yesɛan acḥal d leqrun, akken attkemmel abrid-is. D’da Muḥand mači d lǧahel, ɣas m’ur yeɣri ara, maca yesɛa ifassen ugaren kra yella-n d ttussna. Amɣar-agi ur ixedem ara kan imeḍraḥen, ixedem ayen nniḍen am icwariyen, tibardiwin i yiɣuyal, tiqfacin, igertyal,…lḥṣul mači d yiwet n lḥirfa i yesɛa deg ifassen-is n-uraɣ. Ma yella d nukni, neqqim nezza, imi ayen yessen akka D’da Muḥand at yawi yides ɣer uẓekka ass ma yemmet (nessaram-as tuɣzi laɛmar !!). Atan anda yewweḍ yidles nneɣ, iwumi iruḥ ula…d-rruḥ !

<p style="text-align: right;"> Syphax Y. 

  
 Imɣaren-nneɣ d agerruj, d wid iɛzizen ɣef wul. Zgan kerhen lɛuj, bɣan sswab d lmeɛqul. D imɣaren-nneɣ i aɣ-yesserwan awessi, sskaneyen-aɣ-d abrid n tafat. Ma yella nefka-asen asteqsi, tiririt ad tt-id-rren d snat. Imaɣren-nneɣ, nḥemmel-iten swan, azal i lan yif ssuma. Acek-iten zeddigen am waman, d rrbeḥ kan i asen-nsemma. D imɣaren-nneɣ i aɣ-yesseḥfaḍen tissas, ur aɣ-ǧǧan ad necceḍ. Ssnen ad ḥudden llsas, ɣur-sen war ccek ad teɣreḍ. Imaɣaren-nneɣ, banen d anwi, awal i ten-yeɛnan ɣezzif. Win ur ten-ixaleḍ fell-as terwi, netta d ubuhal kif-kif. D imɣaren-nneɣ i yuklalen annuz, ugar n wiyaḍ imeẓyanen. Ɣas dima ad asen-neqqar ayyuz, aṭas i mazal ttalasen. Imɣaren-nneɣ, acḥal i ten-nettɛizzi, abaɣur seg-sen yettwaway. Imi-nsen ineṭṭeq-d s yinzi, iḥekku-d daɣen timuɛay. Imɣaren-nneɣ, lhan i temwinsa, rnan ttcebbiḥen tawacult. Yal mi ara d-inin taɣawsa, nettyeqqen belli d tameẓẓult. D imɣaren-nneɣ i d At tfenṭaẓit, ggullen ad tt-ḥerzen ur as-berrun. Nnif ssekcamen-t i ugrud d tlemẓit, widak-nniḍen ur ten-tettun. Imɣaren-nneɣ, tekksen-aɣ tatut, smektayen-d amezruy d yidles. Ansay i neṭṭafar am lqut, yis-sen d awezɣi ad t-neɛfes. D imɣaren-nneɣ i d azamul n tmussni, nennum sɣur-sen nlemmed. Amek ara aɣ-seɛyyun ɛni, yak i tama-nsen i nsenned. Imɣaren-nneɣ, cfan-d ɣef zik, tudert-nni n yimezwura. Ulama yid-sen ur tt-necrik, s usugen deg-s negra. D imɣaren-nneɣ i ɛuffen tiḥsifin, ssaramen ḥaca lxir d lɛali. Tiẓeḍt deg ccwal ur tt-ufin, ran tagmat ad tidir ad tili. Nnig wayen i d-iniɣ merra ɣef yimɣaren-nneɣ, mazal ameslay fell-asen ur ifukk. Imi ɣas ma d imeqqranen deg leɛmer, maca allaɣ i kesben s tmussniwin d tektiwin yeɛmer. Nerra tamawt ula i leqdic-nsen deg yal tama. Amedya, llan yimɣaren i d-yesnulfayen tiddukkliwin, ttmaggan d iselwayen-nsent, ttazzalen ɛettben I wakken ad yesmurres ccɣel-nsen. Rnu, neẓra belli ɣas ad d-ssekren tarwa ad mɣuren, wanag ttekkayen s tezmert-nsen deg urebbi n yiḥfiden-nsen d llhu yis-sen. Ad ken-yeḥrez Uxellaq ay imɣaren d temɣarin-nneɣ.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaïsa Khalifi 

  
 Mohamed Al Arifi, yiwen seg Lmacayex Imeqqranen n Ssalafiya Al Wahabiya ay uznen s tfetwatin-is (Fatwas) isawalen i Ljihad deg Surya igiman n yelmeẓyen ad d-mmten, ad d-nɣen, ad zlun irgazen, ad jeggḥen tilawin, ad snejlin igiman n twaculin am tin n Aylan… s yisem n ddin ineslem. Maca, netta ɣas ineɣɣ s  » Lfatwa  » ur d-yettmettat ur izedder mmis deg yilel… Mmi-s netta yuklal kan ad yidir deg leqṭen !

<p style="text-align: right;"> D.D.IMEDYAZEN 

  
 Ma yella ameqqran yesra i uqader d uqedder, amecṭuḥ yesra i usebɣes. Bouam Mouhamed Arezki d amedyaz ilemẓi i d-ilulen deg tɣiwant n Ssuq n Letnin (Mɛetqa). Hata wayen i d-yerra ɣef yisteqsiyen i as-yettunefken:

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Tenniḍ-d mačči aṭas-aya segmi tefkiḍ azal i tira, acimi?  

  Bouam Mouhamed Arezki:  Di tazwara, ttaruɣ kan i yiman-iw… Lliɣ ttwaliɣ aswir-iw d amecṭuḥ, am d assetḥi i ttsetḥiɣ ad d-sbiyyneɣ ayen ttaruɣ. D aya i yekkin cwiṭ deg tmentilt i yi-yeǧǧan ad qqimeɣ armi d taggara-a akken kecmeɣ ad issineɣ amaḍal-agi n tmedyazt amek iwata.

  Amek tufiḍ iman-ik deg umaḍal n yisekkilen? 

  Ayen i yi-yewwin ɣer tira, d tikli d umennuɣ n teqbaylit. Ciṭ di ccna, ciṭ di leqdic adelsan. Yehwa-yi umaḍal-a aṭas. Umreɣ daɣen mi deg-s i lliɣ, deg-i i yella. Ad as-iniɣ tanemmirt i Tdukkla Tadelsant n taddart Tiɣilt Maḥmud i d-yeslulen deg-i lebɣi akken ad xedmeɣ kra i tamagit s yimru i ufiɣ d allal deg wannar n yifyar.

  Tewwiḍ tikkelt iɛeddan arraz amezwaru deg tfaska n tmedyazt i d-thegga Tdukkla Tadelsant Smaɛil Azikiw, amek iga uḥulfu-inek?  

 Arraz-nni d win i ur rǧiɣ maḍi ad t-awiɣ, acku alammi d aseggas-a i ssneɣ tifaskiwin, yerna ufiɣ-d aṭas n yimedyazen yufraren. Aya yerna-yi-d tabɣest d lebɣi meqqren akken ad kemmleɣ ɣer sdat, imi iswi amezwaru d asnerni n wazal i tira taqbaylit.

  Imi aql-ik ɛad d ilemẓi, ahat llan wid i ak-yessebɣasen ad tkemmleḍ abrid i d-tebdiḍ?  

 Tazwara d At uxxam i d-yellan ɣer tama-w, syin akkin ufiɣ-d tawacult n yimedyazen ara snemmreɣ. D nutni i yi-yesbeɣsen! Ladɣa imi lliɣ d ilemẓi gar-asen. Seg-sen ad d-bedreɣ Dda Mbarek Gamar i yi-d-yefkan afud meqqren.

  D acu tessarameḍ ad txedmeḍ s tekci-a-inek n usefru?  

 Tidet kan ur i yi-iban ar tura. Akken lliɣ akka, mazal ttnadiɣ ad snerniɣ aswir n tira-w. Ahat ad d-swejdeɣ ammud n yisefra, maca mazal ciṭṭuḥ imi lawan-a, teṭṭef-iyi-d leqraya.

  Testeqsa-t Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Ma nmuqel s sswab gar yiḍelli d wass-a, ad naf yella umgarad i d-ilulen deg ccna azwaw. D amgarad i aɣ-yattaǧǧan nesḥissif aṭas, imi d-yegla kan s temḍerrit i tezlit-nneɣ d uẓawan-is. Ur mazal tizlit taqbaylit am tinna n zik. Ur teqqim amek tella, ur telḥi ɣer ubrid n lɛali. Acimi? Acku kra n yicennayen imaynuten i d-yettilin, i d-yettekcamen annar-agi n usbeɛzeq n tuɣac, beddlen-tt amek i asen-yehwa. 

 Tṭuqqten tura wid icennun ɣef yiwen n yiswi, sin, neɣ ugar, war ma gan leḥsab-nsen i wazal n tezlit-nsen n tidet. Xeddmen imeslayen s tutlayt-nsen, rnan ssexlaḍen awalen n tutlayin-nniḍen am tefransist. Mačči d anza neɣ d sin i d-yettunefken ɣef waya. Mačči d yiwen n umedya i d-yettwasersen ɣef taluft-a. Nesla i yilmeẓyen i d-ibeddren tafransist deg tezlatin-nsen i yettuneḥsaben zun d tizwawin. Bennun tameɣrut d tseddarin s snat n tutlayin, ssexlaḍen win i nwan d asefru s yimeslayen ur nelli d ayla-nsen. 

 La qqaren: confiance, souffrance, résidence, dance, dommage, fidèle, je t’aime… Asexleḍ-agi n tutlayin, tukksa-a n yimeslayen n lasel, yesquddur aman iwesxen ɣef leḥrir azedgan i ɣensen yinaẓuren-nneɣ iqburen i tezlit taqbaylit. Inaẓuren-agi, kra seg-sen mmuten ǧǧan-d agerruj n ccna yeɣlayen i wid-nniḍen i t-id-yeǧǧan i wiyaḍ, imi wa yeḥfeḍ-it sɣur wa almi simmal ifetti. Kra seg-sen daɣen, mazal ar ass-a ddren, s wul d tẓuri ttakken-d i tezlit-nsen ayen iwumi zemren. D nutni i yettwaḥuzan, i ttuqerḥen aṭas mi ara sellen i tezlit taqbaylit amek tuɣal. 

 D tugdi i iwezzɛen deg wulawen n wid i iḥemmlen tizlit tazwawt taḥeqqanit, ttɛebbin-as tayri ur tt-bɣan ad tt-nɣen wid i ur nquder ccan-is ameqqran. 

 Amek i yettusemma yiwen d acennay aqbayli, icennu yessufuɣ-d tisfifin s teqbaylit, maca mi ara d-tawweḍ i uttḥesses nsell deg-sen xilla n trumit!? D tiyita i yettakken yilmeẓyen i tezlit tazwawt seg wacḥal-aya, ladɣa wid icennun tayri d uɣanib n tmeɣriwin. Mazal ttkemmilen asefcel n tutlayt d yidles-nneɣ, imi ttwalin leqdic-nni-nsen d win yelhan. Xeddmen akkenni ad as-tiniḍ sɛan snat n tutlayin, neɣ wissen d anta d tamentilt!?

<p style="text-align: right;"> Kaïsa Khalifi 

  
 I lmend n useggas amaynut n 2965, inelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas Lɛerbi at Ɛmer, s ufus n tiddukla Asaka, uran-d aɣmis s tmaziɣt.Gar yeḍrisen d imagraden i d-uran inelmaden d tnelmadin, ad naf : iḍrisen ɣef usfuggel n yennayer, tamedyazt, tinigit n tlawin meqren ɣef wamek yella Yennayer ass mi llant meẓiyit, atg. Ayen s yernan azal i weɣmis-agi, d lebɣi s wacu t-uran inemladen. Ur cuḥḥen ara i yiman-nsen, kkan-d tuddar steqsan, megren-d isallen, isefra d-yegran di cfayat n wid meqren. Akka fkan-d afus deg tira n webruy seg yidles nneɣ. Xas ahat d aɣmis ameẓyan, maca d abrid i wakken ad yekkes ckal i wid yessaramen ad arun s tmaziɣt, daɣen d tagnitt i wakken ad afen acu ara ɣren wiyaḍ. Aɣmis-agi, yettwaferqen d afraq, yeffeɣ-d s tallelt n Mass Buzwan Awmer. Deg-s, tella daɣen tadiwnit i s-xedmen i unemhal n uɣerbaz nsen mass Iften Ḥamid.

 Aɣmis-agi yerna-d ar wayen meṛṛa yettwaxedmen ass nni n Yennayer, i d-sweǧden s ufus n tiddukla Asaka. 

<p style="text-align: right;">Tiddukla Asaka

  
 Hattan tlul-d tfaska tamaynut n tmedyezt tamaziɣt deg Tubiret. Iwakken tutlayt ad tezgi tettnerni seg wakud ɣer wayeḍ, iwakken ad sbeyynen tarwa-s timmeɣnest deg wannar, Tidukkla Aqeddic n Yilemẓiyen ed Tmerrit n waɣir n Tubiret teggar tiɣri i kra n wid ed tid yesqerdicen awal n tyemmat – amaziɣ- iwakken ma bɣan ad tekkin deg tfaska-nsen n tmedyezt deg teẓrigt-is tamezwarut, ad d-aznen sin n yisefra-nsen d imaynuten ɣer yiznil-a alikṭrunan: <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="9eeafff8ffedf5ffacaeafabdef9f3fff7f2b0fdf1f3" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a> . « Nwala ala deg tubiret i ulac tafaska n tmedyezt tamaziɣt, dɣa nenna-yas acuɣer ala ur d-nesnulfay ara yiwet, meqqar d abaɣur nniḍen i yidles-nneɣ ». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna Ben Ɛisu Nasir, yiwen n uɛeggal n tidukkla-ya tameẓyant i d-yennulfan deg useggas n 2010. Ad d-nerr kan awellih ma yella win yesran i wugar n yisallen, yezmer ad yessiwel i wuṭṭun-a n usawal: 07 70 43 87 95. « Nessaram kan imedyazen ad d-aznen isefra i yuran ttbinen-d akken ilaq. Zemren ad ttekkin seg yal tawilayt n tmurt acku tafaska d taɣelnawt. Ma d taẓrigt-a tamenzut ad tili d tajmilt i unaẓur Ɛli Meẓyan i yuklalen aṭas n leqder sɣur yal yiwen seg-neɣ ». I aɣ-d-yerna win i aɣ-d-yettmeslayen. 

 Yewwi-d ad ẓren yimedyazen i yenwan ad ceyyɛen isefra-nsen bac ad ḥeḍren i ttiɛad-a n at wawal, dakken azemz aneggaru n uceyyaɛ d ass n 25 seg yunyu i d-iteddun. Isefra-nni dɣa, am tal tikkelt deg yella umsiẓwer, ad ɛeddin sɣur tesqamut n yinezzurfa. Ma yella d tafaska ad temmag ussan n 26, 27, 28, 29, 30 seg wayyur n yulyu, yettusemma d teɣzi n lqidar bac ad tili d timlilit twennaɛ.

 Akka ihi, yetturaǧu, yuɣ lḥal, ad maggen warmuden n tfaska-ya deg uxxam n yidles n Tubiret Ɛli Zeɛmum anda ara yecnu taggara yinebgi n yiseɣ Ɛli Meẓyan, maca ar tura ur teddiz ɣef umḍiq-nni. Afud igerrzen i tdukkla-ya, d tekti n lɛali i d-yellan, imi awal azwaw, amaziɣ yesra i urfad, yuḥwaǧ aqdac sɣur wid-is.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Akken ara yedden ccix , mi ṛzan lmeɣreb , imir tiwaculin ad bdunt ad d-teffɣent. Llant tid yettruhun ɣer tzeqqa n tmeɣriwin d yidles, am uxxam n yidles Mulud at Mɛemmer, neɣ ɣer tḥuna i wakken ad d-aɣen ayen bɣan neɣ ad qimen akken ad ččen ayen semḍen, acku deg uzal ttuẓumen yerna yeḥma lḥal abeɛda ussan-agi ineggura n yunyu. Tizi Uezzu, deg uḍan n remḍan tecbeḥ dayen izaden. Ayen i as-yernan sser, d arrac imecṭaḥ , yetturaren, ferḥen s waṭas. Ad naf amekkkan n’’la gare’’ taqdimt i rran d amekkan n wurar i warrac imecṭaḥ d zhu d uqesser n yimawlan-nsen , tettacar dayen kan : tekksen ɛeggu n remḍan, tettemlili tasa d wayen turew. Yella, daɣen, umekkan-niḍen i d-yezgan nnig lwilaya, ‘’jardin public’’, yal amḍiq yeččur, ula deg ubrid d imeyyaten n lɣaci i ileḥḥun, ama ɣef uḍar ama s tkeryas. Aya, mačči kan deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu , ula deg uẓeffun anda yal tameddit tettli-d tmeɣra n ucennay. Akka, dɣa, ddurt yezrin, yecna, din, Djiilali Ḥamama, ddurt-agi yecna Ali Ferḥati, ma deg uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mɛemmer, yecna Ali Amrane, ass-nni n 28 deg yunyu. Uqbel-is, yecna Ali Meziane d Nouaara. Dayen yesferḥen lɣaci. Deg taggara-a n remḍan , ttfarasen ugar n wussan imezwura : yella wanida xeddmen ṭṭḥara i warrac imecṭaḥ, yella wanida ten-sddukkulen ass n 27 seg remdan. Ma d tilawin, ttaɣent-d isufar akken ad sewwent lgaṭu, ttaɣen-d i warrac imecṭaḥ iselsa imaynuten akked yililucen i lɛid. Akka, yettfakka Remdan s tumert, igerri-d usirem. Rnu ɣer waya, llan wid yeṭṭfen deg leɛwayed n tjaddit : ttheggin-d lqeḍyan i twelliyin ; llan wid yettruḥun deg wass n lɛid neɣ sabeḥ lɛid. Acu kan, seg tama-nniḍen, yettili-d laɛwacer d taswiɛt n leḥzen ɣer yigujilen d tgujilin, ɣer wid-nni i d-yettmektin wid-nni i ten-yeǧǧan. Aken yebɣu yili, nesaram lɛid amerbuḥ i wid ur nettu ara tiwaculin-nsen d yimuḍan d yimeɛdar, Tizi Uzzu gazr tid i ixeddmen tazmert-is akken ad tessefreḥ imuḍan , igellilen, imeɛder, ula d lberrani i d-yusan ɣur-s, sɛan amur-nsen.

<p style="text-align: right;">  Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 I lmend n usmekti n wass agraɣlan n tutlayin tiyemmatin i d-yettasen yal ass n 21 deg furar, Tidukkla tadelsant Tafrara n taddart n Teslent deg tɣiwant n Yiɣram, tama n Uqbu, thegga-d ass-nni n ttlata yezrin yiwet temlilit s wazal-is.

 Mlalen-d deg-s yimezdaɣ n taddart akked kra n yinebgawen i d-yerzan i wakken ad mmeslayen ɣef wazal n tutlayt tayemmat deg tneflit n tmetti. Gar wid I d-yemmeslayen, yella umyaru asdawan Mass Djamal AREZKI i d-yefkan yiwen usarag ɣef umezruy n tutlayin deg umaḍal d liḥala deg tettidir teqbaylit ass-a akked tantaliwin n temnaḍin-nniḍen illan deg Tmazɣa s umata. Deg awal-is, yenna-d belli, ass-a nnig 6000 n tutlayin tiyemmatin i yellan deg umaḍal. Yal aggur neggrent azal n snat deg-sent imi ur ttuseqdacent ara akken iwata, ur asent-ittunefkan ara wawal d wallalen iwulmen. Deg uskasi, imezdaɣ fkan-d aṭas n yisteqsiyen s wazal-nsen ɣef liḥala deg ttedirent tantaliwin ass-a deg tmurt n Lezzayer, amek i tezmer tutlayt ad tidir ur tneggar ara…atg Kra n yimawlan n yigerdan, steqsan ɣef wazal nbeddu n yigerdan n ulmud deg uɣerbaz s tutlayt tayemmat. Asteqsi-agi, yewwi amur meqqren deg uskasi, imi inelmaden n tmurt n Leqbayel ass-a, ur beddun ara almud s tutlayt tayemmat ɣas akken tamaziɣt d tutlayt tunsibt deg tmendawt. Deg tririt-is, Mass Djamal Arezki yenna-d: ”imusnawen akked yimejjayen n tnefsit nnan-d belli beddu n ulmud deg uɣerbaz s tutlayt tayemmat, yessishil i ugrud akken ad yissin tutlayin-nniḍen s shala, mebla ma iḥqer iman-is, neɣ imawlan-is neɣ idles-is’’. ɣef lewhi n tmeddit tekfa temlilit s yiwet n temsikent n yedlisen yettwarun ɣef/ s tutlayin tiyemmatin akked yedlisen n tmaziɣt s umata, am wakken i d-yella usnuzu s ubuddu sɣur kra n yimyura i d-yerzan :” Nessaram ad d-nettemlili yal aseggas deg tegnatin icban tigi, imi tutlayt nneɣ ass-a tuḥwaǧ ad nseḥbiber fell-as”, i d-yenna Mass Djafar Iskounen s yisem-is d aselway n Tidukkla Tafrara n Teslent. Afud igerzen i yilemziyen n Teslent ɣef leqdic-nsen.

<p style="text-align: right;">   Brahim Benhamouche 

  
 Ass-nni n aram, 8 deg unbir 2016, ɣef zuğ n tmeddit, yella-d leqdic adelsan i d-thegga tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu deg uxxam n yidles Mouloud Mammeri. Deg leqdic-a, tella-d temsizzelt gar tesnawiyin n Tizi Uzzu akked tesnawiyin n Lezzayer -asamer. Ma ɣef yiswiyen n temlilit, nnan-d yimḍebbren, Mass Boukhalfi d Mass Ali Ahmed : ‘’nebɣa ad nessufeɣ ciṭ inelmaden deg tegnatin-nni n leqraya i wakken ad steɛfun. Ad ccnun, ad xedmen addal, am wakken, diɣ, ad uraren timsezzilt gar tisnawiyin.’’ Akka, dɣa, i d-tella temsizzelt gar tesnawiyin n Tizi Uzzu akked d tesnawiyin n Lezzayer-asamer. Aya, yella-d s ttawil n umaṭṭaf amezwaru. Ttekkan deg temsizzelt inelmaden i d-yufraren deg yal tasnawit, iwakken ad d-rren ɣef yisestanen n tangiwin yemgaraden. Tangiwin–agi, llant kraḍ, deg-sent, mebla lxetyar, ilaq fell-asen ad d-rren ɣef yisestanen, gar-asent : taɛrabt, tusnakt, tiraklt d umezruy. Ma d tangiwin-nniḍen, llant-d s lxetyar am teglizit , tafransist, tussna , tasengama. Leqdic-a, yella-d s lmendad n umaswaḍ i d-yettwaceyyɛen seg uɣlif n usegmi, Mass Staihi Said , llan, diɣ, yiselmaden i d-yefkan isestanen n yal tanga , d yineɣmasen. Bdan seg tanga taɛrabt, terra-d ɣef yisetanen tnelmedt n tesnawit Fethi Said n Draa Ben khedda, tanga tusnakt, terra-d fell-as Fakhour Celia seg tesnawit n Hamki Idir, tanga n umezruy, terra-d fell-as Ait Larbi Kenza seg tesnawit n Toumi n Tegzirt, tanga n teglizit, terra-d fell-as Bilak Liza seg tesnawit n Abane Remdane, tanga n tusnakt, terra-d fell-as Boustona Nesrine seg tesnawit n stanbouli, tanga tussna terra-d fell-as, Ait Said Taous seg tesnawit n Micli , ma d tanga n tefransist terra-d fell-as, Ait Mouloud Ouardia seg tesnawit n 20 aout 1956. Ayen yessferḥen aṭas wid i d-yerzan ɣer temlilit-a, d tezlatin-nni n Nouara d Idir i d-ccnan yinelmaden. Ha-ten-in yigemmaḍ i d-yeffɣen ɣer taggara. I usmekti, inelmaden-agi yettekkin n uswir wis kraḍ yettrağu-ten ukayad n BAC taggara (deg wayyur n yunyu). Afud igerrzen

<p style="text-align: right;"> <span style="white-space: pre;"> </span>  Zakia Ben yahia 

  
 Deffir n tedyant-nni n Uweqqas i d-yeɣlan s sa (7) n yimattanen ɣef sebba n yiwen n usyax n udrar n Uweqqas, ḍran-d taggara-ya isyaxen deg waṭas n temnaḍin n unẓul-asamar n Bgayet, yettusemma seg Suq Letnin semmed akkin. Maca tikkelt-a, iheggen kan Yuc, ur d-llint terwiḥin i iruḥent d tiseflatin deg wayen i d-yeḍran. Gar yisyaxen-a ihi, yella winna n Ayt ɛnan i d-yellan ugar n ddurt ɣer deffir. Kra n yidɣaɣen, ur mecṭuḥit, sadden-d seg ufella n udrar almi rran tikli tewɛer i kra n wakud. Asyax nniḍen yeḍra-d deg tɣiwant n tsexriwt, deg ubrid yettawin ɣer taddart n Ayt ɛli ed Mḥend. Adrar-nni dɣa segmi i d-tecfa tsuta n yiḍelli netta yettseyyix, maca deg tegrest n useggas n 2011, iban-d belli yella umihi (danger) d ageɛmir ɣef yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt-nni, imi dɣa aṭas seg-sen i iwumi ceqqen yixxamen almi ttuḥettmen ad ǧǧen tinezduɣin-nsen imir-nni. Yuɣ lḥal, werɛad i asen-d-fkan yinesdabuyen (autorités) tinezduɣin timaynutin, ɣas ma heggant yakan deg Lberǧ n Mira. ḥeḍren daɣen yiɣermanen (citoyens) n unẓul-asamer n Bgayet ɣer uɣilif wayeḍ n yiberdan. Wa yerza abrid n twilayt i iteqqnen taɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel i tin n Tsexriwt. D akal i yelḥan, am lberṭa, almi yeǧǧa abrid-nni yemmerwal ɣef yiman-is, yeččur akk d iceqqiqen, ed yimedwan imeqqran. Tazwara, yella ulac win izemren ad iɛeddi fell-as, maca imḍebbren n tɣiwant uzzlen ssan-as kra n ubiṭan bac ad iqeɛɛed ulama cwiṭ. Syin dɣa, wid iqeddcen deg tumnayt tazayzant (transport public) uɣalen ur ttkimmilen ɣer wadda, tteḥbasen kan anda izuq ubrid, wiyaḍ ttawin-d seg wadda ɣer wadeg-nni daɣen dayen. Sebba mi ileḥḥu akka wakal, ur telli mi llan waman deg temnaḍt-a. Maca anect-a icudd ɣer tezmert (l’état de santé) n twennaḍt-nneɣ. Imi dɣa, mi ttruɣunt tẓegwa-nneɣ yal anebdu, ur tesɛiḍ anwa i izemren nniḍen ad ak-yeṭṭef akal; ma mačči d ṭṭjur. War ma nettu, dakken ahat ula d tiregwa akked yiḍerfan xussen cwiṭ deg yidurar-nneɣ, mačči am zik. « Ilaq ad nuɣal ad nerr awellih ɣer ugama-nneɣ: ad neẓẓut ṭṭjur, ad nɛus akken ur ttruɣent deg unebdu, maca daɣen, ilaq ad nxeddem iḍerfan am yijudda-nneɣ ». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna Arezqi.

<p style="text-align: right;"> Mhenni Xalifi 

  
 Imezdaɣ n temnadt at ɛelyan id yezgan di tɣiwant lxebuziya deg umalu lwilaya n tubiret ɣelqen ass larebɛa yezrin abrid yettawin gar tɣiwant lxebuziya akk tɣiwant ɛin bessam anda ssuturen s ubrid yettwaxesen iyi msebriden kan meḥsub abrid ansi ur sɛeddayent ara tkeṛusin imi uɣalen ttidiren di lxuf ḥaca seg ubrid acku ur sɛeddayen ama gezmen abrid dayen id yeglan s lmmut n yiwet teqcict yesɛan 19 iseggasen di lɛemr-is imi tewti tt yiwet n tkeṛust di tuɣalin -is ɣer uxxam , wwin tt ɣer sbiṭar n tizi uzzu dacu kan tewwed leɛfu Rebbi dayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ n taddart-a ad sḥisfen aṭas d leḥzen id yeɣlin di tama-agi s lmmut-a , ɣef waya ɣelqen abrid akken ad zren imḍebren anda tewweḍ liḥala imi abrid-a d yiwen seg yiberdan iweɛren di lwilaya ilaqen ad d-afen tifrat s lɛejlan acku yeččur d tikeṛusin akk d lkiran iḥbsen dina dacu kan tamsalt-a ad teqqim tebɛed ɣef wallen n yimḍebren ur yettaran ara lwelha nsen ɣer temsal yecban tigi .
